Hobaje kaodak kho ai ayeienko kongkong kiteikei, hoba nakthühbü kho yungnyu thüka kikei hoba Mühghaü soushou deitaka shongeiko kikei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei laukei, “Ngesakbü kiashi” hoba ngesakbü kikei.
Mühghaüei ngesakbü maia dogo chühenkei, hoba nakthüh ka ngesakbü janyinkei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei ngesakbü to “Chalou” hoba nakthühbü to “Nangnak” dogo ngakei. Hobaje kho chasem si ngeyang kho shaangbounyet kikei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei laukei, “Dei kho chela dangshuoktiashi hoba kho ka dei ka dei janyintiashi.”
Hobaje Mühghaüei dangshuokbü kho küman thükkabou ka phangkabou kho bangnyintikei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei mühkom khoto “Müh” dogo ngakei hoba chasem si ngeyang kikei. Hobaje kho nyibounyet kikei.
Kheijinei Mühghaüei laukei, “Müh phanga kibü dei pendou kaoen chenei takshattiashi, hoba kaolin longtiashi,” hoba kho tegü kikei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei kaolin kho to “Kaodak” dogo laukei hoba dei takshatbü kho to “Yungnyu” dogo laukei, hoba Mühghaüei kho maia dogo chühenkei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei laukei, “Kaoei langshangbü buhekdeihek, busidei hoba sang phang penko longtiashi” hoba kho tegü kikei.
Hobaje kaoei buhekdeihek luluei lulu phang langshangko hekbü buhekdeihek, busidei hoba sang den lulu yemtikukei, hoba Mühghaüei kho maia dogo chühenkei.
Hobaje nangnak si chasem kho sembounyet chalou kikei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei laukei, “Müha mühkom khünei nangnak ka chalou bangnyinla shanga ngesakbü shuong kitiashi; hoba habü shangshen shanga, poanghongjih shanga hoba chalou hoba po shanga,
hoba kaodak ngesakla shanga mühkoma ngesakbü kiashi,” hoba kho tegü kikei.

Mühghaüei ngesak yaangbü penyi kümbei, yaangshangbou kho chanyu, kho chaloua songdakla, hoba hanshangbou ngesakbü kho litnyu, kho nangnak songdakla shanga; haoei tokei khanshoulitshou shuongkei kümbei.
Mühghaüei kaodak ngesakla shanga,
hoba chalou si nangnak songdakla shanga hoba nakthüh ka ngesakbü janyinla mühkoma khübü kho küman phokei, hoba Mühghaüei maian hapbei.
Hobaje chasem si ngeyang ham kho chalou leiboubü kikei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei laukei, “Dei lang kibü yangsikok den pendouei shentiashi, hoba aushuong mühkoma sengeitiashi.”
Hobaje Mühghaüei yungmang kabü molo dei yangsikok hoba deikabü yangsikok hoba kaakyembü au phang phang pakentikei; hoba Mühghaüei kho maiakei dogo chühenkei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei haoen haükuko laukei, “Lang hekko haayaangashi hoba deiei yungnyu shentiashi, hoba kaodaka aushuong haashi.”
Hobaje nangnak si ngeyang kho chalou ngaobounyet kikei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei laukei, “Kaodaka meisiau haoen lulu phang, samkeisamuk phang lulu hoba kaoa shanbü hoba haoen phang phang lulu longtiashi,” hoba kho tegü kikei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei meisiau phang lulu lulu hoba samkeisamuk shatsinam hoba kaoa shanbü yangsikok haoen lulu phang ajanjan pendou kümbei, hoba Mühghaüei kho maiakei dogo chühenkei.

Hobaje Mühghaüei laukei, “Senei müt sen tegü, sen phatbüa kümbho; hoba yungnyua ngau thüka hoba mühkabü aushuong thüka hoba samkeisamuk thüka hoba kaodak pendou thüka hoba kaoa paibü pendou thüka haoen bunyu yingshi.”
Hibü Mühghaüei hao tegü müt yaükei; Mühghaü phatbüa haoei haosi yaükei. Haoei haoen bousu hoba yaksa yaükei.

Hobaje Mühghaüei haosi haükukei; hoba Mühghaüei haosi to laukei, “Bukko haako hauashi, hoba juong haashi, hoba kaodak shentiashi hoba thepetashi. Hobaje yungnyu kabü ngau thüka hoba mühkabü aushuong thüka hoba kaodaka lang kibü ajanjan pendou thüka bunyu yingshi.”
Hobaje Mühghaüei laukei, “Chühashi, kaodaka kibü lilabü hekbü langshangbü buhekdeihek pendou hoba bunyu pendou laoboua hek hekbü ki ngei kan la kuda, kan shanga kho shausiyung kilabü.
Hobaje kaodaka meisiau pendou la hoba mühkabü au pendou la hoba kaoa shanbü pendou la buhekdeihek sangtüngbü shausiyung shanga kuda,” hoba kho tegü kikei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei haoei kümbü pendou hapbei hoba ho aeibou maian kikei. Hobaje chasem si ngeyang kho chalou lakbounyet kikei.
Kho tegü müh si kao pendou yeikei.
Hobaje nyetbounyet Mühghaüei haoei kümbü pendou thonkei; hibü nyetbounyet haoei kümbü kümsilei pendou ka hao haksokei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei chalou nyetbounyet kho haükuko saüenkei; aiei haoei yaübü kümsilei pendou khünei hao haksokei.
Ho müh si kao kümbü meten.
Ladang
Kaodaka bulong deilong ai akitei hoba kelang onglang mokhittei; aieilausi Mühghaüei kaodak to lang ayantiko kikei; hoba kao shapla khünei müt che ongkei akitei,
lausikei kaonyu maang ka dei pakkei hoba deiei kaothe pendou to dei lakkei.
Kheijinei
Kheijinei
Hobaje
Bamang kho nyakko Eden ka shumang che koukei hoba kho ka shumang lei la jankei.
Shaangbou shumang nyen kho Pishon, hoei hon kibü Havila kaodak pendou jembo kouda,
hoba kho kaodak kabü hon kho maibü; hoba khünei phülem hoba oniks laang kia.
Nyiboubü shumang nyen kho Gihon; ho Kush kaijembo kouda.
Hobaje semboubü shumang nyen kho Tigris, ho Assiria chaang aeto kouda. Hobaje leiboubü shumang kho Eufrates.
Hobaje
lausikei maibü si amaibü ngebü bunyu ka nyi teshau; aieilausi nyi laobou chalou ka shaulaje khünyet ka no maimaitham hailabü.”
Tou
Hibü müt khoei samkeisamuk pendou hoba mühkabü au pendou hoba yamkabü meisiau pendou la nyen nyenkukei, lausikei Adam shanga thuiyobü müt mubü che ühüpou.
Hibü
hoba hiplo laobou
Kheijinei müt khoei laukei,
“Ho tou ngeibü lo ka lo hoba
ngeibü phe ka phe;
Sao yaksa dogo nyenlabü,
Aieilausi sao bousu ka
sungenkei.”
Khoei bousuei jembü nyu si bou apyoan jembü yak to maangshikko paplepbo kilabü, hoba ham kho phe chela yeilabü.
Bousubou si yaksanyu ham mütkong kikei, hoba haosi ihimouyoko kikei.
Tou
Yaksanyuei pinyu to jongaiko laukei, “Bamang kabü buhek pendou shaula thükkei,
lausikei laobou bamang jenyua ki, kho buhek ka teshau hoba temeiti khei ayinglonga kan hailabü,” dogo Mühghaüei laukei.
Lausikei pinyuei yaksanyu to jongaiko laukei, “Maimaitham kan ühailabü.
Aieilausi ladang kanei ho shaulaje kheijineitham kan nyek iplabü hoba kan Mühghaü tegü maibü amaibü ngeko yeilabü, dogo Mühghaüei ngekei.”
Ladang yaksanyuei bunyu kabü buhek kho shaula maibü hoba nyekto loubü hoba songsihon hapla dühlabü che dogo hapbei, saoei kheian shaukei hoba saoei laolakei kukei hoba haoei shaukei.
Kheijinei haosi ham nyek ipbei, hoba haosi mütkong dogo ngean apbei; hoba haosiei bhukyik shiyoan haosieibü mang küplepbei.
Kheijinei
Lausikei
Haoei jongaikei, “Ngei bamanga kaibü ngüh ditan ngo mütkong yingbüei hatko hukei.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “No mütkong dogo ka to aoei lenkei? Ngei ka to teshau dogo laubü buhek kho ka nyi shaukei sai?”
Kheijinei müt khoei laukei, “Laobou yaksa nyi kü yoa kila kukei, saoei kho buhek kü la kukei hoba ngei shaukei.”
Kheijinei
Kheijinei
Hobaje ngei no si yaksanyu kanglanga hoba kaibü lilabü si saoeibü lilabü kanglanga dangbou phokulabü; haoei kaibü khu naknyinkulabü hoba nyi haoeibü youdema püplabü.”
Haoei yaksanyu to laukei, “Ngei no na shia künbü onat aei yeitilabü; hoba no na hapbü onat aei yeitilabü; khei yingasikei no kaibü lao to dühbü kilabü, hoba haoei ka thüka songdaklabü.”
Hobaje Adam to haoei laukei, “Ngei teshau laubü bunyu laobou ka nyi ka yakeibü ngüha leko shaukei ka hangshong kaonyua shedsikhau bauda. Kaibü salang sünga khünei hüanmangan shausiyung haplabü.
ka la sang si jak angbü yemtikulabü, hoba nyi khübü yamkabü pikshik shaulabü.
No kao la ayeingai shongko jembü thenyek ka lem longan ong shausiyung haplabü; aieilausi no kao ka sungenkei hoba no kao ki, hoba nyibou no kao la yeilabü.”
Adamei haoyak la Ev nyenkukei, aieilausi sao khunakshousi pendoueibü nyu ki.
Mühghaüei Adam si haoyak la phekhonei mangyuk shian yukkukei.
Hibü
Kho tegü haoei müt kho shian sattikei; hoba langkeibü bunyu lomla Eden bamang chaangbou aenei kaakyembü kherabim hoba pendou ae sepeibü jajalalabü inlou che phokei.
Adamei haoyak Ev to jambei hoba sao mang akongko apbei, hoba saoei Kain bukkei, hoba laukei, “
Hobaje tokei saoei haona Abel bukkei. Hobaje Abel sanlombü kikei, lausikei Kain sekmoubü kikei.
Hobaje jih sühbüa Kainei haoeibü langle ka
Hobaje Abeleikei sanshuong yoka shaang shatbou hoba khoeibü haabü sungbakei. Hobaje
Lausikei Kain hoba haoeibü lembü asunglet; khoei Kain aeibou khauangkei, hoba hao the khümbei.
Hobaje
Nyi maibü kümalonga no asungletlep si? Hobaje nyi maibü akümlonga shabü kho koukhüna semattiko kia, hoba haoei ka to dühda, lausikei nyi kho thükenjan.”
Hobaje Kainei haona Abel to laukei, “Seti yamto koukho.” Hobaje ladang haosi seka kikei, kheijinei Kainei haona Abel khulimbo meimeikei hoba hao haitikei.
Kheijinei
Hobaje tou kaoei kanaeibü sii sungletla haakouan ki hoba kho kao ka ka to shedsikhau bauda.
Nyi ladang kao moulaje kaoei ka la kesiong ayemtikulabü; kaonyudaka no sateibü hoba shoongaibü chela yeilabü.”
Kainei
Tat nyi ngo kaothe ka shian sattida; hoba kathe ka ngo hulabü, hoba kaodaka ngo satbümaubü hoba shoongaibü che la yeilabü hoba aoei ngo haplaje haoei ngo haitilabü.”
Lausikei
Hobaje Kain
Kain haoyak to jambei hoba sao mang akongko apbei hoba bousushou che Enok bukkukei. Kheijinei Kainei sangnyu che kümbei hoba khola haoshou Enok nyen nyenkukei.
Hobaje Enok la Irad bukkukei; hoba Irad kho Mehujaeleibü bou; hoba Mehujael kho Methushaeleibü bou hoba Methushael kho Lamekeibü bou kikei.
Hobaje Lamekei yak nyi ngakei; cheeibü nyen Ada, hoba lubü cheeibü nyen Zila kikei.
Hobaje Adaei Jebal bukkei; hao neichema kibü hoba samkeisamuk kibü shuongeibü bou kikei.
Hobaje haoeibü na nyen Jubal kikei, hao kongkin si pithung jungeibü shuongeibü bou kikei.
Hobaje Zilaei Tubal Kain bukkei, ao chinam hoba nameibü peisilei pendou jangbü müt kikei; hoba Tubal Kaineibü na yaksa Naama kikei.
Lamekei haoeibü yaksi shuong to laukei,
“Ada si Zila, kü ngüh ditashi:
Kan Lamekeibü yaksi shuong,
ngeibü ngüh ditashi:
Ngo leilutibü shanga ngei müt che,
hoba kü la aktibü shanga ngei heshou che haitia.
Kain haitisi langkei nyet lealonga,
Maimaitham ngo haitibou toje anjinlei to nyetnei phoklamlabü.”

Hobaje Adamei jembü yak to tokei jambei hoba bousushou che bukkei, hoba haoeibü nyen Seth nyenkukei. Saoei laukei, “Mühghaüei Abel jeiko kü la lilabü lubü che pienkukei; aieilausi Kainei hao haitikei.”
Hobaje Seth lakei bousushou che bukkukei; hoba haoei hao nyen Enosh dogo nyenkukei. Kheijinei mütshuongei
Adam thensilen doan phobü. (Ladang Mühghaüei müt yaükei haoei hao Mühghaü phatbüa yaükei.
Haoei haoen bousu hoba yaksa yaükei, hoba haoen haükukei. Hobaje ladang haoen yaükei haoei haoen to “Müt” dogo laukei.)
Hobaje Adam po 130 onkei, hao tegü hao phatko bousushou che bukkei, hoba haoeibü nyen Seth nyenkukei.
Seth bukan phaia Adam po 800 kikei, hoba hao ka bousushou si yaksashou kikei.
Hobaje Adam langkei salang sünga po 930 kian hao haikei.
Seth po 105 onjinei hao ka Enosh pakkei;
hoba Enosh bukan phaia Seth po 807 kikei hoba hao ka bousushou si yaksashou hapbei,
hoba Seth langkei salang po 912 kian hao haikei.
Ladang Enosh po 90 kikei hao ka Kanan pakkei,
hoba Kanan bukan phaia Enosh po 815 kikei, hoba lubü bousu si yaksa shou pakkei,
hoba Enosh langkei salang po 905 kikei hoba hao haikei.
Ladang Kanan po 70 onkei, kheijinei haoei Mahalalel hapbei,
hoba Mahalalel bukan phaia Kenan po 840 kikei hoba hao ka bousu si yaksa shousi pakkei,
hoba Kanan langkei salang po 910 kikei hoba hao haikei.
Ladang Mahalalel po 65 kikei kho chaloua hao ka Jared pakkei;
hoba Jared bukan Mahalalel po 830 kikei hoba hao ka bousu si yaksa shousi pakkei.
Hobaje Mahalalel langkei salang sünga po 895 kikei hoba hao haikei.
Ladang Jared po 162 kikei hao ka Enok pakkei,
hoba Enok bukan Jared po 800 kikei, hoba hao ka bousu si yaksa shousi pakkei,
hoba Jared salang po 962 kikei hoba hao haikei.
Ladang Enok po 65 kikei haoei bousushou che Methusela kikei.
Hobaje Methusela bukan phaia Enok Mühghaü yoa po 300 paikei, hoba bousu si yaksa shousi kikei.
Hobaje Enok salang po 365 kikei.
Hobaje Enok Mühghaü yoa paikei; hoba hao akiko apbei, aieilausi Mühghaüei hao leilangkei.
Ladang Methusela po 187 kikei, kheijinei hao ka Lamek pakkei,
hoba Lamek bukan phaia Methusela po 782 kikei, hoba bousu si yaksa shousi pakkei;
Methusela langkei salang pendouei po 969 kikei, hoba kho phaia hao haikei.
Ladang Lamek po 182 kikei, haoei bousushou che kikei,
hoba haoei hao la Noa nyenkukei hoba laukei, “Aieilausi
Hobaje Noa bukan phaia Lamek po 595 kikei hoba haoei bousu si yaksa shousi shuong kikei,
hoba Lamek langkei salang sünga po 777 kikei hoba hao haikei.
Hobaje Noa po 500 jai lean kikei; hoba haoei shousi müt sem - Shem, Ham hoba Jafet kikei.
Ladang kaonyudaka müt bukko haako haula khangkei, yaksa shousi bukkukei.
Khuthükbü shousi shuongei mütshuongeibü nouyangshousi hesisao maian hapbei; hoba haoenei pienbü pendou haoeneibü yakla lekei.
Hobaje

Khübü chaloua Süngbülopbü shuong kiteikei, hoba kho phaiakei, khuthükbü shousi shuong mütshuongeibü nouyang shousi shuong to jambo haoenei haoeneibü shousi shuong bukkukei; haoen kho shangieda thama hau kibü nyenshen mütshuong kikei.
Hobaje kaodaka khunakshousi shedbü shabü yaang dogo, hoba haoeneibü maangpona dambü ponpen amai dogo
Hobaje khunakshousi aila kaodaka kümbei dogo
Hobaje
Lausikei Noa
Ho Noa meten ngühli; Noa saopobü müt kikei, haoeibü meten shedbü akibü Noa Mühghaü yoa paikei.
Hobaje Noaei shousi sem kikei - Shem, Ham hoba Jafet.
Hobaje Mühghaü thedanga kaodak asaopoko kikei, hoba ik shatyobüei shenan kikei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei kaodak to chühsi, kho asaopoko kikei; aieilausi mütshuong haangei amaiko kibüei amaiko yeikei.
Mühghaüei Noa to laukei, “Ngei khunakshousi pendou shemtilabü, aieilausi haoen ik shatyobüei kaodak shena. Ngei haoen kaonyu yoa mautilabü.
Nyi ka shanga kofer buei longchem che dangashi hoba kho maanga shemjang shuong kümashi hoba tangae maangae ham bunaiei naanglepshi.
Hobaje nyi hai kümashi, longchem kho tousüng phakphei 133, khaang phakphei 22 hoba suokbü phakphei 13.
Nyi longchema koulom che jinashi, hoba kho thükaenei iknop che; hoba kho longchem koukhün khoeibü napheinei jinshi; kho nyi phangaenei shemjang nyiboubü hoba semboubü jinan kümshi.
Hobaje chühashi, ngei lang kibü pendou mühnyu phangka mautila kaodak to yungsen sungbada; hoba kaodaka kibü pendou hailabü.
Lausikei ngei ka yoa thebülanbü pholabü; hoba no, kaibü shousi shuong, kaibü yak hoba kaibü shousi shuongeibü yaksi shuong longchem to atlabü.
Hobaje lang kibü meisiau yangsikok pendou ka pi si paang nyibang haoen ka yoa lang kitilabü lele;
au shuong phang weko ka, hoba samkeisamuk phang weko ka hoba kaodaka shanbü yangsikok phang weko ka nyibang kayoa longchem to leian atashi;
ka shanga hoba haoen pendou shanga shausiyung phang penko lamlean phoashi.
Noaei Múhghaüei sakkubü pendou kümbei.”
Kheijinei
Nyi saopobü meisiau weko ka pi si paang tang nyetbang hoba asaopobü meisiau weko ka pi si paang tang nyibang;
mühkabü aushuong kaakei pi si paang tang nyetbang kaodak pendoua lilabü lang kitila shanga ka yoto leibashi.
Aieilausi tat ka jaüan chalou nyet phaia ngei kaodak to lang chalou saonyi hoba langyang saonyi loutilabü; hoba ngei kümbü langkei kibü pendou ngei kaonyudak ka mautilabü.”
Hobaje Noaei
Kaodak to yungsen loujinei Noa po 600 jailean kikei.
Yungsen ka satenla Noa longchem to atkei, hoba hao yoa haoeibü shousi shuong, hao yak hoba hao shousi shuongeibü yaksi shuong dogo atkei.
Saopobü meisiau yo ka hoba asaopobü meisiau yo ka hoba au shuong yo ka hoba kaoa shanbü pendou ka,
penyibang, pi si paang Mühghaüei Noa la sakkubü tegü longchem to atkei.
Hobaje nyetbounyet kaodak to deinyu yungsen loukei.
Noa langkei salang saongao lakboubü, litnyu nyetboubü chalou anthük nyetbouatham yungnyu yaangbü deikük pendou paknyinkei hoba müh koukhün ipbei.
Hobaje lang kho kaodaka chalou saonyi hoba langyang saonyi kikei.
Hobaje khünyettham Noa hoba hao shousi shuong, Shem, Ham, Jafet hoba Noa yak hoba haoen yoa shousieibü yaksi sem kho longchem to atkei.
Haoen hoba yamkabü meisiau pendou phang weko, hoba samkeisamuk pendou phang weko hoba kaoa shanbü pendou phang weko hoba au pendou phang weko, kaakyembü pendou phang weko,
hoba langkei hakhinbü phe pendou ka haoen penyibang Noa yoa longchem to atkei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei sakkubü tegü meisiau yangsikok pendou ka pi si paang Noa yoa atkei hoba
Hobaje yungsen kho kaodaka chalou saonyinyet kikei; hoba dei kho aei aei yeisije longchem kho phongjung angkei, hoba kao ka tonenkei.
Hobaje kaodaka yungsen kho aei haukiko yeisije longchem kho deitaka phongkei.
Dei kho hau kiko yeisije müh phanga shongh suokbü pendou nyembei.
Dei kho iknop anthükngao sühko angsije shongh shuong danglepbei.
Kaonyudaka lang kibü pendou, topeibü yangsikok, meisiau, müt khunakshousi phang pendou shembei.
Kao ulangbüa ai ong hakhinbü soushou langkei kikeije khübü pendou haikei.
Dei kho kaodaka chalou saongao to anjinsem sühko dangyoan khüpbei.
Mühghaüei Noa hoba hao yoa longchema kibü lang kibü meisiau pendou hoba samkeisamuk pendou damenkei; hoba Mühghaüei kaodaka yei che dantikei hoba dei kho hapjung ngaikei.
Yungnyu deikük hoba mühkou khinkei hoba müh ka lang loubü thakan apbei.
Hobaje kho kaodak ka athakko hapjung ngaikei, hoba chalou saongao to anjinsem penan phaia dei kho shijung ngaikei.
Hobaje lit nyetboubü, hoba chalou anthüknyetboubüa longchem kho Ararat shongha otkei.
Hobaje lit anboubü sühko dei kho athakko hapjung ngaikei; lit anboubü chalou shaangbounyet shonghkhu shuong hapbei.
Hobaje chalou saonyi kian, Noaei haoei dangbü longchem kou ipbei,
hoba haoei aukhomakmak che hautikei; hoba kaodak ka dei kho aushongko hau longei dogo seengeikei.
Kheijinei kaodaka dei hapbeilaoje dogo ngela haoei hao jungka dukutuk che hautikei;

lausikei dukutuk khoei pakshang ühüpsije hao jungto longchem to nyibou sepeijung longeikei; aieilausi kaodak pendoua dei kikei. Hobaje haoei jembü ik shingan leian sungan hao jungto longchemmaang to leiyetkei.
Haoei tokei chalou nyet haiyeikei hoba nyibou haoei dukutuk kho longchem ka litikei;
hoba dukutuk kho hao jungto chasem longeikei, hoba chühsi haoeibü sembunga oliv buyik sangtüngbü anan kikei; hibü Noaei kaodaka dei hapa dogo ngekei.
Hobaje toukei haoei chalou nyetnyet haiteian dukutuk kho hautikei; lausikei kho hao jungto sepeijung aloungai.
Noa po 601 shaangbou lit khangnyet dei kho kaodaka ulangtham apbei. Kheijinei Noaei longchemdak yukbü kho sungan apan chühsi kaodak ulangtham kiteikei.
Nyiboubü lit chalou saoto nyetboua kaodak kho lepde ulangtham apbei.
Kheijinei Mühghaüei Noa to laukei,
“No hoba kayak, ka shousi shuong hoba haoeneibü yaksi shuong yoan longchem ka longashi.
Phea nyenbü meisiau, ausiyuk, kaoa shanbü yangsikok pendou longchem ka sungenashi, khoei ong haoen bukko shatko sitko juong haakoyaangko haulabü.”
Hibü Noa, hao shousi shuong, hao yak, hoba shousieibü yaksi shuong longchem ka longkei.
Meisiau, ausiyuk, shanbü yangsikok phang penko longchemmaang ka longkei.
Kho jiha Noaei
Hobaje
‘Kaonyu ki shongko
Langjinbü jih si youlatbü jih
Khamsilüh jih si sanglem jih
Sulang si poang
Chalou si nangnak
ladangkei ananglabü.’ ”
Hobaje Mühghaüei Noa hoba haoeibü shousi shuong haükuko laukei, “Lang hekko haashi hoba kaonyu shentiashi.
Hobaje kaodak meisiau pendou hoba mühkabü au shuong pendou hoba kaoa paibü yangsikok pendou hoba yungnyua kibü ngau pendouei ka to hattilabü; khübü pendou ka ik to jinkuda.
Ngei kan la pikshik shaula kubü tegü lang kibü topeibü meisiau shuong pendou shaula shanga kuda.
Lausikei kanei kho yoa langkei thonbü sii ashaujan.
Hobaje maimaitham kaneibü sii, kho kaneibü langkei sii, ngei hilabü; meisiau pendou ik ka hilabü; hoba jaisina ik ka ngei müteibü langkei hilabü.
Aoyouei ong müteibü sii angtilaje mütei haoeibü sii angtilabü; aieilausi Mühghaü phatbüa müt kümbei.
“Hobaje kan lang hekko juong haashi; kaonyudaka bukko juongko khonei juongnyu haashi.”
Kheijinei Mühghaüei Noa hoba haoeibü shousi shuong yoa hao to joyoko laukei,
“Chühashi, ngei tou kan yoa hoba kan phainei kaneibü thensilen to ngeibü thebülanbü kaangkhühtham khangdayaüda,
hoba kan yoa kibü langkeibü meisiau pendou yoa, au si samkeisamuk yoa hoba kaodak yangsikok pendou yoa longchem ka longbü meisiau pendou yoa ngei ho khanglabü.
Hobaje ngei kan yoa ngeibü thebülanbü kaangkhühtham khangko, khei lang kibü pendou ladangkei yungsenei ashemtilabü; hoba kaodak maulabü lele ladangkei yungsen aikei akilabü.”
Hobaje Mühghaüei laukei, “Ngo hoba kan yoa langkei kümbü pendou kanglanga loulabü meten sühko ngei thebülanbü tetsida ho kümda.
Ngei sangmeia yepukshangjep phokuda, hoba ho ngo hoba kaodakbü kanglanga thebülanbü tetsida kilabü.
Hobaje hai longlabü, ladang ngei kaonyu thüka sangmei nyengan yepukshangjep kho sangmeia haplaje,
ngeibü theyolanyobü ngüh, laobou ngo hoba kan hoba phe thonan lang kibü meisiau pendou ham kanglanga kia, kho ngei damenlabü hoba deiei phe pendou mautilabü lele touje yungsen ladangkei aloulabü.
Hobaje yepukshangjep kho sangmeia kilabü, hoba Mühghaü si kaodaka kibü phe yoka langkei kibü meisiau pendou ham kanglanga kibü thon akibü thesilan damenla shanga ngei hato chühlabü.”
Hobaje Mühghaüei Noa to laukei, “Ho thebülanbü tetsida, laobou ngo hoba kaodaka kibü langkei pendou kanglanga ngei kaangkhühtham khangayaüa.”
Noaeibü shousi shuong aoyou longchem ka longkei khübü kho Shem, Ham, Jafet kikei; hoba Ham Kananeibü bou kikei.
Haoen sem kho Noaeibü shousi kikei, hoba haoen ka kaonyu pendou shenko haakei.
Hobaje Noa sekmoubü la yeian semlühlaak lekei.
Hobaje haoei ih yungan jaketkei hoba hao mütkong neichema kiteikei.
Hobaje Kananeibü bou Hamei bou mütkong hapan haoeibü jaisina müt nyi to tangto angan lenkei.

Hobaje Shem si Jafetei nei che sungan kho haosieibü phaka peian phaito hauan haoeneibü bou mütkong kibü küplepbukei hoba haosieibü thenyek phaiae sepeian haubü ka haosiei haoeneibü bou mütkong kibü kho ühüp.
Hobaje Noa hao ihei jakbü ka pienan hao shou napeibouei ai kümbei kho ngean apbei
Hobaje haoei laukei,
“Kanan shedsikhau yingshi!
Hao haoeibü jaisinasi shuongeibü phangkabü aaola lelabü.
Tokei haoei laukei,
Shemeibü Mühghaü
hoba Kanan Shemeibü aao yingshi.
Mühghaüei Jafet yaangentishi,
hoba hao Shemeibü neichema kitishi;
hoba Kanan haoeibü aaola yingtishi.”
Yungsen louan phaia Noa po 350 kikei.
Hobaje Noa salangbü po 950 kikei, hoba hao haikei.
Noaeibü shousi shuong Shem, Ham, Jafet mütlang mütliei yungsen phaia haoen la shousi shuong bukkukei.
Jafeteibü shousi shuong Komer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshek hoba Turas.
Hobaje Komer shousi shuong: Ashkenaz, Rifat hoba Togarma.
Hobaje Javan shousi shuong: Elisha, Tarshish, Kittim hoba Rodanim.
Habü ka yungkoa kibü mütli shuong linkei. Habü ho jembü kaodaka Jafet shousi shuong haoeibü phanga jembü ngühyem hoba jembü chempen.
Hobaje Ham shousi shuong: Mizraim, Kush, Put hoba Kanan.
Hobaje Kush shousi shuong: Seba, Avila, Sabta, Rama, hoba Sabteka; hoba Rama shousi shuong: Sheba hoba Dedan.
Hobaje Kush ka Nimrod pakkei; hao kaodaka shaangbou lakjaibou che yeikei.
Hao
Shinar kaodaka haoei habü sangle khangkei: Babilon, Erek, Akad, hoba Kalne.
Ho kao ka Assiria to hauan Ninevi, Rehobot Ir,
hoba Ninevi si Kala kanglanga Resen sangyaang lekei.
Hobaje Mizraim ka Ludbü, Aminbü, Lehabbü, Neftubü,
Patrusbü, Kaslubü (laobou ka Filistiabü longkei hoba Kaftorbü pakkei.)
Kananeibü shaangbü shou Sidon, hoba Hitbü;
hoba Jebusbü, Amorbü, Girgashbü,
Hivbü, Arkbü, Sinbü,
Arvadbü, Zemarbü, hoba Hamatbü hao ka loukei; hoba kho phaia Kananbü chung shuong phinjung satkei.
Hobaje Sidon ka Gerar aeto Gaza sühko hoba Sodom, Gomora, Adma, hoba Zeboiim aeto Lasha sühko Kananbü leilang yeikei.
Habü ho haoeneibü kaophei si phanga hoba chung si ngühyemei Hameeibü shousi shuong ki.
Jafeteibü jai hoba Eber shousi pendoueibü bou Shem lakei shousi shuong bukkukei.
Shemeibü shousi shuong Elam, Ashur, Arpakshad, Lud hoba Aram.
Aram shousi shuong Uz, Hul, Geter hoba Meshak.
Hobaje Arpakshad ka Shela pakkei, hoba Shela ka Eber pakkei.
Eber la shousi müt nyi bukkukei; cheeibü nyen Peleg (aieilausi haoeibü jiha kaodak kho janyinkei), hoba naeibü nyen Joktan.
Hobaje Joktan ka Almodad, Shelef, Hazarmavet hoba Jera pakkei,
hoba Hadoram, Uzal, Dikla,
Obal, Abimael, Sheba,
Ofir, Habila hoba Jobab; habü pendou Joktaneibü shousi shuong kikei.
Mesha ka chaangbou shongh Sefar aenei haoen kishang kikei.
Habü ho haoeneibü kaophei si phanga hoba chung si ngühyemei Shemeibü shousi shuong ki.
Habü ho haoeneibü phang shuonga, thensilen haangei Noa shousieibü chungsiphang ki. Hobaje habü ka jaüan yungsen phaia kaonyudaka phang shuong jankei.
Kho jiha kaodak khümboa ngühyem che hoba ngühang che kikei.
Hobaje haoen chaangbou aeto shoongjung haujinei haoenei Shinar kaoa yo che hapbei, hoba khünei kikei.
Hobaje haoen si haoen joyoko laukei, “Kaiya, senei tham nyatan ipan wana yingko juokkho.” Hibü haoenei laang jeila tham juokbü kho lekei, hoba khangyola bunai lekei.
Hobaje haoenei laukei, “Kaiya, senei sangnyua laangshong lapheishon che müha jakko yaüakho, khei yingsi seneibü nyen kilabü hoba kaonyudak shenko alinlabü.”
Lausikei
Hobaje
Kaiya, sen yanakho hoba haoen cheei che aditenlabü lele haoeneibü ngühyem lusaktikho.”
Hibü
Hibü hoeibü nyen Babel dogo nyenkei, aieilausi khünei
Habü ho Shem mütli. Yungsen phainei nyibou poa Shem po 100 jai kijinei Arpakshad hapbei.
Hobaje Arpakshad bukan phaia Shem po 500 kijinei jayang nouyang shousi shuong kikei.
Hobaje Arpakshad po 35 kijinei Shela hapbei;
hoba Shela bukan Arpakshad po 403 lang kijinei jayang nouyangshousi bukkei.
Shela po 30 kijinei Eber bukkei,
kho phaia Eber bukan Shela po 403 kijinei jayang nouyangshousi kikei.
Hobaje Eber po 34 kijinei Peleg kikei.
Hobaje Peleg bukan phaia Eber po 430 kibü jiha jayang nouyangshousi kikei.
Hobaje Peleg po 30 kijinei Reu kikei.
Hobaje Reu bukan phaia po 209 kijinei toukei jayang nouyangshousi kikei.
Hobaje Reu po 32 kijinei Serug kikei.
Hobaje Serug bukan Reu po 207 kijinei jayang nouyangshousi kikei.
Hobaje Serug po 30 kijinei Nahor kikei.
Hobaje Nahor bukan Serug po 200 kian jayang nouyangshousi kikei.
Hobaje Nahor po 29 kian Tera hapbei.
Hobaje Tera bukan Nahor po 119 salang kijinei jayang nouyangshousi kikei.
Hobaje Tera po 70 kijinei Abram, Nahor hoba Haran hapbei.
Habü ho Tera mütli. Tera ka Abram, Nahor hoba Haran pakkei; hoba Haran ka Lot pakkei.
Haobou Tera lang kijinei Haran, hao bukbü kao Khaldi kabü Ur sanga haikei.
Abram si Nahor chemdang yeikei, hoba Abrameibü yak nyen Sarai hoba Nahoreibü yak nyen Milka, sao kho Haraneibü shou hoba Isakeibü boukei hao ong kikei.
Sarai kho angkongbü; saoei shousi akitei.

Teraei haoshou Abram hoba Haran shou Lot haoeibü shi hoba haoeibü shoumaonyu Sarai, hao yoa leian Kanan kaodak to haula shanga Khaldibü Ur sangnyu ka meimeijung haukei. Lausikei Haran sühko hauan haoen khünei kikei.
Tera po 205 kian Harana haikei.
Hobaje ngei ka ka phang yaangbü che yeitikulabü,
hoba no haükulabü;
hoba ngei kaibü nyen yaangentilabü,
Hobaje aoyouei no haükulaje ngei haoen haükulabü,
hoba aoyouei ka to khüklauoklaje ngei haoen la
shedsikhau kulabü,
hoba no danko kaodak phangshuong pendou haükulabü.”
Hibü

Hobaje Abramei haoyak Sarai si shoumo Lot hoba haoenei thansheibü haoenei kibü pendou hoba haoenei Harana müt lajuche leisheikei, khübü pendou leian haukei; hoba haoen Kanan kao to meimeikei hoba haoen khonei sühlangkei.
Hobaje Abram kho kaophei saabü Shekhema More kaoena saopobü bulong sühko loukei. (Kheijinei Kananbü kho kaonyua kiteikei).
Hobaje
Hobaje haoei kho ka Bethel chaangbou aenei hoba Ai chaangbou aenei apyoan haoei haoeibü neichem dangkei. Hobaje khünei haoei
Hobaje Abram Kanan yungthang aeto wakou athakko meimeijung haukei.
Hobaje kho kaonyeka mühsinou kikei hoba Abram Ijepa kila yankei, aieilausi kaonyeka kaangbüsekbü mühsinou kikei.
Hobaje haoei Ijep to atla nyangko loujinei haoei haoyak Sarai to laukei, “Chühashi, no chühla saomaibü yaksa dogo ngei ngekei.
Ladang Ijepbüei no haplaje haoenei laulabü, ‘Ho haoyak.’ Kheijinei haoenei ngo haitilabü, lausikei no langtilabü.
No küna dogo haoen la lenshi; khei yingsije ka laüa kü to thounoulabü hoba kü langkei püetlabü.”
Ladang Abram Ijep kaodak to loukei, Ijepbüei yaksa kho sao aeibou maietnyu hapbei.
Hobaje Faraoeibü yaangenbü atei sao hapan Farao la sao hemaisaomai shangabü sangan lenkei hoba Farao chem to leibakei.
Hobaje sao laüa haoei Abram to maian jungeikei, hoba hao la sanlon, masu, gadu pisipaang, sambü bousu, yaksa hoba ut dogo kukei.
Lausikei
Kheijinei Faraoei Abram ngaan laukei, “Nyi kü to kümbü kho ai? Sao kayak dogo aila alen?
Nyi aila ‘Sao küna’ dogo laukei? Khoei ong ngei sao küyak la lekei. Kayak hanei kia, sao leilangashi!”
Hobaje Faraoei Abram shangabü hao mütshuong la ngühkhüm kuan hao hoba yak hoba haoei kibü pendou yoan Ijep ka sattikei.
Hibü Abram, haoyak hoba haoei kibü pendou hoba Lot yoan Ijep kaodak ka meimeijung yungthang aeto sattikei.
Abram samkeisamuk hoba chandinam si hona aeibou keian kikei.
Hobaje khüka hao yungthang kao ka meimeijung hauan Bethel si Ai kanglanga laonei haoeibü neichem kiteikei, hoba haoei
shaangbü laangshong lemshon yaükei kho Bethel sühlangkei. Khonei Abramei
Hobaje Lot ao Abram yoa haukei haoeikei sanshuong, masu shuong, hoba neichem kikei.
Lausikei haoen liko kila kaoenei asou, aieilausi haoenei kibü juong yingsije haoen liko akien.
Hobaje Abrameibü shatsinam lombü si Loteibü shatsinam lombü oyokei. Kheijinei Kananbü si Perizbü kho kaoena kiteikei.

Hobaje Abramei Lot to laukei, “Seti kanglanga hoba kaibü masu lombou si ngeibü masu lombou kanglanga oyophetyo ai akitila ngei ka to sudajada; aieilausi seti jaisina ki. Kü jungka no lolo bangashi dogo ngei ka to sudajada.
Nyi nanae lealonga ngo maiaeto haulabü; ayingsi nyi maiae lealonga ngo nanaeto haulabü.”
Hobaje Lotei jembü nyek pükan Jordan pholi to chühkei, hoba
Hibü Lotei hao shanga Jordan pholi pendou pienkei; hoba Lot chaang ae haukei. Khonei haosi bangkei.
Abram Kanan kaoa kikei hoba Lot yosiyang sangnyu shuonga kikei, hoba haoeibü neichem Sodom sühko dangkei.
Lausikei Sodombü shuong kho maangsha maangkok yembü hoba
Hobaje Lot bangan phaia
Aieilausi ai kaodak nyi hapda ho pendou ngei ka la hoba kaibü thensilen la thonsithak akiko kulabü.
Hobaje ngei kaibü thensilen molo phetsen tegü yeitikulabü; hibü kho tegü müt cheei kaodak phetsen wela thükalonga kaibü thensilenkei wela thüklabü.
Meimeiashi, kaodak süng si khaang danko paiashi, aishanga ngei ka la ho kulabü.
Hibü Abramei haoeibü neichem sungbaan Hebrona Mamre saopobü bulong nyangko kikei; hoba haoei khünei
Kho jihsiphaia Shinarbü choba Amrafel hoba Elesarbü choba Ariok hoba Elambü choba Kedorlaomer hoba Goimbü choba Tidal haanga,
haoenei Sodombü choba Bera hoba Gomorabü choba Birsha hoba Admabü choba Shinab hoba Zeboimbü choba Shemeber hoba Belabü choba (kho Zoar) yoa wapyo khangkei.
Habü pendou Sidim pholi (Jem Yungnyu) a yoshaikei.
Haoenei po anthüknyi sühko Kedorlaomer khangenkei, hoba po anthüksem boubüa haoenei hao khulimbo meimeikei.
Hobaje po anthüklei boubüa Kedorlaomer hoba hao to thipbü choba shuongei Ashtoreth Karnaima Refaimbü, Hama Zuminbü, Shave-Kiriathima Emimbü
hoba Horbü, haoen Edom shongh sangliphang nyangko kibü Elparan sühko shikei.
Kheijinei haoen sepeijung En Mishpat (kho Kadesh) to louan Amalekbü kaodak hoba Hazaron Tamara kibü Amorbü kaodak khümbo shikei.
Hobaje pendou haoen khulimbo Sodom choba, Gomora choba, Adma choba, Zeboim choba hoba Bela choba (kho Zoar) meimeikei hoba haoenei lason jaman Sidim pholi to wapyola haukei.
Elam choba Kedorlaomer hoba Goim choba Tidal, hoba Shinar choba Amrafel hoba Elasar choba Ariok; haoen choba ngao khulimbo choba lei kho wapyokei.
Tou Sidim pholia naipüngkhün thukukei hoba Sodom si Gomora choba satkei, hoba atje khüto atetkei, hoba haoen joubü shuong shongh to satetlangkei.
Hobaje choba leiei Sodom si Gomora nyaksinam pendou hoba haoeneibü shausiyung khümbo soan satkei.
Hobaje haoenei Abrameibü shoumo Lot, ao Sodoma kikei, hao hoba haoeibü nyaksinam soan satkei.
Hobaje satenbü che louan Ibribü Abram to ho shangabü lenkei. Hao Eshkol jaisina hoba Aner jaisina Amorbü Mamre saopobü bulong nyangko kikei; habü ho Abram to jiyomaiyobü shuong kikei.
Hobaje ladang Abramei hao chempen langsena dogo ditkei, haoeibü chema bukbü haoei leiyenbü sambü müt 318 leian Dan sühko shijung haukei.
Hobaje haoen khulimbo nangnak hao hoba haoeibü sambü shuong haoei janyinkei, hoba haoen kho thükkei; hoba Damaska yungküka kibü Hob sühko shijung haukei.
Hobaje haoei peisilei pendou hoba haoeibü chempen Lotkei haoeibü peisilei yoa, yaksa shuong hoba lubü shuongkei langsenbü ka sepeinyu leian longeikei.
Ladang Abramei Kedorlaomer si hao to thipbü choba shuong thükan longeikei, Sodom choba, Shave Yo (kho choba Yo) to hao shuokla loukei.
Hobaje Salem choba Melkhizedekei wentek si ih sungbakei. Hao Thükkabou Mühghaüeibü Ungshedbou kikei.
Hobaje haoei hao haükuko laukei, “Müh si kao kümbou
hoba aoei kaibü dangboulabou ka ikto kukei, hao Thükkabou Mühghaü to haübü yingshi!” Hobaje Abramei hao la pendou ka an phejan kukei.
Hobaje Sodom Chobaei Abram to laukei, “Kü la mütshuong kho labü lausikei peisilei nyi leshima.”
“Lausikei Abramei Sodom choba to laukei,
khei ngei leipem che ong yingsikei, ngoklüh che ong yingsikei nyi kibü aikei alelabü; aingenyu nyi, ‘Ngei Abram keitikei’ dogo laulabü.
Kü yoa haubü mütshuongeibü phejan hoba heshou shuongei ai shaukei kho to liman ngei ai alelabü: Aner, Eshkol hoba Mamre, haoenje haoen phejan letiashi.”
Kho phaia
Lausikei Abramei laukei, “O
Hobaje Abramei laukei, “Chühashi, nyi kü la lilabü aikei aku; hoba chühashi, kü sambü che ngeibü phet phanlabü kia.”
Hobaje chühashi, nyibou
Hobaje haoei khong to leijung angan laukei, “Tou müh to chühashi, hoba kho weenalonga khanshoulitshou shuong wean chühashi.” Hobaje haoei hao to laukei, “Kho tegü kaibü lilabü kilabü.”
Hobaje Abramei
Hobaje haoei hao to laukei, “Ngo
Lausikei Abramei laukei, “O
Hobaje haoei hao to jongaikei, “Kü shanga masu saoen che shatan po sem, hoba lonpaang che shatan po sem, sanlon paang che shatan po sem, hoba shujem dukutuk che hoba dukutuk che sungba.”
Hobaje haoei khübü pendou sungbaan phei pheia nyangyoko phokei, aieilausi auje apheinyin.
Hobaje phe shaubü aushuong haibü mang thükto louyenkei, lausikei Abramei haoen shian sattikei.
Hobaje chanyu nepbo kian Abram nyeket maiko yepbei; hoba hatlamoklabü nakthüh yaang hao thükto loukei.
Hobaje
Hobaje haoenei khangenbü phang ngei matjemlabü, hoba kho phaia haoen nyaksinam juong yoa longlabü.
Lausikei no sangmaia kaibü bousishuong jungto haulabü; no tükde jailean khünlabü.
Hobaje meten leiboubüa kaibü thensilen hato nyibou loungailabü; aieilausi Amorbü shieikoela haoenei shedbü akümphemkei.”
Hobaje ladang chanyu nepbei, chühashi, wankhük longbü wanthep che hoba wanlongbü hantin che phejan kanglang to dankei.
Kheijinei
Kenbü, Kenizbü hoba Kadmanbü,
Hitbü, Perizbü, Refaimbü,
Amorbü, Kananbü, Girgashbü hoba Jebusbü kaodak pendou ngei kua.”
Tou Sarai, Abram yakei hao la shousi abukku; hoba saoei sambü sao che Ijep sao Hagar nyenbü kikei.
Saraiei Abram to laukei, “Chühashi, ngei shousi abukla
Hobaje Abram Kanan kaoa po an kian, Sarai Abram yakei Ijepsao Hagar, saoeibü samnyu yak la lela kukei.
Hobaje haoei Hagar to jamsi sao mangakongko apbei. Hobaje ladang saoei sao mang akongko apa dogo ngekei, saoei sao sambunyu aweasüngla khangkei.
Hobaje Saraiei Abram to laukei, “Ngeibü shedbü ka to kishi; ngei ngeibü samnyu ka la kukei; hoba ladang saoei sao mang akongkei dogo ngekei sao thedanga ngo aweasüngko yeikei.
Lausikei Abramei Sarai to laukei, “Chühashi, kaibü samnyu kaibü ika kia; ka thea ai maikei kho sao to jungeiashi.” Hobaje Saraiei sao to huoneiyoueiko jungeisije saoei sao thedang ka satkukei.
Hobaje
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Sarai samnyu Hagar, no laka loukei hoba no lato hauda?” Hobaje saoei jongaiko laukei, “Ngo ngeibü sambünyu Sarai jungka satda.”
Hobaje
Hobaje
Hobaje
Hobaje hao müt yoa yambabü gadu tegü kilabü; haoeibü ik müt pendou khulimbo kilabü, hoba müt pendoueibü ik hao khulimbo kilabü.”
Saoei
Khoei deikhün kho Beer Lahai Roi dogo nyenkei; ho tou sühko khünei kia, ho Kadesh si Bared kanglanga ki.
Hibü Hagarei Abram la bousushou che bukkukei; Abramei Hagarei bukbü jembü shou la Ishmael dogo nyenkukei.
Hagarei hao la Ishmael bukkujinei Abram po saolei to lak kikei.
Hobaje ladang Abram po anjinngao to gü onkei,
Hobaje ngei ngeibü thesilan seti kanglanga phokho, hoba no juongnyu haatiyaangtilabü.”
Hobaje Abramei haoeibü the khüman khüpetkei, hoba Mühghaüei hao to laukei,
“Chühashi, ngeibü thesilan ka yoa kia, hoba ho phang juongeibü bou la yeilabü.
Touje kaibü nyen Abram anyenlabü, lausikei Abraham dogo nyenlabü, aieilausi phang juongeibü bou ngei no yeitia.
Hobaje ngei no lang juong hekbü yeitilabü, hoba ka ka ngei phang shuong longtikulabü hoba ka ka choba shuong longlabü.

“Hobaje ka shanga hoba ka phainei kaibü thensilen shanga Mühghaü kila shanga seti kanglanga hoba ka phainei kaibü thensilen ham kanglanga meten pendoua thon akibü theyolanyobü kila shanga ngeibü thesilan kümlabü.
Hobaje ngei ka la hoba ka phainei kaibü thensilen la, no paishang kaodak, Kanan kaodak pendou, ponpen kaneibü yingla kulabü, hoba ngo haoeneibü Mühghaü kilabü.”
Hobaje Mühghaüei Abraham to laukei, “Nyije, no hoba kaphainei kaibü thensilen haoen meten pendoua ngeibü thesilan jungeijan.
Ngeibü thesilan, laobou seti hoba kaphainei kaibü thensilen kanglanga kanei pholabü, khei kan yoa bousu pendou kipan apjan.
Kan kiplabü, hoba ho ngo hoba kan kanglanga thebülanbü tetsida kilabü.
Loulabü metena kan yo kabü chalou set onbü bousushou, kan chema bukbü ayingsi yenbou ka namei jekbü, kaibü thensilen ayingsikei, haoen pendou kiplabü.
Kaibü chema bukbü yingasikei, kaibü namei jekbü yingasikei pendou kiplabü. Hobaje ngeibü thebülanbü kaibü phea thon akibü thesilan shanga kilabü.
Hobaje akipbü bousu, ao tangkabü phe akip, hao jembü mütli ka wapan aplabü; haoei ngeibü thesilan lulima.”
Hobaje Mühghaüei Abraham to laukei, “Kayak Sarai shangakei saoeibü nyen Sarai dogo tenyen, lausikei sao Sara dogo kilabü.
Hobaje ngei sao haükulabü, hoba tokei aei ngei sao danko ka la bousushou che kulabü, haü, ngei sao haükulabü, hoba sao phangshuongeibü nyu la yeilabü; phangeibü choba shuong sao ka longlabü.”
Kheijinei Abraham the khüman nyikei hoba haoeibü maanga laukei, “Müt che bukan po saongao onan bousushou buklep lo? Hobaje Sara po anjinngao onan saoei shou buklep lo?”
Kheijinei Abrahamei Mühghaü to laukei, “Ishmael ka thea kia yingma!”

Hobaje Mühghaüei laukei, “Aying, kayak Saraei ka la jayangshou che bukkulabü, hoba nyi hao nyen Isak dogo nyenkulabü; hoba hao phainei haoeibü lilabü shanga thon akibü theyolanyobü kilabü lele ngei hao yoa ngeibü thebülanbü kümlabü.

Hobaje Ishmael shangabü nyi laubü ngei dida; chühashi, ngei hao haükua, hoba ngei hao lang hekbü yeitikulabü, hoba hao juong haatikulabü; hao choba anthüknyieibü bou la yeilabü, hoba ngei hao phangyaang yeitikulabü.
Lausikei Isak, ao Saraei ngiempo ho jih tükdea buklabü ki, hao yoa ngeibü thesilan kümlabü.”
Hobaje haoei hao to joyobü nangkei, hoba Mühghaü Abraham jungka angkei.

Hobaje Abrahamei haoshou Ishmael hoba hao chema bukbü pendou hoba haoeibü namei jekbü pendou, haoeibü chema kibü müt yoka bousu pendou leijung louan, Mühghaüei hao to lenbü tegütham haoen phea tangkabü khop khünyettham kipan apbukei.
Hobaje Abrahamei haoeibü tangkabü khop kipan apjinei hao po anjinngaoto gü kikei.
Hobaje hao shou Ishmael, hao jembü tangkabü khop kipjinei po anthüksem kikei.
Khünyettham Abraham hoba haoshou Ishmael haosi ham kipbei.
Hobaje haoeibü chema kibü bousu pendou hoba chema bukbü si yenbou ka namei jekbü yoan hao yoa kipan apbei.
Abraham chaloua aeibou sanglam jiha neichem koukhüna setan kijinei
Hobaje haoei tangko chühkei, hoba chühashi, müt sem hao thedanga lokei. Hobaje haoei haoen hapjinei hao neichem koukhün ka haoen to haüyola laangjung hauan kaoa sühko khüpetan laukei.
“Ngeibü
Tou dei shisho sungbakho, hoba kan you makan bunyu long phanga haksoashi.
Hobaje ngei wentek shisho sungbakukho, hoba kan haksoashi; kho phaia ong haushi; aieilausi kan kaneibü sambü jungto loukei.” Hobaje haoenei laukei, “Maiakei, nyi laubü tegü yingshi.”
Hibü Abraham neichem to aeibou panteiko atan Sara to laukei, “Hali, wen inyaibü angsok sem jinan lamleashi, hoba kho nyatyoan wentek kümashi.”
Hobaje Abrahamkei tongde masu shuong yoto haukei hoba masu shoushou netthembü che sungjung longeian haoeibü sambü shuong la kukei hoba haoei kho lamlekei.
Hobaje haoei makon hoba sendei hoba masu shoushou laobou haoei lamlean kikei kho sungjung hauan haoen thedanga phokukei. Hobaje haoen shauji yungjinei hao haoen nyangko bunyu jungthema lokei.
Kheijinei haoenei hao to laukei, “Kayak Sara lan ki?” hoba haoei jongaikei, “Sao neichema kia.”
Hobaje haoen yoa cheei laukei, “Ladang ngiempo ho jihsiphai longeilaje, maimaitham ngo ka jungto loungailabü, hoba chühashi, kayak Saraei bousushou che buklabü.”
Hobaje haoeibü phaidak ka Saraei ditkei.
Tou Abraham si Sara sinan kikei, hoba po danan kikei, hoba Sara to yaksaeibü haang thonan apan kikei.
Saraei jembü maanga nyiko laukei, “Tou ngo nou lean ngei olinbü haplep lo?”
Kheijinei
Kheijinei Sara hatkei, khoei sao yepeikei hoba laukei, “Ngo anyi.” Lausikei haoei laukei, “Maimaitham no nyia.”
Hobaje mütshuong khüka meimeian Sodom aeto chühyantikei, hoba Abrahamei haoen hangan hautikei.
Kheijinei
Maimaitham Abraham phangyaang yeilabü hoba hau kibü yeilabü, hoba kaodak phang pendou hao danko haülabü.
Aishanga hao shousi hoba hao phainei haoeibü thensilen to ai saopobü janbü hoba ngühmai ki kho jungeiko
Kheijinei
ngo tou yanan, kü jungto loubü ngühyobü tegü haoenei pendou aenei jungeilaoje chühkho; khei ayinglonga, ngei ngelabü.”
Hobaje mütshuong kho khüka sepeinyu Sodom aeto haukei, lausikei Abrahamje tokei
Hobaje Abrahamei nyangko louan laukei, “Nyi saopobü müt shabü shuong yoa mautilep lo?
Sangnyu khünei saopobü müt anjinsem kialonga nyi khünei kibü saopobü müt anjinsem nyena sangnyu kho asenetko mautilep lo?

Kho tegü jungeila ka jungka lounyu bang an kia; shedbü shabü müt yoa saopobü mautisi saopobü mütshuong shedbü shabü tegü yeilabü; kho ka jungka lounyu bangakei! Kaodak pendou matjembouei ngühmai ajungeilep lo?”
Hobaje Abrahamei jongaiko laukei, “Chühashi, thamngu si tapei
saopobü müt anjinsem kho ngaoei apensi ngaoei abenbü shanga sangnyu kho mautilep sai?” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ngei khünei saonyi to ngao hapalonga kho amautikulabü.”
Hobaje toukei haoei hao to joyoko laukei, “Khünei saonyi hapsi lai?” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ngei saonyi shangakei kho ajungeilabü.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “O
Abrahamei laukei, “Tou chühashi, ngei
Kheijinei haoei laukei, “O
Hobaje

Hobaje khuthük hangangbü müt nyi kho chasem Sodom to loukei, hoba Lot Sodom bakhüna setan kikei. Hobaje Lotei haosi hapan haosi to haüyola lokei, hoba haoei haoeibü thenyek kao ae yeian hao lolo khüpetkei.
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Tou chühashi, ngeibü
Hobaje haoei haosi to aeibou susije haosi hao yoa chem to atkei, hoba haoei haosi la lem che likuko tokai ajinbü wentek kangan haosi la okkei, hoba haosiei shaukei.
Lausikei haosi ayeptoua sangnyubü, Sodombü shuong nashou chingbü pendou sangkhu sangyou pendou ka louan chem komlepbei.
Hobaje haoenei Lot ngaan laukei, “Ka jungto tao lotbü müt kho lanei ki? Künei haosi ngelabü lele haosi kün jungto leian kaiyanga.”
Hobaje Lot haoen jungto khongto longan hao phai kou khinkei.
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ngeibü jaisinasi shuong, hai amaiko tejungei.

Tou bousu angebü ngeibü nouyangshou nyi kia; ngei haosi kanla leilangtikho, hoba kan thea ai maikei kho haosi to jungeiashi; lausikei habü mütshuong to ong ai tejungei, aieilausi haosi ngeibü chemsophang to lotakei.”

Lausikei haoenei laukei, “Kün la lam kukkubü.” Hobaje haoenei laukei, “Ho müt ho miet ong lousi hao matjembou yeikho lauda: tou künei haosi to jungeilabü toje ka to aei amaibou jungeilabü.” Hobaje haoenei müt khüto (kho Lot to), kaang aüan koutiko koukap leilulabü lele kikei.
Lausikei müt nyi khoei ik shingan angtian Lot chem to senetngailangko kou kapbei.
Hobaje haoen koukhün junga lobü hanbü yaangbü pendou la nyek thutiko ngümsi haoenei koukhün lambüei haoen lolo mangkei.
Hobaje müt khoei Lot to laukei, “Ka yoa hanei lubü müt kilao? Kaibü haishou kounyang, hoba kaibü jayang nouyangshou shuong hoba sangnyua aoyou kilaje khübü leisheiashi;
aishanga künei ho sangnyu mautikulabü; aieilausi ho sang khulimbo ngekbü
Hobaje Lotei hauan haoeibü nouyangshousi ngabü bousu shuong to joyoko laukei, “Haka hali meimeian longashi, aieilausi

Hobaje ladang lang ngekei, kheijinei khuthük hangangbü nyiei Lot thungeiko laukei, “Hali meimeiashi, kayak hoba hanei kibü kaibü nouyangshou nyi leiashi, khei ayinglonga no ho sangnyueibü shedbü shabüa maulabü.”
Lausikei hao sukeitemeiko kikei; hoba

Hobaje ladang haosiei haoen sangnyu napheito leian loukei, haosi yoa cheei laukei, “Kaibü langkei shanga satashi, nyi sepeinyu techühngai, hoba pholi kaoakei tüot; no amaulabü lele shongh to satashi.”
Hobaje Lotei haosi to laukei, “O kho khei aying, ngeibü bunyu shuong!

Tou chühashi, kaibü sambü ka thea onou yaang hapa, hoba nyi kaibü onou yaangbü la yeiko haatia, laobou nyi kü langkei püetbüei tang khittikei; lausikei ngo shongh to satla athük, aingenyu kü to denche thushed longan ngo hailabü.
Tou chühashi, nyangetnyu laangjung hauan sühlabü sangnyu che kia, kho hanbüshou, O, ngo khünei satentiashi (ho hanbüshou ayingsi?) hoba ngeibü langkei kilabü.”
Hobaje haoei hao to laukei, “Chühashi, ngei ho shangakei no sungletda, khei nyi laobou sang shanga laukei kho ngei amautikulabü.
Hali khünei satetlangashi; aieilausi no khüto aloushongko ngei ai akümen.” Hibü ho sang to Zoar dogo laukei.
Lotei ZoarmMOAB: ‘tetlabü Kü Bou ka’ sühjinei kaonyua chanyu phaman kiteikei.
Kheijinei
hoba haoei khübü sangnyu si pholi pendou, hoba sangnyua kibü pendou hoba kaoa kibü pendou shemtikei.
Lausikei hao phainei Loteibü yakei phai chühngaikei, hoba sao jem on thaonyu che la yeikei.
Nyibounyet ngeyang enyu Abraham pian hao
hoba haoei Sodom si Gomora ae pholi kaodak to chühyantikei, hoba haoei kho kao ka wankhük kho wanang ka wankhük longbü phatko hapbei.
Lausikei ladang Mühghaüei pholi kaodaka kibü sangnyu shuong mautikei, haoei Lot kibü sangnyu shuong mautijinei Mühghaüei Abraham damenko, maulabü yo ka Lot satentikei.
Hobaje Lotei Zoar ka haoeibü nouyangshou nyi yoa shongh to angkei; aieilausi haoei Zoara kila hatkei. Hao hoba hao shou yaksashou müt nyi kho laangpoba kikei.
Hobaje noushounyuei nashounyu to laukei, “Abou jai lea, kaodak haang tegü seti to jamlabü nyangbüa ao aki;
kaiya, seneibü bou lilabü phola shanga setiei abou la ih yungtikho, hoba seti hao to yepakho.
Hobaje khüyou haosiei haosieibü bou la ih yungtikei, hoba noushounyu atan bou yoa yepbei. Sao ladang yepkei hoba ladang pienkei bouei ange.”
Nyibounyet noushounyuei nashounyu to laukei, “Miou ngo kübou yoa yepbei; senei aboueibü lilabü phola shanga taokei setiei hao la ih inkho, no atan hao yoa yepshi.”
Hobaje khüyoukei haosiei bou la ih inkei, hoba nashounyu hauan hao yoa yepbei, hoba sao ladang yepkei hoba ladang pienkei bouei ange.
Kho khei Loteibü nouyangshou müt nyi ham haosieibü bouei mangakongko apbei.
Hobaje nouyangnyuei bousushou che bukkei, hoba hao nyen Moab dogo nyenkei, hoba hao tat sühko Moabbü bou ki.
Hobaje nashounyuei bousushou che bukkei hoba hao nyen Ben-ammi dogo nyenkei, hao kho tat sühko Amon shousi shuongeibü bou ki.
Tou Abraham khüka yungthang aeto meimeijung hauan Kadesh si Shur kanglanga kikei. Longche Gerara thüngkei,
hoba khünei Abrahamei haoyak Sara shangabü lenkei, “Sao küna ki.” Kheijinei Gerarbü Abimelek Chobaei Sara leila hautikei hoba sao leibakei.
Lausikei Mühghaüei Abimelek to nangnak manga longan lenkei, “Chühashi, yaksa laobou nyi lekei kho haangshong no hailabü lele ong kia, aieilausi sao chemkanbü yaksa ki.”
Tou Abimelek sao nyangko mo ohaukei, hibü haoei laukei, “
Haoei kü to ‘Sao ngeibü na’ dogo laukei ayingsi? Hobaje yaksanyueikei jembü lolo ‘Hao ngeibü jai’ dogo alau lo? Kü maangpon tangbü hoba ik hinseibüei ngei ho kümsilei kümbei.”

Kheijinei Mühghaüei manga hao to laukei, “Haü, nyi kaibü maangpon tangbüei ho kümsilei kümbei dogo ngei ngeakei, hoba toukei ngo khulimbo shed shonlabü ka ngei no senetkei. Khoei ngei ka la sao to ameititi.
Hibü müt khoeibü yak kho ngaitikuashi, aieilausi hao thuseibü, hoba haoei ka shanga sukujakulabü, hoba no langlabü. Lausikei nyi sao akungailonga tükde no hoba nyi kibü pendou hailabü.”
Nyibounyet ngeyang enyu Abimelek pikei hoba hao phanga yaangbü shuong pendou ngashaikei hoba haoei haüthükbü pendou haoen to lenkei, hoba haoen aeibou hatkei.
Kheijinei Abimelekei Abraham hao jungto ngaan hao to laukei, “Nyi kü thükto hoba kü sangle to shedbü hatetche sungbalabü lele ngei ka thedanga ai mashikkei? Ai ajungeijan ki kho nyi kü to jungeia.”
Hobaje Abimelekei Abraham to phekei, “Nyi ho ai dambüei kümbei?”
Hobaje Abrahamei jongaikei, “Aieilausi ho kaoa Mühghaü to hatbü aki; khoei haoenei küyak laüa ngo haitilabü.
Hobaje khüto limbo, sao maimaitham küna, küboueibü shou, lausikei kü nyueibü shou aying, hoba sao küyak la yeikei.
Hobaje ladang Mühghaüei küboueibü chem ka ngo kükto thangto hautikei, kheijinei ngei sao to laukei, ‘Sen haushang pendoua “Hao küjai yingkei” dogo lauko nyi kaibü sanou kü to lenjan’ dogo laukei.”
Kheijinei Abimelekei san hoba masu pongsu, hoba aaomüt bousu si yaksa hoba haoyak Sara hao la kungaikei.
Hobaje Abimelekei laukei, “Chühashi, ngeibü kaodak ka thedanga kia; no kimangsühbüa kishima.”
Hobaje Sara to haoei laukei, “Ngei kajai la chandinam hajar che kuda; chühashi, ho kayoa kibü pendou thedanga no ashedbü aukabü ki hoba pendou thea no matmaitia.”
Hobaje Abrahamei Mühghaü to sukeijakei, hoba Mühghaüei Abimelek hoba haoyak, hoba haoeibü aaosao shuong shousi kilabü lele maitikukei;
aishanga Abrahameibü yak Sara haangshong
Tou
Hobaje Sara mangakongko apan Abraham la, hao baushi sinan apan Mühghaüei haoei takletkubü chaloua bousushou che bukkukei.
Hobaje Abrahamei hao la Saraei bukkubü jayangshou la Isak nyenkukei.
Ladang Isak chalou set onkei Mühghaüei haola sakkubü tegü Abrahamei kipbukei.
Haoshou Isak haola bukkujinei Abraham po saongao jai lean kiteikei.
Hobaje Saraei laukei, “Mühghaüei ngo nyitikei; hoba ho shangabü ditbü shuong pendouei kü yoa nyilabü.”
Hobaje saoei laukei, “Aoei Abraham to Saraei na yopbulabü dogo laula? Lausikei ngei hao jai lean hao la bousushou che bukkua.”
Hobaje nashou kho chingko sen apyokei, hoba Abrahamei Isakei sen apyonyet lem yaangbü che kümbukei.
Hobaje Ijep sao Hagareibü shou laobou saoei Abraham la bukkukei, Saraei saoeibü shou to hatlenko hapbei.
Hibü saoei Abraham to laukei, “Ho aaosao si saoeibü shou shian sattiashi; aieilausi ho aao saoeibü shou kü shou Isak to phetphana ühamlabü.”
Khoei haoshou Ishmael laüa Abraham aeibou maanga amaiko kikei.
Lausikei Mühghaüei Abraham to laukei, “Nashou si kaibü sambüsao shangabü no aolinko teki; Saraei ka to lenbü pendoua sao to ngüha leashi; aieilausi Isak danko kaibü lilabü weeilabü.
Ngei sambü aaoeibü shou kakei phang che yeitikulabü, aieilausi hao kaibü lilabü ki.”

Nyibounyet ngeyang enyu Abrahamei wentek si phekhun shongmok che deiei shenko jinan Hagar la kukei. Haoei kho saoeibü phaka tonan jinkukei hoba sao la na kho kuan hangan hautikei. Hobaje sao bangjung satan Beersheba phetsen kaodaka shoongeikei.
Ladang phekhun shongmok kabü dei kho khümbei, saoei na kho buham phang chenei apyokei.
Hobaje saoei hao thedang ka longche hauan, phak saosem thüng saan setkei; aishanga saoei lolo laukei, “Ngei na haibü to techühkho.” Hobaje sao khonei setan ngüh angko haapbei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei nashou haapbü kho ditkei, hoba Mühghaü khuthük hangangbüei khuthük ka Hagar ngako laukei, “No ai kümda, Hagar? Tehüt, aieilausi Mühghaüei nashoubou hao kishanga haapbü dida.
Meimeiashi, nashou kho phonan kaibü ikei jenan sungashi, aieilausi ngei hao ka phang yaangbü che yeitilabü.”
Hobaje Mühghaüei saoeibü nyek ipbukei hoba dei kibü kaoen che hapbei; hoba saoei hauan phekhun shongmok kho deiei shenko khuan na la yungtikei.
Hobaje Mühghaü nashou yoa kikei, hoba hao chingkei; hoba yama kikei, hoba hao chingko lau jungbü müt che la yeikei.
Hao Paran yama thüngkei, hoba haonyuei hao shanga Ijepsao che ngakukei.
Kho jihsiphaia Abimelek si Lajamleibou Fikolei Abraham to laukei, “Nyi kümbü ajanjan pendoua Mühghaü ka yoa kia

Hibü tou kü to Mühghaü nyen phongko khei nyi kü to hoba ngeibü shousi shuongto hoba ngeibü thensilen to akhüp alanglabü; lausikei ngei ka to jungeibü sanou tegü, nyi kü to, hoba ai kaodaka ong no thüngkei khüto jungeilabü dogo thekuashi.”
Abrahamei laukei, “Ngei thedalanda.”
Kheijinei Abrahamei Abimelek to deikhün laobou Abimelekeibü sambü shuongei sokei kho shanga ngühphe kikei.
Lausikei Abimelekei laukei, “Ho aoei kümbeije ngei angekei, nyikei kü to alen, tat ong ditda.”
Kheijinei Abrahamei san hoba masu pongsu sungbaan Abimelek la kukei, hoba haosi ham ngüh lanyokei.
Abrahamei sanlon saoen nyet sanshuong yoka pinyinan phokei.
Hobaje Abimelekei Abraham to laukei, “Habü sanlon saoen nyet pinyinan phobü kho tetlabü ai?”
Abrahamei jongaikei, “Ho deikhün ngei thukei dogo aukabü lela shanga sanlon shoushou nyet ho ngeibü ik ka sungletashi.”
Hibü kho kaodak la Beersheba dogo nyenkukei, aieilausi haosi ham khünei theyolanyokei.
Kho tegü haoen Beershebaa theyolanyokei, hoba Abimelek si haoeibü Lajamleibou Fikol meimeijung Filistia kaodak to ngaikei.
Hobaje Abrahamei tamarisk bu che Beershebaa kekei, hoba Thonakibü Mühghaü
Hobaje Abraham Filistia kaodaka chalou lounyu thüngkei.
Jihsiphai tuisho hauan phaia Mühghaüei Abraham takteikei hoba hao to laukei, “Abraham!” Hobaje Abrahamei jongaiko laukei, “Ngo hanei kia!”

Kheijinei Mühghaüei laukei, “Kashou, kashou jayangshou Isak, laobou nyi sanouda, hao leian Moria kaodak to hauashi. Hobaje khünei ngei ka la shean lenlabü shongh chenei nyi hao kü la juokbü lembü kuashi.”

Nyibounyet ngeyang enyu Abraham pian haoeibü gadua setshang jinan, hao yoa sambü müt nyi hoba haoshou Isak yoan leikei, hoba haoei juokbü lembü shanga bu shenan meimeijung Mühghaüei hao to lenbü kaoen che khüto haukei.
Sembounyet Abrahamei saabü ka kaoen to chühangtikei.
Haoei haoeibü sambü nyi to laukei, “Kasi gadu yoa hanei haiyeiko kiteishi, hoba küshou küsi thito haulabü hoba künei leman nyibou kasi jungto longeilabü.”
Abrahamei juokbü lembü shanga bu sungan haoshou Isak la küntikei, hoba haoei wan si in jungkei; hoba haosi ham liko haukei.
Isakei laukei, “Abou.” Hobaje haoei jongaikei, “Küshou, ai ma?” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Wan si bu kia, lausikei lembü kula sanlon shoushou lan ki?”
Hobaje Abrahamei jongaikei, “Küshou, Mühghaüei juokbü lembü shanga san shoushou lamlekulabü.” Hibü haosi ham liko haukei.
Ladang haosi Mühghaüei lenbü kaoen sühkei, Abrahamei khünei laangshongei lemshang yaükei, hoba bu shean jaan phokei. Hobaje haoshou Isak khühan haoeibü lemshang thüka peithetnyu yeptikei.
Kheijinei Abrahamei haoeibü ikei jembü shou haitila in tonenkei.
Lausikei
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Na to ik tüt. Hobaje hao to ai teküm; Nyi Mühghaü to ngüha leda hoba hatda dogo ngei ngea; aishanga nyi kashou che ong kibü khokei aphokai.”
Hobaje Abrahamei chühangtisi hao phainei sanlon paang che haoeibü laangei hama minetan hapbei, hoba yam to hauan sanlon paang kho sungan haoshou jeila juokbü lembü kukei.
Hibü Abrahamei ho kaonyek la “Jihova-jire” dogo nyenkukei. Tat sühko lauyobü tegü, “
Hobaje
hoba laukei, “
hoba ngei no haükulabü hoba haabüyaangbüa ngei kaibü thensilen müha khanshoulitshou tegü hoba molo yungkoa kibü phetsen tegü haatilabü. Hobaje kaibü thensilenei haoeneibü dangbou koukhün kimlabü.
Hobaje kaibü thensilen danko kaonyu phang pendou haükulabü; aieilausi nyi kü ngüha lekei.”
Hibü Abrahamei jembü sambü nyi jungto ngaian, haoen liko meimeijung Beersheba to haukei. Hobaje Abraham Beershebaa kikei.
Jih tuisho kian phaia Abraham to hai laukei, “Chühashi, kaibü na Nahor lakei Milkaei shousi bukkua.”
Uz, shaang bukbü, Buz, haoeibü na, Kemuel (Arameibü bou)
hoba Kesed, Hazo, Pildash, Jidlaf hoba Bethuel.
Hobaje Bethuelei Rebeka hapbei. Habü müt set Milkaei Abrahameibü na Nahor la bukkukei.
Hobaje haoeibü thangnyu nyenei Reuma, saoeikei Teba, Gaham, Tahash hoba Maaka, dogo bukkukei.
Sara salang po saongaoto saotonyet kikei.
Hobaje Sara Kanan kaodak Kiriat Arba (kho Hebron) a haikei, hoba Abraham Sara shanga mang haapla atkei.
Hobaje Abrahamei haibü mang apyoan meimeijung haukei, hoba Hitbü shousi shuong to laukei,
“Ngo kan yoa yenbou hoba küksithang ki, ngei ngeibü haibü mang khünla thüklabü lele kanei küla mang khünshang kaoen che yakbü.”
Hitbü shuongei Abraham to jongaiko laukei,
“Küneibü ngüha lebü, bunyubou. No kün yoa yaangenbou che ki, küneibü hee maiboua kaibü haibü mang khünashi. Nyi kaibü haibü mang akhünlabü lele kün aoeikei haoeibü hee asenetlabü.”
Abraham loenkei hoba kho kaodak kabü mütshuong thedanga khüpetkei (kho Hitbü).
Hobaje haoei haoen to joyoko laukei, “Ngei ngeibü haibü mang khünla kanei maanganga longa, kü to ngüha lekai, hoba Zoar shou Efron to,
haoei haoeibü kao thonbüa kibü Makpela laangpob laobou haoeibü ki, kho kü la yakkula phekushi. Mu muko haoei ngeibü khünshang yingla kan thedanga kho kü la kutiashi.”
Kheijinei Hit shousi shuong yoa Efron setan kiteikei, hoba Efronei Hit shousi shuong thedanga haoeibü sangnyu bakhün danjung angbü pendou thedanga Abraham to jongaiko laukei,
“Aying, bunyubou, kü ngüha lebü; kao kho ngei kala kuda, hoba khünei kibü laangpob ngei ngeibü eikshuong shousi shuong thedanga ngei kho kala kuda; kaibü haibü khünashi.”
Hobaje Abrahamei kho kaodak mütshuong thedanga khüpetkei.
Hobaje haoei kaonyek kabü mütshuong thedanga Efron to joyoko laukei, “Lausikei nyi maang angalonga kü to ngüha lekai, ngei ho kao munam kala kukho; ho küka leashi, hoba khünei ngeibü haibü khünkho.”
Hobaje Efronei Abraham to jongaiko laukei,
“Ngeibü
Hobaje Abrahamei Efron ngüha lekei; hoba Abrahamei Efron la haoei Hitbü shousi shuong thedanga laubü tegü chandinam shekel saongao lei namseibü shuongei jungeibü hima kukei.
Hibü Efronei ai kao Makpelaa kikei, laobou Mamre thedanga kikei, kao khünei kibü laangpob hoba kho kaijembo laobou ki, leilanga sühko kibü busidei pendou Abrahameibü la yeikei.
Habü Hitbü thedanga haoeibü sangnyu danjung angbü müt pendou thedanga Abrahameibü yingla aukabü kukei.
Kho phaia, Abrahamei Mamre thedanga kibü Makpela kao laangpoba Sara khünkei, ho Mamre Kanan kaodaka kibü Hebron to jetei.
Hibü kao kho hoba khünei kibü laangjakbü heekhün kho Abraham la khünshang shanga Hitbü shuongei aukabü leko kukei.
Tou Abraham baushi sina, hoba po juong yingan kikei, hoba hangsilam pendoua
Hobaje haoeibü chema sambü jaishoubou, ao haoei kibü pendou thüka kikei, hao to Abrahamei laukei, “Kaibü ik ngeibü youshi kanglanga phoashi,
hoba ngei kato
Lausikei nyi ngeibü kaodak hoba ngeibü phang jungto hauan küshou Isak shanga yak leibakujan.”
Hobaje sambüei hao to laukei, “Aingenyu yaksanyuei küphai ho kaodak to semmang asühlep yingkou? Chühashi, ngei kashou laobou kaodak ka no loukei khüto nyibou leian ngailep sai?”
Hobaje Abrahamei hao to laukei, “Nyi küshou nyibou kho kaodak to leian tengai:
Hobaje yaksa khoei kaphai semla maang üanglonga kheijinei ngei kato theyolanyobü shanga aikei shedbü akilabü; nyi küshou khüto nyibou leian angaijan.”
Hobaje sambü khoei haoeibü ik Abrahameibü youshi kanglang to attian ngüh kho shanga thekeilankei.

Hobaje sambü khoei haoeibü bunyuboueibü ut an leian meimeijung haukei; aieilausi haoeibü bunyuboueibü peisilei pendou haoeibü ika kikei: hoba hao meimeijung Mesopotamia a kibü Nahor sangnyu to haukei.
Hobaje chasemlamto yaksa dei khula haubü jiha haoei sangnyu napheinei deikhün nyangko ut khüpettikei.
Hobaje haoei laukei, “O
Chühashi, ngo dei nyangko loakei, hoba sangnyu kabü saoshuong dei khula louda.

Hobaje ho longtiashi, laobou medei to ngei dei yungla shanga kaibü dei ilechak sanoudambo tonletashi dogo laulaje, hoba aoei yungashi hoba ngei kaibü ut lakei yungtikho dogo laulaje kho nyi kaibü sambü Isak shanga pienbü yingtishi. Hobaje khoei nyi ngeibü bunyubou to sanoua dogo ngelabü.”
Hobaje haoei welaubü athontoua Rebeka, ao Abrahameibü na Nahoreibü yak Milkaeibü shou Bethuelei bukkei, saoei ilechak phaka tonan loukei.
Hobaje medeinyu kho chühla sao maian kikei. Saosüngbü medei che, bousu aotokei ühüpyobü; saoei dei khula atan saoeibü ilechak shenko khuan longkei.
Hobaje sambü khoei sao to joyola laangjung hauan laukei, “Sanoudambo kaibü ilechak ka dei shijo inbü.”
Hobaje saoei laukei, “Yungashi bunyubou,” hoba saoei panteiko saoeibü ilechak kho saoeibü phak ka tonletan hao la inkei.
Hobaje saoei hao la yungtian laukei, “Ngei kaibü ut shangakei haoen maang anyem shongko dei khubakho.”
Hobaje saoei panteiko saoeibü ilechak ka buphaua dei jinan, deikhün to nyibou laangjung hauan haoeibü ut pendou shanga dei khukei.
Hobaje müt khoei
Hobaje ladang utei dei yungkhümbei, müt khoei shekel thoche takbü hon kungsaü hoba saoeibü ik shanga hon jikhap penyi shekel an thüngeibü sungenkei.
Hobaje haoei laukei, “No aoeibü shou? Küla lenbü. Kaibü bou chema kün sühshang kiasaoma?”
“Ngo Milka shou, Bethueleibü shou, ao saoei Nahor la bukkukei.”
Saoei tokei hao to laukei, “Künei youho si nyem souko kia, hoba sühshang kia.”
Hobaje müt khoei khu küpjung kouan
Hobaje haoei laukei, “
Hobaje medeinyu kho laangjung hauan saoeibü nyueibü chempen la habü ngühli pendou lenkei.
Tou Rebekaeibü jai che nyenei Laban kikei; hoba hao müt khüto haüyola deikhün sühko laangjung haukei.

Hobaje haoei kungsaü hapbei, hoba haonaeibü ika jikhap hapbei, hoba ladang haoei na Rebekaeibü ngüh müt khoei küto hai joyokei dogo laubü ditkei, kheijinei hao kho müt jungto haukei. Hobaje chühashi, hao ut yoa deikhün nyangko loan hapbei.
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Kaiya, no
Hibü müt kho chem to atkei hoba Labanei ut onkünbü setshang sengkukei hoba haoei hao la ut shanga youho si nyem sungbakei, hoba hao hoba hao yoa loubü shuong shanga yousakla dei sungbakei.
Hobaje hao la hao thedanga shausiyung phokukei, lausikei haoei laukei, “Ngei ngeibü ngühlang alenshongko teshaukho.” Hobaje Labanei laukei, “Kholonga künla lenbü.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ngo Abrahameibü sambü.
ei ngeibü bunyubou aeibou haükua, hoba hao aeibou keian yeia. Hobaje haoei hao la sanshuong hoba masu shuong, chandinam si hon, sambü shuong si sambüsao shuong hoba ut si gadu dogo kukei.
Sara, ngeibü bunyuboueibü yakei ngeibü bunyu la, sao nou lean bousushou che bukkukei; hoba haoei hao la haoei kibü pendou kua.
Hobaje ngeibü bunyubouei küto thetilantiko laukei, ‘Nyi küshou shanga Kanan saoshuong, aoyou yoa ngo kida khüka yak tengaku;
lausikei no kübou chem to hoba ngeibü phang jungto hauan ngeibü shou shanga yak leiba.’
Hobaje ngei ngeibü bunyubou to laukei, ‘Aingenyu yaksanyuei küphai semmang asühlep yingkou?’
Hobaje haoei küto laukei, ‘
Kheijinei no ladang kü kaodak to loulaje, nyi küto thebülanbü shanga aikei shedbü akilabü, hoba haoenei kala sao akulonga, no ngeibü thebülanbü shanga shedbü akilabü.’
“Hobaje ngo tat deikhün to louan laukei: O
chühashi, ngo deikhün nyangko loakei, hoba medei ao deikhula loulaje hoba aoto ngei, ‘Kaibü ilechak ka küla yungla labü,’ dogo laula,
hoba saoei kü to, ‘Nyi yungashi, hoba ngei kaibü ut shangakei dei khubakho,’ dogo laulaje kho
Hobaje ngei kü maangpona alaukhümtoua, chühashi, Rebeka jembü phaka ilechak tonan loukei, hoba deikhün to hauan dei khukei. Hobaje ngei sao to laukei, ‘Küla dei inbü dogo ngei kato sudajada.’
Hobaje saoei panteiko ilechak phak ka tonletko laukei, ‘Yungashi, hoba kaibü ut lakei yungtikho.’ Hibü ngei yungkei hoba saoei ut lakei yungtikei.

Hobaje ngei sao to phekei, ‘No aoeibü shou?’ Hobaje saoei laukei, ‘Nahor shou Bethuel la Milkaei bukkubü nouyangshou.’ Kheijinei ngei chimen kho saoeibü kunga jinkukei, hoba sao la ikngüma jikhap khapbukei.
Hobaje ngei ngeibü khu khüpjung atkei hoba
Hobaje tou kanei ngeibü bunyubou sanouko hoba tükde jungeimang sühalonga kü la lenbüma; hoba tejungeikho lausi küla lenbüma; ngo maiaeto ayingsi nanaeto sepeilabü.”
Kheijinei Laban si Bethuelei jongaiko laukei, “Ho
Chühashi, Rebeka kathedanga kia, sao leian hauashi, hoba
Kheijinei Abrahameibü sambüei haoeneibü ngüh kho ditan haoei hao lolo
Hobaje sambü khoei hon, chandinam, hoba peisilei sungjung louan Rebeka la kukei; hoba haoei saoeibü jai la hoba saoeibü nyu la namsek peisilei kukei.
Kheijinei hao hoba hao yoa kibü mütshuongei shauan yungan khüyou khünei dantikei, hoba nyibounyet haoen pienan haoei laukei, “Ngo ngeibü bunyubou jungto hautikai.”
Lausikei Rebekaeibü jai si haonyuei laukei, “Sao kün yoa chalou shisho, khei annyet ongkei phokushi hoba kho phaia sao haula thükkei.”
Lausikei haoei haoen to laukei, “
Kheijinei haoenei laukei, “Künei sao ngaan phekho.”
Hibü haoenei Rebeka ngaan phekei, “No ho müt yoa haumang sühdalao?” Saoei laukei, “Ngo haulabü.”
Hibü haoenei haoeneibü na Rebeka hoba saoeibü sambüsao hoba Abrahameibü sambü hoba haoen mütshuong hautikei.
Hobaje haoenei haoeneibü na Rebeka haüyoan phaia laukei,
“Nashounyu, no hajar hajar lauko juong thükkabü nyu yeishi!
Kaibü lilabü haoeneibü dangbou shuongeibü bakhün la leshi.”
Kheijinei Rebeka si saoeibü sambüsao shuong lamlekei hoba Abraham sambü yoa haula ut to pükkei. Hobaje sambüei Rebeka leian jembü lam to haukei.
Isak Beer Lahai Roi ka loukei, aieilausi hao yungthang aenei kikei.
Hobaje Isak damanchühla chasemlamto sek aeto haukei, hoba haoei limchühsi ut louko hapbei.
Hobaje Rebekaeikei chühangtisi Isak hapbei, hoba saoei Isak hapsi sao ut ka louyenkei.
Hobaje saoei sambü to phekei, “Sen shuokla sek aeto louko kibou kho ao?” Sambüei laukei, “Hao ngeibü bunyubou.” Hobaje Rebekaei jembü thenyek yukbü nei sungan neikhu yukkei.
Hobaje sambü khoei Isak la haoei kümbü pendou lenkei.
Hobaje Isakei haonyu Saraeibü neichem to sao leiyetan Rebeka lekei, hoba haoei sao sanoukei, hoba haoeibü nyu haian phaia hao maang haksokei.
Hobaje Abrahamei lubü yaksa che lekei, hoba saoeibü nyen Ketura kikei,
hoba saoei hao la Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak hoba Shua bukkukei.
Hobaje Jokshan ka Sheba hoba Dedan pakkei. Hobaje Dedaneibü shousi shuong Ashurim, Letushim hoba Leumim kikei.
Hobaje Midianeibü shousi shuong Efa, Efer, Hanok, Abida hoba Elda kikei. Habü pendou Keturaeibü lilabü kikei.
Abrahamei haoei kibü pendou Isak la kukei hoba hao lang kian haoshou Isak jungka haoen chaangbou aeto sattikei.
Lausikei Abrahamei ngabü thangnyu shuongeibü shousi la haoei jongsak kukei, hoba haoshou Isak jungka hao lang kian chaangbou aeto sattikei.
Abraham langkei salang po saongaoto anjinleito ngao onbüa haikei.
Hobaje Abrahamei haoeibü thonbü hak hinko haoeibü salangei muan haikei, müta jaishou, hoba poei onsapbü, hoba hao jembü mütli yoa yokei.
Hao shounyi, Isak si Ishmaelei hao Hitbü Zohareibü shou Efron kaoa Mamre nyangko kibü Makpela heea khünkei.
Abrahamei laobou kao Hitbü shousi shuong ka jekkei, khünei Abraham si haoyak Sara khünkei.
Hobaje Abraham haian phaia Mühghaüei haoshou Isak haükukei, hoba Isak Beer Lahai Roia kikei.
Ijep sao Hagar, Sara sambüsaoei Abraham la bukkubü, Abrahameibü shou Ishmael thensilen ho,
hoba Ishmaeleibü shousi theneithenko nyen shuong habü ho: Nebaiot, hoba Kedar, Adbil hoba Mibsam,
Mishma, Duma, Masa,
Hadad, Tema, Jetur, Nafish hoba Kedema.
Khübü kho Ishmaeleibü shousi shuong haoen jembü sang hoba jembü kishangei haoeneibü nyen shenda hoba ho chung weko ka kongnyu müt anthüknyi.
Hobaje Ishmaelkei salang po saongaoto khujinto nyet kijinei thonbü hak hinan haikei, hoba hao jembü mütli yoa yokei.
Hobaje haoeibü thensilen Assiria aeto haujinei Ijep kaodak nyangko Havila ka Shur sühkoa haoen kikei; haoei jembü jaisina pendou to dangan ajiaphaiko kikei.
Abrahameibü shou Isak meten ho: Abraham ka Isak pakkei,
hoba Isakei Padan Arama kibü Arambü Bethueleibü nouyang hoba Labaneibü na Rebeka hao yakla lela ngajinei hao po saonyi kikei.
Hobaje Isakei yak shanga
Hobaje saoeibü shimunga nashou kho aüyokei, hoba saoei laukei, “Hai kialonga ngo lai kümla?” Hobaje saoei
“Kaibü nasetshanga phang penyi kia;
phang penyi kaibü shimung ka bangtilabü.
Phang che kho phang che to hau kibou kilabü;
hoba jaishoubouei nashoubou khangenlabü.”
Ladang shou buklabü jih sühkei, chühashi, saoeibü nasetshanga phokbü shou kikei.
Shaangbou kho saklangtham, mang pendou wiei yuklepan bukkei, hoba haoenei hao nyen Esau nyenkukei.
Hobaje kho phaia na bukkei hoba haoeibü ikei Esaueibü youdema hatlepan kikei, hoba haoeibü nyen Jakob nyenkei. Rebekaei haosi bukjinei Isak po saosem kikei.
Hobaje shounyi kho chingkei; hoba Esau meikipbüa sonenbü hoba tanlambü müt che kikei; hoba Jakob eaaoabü müt hoba neichema kikei.
Isakei Esau to sanoukei, aishanga haoei Esauei kipbabü yamphe shaukei; lausikei Rebekaei Jakob to sanoukei.
Jakobei chakshoushik thungan kikei, hoba Esau yam ka mühei haiyetnyu lungkei.
Hobaje Esauei Jakob to laukei, “Hali, saklangle thungbü shik khüka kü la okbü; aishanga ngo mühphama!” (Khoei hao nyen Edom nyenkei, tetlabü ‘Saklangbü’).
Kheijinei Jakobei laukei, “Shaangla kü la kaibü jaishoubou phet yaakbü.”
Hobaje Esauei laukei, “Ngo hailabü lele kia, hoba ngei jaishou phejan phet khoei ai pailetla?”
Lausikei Jakobei laukei, “Kü thedanga shaangla thealanashi.” Hibü Esauei hao to thekolanko haoeibü jaishou phejan phet kho Jakob la yaakkukei.
Kheijinei Jakobei Esau la wentek hoba wenshik si ngoulangshik thungbü okkei. Hobaje haoei shauan yungan meimeijung jembü lam to haukei. Kho tegü Esauei haoeibü jaishou phejan phet aweasüng.
Thedangto Abrahameibü jihsiphaia mühsinou kibü to liman kho kaodaka uangmuang lubü che kikei. Hobaje Isak Filistiabü choba Abimelek jungto Gerar to haukei.
Hobaje
Ho kaodaka thüngshi, hoba ngo ka yoa kilabü hoba no haükulabü. Aishanga kala hoba kaibü thensilen la ngei ho kaodak pendou kulabü, hoba ngei kabou Abraham to theyolanyobü loushadtikulabü.
Hobaje ngei kaibü thensilen müha khanshoulitshou tegü juong haatikulabü, hoba kaibü thensilen la ho kaodak khümbo kulabü hoba kaibü lilabüa kaodak pendou haülabü.
Aieilausi Abrahamei kü ngüha lekei, hoba ngei sakkubü, ngeibü ngühkhüm deikhüm hoba ngeibü songsido jungeikei.”
Hibü Isak Gerara kikei.

Hobaje khünei kibü mütshuongei hao to haoyak shangabü phekei, hoba haoei “Sao küyak” dogo laula hatsi “Sao küna” dogo laukei. “Aingenyu khünei kibü mütshuongei Rebeka laüa ngo haitilabü; aieilausi sao chühla saomaiakei.”
Ladang hao khünei chalou lounyu kikei, Filistiabü choba Abimelekei koulom ka chühkei, hoba chühsi haoei Isakei yak Rebeka to sanouyoko hapbei.

Hobaje Abimelekei Isak ngaan laukei, “Maimaitham sao kayak yingakei, hoba nyi ailai ‘Sao küna’ dogo laukei?” Kheijinei Isakei hao to jongaiko laukei, “Aieilausi ngei dambei, aingenyu ngo sao hangshong hailabü.”
Hobaje Abimelekei laukei, “Nyi kün to ai kümbei? Mütshuong yoa cheei kayak yoa sosotham yepenakei, hoba nyi kün thükto shedbü sungbakhoulabü.”
Kheijinei Abimelekei müt pendou la ngühkhüm kuko laukei, “Aoyouei ho müt ayingsi haoyak to ik atlaje, hao tükde haitilabü.”
Isakei kho kaodaka youli saakkei, hoba kho poathama saongao juong latkei, aishanga
Hobaje müt kho akeiayaang shongko hao aei aei kiko haako haukei.
Hobaje haoeibü san si masu shuong shuonga hoba sambü juong kiko chemdang yaang yeisi Filistiabüei hao to nyekto shatkei.
Hobaje haoboueibü sambü shuongei Abraham haanga thuenbü deikhün pendou Filistiabüei thamei thuan shamtikei.
Hobaje Abimelekei Isak to laukei, “Kün jungka kukashi; aieilausi no künto hau kibou yeia.”
Kheijinei Isakei khüka kukjung satkei, hoba Gerar pholia neichem dangan khünei kikei.
Hobaje Isakei haobou Abraham haanga thubü deikhün nyibou thungaikei, aieilausi Abraham haian phaia Filistiabüei khübü kho thuan shamtikukei, hoba haoei haobouei nyenkubü nyen khübüla nyenngaikukei.
Hobaje Isakeibü sambü shuongei yomanga yungdei pakbü deikhün che thuenkei.
Lausikei Gerarbü sanlombü shuongei Isakeibü sanlombü shuong to oyoko laukei, “Dei kho küneibü! Hibü haoei kho deikhün nyen Esek dogo nyenkei, aieilausi haoenei hao to oyokei.”
Hobaje haoenei nyibou deikhün che thukei, hoba haoenei khokei soyokei; hoba haoei kho nyen Sitna dogo nyenkei.
Hobaje haoei kho ka hauan, lubü deikhün che thukei, hoba kho aoei asoyo. Hobaje haoei khoeibü nyen Rehobot dogo nyenkei hoba laukei, “Aieilausi touje
Khüka hao Beersheba to angkei.
Khüyou
Hobaje Isakei khünei laangshongei lemshon che yaükei hoba
Kheijinei Abimelek Gerar ka hao thangbou Ahuzzat yoa, haoeibü sepai shuong lajamleibou Fikol yoa Isak to haüyola haukei.
Kheijinei Isakei haoen to phekei, “Kanei küto the shouda, hoba kan jungka bangtikei, kholonga kan kü jungto aila louda?”
Hobaje haoenei jongaikei, “
kho khei künei kala ai akümbubü tegü, hoba künei kato maibü to liman aikei akümbü tegü, hoba no sangmaia bangtibü tegü, nyi kün khon asaktilabü lele no tou
Hobaje Isakei haoen shanga lem likuko shaukei yungkei.
Hobaje haoen ngeyang enyu pian haoen cheei che to theyokei. Hobaje Isakei haoen hautikei hoba haoenei hao ka sangmaia bangkei.
Khünyettham Isakeibü sambü shuongei louan haoenei thubü deikhün shanga lenkei, hoba hao to laukei, “Künei deikhün hapa.”
Haoei khola “Sheba” nyenkukei; khoei ho sangnyu to tat sühko Beersheba dogo lauda.
Esau po saonyi kijinei, haoei Hitbü Beerieibü nouyangshou Judit, hoba Hitbü Eloneibü nouyangshou Basemat yakla ngakei.
Haoenei Isak si Rebekaeibü langkei aeibou maangnoutikei.
Ladang Isak baushi sinkei hoba haoeibü nyek yukmetan haoei ühüp, haoei haoshou jaishoubou Esau ngaan hao to laukei, “Küshou.” Haoei jongaikei, “Ngo hanei kia.”
Isakei laukei, “Ngo tou baushi sina, hoba hailabü chalou angekei.
Hibü ngei kato sudajada, kaibü laujin phot hoba kaibü lau jungan yamto kouan küla meishi phe sungba.
Ngei mühbü tegü shaula ngeibü sembunga maibü shausiyung lamlean küla sungba, ngei kho shauan ngo ühaijinei ngei no haükulabü lele.”
Tou Isakei jembü shou Esau to joyojinei Rebekaei ditkei. Hobaje Esau meishi kipbala yamto koukei.
Hobaje Rebekaei haoshou Jakob to laukei, “Lo, kabouei kajai Esau to joyobü ngei dida.
Haoei hai laukei, ‘Küla meishi kipbaan ngei maikubü shausiyung lamleashi, hoba ngei kho shauan ngo ühaitoua no
Tou, küshou, ngei kala lenbü ditashi hoba kü ngüha leko kümashi.
Tou sanshuong yoto hauan khüka shoushou penyi küla sungba, hoba ngei khoei kabouei mühbü tegü hao sembunga maibü shausiyung lamlekukho.
Hobaje nyi kabou jungto kho jungan hauashi; haoei kho shauan hao ühaijinei no haükulabü haang.”
Hobaje Jakobei haonyu to hai laukei, “Küjai Esau wi angbü müt, hoba ngo lenglengbü.
Aingenyu kübouei küto makan chühlabü, hoba hao thedanga ngo khüpbülangbü yinglabü hoba küla haülabü ayingko shedsikhau ong khüpan jinngailabü.”
Hobaje haonyuei hao to laukei, “Küshou, kaibü shedsikhau küto yingshi, kü ngüha ong leko khübü kho küman sungba.”
Hibü haoei hauan khübü lapan haonyu jungto sungbakei, hoba nyuei haoboueibü sembunga maikubü tegü lamlekukei.
Rebekaei haoshou jaishoubou Esaueibü neisimei saoei chema kibü maiboutham sungbaan shou nashoubou Jakob la yukkukei.
Tokei saoei haoeibü ika hoba haoeibü ngüm lenglengbüa loneibü khon yukkukei.
Hobaje saoei lamlebü meimaibü shausiyung hoba wentek kho haoshou Jakob ika kukei.
Hao bou jungto hauan laukei, “Abou,” hoba haoei laukei, “Ngo hanei kia, küshou. No laobou yingkeima?”
Jakobei bou to laukei, “Ngo Esau, kashou jaishoubou; nyi lenbü tegü ngei küma; sanoudambo pian nyi ngo haükulabü lele ngeibü meishi phe shauashi.”
Hobaje Isakei haoshou to phekei, “Nyi ho ailai tongde hapbei, küshou?” Haoei laukei, “Aieilausi
Kheijinei Isakei Jakob to laukei, “Nyangko kaishima; ngei kato meitiko no tükde küshou Esau yinglaoje ngela shanga.”
Jakob bou jungto nyangko haukei; haoei hao to meitiko laukei, “Ngühje Jakobeibü ngüh, ikje Esaueibü ik.”
Hobaje haoei hao ashen, aieilausi haojai Esau tegü haoeibü ik wiei yuklepan kikei; hibü haoei hao haükukei.
Hobaje haoei laukei, “No tükde küshou Esau sai?” Hobaje haoei jongaikei, “Ngo yingkei.”

Kheijinei haoei laukei, “Kü jungto nyangko sungba, ngei haülabü shanga küshoueibü meishi phe kho shaukho.” Jakobei kho hao jungto nyangko sungbaan shaukei hoba ihkei hao jungto nyangko sungbaan yungkei.
Kheijinei haobouei hao to laukei, “Tou kü jungto nyangko louan sembung shepshi küshou.”
Kho tegü hao nyangko hauan haoeibü sembung to shepbei. Ladang haoei haoeibü nei lüm jemenkei, haoei hao haükuko laukei, “Chühashi, küshoueibü lüm
Mühghaüei kala mühkabü nindei ka hoba kaodak haabü ka youshou si ih juong kushi.

Mütshuongei no khangenshi, hoba phangshuongei kato khüpetshi. Kaibü jaisinasi shuong thüka bunyu yeishi; hoba kanyueibü shousi shuongei ka thedanga khüpetashi. Kato khükbüokbü shuong pendou to khüksiuok yingshi, hoba no haükubü shuong haükushi.”
Isakei Jakob haükuan Jakob haobou jungka satsilengko jai Esau meikipbü ka lungkei.
Hobaje haoeibü sembunga maikubü shausiyung lamlean bou jungto sungbakei, hoba haoei bou to laukei, “Abou, nyi ngo haükulabü lele pian kashoueibü meishi phe shauashi.”
Haobou Isakei laukei, “No ao?” Haoei jongaikei, “Ngo kashou jaishoubou.”
Isak sensentham lühko laukei, “Khülonga, aoei kü jungto meishi phe sungbakei? No aloujinei ngei hao ka hian shauan hao haükua. Haü, hao haüko kilabü.”
Ladang Esauei kho ngüh ditkei, haoei maang pakko aeibou khauko haapbo ngekkei hoba haobou to laukei, “Abou kaibü haülabü ka ongkei labü.”
Lausikei Isakei laukei, “Kana kokshua louan kaibü haülabü langa.”

Esauei laukei, “Haoeibü nyen tükde Jakob nyenkei aying lo? Haoei ngo tou hoei nyibou huonda; haoei ngeibü jaishou phejan phetkei langkua, hoba tou chühashi, haoei ngeibü haülabü sunglangkua!” Hobaje haoei phekei, “Kü shanga nyi haülabü che ongkei ajoulet lo?”

Isakei Esau to jongaiko laukei, “Chühashi, ngei hao bunyu yeitia, hoba jaisina chempen pendou haoeibü sambü la lela hao la kua, hoba nyak si ihei ngei hao haükua. Khülonga ngei ka shanga ai kümla küshou?”
Esauei haobou to laukei, “Kaibü haülabü che ongkei jouan kialonga küla labü,” dogo ngekko haapbei.
Haobou Isakei hao to jongaiko laukei,
“No kishanga haabü teibü kaonyu si
mühkabü nindei akilabü.
No inlouei lang kilabü hoba nyi kana khangenlabü.
Lausikei no ladang toplaje kaibü ngüm ka
haoeibü kaangkhüh yukthelabü.”
Haobouei Jakob haükubü shanga Esauei hao mangsenkei; hoba Esauei haoeibü maangpona laukei, “Kübou mang haaplabü chalou sühdabü kheijinei ngei Jakob haitilabü.”
Ladang shou jaishouboueibü ngüh kho Rebeka to lenkei, saoei shou nashoubou Jakob ngala hautiko laukei, “Chühashi, kajai Esauei no haitila lamleko hao lolo maang sungaida.
Hibü küshou, kü ngüha leashi, hoba meimeijung küjai Laban jungto Haran kaodak to satashi.
Hobaje kajai maangsak longbü asem shongko hao yoa longche khüpashi.
Kajai khauang ka asepei shongko hoba nyi hao to jungeibü ama shongko kiteishi. Kho phaia ngei no ngala hautiko khüka no leingailabü. Kasi ham nyetchenei ong kü jungka aila maula?”
Kheijinei Rebekaei Isak to laukei, “Hit sao habü ho tegübü yoa kibüei ngo oanshema. Jakobeikei Hit sao habü yoka, habü kaodak kabü yak ngaalonga ngo lang akibü ong sobou.”
Hibü Isakei Jakob ngakei hoba hao haükukei, hoba hao la maangsanglabü ngüh lenko laukei, “Nyi Kanan sao yakla tenga.
Kanyueibü bou Bethuel chemto Padan Aram to meimeijung hauashi, hoba khünei kanyueibü jai Labaneibü nouyangshou ka müt che leashi.
Hobaje Pendou Thükenbou Mühghaüei no haükushi, hoba no haatishi, hoba no phangshou phangna bou la ayeishongko ka ka juong yeitishi.
No tou yenla lean kibü kaonyu, laobou kaodak Mühghaüei Abraham la kukei, kho nyi leoulabü lele haoei Abraham la kubü haülabü ka la hoba kaibü thensilen la naku.”
Hobaje Isakei Jakob hautikei, hoba haoei Jakob si Esaueibü nyu Rebekaeibü jai Arambü Bethuel shou Laban jungto Padan Aram to hautikei.
Tou Isakei Jakob haükuan hautia dogo ditkei hoba haoei hao haükujinei, “Nyi Kanan sao shuong yoka yaksa telema,” dogo hao la ngühkhüm kubü,
hoba Jakobei nyusiboueibü ngüha leko Padan Aram to haua dogo Esauei ngeenkei,
hoba Esauei Kanan sao ngabüei Isak maang ühaiko hapbei.
Hibü Esau Ishmael jungto hauan jembü shaangbü yaksi thükto Abraham shou Ishmaeleibü nouyangshou Nebaioteibü na Mahalat yakla ngakei.
Hobaje Jakob Beersheba ka meimeijung Haran to haukei.
Hao kaoen che to loukei, hoba khünei hao langyang sünga thüngkei, aieilausi chanyu nepan kikei. Hobaje haoei khünei kibü laang che sungan haoeibü khuaüla lean khünei yepla lengkei.
Hobaje haoei mangh che likei, hoba chühashi, chung che kaoa jaan chung hotenei khuthük sühko onlangkei; hoba chühashi, khuthük hangangbü khonei ang louyan dogo hapbei.
Hobaje
Kaibü thensilen kaodak phetsen tegü yeilabü, hoba no chaang, chanep, yungkük, yungthang sühko haajung haulabü. Hobaje no hoba kaibü thensilen danko kaodak mütshuong pendou haükulabü.
