Hobaje chühashi, ngo ka yoa kia, hoba no laeto ong haulaje ngei püetlabü, hoba no nyibou ho kaodak to leian loungailabü; aieilausi ngei ka la thekubü aküm shongko ngei no üpyolabü.”
Ladang Jakob yepbü ka pienkei haoei laukei, “Maimaitham
Hao hatko kikei, hoba haoei laukei, “Ho latetche hatlabü kaoen ki! Ho lubü aying, Mühghaü chem, ho khuthük bakhün.”
Hobaje Jakobei ngeyang enyu pian haoei khuaüla lebü laang kho sungan kekei, hoba kho thüka oliv onang jonkei.
Hobaje haoei kho kaoen la Bethel nyenkukei, (lausikei shaangla ho sangnyu nyen Luz nyenan kikei.)
Hobaje Jakobei thekolanko laukei, “Mühghaü kü yoa kialonga hoba ngo haushanga ngo püetalonga hoba kü la shausiyung kualonga, hoba neila neisimei kualonga,
hoba nyibou kübou chem to sangmaia loungaitia longa, kheijinei
hoba ngei phonan kebü laang ho Mühghaü chem yeilabü; hoba nyi kü la kubü pendou ka ngei ka la an phejan kulabü.”
Kheijinei Jakob haoeibü wakoua chaang aekabü kaodak to loukei.

Hobaje haoei chühsi, khünei khongthua deikhün che nyangko san si lon shuong tan sem phetetnyu yepan hapbei, aieilausi kho deikhün ka haoenei sanshuong la dei yungtikei. Hobaje deikhün sembunga laang yaangbünyu kikei.
Ladang sanshuong pendou takshatlaje haoenei deikhün sembung kabü laang kho kukan sattian san shuong la dei yungtian laang kho nyibou hao phoshang deikhün sembung to ngaitiko lekei.
Jakobei sanlombü shuong to phekei, “Jaisinasi shuong, kan laka loukei?” Haoenei jongaikei, “Kün Haran ka.”
Haoei haoen ka phekei, “Kanei Nahoreibü shou Laban ngekeilao?” Haoenei jongaikei, “Haü, künei hao ngeakei.”
Haoei phekei, “Hao maisho kiakouba lo?” Haoenei jongaikei, “Hao maisho kia, hoba chühashi, haoshou nouyangshou Rachel san yoa hato louada.”
Jakobei haoen to laukei, “Chühashi, tou chakung angombei hoba sanshuong leisheilabü jih mosüh, hibü sanshuong la dei inla hoba lamshaula leian hauashi.”
Kheijinei haoenei laukei, “Sanshuong pendou ayoshai shongko hoba haoenei deikhün sembung ka laang kho khokan üpbu shongko künei athük; khoei kho khokan apan phaia ong künei san la dei inda.”
Haoei haoen to joyoko kitoua Rachel boueibü sansilon shuong leian loukei; aieilausi saoei haoen lombei.
Ladang Jakobei haonyueibü jai Labaneibü nouyangshou Rachel hoba hao kou Labaneibü san hapbei, Jakobei nyangko hauan deikhün ka laang khokan apbuan haokou Labaneibü san shuong la dei inkei.
Hobaje Jakobei Rachel sembung to shepbei, hoba ngüh angko haapbei.
Kheijinei Jakobei Rachel to hao saoeibü bou chempen hoba Rebekaeibü shou dogo lenkei; hoba saoei laangjung hauan bou la lenkei.
Ladang Labanei haonaeibü shou shangabü ngühlang ditkei, haoei hao shuokla laangjung haukei. Haoei hao bamlepan sembung shepbei, hoba haoei hao chem to leiyetkei.
Kheijinei Labanei laukei, “Maimai no kü phe hoba kü sii;” hoba lit che mauko hao khünei kikei.
Labanei Jakob to laukei, “No chempen yingbü shangakei nyi kü la kong kümbula ayingbü kaibü mu shanga kü la lenbüma.”
Tou Labanei nouyangshou müt nyi kikei; noushounyueibü nyen Lea hoba nashounyueibü nyen Rachel.
Lea nyeka hau aki, lausikei Rachel saomaibü hoba süngsilop maibü che kikei.
Jakobei Rachel sanoukei; hoba haoei laukei, “Ngei kashou nashounyu Rachel shanga po nyet khangenkho.”
Hobaje Labanei jongaiko laukei, “Ngei lubü müt la kubü khantoje ka la kubü maibou; kü yoa kishi.”
Jakobei Rachel shanga po nyet khangenkei; lausikei kho chalou shisho tegü ong dambei; aishanga haoei sao sanoukei.
Jakobei Laban to laukei, “Kü yak kü la labü, chalou pena.”
Hibü Labanei khünei kibü pendou ngashaian lem okkei.
Lausikei nangnak haoei haoeibü nouyangnyu Lea hao jungto leibakei; hoba hao sao jungto atkei.
Hobaje Labanei haoshou nouyangnyu Lea la saoeibü samnyu lela haoeibü samnyu Zilpa kukei.
Hobaje ngeyang chühsi kho Lea kiteikei. Hibü haoei Laban to laukei, “Nyi kü to jungeibü ho ai? Ngei Rachel shanga no khangenkei ayingsi? Aila nyi ngo khüpettikei?”
Labanei jongaikei, “Kün kaodaka noushounyu to shaang nashounyu akuda.
Ho yaksa leiyetbü bale pentishi, hoba künei lubü sao khokei kukho; laobou shanga toukei nyi kü yoa po nyet khangenlabü.”
Hobaje Jakobei khei kümbei. Haoei Lea yoa kho bale pentikei hoba Labanei hao la haoshou Rachel yakla kukei.
(Hobaje Labanei haoshou Rachel la samnyu la lela haoeibü samnyu Bilha kukei.)
Jakobei Rachel to jambei hoba haoei Lea toje Rachel aei sanoukei. Hobaje haoei toukei po nyet Laban khangenkei.
Ladang Lea to asanouda dogo
Hobaje Lea mangakongko apbei hoba saoei bousushou che bukkei, hoba saoei hao nyen Reuben nyenkukei; aishanga saoei laukei, “
Sao nyiboukei mangakongko apbei, hoba saoei laukei, “Aiyeilausi ngo asanouda dogo
Sao toukei mangakongko apan bousushou che bukkei, hoba laukei, “Touje kü laoei kü to maangshiklabü, aieilausi ngei hao la bousushou sem bukkua.” Khoei hao la Levi nyenkukei.
Toukei sao mangakongko apan bousushou che bukkei; hoba saoei laukei, “Touje ngei
Ladang Rachelei Jakob la shou che ongkei abukkuda dogo saoei hapbei, Rachelei nou to nyekto shatkei, hoba saoei Jakob to laukei, “Kü la shou labü, khei ayinglonga ngo hailabü.”
Hobaje Jakob Rachel khulimbo maangpokkei, hoba laukei, “Na hekshang ka ka senetbü Mühghaü jeiko ngo ki sai?”
Kheijinei saoei laukei, “Ngeibü sambü sao Bilha hanei kia, saoei kü la shou bukkulabü lele sao to jamashi hoba kho danko ngeikei chemdang huonglabü.”
Hobaje saoei sambü sao Bilha yakla lela hao la kukei hoba Jakob sao to jambei.
Hobaje Bilha mangakongko apbei hoba Jakob la bousushou che bukkukei.
Rachelei laukei, “Mühghaüei kümat maitikei hoba subüjabü ditan kü la bousushou che kukei;” khoei saoei hao la Dan nyenkukei.
Rachel samnyu Bilha nyibou mangakongko apbei hoba Jakob la nyiboula bousushou che bukkukei.
Rachelei laukei, “Ngo kü nou to maiko longyoan ngei künou thükkei.” Hobaje saoei hao la Naftali nyenkukei.
Ladang Leaei sao nabuk thonbü ngekei, saoei saoeibü samnyu Zilpa leijung louan yakla lela Jakob la kukei.
Hobaje Leaeibü samnyu Zilpaei Jakob la bousushou che bukkukei.
Leaei laukei, “Thu maisepa!” Hibü saoei hao la Gad nyenkukei.
Leaeibü sambüsao Zilpaei nyiboubü bousushou bukkukei.
Kheijinei Leaei laukei, “Ngo latetche olinda! Saoshuongei kü to haünyu, dogo ngalabü.” Hibü saoei hao la Asher nyenkukei.
Whet youshou latbü jiha, Reuben sek to koukei, hoba haoei seka moliqhe hapan haonyu Lea jungto sungbakei. Rachelei Lea to laukei, “Kashoueibü moliqhe ka kü la shisho labü dogo sudajada.”
Lausikei Leaei sao to laukei, “Nyi külao sobü kho hanbümanbü sai? Nyi Küshoueibü moliqhekei langkulep lo?” Hobaje Rachelei laukei, “Khülonga kashoueibü moliqhe shanga tao hao ka yoa yepla thükkei.”
Ladang Jakob chasem sek ka lungkei, Lea hao shuokla hauan laukei, “No kü junga yepjan; aishanga ngei no küshoueibü moliqheei jektheda.” Hibü khüyou hao sao yoa yepbei.
Mühghaüei Lea to ditkukei hoba sao mangakongko apan saoei Jakob la shou ngaoboubü bukkukei.
Hobaje Leaei laukei, “Mühghaüei kü la mu kua, aishanga ngei külao la ngeibü samnyu kukei.” Hibü saoei hao nyen Issakar nyenkukei.
Lea toukei mangakongko apan, Jakob la bousushou lakboubü bukkukei.
Kheijinei Leaei laukei, “Mühghaüei kü la namsek mu maibü kua; touje külaoei ngo sungletlabü, aishanga ngei hao la bousushou lak bukkukei.” Hibü saoei hao la Zebulun nyenkukei.
Kho phaia saoei yaksa shou che bukkei hoba sao la Dina nyenkukei.
Kheijinei Mühghaüei Rachel damenkei; hoba sao la ditkukei hoba saoeibü na setshang ipbukei.
Sao mangakongko apan bousu shou che bukkei, hoba saoei laukei, “Mühghaüei ngeibü himou langkua.”
Hobaje saoei hao la Josef nyenkukei, hoba laukei, “
Rachelei Josef bukan phaia Jakobei Laban to laukei, “Ngo ngeibü kishang hoba jembü kaodak to hautikai.
Kü la yaksi shuong hoba kü shousi aoyou shanga ngei no khangenkei haoen labü, hoba ngo hautikai. Ngei no latetche khangenkei kho nyi ngeakei.”
Lausikei Labanei hao to laukei, “Ngo ong ka nyek to loualonga, haiteishi, aishanga
Haoei toukei laukei, “Kaibü mu lenbü, hoba kho ngei ka la kukho.”
Jakobei hao to laukei, “Ngei no lai khangenkei, hoba kaibü samkeisamuk lai pangtei thounoukei kho nyi no lolo ngeakei.
Ngo aloujinei nyi shisho ong kibü juong haa; hoba ngo haushang pendoua
Labanei laukei, “Ngei ka la ai kula?” Jakobei jongaikei, “Nyi kü la ai teku; nyi kü shanga maang angalonga ngei nyibou kaibü san shuong lombukho:
Ngo tat kaibü sanshuong pendou danjung haukho, hoba panpan lanlanbü si kapnakbü pendou, hoba san yo ka nakhübü pendou hoba lon yoka kapnakbü pendou janyinkho hoba kho ngeibü mu kilabü.

Hibü loulabü jiha nyi ladang ngeibü mu shanga damanchühlaje ngühmaanglanbü chongchinglabü. Lon yoa laobou ong apanbü hoba kap anakbü kü shangabüa yoan kilaje, hoba san yoa anakhübü yoan kilaje khoje kokbü dogo weshi.”
Labanei jongaikei, “Hoat, kho tegü kümshi.”

Hobaje khünyet Labanei lon paang shangshang langlangbü hoba kapnakbü hoba lon nyu jakjak laklakbü hoba kapnakbü pendou, ainei thupaibü kikei, hoba san yoa nakhübü pendou, haoei janyinan jembü shou ikto kukei.
Hobaje hao si Jakob kanglanga semnyet lam kaangtikei. Jakobei Labaneibü joubü shatsinam pangteikei.
Jakobei poplar bulong, almond bulong, hoba plane bulong ka bhek wapan sungan kho ka khop aangan apan phodonga thupaibü longtian panpanlanlan kümbei.
Kheijinei haoei khop aangan apbü phodong kho dei dangshang, laonei sanshuongei dei yungla louda, khünei sanshuong thedangatham phokukei. Hobaje ladang ong nakjih sühkei hoba dei yungla loukei,
haoenei phodong thedanga nakkei hoba shoushou thüngkei. Hobaje haoenei shoushou shatjinei panpan lanlan ayingsi dolosüngsüng ayingsi kap nakan shatkukei.

Hobaje shoushou kho Jakobei lulu bangnyinkei hoba sanshuongeibü thenyek Labaneibü sanshuonga kibü panpan lanlanbü hoba nakhübü kibü aei sepeian phokukei. Kho tegü haoei haoeibü sanshuong lulu phokei hoba Labaneibü sanshuong yoa apho.
Ladang ong shuong yoa sekokbü shuong laangeida kheijinei Jakobei phodong kho dei yungshanga toktian phokukei;
lausikei sanshuong nyibutham kialonga haoei kho toktian aphoku. Hibü hau akibü kho Labaneibü hoba hau kibü kho Jakobeibü yeikei.
Kho tegü müt kho aeibou haakei, hoba haoeibü sanshuong juong hoba bousu si yaksa sambü hoba ut si gadu kikei.
Hobaje Labaneibü shousi shuongei, “Jakobei seneibü boueibü ajanjan pendou langa hoba seneibü bou kibü danko haoei habü nyaksinam pendou hapbei,” dogo lenyoko Jakobei ditkei.
Hobaje Jakobei Laban to chühsi hao shangiedbü thechüh tegü ayingko hapbei.
Hobaje
Hibü Jakobei haoeibü sanshuong kishang khongthu to Rachel si Lea ngaan sungkei.
Hobaje haoei haosi to laukei, “Ngei kaboueibü thenyek shaanglabü thenyek tegü ayingko hapda; lausikei küboueibü Mühghaü küyoa kia.
Hobaje ngei ngeibü hau pendouei kabou khangenkei dogo kanei kan lulu ngeakei.
Lausikei kaneibü bouei ngo khüpettikei, hoba ngeibü mu annepenko jeileikukei. Khei yingasikei Mühghaüei haoei küto amaibü kümbü ka senetkei.

‘Kapnakbü kaibü mu yinglabü,’ dogo ladang laulaje kheijinei sanlon pendouei kapnakbü shat; hoba ‘Panpan lanlanbü kaibü mu yinglabü,’ dogo haoei laualonga kheijinei san shuong pendouei panpan lanlanbü ong shatkei.
Hibü Mühghaüei kaneibü boueibü sanshuong sungan kü la kukei.
“Sanlon laangeibü jihsiphaia mangha ngei chühsi lon paang panpanlanlan, kapnakbü cheei laangeiko hapbei.
Mangha Mühghaü khuthük hangangbüei kü to laukei, ‘Jakob,’ hoba ngei laukei, ‘Ngo hanei kia.’
Hobaje haoei laukei, ‘Kaibü nyekei chühashi, hoba chühko kisi laangeibü lon paang pendou kho panpan lanlanbü, hoba kapnakbü hoba jakjaklaklakbü kikei, aishanga ngei Labanei kato jungeibü pendou hapa.
Ngo Bethel Mühghaü, laonei nyi laanga onang nangkukei, hoba kü to theletlanletbü che lekei. Toutham ho kaodak apyoashi hoba no bukbü kaodak to ngaiashi.’ ”
Kheijinei Rachel si Lea hamei jongaiko laukei, “Kübou chema kün phejan ayingsi onat denche kilao?
Haoei kün yenbou hima jungeida aying lo? Aishanga haoei kün yaakkei, hoba kün shangabü namkei haoei shauan apbua.
Mühghaüei abou ka langbü nyaksinam kho seneibü hoba sen shousi shuong shangabü; hibü Mühghaüei ai ong kato lenkei kho jungeiashi.”
Kheijinei Jakobei haoeibü shousi yaksi shuong pendou ut thüka settikei.
Hobaje haoei, haoei Padan Arama thansheibü shatsinam si nyaksinam pendou haobou Isak jungto Kanan kaodak to haula shanga thedangto hauteitikei.
Laban haoeibü san wi kipla hautoua Rachelei boueibü chemdang heangsho kokkei.
Jakobei Arambü Laban la alenko huonan kokshoua satkukei.
Hobaje hao haoei kibü pendou thonan satkei, hoba hao meimeijung Eufrates shumang kho danjung haukei; hoba haoei Gilead shongh ae haoeibü thenyek sepeikei.
Sembounyet Laban to Jakob kokshoua sada dogo lenkei.
Hobaje haoei haoeibü jaisinasi hao yoa leian, haoei chalou nyetnyet lam to shijung hauan haoei Jakob Gilead shongha laphetkei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei Arambü Laban jungto nangnak mangha longan hao to laukei, “Nyi Jakob to maibü yingasikei amaibü yingasikei aikei akümla no lolo maangsangashi.”
Jakobei shongha haoeibü neichem dangan kijinei Labanei laphetkei; hoba Laban yoa haoeibü jaisinasi shuongei Gilead shongha neichem dangkei.
Kheijinei Labanei Jakob to laukei, “Ngei angeko nyi huphanga ngeibü nouyangshousi shuong, wapyoa langsenbü hima langbü kho nyi ai kümbei?
Ailaibü ka nyi küka hukoshepbo satkei? Tegüje ngei lemlemtham hoba langh langhko no hangan hautikhoulabü, nyi aila küla alen?
Ailaibü nyi küla küshisi hoba nouyangshousi shuong to sembung ashepti? Nyi ngoualoua küma.
Kato amaiko jungeila küto hau kia, lausikei kabou Mühghaüei miou küto joyoko lenkei, ‘Nyi Jakob to maibü yingasikei amaibü yingasikei aikei ajoyola maangsangashi.’
Tou nyi kabou chem waangko no ngaila khambeilonga, aila nyi ngeibü mühghaü shuong kokkei?”
Hobaje Jakobei Laban to jongaiko laukei, “Aieilausi nyi kaibü nouyangshou nyi küka sungngailep yingkao dogo hatkei.

Lausikei aoyoa nyi kaibü mühghaü shuong haplaje, hao langkei akilabü. Hobaje kün chemdanga kü yoa kaibü ai ki nyi lolo shean lenshi hoba hapoualonga kho nyi leshi.” Tou Rachelei kho kokkei dogo Jakobei ange.
Hibü Laban Jakobeibü neichem hoba Leaeibü neichem hoba samnyu nyieibü neichem to atkei, lausikei haoei khübü kho ühüp. Hao Leaeibü neichem ka longan Racheleibü neichem to atkei.
Tou Rachelei chemdang heangsho kho sungan ut setshanga jinkei, hoba khübü thüka setkei. Labanei neichem pendou aeto sepeisaiko chühsikei ühüp.
Hobaje saoei bou to laukei, “Ngo ka thedanga lola amaibü küto temangpokma; aishanga yaksa haangei küto sühakei.” Kho tegü haoei lambei lausikei chemdang heangsho kho ühüp.
Kheijinei Jakob khauangkei, hoba laukei, “Ngeibü shedbü ai? Nyi ngo hainyu khausakko shieilabü lele ngeibü shabü ai?

Nyi ngeibü peisilei pendou to peman chühsikei nyi kaibü chembabü peisilei pendou ka ai hapbei? Kho haoei ngeibü jaisinasi shuong si kaibü jaisinasi shuong thedanga phoashi, hoba haoenei seti kanglanga mat najema.
“Ngo ka yoa po saoche kikei. Kaibü sanlon pi hoba lon piei jembü shou aleilu, ayingsi kaibü sanshuong ka sanlon paang yoka ngei ashau.
Laobou yamyangei taketnyu shaukei kho kajungto asungba; ngei lolo shembei. Chaloua kokbü yingsikei nangnak kokbü yingasikei kho nyi kü la shemtikei.
Küthu hainyu kikei: Chaloua ngo aubüei hoba nangnak khamei khonkukei, hoba ngo nyeket alou.
Ngo ka chemdanga po saoche kikei. Ngei kashou nouyangnyi shanga po anthüklei hoba kaibü sanshuong shanga po lak dogo kümbeileikei, khei yingankei nyi ngeibü mu annepenko jeileikei.

Kübou Mühghaü, Abraham Mühghaü, hoba Isakei Souhatbü kü yoa aki tegüje, maimaitham nyi ngo toukei mütkong sattian kikhoulabü. Ngo khonsakbü hoba ikküm iklei Mühghaüei hapbei, hoba haoei miou kato lenkei.”

Labanei Jakob to jongaiko laukei, “Sao nyi ho ngeibü nouyangshou hoba shousi shuong khokei ngeibü hoba sanshuong hokei ngeibü. Nyi hapbü pendou kho ngeibü. Lankei tat chaloua ngei ngeibü nouyangnyi hoba sao nyiei bukbü shousi shuong shanga ai kümla?
Hibü kaiya, senei ngüh linyokho; ngo hoba no, hoba seti kanglanga ho aukabü kishi.”
Hibü Jakobei laang che sungjung louan, kho laangthaonyu shanga kean phokei.
Hobaje Jakobei haoeibü jaisina to laukei, “Laang yoshaiashi.” Hibü haoenei laang yoshaikei hoba laangshang kümbei; hoba haoen laangshang nyangko shaukei yungkei.
Hobaje Labanei hoto Jegar Sahadutha dogo laukei, lausikei Jakobei hoto Galeed dogo laukei.
Hobaje Labanei laukei, “Laangshang ho tat seti kanglanga aukabü ki.” Khoei hoeibü nyen Galeed dogo laukei.
Hobaje laangthaonyu to Mizpa dogo laukei, aishanga haoei laukei, “
Nyi ngeibü nouyangnyu nyi khonsaktia longa ayingsi ngeibü nouyangnyu nyi khulimbo lubü yaksa ngaalonga, sen yoa müt ao akisi dogokei seti kanglanga Mühghaü aukabü kia.”
Labanei toukei Jakob to laukei, “Ho laangshang to chühashi, hoba laangthaonyu to chühshi, laobou seti kanglanga ngei phokukei.

Laangshang ho aukabü yingshi hoba laangthaonyu ho aukabü yingshi; khei amaibü kümla shanga ngo ho laangshang danko kajungto aloulabü, hoba nokei ho laangshang hoba laangthaunyu danko kü jungto amaibü kümla aloulabü.
Abraham Mühghaü, Nahor Mühghaü, hoba haoeneibü bou Mühghaüei seti kanglanga matjemshi.” Hibü Jakobei haobou Isak to Souhatbü nyena thekeilankei.
Jakobei shongha juokbülembü kukei hoba haoei hao chempen shuong oknyinla ngakei. Haoenei shauan yungan langyang sünga shongha khüpbei.
Hobaje nyibounyet ngeyang enyu Labanei shisi shuong hoba haoeibü nouyangshou nyi to sembung shepbo haükukei; hoba khüka hao kishang to ngaikei.
Jakob jembü lama haukei, hoba Mühghaü hangangbü hao to haüyokei.
Ladang Jakobei haoen hapbei, haoei laukei, “Ho Mühghaü lakjaibü shuong kishang!” Hibü haoei kho kaonyek la Mahanaim nyenkukei.
Jakobei hao to shaang jai jungto Edom kaonyeka Seir kao to youkobü hautikei.
Haoei haoen la sakkuko laukei, “Kanei ngeibü bunyubou Esau to hai laushi, ‘Kaibü sambü Jakobei hai lauda, Ngo Laban yoa tou sühko thüngan kikei.
Ngei masu, gadu, sanlon, lonmai shuong, sambü hoba samnyu, dogo kia. Tou ngei ngeibü bunyubou to lenla hautikei, khei ngei ka thedanga onou haplabü lele.’ ”
Ladang youkobü shuong Jakob jungto nopjung longeikei haoenei laukei, “Kün kajai Esau jungto haüyola haukei, hoba hao kato haüyola müt saongao lei yoan louada.”
Jakob aeibou mokkei hoba maangmaukei. Hobaje haoei hao yoa kibü müt, san shuong, masu shuong, hoba ut shuong tan nyila jankei.
Haoei dambei, “Esauei louan shuong che shemtialonga kheijinei joubü shuong che kho satenlabü.”
Kheijinei Jakobei hai welaukei, “O kübou Abraham Mühghaü, hoba kübou Isak Mühghaü, O
nyi kaibü sambü to onou hoba ngühmai lenbü pendou yoka kü shanga hanbüshou ongkei amu; aishanga ngei ngeibü juloei ho Jordan danjung haukei, hoba ngo touje tan nyila yeia.
Küjai Esau ik ka ngo püetashi, aishanga ngo hatda; aingenyu haoei ngo hoba kü yokabü nashou yaksa pendou shemtilabü.
Lausikei nyi laua, ‘Maimaitham ngei no naang maitilabü hoba kaibü thensilen yungnyu phetsen tegü wesikei awekhümbo juongnyu haatikulabü.’ ”
Khüyou langyang khünei dantikei hoba haoei kibü ka haojai Esau la jongsakla hai janletkukei:
lonnyu saoan hoba lonpaang saoche,
shoushou thonan ut nyunyu khujin, masu pi saonyi hoba pongsu an, hoba gadu nyunyu saoche hoba paang an.
Haoei khübü kho sambü shuong ika tan weko lulu kukei; hoba haoei haoeibü sambü shuong to laukei, “Kü thedang to hauashi, hoba tan tan kanglanga tuibang kaangan phoshi.”
Haoei shaangbou to sakkuko laukei, “Ladang küjai Esauei kato haüyoan, ‘No aoeibü? hoba no lato hauda? hoba ka thedanga kibü habü ho aoeibü?’ dogo phelaje,
kheijinei nyi hai jongaiashi, ‘Habü ho kaibü sambü Jakobeibü. Habü ho ngeibü bunyu Esau la küntibü jongsak ki; hoba haokei kün phainei louada.’ ”
Haoei nyiboubü to hoba semboubü to hoba shatsinam tan leibü pendou to lenkei, “Kanei Esau to haüyojinei hao to jeteibü ngüh lenshi.

Tokei hai lenshi, ‘Chühashi, kaibü sambü Jakob kün phainei louada.’ ” Aieilausi haoei dambei, “Ngei kü thedanga hautibü jongsakei hao khauang sotilabü hoba kho phaia ngei haoeibü the haplabü; aingenyu haoei ngo sungletlabü yinglabü.”
Hibü jongsak kho hao thedangto hautikei hoba haoje khüyou shuong yoa kikei.
Khüyou Jakob meimeijung yaknyi hoba samnyunyi hoba haoeibü shousi müt anthükche leian Jabbok Shumang danjung haukei.
Hobaje haoei haoen shumang danjung hautian phaia haoei kibü pendou jungan hautikei.
Hobaje Jakob hao mütpem apyokei; hoba ngeyang langesaoko müt che to khuyokei.
Ladang müt khoei Jakob athüketko apbei haoei Jakobeibü ilo khengokkukei.
Kheijinei müt khoei laukei, “Ngo litikai, aishanga langesaoa.” Jakobei laukei, “Nyi ngo ühaütiku shongko ngei no alitilabü.”
Müt khoei hao to phekei, “Kaibü nyen ao?” Haoei laukei, “Jakob.”
Haoei laukei, “Tou ka jaüan kaibü nyen Jakob anyenlabü, lausikei Israel dogo nyenlabü; aishanga nyi Mühghaü si müt to longyokei hoba thükkei.”
Jakobei laukei, “Sanoudambo küla kaibü nyen lenbü.” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Nyi ngeibü nyen aila pheda?” Khünei haoei Jakob haükukei.
Hibü Jakobei ho kaonyek la Peniel nyenkukei, aishanga haoei laukei, “Ngei Mühghaü theshuok hapbei, khei yingasikei ngo lang kia.”
Hobaje hao Peniel danjung haujinei chanyu hao junga longkei, hoba hao youshi loei soke ombo ombo paikei.
Khoei tat sühko Israel shousi shuongei youshi bempou phejak ashauda; aishanga haoei Jakobeibü youshi ilo youshi bempou phejaka meitikei.
Jakobei chühangtisi Esau haoeibü mütshuong saongao lei yoa louko hapbei, hibü haoei Lea si Rachel hoba sambüsao nyi yoa shousi shuong jankei.
Hobaje haoei sambüsao hoba haoeibü shousi shuong thedang letikei, hoba kho phaia Lea si saoeibü shousi shuong hoba Rachel si Josef pendou to phaibou.
Hobaje hao haoen thedang to haukei, hoba haojai asühtoua hao lolo kaoa nyetnei khüpetkei.
Lausikei Esauei haoeibü insiaubu litian hao to haüyola laangjung haukei, hoba hao to sembung shepbei; hoba haosi haapyokei.
Kheijinei Esauei tangko chühkei hoba yaksa shuong shousi shuong yoa hapan laukei, “Kayoa kibü habü ho aoyou?”
Jakobei jongaikei, “Kaibü sambü la Mühghaüei onouko kubü shousi shuong.”
Kheijinei sambü sao hoba shousi shuong lousühkei hoba khüpetkei.
Hobaje Lea si saoeibü shousi shuongkei nyangko louan khüpetkei. Thonla phaila Rachel si Josefkei lousühkei hoba khüpetkei.
Esauei phekei, “Ngei haüyobü tan pendou kho ai tetlabü?” Jakobei jongaiko laukei, “Ngeibü bunyu thedanga üeisanou hapla shanga.”
Lausikei Esauei laukei, “Küna, ngei souko kia, nyi kibü nyi lela phoashi.”

Jakobei laukei, “Aying sanoudambo, nyi kü to maangshika longa ngeibü jongsak kü ik ka sungletshima, aishanga kaibü thenyek hapbü kho Mühghaüeibü thenyek hapbü phatkei, hoba nyi ngo maangshikko sungleda.
Ngeibü jongsak laobou kajungto jungan loukei, sungletashi dogo ngei sudajada, aishanga Mühghaüei kü to onouko jungeisije ngei souko kia.” Kho tegü Jakobei susijasije Esauei sungletkei.
Hobaje Esauei laukei, “Sen meimeian seneibü lama haukho hoba ngo ka thedangto haukho.”

Lausikei Jakobei hao to laukei, “Ngeibü bunyuei ngeakei, nashousi shuong hau aki, hoba kü yoa kibü sanshuong si masu shuong haoen senyopbü shoushou ki hoba khübü kho chalou che to aeian leialonga sanshuong pendou hailabü.
Ngeibü
Esauei laukei, “Khülonga ngei kümüt at kayoa apyokho.” Lausikei Jakobei jongaiko laukei, “Khei ai kümla? Ngei ngeibü bunyu thedanga maangshik ong haptibü.”
Hibü Esau khünyet Seir to haubü lamto sepeinyu ngaikei.
Lausikei Jakobei Sukot to hauan hao shanga chem che dangkei, hoba haoeibü shatsinam shanga dip che dangkukei. Khoei kho kaoen la Sukot nyenkukei.
Jakob Padan Aram ka louan phaia, hao Kanana Shekhem sangnyu to louan sangnyu nyangko neichem dangan kikei.
Hobaje laobou kaoena haoei neichem dangkei; kho kao haoei Shekhemeibü bou Hamor thensilen ka sempak saongaoei jekkei.
Khünei haoei lemshang che yaükei hoba khoto El-Elohe Israel dogo laukei.
Tou Lea si Jakobeibü nouyangshou Dina Kanan kaodak kabü yaksa at pean chühla haukei.
Ladang kho kaonyek kabü yaangenbou Hivbü Hamoreibü shou Shekhemei sao hapbei; haoei senan sungan sao to yepbei, hoba himou bautikei.
Hobaje haoeibü maang Jakobeibü nouyangshou Dina to kuan apbei hoba haoei sao to sanoukei, hoba haoei medeinyu to eaaoa joyokei.
Hobaje Shekhemei haobou Hamor to joyoko laukei, “Ho medeinyu ngei yakla lela leiba.”
Tou Jakobei haoshou nouyangnyu leilua dogo ditkei, lausikei haoshousi shuong shatsinam yoa yama kikei, hoba haoen alungshongko Jakobei ngüh üangko kikei.
Kheijinei Shekhemeibü bou Hamorei Jakob to joyola haukei.

Tou Jakobeibü shousi shuong kho ditbüyam yam ka lungkei, hoba mütshuong kho khauangkei, hoba aeibou maangpokyokei; aishanga haoei Jakobeibü nouyangnyu to yepan Israel awealauko jungeikei; laobou kümsilei Israela jungeila janbü aying.
Lausikei Hamorei haoen to joyoko laukei, “Küshou Shekhemeibü maangponei kaibü nouyangnyu maikuan apa, hibü hao la yakla lela sao kushi dogo ngei ka to sudajada.
Kün to laolam yaknga leyoashi, kaneibü nouyangshou kün la labü, hoba kan shanga küneibü nouyang shousi leiyettiashi.
Kan kü yoa kilabü; kan kimang sühbü kaoena kiashi, hoba khünei kian seiatakashi hoba langleko küten ongenashi.”
Kheijinei Shekhemei yaksanyueibü bousijaisi shuong to laukei, “Kanei kü la kaneibü maangshik haptikai, hoba kanei kü ka ai ong hilaje kho ngei kulabü.
Yaksa shanga munam hoba jongsak ajanjan pendou hiashi, hoba kanei kü la lenbü tegü ngei kulabü, lausikei medeinyu kho ong küyak la lela labü.”
Haoei haoeneibü na Dina leilukuabüba Jakob shousi shuongei Shekhem si bou Hamor to huonko jongaikei.
Haoenei hao to laukei, “Künei küneibü na akipbü müt la kula athük, aieilausi kho kün shanga himoulabü.
Ho shanga ong künei hehoat laukho; khei kan kün tegü yeiko, kan bousu pendou kipan apshi;
kheijinei künei küneibü nouyangnyu kan la kulabü hoba kün shanga kaneibü nouyang shousi lelabü, hoba kan yoa kiko phang che ong yeilabü.
Lausikei kipan apla kanei küneibü ngüha alelonga künei küneibü na leian ngailabü.”
Kho thusilam kho haoen si Hamor hoba Hamoreibü shou Shekhem thedanga maikuan kikei.
Heshoubouei haoenei ai laukei kho kümla jih üp, aieilausi haoei Jakobeibü nouyangnyu to nyek pükkei hoba haobou chema pendou to hao aei soumo kuko kikei.
Hibü Hamor si haoshou Shekhemei haoeneibü sangnyu bakhün to hauan haoen himshuong sangnyu kabü mütshuong to lenko laukei,
“Habü mütshuong kho kün to paplepakei. Haoen sen kaodaka kitiashi, hoba khünei seititaktiashi, haoen shanga kao apsileko kia. Senei haoeneibü nouyangshousi lela hoba haoenei seneibü lela thükkei.
Lausikei khübü mütshuong sen yoa kila maangangbü kho ho, haoen tegü sen mütshuong bousu pendou kipan apjan.
Haoeneibü shatsinam, samkeisamuk hoba haoenei kibü pendou seneibü ayinglep lo? Hibü sen haoen to ngühthang yenkho hoba haoen sen yoa kilabü.”
Sangnyu bakhün aibü pendouei Hamor si haoshou Shekhemeibü ngüha lekei, hoba sangnyua kibü bousu pendou kipan apbei.
Sembounyet haoen mou amaiko shatyoko kibü jiha Jakobeibü shousi yoa Dinaeibü jai nyi Simeon si Leviei inlou jungan hauan huphanga sangnyu to louan bousu pendou haitikei.
Hobaje haoenei Hamor si haoshou Shekhemkei haitikei hoba Dina Shekhem chem ka leilangkei.
Jakobeibü shousi shuongei haibü mang thükto longan sangnyu khümbo maklangkei, aieilausi haoenei haoeneibü na leilutikei.
Haoenei haoeneibü sanlon shuong, masu shuong hoba haoeneibü gadu shuong sangnyua kibü si yama kibü ham langkukei.
Haoenei haoeneibü nyaksinam, nashou hoba yaksi shuong pendou hoba haoeneibü chema kibü pendou kulangkukei.

Kheijinei Jakobei Simeon si Levi to laukei, “Kanei kaodakbü shuong thedanga lüm hilabü lele Kananbü si Perizbü yoa ngo mangsenbü yeitilabü lele khonsaktia. Sen shisho ong hibü haoenei ngo khulimbo takshatan ngo shilabü, hoba ngo hoba ngeibü chemdang khümbo shemtilabü.”
Lausikei haoenei laukei, “Haoenei küneibü na to suonlamnyu tegü jungeilep lo?”
Kheijinei Mühghaüei Jakob to laukei, “Bethel to angan khünei kiashi, hoba kajai Esau jungka no satkujinei ka jungto longbü Mühghaü la lemshang che yaükuashi.”
Hibü Jakobei haoeibü chempen hoba hao yoa kibü pendou to laukei, “Kan yoa kibü küksithang mühghaü apashi hoba kan lolo saüenashi, hoba kaneibü neisimei jeiashi.
Sen meimeijung Bethel to angkho; hoba ngo khonsakbü chaloua küto jongaibou hoba ngo haubü lama kü yoa kibou Mühghaü shanga ngei khünei lemshang che yaükho.”
Hibü haoenei Jakob la haoeneibü ika kibü küksithang mühghaü pendou hoba haoeneibü noua jibü chimen kukei; hoba Jakobei khübü Shekhem nyangko kibü yembu chungthema khünkei.
Ladang Jakob meimeikei, sangnyu pendou thükto hatbümokbü longkei, khoei haoenei Jakobeibü shousi shuong phaito ashi.
Kho khei Jakob hoba hao yoa kibü mütshuong pendou Kanana kibü Luz (kho Bethel) to hao hoba hao yoa kibü müt pendou loukei.
Haoei khünei lemshang che yaüan khoto ElBethel dogo laukei, aishanga hao haojai jungka satjung haujinei khünei Mühghaü hao jungto tangkhitkei.
Hobaje Rebekaeibü thuinyu Debora haikei, hoba sao Bethel phanga kibü yembulong phanga khünkei. Hibü kho Alon Bakuth nyenkei.
Jakob Padan Aram ka longeian phaia, Mühghaü nyibou Jakob jungto longkei, hoba hao haükukei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei hao to laukei, “Kaibü nyen Jakob; tou ka jaüan kaibü nyen Jakob anyenlabü, lausikei kaibü nyen Israel dogo nyenlabü.” Hibü Mühghaüei haoeibü nyen Israel dogo nyenkukei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei hao to laukei, “Ngo pendou Thükenbou Mühghaü; bukko haako juong haashi, phang che hoba phangshuong che kilabü, hoba choba shuong kaka longlabü.
Ngei Abraham hoba Isak la kubü kao kho ngei kala kulabü, hoba kaphainei kaibü thensilen lakei kho kao kulabü.”
Kheijinei Mühghaüei hao to joyoshang ka angan apbei.
Jakobei hao to joyoshang khünei laang che phonan kekei, hoba kho thüka lembü yunglabü jonkei, hoba khünei onangkei jonkei.
Jakobei Mühghaüei hao to joyoshang kaoen khoto Bethel dogo laukei.
Kheijinei haoen Bethel ka kukkei, hoba Efrat sühla toukei longche kian Rachel na hapla shat longko aeibou khonkukei.
Hobaje nabuk shat longko kijinei nabuk thuinyuei sao to laukei, “Tehütma, aieilausi tou nyi bousushou che buklabü.”
Lausikei sao haila thonbü hak hinda yingsije saoei shou la BenOni nyenkukei. Lausikei haobouei hao la Benjamin nyenkukei.
Hibü Rachel haikei hoba Efrat (kho Bethlehem) lama sao khünkei.
Jakobei saoeibü hee thüka laang che kekei, kho tat sühko Racheleibü hee laangkee dogo kia.
Hobaje Israel meimeijung haukei, hoba haoeneibü neichem Eder laangshong danan dangkei.
Israel kho kaodaka kijinei, Reubenei hauan haoboueibü thangnyu to yepbei, hoba Israelei ho shangabü ditkei. Israelei shousi anthüknyi kikei.
Leaeibü shousi shuong ho: Jakobeibü shou jaishoubou Reuben hoba Simeon, Levi, Jehuda, Issakar hoba Zebulun.
Racheleibü shousi: Josef hoba Benjamin.
Racheleibü samnyu Bilhaeibü shousi: Dan hoba Naftali;
hoba Lea samnyu Zilpaeibü shousi: Gad hoba Asher, habü ho Jakob shousi aoyou Padan Aram kaoa hao la bukkukei.
Jakobeibü bou Isak jungto Mamre, Kiriath-Arba (kho Hebron) to loukei, laonei Abraham si Isak kikei.
Hobaje Isak langkei salang po saongaoto saolei kikei.
Kheijinei hao thonbü hak hinan haikei, hoba hao jembü mütli yoa yokei, hoba haoshou Esau si Jakobei hao khünkei.
Ho Esau thensilen (kho Edom).
Esauei Kanan sao ka hao yakla ngakei; Hitbü Eloneibü nouyangshou Ada, hoba Hivbü Zibeon shou Anaeibü nouyangnyu Oholibama;
hoba Ishmael nouyangnyu Nebaioteibü na Basemat.
Hobaje Adaei Esau la Elifaz bukkukei, hoba Basematei Reuel bukkukei;
hoba Oholibamaei Jeush Jalam hoba Kora bukkukei. Habü ho hao la Kanana bukkubü Esau shousi shuong ki.

Esauei yaksi shuong, hoba hao shousi shuong chema kibü pendou, hoba samkeisamuk hoba shatsinam pendou hoba yamkabü mei pendou hoba Kanan kaodaka thanbü nyaksinam pendou künan na Jakob jungka lubü kaodak to haukei.
Aieilausi haoeneibü nyaksinam yongko yaangan kisije haoen liko kila amaiko apbei; hoba haoen kishang kaodaka haoeneibü shatsinam shanga haoen ashimalangko kikei.
Hibü Esau (kho Edom) Seir shongha kikei.
Seir shongha kibü Edom thensilen ho:
Habü ho Esau shousi shuong nyen ki: Esaueibü yak Ada kabü Elifaz, hoba Esaueibü yak Basemat kabü shou Reul.
Hobaje Elifaz shousi shuong: Taman, Omar, Zefo, Gatam, hoba Kenaz.
Esau shou Elifazei Timna nyenan lubü thangnyu chekei kikei hoba saoei haola Amalek bukkukei; khübü kho Esaueibü yak Adaeibü shisi shuong.
Reuleibü shousi shuong habü ho: Nahat, Zera, Shama hoba Miza. Habü ho Esau yak Basemateibü shisi shuong.
Zibeon shi Anaeibü nouyangnyu Oholibamaei saoeibü lao Esau la bukkubü shousi shuong: Jeush, Jalam hoba Kora.
Esau thensilen yoa chung shuong habü: Esau shou jaishoubou Elifazeibü shousi shuong; chung: Taman, Omar, Zefo, Kenaz,
Kora, Gatam hoba Amalek. Habü ho Edom kaodaka Elifaz ka bakbü chung shuong ki; haoen kho Adaeibü shisi shuong ki.
Esau shou Reuleibü shousi shuong ho: chung shuong Nahat, Zera, Shama hoba Miza. Habü ho Edom kaodaka Reul ka bakbü chung shuong ki. Haoen kho Esau yak Basemateibü shousi shuong ki.
Esau yak Oholibama shousi shuong ho: Chung shuong: Jeush, Jalam hoba Kora. Ho Esau yak Anaeibü nouyangnyu Oholibama ka bakbü chung shuong ki.
Khübü phang shuong pendou kho Esau (kho Edom) shousi shuong, hoba khübü kho haoeneibü chung.
Habü ho Horbü Seir shousi shuong, aoyou kho kaopheia kikei: Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Ana,
Dishon, Ezer hoba Dishon. Habü Edom kaodaka Seir shousi shuong chung ki.
Lotan shousi shuong: Hor hoba Homan. Timna kho Lotaneibü na yaksa kikei.
Shobal shousi shuong ho: Alvan, Manahat, Ebal, Shefo hoba Onam.
Zibeon shousi shuong ho: Aia hoba Ana. Ho Anaei haobou Zibeoneibü gadu lamshautishang yama dei aubü pakshang hapenkei.
Ana shousi shuong habü ho: Dishon hoba Anaeibü nouyangnyu Oholibama.
Dishon shousi shuong habü ho: Hemdan, Eshban, Ithran hoba Keran.
Ezer shousi shuong habü ho: Bilhan, Zaban hoba Akan.
Dishan shousi shuong habü ho: Uz hoba Aran.
Horbü ka longbü chung habü ho: Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Ana,
Dishon Ezer hoba Dishan. Habü ho Horbü ka longbü chung, haoen Seira kibü chempen theneithenko ki.
Israel thüka aoeikei mo song adakjinei habü choba shuongei songdakkei;
Beor shou Bela Edom choba yeikei. Haoeibü sangnyu nyen Dinhaba kikei.
Ladang Bela haikei, Bozra ka Zera shou Jobabei hao jeila songdakkei.
Jobab haijinei Teman kaodak kabü Hushamei haoeibü setshang jeikei.
Ladang Husham haikei, Moab kaodaka Midianbü thükbou Bedad shou Hadad hao jeiko songdakkei. Hobaje haoeibü sangnyu nyen kho Avit kikei.
Hadad haikei hoba Masreka ka Samlaei hao jeila songdakkei.
Samla haikei, hoba Eufrates nyangko Rehobota Shaulei hao jeila songdakkei.
Shaul haikei hoba Akboreibü shou Baal-Hananei hao jeila songdakkei.
Ladang Akbor shou Baal-Hanan haikei kheijinei Hadadei hao jeila songdakkei. Haoeibü sangnyu nyen Pau kikei, (hoba haoyak kho Me-Zahab nouyangnyu Matred shou Mehetabel kikei.)
Esau ka thenbü chung shuong, haoen chempen weko, haoen kishang weko, hoba haoeneibü nyen weko hai ki: Timna, Alva, Jethet,
Oholibama, Ela, Pinon,
Kenaz, Teman, Mibzar,
Magdiel hoba Iram. Habü ho haoenei kimbü kishang wekoa Edom chung shuong ki. Kho Edomeibü bou Esau kiteikei.
Jakob Kanan kaodaka haobou kishanga kikei.

Ho Jakobeibü chemdang ngühli. Josef po anthüknyet heshou, hoba hao haobou Jakobeibü yak Bilha si Zilpa shuousi shuong, hao jaisishuong yoa san lombo kikei; hoba Josefei jaisi shuongei kümsilei amaibü kümbü ngühlang haobou jungto sungbakei.
Tou Israelei hao shousi shuong pendou to aeila Josef to sanoukei; aishanga hao hao la baushilamto bukkukei; hoba haoei hao la son juong kakbü nei lamlekukei.
Ladang hao jaisi shuongei haoeneibü bouei pendou yoka hao to aei sanouda dogo chühenkei, haoenei hao to mangsenkei hoba hao to sanou ngüh alau.
Youche, Josefei mangh che likei, hoba haoei kho haoen la lenkei; khoei haoenei hao aei ong mangsenkei.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Lo, ngeibü mangh lenkho ditashi.
Sen pendou liko seka youshou thepjinei, chühashi, ngei thepbü youshang kho lokei, hoba chühsi, kaneibü youthep shuong kaijembo loukei hoba ngeibü youthep to khüpetan lembei.”
Hao jaisi shuongei hao to laukei, “Khülonga maimaitham no küneibü choba yeilep lo hoba nyi kün thüka songdaklep lo?” Haoeibü mangh si haoeibü ngüh hangshong haoenei hao aei mangsenkei.
Kho phaia toukei, Josefei mangh che likei, hoba kho hao jaisi shuong to lenkei. “Ditashi, toukei ngei mangh che lia; hoba chühashi, chanyu si litnyu hoba khanshoulitshou anthükcheei ngo lembei.”
Ladang haoei kho haobou si hao jaisi shuong la lenkei, haobouei hao to hakko laukei, “Nyi libü mangh ho ai? Ngo hoba kanyu hoba kaibü jaisi shuongei maimaitham kaoa khüpetan no lemlep sai?”
Hao jaisi shuongei hao to the shouan apbei; lausikei haobouei ngüh kho maanga phokei.
Nyetche haoboueibü san shuong lamshautila hao jaisi shuong Shekhem kaophei to haukei.
Hobaje Israelei Josef to laukei, “Kaibü jaisi shuong Shekhem aenei sanshuong lamshautibü nyi ngeakeibü ngei no khüto hautimang sühda.” Josefei jongaikei, “Ngo lamleakei.”
Hibü haoei hao to laukei, “No hauan ka jaisi shuong si sanshuong maisho kilaoje ngühlang sungbaan kü la lenbüma.” Hobaje haoei hao Hebron yomang ka hautikei, hoba hao Shekhem to loukei.
Hobaje müt cheei hao sekmanga paiko hapan hao to phekei, “Nyi ai lamda?”
Haoei jongaikei, “Ngei kü jaisi shuong lamda. Haoenei sanlon shuong lan lamshautidaje nyi kü la lenla thükasao?”
Müt khoei laukei, “Haoen haka kuka. Ngei haoenei, ‘Sen Dothan to haukho’ dogo lauyobü dida.” Hibü Josef jaisi shuong phaito haukei hoba haoei haoen Dothan nyangko hapbei.
Lausikei haoenei hao saabüa hapan, hao alousühtoua hao haitila huon takkei.
Haoen cheei che to laukei, “Manghlibou kho hato louada!
Tou kaiya, senei hao haitian püngkhün che to tekan jinan, meisiau amaibüei suian apa dogo laukho. Kheijinei haoeibü mangh kho ai loushedlaje senei chühkho.”
Ladang Reubenei ho ditkei, haoei hao haoeneibü ik ka khümenla haujembei. Haoei laukei, “Senei haoeibü langkei temautikho,
sii hansho ongkei tüangti. Phetsena kibü püngkhün to tekan jinkho, lausikei hao to ik tüet.” Reubenei haoeneibü ik ka hao khümenan haobou jungto leian ngaikula shanga laukei.
Hibü ladang Josef hao jaisi shuong jungto loukei, haoenei haoeibü son kakbü namsekbü neisimei kho haoeibü mangka khokan sungkei,
hoba haoenei Josef lapan püngkhün to jaangan attikei. Lausikei püngkhüna dei adangko ulangtham kikei.

Phaisho haoen shaula yungla setan kijinei, haoenei chühlitisi saabüa Ishmaelbü namyak namseibü tan che louko hapbei. Haoenei bu ka tühjung lotbü jen hoba mou moli hoba ponlemhibü peisilei ut taka thongtian Gilead ka Ijep kaodak to hauko kikei.
Kheijinei Jihudaei jaisinasi shuong to laukei, “Senei seneibü na haitisi hoba haoeibü sii küplepsi ai pailetla?
Ishmaelbüla hao yaakkukho; aieilausi hao seneibü na, hoba seneibü phe.” Haoeibü jaisinasi shuongei haoeibü ngüha lekei.
Hibü ladang Midianbü namyak namseibü shuong haoen jungto loukei, haoenei Josef püngkhün ka sungenan nam saoche lu Ishmaelbü la yaakkei, hoba haoenei Josef Ijep kaodak to leian haukei.
Ladang Reuben püngkhün to sepeijung ngaian chühkei, Josef püngkhüna akitei, hoba haoei haoeibü neisimei jitnyinkei.
Hobaje nasi shuong jungto sepeinyu ngaian laukei, “Na kho aki! Ngo tou lato haula?”
Kho phaia haoenei lon paang che haitian khünei Josefeibü mangyuk khoneikei;
hoba son kakbü mangyuk kho bou jungto hautiko lentikei, “Künei ho hapbei. Ho kashoueibü mangyuk yinglaoje chühshi!”
Haoei kho chühenan laukei, “Haü, hoje kü shoueibü mangyuk! Yamyang amaibü atei hao haitia! Kü shou Josef netla phoula yeitia!”
Jakobei maangto shatko haoeibü nei jitnyinan shenjanga senounei shenan chalou lounyu shou shanga mang haapbei.

Haoeibü nouyang jayang shousi shuongei hao maang sula haujembei, lausikei haoei maang hak somang asühko laukei, “Ü, ngo mang haapbo küshou jungto yemto haulabü.” Kho tegü bouei jembü shou shanga mang haapbei.
Kho jihsiphaia, Midianbü khoei Ijep choba Faraoeibü lombou konglebou Potifar la Josef yaakkei.
Kho jihsiphaia Jihudaei haoeibü jaisinasi shuong apyoan Hira nyenbü Adulambü che yoa kila yanan kikei.
Khünei Jihudaei Kananbü Shuaeibü nouyangnyu hapbei. Haoei sao lekei hoba sao yoa yepbei;
hoba sao mang akongko apan bousushou che bukkei, hoba haoei hao la Er nyenkukei.
Toukei sao nyibou mang akongko apbei hoba bousushou che bukkei, hoba hao la Onan nyenkukei.
Saoei toukei bousushou che bukkei, hoba hao la Shela nyenkukei. Saoei hao Kheziba bukkei.
Jihudaei haoshou jaishoubou Er shanga yaksa che lekukei hoba saoeibü nyen Tamar kikei.
Lausikei Jihuda shou jaishoubou Er kho
Kheijinei Jihudaei Onan to laukei, “Kajaieibü yak to yepan sao to laoeibü janbü kümsilei kümashi, hoba kajai shanga lilabü longtiashi.”
Lausikei Onanei lilabü kho haoeibü ayinglabü dogo ngean, haoei haojaieibü yak to jamjinei haoei haojai la lilabü akula shanga jotdei kaoa ong apbo lekei.
Haoei jungeibü kho

Kheijinei Jihudaei hao shoueibü yak Tamar to laukei, “Küshou Shela aching shongko kabou chema latnyu leko kishi.” Aieilausi haoei dambei, “Aingenyu haokei hao jainyi tegü haibüla.” Hibü Tamar ngaian haobou chema kikei.
Hobaje longche kian Shua nouyangnyu, Jihuda yak haikei. Ladang Jihuda maang haksokei hao hoba hao thangbou Adullambü Hira yoa haoeibü san wi kipbou jungto Timna to angkei.
Müt atei Tamar to lenko laukei, “Chühashi, kalaoeibü bou haoeibü san wi kipla Timna to angda.”

Saoei saoeibü latnyu neisimei hangletan saoeibü thenyek sepeian neikhu yukan nei neian, Timna to haubü lam nyangko kibü Enam sang bakhüna setkei; aieilausi saoei Shela chinga dogo ngekei, hoba hao la yakla lela sao aku.
Ladang Jihudaei sao hapbei, sao suonlamnyu dogo dambei; aieilausi saoei neikhu yukkei.
Hobaje haoei lamkoa sao jungto hauan laukei, “Kaiya, ngo ka junga yeptikaima.” (Aieilausi haoei sao kho hao shoueibü yak dogo ange.) Saoei laukei, “No kü yoa yepbü shanga nyi kü la ai kula?”
Haoei laukei, “Ngei lon shuong yoka lon paangshou che küntikho.” Hobaje saoei laukei, “Nyi kho akünti shongko aukabü shanga denche kuasaoma?”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ngei aukabü shanga jeila ai kula?” Saoei jongaikei, “Kaibü shensinge lüh thonan hoba kaibü ika kibü ju.” Hibü haoei khübü kho kuan sao yoa yepbei, hoba sao mangakongko apbei.
Sao meimeijung satan apbei hoba saoei thenyeka yukbü nei hangletnyu phoan saoei latnyueibü neisimei lengaikei.
Kheijinei Jihudaei yaksanyueibü ik ka chongchingla kubü peisilei nyibou sungngaila shanga hao thangbou Adullambü ik danko lonshou kho küntikei, lausikei haoei sao ühüp.
Kheijinei haoei saoeibü sangbü Enaimbü to pheko laukei, “Enaim sanga lamkoa kibü suonlamnyu kho lan ki?” Haoenei laukei, “Hanei suonlamnyu aokei aki.”
Hao Jihuda jungto ngaian, “Ngei sao ühüp,” dogo laukei, hoba sangbü shuongei hanei suonlamnyu aokei aki dogo laukei.
Jihudaei laukei, “Saoei photeibü khübü kho saoei nale, ayinglonga sen himou bautilabü. Chühashi, ngei lonshou kho küntikei, lausikei nyi ühüp.”
Lit sem phaia ngüh kho Jihuda to lenkei, “Ka shoueibü yak Tamarei asangalan jungeia; hoba toukei chühashi, suonlambüei sao mang akongko kia.” Jihudaei laukei, “Sao leijung louan wana juokettiashi.”

Ladang sao leibakei, saoei jembü laoeibü bou jungto ngühlang hautiko laukei, “Habü ho aoeibü yingkeije hoei ngo mang akongko kia.” Hobaje saoei laukei, “Ho aoeibü shensinge lüh hoba ju yingkeije lenashi, dogo ngei ka to sudajada.”
Jihudaei habü ho shenan laukei, “Sao kütokei tangbou yingkei; aieilausi ngei sao kü shou Shela la angaku.” Kho phaiaje haoei sao to ajam.
Sao na hapla jih sühjinei saoeibü na setshanga phokbü shou kibü ngeenkei.
Sao na hapla shejinei cheei ik angtikei; hibü na hapjinei thuibü saoei haoeibü ikngüma lei saklangbü shenkuko laukei, “Ho shaang bukkei.”
Lausikei haoei haoeibü ik sungngaijinei haona shaang bukkei hoba saoei laukei, “Hainyu kümbo nyi kaibü haang wayetkei,” Hibü hao la Perez nyenkukei.
Kho phaia jai, aola saoei ikngüma lei saklangbü shenkukei, kho bukkei hoba hao la Zera nyenkukei.
Tou Josef Ijep kaodak to leian yankei; hoba hao leian yanbü Ishmaelbü shuong ik ka, Farao phanga kibü lombou konglebou Ijepbü Potifarei hao jekkei.
Ladang
kheijinei hao thedanga Josefei onou hapbei, hoba haoei hao khangenkei; hoba bunyuei jembü chema hao ikjai letikei, hoba haoeibü peisilei pendou haoeibü ikjai phanga phokukei.
Haoeibü chema hoba haoei kibü pendou thüka haola ikjai letibü ka jaüan Josef laüa
Hibü haoei kibü pendou Josef ikjaia yoshaian phokukei; hoba shaula yunglabü to liman Josefeibü ika kibü peisilei shangabü bunyuei ai angeko kikei. Josef süngsilop maibü hoba hesihaang maian kikei.
Longche kian bunyuboueibü yakei Josef to maang dühan saoei hao to laukei, “Kü yoa yepashi, kaiya.”
Lausikei Josefei ngüha aleko, sao to laukei, “Chühashi, ho chema ai peisilei ong kü yoa ki bunyuei angekei, haoei haoeibü peisilei khümbo kü ikto kuakei.
Ho chema kü to yaangbou ao aki. Ngeibü bunyuei ka to liman kü la akubü ai aki, aieilausi no hao yak. Hibü ngei ho tegü amaibü jungeiko Mühghaü khulimbo lai shabü shonla?”
Kho phaiakei saoei chalou angbüa Josef to joyosikei, haoei sao yoa yepla ayingsi sao yoa kila ngüha ale.
Lausikei nyetche Josef kümsilei denche shanga chem maang to atkei, kheijinei sambü yoka che ongkei chema akitei.
Saoei Josefeibü neia senetan laukei, “Kü yoa yepashi kaiya!” Lausikei Josefei saoeibü ika haoeibü nei apyoan satkukei.
Ladang Josefei saoeibü ika haoeibü nei apyoan satkua dogo ngekei,
saoei saoeibü chem kabü sambü shuong ngashaian laukei, “Chühashi, sen aweasüngla ong bunyuei Ibribü che leian loukei! Hao küto jamla chem to lotkei, lausikei ngei ngekkei.
Ladang ngei kaang ngekbü ditkei haoei haoeibü nei kü junga apyoan tangto angkei.”
Saoei lao alongei shongko Josefeibü nei sao junga phokei.
Kheijinei saoei hao to jeteibü ngühli kho lenkei: “Nyi laobou Ibribü sen chemto leian loukei, haoei ngo louyola lela ngeibü shemjang to lotkei.
Lausikei ngo ngekko haapsi hao haoeibü nei kü junga apyoan chem ka satkei.”
Ladang saoeibü yakei, “Kaibü sambüei ngo hainyu jungeikei,” dogo laubü ngühli ditkei, hao aeibou khauangkei.
Hobaje Josefeibü bunyuei hao lapan Chobaeibü thüngbü shuong thüngshang to jinkei.
Lausikei ladang Josef thüngdanga kikei, kheijinei
Hibü thüngdang lombouei thüngchema kibü thüngbü shuong pendou Josef ika phokukei; khoei haoenei khünei ai ong kümbei kho Josefei kümtibü ong kikei.
Hobaje Josefeibü ika ai ki, kho thüngdang lombouei ai achüh, aieilausi hao yoa
Longche kian phaia, Ijep choba thungjungbou si wentek kümbü leiyeibou nyiei choba khulimbo mat angkei.
Hobaje Farao chobaei thungjungbou jaishoubou si wentek ngoubü jaishoubou haosi ham to maangpokkei,
hibü lombou shuong thüka leiyeibou phanga thüngbou chem laoboua Josef kikei, khünei haosi lapan jinkukei.
Hobaje lombou shuong leiyeibouei müt nyi khokei Josef yoa kitikei, hoba haoei haoen khangenkei.
Haoen longche thüngshanga kian phaia,
youche Chobaeibü thung jungbou si wentek ngoubou hamei thüngdang chema mangh che che likei, hoba haosieibü mangh tetlabü lulu kiteikei.
Ngeyang enyu Josef haosi jungto hauan chühsi haosi the khümphüman kikei.
Kheijinei haoei haosi to laukei, “Kasi tat aila the angesakko kida?”
Haosiei laukei, “Küsiei mangh cheche likei. Lausikei kho tetenkulabü müt ao aki.” Hibü Josefei haosi to laukei, “Tetenkulabü kho Mühghaüeibü aying lo? Sanoudaman kü la mangh kho lenbü.”
Kheijinei thung jungbou jaishoubouei Josef to mangh lenkei: “Ngeibü mangha semlüh che kü thedanga ngei hapbei,
hoba lüha bhek sem kikei, hoba khünei nyem longan pon pungan semlüh hek shenshena hekkei.
Hobaje ngeibü ika Faraoeibü thung kikei, hoba ngei semlüh shen kheian Faraoeibü ikmanga jinkukei.”
Kheijinei Josefei laukei, “Ho tetlabü hai: bhek sem kho chalou sem.
Semnyet kanglanga Farao Chobaei ka la amai apbuan no shangiedbü kümsileia pienngaitilabü, hoba shangied haoeibü thung jungbü tegü nyi Faraoeibü ik to haoeibü thung kulabü.
Lausikei no ladang maian yeilaje ngokei damenshima, hoba sanoudambo Farao to joyoko ho chem ka ngo leiyentishi.
Aieilausi ngo Ibri kaodak ka thamtham senjung loubü, hoba haneikei haoenei ngo thüngshang laangpoba phola muko ngei ai shedbü aküm.”
Ladang wentek ngoubü jaishoubou khoei hao jamboueibü mangh tetlabü kho maian hapbei, haoei Josef to laukei, “Ngeikei mangh che lia, hoba chühashi, ngeibü khua wentek kam sem tonan kikei.
Hobaje kam thükkaboua Farao shanga shausiyung ngoubülebü phang phanga kikei; lausikei aushuongei ngeibü khua kibü kam ka kho shaukei.”
Josefei jongaikei, “Ho tetlabü kho: Kam sem kho chalou sem.
Semnyet kanglanga Faraoei no sengan kaibü khu thetlabü; hoba bua saülabü hoba au shuongei kaibü phe shaulabü.”

Kho phaia Farao bukbü chaloua haoei hao phanga yaangbü shuong ngaan lem liko tomtikei, kheijinei haoei haoeibü sambü yoa thung jungbou jaishoubou hoba wentek ngoubü jaishoubou yaangbü shuong thedanga lotikei.
Josefei laubü tetlabü tegü thung jungbou jaishoubou toukei haoeibü thung jungla pentikei; hibü haoei Farao ika thung jinkukei.
Lausikei wentek ngoubou jaishoubou haoei phenetnyu haitikei.
Khei yingsikei thung jungbou jaishoubouei Josef adamen; haoei hao maan apbei.
Po nyi onan phaia Faraoei mangh che likei; hoba chühashi, hao Nail yungkoa loan kikei.
Chühsi, shumang ka masu pi netbü nyet phokeilabü che longan sang lamshauko kikei.
Khübü phaia mangsenlabü che hoba koplintham masu pi nyet Nail shumang ka longan shaangla longbü masu yoa yungkoa lokei.
Hobaje mangsenlabü koplinbü masu shuong khoei phokeilabü masu netbü nyet kho shaukei. Kho phaia Farao pienkei.
Hao toukei nyibou ngakkei, hoba nyiboukei mang che likei; chühsi, youlong chenei youman haangmaibü nyet longkei.
Hobaje chühsi, kho phaia sho hoba chaangbou yeiei bungan aptibü lubü youman nyet longkei.
Hobaje khübü youman pungbü khoei youman maibü langshangbü nyet kho suikei. Kho phaia Farao pikei, hoba chühsi, kho nangnak mangha kiteikei.
Ngeyang hao senyüh ashembü ka Ijep kaodaka huonseibü, hoba songnge dongebü shuong pendou haoei ngashaikei, hoba Faraoei haoen la mangh kho lenkei; lausikei haoeibü mangh tetenkulabü ao akitei.
Kheijinei thung jungbouei Farao to laukei, “Tatje ngei ngeibü shedbü damenakei.
Shangied Faraoei haoeibü sambü to maangpokjinei ngo hoba wentek ngoubou küsi Chobaeibü lombou lakjaibou thüngshang chema thüngan phokei.
Hobaje küsi hamei you chenei ong mangh che che likei, hoba küsi lulu thüngthüng manghtet likei.
Kheijinei lakjaiboueibü sambü Ibribü heshou che kün yoa kikei. Küsiei hao la lulueibü mangh lensi haoei küsi la lulueibü mangh tetlabü lenkei.
Hobaje haoei tetenkubü tegü tükde haüthükkei: ngoje shaangla penbü pentikei, hoba jenabouje phenetnyu haikei.”
Hibü Faraoei Josef leila hautikei, hoba haoenei thüngshang laangpob ka hao tongde leibakei. Hobaje hao khu shuan hoba nei jeian phaia Farao jungto loukei.
Faraoei Josef to laukei, “Ngei mangh che likei, hoba kho tetlabü lenla ao aki. Lausikei nyije mangh tetenkuda dogo ka shangabü lauko ngei ditkei.”
Josefei Farao to jongaikei, “Ngei ho athüklabü, lausikei Mühghaüei Faraoei mangsühbü kho kulabü.”
Kheijinei Faraoei Josef to laukei, “Mangha ngo Nail yungkoa loan kikei,
hoba chühsi, netbü hoba phokeilabü masu pi maibü nyet shumang ka longan thakdu laaka sang lamshaukei,
kho phaia dei ka mangsenlabü koplinbü masu pi nyet longkei. Ngei ladangkei Ijep kaodaka ho tegübü masu hapan achüh.
Hobaje koplintham mangsenlabü masu nyetei shaangla longbü pi netbü nyet kho shaukei.
Lausikei haoenei kho suiankei asuibü tegü ong hapbei; aieilausi haoen shangiedbü yam ong mangsenlabü che kikei. Kheijinei ngo pikei.
Ngei toukei mangha youshou youlong chenei youman langshangbü maibü nyet longan hapbei.
Kho phaia, chaang aekabü yeiei souan pungtibü youman nyet longkei,
hoba youman pungbü khoei youman maibü nyet kho suikei. Ngüh kho ngei huonseibü dan la lenkei, lausikei aoeikei kü la kho atetenku.”
Kheijinei Josefei Farao to laukei, “Faraoeibü mangh penyi ham kho tetlabü che ong. Mühghaüei ai kümla ki kho Farao la lena.
Masu pi maibü nyet kho po nyet hoba youman maibü nyet kho po nyet; penyi ham manghtet che ong.
Hobaje kho phaia longbü masu pi kopbü hoba mangsenlabü nyet, hoba chaang aekabü yeiei souan pungtibü youman nyet tetlabü kho, po nyet mühlabü.
Ngei Farao thedanga lenbü tegütham: Mühghaüei ai kümla kho Farao to lena.
Chühashi, po nyet sühko Ijep kaodak pendoua phenganyenga kilabü;
kho phaia po nyet mühsinou kilabü, hoba Ijep kaodaka phenganyenga kibü kho maalabü hoba mühsinou khoei uangmuang anglabü.
Mühsinou loubüei kaodaka shangied apsileko kibü kho adamenlabü; aieilausi müh yongko kaanglabü.
Farao la mangh penyi thentibü kho Mühghaüei mudonga takletbü, hoba haoei tongde kümlabü.
“Hibü tou Faraoei damanchühbü hoba songsido kibü müt che Ijep kaoa settiashi.
Hobaje kho mütei kaonyeka ikjaibü shuong pienla Faraoei sakkuashi, hoba Ijep kaodaka langle maibü po nyet kibü chaloua shusiphon ka phejan ngaoa che Faraoei heashi.
Haoenei khübü pomai jihsiphaia shausiyung pendou takshattiashi, hoba shaula yungla shanga Farao hauei sang pendoua thanan phoan lomtiashi.
Hibü Ijep kaodaka loula kibü mühsinou po nyet shanga punga kho thanan phosi mühjinei kaodak aleilulabü.”
Kümthen kho Farao si hao phanga yaangbü shuong pendou la maikukei.
Hibü Faraoei haoen to laukei, “Mühghaü soushou kibü ho tegübü müt senei ao hapla?”
Kheijinei Faraoei Josef to laukei, “Mühghaüei ngüh ho pendou ka la ngetikei, khoei no tegübü damanchühbü hoba songbüdobü ao aki.
No kü sanglea bunyu yeishi, hoba kü phanga yaangbü pendouei ka ngühkhüma lelabü. Khei choba setshanga ong ka to ngo yaangbou kilabü.”
Hobaje Faraoei Josef to laukei, “Chühashi, Ijep kaodak pendou thüka ngei no ikjai piena.”
Kheijinei Faraoei haoeibü ik ka nyendobü ikjikhap hangan sungan Josef la kukei. Hao la nei maiboutham neikukei, hoba ngüma honeibü yangmen yakkukei.
Haoei haoeibü nyiboubü kailonga hao settikei; hoba haoenei hao thedanga hao la, “Lam kaangkuashi! Lam kaangkuashi!” dogo ngekkei. Kho khei haoei hao Ijep kaodak pendoua thükkabou yeitikei.
Kheijinei Faraoei Josef to laukei, “Ngo Farao, lausikei ka ngüh ayoko Ijep kaodak pendoua aoeikei ik yingsikei you yingsikei atonenlabü.”
Faraoei Josef la Zafenath-Panea nyenkukei, hoba hao yakla lela shanga On kabü ungshedbou Potifera nouyangnyu Asenat kukei. Hobaje Josef Ijep kaodak pendou shoongko paikei.
Hobaje Ijep choba Faraoeibü kümtoleito atjinei Josef po khujin kiteikei. Hobaje Josef Farao jungka satan Ijep kaodak pendoua paikei.
Naangmaibü po nyet khünei kaonyuei shusiphon apsileko longtikukei.
Ijep kaodaka po nyeta latshaibü nyak kho pendou haoei yoshaian sangnyu weko thankei; sangnyu shuong kaijembo kibü sek ka longbü shausiyung pendou haoei khünei thankei.
Kho tegü Josefei molodei phetsen tegü nyak thankei, khei, yongko juongsapsi haoei aweko nangkei.
Müh aloubü thedangto Ona ungshedbou Potifera nouyangnyu Asenatei Josef la bousushou nyi bukkukei.
Josefei jaishoubou la Manasse nyenkukei, hoba laukei, “Aishanga ngo khonkubü pendou hoba kübou chempen pendou Mühghaüei maatikei.”
Hobaje nyiboubü shou la Efraim nyenkukei hoba laukei, “Aishanga ngo khonkubü kaodaka Mühghaüei ngo hekbü bulong yeitikei.”
Hobaje Ijep kaodaka naangmaibü po nyet kho thonkei,
hoba Josefei laubü tegütham, po nyet mühla khangkei. Kaodak pendoua mühkei, lausikei Ijep kaodak pendoua shausiyung kikei.
Ladang Ijep kaodak pendoua mühsinou khangkei, Ijepbüei Farao to shausiyung shanga ngekkei, kheijinei Faraoei haoen to laukei, “Josef jungto hauashi, hoba haoei ai lenlaje kho kümshi.”
Ladang kaonyu pendoua mühkei, kheijinei Josefei bung ipbei hoba Ijepbü la yaakkukei; aishanga Ijep kaodaka müh yongko kaangkei.
Kaodak pendou nyak nola Ijep kaodak to Josef jungto loukei; aishanga kaodak pendoua mühsinou yongko kaangan kikei.
Ladang Jakobei Ijep kaodakaje nyak kia dogo ditkei haoei haoeibü shousi shuong to laukei, “Kan aila chühyoko ong shaida?”
Haoei athakko laukei, “Ngei Ijepa nyak kia dogo ditda; hibü sen mühei ashemlabü lele khüto yanan sen shanga nyak jekba.”
Hibü Josefeibü jaisi shuong müt an kho Ijep kaodak to nyak jekla yankei.
Lausikei Josefeibü na Benjaminje, Jakobei jaisi shuong yoa ohauti, aieilausi thushed denche kühshuoksi amaibüla dogo hao hatkei.
Hibü lubü nyak jekla haubü shuong yoa Israeleibü shousi shuongkei haukei, aishanga Kanan kaodakakei mühsinou kikei.
Tou Josef Ijep kaodaka bunyubou yeian, haoei kaodak pendou kabü mütshuong la nyak yaakkukei. Hibü ladang Josefeibü jaisi shuongkei lousühkei, haoenei hao thedanga kaoa khüpetkei.

Kheijinei Josefei haoeibü jaisi shuong hapbei hoba haoen tongde shenkei, lausikei yenbou to tegü shoulole jongaiko haoen to laukei, “Kan laka louda?” Haoenei jongaikei, “Kanan kaodak ka nyak jekla louda.”
Josefei haoeibü jaisi shuong shenasikei, haoeneije hao ashen.
Josefei haoen shangabü mangh kho damenko haoen to laukei, “Kan kokpheibü mütshuong! Kün kaodak hau akibü chühla loukei.”
Haoenei hao to jongaikei, “Aying, ngeibü bunyubou, kün kaibü sambü shuong nyak jekla ong loukei.
Kün pendou bou cheeibü shou ki. Künje ngühmaanglanbü mütshuong, kün kokpheibü shuong aying.”
Kheijinei haoei haoen to laukei, “Aying! Kan kün kaodak hau akibü chühla loukei.”
Lausikei haoenei laukei, “Kaibü sambü shuong kün jaisina müt anthüknyi Kanan kaodaka kibü müt cheeibü shou, hoba chühashi, kün yoka nashouboutham abou yoa kia, hoba cheje aki.”
Kheijinei Josefei haoen to laukei, “Kan kokpheibü shuong dogo ngei lauanai!
Hoei kan takteilabü: Faraoeibü nyena ngei kan to thedalanda, kaneibü na napeibou hato leian aloulonga, kan haka asattilabü.
Kan yoka che hautian napeibou kho leiba, hoba kanje thüngan photeilabü, khoei ong kaneibü ngüh tükde si jije ngelabü. Amlang yingan kialonga Faraoeibü nyena thekolanko lauda, kan kokpheibü.”
Hobaje haoei haoen jemala semnyet sühko thüngshanga thüngan phokei.
Sembounyet Josefei haoen to laukei, “Kanei hai kümashi hoba langkei kishi, aieilausi ngei Mühghaü to hatda.
Kan ngühmaanglanbü müt yingalonga kaneibü na che thüngshang hanei phokushi, hoba kaneibü chem to müh shanga nyak künan hauashi.
Hobaje kaneibü na napeibou kho kü jungto leiba, kheijinei kaneibü ngüh ngühmai yinglabü hoba kan ühailabü.” Hobaje haoenei kho kümla khangkei.

Kheijinei haoenei sangkuko laukei, “Maimaitham sen seneibü na shangabü shedbü kia; aieilausi haoei sen to aeibou sujijajinei hao maang leilubü hapsikei senei ngüha ale. Khoei kho khonsak sen jungto louda.”
Kheijinei Reubenei laukei, “Ngei kan to nashoubou khulimbo shedbü teküm dogo alausi? Lausikei kanei ngüha ale! Tou chühshima, hao haibü sii sen thükto loungaida.”
Josefei haoen ai lauyoda kho ditan kikei, lausikei haoenei haoei aditenda dogo dambei, aieilausi Josefei ngüh japbou phoan joyokei.
Kheijinei Josef haoen thedang ka thenyek sepeian haapbei hoba toukei hao nyiboukei haoen jungto sepeinyu longeian haoen to joyokei, hoba haoen yoka Simeon lapjung louan haoenei hapbo hao khühkei.
Kheijinei Josefei haoeneibü neimoka shaubü shenko jinkula, haoen wekoeibü neimoka lulueibü nam jinngaikula hoba walama shaulakei kushi dogo ngühkhüm kukei; hoba haoen to kho khei kümbei.
Kho phaia haoenei lulueibü gadua künlekei hoba haoen khüka meimeikei.
Hobaje nangnak yepshanga haoen yoka cheei haoeibü gadu la oknyinla neimok sengsi haoeibü nam neimok sembunga kiteikei.
Kheijinei haoei jaisinasi shuong to laukei, “Ngeibü namje ngaitikuakei. Hanei ngeibü neimok sembunga kia.” Hibü haoen on tokan maangpangko joyoko laukei, “Mühghaüei sen to ho ai kümbei?”
Ladang haoenei Kanan sühkei, haoen to ai kümbei kho pendou bou Jakob to lenkei.
Haoenei laukei, “Khei Ijep kaodak bunyubouei kün to kaangkosekko joyokei, hoba kaodak kokpheibü shuong dogo laukei.
Lausikei künei hao to, ‘Kün ngühmaanglanbü mütshuong; kün kokpheibü aying,’ dogo jongaikei.
Kün bou cheeibü shou müt anthüknyi hoba cheje haia; napeibou kho ong Kanan kaodaka abou yoa kia.”
Kheijinei kho kaodak bunyubouei kün to laukei, “Kan ayepeibü müt yingalonga hoei ngei ngelabü; kan jaisina yoka müt che kü yoa phokuashi hoba chema mühbünoubü shanga nyak künan ngaishi.

Lausikei kaneibü na napeibou kho kü jungto leiba, khei yingsi ong kan kokpheibü aying, tükdebü müt yingkei dogo ngei ngelabü. Kheijinei kaneibü na kho kan la ngaitikulabü hoba kün kaodaka kan namyak namseiko kila thükkei.”
Kho phaia neimok ka shaubü haakletsi mütpem wekoeibü nam lulueibü neimoka hapbei. Hobaje haoenei hoba bouei namsen kho hapan aeibou hatyokei.
Haoeneibü bou Jakobei haoen to laukei, “Kanei ngo shousi akibüla yeitia. Josef aki, Simeonkei aki, hoba tou Benjaminkei kanei leian haumang sühda. Pendou kho kükhu limbo ki.”
Kheijinei Reubenei bou to laukei, “Ngei hao ka jungto nyibou aleibalonga küshou nyi ham kho haitishi. Hao kho kü la nongkushi, hoba ngei ka jungto leingaibakho.”

Kheijinei haoei laukei, “Kü shouje kan yoa ohautilabü; aieilausi haojai haian hao ong jouakei, hibü kaneibü walama denche thushed kühshuokalonga kanei ngo khuthu phaman maangmaua heekhün to attilabü.”
Tou Kanana müh kho aei kaangbou kikei.
Kheijinei haoenei Ijep kaodak ka sungbabü nyak pendou kho shaukhümsije, bouei haoen to laukei, “Toukei ngaian sen shanga nyak shisho jekba.”
Lausikei Jihudaei hao to laukei, “Müt khoei kün to maisho lena, ‘Kanei kaneibü na kho aleibalonga kanei kü the ühüplabü.’
Hibü küneibü na kho kün yoa hautialonga künei ka la nyak jekbala haukho;
lausikei nyi hao ohautilonga kün tohaukho, aieilausi müt khoei kün to lena, ‘Kaneibü na kan yoa athonlonga kanei kü the ühüplabü.’ ”
Kheijinei Israelei laukei, “Kanei kü shanga aila amaibü sungbako kaneibü na toukei che kia dogo müt khola lenkei?”

Kheijinei haoenei laukei, “Müt khoei kün shanga hoba sen chempen shanga kaangko pheko laukei, ‘Kaneibü bou tou sühko lang kiakaoba lo? hoba kaneibü na che kia lo?’ Künei haoei phebü ngüh ong jongaikei. ‘Kaneibü na kho hato leiba,’ dogo laulep dogo künei lai ngela?”
Kheijinei Jihudaei haobou Israel to laukei, “Na kho kü yoa hautiashi, hoba kün tongde meimeijung haukho; khei yingsi ong kün hoba küneibü shousinasi shuong ühaiko lang kilabü.
Hao shanga ngo aukabü yingkho; kü ik ka nyi hao hishi. Ngei ka jungto hao aleibalonga hoba ka thedanga aphokulonga kü langkei sünga ngo ka thedanga shedbü yinglabü.
Aieilausi kün aphai tegüje touje hoei nyibou longeian kikhoulabü.”

Kheijinei haoeneibü bou Israelei laukei, “Khei yingalonga kanei khei kümshima; müt khola jongsak shanga sen kaodaka longbü buhek maibü, moumoli shisho, naodei shisho, shikmeimaitibü, ponlemhibü, pistakhio hoba almond buhek, khübü shisho dogo ona lamlean künashi.
Hobaje kanei lulueibü ika nam phejan nyibang künashi, aishanga kaneibü neimok sembunga jinngaikubü nam khokei künngaijan. Aingenyu denche mashikan kilabü.
Kaneibü nakei leian müt kho jungto tongde sepeinyu ngaiashi.
Thükenbou Mühghaüei kaneibü na lubü che yoa Benjamin thonan kan yoa longeitilabü lele müt kho thedanga kan la üeisanou nahaptima. Kü shangaje ngo shousi akibüla yeitialonga, shousi aki dogo setkho.”
Hibü haoenei jongsakla peisilei hoba ika nam phejan nyi hoba Benjamin leian Ijep kaodak to hauan Josef thedanga lokei.
Ladang Josefei haoen Benjamin yoa hapbei haoei haoeibü ikjaibou to laukei, “Habü mütshuong chem to leiyetashi hoba kü yoa chajih nyakshau shanga shatsinam ka haitian shausiyung lamleashi.”
Josefei laubü tegü müt khoei haoen Josef chem to leian loukei.

Tou Josef chem to leian lousi haoen hatkei hoba laukei, “Shaangla seneibü neimoka jinngaikubü nam shanga sen hato leian louda. Haoei sen la shedbü kuko sen lapan hoba gadu sunglangkuko sen aaola leko phola kümda.”
Hibü haoen Josefeibü ikjaibou jungto hauan koukhüna joyokei.
Haoenei laukei, “O ngeibü bunyubou, shaangla kün hato nyak jekla che louyenkei.
Lausikei nangnak yepshanga sühsi künei neimok sengkei hoba chühsi kün mütpem wekoeibü neimoka nam penko hapbei; kho künei künbangaiakei.
Hobaje künei toukei khoto jinyoan jungan louyenkei, nam kho küneibü neimoka aoei jinkukeije künei angekei.”

Kheijinei haoei laukei, “Kan maang temau hoba tehüt. Kaneibü Mühghaü hoba kaneibü boueibü Mühghaüei kaneibü neimoka nam phokukei; ngeije kaneibü nam hileda.” Kheijinei haoei Simeon haoen jungto leibakei.
Ikjaibou khoei mütshuong kho Josef chem to leian louan you sakla dei kukei, hoba haoenei haoeneibü you makkei, hoba haoeneibü gadu la youho nyaitikei.
Chajihboua Josef chemto mo alongeitoua haoenei jongsak kho lamlekei; aieilausi haoen khünei shaula yunglabü dogo ditkei.
Kho phaia Josef chem to longeisi haoeneibü ika kibü jongsak kho chemto jungan angan hao thedanga phokuan haoenei hao thedanga kaoa khüpetkei.
Haoei haoen shangabü pheko laukei, “Kaneibü jailebü bou che shangabü kanei kü la lenbü kho lai ki? Hao toukei lang kiakaoba lo?”
Haoenei jongaiko laukei, “Küneibü bou kaibü sambü kho maisho kia.” Hobaje haoenei soumo kuko khüpetkei.
Kheijinei haoei tangko chühan, haonyueibü shou, na Benjamin hapan laukei, “Kanei kaneibü napeibou shangabü kü la lenbü kho ho sai?” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Mühghaüei ka to onoushima, küshou.”
Josefei na shangabü sanouko damsije haapshang lambo panteiko haoeibü shemjang to hauan khünei haapbei.
Kho phaia hao the nyetan tang to longan haoeibü maangpon küpjemeian laukei, “Shausiyung shomashi.”

Kheijinei haoenei hao la, haoeibü jaisishuong la, hoba hao yoa shaulabü Ijepbü la lulu lulu khümsoka lamlekukei; aieilausi Ibribü yoa Ijepbü liko shaulabü kho janbü aying. Aieilausi Ijepbü shanga kho mangsenlabü kikei.
Kho phaia hao thedanga, bukbü phetphan tegü jaishou ka thenko settikei, hibü haoen chühyoan maangpangkei.
Ladang Josefeibü khümsok ka haoen la shausiyung shombukei, kheijinei Benjamineibü phejanje lubüeibü to phejan ngaoei juongbou kikei. Kho tegü haoenei shaukhüm yungkhüman hao yoa olinyokei.
Kho phaia Josefei haoeibü chem bunyubou to lenkei, “Mütshuong la haoenei sühthüng haoeneibü neimoka shaubü jinkuashi, hoba haoen müt wekola haoeneibü nam haoeneibü neimok sembunga jinngaikuashi.
Hobaje napeiboueibü neimok sembunga ngeibü chandinam thung kho nam yoa jinkushi.” Hobaje haoei Josefei lenbü tegü kümbei.
Ngeyang enyu haoen haoeneibü gadu yoa hangan hautikei.
Haoen sangnyu ka lalok ohauko Josefei haoeibü chem ikjaibou to laukei, “Meimeiashi, mütshuong kho phai shijung hauashi, hoba haoen laphetjinei laushi, ‘Kanei maibü jeiko aila amaibü kungaikei?
Thung kho ngeibü bunyubouei yungbü thung hoba kho phaang pakbü tetsida lebü thung aying lo? Kanei ho kaang shedtia!’ ”
Haoei haoen laphetan phaia ho ngüh nopmaiko laukei.
Lausikei haoenei hao to laukei, “Küneibü bunyubouei aila hainyutham laudama lo? Kaibü sambü shuongei kheinyuje tekümbao?
Chühashi, küneibü neimok sembunga kibü nam künei hapbü khokei künei Kanan kaodak ka ka jungto sungngaibakei. Khülonga kaibü bunyubou chem ka hon ayingsi chandinam künei ainei lela kokla?
Kaibü sambü shuong yoa aoeibü ona kilaje hao haitishima, hoba künkei seneibü bunyuboueibü aaola lekhoma.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Kanei laubü tegü yingshi: aoeibü ika kho haplaje hao ngeibü aaola lelabü, hoba kan joubü shuong tanglabü.”
Kheijinei haoenei panteiko lulueibü neimok sembunga khühbü sengkei.
Kheijinei haoei jaishoubou ka napeibou sühko aakkei. Hobaje thung kho Benjamineibü neimoka hapbei.
Kheijinei haoenei haoeneibü nei jitnyinkei. Hobaje lulueibü gadu la on künngaitian sangnyu to ngaikei.
Hobaje Jihuda si haoeibü nasi shuong Josef chem to haukei, aieilausi kheijinei hao chema kiteikei; hoba haoen hao thedanga shingennyu khüpetkei.
Josefei haoen to laukei, “Kanei ho ai kümsilei kümbei? Ngo tegübü mütei maimaitham phaang pakla thükkei dogo kanei angekei lo?”

Kheijinei Jihudaei laukei, “Küneibü bunyubou thedanga künei ai lenla? Ayinglonga künei kün lolo ai matmaila? Kaibü sambü shuongeibü Mühghaüei tang khittia. Chühashi, kün hoba aoeibü ika thung hapbei, hao yoa künkei ngeibü bunyuboueibü aaola lekho.”
Lausikei Josefei laukei, “Kho tegü ngei ladangkei ajungeilabü! Touje aoeibü ika thung hapbei hao kho ong ngeibü sambula lelabü; lausikei kanje kaneibü bou jungto maisho ngaiashi.”
Kheijinei Jihudaei hao nyangko hauan laukei, “O ngeibü bunyubou, kaibü nouei ditko kaibü sambouei ngüh che laula ngei sudajada. No Farao him yingasikei, ka sambou to temangpokma.
Ngeibü bunyubouei ka sambü shuong to hai phekei, ‘Kaneibü bou ayingsi lubü na kilao?’
Hobaje künei jongaikei, ‘Künei jailebü bou kia, hoba hao jai lean bukbü na che kia. Haoeibü jaije haia hoba nyuei bukbü yoa hao che ong jouan kia, khoei bouei hao to sanouda.’
Hobaje nyi kaibü sambü dan to laukei, ‘Kanei hao kü jungto leian kayen, ngei hao to chühkho.’
Hobaje künei ngeibü bunyubou to jongaikei, ‘Nashoubou kho bou ka abangenlabü, aieilausi haoei bou ka bangalonga bou kho hailabü.’
Lausikei nyi kaibü sambü to laukei, ‘Kaneibü na napei kho kan yoa leian aloulonga kanei kü theje ladangkei ühüplabü.’
“Kho phaia kün kaibü sambü, küneibü bou jungto hauan kün to küneibü bunyubouei joyobü khümbo abou la lenkei.
Kheijinei küneibü bouei, toukei hauan shaubu shisho jekba dogo laukei.
Lausikei künei laukei, ‘Küneibü napeibou kün yoa kisi ong kün haulabü. Küneibü napeibou kün yoa akishongko künei kho müteibü thenyek ühüpenlabü.’
Kheijinei kaibü sambü küneibü bouei laukei, ‘Kü yakei küla shou müt nyi bukkukei kho kanei ngekei;
ngei laukei, touje cheje kü jungka satsije, maimaitham netla yeia, hoba ngei tou sühko hao ühüpda.
Tou kanei haokei kü jungka leian satan denche thushed kühshuoka longa kanei ngo khuthu phaman maangmaua heekhün to attilabü.’
“Khei yingbü khoei, kaibü sambou küboueibü langkei napeieibü langkei to phenyoan kibüei ngo kübou jungto ladang ngailaje hoba na kho kün yoa athonlaje kheijinei
kübouei na kho ühüplonga hao hailabü. Kaibü sambü shuongei küneibü khuthu phambü bou maangmaua heekhün to attilabü.
Aieilausi ngo kaibü sambouei na shanga aukabü leko ho hai kübou to laukei, ‘Hao ka jungto leian alongei longa ngo ponpen kübou thedanga shed yinglabü!’
Khei yingbü khoei ngei sukojako lauda, khei na jeiko ngo bunyuboueibü aaola leko kikho; hoba na kho jaisishuong yoa ngaitiashi.
Aishanga na kü yoa athonlonga kübou jungto ngo lai haula? aieilausi abou khonsak chühko lai ong akien.”

Kheijinei Josefei hao yoa loan kibü shuong thedanga haoeibü maangpon senyühashembo thepetla athüksije haoei laukei, “Kü jungka müt pendou kukashi!” Hibü Josefei hao jaisi shuong la haoeibü the ngetijinei müt aokei akitei.
Kheijinei hao aeibou haapbü Ijepbü hoba Farao chemdang kabü mütshuongei ditkei.
Hobaje Josefei hao jaisi shuong to laukei, “Ngo Josef, kübou tou sühko lang kiakaoba lo?” Lausikei jaisishuong aeibou mangan apbei hoba haoenei jongaila athükko apbei.
Kho phaia Josefei jaisi shuong to laukei, “Sanoudambo kü jungto nyangko kaishima.” Hibü haoen hao nyangko hausi haoei laukei, “Kanei ao Ijepbü la yaakkei kho kaneibü na Josef ngo!
Lausikei kanei ngo yaakbü shanga kan lolo maangto teshat, ayingsi temangpokyo; aieilausi langkei püetla shanga Mühghaüei ngo kan thedangto hautikei.
Aishanga tou po nyi kaodaka mühda; hoba toukei po ngao sühko sek amoulabü, latkei alatlabü.
Lausikei Mühghaüei kaodaka kan joubü shuong shanga langkei püetla hoba khümenla shanga kan to shaang ngo hautikei.
Khoei, kanei ngo hato hautikei aying, Mühghaüei hautikei. Hobaje ngo Farao aenei bou che, haoeibü chema hoba Ijep kaodak khümboa bunyubou yeitikei.
“Kan kübou jungto panteiko ngaiashi, hao to lenashi, kashou Josefei hai lauda: ‘Mühghaüei Ijep kaodak khümboa bunyubou yeitia. Kü jungto aphaiko panteiko kaiyena.
No Goshen kaonyeka kiashi, hibü no, kaibü shousi hoba shisi shuong hoba nyi aiong ki, pendou kü junga nyangko kilabü.
Khünei ngei no samlabü; aieilausi toukei po ngao mühlabü. Khei ayinglonga aingenyu no, kan chempen hoba ajanjan pendou, nyi kibü khümboei kongan aaplabü.’
“Chühashi, ngei kü sembungei lenbü kanei jembü nyekei hapda.
Toukei Ijep kaodaka ngo yaangenbü pendou hoba kanei jembü nyekei hapbü ajanjan ngühli pendou kübou la lenshima. Hobaje kübou hato tongde leiyenba.”
Kheijinei haoei haona Benjamin ngüma haoeibü ikei shenan haapbei, hoba Benjaminei haoeibü ngüma aapan haapbei.
Kho phaia haoei jaisinasi shuong pendou to sembung shepan haoen to haoeibü ikei souan haapbei. Kho phaiaje jaisinasi shuongei hao to ngühsong wanyokei.
Ladang Josefeibü jaisi shuong louakei dogo Farao choba chema ngühlang ditkei, Farao hoba hao phanga yaangbü shuong olinkei.
Hobaje Faraoei Josef to laukei, “Kaibü jaisi shuong to lenashi, ‘Kanei hai kümshi: Kaneibü shatsinam la künlekuashi hoba Kanan kaodak to ngaiashi;
hoba kaneibü bou hoba chempen pendou hato kü jungto leiba; hoba Ijep kaodaka pendou to maibou kaophei ngei kan la kulabü hoba khünei kanei haabü kaodak ka longbü shaulabü.’
Tokei kanei haoen to ho lenashi, ‘Hai kümshi: Kaneibü shousina, nashou hanbü hoba lulueibü yaksi shuong shanga Ijep kaodak ka kailong jungan hauan kaneibü bou leibama.
Kanei kaneibü peisilei shanga ai tedam, aieilausi Ijep kaodaka kibü peisilei maibü khümbo kho kaneibü yinglabü.’ ”
Kheijinei Israeleibü shousi shuongei kho ditkei. Hobaje Faraoei laubü tegü Josefei haoen la kailong kukei, hoba lama shaula shausiyung kukei.
Toukei haoei haoen mütpem weko la nei jeilabü kukei, lausikei Benjamin laje haoei chandinam saongao sem hoba ngaonei jeiyolabü neisimei kukei.
Hobaje haoei bou jungto peisilei ho hai künan hautikei; Ijep kaodak kabü peisilei maibü gadu an manko, hoba haobouei lama shaula shaubu hoba wen hoba lubü shausiyung gadu pi an manko künan hautikei.
Kho khei haoen jaisi shuong hautikei hoba haoen ungjinei haoei haoen to laukei, “Lama tüoyoma no!”
Hibü haoen Ijep kaodak ka ungkei hoba Kanan kaodaka kibü haoeneibü bou Jakob junga sühkei.
Haoenei hao to lenkei, “Josef kho toukei lang kia! Ijep kaodak pendou thüka hao bunyu yingkei!” Jakob maangkou shembei; aishanga haoeneibü ngüh to haoei maialem.
Lausikei ladang Josefei lentibü ngüh khümbo hao la lenkei hoba hao leila hautibü kailong hapbei, kheijinei Jakob maang sinngaikei.
Hobaje Israelei laukei, “Hoei soua! Küshou Josef toukei lang kia! Ngo mohaitoua hauan hao to chühlabü.”
Hibü Israelei haoei kibü pendou aakjung haukei hoba Beersheba sühan haobou Isak Mühghaü to lembei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei nangnak mangha Israel to lenkei, “Jakob, Jakob!” Hobaje haoei jongaikei, “Ngo hanei kia.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ngo Mühghaü, kaboueibü Mühghaü. No Ijep kaodak to haula tehütma; aishanga ngei khünei no phang yaang yeitikulabü.
Ngo ka yoa Ijep kaodak to haulabü, hoba ngei no maimaitham leingaibalabü. Hobaje Josefeibü ikei maimai ka nyeka yembulabü.”
Hobaje Jakob Beersheba ka meimeijung haukei, hoba Israeleibü shousi shuongei haoeneibü bou Jakob hoba lulueibü shousina shuong hoba yaksi shuong Faraoei hautibü kailong to angtian leian haukei.
Hobaje haoenei lulueibü shatsinam hoba Kanan kaodaka ai peisilei ki kho pendou künan Jakob hoba haoeibü chempen pendou Ijep kaodak to haukei.
Khei haoei haoeibü shousi nouyang jayangshou hoba shisi shousi hoba thensilen khümbo hao yoa Ijep kaodak to leian haukei.
Ijep kaodak to haubü Israel shousi shuong nyen habü ho: Jakob hoba haoeibü shousi shuong: Jakobeibü shou jaishoubou Reuben,
Reubeneibü shousi shuong: Hanok, Pallu, Hezron, hoba Karmi,
Simoeneibü shousi shuong: Jemuel, Jamin, Ohad, Jakin, Zohar, hoba Kanan soei bukbü shou Shaul.
Levi shousi shuong: Gershon, Kohat, hoba Merari.
Jihuda shousi shuong: Er, Onan, Shela, Perez, hoba Zera (lausikei Er si Onanje Kanan kaodaka haikei.) Perez shousi shuong: Hezron si Hamul.
Issakar shousi shuong: Tola, Pua, Jashub, hoba Shimron.
Zebulun shousi shuong: Sered, Elon, hoba Jaleel.
Padan Arama kijinei Leaei Jakob la nouyangnyu Dina to liman bukkubü bousushou shuong ki. Hobaje nouyang jaiyangshou shuong pendouei müt khujinto sem kikei.
Hobaje Gad shousi shuong: Zefon, Haggi, Shuni, Ezbon, Eri, Arodi hoba Areli.
Asher shousi shuong: Imna, Ishva, Ishvi, hoba Beria. Haoeneibü na yaksa Sera kikei. Beria shousi shuong: Heber si Malkiel.
Habü ho Labanei jembü nouyangshou Lea la kubü Zilpa shousi hoba saoei Jakob la müt anthüklak bukkukei.
Jakob yak Racheleibü shou Josef si Benjamin.
Hobaje Ona ungshedbou Potifera nouyangnyu Asenatei Ijepa Josef la bukkubü shounyi: Manasse hoba Efraim.
Hobaje Benjamin shousi shuong: Bela, Beker, Ashbel, Gera, Naman, Ehi, Rosh, Muppim, Huppim hoba Ard.
Jakob la Rachelei bukkubü shousi shuong pendouei müt anthüklei.
Dan shou Hushim.
Hobaje Naftali shousi shuong: Jazel, Guni, Jezer, hoba Shillem.
Labanei haoshou nouyangnyu Rachel la kubü Bilha shousi shuong pendouei müt nyet.
Jakob ka bakbü hoba hao yoa Ijep to haubü, haoeibü shousieibü yaksi shuong aweko, pendouei müt saosemto lak.
Ijep kaodaka bukbü Josefeibü shounyi wean Ijep kaodak to haubü Jakob chempen pendouei müt anjinlei kikei.
Tou Goshen kaonyek to lamlela shanga Jakobei Jihuda hao thedangto Josef jungto hautikei. Ladang haoen hauan Goshen kaodak sühkei,
kheijinei Josefei haoeibü kailong lamlean haobou Israel shuokla Goshen kaonyek to haukei. Josef hao thedanga sühlangsi lengko hao boueibü ngüma souan haaptanglekei.
Kheijinei Israelei Josef to laukei, “Touje ngo haila somakei, aieilausi tou sühko no lang kian ngei kathe hapa.”
Kheijinei Josefei haoeibü jaisishuong si haobou chempen to laukei, “Ngo hauan Farao to ho lenkho, ‘Kanan kaodaka kibü ngeibü jaisinasi shuong hoba kübou chempen kü jungto louakei.
Haoen sanlombü shuong, aieilausi haoen shatsinam sambü shuong kikei, haoenei haoeneibü san, masu shuong hoba ajanjan pendou sungbakei.’
Ladang Faraoei kan ngaan, ‘Kan ai lamshauko kibü shuong?’ dogo phelaje

kheijinei kanei hai jongaishima, ‘Khei kaibü sambü shuong, küneibü pisi shuongei kümbü tegü, nashoudang ka tou sühko shatsinam, samkeisamuk thounoubü müt ki.’ Kheijinei kan Goshen kaoa kila sakkulabü, aishanga sanlombü shuongje Ijepbüei mangsenda.”
Hibü Josefei haoeibü jaisi müt ngao leijung hauan Farao to laukei, “Kübou hoba küjai künasi shuong Kanan ka haoeneibü sanshuong, masu hoba haoenei kibü pendou thonan louan Goshen kaonyeka kia.”
Kho phaia Josefei haoeibü jaisina yoka müt ngao leian hauan Farao la kukei.
Hobaje Faraoei haoeibü jaisinasi shuong to phekei, “Kaneibü langle ai?” Hobaje haoenei Farao to jongaikei, “Kaibü sambü shuong, kün hoba küneibü pisibousi ka kün sanlombü shuong ki.”

Haoenei toukei hao to laukei, “Kün hanei longche kila loukei, aieilausi Kanan kaodaka aeibou mühda, hibü kaibü sambü shuongkei sanshuong lamshaushang aki. Hibü kaibü sambü shuong Goshen kaonyeka kitishi dogo künei sudajada.”
Khünei Faraoei Josef to laukei, “Kabou si kaibü jaisi shuong ka jungto louakei hoba

Ijep kaodak ka thedanga kia. Hibü kaonyek pendou yoka maiboutham khünei kabou si kaibü jaisi shuong kitishi. Haoen Goshen kaonyeka kitishi; hoba haoen yoa kümsilei lan thükbü at kialonga haoen ngeibü shatsinam samkeisamuk thüka bunyu yeitishima.”
Kheijinei Josefei haobou Jakob Farao jungto leibakei, hoba Jakobei Farao haükukei.
Hobaje Faraoei Jakob to phekei, “Kaibü salang lalokche?”
Jakobei Farao to laukei, “Ngo saopobü wakoua thüngbü po saongaoto khujin. Ngo salang tuisho ong hoba khonkubü chalou ong; hoba künei shangied kübousi shuongeibü po aonlang.”
Hobaje Jakobei Farao haükuan phaia Farao jungka bangkei.
Hibü Faraoei sakkubü tegü Josefei haobou si haoeibü jaisi shuong la Ijepa Rameses kaonyek pendou to maibou kao kukei.
Hobaje Josefei haoboueibü jaisinasi shuong hoba haoboueibü chempen pendou haoen chemdang thüng shaueiyungei sambei.
Kaodak pendoua shausiyung aki; aieilausi müh yongko kaangkei, khoei Ijep hoba Kanan kaodak mühei shembei.
Ijep si Kanan kaodak ka nyakei jekbü nam pendou Josefei yoshaian Farao jungto sungbakei.
Ladang Ijep si Kanan kaodaka nam khinkei, Ijepbü pendouei Josef jungto louan laukei, “Kün la shausiyung labüma, aieilausi kaibü nyekei hapbo kün lai haila? Küneibü nam yaakshaukhüma.”
Hibü Josefei laukei, “Khülonga kaneibü shatsinam labüma; nam lekhümalonga, kaneibü samkeisamuk jeila ngei kan la shaubu kukho.”

Hibü haoenei lulu thüngthüng shatsinam samkeisamuk sungbasi, Josefei haoeneibü koli, san, masu, gadu, hoba samkeisamuk ajanjan lu haoen la nyak jaikukei. Khüpo haoei haoeneibü samkeisamuk shatsinam pendou lu haoen la shausiyung kukei.

Hobaje khüpo thonan phaia, nyibou poa Josef jungto louan haoenei hao to laukei, “Küneibü bunyu thedanga künei tehukho; nam hoba shatsinam hoba samkeisamuk pendou kho bunyuboueibü, hibü chühashi, küneibü mang hoba kao to liman ai aki;

aila kaibü nyekei hapbo kün hoba küneibü kao maula? Shaubu lu kün hoba küneibü kao jekashi, hoba küneibü kao yoa kün Faraoeibü aaola lekho. Künla shaubu lilabü labü, khoei kün ühaiko lang kilabü, hoba küneibü sekkei yamla ayeilabü.”
Kho tegü Ijep kaodak pendou Josefei Farao la jekkukei; aieilausi müh kheinyu kaangsije Ijepbüei anaten, hibü haoen müt wekoei jembü sek yaakkei. Kho Faraoeibü la yeikei,
hoba Josefei mütshuong kho Ijep kaodak jiae leilang ka jiae leilang thonbü sühko leishaian phokei.
Lankei ungshedbou shuongeibü kaoje haoei ajek; aieilausi ungshedbou shuongei Farao ka haoeneibü phejan hapbei; hoba ungshedbou shuongei kho shaukei. Khoei haoenei haoeneibü kao ayaak.
