Kheijinei Josefei mütshuong pendou to laukei, “Chühashi, tat ngei kan hoba kaneibü sek Farao shanga jekkua; kan shanga shaubu lilabü ho kanei künan hauan seka wenashi.
Hobaje khoka lajuche latlaje phejan ngao la janan Farao la che kuashi. Hobaje janletbü ka phejan lei kho kaneibü; khoei kaneibü seka lilabü hoba kan chemdang shanga shausiyung yinglabü.”
Haoenei laukei, “Nyi kün khümena, küneibü bunyubouei kün to sanoudama, hibü kün Faraoeibü aaola yeikho.”
Hibü phejan ngao ka che Farao shangabü dogo laukei; khoei tou sühko Ijep kaodaka Josefei khangkubü kho ngühkhüm la yeikei, lausikei ungshedboueibü kaoje Faraoeibü la ayei.
Israelbü Ijep kao Goshen kaonyeka sang lekei. Khünei haoen kian keiko yaangko bukko haako aeibou haajung haukei.
Jakob Ijep kaodaka po anthüknyet kikei, hoba haoeibü salang po saongaoto saonyito nyet kikei.

Ladang Jakob hailabü jih sühkei, haoei haoshou Josef ngajung louan hao to laukei, “Nyi küto sanoualonga, ngei ho sudajada, nyi kaibü ik ngeibü ikaklang to attiashi, hoba nyi maanglemenko thebülanbü lelabü dogo lenashi. Ngo Ijep a tekhün,
lausikei shangied ngeibü bousi shuong yoa khüntimang sühda; hibü nyi ngo Ijep kaodak ka künjung hauan haoeneibü heea khünashi.” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Nyi kü to lenbü tegü ngei kümlabü.”
Haoei laukei, “Nyi khei kümlabü dogo thealanashi.” Kheijinei Josefei hao thea thekeilankei, hoba Israelei haoeibü khukhüma khüpetan lembei.
Longche kian phaia müt atei Josef to, “Kabou shatda” dogo lenkei. Hibü haoei haoeibü shounyi, Manasse si Efraim leian haukei.
Ladang Jakob to, “Kabou Josef ka jungto louakei,” dogo lenkei, kheijinei Israelei haoeibü hau kingaian yepshanga setkei.
Jakobei Josef to laukei, “Pendou to hau yaangbou Mühghaü Kanan kaodak Luz sanga kü jungto longkei, hoba ngo haükukei.

Hobaje haoei kü to laukei, ‘Chühashi, ngei no bukkohaako juong haatikulabü. Hobaje ngei no phangyaang mütli yeitilabü, hoba ngei ka phainei kaibü thensilen la ponpen shanga bunyu yeiko kimla ho kaodak kulabü.’
“Ngo aloujinei Ijep kaodaka kala bukkubü shounyi kho ngeibü; Efraim si Manasse kei Reuben si Simeon tegü ong küshou yinglabü.
Touje haoen phainei kala lajuche bukkulaje kho kashou la lelabü; hoba haoenei jaisi shuongeibü nyena haoenei kaobunyu yeibü nyen nyenlabü.
Ngoje Padan Aram ka Kanan kaoa Efrat sühla nyangko Rachel lama kü thedanga haikukei, hoba ngei sao khünei Efrat (kho Bethlehem) to haubü lama khünan apyokei.”
Kho phaia Israelei Josef shousi shuong hapan phekei, “Habü ho aoyou?”
Josefei haobou to jongaikei, “Khünyi kho Mühghaüei küla hanei Ijepa kubü shousi ki.” Kheijinei Israelei laukei, “Ngei haosi haükulabü lele haosi kü jungto leiba.”
Tou Israel baushi sinan kisije haoeibü nyek yuian maisho achühen. Hibü Josefei haosi hao nyangko leian loukei, hoba haoei haosi himlepan sembung shepbei.
Toukei Israelei Josef to laukei, “Ngei kathe haplep dogo adam; lausikei chühashi, Mühghaüei touje kaibü shousikei küla haptia.”
Kheijinei Israeleibü you phang ka haoeibü shounyi leian sungan hao thedanga kaoa khüpetkei.
Kho phaia Josefei ham leian jungan, Efraim Jakobeibü nanaenei hoba Manasse maiaenei dogo jenan lotikei.
Lausikei haoeibü mai ik shingan Efraim khua shangkei, hao nashoubou yingasikei; hoba haoeibü ik peiyoan, haoei haoeibü nanae ikei Manasse khua shangkei, hao shaangbü shou yingasikei.
Tou haoei Josef haükuko laukei,
“Laobou Mühghaü thedanga shangied küpi kübousi shuong,
Abraham hoba Isak paikei,
laobou Mühghaüei tou sühko ngeibü langkei salang sünga ngo sambei:
Hobaje laobou hangangbüei amaibü pendou ka ngo
püetkei, haoei nashou nyi ho haükushima.
Hobaje ngeibü nyena hoba shangied küpi kübousi shuong Abraham si Isak nyena haoen ngalabü;
hoba kaodaka haoen aeibou haako yaangko kitishima.”
Ladang Josefei boueibü mai ikei Efraimeibü khua shangetan hapbei, hao maang ühai, hoba Efraimeibü khu ka Manaseeibü khua shangettila shanga boueibü ika jungkei.
Hobaje Josefei bou to laukei, “Abou, kho khei touma, ho jaishoubou haoeibü khua kaibü mai ikei shangetshima.”

Lausikei bouei ngüha aleko laukei, “Ngei shenakei. Küshou ngei ngeakei, ho phangyaang che yeilabü, hoba yaangenbü che yeilabü. Lausikei haona kho hao to yaangbou yinglabü, aishanga haoeibü thensilen kho phangshuong yaangbü che la yeilabü.”
Khünyet chalou haoei haoen haükuko laukei, “Ka nyen phongko Israelei haülabü kuko laulabü, ‘Mühghaüei no Efraim si Manasse tegü yeitishi.’ ” Kho khei Jakobei Manasse to Efraim shaangtikei.
Kheijinei Jakobei Josef to laukei, “Chühashi, ngo haida, lausikei Mühghaü kan yoa kilabü, hoba haoei kan pi kaodak to leian ngailabü.
Hobaje kala, ao jaisi shuong thüka ki, ngei laobou Amorbü ka ngeibü inlou si laujinei soletbü haabü kaophei Shekhem ki, kho aeila kuda.”
Kheijinei Jakobei hao shousi shuong ngaan laukei, “Kan yoshaiashi, khei ngiet phaia kan jungto ai loula kho ngei kan la lenkho.”
“Jakob shousi shuong, liko yoshaian ditashi:
kaneibü bou Israeleibü ngüh ditashi.
“Reuben, küshou jaishoubou,
ngeibü hau, tetsida khangbü.
No soumoa haangenbou, hoba no seia sonenbou.
No küp ajembü dei tegü,
no jaila leko ühanglabü,
aishanga no kaboueibü shen to nguikei;
No ngeibü thangnyu shuong to jambei,
hoba nyi kaboueibü shen shatikei.
“Simeon si Levi tükdebü jaisina ki.
Haosiei ik shatyobü kaangbüsekbü shanga insiaubu jungeikei.
Haosi kok shakyobüa ngo ayolabü,
ayingsi haosi sangkuphelambüa ngei phejan alelabü,
Aishanga haosiei khauanga mütshuong haitikei,
hoba haosiei louyola masu pongsu yaküp thettikei.
Haosi khauanga shedsikhau yingshi,
aishanga kho kaangbü sekbü.
Hobaje haosi khau lotbüa shedsikhau yingshi,
aieilausi kho onou akak.
Ngei haoen Israel kaonyu pendoua aatilabü.
Israel mütli yoa ngei haoen lintilabü.
“O Jihuda, noje kaibü jaisinasi shuongei sanglabü.
Nyi kaibü ikei kaibü dangboueibü ngüma nyatlabü.
Kaboueibü shousi shuongei ka to khüpetlabü.
O Jihuda, no molosaonyu shoushou tegütham.
Küshou, no mei taketshang ka longeida;
hao molosaonyu hima leketnyu lengakei,
aoei hao pitila?
Hao yemsang to alou shongko
Jihuda ka Chobaeibü songdak julo,
hoba hao you jungka songdak-julo akuklabü,
hoba mütshuongei haoeibü ngüh ditkulabü.
Semlühlonga haoeibü gadu phenan,
hoba semlühlong maibouthama haoeibü gadu shoushou phenan;
Haoei haoeibü neisimei ihei,
hoba haoeibü neisimei sii hima sakbü semlüha saklabü.
Ihei haoeibü nyek saklanglabü,
hoba sendeiei haoeibü hauh thupailabü.
“Zebulun yungnyu yungkoa kilabü;
hoba hao yungkoa longchem yaangbü phoshang yinglabü.
Sidon kaodak to hao leilang khümlabü.
“Issakarje sekokbü gadu che
onkün penyi kanglanga shingetnyu yepbü him.
Haoei haksoshang maibü che hapda,
hoba kaonyu kho chühsebü maibü ki.
Hibü on künla haoeibü taak thokuda,
hoba aao che la yeiko kümtileitida.
“Danje Israelbü yoa mütli che tegü,
jembü mütli shanga mat jembulabü.
Dan lamkhonga kibü pinyu,
lamnyua kibü kom kibü pinyu,
Haoei Kolieibü youa püpda,
khei yingbüei khonei setbü taakphai to atlabü.
“O
“Gadje koklaklakbü danei shieilabü.
Lausikei phailaje haoei haoen youdema japbo shilabü.
“Ashereibü kaonyu ka haabü shausiyung longlabü.
Hobaje Chobaei shaula mubü jemoubü shausiyung kümenlabü.
“Naftali meishi hima wenbou ki.
Haoei ngühang ngühlam ngean lauda.
“Josefje maihekbü semlüh,
yungko kabü shenmaibü semlühlong phatkei.
Haoeibü bhek kümthanga khuida.
Lau jungbü dangbou shuongei hao amaiko komda,
hoba lau si laujin jungan kipbo hao shida.
Lausikei haoeibü lau maietnyu kikei;
Jakobeibü Yaangenbou phak danko,
Israeleibü Sanlombou hoba Laangnyudak danko,
haoeibü phem shoulotham yeikei.
Kaboueibü Mühghaüei ka to thuida,
Thükenbou Mühghaüei müh ka lang yantikuko no haükuda.
Hobaje kaonyu maang ka haübü dei,
shatsinam hoba shisi shousi juongnyu haülabü.
Kaboueibü haülabü shuong kho,
shangiedbü shongh shuongeibü haülabü tokei yaangbou.
Khübü haülabü pendou Josefeibü khua,
khei haoeibü jaisinasi shuong yo ka
phangche shanenboueibü khüngjaa baulabü.
“Benjamin yamkabü sholou phatko ki;
ngeyang haoei mei taketda,
hoba chasem soletbü phet janda.”
Habü ho pendou Israel phang anthüknyi ki, hoba lulu to paplepbü haülabü shanga lenko haoeneibü bouei haülabü kukei.
Kho phaia haoei haoen to ngüh maisho lenkei: “Touje ngo haibüa kü mütli yoa yolabü chalou süha. Hibü, Hitbü Efron sekphaia kibü heelaaka ngeibü pisibousi shuong yoa,
Kanana Mamre nyangko, Hitbü Efron ka heelaak shanga Abrahamei sekphai thonan phoubü Makpela sekshui laangkhün khonei ngo khünshi.
Khonei Abraham si haoyak Sara khünkei; Isak si haoyak Rebeka khünkei hoba khünei ngei küyak Lea khünkei.
Kho sekshui hoba khünei kibü laangkhün kho Hitbü ka jekngaikei.”
Ladang Jakobei hao shousi shuong to joyokhümbei, haoeibü you yepshanga thopbei hoba thonbü hak hinan haikei, hoba hao mütli shuong yoa yokei.
Kheijinei Josefei boueibü thenyeka thenan haapbo sembung shepbei.
Kho phaia Josefei moli ngebü to haoboueibü mang anyaütila ponlem hibü naangkushi dogo lenkei. Hibü haoenei Israeleibü manga anyaülabü moli naangkukei.
Hobaje Israeleibü mang naanglepla nyishou tegü chalou saonyi lekei, hoba Ijepbü shuongei hao shanga chalou anjinlei mang haapbei.
Ladang mang haapbü chalou shuong wankei, Josefei Faraoeibü yaangbü shuong to laukei, “Kanei kü to sanoualonga, sanoudambo Farao la ho ngüh lenkushi:

‘Kübouei kü to thetilantiko lenkei: Chühashi, ngo haida, hibü Kanan kaodaka ngei kü shanga ai hee kümbei khünei ngo khünshima;’ khoei ngei sudajada, khoei ngo küboueibü mang khünla hautikai, hoba ngo nyibou longeilabü.”
Faraoei laukei, “Hauashi hoba kabouei ka la thetilantibü tegü nyi hao khünashi.”
Hibü Josef boueibü mang khünla haukei. Hobaje Farao jungkabü yaangbü shuong hoba Ijep kaodaka khuleibü shuong pendou hao yoa haukei.
Hobaje toukei Josef chemdang khümbo, hoba haoeibü jaisi shuongeibü chemdang hoba boueibü chemdang pendou hao yoa haukei. Lausikei haoeneibü shousi shuong hoba san shuong ong Goshen kaodaka phoyokei.
Hobaje hao yoa kailong hoba kolia setbü shuongkei haukei; kho mütshang yaang kiteikei.
Ladang haoen Jordan chaangbou aenei Atad amshang sühkei, khünei haoenei aeibou waangko haapbei hoba kaang mang haapyokei; kho tegü Josefei haobou shanga chalou nyet manghaap nou noukei.
Ladang Kananbüei Atad amshanga haoen mang haapyoko ditkei kheijinei laukei, “Ijepbü kaangkosekko mang haapyoda.” Khoei haoenei kho kaoen to Abel Mizraimu dogo laukei.
Hibü Jakobei lenbü tegütham hao shousi shuongei khei kümbei;
aieilausi hao Kanan kaodak to künlangan Abrahamei Hitbü Efron ka heelaak shanga seka thonan phoubü Mamre chaangbou aenei Makpela sek kabü heea haoeibü mang khünkei.
Haoboueibü mang apan phaia, Josef hoba jaisinasi shuong hoba haobou mang apla haubü pendou Ijep kaodak to sepeikei.
Haoeneibü bou haikusije Josefeibü jaisinasi shuongei hai lauyokei, “Josefei senei hao to amaiko jungeibü pendou khüpmaiko phok lamalonga ailai kümla?”
Hibü haoenei Josef jungto ngüh ho lentikei, “Kabouei hao ühaijinei kün la ho hai maisho lenkei:

‘Khei kanei Josef to hai lenshi: Künei sudajada, kaibü sambü jaisinasi shuongei ai shedbü shabü ka to amaibü jungeikei kho apbuma.’ Khei yingbü khoei touje künei sudajada. Nyi kaboueibü Mühghaü sambü shuongeibü shedtiyatibü apbuma.” Ladang haoenei hautibü ngühlang sungbakei, Josef haapbei.
Kho phaia jaisi shuongei hao jungto hauan hao thedanga khüpetko laukei, “Chühashi, kün kaibü sambü shuong ki.”
Lausikei Josefei haoen to laukei, “Tehütma, ngo Mühghaü jeila ki si?
Kanei ngo khulimbo amaibü jungeikei, lausikei kanei tat hapbü tegü Mühghaüeije müt juong langkei püetla shanga maibü kümbei.
Hibü kanei touje tehütma, ngei kan hoba kaneibü shousi shuong samlabü.” Kho tegü haoei sanou ngüh lauan haoen maangpon senyüh shemtikei.
Kho tegü Josef hoba haoboueibü chempen shuong Ijep kaodaka kikei, hoba Josef po saongaoto an salang kikei.
Kho phaia Josefei Efraimeibü shou meten semboubü hapbei, hoba Manasseeibü shou Makireibü shousi shuongkei Josef junga bukkei.

Kho phaia Josefei haoeibü jaisi shuong to laukei, “Ngo haila nyanga. Lausikei Mühghaüei tükde kan thounoulabü, hoba haoei Abraham, Isak hoba Jakob thedanga ai kaodak shanga thekeilankei kho kaodak to kan leian haulabü.”
Kheijinei Josefei Israel shousi la thetilantiko laukei, “Mühghaüei kan tükde pean chühla loulabü hoba kanei haka ngeibü lo künlangashi.”
Kho khei Josef po saongaoto an salangko kian haikei. Hobaje haoenei haoeibü manga anyaülabü ponlemhibü naangkukei, hoba Ijep kaodaka heea khinan phokei.
Tou Israel shousi shuong mütpem weko lulu chempen yoa Ijep to Jakob yoa loubü shuong nyen habü ho ki.
Reuben, Simeon, Levi hoba Jihuda,
Issakar, Zebulun, hoba Benjamin,
Dan hoba Naftali, Gad hoba Asher.
Jakob ka pakbü müt pendouei anjinlei kikei, lausikei Josefje Ijepa hauan kiteikei.
Touje Josef si haoeibü jaisinasi shuong pendou hoba kho meten pendou haikhümbei,
lausikei Israel shousi shuongje aei thusinaang maiko bukko haako haukei.
Kheijinei Ijep kaodaka Josef angebü choba haanbü che longkei.
Haoei hao mütshuong to laukei, “Chühashi, Israelbü shuong mütshang aei juongbou hoba hau kibou yeida.
Kaiya, haoen haako hauan wapyo longalonga haoen seneibü dangbou shuong yoa yoan sen khulimbo wapyoan kaonyek ka satsi amaibüla hoba haoen aei haakoyaangko ohautila senei haoen amaiko jungeikho.”
Hibü Ijepbüei haoen thükto onat jinkuko haoen shieinangeila shanga haoen thüka lombü shuong phokei, hoba haoenei Farao shanga shaubu thanshang sangnyu shuong Pithom si Rameses kümbei.
Lausikei haoenei latetche shieinangeida, khütetche haoen aei aei haakei; hibü Ijepbü shuongei haoen khei jungeila hatkei.
Hobaje Ijepbüei Israel shousi shuong aeibou shieikoeko khangentikei.
Shungkung tham thamjuok hoba sekmou chemmou kümsilei pendouei haoeneibü langkei khauektham yeitikei hoba haoeneibü kümsilei pendoua haoen la tukosekko kümtikei.
Kheijinei Ibribü sao na hapjinei thuibü müt nyi Shifra si Pua nyenbü to Ijep chobaei laukei,
“Ladang kanei Ibribü nyuei na hapbüa thuilaje bousu yinga longa haitiashi hoba yaksa yinga longa lang phoshi.”
Lausikei na hapbü thuinyu shuongei Mühghaü to hatkei, hoba Ijep chobaei haoen la ngühkhüm kubü tegü aküm, lausikei bousu nashou shuong lang phokei.
Hibü nahap thuinyu shuong kho Ijep chobaei ngakei hoba haoen to laukei, “Kanei aila ho hai kümbei? Aila bousu nashou shuong lang phokukei?”
Nahap thuinyu shuongei choba to laukei, “Aieilausi Ibri saoje Ijep sao tegü aying; aishanga haoen aeibou sokeisepbei, hoba nahap thuinyu shuong asühtoua na hapan kiteida.”
Kho tegü Mühghaüei nahap thuinyu to yoko jungeikei, hoba haoen mütshang aei haakoyaangko hoba hau kiko yeikei.
Nahap thuinyu shuongei Mühghaü to hatsije haoei haoeneibü chemdang maibü longtikei.
Kheijinei Faraoei hao mütshuong la ngühkhüm kuko laukei, “Ibri saoei bukbü bousu shou pendou Nail shumang to tekan jinkushi, lausikei kanei yaksaje lang phokushi.”
Tou Levi mütli kabü cheei hao phangsao che yakla ngakei,
hoba kho sao mang akongko apbei hoba bousu shou che bukkei. Hobaje saoei hao bousushou maibü che dogo chühenan saoei hao lit sem huan phokei.

Hobaje ladang saoei hao huan phola athükko apbei, kheijinei saoei dangkung sungan kam maibüshou che wouan sennaangei naanglepan nashou kho khünei jinan Nail Shumang yungkoa thakdu laak phanga phokukei.
Hobaje hao aila yeilaje dogo haonou saabüa loan kiteikei.

Kheijinei Faraoeibü shou nouyangshou Nail Shumang to mangyula yankei, hoba saoeibü samnyu yungkoa paiko kikei, kheijinei saoei kam kho thakdu long phanga hapbei; hoba saoeibü samnyu kho sungla hautikei.
Saoei kho ipbei hoba nashou kho hapbei. Hao haapbo kikei, hoba saoei kho phokeikei, hoba laukei, “Ho Ibribü shousi yoa che ki.”
Kheijinei hao nouei Faraoeibü nouyangnyu to laukei, “Ka shanga Ibri sao shuong yoa nanubü nyu che na kho chühla ngo hauan ngakukho no?”
Saoei jongaikei, “Hoat, hauashi.” Hobaje medeinyu kho hauan naeibü nyu ngakukei.
Hobaje Faraoeibü nouyangnyuei sao to laukei, “Nashou ho leian hauashi, hoba kü shanga hao pangteiashi, hoba ngei ka la kaibü mu kulabü. Kheijinei yaksanyu khoei nashou kho sungkei.”

Hobaje nashou kho chingkei hoba saoei hao kho Faraoeibü nouyangnyu jungto leian loukei, hoba hao saoeibü shou la yeikei. Saoei haoeibü nyen Mosa nyenkukei, hoba laukei, “Aieilausi ngei hao dei ka sungenkei.”
Mosa chingan phaia, nyetche hao hao mütli peanchühla hauan, haoen khonkuko kümti leitibü chühkei. Ijepbü cheei hao mütli Ibribü che ngümeiko hapbei.
Haoei sepeisai chühan müt ao ühüpsije haoei Ijep bou kho ngümettian phetsena jonlepnyu huan phokei.
Nyibounyet hao haukei hoba haoei Ibribü müt nyi oyoko hapbei. Hobaje haoei shedbou to laukei, “Aila nyi kaibü jenabou Ibribü to ngümda?”

Hobaje haoei laukei, “Aoei no kün thüka songdakbou hoba matjembou yeitikei? Ijepbü haitibü tegü nyi ngokei haitila damda sai?” Kheijinei Mosa hatkei hoba haoeibü maanga dambo laukei, “Maimai, ngei ai kümbei kho ngeena.”
Tou ladang Faraoei kümsilei kho ditkei, haoei Mosa haitila lambei. Lausikei Mosa Farao jungka Midian kaodaka kila satkei, hoba hao deikhün che nyangko setkei.
Tou Midianbü ungshedbouei yaksa shou müt nyet kiteikei, hoba haoen louan dei khukei, hoba boueibü sanshuong la dei kula meisok shentikei.
Sanlombü at louan haoen nangan sattikei, lausikei Mosa meimeijung louan haoen püetkei hoba haoeneibü sanshuong la dei inkukei.
Ladang yaksa shuong kho haoeneibü bou jungto longeikei, haoei laukei, “Kan tatje aila hainyu enyu longeida?”
Haoenei laukei, “Sanlombü shuongeibü ik ka Ijepbü cheei kün püetkei. Tokei haoei kün la dei khukukei, hoba sanshuong thükto dei lakkukei.”
Hobaje haoei haoeibü yaksa shousi shuong to laukei, “Hao lanei ki? Kanei aila müt kho apyokei? Hao oknyinlabü lele hao ngaashi.”
Hobaje Mosaei hao yoa kila maang angkei, hoba Jethroeibü nouyangnyu Zippora yakla lekei.
Zipporaei bousu shou che bukkukei, hoba haoeibü nyen Gershom nyenkei, aieilausi haoei laukei, “Ngo kükathanga yenla lea.”
Po lounyu kian phaia, Ijep choba haikei. Lausikei Israel shousi shuong toukei khei ong wiyoko kikei, aieilausi haoen aaola lebü kho Mühghaü junga sühko angkei.
Mühghaüei haoen wiyobü kho ditkei hoba haoei Abraham, Isak hoba Jakob to thebülanbü damenkei.
Hibü Mühghaüei Israel shuong to chühkei, hoba haoen shanga dambukei.
Tou Mosa Midianbü ungshedbou hao kounyangbou Jethroeibü san lombo kikei; hoba haoei sanshuong kho yamnak naphei to leijung hauan Mühghaü Shongh Horeb to loukei.
Khünei buham jenyua wanlonga Mühghaü khuthük hangangbü kho hao jung to longkei. Hobaje Mosaei chühsi buhama wan longan kikei lausikei alon.
Hobaje Mosaei laukei, “Buham kho ailaibü alondaje ngo nyangko haulabü hoba shalatalabü kaoen to chühlabü.”
Ladang hao kho chühla haubü
Mühghaüei laukei, “Hato nyangko telou. Kaibü you ka nguok hangletashi, aieilausi no lanei loan ki kho saopobü kao ki.”
Tokei haoei laukei, “Ngo kaibü pisishuongeibü Mühghaü, Isak Mühghaü, hoba Jakob Mühghaü ki.” Kheijinei Mosaei the hukei; aieilausi haoei Mühghaü to chühla hatkei.
Hobaje

Hibü ngei haoen Ijep kaodak ka khümenlabü hoba kho kaodak ka leiyenan kaonyek maibü ongabü kaoen che khei, sendei si naodei koubü kaodak khüto leian haula ngo louyenkei. Hobaje Kananbü, Hitbü, Amorbü, Perizbü, Hivbü hoba Jebuzbü, kaodak to leian haulabü.
Hobaje tou Israel shousi shuongei ngekbü kü junga lousüha, hoba Ijepbüei lai shieikoeko khonsaktida khokei ngei hapa.
Hibü ngei kü mütli Israel shousi shuong Ijep kaodak ka leiyenla ngei no Farao jungto hautida, tou kaiya.”
Lausikei Mosaei Mühghaü to laukei, “Farao jungto hauan Ijep ka Israel shousi shuong leiyenlabü lele ngo ao?”

Hobaje Mühghaüei jongaikei, “Maimaitham ngo ka yoa kilabü. Hobaje ngei no hautikei dogo ngela shanga ka shanga tetsida ho kilabü: ladang nyi eikshuong Ijep kao ka leian loulaje kanei ho kaoena Mühghaü lemlabü.”

Mosaei Mühghaü to laukei, “Ladang ngo Israel shousi shuong jungto hauan, ‘Kaneibü pisibou Mühghaüei kan jungto ngo hautikei’ dogo lenlaje haoenei kü to phelabü, ‘Hao nyen ao?’ Kheijinei ngei haoen to ai lenla?”
Mühghaüei Mosa to laukei, “NGO KHO NGO KI . Hobaje nyi Israel shousi shuong to lenshi, ‘Aoei NGO KI dogo lauda, haoei ngo kan jungto hautikei.’”
Mühghaüei toukei Mosa to lenkei, “Nyi ho Israel shousi shuong to lenashi, ‘
Hauashi, hoba Israel jaishou shuong liko yoshaitian haoen to lenshi, ‘
Hobaje ngei kan Ijepa khonkubü ka Kananbü, Hitbü Amorbü, Perizbü, Hivbü, Jebusbü kaonyek hoba sendei si naodei koubü kaonyek to leian loula jantheda.’
“Israel jaishou shuongei ka ngüha lelabü. Hobaje no hoba ka yoa Israel jaishou shuong Ijep choba jungto loulabü hoba kanei hao to laulabü, ‘
Lausikei ngei ngeakei, hau kibü ik cheei akümlonga Ijep chobaei kan ohautilabü.
Hobaje ngei ngeibü ik shingan Ijep kaodaka seikümseilei pendou kümbo ngei haoen to ngümlabü. Kho phaia haoei kan litilabü.
“Hobaje ho mütli la Ijepbü thedanga ngei maangshik haptilabü, hoba ladang kan haulaje kan ik kong asatlabü.

Lausikei chandinam si honeibü peisilei shuong hoba yaksa mütpem wekoei neisimei saoeibü chempen hoba sao chema homan kibü ka hilabü, hoba khübü kho kaneibü jayangshou hoba nouyangshou la yakkulabü. Hobaje kanei Ijepbüeibü nyaksinam maklanglabü.”
Kheijinei Mosaei
Kheijinei
Kheijinei
ei laukei, “Ho hai yingalonga haoenei haoeneibü pisibousi shuongeibü
Tokei
Kheijinei
Kheijinei
Lausikei haoenei seikümseilei penyi hama maialem ayingsi ngüha alelonga nyi Nail shumang ka khubü dei kho sii la yeilabü.”
Kheijinei Mosaei
Hibü, tou hauashi, hoba ngüh laula ngei thuilabü, hoba nyi ai laula kho ngei ka la lenlabü.”
Lausikei Mosaei laukei, “O
Kheijinei
Hobaje nyi hao to joyolabü hoba ngüh shuong kho haoeibü sembunga jinkulabü; hoba lauentila shanga hameibü sembunga ngo yolabü hoba kasiei ai kümla, kho ngei lenlabü.
Hobaje eikshuong to ka jeila haoei lenlabü; hoba hao ka shanga sembung tegü hoba no hao shanga Mühghaü tegü kilabü.
Lausikei julo, laobouei nyi seikümseilei shuong kümla ki, kho nyi kaibü ika jungjan.”
Kheijinei Mosa hao kounyangbou Jethro jungto sepeinyu ngaian hao to laukei, “Ijep kaodaka ngeibü mütli tou sühko lang kilaoje haoen to chühla ngaitikai.” Hobaje Jethroei laukei, “Maisho hauashi.”
Hibü Mosa haoeibü shousiyak leijung louan gadu thüka settian Ijep kaodak to meimeikei. Hobaje haoei haoeibü ika Mühghaü ju kho jungkei.
Nyi Farao to hai lenshi,
hoba ngei ka to lenda, ‘Küshou jayangshou kü to lemla hautiashi. Lausikei nyi hao ohauti; hibü ngei kashou jayangshou haitikulabü.’ ”
Lama sühshanga
Kheijinei Zipporaei laang akbü sungjung louan jembü jayangshou kipan apbukei hoba khop kho Mosaeibü you to tekan litikukei; hoba saoei laukei, “Maimaitham kü shanga siiei bukjambü chemkanbou no ki.”
Hibü
Kheijinei Mosaei ai ngüh ong laula
Kheijinei Mosa si Aron haukei hoba Israel shousi jaishou leiyeibü shuong pendou liko kamshaitikei.
Hibü
Hobaje mütshuongei mailembei, hoba ladang haoenei
Kho phaia Mosa si Aron Ijep choba jungto hauan laukei, “
Hobaje Faraoei laukei, “Israelbü hautila ngei hao ngüha lelabü lele
Kheijinei Mosa si Aronei jongaiko laukei, “Ibribü Mühghaü kün to haüyoa.
Lausikei Ijep chobaei haosi to laukei, “Mosa si Aron, kasiei aila mütshuong haoeneibü kümkaleika nangtida? Kan lulueibü kümtoleito hauashi!”
Hobaje Faraoei laukei, “Chühashi, tou kaonyeka kan mütshuong mütshang juongbou hoba kanei haoen lulueibü kümsilei ka haksotida!”
Khünyettham, Faraoei aaoleibü si ikjaibü shuong to laukei,
“Shangied tegü kanei mütshuong la thamjuoklaang kümla youho teku, haoenei haoen lolo youho yoshaitiashi.
Lausikei shaangla haoenei thamjuoklaang lajuche kümbei khüjoche kümshi dogo sakkujan; kanei kho to ashitijan. Haoen haulohaushed, khoei haoenei ngekko lauda, ‘Küneibü Mühghaü to lemla hautishi.’
Mütshuong la kümsilei sekbou kushi; haoen khünei kümtishi, hoba haoen amlangbü ngüha maang teku.”
Kheijinei aaoleibü shuong si ikjaibü shuong hauan mütshuong to laukei, “Farao Chobaei ho tegü lauda: Ngei kan la youho akulabü.
Kan lolo hauan, kanei laka haplaje yoshaishi, lausikei kaneibü kümsilei aikei ashitilabü.”
Hibü mütshuong Ijep kaodak pendou ae youho shanga youkung lamla aakei.
Hobaje aaoleibü shuongei laukei, “Youho kijinei kümbü tegü kanei chalou angbou takletbü kümsilei khümtiashi.”
Faraoeibü aaoleibü shuongei haoen phanga phobü Israelbü ikjaibü shuong to ngümbo phekei, “Shangied thamjuoklaang kümbü tegü kanei aila mietkei tatkei kümsilei ayeiti?”
Kheijinei Israelbü ikjaibü shuong Farao jungto sühko louan laukei, “Kaibü sambü shuong to nyi aila hainyu jungeida?
Kaibü sambü shuong la youho akunyu haoenei kün to thamjuoklaang kümashi dogo lauda! Chühashi, kaibü sambü shuong to ngümda, lausikei kaibü eikshuong shedbü yingkei.”
Lausikei Faraoei laukei, “Kan haulo haushed, kan haulo haushed, khoei ong kanei, ‘Kün
Hibü tou kümsilei to ngaiashi. Kan la ai youho akulabü, lankei kanei thamjuoklaang takletbü longtijan.”
Kanei kaneibü chalou angbou thamjuoklaang takletbü ontijan dogo laujinei Israelbü ikjaibü shuongei haoeneibü thu amaiboua kiteikei dogo damenkei.
Hobaje haoen Farao jungka longjinei haoenei Mosa si Aron lama haoen haiteiko loan haüyokei.
Haoenei haosi to laukei, “
Kheijinei Mosa
Aishanga ngo Farao jungto ka nyena joyola haubü ka jaüan haoei habü mütshuong to amaiko jungeikei; hoba nyi ka mütshuong khümenla aikei aküm.”
Kheijinei
Mühghaüei Mosa to joyoko laukei, “Ngo
Ngo, Abraham, Isak hoba Jakob jungto Thükenbou Mühghaü tegü longkei, lausikei haoen la ngei ngo
Hobaje Kanan kaodak laonei haoen yenla lean kikei, kho kaodak haoen la kula ngei haoen yoa ngeibü thebülanbükei lea.
Toukei Ijepbüei aaola phobü Israel shousi shuong wiyobü dida; hoba ngei ngeibü thesilan damena.
Hibü Israel shousi shuong to lenashi, ‘Ngo
Hobaje ngei kan kü mütshuong tegü sungletlabü, hoba ngo kaneibü Mühghaü yinglabü. Kheijinei Ijep aaothu onat ka leiyenbou
Hobaje Abraham, Isak, hoba Jakob la kula laobou kaonyek shanga ngei ngeibü ik tuokko thekeilankei kho kaonyek to ngei kan leian loulabü; hoba ngei kho kanla phetphan shanga kulabü. Ngo
Kho tegü Mosaei Israel shousi shuong to joyokei; lausikei maangnoubü ka hoba yongko asanouko aaola lebü ka hao to aditku.
Kheijinei
“Hauan Ijep choba Farao to Israel shousi shuong haoeibü kaodak ka sattiashi dogo lenshi.”
Lausikei Mosaei
Habü ho bousi shuongeibü chemdang kongnyubou ki. Israeleibü shaang bukbü Reubeneibü shousi shuong Hanok, Pallu, Hezron, hoba Karmi; ho Reuben chempen shuong.
Hobaje Simeoneibü shousi: Jemuel, Jamin, Ohad, Jakin, Zohar hoba Kanan sao cheeibü shou Shaul: ho Simeon chempen shuong.
Hobaje Levi shousi shuong nyen haoen müt thensilenei habü ho ki: Gershon, Kohat hoba Merari. Levi salang po 137 kikei.
Gershon shousi shuong: Libni, hoba Shimei; kho haoeneibü thensilen yoa.
Kohateibü shousi shuong: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, hoba Uzziel, hoba Kohat salang po 133 kikei.
Hobaje Merari shousi shuong: Mahli hoba Mushi. Habü ho Levi chempen thensilen kikei.
Amramei haoeibü yakla lela hao boueibü na Jokhebed lekei; hoba saoei hao la Aron si Mosa bukkukei. Amram salang po 137 kikei.
Izhar shousi shuong: Kora, Nefeg, hoba Zikri.
Uzziel shousi shuong: Mishael, Elzafam, hoba Sithri.
Aronei Nashoneibü na Aminadab nouyangnyu Elisheba yakla ngakei, hoba saoei hao la Nadab, Abihu, Eliazar hoba Ithamar bukkukei.
Kora shousi shuong: Asir, Elkana, hoba Abiasaf. Habü ho Kora chempen.
Hobaje Aron shou Eliazarei Putieleibü nouyangshou yoa che yakla ngakei; hoba saoei hao la Fenihas bukkukei. (Habü ho Levi chempen pisibou chung thensilen ki).
Aron si Mosa kho
Ijep choba Farao to Ijep ka Israel shousi shuong leian longla lenbü kho haosi ki.
Ladang Ijep kaodaka
haoei laukei, “Ngo
Lausikei Mosaei
Kheijinei
Ngei ka la sakkubü pendou joyolabü hoba Faraoei Israel shousi shuong haoeibü kaodak ka sattila kajai Aronei hao to joyolabü.
Lausikei ngei Farao maang kaangtilabü, hoba ngeibü tetsida hoba seikümseilei Ijep kaodaka haatilabü,
lausikei Faraoei ka to ngüha alekulabü. Kheijinei ngei Ijep to ngeibü ik atlabü hoba matjem yaangei Ijep kaodak ka kü mütli Israel shousi shuong leiyenlabü.
Hobaje ladang ngei Ijep thükto ngei ik shingan Israel shousi shuong haoen yoka leiyenlaje, kheijinei Ijepbüei ngo
Hobaje Mosa si Aron hamei
Hobaje haosiei Farao to joyojinei Mosa po saolei hoba Aron saoleito sem kiteikei.
“Ladang Faraoei ka to, ‘Nyi seikümseilei che lenashi’ dogo laulaje kheijinei nyi Aron to haoeibü ju sungan Farao thedangto tekan litikula lenshi, hoba khoei pinyu che la yeilabü.”
Hibü Mosa si Aron Farao jungto haukei, hoba
Kheijinei Faraoei songngedongebü hoba huonseibü shuong ngaishaikei, hoba Ijep kaodak kabü huonseibü shuongeikei thapboseiko kho tegü kümbei.
Aishanga haoen mütpem wekoei lulueibü ju attikei, hoba khübü kho pinyu la yeikei. Lausikei Aroneibü Juei haoeneibü ju pendou suian apbei.
Khei yingankei Farao maangpon kaangkhühtham yeikei, hoba
Kheijinei
Ngeyang Farao Nail yungko to haujinei no hao jungto hauashi. Hobaje nyi pinyu la yeitibü ju kho ka ika jungan yungkoa haiyeiko kishi.
Hobaje nyi hao to lenshi, ‘Ibri Mühghaü
Hobaje Nail shumanga kibü ngau hailabü, hoba shumang khüka nyaülüm hilabü; hoba Ijepbüei khüka dei yungla asomlabü.’ ”
Hobaje
Kheijinei Mosa si Aronei
Shumang kabü ngau pendou haikei, hoba shumang ka nyaülüm hibüei Ijepbüei shumang ka dei ayungen. Hobaje Ijep kaodak pendou aenei sii kikei.
Lausikei Ijep kabü huonseibü shuongeikei thapboseiko kho tegü kümbei, khoei Farao maangpon kaangngaikei; hoba
Yongbou, Farao haoeibü chobachem to khüpeinyu ngaikei, hoba kho shangabü maangpona ongkei apho.
Hobaje Ijepbü pendouei Nail yungkoa yunglabü dei lambo thukei, aishanga haoenei shumang dei kho ayungen.
Kheijinei
Nyi ohautilonga, ngei kaibü kaonyek khümboa yuk pühtilabü.

Hobaje shumanga yuk shoonglabü. Haoen shoongbü ka kaibü chobachem to longlabü hoba yepshangpob to lotlabü, hoba kaibü yepshang thükto hoba kaibü khangenbü shuong chem to hoba eikshuong thükto hoba wentek phau maangto, hoba wentek nyatbü phau maangto lotlabü.
Yuk shuong ka thükto, kaibü eikshuong hoba no khangenbü shuong thükto pükjung longlabü.’”
Hobaje
Hibü Aronei Ijep kaodak kabü dei thüka haoeibü ik shingkei hoba yuk pakan Ijep kaodak shenkei.
Lausikei huonseibü shuongeikei thapboseiko kho tegü kümbei hoba Ijep kaodaka yuk pakktikei.

Hobaje Mosaei Farao to laukei, “Sanoudambo nyi lenshi, no hoba kaneibü chem ka yuk shuong mautikuan Nail shumanga ong kishi dogo ka shanga hoba kaibü khangenbü shuong shanga hoba kaibü eikshuong shanga ladang sukujakula?”
Faraoei laukei, “Ngiet sukujakushi.” Mosaei jongaikei, “
Ka ka, ka chem ka, hoba no khangenbü, hoba kaibü eikshuong ka, yuk satkulabü; haoen Nail shumanga ong kilabü.”
Kheijinei Mosa si Aronei Farao apyokei, hoba Farao khulimbo yuk pühtibü shanga Mosaei
Hobaje
Hobaje haoenei kho shaang shaanga yoshaikei hoba kaonyeka nyaülüm hikei.
Lausikei ladang Faraoei jemmailangbü hapbei,
Haosiei kho tegü kümbei, hoba Aronei ju jungan haoeibü ik shingan kaoa thamngu to ngümsi müt si meisiau to haatsihek pakkei. Kaoa thamngu pendouei Ijep kaoa haatsihek la yeikei.
Hobaje huonseibü shuongeikei thapboseiko haatsihek paktila haujembei lausikei athük. Hobaje müt si meisiau to haatsihek kikei.
Kheijinei huonseibü shuongei Farao to laukei, “Ho Mühghaüeibü ikjishou ki!” Lausikei
Nyi kü mütshuong ohautilonga ka thükto, kaibü khangenbü shuong thükto, ka mütli thükto hoba ka chemto meishou shuong hautilabü. Ijepbü chem hoba haoen kishang meishouei shentilabü.
Lausikei kaodaka ngo
Ngei kü mütshuong si ka mütshuong kanglanga janyinan pholabü. Ho seikümseilei ngiet loushedlabü.’ ”
ei kho tegü kümbei, hoba meishou shuong Farao Chobachem to hoba hao khangenbü shuong chem to lotkei; hoba Ijep kaodak pendoua leilukukei.
Kheijinei Faraoei Mosa si Aron ngaan laukei, “Kan hauan ho kaonyeka kaneibü Mühghaü lemashi.”
Lausikei Mosaei laukei, “Khei kümjan aying. Aishanga Ijepbüei mangsenbü
Haoei kün la sakkubü tegü chalou semnyet lam to kouan
Faraoei laukei, “Yama
Mosaei laukei, “Ngo ka jungka satbüyam Farao ka, hao khangenbü ka hoba hao mütshuong ka ngiet meishou shuong sattikula ngei
Mosa Farao jungka hauan
hoba
Lausikei toukei Faraoeibü maangpon kaangngaikei hoba haoei mütshuong ohauti.
Kheijinei
Nyi haoen ohautiko toukei senetnyu phoalonga,
chühashi, khongthua ngei samkeisamuk, shatsinam, koli, gadu, ut, masu shuong hoba sanshuong thükto lim aeibou kaangbü longtiko
Lausikei Israelbü samkeisamuk si Ijepbü samkeisamuk kanglanga
Hobaje
Nyibounyet
Faraoei mütshuong pheila hautisi Israelbüeibü samkeisamukje che ongkei ühaiko kikei. Lausikei Faraoeibü maangpon anyaakeiko kikei, hoba haoei mütshuong ohauti.
Kheijinei
Hobaje khoei Ijep kaodaka thamngu hanbüla yeilabü.”
Hibü haosiei hokjung ka tap mokjung louan Farao thedanga lokei, hoba Mosaei kho kuito phinan angtikei; hoba khoei müt si meisiau la bokla yeikei.
Hobaje takshou mouei huonseibü shuong Mosa thedanga aloen.
Lausikei
Kheijinei
Aishanga kao thea ngo tegübü ao aki dogo nyi ngela shanga ngeibü shieikoe pendou ka thükto hoba kaibü yaangenbü shuong thükto, hoba ka mütshuong thükto ngei hautilabü.
Aieilausi haijih dangaje ngei no hoba ka mütshuong shatsinyatei khonkutiko no kao ka wapan apan kikhoulabü.
Lausikei ka la ngeibü hau lenla hoba ngeibü nyen kaonyudak pendoua phinthonla shanga nyekchüh phoan ngei ka langkei phokukei.
Lankei tou sühko nyi haoen tohautikho dogo kü mütshuong khulimbo no lolo yaangenda.
Chühashi, ngiet haijinei Ijep sang lebü chalou ka tat sühko ladangkei lotan achühbü senlaang aeibou kaangko ngei yantikulabü.

Hibü tou kaibü samkeisamuk shatsinam shuong hoba khongthua kibü pendou leishaila hautiashi; aieilausi khongthua kibü müt hoba shatsinam weko chem to aleibabü thükto senlaang lotlabü hoba haoen hailabü.’ ”
Farao khangenbü yaangbü shuong aoyouei
Lausikei aoyouei
Kheijinei
Hobaje Mosaei haoeibü ik mühae shingkei, hoba
hoba senlaang si langpon sepeisai yantikei. Ijep kaodak phangche yeian ladangkei haüthükan achühbü amaiboutham ho kikei.
Ijep khümboa, khongthua kibü pendou, müt si meisiau, shatsinam pendou to senlaangei tetkei, hoba senlaang khoei seka kesiong hoba yama bulong pendou tetngokkukei.
Israel shousi kishang Goshen kaodaka ong senlaang üat.
Faraoei Mosa si Aron to laukei, “Toubüa ngei shabü shona;
to sukujakushi; aieilausi kün langmak si senlaang habü hoei soua. Ngei kan hautilabü hoba touje kan lounyu tethüng.”
Mosaei hao to laukei, “Ngo sangnyu ka satbüyam ngeibü ik shingan
Lausikei ngei ngeakei no hoba kaibü khangenbü shuongei toukei
(Phemba si barli youshou leilukhümbei; aieilausi barli youshou nyenan kikei, hoba phemba tongko kikei.
Lausikei whet youshou aleilu; aieilausi khübü kho mo anyenko kikei.)
Hobaje Mosaei sangnyu apyojung satkei. Haoei ik tuokan
Lausikei ladang Faraoei lang, senlaang hoba langmak thakbü hapbei haoei toukei shabü shonkei. Hao hoba hao khangenbü shuong maangpon kaangngaikei.
Hobaje Mosa danko
Kheijinei
hoba ngei Ijepbü thüka ai seikümseilei kümbei, kho nyi kaibü shilashoula lenla shanga hoba kanei ngo
Hibü Mosa si Aron Farao jungto hauan laukei, “Ibri Mühghaü,
Nyi kü mütshuong ohautilonga, chühashi, ngiet ngei kaibü kaonyek to koksüng hautikulabü.
Aoeikei kaodak ühüplabü lele haoenei kao yepleplabü; hoba senlaang ka satenan kan shanga jouan kibü kho haoenei künlabü, hoba yama kan shanga yeman kibü busidei pendou shaulabü.

Hobaje kaibü chem, hoba no khangenbü shuong pendoueibü chem hoba Ijepbü chem pendou shenlabü, hoba kaibü pisishuong hoba kaibü bousi shuongeikei kaonyudaka kian tat sühkoa kho tegü hapan achüh.’” Hobaje Mosaei Farao apyoan sepeinyu ngaikei.
Faraoeibü khangenbü yaangbü shuongei hao to laukei, “Ho mütei sen la lalokche khonsak kula? Haoeneibü Mühghaü
Hibü Mosa si Aron Farao jungto leibaan haoei haosi to laukei, “Hauashi, kaneibü Mühghaü
Mosaei jongaikei, “Kün küneibü nashou si baushi noushou shuong, hoba küneibü jayang nouyang shuong, hoba küneibü sanlon si masu shuong leian haulabü; aishanga künei
Hobaje haoei haosi to laukei, “Ngei kan hoba kaneibü shousiyak hautialonga,
Kho tegü aying, tou kan bousu shuong hauashi hoba
Kheijinei
Hibü Mosaei haoeibü ju Ijep thükto tuoksije khünyet hoba khüyou langyang pendou chaangbou yei kaonyek thükto loukei. Ngeyangje chaangbou yei khoei koksüng soubaan kikei.
Hobaje koksüng kho shoongjung hauan Ijep kaodak pendou phambo pakkei, haoen shuong aeibou yaangan kikei; khübü koksüng tegü shangied ladangkei louan achüh, hoba ho phaiakei aloulabü.

Haoenei kaothe khümboa paklepsije kaonyek nakthühtham aptikei. Hobaje kaonyeka buyikdeiyik senlaangei apbuan joubü pendou hoba bulonga buhek pendou haoenei shaukei; hoba Ijep kaodak pendoua khongthua buyikdeiyik yingsikei, kesiong yingsikei sangtüngbü aikei ajouti.
Kheijinei Faraoei panteiko Mosa si Aron ngaan laukei, “Ngei
Hibü toukei ngeibü shabü apbushi dogo ngei sudajada, hoba
Hobaje Mosa Farao jungka longan
Hobaje
Lausikei
Kheijinei
Hibü Mosaei haoeibü ik mühae to shingkei, hoba chalou sem Ijep kaodak pendoua nakshounaknyu daomau kikei.
Hobaje haoen cheei che ühüpyoko apbei, ayingsi chalou sem jembü kishang ka ameimei; lausikei Israel shousi shuong pendou haoen kishanga ngesakbü kikei.
Kheijinei Faraoei Mosa ngaan laukei, “Kan hauan
Lausikei Mosaei laukei, “Kholonga
Küneibü shatsinam shuong kün yoa haujan; hoba haak che ongkei phainei üpyolabü; aieilausi kho khei
Lausikei
Hobaje Faraoei hao to laukei, “Kü jungka satan apashi! Touje kü the ühüpla no lolo maangsangashi. Nyi kü the hapnyet no hailabü.”
“Nyi laubü tegü yingshi. Ngo ka thea nyiboula ühüplabü,” dogo Mosaei jongaikei.
Kheijinei
Israel shousi mütpem weko to lenashi; bousu wekoei jembü lepbou ka hoba yaksa wekoei saoeibü lepbü ka chandinam hoba honeibü chisiyak hiashi.”
(Hobaje Ijep mütli thedanga maangshik hapla
Kheijinei Mosaei choba to laukei, “
hoba Ijep kaodaka shaangbü bukbü pendou choba setshanga setbü Faraoeibü jayangshou ka khangan shemshi maanga kibü sambü saoeibü jayangshou sühko hoba shaang shatbü shatsinam pendou hailabü.
Hobaje Ijep kaodak pendoua haapyobü kilabü, hoba kho tegübü ladangkei ditan achüh hoba ho phaiakei aditlabü.
Lausikei Ijep si Israelbü ham kanglanga

Hobaje no khangenbü shuong pendou kü jungto louan haoen lulu khüpetan laulabü; ‘No hoba ka phainei sembü mütshuong pendou hauashi!’ Kho phaia ong ngo haulabü.” Hobaje Mosa Farao jungka aeibou khauangko satkei.
Kheijinei
Mosa si Aronei khübü maangpanglabü, seikümseilei pendou Farao thedanga kümbei, lausikei
“Kan shanga ho lit ho khangbü kilabü; ho poa shaangbou lit kilabü.
Israel mütshuong pendou to lenashi, ho lit anbounyet haoen mütpem wekoei jembü shanga san shoushou chebang lelabü, kho haoeneibü chemdang thüngthüng, chemdang che shanga san shoushou che kilabü.
Hobaje chemdang che kho san shoushou che khümbo lela yongko hanalonga, chemdang kabü mütshang tetan, haoenei lepbou to hamjan. San shoushou kho müt wekoei shauthüng kanei takteian kümashi.
Kaneibü san shoushou kho nali athebü hoba kap anakbü, po che onbü shou yingjan, kanei kho san shuong ka ayingsi lon shuong ka lelabü.
Hobaje ho lit chalou anthük leibounyet asühshongko kanei kho phojan; hoba takshatbü Israel mütshang pendouei kho chasemlamto haitilabü.
Hobaje kho shaubü chema haoenei sii at sungan koukhün nanae maeae hama hoba koukhua naangan phojan.
Khüyoutham haoenei phe kho wana kangan pikyik khaubü yoa hoba tokai ajinbü wentek yoa shaulabü.
Kho phe sang ayingsi deikonga athungshaujan, lausikei khu, yousiik hoba sensimaang khümbo yoan wana kangan shauashi.
Hobaje kho ngeyang sühko tejouti; ngeyang sühko ai joulaje kho kanei jikan apashi.
Kanei ho hai kümjan: kan shembe kaian, kaneibü youa nguok lonan kaneibü julo ika jungan, kanei panteiko shaujan. Ho
“Khüyoutham ngo Ijep kaodak pendoua shoonglabü hoba shaangbü shou si shaang shatbüsitbü pendou haitilabü; hoba Ijep mühghaü shuong pendou thükto matjem sungbalabü. Ngo
Hobaje sii naangbü koukhu shuong kho kan kibü chem shensinge kilabü. Ladang ngei sii haplaje ngei kan koletlabü hoba Ijepbü to limsilang kayangei ngümjinei kan to ameitilabü.
Hobaje ho chalou kan shanga damen-nou che kilabü; loulabüa meten meten kanei ho

“Chalou nyet kanei tokai ajinbü wentek shaulabü. Shaangbounyet kanei kaneibü chem ka tokai sungan apjan; aishanga shaangbounyet ka nyetbounyet sühko aoei tokai jinbü shaulaje kho müt Israel ka wapan aplabü.
Shaangbounyet kanei saopobü kamshai che, hoba nyetbounyet saopobü kamshai che huiashi. Khübü chaloua kanei ai akümaleijan, lausikei müt wekoei ai shaujan kho ong kanei lamlela thükkei.
Hobaje kanei tokai ajinbü wentek lem noulabü; aishanga kho chaloua Ijep kaodak ka ngei kan mütshanga leiyenkei; hibü kho chalou kanei meten sünga ngühkhümei ponpen shanga nou noulabü.
Shaangbou lit chalou anthük leiboubü chasem ka kho lit saoto chebounyet chasem sühko kanei tokai ajinbü wentek shaulabü.
Chalou nyetnyet kanei chema tokai ühüptijan; aieilausi aoyouei tokai jinbü shaulaje kho müt yenbou yingsikei, bukmüt yingsikei, Israel shuong yoka wapan aplabü.
Tokai jinbü aikei kanei ashaujan. Kan kishang pendoua kanei tokai ajinbü wentek shaulabü.”
Kheijinei Mosaei Israelbü jaishou shuong pendou huishaikei, hoba haoen to laukei, “Kan chemdang chemdang thüng san shoushou pienan Püetbü lembü haitiashi.
Kanei hisop shen che jungjung louan phaua kibü siia hamashi hoba phau kabü sii kho koukhua hoba kouthung jijihama naangan phoashi. Kan aokei ngeyang asühshongko jembü chem koukhün ka üanglabü.
Ladang
Hobaje kan si kaneibü thensilen shanga song ho ngühkhüm tegü ponpen shanga kanei jungeilabü.
Hobaje
Ladang kaneibü shousi shuongei, ‘Ho haangsong tetlabü ai?’ dogo laulaje,
kheijinei kanei lenlabü, ‘Ho
Israel shousi shuongei hauan
Saotometuphanga Ijep kaodaka choba setshanga setbü Faraoeibü shaang bukbü ka laangpoba thüngdanga kibü müteibü shaang bukbü shou sühko hoba shatsinam hoba samkeisamukei shaang shatbüsitbü pendou
Hobaje Farao hoba haoeibü khangenbü pendou hoba Ijepbü pendou nangnak pienkei. Hobaje Ijepa haapbü yaang kikei; aieilausi chem chenei ongkei ühaibü akitei.
Nangnak Faraoei Mosa si Aron ngaan laukei, “Meimeiashi, ngeibü mütli apyoan Israel shousi shuong leian hauan nyi laubü tegü kaneibü
Kanei laubü tegü kaneibü sanshuong, masu shuong, leian satashi, hoba ngokei haütibü!”
Ijepbüei Israelbü panteiko, kaonyek ka tongde sattila shanga haoen thungeikei; aishanga haoenei laukei, “Kün pendou haian aplabü!”
Hibü mütshuongei tokai ajinbü wen jungan hoba wen nyatbü phauyaang haoeneibü neiei shoan phak to tonan jinkei.
Hobaje Mosaeibü ngüh tegü Israel shousi shuongei kümbei; hoba Ijepbü ka hon yak, chandinam yak hoba neisimei hikei.
ei mütshuong la onou kusije haoenei hibü haoen la letikei, hoba kho tegü haoenei Ijepbü nyaksinam solangkei.
Israel shousi shuong Rameses ka Sukot sühko haukei. Nashou yaksa aweko bousu shuong hajar saongao lak youei paikei.
Toukei haoen yoa kheiyobü mütshang yaang, san si lon shuong, masu shuong, hoba samkeisamuk juong yoan haukei.
Ijep ka wennyat künan loubüei haoenei tokai ajinbü wentek kangshaukei. Aishanga kho tokai ajinko kikei; aieilausi haoen Ijep ka thungan sattisije ühaien hoba haoen shangakei shausiyung alamleen.
Tou Israel shousi shuong Ijep kaodaka kibü po saongao leito khujin kikei.
Po saongao leito khujin thonlama tükde khünyet kho
Ho haoen Ijep kaodak ka leilangla
lausikei namei jekngaibü aaomüt, nyi hao la kipbuan kialonga haoei ho ka shauenakei.
Pensiyen hoba mulambü mütei ho ka ashaulabü.
Kho chem chenei ashaujan, nyi phe kho danga khonga jungan apaijan; hoba khoka lo che ongkei aleilujan.
Israelbü shuong pendouei kho jungeijan.
Hobaje ladang yenbou che ka junga otan kilaje hoba
Sangbüshou hoba kan yoa louan kibü yenbou shanga ngühkhüm che kilabü.”
ei Mosa si Aron to lenbü tegü Israelbü pendouei khei kümbei.
Khünyettham Israel shousi shuong mütshang yaang Ijep ka
“Israel shuong yoa shaangbou bousushou ayingsi paangshou kho küla saüenkushi. Mütkei meisiaukei ajanjan pendou büngbü nyusem ipan shaang hapbü weko ngeibü!”
Mosaei mütshuong to laukei, “Aaothu ka Ijep apyoan lousatbü chalou ho damenashi: aieilausi hau kibü ikei
Tat kan Abib lita shaangbounyet meimeida.
Hobaje sendei si naodei kouko kibü Kanan, Hit, Amor, Hiv, hoba Jebus kaodak, laobou haoei kaneibü pisibousi shuong to kan la kula thekukei khüto
Chalou nyet kanei tokai ajinbü wentek shaulabü; hoba nyetbounyet
Chalou nyet khümbo kho tokai ajinbü wentek shaulabü; hoba tokai jinbü wentek aikei kan yoa hoba tokei kaneibü kaophei sühkoa ühüptijan.
Hobaje kho chaloua kanei kaneibü shousi to lenshi, ‘Ngo Ijep ka longjinei
eibü ngühkhüm kaneibü sembunga kila shanga ho kaneibü ika tetsida che kilabü, hoba kanei khüngjaa damenlabü che kilabü. Aieilausi hau kibü ikei
Hibü ho ngühkhüm kanei jih tükdea po weko jungeishi.
“Hobaje ladang
nyusem ipbü pendou hoba kanei kibü shatsinam samkeisamuk shaang shatbüsitbü weko kanei
Hobaje shaang shatbü gadu weko kanei san shoushou cheei angngaiashi; hoba kho kanei üangngai longa kanei haoeibü ngüm leilukushi. Kaneibü jayangshou yoa shaangbüshou kho kanei angngaijan.
‘Ho ai tetlabü?’ dogo kaneibü jayangshouei phealonga, kanei hai lenshi, ‘Aaothu ka hau kibü ikei
Ladang Faraoei sen hautila tukeisekkei, kheijinei Ijep kaodaka shaangbü bousushou hoba shaangla shatbüsitbü meisiau pendou
Hobaje kho ika hoba kaibü khüngjaa shensinge che kilabü; aieilausi hau kibü ikei

Ladang Faraoei mütshuong hautikei, Filistia kaodak aeto haubü kho nyangbou lausikei kho lamto Mühghaüei haoen leian ohau. Aishanga Mühghaüei laukei, “Aingenyu haoenei wapyo hapjinei, maangpon sepeinyu Ijep kaodak to haoen ngailabü.”
Hibü Mühghaüei mütshuong yam aeto Saklangbü Yungnyu aeto leian haukei. Israel shousi shuong wapyola lamlean Ijep kaodak ka angkei.

Hobaje Mosaei hao yoa Josefeibü lo künkei; aieilausi Josefei Israel shousi shuong to kaangkhühtham thetilantiko hai laukei, “Mühghaüei maimaitham kan pean chühlabü hoba kanei ngeibü lo haka kan yoa künlangjan.”
Hobaje haoen Sukot ka meimeijung hauan Etham yamlam thonbüa shaikei.
Haoen chaloua si nangnak dogo haula shanga chaloua sangmei thaonyu cheei hoba haoen la ngesakbü kutila nangnak wan thaonyu cheei dogo haoen lam leila
Chaloua sangmei thaonyu hoba nangnak wan thaonyu kho mütshuong ka abang.
Kheijinei
“Israelbü to sepeinyu ngaian Pi Hahirot thedanga Migdol si Saklangbü Yungnyu kaanglang Baal Zefon nyangko shaiteishi dogo lenshi.
Aieilausi Faraoei ‘Israelbü phetsen kaoei kailepan yamei mühakei’ dogo laulabü.
Hobaje ngei Farao maang kaangtilabü hoba haoei haoen shijung haulabü. Lausikei Farao si haoeibü sepai tan pendou thüka ngei nyenhaang haplabü; hoba Ijepbüei ngo
Ladang Ijep choba to mütshuong sada dogo lenkei, Farao si haoeibü yaangenbü shuong dambü jakshaian apbei, hoba laukei, “Senei ai kümbei? Senei Israelbü litia, hoba senei haoeneibü eik aleouko apa!”
Hibü haoei haoeibü kailong lamlean haoeibü sepai shuong hao yoa leian haukei.
Shanenbü kailong saongaolak hoba Ijepbü kailong pendou hoba khübü thüka leiyeibü dan yoan hao yoa haukei.
Ijep choba Faraoeibü maangpon

Ijepbü shuongeibü koli sepai, hoba kailong leibü dan hoba sepai shuong khümboei Israelbü shuong shilangkei, hoba haoen Pi Hahirot si Baal Zefon nyangko Saklangbü Yungnyu yungkoa shaian kijinei laphetkei.
Ladang Israel shousi shuongei chühangtikei, haoenei Farao Choba si Ijepbü shuong hao phainei haoen shijung louko hapbei; haoen aeibou hatkei hoba Israel shousi shuongei
Hobaje haoenei Mosa to laukei, “Ijepa hee aki dogo nyi kün yama haitila leian satkei sai? Ijep ka leian longan nyi aila kün ho tegü jungeida?
‘Ijepbü khangenko kikho, kün khei ong apyoshi’ dogo ho ngüh Ijepa ka to alau lo? Aieilausi yama haibü toje Ijepbü khangenko kibü kün shanga maibou yingkhoulabü.”
Mosaei mütshuong to laukei, “Kan tehüt! Atopeiko kishi, hoba
ei kan shanga wapyolabü, kanje sangsembo kishi.”
Nyi ju tonenan yungnyua ik shingan kho janyinashi, hoba Israel shousi shuong yungnyu jenyua kao ulangbüa haulabü.
Hobaje ngei Ijepbü maangpon kaangtilabü hoba haoenei haoen phaito shilabü; hoba ngei Farao, haoeibü sepai, haoeibü kailong, hoba haoeibü koli thüka setbü sepai thüka ngeibü nyenhaang haplabü.
Ladang ngei Farao, haoeibü kailong hoba haoeibü kolia setbü sepai thüka nyenhaang haplaje, kheijinei Ijepbüei ngo
Mühghaü khuthük hangangbü laobou Israelbü shaishang thedanga haukei, kukjung hauan haoen phainei lokei. Sangmei thaonyukei thedang ka kukkei hoba haoen phainei
Ijepbü si Israelbü kanglanga lokei. Langyang sünga sangmeiei Ijepbü la nakthühkukei hoba Israel shousi la ngesakkukei; khoei langyang sünga cheei che nyangko ohauen.
Kheijinei Mosaei haoeibü ik yungnyu aeto shingkei, hoba
hoba Israelbü shuong, haoeneibü nanae maiaedang hama deiei kümthang la lean kaolina yungnyu khatkei.
Hobaje Ijepbü haoen shijung Faraoeibü koli, haoeibü kailong hoba haoeneibü koli sepai pendou yungnyu jenyu to haoen phai semjung lotkei.

Kheijinei
Hibü Mosaei haoeibü ik yungnyu thükto shingkei, hoba ngeyangje yungnyu kho nyishou tegü yeikei. Hobaje Ijepbü khüka satkei, hoba
Hobaje dei kho sepeinyu longeitian kailong, kolia setbü sepai shuong hoba Israelbü phai semjung loubü Faraoeibü lakjaibü shuong yungnyu to atbü pendou danglepbei; haoen che ongkei ajou.
Lausikei Israelbü shuongje yungnyu jenyua kao ubüa paikei, hoba haoeneibü nanae maiaedang ham shanga yungnyu kho kümthang la lekei.

Kheijinei Mosa si Israel shousi shuongei
“Ngei
aieilausi haoei soneikangko thük hapa;
koli hoba khonei setbü haoei yungnyua shemtia;
hoba hao ngo khümenbou yeia,
hao ngeibü Mühghaü ki hoba ngei hao sanglabü.
Hao ngeibü bousi shuongeibü Mühghaü,
ngei hao yaangentilabü.
haoeibü nyen
“Faraoeibü kailong hoba lakjaibü dan

hoba pienbü lajamleibü shuong
Saklangbü Yungnyu maang to ada.
Si haübüei haoen küplepa;

netla yeiko jangnyinkua.
No thükkaboua yaangenbüei,
kaibü dangbou shuong nyi pekan apda;
no khau lotbüa haoen youho tegü lonan aptida.
Hobaje kaibü kungkhün hakei metbü ka
yungnyu kho chela onshaian apbei;
yungsen kho tangshaitham kümthang tegü lokei;
yungnyu deiyaaka si kho ontoula yeian apbei.
Dangbou shuongei laukei,
‘Ngei shijung haulabü,
ngei laphetlabü;
ngei soletbü peisilei janan lelabü.
Haoen thüka ngeibümaangdak senyühshemlabü;
ngei ngeibü in setenlabü,
ngeibü ikei haoen shemtilabü.’
Lausikei nyi hak metan jinkukei,
hoba yungnyuei haoen küplepbei.
Dei yaangbüa haoen shisanam tegü maangto atkei,
“O
saopobüa soneikangko,
nyensangbüa hatlamoklabü seikümseilei kümbo,
mühghaü shuong pendou yoa no phatko ao ki?
Nyi kaibü mae ik shingkei
hoba kaoei haoen suikei.
Kaibü üeisanouei nyi khümenbü eikshuong nyi leiyenkei;
kaibü haua nyi haoen kaibü saopobü kishang kaoen to leikei.
Phangshuongei kho ditjinei haoen lühkei;
Filistiaa kibü shuong to khonkuei sühkei.
Edoma leiyeibü shuong hatyomokyoko kikei;
Moab kaodak kabü bunyu shuong to hatbümokbüei sühkei;
Kanana kibü shuong tühnyinkei.
Hatbülühbü jemtenbü haoen
thüka sühkei;
O

laang che phatko atopeiko yeitia.
O
kümbü kishang;
O
nyi haoen leishaikei,
hoba nyi kaibü shongha phokukei.
Ladang Faraoeibü koli shuong hoba kailong yoa haoeibü sepai shuong yungnyu jenyu to atkei, hoba nyibou yungnyu kho haoen thükto lottikei; Israel shousi shuongje yungnyu jenyua kao ulangbüa paitikei.
Kheijinei Aroneibü nou thuseinyu; Miriamei jembü ik busena jungkei, hoba yaksa shuong pendouei sao phainei busen kaangko nyen sangko laukei;
aishanga haoei soneikangbü thüksimin hapa;
haoei koli shuong hoba khonei setbü shuong
yungnyu maangto shemetlangtia.”
Kheijinei Saklangbü Yungnyu ka Mosaei Israel shousi shuong leian thedang ae Shur phetsen kaodak to leian atkei. Yama chalou semnyet paian phaia haoenei dei ühüp.
Ladang haoen Mara to loukei, haoenei Mara dei kho ayungen; aishanga dei kho khauekbü kikei. (Khoei kaoeneibü nyen Mara nyenkei).
Hibü mütshuongei Mosa khulimbo nyamnyamko laukei, “Senei ai yungla?”
