Khünei
Haoei laukei, “Kanei kaneibü Mühghaü
Kheijinei shumang anthüknyi hoba hekyang anjinlei kibü Elim sühko haoen loukei; hoba khünei dei nyangko haoen onshaikei.
Hobaje haoen Elim ka meimeijung Israel shousi shuong pendou Ijep kaodak ka bangan lit nyiboubü, chalou anthük ngaoboubüa Elim si Sinai kanglanga kibü Sin yamlamang to loukei.
Yamlamanga Israel shousi shuong pendou Mosa si Aron khulimbo nyamnyambei.
Israel shousi shuongei haosi to laukei, “Kün pheshik chak nyangko setan, wentekei senyühshembo shauko kijinei Ijep kaoa
Kheijinei
Chalou lakbounyetje haoenei chemto sungbabü kho chalou angbou nyishou yoshaibü toje phejan nyiei juongbou yingjan, hoba kho lamlean phojan.
Hibü Mosa si Aronei Israel shousi shuong to laukei, “Ijep kaodak ka kan leiyenbou kho
Hobaje ngeyang kanei
Hobaje Mosaei laukei, “Ladang
Hobaje Mosaei Aron to laukei, “Israel shousi pendou to lenshi, ‘
Aronei Israelbü pendou to joyojinei haoenei yam aeto chühsi,
ei Mosa to laukei,
“Ngei Israel shousi shuong nyamnyambü dida. Haoen to lenshi, ‘Chasem kanei phe shaulabü, hoba ngeyang kanei wen shauan senyühshemlabü. Kheijinei kanei ngo kaneibü Mühghaü
Khünyet chasem auwet seengjung louan haoeneibü shaishang shenkei; hoba ngeyang shaishang kaijembo nin atan kikei.
Ladang atan kibü nin kho ukei, kheijinei onan kibü nin onbü tegü hanpang on ona yama kao pendoua atan kikei.
Ladang Israel shousi shuongei kho hapbei, haoen cheei che to laukei, “Ho ai?” Aieilausi kho ai yingkeije haoenei ange.
Mosaei haoen to laukei, “Ho
ei sakkubü kho ho ki. Kan mütpem wekoei luluei shauthüng heshaiashi; kan mütpem wekoei lulu neichema kibü lühbak thüng mütpem weko phau che che heshaiashi.”
Israelbü shuongei kho tegü kümbei; atei aei atei shian heshaikei.
Hobaje ladang phaua takkei, aoei aei heshaikei haoeibü aei akitei hoba aoei shisho ong heshaikei haoeibükei asouko aying. Mütpem wekoei luluei shauthüng heshaikei.
Hobaje Mosaei haoen to laukei, “Aoeikei ho ngeyang sühko joutian tepho.”
Lausikei haoen ateije ngüha aleko ngeyang sühko phokei; hoba kho yang yangan nyaüan apbei; hoba Mosaei haoen to maangpokkei.
Hobaje kho haoenei ngeyang weko mütpem wekoei luluei shauthüng heshaikei; hoba ladang chanyuei juokkei kho tühnyinkei.
Hobaje lakbounyeta haoen mütpem wekoei shausiyung phejan nyi thüngei aei yoshaian phokei, kho mütpem weko phau nyibang. Noknyüh khuleibü dan pendou louan Mosa to kho shangabü lenkei.
Hobaje haoei haoen to laukei, “
Mosaei sakkubü tegü haoenei kho ngeyang sühko phokei, hoba kho anyaüko kikei, tokei yangkei ayangko kikei.
Mosaei laukei, “Kho tat shauashi, aieilausi tat
Chalou lak kho kanei yoshailabü; lausikei nyetbounyet kho nou ki, khünyet ai akiteilabü.”
Hobaje nyetbounyet müt at heshaila haukei, lausikei haoenei ai ühüp.
Kheijinei
“Chühashi,
Hibü nyetbounyet mütshuong haksokei.
Israelbüei ho to manad dogo laukei, hoba kho koriandar buhek tegü thupaibü hoba kho shaula naodei jinan kümbü wentek peklebü tegü kikei.
Mosaei laukei, “Ho
Hobaje Mosaei Aron to laukei, “Thamchak che sungan mana phau che shenko khünei jinashi, hoba meten pendou shanga
ei Mosa la sakkubü tegü, Aronei Thesilan Busen junga küpjeman phola tentian phokukei.
Hobaje müt kibü kaonyek che to aloushongko Israel shousi shuongei po saonyi sühko mana shaukei. Kanan kaonyek leilang asühshongko haoenei mana shauko kikei.
(Tou omer che kho efa che anboubü kho ki.)
Israel mütshang pendou Sin yamlamang ka meimeian
Hibü haoenei Mosa to oyoko laukei, “Künla yunglabü labü.” Mosaei jongaiko laukei, “Kan kü to aila oyoda? Aila kanei

Lausikei khonei mütshuong deiei aeibou mühkei; hoba mütshuongei Mosa khulimbo nyamnyambei. Haoenei laukei, “Deilaei kün, küneibü shousi shuong hoba samkeisamuk shatsinam shuong haitila Ijep kaodak ka aila nyi kün leijung loukei?”
Hibü Mosaei
Chühashi, Horeba ngo ka thedanga laang thüka lolabü. Nyi laang to ngümashi, hoba mütshuongei yunglabü lele kho laang ka dei longlabü.” Mosaei Israelbü jaishou shuong thedanga kho tegü kümbei.
Hobaje kho kaoen to Massa hoba Meriba dogo nyenkei, aieilausi Israel shousi shuongei oyokei hoba
Kheijinei Amalekbü louan Israelbü to Refidima wapyokei.
Mosaei Joshua to laukei, “Sen shanga müt pienashi hoba Amalekbü to wapyoashi. Ngiet ngo shongh khua Mühghaüeibü ju ngeibü ika jungan lolabü.”
Hibü Mosaei lenbü tegü Joshuaei kümbei hoba Amalekbü to wapyokei, hoba Mosa, Aron hoba Hur shongh khu to angkei.
Ladang Mosaei haoeibü ik tuokkei, kheijinei Israelbüei thükkei, hoba ladang ong haoeibü ik yanlaje kheijinei Amalekbüei thükkei.

Lausikei ladang Mosa ik noukei, haoenei laang che sungjung louan hao phanga phokei, hoba kho thüka hao setkei; hoba Aron si Hur haosi hamei cheei jinei, cheei jinei dogo jungan haoeibü ik tuokan kitikei; hoba chanyu anepshongko haoeibü ik akukko kikei.
Hibü Joshuaei Amalek hoba haoen mütshuong haoeibü inlouei thükenkei.
Kheijinei
Hobaje Mosaei laangshongei lemshang che yaükei, hoba khoeibü nyen “
Hobaje haoei laukei, “
Tou Mühghaüei Mosa shanga hoba haoeibü eikshuong shanga kümbü hoba ailai Israelbü Ijep ka leiyenkei, habü pendou shanga Mosaeibü kounyangbü Midianbü ungshedbou Jethroei ditkei.
Mosaei haoyak Zippora leian sungan phaia, hao kounyangbou Jethroei nyibou sao yoa
jayangshou müt nyi yoan sungletkei; cheeibü nyen Gershom kikei; aieilausi haoei laukei, “Ngo kükathanga yenla lean kikei.”
Hobaje lubü cheeibü nyen Eliezer nyenkei; aieilausi haoei laukei, “Küboueibü Mühghaüei kü to thuia, hoba Faraoeibü in ka ngo khümenkei.”
Mosaeibü kounyangbou Jethroei Mosaeibü yak hoba saoeibü jayangshou nyi leian Mühghaü shongh nyangko Mosa kishang yamlamang to loukei.
Müt cheei Mosa to laukei, “Chühashi, kaibü kounyangbou Jethro ka jungto kayak hoba saoeibü jayangshou müt nyi leian louada.”
Hobaje Mosaei hao kounyangbou shuokla hauko hao to souhat lenko hao to sembung shepbei. Haoen maisho kibü akibü pheyoko neichem maangto atkei.
Hobaje Mosaei hao kounyangbou la Israelbü shanga
Ijepbü ik ka püetan
Hobaje Jethroei laukei, “Ijepbü ik ka hoba Farao ik ka no khümenbou
Tou ngei ngea, lubü Mühghaü pendou tokei

Hobaje Mosaeibü kounyangbou Jethroei Mühghaü shanga juokbü lembü hoba haitibü lembü che jungan loukei; hoba Aron si Israelbü leiyeibü jaishou shuong pendou Mühghaü thedanga Mosaeibü kounyangbou yoa saopobü wentek shaula loukei.
Nyibounyet Mosa mütshuongeibü matjemla setkei; hoba mütshuong ngeyang ka chasem sühko Mosa kaijembo loan kikei.
Hobaje ladang hao kounyangbouei Mosaei kümbü pendou hapbei, haoei laukei, “Nyi mütshuong shanga ho ai kümda? Aila no boushou setda, hoba müt pendou ngeyang ka chasem sühko lotida?”
Hobaje Mosaei haoeibü kounyangbou to laukei, “Aieilausi mütshuongei Mühghaü ka phelalela kü jungto louda.
Ladang haoen lemenbü kilaje haoen kü jungto louda, ngei haoen kanglanga laobou tangbou ki kho pankuda hoba ngei haoen la Mühghaüeibü Ngühkhüm hoba haoei sakkubü janenkubü ngetida.”
Kheijinei Jethroei laukei, “Nyi kümbü ho tükde aying.
Maimaitham nyi ngelabü, no hoba kaibü mütshuongei oan nongan aplabü; aieilausi kümsilei ho ka shanga aeibou atsheibü ki.
Tou ngeibü ngüh ditashi, ngei ka la hangsilam wanan lenkho, hoba ka yoa Mühghaü yoan kishi. Mütshuong shanga Mühghaü thedanga no yingshi hoba nyi haoeneibü ngüh Mühghaü jungto sungba.
Nyi haoen la Mühghaü ngühkhüm hoba janenbü lenashi, hoba haoen ainei paila hoba ai kümla kho nyi haoen la lenjan.

Toukei nyi mütshuong yo ka Mühghaü to hatbü shuong hoba besa anyem amangsühbü, ngühmaanglanbü, kümsilei thükbü shuong, eikshuong yo ka pienashi; hoba hajar thüka, saongao thüka, anjinsem thüka hoba an thüka, khübü tegübü mütshuong songdakla pian phoshi.

Hobaje mütshuong thüka jih pendoua haoen la mat jemtishi. Ngüh yaangbü pendou haoenei ka jungto sungbatishi, lausikei ngühsidei hanbü pendou haoen lolo jemlabü. Hoei kaibü on solabü, aishanga haoenei kaibü onat janyolabü.
Nyi ho kümsilei kümalonga, hoba Mühghaüei maang angalonga khonei nyi natenko loenlabü hoba mütshuong pendou haoen kishang to haksoa ngailabü.”
Hibü Mosaei hao kounyangbouei lenbü kho ditkei hoba haoei lenbü pendou kümbei.
Mosaei Israelbü pendou yoka kümsilei thükbü pienkei, hoba mütshuong thüka kongnyu shuong hajar thüka, saongao thüka, anjinsem thüka hoba an thüka leiyeibü pienkei.
Jihsiphai pendoua haoenei mütshuongeibü mat jembei. Mat yaangbü haoenei Mosa jungto künkei lausikei ngüh hanbü pendou haoenei lolo jembei.
Hobaje Mosaei hao kounyangbou hangan hautikei; hoba Jethro haoeibü lam to hao kaodak to haukei.
Israel shousi shuongei Ijep kaodak apyoan phaia lit semboua shaangbounyet haoen Sinai yamlamang to loukei.
Hobaje ladang haoenei Refidim ka meimeian Sinai yamlamang to loukei, haoen yama shaikei; hoba khonei Israelbü shongh thedanga shaikei.
Hobaje Mosa Mühghaü jungto shongh to angkei, hoba
‘Ngo
Hibü tou kanei ngeibü ngüh ditko laualonga, hoba ngeibü thesilan jungeikho laualonga phang pendou yo ka kan ngeibü nyaksinam yinglabü. Kaonyu pendou ngeibü yingasikei
kan kü shanga ungshedbü sangle che hoba saopobü phang che kilabü.’ Habü ngüh nyi Israel shousi shuong to lenjan.”
Hibü Mosaei mütshuong ka leiyeibü jaishou shuong ngakei hoba
Hobaje müt pendouei jongaiko laukei, “
Hobaje
hoba sembounyet shanga lamlean kishi; aieilausi sembounyet müt pendou thedanga Sinai shongh to
Mütshuong shanga nyi takletbü kaijembo phojan hoba ho lenashi: ‘Kan shongh khüto üanglabü hoba leilang khün ameitila kan lulu lolo maangsangashi; aoei shongha meitilaje hao tükde haitilabü;

hao to aikei ikei ameitilabü, lausikei hao maimaitham laangei tetetlabü ayingsi laujinei kipettilabü. Meisiau yingsikei müt yingsikei, hao lang akitilabü.’ Ladang teklaang lounyu metlaje kheijinei ong haoen shongh to anglabü.”
Hibü Mosa shongh ka louyenan mütshuong saüenkukei, hoba haoenei haoeneibü neisimei sakkei.
Hobaje Mosaei mütshuong to laukei, “Sembounyet shanga lamlean kishi, hoba siisiphe tejam.”
Sembounyet ngeyang, langmak langpon phaukei, hoba shongha shangtüngbü sangmei shangkei, hoba teklaang langh yaang ditkei. Shaishang kabü mütshuong pendou hatbüei lühkei.
Mühghaü to haüyola Mosaei mütshuong shaishang ka leian longkei, hoba haoen shongh youa lokei.
Sinai shongh khümbo wankhükei khuilepbei, aieilausi kho thükto
Ladang teklaang langh aei aei kaangbou yeikei, Mosaei joyokei hoba Mühghaüei langmakei jongaikei.
Sinai shongh to shongh khu sühko louyenkei hoba Mosa shongh khu to ngakei. Hibü Mosa angkei,
hoba
Ungshedbou shuong mangkei aoyou
Mosaei
Hibü Mosa mütshuong jungto yanan haoen to lenkei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei habü ngüh pendou lenko laukei,
“No Ijep kaodak aaothu ka leiyenbü kaibü Mühghaü
“Nyi kü thedanga lubü mühghaü aikei tekiti.
“Thükaenei müh, ayingsi phangaenei kao maangaenei deia kibü phatbü aikei ka shanga heangsho teküm.
Nyi haoen thedanga tekhüpet ayingsi haoen telem; aieilausi kü to mangsenbü pisibousi shuong shabü hangshong haoeneibü shisishousi meten sem si lei sühko shieinangeilabü;
hoba kü to sanoubü hoba kü ngühkhüm jungeibü hajar hajar to onoubü, ngo
“Nyi
“Nounyet saopotham phola damenashi.
Chalou laknyet kaibü kümsilei pendou kümashi,
lausikei nyetbounyet kho
Aieilausi chalou laknyeta
“Kabou si kanyu to soumo hatashi, khei yingsi
“Nyi müt tühaiti.
“Nyi asangalan tejungei.
“Nyi tekok
“Nyi kaibü lepbou khulimbo amlangbü aukhün aolep tüt.
“Nyi kaibü lepbou chemdang to tedüh, nyi kaibü lepboueibü yak ayingsi haoeneibü sambou ayingsi samnyu ayingsi haoeneibü masu ayingsi gadu, ayingsi kaibü lepboueibü aikei tedüh.”
Ladang mütshuongei langmak makbü, langpon ponbü, teklaang langh hoba wankhük longbü shongh hapbei haoen hatbü ka lühkei. Haoen heebüa lokei
hoba Mosa to laukei, “Nyi kün to joyoashi, künei ditkho. Lausikei kün haisi amaibüla Mühghaüei kün to tejoyotikai.”
Hobaje Mosaei mütshuong to laukei, “Tehütma; kanei Mühghaü to hatbü danko kanei shabü ashontila ho Mühghaüei kan takteila loubü ki.”
Lausikei mütshuong heebüa loan kikei hoba Mosa, Mühghaü kiteibü sangmei nakthüh kaoen sühlangko haukei.
Kanei kü to hipan kila lubü mühghaü shuong akümjan; kanei jembü shanga chandinam mühghaü ayingsi honeibü mühghaü ayaüjan.

Kü shanga thamei lemshon yaüashi, hoba kho thüka kaneibü san, lon, hoba masu juokbü lembü kuashi, hoba kaneibü maangmai lembü kuashi. Lanei ong ngeibü nyen damentila ngei pienlaje, ngo kan jungto loulabü hoba kan haükulabü.
Hobaje nyi kü la lemshang laangei yaükualonga nyi kho laang thüngenan ayaükujan; aieilausi nyi kho thüka kaibü laang thüngbü peisilei jungeialonga nyi kho shatida.
Hobaje no mütkong kibü ühüptila shanga no kü lemshang to you yaüjung üangjan.
“Habü Ngühkhüm shuong Israelbü shuong thedanga phokujan.
Nyi Ibribü sambü che jekalonga, po lak haoei khangenlabü. Lausikei po nyetboubüa haoei ai mu akuko litilabü.
Hao hao mütpem louan kialonga hao mütpem ngaitilabü, lausikei hao loujinei hao yak thonan louan kialonga sao hao yoa haulabü.
Haoeibü
Lausikei sambü khoei shangashatko, ‘Ngei ngeibü shousiyak sanouda,’ ngo solojung asatlabü dogo ngetia longa,

kheijinei haoeibü bunyubouei Mühghaü jungto hao leian anglabü. Khünei hao koukhu ayingsi kouthung lambo leian loulabü; hoba haoeibü bunyubouei injakei haoeibü nou sepbulabü. Kho phaiaje haoei hao salang sünga khangelabü.
“Müt atei haoeibü nouyangshou samla lela yaaksi saoje bousu sambü tegü asatlabü.
Saoei jembü bunyubou, aoei jembü shanga sao phokei, hao aolintilonga kheijinei haoei bou la sao angngaitikujan. Haoei sao küksithang la yaakkula athük; aieilausi haoei sao maang alanko jungeikei.
Haoei haoeibü jayangshou la sao letialonga haoei sao to nouyangshou tegü jungeijan.
Haoei lubü yak nyiboula ngayoalonga, saoeibü shausiyung, saoeibü neisimei, hoba sao chem kanbü janbü asenetjan.
Hobaje habü kümsilei semei haoei sao to athounoulonga saoei mu ai akuko khei ong satkulabü.
“Aoei müt to hailabü lele ngümlaje, hao tükde haitilabü.
Lausikei müt khoei hao khulimbo thamtham thobü ayingko Mühghaüei hao ik mangto kubü yingan kiteialonga kheijineije hao, ngei pienkulabü kaoen to satetjan.
Lausikei müt atei khüpbü langbüei thamtham lubü müt che haitia longa hao haitila shanga hao ngeibü lemshang kakei leilangashi.
“Aoei jembüeibü bou, ayingsi nyu to ngümlaje tükde hao haitijan.
“Aoei müt koklaje hoba hao yaaklaje, ayingsi hao ika hapoulaje hao tükde haitijan.
“Aoei jembü nyusibou to khükla uoklaje, hao tükde haitijan.
“Müt nyi oyoan cheei che to laangei tetalonga ayingsi ik seman thangalonga hoba hao ühaisikei shena yeplabü lele yeisije;
haoei nyibou haoeibü ju jungan paijung hauenalonga, aoei ngümbei hao litilabü, khei eik aptibü shanga ong haoei mu kulabü, hoba hao maisho maitijan.
Müt cheei jembü sambü ayingsi sambüsao haoeibü ikei ngümettialonga hao tükde shieikoelabü.
Khei yingsikei hao chalou chesinyi lang kialonga hao ashiakoelabü, aishanga aao kho haoeibü nyaksinam ki.

“Bousu shuong ngümyojinei mang akongbü yaksa che to ngümouan jembü lilabü kho leiluan apalonga, lausikei sao to amaibü aloushadlonga; yaksanyueibü laoei hao ka hibü tegü tükde hao to namshau kijan, hoba matjembüei janthetkubü tegü haoei kujan.
Lausikei kümsilei amaibü at loushedalonga kheijinei langkei jeila langkei,
nyek jeila nyek, hauh jeila hauh, ik jeila ik, you jeila you,
juokbü jeila juokbü, mou jeila mou hoba ngümbü jeila ngümbü dogo shemngaijan.
Müt cheei haoeibü aao ayingsi aaosao la nyek thutialonga haoei leilutibü shanga aao kho ngaitijan.
Hobaje haoei haoeibü aao ayingsi aaosaoeibü hauh kühan apbualonga haoei kho shanga aao kho ngaitijan.
“Masu pongsu cheei bousu ayingsi yaksa che thenettialonga, masu pongsu kho laangei tetettijan, hoba khoeibü phe kho ashaujan. Lausikei masu pongsu khoeibü
Lausikei masu pongsu khoei shangieda müt to thenko kialonga hoba kho
Laiche küman hao ka nam hialonga hao ka ai ong hilaje haoei haoeibü langkei muthüng kujan.
Bousu nashou to thensikei yaksa nashou to thensikei kho ngühkhüm tegü ong kümlabü.
Masu pongsu khoei aao ayingsi aaosao to thensi haoei haoeneibü
“Hobaje müt atei püngkhün che phekünsi, ayingsi püngkhün che thuan kho ashamtiko masu ayingsi gadu khüto atalonga,
püngkhün bunyubouei kho shemjan; shatsinam bunyubou la nam kujan hoba shatsinam haibü kho haoeibü yinglabü.
Hobaje müt ateibü masu pongsuei lubüeibü leilutikualonga; hoba kho haian apalonga kheijinei langkei kibü kho yaakan kho nam kho haoen janan lelabü, hoba haibü khokei pheian lelabü.
Ayingsi masu pongsu khoei thenda dogo shangieda ngean, bunyubouei kho thüngan aphoko kialonga, haoei masu pongsu shanga masu pongsu kulabü, hoba haibü masu kho hao shangabü yinglabü.”
“Müt cheei masu che ayingsi sanlon che koksi hoba kho haitisi ayingsi yaaksi haoei masu che shanga masu ngao hoba sanlon che shanga sanlon lei kujan.

Haoei kokbü shanga haoei shemjan. Haoei ai akilonga, hao kokla haubü shanga hao aao che tegü yaakjan. Kokbü shatsinam kho lang kian hapalonga masu yingsikei, gadu ayingsi sanlon yingsikei, haoei phejan penyi ngaingoulabü.
“Kokbü che chemto atan kian lapsi hoba hao ngümettisi hao haitibü shanga hao shedbü akilabü. Lausikei kho changea yingalonga hao haitisi haitibou kho shedbü.
“Müt cheei sek ayingsi semlühlaaka haoeibü shatsinam lamshautialonga hoba khübü aatian müeibü shaukualonga, haoei haoeibü sek ayingsi semlühlaak maiboutham ka shemngaijan.
“Wan angan jakbaa wan bauan youman thep ayingsi yeman kibü youlong ayingsi sek lonan apsi, aoei wan angtikei haoei tükde angngaikujan.
“Müt atei hao lepboueibü ika peisilei phokusi hoba kho haoeibü chem ka koklangsi kho hapenalonga kokbouei kho phejan penyiei shemngaijan.
Lausikei kokbü alapenlonga chem

“Oyophetyobü weko, masu shangabü yingsikei, gadu shanga yingsikei, sanlon shanga yingsikei, neisimei shanga yingsikei, khei ai maubülebü shangabü yinglaje yingasikei, atei ho yingkei dogo lenalonga, tan nyieibü ngüh kho Mühghaü lemshang to loujan. Mühghaüei ao yuktilaje haoei jembü lepbou la phejan nyi thüngei ngaitikulabü.
“Müt atei haoeibü lepbou la gadu yingsikei, masu yingsikei, sanlon yingsikei, shatsinam at phokusi, hoba aoeikei ühüpbo haian apsi, ayingsi mou lesi, nanglangan kisi,
haoei hao lepboueibü peitoleito ik atasi üt,
Lausikei kho hao ka koklangan kialonga, haoei
Shatsinam kho yamyangei taketnyu shauan kialonga, haoei aukabü shanga netshou sungbajan, hoba taketbü mei kho hao la ashemtilabü.
“Müt atei lepbou ka denche lotsi hoba
Lausikei
“Hobaje müt atei tokei akanko kibü saosüngbü medei suletan sao to asangalanbü kümalonga haoei tükde khümmu kujan hoba yakla ngajan.
Lausikei saoeibü bouei sao hao jungto hautila lothedalonga, haoei medei shuong shanga kuyobü hima yaknga mu kujan.
“Nyi seibüyaübü yaksa aokei akitijan.
“Aoyouei meisiau to yeplaje hao tükde haitijan.
“Aoyouei
“Yenbou to amaibü ajungeilabü ayingsi hao khon akutilabü; aishanga kan Ijep kaodaka yenla lean kikei.
Kanei latnyu ayingsi bou akibü teshitekoe.
Kanei haoen shieikoealonga hoba haoenei kü to ngekalonga maimaitham ngei haoenei ngekbü ditkulabü,
hoba ngo khau anglabü hoba kan wapyoa inei haitilabü. Kaneibü yaksi shuong latnyu la yeilabü, hoba kaneibü shousi shoujit yeilabü.
“Ka yoa kibü ngeibü mütli shalebü at la nyi nam lotkusi hao to namlot kubouei tegü ajungeilabü; ayingsi kanei hao ka phobnam ahijan.
Nyi kaibü lepboueibü neisimei thesilan che tegü sungalonga nyi hao la chanyu anepjineitham kungaijan;
aieilausi hao mang lemabü mangnei kho ong ki. Hao ainei yepla? Ladang haoei kü to ngeklaje ngei hao la ditkulabü, aieilausi ngo üeisanou ki.
“Nyi Mühghaü la tenyiku ayingsi kaibü mütli thüka songdakbou to tekhüktuok.
“Nyi kaibü shaangbü langle kesiong ka, ih ka hoba oliv onang ka kü to lemla tephai.
“Kaneibü shaangbü shou kü la kujan.
Kho tegü kaibü masu si sanlonei nyi kho khei kümjan; chalou nyet nyu yoa kilabü; setbounyet nyi kho kü la kujan.
“Kan kü shanga saopobü kilabü. Hibü yama meisiauei taketbü phe kanei aikei ashaujan; kho kanei keila okashi.
“Nyi amlangbü ngühlang tewenthon; hoba ngühmaang alanbü müt shanga aungüh tüt.
Amaibü kümla no juongbou phai tesem; ayingsi shuong yaangbou ae matjem sepeitila shanga haujembü kümaleia nyi tetotyo;
ayingsi shalebü to hao shangabü ngüha the techüh.
“Nyi kaibü dangboueibü masu ayingsi gadu lam maan paiko haüyosi nyi kho hao jungto leibakujan.
Ka to mangsenbü müteibü gadu onei tetlepan leketnyu yepan hapalonga, nyi hao to athuiko tüpyo; nyi hao to thuijan.
“Shalebü ngüh matjema nyi ngühmai khüpeilangei tüpbu.
Amlanga yuktibü ngühsidei ka bangan kishi; hoba shedbü akibü ngühmaanglanbü nyi tühaiti; aishanga ngei müt amaibü mat amaitilabü.
Hobaje nyi besa anyem aikei alejan; aieilausi besa anyemei müt nyek thutida, hoba ngühmaanglanbü ngüh khüpeilangeitida.
“Yenbou teshitekoe; aishanga kan Ijep kaodaka yenla lean kikeibü kanei yenboueibü maangpon ngeakei.
“Po lak sühko nyi seka langle jinashi hoba kho ka langle yoshaiashi.

Lausikei ka mütlia shalebü shuongei shaula shanga nyetbou poje nyi youli ajinko apyoashi; hoba khonei ai joutilaje yama kibü meisiau shuongei shaulabü. Kho tegü nyi kaibü semlühlaak si oliv bamang shangakei kümashi.
“Chalou lak nyi kaibü kümsilei kümashi, lausikei kaibü masu si kaibü gadu haksolabü lele hoba kaibü sambünyueibü jayangshou hoba yenbou haksola shanga nyetbounyet haksolabü.
“Ngo
“Po chenei semnei nyi kü shanga lem lijan.

Tokai ajinbü Wentek lem nyinei lijan; ngei ka la sakkubü tegü Abib lita pienbü chalou nyet nyi tokai ajinbü wentek shaujan; aieilausi khonei no Ijep ka longenkei. ‘Kü to lemla ladangkei ikkong aloujan.’
“Nyi kaibü kean ongenbü langle shaangbü buhek ai nyi seka jinkei, kho Youlat Lem lijan.
“Po thonbüa kaibü langle sek ka longbü yoshaian phobü Küpjembü Lem lijan.
Po weko habü lem sema bousu pendou ngo kaneibü Thükenbou
“Kü shanga lemla haitibü sii, tokai jinbü wentek yoa nyi alemjan. Ngeibü lema lemla haitibü haabü ngeyang sühko aphojan.
“Kaibü kao ka longbü maiboutham hoba shaangbü buhek shuong kho nyi kaibü Mühghaü
“Nyi sanlon shoushou ayingsi lonshou nyueibü sendeia athungjan.
“Chühashi, kaibü lam leila hoba ngei ai kaonyek lamlekuan ki khüto no leian atla shanga ka thedanga hangangbü che hautida.
Maangkuashi hoba hao ngüha leashi. Haokhu telim, aishanga haoei kaibü shedbü üpbulabü; aieilausi ngeibü Nyen hao to ki.
Lausikei nyi haoeibü ngüha lealonga, hoba ngei sakkubü pendou kümalonga, kheijinei kaibü dangbou to ngokei dangbou che kilabü, hoba no khulimbü shuong to ngokei khulimbou che kilabü.
Aieilausi ngeibü hangangbü ka thedangto haulabü hoba Amorbü, Hitbü, Perizbü, Kananbü, Hivbü, hoba Jebusbü jungto no leian loulabü; hoba ngei haoen shemtilabü.

Haoeneibü mühghaü to akhüpetjan, ayingsi haoen to alemjan, ayingsi haoeneibü kümhaang shuong tejungei. Nyi haoen saopotham kakan apashi, hoba haoeneibü saopobü laang thaonyu shuong kho netla yeiko jangnyinkuashi.
Kaneibü Mühghaü
Khonei kaneibü kaonyeka aoeibü shoukei aleilulabü ayingsi angkong üplabü. Ngei kaibü salang loutikulabü.
“Ngei no shuoklabü phangshuong pendou jungto molousühtoua hatlamoklabü hautikulabü hoba phenyemtilabü. Ngei kaibü labou shuong pendou sepeijung ngaitilabü.
Ngei kaibü haang ka Hivbü, Kananbü, hoba Hitbü, shian sattila ka thedangto naoyang hautilabü.
Lausikei kaonyek litham yeian apan meisiau pühsi amaibüla, ka thedang ka po chenei ongje shian asattilabü.
No haako yaangko kaonyek kho khümbo ale shongko ka thedang ka haoen shibang ong shian sattilabü.

Hobaje Saklangbü Yungnyu ka Filistiabü Yungnyu sühko hoba yamlamang ka Eufrates Shumang sühko ngei kaibü leilang khümbulabü. Kho kaonyek kabü mütshuong kho ngei kaibü ik to khümbo kuan aplabü, hoba ka thedang ka nyi haoen shian sattilabü.
Haoen yoa ayingsi haoeneibü mühghaü shuong yoa nyi thesilan ai teküm.
Ngo khulimbo haoenei ka la shabü ashontila shanga kaneibü kaonyeka haoen tekiti; aieilausi nyi haoeneibü mühghaü shuong to lembü kho ka shanga sung che yinglabü.”
Kheijinei haoei Mosa to laukei, “No si Aron, Nadab si Abihu hoba Israelbü jaishou shuong anjinlei kü jungto kaiyang; hoba heebü ka kanei lemashi;
lausikei Mosa, no ong
Hobaje Mosa mütshuong jungto louan
Hobaje Mosaei
Hobaje Israelbü heshou shuong
Hobaje Mosaei sii jamde sungbaan phaua jinkei, hoba jamde kho lemshon to lakkei.
Hobaje haoei Thebülanbü Le kho jungan kaman kibü shuongei ditko wekei; hoba haoenei laukei, “
Hobaje Mosaei sii kho sungbaan mütshuong la lakkuko laukei, “Theyolanyobü sii khüto chühashi, habü ngüh pendou shanga ho
Kheijinei Mosa si Aron, Nadab si Abihu hoba Israelbü jaishou anjinlei angkei,
hoba haoenei Israel Mühghaü hapbei. Haoeibü you phanga müh sakteibü phatko safir namseklaangei laklepan tegü hapbei.
Lausikei Mühghaüei Israel shousi shuong to ik ashat; haoenei Mühghaü hapbei, hoba haoenei shaukei yungkei.
Hobaje
Hibü Mosa hoba hao to thuibou Joshua pienkei hoba Mosa Mühghaüeibü shongh to angkei.
Hobaje haoei jaishou shuong to laukei, “Küsi nyibou alongei shongko kan hanei haiteiko kishi. Aron si Hur kan yoa kia, aoyouei joyolabü denche kilaje hao haosi jungto hautila thükkei.”
Ladang Mosa shongh to angkei, kheijinei shongh kho sangmeiei khuilepbei.
Hobaje
Israel shousi shuong thedanga, shongha
Hobaje Mosa sangmei jenyu to atjung shongh to angkei. Hobaje Mosa shongha chalou saonyi hoba langyang saonyi thüngkei.
“Israel shousi shuong to kü la lembü che sungba dogo lenashi. Mütpem wekoei jembü maangponei maang angenbü tegü kubü lembü sungletashi.
Hobaje kanei haoen ka sungletlabü lembü kho ho kilabü: hon, chandinam, hoba chinam;
hoba pii, nakthüngle sakbü, saklangbü panyet hoba inyaibü phemba nei hoba lon wi; akasia bu,
sanlon paangeibü khon saklangbüa hambü, hoba loneibü khon hoba
ngesakbü shanga oliv onang; naangla shanga haajangbü onang, hoba ponlemhibü jen,
oniks laang, namsek laang, ungshedbou hele shanga hoba khukua yuklabü shanga.
Ngo haoen yoa kila shanga haoenei lemshang che dangtiashi.
Lemshang neichem hoba khünei peisilei shangabü ngei ailai lenda kho tegü ong nyi dangjan.
“Hobaje haoenei akasia buei busen che kümjan, süng iknop penyi tho hoba khaang iknop che tho, hoba suokbü iknop che tho.
Hobaje nyi kho hon lanbüei naanglepjan, tangae maangae ham nyi naanglepjan, hoba kho thüka honei ko kaiko naangjemashi.
Kho tonla honeibü chikom lei yaüashi, hoba kho jidanga penyi hoba jidanga penyi dogo, you penlei to khangyoshi.
Hobaje nyi akasia buei kaang küman khonei thüka hon jonan jinshi
Hobaje saopobü buseneibü napheinei kho pela shanga nyi kaang kümbü kho chikom khüto hangan jinashi.
Kaang kho chikoma jinan phojan; kho khüka asunglangjan.
Hobaje ngei ka la kulabü ngühkhüm kho busena jinan phojan.
“Hobaje nyi lanbü honei onou setshang kümashi, kho süng iknop nyi tho, hoba khaang iknop che tho.
Hobaje jiji thon hama maisho jangbü honei kaakyembü kherabim penyi kümashi.
Ji thona kaakyembü kherab che hoba ji thona kaakyembü kherab che dogo kümashi; hoba kaakyembü kherabim kho thon thona onou setshang yoa chemala yaüshemashi.
Kaakyembü kherabim kho haosieibü kaak kuito binan küpjin ngühlepbo hoba haosi the shuokyoko kümshi.
Ngei kulabü ngühkhüm kho busen maang to jinashi hoba kho thüka küp denashi.
Hobaje kaakyembü kherabim kanglanga, ngühkhüm busen kabü onou setshang khonei, ngei ka to haüyolabü hoba Israel shousi shuong shanga kü ngühkhüm pendou kulabü.
“Hobaje nyi akasia buei khümsok che kümashi; hoba kho süng iknop penyi, khaang iknop che, hoba suokla iknop che tho.
Hobaje kho hon lanbüei naanglepshi hoba ko kaijembo honei yaülepshi.
Tokei kho kaijembo thon sembung ikmaang tetche kümshi, hoba kho thon sembung kaiko honei yaülepshi.
Hobaje kho shanga nyi hon chikom lei kümashi, hoba khoeibü you lei thüka, ko lei khonei chikom khübü kho jinashi.
Khümsok labü kaang shangabü kho thon sembung nyangko chikom kho kijan.
Hobaje kaang khübü kho akasia buei kümshi, hoba khübü khoei khümsok kho bela shanga khübünei hon naanglepbushi.
Hobaje nyi lembüsabüa jungeila phau, thung, khuan jinla meisok hoba yeian phola buphau kümshi; khübü kho hon lanbü kümshi.
Khümsok kho Thesilan Busen thedanga phojan, hoba khümsok khonei kü to lembü saopobü wentek ponpen kijan.
“Nyi hon lanbüei wanthung denshang che kümashi. Chungthem si kung khokei maisho jangyenan kümjan; kho thung phatbü chipen, tongbü si pungbü kho khüto mang chenei ong yingjan.
Ji ji na to pem sembang pheklangko bhek pem lak phekjung litian kümjan.

bhek chenei almond chipen pungbü tegü thung sem. Tongbü che hoba chipen che; hoba bhek chenei almond chipen pungbü tegü thung sem. Tongbü che hoba chipen che kho tegü wanthung ka bhek lak pheklangan kilabü.
Almond chipen pungbü tegü thung lei khünei tongbü shuong hoba chipen shuong kilabü.
Bhek penyi phanga tongbü che to liko thepan hoba lubü bhek penyi phanga tongbü che to liko thepan wanthung denshang ka bhek lak phekjung satbü kilabü.
Khübü tongbü shuong hoba bhek shuong hoba wanthung denshang pendou kho hon lanbüei chemala jangbü mang che ong yingjan.
Wanthung denshang shanga wanthung pemnyet küman khonei phoashi hoba khübüei haoen thea ngesaklabü.
Khoeibü kip hoba phau shuong kho lanbü honei kümbü yingjan.
Wanthung denshang hoba khübü peisilei pendou shanga hon lanbü seret khujinto ngao lejan.
Hobaje nyi khübü kho ka la shongha lenbü phatko kümjan.

“Tokei nyi lemshang neichem kho thangtet nei an yoan shenbü phemba nei inyaibü hoba mühson, hoba nakthüngan sakbü hoba sii tegü sakbü son kaakyembü kherabim thonan iklühmaibü kümsilei kümboueibü kümsilei tegü dangashi.
Thangtet nei weko süng iknop saoto set; hoba photak iknop lei yingjan, thangtet nei pendou takbü jetei yingjan.
Thangtet nei ngao liko shenyoashi hoba lubü thangtet nei ngao khokei liko shenyoashi.

Hobaje nyi thükkabou thangtet nei che thüka neithon thonbü che ka mongan jinkula mühsonei kümashi, hoba kho tegü thangtet nei sapyobü nyiboubü thükkabou thona jinashi, hoba nyiboubü shenyobü thangtet nei chenei nyi yukjin anjinsem jinashi.
Thangtet nei chea nyi yukjin anjinsem kümashi hoba nyiboubü phenyobü thangtet nei thon khünei yukjin anjinsem kümashi khei yingsije cheei che to hatleplabü.
Hobaje honeibü anjin anjinsem jinashi, hoba thangtet nei shuong kho jikhapei chela phenyoashi; khünei lemshang neichem kho chela yeilabü.
“Lemshang thüka neichem shanga nyi lon wiei thangtet nei kümshi, khübü thangtet nei kho nyi anthükche kümshi.
Thangtet nei weko süng iknop khujin hoba khaang iknop lei; thangtet nei weko anthük che kho takbü jetei kijan.
Nyi thangtet ngao lulu hoba lubü thangtet nei lak kho lubüa lulu shenyoashi; hoba neichem thedanga thangtet nei lakboubü kho penyila nopan phoshi.
Hobaje thenyobü chenei thonbou thangtet nei thona anjin anjinsem jinashi, hoba nyibou thenyobü thangtet nei shuong khoneikei anjin anjinsem jinashi.
Hobaje nyi chinamei pheklang anjinsem kümashi hoba neichem kho chela shenyotila shanga pheklang kho chikom khonei jinashi.
Hobaje neichem thangtet nei thükaenei soueiweneiko aeian kibü kho, thangtetbü soueitaiko aeian kibü lemshang neichem thükeibü phai aenei kibü to paplepjan.
Neichem thangtet nei tousüng jijiham iknop che bang joujan hoba khoei lemshang neichem kho küplepjan.
“Hobaje nyi neichem küplepla shanga sanlon paangeibü khon, saklangbüa haman hoba kho thüka loneibü khonei yuklepan kümashi.
“Lemshang shanga nyi akasia buei tangshaitham huongashi.
Waphei che che kho süng iknop an bang hoba khaang iknop che bang yingjan.
Waphei wekoa wa sembunga cheei che to sapyola haüyetjan; kho tegü lemshang neichem shangabü wa pendou nyi kho tegü lamleashi.
Lemshang neichem shanga wa saoche chaangbou phei ae yeian kümshi;
hoba wa saoche phangaenei chandinamei hatleplabü yoan kümshi; wa chenei thon bangkoa haüyetbü che bang lubü to sapyola shanga kümshi.
Lemshang neichem nyiboubü napheinei chanep pheinei wa saoche;
hoba khübü shanga hanlepbü chandinamei kümbü saonyi, wapheia haüyetbü penyi, hoba toukei wa lubü shanga haüyetbü penyi.
Hobaje chanep phei aenei lemshang neichem takphainei nyi wa lak kümashi.
Lemshang neichem takphai chemnyek ngühshanga wa nyi kümshi.
Khübü phangaenei lulu, thükaeneije shaangboubü chikom khüto sapyoan kilabü, kho tegü penyi ham shanga kilabü, khübü khoei chemnyek penyi kho yeilabü.
Wa yeibü penset kilabü, denshang chandinamei kümbü yoan denshang anthüklak, dangla yeian phobü wa che phanga denshang penyi, hoba lubü huongan kibü penyi phanga.
“Hobaje nyi akasia buei angkhüm jaashi; lemshang neichem napheinei huongla wa ngao,
hoba lemshang neichem napheinei wa ngao, phainei kibü shanga wa ngao kümashi, kho lemshang neichem chanep ae shanga.
Hobaje wa shuong kho jenyua khümjan, kho jithon ka jithon sühko haujan.
Hobaje nyi wa khüto hon yanlettiashi, hoba honeibü chikom kho leikhümjujan shanga yeitishi, hoba leikhümjujan to nyi hon yanan koutiashi.
Hobaje ka la shongha lenbü noksa phatko nyi lemshang neichem kho dangashi.
“Hobaje nyi mühson, nakthüngan sakbü hoba sii tegü sakbüei shenbü phemba nei inyaibüei kümbü; ikseibü kümsilei kümbouei kümbü tegü kaakyembü kherabim yoan kho kümashi;
hoba nyi kho honei naanglepan akasia bu thaonyu lei thüka antian pholabü; pheklang kho honei hoba chandinamei hanleplabü thüka kijan.

Thangtet nei kho anjin pheklanga antian phoashi, hoba thangtet nei maangae to ngühkhüm busen kho jungan kaiya; hoba thangtet nei khoei Saopobü shemjang hoba Saopoboutham shemjang kanglanga janyinkujan.
Hobaje Saopoboutham shemjanga onoubü setshanga nyi ngühkhüm busen kho phoshi.
Hobaje khümsok kho nyi thangtet nei nongbüa phoshi, hoba wanthung denshang kho khümsok thedanga lemshang neichem aenei chaangbou naphei aenei phoshi.
“Aishanga kanei neichem koukhün shanga noksa jinko ikseibouei kümbü kümsilei mühson, nakthüngan sakbü hoba sii tegü sakbü hoba ikeishenbü phemba nei inyaibüei nyi thangtet nei kümashi.
Nyi thangtet nei shanga akasia buei thaonyu ngao kümashi, hoba khübü khonei hon naangkushi, khübü anjin kho honei kümbü yingjan; hoba khübü shanga chinam hanlepla ngao nyi yotiashi.
“Hobaje nyi akasia buei lemshang shon che süng iknop ngao, hoba khaang iknop ngao hoba suokbüa iknop sem lemshon takbü pendou jetei dangashi.
Hobaje chemnyek lei weko khünei laang che bang küman jinashi, hoba laang kho lemshang mang to jetei yingjan, hoba kho thüka chinamei naanglepshi.
Tap jinla shanga nyi chak si tapsuokjin, phau, pheyaüjin, kip kümashi, hoba nyi chaksiam pendou kho chinamei kümshi.
Kho shanga chinamei wennyishou wouashi hoba wennyishou thükaenei nyek leia chikom lei kümshi.
Hobaje chinameibü wennyishou khoei lemshang lom sühko anglabü lele shonphang lemshang phang kaijembo nyi kho jinashi.
Lemshang shanga akasia buei kaang kümashi hoba kho thüka chinamei naanglepashi.
Hobaje kaang khühbü kho chikoma jinjan, khei yingsi ong lemshang jinei kaang kho jiji hama kilabü.
Nyi kho wa kuoktian kümjan; ngei ka la shongha lenbü tegü haoenei kho kümjan.
“Hobaje nyi neichem lemshang khongmaang kümashi. Chaang naphei shanga ji phainei khong shanga phemba nei maibüei shenbü iknop saongao, ji phei shanga kho soueiko kilabü;

hoba kho thaonyu saoche hoba khübünei yukleplabü chinamei kümbü saoche, hoba thaonyu saoche hoba khübünei yukleplabü chinamei kümbü saoche, hoba thaonyua anjin hoba chühjanla kümbü kho chandinam yingjan.
Hobaje kho tegü chanep aenei süng iknop saongao soueiko kilabü kijan, hoba kho thaonyu kho saoche hoba khübü küpla kho chinamei kümbü saoche, thaonyua anjin hoba chühjanlabü kho chandinam yingjan.
Hobaje chanep ae khongmaang shanga iknop anjinsem soueitaiko saüan kijan; khübü kho shanga thaonyu an hoba yukleplabü an.
Chaangbou chanyu phamshang ae khongmaang yo kho iknop anjinsem kijan.
Koukhün ji aedang iknop anthükngao soueitaiko kijan; khübü shanga thaonyu sem hoba yukleplabü shanga sem.
Hobaje che shangabü kho iknop anthükngao soueitaiko kijan, khübü kho shanga thaonyu sem hoba yukleplabü sem.

Hobaje koukhün shanga thangtet nei iknop saoche, hoba mühson, nakthüngan sakbü hoba sii tegü sakbü, hoba phemba neiei shenbü inyaibü noksa jinbüei kümbü kümsilei khübü thaonyu lei hoba yukleplabü lei.
Khonga thaonyu pendou kaijembo chandinamei khühlepjan, khübü anjin chandinam hoba yukleplabü kho chinam.
Khongmaang süng kho iknop saongao hoba khaang kho anjinsem, hoba suokla iknop ngao, shenbü phemba nei inyaibü hoba yukleplabü chandinam.
Lemshang neichema peisilei pendou kho jaangla jungeibü pendou kho hoba khongmaang shanga jaangla kümbü pendou kho chinamei yingjan.
“Nyi Israel shousi shuong to hon shanenbü hoba wanthung jiktian phola koshikbü onang ka jungto jungan loula ngühkhüm kushi.
Kamshang Neichem thangtet nei thükaenei laobou ngühkhüm busen thedanga ki khonei Aron hoba haoeibü shousi shuongei chasem ka ngeyang sühko
“Israel shousi shuong yoka kaibü jai Aron hoba hao yoa haoeibü shousi shuong, ungshedbou tegü ngo khangenla shanga ka jungto loutishi, khei Abihu, Eleazar, hoba Ithamar.
Nyi kaibü jai Aron shanga soneikangko hemaiko soumo shanga saopobü neisimei shikuashi.
Aronei kü shanga khümbo ungshedbou tegü khangenla shanga pendou to maangli maangsang müt hoba aoyoula sangbüdobü songsido kuan ki, haoenei Aron shanga lemjinei lebü neisimei hele shila nyi lenshi.

Haoenei shikulabü nei kho ho kilabü, khukua yuklabü nei che, hoba ungshedbou saopobü neisimei che, lompanbü mangsho che hoba khun che hoba shembe che, kho tegü ungshedbou kümaleia ngo khangenla shanga haoenei kaibü jai Aron hoba haoeibü shousi shuong shanga saopobü neisimei kümbujan.
Haoenei hon, müh son, nakthüngan sakbü, sii tegü sakbü hoba phemba nei inyaibü lejan.
Hobaje haoenei ungshedbou saopobü hele kho hon, müh son, nakthüngan sakbü, sii tegü sakbü hoba phemba nei woubü maibüei maangsangko kümjan.
Hobaje kho jijiham thona shenyoan phakshoka hangan jinshi hoba kho tegü shenyotishi.
Hobaje kho thüka wa nei kümbü kho phatko kümbü to jetei yeilabü, hon, müh son, nakthüngan sakbü sii tegü sakbü hoba phemba nei maibü shenbü.
Oniks laang penyi sungjung louan kho thüka Israelbü shousi shuong nyen laanga doashi;
Haoen pakbü tegü thenei thenko laang chenei lak hoba joubü lak kho lubü chenei thüngan doashi.
Laang thüngbü mütei laang thüngan nyen dobü tegü, nyi Israelbü shousi shuong nyen laang penyi khonei thüngan dojan hoba kho hon laang shona tonenan phojan.
Israelbü shousi shuong shanga damenlabü laang kila shanga phaka peian nei hanbü penyi thüka nyi kho phojan; hoba damenlabü shanga
Hobaje nyi honei kümjan;
hon lansanei namlüh penyi janglüh phatko küman nyi kho sapyoan kümjan; hoba sapyobü namlüh kho hon küpjina phojan.
“Hobaje nyi sangkodoko matjem khükhom Thükkabou ungshedbou saopobü neisimei hele lamlebü tegü nyi kümjan, hon, müh son, nakthüngan sakbü, sii tegü sakbü hoba shenbü phemba nei maibüei kho kümjan.
Kho nyek lei pendou jeteitei hoba nei kho nopyoan kijan, süng ikküm che hoba khaangkei ikküm che.
Hobaje khonei nyi namsek laang denjan, namsek laang lin lei; shaangbü lina sarsius, topaz, hoba karbankel laang shuong;
hoba nyiboubü lina emerald laang che, safair laang che hoba daimond laang che,
hoba saopobü lin kho jacint laang che, agate laang che, hoba amethia laang che,
leiboubü lin kho beryl laang che, oniks laang che, hoba jasper laang che, khübü den kho honei kailepjan.
Laang kho Israel shousi shuong anthüknyi nyen tegü kilabü; thüngan dobü nyen jangbü tegü, müt weko jembü nyen tegütham phang anthüknyi shanga habü ho kilabü.
Hobaje khukua yukbü thük khonei nyi yangmen tegü hon lansanei shenyoan namlüh kümjan.
Khukua yukjin khünei nyi honeibü chikom penyi jinjan thonbü ji jiham khonei chikom penyi kho jinjan.
Hobaje honei sapyobü namlüh penyi kho khukua yukjin kho thon aenei chikom penyi khonei nyi mongan jinkushi.
Hobaje sapyobü namlüh thon ham kho küpjin penyi thonbü aenei jinjan hoba kho phaka beibü ungshedbou saopobü hele nei thedanga phenashi.
Nyi honeibü chikom penyi kümashi, hoba nyi kho khukua yukjin thonbü penyia phenashi, ungshedbou saopobü neisimei maangaenei ho phenyoan kishi.
Hobaje nyi hon chikom penyi kümashi; kho thedanga sapyoshang, khei sangkodoko takbü shembe kaibü nei thükaenei phenashi.

Hobaje khukua yukjin kho sangkodoko takbü ungshedbou neisimei, shembe kaibü neisimei thüka khukua yukbü kho asoueitila shanga mühsonei shenbü neiei chikomei ungshedbou saopobü neisimeia kibü chikom khünei khübü khoei phenjan.
“Ladang ong Aron saopobü kaoen to atlaje damenlabü shanga Israelbü shousi shuongeibü nyen haoeneibü maangpon thüka matjembü khükhom kho haoei khühlabü.
Nyi matjembü khükhom thüka Urim si Thummim jijan, hoba
“Hobaje ungshedboueibü saopobü neisimei pendou kho pi kilabü.
Hobaje khünei khu attishang shanga jenyua khün yettian; hoba tokei kho phenjung asatla shanga ko shopjan.
Mangyuk pendou kaijembo chilang chipen son nakthüngko sakbü si sii tegü sakbü jinjan hoba khübü kanglanga kaijembo honeibü nüngnüng jinashi,
hon nüngnüng che chilang chipen che, dogo mangyuk kaijembo jinashi.
Aron lemla atjinei haoei kho yukjan; hoba hao ühaila shanga hao
“Nyi hon hinseibüei laangdak chenei lamlean nyen dobüa thüngan jinbü tegü, ‘
Hobaje nyi kho piei woubü to phenyoashi, hoba kho khuna jaanglabü hoba kho thedang aenei jinlabü.
Hobaje kho Aroneibü khüngjaa kilabü, hoba Israel shousi shuongei saopobü jongsak khümbo kubü pendoua saopobü peisilei shuong shanga haoenei shonshaibü shedbü pendou Aronei künjan, hoba haoen
“Nyi son lulueibü panpanlanlan takbü phemba nei inyaibüei mangyuk kümjan, hoba nyi phembaei mangyuk takjan hoba nyi phemba nei inyaibüei khuphai che hoba noksa jinan wa che kümjan.
“Aroneibü shousi shuong shanga haoen soneikangbü hoba he maipangteiko mangyuk, khude, hoba khun nyi kümashi.
Hobaje khübü kho nyi kaibü jai Aron hoba hao yoa shousi shuong la yukkuashi, hoba haoenei ungshedboueibü kümsilei khangenlabü, haoen la onang naangkuko, khümbo kuko, haoen saüenan phokushi.
Haoen mütkong kibü küplepla nyi haoen la neisimei shenjang ka youshi sühko shikujan.

Hobaje ladang neichem lemshang to atlaje ayingsi ladang haoen saopobü kaoen nyangko lemla loulaje khübü kho Aron si haoeibü shousi shuong to kilabü, khonei haoen to shed ashonlabü hoba ühailabü; kho ponpen shanga hao hoba hao ka pakbü shuong shanga ngühkhüm kilabü.
“Tou nyi kümlabü ho, Aron hoba hao shousi shuong saüenan ungshed kümsileia ngo khangenla shanga nyi haoen to ho hai kümshi. Nali athebü masu pongsu shoushou che hoba sanlon paang penyi,
hoba tokai ajinbü wentek, hoba oliv onang kheiyobü wentek hoba onang kheibü wentek sungba. Nyi khübü kho whet wen maibouthamei kümjan.
Nyi khübü kho kam chenei jinshi hoba masu pongsu si sanlon paang penyi yo khünei sungba.
“Hobaje nyi Aron hoba hao shousi shuong Kamshang Neichem koukhün khüto leijung louan nyi haoen la mang yutiashi.

Nyi neisimei kho sungjung louan mangyuk si ungshedbou saopobü helea kaakbü neisimei hoba ungshedbou saopobü neisimei kho hoba khukua yukbü kho nyi Aron la lekuashi hoba shanan takbü ungshedbü saopobü neisimeia khude khoei shenashi;
hoba nyi khude haoeibü khua hankushi, hoba saopobü khun kho khude thüka hankushi.
Nyi naangkulabü onang sungjung louan haoeibü khua jonan jinkushi, hoba hao la naangkushi.
“Hobaje nyi haoeibü shousi shuong leijung louan haoen la mangyuk yukkuashi.

Aron hoba haoeibü shousi shuong la khudeei nyi kaikushi, hoba haoenei khun hankushi; hoba ponpen shanga ngühkhümei haoenei ungshed kümsilei kümlabü; hoba nyi Aron si haoeibü shousi shuong khümbo kutiashi.
“Kamshang Neichem thedangto nyi masu pongsu kho sungbajan; hoba Aron si haoeibü shousi shuongei khoeibü khua ikei shangetjan.
Hobaje Neichem lemshang kouthea
Masu pongsueibü sii khüka sungan lemshanga ngoulaang thung kümbü khonei kaibü ikjishouei naangashi hoba joubü kho lemshang youjunga jonshi.
Hobaje maangpin haabü pendou, hoba senmang yukbü hoba kelang penyi hoba kho thüka kibü haabü sungan nyi lemshanga jikashi.
Lausikei masu pongsu phe, haoeibü khon, khoeibü phet nyi shaishang napheinei wana jikan apashi, kho shabü lembü ki.
“Nyi tokei sanlon paang khokei sungan Aron si haoeibü shousi shuongei khoeibü khua ikei shangetlabü.
Hobaje nyi sanlon paang kho wapettiashi, hoba nyi khoeibü sii kho sungan lemshang kaijembo lakashi.
Hobaje nyi sanlon paang kho netla yeiko jemnyinjan, khoeibü sensimaang hoba youshuong kho sakan apashi, jemnyinan kibü kho khu thüka phoashi.
Sanlon paang khümbo kho nyi lemshang thüka juokashi, kho
“Hobaje tokei nyi lubü sanlon paang sungbajan, hoba Aron si haoeibü shousi shuongei haoeneibü ikei sanlon paangeibü khua shangetjan.

Kheijinei nyi sanlon paang kho wapettijan hoba haoeibü sii sungan Aroneibü mae nou hotena hoba haoeibü shousi shuong mae nou hotena hoba haoeibü mae ikpema hoba haoeibü mae youbema naangkuashi, hoba kho phaia lemshang kaijembo lakashi.
Hobaje lemshanga kibü sii hoba naanglabü onang nyi sungjung louan kho Aron hoba haoeibü neisimei hoba hao yoa shousi hoba haoeneibü neisimeia lakkuashi, kho phaia saüenkushi.

“Toukei nyi sanlon paangeibü haabü, meia haabü, hoba maanga yukan kibü haabü hoba sena yukbü haabü hoba kelang penyi hoba kho thüka kibü haabü hoba mae youshi sungashi, aieilausi ho khümbo kubü sanlon paang ki.
Hobaje wentek yangbü che, hoba onang jinbü wentek on che, hoba tokai ajinbü wentek peklebü che,
Hobaje pendou kho nyi Aroneibü ika hoba haoeibü shousi shuongeibü ika phokushi; hoba
Hobaje nyi haoeneibü ik ka khübü kho sungashi hoba
“Kheijinei Aron naangenbü shangabü khümbo kubü sanlon paangeibü khük kho nyi sungjan hoba kho soueibü lembü tegü
“Aron si haoeibü shousi shuong shanga shanenbü sanlon paang hoba lembü yoshaibü youshi, nyi janenan phojan.
Kho Israelbü shousi shuong ka Aron hoba haoeibü shousi shuong ponpen shanga haoeneibü phejan kilabü, aieilausi kho maangmai kubü lembü ki; Israelbü shousi shuong ka haoeneibü sangmai lembü ki.
“Hobaje Aroneibü saopobü neisimei kho hao phainei haoeibü shousi shuong shanga kilabü, kho homan haoenkei khübü thüka saüenko naangenla shanga.
Ladang hao jeibü shou neichem lemshang to loulaje haoei kho chalou nyetnyet yukjan.
“Hobaje nyi khümbo kubü sanlon paang sungjung louan saoposhanga ho phe thungjan.
Hobaje neichem koukhüna Aron si haoeibü shousi shuongei sanlon shoushou phe hoba kama kibü wentek kho shaujan.
Haoen khümbo kula hoba saüenla shanga laobouei silip jakei, khübü peisilei kho haoenei shaula thükkei, lausikei kho pendoueije ashaujan; aieilausi khübü kho saopobü ki.
Khümbo kubü phe kho ayingsi wentek at ngeyang sühko jouan kialonga kheijinei nyi kho wana jikan apashi.
“Kho tegü Aron si haoeibü shousi shuong to ngei ka la sakkubü pendou kümashi, chalou nyet nyet lepde nyi haoen khümbo kutiashi.
Shabü apla shanga chalou weko masu pongsuei lemashi, hoba kho shanga nyi shabü apla küman phaia nyi lemshang kho saüenjan, kho saopotham yeitila shanga nyi onang naangashi.
Chalou nyetnyet nyi lemshang shanga noukosouko saüenlabü hoba lemshang kho saopotham kilabü, hoba aiei ong lemshanga meitilaje saopoko kilabü.
“Lemshanga nyi ho lemjan; chalou angboua athakko sanlon po cheeibü nyibang.
Nyi sanlon shoushou che ngeyang lemjan;
shaangboubü sanlon kho wennet inyaibü efa chenei anboubü phejan, koshikbü onang hin chenei leiboubü phejan, hoba yunglabü lemla shanga ih hin chenei phejan leiboubüei nyi lemjan.
Hobaje sanlon che kho chasem lemjan, hoba ngeyang shausiyung lembü tegü hoba yunglabü lembü tegü kho ponlem maibü shanga wanei
Kho kaneibü meten shanga
Hobaje khünei ngei Israel shousi shuong to haüyolabü; hoba neichem kho soneikangbüei saüenlabü.
Hobaje ngei Kamshang Neichem hoba lemshon saüenlabü; tokei Aron si haoeibü shousi shuong müilingbü kümsileiei ngo khangenla shanga ngei saüenlabü.
Hobaje ngo Israel shousi shuong yoa kilabü, hoba ngo haoeneibü Mühghaü yinglabü.
Hobaje ngo haoen yoa kila shanga haoen Ijep kaodak ka leiyenbü
“Jen juoklabü shanga nyi akasia buei lemshang shon che kümashi.
Kho süng si khaang jeteitei, süng iknop che, khaang iknop che, hoba suokla iknop penyi, khonei laang kho jetei kilabü.
Hobaje thükaenei hoba napheinei kaijembo hoba khonei laang kho hon lanbüei naanglepashi; hoba kho kaiko honei kailepan kümashi.
Hobaje jijiham naphei thüka honei naanglepan kibü phang khonei honeibü chikom nyibang kümashi, hoba khübü künla shanga khün yettilabü.
Hobaje nyi kaang kho akasia buei kümlabü hoba khonei honei naanglepshi.
Ngühkhüm busen thüka onoubü setshang thedanga lanei ngo ka to haüyola, khonei ngühkhüm busen nyangko kibü thangtet nei thedanga nyi kho phoashi.
Hobaje Aronei kho thüka ponlemhibü jen juoklabü; ngeyang weko haoei hantin lamlejinei kho jiklabü.
Ladang Aronei chasem wan saplaje haoei jen kho
Kho thüka nyi saopobü jen ayingsi juokbü lembü ayingsi shausiyung lembü asungletjan; hoba kanei kho thüka yunglabü lembü aikei ajonkujan.
Shabü hangletla shanga shabü lembü kubü ka siiei laang to naangkuko poa che Aroneibü shabü hangletla kümbü yoa kaneibü meten sünga poa shabü hangletla kümashi.
Hobaje
“Ladang nyi Israel shousi shuong lühbak wean chühlaje nyi kheijinei haoen yoa khonsak khonku akila shanga, haoen mütpem wekoei
lühbaka yoan kibü haoen müt wekoei, kho lemshang kabü shekel thoche kujan,
Aoyou lühbaka yoan ki, po saoche ka thükae kabü mütshuongei
Kaneibü shabü hangletla shanga
Nyi shabü debü nam kho Israel shousi shuong ka lejan, hoba kho Kamshang Neichem kümsilei shanga thanan phoshi, kho kaneibü shabü dela shanga
Kheijinei
“Nyi chinamei phauyaang kümashi hoba sakla shanga denshang kho chinamei kümashi; hoba nyi kho Kamshang Neichem si lemshang kanglanga phoashi.
Aron si hao shousi shuongei you si ik maklabü.
Haoen ladang kamshang neichem khüto atlaje, ayingsi ladang haoenei khangenla shanga lemshang nyangko louan wanei
Kho tegü haoen ühaila shanga you si ik deiei sakjan, hoba kho haoen shanga hoba hao, hoba haoeibü lilabü shanga haoen meten meten ponpen shanga ngühkhüm che kilabü.”
“Ponlem hilabü jen dei shekel saongao ngao, ponlem hibü phoulo shekel saoanto anjinsem, ponlem hibü teibü shekel saoanto anjinsem,
hoba kashia saongao ngao saoposhang ka takbü kibü tegü oliv hin che, nyi sungba;
nyi ponlem hibü kümbouei kümbü ponlem tegü saopobü naanglabü onang kilabü.
Hobaje khoei Kamshang Neichem hoba ngühkhüm busen,
hoba khümsok hoba thung si phau pendou, hoba wanthung hoba kho shanga peisilei hoba jenjuok lemshang,
hoba juokbü lembü hoba thungsiphau pendou hoba phauyaang denshang nyi khoei naangashi.
Hobaje kho pendou to saopobou yeila shanga nyi khübü kho saüenan phoshi; khübü khoto aiei ong meitilaje saopobü kilabü.
Aron hoba hao shousi shuongei müilingbü kümsileiei ngo khangenla shanga nyi haoen naangenko saüenan phokushi.
Hobaje nyi Israel shousi shuong to joyoko lenshi. Ho kü junga kan meten meten saopobü naangbü onang kilabü.
Mütmang to ho hakan ajinkulabü ayingsi ho onang phatko lubü ai akümjan. Ho saüenbü, hoba kanei ho saopobü dogo weeijan.
Aoyouei ong hoto phatko kheiyolaje ayingsi aoei ong ho küksithangbü la jinkulaje hao jembü mütli ka wapan aplabü.”
hoba kho ponlem hibü kümbouei kümbü tegü jem jinan hinseibü hoba saopobü nyi hoei kümashi;
hoba kho atje netla yeiko ngünan kamshang neichema ngühkhüm busen thedanga phokushi, khünei ngo ka to haüyolabü; kho ka shanga saopotham kilabü.
Hobaje ponlem laobou nyi kümlaje, kheiyobü tegütham nyi jembü shanga akümjan; kho
Aoyouei ong kho phatko ponlem hibü kümlaje, hao jembü mütli ka wapan aplabü.”
Kheijinei
“Chühashi, ngei Urieibü jayangshou Hureibü shi, nyenei Bezalel Jihuda mütli ka piena.
Songadoa, ditenbüa, ditletbü songadoa, hoba kümbüleibü phang pendoua
hon, chindinam, hoba chinamei maangli maangsang kümsilei kümla,
hanan jinla namsek laang wapnyinla hoba bu jakbü kümsilei liplipa kümbü pendoua Mühghaü soushouei ngei hao shentia.
Hobaje chühashi, ngei hao yoa Ahisamakeibü shou Dan mütli ka Oholiab piena; hoba songsihon kibü maangpon pendoua haoenei ngei ka la sakkubü pendou kümla shanga ngei haosi la songsido jinkua.
Kamshang Neichem ngühkhüm busen, hoba kho thüka kibü onoubü setshang hoba neichema peisilei pendou,
hoba khümsok si thungsiphau hoba hon lanbü wanthung denshang hoba kho shanga peisilei pendou hoba jen juokbü lemshang,
hoba juokbü lemshang chaksiam hoba thung pendou hoba phauyaang hoba jinlabü denshang,
hoba hemaiko kümbü neisimei shuong hoba Aron ungshed kümsilei shangabü saopobü hele, hoba ungshed kümsileia khangenla shanga haoeibü shousi shuong neisimei,
hoba naangkulabü onang hoba saopobü kaoen shanga jen ponlem maibü ngei ka la sakkubü tegütham haosiei pendou kümjan.”
Kheijinei
“Nyi Israel shousi shuong to hai joyoko lenashi: Maimaitham kanei ngeibü nou noujan, aieilausi kan saüenan phokubou

Hibü kanei Nounyet noujan, aieilausi kan shanga ho saopobü ki; müt wekoei aoei ho shatilaje haoje haitilabü; aishanga aoyouei Nounyet kümsilei denche ongkei kümlaje, kho müt jembü mütli ka wapan aplabü.
Chalou laknyet kouko ungko kümaleiashi, lausikei nyetbounyet saopotham noulabü chalou,
Khoei Israel shousi shuongei athakko haoenei meten meten nou jungeila nou noujan.
Hoei ngo hoba Israel shousi shuong kanglanga ponpen shanga tetsida che ki; aieilausi chalou laknyeta
Hobaje Sinai shongha hao to ngüh joyokhüman phaia haoei Mosa la Mühghaüeibü ikjishouei dobü ngühkhüm laangdak penyi kukei.

Ladang Mosa shongh ka louyenla phaikei, mütshuong haoen lolo liko Aron jungto yoshaian hao to laukei, “Kün thedanga haula kün la mühghaü kümbushi, aieilausi Mosa aoei kün Ijep kaodak ka leiyenan leijung loukei, hao ai yeikei, künei angekei.”
Hobaje Aronei haoen to laukei, “Kaneibü yaksi shuong, kaneibü jayang nouyang shousi shuongeibü nou ka honeibü chipen sungenashi hoba kü jungto sungba.”
Hobaje müt pendouei lulueibü noua kibü chinam si chinong sungenan Aron jungto sungbakei.
Hobaje haoei haoeneibü ik ka sungletan khübü peisilei tühnyintian masu paangshou che yaükei.
Hobaje mütshuongei laukei, “O Israel, ho seneibü mühghaü yingshi, aoei sen Ijep ka leian loukei.”
Hobaje Aronei kho hapjinei haoei kho thedanga lemshon che dangkei, hoba Aronei ngekko laukei, “Ngiet
Hibü haoenei ngeyang enyu pian juokbü lembü kukei, hoba sangmai lembü jungan loukei; hoba mütshuong shaula yungla setkei, haoen louyojayo pejapela la khangkei.
ei Mosa to laukei, “Yanashi, aieilausi kaibü mütshuong aoyou nyi Ijep ka leiyenan loukei haoen lolo amaiko yeia.

Ngei haoen la sakkubü lam ka tongde sepeijung sada; haoenei masu paangshou che phatko heangsho che haoen shanga yaüan kho lema hoba khola lembüsabü kua, hoba haoenei laukei, ‘O Israel, habü ho kaibü mühghaü ki, haoei no Ijep ka leiyenan leijung loukei!’”
ei Mosa to laukei, “Ngei habü mütshuong hapa, hoba chühashi, habü maangpon kaangbü shuong ki;
hibü haoen khulimbo ngeibü maangshat yaang longan haoen shemtilabü; hibü tou kü mütpem apyoashi; hoba ngei no phang yaangbü che yeitilabü.”
Mosaei

Amaibü shanga haoei haoen leiyenan leijung loukei, shongha haoen haitila hoba kaothe ka haoei haoen mautila shanga, dogo aila Ijepbü la laueitila? No hatlamoklabü khauang lotbü ka sepeiashi, hoba kaibü mütshuong khulimbo amaibü kümla kibü ka kaibü maangpon jakshaiashima.

No khangenbü Abraham, Isak hoba Israel haoen to nyi no lolo thekolanko laubü kho damenashi: ‘Müha khanshoulitshou tegü ngei kaibü lilabü haatilabü, hoba ngei ho kaodak shanga lenyobü pendou ka la kulabü, hoba kho pendou shanga haoenei phanlabü.’”
ei jembü mütshuong to kümlabü laubü ka haoeibü maangpon sepeikei.
Mosa sepeijung ngaian haoeibü ika ngühkhüm dobü laangdak penyi kho jungan shongh ka louyenkei, kho jijihama dobü laangdak kikei; kho hinei hoba thineikei dogo doan kikei.
Hobaje laangdak shuong kho Mühghaüeibü kümsilei kikei, hoba dobü kho Mühghaüei laangdaka thüngenan dobü kikei.
Mütshuongei ngekjinei Joshuaei haoeneibü ngühlang ditan Mosa to laukei, “Shaishanga wapyobü ngühlang kia.”
Mosaei jongaikei, “Ngühlang kho thükbü shangabü ngühlang aying, ayingsi ngühlang ho athük hapan lemenyobü ngühlang aying, lausikei ho chia laubü shuong ngühlang ngei ditda.”
Hao shaishang nyangko lousi, masu paangshou hoba mütshuong tombülakbü hapbei, hoba Mosa aeibou khauangkei, hoba haoei haoeibü ik ka laangdak khübü kho tekan apbei, hoba kho shongh youa phetnyinkei
Hobaje haoenei yaübü masu paangshou kho haoei sungjung louan wana jikan apbei, hoba kho thamngu la yeiko ngünan deitaka phinan jinan kho Israel shousi shuong la yungtikei.
Hobaje Mosaei Aron to laukei, “Nyi habü mütshuong la shabü hatetche shontilabü lele haoenei ka la ai kümbukei?”
Aronei laukei, “Ngeibü
Aishanga haoenei kü to laukei, ‘Kün thedanga haula künla mühghaü kümbushi, aieilausi Mosa aoei kün Ijep kaodak ka leiyenan leijung loukei, hao aila yeikei künei angekei.’
Hobaje ngei haoen to laukei, ‘Aoei hon ki, kho sungenashi’; hibü haoenei kho sungenan kü la kukei, hoba kho ngei wana jinkei, hoba khoka masu paangshou longkei.”
Ladang mütshuong thepetla athükko Mosaei hapbei; (aieilausi dangbou shuong yoa haoen la nyikulabü lele Aronei haoen ngoualoua aptia.)
Kheijinei Mosaei shaishang bakhüna loan laukei, “Aoyou
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Israel Mühghaü
Hobaje Levibü shuongei Mosaeibü ngüh tegü kümbei, hoba khünyet müt hajar sem thüng tuongkei.
Mosaei laukei, “Tat kanei lulueibü shousi hoba lulueibü jaisina haitibü lembüei
Nyibounyet Mosaei mütshuong to laukei, “Kanei shedbü yaang shona, hoba tou ngo
Mosa toukei
Khei yinga tegükei, nyi haoeneibü shedbü apbuma; khei tekümbho lausije, ngei ka to sudajada, nyi doan phobü kaibü le ka nyi ngeibü nyen haman apashi.”
Lausikei

Tou hauashi, hoba ngei ka to lenbü kaonyek khüto mütshuong leian hauashi; chühashi, ngeibü hangangbü ka thedanga haulabü; khei yingsikei ngei shieikoelabü chaloua ngei haoeneibü shedbü shanga shieikoelabü.”
Hobaje
Kheijinei
Hobaje ka thedangto hangangbü che ngei hautikho hoba Kananbü, Amorbü, Hitbü, Perizbü, Hivbü hoba Jebusbü shian apbulabü.
Sendei si naodei kouko kibü kaonyek khüto angashi; lausikei kan maangpon kaangbü mütshuong yingbü ka ngei kan lama mautisi amaibüla ngoje kan yoto teloukho.”
Ladang mütshuongei kho ngüh ditkei, haoen maanghaapbei hoba haoen aoeikei honeibü chinem yakmen aleko apbei.
Aishanga
Hibü Israelbü shuongei Horeb shongh kaje haoeneibü hele haoen lolo hangletkei.
Ladang ong Israelbü shuongei shaishang kümbei, Mosaei khoka longche bangan neichem dangko lekei; hoba haoei khüto “Shuokshang Neichem” dogo laukei. Hobaje müt atei
Ladang ong Mosa neichem khüto atkei, müt pendou lokei, mütpem weko lulueibü neichem koukhüna, hoba neichem khüto ütshongko Mosa to nyek pükan chühko kikei.
Kho tegü Mosa neichem to atan, Mosaei
Ladang ong mütshuongei sangmei thaonyu kho neichem koukhüna loan hapbei mütpem weko lulueibü neichem koukhüna loan lembei.
Müt cheei jembü thangbou to joyobü tegü
Mosaei
Hibü ngei tou ka to sudajada, ka thedanga ngei onou hapbei yingalonga, ngei ka thedanga onou hapla shanga tou kaibü lamnyu shuong kü la lenbüma: hoba ho phang ho kaibü phang dogo daman chühshima.”
Kheijinei Mosaei hao to laukei, “No yobü kün yoa ohaulonga kün haka leian tüangma.

Aieilausi ai ka ngo hoba kaibü eikshuongei ka thedanga onou hapa dogo ngela thükla? Kaonyudaka kibü mütshuong pendou yo ka ngo hoba kaibü eikshuong kün phang mütli che yeitilabü lele no kün yoa haubüei aying lo?”
Hobaje
Kheijinei Mosaei laukei, “Kü la tou kaibü soneikangbü lenbüma.”
Lausikei haoei laukei, “Nyi kü the hapla athük, aieilausi mütei ngo hapan lang kila athük.”
Kheijinei
Ladang ngeibü soneikangbü danjung haulaje ngei no laangkokloka phokukho hoba ngo adankhüm shongko ngeibü ikei no kapleplabü.
Kheijinei ngei ngeibü ik kuktikho hoba nyi ngeibü tak haplabü, lausikei ngeibü thenyekje ühüplabü.”
Ngeyang kho lamlean kiteishi, hoba Sinai shongh to ngeyang kaiyang hoba kho shongh khua no boushou kü thedanga kiteishi.
Ka yoa aokei aloujan, ayingsi shongha lankei aokei ühüptijan; ayingsi sanlon shuong ayingsi masu shuong kho shongh thedanga alamshautijan.”
Hibü Mosaei shaangla tegü haoei laangdak penyi thüngkei; hoba ngeyang enyu pian
Kheijinei

Hajar, hajar, shanga onou lenda, shedtibü si ngühkhüm lulimbü hoba shabü shanga amai apbuda; lausikei khoei ladangkei shedbü shonbü saopotham ayeitida; nyusibousi shuong shedbü shanga shisi shousi shuong thükto meten sembou leiboubü to sühko phoklamda.”
Hobaje Mosaei tongde kaoae haoeibü khu khüpetkei hoba lembei.
Haoei laukei, “Tou ka thedanga ngei kaibü maangshikbü hapan kialonga, O
Kheijinei
Ngei ka la sakkubü nyi tat chühletan phoshi, chühashi, Kananbü, Hitbü, Perizbü, Hivbü hoba Jebusbü ka thedang ka shian sattilabü.
No haushanga kibü kaonyek kabü mütshuong to sangmai teküm, aieilausi khübü kho ka shanga sung che yeibüla no jembü lolo maangsangashi.
Aeiko kanei haoeneibü lemshang netla yeiko jangnyinkujan hoba haoeneibü thaonyu netla yeiko wapyinkushi hoba haoeneibü saopobü thaonyu hoba haoeneibü haatjang kanei wetan attikushi.
“Aieilausi kanei lubü mühghaü aikei alemjan aishanga
Aingenyu kaonyeka kibü mütshuong to kan jiyophaiyosi haoeneibü mühghaü phai pejapelako semlanglabü, hoba haoeneibü mühghaü to lemlasalabü hoba atei ho ngealonga kanei lembüsabü phe shaulabü;

hoba kaneibü nouyang jayangshousi shuongei haoeneibü nouyang jayangshousi shuong ngatilabü hoba haoeneibü nouyang jayangshousi shuongei haoeneibü mühghaü phai semtilabü hoba haoeneibü shousi shuong haoeneibü mühghaü phai pejapelako semtilabü.
“Nyi jembü shanga namei mühghaü teküm.
“Tokai ajinbü wentek lem maisho lijan, ngei ka la sakkubü tegü chalou nyetnyet, Abib lita saopoenbü penbü chalou nyi tokai ajinbü wentek shaujan; aieilausi Abib lita no Ijep ka longkei.
“Shaang bukbü, shaang shatbü, shatsinam hoba samkeisamuk pendou ngeibü.
Shaang shatbü gadu san shoushou cheei angthetshi; nyi kho üangthetlonga haoeibü ngüm sükthetkujan, kanei shaang bukbü shou pendou angthetjan.
“Aokei kü jungto ik kong aloujan.
“Chalou laknyet kanei kan shanga kümlabü, lausikei nyetbounyet haksoashi, youshap chalouakei hoba youlat jihakei no haksojan.
“Nyi balelem jinpünglem yoa nouashi, kho shaangbou whet latbü hoba po thonbü langle küpjembü lem.
“Poa semnei sühko kan bousu shuong pendou
Aieilausi kan thedanga phangshuong shian sattikho hoba kaneibü leilang yaangtikukho; ayingsi kan poa semnei
“Lemla haitibü sii kho kanei tokai jinbü wentek yoa alemjan, ayingsi khümenbü shanga haitibü kho nyibounyet ngeyang sühko aphojan.
“Kaneibü kao ka shaangboubü buhek ka maiboutham kanei kaneibü
“Kanei lonshou nyunyueibü sendeia tethung.”
Kheijinei
Khonei Mosa
Ladang Mosa Sinai shongh ka ika laangdak penyi kho jungan louyenkei, Mosa Mühghaü to joyoan phaia haoeibü thenyek son kho lailaitham kia dogo haoei hao lolo angengaiko kikei.
Aron si Israel shousi shuong pendouei Mosa hapjinei, chühashi, haoeibü thenyek son lailaitham kikei, hoba hao jungto nyangko loula haoen hatko kikei.
Lausikei Mosaei haoen ngakei, kheijinei Aron hoba shuong leiyeibü pendou hao jungto sepeinyu longeikei, hoba Mosaei haoen to joyokei.
Kho phaia Israel shousi shuong pendou nyangko loukei, hoba Sinai shongha
Ladang Mosaei haoen to joyokhümbei, haoei haoeibü thenyek yuklepbei, hoba Mosaeibü thenyek soneikangko hapbei, kheijinei Mosaei
Lausikei
Hobaje Mosaeibü thenyek Israel shousi shuongei soneikangko hapbei. Hobaje Mosaei
Mosaei Israel shousi shuong ngashaian haoen to laukei, “Habü ngüh ho jungeila
Chalou laknyet kanei kümaleiashi, lausikei nyetbounyet kan shanga saopobü chalou kilabü.
Kanei Nounyet kan kishang pendoua wan ametjan.”
Mosaei Israel mütshuong pendou to laukei, “
Kanei kibü ka
Semjeibü, nakthüngan sakbü, saklangbü, phembanei, nei inyaibü hoba loneibü wi;
hoba sanlon paangeibü khon saklangtham apbo hambü, loneibü khon hoba akasia bu;
hoba ngesakbü shanga hantin, naanglabü shanga onang hoba ponlem hibü teibü shanga shikmei mailabü;
hoba oniks laang hoba ungshedbou saopobü neisimei hoba khükhoma jinlabü namseklaang shuong.
“Hobaje kan yoa maangli maangsang mütshuongei louan
Lemshang neichem kho neichem yuklepbü, hoeibü khangyolabü, hoba wa, thangtet, thaonyu hoba kho thangleplabü:
saopobü busen hoba khonei kaang shuong, onou setshang yuklepbü thangbü nei,
hoba khumsok, khoeibü kaang, chaksiam hoba Mühghaü thedanga phokubü wentek:
Tokei ngesakbü shanga wanthung hoba kho shanga peisilei hantin, hoba ngesakbü shanga onang.
Hobaje jen ponlem juokshang si kaang, hoba naanglabü onang, ponlem teibü, hoba lemshang neichem koukhüna thangbü,
juokbü lembü lemshang, chinameibü shon, khoeibü kaang hoba kho denshang.
Lemshang chemsophanga ajinkhümbü shuong, thaonyu shuong hoba khübü hanleplabü hoba lemshang chemsophang koukhüna thangbü;
lemshang neichem shanga anjin hoba khongaenei anjin hoba khübü janglüh shuong;
lemshanga khangenla shanga maisho takbü neisimei hoba mülingbü kümaleia khangenla shanga Aron müilingbou shanga saopobü neisimei hoba haoeibü shousi shuongeibü hele.”
Kheijinei Israel shousi shuong pendou Mosa jungka kukkei;
hoba kamshang neichem kümsilei shanga hoba khoeibü kümsilei pendou shanga hoba saopobü neisimei shanga mütpem wekoei luluei mangangbü tegü hoba jembü soushouei thungeibü tegü
Bousu yaksa mütpem wekoei luluei maangangbü tegü neia kipbü, noua chibü, ngüma yakbü, nyendobü ikjikhap, hoba honeibü namsek peisilei pendou hoba mütpem wekoei

Mütpem weko aoeibü ika pi, nakthüngan sakbü, saklo maibü phembanei inyaibü, loneibü wi, sanlon khon, wailüha thungbü hoba sanlon paangeibü khon wailüha thungbü hoba loneibü khon kikei khübü kho jungan loukei.
Aoyouei hon si chinameibü lemla thükan kikei haoenei
Hobaje maangli maangsangbü yaksa wekoei maangnyu angko lei shikkei hoba haoenei shikbü lei, pi lei, nakthüngan sakbü, pa lei, phembanei inyaibü sungbakei.
Thit thitbü songbüdobü yaksa wekoei loneibü wiei keiwi shikkei.
Hobaje songdakbü shuongei müilingbü saopobü hele nei hoba khükhoma khangla shanga oniks namsek laang sungbakei;
hoba haoenei tokei shikmei maibü, ngesakbü shanga wandei hoba naanglabü shanga onang, ponlem sa angtila juoklabü jen sungbakei.
Israelbü bousu yaksa pendouei maangnyu angbü lembü
Mosaei Israel shousi shuong to laukei, “Chühashi, Jihuda phang ka Horeibü shi, Urieibü shou Bezalel nyenbü
hao songadoa, ditenbüa, hoba ditletbü songadoa hoba dobüshibü kümsilei phang pendoua;
hoba hao hon, chandinam, hoba chinamei kümbü dobüshibü chühjanbü kümsilei shanga,
hoba namsek laang pheinyinnyin khangbüa hoba bu jakbü kümaleia ikseibü müt shanga hao
Hobaje haoei hao Dan phang ka Ahisamakeibü shou Oholiab, ham haoeibü kümsilei lubü la lenla thüklabü lele haoeibü maangpona sei kua.

Iksei kümsilei yaangbü kümla chühjanbü kümsilei ikpeisei kümsilei kümbou hoba semjeibü, nakthüngan sakbü, saklangbü, hoba phembaneiei noksa jinan kümbü kümsilei hoba neitakbü kümsilei, kümsilei yaangbü den juong kümbü shuong khübü kümsilei kümla haoei haoen la songsido kukei.
“Hibü
Kheijinei Mosaei Bezalel hoba Oholiab, hoba songbüdobü müt aoyou la
Hobaje Israel shousi shuongei lemshang kümsilei shanga dangla jungan loubü lembü pendou Mosa ka hiletkei. Tokei haoenei ngeyang webü maangmai lembü jungan loukei.
Hibü iksei kümsilei kümbü mütshuong pendou aoyouei lemshang kümsilei pendou kümbei haoen mütpem wekoei jembü kümsilei apyokei.
Hobaje haoenei Mosa to laukei, “Kümsilei kümla
Hibü Mosaei ngühkhüm che kukei, hoba haoenei kho shaishang pendoua ngekko paiko laukei, “Bousu yaksa aoeikei touje lemshang shanga lembü teyoshai;” kho tegü mütshuongei sungbabü shiletkei.
Aishanga haoenei kibü lembü peisilei

Haoen yoa kümsilei kümbü iksei kümsilei ka müt wekoei lemshang neichema thangbü nei an yoan dangkei, shenbü phembanei maibü pi, nakthüngan sakbü, saklangbü hoba iksei kümsilei kümbüei dangbü kaakyembü kherabim khübü kümbei.
Thangtet nei weko kho tousüng iknop saotoset, hoba phodak iknop leibang hoba thangtet nei pendou kho takbü jetei ong kikei.
Haoenei thangtet nei ngao kho chela shenyokei; hoba lubü thangtet nei ngaokei chela shenyokei.
Hobaje thangtet nei chela yeitibü neithona nei-ik kho haoenei pilaüei kom kho kümbei.
Thangtet nei chenei haoenei kom anjinsem, hoba nyiboubü shenyobü thonakei haoenei kom anjinsem kümbei; kom kho chenei kibü kho jitokei jian kikei.
Hobaje haoenei honei anjin anjinsem kümbei, thangtet nei kho cheei che to anjin khoei anyotikei, hibü khoei lemshang neichem kho che ong kikei.
Lemshang neichem thüka neichem shanga thangtet nei loneibü wiei haoenei kümbei; haoenei thangtet nei kho anthükche kümbei.
Thangtet nei weko tousüng iknop khujin kikei, hoba phodak iknop lei; thangtet nei anthükche kho pendou takbü jetei ong kikei.
Khübü thangtet nei ngao kho haoei liko shenyotikei hoba thangtet nei lak kho chela shenyotikei.
Hobaje shenyobü thükaenei thona haoenei kom anjinsem kümbei hoba nyiboubü shenyobü nei thüka thonbüa haoenei kom anjinsem kümbei.
Hobaje neichem liko chela yeitila shanga haoenei chinamei anjin anjinsem kümbei.
Kheijinei haoenei neichem küplepla shanga sanlon paangeibü khon paa hambü haoenei kümbei, hoba thükaenei loneibü khonei küpjin kümbei.
Haoenei neichem shanga akasia buei tangsheitham huongkei.
Kamtak weko takbü tousüng iknop an hoba phodak iknop che tho.

Haoenei tokei akasia buei angkhüm ngao kümbei; lemshang neichem jipheinei ngao,

Hobaje haoenei thangtet nei kho pilaü, nakthüngan sakbü, saklangbü hoba shenbü phembanei maibüei kümbei, iksei kümsileiei haoenei kaakyembü kherabim yoan kümbei.
Haoenei akasia buei thaonyu lei küman thüka honei naanglepbei; khübü anjin kho hon kikei, hoba khübü shanga haoenei chandinam hangan jinlabü chandinam lei yotikei.

Haoei hon lanbüei onoubü setshang kümbei; kho tousünga iknop penyi tho hoba phodaka iknop che tho.

Wanthung denshang kho haoei hon lanbüei kümbei, wanthung denshang khoeibü chungthem hoba mang haoei jangan yentian kümbei; khoeibü thung shuong; khoeibü tongbü, hoba khoeibü chipen shuong kho khüto jetei kikei.
Kho ka bhek pem lak phekjung satan kikei;

Hobaje
Hobaje haoei khükhom kho ungshedbou saopobü hele tegü, iksei kümsileiei kümbei; kho hon, pilaü, nakthüngan sakbü, saklo maian sakbü, hoba shenbü phembanei maibüei kümbei,
kho naphei lei pendou jetei kikei; khükhom kho haoenei nyinei nopan kümbei, tousüng ikküm che, hoba phodak ikküm che, kho penyi thüng kikei.

Hobaje nyiboubü lina emerald che, safair che, hoba daimond che,
hoba semboubü lin jacint che, aget che, amethis che.

Hobaje haoenei hon chikom penyi kümbei, hoba ungshedbou saopobü neisimei maanga thona khükhom thonbü penyi thüka kho phenkei.
Hobaje haoenei chikom penyi kümbei hoba kho ungshedbou saopobü neisimei thedanga phakshoka thipbü penyi khüto phenkei, kho maang aenei shenyoshang nyangko shembe kaibü thüka.
ei Mosa la sakkubü tegü, khükhom kho shembe kaibü thüka kilabü, hoba kho ungshedbou saopobü neisimei chikom to pilaü leiei shenkei.

Hobaje khonei haoenei jolüh shobü pilaüei khuphai thüka phenla shanga kümbei; kho
Kho tegü
Hobaje lemshang neichem hoba kho kabü peisilei pendou juetlabü wa, thangtetlabü thaonyu hoba hanleplabü shuong haoenei Mosa jungto;
hoba sanlon paangeibü khon paa thungbü küpleplabü khon yukleplabü thangtetlabü thangtet anjin sungbakei.
Ngühkhüm busen yoa kaang hoba onoubü setshang;
khümsok hoba khoeibü peisilei pendou hoba Mühghaü thedanga phobü wentek;
hon lanbüeibü wanthung, khübü wanthung shuong, khübü thenkei thenko pholabü wanthung shuongei hoba khübü peisilei pendou hoba ngesakbü shanga haabü.
Hobaje honei kümbü lemshang hoba naanglabü onang, hoba ponlem shanga teibü, hoba neichem koukhün shanga thangjin;
chinamei kümbü lemshang hoba khonei chinamei küng yembei kho shanga kaang hoba kho shanga peisilei pendou hoba saklasamla phauyaang hoba kho denshang.

Hobaje khongmang thangtet shuong khübü shanga thaonyu shuong hoba kho yukleplabü hoba khongmang koukhün thangtetlabü hoba khübüeibü lühshuong hoba khoeibü jaanglabü, hoba kamshang neichem shanga peisilei pendou,
lemshang khangenla shanga neisimei maibü kümbü hoba ungshed kümsileia khangenla shanga Aron ungshedbou shanga neisimei hoba haoeibü shousi shuong shanga neisimei.
ei Mosa la sakkubü tegü Israel shousi shuongei kümsilei pendou kümbei.

Kheijinei
“Shaangboubü lit, shaangboubü chalou shaangbounyeta nyi kamshang neichem, lemshang neichem nyi dangashi;
hoba ngühkhüm busen kho khünei phoashi;

Nyi honei kümbü ponlem lemshang kho ngühkhüm busen thedanga phoshi hoba lemshang neichem hoba lemshang koukhün thangbü phoshi.

Kho kaiko khongmang kümenashi hoba thangtet nei kho shaishang koukhüna thangashi.
“Hobaje nyi naanglabü jungan louan lemshang neichem hoba khonei kibü pendou to naangashi, khoei khünei kibü peisilei pendou saüenko kho khei saopobü yeitilabü.
Hobaje nyi juokbü lembü hoba khoeibü peisilei pendou to onang naangkuashi, hoba lemshang kho saüenkuashi, hoba lemshang kho pendou to saopobou kilabü.
Hobaje nyi phauyaang hoba kho denshang kho onang naangkuko saüenko yeitishi.
“Hobaje nyi Aron hoba haoeibü shousi shuong kamshang neichem koukhün khüto leian louan haoen deiei sakkushi.
Hobaje nyi Aron la saopobü neisimei lekushi; hoba ungshed kümaleia haoei khangenla shanga nyi hao la onang naangkuko saüenkushi.
Hobaje nyi haoeibü shousi shuong leian louan haoen la mangyuk yukkushi.
Hobaje haoenei ungshed kümaleia ngo khangenla shanga nyi haoeneibü bou to kümbü tegü nyi haoen la onang naangkushi hoba haoen la onang naangkulabü kho haoen meten sünga haoen shanga kilabü.”
Kho tegü Mosaei
Nyibou po, shaangbou lit, khangnyet lemshang neichem kho huongenkei.

Lausikei aoei lulu to asaopobü kian
Müt atei asaopobü peitoleito, müt asaopobü to yingsikei, asaopobü meisiau yingsikei ayingsi asaopobü mangsenlabü to meitialonga hoba
“Israel shousi shuong to lenshi: Kanei masu, sanlon ayingsi saneibü haabü ashaujan.
Hobaje hao lolo haibü haabü, hoba meisiau taketbüeibü haabü kümsilei lubü shanga jungeila athük lausikei ai yinglaje yingsikei kanei kho ashaujan.
Aieilausi
Kan kishanga ausiyuk ayingsi meisiaueibü sii ashaujan.
Sii at ongkei aoyouei shaulaje kho müt jembü mütli ka wapan aplabü.”
“Israel shousi to lenashi, aoei
haoei jembü ikei
Hobaje ungshedbouei haabü kho lemshang shona juokjan; lausikei senlang kho Aron hoba haoeibü shousi shanga yinglabü.
Hobaje sangmai lembü shanga haitibü ka mae youshi kaneibü heshaibü lembü shanga ungshedbou la kanei kujan.
Aroneibü shousi shuong aoei sangmai lembü sii hoba haabüei lemlaje mae youshi phejan lejan.

Israel shousi shuong haoeneibü sangmai lembü haitibü ka soueibü senlang hoba lekyen heshaibü youshi lembü shanga ngei sungena, hoba khübü kho Aron ungshedbou hoba haoeibü shousi la Israelbü shousi shuong ka kula kibü tegütham ponpen shanga kua.
ei haoen ungshedbou kümsileia khangenla kubü chaloua
kho haoen naangenko pienbü chaloua Israelbü ka haoen la haoei kula
“Juokbü lembü shanga, shausiyung lembü shanga, hoba shabü lembü shanga hoba khümbo kubü shanga, hoba sangmai lembü shanga haitibü, habü ngühkhüm ki.
Kho Sinai Yamlamanga haoei Israel shousi shuong to
“Aron hoba haoeibü shousi shuong hao yoa leiashi, hoba neisimei, naanglabü onang, shabü lembü shanga masu pongsu hoba sanlon paangshou penyi hoba tokai ajinbü wentek kam jungashi;
hoba nyi shuong pendou kamshang neichem koukhün junga yoshaitiashi.”
Hobaje Mosaei shuong to laukei, “
Kheijinei Mosaei Aron hoba haoeibü shousi shuong leijung louan deiei haoen sakkukei.

Hobaje haoei Aron la mangyuk yukkukei, hoba shembeiei hao kaikei, hao la hele lekukei hoba hao la ungshedbou saopobü hele lekukei. Hobaje maangsangko kümbü ungshedbü saopobü neisimei shembeei haoei hao kailepbo khühlepbei.
Hobaje haoei hao la khükhom yukkukei, hoba khükhoma haoei Urim si Thummim jinkukei.
Hobaje
Kheijinei Mosaei naanglabü onang sungkei hoba lemshang neichem hoba khünei kibü pendou la naangkukei hoba khübü kho saüenkukei.
Hobaje khübü kho saüenla shanga khoei lemshang to nyetnei sühko lakkukei hoba lemshang hoba khoeibü thungsiphau shuong hoba sakshang phauyaang hoba khünei kibü pendou la naangkukei.
Hobaje Aron saüenla shanga haoei haoeibü khua naanglabü onang yeian jinkukei, hoba hao la naangkukei.
Mosaei Aroneibü shousi shuong leian loukei, hoba Mosaei
Kheijinei haoei shabü lembü masu pongsu sungbakei, hoba Aron si haoeibü shousi shuongei shabü lembü masu pongsueibü khua haoeneibü ikei shangetkei.

Hobaje Mosaei kho wapettikei; hoba Mosaei sii kho sungkei hoba lemshang ko kaijembo laangshonga haoeibü ikjishouei naangkukei hoba lemshang saüenkukei, hoba lemshang koukhün junga sii naangkukei hoba kho sakenkula shanga kho saüenkei.
Hobaje senmaanga kibü haabü pendou hoba sen yukbü hoba kelang penyi hoba khübü haabü haoei sungkei, hoba kho Mosaei lemshang thüka juokkei.
Lausikei
Hobaje juokbü lembü sanlon paang haoei sungbakei, hoba Aron si haoeibü shousi shuongei sanlon paangeibü khua haoeneibü ikei shangetkei.
Hobaje haoei kho wapettikei, hoba Mosaei lemshang kaijembo sii lakkei.
Hobaje sanlon paang kho haoei netla yeiko jemnyinkei, hoba Mosaei khu si phenet hoba haabü wana jikkei.
Haoei senmaang si you deiei sakkei, hoba Mosaei sanlon paang pendou lemshang shona juokkei; kho ponlem maibü shanga juokbü lembü kikei; kho
Hobaje haoei lubü sanlon paang kho khümbo kubü sanlon sungbakei, hoba Aron si haoeibü shousi shuongei sanlon khua haoeneibü ikei shangetkei.
Hobaje haoei kho wapettikei, hoba Mosaei khoeibü sii sungjung louan Aroneibü mae nouhotena hoba mae ik ikbem hoba mae you youbema hambukei.

Hobaje tokei Mosaei Aroneibü shousi shuong leibakei hoba haoeneibü mae nouhotena hoba haoeneibü mae ik ikpema hoba haoeneibü mae you youbema Mosaei sii naangkukei hoba lemshang thük kaijembo joubü sii lakkukei.
Hobaje haabü, meia haabü hoba senmaanga kibü pendou hoba sen yukbü hoba kelang penyi hoba khübü haabü mae youshi haoei sungenkei;
hoba
Hobaje haoei khümbo Aroneibü ika hoba haoeibü shousi shuongeibü ika phokukei, hoba
Hobaje Mosaei khübü kho haoeneibü ik ka sungletkei hoba lemshanga juokbü lembü khübü kho juokkei; khübü kho ponlem maibü khümbo kubü kikei.
Mosaei senlang kho sungan

Hobaje Mosaei naanglabü onang hoba lemshanga kibü sii sungbakei, hoba kho Aron si haoeibü neisimei to hoba haoeibü shousi shuongeibü neisimeia lakkukei; hoba Aron si haoeibü neisimei hoba hao yoa haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü shousi shuongeibü neisimei saüenan phokei.

Hobaje Mosaei Aron si haoeibü shousi shuong to laukei, “Kamshang neichem koukhün junga phe kho thungashi; Aron hoba haoeibü shousi shuongei kho shaulabü haang dogo kü la sakkubü tegü khünei kho hoba khümbo kubü kama kibü wentek shauashi.
Hobaje laobou phe hoba wentek joulaje kanei khokei wana jikan apashi.
Kan khümbo kuan apbü chalou apenshongko kan kamshang neichem koukhün ka chalou nyetnyet üangjan.
Senei tat kümbü tegü kho khei kümbo kaneibü saüsimaü hangletla shanga
Hobaje chalou nyet change nangnaka kamshang neichem koukhüna kan kiphang, hoba kan ühaila shanga
Hibü Aron si haoeibü shousi shuongei Mosa danko
Tou chalou setbounyet Mosaei Aron si haoeibü shousi shuong hoba Israelbü jaishou shuong ngakei;
hoba haoei Aron to laukei, “Nyi shabü lembü shanga masu paangshou che sungashi, hoba juokbü lembü shanga sanlon paang mo alebü hoba khübü kho
Hobaje Israel shousi shuong to nyi lenashi, kanei shabü lembü shanga lonpaang che hoba juokbü lembü shanga mo alebü masu paangshou che hoba sanlon shoushou che, ham kho po cheeibü shou sungshi,
hoba
Hibü Mosaei haoen la sakkubü tegü haoenei
Kheijinei Mosaei laukei, “Ho kanei kümlabü
Hobaje Mosaei Aron to laukei, “
Hibü Aron lemshang nyangko loukei, hoba hao shanga shabü lembü shanga masu paangshou kho haitikei.
Hobaje Aroneibü shousi shuongei hao jungto sii kho sungbakei, hoba siia haoeibü ikjishou shembei hoba lemshanga kibü laang shuonga naangkukei hoba lemshang junga sii kho yeian jinkukei.
Lausikei
Phe si khon haoei kamshang khonga juokkei.
Kheijinei haoei juokbü lembü kho haitikei; hoba Aroneibü shousi shuongei hao la sii kukei, hoba haoei kho lemshang kaijembo lakkukei.
Hobaje haoenei hao la juokbü lembü phejem lulu, hoba khu khümbo kukei, hoba haoei khübü kho lemshang thük shona juokkei.
Hobaje haoei senmaang hoba you sakkei, hoba lemshanga juokbü lemshang thüka juokkei.
Kho phaia haoei noknyüheibü lembü kukei, hoba noknyüh shanga lemla kulabü lon shabü shanga lemla sungbaan kho haitikei, hoba nyishou tegü shabü lembü kukei.
Hobaje haoei juokbü lembü sungbakei, hoba ngühkhüm tegü lembü kukei.
Hobaje ngeyang juokbü lembü to liman shausiyung lembü ikmaang shenko jungan lemshang thüka juoktiko haoei kho kukei.
Haoei toukei noknyüh shanga sangmai lembü kula masu pongsu hoba sanlon paang kho haoei haitikei; hoba Aroneibü shousi shuongei hao la sii khümbo kukei, hoba haoei kho lemshang kaijembo lakkukei.
Hobaje masu pongsueibü haabü, sanlon paangeibü meia haabü hoba senmaanga haabü, hoba kelang hoba senjan yukbü;
hoba haoenei senlang yoa phokukei, hoba haoei haabü kho lemshanga juokkei.
Hobaje Mosaei sakkubü tegü
Aronei noknyüh thüka haoeibü ik shingan haoen haükukei; hoba juokbü lembü hoba sangmai lembü kuan louyenkei.
Mosa si Aron kamshang neichem khüto atkei hoba longan noknyüh haükukei; hoba
Hobaje
