Tou Aroneibü shousi Nadab si Abihu haosiei haoeneibü wankak suokjin sungan kho thüka wan jinkei, hoba kho thüka jen jinan
Hobaje
Kheijinei Mosaei Aron to laukei, “

Hobaje Mosaei Aroneibü bou nashoubou Uzzieleibü shousi shuong Mishael hoba Elzafan ngakei, hoba haosi to laukei, “Nyangko kaiya, saopobü lemshang jungka kukjung shaishang khongaeto kaneibü jaisinasi sunglangashi.”
Hibü haoen nyangko loukei, hoba shaishang ka Mosaei laubü tegü haosieibü mangyuka haosi lenglangkei.

Hobaje Mosaei Aron to hoba haoeibü shousi Eleazar hoba Ithamar to laukei, “Kan haibüla hoba shuong pendou thükto khauang lousi amaibula kanei kaneibü khu shuan tüp, ayingsi kaneibü nei tejitnyin; lausikei kaneibü jaisina Israel mütli khümboei
Hobaje kan haibüla kamshang neichem koukhün ka tüang; aishanga
Kheijinei
“Kan haibüla kanei kamshang neichem to atjinei ih ayingsi nyakidei, nyi ayingsi kaibü shousi shuongei teyung; kaibü meten pendoua ho ponpen shanga lole ngühkhüm kilabü.
Hobaje kho kanei saopobü si asaopobü kanglanga hoba hinseibü si ihinseibü kanglanga lulu ngelabü.
Hobaje Mosa danko
Kheijinei Mosaei Aron to hoba haoeibü joubü shounyi Eleazar hoba Ithammar to lenkei, “Wanei
hoba kanei kho saoposhanga shaujan, aieilausi kho kaibü phejan; hoba kaibü shousi shuongeibü phejan wanei

Hobaje soueibü senlang kho hoba lembü kubü youshi kho kanei, nyi hoba kaibü jayang nouyang shousi shuongei saüenbü kaoen chenei shaujan; aishanga Israel shousi shuong sangmai lembü haitibü ka kaibü phejan shanga habü ho kuakei.
Lembü youshi hoba soueibü senlang kho wanei lembü haabü yoa haoenei
Ladang Mosaei shabü lembü shanga lon maangkuko lambei hoba chühashi, kho juokan apan kiteikei; hoba joubü Aroneibü shousi Eleazar hoba Ithammar to haoei maangpokko laukei,
“Ho saopobü dogo ngean hoba shuongei shonbü shedbü künla hoba
Chühashi, hoeibü sii saoposhang chemmaang aeto aila jungan alot; ngei sakkubü tegü kanei kho saoposhanga shaujan kikei.”
Hobaje Aronei Mosa to laukei, “Chühashi, tat haoenei haoeneibü shabü lembü hoba juokbü lembü
Hobaje Mosaei kho ditjinei hao senyühshembei.
Israel shousi shuong to lenshi, kaodaka langkeibü meisiau yoa kanei shaulabü habü ho ki,
meisiau yoa ai ong haak pheinyinan ki, hoba youjishou paangnyinan ki hoba shat nyaingaida kho kanei shaula thükkei.
Kheiyingasikei shatnyaibü hoba haak pheinyinbü yoa habü ho kanei ashaujan, ut, aieilausi hoei shat nyaida lausikei haak apheinyinkei, ho kan shanga asaopobü ki.
Sanshou, khei hoei shat nyaida lausikei haak ayembei ho kan shanga asaopobü.
Hobaje langyuk, khei hoei shat shauda lausikei haak ayembei, ho kan shanga asaopobü.
Hobaje uk, khei ho haak pheinyinbü lausikei shat anyaida, ho kan shanga asaopobü.
Khübüeibü phe kanei ashaujan, hoba khübü haibü manga kanei temeiti; khübü kho kan shanga asaopobü.
Deia kibü pendou yoa habü ho kanei shaula thükkei; deia yungnyua, hoba shumanga ai ong kaak hoba kou yeman ki, khübü kho kanei shaula thükkei.
Lausikei yungnyua, shumanga, hoba deia pongyobü pendou hoba deia lang kibü pendou, kaak ayembü hoba kou üangbü pendou kan junga mangsenlabü ki.
Hobaje khübü kho kan thedanga jemtenlabü kilabü, kanei khübü phe ashaujan, hoba khübü haibü mang kan thedanga mangsenlabü kilabü haang.
Deia kibü ainei kaak si kou aki kho kan shanga shalabü ki.
Au yoa kanei habü ho mangsenjan, habü ho ashaujan, khübü kho mangsenlabü; wekekshou, aulu, hoba ngao shaubü aulu.
Aulu hamshang, lolenshang, den lulua;
aukhomakmak phang weko,
hoba ostrik, ukhoungba, tüngtüngbangbang,
hoba ukhoungba hanbou, Kormorant au, hoba ukhoungba yaangbou.
Molo phadak, ngau shaubü pelikan au, hoba hogon;
hoba stork au, heron au, phang lulu, mühghaüaunak, hoba pak.
Kaak yembü pendou you lei pendouei paialonga kan junga kho mangsenlabü ki.
Kheiyingsikei kaakyeman you lei pendouei paibü laobouei kaoa tomjung haula nakshang you thüka tokei you nyi yeman ki kanei shaula thükkei.
Khübü yoka kanei habü ho shaula thükkei; koksüng phang den lulu.
Lausikei kaak yeman paibü laobou you lei yembei khübü kan thedanga mangsenlabü ki.
Khübü khoei kan lulu asaopoko aplabü; aoyouei khübü haibü mang to meitilaje nangnak sühko asaopoko aplabü.
Ao- youei khübü haibü sungan junglaje haoeibü neisimei sakjan, hoba nangnakko asaopoko kilabü.
Meisiau laobou haak pheinyinan ki lausikei maisho aphein- yinko ki, ayingsi shat ashauda, kho kan shanga asaopobü ki; müt weko aoyouei khübü to meitilaje asaopoko kilabü;
hoba you leiei paibü meisiau yoa laobouei ong youmaangei paida, kan shanga khübü kho asaopobú ki; aoei khübü haibü manga meitilaje nangnakko hao asaopoko kilabü.
Hobaje aoyouei khübü haibü mang hean khünda jembü neisimei sakjan, hoba nangnakko asaopoko kilabü, kan thedanga khübü kho asaopobü ki.
Hobaje kaoa nongeiko paibü yoa kan shanga asaopobü habü ho ki; kongi, hoba yepuk hoba jisang haoen den lulu,
chemsou, tangkabü jisang, auteikokbou, litnyusalimong, khapthung.
Hong- yobü yoa habü ho kan shanga asaopobü ki, aoyouei khübü haibü to meitilaje nangnakko asaopoko kilabü.

Hobaje habü haibü mangei aito ong meioulaje kho asaopoko aplabü, bu kümbü to yingsikei, ayingsi neito meito yingsikei, ayingsi nyungkai to yingsikei ai ong denche kümsilei shanga jungeida kho deia jinjan hoba kho nangnakko asaopoko kilabü, kho phaia ong hinseilabü.
Hobaje khübü ka laobou thamchak to che ongkei atlaje khünei ai ong kilaje asaopoko kilabü hoba kanei kho phetnyinjan.
Khünei kibü shausiyung pendou laobou ka dei louda, asaopoko yeilabü, hoba yunglabü pendou laobou chak ka yungda kho asaopoko kilabü.

Hobaje ajanjan pendoua haibü mang takübü cheei ongkei meioua longa asao- poko kilabü, wentek kaangbü yingasikei, ayingsi chak yingsikei netla yeiko jangnyinjan, khübü kho asaopobü hoba kan shanga asaopobü kilabü.
Khei yingasikei dei khuan phobü ayingsi deithung ainei dei khuan phokei kho saopobü kilabü; lausikei aoei khübü haibü manga meitilaje asaopoko aplabü.
Khübü haibü mang ka che lilabü thüka atousi kho asaopoko ki.
Lausikei lilabü thüka dei saangan kiteia longa hoba khübü haibü mang at kho thüka atoua longa kho kan shanga asaopobü kilabü.
Hobaje kanei shaubü meisiau at haisi aoei haibü mang to meitilaje hao nangnakko asao- poko kilabü.
Aoyouei haibü mang kho shaulaje haoei jembü neisimei sakjan, hoba nangnakko asaopoko kilabü, tokei aoei haibü mang kho künlaje haoei jembü neisimei sakjan, hoba chasem sühko asaopoko kilabü.
Kaoa shoongaibü meisiau hanbü pendou mangsenlabü ki, kho ashaujan.
Ai ong shimungei kaoa satko paida hoba ai ong you leiei paida ayingsi ai ong you juong yembei khübü kho kanei ashaujan, aieilausi haoen mangsenlabü ki.
Kan jembü lolo shoongyo shanyoko paibü meisiau aieikei mangsenlabü teyei ayingsi khübü khoei kan ashalabü lele kan lolo asaopoko teyei.
Aishanga ngo kaneibü
Aieilausi kaneibü Mühghaü yingla Ijep kaodak ka leiyenbou ngo
Meisiau hoba ausiyuk hoba deia nuyobü langkibü meisiau pendou shanga ngühkhüm ho ki.
Hinseibü si ihinseibü hoba shaulabü si ashaulabü meisiau ham kanglanga lulu yeitikuda.
Israel shousi shuong to lenshi, mang akongbü nyu che aoei bousu shou buklaje, kheijinei nyu kho chalou nyetnyet asao- poko kilabü, sao mangnei toteibü jihsiphaia asaopoko kilabü.
Hobaje setbounyet shoueibü khop tang kho kipan apjan.
Chalou khujinto sem sühko nyu saüenan kijan, sao saüenbü chalou apen shongko, saoei saopobü peisilei aineikei ameitijan, ayingsi lemshang to aloujan.
Lausikei saoei yaksa che buka longa sao lit weko mang samenbü tegü bale penyi asamenko kilabü, hoba sao samenlabü jih apen shongko chalou saosem to lak saüenan kijan.

Ladang bousu shou shanga yingsikei yaksa shou shanga yingsikei, sao samenbü chalou benlaje, kamshang neichem to ungshedbou jungto saoeibü juokbü lembü shanga sanlon shoushou po cheeibü, dukutuk che, jemau che shabü lembü shanga saoei jungan loujan,
hoba saoei kho

Saoei sanlon shoushou che kula athük longa saoei jemau penyi, ayingsi dukutuk penyi jungjan; che juokbü lembü shanga, hoba che kho shabü lembü shanga; hoba ungshedbouei sao shanga saomeisaülabü, hoba sao hinseian kilabü.

Ladang müt cheeibü mang khona bujung longlaje ayingsi paknyinda ayingsi thu- paitham longan kilaje, hoba haoeibü khona imthu phatko kilaje, kheijinei hao Aron ungshedbou ayingsi haoeibü shousi ungshedbou yoa che jungto leian haujan.

Hobaje ungshedbouei haoeibü phea khon khüto chühjan; hoba khünei wi kho thupaitham yeian kialonga hoba haoeibü phe khotoje chühla haübou yingan kialonga, kho imbü mou ki; hoba ungshedbouei hao to chühan asaopo dogo ngetijan.

Lausikei haoeibü phe khona longan kibü kho thupaian hoba kho chühla khon toje haübou aying hoba khoeibü wi kho thupaitham ayeilonga, kheijinei ungshedbouei kho kaakbü müt kho chalou nyet khinan phojan,
hoba nyetbounyet ungshedbouei hao nyibou chühlabü, hoba kho haoeibü thea jetei hoba mou kho khon nyakko haajung ohauko kialonga kheijinei ungshedbou khoei tokei nyetnyet khinan phojan.

Hobaje tokei nyetbounyeta kho chühngailabü hoba chühsi mou kho sinko hoba khondak shenko ohouko kialonga kheijinei ungshedbouei hao hinseiakei dogo ngetilabü, kho mou che longbü ong ki; haoei haoeibü neisimei saklabü hoba sakasaman kilabü.
Lausikei haoei hao lolo saüenla shanga ungshedbou to lenan phaia mou kho khondak shenko aan kialonga haoei jembü lolo ungshedbou la nyibou lenjan;
hoba ungshedbouei chühlabü, hoba mou kho khondak shenko haajung hauan kialonga kheijinei ungshedbouei hao asaopokei dogo ngetilabü; kho imshat dogo ngean kilabü.
Ladang müt che im longan kilaje, kheijinei hao ungshedbou jungto leian loujan;
hoba ungshedbouei takteilabü, hoba khona thupaitham sungjung longan hoba khoei wi thupaitham yeitian sungjung longbü kho ka phe haanbü longan kialonga,
kho phea imshat hangbü ki, hoba ungshedbouei hao asaopokei dogo ngetilabü hoba haoei khinan aphojan, aishanga hao asaopokei.
Im kho khondak pendoua longa longa, hoba imbü mou longshang khünei khu ka you sühko khei ungshedbouei hapbü sühko longan kialonga;
kheijinei ungshedbouei takteilabü hoba im khoei haoeibü mang pendou yeplepan kialonga kho kaakbü müt kho hinseibü dogo ngetijan, pendou thupaitham apa; hao hinseiakei.
Lausikei ladang ong hao to phe haanbü longlaje hao asaopoko kilabü.
Hobaje ungshedbouei phe haanbü longbü kho chühan hao asaopobü dogo ngetijan, phe haanbü longbü kho ihinseikei, kho im yingkei.
Lausikei phe haanbü kho nyibou thu- paitham yeian apa longa kheijinei hao ungshedbou jungto loulabü hoba ungshedbouei hao takteilabü.
Hobaje mou kho thupaitham yeian kialonga, kheijinei mou longbü müt kho hinseiakei dogo ungshedbouei ngetijan; hao hinseian kia.
Ladang khondaka takshou longan maibü kilaje,
hoba takshou longshang kho thupaitham sungjung longbü che kilaje, ayingsi saklangle bokan kilaje, kheijinei hao ungshedbou la lenjan,

hoba ungshedbouei takteilabü, hoba kho chühla khon toje haübou yingan kialonga, hoba khoeibü wi kho thupaitham yeian kialonga kheijinei ungshedbouei hao asaopokei dogo ngetijan; ho imbü mou takshoua longbü ki.
Lausikei ungshedbouei kho chühan hanei wi thupaibü aki hoba khon to haübou ayinglonga kheijinei ungshedbouei hao chalou nyetnyet khinlabü,
hoba kho khona aan kialonga ungshedbouei hao asaopokei dogo ngetilabü; kho imbü tetsida ki.
Lausikei pokan kibü kho khoyama kialonga kho takshou nali ki; hoba ungshedbouei hao hinseiakei dogo ngetilabü.
Ayingsi manga wanei juokbü kialonga, hoba wanmou phe khünei sungan kialonga, saklangle thupaian ayingsi thupaitham kialonga,

kheijinei ungshedbouei kho chühlabü hoba sungjung longshang wi kho thupaibü yingalonga hoba chühla khontoje haübou yingalonga kho im, kho wanmoua longbü ki; hoba ungshedbouei hao asaopokei dogo ngetijan, ho im mou.
Lausikei chühan chühan, hoba sungjung longbü khünei wi thupaibü hoba khondak toje kho haübou ayinglonga hoba nakthüngan kisi kheijinei ungshedbouei hao chalou nyet khinan pholabü.
Hobaje nyetbounyet ungshedbouei hao takteilabü, kho khondaka aan kialonga, kheijinei ungshedbouei hao asaopokei dogo ngetilabü, kho imbü mou.
Hobaje sungbü kho khünei ong kialonga hoba khondaka haajung satbü akilonga kho wanei juokbü ka pubü ong ki, hoba ungshedbouei hao saopoakei dogo ngetilabü, aieilausi ho wanei juokbü nali.
Ladang bousu yingsikei yaksa yingsikei khua ayingsi kaolo maanga mou kilaje,

kheijinei ungshedbouei mou kho chühjan, hoba chühla khontak to haübou yingalonga hoba khünei wisakshou saklangbü hoba semjeile kialonga, kheijinei ungshedbouei hao asaopokei dogo ngetilabü; ho nyikbü mou kho khua ayingsi kaolo maanga longbü immou ki.
Hobaje ungshedbouei kho nyikmou to chühan hoba chühla khontak to haübou aying hoba khünei wi nakkhübü akilonga kheijinei moulebou kho ungshedbouei nyetnyet khinan phojan;
hoba nyetbounyet ungshedbouei mou kho chühjan, hoba nyikmou kho haajung hauan akiteilonga hoba khünei wi saklangbü akiteilonga hoba nyikmou kho khontak to haübou ayinglonga,
kheijinei haoei khu shuan apjan, lausikei haoei mou kho shuan üpjan, hoba ungshedbouei moulebou kho chalou nyet khinan phojan;

hoba nyetbounyet ungshedbouei mou kho chühlabü hoba mou kho khontaka ühaako kialonga hoba chühla khontak to haübou akilonga kheijinei ungshedbouei hao hinseian kia dogo ngetijan; hoba haoei jembü neisimei saklabü hoba saopoan kilabü.
Lausikei saüenan phaia mou kho khondak shenko puyopuyo haualonga,
kheijinei ungshedbouei hao to chühlabü, hoba nyikmou kho haajung hauan kialonga wisakshou kho aphaneisikei mailabü, hao asaopoko kia.
Lausikei hao thedanga jetei kialonga, hoba khünei wi nakkhübü yeman kialonga mou kho maia, hao saopoakei; hoba ungshedbouei hao saopoakei dogo ngetilabü.
Ladang bousu yingsikei yaksa yingsikei jembü mang khondaka sungjung pujung longan kilaje ungshedbouei haoen to chühjan;
hoba haoeibü mang khondaka puan sungjung longan kibü kho momtham thupaian kialonga kho khondaka pujung longbü ong ki, hibü khoei hao saopoakei.
Ladang müt che haoeibü khu ka khulou elaje hao khüng kheasikei hinseian kia. Haoeibü khüngjaa khulou akiko apsi hao khüng khea lausikei, hao hinseian kia.
Lausikei khüng khebü ayingsi khüngja ka khulou ebüa saklangle thupaibü tetsida kialonga khoje touje hao khüng khebü ayingsi khüngjaa wi ebüa im loushetda.
Hibü ungshedbouei kho chühlabü hoba haoei kho khüngkhebü ayingsi khüngjaa wi ebüa longbü ka sungan kibü kho saklangle thupaian mang khondaka im longbü tegü im hapalonga,
hao im kaakbü müt, hao asaopokei, haoeibü mou khua longsije ungshedbouei hao asaopokei dogo ngetijan.
Im longbü müt aoto mou longan ki haoei nei jitnyinbü neijan, hoba haoeibü khu khulou pinan pholabü; hoba haoei haoeibü thükae sembung khop küplepan, “Asaopobü, asaopobü,” dogo ngekjan.
Hao to mou thonan kishongko hao asaopoko kilabü; asaopobü hao mütpem kijan, hao kishangkei shuong shaishang ka bangan kijan.
Ladang neiameia yemautei bauan kilaje, winei yingsikei, phembanei yingsikei,
kho wiei ayingsi phembaei takbü yingsikei phekhon ayingsi phekhonei denje kümbü yingsikei,

neitomeito ayingsi shenbü peisileia ayingsi phekhona ayingsi takbü ayingsi shenbü peisileia ayingsi phekhonei kümbü ai peisilei yinglaje yingsikei nakthüngan ayingsi saklangle shenbü ngebü kialonga, kho im mou ki, hoba ungshedbou la lenjan.
ungshedbouei mou kho chühlabü, hoba mou kibü kho chalou nyetnyet khinan phojan;
Nyetbounyet haoei mou kho chühlabü hoba mou kho neisimei takbü ayingsi shenbü peialeia ayingsi phekhon, khei phekhonei kümbü ajanjan pendoua kaakan kialonga mou kho hatlabü imshat ki; kho asaopokei.

Hibü haoeibü neisimei ayingsi takbü ayingsi shenbü wi ayingsi phemba neiei takbü ayingsi ai ong phekhonei kümbü peisilei laoboua mousi kaakan ki kho haoei jikan apjan, aieilausi kho yemautei baubü imshat ki, kho jikan apjan.
Lausikei ungshedbou khoei kho chühan chühan mou kho neisimei ayingsi takbü ayingsi, woubü ayingsi phekhonei kümbü ai peisilei yinglaje yingsikei pinjung asatko kialonga,
ungshedbouei mou longbü kho samenla ngühkhüm kujan, kho phaia tokei nyetnyet khinan phojan.

Mou kibou müt khüto chühlabü, hoba mou kho ajakshaiko ayingsi mou kho puyo puyo asatko kialonga kho asaopokei; nyi kho wana jikan apjan, kho shat dangaenei kaakbü yingsikei maangaenei kaakbü yingsikei kho imshat ki.
Hobaje kho ungshedbouei takteialonga hoba kho sakan phaia shenngaian kialonga haoei kho neikameika ayingsi phekhon ayingsi takbü ayingsi shenbü peisilei ka jitan apjan.
Hobaje kho tokei neisimei khünei ayingsi takbü nei ayingsi shenbü ayingsi ai ong phekhonei kümbei kho longan kialonga lanei yemautei bauan ki kho wanei jikan ap- ashi.
Lausikei neisimei takbü yingsikei, shenbü yingsikei, ayingsi ai ong phekhonei kümbü yinglaje yemautei baubü kho khüka atan kialonga, kheijinei nyibou kho sakjan, hoba kho phaia ong hinseian kilabü.
Wi nei ayingsi bhemba nei takbü ayingsi woubü neisimeia imbü mou kaakbü shanga saüenakei dogo ngetila ayingsi asaüenkei dogo ngetila shanga habü ngühkhüm ki.
Imsak baubü müt shanga hao saüenbü chalou habü ngühkhüm kijan; hao ungshedbou jungto leian loujan,
hoba ungshedbou shaishang ka meimeijung haulabü, hoba imsak baubü müt ka mou maia amai chühenlabü;
kheijinei ao saüenlabü ki hao shanga lang kibü hinseibü au penyi hoba cedar bu hoba janglüh saklangbü hoba hisop jungan loula ungshedbouei sakkujan.
Hobaje ungshedbouei au yoka che thamchak chenei dei kouko kibü thüka haitila sakkujan.
Lang kibü au kho shanga kho haoei kho sungbalabü cedar bu hoba janglüh saklangbü, hoba hisop khübü kho hoba lang kibü au kho dei kouko kibü thüka haitibü aueibü sii khünei hamjan.
Hobaje haoei imsak ka ao saüenkulabü ki hao to nyetnei wenan jinkulabü hoba langkibü au khongthua litilabü, hoba kho phaia hao saüena dogo ngetilabü.

Ao saüenlabü ki haoeibü neisimei sakjan hoba haoeibü khu pendou shuan apjan, hoba hao jembü lolo deia mang yuan apjan, khei yingsi ong saüenan kilabü, hoba phaia ong hao sühshang to atlabü, lausikei hao neichem tang aenei nyetnyet kilabü.
Hobaje nyetbounyeta haoeibü khu ka khulou pendou hoba haoeibü sembung wi hoba haoeibü nyek wi shuan aplabü, khei haoeibü khulou pendou shuan aplabü, kho phaia ong hao hinseilabü.

Hobaje setbounyeta haoei kap anakbü sanlon paangshou penyi hoba mo alebü sanlon po cheeibü pi che sungbajan, hoba shausiyung lembü shanga wen inyaibü onang yoa kheiyoan efa phejan ana phejan sem, hoba onang aons anthük lak.
Hobaje ungshedbou aoei hao saüenkuda, saüenla kibü müt kho hoba khübü kho
Kheijinei ungshedbouei sanlon paangshou yoka che sungbalabü, kho shedbü lembü shanga, hoba onang aons anthüklak kho hoba khübü kho

hoba sanlon paangshou kho lanei shabü lembü hoba juokbü haitida khünei saoposhanga haoei haitijan, aishanga ho saopoboutham yingbüka shabü lembü kubü ungshedboueibü yingbü tegütham, shedbü lembü kubükei khei kilabü.
Hobaje ungshedbouei shedbü lembü sii kho shisho sungenlabü, hoba kho ao saüenlabü ki, haoeibü mae nou hotena hoba mae ikbema hoba haoeibü mae youbema ungshedbouei naangkulabü.
Hobaje ungshedbouei onang aons anthüklak kho sungan kho haoei jembü ik nanae ikmanga haakan jinlabü.
Hobaje haoeibü ik nanaenei kibü onang khünei ungshedbouei haoeibü mae ikjishou shanan jinlabü, hoba onang kho
Hobaje haoeibü ika jouan kibü onang kho ao saüenlabü ki haoeibü mae nou hotena hoba haoeibü mae ikbema haoeibü you mae youpema shedbü lembü sii thüka ungshedbouei naangkulabü.
Hobaje ungshedbou ika jouan kibü onang kho ao saüenlabü ki haoeibü khua haoei yeian jinkulabü, hoba hao shanga
Hobaje ungshedbouei shabü lembü kujan, hoba ao saüenlabü ki hao asaüenbü shanga hao shanga saumei saütilabü; hoba kho phaia haoei juokbü lembü haitilabü.
Hobaje ungshedbouei lemshang thüka juokbü lembü hoba shausiyung lembü kulabü; hoba hao shanga ungshedbouei saumei saülabü hoba hao saüenlabü.

Hobaje hao shalebü yingalonga hoba haoei khübü kula athüklonga, kheijinei shedbü lembü shanga soueilabü hoba hao shanga saüsimaü saumei saüla shanga haoei sanlon paangshou che, hoba shausiyung lembü shanga wen onang yoa kheiyoan efa phejan ana che, hoba onang aons anthüklak sungjan.
Hobaje jemau penyi ayingsi dukutuk penyi khei haoei sungbaenbü tegü hoba che shabü lembü hoba lubü che kho juokbü lembü shanga.
Hobaje setbounyet
Hobaje ungshedbouei shedbü lembü shanga sanlon paangshou kho hoba onang aons anthüklak kho sungjan, hoba ungshedbouei khübü

Hobaje shedbü lembü shanga sanlon shoushou kho haitilabü, hoba ungshedbouei shedbü lembü sii kho sunglabü hoba saüenla kibü müteibü mae nou hotena hoba haoeibü mae ikbema hoba haoeibü mae you- pema kho naangkulabü.
Hobaje ungshedbouei onang kho jembü nanei ikmanga yeian jinjan.
Hobaje ungshedbouei haoeibü mae ikjishouei nanaenei kibü onang kho ka at nyetnei
Hobaje ungshedbouei jembü ika kibü onang kho ka ao saüenlabü ki, haoeibü mae nou hotena hoba haoeibü mae ikbema hoba haoeibü mae you youbema hoba shedbü lembü sii kishanga naangkulabü:
Hobaje ungshedboueibü ika jouan kibü onang kho ao saüenlabü ki, haoeibü khua haoei yeian jinkulabü; hoba hao shanga
Hobaje haoei jemau ayingsi dukutuk shoushou ka haoei jekla thükbü kujan;
che kho shabü lembü shanga hoba lubü kho juokbü lembü shanga shausiyung lembü yoan; hoba ao saüenlabü ki hao shanga
Ao to imsak longan ki, hoba aoei hao saüenkula shanga songa kibü tegütham lembü akuenda, hao shanga ho ngühkhüm ki.
Kan ladang Kanan kaodak to louan kilaje, laobou ngei kaneibü yingla kudaje hoba kanei shian apbü kaonyek chem chenei ngei im mou longtila
kheijinei chem
Hobaje chema kibü pendou asaopoko apsi amaibüla dogo ungshedbouei mou kho chühla üttoua, haoenei chem kho kongkula ungshedbouei ngühkhüm kulabü; hoba kho phaia ungshedbouei chem kho chühla atlabü.
Hobaje haoei shat kho chühlabü, hoba chem kümthanga mou kho shangtüngtham onan nakthüngan ayingsi sakshangan kilao hoba kho chühla kümthang toje phangkabou si ji chühlabü.
Kheijinei ungshedbou kho chem ka koukhün to longlabü, hoba chem kho chalou nyet khinan phokulabü.
Hobaje nyibou ungshedbou louan nyetbounyet chühlabü; hoba chem kho kümthanga mou kho haajung hauasi ohau chühlabü;
Kheijinei ungshedbouei laang laoboua mou ki, khübü kho sangnyu batak asao- pobü kaoen che to jinkushi dogo haoen la ngühkhüm kulabü;
hoba haoei chem maang kaijembo kuitaiko sakkulabü, hoba haoenei laang khaangyobü tham kho sangnyu batak asao- pobü kaoen chenei jinkulabü.
Hobaje haoenei khübü laang jeiko lubü pholabü; hoba haoei lubü khangyobü tham sunglabü, hoba chema naanglabü.
Hobaje haoei laang kho sungan phaia hoba chem kho hameitaiko sakan phaia hoba chema tham naangan phaia nyibou louan mou kho chema longa longa;
kheijinei ungshedbou lotan chühlabü, hoba mou kho chema haajung hauan kialonga kho amaiko aplabü im chema kia; kho asaopo.
Hobaje haoei chem kho panlabü, kho laang khükabü wa, hoba chema naangbü khaang- yobü tham pendou hoba haoei khübü kho sangnyu ka asaoposhang kaoen che to sungjung haulabü.
Tokei chem khinan kijinei ao kilaje, hao nangnak sühko asaopoko kilabü.
Hobaje ao chema yepda hao neisimei sakjan, hoba chema ao shauda- yungda, haoeibü neisimei sakjan.
Lausikei ungshedbou louan chühalonga hoba tham naangan phaia mou kho hinseiakei dogo ngetilabü, aieilausi shat kho maia.
Hobaje chem saüenla shanga haoei cedar bu janglüh saklangbü hoba hisop yoa au penyi jungjan.
Hobaje au che dei koshikbü thüka thamchak chenei haitilabü.
Hobaje haoei cedar bu hisop hoba janglüh saklangbü kho lang kibü au penyi sungjung louan haitibü aueibü siia hoba dei koshikbü khünei hamlabü, hoba chema nyetnei sühko lakkulabü.
Hobaje haoei chem kho aueibü sii, dei koshikbü hoba lang kibü aueibü sii hoba cedar bu, hisop, hoba janglüh saklangbüei saüenkujan.
Lausikei haoei lang kibü au kho sangnyu ka angan yama litilabü, kho tegü chem shanga haoei saumei saüjan; hoba kho saüenan kilabü.
Habü ho im baubü pendou shanga hoba nyik baubü pendou shanga ngühkhüm ki;
neiameia im longbü shanga hoba chema kibü shanga; hoba bokbülebü, nyik hoba thethu angbü shanga.
Ladang asaopoko kida hoba ladang saopoan kida khübü shanga habü ho imbü shanga ngühkhüm ki.
Israel shousi shuong to lenashi, ladang bousu at jembü phe ka denje senjung longlaje kho koubü kho asaopobü ki.
Hao ka koubü asaopobü kho ho, haoeibü mang ka sensikei ayingsi senko kibü ka thaksikei kho hao to asaopobü ki.
Shen laoboua ong hao yeplaje asaopoko yeilabü.
Hobaje aoyouei ong haoeibü yepshanga meitilaje haoei haoeibü neisimei sakjan hoba hao lolo deia mangyulabü, hoba nangnak sühko asaopoko kilabü.
Hobaje senko kibü müt setshanga aoei khünei setlaje, haoeibü neisimei sakjan hoba hao lolo deia mangyulabü hoba nangnak sühko asaopoko kilabü.
Hobaje senko kibü manga aoei meitilaje haoeibü neisimei sakjan, hoba hao lolo deia mang yujan, hoba nangnak sühko asaopoko kilabü.
Hobaje senko kibü cheei saopoan kibü che to eokei thokalonga, kheijinei haoei haoeibü neisimei saklabü, hoba hao lolo mang yulabü hoba nangnak sühko asaopoko kilabü.
Hobaje ao to senko ki, hao ainei ong setan pailaje asaopoko yeilabü.
Hobaje aoyouei ong hao setbü phanga den che to ongkei meitilaje nangnak sühko asaopoko aplabü, hoba khübü peisilei to aoei jungda haoeibü neisimei sakjan hoba nangnak sühko asaopoko aplabü.
Hobaje aoyou to ong senko kibü mütei haoeibü ik deia maisho asakko meitilaje, haoeibü neisimei sakjan, hoba hao lolo deia mang yujan, hoba nangnak sühko asaopoko yeilabü.
Hobaje thamchak laobou to senko kibü mütei meitilaje, kho phetnyinjan, hoba buei kümbü thungsiphau khümbo deiei sakjan.
Hobaje ladang ao senko ki, hao senbü ka saüenlaje, haoei hao saüenla shanga chalou nyet wejan, hoba haoeibü neisimei sakjan, hoba kho tegü hinseian yeilabü.
Hobaje setbounyet haoei jemau penyi ayingsi dukutuk shoushou penyi junglabü hoba kamshang neichem koukhün to
Hobaje ungshedbouei kho che shabü lembü shanga hoba che juokbü lembü shanga kulabü; hoba ungshedbouei hao senbü shanga saumei saükulabü.
Hobaje bousu at ka saangan apalonga, kheijinei haoei haoeibü mang pendou deia sakjan, hoba nangnak sühko asaopoko kilabü.
Hobaje mangthembü neisimei, hoba khontak ainei ong jotdei kakan ki, deiei sakjan, hoba chasem sühko asaopoko kilabü.
Hobaje bousu aoei yaksa to jaman jotdei anglaje, haosi hamei lulu lolo deiei sakjan hoba nangnak sühko asaopoko kilabü.
Hobaje yaksa ka sii koubü kisi hoba kho haang tegü mang ka koubü yingalonga, sao chalou nyet asaopoko kilabü, hoba aoyouei sao to meitilaje nangnak sühko asaopoko kilabü.
Hobaje sao asaüenbü chaloua yepshang pendou asaopoko kilabü, hoba ainei ong sao setlaje asaopoko yeilabü.
Hobaje aoei saoeibü shena meitilaje, haoei jembü neisimei sakjan hoba hao lolo mang yujan, hoba nangnakko asaopoko kilabü.
Hobaje sao setbüa aoei meitilaje, jembü neisimei sakjan, hoba hao lolo deiei mang yujan, hoba nangnak sühko asaopoko kilabü.
Hobaje kho yepshanga ayingsi sao ainei ong setlaje, ladang haoei khüto meitilaje hao nangnak sühko asaopoko kilabü.
Hobaje bousu atei sao to jaman sao asaopobü kho hao thük to jinkualonga, hao chalou nyet asaopoko kilabü; hoba mangthembü yepshang laoboua hao lenglaje asaopoko kilabü.
Hobaje yaksa at jembü nei leilubü jih asühjinei, jih lounyu sii saangbü jih kialonga, ayingsi sao asaopobü jih to limbo saangbü kialonga, sao asaopobü jih sühko sao asaopoko kilabü.
Sao saangbü chalou pendoua shen laoboua ong yeplaje, sao asaopoko kibü shen tegütham sao shanga kilabü; hoba sao lanei ong setlaje, sao asaopoko hoba ahinseiko kibü tegü kilabü.
Hobaje aoyouei ong khübü peitoleito meitilaje, asaopoko kilabü hoba jembü neisimei sakjan hoba deiei mang yujan hoba nangnak sühko asao- poko kilabü.
Lausikei sao sii saangbü kho saüenan kialonga, kheijinei saoei sao lolo chalou nyet welabü hoba kho phaia sao saüenan kilabü.
Hobaje setbounyet saoei jembü shanga jemau penyi ayingsi dukutuk shoushou penyi junglabü hoba khübü kho kamshang neichem koukhün lambo ungshedbou jungto jungan loulabü.
Hobaje ungshedbouei che shabü lembü shanga hoba che juokbü lembü shanga kujan hoba ungshedbouei
Haoen yoa kibü ngeibü lemshang neichem haoenei haoen asaopobüei shatiko haoen ühaila shanga kho tegü kanei Israelbü shuong haoen asaopobü ka bangan kitijan.
Habü ngühkhüm ao ka saangda, hoba ao ka jotdei longda hoba khoei hao asaopoko aptida, hao shanga ki.
Hobaje yaksa ao mang asaüenko ki hoba bousu yingsikei yaksa yingsikei saangko kibü hoba bousu aoei asaopoko kibü yaksa to yeplaje haoen shanga habü ngühkhümdeikhüm ki.
Tou
hoba
Ho jungan ong Aronei lemshang to atla thükkei: shabü lembü shanga masu pongsu paangshou che, hoba juokbü lembü shanga sanlon paangshou che.”

Haoei saopobü bhemba nei inyaibü mangsho homjan, hoba kho thüka bhemba nei you yukjin kijan, hoba bhemba nei shembe kaijan, hoba khun hanjan khübü kho saopobü neisimei ki, hoba haoei deiei mang yuan khübü neisimei hele lejan.
Hobaje Israel shousi shuong yoka haoei lon paang penyi shabü lembü shanga hoba sanlon paang che juokbü lembü shanga lejan.
Hobaje Aronei shabü lembü masu pongsu kho lemjan, kho hao shanga ki, hoba hao shanga hoba haoeibü chemdang shabü dean apla shanga saumei saülabü.
Hobaje haoei lon penyi sungban
Hobaje Aronei lon penyi shanga phaang paklabü, phaang pakbü che “
Hobaje lon laobou to
Lausikei lon laobou to phaang shatkei, kho azazel shanga yama lang litibüei hao shanga shabü dela
Hobaje Aronei hao shangabü shabü lembü masu pongsu kho lemlabü hoba hao shanga hoba haoen chemdang shanga shabü dela saumei saülabü, hoba hao shanga shabü lembü masu pongsu kho haitilabü.
Hobaje
Hobaje hao ühaila shanga sao- pobü busen thüka onou setshang jeneibü wankhükei khuileplabü lele
hoba haoei masu pongsueibü sii kho sungbalabü, hoba kho haoeibü ikjishouei onoubü setshang thüka chaangbou aenei lakkulabü; hoba onoubü setshang thedanga ikjishouei haoei nyetnei lakkulabü.

Kho phaia haoei mütshuong shanga juokbü shabü lembü lon haitilabü, hoba sii kho thangtetbü maangae jungan atlabü hoba kho sii kho haoei masu pongsu sii lakbü tegütham kümlabü, hoba kho onoubü setshang thüka hoba setshang thedanga lakkulabü;

Hobaje Israel shousi shuong asaopobü hangshong hoba haoenei ngühkhüm lulimbü hangshong khei haoeneibü shabü pendou shanga, haoei lemshang shanga shabü dela saumei saülabü hoba haoen yoa asaopobü shuong yoa kibü kamshang neichem shangakei kho tegü haoei kümlabü.

Hobaje Saopoboutham to shabü dela hao atjinei hao along shongko hoba hao shanga hoba haoen chemdang shanga hoba Israelbü shuong pendou shanga shabü dela aküm shongko kamshang neichema müt aokei akijan.
Kho phaia hao
Hobaje kho thüka haoeibü ikjishouei sii kho nyetnei lakkulabü, hoba Israel shousi shuong asao- pobü ka sakkuko saüenkulabü.
Hobaje Saopoboutham hoba kamshang neichem, hoba lemshang shanga lamlean saumei saübü phaia haoei langkei kibü lon khoei lemlabü.

Hobaje Aronei haoeibü ik penyi hamei lang kibü lon thüka shangetan, Israel shousi shuongei shonshaibü shedbü pendou hoba haoenei ngühkhüm leilubü pendou khei haoeneibü shabü pendou kho thüka shedbü thekuko küntilabü, hoba haoei loneibü khua shabü kho pholabü hoba kho lamlean lon chühbou müt cheei leian hauan yama litilabü.
Hobaje haoenei shonbü shedbü pendou lon khoei jembü to sangliphang kaonyek che to künlabü, hoba haoei yama lon kho litilabü.
Hobaje Aron kamshang neichem khüto atlabü, hoba haoei Saopoboutham to atjinei lebü bhemba neisimei kho hangletlabü hoba khübü kho khünei phokulabü:

Hobaje haoei haoeibü mang saoposhang chenei mangyulabü, hoba neisimei lejung longan hao shanga juokbü lembü hoba eikshuong shanga juokbü lembü kulabü hoba haoei hao shanga hoba noknyüh shanga shabü dela saumei saülabü.
Hobaje shabü lembü shanga haabü kho haoei lemshang thüka juoklabü.
Hobaje aoei azazel shanga lon litilaje haoei jembü neisimei sakjan, hoba haoeibü mang deia yuan aplabü hoba thonla hao kamshang to atlabü.

Hobaje shabü lembü masu pongsu hoba shabü lembü lon kho laobou sii shabü dela Saopoboutham to jungan atlabü kikei, kho kamshang khong aeto sungbajan, hoba haoenei khübü khon, phe, hoba khübü shiang phet wana jikan aplabü.
Hobaje khübü aoei jiklaje haoeibü neisimei sakjan, hoba hao mangyujan hoba kho phaia hao kamshang to atlabü.
Hobaje ho kan shanga pon- pen song che kilabü, lit nyetboubü chalou anbounyet kanei kan lolo mühei nyengko khonkujan, hoba sangbüshou yingsikei hoba kan yoa kibü küksithang yingsikei ai akümaleijan.
Aishanga kan saüenla ho chaloua kan shanga shabü dela saumei saübü kaneibü shabü pendou ka kan
Ho kan shanga khümbo haksobü nou, hoba kanei kan lolo mühei nyengko khonsakjan, ho ponpen shanga song che ki.
Hobaje ungshedbou ao bou jeila khümbo kuko onang naangkuko pienlaje haoei shabü saumei saübü kümsilei kümlabü, hoba bhemba nei neisimei, khei saopobü hele lejan:

Hobaje haoei saopobü lemshang saüsimaü shanga saumei saülabü hoba kamshang neichem hoba lemshang shanga haoei saumei saübü kümsilei kümlabü hoba haoei ungshedbou hoba eikshuong pendou shanga saumei saülabü.
Hobaje Israel shousi shabü pendou shanga po chenei shabü debü saumei saübü kümsilei kümlabü; ho kan shanga ponpen song che kilabü. Hobaje
Aron hoba haoeibü shousi hoba Israel shousi pendou to lenshi,
Israelbü yoa aoyouei kamshanga masu ayingsi sanlon ayingsi lon haitilaje, ayingsi kamshang khong aenei haitilaje,
hoba kho
Haoeneibü lembü laobou khonga haitilaje kho Israelbü shuongei haoeneibü lembü jungan loulabü, kho
Hobaje ungshedbouei sii kho

Touje haoenei haoeneibü shatsinam haitian lembü kaokabü mühghaü lonpaang heangsho la lembü akulabü, laobou phaito haoenei pejapelako phaisemda. Ho haoen shanga meten sünga ponpen shanga ngühkhüm kilabü.
Hobaje nyi haoen to lenlabü, Israelbü aoyouei ayingsi haoen yoa kibü küksithang yoa aoei juokbü lembü ayingsi haitian lembü kulaje,
hoba kho
Hobaje Israelbü ayingsi haoen yoa kibü küksithangbü aoei sii shaulaje, sii shaubü khulimbo ngo kilabü, hoba hao jembü mütli ka wapan aplabü.
Aishanga phe langkei kho siia ki; hoba kho ngei kan la kaneibü lembü shanga lemshang thüka shabü shanga saumei saüla kua; aieilausi lang kibü kho siiei saüenda.
Hibü ngei Israel shousi shuong to lenkei, kan aoeikei sii ashaulabü, ayingsi kan yoa kibü küksithangbü aoeikei sii ashaujan.

Hobaje Israel shousi shuong yoa aoyouei ayingsi haoen yoa kibü küksithangbü aoyouei meisiau ayingsi au at mei kipjinei shaulaje, haoei khoeibü sii kho saangan aptilabü hoba kho thamei jonlepnyu phokujan.

Aieilausi meisiau pendou langkeibü kho sii khoei ki, hibü ngei Israel shousi shuong to laukei, “Kanei meisiau aieibü siikei ashaulabü, aieilausi meisiau pendou langkei kho sii khoei ki, aoyouei kho shaulaje wapan aplabü.”

Hobaje müt weko aoei hao lolo haibü ayingsi meisiauei shakettibü haibü mang shaulaje, hao kho sangbüshou yingsikei küksithangbü yinga tegükei haoei jembü neisimei sakjan hoba hao jembü lolo mangyuan apjan hoba nangnak sühko asaopoko kilabü.
Lausikei haoei khübü kho asaklonga hoba mang yuan üplonga kheijinei haoei jembü shabü künlabü.
Israelbü to lenashi, “Ngo
Kan kibü Ijep kaodaka kümbü tegü kanei akümjan; hoba ngei kan leian loula kibü Kanan kaodaka kümbü tegü kanei akümlabü, haoeneibü song tegü akümlabü.
Ngeibü song kanei kümshi, hoba kanei ngeibü ngühkhüm phoashi, hoba khübünei paiashi. Ngo
Hibü kanei ngeibü ngühkhüm hoba song jungeijan; kho kümbüei müt langkei kilabü; Ngo
Kan aoeikei jembü chungsi- phang to ajamjan, Ngo
Nyi kanyu ao kaibü nyu ki; nyi sao to himou tejungei.
Nyi kaboueibü yak to himou tejungei, sao kaibü nyu ki.
Nyi kaibü nousina, kabou ayingsi kanyueibü nouyangshou chema ayingsi lubüa bukbü to himou tejungei.
Nyi kaibü jayangshoueibü nouyangnyu ayingsi kaibü nouyangshoueibü nouyangnyu to himou tejungei; aishanga haoen kaibü jembü phe ki.
Nyi kaboueibü yakeibü nou- yangnyu aotokei himou tejungei, aieilausi sao kana ki.
Nyi kaboueibü nou ayingsi na to himou tejungei aieilausi sao kaibü chempen ki. Nyi kanyueibü nou ayingsi na to himou tejungei, aieilausi sao kanyueibü chempen ki.
Nyi kabou jaishoubou ayingsi kabou nashoubou himou tebauti, tetlabü no haoyak nyangko ohaujan, sao kaibü nyumaunyu ki.
Nyi kashoueibü yak to himou tejungei, sao kashoueibü yak ki, nyi himou tebauti.
Nyi kajai ayingsi kanaeibü yak to himou tejungei, kho kajai ayingsi kana himou bautibü ki.
Nyi yaksanyu si saoeibü nouyangnyu ham to himou tejungei; nyi saoeibü jayangshou nouyangnyu hoba saoeibü nouyangnyueibü nouyangnyu yoa himou alejan; haoen kato nyangyoakei. Kho asangalanbü ki.
Nyi kaibü shaangbü yak lang kian sao to tokyoko nou ayingsi na yakla lela himou tejungei.
Nyi yaksa nei totnyinbüa kijinei sao to tejam.
Nyi kaibü lepboueibü yak to shabü shonko tejam.
Kanei kaneibü shou aokei Molek kümsilei shanga lemla akujan, ayingsi kanei kaneibü Mühghaü nyen aweasüngko tejungei. Ngo
Nyi yaksa to tegü bousu to tejam; ho mangsenlabü ki.
Hobaje meisiau aitokei nyi no lolo khoei shalabü lele tejam; ayingsi yaksa aoeikei meisiau thedanga jamla loan akijan, kho songa akibü.
No lolo aikei khübünei shabü teshon; aishanga ngei kan thedang ka shian sattiko kibü phangshuong kheibü pendoua totnyinan kia:
Hobaje kaonyek shaenan kia; hibü shed shonbü shanga ngei shieikoeda, hoba kaonyekei haoeibü mütshuong inletda.

Hibü kan thedanga kibü phangshuong kaonyekei inletbü tegütham kan khoei shed shontijinei kaonyekei inletlabü shanga sangbüshou yingsikei kan yoa kibü küksithangbü yingasikei ngühkhüm hoba ngeibü matjem jungeijan, hoba khübü mangsenlabü aikei teküm.
Aishanga khübü mangsenlabü pendou kan to shaang kibü mütshuongei kümbei, hoba kaonyek shatian kia.
Aishanga aoyouei kheibü mangsenlabü kümsilei at ongkei kümlaje khübü kümbü mütshuong haoen mütli ka wapan aplabü.
Hibü ngei sakkubü kanei jungeijan, khei kan to shaang kibü shuongeibü kümsilei lulu ai teküm, hoba kan lolo khünei shed teshon, Ngo
Israelbü shuong haoen pendou liko yoshaitian lenashi, “Kan saopoan kishi, aishanga ngo
Kan mütpem wekoei lulueibü nyu to bou to soumo hatjan, hoba kanei ngeibü Nounyet noujan; ngo
“Kan heangsho aeto tesepei, ayingsi kan jembü shanga namdei lembüei kümbü mühghaü teküm, ngo
“Ladang kanei sangmai lembü
Kho kanei kubü chaloua hoba nyibounyet shaujan, hoba sembounyet sühko jouan kialonga kho wana jikan apjan.
Kho sembounyet ong shaualonga kho mangsenlabü ki; kho asungletlabü.
Lausikei mütpem weko aoei kho shaulaje haoei shonbü shedbü künlabü, aieilausi
“Ladang kanei kaneibü sek latlaje, nyi kaibü sek phajib sühko khümboje alatjan, ayingsi kaibü seklatjinei youman nyi ahejan.
Hobaje nyi kaibü semlüh seka nguiletbü hek athanshaijan, khübü kho shalebü hoba yenbou la apyokushi, ngo
“Kanei tekok ayingsi khüpbolangko tejungei ayingsi cheei che to yepeijaweko teküm.
Hobaje kanei kü nyena amlang tethetelan, kho nyi kaibü Mühghaü nyen shatida. Ngo
“Nyi kaibü lepbou telepetti, ayingsi hao ka teso; eikbüla munam akuko nyibounyet ngeyang sühko aphojan.
Nyi obangbü to akhükuokjan, ayingsi nyekthubü thedanga phaiyetlabü aphokujan, lausikei kaibü Mühghaü to hatjan. Ngo
“Kanei matjemshanga ngühmaangalanbü aikei akümjan; nyi shalebü to the techüh ayingsi yaangbü to phang che teying; lausikei ngühmaanglanbüei nyi kaibü lepbou matjemashi.
Nyi kaibü mütshuong yoa pintiaatibü ngüh tejungei. Hobaje nyi kaibü lepboueibü langkei thushed to tütti. Ngo
“Nyi kaibü maangpona kaibü jaisina amangsenjan, no haoeibü shedbüa ühamla shanga nyi hao to teshuok hakashi.
Nyi phok telam, ayingsi kaibü mütli shousi shuong khulimbo maangshat aikei tepho, lausikei nyi ka lepbou to jembü to tegü sanouashi. Ngo
“Kanei kü ngühkhüm jungeiashi. Shatsinam phang lulu cheei che to tenakti. Nyi kaibü seka lilabü penyi kheiyoan awenjan ayingsi peisilei phang lulu penyi soyoan kümbü neisimei nyi aneijan.
“Müt cheei aaosao, ao müei phean ki, lausikei tokei mo ajekthetkei, ayingsi sao alitikei, sao to asangalan jungeialonga haoen ngüh juonglabü; haoen ühaitilabü, aieilausi sao alitikei.
Hobaje haoei jembü shabü lembü
Hobaje ungshedbouei hao shanga shabü lembü sanlon paang khoei haoei shonbü shabü shanga
“Ladang kan kaonyek to louan shausiyung shanga bunyu phang juong kelaje, kanei lang kho noubüsoubü dogo weeijan. Po sem sühko ashaula noubü kho ashaujan.
Lausikei po leiboubüa khübü hek pendou saopobü kilabü, kho
Hobaje po ngaoboubüaje kho kan la athakko lang hekkula shanga kanei hek kho shaula thükkei. Ngo
“Kanei ai peisilei kei sii yoan ashaujan, kanei loulabü shanga tetlatalabü ayingsi seibü yaübü, takbüthapbü kümsilei teküm.
Kanei khunyem ayingsi sembung wi kütan üpjan.
Nyi haibü shanga kaibü manga awapngaijan ayingsi ka to shenlangela khükpüp khüngpüp aikei akümjan. Ngo
“Kaibü yaksa shousi shuong suonlamnyu la teyeiti, khei yingalonga kaonyek kho pejapela yeilabü hoba shabüei shenlabü.
Kanei ngeibü Nounyet junge- iashi, hoba lemshang to souhat kuashi. Ngo
“Kan seibüyaübü soushou jungto ayingsi haibü sou to joyobü seibü jungto sepeinyu tengai, haoenei shaantilabü lele haoen telam. Ngo
“No khuthu phambü jaishou yoa loashi, hoba chingbü jaishou pendou to souhat kujan, hoba nyi kaibü Mühghaü to souhat kujan. Ngo
“Ladang yenbou che, ka to bou laman kilaje kanei hao amaiko tejungei.
Ka to bou laman kibü yenbou kho ka junga kan yoa bukmüt tegü kilabü, hoba nyi hao to jembü tegü sanouashi; aishanga kan Ijep kaodaka yen la lean kikei. Ngo
“Kanei matjemshanga ngühmaang alanbü akümjan, süng si khaang takbüa, hauan chühbüa, ayingsi pem webüa,
seret haubü bu tükde, hauan chühbü tükde, efa tükde hoba hin tükde kanei kijan. Ijep kaodak ka leiyenbü ngo
Hobaje kanei ngeibü ngühkhüm pendou hoba ngeibü matjem pendou jungeijan, hoba khübü kho kümashi. Ngo

“Tokei nyi Israel shousi shuong to ho lenashi: Israel shousi ao yinglaje yingasikei, hoba Israelbü to bou laman kibü küksithang yingsikei aoei jembü shou Molek la khümbo kulaje, maimaitham haoje hailabü; kaonyeka kibü shuongei hao to laangei tetlabü.
Tokei ngo kho müt khulimbo lolabü, hoba hao jembü mütli ka wapan aplabü; aieilausi haoei haoeibü shousi shuongei ngeibü lemshang shatikei, hoba ngeibü nyen saopobü aweasüng la Molek la kuan apbei.
Hobaje kaonyek kabü shuongei ho mütei jembü shou Molek la khümbo kuan apjinei haoen nyek muan apalonga hoba hao ühaitilonga,
ngei ngo lolo ho müt hoba haoen chempen khulimbo lolabü hoba hao hoba hao phainei Molek yoa pejapelako haubü shuong haoeneibü mütli ka wapan aplabü.
“Hobaje yemshanla haubü hoba seibüyaübü shuong yoto pejapelako haula sepeinyu ngaibü müt khulimbo ngo lolabü hoba jembü mütli ka wapan aplabü.
Hibü kan lulu bangan kishi, hoba kan saopobü kishi, aishanga ngo
Hobaje kanei ngeibü ngühkhüm jungeiashi, hoba khübü kho kümashi; kan saüenkulabü
“Aishanga mütpem weko aoei jembü bou ayingsi jembü nyu to khüklauoklaje maimaitham haoje haitilabü; haoei bou ayingsi nyu to khükauokabü haoeibü sii haoeibü khua kilabü.
“Hobaje bousu aoei müeibü yak to jamlaje, khei jembü lepboueibü yak to jambou hoba jamnyu maimaitham haitilabü.
Aoei jembü boueibü yak to jamlaje haoei püh thea hao himou bautia, bousubou si yaksanyu ham haitilabü, haosieibü sii haosi thüka kilabü.
Müt cheei jembü li to jamalonga haosi ham tükde haitilabü, haosieibü sii haosi thükto ong yinglabü.
Bousu atei bousu to yaksa to tegü jamalonga haosi hamei mangsenlabü jungeia; haosieibü sii haosi to yinglabü.
Bousu cheei yaksa che hoba saoeibü nyu dogo lealonga kho pejapelabü; haoen yoa amaibü akila shanga bousubou si yaksa nyi ham wanei juokettijan.
Müt cheei meisiau to jamalonga hao haitilabü; hoba kanei meisiau kho haitijan.
Yaksa atei meisiau to jamalonga nyi yaksanyu hoba meisiau kho haitijan; haosieibü sii haosieibü khua kilabü.

“Müt cheei jembü nou ayingsi na jembü boueibü nouyangnyu ayingsi nyueibü nouyangnyu lean jamalonga kho himoulabü kümsilei ki; haoen jembü mütli thedang ka wapan apjan; haoei jembü nou ayingsi na to himou jungeikei; haoei jembü shabü künlabü.
Müt atei yaksa liteibü phejan sii haujinei yepalonga haoei sao to asang- alanda, hoba saoeikei jembü sii haubü tang khittida, hibü haosi ham jembü mütli ka wapan apjan.
“Nyi kanyueibü nou ayingsi na to ayingsi kaboueibü nou ayingsi na to ajamjan, aishanga khoei haoeibü chempen himou bautida, haoenei jembü shabü künlabü.
Müt atei jembü bou jaishoubou ayingsi bou nashouboueibü yak to yepsi haoei haobou jaishoubou ayingsi bou nashoubou himou bautida, haoenei jembü shedbü shonbü künlabü hoba haoen shousi akiko hailabü.
Müt atei jembü jaisinaeibü yak lealonga kho asaopobü ki; haoei jaisina püh thea himou bautida, haoen shousi akilabü.
“Khei yingbü khoei ngei kan ainei kitila leian loukei, kho kaonyekei kan nangan üptila shanga ngeibü ngühkhüm pendou ngeibü matjem pendou kanei phoashi; hoba khübü kho jungei- ashi.
Ngei kan thedang ka shian sattibü phangshuong song tegütham kan tepai; aishanga haoenei khübü pendou kümbei, hibü khoei ngei haoen mangsenkei.
Ngei kan to lena, kanei haoeneibü kaodak kiman sunglabü, sendei hoba naodei kouko kibü kaonyek kho kaneibü yingla ngei kan la kulabü; phangshuong ka kan bangtibü

Hibü kanei saopobü meisiau asaopobü meisiau ka, hoba asaopobü ausiyuk saopobü ka bangtijan; hoba yangsikok ayingsi ausiyukkei ayingsi kan ka asaopobü pinyinan phokubü kaoa paibü aieikei kaneibü soushou mangsenlabü teyeiti; aishanga ngo
Hobaje kan ngeibü yeila saopoan kishi; aishanga ngo
“Tokei, bousu yingsikei, yaksa yingsikei soushou yemshanla haubü, ayingsi seibüyaübü tükde haitilabü; haoenei haoen laangei tetettilabü; haoeneibü sii haoen to yinglabü.”
jembü chema chempen, jembü nyusibou hoba jembü shou, hoba jembü nouyangnyu, hoba jembü jaisina, haibü to liman aoeikei jembü lulu adotyojan;
hoba haoen chempen, jembü nou ayingsi na medei ao saosüngbü ki sao shangaje haoei jembü lulu totyola thükkei.
Hao jembü mütli yoa kongnyubou yingsije, jembü to aweasünglabü lele haoei jembü lolo atotyojan.
“Haoenei haoneibü khu tongko shuan üpjan, ayingsi haoeneibü sembung wi shuan üpjan ayingsi haoeneibü manga aikei apüpjan.
Haoenei haoeneibü Mühghaü nyen ashajan, aieilausi wanei
Haoenei pejapela asangalan sao alejan; ayingsi sao laoei sattibü alejan, aishanga hao Mühghaü thedanga saopobü ki.
Hibü nyi hao saüenan phokujan, aishanga haoei kaibü Mühghaüeibü wentek lembü kuda; kan shanga hao saopobü yingjan; aishanga ngo
Hobaje ungshedboueibü nou- yangnyuei asangalanko jembü lolo shabüa dotko kialonga saoei jembü bou aweasüngda, sao kho wanei juokettijan.

“Hobaje ao jembü jaisina yoa thükkabou ungshedbou ki, hoba aoeibü khua naanglabü onang yeian jinkuan ki, hoba aola saopobü hele lekuda haoei jembü khulou bungbungsese aphojan, ayingsi jembü neisimei jitnyinan alejan,
ayingsi jembü bou shanga ayingsi jembü nyu shanga jembü lolo dotnyinko haibü mang aitokei ohaujan;
ayingsi hao lemshang ka alongjan, ayingsi haoeibü Mühghaü lemshang adotnyinjan, aishanga hao Mühghaüeibü onang naangko pienbü khümbo kubü hao to kia. Ngo
Hobaje haoei saosüngbü medei lejan.
Latnyu ayingsi bangbü ayingsi leilubü yaksa ayingsi asangalan sao khübü haoei alejan; lausikei jembü mütli ka saosüngbü medei haoei yakla lejan.
Hobaje jembü mütli yoa haoei jembü shousi shuong adottijan; aishanga kan saüenan phokubü Mühghaü ngo ki.”
“Aron to lenashi: Kaibü mütli yoa nali thebü aoao yinglaje yingsikei loulabü meten sünga hao Mühghaü shanga wentek lembü kula telouti.
Aishanga laobou müt to ong nali kilaje hao aloujan, nyekthubü yingsikei, sokebü yingsikei, kung pheijobü yingsikei, mütsha mütkok yingsikei, ajanjan pendou aei yembü yingsikei,
you leilubü yingsikei, ik leilubü yingsikei,
shenjang tokbü yingsikei, ik ngokbü yingsikei, shished küngshed yingsikei ayingsi nyekei amubü yingsikei, nyik baubü moushed kakbü yingsikei, kümsamenang yingsikei, hoba tokkhet yembü müt yingsikei,
Aron ungshedboueibü shousi mütli aokei wanei
Haoei jembü Mühghaüeibü saopoenbü ayingsi saopobü kho shaula thükkei.
Ngeibü lemshang adotnyintila shanga haoei thangtetbü khüto ong ütjan, aieilausi hao to nali theakei, aishanga kan saüenan phokubou Mühghaü kho ngo ki.”
Kho tegü Mosaei Aron to lenkei, hoba haoeibü shousi shuong hoba Israel shousi pendou to joyokei.
“Aron hoba haoeibü shousi shuong to ngeibü nyen saopobü aweasüngko akitila shanga haoenei kü la khümbo kubü Israelbü shuong saopobü jongsak shanga maangsangla lenashi; ngo

Haoen to lenashi, kan meten sünga kan ao yinglaje yingsikei jembü to asaopobü kaakan, Israel shousi shuongei Mühghaü shanga saopobü jongsak khümbo kubü saopobü peisilei nyangko loulaje kho müt kho kü thedang ka wapan aplabü, ngo

“Aroneibü shousi yoa müt aoyou im bauan ki, ayingsi mang ka sii senbü ka khonkuko kilaje, haoei hao ihinsei shongko sao- pobü peisilei kho ashaujan; ayingsi müt atei haibü mang to meitibüei asaopoko apan kijinei hao to aoyouei meitilaje ayingsi senko kibü müt to meitibü yingsikei,
ayingsi meisiau to meitibüei hao asaopobü shonjung loubü yingsikei ayingsi müt at danko hao ai ong asaopobü ki kho shonjung loubü yingsikei,
müt aoyouei kheibü khüto meitilaje nangnak sühko asaopoko kilabü, hoba haoei jembü mang deia yuan üplonga haoei saopobü jongsak kho ashaujan.
Hobaje ladang chanyu neplaje hao saopoan aplabü; hoba haoei phaila saopobü peisilei kho shaulabü, aieilausi kho haoeibü wentek ki.
Laobou hao lolo haibü ki, ayingsi meisiauei taketbü ki khoei jembü lolo akhonyola shanga haoei ashaujan; ngo
“Ho khonnyinbü shanga haoen la shabü küntiko kho shangaje haoen ühaila shanga haoenei ngeibü ngühkhüm jungeijan; haoen saüenan phokubou Mühghaü ngo
“Lubüeije aoeikei saopobü peisilei ashaujan. Yensiau ayingsi ungshedbou yoa homan kibü sambü aoeikei kho saopobü shausiyung ashaujan.
Lausikei ungshedbou cheei aao müt jekan kialonga haoei shaula thükkei; hoba haoeibü chemdanga bukbü shuongei haoeibü wentek shaula thükkei.
Ungshedboueibü nou- yangnyu lubü kümbüleibü cheei lean kialonga saopobü peisilei lembü kho yaksanyu khoei ashaujan.

Lausikei ungshedboueibü yaksa shou latnyu la leko kialonga ayingsi bangan kialonga hoba shousi akilonga hoba sao medeia kijineibü tegü sao boueibü chem to longeian kialonga saoei bou shangabü wentek kho shaula thükkei; lausikei lubüeije kho ashaulabü.
“Hobaje müt atei saopobü peisilei mashikan shausi haoei khünei phejan ngaoboubü jinkujan, hoba saopobü peisilei kho ungshedbou la kujan.
Hobaje haoenei saopobü peisilei shaubüei haoen la shabü shontilabü lele,
Israel shousi shuongei saopobü peisilei shuong haoenei ashatijan, aishanga haoen saüenkubou

Aron hoba haoeibü shousi shuong hoba Israel shousi shuong to lenashi, Israel mütlia ayingsi Israelbü yoa küksithang ao yinglaje yingsikei khei haoei lemla kubü, haoeneibü takletbü lembü yingsikei laobou haoenei juokbü lembü shanga
masu pongsu, sanlon ayingsi lon kap anakbü paangei kanei lemjan.
Lausikei aito ong nali thelaje kanei khoei alemjan, aishanga kho kan shanga asungletlabü.
Hobaje aoyouei
Nyekthubü ayingsi leilubü ayingsi pheilebü, moushat takbü ayingsi nyik baubü khübü kho
Khei yingsikei, masu yingsikei sanlon yingsikei you hongbü, you kaobü maangmai lembü shangaje nyi kula thükkei; lausikei theletbü shangaje kho asungletlabü.
Meisiau laobou ong temlang jangnyinan ayingsi nitnyinan, ayingsi leiluan ayingsi wapnyinan kilaje kanei
Ayingsi küksithang ik ka kanei Mühghaü shanga wentek aikei kheibü meisiauei alemjan; aieilausi khübü to haoen amubü kia, khübü to nali kia; kan shanga khübü kho asungletlabü.
Hobaje kho masu pi yingsikei sanlon nyu yingsikei, kanei kho shoushou si nyu ham liko nyetchenei ong ühaitijan.
Hobaje ladang kanei
Khünyet khoyama shaujan, nyibounyet ngeyang sühko kanei aikei jouan aphojan; ngo
Hibü kanei ngei sakkubü shuong jungeiashi, hoba khübü kho kümashi; ngo
Hobaje kanei ngeibü nyen saopobü aweasüngko teki; lausikei ngo Israel shousi yoa saopobü kilabü;
Kan saüenkubou
Israelbü shousi shuong to lenashi,
Chalou laknyet kümsilei kümlabü, lausikei nyetbounyet atshaitham haksoko noulabü, Nounyet saopobü kambü kia; kanei ai kümsilei akümjan; ho
Habü ho
Shaangbou lita chalou anthük leiboubü chasemlama
Hobaje lit jeteibü chalou anthük ngaoboubüa
Shaangbou nyet kanei saopobü kambü che kijan hoba kanei kümsilei akümjan.
Lausikei chalou nyet kanei
hoba kan shanga sungletlabü hoba haoei
Hobaje kanei youman jipeibü chaloua
Hobaje ponlem maibü shanga

Kho chalou asüh shongko kaneibü Mühghaü lembü kho jungan alou shongko kanei wentek yingsikei ang si thengbü ayingsi haanbü nyak ngoubü yingsikei ashaujan, ho kan kishang pendoua kan meten sünga ponpen shanga ki.
Hobaje Nounyet wanan nyibounyet ka kanei jipbü lembü shanga youman sungbabü chalou ka bale nyet danan phaia kanei wean chühjan.
Khei balenyet danan phaia nyibounyet ka kanei chalou anjinsem wejan; hoba kanei
Kan kishang ka wentek yaangbü penyi jipbü lembü shanga efa an phejana penyi kanei sungbajan; khübü kho wen inyaibü tokai yoan kümbü shaangbou hek
Hobaje wentek yoa khünei nali athebü po cheeibü shou sanlon paang nyet hoba masu pongsu shoushou che, hoba sanlon paang penyi kanei kujan; shausiyung hoba yunglabü lembü, ponlem maibü shanga
Hobaje shabü lembü shanga lon paang che hoba sangmai lembü shanga po cheeibü shou sanlon penyi kanei lemjan.
Hobaje
Hobaje khünyet tham kanei khong ngeklabü; kan shanga saopobü kambü kilabü; kanei nyishou tegü kümsilei kongkongle akümjan, kanei meten sünga kan kishang pendoua ho ponpen ngühkhüm kilabü.
Hobaje ladang kanei sek latdaje nyi kaibü sek phajib sühko alatjan, ayingsi kaibü sek ka youman atbü si maabü nyi ahejan; nyi khübü kho shalebü si yenbou shanga apyokuashi; ngo
Kanei nyishou tegü kümsilei kongkongle akümjan; hoba
Hobaje khünyet kanei kümsilei ai teküm; aishanga
Aishanga khünyet aoyouei jembü lulu khon asaklaje jembü mütli ka wapan aplabü.
Hobaje khünyet aoyouei kümsilei at ongkei kümlaje, kho müt ngei hao mütli ka mautilabü.
Kanei kümsilei aikei akümjan; kan kishang pendoua kan meten sünga ho ponpen shanga ngühkhüm ki.
Ho kan shanga kaangkosekko haksobü nou ki, hoba kanei jembü lolo mühei nyengko khonsakjan; lit güboubüa chasem ka chasem sühko kanei kaneibü Nounyet phojan.
Shaangbounyet kho noknyüh saopobü kambü che kilabü; kanei kümsilei kaangbüsekbü aikei akümlabü.
shanga wanei lembü nyetnyet kanei lembü kujan; setbounyeta kan shanga noknyüh saopobü kambü kilabü, hoba
(Habü ho chalou angboua lemlabü takletbü songle lemsilang ki, khei laonyet kanei
Khübü lembüsabü shuong kho songle Nounyet hoba kaibü jongsak shuong hoba nyi theletlanletbü hoba
Kanei ladang kaonyeka buhek yoshailaje, lit nyetboubü chalou anthük ngaoboubüa kanei
Hobaje shaangbounyet kanei hemaibü bunyu buhek, pünglong bhek, ik hongmaibü bunyem hoba shumanga kibü willo bunyem sungbalabü, hoba chalou nyetnyet
Hobaje kanei ho poa nyetnyet
Nyetnyet kan dipchema kilabü; ngei kan Ijep kaodak ka leiyenjinei; Israel shousi shuong dipchema kitikei dogo kaneibü meten shuongei ngela shanga
Israel bukmüt pendou dipchema kijan; ngo
Hobaje Israel shousi shuong la
Athakko wanthung jikan phola Israel shousi shuong to wanthung oliv onang nitbü lanbü ka jungto sungbatila sakkushi.
Kamshang neichem ngühkhüm busen thüka Aronei kho chasem ka ngeyang sühko
Haoei hon lanbü wanthung denshang khünei
Hobaje nyi wen inyaibü sungan khoei wentek anthüknyi kümjan; wentek chenei efa an phejana phejan penyi kilabü.
Hobaje hon lanbü khümsok thüka
Hobaje
Nounyet weko haoei kho küpjembo
Hobaje kho Aron hoba haoeibü shousi shuong shanga kilabü hoba kho haoenei lemshanga shaujan, aishanga ho ponpen ngühkhüm, wanei

Hobaje Israel saoeibü shou che, aoeibü bou Ijepbü kikei, Israelbü yoa haukei, hoba Israel saoeibü shou si Israelbü che kho shaishanga oyo khangkei hoba Israel saoeibü shouei Mühghaü nyen to nyikuko khükkeiuokkei, hibü haoenei hao Mosa jungto leibakei, aoeibü nyu nyen kho Dan phang ka Dibri nouyangshou Shelomit kikei.
maang- angbü ai kho angeti shongko haoenei hao khinan phokei.
“Shaishang khongmaang to aoei khükkeiuokkei hao leiba. Hobaje haoei laubü ditbü pendouei ikei haoeibü khua shangetan shuong pendouei hao to laangei sonlabü.
Hobaje nyi Israelbü shousi shuong to lenashi, aoei ong jembü Mühghaü to khüklauoklaje haoei jembü shabü künlabü.
Hobaje aoei
“Hobaje aoei müt che hailabü lele leilutilaje maimaitham haitilabü.
Hobaje aoei shatsinam to hailabü lele leilutilaje kho shemtilabü; langkei jeila langkei.
“Hobaje müt atei jembü lepbou la leilutia longa; haoei kümbü tegü haoeikei kümlabü.
Leilubü jeila leilubü, nyek jeila nyek, hau jeila hau, haoei müt la nali thetibü tegü haolakei thetilabü.
Aoei meisiau haitilaje kho shemtilabü; hoba aoei müt haitilaje hao haitilabü.
Küksithang yingsikei, sangbüshou yingsikei, kan ngühkhüm che ong kilabü, aishanga ngo
Kho tegü Mosaei Israel shousi shuong to joyokei hoba aoei shaishang khongmaanga khükkeiuokkei hao leibakei, hoba laangei tetkei. Kho tegü Israel shousi shuongei
Israel shousi shuong to lenshi, ladang ngei kan la kubü kaonyek to kan loulaje kheijinei
Po lak nyi kaibü seka kela onglabü hoba po lak nyi kaibü semlühlaaka bhek wapan aplabü, hoba khoeibü hek thanan pholabü.
Lausikei po nyetboua kaonyek shanga khümbo kuan noubü nou po kilabü, kho
Kaibü seka ai ong yemlaje nyi kho alatjan hoba nyi semlüh wapan üpbo kibü ka semlüh akheijan; kho kaonyek shanga khümbomeiko hakso po kilabü.
Hobaje noubü poa kaonyuei ai ong hekkulaje kho ka shanga, kaibü sambü shanga, sambüsao shanga hoba ka yoa mulambü sambü hoba ka yoa homan kibü yenbou shuong shanga shausiyung kilabü.
Hobaje kaibü samkeisamok hoba yamkabü meisiau shanga kho ka longbü pendou shausiyung kilabü.
Kanei po shuong Nounyet wejan, nyetnei nyet po; kaneibü po shuong Nounyet penbü, po saonyito gü kilabü.
Kheijinei nyi lit nyetboubü chalou anboubüa nyi teklaang ngüh yaangbü pendou aeto hautijan; saumei saünyet ka kanei kaneibü kaon- yek pendou to teklaang ngühlang hautijan.

Hobaje anjinsem boubü po kho kanei saüenlabü, hoba kaonyek pendoua müt pendou to dongebü thu ngekletkulabü; kan shanga ho jubilee kilabü hoba kan mütpem weko jembüei kibü peisilei lambo sepeijung ngailabü, hoba kan mütpem weko jembü chempen jungto sepeijung ngailabü.
Kan shanga ho po anjinsem onbü jubilee kilabü, kanei akeaonglabü ayingsi khünei hao lolo yembükei alatlabü ayingsi wapan üpbhembo kibü ka semlüh hek akheilabü.
Aishanga ho Jubilee ki, ho kan shanga saopobü kilabü, sek ka ai longkei kho kanei shaulabü.
Kho Jubilee Po kan mütpem weko jembü nyaksinam jungto sepeilabü.
Hobaje nyi kaibü sangbüyambü la kao at kuan kisi ayingsi kaibü sangbüyambü ka jekan kisi kan cheei che to lepbolangko akümjan.
Jubilee po lühbak tetan nyi kaibü lepbou ka jekjan, hoba langle kesiong longlabü po wean chühjan, haoei ka la yaakkujan.
Po juong yingalonga munam kho kho thüng yaang kilabü, po kho shisho ong yingalonga munam kho thüng shian kilabü, aishanga langle longlabü lühbak tetan chühan ka la yaaklabü ki.
Hibü kan cheei che akhüpettijan, lausikei nyi kaibü Mühghaü to hatjan, aishanga ngo kaneibü
Hibü kanei ngeibü ngühkhüm phai semashi hoba ngeibü matjem to ngüha leashi, hoba khübü kho jungeiashi, hoba kan kaonyeka püetan kilabü.
Hobaje kaoei kan la haoeibü hek hekkulabü hoba kan shi shenko shaulabü hoba kan khünei püetangetan kilabü.
Hobaje kanei akeaonglonga hoba sek alatlonga po nyetboubüa künei ai shaula dogo kanei laualonga,
ngei po lakboubüa po sem heklabü mai hektilabü lele ngei kan thükto haülabü hautikulabü.
Hobaje po setboubüa kanei kesiong jinjinei hangbü nyak shauko kilabü, hoba po güboubü nyaka ashuok shongko hangbü nyak shauko kilabü.
Kao kho ponpen lole shanga ayaakjan; aishanga kao kho ngeibü ki; aishanga kan kü yoa yenbou hoba pensiyen shuong ki.
Hobaje kanei phetphan kibü kao pendoua kanei kao shanga angnam sakkujan.
Kaibü jaisina at shale phama longa hoba haoei nyaksinam at yaakalonga kheijinei hao nyangbü chempen at louan haoeibü jaisinaei yaakbü kho angngailabü.
Müt atei kho angngailabü chempen akilonga hoba müt kho angngailabü lele keian apan kialonga,
haoei kho yaakbü chalou ka po wean chühlabü hoba haoei yaakbü müt kho la joubü shanga ngaingoulabü hoba haoei jembü nyaksinam lengailabü.
Lausikei haoei kho nyibou lengaila nam akilonga, haoei ai yaakkei kho jekbou ika jubilee po asüh shongko kilabü; jubileea haoei litilabü, hoba haoei haoeibü nyaksinam nyibou lengailabü.
Müt atei lelepan kibü sangnyu maanga kishang chem yaakan kisi kho yaakan po che onan phaiaje haoei kho jekngaila thükkei; po che sünga shanga haoei jekngaila janbü yinglabü.
Hobaje po che onan kho ajekngaiko kisi kheijinei lelepan kibü sangnyu phanga kibü chem kho aoei jekkei, meten sünga kho ponpen hao shangabü yeitilabü, jubilee poakei kho alitilabü.
Lausikei sangnyua kibü chem shuong laobou kaijembo ba alekei, kaonyeka sek kibü to weyolabü; khübü kho angngaila thükkei, hoba jubilee poa khübü kho litilabü.
Khei yingsikei Levibü sangnyu shuong shanga, hoba haoeneibü sangnyua kibü chem shuong shanga Levibüei ladang lemang sühlaje kheijinei angngaila thükkei.

Hobaje Levibü cheei angngaibü janbü kho ajungeilonga haoenei phet phanan kibü chem che yaakan kibü kho jubilee poa litilabü, aishanga Israelbü yoa Levi phang sangnyua chem shuong kho haoen shangabü ki.
Lausikei haoeneibü sanglea sek ayaaklabü; aishanga kho ponpen haoen shangabü ki.
Hobaje kaibü jaisina shale phamalonga, hoba ka yoa hao jembü lolo athuienlonga kheijinei nyi hao to thuijan; yenbou hoba bou laman kibü tegü hao kitijan.
Nam ayingsi peisileia nyi aikei phopbü tele, lausikei kaibü jaisina ka yoa kilabü lele kaibü Mühghaü to hatashi.
Nyi phopnam leko nyi kaibü nam telotku, ayingsi hapngaila shanga kaibü shausiyung hao la teku.
Kan la Kanan kaodak kulabü hoba ngo kaneibü Mühghaü yinglabü; kan Ijep kaodak ka leiyenbü
Kaibü jaisina shale phambo ka junga kialonga hoba hao lolo ka la yaakalonga nyi hao jekthetbü aao che tegü ayeitijan.
Mulambü che tegü bou laman kibü che tegü ka yoa hao kilabü;
kho phaia hao hoba haoeibü shousi shuong ka jungka satan aplabü, hoba jembü chempen hoba pisibou nyaksinam lamjung ngailabü.
Aishanga Ijep kaodak ka ngei leiyenbü haoen ngeibü sambü ki; haoen aao tegü ayaakjan,
Nyi hao thüka maanga yaman song adakjan;
hoba kaibü aao hoba aaosao yeila shanga no kaijembo kibü phangshuong ka haoen aao müt bousu si yaksa jekjan.
Tokei küksithang kan yoa homan kibü shousi shuong hoba kan yoa kibü chem- pen hoba haoen yoka kaneibü kaonyeka bukyohaayobü shuong haoen ka kanei jeklabü; khübü kho kaneibü yinglabü.

Hobaje ka phainei phet tegü haoen kaibü shousi shuongeibü yeitikulabü, hoba phet phantilabü; haoen kanei ponpen shanga aao jekla thükkei. Lausikei kaibü jaisina Israel shousi shuongje kan cheei che thüka maangayambo ajungeijan.

Hobaje yenbou ayingsi ka yoa homan kibü at, keialonga hoba kaibü jaisina che hao junga shale phaman kialonga hoba yenbou ayingsi homan kibü ka phanga kibü la yaakan kialonga ayingsi yenboueibü chempen la hao lolo yaakan apalonga,
haoei hao lolo yaaka tegükei thenbülenbü shuongei hao angngaila thükkei.
Ayingsi bou nashoubou ayingsi bou jaishouboueibü shousiei hao angngaila thükkei, ayingsi haoeibü thenboulenbou tegü atei hao angngaila thükkei; ayingsi hao keialonga haoei hao lolo angngaila thükkei.
Hobaje haoei hao lolo yaakbü po ka jubilee po sühko hauan hao jekbü müt yoa weyojan, hoba hao yaakbü munam kho po penbü thüng yingjan; hao mulambü sambü tegü hao yoa kilabü.
Tokei po juong jouan kialonga khübü tetan hao jekbü nam ka hao angngaibü mu hao la kungaijan.
Hobaje jubilee po sühla poa shisho ong jouan kialonga kheijinei haoei hao yoa weyolabü hoba haoeibü po kho tetan chühan, haoei hao angngaibü mu kungailabü.
Po weko chale khüpbü sambü tegü hao thüka maanga yaman song adakjan.
Hobaje khübü khoei hao üangngailonga hao hoba hao yoa haoeibü shousi shuong jubilee poa solo haplabü.
Aishanga kü thedanga Israel shousi shuong sambü ki, haoen ngei Ijep kaodak ka leiyenbü ngeibü sambü shuong ki, ngo
“Kanei kan shanga ai heangsho teküm, ayingsi heangsho jakenbü yingsikei, thaonyu yingsikei, kanei tepho, ayingsi kaneibü kaodaka khüpetla shanga aikei laangei küman tepho, aishanga ngo
Kanei ngeibü Nounyet shuong nouashi, hoba ngeibü lemshang to sou hatashi, ngo
“Kanei ngeibü ngühkhüma paialonga, hoba sakkubü jungeialonga hoba khübü kho kümalonga;
kheijinei ngei kan shanga jihsiphai paplepbüa lang yantikulabü, hoba kaoei jembü lang hekkulabü, hoba yama bunyuei jembü hek hekkulabü.
Hobaje kaneibü youshou nakbü semlüh hek kheibü jih sühko kilabü, hoba kaneibü semlüh hek kheibü jih sühko kilabü, hoba kanei kaneibü shausiyung apsileko shaulabü hoba kan kaonyeka khümenan kilabü.
“Hobaje ngei kaonyeka sangmai kulabü, hoba kan aitokei ühütko lengan kilabü. Hobaje meisiau amaibü ngei kaonyek ka shian sattikulabü, hoba kaneibü kaonyek danko in aikei adantikulabü.
Kanei labou shieilabü hoba kan thedanga haoen inei tuonglabü.
Kan müt ngaoei saongao shieilabü, hoba saongaoei hajar an shieilabü, hoba kaneibü dangbou kan thedanga inei tuonglabü.
Hobaje ngei kan weeilabü hoba kaneibü lilabü bukyo haayotilabü, hoba kan haala yaanglabü, hoba ngeibü thebülanbü kan yoa kümlabü.
Hobaje kanei hangbü nyak lounyu thanan phobü shaula kilabü, hoba haanbü shanga hangbü nyak pu kho sungenlabü.
Hobaje ngeibü lemshang neichem kan yoa phokulabü; hoba ngeibü soushouei kan amangsenlabü.
Ngo kan yoa pailabü hoba kaneibü Mühghaü kilabü hoba kan ngeibü mütli yinglabü.
Kan haoeneibü aaola ayeilabü shanga Ijep kaodak ka kan leiyenbou ngo
“Lausikei kanei kü to ngüha alelonga, hoba habü sakkubü pendou akümlonga; hoba kanei ngeibü ngühkhüm asungletlonga,
hoba ngei sakkubü pendou akümlonga ngeibü thebülanbü leilulabü lele kaibü soushouei ngeibü matjem mangsena longa,

ngeikei kan to ho kümlabü; kaneibü nyek hoba kaushang lühko shatbü longtilabü lele ngei kan thükto hatlamoklabü khukushat hoba lühshatei sühtilabü; hoba kanei kaneibü kesiong amlang jim akibüa keanongan aplabü, aishanga kaneibü dangbou shuongei kho shaulabü.
Ngeibü the kan khulimbo kilabü, hoba kaneibü dangbou thedanga kan phetetlabü; aoyouei kan to mangsenda haoenei kan thüka song daklabü; hoba aoeikei shijung aloujinei kan satyolabü.
“Hobaje khübü kho shangakei kanei kü to ngüha alelonga kheijinei kaneibü shabü shanga ngei nyetneiei aei kan shieikoelabü.
Hobaje kan tubüsekbü lilisese ngei leilutikulabü; hoba ngei kaneibü müh kho nam kaangbü tegü hoba kaneibü kao chisaknam tegü yeitikulabü.
Hobaje kaneibü hau amlanga aplabü, aieilausi kaneibü kaoei hek ahekkulabü, ayingsi kaneibü kaokabü bulongei lang ahekkulabü.
Hobaje kanei kü to dangyoko kialonga hoba kü to ngüha alelonga, kaneibü shabü thüng kan thükto khonsak nyetneiei aei juongtikulabü.

Hobaje kaneibü shousi shuong haoenei solabü hoba kaneibü samkeisamuk shatsinam mautikulabü hoba shisho la ong yeitikuko kaneibü lam sangliphang la yeitikulabü lele ngei kan yoa yam ka meisiau litikulabü.
“Hobaje kho thepetbüei kan kü jungto asepei longa hoba kü to dangyoko kia longa,
kheijinei sepeian ngokei kan to dangbou la yeian kilabü, hoba kaneibü shabü shanga nyetneiei ngei kan khonkutilabü.

Hobaje kanei theyolanyobü leilubü shanga phoklamla ngei kan thükto in sungbakulabü; hoba kaneibü sangnyu shuong phanga liko onshaitikulabü; kan yoa ngei limsilang hautikulabü; hoba dangbou shuong ik to ngei khümbo kulabü.

Kan senetan kibü wentek kho ladang ngei sungngailaje, yaksa müt anei wen ngoubü chak chenei ong wentek kümlabü, hoba kan la wentek hauan chühan ong kulabü, hoba kanei shaulabü, lausikei senyüh ashemlabü.
“Hobaje habü pendou shangakei kanei kü ngüha alelonga hoba dangyoleyoko kialonga,
kheijinei ngo khauang longbü kan yoa dangyoko kilabü; hoba tokei kaneibü shabü shanga nyetneiei kan shieikoelabü.
Hobaje kanei kaneibü jayang nouyang shousi shuongeibü phe shaulabü.

Hobaje ngei kaneibü lemshang shongh leilukulabü, hoba kaneibü jenjuokbü lemshang heangsho shuong wapnyinkulabü hoba kaneibü haibü mang kaneibü heangsho thükto tekan jinkulabü, hoba ngeibü soushouei kan mangsenlabü.
Hobaje ngei kaneibü sangnyu shuong leilukulabü, hoba kaneibü lemshang shakkei shakko phokulabü, hoba ngei kaneibü ponlem maibü lem ajemlabü.
Hobaje ngei kaonyek sangliphang la yeitikulabü, hoba khünei kibü kaneibü dangbou shuongei khünei maangpanglabü.
Hobaje kan phangshuong yoto lintilabü, hoba kan thükto ngei in setenlabü, hoba kaneibü kaodak sangliphang la yeitilabü, hoba kaneibü sangnyu shuong leiluan kilabü.
Hobaje lalokche sangli- phanga kilaje khülokche kaonyekei hoeibü nou noulabü, hoba kaneibü dangbou kaodaka kan kilabü, kheijinei ong kaonyekei haksoko hoeibü nou noulabü.
Kaonyek kho lalokche sangliphanga kida, khülokche hakso kilabü, khünei kan kijinei ühü- penbü hakso kilabü.

Hobaje kan jouletbü shuong shanga khei pik soujung satbü ngühlangei haoen shian aplabü lele haoen dangbou kaonyeka haoeneibü maangpona maangkou yuibü jinkulabü, hoba inei linbü tegütham haoen satyolabü hoba aoeikei shijung aloujinei haoen tuonglabü.
Hobaje aoeikei shijung aloujinei in thedanga haoen cheei che thüka phaiyetlabü; hoba kan dangbou thedanga lolabü, kan hau akilabü.
Hobaje kan phangshuong yoa maulabü, hoba kaneibü dangbou shuongeibü kaonyekei kan shauan aplabü.
Hobaje kan jouletbü dan kibü shuong kaneibü dangbou kaonyeka haoenei shed shonbüei pheijung ngailabü, hoba tokei nyuei bouei shed shonbü haangshong haoen pheijung ngailabü.
“Lausikei haoenei ngo khulimbo ngühkhüm lulimbü shanga hoba kü to dangyoko kibü shanga haoeneibü shabü hoba haoeneibü nyusibou shabü thekualonga,

laobou laüa ngokei hao to jakan kila yeitikei hoba haoen dangbou shuongeibü kaonyek to leian loukei, tokei haoen kipan üpbü maangpon eaaoa ayeilonga hoba kheijinei haoenei luluei shed shonbü shanga shieikoe sungleda longa;
kheijinei ngei Jakob to ngeibü thebülanbü damenlabü; hoba tokei Isak to ngeibü thebülanbü hoba Abraham to ngeibü thebülanbü ngei damenlabü, hoba kaonyek kho ngei damenlabü.

Hobaje kaonyek kho haoenei apyolabü, hoba haoen akiko litham yeijinei hoeibü nou noulabü, hoba haoenei shed shonbü shanga shieikoe haoenei sungletlabü, khei haoenei ngeibü matjem asungletbü hoba haoenei ngeibü ngühkhüm mangsenbü haangshong ki.

Hobaje kho khei yingasikei khei haoen dangbou kaonyeka kibü hangshongkei haoen yoa ngeibü thebülanbü leilubüei haoen lepde mautilabü lele ngei haoen asungletko, ayingsi haoen mangsenkokei akitei; aishanga ngo
Lausikei haoen dambo haoeneibü nyusibou aoyou phangshuong thedanga ngo haoeneibü Mühghaü lela shanga ngei Ijep kaodak ka haoen leiyenkei, haoen yoa lin- yobü ngei damenda; ngo
Sinai shongha Mosa danko
Israel shousi shuong to lenshi, ladang müt cheei

po saoche ka po saosem sühko bousu munam kümlaje lemshanga shekel kibü tegü, chandinam shekel anjinsem kijan; kho yaksa yingalonga munam kümbü kho shekel khujin kijan. Haoen kho po ngao ka saoche jai yingalonga bousueibü munam kho shekel saoche, hoba yaksa shanga shekel an. Haoen lit che ka po ngao sühko jai yingalonga bousu munam chandinam shekel ngao hoba yaksa shanga munam chandinam shekel sem. Haoen po saosem ka thükae sühko yingalonga munam kümbü kho bousu yingalonga shekel anthükngao hoba yaksa shanga shekel an.
Lausikei munam kula hao aeibou shalea longa hao ungshedbou thedanga phokulabü, hoba ungshedbouei haoeibü munam tetlabü, mütei ai thükkei kho thüng haoeibü munam kümlabü.
Meisiau che yingalonga, laobou

Haoei kho lubü den che to ajeiyojan ayingsi maibü che amaibü che shanga; amaibü che maibü che shanga ajeiyojan; haoei meisiau che jeiko lubü che to jeiyoa tegükei, kheijinei kho hoba jeiyobou kho ham noubüsoubü yeilabü.
Kho asaopobü meisiau che yingalonga hoba kho
hoba ungshedbou khoei maibü si amaibü nam tetlabü; ungshedbouei namtet tetbü tegü kho khei kilabü.
Haoei kho angngaimang sühko kia tegükei haoei munam thükto ngaoboubü phejan jinkujan.
Hobaje müt cheei jembü chem
Hobaje aoei kho saüenla khümbo kuda, haoei haoeibü chem kho angngaimang sühalonga kheijinei haoei kho namteta ngaoboubü phejan jinyokujan, hoba kho hao shangabü yinglabü.
Müt atei jembüeibü sek at saüenla khümbo kualonga kho shanga kebü ongbü thüng munam kho kilabü, barli youshou homer chenei chandinam shekel anjin sem.
Haoei haoeibü sek kho jubilee po ka saüenla khümbo kualonga, kho namtet tegü kilabü.
Lausikei haoei jubilee phaia saüenla khümbo kualonga kho shanga nam jouan kibü po thüng nyiboubü jubilee sühko ungshedbouei wean chühlabü, hoba namtet küman kibü khünei shingaitilabü.
Müt wekoei sek saüenla khümbo kuan phaia haoei kho angngaimang sühalonga, haoei kho mantet khünei phejan ngaoboubü jinyokujan, hoba kho haoeibü yeilabü.
Sek kho angngailabü jeiko haoei lubü müt che la yaakan kialonga, haoei kho touje üangngailabü;
lausikei sek khümbo kubü tegü ladang jubileea litilaje
Müt atei lubü ka jekbü sek laobou haoei phanbü phejan che aying, kho
ungshedbouei jubilee po sühko namtet wean chühan, hoba kho chaloua haoei saopobü jongsak tegü
Jubilee poa aoka kho jekkei ao shangabü phet phanan kikei hao la ngaitikujan.
Namtet pendou lemshanga kibü shekel tegü kijan; shekel kho gera saoche yinglabü.
Shaang shatbü meisiau san yingsikei masu yingsikei, kho
Hobaje kho asaopobü meisiau yingalonga kho haoei namtet kümbüei khünei phejan ngaoboubü jinan jekngaijan; hoba üangngailonga, kho haoeibü namtetei yaakjan.
Kho khei yingasikei, lembü sungenan phoan kibü aikei, müt yingasikei meisiau yingasikei, ayingsi haoei kibü sek yingsikei ayaaklabü, ayingsi üangngailabü, lemla sungenan kuan apan kibü weko kho
Khümbo kuan apbü müt, ao müt yoka lemailela mautilabü ki, hao üangngailabü, hao kho haitijan.
Hobaje kaonyeka an phejan pendou kao ka longbü hek ayingsi bunyu kabü buhek yingsikei,
Hobaje müt atei an phejan jekmangsühsi haoei khünei phejan ngaoboubü jinyokujan.
Hobaje masu shuong hoba lon shuong ka an phejan, laobou lombouei wean dantida, anboubü kho
Maia si amai kho haoei alamjan, ayingsi haoei kho ajeiyojan, hoba haoei kho jeiyoa tegükei, kheijinei kho hoba laobou shanga kho jeiyokei penyi ham saopobü kilabü kho ajekngaijan.
Sinai shongha Israel shousi shuong shanga
Nyiboubü lit shaangbou nyet Ijep kaodak ka haoen longan nyibou poa Sinai lamanga kamshang neichema
“Israel shousi shuong pendou chung, chempen, lulu müt wean chühashi, bousu phai lühbak longashi;
po saoche thükae, Israelbü yoa wapyola hauenlabü shuong pendou Aron kasiei haoen tan wean chühjan.
Phang weko ka müt che bang, khei chempen yoa khuleibü wekoei ka to thuijan.”
Habü mütshuong ho kümsilei shanga mütli yo ka pienbü lulu phang leiyeibü shuong ki:
Reuben
Shedeur shou Elizur
Simeon
Zurishadai shou Shelumiel
Jihuda
Aminadab shou Nashon
Issakar
Zuar shou Nethanel
Zebulun
Helon shou Eliab
Efraim
Aminhud shou Elishama
Manasse
Pedazur shou Gamaliel
Benjamin
Gideon shou Abidan
Dan
Amishadai shou Ahiezer
Asher
Okhran shou Pagiel
Gad
Deuel shou Eliasaf
Naftali
Enan shou Ahira.
Mosa si Aronei haoen lulu nyenei ngabü müt habü ho lekei.
Hobaje haoen tan pendou liko nyiboubü lit shaangboua kamshaikei hoba khuleibouei leian po saoche ka thükae pendou mütpem weko chung hoba chempen nyen shenko dotikei.
ei Mosa la sakkubü tegü haoei Sinai lamanga wean chühkei.
Hobaje Israeleibü shou jaishoubou Reuben ka pakbü chung chung chempen chempen khuleibouei leian wapyola haula thükbü bousu weko po saoche thükae nyen dokei.
Reuben
Simeon
Gad
Jihuda
Issakar
Zebulun
Efraim
Manasse
Benjamin
Dan
Asher
Naftali
Pendouei
Mosa si Aronei weanchühbü habü yoa Israelbü leiyeibü müt anthüknyi yoan habü ho kikei; haoen mütpem weko kho jembü chung si phang shanga kikei.
Hibü Israel shousi shuong pendou chempen chempen webü po saoche thüka wapyola haula thükbü pendou Israelbü,
khei haoen pendou wean chühbü hajar saosemto lak hoba saongao ngaoto anjinsem.
Levi ka pakbüje haoen yoa lühbaka ayo.
Aishanga
“Levi chemdangje nyi lühbaka ajinlabü, ayingsi Israel shousi yoa nyi haoen lühbak pendou wean ajinlabü.

Lausikei lemshang neichema ngühkhüm busen hoba peisilei pendou thüka hoba kho shanga pendou thüka ikjaibü shuong Levibü nyi pienshi; haoenei lemshang neichem hoba khoeibü peisilei pendou künlabü kho haoenei thounoulabü hoba lemshang neichem kaijembo shailabü.
Hobaje ladang ong lemshang neichem kukjung satlaje Levi shuongei kho sunglabü; hoba ladang ong lemshang neichem danglaje Levi shuongei kho dangjan, lubü ao nyangko loulaje kho haitilabü.
Hobaje Israel shousi shuongei haoeneibü neichem mütpem weko lulueibü sühshang hoba tan tan lakjaibü tan tegü thenei thenko dangjan.
Lausikei Israel shousi shuong yoa khauang longbü akila shanga Levi shuongei ngühkhüm busen kishang lemshang neichema ngühkhüm busen kho thounoujan.”
Kho tegü
“Israel shousi müt- pem wekoei lulueibü nisan nyangko hoba lulu chempen lulu younak thüngei kamshang neichem ae thedang lean kho kaijembo haoenei neichem dangjan.”

Hobaje chaangbou ae chanyu longshang ae yeian aoyouei nei- chem dangda, haoen kho Jihuda sühshang nisan jungbü shuong kibü tegütham kilabü; hoba Jihuda shousi shuong leiyeibou kho Aminadabeibü shou Nashon kilabü.
Hobaje haoen shuong khübü weanchühbü kho hajar anjinleito lei hoba saongao lak kikei.
Hobaje hao thenbou shailabü shuong kho Issakareibü shousi shuong leiyeibü Zuareibü jayangshou Nethanel kilabü;
hoba haoen tan hoba khübü lühbak kho hajar anjinsemto lei hoba saongao lei kikei,
hoba Zebulun chung hoba Zebuluneibü shousi shuong leiyeibü Helon jaishoubou Eliab kilabü,
hoba haoen tan hoba khübü weanchühbü lühbak kho hajar anjinsemto nyet hoba saongao lei
Jihudabü shaishang pendou tan tan lühbak hajar saongaoto saoleito lak hoba saongao lei kikei. Meimeijinei haoen shaanglabü.
Yungthang aenei Reubeneibü nisan kilabü; hoba Reubeneibü shousi shuong leiyeibou Shedeur jayangshou Elizur kilabü.
Hobaje haoeneibü tan hoba khübü lühbak kho hajar saonyito lak hoba saongao ngao.
Hobaje hao thena shailabü shuong kho Simeon chung kilabü; hoba Simeoneibü shousi shuong leiyeibü Zurishadaieibü jayangshou Shalumiel kilabü.
hoba haoen tan hoba khübü lühbak kho hajar anjinsemto gü hoba saongao sem kikei.
Gad phang kho thenbou kilabü, hoba Gadeibü shousi shuong leiyeibü kho Reuleibü shou jayangshou Eliasaf kikei
hoba haoen tan hoba khübü lühbak kho hajar saonyito ngao hoba saongao lakto anjinsem.
Reubeneibü shaishang tan pendou weyosi pakan chühbü hajar saongaoto anjinsemto che hoba saongao leito anjinsem.

Kho phaia kamshang nei- chem hoba Levibü shuong shaishang tan nyibang kanglanga meimeijung haulabü, haoen sha- ian kibü tegütham, kho tegü haoen meimeilabü; müt weko lulu shaishanga haoeneibü nisan nyangko haulabü.
Chanep ae Efraimeibü tan nisan kilabü; hoba Efraimeibü shousi shuong leiyeibü Amihudeibü shou jayangshou Elishama kilabü,
hoba haoen tan hoba khübü lühbak kho hajar saonyito saongao ngao.
Hobaje hao to thenko sühlabü shuong kho Manasse phang kilabü; hoba Manaseeibü shousi shuong leiyeibü Pedazu- reibü shou jayangshou Gamaliel kilabü;
hoba haoen tan hoba khübü lühbak kho hajar khujinto nyi hoba saoan,
hoba Benjamin phang hoba Benjamineibü shousi shuong leiyeibü Gideoneibü jayangshou Abidan kilabü;
hoba haoen tan hoba khübü lühbak kho hajar khujinto ngao hoba saongao lei.
Efraim shaishang tan pendou pakan chühbüei hajar saongaoto set hoba saongao. Meimeijinei haoen semboubü yinglabü.
Yungkük ae Dan phang tan nisan kilabü, hoba Daneibü shousi shuong leiyeibou Amishadaieibü shou jayangshou Ahizier kilabü;
haoen tan hoba khübü lühbak hajar saosemto nyi hoba saongao nyet.
Hobaje hao to thenko shailabü shuong kho Asher phang kilabü; hoba Ashereibü shousi shuong leiyeibü Okraneibü shou jayangshou Pagiel kilabü;
hoba haoen tan hoba khübü lühbak hajar saonyito che hoba saongao ngao.
Hobaje Naftali phang hoba Naftalieibü shousi shuong lei- yeibü Enaneibü shou jayangshou Ahira kilabü.
Hobaje haoen tan hoba khübü lühbak hajar anjinsemto sem hoba saongao lei.
Dan shaishang kabü lühbak hajar saongaoto anjinsemto nyet hoba saongao lak. Haoeneibü nisan yoa haoen phai meimeilabü.
Israel shousi shuong haoen chempen lühbak habü ho ki; haoen tan tan shaishang kabü lühbak pendouei hajar saongao lakto sem hoba saongao ngaoto anjinsem.
Lausikei
Kho tegü Israel shousi shuongei kümbei;
Tou Sinai shongha
Habü ho Aroneibü shousi shuong nyen ki; Jaishoubou Nadab si Abihu, Eleazar si Ithamar.
Habü ho Aroneibü shousi shuong, onang naangkuko pienbü ungshedbou shuong ki; haoei haoen ungshed kümaleia khangenla khümbo kukei.
Hobaje Sinai lamanga
“Levi phang nyangko leijung louan Aron ungshedbou khangenla shanga hao thedanga haoen phokushi.
Hobaje lemshang nei- chem kümsilei kümla shanga kamshang neichema haoenei hao shanga hoba shuong pendou shanga kümsilei kümlabü.
Hobaje haoenei lemshang neichem kümsilei kümlabü hoba Israel shousi pendou chühlabü hoba kamshang neichema peisilei jemlasanglabü.
Hobaje nyi Levibü kho Aron si haoeibü shousi la kuashi; Israel shousi yo ka haoen hao shanga khümbo kuda.
Aron hoba haoeibü shousi shuong ungshed kümsilei kümla nyi pienashi; lubü ao nyangko loulaje haoje haitilabü.”

“Chühashi, Israel shousi yo ka jaishoubou phai pendou jeiko Israel shousi yo ka ngei Levi shuong heena; hoba Levi shuong ngeibü.
