Aishanga jaishoubou phai pendou ngeibü; Ijep kaodaka ngei jaishoubou phai pendou haitibü chaloua Israela jaishoubou müt hoba meisiau pendou kü shanga pienkei; haoen kü shangabü yinglabü; ngo
Levi ka pakbü chempen chempen weanchühashi; bousu shuong mütpem weko lit che jai onbü ka jaüan thükae nyi haoen lühbak weashi.
Hibü Mosaei hao la sakkubü tegü haoen pakkei.
Hobaje habü ho Levi shousi shuong haoen nyen kikei; Gershon, Kohat hoba Merari.
Hobaje habü ho Gershomeibü shousi shuong haoen phang ki; Libni hoba Shimei.
Hobaje Kohateibü shousi shuong haoeneibü phang nyen Amram hoba Izhar, Hebron hoba Uzziel.
Merarieibü shousi shuong haoeneibü nyen Mahli si Mushi. Habü ho haoen phang tegü Levi chempen shuong ki.
Libnibü phang si chung hoba Shimeibü chung kho Gershon ka kikei; habü ho Gershonbü chung shuong kikei.
Aoyou lit che onbü ka thükae pakkei, bousu pendou lühbakei khei aoyou pakkei khübü kho hajar nyetto saongao ngao kikei.
Gershon chung shuong kho lemshon na- pheinei chanep aepheinei sühtilabü kikei.
Hobaje Gershoneibü chung leiyeibou Laeleibü shou Eliasaf kikei.
Hobaje kamshang neichema Gershoneibü shousi shuongei lemshang nei- chem hoba neichem kho yuklepbü nei hoba kamshang neichem koukhün shanga thangtetbü chühjan;
hoba khongaenei thangtetbü shuong, lemshang neichem hoba lemshon yoan, khongaeto atshang koukhün thangtetbü kho shanga jolüh hoba kho kümsilei shangabü pendou chühjan.
Kohat ka Amrambü chung, Izharbü chung, Hebronbü chung, hoba Uzzielbü chung ki; habü ho Kohat chung ki.
Lit che jai onbü ka thükae sühko bousu pendou lühbakbüei hajar setto saongao lak lemshang kho chühkei.
Kohat shousi chung shuongei lemshang neichem yungkük ae- pheinei sühjan.
Hobaje Kohatbü phanga boueibü chemdang lei- yeibü Uzzieleibü shou Elizafan kilabü.
Hobaje ngühkhüm busen, khümsok, wanthung denshang, hoba lemshang hoba haoenei jungeibü lemshang peisilei, hoba thangtetbü khübü shanga kümsilei pendou haoenei chühlabü.
Hobaje Levi shuong leiyeibü thüka Aron ungshedbou shou Eleazar kongnyu leiyeibou kilabü, hoba lemshang chühbou thüka ikjaibü kilabü.
Merari ka Mahli phang hoba Mushi phang pakkei; ho Merari chungsiphang shuong ki.
Hobaje lit che jai onbü thükae ka bousu phai lühbak kho hajar lakto saoan kikei.
Hobaje Merari chung leiyeibou Abihaileibü shou Zuriel kikei; lemshang neichem yungthang ae- pheinei haoen shailabü.
Hobaje lemshang neichema imlabü wa, hoba kho leithetlabü, hoba khoeibü thaonyu hoba kho hanleplabü hoba khübü peisilei pendou hoba khübü kümsilei pendou
hoba khongmaang kaiko thaonyu shuong hoba hanleplabü hoba kelabü shuong hoba khübü jolüh Merari shousi shuongei chühlabü.

Aoyou chanyu angbou kamshang neichem thedang chaangbou ae thedang yeian shaida, haoen kho Mosa si Aron hoba haoeibü shousi shuong yingjan; haoenei Israel shousi shuong kümsilei lemshang neichem chühla shanga; hoba aoyou nyangko louda, haoje haitilabü.
Hobaje lit che jai onbü hoba khoeibü thükae bousu pendou
Hobaje
Hobaje shaang bukbü shou bousu pendou lit che jai onbü hoba thükae haoen nyen lühbak weanchühbü kho hajar saoto nyi hoba saoanto anjinleito sem.
ei Mosa to laukei,
“Israelbü shaang bukbü pendou jeiko Levi shuong, hoba haoeneibü samkeisamuk jeiko Levi shuongeibü samkeisamuk pienashi; hoba Levi shuong ngeibü kilabü; ngo
Hobaje shaang bukbü shou Israel shousi shuong aoyou Levi shuong tokei juongbou hoba lühbak thükkabou ki, khei haoen saoanto anjinleito sem
nyi haoen mütpem weko shanga shekel lejan (shekel kho gera saoche).
Hobaje nam laobouei haoen lühbak aei angthetan ki, kho nyi Aron hoba haoeibü shousi la kujan.”
Hobaje Levi shuongei angthetbü aoyou lühbak aei kikei haoen ka angthetbü nam kho Mosaei lekei.
Israel shousi shaang bukbü shou ka haoei nam kho lekei, kho lemshona kibü shekel tegü hajar che saongao semto saosemto ngao.
Hobaje
Levi shousi shuong, chung, chempen chempen,
po khujin ka po anjinsem jaishou sühko kamshang neichema kümlaleila kümtoleito atbü pendou wean chühashi.
Yongbou, saopobü peisilei shuong shanga kamshang neichema Kohat shousi shuong kümsilei habü ho ki.
Ladang shaishang kuklaje Aron si haoeibü shousi shuong maangto atlabü, hoba thangtetbü yukbü kho haoenei sungletlabü, hoba khoei ngühkhüm busen kho küpletjan.
hoba kho thüka loneibü khon yukleplabü, hoba kho thüka pilaü neiei seikulabü, hoba kaang jinan phokulabü.

Hobaje Mühghaü thedanga phobü wentek phobü khümsoka haoenei pilaü nei che imbujan, hoba kho thüka phau, nyaklak, hoba phauyaang hoba yeiyola thung shuong pholabü; hoba hanghangko kibü wentek kho, kho thüka kijan;
hoba khübü thüka haoenei nakthüngbü nei seikulabü, hoba khokei loneibü khonei küpleplabü, hoba kho thüka kaang jinan phokulabü.
Pi nei cheei ngesakbü shanga wanthung denshang, wanthung, kip, wanyui phobü hoba onang shuong pendou haoenei küpan phokujan.
Hobaje haoenei peisilei pendou kho loneibü khonei yuklepan phojan hoba kho belabü shon chenei phokulabü.
Hobaje honeibü lemshon thüka haoenei pinei che imjan hoba kho loneibü khonei küpleplabü, hoba kho thüka kaang jinan pholabü.
Hobaje lemshang khangenbü kümaleia jungeibü chaksiam pendou sungan haoenei khübü kho pinei chenei jinan, hoba loneibü khonei küplepan belabü shon thüka phokujan.
Hobaje lemshon ka haoeneibü tap kho apjan hoba hoba kho thüka nakthüngbü nei seikulabü,

hoba kho kümsilei shanga jungeibü chaksiam pendou kho thüka phokuan wansuokjin, phe- yaüjin, suoklabü, hoba phauyaang hoba lemshona chaksiam pendou; hoba kho thüka haoenei loneibü khonei yukleplabü, hoba kho thüka kaang khühlabü.

Hobaje shaishang ka kukjinei ladang Aron si hao shousi shuongei lemshang küplepbü wantilaje hoba lemshang peisilei pendou lamlekulaje, kheijinei Kohat shousi shuongei kho bela loulabü; lausikei haoen haisi amaibula dogo lemshang khüto haoenei ameitijan. Khübü peisileia kamshang neichema Kohat shousi shuongeibü on ki.

Hobaje Aron ungshedboueibü shousi Eleazarei wanthung shanga onang, ponlemhibü jen, hanghangko kibü shausiyung lembü, hoba naanglabü onang, lemshang neichem, hoba khünei kibü peisilei pendou thüka ik jaijan.
“Levibü yo ka Kohatbü wapan tüpma,

lausikei yongko saopobü peisilei shuong nyangko haoen loujinei haoen ühaiko lang kilabü shanga haoen to hai jungeiashi: Aron hoba haoeibü shousi shuong atlabü, hoba haoen mütpem weko la jembü kümsilei hoba jembü on kuashi;
lausikei haoenei saopobü peisilei shuong chühla ütjan, khei ayinglonga haoen hailabü.”
Gershon shousi chung chung, chempen lühbak weanchühashi.
Kamshang neichema kümlaleila aoyou louda, po khujin ka po anjinsem jaishou sühko nyi haoen lühbak weanchühashi.
Khangenbüa hoba on künbü hao Gershon chempeneibü kümsilei ki;
haoenei lemshang neichem thangtet, kamshang neichem yukbü hoba kho thükaenei kibü loneibü khonei küplepbü kamshang neichem koukhüna thangbü,

hoba khongaenei antian phobü khongmaang kouyem lam thangtetbü laoboua lemshang neichem hoba lemshon yoan ki, hoba khübü jolüh hoba kümsilei shanga peisilei pendou hoba khübü khoei ai ong kümlabü ki khübüa haoenei khangenjan.

Gershoneibü shousi shuongei kümlabü kümsilei pendou hoba haoenei künlabü on pendou hoba haoenei kümlabü pendoua Aron si haoeibü shousi shuongei sakkubü phanga kilabü, hoba kanei haoen la haoeneibü on pendou nangan phokuashi.
Kamshang neichem- a Gershoneibü shousi chempen kümsilei habü ho ki, hoba Aron ungshedboueibü shousi Ithammar phanga haoen ikjai letijan.
Merarieibü shousi shuong shanga nyi haoen chung chempen chempen weanchühjan.
Kamshang neichema kümlaleila kümtoleito atbü mütpem weko, po khujin thükae ka po anjinsem jaishou sühko nyi haoen lühbak wejan.
Kamshang neichema haoenei kümlabü pendou on kho ho: lemshang neichem wa shuong, ho kümlabü; thaonyu khamthung, hoba khübü hanleplabü.

hoba khongmaang kaijembo thaonyu shuong, hoba khübü hanleplabü, hoba kelabü, hoba khübü jolüh peisilei pendou hoba khübü shanga ajanjan pendou yoan; hoba haoen nyen ngako haoenei künlabü on kanei lenjan.
Aron ungshedboueibü shou Ithamar phanga Merari shou chempen shuongei kamshang neichema haoenei kümlabü kümsilei pendou ho ki.
Mosa, Aron hoba tan leiyeibü shuongei Kohatbü chung chung, chempen chempen pakkei.
Kamshang neichema kümsilei shanga kümtoleito atbü mütpem po khujin ka thükae po anjinsem sühko;
hoba aoyou chempen chempen pakkei, khübü kho hajar nyito saongao nyetto anjinsem kikei.
Mosaeibü ik danko
Gershoneibü shousi shuong haoen chung chung, chempen chempen pakbü kho,
kamshang neichema kümsilei kümla shanga kümtoleito atbü mütpem weko po khujin thükae ka po anjinsem jaishou
khei haoen chung chung, chempen chempen lühbak webü hajar nyi saongao lakto khujin kikei.
ei sakkubü tegü kamshang neichema khangenbü pendou Gershoneibü shousi shuong haoen chung chung, chempen chempen Mosa si Aronei lühbak weanchühbü habü ho ki.
Merarieibü shousi shuong haoen chung chung, chempen chempen pakbü kho;
kamshang neichema kümlaleila shanga kümtoleito atbü mütpem weko po khujin thükae ka po anjinsem jaishou sühko,
khei haoen chung chung, chempen chempen lühbak webü kho hajar semto saoan,
Mosaeibü ik danko
Mosa, Aron hoba Israel leiyeibü shuongei Levibü chung chung chempen chempen pendou pakbüei,
kamshang neichema on künlabü kümsilei, hoba khangenla kümtoleito atbü mütpem weko po khujin thükae ka po anjinsem sühko
khei haoen lühbak weanchühbü hajar set saongao ngaoto saonyi kikei.
Mütpem weko lulueibü kümsilei hoba lulueibü on
“Im baubü mütmang ka saangbü, haibü to meitibü ka shonbü müt
haoen shaishang ka nangan sattiashi dogo Israel shousi shuong la ngühkhüm kuashi; haoen bousukei yaksakei kanei shaishang khongaeto shian sattiashi; shaishang laoboua ngo kida kho haoenei ashatijan.”
Israel shousi shuongei kho tegü kümbei, hoba haoen shaishang khonga apyokei;
“Israel shousi shuong to jo- yoashi: Bousu ayingsi yaksa cheei
haoei shonbü shabü kho thekujan, hoba shedbü pendou shemjan, hoba ao to haoei amaibü kümbei hao la phejan ngaoa che aeila jinyoan kungaijan.
Lausikei aola shedbü shanga sanghshemlabü ki, hao thenbou akilonga matshembü sanghsiyung kho
Hobaje Israel shousi shuongei heshaibü hoba saopobü jongsak ungshedbou la kulabü pendou haoeibü peisilei yeilabü.
Hobaje mütpem wekoeibü saopobü peisilei kho hao shangabü yeilabü, aoei ai ong ungshedbou la kuda, hao shangabü yeilabü.”
“Israel shousi shuong to lenashi: Müt at yak amaiko yeian, hao khulimbo shabü shonalonga,
hoba müt atei sao to jamalonga hoba kho saoeibü laoeibü nyekei ühüpbo kialonga hoba sao lolo shaan apan sao alapenlonga hoba sao khulimbo aukabü akilonga sao lemthek alapsije,
khei jembü yak to maangalembü songsido che hao to kialonga,

haoei jembü yak ungshedbou thedangto leian loujan, hoba sao shanga barli wen efa che an phejan, sao shanga lembü jungjan; khünei onang ajinjan ayingsi kho thüka ponlem hilabü haoei ajinjan, aishanga ho maangalembü shausiyung lembü ki, shabü damentiko damenlabü shausiyung lembü ki.”
Hobaje ungshedbouei sao nyangko leijung louan
ungshedbouei thamchak che ka saopobü deia jinkulabü;
hoba yaksanyu kho
Hobaje ungshedbouei sao la thetilantiko yaksanyu to laulabü, “Ka to bousu aokei ayepbo kialonga hoba kalao phanga kian nyi shabü kümla ayingbü to ohauko kialonga khüksiuok baubü dei ka no satenashi.
Lausikei kalao phanga phoan no ayingbü to satan kialonga hoba no totnyinan kialonga hoba kalao to liman bousu at to yepan kialonga;
(yaksanyu la khüksiuok ngüh lautiko ungshedbouei sao to laulabü):
Khükbüuokbü dei khoei kaibü youshi pheitiko hoba kaibü shimung bokko nasetshang to attishi.”
Hobaje yaksanyu khoei laulabü, “Amen, kho khei yingtishi.”
Kheijinei ungshedbouei khükbüuokbü shuong kho le chenei doan pholabü hoba kho khauekbü dei khoei nyaülettilabü;
hoba shedsikhau baubü khauekbü dei kho sao la yungtilabü hoba sao to attian sao aeibou khonkutilabü.
Hobaje ungshedbou khoei maangalembü shausiyung lembü yaksanyueibü ik ka sunglabü, hoba
hoba kho damenlabü shanga ungshedbou khoei shausiyung lembü kho ikmaang shenko junglabü, hoba phaila dei kho yaksanyu la yungtilabü.

Ladang haoei sao la dei kho yungtilaje, sao totyoan kialonga saoeibü lao khulimbo shed shonan kialonga, khüktiuoktibü dei kho sao to atlabü hoba khauan aplabü, hoba sao shimung boklabü hoba sao youshi pheilabü, hoba yaksanyu kho jembü mütli yoa shedsikhau che kilabü.
Hobaje yaksanyu kho atotyoko saüenan kialonga, sao to ai ayinglabü, hoba saoei toukei shou buklabü.
Ladang yakei jembü lao phanga kian ayingbü to totyolaje, ho maangalembü ngühkhüm ki; ayingsi bousubou to maangalembü songsido che louan hao yak to maangalembo yeilaje, kheijinei haoei yaksanyu kho
Hobaje bousubou to akakko kilabü, hoba kho yaksanyuei jembü shedbü künlabü.
Israel shousi shuong to lenashi: Ladang bousu yingasikei yaksa yingasikei jembü lolo
haoei jembü lolo ih si nyakidei ka bangenlabü, haoei ih shalepbü ayingsi nyakidei haijepbü ayingsi semlühdei ih ayungjan ayingsi semlüh sangtüngbü, ayingsi linbü ashaulabü.
Hao saüenan kibü chalou sünga semlüh hekei kümbü maanga lang ka khop sühko aikei haoei ashaulabü.
Hao saüenan kibü takletbü chalou pendoua haoei khua khujin aikei ajinjan; chalou apen shongko laoboua haoei hao lolo khümbo saüenan
Haoei
Haoei jembü lolo bou shanga ayingsi nyu shanga ayingsi na shanga ayingsi nousina shanga haoen haijinei asaopoko üpjan.
Hao khümbo saüenan kibü chalou pendoua
Hobaje müt at hao nyangko mangde haian apsi hoba saüenan phobü khu kho shaan aptialonga kheijinei haoei hao saüenbü chaloua khu shuan apjan; nyetbounyet kho haoei shuan apjan.
Hobaje setbounyet haoei dukutuk penyi ayingsi jemau shoushou penyi ungshedbou jungto kamshang neichem koukhün jungto sungbajan.
Hobaje ungshedbou khoei che shabü lembü shanga hoba che kho juokbü lembü shanga saomei saülabü; aishanga haibü mangei haoei haoeibü shed shonkei, hoba khünyettham haoeibü khu saüenjan.
Hobaje hao khümbo kuan kibü chaloua
Haoei khümbo saüenan kibü chalou penjinei ho Nazarit ngühkhüm ki,
hoba haoei
Hobaje tokai ajinbü wentek kam che, wen inyaibü onang yoa nyatyobü on hoba onang tokai ajinbü wentek peklebü hoba kho yoa haoeneibü shausiyung lembü hoba haoeneibü yunglabü lembü.
Hobaje ungshedbouei kho
hoba sanlon paang kho tokai ajinbü wentek kam to yoko
Hobaje Nazarit hao khümbo saüenan phobü khu kho kamshang neichem koukhüna shuan aplabü, hoba khümbo saüenan kibü khu kho sangmai lembü haitibü phanga kibü wan thüka jinkulabü.

Hobaje ungshedbou khoei thungan kibü sanlon paangeibü phak kho sunglabü hoba kam ka tokai ajinbü wen on che, hoba tokai ajinbü wentek peklebü che haoei khümbo kuan phobü khu kho shuan apan khübü kho Nazarit ika phokulabü.
Hobaje ungshedbou khoei khübü kho jipeiko lembü shanga
Haoei hapenlabü to liman aoei theletda, haoei
Aron hoba haoeibü shousi shuong to lenashi: Kanei Israel shousi shuong ho tegü hai haükushi; kanei haoen to lenlabü:
ei no haükushi, hoba no lombo kishi;
ei haoeibü thenyek ka to haukushi; hoba ka to onoushi;
ei ka to maangshikko ka la sangmai hakso kushi.
Hobaje
Ladang Mosaei lemshang neichem yeikei, haoei onang naangkukei hoba saüenkei hoba khoeibü peisilei hoba lemshang hoba khoeibü thungsiphau pendou saüenko hinseian
Israelbü leiyeibü shuong chempen chem- pen khuleibü shuongei lembei, khübü kho phang leiyeibü shuong kikei; haoen thüka aoyou kikei, weanchühbü habü ki.
Hobaje haoenei
Hobaje
“Kho haoen kamshang neichema kümlaleila leashi, hoba kho Levi shuong la mütpem weko lulueibü kümsilei haoen la kuashi.”
Hobaje Mosaei kailong si masu sungan kho Levi shuong la kukei.
Gershonbü shousi shuong la kümsilei thüng kailong penyi hoba masu lei haoei kukei.
Merarieibü shuousi shuong la Aron ungshedboueibü shou jayangshou Ithamar ikjai leko haoen kümsilei thüng kailong lei hoba masu set haoei kukei.
Lausikei Kohatbü shousi shuong la haoei ai aku; aishanga saopobü peisilei shuong kho thounoula shanga haoeneibü kümsilei ki.
Hobaje lemshang shanga kho onang naangkubü chaloua saopoenbü jongsak leiyeibü shuongei kukei; khei haoenei lemshang thedanga haoenei lembei.
Hobaje
Shaangbounyet aoei lembü kukei, hao kho Jihuda phang Aminadabeibü shou Nashon kikei;

hoba haoeibü lembü kho shekel saongaoto khujin takbü chandinam phau che, lemshanga takbü tegü shekel anjinlei takbü chandinam phauyaang che, penyi ham kho shausiyung lembü shanga wen inyaibüei shenan kikei;
ponlemei shenan kibü shekel an atbü honeibü shiklak che,
juokbü lembü shanga po cheeibü shou masu pongsu che, sanlon paang che hoba po cheeibü shou che,
shabü lembü shanga lonpaang che, lemla shanga lonpaang che,
hoba sangmai lembü haitila shanga masu pongsu penyi, sanlon ngao, po cheeibü shou sanlon ngao; habü ho Aminadabeibü shou Nashoneibü lembü kikei.
Nyibounyeta Issakar leiyeibü Zuareibü shou Nethanelei lembei;

haoei haoeibü lembü shanga lemshanga jungeibü hima chandinam phau che kho hauanchühbü kho shekel saongaoto khujin; shekel anjinlei atbü phau che, penyi ham kho shausiyung lembü shanga onang to soyoan wen inyaibüei shenan kikei.
Shekel an atbü honeibü shiklak ponlemei shenan kikei;
masu pongsu shoushou che, sanlon paang che, juokbü lembü shanga po cheeibü shou sanlon paang che;
shabü lembü shanga lon yoa paang che,
hoba sangmai lembü shanga masu pongsu penyi, sanlon ngao, lonpaang ngao, po cheeibü shou sanlon paang ngao; ho Zuareibü shou Nethaneleibü lembü ki.
Sembounyeta Zebuluneibü shousi shuong leiyeibü Heloneibü shou Eliabei lembü;

haoeibü lembü kho shekel saongaoto khujin atbü chandinam phau che, shekel anjinlei atbü chandinam phau che, lemshanga kibü shekel hima; penyi ham kho shausiyung lembü shanga onang to kheiyobü wen inyaibüei shenan kikei;
shekel an atbü honeibü shiklak che ponlemei shenan,
masu pongsu che, lonpaang che, juokbü lembü shanga po cheeibü shou sanlon paang che,
shabü lembü shanga lon yoa paang che,
hoba sangmai lembü haitila shanga, masu pongsu penyi, sanlon ngao, hoba po cheeibü shou sanlon paang ngao; ho Heloneibü shou Eliabeibü lembü kikei.
Leibounyeta Reubeneibü shousi shuong leiyeibü Shedeureibü shou Elizurei lembei.

Haoeibü lembü kho chandinam phau che, shekel saongaoto khujin atbü kikei, shekel anjinlei atbü chandinam phauyaang che, lemshanga kibü shekel hima; penyi ham kho shausiyung lembü shanga onang to kheiyobü wen inyaibüei shenan kikei;
shekel an atbü honeibü shiklak che ponlemei shenan;
masu pongsu shoushou che, sanlon paang che, juokbü lembü shanga po cheeibü shou sanlon paang che,
shabü lembü shanga lon yoa paang che,
hoba sangmai lembü haitila shanga masu pongsu penyi, sanlon paang ngao, lonpaang ngao, po cheeibü shou sanlon paang ngao, ho Shedeureibü shou Elizureibü lembü kikei.
Ngaobounyeta Simeoneibü shousi shuong leiyeibou Zurishadaieibü shou Shelumielei lembei;

Israel shousi shuongei kho onang naangkuko pienbü chaloua lemshanga saüenbü kho ho kiteikei: chandinam phau anthüknyi, chandinam phauyaang anthüknyi, hon nyaklak anthüknyi:

ponlem hibüei shenan hon nyaklak anthüknyi, lemshanga kibü shekel tegütham, che chenei shekel an bang atbü kikei: honeibü nyaklak pendou kho shekel saongaoto saoche:
juokbü lembü shanga masu pongsu anthüknyi, san paang anthüknyi, po cheeibü sanlon paangshou anthüknyi, hoba khübü shanga shausiyung lembü hoba shabü lembü shanga lon yoa paang anthüknyi:
hoba sangmai lembü shanga masu pongsu pendouei saoto lei, sanlon paang saosem, hoba lon paang saosem, hoba po cheeibü sanlon paangshou saosem. Ho lemshanga onang naangkuan phaia ho saüenbü ki.

Hobaje haoen hinseitila nyi haoen to hai kümshi: shabü dean apla jungeibü dei kho haoen la lakkushi, hoba haoeneibü mang pendou kheijinei shuan apbushi, hoba haoeneibü neisimei sakan apbushi hoba haoen lolo hinseitishi.
Kho phaia haoenei masu pongsu che sungan, hoba khoeibü shausiyung lembü shanga onang to kheiyobü wen inyaibü hoba nyi shabü lembü shanga masu paangshou che lejan.

hoba Levi shuongei

“Kho phaia nyi Levi shuong Aron si haoeibü shousi shuong thedanga lotiashi, hoba haoenei haoen
kho nyi Levi shuong Israel shousi shuong yo ka bangentiashi; hoba Levi shuong kho ngeibü yinglabü.
Hobaje nyi haoen saüenkuan, hoba jipbü lembü shanga haoen leman phaia, kho phaia Levi shuongei kamshang neichem kümsilei kümla atjan.
Aishanga Israelbü ka kü shanga khangenla haoen pienakei; Israelbü shaang bukbü shou pendou aoyouei shaangla nasetshang ipbei, haoen pendou jeila kü shanga ngei haoen lea.
Aishanga müt si meisiau shaang hapbü ham kho Israel shousi yo ka pendou ngeibü, Ijep kaodaka shaang bukbü haitibü chaloua ngei haoen kü shanga pienan phoa.

Hobaje Mosaei

Ngei habü mütshuong pendou shia künkei sai? Ayingsi haoen ngeibü khukua tonan nanubüei senyopbü nashou leibü tegütham nyi haoeneibü pisi shuong to theyolanyoko theletbü kaonyek khüto leian hauashi dogo kü to nyi lenlabü lele ngei haoen bukkei sai?
Ngei habü mütshuong pendou la lakabü phe sungbakula? Aishanga, ‘Künei shaula kün la phe labü’, dogo haapbo haoenei kü to lauda.
Kü mütpemei habü mütshuong pendoueibü on künla athük, aieilausi ho kü shanga yongko atshaiakei.
Ho tegü nyi kü to jungeialonga, ngo lepde haitian apashi, dogo ngei ka to sudajada; ka thedanga ngei onou hapalonga kü la touje ngeibü khonsak tehüpti.”
Hobaje
Hobaje ngo louyenlabü hoba khünei ka to joyolabü hoba ka to kibü soushou at sungan haoen thüka phokulabü, hoba müt shuongeibü on ka mütpemei aying haoenei kho ka to janyoko künlabü.
Hobaje nyi mütshuong to laushi: Kanei phe shaula shanga kan lolo ngiet shanga saüenashi; aishanga, ‘Aoei künla shaula shanga phe kula aishanga Ijepaje kün lemseko kikei’, dogo kan haapbei hoba
Kanei chalou che ayingsi nyinyet ayingsi ngaonyet ayingsi annyet ayingsi saochenyet ong ashaulabü.

Haoen souko haoen shanga san shuong hoba masu shuong haitilep sai? Ayingsi yungnyua ngao pendou haoen shanga lapsikei khoei haoen soulep si?”

Hobaje neichem chemdak ka yaülangkei; hoba chühashi, ninthu tegü thupaitham Miriam to im longkei; hoba Aronei Miriam to chühkei, hoba chüh- ashi, sao to im kikei.
Hobaje Aronei Mosa to laukei, “O ngeibü bunyu, küsiei ngoualonga kümbü hoba künei shabü shonbü shanga küsi teshi tekoema.
Sao nyueibü shimung ka bukjinei phe jamde ayoko bukbü müt tegü sao haibü hima teyeitima dogo ngei sudajada.”
Hibü Mosaei
Hobaje
Hibü nyetnyet shaishang na- pheinei Miriam khinan phokei, hoba Miriam nyibou aleingaiba shongko ameimei.
Kho phaia mütshuong Hazeroth ka meimeijung haukei hoba Paran lamanga shaikei.
“Israelbü la ngei kula kibü Kanan kaodak shuchühla nyi müt hautiashi, ho bou chung weko ka müt che che hoba haoen yoa haoen mütpem weko kho leiyeibou che che yingjan.”

Kaonyek pheila Mosaei hautibü mütshuong nyen habü ho ki.
Hobaje Kanan kaodak pheila Mosaei haoen hautikei, hoba haoen to laukei, “Yungkük aeto atashi, hoba shongh to angashi,
hoba kaonyek kho ailai tegübü, khünei kibü mütshuong hau kibü si akibü, haoen shisho si juong chühashi.
Hobaje haoen kibü kaonyek kho ai tegübü maia si amai hoba haoen kishang sangnyu shuong kho ngasinyua si wetba phanga kida;
hoba kao kho lai tegübü haabü ki si kaolo ki, lamang yaangbü kilao? Hobaje maang kaangashi hoba kho kaodak kabü buhek sungba.” (Tou kho jihsiphai kho semlüh elibou sembü jihsiphai kiteikei.)
Hibü haoen angkei, hoba Hamat ae Zin lamang ka Rehob sühko kaonyek kho shuchühkei.
Hobaje haoen yungkük aeto atkei, hoba Hebron to loukei; hoba khünei Anak shousi Ahiman, Sheshai, hoba Talmai kikei. (Tou Hebron kho Ijepa Zoan toje po nyet thedangto sangan kikei.)
Hobaje haoen Eshkol pholi to loukei hoba khünei semlüh shen che thonan wetan sungkei, hoba kho müt nyiei kaanga lengkei; tokei haoenei chilang hek si bhuk sungbakei.
Kho pholi kho to Eshkol dogo laukei, aieilausi Israel shousi shuongei khünei semlüh shen wetan sungkei.
Hobaje chalou saonyinyet kian phaia shuchühbü shuong kaonyek ka sepeinyu longeikei.
Hobaje Mosa, Aron hoba Kadesha Paran lamanga Israel shousi tan pendou jungto haoen longeikei; hoba haoen tan pendou jungto sepeinyu ngühlang sungbakei, hoba kaonyeka hekbü buhek kho haoen la lenkei.
Hobaje haoenei hao to laukei, “Nyi kün laito hautikei kho kaonyek to haukei, hoba khünei maimaitham sendei hoba naodei kouda, hoba khükabü buhek ho ki.
Khei yingasikei khünei kibü müt hau kibü hoba sangnyu shuong ba lelepan kia, hoba aeibou yaangkei, hoba khüto liman künei Anakbü shousi shuong khünei hapa.
Yungkük kaonyeka Amalekbü kia hoba Jebusbü hoba Amorbü kida; hoba Kananbü Yungko hoba Jordan yungkoa kida.”
Kheijinei Mosa thedanga Kalebei mütshuong ngüh üangtiko laukei, “Sen meimeijung angkho hoba kho kaonyek lekho aishanga senei kho thükenakei.”
Lausikei hao yoa angbü shuongei laukei, “Aying, senei khübü mütshuong limbo angla athük, aishanga sen toje haoen hau kibou ki.”

Hobaje haoenei shuchühbü kaonyek shanga ngühlang amaibü sungbaan laukei, “Laobou kaonyek künei shuchühla haukei, kaonyeka kibü mütshuongei shauthüng ongkei langle kesiong alongda, hoba khünei künei hapbü mütshuong süngsilop loubü yaangbü ong ki.
Hobaje khünei Nefilim ka loubü Anak shousi shuong Nefilimbü künei hapbei, hoba kün koksüng tegü ong kikei, hoba kün haoen to takteisi khei ong kikei.”
Kheijinei mütshuong pendouei ngüh angko ngekkei, hoba khüyou mütshuong haapbei.

Hobaje Israel shousi pendouei Mosa si Aron khulimbo nyamnyambei hoba shuong pendouei haosi to laukei, “Mühghaüei kün Ijep kaodaka haitian kikei yingma! ayingsi kho lamanga haitikei tegüje maikhoulabü!
Aila kün inei tuongtila Mühghaüei leian loukei? Küneibü yaksi hoba shousi shuong haitilabü lele yeilabü kün shanga Ijep to sepeian ngaibü maibou aying lo?”
Hobaje haoen cheei che to laukei, “Senei lajamleibou che pienan Ijep to sepeinyu ngaikho.”
Kheijinei mütshuong pendou kaman kibü thedanga Mosa si Aron haosi ham the khüman apbei.

hoba Israel shousi pendou to haosiei laukei, “Kaonyek laobou shuchühko künei danjung haukei kho kao maibü ki.

Hobaje Israel shousi thük to touje khauang lotbü akila shanga kanei lemshang hoba lembü kushang chühlabü.
Hobaje chühashi, ngo boushou, ngei kaibü jaisinasi Levibü Israel shousi yo ka piena; ka shanga haoen kho

Hobaje no hoba kaibü shousi shuongei lembü kushanga ajanjan kümsilei hoba thangtet nei maang aenei ungshed kümsilei kümlabü, hoba khübü kho kanei chühlabü; ngei kan la ungshed kümsilei kho jongsak kümsilei tegü kubü ki; hoba küksithang ao nyangko loulaje haitilabü.”
Kheijinei

Wana ajuokko jouletbü saopoboutham peiseilei shuong kaibü yinglabü; haoeneibü lembü weko hoba haoeneibü shausiyung lembü weko, hoba haoeneibü shabü lembü weko laobou haoenei kü la kuda, ka shanga hoba kaibü shousi shuong shanga saopoboutham kilabü.
Pendou to saopobou tegütham nyi kho shaulabü; bousu phaiei kho shaulabü; kho ka shanga saopobü kilabü.

“Hobaje kho ka shangabü lembü jongsak, khei Israel shousi jipbü lembü pendou; khübü kho ngei ka la, hoba kaibü shousi, hoba ka yoa kibü kaibü nou- yangnyu shuong la ponpen phejan kua; kaibü chung hinseitham kibü wekoei kho shaulabü.
“Onang maiboutham pendou hoba ih hoba youshou maiboutham pendou shaangbü buhek laobou haoenei
Haoeneibü kaonyeka shaang libü buhek, laobou haoenei
“Israelbüei khümbo meiko kubü saüenbü peisilei pendou ka shangabü.
“Ajanjan pendou büngbü nasetshang ipbü
Hobaje angngaila kibü shuong kho lit che jailebü ka nyi khübü munam lemshanga kibü shekel tegütham nam shekel ngao nyi lolo lenenbüei angngaijan (kho gera saoche).
Lausikei shaangla shatbü masu ayingsi shaangla shatbü sanlon, ayingsi lon nyi üangngaijan; haoen saopobü ki; haoeneibü sii nyi lemshanga lakkulabü, hoba
Lausikei haoeneibü phe kan shanga yingjan; jipbü senlang hoba maeae youshi kho ka shangabü kilabü.
“Saopobü peisilei lembü pendou laobou Israel shousi shuongei
Hobaje
Hobaje
Hobaje tou ka jaüan Israel shousi shuongei haoenei shabü shonan ühaila shanga kamshang neichem nyangko aloujan.

Lausikei Levi shuongei kamshang neichem kümsilei kümlabü, hoba haoenei luluei shed shonbü künlabü, hoba haoen meten sünga kho ponpen shanga kho ngühkhüm kilabü, hoba Israel shousi shuong yoa haoen phetphan akilabü.
Aishanga Israel shousi shuongeibü an phejan laobou haoenei
“Nyi Levibü shuong to lenshi, ladang kanei Israel shousi shuong ka ngei kan la kaneibü phetphan shanga haoen ka an phejan lelaje, kheijinei
Hobaje kan shanga lembü kho amshanga youshou kibü tegütham hoba semlühhek nitshang ka longbü semlühdei tegü weeilabü.
Kho tegü kanei Israel shousi shuong ka hapbü kaneibü an phejan pendou ka
shanga lembü weko kanei jongsak pendou ka khübü maiboutham khei kho ka saopobü phejan kanei lemjan.
Hibü nyi haoen to laulabü, ‘Ladang kanei maiboutham lemlaje, kheijinei Levi shuong shanga amshang ka hapbü tegü, hoba semlüh nitshang ka hapbü tegü kho weeilabü.
Hobaje kho kanei pendou aenei kan hoba kan chempenei shaulabü; aishanga kamshang neichema kaneibü kümsilei shanga hapmaibü kan shanga pailetbü ki.
Hobaje kho ka maiboutham kanei sungan phoan phaiaje kho danko kan aikei shabü akilabü; lausikei kan ühaila shanga kanei Israel shousi shuongeibü saopobü peisilei ashatikujan.’”
“Ho
hoba kanei kho Eleazar ungshedbou la kulabü, hoba haoei shaishang khoongaeto kho leijung angan hao thedanga haitilabü;
hoba Eleazar ungshedbouei khoeibü sii kho haoeibü ikjishoua sungbalabü, hoba kamshang neichem thedang aenei sii kho nyetnei laklabü;
hoba hao thedanga müt cheei masu pi kho juoklabü.
Kheijinei ungshedbouei cedar bu hoba hisop hoba nakthüngan sakbü peisilei sungan kho masu pi jikbü jenyu to jinkulabü.
Kho phaia ungshedbouei haoeibü neisimei saklabü, hoba kho phaia hao shaishang neichem to atlabü, hoba ungshedbou kho chasem sühko asaopoko kilabü.
Hobaje aoei kho jiklaje, haoei haoeibü neisimei saklabü, hoba hao mang yulabü, hoba chasem sühko asao- poko kilabü.
Hobaje saüenan kibü müt cheei masu jikbü tap kho yoshaian shaishang khong- aenei sakteibü kaoena pholabü, hoba kho Israel shousi dan shanga asaopobü dei shanga pholabü; ho shabü lembü ki.
Hobaje aoei masueibü tap kho yoshailaje jembü neisimei saklabü, hoba chasem sühko asaopoko kilabü, hoba kho Israel shousi shuong hoba küksithang haoen yoa kibü shanga ponpen shanga song kilabü.”
Aoei müt at haibümang to meitilaje chalou nyet sühko asaopoko kilabü.
Chalou semnyet hoba nyetbounyet haoei jembü lolo dei khoei shabü ka saüenlabü; lausikei haoei sembounyet hoba nyetbounyet hao lolo asaüenlonga, hao ihinseilabü.
Aoei ong haibümang, khei müt haibü manga meitilaje, hoba jembü lolo ahinseiko kilaje hoba
Neichema haijinei ho ngühkhüm kia; neichem to atbü mütpem weko chalou nyet asao- poko kilabü.
Hobaje ipan kibü chaksiam laoboua küpjin ayoko ki, asaopoko kilabü.
Hobaje ao- youei tangakhonga haitian kibü to ayingsi haibümang to ayingsi müt ateibü lo to ayingsi heea meitilaje chalou nyet asaopoko kilabü.
Hobaje asaopobü shanga haoenei shabü juokbü tap sunglabü hoba dei haanbü khünei chak chenei jinlabü.

Hobaje hinseian kibü müt cheei hisop sungan kho deia shemlabü, hoba neichem thüka hoba chaksiam pendou thüka hoba khünei kibü müt to ayingsi haitian kibü to ayingsi haibü, ayingsi hee to meitibü la lakkulabü.
Hobaje saüenbü müt khoei asaopobü khola sembounyet hoba nyetbounyet haoei hao saüenkulabü, hoba haoei haoeibü neisimei saklabü, hoba hao lolo mang yulabü, hoba chasem hao saüenan kilabü.
Lausikei müt ao asaopoko kilaje, hoba jembü lolo asaüenda kho mütshuong yo ka wapan aplabü, aieilausi haoei
Hobaje haoen shanga kho ponpen song kilabü; hoba aoei asaopobü dei kho lakkulaje haoeibü neisimei sakjan; hoba aoei asaopobü dei to meitilaje, chasem sühko asaopoko kilabü;
hoba asaopobü mütei ai ong meitilaje asaopoko kilabü; hoba müt aoei khüto meitilaje chasem sühko asaopoko kilabü.
Kheijinei shaangbou lita Israelbü tan khümbo Zin yam sühkei, hoba mütshuong haoen lolo Kadesha kikei; hoba khünei Miriam haikei, hoba khünei khünkei.
Hobaje shuong shanga khünei dei akitei; hoba haoen liko haoen lolo Mosa si Aron khulimbo takshatkei.
Hobaje mütshuongei Mosa to tokyoko laukei, “
Hobaje aila
Kaonyek ho youshou, ayingsi bhuk, semlüh, chilang, ayingsi ai yunglabü dei akishang kaonyek haang alongbü hato leian loula aila Ijep ka kanei kün leian loukei?”
Hobaje Mosa si Aron haosi hamei takshatan kibü shuong thedang ka kukan kamshang neichem koukhün to atan haosieibü the khümbei hoba
Hobaje

“Julo kho sungashi, hoba shuong kamtiashi, hoba kaibü jai Aron kasiei haoen thedanga kasiei laang to dei longtila joyoashi, hoba nyi haoen shanga laang ka dei longtilabü; kho tegü nyi shuong hoba haoeneibü meisiau la yunglabü kulabü.”
Hobaje haoei sakkubü tegü Mosaei
Mosa si Aronei laang thedanga shuong kamtikei, hoba haoei haoen to laukei, “Kan khulimbo lobü shuong; tou ditashi; küsiei ho laang ka dei longtikulabü.”
Hobaje Mosaei haoeibü ik shingan haoeibü juloei laang to nyinei ngümbei; hoba dei juongnyu longkei, hoba mütshuongei hoba haoeneibü meisiauei yungkei.
Lausikei
Habü ho Meriba dei shuong ki; aieilausi Israel shousi shuongei
Mosaei Kadesh ka Edombü choba jungto ngühlang künbü hautikei; hoba laukei, “Hai kaibü jaisina Israelei lauda, kü to haüthükbü khonsak pendou nyi ngeakei;
laobou küneibü pisibousi shuong Ijep to louyenkei, hoba kün Ijepa jih lounyu kikei, hoba Ijepbüei kün hoba küneibü pisibousi shuong to amaiko jungeikei;
hoba ladang künei

Ngei ka to sudajada, kaibü kaonyek danko kün dantikaima; kün sek danko, ayingsi semlühlaak danko ohaulabü, ayingsi deikhün ka künei dei ayunglabü, kün chobaeibü khongtang lam ae to haulabü, künei kaibü leilang adankhüm shongko maeae ayingsi nanaeto asepeilabü.”
Lausikei Edombüei hao to laukei, “Kakhu limbo ngo in yoan longakei, no ngo danko adanlabü.”

Hobaje Israel shousi shuongei hao to laukei, “Kün kaoyaülam to anglabü; hoba künei kaibü dei, ngo hoba ngeibü samkeisamuk shuongei yungalonga munam kulabü. Kü to khei ai amaibü akümbo ngeibü youei dantikaima.”
Lausikei haoei laukei, “No adanlabü.” Hobaje Edombüei hao khulimbo müt juong yoan hoba sekbülakbü dan yoa longkei.
Kho tegü Edombüei haoeibü leilang aiko Israelbü la lam aku; khünei Israelbü hao ka sepeinyu ngaikei.
Israelbü mütshang pendou Kadesh ka meimeijung haukei. Hobaje Israel shousi shuong khei tan pendou, Hor shongh to loukei.
Hobaje Hor shongha Edom kaodak leilang nyangko
“Aron jembü mütshuong yoa yolabü, aishanga ngei Israel shousi shuong la kubü kaonyek to hao aloulabü; aieilausi Meriba dei shanga kasiei ngeibü ngüh khulimbo lokei.”
Aron hoba haoeibü shou Eleazarei leian Hor shongh sühkei,
hoba Aronei haoeibü neisimei hangletashi hoba haoeibü shou Eleazar la khübü kho yukkuashi; hoba Aron haoeibü mütshuong yoa yolabü, hoba khünei hailabü.
Hobaje
Hobaje Mosaei Aroneibü neisimei kekletan hao shou Eleazar la lekukei, hoba khünei shongh khua Aron haikei; hoba Mosa si Eleazar haosi ham shongh ka louyenkei.
Hobaje ladang shuong pendouei Aron haibü hapbei, Aron shanga haoenei chalou khujin khei Israel chung pendou haapbei.
Ladang yungküka kibü Aradbü choba Israelbü shuong Atharimbüeibü lam to louda dogo laubü ditkei, hoba haoei Israelbü khulimbo wapyokei, hoba at lapbei,
kheijinei Israelbüei
ei Israelbü to ngüha lekukei, hoba Kananbü khümbo kukei; hoba haoenei lemailela haoen hoba haoeneibü sangnyu shuong shemtikei; hoba ho kaonyek to Horma dogo laukei.
Kheijinei haoen Hor shongh ka Saklangbü Yungnyu aeto Edom kaiko haukei; lausikei mütshuongei lama anatenko apbei.
Hobaje mütshuongei Mühghaü si Mosa khulimbo ngüh angko laukei, “Aila kanei kün yama haitilabü lele Ijep ka leian loukei? aieilausi shausiyung aki, deikei aki; hoba ho lejim akibü wentekei kün oda.”
Kheijinei
Hobaje mütshuong Mosa jungto louan laukei, “Künei shabü shona, aishanga künei
ei Mosa to laukei: Chisak namei sekbülakbü pinyu che kümashi, hoba kho phodonga lonan phoashi, hoba kho phaia ao to ong püpbei haoei chühsi lang kilabü.
Hibü Mosaei chisak namei pinyu che kümbei, hoba kho phodonga lonan phokei, hoba pinyuei müt atto püpsi haoei chisak nam pinyu khüto chühjinei hao lang kikei.
Hobaje Israelbü shuong meimeijung haukei, hoba Obota otkei.
Hobaje haoen Obot ka meimeijung hauan Iye Abarima Moab thedanga kibü yama chaangbou aenei shaikei,
kho ka haoen meimeijung haukei hoba Zered pholia shaikei.
Kho ka haoen meimeijung haukei, hoba Amorbü leilang ka longjinei yama Arnon napheinei shaikei, (aishanga Arnon kho Moab si Amor kanglanga leilang ki.)
Kho khei yingbüei
Hobaje pholi anglek Ar kibü aenei yeian hoba Moab leilang thüka nongan.”
Khüka haoen Beeri to meimeikei; ho
Kheijinei Israelbüei ho chia laukei:
“Ongjung longashi, O deikhün,
kanei ho shangabü chia atkushi;
Sonenbü shuongei thubü deikhün,
Yaangenbü choba shousi shuongei thuatlangbü;
Chobaeibü ju hoba juloei.”
Hobaje yamlamang ka haoen Mahana to haukei;
hoba Ma- hana ka Nahaliel hoba Nahaliel ka Bamoth;
hoba Bamoth ka Moab kaonyeka kibü pholi to loukei, laobou Pisga khuaenei nyangko phetsen kaodak to chühan yantida.
Kheijinei Israelbüei Amorbü Choba jungto ngühlang künbü hautiko laukei,
“Kaibü kaonyek danko ngo hautikai; künei sek aeto, ayingsi semlühlaak aeto asepeilabü, künei deikhün ka dei ayunglabü, kaibü leikhüm adanshongko kün Chobaeibü khongnyu lama haulabü.”

Lausikei Sihon chobaei haoeibü leikhüm danko Israelbü haula asakku; hoba tokei hao mütshuong pendou leishaikei, hoba Israelbü khulimbo yamlamang to haukei, hoba Jahaz to loukei, hoba Israelbü khulimbo wapyokei.
Lausikei Israelbüei haoeneibü in maeei haoen thükkei hoba haoeneibü kaonyek Arnon ka Jabok sühko, khei Amonbü sühko lekei, aishanga Amonbü la ba leilang aeibou kaangan kikei.
Hobaje Israelbüei khübü sangnyu pendou lekei, hoba Amonbü sangnyu pendoua Heshbona hoba khübü sang pendoua Israelbü kikei.
Aishanga Heshbon kho Amorbü choba Sihon sangnyu kikei, aoei shaangbü Moab Choba khulimbo wapyokei hoba hao ka kaonyek pendou Arnon sühko sokei.
Khei yingbüei ong Tetenbü ngühei hai lauda:
“Kan Heshbon to kaiya! kho kümetngaitiashi;
hoba longeitiashi.
Aishanga Heshbon ka wan,
Sihon sangnyu ka wanlong longa,
Khoei Moaba Ar hoba Arnon shongha bunyubou shuong suia.
O Moab, ka shanga ügütü!
Kan akisap,
Khemoshbü mütshuong;
haoei haoeibü shousi shuong lintibü la yeitiko
Amorbü choba Sihon ikto kukei.
Hibü haoeneibü shousi shuong Heshbon ka
Dibon sühko mautikei;
Medeba nyangko Nashim ka Nofa sühko wan sapbua.”
Hibü Israelbü Amorbü kaonyeka kikei.
Hobaje Mosaei Jazer pheian chühla hautikei; hoba haoenei khübü sangnyu shuong komlepbei; hoba khünei kibü Amorbü shian sattikei.
Hobaje haoen sepeikei hoba Bashan ae lamnyu to sepeian angkei; hoba Bashanbü choba Ogei haoen khulimbo hao hoba haoeibü mütshuong pendou Edreia wapyola longkei.
Hobaje
Hibü haoenei hao la aikei aphoku shongko hao hoba haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü mütshuong haitikei.
Kheijinei Israelbü shuong meimeijung haukei, hoba Jordan yungko thena Moab pholi Jerikhoa shaikei.
Tou Ziporeibü shou Balakei Amorbü to Israelbüei kümbü pendou hapbei.
Hobaje Moabüei mütshuong to aeibou hatko kikei; aieilausi haoen juong kikei, hoba Moabei Israel shousi shuong hapan hatjihatko kikei.
Hobaje Moabei Midianbü jaishou shuong to laukei, “Masu pongsuei khongthua sang jepbü tegü ho tan hoei sen kaijembo pendou sean künlabü, hoba kho chaloua Zipor shou Balak Moaba Choba kikei.”

Hobaje Eufrates Shumang nyangko Pethora Beoreibü shou Balaam jungto ngühlang künbü haoen mütshuong hautiko laukei, “Chüh- ashi, Ijep ka longbü mütshuong hanei kia; chühashi, haoen kaothe shenko hoba ngeibü thea khulimbo kia.

Hibü tou kaiya, hoba habü mütshuong to kü shanga khükku uokkuashi; kü shanga haoen juongsapbei; aingean ngei haoen thüklabü hoba kaonyek ka haoen shian apenlabü yingkei; aieilausi ngei ngekei nyi ao haükulaje haoei haüda, hoba nyi ao to khükdauokda hao shedsikhau bauda.”
Hobaje Moab si Midianbü jaishou shuong haoenei seibü yaübü mu jungan meimeikei, hoba Balaam jungto louan haoenei Balakeibü ngühlang lenkei.
Hobaje haoei haoen to laukei, “Tao hanei otshi,
Kheijinei Balaam jungto Mühghaü louan laukei, “Ka yoa kibü kho aoyou?”
Balaamei Mühghaü to laukei, “Moabbü Choba Zipporeibü shou Balakei kü jungto hai lauko ngühlang künan hautikei,
‘Chüh- ashi, Ijep ka loubü mütshuong hanei kao the shenko kia, tou kaiya, hoba kü shanga haoen to khükku uokkushi; aingean ngo haoen to wapyoan thükan shian sattienlep yingkei.’ ”
Hobaje Mühghaüei Balaam to laukei, “No haoen yoa ohaujan, nyi mütshuong to akhük auokjan; aieilausi haoen haükuakei.”
Hibü nyibounyet ngeyang Balaam pienan Balakeibü jaishou shuong to laukei, “Kan lulu kishang to ngaiashi; aieilausi ngo shiletda.”
Hibü Moabbü jaishou shuong sepeinyu ngaian Balak to laukei, “Balaam kün yoa tohaukho dogo lauda.”
Kheijinei Balakei haoen to juongbou hoba nyenshen mütshuong nyibou hautikei,
hoba Balaam jungto louan haoenei hao to laukei, “Zippor shou Balakei hai lauda, ‘Sanoudambo no kü jungto loula aieikei tethangetti.
Aishanga ngei no nyenhaang yaangei pailettilabü, hoba nyi lauda, kho ngei kümlabü. Hibü ngei ka to sudajada, habü mütshuong to kü shanga khükku uokkushima.’ ”
Lausikei Balaamei jongaiko Balakeibü khangenbü shuong to laukei, “Balakei haoeibü Choba chem chandinam hoba honei shenko kü la kua tegükei,
Hibü tou
Khüyou Mühghaü Balaam jungto louan laukei, “No ngala khübü mütshuong loualonga, haoen yoa meimeijung hauashi, lausikei ai ngüh ngei ka to joyolaje, kho ong nyi lenjan.”
Hobaje ngeyang Balaam pikei, hoba haoeibü gadua setan Moabbü jaishou shuong yoa haukei.
Hao haubü hangshong Mühghaü khauangkei, hoba hao haoeibü gadua setan haoeibü sambü müt nyiei hangan haujinei
Hobaje gadu khoei
Kheijinei
hoba gaduei
Kheijinei
hoba gaduei
Kheijinei
Balaamei gadu to laukei, “Aieilausi nyi ngo louyola lekei, ngeibü ika in kikei tegüje ngei no haitian kikhoulabü.”
Gaduei Balaam to jongaikei, “Kaibü langkei sünga tat sühko no setbü kaibü gadu ngo aying lo? Ngei ho tegü ka to jungeian chühlao?” Haoei jongaikei, “Ajungei.”
Kheijinei
“Aila nyi kaibü gadu to semnei ngümbei,” dogo
hoba gaduei ngo hapbei, hoba semnei sühko kü jungka sepeikei, haoei kü jungka asepei tegüje ngei no tou haidangaje haitian kikhoulabü, lausikei gaduje lang kikhoulabü.”
Kheijinei Balaamei
Lausikei
Ladang Balakei Balaam louada dogo ditkei Moab sangnyu sühko shuokla haukei, kho leilang thonbü Arnon leilanga kia.
“Ngei no ngala panteiko ohauti lo?” dogo Balakei Balaam to laukei. “Aila no kü jungto alou? Maimaitham ngei no yaangentila athüksi?”
Khünei Balaamei Balak to jongaikei, “Chühashi, ngo ka jungto louakeinai lo? Tou kü to denche ongkei hau kia si? Mühghaüei kü la sembunga jinkubü ngüh ong ngei laula thükkei.”
Kheijinei Balaam Balak yoa haukei, hoba haoen Kiriat Huzot to loukei.
Hobaje Balakei masu pongsu si sanlon haitikei, hoba at Balaam hoba hao yoa kibü jaishou shuong jungto hautikukei.
Hobaje nyibounyet Balakei Bamoth Baal laobou ka nyangbou hapla thükla khüto hao leian angkei.
Kheijinei Balaamei laukei, “Hanei kü la lemshang che kümbü, hoba hanei kü la masu pongsu nyet hoba sanlon paang nyet lamlebu.”
Kheijinei Balaamei laubü tegü Balakei kümbei; hoba Balak si Balaamei lemshang wekoa masu pongsu che che hoba sanlon paang che che lembei.
Kheijinei Balaamei Balak to laukei, “Kaibü lembü nyangko loan kiteishi; ngo kukkho, aingenyu kü to haüyola
Hobaje Mühghaü hao to haüyokei hoba Balaamei laukei, “Ngei lemshang nyet kho lamlea, hoba lemshang wekoa masu pongsu che che hoba sanlon paang che cheei lema.”
Kheijinei
Hibü hao hao jungto sepeinyu ngaikei, hoba Moabbü jaishou shuong pendou yoa liko hao juokbü lembü nyangko hao loan hapbei.
Hobaje haoei haoeibü ngühphatbü sungbaan laukei,
“Balakei ngo Aram ka leian loukei,
Chaang aephei ka Moabbü chobaei,
‘Kaiya, kü shanga Jakob to khükku uokkuashi,
hoba kaiya Israel khulimbo huiletkuashi.’
Mühghaüei akhükuokbü ngei lai khüklauokla?
Hobaje Mühghaüei ahuiletbü ngei lai huiletla?
Aishanga laangshong thüka ngei hao hapda,
hoba shongh ka ngei hao to chühda;
Lo, ho boushou kibü phang che ki.
Hobaje phang yoa pakan ajinlabü.
Aoei Jakobeibü thamngu wela thükla,
ayingsi phejan leia che weenla?
Ngühmaanglanbü shuong haibü tegü ngo haitishi.
Ngeibü thonbü haoen tegü kitishi.”
Kheijinei Balakei Balaam to laukei,
“Nyi kü to lai jungeikei?,
hoba chühashi nyi haoen ong haükua!”
Hobaje haoei jongaikei, “

Kheijinei Balakei hao to laukei, “Haoen pendou ayingsikei, ka junga nyangko kibü shuong ongkei nyi haoen hapenlabü lele sanoudambo no kü yoa kaoen che to kai; khüka kü shanga haoen to khükku uokkushi.”
Hibü haoei hao Zofim khongthu to leian, Pisga shongh khu to angkei, lan haoei lemshang nyet kümbei hoba lemshang wekoa masu pongsu che che hoba sanlon paang che che lemla kukei.
“Thinei ngo
Kheijinei
Hibü hao jungto hao sepeinyu longeikei, hoba Moabbü jaishou shuong yoa liko hao juokbü lembü nyangko loan hapbei.
Kheijinei haoei haoeibü thusei ngüh lenkei.
“Kaiya, Balak hoba ditashi, Zipor shou,
kü to nou haangashi.
Mühghaü kho jembü ngüh leilulabü lele müt tegü aying.
Haoei lauan, kho haoei akümlep lo?
Ayingsi haoei joyoan kho haoei ühaüthüklep lo?
Chühashi,
haükulabü shanga ngei sakkubü sungletakei,
hoba haoei haükua,
Ngei kho jeila athük.
Jakob to shedbü achühen,
ayingsi khonsak aikei Israel to ühüplabü;
Hobaje chobaei ngekbü haoen yoa kia.
Mühghaüei haoen Ijep ka leiyenkei,
Hao to mühghaü ngoueibü laang yemakei.
Aishanga Jakob khulimbo khüksiuok ngüh aki;
hoba Israel khulimbo tetenbü ngüh aki,
Mühghaüei latetche kümbei dogo ong
Jakob si Israel shanga laulabü.
Chühashi, molosaonyu pi laksepbü tegü,
müt tan che kia.
Khei molosaonyu tegü jembü lolo pida.
Haitilabü meisiau asui shongko,
hoba haitibü sii ayung shongko ladangkei lengan akida.”
Kheijinei Balakei Balaam to laukei, “Kholongaje haoen to aikei tekhüktuok hoba haükei tehaüku.”
Lausikei Balaamei Balak to jongaiko laukei, “
Kheijinei Balakei Balaam to laukei, “Kaiya, ngei no kaoen che to leian haukho; aingenyu khükaje nyi kü shanga haoen to khüklauokla muko haplep yingkei.”
Hibü Balakei Balaam Peor shongh khu laobou ka phetsen kaodak to chühan yantida, khüto leian haukei.
Hobaje Balaamei Balak to laukei, “Kü shanga lemshang nyet hanei kümbuashi, hoba kü shanga masu pongsu nyet hoba sanlon paang nyetei lemashi.”
Balaamei lenbü tegü Balakei kümbei, haoei lemshang wekoa masu pongsu che che hoba sanlon paang che cheei lembei.
Ladang
hoba Balaamei haoeibü nyekei chühan angtikei hoba Israel chung shuong shaibü hapbei; hoba Mühghaü soushou hao jungto loukei,
hoba haoei khübü ngühphatbü sungbaan laukei,
“Beoreibü shou Balaamei lauda:
Hobaje nyek longan kibü mütei lauda;
Mühghaüeibü ngüh aoei ditda haoei lauda,
aoei pendou thükenbou mangsang hapda,
khüpetda lausikei nyek longda;
O Jakob, kaibü neichem lai maikei,
O Israel, no kishang lai maikei,
Yosiyang nyünglo nyüngan kibü phatko,
shumang nyangko kibü bamang phatko,
shumang nyangko cedar
bunyu kibü phatko,
haoeibü meisok ka dei koulabü.
Haoeneibü jemdei juong kilabü.
Haoeneibü Choba Agag tokei thükkabou yeilabü.
Hobaje haoeneibü songle tonenlabü.
Mühghaüei haoen Ijep ka leiyenan
haoen la mühghaü ngoueibü laang tegü kia.
Haoeneibü dangbou phangshuong haoenei suilabü.
Hobaje haoeneibü lo netla yeitikulabü.
Hobaje haoeneibü laujinei paiko kiplabü.
Hao khüpetkei,
hao molosaonyu tegü yepbei,
hoba molosaonyu pi phatko;
aoei hao phonla, aoei kan haükuda,
haoen pendou haübou yingshi.
Aoei kan to khükdauokda haoen pendou khüksiuok yingshi.”
Kheijinei Balakei Balaam to maangpokkei hoba haoei ik ipbo laukei, “Ngeibü dangbou to khüklauokla ngei no ngakei, hoba nyi shangashatko semnei haoen haükua.
Hibü no tou kaibü chem to hali ngaiashi; ngei no nyen- hang yaangei tonenla dambei, lausikei chühashi,
Hobaje Balaamei Balak to laukei, “Nyi kü jungto ngühlang künan hautibou to ngei ho hai alau lo?
Balakei tou haoeibü chem chandinamei shenko kuasikei
Tou chühashi, ngo ngeibü mütli jungto ngaida; kaiya, loulabü chaloua habü mütshuongei kaibü mütli to ai kümla kho ngei ka la lenkho.
Hobaje haoei haoeibü ngühphatbü sungjung louan laukei,
“Beoreibü shou Balaamei lauda:
Mühghaü ngüh aoei ditda haoei lauda,
Aoei pendou Thükenbou mangsang hapda,
khüpetda lausikei nyek longda.
Ngei hao to chühda lausikei
nyangbüa aying;
Jakob ka khanshoulitshou che longlabü,
hoba Israel ka Chobaeibü julo che longlabü;
hoba Moab kaodak sühko jangnyinkulabü;
hoba Seth shousi pendou shemtikulabü.
Hobaje Israelei hau kiko kümjinei Edom lean aplabü.
Tokei haoeibü dangbou kibü Seir lean aplabü.
Hobaje Jakob ka choba sangle longlabü,
hoba sangnyu ka joubü mautilabü.”
Hobaje haoei Amalekbü to chühkei, hoba ngühphatbü sungbaan laukei,
“Phang yoa shaangbou kho Amalekbü kikei,
Lausikei thonla hao mautikulabü.”
Hobaje haoei Kenbü to chühan, haoeibü ngühphatbü sungbaan laukei:
“No kishang kaangko sekkotham kia,
kaibü hap laanga kümakei.
Khei yingasikei Ken lemailela mautilabü,
lalokche Ashurei no thüngbou la yeitila?”
Kho phaia haoei haoeibü ngühphatbü sungbaan laukei:
“ügütü, Mühghaüei hai kümjinei ao lang kila?
Lausikei Kittim ka long shuong loulabü,
hoba khübü khoei Ashur khonsaktilabü,
hoba Eber khonsaktilabü,
hoba haokei maubüei sühlabü.”
Kheijinei Balaam meimeijung hao kishang to ngaikei, hoba Balakkei haoeibü lam to haukei.
Ladang Israelbü shuong Shittima kikei, kheijinei mütshuongei Moabbü yaksa to pejapelala khangkei.
Aishanga haoenei mütshuong kho haoenei lembüsabü haitishang to ngakei, hoba mütshuongei lembüsabü phe shaukei, hoba haoeneibü mühghaü thedanga khüpetkei.
Hobaje Israelbüei Peora Baal to jaman apbei; hibü Israel khulimbo
Hobaje
Hobaje Mosaei Israelbü matjembü shuong to laukei, “Aoyou Peorbü Baal to homan ki, khübü müt weko kanei haitiashi.”
Hobaje chühashi, haoen kamshang neichem koukhüna haoen haapbo kijinei, Israelbü shousi yoa cheei jembü jaisinasi shuong jungto Midianbü yaksa che leian loukei.
Hobaje ladang Aron ungshedboueibü shi Eleazareibü shou Finehasei kho hapbei, hao shuong ka longkei hoba haoeibü ika aubu che jungkei;
hoba Israelbü kho phaito popchem to semjung atkei, hoba Israelbou si yaksanyu kho shimung paiko haosi ham kho suettikei. Kho tegü Israel shousi ka lim kho thakkei.
Kheinyu yingsikei limei haibü shuong kho hajar saoto lei kikei.
Aron ungshedboueibü shi Eleazareibü shou Finehasei ngei khambü tegü haoen yoa maangshatei Israelbü thonan üpti.
Hibü ho lenashi, chühashi, ngei hao la ngeibü sangmai theyolanyobü kuda,

kho hao shanga hoba hao ka pakbü shuong shanga ponpen ungshed kümsilei shanga theyolanyobü kilabü; aieilausi haoei haoeibü Mühghaü shanga dühko kikei, hoba Israel shousi shuong shanga shabü ngean apla kümbei.
Tou haitibou Israelbü ao Midian sao yoa haitikei, haoeibü nyen Simeon chung leiyeibou Salueibü shou Zimri kikei.
Hobaje haitibü Midian saoeibü nyen kho Zureibü nouyangnyu Kozbi kikei; Zur kho Midiana haoeneibü chunga leiyeibou che kikei.
“Midianbü to wapyo khangashi, hoba haoen shiashi;
aishanga Peorbü laüa Midianbü leiyeibou cheeibü nouyangnyu Kozbi laüa hoba ao Peor haangjung lima haitikei.”
Hobaje lim danan phaia,
“Israelbü tan khümbo, haoen chung weko, po saoche ka thükae Israela wapyola haula thükbü weanchühashi.”
Hibü Mosa si Eleazar ungshedbouei haoen yoa Moab pholia Jordan nyangko Jerikhoa joyoko laukei, “Po saoche thükae ka müt wean chühashi.”
Israeleibü shaang bukbü shou Reuben; Reuben ka pakbü shuong: Hanok ka Hanok chempen; Pallu ka Pallu chempen
Hezron ka Hezron chempen, Karmi ka Karmi chempen.
Habü ho Reuben chung ki, hoba haoen lühbak hajar 43,730.
Hobaje Pallueibü shousi shuong: Eliab,
Eliabeibü shousi shuong, Nemuel, Dathan, hoba Abiram. Habü Dathan si Abiram haosiei Koraeibü tan yoa
khübü tan ladang haikei, kaoei jembü sembung kaakei hoba Kora yoa haophai sembü shuong suikei; wanei haoen 250 suijinei haoen tetlatalabü che yeikei.
Kheijinei yingsikei Koraeibü shousi shuongje ühai.
Simeon ka pakbü chung chung janbü: Nemuel ka Nemuel chempen, Jamin ka Jamin chempen, Jakin ka Jakin chem- pen.
Zera ka Zera chempen, Shaul ka Shaul chempen.
Habü ho Simeon chung ki, hajar 22,200.
Gad ka pakbü chung si phang janyinbü: Zefun ka Zefun chempen, Haggai ka Haggai chempen, Shuni ka Shuni chem- pen,
Osni ka Osni chempen, Eri ka Eri chempen
Arod ka Arod chempen, Areli ka Areli chempen,
Habü ho Gad chung lühbak hajar 40,500.
Jihudaeibü shousi shuong: Er si Onan; Er si Onan Kanan kaoa haikei.
Hobaje Jihuda ka pakbü chung chung janyinbü: Shela ka Shela chempen, Perez ka Perez chempen, Zera ka Zera chempen.
Hobaje Perezeibü shousi shuong: Hezron ka Hezron chem- pen, Hamul ka Hamul chempen.
Habü ho Jihuda chung weanchühbü ki, hajar 76,500.
Issakar ka pakbü chung, chung janyinbü. Tola ka Tola chempen, Puna ka Puna chempen;
Jashub ka Jashub chempen, Shimron ka Shimron chempen.
Habü ho Issakareibü chung, lühbak hajar 64,300.
Zebulun ka pakbü chung, chung janyinbü, Sered ka Sered chempen, Elon ka Elon chempen, Jahleel ka Jahleel chempen.
Habü ho Zebulun chung lühbak ki, hajar 60,500.
Josef ka pakbü chung, chung janyinbü, Manasse hoba Efraim.
Manasseeibü shousi shuong: Makir ka Makir chempen hoba Makir ka Gilead pakkei; Gilead ka Gilead chempen.
Habü ho Gileadeibü shousi shuong: Leser ka Leser chempen, Helek ka Helek chempen,
hoba Asriel ka Asriel chempen,
hoba Shemida ka Shemida chempen, hoba Hefer ka Hefer chempen.
Hobaje Hefereibü shou Zelofehad shousi aki, yaksa shousi ong: Zelofe- hadeibü yaksa shousi shuong nyen: Mahla, Noa, Hogla, Milka, hoba Tirza.
Habü ho Manasse chung; hoba haoen lühbak hajar 52,700.
Habü ho Efraim ka pakbü chung: chung janyinbü: Shuthela ka Shuthela chempen, Becher ka Becher chempen, Tahan ka Tahan chempen,
hoba ho Shuthelaeibü shousi shuong: Eran ka Eran chempen,
Habü ho Efraim chung lühbak ki, hajar 32,500. Ho Josefeibü shousi shuong chung kia.
Benjamin ka pakbü chung, chung janyinbü: Bela ka Bela chempen, Ashbel ka Ashbel chempen, Ahiram ka Ahiram chempen.
Shufam ka Shufam chempen, Hufam ka Hufam chempen.
Hobaje Belaeibü shousi shuong: Ard si Naaman kikei; Ard ka Ard chempen, Naaman chempen ka Naaman.
Habü ho Benjamineibü chung: hoba haoen lühbak hajar 45,600.
Habü ho Dan ka pakbü chung, chung janyinbü: Shuham ka Shuham chempen; habü ho Daneibü chung janbü ki.
Shuham chung pendou haoen lühbak hajar 64,400.
Asher ka pakbü chung, chung janyinbü: Imna ka Imna chempen, Ishvi ka Ishvi chempen, Beria ka Beria chempen
Be- riaeibü shousi shuong: Heber ka Heber chempen, Makhiel ka Makhiel chempen,
Hobaje Ashereibü nouyangnyu nyen Sera kikei.
Habü ho Ashereibü chung lühbak hajar 53,400.
Naftali ka pakbü chung, chung janyinbü: Jazrel ka Jazrel chempen, Guni ka Guni chempen,
Jezer ka Jezer chempen. Shilem ka Shilem chempen,
Habü ho Naftali chung chung janyinbü ki; hoba haoen weanchühbü hajar 45,400.
Habü ho Israel shousi shuong lühbak weanchühbü ki, hajar 601,730.
Hobaje
“Habü ho shanga haoeneibü nyen phaito phetphanla shanga kaonyek kho janlabü.
Juongbü la juongbü phet kujan, hoba shibü la shibü thüng phet kho kujan; chung weko la nyi phet kho che che lulueibü lühbak thüng kushi.
Khei yingsikei kao kho phaang pakan janlabü, haoen pisibou chung lühbak thüng haoeneibü phet haplabü.
Phaangpakbüa longbü tegü juongbü shibü thüng phet kho janlabü.
Habü ho Levi chung chung lühbak webü ki; Gershon ka Gershon chempen, Kohat ka Kohat chempen, Merari ka Merari chempen,
Habü ho Levibü chung ki. Libni chung, Hebron chung, Mathli chung, Mushi chung, Kora chung. Hobaje Kohat ka Amram pakkei.
Hobaje Amrameibü yak nyen Jokhebed kikei; Levieibü nouyangnyu ao Ijepa Levi la bukkukei, hoba saoei Amram la Aron si Mosa hoba haosieibü nou Miriam bukkukei.
Hobaje Aron la Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar hoba Ithamar bukkukei.
Hobaje Nadab si Abihu haosi ham
Hobaje haoen lühbak webü hajar 23,000; bousu phai pendou lit che ka thükae, aishanga haoen Israel shousi shuong yoa lühbak webüa ayo, aieilausi Israel shousi shuong yoa haoen la phetphanla aku.
Mosa si Eleazarei wean- chühbü habü ki; haoenei Moab pholia Jordan nyangko Jerikhoa Israel shousi mütshang pakkei.
Lausikei khübü yoa Mosa si Aron ungshedbouei Israel shousi shuong Sinai yamlamanga wean chühbüa haoen ayobü che ongkei aki.
Aishanga haoen shanga

Kheijinei Josefeibü shou Manasse chung ka Manasseeibü shou Makir hoba haoeibü shou Gileadeibü shou Hefereibü shou Zelofehadeibü yaksa shousi shuong thedang to loukei, hoba habü ho haoeibü yaksa shousi shuong ki: Mahla, Noa, Hogla, Milka hoba Tirza.
Hobaje haoenei Mosa thedanga hoba Eleazar ungshedbou thedanga hoba leiyeibü shuong thedanga hoba noknyüh pendou thedanga kamshang neichem koukhüna loan laukei,
“Küneibü bou yama haikei, hoba
Haoei bousushou akisikei, aila haoeibü chempen yoka aboueibü nyen apbukei? Aboueibü jaisina yoa kün la phet labü.”
Mosaei haoeneibü mat
hoba
“Zelofehadeibü yaksa shousi shuongei laubü kho tükde lauda, maimaitham nyi haoeneibü boueibü chempen yoa phet kho kujan; hoba nyi haoeneibü boueibü phet haoen jungto hautikushi.
Hobaje nyi Israel shousi shuong to lenashi, ‘Müt che bousushou akiko haisi kheijinei kanei haoeibü phet kho haoeibü nouyangnyu jungto hautikushi.
Hobaje haoeibü nouyangnyu akisikei haoeibü phet haoeibü jailanala kanei kujan.
Hobaje jaisina akilonga, kheijinei kanei haoboueibü jaisina la haoeibü phet kuashi.
Hobaje haoboueibü jaisina akilonga kheijinei kanei haoeibü chempen thenboulenbou nyangbou la haoeibü phet kujan, hoba haoei kho lelabü. Hobaje
Kheijinei
Hobaje ladang nyi kho haplaje, nokei kaibü jai Aron tegü jembü himshuong yoa yolabü;

aieilausi deia haoen thedanga kü la hanglenlabü shangabüa Zin yamlamanga shuongei khulimbo meimeijinei kanei ngeibü ngühkhüm laangdak khuliman apbei.” (Khübü kho Zin yamlamanga Kadesh si Meriba dei shuong ki.)
Hobaje Mosaei
eibü tan sanlombü akibü tegü ayingla shanga hao haoen thea haula hoba loula, hoba haoei haoen leian haulabü hoba leian loulabü.”
Hobaje
hoba Eleazar ungshedbü thedanga hao lotiashi; hoba haoenei hapbo hao la khümbo kuashi.
Hobaje Israel shousi tan pendouei ngüha lelabü lele nyi kaibü hau hao thüka phokushi.
Hobaje hao Eleazar ungshedbou thedanga lolabü hoba ungshedbouei hao shanga
Hobaje
Hobaje haoei hao to ikei shangetkei, hoba
Israel shousi shuong la sakkuashi: Ngeibü lembü, kü la shausiyung lembü, wanei lembü kubü, kü shanga ponlem teibü, habü ho jih tükdea kü to lemla shanga kanei maangsangjan.
Hobaje nyi haoen to laulabü:
Nyi ngeyang sanlon shoushou cheei hoba chasem lubü cheei;
wen inyaibü efa anboubü phejan, oliv onang nitbü hin leiboubü phejan yoa lemlabü.
Ho athakko juokbü lembü, laobou ponlem teibü shanga wanei
Hobaje yunglabü lembü kho sanlon shoushou wekoa hin che ka phejan leia phejan che yingjan. Saopobü lemshanga
Lubü sanlon shou che kho nyi chasem lemashi,
Hobaje po cheeibü shou sanlon nali athebü paang penyi hoba shausiyung lembü shanga wen inyaibü efa phejan ana nyiboubü, onang yoa kheiyoan lembü yoa,
athakko juokbü lembü hoba yunglabü lembü to limbo ho Nounyet weko juokbü lembü ki.
Hobaje lita shaangbounyet kanei
hoba shausiyung lembü shanga masu pongsu weko onang to kheiyoan, wen inyaibü efa che an phejana phejan sem; hoba shausiyung lembü shanga sanlon che shanga kho wen inyaibü phejan ana phejan penyi,
hoba shausiyung lembü sanlon shoushou weko wen inyaibü yoa kheiyoan, efa anboubü phejan,

Hobaje haoeneibü yunglabü lembü kho masu pongsu che shanga ih hin thoche, hoba sanlon paang shanga kho hin phejan semboubü hoba sanlon shoushou che shanga hin che phejan leiboubü po kanglanga lit haanbü weko juokbü lembü kia.
Hobaje
Kheijinei shaangbou lit anthükleiboubü kho
Hobaje ho lit anthükngao boubüa lem che kilabü, chalou nyet tokai ajinbü wentek shaulabü.
Shaangbounyet saopobü kamshai che kilabü; kanei kümsilei kaangbüsekbü aikei akümlabü;
lausikei wanei lembü che, juokbü lembü che
Khübü shausiyung lembü wen inyaibü onang to kheiyoan efa phejan ana semboubü masu pongsu weko hoba sanlon paang shanga efa phejan ana penyi;
sanlon shoushou pennyet weko shanga anboubü phejan nyi lemjan;
ka shanga shabü delabü shabü lembü shanga lon paang che.
ngeyang juokbü lembü laobou ponpen shanga juokbü lembü ki, kho to limbo nyi habü ho lemjan.
Kho tegü lembü shuong chalou nyet shanga, shausiyung wanei lembü, ponlem maibü
Hobaje chalou nyetbounyeta saopobü kambü che kilabü; kanei kümsilei kaangbüsekbü akümjan.
Tokei shaangbü langle shuokbü chaloua ladang shausi- yung lembü haanbü
Lausikei kanei ponlem maibü
hoba haoen shausiyung lembü wen inyaibü onang yoa kheiyoan, masu pongsu weko phejan ana phejan sem, sanlon paang che shanga phejan ana penyi,
sanlon shoushou nyet kho sanlon shoushou weko anboubü phejan;
kan shanga shabü dean apla shanga lonpaang che.
Athakko juokbü lembü si shausiyung lembü to limbo kanei habü yunglabü lembüei lemjan. (Khübü kho kan shanga nali athebü kijan.)
Tou lit nyetboubü lit khangnyet, kanei saopobü kambü che kilabü; kanei kümsilei kaangbüsekbü aikei akümjan, kan shanga ho teklaang metbü chalou ki.
Kanei juokbü lembü che,
Hobaje habü shausiyung lembüwen inyaibü onang yoa kheiyoan, masu pongsu shangabü kho phejan ana phejan penyi,
hoba sanlon shoushou pemnyet shanga sanlon shoushou weko phejan chenei phejan che,
hoba shabü dela shanga shabü lembü shanga lonpaang che,
kho to yoko litnyu haanbüa juokbü lembü shausiyung lembü yoan, hoba yunglabü lembü khübü shanga ngühkhüm hangsilam tegütham,
Kho lit nyetboubüa kanei saopobü kambü che kilabü; hoba kan jembü lolo khonkujan; kanei kümsilei ai akümlabü;
lausikei
hoba khübü shausiyung lembü wen inyaibü onang to kheiyoan masu pongsu shanga an phejana sem sanlon paang che shangabü kho an phejana penyi;
sanlon paangshou nyet shanga che che weko an phejana che,
shabü dean apla shanga shabü lembü athakko kubü, juokbü lembü hoba shausiyung lembü khübü yunglabü lembü khübü kho shaanglathama shabü lembü shanga lonpaang che.
Lit nyetboubü chalou anthük ngaoboubüa kanei saopobü kambü che che kilabü, kanei kümsilei kaangbüsekbü aikei akümlabü, hoba
Hobaje kanei
Hobaje haoeneibü shausiyung lembü wen inyaibü onang yoa kheiyoan, masu pongsu anthüksem shanga masu pongsu weko an phejan penyi,
hoba sanlon shoushou anthüklei, sanlon weko an phejana che;
hoba athakko juokbü lembü shausiyung lembü khübü kho shaangla thama shabü lembü shanga lon paang che.
Nyibounyet kanei masu paangshou anthüknyi sanlon paang penyi nali athebü po cheeibü shou sanlon anthükleiei lemjan;
hoba haoeneibü shausi- yung lembü hoba yunglabü lembü masu pongsu shuong shanga sanlon hoba sanlon shoushou shuong shanga ngühkhüm song tegü haoeneibü lühbak thüng;
athakko juokbü lembü shausi- yung lembü to limbo shabü lembü shanga lon paang che.
Sembounyet masu pongsu anthükche, sanlon paang penyi, nali athebü po cheeibü shou sanlon anthüklei,
hoba khübü shausiyung lembü hoba khübü yunglabü lembü masu pongsu shuong shanga, sanlon paang shuong shanga hoba sanlon shoushou shuong shanga ngühkhüm song tegü lühbak thüng.
Hobaje athakko juokbü lembü shausiyung lembü hoba yunglabü lembü to liman shabü lembü shanga lon che.
Leibounyet masu pongsu an, sanlon paang penyi, nali athebü po che shou sanlon paang anthüklei.
Haoeneibü shausiyung lembü hoba yunglabü lembü masu pongsu shanga, sanlon shuong shanga, sanlon shoushou shuong shanga ngühkhüm song tegü lühbak thüng.
Athakko juokbü lembü hoba yunglabü lembü to limbo shabü lembü shanga lonpaang che.
Ngaobounyet masu pongsu gü, sanlon paang penyi, nali athebü po cheeibü shou sanlon paang anthüklei;
hoba haoeneibü shausiyung lembü hoba yunglabü lembü masu pongsu shuong shanga, sanlon shuong shanga, ngühkhüm song tegü lühbak thüng;
hoba athakko juokbü lembü, shausiyung lembü hoba yunglabü lembü to limbo shabü lembü shanga lonpaang che.
Lakbounyet masu pongsu pemset, sanlon paang penyi nali athebü po cheeibü shou sanlon anthüklei;
hoba shausiyung lembü hoba yunglabü lembü masu pongsu shuong shanga, sanlon shuong shanga hoba sanlon shoushou shuong shanga ngühkhüm song tegü lühbak thüng.
Hobaje athakko juokbü lembü, shausiyung lembü hoba yunglabü lembü to limbo shabü lembü shanga lonpaang che.
Nyetbounyet masu pongsu pemnyet, sanlon paang penyi nali athebü po cheeibü shou sanlon anthüklei;
hoba haoeneibü shausiyung lembü hoba yunglabü lembü, masu pongsu shuong shanga hoba sanlon shoushou shuong shanga ngühkhüm song tegü haoen lühbak thüng;
hoba athakko juokbü lembü shausi- yung lembü hoba yunglabü lembü to limbo shabü lembü shanga lonpaang che.
Setbounyet kanei saopobü kambü che kilabü; kanei kümsilei kaangbüsekbü aikei akümlabü;
lausikei
haoeneibü shausiyung lembü hoba yunglabü lembü masu pongsu shanga, sanlon paang shanga, hoba sanlon shoushou shuong shanga ngühkhüm song tegü lühbak thüng;
hoba athakko juokbü lembü, shausiyung lembü to limbo shabü lembü shanga lonpaang che.
Kaneibü theletbü, hoba kaneibü maangmai lembü, hoba kaneibü shausiyung lembü hoba kaneibü yunglabü lembü hoba kaneibü sangmai lembü to limbo habü ho kanei
Hobaje
Kheijinei Mosaei Israel shousi khuleibü shuong to laukei:
Ladang müt cheei
Tokei ladang yaksa cheei
kho bouei didalonga, hoba bouei sao to ngüh üangko kialonga; kheijinei saoei theletbü ayingsi saoei theletbü laobouei sao khühan ki kho aleiluko kilabü.
Lausikei bouei haoei ditbü chaloua sao la asakkulonga saoei theletbü ayingsi saoei takletbü laobouei sao khühan ki, aikei alelabü; hoba
Hobaje saoei takletan kibü jihsiphaia ayingsi damanchühko theletbü cheei sao to khühan kibü jiha sao chem kanalonga,
hoba kho saoeibü laoei didalonga hoba haoei ditbü chaloua ngüh üangko kialonga, kheijineije saoei takletbü aleilulabü hoba theletbü laobouei sao lolo khühan ki kho aleilulabü.
Lausikei haoei ditbü chaloua haoei kho asakkulonga kheijinei haoei sao to saoei takletan kibü kho hoba saoei damanchühko sao lolo theletbüei khühan kibü kho inletkulabü, hoba
Lausikei latnyu ayingsi bangbü yaksa shangabüa aiei saoei sao lolo khühan ki, kho sao to khühan kilabü.
Hobaje saoei saoeibü lao chema theletbü lealonga, ayingsi takletbüei sao khühan kialonga,
hoba saoeibü laoei kho didalonga hoba sao to ngüh üangko kialonga, hoba sao athangetlonga, kheijinei saoei takletbü pendou aleilulabü; hoba saoei sao lolo theletbüei sao khühbü pendou aleilulabü.

Lausikei laoei kho ditbü chaloua khübü kho amai apbualonga; kheijinei saoeibü sembung ka ai ong theletbü shanga ayingsi saoei jembü lolo theletbü shanga longlaje kho alelabü, saoeibü laoei kho apbua, hoba
Theletbü weko hoba ektokhuian theletbü weko laobouei jembü lolo khonsak leda kho jembü laoei kümbula thükkei, ayingsi amai apbula thükkei.
Lausikei saoeibü laoei chalou angboua ngüh üangko kialonga, kheijinei saoei theletbü hoba sao to kibü theletbü pendou kümbulabü, aishanga haoei sao thedanga kho ditbü chaloua ngüh üangko kikei.
Lausikei khübü kho haoei ditan phaia haoei akümtilonga, kheijineije haoei jembü yak shedbü künlabü.
Bousubou si haoyak haosi kanglanga hoba bou si haoeibü nouyangnyueibü bou chema kibü medei jih haosi kanglanga
“Israel shousi shuongei Midianbü to phok lamlabü; hoba kho phaia no hailabü.”
Hobaje Mosaei mütshuong to laukei, “Midianbü to
Israelbü chung pendou ka chung weko ka hajar che che kanei wapyola hautilabü.”
Hibü Israelbü hajar juong ka chung weko ka hajar che bang hean hajar anthüknyi wapyola lamlekei.
Kheijinei Mosaei haoen, Eleazar ungshedboueibü shou Finehas yoan, chung weko ka hajar che bang lemshang kabü chaksiam hoba laphangla shanga haoeibü ika teklaang jungan hautikei.
Hobaje
hoba joubü haitibü yoa haoenei Midianbü choba shuong haitikei, Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur, hoba Reba Midianbü choba ngao; tokei Beoreibü shou Balaamkei haoenei inei haitikei.
Hobaje Israelbü shuongei Midianbü sao hoba haoeneibü shousi shuong pendou lapshaikei, hoba masu dan pendou hoba haoeneibü sanlon shuong shuonga hoba haoeneibü peisilei pendou haoenei soan sungkei.
Hobaje haoen kibü sangnyu pendou hoba haoen kishang pendou haoenei wanei thean apbukei.
Hobaje haoenei sangshibü ka soletbü pendou müt si meisiau ham lekei.
Hobaje haoenei langsenbü shuong hoba soletbü peisilei Mosa si Eleazar ungshedbou jungto hoba Israelbü tan pendou jungto Jordan nyangko Jerikhoa Moab pholi to sungbakei.
Mosa, Eleazar hoba tan leiyeibü pendou shaishang khong aeto haoen shuokla haukei.
Hobaje lakjaibü dan leiyeibü shuong, hajar thüka lajam leibou hoba saongao thüka lajam leibou wapyobü ka longeibü shuong to Mosa khau angkei.
Mosaei haoen to phekei, “Kanei yaksa pendou lang leakei sai?
Chüh- ashi, habü hoei Israel shousi shuongei Balaameibü ngühsidei danko
Hibü tou hanbü shuong yoa bousu phai haitiashi, hoba bousu to jambü yaksa pendou haitiashi.
Lausikei bousu to ajambü yaksa pendou kan jembü shanga lang phoshi.
Hobaje kan shaishang khong aenei chalou nyet kishi; aoyouei müt at haitikei, hoba aoyouei haibü mang at to meitikei, kan lolo sembounyet hoba nyetbounyet saüenashi.
Hobaje neisimei weko hoba phekhonei kümbü pendou hoba buei kümbü peisilei pendou kanei kan lolo saüenashi.”
Hobaje Eleazar ungshedbouei lason to haubü mütshuong to laukei, “
Khei yingsikei, hon, chandinam, chinam, namkung, tin hoba sishai,
wanei alonbü peisilei phai kanei wana jinkujan.
Hobaje nyetbounyet kaneibü neisimei sakjan hoba kan saopoan kilabü, kho phaia kan shaishang to loulabü.”
“Müt si meisiau ham soletbü weanchühashi, Eleazar ungshedbou kasi hoba tan leiyeibü shuong;
hoba peisilei kho penyi la yeiko lason to haubü lakjaibü hoba tan pendou yoa janashi.
shanga lason to haubü phejan ka khüm heashi; müt, masu, gadu hoba sanlon tan tan ka saongao phejana che che,
kho haoeneibü phei ka helabü, hoba
Israelbü la janletkubü ka nyi müt, masu, gadu, hoba sanlon anjinsem bang weko ka che che sungenlabü, hoba
Hobaje
Tou soletbü, lakjaibü shuongei sungbü yoshaibü kho sanlon hajar 675,000,
masu hajar 72,000,
gadu hajar 61,000,
hoba bousu to ajambü yaksa medei hajar 32,000.
Lason to haubü phejan phei kho sanlon hajar 337,500,
hoba sanlon khüka
Hobaje masu hajar 36,000 ka
Hobaje gadu hajar 30,500 ka
Hobaje müt hajar 16,000 ka
Hobaje
Hobaje Israel shousieibü phejan jamde lakjaibü shuong la Mosaei jankubü ka,
tou shuong shangabü jamde kho sanlon hajar 337,500,
masu hajar 36,000
gadu hajar 30,500,
hoba müt hajar 16,000
Israelbü phejan jamde müt si meisiau ham ka anjinsem bang weko ka sungkei, hoba
Kheijinei sepai hajar juong janbüa yaangbü shuong hajar che janbü thüka lajamleibou hoba saongao thüka lajamleibou Mosa jungto haukei, hoba Mosa to laukei,
“No khangenbü shuongei küneibü ika kibü lakjaibü shuong künei weanchüha, hoba kün che ongkei amaukei.
thedanga kün jembü shanga shabü dela shanga mütpem wekoei jungan loubü lembü, hon, khüngkhap, chinyu, ikjikhap, chimen, ashenjang, khübü kho sungbakei.”
Hibü Mosa si Eleazar ungshedbouei haoen ka hon hoba lubü peisilei pendou lekei,
hoba hajar hoba saongao janbü thüka lajamleibou shuongei
Aishanga lakjaibü shuongei soletbü peisilei jembü shanga luluei lekei.
Ladang Mosa hoba Eleazar ungshedbouei hajar hoba saongao janbü thüka lajam leiboueibü ka hon kho sungkei, haoenei kho Israelbü shanga

Tou Reuben si Gadeibü shousi shuongei samkeisamuk langkeibü meisiau juong kikei; hoba ladang haoenei Jazer kaonyek hoba Gilead kaonyek hapbei, chühashi, kho shatsinam samkeisamuk shanga paplepbü kaoen kikei.
Hibü Gad si Reuben shousi shuongei Mosa, Eleazar ungshedbou hoba tan leiyeibü shuong to laukei,
“Atarot, Dibon, Jazer, Nimra, Heshbon, Eleale, Sebam, Nebo, hoba Beon,
laobou kaonyek
Hobaje haoenei laukei, “Nyi kün to onoukho laualonga ho kaonyek ho no khangenbou la phetphan kushi; Jordan danko kün leian tohauma.”
Hobaje Mosaei Gad si Reubeneibü shousi shuong to laukei, “Kaneibü jaisinasi shuong wapyola haujinei kanje hanei setan kila se?
Aila
Kaonyek chühla shanga Kadesh-Barnea ka ngei haoen hautijinei kaneibü bousi shuongei hai kümbei.
Aieilausi haoen Eshkol pholi to angan kaonyek kho limchühkei,
Hobaje kho chaloua
‘Maimaitham ngei Abraham la Isak la hoba Jakob la thekubü kaodak kho Ijep ka longbü po saoche ka thükaeei ühüplabü; aieilausi haoenei küphai khümboje asem.’
Khei Kenizbü Jefuneeibü shou Kaleb hoba Naneibü shou Joshua to limbo; aieilausi haosieije küphai khümbomeiko kuan sembei.
Hobaje Israelbü khulimbo
Hobaje chühashi, Israel khulimbo
Aishanga hao phai asembo kan sepeinyu ngaialonga haoei nyibou haoen yama apyolabü.”
Hobaje haoenei hao jungto nyangko louan laukei, “Samkeisamuk shanga künei hanei chem danglabü hoba nashou yaksa shanga sangnyu kümbho;

lausikei haoen jembü kishang to aloushongko kün lolo Israel shousi shuong thedang aeto haula insiaubu lamlean kilabü, hoba kaonyek kabü müt ka khümenan kila küneibü shousi shuong künei sangnyu banyu maanga kitilabü.
Israel shousi mütpem weko haoei phet aphan shongko kün jembü chem to angailabü.
Aishanga Jordan thiaenei hoba uthinei künei haoen yoa phet aphanlabü; aieilausi kün shangabü phetphanlabü Jordan hiphainei chaangbou aenei kia.”
Hobaje Mosaei haoen to laukei, “Kanei ho kümbo lausije, kanei
hoba haubü mütpem wekoei jembü thedang ka dangbou shian asatti shongko
hoba
Lausikei kanei khei akümlongaje, chühashi, kanei
Kaneibü shousiyak shanga sangnyu hoba kaneibü samkeisamuk, shatsinam shanga chem dangashi, hoba kaneibü sembung ka longbü kho kümashi.”
Hobaje Gad si Reubeneibü mütliei Mosa to laukei, “No khangenbü shuongei ngeibü bunyubouei sakkubü tegü kümlabü.
Küneibü shousi yaksi shuong, küneibü samkeisamuk, shatsinam pendou Gilead sangnyu shuonga kilabü;
lausikei kün no khangenbü shuongei ngeibü bunyuei laubü tegü
Hibü Mosaei Eleazar ungshedbou la hoba Naneibü shou Joshua la hoba Israel shousi chung leiyeibü la khübü phokukei.
Hobaje Mosaei haoen to laukei, “Gadeibü mütli shuong hoba Reubeneibü mütli shuong insiaubu jungbü pendouei
lausikei haoenei kan yoa insiaubu jungan ohaulonga, khei yingsije haoenei Kanan kao kan yoa janletjan.”
Hobaje Gilead si Reubeneibü mütli shuongei jongaiko laukei, “
Künei insiaubu jungan

Kheijinei Mosaei haoen la khei Gad si Reubeneibü mütli Josefeibü shousi Manasse chung jamde la Amorbü choba Sidon sangle, hoba Bashana choba Og sangle, sangnyu shuong hoba haoen kaijembo kibü kaonyek khümbo kukei.
Hobaje Gadbü mütli shuongei Dibon, Atarot, Aroer,
Atroth Shofan, Jazer, Jogbeha, Beth Nimra hoba Beth Haran sangnyu kümbei,
hoba kümthang sangnyu hoba sanlon shanga chem dangkei.
Hobaje Reubeneibü mütliei Heshbon Eleale, hoba Kiriatham kümetkei.
Hobaje Nebo si Baalmeon (habü nyen jeiyoda), hoba Sibma kümetkei. Haoenei kümetbü sangnyu shuong la nyen lubü nyenkukei.
Hobaje Manasseeibü shou Makireibü chung Gilead to hauan, khünei kibü Amorbü ka kho soan lekei.
Hobaje Mosaei Manasseeibü shou Makir la Gilead kukei, hoba hao khünei kikei.
Hobaje Manasseeibü shou Jair haukei hoba khübü sangnyu shian apbei, hoba khübü kho Haavoth Jair dogo nyenkei.
Nobaei Kenat hoba khünei kibü sangnyu shuong lekei, hoba haoeibü nyenphai ka Noba dogo nyenkei.
Mosa si Aronei leian Israelbü Ijep kaodak ka wakou paijinei haoen tan thüngko thüngko haubü shaishang kaoen nyen habü ho ki.
Hobaje
Hobaje shaangbü lit, chalou anthük ngaoboubüa haoenei Rameses ka meimeikei; Püetbü lem danan nyibounyet kho Israelbüei thük hapan Ijep khümbo limchühngaiko,
ei haitibü shaang bukbü bousu shou shuong pendou khünko kijinei meimeijung satkei; tokei
Hobaje Rameses apyoan Israelbü Sukkota shaikei.
Hobaje Sukkot apyoan yamlamang thona haoen Ethama shaikei.
Hobaje Etham apyoan, haoen Baal Zefon chaangbou ae Piharot to sepeikei, hoba haoen Migdola shaikei.
Hobaje Hahirot apyoan, haoen yungnyu danko yamlamang to haukei, hoba Etham yamlamang danko chalou sem lam paian Maraa shaikei.
Hobaje Mara apyoan, haoen Elim sühkei; khünei Elima deikük shushou anthüknyi hoba pünglong anjinlei kikei, khünei haoen shaikei.
Hobaje Elim apyoan haoen Saklangbü Yungnyu nyangko shaikei.
Saklangbü Yungnyu apyoan haoen Sin yamlamanga shaikei.
Hobaje Sin yamlamang apyoan haoen Dofkaa shaikei.
Dofka apyoan haoen Alusha shaikei,
Alush apyoan haoen Refidima shaikei, khünei mütshuongei yunglabü dei ühüpen.
Hobaje Refidim apyoan haoen Sinai yamlamanga shaikei.
Sinai yamlamang apyoan haoen Kibroth Hattaavaa shaikei
Kibroth Hataava apyoan haoen Hazerotha shaikei.
Hazeroth apyoan haoen Rithmaa shaikei.
Rithma apyoan haoen Rimmon Pereza shaikei,
Rimmon Perez apyoan haoen Libnaa shaikei.
Libna apyoan haoen Rissaa shaikei.
Rissa apyoan haoen Kehelathaa shaikei.
Kehelatha apyoan haoen Shefer shongha shaikei.
Shefer shongh apyoan haoen Haradaa shaikei.
Harada apyoan haoen Makhelota shaikei.
Makhelot apyoan haoen Tahata shaikei.
Tahat apyoan haoen Teraa shaikei.
Tera apyoan haoen Mithkaa shaikei.
Mithka apyoan haoen Hashmonaa shaikei.
Hashmona apyoan haoen Moserota shaikei.
Moserot apyoan haoen Bene Jaakana shaikei.
Bene Jaakan apyoan haoen Hor Haggidgada shaikei
Horhaggidgad apyoan haoen Jotbathaa shaikei.
Jotbatha apyoan haoen Abronaa shaikei.
Abrona apyoan haoen Ezion Gebera shaikei.
Ezion Geber apyoan haoen Zin yamlamanga shaikei (kho Kadesh)
Kadesh apyoan Edom kaonyek thonbü Hor Shongha shaikei.
Hobaje
Hobaje Hor shongha Aron haijinei hao po saolakto sem jai lean kikei.
Hobaje Kananbü Aratbü choba ao Kanan kaodaka Negeba kikei, haoei Israelbü loubü shangabü ditkei.
Hobaje Hor shongh apyoan haoen Zalmona to loukei,
Zalmona apyoan haoen Punona shaikei,
Punon apyoan haoen Obot to loukei,
Obot apyoan haoen Moab leilanga Iye Abarim to loukei,
Iye Abarim apyoan haoen Dibon Gad to loukei;
Dibon Gad apyoan haoen Almondiblathaima shaikei.
Almon Diblathaim ap- yoan haoen Nebo nyangko Abraim shongha shaikei.
Abraim shongh apyoan haoen Jordan nyangko Jerikhoa Moab pholia shaikei.
Hobaje haoen shaishang khünei Moab pholia Jordan peiko Bethjeshimot ka Abelshittim sühko kikei.
Hobaje Jordan nyangko Jerikhoa Moab pholia
“Israelbü shousi to lenashi, ladang kanei Jordan nyangko Kanan kaodak to atlaje,
kaonyek ka khünei kibü mütshuong pendou shian apjan, haoeneibü laangeibü si nameibü heangsho shuong kanei netla yeiko leilukujan hoba haoeneibü shuibao shonghkhu kabü lemshang pendou leilukujan;
kho phaia kaonyek kho leashi hoba khünei kishi; aishanga kan shangabü ngei kho kan la kua.

Hobaje phaangpakbüei chung chung weko kanei kaodak kho phet phanlabü; chung juongbü la juongbü; shibü la shibü dogo phet jankushi; mütpem weko phaang pakbüei ai penlaje kho hao shangabü kilabü; chung chung janbüei phet phanlabü.

Lausikei kanei kaonyek ka khünei kibü shuong shian asattilonga, aoyou kanei khünei kila sakkulaje haoen kho kaneibü nyeka odnepbü tegü ayingsi kaneibü hipa jak ngütbü tegü kan kishanga kan hongeilabü.
Hobaje ngei haoen to lai jungeilabü ki kho tegü ngei kan to jungeilabü.”
“Ladang kan Kanan kaodak to atlaje (kanei phet phanlabü kaonyek kho ho ki, khei Kanan latetcheje khütetche kho khümbo)
Kaneibü yungkük ae leilang kho Zin yamlamang ka Edom aedang sühko; kaneibü yungkük ae leilang kho Jemdei Yungnyu phangae thonbü ka chaangbou ae,
hoba kaneibü leilang kho Akrabbim anglek yungthang aeto sepeilabü, hoba Zin lamnyu aeto haulabü, hoba Kadesh Barnea yungthanga thonlabü, kho Hazar Addar sühko haulabü;
hoba Azmona leilang kho Ijep Shumang aeto sepeilabü, hoba yungnyua thonlabü.
“Chanep leilang shanga yungnyu yaangbü kho yungko yoan kilabü, kho kaneibü chanep kilabü.
“Habü ho kaneibü yungkük leilang kilabü; Yungnyu Yaangbü ka Hor shongh sühko kanei shenla ngelabü kümashi, hoba leilang kho Zedaa thonlabü;
hoba Hor Shongh ka nyi Hamath to jenshuoklabü hoba leilang thonbü kho Zedada kilabü.
kho phaia leilang kho Zifron aeto haulabü, hoba Hazar Enana thonlabü. Ho kaneibü chanep leilang.
“Chaangbou leilang shanga kanei Hazar Enan ka Shefam sühko tetsida kümashi,
hoba Shefam ka Ain chaangbou Ribla sühko leilang yanlabü; hoba kho phaia leilang kho Kinneret yungnyu shonghyoua meiyouko chaangbou sühko yanlabü;
kho phaia leilang kho Jordan sühko yanan Jemdei yungnyua thonlabü.
“Leilang den luluei kaijeman kanei lelabü kaonyek kho ho ki.”
Hibü Mosaei Israelbü to sakkuko laukei, “Chung gü tho mütli che la
aishanga Reubeneibü chung shanga chempen chempen hoba Gad chung shanga chempen chempen hoba Manasse chung jamde shanga haoenei haoeneibü phet sungan apa;
phang nyi tho khoei Jordan khatan chaangbou Jerikho sühko chaang ae haoenei phet phanlanga.”
“Kan shanga kaonyek janlabü müt nyen habü ho ki. Ungshedbou Eleazar, hoba Naneibü shou Joshua,
tokei kaonyek phejan janletla shanga chung weko ka leiyeibü che che lejan”
