Kanan kaodaka phet phanla Israel phang aoyou to janyinbü lela
Tou Jordan nyangko Jerikhoa Moab pholia
“Israelbü to haoenei phetphanbü kao ka Levibü la kishang sangnyu kula sakkuashi; tokei nyi Levibü la sangnyu kaijembo lamshaushang kao kujan.
Haoen kishang shanga sangnyu shuong hoba lamshaushang kao khoei haoeneibü samkeisamuk haoeneibü nyaksinam hoba shatsinam pendou khangenlabü.
Nyi Levibü la kubü to khangyoko lamshaushang kao kho sangnyu banyu thük pendou ae kaijembo iknop hajar che kilabü.

Hobaje sangnyu thükae chaangbou shanga iknop hajar penyi takletashi, hoba yungkük shanga iknop hajar penyi hoba chanep shanga iknop hajar penyi hoba yungthang shanga iknop hajar penyi hoba sangnyu kho jenyua kilabü. Haoeneibü sangnyu shuong shanga habü ho lamshaushang kao yinglabü.
Hobaje kanei Levibü la kubü sangnyu kho satenshang sangnyu lak kilabü; laobou kanei müt haitibü la satenshang shanga kulabü; hoba khübü to limbo kanei sangnyu saonyito nyi kulabü.
Kanei Levibü la kubü sangnyu pendouei saonyito set yinglabü, khübü kho lamshaushang yoan kulabü.

Hobaje sangnyu shuong shanga, laobou kanei Israel shousi shuong shangabü ka kulaje, juongbü la juongbü, shibü la shibü kuashi; juongbü ka juongbü hoba shibü ka shibü sungashi; chung wekoei luluei hapbü phet thüng sangnyu shuong kho Levibü la kulabü.”
“Israel shousi shuong to lenashi: Ladang kan Jordan danko Kanan kaodak to atlaje,
Kheijinei müt atei mashikan haitisi, müt haitibou khünei satenla shanga kanei kan shanga satenshang sangnyu pienashi.
Hobaje kan shanga sangnyu shuong kho phoklambü ka satenshang shanga kilabú, khei müt haitibou kho shuong thea matjemla alo shongko ühaiko kila shanga.
Hobaje kanei kubü sangnyu shuong kho kan shanga satenshang sangnyu lak kilabü.
Kanei Jordan danan sangnyu sem kulabü, hoba sangnyu sem kanei Kanan kaodaka kujan; khübü kho satenshang sangnyu kilabü.
Israel shousi shuong shanga, küksithang shanga, hoba haoen yoa homan kibü shuong shanga khübü sangnyu lak satenshang shanga kilabü, khei müt aoei mashikan müt at haitilaje khünei satenla shanga.
“Lausikei haoenei namkung atei hao to ngüman kho tegü hao haialonga hao müt haitibou ki, müt haitibou kho maimaitham haitijan.
Hobaje haoeibü ikei müt haitilabü hele laang che jungan hao to tetalonga, hoba hao haialonga hao müt haitibou; müt haitibou kho tükde haitijan.
Hobaje haoeibü ika kibü buei hailabü lele ngümalonga, hoba hao haialonga, hao müt haitibou, müt haitibou kho maimaitham haitijan.
Siiei phoklambüei jembü lolo müt haitibou kho haitilabü.
“Hobaje mangsenbüei hao jaangan koutialonga, ayingsi thoan hao to tetalonga hoba hao haialonga;

ayingsi theshat maangshatei haoei haoeibü ikei ngümalonga hoba haian apsi, aoei hao to ngümbei, maimaitham hao haitilabü, hao müt haitibou ki. Siiei phoklambouei ladang hao haüyolaje müt haitibou kho haoei haitilabü.
“Lausikei theshat maangshat akiko ong mangde hao to thangkutialonga, ayingsi athoko dencheei hao to mülanglimde tetousi
ayingsi hao ühüpbo müt haitilabü lele laang atei hao to tetousi, hoba hao haian apsi hoba haoeibü dangbou ayingsi hao to amaibü kümla alam;
kheijinei habü songei ngümbou müt hoba phoklambou müt kanglanga shuongei mat jemlabü.

Hobaje siiei phoklambou müteibü ik ka shuongei müt haitibou kho leiyenlabü, hoba hao satbü satenshang sangnyu khüto shuongei hao leiyetan phokulabü, hoba saopobü onangei naangkubü thükkabou ungshedbou ühaishongko hao khünei kilabü;
lausikei hao satshang satenshang sangnyu leilang danko müt haitibou kho ladang satlaje,
hoba haiboueibü chempenei hao hapan haitialonga, kho phoklambü kümsilei kho hao khulimbo haitibü shedbü akilabü.
Müt haitibou shedbou kho thükkabou ungshedbou kho ühaishongko hao satenshang sangnyua kijan kikei, lausikei thükkabou ungshedbou haian phaia müt haitibou kho jembü phet phanshang to ngailabü.
Habü kümsilei kan meten sünga kan kishang pendoua ponpen song kilabü.
“Aoyouei müt haitilaje, müt haitibou kho aukabü shuong sembung danko hao haitilabü; lausikei müt aokhu limbokei aukabü che kubüei hao ühaitilabü.
Khüto liman haila mubü müt haitilabou shanga kanei angnam alelabü; lausikei hao haitijan.
Hobaje thükkabou ungshedbou ühaijineitham ao satenshang sangnyua satenan ki, hao nyibou longeian kaonyeka kila shanga kanei angnam ai alejan.
Hibü kanei kan kishang ashatijan, aishanga kaonyek shatibü kho sii ki; aoeibü sii apbei kho sii to limbo kaonyeka sii phinbü shanga shabü debü aikei akümjan.
Hobaje kan kibü kaodak nyi ashatijan, kho yoa ngo kia, aishanga ngo

Hobaje Gilead shousi chemdang leiyeibü shuong, Makireibü shou, Josefeibü shousi shuong chempen, Manasseeibü shou, nyangko louan Mosa thedanga hoba leiyeibü thedanga hoba Israel shousi chung leiyeibü thedang to louan joyokei.
Hobaje haoenei laukei, “Phaang pakko kaonyek kho phetphanla Israel shousi shuong la kula shanga

Hobaje Israel shousi chung lubü shousi at jungto hauan chemkana longa, kheijinei haoeneibü phet kho küneibü bousi shuongeibü phet ka sungjung hauan, haoen laobou chung ki haoen la jinkulabü, kho tegü küneibü phet hapbü ka langlabü.
Hobaje ladang Israelbü jubilee kilaje, haoeneibü phet kho haoen laobou chunga yoan ki khola kulabü, hoba kho tegü haoeneibü phet kho küneibü bousi shuongeibü phet ka sunglanglabü.”
Hobaje
Zelofehad nouyangnyusi shuong shanga
Kho tegü Israelbüeibü phetkei aikei phang che ka che to ohaulabü; aieilausi Israel shousi shuongei jembü boueibü chung phet phanko kilabü.
Hobaje Israelbü phanga yaksa shou aoei phet phanlabü lele longlaje, Israel shousi shuongei jembü boueibü phet phanlabü lele saoei saoeibü boueibü chung at jungto laolamla haujan.
Kho tegü ai phetkei phang che ka che to ohautijan; aishanga Israel phang wekoei jembü phet phanjan.”
Zelofehadeibü nouyangnyu shuongei
aieilausi Mahla, Tirza, Hogla, Milka, hoba Noa, Zelofehadeibü nouyangnyu shuongei haoeneibü boueibü naeibü shousi shuong to chem kankei.
Haoen Josefeibü shou Manasse ka pakbü chempen jungto haukei, haoeneibü phet haoeneibü boueibü chempen to kikei.
Jordan nyangko Jerikhoa Moab pholia
Jordan shumang danan yamlamanga Suf thedanga Arabaa Paran hoba Tofel, Laban, Hazeroth hoba Dizahab kanglanga Israel shousi pendou to Mosaei lenyobü habü ho ki.
Ho Horeb ka Seir shongh to haubü lam Kadesh Barnea sühko chalou anthükche lam ki.
ei hao la ai sakkukei pendou Israelbü la lenla shanga Mosaei haoen to po anboubü lit anthük- che boubü shaangbou nyet joyokei.
Kho Heshbona kibü Amorbü choba Sihon, hoba Edreia Ashtarota kibü Bashanbü choba Og thükan phaia.
Jordan danan Moab kaodaka kho ngühkhüm Mosaei wanenkula khangan laukei.

‘Ho shongha kan kithüng kia, sepei- ashi, meimeijung hauashi, hoba Amorbüeibü shongh kaodak to hoba kho kaijembo kibü kaonyek pendou Arabaa shongh kaodak chanep aephei shongh you hoba Negeba hoba Jordan yungko nyangkoa, Kanan kao hoba Lebanon shumang yaangbü Eufrates Shumang sühko hauashi.
Chühashi, ngei kan thedanga kaonyek kho phokua;
Mosaei mütshuong to laukei, “Hobaje kho chaloua ngei kan to lena, ‘Ngei kü mütpemei kaneibü onat künla athük,
kaneibü Mühghaüei kan aeibou bukyohaayotia, hoba chühashi, tat kan shuong müha khanshoulitshou hima kia.
kaneibü nyusibou Mühghaüei kan hajar juongei toukei aei yeitiashi, hoba haoei kan la thekubü tegü, kan haükushi!
Lai küman ngo kü mütpemei kaneibü on atshaibü hoba oyophetyobü künla?
Kan chung weko ka songsido kibü, ditenbü kibü hoba hapbüngebü müt pienashi, hoba ngei kan thüka haoen leiyeibü yeitikulabü.’
Hobaje kanei kü to laukei, ‘Nyi laubü kho kün shanga maiakei.’

Hibü ngei kan chung jaishou ka songsido kibü müt hoba hapbü ngebü pienan kan thüka leiyeibü yeitikei, hajar thüka, saongao thüka, anjinsem thüka, an thüka lajamleibou hoba ikjaibü ka chung wekoa pienkei.

“Hobaje kaneibü matjembou la ngei sakkuko laukei, ‘Kaneibü jaisina kanglanga ngüh ditan chühashi, hoba müt che hoba haoeibü jaisina kanglanga hoba hao yoa kibü küksithang yoa ngühmaanglanko mat jemashi.

Mat jemjinei kanei the techüh, kanei hanbü si yaangbü ham to jetei ditkujan, kanei müt to tehüt, aishanga matjembü kho Mühghaü shangabü ki, hoba kan shanga ngüh aeibou sekbü kho kanei kü jungto sungba, hoba ngei kho ditlabü.’
Kho jihsi- phaia kanei kümlabü pendou ngei kan la sakkua.
“Kheijinei
Hobaje ngei kan to laukei, ‘
Chühashi,

“Lausikei kan mütpem weko kü jungto louan laukei, ‘Sen shanga kaonyek kho pheila haulabü hoba sen laobou lam to angla hoba laobou sangnyu shuong to loula, kho ngühlang sen jungto künla sen thedangto senei müt hautikho.’
“Kho ngei maian dambei; hoba kan ka ngei müt anthüknyi chung weko ka che che pienkei;
hoba haoen shongh aeto angkei, hoba Eskol pholi to louan kho pheianchühkei.
Hobaje kaonyeka kibü buhek at haoeneibü ika jungan sen jungto louyenkei.
“Lausikei kanei üangsaplep dogo laukei, hoba
Hobaje kanei kaneibü neichema nyamnyambo laukei, ‘

Sen lato hauda? Seneibü jaisinasi shuongei seneibü maang- pon koutiko laukei: Mütshuong kho sen tokei yaangbou hoba thong loubü ki; khünei sangnyu yaangbü hoba müh sühko ba leakei; hoba khoto limbo künei khünei Anakimbü shousi shuong hapa!’
“Kheijinei ngei kan to laukei, ‘Temok, ayingsi haoen to tehüt,
kaneibü Mühghaü ao kan thedangto hauda, haoei Ijepa kanei hapbo kümbü pendou tegütham, haoei kan shanga wapyolabü;
hoba yama kanei ngekei, khei mütei jembü shou bukbü tegü ho kaonyek asühshongko
Khei yingasikei khünei
Haoei kaneibü lam shanga nangnak wanei hoba kan ai lam to haula kho lenla shanga chaloua sangmeia kan thedangto haukei.
“Hobaje ladang kan nyamnyambo khauang lemenbü
‘Maimaitham ho meten amaibü habü mütshuong che ongkei kaonyek maibü laobou kaneibü nyusibousi la ngei kula thekukei,
kho Jefuneeibü shou Kaleb to liman ühüplabü; hoba hao la hoba haoeibü shousi la haoyou yaüatlangbü kaonyek kho kulabü; aieilausi haoei khümbo kuan
Hobaje kan hangshong
Naneibü shou Joshua, ao ka thedanga loan ki, hao khüto atlabü, nyi hao thungeijangeiashi; aishanga haoei Israelbü la kho phet phantilabü.’
Lausikei kanje sepeiashi, hoba Saklangbü Yungnyu ae yam to atashi.’
“Kheijinei kanei kü to laukei, ‘Mosa,
Kho tegü ngei kan to joyokei, hoba kanei ngüha ale; lausikei
Kheijinei khübü shongha kibü Amorbü kan khulimbo longkei, hoba naoei shieibü tegü kan Seir ka Horma sühko shian koutikei.
Kheijinei kan sepeikei hoba
Kho tegü kan Kadesha thüngbü sühko chalou juong kikei.
“Kho phaia
“Kheijinei
Kanei ho shongh kaiko paithüng paia; yungthang aeto sepeiashi.
Hobaje mütshuong to lenashi, ‘Seira kibü kaneibü jaisina Esaueibü shousi leilang danjung haula lamlean ong kia; hoba haoenei kan to hatlabü hibü kanei maisho ditashi;
haoen to tewapyo; aishanga ngei kan la haoeneibü kao youphen lamshang che ongkei akulabü, aieilausi ngei Esau la Seir shongh kho phet kua.
Kanei haoen ka namei shaula shausiyung jeklabü, hoba tokei kanei nam lu kanei yunglabü dei haoen ka jeklabü.’
“Aishanga
“Hibü Seira kibü seneibü jaisina Esaueibü shousi shuong ka sen bangan Araba lam ka Elath ka hoba Eziongeber ka haukei.
Hobaje
(Emimbü shangied khünei kikei, eikshuong juong yaangbü hoba Anakimbü tegü thong loubü;
Anakim tegü haoen to Refaim dogo lauda.
Horbükei shangied Seira kikei, lausikei Esaueibü shousi shuongei haoen kakan apbei, hoba haoen thedanga haoen mautikei, hoba haoen jeiko kikei,
“Tou meimeiashi, hoba Zered shumang danashi. Hibü Zered shumang dankei.
Hobaje senei Kadesh Barnea ka meimeian loubü jih ka Zered shumang danbü sühko po khujinto set kikei, kho
Khüto liman haoen amauti shongko haoen shaishanga kibü shuong ka mautila
“Hibü eikshuong yoka wapyola haubü pendou mautian
ei kü to laukei,
Tat kanei Moab leilang Ar danlabü,
hoba ladang Ammonbü leilang nyangko kan loulaje hao to la la teyei, ayingsi haoen to tewapyo, aishanga ngei Ammonbü kao kan la phetphanla akulabü; aieilausi ngei Loteibü shousi la kho phetphan kua.”
(Khoto tokei Refaim kaonyek dogo lauko kikei; shangied Refaim khünei, lausikei Ammonbüei haoen to Zamzamin dogo lauda.
Eikshuong kho yaangbang hoba juong hoba Anakimbü tegü thong loubang yaangbang, lausikei haoen thedanga
Khei
hoba sangkhonga Gaza sühko hauan kibü Avvimbü, Kaftor ka loubü Kaftorbüei haoen mautikei, hoba haoen kishanga kikei.)
“Senei Moab danjung hauan phaia
Tat ka khangan mühnyu phanga pendou aenei ka shanga hatlamoklabü ngei mütshuong thükto jinkulabü, haoenei kan shanga ditlabü hoba lühlabü, hoba kan hangshong khonkulabü.’
“Hobaje Kedemot yam ka ngei ngühlang künbü Heshbon sangnyua kibü Sihon choba jungto sangmai ngühlang hautiko laukei,
‘Ngo kaibü kaodak danko hautishi, ngo khongnyu lama ong setlabü; nanae maeae aitokei asepeiko ong haulabü.
Nyi kü la ngei shaulabü shausiyung yaakkulabü, hoba kü la yunglabü dei nam lu yaakkushi.
küneibü Mühghaüei kün la kula kibü kaonyek to Jordan danko ütshongko Seira kibü Esaueibü shousi shuong hoba Ara kibü Moabbüei kü to kümbü tegü ngo youei ong dantishi.’
“Lausikei Heshbonbü Choba Sihonei hao danko sen adanti, aishanga tat haüthükbü tegü kaneibü ika kulabü shanga
“Hobaje
Kheijinei kan khulimbo Sihon, hao hoba haoeibü eikshuong pendou Jahaza lason to longkei.
Hobaje
Hobaje senei kho chaloua haoeibü sangnyu lekei, hoba müt kibü sangnyu pendou komlepbei hoba bousu yaksa, nashousi shuong che ongkei ajoutiko haitikei.
Samkeisamuk ong sen shanga haitikei, shian apbü sangnyu ka peisilei yoan senei sungkei.
Arnon pholi thonbüa kibü Aroer ka hoba pholia kibü sangnyu ka khei Gilead sühko sen shanga sangnyu che ongkei senei asühlabü lele akitei;
seneibü Mühghaüei thangetbüei ong, kanei Ammonbü kaonyek nyangko, ayingsi Jabbok shumang aenei ayingsi shongh kaodak nyangko alou.
“Kheijinei sen sepeinyu Bashan aeto angkei, hoba Bashanbü choba Og hao hoba haoeibü eikshuong pendou sen khulimbo Edreia lason longkei.
Hobaje
“Hibü
Hobaje kho chaloua haoeibü sangnyu ka alebü sangnyu che ongkei akitei; sangnyu saosem, Bashana Og sangle Argob kongshui pendou.
Ataklepbo kibü sangnyu juong to liman khübü pendouei ba suoketnyu bakhün hoba bakouei kaplepan kibü sangnyu kikei.
Hobaje Heshbonbü choba Sihon to senei kümbü tegü müt kibü sangnyu weko bousu, yaksa hoba nashousi yoan senei haoen maisho mautikei.
Lausikei samkeisamuk, meisiau pendou hoba sangnyu ka makshaibü peisilei sen shanga soan phokei.
“Hobaje kho chaloua Jordan danan kibü Amorbü choba müt nyieibü ik ka Arnon pholi ka Hermon shongh sühko, senei kaonyek lekei;
(ho Hermon to Sihonbüei Siron dogo lauda)
pholia kibü sangnyu pendou Gilead pendou, hoba Bashan pendou Saleka hoba Edrei sühko, Bashana Og sanglea sangnyu shuong senei lekei.”
(Aishanga Bashanbü Choba Og ong Refaima joubü ka jouan kikei; chühashi, haoeibü shen kho namkung shen kikei, kho Amonbü Rabbaa akilo? Müteibü iknopei tousüng iknop gü, hoba khaang iknop lei)
“Hibü senei kho jih khünei kho kaodak lekei, Arnon pholi nyangko kibü Aroer ka, hoba Gilead shongh kaodak jamde hoba kho sangnyu shuong ngei Reubenbü hoba Gadbü la kukei.
Hobaje Gilead joubü hoba Og sangle, Bashan pendou ngei Manasse chung jamde la kukei; kho Argob kongshui pendou, khei Bashan pendou. (Ho to ong Refaim kaonyek dogokei lauda.
Manasseeibü shou Jairei Argob kongshui pendou Geshur hoba Makat leilang sühko lekei, hoba Bashan ong hao jembü nyen phaito nyenkei, tat sühko Havoth Jair dogo lauda.)
“Hobaje Makir la ngei Gilead kukei.
Hobaje Reubenbü si Gadbüla Gilead ka Arnon shumang sühko yomang jenyu hoba khoeibü leilang, Ammonbü leilang Jabbok shumang sühko ngei kukei;
tokei Arba hoba Jordan hoba khoeibü leilang hoba Kineret ka chaangbou ae Pisga shongh youa Araba yungnyu kho Jemdei Yungnyu sühko.
“Hobaje kheijinei ngei kan la sakkuko laukei, ‘
Lausikei ngei kan la kubü sangnyua kaneibü shousi yaksi nashou hanbü shuong hoba kaneibü samkeisamuk kilabü (aieilausi kaneibü samkeisamuk juong kia dogo ngei ngekei),
khei
“Hobaje kho jihsiphaia ngei Jihuda la sakkuko laukei, ‘Habü choba müt nyi to
Haoen to hatko teki, aishanga kan shanga wapyolabü kho
“Hobaje kho jihsiphaia ngei
‘O
Ngei ka to sudajada, Jordan danan thi aedang kaodak maibü kho shongh maibü hoba Lebanon, chühla ngo hautikai.’
“Lausikei kan hangshong
Pisga shongh to angashi, hoba chaang, chanep, yungkük hoba yungthang to kaibü nyekei tangko chühko limchühashi, aishanga nyi Jordan ho danjung ohaulabü.
Lausikei Joshua la kümsilei khümbo kuashi, hao thungeijangeiashi, hoba hao hau kitiashi, aishanga haoei habü mütshuong Jordan danko leian haulabü, hoba nyi hapbü kaonyek kho haoei haoen la letilabü.’
“Hibü sen Beth Peor thedanga thüngkei.”
Hobaje tou, O Israel, ngei kan la lenbü ngühkhüm hoba matjembü jungeila shanga ditashi, “Khei
kaneibü Mühghaüei laobou kan la kuda kho kanei jungeila shanga ngei kan la sakkubü ngüha aei ajinyolabü ayingsi kanei kho ashitilabü.
Kanei jembü nyekei
Lausikei kan aoyouei
“Chühashi,

Hibü khübü kho jungeiashi hoba kümashi, aishanga phang shuong thedanga ho kaneibü songsido hoba ditenbü ki; haoenei khübü pendou dittijinei laulabü, ‘Maimaitham habü phang yaangbü ho songei keibü hoba ditenbü mütshuong ki!’
“Aishanga

Kanei
Kan thepetla haoei müh ka kan la haoeibü ngüh dittikei; hoba kaodaka haoei haoeibü wan yaangbü kan la haptikei, hoba wanlong jenyu ka kanei haoeibü ngüh ditkei.

Mosaei Jordan chaangboua sangnyu sem bangan phokukei;
khei Reubenbü shanga yomanga yamlamanga Bezer; Gadbü shanga Gileada Ramoth, hoba Manassebü shanga Bashana Golan.

Hobaje nyi shaangla leilubü laangdaka kibü ngüh shuong kho ngei laangdaka dolabü; hoba nyi khübü kho saopobü busena jinlabü.’
“Hibü ngei akasia buei busen che kümbei hoba laangdak penyi shaangla kümbü phatko thüngenkei hoba laangdak penyi kho jungan shongh to angkei.

Kheijinei ngo sepeikei hoba shongh ka louyenan ngei kümbü busena laangdak penyi kho ngei phokei; hoba
(Hobaje Israel shousi shuong Beeroth Benejaakan ka meimeian Mosera to loukei, khünei Aron haikei hoba khünei hao khünkei, hoba haoeibü shou Eleazarei ungshed kümsileia hao jeikei.

Kho jihsiphaia
Khei Levi jembü mütli yoa ai phejan ayingsi phetphan akiko ki;
“Kho tegü shaangbü phatko ngo shongha chalou saonyi hoba langyang saonyi kikei, hoba kho jihsiphaiakei

“Hobaje tou, O Israel,
Hobaje kan maila shanga
Chühashi, müh hoba thükkabou mühshuong, kaodak hoba khünei kibü pendou
Khei yingasikei kaneibü pisibousi to haoen to sanoula
Hibü kaneibü maangpon tangkabü kho kipan apashi, hoba touje kan maangpon kaangko teki.
Aishanga
Haoei aao müt si latnyu shanga ngühmaiei mat jembuda, hoba yenbou la neisimei hoba shausiyung kuko sanouda.

Nyi
Hao kho kaibü nyensang ki, hoba hao kaibü Mühghaü, aoei no jembü nyekei hapbo habü kümsilei yaangbü hoba hatlamoklabü ka shanga kümbei.
Kaneibü pisibou müt anjinlei yoan Ijep to yankei, hoba touje
“Hibü nyi
Hobaje kanei tatbü chalou hanei ngeashi, aieilausi kaneibü shousi aoyouei
hoba haoeibü kümsilei shuong Ijepbü choba Farao to Ijepa kümbü;
hoba Ijepbü sepai dan to haoei ai kümbei, haoeneibü koli hoba kailong shuong laobou saklangbü yungnyu to haoenei kan shijung loujinei khüpeitikei, hoba tat sühko
hoba kanei ho kishang asühshongko yama haoei kan to ai kümbei;

hoba Reubeneibü shou Eliabeibü shou Dathan hoba Abiram to haoei ai kümbei, lai kaoei jembü sembung ipbei, hoba Israelbü pendou thedanga haoen chemdang, haoeneibü neichem hoba haoen phainei sembü lang kibü pendou yoan, haoen suikei;
lausikei
“Hibü kan hau kila, hoba kanei laobou kaonyek lela atda, khüto atan kila shanga, ngei tat sakkubü ngühkhüm pendou jungeijan;
khei sendei si naodei kouko kibü kaonyek laobou
Aishanga kaonyek laobou kanei lela atda kho kan loubü Ijep kaonyeka kibü, kanei lilabü jinko kaibü youei dei leian jinko shiklaak bamang lebü che tegü aying.
Lausikei kanei lela kibü kaonyek kho shongh hoba pholi kaodak hoba müh kabü dei yungda;
kaibü Mühghaüei thounoubü kaonyek po khangbü ka po thonbü sühko athakko
“Tat ngei kan la kubü sakkubü ngüh kanei ditkho laualonga,
jih tükdea ngei kaneibü kaonyek shanga lang yantikulabü, khei shaangbü hoba phaibü lang yantikulabü, khei yingsije kanei kaneibü youshou, semlühdei, hoba oliv onang yoshailabü.
Hobaje ngei kaneibü shatsinam shanga kaneibü khongthua sang yemtikulabü, hoba kanei shauan senyühshemlabü.
khauang kan khulimbo longko haoei lang aloutilabü lele müh khinan apbo, hoba kaoei lang ehekkuko, hoba kan la kula kibü kaonyek maibü ka kan tongde mautibula,
kan lubü mühghaü ae sepeian haoen khangenko hoba haoen lembo kaneibü maangpon akhüpettila shanga kan maangsangashi.

“Hibü kanei ngeibü ngüh shuong kaneibü maanga hoba kaneibü soushoua thanan phoashi; hoba amaaphelabü che tegü khühbü kho kaneibü ika khühan phoashi, hoba khübü kho kaneibü khüngjaa shensinge shanga kaiashi.

Nyi sii ong ashaujan, nyi kho kaoa dei tegü jonashi.

Kaibü nyak an phejan, ayingsi sanlon shuong ka shaang shatbü ayingsi tetan phobü, takletbü atbü at, ayingsi kaibü maangmai lembü, ayingsi kaibü ik ka kubü lembü an phejan nyi kaibü ba phanga ashaujan;
lausikei nyi

kaibü Mühghaüei haoeibü nyen phola pienbü kho ka jungka lounyu hauan kialonga kheijinei kaibü masu ayingsi sanlon shuong
Nyi kho meishi, saak hoba asaopobü hoba saopobü phe liko shaubü tegü kho shaujan.

thedanga ai janbü ki kho nyi kümashi; no hoba ka phainei kaibü shousi maian kila shanga nyi kho ashaujan.

ka thedanga haoen mautian, khüpeinyu haoen phai asemla no lolo maangsangashi; hoba nyi haoeneibü mühghaü shangabü, ‘Habü phangei haoeneibü mühghaü lai khangenda? Küneikei kho tegü kümlabü,’ dogo lauko tekhüpetti.
Nyi

hoba, ‘Senei nyi angebü lubü mühghaü phaito haukho hoba senei haoen khangenkho,’ dogo haoei kan to lenbü tetsida hoba seikümseilei kho haüthük- alonga,
kanei kho thuseibou ayingsi manghlibou ngüha alejan; aishanga
kaneibü Mühghaü phaito kan semjan, hoba kanei hao to soumo hatjan, hoba haoei sakkubü jungeijan, hoba haoeibü ngühlang ditjan, hoba hao ong kanei khangenjan, hoba hao to kaangkhühtham hatlepan kijan.
Hobaje kho thuseibou kho ayingsi mangh tetenkubou kho haitijan, aieilausi
“Kaibü jaimai namai ayingsi kaibü jayang nouyangshou ayingsi kaibü sanounyu yak, ayingsi kaibü maangjam thangbouei huphanga sueijaeiko, ‘Nyi ayingsi kaibü nyusibousiei ai angebü
khei no kaijembo kibü, no nyangko ayingsi ka jungka lounyu saako kibü kaodak jithon ka jithon sühko kibü lubü mühghaü shanga sen haukho hoba lubü mühghaü lembho,’ dogo lensi,
nyi hao to hehoat akijan, ayingsi hao to ngüha alejan. Kaibü nyekei hao sanoudambü alenjan, ayingsi nyi hao khei ong tephoku, ayingsi nyi hao to akhüpetjan;
lausikei maimaitham nyi hao haitijan; hao haitila shanga nyi hao khulimbo kaibü ik shaangjan, hoba kho phaia ong müt pendou ik lijan.
Nyi hao laangei tetetjan aishanga aaochem ka Ijep kaodak ka leiyenkubü
Hobaje Israelbü pendouei kho ditlabü hoba hatlabü, hoba kho tegü kümsilei amaibü kan yoa ladangkei akümlabü.
kan yoa shosiek atei thinei sangnyua kibü at suletan, ‘Senei hauan kanei angebü Mühghaü lubü mühghaü khangenkho,’ dogo laualonga,
kheijinei nyi pheiei phaneiko maisho lamjan, hoba chühashi, kan yoa kho mangsenlabü kümsilei küma dogo aukabü kuko maimaitham dogo laualonga;
kanei kho sangnyua kibü shuong maimaitham inei maisho shemtilabü, hoba khünei kibü pendou hoba samkeisamuk yoan inei wapetkhümjan.

“Kaneibü
Aishanga
“Nyi asaopobü peisilei aikei ashaujan.
Habü ho nyi shaula thükbü meisiau ki; masu pongsu, sanlon, lon,
meishi, saak, kongmeishi, yao, dishon, yamkabü masu, hoba shongh kabü sanlon,
hoba haak pheinyinbü weko haak penyi pheinyinbü, hoba shatnyaibü nyi shaula thükkei.
Khei yingasikei, shatnyaibü hoba haak pheinyinbü meisiau yoa nyi habü ho ashaujan: ut, langyuk hoba sanshou; aieilausi shat nyaisikei haoen haak apheinyinkei, khübü kho kan shanga asaopobü ki.
Tokei uk, aieilausi haak pheinyinsikei shat anyaingaida, kho kan shanga asaopobü, kho phe kanei ashaujan; hoba khübü haibü mang to ameitijan.
“Deia kibü pendou kanei shaula thükkei, ai ong kaak hoba kou yeman ki, kanei shaula thükkei;
lausikei ai ong kaak hoba kou aki, kho kanei ashaujan; kho kan shanga asaopobü ki.
“Au saopobü pendou kanei shaula thükkei,
lausikei habü ho kanei ashaujan: wekekshou, aulumai, ngau shaubou aulu,
sou aulu, auluhamshang, hoba aulu haoen phang lulu;
aukhomakmak, hoba haoen phang lulu,
ostrik, nangnak au, yung- au, aulu hoba khübü phang lulu,
ukhoungba hanbou hoba yaangbou, laang angbü ukhoungba;
thimkak au, hogon, kormorant,
dei au, dei au yaangbou hoba khübü phang lulu, shujem dukutuk hoba pak.
“Hobaje kaakyembü yangsikok pendou pendou kan shanga asaopobü ki, khübü kho ashaujan.
Ausiyuk saopobü pendou kanei shaula thükkei.
“Hao lolo haibü aikei kanei ashaujan; aishanga kan
“Nyi lonshou khoeibü nyueibü sendeia athungjan.

Hobaje laobou kaoen haoeibü nyen shanga haoei pienlaje, khünei
Kanei kho jungan alouenlabü lele lam kho aeibou saalonga, aieilausi
kanei kho nam la yeitiashi, hoba nam kho kaneibü ika jungan
hoba nyi ai ong maangangda, masu pongsu shanga yingasikei, sanlon shanga yingasikei, nyakidei yingasikei, ayingsi nyi ai ong maangangkei kho shanga jungeila thükkei, hoba nyi
“Hobaje kan yoa kibü Levibü shuong nyi üpyojan; aishanga kan yoa haoeibü phejan ayingsi phetphanlabü aki.
Po sem weko thonbüa kho po jeteibüa an phejan hapbü pendou chem to sungjung louan phojan.
Hobaje Levibü shuong haoeneibü phejan ayingsi phetphanlabü kan yoa aki yingsije, kan yoa kibü yenbou shoujit, latnyu, kan yoa kibü shuong khei kanei ai ong kümlaje
“Po nyetboubü thonbü wekoa nyi litila sakkujan.
Hobaje litibü kho tegü kilabü; nam lotkubou wekoei haoeibü lepbou la ai lotkuan ki kho apbulabü haoei kho jembü lepbou ayingsi jaisina ka kho tukosekko asungjan; aishanga sanghsiyung apbula
Yenbou ka nyi kho hila thükkei; lausikei kaibü jaisina ika ai ong ki kho nyi kuan apjan.
“Khei yingasikei kan yoa shalebü akilabü; aishanga nyi ong tat ngei ka la sakkubü habü pendou jungeila shanga
kaibü Mühghaüei phetphan lela ka la kubü kaonyeka
Aishanga haoei thekubü tegü, ladang
“Shalebü müt at, kaneibü jaisina yoa at,
lausikei nyi kaibü ik hao la sengkujan, hoba hao khambü shanga souko amakhetko lotkuashi.
Po nyetboubü, sanghsiyung apbubü po nyangko kia dogo kaibü maangpona amaibü adamla maangsangashi; hoba kaibü jaisina shalebü khulimbo amaibü dambo hao la nyi aikei akuko phoan haoei ka khulimbo
Nyi hao la maangmai kuashi, hoba nyi hao la kujinei maangnyuangko kuashi, aishanga ho shangabü
Aishanga kaneibü kaonyeka shalebü ladangkei akiko akilabü; khoei kaonyeka kaneibü shalebü, kaneibü jaisina hoba khambü shuong to kaneibü ik maisho sengla ngei kan la sakkuda.
“Kaibü jaisina, Ibribü bousu ayingsi yaksa che ka la yaakkuan kialonga, haoei po lak no khangenlabü, lausikei po nyetboubüa nyi hao kaibü kümkaleika litijan.
Hobaje ladang nyi kaibü kümkaleika hao litilaje, nyi hao ikkong angaitijan;
kaibü Mühghaüei ka la haükubü thüng, hao la nyi amakhetko kaibü sanlon shuong ka, amshang ka, semlüh nitshang ka, hao la kujan.
Jih cheneije kankei Ijep kaodaka aaola lean kikei, hoba
“Khei yingasikei haoei ka to ngei kaibü kümsilei üpyolabü dogo laualonga, aieilausi haoei no hoba kaibü chemdang sanouda, hoba ka yoa maian kümbei,
kheijinei nyi jalongei haoeibü nou koukhüna sepbulabü, kheijinei ponpen shanga hao kaibü aao la lelabü; kho tegü ong nyi kaibü aaosao tokei kümlabü.
Nyi kaibü kümkaleika hao litijinei nyi hoje seka dogo adamjan, aishanga haoei ka shanga po lak mulambü müteibü mukei jamde ong lekuko haoei kümsilei küma. Hobaje nyi kümbüleibü pendoua
“Kaibü masu shuong hoba sanlon shuong ka shaang shatbü pendou
ei pienbü kaoena no hoba kaibü chemdangei
Khei yingasikei, khünei denche chühenlabü amaibü at kialonga, nyi kho
Kho kanei kaneibü bakhün maanga asaopobü hoba saopobü meisiau khei saak ayingsi meishi tegü shaujan.
Kanei sii ashaujan; kho kanei dei tegü kaoa jonan apjan.
“Abib lit nou nouashi, hoba Püetbü lem
Kanei Püetbü lem shanga sanlon shuong hoba masu shuong ka lanei

Tokai jinbü wentek nyi kho yoa ashaujan; aishanga chalou nyet nyi ho yoa tokai ajinbü wentek, khonkulabü wentek shaujan; aishanga kan Ijep ka panteiko longkei; kaneibü salang sünga kanei Ijep kaodak apyobü chalou damenla shanga kanei shaujan.
Chalou nyetnyet kan kishang aineikei tokai ühüptijan, hoba phe laobou khangnyet chasem kanei haitian lemda, ngeyang sühko aikei ajoutijan.
kaibü Mühghaüei kan la kubü sangnyu aineikei kanei Püetbü lem lembü kho akulabü;
lausikei
kaibü Mühghaüei pienbü kaoena kanei thunganjuokan shaujan; hoba ngeyang kaneibü neichem lamjung sepeinyu longeijan.
Chalou lak kanei tokai ajinbü wentek shaujan, hoba nyetbounyeta
“Kanei bale nyet wean chühjan; kanei bale nyet wean chühbü kho youshoua shaangbou langku hautibü jih ka youshou loan kibü sühko wean chühjan.

hoba kaibü shou yoa, kaibü nou- yangnyu yoa, kaibü sambou hoba samnyu yoa, kaneibü sangnyua kibü Levibü yoa, yenbou, aaomüt, latnyu aoyou kan yoa ki,
Kankei jih cheneije Ijepa aaola lean kikei, dogo kanei damenjan; hibü kanei habü yeikubü ngühkhüm maangsangko jungeijan.
“Nyi kaibü aam ka hoba kaibü semlüh nitshang ka yoshaian phaia chalou nyetbounyet Dip lem nyi noujan.
Hobaje no kaibü jayang nouyang shousi, kaibü sambou hoba samnyu, Levibü, yenbou, shoujit, latnyu, aoyou kaneibü sanga kida, haoen yoan kaibü lem olinyojan.
Chalou nyet
“Poa semnei kan bousu pendou
Mütpem weko
Nyi ngühmai anangletjan, nyi the achühjan; aishanga besaei songbüdobü nyek thutida, hoba saopobü mütshuongeibü inletkuda.
No lang kila hoba
ayingsi
“Nyi
“Kan yoa hoba
hoba thinei lubü mühghaü khangenalonga, khei ngei asakkubü, chanyu ayingsi litnyu müha kibü dan lembo hapalonga;
hoba kho kan la lenalonga, hoba kho kanei dida longa, kanei maisho lamenjan, hoba chühashi, kho tükde dogo aukabü longan khei Israela mangsenlabü kümbei dogo chunga lapbü kialonga,
kheijinei kanei bousu yingasikei yaksa yingasikei amaibü kümbü müt kho batak aijung longan laangei tetetjan.
Müt nyi ayingsi sem aukabüei shedkubü müt kho haitijan; müt cheeibü aukabüei hao ühaitijan.
Hao haitila shanga hao khulimbo aukabü shuongei shaangla ik shatjan, kho phaia ong müt pendouei ik shatlabü, kho tegü kan yoka müt amaibou kho apjan.
“Ngüh at kan shanga matjemla aeibou sekan longalonga, sii angbü ngüh shanga ayingsi ngümyobü ayingsi kan yoa ngühsaknepbü shanga kaneibü bamanga lemenbü kisi kheijinei kanei meimeian
Hobaje kho jiha Levi ungshedbou shuong hoba matjembü shuong jungto no loujan, hoba nyi haoen ka phelabü, hoba haoenei ka la matjembü ngetilabü.
Hobaje kaoen laobou

Ngühkhüm laobou haoenei janenan ka la lenlaje kho tegütham hoba matjembü laobou haoenei ka to lenlaje nyi kümlabü, maeae yingsikei nanae yingsikei matjem laobou haoenei ka la lenlaje kho ka no asepeijan.
Hobaje ao mütei
hoba müt pendouei kho ditlabü, hoba hatlabü, hoba touje jembüei dambüei ongje akümlabü.
kaibü Mühghaüei ao pienlaje nyi hao ka thüka choba yeitijan; kaibü mütli yo ka che ka thüka choba phokujan; kaibü mütli ayingbü küksithang nyi ka thüka aphojan.
Khei yingsikei haoei hao shanga koli juong apholabü, ayingsi koli juong phola shanga mütshuong nyibou Ijep to üttijan, aishanga
Ayingsi haoei maangpon sepeinyu angaila shanga haoei yak juong aphojan, ayingsi haoei jembü shanga hon hoba chandinam juong thanan aphojan.
Ladang hao choba setshanga setlaje Levi ungshedbou shuong thedanga kibü ka haoei jembü shanga ho ngühkhüm le chenei dojan;
hoba haoei kho hao yoa pholabü, khei
Khei haoeibü maangpon jembü jaisina thüka atonenlabü, hoba hao hoba haoeibü shousi shuong athakko lounyu Israelbü yoa sanglea kila shanga haoei sakkubü ngühkhüm ka maeae ayingsi nanae asepeijan.
“Levi ungshedbou shuong, khei Levi chung pendou Israelbü yoa ai phejan ayingsi phetphan akilabü;
Hobaje haoen jembü mütli yoa haoeneibü phet akilabü, haoei haoen to lenbü tegü
“Masu pongsu ayingsi sanlon haitian lembü ka ungshedbou shuong mütli ka haplabü phejan ho kilabü; phak, kaoshang, hoba shiang.
Tokei nyi shaangla hekbü youshou, semlühdei hoba onang kaibü sanlon wi shaangla kipbü, nyi hao la kujan.
Aishanga
“Hobaje Levibü che, hao kishang ka, sangnyu at ka Israelbü pendou ka longan loualonga, hoba haoeibü soushou maangdak pendouei
kheijinei Levibü haoeibü jaisina pendouei
Jembü phet yaakbü ka loubü to liman haoenei shaula phejan jeteitei kilabü.
“Ladang
Kan yoa aoeikei lulueibü jayang nouyangshou wana ajuokettijan; seibü yaübü, tetbütabü, ayingsi shedsikhau kubü, ayingsi khopjikseibü,
ayingsi soumei ipbü ayingsi yemshan manghtakbü kheibü aokei akijan.

No
Aishanga khübü phang ao- you kanei shian aplabü ki, haoenei manghtakbü, seibüyaübü to ngühaleda, lausikei kanje
“Kan yoshaibü chaloua Horeba
hoba
Ngei haoen shanga haoen jembü mütli yoka no tegü thuseibü lela longtilabü; khei haoeibü sembunga ngeibü ngüh jinkulabü; hoba ngei hao la sakkubü pendou haoei haoen la lenlabü.
Hobaje kü nyena haoei lenbü aditbü müt at kialonga, ngei kho shanga ngei lolo hao la jongaitilabü.
Lausikei thuseibü aoei ngei hao to lenashi dogo asakkunyu jembü maangei lenlaje, ayingsi aoei lubü mühghaü nyena lenlaje kho thuseibou kho hailabü.’
“Hobaje nyi kaibü maanga
ladang
“Ladang
kaneibü kaoa
Müt haitibou weko khüto satetlanglabü lele
Müt haitibou aoei jembü langkei püetla khüto satetlanglaje ho tegü kilabü; aoei shanshedte mü haitilaje, khei shangied hao to mangsenyoko aki.
Khei ladang müt che yam to bu akla koulaje hoba woukung ka wou lakan lubü la hao hailabü lele tetouda, kho müt kho tegübü sangnyu chenei satetlangan langkei püetla thükkei.
Kho khei ayinglonga sii angbü phoklambüei müt haitibou kho shieiko hao khauang longan lam saasikei hao laphetan, khei hao haila muko akisikei hailabü lele hao to ngümlabü.
Khei yingbü khoei ngei ka la sangnyu sem phangche kila sakkuda.
“Hobaje
tat ngei laobou sakkuda, kho sakkubü pendou nyi jungeiko laualonga khei
Khünei
“Lausikei müt atei lubü to mangsenyoko kialonga, hoba hao shanga thoko kiteian, hoba hao khulimbo meimeian hao to hailabü lele ngümalonga, hoba khübü sangnyu che to laangatlanga longa;
kheijinei haoenei sangkabü leiyeibü jaishou shuongei tongde hao khüka lapan hao haitila shanga sii phinbou si phoklambou ika khümbo kujan.
Nyi hao to aikei phokei adamjan, lausikei kan haülabü hapla shanga shed akibü müteibü sii Israel ka sungan apashi.
“Nyi
“Müt che khulimbo aukabü cheei ong ngühkhüm leilubü ayingsi shed shonbü, khei ai ong haoei shed shonlaje yuktila athük, aukabü penyi ayingsi sem sembungei ngüh yeila thükkei.
Müt at khulimbo amlang aukabü at longan haoei shedtiyatibü shanga hao khulimbo aukabü kualonga
kheijinei müt nyi lemen kibü
Hobaje matjembouei ngüh haükokuokko lamlabü, hoba chühashi, aukabü kho amlangbü aukabü yingan kialonga
kheijinei kanei hao to haoei haoeibü jenabou to kümla dambo kibü tegü kümashi. Kho tegü nyi ka yo ka müt amaibü apjan.
Hobaje aoyou jouan ki haoenei kho ditlabü, hoba hatlabü hoba touje kan yoa kho tegü amaibü ajungeilabü.
Hobaje kaibü nyekei phokeiko achühjan; langkei jeila langkei, nyek jeila nyek, hauh jeila hauh, ik jeila ik, you jeila you.
“Ladang no dangbou khulimbo lason to haulaje, hoba katoje koli, kailong hoba müt juongbou haplaje, no haoen to hatko teki, aishanga Ijep ka leian longbou
Hobaje ladang kan lason che nyangko loulaje, ungshedbouei louan mütshuong to joyojan.
Haoei haoen to laulabü, ‘Ditashi, O Israel, kan dangbou khulimbo tat lason che to hauda, kan maang tekou, te- hüt, ayingsi telüh, ayingsi haoen thedanga kan temok.
Aishanga
“Kho phaia leiyeibü shuongei eikshuong to lenlabü, ‘Aoyouei chem haanbü dangan kho asaüenkei, hao chemto ngaila thükkei, kho khei ayinglonga hao lasona haisi lubüei kho saüenlabü.
Aoyouei semlühlaak lean phoan kho ka hek shauan achüh, hao chem to sepeinyu ngaila thükkei, kho khei ayinglonga hao lasona haisi lubü mütei buhek kho shaulabü.
Aoyouei yaksa phean, lausikei sao to chem akanko ki, hao chem to sepeinyu ngaila thükkei, kho khei ayinglonga hao lasona haisi lubüei sao lelabü.’
“Hobaje leiyeibü shuongei toukei laulabü, ‘Aoyou hatda, hoba maang ka ngaian ki, hao chemto sepeinyu ngaijan, kho khei ayinglonga hao himshuong maang ka ngailabü.’
Leiyeibü shuongei eikshuong to joyobü thonjinei eikshuong thüka sekbülakbü lajamleibou haoenei pienjan.
“Ladang nyi sangnyu che khulimbo wapyola haulaje shaangla nyi ka to sangmai kümla lenashi.
Sangnyu to sangmai kümbo kan la bakhün ipbualonga kheijinei khünei kibü müt kümtileitiashi.
Lausikei sangnyu khoei ka to sangmai akümlonga hoba ka khu limbo wapyoalonga, kheijinei nyi hao koman sungashi.
Hobaje ladang
Lausikei nashou yaksa hoba samkeisamuk hoba sangnyua kibü pendou khei soletbü peilaleila yeian lelabü hoba
Sangnyu laobou no kaijembo kibü phang shangabü aying, ka ka lounyu bangjung hauan kibü sangnyu pendou to nyi kho tegü kümshi.
“Lausikei hanei kibü phang sangnyua laobou
Lausikei
Khünei haoenei kan la haoeneibü Mühghaü shuong shanga haoenei kümbü mangsenlabü kümsilei pendou achühlettilabü hoba kho tegü

“Ladang kanei lela shanga wapyoko jih lounyu leko sangnyu kho komleplaje kan wou jungan hauan bunyu kho awapjan, aieilausi kanei khübü buhek shaulakei aingean, kheibü kho kanei akan üpjan; aishanga khongthua bunyu shuong kho müt tegü kanei shilep sai?
Nyi ngebü bunyu laobou lang hekbü bunyu aying, kho ong nyi mautilabü, hoba sangnyu kho atuongshongko ka to wapyobü sangnyu khulimbo nyi kaijembo thangetlabü kümjan.
kaneibü leiyeibü hoba matjembü shuong jungto haujan, hoba hao haitibü kaijembo kibü sangnyu shuong müt haibü kaoen ka lalokche kho takanchühjan.
Hobaje haibü mang nyangetnyu kibü sangnyu jaishou shuongei kümsilei küman achühbü hoba sek shapan achühbü masu saoen che sungbalabü.
Hobaje kho sangnyu jaishou shuongei ladangkei sek amoubü hoba lilabú jinan achühbü dei kouko kishang yomang to leian yanlabü hoba yomang khünei masu saoeneibü ngüm kho leilutikulabü.
Hobaje Levi shousi ungshedbou shuong nyangko loulabü, aishanga haoenei hao khangenlabü, hoba hao nyen haükulabü.
Hobaje kho sangnyu kabü leiyeibü jaishou shuong pendouei haibü mang nyangko kibü yomanga masu saoeneibü ngüm leilubü thüka ik sakan aplabü.
Kho phaia haoenei ho hai laulabü, ‘Küneibü ikei ho sii üangti, ayingsi küneibü nyekei ho kümbo ühüp.
Kaibü mütli Israel nyi ao- you khümenkei shedbü apbushi. O
Kho tegü
“Ladang kaibü dangbou khulimbo lason to haulaje, hoba
langsenbü yoa saomaibü yaksa at nyi mangsühko damalonga yakla lela nyi sao ngala thükkei.
Kheijinei nyi sao kaibü chem to leian loulabü, hoba saoeibü khu shuan aplabü hoba saoei iksen linan aplabü.

Hobaje saoei langsenbü neisimei aplabü hoba kaibü chema kilabü, hoba saoeibü nyusibou shanga lit che manghaaplabü. Kho phaia no sao jungto haula thükkei, hoba no saoeibü lao yeilabü, hoba sao kaibü yak yeilabü.
Nyi sao to maang ühailonga nyi sao haumangsühbü to hautiashi; lausikei ai nam lukei sao ayaakjan; nyi sao himou bautisikei sao to nyi aao che tegü tejungei.

“Müt cheei yak müt nyi kialonga che haoei sanouda, cheje haoei nangletda, hoba haoei sanoubü hoba nangletbü hamei hao la shou bukkualonga, hoba shaangbü shou kho nangletnyu apyonyueibü shou yingalonga,
kheijinei haoei haoeibü shousi la jembü nyaksinam phet phantinyet haoei sanounyueibü shou kho haoei nangletnyu apyonyueibü shou, ao shaangbü shou ki, hao to jai teyeiti.
Lausikei haoei nangletnyu apyonyueibü shou la haoei kibü ka phejan nyi aei kuko hao sungletjan; aishanga hao ka shaang pakbü hao ki, hoba jaishou phejan kho hao shangabü ki.
“Müt ateibü shou maang amaibü hoba ngüha alebü at kialonga, khei nyueibouei haksikei haoen to aditkuko kialonga,
nyusibouei hao laplabü hoba haoeneibü sangnyu leiyeibü shuong jungto hoba hao kishang sangnyu bakhün to leian loulabü.
Hobaje sangnyu leiyeibü jaishou shuong to laulabü, ‘Küneibü shou ho maang amai hoba ngüha aleda, haoei künei lenbü aditda; hao apsileko kibü yoa ihei jaakbü müt ki.’
Kheijinei sangnyua kibü müt pendouei hao laangei tetetkulabü; kho tegü kan yoka kan la amaikubü aplabü, hoba Israelbü pendouei ditan hatlabü.
“Hobaje müt atei haila muko shabü shonalonga, hoba hao haitialonga hoba bua saütian phoalonga,
haoeibü mang langyang sünga bua aphokujan, lausikei nyi khünyettham khünan apjan, aishanga ao phenetnyu hailaje, hao Mühghaüeibü shedsikhau phanga kia; hoba
“Nyi kaibü jaisinaeibü masu pongsu ayingsi sanlon lam maan satbü hapan nyi hukoshepbo teki; nyi haoen kaibü jaisina jungto nyibou leian longeikujan.

Hobaje kaibü jaisina kho ka junga nyangko akilonga, ayingsi nyi hao angelonga, kheijinei nyi kaibü chem to leian loulabü hoba kho ka yoa kaibü jaisinaei lamjung alou shongko phokulabü hoba nyi nyibou hao la kungaijan.

Hobaje kho tegü nyi haoeibü gadu shangakei kümjan; hoba haoeibü neisimei shangakei kho tegü kümlabü; hoba kaibü jaisina ka maubü ajanjan pendou haoei ai maukei, hoba laobou nyi hapbei, kho tegü kümjan, nyi no lolo tehuei.
“Nyi kaibü jaisinaeibü gadu ayingsi haoeibü masu pongsu lama tuongan hapsi nyi khübü ka no hueiko teki, nyi maimaitham haoen thuiko phonashi.
“Yaksa cheei bousueibü neisimei alejan, ayingsi bousuei yaksaeibü neisimei alejan, aishanga aoyouei khübü kümsilei kümlaje,
“Kaibü lamnyua aueibü hap che ka thedanga kialonga, bunyu ata ayingsi kaoa shoushou ayingsi tei kisi ayingsi teia ayingsi shoushou yoa pakan kisi nyi nyunyu kho asungjan.
Nyi nyunyu kho sattiashi, lausikei shoushouje nyi sungla thükkei, khünei no maian kilabü, hoba kaibü salang louko kienlabü.
“Ladang nyi chem haanbü danglaje, kheijinei nyi kaibü chemdaka chem kaijembo thangngaijan, khüka müt at atetsi, kho ka nyi kaibü chemdang thükto sii angbü shedbü asungbalabü.
“Nyi kaibü semlühlaaka lilabü den penyi awenjan; khei ayinglonga buhek khümbo kho nyi wenbü lilabü hoba semlühlaak ka longbü kho saoposhanga khümbo kuan apjan.
“Nyi masu che si gadu che la liko sek alaütijan,
“Nyi wi si phemba souyobü nei aneijan.
“Kaibü nei laobou nyi neida nei nyek leia neiyik jinashi.
“Müt cheei yaksa che ngasi hoba sao jungto atsi, hoba sao amangsühlonga,
hoba himou kümsilei sao la jinkualonga, hoba sao la nyenshed sungbualonga, ‘Hobaje ngei ho yaksa ngakei, hoba ngo sao nyangko loujinei ngei sao to saosüng medei tetsida ühüp,’ dogo laualonga;
“kheijinei medeinyueibü nyusibouei medeinyu saosüngbü tetsida shuong sungjung louan bakhüna sangnyu jaishou shuong jungto sungbalabü.
Hobaje medeinyueibü bouei leiyeibü jaishou shuong to laulabü, ‘Ngei kü shou nouyangnyu ho müt la yakla lela kukei hoba haoei sao amangsühda;

hoba chühashi, haoei sao la himou baulabü kümsilei jinkuko laukei: Ngei sao to saosüngbü medei tetsida ühüp; khei yingsikei, habü ho kü shou saosüngbü medei tetsida shuong ki!’ Hobaje haoenei sangnyu leiyeibü jaishou shuong thedanga nei laman phokulabü.
Hobaje sangnyu leiyeibü jaishou shuongei müt kho leijung louan hao to ngümlabü.

Hobaje haoenei hao ka namshau chandinam saongao shaulabü, hoba medeinyueibü bou la kho kulabü; aieilausi Israelbü medei che thükto nyenshed sungbakukei; hoba sao haoeibü yakla yeingailabü; haoei haoeibü langkei salang sünga sao asattijan.
“Lausikei kho tükde yingan kialonga, hoba saosüngbü medei tetsida sao to ühüplonga;

kheijinei haoenei medeinyu kho boueibü koukhün to leian longlabü, hoba sao sangnyu kabü mütshuongei sao haitila laangei tetlabü; aieilausi saoei Israela boueibü chema pejapela yeian kümbei; kho tegü nyi kan yo ka amaibü apjan.
“Müt cheei lubüeibü yak to jambo hapalonga kheijinei haosiham hailabü, yaksanyu to asangalanbou bousubou hoba yaksanyu kho; kho tegü nyi Israel ka amaibü tekan apjan.
“Phean phobü yaksa che kisi, hoba müt cheei sangnyua sao haüyoan sao to jamalonga,

kheijinei nyi sangnyu bakhün ka haosi ham leijung longjan, hoba kanei haosi ham laangei tetetjan; aieilausi sao sangnyua kisikei, yaksanyuei thuibü shang- a angek, hoba bousubou khokei jembü lepboueibü yak haoei leilukukei; kho tegü nyi kan yo ka amaibü tekan apjan.
“Lausikei bousubou khoei phean kibü yaksanyu kho seka hapan bousubou khoei sao to tukosekko jamalonga; kheijineije bousu aoei sao to jambei hao ong hailabü.
Lausikei medeinyu kho to nyi ai akümlabü, medeinyu to haila muko shedbü aki; aishanga ladang müt cheei jembü lepbou khulimbo meimeilaje hoba hao haitilaje, kho tegü ong kho kümsilei ki.
Aishanga haoei sao seka hapbei; phean phobü medeiei ngekkei hoba sao khümenla khünei ao akitei.
“Müt cheei saosüngbü medei nashou che, ao müei phean aki sao hapan sao to hatyolanga longa hoba sao to jamalonga hoba haoen hapenalonga;
kheijinei aoei sao to jambei haoei medeinyueibü bou la chandinam shekel anjinsem kulabü, hoba sao haoeibü yak la lelabü; aieilausi haoei sao leilutikei, haoeibü salang sünga sao üpbo kijan.
“Müt cheei haoeibü boueibü yak alejan, hoba boueibü yak to ajamjan.
“Aoeibü temlang nitnyinan ki, ayingsi mütlüh lipan apan ki, hao
“Dangshouei
“Amonbü ayingsi Moabbü
Aieilausi kan Ijep ka longjinei haoenei shausiyung hoba dei jungan kan shuokla alou, hoba kan to khükti uoktila shanga Mesopotamaiaa kibü Pethor ka Beoreibü shou Balaam haoenei chikei.
Khei yingasikei
Nyi kaibü langkei sünga haoeneibü hakso ayingsi haoen naangmaibü telam.
“Nyi Edombü amangsenjan, aieilausi hao kan bukjambü ki. Nyi Ijepbü to amangsenjan, aieilausi haoeneibü kaoa no yen la lean kikei.
Meten semboubüa bukbü haoeneibü shousi shuongei
“Ladang nyi kaibü dangbou shuong khulimbo meimeilaje, hoba shaishanga kilaje, kheijinei nyi kümsilei amaibü pendou ka saüenan kijan.
Kan yoa müt at nangnak saangan apbüei asao- poko apalonga hao shaishang ka longtijan, hao shaishang to ütjan.
Lausikei chasem haoei jembü lolo mang yuan apjan, hoba chanyu nepan hao shaishang to loulabü.
“Tokei no kishang khongaenei apshang leshang kijan, hoba no khüto khongaeto haujan.
Kaibü shapsikün yoa thamsuokjin che kijan, hoba ladang nyi khongaenei aplalelaje nyi khoei thujan, hoba nyi apbü kho jonlepan phojan.
Aishanga
“Sambü ao jembü bunyu jungka satjung louan ki, hao bunyu la khümbo akujan.
Kan yoa hao kimangsühbü tan laoboua hao kila haoei pienlaje khünei hao ka yoa kilabü, nyi hao to mangthem ajungeilabü.
“Israel sao aokei suonlamnyu la ayeijan, hoba Israelbü bousu aokei suonlambou la ayeijan.
kaibü Mühghaü chem to takletbü lembü shanga pejapelabü mueibü nam, ayingsi keieibü munam aikei asungbajan; aishanga penyi ham kho
“Nyi kaibü jaisina la phopbü yoan, nam phopnam yingsikei, shauayunga ayingsi ajanjan phopbü yoan alotkujan.
Küksithang la nyi phopnam yoan lotkula thükkei, lausikei laobou kaodak nyi lela hauda khünei nyi kümbü pendoua
“Ladang nyi
Lausikei atheletko kialonga kho ka to shabü akilabü.
Lauan apbo thekubü kho nyi maangangko thekubü yingsije
“Ladang kaibü lepboueibü semlühlaak to atlaje, nyi shaumang sühbü tegü semlüh hek shaumang maiko shaula thükkei; lausikei nyi kaibü ona aikei ajinjan.
Ladang kaibü lepboueibü loan kibü youshou laak to no atlaje, nyi kaibü ikei youman yetan shaula thükkei, lausikei kaibü lepboueibü youshou to nyi laangku alitijan.

“Ladang bousu cheei yaksa che lelaje, hoba sao yoa chem kanlaje, yaksanyu to den- che chühenbü ka yaksanyuei hao aolintiko aptisi, haoei sao la bangbü le che dokulabü, hoba kho saoeibü ika kuan haoeibü chem ka sao sattilabü.
Hobaje ladang haoeneibü chem ka sao bangjung satlaje, sao hauan lubüeibü yakla lela thükkei.

Hobaje lao khoei sao amangsühsi hoba sao la bangbü le dokualonga, hoba kho saoeibü ika kualonga hoba haoeibü chem ka sao sattialonga, ayingsi haoeibü yakla lela sao ngabü nyiboubü lao kho haian apalonga;
saoeibü shaangbü lao aoei sao sattikei, sao nyibou hao yakla lela shanga sao asaopoko yeisije haoei alejan; aishanga
“Ladang müt cheei yaksa haanbü ngalaje, hao sepai tan yo to ohaujan, ayingsi ai kümaleiakei hao pakan ajinjan; po cheje hao chema hopatham kilabü, hoba haoei yaksa kho olinko kitijan.
Aoeikei ngünbü laang ayingsi ngünbü laangdakei athealanjan, aishanga haoei langkei cheei theyolanyoda.
“Müt cheei jembü müt Israel shousi at kokla haubü lapensi, hoba hao to aao tegü jungeialonga, ayingsi hao yaakalonga, kho kokbou kho haitijan. Kho tegü kan yoka amaibü nyi apbulabü.
“Im longjinei Levi ungshedbou shuongei kan la lenbü tegü pendou amashikko kümla maangsangashi; ngei haoen la sakkubü, kanei kho tegü jungeiko kümashi.
Kan Ijep ka longjinei lama
“Ladang nyi kaibü lepbü sangmang la denche lotkulaje no haoeibü chem to haoei theletbü hila ütjan.
No khonga haiteijan, hoba aola nyi lotkuda haoei authebü kho khongto ka jungto jungan longlabü.
Hao shalebü müt yingalonga haoei authebü peialeia ayepjan.
Hao jembü neia yeplabü hoba no haükulabü shanga maimaitham ladang chanyu neplaje nyi sepeian hao la authebü kungaiashi, hoba kho
“Nyi jembü mütli yingsikei, ayingsi kaibü kaonyek, kaibü bamanga kibü kaibü yenbou yingsikei eikmu lambü sambü ao yongko shalebü ki, nyi akhangsejan.
Chanyu anepjinei nyi haoeibü munam khünyettham kuashi; aishanga hao shalebü kho maanglema ki; khei ayinglonga haoei kakhu limbo
“Shousi shanga nyusibou ühaitijan, ayingsi nyusibou shanga shousi ühaitijan, mütpem weko jembü shanga haitilabü.
“Yenbou ayingsi bou akibü matjem nyi ajuknyinkujan, ayingsi latnyueibü neisimei angla tepho.
Lausikei Ijepa no aaola lean kikei, hoba
“Ladang nyi kaibü sek ka nyak sunglaje, hoba seka youshang che maalaje, no kho sungla nyibou tengai; nyi kümbü kümsilei pendoua
Ladang oliv long ka hek kheilaje, nyi nyibou bhek lamjung ohaujan, kho yenbou, bou akibü, hoba latnyu shuong shanga kilabü.
Ladang nyi kaibü semlühlaak ka semlüh hek kheilaje, nyi phaito kho heshaila angailabü; ho yenbou, bou akibü hoba latnyu shuong shangabü kilabü.
Hobaje Ijep kaodaka no aaola lean kikei dogo nyi damenlabü; hibü ngei ka la ho kümla sakkuda.
“Ladang müt yoa lemen longan haoen matjemshang to loulaje hoba matjembouei haoen mat jemlaje kheijinei haoenei ngühmaanglanbou mat maitilabü hoba amaibou kho yuktilabü.
Hobaje shedbou to ngümla muan kialonga, matjembouei hao thedanga hao amaibü thüng chühan ngümla the khüman yeptilabü.
Ngümbü kho saonyinei sühko hao la kula thükkei, haoei limankei angümjan; khei ayinglonga khübü kho aei ngümbüei nyi jembü mütli yuktida.
“Masu pongsuei youshou nakjinei nyi haoeibü sembung tekhühku.

“Ladang jaisina liko kian haoen yoa shousi üpyoko che haian aplaje haiboueibü yak küksithang to chemdang ayeilabü; laoeibü jaisinaei sao jungto hauan sao yakla lela ngalabü, hoba sao to jaisinaeibü lao cheei kümjan kümsilei kümlabü.
Hobaje saoei bukbü shaangbou shouei haiboueibü nyena Israel ka haoeibü nyen haman üpla shanga jeijan.

Müt khoei haoeibü jaieibü yak kho lemang asühlonga, kheijinei haoeibü jaieibü yakei bakhün to jaishou shuong jungto anglabü, hoba laulabü, ‘Külaoeibü naei haoeibü jaieibü nyen Israela tephokukho lauda, haoei kü to jaisina bepou kümsilei tekümbho lauda.’
Kheijinei sangnyu jaishou shuongei hao ngalabü, hoba hao to joyolabü; hoba shaüde, ‘Ngei sao amangsühda’, dogo laualonga,

kheijinei haoeibü jaieibü yakei jaishou shuong thedanga hao jungto loulabü, hoba haoeibü you ka ngok hangletkulabü, hoba haoeibü thenyeka eokei thoklabü, hoba laulabü, ‘Ao mütei jembü jaieibü chemdang ayaüda hao to hai kümlabü.’
Hobaje Israela hao nyen, ‘Ngok hangletbou,’ dogo nyenlabü.
“Ladang müt nyi cheei che to oyolaje, cheeibü yakei jembü lao to ngümbü ik ka püetla shanga nyangko louan jembü ik shingan hao to huphang peisilei to nyatyolanga longa,
nyi sao to aikei sanou adambo saoeibü ik wapan apbushi.
“Nyi kaibü nyungkaia seret laang den lulu yaangbü hanbü aphojan.
Nyi kaibü chema kam yaangbü hanbü den lulu aphojan.
kaibü Mühghaüei ka la kubü kaonyeka no salangko kila shanga, seret penko hoba tükde kijan;
aishanga kho tegü kümbüleibü pendou khei ngühmaang alanko kümbü pendou
“Kan Ijep ka longjinei Amalekbüei ka to ai kümbei damenashi.
Kan hü shuokan hoba semthetan kijinei, haoen kaneibü wakoua kühshuokkei hoba phaibü shuong hoba hau akibü shuong wapthetkukei; haoen to Mühghaü to hatbü akitei.
Hibü
“Ladang
Mühghaüei kan la kubü kaodak ka hapbü pendou ka shaangbü buhek kanei jungan loulabü, hoba kho kama phoashi, hoba
Kho jiha ungshed jaishoubou jungto no haulabü, hoba hao to lenashi, ‘
“Hobaje ungshedbouei kaibü ik ka kam kho sungletlabü, hoba kho
Kho phaia nyi
Ijepbüei kün to kaangko jungeikei, kün aaola lekei, hoba kün la aaoeibü kümsilei jangan phokukei.
Lausikei künei küneibü pisibou Mühghaü to ngekkei, hoba
Hobaje
Hobaje ho kaodak to kün leian louan haoei kün la sendei hoba naodei koubü kaodak kukei.
Hobaje tou chühashi, O
“Hobaje nyi
Hobaje
“Sembou poa, kho an phejan kubü po, ladang nyi an phejan kubü pendou thonlaje, kheijinei nyi kho Levibü la, yenbou la, bou akibü la hoba latnyu la kaibü bakou phanga haoen shishenko shaula nyi kujan.
Hobaje
Ngo mang haapjinei ngei an phejan ashau, ayingsi ngo ihinseibü chaloua khübü denche ongkei sungan üp, ayingsi haibü la khübü ka ai aku; ngei
Kaibü saoposhang khuthük ka chühyantiashi, hoba kaibü mütli hoba küneibü pisibou la thekubü sendei hoba naodei koubü kaodak haübuma.’
“Tat
Haoeibü lamnyua paila hoba haoeibü sakkubü ngühkhüm hoba haoeibü matjem hoba haoeibü ngüha lela, tat
Hobaje haoei thekubü tegü hoba nyi haoeibü ngühkhüm pholabü lele
Hobaje haoei kümbü phang pendou thüka nyen shanga, hoba hao nyena hoba nyenhanga thükkabou yeitilabü; hoba haoei laubü tegü
Kheijinei Mosa hoba Israelbü leiyeibü jaishou shuongei mütshuong la sakkuko laukei, “Tat ngei kan la sakkubü pendou jungeiashi,

Hobaje nyi laang thüka ngühkhüm pendou shangashatko dojan.”
Mosa si ungshedbou shuong Levi shuongei Israelbü pendou to laukei, “Ngüh üangko kishi hoba ditashi, O Israel, tat no
Hibü nyi
Khünyet chalouatham Mosaei mütshuong la ngühkhüm kuko laukei,
“Ladang kanei Jordan danjung haulaje, habü hoei mütli haükula shanga Gerizim shongha lojan: Simon, Levi, Jihuda, Issakar, Josef, hoba Benjamin.
Hobaje habü hoei khükla uokla shanga Ebal shongha lojan: Reuben, Gad, Asher, Zebulun, Dan hoba Naftali.
Hobaje Levibüei Israelbü pendou to ngühlang yaangbüei laulabü:
“Hobaje müt pendouei laulabü, ‘Amen!’
“‘Aoei bou ayingsi nyu to soumo ühütdaje hao shedsikhau yingshi.’
“Hobaje müt pendouei laulabü, ‘Amen!’
“‘Aoei jembü lepboueibü leilang khokan aplaje hao shedsikhau yingshi.’
“Hobaje müt pendouei laulabü, ‘Amen!’
“‘Aoei nyekthubü lam ayingbü to leilaje, hao shedsikhau yingshi.’
“Hobaje müt pendouei laulabü, ‘Amen!’
“‘Aoei yenbou, bou akibü hoba latnyu matjembü juknyinkulaje, hao shedsikhau yingshi.’
“Hobaje müt pendouei laulabü, ‘Amen!’
“‘Aoei jembü bou himou bautiko boueibü yak to jamlaje, hao shedsikhau yingshi.’
“Hobaje müt pendouei laulabü, ‘Amen!’
“‘Aoei meisiau at to ongkei jamlaje, hao shedsikhau yingshi.’
“Hobaje müt pendouei laulabü, ‘Amen!’
“‘Aoei jaisinaeibü nouyangnyu ayingsi jembü nyueibü nouyangnyu to jamlaje, hao shedsikhau yingshi.’
“Hobaje müt pendouei laulabü, ‘Amen!’
“‘Aoei jembü yakeibü nyu to jamlaje hao shedsikhau yingshi.’
“Hobaje müt pendouei laulabü, ‘Amen!’
“‘Aoei lepbou huphanga haitilaje hao shedsikhau yingshi.’
“Hobaje müt pendouei laulabü, ‘Amen!’
“‘Aoei shedbü akibü müt haitilaje, hao shedsikhau yingshi.’
“Hobaje müt pendouei laulabü, ‘Amen!’
“‘Aoei ho ngühkhüm hoba lenbü ühütleplaje hao shedsikhau yingshi.’
“Hobaje müt pendouei laulabü, ‘Amen!’
“Ngei tat kan la kubü haoei sakkubü pendou jungeila
Hobaje
“Sangnyua no haükulabü hoba seka no haükulabü.
“Kaibü mang lilabü, kaibü kaokabü buhek, hoba kaibü samkeisamuk shoushou hoba kaibü masu hoba sanlon shoushou haabüa no haükulabü.
“Kaibü kam hoba shem haükulabü.
“No loujinei haükulabü hoba no haujinei haükulabü.
“Dangbou aoei ka to wa- pyolaje
“Kaibü bunga hoba kaibü ikei kümbü pendoua
Hobaje kaodakbü müt pendouei no
ei kaneibü pisibou to ka la kulabü dogo thekubü kaodaka kaibü mang lilabüa, kaibü samkeisamuk lilabüa, kaibü kao buheka
ei kaibü ikküm iklei pendou haükula shanga hoba kaneibü kao to jih tükdea lang yantila shanga haoei thanshang maibü müh ipbulabü.
ei no mei aying khu yeitilabü, hoba no phangaenei aying, thük letilabü, nyi ong
Hobaje lubü Mühghaü khangenla haula shanga tat ngei sakkubü ngüh ka nanae ayingsi maeae to tohau.
“Lausikei tat ngei ka la sakkubü
“Sangnyua no shedla khaulabü, hoba seka no shedla khaulabü.
“Kaibü kam hoba shem shedla khaulabü.
“Kaibü mang lilabü, hoba kaibü kao kabü buhek, kaibü masu hoba sanlon shoushou shuong shedla khaulabü.
“No loujinei hoba haujinei shedla khaulabü.
“Nyi ngo hangletnyu apan nyi kümbü amaibü shanga no amauti shongko hoba no tongde ashem shongko
Nyi laobou kaodak lela atda, khünei kho kaodak ka no amau shongko
ei ka to mangshatbü, mangbokshat, mangbokbü, mang auko shatbü, hoba inei, pangnyintibüei, senmaangbokbüei sühtilabü, hoba khübü khoei no amauti shongko no shieilabü.
Hobaje kaibü khu thüka kibü thükaenei kibü müh kho chinam kilabü, hoba kaibü phangaenei kibü kaodak kho namkaang kilabü.
Kaneibü kaoa lang kho
“Kaibü dangbou thedanga
Kaibü haibü mang kho müh kabü au pendou hoba kaodak kabü meisiau shanga shausiyung yinglabü hoba khübü shian sattikula ao akilabü.
ei no ladangkei amaibü Ijepbüeibü bokbü mouei, mou puyopuyo longbüei sühtilabü.
ei ka to dalabü, nyekthubü, hatbümokbüei sühtilabü;

hoba nyekthubüei daomaua youei shongan chühko paibü tegü no chaloua shongan chühko pailabü, hoba kaibü langkei müisiman akilabü; ponpen no ong khonkulabü hoba soshau soyunglabü, hoba no püetla ao akilabü.
“Nyi yaksa che phelabü lausikei lubüei sao to yeplabü; nyi chem che danglabü, lausikei khünei no akilabü; nyi semlüh laak lelabü, hoba hek nyi ashaulabü.

Kaibü masu pongsu ka thedanga haitilabü, lausikei nyi kho ashaulabü. Kaibü gadu to ka thedanga ik shatan solanglabü, lausikei ka la angaitilabü; kaibü sanlon kaibü dangbou la kuan aplabü, lausikei no püetla aokei akilabü.
Kaibü jayang nouyang shousi lubü la kulabü, hoba chaseko nyi haoen chühmangsühsikei ühüplabü, hoba kaibü ika aikei hau akilabü.
Kaibü kao kabü hek hoba nyi küten ongenbü pendou nyi angebü phang cheei ong shauan apbulabü hoba no ong khonkulabü hoba nitnyinan aplabü.
Hibü nyi ai haplaje kho hapbü khoei no langet bautilabü.
Kaibü youjishou ka khunyuyo sühko,
Hobaje
“Nyi sek to youli juong künan koulabü, lausikei shisho ong latlabü, aishanga koksüngei kho shaukhümbulabü.
Nyi semlühlaak lelabü hoba kümlaleilabü, lausikei nyi semlüh ih ayunglabü ayingsi hek akheilabü; aishanga yangei khübü kho shaulabü.
Kaibü kao pendoua oliv bunyu kilabü, lausikei nyi jembü lolo onang anaanglabü.
Ka ka jayang nouyang shousi paklabü, lausikei haoen ka shangabü ayinglabü, aishanga haoen phangkabou to atlabü.
Hobaje kaibü bunyu pendou hoba kaibü kaoa buhek koksüngei pakleplabü.
“Ka yoa kibü yenbou ong ka to thükkabou to anglabü hoba no phangkabou, phangkabou to ong yanlabü.
Haoei ka la lotkulabü, lausikei nyi hao la alotkulabü, hao khu, hoba no mei kilabü.
“Hobaje no amauti shongko habü shedsikhau shuong pendou ka thüka kilabü hoba no shieilabü, hoba no laphetlabü; aishanga haoei ka la sakkubü hoba haoei jaletkubü ngühkhüm shuong jungeila shanga
Habü ho ponpen shanga no hoba kaibü shisi shousi la tetsida hoba maangpanglabü kilabü.
Aieilausi nyi apsileko hapan olin angko hoba maanga olinbüei
Khei yingbü khoei mühei haiko, dei lako, mütkong, hoba peisilei pendouei kongsepan,
Aulu seengeibü tegü
Hatlamoklabü thenyek yembü phang, laobouei jaishou shuong wela alelabü, ayingsi nashou meten to onou alenlabü;

hoba no amauti shongko haoei kaibü samkeisamuk shoushou hoba kaibü kaokabü hek shaulabü; tokei haoei kan amauti shongko kaibü youshou ih ayingsi onang, kaibü masu ayingsi kaibü sanlon ühaa ayaangtilabü.
Hobaje nyi maanglembü kaibü ba suokbü kaonyek pendoua athaplet shongko haoei kaibü bakhün pendou komleplabü hoba
“Hibü nyi,
Kan yoa bousu ao teiteitham hoba aeibou inyaitham ki, haoei jembü jaisina hoba haoei sanoubü yak, hoba jouan kibü haoeibü shousi shuong shaulabü.
Hibü kaibü bakhün pendoua kaibü dangbou shuong komlepan kibü hoba khonkutiko aüyobüei haoei shaula kibü haoeneibü shousieibü phe haoen la akulabü, aieilausi haoei aikei jouan aki.
Kan yoa ao teiteitham hoba inyaitham, khei teiteibü hoba inyaibüei saoeibü youei kaoa nakmang asühko ki, saoei sao sanoubou lao to hoba saoeibü shousi to

hoba saoeibü nasetshang ka lotbü sam, hoba saoei bukbü nashou to amaiko jungeilabü; aishanga kaibü sangnyua kaibü dangbouei khonkutiko hoba aüyotiko komlepbüei ajanjan pendouei mühbüei saoei hu- phanga khübü kho shaulabü.
“Ho soneikangbü hoba hatlamoklabü nyen
kheijinei
Hobaje Ijepbü kishang laobou nyi hatko kikei, pendou haoei ka jungto nyibou sungbakulabü hoba khübü khoei ka to khapetnyu kilabü.
Tokei no amauti shongko, ho ngühkhüm lea doan akibü shatsinyat pendou hoba lim pendou
Kan che khanshoulitshou lühbak tegü kiasikei lühbak shisho ong yeilabü, aieilausi nyi
ei jih chenei kan to maitila hoba haatila olinbü tegü, kho tegü
“Hobaje kaodak jithon ka jithon sühko phang pendou yoa
Khübü phang yoa hopatham akilabü hoba kaibü you hakso akilabü; lausikei
Kaibü langkei ka thedanga kuia saüan ong kilabü, hoba no change nangnak hatlenbü phang- a ong kilabü, hoba kaibü langkei shanga aikei tükde akilabü.

Kaibü maangpona hatlabüei moktibü hangshong hoba kaibü nyekei ai hapda, kho hangshong, ngeyang nyi laulabü, ‘Mühghaüei ho chasem la ongkei yeitikua yingma!’ hoba chasem nyi ‘Mühghaüei ho ngeyang la ongkei yeitikua yingma!’ dogo laulabü.

ei no nyibou Ijep to longchema leian ngaitilabü, laobou lamnyu shanga ngei ka to, ‘Nyi touje kho nyibou ühüplabü,’ dogo laukei, hoba khünei kan lolo aaomüt hoba aaosao la yeian yaaklabü, hoba aoeikei kan ajeklabü.”
Israel shousi shuong yoa
Kheijinei Mosaei Israelbü pendou ngakei, hoba haoen to laukei, “Ijep kaodaka
Takteibü yaang, tetsida, hoba seikümseilei shuong kho kanei hapa.
Lausikei tat sühko
Po saonyi ngei kan yamlamanga leia; kaneibü neisimei ühang, hoba kaneibü ngokkei aleilu.
Kanei ngo
Ladang kan ho kaodak to loukei, Heshbol choba Sihon, hoba Bashanbü choba Og, sen naklepbo lason to longkei, lausikei senei haoen thükkei.
Hobaje haoeneibü kaodak senei lekei, hoba kho Reubenbü la hoba Gadbü hoba Manasse chung jamde la phetphanla shanga kukei.
Hibü kanei kümbü pendoua naangmaila shanga ho theyolanyobü ngüh shuong maangpona phoashi hoba khübü kho kümashi.
“Tat kan pendou
kaneibü nashou hanbü shuong, kaneibü yaksi shuong hoba kan shaishanga kibü yoa yenbou bu shenbü ka deikhubüa sühko.
Khei
khei ka to joyobü tegü hoba haoenei kaneibü pisibou to, Abraham to, Isak to hoba Jakob to thekubü tegü, khei tat haoei no jembü mütli yeitilabü hoba hao kaibü Mühghaü yeitila shanga,
ho theyolanyobü hoba theletbü ho ngei kan yoa ong kümda aying;
lausikei tat sen yoa
“Aieilausi sen Ijepa, lai kikei senei ngekei, hoba lai kanei danjung loubü phang yoa senei lai dankei,
hoba haoen yoa kibü haoeneibü heangsho hoba laang, chandinam hoba hon, haoen mangsenlabü kanei hapa.
Kho khei ayinglonga kan bousu, yaksa, chempen ayingsi chung yoa maangpon sepeian
Hobaje ladang haoei theletbü ditlaje, jembü lolo yonglambo laulabü, ‘Nembü kho ulangbüei mautila shanga kü maangpon kaangbüei paiasikei, ngo hakso kilabü.’
ei hao la amai üpbulabü, lausikei kheijinei
Hobaje ho ngühkhüm lea dobü shedsikhau thesilan pendou tegütham Israelbü chung pendou ka hao amaibü la kula shanga
“Kheijinei loulabü metena kan phainei longbü kaneibü shousiei hoba kaodak saabü ka loubü yenbouei ladang haoenei ho kaodak lim hoba shatsinyat laobouei
hoba khei kaodak khümbo wansat moli hoba wanui hoba tühnyinbü, khei youli awenshang hoba ai ayemshang, ayingsi khünei sang ayemda, lausikei
khei phang pendouei laulabü, ‘Aila

Hobaje haoenei angebü hoba laobou haoei haoen la aku, thinei lubü mühghaü shuong khangenkei, hoba haoen to lembei.
Hibü ho lea dobü shedsikhau pendou ho mütli thükto sungbakukei. Ho kaodak khulimbo
Hobaje tat sühko kibü tegü, hoba khauang yaang longbüei,
“Huphanga kibü shuong
“Hibü ladang habü pendou kan to haüthüklaje, haülabü yingsikei shedsikhau yingsikei ngei kan thedanga ai phokua, hoba lae aeto
Hobaje kan hoba kaneibü shousi shuong
kheijinei
Kan tekan apan kiasikei, khüka
Hobaje
Hobaje kan lang kila shanga

Hobaje kan sepeinyu longailabü hoba
Hobaje
kanei ong ngühkhüm lea doan kibü tegü, haoeibü ngühkhüm hoba sakkubü shuong jungeiko kanei
“Aishanga ho sakkubü ngei tat kan la sakkuda, ho kan shanga yongko sekbü aying, ayingsi kanei asühlabü lele aying.
‘Kho künei kümla shanga hoba kho kün jungto sungbaan künla kho dittila shanga ao kün shanga müh to angla?’ dogo kanei laulabü lele kho müha aki.
Ayingsi, ‘Künei kho kümlabü lele kün shanga aoei yungnyu to kün shanga hauan kho kün jungto sungbaan kün la dittila?’ dogo nyi laulabü lele kho yungnyu danjung hauan aki.
Lausikei nyi kümla shanga kho ka junga aeibou nyangko kaibü sembunga hoba kaibü maangpona kia.
“Chühashi, tat ngei kan thedanga langkei hoba püngbü juongbü, haibü hoba amaibü phokuda.
Tat ngei kan la
Khei yingsi dogokei, kan maangpon sepeinyu satan hoba maang akuko küksithang mühghaü to lemla hoba haoen khangenla ditletan satalonga,
ngei kan to lenda, kanei lela shanga Jordan danjung atbü kaodaka lounyu akiko maimaitham kan maulabü.

Kan thed- anga langkeibü hoba haibü, haülabü hoba shedsikhau phokua dogo kan khulimbo tat aukabü lela ngei müh si kao phongko lauda; hibü langkei pienashi, khei no hoba kaibü shousi langkei kienla shanga;
kaibü Mühghaü sanoula, haoeibü ngüh ditla, hoba hao to khapetan kila shanga, aishanga hao kho kaibü langkei hoba kaibü salang ki, khei
Hibü Mosa hauan Israelbü pendou to habü ngüh laukei.
Hobaje haoei haoen to laukei, “Tat ngo po saongaoto sao- che kia, touje ngo hau longei dogo paila athükda, hoba
Mühghaü kan thedanga haulabü, haoei khübü phang ka thedang ka mautikulabü, hoba nyi habü ho leilabü; hoba
