Hobaje
Hau kiashi, hoba maangkaangashi; tehüt, hoba haoen to hatko teki, aishanga
Kheijinei Mosaei Joshua ngakei, hoba Israelbü pendou thedanga laukei, “Hau kiashi, hoba maangkaangashi, aishanga habü mütli yoa
Ka thedanga haubou kho hao
Hibü Mosaei ngühkhüm kho dokei, hoba haoei kho
Hobaje Mosaei haoen la sakkuko laukei, “Po nyet weko thonbüa sanghshembü po jih takletbüa, lemshang neichem lema,
ladang Israelbü shuong pendou
Bousu shuong, nashou hanbü shuong, yaksa shuong, hoba kan yoa kibü yenbou khoei haoenei ditla hoba ditletla hoba kaneibü Mühghaü to soumo hatla hoba kho ngühkhüm pendou jungeiko kümla shanga.
Hobaje ngühkhüm angebü haoeneibü shousi shuongei kho ditlabü, hoba Jordan danan lato kan atko ki khonei ki shongko
Kheijinei
Kheijinei neichema sangmei thaonyua
Kheijinei

Kheijinei kho chaloua ngeibü khauang haoen khulimbo longlabü hoba ngei haoen inletlabü, hoba ngei haoen ka ngeibü thenyek hulabü, hoba haoen suian aplabü, hoba amaibü hoba khonsak juong haoen jungto loulabü, hibü kho chaloua haoenei laulabü, ‘Seneibü Mühghaü sen junga akibü hangshong habü khonsak amaibü sen jungto louda aying lo?’
Hobaje haoenei amaibü kümbo küksithang mühghaü shuong jungto sepeibü hangshong ngei maimaitham kho chaloua ngeibü thenyek huan aplabü.
“Hibü tou ho chia doashi, hoba Israel shousi shuong to lenashi, khei Israel shousi shuong khulimbo ho chia kü shanga aukabü che yingla shanga haoeneibü sembung to jinkuashi.

Aishanga ladang sendei hoba naodei kouko kibü haoeneibü pisibou la thekubü kaodak to ngei leian loulaje, hoba haoeneibü shi shenlaje hoba netlaje kheijinei haoen lubü mühghaü jungto se- peilabü, hoba haoen khangenlabü, hoba ngo aweasünglabü, hoba ngeibü thebülanbü leilulabü.

Hobaje khonsak hoba amaibü juong haoen thükto loujinei ho chiaei haoen thedanga aukabü che tegü kulabü, aishanga haoeneibü shieishouei ho amaalabü, aishanga ngei thekubü kaodak to haoen leian ütjineitham ngei haoeneibü lamthen aila yeilaje ngei ngeakei.”
Hibü khünyettham Mosaei kho chia dokei, hoba Israel shousi shuong to kho lenkei.
Hobaje Naneibü shou Joshua la ikjai kuko haoei laukei, “Hau kiashi, hoba maangkaang- ashi; aishanga ngei haoen la thekubü kaodak to Israel shousi shuong nyi leibalabü, hoba ngo ka yoa kilabü.”
Mosaei khübü kho thon sühko Mühghaü ngüh le chenei dobü thonkei.
Hobaje Mosaei
“Habü le leashi, khei
Aishanga kanei ngühkhüm lulimbü hoba kan ngüm kaangbü ngei ngekei, chühashi, tat ngo kan yoa lang kian ongkei kanei
Kan chung leiyeibü jaishou shuong hoba songdakbü shuong pendou haoeneibü nouei ditko habü ngüh laulabü, hoba haoen khulimbo müh si kao aukabü lela kü jungto yoshaitiashi.

Aishanga ngo haian phaia ngei kan la sakkubü lam ka kan sepeinyu ngaian kan lolo aeibou amailabü dogo ngei ngekei, hoba phaiaje amaibü kan to baulabü, aieilausi kaneibü ikkümiklei danko hao khauangtiko,
Hobaje Israelbü shuong kamshaibü pendoueibü nouei ditko Mosaei ho chia ngüh shuong khangbü ka thonbü sühko weko laukei.
“Nou haangashi, kan Mütshuong hoba ngei laukho;
hoba kaodakei kü sembung kabü ngüh ditashi.
Ngeibü lenbü lang tegü yantiashi;
ngeibü ngüh nindei tegü sinlettiashi.
Sang inyaibü thüka lang tapnin tegü;
hoba kesiong thüka nindei lakbü tegü.
Aishanga ngei
küneibü Mühghaü la kanei nyensang kuashi.
“Hao Laangnyudak kia,
haoeibü kümsilei penbüsoubü,
aishanga haoeibü lamnyu pendou tükde;
maanglemlabü hoba shedbü akibü Mühghaü,
hao Ngühmai hoba lanbü ki.
Hao to haoenei amaiko jungeikei,
haoen haoeibü shousi shuong aying,
kho haoen shedbü.
Haoen ayingbü to haubü,
hoba khüpbülangbü meten kia.
O ngoubü hoba songsido akibü mütli,
kanei
Hao kan kümbou kaneibü bou aying lo?
Haoei kan kümbei hoba yaüenkei.
“Shangiedbü chalou shuong damenashi,
po meten juong shanga damenashi;
kabou to pheashi, haoei ka to lenlabü.
Kaneibü jaishou shuong to pheashi
hoba haoei kan to lenlabü.
Ladang Thükkabouei phangshuong la
haoeneibü phetphan kukei,
ladang khunakshousi yoa haoei janyinbü kümbei,
haoei Israel shousi shuong lühbak thüng
mütli shuong la leilang jakukei.
Aieilausi
jembü mütli shuong ki;
haoeibü phetphan jaletbü kho Jakob ki.
“Haoei hao phetsen kaodaka,
hoba apshang dangbü ngühko kibü yamlema hapbei;
haoei hao aüetkei,
haoei hao shanga nongnaekei;
haoeibü nyekei dühko chühbü shongbe
tegü haoei hao lombei.
Auluei jembüeibü hap saklettian
jembü shoushou thüka seengeibü tegü,
haoei haoeibü kaak seengan haoen sungletkei,
hoba haoei jembü kaak thüka haoen tonkei.
hoba hao yoa küksithang mühghaü akitei.
“Haoei hao kaodak thükkaboua settikei,
hoba haoei hao ka longbü shautikei;
hoba haoei hao la laang ka naodei,
hoba laangkoklok ka onang sheptikei.
“Masu ka haabü onbü, sanlon ka sendei,
san shoushou ka hoba nyunyu ka haabü
Bashan masu pongsu hoba lon ka,
kelang haabü hoba whet wen.
Hobaje semlühdei ka nyi ih yungkei.
“Lausikei Jeshurun netkei hoba laukei;
‘No neta no shangtüngtham chinga;
no lenglengtham apa.’
Kheijinei hao Kümbou Mühghaü nangletkei,
hoba hao khümenbou Laang inletkei.
Küksithang mühghaü shuongei
hao to nyekto shatko yeitikei,
mangsenlabüei haoenei hao maangto shattikei.
Haoenei angebü mühghaü shuong,
tou nyangko loubü haanbü mühghaü shuong,
aoyou to kaneibü pisibousi shuongei ühüt;
laobou tükdebü Mühghaü aying,
lausikei kaonyu kabü mühghaü ong.
Haoenei haitibü lembü kukei.
No bukbü Laang nyi nangletkei,
hoba no paktibü Mühghaü nyi maan apbei.
“Hobaje
aieilausi haoeibü jayang nouyang shousiei khau angtikei.
Hobaje haoei laukei, ‘Ngei haoen ka ngeibü the hulabü,
Haoen thonbü ai yeilaje ngei chühkho.’
Aishanga haoen aeibou ngüha alebü meten,
maangalemlabü shousi shuong ki.
Laobou Mühghaü aying,
khoei kü to nyekto shattila yeikei.
Haoeneibü amlangbü kümsileiei ngo khau angtikei;
hibü ao phang che aying haoen yoa
ngei theshat maangshat yeitikulabü.
Ngei haang alongbü phang che to haoen
khauang longtikulabü.
Aishanga püngkhün haüboutham
sühko juokko,
hoba kaodak hoba khünei longbü suiko,
hoba shongh chemshanga wan longko,
ngo khauang longbüa wan longan kia.
“Ngei haoen thüka khonsaklabü ongshaikulabü.
Ngei haoen to ngeibü laujin lekhümlabü.
Mühei haibüei haoen maulabü,
hoba wankak yasebüei suilabü.
Hobaje aeibou amaibü maula longlabü.
Haoen jitnyinla meisiau shuong;
hoba haoen komattila pinyu shuong
ngei haoen thükto hautikulabü.
Khongaenei inei hailabü,
hoba chemmanga moklabü kilabü;
khoei heshou hoba saosüngbü medei ham,
senyopbü nasak yoa khuthubü mautilabü.
Ngei haoen saabüa phinnyintilabü,
müt yoa ngei haoen adamentilabü,
dogo ngei laukhoulabü;
Lausikei haoeneibü dangbou shuongei yonglamlabü,
haoeneibü dangbou shuongei mashikan ngeklabü,
seneibü ikei thük yaang hapa.
Ho kümsilei
dogo laubü la ngo hatda.
“Aishanga haoen songsido akibü phang shuong ki.
Hobaje haoen to ditenbü aki.
O, haoen songsido kiko haoenei ho ditenan,
khei haoen phaikabü thu shanga daman chüha tegüje!
Haoeneibü Laangei haoen ayaak tegüje,
Lai küman cheei hajar che shieila?
Hobaje müt nyiei hajar an lintila?
Aishanga haoeneibü laang seneibü Laang tegü aying,
khei seneibü laboueikei haoen lolo ngeakei.
Aishanga haoeneibü semlühdei Sodom ka,
hoba Gomora bamang ka louda;
haoeneibü semlüh khauekbü semlüh ki,
haoeneibü shen khauekbü ki.
Haoeneibü ih kho pinyueibükom
hoba piyangeibü kom kaangbü ki.
“Ngeibü thanshanga shaangda
ho kü yoa thanan phoakei aying lo?
Haoeneibü you ladang sheketlaje phoklambü
hoba sepeian kungaibü kü shangabü ki;
aishanga haoen khonsaklabü nyangko kia,
hoba hao thükto haüthüklabü shuong panteiko loulabü.
Aishanga ladang haoeneibü hau satda dogo haplaje,
hoba haoen che ongkei aaola leko
hoba dongebü thua akilaje,
sanou dambuko haoei haoeneibü mat jemlabü.
Hobaje haoei laulabü,
‘Haoen satenshang laang
haoeneibü mühghaü shuong.
Aoyouei haoeneibü haitibü lembü shaukei,
hoba haoeneibü yunglabü lembü ih yungkei haoen lanei ki?
Haoen louan kan to thuitiashi;
kan khümenla haoen yeitiashi.’
“Kü to liman lubü mühghaüshuong ao aki,
‘Ngo hao ki,’ dogo tou ngeashi.
Ngei haitida hoba ngei langngaitida.
Hobaje ngeibü ik ka solangla ao aki.
Aishanga ngei müh ae ngeibü ik shingda
hoba thekolanko lauda.
Ngeibü soneikangbü in ngei ulabü,
hoba ngeibü ikei ngühmaia hatleplabü;
ngeibü dangbou la ngei phoklambü kulabü;
hoba kü to mangsenbü shieikoelabü.
Haitibü hoba thüngbü siiei,
ngeibü laujin siiei jaaktilabü,
laobou leiyeibü shuong khulou loubang kibü khu ka,
ngeibü inei phe suilabü.
“Phangshuong yoa olinyoko ngekashi,
O kan haoeneibü mütli shuong.
Aishanga hao khangenbü shuongeibü
sii shanga haoei phoklamlabü.
Hobaje haoeibü dangbülebü la phoklambü kulabü.
Hobaje haoeibü kaodak haoeibü mütli shanga
haoei shabü hangan apbulabü.”
Hobaje Mosa louan kho chisichia ngüh pendou mütli pendouei ditko, hao yoa Naneibü shou Joshua yoan joyokei.
Ladang Mosaei habü ngüh pendou Israelbü pendou to lenkhümbei, haoei haoen to laukei,
“Tat kan to sanglabü ngüh lenbü kho ngühkhüm ngüh pendou khümbo jungeila kaneibü shilashoula ngühkhüm kula shanga ho pendou kaneibü maanga phoashi.
Aieilausi ho kan shanga amlangbü kümsilei aying; aishanga ho kaneibü langkei ki, hoba ho danko kanei Jordan danko hauan lela kibü kaodaka kaneibü salang lounyu kilabü.”
Hobaje
“Moab kaodaka Jerikho ae yeian kibü, kho Abarim shongh, hoba Kanan laobou ngei Israel shousi shuong la lela kukei, kho chühashi.
Hobaje kaibü jai Aron ailai Hor shongha haikei, hoba hao himshuong yoa yokei, kho tegü no angshang shongha haishi hoba kaibü himshuong yoa yoshi.
Aieilausi Zin yamlamanga, Kadesh sangnyu nyangko Meriba deia, Israel shousi shuong yoa kanei kükhu limbo shed shonkei; aieilausi Israel shousi yoa kanei ngo saüenan apho.
Nyi saabü ka kaonyu to chühlabü, lausikei ngei Israel shousi shuong la kuko kibü kaonyu to no üetlabü.”
Tou Mühghaü müt Mosaei hao ühaijinei Israel shousi shuong haükubü haülabü kho ho ki.
Haoei laukei,
hoba haoen jungto Seir ka longkei.
Haoei haoeibü mütshuong la
Paran shongh ka hauan yantikukei.
Hobaje saopobü hajar an yo ka hao loukei;
haoeibü mae aenei haoeibü ngühkhüm kaangbü kikei.
Haü, haoei jembü mütli sanouda,
haoeibü saopobü shuong pendou kaibü ika kia;
Hobaje ka thedanga haoen setda
Mütpem wekoei kaibü ngüh sungletlabü.
Mosaei kün la ngühkhüm che sakkukei;
Jakobeibü tan shanga phetphanlabü kia.
Mütshuong leiyeibü shuong kaman Israel phang
pendou kijinei hao Jeshuruna choba yeikei.
Mosaei Reuben phang shangabü laukei,
“Reuben hao junga shisho ong yingasikei ühaiko lang kitishi.”
Hobaje Jihuda haülabü ho ki; hoba haoei laukei:
“Jihudaeibü ngüh ditashi, O
Hao jembü mütli jungto leian loutiashi;
Hao lolo haoeibü ikei wapyoa;
Hobaje hao khulimbü shuong khulimbo kaibü thuibü che kilabü.”
Hobaje Levi shangabü haoei laukei,
“Kaibü Thummim hoba kaibü Urim nyi aoyou sanouda haoen yoa kia.
Nyi haoen Massaa takteikei,
No haoen to Meriba deia wapyokei.
Aoei haoeibü nyu si bou shangabü,
‘Ngei haoen ühüp’ dogo laukei.
Hobaje haoei jaisinakei asunglet
hoba jembü shoukei angeko apbei.
Aishanga haoenei kaibü ngüh jungeikei
hoba kaibü thebülanbü phoda.
Haoenei Jakob to haoeneibümatjembü
Hobaje Israel to kaibü ngühkhüm lenlabü;
Haoei kaibü kunga ponlem jinkulabü.
Hobaje kaibü lemshanga juokbü lembü khümbo lemlabü.
Haükuashi,
Hobaje haoeibü ikkümiklei sungletashi;
Hao khulimbo longbü
hoba hao mangsenbü shuong khei
hao khulimbo nyibou alolabü lele
haoeneibü ngeilo ngoktikuashi.”
Benjamin shangabü haoei laukei,
Hao yoa haoei khümenan kilabü;
Chalou sünga haoei hao kaplepan kida.”
Josef shangabü haoei laukei,
“Haoeneibü kaodak
Müh thükaenei nyakeinamei nindei yoa,
Hobaje thungshing akibü haübü deiei.
Chanyu ngesakbü ka namsek buhek langei,
Hobaje lit weko apsileko longtibüei;
Shangieda kibü shongha longbü maibouthamei,
Hobaje ponpen kibü shongh nyaksinamei;
Kaodak nyaksinam hoba khünei shenko kibüei,
Hobaje buhama kibü haoeibü maangshikbüei,
Josef haoeibü jaisina yoa yaangenbou,
Haoeibü khu thükto haülabü louyantiashi.
Hao kho soumo kibüa,
shaang shatbü masu pongsu phatkei;
Haoeibü laang kho Mühghaü ngou tegü;
Khünyi khoei phang pendou to thenlabü,
Khei kaodak thonbü sühko shian aplabü;
Hibü Efraim shanga kho tegü hajar an kilabü.
Hobaje Manasse shanga kho tegü hajar juong kilabü.”
Hobaje Zebulun shangabü haoei laukei,
“Zebulun no haushanga olinangko kishi.
Hobaje Issakar, kaibü neichema no olinangko kishi.
Haoenei mütshuong shongh to ngalabü;
Khünei haoenei saopobü lembü kulabü.
Aishanga haoenei yungnyu nyaksinam
Hobaje phetsena huan kibü nyaksinam sheplabü.”
Hobaje Gad shangabü haoeihai laukei,
“Gad yaangentibou haobou yingshi.
Hao molosaonyu tegü thoan kida,
hoba phem si ngümjong phenthetkuda.
Haoei jembü shanga büngbükhangbü phejan pienkei
Aishanga songdakbou phejanje lipletan sungletan kiteikei;
Hobaje hao mütli leiyeibü shuong jungto loukei,
Hobaje haoei
Hobaje Israel shanga matjembü kümbei.”
Hobaje Dan shangabü haoeilaukei,
“Dan Bashan ka tomjung longbü
molosaonyu shoushou ki.”
Naftali shangabü haoei laukei:
“O Naftali,
hoba haülabü shenko
Yungnyu hoba yungkük kho leashi.”
Hobaje Asher shangabü haoei laukei,
“Shousiei haükubou, Ashereibü shousi to aei haübou yingshi.
Hobaje haoeibü you onanga naketlangtishi.
Kaibü ngok nam hoba chinam kilabü;
Hobaje kaibü chalou shuong tegü kaibü hau kilabü.”
O Jeshurun, kaibü Mühghaü tegü lubü ao aki.
Aoei kaibü thuibü shanga khuthüka
hoba hao yaangenbüa müh danko sangda.
Thon akibü Mühghaü kho no kishang,
hoba phangaenei ponpen thon akibü ik ki.
Hobaje kaibü thedang ka dangbou shian apbei,
hoba laukei, ‘Mauashi.’
Hobaje youshou si ih kibü kaodak
Jakob deikük hao ong Israel khümenbüa kikei.
Haü, haoeibü mühei nindei yantikuda.
O Israel, no olinlabü, no tegü
Kaneibü thuibü shanga aih,
hoba kaneibü hangenbü ik kho hao ki!
Kaneibü dangbou shuong kan phangto loulabü.
Hobaje nyi haoeneibü angudonga saiyeilabü.
Hobaje Mosa Moab pholi ka Jerikho aenei kibü Nebo shongh, Pisga shonghkhu to angkei. Hobaje
hoba Naftali pendou hoba Efraim hoba Manasse kaodak hoba Jihuda kaodak pendou chanep yungnyu sühko,
Negeb hoba kaonop wekoeibü Pünglong Sangnyu Jerikho pholi ka Zoar sühko hao la lenkei.
Hobaje
Hibü
Hobaje Beth Peor tangküng aenei Moab kaodaka haoei hao khünkei; lausikei tat sühko aoeikei haoeibü hee angekei.
Hobaje Mosa hao haijinei po saongaoto saoche kikei, haoeibü nyek ayuiko kikei, hoba haoeibü mang ka hau angaiko kikei.
Hobaje Israel shousi shuongei Mosa shanga Moab pholia chalou khujin mang haapbei; kho tegü Mosa shanga mang haapbü penkei.
Hobaje Naneibü shou Joshua songbüdobü soushouei shenan kikei; aieilausi Mosaei hao to haoeibü ikei shangetkei; hoba Israel shousi shuongei hao to ditkei, hoba
Hobaje tetsida pendou hoba seikümseilei pendoua laobou Ijep kaodaka Farao to hoba hao khangenbü pendou to hoba haoeibü kaonyek pendoua kümla
hoba hau yaangbü ik hoba hatlamoklabü yaang laobou Mosaei Israelbü pendou thedanga kümbei;
kho tegü
Tou ho tegü loukei,
“Ngo khangenbou Mosa haia, hibü tou meimeiashi, ngei haoen khei Israel shousi la kubü kaodak khüto no hoba habü mütli pendou Jordan to hauashi.
Ngei Mosa to lenbü tegü, kaibü you yaüetlangshang pendou kho kan la kua.
Yamlamang hoba ho Lebanon ka shumang yaangbü Eufrates shumang sühko Hitbü kaodak pendou hoba chanep shumang yaangbü sühko kaibü leilang kilabü.
Kaibü salang sünga no khulimbo lola thükbü müt cheongkei akilabü, ngo Mosa yoa yobü tegü ka yoa yolabü, ngei ka la athük alotilabü, ayingsi no ainletlabü.
Hau kiashi, hoba maang kaangashi, aieilausi ngei haoeneibü pisibou la kula shanga laobou thekulankukei kho kaodak nyi habü mütli la phet phantilabü.

Ngo khangenbou Mosaei ka la sakkubü ngühkhüm pendou jungeiko kümlabü lele hau kiashi hoba maang ong aeibou kaang- ashi, no lato ong haulaje hausikei, thük haplabü lele ho ngühkhüm ka mae ayingsi nanae tesepei.

Ho ngühkhüm le ho kaibü sembung ka abanglabü, lausikei khünei doan kibü pendou paplepbo jungeienlabü lele nyi change nangnak kho daman chühlabü, khoei nyi kaibü langkei lam naang mailabü hoba nyi thük maibü haplabü.
Ngei ka la asakku sai? Hau kiashi hoba maang kaangashi; hatko deki ayingsi maang hanko teyei aishanga no lato ong haulaje hausikei
Kheijinei Joshuaei mütli leiyeibü shuong la sakkuko laukei,
“Shaishang peko hauan mütshuong la ngühkhüm kuko lauashi, ‘Kan lolo shausiyung lamleashi, aishanga
Hobaje Reubenbü hoba Gadbü hoba Manasse chung jamde to laukei,
Jordan thi aenei Mosaei kan la kubü kaodak khünei kaneibü yaksi, kaneibü nashou hanbü shuong hoba kaneibü samkeisamuk kilabü;
lausikei
Hobaje haoenei Joshua to laukei, “Nyi kün la sakkubü pendou künei kümlabü hoba nyi kün lae to ong hautilaje kün haulabü.
Künei Mosa to pendou ngüha lebü tegü ka to künei ngüha lelabü; Mosa to yobü tegü ka yoa ong
Hobaje aoei ong kaibü ngühkhüm khulimbo meimeilaje hoba nyi sakkubü pendou ngüha alelaje hao haitiashi, hau kiashi hoba maang kaangko kishi.”

Kheijinei Naneibü shou Joshuaei müt nyi kokpheibü tegü huphanga Shittim ka hautiko laukei, “Hauashi, Jerikho hoba kaonyek kho shuichühashi.” Hobaje haoen hauan asangalan sao che nyenei Rahabeibü chem to atkei hoba khünei otkei.
Hobaje Jerikhobü Choba to hai lenkei, “Chühashi, tao hato Israel shousi shuong kaodak pean chühla louakei.”
Hobaje Jerikhobü Chobaei Rahab jungto hautiko laukei. “Ka jungto louan kaibü chem to lotbü mütshuong kho leiba; aishanga haoen kaonyek pendou pheian chühla louda.”
Lausikei yaksanyu khoei müt nyi kho leiyetan kho huan phokei, hoba saoei laukei, “Haü mütshuong kho kü chem to loukei, lausikei haoen laka loukei ngei angekei.
Hobaje bakhün khinbü jih nangnakjinei mütshuong kho satan apbei, haoen lai to haukei ngei angekei; tongde shijung hauashi, aishanga kanei haoen shijung hausije kanei haoen leioulabü.”
Lausikei saoei, haoen kho chemdak to leian angkei hoba haoen kho saoei yenei yenko chemdaka phobü hanthep yoa huan phokei.
Hobaje mütshuongei Jordan deiko sühko haoen shijung haukei, haoen kho haubüyam bakhün kho khinkei.
Hobaje haoen tou ayepbo kijinei, sao haoen jungto chemdak to angkei;
hoba saoei müt shuong to laukei, “
Aishanga kan Ijep ka longjinei
Hobaje künei ho ditjinei kan to hatbü ka küneibü maangpon tühnyinkei; touje kün aotokei maang kaangbü soushou ajoukei; aishanga
Hibü tou ngei kan to sanouko jungeibü tegütham kanei kü bou chemdang to sanoubü jungeila, hoba kü la ngühmai tetsida che kula
Hobaje kanei kübou hoba künyu hoba ngeibü jaisina hoba ngeibü nousina langkei, hoba haoen kibü pendou küneibü langkei haibü ka püetkaima:”
Hobaje mütshuongei sao to laukei, “Küneibü langkei ka shanga yingshi, khei künei kümbü kümsilei ho nyi alenlonga, ladang
Kheijinei saoei haoen kho koulom danko janglühei yantikei, aishanga saoeibü chem kho sangnyu kümthang ba thüka kikei hoba sao kümthang thüka kikei.

Hobaje saoei haoen to laukei, “Shongh khüto angashi, khei ayinglonga kan shibü shuongei kan leiatlabü; hoba kan shibü shuong sepeinyu angai shongko khünei chalou semnyet huan kishi; kho phaia kanei jembü lam to haula thükkei.”
Hobaje mütshuongei sao to laukei, “Künla theyolanyotibü kaibü thebülanbü shanga kün ai shedbü akilabü.
Chühashi, künei kaonyek kho lela loujinei ho saklangbü lüh laobouei nyi kün sattikei ho koulom khünei khühjan, hoba kabou, kanyu, kaibü jaisina hoba kaboueibü chempen pendou kaibü chem to ngashaishi.
Hobaje ho haüthüklabü, aoyouei kaibü chem koukhün ka longan khong to satlaje haoeibü sii kho haoeibü khua kilabü.
Lausikei küneibü kümsilei shanga nyi kaibü sembungei jukeisaia longa kheijinei nyi kün to theyolanyoko theletbü shanga kün shedbü akilabü.”
Hobaje saoei laukei, “Kaneibü ngüh tegü kitishi,” hoba saoei haoen hautikei hoba haoen meimeijung haukei, hoba saoei saklangbü lüh kho kouloma phentian phokei.
Hobaje haoen hauan shongh aeto loukei, hoba haoen shieibü shuong kho sepeijung angai shongko khünei chalou semnyet kikei hoba shibü shuong khoei haoen lam pendoua lambei, lausikei haoenei ühüp.
Kheijinei müt nyi kho sepeijung longeikei, hoba shongh ka louyenkei, hoba kho danko Naneibü shou Joshua jungto loukei hoba haoen to ai kühshuokkei pendou hao la lenkei.
Hobaje haoenei Joshua to laukei, “Tükde
Nyibounyet ngeyang enyu Joshua pikei, hoba hao hoba Israel shousi pendou Shittim ka meimeijung Jordan to loukei hoba shumang danjung ohautoua haoen khünei shaikei.
Hobaje semnyet kian phaia leiyeibü shuong kho shaishang danthetjung haukei.
Hobaje haoenei noknyüh la ngühkhüm kuko laukei, “Ngühkhüm Busen kho Levi phang ungshedbou shuongei ladang lengan hauko haplaje, kheijinei kanei jembü kishang ka kuklabü hoba kho phaito haushi.
Lausi dogokei kan si kho kanglanga iknop hajar nyi thüng kilabü, kan laobou lam to haujan kho ngelabü lele kho nyangko kan ohoujan; aieilausi kanei kho lam to hauan achühkei.”
Kheijinei Joshuaei mütshuong to laukei, “Kan lolo saüenan kishi, aishanga ngiet
Hobaje Joshuaei ungshedbou shuong to laukei, “Ngühkhüm Busen kho lengan mütshuong thedang to danashi,” hoba haoenei Ngühkhüm Busen kho lengkei hoba mütshuong thedang khüto haukei.
Hobaje
Hobaje nyi Ngühkhüm Busen jungbü shuongla sakkuko laushi, ‘Ladang kanei Jordan yungkou to loulaje, kanei Jordana ngüh üangko loshi.’”
Kheijinei Joshuaei mütshuong to laukei, “Hato kaiya hoba

Hobaje Joshuaei laukei, “Hoei ponpen thon akibü Mühghaü kan yoa kia dogo kanei ngelabü hoba Kananbü, Hitbü, hoba Hivbü, Perizbü, Girgasbü, Amorbü, hoba Jebusbü pendou kho haoei kan ka lepde maimai shian aplabü.
Chühashi, kaodak pendou thüka
Hibü Israelbü phang weko müt anthüknyi, phang wekoka müt che che pienashi.
Hobaje ho haüthüklabü, kaodak pendou thüka
Hobaje ladang mütshuongei Jordan danla jembü neichem ka kukkei, hoba Ngühkhüm Busen lengbü ungshedbou shuong haoen thedanga haukei,

Kheijinei thükae ka loukoubü dei shuong kho Zaretan nyangko Adam sangnyu ka lounyu nangan on che ong yeian dangshatkei, hoba Araba yungnyu ka angbü Jemdei Yungnyu ham khümbo janyinkei hoba mütshuongei danjung hauan Jerikho thedanga sühkei.

Ladang phang pendouei Jordan kho lepde dankei,
“Nyi mütli yoka anthüknyi phang weko ka che che pienashi,

hoba haoen la hai sakkuashi: Kanei Jordan jenyu lan ungshedbou shuong you kaangkhühtham lokei, khüka laang anthüknyi sungenashi, hoba khübü kho kan yoa künan hauan tao kan lan shailaje khünei phoshi.”
Hibü Joshuaei müt anthüknyi aoyou haoei Israelbü phang weko ka che che pienkei, haoen ngakei.

Kho jihsiphaia

Hobaje Joshuaei aila kipbukei kho aukabü ho; Ijep kaodak ka loubü eikshuong yoa bousu pendou, khei Ijep kaodak ka longan phaia yama lam loma wapyobü pendou haian apbei.
Aishanga longbü müt pendou kipbei, lausikei Ijep kaodak ka longjinei yama lamoua bukbü müt pendou akip.
Aieilausi haoenei
Hobaje haoeneibü shisishousi aoyouei haoen saüenkei Joshuaei haoen kipbei; haoen kho lama akipsije haoen kho tokei akipbo kikei.
Hobaje ladang phang khümbo kipbei, haoen mou amai shongko shaishanga lulu chema kikei.
Hobaje
Hobaje Israel shousi shuong Gilgala shaikei hoba Jerikho pholia kho lit anthük leiboubü kho Püetbü Lem chasem noukei.
Hobaje Püetbü lem lian phainyet kho, kho kaodak ka longbü tokai ajinbü wentek hoba ulangbü khünyet shaukei.
Hobaje haoenei kaonyek ka longbü kho shauan phaia ngiet kho mana khüman apbei, hoba Israel shousi shuongei touje mana ühüp; lausikei khüpoje haoenei Kanan kaodak kabü buhek deihek shaukei.

Hobaje ladang Joshua Jerikho nyangko loukei, haoei haoeibü nyek ipbei hoba tangküng to chühkei hoba khünei müt che haoeibü ika in jungan hao khulimbo lokei hoba Joshuaei hao jungto hauan laukei, “No kün shanga si küneibü dangbou shanga?”

Hobaje
Tou Israel shousi shuong to hatbüei Jerikho sangnyu kho kaangkhühtham khinkei; aokei tangto üang ayingsi aokei alot.
Hobaje
Hobaje wapyobü müt pendouei sangnyu kaiko che haulabü hoba kanei sangnyu kho kailabü; kho tegü ong kanei chalou lak kümlabü.
Hobaje ungshedbou nyetei sanlon laangei kümbü teklaang nyet Ngühkhüm Busen thedanga junglabü; hoba nyetbounyet kanei sangnyu kho nyetnei kailabü hoba ungshedbou shuongei teklaang kho metlabü.

Hobaje ladang haoenei sanlon laangeibü teklaang ngüh kho ditlaje kheijinei müt pendouei ngüh yaangbüei ngeklabü, hoba sangnyu kümthang kho shimde tuonglabü, hoba müt pendou lulu tangbou tangshaitham haulabü.”
Hibü Naneibü shou Joshuaei ungshedbou shuong ngakei hoba haoen to laukei, “Ngühkhüm Busen kho lengashi hoba
Hobaje haoenei mütshuong to laukei, “Meimeiashi, hoba sangnyu kho kaiashi hoba in si aubu jungbü mütshuong kho
Hobaje ladang Joshuaei mütshuong to joyokei, ungshedbou müt nyet khoei sanloneibü laang teklaang kho metkei hoba
Hobaje insiaubu jungbü mütshuong kho teklaang metbü ungshedbou thedang to haukei, hoba phaibou tan kho Ngühkhüm Busen phaito sembei, hoba haoen haujinei ungshedbou shuongei teklaang metko haukei.

Hobaje Joshuaei mütshuong la ngühkhüm kuko laukei, “Kan to ngekashi dogo sengkubü chalou asühshongko kanei angeklabü, ayingsi kanei ngühlang kho teditti, ayingsi ngüh che ongkei kaneibü sembung ka telongti, hoba kho phaia ong kanei ngeklabü.”

Hobaje nyibounyet haoenei sangnyu kho che kaikei, hoba shaishang to sepeijung longaikei; kho tegü haoenei chalou laknyet kümbei.
Hobaje nyetbounyet haoenei ngeyang enyu ushen ngeko pikei hoba shaangbou tegü sangnyu kümthang kho nyetnei kaikei.

Hobaje sangnyu hoba khünei kibü pendou

Lausi dogokei kan shangaje khübü leilula khümbo kubü peisilei ka kan lulu bangan kishi, khei ayinglonga kanei ho khümbo kujinei, kanei khümbo kubü peisilei lean, khoei kanei Israelbü shaishang to shetsikhau sungbalabü hoba khonkutilabü.
Lausikei hon, chadinam pendou, hoba chinam hoba nameibü thung shuong kho

Hibü mütshuongei ngekkei hoba ungshedbou shuongei teklaang kho metkei; hoba ladang teklaang ngühlang kho ditkei noknyühei kaang ngekkei, hoba kümthang kho shimde tuongkei; hibü müt pendou lulu thedang to tangshaitham sangnyu khüto atkei, hoba haoenei sangnyu kho lekei.
Hobaje haoenei sangnyua kibü bousu hoba yaksa, nashou hoba chingbü, masu pongsu hoba sanlon hoba gadu pendou inei shemtikei.
Hobaje Joshuaei kaonyek shuchühbü müt nyi kho to laukei, “Asangalan sao chem to atashi hoba kanei sao to theyolanyobü tegü yaksanyu hoba saoei kibü khüka sungba.”

Hobaje shu- chühbü heshou shuong kho atkei, hoba Rahab hoba saoeibü bou hoba nyu, saoeibü jaisinasi shuong, hoba saoei kibü pendou leian longkei. Haosi hamei saoeibü chempen pendou yoan leian longkei, hoba Israelbü shaishang napheinei haoen phokei.
Hobaje haoenei sangnyu hoba khünei kibü pendou wanei jikan apbukei hoba hon si chandinam hoba chinam hoba namei kümbü peisilei shuong haoenei

Lausikei asangalan sao Rahab, hoba boueibü chempen hoba saoei kibü Joshuaei langkei khümenkei, hoba sao Israelbü yoa tat sühko kia, aieilausi saoei Joshuaei Jerikho pheian chühla hautibü ngühlang künbü shuong huan phokei.
Hobaje kho jiha Joshuaei haoen to nyen phongko laukei, “Aoei ho Jerikho sangnyu dangngaila thungeijangeilaje, kho müt kho
Kho tegü Joshua yoa
Lausikei Israel shousi shuongei asakkubü peisilei aenei maang alanbü shanga Jihuda phang Zeraeibü shou Zabdiereibü shou Karmieibü shou Akhanei asakkubü peisilei künkei, hibü Israel shousi khulimbo
Hobaje Joshuaei Jerikho ka Bethaven nyangko Bethel chaangbou aenei kibü Ai to mütshuong hautikei, hoba haoen to laukei, “Angashi hoba kaonyek shuchüh- ashi,” hoba mütshuong angkei hoba Ai shuchühkei.

Hobaje haoen Joshua jungto sepeijung longeian laukei, “Mütshuong pendouje tüangti, müt hajar nyi ayingsi sem ong angtishi, hoba Ai kho shiashi, müt pendou hauan hüla manglabü tehuongei, aishanga haoen shijo ong ki.”
Hibü khito hajar sem thüng ong angkei, hoba haoen Aibü thedang ka satkei.
Hobaje Aibüei haoen khujin to lak thüng haitikei, hoba haoen bakhün ka Shebarim sühko shijung louan haoen yanko kijinei haitikei hoba mütshuongeibü maang tühnyinkei hoba deila yeikei.

hoba Joshuaei laukei, “Ügütü! O

Aishanga Kananbüei hoba kaonyeka kibü pendouei ho ditlabü hoba kün kaileplabü hoba küneibü nyen kaodak ka wapan aplabü, hoba kaibü yaangenbü nyen shanga nyi ai kümla?”

Israelei shedbü shona haü, ngei haoen la sakkubü thebülanbü haoenei leilua; tokei haoenei khümbo kubü peisileikei küna, haoenei koka hoba haoenei huan phokei hoba haoenei kho haoeneibü peisilei yoa phoa.

Hibü Israel shousi shuongei haoeneibü dangbou thedanga aloen, haoen dangbou shuong thedangka satda, aieilausi haoen shedsikhau baukei. Kanei khümbo kubü peisilei kho kan ka amautilonga; touje ngo kan yoa yola athük.
