Hibü ngeyang kan phang phang hoba
Hobaje aoei khümbo kubü peisilei kho jungkei hao hoba haoei kibü pendou wanei juokettilabü, aieilausi haoei
Hibü Joshua ngeyang enyu pikei, hoba Israelbü kho phang phang nyangko leian loukei, hoba Jihuda phang kho pienkei.
Hobaje Jihuda phang hao jungto nyangko leibakei hoba Zerabü phang pienkei hoba Zera chempen mütpem che che loutikei, hoba Zabdi pienkei.
Hobaje haoei haoen chempen mütpem che che nyangyoko leian loukei, hoba Jihuda phang Zera shou Zabdi shou Karmi shou Akhan pienkei.
Hobaje Joshuaei Akhan to laukei, “Kü shou; Israel Mühghaü
Hobaje Akhanei Joshua to laukei, “Maimaitham Israel Mühghaü khulimbo ngei shabü shona hoba ngei ho tegü kümbei,

ladang sangshibü peisilei yoa Shinarbüei danga yukbü mangsho che, chandinam shekel sao an hoba hon ontou che yaüan chühbüa shekel anjinsem ngei hapbei, kheijinei khübü kho ngei dühkei, hoba khübü kho ngei lekei hoba chühashi, ngeibü neichem maang- a chandinam kho phang lean ngei khübü kho kaoa khünan phoakei.”
Hibu Joshuaei hangangbü shuong hautikei, hoba haoen neichem khüto laangjung loukei hoba chühashi, chandinam kho phang lean, kho haoeneibü neichema khünan kikei.
Hobaje haoenei khübü kho neichem mangka sungenkei hoba haoenei khübü kho

Hobaje Joshua hoba hao yoa kibü Israelbü pendouei Zeraeibü shou Akhan hoba chandinam hoba mangsho hoba hon ontou hoba haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü yaksa shousi shuong hoba haoeibü masu hoba haoeibü gadu hoba haoeibü sanlon, haoeibü nei- chem hoba haoei kibü pendou hian haoenei khübü pendou Akhor pholi to jungan loukei.
Joshuaei laukei, “Aila nyi kün khonkutikei?
Hobaje haoenei hao thüka laangshaang yangbü che shaangkei, kho tat sühko kia, hoba
Tou

Hobaje nyi Jerikho hoba khoeibü Choba to jungeibü phatko nyi Ai hoba khoeibü Choba tokei kümlabü; khünei sangshibü peisilei hoba samkeisamuk kho ong kanei soletbü peisilei tegü künlabü, sangnyu kho khulimbo kho phainei khünei huan kiteishi.”
Hibü Joshua hoba wapyobü müt pendou Ai to haula meimeikei, hoba Joshuaei lakjaibü müt hajar khujin pienan haoen kho nangnak hautikei.
Hobaje haoen la sakkuko laukei, “Chühashi, sangnyu kho khulimbo kanei la tholabü, sangnyu phai aenei khünei sangnyu kho ka saako tohau, lausikei kan pendou lamlean kishi.
Kheijinei ngo hoba kü yoa kibü müt pendou sangnyu nyangko anglabü, hoba ladang haoen kün khulimbo loulaje, shaangla tegütham künei haoen thedang ka satkulabü.

Hobaje kün haoeneibü sangnyu ka bangjung asat shongko sangnyu khüka haoen kün khulimbo longlabü, aishanga haoenei laulabü, ‘Shaangla tegütham haoen sen thedang ka satda,’ kho tegü künei haoen thedang ka satlabü.
Hobaje kanei la thoshang ka longlabü hoba sangnyu kho leashi, aishanga
Hobaje ladang kanei sangnyu kho shian aplaje,
Hobaje Joshuaei haoen hautikei hoba haoen la thola haukei hoba Ai chanep ae Ai si Bethel kanglanga kikei, lausikei khüyou kho Joshua mütshuong yoa kikei.
Hobaje Joshua ngeyang enyu pikei, hoba mütshuong huishaikei hoba hao hoba Israelbü jaishou shuong Aibü thedang to angkei.

Hobaje müt pendou khei hao yoa kibü wapyobü mütshuong yoan angkei hoba nyangko yoshaikei hoba sangnyu thedang to loukei, hoba Ai chanep phei aenei shaikei hoba khünei hao si Ai haosi kanglanga yomang che kikei.
Hobaje haoei müt hajar ngao thüng pienkei hoba Ai si Bethel kanglanga sangnyu chanep aenei haoen la thokei.
Kho tegü haoenei müt shuong kho khei sangnyu chanep pheia kibü tan khokei yoan meimeitikei hoba Joshuaei khüyou khünei otkei.

Hobaje ladang Ai Chobaei kho hapbei, haoenei la pangan tongde pikei hoba sangnyua kibü mütshuong hao hoba haoeibü müt shuong pendou Araba thedanga janenbü jih tükdea Israelbü khulimbo lason to haukei, lausikei sangnyu napheinei tan che hao khulimbo la thokei dogo haoei ange.
Hobaje Joshua hoba Israelbü pendouei athükbü tegü haoen thedanga lenkei, hoba yam aeto satkei.
Hobaje haoen shijung haula sangnyua kibü pendou huishaikei, hoba haoenei Joshua shijung haukei hoba haoen sangnyu ka bangjung loukei.
Hobaje Israelbü phai ohaubü müt che ongkei Ai si Bethela jouan akitei, hoba haoenei sangnyu kho alombo kaijembo apyoan Israelbü shuong kho shijung haukei.
Hobaje
Hobaje la thoan kibü dan kho tongde hauan kishang ka longkei, hoba haoei ik kho sengbüyam haoen laangjung longkei, hoba sangnyu khüto atan kho shian apbei hoba haoenei panteiko sangnyua wan sapbukei.

Hobaje ladang Aibü shuongei phai chühngaikei haoenei hapbei, hoba chühashi, sangnyu ka longbü wankhük kho müh sühko angkei hoba haoen hito, thito lae aeto satla huon ühüp, hoba yam to linjung satbü mütshuongei sepeinyu haoen shijung haukei.
Hobaje ladang Joshua hoba Israelbü pendouei huan kibü tan khoei sangnyu kho lebü hoba sangnyu ka longbü wankhük hapbei, kheijineitham haoenei nyibou sepeikei hoba Aibü mütshuong kho haitikei.
Hobaje lubü shuong kho sangnyu ka haoen khulimbo longkei, haoen jijineikei Israelbü kanglanga kikei; at hinei hoba at thinei hoba haoenei haoen kho aokei ajoutiko hoba asattiko haitikei.
Hobaje haoenei Aibü Choba kho lang lapan hao kho Joshua jungto leibakei.

Hobaje ladang Israelbüei yama haoeneibü labou shieikei hoba haoen pendou ashem shongko inei tuongtikei, kheijinei Aia kibü pendou thonleko haitikei, hoba Israelbü pendou Ai to longeikei hoba kho inei shemtikei.
Hobaje khünyet tuongbü müt khei Aibü pendouei bousu yaksa yoan hajar anthüknyi kikei.
Aishanga Aia kibü müt leimailela amautishongko Joshuaei aubu litibü ik asepei.
ei Joshua la sakkubü ngüh tegü Israelbüei shatsinam hoba peisilei haoen shanga sangnyu makletbü nyaksinam tegü künlangkei.
Hibü Joshuaei Ai jikan apbukei hoba ponpen shanga kho kaoen ontolou che la ong yeitikei, tat sühko kho maubü sangnyu che ong ki.

Hibü haoei Aibü Choba chasem sühko bunyu chenei saükei hoba chanyu neplamto Joshuaei ngühkhüm kukei hoba haoenei bunyu ka haoeibü mang sungletkei hoba kho sangnyu bakhün to atshanga phokei hoba tat sühko laangshaang yaangbü che shaangan kia.
Kheijinei Joshuaei Ebal shongha Israel Mühghaü
khangenbou Mosaei Israel shousi shuong la sakkubü tegü hoba Mosa Ngühkhüm lea doan kibü tegü laangei lemshang che kümbei laobou thüka aoeikei namshem che ongkei ajungei hoba khünei haoenei
Hobaje haoei laang thüka haoei dobü Mosaeibü Ngühkhüm chühletan, Israel shousi shuong thedanga dokei.
Hobaje Israelbü pendou hoba haoeneibü leiyeibü shuong hoba songdak jaishou shuong hoba haoeneibü matjembü shuong, ngühkhüm busen jiaepheinei phokei, hoba naphei chenei Levi ungshedbou thedanga
Hobaje longche haoei ngühkhüm le pendoua doan kibü tegü haülabü hoba shedsikhau ngühkhüm pendou wean chühkei.
Mosaei sakkubü ngüh pendou che ongkei üpbo Joshuaei Israelbü tan pendou, yaksa shuong, nashou hanbü shuong, hoba haoen yoa yenla lean kibü pendou kaman kian wekei.
Ladang Jordan napheinei kibü shongh kaodak hoba pholi kaodaka kibü hoba Lebanon thedanga Yungnyu Yaangbü yungkoa kibü Hitbü, Amorbü, Perizbü, Hivbü hoba Jebusbü Choba pendouei kho ditkei,
haoenei Joshua hoba Israelbü to wapyola maangpon chela lean liko yoshaikei.
Lausikei ladang Gibeona kibü mütshuongei Joshuaei Jerikho hoba Ai to ai kümbei kho ditkei,
haoenei lepbolangko kümbei hoba haoen ngühthonbü shuong tegü yeikei, hoba haoenei nyingkou hangbü hoba jephot hangbülangbü lühei khühetbü haoeneibü gadu taaka künkei.
Hobaje ngok hangbü shibülebü haoeneibü youa yukkei hoba neisimei hangbü haoenei lekei, hoba haoeneibü shausiyung wentek pendou kho linbü hoba monpungan apan kikei.
Hobaje haoen Joshua jungto Gilgala shaishang to haukei hoba hao hoba Israel mütshuong to laukei, “Kün kaonyek saabü ka loukei, hibü tou kanei kün to yenshik che kümashi.”
Hobaje Israel mütshuongei Hivbü to laukei, “Aingenyu kan kün yoa kibü müt nyangbükei yinglabü, lai küman kan to yenshik che kümla?”
Hobaje haoenei Joshua to laukei, “Kün kaneibü sambü ki” hoba Joshuaei haoen to laukei, “Kan aoyou? hoba kan lae ka loukei?”
Hobaje haoenei hao to laukei, “
hoba Jordan danjung hauan kibü Amorbü Choba müt nyi to kümbü pendou, Heshonbü Choba Sihon to hoba Ashtarota kibü Bashanbü Choba to kümbü dida.

Hobaje küneibü jaishou shuong hoba kün kaodaka kibü pendouei kün to laukei, ‘Lam shanga shausiyung kaneibü ika jungashi hoba haoen shuokla hauashi, hoba haoen to lenshi: ‘Kün kaneibü sambü, hibü kanei tou kün to yenshik che leashi.’
Kan jungto loulabü chaloua ho wentek küneibü shausiyung shanga chem ka lematham jungan loukei, lausikei tou chühashi kho lina, hoba monpunga;
hoba künei takbü ih shongmok haanbü kikei, lausikei chühashi, khübü kho paknyina hoba kün lama lounyu paibüei küneibü neisimei hoba ngok hanga.”
Hobaje
Hobaje Joshuaei haoen to yenshik kümbei, hoba haoen lang kitila theyolanyobü che kümbei, hoba shuong yoa leiyeibü shuongei haoen to ngüh linyokei.
Hobaje haoenei haoen yoa sangmai küman chalou semnyet kian phaia haoen kho jembü lepsang hoba haoen yoa kida dogo ditkei.
Hobaje Israel shousi shuong wakou haukei, hoba sembounyet haoen sangnyu shuong to loukei. Haoeneibü sangnyu Gibeon Kefira, Beerot hoba Keriatjearim kikei.
Hobaje Israel shousi shuongei haoen to awap, aishanga shuong yoa bunyu shuongei Israel Mühghaü
Lausikei bunyu shuongei shuong to laukei, “Israel Mühghaü
Kho tegü senei kümlabü hoba haoen lang kitilabü, kho khei ayinglonga senei haoen to thebülanbü laüa Mühghaüeibü khauang sen thükto lotlabü.”
Hobaje bunyu shuong khoei haoen to laukei, “Hao lang kitiashi, hoba bunyu shuongei haoen to lenbü tegü tan pendou shanga haoen pendou bushenbü hoba deikhubü la yeikei.”
Hobaje Joshuaei haoen ngakei, hoba haoei haoen to laukei, “Kan kün yoa kian, ‘Kün kan ka lounyu hauan kia,’ dogo aila lepettida?
Hibü tou kan shedsikhau la yeia hoba ngeibü Mühghaü phang shanga deikhubü hoba bushenbü la yeian aaothu ka ladangkei abanglabü.”
Hobaje haoenei Joshua to laukei, “
Hobaje tou chühashi, kün kaibü ika kia, hoba nyi kün to kümlabü ai tükde hoba maiakei dogo chühenda kho kümshi.”
Hobaje haoei haoen to kho tegü jungeikei hoba Israel shousi shuong ik ka leiyenkei hoba haoenei haoen ühaiti.
Hobaje tat sühko haoen kho shuong shanga hoba haoei pienbü shanga bushenbü hoba deikhubü shanga Joshuaei khünyet khangenkukei.

Tou ho longkei, ladang Jerusalembü Choba Adoni- zedekei lai Joshuaei Jerikho hoba kho Choba to kümbü tegü haoei Ai hoba kho Choba to kümbo Ai shian apbei hoba kho khümbo mautikei, hoba lai Gibeona kibü shuong Israelbü yoa sangmai kümbei hoba haoen yoa kibü ditkei,
kheijinei haoen aeibou hatkei, aieilausi Gibeon kho Chobaeibü sangnyu yoa che yingsije, sangnyu yaangbü che kikei, hoba kho Ai to yaangbou hoba khünei kibü müt pendou laakbü hongbü kikei.
Hibü Jerusalem kabü Choba Adonizedekei Hebronbü Choba Hoham, Jarmuthbü Choba Piram to hoba Lakhishbü Choba Jafia to hoba Eglonbü Choba Debie to sühko laukei:
“Kü yoa yoshi hoba kü to thuikai, hoba senei Gibeon mautikho, aishanga haoei Joshua hoba Israelbü to sangmai küma.”

Hibü Amor Choba ngao, Jerusalem, Hebron Choba, Jarmuth Choba, Lakhish Choba, Eglon Choba, haoen pendou liko yoshaikei, hoba haoen hoba haoeneibü sepai pendou yoan Gibeon khulimbo takshatkei, hoba kho khulimbo wapyokei.

Hobaje Gibeonbü shuongei Gilgal shaishang khüto Joshua jungto you sühko louan laukei, “Kaibü sambü shuong ka kaibü ik senetan tepho, kün jungto tongde kaiya hoba kün püetashi, hoba kün to thuikai, aishanga shongh kaodaka kibü Amorbü Choba kün khulimbo liko yoshaiakei.”
Hibü Joshuaei hao hoba wapyobü müt pendou hoba lakjaibü pendou hao yoa Gilgal ka angkei.
ei Joshua to laukei, “No haoen to tehüt, aishanga ngei kaibü ika haoen khümbo kuan apa; haoen yoa ka thea loenlabü müt che ongkei aki.”
Hibü Joshua mangde ong haoen jungto loukei, aishanga langyang sünga hao Gilgal ka haukei.
Hobaje
Hobaje ho longkei, Israelbü thedang ka haoen satjung hauan Beth Horon to yanko kijinei Azekaa haoen to
“Chanyu, no Gibeon thüka atopeiko loashi;
hoba litnyu, no Aijalon pholia atopeiko loashi.”

Hobaje chanyuei atopeiko lokei hoba litnyuei haiyeikei. Khei phang khoei haoeneibü dangbou labou to phok alamshongko. Ho Jashar lea doan aki lo? Hobaje chanyu kho mühjia haiyeiko, hoba chaseko anepbo haiteikei.
Hobaje
Hobaje Joshua hoba Israelbü pendou hao yoa Gilgala shaishang to longkei.
Hobaje khübü Choba ngao satkei, hoba Makkedaa haoen lolo laangpoba hukei.
Hobaje Joshua to ho tegü laukei, “Choba ngao kho Makkedaa laangpoba huan kia.”
Hobaje Joshuaei laukei, “Laangpob koukhüna laang yaangbü baman jinkushi, hoba haoen lomla kho nyangko müt apyoashi;
lausikei kan khünei haiko teki, kaneibü labou shuong shijung hauashi, hoba haoen yoa phaibou thonbou sühko haitiashi, hoba haoen haoeneibü sangnyu shuong to tütti; aishanga
Hobaje haoen amauti shongko hoba haoen yoa satenan kibü shuong khümenan kibü sangnyu khüto ütshongko Joshua hoba Israel shousi shuongei haoen juong haitibü thonbü to loukei.
Kheijinei Makkedaa shaishang khüto Joshua jungto sangmaia sepeinyu longeikei, aoeikei Israel shousi shuong at ongkei khulimbo lishang atopei.
Kheijinei Joshuaei laukei, “Laangpob koukhün ipashi, hoba laangpob ka khübü Choba ngao kü jungto leiba.”
Hobaje laubü tegü haoenei kümbei, hoba khübü Choba ngao Jerusalem Choba, Hebron Choba, Jarmuth Choba, Lakhish Choba hoba Eglon Choba laangpob ka leiyenan hao jungto leian loukei.

Hobaje ladang khübü Choba haoenei Joshua jungto leian loukei, Joshuaei kheijinei Israel mütshuong ngakei, hoba hao yoa haubü lakjaibü thüka konglebü shuong to haoei laukei, “Nyangko kaiya, khübü Choba shuongeibü ngüma kanei kaneibü you phoashi;” hoba haoen nyangko loukei hoba haoeneibü you haoeneibü ngüma phokei.
Hobaje Joshuaei haoen to laukei, “Tehüt ayingsi maang tehün, hau kiashi, hoba maang kaangashi; aishanga kaneibü dangbou shuong aoyou khulimbo kan wapyolaje
Hobaje longche kian, Joshuaei haoen khonkutikei, hoba haoen haitikei, hoba haoen bunyu ngaoa saükei, hoba chasem sühko haoen bunyua saüan phokei.

Hobaje chanyu neplamto Joshuaei ngühkhüm kukei hoba haoenei bunyu ka haoen sungletkei hoba ainei haoen lolo hukei kho laangpob khüna jinan phokukei hoba laangpob koukhüna laang yaangbüei küpan phokei hoba kho tat sühko kia.

Hobaje khünyet kho Joshuaei Makkeda lekei, hoba kho sangnyu hoba khünei kibü Choba inei haitikei; haoei khübü kho hoba khünei kibü müt pendou aokei ajoutiko lemailela mautikei; hoba haoei Jerikho Choba to jungeibü tegü Makkedabü tokei kümbei.
Hobaje Joshua hoba Israelbü pendou hao yoa Makkeda ka meimeian Libna sühkei, hoba Libna khulimbo wapyokei.
Hobaje
Hobaje Joshua hoba Israelbü pendou hao yoa Libna ka meimeian Lakhish sühkei hoba kho khulimbo wapyola lamlekei.
Hobaje
Kheijinei Gezer Choba Horamei Lakhish to thuila loukei, lausikei müt aokei ajoutiko Joshuaei hao hoba haoen müt shuong shemtikei.
Hobaje Joshua hoba Israelbü pendou hao yoa Lakhish ka kukjung Eglon sühkei hoba haoenei kho khulimbo wapyola lamlekei;
Hobaje kaonyek kho haoenei lekei, inei kho leilukukei, hoba khünei kibü müt pendou haoei mautikei, haoei Lakhish to kümbü tegütham khünei kibü müt pendou lemailela mautikei.
Hobaje Joshua hoba Israelbü pendou hao yoa Eglon ka Hebron to angkei hoba haoenei kho khulimbo wapyokei.

Hobaje haoenei kho lekei, hoba haoei Eglon to kümbü pendou phatko khünei kibü Choba hoba kho sangnyu pendou haoei aokei ajoutiko inei mautikei; tokei haoei kho hoba khünei kibü müt pendou lemailela mautikei.
Hobaje Joshua hoba Israelbü pendou hao yoa Debir to sepeijung longaikei, hoba kho khulimbo wapyokei.

Haoenei khünei kibü Choba hoba kho sangnyu pendou haoei lekei; haoenei khübü kho inei mautikei, hoba aokei ajoutiko khünei kibü müt pendou lemailela mautikei. Hobaje haoenei Libna si khoeibü Choba to, hoba Hebron to kümbü tegütham haoenei Debir to jungeikei.
Kho tegü kaonyek pendou shongh kaodak, hoba chaangbou phei hoba pholi kaodak, shimpük kaodak, hoba khübü Choba pendou Joshuaei shian apbei. Israel Mühghaü
Hobaje Joshuaei Kadesh Barnea ka Gaza sühko hoba Goshen ka Gibeon sühko haoen pendou mautikei.
Hobaje khübü Choba pendou hoba haoeneibü kaodak Joshuaei jih chenei ong lekei, aieilausi Israel Mühghaü
Hobaje Joshua hoba Israelbü pendou hao yoa Gilgal shaishang to longeikei.
Hobaje ladang Hazorbü Choba Jabinei kho shangabü ditkei, Madonbü Choba Jobab hoba Shimron si Aksafbü Choba
hoba chanepae kibü shongh kaodaka kibü Choba shuong hoba Khinerot chaangbou phei Arabaa kibü hoba kho pholia kibü hoba chanep Dor shonghkhua kibü,
hoba chaangbou hoba chanepa kibü Kananbü hoba Perizbü hoba shongh kaodaka kibü Hermon, phanga Hivbü jungto haoei ngühlang hautikei.
Hobaje haoen yoa sepai tan tan müt juong khei yungkoa phetsen tegü koli hoba kailong juong yoan haukei,
hoba khübü Choba pendou liko haüyokei hoba haoenei louan Israelbü to wapyola Merom deia shaikei.
Hobaje
Hibü Joshua hoba hao yoa wapyobü mütshuong pendou hao yoa Merom dei nyangko haoen khulimbo mangde loukei, hoba haoen to ik shatkei.
Hobaje
Hobaje
Hobaje kho chaloua Joshua sepeinyu louan Hazor lekei hoba khükabü Choba inei haitikei; aishanga kho thedangto khübü Choba sangnyu pendou thüka Hazor bunyu yeikei.
Hobaje khünei kibü langkeibü pendou hoba Choba pendou Joshuaei haitikei.
Hobaje
Lausikei Joshuaei jikan apbubü Hazor to liman shongha sangnyua kibü sangnyu shuongje Israelbüei jikan üpbu.
Hobaje khübü sangnyua apsilebü peisilei pendou hoba samkeisamuk Israel shousi shuongei soletbü peisilei tegü haoen shanga künkei, lausikei haoen aokei langkei aphoku, pendou inei shemtikei.
ei hao khangenbou Mosa la sakkukei hoba Joshuaei kho tegü kümbei;
Hibü kaodak pendou, shongh kaodak hoba chaangbou phei pendou hoba Goshen kaodak pendou pholi kaodak hoba Araba kaodak hoba Israelbü shongh hoba pholi kaonyek pendou Joshuaei lekei;
khei Halak shongh ka louyenbü Seir sühko tokei Hermon shongh phang Lebanon pholia Baalgad sühko hoba khübü Choba pendou haoei lekei, hoba haoen to ngümbei hoba haoen haitikei.
Khübü Choba pendou to Joshuaei po lounyu jakkei.
Gibeona kibü Hivbü to liman sangnyu cheei ongkei sangmai aküm; pendou wapyoa thükkei.
Aishanga

Hobaje kho jiha Joshua loukei, hoba shongh kaodak pendou ka Hebron ka, Debir ka, Arab ka, Jihuda shongh kaodak pendou ka, hoba Israel shongh kaodak pendou ka Joshuaei Anakim mautikei, haoeneibü sangnyu shuong yoa liko haoen lemailela mautikei.
Israel shousi shuong kaonyeka Anakimbü aokei jouan akitei, khei Gaza, Gath hoba Ashdoda ong at jouan kiteikei.
Kho tegü,
Tou Jordan danjung hauan chaangbou ae Araba pendou chaangbou Araba pholi ka Hermon shongh sühko Israelbüei lebü kaonyek hoba shian apbü Choba shuong habü ki;
Amorbü Choba Sihon, aoei Heshbona kian Arnon pholi thonbüa kibü Aroer hoba yomang jenyua kibü sangnyu ka Ammon shousi shuong leilang Jabbok shumang, Gilead jamde sühko,

hoba Araba chaangbou ae Khinerot yungnyu sühko hoba Araba yungnyu khei Jemdei Yungnyu hoba chaangbou Beth-Jeshimot aenei kibü sühko, hoba chaangbou phei Pisga Shongh you phang yaüentok sühko songdakkei.
Hobaje Refaima jouletbü Bashanbü Choba Og leilang, aoei Edri hoba Ashtarota kia.
Hermon hoba Saleka shongh hoba Bashan pendoua hoba Geshur si Maakatbü leilang sühko hoba Hesbonbü Choba Sihon leilang Gilead jamdea songdakkei.

Jordan danjung hauan chanep ae Lebanon pholia kibü Baalgad ka Seir to angbü Halak shongh sühko Joshua hoba Israel shousi shuongei thükenbü kaonyek Choba shuong hoba Israel phang shuong haoen janbü to chühan,
shongh kaodaka kaonop Araba angleka chaangbou phei yamlamanga Hitbü, Amorbü, Kananbü, Perizbü, Hivbü, hoba Jebuzbü, khübü kho Joshuaei haoenei lela kubü ki.
Jerikho Choba che, Bethel napheinei kibü Ai Choba che,
Jerusalem Choba che, Hebron Choba che,
Jarmut Choba che, Lakish Choba che,
Eglon Choba che, Gezer Choba che,
Debir Choba che, Geder Choba che,
Horma Choba che, Arad Choba che
Libna Choba che, Adullam Choba che;
Makkeda Choba che, Bethel Choba che,
Tappua Choba che, Hefer Choba che;
Afek Choba che, Lasharon Choba che,
Madon Choba che, Hazor Choba che;
Shimronmeron Choba che, Akhshaf Choba che,
Taanak Choba che, Meggido Choba che,
Kadesh Choba che, Karmela Jokneam Choba che;
Dorbü shongh khua Dor Choba che, Gilgala Goyim Choba che,
Tirza Choba che; Choba pendouei khujinto che.
Tou Joshua aeibou baushi sinan kikei; hoba
Jouan kibü kaonyek kho ho ki: Filistia hoba Geshurbü kaonyek pendou;

Ijep thedanga kibü Shihor shumang ka Kananbü dogo weeibü chanep pheiae Ekron leilang sühko; Filistiabü bunyu ngao, Gazabü, Ashdodbü, Ashkelonbü, Gatbü hoba Ekronbü; toukei chaangbou pheia kibü Avimbü yoan;
Kananbüeibü kaonyek pendou hoba Sidonbüeibü Meara, Amorbü leilang Ara Afek sühko;
Hobaje chaangbou ae Gebal si Lebanonbü kaonyek Harmon phang Baalgad ka Lebo Hamat asühshongko;

shongh müt kibü kaonyek pendou Lebanon ka Misrepoth Maim sühko, khei Sidonbü pendou yoan; Israelbü thedang ka ngei haoen shian aplabü; ngei ka la sakkubü tegü nyi kho ong Israelbü la phetphan shanga tükde janshi.
Hibü tou phang gü hoba Manasse phang jamde la kho kaonyek ho jankukei.”
Jordan shumangeibü chaang aephei danan hao yoa Reubenbü si Gadbüei lulueibü phetphan la Mosaei kubü hapbei, laobou
Arnon pholi jenyua kibü sangnyu yoa hoba Medeba kao pholi pendou Dibon sühko;
hoba Amorbü Choba Sihon, aoei Heshbon ka Ammon shousi shuong leilang sühko songdakkei, haoeibü sangnyu pendou,
hoba Gilead hoba Geshur si Maakabü leilang hoba Hermon shongh khümbo Bashan pendou Saleka sühko;
hoba Bashana Og Choba, aoei Ashtarot hoba Edrei (Refaima jouan apyobü) a songdakkei; haoeibü sangle pendoua haabü tegü, aieilausi Mosaei khübü kho thükenkei, hoba haoen shian apbei.
Khei yingasikei Israel shousi shuongei Geshur si Maakabü shian asatti hoba tat sühko Geshur hoba Maakat Israel yoa kia.
Levi phang la ong haoei phetphan aku, haoei haoen la lenbü tegü Israel Mühghaü
Hobaje Mosaei haoen chemdang thüng Reubeneibü shousi chempen la kukei.
Hobaje haoeibü leilang Arnon pholi thonbüa kibü Aoer ka yomang jenyua kibü sangnyu Medeba kao yomang pendou;
Heshbon hoba kho yo kaonyeka kibü sangnyu pendou, Dibon hoba Bamoth Baal Beth Baalmeon;
Jahaz, hoba Kedemot hoba Mefaat;
hoba Keriathaim, hoba Sibma hoba yomanga shongh tokbü Zereth- Shahar;
hoba Beth-Peor hoba Pisga shimpük hoba Beth Jeshimot;

hoba pholi kaodak sangnyu pendou hoba Amorbü Choba Sihon sangle pendou aoei Heshbona songdakkei hoba aoei Midianbü konglebou Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur, hoba Reba kaonyeka kibü Sihon phanga bunyu shuong yoan shian apbei.
Hobaje haitibü shuong yoa jouan kibü Beoreibü shou Balaam thulenbou Israel shousi shuongei inei haitikei.
Hobaje Reuben shousi shuong leilang Jordan hoba kho kommanga kikei. Khünei kibü sang hoba sangnyu shuong kho chemdang thüng Reubenbü shousi shuongei phetphanbü kikei.
Hobaje Gadeibü shousi shuong, Gad phang la Mosaei haoen chemdang thüng kukei.
Hobaje haoeneibü leilang Jazer Gilead sangnyu pendou hoba Ammonbü shousi shuong kaonyek jamde Rabbaa kibü Aroer sühko;
hoba Heshbon ka Ramath-Mizpa sühko, hoba Betonim hoba Mahanaim ka Debir leilang sühko;

hoba pholi kaodaka Beth Haram hoba Bethnimra hoba Sukkot hoba Zafon, hoba Heshbonbü Choba Sihin sangnyu joubü Jordan hoba kho kaijembo chaang naphei Jordan danjung hauan Khineret yungnyu thon sühko kikei.
Khünei kibü sang hoba sangnyu shuong kho haoen chemdang thüng Gadbü shousi shuongei phetphanbü kikei.
Hobaje Mosaei Manasse phang jamde la phetphan kukei; kho haoen phang jamde shousi shuong shanga haoen chemdang thüng ong kikei.
Hobaje haoeneibü leilang Mahanaim ka Bashanbü Choba Og sangle pendou hoba Bashana kibü Jair sangnyu saosem, khübü pendou;
hoba Gilead pheiche, Choba Bashan sangle Ashtarot hoba Edrei sangnyu shuong Manasseeibü shou Makhireibü mütli pheiche shanga haoen chemdang thüng kikei.
Jordan danan Jerikhoeibü chaangbou ae Moab pholia Mosaei jankubü phetphanbü shuong habü ho ki.
Lausikei Mosaei Levi phang la phetphan aku; haoei haoen to lenbü tegü
Hobaje Eleazar ungshedbou hoba Naneibü shou Joshua hoba Israel shousi shuong phang yoa chempen jaishou shuongei Kanan kaodaka Israel shousi shuong la jankubü phet shuong,
ei Mosaeibü ik danko phaang pakbüei phang gü tho shanga sakkubü tegü haoen habü ho kia.
Aieilausi phang penyi thoeibüje Mosaei Jordan danjung hauan kua; lausikei haoen yoa Levi phang laje phetphanla aku.

Aieilausi Josefeibü shousi shuong phang nyi kikei. Manasse hoba Efraim; hoba haoeneibü shatsinam lamshaushang hoba haoeneibü shausiyung kao yoan haoen kila sangnyu shuong to limbo haoei kaonyeka Levi phang la phejan aku.
ei Mosa la sakkubü tegü Israel shousi shuongei kümbei, hoba haoenei kaonyek kho jankei.
Kheijinei Gilgala Jihudabü shousi shuong Joshua jungto loukei, hoba Kanezbü Jefuneibü shou Kalebei hao to laukei, “Kadesh Barneaa no hoba kü shanga
khangenbou Mosaei kaonyek shuchühla hautijinei ngo po saonyi jai kiteikei, hoba ngeibü maangpona kibü tegü hao la ngühlang künan longeikukei.
Khei yingasikei kü yoa haubü shuongei mütshuong maang ka ngaitikei, lausikei
Hobaje khünyet Mosaei theyolanyoko laukei, ‘Maimaitham kaibü you yaüatlangshang kaonyek kho no hoba kaibü shousi shuong shanga ponpen phet kilabü, aieilausi
Hobaje tou chühashi, Israel yamlamanga paijinei
Lausikei Mosaei ngo hautibü chaloua tegü tat sühko ngo sekoktham kia, shangied kibü hau tegü wapyola hoba hau longei dogo lela hau kia.
Hibü
Hobaje Joshuaei hao haükukei hoba Jefuneeibü shou Kaleb la Hebron phetphanla kukei.
Hibü tat sühko Hebron Kenizbü Jefuneeibü phetla yeikei; aieilausi haoei Israel Mühghaü
Tou Arba Anakimbü yoa müt yaangboutham yingbü ka shangied Hebron nyen kho Kiriath-Arba kikei, hoba kaonyek kho wapyo ka solo hapbei.
Tou haoen chemdang thüng Jihuda shousi phang shanga jaletkubü Edom leilang sühko yungthang phei thonbüa kibü Zin yungthang aephei yamlamang sühko kikei.
Hobaje haoen yungthang aenei leilang kho Jemdei Yungnyu thonbü ka hoba yungthang pheiae yeian kibü yungnyu sembung ka.
Hobaje kho Akrabbim to angbü pheiae athakko hauan Zin danjung loukei, hoba Kadesh Barnea yungthang aephei to hauan Hezron danjung loukei, hoba Addar sühko hauan Karka aephei to sepeikei;
hoba kho Azmon danjung hauan Ijep shumang to angkei; hoba leilang yungnyua thonko hauan kikei.
Hobaje chaang aephei leilang Jemdei Yungnyu, Jordan thon sühko kikei, hoba yungkük leilang Jordan yungko ka Jordan thon sühko kikei.
Hobaje leilang kho Beth-Hogla sühko hauan Beth-Araba yungkük danjung haukei, hoba Reubeneibü shou Bohaneibü Laang sühko leilang haukei.

Hobaje yungkük aenei kibü shumang Adummin to angbü to tangyoko Gilgal ae yeian kibü yungkük ae Akhor yomang ka Debir sühko leilang haukei, hoba leilang kho En Shemesh dei danjung hauan Enrogela thonkei;
hoba Hinnom yomang aephei to yungkük Jebus ae sühko leilang haukei, (kho Jerusalem) hoba Refaim yungthang yo thona kibü chanep Hinnom yo
thedang shongh khu sühko ka Neftoa deikük sühko hoba Efron shongha sangnyu shuong sühko leilang haukei hoba leilang kho Baala chanep sühko jangshuokkei, kho Kiriath-Jearim
hoba leilang kho Baala chanep ka sepeian Jearim shongh yungthang ae (kho Chesalon) danjung hauan Seir shongh sühko, hoba Timna yomang danjung hauan Beth- Shemesh sühko yankei.
Hobaje yungthang ae Ekron sühko leilang kikei; hoba Shikkeron sühko leilang haayokei hoba Baala shongh danjung hauan Jabneela thonkei, hoba leilang thonbü kho yungnyua kikei.
Hobaje chanep leilang Yungnyu Yaangbou hoba kho kommang kikei, hoba haoen chemdang thüng Jihuda shousi shuong kommang leilang ho kikei.
Hobaje
Hobaje Anakeibü shousi müt sem, Sheshai, Ahiman, hoba Talami. Anak shousi shuong kho ka Kalebei shian sattikei,
hoba kho ka haoei Debira kibü mütshuong khulimbo angkei, tou Debir nyen shangied Kiriath-Sefer kikei.
Hobaje Kalebei laukei, “Aoei Kiriath-Sefer thükkulaje hoba kho lelaje, hao la yak la kü shou Aksa kulabü.”
Hobaje Kalebeibü jaisina Kenazeibü shou Othnielei sangnyu kho thükan lekei, hoba haoei haoshou Aksa hao la yakla lela kukei.
Hobaje ladang sao hao jungto loukei, saoei bou to sek che phelabü lele hao suletkei, hoba sao saoeibü gadu ka louyenkei hoba Kalebei sao to laukei, “Nyi ai mangsühda?”
Hobaje saoei laukei, “Kü la haülabü che labü; nyi ngo yungkük kaodaka kilabü lele yeitisije, deikük khokei kü la labü.” Hobaje haoei sao la thükae si phangae deikük kukei.
Haoeneibü chemdang thüng Jihuda shousi phang phet ho kikei.
Yungkük Edom leilang ae Jihuda shousi phang sangnyu habü kikei; Kabzeel, Eder hoba Jagur,
Kina, Dimona, hoba Adada,
Kedesh, Hazor, hoba Ithnan;
Zif, Tetem, hoba Bealoth,
Hazor, Hadatta hoba Kerioth Hesron (kho Hazor)
Aman, Shema, hoba Molada;
Hazor Gadda, Heshmon, hoba Beth Pelet;
Hazor Zarshual, Beersheba, hoba Biziothia,
Baala, Iim, hoba Ezem,
Etolad, Chesil, hoba Horma,
Ziglak, Madamama, hoba Sansama,
Lebaot, Shilhim, Ain hoba Rimmon; haoeneibü sang yoan sangnyu pendouei saoto gü.
Shonghyou kaonopa habü ho ki: Eshtaol, Zora, hoba Ashna;
Zanoa, Engannim, Tappua hoba Enam,
Jarmut, Adullam, Sukkot, hoba Azeka,
Shaaraim, Adithaim, Gedera, hoba Gedorothaim, haoen haoeneibü sang yoan sangnyu anthüklei.
Zenan, Hadasha, hoba Migdalead;
Dilean, Mizpa hoba Joktheel;
Lakhish, Bozkath hoba Eglon;
Kabbon, Lahman hoba Kitlis;
Gederot, Beth-dagon, Namaa hoba Makkeda; haoeneibü sang yoan sangnyu anthüklak.
Libna, Ether, hoba Ashan,
Ifta, Ashaa, hoba Nazib
Keila, Akzib hoba Maresha; haoeneibü sang yoan sangnyu gü.
Ekron kho sangnyu hoba sang yoan;
Ekron ka Ashdod nyangko kibü pendou haoeneibü sang yoan yungnyu sühko.
Ashdod kho sangnyu hoba sang; Gaza kho sangnyu hoba sang, Ijep shumang hoba Yungnyu Yaangbü kommang leilang sühko.
Hobaje shongh kaodaka Shanur, Juthir hoba Soko
Danna, hoba Kiriath Sanna (kho Debir);
Anab, Estemo hoba Anim;
Goshen, Holon, hoba Gilo; haoeneibü sang yoan sangnyu anthükche.
Arab, Duma, hoba Eshan,
Janim, Beth-Tappua hoba Afeka;
Humta, Kiriath Arba (kho Hebron) hoba Zior; haoeneibü sang yoan sangnyu gü.
Maon, Karmel, Zif hoba Juta;
Jezreel, Jokdeam, Zanoa.
Kain, Gibea, hoba Timna; haoeneibü sang yoan sangnyu an.
Halhul, Bethzur, hoba Gedor,
Maarat, Beth-anot hoba Eltekon; haoeneibü sang yoan sangnyu lak
Kiriath-Baal (kho Kiriath- Jearim) hoba Rabba; haoeneibü sang yoan sangnyu nyi.
Yamlamanga Beth-Arba, Middin, hoba Sekaka,
Nibshan hoba Jem sangnyu hoba Engedi; haoeneibü sang yoan sangnyu lak.
Hobaje Jerusalema kibü Jebusbüje Jihuda shousi shuongei shian asattien; hibü Jerusalema Jihuda shousi shuong yoa Jebusbü tat sühko kia.
Hobaje Josef shousi shuong shanga janletkubü Jerikhoa Jordan ka angkei, Jerikho shumangeibü chaangbou khei yam kho Jerikho ka shongh kaodak danko Bethel sühko;
hoba kho Bethel ka Luz sühko hoba Arkbü leilang Atarot sühko danjung haukei.
Hobaje kho Jafletbü kaophei ka Horon Sangyou leilang hoba Gezer sühko haukei; hoba khoka haubü yungnyua thonan kikei.
Hobaje Josefeibü thensilen Manasse si Efraim phangei kho haoeneibü phet la lekei.
Hobaje chemdang thüng kubü Efraimeibü shousi shuong leilang hai kikei; chaangbou ae haoeneibü leilang Atarot Addar, Beth Horon Sangkhu sühko,
hoba leilang kho chanep aeto Mikmethath yungthang aeto haukei; hoba leilang kho chaangbou ae danjung haukei:
hoba kho Janoa ka Atarot hoba Naara sühko hoba Jerikho onlangko Jordan to yankei.
Tappua ka chanep aeto Kana shumang sühko leilang haukei hoba kho ka haubü yungnyua thonkei. Efraim shousi phang haoen chemdang thüng phet phanbü ho hai kikei.

Manasseeibü shousi shuong phet ka Efraim shousi shuong shanga den lulu sungenan phobü sangnyu shuong yoan liko haoeneibü sang yoa sangnyu pendou haoeneibü chemdang thüng kubü Efraim shousi shuong phet ho ki.
Hobaje Gezera kibü Kananbü haoenei shian asattien; khoei tat sühko Kananbü Efraim phang yoa kida; lausikei tukosekko kümtilabü sambü yeikei.
Manasse chemdang shanga ho janletkei, aieilausi hao Josefeibü shou jaishoubou kikei. Manaseeibü shou jaishoubou Makir, Gileadeibü bou, haoei Gilead si Bashan lekei, aieilausi hao lakjaibü che kikei.

Hobaje haoen chemdang thüng joubü Manasseeibü shousi shuong shanga Abizer shousi shuong shanga, Helekeibü shousi shuong shanga, Asriel shousi shuong shanga, Shekhem shousi shuong shanga, Hefer shousi shuong shanga, Shenida shousi shuong shanga phet janletkei, jembü chemdang thüng habü ho Josefeibü shou Manasseeibü bousu shousi ki.
Lausikei Makireibü shou, Gileadeibü shou, Hefereibü shou, Zelofahadeibü bousushou aki, yaksa ong kikei, hoba haoeneibü nyen shuong habü ho ki, Mala, Noa, Hogla, Milka hoba Tirzaa.
Hobaje haoenei Eleazar ungshedbou hoba Naneibü shou Joshua hoba bunyubou shuong thedangto louan laukei, “Küneibü jaisina yoa liko kün la phet kula
Hobaje Jordan danjung hauan kibü Bashan hoba Gilead kaonyek to limbo phejan Manasse jungto haukei.
Aieilausi Manaseeibü shousi yoa haoeibü yaksa shousi shuong phet che kikei, hoba Gilead kaodak kho joubü Manasse shousi shuong shanga yeikei.
Hobaje Manasse leilang Asher ka Shekhem thedang Mikmetal hoba khoeibü napheito hauan En-Tappuabü kishang sühko kikei.
Tappua kaonyek Manasse shangabü lausikei Manasse leilanga kibü Tappua Efraim shousi shuong shanga kikei.

Hobaje kho leilang Kana shumang chaangbou aephei sühko yanan kikei; Manasse sangnyua habü sangnyu Efraim shangabü kikei, hoba Manasse leilang shumang chanep aephei kikei, hoba kho yungnyua yoan kikei.
Chaangbou aephei Efraim shangabü chanep aephei Manasse shangabü kikei hoba yungnyu kho haoeneibü hoba chanep phei Asher hoba chaangbou Issakhar onko hauan kikei.
Hobaje Isaakhara Beth Shan hoba kho sang shuong Endorbü hoba khoeibü sang shuong Taanakbü hoba khoeibü sang shuong hoba Megidobü hoba khoeibü sang shuong tokei shongh khu sem yoan Manasse shangabü.
Lausi dogokei Manasse shousi shuongei khübü sangnyua kibü shian asattien, lausikei Kananbü kho kaonyeka kikei.
Hobaje ladang Israelbü hau kiko yeikei haoenei Kananbü kümsilei kaangbüsekbü kümbü shuong la yeitikei hoba haoen lemailela shian üp.
Hobaje Josefeibü shousi shuongei Joshua to laukei, “

Hobaje Joshuaei haoen to laukei, “Kan müt juong yingalonga shongh khüto angashi, hoba khünei kan shanga Perizbü hoba Refaimbü kaonyek kho wapenashi, aishanga Efraim shongh kaodak khoje kan shanga kaang ayen.”
Hobaje Josefeibü shousi shuongei laukei, “Shongh kaodak kho kün shanga soubü aying, hoba Beth Shan hoba kho sangnyu shuong hoba Jezreel pholi kaodak hama kibü Kananbü nameibü tongjin kia.”
Hobaje Joshuaei Josefeibü chemdang Efraim si Manasse chemdang to laukei, “Kan müt juong hoba hau yaangbü ki, kan phejan che ong akilabü;

lausikei shongh kaodak shanga kilabü, aishanga kho yam kiasikei kanei kho imlabü hoba kho thon sühko kan shangabü kilabü, aishanga haoen hau kiasikei hoba nameibü tongjin kiasikei kanei Kananbü shian aplabü.”
Kheijinei Israel shousi pendou liko Shiloa kamshaian Lemshang Neichem dangkei, hoba kaonyek kho shian apbei.
Hobaje Israel shousi yoa phang nyet toukei kaophei ajanletko kikei.
Hobaje Joshuaei Israel shousi shuong to laukei, “Kaneibü pisibou Mühghaü
Kan chung weko ka müt sembang pienashi; ngei haoen hautilabü hoba haoen meimeijung kaonyek shuchühko haulabü hoba haoeneibü phet shanga kaonyek chühletnyu pholabü hoba haoen kü jungto loulabü.
Hobaje haoenei kho phejan la yeiko janlabü; Jihuda chaangbou aenei haoeibü leilanga kilabü hoba Josef chemdang chanep aephei haoeneibü leilanga kilabü.
Kanei kho phejan nyetla janlabü hoba kho janyinbü kho kü jungto hato sungbalabü; hoba
Aishanga kan yoa Levi chemdangje phejan aki, aishanga
Hobaje mütshuong meimeijung haukei, hoba Joshuaei kaonyek shuchühla haubü to ho ngühkhüm kuko laukei, “Pheian chühko paiashi hoba kü jungto sepeinyu ngühlang sungba hoba Shiloa
Hobaje mütshuong haukei hoba kaonyek kho shuchühko haukei hoba kho tulai chenei sangnyu phejan nyetla janbü thüng dokei hoba haoenei kho Shiloa shaishang to Joshua jungto jungan ngaikei.
Hobaje Shiloa
Hobaje Benjamineibü shousi chemdang haoen chemdang thüng janletkei hoba haoeneibü phejan leilang Jihudaeibü shousi shuong si Josefeibü shousi shuong haosi kanglanga kikei.
Hobaje yungkük ae haoeneibü leilang Jordan ka kikei, hoba kho yungkük aephei Jerikho aeto angan chanep ae shongh kaodak danjung haukei, hoba khüka haubü Beth-Aven yama thonan kikei.
Hobaje leilang kho ka haubü chaangbou aephei Luz naphei (kho Bethel) sühko kikei, hoba Beth Horon Sangthon chaangbou aephei kibü shongh nyangko Atarothadar sühko leilang yanan kikei.

Hobaje yungthang kaonyek ka jenshuokan chaangbou aephei sepeinyu leian chaangbou aephei Beth Horon thedanga kibü shongh ka Jihudabü shuong sangnyu che Kiriath Baal (Kiriath Jearim) a thonan kikei; kho chanep aephei kaonyek phejan kikei.
Hobaje yungthang aephei kaonyek phejan Kiriath Jearim thonbü ka kikei, chanep aeto haubü Neftoa deikük sühko leilang kikei.
Hobaje chanep ae Refaim pholia kibü Ben Hinnomeibü pholi thedanga shongh thonbü sühko leilang yanan kikei, hoba kho Hinnom pholi to yanan chaangbou phei Jebusbü ae thona En Rogel sühko yankei.
Hobaje kho athakko chanep aephei Enshemesh to hauan Adummim youa kibü Gelilot sühko haukei hoba Reubeneibü shou Bohan Laang sühko yankei.
Hobaje kho chanep aephei Araba ae danjung hauan Araba sühko yanan kikei.
Hobaje chanep aephei Beth Hogla ae danjung leilang haukei hoba Jordan chaang aephei thonbüa chanep phei Jemdei Yungnyu yungkoa leilang thonan kikei; chaangbou aephei kaonyek leilang ho ki.
Chaangbou kaonyek leilang Jordan kikei. Khübü kaijembo leilang ho haoeneibü chemdang thüng hapbü Benjamineibü shousi shuongeibü phet kikei.
Haoen chemdang thüng kubü Benjamineibü shousi shuongeibü sangnyu habü ki; Jerikho, Beth Hogla hoba Emek-Keziz;
Beth Araba, Zemaraim, hoba Bethel,
Avvim, Para, hoba Ofra;
Chefar Ammoni, Ofni, hoba Geba, haoeneibü sang yoan sangnyu anthüknyi;
Gibeon, Rama, hoba Beerot;
Mizpa, Chefra, hoba Moza
Rekem, Irpeel, hoba Taralah,
Zela, Haelef, hoba Jebus (kho Jerusalem), Gibeat, hoba Kiriath, haoeneibü sangnyu anthüklei. Ho Benjamineibü shousi shuong haoen chemdang thüng hapbü phet ki.
Nyiboubü phejan Simeon shanga khei Simeoneibü shou chung shanga haoeneibü chemdang thüng hapbü; hoba haoeneibü phet Jihuda shousi phet yoa kikei.
Haoeneibü phet shanga haoenei habü ho hapbei. Beersheba (ayingsi Sheba) hoba Malada;
Hazarshual, Bala, hoba Ezem;
Eltolad, Bethul, hoba Horma,
Zielak, Beth Markaboth, hoba Hazar Sura,
hoba Beth Lebaot, hoba Sharuhen, haoeneibü sang yoan sangnyu anthüksem.
Ain, Rimmon, Ether, hoba Ashan, haoeneibü sang yoan sangnyu lei;
hoba khübü sangnyu kaijembo kibü sang pendou Baalath Beer, kho chaangbou phei Rama sühko kikei. Simeoneibü shousi shuong chung haoen chemdang thüng hapbü phet ho ki.

Jihudaeibü shousi shuong phejan ka sungenan Simeomeibü shousi shuong phet kikei, aieilausi Jihudaeibü shousi shuong phet haoen shanga liman kikei, hibü Simeoneibü shousi shuong phet haoeneibü phet yoa kikei.
Hobaje semboubü phejan haoen chemdang to chühan Zebuluneibü shousi shuong shanga kukei hoba haoeneibü phet leilang Sarid sühko kikei,
hoba haoeneibü leilang chanep aenei Marala sühko hauan Dabbeshet sühkei;
hoba chaangbou aenei Sarid ka sepeian chaangbou Kistot Tabor leilang sühko haukei; hoba Daberat hoba Jafia sühko kikei;
hoba kho ka chaangbou aenei Gath Hefer hoba Et Kazin danan Zimmon to haukei, hoba Neah sühko weanjinkei;
hoba leilang yungkük ae Hanathon aephei to hauan Ifiahel yomanga thonan kikei;
hoba Kahat, hoba Nahalal hoba Shimron, hoba Idala hoba Bethlehem sühko haoeneibü sang yoan sangnyu anthüknyi.
Haoeneibü sang yoan khübü sangnyu haoen chemdang to chühan hapbü Zebuluneibü shousi shuong phet ki.
Leiboubü phejan Issakar hoba Issakareibü shousi shuong shanga haoen chemdang to chüh- an kukei.
Hobaje haoeneibü leilang Jezreel Kesulot hoba Shunem,
Hafaraim, Shion, hoba Anaharat;
Rabit, Kishion, hoba Ebez,
Remet, Engannim, Enhadda hoba Beth Pazzez sühko kikei,
hoba Tabor, Shabazuma; hoba Beth Shemesh sühko leilang kikei; hoba haoeneibü leilang Jordana thonan kikei; haoeneibü sang yoa sangnyu anthüklak.
Ho haoeneibü chemdang to chühan hapbü haoeneibü sang yoa sangnyu shuong Issakareibü shousi shuong chemdang phet ki.
Hobaje ngaoboubü phejan Ashereibü shousi shuong phang shanga haoeneibü chemdang to chühan hapbei.
Hobaje haoeneibü leilang Helkat, Hali, Beten, hoba Akhshaf,
Allammelek, Amad, hoba Mishal kikei hoba kho chanep aephei Karmel hoba Shihor, Libnat sühko kikei.
Hobaje chaangbou aephei Beth dagon aephei to sepeian Zebulun chanep aephei Iftahel pholi Beth hoba Neiel sühkei, hoba nanaenei Kabul.
Hobaje Ebron, Rehob, Hammon, hoba Kana, khei Zidon yaangbou sühko haukei.
Hobaje baei lelepbü Tur sangnyu sühko Ram to leilang sepeikei hoba leilang kho Hosa aeto sepeikei hoba khoka haubü Akzib kaonyek nyangko yungnyua thonan kikei.
Umma, Afek, hoba Peho yoan;
haoenei sang yoan khübü sangnyu kho Asher chung shousi shuong chemdang to chühan hapbü phet kikei.
Lakboubü phejan Naftali shousi shuong shanga khei haoen chemdang to chühan Naftali shousi shuong shanga kikei.
Hobaje haoeneibü leilang Helef Zaanammina yembulong hoba Adaminekeb hoba Jabneel ka Lakkum sühko kikei, hoba kho Jordana thonan kikei;
hoba leilang kho chanep ae Azoth Tabor to sepeikei, hoba Hukkok to haukei, hoba kho chaangbou aephei to Zebulun chanep Asher hoba chaangbou ae Jordana Jihuda sühko haukei.
Laang baei kailepbü sangnyu habü ho kikei, Ziddim, Zer, Hammat, Rakkat, hoba Khineret;
Adama, Rama, hoba Hazor,
Kadesh Edrei hoba Enhazor,
Iron, Migdalel, Horem, Beth Anat, hoba Beth Shemesh; haoeneibü sang yoan sangnyu anthükgü;
haoeneibü sang yoa khübü sangnyu kho Naftali chung shousi shuong haoen chemdang to chühan hapbü phet kikei.
Nyetboubü phejan Daneibü shousi chung shanga haoen chemdang to chühan longkei.
Hobaje haoeneibü phet leilang ho kikei; Zora, Eshtaol, hoba Irshemesh,
Shaalabim, Aijalon, hoba Itla,
Elon, Timoa, hoba Ekron,
Eltekeh, Gibbethon hoba Baalath;
Jehud, Bene Berak, hoba Gathrimon;
Mejarkon, Rakkon, hoba Jopa thedanga leilang yoan,

hoba Daneibü shousi shuong chung leilang habü ho danjung haukei; aishanga Dan shousi shuongei hauan Leshem khulimbo wapyokei hoba kho shian apbei hoba kho inei mautian haoeneibü la yeikei, hoba khünei kian haoeneibü bou Dan nyenphai ka Leshem la Dan nyenkukei.
Haoeneibü sang yoa sangnyu habü ho Daneibü shousi shuong chung haoen chemdang to chühan hapbü phet ki.
Kho tegü haoeneibü phet shanga kaonyek leilang janbü thon lekei; hoba Israel shousi shuongei haoen jenyua Naneibü shou Joshua la phet kukei.
eibü ngühkhüm tegü haoenei haoei phebü sangnyu Efraim shongha kibü Timna Sera hao la kukei, hoba haoei khünei sangnyu kümetkei.
Shiloa
Kheijinei
“Israel shousi shuong to hai lenashi: Ngei kan to Mosa danko joyobü tegü satenshang sangnyu pienashi;
müt haitibouei mashikan ayingsi angeko müt at haitijinei khüto satetlanglabü lele; kan shanga habü ho haitibou phoklambou ka satenshang kilabü.

Hobaje haoei khübü sangnyu che to satetlanglabü hoba sangnyu bakhün kishanga lobouei haoeibü ngühlang kho sangnyua konglebou shuongeibü noua thenkulabü hoba haoenei hao haoen jungto sangnyu to leian haulabü, hoba hao la kishang chem che kuko hao haoen yoa kila thüklabü.
Hobaje haitibou phoklambouei hao shijung loualonga kheijinei haoenei haitibou kho haoeibü ik to khümbo akulabü aishanga shangied haoei hao amangsen, lausikei shanshedte haoei haoeibü lepbou haitikei.

Hobaje kho jiha thükkabou ungshedbou ühaishongko ayingsi matjemla shanga hao haoen shuong thedanga aloshongko hao kho sangnyua kilabü, kho phaia ong müt haitibou kho haoeibü sangnyu to sepeinyu longeian haoeibü sangnyu hoba haoeibü chem to ngailabü.”
Hibü Naftali shongh kaodaka kibü Galila Kadesh Efraim shongh kaodaka Shekhem hoba Jihuda shongh kaodaka Kiriath Arba (kho Hebron) phangche pienan phokei.
Hobaje haoei Jordan danan Jerikho chaangbou ae Reuben chung ka yam pholia Bezer hoba Gad chung ka Gileada Ramoth, hoba Manasse chung ka Bashana Golan pienkei.

Israel shousi pendou hoba haoen yoa hombü yenbou shanga pienbü sangnyu khübü kho kikei, hibü aoyou müt atei mashikan haitilaje khüto satetlanglabü hoba shuong thedanga hao aloshongko haitibou phoklambou ika hao ühailabü.
Kheijinei Levi chung leiyeibü shuong Eleazar ungshedbou hoba Israel shousi chung leiyeibü shuong nyangko loukei.
Hobaje Kanan kaodak Shiloa haoenei haoen to laukei, “Kishang sangnyu shuong yoa küneibü samkeisamuk shanga lamshaushang kao kün la kula
Hobaje
Hobaje Kohatbü phangsi chung shanga phejan longkei; hoba Levi phang Aron ungshedboueibü shousi shuong phejan sangnyu anthüksem, Jihuda phang ka Simeon phang ka, hoba Benjamin phang ka hapbei.
Hobaje joubü Kohat shousi shuong phejan sangnyu an Efraim phang chung ka Dana phang si chung ka, hoba Manasse phang jamde ka hapbei.
Hobaje Gershon shousi shu- ong phejan sangnyu anthüksem Issakhar phangsi chung ka Asher phang ka Naftali phang ka hoba Bashana Manasse phang jamde ka hapbei.
Merari shousi shuong phejan haoen chemdang to chühan Reuben phang ka, Gad phang ka hoba Zebulun phang ka sangnyu anthüknyi hapbei.
Hobaje
Hobaje Jihudaeibü shousi phang ka hoba Simeon phang ka nyen weko khübü sangnyu kukei;
hoba khübü kho Kohatbü chung Levi shousi shuong, Aroneibü shousi shuong shanga kikei, aishanga haoenei shaangbou phejan hapbei.
Hobaje haoenei haoen la Jihuda shongh kho kaijembo lamshaushang kao Kiriath Arba kukei, Anak (kho Hebron) bou Arba kikei.
Lausikei kaonyeka yamshui hoba sang shuong haoenei Jefuneeibü shou Kaleb shangabü lela kukei.
Hobaje müt haitibou shanga satenshang sangnyu Hebron yoa kho lamshaushang kao, Libna yoa kho lamshaushang.
Jattir yoa kho lamshaushang kao, Eshtemoa yoa kho lamshaushang kao.
Holon yoa kho lamshaushang kao.
Ain yoa kho lamshaushang kao, Jutta yoa kho lamshaushang kao, hoba Beth-Shema yoa kho lamshaushang kao khübü phang penyi kho ka sangnyu gü haoenei Aron ungshedboueibü shou la kukei.
Hobaje Gibeon yoa kho lamshaushang kao, Geba yoa kho lamshaushang.
Anathot yoa kho lamshaushang kao, hoba Almon yoa kho lamshaushang kao, sangnyu lei Benjamin phang ka kukei.
Aroneibü shousi shuong ungshedbou sangnyu pendouei lamshaushang yoan anthüksem kikei.
Hobaje Levi phang Kohat shousi chemdang shuong, khei joubü Kohat shousi shuong yoa Efraim phang ka haoeneibü phejan sangnyu shuong hapbei.
Hobaje müt haitibü shanga satenshang sangnyu Efraim shongha Shekhem yoan kho lamshaushang kao Gezer yoa kho lamshaushang kao.
Kibzaim yoa kho lamshaushang kao hoba Beth-Horon yoa kho lamshaushang kao, sangnyu lei haoen la kukei.
Elteka yoa kho lamshaushang kao,
Aijalon yoa kho lamshaushang kao, Gathrimon yoa kho lamshaushang kao sangnyu lei Dan phang ka kukei.
Hobaje Taanak yoa kho lamshaushang hoba Gathrimon yoa kho lamshaushang kao, sangnyu penyi Manasse phang jamde ka kukei.
Joubü Kohat shousi shuong chemdang sangnyu pendou an yoan lamshaushang kao kikei.
Hobaje Manasse phang jamde ka sangnyu penyi, müt haitibü satenshang sangnyu Golana Bashan hoba kho lamshaushang kao, sangnyu penyi haoen Gershoneibü shousi Levi chemdang la kukei.
Hobaje Issakar phang ka sangnyu lei Kishon yoa kho lamshaushang kao,
Jarmut yoa lamshaushang kao Engannim yoa kho lamshaushang kao,
hoba Asher phang ka sangnyu lei, Mishal yoa kho lamshaushang kao,
Helkat yoa kho lamshaushang kao, hoba Rehob yoa kho lamshaushang kao
hoba Naftali phang ka sangnyu sem müt haitibü satenshang sangnyu Galila Kadesh yoa lamshaushang Hammoth-Dor yoa kho lamshaushang kao hoba Kartan yoa kho lamshaushang kao.
Gershon phang haoen chemdang to chühan hapbü sangnyu pendouei anthüksem yoan khübü lamshaushang kao kikei.
Hobaje Merarieibü shousi chemdang kho joubü Levi phang la Zebulun phang ka sangnyu lei Jokneam yoa kho lamshaushang kao, Karta yoa kho lamshaushang kao,
Dimna yoa kho lamshaushang kao
hoba Reuben phang ka sangnyu lei, Bezer yoa kho lamshaushang kao,
Kedemoth yoa kho lamshaushang kao hoba Mefaat yoa kho lamshaushang kao.
Hobaje Gad phang ka sangnyu pendouei lei, müt haitibü satenshang sangnyu Gileada Ramoth yoa kho lamshaushang kao, Mahanaim yoa kho lamshaushang kao,
Heshbon yoa kho lamshaushang kao hoba Jezer yoa kho lamshaushang kao;
khübü pendouei Merarieibü shousi shuong joubü Levibü chemdang shuong haoen chemdang shuong to chühan hapbü sangnyu shuong kikei, hoba haoeneibü phejan sangnyu anthüknyi kikei.
Israel shousi shuong phejan janbü kao yoa Levi phang sangnyu pendouei saonyito set yoa khübü lamshaushang kikei.
Khübü sangnyu weko haoen kaijemboa lamshaushang kikei, khübü sangnyu pendou kho tegü kikei.
Hibü haoeneibü pisibou la thekubü kaodak pendou
Hobaje haoei haoeneibü pisibou la thekubü tegü haoen kaijemboa
Hobaje
Kheijinei Joshuaei Rebuenbü hoba Gadbü hoba Manasse chung jamde ngaan haoen to laukei,
Tat sühko khübü chalou juong ka
Hobaje tou haoei haoen to joyolauyobü tegü,
Kaneibü maangpon pendouei, kaneibü soushou pendouei hao khangenla, hao to khapyoan kila, haoeibü ngühkhüm jungeila, haoeibü lamnyu pendoua paila, hoba
Kho tegü Joshuaei haoen haükukei hoba haoen hautikei hoba haoen lulueibü neichem to ngaikei.

Tou Manasse phang jamde la Mosaei Bashana phet- phanla kukei, lausikei lubü jamde la Joshuaei haoeneibü jaisina yoa Jordan danan chanep aenei kukei. Kho to limbo Joshuaei haoen neichem to ngaitijinei haoei haoen haükukei;

hoba haoen to laukei, “Nyaksinam juong, shatsinam juong, hon, chandinam, chinam, namkung hoba neisimei juong yoa kan lulueibü neichem to sepeinyu ngaiashi hoba kaneibü dangbou ka hapbü nyaksinam kaneibü jaisina yoa janyoashi.”
Hobaje Reubeneibü shousi shuong hoba Gadeibü shousi shuong hoba Manasse phang jamde sepeinyu longeian Mosa danko

Hobaje ladang haoen Kanan kaodaka kibü Jordan kaijembo kibü kaonyek to loukei, Reuben shousi shuong hoba Gad shousi shuong hoba Manasse phang jamdeei Jordan nyangko lemshang che dangkei, chühla kho lemshang yaangbü che kikei.

Hobaje Israel shousi shuongei ngühlang che hai ditkei, “Chühashi, Israel shousi shuong shangabü yeila Jordan kaijembo kabü kaonyeka Kanan kaodak thedanga Reuben shousi shuong hoba Gad shousi shuong hoba Manasse phang jamdeei lemshang che danga.”
Hobaje ladang Israel shousi shuongei kho ditkei, Israel shousi shuong tan khümbo haoen khulimbo wapyola haula Shiloa kamshaikei.
Kheijinei Israel shousi shu- ongei Eleazar ungshedboueibü shou Finehas hoba hao yoa bunyu an Israel phang pendou shanga boueibü chung ka bunyu che;
Reuben shousi shuong hoba Gad shousi shuong, Manasse phang jamde jungto Gilead kaodak to hautikei; hoba haoen kho mütpem weko Israelbü hajar yoa bou chung thüka boujai kikei.
Hobaje haoenei Reuben shousi shuong hoba Gad shousi shuong hoba Manasse phang jamde jungto Gilead kaodak to louan haoenei haoen to joyoko laukei,
Peora shabü laobou ka
Hobaje tat kan
Lausi dogokei kaneibü phejan kaonyek asaopoko kialonga khei yingsije
Zeraeibü shou Akhanei khümbo kubü peisileia shed shonbü danko Israelbü shuong phang pendou thükto shieikoe lotkei aying lo? hoba haoeibü shedbü shanga kho müt kho ong amau.’ ”
Kheijinei Reubeneibü shousi shuong hoba Gadeibü shousi shuong hoba Manasse phang jamdeei Israelbü hajar thüka lei- yeibü to laukei,
“Yaangenbou, Mühghaü,
phai sembü ka sepeila, ayingsi khünei juokbü lembüei lemla, ayingsi shausi- yung lembü ayingsi kho thüka sangmai lembü che lemla künei lemshang che dangko kialonga kho
Lausikei phaia kaneibü shousi shuongei küneibü shousi shuong to ‘Israel Mühghaü
Aishanga kan Reuben shousi shuong hoba Gad shousi shuong kan si kün kanglanga
Hibü künei laukei, ‘Kaiya, senei lemshang che lamlekho, juokbü lembü ayingsi haitibü lembü shanga aying.’
Lausikei ho kün si kan kanglanga sen phaiabü meten shuong kanglanga aukabü che kilabü, hoba sen hao junga juokbü lembüei hoba haitibü lembüei hoba sangmai lembüei

Hibü künei laukei, ‘Ladang haoenei kün to ayingsi loulabü jihsiphaia küneibü meten shuong to laulaje ho hai kilabü: Seneibü pisibousi shuongei kümbü lemshang tetsida chüh- ashi, ho you che lemla shanga ayingsi haitibü lembü shanga aying, lausikei kün si kan kanglanga aukabü che ki.’
Haoeibü lembü neichem thedanga

Hobaje ladang ungshedbou Finehas, mütshang thüka bunyu shuong, hoba hao yoa kibü Israelbü hajar thüka kongnyu shuongei Reubeneibü shousi hoba Gadeibü shousi shuong hoba Manasse shousi shuongei lenyo lauyobü ditkei haoen to maang haikei.
Hobaje Eleazar ungshedboueibü shou Finehasei Reubeneibü shousi shuong, Gadeibü shousi shuong hoba Manasseeibü shousi shuong to laukei, “Senei ngekei, tat sen yoa

Hobaje Eleazer ungshedboueibü shou Finehas hoba bunyu shuongei Reuben shousi ka hoba Gad shousi shuong ka Gilead kaodak ka longan Israel shousi shuong jungto Kanan kaodak to ngaikei, hoba haoen jungto nyibou sepeinyu ngühlang sungbakei.
Hobaje kho kümsilei khoei Israel shousi shuongei Mühghaü nyen sangkei, hoba Reuben shousi shuong Gad shousi shuong kibü kaodak leilukula hoba haoen khulimbo wapyola haula touje alou.
Hobaje Reuben si Gad shousi shuongei lemshon kho “Aukabü” dogo nyenkukei, aieilausi haoenei laukei, “Ho sen kanglanga
Chalou lounyu kian phaia ho longkei, ladang
kheijinei Joshuaei Israelbü pendou ka haoeneibü leiyeibü shuong hoba haoeneibü jaishou shuong, haoeneibü matjembü shuong, haoeneibü ikjaibü shuong ngaan haoen to laukei, “Ngo baushi hoba aeibou sina,
hoba
Chühashi, habü jouan kibü phang shuong kan phang shanga phetphanla Jordan ka ngei shian apbü phang pendou yoan chanep aenei Yungnyu Yaangbü sühko, ngei kan la janan kua.
Hobaje
Hibü Mosaeibü Ngühkhüm lea doan kibü pendou khümbo jungeila hoba ho ka maeto ayingsi nanaeto asepeila,
hoba kan yoa jouan kibü habü phang yoa kan akheineplabü ayingsi haoeneibü mühghaü nyen alaueilabü ayingsi haoen nyena athealanlabü; haoen akhangenlabü, ayingsi haoen thedanga kanei akhüpetlabü.
Lausikei tat sühko kanei kümbü tegü
Aishanga
Kan yoa müt cheei hajar che shijung haulabü, aishanga haoei kan to laubü tegü
Hibü
Ayingsi kanei lepde sepeinyu ngaian khübü jouan kibü phang yoa kheiyoko kan haoen jungto hauko hoba haoen kan jungto louko haoen to laolam yaknga kialonga,
ho maisho ngeashi, kaneibü
“Hobaje chühashi, tat ngo kaodak haang tegü hauda; hoba kanei kaneibü maang hoba kaneibü soushoua haüko ngekei, khei kan shanga
Hobaje ho haüthüklabü, kaneibü Mühghaü
Ladang kanei

Kheijinei Joshuaei Israel phang pendou Shekhem to yoshaitikei, hoba Israel jaishou shuong hoba haoeneibü lamleibü shuong hoba haoeneibü matjembü shuong hoba haoeneibü yaangbü ikjaibü shuong ngakei, hoba haoen Mühghaü jungto loukei.
Hobaje Joshuaei mütshuong pendou to laukei, “Israel Mühghaü
Hobaje ngei kaneibü bou Abraham shumang aian thiae ka leijung louan hao Kanan kaodak pendou danko leikei, hoba haoeibü lilabü kaonyu shenko hautikei, hoba ngei hao la Isak kukei.
Hobaje ngei Isak la Jakob si Esau kukei hoba ngei Esau la Seir shongh lela kukei, hoba Jakob hoba haoeibü shousi shuong Ijep kaodak to yankei.
Hobaje ngei Mosa si Aron hautikei, hoba ngei khünei kümbü tegü ngei Ijep limeilangei shieikoekei; hoba phaila ngei haoen leiyenkei.
Hobaje ngei kaneibü pisibou Ijep ka leiyenkei, hoba kan yungnyu to loukei, hoba Ijepbüei kailong hoba kolia setan saklangbü yungnyu sühko kaneibü pisibou shijung loukei.
Hobaje ladang haoenei

Hobaje Jordan danan kibü Amorbü kaodak to ngei kan leian loukei hoba haoenei kan to wapyokei, hoba ngei haoen kaneibü ik to kukei, hoba kanei haoeneibü kaonyek lekei, hoba kan thedanga ngei haoen mautikei.
Kheijinei Moabbü Choba Zipporeibü shou Balakei Israel khulimbo meimeikei hoba wapyokei, hoba haoei Beoreibü shou Balaam ngaan kan to khüklauokla hautikei;
lausikei ngei Balaam to ngüha ale hibü haoei sepeian kan haükukei; kho tegü ngei haoeibü ik ka kan leiyenkei.

Hobaje kanei Jordan danjung hauan Jerikho to loukei, hoba Jerikhobü mütshuong, Amorbü, hoba Perizbü, hoba Kananbü, hoba Hitbü, hoba Girgasbü hoba Hivbü hoba Jebusbü mütshuongei kan khulimbo wap- yokei; hoba ngei haoen kaneibü ik to khümbo kukei.
Hobaje kaneibü laujin ayingsi kaneibü in ajungeiko ong kan thedang ka Amorbü Choba müt nyi yoan haoen shian apbei; ngei kan thedangto naoyang hautikei.
Hobaje kaonyek che laoboua kan ühü, laobou sangnyu shuong kanei ayaü hoba lanei kanei semlüh hoba onang bu akeaong, kanei shauda, ngei kan la kho kukei hoba khünei kan kida.
“Hibü tou kanei
Hobaje
Hobaje noknyühei laukei, “Künei

Aishanga aoei kün leian loukei, hoba küneibü pisibou Ijep kaodak aaochem ka leiyenkei, aoei habü tetsida yaangbü kümbei, hoba kün haubü lamnyu pendoua hoba künei danjung haubü müt pendou ka khümenan phokei, hao küneibü Mühghaü

Kanei

Hibü haoei laukei, “Tou kan yoa kibü küksithang mühghaü sungan apashi, hoba kaneibü maangpon sepeiashi.”
Hobaje mütshuongei Joshua to laukei, “Künei
Hibü khünyet kho Joshuaei mütshuong yoa theyolanyobü che kümbei, hoba haoen la Shekhema ngühkhüm hoba songle ngühkhüm kukei.
Hobaje Joshuaei Mühghaüeibü ngühkhüm lea habü ngüh dokei, hoba haoei laang yaangbü che sungbakei hoba
Hobaje Joshuaei mütshuong pendou to laukei, “Chüh- ashi, ho laang ho sen shanga aukabü che kilabü, aishanga hoei kan to joyobü
Hibü Joshuaei mütshuong haoen mütpem weko haoen jembü phetphan kaodak to ngaitikei.
Hobaje khübü chalou danan phaia ho loushedkei, Naneibü shou
Hobaje Gaash shongh chaaenei Efraim shongh kaodaka kibü haoeneibü phetphan leilang Timnat Seraa haoenei hao khünkei.
Hobaje Joshuaeibü jihsiphai pendoua hoba Joshua phaia kibü jaishou shuong jihsiphai pendoua Israelei

Hobaje Israel shousi shuongei Ijep ka sungbabü Josefeibü lo Shekhemeibü bou Hamoreibü shousi shuong ka Jakobei nam saongaoei jekbü kao hanbüshou Shekhema khünkei, hoba khübü kho Josefeibü shisi shoueibü phet la yeikei.
Hobaje Aroneibü shou Eleazar haikei, hoba haoeibü shou Finehas la kubü Efraim shongh kaodak Gibeaa khünkei.
Tou ho longkei, Joshua haian phaia, Israelbü shuongei

Hobaje Jihudaei haoeibü jaisina Simeon phang to laukei, “Kü la janletkubü kaophei to kü yoa kaiyang, senei Kananbü khulimbo wapyokho hoba ngei kho tegü ka la janletkubü kaophei to ka yoa haulabü.” Hibü Simeon hao yoa haukei.
Kheijinei Jihuda angkei hoba
Haoenei Bezeka Adonibezek hapbei, hoba hao khulimbo wapyokei, hoba haoenei Kananbü hoba Perizbü thükkei.
Lausikei Adonibezek alapouko sattikei; lausikei haoenei hao shijung haukei, hoba hao lapbei, hoba haoeibü ikbem si youbem jeman apbukei.

Hobaje Adonibezekei laukei, “Choba anjinlei haoeneibü ikbem hoba youbem jeman apan ngeibü khümsok phanga atbülebü haushaiko kikei, ngei kümbü tegü kho maimai Mühghaüei kü la ngeitikua.” Hobaje haoenei hao Jerusalem to sungbakei hoba hao khünei haikei.
Hobaje Jihudabü shousi shuongei Jerusalem khulimbo wapyokei, hoba kho lekei, hoba inei wapshembei, hoba sangnyua wan sapbukei.
Hobaje thonla Jihudabü shousi shuongei shongh kaodaka chaangbou aepheia hoba pholi kaodaka kibü Kananbü khulimbo wapyola yankei.
Hobaje Jihudabüei Hebrona kibü Kananbü khulimbo haukei; (tou Hebron kho shangiedje Kiriath Arba kikei) hoba haoenei Sheshai, Ahinaan hoba Talmai thükkei.
Kho ka haoen Debira kibü khulimbo haukei, (Shangiedje Debir nyen kho Kiriath Sefer kikei.)
Hobaje Kalebei laukei, “Aoei Kiriath Sefer thüklaje hoba lelaje, ngei ngeibü nouyangshou Aksa yakla lela hao la kulabü.”
Hobaje Kalebeibü na Kenazeibü shou Othnielei kho lekei, hoba haoei haola haoeibü nouyangshou Aksa hao la yakla lela kukei.
Ladang sao hao jungto loukei, saoei hao to saoeibü bou to sek che phela thungeikei, hoba saoei saoeibü gadu ka lotkei, hoba Kalebei sao to laukei, “Nyi ai mangsühda?”
Saoei hao to laukei, “Kü la jongsak che labü, nyi ngo yungkük kaodaka apyosije kü la deikhün kushi.” Hobaje Kalibei sao la deikhün thükkabou hoba phangaenei kibü deikhünkei kukei.
Hobaje Mosaeibü koueibü mütlang mütli shousi shuong chaangbou aephei Arad nyangko kibü woklong sangnyu ka Jihuda shousi shuong yoa angan Jihuda yam to atkei; hoba haoen hauan mütshuong yoa kikei.
Hobaje Jihudabü shuong Simeonbü shuong yoa haukei, hoba haoenei Zefata kibü shuong thükkei, hoba kho lepde mautikei. Hibü sangnyu nyen kho Horma nyenkei.
Jihudaei toukei Gaza kho kaophei yoan hoba Ekron kho kaophei yoan lekei.
Hobaje
Hobaje Mosaei laubü tegü Kaleb la Hebron kukei, hoba kho ka haoei Anak shousi sem shian apbei,
Lausikei Benjaminbüei Jerusalema kibü Jebusbü shian asatti, hibü tat sühko Jerusalema Benjaminbü yoa Jebusbü kida.
Hobaje Josef chemdang kei Bethel khulimbo angkei, hoba
Hobaje Josef mütliei Bethel pheian chühla hautikei. (Tou sangnyu nyen kho shangiedje Luz kikei.)
Hobaje pheian chühbü shuongei sangnyu ka müt che longko hapbei, hoba haoenei hao to laukei, “Sanoudambo sangnyu to atbü lam künla lenbüma, hoba künei ka to sanouko jungeikho.”
Hobaje haoei haoen la sangnyu lamnyu kho lenkei, hoba haoenei sangnyu kho inei wapshembei, lausikei haoenei müt kho hoba haoen chempen pendou sattikei.
Hobaje müt kho Hitbü kaonyek to haukei, hoba sangnyu che kümbei, hoba kho nyen Luz nyenkei; tat sühko kho nyen kho kia.

Hobaje Manasseei Bethshean hoba kho sanga kibü shuong ayingsi Taanak ayingsi kho sanga kibü shuong ayingsi Dora kibü shuong hoba kho sanga kibü shuong ayingsi, Ibleama kibü shuong, hoba kho sanga kibü shuong ayingsi Meggiddoa kibü shuong, hoba kho sanga kibü shuong shian asatti; lausikei Kananbüei khei ong kaonyeka kikei.
Ladang Israel hau kian apbei, haoenei Kananbü shuong tukosekko kümsilei kümtikei, lausikei haoen lepdeje shian üp.
Hobaje Efraimei Gezera kibü Kananbü shian asatti; lausikei haoen yoa Kananbü Gezera kikei.
Zebulunei Kitrona kibü shuong, ayingsi Nahalola kibü shuong shian asatti; lausikei Kananbü haoen yoa kikei, hoba kümaleia tukosekko kümtibü phanga kilabü lele yeikei.
Asherei Akoa kibü shuong, ayingsi Sidona kibü shuong, ayingsi Ahlaba kibü shuong, ayingsi Akziba kibü shuong, Helbaa kibü shuong, ayingsi Afeka kibü shuong, ayingsi Rehoba kibü shuong shian asatti;
lausikei kaonyeka kibü mütli Kananbü yoa Asherbü kikei; aishanga haoenei haoen shian asatti.

Naftali Beth Shemesa kibü shuong ayingsi Beththanata kibü shuong shian asatti, lausikei haoei Kananbü kho kaonyeka kibü shuong yoa kikei, kheiyingsikei Beth Shemes si Beth Anata kibü shuong shanga kümaleia tukosekko kümlabü lele yeikei.
Hobaje Amorbüei Danbü shongh kaodak to thungan sattikei, aishanga haoenei haoen yomang to louyanla asakku;
lausikei Amorbü Heres shong- ha Aijalona hoba Shaalbima akukkuko ong kikei. Lausikei Josef chemdangeibü ik haoen thüka kaangkhühtham kikei, hoba haoen kümaleia tukosekko kümlabü lele yeikei.
Hobaje Amorbü leilang kho Akrabbim Danshang ka Sela ka thükae sühko angan kikei.
Tou
hoba ho kaodaka kibü to kanei theyolan- yobü akümjan; kanei haoeneibü lemshang leilukujan. Lausikei ngeibü ngüha ale. Aila kanei ho kümbei?
Hibü ngeikei lauda, ‘Kan thedang ka ngei haoen shian asattilabü, lausikei kan shanga haoen dangbou kilabü, hoba haoeneibü mühghaü shuong kan shanga sung che kilabü.’”
Ladang
Hobaje haoenei kho kaonyek to Bokim dogo laukei, hoba khünei haoenei
Ladang Joshuaei mütshuong lintikei, Israelbü wekoei lulueibü phet kibü kaonyek kho lela haukei.
Hobaje Joshua salang sünga hoba jaishou shuong aoyou Joshua phainei langkei kikei, hoba aoyouei
Hobaje Naneibü shou Joshua
Hobaje Gaash shongh chanep aephei Efraim shongh kaodaka haoeibü phet Timnat Heres leilang phanga haoenei hao khünkei.
Hobaje kho meten pendou haoeneibü pisibou jungto yoshaikei; hoba haoen phainei
Hobaje Israel shousi shuongei
Hobaje haoen Ijep kaodak ka leian longbü haoeneibü pisibou Mühghaü
Hobaje haoenei
Hobaje Israel khulimbo
ei haoen la maangsangla kubü tegütham hoba
Kheijinei
Hobaje kho khei yingsikei haoenei matjembü shuong to ngüha ale; aishanga lubü mühghaü shuong phaito pejapelako haukei, hoba haoen lolo khübü to khüpetkei. Haoeneibü pisibou aoyouei
Hobaje ladang ong

Lausikei ladang ong matjembü haikei, haoen sepeinyu satkei, hoba haoeneibü pisibou to kei amaibou kümbo lubü mühghaü shuong phai hauko haoen to khangenko haoen to khüpetkei, haoenei kümbü shuong ka ayingsi haoen maangpon kaangbü ka haoen anang.
Hobaje Israel khulimbo
ngeikei tou ka jaüanje Joshuaei hao haijinei apyobü phang che ongkei haoen thedang ka shian asattilabü.
Khoei haoen danko haoeneibü pisibousi shuongei tegü
Hibü khübü phang chemalaje shian üpbo
Tou lajucheei Kanana wap- yobü shanga ai angekei, khei haoen danko Israelbü takteila shanga
Israelbü meten shuongei wapyo kho ngelabü, khei shangied ngean achühbü shuong la haoei lenla shanga ho kikei.
Phang habü ho ki, Filistiabü bou ngao, hoba Kananbü pendou hoba Sidonbü hoba Lebanon shongha kibü Hivbü Baal Hermon shongh ka Hamat lamnyu to haushang sühko thinei kibü sühko.
Hobaje
Hibü Kananbü, Hitbü, Amorbü, Perizbü Hivbü, hoba Jebusbü yoan Israelbü shousi shuong kikei.
Hobaje haoenei haoeneibü nouyangshousi shuong yakla ngakei, hoba haoeneibü shousi la haoeneibü jembü nouyangshousi shuong kukei, hoba haoenei haoeneibü mühghaü shuong khangenkei.

Hibü Israelbü khulimbo
Lausikei ladang Israelbü shuongei
Hobaje
Hibü kaonyeka po saonyi hakso kikei. Kheijinei Kenazeibü shou Othniel haikei.
Hobaje nyibou Israel shousi shuongei
Hobaje haoei hao jungto Ammon hoba Amalekbü shousi shuong leishaikei; hoba hao haukei hoba Israel thükkei, hoba haoenei pünglong sangnyu lekei.
Hobaje Israel shousi shuongei Moabbü Choba Eglon po anthükset khangenkei.
Lausikei ladang Israelbü shuongei
Hobaje Ehudei hao shanga jijiham akbü in che süng iknop che yaükei, hoba haoei kho mae youshia neimanga hopbei.
Hobaje haoei Moabbü Choba Eglon la khüm kho kukei. Tou Eglon aeibou müt netthembü kikei.
Hobaje ladang Ehudei khüm kho kukhümbei khüm jungbü shuong kho haoei ngaian aptikei.

Lausikei haoje Gilgal nyangko laangeibü heangsho kishang ka sepeijung ngaikei hoba laukei, “O Choba, ka shanga ngei huphang ngüh che kia.” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ngüh tüang,” hoba hao nyangko lobü pendou hao jungka angan apbei.
Hobaje Ehud hao jungto haukei, hoba hao mütpem pop- chem lubüa setan kikei. Hobaje Ehudei laukei, “Ngei ka shanga Mühghaü ka ngühlang che künbakei.” Hobaje hao haoeibü setshang ka meimeikei.
Hobaje Ehudei haoeibü nanae ik kho sungenkei, hoba haoeibü mae youshi ka in kho setenkei, hoba haoeibü shimunga sepbei.
Hobaje in yoa singketkei atkei. Hobaje haabüei in kho naanglepbei; aishanga haoei shimung ka in kho asenen, hoba phet nujung longkei.
Kheijinei Ehud chem ka longkei, hoba shemjang koukap shuong kho khinkukei.
Tou hao satan phaia haoeibü sambü shuong loukei, hoba haoenei hapbei hoba chühashi, popchem shuong kho koukhinjinei khinkhüman kikei, hoba haoenei laukei, “Maimaitham hao shemjang liboua yei suda.”

Hobaje haoen phenyeman ayei shongko haoenei haiyeiko kikei, hoba chühashi, haoei shemjang kho aip, hibü haoenei lipthetlabü sungjung louan khübü kho ipbei, hoba chühashi, haoeneibü bunyubou kho shona tuongan haian kikei.
Haoen haiyoko kijinei Ehud satkei, hoba heangsho jakenbü laang kishang danjung haukei, hoba Seira to satetlangkei.
Hobaje ladang hao loukei, haoei Efraim shongh kaodak kaonyeka teklaang metkei, hoba Israel shousi shuong shongh kaodak ka hao shaangan yankei.
Hobaje haoei haoen to laukei, “Kü phai semashi, aishanga
Hobaje kho chaloua haoenei Moabbü hajar an thüng haitikei; pendou hau kibü hoba lanthükbü ong kikei, hoba müt che ongkei asaten.
Kho tegü kho chaloua Moab kaodak Israelbü ik to lotkei. Hobaje po saolei sühko kaonyeka hakso kikei.
Hobaje hao phainei Amateibü shou Shamgar kikei aoei Filistiabü saongao lak masu nangbü juei haitikei; hoba haoeikei Israelbü khümenkei.
Ehud haian phaia Israelbü shuongei nyibou
Hobaje
Kheijinei Israelbü shuongei thuibü shanga
Tou kho jiha Lappidoteibü yak Debora, thuseinyu saoei Israel matjembo kikei.
Hobaje Efraim shongh kaodak Rama hoba Bethel kanglanga Debora woulong phanga sao setko lekei, hoba Israelbü shuong matjemla sao jungto angkei.
Saoei Kadesh Naftali ka Abinaemeibü shou Barak ngala hautiko hao to laukei, “Israel Mühghaü
Hobaje ngei Jabineibü sepai tan lajamleibou Sisera kan yoa Kishon shumang nyangko haüyola shanga haoeibü kailong hoba se- pai shuong leian longtilabü, hoba ngei kaneibü ik to hao kulabü.”
Barakei sao to laukei, “No kü yoa haukho laua longa ngo haulabü. Lausikei no kü yoa tohaukho laua longa ngo ohaulabü.”
Hobaje saoei laukei, “Ngo tükde ka yoa haulabü, khei yingsikei no laobou lama hauda khoei ka la nyenhang akulabü; aishanga
Hobaje Barakei Zebulun si Naftali Kedesh to ngakei, hoba müt hajar an hao phai to haukei, hoba Debora hao yoa angkei.
Tou Mosaeibü kou Heber ka bakbü Kenit bou Heber Kenitbü ka bangan kikei, hoba Kedesh nyangko Zaanannima yembu long sühko thi aedanga haoei neichem dangko kikei.
Ladang Sisera to Abinoameibü shou Barak Tabor shongh to anga dogo ngetikei.
Sisera nameibü kailong saongao gü Küksithang Haroshet ka Kishon shumang ka hao yoa haubü müt pendou leishaikei.
Hobaje Deboraei Barak to laukei, “Khou; aishanga
Hobaje
Lausikei Barakei kailong hoba sepai tan kho Küksithangbü Haroshet shijung haukei hoba Sisera sepai tan pendou inei shemtikei, müt che ongkei ajouti.
Lausikei Sisera Kenitbü Hebereibü yak Jael, saoeibü neichem lambo youei satkei, aishanga Hazor Choba Jabin hoba Kenitbü Hebereibü chemdang kanglanga sangmai kikei.
Hobaje Sisera to haüyola Jael khong to longkei, hoba hao to laukei, “Kaiyeda, ngeibü bunyubou, kü jungto kaiyeda; tehüt.” Hobaje hao neichem to atkei hoba saoei neiei hao seilepbei.
Hobaje haoei sao to laukei, “Sanoudambo kü la yunglabü dei shisho labü; aieilausi ngo deilada.” Hibü saoei sendei thung che ipbei hoba hao la yungla kukei, hoba hao küplepnyu phokei.
Hobaje haoei sao to laukei, “Neichem koukhüna loashi, hoba müt at louan ka to hanei müt at kiasai dogo phesi aki dogo laushi.”

Lausikei Hebereibü yak Jaelei neichema jangbü bu che sungjung loukei, hoba saoeibü ika bungem che jungkei hoba hao jungto hangsho yankei hoba kaoa ayon shongko nyilit to thüngan jinkukei, aieilausi hüan hao maisho ngakan kikei. Kho tegü hao haikei.

Hobaje chühashi, Barakei Sisera shijung loujinei Jaelei hao to haüyola angkei hoba hao to laukei, “Kaiya, nyi lambü müt kho ngei ka la lenkho.” Hibü hao saoeibü neichem to atkei; hoba chühashi, khünei Sisera haoeibü nyilita neichem phenbü bu ngetan haibü mang lengan kikei.
Hibü kho chaloua Mühghaüei Israelbü shuong thedanga Kananbü Choba Jabin letikei.
Hobaje Israelbü shuongei Kananbü Choba Jabin amauti shongko haoeneibü ikei Kananbü Choba Jabin thüka aei aei thük hapbei.
Kheijinei Debora si Abinoameibü shou Barakei chia atko laukei:
Israela leiyeibü shuongei thük hapbü shanga,
maangnyu angko mütshuongei lembü kubü shanga
kanei
Ditashi, O Choba shuong,
nou haangashi,

ladang no Edom khongthu ka longkei.
Kaonyudakei lühkei,
tokei mühshuong moletnyu atkei.
Haü, sangmei shuongei dei sinan yantikei.
khei hauan Sinai, Israel Mühghaü
Anateibü shou Shamgar chaloua,
Jael chaloua thusheda müt akitei,
hoba walama paibü shuongei kolama paikei.
Israela sangsiyam, sangliphang la yeikei.

shongko haoen thakan apbei.
Haoenei mühghaü shuong pienkei.

Israel, hajar an yoa,
Aih ayingsi aubu che ongkei haplao?
Ngeibü maangpon Israel lajamleibü shuong;
Aoyouei maanglansele haoen lolo lembei, haoen yoa kia.

laujin kipbü ngühlang

Khei Israela sangkhong thüksimin kümsilei shanga.

yaangbü khulimbo louyankei.

Hobaje Zebulun ka sepai leiyeibüeibü

hoba Dan,

Asher atopeiko setakei.
Haoeneibü langkei hailabü,
thushed yeitibü kho Zebuluna mütli kikei.
Hobaje Naftali yamshui shongh thüka.
Choba shuong louan wapyokei,
Taanaka Meggido dei nyangko;
haoenei nam aikei ku ühüp.

Sisera khulimbo wapyokei.

O kü soushou,
hau yaangbüei paijung hauashi.

Kolieibü youmangei paibü ngühlang
yaang longkei.

hangangbüei lauda,
Khünei kibü aeibou khükeiuokeiashi.
Aieilausi
hau yaangbü khulimbo
Yaksa pendou to haünyu kho,
Kenbü Hebereibü yak Jael,
Neichema kibü yaksa pendou yoa sao haünyu.
Haoei dei hikei hoba saoei sendei kukei,
Saoei sendei onbü yaangbü phau chenei
hao la sungbakukei.
Saoei saoeibü ikei neichema
jaangbü bu,
hoba saoeibü ik maeae kümbüleibü
bungüma yembei;
saoei Sisera to thüngkei,
saoei haoeibü khu jangnyinkukei.
Saoei haoeibü nilit netla yeitikukei
hoba hanyetkukei.
Sao thedanga hao khüpetkei,
hao tuongkei hoba hao leketkei.
Sao thedanga hao khüpetkei, hao tuongkei.
Lan hao khüpetkei khünei hao haibü mang leketkei.
Koulom ka saoei chühan yantikei,
hoba ngekkei Siseraeibü nyuei
kümkhünyet ka ngekkei;
“Aila haoeibü kailong halokche phaida?
Aila haoeibü kailong you khülokche phai senngaida?
Saoeibü maanglimaangsang.
Yaangennyu saoei jongaiko sao to laukei,
haü, sao lolo sao to jongaida.
Haoen soletbü peisilei lamyobü
hoba janyobü che aying lo?
Bousu weko medei che che ayingsi nyibang
Sisera laje pa nei soletbü laü jinbü pa nei,
Ngeibü ngüm shangakei jijiham noksa jinbü nei dogo se?”
Kho tegü kaibü dangbou pendou mauashi,
O
lausikei ladang hao jembü haua meimeijung haulaje
haoen chanyu tegütham kitiashi!
Hobaje po saonyi kaonyeka hakso kikei.
Toukei Israelbü shuongei
Hobaje Midianbü ikei Israelbü thükkei, hoba Midianbü kibüei Israelbüei haoen lolo shongha püngkhün, laangbob, hoba lapheishon kümbei.
Hobaje ladang ong Israelbüei kesiong lilabü wenkei, kheijinei Midianbü, Amalekbü, hoba chaangbou aekabü mütshuong longan haoen shiko kikei.
Hobaje haoen khulimbo la tho hoba Gaza sühko hauan kao kabü langle leiluku dogo kümbei hoba Israelbü shanga ai peisileikei aphoku hoba sanlon, masu, ayingsi gadu aikei aphoku.

Aishanga haoen lulueibü samkeisamuk, shatsinam yoa neichem künan angkei, koksüng shoongbü tegü haoen tan tan lotkei, haoen hoba haoeneibü ut wesiawekhümbo kikei. Hobaje kaonyek kho leilukula haoen khüto lotkei.
Hobaje Midianbüei Israelbü aeibou yantikei. Hobaje Israel shousi shuongei
Ladang Israelbü shuongei Midianbü shanga
ei Israelbü shuong jungto thuseibü che hautikei, hoba haoei haoen to laukei “Israelbü Mühghaü
Hobaje ngei kan Ijepbü ik ka khümenkei, hoba kan thedang ka haoen shian apbei hoba haoeneibü kaodak kan la kukei.
Hobaje ngei kan to lenkei, ‘Ngo kaneibü Mühghaü

Hobaje haoei hao to laukei, “O
Hobaje
Hobaje haoei hao to laukei, “Ka thedanga ngei onou hapan kia longa kü to joyobü ho no dogo laula kü la tetsida che lenbüma?”
Ngei ka to sudajada ngo ka jungto louan ngeibü lembü shausiyung sungbaan kho ka thedanga aphoku shongko ha ka tesatma. Hobaje haoei laukei, “No nyibou alongei shongko ngei haiteilabü.”

Hobaje Gideon atkei hoba lonshou che, hoba wen efa che, tokai ajinbü wentek lamlekei, phe kho haoei kam chenei jinkei, hoba haoei shikdei kho chak chenei jinkei, hoba yembulong phang che to sungbakei, hoba lembei.
Hobaje Mühghaü hangangbüei hao to laukei, “Phe hoba tokai ajinbü wentek kho sungashi, hoba kho laangthüka tenan phoashi, hoba shikdei kho yeian jinashi;” hoba kho tegü haoei kümbei.
Kheijinei
Hobaje Gideonei hao
Hobaje
Kheijinei Gideonei khünei
Khüyoutham
Hobaje kho lapheishon thüka
Kheijinei Gideonei haoeibü sambü müt an leikei hoba

Hobaje ladang sangnyua kibü ngeyang enyu pikei, chühashi, Baal lemshang leiluan kikei, hoba kho nyangko kibü Ashera wapan apan kikei, hoba nyiboubü masu pongsu ong lemshang küman kishanga leman kikei.
Hobaje haoen cheei che to laukei, “Ho aoei kümbei?” Hobaje ladang haoenei pheyokei, haoenei laukei, Joasheibü shou Gideonei ho kümsilei kümbei.
Kheijinei sangnyubü püh pendouei Joash to laukei, “Kaibü shou haitila leian kaiyang; aieilausi haoei Baal lemshang leilukua, hoba haoei kho nyangko kibü Ashera wapan koutikei.”

Lausikei Joashei hao khulimbo lobü pendou to laukei, “Kanei Baal shanga tokyolep lo? Ayingsi haoeibü pü lelep lo? Aoyouei hao shanga tekyolaje ngeyangje hao haitilabü, hao mühghaü che, yingalonga haoei hao lolo tokyoko wapyotiashi, aieilausi haoeibü lemshang müt cheei leilukua.”
Hibü kho chalou ka khangan hao to Jerubbaal dogo laukei kho tetlabü ‘Hao khulimbo Baalei tokyotiashi,’ aieilausi haoeibü lemshang haoei leilukua.
Kheijinei Midianbü, Amalekbü chaangbou aenei kibü pendou liko yoshaikei, hoba Jordan danan Jezreel pholia shaikei.
Lausikei

Hobaje haoei Manasse pendou aeto ngühlang künbü hautikei; hoba haoenkei hao phai semla liko yoshaikei; hoba haoei ngühlang künbü Asher to, Zebulun to hoba Naftali to hautikei; hoba haoenei haoen shuokla angkei.
Hobaje Gideonei Mühghaü to laukei, “Nyi lenbü tegü nyi Israel ngeibü ika khümenlep yingalonga,
chühashi, ngei amshanga sanloneibü wi iman phokukho; wia ong nin mongan kia longa, hoba kao pendou ulangtham kia longa kheijinei nyi lenbü tegü nyi Israel ngeibü ikei khümenlabü dogo ngei ngelabü.”
Hobaje kho, kho khei kikei, aishanga hao nyibounyet kho enyu pikei, hoba wi kho haushaian nyatsi wi ka dei khuongphau che semletkei.

Hobaje Gideonei Mühghaü to laukei, “Ngo khulimbo no khau tüangma hoba ngei khei tou ho ong joyokho, ngei ka to sudajada, wi ho toukei che ong aukabü kutiashi; touje wi kho ulangtham aptiashi, hoba kaoen pendoua nin mongtiashi.”
Khüyou kho Mühghaüei kho tegü kümbei, aishanga wi kho ong ulangtham kikei, hoba kao pendou nin dangan kikei.

Kheijinei Jerubbaal (kho Gideon) hoba hao yoa kibü müt pendou tongde meimeikei hoba Harod deikhün nyangko shaikei, hoba Midianbü shaishang kho haoen aenei chanep phei More shongh nyangko pholia kikei.
Hobaje
Hibü tou müt shuongeibü noua ho dittiashi, ‘Aoyou hatko lühko ki, hao Gilead shongh ka chem to ngaiashi.’” Hobaje hajar saoto nyi sepeinyu ngaikei hoba hajar an joukei.
Kheijinei
Hibü haoei haoen dei to leiyankei, hoba
Hobaje sembunga ikei mokjung louan jenbü, müt saongao sem kikei. Lausikei joubü pendou kho dei yungla haoeneibü youkükei khüpetkei.
Hobaje

Hibü mütshuongei haoeneibü insiaubu hoba teklaang jungkei hoba haoei Israel mütli pendou kho mütpem weko lulueibü neichem to ngaitikei. Lausikei saongao sem khoje haiteikei, hoba Midianbü shaishang haoeibü youdang aenei yomanga kikei.
Hobaje khüyoutham
Lausikei no yanla hatalonga, kaibü sambü Pura yoan yanashi;
hoba haoen ai lauyodaje nyi ditlabü. Hobaje phaila shaishang to haula shanga kaibü ik hau kingaitilabü. Kheijinei haoei haoeibü sambü Pura yoa in si aubu jungbü shaishang thükkabou to yankei.
Hobaje koksüng shoongbü tegü yomanga Midianbü, Amalekbü, hoba chaangbou aenei kibü müt pendou phekde yeplepan kikei, hoba yungnyu phetsen tegü tan tan haoeneibü ut aweenko kikei.

Hobaje ladang Gideon loukei, chühashi, müt cheei hao thangbou to mangh che lenko kikei, hoba laukei, “Chühashi, ngei mangh che likei, hoba ditashi, barli wentek che Midianbü shaishang to shanjung louyankei hoba neichem to loukei, hoba khoei thangouan kho tuongkei. Hobaje hekolambo khüpeikei hoba kaoa shimde yepbei.”
Hobaje hao thangbouei jongaiko laukei, “Ho Israelbü müt che Joasheibü shou Gideoneibü in to liman lubü ai aying; haoeibü ika Mühghaüei Midian hoba tan pendou khümbo kua.”
Ladang Gideonei mangh lenbü hoba tetlabü kho ditkei, hao khüpetan kaoa youkükei thungan lembei, hoba Israelbü shaishang to ngaikei, hoba laukei, “Meimeiashi, aishanga
Hobaje müt saongao sem kho tan sem la jankei hoba haoen pendoueibü ika teklaang hoba kongbü thamchak maanga wanthung jinan haoei ika jungtikei.
Hobaje haoei haoen to laukei, “Kü to chühashi, ladang ngo shaishang thükkabou to loulaje, ngei lai kümlaje, kho tegü, kaneikei kümlabü.
Ladang ngei teklaang metlaje, ngo hoba kü yoa kibü pendouei kheijinei shaishang pendou aeka kanei teklaang metshi, hoba laushi, ‘

Hibü Gideon hoba hao yoa müt saongao kho aukoujih asüh shongko haoen lapheibü longsilengko shaishang thükkabou khüto loukei; hoba haoenei teklaang kho metkei. Hobaje haoeneibü ika thamchak shuong kho netla yeiko phetnyinkei.
Hobaje tan sem khoei teklaang metkei hoba thamchak shuong phetnyinkei hoba wansembung kho haoeneibü ik nanaenei hoba haoeneibü mae ika teklaang metla jungkei hoba haoenei uihinkei, “
Hobaje haoen mütpem weko haoen kishang shaishanga lokei, hoba tan pendou laangkei, hoba haoenei uihinkei hoba haoen lintikei.
Hobaje haoenei teklaang saongao sem kho metkei, hoba
Hobaje Israelbü kho Naftali ka hoba Asher ka hoba Manasse pendou ka ngashaikei, hoba Midianbü shijung haukei.
Hobaje Gideonei Efraim shongh kaodak pendou to ngühlang hautiko laukei, “Midianbü khulimbo kaiyena, hoba haoen thedanga Jordan shumang kho leashi, Beth-bara sühko, khei Jordan sühko leashi.”

Hobaje haoenei Midianbü leiyeibü müt nyi Oreb si Zeeb lapbei, hoba haoenei Oreb laanga haitikei. Hobaje Zeeb semlüh nitshanga haitikei, hoba Midian shijung haukei, hoba haoenei Oreb si Zeebeibü khu Jordan danjung Gideon jungto sungbakei.
Kheijinei Efraimbü mütshuongei hao to laukei, “Midianbü to wapyola haujinei kün angabü ho nyi ai kümbei? Hobaje haoenei hao to ngüh kaangko lauyokei.”
Lausikei haoei haoen to laukei, “Tou ngei kan to takteiyoko ai kümjan? Efraim semlüh pienbü kho Abiezer ih nyatbü maibou kho aying lo?
Mühghaüei kaneibü ik to Midianbü leiyeibü Oreb si Zeeb khümbo kukei, kan to takteiyoko ngei ai kümenkei”. Kheijinei haoenei kho ditjinei hao khulimbo haoen khauangbü koujung ngaikei.
Hobaje Gideon Jordan to loukei, hoba kho dankei, hoba hao yoa müt saongao sem semthetkei, lausikei shisho ong haukei.
