Hobaje haoei Sukkotbü to laukei, “Ngei kan to sudajada, kü phai sembü la shausiyung okshi aishanga haoen mühei haiyetnyu kia. Hobaje ngo Midianbü Choba Zeba si Zalmunna phai shijung hauda.”
Hobaje Sukkotbü leiyeibü shuongei laukei, “Ngei kaibü sepai shuong la wentek kulabü lele Zeba si Zalmunna tou kaibü ika kilao?”
Hobaje Gideonei laukei, “Khülonga ladang
Hobaje khoka hao Penuel to angkei hoba haoen to kho khei sukeijakei, hoba Sukkotbüei jong- aibü tegü Penuelbüei jongaikei.
Hobaje haoei Penuelbü to kei laukei, “Ladang ngo sangmaia nyibou longailaje ngei ho lapheishon leilutikulabü.”
Tou Zeba si Zalmunna Karkora kikei, chaangbou aenei kibü tan pendou ka jouan kibü pendou; aishanga in jungbü hajar saongao to saoche tuongkei.
Hobaje Noba si Jogbeha chaangbou neichema kibü lamnyu khüto Gideon angkei, hoba sepai tan yoa khüto wapyokei, aishanga sepai tan alamleko kikei.
Hobaje Zeba si Zammunna laangjung satkei, hoba haoei haoen shieikei, hoba haoei Midianbü Choba müt nyi, Zeba si Zalmunna lapbei hoba sepai tan pendou linjung satkei.
Kheijinei Joasheibü shou Gideon lason ka Heres angshang ka sepeijung loukei.
Hobaje Sukkotbü heshou che lapbei hoba hao to pheyokei; hoba hao shanga haoei Sukkotbü leiyeibü jaishou müt anjinlei to nyet doletan phokei.

Hobaje hao Sukkotbü jungto louan laukei, “Zeba si Zalmunna to chühashi, aoyou shanga kanei kü to phangko laukei, ‘Kaibü eikshuong mühei nyengko kibü la ngei wentek kulabü lele Zeba si Zalmunna ka ika kiasi?’
Hobaje haoei sangnyu ka jaishou shuong lapbei hoba haoei yamkabü jak si bijak sungjung louan khoei Sukkotbü thepetko lenkei.
Haoei tokei Penuelbü laangeibü lapheishon leilutikukei, hoba sangnyua kibü shuong haitikei.”
Kheijinei Zeba si Zalmunna to laukei, “Kanei Tabora haitibü mütshuong kho laibü müt?” Hobaje haoenei jongaikei, “Haoen kei no tegübü kikei. Haoen mütpem weko Chobaeibü shou phatko kikei.”
Gideonei laukei, “Haoen ngeibü jaisinasi shuong, künyueibü shousi shuong ki.
Hobaje haoei haoeibü shou jaishoubou to laukei, “Meimeiashi, hoba haosi haitiashi.” Lausikei heshoubou khoei ik ashaten, aishanga hao hatkei aieilausi hao toukei nashou ong kikei.

Kheijinei Zeba si Zalmunnaei laukei, “No lolo louan haitiashi; aishanga müt kho laibü yingkeije haoeibü haukei kho hima ong ki.” Hobaje Gideon loenkei hoba Zeba si Zalmunna haitikei hoba haoei haosieibü uteibü ngüma kibü asenjang kho sungkei.
Kheijinei Israelbü shuongei Gideon to laukei, “Kün thüka no, kaibü shousi hoba kaibü shisi shousieikei songdakshi, aishanga Midianbü ik ka nyi kün khümenkei.”
Gideonei haoen to laukei, “Ngei kan thüka songadaklabü ayingsi ngeibü shousieikei kan thüka songadaklabü, kan thüka

Hobaje Gideonei haoen to laukei, “Ngei kan ka den che himangsühda; kan mütpem wekoei soletbü peisilei chimen yakmen kü la labü.” (Aishanga khübü kho honeibü chimen yakmen kikei, aieilausi haoen Ishmaelbü kikei.)
Hobaje haoenei jongaikei, “Künei maangnyu angko khübü kho kulabü;” hoba haoenei nei che iman mütpem wekoei luluei soletbü peisilei kho khünei jinkukei.

Hobaje haoei subüjabü honei kümbü nouchi shuong yaüan chühbü kho shekel hon hajar cheto saongao nyet kikei. Khübü kho Midianbü Choba shuongei tetsida shanga lenbü namsek peisilei khapbü hoba nakthüngbü hele ayoko hoba haoeibü uteibü ngüma yakbü peisilei ayoko kikei.

Hobaje Gideonei khoei ungshedbou sao- pobü neisimei che kümbei hoba kho haoeneibü sangnyu Ofraa phokei, hoba Israelbü pendouei kho phai pejapelako satkei, hoba kho ong Gideon si haoeibü chempen shanga sung che yeian apbei.
Kho tegü Israelbü thedanga Midianbü yantikei, hoba haoen touje khu aphonen. Hobaje Gideon hanga po saonyi kaonyeka hakso kikei.
Hobaje Joasheibü shou Jerubbaal ngaikei hoba haoen chema kikei.
Tou Gideoneibü shousi anjinlei kikei, aishanga haoei yak juong kikei.
Hobaje Shekhema kibü thangnyuei hao la bousushou che bukkukei, hoba haoei haoeibü nyen Abimelek nyenkukei.
Hobaje Joasheibü shou Gideon baushi sinan haikei, hoba haobou Joasheibü heea Abiezer chungeibü Ofra sangnyua khünkei.
Gideon haisilengko Israelbüei nyibou sepeian apbei, hoba Baal phai pejapelako jungeikei hoba Baal Berith haoeneibü mühghaü la yeikei.
Hobaje Israelbüei
Hobaje haoenei Jerubbaal, (kho Gideon) haoei Israelbü to maibü pendou kümasikei haoen chemdang to sanou alen.
Tou Jerubbaaleibü shou Abimelek kho nyueibü chempen jungto Shekhem to haukei hoba haoen hoba hao nyueibü chempen pendou to lenkei.
Shekhembü bukmüt pendou to lenashi, “Kan shanga laobou maibou, Jerubbaaleibü shousi anjinlei pendou khoei kan thüka songdakla si cheei ong songdakla? Toukei ngo kaneibü lo hoba phe dogo damenashi.”

Hobaje hao nyueibü chempen shuongei habü ngüh pendou hao shanga Shekhembü pendoueibü nouei ditko laukei, hoba haoeneibü maangponei Abimelek phai semmang sühko yeikei; aishanga haoenei laukei, “Hao küneibü jaisina ki.”
Hobaje haoenei hao la Baal-berith lemshang chem ka chandinam anjinlei kukei, hoba haoei khoei haangalongbü hoba maang ashikbü mütshuong hao phainei semla munam kukei.

Hobaje haoei Ofraa boueibü chem to haukei hoba haoei jaisinasi shuong, Jerubbaaleibü shousi shuong müt anjinlei laang che thüka haitikei. Lausikei Jotham Jerubbaaleibü shou nashoubou thamje joukei, aishanga hao lolo hao huan apbei.
Hobaje Shekhembü müt pendou kamshaikei hoba Milo chung pendou hoba haoen haukei, hoba Shekhema yembueibü thaonyu nyangko Abimelek choba yeitikei.
Ladang kho Jotham to lenkei, hao haukei hoba Gerizim shongha lokei. Hobaje kaang ngekko haoen to laukei, “Mühghaüei kan to ditlabü shanga Shekhembü kü to ditshima.
Nyetche chalou bunyu shuong haoen thüka choba che naangenko pienla haukei hoba haoenei oliv bu jungto hauan laukei, ‘Kün thüka songdakshima!’
Lausikei oliv bunyuei haoen to laukei, ‘Ngei ngeibü haabü laobouei seneibü Mühghaü hoba müt hangentida kho ngei apyoan bunyu thüka soueila haulep lo?’
Hobaje bunyu shuongei bhuklong to laukei, ‘No kaiya, hoba kün thüka songdakashi.’
Lausikei bhuklongei haoen to laukei, ‘Ngei ngeibü teibü apyoan hoba hek maibü apyoan bunyu shuong thüka soueila haulep lo?’
Hobaje bunyu shuongei semlüh long to laukei, ‘No kaiya, hoba kün thüka songdakashi.’
Hobaje semlühlongei haoen to laukei, ‘Ngei ngeibü ih laobouei Mühghaü si müt olintida kho apyoan bunyu thüka soueila haulep lo?’
Kheijinei bunyu pendouei bilong to laukei, ‘No kaiya hoba kün thüka songdakashi.’

Hobaje bilong khoei bunyu shuong to laukei, ‘Tükdebü kanei ngo pienda yingalonga khülonga kaiya hoba ngeibü yeme phanga kanei maanglemashi hoba khei ayinglonga bilong ka wan longashi hoba Lebanon cedar bulong shuong suiashi.’

“Khei yingsije tou kanei Abimelek choba yeitibü kho maia hoba tükdebüei yingalonga hoba kanei Jerubbaal hoba hao chempen to maian jungeikei yingalonga hoba haoeibü kümeileieibü mubü kümbei yingalonga.
(Aishanga kan shanga kübouei wapyokei, hoba haoeibü langkeiei lemla kuko kümbei, hoba Midianbü ik ka kan khümenkei;

hoba tat kanei kübou chempen khulimbo longda hoba haoeibü shousi shuong laang che thüka ong müt anjinlei haitikei, hoba haoeibü sambüsaoeibü shou Abimelek ong Shekhem bukmüt thüka choba yeitikei, aieilausi hao kho kaneibü thenbou ki.)
Kholonga tat kanei maia hoba tükdebüei Jerubbaal hoba haoen chempen to kümbei yingalonga Abimelek to olinangko kishi hoba haoeikei kan to olinangko kishi.
Lausikei kho tegü ayinglonga Abimelek ka wan longashi, hoba Shekhem bukmüt hoba Milo chung suiashi, hoba Shekhem bukmüt hoba Milo chung ka wan longashi hoba Abimelek suiashi.”
Hobaje Jotham laangjung haukei hoba satkei hoba Beer to haukei hoba jai to hatbüei khünei kikei.
Hobaje Abimelekei Israel thüka po sem songdakkei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei Abimelek si Shekhembü kanglanga shabü soushou che hautikei, hoba Shekhembüei Abimelek to maangshat lamlam amaiko kümbei;

khei Jerubbaaleibü shousi müt anjinlei to ik atbü mu loutikei hoba haoeneibü sii haoeneibü jaisina Abimelek la nyeilabü, aoei haoen haitikei; hoba Shekhembü aoyouei haoeibü jaisinasi shuong haitila hao hau kitikei kho shanga.
Hobaje Shekhembü mütshuongei hao khulimbo shongh thüka la thotikei, hoba khüto haubü pendou haoenei maklangkei hoba kho Abimelek la lenkei.
Hobaje Ebedeibü shou Gaal haoeneibü thenbou yoa Shekhem to atkei; hoba Shekhembü mütshuongei hao to maanglembei.

Hobaje haoeneibü sek to koukei, hoba haoeneibü semlühlaak ka semlühhek yoshaikei hoba khübü kho nitkei hoba lem likei hoba haoeneibü mühghaü chem to atkei, hoba shaukoyungko Abimelek to khükkei uokkei.

Hobaje Ebedeibü shou Gaalei laukei, “Abimelek ai? Senei hao khangenlabü lele sen Shekhembü ao ki? Hao Jerubbaaleibü shou hoba hao kongnyubou Zebul aying lo? Shekhemeibü bou Hamur kanei khangenashi; lausikei aila hao khangenla?
Habü mütshuong ngeibü ika kikei tegüje kheijinei ngei Abimelek kuktikhoulabü.” Hobaje haoei Abimelek to laukei, “Kaibü sepai tan juong la yeitiashi hoba longashi!”
Hobaje ladang sangnyu songdakbou Zebulei Ebedeibü shou Gaaleibü ngüh ditkei, hoba hao khauangbü ditkei,
hoba haoei Arumaa Abimelek jungto ngühlang hautiko laukei, “Chühashi, Ebedeibü shou Gaal hoba haoeibü thenbou shuong Shekhem to louakei, hoba chühashi, haoenei no khulimbo sangnyu tensepda.
Hibü tou tao nangnak hauashi, no hoba ka yoa kibü mütshuong hauan seka thoteishi.
Hobaje chanyu phamsi lengko tongde meimeian sangnyu to nujung atshi, hoba chühashi ladang no hoba hao yoa kibü mütshuong no khulimbo longlaje nyi haoen to ka la maibü che kümshi.”
Hibü Abimelek hoba hao yoa kibü mütshuong pendou nangnak meimeikei, hoba Shekhem khulimbo tan leia thoan haiteikei.
Hobaje Ebedeibü shou Gaal longkei hoba sangnyu to atshanga bakhüna lokei, hoba Abimelek hoba hao yoa kibü mütshuong thoshang ka meimeikei.
Hobaje ladang Gaalei mütshuong kho hapbei, haoei Zebul to laukei, “Chühashi, shonghkhu ka mütshuong louyenada!” Hobaje Zebulei hao to laukei, “Nyi shongh shuong yeme kho müt tegü hapbü onga.”
Gaalei nyibou jongaiko laukei, “Chühashi, kaonyek jenyu ka mütshuong louada, hoba tan cheje thulenbü yembu long aeka louada.”
Kheijinei Zebulei hao to laukei, “Senei khangenlabü lele Abimelek ao dogo nyi laubü kho touje kaibü sembung lanei ki? Nyi nyikubü mütshuong habü ho aying lo? Tou hauan haoen to wapyoashi.”
Hobaje Shekhem thüka leiyeibü lean Gaalei Abimelek to wapyola haukei.
Hobaje Abimelekei shijung haukei hoba hao thedanga hao satkei, hoba bakhün to atshang sühkoa müt juong leiluan tuongkei.
Hobaje Abimelek Arumaa kikei, hoba Zebulei Gaal si haoeibü chempen Shekhemaje akienlabü lele shian apbei.
Nyibounyet mütshuong sek to koukei. Hobaje Abimelek la ngetikei.

Hobaje haoei jembü mütshuong kho sungkei hoba tan sem la jankei, hoba seka thoan haiteikei, hoba haoei chühkei hoba chühashi, mütshuong kho sangnyu ka longbü hapbei, hoba haoei haoen khulimbo meimeikei hoba haoen haitikei.
Abimelek hoba hao yoa kibü tan thedang aeto laangkei hoba sangnyu bakhün lamnyua loan kijinei tan penyi khoei seka kibü pendou haitikei.
Hobaje khünyet chaseko Abimelekei sangnyu khulimbo wapyokei, hoba haoei sangnyu kho lekei, hoba khünei kibü mütshuong haitikei, hoba haoei sangnyu kho lemailela mautikei hoba jem phinan phokukei.
Ladang Shekhem laang- chema kibü pendouei kho ditkei haoen El Berith chem lapheishon to atkei.
Hobaje Abimelek to Shekhem laangchema kibü müt pendou kamshaiakei dogo ngetikei.

Hobaje Abimelekei Zalmon shongh to angkei, hao hoba hao yoa kibü müt pendou hoba Abimelekei haoeibü ika wou che jungkei hoba bulong bubhek che wapan attikei hoba kho hekei hoba kho haoeibü phaka pekei. Hobaje hao yoa kibü müt to haoei laukei, “Kanei ngo ai kümbo hapbei, panteiashi, hoba ngei kümbü tegü kümashi.”

Hobaje pendouei kho tegü mütpem wekoei bubhek che che wapletkei hoba Abimelek phai sembei, hoba khubü kho lapheishona shaangan phokukei, hoba kho thüka haoenei lapheishona wan jinkukei, hibü toukei Shekhem laangchem lapheishona kibü müt pendou bousu yaksa hajar che thüng haikei.
Kheijinei Abimelek Thebez to haukei, hoba Thebez khulimbo louan setkei, hoba kho lekei.
Lausikei sangnyu manga hau kibou laangchem che kikei, hoba sangnyua kibü pendou khüto satetlangkei, bousu yaksa pendou haoen lolo khinngailangkei, hoba laangchem chemdak to angan apbei.
Hobaje Abimelek laangchem khüto loukei hoba kho to wapyokei, hoba kho wanei jikkula haujembo laangchem koukhün to haukei.
Hobaje yaksa cheei Abimelekeibü khu to ngünbü laang che baman yantikuan haoeibü khu tetnyinkukei.
Kheijinei haoei haoeibü in si aubu jungbou heshoubou kho ngaan laukei, “Kaibü in setenan ngo haitiashi, aishanga ngo yaksa cheei ong haitikei dogo laulabü;” hoba haoeibü heshoubouei hao haitikei.
Hobaje ladang Israelbüei Abimelek haia dogo ngekei, haoen mütpem weko lulu kishang to linkei.
Kho tegü Abimelekei hao bou khulimbo haoeibü jaisina müt anjinlei haitibü ka Mühghaü phoklambü hao thükto loukei.
Hobaje toukei Shekhembü amaibü kümsilei pendou haoeneibü khua Mühghaüei attikukei. Hobaje haoen thükto Jerubbaaleibü shou Jothameibü khüksiuok loukei.
Hobaje Abimelek phaia Israelbü khümenla Puaeibü shou hoba Dodoeibü shi Tola Issakar ka longkei. Hobaje hao Efraim shongh kaodak Shamira kikei.
Hobaje haoei po saoto sem Israel matjembei. Kho phaia hao haikei hoba Shamira khünkei.
Hao phainei Gileadbü Jair longkei, haoei Israel po saoto nyi matjembei.
Hobaje haoeibü bousushou khujin kikei, hoba haoenei jungeila gadu khujin phokei hoba haoenei Gilead kaoa Havoth aenei sangnyu khujin kikei hoba kho tat sühko kia.
Hobaje Jair haikei, hoba Kamona khünkei.
Hobaje nyibou Israelbüei
Hobaje Israelbü khulimbo
hoba khüpo kho haoenei Israelbü shousi shuong shieinangeikei hoba khonkutikei. Po anthükset Israelbü pendou Jordan danjung hauan Gileada Amorbü kaodaka kibü pendou haoenei khonkutikei.
Hobaje Jihuda khulimbo, Benjamin khulimbo, hoba Efraim chemdang khulimbo wapyola shanga Ammonbü shousi shuongei Jordan danjung haukei, khei yingbü khoei Israel aeibou khonsakko kikei.
Hobaje Israel shousi shu- ongei
Hobaje
Toukei Sidonbü hoba Amalekbü hoba Moabbüei kan khonkutikei hoba kanei kü to ngekkei hoba haoeneibü ik ka ngei kan khümenkei.
Khei yingsikei kanei ngo inletkei hoba lubü mühghaü lembei; hibü touje ngei kan akhümenlabü,
hauashi hoba kanei pienbü mühghaü shuong to ngekashi, kan khonkubü chaloua haoenei kan khümentiashi.”
Hobaje Israelei
Hibü haoenei küksithang mühghaü shuong apbei hoba
Kheijinei Ammonbü liko takshatkei, hoba Gileada shaikei. Hobaje Israel shousi shuong haoen lolo liko yoshaikei, hoba Mizpaa shaikei.
Hobaje mütshuong, Gileada leiyeibü shuongei cheei che to laukei, “Ammonbü shousi shuong khulimbo wapyo khangla ao ki? Gileada kibü pendou thüka hao kongnyubou lelabü.”
Tou Gileadbü Jeftha kho hau yaangbü lakjaibou che kikei, hoba hao asangalan saoeibü shou che kikei hoba Gilead ka Jeftha pakkei.

Hobaje Gileadeibü yakei hao la bousu shousi shuong bukkukei, hoba ladang hao yakeibü shousi shuong chingkei haoenei Jeftha shian sattikei, hoba hao to laukei, “Aboueibü chemaje nyi phet aphanlabü, aishanga no lubü yaksaeibü shou ki.”
Kheijinei haoeibü jaisinasi shuong yo ka hao satkei, hoba Tob kaodaka kikei, hoba Jeftha yoa sousiwat mütshuong jambei hoba haoen hao yoa haukei.
Hobaje jih tuisho kian Ammonbü Israel to wapyo khangkei.
Hobaje ladang Ammonbüei Israel khulimbo wapyokei, Gileadbü jaishou shuongei Tob kaodak ka Jeftha leian loula haukei.
Hobaje haoenei Jeftha to laukei, “Kaiya hoba senei Ammonbü khulimbo wapyola no küneibü leiyeibü la leshi.”
Lausikei Jefthaei Israelbü jaishou shuong to laukei, “Kanei kü to amangsen lo? Hobaje kübou chem ka ngo shian sattikei aying lo? Aila tou khonsaka kijinei kan kü jungto louda?”
Haoenei Jeftha to laukei, “Khei yingbü khoei ong tou künei ka jungto sepeinyu louda, kün yoa no haulabü hoba Ammonbü to wapyolabü, hoba Gileada kibü pendou thüka küneibü khu lelabü.”
Jefthaei Gileadbü jaishou shuong to laukei, “Kanei nyibou ngo chem to leijung louan Ammonbü to wapyosi hoba
Kheijinei Gileadbü jaishou shuongei Jeftha to laukei, “Sen kanglanga
Hibü Jeftha Gileadbü jaishou shuong yoa haukei, hoba mütshuongei hao haoen thüka khu hoba leiyeibü yeitikei, hoba Jefthaei haoeibü ngüh pendou Mizpaa
Hobaje Jefthaei Ammonbü Choba jungto ngühlang künbü hautiko laukei, “Ngeibü kaodak khulimbo wapyola no kü jungto loubü ho ngo khulimbo no ai ki?”
Hobaje Ammonbü Chobaei Jefthaeibü ngühlang künbou to jongaikei, “Aieilausi Ijep ka louan Israelei ngeibü kaodak Arnon ka Jabbok sühko hoba Jordan sühko langa; hibü tou sangmaia kungaiashi.”
Hobaje Jefthaei nyibou Ammonbü Choba jungto ngühlang künbü hautikei.
Hobaje hao to laukei, “Hai, Jefthaei lauda, Israelei Moab kaodak ayingsi Ammonbü kaodak alang.
Lausikei ladang Ijep ka angkei, Israelbü Saklangbü yungnyu to haukei hoba Kadesh to loukei.

Kheijinei Israelei Edombü Choba jungto ngühlang hautiko laukei, ‘Kaibü kaodak danko kün hautishi, dogo künei sudajada;’ lausikei Edombü Chobaei ngüha ale. Kho tegü toukei haoenei Moabbü Choba jungto hautikei. Lausikei haoei ü dogo laukei. Hibü Israelbü Kadesha kikei.
Kheijinei haoenei yamlamang danko haukei, hoba Edom kaodak si Moab kaodak chaangbou ae sühkei, hoba Arnon jipheinei sühkei, lausikei haoen Moab kaophei to üt, aishanga Arnon kho Moab leilang kikei.
Kheijinei Israelei Amorbü Choba Sihon hoba Heshbonbü Choba jungto ngühlang künbü hautikei. Hobaje Israelei hao to laukei, ‘Kaneibü kaodak danko küneibü kaodak to kün hautishi dogo künei sudajada.’
Lausikei Sihonei haoeneibü leilang dantila Israel to maangalem, hibü Sihonei haoeibü mütli pendou yoshaitikei; hoba Jahaza shaikei, hoba Israel to wapyokei.
Hobaje
Hobaje haoenei Arnon ka Jabbok sühko hoba yamlamang ka Jordan sühko Amorbü kaodak pendou lekei.
Hibü tou kho tegü
Kaibü mühghaü Khemoshei ai ka la kukei, kho alelep lo? Hobaje
Tou Moabbü Choba Zippereibü shou Balak toje no maibou sai?
Ladang Israel Heshbon hoba kho sangnyu shuonga hoba Aroer hoba kho sang shuonga hoba Arnon yungkoa sangnyu pendoua po saongao sem kikei, kheijinei nyi aila kho jihaphaia sepeinyu alengai?
Hibü ngei no khulimbo shabü ashon hoba kü to wapyobüei nyi kü to amaibü jungeida,
Lausikei Ammonbü Chobaei Jefthaei ngühlang laobou hao jungto hautikei kho aditku.
Kheijinei
Hobaje Jefthaei
hoba ladang ngei Ammonbü thüka thük hapan longeilaje ngeibü chem koukhün ka ao kü to haüyola loulaje
Hibü haoen khulimbo wap- yola Jefthaei Ammonbü jungto danthetjung haukei, hoba
Hobaje haoei Aroer ka Minnith kommaang sühko, sangnyu saoche, hoba Abel Keramim sühko hoba juong haitiko haoen thükkei. Kho tegü Ammonbü Israelbü phanga phokei.

Kheijinei Jeftha haoeibü chem Mizpa to longeikei; hoba chühashi, haoeibü shou senkaangbü jungan saikosaiko hao shuokla longkei, sao kho, haoeibü shou che kho ong kikei. Sao to liman haoei bousu yaksa shousi che ongkei akitei.
Hobaje ladang haoei sao hapbei haoei haoeibü neisimei jitnyinkei, hoba laukei, “Ügütü, ngeibü nouyangshou! Nyi ngo maiko yantia, hoba nyi ngo khonsak yaang yeitia; aishanga ngei
Hobaje saoei hao to laukei, “Abou, nyi
Hobaje saoei bou to laukei, “Kü shanga ho ong kümshima, lit nyi kü mütpem apyokai, khünei ngo shongh to angan nongailabü hoba ngo hoba ngeibü himshuong saosüngbü medei manghaaplabü.”

Hobaje haoei laukei, “Hauashi.” Hobaje haoei sao lit nyi hautikei; hoba sao bangjung haukei; sao hoba saoeibü himshousi shuong shongh to angan sao saosüngbü medei jih waangko mang haapbei. Aieilausi sao saosüngbü medei kikei.
Hobaje lit nyi thonlama sao bou jungto ngaikei, aoei haoei theletbü tegü sao to kümbei; hoba saoei ladangkei bousu angeko kikei. Hobaje Israela ho song che yeian apbei.
Khei Israelbü sao shuongei po weko Gileadbü Jefthaeibü nouyangnyu mang haapla po chenei chalou leinyet haukei.
Hobaje Efraimbü liko kamshaikei hoba Zafon danko haukei hoba Jeftha to laukei, “Aila Ammonbü khulimbo wapyola danjung haukei hoba künje anga? Künei ka thükto kaibü chem jikan apbulabü.”
Hobaje Jefthaei haoen to laukei, “Ngo ngeibü mütli Ammonbü to aeibou dangan kikei; hoba ngei kan ngajinei kanei haoeneibü ik ka kün akhümen.
Hobaje ladang kanei ngo akhümenlabü dogo chühenkei ngei ngeibü langkei ngeibü ika jungan Ammonbü khulimbo danjung haukei, hoba

Kheijinei Jefthaei haoeibü mütli pendou leishaikei hoba Efraim to wapyokei, hoba Gileadbüei Efraim shikei, aieilausi haoenei laukei, “Kan Efraim ka satbü shuong kan Gileadbü, Efraim si Manasse yoa kibü shuong.”

Hobaje Efraimbü khulimbo Gileadbüei Jordan dei khatshang kaian sungkei. Hobaje ladang Efraim ka satbü atei, “Ngo dantikai,” dogo laulaje Gileadbüei hao to laukei, “No Efraimbü sai?” Ladang haoei, “Aying,” dogo laulaje,

haoenei hao to laulabü, “Khülonga Shibboleth dogo laushi,” hoba haoei laukei, “Sibboleth,” aishanga haoei ngüh tükde alongen; kheijinei haoenei hao lapjung loukei hoba Jordan dei khatshanga haitiko lekei. Hobaje kho jiha Efraimbü hajar saonyito nyi haitikei.
Jefthaei po nyet Israelbü matjembei. Kho phaia Gileadeibü bou Jeftha haikei, hoba Gileada haoeibü sangnyua khünkei.
Hao phainei Bethlehembü Ibzanei Israel matjembei.

Haoeibü bousu shousi khujin kikei; hoba yaksa shou khujin kho haoei kounyangsi shuong to chem kantikei, hoba haoshou bousu shuong shanga küksithang ka lubü yaksa khujin ngakukei. Hobaje haoei po nyet Israel matjembei.
Kho phaia Ibzan haikei, hoba Bethlehema hao khünkei.
Hao phainei Zebulunbü Elonei Israel matjembei, hoba haoei po an Israel matjembei.
Kho phaia Zebulunbü Elon haikei hoba Zebulun kaodak Aijalona khünkei.
Hao phainei Pirathonbü Hilleleibü shou Abdonei Israel matjembei.
Haoeibü shou saonyi hoba shi bousu khujin kikei, hoba haoen gadu anjineileia setkei, hoba haoei po set Israel matjembei.
Hobaje Pirathonbü Hilleleibü shou Abdon haikei, hoba Amalekbü shongh kaodak Efraim kaonyeka Pirathona khünkei.
Hobaje nyibou Israelbüei ai
Hobaje Danbü phang ka Zorabü che nyenei Manoa kikei, hoba yak angkong kikei, hoba shou abuk.
Hobaje
khoei maangsangashi, ih ayingsi nyakidei teyung, hoba asaopobü aikei teshau.

Aishanga ditashi, no mangakongko aplabü hoba bousu shou che buklabü. Haoeibü khua khujin ajinkulabü, aishanga bukjinei thama nashou kho Mühghaü shanga Nazarit che kilabü hoba Filistiabü ik ka haoei Israelbü khümenla khanglabü.”

Kheijinei yaksanyuei jembü lao to lenkei, “Mühghaü müt che kü jungto loukei, hoba haoeibü thenyek Mühghaüeibü hangangbü phatko aeibou hatlamoklabü kikei, hao lakaje ngei hao to aphe, hoba haoei kü la haoeibü nyen alen;

lausikei haoei kü to laukei, ‘Chühashi, no mang akongko aplabü, hoba bousushou che buklabü; hibü ih ayingsi nyakidei teyung hoba asaopobü aikei teshau, aishanga nashou kho buknyet ka hao hainyet sühko Mühghaü shanga Nazarit che kilabü.’ ”
Kheijinei Manoaei
Hobaje Mühghaüei Manoaeibü ngüha lekukei. Hobaje
Hobaje yaksanyu kho panteiko laangkei hoba saoeibü lao to laukei, “Chüh- ashi, nyetche kü jungto longbü müt kho kü jungto longakei.”
Hobaje Manoa meimeikei hoba yakphai to haukei, hoba müt kho jungto louan hao to laukei, “Ho yaksa to joyobü kho no sai?” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Haü, kho ngo.”
Hobaje Manoaei laukei, “Ladang kaibü ngüh haüthüklaje shoueibü langkei haang ailai kila, hoba haoei ai kümla?”
Hobaje
Semlüh hek ka longbü aikei saoei ashaulabü, ayingsi sao la ih ayingsi nyakidei teyungti ayingsi asaopobü peisilei aikei ashaulabü; ngei sao la sakkubü pendou sao la jungeitiashi.
Hobaje Manoaei
Hobaje
Hobaje Manoaei
Hobaje
Hibü Manoaei lonshou kho shausiyung lembü yoa lekei hoba
Hobaje ladang lemshang ka wanlong kho müh ae angkei,
Lausikei
Hobaje Manoaei haoyak to laukei, “Maimaitham seti hailabü, aieilausi setiei Mühghaü hapa.”
Lausikei hao yakei laukei, “
Hobaje yaksa khoei bousushou che bukkei, hoba haoeibü nyen Samson nyenkei, hoba nashou kho chingkei. Hobaje
Hobaje Zora hoba Eshtaol kanglanga Mahanedana hao to
Hobaje Samson Timna to yankei, hoba Timnaa haoei Filistiabü yaksa at hapbei.
Kheijinei hao angkei hoba nyusibou to laukei, “Ngei Timnaa Filistiabü yaksa yoa yaksa che hapa; hibü tou ngeibü yak shanga sao leibakushi.”

Lausikei nyusibouei hao to laukei, “Akipbü Filistiabü ka ong kaibü yakla lelabü lele kaibü thenboulenbou yaksa yoa ayingsi sen mütli yoa yaksa che ongkei aki lo?” Lausikei Samsonei bou to laukei, “Sao kü la leibakushi, aishanga sao kü la maikua.”
Lausikei nyusibouei kho
Kheijinei Samson nyusibou yoa Timna to yankei hoba Timnaa semlüh sek to loukei. Hobaje chühashi, molosaonyu heshouabü cheei ngühko phangkei.
Hobaje
Hobaje hao louyankei hoba yaksanyu kho to joyokei, hoba Samsonei sao maikukei.
Hobaje longche kian, haoei sao lela sepeikei, hoba haoei molosaonyu haibü mang kho chühla atkei hoba chühashi, molosaonyu mang khünei nyangkit oman hoba naodei kikei.

Haoei kho haoeibü ika jungkei hoba haoei kho shauko shauko haukei hoba haobou si haonyu jungto loukei, hoba haoen la kukei, hoba haoenei shaukei. Lausikei haoei molosaonyu haibü mang ka sungkei dogo alen.
Hobaje haobou yaksanyu jungto yankei, hoba Samsonei khünei lem che likei; aishanga kho tegü heshou shuongei kümbo kikei.
Hobaje ladang mütshuongei hao hapbei, haoenei hao yoa kila jenabou khujin leian loukei.

Hobaje Samsonei haoen to laukei, “Tou ngei kan ka phenyemlabü che phekho; lem chalou nyet kanglanga kanei kü la kho ai yingkeije lenena longa hoba lamena longa, kheijinei ngei kan la phemba mangyuk khujin hoba lem kabü mangyuk khujin kukho, lausikei kanei kho kü la awanenku longa kheijinei kanei phemba mangyuk khujin hoba lem kabü mangyuk khujin kü la kulabü.” Hobaje haoenei hao to laukei, “Künei ditanchühkho, nyi phenyemlabü kho lenshima.”
Hobaje haoei haoen to laukei,
“Shaubou ka den che shaulabü longkei;
Hau kibü ka den che teibü longkei”
Hobaje sembounyetkei haoenei phenyemlabü kho alenen.

Leibounyeta haoenei Samsoneibü yak to lenkei, “Phenyemlabü kho ai yingkeije kaibü lao kho suletashi, khei aying longa no hoba kaibü boueibü chem künei wanei jikan apbulabü. Kün shale phamtila nyi kün ngashaikei sai?”

Hobaje hao thedanga Samsoneibü yak haapbei hoba laukei, “Nyi ngo mangsenda, nyi ngoje asanouda; kün sangbü thedanga nyi phenyemlabü che kukei hoba kho ai yingkeije nyi kü la alen.” Hobaje haoei sao to laukei, “Chühashi, ngei kü bou ayingsi künyu lakei alen, hoba ka la je lenlep lo?”
Hobaje haoen lem athonshongko saoei chalou nyetnyet haapbei, hoba nyetbounyet haoei sao to lenkei, aieilausi saoei hao aeibou thungeikei. Kheijinei saoei jembü sangbü la phen- yemlabü kho lenkei.
Hobaje sangnyubü shuongei nyetbounyet chanyu anepjinei hao la lenkei.
“Naodei toje ai teibou?
Molosaonyu toje ai hau kibou?”
Hobaje haoei laukei,
“Ngeibü masu saoenei kao alaünyinku tegüje,
kanei ngeibü phenyemlabü telamenkhoulabü.”
Hobaje
Hobaje Samsonei haoyak kho haoeibü thangbou aoei hao hangkei hao la kukei.
Lausikei longche kian, whet youshou latbü jiha Samsonei lonshou che jungan yak peanchühla yankei, hoba haoei laukei, “Ngo yak jungto shemjang to atlabü.” Lausikei saoeibü bouei atla asakku.
Hobaje saoeibü bouei laukei, “Maimaitham nyi sao lepde mangsenda dogo dambei; hibü ngei ka thangbou la sao kua. Saoeibü na aei saomaibü ayinglo? Sanoudambo sao jeila na ong leashi.”
Hobaje Samsonei haoen to laukei, “Toubüaje ngei Filistiabü to ladang amaibü kümlaje kü la shed khühkula akaklabü!”
Hibü Samsonei hauan selong saongao sem lapbei, hoba wanemshang sungbaan haoei mei si mei khüh- yoan mei penyi bang kanglanga wanemshang che che khühkukei.
Hobaje ladang haoei wanemshanga wan sapbukei, haoei selong shuong kho Filistiabüeibü sek youshou angko kishang to hautikukei hoba youthep hoba youshou angko kibü hoba oliv bamang jikan apbukei.

Kheijinei Filistiabüei laukei, “Ho aoei kümbei?” Hobaje haoenei laukei, “Timna boueibü kounyangbou Samson; aieilausi haoei sao yakla lekei hoba sao haoeibü thangbou la kuan apbei. Hobaje Filistiabü angkei hoba sao hoba saoeibü bou wanei juokettikei.”
Hobaje Samsonei haoen to laukei, “Kanei hai kümda yinga longa, ngei kan to phoklamlabü, kho phaia ong ngei nanglabü.”
Hobaje haoei youshon si youshi to meitiko juong haitikei, hoba hao louyankei hoba Etam laanglip poba kikei.
Kheijinei Filistiabü angkei hoba Jihudaa shaikei hoba Lehia shikei.
Hobaje Jihuda mütshuongei laukei, “Aila kün khulimbo kan longkei?” Haoenei laukei, “Haoei kün to kümbü tegü hao to kümlabü lele kün Samson khühla longkei.”

Kheijinei Jihudabü müt hajar sem Etam laanglip pob to louyankei, hoba Samson to laukei, “Filistiabü sen thüka songdakbü dogo nyi angekei lo? Khülonga ho nyi kün to ai kümbei?”. Hobaje haoei haoen to jongaikei, “Kü to haoenei kümbü tegü ngeikei haoen to kümbei.”
Hobaje haoenei hao to laukei, “Filistiabü ik to künei no kula shanga no khühla kün louyankei.” Samsonei haoen to laukei, “Kanei ngo ühaitilabü dogo kan lolo kü la thebü.”
Haoenei hao to laukei, “Tükde ong, künei no khei ong khühlabü hoba haoeneibü ik to kulabü, künei no ühaitilabü.” Hibü haoenei hao janglüh haanbü penyiei khühkei hoba hao laanglip ka sungankei.
Ladang hao Lehi to loukei, Filistiabüei hao to haüyola uihinjung angkei, hoba
Hobaje haoei gadueibü kaolo haansang che hapbei hoba haoeibü ik longan kho japan sungkei hoba khoei haoei müt hajar che haitikei.
Hobaje Samsonei laukei,
“Gadueibü kaolo cheei shaang shaang onko,
Gadu cheeibü kaoloei müt
hajar che ngei haitikei.”
Ladang haoei laubü nangkei haoei kaolo kho haoeibü ik ka wenan apbei; hoba kho kao to Ramath Lehi dogo nyenkei.
Hobaje hao aeibou deilako kikei, hoba haoei

Hobaje Lehia kibü kaokhong Mühghaüei ipan kho ka dei pakkei, hoba ladang yungkei haoeibü soushou nyibou loungaikei, hoba hao hau kingaikei. Hibü kho nyen kho Enhakor dogo nyenkei, tat sühko kho Lehia kia.
Hobaje Filistiabü jihaphaia haoei po saoche Israel matjembei.
Samson Gaza to haukei, hoba khünei haoei suonlamnyu che hapbei, hoba hao sao jungto atkei.

Hobaje Gazabü la Samson loua dogo ngetikei, hoba haoenei hao kailepbei, hoba langyang sünga bakhüna thokei. Haoenei langyang sünga sangsembo thoko laukei, “Ngeyang lange asao shongko senei haiteikho, kho phaia ong senei hao haitikho.”

Hobaje saotometu- phang sühko Samson yepbei, hoba methuphang hao meimeikei hoba sangnyu bakhün koukhün si thaonyu penyia jungkei, hoba khübü kho lühenkei, khinjin hoba lubü pendou haoeibü phaka khübü kho pean Hebron thedanga kibü shongh khu to jungan angkei.
Kho phaia Sorek pholia yaksa che nyenei Delila haoei sanoukei.

Hobaje Filistiabü bunyu shuong sao jungto louan sao to laukei, “Hao suletashi, hoba haoeibü hau yaangbü kho ainei kije lapenshi, hoba senei hao khühlabü hoba hao thüka bunyu lelabü lele ai huonei senei hao lapla kho chühashi, hoba kün mütpem wekoei ka la chandinam hajar cheto saongao bang kulabü.”
Hobaje Delilaei Samson to laukei, “Kaibü hau yaangbü lanei ki, hoba no lai khühenla hoba thepetan phoenla kho sanoudambo kü to lenbüma?”
Hobaje Samsonei sao to laukei, “Laubük haanbü nyetei haoenei ngo khüha longa ngo hau akiko aplabü hoba takübü müt tegü ong yeilabü.”
Kheijinei Filistiabü bunyu shuongei sao la laubük haanbü nyet sungbakukei, hoba khübü khoei saoei hao khühkei.

Tou shemjang maangkaboua saoei müt lombo setteitikei hoba saoei hao to laukei, “Samson! Filistiabü no lapla louda.” Lausikei wana jolühei meiyoujinei tegü laubük kho haoei jangthetkei. Hibü haoeibü hau ainei kije ange.
Hobaje Delilaei Samson to laukei, “Chühashi, nyi ngo aweasüng, hoba kü to yepeia. Sanoudambo no lai khühlaje kü to lenbü.”
Hobaje haoei sao to laukei, “Haoenei ngo janglüh jolüh haanbüei khühalonga, kheijinei ngo hau akiko aplabü hoba lubü tegü ong kilabü.”

Hibü Delilaei jolüh haanbü sungbakei, hoba khübü khoei hao khühkei, hoba hao to laukei, “Samson! Filistiabü no lapla louada! Hobaje shemjang maangkaboua müt thoakei.” Lausikei haoei haoeibü phem ka lüh kho lei tegü ong jangthetkei.

Hobaje Delilaei Samson to laukei, “Tou sühko nyi ngo aweasüng hoba yepeia. No lai khühlaje kü la lenbüma.” Hobaje haoei sao to laukei, “Ngeibü khua khulou shen nyet neia takyoa longa hoba kho kaangkhühtham shenyoa longa kheijinei ngo hau akiko aplabü hoba lubü müt tegü yeilabü.”

Hibü hao yepan kijinei Delilaei khulou shen nyet kho neia takyokei; hoba khübü kho saoei kaangkhühtham phenyokei; hoba hao to laukei, “Samson Filistiabü no lapla louada!” Lausikei yepbü ka hao pikei, hoba nei kong, jajin natjin hoba jim senlangkei.
Hobaje saoei hao to laukei, “Kaibü maangpon kü yoa akinyu nyi lai ngei no sanouda dogo lenenla? Nyi ngo semnei aweasüng, hoba nyi kaibü hau yaangbü lanei ki, kü la alenda.”
Hobaje ladang saoei hao chalou angbou aeibou thungeikei, haoeibü soushou oan sheman apbei.

Hobaje haoei sao la haoeibü maangpon pendou ngetikei, hoba sao to laukei, “Khujin ladangkei ngeibü khua jinan achüh. Aishanga ngeibü nyueibü nyusem ka ngo Mühghaü shanga Nazarit ki. Ngeibü khu shuan apalonga, kheijinei ngeibü hauei ngo apyolabü, hoba ngo hau akiko aplabü, hoba lubü müt tegü yeilabü.”

Ladang Delilaei sao to haoeibü maangpon pendou lena dogo chühenkei, saoei Filistiabü leiyeibü shuong ngala hautiko laukei, “Touje kaiyanga, aishanga haoei kü la haoeibü maangpon khümbo lena.” Kheijinei Filistiabü leiyeibü shuong pendou sao jungto longkei, hoba haoeneibü ika nam kho jungan loukei.
Hobaje saoei hao saoeibü youshia yeptikei, hoba saoei müt che ngakei hoba hao la haoeibü khua khulou shen nyet kho shuan aptikei. Kheijinei saoei hao khon kutila khangkei, hoba haoeibü hau satkei.
Hobaje saoei laukei, “Samson, Filistiabü no lapla louda!” Hobaje ngakbü ka hao pienkei hoba laukei, “Ngo nyishou tegü satan aplabü hoba ngo lolo hopatham kilabü.” Lausikei
Hobaje Filistiabüei hao lapjung louan, haoeibü nyek phekan apbukei, hoba Gaza to hao leijung yankei hoba chinam namlühei khühkei hoba thüngshanga hao la youshou nittikei.
Lausikei khu shuan apan haoeibü khua nyibou khulou yemla khangkei.
Hobaje Filistiabü leiyeibü shuongei haoeneibü mühghaü Dagon la lembü yaangbü lemla hoba olinyola kambei; aishanga haoenei laukei, “Seneibü mühghaüei seneibü dangbou Samson sen ik to kua!”

Hobaje mütshuongei hao hapjinei haoenei haoeneibü mühghaü nyen sangkei, aishanga haoenei laukei. “Seneibü mühghaüei sen la seneibü dangbou hoba seneibü kaodak leilukubou, aoei sen juong haitikei hao kua.”

Hobaje haoeneibü maangpon olinyoko kijinei, haoenei laukei, “Sen shanga louyola Samson ngaashi.” Hibü haoenei thüngshang ka Samson ngakei, hoba haoen thedanga hao louyojayola yeitikei. Hobaje haoenei hao thaonyu kanglanga lotikei.
Hobaje Samsonei haoeibü ika jenan kibou nashou khoto laukei, “Ngo nongla shanga chem thungetbü thaonyu kho kü la peman chühtishi.”
Tou chem kho bousu yaksaei shenan kikei; hoba Filistiabü songdakbü pendou khünei kikei, hoba chemdaka bousu yaksa hajar sem thüng Samson louyola lebü chühko kikei.
Kheijinei Samsonei
Hobaje Samsonei chem thungetan kibü chenyu thaonyu penyi to hatlepbei, hoba haoei khübü to nongetkei, che haoeibü mae ikei hoba che kho nanae ikei hatlepbei.

Hobaje Samsonei laukei, “Filistiabü yoa ngo haitikai.” Hobaje haoeibü hau pendouei hao khüpjung koukei, hoba chem kho songdakbü shuong hoba khüto adan kibü pendou thük to atkei. Hibü langkei kijinei haoei lajuche haitikei, khotoje hao haijinei haitibü juongbou kikei.

Kheijinei haoeibü jaisina hoba haoeibü chempen pendou louyenkei, hoba hao sunglangkei, hoba hao sungjung angan Zora hoba Eshtaol kanglanga haoeibü bou Manoaeibü heea hao khünkei. Haoei po saoche Israel matjembei.
Efraim shongh kaodaka müt che nyenei Mika kikei.

Haoei haonyu to laukei, “Nyi mautibü chandinam saongaoto anthükche laobou shanga nyi khükko uokko laukei, hoba toukei ngeibü nouei ditko laukei, chühashi, chandinam kho ngei kia, kho ngei sungkei.” Hobaje haoeibü nyuei laukei. “
Hobaje haoei chandinam saongaoto anthükche kho haoeibü nyu la kungaikei, hoba haonyuei laukei, “Ngei ngeibü ik ka kü shou shanga heangsho che hoba tühnyinbü noksa che kümla

Hobaje ladang haoei haonyu la nam kho kungaikei, haonyuei chandinam saoan kho sungkei, hoba kho chandinam yaübü la kukei, haoei heangsho che hoba tühnyinbü noksa che kümbei, hoba kho Mikaeibü chema kikei.
Kho Mikaeibü chema mühghaü chem che kikei, hoba haoei ungshedbou saopobü hele hoba terafim kümbei hoba hao shou che khümbo kukei, ao haoeibü ungshedbou yeikei.
Khübü chaloua Israela Choba akitei, müt- pem wekoei lulu maang ong lekei.
Tou Jihuda chempen ka Jihudaa kibü Bethlehem ka heshou che kikei, hao Levibü, hoba hao khünei homan kikei.
Hobaje müt kho Jihudaa kibü Bethlehem ka kishang hapbü chenei kila kukjung haukei, hoba hao haujinei Efraim shongh kaodaka Mikaeibü chem to loukei.
Hobaje Mikaei hao to laukei, “No laka louda?” Hobaje haoei hao to laukei, “Jihudaa kibü Bethlehembü Levibü che ki, hoba ngo kishang hapbü chenei homan kila hauda.”

Hobaje Mikaei hao to laukei, “Kü yoa kishi hoba ngeibü boumai tegü hoba ngeibü ungshedbou che tegü yeishi, hoba ngei ka la po chenei chandinam an kulabü, hoba neisimei soukoaoko hoba kaibü shausiyung kulabü.” Hibü Levi bou kho atkei.
Hobaje Levi bou kho müt kho yoa kila maang haikei, hoba heshoubou kho haoeibü shousi yoa che tegü hao thedanga kikei.
Hobaje Mikaei Levi bou kho saüenko khümbo kukei, hoba heshoubou kho haoeibü ungshedbou yeikei, hoba hao Mikaeibü chema kikei.
Kheijinei Mikaei laukei, “Touje

Khubü chaloua Israela Choba akitei, hoba khübü chaloua Dan phangei haoen jembü kila shanga kishang phet che lambo kikei; aieilausi kho chalou sühko Israel phang yoa haoeneibü phet aikei haoen jungto alouko kiteikei.

Hibü Danbüei haoen phang lühbak khümbo ka maangkaangbü müt ngao, Zora ka hoba Eshtaol ka kaonyek pheila hoba shuchühko paila hautikei, hoba haoenei haoen to laukei, “Hauashi, hoba kaodak kho kaikaijembo paiashi.” Hobaje haoenei Efraim shongh kaodak, Mikaeibü chem to loukei, hoba khünei shaikei.
Haoen Mikaeibü chema kijinei haoenei Levibü heshouboueibü ngüh shenkei. Hobaje haoen sepeian hao to laukei, “Aoei no hato leian loukei? Hanei no ai kümda? Hanei kaibü kümsilei ai?”
Hobaje haoei haoen to laukei, “Mikaei kü to ho tegü kümkei, haoei ngo jekthetan phokei, hoba ngo haoeibü ungshedbou la yeian kia.”
Hobaje haoenei hao to laukei, “Künei ka to sudajada, kün haubü kho thük hapla si ühüplaje Mühghaü ka ngetishima.”
Hobaje ungshedbouei haoen to laukei, “Haksoa haushi, kan haushanga

Hibü müt ngao kho bangjung haukei hoba Laish to loukei hoba khünei kibü mütshuong hapbei. Haoen lai Sidonbü tegü sangsemetnyu hoba khümetangetan kikei kho hapbei; aishanga khonei haoen to amaibü kümlabü lele hau akitei hoba haoen Sidonbü ka saabüa kikei, hoba müt aotokei ai phenyoan aki.
Hobaje ladang haoen jaisinasi shuong jungto Zora si Eshtaol to loukei; haoeneibü jaisinaei haoen to laukei, “Kan haubü ailai ong yingkei?”
Hobaje haoenei laukei, “Meimeiashi, Laish shila sen angkho, aishanga künei kaodak kho hapa; hoba chühashi, kho aeibou maiakei. Kan semetham kilep lo? Hauan kaonyek kho lela tesuktedem.
Kan ladang haulaje küpjemetnyu kibü kaonyek che to loulabü hoba kaonyek kho yaang; aieilausi Mühghaüei kho kan la kua; kaodaka kibü aieikei amühlabü kaonyek che ki.”
Hobaje Zora hoba Eshtaol ka Dan chempen müt saongao lak wapyola lason hele lean haukei.
Hobaje haoen angkei hoba Jihudaa Kiriath Jearima shaikei; hibü tat sühko kho kaoen to haoenei Mahane Dan dogo lauda; chühashi, kho Kiriath Jearim phainei ki.
Hobaje kho ka haoen Efraim shongh kaodak danko haukei, hoba Mikaeibü chem to loukei.

Kheijinei Laish kaodak pheila haubü müt ngao khoei haoeneibü jaisinasi shuong to laukei, “Ungshedbou saopobü neisimei che hoba terafim hoba chandinam tühnyinbüei yaübü heangsho noksa che kia dogo kanei angekei lo? Hibü tou kanei ai kümlaje damanchühashi.”
Hobaje haoen thiaeka sepeikei hoba Levibü heshoubou Mikaeibü chem to loukei, hoba hao to lai kije phekei.
Hobaje müt saongao lak, aoyou Dan shousi shuong kikei, haoen wapyobü hele lean bakhün to atshanga lokei.

Hobaje kaonyek shuchühla haubü müt ngao kho angkei hoba thi aeka atkei, hoba heangsho, ungshedbou saopobü hele, hoba terafim kho, hoba tühnyinan kümbü heangsho noksa kho sungbakei; hoba ungshedbou kho bakhün to atbü lamnyua wapyobü hele lebü müt saongao lak yo khünei lokei.
Hobaje ladang khübü kho Mikaeibü chem to atkei, hoba heangsho, ungshedbou saopobü hele terafim hoba tühnyinbü noksa sungbakei, ungshedbouei haoen to laukei, “Kan ai kümda?”

Hobaje haoenei hao to laukei, “No sangsembo kiashi, kaibü ikei kaibü sembung yemlepashi, hoba kün yo to kaiya, hoba no küneibü bou che hoba ungshedbou che yingashi. Ka shanga müt cheeibü chema ungshedbou yeila maibou si ayingsi Israela phang che hoba chung che thüka ungshedbou yingla maibou?”
Hobaje ungshedbou maang olinko kikei, hoba ungshedbou saopobü hele terafim hoba heangsho jungan mütshuong yoa haukei.
Hibü haoen sepeian bangjung haukei, hoba nashou hanbü hoba samkeisamuk hoba peisilei shuong haoen thedanga phokei.
Ladang Mikaeibü chem ka haoen longche haukei, Mikaeibü chem nyangko kibü mütshuong liko yoshaikei, hoba Dan shousi shuong kho laphetkei.
Hobaje haoenei Dan shousi shuong to ngekkei, hoba haoenei haoeneibü thenyek sepeikei, hoba Mika to laukei, “Shuong hatetche loulabü lele no aiei khonsakda?”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Kanei ngei kümbü mühghaü shuong künlangda hoba ungshedbou leian hauda, hoba ngeije ai jouan ki? Kholonga kanei aila kü to, ‘No aiei khonsakda’ dogo pheda?”
Hobaje Danbü shuongei hao to laukei, “Maangsak yembü müt atei ka to meitisi no kaibü langkei chemdang maubüla kün yoa ngüh tüang.”
Kheijinei Danbü kho haoeneibü lam to haukei, hoba haoen yongko hau kibü dogo Mikaei chühensi haoeibü chem to sepeinyu ngaikei.

Hobaje Mikaei ai kümbei, kho jungan hoba haoei ungshedbou leian Danbü sangsembo küpjembüa kibü mütli jungto Laish to loukei, hoba inei haoen thükenkei, hoba haoenei sangnyu wanei jikan apbei. Hobaje khúmenbü akitei, aieilausi kho Sidon ka lounyu bangan kikei, hoba aotokei phenyoan akitei; hoba kho Beth Rehob nyangko kibü yomanga kikei. Hobaje haoenei sangnyu kümbei hoba khünei kikei.
Hobaje sangnyu nyen kho haoenei haoeneibü bou Dan, ao Israela bukkei, haoeibü nyen phaika Dan dogo nyenkei; lausikei shaanglaje sangnyu nyen kho Laish kiteikei.

Hobaje Danbüei haoenei lemla shanga heangsho kho phokei; hoba Gershomeibü shou, hoba Mosaeibü shi Jonathan khünei ungshedbou kümbei; hoba mütshuong langsenbü to ohaushongko haoeibü shousi shisi shuong haoeneibü ungshedbou kikei.
Hibü Shiloa Mühghaüeibü chem lalokche kikei, khülokche Mikaeibü heangsho kho haoenei phokei.
Khübü chaloua ladang Israela choba akitei, Levibü che Efraim shongh kaodak thon aenei hauan kikei; haoei Bethlehem Jihuda ka thangnyu che sungkei.
Hobaje thangnyuei hao to maangpokkei, hoba Jihuda a kibü Bethlehema bou chem ka sao satan apbei hoba lit lei thüng khünei kikei.

Hobaje saoeibü lao meimeikei, hoba sao to sukojako joyoan sao nyibou leian loula sao phaito haukei. Hao yoa hao haoeibü sambü hoba gadu tang che kikei. Hobaje hao saoeibü bou chem to loukei, hoba ladang yaksanyueibü bouei hao hapbei, haoei olinko hao to haüyola loukei.
Hobaje haoeibü kou yaksanyueibü bouei hao sühtikei, hoba hao yoa chalou semnyet thüngkei, hibü haoenei shaukei- yungkei, hoba khünei kikei.
Hobaje leibounyeta ngeyang enyu meimeikei hoba haula lamlekei, lausikei yaksanyueibü bouei haishoubou to laukei, “Wentek shishoei kaibü maanglemashi hoba kho phaia ong kan hautilabü.”
Hibü haoen setkei, hoba haosi ham liko shaukeiyungkei; hoba yaksanyueibü bouei müt khoto laukei, “Ngei sudajada, hehoat dogo kian taoje khei ong kishi hoba kaibü maang olinko kishi.”
Hobaje müt kho haula lamlekei, lausikei haishoubouei hao to sukeijakei, hoba khünei hao toukei thüngkei.
Hobaje ngaobounyet nyeyang enyu ungla meimeikei, hoba yaksanyueibü bouei laukei, “Ngei kato sudajada, no shauayungashi hoba chakung angom shongko haiteishi;” hoba haosi hamei shaukeiyungkei.

Hobaje ladang müt kho haula meimeikei, hao hoba thangnyu hoba haoeibü sambü, haishoubou, yaksanyueibü bouei hao to laukei, “Chühashi, tou chasem sühda, langyang sünga haiteishi, dogo ngei sudajada, chühashi, chalou danda hanei otashi, hoba kaibü maang olinko kishi, hoba ngenet enyu meimeishi, hoba chem to hauashi.”
Lausikei müt khoei teyepbho dogo laukei, hao meimeikei hoba bangjung haukei, hoba Jebus thedang ae (kho Jerusalem) sühko loukei, hao yoa gadu onkünbü tang che, hoba thangnyu hao yoa kikei.
Haoen Jebus nyangko kijinei chalou satkhüman kikei, hoba sambouei bunyubou to laukei, “Tou kaiya, sen Jebusbü sangnyu to sepeikho hoba khünei otkho.”
Hobaje haoeibü bunyubouei hao to laukei, “Aoyou Israelbü aying haoen yenbou sangnyu aeto asepeilep; lausikei sen Gibea aeto haukho.”
Hobaje haoei haoeibü sambü to laukei, “Kaiya, sen khübü che ayingsi chenei Gibea ayingsi Ramaa yepbho.”
Hibü haoen haoeneibü lamnyu to haukei; hoba haoen Benjamineibü Gibea nyangko kijinei chanyu nepbei.
Hobaje haoenei Gibea khünei hauan sühla sepeikei. Hobaje hao atkei, hoba sangnyu lambheka setkei; aishanga aoeikei haoen haoeneibü chem to aleiyet.
Hobaje chühashi, nangnak baushi che sek ka kümbalei ka lungko kikei; müt kho Efraim shongh kaodak ka kikei, hoba Gibeaa homan kikei, hoba khünei kibü shuong kho Benjaminbü kikei.
Haoei haoeibü nyekei chühangtikei, hoba sangnyu khongnyua yenbou paibü kho hapbei; hoba baushibou khoei laukei, “No lato hauda hoba no lae aeka louda?”

Hobaje haoei hao to laukei, “Kün Jihudaa kibü Bethlehem ka Efraim shongh kaodak thi aeto haukei, ngo thi aeka ki, hoba ngo Jihudaa kibü Bethlehem to haukei, hoba ngo tou ngeibü chem to hauda, hoba ngo leiyetla müt aokei aki.
Khei yingsikei küneibü gadu shanga youho si shausiyung kia; hoba kü shanga kaibü samnyu hoba no khangenbü shuong yoa kibü heshou shanga wentek si ih kia, aieikei shalean aki.”
Hobaje baushibou khoei laukei, “Ka yoa hakso kishi; no khambü pendou ngei nongnaelabü, khonga ong tesüh.”
Hibü haoei hao haoeibü chem to leiyetkei hoba gadu la shausiyung okkei, hoba haoenei haoeneibü you makkei hoba shaukeiyungkei.

Haoen maang olinko kijinei, chühashi, sangnyubü sousiwat mütshuongei chem kho komlepbei; hoba koukapa kokeikei; hoba haoenei chem bunyubou baushibou to laukei, “Kaibü chem to lotbü müt kho ao yingkeije khünei jungeila leianba.”
Kheijinei chem bunyubou kho haoen jungto tangto angan laukei, “Touh! ngeibü jaisinasi shuong, hainyu amaiko tejungei; ho müt kün chem to tou loubü ki, amaibü tekümma.
Chühashi, hanei hao thangnyu hoba kü shou saosüngbü medei che kia, ngei haosi leian longkukho; hoba kanei haosi jungeiashi, hoba haosi kan maang leashi; lausikei ho müt toje amaibü ai teküm!”

Lausikei müt shuongei hao to ngüha ale; hibü müt khoei haoeibü thangnyu kho senjung loukei hoba haoen jungto leian angkukei; hoba haoenei sao jungeikei, hoba ngeyang sühko sao to aseasangko jungeikei; hoba ladang langesaokei haoenei sao litikei.
Kheijinei yaksanyu ngeyang enyu loukei, hoba saoeibü lao kishanga müt khoeibü koukhüna lang angeshongko phetetnyu yepbei.

Hobaje saoeibü lao kho ngeyang laksepbei, hoba koukhün kho ipbei, hoba haoeibü lam to haula longkei hoba chühashi, yaksanyu, haoeibü thangnyu kho saoeibü ik sangchimaanga koukhün junga lengtian kikei.
Hobaje haoei sao to laukei, “Piashi, haukho.” Lausikei ajongai; kheijinei haoei sao gadu taaka künan müt kho meimeian haoeibü chem to ungkei.
Hobaje ladang hao haoeibü chem to loukei haoei in che sungbakei hoba haoeibü thangnyu hatlepan phejan anthüknyi la wapnyinan Israel phang leikhu leithang pendou aeto hautikei.
Hobaje kho hapbü pendouei laukei, “Ijep kaodak ka Israel longbü chalou ka tat sühko ho tegü ladangkei ühaüthük hoba haüthükko alou; ho shanga damanchühashi, sangkuashi hoba lenyoashi.”
Kheijinei Israel shousi shuong pendou longkei hoba Dan ka Beersheba sühko Gilead kaodak yoan Mizpaa
Hobaje Israel phang mütli pendou thüka kongnyu shuong Mühghaü mütli kamshaishanga haoen lolo yokei, in jungbü hajar saonyi.
Ladang Benjamineibüei Israel mütli Mizpa süha dogo ditkei, kheijinei Israelbüei phekei, “Ho amaibü kümsilei ho lai haüthükkeije kün la lenbüshi.”
Hobaje Levibou yaksanyu haitibou laoei laukei, “Benjamin shangabü Gibea to ngo loukei, ngo hoba ngeibü thangnyu sühla loukei.
Hobaje Gibeabüei ngo khulimbo meimeikei, hoba nangnak ngo kaijembo chem kho komlepbei,; haoenei ngo haitila loukei, hoba ngeibü thangnyu to amaibü kümbei hoba sao haia.
Hobaje ngei ngeibü thangnyu künbakei hoba netla yeiko jemnyinkei hoba Israel phetphan kaonyek pendou to sao hautikei; aishanga haoenei Israela mangsenlabü hoba pejapela jungeia.
Chühashi, kan Israelbü kan pendou, kanei hanei songsido hoba dambü lenashi.”
Hobaje müt pendou müt che tegütham loan laukei, “Sen che ongkei lulueibü neichem lambo ohaulabü.”
Lausikei tou Gibea to senei ho hai kümlabü; hoba kho khulimbo tan tan anglabü.

Israel phang pendou ka saongao weko ka an hoba hajar weko ka saongao hoba hajar an weko ka hajar che, mütshuong shanga shausiyung sungbala shanga hoba haoen ladang loulaje, haoenei Benjamineibü Gibeaa Israel to pejapelabü kümbü thüng kho haoenei kümlabü.
Hibü Israelbü bousu pendou müt che tegü yeian sangnyu khulimbo kamshaikei.
Hobaje Israelbü chemdang shuongei Benjaminbü mütli pendou peanchühko müt hautiko laukei, “Kan yoa ho ai kümsilei amaibü haüthükkei?
Tou Gibeaa sousiwat mütshuong kho künei haoen haitilabü hoba Israel ka shabü sungngaila shanga khübü kho litian apashi.” Lausikei Benjaminbüei haoeneibü jaisina Israelbü ngüha ale.
Hobaje Benjaminbüei Gibea sangnyu shuong ka Israel khulimbo lason to haula liko loukei.
Hobaje kho chaloua sangnyu shuong ka Benjaminbüeibü shousi shuong in jungbü hajar saoto lak kikei; kho Gibeaa kibü pienbü saongao nyetje ayoko.
Khübü pendou yoa lanthükbü shanan pienbü müt saongao nyet kikei; mütpem wekoei khuloupemei ongkei atheko püklaangsenei tetla thükan kikei.
Hobaje Israel mütshuong, Benjamin ayoko in jungbü hajar saongao lei kikei, khübü pendou wapyobü müt kikei.
Israel mütshuong meimeikei hoba Bethel to angkei, hoba Mühghaü to, “Benjaminbü to wap- yola kün laobou shaang angla?” dogo phekei. Hobaje
Kheijinei Israelbü ngeyang enyu meimeikei hoba Gibea khulimbo shaikei.
Hobaje Israelbüei Benjamin khulimbo wapyola haukei, hoba Israelbüei haoen khulimbo Gibeaa wapyo lothetko lokei.
Hobaje Benjaminbü Gibea ka longkei, hoba khünyet kho Israelbü hajar saonyi haitikei.
Lausikei Israelbü shuong hau kingaikei hoba khangnyet loshanga lokei.
Hobaje Israel mütliei
Hibü Israel mütli Benjaminbü khulimbo nyibounyet loukei.
Hobaje nyibounyetkei Benjaminbü haoen khulimbo Gibea ka longkei, hoba Israelbü hajar anthükset haitikei; khübü pendou in jungbü ong kikei.
Kheijinei Israelbü pendou sepai tan pendou
Hobaje Israelbüei
Hobaje Aroneibü shou, Eleazareibü shou Finehasei kho thedanga khübü chaloua khangenkei) hoba laukei, “Toukei küneibü jaisina Benjaminbü khulimbo anglep sai, si khüae lela?” Hobaje
Hibü Israelei Gibeaa kaijembo la thoan haiteikei.
Hobaje Israelbüei sembounyet Benjamin khulimbo angkei, hoba lubü chaloua tegü ong Gibea khulimbo lason leithetnyu lokei.

Hobaje Benjaminbüei mütli khulimbo haukei hoba sangnyu ka linjung longan kikei hoba lubü chaloua tegü haoenei khongthua at, Bethel to angshang aenei at hoba Gibea to angshang khongthua at, dogo Israelbü müt khujin thüng haitila khangkei.
Hobaje Benjaminbüei laukei, “Shaangla tegütham ong haoen sen thedanga tuongda.” Lausikei Israelbü shuongei laukei, “Sen atkho, hoba sangnyu ka haoen lamkhong to linjung loutikho.”
Hobaje Israelbü pendou haoen kishang ka meimeikei hoba haoen lolo Baaltamara leithetan lokei hoba Israelbü shuong la thoan kibü shuong haoen thoshang ka, khei Maare Gibea ka longkei.
Hobaje Gibea khulimbo Israel pendou ka pienbü hajar an loukei, hoba lason kho aeibou kaangan apbei; lausikei Benjaminbüei lounyu akiko haoen thükto thushed lotlabü dogo angeko kikei.
Hobaje
Hibü Benjaminbüei haoen athük dogo ngekei.
Aishanga Israelbüei Benjaminbü la younak kukei, aieilausi Gibeabü khulimbo la thotian phokubü to haoenei maanglem phokei.
Hobaje la thoan kibü shuongei tongde leithetkei, hoba la thoan kibü shuong longan sangnyu pendou inei wapetkhümbei.
Hobaje Israelbü si thoan kibü kanglanga shenla ngelabü sangkubü kho haoenei sangnyu ka wankhük yaang tujung angtilabü shanga kiteikei.
Hobaje Israelbü lason to atan lokei hoba Benjaminbüei Israelbü thükko müt khujin thüng haitila khangkei, aishanga haoenei laukei, “Shaangbü lason tegü ong haoen sen thedanga tuongda.”
Lausikei ladang sangnyu ka wankhük sangmei hima tujung longkei, Benjaminbüei haoen phai to chühngaikei hoba sangnyu khümbo ka wankhük angko hapbei.
Kheijinei Israelbü se- peikei hoba Benjaminbü mokkei, aishanga haoen thükto thushedei sühda dogo chühenkei.
Hibü Israelbü ka thenyek sepeian yamae to satkukei, lausikei lasonei haoen laphetkei; hoba aoyou sangnyu ka longkei, Israelbüei kanglanga haoen shemtikei.
Benjaminbü kho haoenei kailepbei, hoba haoen shijung haukei, hoba chaangbou Gibea thedang ae sühko nakeila leko yantikei.
Hobaje Benjaminbü hajar anthükset tuongkei; pendou laakbü ong kikei.
Hobaje haoen yamae sepeian Rimmon laang lambo satkei, hoba haoen hajar ngaoje lamkhonga haitikei; hoba haoen Gidom sühko khaplapbo shikei, hoba haoen hajar nyi haitikei.
Hibü khünyet Benjaminbü in jungbü haitibü pendouei hajar saoto ngao; haoen pendou laakbü ong kikei.
Lausikei müt saongao lak ngaikei hoba yamae Rimmon laang lambo satkei hoba Rimmon laangpoba lit lei kikei.
Hobaje toukei Israelbüei Benjaminbü khulimbo ngaikei hoba haoenei hapbü pendou, khei bousu, yaksa, nashousi hoba shatsinam khümbo haikei. Hobaje haoenei sangnyu khümbo wanei thean apbukei.
Tou Israelbüei Mizpaa sen aoeikei lulueibü yaksa shou Benjaminbü la yakla lela akulabü dogo theyolanyoan kikei.
Hobaje mütshuong kho Bethel to loukei hoba khünei Mühghaü thedanga chasem sühko setkei, hoba haoen ngüh longko aeibou haapbei.
Hobaje haoenei laukei, “O
Hobaje nyibounyet kho mütshuong tongde meimeikei hoba khünei lemshang kümbei hoba juokbü lembü hoba sangmai lembü kukei.
Hobaje Israelbüei laukei, “Israelbü phang tan yoshaishang to
Hobaje Israelbü shousi shuongei haoeneibü jaisina Benjamin shanga phokaiko dambei hoba laukei, “Tat Israel ka phang che wapan apa.
Haoen jouan kibü shanga yakla lela senei ai kümla? Aieilausi shousi shuong yak shanga akulabü dogo
Hobaje haoenei laukei, “Israelbü phang yoa
Aishanga ladang müt pakkei chühashi, khünei Jabesh-Gileada kibü aokei akitei.
Hibü shuongei khüto maang kaangbü müt hajar anthük nyi hautikei hoba haoen la sakkuko laukei, “Hauashi hoba Jabesh- Gileada kibü shuong inei yaksa si nashou hanbü yoan haitiashi.
Hobaje kanei bousu phai pendou hoba bousu to jambü yaksa pendou khümbo lemailela mautiashi.”
Hobaje haoenei Jabesh-Gileada kibü yoa bousu to ajambü saüsüngbü medei saongao lei hapbei, hoba Kanana kibü Shilo shaishang to haoenei khübü kho leian loukei.
Hobaje Rimmon Laanga kibü Benjaminbü shousi shuong jungto thangyenbü khümboei ngühlang hautikei, hoba haoen la sangmai ngekletkukei.
Kho chaloua Benjaminbü sepeinyu loukei, hoba senei Jabesh-Gileadbü sao shuong aoyou langkei khümenkei, haoen la kukei, khei yingsikei, haoen shanga haoen apen.
Hobaje mütshuongei Benjaminbü shanga phokaiko dambei, aieilausi Israelbü phang yoa
Kheijinei shuonga leiyeibü jaishou shuongei laukei, “Benjaminbü ka yaksa mautikusije jouan kibü shuong shanga yak shanga lai lela?”
Hobaje haoenei laukei, “Israel ka chung che haman üpla shanga haoen shanga Benjamin ka satenbü phet cheje kijan.
Kheiyingsi dogokei senei seneibü shousi ka yakla lela haoen la akulabü, aishanga Israelbü shousi shuongei theyolanyoko laukei, Benjaminbü la aoei yak kulaje hao shedsikhau yingshi.”
Hobaje haoenei laukei, “Chühashi, Shiloa po weko
Hobaje haoenei Benjaminbü shousi shuong la sakkuko laukei, “Hauan semlühlaaka thoshi;
hoba Shilobü sao shuong tomshang to tombotombo longa longa kheijinei kan semlühlaak ka kaiyang, hoba kan mütpem wekoei Shilobü sao shuong lulueibü yakla lela lapshi, hoba Benjamin kaodak to haushi.

Hobaje ladang haoeneibü nyusibou hoba jaisinaei kün to louan ngüh longlaje, khei künei haoen to laulabü, ‘Sanoudambo haoen künla sakbüma, aieilausi lasona haoen ka mütpem weko shanga künei yak asung, ayingsi kanei haoen la haoen aku; khei aying tegüje kan to shed kakan kikhoulabü.’ ”

Hobaje Benjaminbü shousi shuongei kho tegü kümbei, hoba haoeneibü lühbak thüng, aoyou tombei hoba aoyou haoeibü langkeia yakla lela haoen lekei, hoba haoen ngaikei hoba sangnyu shuong kümbei, hoba khünei kikei.
Hobaje Israel shousi shuongei kho chaloua kho ka bangjung satkei, mütpem weko lulueibü chung hoba lulueibü chempen jungto hoba haoen mütpem weko lulueibü phet lamjung haukei.
Khübü chaloua Israela choba akitei, mütpem wekoei lulu maang lekei.
Matjembü shuongei songdakbü haanga kaonyeka mühsinou che longkei, hoba Jihuda kaodak Bethlehembü müt che, haoeibü yak hoba haoeibü shousi müt nyi Moab kaodaka kila haukei.

Hobaje müt khoeibü nyen Elimelek, yakeibü nyen Naomi, hoba haoeibü shousi müt nyieibü nyen Malon hoba Chilon kikei, haoen Jihuda kaodak Bethle- hema kibü Efratbü, hoba haoen Moab kaodak to louan khünei kikei.
Hobaje yak si haoeibü shou nyi apyoan Naomieibü lao Elimelek haian apbei.
Hobaje haoenei haoeneibü yak shanga Moab sao lekei, cheeibü nyen Orpa hoba lubü cheeibü nyen Rut, hoba haoen khünei po an thüng kikei.
Hobaje Malon si Chilon haosi ham haikei, hoba yaksanyu kho saoeibü shounyi hoba laoei apyokei.
Kheijinei Moab kaodak ka ngaila saoei saoeibü shounyieibü yaknyi yoa meimeikei, aishanga
Hobaje saoei shounyieibü yaknyi yoa saoei jembü kishang ka meimeikei hoba Jihuda kaodak to ngaila haoen lam to haukei.
Hobaje Naomiei shounyieibü yaknyi to laukei, “Hauashi hoba kasi ham lulueibü nyu chem to ngaiashi, hoba kanei haibü to hoba kü to onouko jungeibü tegü
kasi ham lulu lao chema hakso hapenlabü lele
Hibü kho phaia saoei haoen to sembung shepbei, hoba haoen ngüh longko haapbei.
Hobaje haoenei sao to laukei, “Kün kaibü mütli jungto ka yoa sepeijung ngailabü.”
Hobaje Naomiei laukei, “Kü shounyi, ngaiashi, aila kan kü yoa haula? Kaneibü lao la lelabü lele ngeibü nyusema shousi kia si?
Ngaia, küshounyi, kaneibü lam to hauashi, aishanga ngei lao che lela yongko nou lea. Ngei damlabü kia dogo ngei laualonga, ngei tao lao che hapan shousi bukla maanglem kia dogo ngei lausi;
kanei haoen aching shongko haiyenlep lo? Hibü kan lao lamla ohauko kilep lo? Aying, küshou nyi, ho shanga ngo ong aei maangto shatkuda, aishanga
Hobaje haoen nyibou ngüh longko haapbei, hoba Orpaei nyumaonyu to sembung shepbei, lausikei Rutje sao to souyonyu khüpbei.
Hobaje saoei laukei, “Chühashi, kanaje jembü mütli hoba jembü mühghaü jungto sepeijung ngaida, nokei kana phai ngaiashi.”

Lausikei Rutei laukei, “No apyola hoba ka phai asemla kü to tethungtejangei; aieilausi no lato haulaje ngokei khünei kilabü; kaibü mütli ngeibü mütli yeilabü, hoba kaibü Mühghaü kho ngeibü Mühghaü kilabü.
No lan hailaje ngo khünei hailabü, hoba khünei ngo khünlabü.
Ladang Naomiei Rut kaangkhühtham sao yoa haula maangangenbü chühenkei, saoei sao to joyobü nangkei.
Kho tegü Bethlehem to alou shongko haosi ham haukei. Hobaje ladang haosi Bethlehem to loukei, sangbü pendou yoshaikei hoba yaksa shuongei laukei, “Ho Naomi si?”
Hobaje saoei haoen to laukei, “Kü to Naomi dogo angako Mara dogo ngaashi; aishanga Thükenbouei kü to aeibou khauko jungeia.
Ngo shenan haukei, lausikei
Kho tegü Naomi hoba saoeibü shoueibü yak Moab sao Rut, ao Moab kaodak ka sepeikei, sao yoa ngaikei hoba haoenei barli youshou latla khangjinei Bethlehem to loukei.
Tou Naomi saoei chempen che nyaksinam juong kibü müt che saoeibü lao Elimelekeibü you jungka kikei, haoeibü nyen Boaz.
Hobaje Moabbü sao Rutei Naomi to laukei, “Ngo sek to koukho hoba ao thedanga ngei onou haplaje hao phai ka youman atbü hekho.”
Hobaje sao meimeijung koukei hoba seka youlatbü phainei haoenei atbü youman heko paikei. Thu maiko sao Elimelek chempen Boazeibü sek to kouto haükei.
Hobaje chühashi, Boaz Bethlehem ka loukei hoba youlatbü shuong to laukei, “
Kheijinei Boazei youlatbou ikjaibou to laukei, “Ho aoeibü yaksa nashou?”
Hobaje youlatbü shuong ikjaibouei hao to jongaiko laukei, “Ho Moab kaodak ka Naomi yoa longeibü Moab sao ki.
Hobaje saoei laukei, ‘Ngei ka to sudajada, youlatbü phainei youthep yoa youman atbü heshaitikai.’ Hibü sao louan longche chem to ngaibü to liman ngeyang ka chasem sühko hedanglekei.”
Kheijinei Boazei Rut to laukei, “Kü shou nyi ho ditashi, müeibü sek to youman hela tohau ayingsi haka tebang, lausikei ngeibü samnyu shuong nyangko kishi.

Haoenei latjung danbü seka kaibü nyek theashi hoba haoen phai to haushi. Heshou shuong to haoenei ka to ameitila ngei ngühkhüm kua. Hobaje no ladang dei lalaje dei jephot to hauan heshou shuongei khubü dei yungshi.”
Kheijinei saoei saoeibü the khümbei hoba sao lolo kaoa khüpetan hao to laukei, “Ngo yenbou sao che yingan nyi kü to maangshiklabü lele aila ngo ka thedanga onou hapbei?”

Hobaje Boazei sao to jongaiko laukei, “Nyi kaibü lao haian phaia laoeibü nyu to nyi kümbü hoba lai kaibü nyusibou hoba jembü bukbü kaodak apyoan nyi shangied angebü mütshuong jungto loubü pendou shangabü kü la maisho lena.
ei kaibü kümsilei muko kushi, hoba Israel Mühghaü
Kheijinei saoei laukei, “Ngeibü

Hobaje shaubüyungbü jiha Boazei sao to laukei, “Hato kaiya, hoba shauashi, hoba kaibü shausiyung haijepbüa hamashi.” Hobaje saoei youlatbü shuong yoa setkei, hoba haoei sao la youshou ngoubü kukei, hoba saoei photko shauankei joukei.
Hobaje tokei ladang sao youman atbü hela haula meimeikei Boazei haoeibü heshou shuong la sakkuko laukei, “Sao la youthep yokakei küntiashi, hoba sao tethanget.
Tokei youthep ka sao shanga youshen at sungenashi hoba kho phokushi, hoba sao la yoshaitiashi hoba sao to tehak.”
Hobaje chasem sühko saoei seka youman atbü hekei, hoba saoei yoshaibü younet kho barli youshou takyang che thüng kikei.
Hobaje saoei kho künan sangnyu to atkei, hoba saoeibü laoeibü nyuei saoei ai yoshaikei kho hapbei. Tokei Rutei saoei photko shauan joubü künbaan sao la kukei.
Hobaje saoeibü laoeibü nyuei sao to laukei, “Tat nyi youman atbü laka hekei? Hobaje no aoeibü seka khüpkei? No aoei thounoukei hao haübou yingshi!”
Kheijinei sao aoyoa kümbeileikei, kho saoei saoeibü laoeibü nyu la lenkei hoba laukei, “Tat kü yoa kümbou müt khoeibü nyen Boaz.”
Hobaje Naomiei saoeibü shoueibü yak to laukei, “
Kheijinei Moabsao Rutei laukei, “Haü, haoei kü to aeila leko laukei, ‘Haoenei ngeibü sek alatkhüm shongko no ngeibü youlatbü shuong yoa yangshi.’ ”
Hobaje Naomiei saoeibü shoueibü yak Rut to laukei, “Küshou nouyangnyu, müeibü seka haoenei ka to ameitilabü lele no haoeibü sambü sao yoa khüpbü kho maibou.”
Hibü barli youshou si whet youshou alatkhüm shongko youman atbü heshaila Boazeibü sambü sao shuong yoa aeibou paplepan khüpbei, hoba saoeibü laoeibü nyu yoa sao kikei.
Nyetche Naomiei shoueibü yak to laukei, “Küshou, no maanghaiko kilabü lele ngei ka shanga chem che lambukho no?
Tou Boaz, aoeibü sambü sao shuong yoa no kikei, hao seneibü chempen ayingsi? Chühashi, tao nyi amshanga haoeibü barli youshou siplabü.
Hibü no lolo sakteisaopoan onang naangashi hoba kaibü neisimei maiboutham lean, amshang to no yanashi, lausikei hao ashauayungkhüm shongko nyi no lolo müt khola tengeti.
Hobaje ladang hao yeplaje nyi hao yepshang chühletnyu phoshi hoba no atashi, hoba haoeibü you waan apbushi hoba yepashi, hoba nyi ai kümla kho haoei ka la lenlabü.”
Hobaje Rutei jongaikei, “Nyi lenbü pendou ngei kümlabü.”
Hibü sao amshang khüto yankei hoba saoei laoeibü nyuei lenbü tegü pendou kümbei.
Hobaje ladang Boaz shaukei yungkei hoba olinko kikei, haoei yepshang thonbü junga yepla haukei, kheijinei Rut hangsho loukei hoba haoeibü you waan sao khünei yepbei.
Hobaje methu- phanga müt kho mokkei hoba hao lolo sepeikei hoba chühashi, hao junga yaksa che yepan kikei.
Hobaje haoei laukei, “No ao?” Hobaje saoei jongaikei, “Ngo kaibü samnyu Rut; hibü kaibü samnyu la kaibü shembe nei seikushi, aishanga kaibü thenbou nyangbü che ki.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Küshou,
Hobaje tou küshou, no tehüt, nyi phebü pendou ngei ka la kümbulabü, aishanga ngeibü mütli sangnyua kibü pendouei no mubü yaksa che dogo ngekei.
Hobaje chempen dogo laubü kho tükde; lausi dogokei kütokei nyangbou chempen che kia.
Taoje kiteishi, ngeyang ong ngelabü, haoei ka to chempen haangei louan kümalonga maiakei, haoei ka to chempen phejan kümsilei akümlonga,
Hobaje langngeko sao hao yoa yepbei hoba sao langngesaoko kijinei pikei, aishanga saoei laukei, “Yaksa che amshang khüto loukei dogo angetilabü.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Nyi yukan kibü yukjin sungba hoba kho hatlepashi.” Hobaje saoei kho hatlepbei hoba barli youshou tak- yang lak takkuan sao la khünei jinkukei, hoba sao sangnyu to haukei.
Hobaje ladang Rut saoeibü laoeibü nyu jungto loukei, saoei laukei, “Küshou nouyangnyu, no laibü?” Kheijinei saoei müt khoei kümbü pendou lenkei.
Hobaje saoei laukei, “Barli youshou takyang lak ho haoei kü la kukei, aishanga haoei laukei, ‘Kaibü laoeibü nyu chem to no ikkong ohaujan.’ ”
Kheijinei saoei laukei, “Dambü lai haüthükjung loula kho nyi ange shongko sangsembo kishi, aieilausi kümsilei kho tat ayeishongko müt kho khei ongje akilabü.”

Tou Boaz sangnyu bakhün to angan khünei setkei, hoba chühashi, haoei chempen ao shanga laukei, hao louko kikei. Hibü Boazei laukei, “Hai, no kho hato kaishima; hoba hanei setashi,” hoba hao louan setkei.
Hobaje sangnyubü jaishou müt an leian louan laukei, “Kan hanei setshima,” hoba haoen setkei.
Hobaje haoei haoeibü chempen to laukei, “Naomi ao Moab kaodak ka sepeijung longeikei, saoei seneibü jaisina Elimelekeibü kaophai yakkho lauda.

Hibü ngei ka to hai laukho dogo dambei. Hanei setan kibü thedanga hoba ngeibü mütli jaishou thedanga kho jekashi. Nyi kho jekngaikho laualonga jekngaiashi, lausikei nyi kho tejekngaikho dogo laualonga ngei ngelabü lele kü la lenshi; aieilausi ka to liman kho jekngaila ao aki, hoba kaphainei ngo ong.” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ngei kho jekngailabü.”
Kheijinei Boazei laukei, “Nyi ai chaloua Naomi hoba Ruteibü ik ka sek jekda kho yoa haibüeibü nyen haoeibü phet yoa weeilabü lele haiboueibü yak nyi jekngaijan.”
Kheijinei haoeibü chempen khoei laukei, “Kü shangabü phet leilubüla kü shanga ngeije ho jekngaila athük, ngei jekngaibü thüng kho nyi leashi, aishanga ngei kho jekngaila athük.”

Tou jekngaiyobü hoba jeiyobü Israelbü yoa shangiedbü song hai kikei, namyak tükde dogo laula shanga müt cheei ngok hangletan haoei kho lubü la kulabü hoba ho shangied Israelbü aukabü leyobü song kikei.
Hibü chempen khoei Boaz to laukei, “Kho nyi jekashi,” hoba haoei haoeibü ngok hangletnyu apbei.
Hobaje Boazei jaishou shuong hoba mütli to laukei, “Elemelek shangabü pendou hoba Malon si Chilon ham shangabü pendou Naomieibü ik ka ngei jeka dogo tat kan aukabü kia.
Kho to limbo haibou nyen haoeibü phet yoa kila hoba haiboueibü nyen haoeibü jaisina yoka hoba hao kishang bakhün ka abangtila Maloneibü yak Moab sao Rutkei yakla lela ngei jeka, tat kan aukabü ki.”
Hobaje bakhüna kibü müt hoba jaishou pendouei laukei, “Kün aukabü kia. Kaibü ik to lotlabü yaksa kho Rachel si Lea, aoyouei Israel phang huongena haosi phatko
Hobaje
Hibü Boazei Rut lekei, hoba sao yakla yeikei, hoba hao sao jungto atkei hoba
Hobaje yaksa shuongei Naomi to laukei, “
Hao langkei khümenbou hoba no noushou lama haangngaitibü che kilabü; aishanga kashoueibü yak aoei no sanouda hoba ao ka thedanga bousushou nyet to khaibou ki saoei hao bukkei.”
Kheijinei Naomiei nashou kho tonjung louan saoeibü khukua tonkei hoba sao kho thuinyu la yeikei.
Hobaje saoeibü chempen yaksa shuongei hao la nyen che kuko laukei, “Naomi la bousu shou che bukkuakei,” hoba haoenei haoeibü nyen Obed nyenkei, hao Dawideibü bou Jesseeibü bou ki.
Tou habü ho Perez ka pakbü ki. Perez ka Hezron pakkei,
Hezron ka Ram pakkei hoba Ram ka Amminadab pakkei.
Amminadab ka Nashon pakkei, hoba Nashon ka Salmon pakkei.
Salmon ka Boaz pakkei hoba Boaz ka Obed pakkei,
hoba Obed ka Jesse pakkei hoba Jesse ka Dawid pakkei.
Tou Efraim shongh kaodak kabü Ramathaim ka Zofbü müt che kikei, hoba haoeibü nyen Elkana kikei; hao Jerohameibü shou hoba hao Efraimbü Zufeibü shou Tohu hoba Elihueibü shi kikei.
Haoei yak müt nyi kikei, cheeibü nyen Hanna hoba lubü cheeibü nyen Penina; hoba Peninaei shousi kikei, lausikei Hannaei shousi aki.
Hobaje kho po weko sangnyu ka Shiloa lakjaibou Thükenbou
Hobaje Elkanaei lembü kubü chalou sühjinei, haoei haoeibü yak Penina hoba saoeibü bousu shou si yaksa shou la phejan kukei.
Lausikei Hanna laje phejan penyi thüng kukei; aishanga haoei Hanna to sanoukei, lausikei
Hobaje saoeibü maangjamnyuei sao nyamnyamtiko khauangtikei, aieilausi
Hobaje kho tegü Elkanaei po weko kümbei, ladang ong sao
Hobaje saoeibü lao Elkanaei sao to laukei, “Hanna, no aila haapda? Hobaje no aila ashau ayungda? Hobaje kaibü maang- pon aila ngangko ong kida? Bousushou an tokei ka thedanga ngo khaibou aying lo?”
Hibü Shiloa haoen shauan yungan phaia Hanna meimeikei. Tou ungshedbou Eli
Hobaje sao soushoua ngühko kikei hoba
Hobaje saoei thebülanbü che lekei, hoba laukei, “O Thükenbou
Hobaje saoei
Tou Hanna saoei saoeibü maanga joyokei, saoei sembungkhop ong topeikei, lausi saoeibü ngühje adit. Hibü sao ihei jaakkei dogo Eliei dambei,
hoba Eliei sao to laukei, “No lalokche ihei jaakan kila?”
Hobaje Hannaei jongaiko laukei, “Aying, ngeibü
Kaibü samnyu Belial nouyangnyu che tegü teweima; aishanga tou sühko maangthon hoba maangngangbü juong ka ngei joyoa.”
Kheijinei Eliei jongaiko laukei, “Haksoa haushi, hoba Israel Mühghaüei nyi hao ka hibü kaibü subüjabü sakkushima.”
Hobaje saoei laukei, “No khangenbou ka thedanga onou haptishima.” Kheijinei yaksanyu kho jembü lam to haukei, hoba shaukeiyungkei hoba saoeibü thenyek touje maangmau akitei.
Hobaje haoen ngeyang enyu pikei hoba
Hobaje ladang jih sühjung loukei. Hanna mang akongko apbei hoba bousushou che bukkei hoba saoei haoeibü nyen Samuel dogo nyenkei, aieilausi saoei laukei, “Ngei hao
Elkana hoba hao chemdang pendou po weko haitibü lembü hoba takletbü lemla angkei.
Lausikei Hannaje üang; aishanga saoei hao lao to laukei, “Shou in athon shongko ngo üanglabü, hoba kho phaia ong hao
Hobaje saoeibü lao Elkanaei sao to laukei, “Ka la maibü che leshi, nyi hao in athon shongko haiteishi;
Hobaje ladang hao saoei sen aptikei, saoei sao yoa masu pongsu sem hoba wen efa che hoba ih jephot che künan Shiloa
Hobaje haoenei masu pongsu haitikei, hoba shou kho Eli jungto leian loukei.
Hobaje saoei laukei, “O ngeibü bunyubou, no lang kisije ngeibü bunyubou,
Ho shou shanga ngei welaukei, hoba
Hibü ngeikei hao
Hobaje khünei haoenei
Kheijinei Hannaei welauan laukei:
Ngeibü hau
Ngeibü dangbou thedanga kü sembungei the lenenda.
Aieilausi kaibü khümenbüa ngo olinda!
aishanga ka to liman lubü ao aki;
ayingsi küneibü Mühghaü tegü ai laang aki.
Touje yongko yonglambo telau;
kaibü sembung ka yonglambü ngüh telongti.
Aishanga
Hobaje haoei kümbüleibü seret hauan chühda.
Lakjaibü mütshuongeibü laujin leiluakei.
Hobaje aoyou phaiyetan tuongkei haoen hau kiko shembe kaian kia.
Aoyou shi shenan kikei, haoen lolo shausiyung lamtikei,
hoba aoyou mühei haiyetnyu kikei mühei ühaida.
Haü, angkongnyuei shousi nyet bukkuakei,
hoba shousi juong kibü pheijung ngaida.
Haoei hee to yanlangda,
hoba sungjung longkuda.
Haoei yantida hoba tokei haoei angtida.
Haoei shalebü shuong thamngu ka phonenda.
Hobaje khambü shuong od apshang ka sungenan
Choba shuong yoa settida.
Aishanga kaodak thaonyu shuong
hoba khübü thüka haoei kaodak tenan phoakei.
Haoeibü saopobü shuongeibü you haoei lombo kilabü;
lausikei amaibü nakthüh phanga haoei ngüh üangko phoyolabü.
Aishanga hauei ongje müt aoeikei thük ühüplabü.
Haoen khulimbo haoei müha langmak maklabü.
Kaodak thonbü shuong haoei matjemlabü;
hoba haoei haoeibü Choba la hau kulabü.
Hobaje haoei pienbü hau yaangtilabü.”
Hobaje Elkana haoeibü chem Rama to haukei; hoba nashou khoei Eli ungshedbou thedanga
Tou Elieibü shousi shuong kho jim akibü mütshuong kikei, haoenei
Ladang müt cheei haitibü lembü kulaje, mütshuong yoa ungshedboueibü song ho kikei, ungshedbou phai sembü müt che phe kho thungko kijinei haoeibü ika ikji shou sem yembü phe yaüjin lak jungan loulabü.
Hobaje haoei kho phaua ayingsi kitela ayingsi khaüchaka ayingsi nyakchaka jukettilabü, hoba sepjinei sepenbü pendou kho ungshedbouei shaukei.

Shiloa Israelbü loubü pendou to haoenei khei kümbei. Tokei haabü kho ajuokjinei ungshedbou khangenbou khoei haitibü lembü kubü müt to laulabü, “Ungshedbou shanga ngoulabü phe kushi; aishanga haoei ka ka phe thungbü aying sangtüngbü ong lelabü.”

Hobaje müt khoei hao to laukei, “Haoenei shaangla haabü juoklabü hoba kho phaia nyi mangsüh leshi” dogo laualonga kheijinei nyi laulabü, “Aying, nyi ong kü la kho kujan, kho khei aying longa kho ngei soan sunglabü.”
Kho tegü heshou nyieibü shabü kho
Lausikei Samuelei
Tokei haonyuei hao la mangyuk hanbü che shikukei, hoba saoeibü lao yoa po weko haitibü lembü kula sao angjinei saoei kho po weko sungbakukei.
Hobaje Eliei Elkana hoba hao yak haükukei, hoba laukei, “
Hobaje
Tou Eli aeibou baushi sinkei; hoba Israelbü pendou to haoeibü shounyiei kümbü hoba ailai kambü chem koukhüna nongnaebü yaksa shuong to haosiei asangalanbü jungeikei pendou haoei ditkei.
Hobaje haoei haosi to laukei, “Aila kasiei ho tegübü kümsilei kümda? aieilausi kanei amaibü jungeibü habü mütli pendou ka ngei ditda.
Aying, kü shounyi, aishanga ngei ditbü ngühlang ho maibü aying, kasiei
Müt cheei che khulimbo shabü shona longa Mühghaüei jembulabü; lausikei müt cheei
Hobaje nashou Samuel süngsilop hoba Mühghaü si müt hamei maangshikbüa chingkei.
Hobaje Mühghaü müt che Eli jungto loukei, hoba hao to laukei, “Hai,
Israelbü chung pendou ka ngeibü ungshedbou lela ngei hao apien lo hoba Israelbü shousi shuongei lembü pendou ngei kabou chemdang la aku lo?

Kholonga aila ngei takletan phokubü ngeibü haitibü lembü shuong hoba lembüsabü shuong kanei aweasüngda? Ngeibü mütli Israelbü shuongei lembü maiboutham pendouei kan lolo netan yeitibü danko kü toje kaibü shousi shuong aei hangenda.
Hibü
Chühashi, kaibü chema jaishou che ongkei akilabü lele ngei kaibü phem hoba kaboueibü ik wapan apbulabü chalou shuong louada.
Hobaje Israel la kusikhang kubü pendoua nyi dühko khonsakko chühlabü, hoba kaibü chema ponpen shanga baushi che ongkei akilabü.

Hobaje kaibü müt ao ngei ngeibü lemshang ka wapan üpbo kila hao kho kaibü nyek leilukula hoba kaibü maangpon maangshat khangtilabü lele kilabü hoba kaibü chem ka longbü pendou haoen mütla yeibü jihaphaia hailabü.
Hobaje kaibü shou müt nyi Hofni hoba Finehas thükto haüthüklabü, ho ka shanga tetsida kilabü, chalou chenei ong ham hailabü.

Hobaje kü shanga ngei maanglembü ungshedbou che ngeibü maangpona hoba ngeibü maanga kibü tegü kümlabü lele longtikulabü, hoba ngei hao shanga chemdang kaangbü che huonglabü, hoba hao ponpen shanga onang naangkuko ngei pienbü thedanga pailabü.

Hobaje ho hai haüthüklabü, khei kaibü chema jouan kibü wekoei loulabü hoba hao to nam shisho hoba wentek che shanga hao to khüpetlabü hoba laulabü, ‘Ngei ka to sudajada, khei ngei haken che ongkei shaulabü lele ungshed kümsilei chenei ngo jinkushima.’ ”
Tou nashou Samuelei Eli thedanga
Hobaje ladang Eli hao kishanga lengan kikei, haoeibü nyek yuian kisije haoei hapla athükko kikei.
Hobaje Mühghaü wanthung monyetko kikei. Hobaje
Kheijinei
Hobaje hao Eli jungto laangjung haukei, hoba laukei, “Nyi ngo ngakei hoba ngo hanei kia!” Lausikei haoei laukei, “Ngei no anga, ngaian yepashi.” Hibü hao ngaikei hoba yepbei.
Hobaje
Tou Samuelei
Hobaje toukei
Hibü Eliei Samuel to laukei, “Hauan yepashi, hoba haoei no ngaalonga nyi hai laulabü, ‘Joyoashi,
Hobaje
Hobaje
Kho chaloua Eli chemdang shanga ngei laubü pendou khangbü ka khei thonbü sühko ngei Eli khulimbo kümlabü.
Aishanga haoei ngean kibü shedbü shanga ngei haoeibü chemdang ponpen shanga matjemlabü, aieilausi haoeibü shounyiei khüksiuok haoen lolo sungbakei, hoba haoei haosi athanget.
Hibü Elieibü chemdangei shed shonbü kho haitibü lembü ayingsi lembü kubüei ponpen shanga dean apla athüklabü lele ngei Eli chemdang to thealana.”
Hobaje ngeyang sühko Samuel yepan kikei, hoba
Kheijinei Eliei Samuel ngakei hoba laukei, “Kü shou Samuel.” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ngo hanei kia.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “
Hobaje Samuelei hao la pendou lenkei hoba hao ka ai ahu. Hobaje Eliei laukei, “Ho
Hobaje Samuel chingkei hoba
Hobaje Dan ka Beersheba sühko Israel pendouei Samuel
Hobaje
Hobaje Samueleibü ngüh Israelbü pendou jungto loukei. Tou Filistiabü khulimbo Israelbü lason to haukei, hoba Ebenezera shaikei, hoba Filistiabü Apheka shaikei.

Hobaje Filistiabüei haoen lolo Israelbü khulimbo lin küman kikei hoba ladang haoen lasona haüyokei, Filistiabü thedanga Israelei athük hapbei, hoba haoenei lason lashuok wapyoshanga müt hajar lei thüng haitikei.
Hobaje ladang mütshuong shaishang to louko kikei, Israelbü jaishou shuongei laukei, “Filistiabü thedanga tat
Hibü mütshuongei Shilo to ngühlang künbü hautikei hoba khüka Thükenbou
Hobaje ladang
Hobaje ladang Filistiabüei ngekbü ngühlang ditkei haoenei laukei. “Ibribüei shaishanga ngekbü ngüh yaangbü tetlabü ai?” Hobaje
Hobaje Filistiabü shuong hatko kikei, aishanga haoenei laukei, “Shaishang to mühghaü louakei.” Hobaje haoenei laukei, “Ügütü, aieilausi shangied hai akitei!
Ügütü, habü hau yaangbü mühghaü shuong ik ka aoei sen khümenla? Shieikoe phang phang pendouei Ijepbü to yama sühtibü kho khübü mühghaü ki.
Ibribü thedanga kan aaola ayeila hau kiashi, hoba kan lolo bousu tegü kishi, hoba wapyoashi!”
Hobaje Filistiabüei wapyokei, hoba Israelbüei athük, hoba haoen mütpem weko lulueibü neichem lamjung satkei. Hobaje haitibü juong kikei; aishanga Israelbü hajar khujin youei wapyobü müt tuongkei.
Hobaje Mühghaüeibü Busen sunglangkei, hoba Elieibü shounyi, Hofni si Finehas kei haitikei.
Hobaje lason ka Benjaminbü ka müt che laangjung haukei, hoba khünyet chaloutham jembü nei jitnyinan haoeibü khua tham kakan Shilo to loukei.

Hobaje ladang hao loukei, chühashi, bakhün nyangko Eliei chema setshanga limchühko setan kikei; aishanga Mühghaüeibü Busen shanga haoeibü maangpon lühjilühko kikei. Hobaje ladang müt kho sangnyu to lotkei hoba kho lenkei, sangnyubü khümbo haapyokei.
Hobaje ladang Eliei lemenbü ngühlang ditkei haoei laukei, “Ho lemenbü ngühlang tetlabü ai?” Hobaje müt kho panteiko loukei hoba Eli to lenkei.
(Tou Eli po anjinngaoto set kikei, hoba haoeibü nyek yuian kikei. Hibü haoei achühenko kikei.)
Hobaje müt khoei Eli to laukei, “Lason shuong ka loubü kho ngo hoba ngo tat lason shuong yoka satjung loukei.” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Lai yingkei kü shou?”

Hobaje ngühlang künan loubou khoei jongaikei hoba laukei, “Filistiabü thedang ka Israelbü lina hoba tokei mütli yoa haitibü juong kikei, hoba kaibü shounyi, Hofni si Finehas haia hoba Mühghaü Busen sunglanga!”
Hobaje ladang haoei Mühghaü Saopobü Busen shanga lenkei, bakhün nyangko haoeibü setshang ka phai to atkei, hoba haoeibü ngüm leiluan hao haikei. Haoei Israel po saonyi matjembei.

Hobaje haoeibü shou Fine- haseibü yak mang akongko shou bukla nyangko kikei, hoba ladang saoei Mühghaü Busen langa hoba saoeibü laoeibü bou hoba saoeibü lao haia dogo ngühlang ditkei saoei sao lolo khüpetkei hoba chemnoukei, hoba na hapbei aishanga sao khonkubü sao thük to loukei.
Hobaje sao hailabü chaloua sao to thuibü yaksa shuongei sao to laukei, “Tehüt, aishanga nyi bousu shou che bukkua.” Lausikei saoei ajongai, ayingsi saoei kho adam.
Hobaje, “Israel ka soneikangbü banga,” dogo lauko saoei nashou kho Ikhabod dogo nyenkei; aieilausi Mühghaü Busen sunglangkei hoba saoeibü laoeibü bou hoba saoeibü lao maukei.
Hobaje saoei laukei, “
Filistiabüei Mühghaü Busen sungkei hoba haoenei kho Ebenezer ka Ashdod to sungbakei.
Hobaje Filistiabüei Mühghaü Busen sungatkei, hoba kho Dagon chem to sungatkei hoba kho Dagon nyangko phokei.
Hobaje ladang Ashdodbü kho nyibounyet ngeyang enyu pikei, chühashi,
Lausikei ladang haoenei nyibounyet ngeyang enyu chühkei,
Hibü tat sühko Dagon ungshedbou shuong ayingsi Dagon chem to loubü aoeikei Ashdoda Dagon phoshang kaoa anakeida.
Lausikei Ashdodbü thüka
Hobaje ladang Ashdodbüei kho khei hapbei haoenei laukei, “Israel Mühghaüeibü Busen yoa akilabü; aishanga sen thükto hoba Dagon seneibü mühghaü thükto haoeibü ikok atsheibü kia.”

Hibü haoenei ngühlang hautian Filistiabü songdakbü pendou haoen jungto leishaikei hoba laukei, “Israel Mühghaü Busen shanga senei ai kümla?” Hobaje haoenei jongaikei, Israel Mühghaü Busen kho Gat jungto sunglangtiashi. Hobaje Israel Mühghaü Busen haoenei khüto sungjung haukei.
Lausikei haoenei kho kuktian phaia
Hibü haoenei Mühghaü Busen kho Ekron to hautikei. Hobaje Mühghaü Busen Ekron to loujinei Ekronbüei ngekko laukei, “Sen hoba sen mütli shemtila Israel Mühghaü Busen sen jungto sungbakuakei.”
