Hibü haoenei hautikei hoba Filistiabü songdakbü pendou leishaikei hoba haoenei laukei, “Israel Mühghaü Busen hautian apashi. Khoei sen hoba sen mütli ashemtila Israel Mühghaü Busen kho nyibou haoen kishang to ngaitian apashi.” Aishanga sangnyu pendoua aeibou panglangyoko kikei. Mühghaü ik khünei aeibou kaangan kikei.
Hobaje ühaiko kibü müt mouei sühkei, hoba sangnyu lemenyobüei müha onlangkei.
Hobaje Filistiabüei ungshedbou shuong hoba thu lenbü shuong ngaan laukei, “

Hobaje haoenei laukei, “Israel Mühghaü Busen kanei ngaitijinei kho kong tengaiti. Maimaitham hao la shedbü lembü sepeinyu ngaitikushi; kheijinei kan mou maian aplabü hoba haoeibü ik kan ka aila asungngaije kho kanei ngean aplabü.”

Kheijinei haoenei laukei, “Künei hao la ngaitikulabü shedbü shonbü lembü kho ai?” Hobaje haoenei laukei, “Filistiabü songdakbü shuong lühbak thüng honei kümbü takshou mou ngao hoba honei kümbü yepuk ngao; aishanga shieikoe che kan pendou thüka hoba kan songdakbü thüka kikei.

Hibü kanei kaneibü takshou mou noksa hoba kaonyek leilutikubü kaneibü yepuk noksa kümjan, hoba kanei Israelbü Mühghaü la soneikangbü kulabü; aingenyu haoei kan la kaneibü mühghaü shuong ka hoba kaneibü kaonyek ka haoeibü ik songoktilabü.
Kholonga aila kanei jembü maangpon Ijepbü hoba Farao haoeneibü maang kaangbü tegü kaangda? Ladang haoei kan yoa maangpanglabü kümbei haoenei mütshuong ohauti hoba haoen bangjung asat lo?
Tou hibü tongjin haanbü che, hoba kaang ajinbü sen nyatbü masu saoen penyi sungashi hoba lamleashi. Hobaje masu saoen shuong kho kailong khünei phenashi hoba khübü shoushou haoen ka chem to sungba.
Hobaje

Hobaje kho jembü lam jembü leilang Bethshemesh to angalonga sen to amaibü yaangbü kümbü kho, kho ki; lausikei kho khei aying longa kheijinei sen to meitibü ho haoeibü ikei aying dogo senei ngelabü kho tegü thushed senei kühshuokbü ong yinglabü.”
Hobaje mütshuongei kho tegü kümbei; hoba sen nyatbü masu penyi sungkei, hoba kailonga khübü kho phenkei, hoba haoeneibü shoushou shuong chema khinan phokei.
Hobaje haoenei

Hobaje masu shuong khoei lam tangbü to hauan Bethshemesh lam to haukei; haoen haujinei phangkabou to yankei, hoba nanae ayingsi mae aeto asepei. Hobaje Filistiabü songdakbü shuong haoen phai Bethshemesh sühko haukei.
Hobaje Bethshemeshbü pholia whet youshou latyoko kikei, hoba haoenei haoeneibü nyekei chühan litikei hoba saopobü Busen hapbei hoba kho hapan olinyokei.
Hobaje kailong Bethshemeshbü Joshuaeibü sek to lotkei, hoba laangnyu yaangbü che kikei khünei lokei, hoba haoenei kailongeibü bu kho leilukei hoba
Hobaje Levibüei
Hobaje ladang Filistiabü songdakbü müt ngaoei kho hapbei, khünyet chaloutham haoen Ekron to sepeinyu ngaikei.
Hobaje Filistiabüei

Hobaje honei kümbü yepuk shuong kho songdakbü müt ngao shangabü Filistiabü sangnyu pendou lühbak thüng ba lelepan kibü sangnyu hoba sang penyi shanga kikei, hoba tat sühko tokei laang yaangbü laobou haoenei
Hobaje
Hobaje Bethshemesh mütshuongei laukei, “Ho Saopobü Mühghaü
Hobaje haoenei Kiriath Jearima kibü jungto ngühlang künbü hautikei, hoba laukei, “Filistiabüei Busen sungbakua, kan kaiyena hoba kanei kho sunglangashi.”
Hibü Kiriath Jearimbü loukei hoba
Hobaje Kiriath Jeariama Saopobü Busen kibü chalou jih lounyu haukei khei po saoche thüng, hoba Israelbü pendou
Hobaje Samuelei Israelbü pendou to joyoko laukei, “Kanei
Kheijinei Israelbüei Baalim hoba Ashtarot apbei hoba
Hobaje Samuelei laukei, “Israelbü pendou Mizpa to yoshaiashi, hoba ngei kan shanga
Hobaje haoenei Mizpa to liko yoshaikei hoba haoenei dei khushaikei hoba kho
Hobaje ladang Filistiabüei Israelbü Mizpaa liko yoshaiakei dogo ditkei, Filistiabü songdakbü shuong Israelbü khulimbo longkei. Hobaje ladang Israelbüei kho ditkei haoenei Filistiabü to hatko kikei.
Hobaje Israelbüei Samuel to laukei, “Sen Filistiabü ik ka khümenla shanga
Hobaje Samuelei senyungbü san shoushou che sungkei, hoba kho juokbü lembü pendou shanga
Ladang Samuel juokbü lembü lembo kikei, kheijinei Filistiabüei Israelbü khulimbo lason wapyola nyangko loukei, lausikei kho chaloua Filistiabü thükto
Hobaje Israel mütshuong Mizpa ka haukei, hoba haoen Bethkar phang to alou shongko haoen to wapbei.
Kho phaia Samuelei laang che sungbakei hoba kho Mizpa si Shen kanglanga phokei, hoba kho nyen Ebenezer dogo nyenkei, hoba laukei, “Han sühko
Kho tegü Filistiabü thükkei, hoba haoen touje Israelbü leilang to alou. Hobaje Samuel salang sünga

Hobaje Filistiabüei Israel ka sungbü sangnyu shuong Ekron ka Gat sühko Israelbü la nyibou kungaikei, hoba Filistiabü ik ka Israelbüei haoeneibü kaonyek khümenan phokei. Hobaje Israelbü si Amorbü kanglanga sangmai kikei.
Hobaje Samuelei haoeibü salang sünga Israel matjembei.
Hobaje haoei po weko theneithenko Bethel, Gilgal hoba Mizpa peanchühkei; hoba khübü kaonyek pendoua haoei Israel matjembei.
Hobaje hao Rama to ngaikei, aieilausi khünei haoeibü chem kikei, hoba khünei haoei Israel matjembei, hoba haoei
Hobaje ladang Samuel baushi sinkei, haoei haoeibü shounyi Israel thüka matjembü shuong yeitikei.
Tou haoeibü shou jaishoubou nyen kho Joel kikei, hoba nyiboubü nyen Abija, haosi Beershebaa matjembü kikei.
Hobaje haoeibü shounyiei haoeibü lamnyua apai, lausikei nyakshinam lam aeto sepeikei, hoba besa lekei, hoba ngühmai mat ajem.
Kheijinei Israelbü jaishou shuong pendou haoen lolo liko yoshaikei hoba Samuel jungto Rama to loukei.
Hobaje haoenei hao to laukei, “No baushi, hoba kaibü shounyiei kaibü lama apaida, tou lubü phang pendou phatko kün matjemla kün la Choba che labü.”
Lausikei haoenei, “Kün la matjemla Choba che labü,” dogo laubüei Samuel aolinti, hoba Samuelei
Hobaje
Haoen Ijep kaodak ka ngei leian longbü chalou ka haoenei kümbü kümsilei pendou phatko tat sühko haoenei ngo inletan kia, hoba lubü mühghaü khangenbü kho tegü toukei haoenei ka to kümda.
Tou hibü haoeneibü ngüh ditshi, khei yingsi dogokei nyi haoen to wanan lenan haoen to maangsanglabü lenshi, hoba haoen thüka songdaklabü Choba kümthenleithen shanga haoen to lenshi.”
Hobaje Samuelei

Hobaje haoei laukei, “Kan thüka songdaklabü Chobaeibü kümthenleithen kho hai kilabü; haoei kaneibü bousushou shuong lelabü hoba haoen hao shanga hoba haoeibü kailong shanga hoba haoeibü koli sepai lela pienlabü; hoba haoeibü kailong thedanga haoen laanglabü.
Haoei haoen jembü shanga hajar thüka leiyeila hoba anjinsem bang thüka leiyeila pienlabü hoba haoeibü sek lattilabü. Hobaje haoeibü wapyobü peisilei hoba kailong peisilei shuong küntilabü.
Ponlem kümbü, thungbüjuokbü hoba wentek kümbü yeila shanga haoei kaneibü yaksa shousi shuong lelabü.
Hobaje haoei kaneibü sek hoba kaneibü semlüh bamang hoba kaneibü oliv bamang khübü maiboutham lelabü, hoba khübü kho haoeibü khangenbü la kulabü.
Hobaje kaneibü youshou phejan anboubü hoba kaneibü semlüh haoei lelabü hoba kho sungphatbü müt hoba haoeibü khangenbü la kulabü.
Hobaje kaneibü sambü shuong hoba samnyu shuong hoba kaneibü masu shuong ka maiboutham hoba kaneibü gadu haoei haoeibü kümaleia jinlabü.
Kaneibü sanlon dan ka phejan anboubü haoei lelabü, hoba kan haoeibü sambü yeilabü.
Kanei pienbü Choba shanga kho chaloua kanei ngeklabü hoba kho chaloua
Lausikei mütshuongei Samueleibü ngüh adit hoba haoenei laukei, “Aying! lausikei kün thüka Choba che kijan.
Khei künkei lubü phang pendou tegü yeilabü, khei küneibü Chobaei kün thüka matjemlabü hoba kün thedanga haulabü, hoba küneibü lason wapyolabü.”
Hobaje Samuelei mütshuongeibü ngüh pendou ditkei, hoba haoei
Hobaje
Tou Benjamin ka müt che Abieleibü shou nyenei Kish kikei; Abiel kho Zeroreibü shou Zeror kho Bekoraeibü shou, Bekora kho Afiaeibü shou Benjaminbü kibükeibü müt che kikei.
Hobaje haoeibü shou che kikei, haoeibü nyen Saul, heshou süngsilop maibü, hoba Israel shousi yoa hao to süngsilop maibü che ongkei akitei.
Tou Sauleibü bou Kisheibü gadu mauan kikei. Hobaje Kishei haoeibü shou Saul to laukei, “Tou ka yoa sambü yoka müt che leiashi hoba meimeiashi hoba gadu shuong lamashi.”

Hobaje haoei Efraim shongh kaodak danko haukei, hoba Shalisha kaonyek danko haukei, lausikei haoei haoen ühüp; kheijinei hao Shaalim kaonyek danko haukei, hoba khünei haoen akitei. Hobaje haoei Benjaminbü kaonyek danko haukei, lausikei haoenei khübü kho ühüp.
Ladang haoen Zuf kaodak to loukei, Saulei hao yoa kibü haoeibü sambü to laukei, “Kübouei gadu chüheilabü jeila seti shangabü bouje damlabü ong yeian apsi amaibula, kaiya seti sepeijung ngaiakho.”

Lausikei sambüei jongaiko laukei, “Chühashi, ho sangnyua soumo hatko jungeibü Mühghaü müt che kia; haoei laubü pendou haüthükko louda. Seti khüto haukho; aingenyu seti ai shanga hauda kho shanga haoei seti la lenenlakei kilabü.”

Kheijinei Saulei haoeibü sambü to laukei, “Lausikei chühashi, seti hausi setiei müt kho jungto ai jungan haula? Aishanga setieibü nyingkoa wentek khüma hoba Mühghaü müt jungto jungan haula jongsak che ongkei aki, setiei ai ki?”
Hobaje sambü khoei Saul to nyibou jongaiko laukei, “Chühashi, ngei kü ika Shekel leiboubü kia, seti la setieibü lam lenla kho ngei Mühghaü müt la kukho.”
Shangied Israela ladang müt cheei Mühghaü ka ngelabü phelaje kho tegü haoei laukei, “Kaiya, hoba senei hapbou jungto haukho.” (Aishanga tou thuseibü dogo laubü shangiedje hapbou dogo lauko kikei.)
Kheijinei Saulei haoeibü sambü to laukei, “Maiakei, kaiya, seti haukho.” Hibü Mühghaü müt kibü sangnyu to haosi haukei.
Haosi sangnyu to angjinei haosiei medei shuong deikhula haubü hapbei hoba haoen to laukei, “Hanei hapbou kilao?”
Hobaje haoenei haosi to jongaiko laukei, “Hao kia, chühashi, hao kan thedanga kia, tou panteiashi; aieilausi hao tat sangnyu to lotakei aishanga mütshuong tat shongha olinyobü lembü kia.

Kan sangnyu to lotsilengko kanei hao tangsheitham shongh to hao shaulayungla üangtoua hao haplabü. Aieilausi hao aloushongko mütshuong ashauayunglabü, aishanga haoei haitibü lembü haükuda, hoba phaila aoyou ngakei haoen shaudayungda, hibü kan tou angashi, aishanga ho jiha kanei hao haplabü.”
Hobaje haosi sangnyu to angkei; hoba haosi sangnyu to lotjinei chühashi, shongh to angla haosi thedangto Samuel loukei.
Tou Saul aloujinei chalou che kian

“Ngiet ho jiha ngei ka jungto müt che Benjamin kaonyek ka hautilabü hoba nyi hao ngeibü mütli Israel thüka leiyeibü lela onang naangkujan, hoba haoei ngeibü mütli Filistiabü ik ka khümenlabü; aishanga ngei kü mütli thükto chüha, aishanga haoeneibü ngekbü kü junga lousüha.”
Ladang Samuelei Saul hapbei,
Kheijinei bakhüna Saul Samuel jungto nyangko loukei, hoba laukei “Sanoudambo hapbou chem kho lanei ki, kü la lenbüma?”

Samuelei Saul to jongaikei, “Hapbou kho ngo ki, kü thedang to shongh khüto angashi; aishanga tat no kü yoa shaulayunglabü hoba ngeyang ngei no hautilabü, hoba kaibü maangpona kibü pendou ka la lenlabü.
Hobaje kaibü gadu shuong mauan chalou sem hauda, khübü to maang teku, aishanga khübü kho hapa hoba Israelei maangdak ao to ki? Kho ka shanga hoba kaboueibü chemdang pendou shanga aying lo?”
Hobaje Saulei jongaiko laukei, “Ngo Benjaminbü Israelbü mütli hanboutham aying lo? Hobaje ngeibü chemdang Benjaminbü mütli pendou to hanbou aying lo? Hibü aila nyi ho tegü kü to joyoda?”
Kheijinei Samuelei Saul si haoeibü sambü leian haukei, hoba yenbou pobchem shemjang to haoen leian loukei, hoba ngabü shuong aoyou müt khujin kikei, haoen yoa thükkabou setshanga haosi settikei.
Hobaje Samuelei thungbüjuokbü to laukei, “Ngei ka to lulu phoshi dogo lauko ngei ka la kubü phejan kho sungba.”

Hobaje thungbou juokbouei you kho hoba kho thüka kibü sungbakei hoba kho Saul thedanga phokukei. Hobaje Samuelei laukei, “Ai ka thedanga tenkula amenan phokei kho shauashi; aishanga ngei mütshuong angajinei jih asühtoua ka shanga phokubü ki.”
Hibü khünyet chaloua Saulei Samuel yoa shaukeiyungkei.
Hobaje ladang haoen shongh ka sangnyu to louyenko kikei, haoenei Saul shanga chemdaka shen che imbukei hoba hao khünei yepbei.
Kho phaia Samuelei ngeyang enyu lange saolamto chemdak to ngaan laukei, “Ngei no ungtilabü lele piashi.” Hibü Saul pikei, hoba hao yoa Samuel khongto haukei.
Haosi sangnyu thon sühko yanjinei Samuelei Saul to laukei, “Sambü kho seti thedangto hauteitiashi; hoba hao sepan phaia noje loteiashi, ngei ka la Mühghaüeibü ngüh ngetilabü.”
Kheijinei Samuelei onang thungdou sungbakei hoba kho haoeibü khua yeian jinkukei, hoba hao to sembung shepbei hoba laukei, “

Ladang no kü jungka tat bangjung haulaje kheijinei nyi müt nyi Racheleibü heea Benjamin leilanga Zelzaa haplabü, hoba haoenei ka to laulabü: Gadu shuong laobou nyi lamjung haukei kho hapa, hoba chühashi, kabouei gadu thounoulabü phoan ka shanga damlabü kian lauda, ‘Kü shou shangabü ngei ai kümla?’”

Kho phaia khüka no thedang ae hauashi hoba no Tabor yembu long jungto loulabü hoba khünei nyi müt sem Bethel to angko, müt cheei lonshou sem jungan, hoba lubü cheei wentek sem hoba lubü cheei ih shongmok che jungan, haüyolabü.
Hobaje Haoenei ka la salem kulabü hoba ka la wentek sem kulabü, laobou nyi haoeneibü ik ka sungletlabü.

Kho phaia Filistiabü sepai kishang Mühghaü shongh to no loulabü, hoba ladang no sangnyu thito loulaje, thuseibü tan che, kongkin, busen, laangkip kongkin, hoba kongkin haoen thedanga jungan louyenko nyi haüyolabü hoba haoenei thusei ngüh lauyoko kilabü.
Hobaje
Hobaje ladang khübü tetsida ka jungto loulaje kaibü jihei sakkubü tegü kümshi, aishanga Mühghaü ka yoa kia.

Hobaje no kü to shaang Gilgal to haulabü; hoba chühashi, ngo ka jungto juokbü lembü lemla hoba sangmai hakso lembü lemla louyenlabü, ngo ka jungto alou shongko hoba nyi ai kümla ka la alen shongko chalou nyet no haiteijan.”
Hobaje Samuel ka bangla hao phai sepeijinei, Mühghaüei hao la maangpon haanbü che kukei; hoba khübü tetsida pendou khünyet chaloua haüthükkei.
Hobaje haoen ladang shongh aeto loukei, chühashi, thuseibü tan cheei hao to haüyokei, hoba Mühghaüeibü soushou hanei hao thükto loukei, hoba haoei haoen yoa tetenko laukei.

Hobaje ladang shangied ngeyoan kibü shuongei maimaitham haoei thuseibü yoa tetenko joyoda dogo hapbei, mütshuongei cheei che to laukei, “Kisheibü shou to haüthükbü ho ai? Saul kei thuseibü yoa yoakei si?”
Hobaje nyangko lobü cheei jongaikei, “Hobaje haoeneibü bou ao?” Hibü ho tetentanbü ngüh la yeikei, “Saul kei thuseibü yoa yoakei si?”
Hobaje haoei ladang tetenko laubü thonan apbei, hao shongh khüto loukei.
Hobaje Sauleibü bou nashoubouei hao hoba haoeibü sambü to laukei, “Kasi lato haukei?” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Gadu shuong lamla haukei, hoba künei haoen kho ühüpsi kün Samuel jungto loukei.”
Hobaje Sauleibü bou nashoubouei laukei, “Sanoudambo Samuelei ka to ai laukei kü la lenbüma.”
Hobaje Saulei haobou nashoubou to, “Haoei küsi to shangashatetnyu gadu shuong hapa dogo laukei.” Lausikei sangle kümsilei laobou shanga Samuelei joyokei haoei hao la alen.
Kho phaia Samuelei mütshuong liko
Hobaje haoei Israel shousi shuong to laukei, “Hai,
Lausikei tat kanei kan thushed hoba maangshat pendou ka khümenbou Mühghaü asunglet, hoba kanei hao to laukei, ‘Aying lausikei kün thüka Choba che phobü.’ Tou hibü kan lolo
Hibü Samuelei Israel phang pendou nyangko leijung loukei, hoba Benjamineibü chung pienkei.
Hobaje haoei Benjamin chung haoen chempen chempen nyangko leian loukei, hoba Matrit chem- pen pienkei; hoba Kisheibü shou Saul pikei, lausikei haoenei hao lamjinei haoenei hao ühüp.
Hibü haoenei
Hibü haoei laangjung haukei hoba khüka haoen yoka hao leian loukei, hoba ladang hao müt yoa lokei mütshuong toje phakshok ka thükae suokbou kikei.
Hobaje Samuelei müt pendou to laukei, “
Kho phaia Samuelei mütshuong la Choba sangle kümthenleithen shanga lenkei, hoba tulaia dokei; hoba kho
Hobaje Saul kei haoen chem Gibea to ngaikei. Hobaje
Lausikei Bilieleibü shousi shuong atei laukei, “Ho mütei sen lai khümenla?” Hobaje haoenei hao la nyikukei hoba hao jungto jongsak jungan alouku. Lausikei haoei ngüh üangko kikei.
Tou lit che phaia Amonbü Nahashei leikei, hoba Jabesh Gilead shikei, hoba Jabeshbü müt pendouei Nahash to laukei, “Kün to theyolanyobü che kümashi, hoba künei no khangenlabü.”
Hobaje Ammonbü Nahashei haoen to laukei, “Khei kaneibü mae nyek phekan apsi ong ngei kan yoa kho kümlabü. Hobaje ngei kho Israelbü thüka himou shanga tentian phokulabü.”

Hobaje Jabeshbü jaishou shuongei hao to laukei, “Israelbü leilang pendou aeto ngühlang künbü shuong hautila shanga kün la chalou nyet onko labüma; hoba kho phaia kün khümenla aokei akilonga kün ka jungto longlabü.”
Kheijinei ngühlang künbü shuong Gibeabü Saul jungto loukei, hoba khübü ngüh mütshuongeibü nouei ditko lenkei; hoba müt pendou ngüh longko haapbei.
Hobaje chühashi, Saul khongthu ka masu shuong phaito loukei hoba Saulei laukei, “Mütshuong haapbü ho haoen khonsak ai?” Hobaje haoenei Jabeshbü mütshuongeibü ngüh kho hao la lenkei.
Hobaje ladang haoei khübü ngüh ditkei Mühghaüeibü hau yaangbü hao thükto loukei, hoba hao aeibou maangpokkei.

Hobaje haoei masu pongsu penyi sungbakei hoba khübü kho netla yeiko jemnyinkei, hoba khübü kho Israelbü leilang pendou to ngühlang künbü shuongeibü ika janjan kuan hautiko laukei, “Ao Saul si Samuel phai to aloulaje haoeibü masu to kho tegü kümlabü!” Hobaje pendou thükto
Hobaje haoei haoen Bezeka weanchühkei, hoba Israelbü hajar saongao sem hoba Jihudabü hajar sem kikei.

Hobaje louan kibü ngühlang künbü shuong to haoenei laukei, “Ho hai kanei Jabesh Gileadbü mütshuong to lenjan: Ngiet chanyu kaangbü jiha kan khümenlabü.” Hobaje ngühlang künbü shuong loukei hoba Jabesh mütshuong to laukei, hoba haoen olinko kikei.
Hibü Jabesh mütshuongei laukei, “Ngiet kün kan jungto longlabü, hoba kanei kün to maia dogo dambü pendou kümshi.”

Hobaje nyibounyet Saulei mütshuong tan sem la yeitikei, hoba haoenei shaishang chenyu khüto metu daomaua loukei, hoba Ammonbü shuong ngeyang ka chanyu chajihbou sühko haitikei hoba aoyou joukei haoen linkei; hibü müt nyi ongkei chela akitei.
Hobaje mütshuongei Samuel to laukei, “Saul kün thüka Choba la alelabü dogo laubü shuong kho aoyou? Khübü mütshuong leiba, haoen haitilabü!”
Lausikei Saulei laukei, “Tat müt che ongkei ühaitilabü, aishanga tat
Kheijinei Samuelei mütshuong to laukei, “Kaiya, sen Gilgal to haukho, hoba khünei Saul Choba yeibü ngekletakho.”
Hobaje müt pendou Gilgal to haukei, hoba khünei haoenei Saul Gilgala Choba yeitikei, hoba khünei haoenei sangmai hakso lembü lembei hoba khünei Saul hoba mütshuong pendou aeibou olinyokei.
Kheijinei Samuelei mütshuong pendou to laukei, “Chühashi, kanei kü to lenbü pendoua ngei kaneibü ngüh ditkua, hoba kan thüka Choba che phokua.
Hobaje tou, chühashi, kan thedanga Choba kho paida, hoba ngo baushi, hoba khu thua, hoba chühashi, ngeibü shousi shuong kan yoa kia hoba ngo mütao ka tat sühko ngo kan thedanga paia.
Ngo hanei kia, ngo khulimbo
Hobaje haoenei laukei, “Nyi küneibü nam lepan alekei ayingsi khon asakti, aoeibü ik kakei aikei alekei.”
Hobaje haoei haoen to laukei, “Kanei ngeibü ika aikei ühüp dogo kan khulimbo
Hobaje Samuelei mütshuong to laukei, “Mosa si Aron pienbü hoba kaneibü pisibousi shuong Ijep kaodak ka leiyenbü kho
Tou khei yingsije
Ladang Jakob Ijep to loukei hoba pisibousi shuongei
Lausikei haoenei
Hobaje haoenei
Hobaje
Hobaje ladang Ammonbü Choba Nahash kan khulimbo louko hapbei
“Hibü tou kanei ao Choba pienkei hoba ao kanei hikei, chühashi,
Kanei
Lausikei kanei
Hibü tou loan kishi hoba kan thedanga
Tat whet youshou latbü aying lo?
Hibü Samuelei
Hobaje müt pendouei Samuel to laukei, “Kün ühaila shanga
Hobaje Samuelei mütshuong to laukei, “Tehüt, kanei maimaitham habü amaibü pendou küma khei yingsikei
Ku akubü ayingsi akhümenlabü amlangbü peisilei shuong phai sepeinyu tengai.
Aishanga
Tokei aeilaleko kü shangaje kan shanga welaukula nangbüei
to soumo hatashi, hoba kaneibü maangpon khümboei maimaithama hao khangen- ashi; aishanga kan shanga haoei lai kümsilei yaang kümbei damanchühshi.
Lausikei kanei toukei amaiko kümbo laualonga, kan hoba kaneibü Choba ham maulabü.”
Saul Choba kümla khangjinei hao po khujin kikei, hoba haoei Israela po saonyito nyi songdakkei.
Hobaje Saulei hao shanga müt hajar sem pienkei, hajar nyije Saul yoa Mikmasa hoba Bethel shongha kikei, hoba joubü mütshuong haoei mütpem weko lulueibü neichem to ngaitikei.
Hobaje Gebaa Filistiabü sepai tan Jonathanei thükkei hoba Filistiabüei kho ditkei. Hobaje Saulei kaonyek pendoua teklaang metko laukei, “Ibribü ditashi.”
Hobaje Israelbü pendouei Saulei Filistiabü thüka dogo laubü hoba tokei Filistiabü yoa Israelbü mangsenyobü kikei dogo ditkei. Hobaje mütshuong Saul phainei Gilgala liko kamshaian kikei.

Hobaje Filistiabüei Israelbü to wapyola liko yoshaikei, kailong hajar khujin, koli sepai hajar lak; hoba mütshuong yungkoa phetsen tegü tan juong kikei, hoba haoen angkei hoba Mikmasa Beth-aven chaangbou aenei shaikei.
Ladang Israel mütshuongei ailai ong akümbo apbei, (aieilausi mütshuong kho thushedei sühan kikei,) kheijinei mütshuong haoen lolo laang phanga khünnyeta laanga hoba püngkhüna huan apbei.
Tou Ibribü atje Jordan danan Gad hoba Gilgala kikei, hoba müt pendouei lühjilühko hao phai sembei.
Hobaje Samuelei takletnyu phokubü jih sühkei, haoei chalou nyet haiko kikei, lausikei Samuel Gilgal to alou; hoba mütshuong hao ka linjung satan kikei.
Hobaje Saulei laukei, “Kü jungto hato juokbü lembü hoba sangmai lembü sungba.”
Hobaje haoei juokbü lembü wansilengko chühsi Samuel loukei hoba hao la salem kula Saul hao shuokla haukei.

Hobaje Samuelei laukei, “Nyi ai kümbei?” Hobaje Saulei laukei, “Aieilausi kü jungka mütshuong linjung satbü ngei hapbei, hoba jih takletbüa no alou, hoba Filistiabü Mikmasa haoen liko kamshaian kikei.”
Hibü ngei laukei “Tou Filistiabüei kü thükto Gilgal to louyenada hoba ngei
Hobaje Samuelei Saul to laukei, “Nyi ngoualoua küma; nyi
Lausikei tou kaibü sangle thonlabü;
Hobaje Samuel meimeikei hoba Gilgal ka Benjamineibü Gibea to angkei, hoba Saulei hao yoa kibü müt saongao lak thüng wekei.
Hobaje Saul hoba haoeibü shou Jonathan hoba hao yoa kibü mütshuong Benjamineibü Gebeaa kikei. Lausikei Filistiabü Mikmasa shaikei.
Hobaje sangshibü shuong Filistiabü shaishang ka tan sem la yeian longkei, tan che Ofra to haubü lamnyu Shual kaodak aeto sepeikei;
hoba lubü tan Beth Horon lam to sepeikei, hoba lubü tan yam aeto Zebaim yomang to chühan hautiko leilang aeto sepeikei.
Tou Israel kaodak pendoua in yaübü akitei, aishanga Filistiabüei laukei, “Ibribüei haoen lolo insiaubu yaütiashi.”
(Lausikei Israelbü pendou mütpem weko lulueibü youlatjin, namshou, hoba lulueibü chak, hoba lulueibü shap ula Filistiabü jungto yankei.
Khei yingsikei shap shanga hoba youlatjin, künshem shanga hoba pheyaüjin shanga hoba Choba chak shanga hoba takjin jinla haoeneibü ujin kikei.)
Hobaje lason chaloua Saul si haoshou Jonathan ika kibü to liman aoeibü ika kei in ayingsi aubu akitei.
Hobaje Filistiabü sepai tan Mikmash ngümjem lam to satkei.
Nyetche chalou Sauleibü shou Jonathanei haoeibü insiaubu jungbü heshoubou to laukei, “Kaiya, thi aeto Filistiabü sepai shuong kishang to seti haukho.” Lausikei haoei bou to alen.
Hobaje Migrona kibü chilang bulong phanga Gibea napheinei Saul kikei, hoba hao yoa kibü müt saongao lak thüng kikei.
Hobaje Shiloa
Hobaje Filistiabü sepai tan jungto Jonathan haula ngümjem lam kanglanga khünei jipheinei laanglip che kikei hoba jipheinei laanglip che hoba cheeibü nyen Bozez hoba cheeibü nyen Sene kikei.
Laanglip che Mikmash thedang aenei yungthang aeto longan kikei, hoba che kho Geba thedang ae yungkük thedang ae.
Hobaje Jonathanei haoeibü insiaubu jungbou heshoubou to laukei, “Kaiya, hoba habü akipbü sepai tan yoto seti haukho, aishanga
Hobaje haoeibü insiaubu jungbou heshoubouei hao to laukei, “Kaibü maangpona kibü pendou kümashi, no sepeiashi. Chühashi kaibü maangpon phai ngo ka yoa kia.”
Kheijinei Jonathanei laukei, “Chühashi, seti mütshuong danjung haukho, hoba mütshuong la seti haptikho.
Haoenei seti to kün kasi jungto alou shongko kiteishi dogo laualonga kheijinei setiei setti kishang ka akukko loan kiteikho, hoba haoen jungto seti üanglabü.
Lausikei haoenei seti to, ‘Kün jungto kaiyang,’ dogo laualonga kheijinei seti anglabü; aishanga
Hobaje haoen lolo Filistiabü sepai tan to lenkei, hoba Filistiabüei laukei, “Chühashi, Ibribü haoen lolo huan kibü khünyet ka longan kia!”

Hobaje sepai tan kabü mütshuongei Jonathan hoba haoeibü insiaubu jungbou to jongaikei, “Kün jungto kaiyang, künei kasi la den che lenkho.” Hobaje Jonathanei haoeibü insiaubu jungbou to laukei, “Kü phai kaiyanga; aishanga

Hobaje Jonathanei haoeibü youei ikei khomjung angkei, hoba haoeibü insiaubu jungbou hao phainei kikei; hoba Jonathan thedanga haoen tuongkei, hoba haoeibü insiaubu jungbouei hao phainei haoen haitikei.
Hobaje shaangla haitibüa Jonathan hoba haoeibü insiaubu jungbouei sekphai tho thünga müt saoche thüng haitikei.
Hobaje shaishanga hoba khongthua hoba müt pendou yoa hatbü lühbü kikei; sepai tan hoba sangshibü shuong haoenkei lühkei, hoba kaodak tennyinkei, hibü khünei hatbü lühbü yaang kikei.
Hobaje Benjamineibü Gibeaa Sauleibü lapheibü shuongei chühkei, hoba chühashi, shuong linjung satkei, hoba haoen jiji to satkei.

Kheijinei Saulei hao yoa kibü müt shuong to laukei, “Tou weanchühashi, hoba haoen ka ao satan apbei chühashi.” Hobaje ladang haoenei weanchühkei, chühashi, Jonathan hoba haoeibü insiaubu jungbou khünei akitei.
Hobaje Saulei Ahija to laukei, “Hato Mühghaüeibü Saopobü Busen sungba, aishanga Mühghaüeibü Saopobü Busen kho chaloua Israel shousi shuong yoa kikei.”
Hobaje Saulei ungshedbou to joyoko kijinei Filistiabü shaishanga kibü lemenleenbü athakko aei ong yeikei, hoba Saulei ungshedbou to laukei, “Kaibü ik sungngaiashi.”
Hobaje Saul si hao yoa kibü mütshuong liko yoshaikei, hoba lason to loukei, hoba chühashi, mütpem wekoeibü in lulueibü jenabou khulimbo kikei, hoba khünei panglangbü yaang kikei.
Tou Ibribü shangied Filistiabü yoa kibü shuong aoyou kaijembo kibü kaonyek ka haoen yoa shaishang to angkei khei haoenkei, Saul hoba Jonathan yoa kibü Israelbü to yokei.
Kho tegü Israelbü müt pendou aoyou Efraim shongh kaodaka haoen lolo huan kikei, Filistiabü satda dogo ditjinei khei haoenkei lasona haoen phai khaplapbo phai sembei.
Hibü kho chaloua

Hobaje kho chaloua Israel mütshuong maangto shatlabü thushed kikei, lausikei Saulei mütshuong to theyolanyoko laukei, “Aoei nanganak shongko hoba ngei kü mütpemei dangbou shuong to phok alamtoua shaulayunglaje shedsikhau baushi.” Hibü khünyet aoeikei jepansean achüh.
Hobaje müt pendou yam to atkei hoba khünei kaoa naodei kikei.
Hobaje ladang mütshuong yam to lotan kikei, chühashi, naodei yanjung louyenkei, lausikei ao müteikei jembü ikei jembü sembung to thoan ayung, aishanga mütshuongei theyolanyobü to hatkei.

Lausikei Jonathanei haobouei mütshuong to ngühkhüm kuko theyolanyobü adit, hibü haoei haoeibü ika kibü ju thon kho litian naodei hap to jukettian haoeibü ik haoeibü sembung to thoan jinkei; khoyam haoeibü nyek sa angkei.
Kheijinei mütshuong yoa cheei jongaikei, “Kabouei mütshuong to kaangkhühtham theyolanyoko laukei, ‘Aoei tat chaloua shaula yunglaje hao shedsikhau baushi;’ hoba mütshuong semthetkei.”
Kheijinei Jonathanei laukei, “Kübouei kaonyek khon kutida, chühashi, ngeibü nyek lai sa angetnyu yeian ki! Aieilausi ngei ho naodei hansho seanchühkei.
Mütshuongei haoeneibü dangbou ka haushaibü mühbü shaukei tegüje tat Filistiabü haitibü latetche juongbou yingkhoulabü.”
Hobaje khünyet chalou kho haoenei Mikmash ka Aijalon sühko Filistiabü to wapyokei; hoba mütshuong aeibou semthetan kikei.
Hobaje mütshuongei soletbü thük to laangkei hoba sanshuong, masu hoba masu shoushou sungkei, hoba haoeneibü kaoa haitikei, hoba mütshuongei khübü kho sii yoan shaukei.
Kheijinei müt atei Saul to ho hai laukei, “Chühashi, mütshuongei sii yoan shaubüei haoenei

Hobaje Saulei laukei, “Kan lolo mütshuong yoa lenashi: Mütpem wekoei jembü masu hoba mütpem wekoei san kü jungto sungba hoba khübü kho haitishi, hoba shauashi, hoba sii yoan shaubüei shabü teshon; hoba müt pendouei lulueibü masu hao yoa khüyou sungbakei, hoba khünei khübü haitikei.”
Hobaje Saulei

Hobaje Saulei laukei, “Sen Filistiabü phaito tao yankho, hoba ngeyang lang angeshongko senei haoen shikho, hoba senei müt che ongkei tüpyokho.” Hobaje haoenei laukei, “Ka la aiong maikei kümashi.” Kheijinei ungshedbouei laukei, “Sen hanei Mühghaü nyangko haukho.”
Hobaje Saulei Mühghaü ka songsido phekei. “Ngo Filistiabü phaito shijung yanlep sai? Nyi haoen Israelbü ik to khümbo kulep sai?” Lausikei haoei hao to khünyet ai ajongai.
Hobaje Saulei laukei, “Hato nyangko kai- ya, kan mütshuongeibü leiyeibü shuong, hoba ho chaloua ainei shedbü ki ngeashi hoba chühashi.
Aishanga
Kheijinei haoei Israelbü pendou to laukei, “Kan jipheinei kishi, hoba kü shou Jonathan küsi jiaenei kilabü.” Hobaje mütshuongei Saul to laukei, “Ka la ai maikei kho kümashi.”
Hibü Saulei laukei, “O
Hobaje Saulei laukei, “Ngo hoba küshou Jonathan kanglanga phaang pakashi.” Hobaje Jonathan to baukei.
Kheijinei Saulei Jonathan to laukei, “Nyi ai kümbei kü la lenbü.” Hobaje Jonathanei hao la ngetikei. “Ngei maimaitham ngeibü ika kibü ju thonei naodei hansho seanchühkei, hoba chühashi, ngo haijan.”
Hobaje Saulei laukei, “Mühghaüei khei kümshima, hoba aeikei yingshi; aishanga no maimaitham hailabü, Jonathan!”
Hobaje mütshuongei laukei, “Jonathan aoei ho thüksimin yaangbü sungbakei hao hailep lo! Mühghaüei shiletshi; lang kibou
Kheijinei Filistiabü phaito sembü ka Saul angkei hoba mütshuong haoeneibü kishang to haukei.

Tou ladang Saulei Israel thüka sangle lekei, haoei pendou aenei dangbou shuong khulimbo wapyokei. Moab khulimbo Ammon shousi shuong khulimbo, Edom khulimbo, Zobabü Choba shuong khulimbo hoba Filistiabü khulimbo hoba lae aeto ong hao sepeikei haoei thük hapbei.
Hobaje haoei maangkaangko kümbei hoba Amalekbü shian apbei. Hobaje Israel shibü pendoueibü ik ka khümenkei.
Tou Saulei shousi Jonathan, Ishvi hoba Malkhishua kikei, hoba haoeibü shou yaksa müt nyi nyen hai kikei: Noushounyueibü nyen Merab hoba nashounyueibü nyen Maikel.
Hobaje Sauleibü yak nyen Ahimaazeibü shou Ahinoam kikei, hoba haoeibü se- pai tan leiyeibü kongnyubou kho Sauleibü bou nashoubou Nereibü shou Abner kikei.
Hobaje Sauleibü bou nyen Kish kikei, hoba Abnereibü bou Ner, kho Abieleibü shou kikei.
Hobaje Saul salang sünga Filistiabü khulimbo wapyo kaangbüsekbü kikei. Hibü ladang ong Saulei lakjaibü ayingsi maang kaangbü müt at haplaje haoei lanthükla shanga hao eik la leko kikei.
Kheijinei Samuelei Saul to laukei, “
Hai, Thükenbou
Tou hauan Amalek shiashi, hoba haoenei kibü pendou khümbomeiko soashi, hoba haoen tejouti. Bousu yaksa ham, hoba nasak si senyopbü, masu si san, hoba ut si gadu pendou haitiashi.”
Hobaje Saulei mütshuong ngakei, hoba Telaima haoen weanchühkei, youeibü sepai hajar saoan, hoba Jihudabü müt hajar an.
Hobaje Saul Amalekbü sangnyu to loukei, hoba yomanga hao thokei.

Hobaje Saulei Kenbü to laukei, “Hauashi, bangashi, Amalekbü yoa ngei kan mautisi amaibüla haoen yoka kan yanan apashi, aieilausi Israelbü Ijep ka longjinei kanei Israel shousi shuong to sanou lenkei.” Hibü Kenbü Amalekbü yoka bangjung satkei.
Hobaje Saulei Amalekbü shuong Havila ka Shur sühko (kho Ijep chaang ae sühko) thükkei.
Hobaje haoei Amalekbü Choba Agag langsenkei, hoba inlouei mütshuong lemailela shemtikei.

Lausikei Saul hoba hao mütshuongei Agag hoba sanlon maiboutham hoba masu hoba amenbü shuong hoba sanlon shoushou shuong hoba ai maikei pendou joutikei hoba khübü kho lemailela ashemti, lausikei ajanjan pendou amaibü hoba nangletbü kho lemailela mautikei.
Kheijinei Samuel jungto
“Ngei Saul Choba yeitibü shanga ngo maang shaleda, aieilausi hao kü phai asemda, hoba ngei sakkubü haoei aküm.” Hobaje Samuel khauangkei, hoba langyang sünga haoei
Hobaje Samuel ngeyang enyu Saul to haüyola haukei, lausikei hao la lenkei, “Saul Karmel to haua, hoba chühashi, haoei jembü shanga nyenhang che yaüakei hoba sepeinyu louan Gilgal to yana.”
Hobaje Samuel Saul jungto loukei, hoba Saulei hao to laukei, “No
Hobaje Samuelei laukei, “Ngeibü nouei sanlon wibü hoba masu pongsu wibü laobou ngei ditda kho tetlabü ai?”
Hobaje Saulei jongaikei, “Haoenei Amalekbü ka khübü kho sungkei; aishanga
Kheijinei Samuelei Saul to laukei, “Khei kiteishi,
Hobaje Samuelei laukei, “Nyi no kaibü nyeka hanbü tegü yingasikei, no Israel phang thüka chungthem la yeitikei ayinglo? Hobaje
Hobaje
Kholonga aila nyi
Hobaje Saulei Samuel to laukei, “Haü, ngei
Lausikei mütshuongei sanlon hoba masu pongsu kongnyu peisilei maulabü shuong Gilgala
Lausikei Samuelei laukei, “
Aishanga khulimbo meimeibü kho seibüyaübü shabü tegü ki, nyi
Hobaje Saulei Samuel to laukei, “Ngei shabü shona, aishanga ngei
Hibü tou ngei ka to sudajada, ngeibü shedbü shabü apbu, hoba ngei
Hobaje Samuelei Saul to laukei, “Ngo ka ae asepeilabü; aieilausi nyi
Hobaje Samuel satla sepeijinei haoei haoeibü neithona senetkei hoba kho jitnyinkei.
Hobaje Samuelei hao to laukei, “
Hobaje tokei Israel Soneikangbouei ayepeilabü ayingsi maangpon asepeilabü; aieilausi maangpon sepeilabü lele hao müt che aying.”
Kheijinei haoei laukei, “Ngei shabü shona, khei yingsikei ngei ka to sudajada, kü mütli jaishou shuong thedanga hoba Israel to ngeibü soumo lenbüma, hoba
Hibü Samuel Saul phai nyibou sepeinyu ngaikei, hoba Saulei
Kheijinei Samuelei laukei, “Amalekbü Choba Agag kü jungto hato leian kai.” Hobaje Agag hao jungto olinangko loukei, hoba Agagei laukei, “Maimaitham haibü khauekbü dankhümda!”
Hobaje Samuelei laukei, “Kaibü inei yaksa shuong shousi akiko aptibü tegü yaksa shuong yoa kaibü nyu shousi akilabü.” Hobaje Gilgala
Kheijinei Samuel Rama to haukei, hoba Saul jembü chem to Sauleibü sang Gibea to haukei.
Hobaje Samuel Saul jungto hao ühai shongko touje alou; lausikei Samuelei Saul shanga mang haapbei, hoba
Hobaje Samuelei laukei, “Ngo lai haula? Saulei kho dida longa haoei ngo haitilabü.” Hobaje
Hobaje lemshang to Jesse ngaashi, hoba nyi ai kümla ngei ka la lenkho; hoba aoeibü nyen ngei ka la lenlaje nyi hao kü shanga onang naangkujan.”
Hobaje Samuelei
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Haü sangmai; ngo
Hobaje ladang haoen louan kikei haoei Eliab to chühkei hoba laukei, “Maimaitham
Lausikei
Kheijinei Jesseei Abinadab ngakei, hoba hao Samuel thedang to dantikei, hoba haoei laukei, “Ho
Kheijinei Jesseei Shamma nyangko dantikei, hoba haoei laukei, “Hokei
Hobaje Jesseei haoeibü shousi müt nyet Samuel thedang to dantikei.

Kheijinei Samuelei Jesse to phekei, “Kaibü shousi pendou hanei kia yingkao lo?” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Toukei napeibou jouakei, hoba chühashi, haoei san lomda.” Hobaje Samuelei Jesse to laukei, “Ngala hautian leiba aishanga hao hato alou shongko sen asatlabü.”
Hibü Jesseei leila hautikei hoba hao leian loukei. Tou hao son maibü hoba nyek maibü yembü heshou hoba chühmangsühlabü che kikei. Hobaje
Kheijinei Samuelei onang jinbü ngoulaang thung sungkei hoba haoeibü jaisinasi yoa onang naangkukei, hoba kho chalou ka jaüan
Tou
Hobaje Saul khangenbü shuongei hao to laukei, “Tou Mühghaü ka amaibü soushouei no khonkutida.
Tou küneibü
Hobaje Saulei haoeibü khangenbü shuong to laukei, “Tou kü shanga maisho kaangbü müt che lambushi hoba hao kü jungto leiba.”

Kheijinei heshou shuong yoa cheei jongaikei, “Chühashi, ngei Bethlehembü Jesseeibü shou che kongkin tuokla sangbüdobü müt che hapa, hoba hao hau yaangbü maang kaangbü hoba wapyobü müt, kümaleia tedtangbü hoba maangdühlabü müt, hoba
Hibü ngühlang künbü Jesse jungto hautikei hoba laukei, “Kaibü shou san yoa kibü kho kü jungto hautibü.”
Hobaje Jesseei gadua wentek hoba ih shongmok che küntian lonshou che hoba khübü kho hao shou Dawid yoa Saul jungto hautikei.
Hobaje Dawid Saul jungto loukei, hoba hao thea lokei, hoba haoeibü insiaubu jungbou hao yeikei.
Hobaje Saulei Jesse jungto ho lauko hautikei, “Ngei ka to sudajada: Dawid kü thea lotiashi, aishanga kü thedanga hao maangshik hapa.”
Hobaje ladang amaibü soushou Mühghaü ka Saul thüka kikei, Dawidei kongkin sungjung louan haoeibü ikei tuokkei kheijinei Saul haksoko maian kikei, hoba amaibü soushou hao ka bangkei.
Tou Filistiabü sangjak wapyola liko yoshaikei, hoba haoen Sokoa liko yoshaikei, laobou Jihudabüeibü kikei, hoba Efes Dammima Soko si Azeka kanglanga shaikei.
Hobaje Saul si Israel mütshuong liko yoshaian Ela yomanga shaikei hoba Filistiabü to wapyola lin küman likei.
Hobaje Filistiabü shongha ji pheinei lokei hoba Israelbü shongha ji pheinei lokei; hoba haoen kanglanga yomang che kikei.
Hobaje Filistiabü shaishang ka lajamleibou che nyenei Goliat, Gatbü che longkei, ao thong iknop lak hoba ikkam che kikei.
Hobaje haoei khua chinam khun che hanan kikei, hoba nameibü mangyuk yukan kikei, hoba mangyuk kho chinam shekel hajar ngao atsheibü kikei.
Hobaje haoeibü youa youeibü hele hoba haoeibü phakshok kanglanga chinam aubu kikei.
Hobaje haoeibü aubu sembung kho neitakbüeibü jim tegü kikei, hoba haoeibü aubu phongkung nam shekel saongao lak atsheibü kikei, hoba haoeibü aih jungbü che thedang to haukei.

Hobaje hao lokei, hoba Israelbü sepai tan to ngekkei hoba haoen to laukei, “Aila kan lason lin küman lola longkei? Ngo Filistiabü che hoba kan Sauleibü khangenbü shuong aying lo? Kan shanga kanei müt che pienashi, hoba hao kü jungto louyantiashi.
Haoei kü to wapyola thükalonga hoba ngo haitialonga kheijinei kün kaneibü sambüla yeilabü, lausikei ngei hao thükalonga hoba hao haitialonga kheijinei ngeibü sambü yinglabü, hoba kün khangenlabü.”
Hobaje Filistia bouei laukei, “Tat ngei Israelbü sepai tan khulimbo huiletda, küsi liko wapyola kü la müt che kuashi.”
Ladang Saul hoba Israelbü pendouei Filistia boueibü ngüh kho ditkei, haoen aeibou mokkei hoba hatkei.
Tou Dawid kho Jihudaa Bethlehem Efratbü nyenei Jesseeibü shou kikei, hoba haoei bousu shou müt set kikei. Hobaje Jesse kho Saul haanga baushi, mütshuong yoa haangkhu onbü müt che kikei.
Hobaje Jesseeibü jaishoubou müt semje Saul yoa lason to hauan kikei, hoba lason to haubü haoeibü shousi sem kho nyen Eliab, jaishoubou hoba hao thenkabou Abinadab hoba semboubü kho Shamma.
Hobaje Dawid napeiboutham kikei, hoba jaishou müt sem kho Saul phai sembei.
Tou Bethlehema hao boueibü sanlon pangteila Dawid Saul jungka hau longei dogo paikei.
Hobaje Filistiabü ngeyang si chasem aei aei nyangko loukei hoba Goliatei chalou saonyi longyoko lokei.
Hobaje Jesseei hao shou Dawid to laukei, “Tou kajaisi shuong shanga wentek ngoubü efa che hoba wentek an kho sungan khübü kho tongde kajaisi shuong shaishang to jungan hauashi.
Hobaje habü sendei onbü an hajar thüka leiyeibü jungto jungan hauashi hoba kajaisi shuong lai ong kida chühashi, hoba haoen lai ong kidaje no longeijinei shangashatbü ngühlang sungba.
Tou Saul si kaijaisi shuong hoba Israel müt shuong pendou Ela yomanga Filistiabü to wapyoko kia.”
Hobaje Dawid ngeyang enyu pikei hoba lombü la san phoyokukei hoba Jesseei laubü tegü jungkei, hoba haukei, hoba sepai tan san sana la phangko hauko kijinei thangtetlabü kümbü sühko hao haukei.
Hobaje Israelbü si Filistiabü haoen lason san sana theshuokyoko kikei.
Hobaje Dawidei haoeibü on kho lombü la phokukei hoba sepai tan yoto laangjung haukei, hoba louan haoeibü jaisi shuong la salem kukei.
Hobaje haoei haoen to joyoko kijinei, chühashi, Gata Filistiabü lajamleibou nyenei Goliat, Filistiabü san ka longkei hoba shaangla tegü jeteibü ngüh laukei, hoba Dawidei khübü kho ditkei.
Hobaje Israelbü pendouei ladang haoenei müt kho hapbei hao jungka satkei hoba aeibou hatko kikei.

Hobaje Israel mütshuongei laukei, “Tou angko kibü müt kho kanei haplao? Maimaitham Israelbü huiletla hao longakei, hoba aoei hao haitilaje Chobaei haoeibü nyaksinam yaangbüei keitilabü hoba hao la haoeibü nouyangshou kulabü. Hobaje hao boueibü sanglea hopatham kilabü.”

Hobaje hao nyangko loan kibü mütshuong to Dawidei joyoko laukei, “Aoei ho Filistiabü haitilaje hoba Israel ka himou apbulaje hao to ai kümla? Aishanga langkibü Mühghaüeibü sepai tan khulimbo huiletbou akipbü Filistiabü ho ao?”
Hobaje mütshuongei hao to jongaiko laukei, “Hao haitibou müt khüto kho khei kümlabü.”

Hobaje haoei mütshuong to joyojinei haojai jaishoubou Eliabei ditkei hoba Dawid to Eliab khauangkei hoba laukei, “No aila louyankei? hoba sanlon shisho kho aola phoyokukei? No lilibü hoba kaibü maang amaibü ngei ngekei; aishanga no lason to chühla louyankei.”
Hobaje Dawidei laukei, “Ngei tou ai kümbei? Kho ngüh che ong aying lo?”
Hobaje haoei hao jungka lubü aeto sepeikei, hoba kho tegü laukei, hoba mütshuongei nyiboukei shaangla tegü ong jongaikei.
Hobaje ladang Dawidei joyobü ngüh shuong ditkei, haoenei khübü kho Saul la ngetikei, hoba haoei hao ngala hautikei.
Hobaje Dawidei Saul to laukei, “Hao shangabü aokei maang apbo teki! No khangenbou haulabü hoba ho Filistiabü to wapyolabü.”
Hobaje Saulei Dawid to laukei, “Ho Filistiabü khulimbo hao to wapyola no haula athük; aieilausi no nashou che ong, hoba hao nashoudangka thama wapyobü müt che ki.”
Hobaje Dawidei Saul to laukei, “No khangenbouei hao boueibü sanlon lombei, hoba sanshuong yoka ladang molosaonyu cheei ayingsi sap cheei san che langkei,
ngo kho phaito haukei hoba kho haitikei hoba khoeibü sembung ka kho khümenkei. Hobaje ladang hao kü jungto longeikei, ngei haoeibü kaoshang wia jungkei hoba hao to setkutikei hoba hao haitikei.
No khangenbouei molosaonyu si sap ham haitikei, hoba ho akipbü Filistia bouei langkibü Mühghaüeibü sepai tan nyikusije haoen jetei phatko kilabü.”
Hobaje Dawidei laukei, “Molosaonyu si sapeibü ik ka ngo khümenbü
Hobaje Saulei haoeibü hele Dawid la lekukei.

Hobaje Dawidei haoeibü in haoeibü hele thüka lekei, hoba jim akibüa hao haula haujembei; aieilausi haoei khübü haang ühaangyep, hoba Dawidei Saul to laukei, “Ngo habü yoa haula athük; aieilausi ngei habü ho haang ühaangyep.” Hobaje Dawidei hao ka khübü kho hangletkei.

Hobaje haoei haoeibü ika julo jungkei, hoba shumang ka laang tongtongbü pemngao hao shanga pienkei, hoba haoei jungbü sanlombü nyingkou, khei haoeibü phekhon nyingkoua jinkei; hoba haoeibü ika laang tetbü nyampük phekhon kikei, hoba hao Goliat bou nyangko haukei.
Hobaje Filistiabü loukei, hoba Dawid nyangko loukei, hoba haoeibü aih jungbou hao thedang to haukei.
Hobaje ladang Filistia bouei kaijembo chühkei hoba Dawid hapbei haoei haola nyikukei; aieilausi hao nashou che ong hoba thong maibü hoba hesisao maibü che kikei.
Hobaje Filistia bouei Dawid to laukei, “No kü jungto julo jungan loulabü ho ngo kei lo?” Hobaje Filistia bouei haoeneibü mühghaü shuong phongko Dawid to khükko laukei.
Hobaje Filistia bouei Dawid to laukei, “Kü jungto kaiya, hoba ngei kaibü phe mühkabü au la hoba yammei la kulabü.”
Kheijinei Dawidei Filistia bou to laukei, “No kü jungto in jungan, aubu jungan, javelin jungan louda, lausikei ngoje nyi nyikubü Israel sepai tan Mühghaü, Thükenbou
Tat chalou
Hobaje hanei kambü shuong pendouei
Hobaje ladang Filistia bou kho meimeijung Dawid to shuok- yola loukei, Dawid tongde haukei hoba Filistia bou shuokyola sepai tan aeto laangkei.

Hobaje Dawidei haoeibü ik nyingkou to phekattikei hoba khüka laang che sungenkei, hoba kho wenan litikei, hoba Filistia bou la khüngjaa tetkei, hoba laang kho haoeibü khulo to atkei, hoba haoeibü the khümbo kaoa tuongkei.
Hibü Dawidei Filistia bou to laang litibü phekhon cheei thük hapbei, hoba Filistia bou to tetkei hoba hao haitikei, lausikei Dawideibü ika in akitei.
Kheijinei Dawid laangjung haukei hoba Filistia bou thüka lokei, hoba haoeibü in setenan khoei haoeibü khu thetkei. Hobaje ladang Filistiabüei haoeneibü hau kibü müt haibü ngekei haoen linjung satkei.

Kheijinei Israel hoba Jihudabü mütshuongei hau pendouei ngekko meimeikei hoba Gat sühko Filistiabü shuong kho haoenei shijung haukei; hibü leilubü Filistiabü mütshuong kho lama Sharaim ka Gat hoba Ekron sühko tuongkei.
Hobaje Israel shousi shuong Filistiabü phai shijung haubü ka longeikei hoba haoenei haoen shaishang shikei.
Hobaje Dawidei Filistia boueibü khu sungkei hoba kho Jerusalem to sungbakei lausikei haoei haoeibü insiaubu haoeibü neichema phokei.
Hobaje ladang Filistiabü khulimbo Dawid haubü Saulei hapbei, haoei Abner sepai san tan leibou to laukei, Abner ho heshoubou ho aoeibü shou? Hobaje Abnerei laukei, “O Choba, ngei lenla athük.”
Hobaje Chobaei laukei, “Heshoubou kho aoeibü shou yingkeije nyi pheyoshi.”
Hobaje Filistiabü haitibü ka Dawid longeijinei Abnerei hao leijung loukei hoba hao Saul jungto haoeibü ika Filistia boueibü khu jungan leian loukei.
Hobaje Saulei hao to laukei, “Heshoubou, no aoeibü shou?” Hobaje Dawidei jongaikei, “Ngo Bethlehembü no khangenbou Jesseeibü shou.”
Hobaje ladang Dawid si Saul ngüh joyobü thonkei, khei Jonathanei Dawid to soushou maangpon chela yeikei hoba Jonathanei jembü langkei tegü hao to sanoukei.
Hobaje kho chalou khünei Saulei Dawid hao yoa phokei hoba touje hao boueibü chem to ohauti.
Kheijinei Jonathan si Dawid theyolanyobü che kümbei, aieilausi haoei hao to jembü tegü sanoukei.
Hobaje Jonathanei hao to kibü hele kho hangletkei, hoba kho Dawid la kukei, hoba haoeibü hele, haoeibü in, haoeibü lau, hoba haoeibü mepou yoan kukei.

Hobaje Saulei Dawid lato ong hautilaje khüto hao ngüha leko haukei, hoba hao lolo songsido kiko jungeikei. Hobaje Saulei haoeibü wapyobü mütshuong thüka phokei, hoba tokei Saul khangenbü shuong thedanga kho maibü kikei.

Hobaje haoen longeijinei, Dawidei Filistiabü haitibü ka longeijinei Israelbü sangle pendou ka yaksa shuong chia lauko hoba tombolakko Saul Choba shuokla busen, kongkin pithung yoa olinbüei chisichia pekyoko atyoko longkei.
Hobaje yaksa shuongei haoeneibü kongkin, pithung metyobüa pekyoko chia atkei hoba laukei. “Saulei hajar haitikei, lausikei Dawidei hajar an haitikei.”

Hobaje Saul aeibou khauangkei hoba kho laubüei hao aolinti, hoba haoei laukei, “Haoenei Dawid la hajar an yeitikukei hoba haoenei kü la hajar ong yeitikukei; hoba touje Choba sangle aying dangaje haoei lubü ai hapla?”
Hobaje khünyet ka jaüan Saulei Dawid to nyekto shatkei hoba maang alembo apbei.
Nyibounyet
Hobaje Saulei aubu suan litikukei, aishanga haoei laukei, “Ngei khei Dawid kümthanga nimnim hanettilabü.” Hobaje Dawidei nyinei sühko hao jungka thekan sattikei.
Hobaje Saulei Dawid to hatko kikei. Aieilausi
Hibü Saulei hao ka hao kuktikei, hoba hajar che thüka hao leiyeibou yeitikei, hoba mütshuong thedanga hao hau longei dogo lekei.
Hobaje Dawidei jembü kümsilei pendoua sangkodoko jungeikei, hoba
Hobaje ladang haoei jembü lolo aeibou sangkodoko jungeikei dogo Saulei chühenkei, haoei hao to hatjihatko lokei.
Lausikei Israel si Jihuda pendouei Dawid to sanoukei, aieilausi haoen thedanga hao hau longei dogo lekei.
Kheijinei Saulei Dawid to laukei, “Kü shou noushounyu hanei kia, sao ka la yakla lela kulabü, kü shanga hau aei kiashi, hoba
Hobaje Dawidei Saul to laukei, “Ngo Chobaeibü kounyang yeilabü lele Israela ngo ao hoba ngeibü langkei ayingsi kün chem- penkei ai?”
Lausikei ladang Sauleibü nouyangnyu Merab Dawid la kulabü jih sühkei sao Meholabü Adriel la yakla lela kuan apbei.
Hobaje Sauleibü shou Maikelei Dawid to sanoukei, hoba haoenei Saul to lenkei, hoba khoei hao olintikei.
Hobaje Saulei laukei, “Hao shanga Maikel sung che kilabü, hoba Filistia büeibü ik hao khulimbo kilabü lele ngei hao la sao kulabü.” Hibü Saulei Dawid to laukei, “No tat ngeibü haishoubou yeilabü.”

Hobaje Saulei hao khangenbü la sakkuko laukei, “Dawid to chemphanga joyoashi, hoba lenashi, chühashi, Chobaei ka to olinda, hoba haoeibü khangenbü pendouei no sanouda, hibü tou Chobaeibü kounyang yeishima.”

Hobaje Sauleibü khangenbü shuongei khübü ngüh Dawideibü noua thenan lenkei. Hobaje Da- widei laukei, “Ngo shalebü müt che dogo hapan Chobaeibü kounyang yeilabü kho kan thedangaje sosotham tegütham damda lo?”
Hobaje Sauleibü khangenbü shuongei hao to Dawidei ho tegü hai laukei dogo lenkei.

Hobaje Saulei laukei, “Kanei Dawid to, ‘Chobaei lubü ai munam amangsühda, lausikei Filistiabüeibü phekhop saongao Chobaeibü dangbou shuong phoklam mangsühda,’ dogo laujan.” Tou Saulei Dawid Filistiabüeibü ikei tuongtila dambei.
Hobaje ladang hao khangenbü shuongei habü ngüh Dawid to lenkei, khoei Chobaeibü kounyang yeila Dawid maisho olintikei, hoba chalou shuong kho apenjinei

Dawid hoba hao mütshuong meimeijung haukei hoba Filistiabü saoan haitikei; hoba Dawidei haoeneibü phekhop sungbakei hoba hao lolo Chobaeibü haishoubou yeila Choba shanga haoen la penko kukei. Hobaje Saulei haoeibü shou Maikel yakla lela hao la kukei.
Hobaje
Hobaje Saulei tokei Dawid to aei hatko kikei, hoba athakko Dawideibü dangbou kikei.
Kheijinei Filistiabü leiyeibü shuong longkei, hoba haoen ladüngnei longkei khüjochenei Dawidei Sauleibü khangenbü pendou to aei songsido kiko jungeikei. Hibü haoeibü nyen aei hangenkei.
Saulei haoshou Jonathan si hao khangenbü shuong to Dawid haitila lenkei.

Hobaje Sauleibü shou Jonathanei Dawid to aeibou maangshikko kikei. Hobaje Jonathanei Dawid to ho hai laukei, “Kü bou Saulei no haitila lamda, hibü tou ngei ka to sudajada, no lolo ngeyang maangsangko kishi, hoba hushang chenei kishi, hoba no lolo hushi.
Hobaje ngo no kishang khongthua thinei kübou nyangko lolabü, hoba ngei ka shanga kübou to joyolauyolabü, hoba ngei denche ditalonga ngei ka la lenlabü.”

Hobaje Jonathanei haobou Saul to Dawid shangabü maibü lenyokei, hoba hao to laukei, “Chobaei jembü khangenbou Dawid to khulimbo shabü tejungei; aieilausi haoei no khulimbo shedbü ajungei, hoba haoeibü kümsilei ka aedanga maibü ki.
Aishanga haoei haoeibü langkei haoeibü ika phokei, hoba Filistiabü to wapyokei, hoba
Hobaje Saulei Jonathaneibü ngüh ditkei hoba Dawid ühaitilabü dogo
Hobaje Jonathanei Dawid ngakei, hoba habü pendou Jonathanei hao to lenkei. Hobaje Jonathanei Dawid Saul jungto leibakei, hoba shangied tegü hao hao junga kikei.
Hobaje tokei nyibou wapyo kikei, hoba Dawid haukei hoba Filistiabü to wapyokei, hoba haoenei juong haitikei, hoba hao thedang ka haoen linkei.
Hobaje Saulei haoeibü ika aubu jungan chema setan kijinei amaibü soushou
Hobaje Saulei Dawid to kümthanga nimnim aubuei sula lambei, lausikei Saul thedang ka hao shetjung satkei, hoba haoei aubu kho kümthanga suan yontikei, hoba Dawid satenkei, hoba khüyou satenkei.

Hobaje Dawideibü chem komlabü hoba ngeyangje hao haitila Saulei ngühlang künbü shuong Dawideibü chem to hautikei, hoba Dawideibü yak Maikelei hao to hai laukei, “No kaibü langkei tao akhümenlonga ngietje no hailabü.”
Hibü Maikelei koulom danko Dawid tonan yantikei, hoba hao haukei hoba satkei, hoba satenkei.
Hobaje Maikelei heangsho noksa sungjung louan kho yepshanga tentian phokei, hoba kho neiei yuklepan khua loneibü wi phokukei.
Hobaje ladang Saulei ngühlang künbü shuong Dawid sungla hautikei, saoei laukei hao shatko kia.
Hobaje Saulei ngühlang künbü shuong hai lauko Dawid chühla hautikei, “Ngei hao haitila shanga hao kü jungto shena lengba.”
Hobaje ladang ngühlang künbü shuong chem maang to lotkei, chühashi, shena heangsho noksa hoba loneibü wi kikei.

Hobaje Saulei Maikel to laukei, “Aila nyi ngo hai khüpettida? Hobaje hao satenlabü lele ngeibü dangbou aila sattikei?” Hobaje Maikelei Saul to jongaiko laukei, “Haoei kü to laukei, ‘Ngo sattikai, ngei no aila haitila.’ ”
Tou Dawid satkei hoba satenkei, hoba Rama to Samuel jungto loukei, hoba hao la Saulei kümbü pendou lenkei, hoba Samuel haosi ham hauan Naiota kikei.
Hobaje Saul to ho hai lenkei, “Chühashi, Dawid Ramaa Naiota kia.”

Hobaje Saulei ngühlang künbü Dawid leian loula hautikei, hoba thuseibü danei hoba haoen thüka Samuel leibou lean thusei ngüh tetenko lauyobü haoenei hapbei; Mühghaü soushou haoen thükto lotkei hoba haoeneikei thusei ngüh tetenko joyokei.

Hobaje ladang kho Saul to lenkei, haoei lubü ngühlang künbü shuong hautikei hoba haoeneikei tetenbü ngüh laukei, hoba toukei sembou la Saulei ngühlang künbü shuong hautikei, hoba haoeneikei tetenbü ngüh laukei.
Kheijinei toukei hao Rama to haukei, hoba Sekua kibü deikhün yaangbü to loukei, hoba haoei pheko laukei, “Samuel si Dawid lan ki?” Hobaje cheei laukei, “Chühashi, haoen Ramaa Naiot sanga kia.”
Hobaje hao Ramaa kibü Naiot ae khüto haukei, hoba Mühghaü Soushou hao thüktokei loukei, hoba hao haujinei hao Ramaa kibü Naiot asüh shongko thusei ngüh tetenko laukei.

Hobaje haoeikei jembü neisimei hangletan phokei, hoba haoeikei Samuel thedanga thusei ngüh tetenko laukei; hoba khünyet chalou sünga hoba khüyou langyang sünga mütkong lekeikei. Hibü haoenei laukei, “Thuseibü yoa Saulkei yokei sai?”
Hobaje Ramaa Naiot ka Dawid satkei, hoba Jonathan jungto louan laukei, “Ngei ai kümbei? Ngei ai shedtikei? Hobaje kabouei ngeibü langkei lamlabü lele hao thedanga ngeibü shedbü ai?”

Hobaje Jonathanei hao to laukei, “Mühghaüei shiletshima, no ühailabü, chühashi, yaangbü yingsikei, hanbü yingsikei kübouei kü la angetiko ai akümda, hoba aila kübouei habü kümsilei kü ka hula? Kho khei aying.”
Hobaje toukei Dawidei linjinko theyoko laukei, “Ka thedanga ngei onou hapakei dogo kabouei maisho ngeakei hoba haoei laukei, ‘Jonathan khauangbüla ho hao la tengeti;’ lausikei
Kheijinei Jonathanei Dawid to laukei, “Nyi ai ong kümmangsühda ka shanga ngei kho khei kümlabü.”
Hobaje Dawidei Jonathan to laukei, “Chühashi, ngietje litnyu haanbü hoba ngo Choba yoa shaushang yungshanga asetko akilabü, lausikei sembounyet chasem asüh shongko ngo khongmaanga hula ngo hautishi.
Maimaitham kabouei ngo ühüplonga kheijinei lenshi, ‘Dawidei kü to haoeneibü sangnyu Bethlehem to panteiko haula aeibou sukeijakei; aieilausi chem- pen pendou shanga khünei po weko haitibü lembü kia.’
Kheijinei haoei ‘Maiakei’ dogo laualonga no khangenbou hakso kilabü, lausikei hao khauangko kialonga kheijinei haoei amaibü damsepan kia dogo ngeshi.
Hibü no khangenbou to sanouko jungeiashi; aishanga nyi ka yoa no khangenbou
Hobaje Jonathanei laukei, “No kho tegü ladangkei ayinglabü, aiei maimaitham ka thükto kübouei amaibü kümla damenbü kia dogo ngei ngealonga kheijinei ngei kho ka la alenlep lo?”
Kheijinei Dawidei Jonathan to laukei, “Khei kabouei ka to kaangko jungeia tegükei aoei kü to lenla?”
Hobaje Jonathanei Dawid to laukei, “Kaiya, setije yam to koukho;” hoba haosi ham yam to koukei.
Hobaje Jonathanei Dawid to laukei, “
Kübouei kakhu limbo amaibü jungeia longa hoba no haksoa haulabü lele ngei kho ka la angetiko no hautian apalonga
Hobaje ngo khei ühailabü lele ngo toukei langkei ki shongko
lausikei toukei nyi ponpen ngeibü chem ka üeisanou wapan tüpma; kaonyudak ka
Hibü Jonathanei Dawid chemdang to theyolanyobü che kümbo laukei, “Hobaje
Hobaje Jonathanei Dawid to haoeibü sanou kibü ka nyibou thengai lanngaitikei, aieilausi haoei jembü langkei tegü hao to sanoukei.
Kheijinei Jonathanei hao to laukei, “Ngiet lit haanbü hoba no ayolabü, aieilausi kaibü setshang kong kilabü.
Hobaje ladang no semnyet haiteida no tongde louyanlabü, hoba kümsilei kibü chaloua no lolo huan kishang to kai, hoba Ezel laang nyangko kilabü.
Hobaje shensinge chenei ngei kipbü tegü khi aeto laujin sem kipan litilabü.
Hobaje chühan hauashi, hoba laujin kho lamashi dogo lauko ngei nashousi hautilabü. Ngei nashou khüto, ‘Chühashi, laujin kho kaenei kia, sungba,’ dogo laualonga kheijinei kaiya; aishanga,
Lausikei ngei nashou khüto, ‘Chühashi, laujin shuong kho no limjung hauan kia,’ dogo laualonga, kaibü lamnyu to hauashi, aishanga
Hobaje seti lauyobü shanga, chühashi, seti kanglanga
Hibü Dawid hao ong seka huan kikei, hoba ladang litnyu haanbü longan kikei, Choba shaula yungla hao lolo setkei.
Hobaje Chobaei lubü chaloua tegü, khei kümthang nyangko hao setshanga setkei, hoba Jonathan lokei hoba Abner Saul nyangko setkei, lausikei Dawideibü kaoen kongan kikei.
Khei yingsikei Saulei ai alau, aieilausi haoei dambei, “Hao to denche yinga, hao asaopo, maimaitham hao asaopokei.”
Hobaje litnyu haanbü phaia kongbü kho Dawid setshang kongbü kikei, hoba haoshou Jonathan to laukei, “Aila Jesseeibü shou shaushang yungshang to miet si tat alouda?”
Hobaje Jonathanei Saul to laukei, “Dawidei kü to Bethlehem to haula aeibou sukeijakei.”

Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ngei ka to sudajada, ngo hautishi; aieilausi kün chempen sangnyua haitibü lembü che kia, hoba küjaiei ngo khünei yola sakkukei hoba tou ngei ka ka onou hapalonga ngo hautishi, hoba ngei ka to sudajada, hoba ngeibü jaisinasi shuong hapyotishi.” Hibü khoei hao Chobaeibü khümsok to alou.

Kheijinei Jonathan khulimbo Saul khauangkei hoba haoei hao to laukei, “No ayingbü to haubou ngüha alebü yaksaeibü shou, no jembü himoulabü hoba kanyu himoutila shanga Jesseeibü shou nyi pienkei dogo ngei angekei si?
Aishanga Jesseeibü shou kaonyua ki shongko no ayingsi kaibü sangle aphokulabü; hibü tou hautian hao leian kaiya, aieilausi hao tükde hailabü.”
Hobaje Jonathanei haobou to jongaiko laukei, “Hao aishanga haitila? Haoei ai kümbei?”
Hobaje Saulei hao haitila haoeibü aubu suan litikei, khoei Jonathanei haobouei Dawid haitila damsepakei dogo ngekei.
Hibü Jonathan aeibou khuangko khümsok ka meimeikei hoba Lit Haanbü Lem nyibounyet sühko ai ashauayung; aieilausi haoei Dawid shangabü maangto shatko kikei, aishanga hao bouei hao to himoulabü kümbei.
Hobaje ngeyang Dawid to joyobü jiha Jonathan yamto atkei hoba hao yoa nashou hanbü che haukei.
Hobaje haoei nashou to laukei, “Laangashi, ngei kipbü laujin shuong kho tou lamashi.” Hobaje nashou kho laangjung haujinei haoei hao phai laujin che hao danko kipan apbei.
Hobaje ladang Jonathanei kipan apbü laujin shatshang to nashou kho loukei, Jonathanei nashou phaito ngekkei hoba laukei, “Laujin kho no limjung hauan aki lo?”
Hobaje Jonathanei nashoubou phaito ngekko panteiko hali hali hauashi, telo dogo laukei, hoba Jonathaneibü nashoubouei laujin kho yoshaian haoeibü
(Lausikei nashoubouei ai ange, Jonathan si Dawidei ong ngüh kho ngekei.)
Hobaje Jonathanei haoeibü insiaubu haoeibü nashoubou la kukei hoba laukei, “Hauashi, hoba habü ho sangnyu to jungan atshi.”

Hobaje nashou kho hausilengko Dawid laangshaang jungka pienkei hoba haoeibü thenyek kao ae khüpetan semnei khüpetan lembei, hoba haosi sembung shepyokei hoba Dawid hao lolo haapbü maang athonshongko cheei che to aapyoan haapyokei.
Hobaje Jonathanei Dawid to laukei, “Haksoa haushi, aieilausi seti ham
Kheijinei Dawid Nob lambo Ahimelek ungshedbou jungto haukei, hoba Dawid to haüyola Ahimelek lühjilühko loukei, hoba Dawid to laukei, “Aila no mütpem ka yoa ao ayoko lai?”

Hobaje Dawidei Ahimelek to laukei, “Chobaei kü la kümsilei sakkukei, hoba kü to laukei, ‘Laobou kümsilei shanga ngei no hautida, hoba ai ngei ka la sakkukei ao müt lakei tengeti.’ Hobaje ngei heshou shuong hi hi to hautia.
Hibü tou kaibü ika ai ki? Kü la wentek ngao ayingsi khünei ai ong ki labü.”
Hobaje ungshedbouei Dawid to jongaiko laukei, “Ngeibü ika hanghangko shaubü wentek aki, lausikei heshou shuongei yaksa ka bangan kialonga khünei saopobü wentek kia.”
Hobaje Dawidei ungshedbou to jongaiko laukei, “Maimaitham nyishoubü wakoua ongkei saopoan haudanyu tatbüa sema heshou shuong lai küman asaopola?”
Hibü ungshedbouei hao la saopobü wentek kukei, aishanga Mühghaü thedanga phobü wentek to liman khünei lubü wentek akitei; kho sungenbü chaloua wentek lemabüei jeian phola shanga kho
(Tou khünyet chalou Sauleibü khangenbü shuong yoka che
Hobaje Dawidei Ahimelek to laukei, “Khünei kaibü ika aubu ayingsi in aki lo? Aieilausi ngei ngeibü inlou ayingsi insiaubu ajung, aieilausi Chobaeibü kümsilei panteibü longan apbei.”

Hobaje ungshedbouei laukei, “Ela yomanga nyi Filistiabü Goliat haitibü in kho ong ungshedboueibü saopobü neisimei phoshang phai khünei nei cheei shoan kia, nyi kho lekho lausi kho leashi; aishanga khoto limbo lubüje aki.” Hobaje Dawidei laukei, “Kho to maibou lubü aki, kho labü.”
Hobaje Dawid meimeijung Saul to hatbü ka khünyettham wenjung satkei, hoba Gatbü Choba Akish jungto haukei.

Hobaje Akisheibü khangenbü shuongei hao to laukei, “No, ho kaonyek kabü Dawid Choba aying lo? Hao shanga haoenei jongaiyoko tombolakko, ‘Saulei hajar shijo, lausikei Dawidei hajar an haitikei,’ dogo lauko chia atkukei aying lo?”
Hobaje khübü ngüh Dawidei jembü maanga phokei, hoba Gatbü Choba Akish yongko hatko kikei.

Hobaje haoen thedanga haoei haoeibü haang jeileikei, hoba haoeneibü ika haoei langet angan lenkei, hoba koukhün koukapa thangeikei hoba haoeibü sembung ka hesubü haoeibü kaoshang wi to yanjung attikei.
Kheijinei Akishei haoeibü sambü shuong to laukei, “Chüh- ashi, müt kho langet angbü dogo kanei hapda. Hibü aila hao kü jungto leibakei?
Ngo langet angbüei shaleakei si, ho müt ho kü jungto langet angbü neinoula leibakei lo? Ho müt ho ngeibü chem to lottida si?”
Hibü Dawid khüka Adullam laangpob lamjung satkei, hoba ladang haoeibü jaisina hoba hao boueibü chempenei ditkei, hao jungto khüto louyenkei.

Hobaje khonsakbü mütpem weko hoba sanghsiyung thebü mütpem weko hoba maang ühaiko kibü mütpem weko haoen lolo liko hao jungto yoshaikei, hoba haoen thüka hao leiyeibou yeikei hoba hao yoa müt saongao lei thüng kikei.
Hobaje khüka Dawid Moaba Mizpa to haukei, hoba haoei Moabbü Choba to laukei, “Mühghaüei kü shanga ai kümla kho ngei ange shongko kübou si künyu kan jungto louan kitishima.”
Hobaje haoei haoen Moabbü Choba jungto leian loukei, hoba Dawid lapheishona ki shongko haoen yoa kikei.
Hobaje thuseibou Gadei Da- wid to laukei, “Lapheishona teki kukashi, hoba Jihuda kaodak to atashi.” Kheijinei Dawid kukjung satkei, hoba Heret lamang to loukei.

Hobaje Saulei Dawid hoba hao yoa kibü mütshuong lamena dogo ditkei. Tou Saul haoeibü ika aubu jungan hoba hao yoa khangenbü pendou hao nyangko lotian phoan Rama shongh khua tamarisk bunyu phanga Gibeaa setan kikei.

Hobaje Saulei hao nyangko loan kibü khangenbü shuong to laukei, “Kan Benjamin mütli shuong ditashi. Jesseeibü shouei kan mütpem weko la sek hoba semlühlaak kulep sai, haoei kan pendou hajar thüka leiyeibü hoba saongao thüka leiyeibü yeitilep sai?

Khei kan pendouei ngo khulimbo huon takkei, ladang ngeibü shouei Jesseeibü shou to linyokei kho ngetila ao aki hoba kü shanga maangto shatkubü kan yoa ao aki; ayingsi kü shouei ngo khulimbo ngeibü khangenbü jukan jinan tat chalou tegü thoan kibü kü la angetida lo?”
Kheijinei Saul khangenbou thüka kibü Edombü Doegei jongaiko laukei, “Ahitabeibü shou Ahimelek jungto loubü hapa.
Hobaje hao shanga haoei Mühghaü to phekei, hoba hao la shausiyung kukei hoba hao la Filistiabü Goliateibü in kukei.”
Kheijinei Chobaei Ahitabeibü shou Ahimelek ungshedbou hoba hao boueibü chempen pendou Noba kibü ungshedbou shuong ngala hautikei, hoba haoen pendou Choba jungto loukei.
Hobaje Saulei laukei, “Tou ditashi, no Ahitabeibü shou.” Hobaje haoei jongaikei, “Ngo hanei kia, ngeibü bunyubou.”

Hobaje Saulei hao to laukei, “Haoei ngo khulimbo meimeikei hoba tat chalou tegü kü la thokuan aila kanei ngo khulimbo huon takkei, khei kanei hao la wentek hoba in che kukei, hoba hao shanga Mühghaü to phekei?”

Kheijinei Ahimelekei Choba to jongaiko laukei, “Hobaje no khangenbü pendou yoa Dawid tegü kaibü kounyangbou ao ki? Hobaje kaibü langkei thüka leiyeibou lombü ki hoba kaibü chema hangenko kia, hao tegü maanglembü ao ki?

Tat ong ngei hao shanga Mühghaü to phekei sai? Kho tegü ladangkei aying; Chobaei jembü khangenbü to ayingsi haoeibü chempen thenbou lenbou to ai shedbü tekümma; aishanga no khangenbouei ho shean alen ayingsi aikei angekei!”
Hobaje Chobaei laukei, “Ahimelek, no hoba kaibü chempen shuong pendou tükde hailabü.”
Chobaei hao nyangko lobü hao lombü to laukei, “Sepeiashi, hoba

Hobaje Chobaei Doeg to laukei, “No sepeiashi, hoba ungshedbou shuong to ik atashi.” Hobaje Edombü Doeg sepeikei hoba haoei ungshedbou shuong to ik atkei, hoba khünyet chalou haoei ungshedbou saopobü hele lebü müt saoleito ngao haitikei.
Hobaje ungshedbou shuong sangnyu Nob haoei inei bousu hoba yaksa, shousi hoba senyopbo kibü, masu pongsu shuong hoba gadu hoba sanlon shuong haitikei.
Hobaje Ahitabeibü shou Ahimelekeibü shousi yoa Abiathar nyenbü müt che satenkei, hoba Dawid yoto satjung haukei.
Hobaje Abiatharei Dawid to
Hobaje Dawidei Abiathar to laukei, “Ladang Edombü khünei kikei haoei maimaitham Saul to lenlabü dogo ngei khünyet chaloua ngekei; kaboueibü chempen pendou haibü shanga ngeibü on ki.
No kü yoa kishi, tehüt, aishanga aoei ngeibü langkei lamda, haoei kaibü langkeikei lamda, aieilausi nokei khümenakei.”
Kheijinei haoenei Dawid to laukei, “Chühashi, Filistiabüei Keila khulimbo wapyoda hoba haoenei amshang ka youshou kokkhümda.”
Hibü Dawidei
Lausikei Dawideibü eikshuongei hao to laukei, “Chühashi, hanei Jihudaa sen hatjihatko kian; Filistiabü tan khulimbo sen Keila to hauko laualonga aei amaibou yinglep yingkao?”
Kheijinei Dawidei
Hibü Dawid hoba haoeibü mütshuong Keila to yankei hoba Filistiabü to wapyokei, hoba haoeneibü samkeisamuk shuong sungbakei hoba haoen juongtham haitikei. Kho tegü Dawidei Keilabü khümenkei.
Hobaje ladang Abiathar Ahimelekeibü shou Dawid jungto Keila to satjung haukei haoeibü ika ungshed saopobü neisimei jungan louyenkei.
Hobaje Dawid Keila to louakei dogo Saul la lenkei hoba Saulei laukei, “Mühghaüei ngeibü ik to hao kua; aieilausi bakhün hoba thangtet kibü sangnyu che to lotsije hao khinlepakei.”
Hobaje Saulei müt pendou wapyola Keila to yanla, hoba Dawid si hao mütshuong komlepla sakkukei.
Ladang Dawidei hao khulimbo Saulei huon amaibü huongda dogo ngekei, haoei Abiathar ungshedbou to laukei, “Hato ungshed saopobü hele sungba.”
Kheijinei Dawidei laukei, “O
Keilabü mütshuongei ngo haoeibü ika khümbo kuan aplep lo? No khangenbouei ditbü tegü louyanlep, O
Kheijinei Dawidei laukei, “Keilabü müt shuongei ngo hoba ngeibü eikshuong Sauleibü ik to kulep sai?” Hobaje
Kheijinei Dawid hoba hao mütshuong aoyou saongaolak thüng kikei, meimeijung Keila ka satkei hoba haoen satenlabü aeto satkei. Hobaje Dawid satena dogo Saul to lenkei, hoba hao ohauenko apbei.
Hobaje Dawid yama hushanga Zif yama shongh kaodaka kikei, hoba Saulei chalou angbou hao lambei, lausikei Mühghaüei haoeibü ik to khümbo aku.
Tou Dawid hatko kikei, aieilausi haoeibü langkei lamla Saul longan kikei, hoba Zif yam Horesa Dawid kikei.
Tou Sauleibü shou Jonathan meimeikei hoba Horesa Dawid jungto haukei hoba Mühghaü to maangkhaila haoei thungeikei.
Hobaje haoei hao to laukei, “Tehüt, kübou ikei no aleilulabü hoba no Israel thüka Choba lelabü, hoba ka to thenbou ngo yinglabü, hoba khokei kübou Saulei ngeakei.”
Hobaje haosi hamei
Kheijinei Zifbü Saul jungto Gibea to louan laukei, “Dawid jembü lolo Hakila shongh Jeshimon yungthanga ahukei si?
Hibü tou, O Choba, louyenla maangtakbü tegü kaiyenma, hoba küneibü kümsilei kho Choba ik to hao khümbo kulabü ki.”
Hobaje Saulei laukei, “Kan

hauashi, ngei kan to sudajada, tokei chongchingko shangashatashi, hoba hao kishang hoba hao nongaishang lan ki hoba aoei hao khünei hapbei ngeashi hoba chühashi; aieilausi haoei aeibou lepeilangeiko jungeida dogo kü la lenakei.

Hibü chühashi, hoba huan kishang pendou lanei hao huan ki ngeashi, hoba shangashatko ngean kan kü jungto kai, hoba ngo kan yoa haulabü, hoba kho tegü kümlabü; khei hao kaonyeka kia longa Jihudabü kaodaka ngei hao lamlebü.”
Hobaje haoen meimeikei hoba Saul thedanga Zif to haukei, lausikei Dawid hoba hao mütshuong Jeshimon yungthang Arabaa Maon yama kikei.

Hobaje Saul si hao mütshuong hao lamla haukei. Hobaje haoenei kho Dawid to lenkei, hoba hao laanglaak shui to louyenkei hoba Maon yama kikei. Hobaje ladang Saulei kho ditkei, haoei Dawid phaito Maon yam to shijung haukei.
Hobaje Saul thi ae shongh aeto haukei hoba Dawidei Saul to hatbü ka panteiko satmangsühkei. Aishanga Saul si hao mütshuongei Dawid komlepbei hoba hao mütshuongei haoen lapla kailepan kikei.
Lausikei ngühlang künbü che Saul jungto louan laukei, “No panteiko kaiya, aieilausi Filistiabü sangshila louakei!”
Hibü Dawid phai shijung haubü ka Saul sepeikei, hoba Filistiabü khulimbo haukei; hibü haoenei kho kaonyek to Satenbü Laangdak dogo nyenkei.
Hobaje Dawidei kho apyoan Engedi lapheishon to haukei hoba hao khonei satetlangkei.
Tou ho longkei, ladang Saul Filistiabü shibü ka longaikei, hao to, “Chühashi, Dawid Engedi yama kia” dogo lenkei.
Kheijinei Saulei shanenbü müt hajar sem Israel ka sungkei, hoba Yaoeibü Laangchema Dawid si hao mütshuong lamla haukei.
Hobaje lama hao sanlombüeibü laangpob che kishang to loukei, hoba Saulje setla atkei. Tou Dawid hoba hao mütshuong laangpob maangkabouatham kikei.
Hobaje Dawideibü mütshu- ongei hao to laukei, “Chühashi,
Hobaje phaila Dawidei jembü maangpona meiyoukei, aieilausi haoei Sauleibü neihuom liplangkei.
Hobaje haoeibü mütshuong to laukei, “Mühghaüei pienbü ngeibü bunyubou to ho kümlabü, hao Mühghaüei pienbü dogo ngean hao khulimbo ngei ikshatla ngo shiletkeima.”
Hibü Dawidei habü ngühei haoeibü mütshuong shiletkei hoba Saul khulimbo meimeila asakku, hoba Saul laangpob ka pikei hoba jembü lam to haukei.
Dawid kei phaila pikei hoba Saul phaito ngekko laukei, “Ngeibü bunyubou Choba!” Hobaje Saulei hao to chühkei, hoba Dawidei haoeibü thenyek soumo kuko kao ae khüpetkei,
hoba laukei, “Chühashi, Dawidei ka to amaibü kümla lamda dogo laubü ngüh nyi aila ditda?
Chühashi, lai

Tokei Abou, chühashi, haü, ngeibü ika kaibü neihuom youae nei chühashi; khoei ngei kaibü neihuom youae nei lipan apbukei hoba no ühaiti dogo lenda, ngeibü ika amaibü ayingsi ngühkhüm lulimbü aki dogo nyi ngeashima; hoba nyi ngeibü langkei lela shieisikei ngei kakhu limbo shabü ashon.
Seti kanglanga
Shangied tetenbü ngüha laubü tegü, ‘Amaibü ka amaibü kümsilei longda;’ lausikei ngeibü ik ka thükto ashatlabü.
Israelbü Chobaei ao shijung longkei? Nyi ao shieida? Kei haibü phai si keili phai?
Hibü
Hobaje ladang Dawidei habü ngüh Saul to joyobü nangkei khei Saulei laukei, “Ho kaibü ngüh lo, kü shou, Dawid?” Hobaje Saulei ngüh longkei hoba haapbei.
Kheijinei haoei Dawid to laukei, “Kü to je no saopobou ki, aishanga ngei ka la amaibü kusi nyije kü la maibü kungaikei.
Hobaje tat nyi kü to maian jungeikei dogo nyi ngetia; aishanga
Aishanga müt cheei jembü dangbou haüyojinei haoei hao litilep si? Hibü nyi tat kü to kümbü kho
Hobaje tou chühashi, ngei ngekei, khei no maimaitham Choba yeilabü hoba Israel sangle kaibü ika yaülabü.
Hibü tou khei nyi kü phainei ngeibü lilabü wapan üpbulabü hoba nyi küboueibü chemdang ka ngeibü nyen amautikulabü dogo
Hibü Dawidei Saul to khei kümlabü dogo thekeilankei, hoba Saul chem to ngaikei; lausikei Dawid si haoeibü mütshuong hushang to ngaikei.
Tou Samuel haikei, hoba Israelbü pendou liko kamshaikei, hoba hao shanga manghaapbei, hoba hao haoeibü chem Ramaa khünkei. Hobaje Dawid meimeikei hoba Paran yam to yankei.
Maona müt che kikei, hoba haoeibü nyaksinam Karmela kikei hoba aeibou keian kikei. Haoei lon hajar che hoba sanlon hajar sem kikei.

Haoeibü nyen kho Nabal hoba haoeibü yak nyen Abigal, hoba yaksanyu kho maanglimaangsang hoba saomaibü kikei, lausikei bousubou kho ngouei huongbü hoba maang amaibü kikei, hoba hao Kaleb chung ka kikei.
Hobaje Nabalei haoeibü sanlon ka wi kipda dogo Dawidei yama ditkei.
Hibü Dawidei heshou müt an hautikei, hoba Dawidei heshou müt an khüto laukei, “Kan Karmel to angashi hoba Nabal jungto haushi, hoba kü nyena hao la salem kushi.
Hobaje kho tegü kanei maangmai dogo laulabü: ‘No hoba kaibü chemdang ham hakso kishi, hoba nyi kibü pendou maangamaiko kishi.’
Hobaje ngei kaibü wi kipbü shuong kia dogo ditda, hoba künei haoen himou abauti, hoba Karmela haoen kishongko haoeneibü aikei ashautiku.

Kaibü heshou shuong to pheshi, haoenei ka to lenlabü, hibü kaibü thea kaibü heshou shuong onou haptishima; aishanga kün chalou maibü chenei louda, sanoudambo kaibü ik to aiong loulaje no khangenbü shuong hoba kaibü shou Dawid la kushima.”
Hobaje ladang Dawideibü heshou shuong loukei, haoenei Nabal to Dawid nyena habü pendou joyokei, hoba sangsembo kikei.
Hobaje Nabalei Dawideibü khangenbü shuong to laukei, “Dawid ao? Hobaje Jesseeibü shou ao? Tatngiet aaomüt juong jembü bunyu ka satjung haubü kia.
Khülonga ngei ngeibü wentek hoba ngeibü dei, hoba wi kipbü shuong shanga haitibü ngeibü phe sungan ngei haoen laka loukeije kho ongkei angebü müt la kulep lo?”
Hibü Dawideibü heshou shuong haoeneibü lamnyu to sepeinyu ngaikei, hoba louan hao to khübü pendou lenkei.

Hobaje Dawidei hao mütshuong to laukei, “Kan mütpem weko lulueibü in shouashi.” Hobaje haoen mütpem wekoei in shoukei, hoba Dawideikei haoeibü in shoukei, hoba Dawid phai to müt saongao lei thüng angkei, hoba saoan peisilei yoa kikei.

Lausikei Nabaleibü khangenbü shuong yoa müt cheei Nabaleibü yak Abigail to ho hai laukei, “Chühashi, Dawidei yam ka seneibü bunyubou la salem kula ngühlang künbü shuong hautikei, hoba haoei haoen aweasüngko nyikukei.
Lausikei müt khoei kün to aeibou maian kikei, hoba kün khongthua kijinei, kün haoen yoa lalokche jambo kikei, kün himou abauti ayingsi küneibü ai amautiku.
Kün haoen yoa san lombo kibü jih sünga kün shanga nangnak si chaloua haoen kümthang tegü kikei.
Hibü tou nyi ai kümla ngeashi, hoba damanchühshima, aishanga küneibü bunyubou hoba haoeibü chemdang pendou khulimbo amaibü kümla damenakei, aishanga hao to aoeikei ai alauenlabü lele hao maang amai!”
Kheijinei Abigailei panteiko wentek saoan ih shongmok penyi hoba sanlon pemngao ngoukei hoba semlüh shen saongao hoba bhukeibü wentek iksem saoan hoba khübü kho gadua kün lekukei.
Hobaje saoei heshou shuong to laukei, “Kü thedang to hauashi, chühashi, ngo kan phaito louada.” Lausikei saoei lao Nabal la alen.
Hobaje sao gadua setan shongh phangto louyanjinei chühashi, Dawid hoba haoeibü mütshuong sao thedangto yankei, hoba saoei haoen haüyokei.
Tou Dawidei hai lauko kiteikei, “Maimaitham amlanga ngei ho mütei kibü pendou yama lombo kikua, hibü haoei kibü aikei amau, hoba haoeije maibü jeiko amaibü kungaida.
Ngenet sühkoa haoei kibü pendou khei bousu shou che ongkei khei ngei apyokuan kialonga Mühghaüei kho tegü ayingsi aei Dawid to kümshima!”
Hobaje ladang Abigailei Dawid hapbei, saoei panteiko gadu ka louyenkei hoba Dawid thedanga sao the khümbei, hoba sao lolo kaoa khüpetkei.
Hobaje saoei hao thedanga khüpetan laukei, “Kü thüka ngeibü bunyuboueibü shedbü kho kishima, hoba kaibü samnyuei sanoudambo kaibü nou thenan joyotishima, hoba kaibü samnyueibü ngüh ditshima.

Ngei ka to sudajada, ngeibü bunyu ho haang alongbü müt, khei Nabal wela telekuma; aieilausi hao nyen to thambei, haoeibü nyen Nabal ki, hoba hao to ngoualouabü ki; lausikei kaibü samnyuei nyi hautibü ngeibü bunyueibü heshou shuong ühüp.
Hibü tou ngeibü bunyu
Hobaje tou jongsak ho laobou kaibü samnyuei ngeibü bunyu jungto sungbakei kho ngeibü bunyu phainei sembü shuong la kushima.
Sanoudambo kaibü samnyuei ngühkhüm leilubü shedbü apbuma; aishanga
Hobaje mütei no shieilabü hoba kaibü langkei lamla longasikei ngeibü bunyueibü langkeije
Hobaje ladang
khei ai ayingnyu nyi sii angtibü ayingsi ngeibü bunyuei jembü lolo jembü ikei phoklambei dogo kheijinei ngeibü bunyu shanga maang shüde ngaiko ayingsi maangpona phaiyetbü akilabü, hoba ladang
Hobaje Dawidei Abigail to laukei, “
Hobaje kaibü songsido haübü yingshi, laobouei tat ngei sii angtibü shedbü ka hoba ngo lolo ngeibü ikei phoklambü ka senetan phokei.
Aishanga maimaitham lang kibou
Hibü hao la saoei jungan loubü saoeibü ik ka Dawidei sungletkei, hoba haoei sao to laukei, “Kaibü chem to haksoa ngaiashi. Chühashi, ngei kaibü ngüha lea, hoba no sungleda.”

Hobaje Abigail Nabal jungto ngaikei, hoba chühashi, haoei haoeibü chema lem che Chobaeibü lem phatko kümbo kikei, hoba Nabal ihei jaakan aeibou olinko kikei; hibü saoei hao to aikei hai hai dogo alen.
Hobaje ngeyang ladang Nabal ihei jaakbü maian kikei, hao yakei hao la khübü pendou lenkei. Kheijinei haoeibü maang tuongkei hoba haian apbei hoba hao laang tegü yeikei.
Hobaje kho phaia chalou an kian
Ladang Dawidei Nabal haia dogo ditkei, haoei laukei, “
Hobaje ladang Dawideibü sambü shuong Karmel to Abigail jungto louan kikei, haoenei sao to joyoko laukei, “Dawidei no yakla lela no hao jungto leian haula kün ka jungto hautikei.”
Hobaje sao meimeikei hoba sao lolo sao thenyek kaoae khü- petkei, hoba laukei, “Chühashi, kaibü samnyu kaibü bunyubou khangenbü shuong you sakkulabü sambü che ong ki.”

Hobaje Abigail panteiko lamlekei hoba meimeikei hoba gadu chenei setkei, hoba saoeibü medei shuong ngao sao phainei sembei, hoba Dawideibü ngühlang künbü shuong yoa sao haukei, hoba haoeibü yakla yeikei.
Tokei Dawidei Jezreelbü Ahinoam lekei, hoba haosi ham haoeibü yakla yeikei.
Tou Saulei haoeibü nouyangshou Maikel, Dawideibü yak, Gallimbü Laisheibü shou Palti la kuan kikei.
Kheijinei Zifbü shuong Saul jungto Gibea to louan laukei, “Jeshimon thedanga Hakila shongha Dawid hao lolo maimai huan akilo?”
Kheijinei Saul meimeikei hoba Israelbü pienbü müt hajar sem leian Zif yama Dawid lamla Zif yam to yankei.
Hobaje Jeshimon nyangko Hakila shongha Saulei shaishang lamlekei. Lausikei Dawid yama kikei, hoba Saul hao phainei yamlamang to louakei dogo haoei hapbei.
Hibü Dawidei lapheibü hautikei, hoba maimaitham Saul loukei dogo ditenkei.

Hobaje Dawid meimeikei hoba Saul sühshang to loukei, hoba Saul hoba haoeibü sepai tan leiyeibü Nereibü shou Abner lanei kikei kho hapbei, hoba Saul maangaenei neichem phanga yepan kikei hoba mütshuongei hao kaijembo shaishang kümbei.
Kheijinei Hitbü Ahimelek to hoba Joabeibü jaisina Zeruiaeibü shou Abishai to Dawidei laukei, “Kü yoa ao Saul jungto shaishang to yanla?” Hobaje Abishaiei laukei, “Ngo ka yoa yanlabü.”

Hibü Dawid hoba Abishai mütshuong jungto nangnak loukei hoba chühashi, Saulei haoeibü aubu haoeibü khu nyangko kaoa jaangtian phoan hao shaishang kommaanga yepan kikei, hoba Abner hoba mütshuong hao kaijembo kikei.
Kheijinei Abishaiei Dawid to laukei, “Tat Mühghaüei kaibü dangbou kaibü ika khümbo kua, hibü tou ka to sudajada, aubu khoei kaoa yonko ngei hao to che ong hankho, ngei hao to nyibou ühünlabü!”
Hobaje Dawidei Abishai to laukei, “Hao tühaiti, aishanga
Dawidei laukei, “
ei naangenko pienbü khulimbo ngei kü ik ashatla shiletshima; lausikei tou ngei ka to sudajada, haoeibü khu aedanga kibü aubu si shongmok kho jungashi hoba sen satkho.”
Hibü Dawidei Sauleibü khu ka aubusi shongmok sungkei hoba haoen satkei hoba müt aoeikei ühüp ayingsi kho ange, ayingsi aokei alaksep, aishanga
Kheijinei Dawid naphei to haukei, hoba saabüa shongh khua haoen jungka saan lokei.
Hobaje Dawidei mütshuong to hoba Nereibü shou Abner to ngekkei, “Abner, nyi ajongaida lo?” Kheijinei Abnerei jongaiko laukei, “Choba to aoei ngekda?”
Hobaje Dawidei Abner to laukei, “No maangkaangbü müt che aying lo? No phatbü Israela ao ki? Khülonga nyi kaibü Choba lombo akitei sai? Aishanga eikshuong yoa cheei kaibü bunyubou mautila atkei.
Nyi kümbü ho maibüje aying.
Hobaje Saulei Dawideibü ngüh shenkei hoba laukei, “Kü shou Dawid, ho kaibü ngüh sai?” Hobaje Dawidei laukei, “Ho ngeibü ngüh, ngeibü bunyubou, O Choba.”
Haoei athakko laukei, “Ailaibü ngeibü bunyubouei jembü sambü shieida? Ngei ai kümbü shanga ayingsi ngeibü ika ai amaibü ki?
Hibü tou ngei ka to sudajada, ngeibü bunyubou Chobaei jembü sambüeibü ngüh ditshima.
Kho khei yingsije tou

Kheijinei Saulei laukei, “Ngei shabü shona, sepeinyu kangaia, kü shou Dawid, aishanga touje ngei ka to amaibü akümlabü; aishanga tat ka thea ngeibü langkei namsek kikei, chühashi, ngei ngoubü nei noukei, hoba aeibou mashika.”
Hobaje Dawidei jongaikei, “O Choba, aubu to chühshi! Hibü heshou shuong yoka müt che louan kho ngailangashi.
Hobaje
Tat kü thedanga kaibü langkei phokeibü tegü, kho hima bunyubou thedanga phokeitishi, hoba haoei khonsak maangshat pendou ka ngo khümenshima!”
Hibü Saulei Dawid to laukei, “No haübou yingshi, kü shou Dawid; nyi aiong kümlaje nyi maimaitham thük haplabü.” Hibü Dawid lam to kishang to sepeinyu ngaikei.

Lausikei Dawidei jembü maanga daman laukei, “Tou ngo nyetche chalouje Sauleibü ika maulabü.” Filistiabü kaonyek to satetlanglabü to liman kü shanga aikei maibou aki; hoba Israelbü leilang pendoua ngo lamla shanga Saul haolo anglabü kho tegü haoeibü ik ka ngo satenlabü.
Hibü Dawid meimeian hao yoa kibü müt saongao sem leian Gatbü Choba Maokeibü shou Akish jungto meimeijung haukei.

Hobaje Dawid Gata Akish yoa kikei, hoba haoeibü mütli shuong mütpem weko jembü chempen yoa khei Dawid kei haoeibü yak müt nyi Jezreelbü sao Ahinoam hoba Karmelbü sao Abigail, Nabaleibü yak latnyu yoa kikei.
Hobaje Saul to Dawid Gat to satjung haua dogo ngetikei, hoba haoei touje hao alam.
Hobaje Dawidei Akish to laukei, “Tou ngei ka thedanga onou hapalonga, sangnyu yoa hanei ngo kilabü lele kishang che kü la haoenei kutishima; aishanga kaibü sambü aila Chobaeibü chema ka yoa kila?”
Kheijinei khünyet chalou Akishei hao la Ziklag kukei, khoei tat sühko Ziklag Jihudabü Choba shangabü ki.
Hobaje Dawid Filistiabü kaodaka kibü süngabü kho po che lit lei.
