Hobaje Dawid si hao mütshuong angkei hoba Geshurbü, Girzbü hoba Amalekbü shikei, aishanga Telam ka Shur, khei shangied Ijep kaodak to haubü kaodaka khübü phangshuong kiteikei.

Hobaje Dawidei kaodak kho shikei, hoba bousu yaksa che ongkei lang aphoku, hoba sanlon shuong, masu shuong, gadu shuong, ut shuong hoba neisimei pendou sunglangkei hoba hao sepeinyu Akish jungto longeikei.
Hobaje Akishei laukei, “Kanei tat aosang shikei?” Hobaje Dawidei laukei, “Jihuda yungkük khulimbo hoba Jerahmeel yungkük khulimbo hoba Ken yungkük khulimbo.”

Hobaje Dawidei bousu yingsikei yaksa yingsikei Gat to haoen sungbalabü lele langkei üpyo, khei ayinglonga, “Dawidei hai kümbei,” dogo haoenei sen shangabü laueikulabü dogo dambei. Filistia kaodaka kibü jihsiphai sünga haoei kho hangsilama jungeikei.
Hobaje Akishei Dawid to mailembo hao lolo laukei, “Haoei jembü mütli Israel la hao maisho mangsentia, khoei hao ponpen ngeibü sambü kilabü.”
Khübü chaloua Filistiabü Israel to wapyola sepai tan yoshaikei, hoba Akishei Dawid to laukei, “Nyi maisho ngeashi, no hoba kaibü mütshuong, kü yoa sepai tan yoa haulabü.”
Hobaje Dawidei Akish to laukei, “Maiakei, kaibü sambouei ai kümla kho nyi ngelabü.” Hobaje Akishei Dawid to laukei, “Maiakei, ponpen ngeibü khu lombou no yeitilabü.”
Tou Samuel haikei, hoba Israelbü pendouei mang haapbei hoba khei hao jembü sangnyu Ramaa khünkei, hoba kaonyek ka Saulei sou kibü seibü hoba seibüyaübü shuong shian sattian kikei.
Hobaje Filistiabü shuong liko yoshaikei hoba louan Shunama shaikei hoba Saulei Israelbü pendou liko yoshaitikei.
Hobaje Saulei Filistiabü sepai tan hapjinei hao hatko kiteikei, hoba haoeibü maangpon aeibou lühkei.
Hobaje Saulei

Kheijinei Saulei haoeibü sambü shuong to laukei, “Sou kibü yaksa che, ngo sao jungto haula hoba sao ka pheyolabü lele kü la lambüma.” Hobaje haoeibü sambü shuongei hao to laukei, “Chühashi, Endora sou kibü seibüyaübü manghtakbü yaksa che kia.”

Hobaje Saulei hao lolo jeileian lubü neisimei lean hao hoba hao yoa müt nyi leian haukei, hoba nangnak yaksanyu jungto haukei, hoba haoei laukei, “Ngei ka to sudajada, kaibü seiei ngei ka to ao ao nyen lenlaje, longtishima.”

Hobaje yaksanyu khoei hao to laukei, “Chühashi, Saulei ai kümbei nyi ngeakei, haoei lai sei kakbü hoba seibüyaübü kaonyek ka wapan apbei, hibü nyi ngo haitila aila ngeibü langkei shanga sung sankuda?”
Kheijinei Saulei sao to
Kheijinei yaksanyuei laukei, “Ngei ka la ao longtikula?” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Kü jungto Samuel longtibü.”
Hobaje yaksanyuei Samuel hapjinei saoei kaang ngekkei hoba yaksanyu khoei Saul to laukei, “Aila nyi ngo huonettikei? Aiei no Saul yingkei!”
Hobaje Chobaei sao to laukei, “Tehüt, nyi ai hapbei?” Hobaje yaksanyuei Saul to laukei, “Ngei kao ka mühghaü che longko hapda.”
Hobaje haoei sao to laukei, “Hao chühla lai yingkei?” Hobaje saoei laukei, “Baushi müt che longda hoba haoei neisimei che lean kia.” Hobaje kho Samuel dogo Saulei ngean apbei, hoba souhat lenkei.

Hobaje Samuelei Saul to lenkei, “Aila nyi ngo naangjamtiko leian longtikei?” Hobaje Saulei jongaikei, “Ngo aeibou maangshata kia, aishanga Filistiabü ngo khulimbo wapyoda hoba Mühghaü kü jungka bangjung sada, hoba touje kü to thuseibüei yingsikei, mangh danko yingsikei ajongaida; hibü ngei ai kümla kho kü la ngetila ngei no ngakei.”
Hobaje Samuelei laukei, “
“Ngei lenbü tegü
Aieilausi nyi
Tokei
Kheijinei Saul kaoa shingetnyu tuongkei, hoba Samueleibü ngüh to aeibou hatko kikei, tou hao hau akiko apbei; aieilausi chalou che sünga hoba kho lang- yang sünga haoei ashauayung.

Hobaje yaksanyu kho Saul jungto loukei hoba hao aeibou khonkuda dogo hapbei, hoba hao to laukei, “Chühashi, kaibü samnyuei kaibü ngüha lea. Hobaje ngei ngeibü langkei ngeibü ika lea, hoba nyi kü to joyobü ngüh ngei ngüha lea.
Hibü ngei tou ka to sudajada, nyikei kaibü samnyueibü ngüh ditbüma, hoba ka thedanga wentek haken che phokula sakkubuma; hoba no kaibü lama haujinei no hau kila shaushima.”

Lausikei haoei asunglet hoba laukei, “Ngei ashaulabü.” Lausikei haoeibü sambü shuong hoba yaksanyu haoen yoshaian hao suletkei, hoba haoei haoeneibü ngüha lekei. Hibü kao ka hao memeikei hoba shena setkei.
Hobaje yaksanyuei chema masu shoushou netthembü che kikei, hoba kho haoei panteiko haitikei, hoba saoei wenon sungjung louan seman khoei tokai ajinbü wentek kümbei.
Hobaje saoei kho Saul hoba haoeibü sambü shuong jungto sungbakei hoba haoenei shaukei. Kheijinei haoen meimeikei hoba khüyoutham satkei.
Tou Filistiabü sepai tan pendou Afeka shaikei, hoba Israelbü Jezreela kibü shumang nyangko shaikei.
Hobaje Filistiabü leiyeibü shuong saongao ngaoa hoba hajar hajar shuong shuonga haukei. Hobaje Dawid si hao mütshuong Akish yoa lashibü yoto yangjung loukei.

Kheijinei Israelbü leiyeibü shuongei laukei, “Habü Ibribü shuong ho ai kümda?” Hobaje Akishei Filistiabü to lenkei, “Ho Dawid Israelbü Choba sambü aying lo? Hao kü yoa po nyi kida, hoba hao kü jungto loubü chalou ka tat sühkoa ngei hao to shedbü ai ühüp.”

Lausikei Filistiabü leiyeibü shuong hao to khauangkei, hoba Filistiabü jaishou leiyeibü shuongei hao to laukei, “Nyi hao lan kitila kukei hao khünei kila ngaitiashi; hoba sen yoa hao lason to telei, aingenyu hao sen khulimbü yeilabü. Aieilausi ho mütei haoeibü bunyu to lai paplepenkei? Kho habü mütshuongeibü khu yoa aying lo?
Ho ao shangabü cheei che la chia atyoko tomjinei, ‘Saulei hajar haitikei, hoba Dawidei hajar an haitikei,’ dogo laobou Dawid kho aying lo?”
Kheijinei Akishei Dawid ngakei hoba hao to laukei, “
Hibü tou ngaiashi, hoba Filistiabü bunyu shuong aolinko akitilabü lele sangmaia haushi.”

Hobaje Dawidei Akish to laukei, “Ngei ai kümbei? Hobaje ngei ngeibü bunyu Chobaeibü dangbou shuong khulimbo awapyolabü lele khei tat sühko ka thedanga khülokche kiko nyi kaibü sambü to ai amaibü hapbei?”
Hobaje Akishei jongaiko Dawid to laukei, “Ngei ngekei, Mühghaüeibü hangangbü tegü kü thedanga no maiakei, kho khei yingasikei, Filistiabü leiyeibü shuongei laukei, ‘Hao sen yoa lason to üanglabü.’
Hibü ka yoa kaibü bunyu Saul apyojung lousatbü shuong yoa enyu laksepashi, hoba kan ngeyang pisilengko lang ngejinei meimeijung hauashi.”
Hibü Dawid hoba hao mütshuong ngeyang enyu pijung Filistiabü kaonyek to ngaikei. Hobaje Filistiabü Jezreel to angkei.
Dawid hoba haoeibü mütshuongei Ziklag sühan phaia sembounyet Amalekbüei Jihuda chaangbou hoba Ziklag shian apbei hoba kho jikan apbukei.
Hobaje khünei kibü chingbü, nashou, hoba yaksa pendou che ongkei ühaitiko langsenkei hoba haoeneibü lamnyua haukei.
Hobaje ladang Dawid hoba haoeibü mütshuong sangnyu to loukei, chühashi, kho wanei lonan kikei; hoba haoeneibü yaksi shuong hoba haoeneibü nouyang jayangshousi shuong langsenan kikei.
Kheijinei Dawid si hao yoa kibü mütshuongei haoen to kibü hau akhüm shongko ngüh longko haapbei.
Hobaje Dawideibü yak müt nyi Jezreelbü Ahinoam, hoba Karmelbü Nabaleibü yak latnyu Abigail langsenan kiteikei.

Hobaje Dawid aeibou khonkuko kikei, aieilausi mütshuongei hao to laangei tetla lauyokei; aieilausi müt pendoueibü soushou lulueibü bousu, yaksa shousi shanga mütpem weko maangto shatko kikei; lausikei Dawidei haoeibü Mühghaü

Hobaje Dawidei Ahimelekeibü shou Abiathar ungshedbou to laukei, “Ngei ka to sudajada, hato kü jungto ungshedbou saopobü hele sungba.” Hobaje Abiatharei Dawid jungto ungshedbou saopobü hele sungbakukei.
Hobaje Dawidei
Hobaje haoei hao to jongaikei, “Shijung hauashi, aieilausi nyi tükde haoen laphetlabü, hoba thük hapbo pendou nyibou hapngailabü.”
Hibü Dawid si hao yoa kibü müt saongao lak kho hao yoa haukei hoba haoen Beor shumang to loukei, hoba haoen at khünei apyokei.
Lausikei Dawid yoa saongao leiei shijung haukei, aiei saoan je haoen semthetnyu apbei hoba Beor shumang danjung ohauenko kikei.
Hobaje haoenei Ijepbü che khongthua hapbei hoba haoenei Dawid jungto hao leibakei, hoba hao la wentek kukei, hoba haoei shaukei; hoba haoenei hao la yunglabü dei kukei.
Hobaje haoenei hao la bukhe linbü wentek ontou che, hoba semlüh shen penyi kukei; hoba haoei shauan phaia hau kingaikei; aieilausi haoei chalou sem hoba langyou sem ashau- ayung.

Hobaje Dawidei hao to laukei, “No lakabü müt, hoba no laka?” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ngo Ijepbü heshou che. Amalekbü cheeibü sambü hoba ngeibü bunyuei ngo apyokei aieilausi chalou semnyet dana ngo shatko kikei.
Künei Kheret chaangbou ae shikei, hoba laobou Jihudabüeibü ki kho shikei, hoba Kaleb chaangbou ae thük shikei, hoba künei Ziklag wanei thean apbukei.”

Hobaje Dawidei hao to phekei, “Nyi kho sepai tan yoto ngo leian yanasao?” Hobaje haoei laukei. “Nyi ngo ühaitilabü ayingsi ngeibü bunyu ik to khümbo akulabü dogo Mühghaü nyena thealanashi, hoba kho phaia ngei no sepai tan yoto leian yanlabü.”
Hobaje ladang haoei hao leian yankei, chühashi, haoen kaoen pendoua phinnyinan shauyo yungyoko lem liyoko kikei; aieilausi Filistia kaodak si Jihuda kaodak ka haoenei peisilei juong haujung satkei.
Hobaje Dawidei haoen ngeyang ka nyibounyet nangnak sühko haitikei hoba heshou saongao lei uta setan satenbü to liman müt che ongkei asaten.
Hobaje Amalekbü shuongei sunglangbü pendou Dawidei nyibou hapngaikei, hoba Dawidei haoeibü yak müt nyi ham khümenkei.
Hobaje hanbü yaangbü bousu yaksa shou pendou hoba soletbü peisilei yingasikei haoenei sungbü che ongkei aon aleko akitei. Dawidei tükde ong sungngaikei.
Hobaje Dawidei sanlon si masu pendou sungkei, hoba mütshuongei haoen thedanga nangko ngekkei, “Ho Dawidei soletbü peisilei!”

Hobaje Dawid müt saoan jungto loukei, hoba aoyou aeibou semthetbü ka Dawid phai asemen; haoen kho Besor shumanga apyobü dan kiteikei. Hobaje haoen Dawid hoba hao yoa kibü mütshuong shuokla haukei, hoba ladang Dawid mütshuong nyangko loukei, haoei haoen la salem kukei.

Kheijinei Dawid yoa haubü müt amaibü hoba hang- alongbü mütshuongei laukei, “Haoen sen yoa ohaubü, senei soletbü peisilei ka künei haoen la ai akulabü. Lausikei haoen mütpem wekoei lulueibü shousi yaksi leian sungan satla thükkei.”
Lausikei Dawidei laukei, “
Ho kümsilei shangabü aoei kan to ngüha lela! Aieilausi ao peisilei yoa shaishanga setngaida, haoeibü phejan si ao lason to hauda, haoeibü phejan jetei kilabü.”
Hobaje kho chalou ka tat sühko kho tegü Israelbü shanga ho ngühkhüm ngühkhüh hoba song che la yeiko kümbei.
Hobaje ladang Dawid Ziklag to loukei, Jihudabü baushi shuong khei haoeibü thangbou shuong jungto soletbü peisilei hautiko laukei, “
Bethela kibü shuong jungto hoba yungkük aenei Ramaa kibü jungto hoba Jathera kibü jungto,
Aroera kibü jungto hoba Sifmota kibü jungto hoba Eshtemoaa kibü jungto,
hoba Rakala kibü jungto, Jerahmeelbü sangnyu shuonga kibü jungto, Ken sangnyu shuonga kibü shuong jungto,
Hormaa kibü jungto, Borashana kibü jungto, Athaka kibü jungto,
hoba Hebrona kibü jungto hoba lanei ong Dawid hoba haoeibü mütshuong nongaikei khübü kaonyek pendou jungto hautikei.
Tou Filistiabüei Israelbü khulimbo wapyokei, hoba Israel mütshuong Filistiabü thedang ka satyokei, hoba Gilboa shongha leiluan shemtikei,
hoba Filistiabüei Saul hoba haoeibü shousi shuong khaplapbo shikei, hoba Filistiabüei Sauleibü shousi shuong Jonathan hoba Abinadab hoba Malkhishua haitikei.
Hobaje lason kho Saul khulimbo kaangan apbei, hoba lau jungbü shuongei hao laphetkei hoba lau jungbü shuongei kaangko leilutikei.

Khünei haoei haoeibü insiaubu jungbü to laukei, “Kaibü in setenashi, hoba khoei ngo wa- pettiashi, aingenyu habü akipbü shuong louan ngo wapeilabü hoba ngo mautilabü.” Lausikei haoeibü insiaubu jungbouei aküm, aieilausi hao aeibou hatko kikei, khei yingsije Saulei haoeibü in sungjung louan khoei hao lolo haingaikei.
Hobaje ladang haoeibü insiaubu jungbouei Saul haibü hapbei haoeikei kho tegü haoeibü inei hao lolo wapngaikei hoba hao yoa haikei.
Kho tegü khünyet chaloua ong Saul si haoeibü shousi müt sem hoba haoeibü insiaubu jungbou hoba haoeibü mütshuong pendou haikei.
Hobaje ladang Israelbü mütshuong thi ae yomanga kibü shuong satkei hoba Saul hoba haoeibü shousi shuong haibü hapbei, haoenei sangnyu shuong apyokei hoba satkei hoba Filistiabü louan khübünei kikei.
Hobaje nyibounyet kho ladang Filistiabüei haitian kibü shuongeibü neisimei saüan chühko loukei, haoenei Gilboa shongha Saul hoba haoeibü shousi sem haitian hapbei.
Hobaje haoenei haoeibü khu thetkei hoba haoeibü insiaubu sungkei. Hobaje heangsho chem to hoba mütshuong jungto ngühlang künla kaijembo kibü Filistiabü kaonyek to hautikei.
Hobaje haoenei haoeibü insiaubu Ashtarot chema phokei, hoba haoenei haoeibü mang Beth Shan kümthanga saütian phokei.
Hobaje ladang Filistiabüei hao shanga khei Saul to kümbü shanga Jabesh Gileada kibü shuongei ditkei,
maangkaangbümüt pendou meimeikei hoba langyang sünga paian Saul si haoeibü shousi shuongeibü mang Beth Shan kümthang ka sungletkei hoba haoen Jabesh to loukei, hoba khünei haoen juokkei.
Hobaje haoenei haoeneibü lo sungjung louan khübü kho tamarisk bunyu phanga khünan phokei hoba chalou nyet mühei nyengkei.
Saul haian phaia, Dawid Amalekbü haitibü ka sepeinyu longeian Ziklaga Dawid chalou nyinyet kikei,
Hobaje sembounyet, chühashi, müt che haoeibü neisimei jitnyinan hoba haoeibü khua tham kakan Saul kishang ka loukei. Hobaje hao Dawid jungto loujinei, hao kaoa khüpetkei hoba souhat lenkei,
Dawidei hao to laukei, “No laka loukei?” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ngo Israelbü sepai yoka satenkei.”
Hobaje Dawidei hao to laukei, “Ailai ong hauda? Lenshima!” Hobaje haoei jongaikei, “Lason kho lusakan mütshuong lina, hoba müt juong haia; hoba Saul si haoshou Jonathan haia.”
Kheijinei hao to lenbü heshoubou to Dawidei laukei, “Saul si hao shou Jonathan haia dogo nyi lai ngekei?”

Hobaje hao to lenbou heshoubou khoei laukei, “Thu maiko ngo Gilboa shongha kito haükei, hoba khünei Saul hao jembü aubua nongan kikei, hoba chühashi, kailong shuong hoba kolia setbü shuong hao thüka nyangko kikei.
Hobaje haoei hao phaito sepeian chühsi haoei ngo hapbei hoba ngo ngakei. Hobaje ngei jongaikei, ‘Ngo hanei kia.’
Hobaje haoei kü to laukei, ‘No ao?’ Ngei hao to jongaikei, ‘Ngo Amalekbü.’
Hobaje haoei kü to laukei, ‘Nyangko louan ngo haitiashi, ngo touje hailabü lele ong kia!’

Hibü ngo hao junga loan hao haitikei, aieilausi hao tuongan phaiaje hao lang akienlabü dogo ngei ngekei, hoba haoeibü khua kibü Choba khun hoba haoeibü phema kibü khüngkap ngei sungkei hoba khübü kho hanei ngeibü bunyubou jungto sungbuakei.”
Kheijinei Dawidei haoeibü jembü neisimeia hatkei hoba khübü kho jitnyinkei, hoba kho tegü hao yoa kibü pendouei kümbei,
hoba haoenei mang haapbei hoba Saul si hao shou Jonathan hoba
Hobaje hao to lenbü heshoubou khüto Dawidei laukei, “No laka loukei?” Hobaje haoei jongaikei, “Ngo yenbou cheeibü shou Amalekbü ki.”
Hobaje Dawidei hao to laukei, “
Hobaje Dawidei heshou shuong yoka che ngaan laukei, “Hauashi, hoba hao tuongtiashi.” Hobaje haoei hao ngüman koutikei hoba hao haikei.
Hobaje Dawidei hao to laukei, “Kaibü sii kaibü khua ong künshi; aishanga kaibü sembungei kakhu limbo laukei, ‘Ngei
Hobaje Saul si hao shou Jonathan shanga ho ügütü chia Dawidei manghaap chia laukei.
Ho Jihudabü la lenjan dogo haoei laukei. (Chühashi, ho Jasher lea doakei.)
“O Israel,
kaibü soneikangbü,
kaibü thükkabou setshanga haitiakei! Hau yaangbou lai tuongan ki!
Filistiabü yaksa shuong lai olinko ki.
Kipan üpbü yaksa shuongei phangan jinkuda
Gata kho tengeti,
Ashkelon khongnyua tengek.
“Kan Gilboa shongh shuong,
thüka nindei ayingsi lang ayingsi lemshang khongthu tekitima!
Aishanga khünei lakbühongbü shuongeibü aih totnyinlabü.
Sauleibü aih onangei anaangkubü che tegütham.
Haitibü sii ka, hau yaangboueibü haabü ka,
Jonathaneibü laujin sepeinyu alongai;
hoba Sauleibü inlou kong sepeinyu alongai.
“Saul si Jonathan haosieibü langkeia
sanoulabü hoba maanga mailabü kikei.
Hobaje haibüakei haosi abang.
Aulu tokei haosi sisikbou kikei,
molosaonyu tokei haosi hau kibou kikei.
“Kan Israelbü yaksa shuong Saul shanga haapashi;
aoei kan soumo kakko nakthüngan sakbü nei neitikei;
aoei kaneibü neiameia hon shanjinkukei.
“Lason jenyua laakbü hongbü shuong tuongan ki!
Jonathan no thükkabou setshanga haitiakei.
“Ngo ka shanga sangküngkuda, ngeibü jaisina Jonathan,
kü thedanga no maanga mailabü kikei.
Kü to kaibü sanou maangpanglabü che kikei;
yaksaeibü sanou tokei khaibou.
“Hau yaangbü shuong lai tuongkei,
Wapyobü insiaubu mauakei!”
Kho phaia Dawidei
Hibü Dawid, hoba hao yak mütnyi, Jezreelbü sao Ahinoam si Karmelbü Nabaleibü yak latnyu Abigail ham yoan thi aeto angkei.
Hobaje Dawidei hao yoa kibü mütpem weko jembü chemdang yoa leian angkei, hoba haoen Hebron sangnyu shuonga kikei.
Hobaje Jihudabü mütshuong louan khünei Jihudabü mütshuong thüka Choba lela haoenei Dawid la onang naangkukei.
Hobaje Dawidei ngühlang künbü shuong Jabesh Gilead to hautikei hoba haoen to laukei, “Kanei kaneibü bunyubou, khei Saul to kho sanou lenbü hoba hao khünkubü shanga
Hobaje tou kan to
Tou khei yingsije kaneibü ik hau kiashi, hoba kan maang kaangashi; aishanga kaneibü bunyu Saul haia, hoba Jihuda mütshuongeikei haoen thüka Choba lela kü la onang naangkua.”
Tou Sauleibü sepai tan lajam leibouei Nereibü shou Abnerei Sauleibü shou Ishbosheth leijung louan kikei, hoba Mahanaimei hao leian loukei.
Hobaje haoei Gilead thüka Jezreel thüka, Efraim thüka, hoba Israel pendou thüka hao Choba yeitikei.
Sauleibü shou Ishbosheth haoei Israel thüka Choba lela khangjinei po saonyi kikei, hoba haoei po nyi songdakkei. Lausikei Jihudabü phangeije Dawid phai sembei.
Hobaje Hebrona Jihudabü phang thüka Dawidei songdakko kibü jihsiphai kho po nyet lit lak kikei.
Hobaje Nereibü shou Abner si Sauleibü shou Ishboshetheibü khangenbü shuong Mahanaim ka Gibeon to longkei.
Zeruiaeibü shou Joab, hoba Dawideibü khangenbü shuong longkei hoba haoen Gibeon thimdei nyangko haüyokei, hoba haoen che thimdei jiaenei hoba che kho thimdei jiaenei setkei.
Hobaje Abnerei Joab to laukei, “Ngei ka to sudajada, heshou shuong kho meimeitiashi, hoba sen thedanga tokyotiashi.” Hobaje Joabei laukei, “Tükde yingkei, khei kümtiashi.”
Hibü haoen meimeikei hoba Benjamin si Sauleibü shou Ishbosheth shanga müt anthük nyi hoba Dawid shanga müt anthük nyi dogo pienkei.

Hobaje haoen mütpem wekoei jenaboueibü khua hatlepbei hoba jenaboueibü hiplanga inei hankei, hibü haoen liko tuongkei. Hibü kho Gibeon kaonyeka kibü khüto Helkat Hazzurim (Inlou Sek- phai) dogo lauda.
Khünyet lason aeibou sekanlaakan kikei, hoba Abner si Israelbüei Dawideibü khangenbü shuong thedanga athük hapbei.
Hobaje Zeruiaeibü shou müt sem kho khünei kikei. Joab, Abishai hoba Asahel; hoba Asahel meishieibü you tegü songoktham kikei.
Hobaje Asahelei Abner phaito shijung haukei, hoba Abner phaito shijung haujinei haoei nanae maeae asepai.
Kheijinei haoei hao phaito chühkei hoba laukei, “Ho no lo, Asahel?” Hobaje haoei jongaikei, “Haü, ngo yingkei.”
Hobaje Abnerei hao to laukei, “No mae ayingsi nanae to sepeiashi hoba heshou shuong yoka müt cheeibü insiaubu soan sungashi.” Lausikei Asahelei hao phai shijung haubü ka asepei.
Hobaje Abnerei nyibou Asahel to laukei, “No kü phai asembo sepeiashi, aila ngei no kao to ngüman attila? Ayinglonga kajai Joab la ngei ailai ngeibü thenyek lenla?”

Kheiyingsikei sepeinyu angai. Khei yingsije Abnerei haoeibü shimunga aubu paiko sukei hoba aubu kho takphai ka sungenkei, hoba hao khünei tuongkei. Hobaje hao khünei haikei, hoba shibü dan pendou Asahel haishanga atopeiko lokei.
Lausikei Joab si Abishaiei Abner phai to shijung haukei, hoba Gibeon yamlamang to haubü Gia thedanga kibü Amma shongh haoenei sühjinei chanyu nepbei.
Hobaje Benjamineibü shousi shuong haoen lolo liko Abner phai to kamshaikei, hoba tan che yeikei, hoba shongh chenei lokei.

Kheijinei Abnerei Joab ngaan laukei, “Inei ponpen suilepsai? Thonlaje khauektham aplep dogo nyi angekei lo? Lalokche sühko nyi kaibü mütshuong to haoeneibü jaisina shijung haubü ka sepeiashi dogo ashiletla?”
Hobaje Joabei laukei, “Mühghaü nyen phongko laukho: Nyi alau tegüje maimaitham nyeyang ka thama mütshuong satan kikhoulabü hoba jaisina shibü ka nangan kikhoulabü.”
Hibü Joabei teklaang metkei, hoba müt pendou atopeiko lokei, hoba touje Israelbü phaito shijung ohau, ayingsi touje awapyo.
Hobaje Abner si haoeibü mütshuong khüyou Araba danjung haukei, hoba Mahanaim to loukei.
Hobaje Abner phai shijung haubü ka Joab sepeinyu longeikei, hoba haoei müt pendou liko yoshaitiko kijinei Dawideibü khangenbü müt anthük gü akitei.
Lausikei Dawideibü khangenbü shuongei Benjamin hoba Abnerbü mütshuong 360 haitian kikei.
Hobaje haoenei Asahel bamjung louan Bethlehema haoboueibü heea khünkei. Hobaje Joab si haoeibü mütshuong langyang sünga paikei hoba Hebrona haoenei lang ngetikei.
Tou Saul si Dawid chempen kanglanga wapyo lounyu kikei, hoba Dawid hau kibou yeikei, lausikei Sauleibü chem- pen hau akibou yeikei.
Hobaje Hebrona Dawid la shousi shuong bukkukei; hoba haoeibü shou jaishoubou kho Amnon, Jezreelbü sao Ahinoameibü shou.
Hobaje kho thenkabou kho Karmelbü Nabaleibü yak Abigail ka Kileab hoba semboubü, Geshurbü Choba Talmaieibü shou nouyangnyu Maakaeibü shou Absalom,
hoba leiboubü Haggiteibü shou Adonija hoba ngaoboubü kho Abitaleibü shou Shefatia,
hoba lakboubü Dawideibü yak Egla ka Ithream. Habü ho Hebrona Dawid la bukkukei.
Sauleibü chemdang si Dawideibü chemdang kanglanga wapyo kibü jihsiphaia Sauleibü chung Abnerei hao lolo hau kingaikei.
Tou Sauleibü thangnyu che Rizpa nyenan Aiaeibü nouyangnyu kikei, hoba Ishboshethei Abner to laukei, “Kü boueibü thangnyu jungto no aila haukei?”

Kheijinei Ishboshetheibü ngüha Abner aeibou khauangkei hoba laukei, “Ngo Jihudabüeibü keieibü khu sai? Tat ngei Sauleibü chung, haoeibü jaisinasi hoba hao thangbou shuong to sanou lena, hoba Dawideibü ika no khümbo aku, khei yingsikei, nyi tatje ho yaksa shanga kü la shedbü kuda.
Mühghaüei Abner to khei kümshi, hoba
Sauleibü chemdang ka sangle kho jeileilabü, hoba Dawid Choba setshang Israel hoba Jihuda thüka khei Dan ka Beersheba sühko yaükei.”
Hobaje haoei Abner to lubü ngüh che ongkei ajongaien, aieilausi haoei hao to hatkei.

Hobaje Abnerei ngühlang künbü shuong Hebron to Dawid jungto hautiko laukei, “Kao kho aoshangabü? Kü to theyolanyobü che kümashi, hoba chühashi, Israel pendou ka jungto sungbala ngeibü ik ka yoa kilabü.”

Hobaje haoei laukei, “Maiakei, ngei ka to theyolanyobü che phokho; lausikei ka ka denche mangsühda, kho nyi kü the hapla loujinei shaangla nyi Sauleibü shou Maikel leian alou shongko nyi ngeibü the ühüplabü.”
Hobaje Dawideibü ngühlang künbü shuong Sauleibü shou Ishbosheth jungto hautiko laukei, “Kü yak Maikel ao shanga ngei Filistia büeibü phekhop saongao mu kukei, sao kü la khümbo kungaishi.”
Hobaje Ishboshethei hautikei hoba saoeibü lao, Laisheibü shou Paltiel ka sao leian sungkei.
Hobaje saoeibü lao hao yoa haapbo haukei, hoba sao phainei Bahurim sühko sembei. Kheijinei Abnerei hao to laukei, “Ngaiashi!” Hibü hao sepeinyu haukei.
Hobaje Abnerei Israelbü bousijaisi shuong to joyoko laukei, “Danbü jihsiphaia kan thüka Choba lela kanei Dawid lambei.
Tou khülonga kho kümashi, aieilausi
Hobaje Abnerei toukei Benjamineibü noua joyokei hoba Abnereikei Hebrona Dawideibü noua Israel hoba Benjamin mütli khümboei kümla maikei dogo laubü pendou laukei.
Hibü Abner Dawid jungto Hebron to hao yoa müt saoche yoan loukei, Hobaje Dawidei Abner si hao yoa kibü müt shuongla lem che likukei.

Hobaje Abnerei Dawid to laukei, “Ngo meimeijung haukho, hoba Israel pendou ngeibü bunyu Choba jungto leishailabü, khünei ka yoa theyolanyobü lelabü, hoba ka soushouei maangdakbü pendou thüka no Choba lela thükkei.” Hobaje Dawidei Abner hautikei, hoba hao sangmaia haukei.

Hobaje chühashi, Dawideibü khangenbü shuong hoba Joab sangshibü ka loukei, hoba haoen yoa soletbü peisilei juong sungbakei, lausikei Abnerje Dawid yoa Hebrona akitei, aieilausi haoei hao hautian kikei, hoba hao haksobüa hauan kikei.
Ladang Joab si hao yoa kibü lakjaibü shuong louan kikei, haoenei Joab to laukei, “Nereibü shou Abner Choba jungto loukei hoba haoei hao hautia, hoba hao sangmaia haua.”
Kheijinei Joab Choba jungto loukei hoba laukei, “Nyi ai kümbei? Chühashi, Abner ka jungto loukei, aila nyi hao sattian apbei, hao khei ong haukei sai?
Nereibü shou Abner kho nyi ngekei, no huonettilabü, hoba hau longai dogo kümbü, hoba nyi kümbüleibü pendou ngean sungla hao loukei.”
Hobaje Joabei Dawid jungka longeian phaia Abner phaito ngühlang künbü shuong hautikei hoba haoenei hao Sira deikhün ka leian longeikei, lausikei Dawidei kho ange.

Hobaje ladang Abner Hebron to sepeinyu longeikei, Joabei hao phainei hao to huphanga joyola tegütham bakhün to leian lotkei, hoba khünei hao la shimunga hankei; khünei hao Joabeibü na Asahel sii phinbü shanga haikei.
Hobaje kho phaila Dawidei ditjinei, haoei laukei, “Ngo hoba ngeibü sangle Nereibü shou Abnereibü sii ka ponpen shanga

Kho Joabeibü khu thüka hoba haoboueibü chung pendou thükto attishi, hoba Joabeibü phangsichunga mang ka mousi senbü ayingsi im baubü ayingsi jua soubü che ayingsi inei haibü, ayingsi shaueiyungei kaangbü cheje ayoko tekiti.”
Hibü Joab si haoeibü na Abishai haosiei Abner haitikei, aieilausi haoei haoeneibü jaisina Asahel kho Gibeona lasona haitikei.
Hobaje Dawidei Joab to hoba hao yoa kibü müt pendou to laukei, “Kaneibü neisimei jitnyinashi, hoba senou neiei shembe lokashi hoba Abnereibü mang haapashi.” Hobaje Dawid mang lengbü phainei sembei.
Hobaje haoenei Hebrona Abner khünkei, hoba Chobaei ngüh longko Abnereibü heea haapbukei, hoba müt pendou haapbei.
Hobaje Chobaei Abner shanga mang haapbo laukei.
“Ngoubüloubü müt haibü tegü Abner hailep lo?
Kaibü ik akhühko kikei,
ayingsi kaibü you namlühei aphen.
Amaibou thedanga müt che tuongbü phatko
no kho tegü tuongkei!”
Hobaje müt pendouei hao shanga nyibou manghaapbei.

Hobaje müt pendouei toukei chaseko Dawid sukojako shautiyungtila loukei, lausikei Dawidei thekolanko laukei, “Chanyu anep shongko ngei shausiyung jepan chühalonga ayingsi denche yingalonga Mühghaüei kho tegü, ayingsi aeikei kümshima.”
Hobaje müt pendouei kho ngean apbei, hoba khoei mütshuong olintikei.
Hibü müt pendouei hoba Israelbü khünyet kho Nereibü shou Abner haitibü kho Chobaei aying dogo ditenkei.
Hobaje Chobaei haoeibü khangenbü shuong to laukei, “Kanei tat Israela Chobaeibü shou che hoba yaangbü müt che tuongkei dogo angekei lo?
Hobaje naangenko pienbü Choba che yingsi dogokei tat ngo hau akiko kia; hoba Zeruiaeibü shousi shuong khübü mütshuong kü shanga yongko sekakei.
Ladang Sauleibü shou Ishboshethei Hebrona Abner haia dogo ditkei haoeibü ik hau akiko apbei hoba Israelbü pendou khonkuko kikei.

Hobaje Sauleibü shou Ishboshethei shuong thüka lajamleibü müt nyi kikei, cheeibü nyen Baana, hoba cheeibü nyen Rekab Beerotbü Rimmoneibü shou Benjamineibü shousi shuong ka kikei, aieilausi Beerot kei Benjamina lühbaka yoan kikei.
Hobaje Beerotbü Gittaim to satkei hoba tat sühko khünei küksithang bukmüt la lean kia.

Tou Sauleibü shou Jonathaneibü shou che sokebü kikei. Ladang Saul si Jonathan shanga Jezreel ka ngühlang loukei, hao po ngao jaishou kikei hoba nabukbüei leian sungan satkei hoba sao satla panteijinei hao tuongkei hoba you ngokan sokean apbei. Hobaje haoeibü nyen Mephiboshet kikei.
Hobaje Beerotbü Rimmoneibü shousi Rekab hoba Baana, haosieibü chem to haukei hoba chanyu kaangbü jiha Ishbosheth, hao chajihboua haksoko kijinei haoeibü chem to loukei.
Hobaje chühashi, koukhün lomnyu kho whet youshou sipbo kikei, lausikei sao ngakbü ka nyeket shiettian kikei; hibü Rekab si Baana chem maang to shetjung atkei.
Hobaje hao yepshanga phetetnyu lengan kijinei ladang haosi chem maang to lotkei, haosiei hao to ngümbei hoba haitikei. Hobaje khu thetkei hoba haoeibü khu jungan langyang sünga Araba lam to haukei.

Hobaje haoenei Ishboshetheibü khu Dawid jungto Hebron to sungbakei, hoba Choba to laukei, “Kaibü langkei lambou kaibü dangbou Sauleibü shou Ishboshetheibü khu to chühashi, hoba tat ngeibü bunyu Choba Saul hoba haoeibü lilabü to
Hobaje Dawidei Rekab si haoeibü na Baana, Beerotbü Rimmoneibü shounyi to jongaikei, hoba haosi to laukei, “
ladang müt cheei, ‘Chühashi, Saul haia’ dogo ngühlang maibü sungbakei dogo dambo laukei, ngei hao senetkei hoba Ziglaga hao haitikei, kho haoeibü ngühlang shanga pailetbü kiteikei!
Müt amaibüei saopobü müt jembü chema jembü yepshanga kian haitisi lai aei ong ayingla. Ngei tou kasieibü ik ka haoeibü sii ahilepsi? Hobaje no kaodak ka alanglep lo!”

Hobaje Dawidei haoeibü heshou shuong la sakkukei hoba haoenei haosi haitikei hoba haosieibü you si ik danan apbukei, hoba khübü kho saütian phokei. Lausikei haoenei Ishboshetheibü khu sungkei hoba kho Hebrona Abnereibü heed- anga khünkei.
Kheijinei Israel phang pendou Dawid jungto Hebron to loukei, hoba joyoko laukei, “Chühashi, kün pendou kaibü lo hoba kaibü phe.”
Shangied ladang kün thüka Saul Choba kikei, Israel leian longbou hoba leian lotbbou kho no kikei; hoba
Hibü Israelbü bousijai leiyeibü pendou Dawid Choba jungto Hebron to loukei, hoba Chobaei haoen yoa Hebrona
Dawid lela khangjinei po khujin kikei, hoba haoei po saonyi songdakkei.
Hebrona haoei Jihuda thüka po nyet hoba lit lak songdakkei; hoba Jerusalema haoei Israel si Jihuda pendou thüka po khujin to sem songdakkei.

Hobaje Choba si haoeibü mütshuong kaonyeka kibü Jebusbü khulimbo haukei, aoyouei Dawid to laukei, “No hato alotlabü, nyekthubü si sokebüei ong no shian sattilabü.” Dawid khüto alotlabü dogo daman laukei.
(Khei yingsikei Dawidei Zion lapheishon lekei; kho Dawid sangnyu ki.)

Hobaje khünyet Dawidei laukei, “Aoyouei Jebusbü haitilaje hao deilam khüto angashi hoba Dawideibü langkei to mangsenbü shuong nyekthubü hoba sokebü shuong haitiashi.” Hibü khoei ho lauda, “Nyekthubü si sokebü Choba chem to alotlabü.”
Hobaje Dawid lapheishona kikei hoba kho to Dawideibü sangnyu dogo laukei. Hobaje Dawidei Millo ka khangan sangnyu kümbei.
Hobaje Dawid aei aei yaangbou la yeikei, aishanga
Hobaje Tair Choba Hiramei Dawid jungto ngühlang künbü shuong, cedar bu, hoba mistri shuong, hoba laangeibü mistri shuong hautikei, hoba haoenei Dawid la chem che dangkukei.
Hobaje
Hobaje Hebron ka louan phaia Dawidei Jerusalem ka thangnyu hoba yak aei ngakei; hoba tokei Dawid la bousu yaksa shousi bukkukei.
Hobaje habü ho Jerusalema hao la bukkubü nyen shuong ki. Shammua, Shobab, Nathan, Solomon.
Ibhar, Elishua, Nefeg, Jafia,
Elishama, Eliada, hoba Elifelet.
Hobaje ladang Filistiabüei Israelbü thüka haoenei Dawid Choba yeitila onang naangkukei dogo ditkei, Filistiabü pendou Dawid lapla angkei; hoba Dawidei kho ditkei hoba lapheishon to yankei.
Tou Filistiabü loukei hoba haoen lolo Refaim pholi shenko shaikei.
Hobaje Dawidei
Hobaje Dawid Baal Perazim to loukei hoba Dawidei haoen khünei thükkei, hoba haoei laukei, “Yungsen nujung lotbü phatko ngeibü dangbou shuong kü thedanga
Hobaje haoenei haoeneibü heangsho khünei apyokei, hoba Dawid si hao müt shuongei khübü kho jungan satkei.
Kheijinei Filistiabü nyibou angkei, hoba haoen lolo Baal Perazim pholi shenko shaikei.
Hobaje ladang Dawidei
Balsam bunyu thüka ditbüyam no meimeiashi, aishanga kheijinei
Hobaje Dawidei kho tegü
Dawidei nyibou Israelbü pienbü müt pendou, hajar khujin liko yoshaitikei.
Hobaje Dawidei meimeijung hao yoa kibü müt pendou Jihudaa Baala ka Mühghaüeibü Saopobü Busen jungan angla haukei, kho Thükenbou
Hobaje haoenei Mühghaüeibü Busen kho Abinadabeibü chem ka sungjung haukei hoba kailong haanbü chenei jinkei hoba Abinadabeibü shounyi, Uzza si Ahioei kailong haanbü kho leikei.
Hobaje shongha kibü Abinadabeibü chem ka haoenei Mühghaüeibü Busen yoa künlangkei, hoba Busen thedanga Ahio haukei.
Hobaje fir buei kümbü kongkin, pithung, pitbü kongkin, sen, ikjishoua lonan lükbou hoba kaangbü laa, hoba kongkin pithung phang juongei Dawid si Israel chung pendouei
Hobaje ladang haoen Nakon amshang sühko loukei, Uzzaei ik longan Mühghaüeibü Busen to ik- phen lambei, aieilausi masu shuong kho phaiyetkei.
Hobaje
Hobaje Dawid aolinko kikei, aieilausi
Hobaje khünyet kho Dawidei
Hibü Dawidei
Hobaje
Hobaje Dawid Choba la ho ngetiko laukei, “Mühghaüeibü Busen phobü nyena
Hobaje
Hobaje Dawid
Hibü Dawid hoba Israel mütli pendouei olinko hoba teklaang metbü langei
Hobaje
Hobaje haoenei
Hobaje ladang Dawidei juokbü lembü si sangmai lembü kho thonkei, haoei mütshuong Thükenbou
Hobaje müt pendou khei tan khümbo yoa bousu la hoba yaksa la mütpem weko la wentek che che hoba phe jushin che che hoba kismis haoei kukei. Kho tegü müt pendou lulueibü chem to linkei.

Kheijinei Dawidei haoeibü chempen haükula sepeinyu haukei. Hobaje Sauleibü shou Maikel Dawid shuokla loukei, hoba laukei, “Tatje Israelbü Choba lai soneikangko kikei! Aoei tat jembü lolo haoeibü sambüsao shuong thedanga haangalongbü mütshuong yoa himou akakko jembü lolo mütkong kibü tegü mütkong kikei!”
Hobaje Dawidei Maikel to jongaiko laukei, “
Hobaje ngo khütokei chühajanbou yinglabü; lausikei nyi laubü sambü saoshuong, haoen thedanga ngo nyensang nyenhaang kilabü!”
Hobaje Sauleibü shou Maikel hainyet sühko shousi akitei.
Tou Dawid Choba, jembü chema
Chobaei Nathan thuseibou to laukei, “Tou chühashi, ngo cedarei kümbü chem chenei kida, lausikei Mühghaüeibü Ngühkhüm Busenje neichem thangtet phanga kida.”
Hobaje Nathanei Choba to laukei, “Hauashi, kaibü maang- pona kibü pendou kümashi; aieilausi
Hobaje khüyoutham
“Hauashi, hoba ngo khangenbou Dawid to lenshi, ‘
Aishanga Israel shousi shuong Ijep ka leian longbü chalou ka khei tat sühko, ngo chem chenei kian achüh. Lausikei neichem chenei hoba lemshang chenei paia.
Pendoua ainei ngo Israel shousi shuong yoa paikei, ngei Israel mütli pendou to aoyou to ngei ngeibü mütli Israel samla sakkua, hao to aila kanei kü la cedar buei chem che adangku dogo ngei alau?’
“Hibü tou ngei ngo khangenbou Dawid to hai laulabü: Thükenbou
Hobaje no lato ong haukei ngo ka yoa kikei, hoba ka thedang ka kaibü dangbou pendou wapan apbukei hoba kaodaka kibü yaangbü shuongeibü nyen tegü ngei no nyen yaangbüla yeitikulabü.

Hobaje ngeibü mütli Israel shanga ngei kaoen che pienlabü, hoba haoen kean pholabü. Khünei haoen jembü kishang kilabü, hoba touje akuklabü, ayingsi shaangla tegü amaibü shousi shuongei haoen khon asaktilabü.
Khei ngeibü mütli Israel thüka matjembü shuong sakkubü chalou ka; hoba kaibü dangbou pendou ka ngei no haksotilabü. Toukei
Ladang kaibü salang thonlaje, hoba no kaibü bousi shuong yoa yeplaje, ngei ka phainei lilabü longtilabü laobou kaibü mang ka longlabü; hoba ngei haoeibü sangle yaülabü.
Haoei kü nyen shanga chem che danglabü; hoba ngei haoeibü sangle Choba setshang ponpen shanga kümlabü.
Ngo haoeibü bou yinglabü, hoba hao ngeibü shou yeilabü, haoei shabü jungeia longa ngei hao müteibü juei hoba müteibü shousi shuongei ngümbüei shieikoelabü.
Lausikei Saul ao ka ngei ngeibü sangle langkei, hoba ka thedang ka tekan apbü tegü ngeibü sangle hao kaje abanglabü.
Hobaje kaibü chem hoba kaibü sangle ka thedanga ponpen shanga kaangkhühtham kilabü, kaibü Choba setshang ponpen shanga yaülabü.’ ”
Khübü tang khitbü ngüh pendou tegütham Nathanei Dawid to lenkei.
Kheijinei Dawid Choba atkei hoba
Hobaje O
Hobaje tokei Dawidei ka to ai aei lenla? Aiei nyi no khangenbou ngeakei, O
Kaibü ngüh hima, hoba ka maangpon tegü no khangenbou la ho ngean aptikei, habü yaangbü pendou nyi kümbei.
Hibü no yaangbü ki. O

Hobaje kaodaka kaibü mütli Israel phatko ai mütli ki, aoyou Mühghaüei haoeibü phang che yeila angthetla haukei, haoeibü nyen che yeitila hoba ka shanga kümsilei yaang kümla hoba kaibü kaonyek shanga hatlamoklabü kümsilei kümla kaibü mütli thedanga laobou ka jungto Ijep ka hoba phangshuong ka hoba haoeneibü mühgha shuong ka angthetkei?
Hobaje nyi kaibü mütli Israel ka shanga ponpen shanga kaibü mütli che kila kümbei hoba no
“Hobaje tou, O
Hobaje kaibü nyen ponpen shanga yaangentiko lenshi. Thükenbou
O Thükenbü
“Hobaje tou, O
Hibü tou no khangenboueibü chemdang haükushima, hoba khünei ka thedanga kho athakko kilabü, aishanga nyi, O
Tou kho phaia Dawidei Filistiabü thükkei, hoba haoenei kho kimbei hoba Dawidei haoeneibü ik ka Metheg Amma sungkei.

Hobaje haoei Moab thükkei hoba haoen kaoa shimde yeptian phoan linlin haoen takan chühkei, hoba haoei lin nyi haitila takletkukei, hoba lin che sünga lang phola takletkukei. Hobaje Moabbü Dawid khangenbü shuong yeikei hoba khüm künan loukukei.
Hobaje Dawidei Zobabü Choba Rehobeibü shou Hadadezer hao jembü leilang Eufrates lengaila haujinei thükkei.

Hobaje hao ka Dawidei Koli sepai hajar che to saongao nyet hoba youeibü sepai hajar saoche sungkei, hoba Dawidei kailong koli pendou youshi wapan apbukei, lausikei haoen kailong saongao haoen shanga thanan phokei.
Hobaje ladang Siriabü shuongei Zobabü Choba Hadadezer thuila loukei, Dawidei Siriabü müt hajar saoto nyi haitikei.
Kheijinei Dawidei Damaskaa kibü Siriaa sepai tan phokei; hoba Siriabü shuong Dawid khangenbü yeikei, hoba jongsak jungan loukei. Hobaje hao lae aeto ong haukei thükbü kukei.
Hobaje Hadadezereibü ik ka honeibü aih shuong kho Dawidei sungkei hoba khübü kho Jerusalem to sungbakei.
Hobaje Beta hoba Berothai ka Hadadezer sangnyu shuong ka Dawid Chobaei chinam juong künkei.
Ladang Hamatbü Choba Toiei Hadadezer lakjaibü tan pendou thüka dogo ditkei,
Kheijinei Toiei hao shou Joram Dawid Choba jungto hao la salem kula hoba hao haütila hautikei, aieilausi haoei Hadadezer khulimbo wapyokei hoba hao thükkei aiei Hadadezerei hao to la shuokko kikei.
Tokei habü ho Dawid Chobaei
Siria ka hoba Moab ka Ammonbü shou si shuong ka, hoba Filistiabü ka hoba Amalek ka hoba Zobabü Choba Rehobeibü shou Hadadezer ka sungbü peisilei shuong.
Hao sepeijung longeijinei haoei Edombü Jem pholia hajar anthükset thükkei.
Hobaje haoei Edom pendoua sepai tan tan phokei, hoba Edombü pendou Dawid khangenbü yeikei. Kho tegü
Hobaje Dawid Israel pendou thüka Choba kikei, hoba Dawidei jembü mütli pendou thüka matjembei hoba ngühmai kümbei.
Lakjaibü tan thüka Zeruiaeibü shou Joab kikei hoba Ahiludeibü shou Jehoshafat ngühthen dobou kikei.
Hobaje Ahitubeibü shou Zadok hoba Abiathareibü shou Ahimelek ungshedbou shuong kikei, hoba Seraia dobou kikei.
Hobaje Jehoidaeibü shou Benaia Kheretbü hoba Peletbü thüka kikei, hoba Dawideibü shousi shuong ungshedbou kikei.
Hobaje Dawidei phekei, “Jonathan nyena ngei sanou lenenlabü lele Sauleibü chemdang ka at joukeilao?”
Hobaje Sauleibü chema khangenbü che nyenei Ziba kikei, hoba haoenei hao Dawid jungto ngakei; hoba Chobaei hao to laukei, “No Ziba sai?” Hobaje haoei laukei, “No khangenbou hao ki.”
Hobaje Chobaei laukei, “Sauleibü chema müt at ngei hao to sanoulabü lele kilaoma?” Hobaje Zibaei Choba to laukei, “Toukei Jonathaneibü shou sokebü che kia.”
Hobaje Chobaei hao to laukei, “Hao lanei ki?” Hobaje Zibaei Choba to laukei, “Chühashi, Lodebara Ammieleibü shou Makireibü chema kia.”
Hibü Dawid Chobaei hautikei hoba Lodebar ka, Ammieleibü shou Makireibü chem ka hao leian longkei.
Hobaje Sauleibü shou Jonathaneibü shou Mefiboshet Dawid jungto loukei, hoba hao the khüman souhat lenkei. Hobaje Dawidei laukei, Mefiboshet, hoba haoei jongaikei, “No khangenbü to chühshi.”

Hobaje Dawidei hao to laukei, “Tehüt, aishanga ngei ka la kabou Jonathan nyena sanou lenlabü, hoba kaibü pi Saul shangabü pendou kho ka la kungailabü, hoba no hanghangko ngeibü shaushang yungshanga shaula yunglabü.”
Hobaje haoei souhat lenkei hoba laukei, “Ngo tegübü che to nyi chühlabü kho ngokei ai ki?”
Kheijinei Chobaei Ziba Sauleibü khangenbou ngakei hoba hao to laukei, “Saul hoba haoeibü chema kibü pendou ngei kaibü bunyuboueibü shou la kua.”

Nyi hao shanga no hoba kaibü shousi shuong hoba no khangenbü shuongei sekmoulabü, kheiyingsikei kaibü bunyubou shausiyung kilabü, lausikei kaibü bunyuboueibü shou Mefiboshet je ponpen ngei shaushang yungshang khümsoka shaula yunglabü. Tou Zibaei shousi müt anthükngao hoba sambüsao che kikei.
Kheijinei Zibaei Choba to laukei, “Ngeibü bunyubou Chobaei sakkubü tegütham no khangenbouei kümlabü.” Hibü Mefiboshet je Chobaeibü shou yoa che tegü Dawideibü khümsoka hao shaukei yungkei.
Mefiboshetei bousu shou che kikei haoeibü nyen Mika. Hobaje Ziba chema kibü pendou Mefibosheteibü sambü shuong kikei.
Hibü Mefiboshet Jerusalema kikei, aieilausi haoei athakko Chobaeibü khümsoka shaukei; hoba haoeibü you penyiham sian pheijung ngaian kikei.
Kho phaia Ammonbü Choba haikei hoba haoeibü shou Hanunei hao jeila songdakkei.

Kheijinei Dawidei laukei, “Na- hasheibü shou Hanun to haobouei kü to sanoubü ngei ngei sanou lenlabü.” Hibü Dawidei haobou shanga hao hakso haptibü haoeibü sambü shuong ik to kuan hautikei. Hobaje Dawideibü sambü shuong Ammonbü shousi shuong kaodak to loukei.

Lausikei Ammonbü shousi leiyeibü shuongei haoeneibü bunyu Hanun to laukei, “Dawidei kabou to souhat lenda dogo nyi damda, ka jungto haksotibü shuong hautikei dogo damda si? Dawidei haoeibü sambü shuong ka jungto sangnyu lamla hoba kho chühletla hoba kho tuongtila ohauti lo?”
Hibü Hanunei Dawideibü sambü shuong lapbei hoba haoeneibü kaoshang wi jamde kütan apbukei, hoba haoeneibü neisimei youshi ka lipan apbukei, hoba haoen ngaitikei.

Ladang haoenei kho Dawid la lenkei, haoei haoen shuokla hautikei, aishanga mütshuong aeibou himouko kikei. Hobaje Chobaei laukei, “Kaneibü kaoshang wi aching shongko Jerikhoa kishi, hoba kho phaia kangai.”

Hobaje ladang Ammonbü shousi shuongei Dawid thedanga haoen mangsenan apa dogo chühenkei Ammonbü shousi shuongei hautikei hoba Beth Rehob si Zobaa kibü Siriabü youeibü sepai hajar saoche hoba müt hajar che yoa Maakabü Choba si Tob mütshuong hajar anthüknyi haukei.
Hobaje ladang Dawidei kho ditkei, haoei Joab hautikei, hoba lakjaibü tan pendou hau kibü mütshuong hautikei.
Hobaje Ammonbü shousi shuong longkei hoba bakhün to atshang aenei lason tan penyi lokei, hoba Zobaa kibü hoba Rehoba kibü Siriabü hoba Tob si Maakabü mütshuong khongthua haoen ong kikei.
Tou ladang Joabei la kho hao dantheko thedanga hoba phainei kibü hapbei, haoei Israel mütli pendou ka pienkei, hoba Siriabü khulimbo lason lin küman yangan phokei.
Joubü mütshuong kho haoei haoeibü na Abishaieibü ika lepde kuan apbei, hoba haoei Ammon shousi shuong khulimbo haoen lin küman phokei.

Hobaje haoei, laukei, “Siriabü kho kü shanga hau yongko yaangbü yingalonga, kheijinei nyi ngo thuilabü, lausi tokei Ammonbü shousi shuong ka shanga hau yongko yaangan kialonga kheijinei ngo louan thuilabü.
Maangkaangashi, hoba sen mütli shanga hoba seneibü Mühghaüeibü sangnyu shanga sen bousu lakba la yeikho; hoba
Hibü Joab hoba hao yoa kibü mütshuong Siriabü khulimbo labou nyangko loukei, hoba haoen hao thedang ka satkei.

Hobaje ladang Siriabüei hatla satda dogo Ammonbüei ditkei, kho tegü haoenkei Abishai thedang ka hatla satkei, hoba sangnyu to atkei. Kheijinei Ammonbü shousi shuong ka Joab sepeinyu longeikei, hoba Jerusalem to loukei.
Hobaje ladang Siriabü Israelbüei thüka dogo chühenkei, haoen lolo chela onshaikei.
Hobaje Hadadezer hautikei hoba shumang danan kibü Siriabü leibakei, hoba haoen Helam to Hadadezer lakjaibü tan lajamleibou Shobak haoen thedanga leibou küman loukei.
Hobaje kho Dawid to lenkei, hoba haoei Israelbü pendou liko yoshaitikei, hoba Jordan danan Helam to loukei. Hobaje Siriabüei Dawid danthetko lashuok lokei, hoba hao to wapyokei.

Hobaje Siriabü Israelbü thedang ka hatla satkei; hoba Siriabü kailong saongao nyet hoba koli sepai hajar saonyi haitikei hoba haoeneibü lakjaibü tan lajamleibou Shobak leilukei, hoba hao khünei haikei.

Hobaje ladang Hadadezer khangenbü shuong Choba pendouei Israelbü thüka haoen nemtia dogo ditkei, haoenei Israel to sangmai kümbei hoba haoen khangenkei. Hibü Siriabüei touje Ammonbü shousi shuong to thuila hatkei.

Tou kelit onglit jih sühjinei Choba shuong wapyola haubü jihaphaia Dawidei Joab hoba hao yoa haoeibü khangenbü shuong hoba Israelbü hautikei, hoba haoenei Ammonbü shousi shuong mautikei, hoba Rabba komlepbei. Lausikei Dawid je Jerusalema kikei.
Kheijinei nyetche chanyu neplamto Dawid hao haoeibü yepshang ka meimeikei, hoba Chobaeibü chemdaka paikei, hoba chemdak ka yaksa che mangyuko hapbei, hoba yaksa kho aeibou hesisao maian kikei.
Hobaje Dawidei müt hautian yaksanyu kho shanga pheyokei. Hobaje müt cheei laukei, “Ho Eliameibü shou Bathsheba, Hitbü Uriaeibü yak aying si?”

Hobaje Dawidei ngühlang kümbü shuong hautikei hoba sao leian loukei hoba sao hao jungto lotkei, hoba haoei sao to asangalanbü kümbei; aieilausi sao asaopobü ka hinseian kikei, hoba sao jembü chem to ngaikei.
Hobaje yaksanyu kho mang akongko apbei; hoba saoei ngühlang hautiko Dawid la ngetiko laukei, “Ngo mangakongko apa.”
Hobaje Dawidei Joab jungto ngühlang hautiko laukei, “Hitbü Uria kü jungto hautiashi.” Hobaje Joabei Uria Dawid jungto hautikei.
Hobaje ladang Uria hao jungto loukei, Dawidei hao ka Joabei lai kümbei hoba mütshuongei lai kümbei hoba wapyo lai hauda dogo phekei.
Hobaje Dawidei Uria to laukei, “Kaibü chem to yanashi hoba kaibü you makashi.” Hobaje Uria Chobaeibü chem ka bangkei hoba Choba ka hao phaito jongsak semtikei.
Lausikei Uria je haoeibü bunyubou khangenbü pendou yoa Chobaeibü kouyema yepbei hoba haoeibü chem to ayan.
Hobaje ladang haoenei Dawid to Uria haoeibü chem to ayan dogo lenkei, Dawidei Uria to laukei, “No yena lounyu kian longeikei aying lo? Khülonga kaibü chem to ayandasi?”

Hobaje Uriaei Dawid to laukei, “Saopobü Busen hoba Israel si Jihuda dipa kia, hoba ngeibü bunyu Joab, hoba ngeibü khangenbü shuong khongthua shaiakei; khülonga ngo kü chem to shaula yungla hoba kü yak yoa yepan kila yanlep lo? No kishongko hoba kaibü soushou lang kishongkoje ngei kho tegü akümlabü.”
Hobaje Dawidei Uria to laukei, “Tatkei hanei kiteishi, hoba ngietje ngei no hautilabü.” Hibü Uriaei khünyet kho hoba nyibounyet Jerusalema kikei.

Hobaje ladang Dawidei hao ngakei haoei hao junga shaukei yungkei hoba haoei hao ihei jaaktikei, hoba nangnakje hao jembü shena haoeibü bunyubou khangenbü shuong yoa yepla haukei, lausikei haoen chem toje ayan.
Kho phaia ngeyang Dawidei Joab jungto le che dokei, hoba kho Uriaeibü ika kuan hautikei.
Hobaje haoei lea ho tegü dokei. Lason sekbou thedanga kanei Uria apyoshi hoba kan hao jungka kukshi, khünei hao to meioulabü, hoba hailabü.
Khei yingsije Joabei sangnyu shijinei lanei kaangbü sekbü mütshuong ki, khünei haoei Uria apyokei.
Hobaje sangnyua kibü mütshuong longkei, hoba Joab to wapyokei, hoba khünei Dawid khangenbü shuongkei yoan tuongkei, hoba tokei Hitbü Uria kei haikei.
Kheijinei Joabei ngühlang künbü hautikei hoba wapyobü shanga haüthükbü pendou Dawid la lenkei.
Hobaje haoei ngühlang künbou la sakkuko lenkei, ladang nyi Choba la wapyo shanga pendou lenkhümlaje,
kheijinei Choba khau angtialonga, hoba haoei ka to ho hai laualonga, “Aila kan wapyola sangnyu nyangko haukei? Haoenei kümthang ka kan thüklep dogo angelo?

Jerubbesheteibü shou Abimelek aoei haitikei? Yaksa cheei kümthang ka nitbü laang thükkabou thükto attian hao Thebeza ühai lo? Kan aila kümthang nyangko haukei?” Kheijinei nyi laulabü, “No khangenbou Hitbü Uria kei haiakei.”
Hibü ngühlang künbou kho haukei, hoba louan Dawid la Joabei hao ai shanga hautikei pendou lenkei.
Hobaje ngüh lang künbouei Dawid to laukei, “Mütshuongei kün thüka younak maibü hapan kün khongthua wapyola longkei, lausikei bakhün sühko künei sepeian wapyojung haukei.
Kheijinei no khangenbü shuong to kipbü shuongei kümthang ka kipbei, hoba Choba, kaibü khangenbou Hitbü Uria kei haia.”

Kheijinei Dawidei ngühlang kümbou to laukei, “Nyi Joab to hai lenshi, ‘Hoei no aolinko tekiti, aieilausi inei che yingsikei che yingsikei suian apda; kaibü lason sangnyu limbo aei aei hau kibou yeitishi, hoba kho tuongtishi.’ Hobaje nyi hao thungeijangeishi.”
Hobaje ladang Uriaeibü yakei lao haibü ditkei, saoei lao shanga mang haapbei.
Hobaje ladang manghaapbü thonkei, Dawidei sao haoeibü yakla lekei, hoba hao la bousu shou che bukkukei, lausikei Dawidei kümbü kümeileiei
Hobaje
Keibou khoei sanlon si masu shuong shuonga juong kikei;

lausikei shalebouei sanlon saoen che, laobou haoei jekkei hoba samenkei, kho to liman ai akitei; kho hao to liko hoba haoeibü shousi shuong yoa chingenkei; khoei haoei jembü shausiyung ka shautikei hoba haoeibü thung ka inkei, hoba haoeibü phakshoka tonkei hoba haoeibü nouyangshou che tegü kikei.

Hobaje keibou jungto yenbou che loukei hoba haoei haoeibü sanlon shuong ka hoba haoeibü masu shuong ka hao jungto loubü yenbou shanga ale, lausikei shaleboueibü kho lekei, hoba hao jungto loubü müt kho shanga lamlekei.”
Kheijinei Dawidei müt kho to aeibou maangpokkei, hoba haoei Nathan to laukei, “Khei kümbü müt kho haila muakei,
hoba haoei sanlon shoushou kho penlei phoban kungaijan, aieilausi haoei ho kümbei hoba onou alen.”
Hobaje Nathanei Dawid to laukei, “Kho müt kho no! Kho tegü

hoba ngei ka la kaibü bunyuboueibü chem kukei, hoba ngei kaibü khukua kaibü bunyuboueibü yaksi shuong kukei hoba ka la Israel si Jihuda chem kukei. Khübü kho thüng aying tegüje, ngei ka la aeilakei kuyoan kikhoulabü.
Aila nyi
Tou khei yingbüei kaibü chem ka in ladangkei abanglabü; aieilausi nyi ngo awealau, hoba Hitbü Uriaeibü yak kaibü yak la lekei!’

ei ho tegü lauda: ‘Chühashi, ngei no kaibü chem ka kakhu limbo amaibü longtilabü, hoba ka the ka ngei kaibü yaksi shuong sunglabü, hoba haoen kaibü chempen shuong la kulabü, hoba haoei kaibü yaksi shuong to ho chanyu thedanga yeplabü.
Aishanga nyi kho huphangshoua kümbei, lausikei ngei ho Israelbü pendou thea hoba chanyu thedanga kümlabü.’”
Hobaje Dawidei Nathan to laukei, “Ngei
Kheiyingsi dogokei kho kümsilei haangjung nyi dangbou shuong la
Hobaje Nathan hao chem to ngaikei.
Hobaje
Hobaje nashou kho shanga Dawidei Mühghaü to aeibou sukeijakei. Hobaje Dawid mühei nyengkei hoba atan nangnak langyang pendou kaoa leketnyu yepbei.
Hobaje haoeibü chem to jaishou shuong haukei, hoba hao nyangko hauan hao kao ka phonla haujembei, lausikei hao apien, ayingsi haoen yoa ashau- ayung.

Tou chalou nyetbounyet nashou kho haikei. Hobaje Da- wideibü sambü shuongei nashou kho haia dogo lenla hatkei. Aishanga haoenei laukei, “Chüh- ashi, nashou kho lang kijinei künei hao to joyokei; hoba haoei küneibü ngüha ale, khülonga künei nashou kho haia dogo lenalonga hao lai khauangla?”

Lausikei ladang Dawidei haoeibü sambü shuong liko hangsho joyobü hapbei Dawidei nashou kho haia dogo lenenkei, hoba Dawidei jembü sambü shuong to laukei, “Nashou kho haia sai?” Hobaje haoenei laukei, “Haü, hao haia.”
Kheijinei Dawid kao ka meimeikei, hoba sakkeisambei, hoba hao lolo onang naangkei, hoba haoeibü neisimei jeikei, hoba
Kheijinei haoeibü sambü shuongei hao to laukei, “Nyi kümbü tetlabü kho ai? Nashou kho lang kijinei nyi hao shanga nyengkei hoba haapbei, lausikei nashou kho haisije no pian shaudayungda.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ladang nashou kho lang kikei, ngei nyengkei hoba haapbei, aieilausi
Lausikei touje hao haia ngo aila haapla? Ngei hao nyibou sungngaienlep lo? Ngo hao jungto haulabü, lausikei haoje kü jungto sepeinyu alongeilabü.”
Hobaje Dawidei hao yak Bathsheba maangsukei, hoba sao jungto atkei, hoba sao to yepbei, hoba saoei bousu shou che bukkei, hoba haoei haoeibü nyen Solomon nyenkei, hoba
Hobaje thuseibou Nathan la ngüh kukei, hoba haoei hao nyen Jedidia nyenkei, aieilausi
Tou Joabei Ammonbü shousi Rabba khulimbo wapyokei hoba Chobaeibü sangnyu kho lekei.
Hobaje Joabei ngühlang künbü shuong Dawid jungto hautiko laukei, “Ngei Rabba khulimbo wapyoa, hoba ngei deikük sangnyu kei lea.
Hibü tou joubü shuong liko takshattiashi, hoba sangnyu khulimbo la thoashi, hoba kho leashi; khei aying longa ngei sangnyu kho lean ngeibü nyen nyenan aplabü.”
Hobaje Dawidei müt pendou takshattikei hoba Rabba to haukei, hoba kho khulimbo wapyokei, hoba kho lekei.

Hobaje haoei haoeneibü Chobaeibü khun kho haoeibü khu ka sungkei, hoba takanchühbü kho hon seret khujin kikei, hoba khünei sonlailaibü laang shuong kikei, hoba kho Dawideibü khua hankukei. Hobaje haoei sangnyu ka sungbü peisilei juongnyu sungbakei.

Hobaje khüto atan kibü müt shuong haoei leian longkei hoba haoen bulatbü, sonnam lipnyinbü, hoba namjakbü kümbüa tukosekko kümtileitila, hoba jih jiha juoklaang kümshanga kümla phokukei. Kho tegü haoei Ammonbü sangnyu pendou la kümtikei, kheijinei Dawid si haoeibü mütshuong pendou Jerusalem to longeikei.
Tou Dawideibü shou Absalomeibü na saomaibü yaksa che Tamar nyenan kikei, hoba Dawideibü shou Amnonei sao sanoukei.
Hobaje na Tamar shanga Amnon aeibou maangdühko khei hao shatkei, aieilausi sao saosüngbü medei che kikei, hoba sao shanga denche ongkei kümla Amnon shanga seka dogo chühenkei.
Lausikei Amnoneibü thangbou che kikei, aoeibü nyen Jonadab, Dawideibü na Shemeaeibü shou kikei, hoba Jonadab aeibou maanglimaangsang müt che kikei.
Hobaje haoei hao to laukei, “O Choba shou, no aila hai chalou angboua shena lengan ong kida? Nyi alenlep lo?” Hobaje Amnonei hao to laukei, “Ngei küjai Absalomeibü na, Tamar sanouda.”

Hobaje Jonadabei hao to laukei, “No shena lengan kiteishi, no lolo shatbü neinoushi, hoba ladang kabou no chühla loulaje, hao to lenshi, ‘Sanoudambo küna Tamar loutishi, hoba kü junga shausiyung lamletishi, khünei ngei kho haplabü hoba saoeibü ik ka ngei kho shaula thüklabü.’ ”

Kho tegü Amnon lengan kikei, hoba hao lolo shatbü neinoukei; hoba ladang Choba kho hao to chühla loukei, Amnonei Choba to laukei, “Sanoudambo küna Tamar loutishi, hoba saoeibü ik ka ngei shaulabü lele kü junga wentek penyi kümtishi.”
Hibü Dawidei ngüh hautiko Tamar to hai lentikei, “Kajai Amnon jungto tou hauashi, hoba hao la shausiyung lamlekushi.”
Hobaje Tamar haojai Amnon chem to haukei, hoba hao shena lengan kikei. Hobaje saoei wen sungan kho nyatnyinkei, hoba hao thedanga wentek kümbei, hoba wentek kho ngoukei.

Hobaje saoei wentek ngoubü chak kho sungbakei hoba hao junga kho sungatkei, lausikei haoei teshauko dogo laukei. Hobaje Amnonei laukei, “Müt pendou kü jungka lintiashi,” hoba haoen pendou hao jungka satkei.

Hobaje Amnonei Tamar to laukei, “Shausiyung kho pobchem to shemjang to sungbakushi, ngei kaibü ik ka shaulabü.” Hobaje Tamarei saoei kümbü wentek kho sungan jai Amnoneibü popchem to khübü kho jungan atkei.
Hobaje ladang saoei khübü kho hao la shaula nyangko sungbakei haoei sao hatlepbei hoba sao to laukei, “Küna, kaiya hoba kü yoa yepashi.”
Hobaje saoei hao to jong- aikei, “Ü, ajai, ngo khontesakti; aieilausi Israela ho tegübü aikei akümjan; ho hatlamoklabü kümsilei, nyi ngoubüloubü kümsilei ho hai akümjan.
Hobaje kü shangakei, ngeibü himou ngei lato künlangla? Hobaje ka shangakei Israela ngoubü yoa che yeilabü. Tou khoei ngei ka to sudajada, Choba to joyoashi, aishanga haoei ka ka asenetlabü.”
Lausikei haoei saoeibü ngüha ale, lausi sao toje hau kibou yingsije haoei sao shanglepbei hoba sao to yepbei.
Kho phaiaje Amnonei sao yongko mangsenkei; aieilausi mangsenbü kho aeiche, khei haoei sao sanouko kibü toje aei yaangbouei mangsenkei. Hobaje Amnonei laukei, “Meimeian satashi!”
Hobaje saoei hao to laukei, “Ü, aieilausi ngo sattilabü shedbü yaangbou kho nyi kü to kümbü ho to amaibou ki.” Lausikei haoei sao to ngüha ale.
Kheijinei hao khangenbü sambü shuong haoei hao jungto ngakei hoba laukei, “Ho yaksa kü jungka leian satashi, sao phaito kou khinngaiashi.”
Saoeibü neisimei son phang phang kakbü kikei, aieilausi kheibü kho Chobaeibü saosüng medei shuongeibü hele kikei. Kheijinei haoeibü sambüei sao leian longkei, hoba sao phaito kou khinkei.
Hobaje Tamarei saoeibü khua tap naangkei, son phang phanga kibü saoeibü neisimei jitnyinkei hoba saoeibü ik saoeibü khua shenan sao haujinei ngüh yaangei haapbo jembü lam to ngaikei.
Hobaje jai Absalomei sao to laukei, “Kajai Amnon ka jungto loukei sai? Lausikei tou, küna, küpjembo kishi, hao kajai, hao khulimbo ka maangpona shatko tedam.” Hibü jai Absalomeibü chema phopan kikei.
Ladang Dawid Chobaei habü pendou ditkei, hao aeibou khauangkei.
Absalomei maibükei amaibükei ajoyo; aieilausi Absalomei Amnon to mangsenkei, aishanga haona Tamar to ik shatkei.
Po nyi kian phaia Efraim nyangko kibü Baal Hazora Absalomeibü sanlon wi kipbü shuong kikei, hoba Absalomei Chobaeibü shousi shuong pendou ngakei.
Hobaje Absalom Choba jungto loukei, hoba laukei, “Tou chühashi, kaibü sambü san wi kipbü to sanoudambo Choba hoba haoeibü sambü shuong kaibü sambü yoa haula sakkubüma?”
Hobaje Chobaei Absalom to laukei, “Aying kü shou ka shanga onat yeibüla sen pendouje tohaukho.” Hobaje haoei hao to aeibou sukeijakei, lausikei hao ohau, kheiyingsikei hao haükukei.
Kheijinei Absalomei laukei, “Khei ayinglonga ngei ka to sudajada, küna Amnon kü yoa hautishi.” Hobaje Chobaei hao to laukei, “Aila hao kayoa haula?”
Lausikei Absalomei aeibou susijasije haoei Ammon hoba Chobaeibü shou pendou yoan hautikei.
Hobaje Absalomei haoeibü sambü shuong la sakkuko laukei, “Amnoneibü maangpon ihei olinbü chühenshi, hoba ladang ngei kan to Amnon haitiashi, dogo lenlaje, kheijinei hao haitiashi.”
Hobaje Absalomeibü sambü shuongei Amnon to Absalomei sakkubü tegü kümbei. Kheijinei Chobaeibü shousi shuong pendou meimeikei, hoba mütpem weko lulueibü gadua setan satkei.
Hobaje haoen lama kijinei Dawid jungto ngühlang louan laukei, “Absalomei Chobaeibü shousi pendou haitia hoba haoen che ongkei ajoukei!”
Kheijinei Choba loenkei, hoba haoeibü nei jitnyinkei, hoba kaoa leketkei, hoba sambü shuong pendou neisimei jitnyinko hao nyangko lokei.

Lausikei Dawideibü na Shemeaeibü shou Jonadabei jong- aiko laukei, “Ngeibü bunyubouei Chobaeibü shou heshou pendou haitikei dogo tedam; aieilausi Amnon ong haia; aishanga haoei na Tamar shatibü chalou ka ho Absalom sembungei maang angenan kümbü ki.
Hibü ngeibü bunyu Chobaei jembü maangpon to atan Chobaeibü shousi pendou haikei dogo tedam; aieilausi Amnon ong haikei.”
Kheijineitham Absalom hatla satkei, hoba thoan chühko kibü heshoubou khoei haoeibü nyeklang khapetnyu tangko chühkei, hoba chühashi, shongh ae lam khüto hao phaito müt juong loukei.
Hobaje Jonadabei Choba to laukei, “Chühashi, Chobaeibü shousi shuong louakei, kaibü sambouei laubü tegü haüthüka.”
Hobaje haoei joyokhümbüyam, chühashi, Chobaeibü shousi shuong loukei, hoba haoen ngüh longko haapbei.
Lausikei Absalom satkei hoba Geshurbü Choba Ammihureibü shou Talmai jungto haukei. Hobaje Dawidei hao shou shanga chalou angboua haapbei.
Hibü Absalom satkei hoba Geshur to haukei, hoba khünei po sem kikei.
Hobaje Dawid Chobaei soushoua Absalom jungto haula haiyeiko kikei, aieilausi Amnon shangaje hao haian apsije hao maang thonan kikei.
Tou Zeruiaeibü shou Joabei Chobaeibü maangpon Absalom aei sepeiakei dogo chühenkei.

Hibü Joab Tekoa to haukei, hoba khüka yaksa che leian loukei, hoba sao to laukei, “Ngei ka to sudajada, no lolo manghaapbü neinouashi, hoba manghaapbü neisimei leashi, hoba nyi onang tenaang lausikei jih lounyu haibü shanga mang haapbo kibü yaksa che tegü kishi;
hoba Choba jungto atshi, hoba hao to ho tegü joyoshi.” Hibü Joabei saoeibü sembunga khübü ngüh jinkukei.
Hobaje ladang Tekoa sao khoei Choba to joyokei, saoei saoeibü thenyek kaoei khüpjung atan souhat lenkei, hoba laukei, “Thuikai, O Choba.”
Hobaje Chobaei sao to laukei, “No aiei khonsaktida?” Hobaje saoei jongaikei, “Ngo latnyu che ki hoba kü lao haia.
Hobaje kaibü samnyueibü bousushou mütnyi kibü haosi ham khongthua oyokei hoba haoen pankulabü ao akitei, lausikei cheei che to ngümbei hoba haosi yoa cheei che kho haitikei.

Hobaje chühashi, khümbo kaibü samnyu khulimbo longa, hoba haoenei laukei, ‘Na haibou kho khümbo kuashi, khünei na ao haoei haitikei haoeibü langkei shanga künei hao haitilabü hoba kho tegü phetphanbü kei mautilabü;’ kho tegü ngeibü wankak yasebü haoenei jonnyetkulabü hoba ngeibü lao la kaodaka nyen ayingsi joubü aphokulabü.”
Hobaje Chobaei yaksanyu to laukei, “Kan chem to ngaiashi hoba ngei ka shanga ngühkhüm kulabü.”
Hobaje yaksanyu khoei Choba to laukei, “Ngeibü
Hobaje Chobaei laukei, “Atei ka to denche laualonga, hao kü jungto leian kai, hoba haoei ka to nyibou ladangkei ameitilabü.”
Kheijinei saoei laukei, “Sanoudambo Chobaei
Kheijinei yaksanyuei laukei, “Kaibü samnyu la ngeibü bunyu Chobala ngüh che lentishi.” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Lenashi.”

Hobaje yaksanyuei laukei, “Aila khülonga ho tegü Mühghaüeibü mütli shanga huon amaibü takda? aieilausi Chobaei haoei shian sattibü nyibou chem to aleingaisije ho tegü laubüei Choba khokei shedbü kakbü che tegü ki.

Aishanga kün pendou haiphang, hoba kaoa dei jonan apbü nyibou mokngaila amaibü che tegü ki, ayingsi Mühghaüei langkei alangda, lausikei ao shian sattian ki hao ka inletbü shuong che ayingla shanga huon takda.

Tou khei yingsije ngeibü bunyu Choba to ho ngühei joyola ngo loukei, aieilausi mütshuongei ngo hattikei, hoba kaibü samnyuei maanglem phoan, ngei Choba to joyosi aingenyu Chobaei haoeibü sambüei subüjabü kümbula thükkei.
Aishanga Chobaei ditlabü hoba haoeneibü sambü kho müt aoei ngo hoba ngeibü shou Mühghaüeibü phetphan ka mautilabü ki, hao ik ka püetlabü.
Hobaje kaibü samnyuei dambei, ‘Ngeibü bunyu Choba ngühei ngo haksoa phokulabü,’ aishanga ngeibü bunyu Choba kho maibü amaibü lenenbü Mühghaü hangangbü phatko ki.
Kheijinei Chobaei yaksanyu to jongaikei, “Ngei ka to phebü aikei kü ka huan tepho.” Hobaje yaksanyu khoei laukei, “Tou ngeibü

Hobaje Chobaei laukei, “Ho pendoua Joab ik atan kikei, lo?” Hobaje yaksanyu khoei jongaikei, “No kishongko aoeikei ngeibü bunyu Chobaeibü mae ik ka nanae aeto sepeila athük, aishanga kaibü sambou Joabei kü la sakkuko laubü ki; habü ngüh pendou kaibü samnyu sembunga haoei jinkukei.
Lausikei kümsilei jaksheitila shanga kaibü sambou Joabei kümbei hoba kaodaka kümsilei pendou ngela Mühghaü hangangbü songsido kibü phatko ngeibü bunyubou songeidoei keibü ki.”
Hobaje Chobaei Joab to laukei, “Tou chühashi, ngei ho sakkua, hauashi, heshoubou Absalom nyibou leian kai.”

Hobaje Joab kaoa khüpetkei, hoba souhat lenkei, hoba Choba kho haükukei, hoba Joabei laukei, “Chobaei haoeibü sambüeibü subüjabü sakkusije tat kaibü sambouei, O ngeibü bunyubou Choba, ka thedanga ngei onou hapa dogo ngeda.”
Hibü Joab meimeian Geshon to haukei hoba Absalom Jerusalem to leian loukei.
Hobaje Chobaei laukei, “Hao haoeibü chem to ngaitiashi, lausikei hao la kü thenyek tehüpti.” Hobaje Absalom haoeibü chem to ngaikei, hoba Chobaeibü thenyek ühüp.
Tou Israel pendoua Absalom tegü hao hemaisaomaibü aeibou sanglabü lele lubü akitei; haoeibü youdem ka haoeibü khunyuyo sühko chühenlabü akitei.

Hobaje haoei ladang haoeibü khu shukei, aieilausi po thonbü weko haoei khu shuko kikei, aishanga hao to khulou kho shangtüngtham kijinei haoei shuan apbo lekei, hoba haoei haoeibü khua khulou kho takanchühkei; Chobaeibü seret hauanchühbüei shekel saoan onkei.
Hobaje Absalom la shousi bousushou sem hoba yaksashou che bukkukei. Yaksanyueibü nyen Tamar, sao hemaisaomai yaksa che kiteikei.
Hobaje Absalom Jerusalema po nyi onko kikei, hoba haoei Chobaeibü thenyek ühüp.
Kheijinei Absalomei hao Choba jungto hautila Joab ngala hautikei, lausikei haoei hao jungto alou hoba haoei nyibou hautikei lausikei hao alou.

Hibü haoei haoeibü sambü shuong to laukei, “Chühashi, Joabeibü sek ngeibü sek nyangko kia khünei haoeibü barli youshou sek kia; hoba hauan khünei wan sapshi.” Hobaje Absalomeibü sambü shuongei seka wan sapbukei.
Kheijinei Joab meimeikei hoba Absalom jungto haoeibü chem to loukei, hoba hao to laukei, “Aila kaibü sambü shuongei ngeibü seka wan jinkukei?”

Hobaje Absalomei Joab to jongaikei. “Chühashi, aila ngo Geshur ka loukei? Kü shanga khünei ong toukei kibü maibou yinglabü dogo phela shanga no Choba jungto hautila hato kaiya dogo ka jungto ngüh hautikei. Tou khei yingsije ngo Choba jungto hautishi, hoba kü to shedbü kisi haoei ngo haitishi.”
Kheijinei Joab Choba jungto haukei, hoba hao to laukei, hoba haoei Absalom ngakei. Hibü hao Choba jungto loukei, hoba Choba thedanga kaoa khüpetkei, hoba Chobaei Absalom to sembung shepbei.
Kho phaia Absalomei hao shanga kailong che hoba koli shuong hoba hao thedanga laangla müt anjineisem lamlekei.

Hobaje Absalom tongde pikei, hoba bakhün koukhün naphei nei loko lekei, hoba müt at Choba jungto matjemla shanga matsisangh at kijinei Absalomei hao ngalabü hoba laulabü, “No laobou sangnyu ka?” Hobaje ladang haoei, “Kaibü sambou, Israela ho sangnyu, hoba kho sangnyu ka” dogo laulaje,
Absalomei hao to lenlabü, “Chühashi, nyi hibü kho maibü hoba tükde ong; lausikei kaibü ngüh ditkula Chobaei aokei ohautikei.”
Toukei Absalomei laukei, “Kaonyeka matjembou kho ngo che yinga tegüje khei ngühsidei kibü müt weko kü jungto louan ngei hao la ngühmai ngüh matjem kukhoulabü.”
Hobaje ladang ong müt atei hao la souhat kula nyangko loukei, haoei jembü ik longan hao to hatlepan hao to sembung shepbei.
Kho tegü Absalomei Choba jungto matjemla loubü Israelbü pendou to kümbei; kho tegü Absalomei Israelbü maangpon suletkei.
Hobaje po leiboubü thonlama Absalomei Choba to laukei, “Ngei ka to sudajada, Hebrona ngei
Aishanga kaibü sambouei Geshura kijinei Siriaa theletbü che theletkei hoba laukei, ‘Maimaitham
Hobaje Chobaei hao to laukei, “Sangmaia hauashi.” Hibü hao meimeikei hoba Hebron to haukei.
Lausikei Absalomei Israel pendou aeto shuchühbü hautiko laukei. “Kanei teklaang ngühlang ditsilengko, ‘Absalom Hebrona Choba ki!’ dogo kanei laulabü.”
Hobaje Absalom yoa Jerusalem ka chibü müt saoan haukei, hoba haoenei lansanbüei haukei, hoba haoenei aikei angekei.

Hobaje ladang Absalomei haitibü lembü kuko kitoua haoei Dawid la songsido kubou haoeibü sangnyu Gilo ka Gilobü Ahithofel ngala hautikei. Hobaje khulimbo huontakbü kho hau kian apbei, hoba Absalom yoa müt ae ae haakei.
Hobaje ngühlang künbü che Dawid jungto louan laukei, “Israelbüeibü maangpon Absalom phaito hauan apa.”

Kheijinei Jerusalema hao yoa kibü haoeibü sambü shuong to haoei laukei, “Meimeiashi hoba sen satkho, khei ayinglonga sen shanga Absalom ka satenshang aki, haoei sen tongde laphetbüla, hoba sen thüka amaibüei sühbüla hoba inei sangnyu to wapbula hali hauashi.”
Hobaje Chobaeibü sambü shuongei Choba to laukei, “Chüh- ashi, ngeibü bunyuei ai janenda kho kümla kaibü sambü shuong lamleakei.”
Hibü Choba hoba hao phainei haoeibü chemdang pendou haukei. Hobaje Chobaei chem lomla thangnyu müt an apyokei.
Hobaje Choba kho hoba hao phainei haoeibü chemdang pendou haukei, hoba chem thonbüa haoen otkei.
Hobaje haoeibü sambü pendou hao nyangko danjung haukei; hoba Keretbü pendou hoba Peletbü pendou, hoba Gat ka hao phainei sembü saongaolak pendou kho Choba thedang to danjung haukei.
Kheijinei Chobaei Gitbü Ittai to laukei, “No kün yoa aila hauda? Sepeinyu ngaiashi, hoba Choba yoa kishi, aishanga noje küksithangbü, hoba kaibü kaodak ka shian sattibü che ki.
No miet ong loukei, hoba ngokei laeto haudaje angenyu kisi tat ngei kün yoa shoongaitilep lo? Sepeinyu ngaia, hoba ka yoa kaibü jaisinasi shuong leian hauashi, hoba
Lausikei Ittaiei Choba to jongaikei, “
Hobaje Dawidei Ittai to laukei, “Khülonga hauashi, danjung hauashi.” Hibü Gitbü Ittai danjung haukei, hao yoa kibü haoen müt pendou yoa hoba hanbü shuong pendou yoan haukei.
Hobaje kaonyek pendouei müt pendou danjung haujinei kaangko haapbei, hoba Chobaei Kidron shushou danjung haukei, hoba müt pendou yam aeto danjung haukei.
Hobaje Abiathar angkei hoba chühashi, tokei Zadok loukei, Levibü pendou yoa Mühghaü Ngühkhüm Busen sungbakei, hoba sangnyu ka mütshuong adankhüm shongko haoenei Mühghaüeibü Busen kho phokei.
Kheijinei Chobaei Zadok to laukei, “Mühghaüeibü Busen kho sangnyu to künan atngaiashi. Mühghaü thedanga ngei onou hapsije haoei ngo leingaibalabü; hoba ngei ho hoba hao kishang ham hapmailabü.
Lausikei haoei kü to, ‘Ngeibü olinbü ka to aki,’ dogo laualonga, chühashi, ngo hanei kia, hao thedanga ai maikeije kho kü to kümshima.”
Tokei Chobaei Zadok ungshedbou to laukei, “Chühashi, no hoba Abiathar; kasieibü shounyi, Ahimaaz si Abiathareibü shou Jonathan yoa sangmaia sangnyu to ngaiashi.
Chühashi, yamlamang pholia ka ka kü la ngetilabü ngüh alou shongko haiteishi.”
Hibü Zadok si Abiathar hamei Mühghaüeibü Busen kho Jerusalem to künan ngaikei, hoba haoen khünei kikei.
Lausikei Dawid Oliv shongh to angkei, hoba haujinei haapbo you kong hoba haoeibü khu yuklepan haukei, hoba hao yoa kibü müt pendouei haoeneibü khu yuklepbei hoba haoen haujinei haapbo angkei.
Hobaje Dawid to, “Absalom yoa huon amaibü takbü yoa Ahithofel yoakei” dogo ngetikei. Hobaje Dawidei laukei, “O
Ladang Dawid shongh khu Mühghaü lemshang khüto loukei, chühashi, Arkbü Hushai haoeibü mangyuk jitnyinan hoba haoeibü khua tham naangan loukei.
Dawidei hao to laukei, “No kü yoa haualonga no kü shanga onat che yinglabü.

Lausikei no sangnyu to ngaialonga, hoba Absalom to, ‘O Choba, ngo kaibü sambüla lelabü; shangied ngo kaboueibü sambü kikei, hibü tou ngo kaibü sambü yeilabü,’ dogo laualonga kheijinei nyi kü shanga Ahithofel lamthen thüka thük haplabü.
Zadok si Abiathar ungshedbou nyi ka yoa aki lo? Hibü nyi Chobaeibü chem ka aiong ditlaje, kho Zadok si Abiathar ungshedbou to lenshi.
Chühashi, haosieibü shounyi haosi yoa khünei kia. Ahimaaz, Zadokeibü shou hoba Jonathan, Abiathareibü shou, hoba haoen danko nyi aiong ditlaje kü la lenlabü.”
Hibü Dawideibü thangbou Hushai, sangnyu khüto Absalom Jerusalem to longeian kijinei loukei.

Ladang Dawidei shongh khu kho hansho limjung haukei, Mefibosheteibü sambü Ziba, hao shuokla gadu tang dang yi setshang yoan, wentek ontoubü saoan, semlüh hek shen saongao, buhekdeihek saongao hoba ih shongmok che sungbakei.

Hobaje Chobaei Ziba to laukei, “Nyi aila habü ho sungbakei?” Zibaei jongaikei, “Gadu shuong kho Chobaeibü chemdang setla shanga, wentek si buhekdeihek kho heshou shuongei shaula shanga, hoba ih kho aoyou yama hüla manglaje khübüei yungla shanga.”
Hobaje Chobaei laukei, “Hobaje kaibü bunyuboueibü shou lanei ki?” Zibaei Choba to laukei, “Chühashi, hao Jerusalema kida, aieilausi haoei laukei, ‘Tat Israelbüei küboueibü sangle kü la kungailabü.’”
Kheijinei Chobaei Ziba to laukei, “Chühashi, Mefiboshet shangabü pendou kho ka shangabü ki.” Hobaje Zibaei laukei, “Ngei souhat lenda, ka thedanga ngei ponpen onou haptishima, ngeibü bunyu Choba.”
Ladang Dawid Choba Bahu- rim to loukei, Sauleibü chem ka Geraeibü shou Shimei nyenbü chempen che longkei; hoba Dawid loujinei haoei athakko khükkei- uokkei.
Hobaje haoei Dawid to laangei tetkei, hoba Dawideibü sambü pendou to tetkei hoba pendou, hoba hau kibü müt pendou haoeibü nanae si maeae ik hama kikei.
Hobaje Shimeiei haoei khükjiuokjinei laukei, “Satashi, satashi, no sii angtibü müt, jim akibü müt!
Saul, aoeibü setshanga nyi songdakda, haoeibü chemdang sii phinbü pendou ka thükto
Kheijinei Zeruiaeibü shou Abishaiei Choba to laukei, “Aila ho kei haibü haoei bunyu to khükdauokda? Ngo angan haoeibü khu thetakho.”
Hobaje Chobaei laukei, “Kan Zeruiaeibü shousi shuong, kan yoa ngei ai kümla?

Hobaje Dawidei Abishai hoba haoeibü sambü shuong pendou to laukei, “Chühashi, kü shou ao ngeibü shimung ka loukei, haoei ngeibü langkei lamda; ho Benjaminbü hoei tou latetche aei kümla athükla! Hao khei phokushi, hoba hao la khüktiuoktiashi. Aishanga
Aingenyu
Hibü Dawid hoba hao mütshuong lama haujinei, shongh naphei thito Shimei haukei hoba hao haujinei khükkeiuokkei, hoba hao to laangei tetkei hoba odsinot phinan jinkukei.
Hobaje Choba hoba hao yoa kibü mütshuong pendou maang ngainsheman Jordan sühkei, hoba khünei hao lolo haksomang maikei.
Absalom hoba müt pendou Israelbü mütshuong, hoba hao yoa Ahithofel Jerusalem to loukei.
Hobaje ladang Arkbü Hushai, Dawideibü maangjam thangbou, Absalom jungto loukei, hoba Hushaiei Absalom to laukei, “Choba salangko kishi! Salangko kishi!”
Hobaje Absalomei Hushai to laukei, “Ho ka thangbou to kaibü sanou sai? Aila no kathangbou phaito ohau?”
Hobaje Hushaiei Absalom to laukei, “Aying, lausikei
Hobaje nyibou ngei aoto khangenla hao shou thedanga ngei akhangenlep lo? Ngei kabou yoa khangenbü tegütham, ka junga ngo kilabü.”
Kheijinei Absalomei Ahithofel to laukei, “Kaibü dambü lenshi, senei ai kümla?”

Hobaje Ahithofelei Absalom to laukei, “Kaboueibü thangnyu aoyou haoei apyokei haoen jungto atshi, hoba Israelbü pendouei no kabou to khüpyoda dogo ditlabü, hoba ka yoa kibü pendoueibü ik hau kiko yeilabü.”
Hibü haoenei Absalom shanga chemdaka nei- chem dangkei, hoba Absalomei Israelbü pendou thedanga hao boueibü thangnyu shuong jungto atkei.
Hobaje khübü chaloua Ahithofelei kubü ngüh khoje Mühghaü to theyoko joyobü tegü kikei. Kho tegü Dawid si Absalom haosi hamei Ahithofeleibü ngüh kho weeiko kikei.
Toukei Ahithofelei Absalom to laukei, “Tou ngei müt hajar anthüknyi pienkho, hoba ngo meimeilabü hoba tao Dawid phai semjung haukho;
hoba hao mangetnyu hoba ik hau thetan kijinei ngo hao thükto lotlabü hoba hao hatentilabü, hoba hao yoa kibü müt pendou linlabü, hoba ngei Choba ong wapettilabü.
Hobaje müt pendou ngei ka jungto chemkannyu jembü lao jungto loubü tegü leian loulabü. Nyi müt cheeibü langkei ong lamda, hoba lubü shuong pendou haksoa kilabü.”
Hobaje lamthen khoei Absalom si Israelbü jaishou pendou olintikei.
Kheijinei Absalomei laukei, “Arkbü Hushai kei ngaashi, hoba haoei ai laulaje senei ditkhoma.”
Hobaje ladang Hushai Absalom jungto loukei, Absalomei hao to laukei, “Ahithofelei hai laua, haoei laubü tegü senei kümlep sai? Khei ayinglonga nyi lenshi.”
Kheijinei Hushaiei Absalom to laukei, “Toubüaje Ahithofelei laubü kho amai.”

Tokei Hushaiei laukei, “Nyi ngekei kabou si haoeibü mütshuong hau yaangbü mütshuong ki, hoba khongthua yama jembü shou soan sungan satbü sap che phatko haoen longakei. Kho to limbo kabou wapyoa sonenbü ki, hoba hao nangnakko mütshuong yoa akilabü.
Chühashi, toukei hao hao lolo kaokuok chenei huan kia. Hobaje ladang shaangboua müt at tuonglaje, aoyouei kho ditlaje laulabü, Absalom phai sembü müt yoka haitia.

Kheijinei khei maangkaangbü müt, aoeibü maangpon molosaonyu phatko ki, hatbüei lepde tühnyinan aplabü; aieilausi Israelbü pendouei kabou hau yaangbü müt dogo ngekei, hoba hao yoa kibü shuongkei maangkaangbü mütshuong ki.
Lausikei ngeibü dambü lenda, mütshang kho yungnyu nyangko phetsen tegü, Dan ka Beersheba sühko, Israel pendou ka jungto yoshaitiashi, hoba no yoan lason to haulabü.
Kho tegü kaoen chenei hao lanei haüyolaje sen hao thükto loulabü hoba nin kaoa atbü phatko angeko hao thükto atlabü; hoba hao yoa yobü pendou senei che ongkei üpyolabü.
Hao sangnyu che to atan apalonga kheijinei Israelbü pendouei kho sangnyu to jolüh jungan loulabü, hoba senei yomang khüto khei laangmen che ongkei khünei üpyo shongko senan atlabü.”
Absalom hoba Israelbü müt pendouei laukei, “Hushaieibü kümthen kho Ahithofeleibü kümthen to maibou. Aieilausi B
Kheijinei Zadok si Abiathar ungshedbou haosi to Hushaiei laukei, “Hai, hai, dogo Ahithofelei Absalom hoba Israelbü jaishou shuong la songsido kukei, hoba ngei hai, hai, dogo songsido kua.
Tou hibü tongde ngühlang hautiashi hoba Dawid to lenashi. Tao yam yomanga teshai, lausikei lailai yingsikei danjung hauashi, khei ayinglonga Choba hoba mütshuong pendou suian aplabü.”
Tou Jonathan si Ahimaaz Enrogela haiyeiko kikei, sambüsao che hau hoba haoen la len dogo kikei hoba haoenei hauan Dawid Choba la lenko lekei, aieilausi haoen sangnyu to atbü ühüptijan.
Lausikei nashou cheei haoen hapbei, hoba Absalom to laukei, hibü haosi ham tongde satan apbei, hoba Bahurima chem che to loukei, aoei deikhün che khong kouteia kikei hoba haosi khüto atkei.
Hobaje yaksanyu khoei küpjin sungbaan deikhün sembung kho küpan phokei, hoba kho thüka youshou seknyinan lambei, hoba kho shanga ai ange.

Ladang Absalom chema sambüsao jungto loukei, haoenei laukei, Ahimaaz si Jonathan lanei ki? Hobaje yaksa khoei haoen to laukei: “Haosi shumang aeto anga.” Hobaje ladang haoenei laman ühüp, haoen Jerusalem to ngaikei.
Haoen satan phaia, haosi deikhün ka longkei hoba haukei hoba Dawid Choba to lenkei, “Kan meimeiashi, dei khatko tongde hauashi, aieilausi kakhu limbo Ahithofelei huon hai kua.”
Kheijinei Dawid hoba hao yoa kibü pendou meimeikei, hoba haoen Jordan khatjung haukei; ngeyang lang ngejinei Jordan adanbü haoen yoa aokei akitei.

Hobaje ladang Ahithofel haoei songlen kubü ajungeibü hapbei, haoei haoeibü gadua setshang lamlekei hoba haoeibü sangnyu to satan apbei. Hobaje haoei jembü chem küpjeman phokei hoba hao lolo phenetnyu haikei, hoba hao boueibü heea khünkei.
Kheijinei Dawid Mahanaim to loukei, hoba Absalom si hao yo kabü mütshuong pendou Jordan khatjung haukei.

Hobaje Joab jeila sepai san tan thüka Absalomei Amasa phokei. Amasa kho Ishmaelbü müt che, Ithra nyenan kikei, hoba haoei Nahasheibü shou Abigail lekei; hoba sao kho Joabeibü nyu Zeruiaeibü na kiteikei.
Hobaje Israel si Absalom Gilead kaonyeka otkei.
Ladang Dawid Mahanaim to loukei, Ammonbü Rabba ka Nahaseibü shou Shobi hoba Lodebar ka Ammieleibü shou Mikir hoba Gileadbü Barzilai Rogilem ka
haoenei shen, phauyaang hoba thamchak, whet youshou, barli youshou, shausiyung, ngoubülebü, nyabashik, shumai,

naodei, sendei onbü, sanlon hoba haabü onbü, masu shuong ka Dawid si hao yoa kibü shuongei shaula sungbakei; aieilausi haoenei mütshuong yama hütmangetnyu, mühei haiyetnyu hoba dei latnyu kibü la khübü kho sungbakei.
Kheijinei Dawid hoba hao yoa kibü mütshuong weanchühkei, hoba haoen thüka hajar thüka lajamleibü phokei.

Hobaje Dawidei sepai tan kho phejan sema che Joab phanga, phejan sema che Joabeibü na Zeruiaeibü shou Abishai phanga che hoba phejan sema che Gitbü Ittai phanga hautikei. Hobaje Chobaei mütshuong to laukei, “Ngokei kan yoa haulabü.”

Lausikei mütshuongei laukei, “Noje ohaulabü. Aieilausi kün linalonga haoenei kün shangabü adamlabü. Kün jamde haialonga haoenei kün shangabü adamlabü. Lausikei no che kho kün hajar an tokei khaibou ki; hibü nyije sangnyu ka kün jungto thuibü hautibü maibou.”
Chobaei haoen to laukei, “Kan thedanga ai maibou ki kho ngei kümlabü.” Hibü sepai tan saongao bang hoba hajar hajar haujinei Choba bakhün nyangko lokei.
Hobaje Chobaei Joab, Abishai hoba Ittai la ngühkhüm kukei, “Kü nyena heshoubou Absalom phokeiko jungeishi.” Hobaje müt pendouei Absalom shanga Chobaei leiyeibü shuong la ngühkhüm kubü ditkei.
Hibü sepai tan kho Israel khulimbo yam to haukei, hoba lason kho Efraim yama wapyokei.
Hobaje khünei Israelbü shuong Dawid khangenbü shuongei thükkei, hoba khünyet chalou müt juong, müt hajar saoche haitikei.
Lason kho kaonyek pendoua phinnyinkei, hoba kho chaloua in toje yameibouje müt juongbou suian apbei.

Hobaje Absalomei Dawid khangenbü shuong to kühshuok- an apbei. Hobaje Absalom kolia setan kikei, hoba koli kho yembu long yaangbü che bulong shangbü phangto atkei hoba haoeibü khu yembu longa kaang apjinkei, hoba hao müh si kao kanglanga soueitaiko apyokei hoba hao phanga koli khoje danan apbukei.
Hobaje kho müt cheei hapbei, hoba Joab to laukei, “Chühashi, ngei Absalom yembulong chenei saüan hapbei.”
Hao la lenbü müt khüto Joabei laukei, “Nyi ai hapbei kho nyi kheijineitham, aila hao kao to wetan üatti? Tegüje ngei ka la olinla chandinam uon an hoba senyak che kukhoulabü.”

Lausikei müt khoei Joab to laukei, “Ngeibü ika chandinam uon hajar che kia tegükei ngei Chobaeibü shou khulimbo ngeibü ik ashatlabü; aieilausi künei ditko Chobaei ka la hoba Abishai hoba Ittai la sakkuko laukei, ‘Kü nyena heshoubou Absalom khümenshi.’
Kho khei aying longa ngei haoeibü langkei khulimbo khüpbolangko küman kialonga (hoba Choba ka aikei huan aki), kheijineije no no lolo kukan lokhoulabü.”
Joabei laukei, “Ngei ka yoa ho tegü jih üplabü.” Hobaje haoei haoeibü ika ngatsim sem jungkei, hoba Absalom yembu longa lang kijinei Absalomeibü maangpona suattikei.
Hobaje Joabeibü insiaubu jungbü heshou anei Absalom komlepbei hoba hao to ngümbei hoba hao haitikei.
Kheijinei Joabei teklaang metkei hoba sepai tan Israelbü shijung haubü ka sepeinyu longeikei; aieilausi Joabei haoen senetkei.
Hobaje haoenei Absalom lengbakei, hoba yama püngkhün yaangbü chenei jinkei, hoba haoeibü mang thüka laangshaang yaang shaangan phokukei; hoba Israelbü pendou mütpem weko lulueibü chem to linkei.

Tou Absalomei hao langkeijinei hao shanga Chobaeibü yomanga thaonyu che kean phokei; aieilausi haoei laukei, “Ngei kü nyen damenko phola bousushou aki;” haoei thaonyu kho hao nyena nyenkei, hoba kho to tat sühko Absalom thaonyu dogo lauda.
Kheijinei Zadokeibü shou Ahimaazei laukei, “Ngo tou Choba jungto ngühlang künan khei
Hobaje Joabei hao to laukei, “No tat ngühlang künan ohaulabü, nyi lubü chaloua ngühlang künan haula thükkei, lausikei tatje nyi ai ngühlang akünlabü; aieilausi Chobaeibü shou haia.”
Kheijinei Joabei Kush bou to laukei, “Hauashi, Choba la nyi ai hapbei lenashi.” Kush bouei Joab thedanga khüpetkei, hoba laangjung haukei.
