Kheijinei Zadokeibü shou Ahimaazei nyibou Joab to laukei, “Ai loulaje kaiya, ngokei Kush bou phaito laangkho.” Hobaje Joabei laukei, “Ngühlang shanga kho no ai ku ühüplabü dogo ngean no aila laangla, kü shou?”
Ai loulaje kaiya, dogo laukei, “Ngo laanglabü.” Hibü haoei hao to laukei, “Laangashi.” Kheijinei Ahimaaz pholi lama laangkei hoba Kush bou kho leikei.
Tou Dawid bakhün nyi kanglanga setan kikei, hoba lombou kho bakhün chemdak ba khüto angkei, hoba haoei ladang nyekei tangko chühkei, haoei müt che mütpem laangbü hapbei.
Hobaje lombou khoei ngakei hoba Choba to laukei, “Hao mütpem yingalonga haoeibü sembunga ngühlang künan kia.” Hobaje hao nyangko nyangko loukei.
Hobaje lombou khoei lubü müt che louko hapbei; hoba lombouei bakhün ka ngakei hoba laukei, “Chühashi, lubü chekei mütpem laangjilaangda!” Chobaei laukei, “Haoeikei ngühlang sungbada.”
Hobaje lombouei laukei, “Ngei damsi shaangla laangbou khoje Zadokeibü shou Ahimaaz laangbü phatkei.” Hobaje Chobaei laukei, “Hao müt maibü, hoba ngühlang maibü yoa louda.”
Kheijinei Ahimaazei phangko laukei, “Pendou maisho kia!” Hobaje hao lolo Choba thedanga khüpetkei hoba laukei, “
Hobaje Chobaei laukei, “Heshoubou Absalom maisho kialo?” Ahimaazei jongaikei, “Joabei ladang no khangenbou hautikei, ngei lemenyobü yaang hapbei, lausikei ai yingkeije ngei ange.”
Hobaje Chobaei laukei, “Kukashi, hoba hanei loteishi.” Hibü hao kukkei hoba atopeiko lokei.
Hobaje chühashi, Kush bou loukei hoba Kush bouei laukei “Ngeibü

Chobaei Kush bou to laukei, “Heshoubou Absalom maisho kiakaoba lo?” Kheijinei Kush bouei jongaikei, “Ngeibü bunyu Chobaeibü dangbou shuong, hoba amaibü shanga no khulimbo meimeibü kho tegü yingshima!”

Hobaje Choba kho maang- pon aeibou leilukei, hoba bakhün thük shemjang khüto angkei, hoba haapbei; hoba hao haujinei, haoei laukei, “O kü shou Absalom! Kü shou, kü shou Absalom! Ka jeila ngo ong haikei yingma, O Absalom, kü shou, kü shou!”
Chühashi, Choba haapda hoba Absalom shanga mang haapda, dogo Joab la ngetikei.
Hibü kho chaloua thükbü kho müt pendou shanga manghaapbü yeikei, aieilausi kho chaloua mütshuongei laukei, “Choba jembü shou shanga maangto shatko kia.”
Hobaje lasona mütshuong satjinei himouko kibü tegü mütshuongei khünyet chaloua sangnyu to semeshoko atkei.
Chobaei jembü thenyek küplepbei, hoba Chobaei ngüh yaangbüei ngekkei, “Kü shou Absalom! O Absalom, kü shou, kü shou!”

Kheijinei Joab Choba chem to lotkei, hoba laukei, “Tat nyi no khangenbü pendou himouei thenyek küplepbua; aoyouei tat kaibü langkei hoba shousi nouyang jayang shuong hoba kaibü yaksi shuong hoba kaibü thangnyu shuong langkei khümenkei.

Aieilausi ka to mangsenbü shuong to nyi sanouda hoba ka to sanoubü shuong to nyi mangsenda. Aieilausi leiyeibü shuong hoba khangenbü shuong ka thedanga ai aying dogo tat nyi shangashattia; aishanga tat ngei ho chühenda, khei Absalom langkei kikei tegüje hoba kün pendou haian kikei tegüje kheijinei ong no olinlabü.
Hibü tou khei yingbü khoei meimeiashi, thito hauan no khangenbü shuong maangsuko lauashi; aishanga
0 Kheijinei Choba meimeikai, hoba bakhüna setkei. Hobaje müt pendou to laukei, “Chühashi, Choba kho bakhüna setakei.” Hobaje müt pendou Choba jungto loukei.
Tou Israelbü mütpem weko jembü chem to satjung hauan kikei.
Hobaje Israelbü phang pendouei pheyo phanyoko laukei, “Chobaei seneibü dangbou shuong ik ka sen khümenkei, hoba Filistiabü ik ka sen püetkei; lausikei tou hao Absalom laüa kaonyek ka sada.
Lausikei Absalom, ao sen thüka senei naangenko pienkei, wapyoa haia. Tou khei yingsije Choba nyibou sungbala shanga nyi aila alenda?”

Hobaje Chobaei kho ngühlang Zadok si Abiathar ungshedbou jungto hautiko, Jihudabü jaishou shuong to lenko laukei, “Aila Choba haoeibü chem to nyibou leingaibala shanga Israelbü pendouei lauyobü Choba jungto loubü kan ong phaibouthamla yeida?
Kan ngeibü jaisinasi, kan ngeibü lo hoba ngeibü phe; khülonga aila Choba sungngaibala kan phaiboula yeida?

Hobaje kanei Amasa to lenshi, ‘No ngeibü lo hoba ngeibü phe aying lo? Tou ka jaüan Joab jeiko no ngeibü sepai tan leiyeibou che yeitida; khei ayinglonga Mühghaüei ngo haitishi, hoba toukei aeikei kümshi.’”
Hobaje haoei Jihudabü müt pendoueibü maangpon müt che tegü senjung loukei; khei yingsije haoenei Choba jungto ngüh hai lauko hautikei, “No hoba ka mütshuong pendou longeiashi.”
Hibü Choba Jordan to sepeinyu longeikei; hoba thiaeto Choba shuokla Jordan danko Choba leian loula Jihuda hoba Gilgal to loukei.
Hobaje Geraeibü shou Shimei, Benjaminbü Bahurim ka Jihudabü mütshuong to Dawid Choba to haüyola panteiko meimeikei.
Hobaje hao yoa Benjaminbü müt hajar che kikei, hoba Sauleibü chema khangenbü Ziba hao yoa bousushou anthükngao hoba hao khangenbü müt saoche laangjung Choba thedang to Jordan to louyankei.
Hobaje Chobaeibü chemdang leibala, hoba haoei ai maia dogo damda kho kümla longchem che haukei. Hobaje Geraeibü shou Shimei haoei Jordan danko loujinei Choba thedanga khüpetkei.

Hobaje haoei Choba to laukei, “Ngeibü bunyuei ngeibü shedbü shanga ngo tesenetkai ayingsi ngeibü bunyu Chobaei Jerusalem apyonyet no khangenbouei lai shedbü kümbei kho tedamenma; Chobaei maangpona tephoma.
Aishanga no khangenbouei ngei shabü shona dogo ngekei; hibü chühashi, ngeibü bunyubou Choba shuokla Josefeibü chemdang pendou ka ngo shaangbou tat ngo louakei.”
Zeruiaeibü shou Abishaiei jongaikei, “Kho shanga Shimei ühaitilep lo? Aieilausi haoei

Lausikei Dawidei laukei, “Kan Zeruiaeibü shousi shuong, kan tat kükhu limbü shuong tegü yeila ngei kan to ai kümla? Tat Israela müt at ongkei haitilep sai? Aieilausi ngo tat Israel thüka Choba dogo ngei angekei lo?”
Hobaje Chobaei Shimei to laukei, “No ühailabü.” Hobaje Chobaei hao to thebülanbü lekei.

Hobaje Sauleibü shi Choba shuokla louyankei; Choba bangjung haubü chalou ka hao khümenan nyibou longaibü chalou sühko haoei haoeibü you athounou ayingsi haoeibü sembung wi akip, ayingsi haoeibü neisimei asak.
Hobaje hao ladang Choba shuokla Jerusalem ka loukei, Chobaei hao to laukei, “Mefiboshet no aila kü yoa ohau?”
Haoei jongaikei, “Ngeibü bunyu Choba, ngeibü sambüei ngo huonettikei, aieilausi kaibü sambouei hao to laukei, ‘Ngo Choba yoa haula ngeibü setshang lamlekushi.’ Aishanga kaibü sambü sokemokebü ki.
Haoei kaibü sambou ngeibü bunyubou Choba la nyikutia. Lausikei ngeibü bunyu Choba Mühghaü khuthük hangangbü phatko kia, hibü kaibü thea maibü che kümshima.
Aieilausi kübou chempenje pendou ngeibü
Hobaje Chobaei hao to laukei, “Aila toukei nyi ka shanga lauda? Ngei laukei, ‘Ziba kasi kao kho janashi.’ ”
Hobaje Mefiboshetei Choba to laukei, “Haü, ngeibü bunyu Choba khümenan longaiabü hao la pendou letiashi.”
Hobaje Gileadbü Barzillai Rogelim ka louyankei, hoba hao Choba yoa hao Jordan danko hangan hautila haukei.
Tou Barzillai aeibou baushi, khei po saolei kikei, hoba haoei Choba la hao Mahanaima kijinei shausi- yung kukei, aieilausi hao aeibou keian kikei.
Hobaje Chobaei Barzillai to laukei, “No kü yo to peithetjung kaiya, hoba ngei ka shanga nongnaekulabü.”
Hobaje Barzillaiei Choba to laukei, “Ngo Choba yoa Jerusalem to anglabü lele ngo toukei salang po chalou lajuche kila?

Ngo tat hanei po saolei kia; maibü amaibü ngei ngelep sai? Kaibü sambouei haoei ai shauda ayingsi haoei ai yungda kho shauen yungenlep lo? Bousu yaksa chia laubü shuong to ngei toukei ditla thüklep lo? Khülonga aila ka sambou kho ngeibü bunyu Choba shanga onat che yeitila?
Kaibü sambou Choba yoa Jordan danko tuisho haula thükkei. Chobaei kü la aila ho tegübü jongsak ngaingoula?

Sanoudambo no khangenbou ngaitiashi, khünei ngo ngeibü sangnyua kübou si künyueibü heedang nyangko haila thüklabü. Lausikei hanei kaibü sambou Kimham kia; hao ngeibü bunyu Choba yoa danjung hautiashi; hoba hao shanga ka la ai maikei kho kümashi.”
Hobaje Chobaei jongaikei, “Kimham kü yoa danjung haulabü, hoba ngei hao shanga ai ka thedanga maikei kho kümlabü; hoba nyi kü la kümtimang sühbü pendou ngei ka shanga kümlabü.”
Hobaje müt pendou Jordan danjung haukei, hoba Choba kho danjung haukei; hoba Chobaei Barzillai to sembung shepbei, hoba hao haükukei; hoba hao jembü kishang to ngaikei.
Hibü Choba kho Gilgal danjung haukei, hoba hao yoa Kimham yoan danjung haukei, hoba Jihudabü mütli pendouei hoba tokei Israelbü jamdeei Choba danjung leian loukei.

Hobaje chühashi, Israelbü pendou Choba jungto loukei, hoba Choba to laukei, “Aila seneibü jaisina Jihudabü mütshuongei no koklangkei hoba Choba si haoeibü chemdang Jordan danko hoba hao yoa Dawideibü mütshuong leibakei?”

Hobaje Jihudabü shuong pendouei Israelbü shuong to jongaikei, “Aieilausi Choba kho kün chempen youjung che ki. Khülonga aishanga ho shanga kan khauangko kida? Künei Chobaeibü shaukukei sai? Ayingsi haoei künla jongsak kukei sai?”

Hobaje Israelbü shuongei Jihudabü shuong to jongaiko laukei, “Choba to küneibü phejan an kia hoba toukei kan toje kün aei ki, khülonga aila kanei kün la nyikuda? Küneibü Choba leingaibala lauyobü kün shaangbou aying lo?” Lausikei Jihudabü shuongeibü ngüh kho Israelbü shuongeibü ngüh toje kaangbou kikei.
Tou Benjaminbü che, Bikrieibü shou, jim akibü müt che nyenei Sheba kikei; hoba haoei teklaang kho metkei hoba laukei.
“Dawid yoa kün ai phejan ki?
Hobaje Jesseeibü shou to kün ai phetphan aki;
mütpem weko lulueibü neichem lamashi,
O Israel!”
Hibü Israelbü shuong pendou Dawid jungka linjung satkei, hoba Bikrieibü shou Sheba phai sembei, lausikei Jihudabüje kaangkhühtham Choba phai Jordan ka Jerusalem to semjung loukei.

Hobaje Dawid haoeibü chem to Jerusalem to loukei, hoba chem küpjemla apyobü thangnyu müt an kho Dawidei lekei, hoba chem chenei lombü phanga phokei, hoba haoen shanga shausiyung nongnaekukei, lausikei haoen jungto üt. Hibü haoen haibü chalou asüh shongko latnyu lean kibü tegütham haoen khinan kikei.
Kheijinei Chobaei Amasa to laukei, “Chalou sem kanglanga Jihudabü mütshuong hato ngashaiashi, hoba no yoan hanei kishi.”
Hibü Amasa Jihudabü ngala haukei, lausikei jih takletbü hao phaian apbei.

Hobaje Dawidei Abishai to laukei, “Tou Bikrieibü shou Shebaei Absalom to aei amaibou kümlabü, hao lolo ba lengaian kibü sangnyu shuong khüto atan khonsak longtibüla, kaibü bunyubou khangenbü shuong leian hao shijung hauashi.”
Hobaje Abishai phaito Joab si Keretbü, Peletbü, hoba lakjaibü pendou haukei. Haoenei Jerusalem ka Bikrieibü shou Sheba shijung haukei.

Ladang haoen Gibeona kibü laang yaangbü kho nyangko kikei, haoen to haüyola Amasa loukei. Tou Joab sepai hele lean kikei, hoba kho thüka senyak che hoba shenjanga mepoua in che shouan kikei, hoba hao thedang ae haujinei kho atan apbei.
Hobaje Joabei Amasa to laukei, “Jaisina, no maisho kia lo?” Hobaje Joabei hao to sembung shepla Amasaeibü kaoshang wia haoeibü mae ikei hatyolangkei.

Lausikei Amasei Joab ika in kibü kho ühüp, hibü Joabei hao to manga wapbei hoba nyibou awapjinei hao satan kaoa hak thonkei, hoba hao haikei. Kheijinei Joab si haona Abishaiei Bikrieibü shou Sheba shijung haukei.
Hobaje Joabeibü mütshuong yoka cheei Amasa nyangko lokei, hoba laukei, “Aoyoula Joab maikuda, hoba aoyou Dawid shanga ki, hao Joab phai semashi.”

Amasa thusheda jembü siia khoneiko kikei. Hobaje nyangko loubü atei hao hapan loan apbei hoba ladang müt khoei müt pendou lobü hapbei haoei Amasa pühlam ka yamto jungan atkei, hoba hao la nei seikukei.
Ladang hao lamkhong pühlam ka sunglangkei, müt pendou Joab phai Bikrieibü shou Sheba shijung haukei.
Hobaje Shebaei Israelbü phang pendou danko Beth- Maakabü Abel jungto haukei; hoba Bikhribü pendou yoshaikei hoba hao phai sembei.

Hobaje Joab yoa kibü mütshuong pendou loukei hoba Beth-Maaka kabü Abela hao komlepbei; haoenei sangnyu kho khulimbo kao ongenkei hoba kho lapheishon to tangyoko lokei; hoba haoenei kümthang tuongtila hanyetko kikei.
Kheijinei songsido kibü yaksa cheei sangnyu ka ngakei, “Ditashi! ditashi! Joab to lenashi, ‘Ngei ka to joyola hato kaiya.’ ”

Hobaje Joab sao nyangko haukei, hoba yaksanyuei laukei, “No Joab sai?” Haoei jongaikei, “Ngo yingkei.” Kheijinei saoei hao to laukei, “Ka samnyueibü ngühshuong ditshima.” Hobaje haoei jongaikei, “Ngei ditda sem.”
Kheijinei saoei laukei, “Haoenei shangied ‘Abela ong haoen la songsido phekushima’ dogo lauko kikei, hoba kho tegü haoenei kümsilei thon letiko kikei.
Israela kün sangmai hoba maanglemenbü yoa che kia; nyi sangnyu che, laobou Israela nyu che kia kho mautila lamda, aila nyi
Joabei jongaikei, “Ngei suian apla ayingsi mautilabü khoje laulonga laueitimang asühda!

Kho tükde aying. Lausikei Efraim shongh kaodaka müt che nyenei Bikhrieibü shou Shebaei Dawid Choba khulimbo ik tuoka, hao ong litiashi, hoba ngo sangnyu ka kukkho.” Hobaje yaksanyuei Joab to laukei, “Chühashi, ka la haoeibü khu kümthang limbo tonan yantikulabü.”

Kheijinei yaksanyu khoei saoeibü songsido khümboei müt pendou jungto haukei. Hobaje haoenei Bikhrieibü shou Shebaeibü khu thetkei, hoba kho Joab la baman yantikukei. Hibü haoei teklaang kho metkei, hoba haoen sangnyu ka lulueibü chem to mütpem weko linjung ngaikei. Hobaje Joab Jerusalem to Choba jungto ngaikei.
Tou Joab Israelbü sepai pendou thüka khuleibou kikei, hoba Jehoidaeibü shou Benaia Keretbü si Peletbü leiyeibü kikei.
Hobaje Adoram, angnam kubü thüka ikjai leko kikei, hoba Ahiludeibü shou Jehoshafat doletbou kikei;
hoba Sheva dobou kikei, hoba Zadok si Abiathar ungshedbou haosi kikei;
hoba tokei Jairbü Ira Dawideibü ungshedbou kikei.
Tou Dawid songdak haanga po che phaia che dogo mühsinou po sem kikei, hoba Dawidei

Hobaje Chobaei Gibeonbü ngakei hoba haoen to laukei, (Tou Gibeonbü kho Israel shousi aying, lausikei Amorbü joubü shuong ki; hoba Israel shousi shuongei ik ashatla theyolanyosi dogokei, Saulei Israel si Jihudabü shanga dambüei haoen haitila lambei.)
Hobaje Dawidei Gibeonbü to laukei, “Kan shanga ngei ai kümla? Kanei

Gibeonbüei hao to jongaiko laukei, “Kün si Saul ayingsi haoeneibü chemdang kanglanga chandinam ayingsi hon shanga aying; ayingsi Israela müt at ongkei haitilabü kho kün shanga aying.” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Kan shanga ngei ai kümla lenda?”
Haoenei Choba to laukei, “Aoei kün suikei hoba kün mautila huon takkei hoba Israelbü leilang pendoua kün kishang akiko kila huongkei,
khei haoeibü shousi müt nyet kho künla labü, khünei künei
Lausikei Chobaei

Aiaeibü nouyangshou Rizpa, saoeibü shounyi kho Armoni hoba Mefiboshet, aoyou saoei Saul la bukkukei hoba Sauleibü nou- yangshou Merabeibü shousi müt ngao, aoyou saoei Meholatbü Barzillaieibü shou Adriel la bukkukei, haoen Chobaei lekei.
Hobaje haoei haoen Gibeonbü ika kukei, hoba haoenei haoen

Kheijinei Aiaeibü nouyangshou Rizpaei senounei sungbakei hoba youlat jih ka khangan mühka haoen thükto langh alot shongko kho sao shanga laanga imtian phokei hoba khübü thükto mühkabü aushuong chaloua loula saoei asakku, ayingsi yamkabü meisiau shuongkei nangnak alouti.
Ladang Sauleibü thangnyu Aiaeibü nouyangshou Rizpaei ai kümbei kho Dawid la ngetikei.

Dawid haukei hoba Jabesh- Gileadbü mütshuong ka Sauleibü lo si haoshou Jonathaneibü lo sungbakei, hoba Filistiabü shuongei Giboaa Saul haitibü chaloua lan Filistiabü shuongei haoen haitikei, Bethshan khongnyu lambhek ka haoenei koklangan kikei.
Hobaje khüka haoei Saul si haoshou Jonathaneibü lo sungjung angkei, hoba aoyou phenetnyu haitikei haoen nyeteibü lo haoenei yoshaikei.

Hobaje haoenei Saul si haoshou Jonathan Zelaa Benjamin kaonyeka Sauleibü bou Kisheibü heea haoenei khünkei, hoba Chobaei sakkubü pendou haoenei kümbei; hoba kho phaia Mühghaüei kaonyekei subüjabü ditkukei.
Filistiabüei nyibou Israelbü to wapyokei, hoba Dawid haoeibü khangenbü shuong yoa liko yankei, hoba Filistiabü khulimbo haoen jakkei, hoba Dawid hüan apbei.
Hobaje Ishbibenob, mütlou mütyang shuong ka bakbü che aoeibü aubu seret hauanchühbü namkung shekel saongao sem kikei, hoba aoei in haanbü che shouan kikei, haoei Dawid haitila dambei.

Lausikei Zeruiaeibü shou Abishaiei hao to thuila loukei hoba Filistia bou to wapyokei hoba hao haitikei. Kheijinei Dawideibü mütshuongei hao to sukeijakei, “Nyi Israelbüeibü hantin nyettikusi amaibüla no touje lason to ohaulabü.”
Kho phaia toukei, Goba Filistiabü to nyibou wapyo kikei, kheijinei Saf, ao mütlou mütyang shuong ka bakbü kikei, hao Hushatbü Sibekaiei haitikei.
Hobaje toukei Goba Filistiabü to nyibou wapyokei, hoba Bethlehembü Jaare-Oregimeibü shou Elhananei Gitbü Goliat haitikei, hoba haoeibü aubu kho neitakbüeibü jim che phatko kikei.

Hobaje toukei nyibou Gata wapyokei, khünei mütphon maibü müt che ik jijihama ikjishou lakbang hoba youakei youjishou lakbang pendouei saoto lei yeman kikei, hoba haokei mütlou mütyang shuong ka bakbü kikei.
Hobaje ladang haoei Israel khulimbo huiletkei, Dawideibü na Shimeieibü shou Jonathanei hao haitikei.
Habü lei, Gata süngsilop yaangbü phang ka bakbü kikei hoba haoen Dawid khangenbü shuong ikto atkei.
Hobaje ladang
Haoei laukei,
hoba ngeibü lapheishon,
hoba ngo khümenbou ki.
Kü Mühghaü,
ngeibü laang,
ao to ngo satenda.
Ngeibü aih hoba ngo khümenbü laang,
ngeibü lapheishon hoba ngo satenshang.
Ngo khümenbou, nyi ngo khonku ka khümenda.
Ngei
Ngo dangbou shuong ka püetan kia!
Hailabü deishouei ngo kailepan kikei.
Mautilabü deishouei ngo moktikei!
Sheol jolühei ngo shenlepbei,
hailabü sungei ngo thangetkei.
Ngo maangshata ngei
Ngeibü Mühghaü to ngei ngekkei.
Haoeibü lembü chem ka haoei kü ngüh ditkei;
hoba ngei ngekbü haoeibü nou to loukei.
Kheijinei kaodak nyaakkei hoba lühkei.
Müh denshang topeikei hoba nyaakeikei,
aieilausi hao khauangko kikei!
Haoeibü kungkhün ka wankhük longkei.
Wankak yasebü haoeibü sembung ka laakjung longkei.
Haoei mühkei khüpettikei hoba louyankei;
sangmei nakthühbü haoeibü you phanga kikei.
Hao kaakyembü kherabima setkei,
hoba seengjung satkei,
Hao yeieibü kaak thüka hapbei.
Haoei müh kaijembo ngühlepbo
nakthühbü deinyu shuong yoshaian,
mühshuong sangmei shangbü kümbei.
Hao thedanga jajalalabüei,
wankaka wan longtikei.
hoba Thükenbou Mühghaüei ngüh longtikei.
Hobaje haoei laujin kipbei,
hoba dangbou shuong lintikei;
hoba haoeneibü lam yoongtikei.
Kheijinei yungnyu maang kho tangto longkei.
Kaodak denshang shuong khongthu la yeiko
phaletham yeitilabü.
hakhin thakthakbüei longkei.
Thükkabou ka haoei yantikei,
hoba haoei ngo baman sungkei,
deinyu haübü ka haoei ngo yaüankei.
Ngeibü dangbou hau kibü ka haoei ngo khümenkei;
no mangsenbü shuong ka khümenkei;
aieilausi haoen kü shanga yongko hau yaangbü kikei.
Ngeibü thushed chaloua haoen kü thükto loukei;
lausikei
Hopabü kaoen che to toukei haoei ngo leian longkei;
haoei ngo khümenkei aieilausi haoei kü to olinkei.
Ngo saopobü thüng
ngeibü ik sakteibü thüng haoei kü la pailetbü kukei.
Aieilausi ngo
hoba ngeibü Mühghaü ka amaiko bangjung ohau.
Aishanga ngei haoeibü ngühkhüm pendou jungeikei,
hoba haoei sakkubü ngühkhüm shuong ka ngo abang.
Ngo toukei hao thedanga shed ashonko kikei,
hoba ngo shabü ka bangan kikei.
Hibü khoei
hao thea ngo hinseian kibü thüng pailetbü kukei.
Üeisanou dambü to nyi no lolo üeisanou lenlabü,
shedbü akibü müt to nyi no lolo shed akibü lenlabü.
Hinseibü shuong to nyi no lolo hinseibü lenlabü, lausikei
kombünongbü shuong to nyi no lolo tangsheitham lenlabü.
Khonsak khonkubü shuong nyi khümenlabü,
lausikei yonglam lilibü yantila
kaibü nyek haoen thüka kia.
Aishanga no ngeibü hantin ki,
O
hoba
Haü, no danko ngei sepai tan nitnyintila thükkei,
hoba ngeibü Mühghaü danko ngo
kümthang thüka saiyeila thükkei.
Mühghaü shangaje haoeibü lamnyu benbüsoubü;
hao to maanglem phobü shuong shanga hao kho aih che ki.
hoba seneibü Mühghaü to liman Laangnyu ao ki?
Mühghaü ngeibü kaangbüsekbü lapheishon ki;
hoba ngeibü lamnyu maikeimainyu kümakei.
Haoei ngeibü you meishi saoen you phatko yeitikei
hoba thükaenei suokbüa khümenan phokuda.
Wapyola shanga haoei ngo lenenda,
hibü ngeibü ik phemei chinam lau bühenda.
Toukei nyi kaibü khümenbü aih kü la kua;
hoba kaibü thuibüei ngo yaang yeitia.
Nyi kü phanga ngeibü younak ongatham yeitikei,
hoba ngeibü you ashekti.
Ngei ngeibü dangbou shuong shijung haukei,
hoba haoen mautikei;
ayingsi haoen amaushongko ngo asepei.
Hobaje haoen apienlabü lele ngei haoen suia,
hoba haoen aüan apa,
haü, haoen ngeibü you phanga tuongan kia.
Aishanga lason shanga nyi kü la
shembe kaangkhühtham shenkukei,
aoyou kükhu limbo huongenkei,
nyi haoen kü phanga nyemtikei.
Kü to mangsenbü shuong ngei wapan apbula shanga,
nyi tokei ngeibü dangbou shuong kü jungto
haoeneibü shenjang thotikei.
Haoenei chühkei,
lausikei khümenla ao akitei;
haoenei
lausikei haoen to haoei ajongai.
Ngei haoen to thamngula yeiko ngümbei,
khong kabü thime tegü ong ngei haoen
hannyinkei hoba haoen lintikei.
Nyi toukei kü mütli oyophetyobü ka ngo khümenkei,
nyi ngo phangshuongeibü khu lela phokukei;
ngei angebü müt shuongei ngo khangenlabü.
Yenbou shuongei haoen lolo hehoat dogo ngüha lelabü,
haoenei kü shanga ditsilengko haoenei kü to ngüha lelabü.
Küksithang shuong yuian aplabü,
hoba haoen lolo haoen hushang ka longlabü.
hoba ngeibü laang haülabou yingshi,
hoba ngeibü khümenbü laang,
ngeibü Mühghaü yaangentiashi.
Mühghaü aoei kü la phok lambuda,
hoba kü phangto mütshuong lottida,
aoei ngeibü dangbou shuong ka leiyenkei,
nyi khulimbü shuong thüka yaangentiko,
hoba sekbülakbü müt ka ngo khümenda.
Hibü, O
ngei ka la nyensang kulabü,
hoba ka nyen shanga nyensang chia laulabü.
Haoeibü Choba la haoei thüksimin yaang
hoba haoei naangenbou Dawid la,
hoba haoeibü thensilen pendou shanga üeisanou lenda.
Tou habü ho Dawideibü thonbü ngüh shuong ki. Jesseeibü shou Dawidei laukei, ao thükaeto angtikei, haoei lauda; Jakobeibü Mühghaüei onang naangkuko pienbü, hoba Israel nyensang chia maibü lauda:
hoba haoeibü ngüh ngeibü lishanga kikei.
Israel Mühghaüei laukei, Israelbü laangei kü to joyokei;
müt thüka ngühmaanglanko songdakbou kho,
Mühghaü to souhatbüa songdakbou kho ki.
Chanyu longjinei tegü hao ngeyang ngesak tegü kilabü,
sangmei akibü ngeyang;
kao ka sang longtibü lang phatko.
Toukei Mühghaü yoa ngeibü chem khünei aki lo?
Aishanga haoei thon akibü thebülanbü kü to kümakei,
ajanjan pendoua yenetnyu hoba püetan ki.
Aishanga haoei kü to thuibü
hoba ngeibü maangdak pendou alongtilep lo?
Lausikei Mühghaü to ühütbü müt pendou tekan apbü phatko ki;
aieilausi haoeneibü ikei jungla athük.
Lausikei haoen to meitibü mütei haoen lolo
namkung hoba aubu jungda;
hoba haoen kho haoen kishanga wanei lonan apda.”
Habü ho Dawideibü sekbülakbü sepai shuong nyen: Josheb-bashebet Takemonbü che, kongnyubou sem yoa che kikei. Haoei saongao set khulimbo haoeibü aubu lepbei hoba chemala haitikei.

Hobaje lakjaibü müt sem yoa hao to thenbou kho Ahohieibü shou Dodai, hao shou Eleazar kikei. Lason wapyola Filistiabü yoshaian kijinei hoba Israelbü kukjung satjinei hao hoba Dawidei haoen khulimbo thangetkei.
Hao meimeikei hoba haoeibü ik anoushongko hoba ina haoeibü ik akhangyo shongko Filistiabü wapan attikei; hoba kho chaloua
Hobaje hao to thenbou kho Herarbü Ageeeibü shou Shamma kikei. Filistiabüei Lehia lentilei shenan kibü kaonyek chenei kiko yoshaikei hoba mütshuong kho Filistiabü to hatla satkei.
Lausikei Shamma hao sekmang jenyua lokei hoba kho thangetkei, hoba Filistiabü haitikei, hoba
Hobaje khuleibü müt khujin yoka müt sem yankei, hoba Adullam laangpoba Dawid jungto youlat jiha Filistiabü tan che Refaim yomanga shaian kibü to loukei.
Kheijinei Dawid lapheishona kikei; hoba Filistiabü sepai tan Bethlehema kikei.
Hobaje Dawidei chem waangko laukei, “O müt atei ongkei Bethlehem bakhün nyangko kabü deikhün khüka kü la yungla sungbakua ma!”
Kheijinei lakjaibü müt semei Filistiabü shaishang to tujung atkei hoba bakhün nyangko kibü Bethlehembü deikhün kho ka khukei hoba kho Dawid jungto sungbakei. Lausikei haoei kho ka ayung, haoei kho
Hobaje haoei laukei, “O
Hobaje Zeruiaeibü shou Joabeibü na Abishai müt khujin yoa konglebou kikei. Hobaje haoei haoeibü aubu saongao sem thükto hinkei hoba haoen haitikei, hoba sem to limbo nyenhang che sungbakei.
Khujin yoa hao sonenboutham kikei, hoba haoeneibü leiyeibou yeikei, lausikei haoei sem khoje aonlang.

Hobaje Jehoiadaeibü shou Benaia, Kabzeel ka maang kaangbü müt, kümsilei yaangbü che kikei; haoei Moaba Arieleibü shousishuong müt nyi haitikei. Haoei toukei louyenan ninthu lenan kibüa molosaonyu che püngkhüna haitikei.

Hobaje haoei Ijepbü süngsilop maibü che haitikei. Ijepbü kho haoeibü ika aubu che kikei; lausikei Benaia ju che jungan yankei, hoba Ijepboueibü ik ka aubu kho sokei, hoba hao haoeibü aubuei suettikei.
Habü ho Jehoiadaeibü shou Benaiaei kümbei, hoba lakjaibou müt sem to limbo nyenhang sungbakei.
Khujin khotoje hao hangenbou kikei, lausikei haoei sem khoje aonlang. Hobaje Dawidei hao kho hao lombou la yeitikei.
Joabeibü na Asahel, khujin yoa che, Bethlehembü Dodo shou Elhanan.
Harod ka Shamma, Harod ka Elika.
Paltibü Helez, Tekoa ka Ikkesh shou Ira,
Anathot ka Abiezer, Hushatbü Mebunnai;
Ahohibü Zalmon, Netofabü Maharai
Netofa ka Baona shou Heleb, Benjaminbü Gibea ka Ribaieibü shou Ittai.
Pirathon ka Benaia, Gaash shumang ka Hiddai
Arbathibü Abialbon, Bahurim ka Azmavet.
Shaalban ka Eliahba, Jashem shousi shuong.
Hararbü Shamma shou Jonathan Hararbü Sharareibü shou Ahiam,
Maakabü Ahasbaieibü shou Elifelet, Gilobü Ahithofeleibü shou Eliam.
Karmelbü Hezro, Arbibü Paarai;
Zoba ka Nathaneibü shou Igal, Hagri shou,
Ammonbü Zelek, Zeruiaeibü shou Joab insiaubu jungbou Beerot ka Naharai.
Ithribü Ira, Ithribü Gareb.
Hitbü Uria; pendouei khujinto nyet.
Hobaje
Hibü Chobaei Joab to hoba hao yoa kibü sepai tan leiyeibü shuong to, “Israel chung pendou shoongko Dan ka Beersheba sühko haushi, hoba ngei mütshang lühbak ngela shanga weanchühashi.”
Lausikei Joabei Choba to laukei, “
Lausikei Chobaeibü ngüh khoei Joab si sepai tan leiyeibü thüklangkei. Hibü Joab si sepai tan leiyeibü shuongei Choba thedang ka Israel mütshang wela haukei.
Haoen Jordan dankei hoba Aroer ka khangkei hoba yomang jenyua kibü ka Gad aephei hoba Jezer aeto haukei.
Haoei Gilead to loukei, hoba Hitbü kaodak Kadesh to loukei, hoba haoen Dan to loukei, hoba Dan ka haoen Sidon kaijembo to haukei.
Hobaje Tur lapheishon ka Hiva hoba Kananbü sangnyu shuong to loukei, hoba Beershebaa Jihuda kabü Negeb to angkei.
Kho tegü kaonyek pendou shoongko haoen haukei, lit gü hoba chalou saoche thonlama haoen Jerusalem to loukei.
Hobaje Joabei Choba la müt yoshaibü lühbak kukei. Israela injung thükbü maangkaangbü hajar saongao set kikei, hoba Jihudaa müt hajar saongao ngao kikei.
Lausikei Dawidei mütshuong weanchühan phaia haoeibü maangponei hao to lambei. Hobaje Dawidei
Hobaje ladang Dawid ngeyang laksepbei
“Hauashi, hoba Dawid to lenashi,

Hibü Gad Dawid Choba jungto haukei hoba hao la ngetikei, hoba hao to laukei, “Ngei kaonyeka mühsinou po nyet loutila sai? Ayingsi no kaibü dangbou shuongei shijinei lit sem hatla sateila? Ayingsi kaibü kaonyeka chalou sem shatlim longtila? Tou nyi damanchühashi, hoba ngei hautibou jungto ai jongaibü kula janthetashi.”
Hobaje Dawidei Gad to laukei, “Ngo khonsak yaangbüa kia, sen
Hibü ngeyang ka jih takletbü sühko
Hobaje ladang hangangbüei Jerusalem ae, shemtila shanga haoeibü ik shingkei,
Kheijinei Dawidei
Hobaje khünyet kho Gad Dawid jungto loukei, hoba hao to laukei, “Angashi, Jebusbü Arauna amshang thüka lemshang che kümashi.”
Hobaje Gadei lenbüa
Hobaje Araunaei chühlitikei, hoba Choba hoba hao khangenbü shuong hao ae louko hapbei, hoba Arauna angkei, hoba Choba thedanga haoeibü thenyek kao ae yeian khüpetkei.
Hobaje Araunaei laukei, “Ngeibü bunyubou Choba aila louda?” Hobaje Dawidei laukei, “
Hobaje Araunaei Dawid to laukei, “Ngeibü bunyu Chobaei hao thedanga ai maikei kho leashi hoba kuashi, juokbü lembü shanga masu hoba shaubü nakletbü peisilei shuong kho to chühashi;
ho pendou, Choba, Araunaei Choba la kuda.” Hobaje Araunaei Choba to laukei, “
Hobaje Chobaei Arauna to laukei, “Aying, lausikei ngei kho ka ka munamei ong jeklabü; ayinglonga ngei munam akukoje
Hobaje khünei Dawidei
Tou Dawid Choba baushi hoba khuthu phaman kikei, hoba haoenei hao la nei neikukei, lausikei haoei lemabü ühüp.
Hibü haoeibü sambü shuongei hao to laukei, “Ngeibü
Hibü haoenei medei maibü che Israel kaijembo pendoua lambei, hoba Shunambü Abishag haoenei hapoukei, hoba sao Choba jungto leian loukei.
Hobaje medeinyu kho sao aeibou maian kikei, hoba haoei Choba to thuiko pangteikei; lausikei Chobaei sao to siisiphe asoyo.
Kheijinei Haggiteibü shou Adonijaei jembü lolo yaangenko laukei, “Ngo Choba yeilabü.” Hobaje haoei koli kailong hoba koli sepai hoba müt anjinsem hao thedang to laangla lamlekei.
Lausikei Dawidei aijih dangakei “Nyi aila hai kümda?” dogo lauko hao to ühak; hoba haokei müt maibü che kikei, hoba hao Absalom thena bukkei.
Hobaje haoei Zeruiaeibü shou Joab to si ungshedbou Abiathar to ngühsong wanyokei hoba haoenei Adonija phai sembo hao to thuikei.
Lausikei ungshedbou Zadok si Jehoiada shou Benaia hoba thuseibou Nathan, Shimei, Rei hoba yaangenbü shuong aoyou Dawid yoa kikei, Adonija yoa akitei.

Hobaje Adonijaei sanlon, masu hoba netthembü shatsinam Zohelet nyangko laangei tetetkei, laobou Enrogela ki, hoba haoei jembü jaisina pendou, Chobaeibü shousi shuong, hoba Jihudabü müt pendou hoba Chobaeibü sambü shuong ngakei.
Lausikei thuseibou Nathan hoba Benaia hoba yaangenbü shuong hoba jembü jaisina Solomon haoei anga.
Kheijinei Nathanei Solomoneibü nyu Bathsheba to laukei, “Nyi Haggiteibü shou Adonija Choba yeibü aditsi, hoba seneibü bunyubou Dawidei kho angekei lo?
Hibü tou ngei ka to sudajada, kaibü langkei si kaibü shou Solomon langkei püetla ngei ka la huon kukho.
Hauashi, hoba Dawid Choba jungto atashi hoba hao to lenshi: ‘Ngeibü
Nathanei athakko laukei, “Chühashi, nyi khünei Choba to joyotoua ngokei khüto lotlabü hoba kaibü ngüh kaangkhühtham sunglettilabü.”
Hobaje Bathsheba Choba jungto hauan chem to atkei, hoba Choba aeibou baushi sinan kikei.
Hobaje Bathsheba khüpetkei hoba Choba to souhat lenkei. Hobaje Chobaei laukei, “Nyi ai mangsühda?”
Hobaje saoei hao to laukei, “Ngeibü bunyubou, nyi
Lausikei chühashi, tou Adonijaei songdakda, hoba no ngeibü bunyubouei kho angeda;
hoba haoei sanlon, masu hoba amenbü shatsinam hoba sanlon souko haitian lembeisakei; hoba ungshedbou Abiathar hoba sepai tan leiyeibou Joab haoei ngakei, lausikei no khangenbou Solomon haoei anga.
Hobaje tou ngeibü bunyubou Choba, Israel shousi shuongei ngeibü bunyubou Choba hao phainei ao Choba setshanga setla kho haoen la lentila hao to chühko kia.
Ayinglonga ho haüthüklabü, ladang ngeibü bunyubou Choba jembü pisibousi shuong yoa yeplaje, khei ngo hoba kü shou Solomon shedbüshabü shuong yoa weyolabü.”
Hobaje chühashi, saoei Choba to joyoko kitoua thuseibou Nathan lotkei.
Hobaje haosiei Choba to laukei, “Thuseibou Nathan hanei kia.” Hobaje ladang hao Choba jungto loukei, haoeibü thenyek kaoae yeian haoei Choba junga khüpetkei.
Hobaje Nathanei laukei, “O Choba, ngeibü bunyubou, ‘Adonijaei kü phainei songdaklabü hoba hao ngeibü Choba setshanga setlabü,’ dogo nyi laukei lo?

Aieilausi hao tat yana hoba masu si amenbü shatsinam hoba sanlon souko haoei haitian Chobaeibü shousi shuong hoba sepai leiyeibü shuong si ungshedbou Abiathar haoei ngakei hoba chühashi, haoenei hao junga shauanyungan lauda, ‘Adonija Choba salangko kishi!’ dogo lauda.
Lausikei ngo, khei no khangenbou, hoba ungshedbou Zadok hoba Jehoiadaeibü shou Benaia hoba no khangenbou Solomon haoei anga.
Ho ngeibü bunyubou Chobaei, haoei hao khangenbü shuong to, ngeibü bunyubou Choba setshanga hao phainei ao setlaje alenko kümbei sai?”
Kheijinei Dawid Chobaei jongaiko laukei, “Kü jungto Bathsheba ngaba.” Hibü sao Choba kishang to loukei hoba hao junga lokei.
Hobaje Chobaei thekolanko laukei, “Thushed pendou ka ngeibü soushou khümenbou
maimaitham
Kheijinei Bathshebaei jembü thenyek kaoae khüpetan lembei hoba laukei, “Ngeibü bunyubou Choba Dawid thon akiko kishi!”
Hobaje Dawid Chobaei laukei, “Ungshedbou Zadok, thuseibou Nathan hoba Jehoiada shou Benaia kü jungto ngaashi.” Hobaje haoen Choba jungto loukei.
Hobaje Chobaei haoen to laukei, “Kan yoa kaneibü bunyubou khangenbü shuong leiashi, hoba kü shou Solomon ngeibü gadua settiashi hoba hao Gihon to leian yanashi.
Hobaje ungshedbou Zadok si thuseibou Nathanei, Israel thüka Choba lela hao onang naangkuko pienashi hoba kanei teklaang metko, ‘Solomon salangko kishi!’ dogo ngekashi.
Kheijinei kan hao phaito anglabü, hoba hao louan Choba setshanga setlabü; aieilausi haoei kü jeila songdaklabü hoba hao Israel si Jihuda thüka leiyeibü yeila ngei pienkei.”
Hobaje Jehoiada shou Benaiaei Choba to jongaiko laukei, “Amen!
, ngeibü bunyubou Choba yoa kibü tegü hao Solomon yoa kishi hoba ngeibü bunyubou Dawid Choba setshang toje haoeibü Choba setshang yaangbou yingtikushi.”
Hibü ungshedbou Zadok, thuseibou Nathan hoba Jehoiada shou Benaia, hoba Keretbü si Peletbü louyenkei, hoba Dawid Chobaeibü gadua Solomon settian Gihon to hao leian loukei.
Hobaje ungshedbou Zadokei neichem ka onang thungdou sungkei hoba Solomon la naangkukei. Hobaje haoenei teklaang metkei hoba mütshuongei laukei, “Solomon salangko kishi!”
Kheijinei müt pendou hao phaito angkei, hoba mütshuongei pithung metkei, hoba olinbü yaangbüei olinyokei, hibü haoeneibü ngühlangei kaoa tenkei.
Hobaje Adonija si hao yoa kibü shuong shaubüyungbü thonko loujinei haoenei kho ditkei. Hobaje ladang Joabei teklaang ngühlang ditkei, haoei laukei, “Ai yingbü ka sangnyua ngühbü yaang ho lai longda?”
Hobaje haoei joyoko kitoua, chühashi, ungshedbou Abiathar shou Jonathan loukei. Hobaje Adonijaei laukei, “Kaiyeda; aieilausi no müt maibü hoba ngühlang maibü künbako kilabü.”
Hobaje Jonathanei jongaiko laukei, “Khei aying! Maimaitham seneibü bunyubou Dawid Chobaei Solomon Choba yeitia.
Hobaje Chobaei ungshedbou Zadok si thuseibou Nathan, Jehoiada shou Benaia hoba Keretbü si Peletbü hao yoa hautikei, hoba haoenei hao Chobaeibü gadua settikei.
Hobaje ungshedbou Zadok si thuseibou Nathanei hao Choba la lela Gihona onang naangkuko pienkei. Hobaje haoen khüka olinyoko angkei; hibü sangnyua nyibou ngühbü longda. Kanei ditbü ngühlang kho ho.
Hobaje Solomon kei sanglea Choba setshanga setda.

Hobaje aeilaleko Choba khangenbü shuongei seneibü bunyubou Dawid Choba haükula louan, ‘Kaibü Mühghaüei Solomon, kaibü nyen toje maibou yeitishi, hoba kaibü Choba setshang tokei haoeibü Choba setshang yaangbou yeitishi!,’ dogo lauda. Hobaje Chobaei jembü lolo shena khüpetkei,
hoba laukei, ‘Ngeibü nyekeikei hapouko tat ngeibü Choba setshanga setla kü la aoei kukei kho Israel Mühghaü
Kheijinei Adonijaeibü yensi shuong pendou hatko loenkei hoba mütpem weko jembü haang to ngaikei.
Hobaje Adonija Solomon to hatko hao loan meimeijung haukei, hoba lemshon laang thona ikphen lambei.

Hobaje Solomon to ho hai laukei, “Chühashi, Solomon Choba to Adonijaei hatda; aieilausi chühashi, haoei lemshon laang thona hatan lauda, ‘Solomonei haoeibü sambü jembü inlouei awapettilabü dogo kü la shaang thebülanbü.’ ”
Hobaje Solomonei laukei, “Haoei jembü lolo mubü müt che dogo lenena longa haoeibü khu ka khulou pem che ongkei kaoa üatlabü; lausikei hao to amaibü hapa longa hao hailabü.”
Hibü Solomon Chobaei hautikei hoba haoenei hao lemshang ka leian louyenkei. Hobaje hao louan Solomon Choba to souhat lenkei, hoba Solomonei hao to laukei, “Kaibü chem to ngaiashi.”
Ladang Dawid hailabü jih sühjung loukei, haoei hao shou Solomon to laukei,
“Ngo kaodakbü pendou haangphaito hauda; hibü no hau kiashi, hoba müt che dogo no lolo lenenashi;
hoba
Kü shangabü laubü

“Zeruiaeibü shou Joabei kü to ai kümbei khokei nyi aei ngekei; Israelbü lakjaibou leiyeibou tan penyi to haoei ai kümbei khokei, hoba Nereibü shou Abner, hoba Jethereibü shou Amasa, aoyou haoei haitikei, hoba sangmai jihsiphaia phoklambü sii apbei, hoba haoeibü shenjanga kaian kibü shembea hoba haoeibü youa lonan kibü ngoka kho ashedbü sii kakkei.
Hibü kaibü songsihonei jembü tegü kümashi, lausikei haoeibü khuthubü kho hee to sangmaia tütti.
“Lausikei Gileadbü Barzillai shousi shuong to sanou lenshi, hoba ka yoa denshanga shaubü- yungbü shuong haoen yingtishi; aieilausi ngo kajai Absalom ka sateijinei haoen kü jungto loukei.
“Hobaje chühashi, Geraeibü shou Shimei, Bahurim ka Benjaminbü, aoei ngo Mahanaim jungto haubü chaloua kü to khükkeiuokkei, hao ka yoa kia, lausikei kü to haüyola Jordan to louyenkei, hoba ngei
Tou hibü, hao shedbü aki dogoje teweei, aieilausi no songsihon kibü müt; hoba nyi hao to ai kümla kho ngelabü; hoba nyi haoeibü khuthubü kho sii yoa hee to künlabü.”
Hobaje jembü bousi shuong yoa Dawid yepbei hoba Dawid sangnyua khünkei.
Hobaje Dawidei jembü mütli Israel thüka po saonyi songdakkei kho haoei Hebrona po nyet hoba Jerusalema po khujinto sem songdakkei.
Hobaje haobou Dawid setshanga Solomon setkei hoba haoeibü sangle aeibou yaangko yaükei.
Kheijinei Haggit shou Adonija, Solomoneibü nyu Bathsheba jungto loukei. Hobaje saoei laukei, “No sangmaia louda sai?” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Sangmaia louda.”
Tokei haoei laukei, “Ngei ka to lenlabü denche kia.” Hobaje saoei laukei, “Lenashi.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Sangle kho ngeibü dogo nyi ngekei hoba kü la songdaktila Israel shousi pendouei kü to chühda, lausikei sangle kho sepeia hoba künaeibü la yeia; aieilausi kho
Hobaje tou ngei ka to denche sudajada. Kü to üh dogo telau.”
Hobaje saoei hao to laukei, “Lenashi.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Shunam sao Abishag kü yakla lela kushi dogo nyi Solomon to lenla ngei sudajada.”
Hobaje Bathshebaei laukei, “He, ngei ka shanga Choba to joyolabü.”

Hibü Bathsheba Adonija shanga Solomon to joyola haukei. Hobaje Chobaei meimeian sao to joyola lokei hoba hao lolo sao thedanga khüpetkei hoba haoeibü Choba setshanga setkei; hoba haoeibü nyu setla Choba setshang che kukei, hoba sao haoeibü maeaenei setkei.
Kheijinei saoei laukei, “Ngei ka to hanbüshou den che sumang jamang sühda, kü to üh dogo telau.”
Hobaje Chobaei sao to laukei, “Anyu, pheashi, ngei ka to üh dogo alaulabü.”
Hobaje saoei laukei, “Shunam sao Abishag kho kaibü jai Adonijaeibü yak la lela kuashi.”

Hobaje Solomon Chobaei haonyu to jongaiko laukei, “Adonija shanga Shunam sao Abishag nyi aila pheda? Hao shanga sanglekei pheashi; aieilausi hao küjai; hao shangakei hoba ungshedbou Abiathar shanga hoba Zeruia shou Joab shangakei pheashi!”
Kheijinei Solomon Chobaei
Hibü, tou
Hobaje Solomon Chobaei Jehoiada shou Benaia hautiko hao thükto tomanshattiko hao haitikei.
Hobaje ungshedbou Abiathar to Chobaei laukei, “Kaibü seksichem Anathot to satashi, aieilausi no haila mua; lausikei ngei no touje ühaitilabü, aieilausi kübou Dawid thedanga
Hibü Shiloa Eli chemdang shanga haoei ai laukei,
Hobaje ngühlang kho Joab jungto loukei; aieilausi Joabei Absalom aei asepeisikei, haoei Adonija aeto sepeikei, hoba Joab
Hobaje Joab
Hobaje Benaia
Hobaje Chobaei hao to laukei, “Haoei laubü tegü kümshi. Hobaje kübou chem ka, hoba kü ka ai aukabü akiko Joabei müeibü sii angtibü shedbü künlangla shanga hao haitiashi hoba hao khünashi.
Hobaje
Hibü haoeneibü sii Joabeibü khua kilabü, hoba haoeibü shisishousieibü khua pon- pendou kilabü. Lausikei Dawid si haoeibü shisishousi, haoeibü thensilen hoba haoeibü Choba setshanga
Hibü Jehoiada shou Benaia angkei hoba hao ngüman tuongtian haitikei hoba yam aenei haoeibü chema khünkei.
Hobaje Chobaei Jehoiada shou Benaia lakjaibou Joab jeila lajamleibou yeitikei. Hobaje Chobaei ungshedbou Abiathar jeiko ungshedbou Zadok haoeibü setshanga settikei.
Hobaje Chobaei Shimei ngala hautiko hao to laukei, “Nyi Jerusalema ka shanga chem che dangashi hoba no khüka tesat.
Aieilausi laobou chaloua no Kidron shumang danjung haulaje, nyi ho maisho ngeashi, no tükde hailabü; hoba kaibü sii kaibü khua kilabü.”
Hobaje Shimeiei Choba to laukei, “Nyi laubü kho maiakei, ngeibü bunyubou Chobaei laubü tegü no khangenbouei jungeilabü.” Hobaje chalou juong Shimei Jerusalema kikei.
Hobaje po sem thonko loujinei, Gatbü Choba Maakaeibü shou Akhish jungto Shimeieibü sambü müt nyi satkei. Hobaje haoenei Shimei to laukei, “Chühashi, no khangenbü shuong Gata kia.”
Hobaje Shimei meimeijung haoeibü gadu lamlean Akhish jungto haoeibü khangenbü lamla Gat to haukei, hoba haoeibü khangenbü shuong Gat ka leian loukei.
Ladang Shimei Jerusalem ka Gat to hauan nyibou longeia dogo Solomon to lenkei,
Chobaei youkobü hautiko Shimei ngajung louan hao to laukei, “
Khülonga aila nyi
Chobaei tokei Shimei to laukei, “Nyi kübou Dawid thedanga kümbü kaibü maang- pona huan phobü amaibü pendou nyi ngekei, hibü
Lausikei Solomon Choba haükulabü, hoba Dawid Choba setshang
Hibü Chobaei Jehoiada shou Benaia la ngühkhüm kukei hoba hao tomatlangan ik shatkei hoba hao haikei. Hobaje Solomoneibü ika sangle kho hau kiko yaükei.
Kheijinei Solomonei Ijepbü Choba Farao to yen lambei hoba Faraoeibü shou yakla ngakei hoba haoei haoeibü chem hoba
Hobaje khübü chalou asühshongko
Hobaje haobou Dawidei khonsakko kümbuan kibü ngühkhüma paiko Solomonei
Hobaje Chobaei Gibeon to juokbü lembü kula haukei; aieilausi kho shongh suokbü kikei, hoba kho lemshanga Solomonei juokbü lembü hajar penkoei lembei.
Gibeona nangnak mangh chenei Solomon jungto

Hobaje Solomonei laukei, “Nyi kaibü sambü ka thedanga ngühmaia, hoba sensimaang saopobüei paibü thüng, nyi no khangenbou kübou Dawid to sanou yaang lena, hoba tat chalou tegü nyi hao la bousushou che haoeibü Choba setshanga setla kukei.
Hobaje
Hobaje nyi pienbü phang yaang laobou, mütshang juongbü ka wela athük, haoen yoa no khangenbou kia.
Hibü kaibü mütli tan yaangbü matjemla maibü amaibü shenenla shanga ditenbü sensimaang no khangenbou la labü; aieilausi kaibü mütli tan yaangbü ho aoei matjemla thükla?”
Hobaje Solomonei kho phebüa

Hobaje Mühghaüei hao to laukei, “Aieilausi nyi kho ong phekei hoba nyi kaibü langkei salang loubü shanga ayingsi no keila shanga ayingsi kaibü dangbou langkei shanga aphe, lausikei nyi ngühmai matjem shenenla shanga ong phekei;
chühashi, kaibü ngüh tegü ngei kümlabü; khei ka thedanga no phatko lubü aokei akitei ayingsi ka phainei no tegü aokei alonglabü; chühashi, ngei ka la songsihon hoba ditenlabü sensi maang kulabü.
Hobaje nyi laobou aphe khokei ka la kulabü: khei Choba yoa kaibü jihsiphaia no phatko aokei akila shanga ngei nyaksinam hoba nyensang nyenhang ka la kulabü.
Hobaje no kabou Dawid paibü tegü, ngei janletkubü ngühkhüm si ngei sakkubü jungeiko paia longa, kheijinei ngei kaibü langkei salang loutikulabü.”
Hobaje Solomon pikei, hoba chühashi, kho mangh che kiteikei, hoba hao Jerusalem to louan
Kheijinei asangalanbü yaksa müt nyi louan Choba thedanga lokei.
Hobaje yaksa cheei laukei, “O ngeibü
Hobaje ho longkei, ngei na kho bukan chalou sem kian kho yaksanyueikei bousushou che bukkei, hoba kün liko kikei, hoba kho chema küsi to liman lubü ao akitei.
Hobaje kho yaksanyuei bukbü nashou kho saoei yepetkei.
Hobaje sao metuphanga pikei, hoba ngo nyeket shietnyu yepan kijinei kü ka ngeibü shou sunglangkei hoba nashou kho saoeibü khukua phoan saoeibü shou haibü kho ngeibü khukua phokukei.
Hobaje ngo ladang kü shou la sen inla pikei, chüh- ashi, nashou kho haian kikei; lausikei ladang ngei ngeyang shangshenko chühkei, kü yoa kiteibü kho kü shou aying.”

Hobaje lubü yaksanyu khoei laukei, “Aying! lang kibou kho kü shou, hoba haibü kho kashou.” Hobaje saoeikei laukei, “Aying! haibü kho kaibü shou, hoba lang kibou kho kü shou!” Kho tegü Choba thedanga haosi soyokei.
Kheijinei Chobaei laukei, “Cheei lauda, ‘Lang kibou kho kü shou, hoba haibü kho kaibü shou,’ tokei cheei lauda, ‘Aying! haibü kho kaibü shou hoba lang kibou kho kü shou.’ ”
Hobaje Chobaei laukei, “Kü la in che labü.” Hobaje haoenei Choba jungto in che sungbakei.
Hobaje Chobaei laukei, “Lang kibü nashou kho penyi la wapthetan thoche che la hoba thoche kho chela kuashi.”
Kheijinei yaksanyu ao lang kibü nashoueibü nyu kikei, saoei Choba to laukei, “O ngeibü bunyubou, lang kibü nashou kho sao la kuashi! Hao tühaiti!” Aieilausi nyu khoei jembü shou khüto sanouko dambei.
Lausikei lubü yaksa khoei laukei, “Ho nashou ho ka shangabükei ayinglabü, ayingsi kü shangabükei ayinglabü, wapthettia.”
Kheijinei Chobaei jongaiko laukei, “Lang kibou nashou kho shaangbü nyu khola kuashi. Kho ai aoakei tühaiti! Sao kho tükdebü nyu yingkei.”
Hobaje Israelbü pendouei Chobaei matjembü kho ditkei, hoba haoenei Choba to hatkei; aieilausi ngühmai matjemla Mühghaü songsihon hao to kia dogo haoenei chühenkei.
Solomon Israel pendou thüka Choba kikei,
hoba habü ho hao phanga yaangenbü shuong kikei:
Ungshedbou shuong: Zadok shou Azaria
Matjemshang dobou shuong: Shisha shounyi
Elihoraf si Ahija
Doletbou ikjaibou: Ahilud shou Jehoshafat
Sepai lajamleibou: Jehoiada shou Benaia
Governor shuong thüka khukabou: Nathan
shou Azaria
Choba thungetbou: Nathan shou ungshedbou
Zabud
Choba chema sambü shuongeibü ikjai: Ahishar
Khangbü kümsilei thüka ikjaibou: Abda
shou Adoniram.
Solomonei Israela kaophei governor shuong müt anthüknyi pienkei. Haoen kho lulueibü kao- phei ka Choba si hao chemdang shanga poa lit cheeibü takletbü shausiyung thonla shangabü ikjaibü shuong kikei.
Habü ho yaangenbü mütshuongeibü nyen hoba haoen la ikjai janletkubü kaophei shuong ki:
Benhur: Efraim shongh kaonyek
Bendeker: Makaz, Shalbim, Beth Shemesh, hoba Elon Beth Hanan sangnyu shuong
Benhesed: Arubboth si Suko sangnyu shuong yoa Hefer kaon- yek thepan
Ben-Abinadab (Solomoneibü nouyangshou Tafat yakla ngabou): Dor kaophei khümbo
Ahilud shou Baana: Taanak, Megiddo hoba Zarethan thena Bethshan khümbo. Kho Jezreel phanga khei Jokmeam peiko Beth Shan ka Abel Mehola to onkobü sangnyu shuong
Ben-Geber: Gileada Ramoth sangnyu, (hoba Manasse thensilen, Gileada Jair chungeibü sang shuong, hoba Bashana Argob kaophei, khei phasei kümthang si chinam lengbü bakhün yoan sangnyu yaangbü saosem)
Iddo shou Abinadab: Mahanaim kaophei
Ahimaaz (Solomoneibü nouyangshou Basemath yakla ngabou): Naftali kaophei.
Hushai shou Baana: Ashera kaophei si Bealoth sangnyu
Parua shou Jehoshafat: Issakhar kaophei
Ela shou Shimei: Benjamin kaophei
Uri shou Geber: Amor Choba Sihon si Bashan Choba Ogei songdakbü Gilead kaophei.
Khübü anthüknyi to liman, kaonyu pendou thüka khünei governor che kikei.
Yungnyua phetsen tegü Jihuda si Israelbü tan yaangbü shauko yungko hoba olinko kikei.
Hobaje Solomonei Filistia kaodak Eufrates Shumang ka Ijep leilang sühko sangle pendou thüka songdakkei. Haoenei jongsak juong sungbako Solomon langkei salang sünga khangenkei.
Chalou che shanga Solomoneibü shausiyung lamlebü kho wen maibü taksi khujin hoba nyak taksi saosem kikei.
Masu amenbü an, lamshautibü ka masu saoche hoba sanlon paang saongao, saak, meishi, yao hoba aupaang hemaibü.
Aieilausi Eufrates ka Tifsa, hoba Gaza sühko, hoba khoeibü yungnyu khatan Choba pendou thüka haoei songdakkei; hoba hao kaijembo kibü pendou hao to sangmaia kikei.
Hobaje Jihuda si Israel khümet angetan kikei; Dan ka Beersheba sühko müt pendou jembü semlüh si bhuklong phanga haangkei.
Hobaje Solomon haoeibü koli kailong shanga koli hajar lei kikei hoba koli sepai hajar anthüknyi kikei.
Hobaje kao- phei ikjaibü shuongei Solomon Choba shanga hoba Solomon Chobaeibü nyakshaushang to loubü shuong pendou shanga shausiyung lulu penbü lita kukei; haoenei aieikei shaleko aphoku.
Barli youshou si koli shuong shanga youho si wapyobü koli sobüsepbü haoenei ikjaibü shuong jungto mütpem weko la ikjai kubü thüng sungbakei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei Solomon la songsihon ditenbü hoba maangpon yaangbü yungnyu thüka phetsen tegü kukei.
Hobaje Solomoneibü songsihon chaang aenei kibü shousi shuong hoba Ijepbüeibü songsihon pendou tokei khaibou kikei.

Hao müt pendou to songeihonei keibou kikei; Ezrahitbü Ethan, hoba Maholeibü shousi shuong Heman, Kalkol hoba Darda tokei songboudobou kikei; hoba kaonyek phang pendou thüka haoeibü nyen haangenan kikei.
Hobaje haoei tetenbü ngüh hajar sem laukei hoba haoeibü chia hajar che to ngao kikei.
Hobaje haoei bulong langkei shangabü Lebanona kibü cedar bulong ka khei, kümthanga yembü hisop sühko shangabü laukei; haoei meisiau shangabü, ausiyuk shangabü, lühsili, hoba ngao shangabü laukei.
Hobaje kaodak Choba shuong pendouei Solomoneibü songsihon shangabü ditkei hoba songbüdobü shuong hao ngüh ditla hautikei.

Hobaje Tairbü Choba Hiramei Solomon jungto jembü sambü shuong hautikei, aieilausi haoei Solomon jembü bou chema Chobala lela naangenko pienkei dogo ditkei; aieilausi Hiramei ponpen Dawid to sanouko kikei.
Hobaje Solomonei Hiram to hai lauko hautikei:
“Haoeibü dangbou shuong
Lausikei ngeibü Mühghaü
Hobaje chühashi, ngeibü Mühghaü

Hibü tou Lebanon ka cedar bu haoenei kü la wapbula nyi sakkushi hoba ngeibü khangenbü shuong kaibü sambü shuong yoa kilabü, hoba nyi tetkubü tegü kaibü khangenbü shuong shanga ngei munam souko kulabü; aieilausi Sidonbü tegü bu latla kün yoa minbü maibü aki dogo nyi ngekei.”
Hobaje ladang Hiramei ngüh kho ditkei, hao aeibou olinkei hoba laukei, “Tat
Hobaje Hiramei Solomon jungto hautiko laukei, “Nyi kü jungto hautibü ngühlang ngei dida. cedar si busim wa shanga nyi laubü tegü ngei pendou kümlabü.

Ngeibü khangenbü shuongei khübü kho Lebanon ka yungnyu to sungyanbakulabü. Hobaje ngei khübü thepbü nyi tükde haplabü lele yungnyu to yantikulabü hoba nyi khübü kho sunglangla shanga ngei sengtilabü, hoba ngeibü chemdang shanga shausiyung kula ngei mangsühbü tegü nyi lamlelabü.”
Hibü Hiramei Solomon la haoei mangsühbü pendou tegü cedar si busim wa kukei.
Solomoneikei Hiram la whet youshou taksi hajar saoche haoeibü chemdang shausiyung shanga hoba lanbü onang taksi saoche kukei; kho tegü po weko Solomonei Hiram la kukei.
Hobaje
Hobaje Solomon Chobaei Israel pendou ka khangbü kümsilei kümbü tan leishaikei, hoba khangbü tan kho müt hajar khujin kikei.
Hobaje haoei haoen lit che che shanga Lebanon to hajar an bang hautikei, hoba haoen Lebanona lit che kikei, hoba lit nyi chema kikei, hoba Adoniram khangbü kümsilei kümbü tan thüka kikei.
Hobaje Solomonei onkünbü hajar anjinlei phokei, hoba shongha bulatbü hajar saolei kikei.
Solomoneibü kongnyu ikjaibü shuong kümaleia kibü to limbo kümbüleibü thüka ngühkhüm kubü hajar semto saongao sem kikei.
Hobaje Chobaei ngühkhüm kukei, hoba haoenei laang yaangbü hoba namseklaang jakenbüei chem lotila shanga laang thüngkei.
Hobaje Solomon si Hiram hameibü chemdangbü shuong hoba Gebalbü chemdangbü shuongei khübü kümbei, hoba wa si laang haoenei chemdangla shanga lamlekei.
Hobaje tou Israel shousi shuong Ijep kaodak ka longan phaia po saongao leito saolei boubüa Solomonei Israel thüka songdakbü po leiboubü lit nyi boubü Ziv lita
Hobaje
Hobaje saopobü lembü- chem thedanga chemshou che thenan dangbü kho lembüchem chemkhaang to takan süng iknop saoche hoba khaang iknop an kikei.
Hobaje haoei koulom kho maangaenei hanbou dogo kümbei.
Hobaje haoei chemnyu kaijembo tangaenei kümthang to jaktian shemjang kümbei, hoba chemnyu kümthang to jaktian kaijembo saopobü hoba pendou to Saopobou chem nyi kho kaiko tangaenei shemjang shankei.

Shemjang phangkaboutham kho khaang iknop ngao kikei, hoba jenyu kabü shemjang kho khaang iknop lak kikei; hoba semboubü shemjang kho iknop nyet kikei, hoba chemeibü kümthang kaijembo tangae shanga haoei laang kaangbüei phokhüm thüka chemeibü kümthang aüetlabü lele kümbei.
Hobaje chem dangjinei laang jakenshanga yeian kibü laangei kümbei, hoba chem dangjinei nam jangbou ayingsi, wou, ayingsi nameibü peisilei langh ai aditko ong dangkei.
Lembüchem shemjang phangkabou to atshang kho yungthang aenei kikei; hoba jenyu kabou shemjang to haoen younak khüman angkei, hoba jenyu kabou ka semboubü to angkei.
Hibü haoei chem kho dangkei hoba yeikei, hoba chem khonei khamdak wa shuong pendou cedar buei khümbei.
Hobaje haoei chem pendou to jaktian shemjang iknop ngao bang louan kümbei, hoba haoei chem kho cedar bu latbüei hau kiko thungyoan kümbei.
Tou
“Nyi laobou chem dangan ki, kho nyi ngeibü takletbü ngühkhüma paiko laua longa, hoba ngeibü ngühkhüm jungan kikho laua longa ngei kabou Dawid to lenbü ngeibü ngüh ngei pholabü.
Hobaje ngo Israel shousi yoa kilabü, hoba ngeibü mütli Israel anangletlabü.”
Hibü Solomonei chem kho dangkei hoba kho yeikei.
Hobaje haoei chemmaang kümthang kho cedar bu waei kümbei, shon ka kebung sühko maangae haoei buei kümsembei hoba haoei shon kho busim waei yuklepbei.
Shon ka kümthang sühko haoei iknop saoche chem naphei kho cedar waei huongkei; haoei khübü kho maang aenei Sao- poboutham shanga kümbei.
Hobaje chem kho, Saopoboutham thedanga kibü lemshang kho süng iknop saonyi kikei.
Hobaje chem kho maangaenei chipen si noksa jinan cedar waei kümbei.
Hobaje
Hobaje Saopobü Shemjang kho süng iknop saoche, hoba khaang iknop saoche hoba suokla iknop saoche hoba khonei haoei hon lanbü jinan kümbei, hoba haoei lemshang kho cedar waei kümbei.
Hibü Solomonei chem kho maangaenei hon jinan kümbei hoba Saopoboutham Shemjang kho danko haoei honei janglüh tegü küman nyengtian phokei, hoba khoneikei hondei ong lakkei.
Hobaje chem pendou kho ayeishongko haoei chem khonei hon jinan ong kümbei hoba Saopobü Shemjanga kibü lemshang khümbo kho honei kümbei.
Hobaje Saopobü Shemjang khonei haoei oliv buei kaakyembü kherabim noksa penyi kümbei, suokla iknop an bang kikei.
Hobaje kaakyembü kherabim cheeibü kaak iknop ngao kikei; jikaak thonbü ka jikaak thonbü sühko iknop an.
Hobaje lubü kaakyembü kherabim kho iknop an kikei, kaakyembü kherabim penyi ham takbü jetei hoba chühlakei jetei ong kikei.
Kaakyembü kherab che suokbü kho iknop an kikei, hoba lubü khokei kho tegü ong kikei.

Hobaje haoei kaakyembü kherab noksa kho chemmaanga jinkei, hoba kaakyembü kherab kaak shuong kho sengan kaak cheei kümthanga meiyouko hoba kaak cheeikei kümthanga meiyouko dogo jinkei hoba chem jenyua haoeneibü kaak kho meiyouyoko dogo jinkei.
Hobaje haoei kaakyembü kherab noksa kho honei naanglepbei.
Tokei haoei chem khonei kümthang pendou kho kaijembo kaakyembü kherab pünglong si chipen noksaei tangae maangae pendou shenko kümbei.
Hobaje chemshon kho tangae maangae honei kümbei.
Hobaje Saopoboutham Shemjang to atla shanga haoei oliv buei koukhün den nyi kümbei.
Hibü haoei oliv buei koukap penyi kümbei, hoba haoei kho thüka kaakyembü kherab noksa, pünglong, hoba chipen noksa hon jinan kümbei.
Hibü lembüchem to atla shanga oliv buei koukhün kümbei, kümthang phejan leia che.
Hobaje busimei koukap penyi, koukap che penyila noplabü lele, hoba koukap chekei penyi la noplabü lele kümbei.
Hobaje kho thüka haoei kaakyembü kherabim, pünglong si chipen noksa jinan kümbei, hoba haoei khübü kümaleia hon jinan kümbei.
Hobaje jakenbü laang lin sem jinan hoba cedar phokhüm lin che, dogo jinan maangaenei shemjang kho kümbei.
Hobaje
Hobaje po anthükche boubüa Bul lit, laobou lita chemeibü phejan pendou hoba noksa mangsühbü pendou wantikei. Kho dangjinei haoei po nyet lekei.
Solomonei haoeibü chem dangla po anthüksem lekei, hoba kho pendou maisho kümsembei.
Aieilausi haoei Lebanon buei chem dangkei, süng iknop saongao, khaang iknop anjinsem hoba suokla iknop khujin, kho cedar bu thaonyu lin lei thüka cedar bu phokhüm jinan dangkei.
Hobaje phokhüm saonyito ngao thüka cedar buei küplepan dangkei, khübü kho khamthung lin chenei an thüka kikei.
Hobaje lin sema phokhüm kikei, hoba koulom tangyoko thenyobü sem kikei.
Hobaje koukhün koulom kou- yem pendou phokhüm thüka süng si khaang jian kikei, hoba phejan sem thenyobü ngesakbü kho ngesakbü thüka kikei.
Hobaje haoei Matjem Shemjang kümbei, süng iknop anjinsem hoba khaang iknop khujin khübü thedanga chemso hoba khübü thedanga thaonyu si pangkhüm kikei.
Hobaje haoei chem shan- yobüa Matjem Setshang kümbei; khei chemso kho Matjemshang, hoba shon ka kebunga onko cedar buei küplepan kümbei.
Solomonei hao kilabü chem chemso jiaedanga kibü shemjang khokei kho phatko kümbei. Haoei tokei kho chemso phatko, haoei yakla ngabü Faraoeibü nouyang shou shanga chem che dangkukei.
Khübü pendou nam juong mubü laang kikei, jakenbü laangkei yoan takbü tegü bulatei latbü bu thüka hoba phanga kikei. Chem den khangbü ka thon sühko tangae ka maangae sühko.
Hobaje chemshanga namseklaang kikei; laang yaangbükei yoan, laang kho iknop an si iknop set kikei.
Hobaje thükaenei namseklaang kikei, takbü tegü jakenbü laang si cedar bu kikei.
Hobaje maangkabü shemjang kho kaijembo jakenbü laang lin sem kikei, hoba cedar bueibü phokhüm lin sem kikei.
Tou Solomon Chobaei müt hautian Huram Tair ka leian loukei.

Hao kho Naftali phang ka latnyu cheeibü shou kikei, hoba haobou chinam yaübü Tair müt che kikei. Chinam yaübü kümsilei kümla shanga hao sangbüseibü, ditenbü hoba maangli maangsang kikei. Hobaje hao Solomon Choba jungto loukei, hoba haoeibü kümsilei pendou kümbukei.
Aieilausi haoei chinamei naanglepbü thaonyu penyi iknop anthükset bang kümbei hoba lubü thaonyu lin che iknop anthüknyi kümbei.
Hobaje haoei thaonyu khua phola tühnyinbü chinamei thaonyu sembung noksa penyi kümbei, thaonyu sembung noksa penyi kho iknop ngao bang kümbei.
Thaonyu shuong thüka kibü namlüheibü kümsileikei yoan kikei; thaonyu sembung noksa che shangakei nyet hoba thaonyu sembung noksa che shangakei nyet kikei.
Kho tegü haoei thaonyu sembung thüka pheithetnyu püpyoko kümbü noksa küplepbo chilang shuong lin penyi kümbei.
Hobaje chemsophanga kibü thaonyu shuong thükaenei kibü thaonyu sembung noksa shuong kho leilang chipen kümbü, iknop lei kikei.
Hobaje püpyobü napheinei shimung nyangko thaonyu penyi thük khünei tokei thaonyu sembung noksa kikei, hoba lubü thaonyu sembung che kho kaijembo linlina chilang pon saüan kikei.
Hobaje haoei lembüchem chemsoa thaonyu kekei, hoba haoei maeae thaonyu kho kekei hoba haoei nyen kho Jakhin nyenkukei, haoei tokei nanae thaonyu kho kekei hoba haoei nyen kho Boaz nyenkukei.
Hobaje thaonyu thüka leilang chipen tegü hemaiko küman kikei, kho tegü thaonyu kümsilei wankei.
Hobaje haoei jithon ka jithon sühko kaijembo sidang iknop an kümbei, hoba suokla iknop ngao kikei, hoba kho kaijembo iknop khujin lin chenei kümbei.
Kho phanga iknop khujin onko sidang kaijembo jephot kikei; kho namei kümbü jephot lin nyi la yeiko jephot shuong kikei.

Kho masu pongsu anthüknyi thüka lokei, hoba masu pongsu shuong yungkük ae sem, chanep ae sem, yungthang ae sem, hoba chaang ae sem yeian kümbei hoba khübü thüka sidang kho kümbei, hoba haoeneibü meichung ae pendou maangaenei kikei.
Hobaje kho ikmaang tetche shangbü kikei; hoba sidang ko kho leilang chipen noksa pinan yaübü thung phatko kümbei. Sidang khonei dei liter hajar nyi atkei.
Kheijinei haoei chinamei khamthung an kümbei; khamthung che süng iknop lei hoba khaang iknop lei kikei, hoba suokla iknop sem kikei.
Hobaje khamthung kümsilei kho hai kikei, khamthung thon kho laang kanglanga maisho nitlepan küman kikei.
Hobaje khamthung thona molosaonyu, masu pongsu hoba khuthük hangangbü noksa küman kikei, hoba laang thona khamthung che kikei, hoba molosaonyu si masu pongsu noksa khonei lubü jinyoan küman kikei.
Hobaje khamthung weko chinamei kailong you leibang, hoba chinam kailong tongyoshang kikei, hoba chemnyek lei aenei deiphau che bang phoshang you kikei. Khübü you kho chipen- yakei yaülepan kikei.

Hobaje thaonyu sembung aenei hoba thükaenei iknop che kikei, hoba khoeibü thon aenei thaonyu denshang tegü tongtongbü iknop che tho, tokei khoeibü sembung aenei inei shipetan kümbü noksa kikei; hoba khübü kaijembü kho chemnyek lei longan kikei, tongtongbü aying.
Hobaje kaibou phanga kailong you lei kikei; kailong you tongeishang khonei denshang kikei, hoba kailong you suokbü kho iknop che tho.
Hobaje kailong you kho kolieibü kailong you tegütham kikei, khübü kailong you lükshang khübü napheinei khübü namlüh, hoba khübü phenyoshang pendou tühnyinbü nam kikei.
Denshang weko chemnyek lei aenei khamthung lei kikei, khamthung kho denshang to jetei kikei.
Hobaje denshang thükae thoche tongtongtham kailepan kikei, hoba denshang thükaenei khübü phenyobü hoba kaibou khoto chela yeian kikei.
Hobaje kho phenyobü hoba kaibou napheinei haoei kaakyembü kherabim, molosaonyu si pünglong, kaoaenei sakkubü sühko chipenyak yaüan jinkuko haoei yeitikei.
Kho tegü haoei denshang an kümbei, pendou kho che tegü jeteitei jonkei, kho takbü jeteitei hoba chühlakei jetei.
Hobaje haoei chisaknam deiphau an kümbei, deiphau weko liter saongao set atbü deiphau weko iknop lei bang hoba denshang an weko deiphau che che kikei.
Hobaje denshang shuong kho chemeibü yungkük aenei ngao, hoba chemeibü yungthang aenei ngao dogo phokei; hoba sidang kho haoei yungthang napheinei chemnyeka phokukei.
Huramei chaksiam, suokjin hoba phauyaang kümbei. Haoei
Thaonyu penyi
Thaonyu sembung thüka phauyaang penyi
Thaonyu sembung küpjin yuklepla noksa jinko wouyobü
Chakden an
Deiphau an
Sidang
Sidang thungetbü masu pongsu anthüknyi
Chaksiam, suokjin hoba phauyaang
Habü peisilei khümbo
Jordan shumanga Chobaei khübü kho Sukot si Zarethan kanglanga shungkung kaoa jonan kümbei.
Hobaje Solomonei peisilei pendou seret ohauko apyokei, aieilausi khübü kho yongko juongsapbei; chisaknam takbü kho alamen.
Hibü Solomonei
Hon lanbüei kümbü wanthung denshang shuong lembüchem maangkaboua maeaenei ngao, hoba nanaenei ngao, chipen shuong, wanthung shuong hoba wankip hon lanbüei kümbei.

Thung shuong, wanui jinbü shuong, phauyaang shuong, jenjuok phau shuong, hoba jephot hon lanbüei, hoba Saopoboutham Shemjang to atbü maangkabou koukap shuong shanga hanleplabü hon hoba Lembüchem koukap shuong honei kümbei.
Kho tegü
Kheijinei
Hobaje Israelbü pendou Ethanium lit, kho nyetboubü lita Solomon Chobaeibü chema lem to yoshaitikei.
Hobaje ungshedbou shuongei ngühkhüm busen kho jungkei, hoba Israelbü leiyeibü jaishou pendou loukei.
Hobaje haoenei
Masu pongsu si sanlon wesi aweenko lemla kuko, Solomon Choba hoba Israelbü pendou kho theyolanyobü Saopobü Busen nyangko kamsheikei.
Hobaje ungshedbou shuongei
Aieilausi kaakyembü kherabim kaakphanga Saopobü Busen hoba khünei kibü bu pendou ngühlepan kikei.
Hobaje bu kho loubünyu yingsije Saopobü Shemjang ka saoposhang kho hapbo kikei, lausikei napheikaje bu kho ühüp, hoba tat sühko khübü kho khünei kia.
Israelbü Ijep kaodak ka longjinei
Hobaje ungshedbou shuong sangmei kibüei khangenla shanga lola athükko ungshedbou shuong saopobü kaoen ka loujinei
aieilausi
Kheijinei Solomonei laukei:
“No
lankei, no sangmei shangtüngbü
khünei kilabü dogo laukei!
Ngei ka la no ponpen kitila shanga
shanenbü chem che dangkua.”
Hobaje Chobaei haoeibü thenyek sepeian kaman kibü Israelbü pendou haükukei, hoba Israelbü kaman kibü pendou lokei.
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Israel Mühghaü
‘Ngeibü mütli Israelbü Ijep kaodak ka leiyenbü chalou ka ngei kü nyen kila shanga sangnyu che ongkei apien, lausikei ka mütli Israel thüka songdakla shanga ngei Dawid pienkei.’
“Tou kübou Dawideibü maangpona Israel Mühghaü
Lausikei
lausikei nyi chem kho adanglabü; khei yingasikei ka shou ka la bukkubüei kü nyen shanga haoei chem kho danglabü.’
“Hobaje
Hobaje ngei khonei Saopobü Busen shanga shemjang che kümbei, hoba seneibü bousi shuong yoa haoen Ijep kaodak ka leian loujinei the- yolanyobü kho khonei phoakei.”
Hobaje Israelbü tan kamshaian kibü thedanga Solomon
“O
Nyi no khangenbou kübou Dawid to thekubü phojung loukei, tat chalou tegü nyi kaibü sembungei joyokei, hoba kaibü ikei haüthüktikei.
Hibü tou, O
Hibü tou, O Israel Mühghaü, nyi no khangenbou kübou Dawid thedanga lenyobü haüthükla shanga kaibü ngüh shangashatbü kishi dogo ngei welauda.
“Lausikei maimaitham Mühghaü kaodaka kilepsai? Chühashi, müh hoba mühnyu thüka kibü peisilei shuongei no apham, khotoje yongko hanbou ngei ho chem dangkei!
Khei yingasikei no khangenboueibü welau hoba haoei subüjabüa nyi souhat lenkei. O
Kaibü nyek ho chem aeto change nangnak, khei nyi, ‘Kü nyen khünei kilabü’, dogo laubü aeto no khangenbouei welaubü chühletko kishi.
Hobaje ladang ho chem aeto yeian no khangenbou hoba ka mütli Israelbüei welaulaje, nyi ditkushi; haü, no kishang khuthük ka nyi ditbü, hoba ladang nyi ditlaje kheijinei amai apbushi.
“Müt cheei jembü lepbou khulimbo shed shona longa hoba theyolanyotila khüksiuok ngüh apyokua longa hoba haoei louan kaibü saopobü lemshona theyolanyoa longa,
kheijinei nyi khuthük ka ditashi hoba kümashi. Hobaje no khangenbü shuong amaibü jembü kümsilei kho jembü khua künngailabü lele saopobü shuong matmaitiko jembü saopobü thüng kula mat jemashi.
“Haoenei ka khu limbo shed shonbü haangjung, ladang ka mütli Israelbü dangbou thedanga athük haplaje, hoba haoen ka jungto louan ka nyena thekulaje, ho chema ka nyena welaua longa;
kheijinei nyi khuthük ka ditbü, hoba ka mütli Israel la shedbü apbushi; hoba haoeneibü pisibousi la nyi thekubü kaodak to haoen nyibou leingaishi.

“Ladang haoenei ka khu limbo shed shonbü haangjung khuthük kou kapngailangan lang aloulaje, haoenei thi aeto sepeian welaua longa hoba nyi haoen khonkutijinei haoen shabü ka sepeian ka nyena thekua longa,

kheijinei khuthük ka nyi ditkushi hoba no khangenbü shuong hoba ka mütli Israel la shedbü apbushi; aieilausi haoen paila lamnyu maibü haoen la lenda, hoba nyi phetphanlabü lele kubü kao khüto haoen jungto lang yantikushi.
“Kaonyeka mühsinou kialonga, khonsak khonku kia longa, khambüei nin hansho aada longa, koksüng si meisiau püha longa, ai limsilang hoba shatsinyat kilaje,
ai welauei aoyouei ong ladang phelaje, ayingsi ka mütli Israelbü pendouei lulueibü maangpon khonkubü ngean jembü ik tuokan ho chem aeto yeian welaulaje,
kheijinei no kishang khuthük ka nyi ditbü, hoba shedbü apbushi, hoba nyi mütpem weko la yingtishi.
Hibü küneibü pisibou la kubü kaodaka haoen kijinei, haoenei jih pendoua ka to hatlabü.
“Tokei ka mütli Israelbü ayingko, küksithang ao ka nyena kaonyek saabü ka loulaje,
aishanga haoenei ka ka nyen yaangbü hoba kaibü hau kibü ik shingan haiteibü ditla haoei ho chem aeto welauko loujinei no kishang khuthük ka nyi ditkushi.
Hobaje kaodak phang pendouei no ngela shanga ka mütli Israelei ka to hatbü tegü hatlabü lele hoba ho chem laobou ngei dangkei, ho ka nyena ngada dogo ngela shanga kükeithangei ngabü tegü kümshi.

“Ladang kaibü mütliei jembü dangbou khulimbo wapyola haula laobou lamnyu to haoen hautila nyi pienbü chem ae yeian haoenei ka to welaulaje, hoba ka nyen shanga ngei laobou chem dangkei, khito yeian haoenei welaulaje,
kheijinei haoenei welaubü hoba subüjabü nyi khuthük ka ditkushi, hoba haoeneibü janbü kho phokushi.

“Haoenei ka khu limbo shed shona longa, aieilausi shed ashonbü müt ao aki, hoba no haoen to maangpoka longa, hoba dangboueibü kaodak saabü ayingsi nyangbü to lang senlabü lele haoen jembü dangbou ik to khümbo kuan kia longa,

lausi haoen dangbou kaodaka kijinei haoen lolo damanchühko ka ae sepeia longa, hoba haoen thüngshang kaoa kian ka to, ‘Künei shed shonkei hoba mashikan kümbei, künei amaiko jungeikei’, dogo suajaa longa,

hoba haoeneibü dangbou kaodaka hoba haoen langsenbüa kian haoenei jembü sensimaang pendouei hoba haoeneibü soushou pendouei ka jungto sepeia longa, hoba ka to haoenei jembü kaodak aeto, laobou nyi haoeneibü pisibousi shuong la kukei, hoba laobou nyi pienkei, hoba laobou ngei ka nyena dangkei khüto chühko welaua longa,
kheijinei haoenei welaubü hoba subüjabü nyi khuthük ka ditkushi hoba haoeneibü janbü kho kümbushi.
Hobaje kaibü mütli aoyouei shed shonkei haoen la shedbü apbushi, hoba ka khu limbo haoenei ai shed shonkei kho apbushi hoba haoen aoyouei langsenkei haoen thedanga onou haptishi.
Aieilausi haoen ka mütli hoba kaibü phetphanbü shuong, haoen nyi Ijep kaodak khonkukhonsak ka leijung loukei.
“Kaibü sambüei subujabü ka hoba kaibü mütli Israelei subüjabü ka haoenei ladang ka to ngeklaje, hoba sulajalaje kaibü nyek longshi, hoba haoen to ditkushi.
Aishanga kaibü phet phanla shanga nyi haoen kaodak phangshuong ka bangtikei, hoba no khangenbou Mosaeibü ik danko nyi joyokei, hoba O
Hobaje ladang Solomonei
Hobaje ngüh kaang longko Israelbü tan pendou haoei loan haükukei.
Hobaje laukei, “
Mühghaü seneibü pisibousi shuong yoa kibü tegü sen yoa kishi, haoei sen tüpyo ayingsi sen teinlet.
Seneibü sensimaang hao aeto sepeila hoba haoeibü lamnyua paila, haoei seneibü pisibousi shuong la sakkubü phola hoba jaletkubü ngühkhüm shuong jungeila shanga haoei thuishi.
Hobaje khübü ngeibü ngüh, laobou ngei
kho Mühghaü hoba hao phatbü aokei aki, dogo kaodak phang pendouei ngeashi.
Lausikei tat tegütham, haoei sakkubü hoba jaletkubü ngühkhüma pailabü lele, seneibü
Kheijinei Choba si Israelbü lajuche hao yoa kikei, pendouei
Hobaje Solomonei sangmai lembü
Khünyet chaloua ong Chobaei
Hibü Solomonei kho chalou khünei lem likei, hoba hao yoa tan yaang Israelbü pendou Hamath ka Ijep shumang sühko hoba Mühghaü
Hobaje setbounyet haoei shuong kho lintikei, hoba
Hobaje ladang Solomoneibü chem hoba Chobaeibü chem hoba haoei kümmang sühko kibü pendou kümkhümbei,
Solomon jungto, Gibeona longbü tegü nyibou longkei.
Hobaje
Hobaje kabou Dawid paibü tegü nyi kü thedanga saopobüa ngühmai maangponei paia longa hoba ngei ka la sakkubü tegü küma longa hoba ngeibü ngühkhüm shuong hoba matjem jungeia longa,
ngei kabou Dawid to lenko thekubü tegü kaibü sangle Israel thüka ngei no ponpen songdaktilabü.
Lausikei kan hoba kaneibü shisishousi kü ka banga longa hoba ngei sakkubü hoba ngeibü ngühkhüm apholonga,
ngei haoen la kubü kao ka Israel wapan aplabü, hoba ho chem laobou kü nyen shanga ngei saüenkei, ngei aplabü, hoba Israel lubü phang thedanga tetlatalabü phang che kilabü.
Hobaje ho chem hangletnyu aatan danbü phaibü pendouei hapan khülüh, dogo joyoko laulabü, ‘Aila
Hobaje haoenei jongailabü, ‘Aieilausi haoenei jembü pisibousi shuong Ijep kaodak ka leian loubou Mühghaü maan apan lubü mühghaü to mailembo lembei hoba khangenkei, hibü
Hobaje po saoche boubü thonlamto Solomonei chem penyi dangkei,
Tou Tairbü Choba Hiramei Solomon la cedar bu, busim hoba haoei khambü tegü hon kukei; hibü Solomonei Hiram la Galil kaoa sangnyu saoche kukei.
Hobaje Hiram, Tair ka Solomonei hao la kubü sangnyu shuong kho chühla loukei, hoba khübü khoei hao maang ühaiti.
Hobaje haoei laukei, “O ngeibü jaisina, nyi kü la kubü sangnyu shuong ai?” Hobaje haoei tat sühko khübü khoto Kabul kaodak dogo lauda.
Hobaje Hiramei Choba la hon seret khujin bang atbü saosem jungan hautikei.
Hobaje Solomon Chobaei nam hebü kho
(Hobaje Ijepbü Choba Farao angan Gezer lekei, hoba kho jikan apbuan kho sangnyua kibü Kananbü haitikei, hoba sangnyu kho haoeibü nouyangshou, Solomoneibü yak la jongsak la kukei.
Hobaje Solomonei Gezer kümetkei). Hobaje haoei Beth-Horon dangngaikei,
Baalath si Tamar khübükei dangngaikei,

hoba kaonyua Solomoneibü peisilei thanshang sangnyu pendou, hoba haoeibü koli shuong shanga sangnyu, koli leibü mütshuong shanga sangnyu hoba Solomonei haoeibü olin-lemse shanga laobou Jerusalema dangmang sühkei khübü kho dangkei, hoba Lebanon hoba jembü sangle pendou kümbei.
Amorbü, Hitbü, Perizbü, Hivbü, hoba Jebusbü mütshuong aoyou Israelbü aying,
haoeneibü shousi shuong aoyoueibü kaonyek haoen phainei aoyou Israel shousi shuongei lepde mautila athük, haoen ka tat sühko Solomonei aaothua kibü khangbü lekei.

Lausikei Israelbü yoaje Solomonei aokei aaothua aphoku; haoen wapyobü shuong, haoeibü sangle khangenbü shuong, haoeibü yaangenbü shu- ong, haoeibü lajamleibou shuong, hoba haoeibü koli sepai hoba kailong leibü shuong kikei.
Solomoneibü kümsileia kongnyu leiyeibü shuong müt saongao ngaoto anjinsem kikei, kümaleia kibü shuong thüka haoen leiyeila hau kikei.
Lausikei Faraoeibü nouyangshou Dawid sangnyu ka longan sao la Solomonei dangkubü chem khüto loukei, kheijinei haoei Millo dangkei.
Hobaje po chenei semnei sühko Solomonei juokbü lembü, sangmai lembü,
Solomon Chobaei Edom kao, Saklangbü yungnyua, laobou Eloth nyangko ki, khünei Ezion-gebera longchem dangkei.
Hobaje Hiramei haoeibü longleibü shuong, aoyouei yungnyu ngean kikei, haoen Solomoneibü sambü shuong yoa hautikei.
Hobaje haoen Ofir to long- chema haukei, hoba hon seret khujin bang atbü saongao leito saoche khüka Solomon jungto sungbakei.
Tou Sheba Chobasao, ladang saoei

Hobaje saoei shuong yaangbü che yoa ut yoa ponlemhibü peisilei yoa hon juong hoba namsek laang juong künan Jerusalem to loukei, hoba sao ladang Solomon jungto loukei, saoei jembü maangpona kibü pendou Solomon to lenyokei.
Hobaje Solomonei Choba sao to saoei phebü pendou jongaikei, hoba haoei aikei huan aphoko pendou sao to lenkei.
Hobaje ladang Sheba Chobasaoei Solomon songsihon kibü pendou hoba haoei kümbü chem,
hoba haoeibü yaangenbü shuongei shaubüyungbü denshang hoba khangenbü shuong küpjembo phobü hoba haoeibü soneikangbü neisimei, hoba haoeibü thung jungbü shuong haoei juokbü lembü kujinei lai
Hobaje saoei Choba to laukei, “Ngeibü mütli ka kaibü kümsilei shuong hoba kaibü songsihon shangabü ngühlang ditbü kho tükde ong ki.
Khei yingsikei ngo alou shongko hoba ngeibü nyekei ühüp shongko ngei maialembo kikei, hoba chühashi, jamde ongkei kü la alenou; kaibü songsihon hoba haabü yaangbü ngei ditbü tokei khaibou.
Kaibü mütli hoba kaibü khangenbü aoyou ka junga athakko loda hoba kaibü songsihon ditda, haoenei haüa.
Kaibü Mühghaü, aoei ka to olinda, hoba no Israel thüka Choba yeitikei, hao haübou, aieilausi
Hobaje saoei Choba la hon seret khujin bang atbü saongaoto saoche, ponlemhibü juong hoba namsek laang juong kukei. Sheba Chobasaoei Solomon Choba la ponlemhibü juong kubü tegü lubü ka haoei ühüp.
Hobaje Ofir ka hon hoba almug bu hoba tokei namsek laang juong Hirameibü longchema künbakei.
Hobaje Chobaei almug buei

Hobaje Solomon Chobaei jembü Choba chemkanbü peisilei juong maangmai kubü to limbo Sheba Chobasao la saoei mangsühbü hoba saoei ai ong hikei pendou kukei, hoba jembü kaodak to sao hoba saoeibü sambü shuong pendou meimeijung ngaikei.
Hobaje po chenei Solomon jungto loubü hon jekbü shuongei sungbabü hoba namyak namseibü shuongei sungbabü, hoba ngühyem lulu ka Choba shuongei kubü,
hoba governor shuongei kubü to limbo seret khujin bang atbü hon saongao lakto saosemto lak kikei.
Solomon Chobaei honei yaübü aih yaangbü saoan kümbei, aih wekoa hon shekel saongao lak bang atkei.
Hobaje haoei honei aih saongao sem kümbei, hoba aih chenei haoei hon pound lak sühko lean kümbei hoba Chobaei Lebanon yamchema khübü kho phokei.
Aeilaleko tokei Chobaei thunyu hauh jinan thükto hondei lakan Choba setshang yaangbü che kümbei.
Hobaje Choba setshang to angla kho younak lak kikei, hoba Choba setshang thüka tongtongbü kikei, hoba setshang jijihama ik denshang kikei, hoba ik denshanga molosaonyu penyi kikei.
Hobaje khünei molosaonyu anthüknyi, hoba kho younak lak jijiham thona lokei. Kho phatbü lubü Choba sangle aineikei akitei.

Hobaje Solomon Chobaeibü thung pendou honei küman kikei, hoba Lebanon chema jungeibü thung pendou hon lanbüei küman kikei, hoba chandinameije aikei küman akitei; aieilausi Solomon Choba haanga kho aikei aweei.
Aieilausi Hirameibü longchem leiyeibü shuongei po sema che hon, chandinam, thunyu hauh, kumei hoba meisu shuong, dogo künbako kikei.
Hibü Solomon Choba kaodaka Choba pendou tokei nyaksinam hoba songahona pendou to shanenbou kikei.
Hobaje kaodakbü pendouei Solomon la Mühghaüei haoeibü maangpona ai songsihon kukei kho ditla lambei,
hoba haoen mütpem wekoei hao jungto po weko chandinam thung, hon thung, neisimei, lakbühongbü hele, ponlemhibü peisilei, koli shuong, hoba gadu shuong sungbakei.
Hobaje Solomonei koli sepai shuong hoba koli kailong hajar cheto saongao lei hoba koli sepai shuong hajar anthüknyi haoei phokei, hoba khübü koli kailong shuong haoei Jerusalema Choba yoa phokei.
Hobaje Chobaei Jerusalema laangminshou hima chandinam phokei, hoba bhuklong hima cedar bulong juong haoei kekei.
Hobaje Solomonei phobü koli shuong kho Musri si Kilikia ka sungbabü koli shuong kikei, hoba Chobaeibü namyak namseibü shuongei khübü kho tan tan weko namtet kuan jekngaikei.
Hobaje koli kailong che Ijep ka chandinam saongao lakei sungbakei, hoba koli che saongaoto anjinsemei hoba kho tegü Hitbü Choba pendou hoba Siriabü Choba pendouei lulu shanga sungbakei.
Tou Solomon Chobaei küksithang sao juong, Fa- raoeibü nouyangshou to liman, Moab, Ammon, Edom, Sidon hoba Hit, khübü sao sanoukei,
lausikei khübü mütli sao shangabü
Hobaje haoeibü yaksi saongao nyet kikei, hoba thangnyu saongao sem kikei; hoba haoeibü yaksi shuongei haoeibü maangpon ayingbü to sattikei.
Aieilausi ladang Solomon jai lekei, haoeibü yaksi shuongei haoeibü maang- pon haoeneibü mühghaü jungto leikei hoba haoeibü maangpon haobou Dawid tegü akitei.
Aieilausi Solomon Sidonbü mühghaü, Ashtorethbü hoba Ammonbü mangsenlabü Molek aeto sepeikei.
Hobaje Solomonei
Kho phaia, Solomonei Moabbü mangsenlabü Khemosh shanga hoba Ammonbü shousi shuong mangsenlabü Molek shanga Jerusalem nyangko kibü shongha chem loubünyu dangkei.
Hobaje kho tegü haoeibü küksithang sao yaksi pendou, aoyouei jen juokko hoba haoeneibü mühghaü shuong lembei, haoen shanga haoei kümbei.
Hobaje
Hobaje kho shanga hao la ngühkhüm kuko lubü mühghaü jungto ohaujan dogo laukei, lausikei
Hibü
Lausikei kabou Dawid nyenmai shanga kaibü jihsiphaia ngei akümlabü, lausikei kaibü shou jihsiphaia ngei kho leilutikulabü.
Khei yingasikei ngei sangle pendou kho aleilutikulabü, ngo khangenbou Dawid shanga hoba Jerusalem laobou ngei pienkei kho shanga ka shou la ngei sangle che kulabü.
Kheijinei
Aieilausi ladang Dawid Edoma kikei, lakjaibou lajamleibou Joab, wapyoa haibü shuong khünla angan kikei, hoba Edoma bousu pendou haitikei.
(Aieilausi Edoma bousu pendou ühaitikhüm shongko Joab si Israelbü pendou khünei kikei.)
Hobaje Hadad yoa haoboueibü sambü shuong Edombü at Ijep to satetlangkei; Hadad je nashou hanbü che ong kiteikei.
Hobaje haoen Midian ka meimeian Paran to Ijepbü Choba Farao jungto lousi hao la chem che kukei, hoba shausiyung kubou la lela hao pienkei hoba hao la kao kukei.
Hobaje Farao Choba ka Hadadei onou yaang hapsi jembü yak Tahpeneseibü na hao la yakla lela kukei.
Hobaje Tahpeneseibü naei hao la bousu shou che Genubath bukkukei, ao Tahpeneesei Farao Choba jungto hautikei, hoba Faraoeibü chema haoeibü shousi yoa Genubath kho chingenkei.
Hobaje ladang Ijepa Hadadei Dawid haoeibü bousi shuong yoa yepa dogo ditkei, hoba lakjaibou Joab haia dogo ditkei, Hadadei Farao to, “Ngo ngeibü kaodak to ngaitikai” dogo laukei.
Kheijinei Faraoei hao to laukei, “Nyi kü to aiei maang ühaida, hoba chühashi, aila no kaibü kaodak to haumang sühda?” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ai aying, khei yingsikei ngo khei ong hautikai!”
Hobaje Eliadeibü shou Re- zon, ao hao sambou Zoba Choba Hadadezer ka satjung haukei, Mühghaüei hao khulimbo dangbou longtikei.
Hobaje haoei sepai tan che thüka leiyeibou yeian jembü mütli hao jungto leishaikei, hoba ladang Dawidei hao Zobaa haitikei, haoen Damaska to loukei hoba khünei kian Damaskaa songdakkei.
Hobaje Solomonei songdakbü sünga Hadadei amaibü kümbü shanga hao Israeleibü dangbou yeikei, hoba Israel to mangsenkei hoba Siriabü thüka songdakkei.
Hobaje Nebateibü shou Je- roboam, Zereda kabü Efraim ka, hoba Solomon khangenbou che, aoeibü nyu latnyu che nyenei Zerua kikei; haoeikei jembü ik Choba khulimbo tuokkei.
Hobaje haoei jembü ik Choba khulimbo tuokbü kho ho kikei, Solomonei Millo kümbei hoba haobou Dawid sangnyu leilubü kümetkei.
Hobaje Jeroboam kho kaangbüsekbü müt che kikei hoba Solomonei heshoubou kho aeibou sobüsepbü müt che dogo chühenkei, hoba Josef mütli ka kümsilei pendou hao la khümbo kukei.
Hobaje kho chaloua ladang Jeroboam Jerusalem ka haukei, Shilobü Ahija thuseibouei hao lama hapbei. Tou Ahija neisimei haanbü lean kikei; hoba haosi mütpem khongthua kikei.
Hobaje Ahijaei nei haanbü laobou haoei neian kikei kho hangletkei hoba anthüknyi la yeiko jitnyinkei.
Hobaje haoei Jeroboam to laukei, “Nyi phejan an leashi, aieilausi Israel Mühghaü
Lausikei ngo khangenbou Dawid nyen shangabü hoba Jerusalem nyen shangabü Israel mütli pendou ka pienbü sangnyu kho mütli che ngei lelabü.

Aieilausi haoenei ngo maan apbei, hoba Sidonbü mühghaü, Ashtoreth hoba Moabbü mühghaü Khemosh hoba Ammonbü shousi shuong mühghaü Molek haoenei lembei, hoba ngeibü ngühmai shuong ajungeiko hoba haobou Dawid hima akiko haoenei ngeibü lamnyua apai.
Khei yingasikei sangle pendouje ngei hao ka asungngailabü; lausikei ngo khangenbou Dawid, aoei ngei sakkubü hoba ngeibü ngühmai jungeikei, hao shangabü, ngei haoeibü salang sünga Choba yeitilabü.
Lausikei hao shou ka sangle sungngailabü, hoba ngei ka la chung an khokei kulabü.
Hobaje ngo khangenbou Dawidei Jerusalem kü thedanga hantin che phola shanga, laobou ngei kü nyen shanga khünei phola pienkei, hao shou la ngei chung che kulabü.
Hobaje ngei no lelabü, hoba kaibü soushou pendouei mangsühbü tegü nyi songdaklabü hoba nyi Israel thüka songdaklabü.
