Hobaje ngei sakkubü pendoua nyi ngüha lea longa, hoba kü thea ai janbü ki kho kümbo hoba ngeibü lamnyua paia longa hoba ngo khangenbou Dawid hima ngeibü ngühkhüm hoba ngei sakkubü shuong phoa longa, khei ngo ka yoa kilabü, hoba ngei Dawid shanga kümbubü tegü ngei chem tükde dangkulabü hoba ngei ka la Israel kulabü.
Hobaje kho shanga ngei Dawid lilabü thensilen khonkutilabü, lausikei ponpen shanga aying.’ ”
Hibü Solomonei Jeroboam haitila lambei, lausikei Jeroboam meimeijung Ijep Choba Shishak jungto Ijep to satetlangkei; hoba Solomon ühaishongko Ijepa kikei.
Tou Solomoneibü kümsilei joubü hoba haoei kümbü pendou hoba haoeibü songsihon khübü kümsilei pendou kho Solomoneibü lea doan aki lo?
Hobaje Solomonei Israelbü pendou thüka Jerusalema songdakbü kho po saonyi kikei.
Hobaje Solomon bousi shuong yoa haksokei hoba haobou Dawid sangnyua khünkei hoba hao shou Rehoboamei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Kheijinei Rehoboam Shekhem to haukei, aieilausi Israelbü pendou Shekhem to hao Choba yeitila louan kikei.
Hobaje ladang Nebateibü shou Jeroboamei kho ditkei (aishanga khün sühko hao Solomon Choba ka satetlangan Ijepa ong kiteikei), kheijinei haoenei hao ngala hautikei.
Hobaje Jeroboam yoa Israelbü tan pendou loukei hoba Rehoboam to hai laukei,
“Kabouei kün on atshaitikei, hibü tou kabouei ai amaibü kümbei kho kümetashi hoba haoei on atshaibü ai kün la künkukei kho songoktham yeitishi hoba künei no khangenlabü.”
Hobaje haoei haoen to laukei, “Ngaiashi, hoba chalou sem phaia nyibou kü jungto kangai.” Hibü mütshuong sepeinyu ngaikei.
Hobaje Rehoboamei jaishou shuong, aoyou haobou Solomon langkeijinei khangenbü shuong kikei, haoen to hai phekei, “Ngei habü mütshuong to jongaila kanei kü la ai songsido kula?”

Hobaje haoenei hao to laukei, “No tat habü mütshuong khangenbou che yeimang süha longa nyi haoen khangenashi hoba haoen to ngüh maibüei jongaiko joyoashi, khei yingalonga haoen kho ponpen shanga no khangenbou yeilabü.”
Lausikei jaishou shuongei hao to ai lenkei kho asunglet, hoba heshou shuong aoyou hao yoa liko chingenkei hoba aoyou hao yoa lokei, haoen ka haoei songsido lekei.
Hobaje haoei haoen to laukei, “Aoyouei kü to, ‘Kabouei künkubü on sotishi,’ dogo laukei haoen to jongaila shanga kaneikei ai songsido kula?”

Hobaje heshou shuong aoyou hao yoa liko chingenkei haoenei hao to laukei, “Ka to aoyouei, ‘Kabouei kün on atshaitikei, lausikei nyi songoktishi,’ dogo lauko joyokei, nyi haoen to hai lenshi, ‘Ngeibü ikjishou hanbou ho küboueibü shenjang tokei shangtüngbou!’ dogo lenshi.
Hobaje kübouei kan on atshaitikei yingalonga khüto ngei aei jinyokulabü; hoba kübouei kan to semjinei ngüman kialonga ngei kan sinkipei shieikoelabü.”
Hibü semnyet phaia Jeroboam hoba mütshuong pendou Rehoboam jungto ngaikei, aieilausi Chobaei laukei, “Chalou semnyeta kü jungto kangai.”
Hobaje haoei jaishou shuongei hao to lenbü inletkeibuba mütshuong to aeibou shoulotham jongaikei,

hoba heshou shu- ongei songsido kubü tegü haoei jongaiko laukei, “Kübouei kan buleng atshaitikei, khüto ngei tokei jinyokulabü; hoba kübouei kan to semjinei ngümbei, lausikei ngeije kan sinkipei shieikoelabü.”
Hibü kho tegü Chobaei mütshuong to ngüha ale, aieilausi kho
Hobaje ladang Israelbüei haoen to Chobaei ngüha aleda dogo ngean apbei, haoenei Choba to laukei,
“Dawid yoa kün phejan aki,
Jesse shousi to kün ainei hambei?
O Israel, kan lulu neichem to linashi!
O Dawid, kan jembü chem lamjung ngaiashi!”
Hibü Israelbü shuong lulueibü neichem lamjung ngaikei.
Lausikei Jihuda sangnyu shuonga kibü Israel shousi shuong shangaje haoen thüka Rehoboamei songdakkei.

Kheijinei Rehoboam Chobaei Adoram, ao kümaleia leiyeibou kikei, hao hautisi Israelbü pendouei hao to laangei tetkei, hoba hao haikei. Hobaje Rehoboam Choba haoeibü koli kailonga tongde pükan Jerusalem to satkei.
Hibü Israelei tat sühko Dawid chung khulimbo loda.
Hobaje ladang Israelbüei Jeroboam longeia dogo ditkei, haoenei hao mütshuong jungto ngakei, hoba Israelbü pendou thüka hao Choba yeitikei. Jihuda chung ong Dawid thensilen yoa ngühmaang lanko yokei.

Ladang Rehoboam Jerusalem to lousühkei haoei Jihuda chung hoba Benjamin chung pendou pienbü shuong wapyobü shuong hajar saongaoto lei Israel chung khulimbo wapyola hoba Solomoneibü shou Rehoboam jungto nyiboukei sangle sungbala huishaikei.
Lausikei Mühghaü müt Shemaia jungto Mühghaü ngüh louan laukei,
“Jihuda Choba Solomoneibü shou Rehoboam to hoba Jihuda si Benjamin chung pendou to hoba joubü mütshuong to hai lenashi,
‘Khei
Kho phaia Efraim shongh kaodaka Jeroboamei Shekhem lapheishon kümbei, hoba khünei longche kikei, hoba haoei khüka meimeijung hauan Penuel kümbei.
Hobaje Jeroboamei haoeibü maanga laukei, “Dawid jungto sangle kho nyibou ngailep yingkao?
Jerusalema

Kheijinei Chobaei huon lambei, hoba honeibü masu paangshou penyi kümbei hoba haoei haoen to laukei, “Kan shanga Jerusalem to anglabü kho aeibou sekkei, kan Ijep kaodak ka leian loubü mühghaü shuong to chühashi, O Israel.”
Hobaje haoei che Bethela phokukei hoba lubü kho Dana phokukei.
Hobaje kho kümsilei shabü che la yeian apbei, aieilausi mütshuongei che kho lemlakei Dan sühko haukei.
Hobaje haoei shongh shongha lemshang kümbei, hoba mütshuong yo ka haoei ungshedbou shuong pienkei, lausikei haoen Levi shousi shuong aying.

Hobaje Jeroboamei lit set boubü chalou anthükngao bounyet lemsilang che, Jihudaa kümbü phatko Bethela khangkei, hoba lemshon to angan haoei kümbü masu paangshou shuong la lemla kukei; hoba haoei Bethela ungshedbou shuong phokei.

Hobaje lit set boubü chalou anthükngao boubüa haoei Bethela lemshang laobou kümbei khüto angkei, kho haoei jembü maangpona dambo kibü lit kikei, hoba haoei Israel shousi shuong shanga lem che likei, hoba jen jikla hao lemshang to angkei.
Tou chühashi, Jeroboam lemshon nyangko loan jen juoklabü jihsiphaia
Hobaje
Hobaje haoei khünyet chaloutham tetsida che kuko laukei, “

Hobaje ladang Bethela lemshon khulimbo Mühghaü mütei joyobü Chobaei ditkei, Jeroboamei ik shingan lemshon ka laukei, “Hao lapashi!” Hobaje haoeibü ik laobou haoei hao khulimbo shingkei kho pheian apbei, hoba haoeibü ik kho nyibou haoei sungngaila athükko apbei.
Hobaje
Hobaje Chobaei Mühghaü müt to laukei, “Ngeibü ik maila shanga kaibü Mühghaü to nyi kü shanga sukujakushi.” Hobaje Mühghaü mütei
Kheijinei Chobaei Mühghaü müt to laukei, “Kü yoa chem to louan denche shauashi, hoba ngei ka la jongsak che kulabü.”
Lausikei Mühghaü mütei Choba to jongaiko laukei, “Nyi kaibü nyaksinam jamde kuasikei ngo ka yoa ohaulabü, ayingsi ngei hanei ashau ayungkulabü;
aieilausi
Hibü hao Bethel to loujinei paibü haang ka ayingko lubü lamnyu aeka ngaikei.
Tou Bethela thuseibü jaishou che kikei, hoba haoeibü shousi louan Bethela kho chaloua Mühghaü mütei ai kümbei pendou lenkei; haoei Choba la ai ong lenkei, haoenei boulakei khübü pendou lenkei.
Hobaje haoeneibü bouei haoen to laukei, “Hao laeto haukei?” Tou haoeibü shousi shuongei Jihuda ka loubü Mühghaü müt laeto haukei kho hapan kikei.
Hobaje haoei haoeibü shousi shuong to laukei, “Kü la gadu lamlekubü.” Hobaje haoenei hao la gadu lamlekukei; hoba hao khünei setkei.
Hobaje hao Mühghaü müt phaito haukei, hoba haoei hao yembulong che phanga setan hapbei; hoba haoei hao to “No Jihuda ka loubü Mühghaü müt kho yinglao?” dogo phekei.
Haoei “Ngo yingkei” dogo jongaikei.
Kheijinei haoei hao to laukei, “Chem to louan kü yoa shauayungashi.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ngo ka yoa alongeilabü, ayingsi ohaulabü, ayingsi ngei ho kaoena ashau ayunglabü;
aieilausi
Hobaje jaishou thuseibouei hao to laukei, “Ngokei no tegübü thuseibü che yingkei. Hobaje khuthük hangangbü cheei
Hibü Mühghaü müt kho hao phai semjung hauan haoeibü chem- a shaukei yungkei.
Hobaje haoen shaubü yungbü denshanga setjinei hao leian ngaibou thuseibou jungto Mühghaü ngüh loukei.
Hobaje Jihuda ka loubü Mühghaü müt to hai laukei, “
No longeikei hoba
Ladang Mühghaü mütei shaukei yungkei, jaishoubou thuseibouei haoei leian longeibou thuseibou kho settila gadu lamlekukei.
Hobaje ladang hao haukei, lama molosaonyu che haüyoan hao taketkei hoba haoeibü mang lama tekan apbei hoba gadu hao nyangko loan kikei, hoba molosaonyu haibü mang nyangko loan kikei.
Hobaje chühashi, mütshuong danjung haukei hoba haibü mang lama tekan apan hapbei hoba molosaonyu khünei loan kikei hoba haoenei louan thuseibou jaishoubou to kho lenkei.
Hobaje ladang thuseibouei kho ditkei, haoei laukei, “
Hobaje haoei hao shousi shuong to laukei, “Kü shanga gadu lamlekushi,” hoba haoenei kho lamlekukei.
Hobaje hao haukei hoba lama haibü mang kho apan hapbei, hoba gadu si molosaonyu ham haibü mang nyangko loan kikei. Molosaonyuei haibü mang kho ashau ayingsi gadukei aleiluti.
Hobaje thuseibouei Mühghaü müt haibü mang kho sungjung louan gadu la küntian sangnyu to sungbaan mang haapbo hao khünkei.
Hobaje haoei haibü mang kho haoeibü heea phokei hoba haoenei hao shanga mang haapbo laukei, “Ügütü, küna!”
Hobaje hao khünan phaia haoei haoeibü shousi shuong to laukei, “Ladang ngo hailaje Mühghaü müt khünshang heea ngokei khünshi, haoeibü lo nyangko ngeibü lo phoshi.
Aieilausi Bethela lemshon khulimbo, hoba Samaria sangnyu shuonga lemshang pendou khulimbo laobou haoei
Kho phaiakei Jeroboamei haoeibü shabü lam ka asepei, lausikei nyibou tokei mütshuong ka ungshedbou shuong pienkei hoba aoyouei maangangkei haoei hao saüenkuko ungshedbou pienkei.
Hobaje Jeroboam shanga ho shabü yeikei, khei chung wapan apla hoba kaonyudak ka lemailela mautilabü lele yeikei.
Kho chaloua Jeroboameibü shou Abija shatkei.

Hobaje Jeroboamei hao yak to laukei, “Meimeiashi, hoba Jeroboameibü yak dogo angela shanga sanoudambo no lolo hele jeileiashi hoba Shilo to hauashi. Hobaje chühashi, khünei Ahija thuseibou, aoei habü pendou thüka ngo Choba lelabü dogo laukei, hao jungto hauashi.
Hobaje wentek an yoa naodei jungan hao jungto hauashi hoba haoei ka la nashou kho aila yeila kho lenlabü.”
Hobaje Jeroboameibü nyakei kho tegü kümbei hoba meimeijung Shilo to loukei, hoba Abijaeibü chem to loukei. Tou Ahijaei nyekei ühüp, aieilausi hao baushi sinan kikei.
Hobaje
Hobaje ladang Ahijaei sao koukhün nyangko loubü youlangh ditkei, haoei sao to laukei, “Kaiyeda, no Jeroboameibü yak, aila nyi lubü tegü hanglenda? Aieilausi ngei ka shanga ngühlang amaibü kia.
Israel Mühghaü

hoba Dawid mütli ka ngei sangle sungngaian ka la kukei; lausikei ngo khangenbou Dawid, aoei ngeibü ngühkhüm shuong jungeikei, hoba aoei jembü maangpon khümboei ngei lenbü phai sembei, hoba kü thea maibü pendou kümbei, hao tegü no aying,
lausikei nyi ka thedanga kibü pendou to aeian amaibü kümbei hoba kü ka bangan lubü mühghaü shuong kümbei, hoba ngo maangto shattiko ka phainei ngo apyokei.

Hibü chühashi, ngei Jeroboam mütli khulimbo amaibü sungbalabü, hoba Jeroboam ka bousushou pendou wapan aplabü, ao thüngan ki hoba Israel kaoa khühlepbü hoba soloa kibü pendou kho tegü chemkubü shuongei odsinot kuan apbü tegü Jeroboam chung lemailela pendou amauti shongko kuan aplabü.
Hobaje Jeroboam mütli ao sangnyua hailaje keiei shaulabü, hoba ao seka hailaje mühkabü au shuongei shaulabü, aieilausi
“Hibü no meimeiashi hoba kaibü chem to hauashi hoba no ladang kaibü sangnyu to you yaüjung atlaje kaibü shou hailabü.
Hobaje Israelbü pendou hao shanga mang haaplabü, hoba khünlabü; aieilausi Jeroboam chung yo ka
Tokei
Aieilausi deia thakdu topeibü tegü
Hobaje haoei Jeroboam shedbü shanga Israel khümbo kuan aplabü, laobou haoei shabü shonkei hoba kho shedbü Israelbü la shontikei.”
Hobaje Jeroboameibü yak meimeijung satkei hoba Tirza to loukei, hoba sao chem nyangko loujinei nashou kho haian apbei.
Hobaje
Jeroboameibü joubü kümsilei, laobou haoei wapyokei hoba lai songdakkei kho Israelbü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü Lea doan kia, khüto chühshi.
Hobaje Jeroboamei songdakbü po saoto nyi kikei, hoba hao bousi shuong yoa yepbei, hoba hao shou Nadabei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Solomoneibü shou Rehoboamei Jihudaa songdakkei. Rehoboam ladang songdakla khangkei, hao po saoto che kikei, hoba haoei po anthük nyet
Hobaje
Haoenei haoen shanga shongh wekoa hoba sangtüngbü bulong phanga shomenbü shonghshou, saopobü thaonyu shuong, hoba Ashera kümbei.
Yongbou, kaonyua küksithang lemshanga pejapelabüa jembü phe yaakbü bousu shuong mangkei kikei. Jihudaei
Tou Rehoboam Choba po ngao boubüa Ijepbü Choba Shishakei Jerusalem shila longkei.
Hobaje haoei
Hobaje Rehoboam Chobaei khübü jeila chisaknamei aih kümbei, hoba Chobaeibü sepai koukhün lombü leiyeibü shuong ik to khümbo kukei.
Hobaje ladang ong Choba
Rehoboameibü joubü kümsilei shanga hoba haoei kümbü pendou Jihudabü Choba shuongeibü Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo?
Hobaje athakko Rehoboam si Jeroboam kanglanga wapyo kikei.

Hobaje Rehoboam haoeibü pisibousi shuong yoa yepbei, hoba Dawid sangnyua haoeibü bousi shuong yoa khünkei hoba haoeibü nyu Ammonbü sao nyen Naama nyenbü kikei, hoba hao jeiko hao shou Abijaei songdakkei.
Tou Nebat shou Jeroboam po anthükset boubüa Abijaei Jihuda thüka songdakla khangkei.
Haoei Jerusalema po sem songdakkei, hoba haoeibü nyu Abishalomeibü nouyangshou Maaka nyenbü kikei.
Hobaje haobouei shangied kümbü shabüa paikei, hoba haobou Dawid tegü ayingko
Lausikei Dawid nyen shanga
Aishanga Dawidei
Tou Rehoboam si Je- roboam ham kanglanga khangbü wapyo Abijaeibü salang sünga kikei.
Hobaje Abijaeibü kümsilei pendou hoba haoei kümbü Jihudabü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo? Hobaje Abija si Jeroboam ham kanglanga wapyo kikei.
Hobaje Abija bousi shuong yoa yepbei hoba Dawid sangnyua haoenei hao khünkei, hoba hao shou Asaei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Israelbü Jeroboam Choba po saoche boubüa Jihuda thüka Asaei songdakla khangkei.
Hobaje Jerusalema haoei po saonyito che songdakkei hoba haoeibü nyu nyen Maaka, Abishalomeibü nouyangshou kikei.
Hobaje haobou Dawidei kümbü tegü
Hobaje haoei bousu si bousu jajasasabü kümsilei apbukei hoba pisibousi shuongei kümbü heangsho pendou haoei apbukei.

Hobaje tokei haoeibü nyu Maaka Chobasao leko kibü ka haoei thaktikei; aieilausi saoei Ashera shanga mangsenlabü heangsho che kümbei hoba Asaei kho heangsho kho wapthetthet apbukei hoba Kidron shumanga kho jikkei.
Lausikei shongh kabü lemshang kho haoenei sungan üp; kho khei yingasikei Asaeibü sensimaang haoeibü langkei khümboa
Hobaje haoei
Hobaje Asa si Israelbü Choba Baasha kanglanga haosieibü langkei sünga wapyo kikei.
Hobaje Israelbü Choba Baashaei JIhuda khulimbo angkei hoba Jihudabü Choba Asa jungto aokei apaitila shanga haoei Ramaa kaangbüsekbü laangba yaükei.
Hobaje Asaei
“Kabou si kübou kanglanga kibü tegü seti kanglanga thangjam kikho; chühashi, ngei ka la hon si chandinam jongsak kutida, hauashi, Israel Choba Baasha kü ka kuklabü lele hao to thangjam leiluashi.”

Hobaje Benhadadei Asa Choba to ngüha lekei, hoba Israel sangnyu shuong khulimbo haoeibü sepai tan leiyeibü shuong hautiko Ijon, Dan, Abel Beth Maaka hoba Galil Sidang si Naftali kao pendou yoan leilukukei.
Hobaje ladang Baashaei kho ditkei, haoei Ramaa kümbüleibü nangkei, hoba Tirza to ngaikei.

Kheijinei Asa Chobaei Jihuda kaodak pendoua ngühlang phinthonkei; aokei ajouti, hoba haoenei Ramaa kibü laang hoba wa laobou Baashaei dangkei pendou sunglangkei, hoba Asa Chobaei Benjamina Geha si Mizpa kümbei.
Tou Asaei kümbü kümsilei pendou hoba haoeibü hau pendou hoba haoei kümbü sangnyu pendou Jihudabü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo? Lausikei hao baushilama youa mou longkei.
Hobaje Asa haoeibü bousi shuong yoa yepbei hoba haoeibü bousi shuong yoa haobou Dawid sangnyua khünkei, hoba hao jeiko hao shou Jehoshafatei songdakkei.
Jihudabü Choba Asa, songdak po nyi boubüa Jeroboameibü shou Nadabei Israel; thüka songdakla khangkei hoba haoei Israel thüka po nyi songdakkei.
Hobaje haoei
Hobaje Ahijaeibü shou Baasha Issakhar chungei hao khulimbo kümbei, hoba Baashaei Filistia kabü Gibbetona hao haitikei, aieilausi Nadab si Israelbü pendouei Gibbeton komlepbo kikei.
Jihudabü Asaei po sem boubü songdakko kijinei Baashaei Nadab haitikei hoba hao jeiko songdakkei.
Hobaje hao Choba yeisilengko Jeroboameibü mütli pendou haoei haitikei. Jeroboam shanga haoei langkei kibü aokei üpyo; hoba
Aishanga Jeroboameibü shabü shuong laobou haoei shabü shonkei hoba laobou haoei Israelbü la shed shontikei, kho danko haoei
Hobaje Nadabei kümbü kümsilei hoba haoei ai ong kümbei khübü kho Israelbü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü Lea doan aki lo?
Hobaje Asa si Baasha haosi kanglanga salang sünga wapyo kikei.
Jihudabü Choba Asa, songdak po sem boubüa Ahijaeibü shou Baashaei Tirzaa Israel pendou thüka songdakla khangkei, hoba po anthüklei songdakkei.
Hobaje haoei
Kheijinei
“Thamngu ka ngei no yaangentikei hoba kü mütli Israel thüka Choba yeitikei, lausikei no Jeroboam lama paikei hoba kü mütli Israel la shabü shontikei hoba haoeneibü shabüei ngo khauangtikei.
Chühashi, ngei Baasha hoba haoeibü chemdang lemailela kuan aplabü, hoba ngei kaibü chemdang Nebateibü shou Jeroboam chemdang tegü yeitilabü.
Hobaje ao Baasha yoa sangnyua hailaje kei shuongei shaulabü hoba ao hao yoa khongthua hailaje mühkabü au shuongei shaulabü.”
Tou Baashaeibü kümsilei, hoba haoei kümenleienbü pendou, Israelbü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo?
Hobaje Baasha haoeibü bousi shuong yoa yepbei, hoba Tirzaa hao khünkei hoba hao shou Elaei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Hobaje aeilaleko Hananieibü shou Jehu thuseibou danko
Jihudabü Choba Asaei po saoto lak boubü songdakbü poa Baashaeibü shou Elaei Tirzaa songdakla khangkei, hoba po nyi songdakkei.
Hobaje haoeibü koli kailong jamde thüka leiyeibou hao khangenbou Zimriei hao khulimbei. Jih chenei Ela Choba, Tirzaa Choba chem thüka ikjaibou Arza chema ihei jaakan kikei.
Hobaje Zimri lotan Ela Choba wapettikei, hoba hao jeiko songdakkei. Kho Jihuda Choba Asa songdak po saoto nyet boubüa kikei.

Hobaje ladang haoei songdakla khangkei, hao Choba setshanga setsilengko Baashaeibü chemdang pendou wapettiko bousu shou che ongkei üpyoko, ayingsi chempen ayingsi haoeibü thangbou che ongkei ajoutiko haoei haitikei.
eibü ngühei Jehu thuseibou danko Baasha Choba khulimbo laubü tegütham Zimriei chemdang khümbo shemtikei.
Aieilausi Baasha si haoshou Elaei shabü shonkei hoba Israel lakei shontikei; kho ong ayingko heangsho lembüei
Tou Elaeibü lubü kümsilei hoba haoei kümbü pendou Israelbü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo?
Jihudabü Choba Asa, songdak po saoto nyet boubüa Tirzaa Zimriei chalou nyet songdakkei. Tou Israelbü Filistia kabü Gibbeton khulimbo shaian kikei,
hoba kaman kibü mütshuongei Zimriei Choba khulimbo lokei hoba hao wapettikei dogo ditkei, kheijinei Israelbü pendouei Omri lajamleibou haoen thüka Choba lela ngekletkei.
Hobaje Omri yoa Israelbü pendou Gibbeton ka angkei, hoba haoenei Tirza shikei.
Ladang Zimriei sangnyu kho sungan hapbei, hao Choba chem to atkei hoba haoei wanei Choba chem kho thean apbei hoba hao khünei haikei.
Aieilausi haoei
Tou Zimrieibü lubü kümsilei hoba haoei khulimbo meimeibü pendou kho Israelbü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü Lea doan aki lo?
Kheijinei Israelbü penyi la jankei, müt jamdeei Ginateibü shou Tibni Choba yeitila hao phai sembei, hoba jamde Omri phai sembei.
Lausikei aoyou Omri phai sembei haoenei Ginat shou Tibni phai sembü danthetko thükkei, hibü Tibni haikei hoba Omriei songdakkei.
Jihudabü Choba Asa po khujinto che boubü songdakjinei Omri Israel thüka songdakla khangkei, hoba po anthüknyi songdakkei. Haoei Tir- zaa po lak songdakkei.

Hobaje haoei Shemer ka Samaria shongh kho chandinam seret khujin bang atbü penyiei jekkei, hoba haoei shongha chem dangkei, hoba haoei dangbü sangnyu Samaria shongh la kao bunyueibü nyenphai Shemer nyenkukei.
Hobaje Omriei
Aieilausi hao Nebateibü shou Jeroboam lama paikei, hoba haoeibü shabüei Israel la shed shontikei, hoba jim akibü heangsho lembü kümeileiei Israel Mühghaü khau angtikei.
Tou Omrieibü kümsilei lubü haoei ai kümbei hoba haoeibü hau laobou lenkei, khübü kho Israelbü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo?
Hibü Omri haoeibü bousi shuong yoa yepbei, hoba hao Samariaa khünkei, hoba hao shou Ahabei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Hobaje Jihudabü Choba Asa, songdak po khujinto set boubüa Omrieibü shou Ahabei Israel thüka songdakla khangkei, hoba Omrieibü shou Ahabei Samariaa Israel thüka po saoto nyi songdakkei.
Hobaje Om- rieibü shou Ahabei

Hobaje Nebateibü shou Jeroboam shabü shuong thüka pailabü kho kümsilei sosobü che tegü haoei Sidonbü Choba Ethbaaleibü nouyangshou Jezebel kho hao yakla lekei, hoba hao Baal jungto hauan khangenko hao lembei.
Hobaje Baal chema haoei Baal shanga lemshon kümbei, laobou haoei Samariaakei dangkei.
Hobaje Ahabei Ashera kümbei, hoba haoei Israel Mühghaü

Hao thudena Bethelbü Hielei Jerikho kümetkei, haoei hao shou jaishoubou Abiram lemla kuko chem kho huong khangkei hoba bakhün shuong kho haoeibü napeibou Segubei lembo kümenkei, hoba kho Naneibü shou Joshua danko
Tou Tishbibü Elija ao Gileada kikei, haoei Ahab to laukei, “Israel Mühghaü
Hobaje
“Haka meimeijung chaang aeto hauashi hoba Jordan thedanga Kerith shumang nyangko hushi.
Hobaje shushou dei kho nyi yunglabü hoba khünei no pangteila ngei aukhomakmak la ngühkhüm kua.”
Hobaje
Hobaje aukhomakmak shuongei phe si wentek ngeyang si chasem hao la sungbakei, hoba haoei shushou dei yungkei.
Hobaje longche kian shushou kho hapan apbei, aieilausi kaodaka lang alou.
Hobaje
“Meimeiashi, hoba Sidona kibü Zarefath to no hauashi hoba khünei kishi. Chühashi, khonei kibü latnyu che la no samla ngei ngühkhüm kua.”
Hibü hao meimeijung Zarefath to haukei; hoba ladang haoei sangnyu bakhün sühkei, chühashi, latnyu che khünei bu lakko kikei. Hobaje haoei sao to laukei, “Sanoudambo kü la yungla dei shijo sungba.”
Hobaje saoei kho sungbala hauko kijinei haoei sao ngakei hoba laukei, “Kü la nyak ikkhong che sungbakushi.”
Hobaje saoei laukei, “
Hobaje Elijaei sao to laukei, “Tehüt, hauashi, hoba nyi laubü tegü kümashi; lausikei shaangla kü la wentek hanbü che kümbü, hoba kho kü la sungbakushi, hoba phaila kashou kasi shanga kümshi.
Aieilausi Israel Mühghaü
Hobaje saoei hauan Elijaei laubü tegütham kümbei hoba sao si saoeibü chemdang hoba Elija haoen chalou juong shaukei yungkei.
Elijaei
Hobaje khübü chalou danan phaia yaksanyueibü shou kho shatkei, hoba hao aeibou shatko khei hau thonan apbei.
Hobaje saoei Elija to laukei, “O Mühghaü müt, nyi kü to ai kümda? No ngeibü shabü damentila hoba kü shou haitila loukei sai?”
Hobaje haoei sao to laukei, “Ka shou kü la labü.” Hobaje haoei hao yaksanyueibü khukhu ka bamletkei, hoba hao kishang shemjang to leian loukei, hoba haoei haoeibü shena phokei.
Hobaje haoei
Hobaje haoei semnei sühko nashou khüto thipyolangkei hoba
Hobaje Elijaeibü ngüh
Hobaje Elijaei nashou kho baman sungkei, hoba haoeibü shemjang ka haoei chem to leian yankei, hoba haoei hao nyu la kuko laukei, “Chühashi, ka shou lang kia.”
Kheijinei yaksanyuei Elija to laukei, “Tou ngei no Mühghaü müt dogo ngeda, hoba kaibü sembunga
Hobaje chalou lounyu kian phaia, po semboubüa Elija jungto
Hibü Elija Ahab jungto hao mütpem hauan lenkei, hoba Samariaa mühsinou yaang kaangko kikei.
Hobaje Ahabei chem nyangko kibü Obadia ngakei, (Tou Obadia
lausikei hai kikei, ladang
Kheijinei Ahabei Obadia to laukei, “Kaoen pendou to dei pakshang si shumang pendou danko, koli si gadu shuong langkei khümenla senei sang hapasaoje shatsinam pendou shembula lambo haushi.”
Hibü haoen danjung haulabü kaophei kho janan haula meimeikei; hoba Ahab kei kaoen che to haukei, hoba Obadia kei kaoen che to haukei.
Tou Obadia lama hauko kijinei, chühashi, haoei Elija haüyokei, hoba haoei hao shenkei hoba haoei thenyek kao ae khüpjung atkei, hoba laukei, “No ngeibü bunyubou Elija sai?”
Hobaje haoei hao to laukei, “Hao kho ngo. Hauashi hoba kaibü bunyubou to, ‘Chühashi, Elija hanei kia’, dogo lenashi.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ngo no khangenbou, Ahab ik to khümbo kuan, haitilabü lele ngei ai shed shonkei?

kaibü Mühghaü, lang ki shongko, phang ayingsi sangle che ongkei üpyoko ngeibü bunyubouei no lambei, hoba haoenei ladang ‘Hao hanei aki’ dogo laukei, haoenei no tükde ühüp dogo phang hoba sangleei thetilantikei.
Hobaje tou nyi lauda, ‘Hauan kaibü bunyubou to lenshi, Chühashi, Elija hanei kia.’”
Hobaje ngo ka jungka hausi lengko, ngei angeko
Ngei ai kümbei kho ngei ngeibü bunyubou to alen sai? Ladang Jezebelei
Hobaje tou nyi lauda, ‘Hauashi, kaibü
Hobaje Elijaei laukei, “Lakjaibü dan
Hibü Obadia Ahab to haüyola haukei hoba hao to lenkei; hoba Ahab Elija to haü- yola haukei.
Ladang Ahabei Elija lapbei, Ahabei hao to laukei, “Israel khonkutibou kho no sai?”
Hobaje haoei jongaikei, “Ngei Israel khon akuti, lausikei no hoba kaibü chemdangei

Hibü tou Israelbü pendou Karmel Shongha kü to haüyola hautiashi. Hobaje Jezebeleibü denshanga shaubü yungbü Baal thuseibü shuong saongao leito anjinsem hoba Ashera thuseibü shuong saongao lei kü jungto kamshaitiashi.”
Hibü Ahabei Israelbü shousi shuong jungto ngühlang hautikei hoba thuseibü pendou Karmel shongha kamshaikei.
Hobaje Elija mütshuong nyangko louan laukei, “Kan ho dambü penyi kanglanga lalokche phenyembo kila?
Kheijinei Elijaei mütshuong to laukei, “

Haoenei sen shanga masu pongsu penyi sungbatiashi. Haoenei che netla yeiko jemnyinan bu thüka tonan angtiashi, lausikei wan tejikti. Hobaje ngei masu pongsu che kho kho tegü kümlabü hoba bu thüka tonan angtilabü hoba wan asaplabü.
Hobaje kanei kaneibü mühghaü to welauashi hoba ngei
Hibü Elijaei Baal thuseibü shuong to laukei, “Kanei kan shanga masu pongsu che pienashi, hoba shaangla kho lamleashi, aieilausi kan juong; lausikei wan tejin hoba kaneibü mühghaü nyena ngaashi.”

Kheijinei haoen la kubü masu pongsu kho haoenei sungkei hoba haoenei kho lamlekei, hoba ngeyang ka chajih sühko haoenei Baal nyena ngekko welauko laukei, “O Baal, kün to ditkai.” Lausikei ngühlang che ongkei akitei hoba aoeikei ajongai. Hobaje lemshon kaiko haoenei saikolakko ngekkei.

Hobaje Elijaei haoen la nyikuko laukei, “Kaangko ngekashi! Hao mühghaü nai! Haüko dambo kibü yinglabü, ayingsi akongko kila thükkei, aying longa wakou satan kilabü. Ayingsi hao yepan kia longa kaangjan!”
Hibü haoenei kaangko ngekkei hoba haoeneibü songa thonbü tegü in si aubuei sii akou shongko manga lounyin latnyinko ngekyokei.
Hobaje chakung ngombei hoba chasembü lembüsabü jih asühshongko haoenei ngekdang lekei. Lausikei ngühlang che ongkei akitei ayingsi aoeikei ajongai, ayingsi aoeikei haoen aweei.
Kheijinei Elijaei mütshuong to laukei, “Kü jungto nyangko kaiya,.” Hobaje müt pendou hao jungto nyangko loukei; hoba haoei
Hobaje Elijaei Jakob shousi chung lühbak haangei laang anthüknyi sungkei; aishanga hao jungto Mühghaü ngüh hai lauko loukei, “Israel kho kaibü nyen yinglabü.”
Hibü khübü laangei

Hobaje haoei bu kho yenkei yenko shaangkei hoba masu pongsu kho netla yeiko jemnyinkei hoba bu thüka phokei. Kheijinei haoei haoen to laukei, “Deiei deikhu chak lei shentiashi hoba juokla lembü si bu to jonashi.”
Hobaje haoei haoen to laukei, “Toukei jinashi;” kho haoenei nyiboukei kümbei. Hobaje haoei haoen to laukei, “Semboukei kümashi;” hoba haoenei semboukei haoei lenbü tegü kümbei.
Hobaje lemshang pendou kho deiei sopan koubü ka piyunglam khokei shenkei.
Hobaje chasem lembü jihsi- phaia Elija thuseibou lemshang nyangko louan laukei, “O
O
Kheijinei
Hobaje ladang mütshuongei kho hapbei haoen kaoa khüpetan laukei, “Hao kho
Kheijinei Elijaei laukei, “Baal thuseibü che ongkei asattiko senetashi!” Hobaje haoenei haoen senetkei hoba Elijaei haoen kho Kishon to leian yankei, hoba haoen khünei haitikei.
Kheijinei Elijaei Ahab to laukei, “Meimeiashi, shauayungashi, aieilausi lang kaangko loula langhlangda.”
Hibü Ahab shaula yungla satkei hoba Karmel Shongh to Elija angkei hoba hao kaoa khüpetan haoeibü thenyek youkük penyi kanglanga phokei.
Hobaje haoei hao khangenbou to laukei, “Tou angan yungnyu aephei to chühashi.” Hobaje haoei angan chühan laukei, “Aikei aki.” Elijaei “Hauan chühashi,” dogo nyetnei laukei.

Hobaje nyet boubüa haoei laukei, “Müteibü ik tegü yungnyu ka sangmei hanbü che longada!” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Angashi hoba Ahab to lenshi, ‘Yanan langei no ashimeitoua kaibü koli kailong lamleashi.’ ”
Hobaje longche kanglanga sangmei si yeiei müh nakthühtham apbei, hoba lang kaang loukei. Hobaje Ahab Jezreel to kolia setan haukei.
Hobaje
Tou Elijaei kümbü pendou hoba haoei thuseibü shuong lai küman inei haitikei pendou kho Ahabei Jezebel to lenkei.
Kheijinei Jezebelei Elija jungto ngühlang künbü che hautiko laukei, “Ngei kaibü langkei kho ho tegübü chaloua haoen yoa che tegütham akümlonga, mühghaü shuongei kü to aei kümshi.”
Elijaei kho ditan hatkei hoba meimeijung jembü langkei shanga satkei, hoba Jihuda kaodak Beersheba to louan haoeibü sambü khünei apyokei.
Lausikei hao mütpem chalou che lam sangliphang to haukei hoba juniper bulong che phanga setkei hoba hao hao lolo haila shanga sukojako laukei, “Hoei soua, O
Hobaje juniper bulong phang khünei yepbei hoba chühashi, khuthük hangangbü cheei hao to meitikei hoba laukei, “Meimeiashi hoba shauashi.”
Hobaje haoei chühsi haoeibü khukhüma wankak yasebüa kaangbü wentek si dei thungdou che kikei; hoba haoei kho shauan yungan nyibou yepbei.
Hobaje
Hobaje hao pikei hoba shaukei yungkei hoba kho shaubü yungbü hauei chalou saonyi hoba langyang saonyi Mühghaü Shongh Horeb to angkei.
Hobaje hao laangbob che to louan khünei kikei, hoba chühashi,
Hobaje haoei laukei, “
Hibü haoei laukei, “Hauashi hoba
Hobaje selo nyian phaia wan loukei, lausikei wan khünei
Hobaje ladang Elijaei kho ditkei haoeibü neiei jembü thenyek yuklepan haukei, hoba laangbob nyangko lokei, hoba chühashi, hao jungto ngüh che louan laukei, “Elija, no hanei ai kümda?”
Kheijinei haoei jongaikei, “
Hobaje
Hobaje Israel thüka Choba lela nyi Nimshieibü shou Jehu naangenko pienashi, hoba Abel Mehola ka Shafat shou Elisha, ka jeila thuseibü lela nyi naangenko pienashi.
Hobaje Hazaeleibü in ka satenbü müt kho Jehuei haitilabü, hoba Jehueibü in ka satenbü müt kho Elishaei haitilabü.
Tokei ngei Israela Baal mühghaü thedanga akhüpetbü shuong hoba heangsho to sembung ashepbü shuong hajar nyet kü shanga phoyolabü.”
Hibü hao khüka bangkei hoba Shafat shou Elisha hapbei. Hao masu pongsu dang anthüknyi yoa hoba khübü anthüknyi boubü tang yoa hao sek shapbo kikei. Elija hao nyangko haukei hoba haoeibü nei neikukei.

Hobaje haoei masu pongsu shuong kho apyoan Elija jungto laangjung hauan laukei, “Ngei kübou si künyu to sembung shepla ka to sudajada, kho phaia ong ka phaito semlabü.” Hobaje Elijaei hao to laukei, “Ngaiashi, ngei no ashiletda!”

Hobaje haoei hao phai asembo ngaikei; sek shapbü masu pongsu shuong kho leijung louan haitikei hoba sek shapbü peisilei jikan phe kho thungkei hoba mütshuong la okkei hoba mütshuongei kho shaukei. Kheijinei hao meimeijung Elija phaito haukei hoba hao khangenkei.
Tou Siriabü Choba Ben- hadadei haoeibü lakjaibü dan pendou leishaikei, hoba hao yoa Choba khujinto nyi hoba koli si koli kailong kikei, hoba haoei angan Samaria komlepbei hoba kho khulimbo wapyokei.
Hobaje Israelbü Choba Ahab jungto ngühlang künbü hautiko hao to laukei,
“Benhadadei hai lauda, ‘Kaibü chandinam si kaibü hon kho kü shangabü, kaibü yaksi shuong hoba kaibü shousi shuong, hoba khei maiboutham pendou kho kü shangabü.’ ”
Hobaje Israel Chobaei jongaiko laukei, “Nyi laubü tegü, O Choba, ngeibü bunyubou, ngei kibü pendou ka shangabü.”

Hobaje ngühlang künbü shuong kho nyibou louan laukei, “Benhadadei hai lauda, ‘Ngei tükde kaibü chandinam, kaibü hon, kaibü yaksi shuong hoba kaibü shousi pendou kü la khümbo kubü, dogo lauko hautikei;
lausikei ngei ngiet ho jiha khangenbü shuong hautilabü hoba haoenei kaibü Choba chem, no khangenbü shuongeibü chem hoba haoeneibü the to loubü pendou to ik shatlabü hoba sunglanglabü.’ ”

Kheijinei Israel Chobaei kaonyeka jaishou shuong pendou ngashaian laukei, “Ho müt hoei ailaibü amaibü lamda kho chühletnyu phoashi dogo ngei sudajada; aieilausi haoei ngeibü yaksi shuong hoba kü shousi shuong, chandinam hoba hon shanga hautikei hoba ngei hao la atheletko aki.”
Hobaje jaishou shuong hoba müt pendouei hao to laukei, “Nyi hao to ngüha tele ayingsi kula tethelet.”

Khünei haoei Benhadadeibü ngühlang künbü shuong to laukei, “Ngeibü Choba bunyubou to laushi, ‘Nyi shaangla no khangenbü shuong jungto ai shanga hautikei kho ngei kümlabü, lausikei toubü hoje ngei athüklabü.’” Hobaje ngühlang künbü shuong kho bangkei hoba hao jungto nyibou ngühlang künbakei.
Hobaje Benhadadei hao jungto hautiko laukei, “Kü phainei sembü pendou shanga Samariabü thamnguei soualonga mühghaü shuongei kü to aeikei kümshi.”
Kheijinei Israel Chobaei jongaikei, “Hao to lenshi: ‘Lakjaibü hele leakei dogo ong, kho sungan apbula thükbou tegüthamje asungenjan.’ ”
Hobaje ladang Benhadad si Choba shuong shaishanga shauko yungko kikei, ho ditan hao khangenbü shuong to laukei, “Kan lamlean lin küman loashi.” Hobaje sangnyu kho khulimbo lamlean lin küman lokei.
Kho jihsiphaia thuseibü che Israel Choba Ahab jungto louan laukei, “
Hobaje Ahabei laukei, “Kho aoei kümla?” Hobaje thuseibouei laukei, “Kaonyeka Choba shousi daneibü heshou shuongei, dogo daneibü

Hobaje haoei jongaikei, “Nyi khanglabü.” Hobaje haoei kaonyeka Chobaeibü heshou shuong liko ngashaikei hoba haoen saoanto khujinto nyi kikei; hoba haoen phaito Israel shousi pendou yoshaitikei, hoba haoen hajar nyet kikei.
Hobaje haoen chanyu chajiha haukei, kheijinei Benhadad yoa thuiyobü Choba khujinto nyi yoan ihei jaaketkotham yungyoko kikei.
Hobaje kaonyeka Choba shousi shuong hoba heshou shuong shaang haukei. Hobaje Benhadadei hautibü danei hao to laukei, “Samaria ka mütshuong louada.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Haoen sangmai shanga loua tegükei, ayingsi wapyola loua tegükei, haoen lang ong lapshi.”
Hibü khübü kho sangnyu ka haukei, hoba haoen phainei sepai tan sembei.

Hobaje haoen mütpem wekoei lulueibü labou thükkei, hoba Siriabü hatla satyokei, hoba Israelbüei haoen shijung haukei; lausikei Siriabü Choba Benhadad kolia setan haoeibü koli leibü shuong yoa hao satenkei.
Hobaje Israelbü Chobaei hauan koli shuong hoba koli kailong pendou shemtikei, hoba Siriabü juong haitikei.
Hobaje Israel Choba jungto nyangko thuseibou louan hao to laukei, “Hauan no lolo hau kingaiashi, hoba nyi ai kümda kho nyi ngean phoashi; aieilausi loulabü poa Siriabü Chobaei no khulimbo loulabü.”

Kheijinei Siria Choba Ben- hadadeibü khangenbü shuongei hao to laukei, “Haoeneibü mühghaü shuong kho shongh shuong mühghaü ki, hibü haoen sen toje hau kibou; lausikei senei haoen khulimbo pholi khünei wapyokho, hoba tükde haoen toje sen hau kibou yinglabü.
Hobaje ho kümashi; Choba khujinto nyi kho lulu loshang ka kuktiashi, hoba haoen jeila lajamleibou shuong phokushi.

Hobaje nyi danbüa maubü sepai jeila sepai, koli shanga koli, koli kailong shanga koli kailong dogo lamlean phoshi hoba haoen khulimbo senei pholi khünei wapyolabü hoba tükde haoen toje sen hau kibou yinglabü.” Hobaje haoei haoenei laubü ditkei hoba kho tegü kümbei.
Hobaje po nyiboua Benhadadei Siriabü pendou leishaikei hoba Israelbü khulimbo wapyola Afek to angkei.

Israel shousi shuong liko kamshaian lamlekei hoba hao khulimbo haukei hoba Siriabü shaibü to tangküngyoko shaikei; hoba Israel shousi shuong lonshou tan hanbü tegü shaikei, lausikei Siriabüei kaonyek yeplepbei.
Kheijinei Mühghaü müt che nyangko louan Israel Choba to joyoko laukei, “
Hobaje chalou nyet sühko haoen cheei che khulimbo shaikei. Hobaje nyetbounyet lason shuokkei; hoba Israel shousi shuongei chalou chenei ong youeibü sepai hajar saongao haitikei.

Lausikei joubü shuong kho Afek sangnyu to linjung satkei, hoba joubü hajar saoto nyet thükto kümthang kho nopthetjung koukei. Hobaje Benhadad satenkei hoba sangnyu to louan maangkabou shemjanga hukei.

Hobaje haoeibü khangenbü shuong hao jungto louan laukei, “Tou chühashi, Israelbü Choba shuong üeisanou kakbü Choba shuong dogo künei ditkei, hibü kün senounei neian hoba khua nei shenan Israel Choba Ahab jungto hauan sukojako dogo ka to sudajada; aingenyu haoei kaibü langkei püetlabü.”

Hibü haoen senounei neian hoba khua lüh shenan Israel Choba jungto hauan laukei, “No khangenbou Benhadadei lauda, ‘Ngo lang kitishi dogo sudajada.’ ” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Hao ngeibü jaisina, tokei hao lang kia lo?” dogo haoei phekei.

Tou mütshuongei kaangko chühkei hoba haoei maangangbü yinglaoje panteiko phekei hoba haoenei “Kaibü jaisina Benhadad” dogo laukei. Kheijinei Chobaei “Kan hauan hao leiba” dogo laukei. Kheijinei Benhadad hao jungto loukei, hoba Ahabei hao haoeibü koli kailong to leiyetkei.

Hobaje Benhadadei hao to laukei, “Sangnyu shuong laobou kübouei kabou ka sungkei kho ngei kungailabü; hoba kübouei Samariaa kümbü tegü nyi Damaskaa namseishang kümla thükkei.” Ahabei jongaikei, “Ngei ka to ho theyolanyobü lean no litilabü.” Hibü haoei hao to theyolanyobü che kümbei hoba hao ngaitikei.
Hobaje thuseibü shousi yoa cheei
Kheijinei haoei hao to laukei, “
Kheijinei haoei lubü che hapan hao to laukei, “Kü to ngümbei dogo ngei ka to sudajada.” Hobaje müt khoei hao to ngüman hao la aktikei.
Hibü thuseibou kho bangjung haukei hoba hao lolo müla ashentiko lama Choba haiyeiko kikei.

Hobaje Choba danjinei, haoei Choba to ngekko laukei, “No khangenbou wapyo yaak to atkei hoba chühashi, müt cheei kü jungto müt che lang senbaan laukei, ‘Müt ho lomshi, laiche küman haoeibü langkei mausi haoeibü langkei jeila ka langkei lelabü, ayingsi chandinam hajar sem nyi atjan.
Hobaje khangenbou hihinei akongko kibüei hao satan apbei.’” Hobaje Israel Chobaei hao to laukei, “Nyi lauenbü tegütham kaibü matjem kilabü.”
Hobaje haoei panteiko haoeibü thenyek yuklepbü kho sungan apbei hoba Chobaei hao thuseibü shuong yoa che dogo chühenkei.
Hobaje haoei hao to laukei, “Nyi laobou langkei haitila ngei kaibü ikto kukei, hao sattisije haoeibü langkei jeiko kaibü langkei hoba hao mütli jeiko ka mütli langkei lelabü dogo
Hobaje Israel Choba maangto shatko hao chem lambo Samaria to ngaikei.
Tou Samariabü Choba Ahabeibü chem nyangko Jezreela Naboteibü semlühlaak che kikei.

Hobaje Ahabei Nabot to pheko laukei, “Bamang che lean kesiong jinla kaibü semlühlaak kho kü la kubü: aieilausi ho ngeibü chem nyangakei hoba hoto maibou semlühlaak che ngei ka la kulabü, ayingsi nyi mangsüha longa ngei nama muko kulabü.”
Hobaje Nabotei Ahab to laukei, “Küboueibü phet ngei ka la kula

Hobaje Ahab haoeibü chem to maang aeibou angesakko ngaikei; aieilausi Jezreelbü Nabotei, “Ngeibü phetphan ngei ka la akulabü” dogo hao to laukei. Hobaje hao haoeibü shena kümthang ae yeian nongan thekhüman lengkei hoba ai ashau.
Lausikei hao yak Jezebel louan hao to laukei, “Aiei kaibü soushou maangto shattida, hoba nyi aila ashau ayungda?”

Hobaje haoei sao to laukei, “Jezreelbü Nabot to, ‘Kaibü semlühlaak namei jekkho, ayingsi nyi maanganga longa lubü semlühlaak che kukho’ dogo ngei phekei, lausikei haoei ‘Ngei ka la semlühlaak akulabü’ dogo laukei!”
Hobaje hao yak Jezebelei hao to laukei, “Nyi tou Israel sangle thüka songdakda aying lo? Meimeiashi, shauayungashi, hoba no olinko kishi. Jezreelbü Naboteibü semlühlaak kho ngei ka la kulabü.”
Hibü saoei Ahab nyena Nabot kibü sangnyua kibü jaishou shuong hoba yaangenbü shuong jungto le doan maisho khinlepan hautikei.
Hobaje saoei lea hai lauko dokei, “Pendou huishaiashi, hoba shuong thüka Nabot shongha settiashi.
Hobaje müt nyi la hao khulimbo haoei Mühghaü si Choba to khükauoka dogo lautiashi, hoba hao leiyenan laangei sonan haitiashi.”
Hobaje sangnyua kibü shuongei, jaishou shuongei hoba yaangenbü shuongei Jezebelei lea doan haoen to lenbü tegü haoenei kümbei.
Hobaje haoenei pendou huishaikei hoba müt pendou thüka hao shongha settikei.

Hobaje sousiwat hao nyangko louan setkei hoba sousiwat müt nyi khoei Nabot khulimbo mütshuongei ditko aukabü kuko loan laukei, “Nabotei Mühghaü si Choba khulimbo khükdauokda.” Kheijinei haoenei hao sangnyu ka senjung longan hao to laangei sonko hao haitikei.
Kheijinei haoenei Jezebel jungto ngühlang hautiko laukei, “Nabot laangei tetetnyu haitia.”

Hobaje ladang Jezebelei Nabot laangei sonettia dogo ditkei, Jezebelei Ahab to laukei, “Meimeiashi, hoba Jezreelbü Naboteibü semlühlaak laobou haoei nam lu akulabü dogo laukei, kho sungashi aieilausi Nabot lang aki, hao haia.”
Hobaje ladang Ahabei haia dogo ditkei, Jez- reelbü Naboteibü semlühlaak to hao haukei hoba kho haoei lekei.
Kheijinei
“Samariaa kibü Israelbü Choba Ahab to haüyola no meimeijung hauashi, chühashi, Naboteibü semlühlaak to kouan haoei kho lela hauakei.
Hobaje
Ahabei Elija to laukei, “O ngeibü dangbou, nyi ngo hapa lo?” Hobaje haoei jongaikei, “Ngei no hapa, aieilausi
Chühashi, ngei ka jungto amaibü sungbalabü hoba ngei no lemailela kuan aplabü, hoba Ahab ka bousu shou pendou wapan aplabü, khühbü si solobü Israela jouan kibü pendou shemtilabü.
Hobaje Nebateibü shou Jeroboam chung si Ahijaeibü shou Baasha chemdang tegü kaibü chemdang yeilabü; aieilausi nyi ngo maangto shattikei hoba Israelbü la shabü shontikei.
Hobaje Jezebel shangakei
Ahab chemdang kabü aoyou sangnyua hailaje keiei shaulabü hoba ao seka hailaje mühkabü au shuongei shaulabü.”
Hobaje haoei
Hobaje ladang Ahabei kho ditkei, haoei haoeibü neisimei jitnyinkei hoba haoeibü manga senounei neiko hoba mühei nyengko aeibou khonsak yaang lekei.
Hobaje Tishbibü Elija jungto
Hao eaaoa yeibü shanga ngei haoeibü jihsiphaia amaibü ai akulabü lausikei hao shou jihaphaia hao chemdang to khonsak hautikulabü.”
Hobaje Siria si Israel kanglanga wapyo akiko po sem dankei.
Lausikei po sem boubüa Israelbü Choba jungto Jihudabü Choba Jehoshafat louyenkei.
Hobaje Israel Chobaei hao khangenbü shuong to laukei, “Ramoth Gilead kho seneibü dogo kanei angekei lo? hoba senei kho Siriabü Choba ik ka sungngaila ai aküm aleiko kilep lo?”
Hobaje haoei Jehoshafat to laukei, “Ramoth Gilead to wapyola no kü yoa louasao?”
Hobaje Jehoshafatei Israelbü Choba to laukei, “Ngokei no tegü ong, kaibü mütli kho ngeibü mütli, hoba kaibü koli shuong kho ngeibü koli shuong.”
Hobaje Jehoshafatei Israel Choba to laukei, “
Kheijinei Israel Chobaei thuseibü saongao lei thüng liko yoshaitikei, hoba haoen to laukei, “Ramoth Gilead khulimbo wapyola si natenla?”
Hobaje haoenei laukei, “Hauashi, aieilausi
Lausikei Jehoshafatei laukei, “Senei kho phela shanga hanei thuseibü che ongkei aki sai?”
Hobaje Israelbü Chobaei Jehoshafat to laukei, “
Jehoshafatei laukei, “Choba, nyi khei telau!”
Kheijinei Israel Chobaei ikjaibü che ngaan laukei, “Tongde Imlaeibü shou Mikaia leiba.”
Tou Israel Choba si Jihuda Choba Jehoshafat hele lean Samaria bakhün to atshang khongthua lulueibü Choba setshanga setkei hoba thuseibü pendouei haosi thedanga tetenko laukei.
Hobaje Kenaanaeibü shou Zedekiaei son namei teklaang küman laukei, “
Thuseibü shuong pendouei ho tegü laukei, “Ramoth Gilead to angan thüksimina kishi, aieilausi

Hobaje ngühlang künbou Mikaia ngala haukei hoba haoei hao to laukei, “Tou chühashi, ngühkung cheei thuseibü shuong ngüh kho Choba thedanga maibü ki, kaibü ngühkei haoen yoa che tegü yingshima hoba maibü laushima.”
Hobaje Mikaiaei laukei, “

Hobaje ladang hao Choba jungto loukei, Chobaei hao to laukei, “Mikaia, sen Ramoth Gilead to wapyola haulep sai, ayingsi senei natenla?” Hobaje haoei jongaikei, “Angashi, hoba thüksimin hapashi, Chobaeibü ik to kho
Kheijinei Chobaei hao to laukei, “
Hibü haoei laukei, “San shuong sanlombü akibü tegü ngei Israelbü shuong shongha phinnyinan hapbei, hoba
Hobaje Israelbü Chobaei Jehoshafat to laukei, “Ngei ka to haoei kü shanga amaibü ong lakaje maibüje atetenkuda dogo alau lo?”
Hobaje Mikaiaei laukei, “Hibü nyi
Hobaje
Hobaje soushou che loukei hoba
Hobaje
Hobaje Mikaiaei laukei, “Hibü tou chühashi,
Kheijinei Kenaanaeibü shou Zedekia nyangko loukei, hoba Mikaiaeibü omlanga ipbo laukei, “Ka to joyola
Hobaje Mikaiaei jongaikei, “Chühashi, ladang no, no lolo maangkabou shemjang to hula atlaje khünyet nyi haplabü.”
Kheijinei Israel Chobaei laukei, “Sangnyua kibü governor Amon jungto Mikaia leian hauashi hoba Chobaeibü shou Joash jungto leian haushi,
hoba lenshi, ‘Chobaei hai lauda: Ho müt ho thüngshanga phoashi, hoba ngo sangmaia alongei shongko wentek hanbang hoba dei shibangei hao pangteiashi.’ ”
Hobaje Mikaiaei jongaikei, “No sangmaia ongkei longeia longa,
Hibü Israel Choba Ahab si Jihuda Choba Jehoshafat Ramoth Gilead to angkei.

Hobaje Ahabei Jehoshafat to laukei, “Ngei ngo lolo Choba dogo ashentila shanga ngeibü hele jeilabü hoba lason to atlabü, lausikei nyije kaibü hele leashi.” Hobaje Israel Chobaei hao lolo ashentila hele jeian lason to haukei.
Tou Siriabü Chobaei haoeibü kailong sepai lajamleibü khujinto nyi la ngühkhüm kuko laukei, “Israelbü Choba che to limbo yaangbü ayingsi hanbü che to ongkei tewapyo.”
Hobaje ladang sepai lakjaibü shuongei Jehoshafat hapbei haoenei laukei, “Maimaitham ho Israel Choba.” Hobaje haoenei hao khulimbo wapyola meimeikei. Hobaje Jehoshafatei ngekkei.
Ladang sepai lakjaibü shuongei ho Israel Choba aying dogo ngejung loukei, haoenei hao shijung haubü nangan longeikei.

Hobaje Siriabü sepai cheei laujin kipan litikei hoba Israel Choba la khükhom phanga haukei hoba haoei koli kailong leibou to laukei, “Sepeiashi hoba ngo shuong yo ka leilangashi; aieilausi ngo aeibou amaiko leilua!”
Hobaje khünyet chalou kho lashuok kaangan kikei hoba haoeibü koli kailong Siriabü ae yeian kikei, hoba kailong phang pendou hao ka longbü siiei shenkei hoba Choba kho chasemlamto haikei.
Hobaje chanyu neplamto sepai shuong kishang pendou ae ngühlang hai phinthonkei, “Mütpem weko jembü kaonyek to jembü sang to linashi!”
Hibü haoen Samaria to louan Chobaeibü mang Samariaa khünkei.
Hobaje haoenei koli kailong kho Samariaa kibü thimdeia sakkei (ho suonlambü shuong mangyushang thimdei kikei), hoba
Tou Ahabeibü lubü kümsilei hoba haoei kümbü hoba namsek chem laobou haoei kümbei, hoba sangnyu laobou ong haoei kümbei, Israelbü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü lea khübü kho doan aki lo?
Hibü Ahab Choba haoeibü bousi shuong yoa yepbei hoba haoshou Ahaziaei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Hobaje Israel Choba Ahabei po lei boubü songdakbü jiha Asaeibü shou Jehoshafatei Jihuda thüka songdakkei.
Jehoshafatei ladang songdakla khangkei hao po khujinto ngao jai kikei, hoba haonyu nyen Shilhieibü shou Azuba kikei.
Hobaje haoei haobou Asa lama paikei, hoba
Hobaje Jehoshafatei Israel Choba to sangmai kümbei.
Tou Jehoshafateibü joubü kümsilei hoba haoei lenbü hau, hoba haoei lai wapyokei khübü kho Jihudabü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo?
Hobaje bousu pejapelabü shuong joubü laobou haobou Asa chaloua kikei khübü kho haoei kaonyek ka mautikei.
Hobaje Edoma Choba akitei, Jihuda Chobaei pienbü jeibü cheei ong songdakkei.
Ofir to hon sungla haula shanga Jehoshafatei Tarshish longchem kümbei. Lausikei long- chem shuong Eziongebera leiluan apsi ohau.
Kheijinei Ahabeibü shou Ahaziaei Jehoshafat to laukei, “Ngeibü khangenbü shuong kaibü khangenbü shuong yoa hautishi.” Lausikei Jehoshafatei maangüang.
Jehoshafat haikei hoba haobou Dawid sangnyua hao khünkei, hoba haoshou Jehoramei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Jihudabü Choba Jehoshafatei po anthük nyet boubü songdakbü haanga Samariaa Israel thüka Ahabeibü shou Ahaziaei songdakla khangkei.
Hobaje
Hobaje haoei Baal khangenkei, hoba hao to lembei; hoba bouei kümbü pendou kümbo Israel Mühghaü
Tou Ahab haian phaia, Moabei Israel khulimbo meimeikei.

Hobaje Ahazia, Samariaa hao chemlip thükkabou chemso ka atetkei hoba leiluan shatko kikei; hoba haoei ngühlang künbü shuong hautiko haoen to laukei, “Hauashi, Ekron kabü mühghaü Baalzebub to ngo ho shat ka mailasi amaila pheshi.”
Lausikei
Tou khei yingsije
Hobaje ngühlang künbü shuong hao jungto longeikei, hoba haoei haoen to laukei, “Kan aila longeikei?”
Hobaje haoenei hao to laukei, “Müt che kün to haüyola longkei, hoba haoei kün to laukei, ‘Hauashi, kan hautibou Choba jungto nyibou ngaiashi, hoba hao to lenshi,
Hobaje haoei haoen to laukei, “Kan to haüyola longbou kho ai tegübü müt?”
Hobaje haoenei hao to jongaikei, “Hao winei lebü müt hoba shenjanga phekhonei kaiakei.” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Kho Tishbibü Elija!”

Kheijinei Choba müt anjinsem thüka leiyeibou che hao phainei müt anjinsem thonan hautikei. Hobaje hao shonghkhua setan kibou Elija jungto haukei, hoba hao to laukei, “O Mühghaü müt, Chobaei no, ‘Kaiyena’ dogo lauda.”

Hobaje Elijaei anjinsem thüka leiyeibou to laukei, “Ngo Mühghaü müt che yinga longa, müh ka wan lotan no hoba kaibü müt anjinsem kho nashemti!” Hobaje müh ka wan lotkei hoba hao yoa müt anjinsem kho juoketkei.
Hobaje nyibou haoei anjinsem thüka leiyeibou lubü müt anjinsem thonan hautikei. Hobaje hao angkei hoba hao to laukei, “O Mühghaü müt, Chobaei ngühkhüm kuko lauda, ‘Tongde kaiyena!’ ”

Lausikei Elijaei haoen to jongaikei, “Ngo Mühghaü müt che yinga longa, müh ka wan lotashi, hoba no hoba kaibü müt anjinsem kho nashemti!” Hobaje müh ka Mühghaü wan lotkei hoba müt anjinsem kho juoketkei.

Tokei anjinsem thüka lei- yeibou semboubü müt anjinsem thonan hautikei. Hobaje anjinsem thüka leiyeibou semboubü kho angkei, hoba Elija thedanga youkükei khüpetan hao to sukojako laukei, “O Mühghaü müt, ngei ka to sudajada, ngeibü langkei hoba no khangenbü habü müt anjinsem langkei ka thedanga namsek yingshima!
Chühashi, müh ka wan lotkei hoba müt anjinsem thükto shaangbü lajamleibü müt nyi yoa anjinsem bang khokei yoan shema; lausikei touje ngeibü langkei ka thedanga phokeikaima!”
Hobaje
Hobaje haoei hao to laukei, “
Hibü Elijaei laubü
Tou Ahaziaeibü joubü kümsilei laobou haoei kümbei, Israel Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü lea habü ho doan aki lo?
Hobaje ladang
Hobaje Elijaei Elisha to laukei, “Sanoudaman no hanei kiteiashi, aieilausi
Hobaje Bethela kibü thuseibü shousi shuong Elisha jungto loukei, hoba hao to laukei, “
Kheijinei Elijaei hao to laukei, “Elisha, sanoudaman no hanei kiteiashi, aieilausi
Hobaje Jerikhoa kibü thuseibü shousi shuong Elisha jungto loukei hoba hao to laukei, “
Kheijinei Elijaei laukei, “Sanoudambo no hanei kiteiashi, aieilausi
Hobaje thuseibü shousi shuong müt anjinsem haukei hoba haoen ae yeian heeko lokei hoba haosi Jordana lokei.
Hobaje Elijaei jembü neisimei sungjung louan kho tukei hoba dei to ngümbei hoba haoen ji ji to linkei, khoei haosi ham kao ulangbüa haukei.

Hobaje haosi danjung longan phaia Elijaei Elisha to laukei, “Ngo ka jungka alangjinei ngei ka shanga ai kümtimang sühda pheashi.” Hobaje Elishaei laukei, “Ngei ka to sudajada, kaibü soushou phejan penyi thüng kü to kitishima.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Nyi sekbü che phea; khei yingasikei ngo ka ka langjinei nyi ngo hapalonga no kho tegü yinglabü; lausikei ühüpoulonga kho khei ayinglabü.”
Haosi kho tegü joyoko haujinei, chühashi, waneibü kailong hoba waneibü koli shuong longan haosi ham lulu bangtikei hoba Elija Mühghaü yeishikei khuthük to anlangkei.
Hobaje Elishaei kho hapbei hoba haoei ngekkei, “Abou, abou!. Israelbüeibü koli kailong hoba khonei setbü shuong!” Hobaje haoei touje ühüpbo apbei.
Kheijinei haoei jembü neia jungkei hoba penyi la yeiko jitnyinkei.
Haoei tokei Elijaeibü neisimei hao ka atbü hejung loukei hoba ngaikei, hoba Jordan shumanga lokei.
Hobaje Elija ka atbü neisimei haoei lekei hoba dei to ngümbei hoba laukei, “

Hobaje ladang hao thedanga Jerikhoa kibü thuseibü shousi shuongei hao hapbei, haoenei laukei, “Elijaeibü soushou Elisha thüka kia!” Hobaje haoen hao shuokla loukei, hoba hao thedanga haoen lolo kaoa khüpetkei.
Hobaje haoenei hao to laukei, “Tou chühashi, no khangenbü shuong yoa hau kibü müt anjinsem ki, sanoudaman haoen hautiashi hoba kaibü bunyubou lamtiashi; ai ngenyu,
Lausikei hao himou abaushongko haoenei hao thungeikei, hibü haoei laukei, “Hautiashi.” Yingsije haoenei müt anjinsem hautikei hoba haoenei hao chalou semnyet lambei, lausikei ühüp.
Hobaje hao Jerikhoa kijinei haoen hao jungto sepeijung longeikei, hoba haoei haoen to laukei, “Ngei kan to tohau dogo alen si?”
Kheijinei sangnyu kabü mütshuongei Elisha to laukei, “Chühashi, künei ka to sudajada, ngeibü bunyubouei hapbü tegü sangnyu kho kaoen maibü, lausikei deikhün amai hoba kaoei buhek ahekkuda.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Kü jungto dei thamchak che sungba, hoba khonei jem jinashi.” Hobaje haoenei kho hao jungto sungbakei.
Hobaje hao deikhün to haukei, hoba khonei jem jinkukei hoba laukei, “
Hibü tat sühko Elishaei laubü tegütham dei kho maian kia.
Hobaje khüka hao Bethel to angkei, hoba hao lama angko kijinei nashou hanbü shuong hao shuokla loukei hoba hao la nyikukei hoba hao to laukei, “Angashi, no khüngkhebou! Angashi, no khüngkhebou!”
Hobaje haoei hao phaito chühkei hoba haoen hapbei, hoba
Hobaje khüka hao Karmel shongh to haukei, hoba khüka hao Samaria to ngaikei.
Jihudabü Choba Jehoshafat po anthükset boubüa, Sama- riaa Israel thüka Ahabeibü shou Jehoramei songdakla khangkei hoba po anthüknyi songdakkei.
Haoeikei
Khei yingasikei haoei hao the kabü Nebat shou Jeroboam shabü to apetkei; hoba haoei Israel la shabü shontikei hoba kho ka hao abangen.
Tou Moabbü Choba Mesha sanlon sambü che kikei, hoba haoei Israel Choba la sanlon shoushou hajar saongao hoba sanlon paang hajar saongao wi yoan kukei.
Lausikei ladang Ahab haikei, Moabbü Chobaei Israel khulimbo meimeikei.
Hobaje kho jiha Jehoram Choba Samaria ka haukei, hoba Israelbü pendou leishaitikei.

Hobaje hao haukei hoba Jihudabü Choba Jehoshafat jungto hautiko laukei, “Moabbü Chobaei kü khu limbo meimeia, no kü yoa Moab khulimbo lason to hauasao?” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ngo anglabü, no ai yingkeije ngokei kho ki; ngeibü mütli kaibü mütli shuong tegü, ngeibü koli kaibü koli shuong tegü ki.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Laobou lam to sen angla?” Hobaje Joramei jongaikei, “Edom yamlamang to.”
Hibü Israel Choba si Jihuda Choba, hoba Edombü Choba haukei, hoba haoen chalou nyet nyet kaiko paikei; hoba sepai dan shanga hoba haoen phai sembü meisiau shanga dei akitei.
Hobaje Israel Chobaei laukei, “Ügütü! Aieilausi
Lausikei Jehoshafatei laukei, “
Hobaje Jehoshafatei laukei, “
Hobaje Elishaei Israel Choba to laukei, “Ngei ka yoa ai kümla ki? Kabou si kanyueibü thuseibü jungto hauashi.”
Hobaje Israel Chobaei laukei, “Aying, habü Choba sem ho Moabbü Choba ik to kula
Hobaje Elishaei laukei, “Maimaitham Thükenbou
Lausikei tou kü jungto chia laubü che leiba.” Hobaje ladang chia laubouei kongkin tokkei,
Hobaje haoei laukei, “
Aishanga
Hobaje

Hobaje kanei laang ba lebü sang khümbo hoba pienan phobü sangnyu khümbo shian aplabü hoba buhek maibü kibü khümbo chengan koutilabü, hoba deikük pendou thaklabü hoba kaomai hansho kibü pendou laangei leilutilabü.”
Hobaje ngeyang lemla kubü jihsiphaia, chühashi, Edom lam nyangko to dei loukei, hoba deiei kaonyek nyakkei.
Tou ladang Moabbü pendouei haoen khulimbo Choba shuong wapyola louakei dogo ditkei, haoen lolo injung thükbü ka thükae liko yoshaikei hoba thi leilanga lokei.
Hobaje haoen ngeyang enyu pikei hoba chanyuei dei thüka haukei hoba Moabbüei haoen thedanga dei kho sii tegü saklangtham hapbei.
Hobaje haoenei laukei, “Kho sii yinga; maimaitham Choba shuong liko wapyoa, hoba haoen mütpem wekoei lulueibü jenabou haitia. Hibü tou peisilei to ik shatashi!”

Hobaje ladang haoen Israelbü shaishang to loukei, Israelbü shuong meimeikei hoba Moabbü to wapyokei, hibü haoen haoen thedang ka linjung satkei; hoba haoen thedang to Moab yoa haoen haitijung khüto atkei.

Hobaje haoenei sangnyu shuong leilukukei, hoba kaomai hansho kibü yoan haoenei mütpem wekoei luluei jungbü laang sonan jinkukei hoba kho shentikei; hoba haoenei deikük pendou thaktikukei, hoba bulong maibü chengan koutikei, hoba Kir-haresetha ong laang joutian phokukei; khei yingasikei laanglao jungbü shuongei kho shijung haukei hoba khüto wapyokei.
Hobaje ladang Moabbü Chobaei hao shanga lason aeibou amaiko hapbei, kheijinei in shoubü müt saongao nyet, Edombü Choba jungto nujung atla leian haukei, lausikei haoei athüklang.

Kheijinei hao jeiko songdakla kibou hao shou jaishoubou haoei leibakei hoba Moabbü mühghaü la juokbü lembü kukei. Hobaje Israel khulimbo maangshat yaang lotkei hoba haoen hao jungka bangkei hoba jembü kaodak to ngaikei.
Tou thuseibü shuongeibü shousieibü yaksi yoa cheei Elisha to laukei, “No khangenbou kü lao haia hoba no khangenbouei
Hobaje Elishaei sao to laukei, “Ka shanga ngei ai kümla? Kü la lenbü ma. Kaibü chema ai ki?” Hobaje saoei laukei, “Onang thungdou che to liman kaibü samnyu chema ai aki.”
Kheijinei haoei laukei, “Hauashi, kaibü lepbü shuong pendou ka, thungdou shuong, khei thungdou kongnyu shijo ongje ayingko lotshaiashi.”
“Kheijinei no hoba ka shousi shuong chemmaang to atashi hoba kou khinngailangashi; hoba khübü thungdou pendoua yeian jinashi; hoba shenbü phai nyi sungan phoko leshi.”
Hibü hao jungka sao haukei hoba sao hoba saoeibü shousi shuong kou khinngailangkei; hoba haoenei sao jungto thungdou sungbakei hoba saoei yeian jinkukei.
Hobaje ladang thungdou shuong kho shenkei, saoei shou to laukei, “Tokei kü jungto thungdou che sungba.” Hobaje haoei sao to laukei, “Touje thungdou khüma.” Hobaje onang lotbü thakkei.
Kheijinei sao hauan Elisha thuseibou to lenkei hoba haoei laukei, “Hauashi, hoba onang kho yaakashi, hoba kaibü sangh shemashi; hoba joubü thüka no hoba ka shousi shuong lang kishi.”
Hobaje nyetche keibü sao che kishang danko Shunam to Elisha haukei, hoba saoei Elisha to shaulayungla sukeijakei. Hobaje ho tegü kikei, khei hao ladüngnei dankeiphaikei haoei khünei shaukei yungkei.
Hobaje saoei lao to laukei, “Tou chühashi, sen nyangko athakko danbou ho Mühghaüeibü saopobü müt che dogo ngei chühenda.

Setije shemjang hanbü che küm thangan kümbho, hoba khünei hao shanga shen che, khümsok che, setshang che, hoba wanthung denshang che phokukho, hoba ladang ong hao sen jungto loulaje hao khüto atlabü.”
Nyetche chalou hao khüto loukei hoba shemjang to atkei, hoba khünei haksokei.
Hobaje haoei haoeibü sambü Gehazi to laukei, “Shunam sao kho ngaashi.” Hobaje ladang haoei sao kho ngabakei, hao thedanga sao lokei.

Hobaje haoei Gehazi to laukei, “Tou sao to lenshi, chühashi, nyi kün shanga nongnaeko ho khonsak pendou lea. Ka shanga ai kümla? Ka shangabü Choba ayingsi sepai leiyeibü to denche lentimang sühdalao?” Hobaje saoei jongaikei, “Ngo kü mütli yoa khambü pendou kia.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Khülonga sao shanga ai khamla?” Hobaje Gehaziei jongaikei, “Maimaitham saoei bousushou aki, hoba saoeibü lao baushi sina.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Sao ngaashi.” Hobaje ladang sao ngabakei, sao koukhüna lokei.
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ho tegübü jih ladang nyibou lousühlaje, nyi bousushou che baman kiteilabü.” Hobaje saoei laukei, “Aying, ngeibü bunyubou, no Mühghaü müt, kaibü sambüsao to teye- peima!”
Hobaje yaksanyu kho mang akongko apbei hoba Elishaei sao to lenbü tegü, nyibou po ladang kho jih sühkei, saoei bousushou che bukkei.
Nashou kho chingan phaia hao nyetche hao bou jungto youlatbü shuong yoto koukei.
Hobaje haoei bou to laukei, “Ngeibü khu, ngeibü khu!” Hobaje hao bouei sambü che to laukei, “Hao haonyu jungto leian hau- ashi.”
Hobaje ladang hao leian haukei, hao chajihbou sühko haonyueibü youshia setkei hoba hao haikei.
Hobaje sao angkei hoba Mühghaü müteibü shena hao lengtian phokei hoba kou kapbuan satkei.
Hobaje saoei lao ngaan laukei, “Sanoudambo Mühghaü müt jungto ngo tongde hauan longeila kü la sambü yoka müt che gadu che yoan hautibü.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Aila no tat haula? Ho lit haanbü ayingsi Nounyetkei aying.” Hobaje saoei laukei, “Ai aying, mailabü.”
Kheijinei sao gadu chenei setkei hoba saoeibü sambü to laukei, “Hali koashi, ngei ka la alen shongko maangyangsho tepaiti.”
Hibü sao haukei hoba Mühghaü müt jungto Karmel shongh to loukei.
Ladang Mühghaü mütei sao heebüa hapbei, haoei haoeibü sambü Gehazi to laukei, “Chühashi, khünei Shunam sao kho kia.
Sanoudambo tou shuokla laangjung haushi, hoba sao to laushi, ‘No maisho kia lo? Kaibü lao maisho kiakouba lo? Na maisho kia lo?’ ” Hobaje saoei jongaikei, “Maisho kia.”

Hobaje ladang sao shongh to Mühghaü müt jungto loukei, saoei haoeibü youa hatkei. Hobaje Gehaziei sao nangan apla nyangko loukei, lausikei Mühghaü mütei laukei, “Sao khei ong phokushi, aieilausi saoeibü soushou maanga maangngangko kia, hoba
Kheijinei saoei laukei, “Ngeibü bunyubou to ngei bousushou che hikei sai? Ngo tehuonetti dogo ngei alau lo?”

Kheijinei haoei Gehazi to laukei, “Kaibü shembe kaiashi, hoba kaibü ika ngeibü julo jungashi, hoba kaibü lamnyu to hauashi, nyi müt at haüyosi hao la salem teku; hoba müt atei ka la salem kusi hao to tejongai, hoba ngeibü julo naeibü thenyeka lengtian phoshi.”
Hobaje naeibü nyuei laukei, “
Hobaje Gehazi haoen thedang to haukei, hoba naeibü thenyeka julo kho lengtian phokukei; lausikei ngüh ayingsi jongaibü akitei. Hibü hao to haüyola hao ngaikei hoba laukei, “Na kho apida.”
Hobaje ladang Elisha chem to lotkei, chühashi, nashou kho haian shena lengtian kikei.
Hibü hao maang to atkei, hoba haosi ham khinlepbei, hoba

Hobaje hao ngaikei hoba nashou thüka shingetnyu yepbei hoba haoeibü sembunga haoeibü sembung hoba haoeibü nyeka haoeibü nyek, hoba haoeibü ika haoeibü ik phokei; hoba haoei hao lolo na thüka shingetkei hoba na kho phe lematham apbei.
Kho phaia longeikei hoba chema che hau longei dogo paikei hoba hao thüka shingetnyu yepbei, hoba nashou khoei nyetnei hatshi shikei, hoba na kho nyek longkei.
Hobaje haoei Gehazi ngakei, hoba laukei, “Shunambü kho ngaashi!” Hibü haoei sao ngakei. Hobaje ladang sao hao jungto lotkei, haoei laukei, “Ka shou leian sungashi.”
Kheijinei sao atkei hoba hao junga sao kao to yanan khüpetkei, hoba saoei saoeibü shou leian sungkei hoba satkei.

Hobaje Elisha nyibou Gilgal to loukei, hoba kaonyeka mühsinou kikei, hoba thuseibü shousi shuong hao thedanga setan kikei, hoba haoei haoeibü sambü to laukei, “Thuseibü shousi shuong shanga chak yaangbü hangashi hoba shikdei laiashi.”

Hobaje müt che sek to shiksilei lamla koukei hoba yamkabü semlüh long che hapbei hoba khoka ambok neimok che shenko laman kheipakei hoba shikdei laibü chaka khübü kho yeman thungkei; aieilausi haoenei khübü kho ai yingkeije ange.
Hibü mütshuongei khübü kho shaula hakletkei, lausikei haoenei shik kho shaujinei haoenei ngekko laukei, “O Mühghaü müt, shikchaka haibü kia!” Hobaje haoenei kho ashauen.

Lausikei haoei laukei, “Khülonga nyak hansho sungba” Hobaje haoei kho chaka jinkukei hoba laukei, “Mütshuong shanga haoenei shaula hakletashi.” Hobaje khünei shikchaka haoenei shaula amaibü ai akitei.

Hobaje Baal Shalishabü müt che loukei, hoba Mühghaü müt la shaangbü buhek, barli wentek saoche hoba hangi paksilengko haoeibü neimoka sungbakei. Hobaje Elishaei laukei, “Mütshuong la haoenei shaula kuashi.”
Hobaje hao khangenbouei laukei, “Ailai, ngei ho müt saongao thüka phokula?” Lausikei haoei laukei, “Mütshuong la haoenei shaula kuashi, aieilausi
Hibü haoei haoen thedanga phokukei hoba haoenei kho shaukei hoba
Tou Naaman, Siria Chobaeibü sepai tan thüka lajamleibou, haoeibü bunyubou thedanga aeibou yaangbü hoba nyensang nyenhang hapbü müt che kikei; aieilausi hao danko
Hobaje Siriabü tan shoongjung haujinei Israel kaodak ka yaksa nashou che lang senjung loukei, hoba saoei Naamaneibü yak khangenkei.
Hobaje saoei saoeibü jembünyu to laukei, “Samariaa kibü thuseibü yoa ong ngeibü bunyubou kei kitimang sühnyu! Khünei haoei haoeibü im maitikulabü.”
Hobaje müt che haoeibü bunyubou jungto haukei hoba Israel ka loubü yaksa nashouei ai laukei kho hao la lenkei.
Hobaje Siriabü Chobaei laukei, “Tou hauashi, hoba ngei Israel Choba jungto le che hautikulabü.”
Hibü Naaman haukei, hoba hao yoa neisimei yoa chandinam thamchak an, hon shekel hajar lak hoba neisimei shangtüngbü an künan haukei.
Hobaje haoei Israelbü Choba jungto le kho jungan loukei hoba laukei, “Ladang ho le ka jungto loulaje chühashi, ngei ngo khangenbou Naaman, nyi haoeibü im maitila ka jungto hautikei dogo ngeashi.”

Hobaje ladang Israelbü Chobaei le kho wekei, haoei jembü neisimei jitnyinkei hoba laukei, “Haitila hoba lang kitila ngo mühghaü sai? Khei im baubü müt maitila kü jungto hautida lo? Lausikei daman chühashi, khei haoei lai kü to ngühsak nepla lamda, chühashi!”

Lausikei ladang Mühghaü müt Elishaei Israel Chobaei haoeibü neisimei jitnyinbü ditkei, haoei Choba jungto ngühlang hautiko laukei, “Aila nyi kaibü neisimei jitnyinkei? Hao kü jungto loutiashi, hoba Israela thuseibou che kia dogo haoei ngelabü!”
Hibü Naaman haoeibü koli hoba kailong yoa haukei, hoba Elishaeibü koukhüna lokei.
Hibü Elishaei ngühlang künbü hautiko laukei, “Hauashi, hoba Jordana nyetnei sakashi hoba kaibü phe nyibou chingngailabü hoba hinseilabü.”
Lausikei Naaman khauangko satkei hoba laukei, “Chühashi, hao tükde kü jungto longan lolabü, hoba
Israelbü dei pendou tokei Damaska shumang shuong Apana si Farpar maibou aying lo? Ngei khübüa saklabü hoba hinseian akilep lo?” Hibü hao sepeian khauangko satkei.

Hobaje haoeibü khangenbü shuong nyangko louan hao to laukei, “Abou, thuseibouei ka to kümsilei yaangbü kümla sakkusi nyi kho akümbo kilep lo? Yingsije ‘Sakashi, hoba hinseian kishi’ dogo laubü kho lai?”
Hibü Naaman yankei hoba Mühghaü mütei laubü tegü hao lolo Jordana nyetnei shembei; hoba haoeibü phe nashou hanbü phe tegü nyibou yeikei, hoba hinseian apbei.

Hobaje hao Mühghaü müt jungto ngaikei, hao hoba haoeibü mütshuong hao thedanga loan laukei, “Tou chühashi, ngei ngea, Israel to liman kaodak pendoua lubü Mühghaü aki; hibü tou sanoudambo kaibü samboueibü jongsak leashi.”
Lausikei haoei laukei, “
Hobaje Naamanei laukei, “Khei ayinglonga ngei ka to sudajada no khangenbou la gadu penyi manko tham künlangtikai; aieilausi no khangenbouei
Ho kümaleia
Hobaje Elishaei laukei, “Haksoa hauashi.” Hibü hao hao jungka longche bangjung satkei.
Lausikei Mühghaü müt Elishaeibü khangenbou Gehaziei hao lolo laukei, “Chühashi, ngeibü bunyubouei ho Siriabou Naamaneibü ik ka haoei sungbabü asungletko ngaitia.
Hibü Gehaziei Naaman phai sembei. Hobaje ladang Naamanei hao phaito müt laangjung loubü hapbei, hao kailong ka louyenkei hoba laukei, “Pendou maisho kiakouba lo?”
Hobaje Gehaziei laukei, “Pendou maisho kia. Ngeibü

Hobaje Naamanei laukei, “He, tükde, nam chandinam thamchak penyi kho sungashi.” Hibü haoei thungeiko neisimei jeiyolabü tang penyi yoa chandinam thamchak penyi neimoka shokukei hoba khübü kho haoeibü sambü la küntian Gehazi thedangto hautikei.
Hobaje ladang hao shongh to loukei, haoei khübü kho haoeibü ik ka sungletkei hoba khübü kho chema küpjeman phokei, hoba haoei mütshuong kho ngaitikei.
Lausikei hao chem to atkei hoba haoeibü bunyubou thedanga lokei. Hobaje Elishaei hao to laukei, “Gehazi, no lae ka louda?” Hobaje haoei laukei, “No khangenbou laetokei ohau.”

Hobaje haoei hao to laukei, “Müt kho ka to haüyola haoeibü kailong ka nyibou sepeijinei kü soushou ka yoa ohau lo? Nam si neisimei sungletla hoba oliv bamang hoba semlühlaak, sanlon hoba masu, sambü, sambüsao sungletla ho jihsiphai sai?
Hibü Naamaneibü im kho ka to hoba kaibü lilabü to ponpen shanga kilabü.” Kheijinei hao Elisha jungka imthu bauan satkei.
Tou thuseibü shousi shuongei Elisha to laukei, “Tou chüh- ashi, ka phanga kün shanga kün kishang aeibou nyunyeman kia!
Tou kün Jordan to haukho hoba khüka mütpem wekoei pangkhüm che bang sungkho hoba kün kila thüklabü lele kün shanga khünei künei kishang che kümbho.” Hobaje haoei jongaikei, “Kan hauashi.”
Hobaje haoen yoa cheei laukei, “Sanoudaman no khangenbü shuong yoto haula maangangshima.” Hobaje haoei jongaikei, “Ngo haulabü.”
Hibü hao haoen yoa haukei. Hobaje haoen Jordan to louan bu akkei.
Lausikei cheei ngekkei, “Ügütü, ngeibü
Hobaje Mühghaü müt khoei laukei, “Lanei atkei?” Hobaje haoei hao la kaoen lenkei. Hobaje haoei julou che wapan sungan khoto attikei, hoba wou kho deia phongentikei.
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Nyi kho sungenashi.” Hibü haoei haoeibü ik shingan kho sungkei.
Tou Siriabü Chobaei Israelbü khulimbo wapyoko kikei, hoba haoei haoeibü khangenbü shuong to ngühsong wanyoan laukei, “Ho tegü, ho tegübü kaoena ngeibü kishang kilabü.”
Hobaje Mühghaü mütei Israelbü Choba jungto hautiko laukei, “Ho tegübü kaoen to adanla maangsangashi, aieilausi khüto Siriabü louyanada.”
Hobaje Mühghaü mütei maangsangla lenbü kaoen khüto Israel Chobaei hautikei, hoba hao khünei che nyinei ong ayingko khümenkei.
Tou Siria Chobaeibü maang- pon kho kümsilei shangabü aeibou khonkukei. Hobaje haoei hao khangenbü shuong ngakei hoba haoen to laukei, “Sen yoa ao Israelbü Choba shanga ki kanei kü la alenlep lo?”
Hobaje hao khangenbü shuong yoa cheei hao to laukei, “Ao aki, ngeibü bunyubou, O Choba; lausikei Israela kibü thuseibou Elishaei kaibü yepshang poba joyobü ngüh shuong Israel Choba la lenda.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ngei hautian hao lapoulabü lele hao lan kije hauashi hoba chühashi.” Hobaje kho hao la ngetiko laukei, “Chühashi, hao Dothana kia.”
Khei yingsije haoei khüto koli, kailong hoba sepai tan yaangbü che hautikei hoba haoen nangnak loukei hoba sangnyu kailepbei.

Hobaje ladang Mühghaü müt khangenbou kho enyu pikei, hoba haukei, chühashi, koli si kailong yoa sepai shuongei sangnyu kaijeman kikei. Hobaje hao khangenbouei hao to laukei, “Ügütü, ngeibü bunyubou! Seti lai kümla?”
Haoei jongaikei, “Tehüt, aieilausi aoyou sen yoa ki, khübü kho haoen yoa kibü tokei juongbou ki.”
Kheijinei Elishaei welaukei hoba laukei, “
Hobaje ladang haoen hao jungto louyankei, Elishaei
Kheijinei Elishaei haoen to laukei, “Ho lamnyu aying, ho sangnyu khokei aying, kü phai semashi, hoba kanei lambü müt jungto ngei kan leian haulabü.” Hobaje haoei haoen Samaria to leian haukei.
Hobaje ladang haoen Samaria to loukei, Elishaei laukei, “
Hobaje haoei ladang Israel Chobaei haoen hapbei, haoei Elisha to laukei, “Ngei haoen haitikho no abou? Ngei haoen haitikho no?”

Hobaje haoei jongaikei, “Tou! Kaibü in si laujinei nyi aoyou thüngbou la ayeiti, haoen nyi haitilep lo? Haoen shauan yungan haoeneibü Choba jungto ngaitila shanga haoen thedanga wentek si dei phokuashi.”
Hobaje haoen shanga haoei lem yaangbü che lamlekei hoba haoen shauan yungan haoeneibü Choba jungto ngaikei. Khünyet ka jaüan Siriabü shuong Israel kaodak to sangshila alot.
Hobaje kho phaia Siriabü Choba Benhadadei haoeibü sepai shuong pendou leishaikei hoba angkei, hoba Samaria komlepbei.

Hobaje Samariaa mühsinou yaang longkei, hoba gadueibü khulo chenei chandinam shekel saolei lu hoba dukutuk phet thungdak phejan lei la janan chenei chandinam shekel ngao lu ayaak shongko athakko haoenei kho komlepan kikei.
Hobaje Israelbü Choba ba nyangko danjung haujinei khünei yaksa cheei hao to ngekko laukei, “Thuiashi, ngeibü bunyubou, O Choba!”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “
Hobaje Chobaei sao to phekei, “No aiei khonkuda?” Hobaje saoei jongaikei, “Yaksanyu khoei kü to laukei, ‘Tat senei shaula kashou kuashi, hoba ngiet senei küneibü shou shaulabü.’
Hibü künei küshou thungkei hoba shaukei; hoba ngei sao to nyibounyet laukei, ‘Hao senei shaulabü lele kaibü shou kuashi;’ lausikei saoei jembü shou huan apbei!”
Ladang Chobaei yaksanyueibü ngüh khübü kho ditkei, haoei haoeibü nei jitnyinkei (tou hao ba nyangko danjung hauko kikei) hoba mütshuongei chühko kisi maang aenei haoeibü manga senounei kikei.
Kheijinei haoei laukei, “Shafateibü shou Elishaeibü khu tat hao to thonan kia longa Mühghaüei kü to kho tegü, hoba amaibou kümshima!”

Tou Elisha haoeibü chema jaishou shuong yoa setan kikei, hoba Chobaei hao jungka ngühlang künbü che hautikei; lausikei ngühlang künbou hao jungto aloutoua, haoei jaishou shuong to laukei, “Müt haitiboueibü shou hoei lai ngeibü khu langla hautian ki kho kanei hapdalao? Pialemashi, ladang ngühlang künbou loulaje, kou kapashi, hao thedangto kou kapngailangshi; haoeibü bunyubou paibü youlangh hao phainei aki lo?”
Hobaje tokei haoei haoen to joyoko kijinei chühashi, ngühlang künbou hao jungto louyenkei. Hobaje Chobaei laukei, “Chühashi, ho khonsak
Kheijinei Elishaei laukei, “Kanei
Kheijinei Chobaeibü leiyeibü lajamleibou, aoeibü ika Choba nongan kikei, haoei Mühghaü müt to laukei, “Chühashi,
Tou sangnyu bakhün to atlabü koukhüna imbü müt lei kikei, hoba haoen cheei che to laukei, “Aila sen ühaishongko hanei setla?

Sen sangnyu khüto haukho lausi khünei sangnyua mühsinou kia, hoba sen khünei hailabü; hoba sen tokei hanei setkho lausi tokei sen hailabü. Hibü tou khei yingsije kaiya, hoba Siriabü sepai dan yoto atkho; haoenei seneibü langkei khümena longa sen langkei kilabü, hoba haoenei sen haitia longa sen hai ong hailabü.”
Hobaje Siriabü shaishang to haula haoen langnge saoko meimeikei hoba ladang haoen Siriabü shaishang nyangko loukei, chühashi, khünei müt ao akitei.
Aieilausi
Hibü haoen pikei hoba langnge saoko kijinei satkei hoba haoeneibü neichem, haoeneibü koli, hoba haoeneibü gadu, khei shaishang lai kikei khoyam apyokei hoba haoen khu langpangteiko satkei.

Hobaje ladang imbü shuong kho shaishang nyangko loukei, haoen neichem che to atkei, hoba shaukei yungkei; hoba khüka chandinam si hon hoba neisimei sungkei hoba hauan kho huan phokei, hoba haoen longeikei, hoba neichem lubü che to atkei, hoba khokakei sungkei, hoba hauan khokei huan phokei.

Kheijinei haoen cheei che to laukei, “Senei janbü akümda. Tatbü chalou ho ngühlang maibü chalou che ki, lausikei sen ngüh üangko kida; sen ngeyang lang ngeko haiteia longa, kayangei sen laphetlabü; hibü tou kaiya, sen haukho hoba Chobaeibü chema ngühlang kukho.”

Hibü haoen louan sangnyu bakhün lombü shuong ngakei, hoba haoenei haoen to laukei: “Kün Siriabü shaishang to loukei, hoba chühashi, khünei müt che ongkei ayingsi müteibü ngüh aikei aki, lausikei koli si gadu shuong ong phenphen phoan hoba neichemkei khoyam ong kiteikei.”
Kheijinei bakou lombü danei pühnyinkei, hoba kho Choba chema ngühlang kukei.

Hobaje nangnak Choba pikei, hoba haoeibü khangenbü shuong to laukei, “Tou ngei kan la Siriabüei ai kümbei lenkho! Sen mühda dogo haoenei ngekei, hibü ladang haoen sangnyu ka longlaje senei haoen lang laplabü hoba sen sangnyu to atlabü dogo daman haoen shaishang ka haoen lolo hula khongthu to haukei.”

Hobaje haoeibü khangenbü yoa cheei jongaiko laukei, “Ngei ka to sudajada, sangnyua joutian phokubü koli shuong ka pemngao müt at la sungtiashi. Chühashi, hanei jouan kibü Israelbü tan pendou tegü haoen kia; haü, maubü Israelbü tan pendou tegü haoen ki. Hibü senei hautikho hoba ai yingkeije chühkho.”
Hibü haoenei kailong penyi koli shuong thonan sungbakei, hoba Chobaei Siriabü sepai phaito hautiko laukei, “Hauashi, hoba chühashi”

Hobaje haoen phaito haoen Jordan to haukei, hobaje chühashi, lam sünga Siriabüei haoen panteiko satjinei apbü neisimei hoba insiaubuei shenan kikei. Hobaje ngühlang künbü shuong longeikei hoba Choba to lenkei.
Kheijinei mütshuong longkei hoba Siriabü shaishang to soyoko nuyokei. Hibü wennet taksi che shekel che lu hoba barli taksi penyi shekel che lu,

Hobaje lajamleibou, aoeibü ika Choba nongan kikei, hao bakhün lomla haoei pienkei; hoba mütshuongei hao thüka bakhüna youei nakeiko paikei, hoba Mühghaü müt aoei Choba hao jungto louyenjinei joyokei, haoei laubü tegü hao haikei.
Aishanga ladang Mühghaü mütei Choba to, “Ngiet ho jihsiphaia barli taksi penyi shekel che lu hoba wennet taksi che shekel chebang lu Samaria bakhüna yaklabü” dogo laukei,
kheijinei lajamleibouei Mühghaü müt to jongaikei, “Chühashi,
Kho tegü hao to haüthükkei, aieilausi mütshuongei hao thüka youei nakeiko paikei hoba hao haikei.
Tou yaksa, aoeibü shou Elishaei langngaitikei, sao to Elishaei lenko laukei, “Meimeiashi, hoba kaibü chemdang satashi hoba no lanei otla thüklaje otashi; aieilausi
Yaksanyu kho meimeikei hoba Mühghaü mütei laubü tegütham kümbei; hoba sao saoeibü chemdang yoa haukei hoba Filistiabü kaonyeka po nyet kikei.
Hobaje po nyet boubü thonlama yaksanyu kho Filistiabü kaonyek ka longeikei; hoba saoei saoeibü chem hoba saoeibü kao shanga lenyola haukei.
Tou Chobaei Mühghaü müt khangenbou Gehazi to hai joyoko kikei: “Sanoudambo Elishaei kümsilei yaangbü kümbü pendou lenbüma.”

Hobaje Elishaei lai haibü langngaitikei kho Choba to lenko kijinei chühashi, yaksanyu, aoeibü shou haoei langngaitikei, saoei saoeibü chem hoba saoeibü kao shanga thenan lenkei. Hobaje Gehaziei laukei, “Ngeibü bunyubou, O Choba, yaksanyu ho hoba Elishaei langngaitibü saoeibü shou kho ho ki.”

Hobaje ladang Chobaei yaksanyu to phekei, saoei hao to lenkei. Hibü Chobaei sao shanga songdakbü che pienkukei hoba laukei, “Saoei kao apyoan satbü chalou ka tat sühko sao shangabü pendou hoba kao ka longbü pendou sao la kungaiashi.”
Kheijinei Elisha Damaska to loukei, hoba Siriabü Choba Benhadad shatko kikei hoba hao to ho hai laukei, “Mühghaü müt hi aeto louakei.”
Hobaje Chobaei Hazael to laukei, “Kaibü ika jongsak at jungashi, hoba Mühghaü müt shuokla hauashi, hoba hao danko

Hibü hao to haüyola Hazael hao yoa jongsak jungan haukei, khei Damaskaa peisilei maibü weko ka ut saonyi manko künan hao jungto loukei, hoba hao thedanga lokei hoba laukei, “Kaibü shou Siriabü Choba Benhadadei ho shatbü ka maiasao dogo pheko ngo ka jungto hautikei.”
Hobaje Elishaei hao to laukei, “Hauashi, hoba hao to lenshi: ‘Maimaitham no mailabü;’ khei yingasikei hao hailabü dogo
Hobaje hao himou abaushongko Elishaei hao to tangko chühkei, hoba Mühghaü müt kho haapbei.
Hobaje Hazaelei laukei, “
Hobaje Hazaelei laukei, “Lausikei no khangenbou, kei che kho ai, khei kho kümsilei yaangbü haoei kümla thüklep lo?” Hobaje Elishaei jongaikei, “No Siriabü thüka Choba yeilabü dogo
Kheijinei hao Elisha jungka kukjung haukei, hoba haoeibü bunyu jungto loukei. Chobaei hao to laukei, “Elishaei ka to ai laukei?” Hobaje haoei jongaikei, “Haoei maimaitham no mailabü dogo laukei.”
Lausikei nyibounyet haoei yepshang nei che sungan deia hambei hoba khoei haoeibü thenyek yuklepbukei, hoba khünei hao haikei. Hobaje Benhadad jeila Hazaelei songdakkei.
Israelbü Choba Ahabeibü shou Joram po ngao boubüa Jihuda Choba Jehoshafateibü shou Jehoramei songdakla khangkei.
Hao Choba yeijinei hao po khujinto nyi kikei, hoba Jerusalema haoei po set songdakkei.
Hobaje Ahab chemdangei kümbü tegütham, haoei Israelbü Choba shuong lama paikei; aieilausi Ahabeibü nouyangshou haoei yakla lekei, hoba
Khei yingasikei haoei Dawid to haoeibü shousi shuong shanga ponpen hantin che hao la kulabü dogo thekusije Dawid nyena
Hao hanga Edomei Jihuda songdakbü khulimbo meimeikei hoba haoen thüka Choba che pienkei.

Kheijinei Joramei haoeibü kailong pendou hao yoa leian Zair to haukei, hoba nangnak pian haoen kailepan kibü Edombü hao hoba haoeibü kailong leibou shuongei thükkei hoba mütshuong haoen jembü neichem to satkei.
Hibü tat sühko Edomei Jihuda songdak khulimbo longda. Kho tegü kho jihsiphaia tham Libnaei khulimbo khangkei.
Hobaje joubü Jorameibü kümsilei, hoba haoei kümbü pendou Jihudabü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo?
Hobaje Joram haoeibü bousi shuong yoa yepbei, hoba Dawid sangnyua bousi shuong yoa khünkei; hoba hao jeila hao shou Ahaziaei songdakkei.
Israelbü Choba Ahabeibü shou Joram po anthüknyi boubüa Jihudabü Choba Jorameibü shou Ahaziaei songdakla khangkei.
Ahaziaei songdakla khangjinei hao po saoto nyi kikei, hoba haoei Jerusalema po che songdakkei. Hobaje haoeibü nyu nyen Athalia Israelbü Choba Omrieibü shou kikei.
Hobaje Ahab chemdangei kümbü tegütham, haoei Ahab chemdang lamnyua paikei, hoba laobou
Hobaje Ramoth Gileada Siria Choba Hazael khulimbo Ahabeibü shou Joram yoa hao wapyola haukei, hoba Siriabüei Joram leilutikei.

Hobaje Siriabü Choba Hazael to wapyojinei Ramaa Siriabüei hao leilutibü Jezreela maitila shanga Joram Choba sepeijung ngaikei. Hobaje Jihuda Choba Jehorameibü shou Ahazia Jezereela Ahabeibü shou Joram to haüyola yankei, aieilausi hao shatko kikei.
Hobaje Elishaei thuseibü shousi shuong yo ka che ngakei hoba hao to laukei, “Kaibü shembe kaiashi, hoba ho onang thungdou kaibü ika jungan Ramoth Gilead to hauashi.
Hobaje no ladang khüto loulaje Jehoshafat shou hoba Nimshieibü shi Jehu to chühashi hoba atan haoeibü jaisina yo ka pitiashi, hoba shemjang maangkabou to leian atashi.
Kho phaia onang thungdou kho sungbaan kho haoeibü khua yeian jinkushi, hoba laushi, ‘
Hibü heshoubou thuseibou kho Ramoth Gilead to haukei.

Hobaje ladang hao loukei, chühashi, sepai tan lajamleibü shuong yoa kamshaian hapbei, hoba haoei laukei, “O lajamleibou, ngei ka shanga ngühlang che kia.” Hobaje Jehuei laukei, “Kün laobou jungto?” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ka jungto, O lajamleibou.”
Hibü hao meimeikei hoba chem to atkei, hoba haoei haoeibü khua onang kho yeian jinkukei hoba hao to laukei, “Israel Mühghaü
Hobaje Jezebel ika ngo khangenbü thuseibü shuong sii hoba
Aishanga Ahab chemdang khümbo maulabü, hoba ngei Ahab ka bousu shou weko hoba Israela khinlepan kibü hoba solo thua apyobü wapan aplabü.
Hobaje ngei Ahab chemdang Nebateibü shou Jeroboam chemdang tegü hoba Ahijaeibü shou Baasha chemdang tegü yeitilabü.
