Hobaje Jezreel kaoa kei shuongei Jezebeleibü mang shaulabü, hoba sao khünlabü ao akilabü.” Hobaje haoei kou ipbei hoba satkei.

Kheijinei Jehu haoeibü bunyubou khangenbü shuong jungto loukei, hoba müt cheei hao to phekei, “Pendou maisho kia lo? Aila langet angbü müt kho ka jungto loukei?” Hobaje haoei haoen to laukei, “Kanei müt kho hoba haoei laubü ai kikei ngeakei.”
Hobaje haoenei laukei, “Kho amlang, tou kün la lenbü.” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Hai si hai dogo haoei kü to joyoko laukei,
Kheijinei haoen mütpem wekoei panteiko haoeneibü mangyuk sungan Jehu lolabü younaka imtian phokei, hoba “Jehu Choba” dogo lauko teklaang metkei.
Hibü Nimshieibü shou Jehoshafateibü shou Jehuei Joram khulimbo huon takkei. (Tou Joram si Israel pendouei Siria Choba Hazael khulimbo Ramoth Gilead lombo kikei.

Lausikei Joram Chobaje haoei Siria Choba Hazael to wapyojinei Siriabüei leilutibü mou maitila shanga Jezreel to ngaian kikei.) Hobaje Jehuei laukei, “Nyi maangangbü yinga longa müt aokei Jezreela kho ngühlang lenla sangnyu khüka tesatti.”
Hibü Jehu haoeibü kailong to angan setkei hoba Jezreel to haukei; aieilausi Joram khünei leketnyu yepan kikei. Hobaje Jihudabü Choba Ahaziaei Joram to haüyola louyenan kikei.

Tou Jezreela lapheibü che lapheishona loan kikei, hoba Jehu loujinei haoei haoeibü sepai shuong hapbei, hoba laukei, “Tan che ngei hapda.” Hobaje Joramei laukei, “Kolia setbü müt che leian kai hoba ‘Sangmaia sai?’ dogo hao la phetiashi.”

Hibü hao shuokla kolia müt che setan haukei, hoba laukei, “Chobaei hai lauda, ‘Sangmaia sai?’ ” Hobaje Jehuei laukei, “Nyi sangmai aila lela? No kü phaito sepeiashi.” Hobaje lapheibouei ngühlang kuko laukei, “Ngühlang kubou kho haoen junga sühlangkei, lausikei hao alongeida.”

Kheijinei haoei nyibou müt che kolia setan hautikei, ao haoen jungto loukei hoba laukei, “Chobaei hai lauda, ‘Sangmaia sai?’ ” Hobaje Jehuei jongaikei, “Nyi sangmai aila lela? No kü phaito sepeiashi.”
Hobaje lapheibouei ngühlang kuko laukei, “Hao haoen junga sühlangkei, lausikei nyibou alongeida, hoba leiyeibü kho Nimshieibü shou Jehuei leiyeibü phatkei; aieilausi haoei maangshatei leiyeida!”

Hobaje Joramei laukei, “Lamleashi.” Hobaje haoenei haoeneibü kailong lamlekei. Hobaje Israelbü Choba Joram hoba Jihudabü Choba Ahazia, lulueibü kailonga Jehu to haüyola haukei hoba Jezreelbü Nabot kaopheia hao hapbei.
Hobaje Joramei Jehu hapjinei haoei laukei, “Jehu, no sangmaia louda sai?” Hobaje haoei jongaikei, “Kanyu Jezebel pejapelabü hoba seibüyaübü kümsilei khütetche kian ai sangmai kienla?”
Hobaje Joramei haoeibü koli sepeikei hoba satkei, hoba Ahazia to laukei, “O Ahazia, ho khüpettibü kümsilei!”
Hobaje Jehuei haoeibü hau pendouei lau bühkei hoba Joram to haoeibü phakshok kanglanga kipbei hoba laujin kho haoeibü maangpon paiko atkei hoba haoeibü kailong ka atkei.

Kheijinei Jehuei haoeibü lajamleibou Bidkar to laukei, “Haoeibü mang kho sungba hoba hao Jezreelbü Naboteibü kaophei khongthua apyoshi; aieilausi seti liko haoeibü bou Ahab phainei kailonga setan haujinei lai
ei lauda, ‘Maimaitham ngei miet Naboteibü sii hoba haoeibü shousi shuongeibü sii hapa, hoba ho khongthua tham ngei ka la nyibou ngaitikulabü.’ Hibü tou

Ladang Jihudabü Choba Ahaziaei kho hapbei hao chem kabü bamang lam to satkei. Hobaje hao phaito Jehu semjung haukei hoba laukei, “Hao to kailonga nimnim kipashi.” Hibü Ibleam nyangko kibü Gur to angshanga haoenei hao leilutikei. Hobaje hao Megiddo to satkei, hoba khünei haikei.
Hobaje hao khangenbü shuongei hao kailong chenei Jerusalem to künan haukei, hoba Dawid sangnyua haoeibü bousi shuongeibü heea khünkei.
Ahabeibü shou Joram po anthükche boubüa Ahaziaei Jihudaa songdakla khangkei.
Ladang Jehu Jezreel to haukei, Jezebelei kho ditkei, hoba saoei nyekkhüng wia moli naangkei, hoba saoeibü khu hemaiko kümetkei, hoba koulom ka seman angtikei.
Hobaje Jehu bakhün to lotjinei saoei laukei, “No Zimri, kaibü
Jehuei koulom to chühangtikei hoba laukei, “Kü aenei aoyou ki?” Hobaje sungphatbü müt nyiei semei hao to chühan yantikei.
Hobaje Jehuei laukei, “Sao jangan attiashi.” Hibü haoenei sao jangan attikei, hoba saoeibü sii at kümthanga, hoba at koli to phinan jinkukei, hoba haoei sao youei nakeikei.
Kheijinei hao atkei hoba shaukei yungkei hoba haoei laukei, “Shedsikhau baubü yaksa ho to chühashi, hoba sao khünashi; aieilausi sao Chobaeibü nouyangshou ki.”
Hobaje sao khünla haoen haukei, lausikei saoeibü khulo, you hoba ik to liman haoenei ai ühüp.
Haoen khüto louan Jehu to lenkei hoba haoei laukei, “Ho
hoba Jezebeleibü mang kho Jezreel kaonyeka khongthua odsinot tegü kilabü; khei yingbüei, ‘Ho Jezebeleibü mang,’ dogo haoenei ashenlabü, dogo laukei.”
Tou Samariaa Ahabeibü shousi müt anjinlei kikei. Hibü Jehuei le dokei, hoba Samaria to Jezreel songdakbü shuong jungto, khei jaishou shuong hoba Ahabeibü shousi shuong chühbü jungto hautiko laukei,
“Tou ho le kan jungto lousilengko kan yokabü bunyuboueibü shousi shuong hoba kan yoa kailong, hoba koli shuong, tokei baei lelepan kibü sangnyu si wapyobü insiaubu kan yoa kiabü,
kaneibü bunyuboueibü shousi maiboutham hoba muboutham pienashi hoba boueibü Choba setshanga hao settiashi, hoba kaneibü bunyubou chemdang shanga wapyoashi.”
Lausikei haoen aeibou hatko kikei, hoba laukei, “Chühashi, Choba müt nyiei hao thedanga aloen, khülonga sen lai lola?”

Hobaje Chobaeibü chema ikjaibouei hoba sangnyu thüka songdakbouei hoba jaishou shuongei hoba aoyouei nashousi shuong thounoukei, haoenei Jehu jungto hautiko laukei, “Kün no khangenbü shuong ki, hoba kün la sakkubü pendou kümlabü; künei aokei Choba teyeitikho, ka thea maibü nyi kümashi.”

Kheijinei haoei haoen jungto nyibou le dongaiko laukei, “Kan kü aenei kia longa hoba kanei ngüha lekho laua longa, kanei kaneibü bunyuboueibü shousi shuongeibü khu thetba, hoba ngiet ho jihsiphaia kü jungto Jezreel to kai.” Tou Chobaeibü shousi shuong müt anjinlei yingsije, sangnyua yaangbü shuong aoyouei haoen samenkei, haoen yoa kikei.
Hobaje ladang le khoei haoen sühkei, haoenei Chobaeibü shousi shuong sungkei hoba haoen haitikei, khei müt anjinlei khoeibü khu kho kama phokei, hoba hao jungto Jezreel to khübü kho hautikei.

Hobaje hao jungto ngühlang künbü che hautikei, hoba hao to laukei, “Haoenei Chobaeibü shousi shuongeibü khu sungbaakei.” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Kanei khübü kho ngeyang sühko bakhün to atshang jijihama shaangan phoashi.”
Hobaje ngeyang hao hauan lokei, hoba müt pendou to laukei, “Kan ngühmaanglanbü ki, chühashi, ngei ngeibü bunyubou khulimbo huon amaibü takkei, hoba hao haitikei; lausikei habü pendou aoei haitikei?
Tou ngeashi, A- hab chemdang shanga
Hibü Jezreela Ahab chemdang jouan kibü pendou hoba haoen müt yaangbü hoba haoen ngeyobü thangbou pendou hoba haoeneibü ungshedbou shuong, haoei aokei jouan aphoku shongko Jehuei haitikei.
Hobaje hao meimeijung Samaria to haukei, hoba hao lama san wi kipshanga kijinei,

Jehuei Jihudabü Choba Ahazia jaisinasi shuong haüyokei hoba laukei, “Kan aoyou?” Hobaje haoenei jongaikei, “Kün Ahaziaeibü jaisinasi shuong ki, hoba Choba shousi shuong si Chobasaoeibü shousi shuong la salem kula louyanda.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Haoen lang leashi.” Hobaje haoenei haoen lang lekei, hoba thimdei nyangko wi kipshang chema haoen müt saonyito nyi haitikei; haoei haoen aokei üpyo.

Hobaje ladang hao khüka bangkei, hao shuokla loubü Rekhabeibü shou Jehonadab to hao haüyokei. Jehuei hao la salem kukei, hoba hao to laukei, “Ngeibü maangpon ka yoa kibü tegü kaibü maangpon kü yoa kiakouba lo?” Hobaje Jonadabei jongaikei, “Haü.” Jehuei laukei, “Kho khei ki yingalonga kaibü ik kü la labü.” Hobaje haoei haoeibü ik kukei hoba haoei hao kailong to leian jinkei.
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Kü yoa kaiya, hoba
Hobaje ladang hao Samaria to loukei,
Kheijinei Jehuei müt pendou liko kamshaitikei, hoba haoen to laukei, “Ahabei Baal hansho khangenkei, lausikei Jehueije hao kaang khangenlabü.

Khei yingsije tou kü jungto Baal thuseibü pendou, hao to lembü pendou, hoba haoeibü ungshedbou pendou ngashaiashi, aokei alouko tekiti; aieilausi ngei Baal la haitibü lembü yaang kulabü kia; aoyou ayoko kilaje hao lang akilabü.” (Lausikei Baal lembü shuong shemtila daman Jehuei huonei kho kümbei.)
Hobaje Jehuei laukei, “Baal shanga souhat kuko Thangyen kambü che huiletashi.” Hobaje haoenei kho ngühlang phinthonkei.
Hobaje Jehuei Israelbü pendou jungto ngühlang hautikei, Baal lembü pendou loukei; hibü aloubü müt aokei akitei. Hobaje Baal chem kho jithon ka jithon sühko shenkei.
Hobaje neisimei thüka ikjai lebou to laukei, “Baal to lembü pendou shanga neisimei sungba.” Hobaje haoenei haoen jungto neisimei sungbakei.
Hobaje Jehu si Rekhabeibü shou Jehonadab, Baal chem to atkei, hoba Baal to lembü shuong to haoei laukei, “Baal to lembü to liman hanei kan yoa

Hobaje haoenei haitibü lembü si juokbü lembü kula atkei. Tou Jehuei khonga müt saolei pienan phoan kikei, hoba laukei, “Kaneibü ik ka ngei leian loukubü mütshuong at satan aptia longa aoei hao sattida, haoeibü langkei hao jeila kilabü!”

Hobaje haoei juokbü lembü thonsilengko Jehuei lombü hoba leiyeibü shuong pendou to laukei, “Atashi hoba haoen haitiashi, aokei telongti.” Hobaje haoenei haoen inei haitikei, hoba lombü si leiyeibü shuongei haoen apbei hoba Baal chem shemjang maangkabou to atkei.
Hobaje Baal chema kibü saopobü thaonyu jungan longkei hoba khübü kho jikan apbei.
Hobaje haoenei Baal thaonyu leilutikei hoba Baal chem leilutikei hoba tat sühko kho apshang che la yeitia.
Kho tegü Jehuei Israel ka Baal mautikei.
Khei yingsikei Nebateibü shou Jeroboameibü shabü, laobouei haoei Israel shed shontikei, Bethel si Dana kibü hon masu paangshou laobou haoei kümbei kho shabü kho Jehuei üpyo.
Hobaje
Lausikei Jehuei haoeibü maangpon pendouei Israel Mühghaü
Khübü chaloua
Jordan chaangbou aenei Gilead kaodak pendou Gadbü, Reubenbü, Manassebü kaodak pendoua Aroer ka laobou Arnon pholi nyangko ki, khei Gilead si Bashan sühko.
Tou jouan kibü Jehueibü kümsilei hoba haoei kümbü pendou Israelbü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo?
Hobaje Jehu bousi shuong yoa yepbei, hoba haoenei hao Samariaa khünkei. Hobaje haoeibü shou Jehoahazei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Hobaje Samariaa Jehuei songdakbü jih kho po saoto set kikei.
Ladang Ahaziaeibü nyu Athaliaei saoeibü shou haia dogo ngejung loukei sao meimeikei hoba Chobaeibü chem- pen pendou haitikei.

Lausikei Joram Chobaeibü nouyangshou, Ahaziaeibü nousina Jehoshebaei Ahaziaeibü shou Joash sungkei, hoba Chobaeibü shousi shuong shemtibü yo ka huphangshoua leilangkei; hoba hao thounounyu yepchem shemjanga phokei. Kho tegü saoei hao Athalia ka huan phokei, hibü hao ühaiti.
Hobaje hao sao yoa
Hobaje po nyet boubüa Jehoiadaei Kariabü lajamleibou hoba lombü shuong ngala hautikei, hoba haoen
Hobaje haoei haoen la sakkuko laukei, “Kanei ho kümashi, kan phejan semboubü aoyou Nounyet Chobaeibü chem lomla hauda, Chobaeibü chemlombou yeilabü.
Hobaje phejan semboubü Sur bakhüna kilabü, kho tegü kanei chem kho lomlabü, hoba thangetlabü che yinglabü.
Hobaje kan tan nyi, khei Nounyet haubü shuong Choba kaijembo
Hobaje mütpem weko lulueibü ika insiaubu jungan kanei Choba komleplabü, hoba aoei leikhüm limbo atlaje hao haitiashi, hoba ladang Choba longlaje, hoba hao ladang lotlaje kan hao yoa kishi.”

Hobaje Jehoiada ungshedbouei sakkubü tegütham lajamleibou shuongei kümbei, hoba chemdang wekoei mütshuong aoyou Nounyet lotlabü lele kikei hoba aoyou Nounyet anglabü kikei haoen leishaikei, hoba Jehoiada ungshedbou jungto loukei.
Hobaje ungshedbouei saongao thüka lajamleibou la Dawideibü aubu si aih laobou
Hobaje lombü shuong kho mütpem weko in si aubu jungan chemeibü maephei aeka nanaephei sühko, lemshang hoba chem ae nyangko, Choba kaijembo lokei.

Kheijinei haoei Chobaeibü shou leian longkei, hoba hao la Chobaeibü khun hankukei, hoba ngühkhüm le che hao la kukei, hoba haoenei hao Choba dogo ngekletkei, hoba hao la onang naangkukei, hoba haoenei haoeneibü ik ipbei hoba laukei, “Choba hangkhu onko kishi!”
Hobaje ladang Athaliaei lombü si mütshuongeibü ngüh ditkei, sao mütshuong jungto

hoba saoei chühkei, hoba chühashi, song tegütham Choba kho shona lokei hoba lajamleibü shuong si teklaang metbü shuong Choba nyangko kikei; hoba kaonyek kabü müt pendouei olinyokei, hoba teklaang metkei. Kheijinei Athaliaei jembü neisimei jitnyinkei, hoba ngekkei, “Khüpettibü! Khüpettibü!”

Kheijinei ungshedbou Jeho- iadaei sepai tan thüka pienan kibü saongao thüka leiyeibou la ngühkhüm kukei hoba haoen to laukei, “Lin khüman kibü kanglang to sao leiba hoba aoyouei sao phai semlaje inei haitiashi.” Aishanga ungshedbouei laua, “Sao
Hibü haoenei sao to ik atkei, hoba Chobaeibü chem to koli atbü lam to sao haukei hoba sao khünei haitikei.
Kheijinei Jehoiadaei

Hobaje kaonyek kabü müt pendou Baal chem to haukei, hoba kho leilutikei; haoeibü lemshang hoba haoeibü heangsho haoenei lemailela leilutikei, hoba Baal ungshedbou Mattan lemshang thedanga haitikei. Hobaje ungshedbouei
Hobaje saongao thüka lajamleibou, hoba Kariabü shuong si lombü shuong hoba kaonyek kabü mütshuong pendou haoei leikei; hoba haoenei
Hibü kaonyeka mütshuong pendou olinyokei hoba sangnyu senyühshembo kikei; hoba Choba chema haoenei Athalia haitikei.
Jehoashei songdakla khangjinei hao po nyet kikei.
Israel Choba Jehuei songdakbü po nyetboua Jihuda Choba Jehoashei songdakla khangkei hoba haoei Jerusalema po saonyi songdakkei, hoba haonyu Beersheba sao nyen Zibia kikei.
Hobaje Jehoash ungshedbou Jehoiadaei hao to lenbüa haoeibü salang sünga
Khei yingasikei shongha lembü kaoen khoje asunglangko kikei; mütshuongei tokei haitibü lembü kukei hoba shongha juokbü lembü kukei.
Hobaje Joashei ungshedbou shuong to laukei, “Saopobü lembü nyaksinam pendou laobou
ungshedbou shuong la kho letiashi; ungshedbou mütpem wekoei ngeyobü müt ka hoba haoenei lanei ong leilubü haplaje, chem leilubü shuong kho kümetlabü.”
Lausikei Joash Choba hao po saoto sem onkokei ungshedbou shuongei leilubü kho akümetko kikei.

Kheijinei Joash Chobaei ungshedbou Jehoiada hoba lubü ungshedbou shuong ngakei hoba haoen to laukei, “Aila kanei chem leilubü kho akümet? Tou khei yingsije kanei ngebü müt ka nam tele, lausikei kho chem leilubü kümetla kuashi.”
Hibü touje ungshedbou shuongei mütshuong ka namkei alelabü hoba chem leilubü shuongkei akümetlabü dogo thekukei.
Kheijinei ungshedbou Jehoiadaei Busen che sungbakei hoba khoeibü küpjina khün yettian kho lemshang nyangko
Hobaje haoenei Busena nam juong hapjinei Chobaeibü dobou si thükkabou ungshedbou angkei hoba weanchühan
Hobaje haoenei nam kho weanchühan kümbüleibü
Hobaje laangeibü mistri shuong hoba laang jakbü shuong la, hoba
Khei yingsije,
Lausikei haoenei kho kümbüleibü la kukei, hoba khoei
Aeiche, kümbüleibü la mu kula aoyoueibü ik ka nam kho khümbo kukei haoenei khübü müt yoa nam aweyo; aieilausi haoenei ngühmaanglanko kümbei.
Shedbü lembü shanga nam hoba saüsimaü lembü shanga nam
Kheijinei Siriabü Choba Hazael angkei, hoba Gat khulimbo wapyokei hoba kho lekei, hoba Hazaelei Jerusalem to haula sepeikei.
Hobaje Jihudabü Choba Jehoashei bousi shuong, Jihudabü Choba shuong, Jehoshafat, Jehoram hoba Azariaei khümbo kuan kibü saopobü peisilei shuong, hoba
Tou Joasheibü lubü kümsilei, hoba haoei kümbü pendou Jihudabü Choba shuong Lungbüdobü lea khübü kho doan aki lo?
Hobaje hao khangenbü shuong meimeikei hoba huon amaibü takkei hoba Silla aeto yanbü lama Milloeibü chema Joash haitikei.

Aishanga Shimeatheibü shou Jozakar hoba Shomereibü shou Jehozabad, hao khangenbü shuongei hao haitikei, hoba Dawid sangnyua haoenei hao jembü bousi shuong yoa khünkei hoba haoeibü shou Amaziaei hao jeila songdakkei.
Jihuda Choba Ahaziaeibü shou Joash po saoto sem boubüa Jehueibü shou Jehoahazei Samariaa Israel thüka songdakla khangkei, hoba po anthük nyet songdakkei.
Hobaje
Hobaje Israelbü khulimbo
Kheijinei Jehoa- hazei
Hobaje
Khei yingasikei Jeroboameibü shabü laobouei haoei Israelbü la shed shontikei, haoen kho ka abang; lausikei khonei paikei, hoba Samariaa tokei Ashera kikei.

Aishanga mütshuong ka koli sepai anjinsem hoba kailong an hoba kao kabü sepai hajar an to liman haoei Jehoahaz la ai üpyoku; aishanga Siria Chobaei haoen shemtikei; khei amshanga thamngu phatko haoen yeitikei.
Tou Jehoahazeibü joubü kümsilei hoba haoeibü hau khübü kho Israelbü Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo?
Hobaje Jehoahaz bousi shuong yoa yepbei, hoba haoenei hao Samariaa khünkei, hoba haoshou Joashei hao jeila songdakkei.
Jihuda Choba Joash po khujinto nyet boubüa Jehoaha- zeibü shou Jehoashei Israel thüka Samariaa songdakla khangkei, hoba po anthük lak songdakkei.
Hobaje
Tou Joasheibü lubü kümsilei hoba haoei kümbü pendou hoba haoeibü hauei hao Jihudabü Choba Amazia to wapyobü, khübü kho Israelbü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo?
Hobaje Joash hao bousi shuong yoa yepbei, hoba Jeroboam haoeibü Choba setshanga setkei; hoba Samariaa Israelbü Choba shuong yoa Joash khünkei.
Tou ladang Elisha hao hailabü shatei shatko kikei, Israelbü Choba Joash hao jungto louyenkei, hoba hao thüka haapbei, hoba laukei, “Abou, abou! Israelbü kailong hoba khoeibü sepai shuong!”
Hobaje Elishaei hao to laukei, “Lau hoba laujin sungashi.”
Hobaje haoei Israel Choba to laukei, “Kaibü laua hatashi;” hoba haoei khonei hatkei. Hobaje Elishaei haoeibü ik kho Chobaeibü ika peitian phokei.
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Chaangbou ae koulom ipashi;” hoba haoei kho ipbei. Kheijinei Elishaei laukei, “Kipashi;” kheijinei haoei kipbei. Hobaje haoei laukei, “Thükenbou
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Laujin shuong kho sungba;” hoba ladang haoei khübü kho sungbakei, haoei Israel Choba to laukei, “Kao to ngümashi;” hoba haoei semnei ngümbei, hoba nangkei.
Kheijinei Mühghaü müt kho hao to khauangkei, hoba laukei, “Nyi ngaonei ayingsi laknei ngümla kikei; tegüje nyi Siria amauti shongko wapyokhoulabü, lausikei touje nyi Siriabü semnei ong thüklabü.”
Hobaje Elisha haikei, hoba haoenei hao khünkei. Tou Moabbü lakoubü danei po weko kebüongbü chaloua ong sang shila loukei.

Hobaje haoenei müt che khünko kijinei, chühashi, haoenei sangshibü tan che hapbei hoba haoenei müt kho Elishaeibü heemang to tekan jinkukei, hoba müt khoei Elishaeibü loa meitisilengko hao langngaikei, hoba haoeibü youei lokei.
Hobaje Siriabü Choba Hazaelei Jehoahazeibü songdak sünga Israelbü shieikoekei.
Lausikei haoen to
Hobaje Siriabü Choba Hazael haikei, hoba haoshou Benhadadei hao jeila songdakkei.
Kheijinei Jehoashei Hazaeleibü shou Benhadad ik ka haobou Jehoahaz ka wapyojinei sungbü sangnyu shuong nyibou lekei. Joashei semnei sühko hao thükkei, hoba Israelbü sangnyu shuong sungngaikei.
Israel Choba Jehoahazeibü shou Jehoash po nyi boubüa Jihudabü Choba Joasheibü shou Amaziaei songdakla khangkei.
Haoei songdakla khangjinei hao po saoto ngao kikei; hoba haoei Jerusalema po saoto gü songdakkei, hoba haoeibü nyu nyen Jehoaddin; sao Jerusalembü kikei.
Hobaje
Khei yingasikei shongha lembüje sungan üpbo kikei; mütshuongei tokei haitibü lembü kukei, hoba shongh lemshanga jen juokkei.
Hobaje Choba sangle kho haoeibü ika kaangkhühtham kümsilengko haobou haitibü khangenbü shuong haoei haitikei.
Lausikei haitibüeibü shousi shuongje ühaiti.
Haoei Edombü Jem Yomanga hajar an haitikei, hoba Sela lepde shian apbei, hoba tat chalou sühko kho Joktheel nyenan ki.
Kheijinei Israel Choba Jehueibü shou Jehoahazeibü shou Jehoash jungto Amaziaei ngühlang hautiko laukei, “Kaiya, sen theshuok haüyokho.”

Hobaje Israel Choba Jehoashei Jihuda Choba Amazia jungto ngühlang hautiko laukei, “Lebanona kibü jakham long cheei Lebanona kibü cedar bulong jungto hautiko laukei, ‘Kaibü nouyangshou kü shou la yakla lela kushi;’ hoba khünei Lebanon kabü yammei che dankei hoba jaklong kho naknyinkukei.
Maimaitham nyi Edom thükkei, hoba kaibü maangpon yaangan apbei; kaibü soneikangbüei maanghaian chema kishi; aieilausi nyi no hoba ka yoa Jihudabü tuonglabü lele aila nyi khonsak longtila?”
Lausikei Amaziaei ngüha ale; hibü Israel Choba Jehoash angkei; hoba hao si Jihuda Choba theshuok haüyoan Jihudabüeibü Bethshemesa lason shuokkei.
Hobaje Israelbü thedanga Jihudabüei athük hapbei, hoba mütpem weko lulueibü neichem to satetlangkei.

Hobaje Israel Choba Jehoashei, Bethshemesa Ahaziaeibü shou Jehoasheibü shou Jihuda Choba Amazia lapbei, hoba Jerusalem to loukei; hoba Jerusalem kümthang Efraim koukhün ka chemnyek koukhün sühko iknop saongao lei leilutikei.
Hobaje hon si chandinam pendou hoba Chobaeibü thanshang chema hapbü hoba
Tou Jehoasheibü joubü kümsilei laobou haoei kümbei, hoba haoeibü hau hoba haoei lai Jihudabü Choba Amazia to wapyokei, khübü kho Israelbü Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo?
Hobaje Jehoash bousi shuong yoa yepbei, hoba Israelbü Choba shuong yoa Samariaa khünkei, hoba haoeibü shou Rehoboamei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Hobaje Jihudabü Choba Jehoasheibü shou Amazia Israel Choba Jehoahazeibü shou Jehoash haian phaia po anthükngao salang kikei.
Tou Amaziaeibü lubü kümsilei Jihudabü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo?
Hobaje haoenei hao khulimbo Jerusalema huon takkei; hoba hao Lakhish to satlangkei, lausikei haoenei hao lambo Lakhish to hautikei hoba khünei hao haitikei.
Hobaje haoenei hao kolia künbakei, hoba Dawid sangnyua haoeibü bousi shuong yoa Jerusalema khünkei.
Kheijinei Jihudabü pendouei po anthüklak jailebü Uzzia leijung louan haobou Amaziaeibü setshanga Choba yeitikei.
Haoei Elath sangngaikei hoba kho Jihudabü la kungaikei; kho Amazia haobousi shuong yoa yepan phaia.
Jihudabü Choba Joasheibü shou Amazia po anthükngao boubüa Israel Choba Jehoasheibü shou Jeroboamei Samariaa songdakla khangkei.
Hobaje
Haoei Israelbü leilang Hamath Lamnyu ka Araba yungnyu sühko
Aishanga
Lausikei

Tou Jeroboameibü lubü kümsilei hoba haoei kümbü pendou hoba haoeibü hau hoba haoei lai wapyokei hoba haoei lai Jehudabüeibü Damaska si Hamath Israelbü la kungaikei, khübü kho Israelbü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo?
Hobaje Jeroboam bousi shuong yoa yepbei, hoba haoeibü shou Zekhariaei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Israelbü Choba Jeroboam po saoto nyet boubüa Jihudabü Choba Uzzia, Amaziaeibü shouei songdakla khangkei.
Haoei songdakla khangjinei hao po anthüklak jaishou kikei, hoba haoei Jerusalema po anjinsemto nyi songdakkei, hoba haoeibü nyu nyen Jekolia Jerusalem sao kikei.
Hobaje haobou Amaziaei kümbü pendou tegü haoei
Khei yingsikei shongha lemshang sungan üpbo kikei; mütshuongei tokei haitibü lembü kukei, hoba khübü shongha jen juokkei.
Hobaje
Tou Uzziaeibü joubü kümsilei, hoba haoei kümbü pendou kho Jihudabü Choba shuongeibü Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo?
Hobaje Uzzia bousi shuong yoa yepbei, hoba haoenei hao bousi shuong yoa Dawid sangnyua khünkei hoba hao shou Jothamei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Jihuda Choba Uzzia po khujinto set boubüa Jeroboameibü shou Zekhariaei Israel thüka Samariaa lit lak songdakkei.
Hobaje haobouei kümbü tegü
Hobaje Jabesheibü shou Shallumei hao khulimbo huon takkei hoba mütshuong thedanga hao to ngümbei hoba haitikei, hoba hao jeiko songdakkei.
Tou Zekhariaeibü joubü kümsilei Israel Choba shuongeibü Lüngbüdobü lea doan kia.
Ho
Jabesheibü shou Shallumei Jihudabü Choba Uzzia po khujinto gü boubüa songdakla khangkei, hoba haoei Samariaa lit che songdakkei.
Hobaje Gadieibü shou Menahem Tirza ka angkei, hoba Samaria to loukei, hoba hao to wapyokei, hoba Jabesheibü shou Shallum Samariaa haitikei, hoba hao jeiko songdakkei.
Tou Shallumeibü joubü kümsilei, hoba haoei huon amaibü takbü, chühashi, khübü kho Israelbü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü lea doan kia.

Kheijinei Menahemei Tifsa hoba khünei kibü pendou, hoba Tirza ka leilanga kibü mautikei, aieilausi haoenei hao la aipbu; khei yingbü khoei haoei kho mautikei; hoba khünei yaksa mang akongbü pendou shimong lipyetkukei.
Jihudabü Choba Uzzia po khujinto gü boubüa Gadieibü shou Menahemei Israel thüka songdakla khangkei, hoba Sama- riaa po an songdakkei.
Hobaje

Kaonyek khulimbo Assiriabü Choba Pul loukei, hoba Menahemei haoeibü ika Choba songdak kaangkhühtham yeitila haoeibü thuibü hao yoa kila shanga Pul la chandinam seret khujin bang atbü hajar saongao lei kukei.

Hobaje Menahemei Israelbüeibü nam, khei nyaksinam kibü yaangbü müt pendou ka mütpem weko ka chandinam shekel anjinsem bang Assiria Choba la kula sungkei. Hibü Assiria Choba ngaikei hoba khonei kaonyeka asetngai.
Tou Menahemeibü joubü kümsilei, hoba haoei kümbü pendou khübü kho Israelbü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo?
Hobaje Menahem bousi shuong yoa yepbei, hoba haoeibü shou Pekahiaei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Jihudabü Choba Uzzia po anjinsem boubüa Menahemeibü shou Pekahia Israelbü thüka Samariaa songdakla khangkei, hoba po nyi songdakkei.
Hobaje haoei
Hobaje Remaliaeibü shou Peka, haoeibü lajamleibouei Gileadbü müt anjinsem leian Pekalia khulimbo huon takkei, hoba Samariaa Chobaeibü laangchema hao haitikei, hoba hao jeiko songdakkei.
Tou Pekahiaeibü joubü kümsilei hoba haoei kümbü pendou, chühashi, khübü kho Israelbü choba Lüngbüdobü lea doan kia.
Jihudabü Choba Uzzia po anjinsemto nyi boubüa, Remaliaeibü shou Pekaei Israelbü thüka Samariaa songdakla khangkei hoba po saoche songdakkei.
Hobaje haoei
Israel Choba Peka haanga Assiriabü Choba Tiglath Pileser loukei hoba Janoa, Kedesh, Hazor, Gilead, Galil hoba Naftali kaodak pendou sungkei, hoba haoei haoen Assiria to langsenkei.
Hobaje tou Jihuda Choba Uzziaeibü shou Jotham po saoche boubüa, Eleaeibü shou Hosheaei Remaliaeibü shou Peka khulimbo huon takkei, hoba hao haitikei, hoba hao jeiko songdakkei.
Tou Pekaeibü joubü kümsilei hoba haoei kümbü pendou, chühashi, khübü kho Israelbü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü lea doan kia.
Israel Choba Remaliaeibü shou Peka po anthüknyi boubüa Jihudabü Choba Uzziaeibü shou Jothamei songdakla khangkei.
Haoei songdakla khangjinei hao po saotongao kikei, hoba haoei Jerusalema po anthüklak songdakkei; hoba haoeibü nyu nyen Jerusha, Zadokeibü shou kikei.
Hobaje haoei, haobou Uzziaei kümbü tegütham,
Khei yingasikei shongh lemshang sungan üpbo kikei; mütshuongei tokei haitibü lembü kukei hoba khübü shongh lemshanga jen juokkei.
Tou Jothameibü joubü kümsilei hoba haoei kümbü pendou kho Jihudabü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo?
Khübü chaloua
Hobaje Jotham bousi shuong yoa yepbei hoba Dawid sangnyua bousi shuong yoa khünkei, hoba haoeibü shou Ahazei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Remaliaeibü shou Peka po anthük nyet boubüa Jihudabü Choba Jothameibü shou Ahazei songdakla khangkei.
Haoei songdakla khangjinei Ahaz po saoche kikei, hoba haoei Jerusalema po anthük lak songdakkei hoba haobou Dawid aphatko
Lausikei hao Israel Choba shuong lamnyua paikei, haü,
Hobaje shongh lemshang hoba shonghkhua bubhek ngekyoko satbü bulong phanga haoei haitibü lembü kukei hoba jen juokkei.
Kheijinei Siriabü Choba Resin si Israelbü Choba, Remaliaeibü shou Peka wapyola Jerusalem to angkei, hoba haoenei Ahaz komlepbei, lausikei hao athük.
Kho jih khünei Siriabü Choba Resinei Siria shanga Elath sungngaikei, hoba Elath ka Jihudabü shian apbei, hoba Siriabü Elath to loukei hoba tat sühko khonei kida.

Hibü Ahazei Siriabü Choba Tiglath Pileser jungto ngühlang hautiko laukei, “Ngo no khangenbou hoba kaibü shou ki. Kaiyanga, hoba kü khulimbo longbü Siria Choba ik ka hoba Israel Choba ik ka ngo püetkaima.”
Hobaje Ahazei
Hobaje Assiriabü Chobaei hao to ngüha lekei; hoba Assiriabü Chobaei Damaska khulimbo angkei, hoba kho sungkei; hoba khünei kibü mütshuong lapan Kir to künlangkei hoba Resin haitikei.

Hobaje Ahaz Chobaei Assiria Choba Tiglath Pileser shuokla Damaska to angkei, hoba Damaskaa kibü lemshang kho hapbei; hoba Ahaz Chobaei, lemshanga shensinge kümbü hoba khoeibü noksa kho pendoua tükde kho tegütham küman ungshedbou Uria jungto hautikei.
Hobaje ungshedbou Uriaei lemshang che kümbei, Ahaz Chobaei Damaska ka hautian kibü tegü kho maimai Ahaz Choba Damaska ka alousühtoua ungshedbou Uriaei kho kümbei.
Hobaje ladang Choba Damaska ka loukei, Chobaei lemshang kho hapbei, hoba Choba lemshang nyangko loukei, hoba kho thüka lembei.
Hobaje haoei juokbü lembü jikkei, hoba shausiyung lembü hoba yunglabü jonkei hoba lembü thüka haoeibü sangmai lembü sii lakkei.
Hobaje

Hobaje Ahaz Chobaei Uria ungshedbou la sakkuko laukei, “Lemshang yaangbü thük khonei ngeyang juokbü lembü jikashi hoba nangnak shausiyung lembü hoba Chobaeibü juokbü lembü hoba haoeibü shausiyung lembü kaonyeka juokbü lembü yoan hoba haoeneibü shausiyung lembü hoba yunglabü lembü shuong hoba kho thüka juokbü lembü sii pendou lakkuashi; lausikei chinam lemshang khoneije kü shanga yemshantilabü shangabü ki.”
Kho tegü Ahaz Chobaei sakkubü pendou tegütham Uria ungshedbouei kümbei.
Hobaje Ahaz Chobaei denshang koukhün wapan apbukei hoba kho ka deidang phau sungenkei, hoba yungnyu laobou phanga masu pongsu kikei khüka kho sungetkei, hoba kho laang jabü thüka phokukei.
Hobaje haoei Assiriabü Choba olintilabü laüa haoenei Nounyet shanga
Tou Ahazeibü joubü kümsilei Jihudabü shuong Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo?
Hobaje Ahaz bousi shuong yoa yepbei, hoba Dawid sangnyua bousi shuong yoa khünkei, hoba haoshou Hezekiaei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Jihudabü Choba Ahaz po anthüknyi boubüa Eleaeibü shou Hosheaei Samariaa Israel thüka songdakla khangkei, hoba po gü songdakkei.
Hobaje
Hao khulimbo Assiriabü Choba Shalmanezer angkei, hoba Hoshea, hao khangenbou yeikei, hoba hao jungto jongsak sungbakei.

Hobaje Assiriabü Chobaei Hosheaei huon amaibü takbü hapbei; aieilausi haoei Ijepbü Choba jungto ngühlang hautikei, hoba haoei po weko kümbü tegü Assiriabü Choba jungto khüm ohautisije Assiriabü Chobaei hao lapbei hoba thüngdanga khinan phokei.
Kheijinei Assiriabü Choba kaonyek pendou to longkei, hoba Samaria to angkei, hoba haoei kho po sem komlepbei.
Hoshea po gü boubüa Assiriabü Chobaei Samaria lekei hoba haoei Israelbü Assiria to leilangkei, hoba Halaa hoba Gozan shumang Habora hoba Medeshbü sangnyu shuonga haoen apyokei.
Hobaje kho hai haüthükkei, aieilausi Israel shousi shuongei
Hobaje
Hobaje Israel shousi shuongei huphanga
Hobaje nyemei huonglepan kibü bulong phang wekoa hoba shongha lemshang wekoa saopobü thaonyu hoba Ashera haoen shanga phokei,
hoba haoen to shaang
Hobaje haoenei heangsho shuong khangenkei, laobou shanga
Khei yingsikei
Khüneikei haoenei ngüha ale, hoba bousi shuong aoyouei

Hobaje haoeibü lanshatbü ngühkhüm hoba bousi shuong yoa haoei kümbü the- yolanyobü hoba haoeibü aukabü shuong laobouei haoen la aukabü kukei, khübü kho asunglet; hoba haoen amlangbü phaito sembei, hoba lejim akiko apbei, hoba haoen kaijembo kibü phangshuong phaito satkei; hoba haoen shanga
Hobaje haoenei
Hobaje haoenei haoeneibü shousi bousu yaksa shuong lembü kula juokettikei, hoba shanyotakyo hoba seibü- yaübü kümsilei kümbei, hoba hao khau angtilabü lele
Khei yingsije Israelbü to
Tokei Jihudaeikei
Hobaje
Ladang Dawid chung ka haoei Israel jitan apbei, haoenei Nebateibü shou Jeroboam Choba yeitikei. Hobaje Israelbüei
Hobaje Israel shousi shuongei Jeroboamei kümbü haoeibü shedbü pendoua paikei.
ei haoen hao jungka sungan üpshongko haoei hao khangenbü thuseibü shuong danko laubü tegü haoen khübü ka abang. Hibü Israelbü jembü kaodak ka Assiria to leilangkei, hoba tat sühko haoen khünei kia.

Hobaje Assiriabü Chobaei Babilon ka, Kutha ka, Avva ka, Hamath ka, hoba Safarvaim ka, mütshuong leian loukei, hoba Samaria sangnyu shuonga Israel shousi shuong jeila phokukei, hoba khübü sangnyu shuonga kikei.
Hobaje khünei haoen ki khangnyet ka

Hibü haoenei Assiriabü Choba to lenko laukei, “Nyi leilangbü hoba Samaria sangnyu shuonga apyobü phangshuongei kaonyek kabü mühghaüeibü song angekei; khei yingbüei haoei haoen yoto molosaonyu hautikei, hoba chühashi, haoei haoen haitida; aieilausi haoenei kaonyek kabü mühghaü songlehaang ange.”
Kheijinei Assiriabü Chobaei sakkuko laukei, “Ngei leibabü ungshedbou shuong yo ka che thito ngaitiashi; hoba hao hauan khünei kitiashi, hoba haoen la kaonyek kabü mühghaü songle- haang nalena.”
Hibü haoenei Samaria ka leilangbü ungshedbou shuong yo ka che loukei, hoba Bethela kikei hoba haoenei
Khei yingsikei phang wekoei haoeneibü mühghaü shuong kümbei, hoba Samariabü shuongei kümbü shongh lemshanga phang wekoei haoen kibü sangnyu shuonga khübü kho phokei.
Hobaje Babilonbüei Sukkathbenothbü mühghaü heangsho, Kuthabüei Nergalbü heangsho, Hamathbüei Ashimabü heangsho,
hoba Avvabüei Nibhaz si Tartak heangsho kümbei, hoba Sefarvaimbüei haoeneibü shousi shuong Adrammelekh si Anammelekh Safarvaim mühghaü shuong shanga wana juokkei.
Haoenei
Hibü haoenei
Tat sühko haoenei shangiedbü songle tegütham kümda; haoenei
Aoyou to
lausikei
Hobaje kan shanga lanshatbü ngühkhüm, songle ngühkhüm shuong hoba ngühkhüm si sakkubü kanei ponpen shanga jungeijan. Kanei lubü mühghaü to ühütjan;
hoba ngei kan yoa kümbü theyolanyobü kanei amaajan, ayingsi kanei lubü mühghaü la soumo akujan;
lausikei
Khei yingsikei haoenei hao to ngüha ale, lausikei haoenei shangiedbü pisong bousong tegü kümbei.
Hibü khübü phang shuongei
Tou Israel Choba Elaeibü shou Hoshea po sem boubüa, Jihuda Choba Ahazeibü shou Hezekiaei songdakla khangkei.
Hao songdakla khangjinei po saoto ngao kikei; hoba haoei Jerusalema po saoto gü songdakkei, hoba hao nyu Abi nyenbü Zekhariaeibü nouyangshou kikei.
Hobaje haobou Dawidei kümbü pendou tegütham

Haoei shongh lemshang kho sungan apbei, hoba saopobü thaonyu shuong leilutikukei, hoba Ashera wapan koutikei, hoba Mosaei kümbü pinyu kho netla yeiko leilutikukei, aishanga khübü chalou sühko Israelbü shousi shuongei kho la jen juokkukei, hoba khüto haoenei Nehushtan dogo laukei.
Haoei
Aieilausi haoei
Hobaje
Filistiabü Gaza hoba khoeibü leilang laphei thoshang baei lelepan kibü sangnyu sühko haoei shian apbei.
Hobaje Hezekia Choba po lei boubüa, kho Israelbü Choba Elaeibü shou Hoshea po nyet boubü kikei, Assiriabü Choba Shalmenezer Samaria khulimbo angkei, hoba hao komlepbei.
Hobaje sembou po thonlama haoei kho sungkei, khei Hezekia po lak boubüa kho Israelbü Hoshea, po gü boubüa Samaria lekei.
Hobaje Assiriabü Chobaei Israelbü Assiria to langsenkei hoba Halaa Gozan shumanga Habor si Mede sangnyu shuonga haoen phokei.
Aieilausi haoenei
Tou Hezekia Choba po anthüklei boubüa Assiriabü Choba Sennakherib, ba lean kibü Jihudabü sangnyu shuong khulimbo angkei, hoba khübü kho sungkei.

Hobaje Jihudabü Choba Hezekiaei Assiriabü Choba jungto Lakhish to hautiko laukei, “Ngei shedtia, khei nyi kü la ai küntilaje ngei künlabü, kü jungka ong ngaiashi.” Hibü Assiriabü Chobaei Jihudabü Choba Hezekia la chandinam seret khujin bang atbü saongao sem hoba hon seret khujin bang atbü khujin attikei.
Hobaje Hezekia Chobaei
Kho chaloua Hezekia Chobaei

Hobaje Assiriabü Chobaei Tartan Rab-saris hoba lajamleibou Lakhish ka Hezekia Choba jungto sepai tan yaangbü che yoa Jerusalem to hautikei. Hobaje ladang haoen angkei, neisakbü shuong khongthu lamkhonga kibü thükkabou deikhün deiso nyangko to haoen loukei hoba lokei.
Hobaje ladang haoenei Choba to ngako kikei, haoen jungto Hilkiaeibü shou Eliakim Chobaeibü chema ikjaibou, hoba Shebna dobou hoba Lüngbüdobü dobou Asafeibü shou Joa haoen jungto longkei.
Hobaje lajamleibouei haoen to laukei, “Tou kanei Hezekia to lenashi: Hai Choba yaangbou Assiriabü Chobaei lauda, ‘No ainei nongan maanglembo mailem kida?
Ngühkong kho wapyola shanga shujembü kümthen hoba hau dogo nyi damda sai? Tou kanei kü khu limbo longdabuba kanei aoto maanglemda?

Tou chühashi, nyi ho nyinbü thakdu ju, khei Ijep to maanglemda, laobou ladang müt cheei julaje khoei haoeibü ik to jetlabü hoba kho pailabü. Hao to maanglembü pendou shanga Ijep Choba Farao kho khei ki.’
Lausikei kanei kü to, ‘Künei küneibü
Tou khei yingsije ngei ka to sudajada, ngeibü
Khülongaje lai küman ngeibü bunyubou hanboutham khangenbou yoa lajamleibou che sepeinyu ngaitienla? Khei yingsikei nyi Ijepbü kailong shuong hoba koli sepai shuong to maanglemda.
Tou ngei

Kheijinei Hilkiaeibü shou Eliakim, Sheba, hoba Joaei lajamleibou to laukei, “Sanoudambo no khangenbou shuong to nyi Aramaik ngühyemei joyoashi, aieilausi künei kho ditenda, hoba ba maanga kibü shuongei ditlabü lele kün to Jihudabü ngühyema kün to tejoyoma.”

Lausikei Rakshakeei haoen to laukei, “Habü ngüh laula ngeibü bunyubouei kaibü bunyubou hoba ka jungto hautikei sai? Baa setan kibü shemlabü mütshuong, aoyouei ka yoa jembüei apbü phet shaula hoba jet yungla ki, haoen jungto ngo ohauti lo?”
Kheijinei lajamleibou lokei, hoba Jihuda ngühyemei ngüh yaangbüei ngekkei, hoba lenko laukei, “Kanei Choba yaangbü Assiria Choba ngüha leashi!
Chobaei hai lauda: ‘Hezekiaei kan tehuonetti, hoba haoei kan haoeibü ikei akhümenlabü.
Ayingsi,

Hezekia to ngüha tele, aieilausi Assiriabü Chobaei hai lauda, ‘Kü to sangmai kümshi, hoba kü jungto kaiyang; kan mütpem weko ai lulueibü semlüh, hoba mütpem wekoei lulueibü bhuklong ka shauko kiashi, hoba lulueibü deikhün ka dei yungko kiashi.
Kaneibü kaodak phatbü kaodak che to youshou si semlüh kibü kaodak, nyak si semlühdei sek kibü kaodak, oliv onang hoba naodei kibü kaodak, khei kan ühaiko lang kilabü lele
Assiriabü ik ka phangshuongeibü mühghaü shuong cheei ongkei jembü kaodak püetlep sai?
Hamath si Arpad mühghaü shuong lanei ki? Safarvaim, Hena, hoba Ivva mühghaü shuong lanei ki? Kü ik ka haoenei Samaria khümenkei sai?
Kü ka
Lausikei mütshuong ngüh üangko kikei, hoba hao to ngüh che ongkei ajongai; aieilausi Chobaei haoen to “Hao to tejongai” dogo ngühkhüm kukei.
Kheijinei Hilkiaeibü shou Eliakim, Chobaeibü chema ikjaibou Shebna dobou hoba Lüngbüdobü dobou Asafeibü shou Joa, haoeneibü neisimei jitnyinan louan Hezekia to lajamleiboueibü ngühshuong kho lenkei.
Ladang Hezekiaei kho ditkei, haoei haoeibü neisimei jitnyinkei hoba hao lolo senouneiei khuingaian
Hobaje haoei Chobaeibü ikjaibou Eliakim, dobou Shebna, hoba ungshedbou jaishou shuong senouneiei khuilepan Amoseibü shou Isaia thuseibou jungto hautikei.
Hobaje haoenei hao to laukei, “Hezekiaei hai lauda: Ho maangto shatlabü hoba himou chalou ki, aieilausi nashousi buklabü chalou pena, hoba haoen bukla hau aki.
Aingenyu lajamleibou, ao haoeibü bonyubouei Assiriabü Chobaei langkeibü Mühghaü nyikula hautian ki; haoeibü ngüh pendou
Hibü Hezekiaeibü khangenbü shuong Isaia jungto loukei.
Hobaje Isaiaei haoen to laukei, “Kanei kaneibü bunyubou to hai lenjan, ‘
Chühashi, ngei hao la soushou che jinkulabü, hoba haoei ngühphakphak che ditlabü hoba hao haoeibü kaodak to sepeijung ngailabü, hoba haoeibü kaodaka inei ngei hao haitilabü.’ ”
Hibü lajamleibou sepeinyu ngaikei, hoba Assiriabü Chobaei Libna khulimbo wapyoko hapbei; aieilausi Lakhish ka hao bangan kikei dogo haoei ditkei.
Hobaje haoei ladang Ethiopiabü Choba Tirhakaei ho hai laubü ditkei, “Chühashi, hao ka khu limbo wapyola longan kia,” kheijinei haoei nyibou ngühlang künbü shuong Hezekia jungto hautiko laukei,
“Kanei Jihudabü Choba Hezekia to ho hai lenko laushi: Nyi maanglembü kaibü Mühghaüei Assiriabü Choba ik to Jerusalem akulabü dogo lauko no tehuonetti.
Chühashi, Assiria Choba shuongei kaonyek leilutiko kaonyek pendou to kümbü nyi ditakei, hoba no püetlep lo?
Gozan, Haron, Rezef, hoba Telassara kibü Edenbü phangshuong laobou kübousi shuongei mautikei, phangshuong mühghaüei haoen khümenkei sai?
Hamatbü Choba, Arpadbü Choba, hoba Safarvaim sangnyubü Choba, Hena hoba Ivva Choba lanei ki?”
Hobaje ngühlang künbü shuong ik ka Hezekiaei le kho sungletkei, hoba kho wekei, hoba
Hobaje
O
Maimaitham
hoba haoeneibü mühghaü shuong wana jinkua; aishanga haoen mühghaü aying, lausikei müteibü ikkümiklei; bu si laang, khei yingbü khoei haoen khübü kho mautikua.
Tou khei yingbüei, O
Kheijinei Amozeibü shou Isaiaei Hezekia jungto hautiko laukei,
Nyi ao la awealauko nyikukei? Hobaje ao khulimbo nyi kaibü ngühang thükaeto angtikei? Hobaje kaibü nyek müh ae chühan angtikei? Israel Saopobü khulimbo!
Kaibü ngühthonbü shuong danko nyi
Ngei deikhün thukei hoba küksithangei dei yunga hoba ngeibü youdemei Ijepbü shumang pendou haptilabü.
“Lounyu haua, ngei kho lai lamlekei, shangied ngei kho lai yeitikei nyi adit lo? Kaibü lapheishon kümbü sangnyu shuong leilubü ontou aptila ngei tou kho haüthüktikei.
Hibü khübü mütli hau hanan kikei, haoen mokkei hoba phenyembo kikei, haoen khongthu kabü sang tegü, nyemsang tükdebü tegü chemdaka sangyembü, hoba momoko hopbü hangi tegü kikei.
“Lausikei no kibü, no haubü, no lotbü, hoba kü khu limbo maangpokbü ngei ngeakei.

Ngo khulimbo no khauangbü haangjung hoba no yonglam khulambü ngeibü noukhün sühsije, ngei ngeibü ngauyaüjin kaibü kunga jinkulabü, hoba kaibü sembunga janglüh jinkulabü, hoba no loubü lam to ngei no ngaitilabü.”

“Hobaje ka thedanga amaa- phelabü ho kilabü, ho po kanei hao lolo yembü ka shaulabü, hoba nyibou po jetei longbü ka hoba semboubüa kanei youli wenashi, hoba youshou latashi, hoba semlüh bamanga keshi, hoba khoeibü hek shaushi.
Hobaje Jihudabü chung ka satenbü joubü ka nyibou kao aenei atlabü hoba thükaenei hek heklabü;
aishanga Jerusalem ka jouletbü che haulabü, hoba Zion shongh ka haoen satenlabü;
“Khei yingsije Assiriabü Choba shanga
Hao loubü lamnyu to hao sepeinyu ngailabü, hoba hao ho sangnyu to aloulabü, dogo
Aishanga kü laüa hoba ngo khangenbou Dawid laüa ho khümenla ngei ho sangnyu thangetlabü.”
Hobaje khüyou
Hibü Assiriabü Choba Sennakherib meimeijung haukei hoba Ninevia kikei.

Hobaje ho hai kikei, hao haoeibü mühghaü Nisrokh chema lembo kijinei, Adramelek si Sharezerieibü shousiei inei hao haitikei hoba haoen Ararat kaonyek to satkei. Hobaje haoeibü shou Esarhadonei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Kho jihaphaia Hezekia hailabü lele shatko kikei. Hobaje Amozeibü shou Isaia thuseibou hao jungto loukei, hoba laukei, “
Kheijinei haoei jembü thenyek kümthang ae sepeikei, hoba
“O
Hobaje Isaiaei khong adankhümtoua
“Sepeijung ngaiashi, hoba ngeibü mütli lei- yeibou Hezekia to lenashi, ‘Kaibü
Hobaje ngei kaibü salangbü po anthükngao jinyokulabü, hoba ngei no hoba ho sangnyu Assiriabü ik ka khümenlabü, hoba ngei no hoba ho sangnyu laüa hoba ngo khangenbou Dawid laüa püetlabü.’ ”
Hobaje Isaiaei laukei, “Bhuk wentek che sungashi.” Hobaje haoenei kho sungjung louan bokbü moua thiptian phokukei, hoba hao maian apbei.
Hobaje Hezekiaei Isaia to laukei, “
Isaiaei jongaikei, “Ka shanga
Hobaje Hezekiaei jongaiko laukei, “Yeme shangaje thedang ae youyaü an libü kho sobou; lausikei yeme kho phaito youyaü an suktishi.”
Hobaje Isaia thuseibouei
Kho jihsiphaia Babilon Choba Baladaneibü shou Merodakh Baladanei Hezekia jungto le hoba jongsak künan hautikei; aieilausi Hezekia shatko kia dogo haoei ditkei.

Hezekiaei haoen olinko sungletkei, hoba haoei haoen la namsek peisilei pendou, khei chandinam, hon, ponlemhibü, namsek onang, hoba haoeibü hele thanshang chem hoba haoeibü nyaksinam pendou lenkei. Hezekiaei haoen la haoeibü chema ayingsi haoeibü sangle pendoua alenbü akitei.

Kheijinei Isaia thuseibou Hezekia Choba jungto loukei, hoba hao to laukei, “Khübü mütshuongei ai laukei? Hobaje haoen ka jungto laika loukei?” Hobaje Hezekiaei laukei, “Haoen kaodak saabü Babilon ka louakei.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Haoenei kaibü Choba chema ai hapbei?” Hobaje Hezekiaei jongaikei, “Ngeibü chema kibü pendou haoenei hapa, ngei haoen la ngeibü nyaksinam alenbü ai aki.”
Hobaje Isaiaei Hezekia to laukei, “
Chühashi, kaibü chema kibü pendou hoba kabousi shuongei tat sühko thanshaian kibü pendou Babilon to langlabü chalou louada; aikei ajoulabü dogo
Hobaje ka ka longbü kaibü shousi shuong, laobou ka ka pheklaje haoenei langlabü, hoba Babilon Choba chema sungphatbü mütshuong la yeilabü.”
Kheijinei Hezekiaei Isaia to laukei, “Nyi laubü
Tou Hezekiaeibü joubü kümsilei hoba haoeibü hau pendou hoba haoei lai deikhün sametbü si deiso kümbei hoba sangnyu to dei senjung loukei khübü kho Jihudabü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo?
Hobaje Hezekia bousi shuong yoa yepbei hoba hao shou Manasseei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Manasse songdakla khangjinei hao po anthüknyi kikei, hoba haoei Jerusalema po anjinsemto ngao songdakkei; haoeibü nyu nyen Hefziba kikei.
Hobaje

Aieilausi haobou Hezekiaei leilutibü haoei shongh lemshang kümbei, hoba haoei Baal shanga lemshang kümbei, hoba Israelbü Choba Ahab phatko Ashera che kümbei, hoba müha khanshoulitshou pendou to lembei, hoba khübü kho khangenkei.
Hobaje haoei
Hobaje
Hobaje haoei haoshou wana juokettikei, hoba shensingeei tetbütabü, hoba seibüyaübü kümsilei, yemshanla haubü hoba thuseihuonsei tegübü jungeikei; hoba haoei
Hobaje lembüchem laobou shangabü

ayingsi ngei haoen la sakkubü tegü pendou haoenei ong jungeiko laua longa, hoba ngo khangenbou Mosaei haoen la sakkubü tegü pendou kümbho laua longa, ngei haoeneibü bousi shuong la kubü kaonyek ka Israelbü you lubü to ayaülangtilabü,” dogo laukei, khonei haoei Ashera heangsho küman phokei.
Lausikei haoenei ngüha ale hoba phangshuong aoyou Israelbü shousi shuong thedang ka
Hobaje
“Jihudabü Choba Manasseei khübü mangsenlabü shuong kümsije hoba haoen thedanga kibü Amorbü limlangko amaibü kümbei hoba heangshoei Jihudabü shed shontisije;
Israel Mühghaüei hai lauda: Chühashi, Jerusalem hoba Jihuda thükto ngei amaibü thushed che loutilabü, khei aoyouei ho shangabü ditlaje jiji nou hama jolabü.
Ngei Jerusalem thükto Samaria khulimbo takbü janglüh jenlabü, hoba Ahab chemdang takbü janglüh jenlabü hoba mütei phau sakan haman apan küpjeman phobü tegü ngei Jerusalem haman aplabü.
Hobaje ngeibü phetphanbü jouletbü tekan aplabü hoba haoen dangbou ik to khümbo kulabü, hoba haoen kho dangbou pendou thüka haoen haitilabü hoba soshau soyungbü yeilabü;
aieilausi kü thea ai amai kho haoenei kümbei, hoba haoeneibü bousi shuong Ijep kaodak ka longan, tat sühko haoenei ngo khau angtikei.”
Aeilaleko tokei haoeibü shabü laobou
Tou Manasseeibü joubü kümsilei hoba haoei jungeibü shabü shuong, kho Jihudabü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo?
Hobaje Manasse bousi shuong yoa yepbei, hoba haoeibü chem bamanga Uzzaeibü bamanga khünkei; hoba haoshou Amonei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Hobaje Amon, hao songdakla khangjinei hao po saoto nyi kikei, hoba haoei Jerusalema po nyi songdakkei, hoba tou hao nyueibü nyen Meshullemet, Jotbabü Haruzeibü shou kikei.
Hobaje haobou Manasseei kümbü tegü
Hobaje haobou paibü lamnyu pendoua hao paikei, hoba haobouei khangenbü heangsho shuong khangenkei, hoba khübü kho lembei;
hoba haoei bousi shuongeibü Mühghaü
Hobaje Amoneibü khangenbü shuongei hao khulimbo amaibü huon takkei hoba Choba kho haoeibü jembü chema haitikei.
Lausikei Amon Choba khulimbo huon takbü shuong pendou, kho kaonyek kabü mütshuongei haitikei, hoba kaonyek kabü mütshuongei hao jeiko hao shou Josia Choba yeitikei.
Tou Amoneibü joubü kümsilei laobou haoei kümbei khübü kho Jihudabü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo?
Hobaje hao jembü heea Uzza bamanga khünkei, hoba haoeibü shou Josiaei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Josiaei songdak khangjinei hao po set kikei, hoba haoei Jerusalema po khujinto che songdakkei. Haonyu Bozkathbü Adaiaeibü nouyangshou Jedida nyenbü kikei.
Hobaje laobou
Hobaje Josia Choba po anthükset boubüa Meshullameibü shou Azaliaeibü shou dobou Sha- fan
“Thükkabou ungshedbou Hilkia jungto, khei nam laobou koukhün lombü shuongei mütshuong ka yoshaibü
hoba haoenei kho
mistri shuong, chemdangbü shuong, hoba laangeibü mistri shuong la, hoba chem kümetla shanga wa hoba jakenbü laang jekla shanga kutiashi.
Khei yingsikei haoeneibü ik to jinkubü kho teweyo; aieilausi haoenei ngühmaanglanko kümbei.”
Hobaje thükkabou ungshedbou Hilkiaei dobou Shafan to laukei, “Ngei
Hobaje dobou Shafan Choba jungto loukei, hoba nyibou Choba jungto ngüh kho jungan loukei, hoba laukei, “No khangenbü shuongei chem ka hapbü nam kho hakshaikua, hoba kho
Hobaje dobou Shafanei Choba to laukei, “Ungshedbou Hilkiaei kü la le che kuakei.” Hobaje Shafanei Choba junga kho wekei.
Hobaje ladang Chobaei Ngühkhüm Le kabü ngühshuong kho ditkei, haoei haoeibü neisimei jitnyinkei.
Hobaje Chobaei ungshedbou Hilkia, Shafaneibü shou Ahikam, Mekaiaeibü shou Akbor, dobou Shafan hoba Choba khangenbou Asaia la sakkuko laukei,
“Hauashi, kü shanga hoba mütli shanga Jihudabü pendou shanga ho le hapan kibü shanga

Hibü ungshedbou Hilkia, Ahikam, Akbor, Shafan hoba Asa- iaeibü neisimei phoshang lombou Harhaseibü shou Tikvaeibü shou Shallumeibü yak Hulda thuseinyu jungto haukei, (tou sao Jerusalema kishang nyiboubüa kikei) hoba haoenei sao to joyokei.
Hobaje saoei haoen to laukei, “

Aieilausi haoenei ngo inletkei hoba haoen ikküm iklei pendouei haoenei ngo khau angtila shanga lubü mühghaü shuong la ponlemhibü juokkukei; khoei ho kaonyek khulimbo ngo maangpoklabü, hoba kho maang athonlabü.’
Lausikei Jihudabü Choba, aoei kan
kaibü maangpon inyaitham kisije hoba no lolo

Khei yingalonga, chühashi, ngei kaibü pisi bousi shuong jungto no leijung loulabü hoba no kaibü hee to haksobüa leian loulabü, ayingsi ngei ho kaodak to ladang thushed sungbalaje, kho kaibü nyekei ühüplabü.’ ”
Hobaje haoenei Choba jungto nyibou ngühlang kho sungbakei.
Hobaje Chobaei hautikei hoba haoen Jihudabü si Jerusalembü jaishou shuong pendou hao jungto yoshaikei.
Hobaje
Hobaje Choba lemshon nyangko lokei hoba
Kheijinei Hilkia ungshedbou si nyiboubü ungshedbou hoba koukhün lombü shuong to

Hobaje heangsho lembü ungshedbou shuong aoyou Jihudabü Choba shuongei Jihudabü sangnyu shuong shongh lemshang hoba Jerusalem kaijembo ponlem- hibü juokla pienkei, hoba tokei Baal to, chanyu to, khanshoulitshou naamsen, hoba mühkabü khanshoulitshou pendou to ponlemhibü juokbü shuong haoei thaktikei.
Hobaje haoei
Hobaje

Hobaje Jihudabü sangnyu shuong ka ungshedbou shuong pendou haoei leian loukei, hoba ungshedbou shuongei ponlemhibü juokshang shongh shuong lemshang Geba ka Beersheba sühko shatikei, hoba sangnyua governor Joshuaeibü bakhün to atshang shongh lemshang bakhün kho haoei leilukukei, kho sangnyu bakhün to atshang nanaenei kikei.
Khei yingasikei shongh lemshang ungshedbou shuongei Jerusalema
Hobaje Hinnom pholia khei mütpem wekoei lulueibü nouyang jayangshou Molek la wanei ajuoktila shanga, haoei Tofet saüjim la yeitikei.
Hobaje Jihudabü Choba shuongei chanyu la lemla kuko kibü koli shuong
Hobaje lemshang laobou Ahaz shemjang thükkaboua kikei, laobou Jihudabü Choba shuongei küman kikei, hoba

Hobaje Jerusalem chaang aekabü shongh lemshang laobou Israelbü Choba Solomonei Ashto- reth shanga Zidonbü mangsenlabü kümsilei küman kikei, hoba Khemosh shanga Moabbü mangsenlabü kümsilei, hoba Molek shanga Ammonbü shousi shuong mangsenlabü kümsilei Chobaei shaan aptikei.
Hobaje haoei saopobü thaonyu shuong netla yeiko ngümnyinkukei, hoba Ashe- ra wapan koutikei, hoba haoen kishang müteibü loei shentikei.

Tokei Bethela kibü lemshang hoba Nebateibü shou Jeroboam, aoei Israelbü la shabü jungeitikei, haoei shongh lemshang küman kibü, khei shongh lemshang kümbü kho haoei leilukei, hoba haoei shongh lemshang kho jikkei hoba thamngu la yeiko ngümnyinkukei; hoba Ashera kho jikan apbei.
Hobaje Josia sepeikei hoba shongha kibü hee shuong kho hapbei; hao haukei hoba hee ka lo sungenkei hoba khübü kho lemshanga jikkei; hoba Mühghaü müt, aoei khübü kümsilei ngekletkukei,

Kheijinei haoei laukei, “Thi aenei ngei hapbü laang kho ai?” Kheijinei sangnyu kabü mütshuongei hao to laukei, “Ho Mühghaü müteibü hee ki, ao Jihuda ka loukei, hoba Bethel lemshang khulimbo nyi ai kümbei khübü kümsilei ngekletkukei.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Hao khei apyoshi, aoeikei haoeibü lo tesungen.” Hibü haoenei Samaria ka longbü thuseibüeibü lo yoa haoeibü lo khei apyokei.
Hobaje chem pendou tokei shongh lemshang kümbü Samaria sangnyu shuonga kibü laobou Israel Choba shuongei
Hobaje shongh lemshanga ungshedbü pendou aoyou khünei kikei, haoei lemshang thüka haitikei hoba khübü thüka müteibü lo juokkei, hoba kho phaia hao Jerusalem to ngaikei.
Kheijinei Chobaei müt pendou la sakkuko laukei, “The- yolanyobü ho lea doan kibü tegü
Maimaitham Israelbü matjem, matjembou shuong jihsiphai ka, ayingsi Israelbü Choba haangbü pendoua ayingsi Jihudabü Choba haanga ho tegü ajungei.
Lausikei Josia Choba po anthükset boubüa
Tokei yemshanla haubü shuong, manghtakbü seibüyaübü shuong apbukei; hoba thaonyua chemso kümbü hoba Jihuda si Jerusalema hapbü mangsenlabü kümsilei pendou
Hobaje hao thedanga, haoeibü maangpon pendouei, Mosa ngühkhüm pendou tegütham
Khei yingsikei
Hobaje
Tou Josiaeibü joubü kümsilei hoba haoei kümbü pendou, khübü kho Jihudabü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo?
Hao haanga Ijepbü Choba Farao Nekoei Assiriabü Choba to thuila Eufrates shumang to angkei, hoba Josia Choba hao lothetla haukei; hoba Ijep Chobaei hao Megiddoa haitikei.

Hobaje hao khangenbü shuongei hao kailong chenei Megiddo ka haian künlangkei hoba hao Jerusalem to sungbakei hoba hao jembü heea khünkei. Hobaje kaonyek kabü mütliei Josiaeibü shou Jehoahaz lekei hoba hao la onang naangkukei, hoba haobou jeiko Choba yeitikei.
Jehoahaz songdakla khangjinei hao po saoto sem kikei, hoba haoei Jerusalema lit sem songdakkei, hoba haoeibü nyu nyen Hamutal, Libnabü Jeremiaeibü nouyangnyu kikei.
Hobaje haoeibü bousi shuongei kümbü pendou hima laobou

Kheijinei Farao Nekoei Jerusalema haoei song adaktila hao thüngdanga Riblaa Hamath kaodaka phokei; hoba kaonyek kho chandinam seret khujin bang atbü saongao hoba hon seret khujin bang atbü che hao dela phokei.
Kheijinei Farao Nekoei Josiaeibü shou Eliakim, haobou Josia jeiko Choba yeitikei, hoba haoeibü nyen Jehoakim dogo jeikukei. Hobaje Jehoahaz Ijep to leilangkei hoba khünei haikei.

Hobaje Jehoakimei Ijep Choba Faraoei hibü tegü hon si chandinam kukei, lausikei Faraoei khangsibü tegü nam kho kula shanga haoei kaonyek thüka tukosekko khüm hela yeikei. Mütpem weko ka Farao Neko la kula shanga kaonyek kabü mütli ka hon si chandinam luluei kibü thüng haoei sungkei.
Jehoakim songdakla khangjinei hao po saoto ngao kikei, hoba haoei Jerusalema po anthük che songdakkei, hoba haoeibü nyu nyen Rumabü Pedaiaeibü nou- yangshou Zebida kikei.
Hobaje haoei haoeibü bousi shuongei kümbü pendou tegü laobou
Haoeibü chalou shuonga Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnezzar longkei hoba kaonyek kho shikei, hoba Jehoakimei po sem hao khangenkei, kho phaia hao ngaian hao khulimbo longkei.
Hobaje
Maimaitham Manasseeibü shedbü haangjung haoei kümbü pendou tegü, hoba tokei haoei laobou shedbü akibü sii angtikei; aieilausi haoei shedbü akibü siiei Jerusalem shentikei.
ei sakkubüei ho hao ka sungngaila shanga Jihuda thükto ho loushadkei, khoei
Tou Jehoakimei kümbü lubü kümsilei hoba haoei kümbü pendou kho Jihudabü Choba shuong Lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo?
Hibü Jehoakim haoeibü bousi shuong yoa yepbei, hoba haoeibü shou Jehoakhinei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Hobaje touje Ijepbü Choba nyibou jembü kaodak ka along; aieilausi Babilonbü Chobaei Ijep shumang ka Eufrates shumang sühko Ijep Chobaeibü pendou lean kikei.
Jehoakhinei songdakla khangjinei hao po anthükset kikei, hoba haoei Jerusalema lit sem songdakkei, hoba haoeibü nyu Nehusta Jerusalembü Elnathaneibü nouyangshou kikei.
Hobaje bouei kümbü pendou tegütham, laobou
Kho chaloua Babilonbü Choba Nebukhanezzar khangenbü shuong Jerusalem to sangshila loukei hoba sangnyu kho komlepbei.
Hobaje Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnezzar, haoeibü khangenbü shuongei kho komlepan kijinei sangnyu khüto angkei;

hoba Jihudabü Choba Jehoakhin Babilonbü Choba jungto hao hoba haoeibü nyu hoba hao khangenbü shuong, hoba haoeibü yaangenbü shuong hoba haoeibü sungphatbü mütshuong haukei, hoba haoei songdakbü po set boubüa Babilonbü Chobaei hao lapbei.
Hobaje

Hobaje haoei Jerusalem pendou hoba yaangenbü pendou, hau kibü sekbülakbü pendou, khei thüngbü müt hajar an, hoba bueibü kümsilei kümbü hoba nam yaübü pendou langsenkei; kaonyeka shaleboutham tan to liman ao üpyo.
Hobaje haoei Jehoakhin Babilon to leilangkei hoba Chobaeibü nyu hoba Chobaeibü yaksi shuong, hoba haoeibü sungphatbü mütshuong hoba kaonyeka konglebü shuong haoei Jerusalem ka Babilon to laplangkei.

Hobaje hauki yaangkibü mütshuong pendou, khei hajar nyet hoba bueibü kümsilei kümbü hoba namyaübü hajar che, haoen pendou haukibü hoba wapyola mubü, haoen kho Babilonbü Chobaei lapan Babilon to leilangkei.
Hobaje Babilonbü Chobaei Jehoakhineibü bou nashoubou hao jeiko Choba yeitikei, hoba haoeibü nyen Zedekia jeikukei.
Zedekia Choba yeibü jiha hao po saoto che kikei, hoba haoei Jerusalema po anthük che songdakkei, hoba haoeibü nyu nyen Hamutal, Libnabü Jeremiaeibü nouyangshou kikei.
Hobaje haoei Jehoakimei kümbü pendou tegütham, laobou
Aishanga

Tou hao songdakbü po gü boubü, lit an boubü, chalou an boubüa Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnezzar, hao hoba haoeibü sepai tan Jerusalem khulimbo loukei; kho khulimbo louan setan sühshang kümbei hoba kho kaijembo lapheishon shekei.
Hibü sangnyu kho Zedekia Choba po anthük che boubüa sühko komlepan kikei.
Lit leiboubü, chalou gü boubüa sangnyu khünei mühsinou kaangko kikei, hibü kaonyeka müt shuong shanga shausiyung akitei.

Kheijinei sangnyu kho panyetkei hoba Choba si sepai pendou nangnak kümthang penyi kanglang, laobou Chobaeibü ba nyangko kikei, bakhün lamnyu khüto satkei, (tou Khaldibü, sangnyu khulimbo kaijembo kikei) hoba Choba kho Araba lam to satkei.
Lausikei Khaldibü, sepai tan Choba phaito shijung haukei hoba Jerikho pholia hao laphetkei; hoba haoeibü sepai tan pendou hao ka linjung satkei.
Kheijinei haoenei Choba kho lapbei, hoba Babilonbü Choba jungto Ribla to leian angkei hoba haoenei hao thükto matjem kukei.
Hobaje haoenei Zedekiaeibü shousi shuong hao thea haitikei, hoba Zedekiaeibü nyek phekan apbukei hoba namlühei hao khühkei, hoba Babilon to leian haukei.
Tou lit ngao boubü chalou nyetbounyeta laobou Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnezzar po anthük gü boubü kikei, Babilon Choba khangenbou che lombou lajamleibou Nebuzaradan Jerusalem to loukei.
Hobaje haoei
Hobaje lombü shuong thüka lajamleibou yoa kibou Khaldibü sepai tan pendouei Jerusalem kümthang kaijembo khapyetkei.
Tokei sangnyua apyobü joubü mütshuong hoba apyoan satbü shuong aoyou Babilon Choba jungto satetlangkei, hoba jouletbü dan lombou thüka lajamleibou Nebuzaradanei laplangkei.
Lausikei lombü thüka lajamleibouei kaonyeka shaleboutham mütli at semlüh nitbü hoba sekmoubü shuong yingla apyokei.
Hobaje
Hobaje chak, suokjin, namphei, wankak kipjin hoba nyaklak hoba haoenei jungeibü chinamshou, jaksiam, pendou haoenei sunglangkei.
Hobaje wansuokjin hoba phauyaang, ai ong hon ka kümbei kho hon, hoba ai ong chandinam ka kümbei kho chandinam tegütham lombou lajamleibouei sunglangkei.
Thaonyu penyi kho, sidang che kho, hoba denshang laobou Solomonei

Thaonyu che kho iknop anthükset suokbü kikei, hoba kho thüka chinamei thaonyu sembung noksa denan phoan kikei, hoba thaonyu sembung noksa iknop sem loubü kikei, hoba noksa nyonglepan kümbü kho kaijembo kiplepbü hoba chilang chipen pendou chinamei küman kikei, hoba khübü kho phatko nyiboubü thaonyu khüneikei pepyoko kümbü kikei.
Hobaje lombou lajamleibou khoei thükkabü ungshedbou Se- raia, hoba nyiboubü ungshedbou Zefania hoba koukhün lombü müt sem lapbei.

Hobaje sangnyu ka wapyobü mütshuong thüka phokubü sungphatbü müt che; hoba Choba yoa liko kibü müt ngao, aoyou sangnyua hapbei, hoba kaonyeka sepai tan ngashaibou lajamleibou dobou hoba sangnyua hapbü kaonyeka kibü müt saosem haoei lapbei.
Hobaje lombou thüka lajamleibou Nebuzaradanei haoen lapbei, hoba haoen Babilonbü Choba jungto Ribla to sungbakei.
Hobaje Babilonbü Chobaei haoen to ngümbei hoba Hamath kaoa haoen Riblaa haitikei. Kho tegü Jihudabü haoen kaodak ka langsenbü la yeian leilangkei.
Hobaje Jihuda kaodaka Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnezzarei apyobü mütli shanga kho haoen thükakei haoei Shafaneibü shou Ahikameibü shou Gedalia kho governor yeitikei.

Tou sepai tan lajamleibü pendouei haoen si haoeneibü mütli Babilonbü Chobaei Gedalia governor yeitia dogo ditjinei haoen Mizpa to Gedalia jungto loukei, khei Nethaniaeibü shou Ishmael, Kareaeibü shou Johanan, Netofatbü Tanhumetheibü shou Seraia hoba Makateibü shou Jazania, haoen hoba haoen mütli loukei.
Hobaje haoen si haoen mütli to Gedaliaei theyolanyokei, hoba haoen to laukei, “Khaldibü khangenbü shuong shanga tehüt, kaonyeka kishi; Babilon Choba khangen- ashi, hoba kan maisho kilabü.”
Lausikei lit nyet boubüa Elishamaeibü shou Nethaniaeibü shou Ishmael, Chobaeibü chem- pen, hao yoa müt an loukei, hoba Gedalia hoba Mizpaa Jihudabü si Khaldibü hao yoa kibü shuong haitikei.
Hobaje müt pendou hanbü yaangbü ham hoba sepai tan thüka lajamleibü shuong meimeikei, hoba Ijep to loukei; aieilausi haoen Khaldibü to hatko kikei.

Hobaje Jihudabü Choba Jehoakhin laplangbü po khujinto nyet boubüa lit anthük nyi boubü chalou saoto nyet boubüa Babilonbü Choba Evil-Merodakei haoeibü songdakbü shaangboubü poa Jihudabü Choba Jehoakhin thüngshang ka leiyenkei.
Hobaje haoei hao to huphanga joyokei, hoba hao yoa Babilona kibü Choba shuong setshang thüka hao la setshang che kukei.
Hobaje haoei thüngbüeibü neisimei jeikei, hoba haoeibü salang sünga Chobaeibü khümsoka athakko shauko yungko kikei.
Hobaje haoeibü takletkubü munam shanga Choba ka athakko takletkubü munam che haoeibü salang sünga chalou angbou phejan che kuko kikei.
Adam, Seth, Enok,
Kenan, Mahalalel, Jared,
Enok, Methusela, Lamek, Noa,
Noaeibü shousi shuong Shem, Ham hoba Jafet,
Jafeteibü shousi shuong: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshek, hoba Tiras,
Gomereibü shousi shuong: Ashkenas, Difath, hoba Togarma,
Javaneibü shousi shuong: Elisha, Tarshish, Kittim, hoba Rotarim.
Hameibü shousi shuong: Kush, Ijep, Put hoba Kanan,
Kusheibü shousi shuong: Seba, Havila, Sabta, Raama, hoba Sabteka. Raamaeibü shousi shuong: Sheba hoba Dedan.
Kusheibü bou kho Nimrod kikei, kaodaka hao hau yaangbü la yeila khangkei.
Hobaje Mizraim ka Ijep Lidia, Anam, Lehab, Naftu,
Pathrus, Kaslu, (ho ka Filistiabü loukei) hoba Kaftorbü pakkei.
Kananei Sidon hao shaang bukkei hoba kho phaia Het.
Hobaje Jebusbü, Amorbü, Girgasbü,
Hivbü, Arkbü, Sinbü,
Arvadbü, Zemarbü, hoba Hamatbü pakkei.
Shemeibü shousi shuong: Elam, Asshur, Arfakshad, Lud, Aram, Uz, Hul, Gether, hoba Meshek.
Arfakshad ka Shela pakkei, hoba Shela ka Eber pakkei.
Eber la bousushou müt nyi bukkukei, cheeibü nyen Peleg kikei (aieilausi haoeibü chaloua kaodak jankei) hoba haoeibü na Joktan kikei.
Joktaneibü shousi shuong: Almadad, Shelef, Hazarmavet, Jera,
Hadoram, Uzal, Dikla,
Ebal, Abimael, Sheba,
Ofir, Havila, Jobab pakkei. Khübü pendou Joktaneibü shousi shuong kikei.
Shem, Arfakshad, Shela,
E- ver, Peleg, Reu,
Serug, Nahor, Tera.
Abram, (kho Abraham).
Abrahameibü shousi müt nyi kikei, Isak si Ishmael.
Habü ho Ishmaeleibü shaang bukbü shousi shuong: Nebaiot, Kedar, Adbel, Mibsam,
Mishma, Duma, Maasa, Hadad, Tema,
Jetur, Nafis hoba Kedema, habü ho Ishmaeleibü shousi shuong ki.
Abrahameibü thangnyu Keturaeibü shousi shuong: Saoei Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak hoba Shua bukkei. Jokshaneibü shousi shuong: Sheba si Dedan,
Midianeibü shousi shuong: Efa, Efer, Hanok, Abida, hoba Elda. Habü pendou Ketura ka bukbü kikei.
Abraham ka Isak pakkei. Isakeibü shou müt nyi Esau si Jakob.
Esaueibü shousi shuong: Elifaz, Reuel, Jeush, Jalam, hoba Kora.
Elifazeibü shousi shu- ong: Teman, Omar, Zefi, Gatam, Kenaz, Timna, hoba Amalek.
Reueleibü shousi shuong: Nahat, Zera, Shemma, hoba Mizza.
Seireibü shousi shuong: Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Ana, Dishon, Ezer hoba Dishan.
Hobaje Lotaneibü shousi shuong: Hori si Honam, hoba Lotaneibü nousina Timna nyenan kikei.
Shobaleibü shousi shuong: Alian, Manahat, Ebal, Shefi hoba Onam, Zibeoneibü shousi shuong: Aia hoba Ana.
Anaeibü shousi shuong: Dishon, hoba Dishoneibü shousi shuong: Hamran, Eshban, Ithran, hoba Keran.
Ezereibü shousi shuong: Bilhan, Evan, hoba Jaakan, Dishaneibü shousi shuong: Uz hoba Aran.
Tou Israelbü aoeikei song adakjinei Edom kaodaka habü habü Choba shuongei songdakkei.
Beoreibü shou Bela, hoba haoeibü sangnyu nyen Dinhaba kikei.
Ladang Bela haikei, Bozrabü Zeraeibü shou Jobabei hao jeila songdakkei.
Ladang Jobab haikei, Temanbü Hushamei hao jeila songdakkei.
Ladang Husham haikei Badadeibü shou Hadad, aoei Moab kaodaka Midian thükkei, haoei hao jeila songdakkei. Haoeibü sangnyu nyen Avit kikei.
Ladang Hadad haikei, Mas- rekabü Samlaei hao jeila songdakkei.
Ladang Semla haikei, Re- hobotbü Shaulei hao jeila songdakkei.
Ladang Shaul haikei, Akboreibü shou Baalhananei hao jeila songdakei.
Ladang Baalhanan haikei, Hadadei hao jeila songdakkei. Haoeibü sangnyu nyen Pai kikei, hoba haoeibü yak nyen Matredeibü shou Mezahabeibü shi Mehatabel kikei.
Hobaje Hadad haikei. Edombü konglebü shuong kho Timna, Alia, Jethet.
Aholibama, Ela, Pinon,
Kenaz, Teman, Mibzar,
Magdiel hoba Iram konglebü shuong. Habü ho Edom konglebü shuong ki.
Habü ho Jakobeibü shousi shuong: Reuben, Simon, Levi, Jihuda, Issakar, hoba Zebulun,
Dan, Josef, Benjamin, Naftali, Gad, hoba Asher.
Jihudaeibü shousi shuong: Er, Onam, hoba Shela, haoen sem kho Kananbü sao Bathshuaei hao la bukkukei. Tou Er, Jihudaeibü shaang bukbü shou,
Haoshou maunyu Tamarei hao la Perez si Zera bukkukei. Jihudaeibü shousi pendouei müt ngao kikei.
Perezeibü shousi Hezron si Hamul,
Zeraeibü shousi shuong: Zimri, Ethan, Heman, Kalkol hoba Dara, pendouei müt ngao.
Karmieibü shousi Akhan, Israelbü la khonsak kubou aoei khümbo kubü peialeia mat hapbei.
Hobaje Ethaneibü shou Azaria kikei.
Tou Hezroneibü shousi: Jerahmeel, Ram hoba Kaleb.
Ram ka Amenadab pakkei, hoba Amenadab ka Nashon pakkei, ao Jihudabü kongyubou kikei.
Nashon ka Salmon pakkei hoba Salmon ka Boaz pakkei.
Boaz ka Obed pakkei hoba Obed ka Jesse pakkei.
Jesse ka shaangboubü bukbü Eliab pakkei, nyiboubü kho Abinadab, semboubü kho Shemea.
Leiboubü kho Nathanel ngaoboubü kho Raddai.
Lakboubü kho Ozem, nyetboubü kho Dawid,
hoba haoeneibü nousinasi shuong kho Zeruia hoba Abigal, Zeruiaeibü shousi shuong: Abishai, Joab, hoba Ashel haoen sem.
Abigalei Amasa bukkei, hoba Amasaeibü bou kho Ishmaelbü Jether kikei.
Hezroneibü shou Kalebeibü yak Azuba hoba Jeriotei shousi shuong kikei, hoba khübü kho saoeibü shousi shuong kikei. Josher, Shoba, hoba Ardon.
Ladang Azuba haikei Kalebei Efrat lekei, aoei hao la Hur bukkukei.
Hur ka Uri bukkei, hoba Uri ka Bezalel pakkei.
Phaila Gileadeibü bou Makireibü nouyangnyu jungto Hezron atkei, haoei sao hao po saosem jai lean ngakei, hoba saoei hao la Segub bukkukei.
Hobaje Segub ka Jair pakkei, haoei Gilead kaodaka sangnyu saoto sem kikei.
Hobaje Geshur si Aramei haoen Haveth, Jair, Kenat hoba haoeibü sangnyu shuong khei sangnyu saosem lekei. Khübü pendou Makir, Gileadeibü bou ka pakbü shuong.
Hobaje Hezron Kaleb Efrathaa haian phaia, Hezron yak Abijaei hao la Tekoaeibü bou Ashur bukkukei.
Hezroneibü shaang bukbü shou Jerameeleibü shousi shuong: Ram jaishoubou, Buna, Oren, Ozem, hoba Ahija.
Hobaje Ramei shousi müt sem kikei: Maaz, Jamin hoba Eker.
Jerameelei tokei lubü yak che kikei, saoeibü nyen Atara, sao Onameibü nyu kikei.
Onamei shousi müt nyi kikei: Shammai hoba Jada, hoba Shammaiei shousi müt nyi kikei: Nadab hoba Abishur.
Abishur yakeibü nyen Abi- hail kikei, hoba saoei Ahban si Molid hao la bukkukei.
Nadabeibü shousi shuong: Seled si Appaim; lausikei Seledei shousi üpyokuko haikei.
Appaimeibü shou Ishi hoba Ishieibü shou Sheshan, Sheshaneibü shou Ahlai.
Shemmaieibü jaisina Jadaeibü shousi shuong: Jether si Jonathan, hoba Jether shousi akiko haikei.
Jonathaneibü shousi shuong: Pelet si Zaza, habü kho Jerameeleibü shousi shuong kikei.
Tou Sheshanei bousushou aki yaksashou ong kikei, lausikei Sheshanei Ijepbü sambü che kikei, haoeibü nyen Jarha.
Sheshanei haoeibü nouyangshou haoeibü sambü Jarha la letikei, hoba saoei hao la Attai bukkukei.
Hobaje Attai ka Nathan pakkei hoba Nathan ka Zabad pakkei.
Zabad ka Efilal pakkei, hoba Efilal ka Obed pakkei.
Obed ka Jehu pakkei hoba Jehu ka Azaria pakkei.
Azaria ka Helez pakkei hoba Helez ka Eleasa pakkei.
Eleasa ka Sismai pakkei hoba Sismai ka Shallum pakkei.
Shallum ka Jakamia pakkei, hoba Jakamia ka Elishama pakkei.
Jerameeleibü jaisina Kalebeibü shousi shuong: Maresha, haoeibü shaang bukbü shou ao Zifeibü bou kikei; hoba Hebroneibü bou Mareshaeibü shousi shuong:
hoba Hebroneibü shousi shuong: Kora, Tapua, Rekem, hoba Shema.
Hobaje Shema ka Jorkeameibü bou Raham pakkei, hoba Rekem ka Shammai pakkei.
Shemaieibü shou Maon kikei, hoba Bethzu- reibü bou Maon kikei.
Tokei Kalebeibü thangnyu Efaei Haran, Moza, hoba Gazez bukkei hoba Haran ka Gazed pakkei.
Jahdaieibü shousi shuong: Regem, Jotham, Geshan, Pelet, Efa, hoba Shaaf.
Kalebeibü thangnyu Maakaei Sheber si Tirhana bukkei.
Saoei tokei Madmannaeibü bou Shaaf Makbenaeibü bou Sheva hoba Gibeaeibü bou bukkei, hoba Kalebeibü yaksa shou kho Aksa kikei.
Khübü kho Kaleb ka pakbü kikei. Hureibü shousi shuong, Efrata ka shaang bukbü Shobal, Kirjath-jearimeibü bou.
Bethlehemeibü bou Salma, Beth- Gadereibü bou Harif.
Kirjathjearimeibü bou Shobalei shousi lubü kikei; Haroe, Menuhoteibü mütli jamde.
Hobaje Kirjathjearim chempen shuong: Ithribü, Putbü, Shumatbü, hoba Mishrabü khübü ka Zareat si Eshtaulbü loukei.
Salmaeibü shousi shuong: Bethlehem, Neto- fatbü Atarot Beth Joab, hoba Manahetbü jamde, Zoarbü.
Jebeza kibü chempen dobü shuong kakei, Tiratbü, Shimeatbü, hoba Sukatbü, habü ho Rekab chempen bou Hammat ka loubü Kenbü ki.
Habü ho Dawideibü shousi shuong: Hebrona hao ka pakbü ki: Shaangla bukbü Amnon, Jezreel, sao Ahinoam ka, nyiboubü kho Daniel, Karmel, sao Abigal ka.
Semboubü kho Absalom, nyu kho Geshurbü Choba Talmaieibü nouyangshou Maaka kikei; leiboubü kho Adonija, nyu kho Haggit kikei.
Ngaoboubü kho Shefatia, Abital ka, lakboubü kho Ithream, hao yak Egla ka
Hebrona haola müt lak bukkukei, laoboua haoei po nyet lit lak songdakkei; hoba haoei Jerusalema po khujinto sem songdakkei.
Habü ho hao la Jerusalema bukkukei: Shimea, Shobab, Nathan hoba Solomon, khübü müt lei kho Ammieleibü shou Bathshebaei hao la khünei bukkukei.
Hobaje Ibhar, Elishua, Elpelet,
Noga, Nefeg, Japhia,
Elishama, Eliada, hoba Elifelet, haoen gü.
Thangnyu shuongeibü shousi ayoko habü pendou Dawideibü shousi kikei, hoba Tamar kho haoen nousina kikei.
Solomoneibü thensilen: Re- hoboam, hao shou Abija, hao shou Asa, hao shou Jehoshafat,
hao shou Joram, hao shou Ahazia, hao shou Joash,
hao shou Amazia, hao shou Azaria, hao shou Jotham,
hao shou Ahaz, hao shou Hezekia, hao shou Manasse,
hao shou Amon, hao shou Josia.
Josiaeibü shousi shuong: Shaang bukbü Johanan, nyiboubü Jehoiakim, semboubü Zedekia, leiboubü Shallum,
Jehoiakimeibü shousi shuong: hao shou Jekonia, hao shou Zedekia.
Hobaje langsenbou Jehoiakhineibü shousi shuong: Salthiel,
Malkiram, Pedaia, Shebazzar, Jekamia, Hosama, hoba Nedabia.
Hobaje Pedaiaeibü shousi shuong: Zerubbabel, hoba Shimei; hoba Zerubbabeleibü shousi shu- ong: Meshullam hoba Manania, hoba Shilomit kho haoeneibü nousina kikei,
hoba Hashuba, Ohel, Berkia, Hasadia, hoba Jushab-hesed, haoen ngao.
Hananiaeibü shousi: Pelatia, hoba Jesaia; hao shou Refaia, hao shou Arnan, hao shou Obadia, hao shou Shekania.
Shekaniaeibü shousi: Shemaia, hoba Shemaiaeibü shousi shuong: Hattush, Igeal, Baria, Nearia hoba Shafat, haoen müt lak.
Neariaeibü shousi shuong: Elioenai, Hezekia, hoba Azrikam, haoen sem.
Elioenai shousi shuong: Hodaia, Eliashib, Belaia, Akkub, Johanan, Dalaia, hoba Anani, haoen müt nyet.
Jihudaeibü thensilen: Perez, Hezron, Karmi, Hur, hoba Shobal,
Shobaleibü shou Reai ka Jahat pakkei hoba Jahat kho Ahumai si Lahadeibü bou kikei. Habü ho Zaret chempen kikei.
Hobaje habü ho Etameibü shousi kikei: Jezreel, Ishma, hoba Idbas; hoba haoeneibü nousinaeibü nyen Hazzeletboni.
Hobaje Penuel kho Gedoreibü bou kikei, hoba Ezer kho Hushaeibü bou Bethlehemeibü bou Efratha ka shaangla bukbü.Hureibü shousi habü ho kikei:
Ashur, Tekoaeibü bouei yak müt nyi kikei, Hela hoba Naara.
Naaraei hao la Ashuzam, Hefer, Temeni hoba Nahastari bukkukei. Habü ho Naaraseibü shousi kikei.
Helaeibü shousi shuong: Zeret, Jezoar, hoba Ethnan.
Koz kho Anub, Zobeba, hoba Harumeibü shou Aharhel chungeibü bou kikei.
Jabez kho haoeibü jaisinasi shuong toje aei soumo kuko kikei, hoba nyuei haoeibü nyen Jabez dogo nyenkei, “Aieilausi ngo maangshata bukkei,” dogo laukei.

Hobaje Jabezei Israel Mühghaü to ngako laukei, “Oh, nyi ngo haübü hoba ngeibü leilang yaangngaitibüma, hoba kaibü ik kü yoa kishima, hoba ngo maangto ashatlabü lele nyi ngo khonsak ka senetshima.” Hobaje haoei ai phekei kho Mühghaüei sakkukei.
Hobaje Shuaeibü jaisina Kaleb ka Mehir pakkei, hao Eshtoneibü bou kikei.
Eshton ka Bethrafa, Pasea hoba Tehinna, Nahasheibü bou pakkei. Habü ho Reka müt ki.
Kenazeibü shousi shuong: Othniel hoba Seraia; hoba Othnieleibü shousi shuong Hathat hoba Meonothai.
Meonothai Ofraeibú bou kikei hoba Seraia ka Geraashimeibü bou Joab pakkei, aieilausi haoen ikkümiklei shuong ngebü kikei.
Jefunneeibü shou Kalebeibü shousi shuong: Iru, Ela hoba Naam, hoba Elaeibü shou Kenaz.
Jehalleleleibü shousi shuong: Zif, Zifa, Tiria, hoba Asarel.

Ezraeibü shousi shuong: Jether, Mered, Efer, hoba Jalon. Habü ho Meredei lebü Faraoeibü shou Bithiaeibü shousi shuong ki; hoba sao mang akongko apbei hoba Mariam, Shammai, hoba Ishba Eshtemoaeibü bou bukkei.
Hobaje hao yak Jihudabü saoei Gedoreibü bou Jered, Sokoeibü bou Heber hoba Zanoaeibü bou Jekuthiel bukkei.
Nahameibü nousina Hodia yakeibü shousi shuong kho Garmibü Keilaeibü bou hoba Maakatbü Eshtemoa.
Shimoneibü shousi shuong: Ammon, Rinna, Benhanan, hoba Tilon, Isheibü shousi shuong: Zohet hoba Benzohet.
Jihudaeibü shou Shelaeibü shousi shuong: Lekaeibü bou Er, Mareshaeibü bou Laada, hoba Beth Ashbeaa phemba nei maibü dakbü chung kho haoen chempen;
hoba Jokim, Koziba müt shu- ong, Joas, Saraf, aoyouei Moaba hoba Jashubi Lehema songdakkei (Khübü pisong bousong kho aeibou hangbü).
Habü ho chakyaübü hoba Netaim hoba Gederaa kibü shuong; haoen khünei Choba yoa haoeneibü kümsilei shanga kikei.
Simeoneibü shousi shuong: Nemuel, Jamin, Jarib, Zera, Shaul,
hao shou Shallum, hao shou Mibsam, hao shou Mishma,
Mishmaeibü shousi shuong: Hao shou Hammuel, hao shou Zakur; hao shou Shimei,
Shimeieibü bousu shou anthüklak hoba yaksa shou müt lak kikei; lausikei haoen jaisinasi shuong shousi juongje akitei, ayingsi Jihuda chemdang tegüje haoen ühaa.
Haoen Beersheba, Molada, Hazarshual,
Bilha, Ezem, Tolad,
Bethuel, Harona, Ziklag,
Beth-mar Kabot, Hazarsusim, Bethberei, hoba Shearaima kikei. Habü ho Dawidei songdakbü sühko haoeneibü sangnyu shuong kikei.
Hobaje haoeneibü sangnyu shuong kho Etam, Ain, Rimmon, Tekoa, hoba Asham, sangnyu ngao.
Khübü sangnyu kaijembo Baal sühko hauan haoeneibü sang pendou yoan kikei. Habü ho haoenei sang sangbü kikei, hoba haoenei pithen bouthen ngühli doan phokei.
Hobaje Meshobab, Jamlek, Amaziaeibü shou Josha,
Joel, Joshibiaeibü shou Jehu, Seraiaeibü shou Asieleibü shou,
Elionai, Jaakoba, Jeshohaia, Aseia, Adiel, Jesimiel, Benaia,
Shifieibü shou Zizra. Alloneibü shou, Jedaiaeibü shou, Shim- rieibü shou, Shemaiaeibü shou.
Habü nyen kuan kibü kho haoeneibü nyen chempen kongnyu shuong kikei, hoba haoeneibü boueibü chemdang ka juong haakei.
Haoeneibü shatsinam shanga lamshaushang lambo Gedor to atshang lam sühko haoen haukei.
Haoenei lamshaushang souko hoba maibü hapbei, kaodak kho aeibou phanga yaanga sangsemetnyu hoba senyühshemetnyu kikei, aieilausi khünei shaangla kibü shuong kho Hambüeibü kikei.

Habü nyen doan kibü kho Jihudabü Choba Hezekia haanga loukei, hoba haoenei hauan khünei kibü Ham si Meunbü haoeneibü kishang neichem yoan lemailela shemtikei. Haoenei khübü shian apan khonei kikei, aieilausi khünei haoeneibü shatsinam shuong shanga lamshaushang kikei.
Hobaje haoen atje Simoenbü müt saongao ngao, Pelatia, Nearia, Refaia, hoba Uzziel Ishieibü shousi shuong haoen leiyeibü shuongei leian Seir shongh to haukei,
hoba Amalekbü satenan kibü joubü shuong mautikei, hoba tat sühko haoen khünei ki.

Israeleibü shou jaishoubou Reubeneibü shousi shuong: (aieilausi hao jaishoubou kikei, lausikei haoei haoboueibü chemkan yepshang totnyinkusije haoeibü jaishou phejan Israeleibü shou Josefeibü shousi shuong la kuan apbei, hibü jaishou phejan tegü hao pithen ngühlia ado.
Jihuda haoeibü jaisina yoa hau kiko yeisikei hoba hao ka leiyeibü longasikei jaishou phejanje Josef shangabü yeikei).
Israeleibü shou jaishoubou Reubeneibü shousi shuong: Hanok, Pallu, Hazron, hoba Karmi.
Joeleibü shousi shuong: hao shou Shemaia, hao shou Gog, hao shou Shimei,
hao shou Mika, hao shou Reaia, hao shou Baal,
hao shou Bera, ao Assiriabü Choba Tiglath Pileserei laplangkei; Reubenbü yoa hao leiyeibou kikei.
Hobaje haoeibü jaisinasi shuong haoen chempen, haoen mütli pithen ngühli pakyobü kongnyubou kho Jeiel, hoba Zekharia
hoba Joel chung kabü Shemaeibü shi hoba Azazeibü shou Bela. Haoen Aroer kaoen ka Nebo sühko hoba Baal Meon sühko hauan kikei.
Tokei hao chaangbou ae Eufrates shumang ka yam aeto atshang sühko kikei, aieilausi haoeneibü shatsinam shuong Gilead kaodaka haakei.
Hobaje Saul haanga haoenei Hagarbü to wapyokei, aoyou haoeneibü ikmang to atkei, hoba Gilead chaang aephai pendou haoeneibü neichema haoen kikei.
Gadeibü shousi shuong haoen thedanga Bashan kaodaka Salka sühko hauan kikei.
Konglebou Joel, nyiboubü Sha- fan, Janai, hoba Bashana Shafat.
Hobaje haoeneibü bousi shuong ka pakbü shuong: Maikel, Meshullam, Sheba, Jorai, Jokan, Zia, hoba Eber, haoen nyet.
Habü ho Hurieibü shousi; Abihail, shousi shuong kikei, Jaroaeibü shou, Gileadeibü shou, Maikeleibü shou, Jeshishaieibü shou, Jadoeibü shou, Buzeibü shou,
Abdieleibü shou, Ahi, Gunieibü shou, haoeneibü bou ka pakbü kongnyubou,
hoba haoen Bashana Gilaeda hoba kho sangnyu shuonga hoba Sharon lamshaushang kaonyek pendoua haoeneibü leilang sühko kikei.
Jihuda Choba Jotham haanga Israel Choba Jeroboam haanga habü pendou pithen ngühli doan phokei.

Reubenbü, Gadbü, hoba Manasse chung jamde, maangkangbü mütshuong aih si in jungla thükbü mütshuong, hoba laujinei kipla thükbü hoba wapyoa libünyenbü, haoen hajar saonyito lei saongao nyetto saosem wapyola haula thükbü shuong kikei.
Haoenei Hagar, Jetur, Nafish, hoba Nodabbü khulimbo wapyokei.

Hobaje ladang haoen khulimbo haoenei thuibü hapbei, Hagarbü hoba haoen yoa kibü pendou haoeneibü ikto kukei, aieilausi lasona haoenei Mühghaü to ngekkei, hoba haoenei subüjabü haoei kukei, aishanga haoenei hao to maanglem kikei.
Haoeneibü samkeisamuk, haoenei sunglangkei; haoeneibü ut hajar anjinsem, sanlon hajar saoanto anjinsem, gadu hajar nyi hoba müt langkei hajar saongao.
Aishanga juong haitikei aieilausi wapyo kho Mühghaü ka kikei. Hobaje haoen alaplang shongko haoen kishanga kikei.
Manassebü mütshuong jamde kho kaonyeka kikei; haoen Bashan ka Baal Hermon, Senir, hoba Hermon shongh sühko haakei.
Habü ho haoeneibü bousi shuong ka pakbü kongnyu shuong kikei; Efer, Ishi, Elid, Azrid, Jeremia, Hodavia, hoba Jahdid hau yaangbü laakbü- hongbü shuong kikei.
Lausikei haoenei bousi shuongeibü Mühghaü khulimbo ngühkhüm lulimkei hoba Mühghaü haoen thedanga mautibü kaonyeka kibü mühghaü shuong phaito pejapelako satan apbei.

Hibü Israel Mühghaüei Assiriabü Choba Puleibü hoba Assiriabü Choba Tiglath Pilesereibü soushou phonenkukei, hoba haoei haoen sungkei, khei Reubenbü, Gadbü, Manasse phang jamde, hoba Hala, Habor, Hara si Gozan shumang to leijung hauan tat sühko kitiakei.
Levieibü shousi shuong: Gershon, Kohat, hoba Merari.
Kohateibü shousi shuong: Am- ram, Izhar, Hebron hoba Uzziel.
Amrameibü shousi shuong: Aron, Mosa, hoba Mariam, Aroneibü shousi shuong: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar, hoba Ithamar.
Eleazar ka Pinehas pakkei, Pinehas ka Abishua pakkei.
Abishua ka Bukki pakkei hoba Bukki ka Uzzi pakkei.
hoba Uzzi ka Zarahia pakkei hoba Zarahia ka Meraiot pakkei.
Meraiot ka Amaria pakkei, Amaria ka Ahitub pakkei.
Ahitub ka Zadok pakkei, Zadok ka Ahimaaz pakkei,
hoba Azaria ka Johanan pakkei.
Johanan ka Azaria pakkei (Jerusalema Solomonei dangbü chema ungshedbou tegü khangenbou kho hao kikei)
Azaria ka Amaria pakkei, hoba Amaria ka Ahitub pakkkei.
Ahitub ka Zadok pakkei, Zadok ka Shallum pakkei.
Shallum ka Hilkia pakkei, Hilkia ka Azaria pakkei.
Azaria ka Seraia pakkei, Seraia ka Jehozadok pakkei,
hoba
Levieibü shousi shuong: Gershon, Kohat, hoba Merari.
Hobaje ho Gershoneibü shousi shuong nyen: Libni hoba Shimei.
Kohateibü shousi shuong: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, hoba Uzziel.
Merarieibü shousi shuong: Mahli, si Mushi, habú ho Levibü chempen haoeneibü bousi shuong ka ki.
Gershon ka: hao shou Libni, hao shou Jahat, hao shou Zimma.
hao shou Joa, hao shou Iddo, hao shou Zera, hao shou Jeaterai.
Kohateibü shousi shuong: hao shou Amminadab, hao shou Kora, hao shou Assir,
hao shou Elkana, hao shou Ebiasaf, hao shou Assir,
hao shou Tahat, hao shou Uriel, hao shou Uzzia, hao shou Shaul.
Elkanaeibü shousi shuong: Amasai si Ahimot,
Hao shou Elkana, hao shou Zofai, hao shou Nahat,
hao shou Eliab, hao shou Jeroham, hao shou Elkana
Samueleibü shousi shuong: jaishoubou Vashni, nyiboubü Abiah.
Merarieibü shousi shuong: Mahli, hao shou Libni, hao shou Shimei, hao shou Uzza,
