hao shou Shimea, hao shou Haggia, hao shou Asaia.
Hobaje Jerusalema Solomonei lembü chem adang shongko, haoenei kambü chema lemshang neichem thedanga haoenei chia laubüei khangenkei; hoba haoenei yenkei yenko lulueibü kümsilei kümbei.
Kümbüleibü müt si haoeneibü shousi shuong kho ho ki. Kohatbü shousi shuong: Samueleibü shou, Joeleibü shou chia laobou Heman;
Elkanaeibü shou, Jerohameibü shou, Eliseibü shou, Joaeibü shou,
Zufeibü shou, Elkanaeibü shou, Mahateibü shou, Amasaeibü shou,
Elkanaeibü shou, Joeleibü shou, Azariaeibü shou, Zefaniaeibü shou,
Tahateibü shou, Assireibü shou, Ebiasafeibü shou, Koraeibü shou,
Izhareibü shou, Kohateibü shou, Levieibü shou, Israeleibü shou.
Hobaje haoeibú jaisina Asaf, ao haoeibü mae aenei lokei, Berakiaeibü shou, Shimeaeibü shou,
Maikeleibü shou, Baasaiaeibü shou, Shimeaeibü shou. Malkiaeibü shou.
Ethaneibü shou, Zeraeibü shou, Adaiaeibü shou,
Ethaneibü shou, Zimmaeibü shou, Shimeieibü shou,
Jahateibü shou, Gershoneibü shou, Levieibü shou.
Nanaenei haoeibü jaisina Merareibü shousi shuong: Kishieibü shou Ethan, Abdieibü shou, Mallukeibü shou,
Hashabiaeibü shou, Amaziaeibü shou, Hilkiaeibü shou,
Amzieibü shou, Banieibü shou, Shemereibü shou,
Malieibü shou, Mushieibü shou, Merareibü shou, Levieibü shou.
Hobaje haoeibü jaisina Levi Mühghaüeibü chem lemshang neichem kümsilei pendou shanga pienan kikei.

Lausikei Aron hoba haoeibü shousi shuongei juokbü lembü thüka hoba ponlem hibü lemshang thüka pendou to saoposhang kümsilei pendou shanga hoba Mühghaü khangenbou Mosaei sakkubü pendou phatko Israel shanga shabü hangan aplabü lembü kukei.
Ho Aroneibü shousi shuong ki: hao shou Eliazar, hao shou Finehas, hao shou Abishua,
hao shou Bukki, hao shou Uzzi, hao shou Zerahai,
haoeibü shou Meraiot, hao shou Amaria, hao shou Ahitub,
hao shou Zadok, haoeibú shou Ahimaaz.
Habü ho haoeneibü leilang phanga haoen kishanga kibü kho ki; Aroneibü shousi shuong Ko- hatbü chempen, aieilausi haoen khoei penkei.
Haoen la Jihuda kaodaka kho kommang haoeneibü sekphai yoan Hebron kukei.
Lausikei sangnyu khongthu shuong kho hoba kho sang shuong kho Jefunneeibü shou Kaleb la kukei.
Aroneibü shousi shuong la haoen satet sangnyu shuong kukei. Hebron, Libna, haoeneibü sekphai yoan Jitter, Estheme hoba haoeneibü sekphai yoan.
Hilen, Debir hoba haoeneibü sekphai yoan.
Ashan, haoeneibü sekphai yoan, hoba Bethshemes haoeneibü sekphai yoan.
Hobaje Benjamin mütli ka Geba, haoeneibü sekphai yoan, Alemet, haoeneibü sekphai yoan, Anathot, haoeneibü sekphai yoan haoen chempen khümboa haoeneibü sangnyu anthüksem kikei.
Joubü Kohatbü la phang chempen ka phang jamde, Manasse jamde ka sangnyu an kukei.
Gershon shousi shuong la haoen chempen lühbakei Issakar phang ka Asher ka Naftali phang ka Bashana Manasse phang ka sangnyu anthük sem.
Merari shousi shuong la haoen chempen lühbakei Reuben phang ka, Gad phang ka, Zebulun phang ka sangnyu anthük nyi.
Hobaje Israelbü shousi shuongei Levibü la sangnyu shuong kho sekphai yoan kukei.
Haoenei tokei Jihuda, Simeon hoba Benjamin phangshuong ka nyen kuan kibü habü sangnyu janletkukei.
Hobaje Kohatbü shousi atje Efraim phang ka haoeneibü sangnyu shuong leilang kikei.
Haoen la satenshang sangnyu shuong kukei; Shekhem, Efraim shongh kaodak hoba Gath Rimmon hoba haoeneibü sekphai yoan;
Jokmeam, haoeneibü sekphai yoan, Bethhoren, haoeneibü sekphai yoan,
Aijalon, haoeneibü sekphai yoan.
Hobaje Manasse phang ka jamde, Anir, haoeneibü sekphai yoan Bileam haoeneibü sekphai yoan, Kohat shousi shuong joubü chempen shanga.
Gershon shousi shuong la Manasse phang jamde chempen ka Bashana Golan, haoeneibü sekphai yoan, hoba Ashtarot haoeneibü sekphai yoan kukei.
Hobaje Issakar phang ka; Kedes haoeneibü sekphai yoan, Daberat haoeneibü sekphai yoan.
Ramoth, haoeneibü sekphai yoan hoba Anem haoeneibü sekphai yoan.
Asher phang ka; Mashal haoeneibü sekphai yoan, Apdon haoeneibü sekphai yoan.
Hukok haoeneibü sekphai yoan, hoba Rehob haoeneibü sekphai yoan.
Hobaje Naftali phang ka, Galila Kedes haoeneibü sekphai yoan Hammon haoeneibü sekphai yoan hoba Kiriathaim haoeneibü sekphai yoan.
Joubü Meraribü la Zebulun phang ka jankukei; Rimmon, haoeneibü sekphai yoan, Tabor haoeneibü sekphai yoan.
Hobaje Jerikhoa Jordan danjung hauan, Jordan chaangboua Reuben phang ka yama Bezer haoeneibü sekphai yoan, hoba Jahza sekphai yoan.
Kademoth haoeneibü sekphai yoan, hoba Mefaat haoeneibü sekphai yoan.
Hobaje Gad phang ka; Gileada Ramot haoeneibü sekphai yoan, Mahanaim haoeneibü sekphai yoan,
Heshbon haoeneibü sekphai yoan hoba Jazer haoeneibü sekphai yoan.
Issakhareibü shousi shuong: Tola, Pua, Jashub hoba Shim- ron haoen müt lei.

Tolaeibü shousi shuong: Uzzi, Refaia, Jeriel, Jahmai, Ibsam hoba Shemuel, haoen chempen yoa kongnyu shuong, kho Tola; haoen metena lakjaibü shuong; Dawid haanga haoen lühbak hajar saoto nyi saongao lak.
Uzziei shou che kikei, Izrah- iaeibü shousi shuong: Maikel, Obadia, Joel, hoba Ishia, haoen müt ngao; haoen pendou kongnyu shuong.
Hobaje haoen yoan haoen meten bousi shuong mütli lühbakei wapyola shanga sangshibü tan, hajar khujinto lak kikei, aieilausi haoeneibü shousi yaksi shuong juong kikei.
Issakareibü chempen haoeneibü youjung pendouei hau yaangbü lakjaibü hajar saoleito nyet mütlieibü ngühlia doakei.
Benjamineibü shousi shuong: Bela, Beker, hoba Jediael, haoen sem.

Belaeibü shousi shuong: Ezbon, Uzzi, Uzziel, Jeremot hoba Iri, haoen müt ngao haoeneibü pithen yoa kongnyu shuong, hau yaangbü lakjaibü shuong hoba haoeneibü chung ngühlia nyen doletbü kho hajar saoto nyito khujinto lei kikei.
Bekereibü shousi shuong: Zemira, Joas, Eliezer, Elionai, Omri, Jeremot, Abija, Anathot, hoba Alemet.

Hobaje pendou Bekereibü shousi shuong; hoba pithen ngühliei haoeneibü nyen dobü haoeneibü meten lühbakei haoeneibü bousi shuong pithena kongnyu shuong, hau yaangbü lakjaibü shuong hajar saoche to saoan kikei.
Jedieleibü shou; Bilhan, hoba Bilhaneibü shousi shuong; Jeus, Benjamin, Ehud, Kenaana, Zethan, Tarshish, hoba Ashisha- har.
Habü pendou Jedieleibü shousi shuong bousi shuong pithen kongnyu shuong hau yaangbü lakjaibü shuong hajar anthüknyet to saoan wapyola lamlebü shuong.
Hobaje Shuppim si Huppim Ireibü shousi shuong kikei, Ahereibü shou Hushim.
Naftaliei shousi müt lei kikei: Jahziel, Guni, Jezer, hoba Shallum. (Haoen Bilha thensilen kikei).
Manasseeibü shousi shuong: Asriel, hoba Makhir; ao haoeibü thangnyu Armeanbüei bukkukei. Saoei Gileadeibü bou Makhir bukkei.
Hobaje Huppim si Shuppim shanga Makhirei yak che lekei. Haoeibü nousinaeibü nyen kho Maaka kikei hoba nyiboubü nyen kho Zelofehad; hoba Zelofehadei yaksa shousi ong kikei.
Hobaje Makhieibü yak Maakaei bousu shou che bukkei hoba saoei haoeibü nyen Peres nyenkei, hoba naeibü nyen Shersh; hoba haoeibü shousi shuong Ulam si Rakem kikei.
Ulameibü shou; Bedan. Habü ho Manasseeibü shou Makireibü shou Gileadeibü shousi shuong kikei.
Hobaje nousina Hammolleketei, Ishod, Abiezer, hoba Mahala bukkei.
Shemidaeibü shousi shuong: Ahian, Shekhem, Likhi hoba Aniam kikei.
Efraimeibü shousi shuong: Shuthela hao shou Bered, hao shou Tahat, hao shou Eleada, hao shou Tahat,
hao shou Zabad, hao shou Shuthela si Ezer hoba Elead, aoyou Gath mütshuongeibü kaonyeka sangbü shou shuongei haitikei, aieilausi haoenei haoeneibü samkeisamuk kokshaula yankei.
Hobaje haoeneibü bou Efraimei chalou juong mang haapbei hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuongei hao maangsula loukei.
Hobaje Efraim yak jungto atkei hoba sao mang akongko apbei hoba bousu shou che bukkei, hoba haoei hao nyen Beria nyenkei, aieilausi hao chempen thüka khonsakei sühkei.
Haoeibü nouyangnyu Shera kikei, aoei Beth Horon sangnyu thükae si phangae hoba Uzzen Sheerah kümbei.
Refa hao shou kikei, hao shou Reshef, hao shou Tela, hao shou Tahan,
hao shou Laadan, hao shou Ammihud, hao shou Elishama.
hao shou Nan, hao shou Joshua.

Haoen shangabü hoba kishang kho Bethel hoba haoeibü sangnyu shuong hoba chaangbou ae Naaran hoba chanep Gezer hoba haoeibü sangnyu shuong: Shekhem hoba haoeibü sangnyu shuong hoba Ayyah hoba haoeibü sangnyu shuong.
Tokei Manassebü leilang sünga, hoba Beth-shean hoba hoeibü sangnyu shuong, Taanak hoba hoeibü sangnyu shuong, Dor hoba hoeibü sangnyu shuong. Habüa Israel shousi Josefeibü shousi shuong kikei.
Ashereibü shousi shuong Imna, Isua, Ishvi, Beria, hoba haoeneibü nousina Sera.
Be- riaeibü shousi shuong: Heber hoba Malkiel ao Birzaiteibü shou kikei.
Heber ka Jaflet, Shomer, Hotham, hoba haoeneibü nousina Shua pakkei.
Jafleteibü shousi shuong; Pasak, Bimhal, hoba Ashvat. Habü ho Jafleteibü shousi shuong.
Haoeibü jaisina Shomereibü shousi shuong; Ahi, Rohga, Jihubba, hoba Aram.
Haoeibü jaisina Helemeibü shousi shuong; Zofa, Imna. Sheles, hoba Amal.
Zofaeibü shousi shuong: Sua, Harnefer, Shual, Beri, Imra,
Beazer, Hod, Shamma, Shilsha, Ithran, hoba Beera.
Jethereibü shousi Pishpa hoba Ara.
Ullaeibü shousi shuong Ara, Hanniel hoba Rizzia.
Habü pendou Ashereibü chempen yoa kongnyubou pienbü hau yaangbü lakjaibü shuong, kongnyu shuong. Haoeneibü pakthen lühbak dobü wapyola khangenla shanga hajar saoto lak kikei.
Benjamin ka shaang bukbü shou Bela, nyiboubü Ashbel, hoba semboubü Ahara.
Leiboubü Noha, ngaoboubü Rafa,
Hobaje Belaeibü shousi: Addar, Gera hoba Abihud,
Abishua, Naama, Ahoa,
Gera, Shefufan hoba Huram:
Habü ho Ehudeibü shousi shuong habü ho Gebaa kibü chempen lina kongnyubou shuong ki, hoba haoenei haoen Manahat to lapjung haukei,
hoba Naaman, Ahija, hoba Gera haoei lapjung haukei; hoba hao ka Uzza si Ahihud pakkei.
Hobaje haoeibü yak Hushim si Baara sattian phaia Moab kaodaka Shaharaim la shousi shuong hapbuko kikei.
Hao yak Hedes ka haoeibü shousi shuong Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, hoba Malkam pakkei hoba,
Jeuz, Sakia, hoba Mirma. Habü ho haoeibü shousi shuong, chempen lina kongnyu shuong kikei.
Hobaje Hushim ka kei haoeibü shousi shuong pakkei; Abitub si Elpaal.
Elpaaleibü shousi shuong: Eber, Misham hoba Shamed, haoenei Ono si Lod hoba habü sangnyu shuong kümbei.
Hobaje Beria si Shema haoen Aijalona kibü chempen yoa kongnyubou shuong kikei, haoenei Gata kibü lintikei.
Hobaje Ahio Shashak hoba Jeremot,
Zebadia, Arad, Eder,
Maikel, Ishpa, hoba Joha; habü ho Beriaeibü shousi shuong.
Zebadia, Meshullam, Hiziki, Heber,
Ishmerai, Jezlia hoba Jobad, habü ho Elpaaleibü shousi shuong kikei.
Jakim, Zikri, Zafti,
Elienai, Zilthai, Eliel,
Adaia, Beraia, hoba Shimrat, habü hoba Shimeieibü shousi shuong kikei.
Ishpan, Eber, Eliel,
Abdon, Zikri, Hanan,
Hanania, Elam, Antothija,
Ifdeia, hoba Penuel, habü ho Shashakeibü shousi shuong kikei.
Shamsherai, Sheharia, Athalia,
Jareshia, Elia, hoba Zikri habü ho Jerohameibü shousi shuong kikei.
Habü ho haoen meten webüei chempen lin kongnyubou shuong leiyeibü mütshuong ki; habü ho Jerusalema kikei.
Gibeoneibü bou Jeiel Gibeona kikei, hoba yakeibü nyen Maaka.
Haoeibü shou jaishoubou Abdon, kho phaia Zur, Kish, Baal, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahio, Zaker,
hoba Miklot (Hao Shimeaeibü bou kikei) Tou habü ho Jerusalema haoeneibü chempen yoa kikei.
Ner ka Kish pakkei, Kish ka Saul pakkei; Saul ka Jonathan, Malkishua, Abinadab hoba Ishbaal pakkei.
Hobaje Jonathaneibü shou Meribaal; hoba Mikaeibü bou Meribaal.
Mikaeibü shousi shuong: Pithan, Melek, Tarea, hoba Ahaz.
Jehoadaeibü bou Ahaz, hoba Alemet, Azmavet, hoba Zimrieibü bou Jiheada; Mozaeibü bou Zimri.
Bineaeibü bou Moza; hao shou Rafa, hao shou Eleasa, hao shou Azel.
Azeleibü shou müt lak kikei, hoba habü ho haoeneibü nyen Azrikam, Bokeru, Ishmael, Shearia, Obadia, hoba Hanan ho pendou Azeleibü shousi shuong kikei.
Hao na Eshekeibü shousi shuong: Jaishoubou Ulam, kho thenbou Jeush, hoba semboubü Elifelet.
Ulameibü shousi shuong hau yaangbü lakjaibü shuong, lau jungbü shuong shousi shisi juong, saongao to anjinsem. Habü pendou Benjamin phang kikei.
Hibü Israelbü pendou pakthen doan kikei; hoba chüh- ashi habü ho Israelbü choba shuong le a doan kia. Hobaje Jihudabüei shed shonbü hangshong haoen Babilon to laplangkei.
Tou haoeneibü sangnyu shuonga haoen shangabüa shaangla kibü shuong kho Israelbü ungshedbou shuong, Levibü hoba lembüchema kümbüleibü shuong kikei.
Hobaje Jerusalema Jihudabü shousi shuong, Benjamineibü shousi shuong, Efraim si Manasseeibü shousi shuong kikei.
Ammihudeibü shou Uthai, Omrieibü shou, Banieibü shou, Jihudaeibü shou, Perezeibü shousi shuong,
Shilonbü shaangbü shou Asaia, hoba haoeibü shousi shuong:
Hobaje Zeraeibü shousi shuong; Jeuel hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong saongao lakto anjinngao.
Hobaje Benjamineibü shousi shuong; Meshullameibü shou Sallu, Hadaviaeibü shou, Hassenuaeibü shou;
hoba Jerohameibü shou Ibnea, Uzzieibü shou Ela, Mikrieibü shi, Shefatiaeibü shou Meshullam, Reueleibü shou, Ibnijaeibü shou.
Hobaje haoeibü jaisinasi shu- ong haoen meten linei saongao gü to anjin semto lak. Habü müt pendou lulu chempen kongnyu shuong kikei.
Ungshedbü shuong kho; Jedaia, Jehoarib hoba Jakin,
hoba Hilkia shou Azaria, Meshullameibü shou, Zadokeibü shou, Meraioteibü shou, Ahitubeibü shou, Mühghaüeibü chema songdakbou,
Jeroboameibü shou Adaia, Pashureibü shou, Malkijaeibü shou, Adieleibü shou, Maasai, Jehzeraeibü shou, Meshullameibü shou, Immereibü shou,
haoeneibü thenbou shuong to limbo haoen chempen kongnyu shuong, hajar cheto saongao nyetto saosem Mühghaüeibü chema khangenbü kümsilei shanga aeibou lanthükbü mütshuong.
Levibü shuong; Hasshubeibü shou Shemaia, Azrikameibü shou, Hashabiaeibü shou, Merarieibü shousi shuong,
hoba Bakbakkar, Heres, Galal, Mikaeibü shou Mathania, Zikrieibü shou hoba Asafeibü shou,
Shemaiaeibü shou Obadia, Galaleibü shou, Jeduthuneibü shou, Asaeibü shou Berekia, Elkanaeibü shou kho Netofa sanga kibü shuong.
Chem lombü shuong; Shallum, Akkub, Talmon, Ahiman, hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong; Shallum kongnyubou kikei;
tou sühko chaangbou choba bakhüna ki, haoen Levi shousi shuong shaishang shanga khoukhün lombü shuong kikei.

Hobaje Korieibü shou Shallum, Abiasafeibü shou Koraeibü shou hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shu- ong, haoeneibü chempen Korabü shuong lemshang neichema khangenbü hoba bakhün lombü shuong kümsilei thüka kikei, hoba haoeneibü shousi shuong koukhün lombü shuong
Hobaje Eleazareibü shou Finehas haoen thüka danbü jihsiphaia songdakbou kikei.
Meshelemiaeibü shou Zekharia kambü neichem koukhün lombou kikei.
Habü pendou aoyou koukhüna lombou lela pienkei haoen saoanto anthüknyi kikei. Dawid si Samuel thuseibouei haoen jembü kümaleia pienan phokubü habü ho haoeneibü sangkhonga bakhün lühbaka kikei.
Hibü haoeneibü shousinasiei
Kaoen leia koukhün lombü shuong chaang, chanep, yungkük hoba yungthang aenei kikei.
Hobaje sangkhonga haoeneibü jaisinasi shuong chalou nyetbounyet weko jih jiha haoen yoa kila louko kikei,
aieilausi koukhün lombü kongnyu lei aoyou Levibü kikei, kümsilei takletbü chenei kikei, hoba Mühghaüeibü chema shemjang hoba thanshang thüka kikei.
Haoen Mühghaüeibü chem kaijembo kikei, aieilausi kho thüka haoen ikjai kikei, hoba ngeyang weko kho ipla haoeneibü phejan kikei.
Hobaje haoen at lemshang kabü chaksiam thüka ikjai kikei, aishanga khübü kho haoenei wean sungen hoba wean sungat dogo lekei.
Haoen atje chemkabü peisilei thüka saoposhang kabü chaksiam pendou thüka, wenon inyaibü thüka, onang, jen hoba shikmeimaibü thüka ikjai kikei.
Hobaje ungshedbou shousi atei shikmeimaibü shanga wen lamlekei.
Hobaje Mattithia, Levibü yoa che, Korabü Shallumeibü shou jaishoubou kho wentek kümbü yoa ikjai kikei.
Tokei Kohatbü haoen thenbou at, Nounyet weko kho lamlela shanga Mühghaü thedanga phobü wentek thüka ikjai kikei.
Tou habü ho chia laubü Levibü chempen lin kongnyu shuong ki, lubü kümsilei ka bangan lembüchem shemjanga kida, aieilausi change nangnak haoen jembü kümsileia kikei.
Habü ho Jerusalema kida, leiyeibü shuong, Levibü chempen lin kongnyubou shuong kikei.
Gibeona Gibeoneibü bou Jeiel kikei, hoba yakeibü nyen Maaka kikei;
hoba haoeibü shou jaishoubou Abdon, kho phaia Zur, Kish, Baal, Ner, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahio, Zekharia hoba Miklot.
Miklot ka Shimeam pakkei. Hobaje haoenkei haoeneibü jaisinasi shuong thedanga haoeneibü jaisinasi yoa Jerusalema kikei.
Kisheibü bou Ner kikei, Sauleibü bou Kish. Saul ka Jonathan, Malkishua, Abinadab hoba Eshbaal pakkei.
Hobaje Jonathaneibü shou Meribaal hoba Meribaal kho Mikaeibü bou kikei.
Mikaeibü shousi shuong; Pithon, Melek, Tahrea, hoba Ahaz.
Hobaje Jaraeibü bou Zimri kikei.
Bineaeibü bou Moza kikei hoba Bineaeibü shou Refaia, Eleasaeibü shou Azel.
Azeleibü shousi müt lak kikei, hoba ho haoeneibü nyen: Azrikam, Bokeru, Ishmael, Shea- ria, Obadia, hoba Hanan, habü ho Azeleibü shousi kikei.
Tou Filistiabüei Israelbü naklepbo wapyokei hoba Israelbü Filistiabü thedang ka satkei, hoba Gilboa shongha juong haitikei.
Hobaje Filistiabüei Saul hoba hao shousi shuong laphetkei; hoba Filisitiabüei Sauleibü shousi shuong Jonathan, Abinadab, hoba Malkishua haitikei.
Lason khoei Saul to kaangko thungkei, hoba lau jungbü shuongei hao hapbei hoba haoenei hao leilutikei.

Kheijinei Saulei haoeibü insiaubu jungbü to laukei, “Habü akipbü shuong louan ngo aweasüngko jungeibüla kaibü in setenan kü to paiko sepbai. Lausikei haoeibü insiaubu jungbouei ngüha ale, aieilausi hao aeibou hatkei. Hibü Saulei jembü in sungan jungkei hoba kho thükto apjinan haikei.
Hobaje haoeibü insiaubu jungbouei Saul haibü hapan haokei haoeibü in thükto tuongjinlangan haikei.
Kho tegü Saul haikei, hoba haoshou müt sem dogo chemdang pendou liko haikei.
Ladang Israel mütshuong yomanga kibü pendouei sepai shuong satbü hoba Saul hoba haoeibü shousi shuong haian hapbei, haoenei jembü sangnyu apyoan satkei hoba Filistiabü loukei hoba khonei kikei.
Nyibounyet kho ladang Filistiabü pheingaila longeikei, haoenei Saul hoba haoeibü shousi shuong Gilboa shongha haian hapbei.

Hobaje haoenei haoeibü neisimei saüan sungkei hoba haoeibü khu thetkei, hoba haoeibü in si aubu sungkei, hoba haoeneibü heangsho shuong hoba mütli jungto ngühlang maibü künla Filistiabü kaodak to ngühlang künbü shuong yam shenko hautikei.
Hobaje haoenei haoeibü in si aubu haoeneibü mühghaü shuong lembü chema phokei.
Lausikei ladang Jabesh-Gileadbü pendouei Filistiabüei Saul to kümbü pendou ditkei,

maangkaangbü pendou meimeikei hoba Saul si hao shousi shuongeibü mang pendou sunglangkei hoba Jabesh to künbakei. Hobaje haoenei haoeneibü lo Jabesh yembulong phanga khünkei, hoba chalou nyetnyet mühei nyengkei.
Kho tegü Saul jembü maangalanbü shanga haikei; haoei
Hobaje
Kheijinei Israelbü pendou Hebrona Dawid jungto kamshaikei hoba laukei, “Kün kaibü lo hoba kaibü phe.
Danbü jihaphaia, khei Saul Choba kijineikei Israelbü leian haubou hoba leian loubou kho no kikei; hoba
Hibü Israel jaishou pendou Hebrona
Hobaje Dawid hoba Israelbü pendou Jerusalem to haukei, kho Jebus, lanei Jebusbü kikei kho kaodak to haukei.
Hobaje Jebusa kibü shuongei Dawid to laukei, “No hato alotlabü. Khei yingsikei Dawidei Zion lapheishon kho Dawid sangnyu lekei.”
Da- widei laukei, “Aoyouei Jebusbü ngüman yeptilaje hao leiyeibü lajamleibou yeitilabü.” Hobaje Zeruiaeibü shou Joab shaang angkei, hibü hao leibou yeikei.
Hobaje Dawid lapheishona kikei, hibü kho to Dawid sangnyu dogo laukei.
Hobaje haoei Millo ka sangnyu kho maisho kailepbei, hoba Joabei joubü sangnyu kho kümetkei.
Hobaje Dawid aei aei yaangbou la yeikei, aieilausi Thükenbou
Tou Dawideibü hau kibü mütshuong habü ho ki; haoenei hao la Israel pendou to liko Israel shanga
Habü ho Dawideibü lakjaibü shuong lühbak ki; Hakmonbü Jashobeam, müt sem yoa kongnyubou; haoei haoeibü aubu tonenkei hoba lason chenei haoei saongao sem haitikei.
Hobaje hau yaangbü müt sem yoa hao to thenbou Ahobü Dodoeibü shou Eleazar kikei.
Pas Dammima Filistiabü khünei lason takshatko kijinei hao Dawid yoa kiteikei. Khünei kaoen hanbüshou che barli youshouei shenan kikei, hoba mütshuong Filistiabü ka satyokei.
Lausikei hao sek jenyua lokei, hoba thangetkei; hoba Filistiabü haitikei, hoba
Ladang Filistiabü sepai tan Refaima shaian kikei, leiyeibü müt khujin yoka müt sem Adullam laangbob ka Dawid jungto laangnyu khüto louyenkei.
Kheijinei Dawid lapheishona kikei hoba kheijinei Filistiabü kho Bethlehema kikei.
Hobaje Dawidei waangko laukei, “Bakhün nyangko kibü Bethlehem deikhün ka kü la yunglabü dei atei kua yingma!”
Kheijinei khübü hau kibü müt semei Filistiabü shaishang to tujung atkei, hoba bakhün nyangko kibü deikhün ka dei khukei hoba kho Dawid jungto sungbakei. Lausikei Dawidei kho ayung; haoei kho

hoba laukei, “Ngeibü Mühghaü thedanga ngei ho kümlaje anat. Habü mütshuongeibü langkeibü sii ngei yunglep lo? Aishanga haoeneibü langkei khümbo kuan haoenei kho sungbakei.” Hibü haoei kho ayung. Habü kümsilei hau yaangbü müt semei kümbei.
Tou Abishai, Joabeibü na, müt khujin yoa kongnyubou kikei. Hobaje haoei saongao sem khulimbo haoeibü aubu tonkei hoba haoen pendou haitikei, hoba müt semei tegü nyenhang sungbakei.
Khujin yoa hao khuleibou kikei, hoba haoeneibü leibou yeikei; lausikei haoei sem khoje aonlang.

Hobaje Jehoiadaeibü shou Benaia kho Kabzeela maangkaangbü müt kümsilei yaangbü kümbü che kikei; Moaba haoei Arieleibü shou müt nyi haitikei. Tokei hao louyenkei hoba ninthu lenan kijinei püngkhüna molosaonyu che haitikei.

Hobaje haoei Ijepbü che haitikei, mütlou mütyaang, iknop ngao loubü Ijepbou kho haoeibü ika aubu che neitakbü jim tegü che kikei, lausikei Benaia hao jungto julo che jungan yankei, hoba Ijepboueibü ik ka aubu kho japlangkukei, hoba haoeibü aubuei hao suettikei.
Habü kümsilei ho Jehoiadaeibü shou Benaiaei kümbei hoba hau kibü sem tegü nyenhang sungbakei.
Hao khujin yoa nyenhang kikei, lausikei haoei müt sem khoje aonlang. Dawidei hao lombou shuong thüka phokukei.
Lubü hauki yaangkibü sepai shuong habü kiteikei:
Joabeibü na Asahel
Bethlehem ka Dodo shou Elhanan
Haror ka Shammoth
Pelon ka Helez
Tekoa ka Ikkesh shou Ira
Anathot ka Abiezer
Hushat ka Sibbekai
Aho ka Ilai
Netofa ka Maharai
Netofa ka Baana shou Heled
Benjamin kabü Gibea ka Ribai shou Ithai
Pirathon ka Benaia
Gaash nyangkobü yomang ka Hurai
Arba ka Abiel
Bahurum ka Azmavet
Shaalbon ka Eliaba
Gizon ka Hashem
Harar ka Shagee shou Jonathan
Harar ka Sakhar shou Ahiam
Ur shou Elifal
Mekhera ka Hefer
Pelon ka Ahija
Garmel ka Hezro
Ezbai shou Naarai
Nathaneibü jaisina Joel
Hagri shou Mibar
Ammon ka Zelek
Beeroth ka Zeruia shou Joabeibü insiaubu jungbou Naharai
Ithri ka Ira
Ithri ka Gareb
Hitbü Uria
Ahlai shou Zabad
Shiza shou Adina (Hao Reuben phanga konglebou; hao yoa jembü sepai khujin thonan)
Maaka shou Hanan
Mithni shou Joshafat
Ashterat ka Uzzia
Aroer ka Hothameibü shounyi, Shamma si Jeiel
Tiz ka Shimrieibü shounyi, Jediael si Joha
Mahavi ka Eliel
Elnaam shounyi, Jeribai si Joshavia
Moab ka Ithma
Zoba ka Eliel, Obed hoba Jassiel
Tou Kisheibü shou Saul kibü haangjung Dawid hopatham apaienko kijinei Ziklag to Dawid jungto habü mütshuong loukei, hoba haoen kho wapyoa hao to thuibou hau yaangbü müt yo ka kikei.
Haoen lau jungbü müt, hoba laujin si laangpem tetjin nanae maeae hamei jungenbü mütshuong, haoen Benjaminbü Sauleibü chempen kikei.
Konglebou kho Ahiezer, kho phaia Joas, haosi ham kho Gibeaa Shemaeibü shousi shuong; tokei Azmaveteibü shousi shuong Jeziel hoba Pelet; Bereka, Anathotbü Jehu,
Gibeonbü Ishmaia, müt khujin yoa hau yaangbü müt che, hoba khujin thüka leiyeibou, Jeremia, Jehaziel, Johanan, Gederatbü Josabad.
Eluzai, Jerimot, Bealia, Shemaria, Harufbü, Shefatia;
Elkana, Jesia, Azarel, Joezer, hoba Jashoboam, Korbü,
hoba Gedor ka Jerohameibü shousi shuong Joela hoba Zebadia.
Gadbü hau yaangbü hoba lakbühongbü aih si aubua sonenbü aoyoueibü thenyek molosaonyu tegü kikei, hoba aoyou shongha yao tegü sobüsepbü, haoeneibü lapheishon ka Dawid jungto yamlam to loukei.
Konglebou kho Ezer, nyiboubü kho Obadia, semboubü Eliab,
leiboubü Mishmanna, ngaoboubü Jeremia,
lakboubü Attai, nyetboubü Eliel,
setboubü Johanan, güboubü Elzabed,
anboubü Jeremia, anthükche boubü Makbannai.
Habü Gadbü shousi shuong lakjaibü tan lajamleibü shuong kikei; phangkabou shuong kho saongao thüka hoba thükkabou shuong kho hajar thüka.
Haoenei shaangbou lita Jordan yongko sopbo yungsen kouko kijinei, hoba yomanga kibü mütshuong chaang chanep to linkei.
Hobaje Benjamin si Jihudabü mütshuong at Dawideibü lapheishon to loukei.

Dawid haoen to haüyola angkei hoba haoen to laukei, “Kan kü to thangbou laman kü to thuila loukei yingalonga ngeibü maangpon kan to chela yeilabü; lausikei ngeibü ika amaibü akisi dogokei ngeibü dangbou shuong la ngo loshaula loukei yingalonga kheijineije seneibü pisibou Mühghaüei chühlabü hoba kan to hakshi.”
Kheijinei khujin thüka leibou Amasai jungto Soushou loukei hoba haoei laukei,
“Kün kaibü, O Dawid,
hoba ka yoa kia,
O Jesseeibü shou!
Ka jungto sangmai, sangmai!
hoba hao to thuibü shuong to sangmai!
Aishanga kaibü Mühghaüei ka to thuida.”
Kheijinei Dawidei haoen sungletkei hoba haoeibü sepai tan shuong thüka haoen leiyeibü yeitikei.

Manassebü müt atkei Dawid Filistiabü yoa Saul khulimbo lason to loujinei apyoan Dawid jungto loukei. Khei yingasikei haoei haoen to athui, aieilausi Filistiabü bunyu shuongei sangkuan hao ngaitian apbei hoba laukei, “Sen leiyeibou thushed to atlabü lele haoei jembü bunyubou Saul jungto satan aplabü.
Hao Ziklag to haujinei Manassebü mütshuong habü ho hao jungto loukei: Adna, Jazabad, Jediael, Maikel, Jozabad, Elihu, hoba Zilthai; Manassea hajar thüka lajamleibü shuong.
Hobaje sangshibü tan khulimbo haoenei Dawid to thuikei; aieilausi haoen pendou hau kibü maangkaangbü kikei, hoba sepai tan yoa lajamleibü shuong kikei.
Aishanga chalou angboua Dawid jungto mütshuong sepai tan yaangbü che, Mühghaüeibü sepai tan tegü ayei shongko loudang lekei.
Jihudaeibü shousi shuong aih si aubu jungbü hajar lakto saongao set lamlean kikei.
Simeoneibü shousi shuong hau yaangbü müt kaangbü sekbü wapyola shanga hajar nyetto saongao.
Levibü shousi shuong hajar leito saongao lak.
Hobaje Aron chemdang ka, Jehoiada kho leiyeibou kikei, hoba hao yoa hajar semto saongao nyet kikei.
Zadok heshou che maangkaangbü hau yaangbü haoen chempen ka lajamleibou müt saoto nyi.
Benjaminbü Sauleibü chempen hajar sem, aoyou yoa juongbouei khün sühko Saul chung yoa yojung loukei.
Efraimbü hajar saoche to saongao set, hau yaangbü maangkaangbü mütshuong haoen chem- pen yoa nyenshen mütshuong.
Manasse chemdang jamde ka hajar anthük set, aoyou louan Dawid Choba yeitila nyen shenan kikei.
Issakar mütshuong, aoyouei jihsiphai shanga ditenbü hoba Israelei ai kümla jankei kho ngekei; haoeneibü konglebü saoan hoba haoeneibü thenbou pendou haoeneibü ngühkhüm phanga kikei.
Zebulun ka shanenbü labou to shuokbü tan hajar anjinsem Dawid to thuila shanga nyekchüh cheei lason shanga wapyobü in si aubu penkosouko lamlebü kikei.
Naftali ka lajamleibü hajar che, haoen yoa müt hajar khujinto nyet aih si aubu jungan.
Danbü ka müt hajar saoto set saongao lak lason shanga lamlekei.
Asher ka lason shanga lamlebü sonenbü lakoubü tan hajar saonyi,
Reubenbü, Gadbü, hoba Jordan danjung hauan kibü Manasse phang jamde ka wapyobü in si aubu penkosouko jungan müt hajar saongaoto saoche.
Habü pendou lakoubü shu- ong, lason hele lepde lean, Israel pendou thüka Dawid Choba yeitila maang angenan Hebron to loukei; kho tegü ong joubü Israelbü pendou Dawid Choba yeitila maangpon che kikei.
Hobaje khünei haoen Dawid yoa chalou sem shauko yungko kikei, aieilausi haoeneibü jaisinasi shuong haoen shanga lamlekuan kikei.

Hobaje tokei haoeneibü chempen khei Issakar, Zebulun, hoba Naftali sühko kakei gadua, uta, hoba masua, shausiyung apsileko bhukeibü wentek, semlüh hek, ih, onang, masu hoba sanlon sungbakei; aieilausi Israela olinbü kikei.
Dawidei hajar thüka hoba saongao thüka lajamleibü to khei leiyeibü weko to ditshuokyokei.
Hobaje Israelbü kamshaibü pendou to Dawidei laukei, “Ho kan la maikualonga hoba
hoba senei seneibü Mühghaü saopobü Busen sen jungto sungbakho; aieilausi Saul haanga senei kho inletkei.”
Hobaje leiyeibü pendouei kho tegü kümla maangangkei, aieilausi müt pendou thedanga kümsilei kho tükde ong kikei.
Hibü Kiriath-Jearim ka Mühghaüeibü Busen sungbala shanga Dawidei Israelbü pendou Ijepa Shihor ka Hamat lamnyu sühko yoshaitikei.
Dawid hoba Israelbü pendou Baala, kho Jihudabüeibü Kiriath-Jearim to Mühghaüei Saopobü Busen jungan angla laobou kaakyembü kherabim thükaenei setan kibü
Hobaje haoenei Mühghaüeibü Busen kho kailong haanbü chenei Abinadabeibü chem ka künkei, hoba Uzza si Ahio haosiei kailong kho leiyeikei.
Dawid hoba Israelbü pendouei chiaei kongkin hoba tokbü kongkin, sen, hoba pithung hoba teklaangei lemlemyoko kikei.
Hobaje ladang haoen Khidona amshang shon sühjung loukei, Uzzaei Busen kho hatetla haoeibü ik shingkei, aishanga masu shuong kho phaiyetkei.
Hobaje
Hobaje Dawid khauangkei aieilausi
Hobaje khünyet Dawid Mühghaü to hatkei hoba laukei, “Ngei Mühghaüeibü Busen kho lai küman kü jungto künbangaila?”
Hibü Dawidei Saopobü Busen kho chem to jungan Dawid sangnyu to üt, lausikei kukan Gitbü Obededom chemto jungan haukei.
Hobaje Mühghaüeibü Busen kho Obededomeibü chemdang yoa haoeibü chema lit sem kikei; hoba
Tou Tairbü Choba Hiramei Dawid jungto ngühlang künbü shuong, hoba hao shanga chem dangla shanga cedar bu, laang hoba bueibü mistri shuong hautikei.
Hobaje Dawidei Israel thüka hao Choba lela
Hobaje Jerusalema Dawidei yak aei ngakei, hoba Dawid ka bousu yaksa shousi aei pakkei.
Jerusalema kibü haoeibü shousi shuong nyen ho ki: Shammua, Shobab, Nathan, Solomon,
Ibher, Elishua, hoba Elpalet,
Noga, Nefeg, hoba Jafia,
Elishama, Beeliada, hoba Elifelet.
Ladang Filistiabüei Israelbü pendou thüka Dawid Choba pienkei dogo ditkei, Filistiabü pendouei Dawid lamjung angkei, hoba Dawidei kho ditkei hoba haoen khulimbo haukei.
Tou Filistiabü loukei, hoba Refaim pholi shian apbei.
Hobaje Dawidei Mühghaü to phekei, “Ngo Filistiabü khulimbo angkho no? Nyi haoen kü ikto kuasao?” Hobaje

Hobaje hao Baal- perazimi to angkei, hoba Dawidei haoen khünei thükkei, hoba Dawidei laukei, “Deinyu yungsen jonlepbü tegü ngeibü ikei Mühghaüei ngeibü dangbou shuong tuyetkua.” Hibü ho kaonyek nyen Baal-perazim nyenkei.
Hobaje haoenei khünei haoeneibü mühghaü shuong apyokei, hoba Dawidei khübü kho jikan apla ngühkhüm kukei.
Hobaje Filistiabüei tokei nyibou pholi khünei kho shian apbei.
Hobaje ladang Dawidei Mühghaü to nyibou phekei, Mühghaüei hao to laukei, “No haoen phaito üanglabü; lausikei koman sungshi, hoba balsam bulong shuong napheito haoen thedang to kai.
Hobaje ladang nyi sepai paibü ngühlang bukhua ditlaje, kheijinei lason to haushi, aishanga Mühghaü kan thedang to Filistiabü haitila hauakei.”
Hobaje Dawidei Mühghaüei hao la sakkubü tegü kümbei, hoba haoenei Filistiabü sepai tan kho Gibeon ka Gezer sühko wapbei.
Hobaje Dawideibü nyenhang kaonyu pendou phambo haukei, hoba
Dawidei hao shanga Dawid sangnyua chem dangkei; hoba Mühghaüeibü Saopobü Busen shanga kaoen che kümbei, hoba kho shanga neichem che dangkei.
Kheijinei Dawidei laukei, “Levibü to liman aoeikei Mühghaü Sao- pobü Busen alenglabü, aishanga
Hobaje
Hobaje Dawidei Aroneibü shousi shuong hoba Levibü liko yoshaitikei;
Kohat shousi shuong kongnyubou Uriel, hoba haoeibü jaisinasi saongaoto saoche.
Merarieibü shousi shuong, haoeibü jaisianasi saoanto saoche;
Gershon shousi shuong, kongnyu shuong Joel, hoba haoeibü jaisinasi saoanto khujin;
Elizafaneibü shousi shuong kongnyubou Shemaia, hoba haoeibü jaisinasi saoan,
Hebroneibü shousi shuong kongnyubou Eliel, hoba haoeibü jaisinasi saolei,
Uzzieleibü shousi shuong, kongnyubou Amminadab; hoba haoeibü jaisinasi saongaoto anthük nyi.
Kheijinei Dawidei Zadok hoba Abiathar ungshedbou shu- ong, hoba Levibü Uriel, Asaia, Joel, Shemaia, Eliel, hoba Amminadab ngakei.
Hobaje haoen to laukei, “Levibü chempen leiyeibü shuong kho kan ki; khei
Kanei püngla khangla thama kho ajungbü haangjung
Hibü ungshedbou shuong hoba Levibü shuongei
Hobaje
Tokei Dawidei Levibü konglebü shuong to olinbü ngühlang longtila kongkin, pithung, teklaang ngühlang yaang longko chia laulabü shuong haoeneibü jaisinasi shuong pienla sakkukei.
Hibü Levibü shuongei Joeleibü shou Heman pienkei, hoba haoeibü jaisina Berekaeibü shou Asaf, hoba haoeneibü jaisina Merarieibü shousi shuong Kushaiaeibü shou Ethan,
hoba haoen yoa haoeibü jaisina nyiboubü lin Zekharia, Jaaziel, Shemiramot, Jehiel, Unni, Eliab, Benaia, Maaseia, Mattithia, Elifele, Mikneia, hoba koukhün lombou Obededom hoba Jeiel.
Chia laubü Heman, Asaf, hoba Ethan haoenei chinam kanglabü;
Zekharia, Aziel, Shemiramot, Jehiel, Unni, Eliab, Maaseia, hoba Benaia, haoenei Alamot tegü, pithung metlabü.
Lausikei Maatithia, Elifele, Mikneia, Obededom, Jeiel, hoba Azazia, haoenei Sheminit tegübü kongkinei leilabü.
Levibü yoa chia leiyeibü Kananialei chia leiyeilabü, aieilausi haoei kho ditenkei.
Berekia hoba Elkana Busen shanga koukhün lombü shuong kikei.

Shebania, Joshafat, Nethaniel, Amasai, Zekharia, Benaia, hoba Eliezer, ungshedbou shuongei Mühghaüeibü Busen thedanga teklaang metlabü. Obededom hoba Jehia haosi Busen shanga koukhün lombü shuong yinglabü.
Hibü Dawid hoba Israelbü jaishou shuong hoba hajar thüka lajamleibou shuong Obededomeibü chem ka
Hobaje

Dawidei neisimei phembanei inyaibüei takbü lean kikei, hoba kho tegü Busen jungbü Levibü pendou chia laubü shuong, hoba chia laubü leiyeibü Kenaniaeikei neisimei lekei, hoba Dawidei phembanei ungshedbou saopobü neisimei lean kikei.
Kho tegü Israelbü pendouei
Hobaje
Hobaje haoenei
Hobaje ladang Dawidei juokbü lembü si sangmai lembü kho lamlekhümbei haoei
Israelbü pendou la bousu si yaksa weko la wentek che che hoba phejok che che hoba semlüh wen che che janan kukei.
Tokei haoei Levibü at
Konglebou kho Asaf hoba hao to thenbou kho Zekharia, Jeiel, Shemiramot, Jehiel, Matthithia, Eliab, Benaia, Obededom hoba Jeiel, habü ho pithung, kongkin kangbü shuong; Asafei chinam kanglabü,
hoba ungshedbou Benaia hoba Jahazielei athakko Mühghaüeibü thebülanbü Sao- pobü Busen thedanga teklaang metlabü.
Khünyet Dawidei shaangla Asaf hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong to
O
Mütshuong yoa haoeibü kümsilei ngetiashi.
Hao la chia atkuashi,
hao to nyensang chia lauashi;
Haoeibü maangpanglabü kümsilei pendou lenashi!
Hao saopobü nyena soneikangtiashi;
Aoyouei
athakko hao yobü lamashi.
Haoeibü maangpanglabü kümsilei haoei kümbü,
Haoei kümbü seikümseilei;
Haoei matjem ngüh lauan litibü damenashi.
Hao khangenbou Israel shousi shuong,
Jakobeibü shousi shuong haoei pienbü shuong!
Hao seneibü Mühghaü
Haoeibü matjem kaodak pendoua kia.
Ponpen shanga haoeibü thebülanbü,
Meten hajar shanga haoei sakkubü ngüh haoei amaako kia.
Haoei Abraham to theyolanyobü,
Thonsithak akibü theyolanyobü Isak la thekukei.
Laobou haoei Jakob la takletbü ngühkhüm tegü,
hoba Israel to thon akibü theyolanyobü tegü
khangngaitikei.
Hobaje laukei,
“Kan la Kanan kaodak,
kaneibü phejan phetphan che tegü ngei kulabü.”
Ladang haoeneibü lühbaka shisho kikei;
Haü, aeibou shisho ong, khünei yen la lean kikei.
Phang che ka phang che to, sangle che ka,
Lubü mütli jungto shongaiko kikei.
Haoei aolakei haoen khon akuti;
Haoen laüa haoei Choba shuong to haktiko,
Laukei, “Ngei naangenko pienbü to temeiti;
Ngeibü thuseibü shuong to amaibü teküm.”
Chalou angboua haoeibü khümenbü shanga lenashi.
Phangshuong yoa haoeibü soneikangbü ngetiashi;
Haoeibü maangpanglabü kümsilei shuong
mütli pendou yoa!
Aishanga yaangenbou kho
hoba aeibou sangjan;
Hobaje mühghaü pendou thüka hao to hatjan.
Aishanga mütli shuong mühghaü pendou kho heangsho shuong ki.
Lausikei
Nyensang si soumo yaangbü hao junga kia;
Hao kishanga hau hoba olinbü ki.
O phangshuong ngühyem shuong,
Soneikangbü hoba hau hao la kuashi!
Lembü che jungan kaiya, hoba hao jungto kaiya;
Saopobü hele lean
Hao thedanga lühashi kaodak pendou;
Haü, kaodak kaangkhühtham loan kia;
kho atopeilabü.
Mühshuong olinashi hoba kaonyu olinashi!
Yungnyu hoba kho shenko kibü pendouei ngühashi;
Khongthu hoba khünei kibü pendou olinashi!
Kheijinei yamkabü bulong shuongei olinbüei
Aishanga kaodak matjemla hao louada.
O
la nyensang kuashi,
aishanga hao maibü ki.
Aishanga haoeibü üeisanou süngshonko kida.
Kanei hao to laushi,
“Kün püetashi,
O küneibü
Khümenbou Mühghaü;
hoba phangshuong yo ka kün leiyenashi
hoba khümenashi.
Hobaje kaibü nyena soneikanglabü.
Israel Mühghaü
Thon akibü ka thon
akibü sühko.
Kheijinei müt pendouei laukei, “Amen!”
hoba
Hibü Dawidei Asaf si haoeibü jaisinasi shuong khünei
Haoei tokei Obededom hoba haoeibü jaisinasi saosemto set; tokei Jeduthuneibü shou Obededom hoba Hosa koukhün lombü shuong kikei.
Hobaje ungshedbou Zadok hoba haoeibü jaisinasi ungshedbou shuong
eibü ngühkhüma doan kibü tegü laobou haoei Israel la sakkukei kho pendou tegütham juokbü lemshang thüka athakko ngeyang ka nangnak sühko
Haoen yoa Heman hoba Jeduthun hoba joubü pienan kibü shuong kho hoba shangashatko nyen kuan kibü shuong
Heman si Jeduthuneibü ika saopobü chia shanga chia hoba chia laulabü peisilei hoba teklaang hoba chinam la kikei. Jeduthuneibü shousi shuong koukhüna kila pienkei.
Kheijinei müt pendou lulu chem to linkei, hoba Dawidei haoeibü chemdang haükula chem to ngaikei.
Tou ladang Dawid jembü chema kikei, Dawidei thuseibou Nathan to laukei, “Chühashi, ngo cedar bueibü chema kida, lausikei
Hobaje Nathanei laukei, “Kaibü maang- pona ai ki pendou kümashi, aishanga Mühghaü ka yoa kia.”
Lausikei khüyoutham
“Hauashi hoba ngo khangenbou Dawid to lenashi,
aishanga ngei Israel leiyenbü chalou ka tat sühko ngo chema akida, lausikei ngo neichem che ka neichem che to shongaia.

Ngo lanei ong Israelbü pendou yoa paikei pendou aenei ngei Israel matjembü shuong, aoyou la ngeibü mütli san lomla ngei sakkukei haoen to, aila kanei kü la cedar buei chem che adangkuda dogo ngei alau.’
Hibü tou nyi ngo khangenbou Dawid to lenshi, Thükenbou
Hobaje no lato ong haukei, ngo ka yoa yoan kikei, hoba ka thedang ka dangbou pendou wapan apbua, hoba ngei ka shanga kaodaka yaangbü shuong nyen phatko nyen che longtilabü.

Hobaje kü mütli Israel shanga ngei kaonyek che pienlabü, hoba haoen jembü kishanga kienla, hoba touje akuklabü lele ngei haoen kelabü, hoba kü mütli thüka ngei shaangla matjembü pienbü jihsiphai ka toubü jih sühko amaibou shousi shuongei haoen khonsak kipjim akutilabü,
hoba ngei kaibü dangbou shuong pendou naklepkulabü, khoto aei
No ladang kabousi shuong yoa kilabü jihsiphai longlaje, ka phainei ngei kaibü shousi ka che longtikulabü, hoba ngei haoeibü sangle tenan phokulabü.
Haoei kü la chem che dangkulabü hoba ngei haoeibü Choba setshang ponpen shanga tenan phokulabü.
Ngo haoeibü bou yeilabü, hoba hao kü shou kilabü; hoba ka to shaang ao kikei hao ka ngei langbü tegütham ngei hao ka üeisanou alanglabü.
Lausikei ngei kü chema hoba ngeibü sanglea ponpen shanga hao kaangtilabü hoba haoeibü Choba setshang ponpen shanga kümbulabü.”
Khübü ngüh pendou tegütham, hoba ho mangsang pendou tegütham Nathanei Dawid to joyokei.
Kheijinei Dawid Choba atkei hoba
O Mühghaü, ho ka theaje hanbüshou che ong kikei; lausikei nyi toukei no khangenbou chemdang shanga loulabü chalou lounyu kian joyoa hoba kü la loulabü meten shanga lena, O
Hobaje no khangenbou hangenbü shanga ka to Dawidei ai laula thükla? Aishanga nyi no khangenbou ngeakei.
No khangenbou nyena, O
No phatko ao aki, O

Kaibü mütli Israel aoyou jungto jembü mütli yingla Mühghaüei angla hautikei nyi Ijep ka aoyou angthetkei haoen thedang ka phangshuong shian sattibüei no lolo nyen yaang hoba hatlamoklabü yeitikei, haoen phatko kaodaka ai phang ki?
Hobaje nyi kaibü mütli yeitikei; hoba no, O
“Hobaje tou, O
Hobaje kaibü nyen ponpen shanga kilabü hoba yaangentiko laulabü, Thükenbou
Aishanga no ngeibü Mühghaü, no khangenbou to hao shanga phangche denshang lamletilabü dogo tang khittikua; hibü no khangenbou ka thedanga welaula maang kaangda.
Hobaje tou, O
Hobaje tou ka junga ponpen shanga athakko kienlabü lele, sanoudambo no khangenbou chemdang haükushima; aieilausi O
Kho phaia Dawidei Filistiabü thükkei hoba haoen phanga phokei, hoba haoei Gat si khoeibü sang shuong Filistiabü ik ka sungkei.
Hobaje haoei Moab thükkei, hoba Moabbü Dawid khangenbü shuong la yeikei hoba khüm sungbakei.
Tokei Dawidei Hadadezer, Zobabü Choba Hamat aenei kibü Eufratesa haoei jembü nyenhang noksa phola haujinei thükkei.
Hobaje Dawidei hao ka koli sepai hajar nyet hoba youeibü sepai hajar che sungkei, hoba Dawidei kailong koli pendoueibü youshi phejak wapan apbukei, lausikei kailong saongao shanga souko apyokei.
Hobaje ladang Siriabü Damaska ka Zobabü Choba Hadadezer thuila loukei, Dawidei Siriabü müt hajar saoto nyi haitikei.
Kheijinei Dawidei Siriaa kibü Damaskaa lapheibü tan phokukei, hoba Siriabü Dawid khangenbü shuong yeikei, hoba khüm sungbakei. Hobaje
Hobaje Hadadezer khangenbü shuongei kümbü haoeneibü aih shuong kho Dawidei sokei, hoba khübü kho Jerusalem to sungbakei.
Hobaje Hadadezereibü sangnyu shuong Tibhath ka hoba Kun ka Dawidei chinam juong sungkei; khoei Solomonei chinam sidang hoba thaonyu shuong chinam chaksiam thungsiphau kümbei.
Ladang Hamatbü Choba Touei Zobabü Choba Hadadezereibü sepai tan khümbo Dawidei thüka dogo ditkei,

haoei haoeibü shou Hatoram Dawid Choba jungto hao la salem kula hoba thükbü nyensang kula hautikei, aieilausi haoei Hadadezer dankthetko wap- yokei hoba hao thükkei, aieilausi Hadadezer annebenko Tou to wapyoko kikei. Hobaje haoei hon chandinam hoba chinam peisilei den pendou hautikei.
Khübü khokei tokei Dawid Chobaei
Hobaje Zeruaeibü shou Abishaiei Jem pholia Edombü hajar anthükset haitikei.
Hobaje haoei Edom lapheibü sepai tan phokei, hoba Edombü pendou Da- wid khangenbou yeikei. Hobaje
Hibü Dawidei Israelbü pendou thüka songdakkei, hoba haoei ngühmaia matjembei hoba müt pendou thüka jeteitei jungeikei.
Hobaje Zeruiaeibü shou Joab sepai tan thüka kikei, hoba Ahiludeibü shou Jehoshafat dobou kikei.
Hobaje Ahitubeibü shou Zadok hoba Abiathareibü shou Abimelek ungshedbou shu- ong kikei; hoba Shavsha dobou kikei;
hoba Jehoiadaeibü shou Benaia Keretbü hoba Peletbü thüka kikei, hoba Dawideibü shousi shuong Choba kümaleia konglebü shuong kikei.
Tou Ammonbü Choba Nahash haian phaia haoeibü shousi hao jeila songdakkei.

Hobaje Dawidei laukei, “Nahasheibü shou Hanun to ngei maangkuko jungeilabü, aieilausi haobouei kü to maangshikko jungeikei.” Hibü Dawidei hao maangsula haoeibü youko ikjaibü shuong hautikei. Hobaje Dawid khangenbü shuong hao maangsula Ammonbü kaodaka Hanun jungto loukei.

Lausikei Ammonbü jaishou shuongei Hanun to laukei, “Dawidei ka jungto maangsubü hautibü khoei haoei kabou la soumo kuda dogo nyi damda sai? Haoeibü khangenbüei lamla hoba tuongtila hoba kaonyek shuchühla shanga ka jungto loukei aying lo?”

Hibü Hanunei Dawideibü khangenbü shuong leijung loukei hoba haoenei khu kütan apbukei, hoba haoeneibü neisimei jenyu ka haoeneibü youshi sühko lipan apbukei, hoba haoen sattikei, hoba haoen meimeijung haukei.

Ladang Dawid la mütshuong shangabü ngetikei, hao haoen shuokla haukei, aieilausi mütshuong kho aeibou himouko kikei. Hobaje Chobaei laukei, “Kan sembung wi alongshongko Jerikhoa kishi, kho phaia sepeinyu kangai.”

Ladang Ammonbüei haoen lolo Dawid thedanga phaiyetlabü lele küma dogo chühenkei, Ammonbü Hanunei Mesopotamia ka, Aramaaka ka, kailong hoba koli sepai shuong jekan jungeila chandinam seret khujin bang atbü hajar che hautikei.

Hobaje haoeneibü kailong hajar khujinto nyi hoba Maaka Choba haoeibü sepai tan shanga mu kukei, ao louan Medeba thedanga shaishang kümbei. Hobaje Ammonbü haoeneibü sangnyu shuong ka leishaikei hoba lason to loukei.
Ladang Dawidei kho ditkei, haoei Joab si lakjaibou sepai tan pendou hautikei.
Hobaje Ammonbü longkei hoba sangnyu sang badanga lin küman lokei, hoba Choba shuong aoyou louan kikei haoen lubüa khongthua kikei.
Ladang Joabei lason kho hao naklepbo thedanga hoba phainei kian hapbei, haoei Israelbü müt sonenbü at pienkei hoba Siriabü naklepbo lason lotikei.
Joubü haoeibü mütshuong kho hao na Abishai phanga haoei phokukei, hoba haoen Ammonbü naklepbo lason lokei.
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Siriabü kü shanga yongko hau kialonga, kheijinei nyi kü to thuilabü; lausikei Ammonbü ka shanga yongko hau kian kialonga ngei ka to thuilabü.
Maang kaangashi, sen mütli shanga hoba seneibü Mühghaü sangnyu shuong shanga sen sekalakakho; hoba
Hibü Joab si hao yoa kibü mütshuongei Siriabü nyangko lason wapyola loukei, hoba haoen hao jungka satkei.
Hobaje ladang Ammonbüei Siriabü satbü chühenkei haoenei kho tegü Joabeibü na Abishai jungka satkei hoba sangnyu khüto atkei. Kheijinei Joab Jerusalem to loukei.

Lausikei ladang Siriabüei haoen Israelbü la thüktilep dogo chühenkei, haoenei ngühlang künbü shuong hautikei hoba Siriabü aoyou Eufrates danjung hauan ki, Hadadezereibü sepai tan lajamleibü Shofak haoen thüka khu lean longkei.

Hobaje ladang kho Dawid la ngetikei, haoei Israelbü pendou liko leishaikei hoba Jordan danjung hauan haoen khulimbo sepai tan senshaikei. Hobaje ladang Dawidei Siriabü naklepbo lason lokei, haoenei hao khulimbo wapyokei.
Hobaje Siriabü Israelbü thed- ang ka satkei; hoba Dawidei Si- riabü kailong hajar nyet, youeibü sepai hajar saonyi wapettikei, hoba tokei sepai tan lajamleibou Shofak haitikei.

Hobaje ladang Hadadezer khangenbü shuongei haoen Israelbü la thüktia dogo chühenkei, haoenei Dawid to sangmai kümbei, hoba hao mütshuong la yeikei. Hibü touje Siriabüei Ammonbü thuila maangangko akitei.

Choba shuong lason to haubü kejih ongjiha Joabei sepai tan leian haukei, hoba Ammonbü kaonyek shikei, hoba louan Rabba komlepbei. Lausikei Dawid Jerusalema kikei. Hobaje Joabei Rabba thükkei hoba kho shian apbei.

Hobaje Dawidei haoeneibü heangsho Choba khun haoeibü khu ka sungkei; haoei kho takan chühbü hon seret khujin bang atbü che hapbei hoba khonei namseklaang kikei hoba khübü kho Dawideibü khuna jinkei. Hobaje haoei sangnyu ka soletbü peisilei juong künbakei.

Hobaje khünei kibü shuong haoei leian longkei hoba bulat namju simbü hoba wou jungeitiko kümsilei kümtikei; hoba kho tegü Dawidei Ammonbü sangnyubü shuong to kümbei. Kho phaia Dawid si müt pendou Jerusalem to longeikei.
Hobaje kho phaia Filistiabü to Gezera wapyo longkei, kheijinei Hushatbü Sibbekaiei Filistiabü mütlou mütyaang shuong ka pakbü müt che Sippai nyenbü haitikei, hoba Filistiabü hao phanga phokei.
Hobaje tokei Filistiabü to wapyoko kikei, hoba Gatbü Goliat, aoeibü aubu neitakbüeibü jim tegü kikei, haoeibü na Lahmi, Jaireibü shou Elhananei haitikei.

Tokei Gata wapyo kikei, khünei süngsilop yaangbü che kikei, aoeibü ik wekoa ikjishou lakbang kikei hoba you wekoa youjishou lakbang kikei pendouei saotolei, hoba tokei hao mütlou mütyaang ka pakbü kikei.
Hobaje ladang haoei Israelbü khulimbo meimeikei, Dawideibü na Shimeaeibü shou Jonathanei hao haitikei.
Khübü kho Gatbü yoa mütlou mütyaang shuong ka pakbü kikei; hoba haoen Dawid ika hoba haoeibü khangenbü shuong ika tuongkei.
Israel khulimbo Satan lokei hoba Israelbü lühbak wela Dawid thungan jinkei.
Hibü Dawidei Joab hoba sepai leiyeibü to laukei, “Hauashi, Beersheba ka Dan sühko Israel wean chühashi, hoba haoeneibü lühbak ngela kü jungto ngühlang sungba.”
Lausikei Joabei laukei, “
Lausikei Joabei Chobaeibü ngüh athük. Hibü Joab kukkei hoba Israel pendou shoongjung haukei, hoba Jerusalem to longeikei.
Hobaje Joabei mütshuong lühbak yoshaibü Dawid la kukei. Israel pendoua injung thükbü shuong bousu million che hajar saongao hoba Jihudaa injungbü hajar saongao leito anjinlei.
Lausikei haoei Levi si Benjaminje lühbak to wean jinla athük, aieilausi Chobaeibü sakkubü kho Joabei amangsühko kikei.
Lausikei ho kümsileiei Mühghaü aolinko kikei, hoba haoei Israel to ngümbei.
Hobaje Dawidei Mühghaü to laukei, “Ngei ho kümsilei kümbüei shabü shona; ngei ka to sudajada, no khangenbouei shed shonbü langkushima, aieilausi ngei aeibou ngoukolouko küma!”
Hobaje
“Hauashi hoba Dawid to lenshi,
Hibü Gad Dawid jungto loukei hoba laukei, “
po sem mühsinou yingsikei ayingsi kaibü dangbou shuongeibü inei no laphetjinei lit sem kaibü dangbou thedanga leilubü longtilabü yingsikei ayingsi chalou sem
Kheijinei Dawidei Gad to laukei, “Ngo maangmau yaangbüa kia,
Hibü
Hobaje Mühghaüeibü hangangbü Jerusalem mautila hautikei, lausikei ladang haoei kho mautila kikei,
Hobaje Dawidei haoeibü nyek thükaeto chühan angtisi
Hobaje Dawidei Mühghaü to laukei, “Mütshang wela ngei sakkubü aku lo? Aoei shabü shonkei hoba aeibou amaiko kümbei kho ngo ki. Lausikei habü sanshuongei haoenei ai kümbei? O
Kheijinei
Hibü
Arauna whet youshou sungyoko kikei, hao sepeikei hoba hangangbü kho hapbei, hoba hao yoa kibü shousi müt lei kho haoen lolo hukei.
Dawid Arauna jungto lousi Araunaei chühkei hoba Dawid hapbei hoba amshang to angkei, hoba haoeibü thenyek kaoae yeian Dawid la salem kukei.
Hobaje Dawidei Arauna to laukei, “
Kheijinei Araunaei Dawid to laukei, “Leashi hoba ngeibü
Lausikei Dawid Chobaei Arauna to laukei, “Aying, lausikei ngei kho namtet tükdebüei ong jeklabü; kaibü ai ki kho ngei
Hibü Dawidei Arauna la kao shanga hon shekel saongao lak yaüan kukei.
Hobaje khünei Dawidei
Kheijinei
Kho jiha ladang Dawidei Jebusbü Araunaeibü amshanga hao to
Aishanga
lausikei Dawidei kho junga Mühghaü to phela ohauen, aishanga hao
Kheijinei Dawidei laukei, “Hanei
Hobaje Israel kaodaka kibü küksithang shuong Dawidei liko kamshaitikei, hoba Mühghaüeibü chem dangla shanga haoei laangjakbü shuong, hoba laang thüngenan yentila kümtikei.
Dawidei tokei, bakhün koukap shuong shanga hoba sapyola kojal shanga nam apsileko thankei, hoba chinamkei seretkei ohauenlabü lele,
hoba cedar wa aweenlabü lele lamlekukei; aieilausi Sidonbü hoba Tairbüei bu juong Dawid jungto sungbakei.
Hobaje Da- widei laukei, “Kü shou Solomon heshou hoba kümaleia nashou, hoba
Kheijinei haoei haoeibü shou Solomon ngakei hoba
Dawidei Solomon to laukei, “Kü shou,
Lausikei

Chühashi, ka la bousu shou che bukkulabü, hao sangmai müt che yinglabü; hoba kaijembo haoeibü dangbou pendou ka ngei hao la sangmai kulabü, aishanga haoeibü nyen Solomon nyenlabü, hoba ngei hao haanga Israelbü la sangmai hoba sangsembü kulabü.
Haoei kü shanga chem che danglabü. Hao ngeibü shou yinglabü hoba ngo haobou yinglabü hoba Israela ngei haoeibü Choba setshang ponpen shanga kümbulabü.’
“Tou, kü shou,
ei ong khei ladang haoei ka la Israel thüka leiyeila sakkulaje, nyi
Nyi sakkubü ngühkhüm shuong laobou Israel shanga
Khonsak yaangei
Nyi kümla leilabü müt juong kia; laang thüngbü shuong, laangeibü mistri shuong, bueibü mistri shuong, kümsilei phang pendoua sonenbü aweenko kia;
hon, chandinam, chinam, hoba nam. Meimeiashi hoba kümaleiashi!
Dawidei tokei Israelbü leiyeibü pendou to hao shou Solomon to thuila sakkukei hoba laukei,
Tou
Ladang Dawid baushi sinan kikei, haoei hao shou Solomon Israelbü thüka Choba yeitikei.
Dawidei Israelbü leiyeibü hoba ungshedbü hoba Levibü pendou kamshaitikei.
Levibü po khujin hoba thükaenei wean chühkei, hoba lühbak pendou müt hajar khujinto set kikei.
Khübü yoa hajar saoto lei je
hajar lei bakhün lombü, hoba hajar leiei ngei kümbü kongkin shuong yoa
Hobaje Levibü shousi shuong takteian Dawidei haoen janyinbü longtila Gershon, Kohat hoba Merari.
Gershoneibü shousi shuong kho Ladan hoba Shimei.
Ladaneibü shousi shuong: Jehiel kongnyubou, Zetham, hoba Joel, haoen sem.
Shimeieibü shousi shuong: Shelomoth, Haziel, hoba Haran, haoen sem. Habü ho Ladaneibü boueibü shisi shousi kongnyu shuong kikei.
Hobaje Shimeieibü shousi shuong: Ja- hat, Zina, Jeush, hoba Beria. Habü lei ho Shimeieibü shousi kikei.
Jahat kho kongnyubou kikei, hoba Ziza nyiboubü; lausikei Jeush hoba Beriaeibü shousi juong akitei, khoei haoen bou cheeibü tegü ong wean jinkei.
Kohateibü shousi shuong: Amran, Izhar, Hebron, hoba Uziel, haoen lei.
Amram shousi shuong: Aron si Mosa.
Lausikei Mühghaüeibü müt Mosaeibü shousi shuongje, Levi phang yoa pakan jinkei.
Mosaeibü shousi shuong: Gershom si Eliezer.
Gershomeibü shousi shuong: Shebuel kongnyubou.
Eliezereibü shousi shuong: Rehabia, konglebou; Eliezereibü shousi lubü akitei; lausikei Rehabiaeibü shousi shuong aeibou juongan kikei.
Izhareibü shousi shuong: Shelomit, kongnyubou.
Hebroneibü shousi shuong: Jeria konglebou, Amaria, kho thenbou, Jahaziel semboubü hoba Jekameam leiboubü.
Uzzieleibü shousi shuong: Mika konglebou hoba Ishia kho thenbou.
Merarieibü shousi shuong: Mahli hoba Mushi. Mahlieibü shousi shuong: Eleazer hoba Kish,
Eleazerei shousi akiko haikei, lausikei yaksa shousi shuong ong kikei, hoba haoeneibü thensilen Kisheibü shousi shu- ongei haoen lekei.
Mushieibü shousi shuong: Mahli, Eder, hoba Jeremot haoen sem.
Habü ho boueibü shi aedang ka Levi shousi shuong kikei: boueibü shisi kongnyu shuong haoen, po saoche jaishou ka thükaenei lulueibü nyen dobü
Aishanga Dawidei laukei, “
Hobaje touje Levibü lemshang neichem ayingsi khünei peisilei khangenbü ai kümsilei shangakei jungan apailabü.”
Aishanga Dawideibü thonbü ngühei habü ho po saoche hoba thükae lühbaka kikei.
Aishanga haoeneibü kümsilei kho Aroneibü shousi shuong
tokei Mühghaü thedanga phobü wentek, shausiyung lembü shanga wen on, tokai ajinbü wentek, ayingsi wentek kümbü lembü onang to kheiyobü lembü, hoba takletbü hoba takbü pendoua thuiyolabü.
Hobaje ngeyang weko haoenei
Hobaje ladang ong juokbü lembü shuong Nounyet
Kho tegü haoenei kamshang neichem hoba saoposhang chühlabü, hoba
Aroneibü shousi shuong janbü hai kikei. Aroneibü shousi shuong: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazer, hoba Ithamar.
Lausikei Nadab si Abihu haosieibü bou to shaang haikei, hoba shousi akitei. Hibü Eleazer si Ithammar ungshedbou shuong yeikei.
Eleazereibü shousi shuong yo ka Zadok si Ithamar shousi shuong ka Ahimelekeibü thuibü lekei, haoeneibü kümaleia kümlabü kümsilei kubü tegütham Dawidei haoen jankukei.
Ithamareibü shousi shuong toje Eleazereibü shousi leiyeibü juongbou yingsije haoenei Eleazereibü shousi shuong boueibü shisi shuong anthüklakei leian jankei hoba Ithamareibü shousi shuong ka müt set.
Haoenei phaang pakko pendou jeteitei jankei, aieilausi Ithamareibü shousi shuong hama saoposhanga lei- yeibü hoba Mühghaüeibü leiyeibü kikei.

Hobaje Nethaneleibü shou Shemaia dobou, Levibü cheei Choba leiyeibü shuong Zadok ungshedbou, Abiathareibü shou Ahimelek, ungshedbou shuong boueibü shisi kongnyubou shuong hoba Levieibü shi che Eleazer shanga sungkei hoba Ithamar shanga sungkei.
Tou habü chung saoto lei to kümlaleilabü phaang shatkei:
1. Jehoiarib
13. Huppa
2. Jedaia
14. Jeshebeab
3. Harim
15. Bilga
4. Seorim
16. Immer
5. Malkhija
17. Hezir
6. Mijamim
18. Happizzez
7. Hakkoz
19. Pethahia
8. Abija
20. Jehezkel
9. Jeshua
21. Jakhin
10. Shekania
22. Gamul
11. Eliashib
23. Delaia
12. Jakim
24. Maazia
Hobaje Levi shousi joubü shuong: Amrameibü shousi shuong ka Shebael, Shebael shousi shuong ka Jedeia,
Rehabia ka: Rehabiaeibü shousi shuong ka kongnyubou Ishia.
Izharit ka Shelomoth; Shelomotheibü shousi shuong ka Jahat.
Hebroneibü shousi shuong ka: shaangbou Jeria, nyiboubü Amaria, semboubü Jehaziel, leiboubü Jekameam.
Uzzieleibü shou Mika; Mikaeibü shousi Shamir,
Mikaeibü jaisina kho Ishia, Ishiaeibü shousi shuong Zekharia,
Merarieibü shousi shuong: Mahli hoba Mushi Jaaziaeibü shousi shuong; Beno.
Merarieibü shousi shuong; Jaazia ka Beno, Shoham, Zakur hoba Ibri,
Mahli ka Eleazer haoeibü shousi akitei.
Kisheibü shousi shuong ka Jerameel,
hoba Mushieibü shousi shuong; Mahli hoba Eder hoba Jerimot.
Habü Levibü shousi shuong haoeneibü boueibü shisi lin kikei.

Habü hokei boueibü shisi wekoa kongnyubou hoba haoeibü nakei jeteitei; khei haoeneibü jaisina Aroneibü shousi shuong Dawid Choba, Zadok, Ahimelek hoba ungshedbou hoba Levibü boueibü shisi konglebou youjunga tegütham phaang pakkei.

Dawid hoba kümaleia konglebü shuongei tokei Asaf, Heman, hoba Jeduthuneibü shousi shuong at, tuokbü kongkin hoba pithungei haoenei lenenla lulu phokei. Kümbüleibü shuong nyen hoba haoeneibü kümlaleilabü kümsilei kho:
Asafeibü shousi shuong Zakur, Josef, Nethania, hoba Asharel. Asafeibü lenbü phanga haoenei Chobaeibü lenbü phanga tetenkei.
Jeduthun ka, Jeduthuneibü shousi shuong: Gedalia, Zeri, Jeshaia, Shimei, Hashabia, hoba Mattithia, haoen müt lak; haoeneibü bou Jeduthuneibü lenbü phanga haoei tuokbü kongkin
Heman ka, Hemaneibü shousi shuong: Bukkia, Mattania, Uzziel, Shebuel, Jerimot, Hanania, Hanani, Eliatha, Gidalti, hoba Romamtiezer, Joshbekasha, Mallothi, Hothir, Mahaziet.
Habü pendou Chobaeibü thuseibou Hemameibü shousi shuong. Mühghaüei hao yaangentila thekubü tegütham kikei, aieilausi Mühghaüei Heman la bousu shou anthüklei hoba yaksa shou sem kukei.
Haoen pendou
Hobaje haoenei kümlabü kümsilei shanga hanbü yaangbü lenbou si ditletbü jeteitei phaang pakkei.
Shaangbou pakbüa Asaf shanga Josef to shatkei, nyiboubü Gedalia, hao jungto hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong hoba haoeibü shousi shuong anthüknyi,
semboubü Zakur jungto hoba haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong anthüknyi,
leiboubü Izri jungto haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong anthüknyi,
ngaoboubü Nethania jungto haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong anthüknyi,
lakboubü Bukkia jungto, haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong anthüknyi,
nyetboubü Jesharela jungto, haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong anthüknyi,
setboubü Jeshaia jungto, haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong anthüknyi,
güboubü Mattania jungto, haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong anthüknyi,
anboubü Shimei jungto, haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong anthüknyi,
anthükche boubü Azarel jungto, haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong anthüknyi,
anthüknyi boubü Hashabia jungto, haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong anthüknyi,
anthüksem boubü Shubael jungto, haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong anthüknyi,
anthüklei boubü Mattithia jungto, haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong anthüknyi,
anthükngao boubü Jeremot jungto, haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong anthüknyi,
anthüklak boubü Hanania jungto, haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong anthüknyi,
anthüknyet boubü Joshbekasha jungto, haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong anthüknyi,
anthükset boubü Hanani jungto, haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong anthüknyi,
anthükgü boubü Malothi jungto, haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong anthüknyi,
saoche boubü Eliatha jungto, haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong anthüknyi,
saotoche boubü Hothir jungto, haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong anthüknyi,
saotonyi boubü Gidalti jungto, haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong anthüknyi,
saotosem boubü Mahaziot jungto, haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong anthüknyi,
saotolei boubü Romamtiezer jungto, haoeibü shousi shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong anthüknyi.
Bakhün lombü shuong janbü hai: Korabü ka Asafeibü shousi shuong yo ka Koraeibü shou Meshelmia.
Meshilmiaeibü shousi shuong: shaangbou Zekharia nyiboubü kho Jediael, semboubü kho Zebadia, leiboubü kho Jethniel,
ngaoboubü kho Elam, lakboubü Jehohanan, nyetboubü Elieoenai.
Hobaje Obededomeibü shousi shuong kikei: Shaang bukbü Shemaia, nyiboubü Jehozabad, semboubü Joa, leiboubü Sakar, ngaoboubü Nathaniel,
lakboubü Ammiel, nyetboubü Issakhar, setboubü Peullethai; aieilausi Mühghaüei hao haükukei.
Tokei haoeibü shou Shemaia la shousi shuong bukkukei, aoyou boueibü chemdang shuonga songdakbü shuong kikei, aieilausi haoen to thükbü jongsak yaang kikei.
Shemaiaeibü shousi shuong: Othni, Refael, Obed hoba Elzabad, aoyou jaisinasi shuong thükbüminbü mütshuong kikei. Elihu hoba Semakia.
Habü pendou Obededomeibü shousi shuong, haoeneibü shousi shuong hoba jaisinasi shuong kümsilei shanga minbüngebü Obededom ka saosemto nyi.
Meshelemiaei shousi shuong hoba jaisinasi shuong kikei. Shetenbü müt anthükset kikei.
Hobaje Merarieibü shousi shuong yoka Hosaeibü shousi shuong kikei, konglebou Shemri (aieilausi hao shangabü shou ayingsi dogokei bouei hao konglebou yeitikei),
nyiboubü Hilkia, semboubü Tebalia, leiboubü Zekharia: haoeibü shou hoba jaisina pendouei anthüksem.
Habü ho bakhün lombü shuong janyinbü, hoba haoen kongnyu mütshuongei kümlabü kümsilei shuong, khei haoeneibü jaisinasi shuongei kümbü tegü
Hobaje haoeneibü boueibü shisi hanbü yangbü, jeteitei, bakhün weko shanga phaang pakkei.
Chaangbou shanga phaang Shemaia to shatkei. Haoenei tokei haoeneibü shou Zekharia maangli maangsang songsido maibü kubou che shanga phaang pakkei, hoba haoeibü phejan chanep phei shanga longkei.
Chaangbou phei shanga Obededom longkei, hoba haoeibü shousi shuong la thanshang chem janletkukei.
Shupim si Hosa chanep shanga longkei, Shaleket bakhüna lamnyu angshanga lombouei lombü to ditshuokyoko kikei.
Chaangbou aenei chalou angboua lakbang chanep pheia chalou angboua leibang chaangbou pheia chalou angboua leibang hoba thanshang chemakei nyibang kikei.
Chanep aenei Parbar shanga lama lei, hoba Parbara nyi.
Habü ho Korabü hoba Merarieibü shousi yoa bakhün lombü shuong janyinbü kikei.
Hobaje Levibü ka, Ahijaei Mühghaüeibü chem thanshang hoba khümbo kubü peisilei shuong thüka ikjai kikei.
Ladaneibü shousi shuong: Gershonbü Ladaneibü shousi shuong, Gershonbü Ladaneibü boueibü shisi shuong: Jehieli.
Jehielieibü shousi shuong: Zetham hoba haoeibü na Joel,
Amrambü, Izharbü, Hebronbü, hoba Uzzielbü.
Hobaje Mosaeibü shou Gershomeibü shou Shebuel thanshanga ikjaibü kongnyubou kikei.
Haoeibü jaisinasi shuong: Eliezer ka haoeibü shou Rehabia, hao shou Jeshaia, hao shou Joram, hao shou Zikri hoba hao shou Shelomoth.

Ho Shelomoth hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong kho khümbo kubü jongsak shuong laobou Dawid Chobaei hoba boueibü shousi shuongei hoba hajar si saongao thüka leiyeibü shuong, sepai tan leiyeibü shuong khümbo kubü thanshang pendou thüka ik jaiko kikei.
Wapyoa soletbü ka haoenei
Tokei ungshedbou Samuelei, Kisheibü shou Saulei, Nereibü shou Abnerei hoba Zeruiaeibü shou Joabei khümbo kubü peisilei pendou Shelomet hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuongei chühkei.
Izharbü ka Kanania hoba haoeibü shousi shuongje Israelbü lubü kümsilei shanga leiyeibü shuong hoba matjembü shuong pienkei.
Hebronbü ka, Hashabia hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong hajar cheto saongao nyet lanthükbü mütshuong kho Jordan chanep ae
Hebronbü ka Jerija kho Hebronbü boueibü shisi thensilen ka kongnyubou kikei. Dawidei songdakbü po saonyi boubüa lamyosi haoen yoa hau yaangbü thükbüminbü mütshuong Gileada Jazer hapbei.

Hobaje haoeibü jaisinasi shuong hauki yaangkibü mütshuong hajar nyito saongao nyet boueibü shisi kongnyu shuong kho Dawidei haoen Reubenbü si Gadbü hoba Manasse phang jamde thüka Mühghaü shanga hoba Chobaeibü kümsilei shanga bunyu yeitikei.
Tou Israelbü shousi shuong haoeneibü lühbak bou khushen shuong hoba hajar hoba saongao thüka lajamleibü shuong, lit weko po sünga janbüa loubü si satbü jannyinbü wekoa hajar saoto lei kikei.
Shaangbou lita shaangbou jannyinbü thüka Zabdieleibü shou Jashobeam bunyu kikei; haoeibü janbü hajar saotolei kikei.
Hao Perez ka pakbü hoba shaangbou lit shanga sepai tan pendou thüka lajamleibou kongnyubou kikei.
Nyibou lita Ahobü Dodai jannyinbü thük khünei bunyu kikei, haoeibüa hajar saoto lei kikei, kho jiha Mukloth hao thenkabü leibou kikei.
Semboubü lajamleibou semboubü lit shanga Jehoiada ungshedbüeibü shou Benaia kongnyubou kikei; haoeibü janbüa hajar saoto lei kikei.
Ho Benaia ho khujin yoa lakjaibou che hoba khujin thüka leiyeibou; haoeibü shou Ammizabad haoeibü janbüa bunyu kikei.
Leiboubü lajamleibou Joabeibü na Asahel kikei, leiboubü lit shanga hoba haoeibü shou Zebadia hao phainei kikei; haoeibü janbü hajar saoto lei kikei.
Lit ngaoboubü shanga ngaoboubü lajamleibou kho Izrabü Shamhut kikei; haoeibü janbüa hajar saoto lei kikei.
Lakboubü lit shanga lakboubü lajamleibou kho Ira kikei. Tekoabü Ikkeseibü shou, haoeibü janbüa hajar saoto lei kikei.
Lit nyetboubü shanga nyetboubü lajamleibou kho Pelonbü Helez, Efraimeibü shousi shuong; haoeibü jannyinbüa hajar saotolei kikei.
Setboubü lit shanga setboubü lajamleibou kho Zera ka Hushatbü Shibbekai haoeibü janbüa hajar saoto lei kikei.
Lit güboubü shanga güboubü kho Benjamin ka Anathotbü Abiezer, haoeibü janbüa hajar saoto lei kikei.
Anboubü lit shanga anboubü kho Zera ka Netofatbü Maharai, haoeibü janbüa hajar saoto lei kikei.
Anthük cheboubü lit shanga anthük cheboubü Efraimeibü shousi shuong ka Pirathonbü Benaia, haoeibü janbüa hajar saoto lei kikei.
Anthük nyiboubü lit shanga anthüknyiboubü Othniel ka Netofatbü Heldai, haoeibü janbüa hajar saotolei kikei
Israelbü phang shuong thüka Reubenbü shanga Zikrieibü shou yoka Eliezer kongnyubou kikei; Simeonbü shanga Maakaeibü shou Shefatia;
Levibü shanga Kemueleibú shou Hashabia, Aron shanga Zadok
Jihuda shanga Elihu Dawideibü jaisina yoka Issakar shanga Mikaeleibü shou Omri:
Zebulun shanga Obadiaeibü shou Ishmaia; Naftali shanga Azrieleibü shou Jeremot:
Efraimbü shanga Azaziaeibü shou Hoshea, Manasse phang jamde shanga Pedaiaeibü shou Joel.
Gileada Manasse phang jamde shanga Zekhariaeibü shou Iddo; Benjamin shanga Abnereibü shou Jaasiel.
Dan shanga Jerohameibü shou Azarel, habü ho Israelbü phang leiyeibü shuong kikei.
Po, saoche phangaeje Da- widei awe, aieilausi müha khanshoulitshou lajuche ki, khüjoche kho Israelbü yeitila
Zeruiaeibü shou Joabei wean chühla khangkei, lausikei awanti; hoba kho phaiaje Israelbü thük to kho shanga maangshat loukei, hoba lühbak kho Dawid Chobaeibü lüngbüdobüa ado.
Chobaeibü thanshang thüka Adieleibü shou Azmavel kikei; hoba khongthua thanshang, sangnyu shuonga hoba sanga hoba lapheishon maanga Uzzieleibü shou Jonathan kikei.
Hobaje kao shapbo sekmoubü shuong thüka Kelubeibü shou Ezri kikei;
Hobaje semlüh laak thüka Ramatbü Shimei kikei; hoba semlüh laak ka longbü semlüh dei phoshang thüka Shifmibü Zabdi.
Shefelaa oliv si bhuklong shuong thüka Gederbü Baalhanan hoba onang thanshang thüka Joas.
Sharona lamshaushang sanlon shuong thüka Sharonbü Shitrai; yomanga sanlon tan thüka Adlaieibü shou Shafat.
Ut thüka Ishmaelbü Obil, hoba gadu nyunyu shuong shanga Meronotbü Jehdeia, Masu tan tan shanga Hagribü Jaziz.
Habü pendou Dawid Chobaeibü nyaksinam thüka ikjaibü shuong kikei.
Dawideibü bou nashoubou Jonathan ditenbü müt che hoba dobou che, songsido maibü kubou che kikei. Hao hoba Hakmonieibü shou Jehielei Chobaeibü shousi shuong to chühkei.
Choba la songsido maibü kubü kho Ahithofel kikei, hoba Arkitbü Hushai Chobaeibü thangbou kikei.
Ahithofel kho Benaiaeibü shou Jehoiadaei jeikei, hoba Abiathar Chobaeibü sepai tan thüka Joab kho laakjaibou kikei.

Jerusalema Israelbü leiyeibü pendou phang shuong lei- yeibü, Choba khangenbü jannyinbü leiyeibü shuong hajar thüka lajamleibou, saongao thüka leibou Choba hoba haoeibü shousi shuong nyaksinam hoba samkeisamuk tan thüka ikjaibü shuong Chobaeibü chema leiyeibü shu- ong, laakjaibü mütshuong, hoba shetenbü laakbü hongbü shuong Dawidei liko yoshaitikei.
Kheijinei Dawid Chobaei meimeian lokei hoba laukei, “Kü to ditshi, ngeibü jaisinasi shuong hoba ngeibü mütli shuong. Ngei ngeibü maangpona
Lausikei Mühghaüei kü to laukei, nyi ngeibü nyen shanga chem che adanglabü; aishanga no wapyobü müt hoba nyi sii phina.
Khei yingsikei
Hobaje ngeibü shousi pendou yoa (aishanga
Haoei kü to laukei, “Ngeibü chem hoba ngeibü matjemshang chem danglabü kho kaibü shou Solomon yinglabü, aishanga ngei hao kü shou yingla piena: hoba ngo haobou yeilabü.
Haoei ngeibü ngühkhüm deikhüm shu- ong hoba songa kibü ngühkhüm shuong athakko tat tegü jungeiko kialonga ngei haoeibü sangle ponpen shanga yaükulabü
“Tou khei yingsije,
Hobaje no, küshou Solomon, kaboueibü Mühghaü ngeashi, hoba maangpon khümboei hoba maangnyu angko hao khangenashi; aieilausi
Tou maang sangashi, aieilausi saoposhang shanga chem che dangla

Kheijinei Dawidei hao shou Solomon la lembü chem sanbütakbü hoba khoeibü chem shuong thanshang chem shuong, khoeibü thükkabou shemjang shuong hoba khoeibü maangkabou shemjang hoba onoubü setshang shanga shemjang noksa kukei.
Hobaje
Ungshedbou shuong hoba Levibü shuong jannyinbü shuong shanga, hoba
kümsilei weko shanga honeibü chaksiam pendou shanga hon seret yaübü kümsilei weko shanga chandinam shikchak nyakchak,
honeibü wanthung denshang wekoa kümsileia wanthung denshang weko shanga khambü thüng.
Mühghaü thedanga phobü wentek shanga khümsok weko hon seret haubü, seret yaübü chandinam khümsok shanga chandinam,

hoba pheyaüjin shiklak nyaklak shanga honlanbü, phauyaang shuong, hoba thung shuong, honeibü phayaang shanga hoba kho weko takbü; chandinam phayaang hoba kho weko takbü, chandinam phau hoba khoeibü takbü weko.
Saoposhang honei kümbü jen lemshang shanga hoba khoeibü takbü, tokei
Ho pendou
Kheijinei Dawidei hao shou Solomon to laukei, “Hau kiashi hoba maang kaangashi, hoba kho kümashi. Tehüt, maang apbo teki, aishanga

Hobaje chühashi, Mühghaüeibü chema kümsilei pendou shanga ungshedbou shuong hoba Levi shuong jannyinbü kia, hoba ka yoa kümsilei pendoua maangangbü mütpem weko ao kümsilei at shanga shetenbü ki hao yoan kilabü; tokei leiyeibü shuong hoba müt pendou lepde kaibü sakkubü phanga kia.”

Hobaje Dawid Chobaei thangyenbü pendou to laukei, “Küshou Solomon, ao Mühghaüei jembüei ong pienan ki, hao heshou hoba songsido alibü hoba kumsilei kho yaangbü; aieilausi Chobaeibü chem kho müt shanga aying lausikei

Hibü ngeibü Mühghaü chem shanga ngei thükbü sühkoje ngei yoshaikua; honeibü peisilei shanga hon, chandinam peisilei shanga chandinam, chinam shanga chinam, namkung peisilei shanga namkung, bueibü peisilei shanga bu kho to liman oniks hoba denshang laang shuong son den den, namsek laang den pendou hoba ninulaang.
Tokei saopobü pendou to limbo ngei ngeibü hon si chandinam thanshang kia hoba ngeibü Mühghaü chem shanga ngeibü maangpon khümbo kubüei ngei kho ngeibü Mühghaüeibü chem la kuda.
Hon seret khujin bang atbü hajar sem, ofir hon hoba chandinam lanbü seret khujin bang atbü hajar nyet, chemeibü kümthanga jonla shanga,
hoba kümsilei hangsilam hapbü shu- ongei kümlabü kümsilei pendou shanga hon peisilei shanga hon, chandinam peisilei shanga chandinam. Khülonga aoei maangnyu angko jembü lulu tat
Kheijinei chung leiyeibü shuongei haoeneibü maangangbü lembü kukei; chung leiyeibü shuongei hajar thüka hoba saongao thüka khuleibü shuong, hoba Chobaeibü kümsilei thüka lamleibü shuong.

Mühghaüeibü chema kümsilei shanga haoenei seret khujin bang atbü hajar ngao hoba honeibü nam hajar an seret khujin bang atbü chandinam hajar an, seret khujin atbü chinam hajar anthük set hoba seret khujin bang atbü namkung hajar saongao.
Hobaje aoyouei namseklaang shuong kikei,
Kheijinei mütshuong olinyokei, aieilausi khübü maanglansele kukei, aishanga maangpon khümboei maangnyu angko
Hibü khoei thangyenbü pendou thedanga Dawidei
O
Keisiyaang hoba hangenbü ka ka louda, hoba nyi pendou thüka songdakda. Kaibü ika sei hoba hau kia, hoba yaangentila hoba pendou la hau kula kaibü ika kia.
Hobaje tou künei ka nyen sangda, küneibü Mühghaü, hoba kaibü soneikangbü nyen sangda.
“Lausikei hai maanglansele künei lemenlabü lele ngokei ao hoba ngeibü mütlikei ailaibü ma? Aishanga peisilei pendou ka ka louda, hoba kaibü ong künei ka la kua.
Aishanga küneibü pisibou pendou tegü, kün ka thedanga yenbou shuong ki. Kaodaka küneibü salang mangshoubü che ong hoba aikei maanglem aki.
O

Ngei ngekei, ngeibü Mühghaü, khei nyi maangpon takteida, hoba tangshaibü maangpon to no olinda; ngeibü maangpon tangbüei habü peisilei pendou maanglansele kua, hoba hanei kibü kaibü mütli shuongei maangnyu angko hoba olinangko ka la kubü ngei hapa.
O
Kü shou Solomon la kaibü sakkubü shuong, kaibü aukabü shuong hoba kaibü sakkubü ngühkhüm pendou jungeiko khei ngei lamlean phokubüei haoei Chobaeibü chem kho dangla penbüsoubü maangpon kushima.”
Kheijinei Dawidei thang- yenbü pendou to laukei, “Kanei Mühghaü
Hobaje haoenei
Hobaje khünyet chalou haoenei
Kheijinei Solomon haoeibü bou Dawid jeiko
Leiyeibü pendou hoba hau yaangbü mütshuong hoba tokei Dawideibü shousi pendouei Solomon Choba to haoeibü buleng phanga kila thekukei.
Hobaje
Kho tegü Jesseeibü shou Dawidei Israelbü pendou thüka songdakkei.
Haoei Israelbü thüka po saonyi songdakkei, Hebrona haoei po nyet songdakkei, hoba Jerusalema po khujinto sem songdakkei.
Kheijinei hao aeibou baushi sinan salangko kian nyaksinam hoba nyensang nyenhang hapan haikei, hoba hao shou Solomonei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Tou Dawid Chobaeibü kümsilei shuong shaangbü si phaibü to chühashi; chühenbou Samuel ngühli hoba thuseibou Nathan ngühli, hoba chühenbou Gad ngühlia doakei;
haoei songdakbü pendou shangabü hoba haoeibü hau, hoba hao thüka hoba Israel thüka, hoba kaodak sangle pendou thüka haüthükbü khübü kho doan ki.
Dawid Chobaeibü shou Solomonei haoeibü sangle hau kingaikei hoba
Hobaje Israelbü pendou to hajar thükkabü hoba saongao thükkabü lajamleibou to, matjembü shuong hoba Israelbü pendoua leiyeibü pendou, püshi shuong hoba jaishou shuong to Solomonei joyokei.
Hobaje Solomon hoba hao yoa tan pendou, Gibeona lemshang shongh to haukei; aieilausi Mühghaüeibü kamshang neichem laobou
(Lausikei Mühghaü Saopobü Busen Kiriath-Jearim ka Dawidei kho shanga lamlekuan kishang to jungan angan kikei, aishanga Jerusalema ho shanga haoei neichem dangko kikei.)
Lausikei Hureibü shou, Urieibü shou, Bezalelei chinam lemshanga kümbo kibü kho, Gibeona
Hobaje Solomon
Khüyou Solomon jungto
Solomonei Mühghaü to laukei, “Nyi kübou Dawid la onou yaang lena hoba ngokei hao jeiko Choba yeitia;
O
Ho mütli thedanga ngo longko atko lela songsihon hoba hapbüngebü songsido tou kü la labüma, aieilausi aoei kaibü mütli hajuche ho thüka song dakenla?”

Mühghaüei Solomon to jongaikei, “Ho kaibü maangpona kisije hoba nyaksinam, kibükeibü, nyenhang, ka to mangsenbü langkei haitila ayingsi kaibü langkei shanga salang ahi, lausikei ngeibü mütli aoyou thüka ngei no Choba yeitikei, haoen thüka nyi song dakenla shanga songsihon hoba hapbüngebü ong hikei.
Songsihon hoba hapbüngebü ka la sakkua. Ngei tokei namsek peisilei, nyaksinam, hoba nyenhang, Choba shuong aoeikei ka thedanga akibü hoba ka phainei haibü ho akilabü ka la kulabü.”
Hibü Gibeona lemshang shongh ka hoba kamshang neichem ka Solomon Jerusalem to loukei, hoba haoei Israel thüka songdakkei.
Solomonei kailong hoba koli sepai liko leishaikei, haoeibü kailong hajar anthüklei kikei hoba koli sepai hajar anthüknyi kikei, haoei khübü kailong sangnyu shuonga hoba Jerusalema Choba yoa phokei.
Hobaje Chobaei chandinam hoba hon Jerusalema laang tegü apsileko yeitikei, hoba haoei cedar bulong Shefelaa bhuklong tegü juong yeitikei.
Hobaje Solomonei koli shuong Ijep hoba Kue ka sungbakei, hoba Chobaeibü namyak namseibü shuongei khübü kho Kue ka munam kuan jekbakei.

Haoenei Ijep ka kailong che chandinam shekel saongao lakei jekan sungbakei, hoba koli chenei shekel saongaoto anjinsem kukei; kho tegü haoen danko Hitbü Choba pendou hoba Siriabü Choba shuong jungto hautikei.
Tou Solomonei
Hobaje onat künla hajar anjinlei hoba shongh kaodak ka laang jakla hajar saolei, hoba haoen thüka chühla hajar semto saongao lak Solomonei janletkukei.
Hobaje Solomonei Taireibü Choba Hiram jungto ngühlang hautiko laukei, “Nyi kübou Dawid to jungeibü hoba hao lolo kishang chem che dangla cedar bu hao la kutibü tegü, kho tegü kümbüma.

Chühashi, Israel shanga ponpen jungeila sakkubü tegü hao thedanga ponlem teibü jen jikla shanga hoba Mühghaü thedanga phobü wentek athakko lemla, hoba ngeyang si chasem juokbü lembü shanga, Nounyet shuong hoba lit haanbü shuong hoba
Ngei dangla kibü chem kho yaangbü kilabü, aishanga küneibü Mühghaü, mühghaü pendou tokei yaangbou ki.
Lausikei müh, khei thükkabou müheikei hao takan chühla athüksije, aoei hao la chem che dangkula thükla? Hao thedanga juokbü lembü kulabü to limbo hao shanga chem che dangkulabü ngokei aoma lo?

Hibü tou hon, chandinam, chinam hoba namkung hoba nakthüngan sakbü si laü mühson, leiphe kheibü kümda, tokei noksa küman jinla minbü Jihuda hoba Jerusalema kü yoa kila ngebü aoyou kübou Dawidei phoan ki haoen yoa kila shetenbü müt che kü jungto hautishi.
Tokei kü la Lebanon ka cedar bu, fir bu si algum bu kutishi, aieilausi Lebanona kaibü sambü shuongei wa maian latda dogo ngei ngea. Hobaje chühashi, ngeibü sambü shuong kaibü sambü shuong yoa kilabü.
Khei kü shanga wa juong lamlelabü longlabü aieilausi ngei dangla kibü chem kho yaang hoba maangpanglabü kilabü.
Hobaje chühashi, kaibü khangenbü bu akbü shuong la ngei whet shausiyung takbü hajar saoche, barli youshou takbü hajar saoche, ih shongmok hajar saoche hoba onang shongmok hajar saoche kulabü.”
Kheijinei Tairbü Choba Hiramei le chenei hai jongaiko Solomon jungto hautikei, “
Hiramei tokei laukei, “Israelbü
Hobaje ngei tou minbü ngebü müt diten shuokenbüei shenbü Huram hautida.

Daneibü yaksa shou yoa yaksa cheeibü shou hautia, hoba bou kho Tairbü müt, hon, chandinam, chisak nam namkung, laang, bu, hoba nakthüngan sakbü, mühson, hoba siieibü son, leiphe hoba phemba neisimei, hoba noksa jinshang kümsilei phang pendou kümla hoba hao la kümla kubü phang pendou kümla thükbü kaibü kümsileia libünyenbü mütshuong yoa ngeibü
Hibü tou khei yingsije whet si barli youshou onang hoba ih laobou shanga ngeibü bunyuei joyoa kho haoei khangenbü shuong jungto nahautikua.
Hobaje lajuche khamda Lebanon ka künei bu aklabü, hoba kho longei yungnyua Jopa to sungbalabü, khüka nyi kho Jerusalem to künan anglabü.”
Kheijinei Solomonei haobou Dawidei shaangla webü tegü, Israel kaoa kibü yungkük yungthang yen pendou wean chühsi hajar saongaoto anjinsemto sem hoba saongao lak yingan kikei.
Haoen hajar anjinlei la onat künla kukei, hajar saolei shongh kaodaka laang jakla hoba mütshuong kümsilei kümtila leiyeibü hajar semto saongao lak.
Kheijinei Dawidei pienkubü Jebus hoba Araunaeibü amshanga Solomonei haobou Dawid jungto
Haoei songdakbü po lei boubü lit nyi boubü chalou nyibou nyet haoei dangla khangkei.
Mühghaüeibü chem dangla shanga habü ho Solomoneibü takbüsanbü ki. Tousüng shangied takbü iknop saosem hoba photak iknop saoche.
Hobaje chemkoudei chemsophang kho süng aenei khaang hima iknop saoche hoba khoeibü khusung kho iknop saongaoto saoche, maang aenei haoei hon lanbüei naanglepan dangkei.
Hobaje chem yaangbou kho haoei fir buei lin küman dangkei, laobou haoei hon lansanei naanglepan dangkei hoba kho thüka ekyang hoba chikhap kümbei.
He maitila shanga haoei chem kho namseklaangei jantikei, hoba hon kho Parvaim hon kikei.
Haoei tokei chem kho pangkhüm sangchimang khoeibü toulang shuong, hoba khoeibü koukap shuong honei naanglepan dangkei hoba kümthang shuonga kaakyembü kherabim kümbei.
Hobaje haoei pendou to saopobou chem dangkei, hoba kho tousüng kho chem khaang hima iknop saoche kümbei, hoba haoei kho honeibü leiphe seret khujin bang atbü saongao lak sühkoei naanglepan kümbei.
Hobaje kojal takbü kho hon shekel anjinsem kikei. Hobaje haoei shemjang thükkabou kho hon jinan kümbü kikei.
Hobaje saopobou chem khonei haoei kaakyembü kherabim noksa penyi kümbei; hoba haoei khübü kho hon jinan kümbei.

Hobaje kaakyembü kherabim kaak shuong kho iknop saoche loubü kikei, kherab cheeibü kaak kho iknop ngao chemeibü kümthang sühko kikei, hoba kaak che khokei iknop ngao kherab che khoeibü kaak sühko kikei.
Hobaje kherab cheeibü kaak kho iknop ngao chem kümthang kho sühko hoba lubü kaak khokei iknop ngao lubü lembüchem to meiouko kikei.
Khübü kaak- yembü kherabim kaak shuong kho haoen lolo iknop saoche pinan kikei, hoba haoen lulueibü youei lokei hoba haoeneibü thenyek chemnyu ae yeian kikei.
Hobaje haoei thangtet nei kho nakthüngbü laü hoba siieibü laü hoba inyaibü hoba kho thüka kaakyembü kherabim kümbei.
Tokei haoei chemeibü koudeia thaonyu penyi iknop khujinto ngao suokan kümbei, hoba thükaenei jinshang kümbü kho che chenei iknop ngao bang.
Hobaje thaonyu sembung khünei haoei nameibü chisük yak tegü yakkukei, hoba haoei chilang chipen saongao kümbei, hoba khübü kho chisüka yotikei.
Hobaje haoei thaonyu kho lembüchemeibü khong koudeia phokei, che maeaenei hoba che nanae aenei; hoba mae aenei kibü khola nyen Jakhin hoba nanaenei kibou la nyen kho Boaz nyenkukei.
Haoei chisaknameibü lemshon che kümbei, tousüng iknop saoche, hoba khaang iknop sao- che hoba iknop an suokbü.
Tokei haoei deidang che yaüenkei, kho jithon ka jithon sühko iknop an hoba suokla iknop ngao kommanga iknop khujin.
Kho phanga jephot phatko noksa kikei, kho deidang kailepbo iknop an kikei. Jephot phatbü noksa kho lin nyia thenyoan küman kikei.

Kho masu pongsu anthüknyi thüka lokei, pensemei yungthang ae yeian, hoba pensemei chanep ae yeian hoba pensemei yungkük ae yeian hoba pensemei chaangbou ae yeian; hoba deidang kho hao thüka thükaenei hoba deidang kho haoen thüka thükaenei tenan thüka hoba haoeneibü phai ae je maanga kikei.
