Hobaje kho shangbü ikmaang tetje kikei; hoba khoeibü sembung kho thungsembung phatko küman kikei, leilangkhüpbung chipen phatko; khonei dei liter hajar saosem shimbo kikei.

Haoei tokei deidang phau an kümbei, hoba ngao mae ika hoba ngao nanaenei khünei sakla shanga phokei; juokbü lembü shanga peisilei shuong haoenei khünei sakkei, lausikei deidang khoje ungshedbou shuong sakla shanga kikei.
Hobaje sakkubü tegü haoei honei wanthung denshang an kümbei, hoba haoei khübü kho lembü chema phokei, ngao maenei hoba ngao nanaenei.
Haoei tokei khümsok an kümbei hoba khübü kho lembüchema phokei, ngao maenei, ngao nanae aenei. Hobaje haoei honeibü phauyaang saongao kümbei.
Tokei haoei ungshedbou shuong shanga chemso yaangbü kho hoba chemso shanga koukap shuong chisaknamei kümbei.
Hobaje haoei deidang chaangbou aenei chemeibü napheinei phokei.
Hobaje Huramei chak shuong kho hoba suokjin hoba phauyaang shuong kho kümbei. Hibü Mühghaüeibü chema Solomon Choba shanga haoei kümbü kümsilei kho kümkhümbei;
thaonyu penyi kho hoba phauyaang shuong, hoba thaonyu sembunga kibü noksa penyi kho hoba thaonyu sembunga noksa jinbü küplepla wouyobü nyi;
hoba wouyobü penyi shangabü kho chilang hek saongao lei, wouyobü wekoa chilang hek lin nyibang thaonyu sembunga kibü thaonyu sembung noksa phauyaang penyi kho küplepla shanga.
Haoei tokei denshang kümbei hoba denshang thüka sakshang phau- yang shuong kümbei;
deidang che hoba kho phanga masu pongsu anthüknyi.
Hobaje tokei chak shuong hoba suokjin hoba Solomon shanga hoba
Jordan yomanga Chobaei khübü kho Sukot si Zerada kanglanga shungkung kao ongan kümbei.
Solomonei khübü peisilei juong kümbei, hibü chisaknam takbü khoje alamenen.
Hibü
Wanthung hoba songle ngühkhüm tegütham lembüchem maangkabou thedanga juoklabü hon lanbüei kümbü hantin shuong;
chipen shuong, wanthung shuong, hoba wan shangabü kipshuong,

phauyaang shuong, jen shanga phau shuong, wansuokjin hon lanbüei, hoba lembüchem shanga yukleplabü shuong saopobou shemjang to atshang maangkabou koukap shuong shanga hoba lembüchem koukap shuong shanga honei kümbei.
Ladang Solomonei
Hobaje Dawid sangnyu laobou Zion ki, khoka
Hobaje Israelbü pendou nyetboubü lema Choba thedanga kamshaikei.
Ladang Israelbü jaishou shuong pendou loukei, kheijinei Levi shuongei Saopobü Busen kho sungbakei.
Hobaje neichema kibü Saopobü Busen kamshang neichem, hoba saopobü chaksiam pendou haoenei jungan angkei, hoba khübü kho Levi ungshedbou shuongei jungan angkei.
Hobaje Solomon Choba hoba hao jungto yoshaibü Israelbü danei Saopobü Busen thedanga sanlon hoba masu pongsu lembü juong aweenko haitian lembü kukei.
Hibü ungshedbou shuongei
Aishanga kaakyembü kherabimei haoeneibü kaak shuong kho Saopobü Busen kishang thükae pinan Saopobü Busen hoba khoeibü kaang küplepbei.
Hobaje kaang shuong kho yongko louan kisije kaang thonbü ae khoje lembüchem maangkabou thedang Saoposhang ka hapbo kikei, lausikei khübü kho khong ka hapla athük, hoba tat sühko khübü kho khünei kia.
Laangdak penyi laobou Mosaei Horeba phokei khoto limbo Saopobü Busen khonei ai akitei; khünei
Ladang ungshedbou shuong Saoposhang ka longkei, (aieilausi yoan kibü ungshedbou pendou haoen lolo saüenan kikei, hoba haoen janyinbü akitei;

tokei Levi shuong aoyou chia laubü shuong kikei, haoen pendou khei Asaf, Heman, Jeduthun hoba haoeneibü shousi shuong hoba haoeneibü jaisinasi shuong neisimei maibü lean pithung kongkin jungan lemshang chaangbou thon thona lokei hoba haoen yoa ungshedbou saongaoto saoche teklaang metko kikei.)
Ladang teklaang metbü shuong hoba chia laubü shuong
Hibü sangmei kibü khoei ungshedbou shuongei khangenla athüken; aieilausi
Kheijinei Solomonei laukei, “
Lausikei ngei ka la phetphan chem che hoba no ponpen kila kishang che dangkua.”
Hobaje Chobaei haoeibü thenyek sepeikei, hoba Israelbü shuong pendou haükukei; hoba Israelbü shuong pendou lokei.
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Israel Mühghaü

‘Ijep kaodak ka ngeibü mütli leian longbü chalou ka chem che dangla shanga Israel mütli pendoua khei khünei ngeibü nyen kila ngei sangnyu ai apien, ayingsi ngeibü mütli Israel leiyeibü lela müt aokei apien;
lausikei ngeibü nyen kitila Jerusalem piena.’ ”
Tokei Solomonei laukei, “Tou Israel Mühghaü,
Lausikei
khei yingasi dogokei nyi chem kho adanglabü; lausikei kaibü phe ka longla kibou kaibü shouei ngeibü nyen shanga chem kho danglabü.’ ”
Hobaje
Hobaje khünei
Hobaje hao

(aieilausi Solomonei shon che, tousüng iknop ngao, khaang iknop ngao hoba suokla iknop sem shekei, hoba kho chemso phanga phokei, hoba khünei hao lokei. Kheijinei Israelbü kaman kibü pendou thedanga haoei youkükei thungan khüpetkei, hoba haoeibü ik müh aeto shingkei)
hoba haoei laukei, “O
nyi no khangenbou kübou Dawid to ai thekukei kho kümbei, haü, nyi kaibü sembungei joyokei hoba tat kaibü ikei kho haüthüktida.
Tou khei yingsije, O
Tou khei yingsije, O
“Lausikei maimaitham khei kaodaka müt yoa Mühghaü kilep sai? Chühashi, müh hoba müh suokbüeikei no aphamda, kholonga ngei dangbü chem hoje lai hanbü che ong!
Khei yingasikei O
khei ho chem aeto change nangnak nyi kaibü nyen lanei pholabü dogo laukei khito kaibü nyek ipshima; khünei kho kishang aenei no khangenbouei welaubü ditla nyi thüklabü.
Hobaje no khangenbou hoba kaibü mütli Israelei ho kishang aenei ladang welaulaje haoen to ditshima, haü, nyi no kishang, khei khuthük ka ditshima; hoba ladang nyi ditlaje shedbü apbushima.
“Müt cheei chemlepbou danthetko shabü shonalonga, hoba hao to nyen phongko theyolanyotilabü lele hao thüka hiayoua longa, hoba ho chem kaibü lemshang thedang to hao longan theyolanyoa longa,
kheijinei shedboueibü kümsilei kho hao jembü khu to ngaiko hoba matmaibou kho khümenan haoeibü saopobü thüng hao la pailetbü kuko, nyi khuthük ka ditshi, hoba kümashi hoba no khangenbou mat jemashi.
“Kaibü mütli Israelei ka khu limbo shedshonbü haangjung haoen dangbou thedanga athük hapalonga, ladang haoenei nyibou sulajalaje, hoba kaibü nyen sungletlaje, hoba ho chema welaulaje hoba sulajalaje,
kheijinei nyi khuthük ka ditshi, hoba kaibü mütli Israelbü shedbü apbushima, hoba nyi haoen la haoeneibü pisibou la kubü kaodak to haoen leian kaima.
“Ladang haoenei kakhu limbo shabü shonbü haangjung müh khinan lang aloulaje haoenei ho kishang ae welaualonga hoba kaibü nyen sungletalonga, hoba nyi khon kutibü ka haoen sepeialonga,
ladang nyi lamnyu maibü laoboua haoen paijan kho haoen to nyi lenlaje kheijinei nyi khuthük ka ditshima, hoba no khangenbü shuong kaibü mütli Israelbü shedbü apbushima.

“Kaonyeka mühsinou kisi, limsilang yeilim, kesiong lim, koksüng lim, ayingsi yanglim kisi, haoeneibü sangnyu ata haoeneibü dangbou shuongei komlepa longa; ai shieikoe ayingsi ai shatsinyat ong kilaje,
mütpem weko jembü khonsak khonku, hoba lulueibü maangshat ngeko ho chem aeto lulueibü ik shingan ai welau hoba subüjabü müt atei ayingsi ka mütli Israelbü pendouei hautilaje,

kheijinei nyi no kishang khuthük ka ditshi hoba shedbü apbushi, hoba mütpem weko aoeibü maangpon nyi ngean ki, hao la jembü lamnyu thüng kushima (aieilausi nyi khei nyi ong khunak shousieibü maangpon ngekei).
Khünei haoenei nyi küneibü pisibou la kubü kaodaka lalokche kilaje, haoenei kaibü lamnyua paiko ka to soumo hatlabü.

“Kho tegü ladang yenbou che, ao kaibü mütli Israelbü aying, ladang haoei kaodak saabü ka kaibü nyen yaangbü hoba kaibü ik hau yaangbü hoba kaibü phem shingan kibü nyen shanga loulaje; ladang haoen loulaje hoba ho chem aeto welaulaje;

kheijinei nyi khuthük kaibü kishang ka ditshi, hoba yenbou khoei ka to ai shanga ngalaje kho thüng kümshi; khünei kaodakbü pendouei kaibü nyen ngelabü, hoba ka to soumo hatlabü, hoba kaibü mütli Israelei ngebü tegü ngei kümbü chem ho kaibü nyenei ngada dogo haoenei ngelabü.

“Kaibü mütli haoeneibü dangbou shuong khulimbo lason to hausi, laobou lamnyu to nyi haoen hautilaje, hoba ho sangnyu laobou nyi pienkei, hoba chem laobou ka nyen shanga ngei dangkei, haoenei ka jungto hi ae welaualonga;
kheijinei haoeneibü welau hoba haoenei subüjabü nyi ngüha lekushi, hoba haoen shanga kümbushima.
“Haoenei kakhu limbo shed shonalonga (aieilausi shed ashonbü müt ao aki), hoba nyi haoen to maangpokko hoba dangbou la khümbo kuko kho shanga kaonyek saabü ayingsi nyangbü to laplangan kialonga;

khei yingsikei laobou kaoa haoen langsenan ki, haoen lolo damenalonga hoba sepeialonga hoba haoen thüngan kibü kaodak ka ka jungto subüjabü hautiko, ‘Künei shed shona, kün ayinglam to haukei hoba amaibü küma,’ dogo laualonga;

haoen thüngshang kaonyek laoboua haoen lapan ki khünei maangpon pendouei hoba haoeneibü soushou pendou ka jungto sepeialonga hoba haoeneibü kaonyek ae welaualonga, laobou nyi haoeneibü pisibou la kukei hoba sangnyu laobou nyi pienkei, hoba kaibü nyen shanga ngei dangbü chem ae welaualonga;
kheijinei haoenei welaubü hoba haoenei subüjabü nyi khuthük ka, khei no kishang ka ditshima, hoba haoen shanga janbü kümsilei senetko hoba no khulimbo shed shonbü kaibü mütli la shedbü apbushima.
“Tou, O ngeibü Mühghaü, ngei ka to sudajada, hanei welaubü to kaibü nyek ipbushi, hoba kaibü nou haangkushi.
Hobaje tou meimeiashi, O
O
Tou ladang Solomoneibü welau thonkei, khuthük ka wan louyenkei hoba juokbü lembü hoba haitibü lembü shuong kho lonshembei, kheijinei
Hobaje ungshedbou shuongei
Hobaje Israel shousi shuong pendouei wan louyenjinei chühko kikei, hoba haoen lolo haoeneibü thenyek shon thüka khüpetkei, hoba lembei, hoba
“Aishanga hao maibü ki,
aieilausi haoeibü üeisanou ponpen kida.”
Kheijinei Choba hoba müt pendouei
Hobaje Solomon Chobaei masu pongsu hajar saotonyi hoba sanlon hajar sao ngaoto saoche lembü kukei. Kho tegü Choba hoba müt pendouei Mühghaüeibü chem saüenkei.
Hobaje ungshedbou shuong haoen lulueibü kümaleia lekei. Levibü shuongei
Hobaje
Kho jih Solomonei lem kho chalou nyetnyet likei, hoba Israelbü pendou hao yoa aeibou tan yaangbü che, Hamat to haubü lamnyu ka Ijepbü shushou sühko kikei.
Hobaje setbounyet haoenei thangyen che kambei, aieilausi lemshang saüenbü chalou nyet hoba lem chalou nyet haoenei noukei.
Hobaje lit nyetboubü chalou saoto semboua haoei mütshuong kho haoeneibü neichem lambo hautikei, hoba Dawid to hoba Solomon to hoba hao mütli to
Kho tegü Solomonei
Kheijinei
Lang aloutila ngei müh khinan apalonga, ayingsi kü mütli yoa ngei shatlim hautialonga,

ngeibü mütli aoyou kü nyena ngaan ki haoen lolo semboambo laualonga hoba welaualonga hoba kü the lamalonga hoba haoeneibü lamnyu amaibü ka sepeialonga kheijinei ngei khuthük ka ditlabü hoba haoeneibü shedbü apbulabü, hoba haoeneibü kaodak maitilabü.
Tou hanei welaubü jungto ngeibü nyek hautilabü, hoba ngeibü nou haangkulabü.
Aieilausi tou ho chem, ngeibü nyen khünei ponpen kila shanga ngei pienkei hoba saüenkei; hoba ngeibü nyek hoba ngeibü maang- pon ponpen khünei kilabü.

Hobaje ka shangaje kabou Dawidei kümbü tegü nyi kü thedanga paiko laualonga, hoba ka la sakkubü tegü pendou nyi kümbo laualonga hoba ngei sakkubü ngühkhüm hoba ngeibü matjem shuong jungeikho laualonga,
kheijinei kabou Dawid to theyolanyobü Israela songdakla ka shanga müt che ongkei akikoje akilabü dogo laubü tegü ngei kaibü sangle yaüenkulabü.
Lausikei kanei sepeinyu ngaialonga, hoba ngeibü takletbü ngühkhüm hoba ngeibü sakkubü shuong laobou ngei kan thedanga phokukei, kho apyoan lubü mühghaü shuong khangenkho hoba lembho laualonga;

kheijinei ngei haoen la kubü kaodak ka li yoan pheian aplabü; hoba ho chem laobou kü nyen shanga ngei saüenko yeitikei, ngei kü the ka tekan aplabü, hoba müt pendou yoa kho ngei amaaphelabü hoba tetlatalabü che yeitilabü.
“Hobaje ho chem laobou aeibou tonenan ki kho to, ‘Aila

Hobaje haoenei jongailabü, ‘Aieilausi haoenei jembü pisibou Mühghaü, aoei haoen Ijep ka leiyenkei hao inletkei, hoba lubü mühghaü shuong to ikphen lambei hoba haoen to lembei; hibü khei yingbü khoei haoei haoen thükto khonsak ho pendou loutikei.’ ”
Po saoche thonlama laoboua Solomonei
Huramei hao la kuan kibü sangnyu shuong Solomonei kümetkei, hoba Israel mütli khünei kitikei.
Hobaje Solomon Hamath si Zoba to haukei hoba kho thükkei.
yamlamanga haoei Tadmor kümbei hoba Hamatha thanshang sangnyu shuong haoei kümbei.
Haoei tokei Beth Horon sangkhu hoba Beth Horon sangyou kümbei, kümthang, bakhün hoba thangtetlabüei sangnyu shuong lelepan phokei.

Hobaje Baalath si Solomonei dangbü thanshang pendou hoba haoeibü kailong shuong shanga sangnyu pendou koli sepai shuong shanga sangnyu shuong hoba Jerusalema hoba Lebanona, hoba haoeibü sangle pendoua ai ong Solomonei mangsühkei kho kümbei.
Hitbü, Amorbü, Perizbü hoba Hivbü hoba Jebusbü jouan kibü shuong, aoyou Israelbü aying,
haoen phainei kaonyeka apyoan kibü haoeneibü shousi shuong, aoyou Israel shousi shuongei amauti haoen ka Solomonei kayang lekei, hoba kho tegü tat sühko kia.

Lausikei Israelbü shousi shuong kaje Solomonei haoeibü kümsilei shanga sambüla ayeiti; lausikei haoen wapyobü shuong hoba haoeibü lajamleibou yoa kongnyu hoba haoeneibü kailong hoba haoeneibü koli sepai thüka songdakbü shuong kikei.
Hobaje habü ho Solomon Chobaeibü khusabü saoanto anjinsem konglebü shuongei mütshuong thüka songdakkei.
Hobaje Solomonei Faraoeibü nouyangnyu Dawid sangnyu ka haoei sao shanga dangkubü chem to leian angkei, aieilausi haoei laukei, “Ngeibü yak Israel Choba Dawideibü chema akilabü, aieilausi
Kheijinei Solomonei
Chalou angboua kümla khambü tegütham, Mosaei sakkubü tegü Nounyet, lit haanbü hoba po weko lem sem, tokai ajinbü wentek lem, bale lem, hoba lemshang neichem lem.

Haobou Dawideibü song ngühkhüm tegütham, haoeneibü kümsilei shanga ungshedbou shuong janyinbü, hoba chalou angboua kümla khambü kibü tegü Levi ungshedbou shuong thedanga nyensangla hoba khangenlabü kümsilei shanga, hoba bakhün shanga bakhün lombü shuong haoen janyinbüa pienkei, aieilausi Mühghaü müt Dawidei kho tegü sakkukei.
Hobaje ajanjan pendou shanga hoba thanbü shuong shanga Chobaei ungshedbou si Levi shuong la ai sakkukei, kho ka haoen sukjung angai.
eibü chem huongbü chalou ka kho ayei shongko, Solomoneibü kümsilei pendou kho hai yeikei. Kho tegü
Kheijinei Edom kaonyeka yungkoa Eziongeber si Elath to Solomon haukei.

Hobaje Hu- rama hao jungto hao khangenbü shuong danko jahaz shuong hoba yungnyu shanga ngebü khangenbü shuong hautikei, hoba Solomon khangenbü shuong yoa liko haoen Ofiri to haukei, hoba haka hon khujin bang atbü saongao lei to anjinsem sungbakei hoba Solomon Choba jungto kho sungbakei.

Hobaje ladang Sheba Chobasaoei Solomoneibü nyensang shangabü ditkei, phebü sekbüei Jerusalema Solomon takteila shanga shuong yaangbü leian ponlem hibü künbü ut shuong hoba hon juong hoba namseklaang künan sao loukei; hoba ladang sao Solomon jungto loukei, saoei hao to saoeibü maangpona kibü pendou lenyokei.
Hobaje Solomonei saoei phebü pendou sao la lenkei; hoba Solomon ka haoei sao la alenbü aikei huan akitei.
Hobaje ladang Sheba Chobasaoei Solomoneibü songsihon hoba haoei dangan kibü chem,
hoba haoei shaushang yungshang khümsok, hoba haoeibü sambü shuong setbü hoba haoeibü khangenbü shuong hoba haoeneibü neisimei, hoba tokei haoeibü thung jungbü shuong, hoba haoeneibü neisimei; hoba
Hobaje saoei Choba to laukei, “Kün kaodaka kaibü kümsilei shuong hoba kaibü songsihon shangabü ngei ditbü ngühlang maimaitham kikei.
Kho ngeibü nyekei ühüp shongko ngei maialem; hoba kaibü songsihon yaangbü kho kü la jamde ongkei alenko kikei; aieilausi ngei ditbü nyensang tokei no limakei.
Kaibü mütli shuong olinlabü, hoba no khangenbü habü olinlabü, aoyouei ka thedanga athakko loda, hoba kaibü songsihon ditda:
kaibü Mühghaü haübou yingshi, aoyouei
Hobaje saoei Choba la hon seret khujin bang atbü saongaoto saoche, hoba ponlem hibü hoba namseklaang kukei, hoba tokei Sheba Choba saoei Solomon Choba la ponlem hibü kubü tegü aineikei akitei.
(Hobaje tokei, Hiram khangenbü shuong hoba Solomoneibü khangenbü shuong aoyouei Ofir ka hon jungan loukei, algum bu hoba namseklaang shuong jungan loukei.
Hobaje Chobaei algum buei

Hobaje Solomon Chobaei Sheba Chobasao la saoei maikubü pendou, saoei ai ong phekei, saoei Choba jungto jungan loubü to liman kukei. Hibü sao ngaikei hoba sao hoba saoeibü khangenbü shuong saoeibü kaodak to ngaikei.
Tou po weko Solomon jungto loubü hon seret khujin bang atbü saongao lakto saosemto lak kikei;
kho namyak namseibü hoba khüm hebü ayoko kikei, hoba Arabiabü Choba pendouei hoba kaonyek kabü governor shuongei Solomon jungto hon hoba chandinam sungbakukei.
Hobaje Solomon Chobaei honei yaübü aih wekoa hon shekel saongao lak jinan kümbei.
Hobaje haoei honei yaübü aih saongao sem kümbei; aih wekoa hon shekel saongao sembang lekei; hoba Choba Lebanon yamlamang chema khübü kho phokei.
Chobaei tokei thunyu hau- hei Chobaeibü setshang yaangbü che kümbei, hoba kho hon lanbüei jonlepbei.
Chobaeibü setshang kho younak lak kikei hoba younakshang che honei kümbei, laobou Choba setshanga sapyoan kikei, hoba jijihama ik denshang hoba molosaonyu penyi ik denshang nyangko loan kikei.
Hobaje younak lak thüka khünei younak che che thon wekoa molosaonyu anthüknyi loan kikei; hoba aijihdangakei Choba sanglea kho phatko akitei.
Hobaje Solomon Chobaei yungbü thung pendou hon kikei, hoba Lebanon yamlamang chem kabü thungsiphau pendou hon lanbü kikei; Solomon haangaje chandinam kho aikei weko akitei.
Aishanga Choba kho Hirameibü khangenbü shuong yoa Tarshish to haubü longchem shuong kikei, po semboubü weko che Tarshishbü longchem shuong hon, chandinam, thunyu hauh, meisu, hoba püngau sungbakei.
Hibü nyakanama, songahona Solomon Choba kaodak Choba pendou to thükkabou kikei.
Hobaje kaodakbü Choba pendou Solomon jungto haoeibü maang- pona Mühghaüei jinkubü songsihon ditan chühla lamjung loukei.
Hobaje haoen mütpem wekoei jembü jongsak chandinam thung, phau, hon thung, neisimei, insia- ubu, ponlem hibü, koli hoba gadu po weko khüjobang sungbakei.
Hobaje koli si kailong shuong shanga Solomoneibü chem hajar lei, hoba koli sepai hajar anthüknyi, haoen kho haoeibü kailong sangnyu shuonga hoba Jerusalema Choba yoa kitikei.
Hobaje haoei Choba pendou thüka Eufrates ka Filistia kaonyek sühko songdakkei.
Hobaje Chobaei Jerusalema chandinam kho laang tegü hoba cedar bu kho Shefela bhuklong tegü apsileko yeitikei.
Hobaje Solomon shanga Ijep ka hoba kaonyek pendou ka koli sungbakei.
Tou Solomoneibü joubü kümsilei khangbü ka thon sühko thuseibou Nathaneibü ngühlia, hoba Shilonbü Ahijaeibü tetenbüa hoba Nebateibü shou Jeroboam shanga hapbou Iddoeibü mangsanga doan aki lo?
Solomonei Israelbü pendou thüka po saonyi songdakkei.
Hobaje Solomon bousi shuong yoa yepbei, hoba haobou Dawid sangnyua khünkei; hoba haoeibü shou Rehoboamei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Rehoboam Shekhem to haukei, aishanga Israelbü pendouei hao Choba yeitila Shekhem to louan kikei.
Hobaje ladang Nebateibü shou Jeroboamei kho ditkei, (aishanga hao Ijepa Solomon Choba thedeng ka khüto satjung hauan kikei) Jeroboam Ijep ka longeikei.
Hobaje haoenei hautikei hoba hao ngakei; hoba hao hoba Israel pendou Rehoboam to joyoko laukei,
“Kabouei küneibü buleng atshaitikei; tou khei yingbü khoei kaboueibü kümsilei sekbü kho hoba kün thükto haoei jinkubü buleng atshaibü kho songoktishi, hoba künei no khangenkho.”
Hobaje Rehoboamei haoen to laukei, “Chalou semnyet kian nyibou kü jungto kangai,” hoba mütshuong linkei.
Hobaje Solomon lang kijinei hao thedanga lobü jaishou shuong to Rehoboam Chobaei pheyoko laukei, “Ho mütli la jongaibü ngaitikula kaneikei kü la ai dambü kula?”
Hobaje haoenei hao to laukei, “Nyi ho mütli to sanouko jungeialonga hoba haoen olintialonga hoba haoen to ngühmai joyoalonga kheijinei haoen ponpen no khangenbü shuong yinglabü.”
Lausikei jaishou shuongei hao la kubü ngüh kho haoei ale, tekan apbei, hoba hao thedanga lobü hao him heshou shuong yoa ong ngüh janyokei.
Hobaje haoei haoen to laukei, “Habü mütli la jongaibü kula kaneikei kü la ai dambü kula? Haoenei kü to, ‘Kabouei kün la küntibü buleng songokbou yeitishi dogo lauda.’ ”

Hobaje hao him shuongei hao to laukei, “Ka to, ‘Kabouei küneibü buleng atshaitikua, lausikei nyi kho kün la songokbou yeitikushi,’ dogo joyobü mütshuong to nyi hai lenshi, ‘Küboueibü shenjang toje ngeibü ikjishou aübou shangkei,
hoba tou kübouei kan la buleng sekbü petikei yingalonga, ngei kan la buleng aei ong petilabü; kübouei kan to janglühei sembo shieikoekei, lausikei ngeije kan sinkipei shieikoelabü’ dogo laushi.”
Hibü “Sembounyet kai” dogo Chobaei laubü tegü Jeroboam si mütshuong pendou Rehoboam jungto sembounyet loukei.
Hobaje Chobaei haoen to kaangko jongaikei; hoba Rehoboam Chobaei jaishou shuongeibü ngüh tekan apbukei,

hoba heshou shuongeibü ngüh tegütham Rehoboam Chobaei haoen to joyoko laukei, “Kübouei kaneibü buleng atsheitham petikei; lausikei ngei ho to aei jinyokulabü; kübouei kan janglühei shieikoekei, lausikei ngeije singkipei shieikoelabü.”
Hibü Chobaei mütshuong to ngüha ale; aishanga

Hobaje ladang Israelbü pendouei Chobaei haoeneibü ngüha ale dogo chühenkei, mütshuongei jongngaiko laukei, “Dawid yoa kün ai phejan ki? Jesseeibü shou to kün phetphan ühambei; mütpem weko lulueibü neichem lamashi; tou no Dawid jembü chem to chühashi.” Hibü Israelbü pendou lulueibü neichem lambo linkei.
Lausikei Jihudaa kibü Israelbü shousi shuong shangaje haoen thüka Rehoboamei songdakkei.

Kheijinei Rehoboam Chobaei kümaleia leiyeibou Adoniram hautikei, hoba Israelbü shousi shuongei laangei tetsi hao haikei. Hobaje Rehoboam Choba Jerusalem to satla jembü kailong to angla panteiko haukei.
Hibü Israelbüei tat sühko Dawid mütli chung khulimbo louakei.

Hobaje ladang Rehoboam Jerusalem to loukei; haoei Jihuda hoba Benjamin chemdang shuong hajar saongao to saolei pienbü müt lakjaibü shuong, sangle kho nyibou sungngaila Israelbü khulimbo wapyola ngashaikei.
Lausikei
“Solomoneibü shou Rehoboam Jihudabü Choba hoba Jihudaa Israelbü hoba Benjaminbü pendou to lenko laushi,
Hobaje Rehoboam Jerusalema kikei, hoba khümenla shanga Jihudaa sangnyu shuong kümbei.
Haoei Bethlehem, Etam, hoba Tekoa kümbei,
hoba Bethzur Soko, Adullam,
Gath, Maresha, Zif,
Adoraim, Lakhis, Azeka,
Zora, Aijalon, hoba Heron, habü ho Jihudaa hoba Benjamina khümenla kümbü sangnyu shu- ong ki.
Hobaje haoei lapheishon shuong kho kangkhühtham kümbei, hoba leiyeibü shuong khünei apyokei, hoba shausiyung thanshanga, onang si ih phokei.
Hobaje sangnyu pendoua haoei aih si aubu phokei, hoba haoen aibou hau kiko yeitikei. Hibü Jihuda si Benjamin hao shangabü kikei.
Hobaje Israel pendoua kibü ungshedbou shuong hoba Levi shuong haoen kishang pendou ka hao jungto loukei.
Aishanga Levi shuongei haoen lamshaushang kaodak hoba haoenei kibü shuong apyokei, hoba Jihuda si Jerusalem to loukei, aishanga Jeroboam si haoeibü shousi shuongei khei haoenei
hoba haoei shongh lemshang shanga hoba sanlon paang heangsho hoba haoei kümbü masu paangshou shuong shanga ungshedbou pienkei.
Hobaje aoyouei jembü maangpona Israel Mühghaü lamla maang angenkei, haoen Israel chemdang pendou ka Jerusalem to
Haoenei Jihuda sangle hau kitikei, hoba po sem shanga Solomoneibü shou Rehoboam khümenbüa kitikei, aieilausi haoenei po sem Dawid si Solomoneibü lama paikei.
Hobaje Rehoboamei Dawideibü shou Jeremoteibü nouyangshou Mahalat yakla ngakei, hoba Jesseeibü shou Eliabeibü nouyangshou Abihail yakla lela ngakei;
hoba saoei hao la shousi shuong bukkukei; Jeus, Shemaria, hoba Zaham.
Sao phaiaje haoei Absalomeibü nouyangshou Maaka lekei, saoei hao la Abija, Attai, Ziza, hoba Shelomit bukkukei.
Rehoboamei hao yak hoba thangnyu pendou tokei Absalomeibü shou Maaka sanoukei (haoei yak anthükset hoba thangnyu saosem lekei, hoba bousu shou saoto set hoba yaksa shou saosem kikei.)
Hobaje Rehoboamei haoeibü jaisinasi shuong yoa Maakaeibü shou Abija leiyeibü konglebou pienkei, aieilausi haoei hao Choba yeitila dambü kikei.

Hobaje haoei songsihon kiko jungeikei, hoba Jihuda si Benjamin kaodak pendoua lapheishon kümbü sangnyu pendoua haoeibü shousi shuong janan phokei, hoba haoei haoen la shausiyung souko kukei, hoba haoen shanga yaksi shuong kukei.
Ladang Rehoboameibü sangle kaangko sekoktham yeikei, haoei
Hobaje Rehoboam Choba po ngaoboubüa, haoenei
kailong hajar cheto saoan hoba koli sepai hajar saosem angkei. Hobaje hao yoa loubü shuong Ijep ka Libia, Sukkim hoba Ethio- piabü aweenko haikei.
Hobaje haoei Jihudaa kibü kaangbüsekbü sangnyu shuong lekei, hoba Jerusalem sühko loukei.
Kheijinei thuseibü Shemaia Rehoboam jungto hoba Jihudabü yaangenbü shuong jungto loukei. Haoen Jerusalema Shishak shanga kaman kikei, hoba haoen to laukei, “
Kheijinei Israelbü yaangenbü shuong hoba Choba haoen lolo eaaoa yeikei hoba laukei, “
Ladang
Khei yingsikei haoen hao khangenbü shuong yinglabü, khünei haoenei ngeibü kümsilei hoba kaodak sangle kümsilei ngelabü.”
Hibü Ijepbü Choba Shishak Jerusalem khulimbo angkei; haoei
Hobaje Rehoboam Chobaei khübü jeiko chisaknameibü aih shuong kümbei, hoba khübü kho Chobaeibü koukhün lombü khusabü ik to kukei.
Hobaje ladüngnei Choba
Hobaje ladang haoei hao lolo sembeiambei
Hibü Rehoboam Chobaei hao lolo Jerusalema hau kingaikei hoba songdakkei. Rehoboam haoei songdakla khangjinei po saonyito che kikei, hoba haoei Jerusalema po anthüknyet songdakkei, ho sangnyu
Hobaje haoei amaibü kümbei, aieilausi haoei
Tou Rehoboameibü kümsilei khangbü ka thonbü sühko khübü kho thuseibou Shemaia si Iddo thuseiboueibü lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo? Jeroboam si Rehoboam kanglanga wapyo athakko ong kikei.
Hobaje Rehoboam haoeibü bousi shuong yoa yepbei hoba Dawid sangnyua khünkei, hoba haoeibü shou Abijaei hao jeila songdakkei.
Jeroboam Choba po anthükset boubüa Abijaei Jihudaa songdakla khangkei.
Haoei Jerusalema po sem songdakkei. Haoeibü nyu nyen Mikaia, Gibeabü Urieleibü shou kikei.

Tou Abija si Jeroboam kanglanga wapyo kikei. Abijaei sekbülakbü lakoubü dan leian lason to haukei, shanenbü müt hajar saongaoto lei hoba hau yaangbü lakjaibü hajar saongaoto set leian haukei hoba Rehoboamei hao khulimbo lason lokei.
Kheijinei Efraim shongha kibü Zemaraim shongha Abija lokei, hoba laukei, “Ngeibü ngüha leashi, O Jeroboam hoba Israelbü pendou!”
“Israelbü
Khei yingsikei Dawideibü shou Solomon khangenbou Nebateibü shou Rehoboamei jembü
Hobaje haang alongbü sousiwat at hao kaijembo kambei hoba Solomoneibü shou songsidoei asüh aonbü Rehoboam khulimbo meimeikei hoba haoei haoen khulimbo aloenen.
Hobaje tou kanei Dawideibü shoueibü ika
Kan
“Lausikei kün shangaje
hoba haoenei ngeyang weko hoba nangnak weko juokbü lembü hoba ponlem teibü jikda, hoba khümsok saopobüa wentek thanshaian phoda, hoba honeibü wanthunga hantin shuong kho nangnak weko jikda aishanga
Chühashi, küneibü khua kün yoa Mühghaü kia, hoba kan khulimbo lashuokla ungshedbou shuongei lason teklaang metla jungakei, O Israel shousi shuong,
Lausikei haoen thükto phai ae ka kaijembo Rehoboamei panget lela hautikei, kho tegü haoeibü sepai dan Jihudabü thedanga kikei, hoba panget lebü shuong haoen phainei kikei.
Hobaje ladang Jihudaei chühkei, chühashi, lason kho haoen thedanga hoba phainei kikei, hoba haoenei
Kheijinei Jihudabü mütshuongei la pangkei. Hobaje Jihudabü mütshuongei la pangkei, Mühghaüei Abija si Jihudabü thedanga Jeroboam si Israelbü pendou athük haptikei.
Hobaje Israelbü Jihudabü thedang ka satyokei, hoba Mühghaüei haoen ik to Israel kukei.
Abija hoba haoeibü mütshuongei haoen juong haitikei; hibü Israelbü haibüei tuongtibü lanthükbü hajar saongao ngao.
Kho tegü Israelbü kho jihaphaia setlepbei hoba Jihuda mütshuongei thükkei, aieilausi haoenei
Hobaje Abijaei Jeroboam shijung haukei, hoba hao ka hapbü sangnyu shuong, Bethel, Jeshana hoba Efron yoa sang shuong sungkei.
Abijaeibü chaloua Rehoboamei jembü hau ühüpngai; hoba
Lausikei Abijaeibü hau yaangan apbei. Hobaje haoei yak anthüklei ngakei, hoba bousu shou saoto nyi hoba yaksa shou anthüklak kikei.
Abijaeibü joubü kümsilei, haoeibü the- chüh, hoba haoei lenan phobü ngüh Iddo thuseiboueibü ngühlia doan kia.
Hibü Abija bousi shuong yoa yepbei, hoba haoenei Dawid sangnyua hao khünkei, hoba haoeibü shou Asaei hao jeila songdakkei, hao haanga kaonyek sangsembo po an kikei.
Hobaje Asaei
Aishanga haoei küksithang lemshang hoba shongh lemshang sungan apbei, hoba saopobü thaonyu shuong leilukukei, hoba Ashera kuikui wapan koutikukei,
hoba
Tokei Jihudabü sangnyu pendou ka haoei shongh lemshang hoba chanyueibü noksa shuong sunglangkukei, hoba hao phanga sangle kho hakso kikei.
Hobaje haoei Jihudaa lapheishon sangnyu shuong kümbei; aishanga kaon- yek kho küpjemetnyu kikei, hoba khübü po shuonga hao wapyo akitei; aieilausi
Aishanga haoei Jihuda to laukei, “Senei habü sangnyu kümbho, hoba khübü kho kümthang hoba lapheishon thon bakhün hoba thangtetei kaijembho, kaonyek kho tokei seneibü, aieilausi senei

Hobaje Asaei saolang aih hoba aubu jungbü lakoubü tan che kikei. Jihuda ka hajar saongao sem hoba Benjamin ka aih hoba lau jungbü hajar saoanto saolei khübü pendou maangkaangbü hoba hau yaangbü müt kikei.
Hobaje haoen khulimbo Ethiopiabü Zera lakoubü dan million che hoba kailong saongao sem longkei, hoba Maresha sühko loukei.
Kheijinei hao to haüyola Asa haukei, hoba haoenei Mareshaa Zefatha pholia lason lin küman lokei.
Hobaje Asaei
Hibü
Hobaje Asa si hao yoa kibü shuong haoen Gerar sühko shijung haukei; hoba Ethiopiabü che ongkei langkei jouan aki shongko tuongtikei; aishanga
Hobaje Gerar kaijembo sangnyu pendou haoenei shikei, aishanga
Haoenei samkeisamukeibü chem shuongkei panan apbukei, hoba san juong hoba ut sunglangkei, hoba Jerusalem to ngaikei.
Hobaje Mühghaü soushou Obedeibü shou Azaria jungto loukei,
hoba hao Asa to haüyola haukei, hoba hao to laukei, “Kanei kü to ditshi, Asa hoba Jihuda hoba Benjamin pendou; kan
Tou jih lounyu maimaitham Mühghaü ayoko Israel kikei, hoba lenbou ungshedbou akiko, hoba ngühkhüm akiko kiteikei.
Lausikei ladang haoen khonsaka haoenei
Khübü chaloua ao haulaje ayingsi ao loulaje hao solo akitei, aishanga kaonyeka kibü pendou panglangbü yaangei khonsaktikei.
Haoen netla yeiko leilukei, phangei phang sangnyuei sangnyu khulimyokei, aishanga Mühghaüei haoen khonsaklabü den denei khonkutikei.
Lausikei kan maang kaangko kishi, hoba kaneibü ik hau tengai; aishanga kaneibü kümsilei pailetkulabü.”

Hobaje ladang Asaei habü ngüh hoba Obed thuseibouei tetenbü ditkei, hao maang kangngaikei, hoba Jihuda si Benjamin kaodak pendou ka hoba haoei lebü Efraim shongh kaodak sangnyu shuong ka mangsenlabü shuong apbei, hoba haoei
Hobaje Jihuda si Benjamin pendou hoba Manasse ka hoba Simeon ka haoen yoa homan kibü shuong hai kamshaitikei: aishanga ladang haoenei
Asaei songdakbü po anthük ngaoboubü lit semboubüa haoen Jerusalema takshatkei.
Haoenei sang shibü ka soletbü sungbabü ka haoenei ho chaloua
Hobaje
hoba
Hobaje ngüh yaangbüei hoba uihinbüei hoba teklaang metko haoenei
Hobaje Jihudabü pendouei theyolanyobüa olinyokei, aishanga haoenei haoeneibü maangpon pendouei theyolanyokei hoba haoeneibü maangdak pendouei hao lambei; hoba haoenei hao hapbei; hoba

Tokei Asa Chobaei haoeibü pi yaksanyu Maaka Chobasao akümtila shanga haoei kuktikei, aieilausi saoei mangsenlabü noksa Ashera mühghaü sao heangsho kümbei; hoba Asaei saoeibü noksa kho wapan koutikei, hoba kho thamngu la yeitikei, hoba kho Kedron shushou yomanga jikkei.
Lausikei shonghkhua lembüje haoei sungan üp; khei yingsikei Asaeibü maangpon haoeibü langkei sünga
Hobaje Mühghaü chem to haobouei khümbo kubü peisilei hoba haoei jembü lolo khümbo kubü peisilei, chandinam, hon hoba thungsi- phau shuong haoei sungbakei.
Hobaje touje Asa songdakbü po khujinto ngao boubü sühkoje wapyo akitei.
Asaei songdakbü po khujinto lakboubüa Israel Choba Baashaei Jihuda khulimbo angkei, hoba Jihuda Choba Asa jungto aokei üangla ayingsi alottila shanga haoei Rama kümbei.
Kheijinei Asaei

“Kübou si kabou ham kanglanga kibü tegü seti kanglanga thangjam kikho; chühashi, ngei ka jungto chandinam hoba hon hautida; hauashi, Israel Choba yoka kan thangjam leiluashi, khoei ong haoei kü ka sukngailanglabü.”

Hobaje Benhadedei Asa Choba to ngüha lekei, hoba Israelbü sangnyu shuong khulimbo haoei lakoubü shuong dan thükto lajamleibü shuong hautikei, hoba haoenei Ijon, Dan, Abelmaim, hoba Naftali thanshang sangnyu pendou shian apbei.
Hobaje ladang Bashaei kho ditkei, haoei Rama kümbü ka nangkei, hoba haoeibü kümsilei thaktikei.
Kheijinei Asa Chobaei Jihuda pendou sungkei, hoba Bashaei chem dangko kibü Rama laang hoba bu haoenei sunglangkei, hoba khübü khoei haoei Geba si Mizpa kümbei.
Kho chaloua Asa Choba jungto thuseibou Hanani loukei, hoba hao to laukei, “Nyi
Ethiopiabü hoba Libiabü kailong shuong hoba koli sepai shuong lakoubü dan juong aying lo? Khei yingsikei nyi
Aishanga aoyoueibü maangpon
Kheijinei Asaei thuseibou to maangpokkei, hoba hao thüngshanga phokei, aieilausi kho haangjung haoei hao to khauangkei. Hobaje khüto yoko Asaei müt at üeisanou akiko khonkutikei.
Asaeibü kümsilei khangbü ka thonbü sühko, Jihuda hoba Israel Choba shuong lea doan kia.
Haoei songdakbü po khujinto güboubüa Asaeibü youa shat baukei, hoba haoeibü shat kho aeibou amaiko yeikei; khei yingasikei haoeibü shat shanga haoei
Hobaje haoei songdakbü po saonyito che boubüa haian haoeibü pisibousi shuong yoa yepbei.

Haoenei hao Dawid sangnyua hoba haoei jakan phobü heea khünkei, hoba ponlem maibü hoba ponlem phang phanga hibü moli ngebü shanenbüei lamlebüei nyakbü shen haoei phokei hoba hao hangenko haoenei wan yaang metkei.
Hobaje hao shou Jehosha- fatei hao jeiko songdakkei; hoba Israel khulimbo hau king- aikei.
Hobaje lapheishon kümbü Jihudabü sangnyu pendoua haoei sepai phokei hoba Jihuda kaodaka hoba Efraim sangnyu shuong laobou haobou Asaei sungkei khünei sepai lombü dan phokei.
Hobaje
lausikei haoei haoboueibü Mühghaü lambei, hoba haoei sakkubüa paikei, hoba Israelbüei kümbü phai asem.
Hibü haoeibü ika sangle kaangtikei; hoba Jihudabü pendouei Jehoshafat jungto jongsak sungbakei; hoba haoei nyaksinam hoba nyensang nyenhang juong kikei.
Hobaje
Tokei haoei songdakbü sembou poa haoei leiyeibü Benhail, Obadia, Zekharia, Nethaniel, hoba Mikaia, Jihuda sangnyu shuonga songlenla hautikei.
Hobaje haoen yoa Levibü Shemaia, Nethania, Zebadia, Asahel, Shemiramot, Jehonathan, Adonija, Tobija, hoba Tob Anonija, khübü Levibü yoa Elishama hoba Jehoram ungshedbou shuong hautikei.
Hobaje
Hobaje Jihuda kaijembo kibü sangle pendou thüka
Hobaje Filistiabü ateije Jehoshafat la jongsak sungbakukei, hoba khüm shanga chandinam kukei; hoba Arabiabüeikei hao la sanlon paang hajar nyetto saongao nyet sungbakukei.
Hobaje Jehoshafat aeibou yaangenkei; hoba haoei Jihudaa laang chem hoba thanshang sangnyu shuong kümbei.
Hobaje Jihuda sangnyu shuonga haoei nyaksinam juong jankuko kikei, hoba Jerusalema hau yaangbü lakjaibü shuong kikei.
Hobaje pithen bouthen haangphai ka webü hai kikei; Jihuda ka hajar thüka leiyeibü, Adna lajamleibou, hoba hao yoa hau yaangbü wapyobü müt hajar saongao sem;
hao to thenbou kho Jehohanan, lajamleibou, hoba hao yoa hajar saoanto saolei,
hoba hao to thenbou Amasia, Zikrieibü shou, haoei jembü lolo
Benjamin ka Eliadas lakjaibou müt che, hao yoa lau si aih jungbü hajar saoan,
hoba hao to thenbou Jehozabad yoa hajar sao ngaoto saolei wapyola lamlean kibü.
Lapheishon shebü sangnyu shuonga Jihuda pendoua Chobaei apyobü Chobaeibü kümaleia kikei.
Tou Jehoshafat nyaksinam hoba nyenhang juong kikei; hoba haoei Ahab to yen lambei.
Hobaje po shisho kian hao Ahab jungto Samaria to yankei. Hobaje Ahabei sanlon hoba masu juong hao shanga hoba hao yoa kibü shanga haitikei, hoba hao yoa Ramoth Gilead khulimbo angla thungeijangeikei.

Hobaje Israelbü Chobaei Jihudabü Choba Jehosha- fat to laukei, “No kü yoa Ramoth Gilead to longasao?” hoba haoei hao to jongaikei, “Ngo no tegü ong, hoba ngeibü mütli kaibü mütli tegü ong ki; hoba kün ka yoa wapyoa yolabü.”
Hobaje Jehosha- fatei Israel Choba to laukei, “Ngei sudajada, tat

Kheijinei Israel Chobaei ungshedbou shuong kamshaitikei, müt saongao lei, hoba haoen to laukei, “Kün Ramoth Gilead lason to haula si ngei haiyeila?” hoba haoenei laukei, “Angashi, aishanga Mühghaüei Chobaeibü ik to jinkulabü.”
Lausikei Jehoshafatei laukei, “
Hobaje Israel Chobaei Jehoshafat to laukei, “
Kheijinei Israel Chobaei leiyeibü che ngakei hoba laukei, “Imlaeibü shou Mikaia tongde leiba.”
Tou Israelbü Choba si Jehoshafat Choba hele lean Choba setshanga setan kikei; hoba Samaria bakhün to atshang amshanga haoen setan kikei, hoba haoen thedanga thuseibü pendouei tetenko kikei.
Hobaje Kenaanaeibü shou Zedekiaei jembü lolo namjuei laang kümbei hoba laukei,
Hobaje thuseibü pendouei khei tetenkei hoba laukei, “Ramoth Gilead to angashi hoba thük hapshi;
Hobaje Mikaia ngala hautibou ngühlang künbouei laukei, “Chühashi, thuseibü pendouei Choba shanga ngüh maibü jetei ong kia, kaibü ngühkei haoeneibü tegü yingshi, hoba ngühmai laushi.”
Lausikei Mikaiaei laukei, “

Hobaje hao ladang Choba jungto loukei, Chobaei hao to laukei, “Mikaia, kün Ramoth Gilead to wapyola angla si ayingsi ngei haiteila?” Hobaje haoei jongaikei, “Angashi hoba thük hapshi, haoen kaibü ik to kulabü.”
Lausikei Chobaei hao to laukei, “Ngei ladüngnei ka to
Hobaje Mikaiaei laukei, “Ngei Israelbü pendou sanlombü akibü tegü linan hapa;” hoba
Hobaje Israel Chobaei Jehoshafat to laukei, “Ngei ka to kü shangabü haoei amaibü to liman aikei maibü atetenlabü dogo alen lo?”
Hobaje Mikaiaei laukei, “Hibü
hoba
Kheijinei sou che thedang aeto loukei, hoba

Hobaje haoei laukei, ‘Ngo haulabü, hoba haoeibü thuseibü shuong sembung pendoua yepeijawebü soushou jinkulabü.’ Hobaje haoei laukei, ‘Nyi hao suletlabü, hoba nyi thük haplabü; hauashi hoba kho tegü kümashi.’”
Hibü tou chühashi, “
Kheijinei Kenaanaeibü shou Zedekia nyangko loukei hoba Mikaiaeibü omlanga ipbei, hoba laukei, “
Hobaje Mikaiaei laukei, “Chühashi, no lolo hula shanga shemjang maangkabü to atbü chaloua nyi haplabü.”
Hobaje Israel Chobaei laukei, “Mikaia lapan leiba, hoba sangnyua governor Amon jungto hoba Chobaeibü shou Joash jungto leian hauashi;
hoba lenashi, Chobaei hai lauda, ho müt thüngshanga phoashi, hoba ngo sangmaia alongei shongko nyak shibang hoba dei shibangei pangteishi.”
Hobaje Mikaiaei laukei, “No sangmaia longeialonga
Hibü Israelbü Choba si Jihudabü Choba Jehoshafat Ramoth Gilead to angkei.

Hobaje Israel Chobaei Jehoshafat to laukei, “Ngei ngo lolo hukoshepbo lason to atlabü, lausikei nyije kaibü hele leashi.” Hibü Israel Chobaei hao lolo hukoshepbo hele lekei; hoba haoen lason to haukei.
Tou Siriabü Chobaei haoeibü kailong shuong thüka lajamleibou shuong la sakkuko laukei, “Hanbü ayingsi yaangbü to tewapyo, lausikei Israelbü Choba to ong wapyoshi.”
Hobaje ladang kailong lajamleibou shu- ongei Jehoshafat hapbei, haoenei laukei, “Ho Israelbü Choba kho.” Hibü hao khulimbo wapyola haoen sepeikei, hoba Jehoshafatei ngekkei, hoba
Aishanga ladang kailong shuong lajamleibouei kho Israelbü aying dogo ngekei, hao shijung haubü ka haoen sepeikei.

Lausikei müt cheei haoeibü lau mangthem bühkei, hoba Israelbü Choba la phakshuok to kipan jinkukei, hibü haoei haoeibü kailong leibou to laukei, “Sepeiashi, hoba lason ka ngo langshi, aieilausi ngo leilua.”
Hobaje khünyet lashuok kangan kikei, hoba Israelbü Chobaei haoeibü kailonga angan setan Siriabü ae yeian chasemlam asühshongko haiteikei; hoba chanyu neplamto hao haikei.
Hobaje Jihudabü Choba Jehoshafat Jerusalema haoeibü chem to sangmaia ngaikei.
Hobaje thuseibou Hananieibü shou Jehu hao shuokla haukei, hoba Jehoshafat Choba to laukei, “Nyi amaibü to thuilabü hoba
Khei yingasikei, ka to maibü at ngei hapakei, kho, nyi kaonyek ka Ashera apbua hoba Mühghaü lamla kaibü maangpon kuakei.”
Hobaje Jehoshafat Jerusalema kikei; hoba haoei Beersheba ka shongh kaodak Efraim to nyibou mütshuong yoa haukei hoba haoen nyibou haoeneibü pisibou Mühghaü,
Hobaje taklepan kibü Jihuda sangnyu kaonyek pendoua matjembü shuong phokei, sangnyu weko hoba matjembü shuong to laukei,
“Kanei ai kümda damanchühashi; aishanga müt shanga aying, lausikei
Tou hibü
Tokei Jehoshafatei Jerusalema Levibü hoba ungshedbou hoba Israelbü chung jaishou at
Hobaje haoei haoen la sakkuko laukei, “Haü, kanei maangpon pendouei maanglemenko, hoba

Ladang ong kaneibü jaisinasi shuong haoeneibü sangnyua kibü shuong ka sii angbü shanga ngühkhüm ayingsi sakkubü shanga songle ngühkhüm ayingsi sakkubü shanga songle ngühkhüm ayingsi jaletbü ngühkhüm ayingsi takletbü ngühkhüm shanga kan jungto ngühsaknepbü loulaje, khei
Hobaje chühashi,
Kho phaia Moabbü, Ammonbü, hoba haoen yoa Meunbü Jehoshafat khulimbo wapyola loukei.
Hobaje müt at louan Jehoshafat to lenkei, “No khulimbo tan yaangbü che yungnyu khatjung hauan Siria ka louada, hoba chühashi, haoenei Hazazon Tamar (kho Engedi) shia.”
Hobaje Jehoshafat hatkei, hoba hao lolo
Hobaje
Hobaje Jihuda si Jerusalem thangyena
hoba laukei, “O
O küneibü Mühghaü, ho kaonyeka kibü shuong kaibü mütli Israelbü thedang ka shian apan kaibü thangbou Abraham lilabü la ponpen shanga kukei aying lo?
Hobaje haoen khünei kida, hoba kaibü nyen shanga hanei saoposhang che kümbei hoba laukei,

Kün thükto thushed loualonga in, matjembü, shatsinyat lim, ayingsi mühsinou loualonga, künei ho chem thedanga hoba ka thedanga lolabü, (aieilausi ho chema kaibü nyen kia) hoba küneibü khonsaka ka to ngeklabü, hoba nyi ditlabü hoba nyi khümenlabü.
“Hobaje tou Ammon, Moab, Seir shongh mütshuong to chühashi, aoyou Ijep ka loujinei nyi Israelbü la ashiti.
Chühashi, nyi kün la phet phanla kubü, ka shangabü ka kün shian apla louan kün la haoenei pailettiko lauda.
O küneibü Mühghaü, nyi haoen thüka mat jemlep lo? aishanga kün khulimbo loubü ho tan yaangbü khulimbo kün hau aki, ai kümla künei angekei, lausikei küneibü nyek ka thüka kia.”
Hobaje Jihudabü pendou
Kheijinei kaman kibü shuong yoa Zekhariaeibü shou Jahaziel, Benaiaeibü shou Jeieleibü shou, Mathaniaeibü shou Asaf shousi shuong Levibü thükto
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ditashi, Jihuda si Jerusalema kibü pendou hoba no Jehoshafat Choba;
Ngiet kanei haoen khulimbo yanashi, chühashi, haoen Ziz aeto angbü lam to loulabü, hoba Jeruel yam chaangbou pholi thon aenei kanei haoen haplabü.
Kho lasona kanei wapyola akhamlabü; jembü loshanga hoba kan yoa
Hobaje Jehoshafatei jembü thenyek kaoa shatko khüpetkei; hoba Jihuda si Jerusalema kibü pendou
Hobaje Levibü Kohateibü shousi shuong; Koraeibü shousi shuong, ngühlang yaangbüei
Hobaje haoen ngeyang enyu pikei hoba Tekoa yam to haukei, hoba haoen haujinei Jehoshafat lokei hoba laukei, “Kü to ditshi, O Jihuda si Jerusalema kibü shu- ong;
Hobaje haoei müt shuong to wapyoan phaia sepai tan thedanga, saopobü hele lean
Hobaje ladang haoenei chia laula hoba nyen sangla khangkei, haoen khulimbo louan kibü Ammonbü, Moabbü, hoba Seirbü shongh müt shuong khulimbo

Aishanga Ammonbü si Moabbü shousi shuong Seir shongha kibü shuong khulimbo lokei, haoen khümbo haitila hoba mautila shanga hoba ladang haoenei Seira kibü shuong langlangko thonan aptikei, mütpem wekoei cheei che, cheei che mautila thuikei.
Ladang Jihudabü lamang lapheishon khüto loukei, haoenei shuong yaangbü aeto chühkei, hoba chühashi, haoen kho kaoa tuongan kibü haibü maang shuong kikei, che ongkei asaten.

Ladang Jehoshafat hoba hao müt shuongei haoen ka makletbü nyaksinam sungla loukei, hoba haoenei masu juong, peisilei shu- ong, neisimei hoba namsek peisilei shuong laobou haoenei jembü shanga touje akünkhümlabü lele yoshaikei; hoba peisilei yoshaijinei haoen semnyet sühko kikei, kho juong kikei.
Hobaje sembounyet haoenei haoen lolo Beraka pholia kamshaikei; aishanga haoenei khünei
Kheijinei haoen Jerusalem to nyibou olinyoko haula haoen thedang to Jehoshafat shaangan Jihuda si Jerusalembü mütpem weko ngaikei, aieilausi
Hobaje haoen Jerusalem to
Hobaje ladang Israelbü dangbou shuong khulimbo
Hibü Jehoshafateibü sangleje sangsembo kikei, aishanga haoeibü Mühghaüei hao la hao kaijembo hakso kukei.
Hobaje Jehoshafatei Jihudaa songdakkei; haoei songdakla khangjinei po khujin to ngao kikei; hoba Jerusalema haoei po saoto ngao songdakkei, hoba haoeibü nyu nyen Azuba, Shilhieibü nouyangshou kikei.
Hobaje haoei haobou Asa paibü lama paikei, hoba
Khei yingsikei shongh lemshangje sungan üp; ayingsi mütshuongei haoeneibü pisibou Mühghaü to maangkuko akidei.
Tou Jehoshafateibü kümsilei khangbü ka thonbü sühko Hananieibü shou Jehu ngühli laobou Israelbü Choba shuong ngühlia jinan ki, khünei habü ho doan kia.
Kho phaia Jihudabü Choba Jehoshafatei Israelbü Choba Ahazia aoei amaiko kümbei, hao lolo hao yoa yokei.
Hobaje haoei hao yoa Tarshish to haula long kümla yokei, hoba haoei Eziongebera long shuong kho kümbei.
Kheijinei Mareshabü Dodavahueibü shou Eliezerei Jehoshafat khulimbo tetenko laukei, Ahazia yoa nyi no lolo yosije,
Hobaje Jehoshafat bousi shuong yoa yepbei hoba Dawid sangnyua bousi shuong yoa khünkei; hoba haoeibü shou Jehoramei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Haoeibü nasi shuong kho, Jehoshafateibü shousi shuong kikei; Azaria, Jehiel, Zekharia, Azarishu, Maikel, hoba Shefatia, habü pendou kho Israelbü Choba Jehoshafateibü shousi shuong kikei.
Hobaje haoeneibü bouei haoen la jongsak yaang chandinam, hon hoba Jihudaa kümthang thangan kibü sangnyu shuong yoan kukei, lausikei sangleje Jehoram la kukei, aieilausi haoeibü shou jaishoubou kikei.
Tou ladang Jehoram boueibü sangle thüka chingkei, hoba hao lolo hau kikei haoei nasi shuong pendou hoba Jihudabü konglebü at inei wapettikei.
Jehoramei songdakla khangjinei po khujin to nyi kikei, hoba haoei Jerusalema po set songdakkei.
Hobaje Ahab chempenei kümbü tegü haoei Israelbü Choba shuong lama paikei; aishanga haoeibü yak Ahabeibü nouyangshou kikei; hoba
Khei yingsikei
Haoeibü songdak jihsiphaia Edomei Jihuda sangle khulimbo meimeikei, hoba haoeibü Choba che phokei.
Kheijinei Jehoramei haoeibü lajamleibü shuong hao yoa leian danjung haukei, hoba nangnak hao pienkei, hoba hao kaijembo kibü Edombü hoba kailong thüka lajamleibou haitikei.
Hibü tat sühko Jihuda sangle khulimbo Edom loakei. Kho chaloua Libnaia haoeibü sangle khulimbo lokei, aieilausi haoei bousi shuongeibü Mühghaü,
Aeila leko haoei Jihuda shongh kaodaka shongh lemshang kümbei, hoba Jerusalema kibü shuong pejapelako yeitikei, hoba Jihudabü ayingbü to leian haukei.
Hobaje Elija thuseibou ka hao jungto ledo che sungbakei, hoba weko laukei, “

Israelbü Choba shuong youmoa paisije, hoba Jihuda si Jerusalema kibü shuong Ahab chempen shuongei kümbü tegü, pejapelako hautisije, hoba kaboueibü shousi shuong katoje maibou kibü kaibü nasi shuong nyi haitisije;
chühashi,
Hobaje no lolo shatsinyat amaibü che kaibü shimung shat, khei chalou angbou shatei nyatei kaibü oksishiang along shongko shieikoelabü.’ ”
Hobaje Jehoram khulimbo

hoba Jihuda khulimbo haoen angkei, hoba khüto tuyetjung lotkei, hoba Chobaeibü chema kibü nyaksinam pendou sunglangkei, haoeibü shousi shuong hoba yak kei yoan khei yingbü khoei nashoubou tham Jehoahaz to limbo haoeibü shou che ongkei ajou.
Hobaje ho pendou phaiaje
Jih sühbüa po nyi kian phaia shatei haoeibü oksishiang nujung longan khonku yaanga haikei. Bousi shuongeibü haibü wanjik tegü hao haibü wanjik aküm.

Haoei songdak la khangjinei po khujin to nyi kikei hoba haoei Jerusalema po set songdakkei, hoba aoei awaangko hao bangjung satkei, hoba haoenei hao Dawid sangnyua khünkei, lausikei Choba shuongeibü heea akhün.

Hobaje Jerusalema kibü shuongei haoeibü shou nashoubou Ahazia hao jeila Choba yeitikei; aieilausi müt tan che Arabiabü yoa loubüei jaishou phaije pendou haitian apbei. Hibü Jihudabü Choba Jehorameibü shou Ahaziaei songdakkei.
Haoei songdakla khangjinei Ahazia po saonyi to nyi kikei; hoba haoei Jerusalema po che songdakkei, hoba haonyueibú nyen Athalia Omrieibü shou kikei.
Hao Ahabeibü youmoa paikei; aieilausi amaibü kümla hao lenenbü kho haoeibü nyu kikei.
Ahab chempen tegütham,
Haoei tokei haoenei lenbü phai paikei, hoba Israelbü Choba Ahabeibü shou Jehoram yoa Ramoth-Gileada Siriabü Choba Hazael khulimbo wapyola haukei; hoba Seriabüei Joram leilutikei.

Hobaje Siriabü Choba Hazael khulimbo hao wapyojinei haoenei hao la Ramaa leilutibü moukhün Jezreela maitila hao ngaikei. Hobaje Jihudabü Choba Jehorameibü shou Azaria Jezreela Ahabeibü shou Joram pean chühla yankei, aieilausi hao shatko kikei.
Tou Amazia mautibü kho Joram pean chühla Mühhgaüei yantibü ka, aishanga ladang hao louko kikei, haoei Nimshieibü shou Jehu khulimbo Jehoram yoa haukei, ao Ahab chempen wapan apla
Hobaje ladang Jehuei Ahab chemdang thüka matjembü kümsilei kümbo kikei, haoei Jihudabü konngnyu shuong hoba Ahaziaeibü shousi shuong, Ahazia khangenko hapbei hoba haoen pendou haitikei.
Hobaje haoei Ahazia lambei hoba haoei hao lapbei, (tou hao Samariaa huan kikei) hoba haoenei hao khünkei, aieilausi haoenei laukei, “Hao Jehoshafateibü shou kikei, aoei haoeibü maangpon khümboei
Tou Ahaziaeibü nyu Athalia saoeibü shou haia dogo ditjinei sao meimeikei; hoba Jihudabü songdakei Choba li pendou haitikei.

Lausikei Chobaeibü nouyangshou Jehoshebaei Ahaziaeibü shou Joash yaüan sungkei hoba haitila kibü Chobaeibü shousi shuong ka saoei kokshoua sunglangkei hoba saoei hao pangteinyu kho shemjang chenei huan phokei. Kho tegü ungshedbou Jehoiadaeibü nouyangshou Jehoshebaei hao Athalia ka huan phokei, hibü saoei hao ühaiti.
Hobaje hao haoen yoa Mühghaüeibü chema po lak huan kikei, hoba Athaliaei kaonyeka songdakkei.

Tou po nyetboubüa Jehoiada ungshedbou hao hau kingaikei, hoba saongaobang lei- yeibü, Jerohameibü shou Azaria, Jehonaneibü shou Ishmael, Obedeibü shou Azaria, Adaiaeibü shou Maasela, hoba Zikhrieibü shou Elishafat yoa theyolanyokei.
Hobaje haoen Jihudaa shoongeikei hoba Jihudabü sangnyu pendou ka Levibü hoba Israelbü chung khuleibü shuong leishaikei hoba haoen Jerusalem to loukei.
Hobaje Mühghaüeibü chema kamshaibü pendouei Choba to theyolanyobü che lekei. Hobaje haoei haoen to laukei, “Chühashi, Dawideibü shousi shuong shanga
Kanei kümlabü kümsilei ho, kan ungshedbou shuong hoba Levibü aoyou Nounyet kümlabü kümsilei wanan longeilaje phejan sema che je koukhün lombü;
hoba phejan sema che chemshang bakhüna kilabü.
ungshedbou shuong hoba khangenbü shuong Levibü to limbo aokei
Levibü mütpem weko lulueibü in si aubu jungan Choba kaijembo kilabü hoba aoyou lotlaje haitilabü. Hao ladang lotlaje hoba ladang longlaje kan Choba yoa kishi.”

Levibü hoba Jihudabü pendouei ungshedbou Jihoiadaei sakkubü tegü pendou kümbei. Haoen mütpem weko aoyou Nounyet kümsilei wanla, aoyou kümtoleito haula haoen yoto haoeibü müt shuong leian loukei; aieilausi ungshedbou Jehoiadaei janyinbü kho linjung asattiko kikei.
Hobaje ungshedbou Jeho- iadaei saongao thüka leiyeibü shuong la Dawideibü Mühghaü chema kibü aubu si aih shuong khümbo kuan apbei.
Hobaje haoei mütpem weko lulueibü ika in si aubu jungan mae chemphei ka nanae chemphei sühko Choba kaijembo lemshang hoba chem nyangko apyokei.

Kheijinei haoenei Chobaeibü shou leian longkei hoba hao la Chobaeibü khun hankukei, hoba hao la thebülanbü kho kukei, hoba hao Choba yeitikei; hoba Jehoiada hoba haoeibü shousi shuongei hao la onang naangkukei; hoba haoenei laukei, “Choba haangkhu onko kishi!”
Ladang Athaliaei müt lang- yobü ngühlang hoba Choba nyen sangbü ditkei, sao mütshuong jungto

saoei chühkei, hoba chühashi, Choba kho haoeibü thaonyu nyangko koukhüna sakan loan kikei, hoba lajamleibü si pithung metbü shuong Choba nyangko hoba kaonyek kabü mütshuong pendou olinyokei hoba teklaang metkei, chia laubü shuongei tokei kongkin kaangko nyensang chia lauko leiyeikei; kheijinei Athaliaei jembü neisimei jitnyinkei, hoba laukei, “Khüpettia! Khüpettia!”

Hobaje Jehoiada ungshedbouei sepai saongao thüka lajamleibou shuong leian longkei, hoba haoen to laukei, “Sao kho lin kanglang khüto leian kaiyang; hoba sao phai to ao semlaje hao inei wapettiashi, aishanga ungshedbouei laukei, ‘
Hibü haoenei sao to ik atkei, hoba kolieibü koukhün danko Chobaeibü chem khüto haukei, hoba khünei haoenei sao haitikei.
Hobaje Jehoiadaei hao hoba mütshuong hoba Choba haoen pendou kanglanga khei haoen
Hobaje müt pendou Baal chem to haukei, hoba kho leilukukei, hoba haoeibü lemshang hoba haoeibü mangh noksa netla yeiko jangnyinkukei hoba Baal ungshedbou Mattan lemshang thüka haitikei.
Hobaje
Hobaje
Hobaje haoei saongao thüka lajamleibü shuong hoba yaangenbü shuong, hoba mütshuong thüka governor shuong hoba kaonyeka kibü pendou leian
Hibü kaonyeka kibü mütshuong pendou olinyokei, hoba sangnyu kho küpjembo kikei, hoba haoenei Athalia inei wapettikei.
Joash songdakla khangjinei po nyet kikei; hoba haoei Jerusalema po saonyi songdakkei, hoba hao nyueibü nyen Zibia Beersheba ka kikei.
Hobaje ungshedbou Jehoiada salang sünga Joashei
Jehoiadaei hao shanga yak mütnyi ngakukei, hoba bousu si yaksa shou kikei.
Kho phaia Joashei

Haoei ungshedbou si Levi shuong liko kamshaitian laukei, “Jihudabü sangnyu shuong jungto hauashi, hoba Israelbü pendou ka po che ka po che sühko kaneibü Mühghaü chem kümetla nam yoshaiashi, hoba kanei panteiyoko kümashi.” Lausikei Levi shuongei kho panteiko aküm.
Hobaje Chobaei konglebou Jehoiada ngakei hoba laukei, “Jihuda si Jerusalem ka
(Aishanga yaksa amaibü Athaliaeibü shousi shuongei Mühghaüeibü chem phekyetjung atan saüenbü peisilei pendou Baal shanga jungeikei)
Hibü Chobaei sakkukei, hoba haoenei busen che kümbei hoba kho
Hobaje Jihuda si Jerusalem pendoua Mühghaü khangenbou Mosaei yama Israelbü la hebütakbü sakkubü
Hobaje konglebü pendou hoba müt pendou olinyokei, hoba thon asüh shongko haoenei sungjung louan busen khünei jinkukei.

Hobaje ladang ong Levi shuongei busen kho Chobaeibü ikjaibü shuong jungto sungbakei, haoenei khünei nam juong hapjinei Chobaeibü dobou hoba thükkabou ungshedbouei busen kho kongku hoba kho sungjung hauan phoshang khünei phoku dogo kümbei. Kho tegü haoenei chalou angboua kümbei, hoba nam juong yoshaikei.
Hobaje Choba si Jehoiadaei
Kho tegü kümbüleibü shuongei kümbei hoba haoenei kümsilei kho haoeneibü ikei kümjung haukei, hoba haoenei Mühghaüeibü chem kho küpjembo phokuko kho hau kitikei.
Hobaje ladang haoenei yeikei, haoenei joubü nam kho Jehoiada si Choba jungto sungbakei, hoba khoei
Lausikei Jehoiada baushi hoba poei onan hao haikei, hao haijinei po saongao to khujin kikei.
Hobaje haoenei hao Dawid sangnyu Choba shuong yoa khünkei, aishanga haoei Israela Mühghaü shanga hoba haoeibü lembüchem shanga maibü kümbei.
Tou Jehoiada haian phaia Jihudabü konglebü leiyeibü shuong loukei hoba Choba suthetkei. Kheijinei Chobaei haoen ngüha lekei.
Hobaje haoenei
Khei yingsi dogokei haoen
Hobaje Mühghaü soushou Jehoiada ungshedboueibü shou Zekharia thükto loukei, hoba mütshuong thüka hao lokei, hoba haoen to laukei, “Mühghaüei hai lauda, ‘Kan thusinaang amailabü, aieilausi kanei
Hobaje haoei ngo khulimbo huon takkei hoba Choba sakkubüei
Kho tegü Joash Chobaei Zekhariaeibü bou Jeho- iadaei hao to sanou lenbü kho adamen, lausikei hao shou haitikei. Hao haijinei haoei laukei, “

Po thonlam toje Siriabü sepai shuong Joash khulimbo longkei, hoba haoen Jihuda si Jerusalem khulimbo loukei hoba müt yoa konglebü pendou mautikei, hoba haoen ka soletbü pendou Damaskabü Choba jungto hautikei.
Khei Siriabü sepai tan hanbü che ong lousi dogokei

Ladang haoenei hao aeibou leilutian apyoan satkei, haoeibü yaangenbü danei hao khulimbo huon takkei, aieilausi haoei Jehoiada ungshedboueibü shoueibü sii phinkei; hoba haoenei hao yepshanga haitikei. Hibü hao haikei, hoba haoenei hao Dawid sangnyua khünkei, lausikei haoenei hao Choba shuongeibü heea akhün.
Hao khulimbo huon takbü shuong kho Ammon sao Shimeateibü shou Zabad, hoba Moab sao Shimriteibü shou Jehozabad kikei.
Haoeibü shousi shuong shanga hao khulimbo onat juong shanga hoba
Amaziaei songdakla khangjinei hao po saoto ngao kikei, hoba haoei Jerusalema po saoto gü songdakkei; hoba haoeibü nyueibü nyen Jehoaddan Jerusalemsao kikei.
Hobaje haoei
Hobaje sangle kho haoeibü ika kaangkhühtham yeijinei hao bou haitibü sambü shuong kho haoei haitikei.
Lausikei haoeneibü shousi shuongje haoei ühaiti, lausikei

Kheijinei Amaziaei Jihudabü mütli shuong kamshaitikei hoba haoen chung then kibü hima, Jihuda si Benjamin chung hajar hoba saongao leiyeibü shuong phanga phokukei, hoba haoei po saoche ka thükae pakkei, hoba wapyola hauenlabü phai hoba aubu si aih jungla thükbü hajar saongao sem kikei.
Hobaje chandinam seret khujin bang atbü saongao lu haoei tokei Israel ka maangkaangbü müt hajar saongao munam kuan lekei.
Lausikei Mühghaü müt che louan laukei, “O Choba, Israelbü sepai tan ka yoa tohauti; aishanga
Lausikei kho thüng no wapyoa hau kilabü dogo damalonga, Mühghaüei dangbou thedanga no tuongtilabü; aishanga thuila hoba tuongtila Mühghaü to sei kia.”

Hobaje Amaziaei Mühghaü müt to laukei, “Lausikei ngei Israelbü sepai tan la chandinam seret khujin bang atbü saongao kubü kho lai kümla?” Hobaje Mühghaü müt khoei jongaiko laukei, “Kho toje aei juongbou kula
Kheijinei Efraim ka hao jungto loubü sepai tan nyibou chem to ngaitikei, hoba haoen Jihuda to aeibou khauangkei, hoba hatla moklabü che khau angan chem to ngaikei.
Lausikei Amazia maangkaangkei, hoba haoeibü mütshuong leian haukei, hoba jem yomang pholi khüto haukei hoba Seirbü hajar an wapbei.
Hobaje Jihudabüei lubü hajar an langsenkei, hoba haoen laanglak to leian angkei hoba laanglak ka tekan yantikei, hoba haoen pendou netla yeiko phetnyinkei.
Lausikei Amaziaei ngaitibü sepai tan shuong aoyou yoa lason to ohauti haoenei Jihuda sangnyu shuong shikei; Samaria ka Beth- horon sühko hoba hajar sem haitikei, hoba peisilei juong solangkei.
Edombü haitibü ka Amazia longeian phaia haoei Seir mühghaü shuong sungbakei, hoba haoeibü mühghaü shanga phokei, hoba haoen lembei, hoba khübü la lembü kukei.
Hibü

Lausikei hao joyoko kijinei Chobaei hao to laukei, “Künei no Choba la songsido kubou che yeitikei sai? Nangashi! No aila haimangsühda?” Hibü thuseibü khoei nangkei, lausikei laukei, “Mühghaüei no mautila maang angenan kia dogo ngei ngekei, aieilausi nyi ho kümbei hoba lenbü adit.”
Kheijinei Jihudabü Choba Amaziaei songsido lekei, hoba Israelbü Choba Jehueibü shou Jehoazeibü shou Joash jungto hautiko laukei, “Kaiya, sen theshuok haüyokho.”

Hobaje Israelbü Choba Joashei Jihudabü Choba Amazia jungto ngüh hautiko laukei, “Lebanona jakham cheei Lebanona cedar bulong to kaibü nouyangnyu küneibü shoueibü yak la lela labü dogo lauan hautikei, hoba Lebanon yamkabü meisiau cheei jakham kho nakeikei.
Nyi lauda, ‘Chühashi ngei Edom to ngümbei,’ hoba kaibü maangpon yonglambo yaangan apbei. Lausikei tou chema kiashi; aila no hoba ka yoa Jihuda yoan tuonglabü lele nyi khonsak sungbakukei?”
Lausikei Amaziaei ngüha ale; aishanga kho Mühghaü ka kikei, haoei haoen dangbou ik to haoen kula shanga; aieilausi haoenei Edombü mühghaü shuong lambei.
Hibü Israelbü Choba Joash angkei; hoba hao hoba Jihudabü Choba Amazia Jihudabüeibü Bethshemesa lasona cheei che to haüyokei.
Hobaje Israelbüei Jihuda thükkei, hoba mütpem weko jembü chem to satkei.

Hobaje Israelbü Choba Joash Beth Shemesha Jehoaha- zeibü shou, Joaseibü shou Jihudabü Choba Amazia lapbei, hoba hao Jerusalem to sungbakei, hoba Jerusalem kümthang Efraim Bakhün ka Chemnyek Bakhün sühko iknop saongao lei leilukei.

Hobaje haoei hon si chandinam pendou sokei, Mühghaüeibü chema hapbü thungsiphau pendou, hoba khübü yoa Obed-Edom yoan; haoei tokei Chobaeibü chem kabü nyaksinam hoba lapan kibü mütshuong sokei, hoba Samaria to hao sepeijung ngaikei.
Hobaje Jihudabü Choba Joasheibü shou Amazia, Israelbü Choba Jehoahazeibü shou Joas haian phaia po anthükngao lang kikei.
Tou Amaziaeibü joubü kümsilei khangbü ka thonbü sühko Jihuda si Israelbü Choba shuongeibü lea doan aki lo?
Haoei
Hobaje haoenei hao kolia sungbakei, hoba Dawid sangnyua bousi shuong yoa khünkei.
Kheijinei Jihudabü pendouei Uzzia lekei, hoba hao po anthüklak kikei, hoba hao bou Amazia jeiko hao Choba yeitikei.
Bousi shuong yoa Choba kho yepan phaia haoei Elot dangkei hoba nyibou Jihuda la kukei.
Uzzia songdakla khangjinei hao po anthüklak kikei, hoba Jerusalema haoei po anjinsem to nyi songdakkei, hao nyueibü nyen Jekolia Jerusalemsao kikei.
Hao bou Amaziaei kümbü pendou haoei
Haoei jembü lolo Zekhariaeibü chaloua
Hao haukei hoba Filistiabü khulimbo wapyokei, hoba Gat kümthang, Jabne kümthang, hoba Ashdod kümthang leilutikei. Haoei Ashdod hoba Filistia nyangko sangnyu shuong pendou kümetkei.
Hobaje Filistiabü khulimbo hoba Gurbaala kibü Arabbü hoba Menuatbü khulimbo Mühghaüei hao to thuikei.
Ammonbüei Uzzia la khüm kukei, hoba haoeibü nyenhang Ijep leilang sühko phinthonko haukei, aishanga hao aeibou hau kian apbei.
Tokei Uzziaei Jerusalem chemnyek bakhüna hoba yomang bakhüna hoba nongbü saibüa laangchem dangkei hoba khübü kho thangetko kúmbei.

Hobaje yamlamanga haoei laangchem shuong dangkei, hoba deikhün juong thuyetan kümbei, aieilausi haoei samkeisamuk juong shongh youa kikei. Haoei sekmou chemmou maangdakkei hoba semlüh sek juong moukei.
Tokei Uzziaei wapyolabü sepai tan kikei, hoba kho Jeli dobou hoba ikjaibou Maaseia, Hannaniaei sakkubü tegü, kho Chobaeibü lajamleibou yoa che, haoen lühbak webü tegü tan tan kikei.
Chung jaishou then lühbak danko lakjaibü shuong kho hajar nyito saongao lak.
Haoen phanga tokei sepai tan hajar saongao sem to nyet hoba saongao ngao, haoenei dangbou khulimbo Choba to thuila hau yaangbü yoa wapyola thükan kikei.
Hobaje Uzziaei haoen shanga khei tan pendou shanga aih, aubu, nameibü khun, wapyobü hele laujin hoba wenlaang lamlekukei.

Jerusalema haoei maanglimaangsang mütshuongei lamenbü laujin kiplabü hoba laang yaangbü tekla shanga enjin laangchem thüka hoba chemnyeka küman kikei. Hobaje haoeibü nyen saabüa sühko hangenkei, aieilausi hao hau aki shongko Mühghaüei hao to kaang thuikei.
Lausikei hao hau kiko yeisi hao jembü maulabü shanga yonglaman apbei, hoba haoei haoeibü Mühghaü khulimbo ngühkhüm leilukei; aishanga haoei lemshanga jen juokla
Hobaje hao phai to Azaria ungshedbou atkei, hoba
Hobaje haoen Uzzia Choba khulimbo lokei, hoba hao to laukei, “Uzzia,
Kheijinei Uzzia khau angko maangpokkei, jen juokla haoeibü ika phaushou kikei, hoba ungshedbou shuong to hao maangpokko kijinei

Hobaje thükkabou ungshedbou Azaria hoba ungshedbou pendouei hao to chühkei hoba chühashi, haoeibü khüngjaa im kikei. Hobaje haoenei hao tongde thongan angtikei, hoba hao hao lolo angla panteiko kikei, aieilausi
Hobaje Uzzia Choba hao haibü chalou sühko im bauan kikei, hoba im bausije chem lubü chenei kikei, aishanga
Tou Uzziaeibü joubü kümsilei khangbü ka thonbü sühko Amozeibü shou Isaia thuseibouei doakei.

Hobaje Uzzia bousi shuong yoa yepbei, hoba haoenei hao bousi shuong yoa Choba shuong khünshang nyangko khünkei, aishanga haoenei laukei, “Hao la im baua.” Hobaje haoeibü shou Jothamei hao jeila songdakkei.
Jotham songdakla khangjinei po sao to ngao kikei; hoba haoei Jerusalema po anthüklak songdakkei; hoba haoeibü nyu nyen Jerusha Zadokeibü shou kikei.
Hobaje haoeibü bou Uzziaei kümbü tegü haoei
Haoei
Tokei haoei Jihuda shongh kaodaka sangnyu shuong kümbei hoba yama haoei lapheishon si laangchem shuong dangkei.

Haoei tokei Ammonbü to wapyokei hoba haoen thükkei. Hobaje Ammonbüei khüpo tham hao la chandinam seret khujin bang atbü saongao, hoba whet youshou hajar saongao hoba barli youshou hajar an kukei. Sembou leibou pokei Ammon büei hao la juong kukei.
Hibü Jotham hau yaang yeikei, aieilausi haoei jembü lam
Tou Jothameibü joubü kümsilei hoba haoei wapyobü pendou hoba haoeibü lamnyu shuong, chühashi, khübü kho Jihuda si Israelbü Choba shuong lea doan kia.
Haoei songdakla khangjinei hao po saoto ngao kikei, hoba Jerusalema po anthüklak songdakkei.
Hobaje Jotham haoeibü bousi shuong yoa yepbei, hoba haoenei hao Dawid sangnyua khünkei; hoba haoeibü shou Ahazei hao jeila songdakei.
Ahazei songdakla khangjinei po saoche kikei, hoba haoei po anthüklak Jerusalema songdakkei; hoba
Lausikei haoei Israelbü Choba shuong lama paikei, hoba tokei Baal shuong shanga namdei jonbü noksa heangsho kümbei.
Tokei haoei Hinnom yomanga jen juokkei hoba
Hobaje haoei haitibü juokbü lembü kukei, hoba shongh lemshanga shonghkhua hoba bulong phanga jen juokkei.
Khei yingsije
Aishanga Ramaliaeibü shou Pekaei Jihudaa chalou chenei hajar saongao to saoche haitikei, haoen pendou kho maangkaangbü mütshuong; aieilausi haoenei
Hobaje Efraimbü hauki yaangkibü müt che Zikri, haoei Chobaeibü shou Maaseia, Chobaeibü chema leiyeibou Azrikam hoba Choba to thenbou Elkana haitikei.
Hobaje Israelbü shousi shuongei haoeneibü shousi shuong hoba jaisinasi, yaksa shuong, langsenkei; hoba haoen ka solangbü peisilei juong sunglangkei, hoba kho Samaria to sungbakei.
Lausikei khünei
Hobaje tou kanei Jihuda si Jerusalembü shousi bousu yaksa shuong aaola lela huongda; lausikei kan yoakei
Hibü tou kanei kü to ditshi, hoba kaneibü jaisinasi shuong kanei langsenbü shuong kho ngaitiashi; aieilausi

Kheijinei wapyo ka loubü shuong khulimbo Efraimeibü shousi shuong atei Johananeibü shou Azaria Meshillemoteibü shou Berekia. Shallumeibü shou Jehekia, hoba Haldaieibü shou Amasa, haoen lokei, hoba haoen to laukei,
kanei hato langsenbü shuong leian aloujan; aishanga tou kibü küneibü shedbü shabü to aei jinyokubü kanei
Hibü in si aubu jungbü shuongei lapjung loubü shuong hoba soletbü peisilei shuong konglebü shuong si kaman kibü tan thedanga phokukei.

Hobaje nyen shenko laubü mütshuong kho meimeikei hoba langsenbü shuong kho leibakei, hoba soletbü peisilei ka haoen yoa mütkong kibü pendou la neitikei, haoen la youkhap kukei, shaula yunglabü sungbakukei, hoba onang naangla hoba haoen yoa hau akibü gadua settikei, haoenei jembü jaisina jungto Loulong Sangnyu kibü Jerikho to leibakei. Kho phaia haoen Samaria to ngaikei.
Kho jiha Ahaz Chobaei Assiriabü Choba jungto hao to thuila shanga hautikei.
Aishanga Edombü nyibou louan Jihuda shikei, hoba müt laplangkei.

Filistiabü ikei yomang sangnyu shuong hoba Jihuda yungkük shikei, hoba Bethshemes, Aijalon, Gederot, Soko hoeibü sangnyu shuong yoan, Temna, hoeibü sangnyu shuong yoan, Gimzo hoeibü sangnyu shuong yoan lekei, hoba haoen khünei kikei.
Aieilausi Israelbü Choba Ahaz laüa
Hobaje Assiriabü Choba Tiglath Pileser hao jungto loukei, hoba hao hau kitikhoulabü jeiko thushed kukei.
Hobaje Ahazei
Hobaje haoeibü jeteibü thusheda Ahaz Chobaei

Aishanga Damaskabü mühghaü shuong laobouei hao thükenkei, haoen la haitibü lembü kukei, hoba haoei laukei, “Siriabü Choba shuongeibü mühghaü shuongei haoen to thuikei, hibü ngei haoen la haitibü lembü kü to thuitila kulabü.” Lausikei khübü kho hao hoba Israelbü pendou shanga maulabü kikei.
Hobaje Ahazei Mühghaü chema thung si phau shuong yoshaikei, hoba Mühghaüeibü chema kibü thungsi phau shuong netla yeiko wapnyinkei, hoba
Hobaje
Tou haoeibü joubü kümsilei haoeibü lamthen pendou khangbü hoba thonbü, to chühshi, khübü kho Jihuda si Israel Choba shuongeibü lea doan kia.
Hobaje Ahaz bousi shuong yoa yepbei, hoba haoenei haoeibü sangnyua khei Jerusalema khünkei, aishanga haoenei hao Choba shuongeibü hee to asungba, hoba haoeibü shou Hezekiaei hao jeiko songdakkei.
Hezekiaei songdakla khangjinei hao po saoto ngao kikei; hoba haoei Jerusalema po saoto gü songdakkei, hoba haoeibü nyu nyen Abija, Zekhariaeibü nouyangshou kikei.
Hobaje
Haoei haoeibü songdakbü po sao to ngaoboubü shaangbou lita
Hobaje haoei ungshedbou shuong si Levi shuong leian lotkei, hoba chaangbou ae hopabü kaoena kamtikei, hoba haoen to laukei,
“Ngeibü ngüha leashi, kan Levibü shuong, tou kan lolo saüenashi, hoba
Aishanga seneibü pisibou shuongei shed shona, hoba
“Hobaje chemso koukap shuong khinan apbei, hoba wanthung nyettikei, hoba jen ajuok, ayingsi Israel Mühghaü la saoposhanga juokbü lembü aku.
Khei yingbüei
Aishanga ditashi, seneibü bousi shuong inei tuonga, hoba seneibü bousu yaksa shousi shuong kho shanga thüngshanga kia.
“Tou
Kü shousi shuong tou maang akuko teki; aishanga

Kheijinei Levi shuong meimeikei, Amasaeibü shou Mahat, Azariaeibü shou Joel, Kohatbü shousi shuong hoba Merarieibü shousi shuong, Abdieibü shou Kish, Jehalleleleibü shou Azaria; hoba Gershombü Zimmaeibü shou Joa, Joaeibü shou Eden;
Eliazafaneibü shousi shuong Shimri hoba Jeuel; Asafeibü shousi shuong Zekharia, hoba Mattania;
hoba Hemaneibü shousi shuong Jehuel hoba Shimei; Jeduthuneibü shousi shuong Shemaia hoba Uzziel.
Hobaje haoenei haoeneibü jaisinasi shuong ngashaikei, hoba haoen lolo saüenkei, hoba
Hobaje ungshedbou shuong
Tou shaangboubü lit shaangbou nyet khangkei, hoba lit setboubüa haoen
Kheijinei haoen Chobaeibü chem chemmaang Hezekia Choba jungto atkei, hoba laukei, “Künei
Tokei Ahaz Chobaei haoei songdakjinei haoei shed shonbü apbü thungsiphau pendou künei lamlea hoba saüena; hoba chühashi, khübü kho
Kheijinei Hezekia tongde pikei, hoba sangnyua leiyeibü shuong kamtikei, hoba
Hobaje masu pongsu nyet, sanlon paang nyet, hoba lon nyet sangle shanga, shabü lembü shanga, saoposhang lemshanga hoba Jihuda shanga haoenei sungbakei. Hobaje haoei Aroneibü shousi shuongto

Hibü haoenei masu pongsu shuong haitikei hoba ungshedbou shuongei sii kho sungkei, hoba kho lemshanga lakkei; hoba haoenei sanlon paang shuong haitikei, hoba sii kho lemshanga lakkei, hoba haoenei sanlon shoushou shuong haitikei, hoba sii kho lemshanga lakkei.
Hobaje shedbü lembü shanga haoenei lon paang kho Choba si kambü shuong thedang to nyangko jungan loukei, hoba khübü to haoenei ikkei shangetkei.

Hobaje ungshedbü shuongei khübü kho haitikei hoba haoenei lemshang thüka sii naangkuko Israelbü pendou shanga shedbü ka angbü lembei; aieilausi Chobaei Israelbü pendou shanga juokbü lembü hoba shedbü shanga lembü kujan dogo ngühkhüm kukei.
Hobaje
Hobaje Levibü shuongei Dawidei kongkin shuong hoba thuseibü shuongei teklaang jungan lokei.
Hobaje Hezekiaei lemshanga juokbü lembü kula sakkukei, hoba juokbü lembü kho kula khangjinei
Kambü shuong pendouei lembo kijinei chia laubü shuongeikei chia, hoba teklaang metbü shuongei teklaang metkei, ho pendou juokbü lembü awan shongko kikei.
Hobaje ladang haoenei lembü kubü thonkei, Choba si hao yoa yobü pendouei khüpetko lembei.
Tokei Hezekia Choba si yaangenbü shuongei Levibü shuong to Dawid chia hoba chühenbü Asafeibü ngüh shuongei
Kheijinei Hezekiaei laukei, “Tou kan jembü lolo
Hobaje kambü danei sungbabü juokbü lembü kho masu pongsu anjinlei, sanlon paang saongao hoba san shoushou saoan; khübü pendou
Hobaje saüenbü peisilei shuong kho masu pongsu saongao lak hoba sanlon hajar sem.

Lausikei ungshedbou shuong kho shisho ong kikei, hibü khoei juokbü lembü pendouje alonkhümti, hibü khoei kümsilei kho athon shongko hoba ungshedbou shuong haoen lolo asaüen shongko haoeneibü jaisina Levi shuongei haoen to thuikei; aishanga ungshedbou shuong toje Levibü shuongeibü maangpona saüenla shanga aei dambü haübou kikei.
Juokbü lembü juong kibü to aeian sangmai lembü haabü, hoba juokbü lembü shanga yunglabü lembü kikei. Kho tegü
Hobaje Mühghaüei mütshuong shanga lamlekubü shanga Hezekia hoba mütli pendouei olinyokei, aieilausi kümsilei kho hakde ong haüthükkei.
Tou Hezekiaei Israelbü pendou hoba Jihudabü pendou jungto ngala hautikei hoba Efraim si Manasse jungto le hautikei,
Aieilausi Choba si haoeibü yaangenbü shu- ongei hoba Jerusalema kamshaibü pendouei lit nyiboubüa püetbü lem kila ngühthang yenkei.
Aieilausi ungshedbou shuong haoen lolo müt souko saüenan akisije hoba mütshuongeikei haoen lolo Jerusalema kamshaian akibü haangjung kho chaloua kho kila athükko kikei.
Kho tegü Choba si kambü shuong pendou thedanga kümsilei kho tükde kikei.
Hibü Beersheba ka Dan sühko, khei haoen Jerusalema
Hibü Israel si Jihuda pendou jungto Choba si yaangenbü shuong ka Chobaei sakkubü tegü kan Israel shousi shuong
“Kaneibü bousi shuong hoba kaneibü jaisinasi shuong tegü teki, aoyouei haoeneibü
Kaneibü bousi shuong tegü kan ngüm tekaang, lausikei kan lolo
Aieilausi kan
Hibü ngühlang künbü sangnyu che ka sangnyu che danko Zebulun sühko haukei; lausikei haoenei haoen la nyikukei hoba awealau.
Asher, Manasse, hoba Zebulunbü shuong shisho ong haoen lolo ngüha leko Jerusalem to loukei.
Choba si yaangenbü shuongei
Hobaje mütshuong tan yaangbü che tokai ajinbü wentek lem lila lit nyiboubüa Jerusalem to yoshaikei.
Haoenei kümlaleila khangkei hoba Jerusalema kibü lemshang kho sungan apbei hoba jen juokla shanga lemshanga kibü pendou kho haoenei sunglangkei hoba Kedron koukhüna jinkukei.
Hobaje lit nyetboubü chalou anthük leiboubüa püetbü lem san shoushou kho haitikei. Hobaje ungshedbou shuong si Levi shuong himou bautikei, hibü haoen lolo saüenkei, hoba
Mühghaü müt Mosaeibü ngühkhüm tegü haoen lulueibü kümaleia lokei, Levi shuongeibü ik ka sungbü kho ungshedbou shuongei lakkei.
Aieilausi shuong yoa juong lulu lolo asaüenko kikei; hibü Levi shuongei asaüenko kibü mütpem weko shanga kho
Aishanga müt juong khei Efraim, Manasse, Issakar, hoba Zebulunbü juong asaopoko kikei, lausikei doan kibü tegü ayingko püetbü lem shaukei, aieilausi Hezekiaei haoen shanga welauko laukei,
“Aoei
Hobaje
Hobaje Jerusalema yoan kibü shuong olinbü yaangbüei tokai ajinbü wentek lem kho chalou weko haoeneibü hau pendouei
Kheijinei Hezekiaei Levibü shuong aoyouei
Hibü mütshuongei chalou nyet, sangmai lembü haitikei hoba haoeneibü pisibou Mühghaü
Kheijinei kamshaibü pendouei tokei chalou nyetnyet lem kho lila maangangenkei, hoba chalou nyetnyet olinbüei noukei.

Aieilausi Jihudabü Choba Hezekiaei kambü shuong la masu pongsu hajar che hoba sanlon hajar nyet lembü kukei, hoba yaangbü shuongei kamshaibü shuong la masu pongsu hajar che, sanlon hajar an kukei. Hobaje ungshedbou shuong juongei lulu lolo saüenkei.
Hibü Jihuda ka louan yobü khümbo hoba Levibü si ungshedbou shuong Israel ka longbü kamshaibü khümbo hoba Israel kaodak ka louan yobü shuong hoba Jerusalem ka louan yobü shuong olinyokei.
Hibü Jerusalema olinbü yaang kikei, aieilausi Israel Choba Dawideibü shou Solomon chalou ka ho tegü Jerusalema kian achüh.
Hibü ungshedbou shuong hoba Levi shuong meimeikei hoba müt shuong haükukei, hoba haoeneibü ngühlang ditkei, hoba haoeneibü welau khuthüka haoeibü saoposhang onlangkei.

Tou ladang ho pendou wankei, yoan kibü Israelbü pendou Jihudabü sangnyu shuong lambo haukei hoba saopobü thaonyu shuong netla yeiko ngümnyinkukei hoba Asheram akan koutikei, hoba lemshang shongh hoba lemshang Jihuda si Benjamin, Efraim hoba Manasse pendoua haoenei pendou amauti shongko leilukukei. Kheijinei Israelbü pendou jembü sangnyu shuong to mütpem weko lulu kishang lambo ngaikei.
Hobaje Hezekiaei ungshedbou shuong hoba Levibü shuong janyinbü pienkei, mütpem weko jembü janletbü kümsilei den lulu, ungshedbou shuong hoba Levibü shuong, juokbü lembü hoba sangmai lembü shanga
Chobaei haoei kibü ka lembü kho juokbü lembü shanga kikei; ngeyang si chasem juokbü lembü hoba Nounyet shanga juokbü lembü, lit haanbü lemsilang janenbü,
Hobaje Jerusalema kibü to ungshedbou si Levi shuongeibü phejan kula sakkukei, khei haoenei
Sakkubü ngühkhüm kho phinthonjinei Israelbüei shaangbü buhek deihek, youshou, semlühdei, onang, naodei, hoba sek ka longbü pendou kukei, hoba haoenei ajanjan pendou ka an phejan juong sungbakei.
Hobaje Jihudabü sangnyu shuonga kibü Israelbü si Jihudabü mütliei masu si sanlon an phejan hoba
Litnyu nyetboubüa haoenei yoshaian kibü kho che la haushaikei hoba khübü kho lit nyetboubüa küpjembei.
Ladang Hezekia hoba haoeibü yaangenbü shuongei yoshaian phobü kho hapbei, haoenei
Hobaje Hezekiaei ungshedbou shuong si Levibü shuong to yoshaian kibü jongsak shanga pheyokei.
Thükkabü ungshedbou Azaria, ao Zadok chemdang ka kikei, haoei hao to jongaiko laukei, “Haoenei
Kheijinei Hezekiaei haoen la
Hobaje haoenei maangkuko lembei, an phejan hoba khümbo kubü peisilei shuong sungbakei. Khübü thüka ikjaibou kongnyubou kho Konania kikei, hoba haoeibü na Shimei nyiboubü la lean kikei.

Jehiel, Azaria, Nahat, Asahel, Jerimot, Jezabad, Elil, Ismakhia, Mahat, hoba Banania khübü kho Hezekia Choba si Mühghaüeibü chema haoeibü konglebou Azaria pienbü tegütham, Konania hoba haoeibü na Shimei phanga ikjaibü shuong kikei.
Hobaje Levibü Imnaeibü shou Kare, chaangbou ae bakhün lombou kho Mühghaü la maangmai lembü kubü thüka bunyu kikei,
Eden, Miniamin, Jeshua, Shemaia, Amaria, hoba Shekania, haoenei maangkuko sangnyu shuonga ungshedbou thuiko haoeneibü jaisina si shuong phejan jankuko chingbü, nashou lulu thüng janan lekei.
Chungeibü ngühlia doan kibü to limbo bousu shuong po sem ka thükae aoyou
Ungshedbou shuong nyen dobü kho haoenei bousu shuongeibü lin ka kikei; Levibü kho po saoche jaishou hoba thükaeei jembü kümsilei tegü tan tana kikei.
Ungshedbou shuong haoen haoeneibü nashou hanbü shuong, haoeneibü yaksi shuong, haoeneibü shousi shuong, haoeneibü nouyangshousi shuong tan khümbo nyen doan kikei.

Hobaje Aroneibü shousi shuong, ungshedbou shuong, ao- youeibü sanglea kikei haoeneibü sangnyu shuonga kikei, sangnyu shishoa ungshedbou shuong yoa bousu weko hoba Levibü yoa aoyou nyen doan kikei haoen la phejan kula nyen kuan kikei.
Kho tegü Hezekiaei Jihuda pendoua kümbei; hoba

Hobaje Mühghaüeibü chem kümaleia haoei sungletbü kümsilei pendou ngühkhüm hoba sakkubü tegütham hao hoba Mühghaü lambüa haoei hatlepbü kümsilei wekoa haoei haoeibü maangpon khümboei kümbei hoba khoei hao naangmaikei.
Ho kümsilei hoba maanglemenbü kümsilei phaia Assiriabü Choba Sennakherib louan Jihuda shikei hoba haoei thüklabü dogo daman lapheishon shibü sangnyu shuong kho khulimbo la thokei.
Hobaje ladang Hezekiaei Sennakherib louan Jerusalem khulimbo wapyola shanga loukei dogo chühenkei,
haoei sangnyu thükaenei yungdei kibü dei kho thaktila shanga haoeibü leiyeibü shuong hoba lakjaibü shuong yoa ngüh küpjembei; hoba haoenei hao to thuikei.
Hobaje müt juong kamshaikei, hoba haoeneibü deikhün pendou hoba kaonyek danko koubü shumang kho thaktiko laukei, “Aila Assiriabü Choba shuongei louan dei juong hapla?”
Haoei maangnyu angko kümtikei hoba leiluan kibü kümthang pendou phokei hoba kho thüka laangchem huongkei, hoba Dawid sangnyua haoei Millo hau kitikei. Haoei tokei in si aubu hoba aih juong kümbei.
Hobaje haoei mütli thüka lajamleibü shuong phokukei, hoba sangnyu bakhüna haoen hao jungto kamshaitikei, hoba haoen maang haksoko joyoko laukei,
“Hau kiashi, hoba olinangko kishi, Assiriabü Choba shanga hatko ayingsi mokko teki, ayingsi hao yoa kibü tan pendou khüto tehüt, aieilausi hao yoa kibü khotoje sen yoa kibü yaangbou che kia.
Hao yoa pheeibü in si aubu ki, lausikei sen yoaje sen to thuila hoba seneibü lason wapyola
Kho phaia Assiriabü Choba Sennakheribei hao khangenbü shuong Jerusalem to Jihudabü Choba Hezekia jungto ngühlang hautikei, hoba Jerusalema kibü Jihudabü pendou jungto hautiko,
“Assiriabü Choba Sennakheribei hai lauda, Jerusalem shibü natko haiteila kanei ainei maanglemda?
Mühsinou hoba deilaei haitilabü lele, ‘Assiriabü Choba ik ka seneibü
Ho Hezekiaei kanei lemshang chenei lemlabü hoba kho thüka jen juoklabü dogo Jihuda si Jerusalem la sakkuko haoeibü lemshang shongh hoba lemshang sunglangkei aying lo?
Kaonyek kabü mütli pendou to ngo hoba kübousi shuongei ai kümbei kanei angekei lo? Kaonyeka phangshuongeibü mühghaü shuongei ngeibü ik ka haoen püetla thükan kikei lo?
Kaneibü Mühghaüei ngeibü ik ka kan püetlabü lele, kübousi shuongei lemailela mautibü phangshuongeibü mühghaü pendou yoa kü ik ka jembü mütli püetla thükbü ao ki?

Hibü tou Hezekiaei kan tehuonetti, ayingsi kanei hao to mai telem; aieilausi ai phangeibü mühghaüeikei ayingsi sangleei ngeibü ik ka hoba kübousi shuongeibü ik ka jembü mütli püetla thükan akitei; kaneibü Mühghaüei ong ai ngeibü ik ka khümenla thükla!”
Hobaje haoeibü khangenbü shuongei toukei aei
Tokei haoei, Israelbü Mühghaü,
Hobaje haoenei hatlenko hoba haoen khonkutila haoenei ngüh yaangbüei Ibribü ngühyema kümthanga Jerusalembü to haoenei sangnyu kho lelabü dogo ngekkei.
Hobaje haoenei Jerusalembü shanga kaodakbü mühghaü shuong tegü müteibü ikei kümbü kümsilei la yeitiko laueikei.
Hobaje Hezekia Choba si Amozeibü shou Isaiaei ho shangabü welaua Mühghaü to ngekkei.
Hobaje
Assiriabü Choba Sennakheribeibü ik ka hoba lubüeibü ik pendou ka
Hobaje juongei Jerusalem to hoba Jihudabü Choba Hezekia jungto namsek peisilei jongsak sungbakei; hibü kho chalou ka phang pendouei Hezekia nyenhanga tonenkei.
Kho jihsiphaia Hezekia hailabü lele shatkei; hoba haoei
Lausikei Hezekiaei hao la ku kubü tegü angaitiku, aishanga haoeibü maangpona yonglambo kikei; hibü hao hoba Jihuda hoba Jerusalem thükto
Lausikei Hezekiaei haoeibü maangpon yonglambü shanga hao lolo sang sembei, hao hoba Jerusalema kibü shuong; hibü Hezekia chalouaje Mühghaü khauang haoen thükto alou.

Hobaje Hezekiaeibü nyaksinam juong hoba nyenhang yaang kikei, hoba haoei habü shanga thanshang, chandinam shanga, hon shanga, namsek laang shanga, ponlem hibü shanga, aih shanga, namsek chaksiam phang pendou shanga kümbei.
