Youshou, ih, hoba onang habü shanga thanshang; hoba meisiau phang pendou hoba sanlon shuongeibü chem dangkei.
Kho tegü jembü shanga sangnyu shuong hoba sanlon tan hoba masu tan shanga juong kümbei; aieilausi Mühghaüei hao la nyaksinam juong kukei.
Hobaje Hezekiaei ong Gihon dei shuong thükkabou deikhün thangetkei, hoba khübü kho Dawid sangnyu chanep aeto tangshaitham leijung koukei. Hobaje haoeibü kümsilei pendoua naang maikei.
Khei yingsikei Babilon Chobaeibü youkobü shuong aoyouei hao jungto kaonyeka tetsida kümbü shanga pheyola hautikei, Mühghaüei haoeibü maangpona ai ki pendou ngela shanga takteila khei phokukei.
Tou Hezekiaeibü joubü kümsilei kho hoba haoeibü kümsilei maibü kho, chühashi, khübü kho Jihuda hoba Israelbü Choba shuongeibü lea, Amozeibü shou Isaia thuseiboueibü mangsanga doan kia.

Hobaje Hezekia bousi shuong yoa yepbei, hoba haoenei hao Dawideibü shousi shuongeibü heedang aeto angshanga khünkei. Hobaje Jihuda si Jerusalema kibü pendouei hao haijinei souhat lenkei, hoba haoeibü shou Manasseei hao jeila songdakkei.
Manasseei songdakla khangjinei, hao po anthüknyi kikei; hoba haoei Jerusalema po anjinsem to ngao songdakkei.
Hobaje Israel shousi shuong thedang ka

Aishanga haobou Hezekiaei leilutibü shongh lemshang kho haoei nyibou kümetkei, hoba Baal shuong shanga haoeibü lemshang kümbei, hoba Asherot kümbei, hoba müha kibü pendou kho lembei, hoba haoen khangenkei.
Jerusalema ngeibü nyen ponpen kilabü dogo
Hobaje
Haoei haoeibü shousi shuong Hinnom yomanga wana jikkei, seibü- yaübü kümsilei hoba thulenbü manghdakbü hoba khopjikseibü jungto haukei; haoei
Hobaje haoei kümbü noksa

Hobaje Israelbüei ong ngühkhüm pendou takletbü ngühkhüm hoba Mosa danko kubü songa kibü ngühkhüm ngei haoen la sakkubü pendou maangsangko kümbo laualonga, touje ngei kaneibü pisibou la kubü kaodak ka you ayaütilabü.”
Manasseei Jihuda si Jerusalema kibü suletkei khoei Israel thedanga
Hobaje
Hibü
Hobaje ladang hao khonku khonsaka kikei haoei
Haoei hao to welaukei, hoba Mühghaüei haoei subüjabü sungletkei hoba haoeibü welau ditkei, hoba nyibou haoeibü sangle Je- rusalem to sungbakei. Kheijinei ong Manasseei

Phaila haoei Gihon chanep ae Dawid sangnyua Ngau Bakhün aeto atshang kümthang thükkabou kümbei, hoba kho Ofel sühko dangjung haukei, hoba kho aeibou suokan kümbei; haoei tokei Jihuda lapheishon kibü sangnyu pendoua lajamleibü shuong phokei.
Hobaje
Haoei tokei
Khei yingsikei mütshuongei tokei shongh lemshanga lembü kukei, lausikei kho
Tou Manasseeibü joubü kümsilei, hoba Mühghaü to haoei welaubü, hoba

Hobaje haoeibü welau hoba Mühghaüei lai haoeibü subüjabü sungletkei, hoba haoeibü shabü hoba haoeibü maanglem akibü hoba hao lolo eaaoa ayeijinei haoei shongh lemshang kümbü shanga Asherim hoba noksa phobü chühashi, haoeneibü lüngbüdobüa doan kia.
Khünei Manasse haoeibü bousi shuong yoa yepbei, hoba haoenei hao haoeibü chema khünkei, hoba hao shou Amonei hao jeila songdakkei.
Hobaje Amon songdakla khangjinei po sao to nyi kikei, hoba haoei Jerusalema po nyi songdakkei.
Haoei
Haobou Manasse jembü lolo eaaoa yeibü tegütham haoei
Hobaje hao khangenbü shuongei hao khulimbo huon takkei, hoba haoeibü Choba chema hao haitikei.
Kheijinei kaonyek kabü mütshuongei Amon Choba khulimbü shuong pendou haitikei; hoba hao shou Josia hao jeila Choba yeitikei.
Josia songdakla khangjinei hao po set kikei, hoba haoei Jerusalema po khujinto sem songdakkei.
junga ai tükde ki kho haoei kümbei, hoba haobou Dawideibü lamnyua paikei; hoba haoei mae ayingsi nanae asepei.

Aieilausi haoei songdakbü po setboubüa hao tokei nashou che ong kikei, hoba haoei hao bou Dawideibü Mühghaü lamla khangkei; hoba po anthüknyi boubüa Jihuda si Jerusalem ka shongh lemshang Asherim hoba heangsho noksa jakenbü hoba tühnyinbü haoei lühan apbula khangkei.

Hobaje haoenei hao thedanga Baal lemshang leilukukei, hoba kho thüka loan kibü jen juokshang wapan koutikei; hoba haoei Asherim, ikei dangbü hoba tühnyinbü noksa shuong kho haoei netla yeiko leilukukei, hoba haoei khübü kho thamngula yeitikei hoba aoyouei khübü to lembei haoeneibü heea kho phinan jinkukei.
Hobaje tokei ungshedbou shuongeibü lo kho lemshang thüka jinkei, hoba Jihuda si Jerusalem saüenkei.
Hobaje Manasse, Efraim, hoba Simeon sangnyu shuonga Naftali sühko hauan khübü kaijembo leilubü thüka,

haoei lemshang shuong kho jeinyinan apbukei, hoba Asherim si noksa shuong kho wenla yeiko jangnyinkukei, hoba Israel kaodak pendoua jen juokbü lemshang pendou wapan koutikukei, kho phaia hao Jerusalem to ngaikei.
Tou haoei songdakbü po anthükset boubüa haoei kaonyek si chem kho saüenan phaia Azaliaeibü shou Shafan, sangnyu governor Maasaia, Joahaz ngühli doboueibü shou Joa,
Thükkabou ungshedbou Hilkia jungto haoen loukei, hoba
Haoenei kho
Haoenei kho mistri shuong la hoba chem kümetbü shuong la laang thüngan kibü hoba thaonyu la lela hoba bu beam lela hoba Jihudabü Chobaei nyaüan aplabü chem shanga kukei.

Hobaje mütshuongei kümsilei kho maangkuko kümbei, hoba Jahat si Obadia, Levibü, Merarieibü shousi shuong. Hobaje Zekharia si Meshullam, Kohatbü shousi shuong haoen thüka chühla haoei phokukei. (Levibü chia laula kongkin tokla minbü pendou)
On künbü shuong thüka kikei, hoba kümsilei phang weko kümbü pendou leiyeikei, hoba Levibü atje dobou hoba kongnyubou shuong hoba bakhün lombü shuong kikei.
Kheijinei Hilkiaeibü dobou shafan to laukei, “
Shafanei le kho Choba jungto jungan loukei, hoba tokei Choba to laukei, “No khangenbou la kubü pendou kümdaleida.
eibü chema hapbü nam pendou haoenei kongena hoba kho ikjaibü shuong si kümbüleibü shuong la kua.”
Kheijinei dobou Shafanei Choba to laukei, “Ungshedbou Hilkiaei kü la le che kukei.” Hobaje Shafanei kho Choba thedanga wekei.
Chobaei ngühkhüm shuong kho ditjinei haoei haoeibü neisimei jitnyinkei.
Hobaje Chobaei Hilkia Shafaneibü shou Ahikam, Mikaeibü shou Abdon, dobou Shafan si Chobaeibü sambü Asaia to laukei,
“Hauashi,

Hibü Hilkia hoba aoyou Chobaei hautian kikei, neisimei shemjang lombou Hasraeibü shou Tokhaeibü shou Shallumeibü yak Hulda thuseinyu jungto haukei. (tou sao Jerusalema nyiboubü kishang kikei) hoba sao to ho shanga joyokei.
Hobaje saoei haoen to laukei, “
ei hai lauda, Chühashi, ngei ho kaonyek hoba khünei kibü shuong thükto amaibü loutikulabü. Jihuda Choba thedanga webü shedsikhau shuong pendou kho;
aieilausi haoenei ngo inletkei, hoba haoeneibü ikei kümbü pendouei ngo khauangtila shanga haoenei lubü mühghaü shuong la jen jikkua, hibü ngeibü maangshat ho thükto khüpan jinkulabü hoba anyetlabü.
Lausikei Jihuda Choba aoei

kaibü maangpon sepeian kisije hoba ho kaonyek hoba habü mütli shanga khulimbo ditjinei, Mühghaü thedanga eaaoa yeibü shanga hoba no kü thedanga eaaoa yeikei, hoba kaibü neisimei jitnyinkei hoba kü thedanga haapsije, ngeikei kaibü subüjabü ditda dogo

Chühashi, ngei kaibü bousi shuong jungto leibalabü hoba no jembü hee to haksoa loutilabü hoba amaibü laobou ngei ho kishang hoba ho mütli thükto sungbalabü ki. kho kaibü nyekei ühüplabü.’ ” Hobaje haoenei Choba jungto ngüh kho sungngaibakei.
Kheijinei Chobaei Jihuda si Jerusalembü jaishsou shuong pendou ngashaikei.
Hobaje Chobaei Jihudabü mütshuong pendou hoba Jerusalema kibü hoba ungshedbou shuong hoba Levibü shuong, müt hanbü yaangbü pendou leian
Hobaje Choba hao kishanga lokei hoba
Kheijinei haoei Jerusalema hoba Benjamina yoan kibü shuong khünei lotikei, hoba Jerusalema kibü shuongei
Hobaje Israel shousi shuong shangabü kaonyek pendoua mangsenlabü pendou sunglangkei, hoba Israela kibü pendouei
Josiaei Jerusalema
Hobaje haoei ungshedbou haoen haoeneibü kümaleia hoba
Hobaje Levibü shuong aoyouei Israelbü pendou la songlenkei hoba aoyou
Israelbü Choba Dawidei doan phokubü hima kan lolo kaneibü bousi thenbüei janbü hima lamleashi.
Hobaje kan jaisinasi daneibü shousi shuong chungeibü shi thenei janyinbü tegü saoposhanga loashi, hoba Levi shuong bousi shuong chem- pen weko phejan che janletashi.
Püetbü lem san shoushou haitiashi, hoba kan lolo saüenashi, hoba kaneibü jaisinasi shuong shanga Mosa danko
Hobaje Josiaei noknyüh la haoeibü san shoushou shuong, lon shoushou shuong, shatsinam tan ka hajar khujin kukei, hoba masu pongsu hajar sem, khübü kho Chobaei haoeibü kukei.

Hobaje haoeibü yaangenbü shuongei maangnyu angko müt shuong la, ungshedbou shuong la, hoba Levi shuong la kukei. Hilkia, Zekharia, hoba Jehiel, Mühghaüeibü chema kongnyu ikjaibü shuongei ungshedbou shuong la püetbü lem shanga san shoushou hoba lon shoushou hajar nyi to saongao lak hoba masu pongsu saongao sem kukei.

Tokei Konania hoba haoeibü jaisinasi Shemaia, hoba Nethanil hoba Hashabia hoba Jeiel, hoba Jozabad, Levibü konglebü shuongei Levibü shuong la püetbü lem lembü san shoushou si lon shoushou hajar ngao hoba masu pongsu saongao ngao kukei.
Kho tegü kümsilei lamlekei, hoba ungshedbou shuong lulueibü kaoena lokei, hoba Levibü shuong Chobaei sakkubü tegü lulueibü janletbü tegütham lokei.
Hobaje haoenei püetbü lemeibü san shoushou kho haitikei, hoba haoeneibü ikei sungletbü sii ungshedbou shuongei lakkei, hoba Levi shuongei khübü kho khon okei.
Hobaje Mosaeibü lea doan kibü tegü
Hobaje songa kibü tegü haoenei püetbü lem kabü san shoushou kho wana ngoukei, hoba saopobü lembü shuong kho chaka khaüchaka hoba phau- yaanga ngoukei, hoba shuong jungto jungan haukei.

Phaila haoenei haoen shanga hoba ungshedbou shuong shanga lamlekei, aieilausi Aroneibü shou si ungshedbou shuong nang anakshongko lembüa haabü hoba juokbü lembü shanga akongakangko kikei; hibü Levi shuongei haoen shanga hoba Aroneibü shousi ungshedbou shu- ong shanga lamlekei.

Hobaje Dawidei sakkubü tegü chia laubü shuong Asafeibü shousi shuong haoeneibü kaoena kikei, hoba Asafei Heman. hoba Jeduthun Chobaeibü leiyeibou hoba koukhün lombü shuong bakhün weko kikei; haoen jembü kümsilei ka apyoan haula khaman akidei, aishanga haoeneibü jaisina Levi shuongei lamlekei.
Hibü
Hobaje Israelbü shousi shuong khünei yobü shuongei kümaleia püetbü lem hoba tokai ajinbü wentek lem chalou nyetnyet noukei.

Hobaje Samuel thuseibou chalou ka Israela kho tegübüje lem lian achüh, ayingsi Josiaei noubü phatko Israelbü Choba cheei ongkei püetbü lem ungshedbou shuong, Levi shuong, Jihuda, hoba Israel pendou, hoba Jerusalema kiteibü shuong yoa lian achüh.
Josiaei songdakbü po anthük setboubüa kho püetbü lem likei.
Kho pendou phaia, ladang Josiaei lembü chem yeikei, Ijepbü Choba Neko Karkhemish khulimbo wapyola Eufrates aeto angkei, hoba Josiaei hao khulimbo haukei.

Lausikei haoei hao jungto youkobü hautiko laukei, “No Jihudabü Choba ngei ka to ai kümla? Tat ngo no khulimbo loubü aying, lausikei laobou phang yoa ngo wapyoda kho khulimbo ki; hoba Mühghaüei kü to panteiashi dogo kü la sakkua, Mühghaü ao kü yoa ki haoei no mautisi amaibüla hao khulimbo aloko nangashi.”

Khei yingsikei Josiaei hao ka thenyek asepei lausikei hao to wapyola shanga hao lolo hukoshepbo kümbei, hoba Mühghaüeibü sembung ka loubü Nekoeibü ngüh shuong kho adit, hoba Megidddo pholia wapyola loukei.
Lau jungbüei Josia Choba to kipbei; hoba Chobaei haoeibü sambü shuong to laukei, “Ngo yaüenashi, aieilausi ngo maiko leilua.”

Hibü haoeibü sambü shuongei hao haoeibü kailong ka tonenkei, hoba haoeibü kailong nyiboubüa phokukei, hoba Jerusalem to hao sungbakei hoba hao haikei, hoba bousi shuongeibü heea hao khünkei. Hobaje Jihuda si Jerusalembü pendouei Josia shanga mang haapbei.

Hobaje Jeremiaei Josia shanga mang haapbei; hoba chia laubü bousu si yaksa shuong pendouei tat sühko Josia shanga maang waangko lauyoda hoba haoenei ho Israela habü ho songle ngühkhüm che yeitikei, hoba chühashi, khübü kho ügütü lea doan kia.
Tou Josiaeibü joubü kümsilei kho khangbü hoba shembü hoba haoeibü kümsilei maibü shuong kho
chühashi, khübü kho Israel si Jihudabü Choba shuongeibü lea doan kia.
Kheijinei kaonyek kabü mütliei Josiaeibü shou Je- hoahaz haobou jeila Jerusalema Choba yeitikei.
Jehoahazei songdakla khangjinei hao po saoto sem kikei; hoba haoei Jerusalema lit sem songdakkei,
Hobaje Ijepbü Chobaei hao kho Jerusalem ka kakan apbei, hoba chandinam seret khujin bang atbü saongao hoba hon seret khujin bang atbü kayang hikei.
Hobaje Ijepbü Chobaei haoeibü na Eliakim Jihuda hoba Jerusalem thüka Choba yeitikei, hoba haoeibü nyen Jehoiakim dogo jeitikei, hoba Nekoei haoeibü jai Jehoahaz sungkei hoba Ijep to hao leian haukei.
Jehoiakim songdakla khangjinei po saoto ngao kikei, hoba haoei Jerusalema po anthüknyi songdakkei, hoba haoei
Hao khulimbo Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnezzar angkei, hoba Babilon to haula hao namlühei khühkei.
Nebukhadne- zzarei tokei

Tou Jehoiakimeibü joubü kümsilei kho hoba haoei kümbü mangsenlabü shuong kho hoba laobou ong hao to chühenkei, chühashi, khübü kho Israelbü si Jihudabü Choba shuong lea doan kia; Jehoiakimei hao jeila songdakkei.
Johoiakhin hao songdakla khangjinei po anthükset kikei, hoba haoei Jerusalema lit sem chalou an songdakkei hoba
Nyibou poa longeijinei Nebukhadnezzar Chobaei
Zedekia songdakla khangjinei po saoto che kikei, hoba haoei Jerusalema po anthük che songdakkei,
hoba
Hobaje haoei Nebukhadnez- zar, aoei hao la Mühghaü nyena theyolanyotikei, hao khulimbo lokei.
Leiyeibü ungshedbou hoba müt pendouei kho tegü yongko maang akuko phang shuongeibü mangsenlabü kümsilei phaisembo kikei, hoba
Hobaje
lausikei

Hibü haoei haoen thükto Khaldiabü Choba leian loukei, haoei haoeneibü heshou shuong haoeneibü saoposhanga inei wapettikei, hoba heshou ayingsi medei, chingbü ayingsi baushi to kei onou alen; haoen pendou haoei haoeibü ik to kukei.
Hobaje Mühghaüeibü thungsiphau pendou hanbü yaangbü hoba
Hobaje haoenei
Hobaje aoyou in ka satenkei haoen Babilon to leilangkei; hoba Persia sangle songdak asüh shongko haoen hao hoba haoeibü shousi shuong aaola yeian kikei.
Jeremiaeibü sembung danko
Tou Persia Choba Sairas songdak po shaangboua Jeremiaeibü sembungei
Persia Choba Sairasei hai lauda, “Khuthükbü Mühghaüei kaodak sangle pendou kü la kua, hoba Jihudaa kibü Jerusalema hao chem che dangkula kü la sakkua. Kan yoa aoyou haoeibü mütli shuong ki,
Persia Choba Sairas shaangboubü poa Jeremiaeibü sembung danko
“Persia Choba Sairasei hai lauda,
Kan pendou yoa aoyou haoeibü mütli ki, haoeibü Mühghaü hao yoa yoshi, hoba hao Jihudaa kibü Jerusalem to angshi, hoba
Hobaje aoyou ainei ong ki Mühghaüeibü chem shanga maang angbü lembü kubü to liman, lubü kishanga kibü mütshuongei chandinam hoba hon peisilei hoba meisiauei thuiyoashi.”
Kheijinei Jihuda si Benjamin chung jaishou shuong, ungshedbou shuong, hoba Levibü shuong, khei aoyou Jerusalema kibü
Hobaje haoen nyangko aoyou kikei, khei maang angko lembü kubü pendou to liman haoenei chandinam chakei, honei, meisiauei hoba namsek peisileiei haoen to thuikei.
Hobaje tokei
Khübü kho Persia Choba Sairasei namthanbou Mithredateibü ikei sungjung longkei hoba khübü kho Jihudabü konglebou Sheshbazar la wean kukei.
Hobaje khübü wean chühbü kho ho: honeibü phau 30 chandinam phau 1000 inshou 27
honeibü kamphau 30 chandinam kamphau 410 hoba lubü thungsiphau 1000
Hon si chandinam thungsiphau pendouei hajar ngaoto saongao lei. Khübü pendou kho Sheshbazarei langsenbü shuong Babilon ka Jerusalem to leibajinei sungbakei.
Tou habü ho provinsa kibü Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnezzarei Babilon to langsenbü ka nyibou leingaibü, hoba Jerusalem si Jihuda to mütpem weko lulueibü sangnyu to longeibü shuong ki.
Khübü kho Zerubbabel, Jeshua, Nehemia, Seraia, Reelaia, Mordekai, Bilshan, Mispar, Bigvai, Rehun, Baana yoan loukei.
Israelbü shuong mütshang lühbak: Paraseibü shousi shuong hajar nyito saongaoto anjinleito nyi
Shefatiaeibü shousi shuong saongao semto anjinleito nyi
Araeibü shousi shuong saongao nyetto anjinleito ngao
Pahat Moabeibü shousi shuong (Jeshua Joab danko hajar nyito saongao setto anthüknyi)
Elameibü shousi shuong hajar cheto saoanto anjinsemto lei
Zattueibü shousi shuong saongao güto saonyito ngao
Zakkaieibü shousi shuong saongao nyetto saosem
Banieibü shousi shuong saongao lakto saonyito nyi
Bebaieibü shousi shuong saongao lakto saoto sem
Azgadeibü shousi shuong hajar cheto saoanto saoto nyi
Adonikameibü shousi shuong saongao lakto saosemto lak
Bigvaieibü shousi shuong hajar nyi to anjinsemto lak
Adineibü shousi shuong saongao leito anjinsemto lei
Ater ka pakbü (Hezekia danko) shousi shuong anjin ngaoto set
Be- zaieibü shousi shuong saongao semto saoto sem
Joraeibü shousi shuong saongaoto anthük nyi
Hashumeibü shousi shuong saoanto saoto sem
Gibbareibü shousi shuong anjin ngaoto ngao
Bethlehembü mütshuong saongao to saoto sem
Netofaeibü mütshuong anjinsemto lak
Anathotbü mütshuong saongaoto saoto set
Azmaveteibü shousi shuong saonyito nyi
Kiriatarim, Chefira hoba Beerot ka bakbü shousi shuong saongao nyetto saonyito sem
Rama si Gebaeibü shousi shuong saongao lakto saoto che
Mikmaseibü shousi shuong saongaoto saoto nyi
Bethel si Aibü mütshuong sao anto saoto sem
Neboeibü shousi shuong anjinsemto nyi
Magbisheibü shousi shuong saongaoto anjinsemto lak.
Lubü Elameibü shousi shuong hajar cheto saoanto anjinsemto lei
Ha- rimeibü shousi shuong saongao semto saoche
Lod, Hadid hoba Onoeibü shousi shuong saongao nyetto saoto ngao
Jerikhobü mütshuong saongao semto saonyito ngao
Senaaeibü shousi shuong hajar sem to saongao lakto khujin.
Langsenbü ka longeibü ungshedbü lilabü chung then: Jeshuaeibü chung then Jedaia ka bakbü saongao güto anjinleito sem
Immereibü shousi shuong hajar cheto anjinsemto nyi
Pashureibü shousi shuong hajar cheto saoanto saonyito nyet
Harimeibü shousi shuong hajar cheto anthük nyet.
Langsenbü ka longeibü Levibü shuong chung si phang; Hodavia danko Jeshua si Kadmieleibü shousi shuong anjinleito lei
Chia laubü shuong; Asafeibü shousi shuong saongaoto saoto set

Koukhün lombü shuongeibü shousi shuong: Shallumeibü shousi shuong, Atereibü shousi shuong, Talmoneibü shousi shuong, Akkubeibü shousi shuong, Hatitaeibü shousi shuong, Shobaieibü shousi shuong pendouei saongaoto khujinto gü.
Langsenbü ka longeibü lembü chema kümbüleibü shuong: Zihaeibü shousi, Hasufaeibü shousi Tabbaotheibü shousi shuong.
Keroseibü shousi shuong, Siahaeibü shousi shuong, Padoneibü shousi shuong.
Lebanaeibü shousi shuong, Hagabaeibü shousi shuong, Akkubeibü shousi shuong,
Hagabaeibü shousi shuong, Shelmaieibü shousi shuong, Hananeibü shousi shuong,
Giddeleibü shousi shuong, Gahareibü shousi shuong, Reaiaeibü shousi shuong,
Re- zineibü shousi shuong, Nekodaeibü shousi shuong, Gazzameibü shousi shuong,
Uzzaeibü shousi shuong, Paseaeibü shousi shuong, Besaieibü shousi shuong,
Asnaeibü shousi shuong, Meunimeibü shousi shuong, Nefesimeibü shousi shuong,
Bakbukeibü shousi shuong, Hakufaeibü shousi shuong, Harhureibü shousi shuong,
Bazluteibü shousi shuong, Me- hidaeibü shousi shuong, Harshaeibü shousi shuong,
Barkoseibü shousi shuong, Siseraeibü shousi shuong, Temaeibü shousi shuong,
Niziaeibü shousi shuong, Hatifaeibü shousi shuong,
Langsenbü ka longeibü Solomoneibü chung: Sotaeibü shousi shuong, Hassofereteibü shousi shuong, Perudaeibü shousi shuong,
Jaalaeibü shousi shuong, Darkoneibü shousi shuong, Giddeleibü shousi shuong,
Shefatiaeibü shousi shuong, Hattileibü shousi shuong, Pokhereth Hazzebaimeibü shousi shuong, Amieibü shousi shuong,
Lembü chema kümbüleibü pendou hoba Solomoneibü sambü shuong saongao semto anjinngaoto nyi.
Hobaje Tel-mela, Telharsha, Cherub, Addan hoba Immer ka bakbü habü ho kikei, lausikei haoenei haoeneibü püshi ayingsi bakshang Israel ka si ji alenen.
Delaia ka bakbü, Tobaia ka bakbü Nekoda ka bakbü saongao lakto anjinsemto nyi.
Hobaje ungshedbou shuong ka bakbü Habaia ka bakbü Hakkoz ka bakbü, Barzillaieibü nouyangshou shuong ka yak la lekei, hoba haoeneibü nyen nyenkei.
Habü ho haoen bakshang nyen dobü lamyosi ühüp; khoei haoen shaan apa dogo weeikei hoba ungshedbü kümsilei ka asaopobü dogo inletkei;
hoba governorei haoen to, “Khei ungshedbou cheei Urim si Thummim yoa aloshongko haoenei saopobü shausiyung ashaujan” dogo laukei.
Kamshaibü püh pendouei hajar saonyi to nyi saongao semto saosem kikei,
Kho to liman haoen sambü si sambü sao hajar nyetto saongao semto khujinto nyet kikei, hoba haoen chia laubü bousu yaksa müt saoan kikei.
Haoeneibü koli saongao nyetto khujinto lak hoba gadu saoanto saonyito ngao kikei,
haoeneibü ut saongao leito khujinto ngao, hoba haoeneibü gadu hajar lakto saongao nyetto saoche.
Ladang chung jaishou lei- yeibü shuong at Jerusalema kibü
Haoenei thükbü thüng kümsilei shanga thanshang to hon seret saongao ngao hoba chandinam seret hajar nyito saongao ngao hoba ungshedboueibü neisimei saongao kukei.
Hibü ungshedbou shuong hoba Levi shuong hoba mütli at hoba chia laubü shuong hoba lembü chema kümbüleibü shuong haoen sangnyu shuonga kikei, hoba Israelbü pendou haoeneibü sangnyu shuonga kikei.
Tou ladang lit nyibou loukei, hoba Israelbü sangnyu shuonga kikei, mütshuongei haoen lolo müt che maimai Jerusalem to yoshaikei.

Kheijinei Jozadakeibü shou Jeshua hoba haoeibü jaisina ungshedbou shuong hoba Shealtieleibü shou Zerubbabel hoba haoeibü jaisina shuong lokei, hoba Mühghaü müt Mosa ngühkhüma doan kibü tegü haoenei Israel Mühghaüeibü lemshang kho dangngaikei hoba kho thüka juokbü lembü lemla shanga kümbei.
Haoenei lemshang kho, kho phoshanga phokei, aieilausi kaonyeka kibü shuong shanga haoen thüka hatlamoklabü kikei, hoba kho thüka haoenei juokbü lembü kukei.
Hobaje doan kibü tegütham haoenei dip lem likei, hoba songle ngühkhüm tegütham lühbakei chalou weko juokbü lembü, chalou angboua khambü thüng lembei.
Hobaje kho phaia athakko juokbü lembü hoba janenan kibü
Lit nyetboubü shaangbou nyet ka haoenei

Haoenei tokei laangeibü mistri la hoba bueibü mistri la nam kukei, hoba shausiyung hoba yunglabü onang, Sidonbü la hoba Tairbü la Lebanona cedar bu yungnyu to Joppa aeto Persiabü Choba Sairas haoenei sakkubü hapbü tegü sungbala shanga kukei.

Tou Jerusalema Mühghaü chem to haoen loubü nyibou poa lit nyiboubüa Shealtieleibü shou Zerubbabel hoba Jozadakeibü shou Jeshua hoba Levi shuong, hoba langsenbü ka Jerusalem to longbü pendouei khangkei, hoba

Kheijinei Mühghaüeibü chema kümbüleibü shuong to chühla Jeshua hoba haoeibü shousi shuong hoba jaisinasi shuong Kadmiel hoba haoeibü shousi shuong, Jihudaeibü shousi shuong to liko lokei; Henadakeibü shousi shuong, haoeneibü jaisina Levi shuong yoan lokei.
Hobaje chemdangbü shuongei
Hobaje haoenei nyensang kubü jongaiyoko
“Aieilausi hao maibü ki,
aishanga Israel aenei haoeibü üeisanou ponpen kida.”
Hobaje ladang haoenei

Lausikei ungshedbou shuong hoba Levibü shuong hoba püshi chung kongnyubou hoba jaishou shuong shaangla dangbü chem hapbü shuongei haoen thedanga kho chem chemshang yaübü hapan ngüh yaang longko haapbei, hoba juongei olinbüei ngekkei.
Hibü mütshuongei haapbü si olinbü ngekbü shangashen, aieilausi mütshuongei ngüh yaangbüei ngekkei, hoba ngüh kho saabü ka ditko kikei.
Tou ladang Jihuda si Benjamin lothetbü shuongei

kheijinei haoenei Zerubbabel jungto hoba püshi yoa khuleibü shuong jungto nyangko loukei, hoba haoen to laukei, “Künei kan yoa dangyokho; aieilausi kanei tegü künei kaneibü Mühghaü lamda; hoba küneikei Assiriabü Choba Esarhaddon, aoei kün hato leian loukei, kho chalou ka hao la künei haitibü lembü kuda.”

Lausikei Jerubbabel si Jeshua hoba joubü Israelbü püshi khuleibü shuongei haoen to laukei, “Küneibü Mühghaü la chem che dangkula kün yoa kan ai khaman aki, lausikei Persia Choba Sairasei kün la sakkubü tegü künei lolo ong
Kheijinei kaonyeka kibü shuongei Jihudabü shuong hau thettikei, hoba chem dangla haoen hatentikei,
hoba haoeneibü lamthen lusaktikula haoen khulimbo ngühkhüm ngebü shuong jekthetkei, hoba Persia Choba Sairas songdak sünga, khei Dairas songdak sühko kipjim kukei.
Ahasuerasei songdakjinei, haoei songdak khangjinei haoenei Ji- huda si Jerusalema kibü shuong khulimbo shetbü kuko dokei.
Hobaje Artazerkzes haanga Bishlam hoba Mithredat hoba Tabed hoba joubü haoeneibü himshuongei Persia Choba Artazerkzes jungto dokei, le kho Aramaik ngüha dokei hoba kho sepeikei.
Sepai lajamleibou Rehum si dobou Shimshaiei Jerusalem khulimbo Artazerkzes Choba jungto hai dokei;
Kheijinei sepai lajam leibou Rehum si Shimshai dobou hoba haoeneibü jenabou shuongei dokei. Dinabü hoba Afarsatbü, Tarbetbü, Afarsibü, Arkhevibü, Babilonbü, hoba Elambü,
hoba joubü phangshuong aoyou yaangenbü hoba hangenbü Osnappar to leian loukei, hoba Samaria sangnyua apyokei, hoba shumang danan kibü joubü kaonyeka hoba kho tegü,
Hobaje kho le kho haoenei Artazerkzes Choba jungto hautikei, “Shumang danan kibü kaodaka kibü no khangenbü shuongei ka jungto salem hautida.
Ka jungka longbü Jihudabü kün jungto Jerusalem to louan kia dogo Chobaei ngeshima; haoenei khüpyobü hoba amaibü sangnyu kümda, hoba kümthang yeia, hoba chemshang kümetda.
Chobaei ho ngeshima, khei ho sangnyu kümalonga hoba kümthang shuong yeialonga, haoenei khümnam ayingsi lotnam akulabü, hoba thonlamaje hoei Choba shuongeibü khümnam thushed la yeitikulabü.
Tou künei Chobaeibü jem shauda buba, Chobaeibü himou chühko setla kün shanga janbü ayingsije, kho künei hautia hoba Choba la aukabü kuda.

Khei kabou habüeibü lea dobü lamyola shanga doan phobü le khünei nyi ho sangnyu ho khüpyobü sangnyu Choba shuong hoba provins shanga amai, hoba shangieda ho sangnyua haoenei kaonyek khulimbo longkei dogo ngelabü, kho haangjung ho sangnyu leiluan aptikei.
Ho sangnyu kümalonga hoba kümthang kümalonga, kho tetlabü shumang dananje no phejan akilabü dogo Choba la künei aukabü kuda.”
Kheijinei Chobaei jongaibü le hautikei, “Sepai lajamleibou Rehum hoba dobou Shimshai jungto hoba joubü haoeneibü jenabou Samariaa kibü jungto hoba shumang danan kibü joubü kaonyek jungto salem.
“Laobou le kanei kün jungto hautikei, kü thedanga shangashatko wea.
Hobaje ngei ngühkhüm che kukei, hoba laman chüha hoba ho sangnyu shangied ka thama Choba shuong khulimbo longkei, hoba khüpyobü hoba kaonyek khulimbo hanei longkei dogo hapena.
Shumang danan kibü kaonyek pendou thüka Jerusalem songdakbü Choba yaangbü shuong kikei, hoba haoen la khüm hebütakbü nam kuko kikei.
Ngei ngühkhüm che aküm shongko ho sangnyu akümla kanei habü mütshuong nangteila ngühkhüm kuashi.
Hobaje khünei kan nyibutham teki, hoba aila Choba konglabü lele leilubü longtila?”
Ladang Artaxerkzes Chobaei dobü Rehum si Shimshai thedanga hoba haoeneibü himshuong la wean lenkei, panteiko haoenei Jerusalem to Jihudabü jungto haukei hoba haoen maangshat lamlam nangtikei.
Kheijinei Jerusalema Mühghaüeibü chema kümboleiko kibü kho Persia Choba Dairas songdakbü po nyiboubü asühshongko nangan phokei.
Tou thuseibü shuong Hagai si Zekharia Iddoeibü shi, Israel Mühghaü ao haoen thüka kikei hao nyena Jihuda si Jerusalema kibü Jihudabü to tetenko joyokei.

Kheijinei Shieltieleibü shou Zerubabel, hoba Jozadakeibü shou Jeshaua meimeikei hoba Jerusalema kibü Mühghaüeibü lembüchem dangngaila khangkei, hoba Mühghaüeibü thuseibou müt nyi hamei haoen to thuikei.

Kho jihsiphaia shumang danan kibü provinsa governor Tattenai hoba Shethar-boznai hoba haoeneibü jenabou shuong haoen jungto loukei hoba haoen to hai laukei, “Aoei kan la ho chem dangla hoba kümsemla sakkukei?”
Kheijinei künei haoen to hai jongaikei, “Ho chem dangbü mütshuong nyen ao?”

Lausikei haoeneibü Mühghaüeibü nyek kho Jihudabü jaishou shuong thüka chühko kikei, hoba Dairas jungto ho shangabü asühlang shongko hoba tokei ho shanga leei jongaibü anopmai shongko haoenei haoen anangti.
Shumang danan kibü governor Tattenai hoba Shethar-boznai hoba shumang danan hauan kibü haoeibü jenabou Afarsabü shuongei Dairas Choba jungto hautibü ledo:
Haoenei hao jungto le che hautikei, laonei hai doan kikei; Dairas Choba jungto, pendou sangmai yingshima.

“Ho Chobaei ngeshima khei kün Jihudabü provins hoba Mühghaü yaangbü lembüchem to haukei; laang yaangbüei ho dangda, kümthanga wa jinda hoba kümsilei kho lembo lembo haoeneibü ika thusinaang maiko hauda.
“Khünei künei jaishou shuong to phekei, ‘Aoei kan la ho chem dangla hoba ho kümthang kümsemla ngühkhüm kukei?’
Künei haoen to haoeneibü nyen khei haoeneibü leiyeibü shuong nyen künei doan ka la ngetila shanga phekei.”

Hobaje haoenei kün to hai jongaiko laukei, “Kün müh si kao kümbou Mühghaü khangenbü shuong ki, hoba shangied dangbü chem che laobou Israelbü Choba yaangbü cheei dangkei hoba kümsembei, ho chem nyibou künei kümetda.
Lausikei küneibü pisibouei khuthükbü Mühghaü maangto shattisi haoei Nebukhadnezzar Babilonbü Choba, Khaldibü ik to kukei, haoei ho chem leilukukei, hoba mütshuong Babilon to laplangkei.
Lausikei Babilonbü Choba Sairas shaangboubü poa Sairas Chobaei ho Mühghaüeibü chem dangla ngühkhüm kukei.

Hobaje tokei Mühghaüeibü chema hon si chandinam chaksiam shuong laobou Nebukhadnezzarei Jerusalema kibü lembüchem ka sunglangan kikei, hoba Babilon to lemshang to sungbakei khübü chaksiam Sairas Chobaei Babilonbü lembüchem ka sungletkei hoba khübü kho müt cheeibü nyen Sheshbazar la khümbo kukei, aoei hao governor la yeitikei.
Hobaje hao to laukei, ‘Habü chaksiam sungjung hauashi, hoba Jerusalema kibü lembüchema phoashi, hoba Mühghaüeibü lembüchem kho shangied kishanga dangshi.’
Kheijinei Sheshbazar loukei, hoba Jerusalema kibü Mühghaüeibü chem chemshang imenkei, hoba kho chalou ka tou sühko dangko loukei, hoba toukei kho akümsembei.

“Tou khei yingsikei Choba thedanga maialonga Sairas Chobaei Jerusalema ho Mühghaü chem dangla shanga ngühkhüm kümasi aküm, kho Chobaeibü thanshanga lamtiashi, hoba kho shanga Chobaei mangsühbü kün la ngetishima.”
Kheijinei Dairas Chobaei ngühkhüm che kümbei hoba le thanshang Babilona phoshang ka lamyokei.
Hobaje Ekbatanaa Mediabü provins Chobaeibü chema tulai che hapbei hoba khünei hai doan phobü hapbei:

“Sairas Choba shaangboubü poa Sairas Chobaei ngühkhüm che kümbei; Jerusalema Mühghaüeibü chemshanga chem kho dangtiashi, kho haoenei haitibü lembü lemshang, kho chemshang kaangkhühtham ketiashi, kho suokla iknop saosem hoba photak iknop saosem.
Laang yaangbü lin sem, hoba wa haanbü lin che hoba apbü nam kho Chobaeibü chem ka kutiashi.

Hobaje tokei Jerusalema kibü lembüchem ka Nebukhadnezzarei sungbü Babilon to sungbabü Mühghaüeibü chema kibü hon hoba chandinam chaksiam kho nyibou kungaiashi hoba lulu phoshanga phoashi; hoba nyi khübü kho Mühghaü chema phojan.”
“Tou khei yingsije shumang danan kibü governor Tettanai, Shethar-boznai hoba kaibü jenabou shuong Afrasabü aoyou shumang danjung hauan ki kan khüka bangashi;
ho Mühghaüeibü chem kümsilei khei phoyoshi hoba Jihudabü governor hoba Jihudabü jaishou shuong ho Mühghaü chem hao kishanga dangtiashi.

Tokei ho Mühghaü chem dangla shanga habü Jihudabü jaishou shuong to kanei ai kümla ngei ngühkhüm che kümda, Chobaeibü peisilei shuong ka hoba khei shumang danjung hauan kibü khüm yoshaibü ka khei haoen atoketla shanga khübü mütshuong la jih tükdea apbü nam kuashi.

Hobaje haoen khambü ai ong ki, masu pongsu, sanlon paang hoba sanlon khuthük Mühghaü la haitibü lembüa jikla shanga whet youshou, jem, ih hoba onang Jerusalema ungshedbou shuongei hibü tegü atoknokko chalou angboua kuashi,
khünei khuthük Mühghaü la ponlem teibü haitibü lembü kula shanga, hoba Chobaeibü langkei hoba haoeibü shousi shuong shanga welaula.
Tokei ngei ngühkhüm che kümda, khei aoyouei ho ngühkhüm jeileilaje haoeibü chem ka phokhüm che suan sungashi, hao phonan khünei khühashi; hoba kho shanga haoeibü chem od apshang la yeitishi.

Mühghaü, aoei jembü nyen khünei phoan ki, Choba ayingsi laobou phangei ho ngühkhüm jeileilaje ayingsi ho Mühghaü chem Jerusalema leilutikula haujemlaje Mühghaüei tekan apshima. Ngo Dairasei ngühkhüm che küma; kho tükde ong kümtiashi.”
Kheijinei shumang danjung hauan kibü Tettanai, governorei Shethar-boznai hoba haoen jenabou shuongei, Dairasei hautisije ho tegü pendou maangsangko kümbei.

Hobaje thuseibü Hagai si Iddoeibü shou Zekhariaei thungeijangeiko songlenbü danko Jihudabü jaishou shuongei küpletthako kümbei hoba yeitikei. Hobaje Israel Mühghaüei sakkubü tegü hoba Sairas si Dairas hoba Persia Choba Artaxerkzesei ngühkhüm kubü tegü haoenei kümbei hoba kho kümsembei.
Hobaje kho chem Adar lit semboubüa yeikei, laobou Dairas Chobaei songdakbü po lakboubüa kikei.
Kheijinei Israel shousi shuongei ungshedbou shuong hoba Levi shuong hoba langsenbü shousi shuong joubü shuongei ho Mühghaü chem saüenbü olinbüei noukei.

Hobaje ho chem saüenbüa haoenei masu pongsu saongao, sanlon paang saoan, hoba san shoushou saongao leiei lembei hoba Israelbü pendou shanga shabü lembü shanga lon paang anthüknyi, Israel chung anthüknyi shanga lembei.
Hobaje Mosa ngühkhüma doan kibü tegü haoenei ungshedbou shuong haoen tan tan hoba Levi shuong jembü kümsilei tegü Jerusalema Mühghaü kümsilei shanga phoyokei.
Hobaje shaangboubü lit anthük leibounyet langsenbü shousi shuongei püetbü lem likei.

Aishanga ungshedbou shuong hoba Levi shuongei haoen lolo liko saüenan kikei; haoen pendou hinseian kikei hoba haoenei langsenbü shousi shuong pendou shanga hoba haoeneibü jaisina ungshedbou shuong shanga hoba haoen jembü shanga püetbü san shoushou haitikei.
Hobaje Israel shousi shuong langsenbü ka nyibou longeibü shuong hoba kaonyeka maialembü shuong ihinseibü ka aoyouei Israel Mühghaü
Hobaje tokai ajinbü wentek lem olinbüei chalou nyet noukei, aieilausi
Tou habü phainei, Persia Choba Artaxerkzesei songdakko kijinei Seraiaeibü shou Ezra, Azariaeibü shou Hilkiaeibü shou,
Shallumeibü shou, Zadokeibü shou, Ahitubeibü shou,
Amariaeibü shou, Azariaeibü shou, Maraloteibü shou,
Zerah- iaeibü shou, Uzzieibü shou, Bukkieibü shou,
Abishuaeibü shou, Finehaseibü shou, Elea- zareibü shou, Aron thükkabou ungshedboueibü shou
ho Ezra Babilon ka longkei; hoba Mosa ngühkhüma shetenbü dobou che kikei, laobou

Hobaje Artazerkzes Choba po nyetboubüa Israelbü shousi shuong at, ungshedbou shuong, Levibü shuong, hoba chia laubü shuong, hoba koukhün lombü shuong, hoba lembüchem khangenbü shuong Jerusalem to angkei.
Hobaje hao Jerusalem to lit ngaoboubüa loukei, laobou Choba po nyetboubüa kikei.
Aishanga shaangboubü lit shaangbounyet haoei Babilon to angla khangkei, hoba lit ngaoboubü shaangbounyet haoeibü Mühghaüeibü ik maibü hao thüka kisije, Jerusalem to hao loukei.
Aishanga Ezraei
Tou ungshedbou Ezra, dobou hoba
“Artazerkzes, Choba shuong thüka Chobaei Ezra ungshedbou, khuthük Mühghaü ngühkhüm dobou jungto:
Tou ngei ngühkhüm che kümda, khei Israel mütli atei ayingsi ngeibü sanglea haoen ungshedbou shuong hoba Levi shuong aoei Jerusalem to haula maang angan ki ka yoa haula thükkei.
Aieilausi Chobaei haoeibü songsido kubü müt nyetei Jihuda hoba Jerusalem shanga kaibü ika kibü kaibü Mühghaüeibü ngühkhüm tegütham phanyola hautian kia.
Hobaje Choba si hao la songsido kubü shuongei Israel Mühghaü, ao Jerusalema kida, hao la maangnyu angko chandinam hoba hon kubü jungan haulabü.
Hobaje nyi Babilon provins pendoua hapbü chandinam si hon mütli hoba ungshedbou shuongei maangangko lembü haoeneibü Mühghaü chem laobou Jerusalema ki, kho shanga maangangbü lembü yoan jungan haulabü.

Kho khei yingsije nyi aeibou sonanepbo khoeibü namei masu pongsu, sanlon paang hoba sanlon shoushou shuong haoeneibü shausiyung lembü hoba yunglabü lembü jeklabü hoba Jerusalema kibü kaibü Mühghaü chem lemshanga khübü kho lemashi.
Hobaje joubü chandinam si honei ka thedanga hoba kaibü jaisina thedanga ai maikei dogo damda kho kaneibü Mühghaüei maangangbü tegü kümashi.
Hobaje chaksiam kaibü Mühghaüeibü chem kümsilei shanga ka la kubü kho nyi Jerusalem Mühghaü thedanga khümbo kuashi.
Hobaje tokei kaibü Mühghaüeibü chem shanga ai ong khambo ki, kho nyi Chobaeibü namphot ka apshi.

“Hobaje ngei khei ngo Artazerkzesei shumang danan kibü namthanbou pendou jungto ngühkhüm che kümda, khei Ezra ungshedbou, khuthük Mühghaüeibü ngühkhüm dobouei ai ong kan ka khambo yeilaje, kho tongde kümshi.
Chandinam seret khujin atbü saongao sühko, whet youshou saongao sühko, onang ihlechak saongao sühko hoba jemje lajuche dogo wean achühko kuashi.
Khuthükbü Mühghaüei ai ong sengkuda, tükde khei ong khuthük Mühghaüeibü chem shanga kümtiashi, aishanga aila Choba hoba haoeibü shousi shuong sangle thüka Mühghaü maangshat kitila?

Tokei künei ho sakkuda, ungshedbou shuong, Levi shuong, chia laubü shuong, koukhün lombü shuong, lembüchema kibü shuong ayingsi ho Mühghaüeibü chema khangenbü at to ongkei khüm, kayang, lotsang khangla ngühkhüm aki.

“Aeila leko, Ezra, nyi Mühghaüeibü songsido ka to kibü thüng nyi kümashi; shumang danan kibü mütli pendou mat jemlabü governor si matjembü shuong pienashi, khei kaibü Mühghaüeibü ngühkhüm ngebü pendou hoba habü angebü to kanei lenashi.

Hobaje aoyouei kaibü Mühghaüeibü ngühkhüm ajungeilaje hao thükto matjem tükde kuashi, hailabü yingsije, kaonyek ka nangan apbü yingasikei, peisilei sobü yingasikei ayingsi thüngshanga pholabü yingasikei.
seneibü pisibou Mühghaü haübou yingshi, aoei ho tegü Chobaeibü maang- pona Jerusalema kibü
Hobaje kü la Choba si hao la songsido kubü shuong thedanga hoba Chobaeibü yaangbou leiyeibü shuong thedanga onou lenkei. Hobaje
Tou Artazerkzes songdak haanga chung khuleibü shuong kü yoa Babilon ka angkei hoba haoen bakbü shuong habü ho ki:
Finehas chung ka Gershom; Ithamar chung ka Daniel, Dawid chung ka Hattush,
Shekania chung ka Farosh chung ka Zekharia, hoba hao yoa haoen bousu saongao to anjinsem yoan kikei.
Pahath-Moabeibü chung ka Zerahiaeibü shou Elihoenai, hoba hao yoa bousu saoan.
Shekaniaeibü chung ka Jaha- zieleibü shou hoba hao yoa bousu shou saongao sem.
Hobaje Adineibü chung ka Jonathaneibü shou Ebed, hoba hao yoa bousu shou anjinsem.
Hobaje Elameibü chung ka Athaliaeibü shou Jeshaia, hoba hao yoa bousu shou anjinlei.
Shefatiaeibü chung ka Maikeleibü shou Zebadia, hoba hao yoa bousu shou saolei.
Joabeibü chung ka Jehieleibü shou Obadia, hoba hao yoa bousu shou saoanto anthükset
Shelomiteibü chung ka Josifiaeibü shou Bani hoba hao yoa bousu shou saongaoto saosem.
Hobaje Bebaieibü chung ka Bebaieibü shou Zekharia hoba hao yoa bousu shou saoto set.
Hobaje Azgadeibü chung ka Hakkataneibü shou Johanan hoba hao yoa bousu shou an.
Adonikameibü chung ka phailama loubü shuong, habü ho haoeneibü nyen: Elifelet, Jeuel, Shemaia, hoba haoen yoa bousu saosem.
Hobaje Bigvaieibü chung ka Uthai hoba Zabbud hoba haoen yoa bousu anjinlei.
Tou ngei haoen Ahava aeto koubü shumanga yoshaitikei, hoba khünei kün chalou sem kikei, hoba ngei mütshuong hoba ungshedbou shuong chühan chühkei, Levi ka bakbü shuongje akitei.
Kheijinei ngei Eliazar, Ariel, Shemia, Elnathan, Jarib, Elnathan, Nathan, Zekharia hoba Meshullam kongnyu shuong ngala hautikei, tokei Joiarib hoba Elnathan aoyou ditenbü shuong kikei.

Hobaje ngei haoen Iddo, ao Kasifiaa kongnyubou kikei, hao jungto hautikei, hoba Iddo hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong lembü chema khangenbü shuong Kasifiaa kibü to haoenei ai lenlabü kho lentikei khei haoenei küneibü Mühghaüeibü chem shanga khangenbü shuong leibajan.

Hobaje küneibü Mühghaü ik maibü kün thüka yoan kibü ka haoenei kün jungto Mahli ka bakbü thensilen lilabü maibü kakbü müt che leian loukei, Levibü shou, Israelbü shou, hoba Sherebia, haoeibü shou hoba jaisina anthük set.
Hobaje Hashabia, hoba hao yoa Jeshaia Merar ka bakbü hoba haoeibü jaisina.
Hobaje lembü- chema khangenbü shuong aoyou Dawid hoba kongnyu shuongei Levibü kümsilei shanga kukei, saoanto saoche, haoen pendou nyen shenko ngakei.

Kheijinei Ahava shumanga khei küneibü Mühghaü thedanga kün lolo semla amlabü hoba hao ka kün shanga hoba küneibü shousi shanga hoba küneibü peisilei pendou shanga lamnyu tangbü che lamla ngei nyengbü che huiletkei.

Aishanga lamnyua dangbou shuong khulimbo kün to thuila Choba ka sepai tan hoba koli sepai shuong hila ngo himousele kikei; aishanga künei Choba to laukei, “Maibü lambü shuong pendou thüka küneibü Mühghaüeibü ik kia, lausikei haoeibü khauang hoba hao maangpokbü hao inletbü pendou thüka kia.”
Hibü künei mühei nyengkei hoba kho shanga küneibü Mühghaü lambei, hoba künei subüjabü haoei ditkei.
Hobaje ungshedbou kongnyu leiyeibü shuong anthüknyi ngei pienan phokei, khei Sherebia, Hashabia hoba haoen yoa haoeibü jaisina an,

hoba haoen la chandinam, hon hoba chaksiam, khei küneibü Mühghaü chem shanga lembü laobou Choba hoba hao to thuiyobü shuong hoba haoeibü kongnyu leiyeibü shuong hoba khünei yoan kibü Israelbü pendouei lembo kikei, kho takan kukei,
khei ngei haoeneibü ik ka chandinam seret khujin bang atbü saongao lakto anjinsem, chandinam chaksiam seret khujin bang atbü saongao hoba hon seret khujin bang atbü saongao,
hoba hon phauyaang saoche, hon nam hajar che den hoba hon tegübü namsek, chinam maibü lailaibü thung penyi.
Hobaje ngei haoen to laukei, “
Kanei ungshedbou shuong, Le- vibü shuong hoba
Ungshedbou shuong hoba Levibü shuongei Jerusalem küneibü Mühghaüeibü chem to khübü kho jungan loula chandinam hoba hon hoba chaksiam shuong takbü kho sungletkei.

Kheijinei kün Jerusalem to haula shaangbou lit chalou anthüknyi boubüa Ahava shumang ka meimeijung haukei, hoba küneibü Mühghaü kün thüka kikei, hoba dangbou hoba lamnyua kibü ik ka haoei kün khümenkei.
Hobaje kün Jerusalem to loukei hoba khünei chalou sem thüngkei.

Hobaje leibounyet chandinam si honeibü chaksiam shuong kho Uria ungshedboueibü shou Meremoteibü ik ka takletkei; hoba hao yoa Finehaseibü shou Eleazar kikei; hoba haoen yoa Jeshuaeibü shou Jozabad, hoba Binnueibü shou Noadia, Levibü kikei.
Khümbo kho wean chühko hauan chühko sungletkei; hoba hauan chühbü pendou kho jiha doan phokei.

Langsenbü shousi shuong aoyou küksithang langsenbü ka loukei, haoenei Israel Mühghaü la juokbü lembü lembei. Israelbü pendou shanga masu pongsu anthük nyi, sanlon paang anjinngaoto lak, san shoushou anjin leito nyet, shabü lembü shanga lon paang anthüknyi, khübü pendou
Haoenei tokei Chobaeibü sakkubü kho Chobaeibü songdakbü la hoba shumang thinei kibü governor shuong la kukei, hoba haoenei müt shuong hoba Mühghaüeibü chema thuibü kukei.

Tou khübü kümsilei küman phaia kongnyu leiyeibü shuong kü jungto nyangko louan laukei, “Israel mütliei, ungshedbou shuongei, Levibüei, kaonyeka kibü shuongei, Kananbü, Hitbü, Perizbü, Jebusbü, Ammonbü, Moabbü, Ijepbü, Amorbü, mangsenlabü kümsilei ka abangko kia.

Aieilausi haoen shanga, haoeneibü shousi shuong shanga, haoeneibü nouyangshou shuong yakla lea, ho tegü saopobü phang kaonyeka kibü shuong yoa haoen lolo kheinepnyu apa, haü, kongnyubou shuong hoba songdakbü shuongei ong shaang leiluda.”
Hobaje ngei ladang habü kümsilei ditkei, ngei ngeibü nei hoba ngeibü mangyuk jitnyinkei, hoba ngeibü khu ka khulou hoba sembung wi khekei, hoba phenyembo setkei.
Kheijinei langsenbü shuongei shed shonbü shanga Israel Mühghaü ngüha hatbülühbü weko kü jungto kamshaikei, hoba nangnak lembü jih asühshongko ngo maangpangan apan setkei.
Hobaje nangnak lembüchema ngei ngeibü mühei nyengbü ka khei ngeibü nei hoba mangyuk jitnyinan meimeikei; hoba ngeibü youküka khüpetkei hoba

Hobaje ngei laukei, “O ngeibü Mühghaü, ka jungto ngeibü the phühenla ngo himouda, hoba thenyek saklangtham apda, ngeibü Mühgha, aieilausi küneibü khua küneibü shabü aei yeia, hoba küneibü shedbü müha onlanga.

Küneibü pisibou haang ka tat sühko kün aeibou shabüa kia aishanga küneibü shedbü haangjung küneibü Choba shuong si ungshedbou dan küsithang Choba shuongeibü ika inei hailabü hoba langsenbü to haulabü, soshau soyungtilabü hoba tat tegü himoutila khümbo kua.
Hobaje tou jih tuisho shanga joubü cheje satenlabü, hoba haoeibü saopobü kaoena satenshang che la yeian phokulabü, khei küneibü Mühghaüei küneibü nyek ngesaktikulabü hoba aaothu ka hakso hapla

Aishanga kün aaothua kibü shuong, khei yingasikei küneibü Mühghaüei kün aaothua üpyo, lausikei kün han khangettila küneibü Mühghaü chem loentila hoba ho leilubü kümetla hoba Jihuda si Jerusalema kümla kümthen che jinkula shanga Persiabü Choba shuong thedanga kün la üeisanou haptikei.
“Hobaje tou, O küneibü Mühghaü, ho phaia künei ai laula? aieilausi künei nyi sakkubü inletnyu apa,

laobou no khangenbü thuseibü shuongei sengkuko laukei, ‘Kanei lela haubü kaonyek kho kaonyeka kibü mütli asaopobü danko asaopobü kaonyek ki, haoen mangsenlabü shuong danko laobouei kho ji thon ka ji thon sühko haoen ahinseibüei shenan kia.

Tou khei yingsije kaneibü nouyangshou shuong haoeneibü bousu shuong la teleti, ayingsi haoeneibü yaksashou shuong kaneibü shousi shuong la teleti, ayingsi kanei ladangkei haoeneibü jiyophaiyo ayingsi naangmaibü telam; khünei kan hau kilabü hoba kaonyek ka maibü shaulabü hoba kho kanei phet phanla ponpen shanga phokulabü.’
Tou küneibü amaibü kümsilei hoba shed yaangbü shanga ho pendou kün thükto louasikei no küneibü Mühghaüei küneibü shedbü mu thüng ayingko shibouei kün shieikoekei, hoba ho tegü joubü kün la kusije,

nyibou künei kaibü sakkubü shuong leilulep sai? Hobaje habü mangsenlabü kümbü mütli yoa bukyo haayolep lo? Joubü che ongkei üpyokulabü lele ayingsi che ongkei asatenlabü lele nyi kün amauti shongko nyi kün to khau üanglep lo?
O

Tou Ezraei welauko hoba shedbü theletko, haapbo hoba the khüman, Mühghaüeibü chem thedanga kijinei hao jungto Israelbü bousu yaksa hoba nashousi shuong tan yaangbü che liko kamshaikei, aieilausi mütshuong aeibou haapbei.

Hobaje Jehieleibü shou Shekania, Elameibü shousi yoa cheei Ezra to laukei, “Seneibü Mühghaü khulimbo künei shed shona, hoba kaonyeka kibü küksithang sao yakla lea; khei yingasikei kho shanga tou Israel shanga maanglem kia.

Tou khei yingsije yaksi shuong hoba haoen ka bukbü pendou sattila ngeibü bunyubouei hoba seneibü Mühghaüei sakkubü ngühkhüma jemtenbü shuongei songsido kubü tegü seneibü Mühghaü yoa senei thebülanbü che kümbho, hoba kho ngühkhüm tegü kümtiashi.
Meimeiashi, aishanga ho kaibü kümsilei ki, hoba kün ka yoa kia, hau kiashi hoba kümashi.”
Kheijinei Ezra meimeikei hoba thükkabou ungshedbou shuong, Levi shuong hoba Israelbü pendou to ho kümthen tegü haoenei kümlabü dogo theyolanyotikei, hibü haoen the- yolanyokei.

Kheijinei Mühghaüeibü chem thedang ka Ezra meimeikei hoba Eliashibeibü shou Jehohananeibü shemjang to atkei, hoba ladang hao khüto loukei, haoei nyak ashau, ayingsi deikei ayung, aishanga langsenbü shuong shanga haoei mang haapbei.
Hobaje haoen Jerusalem to haoen lolo kamshaijan dogo Jihuda si Jerusalem pendoua langsenbü shousi pendou jungto ngühlang phinthonkei.
Hobaje chalou semnyet kanglanga aoyou aloulaje kongnyu leiyeibü hoba jaishou shuongeibü ngüh tegütham, haoei kibü pendou lean aplabü hoba hao langsenbü shuong tan kambü ka bangjan.

Kheijinei Jihuda si Benjaminbü mütshuong pendou chalou semnyet kanglanga Jerusalema kamshaikei hoba ho lit gü boubü kikei, lita chalou saoche boubüa müt pendou Mühghaüeibü chem thedanga khongthua setkei, hoba kho kümsilei shanga lang yaang loubü haangjung lühji lühko kikei.
Hobaje Ezra ungshedbou kho lokei, hoba haoen to laukei, “Kanei shed shona, Israelbü shabü aei yeitila küksithang sao yakla lea;
tou khoei kaneibü pisibou to shedbü thekuashi, hoba haoei maangangbü kümashi, hoba kaonyek kabü mütli ka hoba küksithang sao shuong ka bangashi.”
Kheijinei tan pendouei jongaiko ngüh yaangbüei laukei, “Kün shanga nyi laubü tegü künei kümbho.”

Lausikei haoenei laukei, “Mütshang ho yongko juonga hoba ho lang yaangbü loubü jih hoba kün khongthua lola athük, ayingsi ho chalou che si nyieibü kümsilei aying; aieilausi ho kümsileia künei shed kaang shona.

Tou seneibü kongnyu leiyeibü shuong mütshuong shanga loan kitishi, hoba sangnyu shuonga kibü aoyouei küksithang sao lea haoen jih takletbü chenei loutiashi, hoba haoen yoa sangnyu weko ka jaishou shuong, sen ka seneibü Mühghaü hatla moklabü maangshat angai shongko ho kümsilei ho lepde lemai lela angaiti shongko haoen loutiashi.”
Asa- heleibü shou Jonathan hoba Tikoaeibü shou Jahzeia ong ho kümsilei khulimbo lokei; hoba Meshullam hoba Shabethai Levi bouei haosi to thuikei.

Hobaje langsenbü shousi shuongei ho tegü kümbei. Hobaje Ezra ungshedbou hoba haoeneibü püshi shuong thenbü yoa leiyeibü shuong hoba haoen pendou nyen ngako pienkei; hoba lit anboubü shaangbounyetbü kümsilei khoto chühla haoen setkei.
Hobaje shaangboubü lit shaangbounyet küksithang sao ngabü pendou yoa haoeneibü kümsilei wankei.
Hobaje ungshedboueibü shousi yoa küksithang sao ngabü shuong hapbei; nyen Jozadakeibü shou Jeshua ka bakbü shuong hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong, Maaseia, Eleazar, Jarib hoba Gedalia.
Hobaje haoeneibü yaksi shuong aplabü dogo haoenei theletbü kukei, hoba shed shonan kisije san shuong yo ka paang che haoeneibü shedbü shabü shanga haoenei lembei.
Hobaje Immer ka bakbü Hanani hoba Zebadia.
Hobaje Harim ka bakbü Maaseia, hoba Elija hoba Shemeja, Jehiel, hoba Uzzia,
hoba Pashur ka bakbü Elioenai, Masseia, Ishmael, Nathaniel, Jozabad hoba Elasa.
Hobaje Levibü shuong ka; Jozabad, Shimei, hoba Kelaia (Kelita dogokei lauda), Pethahia, Jihuda, hoba Eliezer,
Hobaje chia laubü shuong, Eliashib, hoba koukhün lombü shuong; Shallum, Telem hoba Uri.
Hobaje Israel ka; Paros ka bakbü; Ramia, Izzia, Malkhija, Mijamin, Eleazar, Malkija hoba Benaia,
Elam ka bakbü: Mattania, Zekharia, Jehiel, Abdi, Jeremot, hoba Elija.
Zattu ka bakbü: Elioenai, Eliashib, Mattania, Jeremot, Zabad hoba Aziza,
Bebai ka bakbü: Jehohanan, Hanania, Zabbai, Athlai.
Bani ka bakbü: Meshullam, Malluk, Adaia, Jashub, Sheal, Jeremot.
Pahath Moab ka bakbü: Adna, Khelal, Benaia, Maaseia, Mattania, Bezalel, Binnu, hoba Manasse.
Harim ka bakbü: Elie- zer, Ishija, Malkija, Shemaia, Shimeon,
Benjamin, Malluk hoba Shemaria.
Hashum ka bakbü: Mattenai, Mattata, Zabad, Elifelet, Jeremai, Manasse, hoba Shimei.
Bani ka bakbü: Maadai, Amram hoba Uel,
Benaia, Bedeia, Keluhi,
Vania, Meremot, Eliashib,
Mattania, Mattenai hoba Jaasu,
Binnu ka bakbü: Shimei,
Shelemia, Nathan, hoba Adaia,
Maknadebai, Shashai, Sharai,
Azarel, hoba Shelemia, Shemaria,
Shallum, Amaria, Josef,
Nebo ka bakbü: Jeiel, Mattithia, Zabad, Zebina, Jaddai, Joel, hoba Benaia.
Habü ho pendouei küksithang sao ngakei, hoba haoenei haoen shousi shuong yoan sattikei.
Hakaliaeibü shou Nehemiaeibü ngüh, tou Kislev lit, po saoche boubüa ngo Susaa Chobaeibü chema kijinei,
ngeibü jaisina yoa Hanani hoba haoeibü jenabou at Jihuda kaodak ka kü jungto loukei, hoba ngei haoen to Jihudabü joubü aoyou langsenbü ka satenkei haoen hoba Jerusalem shangabü phekei.
Hobaje haoenei kü to laukei, “Laplangan jouan kibü shuong ho kaonyeka khonku yaang hoba shieikoe thua kia. Jerusalem sangnyu kümthang sakleda hoba ho sangnyu wanei lona.”
Hobaje ngei ladang habü ngüh ditkei, ngo setkei, hoba haapbei hoba chalou shisho mang haapbei.
Hobaje ngo mühei nyengkei hoba khuthük Mühghaü thedanga welaukei hoba laukei,
“O

No khangenbouei welaubü ditlabü lele sanoudambo kaibü nou haangbüma hoba kaibü nyek ipbushima; tou welau kho change nangnak ngei ka jungto hautida, kho no khangenbou Israel shousi shuong shanga Israel shousi shuongei kümbü shedbü laobou künei kakhu limbo küma, ho ngei ka thedanga thekuda, haü! ngo hoba kübou chemdangei shed shona.
Künei kakhu limbo leilubü juong küma, hoba no khangenbou Mosa la laobou ngühkhüm shuong hoba matjem nyi ai sakkukei khübü kho künei haangeilamei ajungei.
Ngei sudajada, nyi no khangenbou Mosa la sakkuko laubü ngüh ho damenshima, ‘Kanei shed shonalonga ngei kan phangshuong yoa phinnyintilabü;
lausikei kan kü jungto sepeinyu longeialonga hoba ngeibü ngühkhüm shuong phoalonga hoba jungeialonga inletnyu apbü mütli kho kaodak saabüa hauan kiasikei ngei haoen khüka leishailabü.’
Tou habü ho no khangenbou hoba mütli, aoyou nyi kaibü hau yaangbü hoba kaibü ik shoulobüei angthetan phokei.
O
Artazerkzes Choba po saoche boubü, nisan lita ladang ih hao thedanga phoan kikei, kho thedangto Choba junga ngei ladangkei maangto shatko lenan achüh.
Hobaje Chobaei kü to laukei, “No shatbü ayingnyu lai küman kaibü thenyek angesakda? Ho lubü aying lausikei maangpona maangshat kibü ka ong.” Kheijinei ngo aeibou hatko kikei.

Hobaje ngei Choba to laukei, “Choba salangko kishima: ladang ngeibü pisibou khünshang lusakan leilubü thua ki, hoba sangnyu kümthang hoba bakhün pendou lonan apan ki, kheijinei ngo maangto shatbü thenyek ayembo kienlep lo?”
Kheijinei Chobaei kü to laukei, “Nyi ai phemang sühda?”

Kheijinei ngei khuthükbü Mühghaü to welaukei, hoba ngei Choba to laukei, “Chobaei maang angalonga hoba no khangenbouei subüjabü janbü dogo damalonga kübou khünshang Jihuda kaodak leilubü kho kümetla ngo hautila sakkushi.”
Kheijinei, chobasao hao junga setan kian, Chobaei kü to jongaiko laukei, “Kaibü lam kho lalokche haula hoba no ladang sepeinyu longeila?” Chobaei ngo hautila maangangsi, ngei jih kho janenkei.
Tokei ngei Choba to phekei, “Chobaei maang angalonga Eufrates Shumang thi aedanga kibü governor shuong jungto sakkubü le, ngo Jihuda kaodaka asühshongko danjung haula sakkushi dogo dokula sudajada.

Tokei Chobaeibü lamang chühbou Asaf jungto lembüchem lapheishon bakhün, sangnyu kümthang pangkhüm kongnyu bu pendou kula sakkula shanga le che Chobaei dokula sudajada.” Hobaje Mühghaüeibü thuibü yoan ngeibü khambü pendou Chobaei sakkuenkei.
Kheijinei ngo Eufrates Shumang danan kibü governor shuong jungto haukei hoba Chobaeibü le haoen la lenkei. Chobaei ngo hangla sepai hoba koli leiyeibü shuong hautikei.
Hobaje Horonbü Sanballat hoba khangenbü Tobia, Ammonbü songdakbü, haosi hamei Israelbü thounoula müt che louada dogo ditan aeibou khauangkei.
Kheijinei ngo Jerusalem sühko loukei hoba khünei chalou semnyet kikei.

Hobaje ngo nangnak meimeikei hoba müt at kü phai sembei. Jerusalem shanga ai ong kümla Mühghaüei ngeibü maangpona metan jinkukei, kho ngei aolakei alen hoba ngo setbü shatsinam to liman lubü shatsinam kü yoa akitei.
Hobaje ngo nangnak pholi bakhün, Selongeibü yungdei kishang hoba od apshang bakhün aeto haukei hoba leilubü Jerusalem kümthang hoba khünei lonan apbü bakhün kho limchühkei.
Kho phaia ngei deikük bakhün hoba Chobaeibü dei dangshang sühko haukei; lausikei khünei ngo setbü shatsinam phoshang kaoen akitei.
Kheijinei ngo nangnak shumang che to angkei, hoba kümthang kho limchühkei, hoba ngo nyibou yomang bakhün aeto sepeinyu ngaikei.
Kheijinei ngo laeto ong haukei, ai kümsilei ong kümbei, leiyeibü shuongei ange; aieilausi kho shangabü ngei tokei Jihudabü ungshedbou, yaangenbü, songdakbü hoba lubü müt aolakei mo alenko kikei.

Kheijinei haoen to laukei, “Kanei sen maangmau thua kibü hapda, Jerusalem lai leiluan hoba kho bakhün lonan apan ki; kaiya, Jerusalem sangnyu kümthang kho senei kümetkho, khei yingalonga sen himoua akilabü.”

Hobaje ngeibü Mühghaüei kü to maibü hoba Chobaei kü to lenbü ngüh pendou haoen to lenkei. Kheijinei Haoenei laukei, “Kaiya, sen meimeikho hoba chem kho dangetkho.” Kheijinei kümsilei maibü shanga haoen hau kingaikei.
Lausikei ladang Horonbü Sanballat hoba khangenbü Tobia Ammonbü songdakbü hoba Arabbü Geshem, haoenei ho ditkei, kheijinei kün attiko nyikuko laukei, “Kanei kümbü ho ai? Kanei Choba khulimda sai?”

Kheijinei ngei haoen to jongaiko laukei, “Khuthükbü Mühghaüei kün to thuilabü, hibü kün hao khangenbü shuong hau kingaian chem kho danglabü; lausikei Jerusalema kaneibü phejan, kaneibü nyenhang hoba nyensang aikei akilabü.”

Kheijinei thükkabou ungshedbou Eliashib hoba haoeibü jaisina ungshedbou shuong maangpon to thungeikei hoba haoenei San Bakhün kho kümbei; haoei kho saüenkei, hoba koukap jinkei; haoenei Hundred hoba Hananel dogo laubü laangshong dan sühko saüenkei.
Hao phainei Jerikhobüei kümbei, hoba haoen phainei Imrieibü shou Zakurei dangkei.
Hobaje Hasenaeibü shousi shuongei Ngau Bakhün kho kümbei; khünei haoenei pangkhüm denkei, koukhün shuong hoba khünei thangtetlabü namlüh jinkei.
Haoen phainei Hakkozeibü shou Uriaeibü shou Meremotei kümetkei. Kho phaia Meshezabeleibü shou Berekiaeibü shou Meshullamei kümetkei. Haoen phaia Baanaeibü shou Zadokei kümetkei.
Haoen phaia Tekoabüei kümetkei, lausikei haoen yoa yaangbü shuongeije
Hobaje hangbü bakhün kho Paseaeibü shou Joiada hoba Besodeaeibü shou Mesholamei kümetkei; haoenei pangkhüm kho denkei hoba khünei koukap hoba thangtetlabü namlüh jinkei.
Kho phaia Gibeonbü shou Melatia hoba Meronotbü Jadon tokei Gibeonbü mütshuong hoba Mizpabü mütshuong aoyou Eufrates Shumang thinei kibü governor phanga kikei, haoenei kümetkei.
Hao phaia hon yaübü Har- haiaeibü shou Uzzielei kümetkei. Hobaje hao phainei ponlem hibü peisilei jungeibü Hananiaei kümetkei; hoba haoenei Jerusalem ongabü kümthang sühko kümetkei.
Haoen phaia Hureibü shou Refaia, ao Jerusalem kaonyek jamtea songdakbou kikei, haoei kümetkei.
Haoen phaia Harumafeibü shou Jedaiaei haoeibü chem thedanga kibü kümthang kümetkei. Tokei hao phaia Hashabniaeibü shou Hattushei kümetkei.
Harimeibü shou Malkija hoba Pahath-moabeibü shou Hasshub haosi hamei lubü phejan che, wanjikshang laangchem yoan kümetkei.
Hao phaia Jerusalem kaonyek jamdea songdakbou Hallohesheibü shou Shallum hoba haoeibü nouyangshou shuongei kümetkei.
Pholi Bakhün kho Hanun hoba Zanoaa kibü shuongei kümetkei. Haoenei kho küman koukap, koukhin hoba thangtetlabü jinkei hoba kümthang iknop hajar che thüng Od apshang Bakhün sühko kümbei.
Hobaje Bethakerem kaonyeka songdakbou Rekhabeibü shou Malkijaiei Od apshang Bakhün kümetkei, haoei kho küman koukap, koukhin hoba thangtet jinkei.

Hobaje Mizpa kaonyeka songdakbou Kolhozeeibü shou Shallunei Deikük Bakhün kümetkei, haoei kho kümbo koukap, koukhin hoba thangtet jinkei hoba Chobaeibü bamang nyangko Shilo thimdei kümthang khokei Dawid sangnyu to yanbü younak sühko kümbei.
Hao phaia Azbukeibü shou Nehemia, ao Bethzor kaonyek jamdea songdakbou kikei, haoei Dawid Chobaeibü hee koudei ka deidang hoba yaangenbou kishang chem sühko kümbei.
Hao phaia Levibü Banieibü shou Rehunei kümetkei. Hobaje hao phaia Keila kaonyek jamdea songdakbou Hashabiaei haoeibü kaonyek phejan kho kümetkei.
Hao phaia haoeibü jaisina Henadadeibü shou Bavai, ao Keila kaonyek jamdea songdakbou kikei, haoei kümetkei.
Hao phaia Mizpa songdakbou Jeshuaeibü shou Ezerei kümthang thek che insiaubu thanshang chem aeto angshang kümetkei.
Hao phaia Zabbaieibü shou Barukei aeibou takliambo kümthang phejan chemnyek ka thükkabou ungshedbou Eliashibeibü koukhün sühko kümetkei.
Hao phaia Hakkozeibü chempen Uriaeibü shou Meremotei Eliashibeibü kouyem ka khangan Eliashibeibü chem thonbü sühko kümetkei.
Hao phaia Yomang kabü ungshedbou shuongei kümetkei.
Hobaje haoen phaia Benjamin hoba Hasshub haosi hamei haoeneibü chem tangbou kho kümetkei. Haoen phaia Anania ka bousushou Maaseiaeibü shou Azariaei haoeibü chem nyangko kümetkei.
Hao phaia Henadadeibü shou Binnuei Azariaeibü chem ka khangan kümthang nongaishang hoba chemnyek sühko kümetkei.
Hobaje Uzaieibü shou Palalei kümthang nongaishang ka Chobaeibü chem thükkabou lapheishon lombü kishang pob nyangbü sühko kümetkei. Hao phaia Parosheibü shou Pedaiaei kümetkei.
Tou Nethinimbü kho Ofela kikei, chaangbou dei bakhün hoba loan kibü lapheishon sühko khünei kikei.
Hao phaia Tekoabüei lapheishon yaangbou ka Ofel kümthang sühko naphei che kümetkei.
Tokei ungshedbou shuong mütpem wekoei koli bakhün thükaenei lubü chem tangbü kho kümetkei.
Haoen phaia Immereibü shousi shuong Zadokei haoeibü chem tangbou kho kümetkei. Hao phaia chaangbou koukhün lombou Shekhaniaeibü shou Shemaiaei kümetkei.
Hao phaia Shemaiaeibü shou Hanania hoba Zalapeibü shou lakboubü Hanunei phejan che kümetkei. Hao phaia Berekiaeibü shou Mashullamei haoeibü shemjang thedang kümetkei.
Hao phaia hon yaübou Malkijaei Nithinimeibü chem sühko kümetkei, hoba namyak namseibü shuongei Hammifkad bakhün tangbou ka thükkabou shemjang to angshang chemnyek sühko kümetkei.
Tokei thükkabou shemjang to angshang chemnyek khüto san koukhün sühko hon yaübü si namyak namseibü ham kamshai- an kümetkei.
Tou ladang künei kümthang kho kümetda dogo Sanballatei ditkei, hao khau angko maangto shatkei hoba Jihudabü attiko nyikukei.

Hobaje haoei haoeibü jaisinasi shuong hoba Samariaa lakjaibü tan to joyoko laukei, “Habü hau akibü Jihudabüei ai kümda? Haoenei haoen lulu loenlep lo? Haoenei langkei lemla kuenlep lo? Onshaian kibü wanei lonbü onshaibü ka laangshong kho haansangleko haoenei kümetenlep lo?”
Tou hao nyangko Ammonbü Tobiaei laukei, “Haoenei laobou küman ki, selong che pükalonga laang kümthang kho nopjung koulabü.”

Kheijinei ngei welaukei, “Ditshima, O küneibü Mühghaü, aishanga kün awealau; haoenei nyikubü ngüh kho haoeneibü khu to ngaitikushi, hoba haoen kho aaomüt shuong lapshaishang kaonyeka soshau soyungbü yeila kushi;
hoba haoeneibü shedbü kho küplepan tepho, hoba haoeneibü shabü ka thedang ka haman tüpma; aishanga haoenei chemdangbü thedanga khau angko no attiko nyikua.”
Kho tegü künei kümthang kho kümbei hoba kümthang pendou kho haüyoko kui tho thüng angko kümbei, aishanga mütshuongei maangnyu angko kümbei.
Lausikei ladang Sanballat si Tobia, Arabbü, Ammonbü hoba Ashdodbüei Jerusalem kümthang kümetbü kümsilei kho athakko, hoba leiluan kibü kümetda dogo ditkei, kheijinei haoen aeibou khau angkei.
Hobaje haoen pendou liko huphanga chemphanga huishaian Jerusalem khulimbo wapyola hoba khünei ajiaphai longtila huon kümbei.
Lausikei künei küneibü Mühghaü to welaukei, hoba change nangnak alauko haoen khulimbo lapheibü phokei.
Kho jiha Jihuda mütshuongeibü chia che hai laukei, “On künan kibü shuong hao ka ngaida hoba tokei leilubü juong jouakei, hibü kümthang kho senei akümkhümlabü.”
Tokei küneibü dangbouei hai laukei, “Sen haoen kishang jenyu sühko ohaushongko hoba haoen haitian kümsilei kho anangti shongko haoenei angelabü hoba ühüplabü.”
Hobaje ladang haoen nyangko kibü Jihudabü kün jungto loukei, haoenei annebenko künto laukei, “Kan pendou kaoen pendou aeka kün jungto sepeinyu longeiashi.”
Hibü ngei kümthang naphei kaoen haübü, khongthua mütshuong haoeneibü chemdang yoan leishaikei hoba mütpem weko insiaubu jungtikei.
Hobaje ngei chühkei hoba lokei, hoba yaangenbü songdakbü hoba mütshuong to laukei, “Kan haoen to hatko teki,
Hobaje ladang künei kho ngea dogo dangbouei ditkei, hoba Mühghaüei haoeneibü huon konga jimtikei, kün pendou kümthang khüto sepeinyu longeikei hoba mütpem weko lulueibü kümaleia ikphen lambei.
Hobaje kho chalou ka khangan ngeibü eikshuong jamde kümsilei kümtikei hoba haoen jamde aubu, aih hoba lau hoba nameibü hele souko lekei hoba songdakbü shuong Jihudabü phang khümbo phainei lotikei.
Aoei kümthang kümbei, hoba aoyouei on künda, mütpem weko ikdang che kümaleia ikphen lambei hoba jiaeei insiaubu jungkei.
Chemdangbü shuongkei mütpem weko in che bang shouan ong chem dangkei hoba teklaang metbou ngo nyangko kikei.
Hobaje yaangenbü, songdakbü hoba imyam to ngei laukei, “Kümsilei kümlabü yaang hoba kaoen hebüa kia, hoba kümthang thüka sen cheei che ka heko bangan kia,
ainei kilaje kiasikei, ladang teklaang langh ditlaje, kheijinei kün kishang lambo kan kamshaiashi; seneibü Mühghaüei sen shanga wapyolabü.”
Hibü kün kümsileia ikphen lambei hoba haoen yoa jamde ngeyang chanyu longsilengko ka khanshoulitshou alongshongko aubu jungan haiyeiko kikei.
Kheijineitham ngei imyam to laukei, “Mütpem weko Jerusalem bakhün phanga thuiyobü shuong yoa kishi, haoen kho nangnak sen thüka lapheibü yinglabü hoba chaloua kümsilei kümlabü.

Hibü ngei yingsikei, ngeibü jaisina hoba khangenbü shuong ayingsi kü phainei sembü lombü shuong yingsikei, kün aoeikei neisimei asungen, müt- pem wekoei deikhula haujineikei insiaubu jungan ong haukei.”
Tou mütli yoa yaksi yoan haoeneibü jaisina Jihudabü khulimbo ngüh yaang longkei.
Haoenei hai lauko kikei, “Sen hoba seneibü nouyang jayangshou juong yeia; sen shauko yungko kila shanga youshou yoshai thanshaikho.”
Tokei atei hai laukei, “Seneibü sek, semlüh sek, hoba chem yoan angngaikuda; hibü senei mühsinou shanga nyak yoshaikho.”
Tokei hai laukei, “Youshou sek hoba semlüh sek shanga Choba la khüm kula shanga künei nam lotkei.

Lausikei touje küneibü phe küneibü jaisinaeibü phe tegü ki, küneibü shousi haoeneibü shousi to jetei ki. Khei yingsikei chühashi, küneibü nou- yang jayangshou aaola yeilabü lele künei leian louda, nouyang atje khübü thu to sungbaan apa, haoen angla kün to hau aki; aishanga küneibü kao hoba semlüh sek müeibü ika kia.”
Hobaje haoeneibü ngüh hoba lemenbü langh ditan ngo aeibou khau angkei.

Kheijinei ngei ngo lolo damanchühan yaangenbü si songdakbü shuong to hakko laukei, “Kanei hau aei jungeiko kaneibü jaisina weko ka phopnam aei lekei.” Hobaje ngei haoen khulimbo thangyen yaangbü che ngaletkei.

Hobaje ngei haoen to laukei, “Küneibü hau thüng künei lulueibü jaisina Jihudabü mü phang la yaakan apan kibü angngaia, khülonga kanei lulueibü jaisina yaaklep sai ayingsi haoen kho kün la yaaklep sai?” Kheijinei haoen ngüh üangko apbei.
Tokei ngei laukei, “Kanei kümbü kümsilei kho maibü aying; dangbouei sen awealaubü haangjung tokei kanei Mühghaü to souhatbüa apailep lo?
Tokei ngei, ngeibü jaisina hoba khangenbü shuongei senei nam hoba nyak lotkuda. Lausikei senei sanoudambo phopnam telekho.
Ngei sudajada, kanei lean kibü haoeneibü youshou sek, semlüh sek, oliv sek hoba chem, tokei saongao phejana nam tokei youshou, ih hoba onang, kanei lean kibü pendou kho tattham ngaitikuashi!”
Kheijinei haoenei laukei, “Ngaitikukho, hoba haoen ka ai alelabü, nyi laubü tegü künei kümbho.” Kheijinei ngei ungshedbou shuong ngashaian thekubü tegü haoenei jungeila theyotikei.
Tokei ngei ngeibü nei hakan apbo laukei, “Aoei theletbü ajungeilaje mütpem weko jembü chem ka hoba kümkaleika Mühghaüei hai hakan aplabü.” Hobaje kaman kibü pendouei laukei, “Amen” hoba

Tokei Jihuda kaodaka ngo governor pienbü chalou ka Artazerkzes Choba saoche boubü ka khujinto nyiboubü kho po anthüknyi ngo hoba ngeibü jaisinasi shuongei governoreibü shausiyung shaula janan kiasikei shauan achüh.

Lausikei kü thedangto governor aoyou kikei, haoenei mütli ka munam aei lekei, khei chalou chenei khüm chandinam saonyi lean phaia ong tokei wentek hoba ih haoen ka khangkei; haü, khei haoen phanga khangenbü shuongeikei mütshuong thüka hau aei jungeikei, lausikei ngeije khei ajungei, aieilausi ngei Mühghaü to hatkei.
Haü, tokei ngei ho kümthang kümetbü kümaleia athakko ikphen lambei. Künei kao hansho ongkei jekan apho, lausikei ngeibü khangenbü pendouei liko thepyoan kümbeileikei.
Tokei ngeibü nyakshau khümsok nyangko kibü küksithang aoyou kün jungto loukei, haoen to limbo, Jihudabü hoba songdakbü müt saongaoto anjinsem kikei.

Chalou che shanga shausiyung lamlejinei masu pongsu che, shanenbü sanlon lak; tokei aunakkei shisho yoan kü shanga lamleko kikei, hoba chalou an weko ih phang pendou küpjeman phokuko lekei. Lausikei ngei governor shausiyung ladangkei ahi, aieilausi ho mütli thüka khühbü buleng atshaitham künan kikei.
“O ngeibü Mühghaü, mütli shanga ngei ai kümbei, ho shanga ngo damenshima.”
Ladang kümthang kho yeia, touje joubü leilubü aki dogo Sanballat, Tobia hoba Arabbü Geshem hoba joubü labou shuongei ditletkei, (kho jiha tokei bakhüna koukap ajinko kiteikei),
Sanballat si Geshem, haosiei kü jungto ngühlang hautiko laukei, “Kaiya, sen Ono pholia sang chenei liko haüyokho;” lausikei haoenei kü to amaibü kümla dambei.
Hobaje ngei haoen jungto ngühlang künbü hautiko laukei, “Ngei kümsilei yaangbü che kümbo kia, hibü ngo louyenla athük; ngo kan jungto louyenla shanga kümsilei kho lai yongshetan phola?”
Haoenei kho tegü ong kü jungto leinei sühko hautikei lausikei ngei jeteibü jongaibü ong kukei.
Kheijinei ngaoboula Sanballatei hao khangenbü che akhinbü le che jungan kü jungto hautikei.

Khonei hai doan kikei: “Phangshuong jungto ho ngühlang loukei hoba Geshemeikei kho tükde dogo lauda, khei nyi hoba Jihudabüei huonbüyoubü tegü damda, kho haangjung nyi kümthang kho kümda, hoba ho ngühlang ditbüei no haoeneibü Choba yeilabü.
Tokei Jihuda kaodaka Choba che kia dogo Jerusalema ka shangabü phinthonla shanga nyi thuseibü pienkei, hoba kho ngühlang kho tou Choba jungto künjan. Hibü kaiya, sen liko janyokho.”
Kheijinei ngei hao jungto hautiko laukei, “Nyi laubü tegü kümbü kümsilei ai aki, lausikei nyi lolo maang ka pakenan laubü ong.”
Aishanga haoen pendouei kün hattiko dogo hai laukei, “Haoeneibü ik kho kümaleia hau akiko aplabü, hoba kho ayeienlabü.” Lausikei ngei welaukei, “O Mühghaü, nyi ngeibü ik hau kingaitiashi!”

Hobaje ngo, Mehetabeleibü shi hoba Delaiaeibü shou Shemaia, ao khinngailangan kikei, hao chem to haukei hoba haoei laukei, “Seti lembüchem kommaanga Mühghaü chema liko haüyokho hoba kou kho kapbo, aieilausi haoen louan no haitilabü; haü, haoen nangnak no haitila louada.”
Kheijinei ngei laukei, “Ngo tegübü müt cheei khei satlep lo? Hobaje ngo tegübü müt cheei jembü langkei khümenla shanga lembüchema satetlangla se? Ngo khüto ütlabü.”
Chühashi, ngei ngekei, Mühghaüei hao ohauti, lausikei haoei ngo khulimbo joyola Tobia si Sanballat haosiei hao besaei jekthetkei.
Kho tegü ngo haitila hoba hatbüa shed shontila hoba ngo khulimbo amaibü ngühlang at haoenei hapenla hoba ngo attila shanga huonei hao suletkei.
“O Mühghaü, Tobia si Sanballat haosi hamei kümbü kümsilei hoba thuseinyu Noadia yoa joubü thuseibü shuongei ngo hattimoktila ai ong küma, ho nyi damenshima.”
Kho tegü kümthang kho chalou anjinsemto nyia Elul lit saoto ngao bounyeta khümbei.
Ladang dangbouei kho ditkei, kaijembo kibü phang pendouei kün to hatkei, hoba chühmang asühko apbei; aieilausi ho Mühghaüeibü kümsilei dogo haoenei ditenkei.
Kho chaloua Jihudabü yaangenbü ka Tobia jungto le juong hautikei hoba Tobia kakei kho tegü haoenei hapbei.

Aieilausi hao Araeibü shou Shekaniaeibü kounyangbou kikei, hoba haoeibü shou Jehohananei Berekiaeibü shou Meshullam nouyangshou lebü haangjung Jihudaa hao thedanga mat ngekko theyolanyobü juong kikei.
Haoenei haoeibü kümsilei maibü shanga kü to lenkei, hoba kü shangakei haoen jungto hauan lenkei. Hobaje Tobiaei ngo hattiko le dodang lekei.
Tou kümthang kho yeikei, hoba ngei koukhün lombü, chia laubü hoba Levibü pienkei.
Kheijinei kümsilei kho ngeibü jaisina Hanani la, hoba lapheishona kongnyu ikjaibou Hanania la Jerusalem khümbo kukei, aieilausi juong toje hao maang lemenbou hoba Mühghaü to hatbü müt che kiteikei.

Hobaje ngei haoen to laukei, “Chanyu akangshongko Jerusalem bakhün tüip, hoba haoenei lombo kitoua bakhün kho khintiashi hoba koukhin jintiashi, hoba mütpem weko jembü lolo hoba lulueibü chem lomla shanga Jerusalema kibü khümbo ka lombü pienjan.”
Tou sangnyu kho yaang hoba ongatham phanganyenga lausikei khünei kibü mütli shisho ong hoba kishang chem mo adangkei.

Hobaje Mühghaüei kü to yaangenbü, songdakbü hoba mütli leishaibü haoen lai haajung loukei yenei yenko dola lenkei. Haoen shaangbü shuong haajung loubü shanga le kho ngei sungbaenkei, hoba khünei dobü ngei hapbei.
Khübü kho provinsa kibü Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnezzarei lapjung haubü shousi shuong, aoyou nyibou Jerusalem hoba Jihuda kaodak to longeikei, lulueibü sangnyu lambo ngaikei.
Haoen Zerubbabel, Jeshua, Nehemia, Azaria, Raamia, Nahamani, Mordekai, Bilshan, Misperet, Bigvai, Nehum hoba Baana yoa loukei.
Langsenbü ka longeibü Israel chung weko kabü mütshang webü lühbak ho ki:
Parosh - 2,172
Shefatia - 372
Ara - 652
Pahath Moab (Jeshua si Joab thensilen) - 2,818
Elam - 1,254
Zattu - 845
Zakkai - 760
Binnui - 648
Bebai - 628
Azgad - 2,322
Adonikam - 667
Bigvai - 2,067
Adin - 655
Ater (Hezekia danko) - 98
Hashum - 328
Bezai - 324
Harif - 112
Gibeon - 95
Habü sangnyua kibü thensilen mütshuongkei longeikei: Bethlehem hoba Netofa - 188
Anathot - 128
Beth Azmavet - 42
Kiriath Jearim, Kefira hoba Beeroth - 743
Rama hoba Geba - 621
Mikmash - 122
Bethel hoba Ai - 123
Lubü Nebo - 52
Lubü Elam - 1,254
Harim - 320
Jerikho - 345
Lod, Hadid hoba Ono - 721
Senaa - 3,930
Ho langsenbü ka longeibü ungshedbü chung lühbak: Jedaia (Jeshua thensilen) - 973
Immer - 1,052
Pashur - 1,247
Harim - 1,017
Langsenbü ka longeibü Levi chung lühbak: Jeshua hoba Kadmiel (Hodavia thensilen) - 74
Lembüchema chia laubü (Asaf thensilen) - 148
Lembüchem lombü dan (Shallum, Ater, Talmon, Akkub, Hatita hoba Shobai) - 138
Langsenbü ka longeibü lembüchema kümbüleibü shuong: Ziha, Hasufa, Tabbaoth,
Keros, Sia, Padon,
Lebana, Hagaba, Shalmai,
Hanan, Giddel, Gahar,
Reaia, Rezin, Nekoda,
Gazzam, Uzza, Pasea,
Besai, Meunim, Nefussim,
Bakbuk, Hakufa, Harhur,
Bazluth, Mehida, Harsha,
Barkos, Sisera, Tema,
Nezia, hoba Hatifa.
Langsenbü ka longeibü Solomoneibü sambü shuong: Sotai, Sofereth, Perida,
Jaala, Darkon, Giddel,
Shefatia, Hattil, Pokereth,
Hazzebaim, hoba Amon.
Langsenbü ka longeibü lembüchema kümbüleibü hoba Solomoneibü sambü shuong thensilen lühbak pendouei saongao semto anjin ngaoto nyi.

Tel Mela, Tel Harsha hoba Kherub, Addon hoba Immer sangnyu ka longeibü Delaia, Tobia, hoba Nekoda chung pendouei mütshang saongao lakto saonyito nyi kiteikei; lausikei haoenei haoen Israelbü yingkei dogo aukabü akuen.

Habü ungshedbou chungei haoeneibü pithen bouthen aukabü dobü aphanen; Hobaia, Hakkoz, hoba Barzillai. (Barzillai ungshedbou pisibouei Gileadbü Barzillai chung ka yak che ngakei hoba kounyangbou chungeibü nyen lekei). Haoenei haoeneibü pithen aphanenbü ka haoen ungshedbou la ale.
Jihudabü governorei haoen to Urim si Thummim jungeilabü lele ungshedbou che aki shongkoje Mühghaü to lembü saopobü shausiyung haoenei shaula athük dogo laukei.
Langsenbü ka longeibü lühbak pendouei - 42,360
Haoeneibü sambü hoba samnyu shuong - 7,337
Chia laubü bousu yaksa - 245
Koli - 736
Koli phatbü - 245
Gadu - 6,720
Mütshuong juongei lembü- chem dangetbüa thuiyola haujem kuyokei: Governorei hon seret 8
phauyaang 50
ungshedbou neisimei 530
Chung konglebou shuongei hon seret 168
chandinam seret 1250
Joubü noknyühei
hon seret 168
chandinam seret 140
ungshedbou neisimei 67
Hibü ungshedbou, Levibü, koukhün lombü, chia laubü, tokei imyam at hoba lembüchema kümbüleibü dan hoba Israelbü khümbo haoeneibü sangnyua kikei.

Hobaje lit nyet boubüaje Israel shousi shuong khümbo lulueibü sangnyua kikei. Tou mütli pendou müt che tegü ong Dei Bakhün thedanga khongthu ongabüa kamshaikei, hoba haoenei dobou Ezra to Mosa Ngühkhüm, laobou
Hobaje lit nyet boubü shaangbounyet ditenko ditla thükbü bousu yaksa kamshaian kibü thangyen to ungshedbou Ezraei Ngühkhüm le kho sungbakei.
Hobaje yungko thedanga ongabü khongthua kamshaian kibü ditenbü shuong thedanga ngeyang ka chalou chajih sühko haoei Ngühkhüm kho wekei hoba kho Ngühkhüm le wejinei müt pendouei nou haangan ditkei.

Dobou Ezra washon chenei lokei hoba haoeibü mae aenei, Matithia, Shema, Anaia, Uria, Hilkia, hoba Maaseia lokei; haoeibü nanaenei Pedaia, Mishael, Malkija, Hashum, Hashbadana, Zekharia hoba Meshullam lokei.
Hobaje Ezraei le müt pendouei hapbo ipbei (aishanga hao pendou thüka tonenan loan kikei) hoba ladang haoei kho ipbei müt pendou lokei.
Hobaje Ezraei laukei, “Yaangenbou
Hobaje müt pendouei haoeneibü ik mühae tuokkei hoba, “Amen! Amen!” dogo lauko jongaikei. Hobaje haoeneibü thenyek kao ae yeian khüpetan

Tokei Jeshua, Bani, Sherebia, Jamin, Akkub, Shabbethai, Hodia, Maaseia, Kelita, Azaria, Jozabad, Hanan, Pelaia hoba Levi shuongei mütli shuong la Ngühkhüm kho ditshuoktikei hoba mütli shuong haoen lulueibü kaoena lokei.
Hobaje Mühghaüeibü Ngühkhüm le ka shangashatko wekei, hoba haoenei tetlabü kho wanenkukei, hibü webü kho mütshuongei ditenkei.

Ladang mütshuongei Ngühkhüm le kabü ngüh shuong weko ditkei haoen to meiyoukei hoba haoen haapyola khangkei. Hibü governor Nehemia, ungshedbou hoba Ngühkhüm dobou Ezra, hoba mütshuong la wanenkubou Levibü shuongei müt pendou to lenkei, “Tatbü ho kaneibü Mühghaü
Kheijinei haoei haoen to laukei, “Kan hauashi, haabü jemoubü shauashi hoba teibü kho yungashi, hoba lamlean akibü dan shanga lembü phejan at künashi. Aishanga
Hibü Levibüei mütli pendou senyühshemtiko laukei, “Kan küpjembo kishi, aieilausi tat saopobü chalou ki. Kan maangto teshat.”
Hobaje müt pendouei shaula yungla phejan at künkei, hoba haoen olinyola haukei; aieilausi haoen la ngekletkubü ngüh kho haoenei ditenkei.
Nyibounyet chung pendou ka kongnyu shuong hoba Levibü haoen pendou dobou Ezra jungto ngühkhüm ngüh kho lamla kamshaikei.
Hobaje
hoba sangnyu pendoua hoba Jerusalema haoenei hai ngekjan, “Shongh khüto angashi hoba doan kibü tegü dip dangla shanga oliv bubhek hoba bunyem shangbüeibü bhek, doan kibü tegü dip dangla yoshaiashi.”
Hibü imyamei hauan khübü peisilei kho sungjung louan müt- pem wekoei lulueibü chemdaka, khonga, hoba Mühghaü lemshang chem kouteia, Dei Bakhün, ongabü khongthua lulu lolo dip dangkei.

Hobaje aoyou langsenbü ka longeian kikei, haoen pendouei dip kho dangkei, hoba khünei kikei; aieilausi Naneibü shou Joshuaeibü chalou ka khangan ho chalou sühko Israel shousi shuongei kho tegü akümbo loukei. Hobaje lemlemtham olinyobü yaang kikei.

Hobaje chalou angbou shaangbounyet ka thonbü chalou sühko haoei Mühghaüeibü ngühkhüm le ka wekei. Hobaje haoenei chalou nyet sühko lem kho likei, hoba setbounyet thonbü lem kambü che songa kibü tegütham haoenei kikei.
Tou ho lit chalou saoto leibounyet Israel shousi shuong senounei neian hoba haoen thüka tham naangan mühei nyengko kamshaikei.
Hobaje Israel mütli phai küksithang ka haoen lolo janyinan lokei, hoba haoenei lulueibü shabü hoba pisiboueibü shabü kümsilei shedbü thekukei.
Hobaje haoen lulu kishanga lokei hoba khünyet angh sem haoeneibü Mühghaü
Kheijinei Levi phang shemjanga Jeshua, Bani, Kadmeil, Shebania, Bunni, Sherebia, Bani hoba Chenani lokei, hoba
Hobaje Levibü shuong: Jeshua, Kadmeil, Bani, Hashabneia, Sherebia, Hodia, Shebania hoba Pethahia, haoen danei laukei:
“Loashi hoba kaibü Mühghaü
hao ponpen thon akiko sangashi!
Müteibü nyensang kheinyutham soubü ayingsi dogokei,
mütpem wekoei hao soneikangbü nyen sangashi.”
Hobaje Israel mütshuongei ho hai welaukei:
“No ong
ka to limbo toukei aki;
nyi müh hoba mühkabü khanshoulitshou shuong kümbei.
Nyi kaodak hoba yungnyu hoba khünei kibü pendou kümbei;
hoba khübü pendou la nyi kukei.
Hobaje müha kibü danei khüpetda hoba no lemda.
No
aoei Abram pienkei,
hoba Khaldibü kaodak Ur ka hao leijung louan hao la
Abraham nyenkukei.
Hobaje ka to maanglemenbü maangpon nyi hao ka hapbei,
hoba Kanan, Hit, Amor, Periz, Jebus hoba Girgashbü kibü kaodak
hao la kula theyolanyokei,
hoba kaibü ngüh kümsilei la yeitikei,
aieilausi no saopobü ki.
“Nyi Ijep kaodaka küneibü pisibou khonkubü hapbei;
Saklangbü Yungnyua nyi haoenei ngekbü ngühlang ditkei.
Farao thedanga hoba haoeibü eikshuong
hoba haoeibü kaonyek mütli khulimbo nyi amaaphelabü
hoba maangpanglabü seikümseilei lenkei.
Aishanga nyi ngekkei,
haoenei yonglambo habü khulimbo jungeikei
hoba tat chalou tegü kaibü nyen ngean aptikei.
Hobaje haoenei yungnyu deiyaak danko kaolina danlabü lele
nyi yungnyu kho janyinkei;
hoba haoen shijung loubü dangbou kho dei yaangbü maanga
laang che tegü haübüa mautikei.
Tokei haoen laeto ong haulaje lama ngesakbü kula shanga
nyi change nangnak wan thaonyuei haoen lam leikei.
No tokei Sinai shongh thükto louyenkei
hoba haoen to khuthük ka joyokei;
Hobaje haoen la ngühmai matjem hoba ngühmai ngühkhüm,
takletbü ngühkhüm hoba sengkubü maibü kukei.
Nyi haoen la khangenbou Mosa danko saopobü Nounyet ngetikei
hoba ngühkhüm shuong kho haoen la sakkukei.
“Hobaje haoen mühei haijinei khuthük ka wentek kukei,
hoba dei lajinei yunglabü dei laang ka longtikei;
hoba nyi kula thekubü kaodak khüto hauan kishi dogo thekukei.
Lausikei haoen hoba küneibü pisibouei yonglambo tukosekko
kaibü ngühkhüm shuong aditkuko apbei.
Hobaje haoenei kaibü ngüha ale,
hoba haoen junga kaibü seikümseilei shuong
haoeneibü maang to üt;
lausikei haoen tukosekko lenbü aditbü lenko
tokei nyibou khühbü buleng thu to sepeinyu ngaila
haoenei leiyeibü che pienkei.
Lausikei no shedbü apbuenbü Mühghaü,
khauangla maangyangsho,
onoua apsileko kibü Mühghaü hoba nyi haoen üpyo.
Haü, haoenei tühnyinbü masu pongsu che
haoen lolo kümbei hoba laukei,
‘Ho kaneibü mühghaü,
aoei kan Ijep ka leian loukei.’
Kho tegübü haoenei aweasüngbü kümsilei yaang kümbei.
Lausikei kaibü onou yongkotham yaangbü ka
nyi haoen yamlamanga ananglet;
changea leibü sangmei thaonyu hoba nangnak wan thaonyuei
ngesak lenkei hoba haoen haubü
lamnyu shean lenla shanga haoen üpyo.
Haoen la lenla soushou maibü haoen la kukei,
haoeneibü sembung ka kaibü mana nyi asungngai;
hoba haoen dei lajinei nyi dei kukei.
Haü, po saonyi nyi haoen yamlamanga sambei,
haoen aieikei shaleko üpyo;
haoeneibü neisimei ühang hoba haoen you apok.
“Tokei nyi haoen la sangle shuong
hoba phangshuong kukei,
laobou phejan nyi pheian kukei;
kho tegü haoenei Heshbonbü Choba Sihon kao
hoba Bashanbü Choba Og kaodak yoan lekei.
Haoeneibü shousi müha khanshoulitshou tegü nyi hautikei
hoba haoeneibü pisibou to laobou kao kukho laukei,
khoto nyi haoen leian louan phokukei.
Hibü shieishouei hauan kho kaodak lekei
hoba khünei kibü Kananbü Chobaei leian
imyam pendou nyi haoen phang to lottikei,
khei haoen yoa haoen maangleko kila shanga.
Ba lengaian kibü sangnyu shuong,
