hoba haabü kibü kaonyek kho haoenei lekei;
hoba khünei peisilei maibüei shenan kibü chem shuong,
yaüenan kibü yungdei shuong,
semlüh si oliv bamang shuong,
hoba buheklong shuong apsileko haoeneibü yeikei,
nyi maisho thounoubüei haoen olinyokei.
“Khei yingsikei haoenei lenbü aditko
no khulimbo meimeikei
hoba kaibü ngühkhüm phainei nangletkei;
thuseibü aoyouei haoen ka jungto sepeinyu longeitila
maangsanglabü songlen kukei haoen haitikei,
hoba aweasüngbü kümsilei yaang kümbei.
Hibü nyi haoen dangboueibü ik to kukei;
hoba khonsak jiha haoenei ngekbü ngühlang
khuthük ka nyi ditkei.
Hobaje kaibü onou yaangbüei haoen dangboueibü ik ka
püetan phola shanga nyi haoen la khuleilanglei shuong kukei.
Lausikei longche ong haksoko kianje tokei haoenei
ka thedanga amaibü kümbei;
hibü nyi haoen dangboueibü ika nangletnyu phokei,
hoba haoen thüka haoenei songdakkei.
Lausikei ladang haoenei sepeinyu ka junga ngekkei,
nyi khuthük ka ditkei,
hoba onouei haoen annebenko khümenkei.
Hobaje nyi haoen kaibü ngühkhüm phangto leian loula shanga shangashatko maangsanglabü kukei;
lausikei haoenei liliseseko jungeikei;
aoyouei kho jungeilaje lang kilabü yingankei,
haoenei kaibü ngühkhüm to ngüha ale;
hoba kaibü matjem khulimbo shed shonkei.
Haoenei phak atho lausikei ngüm kaangko tubüsekbü lenkei hoba lenbü adit.
Khei yingasikei nyi po lounyu haoen to natenkei.
Hobaje ka soushouei thuseibü shuong danko
haoen khulimbo maangsanglabü küntikei lankei haoen la nou ayem;
hibü nyi haoen kho kaonyeka kibü mütshuong ikto kukei.
Khei yingsi dogokei nyi haoen to onoukei,
khoei haoen lemailela amauti ayingsi üpyo;
aieilausi no sanoubü hoba onou thonbü Mühghaü ki!
“Hibü tou, O Mühghaü, theletbü
hoba onou phoenbü yaangenbou,
hoba hatlamoklabü Mühghaü!
Assiriabü Choba shuong haang ka tat sühko kün jungto,
hoba küneibü Choba shuong küneibü khuleibü shuong,
küneibü ungshedbou küneibü thuseibü,
küneibü bousi shuong hoba kaibü mütli pendou jungto loubü
khonsak khonku ho ka thedanga hanbü tegü ki.
Ai yinglaje yingasikei,
kün to haüthükbü pendoua nyi janbü ong küma;
aishanga künei kümsilei amaibü kümasikei
nyije ngühmaanglanbü ong kümda.
Küneibü yaangenbü leiyeibü ungshedbou shuong
ayingsi bousi shuong aoeikei kaibü ngüha ale,
ayingsi kaibü sakkubü hoba kaibü ngühkhüma apai.
No yongko maibü danko nyi haoen la kubü haoenei sangle
hoba haabü kibü kaodak ongabü hapbei;
lausikei khünei haoenei no akhangen,
ayingsi amaibü kümsilei ka haoen asepei.
Chühashi, tat kün aaola lean kia,
nyi küneibü pisibou la kubü kaonyeka
hoba khünei buhekdeihek hoba peisilei maibü shaulabü jeiko,
chühashi kün aaola yeian kia.
Ho kao honei Choba shuong aoyou la
küneibü shabü danko kün thüka nyi song daktikei,
haoen la lang aei haatikukei.
Tokei küneibü manga hoba küneibü samkeisamuk thüka
haoenei jungeimang sühbü jungeila hau kia,
hoba kün khonsak khonku yaanga kia!”
Ho pendou shanga künei thebülanbü kaangko phoda, hoba doan phoda; hoba küneibü leiyeibü kün Levi phang hoba ungshedbou shuong nyen khünei jangan phoda.
Tou nyen jangan phobü shuong nyen: governor Nehemia, Hakaliaeibü shou hoba Zedekia.

Ungshedbou shuong: Seraia, Azaria, Jeremia, Pashhur, Amaria, Malkija, Hattush, Shebania, Malluk, Harim, Meremoth, Obadia, Daniel, Ginnethon, Baruk, Meshullam, Abija, Mijamin, Maa- zia, Bilgai, Shemia.
Azania shou Jeshua, Henadad chung kabü Binnui, Kadmiel, Shebania, Hodia, Kelita, Pelaia, Hanan, Mika, Rehob, Heshabia, Zakkur, Sherebia, Shebania, Hodia, Bani, Beninu.

Mütli Khuleibü Shuong: Parosh, Pahath Moab, Elam, Zattu, Bani, Bunni, Azgad, Bebai, Adonija, Bigvai, Adin, Ater, Hezekia, Azzur, Hodia, Hashum, Bezai, Harif, Anathot, Nebai, Magpiash, Meshullam, Hezir, Meshezabel, Zadok, Jaddua, Pelatia, Hanan, Anaia, Hoshea, Hanania, Hasshub, Hallohesh, Pilha, Shobek, Rehum, Hashabna, Maaseia, Ahia, Hanan, Anan, Malluk, Harim, hoba Baana.

Joubü mütshuong ungshedbou, Levibü, koukhün lombü, chia laubü, lembüchema kümbüleibü dan, hoba joubü pendou aoyou ho kaodaka kibü mütshuong ka janyinan Mühghaüeibü ngühkhüm aenei ki, hoba haoeneibü shousi yaksi shuong hoba nouyangshou shuong aoyou to ditenbü hoba hapbü ngebü songsido kibü pendou,
haoen haoeneibü jaisina hoba yaangbü shuong yoan takshatkei hoba shedsikhau ngekletko Mühghaü khangenbou Mosa la kubü Mühghaüeibü takletbü ngühkhüma paila hoba
Hobaje ho kaonyeka kibü mütshuong la küneibü nouyangshou akula hoba küneibü jayangshou shuongeikei haoeneibü nouyangshousi alela theyolanyokei.

Tokei ho kaonyeka kibüei peisilei ayingsi youshou yaakla sungbaalonga künei khübü kho Nounyet ayingsi saopobü chaloua ajeklabü hoba künei nyetbou po sek khokei aplabü, hoba hila kibü namsangh pendou apbulabü.
Tokei künei Mühghaüeibü lemshang chem shanga chandinam shekel phejan sema che po weko lemla theletkei.

Tokei khümsoka phobü wen, shausiyung lembü hoba juokbü lembü athakko phokula Nounyet, lit haanbü pienbü lem hoba saopobü peisilei shuong Israelbü shanga shatbü chühbü lembüsabü, hoba Mühghaüeibü lembü chem kümsilei pendou ho pendou shanga künei thekukei.
Tokei ngühkhüma doan kibü tegü püshi chung thenan, po weko jih takletbüa bu lembü kubü shanga hoba kho küneibü Mühghaüeibü chema yoshailabü hoba
Hobaje kao ka longbü shaangbü buhek hoba bulong phang pendoua shaang hekbü bu- hek po weko

Hobaje shaang langshangbü, samkeisamuk shaang sitbü, ngühkhüma doan kibü tegü hoba shatsinam hoba sanlon dan ka shaang shatbü Mühghaüeibü chem to ungshedbou ao khünei kümbo ki, hao jungto jungan loula thekukei.

Hobaje küneibü shausiyung ka shaangbou youshou, küneibü haujem lembü hoba buhek phang lulu kabü hek hoba ih si onang küneibü Mühghaüeibü chem shemjanga ungshedbou jungto künei künjan; tokei küneibü kao ka an phejan lembü kho Levibü la sungbakujan, aieilausi künei sekmoubü kaonyek hoba sangnyu pendoua an phejan kho Levibüei hedatakda.

Ladang Levibü phang shuongei an phejan kho sungletlaje, haoen yoa Aroneibü shou ungshedbou kho kijan hoba Levibü phang shuongei an phejan thükto an phejan kho Mühghaüeibü chem shemjang khüto jungan louan thanshanga pholabü.

Aieilausi Israel shousi shuong hoba Levi shousi shuongei haujem lembü youshou, ih, onang khübü kho saopobü thung phoshang shemjang hoba khünei kümbü ungshedbou koukhün lombü hoba chia laubü kishang shemjang khünei yoshailabü hoba künei Mühghaüeibü chem kho sangliphanga üpyolabü.
Hobaje mütli leiyeibü shuong Jerusalema kikei, joubü mütshuong yoa an phejana che Jerusalem saopobü sangnyua kila leian loukukei, hoba phejan gü kho sangnyu lubüa kila phaang pakkei.
Hobaje Jerusalema kila aoyouei lulu lolo maangangenkei, haoen pendou imyamei haükukei.

Kaonyeka kongnyu shuong Jerusalema kibü kho habü ho ki; lausikei Jihuda sangnyua lulueibü phejana kibü habü; Israel, ungshedbou, Levibü, lembüchema kümbüleibü dan hoba Solomon khangenbü shousi shuong.

Jihuda phang shousi shuong: Hobaje Jerusalema Jihuda si Benjamineibü shousi at kikei, Jihudabü shousi yoa Uzziaeibü shou Athaia, Zekhariaeibü shou Amariaeibü shou, Shefatiaeibü shou hoba Mahalaleleibü shou, Perezeibü shousi shuong.
Barukeibü shou Maaseia, Kolhozeeibü shou Hazaiaeibü shou Adaiaeibü shou, Joiaribeibü shou, Zekhariaeibü shou hoba Shelaeibü shou.
Jerusalema kibü Perezeibü shousi shuong sonenbü müt pendouei saongao leito saosemto set kikei.
Benjamin phang shousi shuong: Tokei Benjamineibü bousu shousi habü ho: Joedeibü shou Sallueibü shou Meshullam. Haoeibü lubü thensilen shuong habü ho: Pedaia, Kolaia, Maaseia, Ithiel, hoba Jeshaia.
Hao phainei Gabbai si Sallai, saongao güto saoto set.
Hobaje Zikrieibü shou Joel haoen thüka chühbou kikei, hoba Hassenuaeibü shou Jihuda kho sangnyu thüka nyiboubü kikei.
Ungshedbou shuong yo ka: Joiaribeibü shou Jedaia, Jakin,
Hilkiaeibü shou Seraia, Meshullameibü shou, Zadokeibü shou, Meraioteibü shou, Ahitubeibü shou, habü ho Mühghaüeibü chema songdakbü shuong kikei.
Hobaje haoeneibü jaisinaeibü chema kümbü saongao setto saoto nyi kikei, hoba Jerohameibü shou Adaia, Pelaliaeibü shou, Amzieibü shou, Zekhariaeibü shou, Pashureibü shou, Malkijaeibü shou.
Hobaje haoeibü jaisinasi shuong püshi lin chunga leiyeibü saoanto saonyito nyi hoba Azareleibü shou Amashsai, Ahzaieibü shou, Meshellemoteibü shou, Immereibü shou,
hoba haoeneibü jaisina nyenshen lakjaibü müt saongaoto saoto set. Haoen thüka chühbou Haggedolimeibü shou Zabdiel kikei.
Levibü shuong: Levibü yoa Hasshubeibü shou Shemaia Azrikameibü shou, Hashabiaeibü shou Bunnieibü shou.
Hobaje Levibü phang yoa leiyeibü yo ka Shabbethai hoba Jozabad yoan Mühghaüeibü chem chühbü kümsileia kikei.

Hobaje Mikaeibü shou Mattania, Zabdieibü shou, Asa- feibü shou, ao nyensang kubü welaubüa leiyeibou kikei; hoba haoeibü jaisina yoa nyiboubü kho Bakbukia, hoba Shammuaeibü shou Abda, Galaleibü shou Jeduthuneibü shou.
Saopobü sangnyua kibü Levibü pendouei saoanto saoleito lei kikei.
Lembüchem lombü shuong Akkub, Talmon, hoba haoeneibü jaisina bakhün lombü pendouei saongao to anjinleito nyi kikei.
Joubü Israelbü ungshedbou hoba Levi phang pendou Jihuda kaodak sangnyu pendoua müt- pem weko lulueibü phet phanko kikei.
Lausikei lembüchem kümsilei kümbü danje Ofela kikei hoba lembüchem kümbü dan thüka Ziha si Gishpa ham kikei.
Jerusalema Levibü chühbou Banieibü shou Uzzi, Hashabiaeibü shou, Mattaniaeibü shou, Mikaeibü shou, Asafeibü shousi shuong chia laubü aoyou Mühghaüeibü chema kümaleia chühbou kikei.
Aieilausi haoen shanga Choba ka ngühkhüm kho ho kikei, khei chalou angbou shanga chia laubü dan la takletkubü shausiyung kujan.
Hobaje Meshezabeleibü shou Pethahia, ao Jihudaeibü shou Zera ka pakkei, hao Choba to thenbou kikei; aoeibü ika mütli to chühla hau pendou kukei.
Hobaje sanga kibü hoba haoeneibü sek to chühla shanga Jihudabü shousi at Kiriath Arba, Dibon, hoba Jekabzeel sangnyu shuong hoba habü kaijembo kibü sangayama kikei.
Tokei Jeshuaa hoba Moladaa, Beth-Peleta:
Hazarshual, Beersheba hoba khübü kaijembo kibü sanga,
hoba Ziklag, Mekona hoba kaijembo kibü sanga.
Enrimon, Zora, Jarmuta
Zanoa, Adullam hoba kaijembo sanga Lakhish hoba kho kaijembo khongthua, Azeka hoba kho sang kaijemboa. Hibü haoenei Beersheba ka Hinnom pholi sühkoa setshang imenko chem dangkei.
Benjamineibü shousi shuong Geba ka kijung haubü Mikmash, Aija, Bethel, hoba khübü sangnyu kaijemboa kibü sanga,
hoba Anathot, Nob, Anania,
Hazor, Rama, Gittaim;
Hadid, Zeboim, Neballat,
Lod, Ono, peisilei hapshang pholi sühko louan kikei.
Jihuda chunga Levibü janyinbü atei Benjamin chung lamjung haukei.
Tou ungshedbou si Levibü aoyou Shealtieleibü shou Zerubbabel hoba Jeshua yoa haukei haoeneibü nyen; Seria, Jeremia, Ezra,
Ungshedbou shoung:
Amaria, Malluk, Hattush
Shekania, Rehum, Meremot
Iddo, Ginnethon, Abija
Mijamin, Moadia, Bilga
Shemia, Joiarib, Jedia
Sallu, Amok, Hia, Jedaia chaloua khübü kho ungshedbou chungthem hoba haoeneibü jaisinasi shuong kikei.
Levibü shuong:
Jeshua Binnui, Kadmiel, Sherebia, Jihuda hoba Mattania, ao chia laubü dan leiyeibü kikei, hao haoeibü jaisinasi shuong.
Tokei haoeneibü jaisinasi Bakbukia si Unni ham haoen thedanga lokei
Hobaje Jeshua ka Joiakim pakkei
Eliashib ka Joiada pakkei, hoba Joiada ka Jonathan ka Jaddua pakkei.
Hobaje Joiakim chaloua ungshedbou shuong bou lin nyek weko ka kongnyubou pienkei:
Meraia
Seraia
Hanania
Jeremia
Meshullam
Ezra
Jehohanan
Amaria
Jonathan
Malluk
Shekania
Josef
Adna
Harim
Helkai
Meremoth
Zekharia
Iddo
Meshullam
Ginnethon
Zikhri
Abija
Abija
Miniamin
Piltai
Moadia
Shammua
Bilga
Jehonathan
Shemaia
Mattenai
Joiarib
Uzzi
Jedaia
Kallai
Sallu
Eber
Amok
Hashabia
Hilkia
Nethanel
Jedaia
Levibü Eliashib, Joiada, Johanan hoba Jaddua chalou ka Persiabü Choba Darias songdakbü chalou sühko püshi lin nyek weko kongnyu nyen doan kikei.
Levibü shousi shuong püshi lin khushen weko ka kongnyu nyen khei Eliashibeibü shi Johanan chalou sühko lüngbüdobü lea doan kikei.

Tokei Levi phanga kongnyu shuong: Hashabia, Sherebia, hoba Kadmieleibü shou Jeshua hoba haoeneibü jaisinasi shuong Mühghaü hangangbü Dawid Chobaei sakkubü ngühkhüm tegü nyensang kubü kümaleia janyinbü wekoa chühbou kikei.
Thanshang shemjanga koukhün lombü shuong kho Mattanaia, Bakbukia, Obadia, Meshullam, Talmon hoba Akkub kikei.
Habü, ho Jeshuaeibü shou Joiakim, Jozadakeibü shi haoeibü jiha hoba governor Nehemia hoba dobou Ezra jihsiphaia kikei.

Hobaje Jerusalem kümthang saüenbü chaloua kongkin, pithung, kaangjin jungeiko nyensang chia laubüei saüenbü lem kho lemlemtila shanga kaoen pendou ka Levibü phang shuongei lambo Jerusalem to leishaikei.
Hobaje chia laubü heshou shuong Jerusalem kaijembo pholi kaonyek hoba Netofath kaonyek juong ka takshatkei.
Tokei Bethgilgal hoba Azmavet si Giba ham kaonyek ka loukei, aieilausi chia laubü shuongei Jerusalem kaijembo haoeneibü sang sangkei.
Hobaje ungshedbou si Levibü haoen lolo saüenkei; hoba haoenei bakhün kümthang hoba khübü mütli saüenkei.
Kheijinei ngei Jihudabü yaangbü shuong kümthang thükaenei leishaikei, hoba nyensang kuko khong shoongko haula tan yaangbü penyi pienkei; tan che kümthang mae aeto od apshang bakhün aeto haukei;
hoba haoen phainei Hosheia hoba Jihudabü jamde,
hoba Azaria, Ezra, Meshullam,
Jihuda, Benjamin, Shemaia, Jeremia
hoba ungshedbou shousi shuong at teklaang yoa haoeneibü nyen Jonathaneibü shou Zekharia, Shemaiaeibü shou Mattaniaeibü shou, Mikaiaeibü shou, Zakureibü shou, Asafeibü shou;
hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong Shemaia, Azarel, Milalai, Gilalai, Maai, Nethanel, Jihuda, Hanani, Mühghaü müt Dawid shangabü kongkin phang lulu yoan sembei, hoba dobou Ezra haoen thedangto haukei.
Hobaje haoenei Deibak Bakhün ka Dawideibü chem thüka kibü kümthang to longshang Dawideibü sangnyu henyu dogo laubü lamnyu to chanyu angbou aenei kibü Deibak Bakhün sühko angkei.

Hobaje nyensang kuko khong shoongan nyiboubü tan kho haoen to haüyola haukei, hoba haoen phaia ngo hoba kümthang thükaenei kibü mütshuong jamde wanhap lapheishon thük ka phaangyaangbü kümthang kho sühko hukjung angkei.
Hobaje Efraim Bakhün thükae ka hangbü bakhün si Ngau Bakhün ham hoba Hananel si Hamnea lapheishon ham danko San Bakhün sühko angkei hoba bakhün lombü thedanga küpjemetnyu atopeiko lokei.
Kho tegü Mühghaüeibü chema nyensang kubü dan ham lokei, hoba ngo hoba songdakbü shuong jamde thüng,
hoba ungshedbou shuong; Eliakim, Maaseia, Miniamin, Mikaia, Elionai, Zekharia, Hanania, haoeneibü teklaang jungkei,
hoba Maaseia, Shemaia, Eleazar, Uzzi, Jehohanan, Malkija, Elam, Ezer yoan lokei. Tokei chia laubü shuong haoeneibü leiyeibou Jezrahiaei leian chia kaangko lauko lokei.

Khünyet Haoenei lembü yaang kuko aeibou olinyokei; aieilausi kho tegübü olinbü yaangbü kienlabü kho Mühghaüei haoen to olinkei; hoba kho olinbüa yaksa hoba nashou hanbü shuong yoan olinyokei, khei kho Jerusalema olinyobü kho saabü ka kei ditko kikei.

Tokei khünyet ong ungshedbou hoba Levibü shanga ngühkhümei sakkubü pienan kibü tegü sek ka haujem lembü shaangbü buhek lembü, hoba an phejan lembü yoshaila hoba thanan phola shanga thanshang shemjang lulu thüka müt pienkei; aieilausi Jihudabüei ungshedbou hoba Levibüei khangenbü to olinyokei.
Hobaje Dawid si Solomon haosi hamei khangenbü ngühkhüm tegütham haoenei chia laubü si koukhün lombü shuong yoan haoeneibü Mühghaü hoba saopoenbü lem kho kaangko sungletkei.
Aieilausi Dawid haanga hoba shangied Asaf chaloua chia laubü yoa pienbü che kikei, hoba Mühghaü shanga nyensang hoba olinbü chia kikei.

Hobaje Zerubbabel si Nehemia haosi ham chaloua Israelbü khümboei chia laubü si koukhün lombü la chalou angbou haoen khambü hoba haplabü phejan ai khokei den lulua janan phokei hoba Levibüeikei Aroneibü shousi shuong phejan kho phangche pienan phokei.
Kho chaloua haoenei shuong thedanga Mosaeibü ngühkhüm le ka wekei hoba khünei Ammonbü si Moabbü ladangkei Mühghaüeibü lembü- chem to loula athük dogo doan kikei.

Aishanga haoenei Israel shousi shuong to shausiyung si dei sungjung louan ühaüyo; lausikei haoen khulimbo khüksiuok ngüh laula shanga haoenei Balaam la munam kukei; yingsikei küneibü Mühghaüei shedsikhau kho haülabü yeitikei.
Ladang haoenei ngühkhüm kho ditkei, kheijinei kheinepan kibü dan pendou kho Israelbü ka bangnyinkei.
Kho thedangto ungshedbou Eliashib, ao Mühghaüeibü chem shemjang pendou thüka bunyu pienkei,

haoei Tobia to jailanala yeian shemjang yaangü che, lanei shangied shausiyung lembü, jen, thungsiphau an phejan lembü, youshou, ih, hoba onang phoshang Levibü la chia laubü si koukhün lombü la ngühkhümei yoshaikubü hoba haujem lembü ungshedbou shanga yoshaibü khübü pendou phoan kikei.
Kho jih pendoua ngo Jerusalema akitei, aieilausi Artazerkzes Babilon Choba po khujinto nyi boubüa ngo Choba jungto haukei hoba chalou shisho kian phaia Choba to sudi phekei,
hoba ngo Jerusalem to louan phaia Eliashibei Mühghaü chema shemjang che kubü danko Tobia shanga ai shedbü kümbei kho ngei ditenkei.
Khoei ngo aeibou maangto shatkei, hibü ngei Tobiaeibü peisilei pendou shemjang khüka sungan apbukei.
Kheijinei ngei ngühkhüm kukei hoba haoenei shemjang kho saüenkei, hoba Mühghaüeibü chem thungsiphau hoba tokei shausiyung lembü si jen pendou kho shemjang khüto ngei nyibou sungbakei.
Hobaje Levibü la haoeneibü phejan akubü ngei hapbei, hibü Levibü si chia laubü shuong haoeneibü kümsilei apyoan mütpem weko lulueibü sek to satkhüman kikei.
Kheijinei ngei songdakbü shuong to hakkei hoba laukei, “Aila kanei Mühghaüeibü chem tekan apda?” Hobaje ngei haoen pendou nyibou leishaikei hoba mütpem weko haoen lulueibü kümaleia phongaikei.
Kheijinei Jihudabü pendouei an phejan youshou, ih, hoba onang thanshang to sungbakei.

Hobaje ngei ungshedbou Shelemia, dobou Zadok hoba Levibü yoa Pedaia dogo thanshanga ikjaibü yeitikei, hoba haoen phanga thuiyolabü lele, Mattaniaeibü shou, Zakureibü shou Hanan pienkei. Aishanga haoen to maang lemenan kikei, hoba jaisinasi shuong la janan kubü kho haoeneibü kümsilei kikei.
O ngeibü Mühghaü, ho kümsilei shanga ngo damenashi, hoba ngeibü Mühghaü chem shanga ngei kümbü kümsilei maibü hoba ngei thounoubü kho nyi haman tüpbuma.

Khübü chaloua Jihuda kaodaka mütshuongei Nounyet semlüh nitbü youthep künbü hoba gadu la on küntibü ngei hapbei; tokei ih, semlüh, bhuk hoba lubü on juong Nounyet Jerusalem to sungbabü ngei hapbei; hoba ngei kho chaloua shausiyung yaakbü ngei thangetkei.
Tokei khünei Tairbü aoyou kikei, haoenei Nounyet ngau hoba lubü peisilei phang juong sungbaan Jihudabü la Jerusalema yaakko lekei.
Kheijinei Jihudabü leiyeibü to hakko laukei, “Kanei Nounyet shatiko aila shabü kümsilei ho jungeida?

Kaneibü pisiboueikei hai amaibü aküm lo? hoba kho laüa sen jungto hoba ho sangnyu to habü khonsak khonku thu Mühghaüei sungbakei aying lo? Khei yingsikei kanei Nounyet leilubü haangjung Israelbü jungto khonku aei sungbada.”

Ladang Jerusalem bakhün Nounyet thedangto chasemlamto jijimomo aplaje bakhün pendou khinlabü hoba Nounyet chalou adankhüm shongko aipla ngei ngühkhüm kukei, hoba ngeibü khangenbü at ngei koukhün lombü yeitikei hoba ai on yinglaje yingsikei Nounyet asungetti.
Kheijinei namyaak namseibü shuong Jerusalem kümthang thükaenei che nyinei sühko otkei.
Kheijinei ngei haoen to laukei, “Kan aila kümthang nyangko setda? Kan nyibou kho tegü ong yensüh kümalonga ngei kan to ik atngailabü.” Kho phaiaje haoen Nounyet alou.

Hobaje ngei Levibü to haoen lulu lolo saüenjan dogo hoba Nounyet saopoan phola shanga haoenei koukhün kho lomjan dogo ngühkhüm sakkukei. O ngeibü Mühghaü, ho shangakei nyi ngo damenshima hoba kaibü sanou yaangbüei ngo khümenkaima.
Tokei kho jiha ong Jihudabüei Ashdod, Ammon hoba Moabbü sao to chemdang yeibü ngei hapbei,
hoba haoeneibü shousi jamdeei Ashdodbü ngühyem laukei, hoba Jihudabü ngühyem alauenen, lausikei phang wekoei lulueibü ngühyem laukei.

Hobaje ngo haoen to wetyokei hoba khükkei uokkei hoba attoje ngümbei hoba khuloukei thapan apbukei, hoba Mühghaü nyena hai lauko thelettikei, “Kanei kaneibü nouyangshou haoeneibü shousi shuong shanga akujan, ayingsi haoeneibü nouyangshou kaneibü bousu shousi shuong shanga hoba kan shanga alejan.

Israel Choba Solomonei kho tegübü kümsilei kümbü danko shed shonjung loukei aying lo? Khei yingasikei phang juong yoa hao phatbü Choba aokei akitei, hoba Mühghaüei hao to sanoukei hoba Israel khümbo thüka Choba yeitikei; khei yingsikei haokei küksithang sao lebü danko shed shonkei.
Khülonga künei kan to küksithang sao danko seneibü Mühghaü to shed shonla hoba kho tegü kümsilei amaibü kümla lenlep sai?”
Hobaje Joiadaeibü shisi yoa che ungshedbou chungthem Eliashibeibü shou Horonbü Sanballateibü kounyang kikei, hibü ngei hao kü thedang ka shieikei.
O Mühghaü, haoen damenshima; aishanga haoenei ungshedbou setshang, Levibü hoba ungshedboueibü theyolanyobü kümsilei khulimbo küma.
Kho tegü ngei haoen pendou küksithang ka panthetan hoba saüenan yeitikei hoba ungshedbou si Levibü lulueibü kümaleia ikphen lamtikei.
Hobaje buhek lembü si shaangbü buhek lembü shanga jih kho janenkei.
O ngeibü Mühghaü, ponpen shanga nyi ngo damenshima.
Tou Ahasueras haangbü chaloua Ahasuerasei India ka Ethiopia sühko provins saongaoto saoto nyeta songdakkei.
Khübü chaloua Ahasuerasei Persia sangle Shushan sangnyua haoeibü Choba setshanga setan songdakkei.

Haoei songdakbü po semboubüa haoei haoeibü khangenbü hoba leiyeibü pendou shanga lem che kümbei; Persia hoba Mediabü sepai tan leiyeibü shuong hoba provinsa yaangenbü hoba kongnyu shuong hao junga kikei.
Kheijinei haoei Choba sangle soneikangbü nyaksinam hoba hao yaangenbü soumo yaangbü hangenbü lenbüa khei chalou saongaoto saolei kikei.
Hobaje ladang khübü chalou penkei, Chobaei Shushan sangnyu to louan kibü yaangbü ka hanbü sühko müt pendou shanga Chobaeibü chem bamang khonga chalou nyet lem likei.

Thangtetnei thupaibü, nakthüngbü, hoba nakthüngan sakbü soueiko saüan kikei, phembanei inyaibü hoba nakthüngan sakbü lühei chandinam ikjikhap hoba marbel thaonyua phenan kikei, nongshang setshang kho hon si chandinam ninulaang saklangbü hoba thupaibü hoba nakhübüei yuklepan kikei.
Hobaje haoenei ih kho honeibü thung lulua yungkei, hoba Chobaei ih apsileko kibü thüng haoen la inkei.
Hobaje yungbü kho ngühkhüm tegütham tukosekko aying; aieilausi Chobaei kho tegü haoeibü Chobaeibü chema ikjaibü pendou la khei mütpem wekoei maangangbü tegü haoenei kümla sakkukei.
Tokei Chobasao Vastiei Ahasueras Chobaeibü Choba chema yaksa shuong shanga lem che lamlekei.
Chalou nyetbounyet Chobaeibü maangpon ihei olin angko kijinei sungphatbü müt nyet Mehuman, Miztha, Marbona, Bigtha hoba Abagtha, Zethar hoba Karka,
haoen la imyam si leiyeibü shuong la Chobasao saomaibü lenla shanga Choba thedangto Chobasao Vasti Chobasao khun hanan leian loula sakkukei; aieilausi sao chühla saomaibü kikei.
Lausikei sungphatbü müt danko Chobaei sengkubüa Chobasao Vastiei ngüha ale, khoei Choba aeibou wansak angko khauangkei.
Kheijinei Chobaei songngedonge mütshuong aoyouei jihsiphai shuong ngean kikei, haoen to laukei, aishanga kho tegü ngühkhüm hoba matjem ngebü pendou to Chobaeibü song kikei.

Hobaje hao to thenbou aoyouei Chobaeibü thenyek hapbei, hoba Choba sanglea setshang thükkaboua setkei, khübü kho Karshena, Shetthar, Admatha, Tarshish, Meres, Marsena, hoba Memukan, Persia hoba Mediabü leiyeibü müt nyet kikei.
Haoei laukei, “Ngühkhümei senei Chobasao Vasti to ai kümla? Aieilausi sung- phatbü mütshuong danko Ahasueras Chobaei sakkubü saoei aküm.”

Kheijinei Choba hoba leiyeibü shuong thedanga Memukanei jongaikei, “Chobasao Vastiei Choba thedanga ong aying, lausi tokei yaangbü shuong pendou to hoba Ahasueras Chobaeibü provins pendoua kibü mütli pendou to shedbü küma.

Aishanga Choba Ahasuerasei Chobasao Vasti Choba thedangto leian loula sakkukei, lausikei sao alou dogo ladang ngühlang kulaje Choba saoeibü thechühei yaksa pendou the to haoeneibü laosi shuong nyikuko loulabü.
Hobaje tat chaloua Persia hoba Mediabü Chobasao shuong aoyou Chobasaoeibü kümsilei kho ditkei; Haoenei yaangbü shuong pendou to hai laulabü hoba kho tegü awealaulabü hoba maangto shatbü aei longlabü.

Chobaei ho maangangko damalonga, Chobaeibü ngühkhüm hao ka sattiashi, hoba kho Persiabü hoba Mediabü ngühkhüm yoa dotiashi; khei kho ajeiyoentilabü lele, khei touje Vasti, Ahaseuras Choba thedangto aloulabü, hoba sao to maibou lubü che la Chobaei onoubü setshang kutishima.
Hobaje ladang Chobaeibü ngühkhüm laobou haoeibü sangle pendoua haoei ngetilaje, aishanga kho yaksi shuong pendouei haoeneibü laosi shuong yaangbü yingashi, hanbü yingashi, soumo kulabü.”
Hobaje kho laubüei Choba si yaangbü shuong olintikei, hoba Chobaei Memukanei lenbü tegü kümbei;

Aishanga Chobaeibü provins pendouei lulueibü dolanga hoba lulueibü ngühyema provins weko jungto khei mütpem weko chemdanga bunyu lela, hoba jembü mütli ngühyem tegütham kho phinthonla haoei le hautikei.
Kho thena ladang Ahasueras Choba khau angbü maingaikei, haoei Vasti hoba saoei ai kümbei hoba sao khulimbo ai ngühkhüm kukei kho damenkei.
Hobaje Choba khangenbü shuongei hao to laukei, “Choba shanga hemai saomai medei shuong lamtiashi,

hoba khei Shushan sangnyu to yaksa shuong Chobaeibü sungphatbü müt Hegai ika haoenei yaksa saomaibü medei pendou liko Chobaeibü sanglea provins pendoua ikjaibü shuong pienan haoenei takteila shanga nongkuashi.
Hobaje medei aoei Choba olintilaje Vasti jeiko sao Chobasao yeitishi.” Hobaje khoei Choba olintikei, hoba haoei kho tegü kümbei.
Shushan sangnyua Jihudabü che Benjamin mütli chung Kisheibü shou Shimeieibü shou Jaireibü shou nyenei Mordekai kikei.
Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnezzarei Jihudabü Choba Jekonia Jerusalem ka langsenbü yoa Mordekai yoan laplangkei.

Hobaje haoei haobou nashouboueibü nouyangshou Hadasa, kho Esther, pangteikei aieilausi saoeibü nyusibou aki hoba medeinyu kho chühmang sühlabü hoba hemai saomai kikei, hoba ladang saoeibü nyusibou haikei Mordekaiei sao haoeibü nouyangshou la lekei.
Hibü ladang Chobaei sengkubü haoeibü ngühkhüm phinthonkei medei shuong juongnyu Shushan sangnyu to ngashaikei, khei Esther kei Chobaeibü chem to yaksa lombou Hegai ikjaia leian atkei.

Hobaje medeinyu khoei Hegai olintikei, hoba haoei sao to maangshikkei, hoba haoei panteiko saoeibü peisilei sao saüenla shanga, saoeibü phejan hoba medei nyet, laobou Chobaeibü chem ka sao la kula kikei, kho sao la kukei, hoba haoei sao hoba saoeibü medei shuong yaksa kishang chem maibou to kuktikei.
Estherei sao ai mütli ayingsi ai phang kho alen; aieilausi Mordekaiei kho alenla sao to lensepan kikei.
Hobaje Esther lai ki hoba sao ai yeila kho ngela Mordekai chalou angbou yaksa shuongeibü chem kouthea hau longei dogo paikei.

Tou yaksa shuong shanga ngühkhüm tegü medei lamlelabü lit anthüknyi onko lekei, lit lak ponlem hibü onang hoba lit lak ponlem teibü onang naangko kiteilabü hoba chalou penbüa Choba Ahasueras jungto medei weko lulu chaloua leian atlabü kikei.
Kho tegü medei kho Choba jungto loukei, hoba yaksa shuongeibü chem ka Chobaeibü chem to haujinei saoei mangsühbü hele lean haula sakkuan kikei.

Chasem sao haukei hoba ngeyang Chobaeibü sungphatbou müt Shaasgaz, aoei Chobaeibü thangnyu shuong lombei, haoeibü ikjai lambo yaksa shuong nyiboubü chem lambo loukei, sao to Chobaei maangshikko hoba nyen shenko angalonga sao Choba jungto nyibou üet.

Tou Mordekai aoei haobou nashoubou Abihaileibü nouyangshou Esther haoeibü nouyangnyu tegü lekei; ladang Choba jungto atlabü jih sühkei, yaksa lombou Hegai sungphatbü mütei lenbü to limbo saoei aikei aphe, hoba Esther to chühbü pendouei sao to maang shikkei.
Hibü lit anboubüa kho Tabe lita haoei songdakbü po nyetboubüa Esther Ahasueras Chobaeibü chem to leian atkei.

Hobaje yaksa pendou tokei haoei Eshter to aei sanoukei, hoba medei pendou to aei saoei hao ka sanou hoba onou hapbei; hibü haoei saoeibü khua Choba khun hankukei, hoba Vasti jeiko sao Chobasao yeitikei.
Kheijinei Chobaei haoeibü yaangbü shuong hoba hao khangenbü pendou shanga lem yaangbü che khei Esthereibü lem kümbei, hoba sangle khümboa soti lela sakkukei, hoba Chobaei kibü thüng jongsak kukei.
Hobaje ladang medei shuong nyibou liko yoshaikei, kheijinei Chobaeibü bakhüna Mordekai setkei.
Estherei tokei jembü phang si chung hoba mütli ai alenkei. Aishanga Mordekaiei sao pangteijinei sakkubü tegü saoei kümbei.
Khübü chaloua Mordekaiei Chobaeibü bakhüna setan kijinei Chobaeibü sungphatbü müt nyi Bigthan hoba Teres, aoyouei koukhün lombo kikei, haosi khau lotkei hoba Ahasueras Choba to ik shatla lambei.
Hobaje kho Mordekaiei ngean kikei, hoba haoei Esther Chobasao la ngetikei, hoba Estherei kho Mordekai nyena Choba la lenkei.
Hobaje kho shanga lamyokei, hoba kho tükde dogo lapensije haosi ham bulong chenei phenetnyu haitikei, hoba kho lüngbüdobü lea Choba thedanga doan kikei.
Kho phaia Ahasueras Chobaei Agagbü Hammedathaeibü shou Haman setshang thükkabou to angtikei, hoba hao yoa kibü konglebü shuong pendou to thükkabou setshanga phokukei.
Hobaje Chobaeibü koukhüna kibü Choba khangenbü pendouei khüpetkei hoba Haman to souhat lenkei; aieilausi Chobaei hao shanga kho tegü sakkukei. Lausikei Mordekaiei akhüpet hoba souhat alen.
Kheijinei Chobaeibü koukhüna kibü Choba khangenbü shuongei Mordekai to laukei, “Aila nyi Chobaeibü ngühkhüm leiluda?”

Tou ladang haoenei chalou angbou hao to joyokei, hoba haoen to ngüha ale, Mordekaieibü ngüh kho lela si alela dogo lauan, haoenei Haman to lenkei, aieilausi haoei haoen to hao Jihudabü dogo lenan kikei.
Hobaje ladang Mordekaiei akhüpetda ayingsi hao to souhat alenda dogo Hamanei hapbei, kheijinei Haman aeibou maangto shatkei.

Lausikei haoei Mordekai to ik atko aweasüngla daman kikei, aieilausi haoenei hao to Mordekaieibü mütli shanga lenkei. Hibü Ahasueras Chobaeibü sangle khümboa Jihudabü pendou, khei Mordekaieibü mütli pendou shemtila Hamanei huon takkei.
Shaangboubü lit laobou nisan lit ki, Ahasueras Choba po anthük nyiboubüa Haman thedanga chalou angbou, lit weko, lit anthük nyiboubü sühko, kho Adar lit sühko, haoenei Pur pakkei, kho phaang.

Hobaje Hamanei Ahasueras Choba to laukei, “Kaibü Choba sangle provins pendou aenei phinthonan kibü mütli che kia, hoba haoeneibü ngühkhüm lubü mütli pendou ka lulusap, ayingsi haoenei Chobaeibü ngühkhüm ajungeida; hibü haoen khei apyola Choba shanga kho ku aying.

Ho Chobaei maang angalonga khei haoen shemtilabü dogo dotiashi, hoba Chobaeibü thanshang to sungbala shanga aoyou Chobaeibü kümsilei ikjaiko ki haoen la ngei chandinam khujin bang atbü hajar an kulabü.”
Hobaje Chobaei haoeibü ik ka ikjikhap kekan sungkei hoba Jihudabüeibü dangbou Agagbü Mammedatha shou Haman la kho kukei.
Hobaje Chobaei Haman to laukei, “Nyi ka thedanga ai maibü dogo damda kho tegü haoen to kümla ngei ka la chandinam hoba tokei mütshuong kho kuda.”

Kheijinei shaangboubü lit chalou anthük semboubüa Hamanei Chobaeibü dobou shuong ngakei, hoba Chobaeibü dobou shuong to hoba provins wekoa kibü governor shuong to hoba phang wekoa leiyeibü shuong la sakkubü tegü provins wekoa lulueibü dolanga hoba phang weko lulueibü ngühyema kho doan kikei; Choba Ahasueras nyenei kho dokei, hoba kho Chobaeibü ikjikhapei jangkei.

Hobaje le kho lekünbouei Jihudabü pendou nashou chingbü, nashou yaksa chalou chenei khei lit anthük nyiboubü chalou anthük semboubü, kho Adar lita lusaktilabü, haitilabü, hoba mautilabü, hoba lean apbula shanga hoba haoen ka makan sungla ngühlang provins pendou to hautikei.
Kho chalou shanga haoen lamlean kila shanga dobü le che provins wekoa ngühkhüm kujan dogo müt pendou la ngetikei.
Chobaeibü ngühkhümei ngühlang künbü shuong panteiko haukei, hoba ngühkhüm kho Shushan sangnyua kümbei. Kheijinei Choba si Haman ih yungla setkei; lausikei Shushan sangnyuje mangan apan kikei.

Ladang Mordekaiei khübü kümbü shuong pendou shanga ditkei, Mordekaiei jembü neisimei jitnyinkei hoba khua tap naangan senou nei neikei, hoba sangnyu jenyu to atkei, hoba ngüh yaangbüei hao aeibou mang- haapbo ngekkei;
hoba hao khei Chobaeibü bakou the to loukei; aishanga aokei Chobaeibü bakou maangto senou nei neian atjan aying.

Hobaje provins wekoa lai aeto ong Chobaeibü sengkubü hoba ngühkhüm loukei, Jihudabü yoa aeibou hanghangko nyengbü hoba haapyobü hoba lemenyobü kikei, hoba juongei senou nei neian tap thüka leketnyu yepan kikei.

Ladang Esthereibü sambü sao hoba sungphatbü mütshuong loukei, hoba kho sao to Mordekaiei ai kümbei kho lenkei. Chobasao kho aeibou maang leilukei, hoba Mordekai la neitila hoba hao ka senou nei aptila saoei nei jungan hautikei, lausikei haoei kho asunglet.
Kheijinei Estherei Hathak, Chobaeibü sungphatbou yoa che, ao haoei Esther chühla pienkei, hao ngakei, hoba ho ai, hoba ailai kho ngela Mordekai jungto haula sengkukei.
Hibü sangnyu khongthu keeshang laobou Chobaeibü bakou thedanga kikei khüto Mordekai jungto Hathak haukei.
Hobaje Jihudabü pendou shemtia longa Chobaeibü namthanshang to pendouei ladüng kula Hamanei thekukei hoba Mordekaiei hao to haüthükbü pendou shanga hao to lenkei.

Hobaje haoen mautila Shushana kümbü ngühkhüm dobü kho Esther la lenla shanga hoba kho sao la ngetila hoba sao to Choba jungto sao atshi dogo laula, hao to sulajala, hoba hao thedanga jembü mütli shanga sulajala haoei hao la le kho kukei.
Hobaje Hathak loukei hoba Esther la Mordekaieibü ngühshuong kho lenkei.
Kheijinei Estherei Hathak to joyokei hoba Mordekai jungto ngühlang che ho hai kungaikei.

“Chobaeieibü sambü shuong hoba Chobaeibü provinsa pendouei ngekei, khei aoyou, bousu yingasikei, yaksa yingasikei, ao ong Choba jungto shemjang maangkabou to atlaje, hao shanga ngühkhüm che ong, khei ao jungto hao lang kitila honeibü aubu japan Chobaeibü nyen phonglaje hao to liman, pendou haitilabü; lausikei khübü chalou khujin Choba jungto atla ngo angako kia.”
Hobaje haoenei Esthereibü ngühshuong kho Mordekai to lenkei.
Kheijinei Esther jungto jongaibü jungan ngaila haoen to lenkei, “Jihudabü pendou apyoan noje Chobaeibü chema satenlep dogo tedam.

Aishanga ho tegübü jiha no lepde ngüh üangko kijinei Jihudabü jungto khuthük ka thuibü louyenlabü hoba haoen püetlabü lausikei no hailabü hoba kaboueibü chemdangje maulabü hoba ho tegübü jihsiphai shanga no Chobasao yeibükei aoei ngean?”
Kheijinei Estherei Mordekai jungto jongaibü jungan haoen ngaitikei,

“Chühashi, Shushana Jihudabü pendou liko kamshaiashi, hoba kü shanga kanei mühei nyengashi hoba welaukuashi, chalou sem nangnak sem shaukei teshau, hoba yungkei teyung, tokei ngo hoba ngeibü sambü sao shuongkei kho tegü nyenglabü, hoba kho phaia ngühkhüma akisikei Choba jungto atlabü, hoba kho shanga ngo hailabü yinga tegükei ngo hailabü.”
Mordekai khüka meimeikei hoba Estherei hao la sakkubü tegü pendou kümbei.

Tou nyengbü chalou sembounyet Estherei Chobasaoeibü hele lekei hoba Chobaeibü chem kouthea Chobaeibü chem shemjang maangkaboua lokei, hoba Choba haoeibü Choba setshanga Chobaeibü haangae yeian setan kikei.

Ladang Chobaei Esther khongaenei loan hapbei, hao junga Estherei onou hapbei; hoba Chobaeibü honeibü aubu haoeibü ika kibü Esther jungto juan litikei. Hibü Esther nyangko loukei, hoba Chobaeibü aubu sembunga meitikei.
Kheijinei Chobaei sao to laukei, “Chobasao Esther, nyi mangsühbü ai hoba kaibü subüjabü ai? Chobaeibü sangle jamtekei ngei ka la kulabü.”
Hobaje Estherei laukei, “Chobaei maiakei dogo damalonga Choba si Haman shanga ngei lamlebü lem to tat loushi.”
Kheijinei Chobaei laukei, “Estherei laubü tegü kümla Haman panteiko loutishi.” Hibü Choba si Haman Estherei lamlebü lem khüto loukei.
Hobaje Chobaei iheibü lema Esther to laukei, “Nyi mangsühbü kü la lenbü hoba kho ka la sengkulabü hoba kaibü subüjabü ai? Choba sangle jamde dogo lauasikei sakkulabü.”
Kheijinei Estherei jongaiko laukei, “Ho ngei phebü hoba subüjabü ki,

Choba thedanga kü la onou lenkho laualonga, hoba Chobaei ngei phebü sengkula maang angalonga hoba ngei subüjabü kümbho laualonga Choba si Haman shanga ngei ngiet lem lubü lamlekubü khüto loushima. Kho jiha ngei ai mangsühbü ki kho ka la lenlabü.”

Kheijinei Haman kho chaloua olinangko maangpona olinko haukei, lausikei ladang Hamanei Chobaeibü koukhüna Mordekai hao thedanga aloku ayingsi hao danjinei soumo akuko hapbei, Hamanei hao khulimbo maang- pokbüei shenan kikei.
Khei yingsikei Hamanei jembü lolo thepetkei hoba chem to haukei hoba haoei hautikei hoba haoeibü thangbou shuong ngakei hoba yak Zereskei yotikei.

Hobaje Hamanei haoen la haoeneibü nyaksinam soneikangbü hoba haoeibü shousi juong hoba kümsilei pendou aenei Chobaei hao lai thükkabou to tonenkei hoba haoei leiyeibü shuong hoba Choba khangenbü thüka hao yaangentikei kho yonglambo thenan lenkei.
Tokei Hamanei laukei, “Khei Chobasao Estherei saoei lamlebü lem to kü to liman müt aokei Choba yoa loula asakkuda hoba tokei ngiet saoei Choba yoa liko ngaakei.
Khei yingsikei Jihudabü Mordekai Chobaeibü koukhüna setan ki shongko ho pendou kü shanga ai tegü aying.”

Kheijinei hao yak Zeres hoba hao thangbou pendouei hao to laukei, “Hao bu chenei phenetnyu haitila iknop anjinsem suokan kümashi, hoba ngeyang kho thüka Mordekai phenetnyu haitilabü lele Choba to joyoshi; kho phaia lem to olinangko Choba yoa atshi.” Hobaje khoei Haman olintikei hoba haoei phenetnyu haitilabü shon kho kümbei.
Khüyou Choba nyeket alou, hoba haoei lüngbüdobü le kho sungbala ngühkhüm kukei, hoba khübü kho Choba thedanga wekei.
Hobaje Bigthana hoba Teres Chobaeibü sungphatbü müt nyi koukhün lombü aoyouei Choba Ahasueras to ik shatla lambei haoen shanga Mordekaiei lenkei dogo doan hapbei.
Hobaje Chobaei laukei, “Kho shanga Mordekai to ai souhat hoba nyensang kümbei?” Kheijinei Choba khangenbü shuongei hao to laukei, “Hao shanga ai aküm.”
Hobaje Chobaei laukei, “Chobaeibü khonga ao ki?” Tou Hamanei Mordekai shanga lamlekubüa hao phenetnyu haitila Choba to joyola Chobaeibü thükkabou matjemshang khongmaang to Haman lotan kikei.
Hobaje Choba khangenbü shu- ongei hao to laukei, “Chühashi, Haman Chobaeibü khonga loakei.” Hobaje Chobaei laukei, “Hao lottiashi.”

Hibü Haman lotkei hoba Chobaei hao to laukei, “Chobaei ao to nyenhaang lenla olinda kho müt shanga ngei ai kümla?” Tou Hamanei haoeibü maangpona dambei, “Chobaei kü to liman ao la olinbü lenmang sühla?”
Hobaje Hamanei Choba to laukei, “Chobaei olinbü lenmang sühbü müt shanga,
Chobaei lebü Chobaeibü hele hoba Choba setbü koli, hoba khua Chobaeibü khun hankuan leibatishi.

Hobaje müt ao to Chobaei olinko haangenmang sühda hao la haoenei neitilabü hoba sangnyu khongnyu sünga koli daka setentilabü shanga hele hoba koli kho Chobaeibü yaangenbü konglebou che la khümbo kuashi hoba hao thedanga, müt aoto Chobaei olinko haangenmang sühda hao to hai kümlabü dogo ngekashi.”
Kheijinei Chobaei Haman to laukei, “Tongde kümashi, nyi laubü tegü hele hoba koli sungba, hoba kho tegü Chobaeibü bakhüna setbou Jihudabü Mordekai to kümashi, nyi laubü pendou aikei akümbo teki.”
Kheijinei Hamanei hele hoba koli sungbakei hoba Mordekai la hele lekukei hoba sangnyu khongnyu sünga setan hautikei hoba hao thedanga Chobaei olinko haangenmang sühbü müt to hai kümlabü dogo ngekkei.
Hobaje Mordekai nyibou Chobaeibü bakhün to loukei. Lausikei Hamanje neikhu yukan haapbo haoeibü chem to panteiko ngaikei.

Hobaje Hamanei hao yak Zeres hoba hao thangbou pendou la hao to haüthükbü pendou lenkei. Kheijinei haoeibü songnge donge shuong hoba hao yak Zeresei hao to laukei, “Mordekai ao thedanga no tuongla khangan ki hao Jihudabü ki, nyi hao khulimbüa athüklabü, lausikei maimaitham hao thedanga tuonglabü.”
Hao to toukei haoenei joyoko kitoua Chobaeibü sungphatbü müt loukei hoba panteiko Estherei lamlean kibü lem to Haman leian haukei.
Hibü Choba hoba Haman Esther yoa lem shaula loukei,
hoba Chobaei nyibou iheibü lem nyibounyet Esther to laukei, “Chobasao Esther, kaibü subüjabü ai? Kho ka la kulabü, hoba nyi mangsühbü ai? Choba sangle jamde yinga tegükei kho kulabü.”
Kheijinei Estherei Choba to jongaiko laukei, “O Choba, ngei ka thedanga onou hapalonga ngeibü langkei kü la kungaibü. Kho ngei phebü hoba ngeibü mütli lang kila sakkubuma, kho ngei subüjabü;

aieilausi ngo hoba ngeibü mütli leilutila hoba haitila hoba mautila kün yaakshaua. Lausikei kün khei bousu yaksa aao la lelabü lele ong yaakbü tegüje ngo maangsembo kikhoulabü, aishanga khonkubü khoei Choba senyühshembü amu.”
Kheijinei Ahasueras Chobaei Esther to phekei, “Haoeibü maangpona kho tegü kümla dambo maangkaangko dambou hao kho ao hoba lanei ki?”
Hobaje Estherei jongaikei, “Khulimbou che hoba dangbou che, khei amaibou kho Haman.” Kheijinei Choba si Chobasao thedanga Haman hatko kikei.

Hobaje khauangko Choba iheibü lem ka meimeikei hoba Chobaeibü bamang khüto atkei. Hobaje Esther Chobasao to haoeibü langkei shanga sutijatila Haman loukei, aishanga Chobaei hao danthetko amaibü damenbü haoei hapbei.

Kheijinei Choba bamang ka longeian iheibü lem to atkei, hoba Esther kibü setshang thüka Haman khüpetan kikei. Kheijinei Chobaei laukei, “Haoei kü thedanga Chobasaokei chema shatilep lo?” Chobaeibü ngüh sembung ka longsilengko haoenei Hamaneibü thenyek yuklepbukei.

Kheijinei Choba thedanga kibü sungphatbü müt yoka che Harbonaei laukei, “Chühashi, tokei Mordekai, aoei Choba shanga ngüh maibü laukei hao shanga Hamanei phenetnyu haitila bu iknop anjinsem suokan kümbü Hamaneibü chema lotian phoakei.” Hobaje Chobaei laukei, “Khonei hao phenetnyu haitiashi!”
Hibü haoenei Mordekai shanga kümbü bu shon khünei Haman phenetnyu haitikei. Kheijinei Choba khauangbü sokei.
Khünyet chaloua Ahasueras Chobaei Jihudabüeibü dangbou Hamaneibü chem Esther Chobasao la kukei. Hobaje Mordekai Choba jungto loukei, aishanga Estherei Choba la hao lai phen- yokei kho lenkei.
Hobaje Chobaei haoeibü ikjikhap laobou haoei Haman ka sungkei kho hangletkei, hoba kho Mordekai la kukei. Hobaje Estherei Mordekai, Hamaneibü chemsibung nyaksinam pendou thüka ikjaila phokukei.

Kheijinei tokei Estherei Choba to nyibou joyokei hoba haoeibü youa khüpetkei, hoba Agagbü Hamaneibü kümsilei amaibü hoba Jihudabü khulimbo haoei huon takan kibü apbushi dogo nyeksi angko hao to sukeijakei.
Kheijinei Chobaei honeibü aubu kho Esther jungto litikukei. Hibü Esther meimeikei hoba Choba thedanga lokei.

Hobaje saoei laukei, “Chobaei maang angalonga hoba ngo ka thedanga janbü dogo yingalonga hoba ngo hao thea maikualonga Agagbü Hamedathaeibü shou Hamanei huongenbü le shuong laobou haoei Chobaeibü provins pendoua kibü Jihudabü mautila dokei, kho jakshaian dotishima;
aieilausi ngeibü mütli thükto amaibü loula kibü ngei lai natenla? Ayingsi ngeibü chempen maulabü khokei ngei lai natenla?”

Kheijinei Choba Ahasuerasei Esther Chobasao to hoba Jihudabü Mordekai to laukei, “Chühashi, ngei Esther la Hamaneibü chem kua, hoba haoeibü bushona haoenei hao phenetnyu haitia, aieilausi haoei Jihudabü thükto ik atkei.

Kanei tokei lubü Jihudabü shanga kanei maang angbü tegü doashi. Chobaeibü nyena hoba Chobaeibü ikjikhapei kho jangashi, aieilausi laobou Chobaeibü nyena dokei hoba Chobaeibü ikjikhapei jangkei, müt aoeikei ajaksheilabü.”

Kho chaloua Chobaeibü dobü shuong lit semboubüa kho Sivan chalou saoto semboubüa ngashaikei hoba Mordekaiei Jihudabü la sakkubü tegütham hoba konglebü shuong to hoba governor hoba provinsa leiyeibü shuong India ka Ethiopia sühko provins saongaoto saoto nyet, provins weko jungto lulu dolanga hoba mütli weko lulu ngühyema hoba Jihudabü jungto haoeneibü dolanga hoba haoeneibü ngühyema kho dokei.
Hobaje haoei Choba Ahasueras nyena dokei, hoba kho Chobaeibü ikjikhapei jangkei hoba le kho lekünbü kolia setan koli you sobü Chobaeibü kümaleia jungeiko kibü koli shanenbü ka longbüa setan hautikei.

Ainei Chobaei sangnyua kibü Jihudabü to haoen lolo liko kamshaila hoba haoen to hatyolangyobü pendou leilutila, haitila hoba mautila khei provins kei yoan, hoba haoeneibü shousi hoba yaksa shuong hoba haoenei makletbü peisilei soletbü tegü lela sakkukei.
Ahasueras Chobaei provins pendoua nyetche chaloua nyenei lit anthüknyi boubü chalou anthüksem boubü, kho Adar lita kümla pienkei.
Dobü le che, khei provins wekoa ngühkhüm kho kulabü dogo phang pendou la ngetikei, hoba Jihudabüei kho chalou khünei haoenei haoeneibü dangbou to phok lambulabü lamlean kijan dogo phinthonkei.
Hibü koli yousobü, Chobaeibü kümaleia jungeibüa setan ngühlang künbü shuong Chobaeibü ngühkhümei panteiko hoba sokosepbo haukei, hoba ngühkhüm kho Shushan sangnyua kümbei.
Hobaje Choba thedang ka Mordekai, Chobaeibü neisimei pi hoba thupaibü lean hoba phembanei maibü hoba nakthüngan sakbü neisimei lean haukei, hoba Shushan sangnyubüei olinbüei uihinko lem likei.
Jihudabü shanga kho chalou kho olin ngesak maangnyu angbü jihsiphai che hoba nyensang nyenhangei shenan kikei.

Hobaje provins weko, hoba sangnyu weko ai aeto ong Chobaeibü sakkubü hoba ngühkhüm loukei, Jihudabü olinbü hoba olinyobü lemsilang hoba solo kikei. Hobaje kaonyeka mütli juong Jihudabü la yeikei, aieilausi Jihudabü to hatbü haoen to kikei.

Tou lit anthüknyi boubü laobou Adar lit ki, ho lit chalou anthük semboubüa ladang Chobaeibü sakkubü hoba ngühkhüm kümla nyangko loukei, Jihudabüeibü dangbou shuongei haoen thüka bunyu lela dambü chaloua khei yingsikei kho jaksheida, khei haoen thüka haoenei mangsenbü Jihudabüei ong bunyu yeian kikei.

Jihudabü haoen lolo liko haoeneibü sangnyu Ahasueras Chobaeibü provins pendoua haoen to ik shatla lambü shuong to ik atla kamshaikei; hoba aoeikei haoen khulimbo aloenen; aishanga müt pendou to hatbü lühbü kikei.
Hobaje provinsa konglebü pendou hoba Chobaeibü kümbüleibü shuongei Jihudabü to thuikei; aieilausi Mordekai to hatbü haoen to kikei.
Aishanga Chobaeibü chema Mordekai yaangbü kikei, hoba haoeibü nyenhang provins pendou aeto haukei, aishanga ho Mordekai aei aei yaangbou la yeikei.
Hobaje Jihudabüei haoeneibü dangbou shuong inei haitibü hoba leilutibüei thükkei, hoba haoenei ai kümmang sühkei haoen to mangsenbü to kho kümbei.
Hobaje Shushan sangnyua Jihudabüei müt saongao ngaonei haitikei hoba mautikei.
Hobaje Parshandatha hoba Dalfon hoba Aspatha,
hoba Poratha hoba Adalia, hoba Aridatha,
hoba Parmashta, hoba Arisai, hoba Aridai, hoba Vaisatha,
Hamedathaeibü shou Hamaeibü shousi müt an, Jihudabü dangbou, haoenei haitikei, lausikei makletbü peisileia haoenei ik üt.
Kho chaloua Shushan sangnyua haitian kibü shuong lühbak kho Choba la ngetikei.

Hobaje Chobaei Esther Chobasao to laukei, “Jihudabüei Shushan sangnyua müt saongao ngao haitia hoba mautia hoba Hamaneibü shousi an haitia, khülonga lubü provinsa haoenei ai kümbei? Tou kaibü phebü ai? hoba kho sakkulabü; ayingsi nyi mangsühbü ai? hoba kho kümlabü.”
Kheijinei Estherei laukei, “Chobaei maang angalonga, Shushana kibü Jihudabü to tatbü ngühkhüm tegü ngietkei kümla sakkushima, hoba Hamaneibü shousi müt an bunyua saütiashi.”
Hobaje Chobaei khei kümla sakkukei hoba Shushana ngühkhüm che kukei, hoba haoenei Hamaneibü shousi müt an saükei.
Hobaje Shushana kibü Jihudabü Adar lit chalou anthüklei boubüa haoen liko kamshaikei hoba Shushana müt saongao semnei haitikei, lausikei sangshibü peisileia ik üt.

Hobaje Jihudabü provins lubüa kibü shuong liko kamshaikei, hoba haoeneibü langkei shanga lokei hoba haoeneibü dangbou ka solo hapbei, hoba haoen to mangsenbü shuong hajar anjinleito ngao haitikei; lausikei sangshibü peisileia ik üt.
Ho Adar lit chalou anthük semboubüa kümbei, hoba anthüklei bounyeta haoen haksokei, hoba kho lem libü hoba olinyobü chalou che kümbei.
Lausikei Shushana kibü Jihudabü anthüksem bounyet kamshaikei, hoba anthükngao bounyet haksokei, hoba kho lem libü hoba olinyobü chalou che kikei.
Hibü Jihudabü aoyou sangkhonga kida hoba aoyou sang ba lebü akishanga kida Adar lit chalou anthüklei boubü kho olinyobü hoba lem libü hakso chalou hoba cheei che la jongsak kuyobü chalou nouda.
Kheijinei Mordekaiei habü ho dokei, hoba Ahasueras Chobaeibü provinsa Jihudabü pendou jungto nyangbü hoba saabü to,
Adar lit anthüklei boubü hoba jeteibü lit anthükngao boubüa po weko,

Jihudabü haoeneibü dangbou ka solo hapbü hoba haoen shanga maangshat ka olinbü hoba haapbü ka solo chalou jeileibü lit, khei haoenei khübü kho lem hoba olinbü hoba cheei che la jongsak hautiyobü hoba shalebü la jongsak kubü chalou tegü haoenei nou noula le hautikei.
Hobaje Jihudabüei haoenei khangan kibü tegütham kümlabü hoba Mordekaiei haoen to dobü tegü ditenan kümbei.
Aieilausi Jihudabü dangbou Agagbü Hamedathaeibü shou Hamanei Jihudabü khulimbo haoen shemtila huon takkei hoba Purim phaang pakbü kho tetlabü, haoen mautila hoba leilutila phaang pakkei.
Lausikei ladang Esther Choba jungto loukei, khei Hamanei Jihudabü khulimbo huon takbü haoeibü khu to ngailabü hoba hao hoba hao shousi shuong bua phenetnyu haitila Chobaei sakkukei.
Khünei haoenei Pur ka pheklangan khübü chalou to Purim dogo laukei. Hibü kho lea dobü ngüh pendou tegütham hoba kho kümsilei shanga haoenei hapbü hoba haoen thükto haüthüklabü shanga,
Jihudabüei haoen shanga, hoba haoen to bou lamjung louan kibü pendou shanga kho üplabü, khei po weko khübü chalou nyi, doan kibü tegü lem lilabü kho ngühkhüm tegü khangenkei.

Hobaje khübü chalou damenla hoba mütpem weko phola chemdang weko, provins weko, hoba sangnyu weko hoba Purim chalou khübü Jihudabü yoa anangletjan, ayingsi haoeneibü shisi shousiei khübü damenbü athontijan dogo ngühkhüm yeikei.
Kheijinei Abihaileibü shou Esther Chobasaoei hoba Jihudabü Mordekaiei ho nyiboubü Purim le kaangngaitila hau pendouei dokei.
Hobaje Jihudabü pendou jungto: Ahasueras Choba sangle provins saongaoto saoto nyet to sangmai hoba ngühmaiei,
Purim chalou shuong kho pienbü jiha loujan, khei Jihudabü Mordekai hoba Esther Choba saoei haoen to hoba haoeneibü shousina to ngetiko sakkubü tegü mühei nyengbü hoba waangbü chia shanga le hautikei.
Hobaje Esthereibü ngühkhümei Purim shanga khübü kümsilei kaangngaitikei hoba kho lea dokei.
Hobaje Ahasueras Chobaei kaonyek thüka, hoba yungnyu su shuong thüka khüm hekei.
Hobaje haoeibü sei hoba hau hoba Mordekai yaangenbü shanga penkosouko dobü laoboua ong Chobaei hao yaangentikei khübü kho Media si Persia Choba shuongeibü lüngbüdobü lea doan aki lo?

Aieilausi Jihudabü Mordekai Ahasueras Choba to thenbou kikei hoba haoeibü mütliei maangshikkei; aieilausi haoei jembü mütli maila lambei, aishanga haoei mütli phang ngühyem pendou to pendou maila yaangla lenkei.
Uz kaodaka müt che Job nyenbü kikei, kho müt janbümubü hoba tangbü, hoba haoei Mühghaü to hatkei hoba amaibü to mangsenkei.
Hobaje hao la bousushou nyet hoba yaksa shou sem bukkukei.

Haoei nyaksinamkei sanlon hajar nyet, ut hajar sem, sekmoubü masu pongsu tang saongao ngao, gadu saoen saongao ngao, hoba sambü juong kikei; khoei chaangbou aenei kibü mütshuong to kho müt kho yaangboutham kikei.
Hobaje haoeibü shousi shuong haoen chem wekoa lulu la benbü chaloua lem kikei, hoba haoen yoa shaula yungla shanga haoeneibü nasi yaksa sem kho ngako lekei.

Hobaje ladang ong haoeneibü lem thonkei Jobei haoen ngaan saüenkukei, hoba ngeyang enyu pian haoen pendou shanga juokbü lembü che bang kukei; aieilausi Jobei laukei, “Aingenyu kü shousi shuongei shabü shona yingkei, hoba haoeneibü maangpona Mühg- haü to khükauokka yingkei.” Kho tegü Jobei athakko kümbei.
Nyetche chalou, Mühghaüeibü shousi shuong
Hobaje
Hobaje
Kheijinei Satanei
Hao kaijembo, haoeibü chem kaijembo, hoba haoei kibü pendou kaijembo, pendou aenei nyi ba alelo? Nyi haoeibü ikküm iklei haükua hoba kaonyua haoeibü nyaksinam haada.
Lausikei tou kaibü ik shingan haoei kibü pendou to meitishima, haoei kathedanga ka to khüklaoklabü!”
Hobaje
Nyetche chalou ladang haoeibü shousi bousu yaksa shousi shuong haoeneibü jai jaishoubou chema shauko yungko hoba ih yungyoko kikei, kheijinei Job jungto ngühlang künbou che louan laukei.
“Masu pongsu shuong sekshapbo kikei, hoba khübü nyangko gadu shuong lamshauko kikei,
hoba Sabeanbüei shikei hoba khübü kho langa, haü, haoenei sambü shuong haitia hoba ka la ngühlang lenla ngo ong satenkei.”
Haoei lenko kitoua toukei lubü che louan laukei, “Müh ka Mühghaü wan lotan sanlon si sanshuong juokeda; hoba ka la lenla ngo kü mütpem satenkei.”
Haoei lenko kitoua toukei lubü che louan laukei. “Khaldibü tan sem küman louan ut shuong to hatyolang kei hoba khübü kho langa, inhei sambü shuong waphetia; hoba ka la lenla ngo kü mütpem satenkei.”
Haoei lenko kitoua toukei lubü che louan laukei, “Kaibü shousi bousu yaksa shuong haoeneibü jai jaishou bou chema shauko hoba ih yungko kikei,
hoba chühashi, yamlamang ka yei yaangbü che longkei hoba chema chemnyek lei pendou to soukei hoba khübü mütao shuong thükto nopjung koukei hoba haoen haia, hoba ka la lenla ngo boushou satenkei.”
Kheijinei Job meimeikei hoba haoeibü mangyuk jitthetkei, hoba haoeibü khu kütan apbei, hoba kao to lekjung atkei hoba lembei.
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Kü nyueibü shimung ka mütkong longkei hoba thito ngo mütkong haulabü;
Habü haüthükbü pendoua Jobei mangthem
Tokei nyetche chalou Mühg- haüeibü shousi shuong
Hobaje Jobei jongaikei; Hobaje
Kheijinei
Hobaje Satanei
Lausikei tou kaibü ik shingan haoeibü lo si phejak to meitishima, haoei ka to ka thedanga khükla uoklabü.”
Hobaje
Hobaje Satan
Hobaje haoei lolo nyikngaila chak- phei che sungbakei hoba hao tap thüka setkei.
Kheijinei haoeibü yakei laukei, “No toukei tükdebüa hatlepan kida lo? Mühghaü khükei uokeian haian apashi.”
Lausikei haoei sao to laukei, “Nyi ngoubüloubü che tegü lauda; seneije hai, Mühghaüeibü ik ka maibü ong sungletan, amaibüje asungletlep sai?” Ho pendoua Jobei haoeibü sembungei shabü ashon.

Tou hao to thushed ho pendou loubü Jobeibü thangbou semei ditan, haoen lulu kishang ka loukei, Temanbü Elifaz, Shuhaibü Bildad, hoba Namatbü Zofar, hoba hao to mao laula hoba hao maangsula shanga haoenei liko jih che janthetkei.
Hobaje ladang saabü ka hao hapbei hoba hao ashen hoba haoen ngüh longko haapbei, hoba haoen müt- pem wekoei mangyuk jitnyinkei, hoba thükaeto tap phinan angtikei hoba khuto mokan jinkei.
Kho tegü chalou nyet, langyang nyet haoen hao yoa kaoa setkei, hoba aoeikei hao to ngüh che ongkei ajoyo; aieilausi haoeibü khonku yongko yaangkei dogo haoenei chühenkei.
Kho phaia, Jobei haoeibü sembung ipan hao bukbü chalou to khükkei.
Hobaje Jobei laukei.
“Ngo bukbü chalou hoba khüyou laobouei bousu shou che bukakei,
dogo laukei kho mauashi.”
Kho chalou nakthühbü kishi;
Thükae ka kho Mühghaüei telam,
ayingsi khünei ngesakbü tehauku.
Nakthüh hoba metuphang haoeneibü la yeiko kho shoulepshi;
kho thüka sangmei shangan kitishi.
Aiei ong chalou kho nakthühtida khoei hattishi.
Khüyou hai yingtishi, nakthüh shangbüei kho yukleptishi;
poeibü chalou bakbüa kho teyoti.
Lit webüa kho pakan tejin.
Chühashi, nangnak kho angkong kitishi,
Olinbü ngühlang khüto telouti.
Aoyouei chalou to khükda uokda,
hoba aoyouei Molojisang pitida.
Langesaoko kijinei hapbü khanshoulitshou nakthühtiashi;
ngesakbü haiyeiko dambo kitishi lausikei teluongti;
Ngeiyangbü khanyang tehüpti.
Aieilausi kho chalouei künyuseibü nyusem akhinku.
Ayingsi kü thüka khonsak huan aphoku.
Aila ngo shia ühaima lo?
Aila ngo buksilengko ühaima lo?
Aila youkükei ngo sungletkeima?
Ayingsi aila ngei yunglabü lele sen kikeima lo?
Aieilausi tou haijineije ngo lengan,
sangsembo kikhoulabü.
Ngo haikei laubü tegüje,
haijineije ngo haksoko yepan kikhoulabü.
Coba si songdakbü shuong apyouei jembü shanga
laangchem yaang dangkei haoen tegü kikhoulabü.
Ayingsi hon kibü Choba shuong aoyouei jembü chem
chandinamei shenko yoshaikei haoen yoa ngo kikhoulepnyu.
Ayingsi litei abenko kukan huan phobü tegü,
khei nasakei ladangkei ngesakbü ühüpbü hima yingkhoulabü.
Khüneije amaibü shuongei touje amangpokda;
hoba khünei hübümangbü shuong solo kia.
Khünei thüngdanga kibü shuong lulu maang leda;
haoenei bunyueibü ngüh aditda.
Khünei hanbü si yaangbü ham kia;
Hobaje bunyu sambü to ai alauda.
Aila khonsaka kibü la ngesakbü kula?
Hobaje soushou khüjin khaujinbü la aila langkei kula?
Haoenei haibü haiyeida lausikei kho alouda.
Hobaje khünan phobü nyaksinam to khaibou kho thuko lamda.
Haoenei ladang hee haplaje,
haoen aeibou olinda hoba lemlemda.
Aila lamnyu ühüpbo kibü mütla,
hoba Mühghaüei baei lelepan kibü la ngesakbü kudama lo?
Nyak mühkhoulabü jeiko ngo ngühda,
hoba dei koubü tegü ngo ngühda.
Aieilausi laobou ngei hatjihatko ki khoei kü to sühda;
hoba ngei ai hatko ki kho kü jungto louda.
Ngo senyühshembü aki, sangsembü che akienda,
ayingsi ngo hakso aki, lausikei khonsak loudang leda.
Kheijinei Teman bou Elifasei laukei:
“Müt cheei ka to joyokho lausi nyi natenasao?
Lausikei aoei ajoyoko kienla?
Chühashi, nyi juong lenena,
hoba hau akibü nyi thuia.
Tuongan kibü kaibü ngühei phona,
hoba khokjepjep hau kitia.
Lausikei ho ka to sühsi no maangkhu yuida;
haoei ka to meitisi nyi anatda.
Nyi Mühghaü to souhatbüei maanglemda yingkaoba lo?
Hobaje tükde lobüa maanglem kidaoba lo?
Ho damenashi dogo ngei ka to sudajada;
shed akibü aoyou maukei?
Ayingsi maangtangbü shuong lanei ong tekan apbei?
Ngei hapjung loubüeije aoyouei shabü sek mouda,
hoba amaibü lilabü wenda haoenei kho latda.
Mühghaüeibü hakei haoen mauda;
hoba haoeibü khauang hakei haoen suian apda.
Molosaonyu ngühbü, sekbülakbü molosaonyu langh;
lausikei Mühghaüei paangnyu nguinyueibü
hauh leilukuda.
Phe shaula ühüpbü haangjung molosaonyueibü huon kho mauda.
Hobaje molosaonyu nyunyuei shoushou lubüa aatida.
Jih chenei kü jungto hakphangshoua ngüh che loukei,
hoba ngeibü nouei kho hangsho japan sungkei.
Nangnak mangshetko,
nyeketlouko yepan kijinei.
Hatbü lühbü kü jungto loukei,
laobouei ngeibü lo pendou nyakeitikei.
Kheijinei kü thedang ka sou che tankei,
ngo sangwijaangko longkei.
Kho atopeiko lokei lausikei hao laibü yingkeije
ngei maisho ashen.
Kü thea denche phatko hapbei;
hoba ngei ngüh hanbü che ditkei.
Mühghaü thedanga chale langkei müt hinseian kienlep lo?
Jembü kümbou thedanga müt saopoan kienlep lo?
Chühashi, jembü sambü to haoei maang alemda;
hoba haoei haoeibü khuthük hangangbü ka ongkei shed lapda.
Khülonga thamsak chema kibü,
aoyoueibü chemshang thamngu thüka ki;
laobou phetyangei shauda haoen lai weeila?
Müt che ngeyang lang kila thükkei,
lausikei nang anaktoua netlaphoula yeida,
aoeikei haü dogo akiko haoen mauda.
haoeneibü neichem kabü janglüh
senan sunga longa haoen haida aying lo?
Hobaje khokei hapbüngebü songsido akiko haida aying lo?”
Lenan chühshi,
ka to jongailabü at ongkei kiasaoje;
hoba saopobü shuong laobou jungto no haula?
Aieilausi ngoubüloubü jakyaü yaübüei haitida.
Hobaje ngoubüloubü nyekto shatbüei haitida.
Ngoubü kho ngei li atbü hapa.
Lausikei mangde hao kishang khükei uokeikei.
Haoeibü shousi shuong thusheda kia;
Haoen bakhüna nitetda,
hoba haoen püetlabü kei ao aki.
Haoeibü langle mühbünoubü shuongei shaukhümbuda.
Hobaje shalebü shuongei youman sunglangkuda,
hoba deilabü shuongei haoeneibü yungdei ka dei khuda.
Aieilausi thamngu ka khonku alongda,
ayingsi kao ka khonsak apakda.
Lausikei wanlüh kuito pijung angbü phatko,
müt khonsakla bukkei.
Lausikei ngo habü yingkei laubü tegüje,
ngei Mühghaü lamboulabü,
hoba kü mat Mühghaü jungto künkkoulabü.
Alam ashokenbü kümsilei yaang haoei kümda;
hoba haoeibü seikümseilei wekhümbou aying.
Haoei kaodak to lang yantikuda,
hoba seka dei lakkuda.
Phangkabü thua kibü haoei thükaeto tonenkuda;
hoba manghaapbü shuong satenshang aeto tonenda.
haoeneibü dambü haoenei asühlabü lele.
Maanglimaangsang mütei huon kümbü haoei leilukuda.
Haoei songbüdobü shuong haoen jembü huonayoua lapda,
hoba lulimbü dambü lusaktikuda.
Changea haoenei nakthüh kühshokda,
hoba haoenei chajihboua nangnak tegü youei juko paida.
Lausikei haoeneibü sembung inlou ka akainyu shuong,
hoba hau kibü ik ka shalebü shuong haoei khümenda.
Hibü khoei shalebü shuong maanglem kia,
hoba asaopobü shuong sembung khinlepbuda.
Chühashi, Mühghaüei aoto hakda kho müt olinbou!
Hibü Thükenbouei tangtikubü aweasüngko teki.
Aieilausi haoei aktida hoba haoei khühkuda;
haoei leilutida hoba haoeibü ikei ong maitikuda.
Thushed lak ka haoei no püetlabü;
haü, nyetboubüa no ai ayinglabü.
Mühsinou, haibü ka,
hoba wapyoa,
ineibü sei ka haoei no angngailabü.
Sembong pipibü ka no senetlabü,
hoba hatbümokbü maulabü thushed ka no khümenlabü.
Mühsinou hoba maulabü thusheda no nyilabü,
ayingsi kaodak meisiau shuong to ühütlabü.
Aieilausi seka no laang to thujinglabü,
hoba yamkabü meisiau shuong ka to sangmaia kilabü.
Hobaje kaibü neichem aleiluko kia dogo nyi ngelabü;
hoba nyi kaibü kishang pean chühlabü,
hoba pendou benkosouko haplabü.
Kaibü lilabü halabü dogo nyi ngelabü,
hoba kaodaka yamsang tegü kaibü shousi shuong kilabü.
Hangi lian ong khebü phatko,
No baushi sinan ong hee to atlabü.
Ho to chühashi, künei lamenbü kho tükde ki.
Künei phanjema, hoba no maila shanga kho ngean phoshi.
Kheijinei Jobei jongaikei:
“O, ngeibü takbühitbü ho takan chüha tegüje,
hoba ngeibü khonku pendou seret hauan chühbü yingma!
Aieilausi tou yungnyu phetsen toje atsheibou yinglabü;
khoei ong ngei ngüh ajemtenko lauan apa.
Aieilausi pendou Thükenboueibü laujin kü to ngetakei;
ho kom ngeibü soushouei yungda.
Mühghaüeibü hatlamoklabü shuong kükhu limbo ki.
Yamkabü gaduei haoeibü shausiyung kian wiasao?
Ayingsi masu pongsuei haoeibü shausiyung phoan wiasao?
Ai shik meiamai kho jem ayoko shauenasao?
Ayingsi autei thupaibü ka teibü shauenlepsai?
Ngeibü sembungei khübü to meitimang asühda.
Khübü shausiyung kü sembunga meiamai.
O, ngei mangsüh hapena tegüje,
hoba haoeibü ik sengan ngo shian apa tegüje.
Hobaje ngei haiyeibü Mühghaüei sengkua tegüje!
Hobaje ngo nakleptila Mühghaüei maanganga tegüje,
hoba haoeibü ik sengan ngo shian apa tegüje!
Kheijinei ong ngei hakso hapbhoulabü.
Haü, aphokeibü khonkua ngo olinkhoulabü.
Aieilausi saopobü ngüh shuong ngei asungletko aki.
Ngei haisühlabü lele ngeibü hau lanei ki?
Hobaje ngei natena tegükei khonku ho lanei thonla?
Ngo laang tegü hau kiasai?
Ayingsi ngeibü phe namkung sai?
kü to lam aikei aki ayinglo?
hoba kü ka kümen leienlabü hau satkhüma ayinglo?
Aoyouei lulueibü thangbou shanga senetan phoda,
Haoenei pendou Thükenbou to hatbü senetan phoda.
Shushou tegü hoba kho koushanga maojung haubü tegü,
ngeibü jaisinasi shuongei lepbolangko jungeia.
Ninthu laangei khübü shushou nakthüngko yeida;
hoba khübü thüka ninthu khünda.
Lemabü jihaphaia haoen mauan apda;
ladang aulaje haoen hak la yeian apda.
Wakoubü shuong lam yoongjung satda,
haoen yama shoongaian mauda.
Temabü wakoubü shuongei dei lamda,
Shebabü shuongei maanglem phoda.
Haoenei dambo kibü ühüpsije haoen himou baukei;
haoen khüto loukei hoba mangan apbei.
Kho tegü kü thedanga yeia.
kanei hatlamoklabü che hapda hoba hatda.
kü la denche labü ayingsi kaneibü nyaksinam ka,
jongsak che kushi dogo ngei laukei sai?
Ayingsi dangboueibü ik ka ngo khümenshi dogo,
ayingsi shieikoebou ik ka ngo angngaishi dogo ngei laukei sai?
kü la lenbü ngo ngüh
üangko kikho,
hoba ngei ainei mashikkeije kho ditentiashi.
Ngühmai ngüh lai hau ki;
lausikei kanei hakbüa ai hau ki?
Laialebü mütei laubü ngüh kho
yei tegü dogo dama tegükei,
kanei ngühei hakla huongda si?
Haü, kanei shoushedshou la phaang pakkulabü,
hoba thangbou che ka ku shaulabü.
Hibü tou kü to chühshi,
aieilausi tükde ngo kan thedanga ayepeilabü.
Khüai leshi dogo ngei sudajada, amai teku,
haü, kaneibü maangpon jaksheiashi.
Ngeibü lishanga saopobü kia sai?
Ngeije maibü amaibü ashauenlep sai?”
Kaodaka müt shanga wapyo akisai?
Haoeibü langkei kho chale eikmu koubü phatkei aying lo?
Sambüei yemekoubü mangsühko haiyeibü tegü,
hoba chale eikmu koubüei mu ong haiyeibü hima.
Ngo lit lita kongkong ong kitida,
hoba kü shanga nangnak watlelabü janletkuakei.
Ladang ngo shena lengda, ngei lauda,
“Ngo ladang pila?”
Lausikei langyang louakei,
hoba ngeyang langesaoko ngei ngeibü mang sepeidang leda.
Ngeibü mang yangpem si makei thangthang shenan kia;
ngeibü khon kaangkhühtham yeida,
hoba kho phaia simok senda.
Kü langkei neitakbüeibü leitujin tokei sobou hauda;
hoba maanglem akiko apda.
O ngeibü langkei ho khei yei tegü damenashi;
ngeibü nyekei touje maibüje ühüplabü.
Aoeibü nyekei ngo lomda haoei touje ngo ühüplabü;.
kaibü nyekei ngo lamlabü lausikei ngoje akilabü.
Sangmei ühüpbo maubü hima,
Ao hee to atlaje touje hao alonglabü.
Touje haoen chem to angailabü;
ayingsi hao kishangeikei angelabü.
Hibü ngeikei ngeibü sembung akhinlabü,
ngei ngeibü soushou khonkubü shanga ngei laulabü.
Hobaje ngeibü soushou khauekbü shanga ngo nyamnyamlabü.
Lombü la lomtilabü lele,
ngo yungnyu ayingsi
yungnyu haübü kabü meisiau sai?
Ngeibü shenei ngo haksotilabü,
kü yepshangei ngeibü khonku hansho
maitikulabü dogo ngei lauda.
Kheijinei manglibüei nyi ngo moktida;
hoba mangsang danko ngo hattida.
Hibü ngeibü soushouei nyathetnyu ong haimang sühnyu,
hoba ngo khonsakbü toje hai bouje haimangsühda.
Ngo ngeibü langkeiei oa; ngo ponpenje akilabü.
Ngo khei ong apyoshi aieilausi kü langkei hak kong.
Ngo yaangentilabü lele,
hoba nyi hao to maang kulabü lele müt kei ai?
Hobaje ngeyang weko nyi peanchühlabü lele,
hoba jih weko takteilabü lele mütkei ai?
Lalokche no küae thenyek ayeila?
Ayingsi ngei lit lengbü ühaienla?
Ngei shabü shonkei yingalonga,
O no müt thüngbou,
ngei ka to ai kümla?
Ngei ngo lolo onat künlabü lele,
aila nyi ngo nyek theshang yeitikei?
Hobaje ngei ngühkhüm leilubü shedbü aila üpbuda,
hoba ngeibü shabü aila alangda?
Aieilausi tou ngo thamngua yeplabü.
hoba nyi ngo waangko lamlabü.
Kheijinei Shuhai bou Bildadei jongaikei:
Nyi habü ho lalokche laueila?
Hobaje kaibü ngüh yeinyuyaang tegü lalokche kila?
Mühghaüei matjem lusaktikuda sai,
ayingsi pendou Thükenbouei ngühmai jeileikuda sai?
Kaibü shousi shuongei hao khulimbo shabü shonkei yingalonga,
khülonga haoei haoeneibü shedbü shanga shieikoea.
Nyi ong maangkuko Mühghaü lama yingalonga,
hoba pendou Thükenbou to suajaalonga.
No hinseibü hoba tangbü yingalonga,
maimaitham haoei ka la yingkulabü.
Hobaje kaibü saopobü kishang sepeinyu ngaitikulabü.
Hobaje no hanbüshouei khangsikei,
no thonlama juong halabü.
Aieilausi ngei ka to sudajada,
shangiedbü meten shuong to pheshi.
Hobaje haoeneibü pisibouei ai lamenjung
loukei kho nyi lolo takteiashi.
(Aieilausi senje mietbü shou ong hoba ai angekei,
aieilausi kaodaka seneibü langkei kho mang che tegü ong.)
Haoenei ka la song alenlep lo hoba shean alenlep lo?
“Thim akibüa dangkung yemlep si?
Dei akibüa thakdu yemlep si?
Ho tokei aliko shaangshoua kijinei awapbo,
lubü yamsang ik pendou to sobou yuida.
Kho tegü Mühghaü maan apbü pendou lamnyu thonda,
hoba kho tegü Mühghaü to maialembü shuong maanglem mauda.
Haoeibü maanglem thongokda,
hoba haoeibü maanglem kho keklak chem che phatkei.
Haoei haoeibü chem to nongda,
lausikei kho aloda;
haoei khünei hauei thükbü tegü hatlepda,
lausikei khoei atinda.”
Chanyu thedanga hao teideitham kia,
hoba haoeibü bamanga shaang angda.
Haoeibü li laangshang kaiko yuklepda;
Hao laang kaanglang to atda.
Hao haoeibü chem ka kakan sattialonga,
chem khoei hao atheletlabü hoba laulabü,
ngei no hapanachüh.
Chühashi, haoeibü langkei lama olinbü kho ki,
hoba thamngu ka lubü che longda.
Chühashi, Mühghaüei janbümubü müt nangan üplabü.
Ayingsi haoei amaibü kümbü shuong to athuilabü.
Haoei kaibü sembung nyiyobüei,
hoba kaibü sembungkhop ngekbüei nyibou shentilabü.
Kaibü dangbou shuong himouei shentilabü,
hoba amaiboueibü neichem akiko aplabü.
Kheijinei Jobei jongaikei:
Maimaitham tükde dogo ngei ngekei?
Lausikei Mühghaü thedanga lai küman mütei saopoan kienla?
Müt cheei hao to wetyomangsühsi,
hajar chenei che ongkei haoei ajongaienlabü.
Haoeibü maangpona hao lolo sangbüdobü,
hoba hao hau kibüei,
hao khulimbo maangkaangbü shuong aoyouei thükkei minkei?
Haoei shongh tonenda hoba haoenei kho angeda;
haoei khauangko khübü kho khüpeitida.
Haoei kaodak haoeibü denshang ka nyakeida,
hoba khoeibü thaonyu shuong lühda.
Haoei chanyu la ngühkhüm kuda, hoba kho ohauda,
hoba haoei khanshoulit shuong khinlepda.
Haoei ong mühshuong phambo sengda,
hoba yungnyu deishou thüka paida.
Haoei müha khanshoulitshou shen shen khei
Sabnyu, Orion, hoba Pleiades,
hoba müh chaenei shemjang shuong kümbei.
aditshuokbü kümsilei yaangbü haoei kümda,
haü, aweenbü maangpanglabü kümsilei kümda.
Chühashi, hao kü to himan hauda,
hoba ngei hao ühüpda;
hao kü kü theto tanda lausikei ngei hao ashenda.
Chühashi, haoei japan sungda aoei hao thangetla thükla?
nyi ai kümda dogo aoei hao to lauenla?
Mühghaü kheiongje khau üangda;
Rahabeibü thuiyobü shuong haoeibü you phanga khüpetkei.
Khülonga hao to nyi lai jongaila?
hoba hao yoa ngüh pheyophanyola shanga
ngeibü ngüh lai pienla?
Ngo saopobü kiasikei,
ngei hao to ajongaien;
touje ngeibü dangbou to ngei sulajalabü ong.
Ngei hao to ngaa tegüje, haoei kü to jongaikhoulabü.
Kheiyingsikei haoei ngeibü ngüh
ditlabü dogo maikei telembhoulabü.
Aieilausi haoeibü yeinakei ngo leilutikuda,
hoba ai ayingnyu ngeibü mou pintida.
Haoei ngei hak hinla asakkuda,
lausikei khaubüei ngo shentida.
Hau ong tokyko laualonga haoei kaishima dogo lauda,
hoba mat angko laualonga haoei,
ladang laoyomang sühda dogo lauda.
Ngo saopoan kiasikei, ngeibü sembungei ngo yuktilabü,
ngo janbümubü, lausikei haoei ngo kombünongbü dogo lauda.
Ngo janbümubü, ngei ngo lolo weeiko aki;
ngei ngeibü langkei nyikuda.
Ho pendou jetei ong, hibü ngei lauda,
maibükei amaibükei haoei mautida.
Limsilang khoei mangde haitialonga,
aoyou shedbü aki haoen khonkubü haoei nyikuda.
Kaodak kho amaiboueibü ik to kua;
khünei matjembü shuongeibü thenyek haoei küplepbuda;
haoei akümlonga aoei yingla?
Ngeibü chalou shuong lapangbü tokei yousobou hauda;
khübü kho pijung satda, khübüei ai maibü ühüpda.
Auluei haitilabü meisiau to khoyam
pijung louyenan bauyobü tegü,
khübü kho long minbü tegü hauda.
Ngei ngo nyamnyambü maan apbho,
ngeibü thekhümbü ngesakko laualonga.
Ngei ngeibü khonsak pendou to hatda;
aieilausi nyi “Ngo shedbü aki,”
dogo laula ngei ngekei.
Ngo yuktilabü haang;
khülonga jim akibüa aila ngo hüda?
ninthuei ngo lolo sakalonga,
hoba ngeibü ik saponei sakalonga.
Kheijinei nyi ngo thimto jangan jinlabü,
hoba ngeibü neisimeieikei ngo mangsenlabü.
Aieilausi ngei hao to jongailabü lele,
hoba küsi matjemla haulabü lele,
hao ngo tegübü müt aying.
Küsiham ik shatyolabü lele,
Küsi kanglanga pankulabü aokei aki.
Kü jungka hao la haoeibü ju langtiashi,
hoba hao hatlamoklabüei ngo temokti.
Kheijinei ong hao to ühütko ngei laulabü,
aieilausi kü to hatlabü ai aki.
Ngo ngeibü langkeiei oda,
ngo nyamnyammang sühbü tegü nyamnyamlabü;
ngeibü soushou khauekbü shanga ngei laulabü.
Ngei Mühghaü to laulabü, “Ngo teyukti”;
ayingbü ka nyi kü to tokyoda, kü la lenbü.
Nyi shieikoela, nyi kümbü kümsilei shuinakeila,
hoba amaibüeibü huonsiyoua olinla,
ho ka shanga maibüyangbü si?
ka la müteibü nyek yembei sai?
Ayingsi mütei hapbü tegü nyi haplep sai?
Müteibü chalou tegü kaibü chalou tuisho sai?
Ngeibü shed lapbü hoba ngeibü shabü lambü ho aila?
Ngo shedbüyabü aying,
hoba kaibü ik ka pütla
aokei aki dogo nyi ngesikei, aila hai jungeida?
Kaibü ikei ngo küman kümsembükei,
lausikei sepeian nyi ngo leilutila huongda!
Ngei sudajada,
nyi ho damenashi,
shungkung kao tegü nyi ngo kümbei!
Hobaje tokei nyi ngo thamngula ong yeitilep lo?
Nyi ngo sendei tegü nyatletda,
sendei onbü tegü ayeiti lo?
Nyi ngo khon hoba pheei yuklepbua.
Nyi kü la langkei kukei, hoba sanou lenkei.
hoba kaibü thounoubüei ngeibü soushou khümena.
Khei yingsikei khübü kaibü maanga khünan phokei;
kaibü dambü ho kikei dogo ngei kaangko ngekei.
Ngei shabü shonalonga,
nyi kho chühletnyu phoda.
Hobaje ngeibü shedbü ka nyi ngo akhümenda.
Ngo amailonga kü shanga ügütü;
hoba ngo saopoan kialonga ngeibü khu aphüenda.
Aishanga ngo himou hoba khonkuei shenan kia.
Ngeibü khu phonenalonga molosaonyu tegü nyi ngo shieida;
hoba ngo khulimbo kaibü seishuong lenda.
Ngo khulimbo nyi aukabü haanbü hau tida,
hoba kü thedanga aei maangpokda.
Hobaje ngo khulimbo sepai tan hoba lason hautidang leda.
Hibü aila nyi ngo künyueibü shimung ka sungenkei?
Ngo haian apbü maibou hoba aoeikei ngo ühüpbü maikhoulabü.
Khei ngo langkei akibü maibou yingkhoulabü.
Ngeibü salang shisho ong ayinglo?
Danan apashi;
joubü salang kho kü maang lelabü.
Nakthühbü hoba alongeilabü kaodak hoba haibü yemkao;
khei lemailela nakbü nakthühtham kibü kaodak.
Khei aikei janenan akibü kaodak laobou ka ngo alongailabü;
khüto ohoujinei ngo hansho haksola kü mütpem apyoshima.
Kheijinei Namat bou Zofarei jongaikei:
Ngüh hajuche ajongaiko phoyolep lo?
Müt che ngüh laudang lebüei hao mat mailepsai?
Nyi yonglambo lausi mü sangsembo kilepsai?
Hobaje ladang nyi nyikulaje, aoeikei no ahimoutilepsai?
Aieilausi nyi lauda,
“Ngeibü mailem lenbü saopoakei,
hoba ka thedanga ngo saopoan kia.”
Lausikei O, Mühghaüei joyoa tegüje.
Hobaje haoei hapbü ngebü chemphang ngüh,
khei khoei lai maangpanglabü kümda, kho lena tegüje!
Hibü Mühghaüei kaibü shedbü thüng aying
khei hanbou khangda dogo ngeashi.
Nyi khei ong lambüei Mühghaü haplep lo?
Pendou thükenbou shanga nyi pendou benkosouko haplep lo?
Kho müh to suokbou;
nyi ai kümenkei?
Sheol to kei haübou; nyi ai ngela thükkei?
Kho kaodak takbüsanbü tokei loubou;
hoba yungnyu tokei yaangbou.
Haoei no leithetjung hauan thüngdanga jinalonga,
hoba matjemla thangyen ngaletalonga aoei hao thangetla thükkei?
Aieilausi haoei amlangbü müt ngeda;
Haoei shedbü chühenda hoba nyek hautida.
Hibü ladang ong yamkabü gadu shoushou mütla yeilaje,
kheijinei ong lemshanga mütei songsido haplabü.
Nyi kaibü maangpon tükde leiyeia longa;
hoba hao ae ik sengalonga.
Kaibü ika shabü kialonga, kho saabü to tekan apashi.
Hobaje kaibü neichema asaopobü tethüngti.
Maimaitham kheijineije nali atheko nyi kaibü the lenlabü.
Haü, no kaangkhühtham kilabü hoba ühütlabü.
Aieilausi no khonkubü nyi amalabü.
Dei kouan apbü tegü nyi kho damenlabü.
Hobaje kaibü langkei chalou toje ngesakbou yeilabü.
Tou nakthühan kiasikei, kho ngeyang tegü yeilabü.
Hobaje no khümenan kilabü, aieilausi maanglem kia.
Haü, nyi kaijembo sepeisai chühda.
Satenshanga no haksolabü.
Aoeikei no ühüt amoktiko yeplabü,
Haü, juongei ka to thangbou lammangsühlabü.
Lausikei amaiboueibü nyek akiko aplabü;
hoba haoen satshang lam akilabü,
hoba hak hin thonbü kho ong haoeneibü maanglem yinglabü.
Kheijinei Jobei jongaikei:
Tükte kan ong hapbü ngebü yingshi,
hoba kan yoa songsidokei hailabü.
lausikei ngeikei kan hima ditenda;
ngo kan to phanga aying.
Haü, habü angebü ao aki?
Ngoje lepbü sangmangei nyikubü ong yeia.
Khei ngei Mühghaü to welaukei hoba haoei jongaikei.
Ngo shed akibou hoba janbou mubou!
Ao senyühshembo ki haoeibü maangpona thu amaibü mangsenda!
Tuongetla kümbo kibou shanga kho lamlekuakei.
Kokbü yepeibüeibü neichem naangmaida.
Hobaje aoyouei Mühghaü khauangtida haoen ai ayingda.
Haoenei lulueibü seisihau Mühghaü hima damda!
Lausikei tou yamkabü meisiau to pheashi,
hoba haoenei ka la lenlabü;
hoba mühkabü aushuong to pheashi,
hoba haoenei ka la lenlabü.
Ayingsi kaoa paibü shuong to pheashi,
hoba haoenei ka la lenlabü.
Hobaje yungnyu kabü ngau shuongei ka la ngekkulabü.
Khübü pendou danko
dogo aoei alauen?
Langkei kibü pendou soushou,
hoba khunakshousi pendoueibü hak haoeibü ika kia.
Lishangei shik jepan chühbü tegü,
nouei ngüh ditan achühda lo?
Kanei lauda, jaishou shuong la songsido kia,
hoba baushi shuong la ditenbü kia.
Hao yoa Mühghaü ngebü songsido hoba hau kia;
Hao to songlen maibü hoba maangashokbü kia.
Chühashi, haoei leiluda, hoba kho nyibou akümetenda;
haoei müt che khinda, hoba hao longshang aki.
Chühashi, haoei dei shuong hatlepda
hoba khübü ulangtham apda;
tokei haoei khübü kho litida,
hoba khübüei kaodak khüpeilangeitida.
Hao to hau hoba songsihon maibü kia;
khüpettibü hoba khüpettibou ham haoeibü ika kia.
Haoei songdakbü shuongeibü huonsiyou leilutikuda,
hoba matjembü shuong ngoubüla yeitida.
Haoei Choba shuongeibü ngühkhüm hangangtham apikuda;
hoba haoeneibü shenjanga shembe kaikuda.
Haoei ungshedbou shuong khühlangda.
Hobaje aoyou sekoktham ki haoen pekan apda.
Haoei khusabü shuongeibü ngüh aleda,
hoba baushi shuongeibü dambü apbuda.
Haoei Choba shuong himou bautida,
hoba hauki yaangkibü shuongeibü phekhon sengkuda.
Haoei nakthühphang ka haübüa kibü peisilei shuong sungenda,
hoba taomaophang kho ngesakbü to sungenda.
Haoei phangshuong haatida,
hoba khübü kho leilutida.
Haoei phangshuong pindida, hoba khei apyoda.
Kaodaka leiyeibü shuongeibü dambü ngoutida,
hoba lamnyu akishang sangliphanga shoongaitida.
Wanthung akiko haoen nakthühphanga shoongaida,
hoba ihei jakbü tegü shishilele aptida.
Chühashi, ngei pendou hapa,
ngeibü nouei tida,
hoba ditena.
Kanei ai ngekei, ngeikei ngeakei,
ngo kan to phangkabou aying.
Lausikei ngei pendou Thükenbou to joyomangsühda;
hoba Mühghaü to pheyophanyola ngei mangsühko haiyeida.
Lausikei kan amlangbü kümbü shuong,
kan pendou amlangbü daktar shuong ong.
O, kanei ong ngüh üangko kikei tegüje,
kho kanei hapbü ngebü yingkhoulabü!
Tou kü sembungei laubü ditashi.
hoba ngeibü sembung khopei subüjabü ditshi.
Kanei Mühghaü nyena amlang,
hoba khüpbolangko laulep sai?
Kanei haoeibü thenyek chühlep lo?
Hobaje Mühghaü shanga pü lelep lo?
Haoei kaibü shed lamlabü kho maibü sai?
ayingsi mütei müt khüpettibü tegü nyi hao khüpettilepsai?
Nyi chemphanga the chühalonga,
haoei maimaitham no tang khittikulabü.
Haoeibü son to no ühütlep lo?
Haoei nyonglepbüei no angesaklep ayingsi?
Kanei tetenbü kho jim aki tap tegü ong;
kan matmaibü ngüh shuong kho shungkung tham ong.
Ngüh tüang,
ngei laula shanga ngo khei ong apyoshi.
hoba ai yinglaje yingshi.
Ngeibü phea lai küman ngeibü hauh ngüttila?
Hobaje ngeibü langkei ngeibü ika lai phola?
Chühashi haoei ngo wapettilabü,
ngo maanglem aki;
khei yingsikei ngei hao thedanga ai janbü kho kümlabü.
Kho ngeibü khümenbou kilabü.
Aieilausi Mühghaü to ühütbü müt hao jungto aloulabü.
Ngeibü ngüh maisho ditashi,
hoba ngeibü ngüh nyi noua nepbo ditashi.
Tou ditashi,
ngei kü ngüh linkeilinko kua;
ngo mat maitilabü dogo ngei ngekei.
kü to suok soyolabü ao ki?
Hibü kheiyingsi ong ngo ngüh üangko hailabü.
kü to kümsilei penyi ong teküm,
khei yingsi ong ngo ka thedang ka ngo lolo ahulabü.
Kaibü ik kü ka lounyu bangjung haushi,
hoba kaibü hatlamoklabüei ngo temokti.
Kheijinei ong nyi ngaashi, hoba ngei jongailabü;
ayingsi ngei joyokho, nyi jongaiashi.
Ngeibü shedbü shabü lajuche ki?
Ngei ngühkhüm lulimbü hoba ngeibü shabü ngetiashi.
Aila kaibü thenyek küplepda,
hoba ngo kaibü dangbou dogo weeida?
Yeiei soujung hauko kibü che kho nyi moktilep sai?
Youshou sho linbü kho nyi shieilep sai?
Aieilausi nyi ngo khulimbo ngüh khaubü doan jinkuda;
hoba kü nashouabü shedbü shuong kü la phet phanngaitikei?
Hobaje nyi ngeibü you khühkuda,
hoba ngeibü youmo phanda;
nyi ngeibü you komlepan phokuda.
Ngo nyaületbü peisilei che tegü kiasikei,
hoba phetyangei shaubü nei che tegü kiasikei,
nyi ho pendou kü to kümda.
Yaksaei bükbü müt salang tuisho,
hoba khonsakei shenan kia.
Chipen che tegü bungda hoba yuian apda;
tokei mangshoubü che tegü satda, hoba akiko apda.
Hobaje khübü che to nyi nyek pükda lo?
hoba ka yoa ngeibü matjemda lo?
Aoei asaopobü ka saopobü peisilei longtienkei?
Aokei aki.
Haoeibü chalou takletan kialonga,
hao lit lajuche kila nyi ngean kialonga,
hoba haoei danjung ohauenlabü lele nyi
haoeibü lei kümbuan kialonga.
Chalemu lambüei jembü chalou thonan
maangamaiko solobü phatko,
hao haksola shanga nyi hao ka kaibü nyekei
tangküng to chühashi.
Aieilausi bulong che shanga maanglem kia;
kho akalonga toukei nyemshaang longlabü
hoba nyem kho athonlabü.
Haoeibü li sinsikei, hoba kaoa haoeibü buchung haiasikei.
Khüneikei kaodei takbüei kho sem tokngailabü,
hoba bushang haanbü tegü bhek hakyo hakyo koulabü.
Lausikei mütje haian apda, hoba mauan apda;
haü, müt haida hoba hao lanei ki?
Yungnyu dei hapan apbü tegü,
hoba shunyu che mauan apbo ulangtham hapbü hima.
Kho tegü müt leketda
hoba alaksepda.
Müh amaushongko haoen apingailabü,
ayingsi haoen yepbü ka alakseplabü.
Oh, nyi ngo Sheola huan phokubü yingma;
no khauang longbü akoushongko,
nyi ngo huan phokukei yingma;
hoba kü shanga jih che janenkuan ngo damenkei yingma!
Müt che haisi hao tokei langngailep lo?
Ngo aliti shongko ngeibü langkei lason
chalou pendou onko ngei haiyeilabü.
Nyi ngaalonga ngei jongailabü!
Hobaje kaibü ikei kümbü che shanga nyi haiyeiko kikhoulabü.
Lausikei tou nyi ngeibü youyaü weenakei;
nyi ngeibü shedbü khei ong aphokuda.
Ngei dobü ngühkhüm lulimbü neimok chenei khuilepbuakei.
Hobaje nyi ngeibü shedbü küplepbulabü.
Hobaje maimaitham shongh limjung lotan netla yeida,
hoba laang kho jembü kishang ka linda.
deiei laang shuong haulangda;
hoba kho sopbo koubüei kaodak ka thamngu kulangda!
Hobaje kho tegü nyi müteibü maanglem leilukuda.
Nyi hao khulimbo ponpen shanga thükda,
hoba hao satan apda;
Nyi hao thenyek jeileikuda hoba hao sattian apda.
Haoeibü shousi shuong nyensang hapda hoba haoei angeda;
hoba haoen yantida, lausikei haoei khübü ashenda.
Haoei haoeibü phemanga shatbü ngeda,
hoba haoeibü soushou haoeibü maanga mang haapda.
Kheijinei Teman bou Elifasei jongaikei:
Songbüdobü cheei amlangbü songeidoei jongailep lo?
Ayingsi haoeibü shimung chaangbou yeiei soptilep lo?
