Ku akibü ngüh yoa, ayingsi ai akümenlabü ngüh joyobü yoa,
haoei lemenlep lo?
Haü, ngei Mühghaü to hatbü tekan apda,
hoba Mühghaü thedanga ngühüangko lembü ange angeko mautida.
Aieilausi haibü shabüei kaibü sembung leiyeida,
hoba nyi khüpbülangbüeibü lishang pienda.
Ngei aying, kaibü sembungei no lolo yuktida;
hoba kaibü sembung khopei ka khulimbo aukabü kuda.
Pendou to no shaang bukkei sai?
Ayingsi shongh shuong ayaüjinei no yeikei sai?
Mühghaüeibü chemphang thangyena no yoan chühkei sai?
Hobaje hapbüngebü songsido ka shangabü ong yeikei sai?
Nyi ngebü künei ange sai?
Nyi ai ditenkei kho küneije aditenda sai?
Kün yoa kabou tokei khuthubükei yoakei.
Mühghaüei solotibü hoba ka to ngüh inyaitham joyolabü
kho ka shanga hansepbei sai?
Aila kaibü maangpon athepetda?
hoba aila kaibü nyek shemeida?
Aila kaibü soushouei Mühghaü khulimbo loda,
hoba ho tegübü ngüh kaibü sembung ka lidida?
Hao hinseian kilabü lele müt kho ai?
hoba yaksaei bukbü lai saopoan kienkei?
Chühashi haoeibü Saopobü shuong to maang alemda;
haü, hao thea müh shuongkei asaopo.
Kholonga mangsenlabü hoba ahinseibü,
hoba shabü dei tegü jenbü müt latetche hanan jungeila?
Ngei lenkho, nyi ditashi hoba ngei hapbo loukei
kho lenkho.
Laobou songbüdobü shuongei jembü bousi shuong ka
huan aphoko tetenkei.
Aoyou la ong kao kho kukei,
hoba aoyou yoa yenbou aokei akitei.
Salang sünga, khei shieikoebü shanga po lujuche takletan ki,
khülokche kho amaibou kho khonsakei khonkuda.
Haoeibü noukhüna hatbü kia!
Naangmaijinei soshausoyungbü shuong hao jungto loulabü.
Hao nakthühshang ka longeilabü dogo haoei maialemda;
hoba hao shanga in lamleakei.
Haoei shausiyung lambo paida hoba lauda,
“Kho lanei ki?”
hao shanga nakthühbü chalou hao thea kia.
Khonku khonsakei hao hattida;
Choba che lason haula lamlebü tegü,
haoenei hao thükda.
Aieilausi haoei Mühghaü khulimbo ik shingkei,
hoba pendou Thükenbou khulimbo lilikei.
Aih shangbü thongan,
haoei maanga yaman
hao thükto tomatlangda.
Aieilausi haoeibü thenyek haabüei naanglepakei,
hoba küksiho nethemtham yeitia.
Hobaje hao apsanga kida, khünei chema ao akida
hoba kho laangshang la yeida.
Hao akeida, haoeibü nyaksinam thonlabü,
ayingsi haoeibü youman angüpda.
Hao nakthühshang ka abanglabü,
wanlongei haoeibü bhek maklabü,
hoba Mühghaüeibü sembungei hao metan aplabü.
Hao lolo honettiko haoei amlanga maang telemti;
Aieilausi haoeibü ku kho kongkong yeilabü.
Moko haoeibü bhek wapan aplabü,
hoba haoeibü bhek shaangshou akilabü.
Semlüh tegü haoei semlüh hek asembü nyakan attilabü,
hoba oliv bulong tegü haoeibü pon elettilabü.
Aieilausi Mühghaü to ühütbü shuong dan angkong aptilabü,
hoba besa anyem shaubüeibü neichem wanei longshemlabü.
Haoenei shia amaibü künda hoba shabü bukkuda;
hoba haoeneibü shimungei himou sungbada.
Kheijinei Jobei jongaikei:
Kho tegübü ngüh juong ngeitida;
kan pendou khonku aei kubü haksotibü ong.
Jim akibü ngüh thonlep lo?
Ayingsi kanei jongailabü lele aiei kan maangpok longtida?
Kanei tegü ngeikei lauenakei;
kaneibü soushou kho kü soushou to jeiyoa tegüje,
kan khulimbo ngei wapyokhoulabü,
hoba kan to ngeibü khu ngombhoulabü.
Ngeibü sembungei kan hau kitikhoulabü,
hoba ngeibü sembung khopei kan maangshat sotikhoulabü.
Ngei lauasikei ngeibü maangshat hakasoda;
hoba ngei natsühsikei kho latetche satda?
Lausikei tou haoei ngo damena;
haoei kü thangbou pendou sattikua;
Haoei ngo mengshattida;
hoba ngo linokbü ho ngo khulimbo aukabü che tegü ki.
Haoeibü khauang maangpokei ngo jitnyinkua,
hoba mangsenbüei ngo shieia;
haoei ngo khulimbo hauh uyoa;
ngeibü dangbouei kü to nyekjokphanga semlidia.
Haoenei kükhu limbo haa yaang koua;
haoenei nyikuko ngeibü oma ipa;
haoen kükhu limbo chela lapbuda.
Mühghaüei asaopobü shuong la ngo kua,
hoba amaiboueibü ik to haangkusuko tekan jinda.
Kü maangleko kikei, hoba haoei ngo penyila yeiko pakngokkei;
haü, haoei ngüma nyatan netla yeiko phetnyintia;
Tokei haoei kipla shanga chühan phoakei.
Haoeibü lau jungbü shuongei ngo kailepda;
onou akakko haoei ngeibü kelang thotetkuda.
Haoei ngeibü khauekbüei kao nyaktida.
Haoei kü la nali thetidang leda,
hoba lakbühongbü lakoubü che tegü
kü thükto tomjung lotda.
Ngei ngeibü manga senounei thipa,
hoba ngeibü laang thama khoneia.
Ngei ngeibü ikei aikei amaibü akümsikei,
hoba ngeibü welau hinseian kiasikei.
Haapbüei ngeibü thenyek saklangda,
hoba ngeibü nyekkhop nakkhühtham kia.
Oh kaonyudak,
ngeibü sii nyi teküplet,
hoba ngo haapbü tethakti.
Tokei chühashi, ngeibü aukabü khuthüka kia,
hoba aoei kü ngüha thipda hao thükaenei kia.
Ngeibü thangbou shuongei kü la nyikuda;
Mühghaü jungto ngeibü
nyeksi kouda.
Khei Mühghaü yoa müt che lemaia jungeilabü,
hoba müt cheeibü shou lepbü sangmang yoa
hangalama kiyola shanga.
Aieilausi po shisho kian phaiaje,
ladangkei alongeilabü kaodak to haulabü.
Ngeibü soushou leilua, ngeibü chalou aki,
Kü shanga hee lamlekuakei.
Maimaitham kü la nyikubü shuong ngo kaijembo kia.
hoba haoen khauang longbüei ngeibü nyek yukmetda.
Ngei ho sudajada,
ngo ka yoa angthetla
nyi thekubü aukabü labü,
Ka to limbo kü yoa ik hatyolabü ao ki?
Aieilausi ditenbü ka nyi haoeneibü maang pon huan phoa;
hibü nyi haoen ayaangentilabü.
Aoei phejan che haplabü nyena jembü thangbou
shuong to amlang ngüh lauda;
haoeibü shousi shuongeikei nyek thutikulabü.
Phangshuongei ngühli la lelabü lele,
hoba mütei kü to eokei thoklabü lele haoei ngo küma.
Ngeibü maangshatei ngeibü nyekei shangaashatko hapda,
hoba ngeibü küksiho pendou mangshoubü che tegü ong.
Maangtangbü shuong khünei maangpanglabü.
hoba shed akakbüei Mühghaü to maialembü shanga maangmauda.
Khei yingasikei saopobü shuongei jembü lam pyoda,
hoba aoeibü ik saopobü ki aei hau kibou yeilabü.
Lausikei tou kan pendou kaishi,
hoba kan yoa che ongkei sangbüdobü ühüplabü.
Ngeibü chalou tana, ngeibü nyekchüh,
khei ngeibü maanga dambü leilua.
Haoenei nangnak kho changela yeitida,
hoba lauda, ngesakbü kho nakthüh nyangko kia.
Ngei Sheol kho ngeibü chem dogo lamalonga,
nakthüh phanga yepshang imalonga.
Püngkhün to, no kübou, hoba yangpem
to ngeibü nyu hoba nou dogo laualonga.
Kholonga ngeibü maanglem lanei ki?
Hobaje ngeibü maanglem kho aoei chühla?
Haoen kü yoa Sheol to yanlepsai?
Ayingsi kün liko tham to atlepsai?
Kheijinei Shuhai bou Bildadei jongaikei:
Ngüh lapla shanga lalokche sung sanla?
damanchühashi, hoba thonla künei joyokho.
Aiyingbü shanga kün meisiau tegü weeida,
hoba aila ka thea kün ngoubü la yeikei?
No no lolo khauangko saiyeialonga,
ka haangjung kaodak kho sangliphang la yeilep lo?
Ayingsi laang che kishang ka tomjung satlep lo?
Haü, amaiboueibü hantin nyetda,
hoba haoeibü wanlong alongda.
Haoeibü neichema wanthung kho nakthühakei,
hoba haoeibü khua haoeibü wanthung kho nyetda.
Haoeibü youyaü hau tuilabü,
hoba hao jembüeibü huonei hao tuongtilabü.
Aieilausi jembü you tina minda,
hoba hao tin lüh mongbü thüka paida.
Haoeibü youdemei tineibü menshoua nakda,
hoba tin lühei haoeibü youa japda.
Hao shanga kaoa tinlüh mongan phokuakei,
hoba hao haushanga tin kho sankuakei.
Pendou aenei hatlabüei hao moktida,
hoba youa khaplapbo shida.
Hao hau ka ngaida, hoba haoeibü thushed
kho hao nyangko haiyeiko kia.
Shatei haoeibü khon shaukhümda,
hoba moushedei haoeibü younyek shaukhümda.
Haoei maanglembo kibü neichem ka hao senan aplabü,
hoba hao hatlamoklabü Choba jungto leian haulabü.
Haoeibü neichema mü kilabü;
hao kishanga wansat laang atlabü.
Haoeibü maangkabü li haianapda;
hoba thükaenei haoeibü bhek linda.
Kaodaka haoeibü dambü aki,
hoba khongnyua haoeibü nyen aki.
Ngesakbü ka nakthühbü to hao hautida,
hoba kaodak ka shian sattida.
Haoeibü mütli ka akbü shisishousikei akilabü,
hoba hao kishanga aokei akiteilabü.
Chaangbou aenei kibüei hao haibü hapan maangpangda,
tes hoba chanep aenei kibü mokda.
Maimaitham asaopobü shuong kishang kho tegü ki,
hoba aoei Mühghaü ange hao kishang kho tegü ki.
Kheijinei Jobei jongaikei:
Kanei ngeibü soushou lalokche
naangjamtila hoba ngühei ngo neneila?
Annebenko kanei ngo nyikua;
ngo khulimbo amaibü kümbü ho kan hikei ahimouda lo?
Hobaje maimaitham ngo ong shedkei yingalonga,
ngeibü shedbü kho kü to yinglabü.
Maimaitham kanei ngo khulimbo shanglimalonga,
hoba ngo khonsakbü khulimbo ngüh laualonga.
Kholonga ho ngeashi,
khei Mühghaüei
kü ngüh khüpeinyu apbua.
Chühashi, kü to ik atbü khulimbo ngei ngekda,
lausikei kü to ajongaida;
ngei thuibü ngada,
lausikei janthetkubü aki.
Ngei atanenlabü lele haoei ngeibü lam lothetkua,
hoba ngo haushang haoei nakthühtikua.
Ngeibü soneikangbü haoei kü ka yukan sunga,
hoba ngeibü khu ka khun kho sunglanga.
Pendou aenei haoei ngo leilutia hoba ngo touje aki.
hoba ngeibü maanglem kho bulong che tegü pheiena.
Tokei haoei ngo khulimbo maangpokda,
hoba ngo kho haoeibü dangbou yoa che dogo weeida.
Haoeibü sepai pendou liko louda,
hoba ngo khulimbo lamnyu thangetda;
hoba ngeibü neichem kaijembo haoeneibü setshang imenda.
Haoei ngeibü jaisinasi shuong kü ka saabü to sattikuda,
hoba kü thangbou shuong kü to lepde dangbou la yeia.
Ngeibü chempenei ngo khei apyoa,
hoba ngeibü lamshok thangbouei ngo maa.
Kün chema kibü shuong hoba ngeibü
sambü shuongei ngo yenbou dogo damda;
Haoen thea ngo küksithang che la yeia.
Ngei ngeibü sambü ngada, lausikei haoenei ajongaida;
Ngeibü sembungei ngei hao to sulajalabü ong.
Ngeibü yakei ngo mangsenda,
hoba künyuei bukbü shousi shuongei ngo amangsühko apa.
Nashou hanbü shuongeikei kü la nyikuda;
ngo loalonga haoenei ngo khulimbo laueida.
Ngei maanglemenbü thangbou pendouei ngo mangsenda;
hoba aoyou ngei sanouda, haoenei kü khulimbo loda.
Ngeibü lo khonei ong yuklepan kia,
hoba ushaleko ong ngo satenakei.
Oh, kan kü thangbou shuong kü to onoukai, kü to onoukai,
Aieilausi Mühghaüei kü to meitia.
Mühghaüei shieikoebü tegü aila kanei ngo shieikoeda,
hoba aila ngeibü pheei kan maanga amaida?
Oh, ngeibü ngüh ho doan phoa ma!
Oh, ngüh kho le chenei doa ma!
Nameibü kolem hoba pensilei,
Laanga ponpen shanga doa ma!
Lausikei ngo khümenbou langkei kia dogo ngei kaangko ngekei;
hoba ho phaia nyetche chalou kaodaka
haoei kü shanga lokulabü.
Hobaje ngeibü mang nyaületan phaia,
phea ayingsikei ngei Mühghaü hapbhang.
Hao kü aenei kia dogo ngei ngelabü.
Hao yenbou che aying dogo ngeibü nyekei haplabü.
Ngeibü maanga waangbüei ailai akida.
Hao to shedbü li hapabü,
senei hao lai khonkutila dogo kanei laualonga.
Kanei in to hatashi;
aishanga kanei matjem che kia dogo ngelabü lele
khauangei inlou shieikoe shonbada.
Kheijinei Namat bou Zofarei jongaiko laukei:
Khei yingbü khoei ngo maangmauda,
hoba khoei ngeibü maangpona ho phenyemda.
Ngo himou baulabü lele hakbü kho ngei tida.
hoba ngei ditenbü ka ngeibü soushouei kü to jongaida.
Shangied ka kaodaka müt apyosi lengko ka.
Amaibouei thükbou kho süng ashonda,
hoba Mühghaü to maialembü olinbü kho
longche ong dogo nyi ngekeilao?
Müh sühko hao yonglamsi dogokei,
hoba sangmei sühko haoeibü khu angsikei.
Hao jembü phet tegü ponpen shanga mauda;
Aoyouei hao hapjung loukei haoenei lauda,
Hao lala lato haukei?
Mangalibü che tegü hao seengjung satlabü,
nangnak mangshetbü che tegü hao shian sattida.
Laobou nyekei hao hapbei, touje hao ühüplabü,
ayingsi hao kishangeikei touje hao angelabü.
Haoeibü shousi shuongei shalebü ka sanou lamlabü,
hoba haoeibü ikei haoeibü nyaksinam kungailabü.
Haoeibü lo toukei heshouabü hau tegü ong;
lausikei thama hao yoa yeplabü.
Haoeibü sembunga amaibü kho teikua tegükei,
hoba haoeibü lishangei kho huan phoasikei.
Haoei kho alitiko hatlepsi dogokei,
hoba haoeibü sembunga tokei kho phoasikei;
khei yingasikei haoeibü shaueiyungei haoeibü shimung shatda,
hoba haoeibü kom hao to ki.
Haoei nyaksinam suida, hoba nyibou khingaida;
Haoeibü shimung ka Mühghaüei khübü kho tekan apbuda.
Pinyueibü lüh haoei shepda,
jembü lishangei hao haitida.
Onang longbü shumang,
hoba naodei si sendei koubü shumang shuong haoei ühüplabü.
Haoei küten ongenbü kungaiko, haoei kho ashauoulabü;
Namyaknamsei ka pailetbü thüng hao aolinlabü.
Aieilausi haoei shalebü khonkutikei hoba khoyam apyokei.
Haoei adangbü chem che to hao ik atan soan sungkei.
Haoeibü shi ladangkei ashenshije,
Haoei maanglembü nyaksinam haoei hansho ongkei athanenlabü.
Haoei aeilam aeiphop akümbü ai aki;
hibü haoeibü maangdüh thonshang akida.
Hao ajanjan pendouei benasouan kiasikei,
hao kongda kaangda;
khonsakbü weko hao khulimbo ki.
Mühghaüei hao khulimbo khauangbü,
hoba hao shauji yungjinei khauangbü,
lang tegü yantibü khoei ong hao shi shenan kishi.
Hao nameibü insiaubu ka satenlabü,
hoba chinam lao cheei hao paiko kiplabü.
Haoei kho senenda hoba kho shenjang aeka longda,
hoba lailaibü laujin kho haoeibü
khauekbü ka setenda.
Hao to hatlamoklabüei sühda.
Haoeibü nyaksinam kho pendou amlang ong;
Mütei ametbü wanei hao juokshemda.
Haoeibü neichema joubü peialeia kho longda.
Mühei haoeibü shed shangashattida,
hoba kaodakei hao khulimbo loda.
Mühghaü khauangbü chaloua,
yeiei peisilei soujung satbü tegü,
haoeibü chema küten ongenbü mü kaodak to langda.
Mühghaü ka müt amaibü che shangabü phejan ho,
hoba Mühghaüei janletkubü phet kho ho.
Kheijinei Jobei jongaikei:
Ngeibü ngüh nou haangan ditashi;
hoba hoei kan senyühshemshi.
Natenko haiteishi, hoba ngeikei laulabü;
hoba ngei laokhüman phaia kü la nyikushi.
Ngei ho müt khulimbo nyamnyamda sai?
Hobaje ngo aila natenbü akiko kila?
kü to chühashi, hoba maangpangashi;
hoba kaibü ikei kaibü sembung küplepbashi.
Ladang ong ngei kü to haüthükbü damenda ngo senyüsheida,
hoba ngeibü mang hatlabüei shenda.
Amaibü shuong aila lang kida,
salangko kida, hoba hau yaangbü yeida?
haoeneibü shisishousi haoen yoa haoen kaijembo loda,
hoba haoen thedanga haoeneibü shousi shuong hapda.
Hatlamoklabü ka haoen chemdang satenan kia,
ayingsi Mühghaüeibü ju kei haoen thükto atonenda.
haoeneibü masu pongsu shuongei athon athakko lilabü haatida.
Masu nyunyu shuongei shoushou shatda hoba nangan asattida.
haoeneibü shousi sanlon tan tegü hautida,
hoba haoeneibü shousi shuong tomdalakda.
haoenei kongkin, pithung metko chia lauda,
pthung ngühlang yoa lemlemyoda.
Haoenei haoeneibü langkei naangmaibüa thontida,
hoba mangde haishang to yanda.
Khei yingasikei haoenei Mühghaü to lauda,
Kün jungka satashi.
Aieilausi kaibü song ditletla shanga künei maangadakda.
Künei hao to lemlabü lele pendou to Thükkabou kho ao,
hoba künei hao to welausi künei ai ku hapla?
Chühashi, haoen naangmaibü kho haoeneibü ika aki;
amaibü shuongeibü dambü kho kü ka lounyu bangakei.
amaiboueibü wanthung latüngnei ong metnyetda?
Haoen jungto thushed latüngnei louda?
Mühghaüeibü khauang latüngnei janyoda?
Yei thedanga haoen youho tegü,
hoba youshou sho tegü yeinakei soulangda.
kanei lauda, Mühghaüei haoeneibü
shousi shuong shanga shieikoe thankuakei,
haoei kho ngelabü lele müt khola kho kuan chühashi.
Hao kongbü kho hao lolo haptiashi,
hoba pendou Thükenbou maangshat kho hao la yungtiashi.
Aishanga müt che hao haibü lit mauan phaia,
haoei haoeibü chemdanga olinbü ayingsi maangdak ai ngela?
Thükaenei kibü haoei matjemda dogo ngean,
aoei Mühghaü la songsido lenla?
Müt at langthüng langan hoba haksoa,
at jankomuko haida.
Haoeibü mang haabüei shenakei,
hoba haoeibü lomaang hai nemakei.
Müt atje soushou khaubüa haida,
hoba maibü kho ladangkei seanachüh.
Haoen pendou jeteitei kaoa yepda,
hoba haoen yangbemei shenda.
Chühashi, kaibü dambü,
hoba ngo khulimbo huon amaibü aiong takda ngei ngeakei.
Aieilausi kanei lauda,
“Chobaeibü chem kho lanei ki?
hoba amaibü shuong kishang neichem kho lanei ki?”
Thushed chaloua müt amaibü kho senetan phoda;
hoba maangpokbü chaloua haoen khümenda.
Kho tanbüphaibü to kanei aphesai?
hoba haoeneibü aukabü kanei haü dogo akisai?
Hao thedanga aoei hao shanga khokan lenla?
Kho ong aying, hao hee to lengjung hauda,
hoba haoenei haoeibü hee lomda.
Pholi kao kho hao la aeibou teikulabü;
hoba hao thedanga aweenko kibü mütshaang hao phai to semda.
Kholonga, kanei jongaibü kho kongkong ong dogo ngean,
amlanga laiküman kanei ngo maangsuda?
Kheijinei Teman bou Elifasei jongaikei:
Mühghaü shanga müt che kho ku kiasao;
ayingsi sangbüdobü kho ong hao shanga ku yinglao?
No saopobü laubü kho pendou,
Thükenbou shanga haü, dogo ki sai?
Ayingsi kaibü lamnyu janko kia dogo
laubü khoei hao shanga ku sai?
Nyi hao to hatsi haoei ka to hakda,
hoba kaibü ngüh matjemda sai?
Kaibü shabü yaangbü aying lo?
Kaibü shabü kho thon aki.
Aieilausi amlanga nyi kaibü jaisina ka phobnam leda,
hoba akialebü ka nyi haoeneibü neisimei soda.
Hübümangbü la nyi yunglabü dei akuda,
hoba mühei haiko kibü la shausiyung akuko hatlepnyu phoda.
Lausikei aoyou hau ki, haoenei kaokei kia,
hoba nyen hangbou hao khünei kida.
Latnyu shuong nyi haoen kong ngaitia,
hoba shoujit shuongeibü ik nyi ngoktikua.
Hibü no kaijembo sung sanakei,
hoba hakde loubü thushedei no khonkuda.
Kaibü ngesak kho nyi ühüplabü lele nakthüha,
hoba yungsenei no nyemda.
Mühghaü khuthük thükkaboua aki lo,
hoba khanshoulitshou shuong to chühashi,
khübü kho lai kuia ki!
Hobaje nyi lauda, “Mühghaüei ai ngekei?
Nakthüh shangbü danko nyi mat jemenlep lo?”
Haoei ühüplabü lele sangmei shangtüngbüei hao yuklepda;
hoba hao khuthük kommaanga paida.
Laobou lamnyua amaibou paikei,
kho hangbü lama no haulep lo?
Haoen kho haoeneibü jih mo asühko,
haoeneibü chemshang to liko yungsenei kotlangda.
Haoenei Mühghaü to laukei,
“Kün jungka satan apashi,
hoba pendou Thükenbouei kün shanga ai kümenkei?”
Khei yingsi dogokei haoei peisilei
maibüei haoeneibü chem shentikei.
Lausikei amaiboueibü dambü kho kü ka lounyu bangan kia.
Saopobü shuongei kho hapda hoba olinda;
hoba shedbü akakbü shuongei haoen attiko nyikuda.
Hobaje lauda, “Maimaitham haoeneibü nyaksinam shema,
hoba wanei haoenei kibü juokan apa.”
No Mühghaü to thangbou lamashi, hoba sangmaia kiashi;
kho tegübüei no kila keilabü.
Ngei ka to sudajada, haoeibü sembung ka
kümlabü ngühkhüm sungletashi,
hoba haoeibü ngüh kaibü maangpona phoashi.
No pendou Thükenbou jungto sepeinyu
longeia longa hoba ea aoa yeialonga,
kaibü neichema asaopobü kho nyi saabü to tekan apalonga.
Hobaje hon kho thamngua apyoalonga,
hoba shumanga laang yoa Ofir hon kho apyoalonga.
Kheijinei pendou Thükenbou kho kaibü hon yinglabü,
hoba haoei lenbü lamnyu kho namsek kilabü.
Aieilausi kheijineije nyi no lolo
pendou Thükenbou to olinlabü,
hoba Mühghaü aedanga kaibü thenyek sepeilabü.
Nyi hao jungto kaibü welau hautilabü,
hoba haoei ka to ditlabü.
hoba nyi kaibü theletbü lembü kulabü.
Tokei nyi denche janenlabü, hoba kho ka la loushedtikulabü;
hoba kaibü lamnyua ngesakbü haalabü.
Aieilausi Mühghaüei lilibü yantida,
lausikei ea aoabü haoei püetlabü.
Haoei shedbü akakbü püetda.
Haü, kaibü ik saopoan kialonga no khümenlabü.
Kheijinei Jobei jongaikei:
Tatkei ngo nyamnyambü kho khauekbü;
ngo wibü toje haoeibü ik ong atsheibou.
Oh, hao lanei hapla kho ngei ngea tegüje,
khei hao kishang sühko ngo hauenkhoulabü!
Ngei hao thedanga ngüh yeneiyenko kukhoulabü,
hoba kü sembung ngüh den denei shenlabü.
Haoei ai jongaila ngei ngea tegüje,
hoba haoei kü to ai lenla kho ngea tegüje!
Haoeibü sei yaangbüei kü to tokyoa saoma lo?
Aying, lausikei haoei ngeibü ngüh ditan chühlabü.
Khünei maangtangbü müt cheei hao to pheyophanyolabü,
hoba ponpen shanga ngeibü matjembou ka ngo püetlabü.
Chühashi, ngo thedang aeto hauda,
lausikei hao khünei aki;
hoba ngo phai sukda, lausikei ngei hao ashenda.
Ngo nanae,
mae hoba yungkük yungthang to hao lamla hauda
lausikei ühüpda.
Aieilausi haoei ngo haushang ngeakei;
ladang haoei ngo takteilaje ngo hon tegü longlabü.
Haoeibü youmoa ngo atoknokko paia,
ngo haoeibü lamnyua tükde phaisema,
hoba lubü lam to ayong.
Haoeibü sembung ka litibü ngühkhüm
shuong ngei ladangkei tekan üp.
Ngei shausiyung toje aei ngei haoeibü ngüh thanan phokei.
Lausikei haoeibü maangpon che ong,
hoba aoei hao jaksheikula thükkei?
Hobaje haoeibü soushouei ai kümmangsühda,
kho kümda.
Aieilausi kü shanga ai janthetan ki kho haoei lamlekuda;
hoba kho tegübü juong haoeibü maangpona kia.
Hibü hao thedanga ngo lai aleda;
ladang ngei damlaje ngo hao to hatda.
Aieilausi Mühghaüei ngeibü maangpon hantia;
hoba pendou Thükenbouei ngo khon kutida.
Aieilausi nakthühei ngo lai ale,
hoba nakthüh shangbüei ngeibü thenyek küplepbei.
Aila pendou Thükenbouei matjemla jih ajanenda?
Hobaje aoyouei hao ngekei haoenei aila
haoeibü chalou shuong ühüpda?
Müt amaibüei leilang laang lühan apda;
haoenei meisiau shuong shuonga nanglangda
hoba khübü kho lamshautida.
Shoujit shuongeibü gadu nangjung satda,
hoba latnyu shuongeibü masu pongsu namsangh shanga leda.
Haoenei shalebü shuong tangto nangan sattida,
kaodaka shalebü liko huda.
Chühashi, sangliphang kabü yamkabü gadu tegü,
shausiyung aeibou maangsangko lambo,
haoen haoeneibü kümtoleito hauda;
haoeneibü shousi shuong shanga yam khoei shausiyung kuda.
Haoenei sek ka lang sungda;
haoenei müt amaibüeibü sek ka buhek kheida.
Haoen langyang sünga mütkong yepda;
hoba khamalüha neilabü nei aki.
Shongh aeka louyenbü langei haoen nemda,
hoba satenshang akisije laangpopa huda.
Shoujit shuong senyung nguia keklangda,
hoa shalebüeibü nasak kho namsangh lu leda.
Atje neila akiko mütkong hauda; Mühei haiyetnyu haoenei youshang künda.
Kümthang kanglanga haoenei onang nitda;
haoen onang nitshanga kümda,
lausikei deilaei phaman kida.
Haibü shuongei wibü ngühlang sangnyu ka longda,
hoba moulebü shuong soushouei thuibü hiko ngekda,
lausikei Mühghaüei haoeneibü welau haü dogo aki.
Haoen kho ngesakbü khulimbo lobü shuong ki.
Aoyouei ngesakbü lamnyu ange, ayingsi khübü lamnyua apaida.
Shalebü si akialebü shuong haitila shanga
langnge asaotoua müt haitibou kho pida,
hoba nangnak hao kokkosembo weneida.
Asangalanbü shuongeikei ushenngeko kibü jih haiteida,
hoba lauda,
“Aoeikei ngeibü thenyek ashenlabü,”
hoba haoei neikhu yukda.
Nangnak haoei chem aakda;
ngeyang haoenei khinngailangda,
haoenei ngesakbü kho hapan achühda.
Aishanga haoen pendou shanga nangnak daomao kho
ngeyang tegü ki;
aieilausi haoen kho metu daomaophangeibü thangbou ki.
Haoen dei thüka panteiko hauda;
kaodaka haoeneibü phejana shedsikhau kuan apa;
khoei haoeneibü semlüh laak to akouda.
Chasekbü si lemabüei nindei haptida;
kho tegü Sheolei shabü shuong suida.
Nyusemei hao malabü
yangpemei hao teikeiteiko shaulabü;
hao touje ladangkei adamenlabü;
hoba asaopobü kho bulong che tegü ngokletda.
Haoei aongkongbü sao amaiko jungeida;
hoba latnyu to maibü akümda.
Khei yingsikei haoeibü sei danko
Mühghaüei hau kibü lang kitida;
Hao lang kilabü dogo haoei maialemsi dogokei hao pida.
Mühghaüei hao la maanglemenbü sakkuda
hoba haoei khünei da;
hoba hao haushang to haoei nyek hautida.
Tuisho shanga haoen tonenda hoba haoen satan apda;
haü, haoen yantida,
lubü pendou tegü haoen kheian phoda.
Hobaje hangi hoten tegü haoen wapan apda.
Hobaje tou kho tegü ayinglonga,
aoei ngo amlang dogo aukabü kula,
hoba ngeibü ngüh amlang yeitila?
Kheijinei Shubabü Bildadei jongaikei:
Songdak hoba sei hao yoa kia;
haoei haoeibü kishang müh thükkaboua sangmai kümda.
Haoei sepai san weenlep lo?
hoba haoeibü ngesak ao thüka alongda?
Kholonga laiküman Mühghaü thedanga müt saopoan kila?
Hobaje yaksaei bukbü müt lai hinseian kienla?
Chühashi, hao thedanga litnyu khokei sonalailai,
hoba khanshoulitshou shuong haoeibü nyekei shangaashat.
Yang tegü müt to lai hanbou weeila;
hoba müteibü shou yang ki?
Kheijinei Jobei jongaikei:
Sei akibü müt to nyi lai thuikei!
Hau akibü phem nyi lai khümenkei!
Songsido akibü to nyi lai chemphanga songlenkei,
hoba ngühmai songsido pendou lenkei!
Nyikei ao to joyokei
hoba ka ka aoeibü soushou longkei?
Haibü soushou shuong dei maanga,
hoba khünei kibü shuong lühda.
Mühghaü thedanga Sheol kho mütkong kia,
hoba Abaddon neilabü nei aki.
Haoei kongkongbüa chaangbou naphei kho ongayasetham sengda,
hoba kaodak kho aineikei aphenyoko saüan kia.
Sangmei shangtüngbüa haoeibü dei kho bauyoda,
hoba khübü phanga sangmei kho abangnyinda.
Haoei litnyu küplepda,
hoba kho thüka sangmei yukleptida.
Dei thüka haoei chamang komtida,
ngesakbü si nakthühbü kaanglanga.
Khuthükbü thaonyu shuong lühda,
hoba hao to hakbüa maangpangda.
Haoeibü seiei haoei yungnyu kho küpjemtida,
hoba haoeibü ditenbü haoei Rahab leilutida.
Haoeibü hakei müh he maitida;
haoeibü ikei satko kibü pinyu haitida
Chühashi, khübü kho hao nongeishang naphei ong;
hoba hao shanga lai hansho ong ditda!
Lausikei haoeibü seisihau langmak aoei ditenla thükkei?
Hobaje Jobei tokei haoeibü ngühphatbü athakko laukei:
Mühghaü lang kisije aoei ngeibü phejan soan sungkei,
hoba pendou Thükenbou, aoei ngeibü soushou khauektham aptikei.
Aieilausi ngo tokei hak hinshongko,
hoba Mühghaü soushou ngeibü langkeia ki hongko.
Maimaitham ngeibü sembungei amlang ngüh alaulabü;
ayingsi ngeibü lishangei yepeijawebü ngüh alaulabü.
Ngei no mat matilabü dogo kho ngühkei aying;
ngo ühaishongko ngei tükdebüa hatlepan alitilabü.
Ngeibü saopobü ngei maisho hatlepan kia hoba alitilabü;
ngo lang ki shongko ngeibü maangponei ngo khulimbo ai akilabü.
Ngeibü dangbou kho amaibou to jetei,
hoba ngo khulimbo longbü kho asaopobü to jetei kitishi.
Aieilausi ladang Mühghaüei wapan aplaje khei ladang
Mühghaüei haoeibü soushou langlaje,
Mühghaü to ühütbü shanga maanglem ai aki.
Hao jungto khonsak khonku loujinei haoei ngeksi
Mühghaüei hao la ditkulep lo?
Pendou Thükenbou to haoei olinlep lo?
hoba jih pendoua haoei Mühghaü to ngalep lo?
Mühghaüeibü ikküm iklei seisihau shanga ngei ka to lenkho;
pendou Thükenboueibü dambü ai ki kho ngei huan apholabü.
Chühashi, kanei kan lolo ho pendou hapa;
kholonga aila kan amlang yeikei?
Mühghaü ka amaiboueibü phejan ho,
hoba shieikoebü shuongeibü phet,
laobou haoenei pendou Thükenbou ka sungletda.
Haoeibü shousi shuong haalonga, kho in shanga,
hoba hao ka bakbü shuong kho shi ashenda.
Aoyou hao ka jouletkei haoen kho limeilangei shemlabü,
hoba haoeneibü latnyu shuongei mang ühaaplabü.
Haoei chandinam thamngu tegü shangtian phosikei,
hoba shungkung kao tegü hele lamlesikei.
Haoei kho lamlelakei kilabü,
lausikei saopobü shuongei kho yuklabü,
hoba shed akakbüei chandinam kho janan lelabü.
Haoei keklak tegü haoeibü chem dangda,
hoba lapheibü shuongei tipshou dangda.
Hao keiko yaangko yepda, lausikei kho khüai;
Haoei nyek longda hoba haoei nyaksinam akida.
Yungsenei tegü hatlamoklabüei hao laphetda;
youche danga yeinakei hao soulangda.
Chaangbou yeiei hao soulangda,
hoba hao haoeibü kishang ka kulangda.
Aishanga Mühghaüei hao to aonouko aupuei suda,
haoeibü ik ka hao satpang teida.
Hao la mütshuongei ik ipbuda,
hoba haoeibü kishang ka hakei metan aplabü.
Maimaitham chandinam thushang che kia,
hoba hon lemshang kaoen che kia.
Kao ka namkung sungenda,
hoba laang ka chinam tühenda.
Mütei nakthühbü haübou sühko lamda,
hoba yongko nakbü laang nongbüa sühko kuko lamda.
Thükaenei müt kishang ka bangjung
hauan haoei kao thuyetjung atda;
youei paibü shuongei maang aenei kibü shuong kho
kiasi aki angekei.
Müt ka lounyu bangjung yanan haoen lüha saüan soueida.
Kaonyudak ka shausiyung longda,
lausikei kaonyu maangaje wanei juoketla tegü.
Yanan laangshuong kho ka Safair namseklaang longda,
hoba khünei hon inyaibü kia.
Ho lamnyu au yaangbü aieikei angekei,
ayingsi aulu hamshangeibü nyekeikei ho ühüpbei.
Lilisese meisiaueikei thito paian achühkei;
ayingsi sekbülakbü molosaonyueikei thito danan achüh.
Haoei laang kaangbou kho thuyetjung tanda,
li ka haoei shongh kho khüpeitida.
Laangkoklok jakyetan haoei lam kümda,
hoba haoeibü nyekei namsek peisilei pendou hapda.
Dei nujung alotlabü lele haoei shumang shuong sakthetda;
hoba ai peisilei huan ki kho tangto longtida.
Lausikei songsido lanei hapla?
hoba ditenbü lanei ki?
Mütei khüto haulabü lamnyu angekei;
ayingsi khunakshousi kishang kho hapbei ühüpda.
Haübouei lauda, kho kü to aki;
hoba yungnyuei lauda,
kho kü yoa aki.
Shanenbü honei kho jekla athet,
ayingsi haoeibü mu shanga chandinam atakenen.
Ofireibü hon, oniks namseklaang,
ayingsi Safairei khoeibü mu ajektheten.
Hon si ainaei kho to namton jetei aying;
ayingsi lanbü hon peisilei to kho takteiyolabü aying.
Koral ayingsi Kristal kho weeilabükei aying;
Haü, namseklaang tokei songsido haplabü kho sekbou.
Ethiopiabü topazei kho to takteiyola athük,
ayingsi shanenbü hon tokei namtet alongen.
Kholonga songsido kho laka louda?
Hobaje ditenbü kishang kho lanei ki?
Aishanga langkeibü pendoueibü nyek ka kho huakei;
hoba mühkabü au shuong ka ho huletakei.
Abaddon hoba haibüei lauda,
küneibü nouei ho shanga
ngühphakphak ong ditkei.
Thito haulabü lamnyu Mühghaüei ong ngeakei,
hoba kho kishang kho haoei ngeakei.
Aieilausi kaodak thonbü pendou aeto haoei chühda;
hoba müh pendou phanga haoei chühda.
Ladang haoei yei seret hauan chühkei,
hoba yungnyu shuong kho süngsikhaang takan chühkei;
Ladang haoei lang shanga ngühkhüm kümbei;
hoba langmak langpon shanga lam kümbei.
Kheijinei haoei kho hapbei hoba thanan phokei,
haoei kho lamlekei, haü, haoei kho lamenkei.
Hobaje haoei müt kho to laukei,
“Chühashi,
hapbü ngebü songsido ki;
hoba amaibü ka bangalonga kho ditenbü ki.”
Toukei Jobei nyibou ngühsongwanyo athakko laukei:
Oh, ngo tanbü chasilit shuonga kikei tegüje,
khei Mühghüei ngo lombo kikei tegüje.
Ladang wanthung ngeibü khuaenei haukukei,
hoba haoeibü ngesakbüei nakthühshang danko ngo paikei.
Ngo sekok chaloua tegü laobou chaloua Mühghaüei
küneibü neichem kaplepan kikei.
Ladang pendou Thükenbou tokei kü yoa kikei,
hoba ngeibü shousi shuong ngo kaijembo kikei.
Ladang sendeiei ngeibü koukhün sakkei,
hoba laang khoei kü la onang shumang la yeiko koutikukei!
Ladang ngo sangnyua bakhün khüto haukei,
hoba ladang pühthea ngo setkei.
Kheijinei ngo hapan hukoshepbo kikei,
hoba baushi shuongei loenan souhat kuko kikei.
Songdakbü shuongei ngüh ajoyo,
hoba haoen sembung küpbei.
Yaangenbü shuongei ngüh üang,
hoba haoeneibü lishang atopei.
Aishanga kü shanga ditbü shuongei ngo haükukei;
hoba ngo hapbü shuongei kü la ngühchung kukei.
Aieilausi thuibü hibü shalebü,
Tokei shoujit, hoba thuibü akibü ngei khümenkei.
Maulabü lele ong kibü ka haülabü kho kü jungto loukei,
hoba latnyueibü maangpona ngei olinbü chia lautikei.
Ngei ngo lolo saopobü neisimei lekei,
hoba khoei ngo homlepbei.
Ngeibü ngühmai matjem kho ngeibü mangyuk hoba khun kikei.
Nyekthubüeibü nyek kho ngo kikei,
hoba sokeboueibü you kho ngo kikei.
Akialebü to ngo bou tegü kikei,
ngei yenma aoma lamenkei.
Asaopobü shuongeibü hauh kho ngei kühan apbukei,
hoba haoei mü ka soan anan kibü kho ngei soan apbukei.
Kheijinei ngei laukei,
“Ngo ngeibü hapmaanga hailabü,
hoba chalou shuong kho phetsen tegü kilabü.”
Ngeibü li deia yanda,
hoba langyang pendou ngeibü pheka nin monglabü.
Ngeibü soneikangbü kü yoa hansang kia,
hoba ngeibü ika lao kho asinlabü.
Mütshuongei kü to nou haangkei hoba haiteikei,
hoba ngeibü chemphang songlen ditla alemen.
Ngei laukhüman phaia haoenei ngüh üang,
hoba ngeibü ngühhaoeneibü nouanepbo atkei.
Lang loubü haiyeibü tegü haoenei ngo haiyeikei,
hoba youshap langlou haiyeibü tegü haoenei haa yaang koukei.
Haoenei ngeibü ngüh maialemjinei ngei haoen
la nyikuko lekei,
hoba ngeibü thenyek ngesakbü
haoenei anakthühti.
Ngei haoeneibü lamnyu shean lenkei,
hoba konglebou tegü setkei,
hoba sepai san thüka Choba tegü ngo kikei,
khei manghaapbü shuong maangsubü che phatko.
Lausikei touje kü to nashou shuongei ngo awealauda,
aoyoueibü bousi shuong ngeibü
shatsinam tan shuong lombü,
kei shuong hima ngei jungeikei.
Haü, haoeneibü ika hau kibü kho kü shanga jim aki,
haoen hau ka ngaia.
Ai akibü hoba mühbü ka haoen kopda;
haoenei kaolin shauda,
laobou sangliphang küpsheta nangnak yepda.
Haoenei yam ka pikyik shakda;
hoba haoenei aikei mei akibü haoeneibü li to liko shaukei.
Shuong yoka haoen shian sattida;
kokbü shibü tegü haoen kho ngühüangko shikei.
Shukok yungkok, püngkhüna,
hoba laangpoba haoen kida.
Hamlong phanga haoen gadu tegü wida;
hoba ushiphanga liko kamshaida.
Haoen ngoubüeibü shousi
haü, khongshou shuong,
haoen kaonyek ka shian apa.
Lausikei touje ngo haoeneibü ngühtet la yeia,
ngo ai aying lausikei haoen ekyola ong yeia.
Haoenei kü to mangsenda, haoen kü ka kukjung satda,
onou akiko kü thea eok thokkuda.
Aieilausi haoei ngeibü laopük sengkua hoba ngo himou bautia,
hoba haoenei ngeibü thenyek ka ngeibü nisan apbua.
Ngo khulimbo ngeibü maeaenei haoeneibü amaibü dan meimeida,
hoba haoeneibü leilubü kümsileiei kükhu limbo yoshaida.
Haoenei ngeibü lamnyu leilutikuda,
Ngo tegü thuilabü akibü che haoenei thushedei sühtikuda.
Su khu thangyetjung koubü dei tegü haoen loukouda,
Leilubü kho danko haoenei ngo danglepda.
Hatlamoklabü shuong kü jungto louda;
haoenei ngeibü nyen maibü yeiei tegü soulangda;
hoba sangmei tegü ngeibü nyaksinam laangjung satda.
Lausikei tou ngeibü soushou deila yeia,
khonsak khonku chalouei kü to sühda.
Nangnak ngeibü lo ka phe jitjung satda,
hoba ngo shat longbü kho thaklo athakda.
Shatsinyat shalümei ngeibü neisimei totjinda;
khoei ngeibü mangyukei khühbü tegü khühda.
Mühghaüei ngo thim to jangan jinda,
hoba ngo thamngu tap tegü yeia.
Ngei ka to ngekda hoba nyi ajongaida;
ngo loda hoba nyi kü to achühda.
Nyi kü to asanouko apa,
kaibü ik atsheibüei ngo shieikoeda.
Nyi ngo tonenkuda hoba yeia settida,
hoba nyi ngo yeinaka mautida.
Aieilausi nyi ngo haitilabü;
hoba langkeibü pendou shanga takletkubü yoshaishang
to leilabü dogo ngei maisho ngeakei.
Khei yingsikei tuongko kibouei ik ashinglep lo?
ayingsi thushed chaloua müt cheei thuibü ahilep lo?
Khonsaka kibü shanga ngo ühaap lo?
shalebü shanga ngeibü soushou maangto ashat lo?
Lausikei ngei maibü damsi amaibü loukei;
hoba ngei ngesakbü haiyeisi nakthühbü loukei.
Ngeibü sensimaang netla yeida hoba lai akida;
Ngo manghaapbo neinak neian tangto angda;
ngo thangyen püh thea loan thuibü hida.
Ngo selong to jenabou,
hoba Ostrich ngeibü thangbou.
Ngeibü khon nakda hoba kho khokletda,
hoba shat longbüei ngeibü lo aujiauda.
Hibü ngeibü kongkinei manghaap chia lauda,
hoba ngeibü pithung kho haapyobü ngühlang tegü metda.
Ngei ngeibü nyekei yaksa to ladangkei
achühla theyolanyokei.
Aieilausi thükaeka Mühghaüei
janletkubü ngeibü phejan kho ai?
Asaopobü shuong la thushed ühaüthük si,
hoba shedbü kümbü shuong la leilubü kuda aying lo?
Haoei ngo haushang ühüpda lo?
hoba ngeibü youmo pendou phanenan aki lo?
Ngo amlangbüa paian kialonga,
Ngeibü youei panteiko khüpettila hauan kialonga.
Seret tükdebüa ngo yaüan chühashi,
hoba Mühghaüei ngo tüktea loan kiasi aki chühashi.
Ngeibü youyaü yoongan kialonga,
hoba ngeibü thea maibü aeto ngeibü maangpon
paian kialonga hoba ngeibü ika denche nali ongkei kialonga.
Kholonga ngei youli jinkho hoba lubü la shautishi,
hoba küneibü sek ka longbü pheian apshi.
Yaksa che la ngeibü maang sulettian kialonga,
hoba ngeibü lepboueibü koukhüna ngo thoan kialonga.
Kholonga kü yak müeibü aaola yeitiashi,
hoba lubü che to khüpettiashi.
Aieilausi kho matyaang,
hoba songdakbü shuongei shieikoelabü shabü kümsilei ki.
Aieilausi kho Abaddon sühko wanei juoklabü ki,
hoba ngeibü langle pendou juokan aplabü ki.
Ngeibü sambü ayingsi sambüsaoei matlaujinei
ngei haoeneibü ngüh aditkuko apyokua longa.
Mühghaü matjemla meimeijinei ngei ai kümla?
hoba hao phela loujinei ngei ai jongaila?
Aoei künyueibü shia ngo kümbei haoei haokei aküm lo?
hoba müt cheei ong künyueibü shia aküm lo?
Shalebüei mangsühbü ngei denche ongkei senetan kialonga,
ayingsi latnyuei dambo haiteibü akuko kialonga.
Ayingsi kü phejan ngei ong shauan kialonga,
hoba shoujit shuongei kho ashauouko kialonga.
Nashoudang ka thama nyueibouei tegü haoei ngo samenkei,
hoba künyueibü shimung ka haoei ngo leiyenkei.
Neisimei akibü haangjung müt at haida dogo,
hoba shalebü neisimei aki dogo ngei hapan.
Haoeibü shenjangei kü la haülabü akuko kialonga,
hoba ngeibü sanlon wiei alematiko kialonga.
Tip koukhüna kü to thuibü kia dogo ngean
ngei shoujit khulimbo ik tuokan kialonga.
Khei yingan kialonga phakshok ka ngeibü phak khelettiashi,
hoba ngeibü phemlo shukthettiashi.
Aieilausi Mühghaü ka loubü thushed
kho kho kü shanga hatlamoklabü kikei,
hoba haoeibü soumoei ngei ai akümen.
Ngei hon kho ngeibü maanglem yeitian kialonga,
hoba hon lanbü to,
“Ngei ka to maanglemda,”
dogo ongkei lauan kialonga.
Ngeibü nyaksinam yaangsi hoba kü ikei juong sungbasi
ngo olinan kialonga.
Ngei chanyu haujinei, ayingsi litcha ngesaktham
haujinei kho hapan lemalonga.
Ngeibü maangphanga sujung satan kialonga,
hoba ngeibü sembungei ngeibü ik to shepalonga.
Khokei matjembü shuongei namshaulabü lele shedbü kümsilei che ki.
aieilausi kho tegü yingalonga
thükkaboua kibou Mühghaü atheletda.
Ngei mangsenbü thushed hapjinei ngo olinan kialonga;
hoba shabüei hao sühjinei ngo tomjung angko olina longa.
Haü, haoei langkei to khüka uokashi dogo ngeibü
sembungei lauko ngei shed shonalonga.
Haoeibü pheei aoei maangamaiko ashau dogo
ngeibü neichema kibü shuongei alaulonga.
Chale yen khongnyua aot;
lausikei yensiau shanga ngei ngeibü chem ipbei.
Adamei tegü, ngei khukua ngeibü shabü huan,
ngei ngühkhüm leilubü küplepan kialonga.
Aieilausi ngei shuong yaangbü kho to hatkei,
hoba chungsiphangei mangsenbü shuongei ngo moktikei
hibü ngüh üang hoba khongto üang.
Oh, atei ongkei kü to ditkua tegüje,
chühashi, hanei ngeibü shensinge kia;
pendou Thükenbouei kü to jongaiashi,
hoba ngeibü dangbouei no khulimbo dobü le kho kia tegüje!
Maimaitham kho ngei ngeibü phaka pelabü;
khun che tegü ngei kho kaijembo phenetlabü.
Ngeibü youyaü webü ngei lenlabü,
Choba che tegü ngei kho kukhoulabü.
küneibü kaoei ngo khulimbo ngekalonga,
hoba sek laüan kibü kaoei liko haapalonga.
Khünei longbü ngei mu akuko shaualonga,
hoba kao bunyu shuong haitialonga.
Youshou jeila sang longtiashi,
hoba barli youshou jeiko lümhibü sang longtiashi,
Jobeibü ngüh thonbü.
Hibü khübü müt semei Job to ajongaiko nangkei, aieilausi haoei jembü lolo saopobü dogo dambei.
Hobaje Rameibü thensilen Buzabü Barakeleibü shou Elihu khauangkei. Job khulimbo maangpokkei, aieilausi Mühghaü toje hao ong tükde dogo haoei dambei.
Tokei haoeibü thangbou müt sem khulimbokei hao khauangkei, aieilausi haoenei jongaibü tükdebü kho ühüpen, hoba Jobeibü shedbü kho ho hai dogo alenen.
Tou Elihuei Job to joyola haiteiko kikei, aieilausi haoen toje jaishou.
Hobaje müt semeibü sembunga jongailabü aki dogo chühenkei hao khauang longkei.
Hobaje Buza bou Barakeleibü shou Elihuei jongaikei.
“Ngo nashou kan aeibou jaishou,
hibü khoei ngo hatko kikei,
hoba kan to ngeibü dambü laiche ongkei alen.”
Ngei laukei,
“Jaishou shuongei lauashi,
hoba salang loubü shuongei hapbü ngebü songsido lenashi.”
Lausikei songboudobouei laukei,
“Müt che to soushou che kia,
hoba hao to pendou Thükenbou hak kia,
khoei haoen la songsido kuda.
Jaishoua nyenakei dogo ong songsido kida aying,
ayingsi salang loubü shuongei ditenda dogo aying.”
Hibü ngei lauda,
“Kü to ditshi,
ngeikei ngeibü dambü lenkho.”
Chühashi, ngei kaneibü ngüh haiiyeiko kikei,
ngei kan hapbüngebü ngüh ditko,
kanei ai laulaje dogo lambo kikei.
Ngei kan to nou haangan kiteikei, hoba chühashi,
kan aoeikei Jobeibü shedbü ho dogo alenen.
ayingsi haoei laubü kan yoa aoeikei ajongaian.
Künei songsido hapa dogo telau,
Mühghaüei hao yantilabü dogo kanei lauakei maangsangashi.
Ho tegübü ngüh haoei kü la alen,
hoba kaneibü ngühei ngei hao to ajongai.
Haoen oanshema,
haoenei touje ajongaida,
Haoenei laulabü ai aki.
Hobaje haoenei ajoyolonga, haoen ngüh üangko kialonga,
hoba touje ajongailonga ngoje kheiong haiteiko kilep sai?
Ngeikei ngeibü phejanje jongailabü,
hoba ngeikei ngeibü dambü lenlabü.
Aieilausi ngo ngühei shenetnyu kia,
Laumangsühbüei ngo laiong aleko kia.
Chühashi, ngeibü shimung ho khün ayetbü jephot phatkei;
ih haanbü jephot tegü thalabü lele ong kia.
Ngei hak hinlabü lele ngei laujan;
Ngeibü sembung khop iptiashi hoba jongaitiashi.
Ngei ho sudajada,
ngei aoeibü thekei techühkho,
ayingsi ngei aolakei nyensang tekukho.
Aieilausi ngei nyensang akuen,
khei ayinglonga ngo kümbouei
ngo tongde langlabü.
Hobaje tou, Job, aiyinglaje yingsikei
nyi sanoudambo ngei laubü ditshi,
hoba ngeibü ngüh khümbo ditshi.
Tou chühashi,
ngei kü sembung ipa;
ngeibü lishangei laua.
Ngeibü maangpon tangbü shanga ngei laulabü,
hoba ai ngühmai kho laulabü.
Mühghaü soushouei ngo küma,
hoba pendou Thükenbou soushouei kü la langkei kuda.
Nyi thükalonga kü to jongaishi,
kaibü ngüh linkeilinko lamleashi hoba kaishima.
Chühashi, Mühghaü thedanga no tegü ngokei kia,
ngokei shungkung thamei kümbei.
Chühashi, no kü to yonganje tehüt,
ayingsi ka to ngeibü ik yonganje ashatlabü.
Maimaitham nyi ngeibü nouei ditko laua,
hoba nyi khei lauko ngei tida.
“Ngo hinseiakei, ngühkhüm aleilu,
kü to shedbü aki,
kü to shabü aki.
Chühashi, haoei kükhu limbo shabü shona,
haoei ngo dangbou dogo weeida.
Haoei ngeibü youa lühmong jinkuda.”
Chühashi, ngei ka to lauda, no shedakei,
aieilausi Mühghaü kho müt toje yaangbou.
Ailaibü nyi hao to tokyoko hai lauda,
haoei ngeibü ngüh che ongkei ajongaida?
Aieilausi Mühghaüei che ninei joyoda,
lausikei mütei kho aditenda.
Manga mangnak mangsanga nyeket louko yepjinei
müt shena lengjinei.
Kheijinei haoenei müteibü nou ipbuda,
hoba maangsangtila hatlenda.
Khei khunakshousi shedbü kümsilei ka kukenla shanga,
hoba müt ka lilisese sungan apla shanga.
Haoeibü soushou püngkhün ka sungenla shanga,
hoba haoeibü langkei insiaubu khümenla shanga.
Haoeibü yepshanga shat longbü danko hao thepetla
hoba haoeibü lo to takbü athakda.
Hibü haoei shauayunga ameitida,
hoba sembunga
shaukeiyungkei ateikuda.
Haoeibü phe lemailela linda,
hoba haoeibü lo tangto loushedda.
Haoeibü soushou heekhün nyangko,
hoba haitibou jungto hauda.
To ai tükde ki kho müt la lenla shanga,
hao yoa khuthük hangangbü che,
youkobou che,
hajar yoa che kialonga.
Hobaje haoei hao to onouko lauda,
“Püngkhün to ayantiko hao litiashi,
ngei hao shanga angthetbou che hapa.”
Haoeibü phe toukei nashou la yeingaida,
hoba hao nashouabü jihsiphai to ngaida.
Haoei Mühghaü to welauda hoba haoei hao to sangu lenda;
haoei Mühghaü thenyek olinbüei hapda;
hoba haoei mütla saopobü ngaitikuda.
Haoei müt thedanga chia lauda, hoba lauda,
“Ngei shed shona, hoba tangan kibü komtida,
lausikei haoei ngeibü shedbü thüng ashiakoe.
Haoei ngeibü soushou yemkhün to atlabü ka khümenkei,
hoba ngeibü soushouei ngesakbü kho haplabü.”
Chühashi, khübü pendou Mühghaüei kümda.
Khei haoeibü soushou püngkhün ka leingaila shanga
hoba langkei ngesakbü hapla shanga.
O Job, maangkuashi,
ngeibü ngüha leashi,
ngei lenlepbü, ngüh tüang.
Nyi lenlabü at ongkei kialonga, kü la lenbü.
Aieilausi ngei no tangtimang sühda.
Khei ayinglonga nyi ngeibü ngüha leashi,
no semetham kiashi,
hoba ngei ka la songsido ngüh lenlabü.
Tokei Elihuei Athakko laukei:
Kan songbüdobü shuong ngeibü ngüha leashi;
hoba kan songsido kibü shuong ngeibü ngüh ditashi.
Aieilausi lishangei shik jep anchühbü tegü,
nouei ngüh ditanchühda.
Sen shanga ai tükde ki kho senei pienkho;
ai maibü kho sen yoa ngean phokho.
Aieilausi Jobei laua,
“Ngo saopobü,
hoba Mühghaüei ngeibü phejan soa.
Ngo tükde ong kisikei ngo khonkuda;
ngei ngühkhüm aleiluko kiasikei,
ngeibü mou ashengda!”
Dei tegü nyikubü yungbou Job tegübü ao ki?
Shedbü kümbü to
thangbou lambü,
hoba tokbüsungbü müt yoa paibü hao tegübü ao ki?
Aieilausi haoei lauda, Mühghaü to paplepbo kilabü
kho müt shanga ai ku ki.
Hibü kan ditenbü shuong ngeibü ngüh ditashi,
Mühghaüei amaibü kümbei dogo se?
hoba pendou Thükenbouei shedbü
kümlabü dogo kho ladangkei aying.
Aieilausi müteibü kümsilei thüng hao la pailetbü kuda,
hoba haoenei muthüng hapngaida.
Haü, maimaitham Mühghaüei amaibü akümda,
hoba pendou Thükenbouei yepeiko mat ajemda.
Aoei haoeibü ik to kaodak kho kukei?
ayingsi kaodak pendou on aoei hao la küntikei?
Haoei haoeibü soushou jembü jungto longeitimang sühalonga,
hoba haoeibü hak jembü jungto leingaimang sühalonga.
Phe pendou liko maulabü,
hoba müt thamngula ong yeilabü.
Hobaje nyi ditenbü kialongaje ho ditashi;
ngeibü ngüh ditashi.
Aoei ngühmai mangsenda haoei songdakla thüklepsai?
Hobaje ngühmaanglanbü hoba
hauki yaangkibü nyi yuktilep lo?
Aoei Choba to,
“No haangalongbü” dogo,
hoba yaangenbü to,
“Kan amai” dogo lauda?
Aoei Chobaeibü shou to theachühda,
ayingsi shalebü to aei keibü aweeida,
aieilausi haoen pendou haoei kümbü shuong ki.
Mangde, khei haoen metuphanga haida,
keibü shuong to ik atda hoba haoen mauda,
hoba hauki yaangkibü shuong müteibü ik ayoko sunglangka.
Aieilausi müt haushang lam pendou to haoei chühda,
hoba haoeibü younak pendou haoei hapda.
Shedbü kümbü shuong hushang
nakthühbü ayingsi metuphang aki.
Aieilausi müt che Mühghaü jungto matjemla haula
haoei chalou apakkuda.
Ngüh aphaneiko haoei hauki yaangkibü
shuong netla yeitida,
hoba haoen jeila lubü phoda.
Kho tegü haoei haoeneibü kümsilei ngean,
hoba nangnak haoen khoknyinkuda hoba
ngünnyinda.
Müt pendouei chühko kian,
haoei müt amaibü shuong shieikoeda hoba ngümda.
Aieilausi haoenei hao phai asem,
hoba haoeibü ngühkhüm che ongkei haü dogo aki.
Khei shalebü shuongei ngekbü hao jungto hautilabü,
hoba akialebü shuong lemenbü haoei ditlabü lele.
Haoei küpjembo phoalonga, aoei hao yuktila?
haoei haoeibü thenyek küplepalonga, aoei hao hapla?
Phang che to yingasikei,
müt che to yingasikei jetei ong.
Khei Mühghaü to ühütbüei song ataklabü;
khei mütli shanga sung akila shanga.
Müt cheei Mühghaü to, “Ngei tükde shed shona,
hibü touje nyibou shabü ashonlabü,”
dogo thekuko lauasao?
Ngei ühüpbü shedbü lenbü;
ngei shed shonan kialonga touje kho ngei ashonlabü,
dogo mütei lauena sao?
Nyi dambü tegü haoei pailetbü kulep lo?
Khoei nyi kho asungletda;
aieilausi ngei aying, nyi pienjan,
hibü nyi ai ngekei kho lenashi.
Ditenbü müt, khei ngeibü ngüha lebü
songbüdobü pendouei kü to laulabü.
Jobei ai angeko lauda,
hoba haoeibü ngüh songbüdobü ngüh tegü aying.
Jobei thon sühko laua tegüje maikhoulabü;
aieilausi haoei amaibü mütei tegütham jongaida.
Aishanga haoeibü shedbü tokei liman haoei khulimbo meimeida;
kün yoa haoei ik ipbo nyikuda,
hoba Mühghaü khulimbo ngühshed angda.
Kheijinei Elihuei athako laukei:
Nyi ho tükde dogo damda sai?
Nyi no kho Mühghaü tokei saopobou dogo damda sai?
Kü shanga kho ai ku?
Shed shonsi ashonsikei ngo ai ku dogo lauda?
ka to hoba kaibü thangbou shuong to ngei jongaikho.
Müh to chühangtiashi,
hoba chühshi,
hoba sangmei kho to tangko chühshi, kho ka to suokbou.
Nyi shed shonsi hao phangche yeida sai?
Hobaje nyi ngühkhüm juong leilusi hao shanga kho ai?
No saopobü yingalonga nyi hao la ai kuda?
Ayingsi kaibü ik ka haoei ai hapda?
Kaibü khüpei langeibüei no tegübü ong khonkulabü,
hoba kaibü saopobü kho müteibü shou che shanga ong ku.
Shieikoe yongkotham yingsije mütshuongei ngekda;
haoenei hau kibü ka thuibü hida.
Lausikei aoeikei hai alau,
ngo kümbou Mühghaü lanei ki?
Aoei nangnak chia kuda?
Aoei kaodak meisiau toje sen to aei lenda,
hoba müh kabü au toje aei sangbüdobü yeitida.
Haoenei ngekda, lausikei amaibü
hoba yonglamlili yingbü ka haoei ajongaida.
Maimaitham Mühghaüei amlangbü ngekbü aditda,
ayingsi pendou Thükenbouei kho aweeida.
Kholonga nyi hao ühüpda dogo,
ngühsidei kho hao thedanga kia dogo,
hoba nyi hao haiteida dogo lauda longa lai hanbou weeida.
Hobaje tou hao khauangko pean achühsi,
ayingsi shedbü yongan alamsi.
Jobei amlanga haoeibü sembung ipda;
ai angeko haoei ngüh pühtida.
Tokei Elihuei athakko laukei:
Longche haiteishi, hoba ngei ka la lenkho;
aishanga Mühghaü nyena ngei tokei lenlabü at kia.
Saabü ka ngei ngeibü songsido sungbalabü,
hoba ngei ngo kümbou la saopobü kulabü.
Aieilausi maimaitham ngeibü ngüh amlang aying;
songadoa benbüsoubü kho ka yoa kia.
Chühashi, Mühghaü hau kibü hoba aokei aweasüngko akida;
Hao ditenbüa hau aeibou yaangkei.
Haoei amaibou langkei pyoda; lausikei
khonsakbü la haoeibü janbü kuda.
Saopobou ka haoei haoeibü nyek alitida,
lausikei Choba setshanga Choba shuong yoa
haoei haoen ponpendou kitida,
hoba haoen tonenda.
Hobaje haoei haoen thüngdanga phoalonga,
hoba haoen khonsak lüha lapalonga.
Kheijinei haoei haoeneibü kümsilei lenda,
hoba lilikhuia küma dogo haoenei
ngühkhüm lulimbü lenda.
Tokei lenbü ditenlabü lele haoei
haoeneibü noukhün ipbuda,
hoba haoen shabü ka maangpon sepeiashi dogo ngühkhüm kuda.
Haoenei hao to ngüha lealonga hoba khangenalonga
haoeneibü chalou püngbü juongbü hoba
haoeneibü po olinbüa danlabü.
Lausikei haoenei ngüha ale longa, haoen inei maulabü,
hoba songsido ühüpbo haoen maulabü.
Lausikei aoyouei Mühghaü to ühütda
haoeneibü maangpona khauangmaangpok thanda;
haoei haoen to khühsi dogokei haoenei thuila angada.
Haoen heshoudanga haida, hoba haoeneibü
langkei himoua thonda.
Haoei khonku khonsakbü shuong haoeneibü
khonsak danko khümenda,
hoba khonku danko haoeneibü noukhün ipbuda.
Haübü thushed ka haoei no senetan,
toket thangetbü akishang hopabü kaoen to leian haukhoulabü,
hoba no shaubü yungbü khümsoka ai phokuda
kho litkei aako yingkhoulabü.
Lausikei no amaibü matjembüei shenan kia;
Matjembü hoba ngühmaiei no sühakei.
Aieilausi khauang longbü ka no suletan nyikubü
chela yeibüla maangsangashi;
hoba suletbü yaangbüei no ayingbü to tohauti.
Khon asakko hoto kaibü nyaksinam jetei yinglep lo?
Ayingsi kaibü hau khümboei angeklonga hoto jetei yinglep lo?
Nangnak kho tewang, ai jihsiphaia phangshuong
haoen kishang ka wapan apda.
Maangsangashi, shabü aeto tohau;
aieilausi nyi khonsak toje shabü bouje piena.
Chühashi, Mühghaü kho haoeibü haua tonenakei,
hao tegübü lenbou ao ki?
Aoei hao la haoei kümlabü janletkukei?
Hobaje aoei, “Nyi shedbü küma” dogo lauenkei?
Haoeibü kümsilei hangenla tema,
Laobou shanga mütei chia lauda.
Müt pendouei khüto chüha,
mütei kho saabü ka hapda.
Mühghaü kho yaangbü hoba senei hao angekei;
Haoeibü po lajuche bakla athük.
Aieilausi haoei yungnyu ka deimen shependa;
haoei khübü kho dangshettian langmen la yeitida.
Laobou müh ka yantida,
hoba müt thükto apsileko attida.
Haü, sangmei tubü, hoba haoeibü
neichem ka langmak maakbü,
aoei ditenla thükkei?
Chühashi, hao kaijembo haoei langpon yantida,
hoba yungnyu haübüa khoei yuklepda.
Aieilausi khübü danko haoei phang shuong samda,
haoei shausiyung apsileko kuda.
Ik jijihamei haoei langpon jungda,
hoba chühletnyu phoshang to loutila haoei ngühkhüm kuda.
Langmak khoei hao maangpokbü lenda,
hoba yeinakei haoeibü khauangbü lenda.
Haoeikei ngeibü maangpon lühda,
hoba ho kaoen ka tomjung satda.
Haoei ngüh longbü hoba haoeibü sembung ka
longbü ngühlang kanei ditshi.
Mühnyuphang pendou aeto haoei kho hautida,
hoba kaodak thon sühko haoei langpon hautida.
Kho phaia haoei ngühda hoba langh yaangbüei
haoei langmak makda;
hoba haoei langpon shuong kho asenetda.
Haoeibü sembung ka haoeibü ngühlang ditda.
Mühghaüei haoeibü ngühei
maangpanglabü che langmak maktida;
senei ditenla athükbü kümsilei yaang haoei kümda.
Aieilausi haoei ninthu to, kaodaka atashi,
tokei yeitoklangtok to atashi dogo lauda.
Mütshuongei haoeibü kümsilei ngelabü lele,
haoei mütpem wekoeibü ik hatlepbuda.
Kheijinei meisiau juong yepshang to ngaida,
hoba haoeneibü thüngshanga shaida.
Yungthang ka yeinak louda, hoba yungkük
ka shakbü libü souda.
Mühghaüeibü hakei ninthu yeitida,
hoba yungnyu yosiyaang kho ontolou aptida.
Haü, haoei sangmei shangtüngbü kho nemtida,
hoba sangmeiei haoeibü langpon pontida.
Hobaje müt kibü kaoa haoei ai ong
sakkulaje haoei kümla shanga,
kho hitoche, hoba thito che, dogo haoei lolo leiyeiko kaitida.
Mühghaüei kaodak to lang kho mütshuong shieikoela
ayingsi haoen to maangshikbü lenla yantida.
O Job, ho ditashi; atopeiko loashi,
hoba Mühghaüeibü maangpanglabü kümsilei damanchühashi.
Mühghaüei ailai küman haoeibü kümsilei janda,
hoba sangmei ngesak lai hauda nyi ngekeilao?
Müha sangmei lai tetyoyo iman ki,
hoba Mühghaüei
maangpanglabü kümbei ngekeilao?
Yungthang yeiei kaodak sangsembo hatlepnyu kijinei
kaneibü neisimei lai lematham ki?
Thükaenei müh mangchüh tegü lenglengtham kibü
kho pintila no hao yoa yoasao?
Senei hao to ai laula kho kü la lenshi;
aieilausi sen to abenasou kisije senei
seneibü ngüh ngühthenyenko akuen.
Ngei laulabü dogo hao to laulepsai?
Ayingsi ngo suian apashi dogo müt cheei lauasao?
Hobaje tou mütshuongei müh shuong
ngesakbü kho shangashatko ühüp,
lausikei yeiei sousi khübü kho souan sattida.
Yungkük aeka shaüshaüponpon ngesakbü louda;
Mühghaü to hatlamoklabü son kia.
Pendou Thükenbou senei hao alamen,
dei hoba matjembüa hao hau yaangbü;
hoba saopobüei shenan kisije haoei shedbü mat ajemda.
Hibü khoei mütshuongei hao to hatda;
aoeibü maangpona songbüdobü dogo damda haoei weko aki.
Kheijinei yeinak ka
Ai angebü ngühei Mühghaüeibü
dambü küplepkubü kho ao?
Sekokbü müt che tegü nyi tou shembe kaiashi,
hoba ngei ka to phelabü hoba nyi kü la lenbü.
Ngei kaodak yaüjinei no lanei kikei?
nyi ngean kialonga lenshima?
Nyi ngekeilonga aoei ho takletbü lamlekei?
Ayingsi aoei ho thüka lüh jenkei?
Hoeibü thaonyu shuong kho lanei kekei?
Ayingsi ho chemnyek laang aoei kekei?
Ladang ngeyang khanshoulitshou shuongei liko chia laukei,
hoba Mühghaüeibü shousi shuongei olinbüa ngekkei?
Ayingsi yungnyu kümjinei, ladang kao
kho paknyinkei kheijinei no lanei kikei?
Ladang ho shanga ngei sangmei nei kümbukei,
hoba sholepbü nasaknei sangmeishangtüngbü kümbei.
Hobaje kho shanga leilang jakei,
hoba koukap si thangtet kümbei.
Hobaje laukei,
“Han sühko no louenkei,
lausikei ho sühko ong hoba no lili yonglambü hanei
nanglabü dogo laujinei no lanei kikei?”
Buknyet ka tat sühko nyi chalou ka ngeyang yeila
ngühkhüm kuan chühakei sai?
Ayingsi laobou jiha oshenngela kho nyi hao la lenalo?
Khei khoei kaodak pendou seilepla shanga,
hoba kho ka amaibou kho wenan aplabü lele.
Bungümei ipsi shungkung kao mo lean jaksheibü tegü,
hoba paa nei hambü tegü yeida.
Hobaje amaibou ka ngesakbü kho senetan phoda,
hoba liliseseboueibü phem kho leiluda.
Yungnyu pakshang to no louakaoba lo?
Ayingsi kokloka paiakao lo?
Haibü bakou shuong ka la lenakaoba lo?
Ayingsi haibü yemkao koukhün lombouei no hapakaoba lo?
Nyi kaodak takletbü ngean phoakaoba lo?
Nyi kho pendou ngealonga lenshima.
Nyi ngesakbü loushang ngekeilao?
Ayingsi nakthühbü pakshang lanei ki?
Haoen lalokche hauan ki nyi lenla thükasao?
nyi haoen kishang lam ngekeilao?
Kheijinei no bukakeibü nyi ngean kilabü,
aieilausi no aeibou baushi!
No ninthu thanshang to atan chühakaoba lo?
Ayingsi senlaang bung hapakaoba lo?
Laobou no khonsak chalou hoba wapyo,
hoba lason chalou shanga lamlean phokei.
Yei janyinshang hoba kaodaka chaangbou yei
phinshang lamnyu kho lae ae?
Lang loula shanga lam aoei shemyetkei
ayingsi langmak langpon shanga lam aoei jimyetkei?
Müt akishang, hoba sangliphang to lang loutila shanga.
Kaolong kao nembo nyaütila shanga
hoba kaolina sangnyem yemtila shanga.
Langeibü bou kilao?
Khülonga nangnak nindei aoei attida?
Aoeibü shimung ka ninthu laang longkei?
Hobaje müh ka deihakei aoei senlaang paktida?
Dei kho laang la yeida, hoba yungnyu haübou kho shenda.
Pleiades khanshoulitshou kho nyi khühla,
ayingsi Orion lüh kho nyi sengla thükkeilao?
Nyi Mazzarot kho haoeibü jihsiphaia longtila,
ayingsi nyi Sap kho shoushou thonan leiyeila thükkei lao?
Nyi mühkabü ngühkhüm shuong ngekeilao?
kaodaka ngühkhüm kho nyi kümbei lo?
Lang juong loutila shanga nyi sangmei to
ngüh kaangko ngekda sai?
Nyi langpon to hauashi dogo sengkuda sai,
hoba haoenei ka to, “Kün hanei kia dogo lauda sai?”
Aoei maangkaboua songsido jinkukei?
Ayingsi aoei maangpona ditenbü kukei?
Songeidoei aoei sangmei kho wela thükkei,
ayingsi aoei mühkabü thungdou ka yeian jinkula thükkei?
Tham kho kaangkhütham apjinei, tham on kho khangyu khümda lo?
Molosaonyu nyunyu hoba molosaonyu meiloushou
haoen thüngshanga hoba tokei kolama thoan kijinei.
Nyi nyunyu shanga shausiyung lambulep sai,
ayingsi meiloushoueibü shi shentikulep lo?
Shoushou shuongei kü to wiyojinei,
hoba shausiyung akiko mühei haijinei,
aukhumakmak la aoei haoeibü shausiyung kuda?
Yaoei shoushou ladang shatda nyi ngekeilao?
Nyi meishiei shoushou shatbü haplao?
Haoenei shoushou lit ladüng künda nyi weanchühlao,
ayingsi haoenei shoushou shatbü jih ngekeilao?
Haoenei youkükei thungetan shoushou shatda,
hoba haoeneibü khonsak thontida.
Khübü kho khongthua yama chingenda,
haoen satda hoba alongaida.
Yam kabü gadu kho aoei litikei,
ayingsi yam kabü gadu aoei sengkei?
Ngei aola yamlamang kho chem la lela kukei?
Hobaje jem kao kho ao kishang la kukei.
Haoei sangnyu lemenbü kho nyikuda,
ayingsi kümbuboueibü ngüh aditda.
Shongh kho haoeneibü lamshaushang,
hoba haoei nyem sangtüngbü lamshauda.
Mühghaü ngou paangei no khangenlep lo,
ayingsi mühghaü ngou paang kaibü masu chema yepbulep lo?
Nyi mühghaü ngou kho lühei phenan sek laütilep lo,
ayingsi ka phainei haoei sek laükulep lo?
Hao hau yaangsikeinyi hao to mailem kilep lo?
Nyi kaibü kümsilei yaangbü kho haola
Kaibü youshou haoei sungbakulep hoba bunga khübü kho yoshaikulep dogo,
nyi hao to maanglem pholep sai?
Ostrikeibü kaak kho maisho pinda,
lausikei khübü kho lolenshangeibü kaak to takteiyola athük.
Aieilausi saoei saoeibü tei kaoa teida,
hoba khübü kho phetsena paaktida.
Hobaje kho lubüei leilutikulabü dogo,
hoba yamkabü meisiauei naknyinkulabü dogo adamenda.
Saoeibü shoushou kho haoeibü ayingbü tegütham
maang akuko jungeida,
saoeibü kümsilei kho amlang ong aikei hatko aki.
Aieilausi Mühghaüei sao la songsido aku,
hoba ditenbü phejan ajanletku.
Khei yingsikei ladang saoei laangla saoeibü kaak binda,
saoei koli si khünei setbou la nyikuda.
Nyi koli la hau kuda sai,
nyi haoeibü ngem kolieibü wiei shentikukei sai?
Hao hatlamoklabü che soumo kian wijinei
koksüng tegü nyi lühtida sai?
Haoei pholia olinbüei saiyeida,
hao hau kiko insiaubu to shuokla hauda.
Haoei hatlamoklabü kho haü dogo aki, hoba haulo üangda.
ayingsi in ka phai asukda.
Laophot, aupu, hoba ngatsim hao to.
Khau longbü hatlamoklabü hao to hapda,
ayingsi teklaang metjinei hao atopeiko akienda.
teklaang metbü weko haoei, “Aha” dogo wida
hebü ka haoei lason leiyeibüei oihinbü
hoba leilangbü shuong laphetda.
Kaibü songsido danko aulu pijung hauda,
hoba yungthang aeto kaak sengda sai?
Ayingsi kaibü ngühkhümei wekekshouei
seengjung angan kui suokbüa hap kümda sai?
Hao laanglip longlenga kida,
hoba shongh khua hao kishang kia.
Müh khüka haoei shausiyung lambo chühda;
saabü ka haoei chühenda.
Haoeibü shoushou shuongei sii yungda;
hoba lanei haibü mang ki, khünei hao kia.
Tokei
Aoei nyen shada haoei pendou Thükenbou to tokyolep lo?
Aoei Mühghaü to pheyophanyoda hao la kho jongaitiashi.
Hobaje Jobei
Chühashi, ngo ai amu,
ngei ka to ai jongaila?
Ngei kü sembung küpbho.
Ngei che laua, haü,
nyinei sühko,
lausikei khüaei, ajongailabü.
Kheijinei
Hau kibü müt che tegü shembe kaiashi;
ngei ka to phelabü hoba nyi kü to jongailabü.
Nyi khei ngeibü ngüh jongaibü aweeilabü si?
No matmailabü nyena nyi ngo yuktila se?
Ka la Mühghaüeibü ik tegü yemakei si,
hoba nyi haoei tegü langmak yaang maktila thükkei si?
Lala, no soumo hatko hele leanchühshima,
hoba soneikangko neisimei leanchühshima.
No khauangbü kho hansho limtishima,
hoba aoyou yonglam lilida pendou to chühko haoen yandishi.
Lilisesebü pendou to tangko chühko haoen yantiashi;
müt amaibü kho haoen loshang ka nakan yantiashi.
Thama haoen liko küplepashi;
haoeneibü thenyek nongbüa küplepashi.
Kheijinei ong ngeikei no sanglabü,
khei kaibü mai ikei no khümenalonga dogo.
Tou kaomaang thunyu
meisiau yaangbou kho to chühshi,
laobou no tegü ngo kümbei,
masu pongsuei tegü haoei sang shauda.
Haoeibü hau shenjanga kia,
hoba haoeibü sei kho haoeibü shimung phejaka kia.
Cedar bu tegü haoeibü mei topeida;
haoeibü youshi phejak kho shouloutham kia.
Haoeibü lo chisaknam tegü,
haoeibü yousi ik namju tegü.
Mühghaüei kümbü yoa hao kongnyubou;
aoei hao kümbei, haoei hao in nyangko sungbatishi.
Aieilausi shonghei hao shanga shausiyung longtikuda,
khünei meisiau pendou louyoda.
Leilang chipen phanga haan yua,
hoba thima hao da.
Leilang chipen longei hao yeme koulepda;
yungko kabü chipen shuongei hao kailepan kia.
Chühashi, shumang che hao deikhang shenko akoulonga hao amokda,
Jordan shumang haoeibü deikoushang
sühko sopsikei hao maangleman kia.
Aoei haoeibü nyek thutian,
ayingsi namsungei haoeibü kunga paiko sepan lapla?
Nyi ngau yaüjinei molojisang senenlep lo,
ayingsi haoeibü lishang janglühei phenan
yantileplo?
Nyi haoeibü kunga jolüh lean jinkuenlep lo,
ayingsi ngau yaüjinei haoeibü kaoshang sepyetkuenlep lo?
Haoei ka to annebenko sulepjalep lo,
ayingsi ka to ngüh inyaibü laulep lo?
Nyi hao ponpen shanga kaibü sambü la leashi dogo,
haoei ka yoa theyolanyoulep lo?
Au che to louyobü tegütham nyi hao to louyolep lo,
ayingsi kaibü sambüsao shuong shanga phenan pholep lo?
Ngaulapbü shuongei haoeibü namton kho noyolep lo,
namyaknamseibü yoa haoenei hao wapnyinan yaklep lo?
Namju simbüei nyi haoeibü khon sepyetenlep lo
ayingsi haoeibü khu ngausepjinei sepyetenlep lo?
Nyi hao to meitian ong chühshi;
hoba latetche wapyoenlaje damanchühshi;
nyi hao to nyibou akümenlabü.
Chühashi, hao to meitibü maanglem aki;
hao to chüh ong chühbüeikei hatda.
Hao to aoeikei ameitienlabü lele hao aeibou sekbülakbü;
kholonga aoei hao thedanga loenla?
Ngei shemngailabü lele aoei kü to tokyokei?
Nühnyu phanga kibü ajanjan pendou kho ngeibü.
Haoeibü yousi ik haoeibü hau yaangbü,
ayingsi hao süngsilop maibü shanga ngei alauko akilabü.
Aoei haoeibü tangnei hangletkula thükkei?
Haoeibü khon shangbü nyangko aoei loenkei?
Aoei haoeibü sembung koukhün shuong ipla thükkei?
haoeibü hau kaijembo hatlamoklabü kia.
Haoeibü shenjang aih tegü shangtüngbüei,
kaangkhühtham nitshokan kia.
Kaanglang to yei hansho ongkei ütlabü lele,
cheei che to nityoan kia.
Khübü kho cheei che to shenyoan kia,
abangnyinlabü lele khübü kho phopyoan kia.
Haoei haatji shijinei wanlong longda,
hoba haoeibü nyek kho ngeiyangbü chanyu saklangbü tegü.
Haoeibü sembung ka wan longda,
hoba wanlüh pakda.
Wanmanga nyakchak tühjung longbü tegü,
Haoei hakhinjinei wankaka wan metenda,
hoba haoeibü sembunga wanlüh longda.
Haoeibü hau haoeibü ngüma kia,
hoba hao thedanga hatbüei tomda.
Haoeibü phe phejak shuong chela yeiko khangyoakei
Khübü kho kaangkhühtham aleilulabü lele kia.
Haoeibü maangpon laang tegü kaangbü;
haü, inulaang tegü kaangbü.
Hao meimeijinei hauki yaangkibü shuong hatda;
Hatbülühbüei haoen maangngouda.
inei hao to wapsikei ütda, ayingsi aupueikei,
laojineikei hoba namju simbüeikei ai ayingda.
Haoei namju kho youho tegü,
hoba chinam kho busha hima weeida.
Laojinei hao shian asattienda,
laang shuongkei jutho hima yeida.
Injuei subü kho youkung hima weeida;
hoba aupuei sujinei nyikuda.
Haoeibü shimung maangaenei akbü laang tegü kia,
thima haoeibü yepshang kho kolei kümbü tegü lin lin kia.
Haülangbü khünei haoei chak che tegü tühjung longdida;
haoei yungnyu kho onang hima yeitida.
Haülangbou kho ashentibü tegütham,
hao phainei haoei lamnyu kho soneikangtiko longtida.
Kaodaka aitokei ühütbü, hao tegübü
meisiau aikei küman aki.
Yaangenbü pendouei hao to hatda,
lilisesebü pendou thüka hao Choba.
Kheijinei Jobei
Nyi pendou kümenkei dogo,
hoba kaibü dambü aikei senetan aphoen dogo ngei ngekei.
Songsido akibü ngühei Mühghaüeibü
dambü küplepan phobou kho ao?
Hibü ngei aditenko laua, hoba ngei
aditenko maangpanglabü shanga laua.
Sanoutambo ditashi, hoba ngei laukho;
ngei phekho kü la lenbü.
Ngeibü nouei ong ngei ka shanga ditkei,
lausikei touje ngeibü nyekei no hapda.
Khoei, ngeibü laubü sheda dogo theletda,
hoba thamngu si tap thüka setan ngo maangpon sepeida.
Hobaje ho tegü longkei,

Hobaje tou, masu pongsu nyet hoba lon paang nyet jungan ngeibü sambü Job jungto hauashi, hoba kan shanga juokbü lembü lemashi, hoba ngeibü sambü Jobei kan shanga welautiashi; aieilausi ngei kan to kanei kümbü hima aonouko ajungeilabü lele ngei haoeibü welau sungletlabü; aieilausi ngeibü sambü Job tegü kü shanga ai janbü ki kho kanei alau.
Hobaje Teman bou Elifas si Shuhai bou Bildad hoba Namat bou Zofar hauan
Hobaje haoei thangbou shanga welaukujinei
Hobaje haoeibü jaisina pendou hoba nousina hoba shaangbü ngeyobü thangbou pendou loukei hoba haoeibü chema hao yoa lem likei, hoba haoenei hao yoa haoeibü onat janyokei hoba
Hobaje
Hobaje haoei bousu shou nyet hoba yaksa shou sem kikei.
Hobaje haoei noushounyu nyen Jemima nyenkei, mütaonyu Kezia nyenkei, hoba napeinyu Kerren-happuk dogo nyenkei.
Hobaje Jobeibü yaksa shou tegü kaodaka hemaisaomai yaksa aokei akitei; hoba haoeneibü bouei haoeneibü jaisi shuong to liko phet kukei.
Kho phaia Job po saonyet salang kikei, hoba meten lei sühko hoba shiho sühko hapbei.
Hobaje Job chalou benbüa baushi sinan haikei.
Ao amaibü shuong songahona apaida,
hoba shabü shuong lama aloda,
hoba nyikubü setshanga asetda
kho müt haübou.
Lausikei
hoba haoeibü ngühkhüma change nangnak daman chühda.
Hao kho yungkoa kebü bunyu che phatkei,
laobouei poang hongjiha lang hekkuda,
hoba haoeibü ikkei ayuida,
Haoei kümbüleibü pendoua naangmaida.
Amaibü shuong kho tegü aying,
lausikei haoen youshou sho yeiei soulangbü phatko ki.
Hibü amaibü shuong matjemshanga alolabü,
ayingsi shabü shuong saopobü shuong thangyena alolabü.
Aishanga
lausikei amaibü shuong lamnyu maulabü.
Phangshuong aila lemenyoda?
Hobaje mütshuongei amlangbüa huon takda?
hoba songdakbü shuongei liko huon takda hoba lauda.
“Senei haoeneibü lühkhüh sengkukho;
hoba haoeneibü khühbü sen ka sungan apakho.”
Khuthüka setbouei nyikuda,
haoen yuktilabü.
Kheijinei haoei khauangko haoen to joyolabü,
hoba hao aeibou maangto shatko haoen khonkutilabü.
Khei yingasikei, Zion ngeibü saopobü
sangnyua ngei ngeibü Choba settia.
“Ngei ngühkhüm shanga kho lenkho,”
“No kü shou. Tat ngei no bukkei.
Kü ka hiashi, hoba phangshuong kho
ngei ka la phetphanla kulabü.
Hobaje kaodak thonbü sühko ka shangabü yingla kukho.
Nyi haoen namjuei leilutikulabü,
nyi haoen jakyaübüeibü chak tegü ngümnyinkulabü.”
Hibü, O Choba shuong, kan songsihon kiashi;
Kan kaodak matjembü shuong maangsangashi.
hoba lühjilühko olinashi.
Hao khauang alonglabü lele hoba lamnyua
kan amaulabü lele shou to sembung shepashi.
Aieilausi hao tongde khauanglabü;
hao to maanglembü pendou kho haübou.
juong kü khulimbo meimeida!
Kü soushou shanga juongei lauda,
“Mühghaü ka hao shanga thuibü aki.”
Lausikei, O
no ngeibü soneikangbü hoba ngeibü khu tonenbou.
Ngei ngeibü ngühei
hoba haoei haoeibü saopobü shongh ka kü to jongaida.
Ngo lengda hoba nyeket shida;
ngo tokei pida, aieilausi
Ngo khulimbo kaijembo lobü shuong,

Meimeiashi, O
O ngeibü Mühghaü;
aishanga nyi ngeibü dangbou shuong pendou to omlanga ipda.
Nyi amaibü shuongeibü hauh leilutikuda.
Khümenbü
haülabü ka mütli shuong thükto yingshi!
O ngeibü saopobü Mühghaü,
ngei ngajinei kü to jongaikai.
Ngo khonsaka kijinei nyi kü to thuida.
kü to sanoudamkai hoba ngeibü welau ditshi.

Kanei lalokche amlangbü sanoula,

Lausikei Mühghaü to hatbü müt
Ngei
Khauangashi, lausikei shed teshon;

Saopobü lembü kuashi,
hoba
Juongei laulabü,
Aoei kün to denche maibü lenla,
O
Haoen youshou si ih aei yeijinei olinbü to aei,

aieilausi,
O

O
ngeyang ngei ngeibü welau ka ae

Yonglam lilibüei ka thedanga alolabü,

Haoen shedbü dogo weeiashi, O Mühghaü,
haoen jembü chemphang songlen ngühei tuongtiashi,
Haoen shedbü juong yoa apashi,

kü to sanou damkai, O

Kaiya, O
Kaibü üeisanouei ngo khümenashi.
Aieilausi yemphem maanga no damenlabü aki;
Sheola aoei no sangla?

Aieilausi
Ngeibü dangbou shuong pendou himou bautilabü

O
ngo shieibü pendou ka ngo püetashi hoba ngo senetashi.
Khei ayinglonga haoenei ngeibü langkei

O
kü to shedbü shabü kian kialonga,

O
ngeibü dangbou shuong khauang khulimbo nyi phonenashi;

Hobaje phangshuong dan no kaijembo kamsheitiashi;

O
hoba ngo ngühmaanglanbü thüng kümat jemashi.
Amaibü dan amaibü thonshang to loutishi,

Ngeibü aih Mühghaü yoa kia;

Mühghaü saopobü matjembou ki,
haü, chalou angboua khauangbü Mühghaü che.
Mütei maangpon asepei longa,
haoei jembü in ulabü;
haoei jembü lau büha, hoba kho lamlea,

O

Amen! hoba Amen!
