Lanei hapbü ngebü ki khonei shemjang kho hemaibü namsek peisileiei shentida.
Sekokbü müt toje songsido kibü müt maibou; haü, hau kibou toje hapbü ngebü aei kongnyubou.
Khübü pendou phoan, no lasona mo alojinei nyi maangsangko kümthen kümjan, hoba nyi songlen maibü aei hapbü ngebü thüng, nyi wapyo aei thüklabü.
Songnge dongeei lenla ngoubü müt che shanga ditenla yongko haükei. Kongnyu ngühsidei sangkujinei haoei laula akida.
Nyi hanghangko amaibü kümla huongalonga, nyi lusaktibü nyenshed hapngailabü.
Ngoubü huonsiyou takbü kho shabü. Aingenyu müla nyikubü müt che kho mütshuongei mangsenda.
No thusheda nyibutham apalonga kaibü hau hana.
Hailabü lele kibü müt che khümenla tesuktedem.
Nyi “Ngei ho angekei” dogo telau; lausikei Mühghaüei kaibü nongeisae ngean mat jemda. Haoei no lomda, haoei ngeda. Hobaje nyi kümbü thüng haoei ka la jongsak kulabü.
Kü shou, nyi naodei shauashi, ho maiakei, hoba hap ka sungbüyam kho teishiktham ki.
Kho tegü ka soushou shanga songsihon kho maiakei dogo chongchinglabü. Songsihon ha- pashi hoba kaibü leilubü thu kho ngesakle kilabü.
Saopobü müt cheeibü chem sola soshau soyungbü müt amaibou tegü teying.
Ai aying, maang tangbü mütje laiche küman annebenko tuongasikei longaida; lausikei müt amaibü thushedei mautida.
Kaibü dangbou thushed kühshuokjinei hoba hao phaiyetan tuongjinei no teolin.
No yonglambü kho
Shabü müt shuongei no maang temauti, nyi haoen tedüh.
Müt amaibü cheei loulabü thu shanga aikei chüheilabü aki.
Kü shou, nyi
Khübü mütshuong nyek shemjang alaptoua leiluan apla thükkei. Mühghaüei ayingsi Chobaei ka la thushed kulabü kho damendalao?
Songbüdobü mütshuongei habü hokei lauakei. Matjembou cheei the chühbü kho shedbü.
Aoyouei müt amaibü shedtibou to “No shedbü aki” dogo laulaje hao khükei uokeilabü hoba mangsenlabü.
Matjembou shuong aoyouei shedbou la kayang kuda, haoei haülabü haplabü hoba nyenmaia olinda.
Tangshaitham lanko jongaibü kho tükdebü thangbou tetsida lenbü ki.
Kaibü sek akhüm shongko nyi kaibü chem dangla telamle, hoba kho phaia ong kaibü shiang lamenlabü.
Amlangbüa müt at khulimbo aukhen aolep tüt, hoba tekhüp telang.
“Haoei kü to kümbü tegütham ngei hao to kümngailabü! Haoei kümbü thüng ngei shemngailabü” dogo telau.
Ngei haulo haushedboueibü sek si haang alongboueibü semlühlaak nakjung dankei.
Khübü kho jakham si senouei chinglepnyu kikei, hoba kaijembo laang ba khokei tuongan kikei.
Kheijinei ngei khüto chühkei, hoba ho daman chühkei, hoba ho ka ditenbü che hapbei.
No yepmang sühsije che ngakashi. Kaibü ik shenyoan longche haksoashi;
lausikei no longche yeptoua shaleei insiaubu jungbü soshau soyungbü müt cheei tegü no laphetlabü.
Habü hokei Jihuda Choba Hezekia mütshuongei doletbü Solomoneibü tetentanbü ki.
Mühghaüei ai huan phokukei kho shanga senei hao soneikangtida; Choba shuongei ai wanan lenda kho shanga senei haoen la nyensang kuda.
Nyi Chobaei dambü ladangkei angeda; mühshuong suokbü ayingsi yungnyu haübü tegü haoeibü dambüei sen limakei.
Chandinam ka namphet kho apashi, hoba yaübü shuongei maisho yaüenlabü.
Hibü songlen amaibü kubü mütshuong Choba jungka kuktiashi hoba khei yingsi ong haoeibü saopobü songdak kho ngelabü.
No Choba thedanga lojinei hao tethung tejangei hoba no konglebou tegü telen.
“Kaibü setshang mü lubü kongnyubou la kuashi” dogo laubü toje “No thükkabou setshang to kayang” dogo laubü maibou.
Kaibü nyekei hapbü kho matjemshang to yongko panteiko jungan tohau; phaito lubüei kaibü shedbü lapsi kheijinei nyi ai kümla?
Kaibü lepbü sangmang yoa aditenbü kisi kasi kanglanga ditenyoashi, hoba müeibü hup- hang tekhuok.
Khei ayinglonga müei ka nyen shalabü hoba kaibü himou ladangkei asatlabü.
Dambü maibü wanan lenbü kho chandinama honlaang shanjinbü phatkei.
Ditla maangdakbü to songsido kibü mütei hakbü honeibü ikjikhap ayingsi hinseibü honeibü chimenyakmin to kei khaibou.
Youlatjih sanglema deili tegü, maanglemlabü ngühlang künbou kho hao hautibou senyüh shemtibou kho ki.
Mütshuong aoyouei haoenei ladangkei akunyu thekuda, khübü kho lang athonbü sangmei si yei phatkei.
Lounyu natenbü hoba subüjabüei kaangkosekko thangetbü leilutida, hoba songdakbü shuongkei leibada.
Nyi ladangkei naodei aei teshau, lemaia shaushi; dantisi nyi ngaitibula.
Ka lepbou chem annebenko pean techüh; hao ka to olabü hoba mangsenan aplabü.
Aukhen aolepbü müt che kho haitibü inlou, bungüm ayingsi laujin simbü che phatkei.
Khonsak thusheda maang alemenlabü müt to nongbü kho hauh amaibüei nyaila athükbü ayingsi sokebü yoa paila haujembü phatkei.
Maangngangbü müt che la chia atkubü kho khamalüha nei khokan apbubü ayingsi haijepbüei mou sakkubü phatkei.
Kaibü dangbou mühei haiko kialonga hao la oknyinashi; hoba hao dei laalonga hao la dei inashi.
Nyi hao himoutibüei wankak yasebüei tegü lamlabü hoba
Yungkük yeiei lang sungbabü tegü, ngüh jungeibü lishangei maangshat sungbada.
Khauang maangpok yak che yoa chem chenei kibü khantoje kepunga kibü maibou.
Thonla loubü saabü kabü ngühlang kho no deilaei maang laakjinei deili phatkei.
Thimkükdei ayingsi yungdei ngatbü phatko, saopobü mütei shabü shuong ngüha hehoat kibü kho ki.
Naodei juong shaula amaibü tegü, mü yongko sangbükei khei yingkei.
Nyi kaibü khauang thepetla athüklonga, no kho müei shila sobü ba alebü sangnyu che phatko ki.
Ngoubü shanga sangbü- yaübü kho, sanglem jiha ninthu lenbü hoba khamalüha lang loubü phatkei.
Ajan ayingbüa khükbü uokbüei ka la ai ayinglabü; haoen kho pakshang akiko seengeibü aushuong phatkei.
Nyi koli to semjan, gadu janglühei thepetjan, hoba ngoubü to lijuei ngümjan.
Ngoubü to hao ngoubü thüng tejongai, khei kümalonga nokei hao tegü yinglabü.
Ngoubü che to hao ngoubü thüng jongaiashi, khei yingalonga haoei hao lolo sangbü tegü damlabü.
Ngoubü che la ngühlang küntibü kho nyi jembü you wetan apbü ayingsi lusakbü yungbü phatkei.
Ngoubü sembunga tetentanbü kho sokemokebü phatkei.
Ngouei huongbü müt la nyensang kubü kho lüklük kipjina laang jinbü phatkei.
Ngoubüei tetentanbü jungeibü kho ihjaakbü mütei haoeibü ika ngütbü jak apla haujembü phatkei.
Eiklambü aoei ngoubü si danbüphaibü mangthem ong eik lamda, khübüei müt pendou la nali thetida.
Keiei jembüei khinngaibü to sepeinyu ngaibü tegü, ngoubüei nyibou ngoualouabü kümsilei kümda.
Aoei ai angenyu hao sangbüdobü tegü damda, khotoje yongko ngoubüeibü maanglem kho khaibou.
Haulo haushedbü müt aila chem ka alongda? Hao aito hatda? Molosaonyu sai?
Koukap kepjaa yikaibü tegütham, haulo haushedbouei jembü shena lükaida.
Müt atje jembü sembung to nyak mokan attila to liko haulobü kia.
Haulobüei müt nyetei dambü maibü kubü toje hao ong aei songsido kibou dogo damlabü.
Aoei mü oyophetyoa sembung atda, hao kho khongshongbü keieibü noua yaübü phatkei.
Aoei mü khüpettida hoba kho “Amlang ekyoda” dogo lauda, kho langet angbü mütei wanted, laujin ayingsi hailabü insiaubu tekan jinkubü phatkei.
Bu akilonga wan nyetda; kokngüh shakyojepyo akilonga oyophetyo thonda.
Wankak yasebüa wan lapda; kho tegü lemen longtibouei pheyo phanyoko ong kida.
Kok shakyobü kho jemoubü shausiyung phatkei; khübü kho shiangmaang to atda.
Ngüh haabü sembung si shabü maangpon namdei lakbü thamchak phatkei.
Hibüyoubü mütei haoei mü mangsenbü kho hao khüpbülangbü ngüha huan phoda.
Khübü kho maian hapla thükkei, lausikei hao to maitelem; aieilausi haoeibü maangpon mangsenbüei shenakei.
Haoei mangsenbü kho maian lensikei, müei haoei amaibü kümbü pendou haplabü.
Aoei mü la tin sankuda jembü lolo minngaida. Aoei laang khokeida kho hao thükto tongjung loukoulabü.
Yepei jawebü mütei müt at leilutimang sühbü kho nyi mangsenjan. Suthetbouei ai ühüpshauda, lausikei leilubü ong longtida.
Ngiet shangabü yong telam, tou anjih kanglanga ai yinglaje angekei.
Nyi no lolo ka sembungei ayingko khei mü tangkabü la sangtiashi.
Ngoukolouko khonsak longtibü kho laang si phetsen atshaibü ham khüto takyolabü aying.
Khau lotbü kho onou akakbü, maangpok angbü kho yungsen; lausikei nyek to shatbü thedanga ao loenla?
Huphanga sanoubü toje thedanga hakbü maibou.
Thangbouei aktibü kho maanglem kia; lausikei dangbouei ka to phak himbü kho maangsanglabü kia.
No ladang shi shenan kilaje nyi naodei amühlabü; lausikei no ladang mühei hailaje khaubü shausiyungkei teiko shauenlabü.
Müt che chem ka satan shoongaibü kho au che haoeibü hap ka satan shoongaibü phatkei.
Onang si ponlemei maangpon olintida; lausikei soushou je khonkuei laü angda.
Ka thangbou shuong ayingsi kaboueibü thangbou shuong tema. No khonsakjinei kajaikana thuila tenga; saabüa kibü jaimai namai to je nyangko kibü lepbou che kho khaibou.
Kü shou, sangadoashi, ngo olinlabü; kheijinei ngei ngo awealaubou to jongaila kilabü.
Tedtangbü mütei thushed loubü kho hapda hoba kho ka huda; lausikei songlanbouei khei ong hauda hoba hao jembü lolo khonsakda.
Ngoualoua yenbou shanga sanghshemla theletbü leboueibü neisimei kho letiashi, hoba usa kabü yaksa shanga sanghshemla theletbü lebou kho theletshang to attiashi.
Ngeyang enyu pian aoei ngekko hao thangbou haükuda, hao shanga kho khüksiuok dogo weeida.
Nyamsa nyu che kho lang loujinei det det sangbü langdei phatkei.
Nyi sao semeshoko phola thükasao? Nyi yei thangetan chühlao? ayingsi ikmaang shenko naodei jungan chühlao?
Namei nam uan phamtida, kho tegü müt cheei müt che uan phamtida.
Aoei bhuklong che thounouda, haoei khoeibü hek shauda; hoba aoei jembü
Nyi deia kaibü thenyek hapngaibü tegü nyi kaibü maang- pona no khoyam hapda.
Sheol si Abaddon ladangkei senyüh ashemda; hoba müteibü nyekkei ladangkei ashenda.
Sinletbü kho chandinam shanga, hoba wansoujin kho hon shanga; hoba müt che hao sangbüei takteida.
Shaubü anbü yoa shema muei ngoubou kho netla yeiko shinyinashi; khoeikei nyi hao ngoualouabü kho üpbuenlabü.
Kaibü sanshuong si masu shuong to maangsangko chühashi,
aieilausi nyaksinam pon- pen shanga aying hoba Choba khun kho meten pendou shanga lo aying.
Ladang ushisang shemda, nyemshang haanbü kho longda, hoba shonghyou pik shuong lipshaida.
Nyi kaibü sanlon shuongeibü wiei nei taklabü hoba lon yaakletbü ka sek jeklabü.
Hobaje joubü lon shuong khoei kaibü chemdang samla sendei souko kulabü hoba kho tegü kaibü sambüsao shuong pangteilabü.
Aoeikei ashieinyu müt amaibü shuong sateida; lausikei saopobü müt molosaonyu tegü maangkaangko kida.
Ladang phang cheei shabü shonda, hoei songdakbü juong yeida; lausikei ditenbü si songsido kibüei phang che kho hau kiko süngshonko kitilabü.
Hau jungeibü müt che, aoei shalebü shieikoedaje, hao kho langle apbubou deinyu yungsen phatkei.
Ngühkhüm inletbou khoei shabü shuong sangda; lausikei ngühkhüm jungeibü shuongei haoen khulimbo loda.
Amaibü mütshuongei ngühmai kho aditenda; lausikei aoyouei
Keisikei khüpeilangeibü müt toje shalesikei ngühmaang lanko kibü maibou.
Aoei ngühkhüm jungeida, hao songsido kibü shou; lausikei shaumüt yungmüt to jambüei jembü bou himou bautida.
Aoei namlot si phobnamei jembü nyaksinam haatida, shalebü shuong to sanouko dambubou shanga kho thanshaida.
Aoei ngühkhüm ajungeilaje haoeibü welaukei aditkulabü.
Aoei maangtangbü müt ayingbü lam to leian jinda, hao jembü püngkhün to atlabü; lausikei shedbü akibü mütei phet maibü phanlabü.
Keibüei hao lolo songsido kibou dogo damda; lausikei shalebou ao to ditenshuokenbü thechüh ki, haoei maibou ngekei.
Saopobü shuongei thüksimin hapjinei müt pendou olinyoda; lausikei müt amaibü songdak hau to angjinei mütshuong huan apbuda.
Nyi kaibü shabü hualonga langkeia no ladangkei naang amailabü; thekuashi hoba apyoashi, kheijinei Mühghaüei ka to onou lenlabü.
Aoei
Amaibü songdakbou kho shalebü shanga lejim aki; hao kho ngühbü molosaonyu ayingsi huokbü sap phatkei.
Ditenbüa shalebü songdakbou kho tokei shieikoe yaang kia; lausikei aoei aeilam aeiphop mangsenlaje hao salanglabü.
Müt haitibü shedbü kümbü mütei haoei thükbü tegü panteiko haoeibü heekhün thuda; hao shieila hau tejem.
Ngühmaang lanashi hoba no püetlabü; no ngühmaang alanlonga no mangde atetlabü.
Haujembo kümbüleibü sekmoubouei shaula kida; lausikei aoei jihsiphai apsileda hao pon- pen sha lelabü.
Ngühmaang lanbü ongayasebü olinbü langkei to leilabü; lausikei no keila panteialonga no shieikoelabü haang.
Maangthük maangphang kümbü kho amai; lausikei mütei shausiyung hanbüshou shanga ngühkhüm lulimda.
Makhet meletbü mütshuongei haoen ladang shale phamla angeko keila panteida.
Lepbolangko laubü toje müt at kümetkubü maibou, phaila haoei khoto maangshiklabü.
Aoei nyusiboueibü nyaksinam kokan sungan ho shedbü aying dogo damda, kho kokbü to maibou aying; hao leiluboueibü meitangbou.
Kükükanong dambüei ong oyolemen longtida; lausikei aoei
Jembüei dambüa ong paibü kho ngoubü; lausikei ao songsido kiko pailaje hao khümenlabü.
Shalebü la kubou kho ladangkei sha alelabü; lausikei nyi shalebou ka the huan kialonga mütshuong ka khüksiuok yaang haplabü.
Müt amaibü songdak hau to angjinei mütshuong huan apda; lausikei haoen maujinei saopobü shuong nyibou haada.
Annebenko kümetkusi aoei tulaseklaje hao mangde ong maulabü, hoba ladangkei asinngailabü.
Saopobü shuong haajinei noknyüh olinyoda; lausikei shabü mütei songdakjinei noknyüh sangwi jangda.
Aoei songsido maikuda haoei bou olintida; lausikei aoei asangalan sao shuong to mangjamda haoei jembü nyaksinam apsileda.
Chobaei ngühmaiei kaodak yaüda; lausikei aoei jongsak hida haoei kho pekan apda.
Aoei jembü lepbou amlanga sangda, haoei jembü younaka tak sanda.
Amaibü müt kho ngühkhüm lelimbüa lapda; lausikei saopobü mütshuongei chia lauko olinyoda.
Saopobü shuongei shalebü shuongeibü khonsak ngeda; lausikei amaibü mütshuongei khübü kho ditenla athükda.
Mü awealaubü mütshuongei sangnyu che jikan apbuda; lausikei songsido kibü mütei khübü kho küpjemtida.
Ladang sangbüdobü mütei ngoubü to mat angda, ngoubü kho nyi ong nyida, hoba khau angan ngekko küpjembü to alouda.
Sii mühbü mütshuongei maangtangbü shuong mangsenda, hoba maangtangbou kho haitila lamda.
Ngouei huongbü mütshuongei jembü khauang pendou khokenda; lausikei tedtangbü mütshuongei natenko senetda.
Songdakbou cheei amlangbü ngühlang to maang kualonga, hao phanga kibü songdakbü shuong pendou yepeijawebü la yeilabü.
Shalebou si naklepbou haosi ham liko haüyoda,
Chobaei shalebou la tükdebüa yingkua longa, haoeibü songdak hangkhu onko kilabü.
Kümetkubü si thepetbü ham khoei hapbü ngebü kuda; lausikei nashou che kho hao maang leko phokua longa haoei haonyu himou bautida.
Shabü shuong songdak phanga ngühkhüm lulimbü juong yeida; lausikei saopobü mütshuongei kho tegübü mütshuong atbü haplabü.
Ka shou thepetashi, hoba no hao shangabü ponpendou the lenenlabü; haü, haoei ka maang- pona olinbü kulabü.
Lanei thuseibü songlen aki, noknyüh senetbü aki; lausikei aoei ngühkhüm jungeida, hao haübou.
Sambü che ngüh kongeije akümetkuenda, haoei nyi laubü kho ditenla thükkei, lausikei haoei kaibü ngüha maang akulabü.
Nyi ngüha panteibü müt che haplao? Hao toje ngoubü cheeibü maanglem khaibou.
Nyi kaibü sambü la nashoudangka thama haoei mangsühbü pendou kualonga nyetcheje haoei kaibü phet pendou phanlanglabü.
Khauangla sobü mütshuongei oyolemen longtida, hoba maangsak yembüei shedbü juong shonda.
Liliseseei no phangto yanlabü; lausikei no ea aoa kialonga nyi nyensang nyenhang haplabü.
Aoei kokbü to maangjamda, haoei jembü langkei mangsenda; haoei khükbüuokbü kho ditda lausikei aikei ajoyoda.
Müt to hatbüei jembü lolo sung sanngaida; lausikei nyi
Müt juongei songdakbüei maangshikbü maikuda; lausikei
Saopobü shuongei ngühmaang alanbü mangsenda; lausikei maangtangbü kho shabü shuong thedanga mangsenlabü.
Habü ho Jake shou Agureibü tang khitbü ngüh:
“Mühghaü kü yoa aki, Mühghaü
kü yoa aki, hoba ngo lai lela?
Ngo müt tegüje aying, meisiau ong phatkei.
Müt to kijan ditenbü kho kü to aki.
Ngei lubü songsihon ladangkei aditlet;
hoba ngei Mühghaü shangabü jimlatangla angesapbei.
Aoei khuthükbü hapbü ngebüa bunyu yeian chühkei?
Aoei haoeibü ika yei lapan jungan chühkei?
Ayingsi neia dei senan chühkei?
Ayingsi kaodak leilang takan chühkei?
Hao ao nyi ngekeilao? Hao aoeibü shou?
“Mühghaüei haoei theletbü pendou kümda. Hobaje lambü shuong pendou shanga haoeibü khümenbü kho ngoukhon aih phatkei.
Haoeibü ngüh to tejin- yo, khei aying longa haoei ka to haklabü hoba no yepeijawebü la yeitilabü.”
Mühghaü, ngei ka ka peisilei den nyi shanga sudajada; ngo ühaijinei nyi kho kü ka teshiletma.
Ngo yepeijawebü ka bangtikai hoba ngo keikei tekeiti ayingsi shakei teleti. Kü la ngei shauthüng ong kubü.
Aingenyu ngo shi shena longa no atheletlabü hoba laulabü, “
Ladangkei sambü cheei jembubou nyen tesha. Ka to khükla uoklabü hoba ho laüa no khonsaklabü.
Mütshuongei haoeneibü bousi to khükda uokda hoba lulueibü nyusi to maang ashikda.
Mütshuong haoen kheinyu asaopoko kian haoenei haoen saopoan kia dogo damda!
Mütshuong aoyouei haoen müt maibü dogo damda - oh, haoenei haoen lai maikei dogo damda!
Mütshuongei shalebü si khambü shuong thüka keikokombo jungeibüei thük leda; kho tegübüei haoen haoeneibü langkei haangda.
Watei yaksa shou nyi kia, hoba ham la nyen “Kü la labü!” dogo nyenkuakei.
Ladangkei senyüh ashemlabü peisilei den lei kia:
Haibü yemkao,
angkongbü yaksa che, langdei khambü kaolin,
hoba nyettila athükbü wan.
Aoei jembü bou la nyikuda ayingsi jembü nyu noushoulama awealauda, shushou kabü aukhomakmakei haoeibü nyeklang phekan apbulabü hoba hogonei kho shaulabü.
Kü shanga yongko ditenla sekbü peisilei den lei kia:
Wekekshou müha seengeida,
pinyu laang thüka paida,
longchem cheei yungnyua jembü haang lamenda;
hoba bousu che si yaksa che sanouyoan apda.
Alanbü saoeibü hangsilam kho ho: Saoei asangalanbü kümda hoba mang yuan apan lauda, “Ngei ai shedbü aküm!”
Kaodakei peisilei den lei honei anatenko lühda:
Aaomüt che Choba la yeibü,
hoba nyakei photettian kibü ngoubü che.
Mangsenbü sao cheei lao hapoubü,
hoba sambüsao che, aoei saoeibü sambünyu jeida.
Kaodaka meisiau hanbü lei kia, lausikei yongko maangli maangsang:
Min: haoen hau aki, lausikei
haoenei sulanga haoeneibü shausiyung thanan phoda.
Sanshou: haoenkei hau akibü tan che,
lausikei haoenei haoen kishang laangpoba kümda.
Koksüng: haoenei Choba aki,
lausikei pendou takshatan shoongda.
Chemsou: nyi haoen yo ka che ika lapan jungla thükkei;
khei yingsi dogokei haoen Choba chema kida.
Haoen paijinei maangkuko chühlabü hangsilam den lei kia:
Molosaonyu meisiau pendou to hau kibou,
hoba haoei aotokei ühütda;
khungom satsattham paibü aupaang, lonpaang,
hoba Choba che haoeibü mütshuong thedanga.
Nyi ngoualoua amaibü kümbo yonglaman kia longa nyi kaibü ikei sembunga yeman daman chühashi.
Nyi sendei yeiyosi onbü longda, kung to nyatsi kungsii angda; kho tegü thakthak mangmangbüei oyolemen longtida.
Habü ho Lemuel Chobaeibü nyuei hao to tang khitbü ngüh shuong:
“Oh kü shou, ngeibü shia künbü shou, oh ngeibü theyolan- yobü shou, ngei ka la ai lenla?
Kaibü hau yaksa to suonlambüa tüp; hoba kaibü nyaksinam Choba shuong mautilabüa tüp.
Ditashi, Lemuel, Choba shuongei ih ayungjan ayingsi jaakbümakbü to adühjan.
Ladang haoenei ih yungda, haoenei ngühkhüm maada hoba khonsakbü mütshuong to tangbü kümlabü kibü kho khüpeinyu apda.
Aoyou maulabü ki khübü la ih kho inashi, hoba langkeia khonkua kibü mütshuong la ih kho yungtiashi.
Haoen la yungtiashi hoba haoeneibü shale si aolinbü maatiashi.
“Haoen lolo ngüh alauenbü shuong shanga ngüh laukuashi. Thuila akibü shuong haoen tangbüjanbü shanga ngüh atkuashi.
Haoen shanga laukuashi hoba saopobü matjem lekuashi. Shalebü si khambü tangbüa püetashi.”
Mubü yak che aoei hapenla thükkei? Sao phülem to khaibou!
Saoeibü laoei sao to haoeibü maanglem phoda, hoba ladangkei sha alelabü.
Saoeibü salang sünga maibü kümda hoba ladangkei akomda.
Saoei wi si lei inyaibü lamda, hoba saoeibü ikei maangnyu angko kümda.
Sao namyak namseibü long- chem che phatkei, usa ka shausiyung künbada.
Langnge asaoko sao pian chemdang shanga shausiyung lamlekuda, hoba sambü sao shuongei kümlabü kümsilei jankuda.
Saoei sek che dameida hoba kho jekda; hoba saoeibü ikei thanshaibü namei saoei semlühlaak leda.
Saoei shembe kaida hoba sisik laangminko sekoktham kümdaleida.
Saoei saoei seibütakbüa pailetbü kibü hapda, hoba nangnak saoeibü wanthung anyetda.
Saoei keimeia jungan ji ikdangei bünga jungan lei shikda.
Shalebü to saoei saoeibü ik sengda; haü, saoei saoeibü ikei shale khonsakbü shuong sühlangda.
Saoeibü chemdang shanga ninthu lenbü to ühütda; aieilausi saoeibü chemdang pendouei lemabü nei neiakei.
Saoei yepshang nei imda, hoba nakthüngle sakbü nei inyaibü neida.
Kaonyek kabü jaishou shuong setjinei saoeibü lao bakhüna shenan apda.
Saoei phemba nei si shembe nei takan namyaknamseibü shuong la yaakda.
Hau si soumo kho saoeibü hele, hoba loulabü thusilam shanga saoei hatko aki.
Saoei songsido kiko sao sembung ipda, hoba saoeibü lishanga üeisanou ngühsong kia.
Saoei saoeibü chemdang maila chühko ong kida, hoba haulobü shausiyung ashauda.
Saoeibü shousi shuong laksepda hoba sao to haünyu dogo lauda; saoeibü laoeikei sao sangko lauda:
“Yaksa juongei muko küma, lausikei nyi haoen pendou leilanga.”
Chühsühbü kho khüpettibü hoba saomaibü kho jim akibü; lausikei aoei
Saoeibü langle sao la kuashi, hoba saoeibü kümeileiei bakhüna sao sangtiashi.
Jerusalem kabü Choba, Dawideibü shou, Songlendolenboueibü ngüh.
“Lejim aki, Lejim aki”, dogo Damthenchühbouei lauda, “Kong ka kongmaimai, pendou kho lemailela kongkong.”
Mühnyu phanga mütei kümbü, hao hübü mangbü ku ai?
Meten che satda, hoba lubü meten che louda; lausikei kaodakje ponpen kida.
Chanyu kho longda hoba chanyu kho nepda, hoba hao longbü aeto nyibou ngaida.
Yeiei chanep aeto souda, hoba chaangbou naphei to sepeida haoei jembü lama athakko tuongjung hauda hoba sepeisaeko kaida.
Shumang pendou yungnyu to kouda, lausikei yungnyu kho ashenda, lanei shumang kouda khüto ong nyibou kouda.
Ajanjan pendou damlabüei shenakei, mütei ho alauen, hapbüei nyek ashenda.
Khei ai kikei kho ong kilabü; ai ong küma kho ong kümlabü hoba mühnyu phanga aikei haanbü aki.
Chühashi, ho haanbü ki dogo mütei laubü peisilei che kilao ma? Sen to shaangbü meten shuong haanga ho kikei.
Shangied haüthükbü aikei adamenlabü, ayingsi phaila loubü yoa loula kibü haüthükbü aikei adamenlabü.
Ngo damthenchühbou kho Jerusalema Israelbü thüka Choba kikei.

Hobaje mühnyu phanga kümbü pendou shanga ngeibü hapbü ngebü songeidoei lamla hoba lamenla shanga ngei maang kukei, ho khei Mühghaüei müteibü shousi shuongla akong- akangko kila shanga kubü kümsilei sekbü che.
Mühnyu phanga kümbü kümsilei pendou ngei hapda; hoba chühashi, pendou amlang hoba yei to longyobü ong.
Laobou koma kho tangla athük hoba ai ong aonlangko ki kho wela athük.
Ngei ngeibü maangpona hai laukei, chühashi, kü to shaang Jerusalema kibü pendou to ngei songsido yaangbou hapa; haü, ngeibü haiyepei hapbü ngebü hoba ditletbü yaangbü danthetjung loua.
Hobaje ngei songngedonge hoba langet angbü si ngoubüloubü ngela ngei maang kukei, hoba ngei chühenda, khei khokei amlang ong hoba yeia haujembü ong.
Aishanga songsido aei kialonga maangpon shale aei ki, hoba hapbü ngebü haalonga maangmau onat aei pühda.
Ngei kü maangpona laukei, “Kaishima, ngei no olinbü takteikho; kamaangleko olinashi,” lausikei chühashi, khokei amlang ong kikei.
Ngei laukei, “Ekyo nyiyobü kho ngoubü hoba olin maangmai kho ainei lela?”

Haoen langkei salang tuishoa müh phanga müteibü shousi shuongei kümla shanga hapbüngebüei ngeibü khu leiyeiko ihei ngeibü maang lai olintienkei hoba ngoubü kümaleia lai ik atenkei, kho ngeibü haiyepei lambei.
Ngei kümsilei yaangbü kümbei, kü shanga chem shuong dangkei, hoba semlüh kekei.
Kü shanga chipen ba hoba kü shanga buheklaak kümbei hoba ngei khübünei bulong phang juong kekei.
Bulong shuong yeman kishanga dei lakla shanga, ngei deikhün thukei.
Ngei aaomüt bousu yaksa jekshaikei hoba ngeibü chema bukbü sambüyaübü shuong kikei; hoba Jerusalema kü to shaang kibü pendou to aeibü ngei masu hoba sanlon shuong kiteikei.
Sangle shuong hoba Choba shuong nyaksinam hoba hon si chandinam ngei haushaikei, ngei bousu si yaksa chia laubü shuong phokei hoba müteibü shou olinla thangnyu juong phokei.
Hibü ngo yaangenkei hoba Jerusalema kü to shaang kibü pendou limjung haukei, hoba ngeibü hapbüngebü songsido kü yoa tokei kikei.

Hobaje ai ong ngeibü nyekei dühkei khübü ka ngo asukngai, ngeibü olinbü aikakei asukngaiti, aieilausi ngeibü kümsilei pendoua ngeibü maangpon olinko kikei; hoba ngei kümbü pendou ka ngeibü ku ho kikei.
Kheijinei ngeibü ikei kümbü kümsilei pendou hoba ngei kho kümla hübü shanga chühkei hoba chühashi, pendou amlang hoba yei to longyobü ong kikei, hoba müh phanga ku ai akitei.
Hibü ngei ngo lolo songsido kibü langat angbü hoba ngoubüloubü damanchühla sepeikei, aieilausi Choba phaito loubü müt khoei ai kümenkei? Haoei shaangla ai kümenkei kho ong kümenkei.
Kheijinei ngei ho hapbei, khei ngesakbü kho nakthühbü to latetcheei maikei khütetche hapbüngebü kho ngoubü toje maikei.
Songsido kibüeibü nyek kho haoeibü khua thonkei, lausikei songsido akibü shuong kho nakthüha paida, khei yingsi dogokei, ngei ho chühenkei, khei haoen pendou to thu jetei louda.
Kheijinei kü maangpona laukei, “Songsido akibü to haüthükbü tegü kütokei haüthüklabü, kholonga ngo ai aei songsido ki?” Kheijinei ngei ngeibü maangpona hokei amlang dogo laukei.
Aieilausi songsido kibükei songsido akibü tegütham ponpenje adamenlabü, aishanga loulabü chalouaje pendou maan apan kilabü.
Hibü ngei langkei kho mangsenkei, aieilausi müh phanga kümenbü kümsilei shuong kü shanga maangto shatlabü kikei, aishanga pendou amlang hoba yei phainei leiyobü che ong ki.
Kü phaito loulabü müt la ong phoyokulabü dogo hapan müh phanga ngo hüko kümbü ngeibü kümsilei pendou ngei mangsenkei.

Hobaje hao kho songei keibü yingla si songei akeibü yinglaje aoei ngekei? Khei yingsikei ngeibü kümsilei ainei ngo hükei hoba müh phanga hapbüngebü lenkei, khübü kümsilei pendou thüka hao bunyu yingla, hokei amlang ki.
Hibü müh phanga kümbü ngeibü kümsilei pendou apyoan ngei kü maangpon haiko kikei.
Aieilausi che cheje aoei songsido kiko hoba hapbüngebüei hoba maangli maangsangei kümbei, kho pendou aoei khünei ühü amang, hao la hao maangleko apyokujan. Hokei amlang hoba maangto shatlabü che.
Mütei hübümangbü senyüh sheibü laobou künan haoei müh phanga kümda, hao pendou shanga haoei ai ki?
Aieilausi hao langkei salang sünga maangmau onat ong; nangnakkei haoei hakso ühüpda, hokei amlang.
Müt shanga jembüei kümenleienbüa olinbü hapbo shaubü yungbü to limbo maibou ai aki. Hokei Mühghaüeibü ik ka ong dogo ngei hapbei.
Aishanga hao ayoko aoei shauenkei hoba maanga maiko kienkei?

Aieilausi aoei hao olintida hao la Mühghaüei songsido hapbü ngebü hoba olinbü kukei, lausikei shabü shuong la yoshaila hoba thanlabü kümsilei kuda, khei Mühghaü maang olintibü la kula shanga ong, ho amlang hoba yei phai shibü che ong.
Ajanjan pendou shanga jih che hoba müh phanga kümsilei pendou shanga jembü jihsiphai takletan kia.
Buklabü jih che, hoba hailabü jih che,
kelabü jih che hoba kean kibü pheian aplabü jih che.
Haitilabü jih che hoba maitilabü jih che,
leilulabü jih che hoba kümetlabü jih che.
Haaplabü jih che, hoba nyilabü jih che,
mang haaplabü jih che hoba tomlabü jih che.
Laang tuongan koutilabü jih che hoba laang yoshailabü jih che,
himyolabü jih che, hoba himyobü nanglabü jih che.
Lamlabü jih che hoba maulabü jih che, pholabü jih che
hoba tekan aplabü jih che.
Jitnyinlabü jih che hoba shingailabü jih che,
ngüh üangko kilabü jih che hoba joyolabü jih che.
Sanoulabü jih che hoba mangsenlabü jih che,
wapyobü jih che hoba sangmai jihsiphai che.
Kümbouleibou che kho hao hübü ka ai ku?
Mühghaüei müteibü shousi shuong la kümlabü kümsilei akongko kila shanga ai kukei kho ngei hapa.
Haoei ajanjan pendou jembü jihsiphaia he maian kümbei; tokei haoei müteibü maangpona thon akibü jinkukei, kho khei yingsikei mütei khangbü ka thon sühko Mühghaüei kümbü jihsiphai ühü- penda.
Ngei ngekei khei haoen langkei ki shongko olinyolabü hoba maanga mailabü toje maibou ai aki.
Tokei mütpem weko jembü kümsilei pendoua shaula yunglabü hoba jembü kümsilei maibü pendouei maanga mailabü kho Mühghaüei müt la kubü jongsak ki.
Ngei ngekei, khei ai ong Mühghaüei kümlaje kho ponpen kilabü; khünei aikei ajin- yoenlabü hoba apla athük. Mütei hao to hatlabü lele Mühghaüei ho tegü kümsembei.
Tou kibü kho kian apa, hoba laobou dana kho Mühghaüei nyibou lamda.
Hobaje tokei ngei müh phanga matjemshang kho hapbei, khünei amaibü kikei, hoba sao- pobü kishangakei shabü kikei.
Ngei kü maangpona laukei, “Mühghaüei saopobü si amaibou mat jemlabü, aieilausi ajanjan pendou shanga hoba kümsilei weko shanga haoei jih che takletakei.”
Müteibü shousi shuong shanga ngei kü maang- pona laukei, khei haoen kho meisiau shuong tegü ong dogo lenla shanga Mühghaüei haoen takteida.

Aieilausi müteibü shousi shuong hoba meisiau shuong thu jeteitei, che lai haida kho tegü chekei haida. Haoen pendou hak hinbü che ong, hoba meisiau to aei müt to aikei aki; aieilausi pendou amlang ki.
Pendou kaoen che to ong hauda, pendou thamngu ka hoba pendou nyibou thamngu yeida.
Müteibü soushou thükaeto angda sai ayingsi meisiaueibü soushou kaomaang to atda dogo aoei ngekei?
Hibü mütei jembü kümaleia olinlabü to liman maibou ai aki dogo ngei hapbei; aieilausi hao phainei ai haüthükla kho to chühla aoei hao la lenenkei?

Tokei nyibou müh phanga shieikoe kümbü pendou hapbei hoba chühashi, shieikoebü shuong nyeksi hoba haoen haksotibü ao aki; haoen to shieikoebü aenei hau kikei, lausikei haoen maang haksotibü aokei akitei.
Hibü khoei langkei kibü aoyou tokei lang ki haoen toje haibü aoyou haia, haoen thu maibou dogo ngei dambei.
Haü, haosi ham toje maibou kho tou ao aki, aoei müh phanga kümbü kümsilei amaibü hapan achüh, hao maibou.
Kheijinei ngei ho hapbei, khei mütei jembü lepbou to nyekto shatbü danko kümsilei pendou hoba maangli maangsang pendou longda hokei amlang hoba yei- phai shibü che ong.
Ngoubüei haoeibü ik semda hoba jembü phe shauda.
Hübümangbü hoba yei shibüa ik penyi toje sangsembo ik khong che kibü maibou.
Nyibou ngei müh phanga amlangbü che hapbei.

Müt che ao hao thenbou aki, haü, shousi ayingsi jaisinakei aki, khei yingsikei haoei kümbü thon aki ayingsi haoei kibüei hao nyekmang ashen, hibü ao shanga ngei hakso akiko kümsilei kümda? dogo haoei ladangkei apheda. Hokei amlang kongkong ki, haü, hokei maang leilubü che hübümangbü ki.
Che toje penyi maibou aieilausi haoenei kümbü shanga mu maibü kia.
Aieilausi haosi tuongalonga hao meitangbou cheei hao phonlabü; lausikei mütpem kibou ügütü; ladang hao tuonglaje hao phonla ao aki.
Tokei müt nyi liko yepsi haosi lematham ki, lausikei mütpem kila thüksikei müt nyi khulimbo haoei lan athüklabü. Janglüh pem sem shiyobüje tongde athetda.
Jaishou songsido akibü Choba che aoei chemphang songlen ngüh sungletla angekei hao toje shalebü songsido kibü heshou che maibou.
Aishanga sanglea hao shalebü yingasikei thüngshang ka haoei Choba setshang sühkei.
Müh phanga langkeibü hoba heshouboueikei aoei Choba jeila kikei, pendou ngei hapa.
Müt pendou wesikei awekhümbo kikei: haoen pendou thüka hao kikei. Lausikei phaila loubü shuongei hao to aolinlabü, maimaitham hokei amlang hoba yei shieibü ong.
Mühghaüeibü chem to haujinei no maangsangko paiashi; aishanga songsido akibüeibü lembü kubü toje ditla nyangko haubü maibou, aieilausi haoenei amaibü kümda dogo haoenei angekei.
Kaibü sembung pitpitbü hoba Mühghaü thedanga ngühlaula kaibü maangpon tepantei, aishanga Mühghaü khuthüka kia hoba no kaodaka kia, hibü kaibü ngüh shisho ong yingshi.
Aieilausi kümsilei juong ka mangh che longda, hoba ngoubüloubü ngüh danko songsido akibü ngüh longda.
Ladang nyi Mühghaü to theletbü che theletlaje kho tongde küman apashi; aieilausi songsido akibü to hao olinko aki. Nyi theletbü kho kümashi.
Theletan akümbü khantoje nyi atheletbü maibou.

Kaibü sembungei no shatilabü lele ngüh telau, ayingsi nyi khuthük hangangbü to shed shona dogo telau, khei ayinglonga Mühghaüei kaibü ngüh khulimbo maangpoklabü, kaibü ikküm ikleiei mautikulep aying lo?
Aishanga mangh juong yeijinei ngüh kongkong juong longda; lausikei nyi Mühghaü to hatashi.

Nyi kaonyeka shale jongle shieikoebü hapalonga hoba ngühmai matjem hoba matmaibü hibü- youbüei jungan haubü hapalonga khünei maang tepang, aieilausi yaangbü dogo weeibü to thükkabou che kia, hoba haoen to thükkabou ki.
Lausikei kaodakeibü ku kho pendou shanga ki; Choba khokei sek khoei samda.
Aoei nam to sanouda, namei nyek ashenlabü, aoei nyaksinam sanouda, nyaksinamei nyek ashenlabü, ho amlang ki.
Ladang peisilei shuong aei haada, shaubü shuongkei aei haada, hoba nyekei chühbü to liman bunyubou kho ai ku ki?
Hansho ong shausikei, juong shausikei sekmoubü shuong nyeket louko yepda, lausikei keibüei apsileko kibü shangakei hao nyeket alouda.
Müh phanga maangto shatlabü che ngei hapa, khei nyaksinam bunyu lean phobü kho hao khonkula ong.
Hobaje khübü nyaksinam kho amaibü atei mautida hoba hao nashou cheeibü bou la yeijinei haoeibü ika ai aki.
Nyueibü shimong ka longbü tegü nyibou mütkong haulabü hoba haoei ika jungan haulabü lele haoei kümbü ku ai ajunglabü.
Hobaje tokei maangto shatlabü amaibü che kia, hao lai loukei kho tegü hao haulabü. Hibü haoei yei shieibü ka ai pailetkei?
Haoei salang sünga haoei nakthüh hoba maangto shatbüa dantia, hoba haoeibü senyühsheibü shat hoba maangshat ong aei.
Chühashi, ai maibü hoba janbü ki kho ngei hapa. Mühghaüei kubü langkei salang tuisho khümbo müh phanga haoei kümbüa maanga maiko shaula yunglabü, aieilausi kho müteibü thu ki.
Mütpem weko ao la Mühghaüei nyaksinam hoba keisiyaang kukei hoba kho shaula hau kukei, hoba haoeibü thu sungletla hoba haoei kümbüa olinbü haplabü ho Mühghaüeibü jongsak ki.
Aieilausi haoei haoeibü salang chalou juongje adamenlabü, aieilausi Mühghaüei haoeibü maangpon olinbüa phokuda.
Müh phanga ngei amaibü che hapbei, hoba kho khunak shousi thüka atshaibü ki;

müt la Mühghaüei nyaksinam kibükeibü hoba nyensang nyenhang kukei, khei haoei mangsühbü aieikei sha alelabü lele khei yingsikei haoei kho shaula Mühghaüei sei aku, lausikei yenbou cheei kho shauda, ho amlang hoba ho shat amaibü che ki.
Müt cheei shousi müt saongao buksi hoba po juong hao salangko kisi, lausikei hao songadoa maibü akilonga, hoba aeila leko hao khünshang akilonga ngei laukho, khei hao nasaka haibü maibou.
Aieilausi hao amlang yeida hoba nakthühshang to hauda, hoba haoeibü nyen nakthüh phanga keplepan kia.
Kho to aei khoei chanyu kho ühüp, ayingsi ai angekei; lausikei hao toje kho hakso kibou.
Haü, hao po hajar nyithüng kiasikei hoba maibü ühüplonga pendou kaoen che to ong hauda aying lo?
Mütei kümbü pendou haoeibü sembung to jinla ong, khei yingsikei haoeibü shi ashenda.
Songsido akibü to songsido kibü shuong ainei maibou? Ayingsi langkei kibü yoa paila ngebü shalebüei ai ki?
Maikuko maangtakbü toje nyekei ongkei hapbü maibou, hokei amlang hoba yei shieibü ong.
Ai ong yeijung loua, nyen nyenkua, hoba müt kho ai ngebü ong, hoba hao to kaangbousekbou haoei athüklabü.
Ngüh aei lau, amlang aei yei, dogo hoba müt kho aiei maibou?
Aieilausi hao amlang langkei salang tuisho mangshoubü che tegü danjung haujinei müt shanga jembü langkeia ai maikei kho aoei ngekei? Aieilausi mühnyu phanga haoeibü phejan ai yinglaje aoei ngekei?
Nyen maibü kho namseklaang tokei maibou; hoba hainyet kho buknyet to maibou.
Lemlibü chem to haubü toje manghaapbü chem to haubü maibou, aieilausi müt pendou thonshang kho ki, hoba langkei kibüei haoeibü maanga kho haüko pholabü.
Maangto shatlabü kho ekyonyiyobü toje maibou aieilausi the angesakbüei maangponje olintida.
Songsido kibü maangpon kho manghaapbü chema kia; lausikei songsido akibü maangpon kho lemlembü chema kia.
Songsido akibüeibü chia ditbü toje songsido kibüeibü hakbü ditbü maibou.
Aishanga chakmaanga jak tühko laibü him songsido akibü ekyonyiyobü kho ki; hokei ai jim akibü.
Maimaitham shieikoebüei songsido kibü ngoubü la yeitida, hoba besa anyemei maangpon yongtida.
Khangjineibü toje thonbüa maibou; hoba natenbü soushou kho yonglambü soushou toje maibou.
Khauangla tepantei, aieilausi khauangbü songsido akibü khukua kia.
“Tou toje aila shangied maibou?” dogo nyi tephe, aishanga ho shangabü ho nyi songsido kibüei pheda aying.
Phetphan yoa songsido kibü kho maiakei, haü, chanyu hapbü shuong shanga ho maibou ki.
Aieilausi songsido kho nam tegü khümet angetlabü ki, khei songsido khoei kho khümenan phoda.
Mühghaüeibü kümsilei kho daman chühashi, khei haoei sükan kümbü aoei tangtienkei?
Sangmai hakso chaloua olinko kiashi, hoba khonku onat chaloua daman chühashi; khei mütei hao phainei ai haüthüklaje alamenlabü lele Mühghaüei chekei chekei kümbei.
Habü pendou ngei ngeibü kongbü langkeia hapa; saopobü müt che hao saopobüa mauda, hoba amaibou müt che jembü kümsilei amaibü kümbo salang louko hauda.
Yonganje tesaopo, ayingsi no lolo yongan songsido teki, aieilausi nyi no lolo leilulabü.
Yonganje amaibü kümbou teyei ayingsi no lolo saopobü teyei; kaibü jih asühjinei no aila haila?
Nyi ho senetan phosi maikei, kho kakei kaibü ik teliti; aoei Mühghaü to hatda khübü pendou ka satenlabü.
Sangnyu chenei songdakbü an toje songsido kibü shanga songsido khoei hau aei kuda.
Maimaitham kaodaka sao- pobü kümbo ladangkei shabü ashonbü müt maibü che ongkei aki.
Mütei laubü ngüh pendouaje maang teku, khei ayinglonga kaibü sambüei ka to khükbüokbü ditousi amaibula.
Aieilausi nyikei kho tegü lubü tokei khükaoka dogo kaibü maangponei ngekei.
Habü pendou ngei ngeibü songeidoei takteikei; ngei laukei, “Ngo songbüdobü yeilabü”, lausikei kho kü ka aeibou saan kikei.
Ai ki kho saabüa kia, hoba aeibou haülangtham, aoei kho lamenla?
Ngei ngela hoba lamla hoba songsido lamla hoba li pendou phanla hoba khüpbülangbü kho songsido akibü kümsilei hoba songsido akibü kho langet angbü dogo lamla ngei maang kukei.

Yaksa aoeibü maangpon sung hoba tak hoba saoeibü ika khühbü yangmen tegü ki, sao kho haibü tokei khauekbü dogo ngei hapbei, aoyouei Mühghaü maang haitida sao ka satenlabü, lausikei shabü shuong saoei laplabü.
Chühashi, ngei ho hapa dogo Songlendolenbouei lauda, den che to takteiyoko longbü kho ngela shanga,
ngeibü haiyepei athakko lambei, lausikei ühüp; hajar yoa ngei bousu che hapbei, lausikei khübü pendou yoa yaksa che ongkei ngei ühüp.
Chühashi, ngei ho ong hapbei, khei Mühghaüei khunak shousi tangshaitham kümbei, lausikei haoenei juong lamena.
Ao songnge dongebü phatko ki? Hobaje aoei wanenbü lamenkei? Müt che songsidoei haoeibü thenyek ngesaktida hoba haoeibü thenyek atshaibü kho jakshaitida.
Ngei thungeijangeida, Mühghaü to theletbü shanga dambo Chobaei sakkubü ditashi.
Hao jungka satla tepantei, hoba amaibü kümaleia tekausak; aieilausi hao junga maangangbü haoei kümda.
Aieilausi Chobaeibü ngüha sei kia; hoba aoei hao to, “No ai kümda,” dogo lauenkei?
Aoei ngühkhüm jungeida, amaibü ai akühshuoklabü, hoba songsido kibü mütei maibü amaibü janenbü jihsiphai ngekei.
Aieilausi khunak shousi khonku khonsak yaang kiasikei, ajanjan pendoua jih che hoba matjem kia.
Aieilausi phaila ai haüthükla haoei angekei; aishanga kho khei haüthükbula dogo aoei hao la lenenla?
Müt aoeibü ikakei soushou senetan phola hau aki, ayingsi haibü chalou thüka haoeibü sei aki, wapyoa aokei asattida ayingsi hao la kubü amaibü ka hao alongtilabü.
Ho mühnyu phanga kümbü kümsilei pendoua ngei chühjinei ngei hapa, jih che kia, ladang müt cheei hao khonkutila shanga lubü che thüka songdakda.
Kho to limbo ngei amaibou kaoa khünbü hapbei, haoen saoposhang ka at long dogo kikei, hoba sangnyua haoenei amaibü kümbü shanga nyen sangkei. Khokei amlang.
Aieilausi kümsilei amaibü shuokenbü shanga shieikoe panteiko akümnyu kümsilei amaibü kümla müteibü shousi shuong maangpon kaangkosekko yeia.
Shabü müt cheei kümsilei amaibü saongao penko kümbo hao salanga tegükei, lausikei ngei maisho ngekei khei Mühghaü to souhatbü shuong aoyouei hao to soumo hatda, haoen maiphang.
Lausikei amaibü shuong shanga seklabü ayingsi haoeibü salang mangshoubü che tegü ashinglabü aieilausi haoei Mühghaü to ühütda.
Kaodaka haüthükbü amlang kümsilei che kia, khei saopobü müt to amaibü kümbü to tegü kühshuokda, tokei müt amaibü to saopobü müteibü kümsilei tegü kühshuokda. Ngei lauda, khei khokei amlang ong.

Hibü ngei aukabü kuda, aieilausi müh phanga müt che shauko yungko olinko kilabü to maibou aikei aki; aieilausi kho haoeibü langkei, laobou kaodaka Mühghaüei kukei, kho shanga hao yoa haoei kümbü pendoua kilabü.
Ladang songsido ngela hoba kaodaka kümbü kümsilei shuong ditenla shanga ngei maangkukei change nangnak ayep.

Kheijinei ngei Mühghaüeibü kümsilei pendou hapbei, khei müh phanga kümbü kümsilei kho mütei lamenla athük, aieilausi ho ditenla mütei latetche haujemlaje jemsikei haoei kho ühüplabü, haü, khüto liko songsido kibü cheei ho ngekei dogo laua tegükei haoei kho alamenlabü.

Khübü pendou ngeibü maanga künjinkei, khübü pendou takteiko khei saopobü shuong si hapbü ngebü hoba haoeneibü kümsilei Mühghaüeibü ika kia; ho sanoubü yingkeisi mangsenbü, mütei angekei; haoen thedanga pendou amlangbü ong.

Pendoueibü thonshang che ong, khei sao- pobü si asaopobü, maibü si amaibü, hinseibü si ihinseibü, lembüsabü kubü si akubü. Theletlanletbü si thelalanla hatbü dan tegütham; müt maibü si shabü müt yoa jetei ong ki.

Müh phanga kümbü pendoua ho amaibü che ki, khei pendou jungto thu jetei louda; haü, tokei müteibü maangpon amaibüei shenakei, hoba haoen kijinei ngoubüloubü sensimaang haoeneibü maangpona ki, kho phaia haoen haishang to hauda.
Lausikei langkeibü pendou to phenyoan kibou maanglem kia, aieilausi lang kibü kei kho haibü molosaonyu che to khaibou.
Aieilausi langkeibüei haoen hailabü dogo ngekei; lausikei haibüei ai angekei, hoba haoen touje mukei aki; aieilausi haoeneibü damenbü kho maua.
Haoeneibü sanoubü, haoeneibü mangsenbü, hoba dühbü touje maua; hoba mühnyu phanga küman kibüa aineikei haoeneibü phejan hansho ongkei aki.
Hauashi, kaibü shausiyung olinko shauashi, hoba kaibü ih olinbü seneimaangei yungashi, aieilausi Mühghaüei kaibü kümsilei shuong sungletda.
Kaibü neisimei ponpen thupaitham phoshi, hoba kaibü khua onang auko kitishi.
Haoei müh phanga ka la laobou yak kukei, kaibü leshang akibü salang sünga nyi sanoubü yoa olinko kishi; aieilausi mühnyu phanga langkeia hoba ai kümaleia ong nyi kümlaje kho kaibü phejan.
Aiong kaibü ikei kümla thüklaje, nyi kümashi, aieilausi no haushang yemsanga kümsilei ayingsi damlabü ayingsi hapbüngebü hoba songsido ai aki.

Nyibou mühnyu phanga kho ngei hapbei, khei laangyobü kho sobüsepbü shanga aying, lason kho hauki yaangkibü shanga aying, ayingsi shausiyung kho songbüdobü shanga aying ayingsi nyaksinam kho haiyep akbou shanga aying; ayingsi janbümubü kho maangli maangsang shanga aying, lausikei chalou jihsiphai haoen pendou to haüthükda.
Aieilausi mütei haoeibü jihsiphaikei angekei; huonsiyou kibü ngau taka minbü tegü, hoba ausiyuk minbü tegütham mütkei lapda.
Ngei tokei mühnyu phanga songsido tetsida che hapbei hoba kho kü shanga yaangbü che dogo chühenkei.
Sangnyu hanbüa müt shisho ong kikei, hoba kho khulimbo Choba yaangbü che loukei hoba komlepbei hoba kho khulimbo lapheishon yaangbü kümbei.
Khünei shalebü songsido kibü che kikei, hoba haoeibü songsido danko sangnyu kho khümenkei, lausikei aoeikei kho shalebou kho adamen.
Lausikei ngei laukho, “Songsido kho hau tokei maibou, khei yingsikei shalebou songsido kibü kho aweasüngda, hoba haoeibü ngüh aditda.
Songbüdobü ngüh hangsho ditbü kho songsido akibü shuong thüka songdakbouei kaang ngekbü tokei maibou.
Songsido kho lasona insiaubu tokei maibou lausikei shabü müt cheei maibü juong mautida.”
Meishou haibüei ponlem hibü kümboueibü moli nyaülüm hitida; kho tegü songsido akibü hanbüshou cheei songsihon hoba nyenhang shopmauda.
Songsido kibou kho maiphei to hauda, lausikei songsido akibü maangpon kho nanae to hauda.
Haü, tokei ladang songsido akibü lamnyua paida, haoei aditenda, hoba haüyobü weko to ngo ngoubü dogo lenda.
No khulimbo songdakbou khau angsi kaibü younak tejeilei; aieilausi sangsembo kibüei shedbü yaangbü kho songoktida.
Mühnyu phanga songdakbü shuongei mashikbü ka longbü tegü amaibü che ngei hapbei.
Songsido akibü thükkabou setshanga setjinei songsido kibü phangkabou setshanga setda.
Ngei Choba shuong kaoa youei paiko hapjinei, sambüyaübü shoujitshou shuong koli taka setan hapbei.
Aoei püngkhün thuda hao khüto atetda, hoba aoyouei kümthang khapyetda pinyuei hao to püplabü.
Aoei laang thüngda, khoei hao leilulabü, hoba aoei bu shenda khünei thushed kia.
Wou kho nyenalonga hoba haoei in kho aulonga hao aei hau jemjan, lausikei khei leiyeila shanga songsido khamda.
Hao amüjinei pinyuei püpalonga kheijinei mübou shanga ku aki.
Songsido kibüeibü ngüh khoka onoubü longda, lausikei soungouabü sembung khopei hao suida.
Haoeibü ngühlau khangbü kho ngoubüloubü hoba haoeibü ngühlau thonbü kho langet angbü ki.
Songsido akibü mütei ngüh phopan lauda, lausikei mütei ai laulaje angekei, hoba hao phainei ai haüthüklaje aoei hao to lenenla?
Songsido akiko kümbü khoei hao hütimangtida, aieilausi haoei sangnyu to atlabü lam angekei.
Kaibü Choba nashou yingalonga hoba kaibü songdakbü shuongei ngeyang sühko lem lialonga, O kaodak, ka shanga ügütü!
Ladang kaibü Choba yaangenbü phang yinglaje, hoba ladang kaibü songdakbü shuongei jaakla shanga aying, lausikei hau kila shanga jiha- phaia ong shaula yunglaje, O kaodak, ka shanga olinlabü.
Haulohaushedbüei chemdak shemyettida; hoba akümaleibüei lang sangtida.
Ekyonyiyola shanga lem kho lida, hoba ihei langkei kho olintida, hoba pendou shanga nam apsileda.
Kaibü maang- ponei ongkei Choba to tekhüktüok; hoba kaibü shen kakei tekhüktüok; aieilausi mühkabü au shuongei kaibü ngüh kho thonlabü, ayingsi kaakyembü shuongei kho lenlabü.
Kaibü shausiyung kho deitaka phinashi; aieilausi nyi chalou juong kian kho hapmeilabü.
Phejan nyet la, khei set la sühko janashi, aieilausi kaodaka ai amaibü loushedlaje nyi angekei.
Sangmei kho deiei shenan kialonga haoenei kaodak to lang loutida, hoba bulong kho lae aeto tuonglaje khünei hao kilabü.
Aoei chamai langmai chüheilaje haoei sek ashaplabü; hoba aoei sangmei to chühko khüplaje haoei you alatlabü.
Nyi yeilam angebü tegü, ayingsi yaksaei nasetshanga nashoueibü lo kho lai chingda angebü tegü kho maimai Mühghaü aoei pendou kümda haoeibü kümsilei kho nyi angekei.
Ngeyang kaibü youli kho phinashi, hoba chasem kaibü ik tesenet, aieilausi laobou lilabü mailaje, ho si kho ayingsi penyiham kho jetei mailaje nyi angekei.
Maimaitham ngesakbü kho teibü hoba nyekei chanyu to chühlabü kho maanga mailabü ki.

Haü, müt che kaodaka po juong salangko kialonga, khübü pendoua hao olintiashi, lausikei hao la nakthühbü chalou shuong damentiashi; aieilausi khübü khokei juong yinglabü. Loula kibü pendou amlang ong ki.

O mütaobou, no mütao jiha olinashi; no mütao jiha kaibü maangponei no thungei jangeitiashi, hoba kaibü maangponei leibü aeto hoba kaibü nyek to loubü ae hauashi, lausikei ho ngeashi, khei khübü pendou shanga Mühghaüei no matjemlabü.
Hibü kaibü maangpon ka maangmau onat apashi, hoba kaibü mang ka khonsak khonku sungenashi; aieilausi no nashouabü hoba mütao langkei kho amlangbü ki.
No mütaoa no Kümbou damenashi, ayinglonga chalou amaibü shuong louan, hoba po kho danjung loujinei nyi laulabü, “Ngei habünei maanga mailabü aki.”
Ayinglonga chanyu kho hoba ngesakbü kho, hoba litnyu kho, hoba khanshoulitshou shuong kho nakthühtham aplabü, hoba lang louan phaia sangmei onshailabü.
Kho chaloua chem lombü shuong lühlabü, hau kibü mütshuongei khüpetlabü, hoba shemshibü shuong nanglabü, aieilausi haoen shisho ong yeikei; hoba koulom ka chühbü shuongeibü nyek yuian apbei.
Hobaje khonga kou khinlabü, ladang shemshibü ngühlang koungailaje, hoba müt cheei au wibü ditan moklaje, hoba chia laubü nouyangshou shuong shijung ngailaje,

haü, thükaenei ai ki khüto haoen hatda, hoba lama haoen hatlamoklabü kilabü; hoba almond bulong pon punglabü, hoba koksüng lulu lolo thopjung ngaida hoba mangsüh maangdak akilabü, aieilausi müt ponpen kishang to hauda hoba manghaapbü shuong khong- yaanga shoongaida,
chandinam namlüh athettoua, honeibü phauyaang aphetnyinjinei, ayingsi kailong you yungdeia aleilujinei.
Hobaje shaangla kibü tegü thamngu kho kao to sepeida, hoba soushouje kubou Mühghaü jungto ong ngailabü.
Lejim akibü yoa lejim akibü, Songlendolenbouei lauda, pendou lejim aki.
Songlendolenbou kho songsido kibü ong aying, haoei mütshuong to hapbüngebü lenkei, haü, haoei seret hauan chühko takteiko hoba lambo tetenshuokenbü juong yenei yenko yoshaikei.
Songlendolenbouei ditmangsühlabü ngüh shuong hapla lambei hoba tangshaitham ngühmai ngüh dokei.
Songsido kibü ngüh kho aubu tegü, hoba sanlombü cheei yoshaian kubü songbüdobü ngüh kho kojal kaangkhühtham thüngbü phatkei.
Kü shou, khüto yoko ho lauda, maangsangashi; le juong kümsi thon aki, hoba ditletla yongko lambü kho phe hübümangbü ong.
Thonbü kho ho, pendou ditan chüha; Mühghaü to hatashi, hoba haoeibü ngühkhüm jungeiashi, aieilausi mütei kümlabü kümsilei pendouei khüjo kho ong.
Aieilausi maibü yingsikei, amaibü yingsikei, huan kibü pendou yoa Mühghaüei kümsilei pendou mat jemlabü.
Solomon Chiashuong yoa shanenbü.
Aiwaü, haoeibü sembung shepbüei
haoei kü to sheptimang sühdaü!
Aishanga ih toje kaibü sanou maibou!
Nyi naangbü onang shuonga maibü ponlem che kia.
Kaibü nyen onang yeian jinkubü tegü kia;
hibü khoei medei shuongei ka to sanouda.
Ngo kaphai to loutishi; sen panteikho,
chiaei ngo haoeibü shemjang to leian atakei;
ka to khünei olinangko hoba olinyoko kilabü.
Ih toje kaibü sanou aei yaangentilabü;
haoenei maimaithamei ka to sanouda.
O Jerusalem nouyang shousi shuong;
Kedar neichem shuong tegü, Solomon thangtet nei tegü,
ngo nakthühbü ki lausikei hemaibü.
Ngo nakthüngan yeibü shanga kü to techüh,
aieilausi chanyuei kü to aujiauko juokkei.
Künyueibü shousi shuongei kü to khauangko kikei;
Haoenei kü la semlüh laak lomtikei;
lausikei ngeibü semlüh sekje ngei achüh!
Kü soushouei sanoubou no kü la lenshima.
Kaibü sanshuong dan nyi lan lamshautida;
chajihboua nyi haoen lan haksotida?
Aishanga kaibü jenabou shuong san shuong ngangko shoongaibü
che phatko aila ngo kila?
Nyi angelonga, O yaksa yoa hemaisaomainyu,
san shuong youmoa paiashi.
Hobaje kaibü san shoushou shuong sanlombou neichem shuong
nyangko lamshautiashi.
Ngei sanounyu, Faraoeibü tongjina koli saoen che yoa
nyi no takteida.
Kaibü omlang kho chimenei janetnyu;
kaibü ngüm honeibü yakpitei he maietnyu.
Künei ka la honeibü hele, chandinam jinkuan kümbulabü.
Choba hao jembü Choba setshanga setan kijinei,
ngeibü ponlem onangei jembü sanglem hautikei.
Ngei sanounyu kho, langyang sünga ngeibü khukua lengjinei,
ponlem onang thungdou che phatkei.
Kü la ngei sanounyu kho, Engedi semlüh seka,
henna chipen tongbü she che phatkei.
Chühashi, no hemaisaomai, ngei sanounyu;
chühashi, no hemaisaomai, kaibü nyek dukutuk phatkei.
Chühashi, no hemaihaangmai, ngei sanoubou.
Oh, lai maangdühlabü che!
Setieibü shen sangtüngshoko kia.
Setieibü chem phokhüm kho cedar bu ki;
setieibü kebung kho busim bu ki.
Ngo sharona kibü jakchipen,
pholi kaodaka kibü leilang khüpbong chipen che ki.
Jak shuong yoa leilang khüpbong chipen che phatko,
medei shuong yoa ngei sanounyu kho ki.
Lamang bunyu yoa shongbe long tegü,
kho heshou shuong yoa ngeibü sanoubou ki;
olinbü yaangbüei ngo haoeibü yeme koubü phanga setkei.
Hobaje haoeibü buhek ngeibü sembunga maian kikei.
Haoei ngo lemlibü chem to leian loukei,
hoba kü thüka haoeibü nisan sanou kikei.
Semlüh hekeibü wentekei ngo hau kitikei,
shongbeei ngo haksotikei;
aishanga ngo sanouei semthetda.
Aiwaü, haoeibü nanae ik ngeibü khua aükei yingma;
hoba haoeibü mae ikei ngeibü khua hatkubü yingma!
O Jerusalem nouyangnyu shuong, ngei ho pheda khei,
hao aloen shongko kanei küsieibü sanou ashiletlabü,
dogo yama yaonyu ayingsi meishi saoen nyen phongko theletashi.
Ngei sanouboueibü ngühlang!
Chühashi, shongh limbo saiyeiko,
shongh shui peiko toman shatko hao louda.
Ngei sanoubou meishi tegü, ayingsi sap paang che tegü ki.
Chühashi, khünei küneibü kümthang takpheinei hao loda.
Haoei koulom ka chühan hautida;
kou khünyet danko haoei hao lolo lenda.
Ngo sanoubouei kü to joyoda.
Piashi, ngei sanounyu, ngeibü saomainyu, küyoa kaiya.
Aishanga ditashi, poang dana, langlou thaka;
kaodaka chipen tongda, auei chia laubü jihsiphai louakei;
hoba sen kaodaka dukutuk wiyobü ngühlang ditda.
Bhuklonga bhuk hekda, hoba semlüh shuong chipen pungakei;
haoenei sanglemhautida.
Meimeian kaiya, ngei sanounyu, ngeibü hemaisaomainyu.
O ngeibü guduru, laangbob maanga laanglip phanga,
kü la kaibü thenyek haptishi, kü la kaibü ngühlang dittikai;
aishanga kaibü ngüh teibü hoba
kaibü thenyek chühmang sühlabü che ki.
Setiei selong shuong, khei semlüh laak leilutibü
selong hanbü shuong lapshaikho;
aieilausi khübüei chipen bungbü seneibü semlüh laak leilukuda.
Ngei sanoubou kho ngeibü, hoba ngo haoeibü.
Haoei haoeibü sanshuong leilang khüpbong chipen yoa
lamshautida.
Ngeyangbü yeisangshou adankhüm shongko;
nakthüh adankhüm shongko ngei sanoubou kü jungto kangaia.
Hobaje yaüen pholia meishi shoushou che tegü;
ayingsi sak paangshou tegü louyoashi.
Ngo ngeibü shena yepjinei,
langyangbou ngei ngo sanoubou mangha likei;
lausikei ngei hao ühüp.
Ngo tou meimeilabü hoba sangnyu shoongko,
khongtanga khongji pheila nongeilabü.
Kü soushouei sanoubou hao ngei lamlabü;
ngei hao lambei lausikei ngei hao ühüp.
Lapheibü shuongei haoen sangnyu shoongko haujinei ngo hapbei.
Ngei haoen to phekei, “Kü soushouei sanoubou kanei hapakao lo?”
Haoen dansilengko kü soushouei sanoubou hao ngei hapbei.
Ngei hao hatlepbei, hoba künyueibü chem to
ngei hao aleiba shongko,
hoba ngo shia künbü saoeibü shemjang to leian alotshongko,
ngei hao aliti.
O Jerusalem nouyangnyu shuong, ngei ho pheda,
hao aloen shongko kanei küsieibü sanou ashiletlabü,
dogo yama yaonyu ayingsi meishi saoen nyen phongko theletshi.
Wankhük on che phatkotham,
ponlem hibü onang hoba jen ponlem hibü namseibü thenaang pendou
künan yam lam ka longbü kho ao?
Chühashi, ho Solomon, haoeibü Choba setshanga lengan louada;
Israela pendou to shanenbü sepai shuong,
khei sekokbü sepai saosem pienan ki.
Haoen pendou in shouan, wapyoa libünyenbü;
nangnak hatbümokbüei mütpem weko jembü pheloa
in shouan kikei.
Solomon Chobaei jembü lolo Lebanon buei shen kümbei.
Haoei khoeibü khamthung chandinamei kümbei.
Kho phaia honei kho setshang nakthüngan kibüei kümbei,
kho maangaenei Jerusalem nouyangnyu shuongei
lemangsühlabü che kümbei.
Meimeijung hauashi, O Zion nouyangnyu shuong,
hoba hao chemkanbü chaloua hao maangpon olinko kibü chaloua
haonyuei hao la hankubü Choba khun hanan kibü
Solomon Choba to chühashi.
No lai hemaikei, ngei sanounyu, oh lai hesisao maikei!
Kathangbou phainei kaibü nyek guduru phatko kia;
kaibü khulou Gilead shongh ka longbü lon shuong tegü kia.
Kaibü hauh sanshuong wi kipan mangyushang ka
longbüyam phatko kia;
haoen wekoei shoushou nyibang;
hoba haoen yoa che ongkei angkongbü ayokei.
Kaibü sembungkhop leiphe saklangbü tegü,
hoba kaibü joyolauyo paplepsele ki.
Kaibü omlang kaibü neikhui maanga chilang paknyinbü phatkei.
Kaibü ngüm kho Dawideibü laphei laangshong phatkei,
yakpit hajar juong yoa pemsemtham hoba lenglengtham;
laonei lakjaibü shuongeibü aih shuong anan phoda,
kho maimai ki.
Kaibü sen penyi kho leilang khüpbong yoa lamshaubü,
penyi phukan shatbü meishi saoen phatko ki.
Chalou alema shongko hoba nakthüh asatshongko,
ponlem hibü jen kibü shongh to,
hoba ponlem kibü shonghshou to ngo thünglabü.
No hemaisaomai, ngei sanounyu;
ka to aikei chühenlabü mak amaibü akakkei!
Kü yoa Lebanon Shongh ka kaiya, ngeibü chemkannyu.
Kü yoa Lebanon ka Amana Shongh khu ka,
Senir si Hermon khu ka,
molosaonyu laangbob ka, kongkhü shongh ka chühashi.
Nyi ngeibü maangpon solangkei hoba ngo maang kaangtikei,
nashounyu, ngeibü chemkannyu;
kaibü nyekei che chühan litibüei,
kaibü ngüm che sepeibüei,
nyi ngeibü maangpon kaangtikei.
Kaibü sanou lai maikei, nashounyu,
ngeibü chemkannyu!
Ih toje kaibü sanou latetche maibou!
Hobaje ponlem phang pendou toje
kaibü onang sanglem latetche maikei!
O ngeibü chemkannyu, kaibü sembung ka
naodei hap tegü teibü atda;
naodei si sendei kaibü lishanga thonakei;
hoba kaibü neisimei sanglem kho Lebanon sanglem tegü kia.
Nashounyu, ngeibü chemkannyu, lethetan kibü bamang che kia,
thangtetan kibü deikhün che, küplepan kibü deikük.
Kaaka longbü chilang hek, bamang buhek deihek maibü;
henna ponlem hibü bunyu shuong.
Ponlem hilabü hoba khangbü nyak, naanglabü nai
hoba bunai, bu yoa ponlem hilabü;
jen hoba khühkhühbü nai, kongnyu ponlem pendou.
No deikük bamang che, langkeibü deikhün che,
hoba Lebanon ka koubü dei ki.
Piashi, O yungthang yei; hoba souashi, no yungkük yei;
ngeibü bamang thüka haoeibü ponlem longtikei!
Kü thangbou haoeibü bamang to lottiashi,
hoba haoeibü buhek maibü shautiashi.
Ngo ngeibü bamang to lotakei, nousina, ngeibü chemkannyu.
Ngei ngeibü ponlem hibü hoba balsam ponlem yoshaiakei;
ngei ngeibü naodei, naodei khüh yoa shaua;
ngei ngeibü ih sendei yoa yunga.
O thangbou shuong, shauashi, yungashi,
haü, sanouei ajaakshongko yungashi!
Ngo yepbei, lausikei ngeibü maangponje pietlemetnyu kikei.
Chühashi, ngo sanoubouei koukapa kuokeiko mangh likei.
Kü la ipbuashi, nousina, ngei sanounyu;
ngeibü guduru, ngeibü bennyu sounyu.
Aishanga ninei ngeibü khu nemakei.
Ngeibü khu nangnakbü deihakei nemakei.
Ngei ngeibü mangyuk hangleda, ngei kho lai yukngaila?
Ngei ngeibü you saka, ngei khübü kho lai mak kaktila?
Ngei sanoubouei ik kou khünyet to phekattikei,
hoba kü maangpon maang aenei laakko kikei.
Ngei sanoubou la ipbula ngo pikei,
hoba ngeibü ik ponlem hibü saangan apbo naanglepan,
hoba ngeibü ikjishou ponlem hibü dei koukhinjina saangkei.
Ngei ngeibü sanoubou la ipbukei,
lausikei ngei sanoubouje ngaian kikei,
haoei joyojinei ngeibü soushou semjung haukei.
Ngei hao lambei, lausikei ngei hao ühüp,
ngei hao ngakei, lausikei haoei ajongai.
Sanglombü shuong sangnyu pheiko haubü shuongei ngo hapbei,
haoenei kü to ngümbei, haoenei kü la ngüman aktikei;
kümthang lombü shuongei ngeibü neisimei sunglangkei.
O Jerusalem nouyangnyu shuong, ngei kan la sakkuda,
kanei ngei sanoubou hapalonga, kanei hao to
ngo sanouei shatda dogo lenkushi.
O yaksa yoa hemai saomainyu,
Nyi kü la hai sakkulabü lele lubü to latetche aeikei?
Nyi sanoubü lubü sanoubou to aian ai aeibou ki?
Ngei sanoubouje hajar an yoakei shetenbou, lanthükbou
hoba pendou yambou ki.
Haoeibü khu hon maibou tham ki;
haoeibü khulou aukhomakmak tegü nakhütham
wi shangtüngtham ki.
Haoeibü nyek shumang nyangko kibü guduru shuong phatko,
sendeiei mangyuan paplepshoule tentian ki.
Haoeibü omlang sanglem longbü balsam chipen tegü kia;
haoeibü sembung khop leilang khübong chipen tegü,
ponlem hiko yanletbü phatko ki.
Haoeibü ik shuong saa angko namseklaang tenan phobü
hon ikjikhap tegü ki;
haoeibü mang safir namseklaang jinbü
thunyu hauhei kümbü tegü ki;
Haoeibü you shuong ninulaang thaonyu hon maibü
haüyetbü to lonettibü tegü ki.
Haoeibü sembungkei jankei janetshouko;
haü, hao pendoua maisapbei.
Ho ngei sanoubou ki, hoba ho küthangbou ki,
O Jerusalem nouyangshou shuong.
Ngei sanoubou lato satan apbei, O no yaksa yoa hemai saomainyu?
Ka yoa hao lamla sen haulabü lele nyi sanoubou
laeto sepeinyu satkei?
Ngei sanoubou haoeibü bamang to sanglem hishang to,
bamanga lamshautila hoba leilang khüpbong chipen pakla yanakei.
Ngo ngo sanouboueibü hoba ngo sanoubou ngeibü.
Haoei haoeibü sanshuong leilang khüpbong chipen yoa lamshautida.
O ngei sanounyu, no Tirza tegü hemaisaomai,
Jerusalem tegü mainyu.
Nisan jungbü sepai tan tegü hatla moklabü.
Kü ka kaibü nyek sepeinyu apashi;
aishanga haoenei ngo naklepda.
Kaibü khulou lonshuong dan che,
Gilead shongh ka louyenbü phatko ki.
Kaibü hauh sanshuong mangyushang ka longbüyam phatko kia;
haoen wekoei shoushou nyibang,
hoba haoen yoa che ongkei angkongbü ayokei.
Kaibü omlang kaibü neikhui maanga
chilang paknyinbü phatkei.
Chobasao saosem, hoba thangnyu saolei,
hoba medei aweenko ki.
Ngeibü guduru, ngeibü bennyu sounyu che ong kia;
haonyueibü shou sao ong, sao buknyu bennyu kho sao ong ki.
Nouyangnyu shuongei sao hapbei
hoba sao to haünyu dogo laukei;
Haü, Chobasao shuong hoba thangnyu shuongei
hoba haoenei sao sangkei.
Ngeyang tegü chühan litibü;
litnyu tegü hemaisaomai chanyu tegü sakteingesakbü,
nisan jungbü sepai tan che phatko hatla moklabü ho ao?
Yomanga momtham kibü semlüh tongda si atongda chühla.
Chilang chipen bungda si abungda chühla,
ngo buhek bamang lamjung yankei.
Ayingsi ngei angeko kijinei,
ngeibü soushouei ngei maangangbü
kü mütlieibü tongjin yoa ngo phokukei.
Sepeiashi, sepeiashi, O Shulambü.
Künei ka to chühlabü lele sepeiashi, sepeiashi.
Mahanaimbü tombülakbü to chühbü tegü,
aila kanei Shulambü to chühla?
O Chobaeibü nouyangnyu, youshang shangan
kaibü you lai he maikei!
Kaibü youshi auteilo namseklaang tegü,
ik peiseibü ikküm iklei tegü kia.
Kaibü shung kheiyobü ihei shaleko akibü thungshou phatkei.
Kaibü shimung leilang khüpbong chipenei kailepan kibü
youshou shang che phatko ki.
Kaibü sen penyi kho penyi phukan shatbü meishi saoen phatko ki.
Kaibü ngüm thunyu hauh lapheishon phatkei.
Kaibü nyek Heshbona Bath-Rabbim nyangko thüngdou tegübü kho ki.
Kaibü kung Damaska ae yeian kibü Lebanon lapheishon che phatkei.
Ka to kaibü khu kho Karmel shongh phatkei;
hoba kaibü khua kaibü khulou nakthüngan sakbü son phatkei.
Kho khulou shikbü khünei Choba kho langsenakei.
No lai hesisao maikei, lai maanga mailabü,
O sanounyu, maangpon ngesakla shanga!
Kaibü süngsilop, hekyang long phatko kia;
hoba kaibü sen semlüh shen phatko kia.
Ngei laukei, ngo hekyang long khüto nguilabü;
ngei khoeibü bheka ikphen lamlabü.
Kaibü sen kho semlüh shen tegü,
hoba kaibü haklüm hibü kho shongbe phatko yingshima;
hoba kaibü sembung kho ih maiboutham,
kü sembung si hau lematikei.
Jaakko teian kü sembung to atbü phatkei.
Ngo, ngo sanouboueibü ki,
hoba haoeibü maangdak kü aenei kia.
Kaiya, ngo sanoubou, seti khongthu cheto haukho;
hoba seti nangnak kho sanga otkho.
Seti enyu pian semlüh sek khüto tongde haukho;
semlüh sem longkeilaoje hoba hao bungdalaoje,
hoba chilang pon bungdalaoje setiei chühkho.
Khünei ngei ngeibü sanou ka la kukho.
Lüh kibü bu chipen shuongei sanglüm hautida,
hoba küneibü koukhün junga buhek deihek phang pendou;
hangbü si haanbü, ngei ka shanga phokuakei,
O ngei sanoubou.
O, no kho kü nyuei senyopbü,
ngeibü jaisina tegü yinga tegüje!
Ngei no khongaenei hapjinei, ngei ka to sembung shepoulabü;
haü, aoeikei kü la anyikuko kikhoulabü.
Ngei no leian haukhoulabü hoba no künyu chem to leibakhoulabü.
Saoei kü la song lenkhoulabü;
ngei ka la ngeibü chilang hek ponlem hibü ih yungtikhoulabü.
Haoeibü nanae ik ngeibü khu phanga kikhoulabü;
hoba haoeibü mae ikei kü to himyolabü.
O Jerusalem nouyangnyu shuong, ngei ho pheda,
Kanei küsieibü sanou ashiletlabü dogo theletashi.
Haoei sanoubou to nongan yam ka longshedbou ho ao?
Shongbe long phanga ngei no pitikei;
khünei kanyuei no bukkei,
laonei sao no bukla nabuk shatei shatko kikei.
Kaibü maangpona shangjinbü tegütham,
kaibü phema shangjinbü maimai ngo thüngtiashi.
Aishanga sanoubü kho haibü tegütham hau kia;
nyekto shatbü kho hee tegü onou aki.
Hoei wanlühei tegütham khitda,
hoba maangshat wanlongei maimai londa.
Dei juongei sanou ajonyeten,
ayingsi yungsenei kho nyemla athük.
Müt cheei sanou jekla jembü nyaksinam khümbo kuasikei,
hao la ong aei nyikulabü.
Küneibü na nashounyu che kia,
hoba sao la sen aki.
Sao chemdang yeila phebü chaloua,
künei sao shanga ai kümla?
Sao kümthang che tegüje,
künei sao thüka chandinam chem dangyokhoulabü.
Hobaje sao koukap che tegüje,
künei cedar bu shenpheiei thünglepbhoulabü.
Ngo kümthang che ki,
hoba ngeibü sen khoeibü lapheishon shuong phatko kia.
Ngo sanoubou thea ngo hakso hapnyu che tegü ki.
Baal Hamona Solomonei semlüh laak che ki.
Lombou shuongla hao sek kho kukei;
mütpem wekoei buhek shanga chandinam hajar chebang
sungbalabü kikei.
Ngeibü semlüh sek, laobou ngeibü ki, kü junga kia;
O Solomon, hajarei lela thükkei;
hoba aoyouei buhek lomda khübü kho soan lelabü.
No bamanga kibou, himshuongei kaibü ngühlang ditda;
kho kü la dittiashi.
Panteiashi, ngei sanoubou,
hoba ponlem hibü shongh thüka no meishi nyuyaang che,
ayingsi yao shoushou che phatko kilabü.
Uzzia, Jotham, Ahaz hoba Hezekia, Jihudabü Choba shuong haanga, Amozeibü shou Isaia, haoei Jihuda si Jerusalem shanga mangsang hapbü.
Ditashi, O mühshuong, nou haangashi, O kaodak! aishanga
Masu pongsuei jembü bunyu ngekei, hoba gaduei jembü bunyubou chem ngekei; lausikei Israeleije ngo angekei, kü mütliei aditenda.”
Shabü phang, shabü on künan kibü mütli, kümsilei amaibü kümbü lilabü, leilubü jungeibü shousishuong! Haoenei
Kan to ngümlabü lele toukei aila kanei aei aei khulimbo meimeila? Khu khümbo to shatda, hoba maangpon pendou yuida.
You youdem maang aeka khu sühko maian aki, moukhün, yingko ngümbü, hoba sii koubü mou ong, khübü kho aküplep, ayingsi khühkei akhüh, hoba onangei amaiti.
Kaneibü kaodak sangle phanga kia. Kaneibü sangnyu shuong wanei lonakei, kaneibü kaodak kan thedanga küksithangei suian aplabü hoba küksithang shuong nangan apbü tegü kho sangliphang la yeia.
Hobaje semlüh seka dipshou tegü, simou seka bangdip tegü, komlepan kibü sangnyu tegü, Zion nouyangshou apyoakei.
Hobaje lakjaibou
Kan Sodom songdakbü shuong,
“Kü shanga kaneibü lembü khüjoche ainei lela?” dogo
Kan kü thedang to loujinei, ngeibü chemso nakeila, ho kan ka aoei hikei?
Touje amlangbü lembü tejung, ponlem hibü kü shanga mangsenlabü ki; litnyu haanbü hoba Nounyet, thangyen ngashaibü, shabü hoba saopobü thangyen ngei chühko akien.
Kaneibü litnyu haanbü hoba lemsilang kü soushouei mangsenda; kü shanga khübü kho khonsaklabü ki, khübü khoei ngo oanjaakan apa.
“Hibü ladang kanei ik tuoklaje, ngei ngeibü nyek kan ka huan aplabü; kanei annepenko welausikei ngei aditlabü. Kaneibü ik siiei shenakei.
Kan sakan apashi, kan hinseian kishi, kü the ka kanei amaibü kümbü apashi, amaibü kümbü nangashi.
“Maibü kümla ditletashi, ngühmai jungeiashi, shieikoebü thangetashi, bou akibü la pü lekuashi, latnyu shanga ngühmai matjem laukushi.”
“Tou kaiya, hoba sen pendouei liko damanchühkho,” dogo
“Kanei hehoat kiko hoba ngüha lealonga, kanei kaonyudak ka maibü shaulabü.
Lausikei kanei ühsap dogo khulimbo meimeialonga inei kan suilabü, aishanga
Maanglembü sangnyu lai küman asangalan sao yeikei! Sao ngühmaiei shenan kikei, saopobü kishang sao to kikei, lausikei touje müt haitibü yeikei.
Kaibü chandinam namphet la yeiakei, kaibü ih dei to kheiyoan apa.

Kaibü songdakbü shuong khulimbo lobü shuong yeia, hoba kokbü shuongeibü jenabou yeia; müt- pem wekoei besa anyem sanouda, hoba ku phai semda; haoenei bou akibüeibü mat ajembuda, ayingsi haoen jungto loubü latnyu shanga ngühmaanglanbü akümda.
Hibü lakjaibou
Ngei kakhu limbo ngeibü ik sepeilabü, hoba kaibü namphet kaibü hokjunga tühnyintikulabü, hoba kaibü kheiyobü pendou hinseitikulabü, hoba kaibü namkung pendou sunglanglabü.
Shaangla tegütham ngei kaibü songdakbü shuong hoba shaangla tegütham kaibü damanchühlabü kümetkulabü; phaila ka to Saopobü sangnyu, Maanglemenbü sangnyu dogo ngalabü.”
Ngühmaiei Zion angthetlabü, hoba sao maangpon sepeibü shuong saopobüei khümenlabü.
Lausikei ngühkhüm leilubü shuong hoba shabü shuong shanga liko maulabü kilabü hoba aoyouei
Aishanga kanei maangdühbü yembü bulong shanga kan himoulabü, hoba kanei pienbü bamang shanga kan phenyembo kilabü.
Aishanga yik sembü yembü tegü, hoba dei akibü bamang tegü kan kilabü.
Kheijinei hauki yaangkibü mütshuongkei jiklabü bu tegü, hoba haoeibü kümsilei wanang phatko kilabü; hoba ham liko lonlabü, hoba kho aoeikei anyettienlabü.
Jihuda si Jerusalem shanga Amozeibü shou Isaiaei hapbü ngüh.
Thonbü chaloua ho haüthüklabü,
khei
shonghshou thüka tonenan phokulabü,
hoba phang pendou khüto nuyolabü.
Hobaje müt juongei hauan laulabü,
“Kan kaiya, Jakob Mühghaü chem to,
hoba haoei haoeibü lamnyu shuong sen la lenlabü,
hoba seneibü lamnyua sen paikho.
Aishanga Zion ka haoeibü lenbü shuong
hoba Jerusalem ka
Hobaje haoei phangshuong yoa matjemlabü,
hoba müt juong mat jemlabü;
hoba haoenei jembü inei shap, hoba aubuei hausao yaülabü;
phangei phang khulimbo in ajaplabü ayingsi haoenei
touje wapyola aditletlabü.
O Jakob chemdang, kaiya, senei
Aishanga haoei jembü mütli Jakob chung nangleda, aieilausi haoen chaangbou aekabü seibü- yaübü kümeileiei shena, hoba Filistiabü tegü huonseibüei shenakei, hoba küksithang yenbou to ik shenyoda.
Tokei haoen kaodak chandinam hoba honei shenakei, haoeneibü thanshang thon aki; tokei haoen koliei shenakei, haoeneibü kailong shuong thonsithak aki.
Haoen kaodak heangshoei shenakei, haoen jembü ikküm iklei haoenei lemda.
Hobaje akainyu shuong khüpettiakei, hoba yaangbü müt louyantiakei, khei yingbü khoei haoen la amai tüpbuma!
hatla moklabü jungka, hoba haoeibü soumo yaang soneikangbü ka laangbob to atshi, hoba thamngua no hushi.
Kui saabü to chühbü müt phangto louyantilabü, hoba yonglam lilibü müt phangto khüpjung yantilabü, hoba kho chaloua
Aishanga lilisesebü hoba yonglambü pendou khulimbo, hoba tonenan kibü pendou khulimbo,
Lebanona cedar bulong suokbü hoba tonenan kibü; hoba Bashan kabü yembu long pendou khulimbo;
hoba shongh suokbü pendou khulimbo, hoba shonghshou tonenan kibü pendou khulimbo;
hoba laangchem suokbü weko khulimbo, hoba thangetan kibü ba pendou khulimbo;
hoba Tarshish longchem pendou khulimbo maangli maangsang ikkümiklei pendou khulimbo.
Hobaje suokbü to angan kibü mütshuong senletlabü, hoba yonglam lilibü shuong phangto tonletlabü. Heangsho shuong lemailela dankhümlabü; khünyet chaloua
Hobaje ladang
Kho chaloua mütshuongei jembü shanga lemla kümbü jembüeibü chandinam heangsho shuong si honeibü heangsho shuong, haoenei somshou sompung hoba pak shuong thedanga tekan aplabü.
Hobaje ladang haoeibü hauei kaodak nyaakeila meimeilaje,
Kungkhün ka hak hinda dogo ong lang kibü müt to maanglem phobü ka nangashi; aishanga hao ai mu ki?
Aishanga, chühashi,
hau kibü müt hoba sepai, matjembou hoba thuseibü, manghdakbü hoba jaishou shuong.
Anjinsem thüka lajamleibou yaangbü müt songdakbü daman- chühbou, maangli maangsang müt senbabü, hoba seibü yaübü libü nyenbü.
Hobaje haoeneibü Choba lela ngei haoen la shousishuong kulabü, hoba nashou okjok shuongei haoen thüka songdaklabü.
Hobaje mütshuong cheei che, cheei che hoba mütpem weko jembü chempenei khonkutilabü; hoba nashousiei baushi thüka, hoba hanbüei yaangbü thüka jembü lolo yonglambo jungeilabü.
Müt cheei haoboueibü chema che senetan, “Nyi neisimei kia, no kün thüka songdakbou yeishi, hoba ho leilubü thüka ka maang leshi,” dogo laulabü jih che loulabü.
Lausikei kho chaloua haoei ngüh longko laulabü, “Ngo maitibou che aying, aishanga ngei chema shausiyung ayingsi neisimei aki; kanei ngo mütshuong thüka songdakbou ayeitijan.”
Aishanga Jerusalem leiluakei, hoba Jihuda tuongakei, aieilausi haoeneibü ngühang hoba haoeneibü kümsileiei
Matjemjinei haoenei haoen khu limbo kuda, Sodom phatko haoenei jembü shabü ngetida, kho huan aphoda, haoen jembü soushou shanga ügütü! Aishanga haoenei jembü to haoenei lolo amaibü küma.
Saopobü shuong shangaje maisho kilabü, aishanga haoenei jembüei kümbüleibü mai shaulabü.
Amaibou shanga ügütü! Hao shanga amaibü kilabü; aishanga haoeneibü ikkümiklei pailetbü haoen la ngaitikulabü.

Kü mütli shanga haoen shieikoebü shuong kho nashousi shuong kilabü hoba yaksa shuongei haoen thüka songdaklabü. Kü mütli shuong! Kan leiyeibü shuongei kan ayingbü to leida, hoba kan phai semlabü lamnyu mautida.
jembü mütli jaishou shuong hoba leiyeibü shuong yoa matjemshang to atlabü hoba laulabü, “Semlüh sek kanei kongkong aptikei, shalebü ka soshau soyungbü kaneibü ika kia.
Kü mütli ngümnyinbü hoba shalebüeibü thenyek nitnyinkulabü ho kan ai tetlabü? dogo lakjaibou
Toukei
Hibü
Kho chaloua
thok hoba chinyu hoba ngüma kaibü nei
khun hoba youkhap, senyak, ponlem thung hoba khüngkhap,
ikjikhap hoba kungkhap.
Lemsilang neisimei, mangyuk hangan jinan neilabü neisimei, namjin nyingkou,
jajalalabü neisimei, phembanei inyaibü, khuphai, neikhuyukbü nei sunglanglabü.
Hobaje kho khei haüthüklabü, ponlem jeila nyaülüm, senyak jeila jaklüh, khulou maibü jeiko khüngkhebü, hoba hangenbü neisimei jeiko senou nei, hemaisaomai jeiko himou kilabü.
Ka mütshuong inei hoba kaibü lakbühongbü shuong lasona tuonglabü.
Hobaje saoeibü bakhünei waanglabü hoba mang haaplabü, hoba sao litham kilabü hoba kaoa setlabü.

Hobaje kho chaloua yaksa müt nyetei bousu che hatlepan laulabü, “Künei jembü shausiyung shaulabü, hoba jembü neisimei neilabü, nyenei ong no küneibü lao dogo ngatishi; kün laolamla ohoubü himou kho apbuma.”
Kho chaloua
Aoyou Ziona apyoan ki, aoyou Jerusalema jouletan ki, Jerusalema lang kibü dan yoa doan kibü shuong pendou to saopobü dogo ngalabü.
Haoeibü seiei
Kheijinei
Hobaje chaloua lemabü ka yemekoubü shanga thangleplabü che, hoba yeinak si langtok ka satenshang che hoba huletshang che kilabü.
Ngei sanoubou shanga, haoeibü semlüh sek shanga ngei sanoubü chia ngei laukho.
Ngei sanoubou kaomai kibü shongha semlüh sek che kikei.
Hobaje haoei kho kaijembo khün thuan laang hean apbei,
hoba semlüh maibü kao khünei kekei,
hoba kho sekjia dip che dangkei,
hoba tokei khünei semlüh hek ngünshang kümbei;
hoba khoei semlüh hek hekkulabü dogo haoei maanglem kikei;
lausikei khoei yamkabü semlüh hek hekkukei.
Hibü tou, O Jerusalem bukmüt shuong hoba Jihudabü mütshuong, ngei sudajada, ngo hoba ngeibü semlüh sek kanglanga mat jembushi!
Ngeibü semlüh sek shanga ngei ai kümbei ho to aei tokei ai kümla? Khülonga, aila semlüh hek hapla maangleman kijinei haoei yamkabü semlüh hek hekkukei?
“Hibü tou, ngeibü semlüh sekei tokei ai kümla kho ngei kan la lenkho; kho ka ngei jakba lühan aplabü, hoba kho mei la au la shaukhümtilabü.
Hobaje kho ngei apmeilang lelabü, kho yotan üplabü ayingsi kütko amoulabü; lausikei khünei jak angbü bushem hoba jaklong yemtilabü; toukei lang ayantila sangmei la ngühkhüm kulabü.”
Aishanga lakjaibou
hoba Jihudabü mütshuong kho haoei olinangko kibü dan.
Haoei ngühmaanglanbü lambei,
lausikei sii phinbü to chühashi,
saopobü lambei, lausikei ngekyobü to chühashi.
Kan aoyouei kaonyek jenyua kan mütpem touje kishang akilabü lele chem che thüka che thenan hoba sek chenei che phopan jungeida, ügütü!
Ngeibü noua lakjaibü
Aishanga semlüh sek sekphai an ka takyang an kheilabü, lilabü takbü chenei ngongkam che sunglabü!”
Aoyou ngeyang enyu ih lambo pida, aoyou nangnak ihei ajaakshongko khüpda haoen shanga ügütü!
Hobaje haoenei lemalanga kongkin tuokbü kongkin kümthung metjin kia, lausikei
Hibü haoen hapbüngebü songsido akibü haangshong kü mütli thüngshang to hauakei, hoba haoeneibü yaangenbü shuong mühei haiyetnyu kia, hoba haoeneibü imyam deilaei hakshemda!
Hibü molowanei jembü maangdak yaang yoan takletbü akiko jembü sembung ipbei, hoba haoeneibü soneikangbü hoba haoeneibü tan hoba haoen yoa lemenyobü shuong khüto yanda.
Hibü takübü mütshuong khüpetda hoba yaangenbü mütshuong senyanda, hoba müh to chühbü mütshuong hanbü la yeitida.
Lausikei Thükenbou
Kheijinei san shoushouei jembü lamshaushanga tegü lamshaulabü hoba keibü shuongeibü kaoena lon shoushou shuongei lamshaulabü.
Aoyouei shabü amlangbü lühei jangda, hoba aoyouei shabü kailong janglühei senda haoen ügütü!
Haoeneibü kümsilei senei sosotham hapenlabü lele hautiashi, Israelbü Saopobou kümsilei kho senei ngelabü lele nyangko lottiashi hoba loutiashi dogo aoyouei lauda, haoen shanga ügütü!

Aoyouei amaibü to maibü hoba maibü to amaibü lauda; aoyouei nakthühbü to ngesakbü hoba ngesakbü to nakthühbü tegü weeida, aoyouei khauekbü to teibü hoba teibü to khauekbü tegü weeida haoen shanga ügütü!
Aoyouei jembü thea songsido kibü dogo hoba jembü thea ditenbü kia dogo damda haoen shanga ügütü!
Aoyou ih yungla laakkei hoba nyakidei kheiyola mü to liman ki,
aoyouei besa shanga amaibou mat maitida, hoba shedbü akibü ka ngühmai solangda, haoen shanga ügütü!
Hibü wanlongei thon sühko lonshembü tegü hoba sang linbü wanlongei juokshembü tegü haoeneibü li nyaüan aplabü, hoba haoen chipen bungbü kho thamngu tegü kuito soulanglabü; aieilausi haoenei Thükenbou
Hibü jembü mütli shanga
Hibü saabüa kibü phang chela haoei tetsida che longtikulabü, hoba kaodak thonbü ka haoen shanga teklaang metkulabü, hoba chühashi, haoen aeibou panteiko loulabü.
Haoen yoa aokei amanglabü ayingsi akühlabü, ayingsi aokei angaklabü, ayingsi ayeplabü, ayingsi haoeneibü shenjang ka shembe asenglanglabü, ayingsi haoeneibü youshang lüh aleilulabü.
Haoeneibü laujin simbü hoba haoeneibü lao pendou khü- hakei, haoeneibü koli shuong youdem laangkhüh kaangbü tegü, hoba haoeneibü kailong you mühghaü yei tegü weeilabü.
Haoen ngühbü molosaonyu tegü kilabü, haoenei molosaonyu ngühbü tegü ngühlabü; haü, haoenei ngühlabü hoba haitila kibou to toman shatlabü, hoba kho langlabü, hoba khümenlabü ao akilabü.
Hobaje khübü chaloua yungnyu ngühbü tegü haoen ngühlabü hoba müt atei kaodak to chühalonga, chühashi, nakthüh hoba maangmau onat hoba kho sangmei shuongei ngesakbü yuklepan haplabü.
Uzzia Choba haibü poa Choba setshanga setan thükaenei tonenan yaangenbü neisimeiei lembü chem shenan ngei
Hao thüka kaakyembü Kherabim lokei, che che weko kaak lakbang kikei, pemnyiei haoei jembü thenyek küplepbei, hoba pemnyiei haoei jembü you küplepbei, hoba pemnyiei hao seilepbei.
Hobaje cheei che to ngekyoko laukei, “Saopobü, Saopobü, Saopobü, Thükenbü
Hobaje ngekbü ngühlang khoei chemshang shenkei, hoba wankhükei chem shenkei.
Kheijinei ngei laukei, “Ngo ügütü! Aieilausi ngo lishang asaopobü müt hoba ngo lishang asaopobü mütshuong yoa kida, aishanga ngeibü nyekei Choba Thükenbou
Kheijinei lemshon ka kipei wankak yasebü sungbaan kaakyembü Kherabim yoa che kü jungto seengjung loukei.
Hobaje khoei ngeibü sembunga haoei meitikei, hoba laukei, “Chühashi, hoei kaibü sembunga meitia, hoba kaibü shedbü shabü langkua, hoba kaibü shabü apbua.”
Kheijinei
Haoei laukei, Hauashi hoba habü mütshuong to lenshi: “Ditdang leashi, lausikei ladangkei tediten; hapdang leashi lausikei ladangkei teshen.

Habü mütshuongeibü maangpon ngoutiashi; haoen nou otiashi hoba haoeneibü nyek yuitiashi. Khei ayinglonga haoenei haoeneibü nouei ditlabü, haoeneibü maangponei ditenlabü, hoba sepeilabü hoba maingailabü.”
Kheijinei ngei laukei, “O
hoba
Khübü yoa phejan ana che ongkei khünei jouan yembulong ayingsi terebint bulong akbü chungthem tegü kiasikei, kho nyibou chengan aplabü; kho tegü saopobü phang kho haoeibü chungthem ki.

Uzziaeibü shou Jotham, hoba haoeibü shou Ahaz Jihudaeibü Choba haanga Siriabü Choba Rezin, hoba Remaliaeibü shou Peka Israelbü Choba Jerusalem khulimbo wapyola angkei, lausikei, kho khulimbo awapyoan.
Hobaje ladang Dawideibü chung to “Siriabü Efraimbü kaoa shaiakei” dogo laukei, haoeibü maangpon hoba hao mütlieibü maangpon yama bulung shuong yeiei nyaakeibü tegü nyaakeikei.
Kheijinei

Hobaje hao to lenshi, ‘Maangsangashi hoba saangsembo kiashi. Rezin, Siria hoba Remaliaeibü shou kaangbou khau angsi dogokei hoba khübü wankhük laibü, wanted tho pemnyi kibü shangakei hatko teki, hoba kho laüa ka maangpon semthetko teki.
Aieilausi Siriaei Efraim si Remaliaeibü shou yoan kakhu limbo huon amaibü kümbo, hai lauko loukei,
“Jihuda khulimbo sen angkho, hoba sen shanga janyin bangnyin longtikho hoba kho kanglanga Tabeeleibü shou Choba yeitiakho,
Mühghaüei hai lauda: Kho athük haplabü, kho tegü ayinglabü.
Aishanga Siriabü khu Damaska hoba Damaskaeibü khu Rezin ki; hoba po saosemto ngao kanglanga Efraim phang che ongkei akitilabü lele netla yeiko leilutikulabü.
Hobaje Efraimeibü khu Samaria, hoba Siriaeibü khu Remaliaeibü shou ki. Kanei kho maitelembho laua longa maimaitham kho kanei atinlabü.”
Hobaje
Lausikei Ahazei laukei, “Aphelabü, ayingsi ngei
Kheijinei Isaiaei laukei, “Tou kanei ditashi, O Dawid chemdang! Müteibü maangpon noutilabü ho ongkei hanbümanbü dogo kanei damda si? Kholonga kanei kü Mühghaü kei noutilep lo?
Hibü
Ladang haoei amaibü asungletla ngean hoba maibü pienla ngean aplaje haoeibü shausiyung kho sendei onbü hoba naodei kilabü.
Aishanga nashou khoei amaibü asungletla hoba maibü pienla angejinei kaonyek laoboua Choba penyi, nyi hatko khangenda, kho inletnyu aplabü.
“Assiria Choba khei Efraim ka Jihuda bangbü chalou ka tou sühko louan achühbü chalou shuong ka to hoba ka mütli thükto hoba kaboueibü chemdang thükto
“Kho chaloua ho haüthüklabü, khei
Hobaje khübü kho loulabü hoba khübü pendou yomang haübü hoba laangkhüna, hoba sang pendoua hoba buham pendoua louan shailabü.
“Kho chaloua
“Hobaje kho chaloua ho hai kilabü, müt cheei masu pi shoushou che hoba sanlon penyi bang samlabü;
hoba sendei apsileko kibüei haoei jembü shausiyung shanga sendei ontobü kilabü. Aieilausi kaonyeka jouan kibü wekoei sendei hoba naodei shaulabü.
