“Hobaje ho haüthüklabü, ainei ong semlüh long hajar chenei chandinam hajar mubü kikei kho bi long hoba jaklong ong yeilabü.
Hobaje mütshuongei lau si laujin jungan khüto loulabü, aieilausi kaonyek pendou kho jak angbü buham hoba jaklong ong kilabü.
Hobaje jak angbü buham hoba jak to hatbü ka shapei laünyinan kishang shonghshou khüto no aloulabü; lausikei kho masu si sanlon lamshaushang la ong yeilabü.”
Kheijinei
Hobaje kü shanga doan phola maanglembü aukabü müt nyi, Uria ungshedbou hoba Jeberekiaeibü shou Zekharia lelabü.”
Kho phaia thuseinyu jungto atkei hoba sao mangakongko apbei, hoba bousu shou che bukkei. Hibü
Aishanga nashou khoei Abou, Anyu, dogo ngala aminjinei, Damaska kabü nyaksinam hoba Samaria ka solangbü peisilei shuong Assiria Choba jungto sunglanglabü.”
Hobaje
“Ho mütliei sangsembo koubü Shiloa dei asungletko apsije hoba Rezin hoba Remaliaeibü shou to hatsije,
tou chühashi,
Hobaje thedang aeto Jihudaa hujung atlabü sopbo hoba limbo koulabü hoba haoei ngüm sühko anglabü, hoba haoeibü kaak sengbüei kaibü kaonyek yomang shenlabü, O Imanuel”.
O mütli shuong, lemenyoashi, hoba kan netla yeiko leilutilabü, hoba kan kaonyek saabüa kibü pendouei nou haangashi; kan lolo shembe kaiashi, hoba kan netla yeiko leilutikulabü.
Liko huon kümashi, lausikei kho ai ayinglabü! Thükbü sühko ngüh joyoashi, lausikei kho ühaüthüklabü; aieilausi Mühghaü kün yoa kia.
Ao shanga hau kibü ikei
“Ho mütli shuongei thushed dogo laujinei kanei thushed dogo telau, ayingsi haoenei aito hatda kho to kan tehüt ayingsi kho shanga temok.
Lausikei Thükenbou
Hobaje hao saoposhang che kilabü; lausikei Israel chung ham shanga nakeilabü laang hoba phaiyetlabü laang kilabü hoba Jerusalema kibü shanga silang hoba sung kilabü.
Hobaje ho thüka juong phaiyetlabü hoba tuonglabü hoba sunga minlabü hoba laplabü.”
Ngei ngeibü aukabü ngüh khühyolabü hoba ngeibü lenbü kü mütli shuong maangpona jangan phokulabü.
Kho phaia Jakob chemdang ka thenyek huan kibü
Chühashi, Zion shongha kibou Thükenbou

Hobaje ladang haoenei kan to, “Yemshanla haubü si seibü- yaübü, lemenyoko hoba welausansanbü müt lamashi,” dogo lenlaje phang cheei haoeneibü Mühghaü to aphelabü lo? Langkibü shanga haoenei haibü to apheyolabü lo?
Lenbou hoba aukabou jungto hauashi! Maimaitham haoenei ho ngüh tegütham, ajoyolonga haoen shanga ngeyang aki.

Hobaje haoenei kaonyek danko aeibou khonkuko hoba mü- hei haiko no ngalabü, hoba haoen mühei haibüei haoen lolo khau anglabü, hoba haoeneibü Choba si haoeneibü Mühghaü khükla uoklabü, hoba haoeneibü thenyek müh ae yeilabü.
Hobaje nyibou kaoae chühlabü, lausikei maangto shatlabü hoba nakthühei maang laaklabü, nangnakei haoen shian sattilabü.
Lausikei maangkhu yuian kibü sao shanga touje nakthüh akilabü.
Shangied haoei Zebulun kaodak si Naftali kaodak to himou sungbakukei. Lausikei thonlamaje Jordan chanep aikabü phangshuong kibü kaonyek, Galil yungnyu kaijempo haoei soneikangtilabü.
Nakthüh phanga paibü mütshuongei ngesak yaang hapbei; aoyou nakthüh phanga kida, haoen la ngesak haukua.
Nyi phang haatia; nyi haoeneibü olinbü haatikua, haoen ka thedanga youlatjinei olinyobü tegü olinyoda. Soletbü peisilei janyojinei mütei olinyobü tegü olinyoda.
Aishanga kaang laobou haoen shanga onat kikei, hoba haoeneibü phaka kibü bu haoeneibü
Aishanga lasona lemenyobü dan yoa insiaubu jungbü müteibü hele pendou hoba sii hambü neisimei jikla shanga busidei tegü ong kilabü.

Aishanga sen la nashou che bukkuakei, sen la bousushou che kuakei; hoba songdak haoeibü phaka tonlabü. Hobaje haoeibü nyen, “Maangpanglabü daman- chühbou,” “Thükenbou Mühghaü,” “Thon Akibü Bou,” “Sangmai Chobashou,” dogo nyenlabü.
Haoeibü songdak hoba sangmai haalabü shanga Dawid Choba setshanga hoba haoeibü sangle thüka, kho huonglabü hoba ngühmai hoba saopobüei kho tonenla shanga tou maangdakbü kho kümlabü.
Hobaje müt pendouei Efraim hoba Samariaa kibü shuongei kho ngelabü, haoenei liliseseko hoba maangpon yaangko lauda.
“Juoklaang shuong ada, lausikei künei laang thüngenbüei kümlabü, bhuklong wapan koutia, lausikei künei cedar buei jeilabü.”
Hibü
Thedang aenei Siriabü hoba phainei Filistiabü; hoba haoenei haa kouan Israel suilabü. Habü pendou shanga hao khauang longbü athonkei hoba haoei ik tuokbü asungngaikei.
Khei yingasikei aoei mütli to ngümbei, hao jungto hauan ase- pei, ayingsi Thükenbou
Hibü
Jaishou si lolebü müt kho khu ki, yepeijawebü thuseibü kho mei ki.
Aishanga ho mütli leibü shuongei haoen ayinglam to hautida, hoba aoyou haoenei leiyeia haoen mokkei.
Hibü
Aishanga kümsilei amaibü wan tegü longda, khoei sang si jaklong lonan apda; haü, khoei yamnaka wan laakjung sattida, hoba khübü kho wankhük sangmei shangtüngbü thükae to thungan angtida.
Thükenbou
Haoenei mae ikei hoba nanae ikei sungan shaulabü, lausikei haoen senyüh ashemlabü. Haoenei mütpem wekoei jembü shousi sühko shaulabü.
Manasseei Efraim hoba Efraimei Manasse haoen cheei che shilabü hoba haoen liko lapbuan tokei Jihuda shilabü. Ho pendou shanga hao khau lotbü angaida, lausikei haoeibü ik toukei tuokakei.

Aoyouei latnyu shuong kho haoenei soletbü peisilei che yeitida, hoba bou akibü shuong haoeneibü la yeitida, athükaminbü shuong ngühmai matjem ka sepeitida, hoba kü mütli shalebü ka shauko kibü sungngaila shanga,
asaopobü ngühkhüm shuong kümda, hoba dobou shuong aoyouei ngean ayingbü doda, haoen shanga ügütü!
Matjembü chaloua saabü ka loula kibü yeinak ka nyi ai kümenla? Ao jungto thuibü shanga satenla, hoba kaibü nyaksinam nyi lan phokula?
Thükbou shuong phang to kan khüpjung yanlabü, haitibü phangaenei kan tuonglabü. Ho pendou shanga hao khauang angailang, lausikei toukei haoeibü ik tuokan kia.
Aha! Assiria ngeibü khauangbü ju, hoba ngo maangpokbü phodong!
Mühghaü to ühütbü phang, ngo khauang maangpok kibü mütli khulimbo ngei hao hautikei, hoba haoen ka soshau soyungla hoba peisilei hausheila hoba khonga thim tegü nakan attila hao la ngei sakkulabü.
Lausikei haoei kho tegü adamda hoba haoei kho tegü haoeibü maangpona daman achühda; hoba phang shisho ong ayingko wapan apbula ong damda.
Aishanga haoei laukei, “Ngeibü lajamleibü shuong haoen pendou Choba shuong aying lo?
Karkhemish tegü Kalno aki lo? Arpad tegü Hamat aki lo? Damaska tegü Samaria aki lo?
Jerusalem si Samariabü touje khaibou heangsho kümbü noksa khei kü ikei heangsho shuong sangle lamensije,
ngei Samaria si heangsho shuong to kümbü tegü ngei Jerusalem si haoeibü heangsho shuong to akümlep lo?”
Lausikei ladang

Aishanga haoei laukei, “Ngeibü ik hauei ngei ho kümbei, hoba ngeibü songeihonei; aishanga kü to ditenbü kia, ngei ngeibü phangshuongeibü leilang sungngaia. Hobaje ngei haoeneibü thanshang soan sunga; phangshuong ngei kao sühko senleda.

Phangshuongeibü nyaksinam aueibü hap tegü ngei leilutikua; hoba tonjung satan kibü autei hejung loubü tegütham ngei kaodak pendou yoshaia; hoba kaak topeibü, ayingsi lemenyobü ayingsi sembung ipbü che ongkei akiteilabü.”
Lausikei
Hibü
Israel Ngesakbü wan la yeilabü, hoba haoeibü Saopobou kho wanlüh la yeilabü, hoba khoei haoeibü jak hoba jaklong nyetchenei ong juoklabü hoba suilabü.
Hobaje haoei yamkabü soneikangbü hoba hek hekkubü khongthu, soushou si mang ham haoei mautikulabü; hoba kho shatbü müt pheijung ngaibü tegü kilabü.
Hobaje haoeibü yamkabü bunyu shuong jouan kibü kho nashou cheei ongkei tonan phoenlabü lele shisho ong kilabü.
Kho chaloua jouan kibü Israel hoba satenbü Jakob chemdangei touje haoen yoa wapyobü dangbou labou to nongan akilabü, lausikei
Hau yaangbü Mühghaü jungto joubü cheje, khei Jakob joubü, sepeinyu longeilabü.
Aishanga kaibü mütli molo phetsen tegü kiasikei haoen yoa joubü ong longeilabü; saopobüei sopbo mautila janletkuakei.
Aieilausi
Hibü
Aishanga tuishoa ngo maangto shatbü nanglabü hoba ngo khauangbü koulabü.
Kheijinei Thükenbou
Hobaje kho chaloua haoeibü on kaibü phak ka tonletlabü, hoba onang naangkubüei buleng kho mautikulabü.”
Haoen Aiat to loua; haoen Migron peithetjung dana. Mikhmasa haoenei haoeneibü on künlean phoakei.
Haoen lam danjung hauakei. Gebaa haoen shaiakei. Rama lühda, Sauleibü Gibea satjung hauakei.
Ngüh yaangbüei ngekashi, O Gallim nouyangnyu! Ditashi, O Laisha! Jongaiashi, O no Anathot!
Madmena hatla satda, Gebim müt satenshang lambo satda.
Tattham hao Noba otlabü, haoei Jerusalem shongh, Zion nouyangshou shongha haoeibü ik nyatlepbü ik kho topeilabü.
Lausikei chühashi,
Hobaje namei ha- oei yam shangbü waplabü, hoba Lebanon kaangkosekko tuonglabü.
Hobaje Jesse mangka shaangbü shou che longlabü hoba haoeibü li ka bhek cheei lang heklabü.
Hobaje hao thüka
songsido hoba ditenbü kibü soushou,
damanchühbü hoba hau kibü
soushou hoba hapbüngebü soushou
hoba
Hobaje
Haoeibü nyekei hapbü haoei
mat ajemlabü hoba haoeibü nouei ditbüei ajanenlabü;
lausikei ngühmaiei haoei shalebü matjemlabü,
hoba kaonyeka sembüambü shanga eaaoa janenlabü
hoba haoeibü sembung juei haoei kaodak to ngümlabü,
hoba sembungkhop hakei haoei amaibü haitilabü.
Haoeibü shembenei kho saopobü kilabü,
hoba haoeibü kaangnei kho maanglemenbü kilabü.
Kheijinei sho san shoushou yoa kilabü,
hoba kongkhüei lon shoushou yoa lenglabü.
Masu shoushou si molosaonyu
shoushou hoba amenbü shatsinam chela lamshaulabü,
hoba nashou hanbü cheei haoen leiyeilabü.
Masu si sap liko lamshaulabü,
hoba haoeneibü shoushou shuong liko chela yeplabü.
Molosaonyuei masuei tegü youho nyailabü.
Senyungbü nashou pinyueibü laangkhüna louyolabü,
hoba nashouei haoeibü ikei pinyu hap phekeilabü.
Ngeibü saopobü shanga pendoua haoenei ai aleilutilabü,
ayingsi amautilabü.
Aishanga deiei yungnyu küplepbü tegü,
Kho chaloua ho haüthüklabü, khei Jesseeibü lilabü laobou mütshuong shanga tetsida ki, phangshuongei hao jungto lamjung haulabü, hoba haoeibü haksoshang khünei soneikangbü kilabü.
Kho chaloua Assiria ka, Ijep ka, Pathrus ka, Kush ka, Elam ka, Shinar ka, Hamat ka, hoba yungnyu yungko kaonyek ka
Phangshuong la jembü shensinge kulabü hoba nangletan kibü Israelbü yoshailabü hoba kaodak kaonyek lei ka Jihudabü phinnyinan kibü liko kamshailabü.
Kheijinei Efraim khulimbo nyekto shatbü touje thonan aplabü, hoba aoyou Jihudabü khulimbü yeian ki haoen wapan aplabü; Efraimei Jihuda to nyekto ashatlabü; hoba Jihudaei Efraim khulimbo ayinglabü.

Lausikei haoenei chanep Filistiabü phak thüka pijung yanlabü, haoenei liko chaangbou aenei kibü shousi shuong soan sunglabü. Edom si Moab haoeneibü hau phanga kitilabü, hoba Ammon shousi shuongei haoen to ngüha lelabü.
Kheijinei
Hobaje jouletbü jembü mütli laobou joulaje, haoen shanga Israel shanga hao Ijep kaonyek ka longbü chaloua kibü tegü Assiria ka lamkhong che kilabü.
Kho chaloua nyi laulabü, “Ngei ka la nyensang kulabü, O
Chühashi, Mühghaü ngo khümenbou ki, ngei mailemlabü hoba ühütlabü; aishanga
Hibü olinbüei kanei khümenbü deikhün ka dei khulabü.”
Hobaje kho chaloua kanei laulabü, “
to chia lauashi, aishanga haoei soneikangko küma; ho kaodak pendoua ngetiashi.
Ngüh yaang longashi hoba ngekashi. Kan Ziona kibü shuong; aishanga Israeleibü Saopobou kan yoa yaangbü ki.”
Amozeibü shou Isaiaei Babilon shanga onat hapbei.
Kanei shongh khongthua tetsida che phoashi, haoen to ngüh yaangbüei ngaashi, hoba yaangenbü shuong bakhün to atla ikei küpashi!
Aishanga ngeibü khauang ik shatla shanga khümbo saüenbü hoba lakjaibü mütshuong ngei ngashaia.
Müt tan yaangbü ngühlang phatko shongha lemenbü ditshi! Phangshuong Choba sanglea yoshaian huibü ngühlang ditashi! Thükenbou
Kaodak saabü mühthon kaothon ka haoen louada, ho kaodak khümbo maulabü
Kanei manghaapashi, aishanga
Hibü ik pendou hau akiko yeilabü, hoba mütpem weko maang akiko yeilabü, hoba haoen phenyemlabü.

Maang yuibü hoba maangshatei haoen to sühlabü, yaksa na hapjinei khonkubü tegü haoen khonkua kilabü, haoen cheei che to maangpangbüei nyeklang menmentham chühlabü; haoeneibü thenyek kho wanlong tegü kilabü.
Chühashi kaodak litham apyokulabü, hoba ho ka shabü shuong mautikulabü onou aki; maang- pokbü hoba kaangbüsekbü khauang longbüei
Aishanga müha khanshoulitshou shuong hoba onshaian kibü khanshoulitshou shuongei ngesakbü akulabü; ladang chanyu longlaje hao nakthühtham yeilabü, hoba litnyuei ngesakbü ohaulabü.
Amaibü kibü shanga kaodak hoba müt amaibou haoenei shed shonbü shanga ngei shieikoelabü; lilibü pejapelabü ngei thontikulabü, tokbü sungbü yonglamlilibü phangto yantikulabü.
Hon maibou toje müt ong hoba ofir hon toje khunak shousi hapla sekbou ngei yeitikulabü.
Hibü Thükenbou
Kho phaiya meishibü shuongei shieibü meishi phatko ayingsi leisheilabü akibü sanshuong phatko haoen mütpem weko jembü mütli jungto sepeinyu ngailabü, hoba mütpem weko jembü kaodak to satlabü.
Aoyou pailaje baiko suettilabü hoba lapjung loubü mütpem weko inei wapettilabü.
Haoeneibü nasakshou shuong haoen thedanga netla yeiko ngümnyinkulabü, haoeneibü chem aaklangkulabü, hoba haoeneibü yaksi shuong to ik shatlabü.
Chühashi, ngei haoen khulimbo chandinam shanga weko akibü hoba hon to olinbü akibü Mediabü pühnyintilabü.
Haoeneibü laujinei heshou shuong netlaphoula yeiko kipetkulabü, hoba nasetshang hek thüka haoenei onou ühüplabü, ayingsi nashousi shuong haoenei sanouko achühlabü.
Hobaje Mühghaüei Sodom si Gomora mautijinei tegü Choba sangle hemaihaangmai Khaldibü yonglambü soneikangbü Babilon kho tegü yeilabü.
Touje hao to ladangkei sang asangngailabü, ayingsi meten meten müt akilabü. Arabbü aoeikei khünei neichem adanglabü, sanlombü aoeikei khünei san ayeptilabü.
Lausikei phetsen kaodak yamkabü meisiau khünei yeplabü, hoba chemshuong kho ngühyoko kibü meisiau shuongei shenan kilabü; khünei ostrik aushuongei shenan kilabü, hoba yao shuong khünei saiyeilabü.
Hobaje haoeneibü laangchema sho, hoba Chobaeibü chem maibüa selong shuong lemenlabü; kho jihsiphai lousühda, hoba kho chalou kho asünglanglabü.
Hobaje phangshuongei haoen leian haoen kishang to loulabü, hoba Israel chemdangei haoeneibü
Kaibü maangshat hoba laobouei no kümtileitila yeitikei,
Nyi Babilon Choba khulimbo ho nyikubü chia ho nyi sungba hoba laushi, “Shieikoebü lai thonan apbei; ho sangnyu khüai lelabü!
ei amaibü shuongeibü ju hoba songdakbü shuongeibü julo, laobouei mütshuong to leilubüei athakko ngümbei, hoba aoeikei senetla athükbü khauangei phangshuong thüka songdakkei, kho leilutia
Kaonyu haksoa kia hoba küpjembo kia; haoenei chia lauda.
Haü, busim long si Lebanona cedar bulong shuongei ka to olinda hoba lauda, ‘No tuongan kisije kün khulimbo bu akbü aokei alouda.’
“Phangaeka molowanei ka to haüyola topeida, hoba ka shanga haoei haibü, khei, kaodak kongnyu shuong pendou phühentida; kaodak Choba pendou haoei haoeneibü Choba setshang ka tonenkuda.
Haoen pendouei jongaiko ka to laulabü, ‘Kün tegü nokei tou hau akiko yeian apa lo? No kün tegü yeia lo?
Kaibü kongkin ngühlang hoba kaibü yonglamshamle yemsang sühko senyana; no maangaenei pheyangei omlepakei, yangbemei no küplepakei.’
“Khuthük ka no lai atetan ki, O Lucifer, chalou Khanyang, Ngeyangbü shou! Phangshuong phangae to yantibou, no lai kaoa sühko nakyantian ki!

Hobaje nyi kaibü maangpona, ‘Ngo khuthük to anglabü, Mühghaüeibü khanshoulitshou shuong thükaenei ngei ngeibü Choba setshang tonenlabü, hoba yungthang ae thonbüa ngo shuong yoshaibü shongh thüka ngo setlabü.
Ngo sangmei thükto anglabü, ngo Thükkabou phatko kilabü.’
Lausikei püngkhün thonbü sühko, yemsang sühko noje leiyanlabü.
“Aoyouei no hapda haoenei ka to kaang chühlabü; haoenei kashanga damanchühko laulabü, ‘Kaodak lühtibou hoba Choba sangle shuong nyaakeitibou müt kho ho si?
Sangnyu leilutibou hoba kaodak yam la yeitibou müt kho ho si? Thüngbü shuong jembü chem to angaitibou müt kho ho si?’
Phangshuong thüka Choba pendou, haoen pendou mütpem weko jembü chema soneikangbüa yepda.
Lausikei noje mangsenlabü bubhek che tegü, inei haitibü dan, haibü shuong yoa, you phanga nakeibü haibü mang, laang püngkhün to yanbü tegü, no hea nangletkei.
No haoen yoa liko akhünlabü, aieilausi nyi kaibü kaonyek leilutikei, hoba nyi ka mütli haitikei. Amaibü kümbü thensilen ponpen shanga telaueiti ma!
Haoeneibü bousi shuongei shed shonbü shanga, haoeneibü shousi shuong longan kaodak juongnyu, kaonyu nyakko sangnyu shuongei shentisi amaibula haoeibü shousi shuong haitishang lamleashi.”
“Ngei haoen khulimbo meimeilabü,” dogo Thükenbou
“Toukei ngei ho san kishang hoba deieibü süngküp la yeitilabü hoba kho ngei leilubü chemkujinei kuan mautilabü,” dogo Thükenbou
Thükenbou
Khei ngei Assiriabü kü ikei leilutilabü, hoba ngeibü shongh thüka you phanga hao nakeilabü; kheijinei haoeibü buleng haoen ka banglabü, hoba haoeneibü phak ka haoeneibü on banglabü.
Kaonyu khümbo shanga kho ngei kümlabü maangangbü lamthen ki, hoba phang pendou thüka tuokbü ik kho ho ki.
Aishanga Thükenbou
Ho thusei ngüh Ahaz Choba haibü poa kikei.
“O Filistia, kan tou ngümbü ju leilua, kan pendou tüolinyo; aishanga pinyueibü li ka piyang che longlabü hoba haoeibü hek kho wan tegü pijung haubü pinyu yinglabü.
Hobaje shalebou thamei shausiyung haplabü, hoba khambü shuong thushed akiko leketnyu kilabü, lausikei kaibü li je ngei mühsinouei haitilabü, hoba kaibü jouletbü ngei haitilabü.
Haapyoashi, O bakhün; ngekyoashi, O sangnyu; no hatbüei tühnyina, O Filistia, kan pendou! Aishanga yungthang aeka wankhük che louada, hoba haoei pienbü chaloua aokei sukjung ngaian aloda.”
Kholonga phangeibü ngühlang künbou la ai ong jongaibü kula? “
Moab shangabü thusei ngüh che. Aishanga Moaba Ar youche langyanga leilua, hoba kongkong yeitia; aishanga Moaba Kir youche langyanga leilua, hoba kongkong yeitia.
Haoen Dibon to hoba lemshang shonghkhu to haapla angkei; Moabei Nebo si Medeba thükto lapangda; haoeneibü khu pendou kütan apa, hoba sembung wi pendou kütan apa.
Haoenei khonga haoen lolo senouneiei shembe kaida; haoen chemdaka hoba haoeneibü khonga mütpem wekoei nyeksi angko haapda.
Heshbon si Elealeei ngekkei hoba haoeneibü langh Jahaz sühko ditkei; khoei Moabbü insiaubu jungbü shuongei ngüh yaangbüei ngekkei; haoeibü soushou lühda.

Kü maangponei Moab shanga haapda; haoeibü yaangenbü shuong Zoar hoba Eglath Shelishiya aeto satjung hauda. Aishanga haoen haapbo Lohit to angda; aieilausi Horonaim lama haoenei leilubü ngühei ngekkei.
Aishanga Nimrim dei ulangtham apa; aieilausi sang linakei; nyem haanbü alongda; khünei sangtüngbü peisilei ai aki.
Hibü haoenei juong pailetbü hoba haoenei thanbü nyaksinam Willow Shushou aeto haoenei künlanglabü.
Aishanga ngekbü ngühlang Moab leilang sühko haua; kho haapyobü ngühlangei Eglaim hoba Beerelim sühkei.
Aishanga Dibon kabü dei shuong siiei shenakei; aishanga Dibon thüka, Moab ka satenbü shuong thükto hoba kaonyeka jouletbü jungto ngei toukei molosaonyu che sungbalabü.
Kanei Sela laobou yamlamang aenei ki, kho ka kaonyek songdakbü shuong shanga Zion nouyangshou shongh jungto sanlon shoushou shuong hautiashi.
Aishanga ho tegü kilabü, hap ka shian sattibü aushuong tegü shoongailabü, Moab nou- yangshou shuong Arnon shukoa kilabü.
“Songsido kuashi, matjem kuashi, chajihboua kaibü yeme nangnak tegü yeitishi! Nangletbü shuong hutiashi hoba satbümaubü shuong tehuonettima.
Moabbü satbümaubü shuong kan yoa kitiashi, leilutibü thedang ka haoen shanga satenshang yingshi!”
(Ladang shieikoebü thon letilaje hoba leilutibü nangtilaje, hoba nakan yantibou kaonyek ka akiko mautilaje.
Onoubüa Choba setshang che kümlabü, hoba kho thüka, Dawideibü neichema ngühmaia müt che setlabü.)
Jihudabüei lauda, “Moab lilisese shangabü künei dida. Haoen khei yetsiyetlang hoba haoen yonglam lilibü ki, lausikei haoen sungen yaangenko laubü kho kongkongbü ki.”
Hibü Moabei haoen shanga lapangko manghaaplabü; müt- pem wekoei Moab shanga mang- haapashi. Kirhareseta semlüh linbüei kümbü wentek akisapbü shanga haoen haaplabü.
Aishanga Heshboneibü semlüh kia, hoba Sibma semlüh long linan apan phangshuongei
Hibü ngo Sibma semlüh shanga, Jezer yoa haapda; O Heshbon, hoba Eleale, ngei no ngeibü nyeksiei nemtikuda; aishanga kaibü sulang buhek thüka hoba kaibü youlatbü thük to la- pang ngühlang ngekkua.

Hobaje lang hekkushang khongthu ka maang haibü hoba olinbü maua; semlüh seka chia laubü ayingsi olinyobü akilabü; nitshanga semlühdei aoeikei ayungettilabü, semlüh seka olinyoko lemenyobü ngei thaktilabü.
Khei yingbü khoei Moab shanga kü soushouei kongkin tegü waangda. Ngeibü maangpon Kirheres shanga waangda.
Hobaje Moabei jembü shongh to jembü lolo manganshembo longasikei hao ai ayinglabü.
Moab shanga shangied
Lausikei tou
Damaska shanga thusei ngühlang. “Chühashi, Damaska sangnyu che akitilabü, kho leilubü thansheibü che ong yeilabü.
Hobaje Siria sangnyu shuong tekan aplabü; khübü kho sanshuong lamshaushang la yeilabü, haoen lekeitaiko yeplabü hoba aoeikei haoen ashieilabü.
Toukei Efraima lapheishon akilabü, hoba Damaska ka Choba sangle hoba Siria jouletbü shuong mautilabü; haoen Israel shousi shuong soneikangbü tegü kilabü dogo Thükenbou
Hobaje kho youlatbü mütei loan kibü youshou yoshaijinei tegü hoba youman latbü tegü Refaim yomanga mütei youman yoshaibü tegü kilabü.
Ayingsi ladang oliv bulong ka hek kheilaje phailam shanga khonei bukhu suokbüa penyi ayingsi sem tegü bhek hotena leisingao kibu tegü, dogo
Kho chaloua mütshuongei kümbou tou chühlabü, hoba haoeneibü nyekei Israel Saopobou to souhat lenlabü.
Touje haoei ikei kümbü kümsilei lemshang to achühlabü; ayingsi hao ikjishouei kümbü Asherim, ayingsi chanyu phatko kümbü heangsho to souhat kubü akilabü.
Kho chaloua haoeibü sangnyu hau kibü shuong kho Israel shousi shuong thedanga Amorbü hoba Hivbüei apyoan satbü haoeneibü sangnyu shuong phatko, kaneibü sangnyu shuong phai senan ngaitilabü.
Aishanga nyi kaibü khümenbü Mühghaü hoba no satenshang Laang shanga maangpona adam; hibü kanei Adonis bamang shuong kümasikei hoba küksithang Mühghaü shanga thanasikei,
khübü nyi kebüongbü chaloua balepan phoan ngeyangje kaibü lilabü kho yemtisikei; kho khei yingasikei khonku hoba maangto shatlabü yaangbü chaloua youlatbü akiko aplabü.
Aha, müt juongnyueibü langh, yungnyu ngühbü ngühlang tegü loubü hoba dei yaangbü kaangko koubü tegü phangshuong ngüh- yoda.
Dei juong kaangko koubü tegü phangshuong shangkei shangko shoongyoda, lausikei haoei haoen to haklabü, hoba haoen saabü to satlanglabü, shongha yei thedanga thamngu soulangbü tegü shian sattilabü.
Chühashi, chasemlamto hatlabü! ngeyang asühjinei khübü kho akitida! Ao- youei sen ka soletbü leda haoeneibü phejan hoba sen ka soshau soyungbü shuong thu ho ki.
Ah, Ethiopia shumang shuong danjung hauan, kaakei homlepan kibü kaodak;

Nail yungnyu aeto dei thüka papiras buei kümbü longchema lambubou shuong hautibü kaonyek! Kan sobüsepbü ngühlang künbü shuong, thongloubü hoba lenglengtham kibü phang jungto nyangbü si saabü ka hatlamoklabü mütshuong jungto hau kibü hoba thükenbü phang, aoyoueibü kaonyek shumang shuongei jan- yinan ki, haoen jungto hauashi.
Kan kaodaka müt pendou hoba kaoa kibü pendou ladang shongha tetsida longlaje, chühashi! Ladang teklaang metlaje, ditashi!
Aishanga
Aishanga youlat jih asühjinei ladang chipen bungthonlaje hoba chipen khoei semlüh semlaje haoei phekshuong kho inshouei wapan aplabü.
Haoen haitibou auyaanglange shuong, hoba kaonyeka yamkabü ausiyuk la phokulabü, hoba haibü aushuongei khübü thüka sulang anglabü, hoba kaokabü yangsikok pendou khübü thüka poang anglabü.”
Kho chaloua Thükenbou
Ijep shanga thusei ngühlang. Chühashi,

ei lauda, “Ngei Ijepbüei Ijepbü khulimbo pühnyintilabü, hoba haoen müt- pem weko jaisina khulimbo hoba mütpem weko jembü lepbou khulimbo, sangnyuei sangnyu khulimbo, Chobaei Choba sangle khulimbo wapyolabü.
Hobaje Ijepbü soushou akiko aptilabü, hoba haoeneibü huon ngei mautikulabü; haoenei heangsho shuong, shetsikhau kibü shuong, hoba yemshanla haubü shuong, hoba seibüyaübü shuong lamlabü.
Hobaje onou akibou songdakbou la ngei Ijep kuan aplabü, hoba sekbülakbü Choba cheei haoen thükka songdaklabü.”
Hobaje Nail shumang ulangtham hoba shumang kho lela akiko apbo hapan aplabü.
Hobaje shumang shuong nyaüan aplabü, Ijep Nail shumang shushou shuong shijung ngailabü hoba linoktham aplabü, thakdu si sanglong yuian aplabü.
Nail nyangko khongthua yamsang Nail shumang nyangko hoba Nailei komlepan kibü pendou ulangtham yeilabü hoba touje ai akiko yeitilabü.
Ngaulapbü shuong to khau angyolabü hoba Naila ngauyaüjin attibü shuong haaplabü hoba aoyouei deia tak tekda haoen phaklaktham aplabü.
Toukei aoyouei phembalei neisimei kümbo khaangnei takda, hoba aoyouei mokok takda haoen himousele kilabü.
Haoeibü chemshang netla yeiko leilulabü, hoba eikei jekbü pendoua maang koulabü.
Zoana kabü Chobaeibü shousi shuong ngoubü! Faraoeibü songbüdobü shuong songsihon akiboula yeia. Kanei lai Farao to, “Ngo songei keiboueibü shou, shangiedbü Choba shuongeibü shou,” dogo lauenla?
Khülonga kaibü songbüdobü mütshuong lanei ki? Haoenei tou ka la lentiashi; hoba Thükenbou
Zoan Chobaeibü shousi shuong ngouan apa, hoba Memfibü Choba shousi shuong khüpettia; haoenei Ijep, laobou haoenei phangshuongeibü chemnyek laang ki, ayingbü to leilanga.
ei haoeneibü maangaenei khüpeilangeibü songsido kheinepbua; hoba ihei jaakbü müt ngaitiko ngomeitaiko kibü tegü haoenei Ijep haoeibü kümsilei pendoua ayingbü to hautida.
Thükkabou ayingsi phangkabou yingsikei ekyanglong ayingsi thakdulong yingsikei aoeikei Ijep shanga aikei akümenlabü.
Hobaje kho chaloua Ijep yaksa phatko kilabü; hoba Thükenbou
Hobaje Jihuda kaodak Ijep shanga hatlamoklabü che yinglabü hoba Thükenbou
Kho chaloua Ijep kaodaka Kanan ngüh lauyobü shuong hoba Thükenbou
Kho chaloua Ijep kaodaka
Hobaje Ijep kaodaka Thükenbou
Hobaje
Hobaje
Kho chaloua Ijep ka Assiria sühko lamkhong che kilabü, hoba kho danko Assiriabü Ijep aeto hoba Ijepbü Assiria aeto haulabü hoba Ijepbüei Assiriabü yoa
Kho chaloua Israel Ijepbü yoa semboubü yinglabü, hoba kaonyudaka haülabü che yinglabü.
Aishanga Thükenbou
Assiria Choba Sargonei lajamleibü yaangbou hautiko, Ashdod to hao loubü poa haoei Ashdod khulimbo wapyokei hoba kho lekei.
Kho chaloua Amozeibü shou Isaia danko
Hobaje

kho tegübü Assiria Chobaei Ijepbü langsenbü shuong hoba Ethiopiabü langsenbü shuong hoba Ethiopiabü shian apan kibü shuong nashou, chingbü mütkong hoba youkong, youdemkong Ijepbü himou bautilabü lele leian haulabü.
Hobaje Ethiopiabü maanglem hoba Ijepbüeibü yonglambü haangjung haoen mokko manghlabü hoba himousele kilabü.

Hobaje yungkoa kibü mütshuongei kho chaloua laulabü, ‘Chühashi, aoyou to senei maanglem phokei, hoba aoyou jungto senei Assiria Choba jungto khümenla haukei, haoen to ai haüthükkei! Hobaje senje lai ong satenla?’ ”
Yungnyu phetsen kaodak shanga onat. Mühghaüeibü yei Negeb danko kaang soujung loubü tegü ho phetsen kaodak ka thungjung louda.
Kü la mangsang sekbü lena; huonbü youbü mütei huonkoyouko jungeida, soshausoyungbü mütei soshauso- yungko jungeida, Angashi, O Elam; komlepashi, O Media! Hao ngühbü pendou ngei thontikua.
Hibü ngeibü shenjang noubüei shena; yaksa nahapjinei khonkubü tegü kü to khonkuei süha. Ngei ditla athüklabü lele ngo khonsakda, ngei hapla athüklabü lele ngo moktiakei.
Ngo maang yongda, hatla moklabüei ngo moktida, ngei sanouko kibü ngesakbüei kü shanga hatlalühlabü yeia.
Haoen khümsok jaan phoda. Haoenei haoeneibü nei iman phoda, haoenei shauda hoba yungda. “Chobaeibü shousishuong, meimeiashi hoba aiha haabü naangashi.”
Aishanga
Haoei tan che hapa longa, kolia setbü tan nyangko, gadua setbü tan uta setbü tan haoei aeibou maangsangko ditjan.
Hobaje haoei molosaonyu tegü ngekkei, O
Tou chühashi, kailonga müt setan louda, kolia müt nyibang setan louada; hoba haoei jongaiko laukei, “Babilon tuonga; hoba jakenbü heangsho pendou kaoa netla yeia.”
O ngeibü youshou nakbü mütshuong, ngeibü amshanga kibü khonsakbü shuong! Thükenbou
Edom shangabü thusei ngüh, Seir ka müt atei ngo ngako lauda; Lapheibou, nangnak lalokche sankei? Lapheibou, nangnak lalokche dankei?
Lapheibouei jongaikei “Lang ngeda, lausikei nangnakkei louada. Nyi toukei ngemangsühda longa nyibou kangai.”
Arabiabü shangabü thusei ngüh: O kan tan tan paibü Dedanbü; Arabia yamlamanga kan kilabü!
Deilabü shuong jungto dei sungba, satbümaubü loubü shuongla nyak okko sungletashi, O Tema kaodaka kibü mütshuong!
Aishanga in ka hoba bühan kibü lau ka lason- yaak ka haoen satena.
Aishanga
Kedarbü shousishuong lau jungbü shuong wapyobü mütshuong joubü shuong kho shisho ong kilabü, aishanga
Mangsang pholi shangabü thusei ngühlang che. Tou, pendou chemdak to angan apbü ho kan ai yingkei?
O no ngekbü ngühlang hoba oyolemenbü sangnyu, olinbü sangnyu! Kaneibü haitibü shuong kho inei haitibü aying, ayingsi lasona haibü aying.
Kaneibü songdakbü pendou kho liko satan apbei; haoen lau jungbü shuongei lapbei, haoen saabü to satasikei hapbü pendou liko lapbei.
Hibü ngei laukei, “Kü to chühashi, ngo aeibou haaplabü, kü mütli nouyangnyu shanga, ngo maang sula hautejem.”
Aieilausi mangsang pholia Thükenbou
Hobaje Elambüei sepai müt tan hoba kolia setbü shuong yoa laujin subü khek jungkei, hoba Kirbüei aih lamlean phokei.
Kan pienbü pholi shuong kailongei shenko kikei, hoba kolia setbü mütshuong haoen lolo bakhüna linküman kikei.
Hobaje Jihudabüeibü nongetshang kümbü haoei sungan apbukei. Hobaje kheijinei kanei yamkabü chema insiaubu lambo haukei.
Hobaje Dawid sangnyua khün juong yetbü to kanei maang kukei, hoba phangaenei süngküp kibü dei shuong kanei leishaikei.
Toukei kanei Jerusalema chem weanchühkei, hoba banyu kümthang kümetla shanga chem shuong kanei pankei.
Hobaje bamang kümthang penyi kanglanga kanei süngküp hangbou dei shanga dei thanshang kümbei. Lausikei thedangto thama aoei ho huongkei, kanei hao to maang aku.
Thükenbou
Lausikei chühashi, olinangko maangnyuangko masu pongsu hoba sanlon haitiko phe shauan ih yungyokei. “Senei shauakho hoba yungakho, aishanga ngietje sen hailabü,” dogo kanei dambei.
Lausikei Thükenbou
Hibü Thükenbou
“No hanei ai kümda, hoba hanei no ao dogo damda, khei ka shanga hanei hee thüngenko, kaibü hee thükaenei suokko thüngenan ka shanga laang thüka chem dangbü ho ai?
Chühashi, O no hauki yaangkibü müt,
Hobaje leitem che phatko, tongko tongko kaonyek saabü to souan koutilabü, hoba kaibü soneikangbü kailong shuong khüto haulabü, kaibü
Ngei no kaibü kümsilei ka apbulabü hoba no kishang ka no kuktilabü!”
Hobaje kho chaloua ngei ngo khangenbou Hilkiaeibü shou Eliakim ngalabü;
hoba ngei ngeibü hele hao la lekulabü, hoba haoei hao la shembe kaikulabü; hoba kaibü songdak hau hao la kuan aplabü hoba Jerusalema kibü shuong hoba Jihuda chungeibü bou hao yeilabü.
Hobaje Dawid chung sabi ngei haoeibü phaka peitian phokulabü; hoba haoei iplabü hoba ao müteikei akaplabü; hoba haoei khinlabü hoba aoeikei aiplabü.
Hobaje kaangbü kaoena ngei hao kojal tegü thüngan phokulabü, hoba boueibü chem shanga hao hangenbü Choba setshang yeilabü.
“Hibü hao la boueibü chem soneikangbü pendou, shousimi hoba longbü, thungshou phaushou weko, thungsiphau ka yeiyolabü thung pendou haoenei hao la ankulabü.
Kho chaloua, Thükenbou
Tair shangabü thusei ngühlang.
La pangko haapashi, O Tarshish longchem shuong; aishanga chem aki hoba chemaang to atla akilabü lele kho leiluakei. Kupra kaodak ka kho haoen jungto tang khitakei.
Sangsembo kiashi, O yungkoa kibü kaonyek shuong, Sidonbü namyaknamseibü shuong, haoen yungnyu shoongko paikei, namyaknamseibü shuong dei khatkei;
aoyou Nail shumang kabüei lang leda, aoyou phang ka namyak namseibüei haoei pailetbü hapbo kikei.
No himouko kishi, O Sidon, O yungnyu lapheishon, aishanga yungnyuei laua: “Ngo nahap shatei khonaku, ayingsi abuklet; ngei bousushou shuong asamen, ayingsi yaksashou shuong apangtei.”
Ladang ngühlang khoei Ijep sühlaje, haoen Tair ngühlangei aeibou khonsaklabü.
Kan Tarshish aetou hauashi, ngekko haapashi, kan yungko kaonyeka kibü shuong.
Kanei tonenbü sangnyu shuong shang- ieda khangan kibü shuong kho aoeibü youei hao saabüa kila sungjung satbü kho ho si?
Tair, laobou Chobaeibü khun kubou laoboua namyaknamseibü shuong Chobaeibü shousi shuong kikei. Hobaje laobou kaodaka hangenlabü namyaknamseibü shuong kikei, kho khulimbo aoei hai huongkei?
Yonglam lilibü pendou shatitatila hoba kaodaka nyensang nyenhang pendou nyikula shanga Thükenbou
Nail tegü kaneibü kaodak sopbo kouashi, O Tarshish nou- yangshou shuong, touje toketlabü ai aki.
Yungnyu thüka haoeibü ik shingakei, haoei Choba sangle shuong nyaakeikua; Foenicia shanga khünei lapheishon mautikula shanga
Hobaje haoei laukei, “No touje aolinlabü, O no khonkubü Sidon Nouyangshou! Meimeiashi, Kupra to hauashi, khüneikei no hakso akilabü.”

Assiriabü aying, lausikei Khaldibü khüto chühashi; ao- youei Tair kho yamkabü meisiau kishang la yeilabü thu janletkei; haoenei shilabü lapheishon shuong kümbei, haoenei saoeibü Choba setshang shuong jikan apbua; haoenei sao kho lusakbü ontou che la yeitia.
Wiyoashi, kan Tarshish longchem shuong; aieilausi kan lapheishon leilubüa apyoakei.
Kheijinei Choba chemdang che lalokche kida, kho tegü po anjinlei sühko Tair maan aplabü, hoba po anjinlei thon sühan phaia, Tair shanga suonlambü chiaa tegü haüthüklabü:
“Kaibü kongkin sungba, hoba khonga shoongaiashi, O maanapbü ho suonlamnyu; chikung maibü longtiashi, no damenlabü lele chia juong lauashi!”
Po anjinlei thonan phaia
Saoei namseibü ka ai pailetlaje
Chühashi,

Hobaje kho mütshuong to lai, kho tegü ungshedbou to kei kho tegü jetei; hoba sambü to lai, kho tegü bunyubou to kei; sambüsao tou lai, sambünyu to kei kho tegü; jekbou to lai, kho tegü yaakbou to kei; lotbou to lai, kho tegü lotkubou tokei; sungletbou tou lai, kho tegü kubou to kei kho khei kilabü.
Kaodak lemailela kongan aplabü, hoba lemailela huan aplabü; aishanga
Kaodakei mang- haapda hoba yuida; kaodak shepjung atda hoba nyaüan apda. Kaodakbü yaangenbü mütshuong heletda.
Kaodaka kibü shuongei kaodak shatida; aieilausi haoenei ngühkhüm shuong leilulabü, sangle ngühkhüm deikhüm inletkei, hoba ponpen shanga theletlanletbü ngühkhüm leilukei.
Hibü shedsikhauei kaodak suida; aoyou khünei kida haoen to shedbü hapda; khunak shousi shuong haikhümda, hoba müt shisho ong jouan kia.
Ih haanbüei mang haapda, semlüh long linoktham apda; jih chenei olinangko kibü mütshuong tou ngangda.
Lemchi kungei nyilang phatphatbü thonda, aoyou olinyoda haoeneibü ngüh thonda, kaangbü kongkinei olinbü thonda.
Haoenei chia lauko ih ayunglabü; aoyouei nyakidei yungda haoen la kho khaukulabü.
Panglangbü sangnyu tuongakei; aokei üetenlabü lele chem kho khinakei.
Ih shanga khonga ngekbü ngühlang kia, themai maangmai pendou menthubang apakei; kaonyek ka olinmaangmai sada.
Sangnyua lusakbü apyoakei, hoba khoeibü bakhün netla yeiakei.
Aishanga oliv bulong ka ngümletjinei ayingsi semlüh kheibü chaloua shem nitnyinbü tegü, phangshuong yoa kho tegü kaodaka kilabü.
Haoen joubü satenbü shuongei olinbüei ngüh longlabü,
Hibü, Israel Mühghaü, khei

Kaodak thonbü ka künei nyensang chia “Saopobü to soneikangbü” dogo lauko ditda. Lausikei ngei laukei, “Ngo ügütü! Ngo ügütü! Ngo linetda! Khüpbülangbü shuongei khüpbolangko jungeida, haoeneibü khüpsilang ai ai amaibou yeida!”
Hatlamoklabü sung ka thüka kia, O kaodaka kibü müt shuong.
Hobaje ao hatlamoklabü ngühlang ka satlaje püngkhün to atlabü; ao püngkhün ka satenlaje sunga minlabü; aishanga müha koulom shuong ipakei, hoba kaodak chemshang nyaakeida.
Kaodak maisho leilua, kaodak lemailela tühnyina. Kaodak maiko tennyina.
Ihei jaakbü müt tegü tuong nyinyi kilabü hoba chemshou tegü yeinakei soueilabü; hoba haoeibü ngühkhüm leilubü ho thüka yaang kilabü, hoba kho tuongbü kho nyibou apingailabü.
Kho chaloua ho haüthüklabü, khei
Hobaje langsenbü shuong thüngdanga leishaian phobü tegü haoen liko leisheilabü, hoba thüngdanga thüngan pholabü, hoba chalou lounyu kian peanchühlabü.
Kheijinei litnyu mangtüngtham aplabü hoba chanyu himoulabü, aishanga Ziona hoba Jerusalema hoba haoeibü jaishou shuong thedanga soneikangko Thükenbou
O
ngei no yaangentilabü,
ngei ka nyen sanglabü,
nyi seikümseilei küma;
shangieda kümthen kümbü maanglembü maimaithama haüthüka.
Aishanga nyi sangnyu shemtiko shaang che la yeitikei,
hoba lapheishon küman kibü sangnyu leilubü che la yeitikei;
küksithang shuongeibü laangchem touje akilabü,
kho nyibou ladangkei akümenenlabü.
Hibü hau kibü phangshuong mütliei no soneikangtilabü,
hatlamoklabü phangshuong sangnyu shuongei ka to hatlabü.
Aishanga kaangbüsekbü mütshuong khauangbü bamang kümthang
khulimbo lotbü yeinak tegü kijinei
no shalebü shanga hau kibü lapheishon,
yeinak ka satenshang hoba lemabü ka yemekoubü che kilabü.
Ulangtham kibüa lemabü tegü kilabü.
Nyi küksithang shuong ngüh üangko aptikei;
sangmei yemekoubüa lemabü tegü,
onou akakbü mütshuongei chia laubü nyi thaktilabü.
Ho shanga Thükenbou
Hobaje ho shongha haoei müt pendou thüka danga yukbü hoba phang pendou thüka yuklepbou kho mautilabü;
haoei ponpen shanga haibü kho suilabü. Thükenbou
Hobaje kho chaloua ho hai laulabü, “Chühashi, ho seneibü Mühghaü ki, senei hao chüheikei, hoba haoei sen khümenkei. Ho
Aishanga ho shongha
Hobaje dei itbüei dei itla ik shingbü tegü haoei khübü thüka ik shinglabü; lausikei haoeibü maangli maangsang ik yoa Mühghaüei hao tonletlabü.
Haoeneibü laphei kümthang suokbü haoei senletkulabü; haoei senan yantikulabü, khei kaoa, thamngua sühko senyankulabü.
Kho chaloua Jihuda kaodaka ho chia laulabü:
“Künei hau kibü sangnyu che kia;
khümenlabü shanga haoei kümthang hoba thangetlabü kümlabü.
Ngühmai jungeibü saopobü phang atla shanga kanei bakhün ipashi.
Ka to ikphen laman kibü maangpon nyi hakso benbüsoubüa phoda;
aieilausi nyi hao to mailemda.
Kanei ponpen shanga
aieilausi
Aishanga haoei thükaenei, sangnyu suokbüa kibü shuong senyankei,
haoei kho phangto yantikei;
haoei kho kao hima, khei thamngua sühko sungyankei;
Youei kho nakan yantilabü;
khei shalebü youei, hoba thuibü akibüeibü younak yeitilabü.
Saopobü lamnyu tangsheitham kia;
saopobüeibü lamnyu nyi lenglengtikuda.
Kaibü matjembü lamnyua, O
kaibü nyen damenlabü kho küneibü soushou maangdak ki.
Kü soushouei ngei no nangnak maangdakko kikei,
haü, ngeibü maanga soushouei ngei no aeibou lamda.
Aieilausi ladang kaibü matjembü kaodaka kilaje,
kaodaka kibü mütshuongei saopobü ditletda.
Amaibü to onou lenasikei haoei saopobü aditletda;
maangtangbü kaoa haoei amaiko jungeida,
hoba
O
khei yingasikei haoenei ühüpda.
Haoen la ka mütshuong shangabü kaibü maangdak haptiashi,
hoba haoen himou bautiashi.
Kaibü dangbou shuong shanga phobü wanei haoen suitiashi.
aishanga nyi kün shanga kümsilei pendou kümbua.
O
ka to liman lubü bunyu shuongei kün thüka songdaka,
lausikei künei ka nyen ong hangenda.
Haoen haikhüma, haoen lang akida;
haoen yeme che ong yingkei, haoen apingailabü.
Nyi haoen kayangei pean chühkei hoba haoen leilutikei;
nyi haoen damenbü khümbo mautikei.
Nyi phang haatia, O
nyi phang haatiyaangtikei.
No soneikangko kia;
nyi kaodak leikhuleidang pendou yaangngaitia.
kaibü hakbü haoen to kijinei haoenei subüjabü hautikei.
Mang akongbü sao na hapla jih nyangko loujinei,
sao khonkuei ngekbü phatko
O
Kün mang akongko kikei, kün na hapla khonkuko kikei,
lausikei künei yei ong bukletkei.
Künei kaonyu la khümenbü asungba;
künei kaodakbü müt la abukku.
Lausikei kaibü haibü lang kilabü;
haoeneibü mang langngailabü.
O thamngua lang kibü shuong, pienashi hoba olinbü ngekyoashi!
Aishanga kaibü nindei kho ngeyangbü nindei;
hoba aoyou haian ki
Hauashi, kü mütli, no kaibü shemjang to atashi, hoba ka phainei kou khingngailangashi; haoeibü maangshat adan shongko no lolo khonei huashi.
Chühashi,
Kho chaloua
Khünyet hai laulabü; “Maangamailabü semlüh bamang, kanei ho shanga chia lauashi!
Ngo
Ngo maangpoklabü ai aki. Ngo khulimbo sang hoba jaklongei lason huiletkei yingma! ngo haoen khulimbo meimeilabü. Ngei haoen liko jikan aplabü.
Kho khei aying longa haoen lolo kü phang to lotan satetlangashi; haoenei kü to sangmai kümtiashi, haü, kü to sangmai kümtiashi.”
Kho chaloua Jakob li atlabü, Israel tonglabü hoba tongbü kho bunglabü, hoba haoeneibü maiei kaodak pendou shenlabü.
Sao to ngümbü shuong to
Haoei haoen takan chühko kaodak ka shian sattiko meimeikei; chaangbou yei soubü chaloua haoei haoen kaangbü yeiei souan sattikei.

Hibü khoei Jakobei shonbü shedbü kho soulanglabü, hoba haoeibü shabü apbü hek pendou ho kilabü; khei haoeneibü lemshang laang pendou laangthu tegü netla yeiko ngümnyinkulabü, khei Asherim ayingsi jenjuokbü lembü touje akümtilabü.
Aishanga thangetan phobü sangnyu shakkeishakko yam phatko apyoan hoba inletan kia, khünei masu shoushou lamshaulabü hoba khünei hao leketnyu yeplabü, hoba khünei kibü bubhek shuong jepshaulabü.

Ladang khoeibü bubhek shuong linlaji, yaksa shuong loulabü, hoba wan sapan phokulabü. Aishanga ho ditenbü akibü mütli ki; hibü aoei haoen kümbei haoei haoen shanga sanouko adamlabü hoba aoei haoen yeitikei haoei haoen to maang ashiklabü.
Kho chaloua Eufrates shumang ka Ijep shumang sühko
Kho chaloua teklaang yaangbü metlabü; hoba aoyou Assiria kaodaka mauan ki, hoba aoyou lühbaka ayobü phang Ijep kaodaka ki, loulabü hoba Jerusalem saopobü shongha haoenei
Ihei jaakan kibü haoeneibü yomang kaodak maibü khünei kibü haoeneibü soneikangbü hemaibü jikletko kibü chipen hoba Efraim ihei jaakbü shuong yonglambü Choba khun shanga ügütü!
Chühashi,
Efraimbü ihei jaakbü shuong yonglam lilibü khun kho youei nakeilabü;
hoba haoeibü soneikangbü hemaibü nyaületko kibü chipen laobou yomang kao maibü khünei ki, sulang anepjinei hekbü bhuk tegü kilabü, laobou mütei kho hapsilengko haoeibü ika kitoua shauan apda.
Kho chaloua Thükenbou
Hobaje ao matjemshanga setda, hao shanga ngühmai soushou hoba aoyouei bakhün ka lason thangan ngaitida haoen shanga hau kilabü.

Lausikei habü hokei ih hoba nyakidei danko ngomeida hoba ayinglamto hauda; ungshedbou hoba mütli shuong nyakideiei ayinglam to hauda, ihei haoen suia hoba nyakideiei haoen ayinglam to haua, nyekei haplabü seia haoenei maang shikda, matjem kubüa haoen phaiyetda.
Aieilausi khümsok pendou ngaitibü hoba makeilakei shenakei, khoei sakteibü kaoen che ongkei aki.
“Ao la haoei ngelabü songsido lenla? Hobaje ao la haoei ngühlang kho ditentila? Nasakshou sen apsilengko, tou sen ka keksilengko to sai?
Aishanga kho ngühkhüm che thena ngühkhüm che; ngühlin che thena ngühlin che; haneikei hansho khüneikei hansho!”
Maimai li khipan, hoba küksithang ngühyem danko haoei habü mütli to joyolabü.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Honei hakso kia, hüan mangan kibou la kanei hakso kuashi,” hoba, “Ho hau sinngaishang ki,” khei yingasikei haoenei ngüha alekuda.
Hibü
Hibü Jerusalema mütli thüka songdakbü nyikubü müt,

Aieilausi kanei laukei, “Haibü to künei thebülanbü che küma, hoba Sheol to kün theyolanyobü che kia; ladang sopbojaiko koubü shieikoe danlaje, kho kün jungto aloulabü, hoba sen satenshang senei amlangbü la yeitia, hoba lepbülangbü phanga sen hua.”
Hibü
Hobaje ngei matjembü kho takbü lüh hoba saopobü kho laangsaü takbü lüh yeitilabü, sen laang khoei yepeibü satenshang kuan aplabü, hoba deiei hushang jonlepbo koutilabü.”
Hobaje haibü to kan theyolanyobü kho lemailela mautikulabü, hoba Sheol yoa kan thebülanbü ühaüthüklabü, ladang sopbo koubü shieikoe danlaje kheijinei haoei kan phangaenei nakeitilabü.
Ladüngnei kho danjung haulaje, khoei kan künlabü, aieilausi kho ngeyang weko hoba chajiha hoba nangnak weko danjung haulabü, hoba kho ngühlang ditenla hatlamoklabü ong kilabü.
Aieilausi shen kho mütei kho thüka lenglabü toje tuibou, hoba jembü lolo seileplabü toje hanbou ki.
Aishanga haoeibü kümsilei kümla haoeibü maang- panglabü kümsilei, hoba haoei haoeibü maangpanglabü kümsilei, haoeibü kümsilei haüthüktila shanga, Perazima Shongh tegü
Hibü tou, kan khühbü kaangngaitisi amaibüla, kan nyikubü shuong teyei; aieilausi Mühghaü, Thükenbou
Kan nou hangashi, hoba ngeibü ngüh ditashi; maang kuashi, hoba ngeibü ngühlau ditashi.
Sek shapbüei youli wenla athakko sek ong shapdang leda si? Haoei athakko kao laünyinda hoba shapnyinda sai?

Ladang tang kho yentilaje haoei pendoua monshu hoba shikmei maitibü wenda aying lo? Whet youshou seka linlina hoba barli seka jaletan kibüa hoba khoeibü napheinei wentek kümbü youshou wennyinda aying lo?
Aishanga haoeibü Mühghaüei hao la tükde shean lenda.
Aishanga shikmei maitibü kho nitshanga peisilei akbüei anitnyinda, ayingsi monshu tokei kailong youei anitda, lausikei shikmei maitibü kho bungümei ngümda, hoba monshu kho juei ngümda.
Youshou netla yeiko anitnyinda, aishanga haoei kho ponpendouje alomda, hoba haoei kailong you hoba haoeibü koli shuongei kho sennyinan phosikei, haoei kho angümnyinda.
Hokei Thükenbou
O, Ariel, Ariel, Dawidei kümbü haksoshang sangnyu, ka shanga ügütü! Po to po jinyokushi, lemsilang sepeisaiko loutishi!
Kheijinei ngei Ariel, maangto shattilabü, hoba khünei haapyobü hoba manghaapbü kilabü. Khei yingsikei sao kü thedanga Ariel ong kilabü.
Hobaje ngei ka khulimbo panget lelabü hoba ka khulimbo lapheishonei thangetlabü, hoba ka khulimbo ngei lapheishon shelabü.

Kheijinei phang to kouan nyi kaomaang ka ngüh anglabü; hoba kao ka kaibü ngüh kouan longlabü. Kao ka amaibü soushou cheeibü ngüh tegü kao ka longlabü, hoba kao ka nyi ngüh laubü ngühlang hanbü loushedlabü.
Lausikei kaibü dangboulabou shuong thamngu netshou tegü kilabü hoba hatlamoklabü mütshuong kho soujung satbü youshou sho tegü kilabü; haü, kho chemala mangde ong haüthüklabü.
Thükenbou
Hobaje Ariel khulimbo wapyobü phang tan pendou khei sao khulimbo hoba saoeibü haukibü lapheishon hoba sao maangto shattibü khulimbo wapyobü manghlibü che tegü nangnak mangh che tegü kilabü;

mühei haiko kibü mütei haoeibü mangha nyak shauda, lausikei hao senyühashembo pienbü tegü kilabü; ayingsi deilako kibü müt cheei dei yungko manghlida, lausikei deilamang amaiko semthetnyu pibü tegü kilabü; Zion shongh khulimbo wapyobü phang pendou kabü tan khei kilabü.
Mangyoashi hoba maang- pangyoashi, kan lolo nyek thuashi hoba nyek thuan kishi, haoen haoenei yungthüng yunga, lausikei ihei aying; haoen ngomeida lausikei nyakideiei aying!
Aishanga

Hobaje tou kan thedanga mangsang pendou dobü shangjin- an kibü ngüh tegü kia, laobou müt cheei hapbü ngebü chela kujinei, “Sanoudambo ho weashi,” dogo suajaa longa haoei laulabü, “Ngei athük, aishanga ho shangjinan kia.”
Ayingsi cheei ao hapbüngebü aying hao la kuko, “Sanoudambo ho weashi,” dogo laua longa, haoei laulabü, “Ngo hapbüngebü aying, ngei wela athük.”
Kheijinei

Hibü chühashi, ngei ho mütli yoa khei maangpanglabü kümsilei hoba seikümseilei nyibou kümlabü, hoba haoen songbüdobü mütshuong songsido maulabü, hoba haoeneibü ditenbü mütshuong yoa leshang akiko aplabü.”
Aoyouei honsiyou

Kanei kümsilei khü- peilangeikuda! Chakyaübü kho shungkung kao to takteiyola tegütham! Küman kibü peisileiei kümbou to, “Haoei ngo aküm” dogo laulep lo? Ayingsi chakyaübou to chakei, “Haoei ai angekei” dogo lauenlep lo?
Lebanonbü buhek hekbü kaonyek yeitilabü, hoba buhek hekbü kaonyek lamang la yeila toukei jih tuisho ong aki lo?
Kho chaloua obangbü shuongei lea kibü ngüh shuong webü ditlabü hoba thüngmangmanga kibü ka nyek thubüei nyekei haplabü.
Toukei sembüambü shuong olinbü
Aishanga asük alangbü songdakbü mauan aplabü, hoba müla nyikubü thonan aplabü, hoba amaibü lamthen kümbü pendou konglabü.
Ao- youei müt at shedtila ngüh püpbuda hoba aoyouei bakhüna sung sankuda, hoba aoyouei ngühmaanglanbü amlangbü la yeitiko apbuda haoen pendou wapan apbulabü.
Hibü Abraham khümenbou
Aieilausi ladang haoeibü shousi shuongei haoen yoa kü ikei kümbü haplaje, haoenei kü nyen saüenlabü, haü, haoenei Jakob Saopobou saüenlabü, hoba haoenei Israel Mühghaü to soumo hatlabü.
Aoyouei matjembüa mashikkei haoenei ditenko laulabü, hoba aoyouei nyamnyamkei haoenei lenbü ditenlabü.
Aoyouei kü ka songsido apheko Ijep to meimeian Faraoeibü haua haoen lolo hau kingaila hoba Ijepbü yemephanga maanglem kila shanga yankei!
Hibü Faraoeibü hau kho kan himou hoba Ijepbü yeme phanga maanglem kibü kho panglangtilabü.
Aishanga haoeneibü Choba shuong Zoana kiasikei hoba haoeneibü lambubou shuong Hanes to louan kiasikei.
Haoen la ku kula athükbü khei thuibü ayingsi ku akuenbü mütli danko haoen himoulabü hoba nyen shedla ong yinglabü.”

Negeb meisiau shanga thusei ngühlang che. Khonsak hoba khonkubü kaodak, ai ka molosaonyu nyunyu hoba paang, lüh kibü pinyu hoba wan tegü sengjung haubü pinyu, haoenei nyaksinam shuong gadu shoushou taaka hoba haoeneibü thanbü nyaksinam uteibü angudonga künan haoen la ku akuenbü mütli jungto hauda.
Aishanga Ijepbüeibü thuibü kho amlang hoba aikei leshang aki, khei yingbüei ngei sao to setan kibü Rahab dogo lauda.
Tou hauashi hoba loulabü chaloua aukabü lela haoen thedanga kho laangdak chenei doashi;
Aishanga habü ho lenbü aditbü mütli shuong, maang asangbü shousi shuong,
Haoenei mangsang hapbü to “Tehüp” dogo lauda, hoba thuseibü to “Ai tükde kho teteten, kün to ngüh maibü ong laushi, khüpbolangko tetenshi.
Lamnyu ka longan apshi, lamkhong ka sepeinyu kukashi! Israel Sao- pobou kün la teditti,” dogo lauda.
Israel Saopobouei hai lauda, “Aieilausi kanei ho ngüh wela ale, hoba khüpbülangbü si kombünongbüa maanglem phoda hoba khübü to nongan kida;
hibü ho shedshonbü kan thükto kümthang suokbü kaangan tuongla ong kibü mangde leiluan tuongbü kan thükto lotbü tegü kilabü.

Hobaje haoei kho chakyaübüeibü chak aikei ajouko ngümnyinbü phatko leilukulabü, hibü ho netla yeiko ngümnyinbü yoa hokjung ka wankak yasebü sungenla, ayingsi deidang ka dei khujin phoushou che ongkei üpyolabü.”
Aishanga Thükenbou
Lausikei kanei laukei, ‘Aying, kün kolia setan satlabü.’ Hibü kan satlabü! Kanei laukei. ‘Kün sobüsepbü kolia setlabü.’ Hibü kan shibü shuong sobüsepbü kilabü!
Müt cheei hatlensi hajar che satlabü; müt ngaoei hatlensi kan shongha kibü amaaphilabü che tegü hoba shonghshoua nisankung che tegü kan üpyo shongko satlabü.
Khei yingasikei kan to onoula
O, Jerusalema kibü Zion mütli, touje kan ühaaplabü; kanei ngekbü ngühlang ditjinei haoei kan to onoulabü; haoei ditjinei haoei kan to jongailabü.
ei kan la dangboueibü nyak hoba khonkubü dei kuasidogokei, kaneibü lenbou touje hao lolo huan akilabü lausikei kaneibü nyekei hao haplabü.
Hobaje kanei ladang mai aeto ayingsi nanae aeto sepeilaje, kaneibü nouei kan phainei ngüh che hai lauko ditlabü, “Lamnyu ho yingkei, honei paiashi.”

Hobaje chandinamei naanglepbü jakenbü heangsho hoba hon tühan jinbü heangsho noksa kanei shaan aplabü; khübü kho kan shanga asaopobü peisilei che tegü yeian aplabü, hoba kanei khübü to, “Koulangashiü,” dogo laulabü!

Kheijinei haoei kanei kaonyua wenan phobü kesiong yemtila lang yantikulabü hoba kaonyu ka shusiphon müisiman maibü apsileko longlabü. Khünyet kaneibü shatsinam lamshaushang khongthuyaanga lamshaulabü.
Hobaje sek shapbü masu pongsu si gadu shoushou shuongei maisho sipbü hoba jem khonbü youho nyailabü.
Haitibü chalou yaangbü khünyet, ladang lapheishon shuong tuonglaje, shongh suokbü wekoa hoba shonghshou suokbü wekoa shushou shuong koulabü.
Ladang
Chühashi,
Haoei hakhinbü yungsen tegü ngüma thükko longakei. Mautilabü shangkuei phangshuong sinan aplabü; hoba maubü lam to leila shanga mütshuongeibü sembunga senbü janglüh kilabü.
Lausikei kan shangaje saopobü lemlibü you tegü hoba
Aieilausi
Ladang
Hobaje ngümbü juei
Aishanga shangied ka thama juokshang che lamlean haüthükakei, haü, ho Choba shanga lamleakei. Haoei wan si bu apsileko phoan haübü hoba hopabü kümbuakei;

Aoyouei thuibü lambo Ijep to louyanda hoba koli to maanglem kida, haoen shanga ügütü! Juong yingbü ka haoenei kailong shuong to, koli sepai shuong juong kibü ka khübü to maanglemda, lausikei Israel Sao- pobou to achüh, ayingsi

Khei yingasikei hao songsido kia, hoba jembü ngüh asungngaida, hoba amaibü sungbakuda. Aoyouei amaibü kümda, haoen khulimbo hoba aoyouei shedbü shabü kümsilei kümda, haoen to thuibü shuong khulimbo meimeilabü.
Lausikei Ijepbü kho Mühghaü aying, müt ki; hoba haoeneibü koli soushou aying, phe ki. Hibü ladang
Aishanga
Ngühlepan seengeibü aushuong tegü, Thükenbou
Aishanga kho chaloua haoen mütpem wekoei chandinam heangsho hoba honeibü heangsho, laobou kaneibü shabütabü ikei kan shanga kümbei kho kanei aplabü.
Kheijinei Assiria inei tuonglabü, kho müteibü inei aying; inei suilabü, lausikei mütmaieibü inei aying. Haoen in thedang ka satlabü, hoba haoeibü heshou shuong aao la yeitilabü.
Hatbülühbüei songdakbou langjung satkulabü, lapang langh to leiyeibü shuong mokbüei nisan apyoan satlabü,” dogo haoeibü wan Ziona, hoba haoeibü wanhap Jerusalema kibou
Chühashi, Choba cheei sao- pobüa songdaklabü, hoba khuleibü shuongei ngühmaanglanbüa kaplabü.
Hobaje haoen mütpem weko yei ka satenshang, hoba yeinak ka hushang tegü, kaolina shumang phatko hoba chalin kaodaka laang yaangbü yemekoubü phatko kilabü.
Kheijinei aoyouei hapda haoenei nyek amulabü hoba ao- youei ditda haoenei nou hangan kilabü
Hobaje thounouboueibü maanga ditenbü songsido kilabü hoba li khipan kibü shuongei shangashatko laula panteilabü.
Touje ngoubü to yaangenbou dogo alaulabü, ayingsi ngühmaang alanbü to yaangbü dogo alaulabü.
Aishanga duduyaya mütei soungouabü ngühei joyolabü, hoba haoen maangpona amaibü huon daklabü. Haoei Mühghaü to ühütbü kümsilei kümlabü, hoba
Ngühmaang alanbü peisilei kho amaibü ki, yepeijawebü ngühei eaaoabü mautilabü, khambouei tükde lauasikei haoei huon amaibü takda.
Lausikei mangsembü mütei maangmai kümsilei kümda; hoba maimang kümaleia younak kümda.
Kan helelea kibü yaksa shuong meimeiashi, hoba ngeibü ngüh ditashi; kan asangadobü yaksa shuong, ngei laubü ngüh to nou haangashi!
Po che phaia, chalou shishoko kan khonsaklabü, kan asangadobü yaksa shuong; aieilausi semlüh seka mai aheklabü hoba aikei asunglabü.
Sensentham lühashi, kan helelea kibü yaksa shuong, lühjilühko kishi, kan asangadobü mütshuong; nei hangletashi hoba kan lolo mütkong yeishi; kaneibü shenjanga senounei shembe kaiashi!
Sek maibü shanga hoba mai hekbü semlüh shanga;
kü mütlieibü kaonyeka jaklong hoba jakham yemlabü, hoba olinangko kibü sangnyua olinbü chem shanga kaneibü khukhu to jangashi!
Aishanga Chobaeibü chem apyolabü hoba müt juong kibü sangnyu nangletlabü, shongh yamkabü gadu shuong olinyoshang, shatsinam tan tana lamshaushang shanga thüngshang la yeilabü.
Thükae ka sen thükto soushou khüpan ajinkushongko; hoba yam kho mai hekkubou sek ayei shongko; hoba buhek hekbü sek kho yamlamang ayeiti shongko kho khei kilabü.
Kheijinei yama ngühmai matjem kilabü hoba saopobü hek hekshang seka kilabü.
Hobaje saopobü kümka leika longbü kho hakso kilabü; hoba ngühmai ka longbü kho ponpen shanga eaaoa kibü hoba maanglem kibü kilabü.
Hobaje kü mütli shuong sangmaia kila hanghangyeplabü, hoba haksobü kaoena sangsembo maisho kienlabü.
Lausikei yam chengshemlabü hoba sangnyu leiluan phokulabü;
kan aoyouei shumang pendou nyangko lilabü wenda, hoba masu pongsu si gadu shuong yangan litian lamshautida, haüa.

No leilutikubü müt, no aleiluko kiasikei; soshauso- yungbü müt, aoeikei ka ka asoshauko kiasikei, no ügütü! Nyi leilubü thonan phaiaje, no leilulabü hoba nyi soshausoyungbü thonan phaiaje ka to soshauso- yunglabü.
O
Lemenbü ngüh ditan mütshuong koujung ngaida, no lolo meimeijinei phangshuong linda.
Hobaje nyi soletbü peisilei shuong kotkotyangei haushaibü tegü haushailabü, koksing shuong tomjung satbü tegü haoenei kho thüka saiyeilabü.
yaangenakei, aishanga hao thüka kida; haoei Zion ngühmai hoba saopobüei shentiakei;
hoba khümenbü songsido hoba hapbüngebü songsihon kaibü jihaphaia kaangkhühtham kilabü.
Chühashi, haoeneibü lakjaibü shuongei khongthua ngekda; sangmei hakso shanga lambubou shuong aeibou haapda.
Lamkhong shuong apyoa, hoba wakoubü shuong akiko thonan apa. Haoeibü jishuoklamshuok ngühkhüm leilua, youkobü shuong nyikua hoba aolakei soumo akuda.
Kaodakei manghaapda, hoba haapyoda, Lebanon himou bauakei hoba yuian apda; Sharon kaomai yo yamla yeia, Bashan si Karmel Shongh pikyik ea.
“Tou ngo meimeilabü,” dogo
Kanei youshou sho shia künda, kanei youho buklabü, kaneibü hak kho kan suilabü wan ki.
Mütshuong shini juokbü tegü juoklabü; hoba jakham wapan wana jikbü tegü jiklabü.
Ngei ai kümbei, kan saabüa kibü shuong ditashi, hoba kan nyangbüa kibü shuong, ngeibü hau ngeashi.”
Ziona shabü shuong hatda; Mühghaü to ühütbü shuong hatbümokbüei süha: “Sen yokabü ao suibü wan yoa kienla? Sen yokabü ao ponpen lonko kibü wanlong yoa kienla?”
Aoei ngühmaanglanko paida, hoba tangshaitham lauda, aoei mü khüpettiko ku hapbü mangsenda, aoei besa asungletla ik ngailangda, aoei sii angtibü aditla noua sakda, hoba amaibü to achühla nyek muda,
hao thükaenei kilabü, hao maangsangko kishanga lapheishona kilabü. Haoeibü shausiyung hao la kulabü, hao deiei ladangkei akonglabü.
Kaibü nyekei Choba kho hemaibüa haplabü; haoenei kaodak saabü ka chühlabü.
Hatlamoklabü thüka kaibü maangponei damanchühlabü: “Webou yaangbou kho lanei ki? Khüm hebou kho lanei ki? Laangchem wean- chühbou kho lanei ki?”
Li khipan, khei nyi aditenlabü lele, joyobü nyi dit ashuoklabü lele haüko joyobü mütli, hatlamoklabü mütli nyi ühüplabü.
Seneibü lemsilang kamshaishang Zion sangnyu to chühashi; kaibü nyekei Jerusalem haplabü, sangsembo kibü chem atopeibü neichem; ho jaangbü ladangkei alühenlabü ayingsi habü lüh at ongkei athetlabü.
Aieilausi khünei shumang yaangbü hoba shumang hanbü kishang,
Aishanga

Kaibü phenyobü janglüh sengakei; khoei longshing aenei thaonyu hau akitien, khoei longlei nei kho asengenen. Kheijinei soletbü peisilei phejan juong janlabü, hoba sokebüei mangkei sangshibü peisilei ka maibü soan sunglabü.
Khünei Ziona kibü aoeikei, “Ngo shatda;” dogo alaulabü, hoba khonei kibü mütshuong pendoueibü shabü amai apbulabü.
Kan phangshuong, mütli pendou nyangko kaiya, hoba nou haangko ditashi! Kaonyua kibü mütyang, mütshang khümboei ditashi.
Aishanga phang pendou khulimbo, hoba haoeneibü lakjaibü dan khulimbo,
Haoen haitibü tekan aplabü, hoba haoeneibü haibü mang ka nyaülüm longlabü hoba haoeneibü sii shongha aan koulabü.

Hobaje müha khanshoulitshou pendou netla yeilabü, hoba mühshuong phekhon tegü tujung ngailabü, hoba semlüh long ka ik heletbü tegü ayingsi bhuklong ka ik thakletbü tegü khübü khanshoulitshou shuong pendou shemlabü.
Aishanga khuthüka ngeibü in khauang longbüei shenan apa. Chühashi, Edom thükto hoba ngei khükbüuokbü thükto matjemlabü kho louyanlabü.
eibü in siiei nyaka, kho haabüei san shoushou hoba loneibü sii, sanloneibü kelang haabüei yuklepakei, aieilausi Bozraa
Yamkabü masu pongsu shuong yoa hoba masu paangshou shuong yoa tuonglabü; hoba haoen kaodak siia hamlabü; hoba haoen haabüei yukleplabü.
Aishanga kho chalou kho
Hobaje khünei kibü shumang shuong moli la yeilabü hoba kho kaodak wansatbü moli, hoba kho kaonyek longan kibü bunai moli la yeilabü!
Changea yingsikei nangnak yingsikei kho anyetlabü; kho wankhük ponpen khuijung anglabü. Meten meten kho apshang danglabü; aokei kho peithetko adanlabü.
Lausikei yungau si san kishang yeilabü; hoba khonei ukhoungba si aukhomakmak kilabü.
Kheijinei sao to Choba sangle dogo laulabü lele ai akiteilabü, hoba saoeibü songdakbü shuong aikei akilabü.
Hobaje kho Chobaeibü chema jakham yemlabü hoba khoeibü lapheishona senou si jak angbü sang yemlabü; hoba kho selong si ostrik shuong thüngshang yeilabü.
Hobaje phetsen kaodak yammei shuongei, sho si yao to haüyolabü hoba jembü thangbou to ngekyolabü, haü, nangnakbü meisiau amaibü khünei kilabü, hoba haoei haksoshang haplabü.
Hobaje khünei ukhoungbaei saoeibü hap takko, tei teiko hoba shoushou püpbo saoeibü kaakphanga leishailabü; haü, khünei hogon kamsheilabü hoba jembü himshuong yoa kilabü.
Kanei
Hobaje haoei haoen shanga phaang pakkei, hoba haoeibü ikei haoen la jolühei takletkua, haoenei kho ponpen lelabü, meten meten haoen khünei kilabü.
Yamlamang si kaolin phetsen kaonyekei olinyolabü
hoba jak chipen bungbüei sanglabü.
Kho apsileko bunglabü hoba khei chia laubü ngühei olinyolabü;
Lebanoneibü soneikangbü,
Karmel si Sharoneibü soumo ho la kulabü;
haoenei
Mühghaü soumo yaang haplabü.
Kanei hau akibü ik hau kitiashi,
hoba hau akibü youkük kaangkhühtham yeitiashi.
Aoyoueibü maangpon hatbü lühbüa ki haoen to lauashi,
“Hau kiashi, tehüt, chühashi,
kaneibü Mühghaü phoklambü yoa Mühghaüei kungaila louada,
hao louan kan khümenlabü.”
Kheijinei nyekthubü nyek iplabü,
hoba obangbü noukhün yetlabü.
Kheijinei sokebü mütei meishi tegü saiyeilabü
hoba likhipbüei chia laulabü, aieilausi, yamlamanga dei paklabü
hoba phetsen kaoa dei shumang koulabü.
Hobaje lamennyu kibü phetsenei thimdei dangshang yeilabü,
hoba deila phaman kibü kaonyuei dei koushang shumang yeilabü.
Selong kishang, lanei haoen thüngda
kho thakdu si sang yemshang yeilabü.
Hobaje khünei lamkhong hoba lamnyu che kilabü,
hoba kho to, “Saopobü Lamnyu,” dogo laulabü.
Asaopobüei kho lamnyua apailabü;
ho Lamnyua paibü dan shanga ong kilabü;
amaibü ngoubüloubü shuong khünei anongeilabü.
Khünei molosaonyu aikei akilabü,
ayingsi kho thükto haitila maangdakbü meisiau aikei üanglabü,
haoen khünei athünglabü.
Lausikei angthetbü shuong ong khünei pailabü.
Hobaje
hoba chia lauko Zion to loulabü,
hoba ponpen thon akibü olinbü haoeneibü khua kilabü.
haoen olinangbü hoba maangpon olinbüei shenlabü,
hoba maangmau si maangshat satan apbulabü.
Tou Hezekia Choba songdak po anthüklei boubüa Assiria Choba Sennakheribei thangtetan kibü Jihudabü sangnyu pendou komlepbo angkei hoba khübü kho lekei.

Hobaje Assiria Chobaei Lakhish ka haoeibü lajamleibou yoa sepai tan yaangbü che Jerusalem to Hezekia Choba jungto hautikei. Hobaje lajamleibou kho neisakbü kao lamkhong lason thüka deileishang thükkabou thimdei dangshang nyangko lokei.
Kheijinei Choba chema ikjaibou Hilkiaeibü shou Eliakim dobou Shebna hoba lüngbüdobü dobou Asafeibü shou Joa hao jungto loukei.
Kheijinei sepai leiyeibouei haoen to laukei, “Kanei Hezekia to laushi, ‘Hai, Assiria Choba yaangbouei lauda: Ainei maanglem phoan no hainyu maang yaangda?’
Ngei lauda, wapyo shanga kaibü huon hoba hau amlangbü ngüh shuong ki; tou nyi kü khu limbo meimeian aoto nyi mailem kida?

Chühashi, ho Ijep, thakdu julo nitnyinbü che, laobou thükto mütei nongalonga kho haoeibü ikto atlabü hoba sepyetlabü, kho thüka nyi maanglem phoda. Kho tegü Farao, Ijepbü Choba, hao to mailem phobü pendou to ki.”
Lausikei nyi kü to, “Küneibü Mühghaü
Hibü ngei tou ka to sudajada, ngeibü bunyubou Assiria Choba la thebülanbü kuashi, hoba ngei ka la koli hajar nyi kulabü, nyi ong khübünei settila lakjaibü shuong hapenalonga!
Khülonga, nyi kailong hoba koli sepai shanga Ijep to maanglem kisije, lai küman nyi ngeibü bunyubou khangenbü hanbüshou yoa lajamleibou che the sepeinyu ngaitienla?
Hobaje tou

Kheijinei Eliakim, Shebna hoba Joaei lajamleibou to laukei, “Ngei ka to sudajada, no khangenbü shuong to Aramaik ngühyema joyoashi, aieilausi künei kho ditenda. Kümthanga kibü mütshuongei ditko kün to Jihudabü ngühyema tejoyoma.”

Lausikei, lajamleibouei laukei, “Ngeibü bunyubouei habü ngüh kaibü bunyu to, hoba kan to ong joyola ngo hautikei sai? Kümthang thüka setan kibü shuong, hoba kan yoan, aoyou jembüeibü phet shaula hoba jembüeibü jet yungla ki, khübü mütshuong to joyolakei ohauti sai?”
Kheijinei lajamleibou lokei, hoba Jihuda ngühyema ngekko laukei, “Kanei Assiria Choba, Choba yaangboueibü ngüh ditashi!
Chobaei hai lauda: Hezekia la kan tehuonetti, haoei kan akhümenlabü;
ayingsi,

Hezekiaeibü ngüh tedit; aishanga Assiria Chobaei hai lauda: Kaneibü sangmai kü to kümshi, hoba kü jungto longashi; hoba kan mütpem wekoei jembü semlüh hoba mütpem wekoei jembü bhukhek shauashi, hoba kan mütpem wekoei lulueibü deikhün ka dei yungashi;
ngo louan kaneibü kaonyek tegübü kaodak che to, youshou hoba semlüh ih kibü kaonyek, shausi- yung hoba semlüh sek kibü kaodak to kan leian ohaushongko shauayungashi.
Hamat si Arpad mühghaü shuong lanei ki? Sefarvaim mühghaü shuong lanei ki? Ngeibü ik ka haoenei Samaria khümenkei sai?
Khübü kaodak mühghaü shuong yoa laobouei ong kü ik ka haoeibü kaodak khümenan ki. Kholonga lai küman
Lausikei haoenei ngüh üangko kikei hoba hao to ngüh che ongkei ajongai; aieilausi Chobaei, “Haoen to tejoyo,” dogo sakkuan kikei.
Kheijinei Hezekiaeibü shou ikjaibou Eliakim, dobou Shebna hoba lüngbüdobü dobou Asafeibü shou Joa, haoeneibü neisimei jitnyinan Hezekia jungto loukei, hoba hao to lajamleiboueibü ngüh pendou lenkei.
Hezekia Chobaei kho ditjinei haoei neisimei jitnyinkei hoba hao lolo senounei neikei, hoba
Hobaje ikjaibou hoba dobou Shebna hoba ungshedbou jaishou shuong senounei neian Amozeibü shou thuseibou jungto haoei hautikei.
Hobaje haoenei hao to laukei, “Hezekiaei hai lauda: Khonkulabü, haklabü hoba himou baulabü chalou ho ki; aieilausi nashousi buklabü jih süha lausikei bukletla hau akibü him ki.
Aingenyu
Ladang Hezekia Chobaeibü khangenbü shuong Isaia jungto loukei,
Isaiaei haoen to laukei, “Kanei ho hai kaneibü
Chühashi, ngei hao la soushou che jinkulabü, hoba haoei ngühpakpak che ditlabü hoba haoeibü kaonyek to sepeinyu ngailabü hoba haoeibü kaonyeka ngei hao inei haitilabü.’”
Hibü lajamleibou ngaikei hoba Assiria Chobaei Libna khulimbo wapyoko hapbei; aieilausi Lakhish ka hao banga dogo haoei ditkei.

Hobaje Ethiopiabü Choba Tirhakaei leian Ijepbü sepai shuong hao khulimbo wapyola longakei dogo lauko Assiria Choba Sennakheribei ditkei. Hobaje ladang haoei kho ditkei, haoei Hezekia jungto ngühlang künbü hai lauko hautikei:
“Kanei Jihudabü Choba Hezekia to hai laushi: Kaibü Mühghaü ao to maanglem phoda, ‘Jerusalem Assiria Choba ikto akulabü,’ dogo lauko no tehuonetti.
Chühashi, Assiria Choba shuongei kaonyek pendou lemailela mautiko ai kümbei nyi dida; hoba no püetlep sai?
Phangshuong Mühghaü shuongei ngeibü pisibousi shuongei shemtibü, khei Gozan, Haran, Rezef hoba Telassara kibü Eden shousi shuong püetkei sai?
Hametbü Choba, Arpadbü Choba, Sefarvaim sangnyubü Choba Hena si Ivaabü Choba lanei ki?”
Kheijinei ngühlang künbou ik ka Hezekiaei le kho sungletkei hoba kho wekei, hoba Hezekia
Hobaje Hezekiaei
“O Thükenbou
Kaibü nou haangkushi, O
Maimaitham,
Hobaje haoeneibü mühghaü shuong wana jinkua; aieilausi haoen mühghaü shuong aying, lausikei haoen müteibü ikei kümsembü bu si laang ki.
Hibü tou, O
Kheijinei Amozeibü shou Isaiaei Hezekia jungto ngühlang hautiko laukei, “
ei hao khulimbo laubü ngüh kho ho ki, ‘Zion nouyangnyu, medei, no awealau hoba no attiko nyikua; Jerusalem nouyangnyuei ka la khu ngombua.
Nyi ao aweasüngla hoba awealaula? Ao khulimbo nyi ngüh longkei; hoba kaibü nyek thükae to angtikei? Khei Israel Saopobou khulimbo kikei.
Kaibü khangenbou shuongei hoba nyi
Ngei deikhün thukei hoba dei yungkei. Hobaje ngeibü youdemei Ijep shumang Nail pendou ulangtham aptikei.
“Lubüjinei ngei kho lai kümbei hoba shangied lai kümthen kümbei kho nyi adit lo? Tou kaibü thangtetan kibü sangnyu shuong lusakbü laangshong che la yeitila ngei kho haüthüktikei.
Hibü khünei kibü shuong la hau kian kikei, haoen maangpangkei hoba phenyemyokei; haoen khongthua yamsang tegü hoba bunyem alibü tegü hoba seka youkung alibü tegü kikei.
“No pibü hoba setbü, no haubü hoba loubü, hoba kükhu limbo khauangbü ngei khümbo ngea.

Nyi kükhulimbo khauangsije hoba no yonglam lilibü ngeibü nou to atsije ngei ngeibü ngau- yaüjin kaibü kunga hoba kaibü sembung khopa ngeibü janglüh jinkulabü, hoba no laobou lam ka loukei kho lam to ngei sepeinyu ngaitilabü.”

“Hobaje kho ka shanga tetsida che kilabü: Toupo haoen lolo ai yemlaje kho kanei shaulabü hoba nyibou poakei kho jeteibü ka longbü kho ong shaulabü. Hobaje sembou poa kanei lilabü wenashi, sek latashi, hoba semlüh laak leashi hoba kho hek shauashi.
Jihuda chung jouletan kibü nyibou maangaeka li atlabü hoba thükaenei lang heklabü.
Aieilausi, Jerusalem ka jouletbü hoba Zion shongh ka satenbü tan che longlabü. Thükenbou
“Hibü khoei
Hao loubü lamnyu to ong hao sepeinyu ngailabü, hoba ho sangnyu to aloulabü dogo
Aieilausi, kü shanga hoba ngo khangenbou Dawid shanga lolabü hoba khümenlabü!”
Hobaje
Hibü Assiriabü Choba Sennakherib meimeian sepeinyu ngaikei hoba Ninevia kikei.

Hobaje ho longkei, haoeibü mühghaü Nisrokh chema haoei lembo kijinei hao shousi shuong Adramelek hoba Sharezer haosiei inei hao wapettikei, hoba haosi Ararat kaonyek to satkei. Hobaje haoeibü shou Esarhadonei hao jeila songdakkei.
Khübü chaloua Hezekia hailabü lele shatkei, hoba Amozeibü shou Isaia thuseibou hao jungto loukei hoba hao to laukei, “
Kheijinei Hezekia thenyek kümthang ae sepeikei hoba
Hobaje laukei, “O
Kheijinei
“Hauashi, hoba Hezekia to lenshi:
Hobaje ngei no hoba ho sangnyu Assiriabü Chobaeibü ik ka khümenlabü; hoba ho sangnyu ngei aüetkulabü.
“Hobaje
Chühashi, chanyu neplamto manghshoubü Ahazeibü younak thüka shoungaitibü kho nyibou sepeinyu younak aan ngei loungaitilabü.” Hibü chanyueibü mangh shoungaitibü kho younak aan sepeinyu loungaitikei.
Jihudabü Choba Hezekiaei hao shatbü maian dobü:
Ngei laukei, “Ngeibü chalou shuong chajihboua ngo hee koukhün to atlabü;
ngeibü salang jouan kibü po kü ka sungngaikei lo?”
Ngei laukei, “
ngei touje kaodaka kibü yoa müt to achühlabü.
Ngeibü kishang sanlombü neichem tegü kü ka sungngaia,
neitakbüei tegü haoei ngeibü langkei tungaian phokei;
change nangnak haoei ngo langkei thontilabü.
Ngeyang sühko ngei ngo lolo hangsho damanchühkei;
molosaonyuei tegü haoei ngeibü lo pendou leilutikuda.
Chalou ka nangnak sühko nyi ngeibü langkei thontilabü.
Lolenshang tegü ayingsi dei au tegü ngo wikei,
dukutuk tegü ngei mang haapbei;
ngeibü nyek müh aeto chühangtibü anatda.
O
Ngei ai laula? Haoei kü to joyokei,
hoba haoei lolo kümbei;
ngeibü soushou khonkubü haangjung ngeibü salang sünga
ngo hangsho haulabü.
O
hoba habü pendou danko ngeibü soushou senetan ki;
hibü nyi ngo nyibou maitiashi hoba ngeibü langkei kitishi.
Chühashi, ngo maila shanga ngei khonku yaang hapda;
lausikei nyi sanoubüei ngeibü soushou maulabü püngkhün ka püetkei.
Aishanga nyi ngeibü shabü pendou kaibü napheinei tekan apbei.
Sheolei no sangla athük, hoba haibüei no sangko küpla athük.
Aoyou püngkhün to yanda haoenei
kaibü ngühmaanglanbü shanga maanglem akien.
Langkibü, langkibüei ngei tat kümbü tegü no sanglabü.
Ngo khümenla
hibü
haulüh kongkinei senei chia laulabü.
Tou Isaiaei laukei,
“Bhukeibü wen che dotashi hoba kho bokbüa thipashi, hoba hao mailabü.”
Hezekiaei toukei laukei,
Kho chaloua Baladaneibü shou Babilonbü Choba Merodakh-Baladanei Hezekia jungto dobü le hoba jongsak hautikei aieilausi hao shatko kibü maia dogo haoei ditkei.

Hobaje Hezekiaei haoen la haoeibü namsek peisilei shuong chandinam, hon hoba ponlemhibü hoba namsek onang hoba haoeibü namsek hele chem hoba haoeibü thanshanga kibü khümbo lenkei. Hezekiaei haoen la haoeibü chema hoba haoeibü sangle pendoua aikei alenbü akitei.

Kheijinei Isaia thuseibou Hezekia Choba jungto loukei hoba hao to laukei, “Khübü mütshuongei ai laukei? Hobaje haoen ka jungto laka loukei?” Hobaje Hezekiaei laukei, “Haoen kaodak saabü Babilon ka kü jungto loukei.”
Kheijinei haoei laukei, “Haoenei kaibü chema ai hapbei?” Hobaje Hezekiaei jongaikei, “Ngeibü chema kibü pendou haoenei hapa; ngei haoen la alenbü ngeibü thanshanga ai aki.”
Kheijinei Isaiaei Hezekia to laukei, “Thükenbü
Chühashi, kaibü chema kibü pendou hoba kaibü pisibousi shuongei tat sühko thanshanga phokuan kibü Babilon to sunglanglabü chalou louada; aikei ajoutikulabü dogo
Hobaje ka ka longbü shousi shuong laobou ka ka pakkei haoen leian satlabü, hoba Babilonbü Choba chema haoen sungphatbü yeitilabü.”
Kheijinei Hezekiaei Isaia to laukei, “Nyi laubü
“Solotishi, kanei kü mütli solotishi,”
dogo kaneibü Mühghaüei lauda.
Jerusalem to maangnyembo joyoashi,
hoba sao khangenbü chalou thona,
saoei shedshonbü shedbü apbua,
hoba saoeibü shabü pendou shanga penyi thüng
Cheei ngekbü ngühlang: “Kanei yamlamanga
phetsen kaoa seneibü Mühghaü shanga lamnyu tangsheitham kümashi.
Kaokhong pendou tonenlabü,
hoba shongh pendou yomang la yeitilabü,
hoba kombünongbü pendou tangsheitham yeilabü,
hoba tokbükhongbü lenglengtham yeitilabü.
Hobaje
hoba kho khunakshousi pendouei haplabü;
aieilausi
Ngüh cheei lauda, “Ngekashi!”
Hobaje ngei laukei, “Ngei ai ngekla?”
“Khunakshousi pendou sang tegü ki,
hoba khoeibü soneikangbü pendou
khongthu kabü chipen phatkei.
Sang yuida hoba chipen setda,
aieilausi
Maimaitham mütshuong sang ki.
Sang yuida hoba chipen setda;
lausikei seneibü Mühghaüeibü ngühje ponpen kida.”
Jerusalem, shongh suokbü khüto angashi,
hoba ngühlang maibü phinthonashi!
O Zion, ngüh yaangbüei ngekashi,
hoba ngühlang maibü ngetiashi!
Ngüh angashi hoba hatko teki.
Jihuda sangnyu shuong to lenashi,
“Ka Mühghaü louada!”
Chühashi, Thükenbou
hau kibü tegü loulabü,
hoba hao shanga haoeibü ikei songdaklabü;
chühashi, haoeibü jongsak hao yoa kia,
haoei kungailabü mu hao yoa kia.
Haoei haoeibü sanshuong sanlombouei tegü samlabü:
haoei haoeibü phemei san shoushou shuong leishailabü,
hoba haoei khübü kho khukua tonda.
Hobaje sen yoptibü shuong kho hangsho leian haulabü.
Aoei haoeibü ikkhonga yungnyu takan chühla thükkei,
hoba müh phakei takan chühla thükkei?
Hobaje kaodaka thamngu takbü che maisho ngela thükkei,
hoba shongh shuong seret hauan chühla thükkei,
hoba shonghshou takteila thükkei?
Aoei
hoba hao la songsido maibü kubou la yeiko hao thungeikei?
Mühghaüei ao ka songsido lekei,
hoba hao la aoei songlenkei?
Chühashi, phangshuong kho meisokka deimenshou saangbü jam;
hoba sereta thamngu hanbü che hima haoen weeida.
Chühashi, su shuong haoei peisilei aeibou hanbü che hima tonenda.
Lebanon kabü meisiau shuong juokbü lembü shanga,
ayingsi bunyu shuong jikla southüng aying.
Hobaje hao thedanga phangshuong pendou ai aying,
hao thedanga haoen ai akibü kongkong hoba jim aki dogo weeida.
Khülonga kanei Mühghaü aoto takteila?
Heangsho yaübü kho kümbüleibü mütei tühnyintibü ki,
hoba hon yaübouei kho thüka shanjinkuda,
hoba chandinam namlühei phenda.
Kho tegü lembü kula ao aeibou shale phaman ki,
haoei ashalabü bu pienda.
Kheijinei haoei jembü shanga heangsho noksa atopeiko
toktian phola kümaleia ikseibü müt lamda.
Kanei angekei lo? Kanei adit lo?
Khangjineithama kan la alen lo?
Kaopakjineithama kanei aditen lo?
Kho kaodak kailepbü thüka setbou hao ong ki,
hoba khünei kibü mütshuong koksüng hima ki.
Haoei müh shuong thangtetnei tegü shingtida,
hoba neichem tegü maangaenei kila danglepan phokuda.
Khei yaangenbü shuong aila ayeitida;
kaodak matjembü shuong haoei amlang la yeitida.
Haoen maisho akekei,
haü, haoen maisho awen;
haü, haoen kaoa li maisho üat.
Haoei haoen thükto souda;
hoba haoen ngokan apda,
hoba haoen yeishikei youho tegü soulangda.
“Khülonga kü to jetei yeila kanei ngo ao to takteiyola?”
dogo Saopobouei lauda.
Kaneibü nyek thükaeto chühangtiashi,
hoba chühashi, habü ho aoei kümbei?
Aoei haoeneibü lakjaibü shuong leishaikei,
hoba haoen pendou to haoei nyenshenko ngada;
Haoeibü hau yaangbü danko,
hoba haoeibü seisihauei che ongkei amauko ki.
Ngeibü lamnyu
“Ngeibü ngühmai ngeibü Mühghaü ka khei dantida,”
dogo nyi aila lauda, O Jakob?
hoba aila nyamnyamda, O Israel?
Nyi angekei lo? Nyi adit lo?
kaothon shuong Yaübou ki,
hao amangetda ayingsi asemthetda,
hoba haoeibü songsihon aoeikei aphanjemlabü.
Semthetbü hoba hau akibü la haoei seisihau kungaida.
Mütao shuongkei semthetlabü hoba mangan shemlabü,
hoba heshou shuong phaiyetlabü hoba tuonglabü;
lausikei aoyouei
haoeneibü hau sinngailabü.
Haoen aulu shuong tegü kaakei seengjung anglabü;
haoen laangsikei amanglabü,
haoen pailabü lausikei asemthetlabü.
Mühghaüei lauda,
“O su shuong, kü thedanga ngüh üangko kishi;
hoba mütshuong haoenei hau haanbü haptishi;
haoen nyangko loutishi,
sen pendou liko matjemshang to nyangko loukho!
“Aoei chaangbou aeka che longtian hao haushanga
ngühmaanglanbüei thüktian hao thedanga
phang shuong haoei kuda,
hoba Choba shuong thüka hao la songdaktida;
haoeibü inei haoen thamngu tegü,
hoba tekteksousou apan kibü youkung tegü yeitida.
Haoeibü youei nakan achühbü to
haoen shieiko thushed akiko danjung hauda.
Meten shuong khangbü ka ngetiko aoei ho sakkukei
hoba kümbei?
“Su shuongei hapbei, hoba hatkei;
haoen nyangko lotkei hoba loukei.
Haoen mütpem wekoei lepbou to thuikei,
hoba mütpem wekoei lulueibü jaisina to laukei,
‘Olinangko kishi!’
Hibü bueibü mistriei hon yaübü thungeijangeida,
hoba aoei nampem yentiko jangda haoei, ‘Ho maia,’
dogo lauko namjangboua yaübou thungeijangeida;
hoba atopeitila haoei kho kojalei thüngan kangtida.
“Lausikei no, O Israel, ngo khangenbou Jakob,
ao ngei pienkei, Abraham lilabü küthangbou.
No ngei kaodak thonbü ka leibakei,
hoba ho chemnyek ka no ngakei hoba ngei ka to laukei,
‘No ngo khangenbou,’ ngei no pienkei hoba no ananglet.
No tehüt, ngo ka yoa kia, mokde apyoko teki,
aishanga ngo kaibü Mühghaü ki;
ngei no hau kitilabü hoba ka to thuilabü;
ngei no ngeibü saopobü mai ikei tonenlabü.
“Chühashi, no khulimbo khauang kibü shuong
haoen himoulabü,
hoba maangpangan apan kilabü,
ka to ao tokyolaje haoen ai ayinglabü hoba maulabü.
Nyi kaibü dangboulabou shuong lamasikei
nyi haoen ühüplabü.
Aoyouei no limbo wapyolaje
ai akibü tegü kongkong yinglabü.
Aieilausi ngo kaibü Mühghaü
aoei kaibü mae ika hatda hoba lauda,
‘Tehüt, ngei ka to thuilabü.’”
“Tehüt, no yangbem Jakob, O hanbü Israel,
aishanga ngei ka to thuilabü,
dogo
Chühashi, ngei no hauh juong yembü
youshou nakbü peisilei akbü haanbü che yeitilabü.
Nyi shongh nopthetkulabü
hoba hanbüshou la yeiko ngümnyinkulabü
hoba shonghshou shuong youshou sho tegü yeitilabü.
Nyi haoen siplabü hoba yeiei haoen soulanglabü,
hoba yeishikei haoen phinnyintilabü.
Lausikei no
hoba nyi Israel Saopobou to soneikanglabü.
“Shalebü hoba khambüei amlanga dei lamda,
hoba deilabüei haoeneibü lishang ulangtham kia;
ngo
ngo Israel Mühghaüei haoen üpyolabü.
Ngei shongh khongthua shumang shuong
hoba pholi jenyua deikük iplabü.
Ngei yam kho süngküp
hoba kaolin kho dei bakshang kümlabü.
Ngei yama cedar si akasia,
hoba mürtel si oliv bulong kelabü;
ngei phetsen kaoa busim si fir
hoba saipres bulong liko yemtilabü.
Khei
hoba Israel Saopobouei ho kümbei
dogo mütshuongei haplabü hoba ngelabü,
damanchühlabü hoba ditenlabü.”
“Kaneibü ngühsidei sungbaan lenashi,
Kaneibü aukabü hau kiboutham sungba.
Haoen la khübü kho sungbatishi,
hoba ai haüthüklaje kün la ngetiashi.
Shangiedbü kümsilei shuong kün la ngetiashi,
khübü kho ai khei künei kho damanchühlabü lele,
hoba khübü thonshang ngela shanga;
ayingsi loulabü jihsiphaia loushadlabü shuong
kün la lenbü.
Künei kan kho mühghaü shuong dogo ngela shanga,
loulabü kümsilei shuong ngetikai.
Haü, kün hatbümokbüei shenlabü
hoba panglangyolabü lele,
maibü ayingsi amaibü dencheje küman lenashi.
Chühashi, kan ai aki,
hoba kaneibü kümsilei kongkong ki;
aoei kan pienlaje hao kho mangsenlabü ki.
“Ngei yungkük ka che longtia hoba hao louakei,
chanyu longsilengko ka haoei ngeibü nyen ngada.
Chakyaübouei shungkung kao nakeibü tegü,
haoei songdakbü shuong shemkhün to nakyantilabü.
Khangbü ka künei ngelabü,
dogo hoba jih asühjinei ka thama,
‘Hao tükde,’ dogo künei laulabü lele aoei kho ngetikei?
haü, ngetibü ao aki,
haü, tetenbü ao aki,
haü, kan ka ngüh ditbü ao aki.
Ngo
ngei Jerusalem to hai lenla ngühlang künbou hautikei,
‘Ka mütshuong louada!
Haoen chem to louada!’
Lausikei mühghaü shuong yoa ao akitei,
khübü shanga damanthenan chühbü akitei,
khei ngei haoen to phejinei ngüh che ongkei ajongaien.
Ditashi, haoen pendou amlangbü!
Haoeneibü kümsilei kongkongbü;
haoeneibü tühnyintibü heangsho shuong kho yeikong,
hoba jim akibü.”
Chühashi, ngei khangenbou,
ao ngei tonenda;
ngeibü pienbü, hao to ngo olinda.
Ngei ngeibü soushou hao thüka phokukei,
haoei phangshuong jungto ngühmai matjem sungbalabü.
Haoei angeklabü ayingsi hau pendouei ngühlang akulabü,
ayingsi haoeibü ngühlang khonga adittilabü.
Konan kibü thakdu che ongkei haoei apakngoklabü,
hoba wankhük angko juokko kibü wanlüh che ongkei haoei anyettikulabü;
ngühmaia haoei matjem longtilabü.
Kaodaka ngühmai matjem aküm shongko,
hoba su kaonyek shuongei haoeibü lenbü haiyeiko akishongko
haoei chongachingko ajuoklabü ayingsi maang angaitilabü.
Mühghaü
hoba khübü sengan phokukei,
aoei kaodak hoba kho ka longbü phinnyinan phokukei;
hoba aoei kho thüka müt la hak hoba khonei paibüla
soushou kuda haoei hai lauda.
Ngo
hoba kaibü ik hatlepla hoba no loman kila,
hoba phangshuong ngesakbü shanga mütshuong to
theyolanyobü shanga ka la kulabü.
Nyekthubü shuong nyek ipbula, thüngbü shuong thüngdang ka,
hoba aoyou nakthühbüa thüngshang chema setan ki haoen leishaila.
“Ngo
ngeibü soneikangbü lubü la
ayingsi ngeibü nyen heangsho la ngei akulabü.
Chühashi, danbü kümsilei shuong loushedakei,
hoba ngei kümsilei haanbü ngetida;
khübü mo alongjineitham ngei kan to khübü shanga lenda.”
hoba mühthon kaothon ka hao la nyensang kuashi,
yungnyu hoba khünei kibouei ngühashi,
yungkoa kibü kaodak shuong hoba khünei kibü shuongei ngekashi.
Yam hoba sangnyua kibü shuong
Kedara kibü sangnyu shuongei ngektiashi,
haoen la shongh khu ka ngektiashi,
Selaa kibü shuongei chia lautiashi,
haoen la shongh khu ka ngektiashi.
kutiashi hoba haoeibü nyenhang kaonyeka kaang ngetiashi.
haoei ngeklabü haü, haoei ngühlang kaang kulabü;
