haoei haoeibü dangbou shuong khulimbo hau yaangbüei kümlabü.
Ngo lounyu sangsembo kia, ngo ngüh üangko kikei,
hoba ngo lolo khonkuko kikei;
tou ngei yaksaei nahapjinei tegü ngeklabü;
ngei liko mautilabü hoba suilabü.
Ngei shongh si shonghshou kho apbulabü,
hoba haoeneibü buhekdeihek pendou lintilabü.
“Hobaje nyekthubü shuong haoenei angebü lamnyu to leibalabü,
haoenei angebü lamnyu to leilabü;
haoen thedanga nakthühbü ngei ngesaktilabü,
hoba kombü tangsheitham yeitilabü.
Habü ho ngei kümlabü,
hoba habü ho ngei akümbo aphokulabü.
Heangsho noksa to maanglembü
hoba tühnyintian kümenbü heangsho to ong,
‘Kan küneibü mühghaü,’
dogo laubü shuong haoen sepeitilabü,
hoba haoen himou yaang haplabü.”
“Ditashi, kan obangbü shuong;
chühashi, kan nyekthubü, hoba hapashi!
Ao nyekthubü kho ngo khangenbou ong,
ayingsi ngei hautibou ngeibü
ngühlang künbou tegübü ao obangbü ki?
Ao kü yoa haksoa ki, hao tegü ao obangbü ki?
Hobaje
Nyi juong hapa lausikei nyi asungletda,
haoeibü noukhün yetakei lausikei haoei aditda.”
hoba soneikangbü yeitila shanga
saopobü shanga olinko kikei.
Lausikei ho solangtibü hoba leilutibü mütli ki,
haoen pendouei khünyeta sung sanan phokuakei,
hoba thüngshang chema haoen huakei;
haoen haitilabü shanga kia,
hoba aoeikei, “Haoen ngaitiashi,”
dogo laulabü aki.
Kan yoa khoto nou haanglabü,
ayingsi loulabü jih shanga ngüha lelabü
hoba ditlabü ao ki?
Aoei Jakob shian aptikei
hoba Israel soshau soyungtikei?
Ho
ao khulimbo senei shed shonkei;
hoba haoeibü lamnyua haoenei tepaikho lauda,
ayingsi haoenei haoei lenbü ngühkhüm ale!
Hibü haoei haoen thükto hao khauangbü
maangshat khüpan jinkukei,
hoba kho haoenei aditensikei khoei haoen kaijembo wan laptikei,
hoba kho haoeneibü maangpona aphosikei haoen lonan apbei.
Lausikei tou, O Jakob, no kümbou
hoba O Israel, no khümenbouei hai lauda:
“Tehüt, aieilausi ngei no angkei;
ngei no nyenshenko ngakei, no ngeibü ki.
Dei danko no ladang haulaje, ngo ka yoa kilabü,
hoba shumang danjinei haoenei no anyemlabü;
ladang no wan danko pailaje, no ajuoklabü,
ayingsi wanlong ka thüka alaplabü.
Aieilausi ngo
Israel Saopobou, no khümenbou ki;
no angthetbü mu ngei Ijep,
hoba ka jeila Ethiopia si Seba kukei.
Kü thedanga no namsek hoba nyenhang yingbü ka,
hoba ngei ka to sanouda buba ngei ka jeila mütshuong,
hoba kaibü langkei jeila mütli kulabü.
Tehüt, aishanga ngo ka yoa kia;
ngei kaibü thensilen chaangbou aeka sungbalabü,
hoba ka jungto chanep aeka yoshailabü.
Yungthang aeto ngei laulabü, ‘Haoen litiashi,’
hoba yungkükbou to, ‘Haoen tesenet,’ dogo laulabü.
Saabü ka ngeibü jayangshou shuong,
hoba kaodak thonbü ka ngeibü nouyangnyu shuong leiba.
Kü nyena ngabü mütpem weko,
ao ngeibü soneikangbü shanga ngei küman ki,
ngei hao khümenlabü, haü, ngei hao kümbei.”
nouje yeman obangbü shuong kü jungto leiba!
Phang pendou liko kamshaiashi,
haoen yoa aoei ho lauan photeila,
hoba shangiedbü chalou aoei sen to lenla thükkei?
Haoen matmaila shanga haoen liko aukabü sungbatiashi,
khei yingsije lubü shuongei ditlabü hoba laulabü, “Ho tükde.”
Khei kanei ngelabü hoba mailemlabü,
hoba ngo hao dogo ngela shanga kan ngeibü aukabü shuong
hoba ngei pienbü khangenbü ki;
kü thedang to ai mühghaükei ayeiko kikei;
ayingsi kü phaineikei akitei dogo
“Ngoje ngo ong
hoba kü to limbo khümenlabü aokei aki.
Ngei lenan apyokei hoba ngei khümenkei, ngei ngetikei,
hoba kan yoa küksithang mühghaü akitei,
hibü kan ngeibü aukabü shuong,
hoba ngo Mühghaü ki dogo
Haü, kho chalou ka ngo hau ki;
hoba ngeibü ik ka sola aokei aki;
ngei kümlabü hoba kho aoei sepeisaikula?”
No angthetbou, Israelbüeibü Saopobou
“Kan shanga ngo Babilon to hautia,
hoba linan kibü pendou khei Khaldiaa kibü shuongkei
haoen olinbü yoto leiyenlabü.
Aishanga ngo
kümbou ngo kaneibü Choba ki.”
hoba dei yaangbü shuong danko lamnyu kümda.
Aoei kailong si koli sepai tan hoba lakjaibü liko leian louda,
haoen liko phetetda, haoen alakseplabü,
haoen mauakei, haoen wanthunglüh tegü nyetakei!
Kanei danbü kümsilei shuong tedamen,
ayingsi shangiedbü kümsilei shanga daman thenan techüh.
Chühashi, ngei kümsilei haanbü che kümlabü,
toukei kho tangto longlabü;
kho nyi achühenda lo?
Yama lam che hoba phetsen kaoa shumang che ngei kümlabü.
Khongthua meisiau shuong selong
hoba ostrik shuongei ngo hangenlabü.
Aieilausi kü mütli hoba ngei pienbü shuong la yunglabü kula shanga
ngei yamlamanga dei hoba phetsena shumang shuong kuda.
Mütshuongei ngeibü nyensang phinthonla shanga
kü shanga ngei haoen kümbei.
Khei yingasikei, O Jakob nyi ngo khambo loukei,
lausikei no kü to oanapan kikei, O Israel.
Nyi juokbü lembü shanga kü jungto san asungba,
ayingsi kaibü haitibü lembüei nyi ngo ühangen,
ngei ka la shausiyung lembü akuti ayingsi jenei oan üpti.
Nyi kü la namei ai ajekku,
ayingsi nyi kaibü lembü haabüei ngo senyühashemti;
lausikei nyi ngo kaibü shabü shuongei onat yeitikei.
Ngo, aoei no ngeibü yingbü shanga
kaibü ngühkhüm leilubü haman apbukei, kho ngo ki,
hoba kaibü shabü shuong ngei adamenlabü.
Kü la damentiashi, senei liko suyojayokho,
no matmaila shanga nyi weanchühko lenshi!
Kaibü shaangbü bouei shabü shonkei
hoba kaibü thuseibü shuongei kü khu limbo ngühkhüm lulimkei.
Hibü ngei Chobaeibü shousi shuongeibü
saopobü lemshang leilukulabü
hoba ngei Jakob shedbükhaubü che,
hoba Israel shabütabü che yeitilabü.
ngo khangenbou, hoba ngei pienbü Israel.
hoba aoei ka to thuila haoei hai lauda:
Tehüt, O Jakob, ngo khangenbou,
hoba ngei pienbou, no Jeshurun.
“Aieilausi dei lako kibü kaonyeka dei
hoba kaolin thüka shumang shuong ngei khüpan jinkulabü;
kaibü shousi la ngeibü soushou
hoba ka ka bakbü shuong la
ngeibü haülabü khüpan jinkulabü.
Hobaje khongthu kabü sang phatko,
hoba yungko nyangko kabü willo long phatko haoen yemlabü.
“Cheei, ‘Ngo
hoba lubü cheei hao lolo Jakob nyen phonglabü;
tokei cheei hao ika, ‘
hoba Israel nyen phonglabü.”
“Ngo shaangbou hoba thonbou,
hoba kü to liman lubü Mühghaü aki.
Kholonga ngo phatko lubü ao ki?
Haoei kho phinthonashi hoba kü thedanga ngekletashi,
shangied ka ngei kümbü aoei lenenkei,
ayingsi loulabüa sühko shangabü aoei tetenla thükkei?
haü, tokei ai loushedla ki haoen la tetentiashi.
Kan telüh hoba tehüt.
Ngei ho aphinthon lo
hoba mietshangieda thama ateten lo?
Kan ngeibü aukabü shuong ki.
Kü to limbo lubü Mühghaü aoche kilao?
Haü, lubü Laangnyu aki;
ngei che ongkei angekei.”
Heangsho noksa kümbü shu- ong pendou amlangbü ki, hoba haoenei thanbü peisilei shuongei ku akulabü. Haoen shanga laukubü shuong pendou nyekthubü; haoen ühüpangebüa himou ki.
Aoei heangsho noksa kümda ayingsi ai apailetlabüa tühnyintibü heangsho noksa kümda?

Chühshi, hao hoba haoeibü peisilei shuong pendou himou bautilabü; aishanga heangsho kümbü shuong kho lubü aying lausikei müt ong ki. Haoen pendou liko kamshaian lotiashi; haoen mokde apyolabü hoba himou shaulabü.

Namyaübouei namkung at sungenan kümda, hoba wankaka juokda; hoba namjangjinei noksa longtida, hoba kho haoeibü hau kibü phemei janga. Kho phaia hao mühei haida hoba haoeibü hau khümda; haoei dei ayunglonga hao semthetda.
Bueibü mistriei takbü lüh kho jenda, pencilei seida, rendaei kho thuan yentida, kompasei takletbü kho longtida hoba kho müt phatko khunakshousi hemaisaomai phatbü kho chema tentian phola kümda.
Mütei cedar bulong akda ayingsi busim bulong ayingsi yembu long sungbada, ayingsi müt shanga jiklabü bu jungeilabü

Kho phaia ho müt shanga jiklabü bu la yeida; hoba haoei kho at sungan hao lolo lematida, haü, haoei khonei wan sapda hoba wentek ngouda. Lausikei tokei haoei mühghaü kümda hoba kho lemda; haoei heangsho noksa kümda, hoba kho to khüpetda.
Kho haoei jamde wana jikda hoba kho wan metbüa haoei phe ngoushauda hoba senyühshemda. Haoei wan kangan sungda hoba lauda, “Aha, ngo lemakei! Ngei wan hapa!”
Hobaje haoei joubü khoei haoeibü heangsho mühghaü che kümda; haoei kho thedanga khüpetda hoba lemda. Haoei khüto welauda hoba lauda, “Ngo khümenashi, aieilausi no ngeibü mühghaü ki!”
Haoenei angeda ayingsi haoenei aditenda; aieilausi haoenei ühüpla shanga haoeneibü nyek hoba haoenei aditenla shanga haoeneibü maangpon khinkuakei.

“Ngei kho jamde wana jika, haü, tokei ngei kho wankak thüka wentek kanga; ngei phe ngoua hoba kho shaua; hoba joubüei ngei mangsenlabü peisilei che kümlep lo? Buthem che to ngei khüpetan lemlep lo?” dogo laula aoeikei daman achüh hoba aolakei hapbüngebü ayingsi ditenbü aki.
Hao tap shauko kida, khüpbülangbü maangponei hao ayinglam to leilangkei; hao jembukei khümenla athük, ayingsi, “Ngei amlangbü chenei hatlepakei,” dogo laulakei athükda.
hoba ngo khangenbou O Israel!
ngei no yeitikei, no ngo khangenbou ki;
O Israel, ngei no amaalabü.
Ngei kaibü ngühkhüm lulimbü kho deihak tegü,
hoba kaibü shedbüshabü shuong sangmei tegütham haman apbua.
Kü jungto sepeiashi, aishanga ngei no angtheda.”
Chia lauashi, O kan müh shuong,
aieilausi
Kaang ngekashi, O kaonyu maang.
Chia atla khangashi, kan shongh shuong,
kan yamlamang hoba khünei kibü bulong shuong pendou,
aishanga
hoba Israela hao soneikanglabü.
“Nyusema no yeitibou,
pendou kümbouei hai lauda,
Ngo
ao mütpemei müh sengan phokuda
hoba kaodak yamutham phokula kü yoa ao kikei?
Aoei seibüyaübüei tetenbü kongkong,
hoba thusei ngüh laubü shuong langetangbü tegü yeitida,
songbüdobü mütshuong ange ühüpbüla yeitida.
Lausikei hao khangenbüeibü ngüh kaangngaitida,
hoba haoeibü ngühlang künbü shuongei tetenbü haüthüktida;
Jerusalem shanga, sao to toukei müt kilabü,
hoba Jihuda sangnyu shuong shanga haoen sang sangngaitilabü
hoba haoen leilubü shuong kho ngei phonlabü.
Aoei yungnyu haübü to ulangtham apashi,
hoba kaibü shumang pendou haptikulabü dogo lauda.
Aoei Sairas shanga, ‘Hao ngeibü sanlombou,’
hoba ngeibü maangangbü pendou haoei haüthüktilabü;
haoei Jerusalem shangabü, ‘Sao kümetlabü,’
hoba lembüchem shangabü, ‘Ho chemshang huongenlabü’
dogo laulabü.”
Hai,
maeaenei ngei hatlepan kibü
Sairas to hao thedanga phang shuong leiyenla
hoba Choba shuong shembe sengkula,
hoba hao thedanga koukhüm ipbula
hoba bakhün akhinko kilabü dogo lauda.
“Ngo ka thedang to haulabü,
hoba khüpkhüp khongkhongbü lenglengtham yeitilabü;
ngei chinam koukap shuong netla yeiko leilutikulabü
hoba nameibü thangtet wapthetkulabü.
Hobaje ngei ka la nakthühphanga kibü nyaksinam shuong,
hoba huphanga ühüpbo kibü nyaksinam shuong,
khei Israel Mühghaü aoei no nyenshenko ngada,
nyi
Aishanga no khangenbou Jakob shanga
hoba ngeibü pienbü Israel ngei no nyenshenko ngada;
nyi ngo angesi dogokei ngei kaibü nyen nyenkua.
“Ngo
kü to limbo lubü Mühghaü aki,
Nyi ngo angeko kiasikei ngei ka la shembe kaikulabü,
khei chaang chanep ka kü to limbo lubü aki
dogo haoenei ngela thükkei.
Ngo
Ngei ngesakbü yeitida hoba nakthühbü kümda,
ngei naangmaibü sungbada hoba amaibükei longtida,
ngo
O müh shuong, thükae ka khüpan yantikushi,
hoba sangmei shuongei saopobü jonan yantikushi;
khümenbüa mai hekla kaodakei ipashi,
hoba haoei saopobü liko longtilabü lele yeitishi,
ngo
Aoei Kümbou to hoba chakei
chakyaübou to tokyoda hao ügütü.
Chak yaübou to shungkungei, “Nyi ai kümda?” dogo
ayingsi kaibü kümsileiei,
“Hao la ik ayembei si,” dogo lauda sai?
Aoei bou che to, “Nyi aila ngo yaükei?” dogo,
ayingsi nyu to, “Nyi ai bukkei?” dogo laulaje hao ügütü!
Ho Kümbou
“Loulabüa loushedlabü kümsilei shuong shangabü,
ayingsi kü shousi shuong shangabü kü to pheda si,
ayingsi ngeibü ikküm ikelei shangabü kü la ngühkhüm kuda si?
Ngei kaodak kümbei hoba khonei kibü müt kümbei.
Ngei kü ikei mühshuong pintikei,
hoba khübü tan pendou ngei lin küman phokukei.
Ngei ngeibü saopobüa Sairas phonenlabü:
ngei haoeibü lamnyu pendou tangshaitham yeitilabü.
Haoei ngeibü sangnyu kümlabü,
hoba ngeibü langsenbü shuong dongebü thua phokulabü,
mu shanga ayingsi jongsak pailetla shanga aying,
dogo Thükenbou
Ho hai
hoba Ethiopia namyaknamsei shuong,
hoba süngsilop maibü Sabea shuong ka jungto loulabü,
hoba haoen kaibü yinglabü;
haoen ka phainei haulabü,
khei namlühei khühan haoen loulabü.
Haoenei ka to khüpetan hainyu lauko sulajalabü:
‘Maimaitham Mühghaü ka yoa kia,
hoba lubü ao aki; lubü mühghaü aki.
Maimaitham no no lolo hubou Mühghaü,
O Mühghaü hoba Israel Khümenbou.
Heangsho kümbü shuong himou baulabü;
haü, haoen liko nyenshedkhün to atlabü.
Lausikei Israelbüje
athonbü khümenbüei khümenlabü;
no ladangkei ihimoutilabü ayingsi
nyenshedkhün to üettilabü.’”
Aieilausi mühshuong kümbou
hao Mühghaü ki;
kaodak yeitibou hoba kho kümbouei kho khangenyaüenkei,
haoei kho amlanga aküm lausikei haoei kho müt kila yeitikei;
“Ngo
Ngei huphang nakthüha kibü kaodak chenei kho alau;
ngei Jakob shousi shuong to, ‘Amlanga ngo lamshi,’ dogo alau.
Ngo
hoba ai ngühmai kho lenda.”
“Kan lolo kamshaiashi, hoba kaiya;
liko nyangko kaiya, kan jouletbü phang shuong.
Bu ka jakenbü heangsho jungbü shuong
haoen hapbü ngebü songsido aki,
hoba khümenla athükbü mühghaü to welauda.
Haoenei liko damanchühtiashi,
kho phaia sen la haoenei nalena;
hoba kho aukabü sungbatishi;
aoei shangied kho, hoba piaboua ho lenan apyokei?
Kho ngo
Hobaje kü to liman lubü Mühghaü,
saopobü Mühghaü che hoba Khümenbü che aki;
kü to liman aokei aki.
“Kü jungto sepeiashi
hoba kan khümenan kishi,
kan kaodak thonbü pendou;
aieilausi ngo Mühghaü ki,
hoba lubü ao aki.
Ngei ngo lolo thedalanda,
kü sembung ka ngühmai longa
hoba kho nopjung alongeilabü,
khei kü to youkük pendouei khüpetan lemlabü,
lishang pendouei theletlanletlabü.
hao jungto ong mütshuong louda;
hoba hao khulimbo khauangbü shuong himou baulabü.
hoba soneikanglabü.
“Bel khüpjung kouda, Nebo phaangjung kouda!
Haoeneibü heangsho meisiau shuong la on kho phokua.
Kanei künan paibü on shuong,
onat künbü hübümangbü meisiau shuong la thongtia.
Haoen phangjung kouda, haoen liko khüpjung kouda;
haoenei on kho sungenla athük,
lausikei haoen lolo thüngshang to hauda.
“Kü to nou haangashi, O Jakob chemdang,
hoba jouan kibü Israel chung pendou,
aoyou ngei nyusem ka shia künan bukbü sühko thounoukei.
Hobaje khei baushi sinko ngo toukei khei ong kia,
kan khu athu shongko ngei kan künlabü,
ngei kan küma hoba ngei thounoulabü,
ngei buklabü, hoba ngei püetlabü.
“Kanei ngo ao to jetei yeitila hoba ao to phatyotila?
Ao to kanei ngo takteiyola?
Aoyouei nyingkou ka hon hakletda,
hoba chandinam seret hauda haoenei hon jungda
hoba haoenei mühghaü yaükuda,
hoba kho thedanga khüpetda, hoba khüto lemda.
Haoenei kho phak to tonan jinan jungan hauda,
hoba hao kishanga phokuda,
hoba hao kishang ka atopeiko kida.
Müt cheei hao to ngekko ngasikei haoei ajongailabü,
ayingsi haoeibü khonku ka hao apüetlabü.
“Ho damenashi, ho shanga damanchühashi,
nyibou kho maangpon to lottiashi,
kan ngühkhüm leilubü shuong.
Shangiedbü kümsilei shuong damenashi;
aieilausi ngo Mühghaü, hoba lubü ao aki;
ngo Mühghaü, hoba ngo tegübü lubü ao aki.
Aoei khangbü ka thonbü sühko hoba pihangbouhang ka
akümbo kibü shanga lauda, aoei ngeibü kümthen
haüthüktila hoba kü thea maibü pendou
ngei kümlabü dogo lauda.
Chaang aeka ngei ausangyuksang che hoba ngeibü
kümthen shanga kaonyek saabü ka müt kho ngada;
haü, ngei laua, ngei tokei kho haüthüktikulabü,
ngei maang anga ngei tokei kho kümlabü.
“Ngeibü ngüha leashi, ngühmai ka lounyu bangan kibü
kan maangpon kaangbü shuong.
Ngei ngeibü saopobü nyangko sungbada, kho asaakei;
hoba ngeibü khümenbü aphailabü.
Hobaje ngei Ziona Israel ngeibü soneikangbü shanga
khümenbü phoyokulabü.”
O saosüngbü, O Babilon Nouyangshou shuong;
aieilausi touje ka to nyemnyemtham
hoba inyaitham dogo alaulabü.
Nitbü laang sungashi,
hoba shausiyung nitashi;
nyi yukbü nei sungenashi.
Kaibü nei loubü hangletashi,
teküplet, yungnyu shuong danko hauashi.
No mütkong kibü aküpletlabü, haü, himou haplabü.
Ngei phoklamlabü; ngei aokei ajoutilabü.”
Sen Angthetbou, Thükenbou
hao Israel Saopobou ki!
“No ngüh üangko setshi,
hoba nakthühshang to atashi,
O Babilonbü Nouyangshou;
aieilausi touje ka to sangle shuongeibü
Chobasao dogo angalabü.
Ngo kü mütli yoa khauangko kikei hoba ngeibü phet shatia;
hoba khübü kho kaibü ik to kua
hoba nyi haoen to üeisanou alen.
baushilamtobü la mangkei nyi kaibü buleng atsheibü jinkukei.
Hobaje nyi laukei, ‘Ngo ponpen yaangenbü sao che kilabü.’
Khei yingbü khoei nyi habü kümsilei
kaibü maangpona thanan apho
ayingsi haoeibü thonbü ai yinglaje damanachüh.
“Hibü tou ho ditashi, no lemsilang sanoubou,
asangadoko kibou hoba kaibü maangpona,
‘Ngo kia, kü to limbo lubü ao aki.
Ngo ladangkei latnyu la leko akilabü,
ayingsi shousi shuong maubü ngei angelabü,’
dogo lauko akilabü.
Lausikei nyetchenei ong shousishuong maubü
hoba latnyu la yeian kibü ham ka jungto loulabü,
kaibü seibüyaübü juong hoba kaibü shedsikhau
ngüh yaangbü juong kiasikei khübü kho
souko ka jungto loulabü.
“Aishanga nyi kaibü amaibü huona maanglembei,
hoba nyi laukei, ‘Aoeikei ngo ühüpda,’
kaibü songeidoei hoba kaibü hapbü ngebüei
no ayinglam to leikei,
hoba nyi kaibü maangpona laukei,
‘Ngo kia, hoba kü to liman tokei ao aki.’
Hibü ka to amaibüei sühlabü
hoba nyi kho apbula sei ai angelabü;
hoba maulabüei ka to sühlabü,
nyi kho apbula athüklabü hoba hakde nyi angebü
leilubü ka to sühlabü.
Tou kaibü seibüyaübü khüksiuok kümsilei
hoba khopjikseibü dan yoa no heshoudang ka
kümjung loubü yoa laushi.
Ai ngenyu nyi thük hapla thükkei,
aingenyu nyi hatlamoklabü kümla thükkei.
Kaibü ngühsongwanbü juongei no oan apakei!
Tou mühhaang tetbü shuong si khanshoulitshou to chühbü shuong
hoba ka la lit weko thu lenbü shuong haoen lotian no khümentishi.
“Chühashi, haoen youkung tegü kilabü;
wanei haoen lonlabü, wanlong sei ka haoen lolo akhümenlabü
Ho lemako kanglabü wankak che ayinglabü
ayingsi nyangko setlabü wan che ayinglabü.
Ainei nyi haujembo kümbei kho tegü ka shanga kilabü,
aoyouei ka yoa no heshoudang ka seiyotakyoko loukei,
haoen mütpem weko lulu lama shoongailabü;
no khümenla ao akilabü.”
O Jakob mütli, ao to Israel nyenei ngada,
hoba Jihuda lin ka pakkei,
aoei
hoba Israel Mühghaü nyen phongda,
lausikei ngühmaia ji, ayingsi saopobüa aying, kanei ho ditashi,
aishanga kanei kan lolo saopobü sangnyu mütli dogo ngada
hoba Israel Mühghaü to nongda,
Thükenbou
“Shangiedbü kümsilei shuong shanga
ngei mietshangied ka ngetia,
haü, khübü kho ngeibü sembung ka longkei,
hoba ngei haoen to lenkei,
hakde ong ngei khübü kho kümbei,
hoba khübü kho haüthükkei.
Aieilausi kaibü maangpon tubüsekbü
hoba kaibü ngümlüh nameibü
hoba kaibü khüngja chinam dogo ngei ngekei.
Hibü ngei mietshangied ka ka la ngetikei,
khei, ‘Ngeibü heangshoei khübü kho kümbei,
ngeibü buei jakenbü heangshoei haoen la sakkukei,’
dogo nyi laubüla dogo kho ühaüthükjinei ngei ka la lena.
“Kho nyi dida; ho pendou haüthükbü chühashi.
Kanei ho shanga aukabü alelep lo?
Kho chalou ka khei huan kibü nyi angeko kibü
ka la kümsilei haanbü lena.
Haoen tou kümbü ki, mietshangied ka aying;
‘Chühashi, ngei habü ho ngeakei,’
dogo nyi laubüla dogo ho chalou
thedangtoje nyi aditko kikei.
Nyi ditkei adit, ngekei angeko kikei;
mietshangied ka thama kaibü nou aipbo kikei.
Aieilausi nyi aeibou lepbolangko jungeikei;
bukjinei ka thama ngühkhüm lulimbou dogo ngei ngekei.
“Kü nyen laüa ngo khauangbü thetian kilabü;
hoba ngeibü nyensang nyenhang shanga
ngei no wapan üplabü laüa ngei ka ka senetan kia.
Chühashi, ngei no koshiktikua,
chandinam tegütham ayingsikei;
yaüshem wanlong ka ngei no pienkei.
Kü laüa, haü, kü nyen laüa, ngei ho kümda.
Aieilausi lai küman ngei kü nyen shatila?
Ngei ngeibü soneikangbü mü la akulabü.”
O Jakob, hoba Israel, ngei ngabou: ngo hao ki;
ngo büngbou hoba shembou ki.
Haü, ngeibü ikei kaonyu chemshang yaükei,
hoba ngeibü mae ikei mühshuong pintikei;
ngei haoen to ladang ngalaje haoen liko loda.
“Kan lolo kamshaiashi, kan pendou, hoba ditashi:
Laobou heangshoei habü ho ngetikei?
haoei Babilon khulimbo kümlabü;
haoeibü ikok Babilonbü khulimbo kilabü.
Ngei, khei ngei joyoa, haü, ngei hao ngakei.
Ngei hao leibalabü, hoba haoei
haoeibü lamnyua thüksimin haplabü.
“Kan kü jungto nyangko kaiya hoba ho ditashi:
Bünglakhangla ngetijineithama ngei huphanga alau,
ho haüthükjinei thama ngo khünei kia.”
(Hobaje tou Thükenbou
Hai
“Ngo
aoei kan to pailetbü shanga lenda,
hoba kan haujan lamnyu kan la shean lenda.
“Kanei ngeibü ngühkhüm shuong ditkei laubü tegüje,
kaneibü sangmai shumang che tegü kikhoulabü!
Hobaje kaneibü haülabü deinyu yungsen tegü kikhoulabü.
Tokei kaibü lilabü phetsen tegü
hoba kaibü shousi thamngu tegü kikhoulabü;
kü thedang ka haoeneibü nyen wapan üpbo
ayingsi amautiko kikhoulabü.”
Babilon apyoashi, Babilonbü ka satashi!
Chia laubü ngühlangei ngekashi hoba ho ngetiashi.
Ho kaonyu thonbü pendou to hautiashi, hoba lauashi:
Hobaje haoei haoen phetsen kaodak danko
leian haujinei haoen dei ala;
laangnyu ka haoei haoen shanga dei koutikei;
haoei laang paknyintikei, hoba ongjung longkei.
“Amaibou shanga hakso aki,” dogo
Ngeibü ngüha leashi, O kan su shuong;
ditashi kan kaonyek saabüa kibü mütshuong:
künyueibü shimung ka haoei ngeibü nyen ngakei.
Hobaje haoei ngeibü sembung in akbü tegütham kümbukei,
haoeibü yemekoubü ikmaanga haoei ngo hutikei;
haoei ngo simbü laujin tegü lamlean lauphota hukei.
Haoei kü to laukei, “No ngo khangenbou Israel,
ao to ngo soneikanglabü ki.”
Lausikei ngei laukei, “Ngei amlanga kümbo hükei;
ngei ngeibü hau kongkong hoba jim akibüa apa.”
Khei yingsikei ngeibü matjem
hoba ngeibü pailetbü kü Mühghaü yoa kia.
Tou
haoei Jakob jungto sepeinyu sungbalabü,
hoba Israel jungto leishailabü dogo lauda,
aieilausi ngei
hoba kü Mühghaü ngeibü hau yeiakei.
Haü, haoei lauda, “Jakob phangshuong longtila,
hoba jouan kibü Israel nyibou kümetlabü
ho ka shanga yongko songokbü ki.
Hibü ngeibü khümenbü kaodak thonbü sühko sungbala shanga
ngei no Küksithang shuongeibü ngesak yeitilabü.”
Angthetbou
mütei awealaubou to hoba phangei mangsenbou to
songdakbü shuong khangenbü shuong to hai lauda:
“Choba shuongei haplabü hoba loenlabü,
Choba shousi shuongei kho haplabü
hoba haoenei soumoa khüpetlabü.”
Aieilausi
Israel Saopobou ki haoei no pienkei.
“Ngeibü maangshikbü chaloua ngei ka to jongailabü;
hoba khümenbü chaloua ngei ka to thuilabü;
hoba ngei no amenlabü hoba mütli shanga
theyolanyobü che ngei ka la kulabü,
khei nyibou kaodak kümetla
hoba inletan kibü phetphana haoen kitila shanga;
thüngbü shuong to, ‘Longan apashi,’
hoba nakthüha kibü shuong to,
‘Ngesakbü to longashi!’ dogo lenla shanga.
Haoenei lama lamshaulabü hoba shongh khu khongthu
pendou kho haoen lamshaushang kilabü.
Haoen mühei ühailabü ayingsi dei alalabü,
tokei haoen aubü ayingsi chanyu juokbüei ühaitilabü.
Aieilausi haoen to üeisanou dambouei haoen leilabü,
khei dei pakshang shuong nyangko haoei haoen lomlabü.
“Hobaje ngeibü shongh lam pendou lam che ong yeitilabü,
hoba ngeibü lamkhong yaangtilabü.
Chühashi, khübü kho saabü ka loulabü,
hoba chühashi, khübü kho yungkük ka hoba chanep ka
hoba khübü kho Aswan kaonyek ka loulabü.”
Chia lauashi, O müh shuong!
olinangko kishi, O kaonyu!
ngüh longko chia lauashi, O shongh shuong!
Aishanga
hoba haoeneibü khonsak khonkubü thüka
maangpona sanou dambuko kilabü.
Lausikei Zionei laukei, “
Hibü
“Nyuei senyopbü jayangshou maalep lo
hoba saoei bukbü shou to sanouko adamlep lo?
Saoei maan apa tegükei ngeije kan amaalabü!
Chühashi, ngei ngeibü ikmaanga kan shanjinakei,
kaibü kümthang shuong athakko kü thea kia.
“No kümetlabü mütshuong panteiko louada,
hoba no leilutibü shuong ka jungka suklabü.
Kaijembo to kaibü nyek longan chühashi;
ho pendou haoen lolo liko kamshaida,
hoba ka jungto louda.
habü pendou chisiyak tegü lelabü;
hoba nyi chem kannyu tegütham no lolo habüei shembe kailabü.’
“Kaibü leilunyu apbü hoba sangliphang kaonyek
hoba kaibü leilubü kaonyek shangabü kho maimaitham
touje mütli shanga aeibou nyunyeman kilabü,
hoba no suibü shuong kho saabüa thinei kilabü.
No yen la lean kibü thua bukbü shousishuongei
toukei kaibü noua thenan laulabü,
‘Kün kila shanga ho kaophei yongko nyonyemakei;
kün kila kaoen kuyoshi!’
Kheijinei nyi kaibü maangpona laulabü,
‘Habü shousi kü la aoei bukkukei?
Ngo shousiei kongan hoba angkong kiteikei;
ngo langsenan hoba inletan kiteikei.
Habü ho aoei pangteikukei?
Chühashi, ngo boupem apyoan kikei;
lausikei habü ho lakabü?’ ”
“Chühashi, ngei ngeibü ik phangshuong thük to shinglabü,
hoba mütshuong la ngeibü nisan tonenkulabü;
hoba haoenei kaibü jayangshousi shuong haoeneibü khukua baman,
hoba kaibü nouyangshousi shuong haoeneibü phaka jenan loulabü.
Hobaje Choba shuong no lombou boushuong yinglabü,
hoba haoeneibü Chobasao shuong
no thounoubü nyusi shuong kilabü.
Haoenei thenyek kaoei yeian ka to khüpetlabü;
haoenei kaibü you kabü thamngu selabü.
Kheijinei nyi ngo
hoba aoyouei kü to maanglem pholaje haoen himou abaulabü.”
Thükenbou ka haitila kibü solangla thüklep lo,
ayingsi ngühmai langsenbü shuong khümenla thüklep lo?
Lausikei
“Haü, langsenbü shuongkei lakoubü shuong ka sunglanglabü,
hoba sekbülakbü müt ka haitila kibü songailabü.
Aishanga kaibü dangbou to ngokei danglabü,
hoba kaibü shousi shuong ngei khümenlabü.
No khonkutibü shuong la ngei haoeneibü phe shautilabü;
hoba haoen haoeneibü siiei ihei tegü jaaktilabü.
Kheijinei khunakshousi pendouei, ngo
no Khümenbou, no Angthetbou
hoba Jakob Hauyaangbou dogo ngelabü.”
“Kanyu to banglabü le doyobü laobouei
ngei sao to bangkei kho lanei ki?
Ayingsi ngei sangh thean kibü ao la ngei kan yaakkei?
Chühashi, kanei shed shonbü haangjung kan yaakkei,
hoba kanei ngühkhüm lulimbü shanga kanyu apbei.
“Khülonga ngo loujinei müt aokei akitei lo?
Ngei ngajinei jongaila müt aokei akitei lo?
Kan khümenla ngeibü ik yongko tuikei sai?
Ayingsi kan khümenla kü la sei aki sai?
Chühashi, ngei hakjinei yungnyu ulangtham aptida,
ngei shumang shuong phetsen kaodak la yeitida;
khübü chaloua dei akibü ka nyaülem hida,
aieilausi dei aki, hoba deilabüei haida.
Ngei mühshuong la nakthühbü neisimei letida,
hoba haoen yuklepla senounei kümda.”
Hüan mangan kibü to ngühei jih tükdea lai joyola kho
ngei ngela shanga
kü la lenla shanga lishang kuakei.
ngeyang weko haoei pitida,
mütshuongei kümbü tegü haoei pitilemtida.
hoba ngo ngüha aleko akitei ayingsi ngo phai asepei.
Ngei ngümbou to ngeibü shenjang thokei,
hoba kaushang wi khebou to ngeibü om thokei;
ngei ngeibü thenyek himou hoba eok thokbou ka ahu.
Aishanga
Hibü ngo maang apangko ki;
hibü ngei kü thenyek laang akbü tegü phoda,
hoba ngo himou abaulabü dogo ngei ngekei.
Aoei ngo mat maitida, hao nyangko kia.
Kü khu limbo aoei tokyola?
Sen theshuok loakho!
Ngeibü dangbou ao?
Hao ngo nyangko loutishi!
Chühashi,
Ngo yuktilabü lele ao ki?
Chühashi, haoen pendou neisimei tegü hangan aplabü;
haoen kho phetyangei shauan aplabü.
Kan yoa aoei
hoba hao khangenboueibü ngüh ditda?
Ao nakthüha paida hoba ngesakbü aki,
haoei
hoba haoeibü Mühghaü to nongashi.
Chühashi, kan pendou wan sapbü shuong
hoba kan lolo hantinei shembe kaibü shuong,
kan wanlonga hoba kanei sapbü hantina kan paiashi.
Kü ik ka kanei ho haplabü:
Kan maangshata leketlabü.
“Ngeibü ngüha leashi,
kan aoyouei saopobü phai semda
hoba kan
laobou laang ka jakenkei hoba kan püngkhün
laobou ka thuenkei kho to chühashi.
Kaneibü bou Abraham to hoba kan bukbü nyu Sara to chühashi.
Ngei Abraham mütpem ong ngakei hoba ngei hao haükukei,
hoba hao ka bakko haako hautikei.
“Aishanga
apan kibü kaonyek pendou haoei
solotilabü hoba haoeneibü yam Eden tegü,
hoba haoeneibü phetsen kaodak
olinbü hoba olinlabü nyensangkubü
hoba chia laubü ngühlang hao to haplabü.
“O kü mütli shuong, nouanepbo ditashi,
O ngeibü phang shuong kü la nou haangkushi:
Aieilausi kü ka songlen che satlabü
hoba ngeibü matjem mütshuong ngesakbü shanga phokulabü.
Ngeibü saopobü nyangko louada,
ngeibü khümenbü hauda hoba
ngeibü ikei mütshuong mat jemlabü.
Yungko kabü kaodak shuongei kü shanga haiyeiko kilabü,
hoba ngeibü ika haoenei maanglemlabü.
Kaibü nyek mühae chühangtiashi
hoba kaodak phang aeto chühashi;
aieilausi mühshuong wankhük tegü mauan aplabü;
hoba kaodak neisimei tegü hanglabü,
hoba aoyou khünei kida kho tegü yeilabü.
Lausikei ngeibü khümenbü ponpen kilabü
hoba ngeibü saopobü aleilulabü.
“Ngeibü ngüha leashi kan ngeibü saopobü ngebü,
kan ngeibü ngühkhüm maangpona phobü shuong,
kanei mütei hakbü to tehüt;
ayingsi haoenei awealaubüa maangtepang.
Aieilausi phetyangei neisimei shaubü tegü haoen shaulabü
hoba yangei winei shaubü tegü haoen shaulabü.
Lausikei ngeibü saopobü ponpen kilabü,
hoba ngeibü khümenbü meten pendou to kilabü.”
Piashi, piashi! Kaibü hau sungenashi,
O
shangiedbü chaloua tegü, mietshangiedbü
chalou meten shuong tegü piashi!
Nyi Rahab netla yeiko wapettikei aying lo?
Dragon baiko sepettikei aying lo?
Nyi dei haübü yungnyu ulangtham üpti lo?
Nyi khümenbü shuong shanga yungnyu haübüa
lamnyu che ayeiti lo?
Hobaje
hoba chia lauko Zion to loulabü,
hoba ponpen thon akibü olinbü haoeneibü khua kilabü.
Haoen olinko hoba olinangko kila haplabü,
hoba maangto shatbü hoba maangkoushembü satlabü.
“Ngei kan solotibü kho kia.
Haian aplabü müt hoba müteibü shou
piksang tegü yeitilabü ki;
kho to hatko kilabü no ho ao?
hoba kaodak chemshang huongkei kho nyi aila maada,
hoba shieikoebüei no mautiko laujinei hao khauangbü
nyi kheinyu hatko ong kikei?
Shieikoebü khauang lan ki?
Tongde yen kaoa langsenbü shuong litilabü;
haoen püngkhüna atetnyu ühailabü,
ayingsi hao shaueiyungei akaanglabü.
“Aishanga yungnyu shieitaiko
yungsen to hakbou kho ngo
Ngeibü nyen Thükenbou
Hobaje ngei ngeibü ngühshuong kaibü sembunga jinkua,
hoba ladang ngei mühshuong sengtikei
hoba kaodak chemshang imbei,
ngei no ngeibü ikmaanga yemekoubüa hutikei
hoba Zion to laukei, ‘No ngeibü mütli ki!’ ”
Piashi, piashi! O Jerusalem, laobouei
haoeibü khauang longbü thung yungkei,
nyi jaakbü thung yunga, hoba kho lea.
Saoei bukbü shousi pendou yoa sao lomla ao aki;
ayingsi hao samenbü shousi pendou yoa sao leiyenlabü ao aki.
Khübü kümsilei penyi ka to haüthüka,
ka yoa aoei sanouko dambukei?
Leilubü hoba maubü, mühsinou hoba in,
ngei lai no solotila?
Kaibü jayangshousi shuong semtheda;
haoen tina minbü yao tegü khonga pendou aenei koalanga leketakei;
haoen
Hibü tou ho ditashi, no khonkubou hoba jaakbü müt,
lausikei ihei aying.
Thükenbou
aoei hao mütli shanga sukujakuda, haoei hai lauda:
“Chühashi, ngei kaibü ik ka jaakbü thung,
khei ngo khauang longbü phau sunga;
nyi touje ho nyibou ayunglabü.
Hobaje aoyouei no shieikoekei
haoeneibü ika ngei kho phokulabü,
aoyouei ka to, ‘Kün danjung haukho no khüpetashi,’ dogo lauda.
Hobaje nyi kaibü shenjang kao tegü hoba müt danla maiko
khong tegü yeitikei.”
Piashi, piashi, kaibü hau kingaiashi, O Zion.
Kaibü neisimei maibü neiashi.
O Jerusalem saopobü sangnyu,
aieilausi tou ka jaüan ka jungto akipbü hoba asaopobü alotlabü.
Nyi lolo thamngu kangan apashi,
piashi, O thüngan kibü Jerusalem,
nyi lolo ngüma phenan kibü lüh sengashi.
O langsenbü Zion nouyangnyu.
Aieilausi
Aieilausi
‘Lausikei tou ngei hanei ai hapda?’ dogo
Hibü ngeibü mütliei ngeibü nyen ngelabü; hoba kho chaloua ngüh laubou kho ngo dogo haoenei ngelabü. Haü, ngo hanei kia.”

Shongha aoei ngühlangmaibü künbada, aoei sangmai ngekletda, aoei maibü shangabü ngühlang sungbada, aoei khümenbü ngekletda, aoei Zion to, “Ka Mühghaüei songdakda” dogo lauda, haoeneibü you shuong lai he maikei!
Ditashi, kaibü la- pheibou ngühlang,
haoenei ngüh longda, haoenei liko chia lauda.
Aieilausi ladang
haoen theshuok hapyolabü!
Olin angko, liko chia lauashi,
Jerusalema kan nangletan kibü kaonyek shuong.
Aieilausi
haoei Jerusalem angngaian kia.
Phang pendou thedanga
saopobü ik ong yeitilabü,
hoba kaodak thonbü pendouei seneibü
Mühghaü khümenbü haplabü.
Kan bangashi, bangashi, haka satashi,
asaopobü peisilei aitokei temeiti!
Hao jungka kan satan apashi; kan hinseian kishi,
kan
Aieilausi kan panteiko ohaulabü ayingsi kan hujung asatlabü,
kan to shaang
hoba Israel Mühghaü kan phainei kilabü.
hao yaangentilabü, hoba tonenlabü,
hoba aeibou thükkabou yinglabü.
Juongei hao hapan maangpangbü tegü hao chühla lubü müt limbo,
hoba haoeibü hesisao müteibü shousishuong tokei phangche
aeibou leiluan kikei.
Kho tegü haoei phang juong moktilabü
Choba shuongei hao thedanga haoeneibü sembung khinlabü.
Aishanga haoen la alenbü haoenei haplabü,
hoba laobou haoenei adit kho shanga haoenei damanchühlabü.”
“Aoyouei künei lenbü to mailembei?
Hobaje ao la
Aieilausi hao junga hao bunyem alibü tegü
hoba kaolin kabü buli tegü yembei;
haoeibü hesisao ayingsi hemaibü akitei,
senei ladang hao haplaje,
senei hao mangsühlabü lele hao to hemaibü akakkei.
Hao aweasüng hoba mütei inletkei, maangshat hapbü;
hoba khonsakbü to ngeyoan kibü müt;
hoba mütei hao ka haoeneibü thenyek hueiko phobü tegü
hao nyikuko aweasüng hoba senei hao wela ale.
“Maimaitham haoei seneibü khonsak thongkei,
hoba seneibü maangshat haoei künkei,
lausikei Mühghaüei hao shieikoekei,
hao to ngümbei hoba khonkutikei.
Lausikei senei ngühkhüm leilubü shanga hao to nali thekei,
seneibü shedshonbü shanga hao mang netla yeitikei.
seneibü sangmai shanga hao to shieikoe sühkei;
hoba hao to ngümbüei sen maian apbei.
Sen pendou san tegü lam maan satkei,
sen mütpem weko lulueibü lam to sepeikei;
hoba senei shed shonbü pendou
“Hao shieikoekei, lausikei hao lolo semetametnyu yeikei
hoba haoeibü sembung aip;
haitishang to leijung haubü san shoushou tegü
haoei haoeibü sembung aip.
Shieikoe hoba matjembouei hao leijung satkei.
Hobaje haoeibü thensilen shangabü aoei laula thükkei?
Senei ngühkhüm lulimbü shanga
hao langkibü kaodak ka wapan apbei;
aishanga kü mütli shedshonbü laüa
hao to ngümbo haitikei.
Haoei thamtham ai aküm,
ayingsi haoeibü sembunga khüpsilang ai akisikei
haoenei haoeibü hee amaibü shuong yoa kümbukei,
hoba haijinei keibü che yoa phokukei.”
“Khei yingsikei ngei haoeibü mang
netla yeitila maangangan kikei,
haoei hao khonkutikei;
ladang haoei hao lolo shabü shanga lembü che kulaje
haoeibü lilabü haplabü.
Haoei hao khonkubü soushou hek haplabü,
hoba maanghaiko kilabü;
haoeibü songeihonei ngeibü saopobü sambüei
ngühmaanglanbü juong yeitilabü,
hoba haoei haoeneibü shedbü künkulabü.
Hibü yaangbü yoa ngei haoeibü phejan janletkulabü,
hoba hau kibü yoa haoei peisilei janletkulabü,
aieilausi haoei langkei haibüa sühko kukei,
hoba ngühkhüm leilubü shuong yoa lühbaka yokei.
Aishanga haoei juongnyueibü shabü künkei,
hoba ngühkhüm leilubü shuong shanga haoei sukujakukei.”
Chia lauashi, O angkongnyu, na abuknyu;
chia lauko ngüh longashi, hoba kaang ngekashi,
no na hapla khon akujan;
aishanga chemdang yeibü yaksaeibü shousi shuong toje
nyushou kibüeibü shousi juongbou ki.
Kaibü neichem yaangngaitiashi,
no kishang thangtetnei bintiashi, tejouti;
kaibü janglüh lounyu senjemashi,
hoba kaibü bu jaangbü hau kitiashi.
Aishanga no maeae hoba nanae to linjung satlabü;
hoba kaibü shijep shuongei küksithang shenlabü
hoba sangnyu shuong lelabü,
hoba sangliphanga kibü sangnyu shuonga müt kitilabü.
Tehüt, no himou abautilabü.
Himou baula tehüt, aishanga no ihimoutilabü.
Aishanga nyi kaibü heshoudangabü himou maanaplabü,
hoba no latnyula lean kibü jihsiphaia hakbü
nyi touje adamenlabü.
Aieilausi no Kümbou kho kaibü lao ki;
haoeibü nyen
hao kaodak pendou Thükenbou Mühghaü, dogo nyenlabü.
Aieilausi inletbü hoba maangpon leilutibü yak phatko,
at heshoudangabü yak tegütham
dogo Mühghaüei lauda.
“Aishanga jih tuisho ngei no inletkei,
lausikei onou yaangbüei ngei no nyibou leian longaikukei.
Khauangko maangpokbü jiha,
ngo ka ka longche shanga ngei ngeibü thenyek hukei.
Lausikei ponpen thon akibü sanouei
ngei ka to onoulabü dogo no angthetbou
“Aishanga kü la ho Noa chalou phatkuakei;
Ngei touje Noaeibü dei kaodak to
nyibou aloutilabü dogo thekubü tegü,
ngei ka to khauangko amaangpoklabü,
ayingsi ka to ühakla thekua.
Aishanga shongh shuong nyaakeiasikei
hoba shonghshou shuong kukasikei,
lausikei ngeibü kaangbüsekbü sanou ka ka abanglabü,
ayingsi hakso shanga ngeibü theyolanyobü akuklabü,”
dogo ka to onoubü
“O Jerusalem, khonsak khonku hapbou sangnyu,
yeithuyeinakei soueibou hoba hakso ühüpbou.
Chühashi, ngei no namsek laangei danglabü,
hoba kaibü chemshang safair namsek laangei yaülabü.
Ngei kaibü koulom shuong
phülem namsek laangei kümlabü,
hoba kaibü bakhün karbankel namsek laangei,
hoba pendou ae kaijembo laang maibüei kümlabü.
“Hobaje kaibü shousi pendou la
hoba kaibü shousi olinbü yaang kilabü.
Saopobüa no kümenlabü,
no shieikoebü ka lounyu bangan kilabü.
Aishanga no hatbümokbü ai akilabü,
hoba maulabü ka lounyu bangan kilabü,
aishanga kho nyangko aloulabü.
Atei oyophetyo longtialonga,
kho kü ka louda aying, aoei no
khulimbo oyophetyo longtilaje hao ka thüka tuonglabü.
“Chühashi, ngei namjangbü küma,
aoei wankaka kibü wan soueida
hoba kho shanga peisilei longtida
toukei ngo mautila shanga leilutibü küma.
Hobaje no khulimbo kümbü insiaubu
aikei jim ayinglabü,
hoba matjemshanga no khulimbo laubü
lishang weko nyi yuktilabü.
Ho
hoba kü shanga haoen Saopobü ki,”
dogo
kan dei khüto kaiya;
kan louan jekashi hoba shauashi,
haü, kaiya, ih hoba sendei nam akuko hoba munam akuko jekashi.
Ai wentekmai aying kho shanga aila kanei nam apda,
hoba aiei maang anyemda, khünei aila eik apda?
Kü to nou haangko ditashi, hoba ai maikei kho shauashi,
hoba shausiyung maibüei kaibü soushou maanga maitiashi.
“Kaibü nou haangashi, hoba kü jungto kaiya;
no kaibü soushou lang kilabü,
aishanga Dawid la onou lenla thekubü ponpen thon akibü
theyolanyobü kan yoa ngei kümlabü.
Aieilausi jih chenei ngei haoeibü mütshuong thedanga
aukabü che yeitibü phangshuong leiyeibü
hoba ngühkhüm kubou yeitibü tegü.
Kho tegü nyi angebü nyi ngalabü,
hoba nyi angebü phang che ka jungto laangjung loulabü.
hoba Israel Saopobou shanga,
aieilausi haoei no soneikangtikei.”
hao nyangko kijinei hao ngaashi.
Amaibouei jembü lam,
hoba asaopobü mütei jembü dambü apyoashi.
hoba hao to haoei onoulabü;
hoba seneibü Mühghaü jungto nyibou sepeiashi,
aieilausi haoei shedbü juong apbulabü.
“Aishanga ngeibü dambü shuong kaneibü dambü aying,
ayingsi ngeibü lamthen shuong kaneibü lamthen aying,
dogo
Aishanga kaodak toje müh suokbou kibü tegütham,
kho khei ngeibü lamthen shuong kaneibü lamthen shuong to suokbou
hoba ngeibü dambü shuong kaneibü dambü aying.
“Aishanga ngeibü ngüh kho müh ka lang loubü tegü
hoba sepeian angaibü nindei lotbü phatkei.
Haoenei kaodak la dei lakkuda hoba lilabü yemtikuda
hoba pon bungtian lang hektida
hoba lilabü wenbou la lilabü kuda
hoba shaubou la shausiyung kuda.
Kho tegü ngeibü sembung ka satbü ngeibü ngüh kilabü,
kho konga kü jungto sepeinyu alongeilabü,
lausikei khoei ngei maangsühbü haüthüktikulabü,
hoba ngo laobou shanga hautikei khonei naangmailabü.
“Aishanga kan olinangko longlabü
hoba soloa leian haulabü shongh
hoba shonghshou shuongei kan thedanga lauko ngüh longlabü,
hoba khongthu ushi bulong shuongei haoeneibü ik iplabü.
Sang jeila fir bulong longlabü
hoba jaklong jeiko mürtel bulong longlabü.”
Müt aoei ho kümda, müteibü shou aoei hanei kaangkhühtham hatlepda, aoei aleiluko jungeida, hoba amaibü ai akümbo ik senetan phoda hao haübou.”
Ayingsi küksithang aoei jembü lolo
Aishanga
haoen la bousu yaksa shou shuong tokei maibou nyenshen che hoba nyen che ngeibü chema hoba ngeibü kümthang phanga haoen la ngei kulabü; ngei haoen la amaulabü ponpen kibü nyen che kulabü.”
“Toukei küksithang aoyouei

ngei haoen saopobü sangnyu to leibalabü, hoba ngeibü welaubü chema haoen olinangko yeitilabü; haoeneibü juokbü lembü ngeibü lemshang thüka sungletlabü, aishanga ngeibü chem müt pendou shanga welaubü chem dogo nyenlabü.”
Kan khongthu kabü meisiau pendou kaiya hoba yamnak kabü meisiau pendou suiashi,
haoei lauda, “Ngeibü lapheibü mütshuong haoen pendou nyekthubü songsido aki, haoen keingou! Haoenei ngongla athük manghliko phetetnyu yepmangsühda.

Haü, keishuong aeilamaeiphob, haoen ladangkei shishenan kila athük, hoba ditenla akibü kheibü sanlombü shuong ki; haoen pendou lulueibü lam to sepeijung mütpem weko lulueibü pailetbü lambo che ongkei ajouko sada.
Haoenei lauda, ‘Kan kaiya, ngei ih sungbalabü, hoba sen lolo nyakideiei shentikho, hoba ngietkei tatbü tegü chalou yaangbü kilabü.’ ”
Saopobü shuong mauda, hoba müt aoeikei maang- pona aphoda; hoba Mühghaü to souhatbü müt ngailangda, hoba aoeikei loulabü amaibü ka saopobü ngailangda dogo daman thenan achühda.
Hao haksoshang to atda, haoeneibü heea haoen haksoda, hao saopobü hoba tangbü lam to hauda.
“Lausikei nyangko hito kaiya, kan seinyueibü shousi shuong hoba jajasasa shuong!
Kanei aola eklenda? Ao khulimbo haakouan lishang shean lenda? Kan ngühkhüm leilubü shousi shuong hoba yepeijawebü shousishuong.
Kan yembulong yoa hoba bulong ham shangbü weko phanga kan lolo khauangko laanglip kaanglanga pholia kanei kaneibü shousishuong haitian juokbü lembü kuda aying lo?
Pholia laang lenglengbü yoa kaibü phejan kia, khübü kho kaibü thu ki, khübü to kaibü yunglabü lembü jonan jinkukei hoba nyi shausiyung lembü kukei. Khübü peisilei shanga sangsembo kilep lo?
Shongh suokbü hoba tonenan kishanga nyi kaibü shen kümbei; khüto nyi lembü kula angkei.

Koukap si thaonyu phainei nyi shensinge noksa phoda, kü ka bangan kanei lolo lubü lamentiakei, hoba anga; nyi kaibü shen yaangtia, hoba ka shanga haoen yoa theyolanyobü lea; nyi kaibü shensinge noksa chühletshanga kaibü shen mangsühda.
Nyi onang jungan Choba Molek jungto haukei, hoba ponlem juong yeikei; hoba nyi kaibü youkobü shuong saabü to, khei yemsang haübü sühko hautikei.
Kaibü lam saabüei no mangtikei, khei yingsikei, maanglem aki dogo nyi alau, nyi kaibü hau haanbü ong hapbei; hibü nyi aliti.

“Hobaje aoto no jemtenkei hoba hatbü ka nyi yepeijaweko laukei, hoba ngo adamen, ayingsi kaibü maangpona thanan apho? Khei ngei jih lounyu ngüh üangko kibü shanga nyi kü to soumo ühütko kikei aying lo?
Lausikei ngei kaibü ngühmai hoba kaibü kümsilei shuong khuokenan ngetilabü, khübü khoei ka la ku akulabü.

Ladang nyi ngeklaje, nyi laobou yoshaian ki khübü khoei no khümentishi; lausikei yeiei khübü kho soulanglabü; lausikei aoei kü to satenlaje kaodak phet haplabü hoba ngeibü saopobü shongh phet phanlabü.”
Hobaje ho hai laulabü, “Kanei kümashi, kanei kümashi; lamnyu lamleashi, kü mütlieibü lamnyu ka kühlabü kho sunglangkuashi!

“Aishanga thükkabou hoba yaangenbou thon akibüa kibou aoeibü nyen Saopobou ki haoei hai lauda. Ngo thükkabou hoba saopobüa kida, tokei aoeibü soushou leilubü hoba sembüambüa ki, hao yoa sembüambü soushou haanbü yeitikulabü hoba maangpon leilubü shuong haanbü yeitilabü.
Aishanga ngei pon- pendouje senyoko aoyolabü, ayingsi ponpenje khauangko atok- yolabü; aishanga kü ka soushou hoba ngei kümbü langkei kibü longda.
Haoeibü nyekdüh maangdüh shedbü laüa ngo khauangko kikei. Hobaje hao to ngümbei; ngei ngeibü the huan apbei, hoba khauangko kikei; hoba haoei haoeibü maangpon phai sepeijung satkei.
“Ngei haoeibü lamnyu shuong hapbei, hoba hao maitilabü hoba toukei hao leilabü, hoba hao la haoeibü manghaapbü hakso souko ngaitikulabü.
Sembung ka longbü hek kho ngei longtikulabü. Hakso, hakso, saabüa kibü shuong hoba nyangbüa kibü shuong shanga kia, dogo
Lausikei amaibüje topeiko kibü yungnyu phatkei; aieilausi hao sangsembo kila athük hoba khübü dei khoei thim hoba maksilak ongan angtida.
Amaibü shangaje hakso aki,” dogo ngeibü Mühghaüei lauda.
“Hau pendouei, ajemtenko ngekashi. teklaang tegü kaibü ngüh longashi. Kü mütli la haoenei ngühkhüm lulimbü shangabü hoba Jakob chemdang to haoeneibü shabü shangabü ngetiashi!

Aishanga chalou angboua haoenei ngo lamda; ai janbü ki kho jungeiko, hoba haoeneibü Mühghaü ngühkhüm shuong ainletbü phang che phatko, haoenei ngeibü lamnyu shuong lamenla maangdakbü tegü lenda. Haoenei kü ka saopobü ngühkhüm shanga pheda, hoba khübü nyangko loula Mühghaü shanga maangdakbü tegü lenda.

“Kün aila mühei nyengkei, hoba nyi kho aila ühüpda, kün aila hanbüla yeiko khüpetda, hoba nyije achühenda, dogo haoenei lauda. Chühashi, kan mühei nyengbü chaloua kan lulu maangleda, hoba kaneibü kümbüleibü shuong pendou shieikoeda.”
Chühashi, kanei oyophetyo hoba tokyola shanga hoba amaibü kümla ik seman thangyola mühei nyengda. Kaneibü ngühang thükaenei dittila kanei tat kümbü tegü anyengjan.
Ho tegübü nyengbü ho ngei pienbü sai? Müt shanga soushou khonkutilabü chalou ong lo? Kho lulueibü khu sang tegü hakjung kouan, hoba hao senounei si tapei naanglepan pailabou sai? Kho to nyengbü hoba
Ngei pienbü nyengbü khoje ho; amaibü khühbü yangmen senglabü, hoba kaangkhüh senglabü, shieikoebü la do ngetilabü hoba kanei kaangkhüh weko pakngokkulabü ho aying lo?
Kaibü shausiyung mühei haibü shuong to janyolabü, hoba chem akibü shalebü chem to leian loulabü; ladang nyi mütkong haplaje, hao la neikulabü, hoba müt ka no asepeijan, ho aying lo?
Kheijinei kaibü ngesakbü ngeyang tegü longlabü, hoba kaibü maitibü tongde longlabü, hoba kaibü saopobü ka thedang to haulabü,
Kheijinei nyi ngalabü, hoba
“Nyi shieikoebü, the thepthep nyikubü, hoba lubülimbü ngühlaubü apbo laualonga,

Hobaje kaibü shausiyung mühei haiko kibü to janyokho hoba khonsaka kibü haksotikho laualonga kheijinei ka shanga nakthüh phanga ngesakbü longlabü, hoba maang nakthühtham kibü chaloua ngesakbü tegü kilabü.
Hobaje
Hobaje kaibü mütliei shangied leilubü kümetlabü, nyi meten juong chemshang yaülabü; hoba ka to, Leilubü Kümthang Kümetbou, Lamnyu si müt Kishang Yaüetbou, dogo laulabü.”
kheijinei ong nyi
Chühashi, khümenla shanga
Lausikei kaneibü shedbüshabüei kan si kaneibü Mühghaü kanglanga jannyintikei, hoba kaneibü shabüei haoei kan ühüplabü lele haoeibü thenyek kan ka huan apbei.
Aishanga kaneibü ik siiei hoba kaneibü ikjishou shuong shedbüei dotnyinan kia, kaneibü sembung khopei yepeijaweda.
Ngühmai shanga aoeikei asuajada, ngühmai pülebü ao aki; haoenei kongkonga maanglemda hoba amlang ngüh lauda, shedbü damanchühda hoba shabü longtida.
Pinyueibü tei haoenei teida hoba haoenei keklakchem jenda. Aoyouei khübüeibü tei shaulaje haoen haida, hoba laobou kühyetlaje pinyu longda.
Khübü keklakeibü lüh kho nei shanga kongnyu aying; khübü ka longbü aoeikei aneida. Haoeneibü kümsilei kho shedbü shabü kümsilei hoba ik shatyobü kümsilei haoeneibü ika kia.
Haoeneibü you amaibü aeto laangda, shedbü akibü sii angtida, haoen pantei- yoda; haoeneibü dambü amaibü lamthen ki; sangliphanga apyola hoba leilutibü haoeneibü lamnyua kia.
Haksobü lam haoenei angekei, hoba haoen haushanga ngühmai aki. Khübü kho haoenei kümbü kombü lamnyu khüto aoyou atlaje hakso angeda.
Hibü ngühmai sen ka saabü to hauan kia, ayingsi saopobüei sen asühda, senei ngesakbü lamda, lausikei nakthüh hapda; Soneikangbü lamda, lausikei sen nakthüha paida.
Nyek ayembü mütshuong youei juan chühko paibü tegü banyu kümthang kaijembo senei juan chühko nongeida, jijimomo kijinei tegü senei chalou chajiha phaiyetda, sekokbü yoa sen haibü tegü paida.
Senei sapei tegü ngühda hoba guduru tegü ngayoko wida, matjemla shanga senei lamda, lausikei ao aki, khümenbü shanga lamda, lausikei kho sen ka lounyu hean saabüa kia.
“Aishanga küneibü ngühkhüm leilubü juong kia, hoba küneibü shedbüei kün khulimbo aukabü kuda; küneibü ngühkhüm leilubü shuong kün yoa kia hoba küneibü shedbü shabü shanga künei ngekkei.
Lenbü aditko meimeibü,
Ngühmai ka phai sukjung ngaia, hoba sao- pobü saabüa hauan kia, aishanga khonga ngühmai tuongakei, hoba tangbü thechüh atla athükda,
haü, ngühmaiei shalean kia; hoba aoei amaibü ka banglaje
lulu haitibüla yeitida; hoba
Hobaje haoei khünei müt aokei ühüp, hoba sukujakulabü aki dogo maangpangkei, hibü hao ikei hao jungto khümenbü sungbakei, hoba hao saopobüei hao tonenkei.
Hobaje khuku yukjin shanga haoei saopobü yukkei, hoba haoeibü khua khümenbü nameibü khun hoba neisimei shanga haoei phoklambü nei neikei hoba tanga neimok maangdakbü lean kikei.
Haoeneibü kümsilei thüng haoei mu kulabü, haoeibü dangbou shuong khau lotbü haoeibü labou shuong la kungaibü yungkoa kibü kaonyeka haoei nyibou ku kulabü.
Kho tegü haoenei
Hobaje Zion to Khümenbou loulabü, hoba Jakob ka ngühkhüm leilubü sungngailabü dogo
Hobaje kü shangaje ho kan yoa ngeibü theyolanyobü ki dogo
Laksepashi, olinyoshi, aieilausi kaibü ngesakbü louakei,
hoba
Aishanga chühshima, nakthühei kaodak küpleplabü,
hoba nakthüh shangtüngbüei mütshuong küpleplabü;
lausikei ka thükto
hoba haoeibü soneikangbü ka thüka haplabü.
Hobaje phangshuong kaibü ngesakbüa pailabü,
hoba Choba shuong kaibü langngebü soneikangbüa pailabü.
Kaibü nyek longan kaijembo chühashi,
haoen pendou liko kamshaida,
haoen ka jungto louda:
kaibü jayangshou shuong saabü ka loulabü,
hoba kaibü nouyangnyu shuong ika tonlabü.
Kheijinei nyi haplabü, hoba ngesaklabü,
hoba kaibü maangpon olinbüei topeilabü hoba toplabü;
aieilausi yungnyu nyaksinam shuong ka jungto sepeilabü,
hoba phangshuongeibü nyaksinam ka jungto loulabü.
Ut shuongei hoba ut shoushou shuongei no omleplabü,
khübü pendou Sheba ka loulabü,
haoenei hon si jen sungbalabü;
hoba
Kedar kabü san tan pendou ka jungto liko yoshailabü
hoba Nebaiot sanlon paangshuongei
kaibü khambü kulabü;
haoen ngeibü lemshanga sungletenlabü lele anglabü,
hoba ngeibü soneikangbü chem ngei soumo kitilabü.
Sangmei tegü seengeibü hoba guduru
kouloma seengeibü tegü khübü kho aoyou?
Maimaitham su shuongei kü shanga haiyeida,
shaangla Tarshish longchem shuong,
kaibü bousushou shuong saabü ka haoeneibü chandinam
hoba haoeneibü hon
hoba Israel Saopobou shanga haoen yoa sungbalabü;
aieilausi haoei no soneikangtiakei.
“Hobaje küksithangei kaibü kümthang kümbulabü
hoba haoeneibü Choba shuongei ka to khangenlabü,
aishanga ngo khau lotjinei ngei ka to ngümbei,
lausikei ngeibü onouei ngei ka to üeisanou dambei.
Kaibü bakhün toukei athakko ipan kilabü,
hoba Choba shuongei leian mütshuongei phangshuongeibü
nyaksinam jungan ka jungto loulabü lele changea
ayingsi nangnak khübü kho akhinko kilabü.
Aishanga phang ayingsi Choba sangleei no akhangenlabü,
haü, khübü phang lemailela tekan aplabü.
“Ngeibü, lemshang hemaitila shanga Lebanon soneikangbü,
fir bulong, wansak bulong, hoba larch bulong ka jungto loulabü,
hoba ngei ngeibü you phoshang soneikangtilabü.
Hobaje aoyouei no khonsaktikei,
haoeneibü shousi shuong ka jungto khüpetan loulabü,
hoba ka la nyikubü pendouei kaibü youdema
haoen lolo khüpetlabü,
hoba haoenei ka to, ‘
hoba ‘Israel Saopoboueibü Zion,’ dogo ngalabü.
“No inletan apyoko hoba mangsentiko,
hoba mütei inletan kibü jeiko ngei no
ponpen thon akiko the lenenko kilabü
hoba meten juong olinbü yeitilabü.
Nyi phang shuong ka sen sheplabü,
hoba Choba shuongeibü khukhu ka sheplabü,
hoba ngo
Jakobeibü yaangenbou, dogo nyi ngelabü.
“Chinam jeiko ngei hon sungbakulabü,
hoba namkung jeiko ngei chandinam sungbakulabü,
bu jeiko chinam, laang jeiko namkung,
hoba kan songdakbü shuong hakso
hoba kaibü kümsilei songdakboueibü saopobü yeitikulabü.
Ik shatyobü kümsilei touje kaibü kaodaka aditlabü,
sangliphanga apyobü ayingsi leilubü
kaibü kaodaka touje aditlabü,
lausikei nyi kaibü kümthang to Khümenbü,
hoba kaibü bakhün to Nyensang dogo ngalabü.
“Touje changea chanyu kaibü ngesak akilabü,
ayingsi sonlailai shanga litnyuei ka la ngesak akulabü,
lausikei ka shanga
hoba kaibü Mühghaü kaibü soneikangbü kilabü.
Kaibü chanyu touje aneplabü,
ayingsi kaibü litnyu hao lolo amaulabü,
hoba no manghaapbü chalou thonlabü.
Ngo soneikangtila shanga kü shanga bubhek ngeibü ikei
kümbüleibü kümsilei toukei kaibü mütli
pendou saopobü yeitilabü;
ponpen shanga haoeneibü kaodak phet phanlabü.
Naklepbou kho hajar che yeilabü,
hoba hanbou kho hau kibü phang che yeilabü.
aieilausi shalebü la ngühlangmaibü songlenla
maangpon leilubü khühyokula,
thüngbü shuong la dongebü thu ngekletkula,

hoba seneibü Mühghaü phoklambü chalou ngekletkula,
manghaapbü pendou maangsula;
Ziona manghaapbü shuong shanga nongnaekula,
haoen la tap jeiko chipen yak kula,
manghaapbü jeiko olinbü onang,
maangkhu yuibü soushou jeiko nyensang hele kula,
khei haoeibü soneikangbü shanga haoen to saopobü bulong,
Hobaje haoenei mietshangied leilubü kümetla,
shaangied litham apyobü meten juong inletbü,
hoba tekan apan kibü sangnyu shuong haoenei kümetlabü.
Hobaje küksithang shuong lolabü hoba kaibü sanshuong pangteilabü;
hoba yenbou homan kibü shuong kaneibü seklatbü shuong,
hoba kaneibü semlüh nitbü shuong yinglabü.
Lausikei kanje
mütshuongei kan to seneibü Mühghaü khangenbü shuong dogo ngalabü.
Kanei phangshuongeibü nyaksinam shaulabü;
hoba haoeneibü soneikangbü shanga kanei thük haplabü.
Kan himou jeiko shanga phejan nyithüngei hapngailabü,
hoba lemenleenbü jeiko haoenei jembü phejana olinyolabü,
hibü haoen kaodaka haoenei phejan nyi haplabü;
ponpen thon akibü olinbü haoen shanga kilabü.
“Aishanga ngo
hoba shedshonbü soshausoyungbü mangsenda,
ngei haoen la haoeneibü mu maimaitham kungailabü;
hoba ngei haoen to ponpen thon akibü theyolanyobü kümlabü.
Hobaje haoeneibü lilabü phangshuong yoa,
hoba haoeneibü shousi müt yoa ngeko yeitilabü.
Haoen hapbü pendouei khei, haoen
dogo haoen ngelabü.”
Ngo
ngeibü soushouei ngeibü Mühghaü to olinangko kilabü,

chemkanbouei lulu neisimeiei janan lebü tegü,

ngei lapheibü phokuakei,

Kaodaka Jerusalem nyensang nyenhaang yeitiko

Lausikei aoyouei kho kheishaian phoda,
haoenei kho shaulabü,
hoba
hoba aoyouei kho yoshaikei haoenei kho ngeibü saoposhang
chemsophanga shaulabü.”
Danjung hauashi, bakhün danko hauashi;
kanei mütlieibü lamnyu lamleashi,
laang heshaiashi,
mütshuong thüka nisan tonenashi.
Chühashi, kaodak thon sühko
“Kanei Zion nouyangnyu to lenashi:
‘Chühashi, kaneibü khümenbü louada!
Chühashi, haoeibü jongsak hao yoa kia,
hoba haoeibü kümsilei hao yoa thonakei.’ ”
Hobaje haoenei kan to, “Saopobü Mütli,”
hoba ka to “Lamenbü, Awailetbü Sangnyu,” dogo ngalabü.
“Bozra ka saklangbü nei neian, Edom ka loubü haoeibü neisimei soneikangko lean hau kiko paijung loubü ho ao?”
“Kho ngo, aoei saopobüa lauda, hoba khümenla hau yaang ki.”
“Aila kaibü neisimei semlüh nitshanga nakeibü müteibü neisimei tegü saklangkei?”
Aishanga phoklambü chalou kü maangpona kikei, hoba ngo angthetbü chalou louakei.
Hobaje ngei chühsi thuilabü ao akitei; hoba tonenkulabü ao akibü ka ngo phenyembei, hibü ngo ngeibü phemei kü to thuikei, hoba ngo khauangbüei ngo tonenkei.
Ngo khauangbüa ngei müt shuong tonan yantikei, hoba ngeibü khauang maangpokei haoen netla yeitikei, hoba haoeneibü langkeibü sii kaoa jonan koutikei.”
ngei
hoba Israel chemdang to aeibou maibü,
laobou haoeibü onou thüng haoei haoen la kukei,
hoba haoeibü üeisanou juong shanga laulabü.
Aishanga haoei laukei, “Maimaitham haoen kü mütli, kü junga ayepeilabü shousi shuong ki;” hibü khoei hao haoeneibü Khümenbou yeikei.

Haoeneibü khonsak khonku pendoua haoei khonsak onat hapbei, hoba hao yoan kibü khuthük hangangbüei haoen khümenkei. Haoeibü sanouei hoba haoeibü üeisanouei haoei haoen angthetkei; haoei haoen tonenkei hoba shangiedbü chalou pendoua haoei haoen künkei.
Lausikei haoenei ngüh- a ale hoba haoeibü Soushou Saopobü maangto shattikei; hibü hao haoeneibü dangbou yeitikei hoba hao lolo haoen khulimbo wapyokei.
Kheijinei haoeibü mütliei shangied Mosa chalou shuong damenko laukei, “Sanlombou ao san tan yoan yungnyu ka haoen aoei leiyenkei hao lanei ki? Haoen yoa Soushou Saopobü aoei phokukei, hao lanei ki?
Aoei soneikangbü phem Mosaeibü mae ik to hautikei, aoei hao lolo ponpen thon akibü nyen shanga haoen thedanga dei jankukei?
Aoei haoen haübükuokbü danko haoen you akühtila shanga yama koli tegü,
masu shuong kaokhong to yanbü tegü leian yankei, kho tegü
Khuthük ka chühan yantiashi, hoba kaibü saopobü hoba soneikangbü kishang ka chühashi. Kün shanga kaibü maangdak yaangbü lan ki? Kaibü sei lanei ki? Kaibü sanou si üeisanou lanei ki? Kün inletan tüp.
Aishanga Abrahamei kün angesikei hoba Israelei kün asungletsikei no küneibü bou ki; no, O
O
Ka mütliei longche shanga kaibü saopobü kaoen lekei; lausikei tou küneibü dangbou shuongei kaibü saoposhang nakeia.
Aoyou kaibü nyenei anga haoen tegü, shangied ka aoyou thüka nyi song adak haoen phatko kün khümena.
O, nyi müh shuong khuoknyinda, shongh shuongei ka thedanga topeilabü lele no louyenkei yingma!
Sang linbüa baubü wanei dei tühtibü tegü haoen lühlabü. Kaiya hoba kaibü dangbou shuong la kaibü sei tang khittiashi, hoba phangshuong ka thedanga lühtiashi!
Künei dambo akibü hatlamoklabü kümsilei shuong laobou shangied ka thama mütei ditan achüh.
Ayingsi nouei ditan achüh, nyekei ka to limbo lubü Mühghaü hapan achüh, aoei hao shanga haiyeiko kibü shuong shanga kümda.

Aoyouei saopobü kümda hoba aoyouei kaibü lamnyu shuong damenda, haoen to thuila no louda. Lausikei ladang künei athakko haoen khulimbo shabü shonkei, no khauangko kikei. Kholonga kün lai küman khümenla?
Kün pendou asaopobü müt tegü yeia, hoba küneibü saopobü pendou neikekmeikek phatko ki; kün pik tegü yuida, hoba küneibü shabüei kün yeiei tegü soulangda.
Aoeikei kaibü nyena angada ayingsi ka to thuibü hiko aokei akhapyoda; nyi kaibü the kün ka hungailanga hoba küneibü shabü haangjung nyi kün inleda.
Lausikei, O
O
Kaibü saopobü sangnyu shuong yamla yeia; Zion yam la yeitia, Jerusalem sangliphang la yeitia.
Küneibü saopobü hoba hemaibü chem lanei küneibü pisibousi shuongei kaibü nyen sangkei kho wanei lonan apa, hoba künei mangsühbü peisilei shuong tekan apa.
Khübü shanga, O
Aoyouei dambü phailam amaibüa paikei, khulimbü mütli, haoen to ngei chaseko ngeibü ik shingkei;
mütli laobouei athakko kü thedanga bamanga meisiau lembü haitiko juoklaang thüka ponlem hibü juokko kikei haoenei ngo khauang longtikei.
Haoen heea setda hoba hushanga kida, aoyouei uk phe shauda hoba asaopobü phe haoeneibü chaka ki,

haoenei lauda, ‘Thi to kukjung hauan loashi, kü jungto nyangko telou, aishanga ngo kan shanga yongko saopobü ki!’ Habü mütshuong ho ngeibü kungkhün maanga wankhük tegü, khei chaseko juokbü wan phatko ki.
“Chühashi, ho kü thea doakei: Ngo ngüh üangko akilabü; lausikei sepeinyu ngaitikulabü.

ei lauda, ‘Haü, shong- ha jen juokjinei hoba shongh thüka ngo wela alebü kaneibü shabü hoba kabousi shuongeibü shabü kaneibü khukua sühko kungailabü; hibü haoeneibü khukua haoeneibü kümsilei shaang ngei takan chühlabü.’”
Hai,
Hobaje ngei Jakob lilabü ka lilabü che hoba Jihuda ka ngeibü shongh phetphanbou longtilabü; hoba ngeibü pienbü shuongei kho phetphanlabü hoba ngeibü khangenbü shuong khünei kilabü.
Hobaje ngo lambü kü mütli shanga Sharon san shuong tan shanga kishang yeilabü, hoba Akhor pholi kabü masu shuong shanga lamshaushang kilabü.
“Lausikei kan

ngei kan inei haitila thujingtilabü, hoba kan pendouei haitibou thedanga khüpetlabü; aieilausi ngei ngajinei kanei ajongai, ladang ngei joyokei kanei ditko akitei; lausikei kü thea ai amai kho kanei kümbei hoba ngo aiei aolintida kho pienkei.
Hibü
Chühashi, ngeibü khangenbü shuongje maangpon olinbüei chia laulabü, lausikei kan maangpon maangto shatbüei haaplabü hoba soushou leilubü haangjung haaplabü.
Hobaje kanei kaneibü nyen pienbü shuong shanga khükla uokla apyokulabü, kho tegü

Kheijinei aoei kaonyeka haülabü shanga welaulaje tükdebüei Mühghaü to welaulabü aoei kaonyeka theyolanyobü che theyolanyolaje ngühmai Mühghaü to theyolanyolabü; aishanga danbü chalouabü khonsak maan apa hoba ngeibü nyek ka huan apa.”
Lausikei ngei ai kümda khonei mütei olinyolabü hoba ponpen thon akiko tonenlabü; aishanga chühashi, ngei Jerusalem yaangentilabü hoba kü mütli olinbü yeitila kümda.
Hobaje ngo Jerusalem thüka yaangenlabü hoba kü mütli to olinlabü; touje sao to haapbü ayingsi ngekbü ngühlang aditlabü.
Touje sao ka nashou yingasikei jaishou yingasikei langkei salang apenko adankhümlabü; lausikei nashouboutham po saongao kian ong hailabü hoba aoyou po saongao apenko atlaje shedsikhau dogo weeilabü.
Hobaje haoenei chem dangko khünei müt kilabü hoba haoenei semlühlaak lelabü hoba khübü hek shaulabü.
Lubü kila haoenei chem adanglabü, lubüei shaula haoenei akeaonglabü. Aishanga bulong salang tegü kü mütli salang kilabü; hoba haoeneibü ikei kümbü kümsilei ngeibü pienbü shuongei thon sühko lelabü.
Haoen kongkonga ühülabü, ayingsi maulabü shanga shousi abukshailabü; aishanga haoen
Kheijinei haoenei angajinei ngei jongailabü; haoen joyoko kitoua ngei ditlabü.

Sho si san shoushou liko lamshaulabü, hoba masu pongsuei tegü molosaonyuei youho shaulabü; lausikei pinyuje haoeibü shausiyung kho thamngu yinglabü. Haoenei ngeibü saopobü shongh pendoua amaibü ai akümlabü ayingsi amautikulabü,” dogo
Habü pendou kü ikei aküm lo, hoba ho pendou ngeibü aying lo, dogo

“Lausikei aoei masupongsu che haitilaje hao müt che haitibü tegü kilabü, aoei sanlon che haitian lemlaje haoeibü sii ngüma nyatetnyu haitibü tegü kilabü; aoei shausiyung lembü kulaje haoei ukeibü siiei lembü tegü kilabü, hoba aoei damenlabü jen lembü kulaje haoei heangsho haükubü tegü kilabü. Haoenei lulueibü lam shuong piena, hoba haoeneibü soushouei haoen mangsenlabü shuonga ong olinda.

Hibü ngeikei haoen awealaula ong pienlabü hoba haoen thükto haoen hatlamoklabü sungbakulabü. Aieilausi ngei ngajinei aoeikei ajongai. Ngei joyojinei haoenei adit; lausikei kü thea ai amai kho haoenei kümbei, hoba ngo ainei aolinda kho haoenei pienkei.
Kan haoeibü ngüha lühjilühko kibü shuong
Sangnyu pühnyinbü ngühlang, lembü chem ka ngühlang ditashi! Ho haoeibü dangbou shuong la ngaitikubü
“Lausikei sao nahap shatei shatjinei saoei bukkua; sao khon akujinei saoei bousushou che bukkua.
Aoei ho tegü ditan chühkei? Aoei ho tegü hapan chühkei? Nyetchenei ong kaonyekei mütli longtilep lo? Chemala phang che longtilep lo? Aishanga Zionei na hap khangjineitham saoei shousi shuong bukkei.
Bukla ngei ai sungbakei kho ngei abuktilep lo? dogo
Kan hao to sanoubü pendouei Jerusalem to olinyoashi,
hoba sao shanga olinangko kiashi,
kan sao shanga manghaapbü shuong.
Khei sao maangsubü sen ka kanei maangnyembo sheplabü
hoba kanei sendei nyatko sao soneikangbü juongei
kan olinangko kila shanga sao to olinyola shanga olinyoshi.
Aishanga
Jembü shou nyuei jaabü tegü ngei kan jaalabü; hoba kan Jerusalema solotilabü.
Hobaje kho kanei haplabü, hoba kaneibü maang- ponei olinyolabü, hoba kaneibü lo nyemshang tegü yeilabü;
Aishanga chühashi,
Aishanga wanei hoba haoeibü inei phe pendou thüka haoei matjemlabü hoba
Aishanga haoeneibü kümsilei hoba haoeneibü dambü ngei ngekei hoba phang, ngühyem pendou leishaila ngo louada, hoba haoen loulabü hoba ngeibü soneikangbü haplabü.

Hobaje haoen danko ngei tetsida che pholabü, hoba aoyou haoen ka satenlaje phang shuong jungto ngei hautilabü, khei Tarshish, Put, si Lud jungto Tubal hoba Javan jungto saabüa Su ngao laobouei ngeibü nyen- hang adit, ayingsi ngeibü soneikangbü ühüp, haoen jungto hautilabü. Haoenei phang yoa ngeibü soneikangbü ngetilabü.
Hobaje mütshuongei kaneibü jaisina pendou ka leian loulabü, koli taaka, kailonga hoba peisilei künbü kailonga küplepan gadu si ut thüka ngeibü saopobü shongh Jerusalema
Hobaje khübü atje ngei ungshedbou shuong hoba Levi shuong shanga lelabü, dogo
“Aishanga khuthük haanbü hoba kaodak haanbü laobou ngei kümbo ki, kü thedanga athakko kilabü, kho tegü kaibü phang hoba kaibü nyen athakko kilabü, dogo
Hobaje litsak ka litsak sühko hoba Nounyet ka Nounyet sühko khunakshousi pendouei kü to lemla loulabü,” dogo

Hobaje haoen longlabü hoba ngo khulimbo meimeibü müt haibü mang to haoenei chühlabü; aishanga haoeneibü yangbem ühailabü ayingsi haoeneibü wan anyetlabü, lausikei khunakshousi pendou thedanga haoen mangsenlabü kilabü.”
Benjamin kaodaka Anathota ungshedbou yoa Hilkiaeibü shou Jeremiaeibü ngüh shuong:
Ao jungto Jihudabü Choba Amoneibü shou Josia, haoeibü songdakbü po anthüksem boubüa hao haanga
Tokei Jihudabü Choba Josiaeibü shou Jehoakim haanga Jihudabü Choba Josiaeibü shou Zedekia po anthükche boubü thonbü sühko, lit ngaoboubüa Jerusalem langsenbü sühko kho loukei.
Tou
“No shia akünjinei ngei no ngean kikei, hoba no abukjinei thama ngei no saüenan phokukei, phang shuong jungto thuseibü che yingla ngei no pienkei.”
Kheijinei ngei laukei, “Ah,
Lausikei
Haoen to tehüt, aishanga no püetla ngo ka yoa kia.”
Kheijinei
Chühashi, tat phangshuong thüka hoba sangle shuong thüka pheienla hoba senthetla, mautila hoba khokan koutila, kümla hoba kela ngei no phoyoda.”
Tokei
Kheijinei
Nyiboukei
Kheijinei
Aishanga ditashi, yungkük sangle pendou ngei ngashailabü,” dogo
Hobaje haoen amaibü shanga ngei haoen khulimbo matjem laulabü, aieilausi haoenei ngo inletkei, hoba lubü mühghaü shuong to jen juokko lembei hoba haoenei lulueibü ikküm iklei shuong lembei.
Lausikei nyi shembe lokan meimeiashi, hoba ka la sakkubü pendou haoen la lenashi. Tou nyi haoen to tehüt, khei ayinglonga ngei no haoen yoa kijinei aei hatentilabü.

Aishanga chühashi, ngei no tat kaonyek khümbo khulimbo Jihudabü Choba shuong khulimbo, khoeibü konglebü shuong khulimbo, khoeibü ungshedbou shuong hoba kaonyek kabü mütli khulimbo loan kibü sangnyu che hoba nameibü thaonyu che hoba chisak nameibü kümthang yeitia.
Hobaje haoenei kakhu limbo wapyolabü, lausikei haoenei no anyemlabü aishanga no khümenla ngo ka yoa kia,” dogo
Tou
“Hauashi, hoba Jerusalembüeibü noua joyoko ngekashi,
Ngei ka shanga no heshoudanga nyi phebü sanouyobü damenda,
ailaibü nyi yamlamanga youli awenbü kaonyeka kü phai sembei.
Haoeibü shaangbü buhek Israel kho
aoyouei hao suikei haoenei shed shonkei;
haoen thükto amaibüei sühlabü, dogo
O Jakob chemdang, mütli pendou,
kaneibü
“Kaneibü pisibousi shuongei kü to ai shedbü hapbei?
Haoen kü ka lounyu bangjung satkei
hoba amlangbü kümsilei heangsho phai sembei.
‘Yamlamang danko sen leian loubü phetsen kaodak,
hoba püngkhün danko uangmuang kaodak hoba haibü yemkao danko
hoba aokei apaibü kaodak hoba müt aokei akishang
Ijep ka kün leiyenbü
dogo ongkei haoenei aphe.
Hobaje ngei no apsileko kibü kaonyek khoeibü buhek hoba
khoeibü peisilei maibü shuong shaula leian loukei;
lausikei ladang kan loukei kanei ngeibü kaodak shatikei,
hoba ngeibü phet mangsenlabü yeitikei.
Ungshedbou shuongei, ‘
hoba aoyouei ngühkhüm jungeida haoenei ngo ange;
songdakbü shuongeikei ngo khulimbo meimeikei,
hoba thuseibü shuongei Baal nyen phongko thusei ngüh laukei,
hoba ku akubü phaito sembei.
“Hibü ngei ka to tokei khüpyolabü
hoba kaneibü shisi shuong to khüpyolabü,
dogo
Aishanga Kittim yungko danko hauashi,
hoba Kedar to hautiashi hoba maisho daman chühashi;
hoba kho tegü kibü si akibü chühashi.
Phang atei lulueibü mühghaü shuong,
(khei mühghaümai ayingsi dogokei) jakshaikei sai?
Lausikei kü mütli shuongei haoeneibü soneikangbü jeiko
laobouei ku akuda kho jeia.
O mühshuong,
kan khünei mokashi hoba aeibou hatjihatko kiashi,
dogo
Aishanga ngeibü mütliei shedbü penyi küma.
Haoenei ngo langkeibü deikük inletkei,
hoba haoen shanga deikhün,
dei adangbü paknyinbü deikhün jakenakei.
“Israelbü sambü che sai?
Hao chema bukbü sambü che sai?
Kholonga hao haitilabou che aila yeikei?
Hao khulimbo molosaonyu paangshouei ngühkei,
hoba ngühlang kukei hoba haoenei
haoeneibü kaodak leiluan aptikei,
haoeneibü sangnyu shuong müt akiko lonan apbei.
Tokei Memfis si Tahpanhes mütshuongei
kaibü khu khulo nyintikukei.
Lausikei haoei no lamnyua leijinei
nyi inletbü hangshong kho ka thükto sühkei aying lo?
Hobaje tou Nail dei yungla shanga
Ijep lama haubüei nyi ai pailetla?
Ayingsi Eufrates dei yungla shanga
Assiria lama haubüei nyi ai pailetla?
No jembü amaibüei shieikoelabü,
hoba no phai sukbüei ka to haklabü,
hibü khoei
hoba soumo ühütko kibü kho lai amai hoba khaubü ki
kho nyi ngelabü hoba haplabü,
dogo Thükenbou
“Aishanga shangied nyi kaibü buleng leilukei hoba kaibü khühbü phenthetkei,
hoba nyi laukei, ‘Ngei akhangenlabü.’
Aishanga shonghshou suokbü wekoa
hoba hakjung koubü bulong phang wekoa
nyi no lolo lengkei hoba pejapelako kikei.
Khei yingsikei ngei no pienbü semlüh long che kekei,
aishanga lilabü jembüsangbü che kikei, khülonga aila kü
thedanga haang alongbü yamkabü semlühlong yeikei?
Aishanga nyi sapon deiei no saksikei hoba sapon juong lesikei
khei yingsikei kaibü shed shonbü kü thedanga nali kia dogo
Ngo atotnyinkei, ngo Baal phaito ohau, dogo nyi lai lauenla?
Pholia no haushang to chühashi,
nyi ai kümbei ngeashi,
you sobü ut shoushou jembü lama weneitaiko haubü kho no ki.
Yamkabü gadu yama haanghangyepbüei yei hipda,
sao langeibü ka aoei sao sepeinyu ngaitila?
Aoyouei sao lamda haoen lolo amanglabü,
litcha maijinei haoenei sao haplabü.
No youkong teki hoba sanglou uko telang,
lausikei nyi lauda, ‘Maanglem aki,
aishanga ngei küksithang mühghaü shuong to sanouda,
hoba haoen phaito ngo haulabü.’ ”
“Kokbü lapenjinei hao himou baubü hima
Israel chemdang himou baulabü,
khei haoen haoeneibü Choba shuong,
hoba haoeneibü leiyeibü shuong,
haoeneibü ungshedbou shuong
hoba haoeneibü thuseibü shuong himou baulabü.
Haoenei bulong che to, ‘No kübou,’ hoba laang che to,
‘Nyi ngo bukkei,’ dogo lauda.
Aishanga haoenei haoeneibü thenyek ayingko
haoeneibü takphai kü ae yeikukei.
Lausikei haoeneibü khonsak chaloua haoenei laulabü,
‘Meimeiashi hoba kün khümenashi!’

“Lausikei nyi kümbü kaibü mühghaü shuong lanei ki? Kaibü khonsak chaloua haoenei no khümenla thükalonga, haoen meimeitiashi. Aishanga O Jihuda, kaibü sangnyu lajuche ki khüjoche kaibü mühghaü shuong ki.
Khülonga kanei ngo khulimbo aila lauyoda? Kan pendouei ngo khulimbo ngühkhüm leilua, dogo
Amlanga ngei kaneibü shousi shuong to ngümbei; haoen maang asang, kan jembü inei kaneibü thuseibü shuong mautikubou molosaonyuei tegü suian apbei.
‘O kan ho metenbü, kanei
Medeiei jembü hele chimen yakmen maalep lo? Khei yingasikei kü mütli shuongei chalou shuong aweenko ngo maan apbei.
Sanounyu lamla nyi kaibü lamnyu lai küman ho ngeenda! Khei amaibü yaksa shuong tokei nyi kaibü lamnyu shuong lenakei.
Kaibü neia shed akakbü sii naangan hapda. Nyi kho paijung atbü ühüp.
“Lausikei khübü pendou thüka hapbei. Khei yingasikei
nyi lauda, ‘Ngo shedbü aki; maimaitham
Aila kaibü lamnyu ho hai jakshaiko shoongaida? Assiriaei no himoutilabü.
Kaibü khua kaibü ik tenan hao ka no satlabü; aishanga nyi maanglembü shuong

“Kaolong shonghkhu aeto kaibü nyekei chühangtiashi, hoba chühashi, no ayepbü kaoen lanei ki? Arabbü yama tegü lama no haoen shanga setan kiteikei; hoba kaibü asangalanbü kümsileiei hoba kaibü shedbüei nyi kaonyek shentikei.
Hibü langloubü senetkei hoba youshap lang alou; khei yingasikei no asangalanbü the yeman ihimouko kida.
“Touje nyi kü to, ‘Abou, nyi kü to heshoudanga thama sanouko thounoukei dogo angekda lo?
Hao ponpen khauangko kilep lo? Haoei kho thon sühko kilep lo?’ Chühashi Israel, nyi laua, lausikei thükthüng nyi amaibü küma.”
Josia Choba haanga
Hobaje saoei habü pendou küman phaia, sao kü jungto sepeilep dogo ngei dambei.

Hobaje ladang khei sukjung ngaibü Israelei asang- alan jungeikei, ngei sao tekan apbei. Khei yingasikei khüpettibü Jihuda saoeibü nousinaei ühüt, lausikei tokei saokei haukei hoba asangalanbü jungeikei.
Sao pejapelako helelea kibü danko kaonyek kho shaan apbei hoba haoei laang si bulong to asangalan kümbei.
Ho pendou haüthüksi dogokei sao maang- asangbü jaisina Jihudaei saoeibü maangpon pendouei kü jungto sepeinyu alou, lausikei hibü- youbü maangpon kikei,” dogo
Kheijinei
Hauashi, hoba khübü ngüh yungküka ngekashi, hoba lenashi, phaisukbü Israel, sepeiashi dogo
“Nyi
Hobaje ngei kan la ngeibü maangsembü sanlombü shuong kulabü, aoyouei kan hapbüngebü songadoa hoba ditenbüei samlabü.
Hobaje khübü chaloua
Kho chaloua haoei Jerusalem to
Khübü chaloua Jihudabü chemdang kho Israelbü chemdang yoa pailabü hoba haoen yungkük kaonyek aeka kaneibü pisibousi shuong la ngei phet- phanla kubü kaodak to liko loulabü.”
Kheijinei ngei laukei,
“Ngei no ngeibü shousi shuong yoa lai phokula
hoba ka la kaonyek maibü phangshuongeibü phetphan maibü lai kula?
Hobaje ngei laukei: Kanei kü to, ‘Abou,’ dogo ngalabü;
hoba kü phai sembü ka sepeinyu angailabü.
Maimaitham yakei jembü lao khüpettiko bangbü tegütham,
kanei ngo khüpettiko jungeikei;
O Israel chemdang,” dogo
Kaolong shonghkhua ngüh che ditda,
Israel shousi shuong haapbü hoba subüjabü ngühlang;
haoenei jembü lam theknyinsije,
haoenei
Sepeiashi, kan phaisukbü shousi shuong,
kan phaisukbü ngei maitilabü.
“Haü, kün ka jungto louada,
aishanga no
Tükde shongh hoba shonghshou ka thuibü lambü,
hoba shonghnyua lemenbü jim aki.
Maimaitham
“Sen heshoudang ka thama himou kümsileiei seneibü pisibouei kümenbü suian apbei; haoeneibü sanlon tan hoba masu shuong, haoeneibü shousi shuong hoba haoeneibü yaksa shousi shuong.
Sen himou baubüa sen leketnyu yepbho hoba seneibü himouei sen küplettishi, aishanga seneibü
“No longeikho laualonga O Israel, no kü jungto sepeiashi,” dogo
hoba ngühmaia hoba saopobüa, ‘
Aishanga
Kan lolo
Kanei Jihudaa ngekashi hoba Jerusalema ngetiashi;
hoba lenashi, kaonyeka kanei teklaang metashi, ngekashi hoba lenashi;
kamshaiashi hoba banyu lean kibü sangnyu shuong khüto kaiya.
Zion to haulabü aenei nisan che phoashi,
satenshang lamshi, tühaitei;
aishanga ngei yungkük ka amaibü yaang sungbalabü.
Molosaonyu che haoeibü hushang ka hoba phangshuongeibü mautibou che louada;
hao jembü lama kia.
Hao jembü kishang ka longan thinei kia;
haoen kaonyek sangliphanga,
khei kaneibü sangnyu shuong müt akiko apshang danglabü.
Hibü kho shanga senounei shenan,
ügütü chia lauashi hoba haapyoashi;
aishanga
Kheijinei ngei laukei, “Ah,
Kho chaloua ho mütli to hoba Jerusalem to ho hai laulabü, “Yeilang aubü che, yamlamang shonghkhu ulangbü ka kü mütli nouyangshou aephei to louada; soueikula aying, hinseitikula aying;
lausikei kho shangaje yongko sekokbü kü shanga loulabü, tokei tou ngei haoen shanga matjem kulabü.”
Chühashi, hao sangmei tegü angda, hoba haoeibü kailong yeishik tegü kilabü; haoeneibü koli shuong aulu tokei sokeisepbei. Sen shanga ügütü! Sen lai kila!
O Jerusalem, no khümenlabü lele kaibü maangpon shabü ka sakenashi. Lalokche kaibü dambü shuong ka to thüngan kila?
Aishanga Dan ka ngüh cheei ngetida hoba Efraim shongh ka amaibü ngekletkuda.
“Phangshuong maangsangtiashi; chühashi Jerusalem la ngetiashi: ‘Kaodak saabü ka sangshibü louada, hoba Jihuda sangnyu shuong khulimbo ngühlang kuda.
Sek lombü shuongei tegütham, haoen sao khulimbo komlepan kia, aieilausi saoei ngo khulimbo meimeikei,’ ” dogo
“Kaibü hangsilam hoba kümsilei shuongei ka thükto ho loushedkei. Ho kaibü shabü kümsilei shuong ki, maimaitham ho khauektham ki, aieilausi hoei kaibü maangpona sühko atda!”
O ngeibü soushou, ngeibü soushou!
Kü maangpona ngeibü mang toktokda.
Kü to ngeibü maangpon sangsembo akida;
ngo küpjembo akienda.
Aishanga teklaang ngühlang wapyobü ngühlang ngei ditda.
Leilubü thükto leilubü, kaonyek khümbo leiluakei.
Hakde ong ngeibü neichem shuong
hoba ngeibü thangtet nei shuong jitnyina.
Ngei lalokche nisan hapla hoba teklaang ngühlang ditla?
“Aishanga kü mütli ngoubü ki;
haoenei ngo angekei.
Haoen ngoubüloubü shousi shuong ki;
hoba haoen to ditenbü ai aki.
Amaibü kümla haoen maanglimaangsang ki;
lausikei maibü kümla haoenei angekei.”
Ngei kaodak to chühkei, hoba chühashi, kho leilubü
hoba kongkong kikei hoba mütshuong haoeneibü ngesak akitei.
Ngei shongh shuong to chühkei,
hoba chühashi haoen lühkei
hoba shonghshou pendou jiji to ngomyokei.
Ngei chühkei hoba chühashi khünei müt akitei,
hoba mühkabü au pendou satan kikei.
Ngei chühkei hoba chühashi,
buhek hekbü kao kho yamla yeian kikei,
hoba khünei sangnyu pendou
hoba haoeibü hatla moklabü sei thedanga leiluan kikei.
Aishanga
“Kaonyek pendou sangliphang che la yeilabü;
khei yingasikei kho thon alelabü.
Kho shanga kaodakei mang haaplabü,
hoba thükaenei müh nakthühbü kilabü,
aieilausi kho ngei laua hoba kho asenetlabü;
ngei jantheda hoba khüka asepeilabü.”
Koli sepai shuong hoba lau jungbü shuong ngühei
sangnyu khümbo satyoda,
haoen hushang lamjung atda hoba laangbob lambo angda;
sangnyu weko nangletakei
hoba müt che ongkei khünei akida.
Hobaje no ladang leilulaje nyi ai kümla?
Nyi no lolo nakthüngan sakbü neisimei lesikei hoba no lolo
honeibü neisimei hele leasikei
kaibü nyeka naangan yaangtisikei,
amlanga nyi no lolo he maitida;
no sanoubü shuongei ka la nyikuda,
haoenei kaibü langkei lamda.
Ditashi, shou bukjinei yaksa cheeibü ngüh phatko,
shaangbüshou bukjinei sao khonkubü phatko,
Zion Nouyangshou ngühlang,
haksakan saoeibü ik yantiko: “Ngo tou ügütü;
aishanga müt haitibü shuong thedanga ngeibü soushou semthetda,”
dogo laubü ngühlang ngei ditda.
“Kanei Jerusalem khongnyu sünga langeiashi,
hoba tou chühashi hoba ngeashi,
hoba khünei hopabü kaoena kanei tükdebü kümbü
hoba ngühmai lambü müt che hapla si ühüplaje lamashi,
hoba ngei ho sangnyu la amai apbulabü.
Hobaje haoenei, ‘
maimai haoenei amlang thedalanda.”
O
Nyi haoen to ngümbei,
lausikei haoenei aüh alau;
nyi haoen mautikei lausikei haoen maang asangngai.
Haoenei haoeneibü thenyek laang tokei kaangbou yeitikei,
hoba haoen sepeinyu telongaikho lauda.
Kheijinei ngei laukei,
“Maimaitham habü ho shalebü ki,
haoen ngoubüloubü ki;
aishanga haoenei
ayingsi haoeneibü Mühghaüeibü matjem angekei.
Hibü ngo khuleibü shuong jungto haulabü hoba haoen to joyolabü,
aishanga haoenei
hoba haoeneibü Mühghaüeibü matjem ngeakei.”
Lausikei habü hoei maangpon che la lean buleng leilua hoba khübü phentheda.
Hibü yam ka molosaonyu cheei haoen haitilabü
hoba phetsen kao kabü sho cheei haoen jitnyinlabü,
kongkhü cheei haka longbü shuong mütpem weko netla yeiko jitnyinla shanga
haoeneibü sangnyu nyangko thoan kilabü;
aishanga haoen ngühkhüm lulimbü hoba phaisukbü juongseba.
“Ngei ka la lai shedbü apbuenla? Kaibü shousi shuongei ngo inletkei
hoba ai mühghaü shuong aying khübüei theyolanyokei;
ladang ngei haoen shishenko pangteikei haoenei asangalanbü jungeikei,
hoba haoen lolo tan tan asangalan sao shuong chema yoshaikei.
Haoen shausiyung maibüei pangteibü koli shuong tegü
mütpem wekoei jembü lepboueibü yakla koli tegü wikukei.
Khübü shanga ngei haoen ashiakoelep lo?
Hobaje kho tegübü phang to ngei phok alamlep lo?” dogo
“Kan saoeibü semlühlaak khüto angashi hoba leilutiashi;
lausikei khümbomeikoje teleiluku.
Saoeibü bhek shuong sunglangashi,
aishanga haoen
Aishanga Israel mütli hoba Jihuda mütliei ngo khulimbo
khüpbolangko jungeia,” dogo
Haoenei
Hobaje thuseibü shuong kia lausikei yei ong hoba ngühmai haoen to aki; kho tegü haoen to kümlabü.”
Hibü
“Chühashi, O Israel chemdang, kan thükto saabü ka phang che sungbalabü,” dogo
Haoeneibü laujin phot kho ipan kibü hee ki; haoen hau kibü mütshuong ki.

Hobaje haoenei nyi latbü youshou shauan apbulabü, laobou nou- yang jayangshousiei shaula kiteikei; haoenei kaibü sanlon si masu shuong shaukulabü. Haoenei kaibü semlüh si bhuk shaukulabü, hoba ba lean kibü sangnyu shuong laobou to nyi maanglemda, khübü kho haoenei inei wapshemkulabü.
“Lausikei khübü chalouakei ngei no khümbothamje temautikho, dogo
Hobaje ladang kan mütliei, ‘Aila
“Jakob chemdang to kanei ho phinthonashi, hoba Jihudaa kho ngekletkuashi:
Ho ditashi, O ngoubü shuong hoba ai aditenbü mütshuong; kan nyekkhün yetakei, lausikei ühüpda; kan nou yemakei lausikei aditda.

ei lauda: Kanei kü to ühütda lo? Kan kü junga alühda si? Yungnyu shanga leilang ngei phetsen phokukei, ladangkei danjung alouenlabü lele thangetlabü che; deishou shuongei onshaisikei haoenei athüklabü, haoen ngühsikei haoenei kho danjung ohaulabü.
Lausikei ho mütli ngüm kaangbü hoba khulimbo lobü; haoen khulimbo meimeikei hoba khüpeinyu ngaia.
Haoenei haoeneibü maangpona ho alauda:
Kaneibü shedbü shabüei khübü shian sattia; hoba kaneibü shabüei kan ka maibü seneda.
“Aishanga ngeibü mütli yoa müt amaibü hapda; au sanbüei huan thobü tegü haoenei thoan haiteida, haoenei sung sanda, haoenei müt lapda.
Auei shen- an kibü kam tegü, khüpbülangbüei haoeneibü chem shenakei, hibü haoen yaangbü hoba keibü la yeia.
Haoen netda, thesak angakei, haü, amaibü kümaleia haoen aoeikei athükda, haoenei shoujit shuongeibü pü alekuda; khei haoen naangmaila atonenda hoba shalebüeibü janbü kümsilei shanga haoen alokuda.
“Khübü shanga ngei ashi- akoelep lo? dogo
Maangpanglabü kümsilei che hoba hatla moklabü kaonyeka haüthükakei.
Thuseibü shuongei amlang tetenda, hoba ungshedbou shuongei haoenei maangangbüei songdakda, hoba ngeibü mütli shuongei kho tegü kilakeila maikuda. Lausikei thonlama kanei ai kümla?

“Satenla shanga Jerusalem ka satashi, kan Benjamineibü shousi shuong, hoba Tekoaa teklaang metashi, hoba Beth- hakherem thüka nisan phoashi; aishanga yungthang phei ka khonsak yuklepjung khei leilubü yaang lotda.
Hemai saomai omlang Zion nouyangnyu ngei wapan aplabü.
Sao jungto sanlombü shuong jembü sanshuong yoa sao khulimbo loulabü; sao kaijembo haoenei jembü neichem shuong danglabü; hoba haoen wekoei jembü kishanga lamshaulabü.
Kanei sao khulimbo wapyola lamleashi! Meimeiashi, hoba sen sao khulimbo chajihboua angkho! Lausikei sen shanga ügütü, aieilausi change nepda, hoba chasembü mangh lounyu yeida.
Meimeiashi, sen nangnak angkho hoba saoeibü lapheishon shuong senei leilukukho!”
Aishanga Thükenbou
Deikük ka dei longbü tegütham saoei amaibü longtida. Sao to kaangbüsekbü hoba soshau soyungbü ngühlang ditda; kü thedanga athakko shatbü hoba moukhün shuong kia.
O Jerusalem, ngo kan ka lubü to kukjung satakei, ngei no sangliphang müt akibü kaodak che yeitiakei.”
Thükenbou
Haoenei ngüha leko ditlabü lele ngei aoyou to joyola? Chühashi, haoeneibü nou saklep- akei, hoba haoenei ditla athük. Chühashi,
