Khei yingbü khoei
Kheijinei
Hobaje haoeneibü phangshuong, haoeneibü sek hoba haoeneibü yaksi shuong yoan müla kulabü. Aieilausi kaonyeka kibü thükto ngei ngeibü ik shinglabü,” dogo
“Aishanga haoen hanbou ka yaangbou sühko mütpem weko thedüh maangdüh aeto hauakei, hoba thuseibou ka khei ungshedbou sühko mütpem wekoei yepeijaweko jungeida.
Kü mütli nouyangshoueibü moukhün haoenei sosotham maitian lenda. Sangmaije akinyu haoenei, ‘Sangmai, sangmai,’ dogo lauda.

Mangsenlabü kümsilei shuong kümjinei haoen himouko kikei sai? Aying, haoen aikei himouko ayingsi the menko akitei. Hibü tuongbü shuong yoa haoen tuonglabü; ngei haoen shieinangeijinei haoen tuongtilabü,” dogo
Ngei kan thüka lombü phokuko laukei, ‘Teklaang ngüh ditashi!’ Lausikei haoenei laukei, ‘Künei aditlabü.’
“Hibü ditashi, O phangshuong; O saopobü thangyenbü shuong, haoen to ai loushedlaje ngeashi.
Ditashi, O kaodak: chühashi, ho mütli thükto ngei amaibü, khei haoeneibü dambü hek sungbakulabü, aieilausi haoenei ngeibü ngüha ale; hoba ngeibü ngühkhüm le haoenei tekan apbei.
Aineilela Sheba ka jen hoba kaodak saabü ka ponlem hibü hongkung teibü jungan kü jungto louda? Kaneibü juokbü lembü sungletla athük ayingsi haitibü lembü kü thedanga olinbü aying.”
Khoei

Haoenei lau hoba aubu jungda; haoen to onou aki, hoba üeisanou aki, haoeneibü ngüh yungnyu tegü ngühda; hoba haoen kolia setda; ka khu limbo lason to haubü müt tegütham müt lamlebüa kia, O Zion nouyangshou.”
Künei haoeneibü ngühlang dida, hoba küneibü ik hau akiko apa; khonkubü hoba yaksa na hapjinei khonsakbü tegü kün to maang alembo hatyolanga.
Sek to tekou ayingsi lama tepai, aishanga khünei dangboueibü in hoba pendou aenei hatlabü kia.
O ngeibü mütli nouyangnyu, nyi senounei neiashi, hoba no lolo tapa lekeiashi; no mang haapashi, jayangshou shanga tegü haapashi; aieilausi sen thükto maulabü ong hakde loulabü.
“Kü mütli yoa ngei no khei nyi ngela hoba haoeneibü lamthen takteilabü lele ngei laangbob hoba lapheishon che yeitikei.
Haoen pendou songdak khulimbo longda, sukjung ngaian paibü shuong yoa shoongaibü shuong. Haoen chisak nam hoba namkung ki; haoen pendou amaiko jungeida.
Wanei wan metjin kho juokda, namphet khoje wanei tühnyinakei, lausikei jim akibüa haoenei athakko saüenda; aieilausi amaibü khoje sungan üpbo kia.
Mütei khübü to chandinam namphet dogo lauda, aieilausi
Thükenbou
‘Ho
“Aishanga kanei kaneibü haang shuong hoba kümsilei shuong maisho kümedalonga, kanei müt che hoba haoeibü lepbü sangmang kanglanga ngühmai kümalonga,
kanei yenbou, bou akibü hoba latnyu khon akutilonga, hoba kanei shed akibü sii üangtilonga ayingsi kan jembü khonkulabü lele lubü mühghaü phai asemlonga,
kheijinei ngei kaneibü pisibou la shangieda ponpen shanga kubü kaodaka ngei kan kitilabü.
“Chühashi, amlanga khüpettibü ngüh kanei mailemda.
Kanei kokda, müt haitida, hoba asangalanda hoba yepeijaweko thelalanda, hoba Baal shanga jen juokda hoba kanei angebü küksithang mühghaü shuong phaito paida,
hoba kho phaia ho chema, laobou kü Nyenei ngaan ki, khüto louan loda hoba, ‘Kün khümenakei!’ dogo lauko khübü mangsenlabü pendou kümlep lo?
Ho chem laobou kü Nyenei ngaan ki, ka thedanga soshau soyungbü laangbob che la yeikei sai? Chühashi, ngei kho hapa! dogo
Lausikei tou ngo kishang laobou Shiloa kikei khüto kan hauashi, lanei ngei ngeibü Nyen shaanglaje kiteikei, hoba ngeibü mütli Israel amaibü shanga ngei khüto ai kümbei chühashi,
hoba tou
Hibü ho chem laobou ngeibü Nyen nyenan ki, laoboua kanei maanglem phoda, kishang laobou ngei kan la hoba kaneibü pisibou la kukei, ngei Shiloa kümbü tegü ho chem hoba ho kishang to kümlabü.
Hobaje ngei kü thedang ka kaneibü chempen pendou tekan aplabü, khei Efraim chung khümbo nangletbü tegü ngei kan nangletlabü.”
Jihuda sangnyu shu- ong hoba Jerusalem khongnyua haoenei ai kümda nyi ühüpda lo?

Khuthükbü Chobasao la wentek ngoukula shanga, nashousi shuongei bu lakda, bou shuongei wan metda, hoba yaksa shuongei wen nyatda. Ngo khauangtilabü lele haoenei lubü mühghaü shuongla yunglabü lembü khü- pan jinkuda.
Hoei haoenei ngo ong khauang longtida sai? dogo
Hibü
“Thükenbou
Aishanga Ijep kaodak ka kaneibü pisibousi shuong leian longjinei juokbü lembü ayingsi haitibü lembü shanga ngei haoen to ajoyo ayingsi asakku.
Lausikei ho sakkubü ngei haoen la kukei: Kü ngüh ditashi, hoba ngo kaneibü Mühghaü hoba kan kü mütli yinglabü. Ngei kan la sakkubü lamnyu pendoua paiashi, khünei kan maian kilabü.
Lausikei haoenei ngüha ale ayingsi nou ühangku; khüpeinyu, haoenei jembü songadoa hoba haoeneibü sensimaang amaibü kaangbüa haoen paikei. Thedang ae aying, phai aeto haukei.
Kaneibü pisibou Ijep kaodak ka longbü chalou ka tat sühko ngei kan jungto ngeibü khangenbü hoba thuseibü pendou chalou weko hautidang lekei.
Khei yingasikei haoenei kü to adit ayingsi nou ühangku, lausikei haoen ngüm kaangtikei hoba haoeneibü pisibousi toje haoenei aei amaibou kümbei.
“Ladang nyi habü ngüh pendou haoen to lenlaje haoenei ka to kei ngüha alelabü; ladang nyi tokei haoen to ngalaje haoenei ka to ajongailabü.
Hobaje nyi haoen to laulabü: Ho mütliei
“Kaibü khu shuashi, O Jerusalem,
hoba kho tekan apashi,
hoba shonghkhua manghaap chia laushi;
aieilausi
kibü meten asunglet hoba nangletkei.
“Aishanga Jihudabü shousi shuongei kü thedanga amaibü kümbei dogo
Hobaje haoeneibü shousi shuong hoba nouyangshou shuong wana jikla Ben Hinnom Yoa Tofet lemshang shongh kümbei; laobou ngei asakku ayingsi ngeibü maangto alotko kikei.
Hibü chühashi,
Hobaje ho mütlieibü haibü mang shuong kho mühkabü au hoba kaodak kabü meisiau shuong shanga shausiyung yinglabü hoba aieikei haoen aphangnyintilabü.
Kheijinei ngei Jihudabü sangnyu shuong ka hoba Jerusalem khongnyu ka olinyobü ngühlang hoba chemkanbü ngühlang thaktilabü; aieilausi kaonyek kho sangliphang la yeitilabü.
“Kheijinei,

Hobaje khübü kho chanyu litnyu hoba müha kibü khanshoulitshou pendou thüka phinan aplabü, laobou to haoenei sanoukei hoba phai sembei hoba pheyolamyokei, hoba lembei. Khübü kho ayoshailabü, ayingsi akhünlabü, lausikei khongdanga od hima apyolabü.
Hobaje ngei shian apshang pendoua ho phang amaibü jouan kibü pendouei langkei toje haibü ong pienlabü dogo Thükenbou
Tokei nyi haoen to lauashi:
Khülonga aila Jerusalema ho mütliei ponpen phai sukjung ngaida? Khüpsilang kaangkhühtham haoenei hatlepda, haoen nyibou tesepeikho lauda?

Ngei nou haangan ditko kikei, lausikei haoenei tükde alau. Müt aoeikei, ‘Ngei ai kümbei,’ dogo lauko jembü amaibü ka maangpon asepeida. Lason to nyujung atbü koli tegü mütpem weko jembü lam to sepeida.
Haü, müha yungauei mangkei jembü chasilit takletbü ngeda; dukutuk, lolenshang hoba yungauei haoen loubü jihsiphai jungeida. Lausikei kü mütliei
‘Kün songsi- hona keibü ki, hoba
Songsihon kibü mütshuong himou baulabü, haoen phenyembo hoba mokde apyoakei; ditashi, haoenei

Hibü ngei haoeneibü yaksi shuong lubü la kuan aplabü, hoba haoeneibü sek haoen thükbü la kuan aplabü, aishanga mütpem weko hanbou ka yaangbou sühko aeilam aeiphopei shenan kia; khei, thuseibü ka ungshedbou sühko mütpem wekoei yepeijaweko kümda.
Ngeibü mütli nou- yangnyueibü mou haoenei sosotham maitian lenda hoba sangmaije akinyu, ‘Sangmai, sangmai,’ dogo lauda.

Haoenei mangsenlabü jungeijinei haoen himoukei sai? Aying, haoen aikei himouko akitei; ayingsi lai the menla khokei haoenei angekei. Hibü tuongbü shuong yoa haoenkei tuonglabü, haoen shieikoejinei haoen phangto sungyanlabü, dogo
“Ngei haoen lemailela mautilabü, dogo
“Sen tokei aila setan kida? Liko kamshaiashi! Sen thangngaian kibü sangnyu khüto atkho hoba sen khünei shemkho! Aishanga
Senei hakso lambei, lausikei ai maibou alou, hoba mailabü chalou lambei, lausikei chühashi, hatla moklabü yaang.

Haoeneibü kolieibü kunga wibü Dan ka ditda; hau kibü koli shuong wiyobüei kaonyek khümbo lühda. Aishanga, kaonyek hoba khünei kibü pendou suila, sangnyu hoba khünei kibü mütshuong pendou suila haoen lousüha.
“Aishanga chühashi, ngei pinyu hoba lüh kibü pinyu hautilabü, deipi shuong ngoutila athük; hoba khübü khoei kan to püplabü,” dogo
Aiwaü! ngeibü maangmau yongko yaanga,
ngeibü maangpon maang aenei semthetda!
Ditashi! Kaodak aeibou saabüa
ngeibü mütli nouyangshoueibü ngühlang,
Saoeibü Chobasao to aki lo?
Aila haoenei ngo heangsho noksaei,
hoba küksithang amlangbü kümsileiei
maangto shatko khau angtida?
“Youlat jih dana sulang dana
hoba senje akhümenkei.”
Ngeibü mütli nouyangshou leilubü hangshong
ngeibü maangpona akakei;
ngo manghaapda, hatla moklabüei kü to süha.
Gileada maitilabü moli aki lo?
Khonei moli ngebü aki lo?
Khülonga aila kü mütli nouyangshou shat amaida?
Ügütü, ngeibü khu dei yingma,
hoba ngeibü nyek nyeksi pakshang che yingma!
Khei ngei change nangnak kü mütli haitibü shanga haapbo kikhoulabü.
Ügütü, yama wakoubü shuong otshang che ki yingma,
khei ngei kü mütli yoan haoen jungka satan apbhoulabü.
Aishanga haoen pendou maangalanbü shuong,
huonbüyoubü tan che ki.
Hobaje khüpsilang shanga lau maimai haoeneibü lishang bühenda;
haoeneibü kaonyeka hau kiko yeiakei,
lausikei maimai tükde shanga aying.
hoba haoenei ngo haoeneibü Mühghaü dogo asungletda.”
Kan mütpem weko jembü lepbü sangmang shanga maangsangashi;
hoba aotokei mailem teki;
aieilausi jaisina wekoei thükbü tegü khüpettida
hoba lepbü sangmang wekoei awealauko hauda.
Hobaje haoeneibü lepbü sangmang weko khüpettida
hoba ngühmai alauda;
haoenei jembü lishang to yepeijaweko laula lena;
haoen tegü ayeishongko haoenei shedbü kümda.
Kaibü kishang khüpsilang yoa kia,
khüpsilang danko haoenei ngo ngela asungletda
dogo
Khei yingbüei Thükenbou
“Chühashi, ngei haoen tühnyintilabü,
hoba haoen takteilabü.
Aishanga ngeibü mütli nouyangshou amaibü thükto ngei
tokei ai kümenla?
Haoeneibü lishang hailabü laujin ki,
hoba hoei khüpeilangei lauda;
müt cheei jembü lepbü to eaaoa haoeibü sembungei joyoda,
lausikei haoeibü maangpona hao shanga tin sankuda.
Khübü kümsilei shanga ngei haoen ashiakoelep lo?
Ho tegübü phang che to ngei phok alamlep lo?
dogo
Ngei laukei, “Shongh shuong shanga ngo haaplabü
hoba haapbo ngeklabü;
hoba yama lamshaushanga waangbü chia laulabü;
aieilausi khübü kho lonan apakei;
hibü aoeikei kho danjung ohauenda.
Mütshuongei masu shuong ngühlang ditla athük,
mühkabü au shuong hoba meisiau shuong hatla lina hoba sada.”
selongeibü laangpob yeitikulabü,
hoba Jihuda sangnyu shuong müt akiko
sangliphang la yeitikulabü.”
Ngei phekei, “
Lausikei haoen jembü maang- pon khünbüyaangbü phaito hoba haoeneibü bousi shuongei lenbü Baal shuong phaito paida.
Hibü Thükenbou
Ngei tokei haoen, khei haoenei yingasikei haoeneibü pisibousi shuongei yingasikei ngean ditan akibü phangshuong yoa phinthontilabü, hoba haoen ashemti shongko haoen phaito ngei in hautilabü.”
Thükenbou
“Kanei daman chühashi!
Manghaapbü yaksa shuong louenlabü lele ngaashi,
hoba manghaap saoshuong ngala hautiashi.”
Mütshuongei laukei,
“Haoen panteitiashi hoba sen shanga manghaap chia lautiashi,
khei seneibü nyek ka nyeksi akoushongko,
hoba haapbüei seneibü nyekkhop ka dei ongjung alongshongko.”
Aishanga haapyobü ngühlang che Ziona ditda:
“Sen lai leiluan ki!
Sen aeibou himou baua!
Senei seneibü kaonyek apyojan;
aieilausi haoenei sen kishang leilutikua.”
Ngei laukei,
O kan yaksa shuong,
hoba kaneibü nouei haoeibü ngüh sungletashi.
Kaneibü nouyangnyu shuong la haapyola lenashi,
hoba kaneibü jenabou la manghaap chia laula lenashi.
Aishanga seneibü koulom to haibü lotakei,
hoba kho seneibü Choba chem to lotakei;
hoei nashousi shuong kouteia
hoba heshou shuong khongmaanga wapan apakei.
Haibü mang odsinot shaangbü maimai khong shenko phinakei,
khei youlatbouei phainei youman ikmaang shenko apyobü tegü,
aoeikei kho ayoshailabü.
“Songbüdobüei jembü songahona telili,
ayingsi haukiyaangkibü mütei jembü haua telili,
ayingsi keibü mütei jembü nyaksinama telili.
Lausikei aoei lilida,
haoen honei ong lilitiashi,
khei haoenei ngo ditenbüa hoba ngebü shanga,
aieilausi kaodaka sanou onou matjem,
hoba saopobü kümbou kho ngo
aieilausi khübünei ngo olinda,
dogo
Ijep, Jihuda, Edom, Ammon shousi shuong, Moab hoba yama kibü pendou jembüeibü khu naphei shuan apbü shuong, aishanga habü phang pendou kipan üpbei, hoba Israel chung pendou maangpona kipan üpbei.”
O Israel chemdang,
ei hai lauda,
“Phangshuongeibü lamnyu teditlet
ayingsi mühkabü tetsidaei tephenyem,
aeilausi phangshuong khübü khoei mokda.
Aishanga müteibü songle amlangbü ki.
Yam ka bulong che akda
hoba ikseibü müteibü ikei kho jakenda.
Mütshuongei kho chandinam si honei naanglepda;
atopeitila shanga haoenei martol si kojalei thünglepda.
Haoeneibü heangsho shuong kho simo laka
müteibü noksa küman phobü phatko ki;
hoba haoenei joyola athük,
haoen jung ong jungeilabü ki,
aieilausi haoen paila athük.
Haoen to tehüt,
aieilausi haoenei amaibü kümla athük,
ayingsi maibü kümlakei aki.”
O
hoba kaibü nyen hau yaangbü ki.
O phangshuong Choba, aoei ka to ühütla?
Aishanga kho ka shanga janbü ki.
Aishanga phangshuong songbüdobü pendou yoa
hoba haoeneibü sangle pendoua no phatbü ao aki.
Haoen lepde lejim akiko ngousepa,
heangsho lembü shuongeibü lenbü kho bu ong ki.
Chandinam phau yaübü Tarshish ka sungbakei,
hoba Ufaz ka hon, khübü kho bueibü ikküm iklei
hoba hon yaübü ik ka ki;
haoeneibü neisimei mühson
hoba nakthüngan sakbü haoen pendou
libünyenbü müteibü kümsilei ki.
Lausikei
hao lang kibü Mühghaü hoba ponpen kibü Choba.
Hao khau longjinei kaodak nyaakeida
hoba phangshuongei haoeibü maangshat atinda.
(Nyi haoen to hai lenshi: Shabü mühghaü shuong aoyouei müh si kao aküm, haoen kaodak ka hoba mühnyu phang ka maulabü.)
Aoei kaodak haoeibü seiei hauei kümbei kho hao ki;
aoei jembü songeidoei kaodak yaüda
hoba haoeibü ditenbüei mühshuong jenkei.
Ladang haoei haoeibü ngüh longlaje müha dei shuong ngühda,
hoba kaodak thonbü ka haoei sangmei tuan angtida,
lang loutila haoei langpon pontida,
hoba haoeibü thanshang chem ka haoei yei longtida.
Mütpem weko ngoubüloubü hoba songsihon akibü;
hon yaübü weko jembü heangshoei himou bautida.
Aieilausi haoeibü heangsho kho amlangbü hoba haoen to hak aki.
Haoen lejim aki, mashikbü kümsilei ki;
haoen shieikoejinei haoen maulabü.
Ao Jakobeibü phejan ki haoje khübü aphatkei,
aishanga pendou Kümbouyaübou kho hao ki,
hoba Israel kho haoeibü phetphan phang ki;
hao nyen kho Thükenbou
O no, ao komlepan ki, kaibü neilop kao ka hauan sungashi.
Aishanga
Ngo leilubü shanga ngo ügütü!
Ngeibü mou yaangsepbei! Lausikei ngei ngo lolo laungaikei:
“Maimaitham ho ngeibü shat, hoba ngei ho natjan!
Ngeibü neichem leilua hoba ngeibü jolüh pendou jangtheda;
ngeibü shousi shuong kü jungka sada, hoba haoen aki;
nyibou ngeibü neichem sengla ayingsi
ngeibü thangtet phonngaikula ao aki.”
Ngei jongaikei, “Aishanga sanlombü shuong ngoubü
hoba
khei yingbü khoei naang amaida;
hoba haoeneibü sanlon dan pendou lina.
Ditshima! Ngühphakphak che kho louada:
Jihudabü sangnyu shuong sangliphang selong thüngshang
la yeitila yungkük aeka aeibou pangyoda.”
Ngei ngekei, O
khei paila shanga jembü to lam shean lenla müt to aki.
Ngo tangtibü, O
nyi ngo kongkongtham yeitibüla, no khauangkoje touma.
No angebü phangshuong thükto
hoba kaibü nyen aphongbü mütli thükto
kaibü khauang khüpan jinkushima.
Aishanga haoenei Jakob suia;
haoenei hao suikei hoba hao mautia,
hoba haoeibü kishang leiluan phokua.
“Ho theyolanyobü ngüh shuong ditashi, hoba Jihuda si Jerusalema kibü shuong to joyoashi.
Nyi haoen to lenshi,

Laobou ngei kaneibü pisibou shuong la ngei haoen Ijep kaodak namlüh wanhap ka leiyenjinei sakkukei hoba laukei: Ngeibü ngüh ditashi, hoba ngei kan la sakkubü pendou kümashi; kho tegü kan ngeibü mütli yinglabü, hoba ngo kaneibü Mühghaü yinglabü.
Khünei tat tegü ngei kaneibü pisibousi to haoen la sendei si naodei kouko kibü kaodak kula thekubü ngei kümenlabü.”
Kheijinei ngei jongaikei, “Kho tegü yingshima,
Hobaje
Aishanga kaneibü pisibousi shuongei ngei Ijep kaodak ka leiyenjinei haoen to maangsanglabü kuko khei tat sühko, ‘Ngeibü ngüh ditashi,’ dogo lauko maangsanglabü kukei.

Khei yingasikei haoenei ngüha ale hoba haoen nou ayem, lausikei mütpem weko lulueibü maangpon kaangbüei paikei, hibü ngei ho theyolanyobü ngüh pendou haoen thükto sungbakei, laobou ngei haoen la kümla sakkukei, lausikei haoenei aküm.”
Kheijinei

Haoenei haoeneibü pisibou aoyouei ngeibü ngüh ditla haoeneibü shedbü aeto sepeinyu haua, lubü mühghaü shuong jungto haoen khangenla haoen hauan apa, Israel si Jihuda chungei haoeneibü pisibou yoa kümbü ngeibü thebülanbü leilua.
Hibü
Kheijinei Jihudabü sangnyu shuong hoba Jerusalema kibü shuong haulabü hoba haoenei juokbü lembü mühghaü shuong to ngeklabü, lausikei haoen khonsak jihsiphaia haoenei haoen akhümenlabü.
Aishanga O Jihuda, kaneibü mühghaü shuong kaneibü sangnyu lajuche khüjoche ki, hoba Baal to jen juokla lemshang Jerusalem khongyaang lajuche khüjoche kan himou baulabü lemshang kanei kümakei.
Hibü ho mütli shanga welau tele, ayingsi haoen shanga tengek ayingsi tewelau, aishanga haoen khonsak jihsi- phaia haoenei ngo ngajinei ngei aditlabü.”
ei cheje ka to oliv bulong sangtüngbü hemaibü buhek maibü hekbü dogo laukei. Lausikei yeithu yeinak langh yaangbü louan kho to wan sapbulabü hoba khoeibü bhek shuong kho suilabü.
“Thükenbou

Lausikei ngo eaaoabü san shoushou haitishang to leian haubü phatko kikei. Haoenei kükhu limbo huon takda dogo ngei angeko kikei, aieilausi haoenei laukei, “Senei buhek yoan bulong kho mautikho, langkeibü kaodak ka hao wapan apbho, khei, khünei touje hao nyen adamenlabü.”
“Lausikei Thükenbou
Hibü
Hibü Thükenbou
Hobaje aokei ajoulabü; aishanga haoen shieikoebü poa ngei Anathotbü thükto shieikoe sungbalabü.”
O
pheyo phanyoko louasikei noje ponpen tangetnyu ong ki;
khei yingasikei ngeibü ngüh ka thedanga laueida:
Aila müt amaibü naangmaida?
Aila khüpbülangbü shuong maisho kida?
Nyi haoen kekei hoba haoen li ada;
haoen yemda hoba lang hekda.
Haoeneibü sembunga no nyangko kia,
lausikei haoeneibü maangpon kaje saakei.
Lausikei O
nyi ngo hapda hoba ngeibü maangpon ka aenei takteida.
Haitilabü sanshuong tegü nyi haoen senashi.;
haitilabü chalou shanga haoen phei chenei phoashi.
Lalokche kaonyekei mang haapla
hoba khongthu kabü sang pendou yuila?
Khünei aoyou kida haoen amaibü haangjung
meisiau shuong hoba ausiyuk shemda;
aieilausi mütshuongei laukei,
“Mühghaüei küneibü thonshang ühüplabü.”
“Jeremia, no müt yoa langyosi mangalonga
no koli to lai leiyola?
Hobaje no kaomaia tuongalongaje
Jordan lamanga lai lela?
Aishanga khei kaibü jaisinasi shuong
hoba kaibü chungei ka to lepbolangko jungeiakei;
khei haoenei ka phainei kakhu limbo ngekda.
Haoenei ngüh maibü lauasikei haoen to mai telem.”
“Ngei ngeibü Israel apyoa;
ngei ngeibü phang inleda.
Ngeibü soushouei sanounyu ngei sao
dangbou shuongeibü ik to kua.
Kü shanga ngei pienbü phetei
yama molosaonyu phatko longeida;
saoei ngo khulimbo ngühda,
khoei ngei sao to mangsenda.
Ngeibü phet kho kü thedanga haitilabü tolobü au phatkei sai?
Sao khulimbo haitilabü au shuong kaijembo kia sai?
Hauashi hoba yamkabü meisiau pendou kamshaitiashi;
shautila haoen leishaiashi.
Usa kabü sanlombü juongei ngeibü semlüh bamang leilutikua;
haoenei ngeibü phejan naknyinkua;
haoenei ngeibü phejan maibü yam sangliphang la yeitkua.
Haoenei kho sangliphang la yeitia;
sangliphang la yeitisije kü la mang haapbuda,
kaonyek pendou sangliphang la yeiakei,
lausikei aoeikei athounouda.
Kaolong shongh khongthu pendoua
leilutibü shuong louan kia.
müt aokei sangmai haksoa aki.
Haoenei whet youshou wenkei lausikei yousang latkei;
haoen jembü lolo mangetkei, lausikei ai apailet.
youlatbü shanga himouko kilabü.”
Hobaje ngei haoen pheian apan phaia ngei tokei haoen to onoulabü hoba haoen mütpem weko jembü phetphan hoba mütpem weko jembü kaodak to nyibou leian loulabü.
Hobaje ho tegü hai haüthüklabü, haoenei ngeibü mütlieibü lamnyu moshikko ditletko, kü nyenei
Lausikei phang atei ngüha alelonga kheijinei ngei kho lepde pheian aplabü, hoba kho mautilabü dogo
Hibü
Hobaje
“Nyi jekbü shembe nei laobou kaibü shenjanga ki kho jungashi hoba meimeiashi, hoba Eufrates to haushi, hoba khünei laangphanga kho huashi.”
Hibü ngo haukei, hoba
Hobaje chalou lounyu phaia
Kheijinei ngo Eufrates to haukei, hoba shembe nei kho ngei huan phoshang ka sungenkei, lausikei chühashi, shembe nei kho leiluan kikei, kho ainei lela amaiko leiluan kikei.
Kheijinei
ei hai lauda: “Kho khei ngei Jihuda yonglam hoba Jerusalem yonglam yaangbü leilukulabü.

Habü amaibü mütli aoyouei ngeibü ngüh teditkho lauda, aoyouei jembü kaangbüsekbü maangpon phai semda hoba lubü mühghaü shuong phai haoen khangenla hoba lemla hauan ki, ho shembe tegü kilabü, laobou ainei lela amaiko ki!

Aishanga shembe nei müteibü shenjanga khang- yoan kibü hima, ngei Israel chung khümbo hoba Jihuda chung khümbo, khei khünei kü shanga nyenshen mütli che, nyensangbü che, hoba soneikangbü che yinglabü lele kü to apettikho, dogo
“Nyi haoen to ho ngüh joyoashi:
kheijinei nyi haoen to lenshi,
Hobaje cheei che khulimbo bou shuong si shousi shuong liko ngei haoen phetnyintilabü dogo
Ditashi, hoba nou haangashi, telili,
aishanga
ayinglonga haoei nakthüh sungbalabü,
jijimomoa shongh shuonga kan phaiyetlabü
hoba kanei ngesak lamjinei haoei kho nakthüh yeitilabü,
hoba daomau la yeitilabü.
Lausikei kanei ngüha telekho lausije ngeibü soushou
kaneibü lilisese shanga huan haaplabü;
ngeibü nyekei aeibou haaplabü,
hoba nyeksi koulabü;
aieilausi
Negeb sangnyu shuong khinakei; khübü ipjung danla ao aki. Jihudabü pendou laplanga, khei khümbo langsena.”
Jerusalem, kaneibü nyek khapetnyu chühashi! Yungkük aeka louko kibü labou shuong to chühashi! Kan la nongkubü kaneibü the lenenbü sanshuong kho lanei ki?
Nyi no lolo ka thangbou shuong dogo lauko kibü mütshuongei ka thüka song taksi nyikei ai laula? Yaksa na bukla shatbü khonku tegübü ka thükto aloulep lo?
Hobaje nyi kaibü maangpona: Ailaibü habü hoei kü to sühda, dogo lausi kho kaibü shabü yaangbü haangjung no neisimei akakko mütkong ki, hoba ka to khonku sühda.
Ethiopiabüei jembü son ayingsi kongkhüei jembü kapnak jeienlep lo? Khei jeiensi ong kan aoyouei amaibü kümla hanghangyepan ki, maibü kümla thüklabü.
Hibü yambabü yeiei youshou sho soulangtibü tegü ngei kan phinnyintilabü.
Ho kaibü thu ngei ka la takletkubü phejan ki dogo
Ngei ngei lolo ka thedanga kaibü ikset kaibü thenyek to himenkulabü hoba kaibü himou haplabü.
Ngei kaibü mangsenlabü shuong kaibü asangalanbü hoba ngayobü ngühlang phe thedüh maangdüh, pejapela seka shongh thüka hapa. O Jerusalem, ka shanga ügütü! No lalokche ihinseiko kila?
Thea thangbü shulinyunglin shanga
“Jihudaei mang haapda, hoba haoeibü sangnyu shuong sakleda;
haoeibü mütliei kaoa manghaap chia lauda
hoba Jerusalemei thuibü mangsühko ngekbü ngühlang angtida.
Haoeneibü yaangenbü shuongei haoeneibü sambü shuong
deikhula hautida, haoen deikhün khüto louda,
lausikei dei ühüpda.
Haoen deiyei kongkong longeida;
haoen himousele phenyemakei
hoba haoen neikhu yukakei.
Kao kho paknyina, aieilausi kaonyek to lang aloubü hangshong,
sekmoubü shuong himouko haoen neikhu yukda.
Khongthu ushia meishi nyunyuei saoei shoushou shatbüyam
apyoan satda aieilausi nyem aki.
Yamkabü gadu shuong shonghkhua loda,
selong shuong tegü haoenei hakhin thakthakle hinda;
haoeneibü nyek yuida, aieilausi bunyem deinyem aki.
Kün khulimbo küneibü shabüei aukabü kuasikei,
O
aieilausi kün jih juonga phai suka,
künei no khulimbo shabü shona.
O Israel maanglembou, khonsak khonku jiha hao khümenbou,
aila kaonyeka no yenbou phatko ki,
wakoubü youche shanga otbü phatko kida.
Aila no phenyembü müt che tegü,
khümenla athükbü Thükenbou müt che tegü kida?
Khei yingasikei, O
hoba kaibü nyenei kün ngaan kia;
kün tüpyoma.”
ei kü to laukei, “Ho mütli mailayaangla shanga tewelau.

Haoenei mühei nyengasikei, ngei haoenei ngekbü aditlabü, hoba haoenei juokbü lembü hoba shausiyung lembü kuasikei ngei khübü kho asungletlabü. Aeiko ngei haoen kho inei, müheinouei hoba limeilangei mautilabü.”
Lausikei ngei laukei, “Ah,
Hobaje
Hibü thuseibü shuong aoyouei ngei ohautisikei kü nyena tetenbü ngüh lauda, hoba aoyouei ho kaodaka in si mühsinou aloulabü dogo lauda, khübü thuseibü in si mühsinouei mautilabü, dogo

Hobaje aoyou mütli shanga haoenei tetenbü ngüh lauda, haoen Jerusalem khongmaanga mühsinou hoba inei haitibü shuong tekteksousou aplabü. Hobaje haoen ayingsi haoeneibü yaksi khünla hoba haoeneibü jayangshousi ayingsi nouyangshousi khünla ao akilabü. Aishanga ngei haoen amaibü haoen thükto khüpan jinkulabü.”
“Change nangnak ngeibü nyek ka nyeksi koutiashi,
aishanga kü mütli saosüngbü nouyangnyu
kaang ngümbüei mou yaang letia.
Ngo khong to angalonga inei haitibü shuong hapda;
hoba sangnyu khüto ngo atalonga
limsilang shatsinyat shuong hapda.
Aishanga thuseibü hoba ungshedbü ham
kaonyek shoongko hauda,
khei yingankei haoenei ai angekei.”
Kaibü soushouei Zion to maang ashik lo?
Kün amailabü lele aila nyi kün to ngümbei?
Künei hakso lambei, lausikei ai maibou alou;
maitibü jih che lambei,
lausikei chühashi, kho jeiko hatlabü.
O
hoba küneibü pisibousi shuongeibü
shabü künei ngejung louda,
aishanga künei kakhu limbo shabü shona.
Kaibü nyen shanga kün tekan tüpkai;
kaibü soneikangbü Choba setshang aweasüngko teyingma;
damenashi hoba kün yoa kaibü thesilan teleiluma.
Phangshuongeibü amlangbü mühghaü shuongei lang loutilep lo?
Ayingsi müh shuongei lang yantilep lo?
O
Hibü künei ka to maanglem phoda;
aishanga nyi habü pendou kümda.
Kheijinei
Hobaje haoenei ka to, ‘Kün laeto haula?’ dogo phejinei nyi haoen to lenshi:
Aoyou yemshatei haila tetkei haoen yemei hailabü!
aoyou lasona inei haila tetkei haoen inei hailabü;
aoyou mühsinouei haila tetkei haoen mühsinouei hailabü;
aoyou langsenla tetkei haoen langsenlabü.
Ngo
Hobaje Jihuda Choba Hezekiaeibü shou Manasseei Jerusalema ai kümbei kho hangshong kaodak sangle pendou to ngei haoen hatlamoklabü che yeitilabü.”
“O Jerusalem, aoei ka to onoula
ayingsi aoei kaibü mang haapbula?
No maisho kibü akibü shanga phela aoei sepeila?
Kan danshuongei ngo inletkei;
kan phaiae sukngailangkei;
hibü ngei ngeibü ik kakhu limbo shingkei
hoba no mautikei,
aieilausi ngei ka shanga dambubüei oanshema
dogo
Kaonyek bakhüna ngei haoen wanei sipan aplabü.
Ngei kan kü mütli shemtia,
ngei kaneibü shousi shuong haitia;
aieilausi kanei jembü amaibü lamnyu ka asepei.
Ngei kaneibü latnyu shuong
yungnyu phetsen tokei juongbou yeitia.
Ngei kaneibü heshou shuong haoeneibü chajihboua haitikei,
hoba haoeneibü nyusi shuong khonkutikei.
Ngei hakde haoen to hatlamoklabü khonkuei ngümbei.
Shousi müt nyet maubüeibü nyu semtheda hoba hakde apa.
Tokei chajihboua kian saoeibü chanyu nepkua;
sao himou bautikei hoba maangpon noutikei;
hoba kaneibü joubü dan ngei kaneibü dangboulabou la
haitila shanga kuan aplabü.
Ngo
Ügütü, kü thu amai! Anyuei ngo aila bukkeima? Kaodak khümboa ngo oyolemenko ong kilabü müt che. Ngei aolakei alotku ayingsi lotankei aki; lausikei haoen pendouei kü to khükdauokda.
O
Atei namkung, khei yungkük aeka namkung hoba chisaknam leiluenlep lo?
Haoenei angebü kaodak chenei ngei haoen la haoeneibü dangbou shuong khangentilabü, aishanga ngeibü khauang wan che phatkei, hoba kho ladangkei anyetlabü.”
Kheijinei ngei laukei, “O
Ladang kaibü ngüh shuong loukei, ngei khübü kho shaukei; hoba kaibü ngüh shuong kü shanga olinlabü hoba maanga mailabü che kiteikei, aishanga kaibü nyenei ngo ngakei, O
Ekyo nyiyobü dan yoa ngo aset, ayingsi aolinyo. Kü mütpem setkei, aieilausi kaibü ik kü thüka kikei, aishanga ngo khauangei soptikei.
Aila ngeibü khonku anangda? Ngeibü mou aila amaida? Aila khübü temaikho lauda? No kü to ngo hau thettiko sulang kabü shumang ubü phatko kilep lo?”
Hibü
Hobaje ngei ho mütli thedanga no chisak nameibü ba kümthang tegü yeitilabü. Haoenei no khulimbo wapyolabü, lausikei haoenei no athüklabü. Aishanga no khümenla hoba no senetla ngo ka yoa kia.
Hobaje amaibü ka ngei no khümenlabü hoba hatla moklabü ka ngei no angthetlabü. Ngo
Tokei
“Nyi yak tenga, ayingsi ho tegübü kaoena bousu yaksa shousi teki.
Aishanga ho kaonyeka bukan kibü bousu si yaksa shousi shuong shanga haoen hoba buktibü haoeneibü nyusi shuong shanga hoba ho kaonyeka haoen bukbü bou shuong shanga

Hailabü shatsinyat yaangbüei haoen hailabü; haoeneibü mang ühaaplabü ayingsi haoen akhünlabü. Haoen tanga odsinot tegü kilabü. In hoba mühsinouei maubüa haibü mang kho mühkabü au hoba yamkabü meisiau shanga shausiyung kilabü.
“Aishanga
Ho kaodaka yaangbü si hanbü ham hailabü, lausikei haoen aoeikei akhünlabü. Kan aoeikei haoen shanga mang ühaaplabü, ayingsi kan lolo manghaap tetsida lenko khu ashulabü.
Sanouboutham, khei bou ayingsi nyu haiasikei aoeikei manghaap sotila shausiyung akulabü ayingsi maang sula shanga yunglabü akulabü.
“Lemlibü chem to haoen yoa setla, shaula yungla no ütjan.
Aishanga Thükenbou
“Hobaje nyi habü ngüh pendou ho müt to lenjinei haoenei ka to: Ainyula
Kheijinei nyi
Lausikei kaneibü pisibousi shuong toje kanei amaibü kümbei. Aishanga chühashi, kan mütpem weko tubüsekbü hoba amaibü, hoba kanei kü to ngüha aleda.

Hibü, kanei ayingsi kaneibü pisibousiei angebü kaonyek che to ngei kan ho kaodak ka tekan aplabü. Hobaje khünei kanei change nangnak lubü mühghaü shuong khangenlabü, aishanga ngei kan to onou alenlabü.”

Lausikei haoenei kü to, ngo yungkük kaodak hoba ngei shian apbü kaodak pendou ka leian loubou Mühghaü lang kishongko, dogo lauko thelalanlabü jihsiphai louada. Aishanga ngei haoen haoeneibü pisibousi la kubü kaodak to leian loulabü. Ngo
Aishanga haoen haushang pendou to ngeibü nyek hautiakei; kü ka haoen ahuenkei, ayingsi haoeneibü shabü ngeibü nyek ka küplepan aki.

Hobaje ngei haoen amaibü hoba haoeneibü shabü phejan nyiei khüpngailabü; aieilausi haoenei mangsenlabü heangsho haibü mang shuongei ngeibü kaonyek shatikei, hoba ngeibü phet haoeneibü mangsenlabü shuongei shentia.”
O
Mütei jembü shanga mühghaü shuong kümlep lo? Habü ho mühghaü shuong aying.”
“Hibü, ngo
Hobaje bulong sangtüngbü weko hoba shonghshou suokbüa shetenan kibü shongh thüka kaneibü shousi shuongei haoeneibü lemshang hoba Ashera mühghaüsao damenda.
Kaneibü leikhu leidang pendoua kaneibü shabü shanga kanei kibü hoba kaneibü nyaksinam pendou soletbü peisilei tegü ngei kaneibü dangbou la kulabü.
Ngei kan la kubü phet ka kaneibü ik ngei lititilabü hoba kanei angebü kaonyeka ngei kaneibü dangbou shuong kanei khangentilabü, aishanga ngeibü maangshat wan tegü longakei hoba ladangkei anyetlabü.”
“Aoei müt to maanglemda,
hoba phe jembüeibü insiaubu la yeitida,
aoeibü maangpon
hao shedsikhau yingshi.
Hao phetsen kaoa buham che phatkei,
hoba aikei maibü longbü ühüplabü.
Hao ulangbü yam, müt akibü jemkaoa kilabü.
“Lausikei aoei
Hao dei nyangko kibü bulong phatko ki,
laobouei haoeibü li shumang aeto yanan koutida;
hoba juokbü aubü loujinei ühütda.
Aishanga saoeibü yik sangtüngtham kia,
hoba uangmuang loujinei maang amauda.
Aishanga saoei hek hekbü athakda.
“Pendou thüka maangpon khüpbülangbü ki,
hoba ho maingaila yongko sekakei;
ho aoei ditenla thükla?
Ngo
khei mütpem weko la jembü thechüh thüng,
hoba jembüei kümbü thüng ngaingoula shanga.”
Ajanayingbü haang ka nyaksinam pailetbü kho
jembüei ateibü tei pakan shoushou püpenbü aulak phatko ki.
Hao haangtoua nyaksinamei hao apyolabü
hoba thonlaje hao ngoubü che ong yinglabü.
Soneikangbü Choba setshang tegü khanglathama
tonenan kibü kho küneibü Lembüchem ki.
O
no inletbü shuong pendou himou bautilabü.
Ka jungka sepeinyu ngaibü shuong kho thamngua doan pholabü;
aishanga haoenei lang kibü deikük
Ngo maitiashi, O
Chühashi, haoenei kü to lauda, “
Lausikei,
Kü to hatlamoklabü che teyingtima; amaibü chaloua no ngeibü satenshang ki.
Aoyouei ngo shieikoeda khübü kho himou bautiashima, lausikei ngoje teyoti,
Choba shuong to hoba Jihuda mütshuong pendou hoba Jerusalema kibü shuong hoba ho bakhün to lotbü shuong pendou to ngei lenbü to ditla lenashi.”
ei hai lauda, “Nounyet chaloua on akünla ayingsi Jerusalem bakhün danko on künan alotla maangsangashi.
Kanei Nounyet chem ka on künan telong ayingsi kümsilei ai teküm; lausikei ngei kaneibü pisibousi la sakkubü Nounyet chalou saopotham jungeiashi.
Khei yingasikei, haoenei kü ngüha ale ayingsi nou ühang. Lausikei haoen tubüsekbü yeikei; hoba haoenei kü to ngüha ale ayingsi ngeibü songlen asunglet.

“Lausikei khübü mütshuongei to kü ngühkhüm pendoua ngüha leshi dogo lenshi. Haoenei ho sangnyu bakhün danko Nounyet on aikei akünjan. Haoenei Nounyet kho saopobü chalou dogo noujan hoba khünyet ai kümsilei akümjan.

Kheijinei haoeneibü Choba shuong si songdakbü shuong Jerusalem bakhün danko lotlabü hoba Dawid to kibü jeteibü Choba songdak hau kilabü. Jihudabü si Jerusalembü mütshuong yoa haoen liko koli kailong si koli thüka setan loulabü, hoba Jerusalem sangnyu kho ponpendou mütei shenan kilabü.

Hobaje Jihudabü sangnyu shuong ka hoba Jerusalem kaijembo kibü sang shuong ka mütshuong loulabü; Benjamin kaophei ka, hoba shongh shuong ka, hoba Negeb kaonyek ka, juokbü lembü si lembüsabü, hoba shusiphon lembü si ponlem juokbü, hoba nyensangbü lembü jungan

Lausikei haoenei kü to Nounyet kho saüenbü chalou che tegü jungeila ngüha lejan. Khünyet haoenei Jerusalem bakhün danko on künan ütjan; haoenei khei kümalonga, ngei Jerusalem bakhüna wan sapbulabü. Wanei Jerusalem Choba- chem shuong lonlabü, hoba aoeikei kho panyetla athüklabü.”
“Meimeiashi, hoba chak- yaübü chem to yanashi, hoba khünei ngei ka la ngeibü ngühlang kulabü.”
Hibü ngo chakyaübü chem to yankei hoba hao haoeibü kümsilei büngsoua kümbo kikei.
Hobaje chakyaüboueibü ika haoei shungkung thamei yaübü chak kho leilukei hoba haoei toukei haoei hao la maikubü tegü lubü chak che yaüetkei.
Kheijinei
“O Israelbü shuong, ho chakyaübüei tegü ngeikei kan to kümla athükkei lo? Chühashi, chakyaüboueibü ik kabü shungkung tham tegü kan kü ikmanga kia.
Ai jiha ngei phang che hoba sangle che pheian apla hoba leilula hoba mautila shanga laulaje,
hoba ngei joyobü phang khoei haoen amaibü ka sepeialonga ngei haoen to amaibü kümla dambü ka ngo maangpon sepeilabü.
Hobaje ai chaloua ngei phang che huongla hoba kho kitila shanga laulaje,
hoba khoei kü thedanga amaibü kümalonga, hoba ngeibü ngüh aditkuko apalonga, kheijinei ngei haoen to maibü kümla dambo kibü ka ngo maang- pon sepeilabü hoba akümlabü.

Kholonga tou, hauan Jihuda si Jerusalema kibü to hai lenashi, ‘Chühashi, ngei kan khulimbo huon amaibü huongda hoba kan shieikoela lamleda. Hibü kan mütpem weko jembü shabü lamnyu ka sepeiashi, hoba kaneibü lamthen amaibü hoba kanei kümbo kibü kümsilei shuong ka jaksheiashi.’
Lausikei haoenei lauda, ‘Künei ainyula kümetla? Aishanga kün pendou lulueibü huonayoua pailabü, hoba kün mütpem weko lulueibü maangpon tubüsekbü phai semlabü.’ ”
Hibü
“Hibü tou kan yoa atei ongkei ho tegübü ditkeilaoje pheashi.
Saosüngbü medei Israelei aeibou hatlamoklabü kümsilei che küma!
Lebanon kabü ninthu kho longleng ka shanjung koulep lo?
ayingsi suokbü ka dei libü koubü kho ulangtham aplep sai?
Lausikei kü mütliei ngo maan apbei;
haoenei amlangbü heangsho la jen juokkuda;
haoen haoeneibü shangiedbü lamnyua phaiyetda;
hoba lamkhong to ohauko kolam to haua.
Haoeneibü kaodak hatlamoklabü, ponpen himoulabü yeitida.
Aoyou ho to danlaje hatko maangpangda hoba haoeibü khu ngomeida.
Chaangbou yeiei tegü ngei haoen dangbou thedanga phinnyintilabü.
Haoen thushed jihsiphaia ngei haoen la phaiae yeikulabü;
khonku jihsiphaia ngei haoen to athuilabü.”

Kheijinei mütshuongei laukei, “Kaiya, senei Jeremia khulimbo huon kümbho! Aishanga ungshedbou ka ngühkhüm, ayingsi songbüdobü ka songsido maibü, ayingsi thuseibü ka Mühghaü ngühlang amaulabü. Kaiya, senei sembungei hao to pekyokho, hoba haoeibü ngüha telekho.”
Kheijinei ngei welaukei, “O

Maibü shanga amaibü nopngaikulep lo? Khei yingasikei haoenei ngeibü langkei shanga püngkhün che thukuakei. Ngei ka thedanga haoen pü maibü lauko, kaibü maangshat haoen ka sepeinyu satla ngo lai lokei damenshima.
Lausikei tou, O
Ladang nyi haoen thükto sepai tan hautilaje haoeneibü chem ka hatbümokbüa haapbü che dittiashi; aishanga ngo mintila haoenei püngkhün thukei, hoba ngeibü you shanga tin sankukei.
Khei yingasikei, O
Hobaje Ben Hinnom Yo to hauashi, laobou chak phetnyinbü bakhün nyangko ki hoba ka la lenbü ngüh kho khünei phinthonashi.
Hobaje lauashi: Kanei

Aieilausi mütshuongei ngo nangletkei hoba ho kishang kaoen shatikei; hoba khonei lubü mühghaü la jen jikkukei, aoyou haoenei hoba haoeneibü pisibousi shuong hoba Jihudabü Choba shuongei ange. Haoenei shed akakbü siiei ho kaodak shentikei,
hoba haoeneibü shousi shuong Baal to lemla shanga wana juokla lemshon yaüenkei; laobou kümla ngei ladangkei asakku, ayingsi kü maangpon to alot.
Hibü chühashi, dogo

Hobaje ho kishanga ngei Jihuda si Jerusalem huonsiyou kho kongkongbü la yeitilabü. Ngei haoen haoeneibü langkei lambü dangbou shuong thedanga inei tuongtilabü. Ngei haoeneibü haibü mang shuong mühkabü au shuong si yamkabü meisiau shuong la shausiyung shanga kulabü.
Hobaje ngei ho sangnyu hatlamoklabü hoba jemtenlabü che yeitilabü, hoba ho nyangko danbü wekoei ho thusheda moklabü hoba maangpanglabü.

Hobaje ngei haoen la haoeneibü jayang nouyangshousieibü phe shautilabü. Hobaje komlepbü hoba khonsak laobouei haoeneibü dangbou shuong, aoyouei haoen khonkutila lamda, kho tegü kijinei mütpem weko la jembü lepboueibü phe shautilabü.”
Kheijinei
hoba Thükenbou
Kho tegü ho kaonyek to hoba ho mütli to Tofet tegü ho sangnyu yeitiko ngei kümlabü.

Jerusalema kibü chem shuong hoba Jihudabü Chobaeibü chem pendou, laobou chemdaka ong mühkabü hang- angbü tan pendou to ponlem hibü jen juokkei hoba lubü mühghaü shuong la yunglabü ih lembü jonan jinkukei, Tofet kaoen tegü shaan aplabü.”
Kheijinei Jeremia Tofet,
Thükenbou
Ladang Immereibü shou,
haoei thuseibou Jeremia to ngümbei hoba
Nyibounyet Pashurei Jeremia thüngshang chem ka sungenjinei Jeremiaei hao to laukei, “
Aishanga

Tokei ngei sangnyu nyaksinam pendou, khoeibü pailetbü pendou, khonei namsek peisilei pendou thonan, Jihudabü Choba shuong nyaksinam pendou haoeneibü dangbou ik to kuan aplabü. Haoenei khübü kho soletbü nyaksinam tegü Babilon to künlanglabü.
Hobaje no, Pashur, hoba kaibü chema kibü pendou Babilon langsenbü to haulabü. No khünei hailabü; no hoba nyi yepeijaweko tetenkubü kaibü jenabou shuong pendou yoan khünlabü.’ ”
O
hoba ngo lepettiko kikei;
kü toje no hau kibou, hoba nyi thüka.
Chaseko ngo akhainyu yeia.
Pendouei ngo awealauda;
haoenei ngo chaseko nyikuda.
Aishanga ladang ong ngei joyolaje ngei ngekla yeida,
hoba ngekda, “Ik shatyobü! hoba Lusakbü!”
aishanga ngei kaibü ngühlang phinthonda.
Lausikei ladang, “Ngei
ayingsi hao nyen alaueilabü,” dogo laulaje
kheijinei kaibü ngüh kho ngeibü lomanga
wan küplepnyu phobü maimai kü maangpona juokda.
Ngei kho senetan phola hüanshemda,
lausikei ngei athükenda.
Aishanga müt juongei,
“Pendou aenei hatlamoklabü!
Hibü senei hao tesungletkho!”
dogo laubü ngei ditda.
Ngeibü maangjam thangbou shuongei mangkei
ngo tuongbü chüheida hoba lauda,
“Aingenyu hao huonoulabü,
kheijinei senei hao lapan phok lamoulabü.”
Lausikei no, O
lakjaibou che tegü kü yoa kia;
hibü ngo shieikoebü shuong phaiyetlabü;
hoba haoenei ngo athüklabü.
Haoen thonsithak akiko himoulabü,
Lausikei, O Thükenbou
nyi saopobüa mütshuong takteida,
hoba haoeneibü maangpona dambü hapda.
Haoen thükto kaibü phoklambü kü la haptishi;
aishanga ngeibü mat ngei ka la khümbo kua.
aishanga amaibü kümbü seisihau ka
haoei shale jonglebü langkei püetda.
Ngo bukbü chalou shedsikhau yingshi!
Künyuei ngo bukbü chalou kho haülabü teyingma!
Aoei kübou jungto,
“Bousu shou che ka la bukkuakei!”
dogo hao aeibou olintiko ngühlang künan loukei,
hao shedsikhau yingshima!
Kho müt kho
sangnyu shuong phatko kitishi;
ngeyang ngesakbü ngühlang che
hoba chajiha lapangbü che dittiashi;
aieilausi haoei ngo nyusema ühaiti;
tegüje künyueibü nayepshang kho
ngeibü hee la yeikhoulabü.
Ngo aila bukkei?
khonkula hoba maangmau hapla
hoba ngeibü salang himoua dantila shanga ong sai?
Ho
“Kün shanga
Kheijinei Jeremiaei haoen to laukei, Zedekia to kanei hai lenshi:
Israel Mühghaü
Ngei ngo lolo kan khulimbo ik shingan, ngeibü hauki yaangkibü ik, ngeibü khauang, ngeibü maangshat, hoba ngo maangpokbü yaangbüa wapyolabü.
Hobaje ho sangnyua kibü müt hoba meisiau ham to meitilabü, hoba haoen wapyo yaangbüei hailabü.
Hobaje phailathonla,
Hobaje ho mütli to nyi lenshi,

Aoyou ho sangnyua kilaje haoen inei, mü- heinouei hoba limeilangei hailabü. Lausikei ao angan kan komlepbo kibü Babilonbü la khümbo kuan aplaje haoen ashemtilabü; hoba haoeneibü langkei thamje satenlabü.
Aishanga ho sangnyu khulimbo maibü ayingko amaibü kümla ngei jantheda. Ngei ho sangnyu Babilonbü Choba ikmang to kuan aplabü, hoba haoei ho wanei lonan apbulabü. Ngo
Hobaje Jihudabü Choba chemdang to lenashi, “
O Dawid chung to
Chühashi, ngo kan khulimbo kia, O yomanga kibou, O yomang laang, dogo
Lausikei kanei kümbü thüng ngei kan shieinangeilabü. Ngei kaneibü Choba chema wan sapbulabü, hoba wanei kho kaijembo lonshemlabü. Ngo
hoba laushi,

Aishanga kanei maimaitham ho kümalonga kheijinei ho chem bakhün to Choba shuong aoyou Dawid setshanga setda, koli kailong hoba koli thüka setbü shuong, haoen hoba haoeneibü yaangenbü shuong, hoba haoeneibü mütli shuong lottilabü.
Lausikei kanei habü ngüh aditlonga ngei lolo khei ho chem sangliphang la yeitilabü. Ngo
Aishanga Jihudabü Choba chemdang shanga
No naklepbo ngei leilutibou che hautida. Mütpem wekoei jembü wou sungbalabü, hoba haoenei kanei amenbü cedar bulong shuong chenglabü, hoba khübü kho wan to jinlabü.
“Kho phaia phangshuong kho sangnyu peithetko danlabü, hoba mütpem wekoei jembü lepbü to, ‘Aila ho sangyaang to
Kheijinei haoenei jongailabü, ‘Aieilausi haoenei jembü Mühghaü
Ao haia hao shanga tühaap ayingsi mang tühaap;
lausikei ao satda hao shanga aeibou haapashi,
aishanga touje hao jembü kaodak chühla alongeilabü.
Aishanga Jihudabü Choba Josiaeibü shou Shallum, aoei haobou jeiko songdakkei hoba ao ho kishang ka satkei hao shanga
Lausikei kishang lato hao laplangkei hao khünei hailabü, hoba touje ho kaodak ladangkei ühüplabü.”
Aoei jembü chem asaopobüei danglaje
hoba jembü shemjang thükkabou ngühmaang alanbüei kümlaje;
aoei jembü mütli amlanga kümtileitilaje,
hoba haoeibü eik mukei akudaje kho müt ügütü!
Aoei, “Ngei chem yaangbü che hopatham,
thükkabou shemjang yoan danglabü,”
dogo lauda kho müt ügütü!
Hobaje haoei kho shanga koulom yettian,
cedar buei koulom koukap kümda;
hoba kho saklangbü laüei naanglepda.
Cedar buei tokyoko chem dangbü shanga
nyi no Choba maibou dogo damda sai?
Kabouei ngühmai hoba saopobü kümbo shaukeiyungkei.
Hibü khoei hao maian kikei.
Haoei shalebü hoba khambü la yingkuan mat jembei,
hibü khoei hao maian kikei.
Ho ngo ngela shanga aying si?
dogo
Lausikei nyi ngühmaang alanbü pailetbü shanga,
hoba shed akakbüeibü sii phintila,
hoba ka mütli khonsaktiko ik shatyola shanga ong
kaneibü maangpon hoba nyek thean ki.
Khei yingsije Jihudabü Choba Josiaeibü shou Jehoiakim shangabü hai lauda:
“Hao hainyet aoeikei,
‘Ügütü, kü thangbou! ügütü!’
dogo lauko mang ühaaplabü.
Ayingsi aoeikei hao shanga,
‘Ügütü, ngeibü bunyu! ügütü, ngeibü Choba!’
dogo lauko ühaaplabü ayingsi angeklabü.
Gadu che khünan apbü hima Jerusalem bakhün danko
hao senjung hauan tekan aplabü.”
Jerusalembü, Lebanon to angashi hoba ngekashi,
hoba Bashana kaibü ngühlang ngekashi;
hoba Moab ka ngekashi,
aishanga no sanoubü pendou mautiakei.
No naang maijinei
lausikei nyi laukei, “Ngei ngüha alelabü.”
Nashou dangka thama no khei kikei,
khei nyi
Kaibü sanlombü pendou yeiei soulangkulabü,
hoba ka to sanoubü pendou laplanglabü;
kheijinei kaibü amaibü kümsilei haangjung
kaibü sangnyu nyikulabü hoba himoulabü.
O kan Lebanona kibü cedar bulonga hap takbü shuong,
yaksa na hapla khonkubü tegü ladang ka thükto
khonku sühlaje no latetche wila?
hoba nyi hatbü hoba ka langkei lambo kibü mütshuong ik to ngei no kuan aplabü. Ngei no Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnezzar hoba haoeibü sepai shuong ikmang to kulabü.
Ngei no hoba kaibü bukbü nyu lubü kaonyek che to langsentilabü. Lanei no ayingsi sao abuk khüto kasi haulabü hoba ham khünei hailabü.
Kan longeila chüheibü kaonyek to kan ladangkei alongeilabü.”
Ngei laukei, “Ho Jehoiakhin Choba, akhainyu, hoba aoeikei athounouko tekan apbü chakkok che phatko yeia sai? Aila hao hoba haoeibü shousi shuong haoenei angebü kaodak che to langsenkei?”
O kaonyu, kaonyu, kaonyu!
“Ho müt shousi aki dogo doashi,
hao haanga jeibü akilabü.
Aishanga Dawid Choba setshanga setla,
hoba Jihudaa nyibou songdakla haoeibü shousi aokei apenlabü.”
Ngeibü lamshaushang kabü sanshuong mautibü hoba lintibü sanlombü shuong shanga ügütü! dogo
Hibü Israel Mühghaü
Kheijinei ngeibü sanlon joubü dan ngei haoen lae aeto shian sattikei, kaonyek pendou ka leishailabü, hoba ngei haoen chem to nyibou leibalabü. Haoenei shousi juongnyu kilabü hoba haalayaanglabü.
Hobaje ngei haoen thüka haoen to thounoulabü sanlombü shuong pholabü, hoba touje haoen ladangkei ühüt- amoktilabü, ayingsi che ongkei amaulabü, dogo
Hao haanga Jihuda khümenan kilabü, hoba Israel thushed akiko kilabü; hoba hao la nyenkulabü nyen kho ‘
“Hibü chühashi, ‘Ijep kaodak ka Israelbü leian longbou
lausikei haoenei, ‘Yungkük kaodak hoba haoei shian sattibü kaonyek pendou aeka leian longeibou
Thuseibü shuong shangabü:
Maangaenei ngeibü maangpon leiluakei;
ngeibü lo pendou lühda;
hoba haoeibü saopobü ngüh shuong thedanga
ngo ihei jaakbü che ong phatkei.
haoen amaiko haangda hoba ajanayingko jungeida.
Shedsikhau haangjung kaonyu linoktham apa,
hoba lamshaushang yuia.
“Thuseibü hoba ungshedbou hamei Mühghaü to ühütda;
ngeibü Lembüchemakei haoen amaibü lapena.
Hibü haoeneibü lamnyu shekshektham yinglabü;
haoen nakthühshang to haulabü hoba khonei tuongetlabü.
Aishanga haoen shieikoebü poa
ngei haoen thükto amaibü sungbalabü.
Samariabü thuseibü shuong to apen asou che hapda:
haoenei Baal nyen phongko tetenkei
hoba kü mütli ayinglam to leikei.
Lausikei Jerusalembü thuseibü danei
khütokei amaibou kümbü ngei hapbei:
haoenei asangalanbü jungeida
hoba yepeijaweko haangda.
Haoenei amaibü kümbü shuongeibü ik hau kingaitida,
khoei aoeikei lulueibü kümsilei amaibü ka asepeida.
Haoen pendou kü thedanga Sodom phatko ki;
hoba Jerusalem mütli kho Gomora phatkei.
“Hibü ngo Thükenbou
Chühashi, ngei haoen la khauekbü shausiyung oklabü,
hoba kombü dei inlabü,
aishanga habü thuseibü shuong danko kaonyu pendoua
Mühghaü to ühütbü phinthona.”
Thükenbou
Kü ngüh asungletbü shuong to haoenei hai lauda, ‘
Ngei laukei, “Khübü shuong yokabü aoeikei
eibü yeithu yeinak khauang longlabü chasilang che, hoba kho amaiboueibü khua paknyinlabü.
khauang longbü kho haoei jembü maangpona kümla huongbü akümshongko sepeinyu angailabü. Loulabü chaloua kanei kho chongchingko ditenlabü.”
Haoenei ngeibü hu- phang dambü ngekei tegüje, haoenei ngeibü ngüh shuong kü mütli la ngekletkukhoulabü, hoba haoen amaibü lamnyu ka hoba amaibü kümsilei ka sepeian kikhoulabü.
“Ngo nyangbüa ong kian, hoba saabüaje akibou Mühghaü che lo? dogo
Ngei hao ühüpenlabü lele atei huenlep lo? dogo
Thuseibü shuong aoyouei kü nyena amlang tetenko, ‘Ngei mangh lia! ngei mangh lia!’ dogo laukei ngei dida.
Thuseibü shuong aoyouei amlang tetenko jembü maangpon khüpbülangbüei tetenda haoeneibü maang- pona lalokche thüngla?
Aoyouei jembü mangh laobou haoen cheei che to lenda, khei haoeneibü pisibousi shuongei Baal haangjung ngeibü nyen maan apbü tegütham haoeneibü manghei ngeibü nyen kü mütli la maatila damda.
Thuseibü aoei mangh che lian ki kho mang kho nalena, lausikei aoei ngeibü ngühlang ki haoei ngeibü ngüh maanglanko lentiashi. Youho to youshou ainei jambei? dogo
Ngeibü ngüh wan aphat lo? dogo
Hibü chühashi, ngo thuseibü shuong khulimbo kia, aoyouei cheei cheeibü ngüh kokda, hoba kü ngüh tegü phinthonda, dogo
Haü, ao- youei jembü lishang jungeiko, ‘
Maimaitham, aoyouei amlangbü manghei tetenda, ngo haoen khulimbo kia, dogo
Hobaje kü mütli yoa atei, ayingsi thuseibü ayingsi ungshedbou ayingsi aoei ‘
Aeiko, kan müt- pem wekoei jembü jenabou ayingsi chempen to, ‘
Lausikei kanei touje, ‘
Jeremia, nyi thuseibü shuong to pheshi, ‘
Hobaje haoenei ngeibü ngühkhüma akiko, ‘
ngei maimaitham haoen, hoba haoen si haoeneibü pisibou la kubü sangnyu, ham yaüan sunglabü hoba kü jungka saako tekan aplabü.
Hobaje ngei haoen thükto ladangkei amaalabü lele thon akibü ngühthem hoba himou sungbakulabü.”
Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnezzarei Jerusalem ka Jihudabü Choba Jehoiakimeibü shou Jehoiakhin hoba Jihudabü leiyeibü shuong, dobüshibü shuong hoba namyaübü shuong Babilon to lang senan phaia,
Kam che kabü bhuk aeibou semlo maian shaang sembü tegü kikei; lausikei lubü kam che kabü bhuk kho shaula amaiko nyaüan sheman kikei.
Kheijinei
Kheijinei
“Ngo
Maibü shanga ngeibü nyekei haoen to chühlabü, hoba ngei haoen ho kaodak to leibalabü. Ngei haoen huongngailabü hoba atuongtilabü; ngei haoen kelabü, hoba haoen pheian üplabü.
Ngo
Lausikei
Ngei lae aeto haoen shian aplaje pendou aenei kaodak sangle thüka hatlamoklabü che, nyikubü che, tetenbü che mokde aplabü che hoba shedsikhau che yinglabü lele haoen yeitilabü.
Hobaje haoen hoba haoeneibü pisibou la kubü kaonyek ka haoen lemailela amauti shongko ngei haoen thükto in, mühsinou hoba limsilang hautikulabü.”
Jihudabü Choba Josiaeibü shou Jehoiakim songdakbü po leiboua Jihudabü mütli pendou shanga ngo Jeremia jungto loubü ngüh. (Kho Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnezzareibü songdak shaangbou po kikei.)
Ngei Jihudabü hoba Jerusalema kibü mütshuong pendou to laukei,
“Jihudabü Choba Amoneibü shou Josiaeibü songdak po anthük semboubü ka khangan tat sühko, khübü po saoto sem,
ei haoeibü khangenbü, thuseibü shuong pendou thenei thenko kan jungto hautikei, lausikei kanei ngüha ale ayingsi aditku.
Tou kan mütpem weko lulueibü amaibü lamnyu hoba kümsilei ka sepeiashi, khei yingsi ong
Lubü mühghaü shuong phaito haoen khangenla hoba lemla tohau; kaneibü ikküm ikleiei ngo khau anglabü lele temaangpokti. Khei yingsi ong ngei kan aikei khon akutilabü dogo laukei.
Khei yingasikei kanei kü to ngüha ale hoba kaneibü kümsilei amaibüei kanei ngo khau angtikei, hoba ka thükto leilubü sungbakei, dogo
“Hibü Thükenbou

chühashi, ngei yungkük kabü phang pendou ngashailabü, hoba ngo khangenbou Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnez- zar ngalabü; hoba ho kaodak hoba habü mütli hoba habü phang khulimbo ngei haoen hautilabü. Hobaje ngei haoen lemailela mautilabü hoba haoen konga jimbü che, hoba mangsenlabü che hoba ponpendou sangliphang la yeitilabü, dogo
Tokei ekyonyiyo ngühlang, olin maangmai ngühlang, chemkanbü ngühlang hoba, shemshi otangbü, hoba wanthung ngesakbü ngei haoen ka ngailanglabü.
Hobaje ho kaodak khümbo leilubü hoba sangliphang yeilabü hoba habü phang shuongei Babilonbü Choba po anjinlei khangenlabü.
Kheijinei po anjinlei penan phaia ngei Babilonbü Choba hoba haoeibü phang haoeneibü shedbü shabü shanga shieikoelabü. Ngei kho kaonyek leilukulabü hoba ponpen shanga sangliphang la yeitikulabü, dogo
Ngei ngeibü ngüh pendou, laobou khulimbo laukei, hoba ho lea doan kibü pendou, laobou Jeremiaei phang pendou khulimbo tetena, ngei kho ho kaodak thükto loutilabü.
Aishanga phangshuong hoba Choba yaangbü juongei haoen aaola lelabü; hoba ngei haoeneibü kümsilei thüng haoen la ngaitikulabü.”
Israel Mühghaü
Ladang haoenei haka yunglaje, ngei haoen jungto in hautibü haangjung haoen tuong nyinyi hoba jaakjaakmakmak yeilabü.”
Hibü ngei
Jerusalem hoba Jihuda sangnyu shuong, khükabü Choba shuong hoba konglebü shuong la yungtikei, khoei haoen sangliphang hoba satenshang mangsenlabü hoba shedsikhau che, khei tat kibü tegü yeitilabü.
Ho thung ka yunglabü nyen shuong pendou hanei kia:
Ijepbü Choba, haoeibü yaangenbü shuong
hoba leiyeibü shuong;
Ijepbü khümbo hoba Ijepa kibü küksithang shuong;
Uz kaodak kabü choba pendou;
Filistia sangnyu shuong Ashkelon, Gaza, Ekron
hoba Ashdoda jouletbü dan;
Edom, Moab hoba Ammonbü mütshuong pendou;
Tair si Sidon Choba shuong pendou;
Mediterrania kaonyu kabü Choba shuong pendou;
Dedan, Tema hoba Buz kabü sangnyu shuong pendou;
khulou tuibang aman khu shubü mütshuong pendou;
Arabiabü Choba shuong pendou;
phetsen kaodak kabü phang Choba pendou;
Zimri, Elam hoba Mediabü Choba pendou;
yungkük kabü Choba pendou, saabü
hoba nyangbüa kibü, che thena che.
Kaonyudaka phang wekoei ho ka yunglabü. Thonla Babilon Chobaei yunglabü.
Kheijinei
Hobaje haoenei kaibü ik ka thung kho yungla asungletlonga kheijinei nyi haoen to laulabü, khei Thükenbou

Aishanga chüh- ashi, ngei jembü sangnyua leilubü kümsilei che kümla khangda. Haoeneije haoen ashiakoelep dogo damda si? Khei aying, haoen shieikoelabü haang, aishanga ngei kaonyudak pendou to lason hautila kümda. Ngo Thükenbou
“Hibü, Jeremia, ngei laubü habü ngüh pendou tetenashi. Nyi habü mütshuong la hai lenjan:
haoei hao saopobü kishang ka tennyinlabü.
Haoei hao mütli khulimbo hau yaangbüei ngühlabü;
haoei semlüh ngünbü maimai ngeklabü,
khei kaonyua kibü pendou khulimbo ngeklabü,
hoba kaonyu thon sühko ngüh jolabü,
aishanga
Haoei müt pendou matjemlabü,
hoba amaibou kho haitilabü,
dogo
Thükenbou
Hobaje kho chaloua

Haapashi, kan sanlombü shuong, hoba kaang ngekashi! Kan sanshuong leiyeibü dan, mang haapashi hoba thamngua lekeiashi! Aishanga kan sanlon paang tegü haitilabü jihsiphai loua; kan thamchak tegü atan phetnyinlabü.
Sanlombü shuong satshang jouan akilabü, sanlon leiyeibü shuong shanga satenshang akilabü.
Sanlombü dan ngekyobü ditashi, hoba sanshuong leiyeibü dan haapyobü ditashi; aishanga
khauang maangshatei küp jemetshouko kibü kaonyek leiluan aplabü.
Molosaonyu che phatko haoei jembü laangbob apyolabü, aishanga
Jihudabü Choba Josiaeibü shou Jehoakim songdakla khangbüa ho ngüh
ei hai lauda: “
Aingenyu haoenei kho ditlabü, hoba mütpem weko jembü amaibü lamnyu ka sepeilabü. Kheijinei haoenei amaibü kümbü haangjung ngei haoen to amaibü kümla dambo kibü ka ngo maangpon sepeilabü.”
hoba kanei ngo khangenbü thuseibü shuongeibü ngüh to aditkulonga, aoyou, kanei aditkusi dogokei ngei tokei tokei kan jungto hautikei,
kheijinei ngei ho chem Shilo phatko yeitilabü, hoba ho sangnyu kaodak phang pendou yo ka shedsikhau che tegü ngei yeitilabü.”
Ungshedbou shuong si thuseibü shuong hoba mütli pendouei
Lausikei ladang
Aila nyi
Ladang Jihudabü khuleibü shuongei habü kümsilei shangabü ditkei, haoen Choba chem ka
Kheijinei ungshedbou hoba thuseibou shuongei khuleibü hoba müt pendou to lenkei, “Ho müt haila muakei, aieilausi haoei ho sangnyu khulimbo laua. Kaneikei kaneibü noueitham dida.”
Kheijinei Jeremiaei khuleibü shuong si noknyüh pendou to joyoko laukei, “Kanei ditbü ngüh pendou kho ho chem hoba ho sangnyu khulimbo laula
Hibü tou kanei kümbü shuong kümetashi, hoba
Lausikei kü shangaje chühashi, ngo kaneibü ika kia, kan thedanga maibü hoba tükde dogo dambü kü to kümshi.
Lausikei kanei ngo haitialonga, kanei shed akibü sii angtibü shedbü kho kan jembü lolo to hoba ho sangnyu hoba ho mütli thükto sungbalabü, aishanga
Kheijinei khuleibü hoba müt pendouei ungshedbou si thuseibü shuong to laukei, “Ho müt haila amukei; aishanga haoei
Hobaje kaonyek kabü jaishou atei loenan kamshaian kibü pendou to joyoko laukei,
“Ladang Moreshetbü Mikaei Jihudabü Choba Hezekia chaloua tetenkei hoba Jihudabü mütli pendou to, Thükenbou
‘Zion sek tegü shapnyinlabü,
Jerusalem leilubü odsinot shaangbü che yeilabü,
hoba Lembüchem shongh kho lamang shongh yeilabü,’
dogo laukei,
Jihudabü Choba Hezekia si Jihudabü pendouei hao haitikei si? Aeiko Hezekiaei
(Tokei lubü che aoei

Hobaje ladang Jehoiakim Chobaei haoeibü khuleibü pendou hoba kongnyu pendou yoan haoeibü ngüh shuong ditkei, Chobaei hao haitila lambei. Lausikei ladang Uriaei ho shangabü ditkei hao hatla satkei hoba Ijep to satetlangkei.
Kheijinei Jehoiakim Chobaei Akhbor shou Elnathan yoa müt at Ijep to Uria lamla hautikei.
Haoenei Ijep ka Uria leian loukei hoba Jehoiakim jungto sungbakei. Chobaei hao inei haitikei hoba haoeibü mang püh khünshang to jinkukei.)
Lausikei Shafaneibü shou Ahikamei kü la pü lekubü danko haoenei ngo haitila noknyüh ik to khümbo kuan üp.
Jihudabü Choba Josiaeibü shou Zedekia songdak khangbüa
ei kü to hai laukei: Nyi lolo kip hoba buleng kaang kümashi hoba khübü kho kaibü ngüma yakashi.
Hobaje Jerusalem to Zedeia Choba jungto loubü lambubou shuong danko Edom Choba, Moab Choba, Ammon Choba, Tair Choba hoba Sidon Choba jungto ho ngühlang hautiashi.
Haoen la haoeneibü bunyu shuong shanga ho ngühlang lentishi, Thükenbou
“Ngeibü seisihau yaangbüei ngei kaodak, khunakshousi, hoba kaodaka kibü meisiau shuong kümbei; hoba kho ngei kü la maikubü la kuda.
Tou ngei kaneibü kaonyek pendou ngo khangenbou Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnez- zar la kuakei, hoba tokei ngei hao la khongthu yaang kabü shatsinam shuong hao khangenla kuakei.

Hao jembü kaodak tuonglabü chalou apen shongko phang pendouei hao, haoeibü shousi, hoba haoeibü shisi shuong khangenlabü; kho phaia phang juongei hoba Choba yaangbü shuongei hao haoeneibü aao la yeitilabü.

“Lausikei phang atei kho Nebukhadnezzar, Babilonbü Choba akhangenlonga hoba Chobaeibü songdak phangto akhomlonga, kho phang inei, mühsinouei hoba limsilangei, khei haoeibü ikei kho amautishongko, ngei shieikoelabü, dogo

Hibü kanei thuseibü shuong to ayingsi khopjik seibü shuong to ayingsi manghtakbü shuong ayingsi yemshanbü shuong ayingsi seibü yaübü shuong aoyouei kan to, ‘Kanei Babilon Choba tekhangen,’ dogo lauda haoen to ngüha tele.
Aishanga haoenei kho kan kaneibü kaonyek ka saabü to kuktila yepeijaweko tetenkuda; ngei kan shian sattilabü hoba kan shemlabü.
Lausikei phang laobouei jembü ngüm Babilonbü Choba kaang phangto sungbalaje kho phang ngei jembü kaodaka sek moushauko khünei kitilabü, dogo
Jihudabü Choba Zedekia to ngei jeteibü ngühlang kukei. Ngei laukei, “Babilonbü buleng phangto kaneibü ngüm atashi; hoba hao si hao mütshuong khangenashi, hoba kan lang kilabü.
Laobou phangei Babilonbü Choba akhangenda kho phang shanga
Thuseibü shuong aoyouei kan to, ‘Kanei Babilonbü Choba akhangenlabü,’ dogo laulaje haoeneibü ngüh kanei tedit, aishanga haoenei kan la amlangbü tetenkuda.
Ngei haoen ohauti, dogo
Kheijinei ngei ungshedbou shuong hoba müt pendou to joyoko laukei, “
Haoen to ngüha tele. Babilonbü Choba khangenashi hoba kan lang kiashi. Aila ho sangnyu sangliphang la yeila?
Haoen maimaitham thuseibü shuong yingalonga, hoba

(Ladang Nebukhadnezzar Chobaei Jihuda Choba Jehoiakim shou Jehoiakhin, hoba Jihuda si Jerusalem kabü khuleibü shuong Babilon to laplangkei, haoei thaonyu shuong, chinam deidang, denshang kailong, hoba Lembü- chem kabü nyaksinam at asunglang.)
“Ditashi,
Khübü peisilei Babilon to künlanglabü hoba ngei haoen pean chühbü chalou asühshongko khübü kho khünei kiteilabü, dogo
Kho poa ong Jihudabü Choba Zedekiaeibü songdak khangbü po leibou, lit ngaoboubüa, Gibeon ka Azzureibü shou Hanania thuseibouei
Israel Mühghaü
Po nyi kanglanga Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnez- zarei haka künlangbü Lembü- chem kabü peisilei pendou ngei ho kaoen to sungngaibalabü.
Ngei tokei Jihudabü Choba, Jehoiakimeibü shou Jehoiakhin hoba Babilon to langsenbü Jihudabü shuong pendou nyibou leingailabü. Haü, ngei Babilon Chobaeibü buleng leilutikulabü, dogo
Kheijinei ungshedbou shuong thedanga hoba
Haoei laukei, “Amen!
Khei yingasikei tou ngei laobou kan pendouei hoba müt pendouei ditko lauda ho ditashi:
Shangied ka thuseibü shuong aoyou kan to hoba kü to shaang kikei, haoenei wapyo, mühsinou, hoba limsilang, kaonyek yaangbü juong hoba sangle yaangbü shuong khulimbo tetena.
Lausikei thuseibü aoei sangmei shanga tetenda hao shangaje ladang kho thusei ngüh loushedlaje, kheijinei ong
Kheijinei thuseibou Hananiaei Jeremiaeibü ngüm ka buleng kho sungkei hoba leilukukei,
hoba Hananiaei müt pendou thedanga joyoko laukei, “
Thuseibou Hananiaei Jeremia thuseiboueibü ngüm ka kaangkhüh kho leilukuan longche kian
“Hauashi hoba Hanania to lenshi,
Aishanga Israel Mühghaü, Thükenbou
Kheijinei thuseibou Jeremiaei thuseibou Hanania to laukei, “Tou ditashi, Hanania,
Hibü
Hibü Hanania thuseibou kho khüpotham lit nyetboubüa haikei.

Laobou Jeremia thuseibouei Jerusalem ka langsenbü jaishou shuong jungto, ungshedbou shuong jungto, thuseibü shuong hoba müt pendou, aoyou Jerusalem ka Babilon thüngshang to Nebukhadnezzarei langsenkei, haoen pendou jungto dobü le ngüh shuong habü ki.
(Ho Jehoiakhin Choba, haoeibü nyu, sungphatbü shuong, Jihuda hoba Jerusalembü leiyeibü shuong, buei noksa kümbü shuong, hoba namyaübü shuong Jerusalem ka langsenan kibü shuong to dokei.)
Shafaneibü shou Elasa hoba Hilkiaeibü shou Gemaria, aoyou Jihudabü Choba Zedekiaei Babilon to Nebukhadnezzar Choba jungto hautikei, haoeneibü ika le dobü hautiko laukei:
“Israel Mühghaü, Thükenbou
‘Chemsibung dangashi hoba khünei kiashi. Balaak leashi hoba khüka longbü shauashi.

Yak ngaashi, hoba jayang nouyang shousi kiashi. Kaneibü shousi shuong la yak ngakuashi hoba kaneibü yaksa shousi shuong laolamla hautiashi, khünei haoenei nouyang jayang shousi buklabü. Khünei kan bukko haako hauashi hoba shijung tengai.
Lausikei ai sangnyu to ngei kan laplangtikei kho sangnyu shanga sangmai naangmaibü lambushi. Kho shanga
Aishanga Thükenbou
Aishanga haoenei ngeibü nyena yepeijaweko tetenda. Ngei haoen ohauti, dogo
“Aishanga
Aishanga kan shanga ngeibü lamthen ngei ngeakei; khei kan to komla aying lausikei kan naangmailabü lamthen, hoba kan la loulabü shanga maanglem souko kulabü lamthen, dogo
Kheijinei kanei kü to ngalabü, hoba louan kü to sulajalabü, hoba ngei kan to ditkulabü.
Kanei ngo lamlabü hoba ngo haplabü, ladang kanei maangpon khümboei lamlaje.
Haü, kanei ngo haplabü, dogo
“Kanei,
lausikei Choba ao Dawid setshanga setda, hoba sangnyua kibü müt pendou, kaneibü thensilen aoyou kan yoa alaplang, haoen shang- abü
Thükenbou

Ngei in, mühsinou, hoba limsilangei haoen shieilabü hoba kaodak sangle pendou shanga konglabü, shedsikhau che, hatlamoklabü che, mangsenlabü che, hoba ngei lae aeto haoen shian apbei phang pendou yoa akhainyu che yinglabü.
Aieilausi haoenei ngeibü ngüha ale, dogo
Hibü,
“Thükenbou
Hobaje Babilona Jihuda ka laplangbü pendouei haosi laüa ho shedsikhau ngühtet jungeilabü:

Aieilausi haosiei Israelbü ngoukolouko jungeikei; haosiei jembü lepboueibü yaksi shuong to asangalanbü jungeikei, hoba haosiei ngeibü nyena ngei haosi la asakkubüa amlang ngüh laukei. Ngei ngeakei hoba ngo aukabü ki, dogo
Nehelambü Shemaia to nyi lenshi,
“Thükenbou
Kholonga, Anathotbü Jeremia, aoei jembü lolo kan thedanga ungshedbou la yeian ki hao to aila ühak?
Aishanga haoei Babilona sen jungto ngühlang hautiko laukei: Kan thüngchema lounyu kilabü; chem dangashi hoba khünei kiashi, hoba balaak leashi hoba khoka longbü shauashi.’”
Zefania ungshedbouei ho le Jeremia thuseibouei ditko wekei.
Kheijinei
Langsenbü pendou jungto hautiashi, hoba lauashi: Nehelambü Shemaia shangabü
Hibü
Israel Mühghaüei hai lauda, “Ngei ka la lenbü ngüh pendou le chenei doashi.
Aishanga
künei panglangbü, hatbü hoba hakso akibü ngühlang ditda.
Tou loashi, hoba damanchühashi!
Bousuei shou buklep lo?
Khülonga aila bousu wekoei yaksaei na hapjinei kümbü tegü,
lulueibü shimunga jembü ikei shangetan ngei hapda
hoba aila thenyek phaklaktham kida?
Ügütü, ho chalou aeibou yaangkei!
ho phatko ai aki.
Kü mütli Jakob shanga khonkulabü,
lausikei kho chalou ka hao khümenlabü.”
Thükenbou
Lausikei haoenei ngo haoeneibü
“Kholonga tehüt, O Jakob, ngo khangenbou;
ayingsi hatkomokko teki, O Israel.
Ngei kan hoba kaneibü thensilen kaonyek saabü ka,
hoba kan langsenshang ka püetlabü.
Hobaje Jakob longeilabü
hoba sangmaia hopatham kilabü,
hoba aoeikei hao ühüttilabü,
dogo
Aishanga ngo ka yoa kia hoba no khümenlabü.
Phang pendou aoyou yoa ngei no phinnyintikei,
ngei haoen mautilabü,
lausikei kan ngei khümboje athontilabü.
Ngei ka to ngühmaiei haklabü;
ngei no ashiakoeko thamje üpyolabü,
dogo
“Ka la aakbü amaitikuenlabü,
ka la mou yaang leakei.
Ka shanga thounoulabü müt ao aki,
kaibü mou shanga maishang aki,
no mailabü maanglem aki.
No sanoubü shuongei no maa;
haoenei no alamda.
Aishanga ngei ka la dangboueibü mou tegü letikei;
hoba onou akakko shieikoekei,
aieilausi no shabü yaang kia.
Aishanga kaibü shedbü yaangseba,
hoba kaibü shabü juongsepa.
No leilubü shanga ainyula ngekda;
no khonkubü maila athük.
Aieilausi kaibü shedbü yaangbü
hoba kaibü shabü juong thüngei
ngei habü ho ka to kümbei.
Lausikei no suibü dan pendou suilabü,
hoba kaibü labou pendou lang senlabü.
No khonkutibü shuong pendou khonkutilabü,
ka ka soshau soyungbü shuong ka ngei solabü.
Lausikei ngei no maingaitilabü;
hoba kaibü mou shuong maitilabü;
kaibü dangbou shuongei ka to,
‘Aoeikei athounouko tekan apbou Zion,’ dogo lauasikei,
dogo
“Chühashi, Jakobeibü neichem thu kho
ngei nyibou kümetkulabü
hoba hao kishanga onou kilabü,
sangnyu kho hao jembü shongh thüka kümlabü
hoba Chobaeibü chem kho lanei kikei khünei lolabü.
Khükabü mütshuongei nyensangbü chia laulabü;
haoenei olinbüei ngekyolabü.
Ngeibü haülabüei haoen haalabü
hoba shijung angailabü;
ngeibü haülabüei haoen la soumo sungbalabü
hoba haoen hanbü la ayeilabü.
Haoeneibü shousi shuong shangied tegü haanglabü,
hoba kü thedanga haoeneibü mütli huongenlabü;
hoba haoen shieikoebü pendou ngei shieikoelabü.
Haoeneibü choba kho haoen yo kabü che yinglabü;
haoeneibü songdakbou haoen yo ka longlabü.
Ngei hao ngo nyangko leibalabü,
hoba hao ngo nyangko loulabü;
aishanga angako aoei jembü lolo ngo nyangko
loula maang yaangenla?
dogo
Hibü kan ngeibü mütli kilabü,
hoba ngo kaneibü Mühghaü kilabü.”
eibü khauang maangpok longbü haoei akümshongko hoba awanti shongko angailabü. Phailamaje kanei ho ditenlabü.
ei hai lauda: Mütli aoyou in ka satenkei haoenei yama onou hapbei. Ladang Israel mütliei hakso lambei,
saabü ka haoen jungto longkei. Ngei ponpen thon akibü sanouei ka to sanoukei; hibü ka to maanglemenbü athakko kia.
Ngei no nyibou dangetlabü, hoba no kümsembulabü, O Israel, saosüngbü medei! Nyibou nyi no lolo busen junglabü, hoba lemlembo olinyobüa tombolakko haulabü.
Tokei nyi Samaria shongh semlüh sek moulabü, sekmoubü shuongei kelabü, hoba kho hek shaulabü.
Aishanga Efraim shongh kaodaka lapheibü shuongei nyetche chalou ngeklabü: ‘Meimeiashi, hoba sen Zion to seneibü
Aishanga
“Jakob shanga haujembo olinyobü chia lauashi;
hoba phangshuong yoa yaangboutham shanga ngekashi.
Kaibü nyensangbü dittiashi hoba hai lauashi,
Chühashi, ngei haoen yungkük aeka leibalabü,
hoba haoen kaodak thonbü ka leishailabü.
Haoen yoa nyekthubü hoba sokebü loulabü,
hoba mang akongbü yaksa si hapla khonkubü yoan,
haoen liko tan yaangbü che hato longeilabü.
Haoen haapbo longeilabü,
hoba subüjabüa ngei haoen leingailabü.
Ngei haoen dei shumang nyangko paitilabü,
haoen aphaiyetlabü lamnyu yenbüa ngei haoen leilabü.
Aishanga Israel thedanga ngo bou,
hoba Efraim ngeibü shaangbü shou ki.”
“O phangshuong, kü to ditashi;
hoba yungnyu khatan kibü kaodak saabüa
kü ngüh phinthonashi.
Aoei Israel lintikei haoei leishailabü,
hoba sanlombüei jembü san lombü tegü haoen lomlabü.
Aishanga
hoba hao shanga yongko hau kibü ik ka hao khümenkei.
Haoen loulabü hoba Zion shongha ngüh yaangbüei chia laulabü
hoba
khei youshou thüka, ih thüka hoba oliv onang,
hoba sanlon si masu pongsu shoushou thüka olinyolabü.
Haoen dei lakbü bamang che phatko kilabü,
hoba haoen touje sensen maangmau akilabü.
Kheijinei yaksa nashou shuong tombolakko olinyolabü;
hoba heshou shuong si baushi shuong lemlemtham kilabü.
Ngei haoen la hakso kulabü hoba manghaap jeila olintilabü,
ngei haoen maang sulabü hoba maangshat jeiko olinbü kulabü.
Ungshedbou shuongeibü langkei ngei soukoauko samlabü,
hoba ngeibü mütli ngo maibüei senyüh shemlabü,
dogo
“Ramaa ngühlang che,
maang waangko hoba aeibou haapbü ditda;
Rachel jembü shou shanga haapda,
saoeibü shousi shuong shanga sao maangli athonda,
aieilausi haoen aki.
Haapbü ka kaibü ngüh
hoba nyeksi angbü nangashi;
aishanga kaibü kümsileia pailettilabü,
dogo
hoba haoen dangbou kaodak ka longeilabü.
Hibü loulabüa no maanglem kia,
hoba kaibü shousi shuong jembü kaodak to longeilabü,
dogo
“Maimaitham Efraimei jembü lolo hai ngühko wibü ngei dida:
‘Nyi ngo asenetbü masu shoushou tegü thepetkei,
hoba ngo thepetbü phanga ngüha lekei.
Ngo nyibou kümetkuashi,
hoba ngo sepeinyu longeilabü,
aieilausi no ngeibü Mühghaü
Ngo sepeinyu satan phaia ngo maangpon sepeikei;
hoba ngei ditenan phaia, ngei ngeibü khukua jangkei.
Ngo himousele kikei, ngo maang kouan kikei,
aieilausi ngeibü mütaoabü shedbüshabü ngei künkei.’
“Efraim ngei sanoubü jayangshou.
Hao ngei yongko sanoubü shou;
aishanga ladüngnei ngei hao khulimbo laulaje
ngei tokei hao damenda.
Hibü kü maangponei hao shanga haiyeida,
maimaitham ngei hao to onoulabü,
dogo
Nyi lamnyu shensinge phoashi;
no lolo lamleilabü bu jangashi.
Sepeiashi, O saosüngbü Israel,
kaibü sangnyu shuong to sepeiashi.
No lalokche sepeisaila,
O mailem akibü nouyangnyu?
Aishanga yaksaei bousu püetbü phatko,
Thükenbou
O saopobü kishang,
O saopobü shongh’
Hobaje Jihuda si haoeibü sangnyu pendou hoba sekmoubü shuong, hoba aoyou jembü san tan yoa shoongaida khünei liko kilabü.
Ngei hübü mangbü soushou sinngaitilabü hoba semthetbü soushou weko ngei senyühshemtilabü.
Kheijinei mütshuongei laulabü, ‘Ngo shen to haukei hoba yepmang maian laksepbei.’
“Chühashi, ngei Israel chung si Jihuda chung, müt si meisiau lilabü yoa kaonyu nyaktilabü chalou lousühada, dogo
Hobaje ho haüthüklabü, khei ngei lai haoen thüka pheienla hoba leilutila, apla hoba mautila hoba amaibü sungbala chühko kikei, kho tegütham ngei haoen thüka kümla hoba kela chühko kikei dogo
Khübü chalou ka touje,
‘Pisibousi shuongei haijepbü shaukei;
hoba shisi shousi la hauh amda,’
dogo haoenei alaulabü.
Lausikei mütpem weko jembü shabü shanga hailabü; aoei haijepbü semlüh hek shaulaje hao hauh amlabü.”

Theyolanyobü laobou ngei haoeneibü pisibousi shuong yoa haoeneibü ika jenan Ijep kaodak ka ngei leiyenjinei kümbei, ngeibü theyolanyobü laobou, ngo haoeneibü lao tegü yingasikei haoenei leilukei, kho theyolanyobü tegüje ayinglabü, dogo

Lausikei theyolanyobü hoje khübü chalou danan phaia Israelbü chung to ngei kümbü kho ki, ngei ngeibü ngühkhüm haoen thükto jinkulabü, hoba ngei kho haoeneibü maangpona dolabü, hoba ngo haoeneibü Mühghaü hoba haoen ngeibü mütli yinglabü.
Hobaje touje mütpem wekoei jembü lepbou to hoba mütpem wekoei jembü jaisina to ‘
hoba nangnak shanga litnyu hoba khanshoulitshou la
takletbü ngühkhüm kuda.
Haoei yungnyu shouentida hoba ngühtida;
haoeibü nyen Thükenbou
Kü thedang ka habü takletbü ngühkhüm bangjung satkualonga
kheijinei ong Israel thensilen kü thedanga
ponpen thonsithak akiko phang che kilabü ka thonan aplabü.
Thükaenei müh shuong takan chühla thükalonga
hoba phangaenei kaomaang denshang lamenalonga,
kheijinei ong ngei Israel ka pakbü pendou,
khei haoenei kümbü pendou shanga inletlabü,
dogo
“Chühashi, chalou shuong louada,” dogo
Hobaje takan chühbü lüh aei longlabü, khei Gareb shongh sühko tangshaitham hoba kho phaia Goa to sepeilabü.
Haibü mang shuong hoba tap yo khümbo, hoba chaang aenei Koli Bakhün nongbü ka Kidron Shoushou thük khongthu pendou jembo
Jihudabü Choba Zedekia po anboubüa
Kho chaloua Babilonbü Choba sepai danei Jerusalem komlepbo kikei, hoba Jeremia thuseibou kho Jihudabü Chobaeibü lombou kibü chema khinlepan kikei.
Aishanga Jihudabü Choba Zedekiaei hao lapan phoan laukei: “Nyi aila,
hoba Jihudabü Choba Zedekia kho Babilonbü ka asatenlabü, lausikei maimaitham Babilonbü Chobaeibü ika kuan aplabü; hoba kho yoa theshuok hoba nyek si nyek shuokyoan joyolabü.
Hobaje haoei Zedekia Babilon to sunglanglabü hoba khünei ngei pean achühshongko kilabü. Kanei Babilonbü khulimbo wapyosikei athüklabü dogo
Jeremiaei laukei,
Chühashi, kabou nashoubou Shallumeibü shou Hanamel ka jungto loulabü, hoba laulabü: Anathota kibü ngeibü sek jekashi; aishanga jekngaian anglabü kho no ong ki.
Kheijinei kübou nashouboueibü shou Hanamel lombou kibü chem to
Hobaje ngei Anathota kübou nashouboueibü shou Hanamel ka sek kho jekkei, hoba hao la nam chandinam shekel anthüknyet kho wean jinkukei.
Ngei yeibü khünei ngeibü nyen dokei hoba khonei shangkei hoba aukabü shuong ngakei, hoba nam kho seret kunga hauan chühkei.
Kheijinei jekthetbü aukabü dokei; shangan kibü ham kho hoba laobou ipan kikei, ngühkhüm hoba song tegütham khübü kho yoan ngei lekei.

Hobaje jekthetbü aukabü dobü kho kübou nashouboueibü shou Hanamel thedanga jekthetbü aukabü dobüa nyen doletbü aukabü shuong thedanga hoba Jihudabü aoyou lembü chema setan kikei pendou thedanga Maaseiaeibü shou Neriaeibü shou Baruk la kukei.
Haoen thed- anga ngei Baruk la kuko laukei,
Hai Thükenbou
Aishanga Thükenbou
Jekthetbü aukabü dobü kho ngei Neriaeibü shou Baruk la kuan phaia ngei
“Ügütü,
Nyi hajar juong to thonsithak akiko sanou lenda, lausikei pisiboueibü shedbü haoeneibü shisishousi jungto haoen phaito loutida. O yaangbü hoba hau kibü Mühghaü, aoeibü nyen Thükenbou
Songsihon yaangbü; hoba kümbüleibüa yaangbü; aoeibü nyek müteibü lamthen pendou aenei ipan ki, mütpem weko la jembü lamthen thüng hoba jembüei kümbü thüng pailetkuda;
aoei Ijep kaodaka tetsida hoba seikümseilei lenkei hoba tat sühko Israela hoba khunak shousi pendou yoa hoba tat tegü nyen che longtian ki.
Nyi kaibü mütli Israel Ijep kaodak ka tetsida hoba maangpanglabü hau kibü ikei hoba phem shingbüei hoba hatlamoklabü yaangei leibakei.
Hobaje ho kaodak laobou nyi haoeneibü pisibou la kula theyolanyokei, sendei hoba naodei kouko kibü kaodak haoen la kukei.
Hobaje haoen atkei hoba kho lekei, lausikei haoenei kaibü ngüha ale ayingsi kaibü ngühkhüma apai; nyi haoen la kümla sakkubü haoenei ai aküm; hibü nyi haoen thük to habü amaibü pendou loutikei.
“Chühashi, Babilonbüei sangnyu kho lela kaotok yaüenan komlepakei. In, mühsinou hoba limsilang danko sangnyu kho haoen ikmang to atlabü. Nyi ai laukei kho pendou loushedbü kho nyi hapda.
Khei yingasikei, O Thükenbou
“Chühashi, ngo
Hibü

Hobaje ho sangnyu khulimbo wapyola Khaldibü loulabü hoba ho sangnyua wan thekulabü, hoba chemdaka laobou haoenei Baal la ponlem hibü lembo ki, hoba ngo maangto shattiko lubü mühghaü shuong la yunglabü lembü yeian jinkuko ki, kho yoan juoklabü.

Aishanga Israelbü shousi shuong si Jihudabü shousi shuongei kü thedanga ai amai kho ong haoen heshou dangka thama küma; aishanga Israelbü shuongei ngo maangto shattila ong haoeneibü ikküm ikleiei küma, dogo
Aishanga ho sangnyu kümbü chalou ka tat sühko ngeibü khauang maangpok hoba maangshat longtia. Hibü ngei ho kü thedang ka sungan aplabü.

Israelbü shousi shuong hoba Jihudabü shousi shuong haoeneibü Choba shuong hoba haoeneibü ungshedbou shuong, hoba haoeneibü thuseibü shuong, Jihudabü hoba Jerusalema kibü shuongei amaibü pendouei ngo maangto shattiko khauangtikei.
Haoenei haoeneibü thenyek aying takphai kü ae yeikei; hoba ngei haoen to maangshikko lenasikei haoenei songlen asunglet.
Ngeibü Nyen nyenbü chem kho shatila haoenei mangsenlabü shuong phokei.

Haoeneibü jayang nouyang shousi shuongeibü lembü Molek la kula ngei haoen la asakku, ayingsi ho mangsenlabü haoenei kümla Jihudabü shuong shatila ngeibü maanga daman akisi dogokei haoenei Hinnomeibü jayangshou pholia Baal shanga lemshang shongh lemshang kümbei.”
Israel Mühghaü

Chühashi, ngo khausak longko khauangjinei hoba maangto shatjinei ngei haoen laeto ong shian sattikei, khübü kaonyek pendou ka ngei haoen leishailabü; hoba ngei haoen nyibou ho kaonyek to leibaan haoen thushed akiko phokulabü.
Hobaje haoen ngeibü mütli kilabü, hoba ngo haoeneibü Mühghaü yinglabü.
Hobaje haoenei kü to ponpen soumo hattila shanga ngei haoen la maangpon che kulabü; hoba haoen hoba haoen phainei haoeneibü thensilen maila yaangla shanga lamnyu che kulabü.
Ngei haoen to theyolanyobü che kümlabü. Ngei haoen to maibü kümbü ladangkei ananglabü, hoba haoen kü jungka ladangkei sepeinyu angaitila shanga kü to hattila haoeneibü maangpona ngei jinkulabü.
Haoen to maibü kümbüa ngo olinlabü, hoba ho kaonyeka ngei haoeneibü maang- ponei hoba ngeibü maangpon pendouei hoba ngeibü soushou pendouei lo leko phokulabü.
“Aishanga
Ho sangliphang, müt ayingsi meisiau akishang ho Babilonbü ik to kuakei, dogo laobou shanga kanei laueida, kho kaonyeka kao jekyo phouyolabü.

Mütshuongei sekphai chandinamei jekthetlabü, hoba aukabü doyobü nyen dolabü, hoba aukabü shangyolabü. Ho Benjamin kaonyeka, Jerusalem sangnyu kaijemboa, Jihudabü sangnyu shuonga hoba kaonyek sangnyu shuonga, hoba Negeb sangnyu shuonga haüthüklabü. Aishanga ngei haoeneibü thu kümetkulabü, dogo
Tokei Jeremia lombou chema khinan kijinei
“Kaonyu yaübou
‘Kü to ngaashi hoba ngei ka to jongailabü; hoba nyi ngean akibü hupang kümsilei yaangbü ka la lenlabü.’
Aishanga
Khaldibü wapyobü shangabü, khei ngo khauang maangpoka haitilabü mangjimei ho kaoen shenlabü, aishanga haoen amaibü haangshong ho sangnyu ka ngei ngeibü thenyek huan aplabü.
Chühashi, ngei khüto haangmaibü, hoba maitibü hoba haoen to thusinaang maibü hoba maimaitham sangmai tang khitlabü.
Ngei Jihudabü si Israelbü thu nyibou kümetkulabü, hoba shaangla tegütham haoen nyibou kümetlabü.
Ngo khulimbo shedbü shabü pendou ka ngei saüenkulabü, hoba ngo khulimbo lobü hoba shed shonbü pendou apbulabü.

Hobaje kaodak phang shuong aoyouei ngo haoen shanga maibü kümla kibü pendou to ho sangnyu kü shanga olinlabü nyen che, nyensanglabü che, hoba soneikanglabü che yinglabü, ho shanga maibü pendou hoba sangmai, hakso pendou ngei sungbakubü shanga haoenei hatlabü hoba lühlabü.”
olinyobü ngüh hoba chemkanbü ngühlang, hoba aoyouei
‘Thükenbou
aishanga
haoeibü sanou ponpen kida!’
Aishanga shaangla tegü ngei haoeneibü kaonyek thu nyibou kümetkulabü, dogo
Thükenbou

Shongh kaodak sangnyu shuonga, chanepbü sangnyu shuonga hoba Negeb sangnyu shuonga hoba Benjamin kaonyeka, Jerusalem kaijembo kabü sangnyu shuonga hoba Jihuda sangnyu shuonga, san tan tan, aoei haoen weanchühda, haoeibü ik phanga nyibou danjung haulabü,” dogo
“Chühashi, Israelbü chung si Jihudabü chung to thekubü haüthüklabü chalou shuong louada, dogo
Khübü chalou hoba kho jihsiphaia Dawid shanga ngei saopobü Bhek che longtilabü, hoba haoeibü kaonyeka ngühmai hoba saopobü kümlabü.
Khübü chaloua Jihuda püetlabü hoba Jerusalem khümenan kilabü. Khoeibü nyen ho hai nyenlabü: ‘
Aishanga
ayingsi Levi ungshedbou shuong kü thedanga juokbü lembü kula, shausiyung lembü juokla hoba ponpen shanga haitibü lembü lamlela ladangkei mütei shalean akilabü.”

kheijinei ngo khangenbou Dawid yoa ngeibü thesilan hoba kü thedanga khangenko kibü Levi ungshedbou shuong to theyolanyobü leiluenlabü, hoba haoeibü Choba setshanga setan songdakla Dawidei haoeibü shousi che ongkei akilabü.
Müha khanshoulitshou wela athükbü tegütham, ngo khangenbou Dawideibü thensilen shuong hoba Levi ungshedbou shuong aoyouei kü to khangenda, ngei haatijuongtilabü.”
“Habü mütshuongei, ‘
ei hai lauda: Chalou si nangnak ngei thebülanbü ahoongen tegüje hoba müh si kaodak to haang ngühkhüm atakletku tegüje,

kheijinei ngei Jakob si ngo khangenbou Dawid thensilen inletlabü hoba ngei haoeibü thensilen ka Abraham, Isak hoba Jakob thensilen thüka songdakla telekhoulabü. Aishanga ngei haoeneibü thu kümetkulabü hoba haoen thüka üeisanou kilabü.”
Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnezzar hoba haoeibü sepai tan pendou hoba haoeibü sangle phanga kaodak sangle pendou hoba müt pendou Jerusalem hoba ho sangnyu pendou khulimbo wapyobü chaloua
Haoeibü ik ka no asatenlabü, lausikei maimaitham laplabü hoba no haoeibü ik to kulabü. Nyi Babilonbü Choba to the thenthen haüyolabü hoba hao to theshok joyolabü. Hobaje no Babilon to haulabü.
Khei yingsikei
no sangmaia hailabü. Ka to shaang kibü kaibü pisibousi Choba shuong shanga kümbü tegütham mütshuongei ka la soumo kuko ponlem hibü juoklabü. Haoenei, ‘Ügütü, O
Kheijinei Jeremia thuseibouei habü ngüh pendou Jerusalema Zedekia Choba to joyokei.
Babilonbü Chobaei Jerusalem hoba Jihuda sangnyu pendou, jouan kibü Lakhish si Azeka to wapyoko kiteikei. Aishanga jouan kibü Jihudabü sangnyu shuong thangtetan kibüje khübü kho ong kikei.
Zedekia Chobaei Jerusalema kibü pendou yoa haoen to solo phinthonla theyolanyobü küman phaia
Khei mütpem weko jembü Ibribü aaomüt shuong bousu yingsikei yaksa yingsikei litilabü; aoeikei Jihudabü jembü jaisina che ongkei aaomüt la ayeitilabü.

Hobaje konglebü shuong pendou hoba müt pendouei haoen nyibou aaothu la ayeitilabü lele haoeneibü aaomüt shuong bousu yaksa pendou litikho dogo theyolanyokei. Khonei haoenei hehoat kikei, hoba haoen litikei.
Lausikei phailaje haoeneibü dambü jakshaikei, hoba haoenei litibü bousu yaksa aaomüt shuong khümbo leibakei hoba nyiboula haoen phanga aaothu la yeitikei.
Kheijinei

Po nyetbou thonbü weko kan mütpem wekoei kan la yaakkuan kibü jaisina Ibribü aaothu ka litijan. Haoei po lak no khangen- an phaia nyi hao kaibü kümsilei ka litijan. Lausikei kaneibü pisibousi shuongei, kü to ngüha ale ayingsi kü to haoeneibü nou ühang.
