Tou nyangko ong maangpon sepeida, hoba kü thedanga laobou janbü ki kho kümbei: Kan mütpem wekoei jembü lepbou to dongebü thu ngekletkukei. Kanei kü Nyen kiman kibü chema kü thedanga theyolanyobü che kümbei.
Lausikei kanei kaneibü dambü jeileikei hoba kü nyen shatikei. Kan mütpem wekoei haoenei mangsühbü tegü litibü bousu hoba yaksa aaomüt shuong haan lengaikei, hoba haoen kaneibü aao la yeitingaikei.
Hibü

Jihuda si Jerusalem kabü yaangenbü shuong, hoba Choba- chem kabü yaangenbü shuong si ungshedbou shuong, hoba leiyeibü shuong pendouei, haoenei penyi la yeiko shipnyinbü masu paangshou kanglanga paikotham kü thedanga theyolanyokei. Lausikei haoenei thesilan leilukei hoba takletbü ajungei. Hibü ngei khübü mütshuong to haoenei masu paangshou to jungeibü tegütham jungeilabü.
Ngei haoen dangbou shuong ik to hoba haoeneibü langkei lambü shuongeibü ikmang to kulabü. Haoeneibü haibü mang kho mühkabü au shuong hoba kaokabü yangsikok shanga shausiyung yeilabü.

Hobaje Jihudabü Choba Zedekia hoba haoeibü lei- yeibü shuong haoeneibü dangbou shuong aoyouei haoeneibü langkei lamda haoeneibü ikmang to kulabü. Ngei haoen Babilonbü Choba sepai tan, laobou kan yo ka sepeinyu ngaian ki, haoeneibü ik to kulabü.

Chühashi, ngei sakkulabü hoba haoen ho sangnyu to longeitilabü. Haoenei ho khulimbo wapyolabü, hoba kho lelabü, hoba ho wanei lonan apbulabü. Ngei Jihuda sangnyu shuong müt akiko sangliphang che la yeitilabü, dogo
Jihudabü Choba Josiaeibü shou, Jehoiakim songdakbü haanga
“Rekhab chung jungto hauashi, hoba haoen to jo- yoashi, hoba haoen
Hibü ngei Habbaziniaeibü shou Jeremiaeibü shou Jazania hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuong hoba haoeneibü shousi pendou hoba Rekhab chung khümbo leian haukei.
Ngei haoen
Kheijinei Rekhabbü thedanga ihei jephot si thung shuong shenko phokukei hoba ngei haoen to, “Ih yungashi,” dogo laukei.
Lausikei haoenei jongaikei, “Künei ih ayunglabü, aishanga Rekhabeibü shou Jonadab, küneibü piei kün la sakkuko lenkei: Kanei ih ayungjan, kan hoba kaneibü shousi shuongei ladangkei ih ayunglabü.

Kanei chem che ongkei adanglabü, kanei lilabü asaklabü, ayingsi kanei semlühlaak alejan, lausikei neichema kiko pailabü. Khei kümalonga kan laobou kanoyeka yen la lean kilaje khünei kan salangko kilabü.

Künei Rekhabeibü shou Jonadab küneibü piei sakkubü ngühkhüma ngüha lekei. Künei yingasikei, küneibü yaksi shuongei yingasikei, küneibü jayangshousi shuongei yingasikei, ayingsi küneibü nouyang shousi shuongei ladangkei ih yungan achühkei,
ayingsi kishang chem adangkei, ayingsi küneibü semlühlaak, sek ayingsi youli aki.
Lausikei kün nei- chema kijung loukei hoba Jonadabeibü piei kün la sakkubü pendou ngüha lekei hoba kümbei.

Lausikei ladang Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnezzar kaonyek khulimbo angkei, künei laukei: Kaiya, Babilonbü sepai tan hoba Siriabü sepai tan ik ka satenla Jerusalem to haukho. Khoei kün Jerusalema ong kida.”
Kheijinei
“Thükenbou

Rekhabeibü shou Jonadabei haoeibü shousi shuong la ih ayungla ngühkhüm kubü kho jungeia, hoba tat sühko haoenei aikei ayungda. Aishanga haoenei piei lenbü ngüha lea. Ngei kan to tokei tokei joyoa, lausikei kanei kü ngüha ale.

Ngei kan jungto ngo khangenbü thuseibü shuong pendou haoen tokei tokei hautiko lena. Haoenei laukei: Tou kan mütpem weko jembü amaibü lamnyu ka sepeiashi hoba kanei kümbü shuong kümetashi, khei yingsi ong ngei kan hoba kaneibü pisibou la kubü kaonyeka kan kilabü. Lausikei kanei kü jungto kaneibü nou ühangku ayingsi adit.
Rekhabeibü shou Jonadab, haoeneibü piei haoen la sakkubü jungeikei, lausikei habü mütliei kü to ngüha ale.
Hibü Thükenbou
Kheijinei Rekhabeibü chung to Jeremiaei laukei, “Thükenbou
Hibü Thükenbou
Josiaeibü shou Jehoiakim, Jihudabü Choba po lei boubüa ho ngüh

“Phekhon tu che sungba hoba kho thüka ngei ka la Israel hoba Jihuda hoba phang pendou khulimbo joyobü ngüh pendou doashi. Josia Choba songdak jihsiphaia ngei ka to joyo khangbü chalou ka tat sühkobü ngüh khümbo doashi.

Aingenyu ladang Jihudabü mütliei ngei haoen to kümla kibü amaibü pendou shangabü ditlaje khünei haoen mütpem weko jembü kümsilei amaibü ka maangpon sepeilabü. Kheijinei ngei haoeneibü amaibü hoba shedbü shabü apbulabü.”
Kheijinei Jeremiaei Neriaeibü shou Baruk ngakei, hoba
Hobaje Jeremiaei Baruk la sakkuko laukei, “Ngo
Hibü no mühei nyengbü chaloua
Aingenyu haoeneibü subüjabü
eibü chema
Jihudabü Choba Josiaeibü shou Jehoakim po ngaoboubüa lit güboubüa Jerusalema müt pendou hoba aoyou Jihuda sangnyu shuong ka Jerusalem to loukei,

Kheijinei müt pendouei ditko kian, dobou Shafaneibü shou Gemariaeibü shemjang ka Barukei Jeremiaeibü ngühshuong dobü tulai ka wean lenkei. Haoeibü shemjang kho thükkabou chemsophanga Lembüchemeibü Haanbü Bakhün to atshang nyangko kikei.
Ladang Shafaneibü shou Gemaria hoba haoeibü shou Mikaiaei

hao Chobaeibü chem to yankei hoba doboueibü chem khüto atkei, hoba konglebü shuong pendou khünei setan kikei. Elishama dobou, Shemaiaeibü shou Elnathan, Shafaneibü shou Gemaria, Hananiaeibü shou Zedekia, hoba lubü leiyeibü shuong pendou.
Hobaje Barukei mütshuongei ditko dobü tulai kho wejinei Mikaiaei haoei ditbü ngüh pendou haoen la lenkei.

Kheijinei khuleibü shuong pendouei (Kushieibü shou, Shelemiaeibü shou, Nathaniaeibü shou) Jehudi hautiko Baruk to laukei, “Mütshuongei ditko nyi webü tulai kho kaibü ika jungashi; hoba kaiya.” Hibü Neriaeibü shou Barukei haoen jungto jungan loukei.
Kheijinei haoenei hao to laukei, “Setashi, hoba kho kün la wean lenkai.” Hibü Barukei haoen la wean lenkei.
Ladang haoenei ngüh pendou kho ditkei, haoen hatbüei cheei che to chühyokei, hoba haoenei Baruk to laukei, “Senei habü ngüh pendou Choba la ngühlang kujan.”
Kheijinei haoenei hao to phekei, “Habü pendou nyi lai dokei künla lenbü? Jeremiaeibü sembungei lenko dotikei sai?”
Barukei jongaikei, “Haü, habü pendou haoeibü sembungei ngüh longko kü la lenkei, hoba ngei shiaiei phekhona dokei.”
Kheijinei khuleibü shuongei Baruk to laukei, “Hauashi hoba Jeremia kasi huashi. Kasi kishang aolakei tengeti.”
Hibü dobü le kho Elishama doboueibü chema phoan haoen Chobaeibü chem to haukei, hoba haoenei Choba la ngühlang pendou kukei.

Kheijinei dobü tulai kho sungbatila Chobaei Jehudi hautikei, hoba haoei Elishama doboueibü chem ka sungbakei, hoba kho Jehudiei Choba la, hoba khuleibü shuong Choba nyangko loan kibü shuong la wean lenkei.
Kho lit gü boubü kikei hoba Choba kho poang- chema setan kikei, hoba hao thedanga phauyaanga wankak wan longko kikei.
Jehudiei lip semsilei wekhümjinei Chobaei inshouei khübü jemnyinkei hoba khübü kho wankak phauyaang to jinkei. Wankak phauyaanga alonshem shongko tulai khümbo kho wan to jinkukei.
Khei yingasikei, Choba ayingsi hao khangenbü shuong aoeikei khübü ngüh ditan ühüt, ayingsi haoenei lulueibü neisimei ajitnyin.
Ladang Elnathan, Delaia hoba Gemariaei dobü tulai kho ajiksi maikei dogo Choba to sukeijakei, haoei haoen to ngüha ale.
Yongbou, Chobaei Chobaeibü shou Jeramael, Azrieleibü shou Seraia, hoba Abdeeleibü shou Shelemia la dobou Baruk si Jeremia thuseibou lapla sakkukei. Lausikei
Jeremiaei lenko Barukei dobü tulai jikan apbuan phaia,
Lubü tulai dola sungba hoba shaangbü dobü tulai laobou Jihudabü Choba Jehoiakimei jikan apbukei, khünei kibü pendou doashi.
Hobaje Jihudabü Choba Jehoiakim to lenashi,
Hibü hai, Jihudabü Choba Jehoiakim shangabü

Hobaje hao hoba hao ka bakbü shuong hoba khangenbü shuong haoeneibü shedbü shanga shieikoelabü. Ngei haoen thükto hoba Jerusalema kibü shuong thükto hoba Jihudabü thükto ngei haoen khulimbo lauenbü amaibü pendou loutilabü; aieilausi haoenei ngüha aleda.”

Kheijinei Jeremiaei dobü lubü tulai sungbakei hoba Neriaeibü shou Baruk dobou la kukei. Haoei khünei Jihudabü Choba Jehoiakimei wana jikan apbubü Jeremiaeibü ngüh shuong hoba phatyobü lubü ngüh shuong pendou khünei dokei.
Josiaeibü shou Zedekia, ao Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnezzarei Jihudabü kaodaka Choba yeitikei, haoei Jehoiakimeibü shou Jehoiakhin jeiko songdakkei.
Lausikei haoei yingsikei hoba hao khangenbü shuongei yingsikei kaonyeka mütli shuongei yingsikei
Zedekia Chobaei Shalemiaeibü shou Jehukal, Maaseiaeibü shou Zefania ungshedbou jungto hautiko laukei, “Kün shanga
Tou Jeremia mütshuong yoa atko longeiko dogo kikei, aishanga hao toukei thüngshanga mojinko kikei.
Faraoeibü sepai tan Ijep ka longan kikei, hoba ladang Babilonbü aoyouei Jerusalem komlepan kikei, haoeneibü ngühlang ditan phaia haoen Jerusalem ka sukjung ngaikei.
Kheijinei

Israel Mühghaüei hai lauda, “Jihudabü Choba aoei kan kü jungto kü ka phela hautikei hao to kanei hai lenashi: Chüh- ashi, Faraoeibü sepai tan laobou ka to thuila loukei jembü kaodak Ijep to ngaikho dogo kia.
Hobaje Khaldibü sepeinyu longeilabü hoba sangnyu khulimbo wapyolabü, haoenei kho lelabü hoba kho wanei lonan apbulabü.
ei hai lauda: Babilonbü maimaitham kukjung satlabü, dogo lauko kan lolo tekhüpetti. Haoen angailabü.

Aishanga Khaldibü no khulimbo wapyobü sepai tan khümbo nyi thükasikei, haoen yoa mütpem wekoei jembü neichema leilu leilubü shuong ong jouan kiasikei, haoen lakseplabü hoba ho sangnyu wanei jikan apbulabü.”
Tou Faraoeibü sepai tan sühlangjineije Khaldibü sepai tan Jerusalem ka kukan kiteikei.
Jeremia Jerusalem ka Benjamin kaodak kabü mütli yoa haoeibü phejan sungletla meimeijung haukei.
Lausikei ladang hao Benjamin Bakhüna kikei khünei lombou che, Hananiaeibü shou Shelemia haoeibü shou nyen Irija, haoei Jeremia thuseibou lapbei hoba laukei, “No Khaldibü jungto satda!”
Hobaje Jeremiaei laukei, “Kho amlangbü. Ngo Khaldibü jungto asatda.” Lausikei Irijaei haoeibü ngüha ale, hoba Jeremia lapbei hoba hao khuleibü shuong jungto leibakei.
Hobaje khuleibü shuongei Jeremia to khauangkei hoba haoenei hao to ngümbei hoba Jonathan doboueibü chema hao thüngan phokei; aieilausi haoeibü chem kho thüngshang chem la kümbei.
Jeremia püngkhün che to jinkei, hoba chalou lounyu khünei kikei.
Zedekia Chobaei hao ngala hautikei, hoba hao leiyenkei hoba Chobaei haoeibü chema huphanga hao to phekei hoba laukei, “
Jeremiaei tokei Zedekia Choba to laukei, “Ngo thüngshanga kanei pholabü lele ngo ka thedanga ai shedkei ayingsi no khangenbü shuong ayingsi ho mütli to ai kümbei?
Kaneibü thuseibü shuong aoyouei ka to, ‘Babilonbü Choba no hoba ho kaodak khulimbo aloulabü,’ dogo tetenbü lanei ki?
Tou ditashi, ngei ka to sudajada, O ngeibü Choba. Ngei ea aoa subüjabü ka jungto sungbada: Ngo Jonathaneibü thüngshang chem to tengaitikai. Khei kümalonga ngo khünei haibüla.”

Hibü Zedekia Chobaei ngühkhüm kukei hoba chem lombü la haoenei Jeremia khümbo kukei, hoba sangnyua wentek akhüm shongko wentek kümshang khongnyu ka chalou weko hao la wentek che che kukei. Hibü Jeremia lomboueibü shemjanga kikei.
Tou Mattaneibü shou Shefania, Pashureibü shou Gedalia, Shelemiaeibü shou Jukal, hoba Malakiaeibü shou Pashur, haoenei mütshuong to lenko kibü ditkei.

ei hai lauda, “Aoyou ho sangnyua kilaje inei, mühsinouei, hoba limsilangei hailabü, lausikei aoyou Khaldibü jungto satlaje lang kilabü; haoeneibü langkei kho wapyobü jongsak che tegü yinglabü hoba lang kilabü.”
ei hai lauda, “Ho sangnyu ho Babilonbü Chobaei sepai tan ik to kulabü hoba lean aplabü.”

Kheijinei khuleibü shuongei Choba to laukei, “Ho müt haitiashi, aieilausi ho tegübü ngüh haoen to laubüei ho sangnyua phoyobü sepai shuong hoba müt pendoueibü ik haoei hau akitiko aptida. Aishanga ho mütei ho mütli maila lamda aying, lausikei haoen amaitila ong lamda.”
Zedekia Chobaei laukei, “Chühashi, hao kaneibü ika kia aieilausi Chobaei kan khulimbo ai akümlabü.”

Hibü haoenei Jeremia sungenkei hoba Chobaeibü shou Malkiaeibü deikhün to jinkukei, laobou lombü chema kikei. Haoenei Jeremia deikhün to jolühei phenan yantikei; deikhüna dei akitei, lausikei thimdak ong kiteikei hoba Jeremia thim to nyemjung atkei.
Ladang Ethiopiabü sung- phatbü müt che Ebed-Melek, ao Chobaeibü chema kikei, haoei Jeremia haoenei deikhün to jina dogo ditkei, kheijinei Choba kho Benjamin Bakhüna setan kiteikei.
Ebed-Melek Chobaeibü chem ka satkei hoba Choba to lenkei,
“Ngeibü bunyubou Choba, habü mütshuongei Jeremia thuseibou deikhüna jinkubüei haoenei kümbü pendoua shed shona; hao khünei mühei hailabü, aieilausi sangnyua wentek ajoukei.”
Kheijinei Ethiopiabü Ebed-Melek la Chobaei ngühkhüm kukei, “Ka yoa haka müt khujin leiashi, hoba Jeremia hao ühaitoua deikhün ka yaüenashi.”
Hibü Ebed-Melekei mütshuong kho hao yoa leikei, hoba Chobaeibü chem to thanshang chem neisimei phoshang to haukei. Haoei khüka neikek si neisimei hangbü sungkei, hoba haoei lüha shenan yantikei.
Kheijinei Ebed-Melek Ethiopiabü khoei Jeremia to laukei, “Neikek si neisimei kho kaibü phakphanga si lüh kanglanga hopashi.” Jeremiaei khei kümbei,
hoba haoenei Jeremia lühei senenkei hoba deikhün ka hao yaüenkei, hoba Jeremia lombou chema kikei.
Zedekia Chobaei Jeremia thuseibou ngala hautikei, hoba
Jeremiaei Zedekia to laukei, “Ngei maimaitham ka to lensi nyi ngo ühaitilep lo? Hobaje ngei ka la songsido maibü kuasikei nyi kü to ngüha alelabü.”
Kheijinei Zedekia Chobaei huphanga Jeremia to thekeilankei, “
Kheijinei Jeremiaei Zedekia to laukei, “
Lausikei nyi Babilonbü Choba khuleibü shuong ik to khümbo akulonga ho sangnyu Khaldibü ikto kuan aplabü, hoba haoenei ho wanei jikan apbulabü, hoba no haoeneibü ik ka asatenlabü.”
Lausikei Zedekia Chobaei laukei, “Jihudabü aoyou Khaldibü jungto satetlangan ki, haoenei ngo kuan apan kü to mangtham jungeibüla dogo ngo hatda.”
Jeremiaei laukei, “No haoen la akutilabü, ngei ka to ai lenda, khünei ong nyi
Lausikei nyi khümbo tekukho laualonga
Chühashi, Jihudabü Chobaeibü chema apyoan kibü yaksa shuong pendou Babilonbü Choba eibü khuleibü shuong jungto leian hauko kü la haptiakei. Haoen haujinei haoenei ai lauda ditashi:
‘Chobaeibü maanglembü jaishou shuongei no lepettikei,
hoba ka khu limbo thük hapbei.
Tou kaibü you thima nyemakei;
haoen ka ka sepeinyu satkua.’”
“Kaibü yaksi shuong hoba kaibü shousi shuong Khaldibü jungto leian haulabü. Nyi no lolo haoeneibü ik ka asatenlabü, lausikei Babilonbü Chobaei laplabü; hoba ho sangnyu wanei jikan apbulabü.”
Kheijinei Zedekiaei Jeremia to laukei, “Habü ngüh ho aolakei telen, hoba no ühailabü.
Khuleibü shuongei ngei ka to joyoa dogo ditalonga, hoba ka jungto louan nyi Choba la ai lenkei hoba Chobaei ka to ai laukei, aikei kün ka tehu hoba künei no ühaitilabü dogo laualonga,
kheijinei nyi haoen to, ‘Ngei Choba to ngo nyibou Jonathaneibü chem to khünei ühaitila ohautisi maikei dogo sukeijakei,’ dogo lenshi.”

Kheijinei khuleibou shuong pendou Jeremia jungto loukei hoba hao to phekei, hoba haoei Chobaei hao to lenbü tegü haoen to jongaikei. Hibü haoenei hao to joyobü nangkei, aieilausi aoeikei haoei Choba to ngühsong wan- yobü adit.
Hobaje Jerusalem lebü chalou asühshongko Jeremia Choba chem chemsophanga phokei.
Jihudabü Choba Zedekia po güboubü lit anboubüa, Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnez- zar hoba sepai tan pendou Jerusalem khulimbo loukei, hoba kho shikei.
Zedekia po anthükche boubü lit leiboubü chalou gübounyet sangnyu khonei sangnyu kümthang kho leilukei.

Ladang Jerusalem lekei, Babilonbü khuleibü pendou loukei hoba bakhün jenyua setkei: Nergal Sharezer, Samgar Nebo, Rabsarisbü Sarsekhim, hoba lubü Rabmagbü Nergal Sharezer, hoba Babilon Choba songdak phanga joubü pendou yoan kikei.
Ladang Jihudabü Choba Zedekia hoba sepai pendouei haoen hapbei haoen satkei; Chobaeibü bamanga kümthang penyi kaanglanga bakhün danko nangnak sangnyu ka angkei, hoba haoen Araba aeto haukei.

Lausikei Khaldibü sepai shuongei haoen shijung haukei hoba Jerikho pholia Zedekia laphetkei hoba haoenei hao lapbei, hoba Hamat kaodaka Riblaa Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnezzar jungto hao leian loukei, hoba haoei hao to mat jembei.
Babilonbü Chobaei Riblaa Zedekia Chobaeibü shousi shuong hao thedanga haitikei, hoba Babilonbü Chobaei Jihudabü sekbülakbü pendou haitikei.
Kheijinei haoei Zedekiaeibü nyek phekan apbukei hoba Babilon to leian haula hao namlühei khühkei.
Hobaje Khaldibüei Chobaeibü chem hoba mütli shuongeibü chem jikkei hoba Jerusalem kümthang leilukukei.
Kheijinei lombou lajamleibou Nebuzaradanei joubü mütshuong aoyou sangnyua ap- yoan kikei, aoyou hao jungto satetlangkei, hoba aoyou haiyeiko kikei khübü kho Babilon to lang senkei.
Lombou lajamleibou Nebuzaradanei shalebü müt at aoyou ai aki haoen Jihuda kaodaka apyokei, hoba haoen la semlüh bamang hoba sek yoan kukei.
Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnezzarei Jeremia shanga lombou Nebuzaradan danko sakkuko laukei,
“Hao leian kaiya, hao to maisho chühashi; hoba hao to amaibü teküm, lausikei haoei ka to lenbü tegü hao to kümashi.”
Hibü lombü lajamleibou Nebu- zaradan, yaangenbou Nebushazban si Nergal Sharezer, hoba Babilonbü Chobaeibü songdakbü konglebü shuong pendouei,
hautikei hoba lombou shemjang ka Jeremia leian sungkei. Haoenei Shafanureibü shi, Ahikameibü shou Gedalia la haoei haoeibü chem to leian haula khümbo kukei. Hibü hao mütshuong yoa kikei.
“Hauashi, hoba Ethiopiabü Ebed-Meleg to lenshi, Thükenbou
Lausikei noje khünyet ngei püetlabü, dogo
Aieilausi maimaitham ngei no püetlabü hoba no inei atuonglabü; lausikei no jembü langkei wapyobü jongsak phatko kilabü, aieilausi nyi kü to maanglem phokei, dogo
Lombü lajamleibou Nebu- zaradanei Rama ka Jeremia litian phaia haoei hao namlühei khühan Jerusalem hoba Jihuda langsenbü pendou yoa leian Babilon to lapan haujinei
Lombou lajamleibouei Jeremia leian loukei hoba hao to laukei, “
hoba

Tou chühashi, kaibü ik namlüh ka ngei no litila Babilon to kü yoa loula maiakei dogo nyi damalonga kaiya, hoba ngei no maisho chühlabü; lausikei no kü yoa Babilon to loula sheda dogo damalonga telou. Chühashi, kaodak khümbo ka thedanga kia, nyi laeto maikei hoba janbü dogo damda thi aeto haushi.

“No ohauko kialonga kheijinei Ahikameibü shou, Shafaneibü shi Gedalia jungto sepeiashi, ao Babilonbü Chobaei Jihudabü sangnyu shuonga governor pienkei. Hao yoa mütli yoa kiashi, ayingsi nyi lae aeto haujan dogo damda thi aeto haushi.” Hibü lombou lajamleibouei hao la shausiyung hoba jongsak kukei, hoba hao hautikei.
Kheijinei Jeremia Mizpaa Ahikameibü shou Gedalia jungto haukei, hoba hao yoa kaonyeka apyoan kibü mütshuong yoa kikei.

Ladang khongthua sepai tan lajamleibü pendouei, hoba haoen mütshuongei Babilonbü Chobaei Ahikameibü shou Gedalia kaonyeka governor piena hoba bousu, yaksa, hoba nashousi shuong, kaonyeka shalebou tham aoyou Babilon to alaplangko ki hao la ikjai khümbo kua dogo ditkei,
haoen Mizpaa Gedalia jungto Nethaniaeibü shou Ishmael, Kareaeibü shou Johanan, Tanhumetheibü shou Seraia, Netofa ka Efaieibü shousi hoba Maaka ka Jezania, haoen mütshuong yoa haukei.

Ahikameibü shou Gedalia Shafaneibü shiei haoen hoba haoeneibü mütshuong to theyolanyoko laukei, “Khaldibü khangenla tehüt, kaonyeka kishi, hoba Babilonbü Choba khangenashi, hoba kan yoa kho maian kilabü.

Kü shangaje Mizpaa kilabü, Khaldibü aoyou kü jungto loulaje haoen thedanga kan shanga lolabü. Lausikei kaneije ih hoba sulang buhek hoba onang yoshaishi, hoba kaneibü nyak chaka khübü kho thanan phoshi, hoba kanei sungan kibü sangnyu shuonga kishi.”

Kho tegü ladang Jihudabü aoyou Moabbü si Ammonbü yoa hoba Edom hoba lubü kaonyeka, khei Babilonbü Chobaei Jihudaa joubü apyoan ki hoba Ahikameibü shou Gedalia Shafaneibü shi haoen thüka governor pienan kia dogo ditkei,
kheijinei Jihudabü pendou haoen lai aeto ong shian apan kikei, khüka Jihudabü kaonyek to Mizpa hoba Gedalia jungto loukei. Hobaje haoenei ih hoba sulang buhek juongnyu yoshaikei.
Tou Kareaeibü shou Johanan hoba khongthua sepai tan leiyeibü pendou Mizpaa Gedalia jungto loukei
hoba hao to laukei, “Ammonbü Choba Baalisei; Nethaniaeibü shou Ishmael kaibü langkei lela hautiakei dogo nyi ngekeilao?” Lausikei Ahikameibü shou Gedaliaei haoen to maialem.

Kheijinei Kareaeibü shou Johananei Mizpaa Gedalia to huphanga joyokei, “Ngo hauakho hoba ngei Nethaniaeibü shou Ishmael haitiakho, hoba aoeikei kho angelabü. No nyangko kamshaian kibü Jihudabü linlabü hoba lubü Jihudabü jouletbü shuong shemlabü lele aila kaibü langkei letila?”
Lausikei Ahikameibü shou Gedaliaei Kareaeibü shou Johanan to laukei, “Nyi ho kümsilei akümlabü, aishanga nyi Ishmael shangabü amlangbü ngüh angda!”

Lit nyetboubüa Nethaniaeibü shou hoba Elishamaeibü shi Ishmael, ao Chobaeibü thensilen, hoba Chobaeibü kongnyu songdakbü yoa che kiteikei, hao Mizpaa Ahikameibü shou Gedalia jungto müt an yoan loukei. Ladang haoen khünei liko shauko yungko kikei,

kheijinei Nethaniaeibü shou Ishmael hoba hao yoa müt an kho meimeikei hoba Ahikameibü shou hoba Shafaneibü shi Gedalia kho inei wapan koutikei hoba hao haitikei, ao Babilonbü Chobaei kaonyeka governor pienan kikei.
Tokei Ishmaelei Mizpaa Gedalia yoa kiteibü Jihudabü pendou hoba Khaldibü sepai aoyou khünei kiteikei haoen pendou haitikei.
Gedalia haitian phaia nyetbounyet, aoeikei kho angetoua,
Shekhem, Shilo, hoba Samaria ka haoen sembung wi kütan apan hoba neisimei phenthetbü lean, haoeneibü mang wapeian, shausiyung lembü hoba ponlem hibü jungan
Hobaje Nethaniaeibü shou Ishmael Mizpa ka haoen to haüyola haapbo longkei. Haoei haoen haüyojinei, haoei haoen to laukei, “Ahikameibü shou Gedalia jungto kaiyeda.”
Ladang haoen sangnyu to lotkei, Nethaniaeibü shou Ishmael hoba hao yoa kibü mütshuongei haoen haitikei hoba haoen deikhüna jinkukei.
Lausikei khünei haoen yoa müt anei Ishmael to laukei, “Kün tühaiti, aieilausi künei youshou, barli, onang, hoba naodei seka huan thanan phoakei.” Hibü haoei haoen apyokei hoba jenabou yoa ühaiti.
Tou deikhün laoboua Ishmaelei haitibü mütshuong mang pendou jinkukei kho Israelbü Choba Baasha khulimbo Asa Chobaei thangetla kümbü kiteikei. Nethaniaeibü shou Ishmaelei haitibüei kho shentikei.

Kheijinei Ishmaelei Mizpaa joubü müt pendou, khei Chobaeibü nouyang shousi shuong hoba Mizpaa apyobü müt pendou, aoyou lombü lajamleibou Nebu- zaradanei Ahikameibü shou Gedalia la khümbo kuan phokei haoen lapbei. Nethaniaeibü shou Ishmaelei haoen lapbei, hoba Ammonbü jungto danthetjung haula meimeikei.
Lausikei ladang Kareaeibü shou Johananei hoba hao yoa kibü sepai tan leiyeibü pendouei Nethaniaeibü shou Ishmaelei kümbü amaibü pendou ditkei,
haoenei haoeneibü mütshuong pendou leikei hoba Nethaniaeibü shou Ishmael khulimbo wapyola haukei. Gibeona kibü thimdei yaangbü khüto haoen hao thükto loukei.
Hobaje ladang müt pendouei Kareaeibü shou Johanan hoba hao yoa sepai tan leiyeibü pendou hapbei, haoen olinyokei.
Hibü müt pendou aoyou Ishmaelei Mizpa ka langsenan haukei haoen nopngaian loukei hoba Kareaeibü shou Johanan jungto haukei.
Lausikei Nethaniaeibü shou Ishmaelei hao yoa müt set leian Johanan ka satenkei, hoba Ammonbü jungto haukei.

Kheijinei Kareaeibü shou Johanan hoba hao yoa sepai tan leiyeibü pendouei Nethaniaeibü shou Ishmael Ahikameibü shou Gedalia haitian phaia joubü sepai shuong aoyou Nethaniaeibü shou Ishmaelei sunglangan kikei, se- pai shuong, yaksa shuong, nashousi shuong, hoba sungphatbü mütshuong aoyou Johananei Gibeon ka leian longeikei haoen pendou leikei.
Hobaje haoen haukei hoba Bethlehem nyangko Gerut Kimhama kikei; aieilausi Khaldibü laüa Ijep to haula dambo kikei;
aishanga haoenei Babilonbü to hatkei. Aieilausi Nethaniaeibü shou Ishmaelei Babilonbü Chobaei kaonyeka governor yeitibou Ahikameibü shou Gedalia haitian kikei.
Kheijinei sepai tan leiyeibü pendou Kareaeibü shou Johanan hoba Hoshaiaeibü shou Azaria hoba müt pendou hanbou ka yaangbouthama sühko nyangko loukei.
Hobaje Jeremia thuseibou to laukei, “Küneibü subüjabü ka jungto loutiashi; hoba
kaibü Mühghaüei kün la kün haulabü lamnyu hoba künei kümlabü kümsilei shean lenlabü lele welaukushi.”
Jeremia thuseibouei haoen to laukei, “Ngei kan la ditkua, chühashi, ngei
Kheijinei haoenei Jeremia to laukei, “Laobou ngüh künan
Maisi amaisikei, khei ladang
Chalou anboubü thonnyet
Kheijinei Kareaeibü shou Johanan hoba hao yoa sepai tan leiyeibü pendou hanbou ka yaangboutham sühko ngakei.
Hobaje haoei haoen to laukei, “
‘Kan ho kaodak ka asatko kialonga, kheijinei ngei kan phonan dangetlabü hoba senan akoutilabü; ngei kan kelabü, hoba apheienlabü, aishanga ngei kan to amaibü kümbü shanga ngo ngangda.
Kan hatko kibü Babilonbü Choba to kan ühütlabü dogo
Ngei kan thükto onoulabü hoba no jembü kaodaka kitila ngei ka la sakkulabü.’
“Lausikei kanei, ‘Ho kaodaka kün akilabü,’ dogo laualonga,
hoba, ‘Aying, kün Ijep kaodak to haulabü lanei künei wapyo ühüplabü, ayingsi teklaang ngühlang aditlabü, ayingsi mühei haiko akilabü,’
hoba kün khünei kilabü, dogo laualonga kheijinei kanei
kheijinei kanei hatbü inei khünei kan laphetlabü, hoba mühsinou laobou to kanei hatda, kho Ijep sühko khaplapbo kan phaito semlabü hoba khünei kan hailabü.
Müt pendou aoyouei Ijep to kila haula jembü thenyek sepeida inei, mühei, hoba limsilangei hailabü; amaibü laobou ngei haoen thükto sungbalaje kho ka haoen jouletbü ayingsi lang kibü ayolabü.’
“Aishanga Thükenbou
Aishanga kaneibü
Hobaje tat ho kan la lentikei, lausikei kanei
Tou khei yingsije ho damenashi: Kan kila haumangsühbü kaonyeka kan inei, mühsinouei hoba limsilangei hailabü.”
Hoshaiaeibü shou Azaria hoba Kareaeibü shou Johanan hoba müt pendou hanbou ka yaangbouthama sühko louan Jeremia to laukei, “Nyi amlang laueida,
lausikei Khaldibü ika kün khümbo kula, khei haoenei kün haitila ayingsi kün Babilon to laplangla shanga Neriaeibü shou Barukei no kün khulimbo phokuakei.”
Hibü Kareaeibü shou Johanan hoba sepai tan lajamleibou pendou hoba müt pendouei Jihuda kaodaka kila
Lausikei Kareaeibü shou Johanan hoba sepai tan lajamleibü pendouei Jihudabü jouletbü pendou, hoba phinthon- an kibü kaonyek pendou ae ka Jihuda to kila louan kibü shuong pendou,

khei bousu shuong, yaksa shuong, nashousi shuong, Chobasao shuong hoba mütpem weko aoyou lombü lakjaibü Nebuzaradanei Shafaneibü shi hoba Ahikameibü shou Gedalia yoa apyoan kikei, tokei thuseibü Jeremia hoba Neriaeibü shou Baruk yoan laplangkei.
Haoenei
Kheijinei Tahpanhesa
“Kaibü ika laang yaangbü shuong jungashi, hoba Tahpanhesa Faraoeibü chem to atbü lama Jihudabü pendou thedanga juoklaangei yaübü shema khübü kho huan phoashi.
Hobaje haoen to lenshi, Thükenbou
Nebukhadnezzar loulabü hoba Ijep shian aplabü. Limsilangei shemla tetbü shuong limei hailabü, langsenla tetbü shuong laplanglabü, hoba inei shemla tetbü shuong inei hailabü.

Haoei Ijepbü mühghaü shuong lembü chema wan sapbulabü; hoba haoei haoeneibü lembüchem thekulabü hoba haoeneibü mühghaü shuong langkulabü. Sanlombüei haoeibü neisimei ka hek lapan apbü tegütham, Babilon Chobaei Ijep sakteitham kuan aplabü, hoba hao khüka sangmaia satlabü.
Hobaje Ijep kabü Heliopolis saopobü thaonyu shuong kho haoei leilukulabü, hoba Ijepbüeibü mühghaü lembü- chem shuong kho wanei lonan apbulabü.”
Ijep kaodak Migdola, Tah- panhesa, Memfisa hoba Patros kaopheia kibü Jihudabü pendou shangabü Jeremia jungto loubü ngüh:
Thükenbou

aieilausi haoenei amaibü kümsilei kümbei. Haoenei ayingsi kanei ayingsi kaneibü pisibousiei ongkei ngean akibü mühghaü shuong jungto jen juokla haubü hoba lubü mühghaü shuong to lembü danko ngo maangto shatko khau angtikei.
Tokei ngo khangenbü shuong hoba thuseibü pendou athakko kan jungto hautiko laukei, ‘O, ho mangsenlabü kümsilei ngei mangsenbü ho teküm!’
Lausikei haoenei amaibü ka hoba lubü mühghaü shuong to jen juokbü ka sepeila haoenei ngüha ale, ayingsi nou ühangku.
Khoei ngeibü maangshat hoba ngo khauangbü Jihudabü sangnyu shuong hoba Jerusalem khongnyua yeian jinkukei, hoba ngei wan thekukei. Tat sühko kibü tegü, haoen tekan apbü hoba sangliphang la yeitikei.
“Hobaje tou Thükenbou

Aila kanei kaneibü kümsilei danko Ijep kaodak laonei kan kila loukei khünei lubü mühghaü la jen juokkuko ngo khau angtida? Kanei kan lolo wapan aplabü hoba kan lolo shedsikhau che yeilabü hoba kaodak phang pendou yoa akhainyu che la yeilabü.

Kaneibü pisibousi shuongeibü amaibü kümsilei hoba Jihudabü Choba si Chobasao shuongeibü amaibü kümsilei, hoba kanei si kaneibü yaksi shuongei Jihuda kaodaka hoba Jerusalem khongnyua shonbü amaibü kümsilei kho kanei maasai?
Tat sühkokei haoenei jembü lolo eaaoa ayei. Haoenei kü to soumo hatbü alen, ayingsi ngei kan hoba kaneibü pisibousi shuong thedanga jaletkubü sakkubü si ngühkhüm phai asem.
“Hibü Thükenbou

Jihudabü jouletbü aoyouei Ijep to kila haula thenyek sepeian ki, ngei haoen lelabü. Haoen pendou Ijepa shemlabü; haoen inei tuonglabü ayingsi mühsinouei shemlabü. Hanbou ka yaangbouthama sühko haoen inei hoba mühsinouei hailabü. Haoen phenyemlabü, moklabü shedsikhau che hoba akhainyu che la yeilabü.
Ngei Jerusalema shieikoebü tegütham, ngei haoen Ijepa kibü shuong inei, mühsinouei hoba limsilangei shieikoelabü.
Jouletbü Jihudabü aoyou Ijep kaoa kila louan ki haoen asatenlabü ayingsi ühaiko akilabü. Jihuda kaodak laonei haoen kila ngaila chüheilaje, satetlangbü shisho to liman kan aokei angaienlabü.”

Kheijinei bousu pendou, aoyoueibü yaksi shuongei lubü mühghaü shuong la jen juokbü ponlem lemla kua dogo ngekei, hoba nyangko lobü yaksa shuong pendou, kambü tan yaangbü, hoba Ijep yungthang kaonyeka kibü müt pendouei Jeremia to jongaikei.
“Nyi kün to

Lausikei künei kümlabü dogo laubü pendou künei kümlabü: Künei Mühkabü Chobasao to jen ponlem juoklabü hoba küneibü pisibousi shuongei, küneibü Choba shuongei hoba küneibü konglebü shuongei tegü künei Jihuda sangnyu shuong hoba Jerusalem khongnyu shuonga sao la yunglabü lembü jonkulabü. Aishanga kheijinei küneibü shausiyung souko, hoba naang maian kikei hoba khonsak akitei.
Lausikei Mühkabü Chobasao la jen ponlem juokbü hoba sao la yunglabü lembü yeian jinkubü apyoan phaiaje, kün ajanjan pendouei shaleda, hoba in si mühsinouei shemda.”

Hobaje yaksa shuongei laukei, “Ladang künei Mühkabü Chobasao to jen ponlem juokkei hoba sao la yunglabü lembü yeian jinkukei kho künei sao shanga wentek sao phatbü noksa yoan kümbü hoba sao la yunglabü lembü yeian jinkubü kho küneibü laosi shuongei maangangbü ayoko kümbei sai?”
Kheijinei Jeremiaei müt pendou bousu si yaksa shuong hoba hao la ho jongaibü kubü pendou to laukei,

“Kanei Jihuda sangnyu shuonga hoba Jerusalem khongnyua kan si kaneibü pisibousi shuongei, hoba kaneibü Choba shuong si kaneibü konglebü shuongei, hoba kaonyeka kibü mütshuongei jen ponlem juokbü shangabü kho

ei kanei amaibü kümbü shuong hoba mangsenlabü shuong laobou kanei kümbei kho natenla athük, hibü kaneibü kaodak sangliphang hoba tekan apshang hoba shedsikhau che, müt akiko tat sühko kibü tegü yeitikei.
Aieilausi kanei jen ponlem juokkei hoba
Kheijinei Jeremiaei yaksa shuong yoan müt pendou to laukei, “Kan Ijepa kibü Jihudabü shuong pendouei
Thükenbou
Lausikei
Chühashi, ngei haoen maibü shanga ayingko amaibü shanga sembo kia; khei Jihudabü aoyou Ijep kaodaka ki, haoen pendou in si mühsinouei khümbo shemlabü.

Lausikei in ka satenan Ijep ka Jihuda kaodak to longeibü shuong lühbak shijo ong yinglabü. Kheijinei Ijep to kila loubü jouletbü Jihudabü khümboei haoeneibü ngühsi ngeibü ngüh laobou tükde yingkeije kho ngelabü.
‘Ho kan thedanga tetsida yinglabü,’ dogo

ei hai lauda, ‘Ngei Jihudabü Choba Zedekia, haoeibü langkei lambo kibou haoeibü dangbou Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnezzar ik to kubü tegütham, ngei Ijepbü Choba Hofra haoeibü langkei lambo kibou haoeibü dangbou shuong ik to kuan aplabü.’ ”
Josiaeibü shou Jihudabü Choba Jehoiakim po leiboubüa Jeremia thuseibouei ngüh japtiko Neriaeibü shou Barukei habü ngüh le chenei dokei. Kheijinei Jeremiaei laukei:
, Israel Mühghaüei ka to hai lauda, “O Baruk,
nyi laukei, ‘Ngo ügütü! Aishanga
Kholonga nyi ka shanga kümsilei yaangbü lamda sai? Khübü telam. Aishanga chühashi, ngei khunak shousi pendou thükto amaibü sungbada, dogo
Phangshuong shangabü

Ijep shangabü: Ijep Choba Farao Nekoeibü sepai tan, laobou Garkhemisha Eufrates shumang nyangko kikei, hoba laobou Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnez- zarei Jihudabü Choba Josiaeibü shou Jehoiakim po leiboubüa thükkei, kho khulimbo ngühlang hai ki:
“Kaneibü saolang aih lamleashi,
hoba lason to meimeiashi!
Koli shuong lamleashi, nguian setashi!
kaneibü nameibü khun hanan loashi!
kaneibü aubu shuong samashi,
kan wapyobü hele leashi!”
“Lausikei ngei ai hapda?”
dogo
“Haoen mokde apyoko phaito sukda;
haoeneibü sekbülakbü shuong thüklangtia,
hoba panteiko lina;
haoen hatbümokbüa sepeian achühko satyoda.
Sobüsepbüei satenla athük;
ayingsi sekbülakbüei asatenlabü.
Yungthang ae Eufrates shumang nyangko
haoen phaiyetkei hoba tuongkei.
Nail shumang tegü ongjung longbü,
yungko to sopjung koubü shumang phatbü kho ao?
Nail tegü Ijep ongjung longda,
yungko sühko phongjung koubü shumang phatko.
Ijepei laukei, ‘Ngo longlabü hoba kaodak küpleplabü;
ngei khünei kibü sangnyu si mütshuong mautilabü.
Thungjung lilangashi, O koli shuong!
Khauangko leiashi, O kolia setbü shuong!
Theae hauashi, O sekbülakbü shuong!
Aih thongbü Ethiopiabü si Putbü shuong,
hoba lau jungla sisikbü Lidiabü shuong.’ ”
Ho Thükenbou
ho phoklambü chalou,
khei haoeibü dangbou shuong to phoklamlabü chalou ki.
Senyühashem shongko haoeibü inei suilabü,
hoba deilamang maiko haoeneibü sii jenlabü.
Aishanga tat
yungthang kaodak Eufrates nyangko haitibü lembü kulabü.
Gilead to angashi hoba mailabü moli leashi,
O Saosüngbü Ijep nouyangnyu!
Amlangbüa nyi moli juong lea,
ka shanga mailabü aki.
Phangshuongei kaibü himou shangabü ditakei;
hoba nyi ngekbüei kaonyu nyaka.
Lakbühongbü che lakbühongbü thüka phaiyetda,
hoba ham kao to tuongda.
Ijep kaodak to ngümla Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnez- zar loubü shangabü Jeremia thuseibou to
“Ijep sangnyu dana ngekashi,
hoba Migdola, Memfisa hoba Tahpanhesa phinthonashi;
‘Kan püetla lason kümenashi;
aishanga no kaijembo kibü pendou inei suilabü!
Aila kaneibü lakjaibü Apis mühghaü tuongkei?
Aishanga
Kaibü sepai tan phaiyetkei hoba tuongkei;
hoba che thüka che tuongkei.
Haoenei laulabü, ‘Laksepashi! Sen mütli jungto chem to ngaiakho
hoba dangboueibü in ka satenakho!’
“Khonei haoenei ngeklabü,
‘Ijepbü Choba Farao kho langh lansan yingkei;
haoei jih maibü thetia.’
Ngo, Thükenbou
ngo langkeibü Mühghaü.
Shongh yoka Tabor shongh tonenbü jam
hoba Karmel Shongh tonenan lobü tegütham,
no shila louboueibü hau kheinyu kilabü.
Lang senan küksithang kaoa kila on lamleashi,
O kan Ijepbü shuong!
Aishanga Memfis tekan apshanga kilabü,
hoba müt akiko leilubü che la yeilabü.
Ijep kho yungkük aeka ausep louan takbü
hemaisaomai masu che phatko ki.
Sao mu atko phobü sepai shuongkei
shaula ambü masu ong phatkei.
Haü, haoenkei sepeilabü hoba liko satyolabü;
haoenei loenan alongyolabü,
aishanga haoen shieikoelabü chalou amaibü,
thushed chalou haoen thükto louada.
Pinyu ngühjung satbü phatko Ijepei ngüh longda,
aishanga dangbou shuong lousühda.
Haoen sao khulimbo bu akbü shuong phatko wou jungan loulabü.
Tujung üetenlabü lele shangasikei,
haoenei saoeibü lamang aklabü,
dogo
Aieilausi koksüng shuong tokei haoen
wesikei awekhümbo juongbou ki.
Ijep Nouyangshou himou bautilabü,
yungkük aekabü mütli che la khümbo kuan aplabü.”
Thükenbou
Aoyouei haoeneibü langkei lamda, Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnez- zar hoba haoeneibü songdakbü shuongeibü ik to ngei haoen khümbo kulabü. Lausi dogokei, phaiaje Ijepa shangied tegü müt kilabü, dogo
“Lausikei tehüt, O Jakob, ngo khangenbou,
mokyo hatyoko teki, O Israel.
Aishanga ditashi, saabü kaodak ka ngei no püetlabü,
hoba langsenbü kaodak ka
ka shousi shuong khümenlabü.
Jakob longeilabü hoba sangsembo hopatham kilabü;
hoba aoeikei sao ühüttilabü.
Tehüt, O Jakob, ngo khangenbou,
aishanga ngo ka yoa kia,
dogo
Ngei kan shian hautibü phangshuong khümbo mautiasikei,
ngei no khümboje ashemtilabü.
Ngei ka to haklabü, lausikei ngühmaia ong;
ngei no ashiakoekothamje üpyolabü.”
Faraoei Gaza to angümjinei
“Chühashi, yungkük ka yungsen loukouada
hoba sopbo koubü deilo che yeilabü.
Kaodak hoba khünei shenko kibü pendou haoenei jonleplabü,
sangnyu shuong hoba khonei kibü pendou.
Mütshuongei thuibü khambo ngeklabü;
kaonyeka kibü mütshuong haapyolabü.
Haoeneibü koli shuong youlangh anatko,
haoeneibü kailong shuong nuyoko nongeibü,
haoeneibü kailong you tuongbü langh ditan
bousi shuongei jembü shousi shuong to achühngailabü;
hoba haoeneibü hau thetan hakjung koulabü.
Aieilausi Filistiabü pendou mautilabü chalou louada,
hoba Tair si Sidon ka thuibü joubü pendou wapan aplabü.
Aishanga
Filistia ka jouletbü mautilabü.
Gaza thükto maangmau yaang süha;
Ashkelonbü ngüh alongko apakei.
O jouletbü Filistia shuongei lalokche manghaapla?
‘Ügütü,
Kan lolo mepoua in shoungaiashi,
haksoashi hoba sangsembo kishi!’
Lausikei
kho khei ngüh üangko kienlep lo?
Ashkelon khulimbo hoba yungko khulimbo haoei kho kümakei.”
Moab shangabü Thükenbou
“Nebo shanga ügütü! aieilausi ho leiluakei;
Kiriathim shian apa;
hoeibü lapheishon leilutia,
hoba hakabü mütshuong himou bautia.
Moabbü nyenhang satan apa.
Dangbouei Heshbona lean apa,
hoba Moab phang leilutila huonda.
Madmen sangnyukei litham aplabü;
aishanga lakoubü shuong ho khulimbo haulabü.
Horonaim mütshuongei ngekda,
‘Panglangbü! Lusakbü yaang!’
“Moab lusaka;
nashousi shuong haapyobü ditashi.
Luhit to angbü lamnyua,
haoen khauektham haapyobü ditashi.
Horonaim to koubü lamnyua
haoen khonkua ngekyobü ditashi.
‘Satashi! Kaneibü langkei khümenashi!’
dogo haoenei lauda.
‘Phetsen kaoa yamkabü gadu che phatko laangashi!’
“Moab, nyi kaibü haua si nyaksinama maanglembei,
lausikei tou no mangkei langsenlabü;
hoba kaneibü mühghaü Khemosh,
haoeibü ungshedbou shuong si konglebü shuong yoan laplanglabü.
Sangnyu weko to mautibou loulabü,
hoba sangnyu che ongkei ainletlabü.
Yomang si yaüentok pholi khümbo maulabü,
aishanga ngo
Moab shanga laangkee phokuashi;
aishanga sao tongde maulabü.
Saoeibü sangnyu shuong lusakan aplabü,
hoba khonei aokei akiko sangliphang la yeilabü.”
“Lausikei chühashi, ngei Moab ih tegütham yeian sungla mütshuong hautilabü chalou shuong louada. Haoenei ih takbü jephot shuong kongenlabü hoba khübü kho netla yeiko jangnyinlabü, dogo
Bethel mühghaü to maanglembü shangabü Israel chung himoubü tegütham, Khemosh mühghaü to maanglembü Moabbü himou baulabü.
“Moabbü shuong, ‘Kün lakjaibü hoba wapyoa sonenbü shuong,’
dogo lauko aila nyen leda?
Moab hoba saoeibü sangnyu shuong lusakkua;
haoeibü shanenbü heshou shuong haitikhüma.
Ngo Thükenbou
Moab tuonglabü thushed nyangakei;
hoba sao leilulabü tongde louada.
“Kan sao nyangko kibü shuong
hoba saoeibü nyenhang ngebü phang pendouei mang haapashi.
‘Saoeibü haukiyaangkibü songdak leilua;
saoeibü soneikangbü hoba hau touje aki,’ dogo laushi.
O kan Dibona kibü shuong,
kaibü soneikangbü kaoen ka kayena
hoba kaoa thamngua setashi;
aishanga Moab leilutibou hanei kia
hoba haoei kaibü lapheishon leilutikua.
O kan Aroera kibü shuong,
lamnyu nyangko loashi, hoba chühko kishi;
laangjung satbü shuong ka pheashi,
‘Ai kühshuokkei?’ dogo haoen ka pheshi.
‘Moab tuonga, dogo haoenei jongailabü,
ho shanga haapbuashi; ho himou bautiakei.
Moab maua dogo Arnon Shumanga ngetiashi!’
“Yaüentok sangnyu shuong to matjem lousüha, kho Holon, Jahza hoba Mefaat thükto,
hoba Dibon, Nebo si Beth Diblathaim thükto,
hoba Kiriathaim, Bethgamul si Bethmeon thükto,
hoba Keriot si Bozra thükto. Moab sangnyu shuong saabü si nyangbü pendou thükto matjem loua.
Moabeibü laang wapan apbua; saoeibü hau leilua, dogo
Moab, nyi Israel mütli latetche nyikula lekei damendalao? Nyi haoen soshau soyungbü shuongei lapbü hima jungeikei.
“O kan Moaba kibü shuong, kaneibü sangnyu shuong apyoashi! Hauan laangnyu thüka kishi! Laanglip khüna jembüeibü hap takbü dukutuk phatko kishi.
Moab yonglambü shangabü künei dida! Haoen aeibou lilibü, hao yaangenbü, hao sungenbü, hao yonglamshamle hoba haoeibü maangpona mü awealaubü ki.
Hao maangsak yembü ngei ngekei, hoba hao lilibüei ai haang along, dogo
Khei yingbü ka Moabbü pendou shanga ngo haapda, hoba Kir Heres mütshuong shanga ngo haapda.

Jezer shanga haapbü toje aei ngo ka shanga haapbuda. O Sibma mütshuong, no Haibü Yungnyu danko hoba Jazer onlangko khaübü semlüh buhek phatkei. Lausikei tou kaibü buhek hoba semlüh hek shuong thükto leilubü lousüha.
Moab kaomai kaodak ka olinbü hoba lemselabü sunglanga. Nitshang ka semlühdei koubü ngei thontia; aoeikei olinbüei uihinko angünlabü; khübü kho olinbüei uihinbü aying.
“Heshbon si Elealebü mütshuongei ngekda, hoba haoenei ngekbü ngühlang kho Jahaz sühko, hoba Zoar ka Horonaim si Eglath-Shelishiya sühkoa ditda, aishanga Nimrim shumang dei mangkei ulangtham apa.
Moab mütshuongei haoeneibü lemshang shongha juokbü lembü kubü hoba haoeneibü mühghaü shuong la jen ponlem juokbü thaktikulabü, dogo
“Hibü Moab shanga hoba Kir Heres mütshuong shanga ngeibü maangponei mangap pithungei chia atbü phatko maanghaapda. Haoenei thanshaibü nyaksinam maukhüma.
Aishanga haoen pendouei khu shuan apa, hoba haoeneibü sembung wi kütan apa. haoeneibü ika haüko aktiakei, hoba shenjanga senounei shenakei.
Moabbü chemdak hoba khongnyu pendoua ügütü chia to liman lubü ai aki; aishanga ngei Moab aolakei amaikubü jephot tegü phetnyin- an apa.
Sao latetche leiluan ki! Haoen latetche haapda! Moab latetchei himoua takphai sepeian ki! Moab leilubü thua kia hoba kaijembo kibü pendou shanga sao akhainyu hoba hatlamoklabü che yeian ki.”
Aishanga
Sangnyu shuong hoba lapheishon shuong shian mautilabü. Khünyet chaloua Moabbü lakjaibü shuongeibü maangpon kho nahap shatei sühbü yaksa cheeibü maangpon phatko kilabü.
Moab leilutilabü hoba phang che ayinglabü, aieilausi haoei jembü lolo
Hatlamoklabü, püngkhün, hoba sung ka thedanga kia, O Moab mütli shuong, dogo
Ao mokbü ka satlaje püngkhün to atlabü; ao püngkhün ka khomjung longlaje sunga minlabü. Aishanga haoen shieikoebü poa Moab thükto habü sungbalabü, dogo

Heshbonbü yeme phanga satbümaubü shuong jim akiko loda; aieilausi jih chenei Sihon Chobaei songdakbü sangnyu Heshbon ka wan che anga; kho wanei Moabbüeibü khüngja hoba oyolemenbü shuongeibü khun juokda.
Moab mütshuong ügütü! Khemosh mütli shuong leilua; aieilausi kaibü jayangshou shuong langsena hoba kaibü nouyangshou shuong thüngshang to laplanga.
Khei yingasikei, thonlama ngei Moabbü naangmaitikulabü, dogo
Ammonbü shangabü

Hibü chühashi, ngei Ammoneibü Rabba sangngu khulimbo lason uihintilabü hoba ho leilubü uon che la yeitilabü; hoba kaijembü sangnyu shuong khümbo wanei lonlabü chalou che lousühada. Kheijinei Israelei hao shian sattibü shuong shian aplabü, dogo

Haapashi, O Heshbon! aishanga Ai leilutia! Mang haapashi, O Rabba nouyangshou shuong! Senou nei neiashi hoba mang haapashi! Maang ngouan laang- yoashi. Aishanga Molek haoeibü ungshedbou hoba konglebü shuong yoa langsenlabü.
O maangalanbü nouyangshou, no kaibü kao yomang shanga aila yonglamda? Kaibü hau kouda. ‘Aoei ngo shila,’ dogo lauko aila nyi kaibü hau to maanglemda?
Chühashi, kan kaijembo kibü shuong ka ngei kan thükto hatlamoklabü sungbakulabü, dogo Thükenbou
“Lausikei phaiaje ngei Ammonbü naang maitikulabü, dogo
Edom shangabü Thükenbou
Dedanbü shuong, sepeiashi hoba laangjung satashi! Laangboba huashi! Aieilausi ngei Esau thensilen thükto shieikoe sungbako mautilabü jihsiphai lousüha.
Semlüh hek kheibü shuong ka jungto lousi haoenei semlüh- hek shisho üpyokulep lo? Kokbü shuong nangnak lousi haoenei mangsühbü ong langlep aying lo?

Lausikei ngei Esau mütkong khokletkulabü; hao lolo ahuenlabü lele ngei hao hushang khokan apbulabü. Haoeibü shousi shuong, haoeibü jaisinasi shuong, chem- pen shuong shemlabü hoba hao touje akiko aplabü.
Kaneibü shoujit shuong apyoshi, ngei haoeneibü langkei thounoulabü. Kaneibü latnyu shuongei kü to maang lemtishi.”
Aishanga
Ngei ngo lolo thedalanda, Bozra, hatlamoklabü che, akhainyu che, leilulabü che, hoba shedsikhau che yeilabü; hoba haoeneibü sangnyu shuong pendou ponpen shanga leiluan kilabü, dogo
Aieilausi chüh- ashi, ngei no phang yoa hanbou yeitilabü hoba müt yoa aweasüngtilabü.

Nyi huongbü hatla moklabü si ka maangpon yonglam liliei no khüpettia. O no laanglip boba kibou hoba shonghkhu suokbou kimbou. Nyi kaibü hap auluei tegü suokbüa takasikei, ngei no khüka senyenlabü,” dogo
Sodom si Gomora hoba haosi nyangko kibü sangnyu shuong khüpan apjinei tegü, khünei müt aokei akilabü; khünei khunakshousi aokei athünglabü, dogo

Chühashi, Jordan yamlamang ka nyemsang lamshaushang lambo molosaonyu che loushedbü phatko ngo anglabü, hoba ngei Edom mangde ong haoeneibü kaonyek ka shian sattilabü. Kheijinei ngei ao pienlaje haoei kaonyek thüka songdaklabü. Kü to ao takteiyola? Kü to ao sheiyola? Hobaje ao sanlombouei kü khu limbo lola?
Hibü
Haoen tuongbü langhei kaonyu nyaakeilabü; haoenei ngekbü Saklangbü Yungnyua ditlabü.
Chühashi! aulu kaak pinan seengjung lou- yenbü tegü labou shuong Bozra khulimbo loulabü. Khünyet Edombü sekbülakbü shuongeibü maangpon nabukshatei sühbü yaksa che phatko kilabü.”
Damaska shangabü ngühlang: “Hamat si Arpad mütshuong phenyemyoakei, aishanga haoenei ngühlang amaibü dida. Haoen hatbüei tühnyinda, hoba sangasemenbü yungnyu tegü shoueida.
Damaska hau akiko apa, sao satla sepeikei, hoba panglangbüei sao to sühlangakei; yaksa che nabukshatei sühbü tegütham sao khonku si maangshatei senetakei.
Olinbü hoba nyenshen sangnyu lai nangletan ki!
Hibü saoeibü mütao shuong khongnyua tuonglabü; khünyet lakjaibü shuong pendou mautilabü, dogo Thükenbou
Hobaje Damaska kümthanga ngei wan sapbulabü, hoba khoei Benhadad Chobaeibü lapheishon shuong lonan aplabü.”
Babilon Choba Nebukhadnezzarei sang shian kimbü Kedar si Hazorbü Choba sangnyu shuong shangabü
Haoeneibü neichem si haoeneibü sanshuong lean aplabü; haoeneibü thangtetnei si haoeneibü peisilei khümbo ut yoa haulangkulabü. Mütshuongei haoen to ngeklabü, ‘Pendou aenei hatla moklabü ki!’
“Hali satashi, O kan Hazora kibü shuong! Laangbob haübüa huan apashi, dogo
‘Meimeiashi! Damlabü ai akiko ongayasetham kibü phang che shiakho! Kho sangnyua bakhün ayingsi koukhin aki hoba mütshuong helelea ki.’

“Haoeneibü ut shuong soletbü peisilei yeilabü, haoeneibü masu shuong konga jimlabü! Khulou tuibang kipbü shuong ngei yeia pendou aenei soulangtilabü, hoba pendou aeka ngei haoen jungto thushed loutikulabü, dogo
Hazor ponpen shanga selong thüngshang leilubü kaoen che yeitilabü. Khünei müt aokei nyibou akingailabü.”
Jihudabü Choba Zedekia songdak khangbüa
Thükenbou
hoba müh kaophei lei ka ngei Elam thükto yei den lei sungbalabü; hoba ngei haoen khübü yei den lei pendou aeto aatilabü, hoba Elambü langsenbü to ohaubü phang che ongkei akiteilabü.

Haoeneibü dangbou thedanga hoba aoyouei haoeneibü langkei lamda haoen thedanga ngei Elam moktilabü. Ngeibü kaangbüsekbü khauang longbüa ngei Elambü thükto leilubü sungbalabü, hoba ngei haoen khümbomeiko ashemti shongko ngei haoen khulimbo lakoubü shuong hautilabü, dogo
Hobaje ngei Elambüeibü Choba shuong hoba konglebü shuong mautilabü hoba khünei ngeibü Choba setshang huongenlabü, dogo
Lausikei phailama ngei Elambüeibü thu nyibou naang maitilabü,” dogo
Babilon shangabü hoba Khaldi kaodak shangabü thuseibou Jeremia danko joyobü ngüh:
“Phang shuong la ngetiashi! Ho phinthonashi!
Shensinge phoashi hoba phinthonashi!
Kho huan tepho!
Babilon shian apa!
Bel himou baua;
saoeibü mühghaü Marduk phenyemakei;
Saoeibü heangsho shuong netlaphoula yeia!
“Yungkük aeka sao khulimbo louan shilabü hoba saoeibü kaodak sangliphang la yeitilabü. Khonei ao akilabü; müt si meisiau ham laangjung satkhümlabü.”
haoeneibü thenyek Zion aeto sepeian khüto haulabü lamnyu pheko laulabü. Haoen louan

“Ngeibü mütli shuong maubü san la leko, haoeneibü sanlombü shuongei haoen ayinglamto aatibü hoba shongh aeto lintibü sanshuong phatkei. Haoen shonghnyu hoba shonghshoua shoong- aikei hoba haoeneibü kishang maan apbei.
Haoen hapbü pendouei haoen taketkei; hoba haoeneibü dangbou shuongei laukei, ‘Kün shedbü aying, aishanga haoenei haoeneibü
“Israelbü shuong, Babilon ka satashi! Khaldi kaodak apyoashi! Sanshuong leibou lonpaang tegü kishi.

Aishanga chühashi, yungkük kaodak aeka ngei phangshuong tan yaangbü Babilon khulimbo huishaiko leibada. Haoenei sao khulimbo haoen lolo lason lolabü, hoba yungkük aeka sao shian aplabü. Haoeneibü lau kho ik kong alongeibü sonenbü meikipbü che phatko ki.
Khaldi shilabü, sao shibü pendou senyüh shemlabü, dogo
lausikei kaneibü nyu kaang himoulabü; hoba no bukbü sao himou baulabü. Ditashi, Babilon kho phangshuong yoa pendou to manseibou, kaolin hoba sangliphang kho sao yinglabü.
Aishanga
“Kan lolo Babilon khulimbo limchühko kaijembo loashi. Kan lau jungbü pendouei sao to kipashi, laujin tejouti, aieilausi saoei
Sangnyu kaijembo lapang uihinashi! Touje Babilonei litian apa, saoeibü lapheishon tuonga, saoeibü kümthang shuong noptheda. Aishanga ho
Babilon ka youli wenbou kho hoba youlat jiha langku jungbü shuong wapan apashi. Shieikoebü in to hatbü ka mütpem weko jembü mütli jungto sepeilabü hoba mütpem weko jembü kaodak to ngailabü.”
Hibü Thükenbou

Ngei Israel nyibou saoeibü lamshaushang to leian loulabü, hoba saoei Garmel shongh si Bashan kao- pheia lamshaulabü; hoba Efraim si Gilead shongh kaopheia yembü kesiongei saoeibü maangdak senyüh shemlabü.
Khübü chaloua hoba kho jihsiphaia, Israeleibü shedbü lamlabü lausikei aikei akilabü, hoba Jihudaeibü shabü lamlabü, lausikei aikei ühüplabü; aishanga ngei apyobü jouletbü shuong la ngei ap kulabü.”
Kaonyua lason ngühlang kia, hoba leilubü yaang!
Kaodak khümbo ngümnyinbou lai netla yeitian ki! Phangshuong yoa Babilon lai hatla moklabü che leiluan ki!
O Babilon, ngei ka la sung sankukei hoba nyi kho alapentoua no khonei minkei; aieilausi nyi
ei haoeibü insiaubu phoshang ipbei hoba haoeibü maangshat insiaubu sungenkei; aishanga Khaldibü kaodaka Thükenbou
Kaonyek lei weko ka sao khulimbo kaiya. Saoeibü bung shuong khoknyinashi; sao youshou thanan phobü phatko shomentiashi! Sao khümbomeiko mautiashi hoba sao la ai tejouti!
Saoeibü masu pongsu pendou haitiashi; haoen haitishang to hautiashi! Haoen shanga ügütü! Aishanga haoen shieikoelabü chalou jihsi- phai lousüha!”
(Ditashi, satetlangbü shuong Babilon ka Zion to loua, hoba haoenei Babilonbüei haoeibü Lembüchem khulimbo kümbü shanga seneibü

“Babilon khulimbo lau jungbü pendou huishaiashi. Sao kaijembo louan thoashi; aokei tesatenti. Saoeibü kümsilei thüng sao la ngaitikuashi; saoei kümbü pendou thüng sao to jungeishi. Aishanga saoei Israel Saopobou
Hibü saoeibü heshou shuong khongjia tuonglabü; hoba saoeibü sepai shuong pendou khünyet shemtilabü, dogo
“Chühashi, ngo kakhu limbo kia, O lilinyu Babilon; aishanga ngei no shieikoelabü jihsiphai lousüha, dogo Thükenbou
Lilinyu kho sao phonla ao akiko phaiyetlabü hoba tuonglabü; saoeibü sangnyu kaijembo kibü shuonga ngei wan sapbulabü hoba khoei sao kaijembo kibü pendou lonlabü.”
Thükenbou
Lausikei haoen Angthetbou to hau kia; haoeibü nyen kho Thükenbou
“Khaldibü thükto haibümaubü!
Babilona kibü shuong thükto haibümaubü,
hoba haoeibü songdakbü shuong si
haoeibü songbüdobü mütshuong thükto in che!
Amlangbü thuseibü shuong thükto in che,
haoen ngoubüla yeitilabü!
Sekbülakbü shuong thükto in che,
hoba haoen mautila in che!
Saoeibü koli si kailong shuong leilutiashi!
Haoen yoa küksithang sepai tan thükto in che,
haoen yaksa yeitilabü.
Saoeibü nyaksinam thanshang khulimbo in che!
Khübü kho solanglabü.
Saoeibü dei thükto shulin yunglin che,
haoen ulangtham yeilabü.
Aishanga ho heangsho juong kibü kaodak che ki,
hoba lembüsabü heangsho thüka langet angko kia.
“Hibü yamkabü meisiau shuong hoba selong shuong Babilona kilabü, hoba ostrik shuong khünei thünglabü. Touje hao to ladangkei müt akilabü, ayingsi meten meten ao akilabü.
Mühghaüei Sodom si Gomora hoba haoen nyangkobü sangnyu shuong khüpan apbü tegütham khei ao akilabü hoba khunakshousi aokei athünglabü, dogo
“Chühashi, yungkük aeka mütli che louada,
hau kibü hoba saabü kabü phangyaang;
hoba Choba juongnyu lason shanga huishaiakei.
Haoenei lau hoba insiaubu hatlepakei;
haoen to phokei hoba üeisanou aki.
Haoeneibü ngühlang kho yungnyu ngühbü phatkei,
haoen koli thüka setda.
Lason shanga haoen bousu che tegü kakhu limbo lamleakei,
O Babilon Nouyangshou!
Babilonbü Chobaei haoen shangabü ngühlang ditkei,
hoba haoeibü ik nyibutham apbei.
Yaksa na hapla khonkubü phatko
hao to khonkuei sühkei.

“Chühashi, Jordan lamang ka nyemsang san lambo molosaonyu che loushadbü phatko ngo anglabü, hoba ngei Babilon mangde ong haoeneibü kaonyek ka shian sattilabü. Kheijinei ngei ao pienlaje haoei kaonyek thüka songdaklabü. Kü to ao takteiyola? Kü to ao sheiyola? Hobaje ao sanlombouei kü khu limbo lola?
Hibü
Babilon shian apbü langhei kaonyu nyaakeilabü; haoenei ngekbü Saklangbü Yungnyua ditlabü.”
Hobaje ngei küksithang shuong Babilon khulimbo saoeibü kaonyek sipan apla hautilabü; hoba kho maubü thu lousühnyet jiji pendou aeka haoenei sao shilabü hoba aikei üpyolabü.
Lau jungbü shuong la jembü lau tebühti, ayingsi haoeibü nameibü hele teleti. Saoeibü heshou shuong jouan tephoku; saoeibü sepai tan lemailela shemtishi.
Babilona haoen leiluan tuonglabü hoba saoeibü sangnyu khonga haian yeplabü.
Aishanga Israel Saopobou thedanga haoeneibü kaonyu shedbüei shenan kiasikei, Israel si Jihuda, Thükenbou
Babilon ka satashi! Kaneibü langkei khümenla langashi! Saoeibü shabü laüa kan temauma. Ho
eibü ika Babilon kho kaodak pendou jaaktibü honeibü thung che phatko kikei. Phangshuongei saoeibü ih yungkei, hibü phangshuong langet angda.
Babilon hakde tuongkei hoba leilua! Sao shanga manghaapashi! Saoeibü moukhün mailabü moli leashi; aingenyu sao mailakei thükkei.

Khünei kibü küksithang shuongei laukei, ‘Künei sao maitimang sühkei, lausikei sao amaitien. Senei sao apyoakho, hoba jembü kaodak to ngaiakho. Mühghaüei haoeibü hau pendouei Babilon shieikoea, aishanga saoeibü leilubü matjemei müh süha.’ ”
“Laujin shuong simashi! Aih shuong jungashi!
Babilonbü laang ba naklepbo shensinge che phoashi! Lombüshuong hau kingaitiashi, lapheibü phoashi, latho kümashi!”
O kan dei juong nyangko kibü hoba nyaksinama keibü shuong, kaibü thonbü süha, kaibü langkei lüh thettia.
Thükenbou
haoeibü songsihonei haoei kaodak yaükei
hoba haoeibü ditenbüei müh pintikei.
Hao ngühkhümei mühkabü dei shuong ngühda;
hoba haoei kaodak ji thon ka sangmei sungbada.
Lang shanga haoei langpon pontida
hoba haoeibü thanshang ka yei loutida.
Mütpem weko ngoubü hoba hapsinge songsido aki;
namyaübü weko jembüeibü heangshoei himou bautida,
aieilausi haoeibü mühghaü shuong kho amlangbü ki,
hoba haoen to langkei hak aki.
Haoen jim aki, nyikulabü peisilei che;
haoeneibü kayang chaloua haoen maulabü.
Ao Jakob Mühghaü ki haoje khübü tegü aying,
aishanga ajanjan pendou Kümbou kho hao ki,
hoba Israel kho haoeibü phetphanbü phang la lela piena.
Haoeibü nyen kho Thükenbou
“Babilon, no ngeibü bungümjin hoba wapyobü insiaubu ki.
Ka yoa phangshuong netla yeiko jangnyinla,
sangle shuong netla yeiko mautila,
koli si hao thüka setbü shuong netla yeitila,
koli kailong si leibü shuong netla yeitila,
bousu si yaksa netla yeitila,
baushi si mütao haitila,
lombüshuong si haoeibü sanshuong haitila,
sekmoubü shuong si haoeneibü sekshapbü masu haitila,
governor shuong si yaangenbü shuong netla yeitila ngei no jungeikei.”
Chühashi, Babilon, no kaodak khümbo mautibou shonghnyu che phatko ki; lausikei ngo
Ka ka chemnyek shanga laang hoba chemshang shanga laang aikei asunglabü, aishanga no ponpen shanga sangliphang che kilabü, dogo

“Kaonyua shensinge che tonenashi! Phangshuong yoa teklaang metashi! Sao khulimbo lason wapyola phangshuong lamleashi; sao khulimbo habü sangnyu shuong tensepashi: Ararat, Mini hoba Ashkenaz. Sao shila lajamleibü che pienashi. Koksüng tan phatko koli shuong lamleashi.
Babilon khulimbo phangshuong wapyola lamleashi. Mediabü Choba shuong si haoeneibü governor shuong hoba songdakbü shuong; hoba haoeneibü songdak sangle phangkabü kaonyek shuong pendou lamleashi.
Kaodak lühda, hoba nyaakda, aishanga Babilon kaodaka müt aokei akiko sangliphang la yeitilabü lele
Babilonbü sekbülakbü shuong wapyobü nanga; haoen lulueibü lapheishona kia. Haoen maang ayaangenko apa; haoen yaksa tegü yeia. Saoeibü sangnyu bakhün thangtet leilua hoba saoeibü chemsibunga wan anga.
Babilonbü Choba to, sangnyu jiji pendou aenei lean apa dogo lenla lapang ngühlang künan cheei che to haüyoko laangyoda.
Shumang danshang phaishang dangbouei sunga hoba lapheishona wanei lona, hoba sepai shuong panglangyoda.
Aishanga Thükenbou
Babilon Choba Nebukhadnezzarei Jerusalem suia,
hoba haoei ngo shauan apa.
Haoei sangnyu kho ilechak tegü kongenbü la yeitia;
haoei dragon cheei tegü suian apa.
Haoei jembüei mühbü tegü shaua,
hoba haoei joubü ngaitian apbei.
Zion mütshuongei hai laushi,
“Kün to amaiko ik shatbü shanga
Babilonbü thükto yingshi!”
Jerusalem mütshuongei hai laushi,
“Kün khonkutibü shanga
küneibü sii Khaldibü shuong thükto yingshi!”
Hibü,
Hobaje Babilon leilubü laangshaang selong shuong thüngshang che yeilabü. Ho müt akibü mokde apyolabü hoba akhainyu kaoen che kilabü.
Babilonbü shuong pendou molosaonyu tegü ngühyoda hoba molosaonyu shoushou tegü haoen wiyoda.
Haoen sei longbü jiha ngei haoen la lem che lamlekulabü hoba haoen haian üpshongko haoen jaakan yeptilabü hoba ladangkei alakseptilabü.
Ngei haoen haitishang to leian haubü sanlon shoushou, lon hoba sanlon paang phatko leian yanlabü, dogo
Babilonbü thükto yungnyu nguiakei hoba kho deinyu yungsen ngühbüei sao küplepan ki.
Saoeibü sangnyu shuong hatla moklabü che ki, uangmuang hoba sangliphang kaodak che la yeiakei, aokei akibü kaodak, müteibü shou adanbü kaodak che yeian ki.
Hobaje ngei Babilona Bel shieikoelabü hoba haoei ai suikei kho haoeibü sanglou ka sungenlabü. Touje phangshuong hao jungto yangjung ohaulabü.
“Babilonbü kümthang tuongakei.
Ngeibü mütli shuong, hao ka longashi! Kaneibü langkei khümenla laangashi!

Ladang kaonyua ngühphakphak ditlaje kheijinei kaneibü maangpon tekou ayingsi hatko teki; toupo ngühphakphak che hoba ngiempo ngühphakphak che dogo songdakbü cheei songdakbü che khulimbo kaonyua leilubü kilabü.
Hibü chühashi, ngei Babiloneibü heangsho shuong shieikoelabü jihsiphai louada; saoeibü kaonyu khümbo himou baulabü hoba saoeibü tuongbü mangjimei shenlabü.
Kheijinei müh si kao hoba haoen to kibü pendouei Babilon thükto olinbüei ngeklabü, aishanga yungkük ka mautibü shuong louan sao shilabü, dogo
Kaodak pendou haitibü haangjung Babilon tuongbü tegü, Israel haitibü hangshong Babilon tuongjan.”
Kanei lauda, ‘Kün himou bautia, aishanga künei hakbü dida; himouei küneibü thenyek küplepbua, aieilausi küksithangei
Hibü chühashi,
Babilon müha jakko angasikei, hoba saoeibü kaangbüsekbü lapheishon sheasikei ngei sao khulimbo mautibü shuong hautikulabü, dogo
“Ditashi, Babilon ka lemenbü!
Khaldibü kaodak ka maubü yaang longbü ngühlang!
Haoei saoeibü lemen langh thaktikuda.
Sepai tan dei juong ngühbü langh phatko louada,
hoba phangyoko sao shilabü.
Haoen Babilonbü khulimbo louakei;
saoeibü sekbülakbü shuong lean apa,
hoba haoeneibü lau netla yeia.
Aishanga
haoei Babilon la saoei mubü kungailabü.
Saoeibü leiyeibü shuong, songbüdobü shuong,
governor shuong, saoeibü lajamleibü shuong
hoba saoeibü lakjaibü shuong jaaktilabü.
Hobaje haoen ladangkei alaksepbo yeptilabü, dogo
Choba, aoeibü nyen Thükenbou
Babilonbüeibü kaangbüsekbü kümthang kao hima yeitilabü,
hoba saoeibü suokbü bakhün shuong wanei lonlabü.
phangshuongeibü kümsilei kho jim akibü;
haoen thungyobü kho wanlüh shanga ong ki.”

Zedekia Chobaeibü ikjaibou Seraia kho Neriaeibü shou hoba Maseiaeibü shi kiteikei. Jihuda Choba Zedekia songdak po leiboubüa Seraia hao yoa Babilon to hauko kikei hoba Jeremiaei hao la ho ngühlang kukei.
Babilonbü to habü amaibü pendou loushedla doan kibü khübü ngüh shuong pendou Babilon shangabü Jeremiaei le chenei dokei.
Hobaje Jeremiaei Seraia to laukei, “Ladang no Babilon to atlaje nyi habü ngüh pendou kaangko weashi.
Hobaje welau- ashi, ‘O
Ladang nyi ho le wekhümlaje khünei laang che khühashi, hoba Eufrates Shumang to tekan attishi.
Hobaje lauashi, ‘Babilon to hai haüthüklabü, aieilausi
Jeremiaeibü ngühshuong hanei thonda.
Zedekia Choba yeijinei hao salangbü po saoto che kikei hoba Jerusalema haoei po anthük che songdakkei. Hao nyu kho Libnabü Jeremiaeibü nouyangshou Hamutal nyenbü kikei.
Hobaje Zedekiaei Jehoiakimei kümbü tegü
Maimaitham
Hobaje Zedekiaei Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnezzar khulimbo meimeikei.

Hobaje haoei songdakbü po gü boubü lit anboubü chalou anbounyet Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnezzar haoeibü sepai tan pendou yoa Jerusalem khulimbo loukei, hoba haoenei kho komlepbei hoba kho kaijembo lapheishon shekei.
Kho tegü sangnyu kho Zedekia Choba po anthükche boubü sühko komle- pan kikei.
Lit leiboubü chalou gü boubüa sangnyu khünei mühsinou aeibou kaangan yeisi kaonyeka mütshuong shanga shausiyung akitei.

Kheijinei sangnyu ba kho panyetkei hoba wapyobü mütshuong pendou linkei. Khaldibü shuongei sangnyu pendou kaian kiasikei haoen nangnak sangnyu kümthang penyi kaanglanga bakhün che to Chobaeibü bamang nyangko angan shetlangkei. Hobaje haoen Araba aeto satkei.
Lausikei Khaldibü sepai tanei Choba shijung haukei hoba Jerikho pholia Choba kho laphetkei hoba haoeibü sepai tan pendouei hao apyoan linkei.
Kheijinei haoenei Choba kho lapbei, hoba Hamath kaodak Reblaa Babilonbü Choba jungto hao leibakei, hoba hao thükto haoei matjem kukei.
Babilonbü Chobaei Zedekiaeibü shousi shuong hao thea haitikei hoba tokei Reblaa leiyeibü shuong pendou haitikei.
Haoei Zedekiaeibü nyek phekan apbukei, hoba hao namlühei khühkei, hoba Babilonbü Chobaei hao Babilon to leian haukei hoba hao ühai shongko thüngdanga phokei.
Lit ngaoboubü chalou anbounyeta Babilon Choba Nebukhadnezzar songdak po anthükgü boubüa, Nebuzaradan, Babilon Choba lombü yoa lajamleibou Jerusalem to atkei.
Hobaje haoei
Hobaje Khaldibü sepai tanei, aoyou Choba lombü lajamleibou tan yoa kikei, Jerusalem kaijembo ba pendou lusaktikukei.

Hobaje Choba lombü lajamleibou Nebu- zaradan mütli yoa shaleboutham hoba sangnyua apyoan kibü shuong hoba ikküm ikleia libünyenbü shuong yo ka nangletbü shuong hoba aoyouei Babilon Choba jungto letjung haukei haoen dan Babilonbü Choba jungto lapjung haukei.
Lausikei Choba lombü lajamleibü Nebuzaradanei kaonyeka kaang shalebü shuong atje semlüh sek moutila hoba sek latla shanga apyokei.
Hobaje
Hobaje haoenei nyakchak, tap suokjin, hoba namphet kipan aplabü shuong hoba sii laklabü phauyaang shuong hoba jen juoklabü phau shuong hoba Lembü- chem kümsileia jungeibü chisaknam phau,

hoba tokei chandinamei yaübü phau hanbü shuong hoba wankak suokjin phau, hoba sii laklabü phauyaang shuong hoba chak shuong hoba wanthung denshang shuong hoba yunglabü lembü kulabü phau, khübü peisilei khümbo Chobaeibü lombou lajamleibouei künlangkei.
Thaonyu penyi kabü chisaknamei yaübü kailong, yungnyu yaangbou, yungnyu phanga kibü masu pongsu anthüknyi hoba kho juetla kümbü denshang shuong, laobou Solomon Chobaei
Thaonyu kho suokla iknop anthükset bang kikei, kaijembo iknop anthüknyi bang; hoba kho shangla ikpit lei bang hoba kho maang kuokan kikei.

Khonei chisaknam thaonyu sembung yeman kikei; thaonyu sembung che kho iknop ngao suokbü kikei, hoba thaonyu sembung kaijembo chilangei pepyobü küman chinamei yaüan kikei; hoba nyiboubü thaonyu khokei, kho tegütham ong chilangei küman kikei.
Thükaenei chilang hek pendouei saongao bang kikei hoba khüka anjinngaoto lak khoje kao ka hapbo kikei.
Hobaje Choba lombü lajamleibou Nebuzaradanei thükkabou ungshedbou Seraia, hoba thenkabou ungshedbou Zefania, hoba koukhün lombü müt sem laplangkei.

Hobaje sangnyu ka haoei wapyobü mütshuong leiyeibü che, hoba sangnyu ka asatko kiteibü Chobaeibü meitangbou müt nyet lapbei, hoba sepai tan thüka lajamleibou thenkabou hoba kaonyeka mütli huishaian phobou, hoba sangnyua hapbü kaonyek kabü mütli shuong yokabü müt saosem lapbei.
Hobaje lombü thüka lajamleibou Nebuzaradanei haoen lapbei hoba haoen Reblaa Babilon Choba jungto sungbakei.
Hobaje Babilonbü Chobaei haoen to ngümbei hoba Hamath kaonyek Reblaa haoen haitikei. Kho tegü Jihudabü jembü kaodak ka langsenkei.
Nebukhadnez- zarei lapjung haubü lühbak ho ki: po nyet boubüa Jihudabü hajar sem to saoto sem.
Nebukhadnezzar po anthükset boubüa haoei Jerusalem ka müt saongao setto khujinto nyi.
Po saoto semboubüa Choba lombü lajamleibou Nebuzaradanei Jihudabü saongao nyetto saonyito ngao. Müt pendouei hajar leito saongao lak kikei.

Jihudabü Choba Jehoiakhin laplangbü po khujinto nyet boubüa, lit anthüknyi boubüa, hoba chalou saoto ngaobounyet, Evil-Merodakh Babilon Choba yeibü poa Jihudabü Choba Jehoiakhin to onou lenkei hoba thüngshang ka sungenkei.
Hobaje haoei hao to huphanga joyokei, hoba Babilona hao yoa kibü Choba shuong setshang thüka thükkabou younak che hao la kukei.
Hibü Jehoiakhinei haoei thüngshanga lebü neisimei hangletkei; hoba salang sünga chalou angboua Chobaeibü khümsoka shaukei yungkei.
Haoeibü munam shanga hao hainyet sühko haoeibü salang sünga hao chalou angbou khambü thüng Chobaei hao la ponpen thuibü kukei.
Ügütü, jih chenei mütei
shenetnyu kibü sangnyu,
kho laibü jembünyu ong setan ki!
Phangshuong yoa sao yaangenan kibü
kho ailaibü latnyu che la yeian ki!
Sangnyu shuong yoa chobasao che kibü kho
tou sambüyaübü che la yeiakei.
Nangnak sao khaukei kauko haapda;
saoeibü omlanga nyeksi kouda.
Sao to sanoubü shuong yoa sao maangsulaje ao aki.
Saoeibü thangbou shuong pendouei sao khüpettiko jungeida;
haoen saoeibü dangbou shuong yeia.
Khonkutibü haangjung hoba aaola leko kümtileitibü haangjung,
Jihudabü laplanga.
Sao songalebü shuong yoa kida,
hoba saoei hakso ühüpda;
sao shieikoebü pendouei sao kailepan
sao satla amaiko kipan kibü thua laphetakei.
Zion lamnyu shuongei mang haapda;
aieilausi saopobü lem to aokei alouda.
Saoeibü bakhün litham apa,
saoeibü ungshedbou shuongei ngühyoda,
saoeibü medei shuong khonkuda,
hoba saokei khonsakko kia.
Saoeibü yenbou shuong thükkabou la yeia,
saoeibü dangbou shuong naangmaida.
Aishanga saoei ngühkhüm juong leilubü shanga,
Saoeibü shousi shuong yenbou shuong jungto
thüngshang to haua.
Hobaje Zion Nouyangshou ka,
sao hemaisaomai pendou banga.
Saoeibü chobaeibü shousi shuong
lamshaushang ühüpbü meishi tegü yeia;
hoba meishibü thedanga sateibü tegü haoen semthetnyu apa.
Sao khonkubü hoba maangshatbü chaloua shangieda
sao shangabü namsek peisilei pendou Jerusalemei damenda;
hoba ladang saoeibü mütli shuong yenboueibü ik to atkei,
kheijinei aoeikei sao to athui.
Kheijinei yenbou shuong hapbei,
hoba haoenei sao tuongbü to nyikukei.
Jerusalemei shed yaang shonkei,
hibü sao shabü peisilei tegü yeikei;
sao hangenbü shuong pendouei sao aweasüngda.
Aieilausi haoenei sao mütkongbü thu hapbei;
haü, sao sao lolo ngühda,
hoba saoeibü thenyek phai yeida.
Sao asaopobü kho saoeibü ikseta kikei;
saoei saoeibü loulabü thu daman achüh.
Hibü sao maangkeipangko atetkei,
sao maangsulabü aki.
O
aishanga dangbouei lulu lolo thük lea.
Namsek peisilei pendou thüka yenbouei ik tuoka;
Aishanga songalebü shuong saoposhang to atbü saoei hapbei.
Aoyou shanga nyi kaibü kamshang to haoen alotla
ngühkhüm kuan kikei.
Saoeibü mütli pendou ngühda,
haoen lang kila shanga haoen shausiyung lamla hauda;
“Chühashi, O
aishanga ngo aweasüngko apa.”
Nyangko nongeibü kan pendou, kan theaje ho ai aying lo?
“Chühashi, hao khauang lotbü chaloua
kü to sühbü ngeibü maangshat tegü,
maangshat at ongkei kiasi aki chühan chühashi.
“Müh ka haoei ngeibü lomaang to wan jinkukei,
hobaje khoei haoen thükda.
Haoei ngeibü you shanga tin sankukei,
haoei ngo sepeinyu ngaitikei;
haoei ngo chaseko sangliphanga semthetnyu apyokei.
“Ngeibü ngühkhüm lulimbü shabü buleng pendou,
haoeibü ikei khühyoakei.
Khübü kho ngeibü ngüma yakkuakei;
haoei ngo hau akiko aptikei.
hoba haoen khulimbo ngo aloenda.
“Ngeibü hau kibü müt pendou kü thea kongkong yeitikei;
ngeibü heshou shuong janyinla shanga ngo khulimbo
haoei tan huishaikei.
Jihudabü Saosüngbü Nouyangshou kho amshanga semlüh tegü
“Khübü shanga ngo haapda;
ngeibü nyek ka nyeksi kouda.
Aieilausi ngeibü soushou haan khangetko solotibü kho
kü ka lounyu bangan kia;
ngeibü shousi shuong litham kia
aieilausi dangbouei thüka.
“Zionei saoeibü ik shinga, sao solotila ao aki;
Jakob shanga khei hao kaijembo kibü shuong kho
hao khulimbo ong yeilabü dogo
Hobaje haoen yoa Jerusalem asaopobü peisilei che tegütham ki.
aishanga ngei haoeibü ngühkhüm khulimbo kümbei;
ditshima, kan mütli pendou hoba ngeibü maangshat chühshi;
ngeibü medei shuong hoba ngeibü heshou shuong laplanga.
“Ngei kü to sanoubü shuong ngakei,
lausikei haoenei ngo khüpettikei.
Ngei ungshedbou shuong hoba ngeibü jaishou shuong
soushou haksola shausiyung lamjinei sangnyua haoen maukei.
“Chühashi, O
ngeibü soushou lemenda, ngeibü soushou panglangda;
aishanga ngei aeibou lulima;
khonga in lepda chemaje haibü tegü kia.
“Haoenei ngo ngühko wibü ditkei,
ngo haksotilabüje ao aki.
Ngeibü dangbou pendouei ngeibü khonku khonsak ditkei;
nyi ho kümbüa haoen olinda.
Nyi huiletbü chalou kho nyi loutilabü,
hoba haoen no phatko kilabü.
“Haoen amaibü pendou ka jungto loutishi,
hoba ngei ngühkhüm lulimbü shanga kü to kümbü tegü,
haoen to kümshima aishanga ngeibü shedti mashikbü juong
hoba ngeibü maangshema.”
Ügütü,
Zion Nouyangshou küplepbei.
Müh ka kao sühko haoei Israel hemaisaomai yantikei.
Hao khauang longbü chaloua haoei haoeibü lembüchem adamen.
Jakob kishang pendou
hao khauangbüei Jihudabü Nouyangshoueibü
lapheishon shuong tuongtia.
Kao sühko sangle hoba haoeibü songdakbü shuong
himou to yantia.
Haoeibü khauangei Israelbüeibü hau yaangbü
pendou haoei wapan attia.
Dangbou shuong thedanga haoei jembü mae ik haoen ka sungngaia.
Longan kibü wan tegü Jakob lonshema,
kaijembo kibü pendou haoei lonshemtia.
Dangbou cheei tegü haoei haoeibü lau bühkei,
hao haoeibü mae ik lamlean loakei.
Haoeibü nyekei maikubü pendou haitia;
Zion Nouyangshoueibü neichem to haoei haoeibü
khauang yeian jinkukei.
haoei chobasaoeibü chem pendou leilukua;
haoei saoeibü lapheishon shuong netla yeitikua.
Hobaje Jihudabü Nouyangshou shuong la
haoei manghaapbü hoba waangbü aei yeitia.
Bamanga haoeibü chemshou phatko kibü
lembüchem kho haoei pana;
haoei haoeibü lemshang kaoen leilua.
Ziona lemlishang hoba Nounyet lemshang
Hobaje hao hatlamoklabü khauang longbüa choba si ungshedbou
shuong nyikula yeia.
haoei haoeibü saoposhang inleda.
Saoeibü kümthang shuong haoei dangboueibü ik to kuan apa;
lemenbü ngühlang longan kikei.
Zion Nouyangshoueibü kümthang kho leilukulabü;
leilutila kibü ka haoeibü ik asenngai.
Lapheishon maang hoba kümthangei mang haaplabü lele
haoei yeitikei hoba haoen liko hau thetkei.
Saoeibü bakhün kaomangto atda,
haoei saoeibü koukhin mautikukei hoba leilutikua;
saoeibü choba leiyeibü shuong kho ngühkhüm
akibü shuong phang yoa kia;
haü, saoeibü thuseibü shuongei
mangsang ühüpda.
Zion Nouyangshou noushou shuong kaoa setda;
hoba haoen ngüh üangko kia.
Haoenei haoeneibü khua tap phinan jinakei
haoen haoen lolo shembe lokakei;
Jerusalembü medei shuongei himoubüei haoeneibü
thenyek küplepakei.
Ngeibü nyeka nyeksi dangda,
ngeibü maangpon jitnyina.
Ngeibü mütli nouyangshou leilubü shanga
ngeibü maangpon kao to atakei;
aieilausi hanbü shuong hoba senyopbü shuong
sangnyua semthetan kia.
Leilubü müt tegü sangnyu khongnyua haoen semthetnyu kijinei;
haoeneibü langkei haoeneibü khukua nongan kijinei
nyusi shuong to haoenei lauda, “Nyak si ih lanei ki?”
O Jerusalem Nouyangshou, ka shanga ngei ai laula,
no ai to takteiyola?
O Zion Saosüngnyu, no solotila ngei no ai to takteiyola?
aishanga yungnyu tegü no leilubü yaang kia,
no aoei maitienla?
Kaibü thuseibü shuongei ka shanga kongbü
hoba leilubü mangsang hapa;
kaibü thu kümetlabü lele haoenei kaibü shedshonbü
tang akhittiku lausikei ka shanga kongbü
hoba ayingbü onat ong hapa.
Lama paibü pendouei ka la ik ipbuda;
Jerusalembü Nouyangshou to haoenei hish dogo khu ngombukei,
hoba lauda, “Chühseko hesisao maibü,
hoba kaodak pendou olinshang sangnyu dogo mütei laueibü
sangnyu kho ho si?”
Kaibü dangbou pendouei no khulimbo nyikuda;
haoenei hish dogo hauh takyoda hoba haoenei lauda,
“Künei sao suia,
ho künei chüheibü chalou kho ki;
ho küneibü, ho künei hapa.”
shangied haoei sakkubü tegütham haoeibü ngüh haüthüka;
haoei onou akiko tonan yantia;
hoba ka thüka dangbou shuong haoei olintia.
Haoeneibü maangponei
O Zion Nouyangshou kümthang,
shumang tegü changenangnak nyeksi koutishi;
no lolo sangsembo teki,
kaibü nyek haksoko tekiti.
Meimeiashi, chasem khangbü jih ka nangnak ngekashi;
dei tegü jonan koutiashi;
kaibü shousi shuong langkei shanga khongnyu weko lambheka,
mühei haiko nyengko kibü shanga kaibü ik hao jungto tuokashi.
Chühashi, O
yaksa shuongei haoenei bukletbü haoenei thounouko
thuibü shaulep lo?
Ungshedbou si thuseibü
Khong kabü thamngua nashou si chingbü haian yepakei
ngeibü heshou hoba ngeibü medei shuong inei tuongakei;
no khau longbü chaloua onou akiko nyi haoen haitikei.
Saopobü lemnyet tegü ngeibü hatlamoklabü
pendou aeka nyi ngashaikei;
hoba
aoyou ngei thuiko pangteikei ngeibü dangbou shuongei mautikei.
Mühghaü maangshat julo phanga kayang hapbou müt kho ngo ki;
Ngesakbü akiko nakthühshang to haoei ngo shian jinkei.
Maimaitham ngo khulimbo chaseko haoeibü ik sepeitaiko leda.
Ngeibü phe hoba ngeibü khon haoei haman apbua,
ngeibü lo haoei leilutikua.
Haoei ngo khulimbo komlepbei,
hoba khauekbü sii khonkuei kailepbei.
Haian lounyu apyobü phatko, haoei ngo nakthüh phanga kitikei.
Ngo alongenlabü lele haoei ngo kailepbo taklepbei;
haoei kü la yangmen atshaibü jinkukei.
Haü, ngei thuibü hiko ngekjinei
haoei ngeibü welau asungletda.
Thüngbü laangei ngeibü lamnyu haoei lelepa;
haoei ngeibü lamnyu komettham aptikei.
Sapei thoan haiteibü tegü, molosaonyu cheei huan haiyeibü
tegü kü thedanga hao kia.
Haoei ngeibü lamnyu pekseknyu apbua hoba ngo netla yeitia.
Haoei haoeibü lau büha hoba laujin khoei kü to takda.
Haoeibü lauphot ka laujinei haoei ngeibü maangpona yontia.
Ngeibü mütli pendou shanga nyikushang ngo yeitia;
hoba chaseko haoeneibü akainyu chia la yeitia.
Haoei ngo khauekbüei shentikei,
haoei ngo khauekbü deiei oan sheman aptikei.
Laangminshouei haoei ngeibü hauh leilutikua,
haoei ngo tapei jonlepa.
Ngeibü soushou hakso ühüptiko kia,
olinbü kho ai yingkeije ngei maa.
Hibü ngei lauda, “Ngeibü soneikangbü maua,
hoba
Ngeibü khonsak hoba ngo khonku khauekbü dei
hoba khaubü damenshima.
Ngeibü soushouei ho shanga athakko damda,
hoba kü to maiko nopda.
Ho ngeibü maangpon to louda, hibü ngei maanglem kia.
Sen amauko kibü kho
aieilausi haoeibü onou ladangkei athonda.
Ngeyang weko haoen haanbü;
kaibü maanglemenbü yaang kia.
Ngeibü soushouei lauda,
hibü ngei hao to maanglemlabü.
Hao shanga haiyeiko kibü shuong to,
hao lambü soushou to
Mütei
hoba ngüh üangko kila maikei.
Mütao jiha buleng atshaibü pelabü kho
müt che shanga maiakei.
Hao mütpem ngüh üangko settiashi,
aieilausi kho haoei kala küntia.
Hao sembung thama yontishi,
khei yingalonga maanglem kila thükkei.
Aoei hao to ipda, hao jungto omlang thoashi,
hoba hao ngühthemei shentishi.
Aishanga
Aishanga haoei maangto shattiasikei,
khei yingsikei haoeibü üeisanou souko kibü thüng
haoeibü onou kilabü.
Aieilausi haoei kheiongje khonsak akuda,
ayingsi müteibü shousi shuong maang angangtida.
Kaodakeibü thüngbü shuong pendou youphanga nyuinyinlabü.
Thükkabou junga müteibü janbü kümsilei apbulabü.
Müt che haoeibü janbü kümsilei sepeisaila
Maibükei amaibükei loubü kho Thükkabou ka aying lo?
Aila lang kibü müt cheei jembü shabü
shanga shieikoesi nyamnyamla?
Senei lambho hoba seneibü lamnyu takteikho
hoba
Seneibü maangpon hoba seneibü ik,
khuthük kabü Mühghaü jungto senei tonenkho.
“Künei shabü shonkei hoba khulimbei,
hoba O
“Nyi kün shibakei hoba kün haitikei;
kaibü khauang maangpokei kaibü üeisanou küplepbei.
Küneibü welau danko alouenlabü lele
nyi no lolo sangmeiei yuklepbei.
Phangshuong yoa nyi kün odsinot tegü yeitikei.
“Küneibü dangbou pendouei kün khulimbo
haoeneibü sembung ipakei.
Hatbümokbü püngkhün lemenleenbü
hoba leilubü kün thükto louakei.
Ngeibü mütli nouyangshou maubü shanga ngeibü nyek ka
nyeksi shumang tegü kouda.
“Khuthük ka
Ngeibü nyek ka nyeksi athakko koulabü.
Ngeibü sangnyu nouyangshou shuong laüa
ngeibü nyekei ngeibü soushou maangshat khangtida.
“Ai ayingnyu ngeibü dangbou shuongei
au che tegü ngo shieikei.
Püngkhün to haoenei ngeibü langkei yaüan jinkei,
hoba kü thükto laang sonan jinkukei.
Deiei ngeibü khu danglepbei,
hoba ngei laukei, ngo akisap.
“Phangkabou püngkhün ka ngei no ngakei, O
Thuibü shanga ngei ngekjinei nyi kü ngüh ditkei,
nyi kaibü nou teküpletma.
Ngei no ngajinei no nyangko loukei,
hoba nyi laukei, ‘Tehütma.’
“O
nyi ngeibü langkei angtheda.
O
nyi ngeibü mat jembüma.
Ngo khulimbo haoeneibü phoklambü
hoba haoeneibü huon pendou nyi hapa.
“O
hoba ngo khulimbo haoeneibü huonsiyou pendou nyi ngekei.
Chaseko no khulimbo meimeibü shuong sembung khop,
hoba haoeneibü dambü ngo khulimbo ong ki.
Haoen setbü hoba haoen loenbü to chühshi,
ngo haoeneibü akhainyu chia la yeia.
“O
nyi haoen la ngaingouashi.
Kaibü shedsikhau haoen thüka kitishi,
hoba nyi haoeneibü maangpon nyibutham yeitikushi!
O
hoba kaibü kaonyudak ka haoen mautishi!”
Ügütü, hon kho ailabü son satkei;
hinseibü son kho lai küman jeileikei!
Khong wekoa lampheka saopobü laang shuong lai phinnyinan ki.
Ügütü, Zion sangnyubü shousi shuong,
hon shanenbü to takteila thükbü,
chak yaübü ikei kümbü kümsileil lai thamchak tegü weeida.
Khei selong shuongeikei sendei kuda,
hoba haoeneibü shoushou sena yopda.
Lausikei yama ostrik aushuong tegü,
ngeibü mütli nouyangshou shuong onou akiko yeia.
Deilabüei senyungbü nashou,
lishang ngeia khipakei;
nashou hanbü shuongei nyak hida;
lausikei aoeikei haoen la peian akuda.
Haabüteibü shaubüyungbü shuong kho khonga shemda;
shanenbü neisimei thüka chingenbü shuong
odsinot apshanga leketnyu yepan kia.
Aishanga, haoeneibü shabü laüa shieikoebü Sodom toje
kü mütli nouyaangshou shieikoe yangbou;
laobou hakde ong Mühghaü ikmaanga thonshang to loukei.
Saopobü chobaeibü shousi shuong, ninthu tokei hinseibou,
sendei tokei haoen hinseibou kikei.
Namseklaang tokei haoeneibü mang maietnyu
mütsak angetnyu kikei;
haoen hemai saomai kho, safir namsek laang phatko kikei.
Tou haoeneibü thenyek wankak tokei nakhübou;
khonga haoen achühenda, haoeneibü khon loa ong yukakei.
Pheijung ngaiakei, ju tegü linjung ngaiakei.
Mühei nouei koplintham apan,
sek ka buhek deihek ühüpbo haibü toje inei haibü maibou ki.
Onou kakbü nyushuongei haoeneibü ikei
haoeneibü shousi shuong shaula thungkei.
Ngeibü mütli nouyangshou mautida,
nashousi shuong kho saoeibü shausiyung yeikei.
haoei haoeibü kaangbüsekbü khauang longbü hakletkua
hoba haoeibü Ziona wan che sapbei khoei chemshang kho lona.
Jerusalem bakhün to dangbou labou lotlabü dogo,
kaodakbü choba shuong ayingsi kaodak mütli shuong
aoeikei maialem.
Ho saoeibü thuseibü shuong shabü haangjung
hoba saoeibü ungshedbou shuong shedbü shabü haangjung;
haoeibü saopobü shuongeibü sii sao kishanga phinkei.
Kongnyua nyekthubü tegü haoen shoongaida,
haoen siiei naanglepakei;
hibü aoeikei haoeneibü neiameia meitila athükda.
Haoenei haoen to ngetikei;
“Kan kukashi, kan asaopo, kukashi, temeiti!”
Hibü haoen linan shoongaibü la yeikei;
mütshuongei phangshuong yoa laukei,
touje haoen sen yoa akitilabü.
touje haoei haoen alomlabü.
Ungshedbou shuong la haoei soumo alen
hoba jaishou shuong to haoeibü maangshik alen.
Künei jim akibü thuibü shanga haiyeijinei
küneibü nyekei atin;
püetla athükbü phang shanga ong,
künei maanglembo haiyeia.
Kün khong to asatenlabü lele haoenei küneibü youmo phanda;
küneibü chalou tetetnyu weenakei,
aishanga küneibü thonbü süha.
Kün shieibü shuong kho müha aulu tokei sobüsepbü
shongh thük ka haoenei kün shijung loukei.
Yamlama haoei kün la thokukei.
haoeneibü püngkhüna atakei;
ao shangabü künei, “Haoeibü yeme phanga phangshuong yoa
kün kilabü” dogo laukei.
Olinangko kishi hoba olinashi,
Uz kaodaka kibü, O Edom Nouyangnyu.
Lausikei thung kho ka jungto lousühlabü;
no jaaklabü; hoba no lolo mütkong aplabü.
O Zion Nouyangshou, kaibü shabü shieikoe thona,
haoei touje no thüngshang to leian ohaulabü.
Lausikei, O Edom Nouyangshou,
haoei kaibü shedbü peanchühlabü;
haoei ka shabü phanenlabü.
O
Chühashi, hoba küneibü himou to chühkai!
Küneibü phet küksithang la,
hoba küneibü chem yenbou la kua.
Kün shoushed hoba bou akibü shuong ki;
küneibü nyusi shuong latnyu la yeian ki.
Künei yungbü dei shanga nam kuda,
küneibü bu kün la yaakkuda.
Kün shieibü shuongei kün ngüma nyatan shieida,
kün hüatoua lausikei hakso aki.
Shausiyung souko hapla shanga Ijep la hoba Assiria la eik kua.
Küneibü pisibousi shuongei shabü shonkei
lausikei touje haoen aki;
hoba künei haoeneibü shedbü shabü on künda.
Kün thüka aao shuongei songdakda;
hoba haoen ikmang ka kün püetla ao aki.
Küneibü langkei lemla kuan ong künei shausiyung hapda;
aieilausi yama ineibü thushed kia.
Müheinouei juokbü aubü ka,
küneibü khon wan metjin maimai aujiauko kia.
Ziona yaksa shuong, Jihudaa medei shuong ik atko leilutia.
Küneibü khuleibü dan kuia soueitaiko saüan phoakei,
jailebü shuong to üeisanou alenda.
