Heshou shuong la khangsiko shem shitida
hoba nashousi shuong buken atshaibü künan ngomeida.
Khuleibü jaishou shuong sangnyu bakhüna asetda,
heshou shuongei haoeneibü chia alauda.
Küneibü maangpon olinbü thona
kün tombülakbü kho manghaapbü la yeia.
Küneibü khu ka khun hangleda,
kün shanga ügütü, aishanga künei shed shona.
Kho shanga küneibü maangpon shaleko kia,
khübü shanga küneibü nyek yuia;
aishanga Zion shongh inletan ki,
hoba kho thüka selong shuong hongyoda.
Lausikei O
kaibü choba setshang meten meten sünga kida.
Aila ponpen shanga kün maan apda?
Aila halokche nyi kün inletda?
Nyi kün ka jungto longeitiashi,
O
shangiedbü chalou tegü küneibü chalou haansang yeitibüma.
Lausikei nyi kün lemailela asunglet,
kün khulimbo no aeibou khauangko kia.
Po khujin boubü, lit leiboubü, chalou ngaobounyet Kebar shumang nyangko thüngbü shu- ong yoa kijinei müh ipan ngei Mühghaüeibü mangsang hapbei.
Lit ngaoboubü, Jehoiakhin Choba langsenbü po ngaoboubüa;
Kebar shumang nyangko Khaldibü kaonyeka Buzeibü shou Ezekiel ungshedbou jungto
Hobaje ngei chühkei, hoba chühashi, yeithu yeinak yungkük aeka sangmei yaangbü, kho danko langpon hoba kho kaijembo shaüshaü ponponbü hoba kho jenyua nam tegü jajalalatham hauan kikei.
Hobaje kho yoa lang kibü meisiau lei phatko hapbei. Khübü chühla hai kikei, haoen kho chühla hesihaang kho müt phatko kikei.
Hobaje haoen weko thenyek leibang yembei hoba haoen weko kaak leibang kikei.
Haoeneibü you tangsheibang kikei, hoba haoen la masueibü hak tegü yeman kikei. Khübü kho samenbü chinam tegü ponyokei.
Hobaje haoeneibü hip leia haoeneibü kaak phanga müteibü ik yeman kikei. Khübü lei pendou la thenyek si kaak yeman kikei,
hoba haoeneibü kaak cheei che to meiyouko kikei. Khübü weko lulu lam to thedangae tangshaitham haukei; haoen haujinei haoeneibü thenyek asepei.

Khübü leieibü thenyek chühla hai kikei: haoen lei weko la müteibü thenyek yeman kikei, hoba maiaenei haoen lei weko la molosaonyueibü thenyek yeman kikei, hoba haoen lei pendou la nanaenei masu pongsu thenyek yembei; haoen lei pendou la tokei aulueibü thenyek yeman kikei.
Haoeneibü thenyek kho khei yeman kikei. Haoeneibü kaak shuong thükaeto pinan kikei; haoen weko la kaak penyi bang, cheei che to anyoan, hoba penyiei haoeneibü mang küplepan kikei.
Hobaje haoen weko thedang aeto tangsheitham haukei. Soushouei lae aeto haumang sühkei, thi aeto haoen haukei, hoba haujinei haoen asepei.
Hobaje lang kibü meisiau yoa che chühla wanthung phatko kikei. Wan kho meisiau shuong yoa hau longei dogo shoongaiko kikei; hoba wan kho ngesaktham hoba khüka langpon longkei.
Hobaje meisiau shuong kho langpon ponbü tegü wenjung hau hoba longei dogo kikei.
Tou lang kibü meisiau shuong to ngei chühsi, thenyek leibang yembü meisiau weko shanga tongjinyou che bang kaoa tenan phobü ngei hapbei.

Tongjinyou son hoba kümsembü hai kikei: Haoen kho yasangle lailaibü namseklaang tegü kikei, hoba khübü lei pendou chühla jeteitham kikei. Khübü kho tongjinyou che maanga tongjinyou che thenyoan kümbü phatko kikei.
Haoen haujinei haüpangteiko kaophei lei ka meisiauei chühko kibü aedang to hauko lekei; hoba haoen haujinei khübü asepei.
Hobaje tongjinyou kaijembo kho lounyu hoba hatlabü hoba khübü lei kaijembo nyekei shenan kikei.
Ladang lang kibü meisiau shuong meimeikei, tongjinyou shuong khokei haoen yoa haukei, hoba ladang lang kibü meisiau shuong kho kao ka tonenkei tongjinyou shuongkei tonenkei.
Laeto ong soushou shuong meimeilaje haoen haukei, hoba tongjinyou shuong kho khübü yoa tonenkei, aishanga soushou kho lang kibü meisiau shuong tongjinyou yoa kikei.

Ladang ong meisiau shuong haulaje khübükei haukei hoba haoen lojinei khübükei lokei, hoba haoen kao ka tonenjinei tongjinyou khübükei haoen yoa meimeikei; aishanga soushou kho lang kibü meisiau shuongeibü tongjin yoa youa thonan kikei.
Hobaje lang kibü meisiaueibü khua müha kibü peisilei onshaibü phatko hatlamoklabü ninthu laang son phatko haoeneibü khu thükaenei longan kikei.
Hobaje onshaibü phang khünei haoen nyangko kaakshuong khoei nyibou meisiau khüto meiyouan kikei, hoba lubü penyi khoei mang yuklepan kikei.

Hobaje ladang haoen haukei haoeneibü kaak ngühbü kho dei yaang koubü langh tegü ayingsi, pendou Thükenboueibü langh, khei lakjaibü tan yaang lemenbü langh tegü ngei ditkei. Ladang ong lokei, haoenei haoeneibü kaak shuong kho lottikei.
Hobaje haoeneibü kaak shuong lottian lojinei thükaenei haoeneibü khua onshaibü kibü thük ka ngühlang che longkei.
Hobaje haoeneibü khu thüka kibü onshaibü thükaenei chühla safir laang phatbü Choba setshang tegü kikei, hoba kho thüka müt che phatko kikei.
Hao chühla shenjang ka thükae ngei son lailai chinamkung denche tegü hapbei, hoba khüka jaüan phangae kho wan maimai hapbei; hoba sonlailai ngesakei hao kaijeman kikei.
Lang loubü chaloua sangmeia yepukshangjep tegü hao kaijembo sonlailaibü hapbei. Kho
Hobaje haoei kü to laukei, “Müteibü shou, kaibü youei paiashi, hoba ngei ka to joyolabü.”
Hobaje haoei kü to joyojinei soushou kü jungto lotkei, hoba ngeibü youei loan apyokei, hoba haoei kü to joyobü ngei ditkei.

Hobaje haoei kü to laukei, “Müteibü shou, ngei no Israel shousi shuong, khei ngo khulimbo meimeibü lenbü aditbü mütli jungto hautida; haoen hoba haoeneibü pisibousi shuongei tat sühko ngo khulimbo ngühkhüm lulima.
Haoen tubüsekbü hoba ngümkaangbü mütshuong ki, hibü ngei no haoen jungto hautida. Haoen to, ‘Thükenbou
Hobaje haoenei ngüha lesi alesi dogokei haoen yoa thuseibü che kiteikei dogo haoenei ngelabü (aishanga haoen tubüsekbü phang ki.)”

Lausikei no, müteibü shou, haoen to ayingsi haoenei laubü ngüh aitokei ühütjan. Haoenei no yuktilabü; ho jakham si sinkip yoa kibü phatko kilabü. Haoen kheinyu khulimbü phang yingasikei, haoeneibü ngüh to tehüt ayingsi haoenei hatlenbü to temok.
Haoenei ditsikei aditsikei nyi ngeibü ngüh haoen to lenashi, aishanga haoen kho khulimbü mütli ki.
“Lausikei no, müteibü shou; ngei ka to ai lenda ditashi. Ho ngüha alebü mütli tegü no ngüha aleko teki; haa kouashi hoba ngei ka la ai oklaje shauashi.”
Hobaje ladang ngei chühkei, ik che kü aeto shingan ngei hapbei, hoba khonei tulai che kiteikei.
Hobaje haoei kho kü thedanga sengkei, hoba kho tangaenei hoba maangaenei doan kikei; hoba khonei haapbü, manghaapbü hoba maangto shatlabü doan kikei.
Hobaje haoei kü to laukei, “Müteibü shou, ka thedanga kibü tulai kho shauashi; hoba hauan Israel phang to joyoashi.”
Hibü ngei kü sembung ipbei, hoba haoei tulai kho kü la shaula kukei.
Hobaje haoei kü to laukei, “Müteibü shou, ngei ka la kubü tulai ho shauashi hoba kaibü shi shentiashi.” Hibü ngei kho shaukei, hoba kho ngeibü sembunga naodei tegü teishiktham kikei.
Hobaje haoei kü to laukei, “Müteibü shou, Israel phang jungto hauashi, hoba ngeibü ngühei haoen to joyoashi.
Aishanga ngühyem sekbü hoba küksithang ngühyem che jungto no hautida aying lausikei Israel mütli jungto hautida;
nyi aditenlabü ngühyem sekbü hoba phang juong jungto ohauti. Ngei no haoen jungto hautikei laubü tegüje haoenei ka to ditkuan kikhoulabü.
Lausikei Israel mütlieije ka ngüh ditmang asühlabü aishanga haoenei kü to ditkula maangüangda; aishanga Israel mütli pendou tubüsekbü hoba khünbüyangbü maangpon ki.
Chühashi ngei kaibü thenyek haoeneibü thenyek tegü shangtüngtham yeitilabü.
Ngei kaibü khüngja laangkoklok laang tokei kaangbou tegütham yeitikulabü. Haoen khulimbü phang yingasikei haoen to hatkomokko teki.”
Tokei haoei kü to laukei, “Müteibü shou, ngei ka la lenbü ngüh pendou kaibü maangpona sungletashi, hoba kaibü nouei ditashi.
Hobaje langsenbüa kibü ka mütli jungto hauashi hoba haoen to joyoashi. Haoenei ditsikei aditsikei haoen to, ‘Thükenbou
Kheijinei soushouei ngo tonenkei, hoba ngei kü phainei ngühkei ngühko langh yaangbü cheei, “
Hobaje lang kibü meisiaueibü kaak cheei che to kakyojinei longbü langh hoba khübü nyangko tongjinyou langh, khei selonyibü langh yaangbü tegü ngei ditkei.
Kho tegü soushouei ngo tonenkei hoba leilangkei, hoba ngo ngeibü soushou maangto shatko khauangko haukei hoba
Hobaje Kebar shumang nyangko Tel- Abiba kibü langsenbü mütshuong jungto ngo loukei; hoba khünei haoen yoa ngo chalou nyet maangpangan shembo setkei.
Chalou nyet kian phaia
Haoei laukei, “Müteibü shou, ngei no Israel mütli thüka lapheibou yeitikei; hibü kü sembung kabü ngüh ditashi, hoba haoen la kü ka maangsanglabü kushi.

Amaibü müt to, ‘No maimaitham hailabü,’ dogo ngei lausi, hoba nyi hao la maangsanglabü akulonga, hoba haoeibü langkei khümenla shanga nyi hao lamnyu amaibü ka sepeitila maangsanglabü ngüh alenlonga, kho müt amaibü haoeibü shedbüa hailabü, lausikei hao haibü sii ngei ka ka hilabü.
Khei yingasikei nyi müt amaibou la maangsanglabü kualonga hoba hao amaibü ka ayingsi hao amaibü lamnyu ka hao asepei longa hao jembü shabüa hailabü, lausikei noje ka langkei khümenlabü.

“Tokei, ladang saopobü müt jembü saopobü ka sepeian amaibü kümlaje, hoba ngei hao thedanga phaiyetshang che phokulaje, nyi hao la maangsanglabü akulonga haoje jembü shabüa hailabü. Haoei kümbü saopobü kümsilei maibü ngei adamenkulabü, hoba hao haibü sii ngei ka ka hilabü.

Khei yingasikei, nyi saopobü müt la haoei shabü ashonlabü lele maangsanglabü kualonga hoba haoei shabü ashonlonga, maimaitham hao lang kilabü, aieilausi haoei maangsanglabü lenbü ngüh ditkei hoba nyi ka langkei khümena.”
Hobaje
Kheijinei ngo meimeikei, hoba yomang khüto likei. Hobaje ngei Kebar shumang nyangko hapbü soneikangbü tegütham
Kheijinei Mühghaü Soushou kü to atkei, hoba ngeibü youei lotian phokukei hoba haoei kü to laukei, “Hauashi, kaibü chemmanga no lolo khinlepashi.
Hobaje no müteibü shou, chühashi, haoenei ka to ik shatlabü hoba khübü khoei no khühlabü, hoba no mütshuong yoa ohauenlabü.
Hobaje ngei kaibü lishang li khiptilabü, hoba haoen to ühaktila shanga kaibü lishang ngeia khiptilabü, aishanga haoen ngüha alebü mütli ki.
Lausikei ladang ngei ka to joyolaje, ngei kaibü sembung ipbulabü hoba nyi haoen to, ‘Thükenbou
Mühghaüei laukei, “Müteibü shou, juoklaang che sungashi, hoba kho ka thedanga phoashi, hoba kho thüka Jerusalem sangnyu noksa kümashi.

Kho khulimbo thangetlabü kümashi, hoba kho khulimbo lapheishon shuong kümashi. Kho nyangko shongh kho to suokbü kümashi; kho nyangko lapheibü setshang kümashi hoba kho kaijembo khulimbo tuyetlabü peisilei tentian phoashi.

Kho phaia namkung shelebü phau sungba hoba kho sangnyu kasi kanglanga nameibü kümthang phatko phoashi, hoba thiaeto kaibü thenyek yeiashi, hoba kho komleplabü hoba nyi kho khulimbo sangshibü kümlabü. Ho Israel phangshuong shanga tetsida che kilabü.
“Kho phaia kaibü nanaenei no shimtian yepshi, hoba kho thüka Israel mütliei shed shonbü ka thüka künshi. Chalou lalokche no lengan kilaje kho thüng nyi haoeneibü shedbüshabü künlabü.
Aishanga haoeneibü shabü ka- yang po che bang weko ngei ka la chalou lühbak che bang tetkuda. Hibü chalou saongao semto anjinngao nyi Israeleibü shedshonbü künlabü.
Hobaje nyibou nyi ho küman phaia no kaibü maeaenei phetetnyu yepashi, hoba Jihudabü phangei shedshonbü künashi. Ngei ka la po shanga chalou che dogo chalou saonyi tetkuda.
“Hobaje Jerusalem komlepbü aeto kaibü nyek theashi hoba kho khulimbo ik shingan tetenashi.
Hobaje chühashi, nyi komlepbü takletbü chalou apen shongko jiphei ka jiphei to sepeila athüklabü lele ngei kala lühmong jinkuan khühleplabü.

“Tokei whet si barli, kaobak si napashik, jei si monshushumai hoba shikmeimailabü khübü chak chenei jinshi, hoba khoei ka shanga wentek kümshi. Nyi khübü kho no chalou saongao semto anjinngao no nashuan yepbü sünga shaulabü.
Hobaje nyi shaulabü shausiyung kho takbü chalou weko shekel saoche yingjan; chalou weko jih takletbü chenei nyi kho shaujan.
Hobaje nyi dei takbü hin phejan lak ka che yungjan; chalou weko jih takletbüa yungjan.
Hobaje nyi müteibü sed linbü jikan wentek ngouashi hoba nyi kho mütshuongei hapbo barli wentek tegü shauashi.”
Hobaje
Kheijinei ngei laukei, “Khei aying, Thükenbou
Hibü Mühghaüei laukei, “Aeibou maikei, müteibü sed jeiko ngei ka la masu sed kukho hoba khoei nyi kaibü wentek kümjan.”
Tokei haoei kü to laukei, “Müteibü shou, ngei Jerusalema shausiyung shitikulabü. Mütshuongei wentek seret takletan maangsangko shaulabü, hoba haoenei dei jemtenko yunglabü,
aishanga shausiyung si deiei aeibou mühlabü. Haoeneibü shedbü shabü haangjung haoen cheei che to mokkotham yeilabü.”
Hobaje

Ladang sang komlepbü chalou shuong kho dankhümlaje sangnyu sangjia phejan sem ka che nyi jikan apashi. Hobaje phejan che kho nyi sangnyu kaijemjinei inei netla yeiko jemnyinshi. Hobaje phejan sema che nyi yei la soulangtiashi. Aishanga ngei haoen in in setenan shilabü.
Hobaje nyi khüka shisho sungashi hoba kaibü shembe neia senashi.
Hobaje kho nyibou nyi sungshi hoba wanji to jinshi, hoba kho wana lontishi. Kho ka Israel chung pendou aeto wan aalabü.”
Thükenbou
Lausikei sao kaijembo kibü kaonyek shuong tokei aei amaibou kükhu limbei hoba saoei ngei sakkubü ngühkhüm deikhüm ajungei.
Hibü Thükenbou Thükenbou
Hibü Thükenbou
Kaibü mangsenlabü kümsilei shuong shanga ngei kan yoa ladangkei küman achühbü hoba ho phaiakei ladangkei akümlabü kümsilei kümlabü.
Kho haangjung kan yoa bousi shuongei shousi shuong shaulabü hoba shousi shuongei bousi shuong shaulabü. Ngei ka yoa matjemlabü hoba kan jouletbü shuong khümbo ngei yeia pilangtilabü.’
“Hibü ngo lang ki shongko, dogo Thükenbou

Kan mütli phejan sem ka che sangnyu maanga limsilangei hoba mühsinouei hailabü; phejan sem ka che kan kaijembo kibüeibü inei tuonglabü; hoba kho phaia joubü phejan che kho ngei yei to aatilabü hoba haoen in phinan shilabü.
“Kheijinei ngeibü khauang koulabü hoba ngeibü maangshat haoen thüka maangamailabü, hoba semjung ngailabü. Hobaje ladang ngei ngeibü maangshat haoen thüka yingtilaje, haoenei ngo
Tokei ngei no kaijembo kibü phangshuong yoa hoba danbüphaibü pendou thedanga no inletbü hoba akhainyu che yeitilabü.
“Ladang ngei ka to khau- angbü hoba maangpokbüa hatlamoklabü hakbüei matjemlaje no kaijembo kibü phangshuong shanga no moklabü jemtenlabü hoba maangpanglabü yinglabü; ngo
Hobaje ngei kan khulimbo mühsinouei shemlabü hoba leilubüei hailabü laujin kipan litilabü. Ngei kan thükto mühsinou aei aei sungbalabü hoba kaneibü shausiyung hapshang khinkulabü.

Hobaje ngei kan khulimbo mühsinou hoba yambabü meisiau hautikulabü, hoba khübüei kaneibü shousimi shemtilabü. Shatlimnyatlim hoba sii angbü kan thükto danlabü hoba ngei kan khulimbo in sungbalabü. Ngo
Hobaje
“Müteibü shou, Israelbüeibü shongh shu- ong aeto kaibü thenyek sepeiashi, hoba haoen khulimbo tetenashi
hoba lenashi, O Israel shongh shuong, Thükenbou
Hobaje kaneibü lemshang lusaklabü hoba kaneibü jenjok lemshon netlaphoula yeilabü; hoba ngei ka mütshuong pendou kaneibü lemshon thea haitikulabü.
Ngei Israel shousi shuongeibü haibü mang haoeneibü heangsho thedanga lengtian phokulabü, hoba kaneibü losilak kaneibü lemshang kaijembo tekteksousou phokulabü.

Kaneibü lemshon hoba khübeibü heangsho shuong netla yeiko phetnyinlabü, kaneibü jenjuok lemshon lusaklabü, hoba kanei kümenbü khümbomeiko kuan aplabü lele Israeleibü sangnyu shuong pendou shakkeishakko maulabü.
Pendou aenei mütshuong haitilabü, hoba aoyou jouletlaje haoenei ngo
“Lausikei müt atje ngei in ka satentilabü hoba phangshuong yoto aatilabü,

khonei haoen langsenbüa kilabü. Khünei haoenei ngo damenlabü hoba ngei haoen shieikoea hoba himou bautia dogo ngelabü, aieilausi haoeneibü maangalanbü maangponei ngo inletkei hoba haoenei kü toje heangsho to aei dühkei. Hobaje haoenei haoen lolo haoeneibü nyekei mangsenlabü pendou haoenei kümbü hapan amaibü shuong shanga haoen lolo himouko damlabü.
Hobaje haoenei ngo
Thükenbou
Saabüa kibü shuong limei hailabü, hoba nyangbüa kibü shuong inei tuonglabü hoba jouan hoba saten- an kibü shuong mühei shemlabü. Kho tegütham ngei ngeibü khauang maangpok haoen thüka dantilabü.

Hobaje ladang haoen haitibü müt haoeneibü heangsho yoa, lemshang kaijembo shonghshou suokbü thüka, shonghkhu pendou thüka hoba haoeneibü lemshon pendoua ponlem teibü lemshang bulong sangtüngbü phang weko hoba yik shangtüngtham kibü yembulong phang wekoa haplaje, kheijinei haoenei ngo
Hobaje ngei haoen thükto ik shinglabü hoba kaonyek kho yam ka Ribla sühko, Israelbü kishang kaoen che ongkei ajoutiko sangliphang la yeitilabü. Kheijinei müt pendouei ngo
Nyibou
“Müteibü shou, Thükenbou
“Tou ka thükto thonbü louakei, hoba ngei ngeibü khauang longbü ka thükto lottilabü. Ngei no kaibü kümsilei thüng no matjemlabü, hoba kaibü mangsenlabü kümsilei pendou ngei ka la kungailabü.
Ngei ka to aphokeilabü ayingsi onou alenlabü. Lausikei kaibü amaibü lamnyu shuong, hoba kaibü mangsenlabü kümsilei shuong ka la kungailabü. Kheijinei kanei ngo
Thükenbou
Thonbü che louan apa! Thonbü che loua! Ho kakhu limbo louda, chühashi, kho louada!
O kaonyeka kibü shuong, ka la sühbü thonbü jih che louakei. Jihsiphai lousüha, chalou nyangko kia; lemshang shongh thüka olinyobü ayingko panglangbü ong ki.
“Tongde ngeibü khauang ka la yeian jinkulabü. Ngei nyi kümbü thüng kaibü mat jemlabü, hoba kaibü mangsenlabü kümsilei thüng ngei ka la kungailabü.
Ngei ka to aphokeilabü ayingsi onou alenlabü. Lausikei kaibü amaibü shuong, hoba kaibü mangsenlabü kümsilei shuong ka la kungailabü. Kheijinei kanei ngo
“Chühashi, chalou kho lousüha! Ho louan apa! Leilubü tangto lousheda, yonglambü tongbü khida hoba lilibü kho bunga!
Maanga yambü amaibü shieikoelabü julo la yeiakei; mütli yo ka aokei ajoulabü, haoen yo ka yingasikei ayingsi haoeneibü keisiyaang, haoeneibü nyenhang ayingsi haoeneibü soneikangbü ajoulabü.
“Jihsiphai lousüha, chalou nyangko loua. Jekbou teolin, ayingsi yakbou tengang, aishanga mütshang khümbo thükto maangshat ki.

Aishanga ham lang kishongko yakbouei haoei ai yaakkei kho nyibou ühüpmailabü, aishanga mütshang khümbo shangabü mangsang kho üeisheilabü. Haoeneibü shabü haangjung aoeikei jembü langkei senetan apholabü.
Haoenei teklaang metsikei hoba pendou lamleasikei, aokei lason to ohaulabü, aishanga ngeibü maangshat mütshang khümbo thüka ki.
“Tangaenei in, hoba maang- aenei hailabü shatsinyat hoba mühsinou ki; aoyou khongthua ki hao inei hailabü, hoba aoyou sangnyua ki, haoen mühsinou hoba limsilangei suilabü.
Lausikei aoyou ong khübü ka satenlaje haoen shongha yo kabü jemau phatko kilabü. Haoen pendou mütpem weko lulueibü shabü shanga haapyoko shailabü.
Mütpem wekoeibü ik hau thetlabü hoba youkük pendou hau akiko dei tegü yeilabü.
Haoenei senounei neilabü, hoba haoen pendoua hatbüei lühlabü. Haoeneibü khu shuan aplabü, haoeneibü thenyek himouei yukleplabü.
Haoenei haoeneibü chandinam si hon asaopobü peisilei che tegütham khonga tekan aplabü.

Haoeneibü hemaibü namseklaangei haoen yonglamlabü ong yeitikei hoba haoeneibü mangsenlabü heangsho hoba lejim akibü noksa shuong khüka yaükei. Hibü ngei khübü kho haoen shanga asao- pobü peisilei la yeitikulabü.
“Hobaje ngei khübü kho küksithang la koktilabü hoba kaodaka amaibü shuong la solangtilabü, hoba kho haoenei shatilabü.
Haoen ka ngei thenyek sepeilabü, hoba haoenei ngeibü huphang thanshang shatilabü hoba soshau soyungbü shuong khüto atlabü hoba kho shatilabü.
“Yangmen lamleashi, aishanga kaodak sii phinko ngühkhüm leilubüei shenakei, hoba ikshatyobüei sangnyu shen- akei.
Hibü ngei phang amaiboutham leibalabü, hoba khübüei haoeneibü chemsibung lean aplabü. Ngei hauki yaangkibü lilisese thonshang to loutilabü, hoba haoeneibü lemshang shatilabü.
Ladang leilubü loulaje haoenei sangmai lamlabü, lausikei ladangkei akilabü.
Thushed thükto thushed ngühphakphak thükto ngüh- phakphak loulabü. Haoenei thusei mangsang lamlabü, lausikei ungshedbou ka lenbü ngühkhüm hoba jaishou shuong ka songsido kubü dankhümlabü.

Chobaei mang haaplabü, hoba leiyeibü shuongei lulu lolo maangkhu yuibü neisimei lelabü hoba kaodakbü mütshuongeibü ik lühlabü. Ngei haoeneibü kümsilei thüng haoen to kümlabü, hoba haoeneibü matjem thüng haoen to mat jemlabü. Kheijinei haoenei ngo
Po lakboubü lit lakboubü, chalou ngaobounyeta ngo ngeibü chema hoba Jihudabü jaishou shuong kü thedanga setan kijinei Thükenbou
Kheijinei ngei chühkei, hoba chühsi müt phatbü mangsang che hapbei. Hao chühla shenjang ka jaüan youae wan tegü, hoba haoeibü shenjang ka thükae kho lailaitham mangh shoubü nam tegü kikei.

Hobaje haoei ik phatbü che longtikei hoba ngeibü khua khulou shen chenei japbei. Hobaje kho mangsanga Mühghaü Soushouei ngo kaodak si khuthük kanglang to tonenkei, hoba Jerusalem to leilangkei. Haoei ngo Mühghaü khauang longtibou heangsho kishang Lembüchem maangkabou shemjang to atbü yungkük bakhün aeto leilangkei.
Hobaje chühashi, Israelbü Mühghaü soneikangbü ngei Kebar Shumanga hapbü hesihaang phatko hanei hapbei.
Mühghaüei kü to laukei, “Müteibü shou, yungkük aeto chühashi.” Hibü ngei chühkei, hoba yungkük bakhün to atshanga lemshon nyangko Mühghaü khauangtibou heangsho kho ngei hapbei.

Hobaje haoei kü to laukei, “Müteibü shou, haoenei kümbo kibü nyi hapataoba lo? Israel mütliei ngo ngeibü saopobü kaoen ka aei aei saabou shian sattiko hanei mangsenlabü yaang kümbo kibü khüto chühashi.”
Hobaje haoei tangkabü shemjang koukhün khüto ngo leian haukei, hoba kümthanga khün yetbü che kü la haptikei.
Haoei kü to laukei, “Müteibü shou, tou kümthang kho thunyinashi.” Hobaje ngei kümthang kho thujung atkei hoba koukap che hapbei.
Hobaje haoei kü to laukei, “Atashi hoba haoenei khünei amaibü mangsenlabü kümbü khüto chühashi.”
Hibü ngo atkei hoba chühkei, hoba ngei khonei shanbü yangsikok phang weko hoba mangsenlabü meisiau hoba Israelbüei jungeibü heangsho pendou kümthang kaijembo küman kikei.

Hobaje haoen thedanga Israelbü chung jaishou shuong müt anjinlei hoba haoen yoa Shafaneibü shou Jaazaria yoan kikei. Mütpem weko lulueibü ika jen juokbü phau jungan loan kikei, hoba ponlem hilabü wankhük sangmei kho angko kikei.
Mühghaüei kü to phekei, “Müteibü shou, Israelbü chung jaishou shuongei huphanga kümbo kibü kho hapdalao? Haoen mütpem wekoei lulueibü heangshoei shenbü shemjanga lemda. Aishanga haoenei lauda, ‘
Kheijinei
Hibü haoei ngo
Haoei kü to laukei, “O müteibü shou, nyi ho hapdalao? Nyi habü ho to aeibü mangsenlabü shuong haplabü.”
Hobaje haoei
Hibü ngeikei haoen to khauangko jungeilabü; ngei haoen ajoutilabü ayingsi haoen to onouko adamlabü. Haoenei ngeibü noukhüna ngekasikei ngei haoen to aditkulabü.”
Kheijinei Mühghaüei langh yaangbüei ngekko ngei ditkei: “Sangnyu lombü shuong kho müt- pem weko lulueibü ika insiaubu jungan hato leiba.”

Hobaje ngei yungkük ae yeian kibü thükkabou shemjang bakhün ka müt lak, mütpem weko lulueibü ika haitilabü insiaubu jungan louko hapbei. Hobaje haoen yoa müt cheei inyaibü nei neian dolabü moli thungshoua hopan kikei. Haoen pendou lotkei hoba chinam lemshang nyangko lokei.
Hobaje Israel Mühghaüeibü soneikangbü kaakyembü kherabim thüka kiteibü ka angan apbei hoba Lembüchem to atshang aeto kukkei. Hobaje
hoba hao to laukei, “Jerusalem sangnyu chenyu peithetjung haushi, hoba khünei mangsenlabü kümbü pendou shanga aoei maangto shatko hoba haapbo kije haoeneibü khüngjaa tetsida che phoashi.”
Hobaje ngei ditko Mühghaüei lubü shuong to laukei, “Sangnyu danko kan hao phai semshi hoba haitiashi. Ao tejouti hoba aotokei onouko tedam.

Baushi, heshou hoba medei, yaksa hoba nashou hanbü shuong shemtiashi, lausikei shensinge kibü mütshuong aotokei temeiti. Ngeibü Lembü- chem ka khangashi.” Hibü haoenei Lembüchem thedanga loan kibü jaishou shuong ka khangkei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei haoen to laukei, “Lembüchem kho shatiashi, hoba shemjang kho haibü mangei shentiashi. Meimeiashi khou!” Hibü haoen haukei hoba sangnyu sünga haitila khangkei.
Haoenei haitijung haujinei khünei kü mütpem apyokei. Ngei kaoae yeian kü the khümbei hoba ngekko laukei, “Thükenbou
Kheijinei Mühghaüei jongaiko laukei, “Israel chung si Jihudaeibü shedbüshabü yongko yaangkei; kaonyu khümbo siiei shenakei hoba shedshonbëi Jerusalem sangnyu shena. Haoenei lauda, ‘
Hibü ngeikei haoen aphokeilabü hoba onou alenlabü, lausikei ngei haoeneibü kümsilei haoeneibü khu to jinkulabü.”
Kheijinei inyaibü nei neian dolabü moli thungshoua hopbou kho longeikei hoba
Kheijinei ngei chühkei, hoba kaakyembü kherabim thükaenei kibü müh onshaibüa sapfir laangei kümbü tegütham Choba setshang phatbü che hapbei.

Hobaje inyaibü nei neibü müt to Mühghaüei haoei laukei, “Kaakyembü kherabim phanga tongjinyou kanglang to atashi. Kaakyembü kherabim kanglang ka wankak yasebüei kaibü ik penyi ham shentiashi hoba khübü kho sangnyua phinashi.”
Hobaje ngei hapbo hao atkei.
Tou müt kho atjinei kaakyembü kherabim Lembüchem yungthang aenei loan kiteikei, hoba sangmeiei maangkabou shemjang kho shenkei.
Hobaje
Hobaje Thükenbou Mühghaüei joyojinei ngüh longbü tegü, kaakyembü kherabim kaakeibü langh kho shemjang thükkaboua sühko ditkei.
Hobaje ladang haoei nei inyaibü neibou müt to, “Tongjin- you kanglang ka, kaakyembü kherabim ka wan sungashi,” dogo lauko sakkukei, müt kho atkei hoba tongjinyou thedanga lokei.
Hobaje kaakyembü kherabim yoa cheei haoeibü ik khübü yoa wan kibü aeto shingkei. Haoei kho sungkei, hoba inyaibü nei neiboueibü ika kho jinkukei, hoba haoei kho sungkei hoba satkei.
Hobaje kaakyembü kherabim la haoeneibü kaak phanga müteibü ik phatko yeman hapkei.
Hobaje ngei chühkei, hoba kaak- yembü kherabim nyangko tongjinyou lei, tongjinyou che kho kaakyembü kherabim che bang nyangko kikei; hoba tongjinyou kho chühla khrisol namseklaang son phatko kikei.
Hobaje tongjinyou che chenei kibü tegütham khübü lei pendou chühla phatyoko thenan kikei.
Ladang haoen haukei, haoen lei pendou lulu kaoen lei aeto haukei, lausikei khuei chühko leibü ae khüto haoen phai semjung haukei, hoba haoen haujinei asepei.
Hobaje haoeneibü mang khümbo, haoeneibü shenjang, haoeneibü ik, hoba haoeneibü kaak hoba tongjinyou lei yoan khümbo nyekei shenan kikei.
“Tongjung haubü tongjinyou shuong,” dogo ngako ngei ditkei.

Kaakyembü kherabim weko thenyek leibang yeman kikei: Shaangboubü kho masu pongsueibü thenyek, nyiboubü kho müteibü thenyek, semboubü kho molosaonyueibü thenyek, hoba leiboubü kho aulueibü thenyek yeman kikei.
Hobaje kaakyembü kherabim kho sengjung angkei. Khübü kho ngei Kebar Shumang nyangko hapbü lang kibü meisiau shuong yingan kiteikei.
Hobaje ladang ong kaakyembü kherabim meimeikei, tongjinyou shuong haoen yoa haukei; hoba ladang kaakyembü kherabimei kao ka pilangla kaak sengkei, tongjinyou shuongkei haoen yoa thonlangkei.
Ladang kaakyembü kherabim lokei, khübükei loan kikei; hoba ladang haoen pila khangkei, khübükei haoen yoa haukei, aishanga lang kibü meisiaueibü soushouei haoen leikei.
Hobaje
Hobaje kaakyembü khe- rabimei haoeneibü kaak tonenkei hoba ngei hapbo kao ka pilangkei, hoba haoen haujinei tongjinyou shuongkei haoen yoa haukei. Haoen
Khübü kho ngei Kebar Shumang nyangko Israel Mühghaü phanga hapbü lang kibü meisiau shuong kiteikei, hoba haoen kho kaakyembü kherabim dogo ngei damenkei.
Che che weko thenyek leibang hoba kaak leibang yeman kikei hoba haoeneibü kaak phanga müteibü ik phatbü kikei.
Hobaje haoeneibü thenyek kho ngei Kebar Shumang nyangko hapbü thenyek shuong phatan kikei. Meisiau weko theae tangshaitham haukei.
Kheijinei soushouei ngo tonenkei, hoba chanyu angbou ae yeian kibü
Hobaje Mühghaüei kü to laukei, “Müteibü shou, habü mütshuong ho sangnyua kümthen amaibü huonbü shuong hoba songsido amaibü kubü dan ki.
Haoenei lauda, ‘Chem dangla sen shanga ho jih tükdebü aying lo? Ho sangnyu shikchak che ki, hoba sen phe ki.’
Hibü haoen yuktiko tetenashi; tetenashi, O müteibü shou.”
Hobaje
Kanei ho sangnyua juong haitia hoba haibü mangei khongnyu shenakei.
“Hibü Thükenbou
Kan in to hatda sai? Ngei kan shilabü müt yoa inlou sungbalabü, dogo Thükenbou
Hobaje ngei kan sangnyu ka sungenlabü, hoba küksithangeibü ik to khümbo kulabü, hoba kan thükto matjem hautilabü.
Kan inei tuonglabü ngei kan Israel leikhu leidang pendoua matjemlabü. Kheijinei kanei ngo
Ho sangnyu kan shanga chak ayinglabü ayingsi kho maanga kan phe ayinglabü; ngei kan Israel leikhu leidang pendoua mat jemlabü.
Hobaje kanei ngo
Ngei thusei ngüh lauko kitoua Benaiaeibü shou Petalia haikei. Kheijinei ngei ngeibü the kaoae khümbei hoba ngüh yaangbüei ngekkei, “Aiwaü,
Hobaje
Haoei laukei, “Müteibü shou, kaibü jaisinasi shuong, khei kaibü chem- pen shuong, kaibü thenbülenbü shuong hoba Israel chung pendou shangabü Jerusalema kibü shuongei lauda, ‘
“Hibü lenashi: Thükenbou
“Hibü lenashi: ‘Thükenbou
Hobaje haoen khüto longeilabü, hoba haoenei lejim akibü heangsho pendou hoba mangsenlabü pendou khüka sungan aplabü.
Hobaje ngei haoen la maang- pon haanbü che, hoba soushou haanbü che kulabü; ngei haoeneibü maangpon ka laang phatbü maangpon sungan apbulabü hoba ngühalebü maangpon kulabü.
Kheijinei haoenei ngeibü takletbü ngühkhüm phai semlabü hoba ngeibü ngühkhüm deikhüm jungeilabü. Kheijinei haoen kü mütli yinglabü, hoba ngo haoeneibü Mühghaü yinglabü.
Lausikei aoyouei haoeneibü maangponei amaibü kümsilei shuong hoba mangsenlabü heangsho shuong phai semtida, ngei haoenei kümbü haoeneibü khu thükto sungbakulabü,” dogo Thükenbou
Kheijinei kaakyembü kherabimei haoeneibü kaak tonenkei, hoba tongjinyou shuong kho haoen yoa thonan kikei, hoba Israel Mühghaü soneikangbü haoen thüka kikei.
Hobaje
Hobaje Soushouei ngo tonenkei, hoba Mühghaü Soushouei mangsanga langsenbü shuong jungto Babilon to ngo leian lotkei. Kheijinei ngei hapbü mangsang kho kü ka angan apbei,
hoba ngei
Haoei laukei, “Müteibü shou, ngüha alebü phangshuong yoa kida. Haoen la haplabü nyek yemakei lausikei ühüpda hoba ditlabü nou yemakei lausikei aditda, aishanga haoen ngüha alebü chung ki.

“Hibü, O müteibü shou, satbümaubüeibü on che tegü lamleashi, hoba haoenei hapbo chaloua satashi, kaoen che ka kaoen che to haoen thedanga no langsenbü che tegü hauashi. Aingenyu haoen lenbü aditbü chung yingasikei haoenei ditenlakei thükkei.
Hobaje nyi kaibü on chaloua haoenei hapbo langsenshang to haula shanga künlebü kho sungba. Hobaje nyi chasem haoenei hapbo mütshuong thüngshang to haubü tegü no lolo hauan lenshi.
Haoenei chühko kijinei nyi kümthanga khün yettiashi, hoba nyi künlebü on kho danko langashi.
Kaibü on kho haoenei hapbo kaibü phaka künenashi, hoba kho nakthüh phanga, khei nyi kao ühüplabü lele kaibü thenyek küplepan künlangashi, aishanga Israel chung thedanga ngei no tetsida che yeitida.”
Hibü
Ngeyang
“Müteibü shou, tubüsekbü Israel chungei ka to, ‘Nyi ai kümda’ dogo alau lo?
Haoen to lenshi, ‘Thükenbou
‘Ngo kan shanga tetsida che ki,’ dogo haoen to lenshi. Ngei kümbü tegütham haoen to kümlabü. Haoen satbümaubü hoba langsenbü yeilabü.

Haoen yoa kibü yaangenbouei haoeneibü on phaka tonlabü hoba nakthüh phanga haulabü hoba haoei kümthang paiko thuyetlabü hoba kho danko anglabü. Haoeibü nyekei kao ühüplabü lele haoei haoeibü thenyek yukleplabü.
Ngei ngeibü tak hao la seilepbulabü, hoba hao ngeibü taka minlabü; Khaldibü kaodak Babilon to ngei hao leian loulabü, khei yingasikei haoei kho ühüplabü hoba khünei hao hailabü.
Hobaje hao to thuilabü shuong hoba hao kaijembo kibü khangenbü tan pendou ngei yeia pendou ae aatilabü, hoba ngei haoen in jungan shieilabü.
“Ladang ngei haoen phangshuong yoa lintilaje hoba kaonyek pendoua phinnyintilaje, kheijinei haoenei ngo
Lausikei haoen lae aeto ong haulaje phangshuong yoa haoeneibü mangsenlabü kümsilei shuong shedbü nathekula shanga ngei haoen shisho mühsinou ka hoba limsilang ka khümenlabü, hoba haoenei ngo
Tokei
“Müteibü shou, kaibü nyak lühjilühko shauashi, hoba hatbü ka kaibü dei nyaakeiko yungashi.
Hobaje kaonyek kabü mütli shuong to lenashi: ‘Jerusalema hoba Israel kaodaka kibü shuong shangabü Thükenbou
Müt kibü sangnyu shuong tekan aplabü, hoba kaonyek sangliphang la yeilabü. Kheijinei kanei ngo
“Müteibü shou, ‘Chalou shuong welangda, hoba tetenbü shuong aloushadda,’ dogo Israel kaonyeka lauyobü kaneibü tetenbü ngüh kho ai?”
Hibü haoen to lenshi, “Thükenbou
“Aishanga touje Israel chung yoa amlangbü mangsang hoba suletjaletbü shambülebü thusei ngüh lauyobü akilabü.
Lausikei ngo
“Müteibü shou, chühashi, Israel phangshuongei lauda, ‘Haoei hapbü mangsang kho loulabü posilit juong shanga ki, hoba haoei jih lounyu shanga tetenko lauda.’
Hibü haoen to lenshi, ‘Thükenbou
“Müteibü shou, tou tetenko kibü Israelbü thuseibü shuong khulimbo teten- ashi. Jembü maang ka bakbü thusei ngüh laubü shuong to hai lenashi: ‘
“Thükenbou
O Israel, kaibü thuseibü shuong kho sangliphang kabü selong shuong phatkei.
eibü chaloua loenlabü shanga kan leilubü kümthang kümetla üang ayingsi Israel chung shanga ba aleku.
Haoeneibü mangsang kho amlangbü hoba haoeneibü tetenbü kho yepeijawebü.
Ngei ajoyonyu kanei, ‘
Hibü Thükenbou

Jim akibü mangsang hapbü thuseibü shuong hoba yepeijaweko tetenbü shuong khulimbo ngeibü ik kilabü. Haoenei ngeibü mütli kishanga kaoen ühüplabü, ayingsi Israel chung dobü lea haoen adoletlabü, ayingsi Israel kaodak to haoen alottilabü. Kheijinei kanei ngo Thükenbou
“Aieilausi haoenei solo akinyu, ‘Solo kia,’ dogo lauko ngeibü mütli shuong suletkei, lausikei hakso akida, hoba ladang atei ba kümthang yaülaje, chüh- ashi, haoenei kho shiniei naanglepda,

hibü haoen shinei naangko küplepbü shuong to kho tuonglabü dogo lenshi. Langdok kaangbü louan piyungdei yungsen koutilabü hoba senlaang yaangbang attilabü hoba yeithu- yeinakei kho nopthetthet apbulabü.
Ladang kümthang kho tuonglaje mütshuongei kan to, ‘Kanei shini naangbü kho lala?’ dogo alaulep lo?”
Hibü Thükenbou
Hibü ngei kanei shiniei naanglepbü kümthang kho pankulabü hoba kaoa yeptikulabü, hibü chemshang kho khongthu la yeilabü. Ladang kho tuonglaje kho yoa kan maulabü; hoba kanei ngo
“Kho tegü banyu kümthang hoba shini naangko küplepbü mütshuong khulimbo ngei maangshat phetan aplabü. Ngei kan to, ‘Banyu kümthang hoba kho naangbü shuong,
hoba Jerusalem shanga tetenbü thuseibü shuong, hoba sao shanga sangmai mangsangje akinyu sangmai mangsang hapbei dogo laubü shuong koulanga dogo laulabü,’ dogo Thükenbou
hoba lenashi, ‘Thükenbou

Yepeijawebü ngüh ditbü ngeibü mütli to yepeijaweko lauko barli youshou ikkhong che shenko shanga hoba wentek hansho shanga ühüiko kilabü langkei haitila hoba langkei akilabü mütshuong khümenla shanga kanei ngo hoba ngeibü mütli shuong shatida.’
“Hibü Thükenbou
Ngei kaneibü yuklepbü nei jitan apbulabü hoba kaneibü ik ka kü mütli khümenlabü, hoba haoen ashieitila shanga touje kaneibü ika akilabü. Kheijinei kanei ngo

“Aieilausi ngei ngühmaanglanbü hau athettiko kijinei kan yepeijawebüei haoen maang- üangti, hoba amaibüa ong haoen maangpon asepeitiko hoba langkei akhümenko kitilabü lele kanei haoen maang kaangtikei,
hibü kanei touje amlangbü mangsang ayingsi yepeijaweko atetenlabü. Ngei kaneibü ik ka kü mütli shuong khümenlabü. Hobaje kanei ngo
Israelbü khuleibü at kü jungto loukei, hoba kü thedanga setkei.
Kheijinei
“Müteibü shou, khübü mütshuongeibü maanga heangsho shuong phoakei hoba khübüei haoen thea shedshonbü phaiyetlaang phoakei. Haoenei kü to joyola ai janbü ki?
“Hibü haoen to joyoashi hoba hai lenshi, Thükenbou
Khübü heangsho shuongei Israel chungeibü maangpon khümbo kü jungka kuktikei, lausikei ngeibü jongaibü danko ngei haoen leibangaila haujemda.
“Hibü Israel mütli to lenshi, Thükenbou

“Ladang Israelbü at ayingsi Israelbü to penan kibü küksithang jembü lolo kü jungka bangjung satda hoba haoeibü maangpon to heangsho shuong sungletda, hoba hao thea shedshonbü phaiyetlaang phoda hoba thuseibü jungto hao danko kü shangabü phela hauda, ngo
Kho müt khulimbo ngei ngeibü the sepeilabü, hoba hao tetlatala hoba amaaphelabü laueilabü ngüh che yeitilabü. Ngei hao kü mütli yo ka wapan aplabü. Kheijinei kanei ngo
“Hobaje thuseibou kho khü- pettiko ngüh lautialonga ngo
Hobaje thuseibou si hao lambou hamei jeteibü shedshon kayang künlabü.

Kheijinei Israel mütliei touje kü ka bangjung asatlabü, ayingsi haoeneibü shabü pendouei touje haoen lolo ashalabü. Haoen ngeibü mütli shuong yinglabü, hoba ngo haoeneibü Mühghaü yinglabü, dogo Thükenbou
Hobaje

“Müteibü shou, kaonyek cheei maangalanbü danko kükhu limbo shabü shonalonga, hoba ngei kho khulimbo ngeibü ik shingalonga hoba khünei kibü shausiyung leilutialonga hoba kho thükto mühsinou hautialonga hoba khükabü mütshuong si meisiau haitialonga,
habü müt sem Noa, Daniel hoba Job, khünei kiasi dogokei haoeneibü saopobüei haoeneibü langkei ong khümenlabü, dogo Thükenbou
“Ayingsi ngei yamkabü meisiau kaonyek danko hautia longa hoba haoenei taketkhüman kho sangliphang la yeitialonga, khei meisiau kibü haangjung müt aokei danjung ohauenlonga,
ngei thekolanko laukho, dogo Thükenbou
“Ayingsi ngei ho kaonyek khulimbo in che sungbaalonga hoba, ‘Kaonyek danko in hautishi,’ dogo laualonga hoba müt si meisiau ham haitialonga,
ngei thekolanko laukho, khei khübü müt sem kho khünei kiteia habü tegükei haoenei haoeneibü nou- yang jayangshou shuong akhümenlabü, lausikei haoen ong khümenlabü, dogo Thükenbou
“Ayingsi ngei kaonyek to limsilang che hautialonga hoba kaonyek ka müt si meisiau shemtila ngei kho thükto sii angbü danko ngeibü maangshat hakan jinkualonga,
ngei thekolanko laukho, Noa, Daniel hoba Job khünei kiasi dogokei haoenei nouyang jayangshou shuong akhümenlabü, dogo Thükenbou
“Aishanga Thükenbou

Khei yingasikei, chühashi, leilanglabü joubü nouyang jayangshou shuong shisho apyolabü. Chühashi, haoen kan jungto loulabü, hoba ladang kanei haoeneibü thechüh hoba haoeneibü kümsilei haplaje, ngei Jerusalem thükto amaibü sungbabü shanga hoba ngei kho thükto sungbabü pendou shanga kan solotilabü.
Hobaje ladang kanei haoeneibü thechüh hoba haoeneibü kümsilei haplaje haoenei kan haksotilabü, hoba ngei khünei kümbü pendou ai ayingkoje aküm, dogo kanei ngelabü, dogo Thükenbou
Hobaje
“Müteibü shou, lubü bulong toje semlüh long ai aei hoba yama kibü bulong toje semlüh bhek ai khaibou ki?
Kho ka den che shanga waphei sunglep sai? Shikchak nyakchak, thungsiphau at anan phola shanga mütei lelep sai?
Chühashi, kho jikla wan to jinda hoba wanei jijithon ham londa hoba khoeibü lom wanei juokthetda, ho kümsilei denche shanga lejim kia sai?
Chühashi, pemtou kijinei kho ainei lejim akiteilonga, wanei kho juokthet- an hoba lonan phaia kho kümsilei maibü denche shanga toukei lejim kilep sai?
“Hibü Thükenbou
Hobaje ngeibü thenyek haoen khulimbo pholabü. Haoen wan ka longlabü, lausikei wanei haoen lonlabü. Ladang ngei ngeibü the haoen khulimbo pholaje, kheijinei kanei ngo
Hobaje ngei kaonyek sangli- phang la yeitilabü, aieilausi haoen maangalan, dogo Thükenbou
“Müteibü shou, Jerusalema saoeibü mangsenlabü kümsilei shuong ngetiashi,
hoba laushi, Thükenbou
“No bukbü hoba no nashouabü jihsiphai kho Kanan kaodak ki; hoba kaibü bou Amorbü, hoba kaibü nyu Hitbü kiteikei.
Hobaje no bukletbü nasakshoua kaibü shung alipbu ayingsi no deiei asakenku, ka la jem aikei anaangku, ayingsi nasak neiei aikei asho.
Aoeikei ka shanga sanouko dambuko khübü at ongkei kümla ka to nyekei onouko achüh. Lausikei no buknyet ka to mangsenkei, hoba khongthua tekan apbei.
“Kheijinei ngo dankei hoba ngei no kaibü siia khoneiko hapbei. No siiei khuilepan kiteikei, hoba ngei ka to laukei, ‘Tou lang kiashi!’

Hobaje ngei no khongthu kabü bulong phatko chingtikei. No chingkei hoba thong loukei hoba no pendou to saomaibü yaksa la yeiko chingenkei. Kaibü sen tokkei hoba kaibü khulou yembei, khei yingasikei no mütkong kelutham kiteikei.

“Kho phaia ngo no nyangko dankei, hoba ka to chühsi, ka to sanouyolabü jihsiphai sühan kiteikei. Hobaje ngei ngeibü neiei no mütkongbü küpletkukei. Haü, ngei no kankei, hoba ka to chemkanla theyolanyokei, hoba no ngeibü la yeikei, dogo Thükenbou
“Kheijinei ngei no deiei mang yukukei, haü, ngei ka ka sii sakan apbukei, hoba ngei ka la onang naangkukei.
Tokei, ngei ka la noksa kakbü neisimei lekukei phekhon ngok lonkukei. Ngei ka la inyaibü khude tekukei hoba namton hele lekukei.
Hobaje kaibü ika ngei phülem chikhap hangan jinkukei, hoba kaibü ngüma yak yakkukei.
Hobaje ngei ka la kungsaü chinem khapbukei, noua chipen jikukei hoba kaibü khua hemaibü khun hankukei.

Kho tegü no hon si chandinamei janko lekukei; hoba kaibü nei noksa shuian takbü inyaibü nei hoba shanshanbü nei kiteikei. Kaibü shausiyung kho inyaibü wen, naodei hoba onang kikei. No son kakko saomaian yeikei; hoba Chobasao la yeikei.
Hobaje kaibü hemaisaomai nyensang phangshuong yoa phinthonkei, aishanga ngei ka la soumo yaang phokukei kho benbüsoubü yeikei, dogo Thükenbou
“Lausikei nyi kaibü saomaibüa maanglembei; hoba kaibü nyenhang nyi suonlambü kümsileia jungeikei. Danbüphaibü weko la no yepbukei hoba kaibü saomai haoeibü la yeikei.
Hobaje nyi kaibü neisiei at hangletkei hoba tonenbü lemshang hele lamlekei, hoba khonei nyi suonlam kümsilei kümbei. Kheibü kümsilei ühaüthükjan ayingsi ladangkei aloushadjan.
Tokei nyi ngei ka la kubü hon hoba chandinam sungkei hoba kho nyi ka shanga bousu heangsho kümla lekei hoba khübü yoa suonlam kümsilei kümbei.
Hobaje nyi kaibü noksa jinbü neiei khübü kho küplepbei, hoba khübü thedanga ngeibü onang si ngeibü jenjuokbü phokukei.
Tokei ngei ka la kubü wentek, wen inyaibü si oliv onang hoba naodei, laobouei no sambei, nyi khübü khokei haoen thedanga ponlem maibü shanga phokukei,” dogo Thükenbou
Kanei kü shanga bukkubü nouyang jayangshou shuong kanei sungkei hoba haoen heangsho shuong la lembüsabü shanga kukei. Kaneibü suonlambü hoei ongkei soubü aying lo?
Kanei ngeibü shousi shuong haitikei hoba heangsho shuong la juokbü lembü kukei.
Kaibü mangsenlabü hoba suonlambü kümsilei pendoua nyi no kaibü siia khoneiko kibü kaibü nashouabü chalou shuong nyi adamen.
Ügütü! Ka to ügütü, dogo Thükenbou
kanei kan shanga saopobü lemshang dangkei hoba khongnyu wekoa kan shanga suonlamshang kümbei.
Khongnyu naphei wekoa nyi jembü kishang kümbei hoba khünei no saomaibü mangsenlabü yeitikei, hoba danbü phaibü weko la kaibü you kaakkukei; hoba kaibü suonlambü aei yeitikei.
Tokei nyi ka lepbou Ijep to maangdühbüa suonlambü jungeikei; hoba ngo maangto shattila kaibü suonlambü aei ong yeitikei.

“Hibü, chühashi, ngei ka thükto ngeibü ik tuokkei, hoba ngeibü haülabü ka kaibü phejan ngailangkei. Ngei no ka to mangsenbü Filistiabü shuong, aoyou kaibü asangalan kümsilei shanga himouko ki, haoen la khümbo kua.
“No mü to jambüyangbüei maanga amaiko tokei nyi Assiriabü to jambei. Haü, no haoeneibü suonlamnyu kiteikei, lausikei haoenei no senyüh- ashemti.”
Kho phaia nyi Khaldibü namyaknamseibü yoa suonlam kümsilei kümbei, khei yingankei khoei no senyühashem.
“Jajasasa suonlamsao kümsilei khübü pendou nyi hapan kaibü maangpon lai hau akiko ki, dogo Thükenbou
Khongnyu wekoa nyi heangsho lemshang dangda hoba suonlambü jungeida. Lausikei no nyishoubü mulebü suonlambü tegü khongto asatda.
No asangalanbü yak! Nyi jembü lao jeiko lubü yensiau to asangalanko kida.
Suonlamnyu wekoei jembü mu hapda, lausikei nyi kaibü pejapela shanga pendou aeka ka jungto yepla naloula shanga nyi haoen la anyem shangkuko kaibü sanoubü shuong pendou la jongsak kuda.
Hibü no lubü suonlamnyu shuong to mudonga lulusap; bousu aoeikei ka to dühko ka to asuaja. Aoeikei ka la mu aku; nyi bouje haoen la kukei! Haü, no mudonga lulusap.”
Hibü no, O suonlamnyu,
Thükenbou

Hibü chühashi, ka to sanouyobü shuong pendou, aoyou to no olinbü hapbei, khei nyi sanouko kibü pendou, hoba nyi mangsenbü pendou ngei leishailabü. Ngei haoen pendou no kaijembo kamshaitilabü, hoba ngei kaibü neisimei khokan apbulabü hoba haoen la no mütkong haptilabü.
Hobaje chemdang yeibü asangalan hoba müt haitibü kayang matjemei ngei no yuktilabü; hoba ngei ka thükto ngeibü khauang hoba maangshat longbüa haibü sungbalabü.

Kheijinei ngei no haoeneibü ik to khümbo kuan aplabü, hoba haoenei no kishang hoba nyi suonlambü si heangsho lemshang kümbü pankulabü. Haoenei kaibü neisimei hoba phülem langkulabü hoba haoenei no mütkong apyolabü.
“Haoenei no khulimbo mütshang che leishailabü hoba ka to laangei sonlabü, hoba haoenei no inei netla yeiko jemnyinlabü.

Hobaje haoenei kaibü chem wanei jikan apbulabü, hoba yaksa juong thedanga ka thükto kayang sungbalabü. Ngei no kaibü suonlam kümsilei ka thaktilabü, hoba nyi kaibü sanoubü shuong la jongsak kubü bangtilabü.
Kheijinei ngeibü khauang longbü koulabü hoba ngo sangsembo yeilabü. Touje ngeibü nyekshat maangshat khauang ka ka banglabü.

Aieilausi nyi kaibü nashouabü chalou shuong adamen lausikei khübü kümsilei pendouei ngo khauangtikei. Hibü chühashi, ngei maimaitham kaibü khu thükto kaibü kümsilei künan jinkulabü. Aila nyi lubü mangsenlabü kümsilei thükto pejapelabü shomyokei?” dogo Thükenbou

No maimaitham nyueibü nou- yangshou ki. Saoei saoeibü lao si saoeibü shousi shuong mangsenkei. No kaibü nousinasi shuong phatkei, aoyouei haoeneibü laosi shuong hoba shousi shuong mangsenkei. No hoba kaibü nousinasi sangnyu shuongei Hitbü nyu hoba Amorbü bou kiteikei.
“Kaibü nou si saoeibü sangnyu shuong kho yungthang aenei Samaria ki. Kaibü na si saoeibü sangnyu shuong kho yungkük aenei Sodom ki.
Haoeneibü youmo phai semla hoba haoeneibü amaibü kümsilei neinoula no maang nyema lo? Aying, longchetanga kaibü kümsilei pendoua haoenei kümbü tokei nyi amaibou kümbo kiteikei.
“Ngo langkeibü Mühghaü ki shongko,” dogo Thükenbou
Chühashi, ho kaibü nou Sodomei shedshonbü kiteikei: Sao hoba saoeibü nouyangshou shuong lilisese, naangmaibüa apsilebü hoba hopabü; lausikei saoei shalebü si khonkubü to athounou.
Haoen lilian apbei hoba kü thedanga mangsenlabü kümbei. Hibü kanei hapbü tegütham ngei haoen shemtikei.

“Samariaei kanei shonbü shedbü shabü ka jamde thüng ongkei ashon. Nyi haoen tokei yongbou mangsenlabü kümsilei kümbei. Nyi kümbü mangsenlabü kümsilei shuong takteialonga kaibü nasi shuong saopobou tegütham ki.
Nyi tou kaibü himou thonglabü. Ka to takteiyoalonga kanasi shuongje saopobü tegü chühlabü lele nyi haoen tokei aei amaibou shabü shonkei.”
khei ngo khau angtila shanga nyi kümbü pendou laüa nyi himou künlabü hoba kanasi shuongeibü naangmaibü shangabü nyi himouko damlabü.
Kheijinei kana Sodom si saoeibü sangnyu shuong hoba Samaria si saoeibü sangnyu shuong shangiedbü thu to longeilabü; hoba no si kaibü sangnyu shuong shangiedbü thu to sepeilabü.
Aishanga no yonglam lilibü chaloua kana Sodom shangabü nyi laulonga alauei.

No amaibü tangto alongjinei, Edom nouyangshou shuong hoba sao kaijembo kibü pendouei, hoba Filistiabü nou- yangshou shuong si aoyou no kaijembo ki, haoenei ka to nyikubü hoba hakbü chalou phatko no kia.
Nyi kaibü pejapela thedühmaangdüh hoba mangsenlabü kümsilei shuong ka longbü on künngailabü,” dogo
“Thükenbou
Khei yingasikei no nashoudanga ngei ka to theyolanyobü ngei damenlabü, hoba ngei ka yoa thonsithak akibü thesilan kümlabü.

Kheijinei nyi kaibü kümsilei shuong damenlabü, hoba ladang nyi kaibü nousinasi shuong sungletlaje himouko kilabü. Ngei haoen ka la nouyangshou yingla kulabü, lausikei kho ngei ka to thebülanbü shanga aying.
Hibü ngei ngeibü thebülanbü ka yoa pholabü, hoba ngo
Ladang ngei nyi kümbü pendou ka la amai apbuko angthetlaje kheijinei nyi shedbü pendou damenlabü hoba ngüh angla ongkei himoulabü lele kilabü,” dogo Thükenbou
Hobaje
“Müteibü shou, ngühsung che kuashi hoba ngühphatbü che Israel mütli to lenashi.
Haoen to hai lenshi, ‘Thükenbou
Haoei hoten bhekyaak kho khean sungkei hoba haoei kho namyak namseibü kaonyek che to sungjung haukei, hoba haoei kho namseibü sangnyu chenei kean phokukei.
Haoei tokei Israel kaonyek ka lilabü ponshou at sungjung haukei, hoba kho kaomaia kekei. Haoei kho dei juong kibü kaoen kabü willo bulong tegü apyokei.

Hobaje kho yembei hoba khaüjung satbü semlüh long tuibü la yeikei. Bhek shuong kho aulu ae yeian chingkei, hoba khoeibü li phangto haüko atkei. Hibü kho semlüh long la yeikei, hoba bhek shuong longkei, hoba bhek haanbü shuong yembei.

“Tokei aulu lubü yaangbü che kaak yaang hoba wi juong angan kikei. Hobaje chühashi, semlüh long khoei hao ae haoeibü li süngjung litikei, hoba hao ka dei nahapla shanga mudonga yeman kibü kaoen ka bhek kho hao aeto sepeian khuikei.,
Lausikei khoeibü bhek khaüan mai hektila hoba hangenbü semlüh long yeitila shanga mudonga kho kaomaia hoba dei juong kibüa kekei.
“Hibü, ngo Thükenbou
Haü, ho keakei, lausikei ho langasao ayingsi chingasao? Chaangbou yeiei soualonga ho ayuilep lo? Yemshang khünei ho yuian üplep lo?”
Tokei

“Ngüha alebü chung to lenashi, ‘Kanei ho ngühphatbü tetlabü ngekeilao?’ Haoen to lenashi: ‘Babilonbü Choba Jerusalem to loukei, hoba khükabü Choba si haoeibü leiyeibü yaangbü shuong hao yoa Babilon to leian ngaikei.
Hobaje hao chemdang ka lilabü che sungkei, hoba hao yoa theyolan- yobü che phangto hao attikei. Haoei tokei kaonyek kabü leiyeibü shuong leilangkei.
Kho Choba sangle nyibou loenla athüklabü lele phangto nakan yantilabü, lausikei haoeibü thebülanbü jungeibüei hao loan kienlabü shanga kikei.

Lausikei Jihudabü Chobaei hao khulimbo lokei hoba haoeibü lambubou shuong Ijep to koli si sepai juong hao la hautikushi dogo phela hautikei. Haoei thükenlep lo? Kho tegübü kümsilei kümbo hao satenlep lo? Haoei thebülanbü leilutian hao tokei satenlep lo?
“Ngo lang kishongko, dogo Thükenbou
Ladang Babilonbüei langkei juongnyu shemtila shanga kaomang laiko thulaje hoba lapheishon shelaje kheijinei Ijep Choba Faraoeibü lakjaibü sepai tan yaangbüeikei hao to thuijim akilabü.
Haoei theyolanyobü leilubüei jembüei theletbü aweasüng. Aieilausi haoei jembüeibü ngühei theletan khübü pendou kümbei, khoei hao asatenlabü.
“Hibü Thükenbou
Ngei hao la meishibüeibü tak sankulabü hoba ngeibü taka hao minlabü. Ngei hao Babilon to leilanglabü hoba khünei hao khulimbo ngühkhüm lulimbü kayang matjem kulabü, aieilausi hao kü to maangalan.
Haoeibü shanenbü sepai tan pendou lasona inei tuonglabü, hoba jouletbü shuong pendou ae aalabü. Kheijinei kanei ngo
Thükenbou
“Ngeikei cedar bulong hoten kho sunglabü,
hoba hoten bhek haanbü ka alibü sem kho sunglabü
hoba ngei kho shetenbü shongh suokbüa kelabü,
khei Israeleibü shonghkhu suokbouthama kelabü.
Khoei bhek longtilabü hoba lang heklabü
hoba nyenhang kibü cedar bulong che yeilabü.
Kaakyembü au phang pendouei khonei hap huonglabü
hoba khoeibü yeme phanga haksolabü.
Kaonyua yembü bulong pendouei
ngo
Ngei bulong yaangbü chengan koutida
hoba bulong hanbü lounyu chingtida.
Ngei bulong sangtüngbü lintida
hoba linbü bulong sangtüngtida.
Ngo
hoba laukei, “Israel kaoa mütshuongei ho tetentanbü athakko jungeibü ngühtet ai?
‘Bousi shuongei haijepbü semlüh shaukei,
Lausikei shousi shuong to hauh ambei.’
“Ngo lang kishongko, dogo Thükenbou
Chühashi, müt pendou ngeibü, boueibü langkei tegütham shoueibü langkeikei ngeibü ong. Shabü shonbou langkei khoje hailabü.
“Ngühtet chenei müt che saopobü hoba janbü ong kümbo ngühmaanglanbü ki.
Haoei shongha Israelbüeibü heangsho alemda ayingsi asakkubü lemshang kabü lembüsabü shausiyung ashauda. Haoei jembü lepboueibü yak to ajamda, ayingsi ihinseibü jihsiphaia yaksa to ajamda.
Haoei aokei ahonetda ayingsi akokda. Haoei hao ka lotboueibü angthetnam kungaida; haoei mühbünoubü la oknyinda hoba mütkongbü la neisimei kuda.
Haoei phobnam pailetla shanga alotkuda. Müt si müt kanglanga oyolemenbüa amaibü kümla haoei senetda hoba ngühmaanglanbü janthet kuda.
Kheibü mütei ngei sakkubüa ngüha leda hoba kü ngühkhüm jungeida. Hao saopobü, hoba hao lang kilabü,” dogo Thükenbou
“Tokei ngühtet chenei haoei soshau soyungbü hoba müt haitibou, ayingsi habü tegübü lubü amaibü kümsilei kümbü shou che kia,
(khei boueije kheibü kümsileije ladangkei aküm). Haoei shongh kabü lemshanga lembüsabü phe shauda, hoba müeibü yak to jamda.
Haoei shalebü si akialebü shieikoeda. Hao koklasemla hauda. Haoei lotboueibü angthetnam akungaida. Hao küksithangeibü lemshang to hauda. Haoei mangsenlabü heangsho shuong lemda,

hoba haoei pailetla shanga phobnam lela lotkuda. Kho tegübü müt lang kilep sai? Aying, hao lang akilabü. Aieilausi haoei khübü mangsenlabü pendou kümbei, hibü hao haitilabü hoba haoeibü sii hao thüka kilabü.
“Lausikei ngühtet chenei nyiboubü müt khoei shou che kia. Haoei haobouei kümbü shabü kümsilei pendou hapda, lausikei haoei bouei kümbü nei anou.
Haoei Israelbüeibü heangsho shuong to alemda ayingsi asakkubü lemshanga lembüsabü shausiyung ashauda. Haoeibü lubüeibü yak to ajamda,
ayingsi aokei ashiakoeda ayingsi aoeibükei akoklangda. Lotbouei hao la angthetnam phokubü kungaida. Haoei mühbünoubü la oknyinda hoba mütkongbü la neisimei kuda.
Haoei shabü ka haoeibü ik senetda hoba phobnam pailetla shanga alotkuda. Haoei kü ngühkhüm jungeida hoba ngei sakkubü phai semda. Hao boueibü shabü shanga ühailabü; hao tükde lang kilabü.
Lausikei haobouje haoeibü shabü shanga hailabü, aieilausi haoei jaisina ka soshau soyungkei hoba kokkei hoba jembü mütli yoa ai amai kho kümbei.

“Lausikei kanei lauda, ‘Aila shouei boueibü shabü akünla?’ Aieilausi shouei janbü hoba tükdebü kümbei. Haoei kü ngühkhüm jungeikei hoba ngeibü sakkubü phai maangsangko sembei, hibü khoei hao lang kilabü.

Shabü shonbou müt khoje hailabü. Boueibü shedbüshabü shouei akünlabü, ayingsi shoueibü shedbüshabü bouei akünlabü. Saopoboueibü kümsilei maibü kho hao thüka kilabü, hoba amaiboueibü kümsilei amaibü kho hao khulimbo kilabü.
“Lausikei müt amaibouei haoei shonbü jembü shedbüshabü pendou ka sepeialonga, hoba kü ngühkhüm janbü hoba tükdebü kho kümalonga, hao maimaitham lang kilabü; haoje ühailabü.
Haoei kümoubü shedbüshabü aikei hao khulimbo adamenlabü. Aieilausi haoei kümbü saopobüa hao lang kilabü.
Amaibü müt haibüa ngo olinbü ki sai?” dogo Thükenbou

“Lausikei ladang saopobou haoeibü saopobü ka sepeinyu satlaje hoba shed shonlaje hoba amaibouei kümbü tegü mangsenlabü kümsilei pendou kümlaje hao lang kilep lo? Aying! Haoei kümbü saopobü che ongkei adamenlabü. Ngühmaangalanbü ka hao sheda hoba haoeibü shedshonbüa hao hailabü.
“Lausikei kanei lauda, ‘
Ladang saopobü mütei haoeibü saopobü ka sepeinyu ngailaje, hoba shed shonlaje, hao hailabü.
Ladang amaibü mütei haoei kümbü shabbü ka sepeida hoba janbü ngühkhüm si tükdebü kho kümda, haoei hao langkei khümenlabü.
Aieilausi haoei kümbü hoba ngühkhüm lulimbü shabü pendou haoei damanchühda hoba hao khüka sepeinyu longeida, hao maimaitham lang kilabü; hao ühailabü.
Khei yingasikei Israel chungei lauda, ‘
“Hibü, O Israel chung, mütpem weko lulueibü kümsilei thüng ngei kan mat jemlabü, dogo Thükenbou
Kanei shonshaibü ngühkhüm lulimbü pendou kan lolo tekan apashi, hoba kaneibü maangpon haanbü hoba langkei haanbü yeiashi. Aila kan haila, O Israel chung?
Aishanga ao haibüakei ngo olinko aki,” dogo Thükenbou
Kaibü nyu ai kikei? Molosaonyu nyunyu!
Saoei sekbülakbü molosaonyu paang shuong yoa
saoeibü shoushou shuong chingentikei.
Saoei saoeibü shoushou shuong yo ka che pangteienkei;
hao la lamshaula ngetikei
hoba haoei müt shaula ditletkei.
Phangshuongei hao shangabü ditkei,
hoba haoenei haoen püngkhüna minoukei.
Haoenei hao ngauyaüjinei Ijep kaodak to senan haukei.
Saoei saoeibü maanglem athonshongko chüheikei.
Kheijinei saoei lubü molosaonyu shoushou che chingentikei,
hoba hao sekbülakbü molosaonyu paang la yeikei.
Ladang hao chingenkei,
hao lubü molosaonyu yoa shoongkei.
Haoeikei meisiau taketla hoba müt shaula ditletkei.
Haoei lapheishon pankukei
hoba sangnyu shuong leilukukei.
Haoei ngühbü langh wekoei
kaonyu kabü mütshuong mokde apyokei.
Phangshuongei hao to wapyola meimeikei;
kaophei pendou aeka pendou ka mütshuong loukei.
Haoenei meishibü tak sankukei
hoba haoeneibü taka hao mintikei.
Haoenei hao ngauyaüjinei thüngshang chem to jinkei
hoba Babilonbü Choba jungto leian haukei.
Touje haoei ngühbü Israel shongha
ladangkei aditlabü lele haoenei hao
lombou phanga thüngkei.
Kanyu, dei nyangko kebü kaibü semlühlaak
kabü semlühlong phatko kikei.
Aieilausi dei apsileko kibüei,
semlühlong kho bhek si mai hekbüei shenan kikei.
Saoeibü bhek kho hau kikei
hoba Chobaeibü julo la yeiko chingkei.
Semlühlong kho sangmeia jakko louan chingkei;
müt pendouei sao buham yaangbü hoba loubü hapbei.
Lausikei khau angbü ikei sao lito mokko pheienkei
hoba kaoa tekan apbei.
Hobaje chaangbou yeiei khoeibü hek lintikei.
Saoeibü bhek shuong ngokan apbei;
haoen yuian apbei hoba wana lonkei.
Touje sao phetsen kaoa,
kaolin hoba dei akibü kaoa keakei.
Saoeibü bumanga wan lapbei;
wanei khoeibü bhek si hek lona.
Touje bhek shuong kho ladangkei hau akingailabü,
hoba Chobaeibü julo la alelabü.”
Ho waangbü chia ki; ho thonsithak akiko laukei.
Langsenbü po nyetboubü, lit ngaoboubü, chalou anbounyet, Israelbü leiyeibü at
Kheijinei
“Müteibü shou, Israelbü jaishou shuong to joyoashi, hoba haoen to, Thükenbou
“Nyi haoeneibü mat jemlep lo? Müteibü shou, nyi haoeneibü mat jemlep lo? Khülonga haoeneibü pisiboueibü mangsenlabü kümsilei shuong ngeentiashi,
hoba haoen to lenshi: Thükenbou
Khünyet chaloua, ngei haoen sendei si naodei kouko kibü kaodak, khei kaodak pendou tokei shanenbü kaonyek to leian atla shanga haoen Ijep ka leibalabü dogo ngei haoen la thekukei.
Hobaje ngei haoen to laukei: Kan mütpem wekoei kanei dühbü mangsenlabü heangsho shuong apashi, hoba amlangbü Ijepbü mühghaü shuongei kan lolo teshati, aieilausi ngo kaneibü

Lausikei haoenei ngo khulimbo meimeikei hoba kü to ngüha ale. Haoenei mangsenlabü heangsho shuong ayingsi haoenei Ijepbü mühghaü shuong üpyo. Hibü ngei Ijep kaodaka ngeibü khauang longbü haoen khulimbo kümla shanga hakan jinkulabü dogo ngei laukei.
Lausikei phangshuong aoyou yoa haoen kiteikei khübü thea, hoba Ijep ka haoen leian longbüei ngo Israelbü thedanga tang khittikei, haoen thedanga ngeibü nyen ashatilabü laüa ngei kho aküm.
“Hibü ngei haoen Ijep kaodak ka leian longkei hoba yam to haoen leian loukei.
Hobaje ao mütei kho kümlaje hao lang kilabü lele ngei haoen la kü ngühkhüm kukei hoba ngeibü sakkubü ngetikei.
Tokei ngei haoen la ngo hoba haoen kanglanga tetsida phola hoba ngo

Lausikei Israel mütshuongei yama mangkei ngo khulimbo meimeikei. Haoenei ngeibü ngühkhüm leilukei hoba haoenei ngeibü sakkubü inletkei, laobou mütei jungeia longa haoeibü langkei kila kiteikei. Haoenei Nounyet khümbomeiko shatikei. Hibü ngei haoen yama shemtila shanga haoen la ngeibü khauang longbü hakan jinkulabü dogo ngei laukei.
Lausikei phangshuong thea ngei Israelbü shuong Ijep ka leibako hapbü shuong thedanga kü nyen ashatilabü laüa ngei kho aküm.
Hibü khoei ngei sendei si naodei kouko kibü kaodak, pendou to shanenbü kaonyek to haoen leian ütlabü dogo ngei yama ik tuokan thekukei.
Aieilausi haoenei ngeibü sakkubü inletkei hoba kü ngühkhüm leilukei, hoba ngeibü Nounyet shatikei. Aishanga haoeneibü maangpon heangsho lembü phaito haukei.
“Khei yingasikei haoen shemtila ngei onouko dambei. Ngei haoen yama ashemtila janthetkei.
Ngei yama haoeneibü shousi shuong to laukei: Kan kaneibü pisibou ngühkhüm deikhüma tepai, ayingsi haoeneibü sakkubü tejungei, ayingsi haoeneibü heangshoei kan lolo teshati.
Ngo kaneibü
Ngeibü Nounyet saüenan phoashi, hoba khübü kho ngo hoba kan kanglanga kanei ngo

“Lausikei shousi shuongeikei ngo khulimbei. Haoenei ngeibü ngükhüm deikhüma apai, hoba ngeibü sakkubü ngüh shuong maangsangko ajungei, laobou mütei kümalonga khünei langkei kilabü. Haoenei ngeibü Nounyet shuong shatikei, hibü haoen khulimbo yama ngo khauang longbü haoen thükto khüpan jinkulabü dogo ngei laukei.
Lausikei phangshuong thea ngei Israelbü shuong Ijep ka leibako hapbü shuong thedanga kü nyen ashatilabü laüa ngei kho kümbei.
Hibü ngei yama lubü thebülanbü che kümbei. Ngei haoen kaonyek pendoua phangshuong yoa phinnyintilabü dogo theletlanletkei.
Aieilausi haoenei ngeibü ngühkhüma ngüha ale lausikei ngeibü sakkubü inletkei hoba ngeibü Nounyet shuong shatikei; hoba haoeneibü nyek haoeneibü pisiboueibü heangsho phai sembei.
“Kheijinei ngei haoen la amaibü ngühkhüm hoba langkei asungbalabü sakkubü shuong kukei.
Ngei haoen lolo haoeneibü lembüei shatikei, hoba haoeneibü jembü jayangshousi shuong juokbü lembü kutikei. Kho haoen shieikoela hoba haoen la ngo
“Hibü müteibü shou, Israelbü chung to joyoashi, hoba haoen to lenashi: Thükenbou

Ngei haoen la kulabü dogo ik tuokko theletlanletbü kaodak to haoen leibakei. Ladang haoenei shongh suokbü hoba bukhu shangtüngtham hapbei, haoenei khübü wekoa haitibü juokbü lembü kukei. Khünei haoenei juokbü lembü kubü hoba yunglabü lembü sungbabü danko ngo khau angtikei.
Kheijinei ngei haoen to phekei: Kan haushang shongh kho ai tegübü che? Hibü tat sühko kho kaodak to ‘Bama’ dogo lauda.
Hibü, Israelbü shuong to lenshi: Thükenbou

Tat dogokei kanei jeteibü jongsak kuda hoba kaneibü shousi shuong haoen la wana juokbü lembü kubü danko jeteibü heangsho shuong yoa kan lolo shatida. Hobaje O kan Israelbü shuong, kü jungto ngeibü maangangbü phela loulep lo! Ngo langkeibü Mühghaü ki shongko, ngei kan la kü ka ai aphetilabü, dogo Thükenbou
Kanei lauda: Kün bu si laang lembü lubü kaodak phangshuong hoba mütli shuong phatko kimang sühda. Lausikei kaneibü maanga kibü kho ladangkei aloushadlabü.
“Ngo langkeibü Mühghaü ki shongko, dogo Thükenbou
Hobaje hauki yaangkibü ikei hoba khauang maangpokei ngei kan phangshuong yo ka leibalabü hoba kan phinnyinan kibü kaonyek mütshuong yo ka leishailabü.
Hobaje ngei kan ‘Phangshuongeibü Phetsenkao’ to leibalabü hoba khünei theshuok matjema yuktilabü.
Ijep kaodak Sinai Phetsen kaoa kaneibü pisibousishuong matjema yuktibü tegü, ngei kan yuktilabü,” dogo Thükenbou
“Hobaje ngei kan julo the- petbü phangto khomtilabü hoba ngei kan to theyolanyobü ngüha letilabü.

Hobaje kan yo ka khulimbo meimeibü shuong hoba ngo khulimbo ngühkhüm leilubü shuong ngei saüenlabü; haoen yen la lean kibü kaodak ka ngei haoen leian longlabü, lausikei Israel kaodak to haoen leian ütlabü, hoba kanei ngo
“Kan shanga, O Israel chung, Thükenbou
Aishanga ngeibü saopobü shongh, Israelbü shongh khua, khünei Israel mütli pendouei kaonyeka ngo khangenlabü hoba khonei ngei haoen sungletlabü, dogo Thükenbou
Ladang mütshuong yo ka ngei kan leiyenlaje hoba ainei kan phinthonan ki khübü ka leishailaje ponlem teibü tegü ngei kan sungletlabü hoba phangshuongei hapbo ngo kan yoa saüenan kilabü.
Ladang Israel kaodak to hoba kaneibü pisibousi la kulabü dogo thekubü kaodak to, ngeibü ik shingbüei ngei kan leian loulaje, kheijinei kanei ngo
Khünei kan lolo shatiko kümbü amaibü kümsilei shuong pendou kanei damenlabü; hoba kanei kümbü amaibü kümsilei pendou kanei mangsenlabü.
Hobaje, O kan Israel mütli, ladang ngei kaneibü shedbü kümsilei ayingsi kanei amaibü kümbü thüng ayingko ngei kan to jungeilaje kheijinei kanei ngo
Hobaje
“Müteibü shou, kaibü thenyek yungthang ae sepeiashi; yungthang khulimbo songlenashi hoba yungthang yam khongthuyaang khulimbo thusei ngüh lenashi.
Hobaje yungthang ae yam to lenashi:
Hobaje ngo
Kheijinei ngei laukei, “Ügütü, Thükenbou
Hobaje
“Müteibü shou, kaibü thenyek Jerusalem ae yeiashi hoba saoposhang khulimbo songlenashi. Israel kaodak khulimbo tetenashi
hoba sao to lenashi: ‘
Aieilausi yungkük ka yungthang sühko ngei saopobü si asaopobü ham wapan apla shanga ngeibü in mepou to nyibou angailabü.
Kheijinei müt pendouei ngo
“Hibü ngühashi, müteibü shou! Haoen thedanga maangpon leiluko hoba maangto shatbü yaangei nyi ngühashi.

Hobaje ladang haoenei ka to, ‘Nyi aila ngühda?’ dogo phelaje, nyi laulabü, ‘Lousühko kibü ngühlang shangabü; aieilausi maangpon weko tühnyinlabü hoba ik pendou hau akiko aplabü; soushou weko semthetlabü, hoba youkük weko dei tegü hau akiko aplabü.’ Chühashi, kho lousühada! Kho kümlabü haang, dogo Thükenbou
“Müteibü shou, tetenashi hoba lauashi, ‘
In, in, ho phametnyu uakei hoba lailaitham samenakei.
Kho haitila shanga uakei,
kho langpon maimai yingtila samena.
Khünei maangmai angyobü kila athük,
aishanga kü mütliei maangsanglabü si kayang weko nyikukei.
Haitibou ika junglabü lele ong
inlou kho lailaitham samenan kia.
Ngekashi hoba haapashi, müteibü shou,
aishanga ho kü mütli thüka
hoba Israel leiyeibü pendou thüka kia.
Haoen pendou ngeibü mütli joubü shuong yoa
liko haitilabü shuong ki.
Hibü kaneibü khükjak to ipashi.
Aishanga ngei kü mütli takteida,
hoba haoen maangpon asepeilabü laualonga,
khübü pendou haoen to haüthüklabü.
“Hibü no, müteibü shou, thusei ngüh joyoashi. Kaibü ik ipashi hoba in kho nyibou louyantiashi, hoba kho semboukei louyantiashi. Ho haitibou in, haitibou in yaangbü ki!
Hibü hoei haoeneibü maangpon tühnyinda hoba phaiyetda. Ngei haoen haitila shanga bakhün pendoua inlou phokuakei. Oh! haitila shanga ho langpon tegütham jajalalatham lotakei.
O akbü inlou, nanae maeae ik shatashi, lae aeto ong kaibü thenyek sepeilaje wapashi!
Ngei ngeibü ik iplabü, hoba ngeibü khauangbü koulabü. Ngo
“Tokei no, müteibü shou, Babilon Chobaeibü in louenlabü lele nyi lam penyi chühan phoashi. Penyi ham kho kaonyek jetei ka khanglabü. Sangnyu lambheka shensinge che phoashi.
Nyi lamnyu che Ammoneibü shousi shuong Rabba khulimbo loula hoba lubü che kho Jihuda si thangtetan kibü Jerusalem khulimbo loulabü lamnyu chühletan phoashi.

Aishanga Babilonbü Choba lamnyu penyi la bhekshang lambheka lolabü. Lambhek khonei haoei laujin shuong jungeiko phaang paklabü, haoei heangsho noksa to phelabü, hoba haoei lembü meisiaueibü senei silip jako takteilabü.

Chühashi, tou haoeibü mae ika jungbü shensinge kho ‘Jerusalem’ dogo kiteikei! Hoei hao to banyu kümthang tuyetko haula, haitilabü ngühkhüm kula, langh yaangbüei lashuok uihinla, bakhüna pangetlela, kao yaüenla, hoba latho phasei kümla shanga.
Hao to theyobü leabuba ho amlangbü soutakan chühda dogo ong Jerusalemei damlabü. Lausikei ho tetenbüei haoeneibü shedbüshabü laüa haoen langsenlabü shangabü damentida.
Hibü Thükenbou
“Hobaje no, O asaopobü Israel songdakbou, kaibü jihsiphai lousüha, kayang jihsiphai sühan apa.
Thükenbou
Lusakbü! Lusakbü! Ngei ho leilubü che la yeitilabü! Ho tükdebü ao shangabü yingkeije hao alou shongko aikei ajeileilabü; hao la ngei kho kulabü.
“Hobaje no, O müteibü shou, thusei ngüh joyoashi hoba lenashi: Ammonbü shousi shuong shangabü hoba haoenei nyikubü shangabü Thükenbou
‘Inlou, inlou, haitila setenan kia,
langpon tegü ponko shemtila shanga samenan kia.
Kan shangabü amlangbü mangsang hoba thulenbü kubü jeila, ho haitilabü müt amaibü shuongeibü ngüma tenkulabü, aoyoueibü jihsiphai, khei aoyoueibü thonbü matjem kayang chalou lousühan apa.
“ ‘Inlou kho mepou to ngaitiashi! No kümshang hoba no bukbü kaodaka ngei no mat jemlabü.
Hobaje ngei ngeibü khauang ka thükto khüpan jinkulabü hoba ngo maangpokbü ngei ka thükto metan jinkulabü; hoba ngei no kaangbüsekbü hoba müt haitila sekokbü ik to khümbo kulabü.
No wan shanga bu yinglabü. Kaibü kaonyeka kaibü sii phinlabü, hoba no touje adamenlabü.’” Aishanga ngo
“Müteibü shou, nyi sii phinbü sangnyu mat jemlep lo? Kholonga sao la saoeibü mangsenlabü kümsilei pendou damentiashi
hoba laushi: Thükenbou

Nyi lolo jembü sii phinbüa no shedla yeida, hoba nyi kümbü heangshoei no shedan apa. Nyi kaibü chalou nyangbou to loutikei, hoba kaibü po thonbü sühjung loutikei. Hibü ngei no phang pendou shanga haklabü hoba kaonyek pendou thedanga akhainyu yeitilabü.
Aoyou no nyangko ki hoba aoyou ka jungka saako bangan ki haoenei ka la nyikulabü, O no, oyolemenei shenbü nyenshedbou sangnyu.
Chühashi, kan yoa Israel khuleibü shuongei haoeneibü hau pendou sii phinbüa kuda.
Sangnyua kanei nyusibou aweasüngda. Kanei kan yoa homan kibü yenbou shuong shieikoeko jungeida hoba shoujitshou si latnyu shuong amaiko jungeida.
Nyi ngeibü saopobü peisilei shuong awealau, hoba nyi ngeibü Nounyet shatikei.
Kan yoa müt haitila jukbüsabü shuong at kia, hoba kan yoa müt at heangsho to lembüsabü shausiyung shaubü kia hoba müt at nyekdüh maangdüh loushedtibou shuong kia.
Kan yoa at jembüeibü bousi shuongeibü yaksi to jambü ki; kan yoa at yaksa mang asaopojinei tukosekko jambü kia.
Kan yoa atei jembü lepboueibü yak to mangsenlabü kümsilei jungeida, hoba atei thedüh maangdühei jembü shoueibü yak shatida, hoba kan yoa atei jembüeibü na, khei nyumaunyueibü shou shatida.
Kan yoa sii phintila besa anyem leda; hoba nyi kaibü lepbou la lotkubü ka aeilam aeiphopei phobnam leko pailetda. Hobaje ngoje maan apakei,” dogo Thükenbou
“Chühashi, nyi maang alanbü pailetbü lebü hoba kan yoa sii phintibü shanga ngeibü ik seman ngümlabü.
Ngei kan khei jungeibü chaloua kan to maangkhai ayingsi kaneibü ik shingla hau kiteilep lo? Ngo
Ngei kan phangshuong yoa phinnyintilabü, hoba ngei kaonyek shuong jungto lintilabü; hoba kaibü ihinseibü kümsilei thonbü che to loutilabü.
Hobaje ladang no phangshuongei hapbo shaanlaje, kheijinei nyi ngo
Kheijinei
“Müteibü shou, kü thedanga Israel chemdang namphet la yeiakei; haoen pendou yaüshema chisaknam, tinnam, nammai hoba shisanam phatko ki, haoen chandinam phet ki.
Hibü Thükenbou

Mütei chandinam, chisaknam, nammai, shisanam hoba tinnam wanei juokko tühnyinla yaüshema onshaibü tegü, ngei ngeibü khauang longbü hoba ngeibü maangshata kan sangnyu to leishailabü hoba khonei tühnyintilabü.
Haü, ngei kan leishailabü hoba ngeibü khauang maangpok wan kan la metan jinkulabü, hoba khonei kan tühnyinlabü.
Chandinam yaüshema tühnyinbü phatko kan sangnyua tühnyintilabü, hoba ngo
Tokei
“Müteibü shou, Israelbü to lenashi, khei haoeneibü kaonyu kho asaopobü ki, khoei ngei ngeibü kauang maangpoka shieikoeda.

Aishanga kaonyeka songdakbü shuong kho molosaonyuei ngühko, jembüei haitian, shaula meisiau phenthetbü phatko ki; haoenei müteibü langkei suida, haoenei nyaksinam si namsek peisilei soda hoba haoenei saoshuong juong latnyu la yeitida.

Saoeibü ungshedbou shuongei kü ngühkhüm leiluda, hoba ngeibü saopobü peisilei shuong shatida; haoenei saopobü si takübü kümsilei abangnyinda; hoba haoenei ngeibü Nounyet shuong weeiko aki. Kho tegütham Israelbüei ngo shatida.
Saoeibü khuleibü shuong kho haitibü meisiau phenthetbou sho shuong phatko ki. Haoen keila yaangla shanga haoenei müt haitida.
Haoeneibü thuseibü shuongei tokei haoeneibü kümthanga shini son naangko haoen to amlangbü mangsang lenko amlangbü thu tetenkuda.
Kaonyek kabü naangmaibü mütshuongei khü- pettida hoba soshau soyungda. Haoenei shalebü shieikoeda hoba küksithangbü amaiko jungeida.
Ngei haoen yoa kümthang yaüla hoba kaonyek lusakbü lothetko püetla, ngei kho leilutila kibü ka thangetla shanga müt che laman chühkei, lausikei ngei che ongkei ühüp.
Hibü ngeibü khauang maangpok haoen la khü- pan jinkulabü, ngeibü khauangbü wanei ngei haoen mautilabü, hoba haoeneibü kümsilei shuong ngei haoeneibü khua kün lekulabü, dogo Thükenbou
Müteibü shou, nyu cheeibü shou yaksashou müt nyi kikei.
Hobaje haosi medei jiha Ijepa kijinei saosüngbü haang mautikei hoba suonlam kümsilei kümbei.
Noushounyueibü nyen Ohola hoba naeibü nyen Oholiba kikei. Hobaje haosi ngeibü yak la lekei, hoba haosiei nouyang jayangshou bukkukei. Ohola kho Samaria hoba Oholiba kho Jerusalem kikei.
Hobaje sao küyak yingasikei, Oholaei suonlam kümsilei kümbei hoba saoei sao to nyekthebü Assiriabü shuong to saoei aeibou sanoukei.
Haoen kho nakthüngan sakbü neisimei lebü kikei, governor shuong hoba lakjaibü shuong; haoen pendou süngsilop maibü heshou shuong kolia setbü koli sepai shuong kikei.
Hobaje saoei haoen to maangdühkei hoba haoeneibü heangsho pendou yoa saoei jembü lolo totkei.

Ijep ka leian loubü jihsiphai ka thama saoei suonlambü üpyo, laonei saoei saosüngbü haang mautikei. Sao yaksa nashou che ong kijinei ka jaüan bousuei sao junga yepbei hoba suonlambü che hima jungeikei.
Hibü saoei suletbü sao to sanoubü Assiriabü ikto ngei sao khümbo kukei.

Haoenei sao mütkong phokukei, saoeibü jayang nouyangshou shuong laplangkei hoba haoenei sao inei wapettikei. Yaksa shuong yoa sao shangabü tetlaltalabü ngüh che la yeikei, aishanga haoenei sao thüka mat jembei.
Saoeibü na Oholibaei kho hapasikei, sao aeiko Ohola tokei amaibou nyekdüh maangdüh hoba suonlambüa kiteikei.
Hobaje saoei Assiriabü governor shuong hoba saoeibü yaangenbü shuong, soumo aeibou kiko hele lebü shuong, koli sepai shuong hoba hemaibü heshou shuong to dühbü yaang kikei.
Hobaje saokei totnyina dogo ngei hapbei; haosi hamei lamnyu jeteibüa paikei.
“Lausikei saoei sao suonlambü aei ong yeitikei. Aishanga Khaldibü noksa mangkei shouko saklangbü laüei kümbü
shembe neiei kaian lean, laama hambü neiei khua kaian haoen bukmüt kao Khaldia Babilonbü phatko haoen pendou chühla leiyeibü shuong tegü noksa kümthanga saoei hapbei.
Saoei haoen hapsilengko saoei haoen to dühkei, hoba haoen jungto Khaldi to ngühlang künbü hautikei.
Hobaje Babilonbü saoeibü sanou yepshang to lotkei. Haoen sao jungeikei haoenei sao totnyinkukei hoba sao haoen yoa ihinseiko apbei hoba lepde haoen to saoei mangsenko bangkei.
Hibü saoei sao suonlambü hoba sao mütkongbü ngean aptikei, kheijinei ngeibü soushouei nou to mangsenko bangkei.
Khei yingasikei sao Ijepa suonlambü tokei aei, sao medei jih damenko sao suonlambü aei yeitikei.
Hobaje saoei khongkabü laosi shuong, aoyoueibü dühbü gadueibü ayingsi kolieibü tegütham kikei, khübü to dühbüei shenkei.
Kho tegü Oholiba, nyi no yaksa nashoua Ijepa kijinei kaibü senlanga jungbü hoba sen alibüa nyatbü thedüh maangdüh nyi nyibou dambo loutida.
“Hibü, O Oholiba, Thükenbou

Ngei Babilonbü hoba Khaldibü pendou, hoba Pekod, Shoa hoba Koa ka, hoba Assiriabü pendou leibalabü. Ngei ngeibü süngmai lopmai heshou shuong, governor shuong, hoba haoeneibü lakjaibü pendou, nyenshen mütshuong hoba kolia setbü shuong pendou leishailabü.

Hobaje haoeneibü insiaubu, koli kailong si tongjin kailong, hoba phangshuong tan yoa no khulimbo loulabü. Haoenei no kaijembo thangetlabü aih haanbü hoba nameibü khun pholabü hoba ngei haoen la matjem kulabü hoba haoeneibü matjem younak haangei ka la kayang kulabü.

Ngei ngo nyekto shatbü kakhu limbo pholabü hoba haoenei ka to maangshat lamlam kümlabü. Haoenei kaibü kung si nou shipan apbulabü hoba kaibü shousi shuong haitilabü. Haü, haoenei kaibü jayang nouyangshou shuong ka ka sunglabü hoba joubü shuong wana lang juokettilabü.
Haoenei tokei kaibü neisimei hangletkulabü hoba kaibü namsek chisiyak sunglangkulabü.
Kho tegü kaibü maangdüh kho thaktikulabü hoba Ijep kaodak ka sungbabü kaibü pejapela ka ka ngei thaktilabü. Nyi touje kaibü nyekei haoen to adühlabü, ayingsi Ijep touje adamenlabü.”
Aishanga Thükenbou
Hobaje haoenei ka to mangsenko jungeilabü hoba nyi mouenbü pendou sunglangkulabü, hoba no mütkong apyolabü, hoba kaibü suonlambü tang khittilabü. Kaibü maangdüh si kaibü pejapelaei
khübü kho ka thükto sungbakei. Aieilausi no phangshuong shanga suonlamnyu che kiteikei hoba haoeneibü heangshoei jembü lolo shakei.
No kaibü noueibü lama paikei, hibü jeteibü kayang thung yungla kulabü.”
Thükenbou
“Nyi kaibü noueibü thung ka yunglabü;
laobou haülangtham hoba yaangbü ki kho ka yunglabü.
Mütpem wekoei haklabü hoba nyikulabü;
thung kho shenettiakei.
Hoei no khonkubü hoba ihjaak yeitilabü,
hoba hatbülühbü hoba lusakbü thung kho,
kanou Samariaeibü thung ki.
Nyi kho yunglabü hoba sopan aplabü,
hoba kho chakkok nyinbüei
kaibü sen jitnyinlabü.
Aishanga ngei joyoa, dogo Thükenbou
Hibü Thükenbou
Aishanga haosiei asangalan shonkei hoba khoeibü sii haosi ika kia. Haosiei haosieibü heangsho yoa asangalan jungeikei; haosiei kü la bukkubü shousi shuong juokbü lembü kukei.
Hobaje haosiei kümbü kho ong aying. Haosiei ngeibü Lembüchem shatikei, hoba Nounyet shatikei.
Aishanga haosiei ngeibü shousi shuong heangsho la haitian lemla kunyet haosi ngeibü Lembüchem to loukei hoba kho shatikei! Kho tegütham haosiei ngeibü chema jungeikei!
“Haosiei tokei tokei saabü ka mütshuong chila ngühlang künbü hautikei, hoba ladang haoen lousühkei, kheijinei nousinanyiei mang yukei hoba nyeka son naangkei hoba chühjanko hele lekei.
Hobaje soumo kibü yepshang thüka haoen thedanga khümsok che lamlekuan kibü junga haosiei ponlem hibü hoba onang shimtian phokuan khonei haosi setkei.

Khünei saonyi kaijembo ekyonyiyoko kibü langh ditkei; phetsen kao ka Sabeabü shuong yoa sousiwat mütshuong yoan leibaan kikei. Haoenei saonyieibü ika chikhap hangan jinkukei, hoba haosieibü khua khun maibü hankukei.
Kheijinei ngei asangalanei hüshuokan kibü shangabü laukei, ‘Tou haoenei sao kho suonlamnyu la nalea, aishanga sao kheibü la lelabü ong joukei.’
Hobaje haoen suonlamnyunyi jungto tokei tokei atkei. Haoen peja- pelabü yaksanyi, Ohola si Oholiba jungto ngaikei.
Lausikei saopobü mütshuongei asangalanbü yaksa shuong thükto kayang kukei, aieilausi haosi asangalan sao, hoba haosi ika sii phinbü ki.”
Aishanga Thükenbou
Hobaje mütshuongei haoen to laangei sonashi hoba in jungan shiashi hoba haoeneibü jayang nouyangshou shuong haitiashi, hoba haoeneibü chem wanei thean apbuashi.
Kho tegü ngei kaonyeka pejapela thontikulabü, khei yaksa pendouei asangalana haosi nei anoutila maangsanglabü lenlabü.
Hobaje kasi nousinanyikei ngei kasieibü pejapela hoba heangsho lembü shabü shanga shieikoelabü. Kheijinei kanei ngo Thükenbou
Langsenbü po güboubü, lit anboubü, chalou anbounyet,
“Müteibü shou, tat chaloutham nyi chalou dolet- ashi, aieilausi tat chaloubou- atham Babilonbü Chobaei Jerusalem komlepla khangda.
Hobaje ngüha alebü chung to ngühphatbü che joyoashi, hoba haoen to lenshi: Thükenbou
Khaüchak wana hangashi,
hoba kho deiei soptiashi.
Khonei phe netshou maiboutham jinashi,
kho youshi phejak si phak phejakei,
khei pienbü lo maibüei shentiashi.
Pienbü sanlon tan ka sungenashi;
chak phanga bu shangashi.
Dei tühtiashi;
lo si phemai maisho thungashi.”
Hibü Thükenbou
Aishanga saoei phintibü sii sao to kia; lausikei sii kho thamei küpleplabü lele kaomaia asangti; saoei kho laangdaka sangtiakei.
Khauang longko phoklam naloula shanga kho aküpletlabü lele ngei saoeibü sii kho laang thüka phokukei.”
Hibü Thükenbou
Bu juongko shangashi! Wan kho souashi! Phe kho yingko thungashi! Shikdei kho ontiashi! Losilak shuong jikan apashi.
Touje chisak namchak kongbü kho wankaka hangashi hoba saklangtham juokentiashi. Kheijinei namtüh kho khokletan phaiaje jungeila saüenbü yinglabü.
Lausi dogokei latetche auko juoklaje juokasikei kho mak shangbü khoje akhokletlabü.
Hibü, O Jerusalem, kaibü pejapelabü kümeileiei no shatia. Ngei no saüenkula haujemsikei no khei ong totnyinan ki. Ka thükto ngeibü khauang maangshat alotshongko no nyibou ihinseilabü.
Ngo
“Müteibü shou, chühashi, ngei ka nyek to loubou kho ikok cheei sunglanglabü. Khei yingasikei nyi mang ühaaplabü ayingsi ühaapjan ayingsi kaibü nyek ka nyeksi üangjan.
Ngüh alongko maangngangshi, haibü shanga mang tühaap. Manghaap küktet kaibü khua akhaiko ayingsi kaibü youa ngok alonko tohau. Kaibü sembung teküplet ayingsi mang haapbü shausiyung teshau.”
Hibü ngei mütshuong to ngeyang kho tegü joyokei, hoba chasem kü yak haikei hoba nyibounyet ngei kü la sakkubü tegü kümbei.
Hobaje mütshuongei kü to phekei, “Nyi hai kümbü ho kün shanga ai ngühtet yingkeije kün la alenlep lo?”
Hibü ngei haoen to laukei, “
Israel chung to lenashi: Thükenbou
Hobaje ngei kümbü maimai kanei kümlabü. Kanei kaneibü sembung aküpletlabü ayingsi manghaap shausiyung ashauayunglabü.
Kanei khua akaiko ayingsi youkong apailabü ayingsi mang ühaaplabü ayingsi ühaaplabü. Kaneibü shabü hangjung kan linetlabü, hoba kan cheei che to ngühyoko kilabü.
Kheijinei Ezekiel kan shanga tetsida che kilabü; haoei kümbü tegütham kanei kümlabü. Ladang ho loushadlaje kheijinei kanei ngo Thükenbou
Khünyet chaloua satenbü yo ka at louan kan la kho ngühlang lenlabü.
Kho chaloua ao satenan ki hao jungto kaibü sembung iplabü hoba nyi ngüh laulabü hoba touje li akhiplabü. Hibü no haoen thedanga shenla ngelabü che kilabü hoba haoenei ngo
Hobaje
“Müteibü shou, Ammonbü aeto kaibü thenyek sepeiashi hoba haoen khulimbo tetenashi.
Ammonbü shousi shuong to lenashi, ‘Thükenbou

Hibü chühashi, chaangbou aekabü shousi shuong la letila shanga ngei no khümbo kulabü. Hobaje haoenei ka to otshang kümlabü hoba khonei sang sanglabü. Haoenei kaibü buhek shaulabü hoba kaibü sendei yunglabü.
Ngei Rabba ut shuong shanga lamshaushang yeitilabü hoba Ammon kaonyek khümbo sanshuong shanga yepshang yeitila ngei no khümbo kulabü. Kheijinei kanei ngo
“Aishanga Thükenbou

hibü chühashi, ngei kakhu limbo ngeibü ik tuoklabü hoba phangshuong la shitila shanga khümbo kulabü. Ngei no mütli yo ka wapan aplabü hoba ngei no kaonyek ka lemailela mauan aptilabü. Ngei no mautilabü hoba nyi ngo
Thükenbou
Chühashi, ngei Moabeibü jiphei leilang kabü sangnyu shuong ka shanenbü sangnyu shuong khei Bet Jeshimot, Baal Meon, hoba Kiriathaim yoan shitilabü.
Ngei Ammon yoan Moabeibü chaangbou aekabü shousi shuong la letila kuan aplabü, hibü phangshuongei touje kho adamenlabü.
Kho tegü ngei Moab thükto mat jemlabü, hoba ngo
Thükenbou
Hibü Thükenbou
Edom thükto ngei kü mütli Israelbü ik danko phoklamlabü, hoba haoenei ngeibü khauang si maangshat thüng Edom to jungeilabü; hoba haoenei ngeibü phoklambü ngelabü,” dogo Thükenbou
Thükenbou
Hibü Thükenbou
Hobaje ngei haoen thükto hatla moklabü khauang yaangei phoklamlabü. Hobaje ladang ngei haoen thükto phoklamlaje kheijinei haoenei ngo
Kün langsenbü po anthük- che boubü lita chalou shaangbounyet
