“Müteibü shou, aieilausi Tairei Jerusalem khulimbo ‘Akhai’ dogo laukei! Phangshuongeibü bakhün sakleda, hoba khoeibü koukap shuong kü shanga ipan apa; touje sao leiluan apabü ngo naangmailabü.
Hibü Thükenbou
Haoenei Tair kümthang shuong leilukulabü hoba saoeibü lapheishon shuong panletkulabü. Hobaje ngei sao ka kaomai pendou kuanaplabü hoba sao laangkudak ong yeitilabü.
Sao sangnyua ngau lapbü shuongeibü tak lamshang yeilabü, aishanga ngei kho lauan apa, dogo Thükenbou
hoba khongthua saoeibü jayang nouyang shuong inei haitilabü. Kheijinei Tairei ngo
Aishanga Thükenbou
Haoei kaibü jayang nouyangshou shuong khongthua inei wapettilabü. Labou shuongei no khulimbo phasei kümlabü, shongh suoketnyu yaülabü hoba kaibü kümthang limbo aihei thanglepnyu yaülabü.
Hobaje kaibü kümthang shuong danthetko haoei tuyetlabü buthem pholabü hoba wouei kaibü lapheishon jangnyinkulabü.

Haoeneibü koli shuong juongsapbüei haoeneibü thamnguei no khuileplabü. Koli shuong, koli kailong shuong hoba koli sepai shuong, tuyetbü sangnyu bakhün danko nujung danbü langhei kaibü kümthang shuong nyaakeilabü.
Haoeibü koli shuongei kaneibü khongnyu peiko nakeilabü hoba kaibü mütli shuong inei haitilabü hoba kaneibü haukibü heangsho thaonyu shuong kao to lotlabü.

Hobaje kaneibü nyaksinam haoenei aaklabü hoba kaneibü namyaknamsei solanglabü. Haoenei kaneibü kümthang shuong leilukulabü hoba kaneibü shanenbü chem shuong panletkulabü hoba kaneibü laang hoba kaneibü waphei hoba kaneibü kao khümbo haoenei simaang to jinkulabü.
Kanei chia laubü ngühlang ngei thaktikulabü, hoba kaneibü kongkin ngühlang touje adittilabü.
Hobaje ngei no laangkudak maimai yeitikulabü hoba no ngaulapbü shuongeibü tak lamshang la yeilabü. Sangnyu touje ladangkei akümetkulabü, aishanga ngo
Thükenbou

Kheijinei yungko kabü Choba shuong pendou Choba setshang ka louyanlabü hoba haoenei neisimei hangletnyu pholabü, hoba noksa jinbü neisimei khokan aplabü. Haoenei sensentham lühko nei neilabü, haoen kaoa setlabü, hoba jih weko lühlabü hoba kaibü thu to maangpanglabü.
Hobaje haoenei ka shanga ho manghaap chia laulabü:
O nyenhang sangnyu, no lai maukei!
Saoeibü longchem yungnyu ka ühüpbo apbei.
Ho sangnyu mütshuongei yungnyu thüka songdakkei
Hobaje yungkoa kibü shuong pendou hattiko kikei.
Tou ho tuongbü chaloua,
Su kaodak shuong lühda,
Hobaje kho tuongbüa haoen mütshuong hatyoda.”
Thükenbou

Kheijinei ngei no shangiedbü mütshuong yoa yola yemlam kaodak to yantilabü. Ngei no leilubü shuong yoa, kaonyumanga haibü shuong yoa kitilabü. No ladangkei alongeilabü ayingsi langkeibü shuong yoa kishang kaoen akimlabü.
Ngei no lepde maushang dangtilabü hoba no touje akilabü. Mütshuongei no lamla thükkei, lausikei no touje ladangkei ühüplabü, dogo Thükenbou
“Müteibü shou, Tair shangabü mang haapashi.
Yungnyu yungko lamnyua setbou yungko kaodak pendou aenei kibü mütshuongeibü namyak namseibou Tair to, ‘Thükenbou
O Tair, nyi lauda, ‘Ngo hemai saomaia penbüsoubü.’
Kaibü chem kho yungnyu ki.
No kümbou shuongei kaibü hemaisaomai pentisoutia;
Haoenei kaibü waphei pendou Hermon Shongh ka,
fir buei kümbei
Hobaje kaibü thaonyu shanga
Lebanon ka cedar bu sungbakei.
Haoenei longlei waphei kümla shanga
Bashan ka yembu sungbakei;
Haoenei Kupra su ka shon shanga busimei kümbei
Hobaje kho thunyu hauhei shuian kümbei.
Kaibü longlei nei kho inyaibü neiei kümbei,
Ijep ka noksa jinbü inyaibü nei maibü,
khei usa ka sosotham shenko kikei.
Elisha su ka sangtüngbü si nakthüngan sakbüei
Kaibü yemekoubü küman kikei.
Kaibü longlei waphei kho
Sidonbü si Arvadbü shuong kikei.
O Tair, kaibü songbüdobü shuong kho
longleibü dan kikei.
Longchemeibü mistri shuong kho
Gebalbü kabü sonenbü jaishou shuong kiteikei.
Yungmanga haubü longchem leibü dan weko ka
Kaibü namseishanga namyaksamsei kümbei.

“Persia, Lidia hoba Putbü mütshuong kaibü lakjaibü tan yoa sepai kümsileia khangenko kikei. Haoeneibü aih si namkhun kaibü kümthanga antian phokukei. Ka la soneikangbü thüksimin sungbabou kho haoen ki.
Arvad si Helekbü shuongei kaijeman kaibü kümthang lombo kikei; hoba Gammadbü mütshuongei kaibü lapheishon lombei. Haoenei haoeneibü aih kaibü kümthanga antian phokukei. No sao maitibou kho haoen ki.
“Kaibü nyaksinam den juong kibü danko Tarshishei ka to jeiyoko namseikei, chandinam, nammai, tin, hoba shisanamei ka to jeiyoko namseikei.
Javan, Tubal, hoba Meshekhei ka to namyak jekyokei; haoenei ka to aaomüt si chisaknamei lubü peisilei to jeiyokei.
Nyi kaibü namsei peisilei shuong Beth Togarmabü mütliei kato koli, wapyobü koli, hoba gadu lu jeiyokei.
Dedanbü mütshuongei ka to namyak jekyokei, hoba yungkoa kibü juong kaibü namseiyen kiteikei; haoenei kaibü peisilei lu ka la thunyu hauh si eboni kukei.

Nyi peisilei juongnyu longtibü ka Siria mütliei ka ka nyaksinam juong jeklangkei. Haoenei ka la kaibü peisilei lu emerald, nakthüngle sakbü nei, noksa shuibü kümsilei, phembanei inyaibü, koral hoba namseklaang jeikukei.
Jihuda si Israel kaodakei ka to namyak namsei kümbei; haoenei Minnith ka whet youshou, oliv onang, naodei, onang hoba maitibü moli yakyo jekyokei.
Kaibü nyaksinam juong hapshang kibüei hoba kaibü nyaksinam den juong kibü danko Damaskaei ka to Helbon ka ih hoba Zahar ka thupaibü wiei namyak seiyokei.
Uzal ka Danitbü si Grikbü shuongei ka to neisimeiei seiyojekyokei; namsak, budei hoba kalamus khübü kho kaibü namyak peisilei to jeiyokei.
Dedan mütshuongei meisiau taka müt setla imbü nei ka la yaakkukei.
Arabia si Kedar kabü leiyeibü shuong pendou kaibü namseiyen kikei; haoenei ka la san shoushou, sanlon paang hoba lon yaakkukei.
Sheba si Raama kabü namseibü danei ka to yaakyo jekyokei; kaibü peisilei shanga haoenei ponlem maiboutham hoba namsek laang, hoba hon kukei.
Haran, Kanne hoba Eden sangnyu shuong, Shebabü namyak namseibü shuong, Ashur si Khilmad sangnyu shuong, haoen pendouei ka to nam seiyokei.
Kaibü namyakshanga haoenei ka la shanenbü neisimei, nakthüngle sakbü, hoba noksa shuian kümbü, shuishuilelebü amnyu, hoba maisho yikyoan shenbü janglüh yaakkukei.
Tarshish kabü longchem shuongei kaibü namyak peisilei künkei.
No yungnyua onei manetnyu kibü
Longchem che phatkei.
Kaibü longchem leibü shuongei no dei haübü aeto leibakei,
Chaangbou yeiei no yungnyu jenyua leilutikei.
Kaibü nyaksinam, seibütakbü peisilei shuong,
Kaibü longchem leibü shuong pendou,
Kaibü longchemeibü mistri si kaibü namseibü dan,
Longchema atan kibü sepai shuong pendou,
Ladang kaibü longchem lusakkei
Kheijinei khümbomeiko yungnyua shema.
Kaibü longleibü shuongei ngekbü ngühlangei
Yungko nyaakeilabü.
“Longchem pendou inleda,
Hobaje longleibü pendou yungko to sada.
Haoen pendouei haoeneibü khu to tham mokan jinko
Hobaje tapa lekeiko ka shanga khauektham mang haapda.
Haoenei ka shanga haoeneibü khu shuan apda.
Hobaje haoen lolo senounei neida.
Haoen ka shanga mang haapjinei maang laakda.
Haoenei ka shanga manghaap chia atda:
‘Yungnyua sangsembo kibou
Tair to ao takteiyola?
Ladang kaibü namyak namsei yungnyua haukei,
Nyi phangshuong khambü senyühshemtikei.
Nyi kaibü nyaksinam juongbüei
Kaodak Choba shuong keitikei.
Tou no yungnyua lusakan kia;
No yungnyu haübüa shemjung atan leiluakei.
Kaibü namyak peisilei shuong
Hobaje ka shanga kümbüleibü shuong pendou
Ka yoa liko simaanga maua.’
“Sukoa kibü pendouei kaibü thu hapan maangpangda; haoeneibü Choba shuong hatbümokbüei shena hoba haoeneibü thenyek maangmauei shena.
Phangshuong yoa namyaknamseibü shuongei kaibü thu to mokde apyoda; no hatlamoklabü thonshang che to loua hoba touje no ladangkei akilabü.”
“Müteibü shou, Tairbü Choba to lenashi, Thükenbou
Daniel tokei no songsido kibou sai? Ka ka aikei huan aki sai?
Kaibü songeidoei, kaibü ditenbüei nyi kaibü nyaksinam sungbakei, hoba hon si chandinam kaibü thanshang to sungbakei.
Kaibü namyaknamsei songsido yaangbüei nyi nyaksinam thankei, hoba kaibü keisiyaangei kaibü maangpon liliseseko yeikei.
“Hibü Thükenbou
ngei no khulimbo kaangbüsekbü küksithang phangshuong leibalabü; haoenei kaibü saomaibü hoba songsido khulimbo haoeneibü in tonlabü hoba kaibü chühjanbü son leilutikulabü.
Haoenei no püngkhün to senyanlabü, hoba yungnyu jenyua haitian aplabü.
Khülonga nyi no haitibou shuong thedanga, ‘Ngo mühghaü che ki,’ dogo lauena sao? No haitibou shuong ikmanga no müt che ong, mühghaüje aying.
No küksithangeibü ikmanga akipbü shuong haibü hima hailabü. Aieilausi ngei kho lauan apa, dogo Thükenbou
Tokei
“Müteibü shou, Tairbü Choba shanga mang haapashi hoba hao to lenshi: Thükenbou

No Mühghaüeibü neichem Edena kikei; namsek laang wekoei no shanglepan kikei: phülem hoba daimond; topaz, beril, karnelian, hoba jasper; safair, emerald, hoba garnet. Nyi honeibü chisiyak kikei. No kümnyet khübü kho ka shanga lamlean kiteikei.
Ngei hatlamoklabü kaakyembü kherabim no lomla phokukei. No Mühghaüeibü saopobü shongha kikei; no jajalalabü namsek laang yoa paikei.
Nyi amaibü kümla akhangshongko no kümbü chalou ka jaüan ka to benbüsoubü kikei.

No namyaknamsei yaangbüei akong asaosapbo kikei, hoba khoei no ik shatyobü hoba shabü to leikei. Hibü ngei no Mühghaüeibü shongh ka saüjim tegü nangan apbei, hoba no homlepan kibü kaakyembü kherabimei no jajalalabü namsek laang yo ka shian sattikei.
Hemai saomaibüei no lilian yeikei, hoba kaibü nyenhangei nyi ngoualoua kümla khangkei. Hibü ngei no kaoa phetettikei; hoba lubü Choba shuong jemtentila ngei no haoen thea phokukei.

Kaibü shedshonbü juongei hoba no nam- yaknamseia ngühmaang alanbüa nyi saoposhang shatia. Hibü ngei ka ka wan longtikei, hoba khoei no suikei, hoba ka to chühko kibü shuong pendou thea ngei no tap la yeitikei.
No ngean kibü phangshuong pendou kaibü thu hapan mokde apyoda; no hatlamoklabü thonshang che to loua hoba touje ladangkei akilabü.”
Hobaje
“Müteibü shou, kaibü thenyek Sidon ae yeiashi, hoba sao khulimbo teten- ashi
hoba lauashi: Thükenbou
Aishanga ngei sao jungto shatlim hautikulabü hoba saoeibü khongnyua sii koutilabü. Jiji pendou aeka sao shilabü hoba saoeibü mütshuong inei hailabü. Kheijinei haoenei ngo
Thükenbou

Haoen khünei khümenan kilabü. Haü, haoenei chem danglabü hoba semlüh laak lelabü. Hobaje ngei haoen kaijembo kibü haoen la nyikubü pendou shieikoelabü, hoba Israel khümenan kilabü. Kheijinei haoenei ngo
Kün langsenbü po anboubü, lit anboubü, chalou anthüknyiboua
“Müteibü shou, Ijep Choba Farao khulimbo kaibü thenyek sepeiashi, hoba hao khulimbo hoba Ijepbü pendou khulimbo tetenashi.
Joyoashi hoba lenashi, Thükenbou
Ngei kaibü haken shedlangko ngauyaüjin che attikulabü hoba kaibü shumang kabü ngau shuongei kaibü koua khangyolabü. Kheijinei ngei no Nail shumang ka to khang- yoan kibü ngau pendou yoa sungenlabü.

Ngei no hoba kaibü shumanga kibü ngau pendou khongthuyaang kongkongbüa tekan aplabü. No kaoa atlabü hoba ahelabü ayingsi akhünlabü. Ngei no kaodak meisiau la hoba mühkabü aushuong la shausiyung shanga kulabü.
Kheijinei Ijep kaodaka kibü mütshuong pendouei ngo
Ladang haoenei ka to ikei jungkei no paknyinkei hoba haoeneibü ik si phak seithetkei, hoba ladang haoenei ka to nongyolangkei no pakngokkei hoba haoeneibü shenjang leptikei.
Hibü Thükenbou
Ijep sangliphanga nangletnyu apbü kaonyu che la yeilabü. Kheijinei haoenei ngo
“Aieilausi nyi laukei: Nail shumang kho ngeibü; ngei kho kümbei,

hibü ngo no khulimbo hoba Nail shumang khulimbo ki. Hobaje ngei Ijep kaodak kho yungthang aenei Migdol sangnyu ka yungkük aenei Aswan sangnyu sühko, hoba Ethiopia leilang onlangko lemailela leilubü hoba apshang dangbü kaonyu che la yeitilabü.
Khunakshousi ayingsi meisiau aieikei kho nakjung adanlabü. Po saonyi onko khonei aikei akilabü.
Ngei Ijep kaodakbü yoa pendou to amaiko leilubü sangliphang la yeitikulabü. Hobaje ngei Ijepbü shuong phangshuong yoa phinnyintilabü hoba kaonyek shenko haoen aatilabü.”
Thükenbou
hoba ngei Ijepbü thu nyibou kümetkulabü, hoba haoen bakshang Pathros kaonyek to leibalabü. Khünei haoen hau akibü Choba sangle che kilabü,
hoba haoen pendou to hau akibou Choba sangle yinglabü hoba haoenei ladangkei lubü phangshuong thüka songdak alelabü.
Touje Israel mütli shanga Ijep kho ladangkei maanglemshang ayinglabü lausikei haoen jungto thuibü khambo haubü kho shedbü dogo damenlabü. Kheijinei Israelei ngo Thükenbou
Kün langsenbü po saoto nyetboubü shaangboubü lita shaangbou nyet

“Müteibü shou, Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnezzarei Tair khulimbo haoeibü sepai tan la kümsilei yaangbünyu khangtia. Haoei on atsheibü küntibü danko sepai shuong khüngja khetikei hoba phakshok khokan aptikei, khei yingasikei hao ayingsi haoeibü sepai shuongei Tair khulimbo wapyola longyobü ka ai apailet.
Hibü Thükenbou
Haoei khangenbü shanga ngei hao la haoei kümbü mu tegü hao la Ijep kaonyek kuda, aieilausi hao hoba haoeibü sepai shuongei kü shanga kümbei, dogo Thükenbou
“Kho chaloua ngei Israel mütli shanga che longtilabü hoba ngei haoen yoa kaibü sembung hopatham ipbulabü hoba haoenei ngo
“Müteibü shou, tetenashi hoba lenashi: Thükenbou
Haapashi, hoba lauashi,
Khünyetbü chalou shanga ügütü!”
Aishanga chalou khama nyanga,
Haü,
Phangshuong shanga sangmei shangbü chalou,
Hobaje khonkulabü chalou yinglabü.
Ijepa lason kilabü
Hobaje Ethiopia thükto khonku loulabü.
Ijepa haitibü phetetet yeplabü,
Saoeibü nyaksinam aaklanglabü,
Hobaje saoeibü chemshang lusaklabü.
“Kho lasona Ethiopia, Libya, Lidia, Arabia, Kub, hoba ngeibü jembü mütli ka leishaibü sepai shuong yoan inei hailabü.”
ei hai lauda: “Yungkük aenei Migdol ka yungthang aenei Aswana sühko Ijep to aihkhün jambü dan pendou lasona hailabü. Ijepeibü lilisesebü lakjaibü tan shemlabü, dogo ngo Thükenbou
Ngei kaonyu kho kaodakbü yoa pendou to amaiko leilubü sangli- phang la yeitikulabü, hoba khoeibü sangnyu shuong kho lusakbü sangnyu shuong yoa kilabü.
Ladang ngei Ijep la wan sapbulaje hoba haoeibü pü lebü shuong khümbo shemtilaje kheijinei haoenei ngo
“Ladang kho chalou loulaje hoba Ijep maulaje, ngei khünyet apialembü Ethiopia mütshuong moktila longchema ngühlang künbü shuong hautilabü hoba haoen hatbülühbüei shenlabü. Kho chalou louada!”
Thükenbou
Hao hoba haoeibü mütli yoa sekbülakbü phang leian kaonyek kho mautila loulabü. Haoenei Ijep khulimbo haoeneibü in setenlabü, hoba mangjimei kaonyek shentilabü.
Hobaje ngei Nail shumang ulangtham aptilabü hoba Ijep kho müt amaibüeibü ik to kuan aplabü. Kaonyek hoba khünei kibü pendou ngei küksithangeibü ikei sangliphanga apyokulabü. Ngo
Thükenbou
Ngei yungkük Ijep sangliphang la yeitilabü hoba yungthang aenei Zoan sangnyua wan sapbulabü. Ngei Thebes sangnyu sangyaang shieikoelabü.
Ngei Pelusiam, Ijepeibü lapheishon thükto ngeibü khauang khüpan jinkulabü, hoba Thebes nyaksinam ngei wapan apbulabü.
Ngei Ijepa wan che sapbulabü, hoba Pelusiam khonku yaanga kilabü. Thebes kümthang leilunyu aplabü; hoba sangnyu kho yungsenei dangleplabü.
Heliopolis si Bubastis heshou shuong lasona inei hailabü, hoba lubü mütshuong lang senlabü.

Ladang ngei Ijepeibü songdak buleng hau leilukulaje Tahpanhesa nakthüh kilabü hoba haoen aeibou yonglam liliko kibü hau thonshang che to loutilabü. Sao sangmeiei khuileplabü, hoba saoeibü sangnyu shuong langsenbü to haulabü.
Kho tegü ngei Ijep shieikoelabü hoba haoenei ngo
Kün langsenbü po anthük- che boubü shaangbü lit chalou nyetbounyet
“Müteibü shou, ngei Ijepbü Choba Faraoeibü ik ngoktikua. Chühashi, mou maitila shanga aoeikei akaikukei ayingsi hau kiko in jungla shanga jutho akhühku.
Hibü Thükenbou
Ngei Ijepbü shuong phangshuong yoa phinnyintilabü hoba kaonyek shuong danko aatilabü.
Hobaje Babilonbü Chobaeibü ik hau kitilabü hoba ngeibü in haoeibü ik to jinkulabü. Lausikei ngei Faraoeibü ik pakngoklabü, hoba haoei hao thedanga haila leilubü mütei ngühbü tegü wilabü.
Haü, ngei hao hau akibou yeitilabü hoba Babilon Chobaeibü ik hau kitilabü. Ladang ngei hao la ngeibü inlou jinkulaje hoba haoei Ijep kaodak khulimbo tuoklaje, kheijinei pendouei ngo
Ngei Ijepbü phangshuong yoa lintilabü hoba kaonyek danko aatilabü. Kheijinei haoenei ngo
Kün langsenbü po anthük- cheboubü lit semboua shaangbounyet
“Müteibü shou, Ijep Choba Farao to hoba haoeibü mütli shuong to lenashi:
No seisihau latetche yaangkei!
Ngei no ao to takteiyola?
Chühashi, no Lebanona cedar phatkei,
Hemaisaomai, yeme kubü bubhek,
Sangmeia onlangko thong loubü bulong.
Khünei hao chingtilabü dei,
Hobaje kho thounoula kaomanga shumang kiteikei.
Chingko kibü bulong la khübüei dei lakkukei
Hobaje yambabü bulong pendou to shumang koutikei.
Aieilausi honei dei maisho lakbü ka,
Ho lubü bulong shuongtokei loubou chingkei.
Hoeibü bhek shangan hoba louan khaükei.
Mühkabü au phang pendouei hoeibü bheka hap kümbei;
Yambabü meisiauei hoeibü hamphanga shoushou sitkei;
Kaodak phangshuongei hoeibü yeme phanga haksokei.
Bhek loubü yo to khütetche suokan
Kho bulong latetche hemaikei.
Khoeibü lishuong dei haübüa sühko atakei.
Mühghaüeibü bamang cedar aitokei kho takteiyola athük;
Busim long aineikei kho tegübü bhek akhaü,
Hobaje plen bunyua kho tegübü bhek akitei.
Mühghaüeibü bamanga mangkei
Kho tegübü hemaibü bulong akitei.
Khaübü bhek shuong yoa ngei ho he maitikei.
Mühghaüeibü Eden bamanga ho pendou to dühbü bulong kiteikei.
“Hibü tou, sangmeia asühlang shongko bukhu louko chingbou bulong khola ai haüthüklaje ngo Thükenbou
hibü ngei ho inleda hoba küksithang songdakbou che la hao kuan apa. Haoei kho bulong la hao amaibü shanga haoei mubü thüng kungailabü.

Hobaje hatlabü küksithang phangshuongei hao chengan koutilabü hoba ap- yolabü. Hoeibü pakngokbü bubhek shuong kaonyeka shongh thüka hoba yomanga atlabü. Hoeibü yeme phanga kibü phangshuong pendou satan apbulabü.
Kho tuongbü bulong thüka mühkabü au shuong pendou thünglabü hoba yamkabü meisiau shuong pendou haoeibü bu bheka shailabü.

Deiei pangteiko kibü bulong yingasikei kho tegübü loubü bulong aikei ayemlabü ayingsi sangmeia jakko suokbü onlanglabü akilabü. Aieilausi haoen pendou haila tetkei; khunakshousi yoa kaomang to aoyou yemsang to kouda, haoen yoa yantila tetkei.”
Thükenbou

Ladang ngei hao yemsang to koutilaje ho tuongbü langhei phangshuong nyaakeilabü. Eden kabü bulong pendou, shanenboutham hoba Lebanon kabü deilakbü bulong maiboutham shuong pendou kho tuongbü shanga kaomanga senyühshemlabü.
Haoeibü yemekoubü phanga kibü shuong si hao to aihkhüna jambü shuong pendou inei tuongbü shuong yoa yola haoen yemsang to koulabü.

“Bulong kho Ijep Choba hoba hao mütshuong ki. Eden kabü bulong shuong mangkei kheinyu loubü yaangbü hoba soumo kakbü akitei. Lausikei tou, Eden kabü bulong shuong tegü, kho yemsang to koulanglabü hoba mühghaü angebü si lasona inei tuongbü shuong yoa yolabü. Kho ngei joyoa, dogo Thükenbou
Kün langsenbü po anthüknyi boubü lit anthüknyi boubü shaangbounyet

“Müteibü shou, Ijepbü Choba Farao shangabü mang haapbü che huiletashi hoba hao to lenshi: No phangshuongeibü molosaonyu che phatko küman lenda, lausikei no shumang kabü jisangei dei khatbü phatkei. Nyi kaibü youei dei ngattida hoba haoeneibü shumang shuong sepseptham yeitida.
Thükenbou
Ngei no khongthua tekan aplabü hoba haoen la no shautila shanga kaodak kabü ausiyuk hoba meisiau shuong pendou ngashailabü
Kaibü mangjim nyaübüei ngei shongh si yo pendou shentilabü.
Ngei kaibü sii piyung tegü koutibüei shongha ontilabü, hoba aukhomakmak shuong kaibü pheei photlabü
Hobaje ladang ngei no shemtilaje ngei müh küpleplabü hoba khünei kibü khanshoulitshou shuong nakthühtham aptilabü. Chanyu kho sangmei phainei hulabü hoba litnyuei jembü ngesak ohaulabü.
Mühkabü ngesakbü pendou ngei kaibü kaonyu thüka nakthühtham aptilabü, dogo ngo Thükenbou
“Ladang ngei kanei ngean akibü kaonyek shuong danko kan shembü ngühlang phinthonlaje kheijinei phangshuong juongnyu maangpon shalelabü.
Haü, ngei ka to kümbüei müt juongnyu mokde apyotilabü. Ladang ngei ngeibü inlou tuoklaje mokbüei lühlabü. No tuongnyet haoen pendou jembü langkei shanga lühlabü.”
Aishanga Thükenbou
Keibükombü phangshuongeibü sepai shuong la ngei haoeneibü in setentilabü hoba ka mütli pendou haitilabü. Kaibü mütshuong pendou hoba no yonglam liliko kibü pendou shemtilabü.
Dei juong kishang kabü kaibü shatsinam khümbo shemtikulabü. Khünei müt aokei akilabü, ayingsi shatsinameibü haakei nakbü youmo akilabü.
Kheijinei ngei saoeibü dei dangshadtilabü hoba saoeibü shumang shuong onang tegü yeitikulabü, dogo Thükenbou
Ladang ngei Ijep kaodak sangliphang hoba leilubüa phokulaje hoba khünei shenko kibü pendou ngei haitilaje kheijinei haoenei ngo
Ho waangbü chia haoenei manghaap chia la laulabü. Phangshuongeibü saoshuongei Ijep si saoeibü mütli shuong pendou waangko ho manghaap chia laulabü dogo Thükenbou
Kün langsenbü po anthük nyiboubü, shaangbü lit chalou anthük ngaobounyet
“Müteibü shou, Ijep mütshuong juongnyu shanga mang haapyoashi. Haoen hoba nyenshen phangshuong yemsang to yantiashi.
Haoen to lenashi:
No ong pendou to hemaisaomaibü dogo damda sai?
No yemsang to yanlabü
hoba mühghaü angebü dan yoa yeplabü.
“Ijepbü shuong lasona haitibü shuong yoa tuonglabü. Haoen haitila in tonenakei; sao kho saoeibü mütshuong yoa senlangashi.
Sonenbü lakjaibü shuongei hoba Ijep to aihkhün jambü shuongei Ijepbü shuong yemsang to sungletda. Haoenei ngekda, ‘Lasona haitibü mühghaü angebü shuong hato louyenakei!’
“Assiria hoba saoeibü sepai shuongeibü mangkhün kaijembo hanei kia. Haoen pendou lasona haitikei,
hoba haoeneibü mangkhün shuong kho yemsang thonshanga kia. Saoeibü sepai shuong pendou lasona tuongkei, hoba haoeneibü mangkhünei saoeibü hee kaijemakei.
“Elam hoba saoeibü sepai shuongeibü mangkhün kaijembo hanei kia. Haoen pendou lasona inei haitikei hoba haoen yemsang to akipbo yankei. Haoenei yemsang to yanbü shuong yoa haoeneibü himou thongda.

Elam lasona haitibü shuong yoa yepda, hoba saoeibü sepai shuongeibü hee sao kaijembo kia. Haoen pendou akipbü shuong, pendou lasona haitibü shuong ki. Aieilausi haoeneibü hatlamoklabü lang kibü kaodaka phinthonbü hangjung haoenei yemsang to yanbü shuong yoa haoeneibü himou künda; haoen haitibü shuong yoa yeptiakei.
“Meshek si Tubal, haoeneibü sepai shuongeibü mangkhünei kaijeman khünei kia. Haoen pendou akipbü, pendou lasona haikei. Khei yingasikei che haoenei lang kibü shuong moktikei.

Haoen la shangiedbü jihsiphai kabü lakjaibü shuong la tegü soumo mangap aku, aoyou yemsang to lason hele souko lean yankei, haoeneibü in khua aükei hoba haoeneibü aih haoeneibü mang thüka phokei. Khübü lakjaibü shuong kho jih chenei lang kibü shuong hattimoktila sekbülakbü kiasikei haoeneibü shabü kayang haoeneibü loa baukei.
“Kho tegü Ijepbü shuong, lasona haibü akipbü shuong yoa leiluan yeplabü.
“Edom saoeibü Choba shu- ong si saoeibü songdakbü shuong yoa hanei kia. Haoen sekbülakbü sepai shuong kiteikei, lausikei tou haoen lasona haibü akipbü shuong yoa yemsanga yepakei.

“Yungkükbü Chobaeibü shousi shuong pendou, hoba Sidonbü shuong pendou khünei kia. Haoeneibü hauei jih chenei hatlamoklabü phinthonkei, lausikei tou haoen lasona haian akipbo yemsang to koubü tegü nyenshed künakei.
“Farao Choba hoba haoeibü sepai shuongei lasona haitibü shuong kho haplabü hoba haoen senyühshemlabü, dogo Thükenbou
“Aishanga ngei Farao Choba lang kibü shuong hattimoktila pienkei, lausikei hao hoba haoeibü sepai tan pendou hailabü hoba akipbo lasona haibü shuong pendou yoa khünlabü,” dogo Thükenbou
Hobaje
“Müteibü shou, kaibü mütlieibü shousi shuong to joyoashi, hoba haoen to lenshi: Ladang kaonyek to wapyo loulaje kaonyek kabü mütli shuongei haoen yo ka müt at pienan lombou che phokuda;
hoba ladang haoei kaonyek to labou louko hapda, haoei teklaang metko mütli shuong to maangsangla lenda.
Kheijinei aoei teklaang metbüje ditda lausikei maangsangan akiko labou lousüh- an hao haitida, haoeibü sii hao thüka kilabü.
Haoei teklaang ngühlang ditkei lausikei pianleman akitei, khoei hao haibü sii hao thüka kilabü. Hao pianleman kiteikei tegüje haoei hao langkei khümenan kikhoulabü.
Lausikei, lombouei labou loubüje hapan mütshuong pianleman kitila teklaang ametkulonga, labou loulabü hoba shabü mütshuong kho hailabü, lausikei haoen haibü sii ngei lombou ka hilabü.
“Hibü tou, müteibü shou, ngei no Israel phangshuong thüka lombou yeitida; hibü kü sembung ka angbü ngüh ditashi, hoba kü ka haoen la maangsanglabü kuashi.

Ladang ngei müt amaibü to, ‘O müt amaibou, no maimaitham hailabü,’ dogo laulaje, hoba nyi müt amaibou kho haoeibü langkei khümenlabü lele haoeibü lamnyu ka sepeila alenlaje, kheijinei hao haoeibü shedbü shabü shanga hailabü, lausikei hao haibü sii ngei ka ka hilabü.

Khei yingasikei nyi müt amaibou khüto haoeibü lamnyu ka sepeian maangsangan kila len- alonga, hoba hao haoeibü lamnyu ka asepeilonga, hao haoeibü shedbü shabü shanga hailabü, lausikei nyi ka langkeije khümenlabü.”

Haoen to lenashi: ‘Ngo langkeibü Mühghaü ki shongko, shabü müt haibüa ngo olinbü aki. Aeiko ngei haoen shabü ka nangan lang kitimang sühda. Kaneibü amaibü lamnyu ka sepeiashi! O Israel phangshuong, kan aila haila?’ dogo Thükenbou

“Hibü, müteibü shou, kaibü Israel mütli shuong to lenashi: Saopobü müt haoei ngühkhüm leilunyet hao haoeibü saopobüei akhümenlabü. Müt amaibü cheei haoei amaibü kümbü ka nangalonga, hao ashiakoelabü, hoba müt maibü che shabü shonla khangalonga, haoeibü langkei khümenla athüklabü.

Ngei müt maibü che to no maimaitham lang kilabü dogo thekula thükkei, lausikei haoei haoeibü danbü langkei maibü to maanglemalonga hoba shabü shonla khangalonga, haoei kümsilei maibü kümbü ngei aikei adamenlabü.
Ngei müt amaibü che to, ‘No maimaitham hailabü,’ dogo hakla thükkei, lausikei haoei haoeibü shabü ka sepeian tangbü hoba janbümaibü kümalonga,

tetlabüei, haoei lotbü shanga phokubü angthetnam kungaialonga ayingsi haoei kokbü ngaitikualonga, hoba haoei shabü kümbü nangan langkei kubü ngühkhüm phai semalonga, maimaitham hao lang kilabü, hao ühailabü.
Ngei hao la haoei shonshaibü shabü apbulabü hoba hao lang kilabü; aieilausi haoei ai tangbü hoba janbümaibü ki kho kümbei.
“Khei yingasikei kaibü mütli shuongei lauda, ‘
Ladang saopobü müt cheei hao saopobü ka sepeilaje hoba shed shonlaje hao kho shanga hailabü.
Hobaje ladang müt amaibü cheei haoeibü songsido amaibü ka sepeilaje hoba ai tangbü hoba janbümubü ki kho kümlaje hao khoei lang kilabü.
Khei yingasikei, O Israel chung, kanei lauda, ‘
Kün langsenbü po anthük nyiboubü, lit anboubü chalou ngaobounyet Jerusalem ka satenbü müt che kü jungto loukei hoba laukei, “Sangnyu kho tuonga.”
Hao loulabü thedangto chasem
Kheijinei

“Müteibü shou, Israeleibü leilubü kaoa kibü mütshuongei athakko lauda, ‘Abraham müt che ong kikei, lausikei haoei kaonyek khümbo kiman kikei. Lausikei senje juong; phetphanla shanga maimaitham kaonyek kho sen la kuakei!’
“Hibü haoen to lenashi, Thükenbou
Kan kaneibü in to sounongda. Kanei mangsenlabü kümda, hoba kan mütpem wekoei lulueibü lepboueibü yak totnyinkuda. Kholonga kanei kaonyek kho kimenlep lo?
“Haoen to hai lenshi: Thükenbou
Hobaje ngei kaonyek kho sangliphang kaonyu la yeitilabü, hoba sao yonglam lilibü thonshang che to loutilabü. Israeleibü shongh shuong aoeikei lamjung ohaulabü lele sangliphanga kilabü.
Ladang ngei kaonyek kho sangli- phang la yeitilaje hoba haoeneibü shabü shanga mütshuong shieikoelaje kheijinei haoenei ngo
Hibü ngeibü mütli shuong nyi lenbü ditla nyuyoda, lausikei nyi haoen to kümla lenbü khoje akümda. Aishanga haoeneibü sembunga sanou ngüh kia, lausikei haoeneibü maangponei jembü kusikhang ong shida.

Maimaitham haoen thedanga no kho ngühlang maibü kakbü, sanouyobü chia aeibou maian laubü hoba kongkin maisho tuokbü müt che ong phatkei; aishanga haoenei kaibü ngüh shuong ditda lausikei khübü kho tetche ongkei haoenei akümda.
Ladang khübü pendou tükde loushedlaje, maimaitham ho tükde loushedlabü haang, kheijinei ong haoenei thuseibou che haoen yoa kiteikei dogo ngelabü.”
“Müteibü shou, Israel sanlombü shuong khulimbo tetenashi. Thusei ngüh lauashi, hoba haoen to lenashi: ‘Thükenbou
Kanei haabü shauda, kanei winei neida, amenboutham kanei haitian shauda. Lausikei kanei sanshuongje apangteida.

Kanei hau akibü shuong alommaiti, ayingsi shatbü amaiti, ayingsi akbü mou akhühku. Kanei ayinglam to satbü aleingai, ayingsi maubü alam. Lausikei kanei maangshat lamlam hoba kaangbü sekbüei haoen thüka songdakkei.
Hibü haoen linkei, aieilausi sanlombü akitei, hoba ladang haoen khongthu- yama aakei kheijinei haoen yamkabü meisiauei haoen taketnyu shaukei.
Hibü ngeibü sanshuong shongh peiko hoba shonghshou suokbü wekoa shoongaikei. Haoen kaothe pendoua phinthon- an kikei hoba haoen lamla ayingsi chühla aokei akitei.
“Hibü kan sanlombü shuong, ngo

Ngo langkeibü Mühghaü ki shongko, kanei kü ngüha lebou kiteikei. Ngeibü sanshuong yamkabü meisiauei shian taketkei hoba haoen shaukei aieilausi khünei sanlombou akitei. Ngeibü sanlombü shuongei sanshuong lamenla hauajem. Haoenei jembü ong laka sanshuong athounou.
Hibü kan sanlombü shuong,
Thükenbou
“Aishanga Thükenbou

Sanlombou che haoei thounoubü sanshuong aan kibü lamenan nyibou leibabü tegütham ngei ngeibü sanshuong lamlabü. Haoen sangmei shangbü hoba nakthühbü chaloua haoen aan kibü kaoen pendou ka ngei haoen püetlabü.
Ngei haoen phangshuong ka leibalabü hoba kaonyek ka leishailabü, hoba haoen jembü kaodak to leibalabü. Ngei haoen Israel shongh to hoba dei koushang to leilabü hoba sanglaak kee maibüa thounoulabü.
Ngei haoen shongh si yo kabü nyemsang alibüa lamshautilabü hoba Israel shongh khua haoen keeshang kilabü; hoba khünei sanglaak maibüa Israel shongh thüka haoen lamshaulabü.
Ngo ngeibü sanshuongeibü lombou kilabü, hoba ngei haoen yeptilabü, dogo Thükenbou
“Mauan kibü ngei lamlabü, linan kibü nyibou leingailabü, leilubü khühetkulabü, hoba shatko kibü maitikulabü; lausikei netbü si hau kibü ngei leilutikulabü, aishanga ngo janbü kümbou sanlombou ki.
“O ngeibü sanshuong, kan shangabü Thükenbou
Kan yoa atje nyem maiboutham lamshaukokei senyüh ashemda; kanei kanei ashaubü nyem mangkei nakeila leda! Kanei dei koshikbü yungda hoba kanei ayungbü dei ngattida!
Kanei youei nakeibü nyem kho ngeibü sanshuongei shaulep sai ayingsi kanei ngattibü dei yunglep sai?
“Hibü Thükenbou
Aieilausi kanei hip si phakshokei aüda hoba haoen alintishongko kaneibü laangei hau akibü to thenda.
Lausikei ngei ngeibü san khümenlabü hoba haoen touje amaiko ajungeilabü. Ngei san weko mat jemlabü hoba maibü si amaibü pinyinlabü.
Hobaje haoen thüka sanlombou yingla shanga ngei ngeibü sambü Dawid phatbü choba che kulabü; hoba haoei haoen thounoulabü hoba haoeneibü sanlombou yinglabü.
Ngo
Hobaje ngei haoen yoa sangmai thesilan che kümlabü hoba ngeibü sanshuong ushia ai apeksekko yeplabü lele ngei sekbülakbü meisiau shuong shian sattikulabü.
“Hobaje ngei haoen haükulabü hoba haoen ngeibü saopobü shonghshoua kitilabü. Ngei haoen la langmin yantikuko haükulabü hoba khünei haülabü langmin haaklabü.

Hobaje yamkabü bulongei haoeneibü hek hekkulabü hoba kaodakei shusiphon hekkulabü, hoba mütpem weko jembü kaoa khümetangetan kilabü. Ladang ngei kü mütlieibü yangmen thettikulaje hoba haoen aaola lebü shuongeibü ik ka haoen litilaje kheijinei haoenei ngo
Touje phangshuongei haitibou ayeilabü hoba yamkabü meisiauei haoen ataketlabü hoba ashaulabü. Haoen khümetangetan kilabü hoba aoeikei haoen ühütlenlabü.
Ngei haoen la shusiphon mailabü kaomai kulabü hoba kaonyua müh akitilabü. Touje lubü phangshuongei haoen to anyikulabü.
Kheijinei müt pendouei ngo
“Kan kü mütshuong, ngeibü nyemlaaka lamshaubü sanshuong ki, hoba ngo kaneibü Mühghaü ki,” dogo Thükenbou
“Müteibü shou, Edom kaonyek yuktiko tetenashi.
Ngo Thükenbou
Ngo kaibü labou ki, Edom shongh shuong!
Ngei no sangliphang kaonyu la yeitilabü.
Ngei kaibü sangnyu leilukulabü;
Hobaje no sangliphanga apyokulabü;
Kheijinei nyi ngo
“Aieilausi no Israeleibü lole labou kiteikei, hoba saoeibü shabü hangjung sao shieikoebü jihsiphaia nyi saoeibü mütli shuong haitiko lekei.
Hibü, ngo langkeibü Mühghaü kishongko, haibü kho kaibü phejan, hoba nyi wailetla athük. No nyi sii angtibüa yuktian ki hoba siiei no shilabü.
Ngei Edom shongh sangliphang la yeitilabü hoba ho kao danko paibü shuong pendou haitilabü.
Ngei shongh shuong haitibü mangjimei shentilabü, hoba lasona haibü mangei shongh si yomang pendou küpleplabü.
Ngei no ponpen sangliphang yeitilabü hoba kaibü sangnyu shuonga müt akitilabü; hoba kanei ngo
“Aieilausi, ngo

Hibü ngo langkeibü Mühghaü kishongko, no khau angbü, kaibü nyekshat maangshat, hoba kü mütli to nyi mangsenbü thüng ngei ka la ngaingoulabü. Nyi haoen to kümbü thüng ngei no shieikoeda dogo haoenei ngelabü.
Kanei Israeleibü shongh shuong khulimbo, khübü kho sen shangabü ki, khübü kho seneibü shausiyung shanga kukei, dogo nyikubü ngo
Kanei kü khu limbo yonglam khulambei hoba ngei kho ditkei.”
Thükenbou
Aieilausi Israeleibü phetphan sangliphang la yeijinei kan olinyobü tegütham ngei kan to kümlabü. Kan sangliphanga kilabü, O Seir Shongh, haü, Edom kaodak khümbo yoan. Kheijinei haoenei ngo
“Müteibü shou, Israel shongh shuong to tetenbü ngüh joyoashi hoba lauashi, ‘O Israel shongh shuong,
Thükenbou
“Hibü tetenashi hoba lenashi, ‘Thükenbou
Hibü, O kan Israel shongh shuong, Thükenbou
“Thükenbou
“Hibü Israelbü kaonyek shangabü tetenashi hoba shongh shuong to, shonghshou shuong to, dei koushang hoba pholi to lenashi: Thükenbou
Thükenbou
Lausikei kan, O Israel shongh shuong, nyi kü mütli Israel shanga bhek longtilabü hoba mai hekkulabü, aishanga haoen tongde chem to loulabü.
Ngei kan shanga dambuda hoba kaneibü kaonyu nyibou shapnyintila hoba khonei youli wentila ngo kan la yingkulabü.
Hobaje Israel chung pendoua ngei kaneibü lühbak haatikulabü. Sang sangngailabü hoba leilubü shuong kümetlabü.

Hobaje ngei kan thüka müt si shatsinam lühbak juongtikulabü, hoba haoen haalabü hoba püngko juongko lang heklabü. Ngei shangied tegütham ka to mütshuong kitilabü hoba shaangbou toje maibou kan naang maitilabü. Kheijinei kanei ngo
Haü, ngei kü mütli, kan Israelbü, nyibou kaneibü kaonyua kitila leibalabü. Kho kaneibü kaonyu yinglabü, hoba no haoeneibü phet yinglabü; hoba touje ka to haoeneibü youyikei akonglabü.
“Thükenbou
Lausikei tou ka jaüan hoei ladangkei müt asuilabü hoba ka mütli youyikei akonglabü, dogo Thükenbou
Ngei touje phangshuongei kan nyikula lebü adititilabü ayingsi touje mütshuongei kan to hakbü aditlabü ayingsi touje kan phangshuong aphaiyetlabü, dogo Thükenbou
Tokei
“Müteibü shou, ladang Israel mütli haoen kaodaka kikei, haoenei haoeneibü thechüh hoba kümsileiei kho shatikei. Kü thedanga haoeneibü thechüh kho yaksa mang asaopobü chaloua ihinseibü hima kikei.
Kaonyeka haoenei sii angtibü haangjung hoba haoeneibü heangshoei kho shatibü laüa ngei haoen thüka ngeibü maangshat khüpan jinkukei.
Ngei haoen phangshuong yoa phinnyintikei hoba kaonyek shenko aatikei; haoeneibü thechüh hoba kümsilei thüng ngei haoen mat jembei.
Hobaje haoen haushang pendoua phangshuong thedanga haoenei ngeibü saopobü nyen shedtikei, aieilausi haoenei lauda: ‘Habü ho
Khoei ong ngo maangto shatko kikei, aishanga Israelbü shuongei haushang pendoua ngeibü saopobü nyen shatikei.
“Hibü tou Israel phangshuong to lenashi, Thükenbou

Ngei ngeibü saopobü nyen yaangbü, laobou phangshuong yoa shatikei, laobou nyen kanei haoen yoa shaantikei, kho ngei saüenan pholabü. Ladang ngei kan danko phangshuong thea ngo saopobü yingkei dogo shentilaje kheijinei ngo
Aishanga ngei kan phangshuong yo ka leibalabü hoba kaonyek pendou ka kan leishailabü hoba kan kaneibü kaonyek to leian loulabü.
Hobaje ngei kan la dei koshikbü lakkulabü hoba kan hinseian kilabü, kan la mak kakbü pendou ka hoba kaneibü heangsho pendou ka kan hinseitikulabü.
Ngei kan la maangpon haanbü kulabü hoba soushou haanbü jinkulabü, ngei kaneibü phe ka laangeibü maang- pon sungan apbulabü hoba kan la pheeibü maangpon kulabü.
Hobaje ngei kan la ngeibü Soushou jinkulabü hoba ngeibü ngühkhüm deikhüma paitilabü hoba kanei ngeibü ngühmai jungeilabü, hoba khübü kümlabü.
Kheijinei kaneibü pisibou la ngei kubü kaonyeka kan kitilabü. Kan ngeibü mütli kilabü hoba ngo kaneibü Mühghaü kilabü.
Ngei kan asaopobü pendou ka püetlabü. Ngei shusiphon haang maitilabü hoba kan thükto ai limsilang aloutilabü.
Mühlimnoulim danko phangshuong yoa kan himou abautila shanga ngei buhekdeihek hoba shusiphon haatijuongtikulabü.
Kheijinei kanei kaneibü thechüh amaibü hoba kümsilei amaibü kümbü shuong damenlabü, hoba kaneibü shabü si shedtimashikbü shanga mangsenlabü.
Ngei ho kan laüa kümda aying dogo kan la ngetimang sühda, dogo Thükenbou
“Thükenbou
Hobaje danbü phaibü pendouei hapbo apan kilabü jeiko apshang dangbü kaonyu sek la moulabü.
Haoenei laulabü, ‘Apan kibü kaonyek ho Eden bamang phatko yeia; hoba leiluan tekan apbü hoba maubü sangnyu shuong tenlepnyu mütei nyaka.’
Kheijinei kaijembo kibü phangshuongei ngo
“Thükenbou
Jerusalema lemlasalabü san shuong phatko, tou leiluan kibü sangnyu shuong kho mütshangei shenlabü, hoba haoenei ngo
Haoei ngo khübü kaijembo to leian haukei, hoba chühashi, khongthu yomang shenko lo juong kikei, hoba khübü kho aeibou linokbang kikei.
Hobaje haoei kü to laukei, “Müteibü shou, khübü lo shuong lang kila thüka sao?” Ngei laukei, “O Thükenbou
Kheijinei haoei kü to laukei, “Habü lo shuong to thusei ngüh joyoashi hoba haoen to lenshi: O lo linbü shuong,
Thükenbou
Hobaje ngei kan la haulüh si phejak jinkulabü, hoba khonei küplepkulabü. Ngei kan la hak jinkulabü hoba kan lang kilabü hoba kanei ngo
Hibü kü la sakkubü tegü ngei thusei ngüh lenkei. Hobaje ngei tetenko kijinei, tenbü langh yaangbü che ditkei losilak shuong kho lulueibü lo lamjung chela takshatkei.
Hobaje ngei chühko kijinei khübü thüka haulüh si phejak kikei hoba khübü thüka khonei yuklepbei, lausikei khübü to hak akitei.
Kheijinei haoei kü to laukei, “Hak to thusei ngüh lenashi; tetenashi, O müteibü shou, hoba hak to lenashi, Thükenbou
Hibü haoei sakkubü tegü ngei thusei ngüh lenkei, hoba haoen to hak atkei; haoen langkei hoba haoeneibü youei loenkei. Haoen sepai tan yaang tetche kiteikei.
Kheijinei haoei kü to laukei, “Müteibü shou, habü lo shuong ho Israel chung khümbo ki. Haoenei lauda: Seneibü lo shuong linoktham apa, hoba seneibü maanglem maua; sen lemai lela wapan apakei.
Hibü tetenashi, hoba haoen to lenashi: Thükenbou
Hobaje ladang ngei kaneibü hee ipbulaje hoba kan khüka longtilaje, kanei ngo
Hobaje ngei ka la kü Soushou jinkulabü hoba kan lang kilabü, hoba ngei kan kaneibü kaoa phokulabu. Kheijinei kanei ngo
“Müteibü shou, nyi julo che sungashi hoba khonei hai doashi: ‘Jihuda sangle.’ Tokei lubü julo che sungashi hoba khonei hai doashi: ‘Israel sangle.’
Kho phaia julo penyi kho che maimai haplabü lele kaibü ika thon si thon thenyoan jungashi.
Ladang kaibü mütli shuongei ka to, ‘Habü ho nyi ai tetlabü lendaje kün la alenlep lo?’ dogo phealonga,
kheijinei haoen to lenshi: Thükenbou
“Julo penyi kho ka ika jungashi hoba mütshuong la haptiashi.
Hobaje nyi haoen to lenashi, Thükenbou
Hobaje Israel shongha ngei haoen phang che yeitilabü. Haoen pendou thüka Choba che ong kilabü hoba touje haoen ladangkei phang penyi ayinglabü, ayingsi touje aieikei haoen sangle penyi la ajanlabü.

Touje haoen ladangkei haoeneibü heangshoei ayingsi mangsenlabü kümsilei ayingsi ngühkhüm lulimbü shabü aieikei ashalabü. Ngei haoen sukjung ngaibü shabü pendou ka ngei khümenlabü, hoba ngei haoen saüenkulabü. Haoen ngeibü mütli, hoba ngo haoeneibü Mühghaü yinglabü.
Hobaje ngo khangenbou Dawid haoen thüka Choba yeilabü, hoba haoen pendouei sanlombou che kilabü. Haoen ngeibü ngühkhüm- a pailabü hoba ngeibü sakkubü nouanepbo jungeilabü.

Hobaje ngo khangenbou Jakob la ngei kubü kaonyeka, ainei kaneibü pisibousi shuong kikei, khünei haoen kilabü. Khünei haoeneibü shousi hoba haoeneibü shousi shisi shuong ponpen shanga kilabü, hoba ngo khangenbou Dawid ponpen shanga haoeneibü kilabü.
Ngei haoen yoa sangmai thesilan kümlabü; kho thonsithak akibü theyolanyobü kilabü. Ngei haoen kitilabü hoba haoen lühbak juong yeitilabü, hoba ngei ponpen shanga haoen yoa ngeibü saoposhang pholabü.
Ngeibü lemshang neichem haoen yoa kilabü, ngo haoeneibü Mühghaü yinglabü hoba haoen ngeibü mütli yinglabü.
Hobaje ladang ngeibü lemshang haoen yoa ponpen shanga kilaje kheijinei phangshuongei Israel saüenan phokubou
“Müteibü shou, Magog kaodaka, Meshek si Tubal Choba yaangbou Gog aeto kaibü thenyek sepeiashi hoba hao khulimbo tetenashi,
hoba lenashi: ‘Thükenbou

Ngei no kaiyeitilabü hoba kaibü kaumaanga ngau yaüjin jinkulabü hoba kaibü sepai tan pendou, koli hoba kolia wapyobü mütshuong haoen pendou, insiaubu penko jungan hele manko lean, wapyobü aih si aih jungbü tan yaangbü, haoen pendou in jungan,
Persia, Ethiopia, hoba Put, haoen pendou aih jungan hoba nameibü khun hanan hao to thipakei,
hoba tokei Gomer hoba haoeibü tan pendou, hoba yungthang thonbü ka Beth Togarma si kaibü sepai shuong pendou, khei phangshuong juongnyu yoa ngei no senbalabü.
Lamleashi, haü, no hoba ka jungto takshatbü sepai shuong pendou lamlean kishi; hoba haoen la ngühkhüm kushi.

Hobaje po juongnyu phaia nyi, phangshuong juong yo ka liko leibabü hoba wapyosuyo hatlalühlabü akiko haksoa kibü kaonyek che shilabü. Hobaje posilit lounyu sangli phanga apshang dangan kibü, lausikei touje müt pendou püetan kibü Israel shongh shuong nyi shilabü.
Hobaje yeinak che tegütham no louyenlabü hoba kaibü sepai tan pendou hoba ka yoa müt juong yeithu yeinak phatko kaonyek nyonglepbo sangmei che tegü loulabü.’ ”
Thükenbou
Nyi laulabü: Ngei ba alebü sang shuong shilabü; sangsembo kibü mütshuong, aoyou hatlamoklabü akiko ki, ngei haoen shilabü. Haoen pendou baei alelepbo hoba koukhinei athangko ki.

Ngei apsilebü peisilei aaklabü hoba soshau soyunglabü, hoba leilubü sang lengaibü kaodak khulimbo hoba shatsinama hoba peisileia keibü kaonyek jenyua kibü, phangshuong yo ka leishailabü mütli khulimbo ngeibü ik sepeilabü.

Sheba, Dedan hoba Spain kabü sangnyu shuong kabü namyaknamseibü shuongei ka to phelabü, ‘Soletbü peisilei aakla no loukei sai? Nyi kaibü jenabou ka soshau soyungla kamshaitikei sai? hon si chandinam sunglangla hoba shatsinam si samkeisamuk sungla hoba soletbü juong aaklangla shanga loukei sai?’ ”
Hibü, müteibü shou, tetenashi hoba Gog to lenshi: Thükenbou
no hoba ka yoa mütli phangshuong juong, pendou kho kolia setan, shuong yaangbü hoba hau yaangbü sepai kaibü kishang yungthang thonbü ka loulabü.

Hobaje sangmeiei kaonyek yuklepjung loubü tegü no ngeibü mütli Israel khulimbo loulabü. Jihsiphai lousühjinei, O Gog, ngei no ngeibü kaonyek khulimbo sungbalabü hoba no danko phangshuongei ngo saopobü dogo tang khitlabü.
Thükenbou
Khünyet chaloua hai haüthüklabü: “Ladang Gogei Israel kaodak shilaje, kheijinei ngeibü khauang maangpok loushadlabü, dogo Thükenbou
Aishanga ngeibü maangdak hoba khauang maangshata khünyet Israel kaodaka selo nyibü yaang kilabü.

Hibü yungnyu kabü ngao, mühkabü au, yamkabü meisiau, kaoa kibü yangsikok pendou hoba kao thea kibü khunakshousi wekoei kü thedanga hatbüei lühlabü. Shongh shuong thapletlabü, laanglip shuong limletjung loukoulabü, hoba kümthang shuong tuonglabü.
Hobaje ngei ngeibü shongh shuong pendoua Gog khulimbo in ngaletlabü, dogo Thükenbou

Hobaje ngei hao khulimbo shatlim hoba sii angbü kayang kulabü. Ngei hao thükto hoba haoeneibü sepai tan thükto hoba hao yoa thipbü phangshuong juongnyu thükto langtok yaangbü hoba sen yaangbü, khei wan hoba wansat moli jonyantilabü.
Hobaje ngei ngo yaangenbü hoba saopobü lenlabü, hoba ngei phangshuong juongnyu thedanga ngo lolo shentilabü. Kheijinei haoenei ngo
“Müteibü shou, Gog khulimbo tetenashi hoba lenashi: ‘Thükenbou
Ngei no kai- yeitilabü hoba no leian haulabü hoba yungthang thonbü ka sungenlabü hoba Israel shongh thükto ngei no leian loulabü.
Hobaje kaibü nanae ik ka lau hoba kaibü mae ik ka laujin attikulabü.
Gog si haoeibü sepai tan hoba hao to aihkhün jambü phangshuong Israel shongh shuong thüka atlabü. Ngei kaneibü haibü mang kho au shuong hoba yamkabü meisiau la shausi- yung shanga kuan aplabü.
No khongthuyaanga atlabü, aieilausi ngei kho laua, dogo Thükenbou
Ngei Magog thükto hoba yungko kaonyeka ongayasetham kibü mütshuong thükto ngei wan hautikulabü, hoba haoenei ngo
“Ngei kü nyen saopobü ngeibü mütli Israel yoa shentilabü. Ngei touje ngeibü saopobü nyen ladangkei ashatilabü, hoba phangshuongei ngo
“Chühashi, kho louada! Ho maimaitham loushedlabü, dogo Thükenbou
Kheijinei Israel sangnyu shuonga kibü shuong haulabü hoba insiaubuei jiklabü bu yeitilabü, aih hoba wapyobü aih, lau hoba laujin janglüh hoba aubu haoenei wan shanga po nyet jiklabü bu yeitikei.

Haoenei sek ka bu alaklabü ayingsi yam ka aikei awaplabü, aieilausi insiaubu haoenei jikla lelabü. Hobaje aoyouei haoen ka sokei khübü ka haoenei solabü, hoba aoyouei haoeneibü aaklangkei khübü shuongeibü haoenei aaklanglabü, dogo Thükenbou
Hobaje lit nyet Israel chungei kaonyek saüenla shanga haoen khünlabü.
Haü, kaonyeka müt pendouei haoen khünlabü hoba ladang ngeibü soneikangbü tang khitlaje kho chaloua haoen la hoei nyenhang sungbakulabü, dogo Thükenbou

Hobaje kaonyek saüenla shanga hanghangko mütshuong pholabü. Haoen to liman at kaonyek peiko lamla haulabü, hoba atei khongthua kibü mangjim shuong khünlabü. Haoenei kho lit nyet thonan phaia lam khanglabü.
Hobaje ladang haoen kaonyek danko haulaje, hoba atei müteibü losilak hapoulaje, mangkhün thubü shuongei Gog Hamona khünan üpshongko haoei kho junga amaaphelabü che pholabü.
(Khünei tokei Hamona nyenan sangnyu che kilabü.) Hibü haoenei kaonyu kho saüenlabü.
“Hobaje no, müteibü shou, Thükenbou
Kanei sekbülakbüeibü phe shaulabü hoba kaodakbü Choba shuongeibü sii yunglabü; haoen pendou sanlon paang si shoushou, hoba lon si masu pongsu, hoba Bashan kabü amenbü meisiau tegü haitilabü.
Hobaje ngei kan shanga lamlekuko kibü haitibü lembüsabü haabü khoei kan aphot shongko shaulabü hoba ajaak shongko sii yunglabü.
Hobaje ngeibü khümsoka, koli si koli kailonga setbüei, sekbülakbü müt si wapyobü sepai shuongei kan shi shenlabü, dogo Thükenbou
Khünyet ka jaüan Israel mütliei ngo haoeneibü

Hobaje phangshuongei Israelbü shuong haoenei shabü shanga langsenbü to haukei dogo ngelabü, aieilausi haoen kü to maangalan. Hibü ngei haoen ka ngeibü the hukei hoba haoeneibü dangbou la khümbo kuan apbei, hoba haoen pendou inei tuongkei.
Haoen asaopobü thüng ngei haoen to kümbei hoba ngei ngeibü the haoen ka huan apbei.”
Hibü Thükenbou
Haoen haoeneibü kaodaka ongayasetham satetlangan, haoen hattimoktila aokei akiko ongayasetham kijinei haoenei kü to maangalanbü hoba haoeneibü himou damenlabü.
Ladang ngei haoen mütshuong yo ka nyibou leian loulaje hoba haoeneibü dangbou labou kaodak ka leishailaje, kheijinei ngei ngo lolo haoen thedanga saopobü dogo lenlabü.
Kheijinei kü mütshuongei ngo haoeneibü
Ngei touje haoen ka ngeibü thenyek ahulabü, aieilausi Israel mütli thükto ngeibü Soushou khüpan jinkulabü, dogo Thükenbou
Kün langsenan phaia po saoto ngaoboubü, po haanbü lit chalou anboubü, hoba Jerusalem sangnyu shian apbü phaia po anthükleiboubü kiteikei. Khünyet chaloua
Mühghaüeibü mangsanga haoei ngo Israel kaodak to leian loukei hoba aicheküm- an shongh suokbü chenei ngo phoyokei. Ngei kü thedanga yungkük aenei sangnyu che huongbü phatko chem juongnyu hapbei.
Hobaje haoei ngo khüto nyangko leian haukei, hoba chühashi, khünei müt che chühla chisaknam phatan kikei; hoba haoeibü ika takbü janglüh che hoba phodong ju che jungan bakhüna loan hapbei.

Hobaje müt khoei kü to laukei, “Müteibü shou, kaibü nyekei chühashi, hoba kaibü nouei ditashi, hoba ngei ka la lenbü pendoua kaibü maangpon phoashi, aishanga khübü lenla shanga ngei no hato leibakei. Nyi hapbü pendou Israel mütli la lenashi.”

Ngei Lembüchem che hapbei, hoba kho baei lelepan kikei. Kheijinei müt khoei takbü phodong ju jungkei hoba kho jutak che loubü kikei hoba haoei kümthang kho takkei. Kho jutak che suokbü hoba jutak che shangbü kikei.
Kheijinei hao chaang ae yeibou bakhün khüto loukei. Hao younak khüto angkei, hoba onlangshanga haoei atshang kho takkei; hoba kho phodong jutak che haüan kikei.

Hobaje kho danan lam che kikei hoba khonei lombou shuongeibü shemjang sem kiteikei. Shemjang weko süng si khaang phodong jutak che bang jeteitei kikei, hoba khübü kanglang kabü kümthang shuong kho iknop ngao bang shangan kikei. Hobaje lombou shemjang danan Lembüchem ae yeibou atshang bakhün khonei phodong jutak che kiteikei.
Hobaje haoei bakhün chemso takkei;
hoba kho iknop set haübü hoba khoeibü aüetbü thaonyu kho iknop penyi bang shangan kikei. Kho bakhün chemsoei Lembüchem ae yeian kikei.
Hobaje chaangbou aenei bakhün maanga ji jinei lombou shemjang sem kikei; sem pendou takbü jeteitei kikei, hoba khübü kanglanga kümthang pendou kho jeteitei shangan kiteikei.
Kho phaia müt khoei bakhün to atbü khaang kho takkei; kho iknop an hoba khoeibü süng kho takbü iknop an kikei, hoba suokbü kho iknop anthüksem kikei.
Hobaje lombou shuong shemjang thedanga iknop che suokbü kümthang kikei, hoba shemjang shuong kho pendou aenei jeteitei iknop lak bang kikei.
Hobaje lombou shemjang ji kümthang ka ji sühko haoei takbüa khaang iknop saoto ngao, koukap che ka koukap che sühko kikei.
Tokei haoei bakhüna maangkabü kümthang thungetbü kaiko takkei hoba kho iknop saosem kiteikei. Takbü kho khongae yeian kibü shemjang sühko kikei.
Bakhün thedang khongchi ka maangae bakhün shemjang sühko iknop anjinsem kikei.

Hobaje shemjang pendou kabü tangkabü kümthang hoba shemjang si shemjang kanglanga maangkabü kümthang pendoua koulom hanbang yettian kikei. Hobaje atshang ae yeian kibü thungetbü kümthang maangae pendoua pünglong noksa küman kikei.
Kho phaia müt khoei ngo bakhün danko tangkabü khongmaang to leibakei. Khonei tangkabü kümthang to thenan dangbü shemjang khujin kiteikei, hoba khübü thedanga laangei yaüan jabü khongchi che kiteikei,
hoba kho khongmaang kaiko yaüan kikei. Tangkabü khongmaang kho maangkabou khongmaang tokei kaobou kiteikei.
Hobaje haoei kaobou shemjang maang ka maangkabou shemjang tangae kanglang takkei; kho chaangbou aenei hoba yungthang aenei iknop saongao bang kiteikei.
Hobaje müt khoei yungkük ae yeibou shemjang to atshang bakhün süngsikhaang takkei.
Hobaje lombü shuongeibü shemjang sem pendoueibü thungetbü khamthung shuong kho takletbü jeteitei kikei. Kho tousüng iknop anjinsem hoba photak iknop saoto ngao kiteikei.

Khoeibü koulom shuong, thaonyu shuong kho hoba pünglong noksa kümbü shuong kho chaangbou bakhün ae yeibü takbü to jeteitei kikei. Hobaje khüto younak nyet angkei, hoba thaonyu shuong kho khübü tangkünga kikei.

Hobaje chaangbou aeto atboua kibü tegütham, khonei yungkük ae yeibou bakhün tangboua maangkabou shemjang to atlabü bakhün che kiteikei. Müt khoei bakhün penyi kanglang kho takkei hoba takbü iknop saongao kikei.
Hobaje haoei ngo yungthang aeto leian haukei hoba ngei khonei bakhün che hapbei. Haoei khoeibü aüetbü hoba thaonyu shuong takan chühkei hoba khünyi khokei lubü shuong tegütham takletbü jetei kikei.
Hobaje kho bakhün kabü shemjang shuong lubüa kibü tegütham koulom shuong kikei. Kho tousüng iknop anjinsem hoba photak iknop saoto ngao kiteikei.
Hobaje khüto angla younak nyet kikei, hoba khüto atlabü shemjang khokei khongchi ae yeiko thonbü aenei kikei. Hobaje jiji kümthanga thaonyu to yuko pünglong noksa kümbü kikei.
Hobaje yungkük aenei shemjang maangkabou aenei bakhün che kikei, hoba bakhün ka bakhün sühko yungthang ae takan chühkei hoba kho iknop saongao kikei.
Kheijinei müt khoei ngo yungkük bakhün danko maangkabou shemjang to leibakei, hoba haoei yungthang bakhün takan chühkei; ho takbü lubü shuong to jetei kikei.

Lombü shemjang shuong, thungetbü kümthang shuong hoba thaonyu shuong taksi lubü jetei kikei. Bakhün kabü shemjang shuong kaiko koulom shuong kikei. Ho tousüng iknop anjinsem hoba photak iknop saoto ngao kikei.
(Hobaje maangkabü shemjang kaiko thaonyu shuong kikei, tousünga iknop saotongao hoba photaka iknop ngao.)
Hobaje khübü thaonyu shuong khongchi kabü shemjang ae yeian kikei; hoba khoeibü thaonyu shuong thüka pünglong noksa kikei, hoba khüto anglabü younak pemset kikei.
Kho phaia müt khoei ngo chaangbou bakhün danko maangkabou shemjang to leibakei.

Hobaje lombou shemjang shuong, kho thungetbü kümthang hoba thaonyu takan chühsi lubü to jetei kikei. Bakhün si thaonyu kaijembo koulom shuong kikei. Kho tousüng iknop anjinsem hoba photak iknop saoto ngao kikei.
Kho thaonyu shuong khoei shemjang ae yeian kikei; hoba pünglong noksa shuong jijiham aenei küman kikei, hoba khüto angla younak pemset kikei.
Hobaje müt khoei ngo yungkük bakhün to leibakei. Haoei kho takan chühkei hoba kho lubü shu- ong to jetei kikei.
Khübü phatko khoneikei lombü shemjang, noksa kümbü maangkabü kümthang hoba thaonyu kaijembo koulom kikei. Kho tousüng iknop anjinsem hoba photak iknop saoto ngao.
Hobaje hoeibü thaonyu kho khongchi kabü shemjang ae yeian kikei, pünglong noksa kümbü shuong kho jijihama kikei, hoba khüto angla younak pemset kikei.
Hobaje yungkük aekabü bakhüna thaonyu nyangko koukap yoa shemjang che kikei, khünei haoenei juokbü lembü sakan apbei.

Hobaje bakhün chemso- phanga shemjang jinei penyi hoba jinei penyi dogo khümsok lei kikei. Hobaje khübü khümsok thüka haoenei juokbü lembü, shabü lembü hoba saüsimaü lembü tegübü lembüsabü kulabü meisiau shuong haitikei.
Hobaje chemso tangae yungkük bakhün to atshang jiji aenei khümsok penyi bang, dogo jeteibü khümsok lei kikei.
Hibü bakhün maang aenei khümsok lei hoba tang aenei lei dogo pendouei khümsok pemset lembü haitibü juokla shanga kikei.

Tokei laang ka jakenbü khümsok lei, tousüng iknop che tho hoba photak iknop che tho, hoba suokla iknop che kikei. Hobaje khübü khünei haoenei juokbü lembü kula haitilabü peisilei hoba lubü lembü peisilei shuong phokei.
Hobaje lembü haitian phe antian phola shanga kümthang kaijembo anjin ikmaang tetbang saüan kikei.

Hobaje haoei ngo maangkabou shemjang khüto leibakei. Hobaje maangkabü khongchia koulom shemjang penyi kikei, che yungthang bakhün junga yungkük ae yeian, hoba che yungkük bakhün junga yungthang ae yeian kikei.
Hobaje haoei kü to, yungthang ae yeian kibü shemjang ho Lembüchem lombü ungshedbou shuong shanga ki,
hoba yungthang ae yeian kibü shemjang kho lemshon lombü ungshedbou shuong shanga ki. Levieibü shousi shuong yoa haoen ong
Kheijinei müt khoei maangkabou khongchi takan chühkei, hoba kho tousüng iknop saongao hoba photak iknop saongao, dogo süngsikhaang jeteitei kikei. Hobaje lemshon kho chemkoudeia kikei.

Kheijinei haoei ngo lembüchem chemsophang to leibakei. Haoei chemso thaonyu weko takan chühkei; khübü kho jijihama iknop ngao bang kikei. Atshang khaang kho iknop anthüklei hoba khoeibü thungetbü kümthang shuong khang kho jijihama iknop sem bang kikei.
Chemso khaang kho iknop saoche hoba thedang ka phai sühko iknop anthüknyi. Khonei chung younak an angan kikei, hoba atshang jijihama khamthung si thaonyu shuong kikei.
Kho phaia müt khoei ngo lembüchem to leibakei hoba thaonyu shuong takan chühkei; hoba kho jijiham photak iknop lakbang kikei.

Hobaje chem maang to atshang lam kho iknop an kikei, hoba lam atshang naphei shuong kho jijiham iknop ngaobang kikei. Haoei tokei lemshang tangkabou kho takan chühkei; hoba kho tousüng iknop saonyi hoba khaang iknop saoche kikei.

Kheijinei hao maangkabou lemshang to atkei, hoba khamthung weko atshang lam takan chühkei; khoeibü khaang iknop nyibang kikei. Atshang lamkhaang kho iknop lak kikei, hoba thungetbü kümthang shuong kho jijihama iknop nyet bang kikei.

Hobaje haoei maangkabü lemshon khoeibü süng kho takan chühkei; kho iknop saoche kikei, hoba khoeibü tangkabü lemshon thon sühko taksi iknop saoche kiteikei. Haoei kü to laukei, “Ho Pendou to Saopobou Kaoen ki.”
Kheijinei müt khoei Lembü- chem kümthang takan chühkei; kho iknop lak shangbü kikei, hoba chem kaiko hip aenei shemjang weko kho khaang iknop lei bang kikei.

Hobaje naphei shemjang shuong kho chemlip chenei shemjang khujin bang sem thenan dangbü chem kikei. Chemlip weko Lembüchemeibü tangkabou kümthang kho, shemjang shuong kümthanga aphenyoko lola tinlabü lele phangkabou shon to pekbou kikei.

Hobaje tangküng ka hapjineije, Lembüchem kümthang shuong kho khusunga onko jeteitei shangan hapbei. Hobaje Lembüchem tangkabü kümthang to yuko shemjang phangkaboutham ka jenyu kabü shemjang danko müt anglabü younak chung kikei.
Hobaje Lembüchem kaijembo shemjang shanga chemshang longko shon tonenan küman ngei hapbei. Kho phodongei lapbo iknop lak loubü kikei.
Shemjang tangkabü kümthang shangbü kho iknop ngao kikei. Lembüchem shemjang kanglangeibü kongkongbü kaoen
hoba ungshedboueibü shemjang shuong kho Lembüchem kaijembo iknop saoche kikei.
Hobaje khongmaang ka naphei shemjang to haulabü lam yungthang aenei che hoba yungkük anei che kikei; hoba kong apyoan kishang kho kaijembo khaang iknop ngao kikei.
Khongmanga Lembüchem chanep ae yeian kibü chem kho khaang iknop anjinlei kikei. Chem kaiko kümthang shangbü, hoba tousüng iknop anjinngao kikei.

Kheijinei müt khoei Lembü- chem tang takan chühkei; hoba kho tousüng iknop saongao kikei. Hobaje Lembüchem khong ka kongkongbü kaoen danko chanep aekabü chem sühko taksi kanglang kho tousüng kho iknop saongao kikei.
Chaangbou aekabü chem thedang ae kho khong yoan khaang iknop saongao kikei.
Kheijinei haoei chemsüng jiji- hama shonshe yoan khong chanep ae takan chühsi tousünga iknop songao kikei.
Lembüchem maangkabou, Sao- pobü Kaoen, hoba Pendou to Saopobou Kaoen
pendou shon ka kouloma sühko bu kinlepbüei thanglepan kikei.
Lembüchem maangkabou kümthang khümbomeiko, koukhün thüka sühko
kaakyembü kherabim si pünglong noksa kümbüei küplepan kikei. Pünglong shuong si kaak- yembü kherabim che thena che dogo shemjang kaiko kümbei. Kaakyembü kherabim weko thenyek penyi bang yeman kikei:
müteibü thenyekei ji aedang kabü pünglong to chühko, hoba ji pheinei molosaonyueibü thenyekei pünglong aeto yeian kikei.
Kho noksa shon ka koukap thüka onko küman kikei.
Lembüchem Saopobü Kaoeneibü thaonyu shuong kho takbü jeteitei kikei.
Pendou to Saopobou Kaoen koukhün to atshanga
bueibü lemshon phatko denche hapbei. Kho suokla iknop sem hoba süng si khaang iknop nyibang kikei; Hoeibü koukhün shuong denshang hoba naphei pendou buei kümbü kikei. Hobaje haoei kü to laukei, “Ho
Lembüchem si Pendou to Saopobou kaoen hama koukap penyi bang kikei.
Khübü koukap weko kakphei penyi bang soueitaiko ki.
Kümthanga küman kibü tegütham, khübü koukap shuonga kaakyembü kherabim si pünglong noksa shuong küman kikei. Hobaje atshang chemso thaonyu kho buei yuklepan kümbei.
Hobaje chemso napheinei jijihama khinan kibü koulom kikei, hoba kho pünglong noksa kümbüei küplepan kikei. Hobaje Lembü- chem naphei shemjang thaonyu shuong küplepan kikei.
Kheijinei haoei ngo khong aekabü shemjang yungthang aeto leikei hoba Lembü- chem chanep thonbü aenei chem ka yongan asaako, Lembüchem yungthang aekabü chem to leikei.
Yungthang ae yeian kibü chemsüng kho iknop saongao hoba photak iknop anjinsem kikei.
Lin jiji thedang aenei maangkabou shemjang khong iknop saoche, hoba khong shemjang küplepan kibü khünei thenyoan kibü shemjang den sema lin küman setshang jajung angan kikei.
Shemjang shuong thedang aenei lam che kikei, hoba kho khaang iknop an hoba tousüng iknop saongao. Hobaje khübüeibü koukap yungthang aenei kikei.
Thenyoan kibü thükkabou shemjang shuong kho lubü toje nyonyembou kikei, aishanga setshang jajung angbüei lombabou shemjang si phangkabou shemjang toje haoen ka kaophei aei yaangbou lekei.
Aishanga khübü shemjang shuong kho chem sem thenyoan dangbü kiteikei, khoei semboubü shon khoneije thaonyu akitei; hibü khoei haoen kho phangkabou si jenyu kabü shon to hanbou kikei.
Khonei tangkabou kümthang, shemjang shuong si tangkabou khongchi to jeteitei kikei; ho shemjang thedang aeto iknop anjinsem lilangan kikei.
Aishanga tangkabü khongchi thena shemjang lin kho tousüng iknop anjinsem kikei, hoba chühashi, lembüchem thedang aeneije iknop saongao kikei.
Shemjang phangae kabü to chaangbou aeka atshang che kikei, aishanga khütoje tangkabü khongchi ka atshang lam kikei.
Yungkük ae lembüchem shemjang thedang hoba chemeibü kümthang thükaenei shemjang shuong kikei
hoba khübü thedanga lam che kikei. Khübü kho yungkük ae yeian kibü shemjang shuong phatko kikei; süng si khaang jetei, kümsembü chühla jetei, hoba koukhün shuong jetei kikei.
Hobaje kümthang khangshang, shemjang to atshang, chaang ae thonbüa chemeibü yungkük aekabü shemjang shuong phanga koukap che kikei.
Kheijinei haoei kü to laukei, “Chem ham kho saopobü ki. Khübünei
Ladang ungshedbou shuong Lembüchem maangto atlaje hoba khongto angmang sühda, kheijinei haoenei
Ladang müt khoei Lembü- chem maangkabou kaophei takkhümbei, haoei ngo chaangbou bakhün danko lilangkei hoba tangkabou kaophei kaijembo takkei.
Haoei phodong jungkei hoba chaangbou ae kho takkei; kho iknop saongao ngao kikei.
Haoei phodong jungkei hoba yungkük ae takkei; kho iknop saongao ngao kikei.
Haoei phodong jungkei hoba yungthang ae takkei; kho iknop saongao ngao kikei.
Tokei haoei phodong jungkei hoba chanep ae sepeikei hoba takkei; kho iknop saongao ngao kikei.
Hibü haoei chemhip lei kho pendou takkei. Ho kaijembo kümthang kikei, hoba asaopobü ka saopobü bangnyinla shanga honei tousüng iknop saongao ngao hoba khaang iknop saongao ngao kikei.
Kho phaia müt khoei ngo chaangbou ae yeian kibü bakhün to leian haukei,
hoba chühashi, Israel Mühghaü soneikangbü chaangbou aeka louko ngei hapbei. Haoeibü langh kho dei juong ngühbü tegü kikei, hoba kaodak kho haoeibü soneikangbüei ngesakan kikei.
Ngei hapbü mangsang kho haoei sangnyu mautila loujinei ngei hapbü mangsang tegü kikei, hoba Kebar shumanga ngei hapbü mangsang tegü kikei, hoba ngo ngeibü the khüman yepbei.
Hobaje
Kheijinei Soushouei ngo leian angkei hoba maangkabou shemjang to leian loukei hoba chühashi,
Müt kho kü junga loan kitoua Lembüchem maang ka

Haoei kü to laukei, “Müteibü shou, hanei ngeibü Choba setshang ki. Ngo hanei Israel mütli shuong yoa kida hoba ngei haoen thüka ponpen songdakda. Touje Israel mütshuongei yingasikei ayingsi haoeneibü Choba shuongei yingasikei haoeneibü mühghaü shuong to lembü danko ayingsi haoeneibü Choba shuongeibü haibü mang khünbü danko ngeibü saopobü nyen ladangkei ashatilabü.

Ladang Choba shuongei ngo si haoen kanglanga kümthang cheei ong auan, ngeibü amshang thena haoeneibü amshang, hoba ngeibü khamthung thena haoeneibü khamthung lotikei, kheijinei haoenei haoeneibü mangsenlabü kümsileiei ngeibü saopobü nyen shatikei. Hibü ngei ngeibü khauanga haoen mautikei.
Tou haoenei lubü mühghaü shuong to lembü nangjan hoba haoeneibü Choba shuongeibü haibü mang heangsho shuong kuktijan. Haoenei khei kümalonga ngo haoen yoa ponpen kilabü.”

hoba haoenei kümbü pendou shangabü haoen himouko kialonga, haoen la Lembü chemeibü kümthen, khei hoeibü kümhaang hele, satshang hoba lotshang, hoeibü kümhaang khümbo hoba takletbü si ngühkhüm pendou haoen la ngetiashi.
Ho lembü chemeibü ngühkhüm ki: Shongh khua kaijembo leilang khümbo kho pendou to saopobou yinglabü. Chühashi, ho Lembü chemeibü ngühkhüm ki.”

Habü ho iknop loubüei lemshang takan chühbü shuong ki, kho iknop che hoba ikmaang che takbü ki: Youdang aenei iknop che kilabü hoba photak kho iknop che, hoba thon kaijembo phak che, hoba kho lemshang denshang kho kilabü.
Hobaje kao aenei kümyou phangkabou piyung koushang ka chemthon sühko iknop penyi, hoba photak iknop che, hoba chemthon hanbou ka chemthon yaangbou sühko iknop lei hoba photak iknop che.
Hobaje lemshang hokjung kho tousüng iknop lei yinglabü, hoba lemshang hokjung thüka laang lei, che chenei iknop chebang yinglabü.
Lemshang hokjung kho hip lei pendou aenei jeteitei, tousüng iknop anthüknyi hoba photak anthüknyi.

Thükkabou chemthon kho pendou aenei takbü jeteitei, tousüng iknop anthüklei hoba photak iknop anthüklei, sembung thon iknop tho che hoba kaijembo kümbüa photak iknop che. Lemshon to anglabü younak shuong kho chaangbou ae yeian kikei.
Hobaje Thükenbou
Zadok ka thenbü Levi phangeibü ungshedbou shuong ong kü to khangenla shanga ngo kishang to loujan. Ngo Thükenbou
Nyi sii at sunglabü hoba kho laang leia hoba chemthon chemnyek lei hoba sembung kaijembo naanglabü. Kho tegütham nyi lemshon kho sakenlabü hoba saüenlabü.
Kho phaia nyi shabü lembü shanga masu pongsu kho sungbalabü hoba kho Lembü- chem kaopheia takletbü saoposhanga juoklabü.
Nyibounyet nyi nali athebü lon paang che shabü lembü shanga lemlabü. Lemshang kho masu pongsueibü siiei saüenbü tegü saüenashi.
Ladang nyi saüenbü kho wanlaje, nyi nali athebü masu paangshou che hoba sanlon shuong yoka kap anakbü sanlon paang cheei lemjan.
Hobaje nyi khübü kho
Chalou nyetnyet chalou angboua lon paang che che shabü lembü shanga nyi lamlejan; tokei nyi kap anakbü masu paangshou che hoba sanchem ka sanlon paang cheei lemjan.
Chalou nyet ungshedbou shuongei lemshon dela shanga saüenlabü; kho tegü haoenei kho khümbo kuko saüenlabü.
Hobaje ladang chalou kho benlaje, setbounyet ka jaüan ungshedbou shuongei lemshon thüka kaneibü juokbü lembü lemlabü. Kheijinei ngei kan sungletlabü, dogo Thükenbou
Kheijinei müt khoei ngo chaangbou ae yeibü Lembüchem tangae bakhün to leibangaikei, hoba kho khinan kikei.
Hobaje
Choba ong ho bakhün maanga
Kheijinei müt khoei ngo Lembüchem thedang yungkük bakhün aeto leibakei. Ngei chühsi
hoba
“Ngüha alebü Israel chemdang to lenashi, Thükenbou

Kaneibü mangsenlabü kümsilei shuong pendou yo to tokei kanei kü la shausiyung, haabü hoba sii lemla kujinei kanei maangpona hoba phea akipbü küksithang shuong leibabü danko ngeibü Lembüchem shatikei, hoba kaneibü mangsenlabü kümsileiei ngeibü theyolanyobü leilukei.
Hobaje ngeibü saopobü peisilei shuonga ikjai alebü ong ayingko, aeiko khübü küksithang shuong ngeibü saopobü peisileia ikjai lela leiyetkei.
“Hibü Thükenbou

Khei yingasikei haoenei lemshang koukhüna ikjaiko hoba lemshanga khangenko haoen ngeibü Lembüchema khangenbü shuong yinglabü. Haoenei mütshuongei juokbü lembü shanga sungbabü meisiau haitila thükkei, hoba mütshuong thedanga loan haoen khangenlabü.

Lausikei haoenei haoeneibü heangsho thedanga haoen to khangenkei hoba Israel shousi shuong la shedbü shabü shontikei, khoei haoeneibü shedshonbü shanga ngei haoen shieikoelabü, dogo ngei theletlanletkei, dogo Thükenbou

Haoen kü jungto ungshedboueibü kümsilei kümla shanga ayingsi ngeibü saopobü kümsilei denche nyangko loula, ayingsi saopobü peisilei shuong shanga ngo nyangko aloujan ayingsi Pendou to Saopobou Kaoen to alotjan. Ho haoenei mangsenlabü kümsilei shuong kümbü shangabü himou kayang ki.
Khei yingasikei ngei haoen la Lembü chema nongeisaelabü ikküm ikleia ikjai kulabü.”
Thükenbou
Haoen ngeibü Lembüchem to atlabü; hoba haoen ong kü to khangenla shanga ngeibü lemshon nyangko loulabü hoba ngei sakkubü khangenbü kümsilei kümlabü.
Ladang haoen shemjang maangkabou to atlaje haoenei nei inyaibü neijan; shemjang maangkaboua ayingsi Lembüchem chemmaanga khangenjinei haoenei winei aneijan.
Haoeneibü khua nei inyaibü kaijan hoba haoeneibü shenjanga nei inyaibü kaijin kijan. Haoen lem khümlabü neisimei aieikei haoenei shembei akaijan.

Hobaje ladang haoen müt shaishang tangkabü shemjang to anglaje, haoenei haoeneibü neisimei hangletlabü hoba haoenei khangenshang saopobü shemjanga phoyolabü. Haoeneibü saopobü neisimeiei mütshuong aphaiyettila shanga lubü neisimei lelabü.
“Ungshedbou shuongei haoeneibü khu atongjan ayingsi haoeneibü khulou lounyukei ümjan; lausikei lemaia amjan.
Ungshedbou shuongei maangkabou shemjang to atjinei aoeikei ih ayungjan.
Ungshedbou aoeikei latnyu ayingsi bangbü sao yakla alelabü, lausikei Israel chemdang ka bukbü medei ayingsi ungshedboueibü yak latnyu che lela thükkei.
“Haoenei ngeibü mütli la saopobü si asaopobü kanglanga bangnyinbü lenjan, hoba haoen la hinseibü si ihinseibü kanglanga janyinla lenjan.

Oyolemen longsi haoenei matjembou tegütham ngüh jembulabü, hoba haoenei mat kho ngeibü ngühkhüm haangei jembujan. Ngeibü ngühkhüma kibü tegütham haoenei songle mailem lemsilang jungeilabü, hoba haoenei Nounyet saopotham pholabü.
“Ungshedbou aoeikei, haoeibü bou ayingsi nyu, ayingsi jayangshou ayingsi nouyangshou, jaisina ayingsi chemdang ayeibü medei to liman haibü mang to totyobüei jembü lolo ashattijan.
Hobaje kho tegü haoei totyoalonga chalou nyet haoei dantijan hoba kho phaia hao saüenlabü.
Hobaje saoposhanga khangenla hao maangkabou shemjang to khangenla hao ladang atlaje haoei hao shanga shedbü lembü kujan, dogo Thükenbou
“Haoenei phetphan akilabü; ngo haoeneibü phetphan: hoba nyi Israela haoen la ai nyaksinam akulabü; ngo haoeneibü nyaksinam ki.
Shausiyung lembü, shabü lembü hoba shabü debü lembü shuong kho haoeneibü shausiyung kilabü; hoba Israela khümbo kubü saüenbü pendou haoeneibü yinglabü.

Aishanga shaangbou buhek deihek maiboutham hoba ajanjan pendou lembü laobou kanei kuda kho ungshedbou shuong shanga kilabü; hoba kaneibü chemdanga haülabü kila shanga kanei shaangla wentek kümbü ungshedbou la kujan.
Au yingasikei ayingsi meisiau yingasikei, yemei haibü ayingsi meiei taketbü aikei ungshedbou shuongei ashaujan.”
Ladang kanei phetphan shanga kao jankulaje sao- pobü kao phejan
Khonei Lembüchem shanga chemnyek lei pendou aenei iknop saongao ngao bang kilabü, hoba kaijembo kanglanga kongbü kaophei iknop anjinsem kilabü.
Hobaje kho kaoen ka tousüng iknop hajar saoto ngao hoba khaang iknop an dogo khonei Lembüchem, pendou to saopobü kaoen shanga kanei takletjan.
Kho saopobü kaonyek yinglabü; kho saoposhang khangenbü shuong, aoyou
Hobaje Levibü shuong aoyouei lemshanga khangenda, haoen shanga tousüng iknop hajar saoto ngao hoba khaang iknop hajar an kilabü; kho haoen shanga kishang chem shanga kilabü.
Hobaje saopobü kaonyek shangabü jaletbü then to jenshuokko sangnyu shangabü kaonyek khaang iknop hajar ngao hoba tousüng iknop hajar saoto ngao sungenlabü; ho Israelbü pendou shangabü yinglabü.

Tokei songdakbou Choba shanga kaophei sungenjan. Saopobü kaoeneibü chanep leilang ka ho Mediterrania Yungnyu sühko chanep aeto thenlanglabü; hoba hoeibü toulei kho Israel phang la jaletkubü kaophei to jeteitei yinglabü lele, chaangbou leilang ka ho kaonyeka chaang aephei to thenlangko jaletlabü.
Israela ho haoeibü nyaksinam yinglabü. Hobaje ngeibü Choba shuongei touje ngeibü mütli ashiakoelabü; lausikei haoei Israel mütli la haoeneibü phang thüngthüng kao letilabü.
Thükenbou
“Kanei deiabü si linbü peisilei seret haubütakbüa ngühmai jungeijan.
“Efa si bat takbü jetei kilabü, khei bat kho homer phejan ana che, hoba efa kho homer phejan ana che yinglabü; homer kho tükdebü takletbü kilabü.
“Hobaje shekel kho gera sao- che yinglabü; shekel saoche hoba shekel saoto ngao hoba shekel anthükngaoei kaneibü mina che yinglabü.
“Kanei kulabü lembü kho ho ki: whet youshou homer weko ka efa chenei lakboubü hoba barli youshou homer weko ka efa chenei lakboubü.
Kor weko, batei takbü onang kho phejan ana che ki (laobou bat an ayingsi homer cheei onda, aishanga bat an kho homer che to jetei ki).

Tokei, Israela nindei lakbü lamshaushang ka sanshuong tan weko ka sanlon che bang sungbalabü. Khübü kho shausiyung lembü, juokbü lembü, sangmai lembü, khei mütshuong shanga shabü dela shanga jungeilabü, dogo Thükenbou
“Kaonyeka müt pendouei ho jongsakla kubü Israela konglebü shuong shanga phejan lelabü.

Hobaje lemalanga hoba Israelbü chung pienbü lemsilang, khei Litnyu Haanbü hoba Nounyet tegübü pendoua, juokbü lembü, shausiyung lembü hoba yunglabü lembü kulabü kho konglebü shuongeibü phejan yinglabü. Israel chungeibü shabü dela shanga haoei shabü lembü, shausiyung lembü hoba sangmai lembü lamlejan.”
Thükenbou
Hobaje ungshedbouei shabü lembü sii kho sunglabü hoba kho Lembü- chem koukhüna hoba lemshon chemnyek leia hoba maangkabou shemjang koukhün thaonyu shuong thüka thipbulabü.
Kanei lita chalou nyetbounyet, müt atei alemlele ayingsi ai angeko mashikan kisi shanga dogo haoen nyena kho kümbulabü; kho khei kanei Lembüchem shanga shabü dean apbü kümsilei kümlabü.
“Shaangbou lit chalou anthük leibounyeta kanei Püetbülem lijan, hoba kho chalou nyet libü lem, laonei kanei tokai ajinbü wentek shaulabü.
Khünyet songdakbouei jembü shanga hoba kaonyeka mütli pendou shanga masu pongsu che shabü lembü shanga sungbalabü.
Hobaje chalou nyeteibü Lemli sünga haoei chalou weko nali athebü masu pongsu nyet hoba sanlon paang nyet
Hobaje shausiyung lembü shanga masu pongsu weko efa che lamlelabü hoba sanlon paang weko efa che, hoba efa weko shanga oliv onang hin che lamlejan.
“Lit nyetboubü, chalou anthük ngaobounyet khangbü chalou nyeteibü Lemli jihsiphaiakei, songdakbouei shabü shanga lembü, juokbü lembü, shausiyung lembü hoba oliv onang lembü lamlelabü.”
Thükenbou

Hobaje songdakbou thükkabou koukhün chemso lam khüto atlabü, hoba koukhün thaonyu nyangko lolabü. Ungshedbou shuongei haoeibü juokbü lembü hoba haoeibü sangmai lembü lemlelabü. Haoei kouyoua lemlabü, kho phaia hao anglabü, lausikei bakhün khoje chasem sühko akhinlabü.
Hobaje Nounyet si Lit Haanbüa kaonyek kabü mütli shuongei kho bakhün koukap junga
Hobaje songdakbouei Nounyet
Hobaje sanlon paang yoa sungbalabü shausi- yung lembü kho efa che yingjan, hoba sanlon shoushou yoa sungbalabü shausiyung lembü khoje haoei thükthung, kho yoa efa weko shanga oliv onang hin che bang.
Hobaje Lit Haanbü chalounyet haoei kap anakbü masu paangshou che, sanlon shoushou lak hoba sanlon paang cheei lemjan.
Hobaje shausiyung lembü che tegü, masu pongsu yoa efa che, sanlon paang yoa efa che hoba sanlon shoushou shuong yoa haoei thükthüng, kho yoa efa weko shanga oliv onang hin che bang.
Hobaje ladang songdakbou kho lotlaje hao koukhün chemso aeto atlabü hoba hao kho lam to anglabü.
“Lausikei ladang mütshuong
Ladang haoen atlaje songdakbou kho haoen yoa atlabü, hoba ladang haoen anglaje hao haoen yoa anglabü.

Lem chalou hoba pienbü lemsilanga, shausiyung lembü kho masu pongsu che yoa efa che, sanlon paang yoa efa che, hoba sanlon shoushou shuong yoa haoei thükthüng, kho efa weko shanga oliv onang hin che bang.
“Hobaje ladang songdakbouei
Tokei kanei kho yoa ngeyang weko shausiyung lembü shanga efa ka phejan lak la janan che, kho yoa wena nyatyola shanga oliv onang hin ka phejan sem la janan che dogo lamlelabü.
Kho tegü haoenei san shoushou, shausiyung lembü hoba oliv onang ngeyang weko athakko juokbü lembü kula lamlelabü.”
Thükenbou

Lausikei, haoei haoeibü phet ka haoeibü sambü yoa che la jongsak la kualongaje, dongebü chalou asüh shongko kho sambü khoeibü yinglabü; kho phaia songdakbou la ngaitikulabü. Haoeibü phetphan kho hao shousi shuong shangabü kilabü.

Hobaje songdakbouei mütshuongeibü phetphan nyaksinam aikei alangkujan. Haoei jembü shousi la kubü nyaksinam khoje, kü mütlieibü kao soan sungko haoen aokei ashiakoelabü lele, hao la janletkubü kaophei ka ong yingjan.”

Kheijinei müt khoei yungthang aephei yeibü bakhün danko atshang shemjang yungkük aenei maangkabou khongyaang to ngo leibakei. Khübü kho ungshedbou shuong shanga saopobü shemjang ki. Haoei kü la chanep shemjang aenei kaoen che shean lenkei,

hoba laukei, “Ho ungshedbou shuongei shabü shanga lembü ayingsi shabü debü phe thungshang hokjung hoba shausiyung lembü wen kümshang ki, kho mütshuong anou asouko üptilabü lele haoenei saopobü peisilei tangkabü shemjang to asungba.”
Kheijinei haoei ngo tangkabü shemjang danko leian haukei, hoba chühashi, shemjang chemnyek lei wekoa shemjang che che kikei.
Shemjang lei chemnyeka shemjang sapyoan kikei, kho tousünga iknop saonyi hoba khaang iknop khujin kikei; chemnyek lei pendoua shemjang weko takbü jetei ong kikei.
Hobaje khübü chemlin kaijembo laangeibü kümthang kikei, hoba kümthanga thenan hokjung kikei.
Kheijinei haoei kü to laukei, “Habü ho thungshang juokshang chem ki, hanei Lembüchema khangenbü shuongei mütshuong shanga lembü haitibü thungla shanga ki.”

Hobaje müt khoei ngo se- peinyu Lembüchem koukhün to leibakei. Hobaje chühashi, chaangbou ae Lembüchem koukhün phang ka dei pakkei (aishanga Lembüchem kho chaang ae yeian kikei). Dei kho Lembüchem phang yungthang aeka, lemshon yungthang ae ka loukouko kikei.

Kheijinei müt khoei ngo Lembüchem ka yungkük aekabü bakhün lam ka leilangkei hoba chaangbou ae yeibü bakhün kaijembo leiyeikei. Hobaje chühashi, yungthang bakhün aeka shumang hanbüshou che kouko kikei.
Müt khoei haoeibü ika takbü janglüh jungan chaangbou ae haukei, haoei iknop hajar che takkei, hoba younyeka thükko koubü dei khatko ngo leian dankei.
Nyibou haoei hajar che takkei hoba youküka thükko kibü dei danko ngo hautikei. Tokei haoei hajar che takkei hoba shenjang sühko kibü dei danko haoei ngo hautikei.
Kho phaia tokei haoei hajar che takkei hoba khoje ngei akhatenlabü shumang che kikei. Aieilausi kho dei itjung danlabü to liman akhatenlabü lele haüan kikei.
Haoei kü to laukei, “Müteibü shou, nyi ho hapdalao?”
Kheijinei haoei ngo sepeian yungko aeto leibakei,
hoba ngo ladang khünei sühlangkei, chüh- ashi, ngei yungkoa jijihama bulong juongnyu hapbei.

Haoei kü to laukei, “Ho dei chanyu angbou kaonyek to kouda, hoba Jordan Yo to hoba Haibü Yungnyu to kouda. Ladang ho Haibü Yungnyu to atda, hoei kho yungnyu kabü jemdei kho koshikbü deimai la yeitida.

Shumang kho laeto ong koulaje, shuong shuonga paibü meisiau phang pendou khonei kilabü. Khünei ngau juongnyu kilabü, aieilausi ho shumang khüto kouda hoba jemdei kho koshikbü deimai la yeitida; hibü ho shumang laeto ong koulaje khünei ajanjan pendou lang kilabü.
Ngau lapbü shuong yungko sünga lolabü; Engedi ka Eneglaim sühko yungkoa haoeneibü tak pinlabü kaoen kilabü. Khünei Yungnyu Yaangboua kibü tegütham ngau phang juongnyutham kilabü.
Lausikei deidang hoba thimdei akoshiklabü; khübü kho jem bakshang kilabü.

Yungko jijihama shausiyung shanga bulong phang pendou khünei yemlabü. Khübüeibü pikyik shuong ladangkei ayuilabü, ayingsi khübüei buhek ahekko akilabü. Khübüei lit weko lang heklabü, aieilausi haoen to lakbü shumang kho Lembüchem ka kouda. Haoeneibü hek shausiyung shanga hoba haoeneibü pikyik shuong maitilabü shanga kilabü.”
Ho tegü Thükenbou
Kaneibü püshi shuong la ngei ik shingan ho kaodak kula thekubü tegü ho kan shanga phetphanlabü kilabü; ho kan kanglanga jeteitei janashi.
“Habü ho kaonyu leikhu leidang yinglabü: Yungkük aenei Yungnyu Yaangbou ka Hethlon sangnyu ka Hamat Lamnyu ka Zedad sangnyu sühko.
Kho Berotha si Sibraim (laobou Damaska si Hamath leilang kanglanga kida), kho Hauran leilanga kibü Hazer Hattikon sühko.
Yungkük leilang kho Damaska yungkük leilanga Hazer Enan, hoba yungthanga Hamath leilanga sühko koulabü. Kho yungthang leilang kilabü.

“Chaangbou leilang kho Damaska si Hauran kanglang kabü kaonyek kük ka yungkük ae, hoba kho Jordan Shumangei chanep aenei Israel kaophei si chaang aenei Tamar jembo, Gilead kanglanga leilang longtiko kouda. Kho chaangbou leilang kilabü.
“Yungthang leilang aenei Tamar ka Meriba Kadesh dei sühko, khüka Ijep kabü Wadi shumang aenei Yungnyu Yaangbou sühko. Ho chaangbou leilang kilabü.
“Chanep aenei Hamat lamnyu tangküng kaopheia sühko Yungnyu Yaangbou kho leilang kilabü. Ho chanep leilang kilabü.
“Kho tegü kan yoa ho kaonyu Israel phangshuong thüngthüng kanei janyojan.

Hobaje kho kan lolo phet phanla shanga janletlabü, hoba kan yoa shousi bukan kibü yenbou shuong la janletkujan. Kanei haoen kho Israel mütli mütlang hima weeijan; hoba haoenlakei Israel phang yoa phetphan janletkulabü.
Laobou phanga ong yenbou kho kilaje, khünei kanei haoeibü phet janletkujan, dogo Thükenbou

Yungthang kao leilang kho Yungnyu Yaangbou ka Hethlon to, Hamat Lamnyu to, Enon Sangnyu to, hoba Damaska si Hamath sangle kanglang leilang chaangbou aeto lida. Phang wekoei yungkük ka yungthang sühko chaangbou kao leilang ka Yungnyu Yaaangbou jembo kaonyu phejan takletbü che bang ho tegü hapjan:
Dan
Asher
Naftali
Manasse
Efraim
Reuben
Jihuda

Jihuda leilang nyangko chaangbou aeka chanep sühko kanei aeila lemla kulabü kho kilabü. Ho khaang iknop hajar saoto ngao kilabü, hoba chaangbou ka chanep sühko tousüng kho phang cheeibü phejan hima kilabü. Lembüchem kho jenyuyaaka kilabü.

Ho ungshedbou shuong shanga saopobü phejan kilabü. Ho yungthang aenei tousüng iknop hajar saoto ngao, chanep aenei khaang iknop hajar an, chaang aenei khaang iknop hajar an hoba yungkük aenei tousüng iknop hajar saoto ngao kilabü. Hobaje khoeibü jenyuyaaka

Kho janletbü kaophei Zadok shousi shuong saüenbü ungshedbou shuong shangabü kilabü. Haoenei ngo maanglanko khangenkei hoba lubü Levi phangei kümbü tegütham joubü Israelbü shuong neinouko ayinglam to asat.
Hibü haoen la Levibüeibü kaophei to leiko saopobü kaophei ka phangche shanenko janletkubü ki, hoba kho pendou to saopobou phejan kilabü.
Levibü shuongeikei ungshedbou shuongeibü kaophei to leiko yungkük aenei aeila janletbü kaophei che kilabü. Kho tousüng iknop hajar saoto ngao hoba khaang iknop hajar an.
shanga saüenbü kaophei kho kaonyu phejan pendou to maibou ki, hoba haka che ongkei ayaakshaulabü ayingsi aotokei ajeiyolabü. Ho saopobü hoba
