Hobaje joubü kaophei khaang iknop hajar ngao hoba tousüng iknop hajar saoto ngao kho sangnyu shanga chemsibung dangla hoba lamshaushang kee tegübü shanga jungeilabü.
Hobaje khübüeibü takletbü habü ho kilabü, chanep phei iknop hajar leito saongao ngao, hoba chaangbou naphei iknop hajar leito saongao ngao hoba chanep iknop hajar leito saongao ngao.
Hobaje sangnyua lamshaushang kee kho yungthanga iknop saoanto anjinsem, yungküka iknop saoanto anjinsem, chaangboua iknop saoanto anjinsem, hoba chanepa iknop saoanto anjinsem jaletlabü.
Joubü chaangbou aenei tousünga iknop hajar an hoba chanep aenei hajar an saopobü kaophei to nyangyoko kilabü. Khüka longbüei sangnyua kümbüleibü shuong shanga shausiyung kulabü.
Hobaje kho Israel phang pendou ka kümbüleibü shuongei mouenlabü.
Janletkubü khümboei jiji- ham aenei süng si khaang iknop hajar saoto ngao yinglabü. Kanei saopobü phejan kho sangnyubü peisilei yoa aeilabü jongsak che tegü shanenko sungenan phojan.

Saopobü phejan si sangnyubü peisileiei jijiham aedanga kaangtibü kaophei kho songdakboueibü yinglabü. Ho saopobü phejan ka chaangbou leilang to iknop hajar saoto ngao, hoba chanep leilang to iknop hajar saoto ngao dogo lilabü. Phangeibü phejan toulei to linyoko kaophei ham songdakbou shangabü yinglabü, hoba Lembüchem yoan saopobü kaoen kho jenyuyaaka kilabü.
Hibü Levi shuongeibü peisilei si sangnyueibü peisilei shuong kho songdakboueibü kaophei jen- yuyaaka kilabü. Songdakboueibü kaophei kho Jihuda si Benjamin leilang kanglanga kilabü.
Aeila janletbü yungkük aenei joubü phang wekoei, chaangbou leilang chanep ae ka Yungnyu Yaangbou jembo yungthang ka yungkük sühko kaonyu takletbü che bang ho hai hapjan:
Benjamin
Simeon
Issakhar
Zebulun
Gad
Gadeibü yungkük leilang kho Tamar ka Meribath-Kadesh dei sühko, hoba khüka Ijep kabü Wadi shumang ka Yungnyu Yaangbou sühko kilabü.
“Kanei Israel phangshuong la janletkulabü phet kho ho kaodak ki; hoba habü ho haoeneibü phejan ki,” dogo Thükenbou
Habü ho sangnyu bakhün shuong kilabü: Yungkük aephei ka khangan, laobou tousüng iknop hajar leito saongao ngao,
sangnyu bakhün shuong kho Israel phangeibü nyen nyenlabü. Yungkük aenei bakhün sem kho Reuben bakhün, Jihuda bakhün hoba Levi bakhün.
Chaangbou aenei bakhün sem kilabü, laobou tousüng iknop hajar leito saongao ngao: kho Josef bakhün, Benjamin bakhün hoba Dan bakhün.
Yungthang aenei bakhün sem kilabü, laobou takbü iknop hajar leito saongao ngao: kho Simeon bakhün, Issakhar bakhün hoba Zebulun bakhün.
Chanep aenei bakhün sem kilabü, laobou tousüng iknop hajar leito saongao ngao: kho Gad bakhün, Asher bakhün hoba Naftali bakhün.
Tang kaijembo kanglang kho iknop hajar anthükset yinglabü. Hobaje khünyet ka jaüan kho sangnyu nyen: “
Jihudabü Choba Jehoakim songdakbü po semboubüa Babilonbü Choba Nebukhadnezzar Jerusalem to loukei hoba haoei shikei.
Hobaje Mühghaü chema kibü thungsiphau at yoan
Hobaje sungphatbü mütshuong thüka leiyeibou Ashpenaz to Israelbü shousi shuong at, khei Choba chempen hoba yaangenbüeibü shousi at leiba dogo Chobaei hao to laukei.

Khei nali athebü heshou süngsilop maibü songadoa shetenbü, hapbü ngebüa maangli maangsang hoba pithen bouthen ditenbü, hoba Choba chema lola mubü hoba haoen la Khaldibüeibü ngühyem hoba dobüshibü lenla thükbü yingjan.
Hobaje haoen shanga chalou angbou Chobaeibü shausi- yung maibü hoba haoei yungbü ih kula Chobaei sakkukei hoba haoen po sem pangteijan hoba thonla haoen Choba thedanga lojan.
Khübü yoa Jihudabü phang ka Daniel, Hanania, Mishael hoba Azaria kikei.

Hobaje sungphatbü mütshuong yo kabü bunyuei haoen la nyen nyenkukei. Daniel la haoei Belteshazar nyenkukei, hoba Hanania la haoei Shadrak hoba Mishael la Meshak hoba Azaria la Abednego dogo nyenkukei.

Lausikei Danielei haoeibü maanga Chobaeibü shausiyung maibü ayingsi haoeibü ih yungbüei hao lolo ashalabü dogo janthetkei; hibü haoei sungphatbou müt bunyubou to haoei hao lolo ashala shanga sukeijakei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei sungphatbou müt thedanga Danielei maangshik hoba onou haptikei.

Hobaje sungphatbou müt bunyubouei Daniel to laukei, “Ngei ngeibü bunyu Choba aoei kan la shaula hoba yungla sakkukei hao to hatda; aila kaneibü thenyek kan himshuong toje amaibou hao la haptila? Khei yingalonga kanei Choba thed- anga ngeibü khu thusheda phokuda.”
Kheijinei ikjaibou ao Daniel, Hanania, Mishael hoba Azaria thüka sungphatbou müt bunyubouei pienkei hao to Danielei laukei,
“Chalou annyet shanga khangenbü shuong to takteiashi, shaula pikshik hoba yungla dei labü.
Kho phaia ka junga küneibü thenyek hoba Chobaeibü shausiyung maibü shaubü heshou shuong thenyek chühyoshi, hoba ka la maibü che no khangenbü shuong to jungeishi.”
Hibü kho shanga haoei haoen to ngüha lekei, hoba chalou an haoen takteikei.
Hobaje chalou an thonan Chobaeibü shausi- yung maibü shaubü heshou pendou tokei haoen chühlalela hesihang maibou hoba phe netbou kikei.
Hibü ikjaibouei haoen la shausiyung maibü hoba haoenei yungbü ih aku lausikei pikshik shausiyung kukei.
Tou khübü heshou müt lei shanga Mühghaüei haoen la hapbü ngebü hoba ditenbü pendoua songbüdobü kukei, hoba mangsang hoba manghlibü pendoua Daniel ditenbou kukei.
Hobaje haoen leian loula Chobaei takletbü chalou sühbüa sungphatbü mütshuong yoa
Hobaje Chobaei haoen to joyokei, hoba haoen yoa Daniel, Hanania, Mishael hoba Azaria, tegübü ao akitei; hibü haoen Choba thedanga lokei.
Hobaje Chobaei laobou songsido hoba ditenbü kümsilei shanga ong phekei, haoeibü sanglea thulenbü hoba huonseibü pendou tokei phejan anei haoen maibou hapbei.
Hobaje Sairas Choba shaangboubü po sühko athakko kikei.
Nebukhadnezzarei songdakbü po nyiboua Nebukhadnezzarei mangh likei hoba haoeibü soushou khonsakkei hoba nyeket alou.
Kheijinei Choba la haoeibü mangh lenla shanga thulenbü, huonseibü shuong, manghtakbü shuong, seibüyaübü shuong hoba Khaldibü ngala Chobaei ngühkhüm kukei. Hibü haoen lotan Choba junga lokei.
Hobaje Chobaei haoen to laukei, “Ngei mangh che lia, hoba mangh kho ngela kü soushou khonsakda.”
Kheijinei Khaldibü shuongei Aramaika Choba to laukei, “O Choba, salangko kishi! No khangenbü shuong la kaibü mangh lenshima, hoba künei tetlabü kho lenlabü.”

Chobaei Khaldibü to jongaiko laukei, “Ngeibü ngüh ho tükde kia, kanei kü la mangh kho alenen longa hoba khoeibü tetlabü angeti longa kan netla yeiko wapettilabü, hoba kaneibü chem odlanotla yeitilabü.
Lausikei kanei ho mangh hoba tetlabü lenena longa kü ka kanei jongsak, mu hoba nyenhang yaang haplabü; hibü kü la mangh si tetlabü kho lenashi.”
Nyiboukei haoenei jongaiko laukei, “Chobaei haoeibü sambü shuong la mangh kho lenashi hoba künei tetlabü lenlabü.”
Chobaei jongaiko laukei, “Kanei jih pailetla haujemda dogo ngei maisho ngeakei, aieilausi ngeibü ngüh ho tükde kia dogo kanei ngekei.

Lausikei kanei kü la mangh kho alen longa kan shanga ngühkhüm che ong kia, aishanga jeileibü che longla hai- yeiko kanei amlang ngüh kü to laula lamlekei, hibü kü la mangh kho lenbü, hoba kanei tetlabü lenenkei dogo ngei ngelabü.”

Khaldibüei Choba to jongaiko laukei, “Chobaei phebü onlanglabü lele songsido kibü müt che ongkei kaodaka aki; aishanga Choba latetche yaangbü hoba hau kibü yinglaje yingasikei ho tegü thulenbü, huonseibü, manghtakbü ayingsi seibüyaübü Khaldibü to ladangkei phean achüh.
Chobaei kümsilei sekbü che pheda hoba kho mühghaü shuong aoyou müt yoa akida haoen to liman Choba to lenla athük.”
Khoei Choba aeibou maangto shatkei hoba maangpokkei, hoba Babilonbü hapbü ngebü pendou mautila ngühkhüm kukei.
Hibü songbüdobü shuong kho haitijan dogo ngühkhüm kho pendou ae phinthonkei, hoba haoenei Daniel hoba haoeibü thangbou shuongkei haitila lambei.
Kheijinei Chobaeibü lombou leiyeibou Ariok, ao Babilona songbüdobü shuong haitila hauan kikei, hao to Danielei songsido kiko hoba ngühmaanglanko jongaibü kukei.
Chobaeibü leiyeibou Ariok to haoei laukei, “Chobaeibü ngühkhüm kho aila kheinyu kaangkei?” Ladang Ariokei ho shangabü shaknyinan Daniel to lenkei,
Daniel tongde atkei, hoba Choba to hao la jih kushi dogo sukeijakei hoba haoei Choba la tetlabü kho kulabü dogo laukei.
Kheijinei Daniel haoeibü chem to ngaikei, hoba ho shangabü haoei haoeibü jenabou, Hanania, Mishael hoba Azaria to lenkei.
Hobaje kho huphang ngüh shanga Daniel hoba haoeibü youjambü shuong Babilonbü songbüdobü shuong yoa amautila haoenei khuthük Mühghaüeibü onou phela shanga ngetikei.
Kheijinei nangnak mangsanga huphang ngüh kho Daniel jungto tang khitkei.
Danielei laukei,
“Ponpen thon akibü Mühghaü nyen haübou yingshi!
Aieilausi songsihon hoba hau hao shangabü ki.
Haoei jihsiphai hoba poang hongjih jeileikuda.
Haoei Choba shuong sungan apda hoba Choba shuong phongaida;
songbüdobü la haoei songsido kuda hoba ditenbü la haoei
hapbü ngebü kuda.
Haoei haoeneibü huphang kümsilei shuong tang khittida;
nakthüh phanga ai ki haoei ngekei,
hoba ngesakbü hao yoa kia.
O no ngeibü pisiboueibü Mühghaü,
Ngo kato olinda hoba no sangda.
Nyi songsihon hoba hau kü la kukei,
hoba tou künei kaka ai hikei nyi kü la ngetikei;
aishanga Choba shanga nyi kü la ngetikei.”

Hibü Babilona hapbü ngebü mautila Chobaei pienbou Ariok jungto Daniel atkei; hao hauan hao to laukei, “Babilonbü hapbü ngebü temauti, ngo Choba jungto leian atkai, hoba ngei Choba la tetlabü kho lenlabü.”
Kheijinei panteiko Choba jungto Ariokei Daniel leian atkei, hoba hao to ho tegü laukei, “Langsenbü Jihudabü shuong yoa Choba la tetlabü ngetilabü ngei müt che hapakei.”
Daniel aoeibü nyen Belteshazar nyenan kikei hao to Chobaei laukei, “Ngei laobou mangh hapbei hoba khoeibü tetlabü nyi kü la lenla thüklep lo?”
Danielei Choba to jongaiko laukei, “Hapbü ngebü, manghtakbü, khopjikseibü, seibüyaübü, huonseibü ayingsi, khanshoulitshou tetenbü aoeikei Chobaei khangbü huphang ngüh kho alenen.
Lausikei huan kibü tang khittibou khuthüka Mühghaü che kia, hoba haoei ho phaia ai yingla kho Nebukhadnezzar la ngetia. Kaibü mangh hoba mangsang kaibü shen thüka kaibü khu aenei habü ho kia.
“Choba, ka jungto no shena lengan kijinei loulabü jihsiphaia ai yingla dambü loukei, hoba aoei huan kibü tang khittida haoei ai haüthükla kho ka la ngetikei.

Lausikei kü shangaje khei lubü müt pendou toje ngeibü songsido aei kibü shanga ho huphang ngüh ho kü la tang khittikei aying, lausikei tetlabü kho ka la ngetila hoba kaibü maangpon dambü shuong nyi ngela shanga ki.
“O Choba, nyi hapbei, hoba chühashi, heangsho yaangbunyu che kikei. Kho heangsho aeibou yaangbü hoba yongko soneikangko kikei, hoba ka thedanga lokei, hoba khoeibü hesihang hatlamoklabü che.
Kho heangshoeibü khu kho hon hinseibü kikei, haoeibü khukhu hoba ikshon chandinam kikei, haoeibü shimung hoba haoeibü youshi chisaknam kikei.
Haoeibü you namkungnam, haoeibü youdem pheiche nam hoba pheiche shungkungtham.
Nyi khüto chühko kijinei ik ayoko thüngenbü laang cheei haoeibü youdem pheiche nam hoba pheiche shungkungtham dogo kibü khüto kakkei hoba khübü kho netla yeikei.

Kheijinei namkung, shungkungtham, chisaknam, chandinam hoba hon liko netla yeiko phetnyinkei, hoba sulang amshang kabü youshou sho tegü yeikei, hoba yeiei khübü kho soulangkei hoba haoen kishang ühüpbo apbei. Lausikei heangsho kühnyinkubü laang kho shongh yaangbü che la yeikei hoba kaodak pendou shenkei.
“Mangh kho ho kikei, hoba tou künei Choba la tetlabü kho lenlabü.
No, O Choba, Choba shuong thüka Choba, aola khuthükbü Mühghaüei sei, hau hoba soneikangbü kukei.
Hobaje lanei ong müteibü shousi shuong ki, yamkabü meisiau hoba mühkabü au haoei kaibü ik to kukei khübü pendou thüka ka la songdaktikei, honeibü khu kho no ki.
Ka phainei ka to hanshangbou sangle che longlabü hoba semboubü chisaknam sangle cheei kaodak pendou thüka songdaklabü.

Hobaje leiboubü sangle kho namkung tegü hau kiko kilabü; aieilausi namkungei peisilei pendou ngümnyinkuda; hoba namkungei peisilei pendou ngünnyinkubü tegü, haoei khei netla yeiko leilutikulabü hoba ngünnyinkulabü.

Hobaje nyi youdem hoba youbem pheiche chak yaübüeibü shungkungtham hapbü tegü kho janyinbü sangle che yeilabü, lausikei nyi shungkungtham yoa namkung kheiyoan hapbü tegü khonei namkung kaangbü maibü atje kilabü.
Lausikei youdem pheiche namkung hoba shungkungtham kibü tegü sangle kho pheiche hau akibü kilabü.
Hobaje nyi namkung shungkungtham totbü yoa kheiyoan hapbü tegübü kho haoen laolam yaknga soyolabü, lausikei namkung shungkungtham to akhangyobü tegü haoen che la nyatyoan akilabü.

Hobaje khübü Choba shuong chaloua khuthükbü Mühghaüei ladangkei amaubü sangle che huonglabü, ayingsi sangle kho lubü mütli la üpyokulabü, lausikei khoei khübü sangle pendou netla yeiko leilutikulabü hoba mautikulabü hoba kho ponpen loan kilabü.

Khei shongh ka müteibü ik ayoko laang che thüngenbü nyi hapbü tegü hoba khoei namkung, chisaknam, shungkungtham, chandinam hoba hon netla yeiko leilutikubü tegü yaangenbou Mühghaüei ho phaia ai haüthükla kho Choba la ngetia, hoba mangh kho tükde hoba tetlabü maimaitham ki.”
Kheijinei Nebukhadnezzar Chobaei haoeibü the kaoa khüpetkei hoba Daniel to lembei hoba hao la lembü hoba ponlem maibü kula haoen la sakkukei.
Chobaei Daniel to laukei, “Maimaitham kaibü Mühghaüje mühghaü shuong thüka Mühghaü hoba Choba shuong thüka Bunyubou, hoba nyi ho huphang ngüh tang khittisije, hao huan kibü tang khittibou ki.”

Kheijinei Chobaei Daniel thükkabou setshang to angtikei, hoba hao la jongsak yaangbü juong kukei, hoba Babilon provins khümbo thüka songdakbou hoba Babilonbü hapbü ngebü pendou thüka kongnyubou yeitikei.
Kheijinei Danielei Choba to subüjabüei Babilon provinsa songdak kümsilei thüka haoei Shadrak, Mishak hoba Abednego pienkei, lausikei Danielje Chobaeibü chema kikei.
Nebukhadnezzar Chobaei honeibü heangsho che kümbei, kho suokla iknop saosem hoba khaang iknop lak, haoei kho Babilon provins Dura pholia lotian phokei.

Kheijinei Nebukhadnezzar Chobaei yaangenbü shuong, governor shuong, konglebü shuong, matjembü shuong, namthanbü shuong, songsido kubü shuong, nama bunyu shuong, hoba provinsa songdakbü shuong liko kamshaila ngala hautikei.

Kheijinei yaangenbü shuong, governor shuong, hoba kongnyu matjembü shuong, namthanbü shuong, songsido kubü shuong nama bunyu shuong hoba provins thüka songdakbü shuong pendou Nebukhadnezzar Chobaei phonenbü heangsho saüenshanga kamshaikei, hoba Nebukhadnezzar Chobaei lotibü heangsho thedanga haoen lokei.
Kheijinei Chobaeibü ngühlaubou cheei kaangko ngekkei, “O mütli shuong, phangshuong hoba ngühyem shuong, ho kan la sakkuda.
Laobou chaloua teklaang ngühlang pithung hoba pithung phang juong hoba chia phang pendou ditlaje kanei khüpetlabü hoba Nebukhadnez- zar Chobaei kümbü honeibü heangsho kho lemlabü.
Hobaje aoyouei akhüpetlaje hoba alemlaje kheijinei wan longan kibü wanang to lapan jinkulabü.”
Hibü kho chaloua müt pendouei teklaang ngühlang kongkin hoba chia phang juong ditjinei khüpetkei hoba Nebukhadnezzar Chobaei lotibü honeibü heangsho to lembei.
Hibü kho chaloua Khaldibü at nyangko loukei hoba Jihudabü aweasüngko,
Nebukhadnezzar Choba to haoenei laukei, “O Choba, ponpen lang kishi!
O Choba, mütpem wekoei teklaang ngüh, pithung, kongkin phang juong, hoba chia phang juong, hoba chia phang pendou ditjinei khüpetlabü hoba honeibü heangsho to lemlabü dogo nyi ngühkhüm kümbei;
hoba aoei khü- petan alemlaje wanlong longan kibü wanang jenyu to lapan jinkulabü.
Babilon provinsa songdakbü kümsilei thüka ikjaiko Jihudabü at, Shadrak, Meshak hoba Abednego, nyi pienakei, O Choba, khübü mütshuongei no aweda, ayingsi nyi kümbü heangsho to alemda.”
Kheijinei khau angko hoba maangpok angan Nebukhadnez- zarei Shadrak, Meshak hoba Abednego leian loula sakkukei; kheijinei haoenei khübü mütshuong Choba jungto leian loukei.
Nebukhadnezzarei haoen to laukei, “O Shadrak, Meshak hoba Abednego, kanei ngeibü mühghaü to akhangenda ayingsi ngei kümbü honeibü heangsho to alemda dogo laubü kho tükde sai?

Tou kanei teklaang, pithung, hoba kongkin phang juong ditjinei ngei kümbü heangsho thedanga khüpetla hoba lemla kanei lamlean kialonga, kho maibou, lausikei kanei alemlonga wanlong longan kibü wananga lapan jinlabü hoba ngeibü ik ka kan khümenlabü mühghaü ao ki?”
Shadrak, Meshak hoba Abednegoei Choba to jongaiko laukei, “O Nebukhadnezzar, künei ho shanga ka to jongaila ai kongnyu aki.
Chühashi, küneibü Mühghaü, ao künei khangenda haoei wanlong longan kibü wanang ka kün khümenla thükakei, hoba O Choba, haoei kün kaibü ik ka khümenlabü.
Lausikei kho khei aying tegükei, O Choba, nyi ho ngeashi, künei kaibü mühghaü akhangenlabü, ayingsi nyi kümbü honeibü heangsho to alemlabü.”

Kheijinei Nebukhadnezzar khau aeibou angkei hoba Shadrak, Meshak hoba Abednego khulimbo haoeibü thenyek si sembung aiche tegü jakshaikei, hibü wanlong kho shangiedbü toje nyetneiei aubou yeitishi dogo haoen la sakkukei.
Hobaje haoei sepai shuong yoa hau kibou müt at to Shadrak, Meshak hoba Abednego khühan wanlong longan kibü wananga lapan jinkula haoei sakkukei.
Kheijinei khübü mütshuong haoeneibü tanga yukbü, mangyuk, khushen hoba manga yukbü hoba neisimei lubü yoan khühkei hoba wanlong longan kibü wanji to lapan jinkukei.
Hobaje Chobaeibü ngühkhüm aeibou kaangbü hoba wanlong kho yongko aubü yingsije Shadrak, Meshak hoba Abednego khühbü shuong wan longan kibü wanangei juoketkei.
Hobaje khübü müt sem Shadrak, Meshak hoba Abednego khühan wanlong jenyu to attikei.
Kheijinei Nebukhadnezzar mokkei hoba panteiko lokei, hoba haoei hao phanga songbüdobü shuong to laukei, “Senei müt sem khühan jinkukei aying lo?” Haoenei jongaiko laukei, “Maimaitham, O Choba.”
Haoei jongaiko laukei, “Chühashi, ngei müt lei sengan wanjia paiko hapda, hoba haoen to ai ayingda, hoba leiboubü kho chühla mühghaü shuongeibü shou che phatko kia.”

Kheijinei wanlong longan kibü sembung nyangko louan Nebukhadnezzarei joyoko laukei, “Shadrak, Meshak hoba Abednego, kan Thükkabou Mühghaü khangenbü shuong longashi, hoba hato kaiya. Kheijinei Shadrak, Meshak hoba Abednego wanlong jenyu ka longkei!”

Hobaje songdak kongnyu shuong hoba governor shuong hoba Chobaeibü damanchühbü shuong liko kamshaian khübü müt sem hapbei, hoba haoeneibü manga wanei ai aleko kikei, ayingsi haoeneibü khulou amakko kikei, ayingsi haoeneibü tangkabü neisimei mangyuk ajuok ayingsi haoen to wanmaklüm ongkei ahi.

Nebukhadnezzarei laukei, “Shadrak, Meshak hoba Abednegoeibü Mühghaü haübou yingshi; aoei hao khangenbü shuong aoyouei hao to maanglembei haoen khümenla haoeibü hang- angbü yantikei hoba haoenei haoeneibü Mühghaü to limbo lubü mühghaü aikei akhangenla ayingsi alemla shanga haoeneibü mang khümbo kuko Chobaeibü ngühkhüm jakshaitikukei.

“Hibü ngei ngühkhüm che kümda, khei mütli at, phang ayingsi ngühyem laobouei, Shadrak, Meshak hoba Abednegoeibü Mühghaü khulimbo ngüh che ongkei laulaje, netla yeiko wapnyinlabü, hoba haoeneibü chem odsinot shangan phobü tegü yeitikulabü, aishanga ho tegü khümenla thükbü lubü mühghaü aokei aki.”
Kheijinei Chobaei Shadrak, Meshak hoba Abednego Babilon provinsa setshang thükkabou to angtikei.
Nebukhadnezzar Chobaei kaodaka kibü mütshuong, phang hoba ngühyem pendou to, “Kan yoa sangmai hakso yingshi!” dogo lauko ngühlang hautikei.
“Thükkabou Mühghaüei kü aenei kümbü amaaphilabü hoba seikümseilei ngetila ngei maia dogo dambei.
“Haoeibü amaaphilabü shuong ailai yaangkei,
hoba haoeibü seikümseilei shuong ailai hau yaangkei!
Haoeibü sangle ponpen kibü sangle ki,
hoba haoeibü songdak meten meten kida.
“Ngo Nebukhadnezzar, ngeibü chema haksoko ngeibü Chobaeibü chema naangmaiko kikei.
Ngei mangh che hapbei hoba khoei ngo moktikei, ngeibü yepshanga damanchühbü hoba ngeibü khua mangsangei ngo khonkutikei.
Hibü mangh tetlabü kho kü la ngetila shanga Babilona songnge donge pendou kü thedang to leian loula ngei ngühkhüm che kümbei.
Kheijinei huonseibü shuong, thulenbü shuong, Khaldibü shuong, hoba khanshoulitshou tetbü shuong loukei hoba haoen thedanga ngei ngeibü mang lenkei, lausikei haoenei kho tetlabü kü la alenen.
Lausikei phaila thonla Daniel, aoeibü nyen Belteshazar ngeibü mühghaüeibü nyenphai ka hoba aoto saopobü Mühghaüeibü soushou ki, hao kü jungto lotkei, hoba ngei ngeibü mangh ho tegü hao to lenkei.
O Belteshazar, thuseibü thüka
“Ngo shena lengan kijinei ngeibü khua mangh kho ho tegü kikei. Ngei chühkei hoba chühashi, kaodak bunyua bulong che kikei hoba kho aeibou loubü kikei.
Bulong kho yaangbünyu yeian kangkhühtham kikei, hoba kho kaodak thonshang pendou ka hapbo kikei.

Khoeibü yik hemaian kikei hoba khoeibü buhek juong hoba khonei pendou shanga shausiyung kikei; yama meisiau shuong haoeibü yemekoubü phanga haksokei, hoba khoeibü bubheka aushuong shaikei hoba phe pendou ho ka sambo kikei.
“Ngeibü shen thüka ngeibü khua ngei chühkei hoba chühashi, lombou che hoba Saopobü che khuthük ka louyankei.

Haoei kaang ngekkei hoba laukei, ‘Bulong kho akashi, hoba haoeibü bhek wapan apashi, haoeibü yik nyaakletashi, haoeibü hekshuong phinphin aptiashi, kho phang ka meisiau shuong hoba haoeibü bhek ka aushuong sattiashi.
Lausikei haoeibü li si chungthem kaoa namkung si chisaknamei khühlepan yama nyemsang yoa apyoshi.
“ ‘Hobaje kho mühkabü nindeiei nembo apyoshi hoba haoeibü phejan kaodakbü nyem yoa meisiau yoa kitishi.
Müteibü maangpon ka hao jakshaitiashi hoba meisiaueibü maangpon hao la kuashi, hoba hao thedang to nyetnei dantiashi.

Lombü shuongei janenbü ngühkhüm kho kia, hoba saopobü shuongei janenbüei sakkubü kho ki, khei Thükkabouei khunakshousi sangle thüka songdakla hoba kho haoei maangangbü la kuda, hoba kho thüka phangkabü mütshuong phokuda dogo lang kibü pendouei ngela shanga.’

“Ho mang ho ngo Nebukhadnezzar Chobaei hapbei, hoba no Belteshazar, nyi tetlabü ngetiashi, ngeibü sanglea songnge donge pendouei tetlabü kü la ngetila athükko kiasikei, nyije thükakei, aishanga Saopobü Mühghaüeibü soushou ka to kia.”

Kheijinei Daniel, aoeibü nyen Belteshazar kikei, longche phenyeman apbei; Chobaei laukei, “Belteshazar, mangh ayingsi kho tetlabüei no khontesak.” Belteshazarei laukei, “Ngeibü bunyubou, mangh kho no mangsenbü shuong shanga yingtishi, hoba tetlabü kho kaibü dangbou shuong shanga yingtishi.
Nyi hapbü bulong laobou chingkei hoba kaangkhühtham kikei hotenei müh sühan kikei, hoba kaodak pendou ka hapbo kikei.
Laobou yik hemaian kikei, hoba khükabü hek shuong khübü pendou shanga shausiyung kikei, laobou phanga yamkabü meisiau shuong huda hoba bhek shuonga mühkabü aushuong pakshang kikei.
“O Choba, yaangenko hoba hau kiko kibü kho no, aishanga no yaangenbü müh sühko hoba kaibü songdak kaodak thonbü sühko kia.

Hobaje müh ka lombou che hoba saopobü che louyenko laobou Chobaei hapbei, haoei laukei, ‘Bulong kho akashi, hoba mautiashi, khei yingsikei li si chungthem kho kaoa namkung hoba chisaknamei kaijembo yuklepan yama nyem alibü thüka ap- yoshi hoba hao mühkabü nindeiei nemtiko meisiau yoa kitishi.’
“O Choba, tetlabü kho ho, hoba ho Thükkabou kabü ngühkhüm ngeibü bunyubou jungto loubü ki.

No müt yo ka shian sattilabü hoba no yama meisiau yoa kilabü; hoba nyi masuei tegü sang shaulabü hoba mühkabü nindeiei nemlabü, hoba ka thüka jih nyet dantilabü; khunakshousi sangle thüka Thükkabouei songdakda hoba kho haoei maangangbü la kuda, dogo nyi angeshongko kho khei kilabü.
Hobaje bulong chungthem li apyola sakkubü kho ho; khei khuthükbü Mühghaüei songdakda dogo nyi ngean phaia kaibü sangle maimaitham ka la kulabü.

Hibü, O Choba, sanoudambo nyi ngeibü songsido sungletashi hoba saopobü kümbüei kaibü shabü shuong, hoba shalebü to onou lenbüei kaibü shedbü shuong pailetashi, aingenyu kheijinei kaibü naangmaibü süngshonlabü.”
Ho pendou Nebukhadnezzar to loushadkei.
Lit anthük nyiboubü thonlama Babilon Chobaeibü chemdaka hao paiko kijinei,
Chobaei hao lolo laukei, “Ho Babilon yaangbü ho ngo Choba kishang aying lo?”
Chobaeibü sembunga ngüh kho kitoua khuthük ka ngüh che louyenkei, “O Choba Nebukhadnezzar, ho ka to lenda, ka ka sangle banga,

hoba no müt yoka shian sattilabü hoba kaibü kishang yam khongthu meisiau yoa kilabü; masu pongsu tegü no khonkuko sang shautilabü hoba khunakshousi sangle thüka Thükkabouei songdakda hoba kho haoei maangangbü la kuda dogo nyi ange shongko po nyet dantilabü.”

Kheijineitham Nebukhadnezzar Choba thüka ngüh kho haüthükkei. Müt yoka hao shian sattikei, hoba masu tegü sang shaukei, hoba haoeibü mang mühkabü nindeiei nemshatko kikei, hoba haoeibü khulou aulueibü wi tegü hoba haoeibü yousen iksen aueibü yousen tegü yeikei.

“Chalou jihsiphai thonbüa ngo, Nebukhadnezzarei ngeibü nyek khuthük ae chühangtikei hoba ngeibü songsido kü jungto sepeinyu longeikei hoba ngei Thükkabou haükukei, hoba pon- pen lang kibou la ngei nyensang kukei hoba souhatkei.
Aishanga haoeibü songdak ponpen thon akibü songdak
hoba haoeibü sangle meten meten kida.
Hao thedanga kaodaka kibü pendou aikei weko aki;
khuthük hangangbü tan yoa hoba kaodaka kibü
müt yoa haoei ai maangangda kho haoei kümda;
hoba haoeibü ik senetla ayingsi hao to
‘Ai kümda,’ dogo laulabü ao aki.

“Kheijineitham ngeibü songsido kü jungto sepeinyu longeikei, hoba ngeibü sangle soneikangbü shanga ngeibü soumo hoba ngeibü soumokakbü kü jungto sepeinyu longeikei hoba ngeibü songnge donge shuong hoba kü phanga yaangenbü shuong ngo lambo loukei, hoba ngeibü sanglea ngo setkei, hoba kü la jembophambo yaangenla jinyokukei.
“Tou ngo Nebukhadnezzarei khuthükbü Choba sangda hoba souhatda, aishanga haoeibü kümsilei pendou tükde ki, haoeibü lamnyu maimaitham kia hoba aoyou lilisese paida haoei hao yantila thükakei.”
Belshazzar Chobaei haoeibü songdak yaangenbü müt hajar che shanga lem yaangbü kümbei, hoba hajar thedanga ih yungkei.

Belshazzarei ih yungan phaia haobou Nebukhadnezzarei Jerusalem lembü chem ka sungbabü hon hoba chandinam thung si phau shuong Choba hoba haoeibü yaangenbü shuong, haoeibü yaksishuong hoba haoeibü thangnyu shuongei khübünei yungla shanga sungbala sakkukei.
Kheijinei Jerusalem lembü chem ka jungan loubü honeibü thungsi- phau haoenei sungbakei; hoba Choba hoba haoeibü yaangenbü shuong haoeibü yaksi shuong hoba haoeibü thangnyu shuongei khünei yungkei.
Haoenei ih yungkei hoba hon, chandinam, chaksiam, namkung, bu hoba laang, mühghaü shuong nyen sangkei.
Kheijineitham müteibü ik che longkei hoba ikjishouei wanthung thedanga Chobaeibü chem kümthanga naangbüa dokei, hoba ikei dobü kho Chobaei hapbei.
Kheijinei Chobaeibü thenyek menthutham apbei, hoba hao maangmaukei, hoba haoeibü yousi ik nunutham apbei, hoba haoeibü youkük kakyokei.

Khaldibü huonseibü, seibüyaübü hoba khanshoulitshou tetbü leian loula Chobaei kaang ngekkei. Babilonbü hapbüngebü to Chobaei laukei, “Aoei ho dobü welaje hoba hoeibü tetlabü kü la lenlaje Chobaeibü nei neikulabü, hoba haoeibü ngüma honeibü yangmen yakkulabü hoba sanglea semboubü songdakbou yinglabü.”
Kheijinei Chobaeibü hapbüngebü pendou loukei, lausikei haoenei dobü kho aween ayingsi Choba la haoenei tetlabü kho alenen.
Kheijinei Belshazzar Choba aeibou maangmaukei hoba phaklaktham apbei hoba haoeibü yaangenbü shuong phenyembei.
Choba hoba haoeibü yaangenbü shuong lemensije Choba sao lemlibü chem khüto loukei hoba Choba saoei laukei, “O Choba, ponpen lang kishi, no maang temau, ayingsi no phaklaktham teyei.

Kaibü sanglea saopobü Mühghaü soushou kia, hoba kaibü bou haanga hao to ngesakbü hoba ditenbü hoba songsido hapan kikei; hibü kaibü bou Nebukhadnezzar Chobaei sei lenbü, seibü yaübü Khaldibü hoba khanshoulitshou tetenbü thüka hao thükkabou yeitikei.

Aieilausi Daniel, aola Belteshazar nyenkukei hao to soushou phang- che hoba hapbüngebü hoba ditenbü mangh tetenla, huphang ngüh tetenla hoba toknokbü apbula hau hao to kikei. Tou Daniel ngala hautiashi hoba haoei ka la tetlabü kho lenlabü.”
Kheijinei Daniel Choba jungto leian loukei. Chobaei Daniel to laukei, “Kübouei Jihuda ka leian loubü Jihudabü langsenbou che kho no sai?
Ka to saopobü Mühghaü soushou kia, hoba ngesakbü hoba ditenbü hoba libünyenbü songsido ka to kia dogo kashanga ngei dida.
Hobaje tou hapbüngebü mütshuong hoba seibüyaübüei ho dobü haoenei wela hoba tetlabü kü la lenla shanga kü jungto leian loua; lausikei haoenei ho shanga tetlabü kü la alenen.

Nyi tetlabü kulabü hoba phenyembü apbula thükkei dogo ngei dida; tou nyi dobü kho wela hoba hoeibü tetlabü kü la lenla thükalonga Chobaeibü nei ka la neikulabü hoba honeibü yangmen kaibü ngüma yakkulabü hoba sanglea songdakbou semboubü yinglabü.”
Kheijinei Danielei Choba to jongaiko laukei, “Kaibü jongsak shuong kho kaibü yingshi hoba kaibü mu kho lubü la kushi; khei yingsikei dobü kho ngei Choba la wekukho hoba hao la tetlabü lenkho.
“O Choba, Thükenbou Mühghaüei kabou Nebukhadnezzar la sangle hoba yaangenbü, hoba soneikangbü hoba soumo kua.

Hobaje haoei hao khei yaangentibüei mütli shuong, phangshuong, hoba ngühyem pendou hao thedanga lühkei hoba hatkei; haoei haitimang sühbü haitikei, haoei phomang sühbü lang phokei, haoei tonenmang sühbü tonenkei, haoei yantimang sühbü yantikei.
Lausikei ladang haoeibü maangpon yonglamlilikei, hoba haoeibü songsido kaangkhühtham apan hao maang lekei, kheijinei Choba setshang ka hao pekan apbei hoba haoeibü soneikangbü hao ka sungngaikei.

Hobaje hao müt yoka shian sattikei hoba haoeibü maangpon meisiau phatko yeitikei hoba Thükkabou Mühghaüei khunakshousi sangle thüka songdakda hoba haoei ao ong maangangda haoen kho thüka phokuda dogo haoei ange shongko masu tegü hao la sang shautikei hoba haoeibü manga nindei laktikei.
“Hobaje no haoeibü shou, O Belshazzar, ho pendou nyi ngeasikei nyi kaibü maangpon eaaoa ayei.
Lausikei khuthükbü
Kheijinei hao jungka ik kho yantikei hoba dobü kho dokei.
“Hobaje doan kibü kho ho: MENE, MENE, TEKEL PARSIN.
Kho tetlabü kho ho; Mene, tetlabü, Mühghaüei kaibü sangle pakan chüha hoba kho thontia.
Tekel, tetlabü, no sereta hauan chüha hoba seret along.
Parsin, tetlabü, kaibü sangle jannyina hoba Medes si Persiabü la kua.”
Kheijinei Belshazzarei ngühkhüm kukei hoba Daniel la Chobaeibü nei neikukei hoba haoeibü ngüma honeibü yangmen yakkukei, hoba sanglea hao songdakbü semboubü yinglabü dogo phinthonkei.
Khüyou Khaldibü Chobaei Belshazzar haitian apbei.
Hobaje Mediabü Dariasei sangle kho sungletkei, ao salangbü po saosemto nyi thüng kikei.
Sangle pendou thüka songdakla songdakbü saongaoto saoche phola Dariasei maangangkei.
Hobaje haoen thüka songdakbou müt sem yoa Daniel kei che kikei, khei Choba khonakutila hoba haola ngühsidei ngetila shanga khübü kongnyu shuongeibü on kikei.
Hobaje khübü governor müt sem hoba kongnyubou toje Daniel aei shanenan yeikei; aieilausi hao to mü to aeibü soushou phangche kikei, hoba sangle pendou thüka hao phokula Chobaei huongkei.

Kheijinei chühbou shuong hoba governor shuongei Daniel khulimbo sanglea haoeibü shedbü lapla younak lambei; lausikei haoenei younak ayingsi shedbü aikei alapen, aieilausi haoei maanglanko khangenkei hoba hao to mashikbü ayingsi shedbü aikei ühüp.
Hibü khübü mütshuongei laukei, “Hao Mühghaüeibü songle ngüh aedanga ayingdangaje senei ho Daniel khulimbo ai younak ühüplabü.”
Kheijinei khübü setshangbou shuong hoba konglebü shuong Choba jungto liko ngühkung yenan loukei hoba hao to laukei, “Darias Choba ponpen lang kishi!

Sangle setshangbou shuong, ponpen konglebü khuleibou shuong songsido kubü hoba governor shuong liko kamshaian Chobaei ngühkhüm deikhüm kümla hoba ngühkhüm kaangbü che kümtila ngüh thangyenkei, khei aoyouei, O Choba, ka to limbo mühghaü ayingsi müt at to chalou khujin sühko welaulaje haoje molosaonyu püngkhüna lapan jinkulabü.
Tou, O Choba, Mede si Persiabü ajakshaibü ngühkhüm tegütham kho ajakshaila shanga ngühkhüm kaangbü kümashi hoba dobüa shensinge kümshima.”
Kho tegü Darias Chobaei dobü hoba ngühkhüma shensinge kümbei.

Hobaje ladang Danielei dobüa nyen shangjina dogo ngekei, hao haoeibü chem to atkei. Hobaje thükkabou shemjanga haoeibü koulom shuong kho Jerusalem ae yeian ipan kikei; hoba haoei nyishou kümbü tegü chalou angboua youkükei thungan semnei bang welaukei, hoba haoei haoeibü Mühghaü nyen sangkei.
Kheijinei khübü mütshuong liko linjung loukei, hoba Danielei haoeibü Mühghaü thedanga welaubü hoba subüjabü haoenei hapbei.

Kheijinei haoen Choba jungto loukei hoba Chobaeibü ngühkhüm kho shanga Choba to laukei, “Ka to limbo, O Choba, aoei chalou khujin kanglanga mühghaü to ayingsi müt at to welaulaje hao molosaonyu püngkhün to lapan jinkulabü dogo ngühkhüma nyi ado lo?”
Chobaei jongaiko laukei, “Mede si Persiabü ajakshaibü ngühkhüm tegü kho loakei.”
Kheijinei haoenei Choba to laukei, “Daniel, ao Jihuda ka Jihudabü langsenbü che ki, O Choba, haoei no khulimbo ayingsi kaibü ngühkhüm aweasüngko, chalou chenei semnei welauda.”
Kheijinei Chobaei khübü ngüh ditjinei aeibou aolinko apbei hoba Daniel khümenla haoeibü maangpona huongkei hoba chanyu alongshongko hao khümenla aeibou haujembei.
Kheijinei khübü mütshuong Choba jungto nujung loukei hoba Choba to laukei, “O Choba, ngühkhüm ayingsi ngühkhüm deikhüm, Chobaei kümbü aikei ajeileila Mede si Persiabü ngühkhüh ki.”
Kheijinei Chobaei sakkukei hoba haoenei Daniel leian loukei hoba molosaonyu püngkhün to lapan jinkukei. Chobaei Daniel to laukei, “Kaibü Mühghaü, ao nyi athakko khangenda haoei no khümenlabü.”

Hobaje laang che sungbakei hoba molosaonyu kishang koukhüna küptian phokukei hoba kho Chobaei haoeibü nyen shangjinbü hoba haoeibü yaangenbü shuong nyen dobüei khei Daniel shanga ai jeileila akilabü lele shangan phokukei.
Kheijinei Choba haoeibü chem to ngaikei hoba khüyou kho hao ashauayungko dantikei ayingsi hao jungto ai asungbati, hoba hao angak.
Kheijinei Choba ngeyang enyu pikei, hoba panteiko molosaonyu püngkhün to Daniel kishang to haukei.

Hobaje hao molosaonyu püngkhün to Daniel kishang to loukei, hoba haoei maangto shatbü ngühei ngekko Daniel to laukei, “O langkibü Mühghaü khangenbou Daniel, kaibü Mühghaü, ao nyi athakko khangenda haoei molosaonyu shuong ka no khümenla thükakaoba lo?”
Kheijinei Danielei Choba to laukei, “O Choba, Ponpen lang kishi.

Ngeibü Mühghaüei haoeibü khuthük hangangbü hautikei hoba molosaonyu shuongeibü sembung khinkukei, hoba haoenei kü la ai akümbu; aieilausi hao thedanga kü to shedbü ühüp, hoba ka thedangakei ngei ai aküm.”
Kheijinei Choba aeibou olinkei hoba haoenei Daniel molosaonyu püngkhün ka sungenla sengkukei. Hibü Daniel püngkhün ka sungenkei hoba hao to mo ühüp, aieilausi haoei haoeibü Mühghaü to mailembei.

Hobaje Chobaei ngühkhüm kukei hoba Daniel la shed kubü shuong kho leian loukei, hoba haoei haoen molosaonyu püngkhün to lapan jinkukei. Haoen, haoeneibü shousi shuong hoba haoeneibü yaksishuong hoba haoen, püngkhün shinga ashattouatham molosaonyuei haoen japan sungkei hoba haoeneibü lo netla yeikei.
Kheijinei kaodaka kibü pendou, mütli, phang hoba ngühyem pendou jungto Darias Chobaei dokei:
“Kan to hakso kishi, salem!
Ngeibü sangle songdak pendoua Danieleibü Mühghaü thedanga lühashi, hoba hatashi dogo ngei ngühkhüm che kümda. Aishanga
Hao langkibü Mühghaü ki,
hoba haoeibü songdak ponpen ki.
Haoeibü sangle ladangkei amaulabü
hoba haoeibü songdak ladangkei thonsithak akilabü.
Haoei püetda hoba khümenda;
khuthüka hoba kaodaka haoei seikümseilei
hoba maangpanglabü kümda.
Haoei molosaonyueibü seisihau ka Daniel khümenkei.”
Hibü ho Daniel, Darias Choba haanga hoba Persiabü Sairas Choba haanga sangmai haksoa kikei.
Babilonbü Choba Belshazzar shaangboubü poa Danielei haoeibü yepshanga mangh che likei hoba mangsang hapbei; kheijinei haoei mangh kho dokei hoba kho shanga ngühnyek kongnyu lenkei.
Danielei laukei:
Nangnak ngeibü mangsanga ngei mühkabü yei pem leiei yungnyu yaangbü thüka souko hapbei.
Kheijinei yungnyu ka meisiau den lulu pem lei longkei.

Hobaje shaangboubü kho molosaonyu phatko kikei, hoba aulueibü kaak yeman kikei. Hobaje haoei chühko kitoua kaakshuong kho khean apbei, hoba kho kaodak ka tonenkei hoba müt tegü you penyiei lotikei, hoba khola müteibü maangponlang kukei.
Hobaje chühashi, nyiboubü meisiau kho sap che tegü ji pheinei hao tonenan kikei, hoba haoeibü sembunga hauh kaanglanga hiplo sem kikei, hoba hao to laukei, “Piashi, phe juong suiashi.”
Kho phaia ngei chühkei, hoba chühashi, lubü che, kongkhü che taka aueibü kaak lei yeman kikei, toukei meisiau kho la khu pem lei yeman kikei, hoba hao la songdaklabü hau kukei.

Kho phaia nangnak mangsanga ngei chühkei, hoba chühashi, leiboubü meisiau hatlamoklabü che hoba yongko sekokbü hoba kho la nameibü hauh yaangbünyu kikei, khoei suikei hoba netla yeiko jitnyinkukei hoba joubü kho youei nakeikei. Hobaje thedangtobü meisiau pendou dokei ho phang che kikei, hoba kho la laang an yeman kikei.

Ngei laang shuong khüto chühko kisi, chühashi, khübü yoa laang lubü hanbü che longkei, laobou thedanga shaangbou laang pensem kho li yoan lühan apbei hoba chühashi, kho laanga müteibü nyeklang tegü hoba ngüh atshaibü laubü sembung kikei.

Ngei chühko kijinei Choba setshang shuong kho phokei, hoba jaishou che setkei haoeibü neisimei ninthu tegü thupaibü hoba haoeibü khua khulou wi hinseibü tegü thupaibü kikei, haoeibü Choba setshang wanlong tegü hoba khoeibü kailong you wanlong longbü wan tegü kikei.
Hobaje waneibü shumang che koukei hoba hao thedanga koukei, hajar hajarei hao khangenkei hoba hajar anei hao thedanga lokei, matjemla lamlekei; hoba le shuong ipbei.
Laang khoei ngüh atshaibü lausije ngei chühko kikei, hoba ngei chühko kitoua meisiau kho haitikei hoba mautikei, hoba hao kho wanei juokla aku shongko ngei chühkei.
Joubü meisiau shuong khoeije haoeneibü songdak jungan satkei, lausikei haoen jih tuisho shanga lang phokukei.
Kheijinei nangnak mangsanga ngei chühkei, hoba chühashi, müha sangmeia müteibü shou che phatko loukei hoba haoei shangiedbü chalou jungto loukei hoba hao jungto hao leian louan phokukei.

Hobaje mütli shuong, phang shuong, hoba ngühyem shuong pendouei hao khangenla hao la songdakla hoba soneikangbü hoba Choba sangle kukei, haoeibü songdak kho pon- pen thon aki, ladangkei adanlabü hoba haoeibü sangle kho maula athük.
Ngo Daniel je, kü to soushou khonsakko kikei, hoba ngeibü khua mangsangei ngo mokde apyotikei.
Nyangko loan kibü che jungto ngo nyangko haukei, hoba kho pendou shangabü phekei. Hibü haoei kü to lenkei, hoba khübü tetlabü kü la ngetikei.
“Khübü meisiau yaangbü pemlei kho kaodaka longlabü Choba lei ki.
Lausikei Thükkaboueibü saopobü shuongei sangle kho sungletlabü, hoba ponpen shanga sangle kho lelabü, khei ponpen thon akiko.”

Kheijinei meisiau leiboubü laobou haoen pendou tokei phangche kikei, yongko hatlamoklabü, aoeibü hauh namkung hoba iksen chisaknam kikei, laobouei suian netla yeiko leilutikukei hoba haoeibü youei nakeikei kho shanga tükdebü kho ngemang sühko ngei phekei.

Hobaje haoeibü khua laang an kibü shanga hoba lubü laang che louan laobou thedanga sem kho kakan apbei, nyek yembü laang, hoba ngüh atshaibü laubü sembung laobou chühla lubü toje yaangbou kikei, kho shanga phekei.
Hobaje ngei chühko kijinei kho laangei saopobü shuong to wapyokei hoba haoen kho thükkei.
Lausikei shangiedbü mütshuong louan Thükkaboueibü Saopobü shuong shanga matjembei hoba saopobü shuongei sangle lela jih sühkei.

Haoei hai laukei, “Meisiau leiboubü kho kaodaka Choba sangle leiboubü kilabü; ho sangle pendou toje phangche kilabü hoba khoei kaodak pemtou suilabü hoba kho nakan yantilabü, hoba kho netla yeiko leilutilabü.
Laang an shangabü kho hai, kho sangle ka Choba an longlabü, hoba haoen phainei lubü che longlabü hoba shaangbü toje hao phangche yinglabü hoba haoei Choba sem yantilabü.

Hobaje Thükkabou khulimbo haoei ngüh laulabü hoba Thükkaboueibü sao- pobü shuong haoei khonkutilabü hoba haoei jih hoba ngühkhüm jeileila huon taklabü hoba haoen jih che, jih penyi hoba jih thoche shanga kulabü.
Lausikei matjembü kilabü hoba haoeibü songdak sunglanglabü, mautikulabü hoba thon sühko leilutikulabü.

Hobaje Choba sangle, songdak, hoba mühnyu phanga kaodak khümbo sangle shuong, yaangenbü kho Thükkaboueibü Saopobü shuong la kulabü, haoeneibü sangle kho ponpen thon akibü sangle hoba songdakbü pendouei hao to khangenlabü hoba ngüha lelabü.”
Ho thonbü. Ngo Danielje, aeibou senyüh pipikei, hoba ngeibü son jeikei; lausikei ajanjan pendou kho ngeibü maanga phokei.
Belshazzar Chobaei songdakbü po semboua ngo Daniel jungto shaangla tegü mangsang che longkei.
Mangsanga ngei hapbei hoba kho hapjinei ngo Elam provins Suza sangnyua kikei, hoba ngeibü mangsanga Ulai shumang nyangko kikei.
Kheijinei chühentikei, hoba chühashi, yungkoa sanlon paang che laang penyi yeman loan kikei, hoba laang penyi ham kho loubang lausikei che loushangbou kikei, hoba thonla loubou kho longkei.

Sanlon paang khoei, yungkük hoba yungthang aeto thenbü ngei hapbei; hoba meisiau che ongkei aloenen ayingsi aoeikei haoeibü ik ka khümenla athüken, lausikei lulu maang lekei, hoba hao lolo yaangenkei.
Hobaje ngei damanchühko kitoua, chühashi, chanep ka lon paang che kaodak pendou thükto kaoa ameiyouko ong loukei, hoba lon khola haoeibü nyek kanglanga shetennyu laang che kikei.
Hobaje laang penyi angbü sanlon paang laobou ngei shumang thedanga loan hapbei hao jungto khauang longan haujembo haoei shijung loukei.

Hobaje sanlon paang nyangko loubü ngei hapbei hoba hao khulimbo lekeiko hao khauangko hoba sanlon paang khüto kakkei hoba haoeibü laang penyi kho leilutikukei hoba hao thedanga sanlon paang kho lola hau akisije haoei hao kaoa tuongtikei hoba hao to nakeikei hoba haoeibü ik ka sanlon paang kho khümenla aokei akitei.
Hobaje lon paang kho hao lolo aeibou yaangenan apbei, hoba hao hau kian apjinei laang yaangbü kho leiluan apbei hoba kho jeiko mühkabü yei lei aeto shangshenko laang lei longkei.
Hobaje haoen che ka laang hanbü che longkei, laobou yungthang, chaangbou hoba soneikangbü kaodak ae aeibou yaangan apbei.
Kho aeibou, khei müha jakko yaangenkei; hoba lakjaibü khanshoulitshou tan ka at kaodak to thenan attikei, hoba khübü thüka nakeikei.
Khei haoei jembü lolo khanshoulitshou tan Choba tokei leiyoko yaangenkei hoba haoei athakko juokbü lembü hao ka sunglangkei, hoba haoeibü lemshang pankukei.
Hobaje ngühkhüm leilubü danko khanshoulitshou tan athakko juokbü lembü yoan hao la kuan kikei, hoba haoei ngühmai kaoa attikei, hoba haoei maangangbü kümbo naangmaikei.

Kheijinei khuthük hangangbü cheei lubü khuthük hangangbü che to lauko ngei ditkei, “Athakko juokbü hoba sangliphang la yeitibü hoba khübü lemshang hoba tan ham youei nakeitilabü shanga mangsang lalokche kila?”
Hobaje haoei hao to laukei, “Chasem hoba ngeyang hajar nyito saongao sem sühko shanga; kho phaia lemshang kho saüenlabü.”
Hobaje ladang ngo Danielei, mangsang kho hapbei, ngei kho ditenla lambei, hoba chühashi, kü junga müt che phatko lokei.
Hobaje Ulai yungko kanglanga ngei müteibü ngüh cheei ngako ditkei, “O Gabriel, ho müt la mangsang ditentiashi.”

Hibü ngo loshang nyangko hao loukei, hoba hao loujinei ngo hatko mokkei hoba ngo the khüman khüpetkei. Lausikei haoei kü to laukei, “Ditenashi, O müteibü shou, aishanga mangsang kho thonbü chalou shangabü ki.”
Haoei kü to joyoko kijinei ngeibü the kao ae yeian nyeket shian apbei, lausikei haoei kü to meitikei hoba lotikei.
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Chühashi, khau- angbü thonlama ai kila ngei ka la ngetilabü, aishanga kho thonbü takletbü chalou shangabü ki.
“Sanlon paang laang penyi yeman kibü nyi hapbü kho Media hoba Persiabü Choba ki.
Hobaje lonpaang kho Grikbü Choba ki, hoba haoeibü nyek kanglanga kibü laang yaangbü kho püngbü khangbü Choba.
Hobaje laobou laang leiluan apbei hoba kho jeiko lei longkei, kho sangle pem lei, phangshuong ka longlabü, lausikei haoeibü hau tegü ayinglabü.
“Hobaje haoeneibü sangle thonlam to ladang ngühkhüm lulimbü shuongei shenan aplaje hatla moklabü Choba che aoei maangka pakbü si huphang ngüh jukyosayobü longlabü.

Hobaje haoeibü sei yaang kilabü, lausikei jembü hauei aying hoba haoei hatlamoklabü che leilutikulabü hoba naangmailabü; hoba haoei maangangbü kümlabü hoba hau yaangbü shuong hoba saopobü mütshuong haoei leilutikulabü.

Hobaje haoeibü huoneiyouei haoeibü ika khüpbülangbü haala- yaanglabü hoba haoeibü maanga hao kho yaangenlabü hoba haoen maang asangko kijinei haoei juong leilukulabü; haoei tokei Choba shuong thüka Choba khulimbo tokei lolabü lausikei müteibü ik ayoko hao leilulabü.
Hobaje nangnak si ngeyang shanga mangsang lenbü kho tükde ki; lausikei nyi mangsang kho khinan phoashi, aishanga ho loulabü shangabü ki.”
Hobaje ngo, Daniel, hüanshembei hoba chalou shisho shatko kikei, kheijinei ngo pikei hoba Chobaeibü kümsilei kümbei; lausikei mangsang khoei ngo phenyembei hoba aoeikei kho aditen.
Medebü phang Ahasairaseibü shou Dairas shaangboubü poa ao Khaldibü sangle thüka Choba pentian kikei,
haoeibü songdak shaangboua ngo Daniel, Jeremia thuseibou to
Hibü ngei welaubü hoba subüjabüei mühei nyengko hoba senounei neian, hoba tap naangko ngo
Hobaje
“Künei shed shona hoba mashika, hoba maangkombo küma hoba lenbü adit, khei kaibü ngühkhüm ka hoba kaibü songle ngühkhüm ka sepeian apa.
Hobaje no khangenbü thuseibü shuong aoyouei kaibü nyena küneibü Choba shuong songdakbü shuong hoba pisibousi shuong to hoba kaonyek kabü müt pendou to joyokei, haoen to künei ngüha ale.
O
O
küneibü Mühghaüeibü üeisanou hoba ap apbubü kia, aieilausi künei hao khulimbo meimeikei.
küneibü Mühghaüei kün thedanga hao khangenbü shuong hoba thuseibü shuong danko haoeibü ngühkhüma paila ngabü ngüha ale.

Haü, Israelbü pendouei ngühkhüm leilua hoba kaibü ngüh aditko sepeian apa, hibü shedsikhau hoba theletbü laobou Mühghaü khangenbü Mosa ngühkhüma doan phokukei kho shedsikhau kün la khüpan jinkua, aishanga künei no khulimbo shabü shona.
Kün khulimbo hoba kün thüka aoyouei songdaka haoen khulimbo haoei laubü kün to thushed yaang loutibüei haoei song lena aishanga mühnyu phanga Jerusalem to kümbü tegü aküm.
Mosaeibü ngühkhüma doan kibü tegü kho thushed pendou kün to süha, khei yingasikei küneibü shedbü ka sepeinyu hoba kaibü ngühmaia maangsangko künei
Hibü
“O
O
Hibü tou, O küneibü Mühghaü, no khangenboueibü welau hoba subüjabü ditashi, hoba kaibü nyen shanga ongkei, O

O ngeibü Mühghaü, kaibü nou haangkushi hoba ditashima, kaibü nyek ipashi, hoba kün sangliphanga kibü hoba kaibü nyena ngabü sangnyu to chühshima, aishanga kün saopobü shanga ka thedanga sudajada aying, lausikei kaibü onou yaangbü kibü shanga sudajada.
O
Ladang ngo joyoko kikei, hoba ngeibü shabü hoba kü mütli Israeleibü shabü thekuko welauko kikei,
Ngei tokei welauko joyoko kijinei Gabriel, ao shaangla mangsanga ngei hapbei, hao chasem lembü jihsiphaia panteiko kü jungto seengjung loukei.
Hobaje haoei kü la ditentila loukei, hoba kü to joyoko laukei, “O Daniel, ka la hapbüngebü hoba ditenbü kula tou ngo louakei.
Kaibü subüjabü khanglamto sakkubü che loukei, hoba ngei ka la lenla loukei, aieilausi no aeibou sanoubou ki; hibü ngüh kho damanchühshi, hoba maangsangko ditenashi.

“Ngühkhüm lulimbü nangla, shabü khüai shonla, shed shonbü angla, ponpen thon akibü saopobü leiyetla, mangsang si thusei ngüh khinan phola hoba saopobü kishang onang naangko pienla kaibü mütli shuong shanga hoba kaneibü saopobü sangnyu shanga bale anjinlei wean phokuakei.

Hibü ngeashi hoba ditenashi, Jerusalem kümetlabü hoba nyibou kümetla sakkubü ngüh haubü ka naangenko pienbü Chobaeibü shou loubü sühko bale nyet kilabü, kho phaia bale saosemto nyi khongnyu hoba phaseibü yoan khei khonsak khonku jiha kho kümetkei.

Hobaje mangsang thonbüa bale saosemto nyi phaia naangenko pienbou kho wapan aplabü hoba ai akilabü hoba loula kibü Chobaeibü shoueibü eikshuongei sangnyu hoba lemshang kho leilutilabü hoba haoeibü thonbü kho yungsenei kilabü hoba thon sühko wapyo kilabü; sangliphanga kilabü kho lamlea.

Hobaje juong to bale che shanga haoei kaangkhühtham theyolanyobü kümlabü; hoba bale tho che kho juokbü lembü si lemla kubü nangtilabü, hoba mangsenlabü shuong jeiko leilubü theletan kibü thon asühshongko leilutibou thükto khüpan jinkulabü.”

Persiabü Choba Sairas po semboubüa Daniel, aoeibü nyen Belteshazar kikei, hao jungto haoeibü ngüh tang khitkei, huphangngüh kho tükde kikei hoba kho wapyo yaangbü che shangabü kikei, hoba haoei ngüh kho ditenkei hoba mangsang kho tetenkei.
Khübü chaloua ngo, Daniel, bale sem sünga manghaapbo kikei.
Ngei shausiyung maibü aikei ashau, ayingsi ngeibü sembunga ih thenan achüh, ayingsi bale sem aon shongko ngei khua ai onang anaang.
Kho phaia shaangbou lit chalou saoto leiboubüa ngo shumang yaangbü Tigris yungkoa loan kikei.
Ngeibü nyekei chüh- an angtikei, hoba chühkei, hoba chühashi, müt che phemba nei neian kikei, hoba haoeibü shenshang ofir hon maibüei shembe kaian kikei.

Haoeibü mang beril namsek laang tegü lailaibü, haoeibü thenyek langpon tegü hoba haoeibü nyek hantin ninbü tegü hoba haoeibü you si ik samsilengkobü chisaknam tegü lailaitham hoba haoeibü ngühang shuong yaangbüeibü ngühang hima kikei.
Hobaje ngo, Danielei ong mangsang kho hapbei, aieilausi kü yoa kibü mütshuongei mangsang kho ühüp, lausikei haoen aeibou lühkei hoba haoen kho hula satkei.
Hibü ngo ong apyokei, hoba kho mangsang yaangbü hapbei, hoba ngo hau akiko apbei hoba ngo thenyek saklangtham apbü maian apbei hoba hau akiko apbei.
Kheijinei ngei haoeibü ngüh ditkei hoba haoeibü ngüh ditjinei ngeibü thenyek kaoae khüpetkei hoba ngo haileleko ngakkei.
Hobaje chühashi, ik cheei kü to meitikei hoba ngeibü youkük si ik lühkei.

Hobaje haoei kü to laukei, “O aeibou maangshikbü Daniel, ngei ka to lenbü ngüh shuong ditashi, hoba tangshaitham loashi, aishanga tou ngo ka jungto hautiakei.” Hobaje haoei habü ngüh laujinei ngo lühjilühko lokei.

Kheijinei haoei kü to laukei, “Tehüt, Daniel, aishanga shaanglathama Mühghaü thedanga ditenla shanga nyi kaibü maang- pona maangdakbü hoba sembüambü jihsiphai ka kaibü welau dida hoba nyi joyobü ka ngo louakei.
Chalou saoto che sühko Persia sangle Chobaei ngo thangetkei, lausikei thükkabou hangangbü yoa che, Maikhel kü to thuila loukei hibü khünei hao Persia sangle Choba yoa apyoan ngo loukei.
Phaia kaibü mütli shuong to ai haüthükla kho ka la ditentila ngo loukei, aishanga mangsang kho loulabü jihsiphai shanga ki.”
Hobaje ladang haoei kü la habü ngüh lenkei, ngei ngeibü thenyek kaoae khüpjung atkei hoba ngo ngoubü la yeikei.
Hobaje chühashi, müteibü shou phatbü cheei ngeibü sembung khopa meitikei kheijinei ngei ngeibü sembung ipbei hoba laukei, hoba kü thedanga loan kibü to ngei laukei, “Ngeibü
Hibü ho ngeibü bunyu khangenbouei ngeibü bunyu to lai joyoenkei? Aieilausi kü to hau hansho ongkei aki, ayingsi kü la hak ajoukei.”
Tokei müteibü hesihaang phatan müt cheei louan kü to meitikei hoba haoei ngo hau kitikei.

Hobaje laukei, “O aeibou maangshikbü müt, tehüt, ka yoa hakso kishi hau kiashi, hoba maangkaangashi.” Hobaje haoei joyoan phaia ngo hau kingaikei, hoba ngei laukei, “Ngeibü bunyubouei lautiashi, aishanga nyi ngo hau kitia.”
Kheijinei haoei laukei, “Ngo aila loukei nyi ngekeilao? Lausikei tou ngo Persia Choba to wapyola ngailabü, hoba ladang ngo ngailaje, chühashi, Grikbü Choba loulabü.
Lausikei ngühmai lea ai doan ki ngei ka la lenlabü khübü khulimbo kü to thuiyola kaibü Choba Maikhel to limbo lubü ao aki.”
Hobaje tokei ngoje, Medebü Dairas shaangboubü poa hao senetla hoba hau kitila ngo lokei.
Hobaje tou ngei ka la ngühmai kho lenlabü.
Chühashi, Persiaa toukei Choba sem longlabü hoba leiboubü kho haoen pendou to keibou yinglabü hoba ladang hao nyaksinam danko hau kiko yeilaje haoei Grikbü Choba sangle khulimbo pendou tenseplabü.
“Hobaje Choba yaangbü che longlabü hoba songdak hao maangleko kilabü.

Hobaje ladang hao longlaje haoeibü sangle leilulabü hoba müh kabü yei pem lei la janan aplabü, lausikei kho haoeibü shousina jungto ohaulabü, ayingsi haoei songdakko kibü hau kho toukei akilabü, aishanga haoeibü sangle kho ngailanglabü, hoba khübü la aying lubü la kuan aplabü.
“Kheijinei yungthang kabü Choba hau kian kilabü, lausikei kongnyu yoa che hao tokei hau kibou yinglabü hoba hao toje haoeibü songdak yaangbou yinglabü.

Po shisho kian phaia haoen injung che la yeiko kamshailabü hoba yungthang kabü Chobaeibü nouyangshou yungkük Choba jungto sangmai kümla loulabü, lausikei saoeibü phem hau akiko kilabü ayingsi hao hoba hao ka bakbü hau lounyu akilabü, lausikei saoeibü himshuong hoba saoeibü jayangshou hoba saoeibü lao khümbo kulabü.
Lausikei saoeibü li ka shaangbou che haoeibü lin ka longlabü, haoeibü sepai tan khulimbo loulabü hoba yungkük lapheishon to atlabü hoba haoen to wapyoan thüklabü.

Tokei haoeneibü mühghaü shuong, haoen namdei leman kümbü heangsho shuong hoba haoeneibü chandinam si honeibü thung si phau shuong Ijep kaodak to haoen yoa haoei langsenlabü hoba po shishoje haoei yungkük Choba to awapyolabü.
Kho phaia hao chaang naphei sangle to loulabü hoba hao haoeibü kaodak to longeilabü.
“Hobaje haoeibü shousi shuongei wapyolabü hoba sepai tan yaangbü kamshaitilabü, hoba yungsen tegü danlabü hoba haoei sepeian khei lapheishon sühko wapyolabü.

Hobaje yungthang kabü Chobaei hatlamoklabü che khauangko meimeijung haulabü hoba yungkük kabü Choba to wapyolabü hoba haoei sepai tan yaangbü lamlelabü, lausikei mütshuong yaangbü kho haoeibü ik to kuan aplabü.
Hobaje ladang shuong kho thüklaje haoeibü maangpon yaangan aplabü hoba haoei hajar hajar yaangentilabü, lausikei haoei thük ühüplabü.
“Hobaje yungkük kabü Chobaei nyiboukei shaangbü toje sepai tan yaangbou leishailabü hoba po shisho kian peisilei juong yoto sepai tan yaangbü kho khulimbo meimeilabü.
Khübü chaloua yungthang kabü Choba khulimbo juong meimeilabü, hoba mangsang kho haüthükla shanga kan jembü mütli yoa kaangbüsekbü mütshuong longyolabü, lausikei haoen tuonglabü.

Kheijinei yungkük aekabü Choba loulabü hoba kao shongh yaülabü hoba maisho thangetan kibü sangnyu che lelabü. Hobaje yungthang aekabü sepai tanei hao khulimbo aloenlabü, haoen pienbü sepai taneikei lola hau akilabü.
Lausikei sangshibouei hao khulimbo ao akiko hao maangleko kümlabü hoba soneikangbü kaodaka lolabü hoba pendou kho haoeibü ika kilabü.

“Kheijinei haoeibü sangle hau pendouei yungkük kabü Choba khulimbo haoeibü thenyek yeilabü, lausikei hao to sangmai kümlabü hoba hao la yaksa shuongeibü nouyangshou haoeibü sangle leilutila kulabü, lausikei kho athük haplabü ayingsi hao shanga ku ayinglabü.
Kho phaia haoei yungko kaodak aeto haoeibü thenyek sepeilabü hoba juong lelabü lausikei konglebou cheei hao lilisese kho thaktilabü haü, hao yonglam lilibü kho hao jungto ngailabü.
Kheijinei haoeibü kaodak kabü lapheishon ae hao thenyek yeilabü, lausikei hao youa kühan tuonglabü hoba touje ühüplabü.
“Hao jeila che longlabü; hao aoei khüm hebü che sangle soneikangbü danko hautilabü, lausikei chalou shisho kanglanga hao netla yeiko leilulabü, khauangbüa ayingsi lasona aying.”
Hobaje khuthük hangangbüei shaknyinko lenla khangkei: “Hao jeila müt amaibü che longlabü, ao la sangle nyenhang aku, lausikei asang adoko kijinei hao loulabü hoba ngüh teibüei sangle haplabü.
Hao thedang ka sepai tan lemailela kotlanglabü hoba leilulabü, hoba thebülanbü Chobaeibü shou yoan leilutikulabü.
Hobaje hao to injung che yeisilengko ka haoei khüpeilangeiko kümlabü aishanga hao müt shisho danko hau kiko yeilabü.

Asangadoko kijinei provinsa keiboutham thükto hao loulabü hoba haoeibü bousi shuongei ayingsi pisi shuongei akümbü haoei kümlabü; haoen yoa haoei soletbü peisilei hoba peisilei maibü phinnyinlabü hoba lapheishon khulimbo huon amaibü taklabü lausikei jih tuisho shanga ong.
“Hobaje yungthang kabü Choba khulimbo sepai tan yaangbüei wapyolabü, lausikei hao athüklabü, aishanga hao khulimbo huon amaibü taklabü.
Haü, aoyouei hao yoa shausiyung maibü shauda haoenei hao yantilabü hoba haoeibü sepai tan koklanglabü hoba juong wapettilabü.
Hobaje khübü Choba ham maangpon kombü kilabü hoba khümsok chenei setan lepbülangbü ngüh lauyolabü, lausikei kho ai ayinglabü, aishanga thonbü kho jih sühbüa kilabü.
Kheijinei hao haoeibü kaodak to nyaksinam juong yoa ngailabü, lausikei haoeibü maangpon saopobü theyolanyobü khulimbo kilabü hoba hao maangleko ik shatlabü hoba haoeibü kaodak to ngailabü.
“Jih sühbüa hao longeilabü hoba yungthang aeto loulabü; lausikei touje shaangbü tegü ayinglabü.
Aishanga Kitimbü long shuong hao khulimbo loulabü, yingsije hao hatkomokko suklabü.
“Hobaje hoba saopobü songle khulimbo khauanglabü hoba hao maang lelabü, hao khei sepeinyu satlabü hoba saopobü thebülanbü apyobü yoto che la yeilabü.
Hobaje hao ka sepai longan haoenei lemshang si lapheishon shatilabü hoba chalou weko juokbü lembü sunglanglabü. Hobaje leilutibü mangsenlabü haoenei pholabü.
Hobaje thebülanbü lulimbo amaibü kümbü shuong haoei ngüh teibüei suletlabü, lausikei aoyouei Mühghaü ngekei haoenei kaangkhühtham hoba maian kümlabü.
Mütshuong yoa aoyou songsido ki haoenei juong lenlabü lausikei in hoba wanlongei haitiko thüngbüa hoba soshau soyungko chalou juong haoen tuonglabü.
Ladang haoen tuonglaje, haoenei thuibü hansho haplabü lausikei juong haoen lolo ngüh teibü lauko haoen yoto loulabü.
Hobaje songsido kibü yo ka atje tuonglabü hoba thonbü chalou sühko haoen thupaitila shanga hoba saüenla hoba hinseitila shanga haoen tuonglabü, aieilausi kho takletbü jih toukei asühkei.

“Hobaje Chobaei haoei maangangbü tegü kümlabü, hoba hao jembü lolo hangenlabü, hoba mühghaü shuong thüka Mühghaü to limbo maangpanglabü laulabü hoba leilubü akou shongko hao haalayaanglabü, aishanga lamlean phobü kho haüthükjan.
Haoei pisiboueibü mühghaü shuong ayingsi yaksa shuongei sanoubü mühghaü shuong aikei aweeilabü, ai mühghaü tokei ühütlabü, aishanga pendou thüka haoei hao lolo yaangenlabü.
Lausikei khübü jeiko lapheishon mühghaü hangenlabü hoba mühghaü ao haoeibü pisibousi shuongei ange, hao to hon, chandinam, namseklaang hoba jongsak maibüei tonenlabü.

Pendou to hau kibou lapheishon shuong kho küksithangeibü mühghaü lembü la haoei lomtilabü, hoba aoyouei kho mühghaü sungletlaje haoen haoei hangenlabü. haoei juong thüka haoen songdakbou yeitiko haoen la jongsak shanga kao janan kulabü.

“Thonbü chaloua yungthang kabü Chobaei hao to jaanglabü, lausikei yungthang kabü Chobaei hao khulimbo mühghaü yei che tegü kailong shuong hoba koli sepai shuong hoba longchem juongnyu yoa loulabü hoba hao kaonyek danko yungsenei tegü kuan apjung danlabü.
Hao tokei soneikangbü kaodak to atlabü hoba hajar hajar tuonglabü, lausikei khübü haoeibü ikei khümenlabü: Edom, Moab, hoba Amonbü shousi shuong yoa kongnyubou.
Tokei haoei kaonyek shuong thüka haoeibü ik shinglabü hoba Ijep kaodak asatenlabü.
Lausikei Ijep kaodak kabü hon, chandinam, hoba namsek peisilei shuong thanshang pendou thüka hao bunyu yinglabü. Hobaje Libiabü hao phainei pailabü.
Lausikei chaang si yungkük kabü ngühlang shuongei hao mokde apyolabü, hoba khau aeibou angko mautilabü hoba lemailela juong shian apla hao haulabü.
Hobaje haoei haoeibü Chobaeibü neichem yungnyu si soneikangbü saopobü shongh kanglanga kümlabü, khei yingasikei hao haoeibü thonbü sühlabü hoba aoeikei hao to athuilabü.”

“Kho chaloua thükkabou hangangbü Maikhel lolabü. Haoei kaibü mütli shousi shuong shanga loda. Hobaje phang che kisilengko ka ladangkei kian achühbü khonku jih che kilabü hoba kho chaloua lea nyen doan kibü mütpem weko kaibü mütli shuong khümenlabü.
Hobaje kaoa yepan kibü juong pilabü, at ponpen langkei to hoba at himou hoba ponpen thon akibü mangsenlabü to langngailabü.
Hobaje aoyou songsido ki haoen mühloma soneikangbü tegü haulabü hoba aoei saopobü to juong se- peitilaje haoen khanshoulitshou tegü ponpen thon akiko kilabü.”
“Lausikei, O Daniel, ngüh shuong kho khinlepnyu phoashi, hoba thonbü chalou asühshongko le kho khanglepnyu khinan phoashi, aishanga müt juongnyu hau longei dogo laangyolabü hoba songsido haalabü.”
Kheijinei ngo Danielei chühkei, hoba chühashi, lubü müt nyi lokei, che hi yungkoa hoba che thi yungkoa.
Hobaje shushou dei thükaenei kibou phembanei neibou to ngei laukei, “Habü maang- panglabü shuong thon sühla lalokche kila?”

Kheijinei müt ao phembanei neian shushou dei thükaenei kikei, haoei haoeibü maeae hoba nanae khuthük ae shingkei hoba ao ponpen lang kida hao nyen phongko thekeilankei. “Kho jih che, jih nyi, hoba jih tho che, kilabü dogo laukei, hoba ladang haoen saopobü mütshuongeibü hau haoei netla yeiko leilukulaje khübü pendou thonlabü.”
Hobaje ngei ditkei, lausikei aditen, kheijinei ngei laukei, “O ngeibü bunyubou, khübü kümsilei loushedbü kho ai yingla?”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Daniel, kaibü lamnyu to hauashi, aieilausi ngüh shuong kho küpa hoba thonbü asühshongko khinlepa.
Juongnyu haoen lolo hinseilabü hoba haoen lolo thupailabü hoba saüenan kilabü; lausikei amaibü shuongei amaiko kümlabü, aoeikei aditenlabü, lausikei aoyou songsido ki haoenei ditenlabü.
“Athakko juokbü lembü sungan apbü jih ka hoba leilutibü mangsenlabü laobou kishanga phobü jih sühko chalou hajar che, saoanto anjinngao kilabü.
Chalou hajar che saongao sem hoba khujinto ngao aoei haisühlaje hoba sühlaje hao haübou!
“Lausikei no kaibü lamnyua thon asüh shongko hauashi, aishanga no haksojan, hoba chalou shuong thonbüa kaibü phejan penbü kaoena lojan.”
Uzzia, Jotham, Ahaz hoba Hezekia Jihudabü Choba shuong hoba Israelbü Choba Jehoasheibü shou Jeroboam haanga Beerieibü shou Hosea jungto loubü
Ladang
Hibü haoei hauan Diblaimeibü nouyangshou Gomer yakla ngakei hoba sao mang akongko yeikei, hoba hao la bousu shou che bukkukei.
Hobaje
Hobaje kho chaloua ho haüthüklabü, khei Jezreel pholia ngei Israeleibü laujin leilutikulabü.”
Hobaje sao nyibou mang akongko apbei hoba yaksa shou che bukkei. Hobaje
Lausikei Jihudabü chemdang thük to üeisanou kilabü, hoba
Tou Lo-Ruhamaei nyueibü sen apan phaia sao mang akongko apbei hoba bousu shou che bukkei.
Hobaje

Khei yingasikei Israel shousi shuong lühbak atakenbü hoba aweenbü molo phetsen tegü kilabü, hoba ho haüthüklabü, “Kan ngeibü mütli aying” dogo laulabü jeiko “Kan langkibü Mühghaü shousi shuong” dogo nyenlabü.
Hobaje Jihuda shousi shuong hoba Israel shousi shuong liko kamshailabü hoba haoenei lei- yeibü che pienlabü hoba kaonyek ka longlabü aieilausi Jezreeleibü chalou yaangbü kilabü.
Kan jaisinasi shuong to “Kü mütli” dogo hoba nousina to, “Onou hapbü shuong” dogo lenshi.
Kü shousi shuong, kaneibü nyu to suajaashi; aishanga sao kü yak aying, ngo saoeibü lao kei aying hoba sao ka pejapela hoba saoeibü sen kanglang ka asangalanbü aptiashi.
Khei ayinglonga ngei sao ka neisimei sungan mütkong aptiko hoba sao buknyet tegü phokulabü hoba sao sangliphang tegü hoba sao kaolin tegü phokulabü hoba deilaei sao haitilabü.
Haü, saoeibü shousi shuong to ngei üeisanou akilabü, aishanga haoen khongshou shuong ki.

Aishanga haoeneibü nyuei asangalanbü jungeikei haoeneibü bukbü nyuei himoulabü lele kümbei, aishanga saoei laukei, “Ngei sanoubü shuong aoyouei kü la nyak, ngeibü dei, ngeibü winei, phembanei, ngeibü onang, hoba yunglabü kuda, haoen phai haulabü.”
Hibü chühashi, ngei saoeibü lamnyu ühüplabü lele ngei sao khulimbo ba lelabü.

Hobaje saoei sao to sanoubü shuong phaito semlabü lausikei saoei haoen alaphetlabü; saoei haoen lamlabü, lausikei haoen ühüplabü; kheijinei saoei laulabü, “Ngo haulabü hoba ngeibü shaangbü lao jungto sepeilabü; aishanga kü shanga tou toje kho ong maibou kikei.”
Aishanga sao la youshou hoba ih, hoba onang ngei kukei, hoba Baal shanga jungeibü chandinam hoba hon ngei haatikei dogo saoei angekei.
Hibü youlat jiha ngei ngeibü youshou sungngaian aplabü, hoba ih jihsiphaia ngeibü semlüh dei senetlabü, hoba ngeibü wi si phemba nei sunglanglabü; khonei saoei jembü mütkong aküplepenlabü.
Hobaje sao to sanoubü shuongei hapbo ngei sao mütkong phokulabü, hoba kü ik ka aoeikei sao akhümenlabü.
Hobaje sao olinbü pendou ngei thaktilabü, saoeibü lem shuong hoba saoeibü litnyu haanbü lem hoba saoeibü nousisou hoba saoeibü lemsilang noubüsoubü pendou,

hoba saoeibü semlühlong hoba bhuklong laobou shanga saoei, “Ngo sanoubü shuongei kü la kubü ngeibü mu habü ki,” dogo laukei, khübü kho ngei leilunyu phokulabü, hoba ngei khübü yam la yeitikulabü, hoba yamkabü meisiauei khübü kho shaulabü.
Hobaje Baal lem chaloua ngei sao shieinangeilabü, ao to saoei jen juokkei; hoba ladang kungkabü chimen hoba namsek yak yakan sao sanoubü shuong jungto haukei, hoba ngo maan apbei dogo
Hibü chühashi, ngei sao suletlabü, hoba sangliphang ka sao leian loulabü, hoba sao to eaaoa joyolabü.
Hobaje khonei saoeibü semlühlaak hoba Akhor pholi kho maanglem koukhün che tegü ngei sao la kungeilabü, hoba sao medei jihdanga tegü hoba sao Ijep ka longbü chaloua tegü saoei jungeilabü.
Hobaje
Aishanga saoeibü sembung ka Baal nyen kho sunglanglabü hoba haoeneibü nyen tou alaueilabü.

Hobaje kho chaloua ngei haoen shanga yamkabü meisiau yoa, müh kabü au yoa hoba kaoa shuongeibü shuong yoa theyolanyobü che kümlabü, hoba kaonyek ka ngei lau hoba in hoba lason leilutikulabü, hoba haoen thushed akiko lekeitilabü.
Israel, ngei no ponpen shanga kanlabü,
haü, saopobüa, ngühmaia, sanou dambü hoba onoua;
kü shanga ngei no kanlabü.
Maanglemenbüa khei ngei no kanlabü
hoba nyi
Hobaje khübü chaloua ngei müt shuong to jongailabü,
hoba haoenei kaodak to jongailabü.
Hobaje kaodakei youshou to hoba ih to
hoba onang to jongailabü
hoba haoenei Jezreel to jongailabü.
Hobaje kü shanga kaodaka ngei sao kean ongan pholabü
hoba üeisanou akibü sao to ngei üeisanou kilabü
hoba aoyou kü mütli aying haoen to ngei laulabü,
“No kü mütli ki” hoba haoenei laulabü,
“No küneibü Mühghaü ki.”
Hobaje
Hibü ngei sao chandinam shekel anthük ngao hoba barli youshou seret saongaoto anjinsemei jekthetkei.
Hobaje ngei sao to laukei, “No kü yoa chalou juong kishi, no asangalanbü ayeilabü hoba no aoeibü yak kei ayinglabü, ka thedanga ngo kei khei kilabü.
Aishanga Israel shousi shuong chalou juong Choba akiko, leyeibü akiko, hoba haitibü lembü akiko, hoba saopobü thaonyu akiko hoba efod ayingsi terafim akiko kilabü.
Phaila Israel shousi shuong longailabü, hoba
O kan Israelbü,
Thamto haubü, yepeibü, wapyobü, kokbüsembü, hoba asangalanbü ong kia; khübü longtang leda hoba sii angyodang leda.
Hibü kaodaka mang haapyoda hoba khonei kibü pendou khei yamkabü meisiau hoba müh kabü au, hoba yungnyu kabü ngau shuong shemda.
Khei yingsikei müt aoeikei tüoyo ayingsi aoeikei shed teku- yo, aishanga kan mütli kho ungshedbou shuong to oyobü shuong tegü kia.
Hobaje changea no phaiyetlabü hoba nangnak ka yoa thuseibou kei phaiyetlabü hoba kanyu Israel ngei mautilabü.
Songsido akibü haangjung kü mütli mauda, nyi songsido asungletsije kü shanga no ungshedbou aletilabü. Kaibü Mühghaüeibü ngühkhüm nyi maasije ngeikei ka shousi shuong maan aplabü.
Haoen aei haasi haoenei kükhu limbo shabü shondang lekei, haoeneibü soneikangbü kho ngei himou to jeikulabü.
Kü mütli shabü thüka haoenei olinyoda hoba haoeneibü shedbü thüka haoeneibü maang phoda.
Hibü mütli lai ki, ungshedbou shuongkei kho tegü kilabü, haoeneibü kümsilei shuong shanga ngei haoen shieikoelabü hoba haoenei kümbü haoen la pailetkulabü.
Hobaje haoenei shaulabü lausikei senyüh ashemlabü, haoenei pejapelalabü lausikei ühaalabü, aieilausi asangalanbü kümla shanga haoenei
Pejapela, ih lebü hoba ih shaangshouei ditenbü langda.
Kü mütshuongei bu ka songsido pheda, hoba haoeneibü juloei haoen to ngetida; aieilausi peja- pela songsidoei haoen mashiktida, hoba haoenei Mühghaü apyoan pejapelako satakei.

Shongh khua haoenei haitian lemda, hoba shongha, yembü long, poplar hoba terebin bulong phanga jen juokda; aieilausi haoeneibü yemekoubü kho maibü ki, hoba kaneibü nouyangshou shuongei pejapelabü jungeikei, hoba kaneibü chemkannyu shuongei asangalan kümbei.

Kaneibü nouyangnyu shuong pejapelajinei hoba chemkannyu shuongei asangalanjinei ngei haoen shieinangeilabü, aishanga bousu shuongkei haoen lolo pejapelako satda hoba asangalanbü yoa meisiau haitiko lemdasada hoba aditenbü mütli che kho tekan aplabü.
O Israel, nyi asangalan kümsikei Jihuda la shed tekakti; Gilgal to telou, ayingsi Bethaven to tüang, ayingsi
Aishanga masu saoen anyibü tegü Israel shouloakei, khülonga khongthua san shou tegü
Efraim heangsho kümbou la yeiakei; hao khei apyoshi.
Haoenei dantiko yung- yoan phaiaje, haoenei athakko pejapela kümda, saoeibü songdakbü shuongei himou aeibou sanouda.
Yeiei jembü kaaka sao leilangakei, hoba haoeneibü lembüsabü shanga haoen himoulabü.

O kan ungshedbou shuong, ho ditashi, hoba kan Israel mütli, maang kuashi, hoba O Choba chemdang, nou haangashi; aishanga kan khulimbo matjembü kia, aishanga kan shanga Mizpaa kan sung che phatko kikei, hoba Tabor thüka tak sanan kikei.
Hobaje haoenei Shittim püngkhün haülangtham thukei, lausikei haoen pendou ngei shieinangeilabü.
Ngei Efraim ngeakei, hoba kü ka Israel huan aki aishanga tou, O Efraim, nyi asangalanbü küma, Israel shaan apa.
Haoeneibü kümsileiei haoeneibü Mühghaü jungto sepeila asakkuda, aishanga haoen yoa pejapelabü songsido kia, hoba haoenei
Israel yonglam lilibü kho hao thea aukabü longakei hoba Efraim haoeibü shedbüa phaiyetlabü, Jihuda kei haoen yoa phaiyetlabü.
Lombou shuong haoeneibü san shuong yoa
khulimbo haoenei yepeijaweko jungeia; aishanga haoenei khuongshou bukkua. Hibü tou litnyu haanbüei haoeneibü sek- phai yoa haoen suian aplabü.
Gibeaa kanei teklaang metashi! Ramaa pithung metashi! Bethavena laphang ngühlang hautiashi! O Benjamin, lühashi.
Kayang chalou lousüha, hoba Israel sangliphang la yeilabü. Israel mütli, ho maimaitham loushedlabü!
Jihuda konglebou shuong kho leilaang laang yühan apbü shuong phatko yeia; haoen thükto ngeibü maangshat dei tegü ngei jonan jinkulabü.
Israel shieikoeei nakan yantiakei; matjema netla yeitiakei; aieilausi haoei jim akibü phainei paila maangangenkei.
Lausikei Israel thüka ngo phetyang phatko, hoba Jihuda chung thedanga monan apbü phatko ki.

“Ladang Israelei sao shatbü hapbei, hoba Jihudaei saoeibü moukhün hapbei, kheijinei Israel Assiria to haukei hoba Jareb Choba jungto hautikei; lausikei haoei no maitikula athük ayingsi kaibü moukhün amaitien.

Aishanga Efraim thedanga ngo molosaonyu che tegü hoba Jihuda chung thedanga molosaonyu shoushou phatko kilabü; ngei khei jitnyinkulabü hoba satan aplabü; ngei sunglanglabü, hoba püetlabü aokei akilabü.
“Haoenei jembü shedbü thekuko kü the alam shongko, ngo jembü kishang to sepeinyu ngailabü hoba haoen khonkua haoenei ngo maangtakko lamlabü.”
Mütshuongei lauda, “Kaiya, sen
Chalou nyinyet kian haoei sen khangettilabü sembounyeta haoei sen langngaitilabü, hoba sen hao thedanga kilabü.
Hobaje senei ngekho, senei
O Efraim, ngei ka to ai kümla? O Jihuda, ngei ka to ai kümla? aishanga kaibü sanou kho ngeyangbü sangmei tegü hoba tongde satbü nindei tegü ki.
Hibü ngei haoen thuseibü shuong danko akan koutia, ngei haoen kü sembung ngühei haitia hoba ngesakbü tegü ngeibü matjem hauda.
Aishanga ngei haitibü lembü aying, sanou kaangbü mangsühda; hoba juokbü lembü aying, Mühghaü ngebü songsido mangsühda.
“Lausikei Adamei tegü haoenei linjinbü ngühkhüm leilua, khonei haoenei ngo khulimbo yepeijaweko jungeia.
Gilead kho shedbü kümsilei kümbü shuong sangnyu ki, kho siiei naanglepan kia.
Hobaje kokbü shuongei la thobü tegü ungshedbou shuongei Shekhem to haubü lama haoenei müt haitida; haü, haoenei jim akibü kümsilei kümda.
Israel chunga ngei hatlabü kümsilei hapbei, khonei Efraim pejapelabü kia, Israel shaan apa.
“Ka shangakei, O Jihuda, ladang ngei kü mütli langsenbü nyibou sungngailaje kheijinei ka shanga youlatbü jih takletan kia.

“Ladang ngei Israel maitimang sühda kheijinei Efraim shabü hoba Samaria amaibü ngean apda, aishanga haoenei yepeijaweko jungeida hoba kokbü shuong maangto lotda, hoba khonga soshausoyungbü shuongei soshausoyungda.
Hobaje haoeneibü kümsilei amaibü pendou ngei damenda dogo haoenei daman achühda; tou haoen jembü kümsileiei haoen kailepan kia, khübü kho kü thea ki.”
Haoenei haoeneibü kümsilei amaibüei Choba olintida, hoba amlangbüei kongnyubou shuong olintida.
Haoen pendou asangalanbü shuong, wentek ngoubüei wanhap juoklo maibü tegü haoen ki, wen nyatnyinbü ka kho tokai ayei shongko wan ajiketbü tegü.
Seneibü Choba haanga kongnyubou shuong ihei juokan shatkei, müt attiko nyikubü shuong yoa haoei jembü ik tuokkei.
Aishanga haoeneibü huon amaibüei haoeneibü maang- pon wanhap tegü juokda, langyang sünga haoen khauang litham kian, ngeyangje longan kibü wan tegü kho wanlong longda.
“Yasebü wan tegü haoen pendou auetnyu ki, hoba haoenei haoeneibü songdakbü shuong suida hoba haoeneibü Choba pendou tuongan kia, hoba haoen aoeikei kü to angada.”
Yenbou shuongei haoeibü hau suida, hoba haoei kho angeda, hao la kaoen kaoena khuthu longakei, hoba haoei kho angeda.
Hobaje hao khulimbo Israel yonglam lilibüei aukabü kuda, khei yingasikei haoei
Hobaje songsido akibü ngoubü dukutuk tegü Efraim kia; haoenei Ijep to ngada hoba Assiria jungto hauda.
Ladang haoen haulaje, ngei haoen ngeibü sungei minlabü, müh kabü aushuong tegü ngei haoen senyenlabü; haoeneibü kümsilei shuong shanga ngei haoen shieinangeilabü.

“Haoen shanga ügütü! Aishanga haoen kü jungka bangjung satkei, haoen shanga maulabü! aishanga haoenei ngo khulimbo ngühkhüm leilukei, ngei haoen angngaikhoulabü, lausikei haoenei ngo khulimbo amlangbü laukei.
Hobaje haoenei maang kuko kü jungto angekda, lausikei haoeneibü shena haoen lemenyoda; haoenei nyak hoba ih shanga haoen lulu wapda hoba ngo khulimbo meimeida.
Ngei haoen lenensikei hoba hau kitisikei, ngo khulimbo haoenei amaibü huon takda.

Haoen sepeida lausikei thükaenei kibou jungto aying, haoen huonettibou lau che ong phatko ki. Haoeneibü sembungei khau angbü haangjung leiyeibü shuong inei tuonglabü. Ijep kaodaka haoen nyikulabü ho kilabü.”
Ka sembunga teklaang che tenashi. Aulu che tegü
Haoenei kü to, “Kü Mühghaü, kün Israelei no ngeakei” dogo ngeklabü.
Ai maibü kho Israelei apa, dangbou shuongei hao shieilabü.

Haoenei Choba shuong pienkei, lausikei kho ngo danko aying; haoenei leiyeibü shuong pienkei, lausikei kho ngei angekei; haoeneibü chandinam hoba honei haoen wapan aplabü lele haoenei heangsho shuong kümbei.
O Samaria, ngei kaibü masu shoushou amangsühda, haoen khulimbo ngo khau angda; Israela haoen shed akiko kilabü jih ladang ong longla?
Aishanga Israel ka ho ki, bu jakbü mütei ho kümbei, hoba ho Mühghaü aying, haü, Samariabü masu shoushou netla yeiko jangnyinlabü.
Aishanga haoenei yei wenkei hoba haoenei mühghaü yei latlabü, youlong loan aki youman alonglabü, longa tegükei kho küksithang shuongei shaulabü.
Israel suian apa, tou phangshuong yoa lejim akibü chaksiam tegü haoen ki.
Aishanga haoen yamkabü gadu hao jembü ong shoongaibü tegü Assiria to angan kia, Efraimei namei sanoubü shuong jekda.
Haü, phangshuong yoa haoenei yaakyosikei tou ngei haoen yoshaitilabü, hoba Choba si Chobaeibü shousi shuong onang naangkubü ka longche haoen thakan aplabü.
“Aieilausi Efraimei shabü ashonla shanga lemshang juongnyu yeitiasikei khübü kho hao thedanga shabü aei shonshang lemshang la ong yeiakei.
Ngei hao shanga ngeibü ngühkhüm hajar an dobü ngühkhüma doasikei, khübü kho haoenei angebü peisilei che tegü weeida.
Haoenei haitibü lembü shuong sanouda, haoenei phe lemda, hoba kho shauda, hoba

“Aishanga Israelei jembü Kümbou maan apbei hoba Chobaeibü chem shuong dangkei, hoba Jihudaei ba lebü sangnyu juongnyu yeitikei; lausikei haoeibü sangnyu shuong thük to ngei wan yantilabü hoba khoei khübü Choba chem shuong kho suian aplabü.”
O Israel, kan tüolinyo! phangshuong tegü tesungen; aishanga kaneibü Mühghaü apyoan kan pejapelako satakei; youshou nakshang amshang pendoua nyi asangalan namseibü sanoua.
Amshang si semlüh nitshangei haoen asamlabü, hoba ih alibüei sao senyüh ashemlabü.
eibü kaodaka haoen akilabü, lausikei Efraim Ijep to ngailabü hoba Assiriaa asaopobü shausiyung haoenei shaulabü.
Haoenei ih lembü
Saopobü lemnyet hoba
Aishanga chühashi, maulabü ka haoen satan apa, khei yingsikei Ijep to haoen leishailabü, Mimfisei haoen khünlabü haoeneibü namsek chandinam shuong senouei küpleplabü haoeneibü neichema jak kilabü.
Shieikoe chalou shuong loua, ngaingoubü chalou shuong loua, Israelei kho ngelabü; thuseibou kho ngoubü, soushou müt kho langetangbü, aieilausi kaibü shedbü shabü juongnyu hoba theshou- yobü yaang.
Thuseibou kho ngeibü Mühghaü mütli Efraimeibü la- pheibou che kikei, khei yingasikei hao haushang pendoua ausanbü sung ki, hoba haoeibü Mühghaü chema ajiaphaibü kia.
Gibea haanga tegü, haoenei lolo aeibou leilua, haoeneibü shedbüshabü haoei damenlabü, haoei haoeneibü shabü shieinangeilabü.

“Yama semlüh hek tegü ngei Israel hapbei; shaangboubü poanga bhuklonga shaang sembü bhuk phatko, ngei kaneibü bousishuong hapbei; lausikei haoen Baal Peor to loukei, hoba haoen lolo Baal la khümbo kukei hoba haoenei sanoubü peisilei tegü haoen mangsenlabü peisilei che la yeikei.
Efraimeibü soneikangbü au tegü seengjung satlabü, bukbü akilabü, shia künbü akilabü, mang akongko akilabü.
Haoenei shou pangteibükei müt che ongkei akitiko ngei haoen solanglabü, haü, ladang ngo haoen ka banglaje haoen shanga ügütü!”
Ngei hapbüeije Efraim kaoen maibüa kebü Tair tegü, lausikei Efraimei hao shousi shuong haitibou jungto leian haulabü.
Haoen la kuashi, O

Haoeneibü amaibü kümsilei pendou Gilgala kia; aieilausi khonei ngei haoen mangsenkei, haoenei kümbü kümsilei amaibü shanga ngei kü chem ka shian sattilabü. Ngei touje haoen to asanoulabü; haoeneibü leiyeibü shuong pendou songdak khulimbo meimeibü shuong ong ki.
Efraim to ngüma, haoeibü li lina, haoenei lang aheklabü, haü, haoenei pangteiena tegükei haoeneibü na setshang lang maibü kho ngei haitilabü.
Ngeibü Mühghaüei haoen tekan aplabü, aieilausi haoenei hao to ngüha ale; phangshuong yoa haoen shoongaiko nongeibü shuong kilabü.
Jembü lang hektiko süng- yoko satbü semlüh kho Israel ki. Haoeibü hek aei yeisi, lemshon aei haoei küm, hoba haoeneibü kaonyek aei haasi, haoenei lemshang thaonyu aei jinyokei.
Haoeneibü maangpon amlangbü shedbü shanga haoenei on künlabü.
Maimaitham touje haoenei laulabü, “Künei Choba aki, aishanga künei
The- yolanyoko, haoenei amlang ngüh lauda, hibü shapbü seka komsang yembü tegü matjembü longlabü.

Samariaa kibü shuongei Betha- venbüeibü masu shoushou shuong shanga hatko kilabü, aishanga kho shanga mütshuongei mang haaplabü hoba kho thüka heangsho lembü ungshedbou shuong haaplabü; haoeibü soneikangbü satbü shanga haoen haaplabü.
Tokei kho Jereb Choba jungto jongsak che shanga Assiria to jungan haulabü, Efraim himou haplabü, hoba Israelei heangsho shanga himou baulabü.
Dei thüka okjok tegü Samariaei jembü Choba maulabü.

Aven shonghkhu lemshang, Israeleibü shabü hangshong leilutikulabü; haoeneibü lemshanga sang si jaklong yemlabü; hoba haoenei shonghnyu to “Kün tetlepashi”, hoba shonghshou to “Kün thük to lotshi” dogo laulabü.
“O Israel, Gibea haang ka nyi shabü shona, khünei haoen athakko loan kia, Gibeaa haoen laphetko wapyoko aloulep lo?
Ladang ngei maanganglaje ngei haoen shieinangeilabü; ladang haoen ngühkhüm leilubü penyiei haoen khühlaje, haoen khulimbo mütshuong yoshailabü.

“Youshou nakla lenenbü masu saoen phatko Efraim kikei; lausikei saoeibü ngüm hemaibüa kaang ajinku. Ngei Efraim la sek shapbü kaang jinkula janthetkei. Jihudaei kao laünyinlabü, hoba Jakobei kao yentilabü.
Ngei laukei, ‘Kan shanga sek haanbü shapashi, saopobü wenashi, hoba kanei kü la khümbo kubü ka longbü haülabü hek latashi. Ho kan shanga ngo kaneibü
Lausikei kanei amaibü kümsilei wenkei hoba khoeibü shedbü latkei. Kanei yepeijawebü ka longbü buhek shaua.
“Aishanga kanei koli kailong hoba lakjaibü sepai mütshang to maanglembeibü,

ka mütli jungto wapyosuyo loulabü, hoba kaibü lapheishon khümbo leilulabü. Ho wapyo jihsiphaia Shalman Chobaei Betharbel sangnyu leilutikubü tegü kilabü; hoba khonei nyu shuong si haoeneibü shousi shuong netlaphoula yeiko jangnyinkei.
O Bethel, kaneibü amaibü kümsilei haangjung kan to khei loushedlabü. Lason khangsilengko enyutham Israel Choba hailabü.”
“Ladang Israel nashou che kikei,
kheijinei ngei hao sanoukei
hoba Ijep ka kü shou ngakei.
Lausikei ngei hao aei ngasi,
haoen kü ka yongbou satan apbei.
Baal shuong to haoenei haitian lembei
hoba heangsho shuong to lembei.
Khei yingasikei Efraim to paila lenbou kho ngo kikei;
ngei ngeibü ikei haoen bamjung loukei,
lausikei ngei haoen maitikei dogo haoenei ange.
Khunak shousi sanou janglühei ngei haoen leiyeikei,
hoba aoei haoeneibü sembung ka janglüh sungan apbukei;
hao phatko haoen shanga ngo yeikei,
hoba khüpjung yanan ngei haoen pangtei onoukei.
“Hao Ijep kaodak to ngailabü, hoba Assiriabü kho haoeibü Choba yinglabü, aieilausi haoenei kü jungto sepeinyu telongaikho dogo lauda.
Haoeneibü sangnyu shuong thük to in hautilabü hoba koukhin wapnyinkulabü, hoba haoeneibü lapheishona haoen maulabü.
Hobaje kü mütli kü ka sukjung ngaila maang angena, thükkaboua kibou khüto haoenei ngasikei cheei ongkei hao asamlabü.
“O Efraim, ngei no lai litila?
O Israel, ngei no lai püetla?
Adma tegü ngei no lai yeitila?
Zeboim tegü ngei no lai apyola?
kü maangponei kho akümtilabü!
ka shanga ngeibü onou yongko yaangkei.
