Ngeibü kaangbüsekbü khauangei ngei akümlabü,
Efraim nyibou mautila ngo asepeilabü.
Aishanga ngo Mühghaü, müt aying.
ngo Saopobou kan yoa ki.
Hobaje ngo khauanga ka jungto alotlabü.
Ijep ka au tegü lühjilühko haoen loulabü hoba Assiria kaodak ka guduru tegü loulabü, hoba haoeneibü chema haoen kitilabü, dogo
“Efraim yeia samda, hoba chanyu angbou yei phai semda; haoei amlangbü hoba leilutibü athakko yaang yeitida, hoba haoenei Assiria yoa thebülanbü kümda, hoba Ijep to onang jungan atda.”
Jihudabü yoa tokei
Nyusema haoei hao jaieibü youdema senetkei hoba hao hau kijinei haoei Mühghaü to tokyokei.
Haü, haoei khuthük hangangbü to wapyokei hoba thükkei, hao haapbei, hoba hao to sukeijakei, haoei hao Bethela lamenkei, hoba khonei Mühghaüei hao to joyokei.
Khei
Hibü no kaibü Mühghaü jungto sepeiashi, sanou hoba ngühmai lamashi, hoba kaibü Mühghaü junga athakko haiyeiko kishi.
Hobaje Efraimei laukei, maimaitham ngo keia, kü shanga nyaksinam hapa, lausikei haoeibü nyaksinam pendouei haoei shonshaibü shabü ladangkei üplabü.
Lausikei ngo Ijep ka no leibabou
“Toukei ngei thuseibü shuong to joyokei, hoba mangsang juongnyu ngei hautikei, hoba thuseibü shuong danko ngei ngüh- phatbü juong kukei.
Gileada shedbü shabü kia longa haoen lepde lejim akibü la yeilabü. Gilgala haoenei masu pongsu kho haitialonga seka kao shapan shangtian phobü tegü haoeneibü lemshon yeilabü.”
Jakob Aram kaodak to satkei hoba Israelei yaksa che shanga kümbeileikei, hoba yak che shanga haoei san lombei.
Thuseibü che danko
Efraimei hao yongko maangto shattikei, hibü haoeibü sii hao thüka phokulabü hoba
Ladang Efraimei joyokei, mütshuong lühkei, haoei hao lolo Israela yaangenkei, lausikei ladang hao Baal to phaiyetkei, hao haikei.

Hobaje tou haoenei aei ong shabü shonda, hoba haoenei chandinam leman heangsho shuong kümda; haoen maanglimaangsang songsidoei kümbü heangsho ki. Khübü shangabü haoenei lauda, “Haoenei mütei lemda hoba masu shoushou shuong to sembung shepda.”
Hibü haoen ngeyang sangmei tegü hoba tongde satan apbü nin tegü amshang ka yeiei soulangbü youshou sho tegü hoba hokjung ka wankhük satbü tegü kilabü.
Lausikei ngo
Ngei kan yama shulin yunglin kaoa ngean kikei.
Lausikei ladang haoen jembü lolo shenan apbei, haoeneibü maangpon yonglaman apbei khoei haoenei ngo maan apbei.
Hibü haoen thedanga ngo molosaonyu tegü yeilabü, kongkhü tegü ngo lam nyangko thoan kilabü.
Ngo haoen to sap jembü shou laplangbü phatko haüyolabü hoba haoen khükjak khapnyinkulabü hoba khünei ngei haoen molosaonyu phatko suilabü, yamkabü meiei tegü haoen shaknyinlabü.
“O Israel, ngei kan leilutilabü, kan to aoei thuila thükla?
Touje kan püetla kaneibü Choba ao ki? Kan pü lela kaneibü songdakbü shuong aoyou shanga kanei Choba che hoba songdakbü shuong labü dogo laubü lan ki?
Ngo khauang maangpoka ngei choba shuong kukei, hoba ngo maangshata haoen ngei sungngaikei.
“Efraimei shed shonbü the- pan phoa, haoeibü shabü thanan phoakei.
Yaksa nahapshat khonku hao jungto loulabü; hao songsihon akibü jayangshou ki, aishanga nasetshang koukhüna lolabü ho jih aying.
Sheol ka ngei haoen angngailabü. Haikhün ka ngei haoen khümenabü. O haibü, kaibü shieinangei lanei ki? O hee, kaibü leilutibü lan ki? Maangpon sepeibü kü the ka küpleplabü.
Haoeibü jaisinasi yoa hao bukko haako kiasikei, chaangbou yei loulabü;

Samariaei jembü shedbü künlabü, aishanga haoei jembü Mühghaü khulimbo meimeikei, haoen inei tuonglabü haoeneibü nasakshou shuong netla yeiko ngümnyinkulabü, hoba mang- akongbü yaksa shuong nitnyinkulabü.”
O Israel,
Assiriaei kün akhümenlabü, kün kolia satlabü ayingsi küneibü ikküm iklei shuong to touje ‘Kan küneibü mühghaü shuong’ dogo alaulabü; aishanga ka to bou akibü shuongei üeisanou hapda.”
“Haoen sukjung ngaibü ngei maitilabü.
Ngei haoen to maangpon khümboei sanoulabü;
aishanga ngeibü khau ang longbü hao ka sepeingaia.
Ngo Israel thedanga nindei tegü kilabü,
leilang khüpbong tegü hao punglabü,
hoba Lebanon tegü haoeibü li yanlabü.
Haoeibü bhek shuong haakyoko koulabü,
hoba haoeibü hemaibü kho,
Oliv bulong tegü kilabü,
hoba ponlem Lebanon tegü kilabü.
Aoyou haoeibü yemekoubü phanga kida,
haoen sepeinyu longeilabü;
youlong tegü haoen nyibou longlabü,
hoba semlüh tegü ponlabü.
Haoeibü ponlem kho Lebanon kabü
semlüh lem tegü kilabü.
Efraimei laulabü,
touje ngo heangsho to ai phejan ki?
Ngei jongaia hoba hao weeilabü;
ngo fir bulong sangtüngbü tegü ki,
kü ka kaibü buhek
hapda.”
Ao songei keikei, haoei habü ditenashi, ao tetdangbü, haoei habü ngeashi; aishanga
Pethueleibü shou Joel jungto loubü
Kan jaishou shuong ho ditashi,
hoba Jihuda kaonyeka kibü pendouei nou haangashi.
Kan haanga ayingsi kaneibü pisibou haanga
ho tegü haüthüklao ma?
Ho shanga kaneibü shousi shuong to lenshi;
hoba kaneibü shousi shuongei shousi shuong la lenngaishi,
hoba haoeneibü shousi shuongei loulabü meten la lentishi.
Shoongbü koksüngei shauan joubü
koksüng hanbüei shaukei;
koksüng hanbüei shauan joubü toman shatko paibü
koksüngei shaukei;
toman shatko paibü koksüngei shauan joubü
souyobü koksüngei shaukei.
Kan ihei jaakbü shuong piashi hoba haapashi;
ih shuong shanga kan ihyungbü pendou ngekashi,
aieilausi kho ka sembung ka apbua.
Aishanga ngeibü kaonyek khulimbo hau kibü
hoba aweenbü phang che longakei;
haoeibü molosaonyueibü hauh ki,
molosaonyu yaangbüeibü hauhmai hao to ki.
Haoei ngeibü semlüh leilukua,
hoba ngeibü bhuklong leilutikua,
haoei khoeibü khop lemailela khokan apa,
hoba kho tekan apbei,
haoeibü bhek shuong thupaitham apa.
Medeiei senou neiei shembe kaian sao medei jih danga
hao shanga haapbü tegü mang haapshi.
hoba yunglabü lembü tekan apa;
Sek apa, kaoei mang haapda;
aishanga youshou leilua, ih ulangtham apa,
hoba onang hapjung ngaida.
Whet si barli youshou shanga sekmoubü
shuongei maang ngangashi;
semlüh sek moubü shuongei ngekashi,
aishanga youlatbü maua.
Semlüh long yuida, bhuklong linakei;
chilang long, hekyang long hoba shongbe long
khei seka bulong pendou yuia;
aishanga müteibü shousi shuong ka olinbü sada.
Kan ungshedbou shuong kanei senou nei neiashi
hoba mang haapashi;
kan lemshanga khangenbü shuong, ngekashi kaiya;
kan ngeibü Mühghaü khangenbü shuong,
langyang sünga senou nei neian yepshi,
aishanga shausiyung lembü hoba yunglabü lembü
kaneibü Mühghaü chem ka seneda.
Saüenan mühei nyengshi,
saopobü kambü che ngashaiashi,
jaishou shuong hoba kaonyeka kibü pendou
hoba
Maangto shatlabü chalou,
aishanga
hoba pendou Thükenbou ka maulabü tegü kho loulabü hang.
Sen thedang ka shausiyung,
haü,
hoba olinbü bangda aying lo?
Youli shuong kho kaolin maanga linan apda.
Youshou thanshang litham apyoakei, bung shuong leilua,
aishanga youshou ayem.
Haoenei lamshaushang akisije meisiau shuongei lai lemenyoda
hoba masu shuong mangda haü, sanlon shuong litham apakei.
aishanga wanei yam lamshaushang suia,
hoba wanlongei sek kabü bulong pendou laaka.
Haü, yamkabü meisiau shuongei
ka shanga aeibou maang laakko deilada;
aishanga shumang shuong ulangtham apa.
Teklaang metashi; hoba Mühghaüeibü saopobü Zion shongha
thüngdou langh dittiashi.
Lühashi, Jihuda müt shuong!
Aishanga
Nakthüh hoba nakshou naknyu chalou.
Mütli yaangbü hoba hauki yaangkibü che
nakthühtham shongh shuong küplepan kia;
kho tegü shangied kian achüh, ayingsi meten pendou thonko
kho phatko haoen phaia touje akilabü.
Haoen thedanga wanei suian apda,
hoba haoen phainei wanlong longda.
Kaodak kho haoen thedanga Eden bamang tegü,
lausikei haoen phainei sangliphanga yamla yeida;
haoen ka aokei asatenda.
Haoen chühla koli phatko hoba wapyobü koli tegü
haoen laangda.
Kailong paibü ngühlang tegütham,
haoenei shongh khua toman shatda;
youho jikan apbü wanlong olinbü tegütham,
hau kibü tan lason lamlebü tegü.
Haoen thedanga noknyüh khonkuda,
thedanga pendou phaklaktham yeida.
Sekbülakbü shuong tegü haoen laangda,
wapyobü mütshuong tegü haoen ba to saüjung nguida.
Haoen lulueibü lama paida,
hoba haoenei haoeneibü lin aleiluda.
Haoen cheei che to ajangda,
mütpem weko lulueibü lama hauda;
haoenei insiaubu tujung hauda hoba atoketda.
sangnyua haoen toman shatda;
ba thüka haoen laangda,
haoen chem to angda haoen kokbü tegü koulom to atda.
Haoen junga kaoei nyaakda,
mühshuongei lühda;
chanyu si litnyu nakthühtham apda,
hoba khanshoulitshou shuongei haoeneibü ngesakbü senetda.
Hobaje
aishanga haoeibü lakjaibü shuong aeibou yaangkei,
aoyouei haoeibü ngüha leda,
hao hau kibü.
Aishanga
hoba aeibou hatlamoklabü che,
hoba aoei kho tinla?
tou ongkei kan maangpon pendouei
kanei mühei nyengko hoba haapbo,
hoba manghaapbo kü jungto sepeiashi.
Hobaje kaneibü neisimei ayingko
kaneibü maangpon jitnyinashi,
hoba
Aishanga hao onou hoba üei dambüei shenakei,
khauangla maangyangsho hoba sanoudambü apsileko
hoba amaibü ka haoei hehoat kida.
Khei haoei nyibou maangpon sepeila
hoba hao phainei haülabü che,
khei shausiyung lembüsabü kaneibü
phokulabü lele naang maitikulakei ai ngenyu!
Ziona teklaang metashi, mühei nyengbü saüenashi,
jaishou shuong kamshaiashi,
hoba nashousi shuong si senyopbü shuong leishaiashi!
Mütshuong liko hokshaiashi;
haoen saopobü thangyen che tensepashi;
jaishou shuong ngashaiashi;
nashou hanbü shuong hoba nasak yoan leishaiashi.
Chemkanbou si chemkannyu jembü popchem maangka longashi.
Ungshedbou shuong,
chemsophang si lemshang kanglanga haapashi,
hoba lauashi, “O
Hobaje phangshuongei kün khulimbo,
‘Haoeneibü Mühghaü lan ki?’ dogo lauko
kaibü phetphan awealauko tejungeiti.”
Kheijinei
hoba jembü mütli to maangshikkei.
Hobaje
“Chühashi, ngei kan jungto youshou, ih
hoba onang yantikulabü
hoba phang yoa touje kan awealauko ayeitilabü.
Lausikei chanep phei sepai tan saabü to kuktilabü,
hoba kaolong hoba sangliphang to chanyu angbou yungnyu
to shian aplabü.
haoeneibü thedanga lamleibü shuong Haibü Yungnyu to

hoba shalüm longlabü hoba lem amaibü longlabü,
aieilausi haoei amaibü kümsilei yaang kümbei.
“Tehüt, O kaonyu, olinashi hoba olinangko kishi,
aishanga
Hatko teki, kan khongthua kibü meisiau shuong,
aishanga yama lamshaushang longakei,
aishanga bulongei jembü lang hekkuda;
bhuklong si semlüh longei jembü hau kuda.
“Hibü kan Zion shousi shuong olinko kishi,
hoba
aishanga haoei kan la shaangbou langh takletbü tükde kuda,
hoba kan shanga haoei lang shaangboubü lang
hoba phaibou lang shangied tegütham yantikuda.
Hobaje amshang kho whet youshouei shenan kilabü,
hoba ihlechak shuong kho ih hoba onangei soplabü.
Hobaje ngei kan yoto hautibü ngeibü sepai tan yaangbü,
koksüng, jepan apbubou koksüng, shoongbü koksüng,
toman shatbü hoba shaukhümkubü koksüng,
koksüng shuongei shaukubü kaomai shuong
ngei nyibou kan la kungailabü.
Hobaje kanei apsileko shaulabü hoba senyühshemlabü,
hoba kan to maangpanglabü kümbou
hoba lubü ao aki, dogo kanei ngelabü,
hoba ka mütli ladangkei himou abaulabü.
Hobaje ngo Israelbü yoa kia dogo,
hoba ngo
hoba lubü ao aki, dogo kanei ngelabü,
hoba ka mütli ladangkei himou abaulabü.
“Hobaje phaia ho haüthüklabü,
khei ngei kü soushou phe pendou la khüpan jinkulabü;
hoba kaibü jayangshou hoba nouyangshou shuongei
thusei ngüh tetenlabü hoba jaishou shuongei mangh lilabü;
hoba kaneibü heshou shuongei mangsang haplabü.
Hobaje tokei khübü chaloua ngeibü sambü hoba samnyu
shuong thükto kü soushou khüpan jinkulabü.
“Hobaje müha hoba kaoa maangpanglabü shuong lenlabü,
sii hoba wan hoba wankhük thaonyu kilabü.
hoba hatlamoklabü aloujinei
chanyu kho nakthühtham aplabü
hoba litnyu kho sii la yeilabü.

khei aoyouei
Aishanga
Satenbü shuong Zion shongh hoba Jerusalema kilabü,
hoba
“Aishanga chühashi, khübü chaloua hoba kho jiha ladang
Jihuda si Jerusalem langsenbü nyibou ngei leingailaje,
ngei phang pendou leishailabü,
hoba Jehoshafat pholi to leian yanlabü,
hoba ngei khünei kü mütli shanga hoba ngeibü phet Israel
shanga aoyouei haoen phangshuong yoa pheinyintian ki,
hoba ngeibü kaonyek janan ki, haoen to ngei mat jemlabü.
Hobaje haoenei kü mütli shanga phaang paklabü,
hoba asangalanbü shanga bousushou che kukei
hoba haoenei yungla ih shanga yaksashou che yaakkei.

“Haü, O Tair, hoba Sidon hoba Filistia kaonyek pendou kü thedanga kan ai ki? Ngei kümbü shanga kanei kü la kungailep sai? hoba kanei kü la kungaiko laualonga panteiko hoba tongde ngei kaneibü kümsilei sepeinyu kaneibü khu thüka kulabü.
Aishanga kanei ngeibü chandinam hoba ngeibü hon lea, hoba ngeibü nyaksinam maibü kaneibü lemshang chem to kanei sunglanga.
Jihudabü si Jerusalembü haoen jembü leilang ka saabü to lintila shanga kanei Grikbü la yaaka.
Chühashi, kanei laenei haoen yaakan ki khüka ngei haoen meimeitilabü, hoba kaneibü kümsilei kaneibü khu to ngaitikulabü.
Hobaje kaneibü jayang nouyangshou shuong Jihudabü shousi shuong ik to ngei yaaklabü, hoba haoenei saabüa kibü mütshuong la haoen yaaklabü, aishanga
“Kanei mütshuong la ho phinthonashi,
‘Wapyo lamleashi; sekbülakbü shuong meimeitiashi,
wapyobü müt pendou nyangko loutiashi, haoen longtiashi.
Kanei sek shapbü insiaubu jungashi
hoba sangjipbü insiaubu jungashi,
hau akibüei ngo hau kia dogo lautiashi.
Kan panteiashi hoba kaiya,
kaijembo kibü phang pendou,
hoba kan lulu takshatashi.’”
O
“Phangshuong haoen lulu shitiashi
hoba Jehoshafat pholi to longtiashi;
aishanga khünei kaijembo kibü phang pendou
matjemla ngo setlabü.
Laangku litiashi, aishanga sek nyena;
kaiya kanei juletashi,
aishanga semlüh hek nitshanga shenko kia,
jephot sopbo kouda;
aishanga maibou kho aeibou yaang kia.”
Shuong shuonga janthetbü yoa kia!

Chanyu si litnyu nakthühtham apakei,
hoba khanshoulitshou shuongei haoeneibü ngesak senetakei.

hoba Jerusalem ka haoeibü ngüh hautilabü;
hoba müh si kao topeilabü,
lausikei hao mütli shanga
hoba Israel shousi shuong shanga laphei shon kilabü.
“Kho tegü kaneibü Mühghaü, ngeibü saopobü shongh
Ziona kida dogo ngelabü,
kheijinei Jerusalem saopobü kilabü,
hoba yenbou aoeikei touje sao ashilabü.
“Hobaje kho chaloua ho haüthüklabü,
shonghnyu shuongei ih teibü saangtilabü,
hoba shonghei sendei koutilabü
hoba Jihuda shushou pendou dei koulabü,
hoba
hoba Shittim pholia dei koulabü.
“Jihudabü shousi shuong to ik shatbü hangshong,
Ijep sangliphanga kilabü.
Edom yam sangliphang shanga yinglabü,
aieilausi haoeneibü ikei haoenei shedbü akibü sii phinkei.
Lausikei Jihuda ponpen kilabü,
hoba Jerusalem meten meten kilabü.

ngei kho ashiakoeko üpyolabü,

Amos, ao Tekoa kabü sanlombü shuong yoa kikei, haoei Jihudabü Choba Uzzia haanga hoba Israelbü Choba Jehoasheibü shou Jeroboam haanga, selo anyijinei po nyi kian, Israelbü shanga haoei hapbü ngüh shuong.
Hobaje Amosei laukei,
hoba Jerusalem ka haoeibü ngüh longda.
Sanlombü shuongeibü nyemlaakei mang haapda;
hoba Karmel Shongh kabü sang yuida.”
Hibü ngei Hazael Choba chem to wan hautilabü, hoba khoei Benhadad Choba chem lonlabü.
Ngei Damaska sangnyu bakou netla yeitilabü, hoba Aven Yo kabü mütshuong si Beth Eden songdakbou wapan apbulabü. Hobaje Siriabü mütshuong Kir thüngshang to langsenlabü.”
Hibü ngei Gaza kümthang to wan hautilabü, hoba khoei saoeibü lapheishon lonshemlabü.
Hobaje Ashdod si Ashkelon kabü songdakbü shuong ngei wapan apbulabü. Ngei Ekron sangnyu shieikoelabü, hoba jouan kibü Filistiabü pendou hailabü.”
Hibü ngei Tair kümthang to wan hautilabü, hoba khoei saoeibü lapheishon lonshemlabü.”
Hibü ngei Teman sangnyu thükto wan hautilabü, hoba khoei Bozraeibü lapheishon lonshemlabü.”
Hibü ngei Rabba kümthang to wan hautilabü, hoba khoei saoeibü lapheishon lonshemlabü. Khünyet lasona ngekyobü kilabü, hoba wapyo kho yeishik maimai kilabü.
Hobaje haoeneibü Choba si yaangenbü shuong langsenbü to haulabü.”
Hibü Moab thükto ngei wan hautilabü, hoba khoei Keriot lapheishon lonshemlabü; hoba lemenbü, ngekbü hoba teklaang ngühlang yoa müt hailabü.
Hobaje ngei Moab songdakbou si kaonyek kabü khuleibü shuong khümbo wapan aplabü.”
Hibü ngei Jihuda thükto wan hautilabü, hoba khoei Jerusalem lapheishon lonshemlabü.”
Khei kaomang to atko shalebüeibü khua nakeida hoba jim akibüeibü lamnyu aüan apda, hoba ngeibü saopobü nyen shatiko müt che si haobou jeteibü medei jungto atda.
Hobaje theletla lebü neisimei thüka lemshang weko nyangko haoen lolo lengda, hoba Mühghaü chema haoenei nyatbü ih yungda.
“Khei yingasikei haoen thedanga ngei Amorbü mautilabü, aoeibü thong cedar bulong tegü hoba yembu tegü hau kibü yingasikei, ngei haoeibü li leilutikulabü.
Tokei ngei hao Ijep kaodak ka leibakei, hoba Amor kaodak phetphanla yama po saonyi leiyeikei.
Hobaje kaneibü shousi shuong ka thuseibü heshou shuong ka Nazirit mütshuong, kho maimaitham aying lo? O Israel shousi shuong, dogo
“Lausikei Nazirit mütshuong lakei kanei ih yungtikei, hoba thuseibü shuong lakei ngühkhüm kuko, ‘Kanei thusei ngüh telau’ dogo laukei.
“Chühashi, youmanei manan kibü kailong sanglepbü tegü ngei kan sangleplabü.
Sekbülakbü shuongei asatenlabü hoba hauki yaangkibüei haoeneibü hau asungenlabü, ayingsi sekbülakbüei jembü lolo akhümenlabü.
Aoei lau jungda hao aloenlabü, hoba ao you sokei, hao lolo akhümenlabü, ayingsi aoei kolia setda haoeibü langkei akhümenlabü.
Hobaje sekbülakbü yoa ao maang kaangbü ki, khünyet mütkong satlabü,” dogo
O Israelbü, kan khulimbo, Ijep kaodak ka ngei leiyenbü chung khümbo khulimbo
“Kaodak chung pendou apyoan ngei kan to thounoukei, hibü kaneibü shedbü shabü pendou ngei pean chühlabü.”
Maangpon apaplep longa müt nyi liko pailep lo?
Yama taketlabü meisiau akijinei molosaonyuei ngühda si?
Molosaonyu paangshouei laang- poba denche sungbaan akilonga wilep si?
Hao shanga kaoa autin asanku longa au kho tina minlep si? Ai aminnyu tinkung kho shemlep si?
Sangnyua teklaang metsi mütshuong alühda lo?
Sangnyu chenei denche amaibü loushedsi kho
Maimaitham
Molosaonyuei ngüha, aoei ühütla?
“Ashdod Choba hoba Ijep Chobaeibü chema ngekletashi hoba lenashi. Samaria shongha kan lolo kamshaiashi, hoba khünei oyolemen latetche ki chühashi.
Habü mütshuongei haoeneibü thanchema ik shatyobü hoba sobakokpabü thanshaida, hoba haoenei janbü kümla angekei” dogo
Hibü
“Kanei ditashi, hoba Jakob chemdang khulimbo aukabü kuashi” dogo
“Aishanga Israelei ngühkhüm lulimbü shieinangei chaloua ngei tokei Bethel lemshangkei shieinangeilabü, hoba lemshang laangshong wapan apbulabü, hoba kao to attilabü.
Hobaje poang chem hoba sulang chem penyi ham ngei mautikulabü, hoba thunyu hauhei dangbü chem mautikulabü, hoba chemsibung juong maushangdanglabü” dogo
“Ho ditashi, kan Bashan kabü masu shuong, kan Samariaa kibü yaksi shuong, kanei shalebü shieikoeda, athükaminbü nakan yantida, hoba haoeneibü laosi to, ‘Sungba, senei yungkho!’ dogo lauda.
Haoenei kan anjinei senlanglabü hoba kan joubü shuong kho ngau yaüjinei senlabü, khübü chalou ka jungto louada dogo
Hobaje kan mütpem weko tangshaitham sao thedanga leilubü kishang khüto anglabü hoba kan lolo Harmona jinkulabü,” dogo
“Bethel to kaiya hoba ngühkhüm lulimashi; Gilgal to kaiya, hoba ngühkhüm lulimbü juong yeiashi, kaneibü juokbü lembü ngeyang weko, hoba kaneibü an phejan sembounyet weko sungba;
hoba nyensang kubü lembü, tokai ajinbü wentek juokko kuashi hoba maangmai lembü ngekletashi hoba khübü kho ngetiashi, aishanga O Israel, kanei kho mangsühda!” dogo
“Hobaje ngei kan la shaula akibü ka shikonglopkong hoba kan kishang pendoua uangmuang kukei; khei yingasikei kan kü jungto sepeinyu alongei,” dogo

“Hobaje youlatla lit sem kian ngei tokei kan ka lang senetkei; ngei sangnyu che thükto lang loutikei hoba lubü sangnyu che thüktoje lang alouti; sek che thükto lang loukei, lausikei sek laoboua lang alou kho liman apbei.
Hibü sangnyu penyi sem sangnyu che jungto dei hiyungla loukei, hoba senyühashem; khei yingsi dogokei kan kü jungto asepei,” dogo

“Ngei kan shatsinyat hoba mousisouei sühtikei, kaneibü bamang shuong hoba kaneibü semlühlaak shuong hoba kaneibü bhuklong shuong hoba kaneibü oliv bulong shuong koksüngei shaukhümbukei; khei yingasikei kan kü jungto asepei,” dogo

“Ngei kan jungto Ijepbü jungto hautibü tegü shatlim hautikei; kaneibü heshou shuong ngei inei haitikei, kaneibü koli shuong ngei nanglangkei hoba kaneibü shenyou shalümei kaneibü kung sühko ngei longtikei; khei yingasikei kan kü jungto se- peinyu alongei,” dogo
“Mühghaüei Sodom si Gomora apbubü tegü ngei kan yoa atje apbua hoba wan longan kibü ka lungaibü wanted tegü kan kü jungto asepei,” dogo
“Hibü, O Israel, ngei kan to hai kümlabü, aishanga ngei ka to hai kümla kiabü, kaibü Mühghaü to haüyola lamleashi, O Israel!”
Aishanga ditashi, aoei shongh shuong
yeitikei, hoba yei kümbei;
aoei müt to haoeibü dambü shuong ai ki kho lenda;
hoba change kho nangnak la yeitida,
hoba kaodaka shongh shuong yeitikei,
haoeibü nyen kho
Thükenbou Mühghaü ki!
O Israel mütli, ka shanga ngo manghaapbü ngüh kanei ditashi.
Saosüngbü Israel medei tuonga,
Sao ladangkei alakseplabü!
Sao kaokonga apyoakei;
Hobaje sao phonla ao aki.
Aishanga
Aishanga Israel mütli to
lausikei Bethel telam, ayingsi Gilgal to tüt, hoba Beersheba danko tohau; aishanga maimaitham Gilgal lang senlabü, hoba Bethel jim akiko aplabü.”
Kanei ngühmai khauekbü yeitida, hoba saopobü kaoa tekan apda!
Aoei Pleiads hoba Orion kümbei;
haoei daomao ka ngeyang yeitida;
hoba change ka nangnak nakthüh yeitida.
Haoei yungnyu dei ngashaida;
hoba kho kaonyu thükto jonan jinkuda;
haoeibü nyen
Haoei hauki yaangkibü thükto hakde mauthu sungbada,
hoba lapheishon thükto leilubü longtida.
Bakhüna hakbü müt to haoenei mangsenda, hoba ngühmai hoba ngühmai laubü müt to haoenei mangsenda.
Kanei shalebü to nakkei hoba hao ka youshou sungshaukei; yingsije, kanei laang jakenan chem dangasikei, kan khünei akilabü, kanei semlühlaak maibü leasikei kanei khübü ih ayungoulabü.
Aishanga kanei ngühkhüm leilubü juong hoba shabü laobou yaangbü, kho ngei ngeakei; kanei shedbü akakbü khonkutida hoba besa leda hoba athükaminbü bakhüna nangletda.
Khei yingbüka, ao ngühmaanglanbü ki kho tegübü jiha ngüh üangko kilabü; aishanga ho jihsiphai amaibü ki!.
Kan lang kimang sühalonga maibü lamshi, hoba amaibü aying; khei yingalonga
Amaibü kho mangsenashi, hoba maibü kho sanouashi hoba bakhüna ngühmai kümshi; aingenyu
Hibü
Hobaje semlühlaak pendoua haapbü kilabü, aishanga ka jungka ngo danlabü,” dogo
Ho müt che molosaonyu ka satensi sap che haüyobü jam! Ayingsi chem to ngaian haoeibü ik kümthang to nongyolangsi pinyuei püpbü jam!
chalou kho ngesakbü jiko nakthühbü aying lo? Khonei sonlailai ayingko nakthüh ong kilep aying lo?
Ngei mangsenda, ngei kaneibü lemsilang nyikuda. Kanei saopobü thangyen kambüa ngo aolinda.
Haü, kanei kü la juokbü lembü hoba shausiyung lembü kuasikei ngei khübü asungletlabü, kaneibü netthembü nyensang lembü shuong ngei aweeilabü.
Kanei kü ka kaneibü chia laubü ngailangashi, aishanga kaneibü kongkin ngüh ngei aditlabü.
Lausikei dei tegü ngühmai nujung louyantiashi, hoba saopobü shuong sopbo koutiashi.
“O Israel mütli, yama po saonyi kijinei kanei kü jungto meisiau lembü shausiyung lembü sungbakei sai?
Lausikei kanei kaneibü Choba Sakkut hoba kaneibü khanshoulitshou mühghaü Kaiwan noksa laobou kan shanga kümbei kanei pejan.
Hibü kan Damaska danko langsenbü to ngei kan hautilabü,” dogo
Ziona ongayasetham kibü shanga hoba Samaria shongha maangleman kibü shanga, kongnyu phang yo ka yaangenbü shanga aoyou jungto Israelbü chung loukei haoen shanga ügütü!
Kalne danko hauashi hoba chühashi, hoba kho ka yaangenbou Hamata jungto hauashi, kho phaia Filistiaa Gat to yanashi! Haoen khübü sangle to maibou sai?
O kan amaibü chalou saabüa aptimang sühbü shuong, hoba ik shatyobü setshang nyangko loutimang sühbü shuong.
“Thunyu hauh yepshanga phetetnyu lengbü shuong, hoba haoen lolo khümsoka shingetnyu kibü shuong, hoba sanshuong ka san shoushou hoba masu chem ka masu shoushou shaubü shuong, ügütü!
Kongkina peksekyoko chia laubü, hoba Dawid tegü chia kongkin jembü shanga kümenda.
Thunga ih yungda hoba haoen lolo onang maibüei naangbü shuong; lausikei Josef khonsakbü shanga haoenei maangpon nou kuko aki.
Hibü, tou shaangboubü langsenbü shuong yoa haoen langsenbü to haulabü hoba shingetnyu lengan lem liyoko dankhümlabü.”
Hobaje ho loushedlabü, chem chenei müt an kialonga haoen hailabü.

Koliei laangdaka langenlep lo? Yungnyua masu pongsuei sek shaplep lo? Khei yingasikei kanei ngühmai khauekbü, hoba saopobü buhek kom la yeitia.

Hobaje
Hobaje ngei laukei, “Takbü janglüh che.”
Kheijinei
Hobaje Isakeibü thensileneibü shongha lembü sangliphanga kilabü hoba Israelbüeibü lemshang inletkulabü hoba Jeroboam chemdang khulimbo ngei in tonlabü.
Kheijinei Bethel kabü Amaziaei Israelbü Choba Jeroboam jungto ho lenko hautikei, “Israelbü chemdang yoa no khulimbo Amosei huon amaibü takda; haoeibü ngüh pendou kaodakei atinda.
Aishanga Amosei lauda, ‘Jeroboam inei hailabü, hoba kheijinei kaonyek ka Israel langsenbü to laplangbü.’ ”
Tokei Amaziaei Amos to laukei, “O no thuseibou, satashi. Jihuda kaodak to satan apashi, hoba khünei shiang lamashi hoba thusei ngüh lauashi.
Lausikei touje Bethelaje thusei ngüh telau; aishanga ho Chobaeibü lemshang ki, hoba ho mütlieibü lembüchem ki.”
Kheijinei Amosei jongaiko Amazia to laukei, “Ngo thuseibü aying, ayingsi thuseibüeibü shoukei aying, lausikei ngo sekmoubü hoba bhuklaak moubü müt ki.

Ho ditashi, O kan athükaminbü suibü shuong, hoba kaonyeka athükamin haptibü shuong.
“Efa shibou hoba munamje aei yeitiko hoba seret amlangbüei lepbolangko senei yakenlabü shanga ladang ong hangi yakla lit haanbü hoba youshou yakla shanga Nounyet danlama?
Khei senei chandinam lu shalebü hoba nguok youdang che lu shale jonglebü jekla hoba youshou monbü yakla?” dogo kanei lauda.
Jakob to sanoubüei ong
Kho shanga kaoei alühlabü hoba khünei kibü müt- pem wekoei mang ühaaplabü lo? Haü, kaonyu pendou Nail tegü anglabü, hoba kho Ijepa Nail tegü dei jonglabü hoba nyibou hapngailabü.
Hobaje kho chaloua chanyu chajihboua chanyu neptilabü hoba changea ngei kaodak nakthühtham aptilabü, dogo

Hobaje kaneibü lemsilangei manghaapbü yeitilabü, hoba kaneibü chia pendou waangbü chia yeitilabü, hoba kaneibü shenjanga ngei senounei shentilabü, mütpem weko khüng khetilabü hoba bousushou tetche ong kibü shanga manghaapbü tegü, hoba kho thonbü kho khauekbü chalou tegü ngei yeitilabü.
“Chühashi, kaonyeka mühsinou che, khei nyak akibü ayingsi deilabü lim che aying, lausikei Mühghaü ngüh aditbü lim che ngei hautila chalou shuong louada, dogo
Hobaje haoen yungnyu ka yungnyu sühko hoba yungkük ka khei chanyu angbü sühko shoongailabü; haoen hau ngai dogo laangyolabü, lausikei kho ühüplabü.
Kho chaloua hemai saomai medei shuong hoba heshou shuong deilaei semthetlabü.
Aoyouei Samariabü heangshoei thekolanko lauda, O Dan, ka mühghaü lang kisije, hoba Beersheba heangsho lang kisije, khei haoen tuonglabü, hoba ladangkei nyibou alakseplabü.”
Ngei lemshang nyangko
Haoen yemkhüna sühko thujung atsi dogokei khün ka ngeibü ikei haoen senenlabü, hoba haoen müh to angsikei, khüka ngei haoen senletlabü.
Hobaje haoen Karmel hotena husikei ngei haoen lamenlabü, hoba khüka haoen leibalabü, hoba haoen kü thenyek ka yungnyu haübüa huasikei khüka ngei pinyu la sakkulabü hoba haoei haoen to püplabü.
Hobaje haoen dangbou labou thedang ka thüngshang to hauasikei khünei ngei in la sakkulabü, hoba khoei haoen wapettilabü. Haü, ngei haoen thükto maibü shanga aying, amaibü shanga ngei nyek hautilabü.”
Aishanga
haoei kaonyek to meitia longa tühnyinda;
hoba khünei kibü pendouei mang haaplabü,
hoba kho Nail tegü anglabü;
hoba Ijepa Nail tegü hapjung ngailabü.
Müha popchem küman kaoa mühyou
tenan kümbou kho hao ki;

haoeibü nyen
“O Israel shousi shuong, kü thedanga kan Ethiopiabü tegü aying lo? dogo
Chühashi,
Aishanga ditashi, ngei sakkulabü hoba onyishoua ang nyiletbü tegü ngei Israel chemdang phang pendou yoa nyiletlabü; khei yingasikei, youshou hanbüshou khokei kaoa üatlabü.
Kü mütli shabü shuong pendou aoyouei ‘Amaibüei sen alaphetlabü ayingsi sen athangetlabü,’ dogo lauda, haoen inei hailabü.”
“Kho chaloua Dawideibü lemshang neichem tuongan kibü ngei phonlabü, hoba kho leilubü thipetlabü hoba hao leilubü ngei phonngaikulabü hoba shangied kibü tegü ngei kho danglabü;
khei haoenei Edom jouletbü hoba kü nyena ngabü phang pendou lela shanga,” dogo kho kümbou
“Chühashi, sek shapbouei youlatbou,
hoba semlüh kebouei nakbou leilabü chalou shuong louada,”
dogo
“Shonghnyuei ih teibü koutilabü,
hoba shonghshou pendou khoei nyakko koulabü.
Hobaje ngei kü mütli Israelbü langsenbü ka
nyibou leian loulabü.
Haoenei leilubü sangnyu shuong kümetlabü,
hoba khünei kilabü;
hoba haoenei semlühlaak lelabü;
hoba khoeibü ih yunglabü, hoba haoenei balaak lelabü,

Hobaje ngei Israel jembü kaodaka kean pholabü,

Obadiaeibü mangsang
phangshuong yoa chobaeibü hangangbü hautiakei:
“Kan meimeiashi, hoba sao khulimbo lasona loakho!”
Chühashi, ngei ao phangshuong yoa hanbüla yeitia
no aeibou aweasünglabü.
Kaibü maangpon yonglam lilibüei no khüpettian,
O no laanglipa kia, kui suokbüa kida,
khei jembü maangpona “Aoei ngo kao to yantila” dogo lauda.
No aulu tegü kuito seengjung angasikei,
hoba kaibü hap khanshoulitshou yoa kümasikei,
ngei khüka no sungyanlabü,
dogo
Ka jungto kokbü loualonga; nangnak soshausoyungbü loualonga
no latetche aleilukula!
Haoen asou shongko haoenei akoklep lo?
Semlüh hek thanshaibü at ka jungto loualonga
haoenei semlüh hek at üpyokulep lo?
Esau shanga lai lamenkei haoeneibü huphang
nyaksinam lai lapenkei.
Haoenei no leilang sühko shian apbei,
kayoa sangmaia kibü mütei no khüpettikei,
hoba ka thüka thük hapbei,
kaibü jem sebü shuongei ka phanga sung sanan phokukei,
kho shanga aikei ditenbü aki.
“Kho chaloua ngei Edom ka songsido kibü mütshuong
hoba Esau shongh ka ditenbü amautikulep lo?
dogo
Hobaje, O Teman, kaneibü lakjaibü shuong moklabü,
khei mütpem weko Esau shongh ka haitibüei
kulo kuan mautiphang.
“Kana Jakob to ikshatbü shanga himouei no küpleplabü,
hoba no ponpen shanga wapan aplabü.
Küksithang shuongei haoeibü peisilei laangbü
hoba haoeibü bakhün to adan,
Jerusalem thüka phaang pakjinei no heebüa limchühko
lobü chaloua khei no haoen yoa che kikei.
Kana khonku thushed chaloua nyi olinko techüh
hoba Jihudabü shousi shuong thüka
haoen maubü chaloua teolinyo
ayingsi maangshat chaloua yonglambo telau.
Kü mütlieibü bakhün to haoen thushed chaloua tüet;
haü, haoen thushet chaloua haoeneibü khonku thüka
olinko techüh, ayingsi haoen thushed chaloua
kanei haoeneibü peitoleito ik tüet.
Satyobü shuong wapetla no lambheka telo;
maangshat chaloua jouan kibü shuong kho khümbo teku.
“Aishanga phang pendou thüka
nyi kümbü tegü ka to kümlabü,
nyi jungeibü kakhu thük to longeilabü.
Aishanga ngeibü saopobü shongha kanei yungbü tegü
khünei phang pendouei athakko yunglabü,
haü, haoenei yunglabü hoba ngoualoua laulabü
hoba haoen akibü tegü ong yeilabü.
“Lausikei Zion shongha satbü maubü shuong kilabü
hoba kho saopobü kilabü,
hoba Jakob chemdangei phet phanlabü.
Hobaje Jakob chemdang wan la yeilabü,
hoba Josef chemdang wanlong la yeilabü,
hoba Esau chemdang youkung tegü yeilabü
hoba haoen khübü kho jiklabü hoba haoen suilabü,
hoba Esau chemdang che ongkei ajoulabü,
aishanga
Hobaje yungküka kibüei Esaueibü shongh

Tou Amittaieibü shou Jona jungto
“Meimeiashi, sangnyu yaangbü Ninevi khüto hauashi, hoba kho khulimbo ngekashi, aishanga haoen amaibü kü jungto longa.”
Lausikei
Lausikei

Kheijinei longchema kümbüleibü shuong hatkei hoba mütpem wekoei lulueibü mühghaü to ngekkei hoba kho songoktila shanga haoenei longchem kabü peisilei sonan apbei. Lausikei Jona je longchem maangto atan kikei, hoba hao yepbei, hoba maangamaiko nyeket shian kikei.
Hibü longchem leiyeibou kho hao jungto loukei, hoba hao to laukei, “No ho ai tetlabü, O nyeket shibou? Piashi, kaibü mühghaü to ngaashi! Aingenyu, haoei sen ashemtilabü lele denche dambulabü.”
Hobaje haoen si haoen joyoko laukei, “Kaiya, ao laüa ho thushed ho sen jungto loudaje kho senei ngela phaang pakkho.” Hibü haoenei phaang pakkei, hoba kho Jona to shatkei.
Kheijinei haoenei hao to laukei, “Lenshima, ao laüa ho thushed sen thükto louda, kün la lenbü. Kaibü kümsilei ai hoba no laka louda? Kaibü kaodak ai hoba no laobou mütli ka?”
Kheijinei haoei haoen to laukei, “Ngo Ibribü, yungnyu si kaolin kümbou
Kheijinei mütshuong kho aeibou hatkei hoba hao to laukei, “Nyi ho ai kümbei?” Aishanga hao
Kheijinei haoenei hao to laukei, “Yungnyu kho sen shanga küpjembo yeitila shanga künei ka to ai kümla?” Aishanga yungnyu deishou kho aei aei ong amaibou yeikei.
Hobaje haoei haoen to laukei, “Ngo baman sungashi hoba yungnyu to tekan jinashi, khoei kan shanga yungnyu sangsemlabü, aishanga ho deishou yaangbü kü laüa kan thüka kia dogo ngei ngekei.”
Khei yingasikei mütshuongei haoen sepeian kao sühla haujembo longchem leikei, lausikei haoenei athük, aishanga haoen limbo deishou aei aei ong longkei.
Hibü haoenei
Hibü haoenei Jona leibakei hoba yungnyua hao baman jinkukei, hoba yungnyu jembü khauang ka thakkei.

Kheijinei ngauyaangeibü shimung ka Jonaei
“Ngeibü khonsak ka ngei
Hobaje haoei kü to jongaikei;
Sheol shimung ka ngei ngekkei;
hoba nyi ngeibü ngüh ditkei.
Aishanga nyi ngo haübou ka
yungnyu chenyu to ngakei;

Kaibü deishou hoba kaibü deilo kü thük ka dankei.
Hobaje ngei laukei, ‘Ka the ka ngo apa;
ngei kaibü lembüchem aeto lai chühngaila?’
Kü langkei thüka deiei jonlepbei,
haülangbüei ngo kailepan kikei;

Ngo shonghyou sühko koukei;
kaodakei ngo thangtetbüei
ponpen shanga kü thüka khinlepan apbei.

kheijinei ngei

Khümenbü
Hobaje
Hobaje
“Meimeiashi, sangnyu yaangbü Ninevi khüto hauashi, hoba ngei ka la sakkubü songlen ngüh khüto ngekashi.”
Hibü Jona meimeikei hoba
Hobaje Jonaei nyetche lam sangnyu to atla khangkei hoba haoei ngekko laukei, “Ninevi mautila touje chalou saonyi ong kia!”
Hobaje Ninevi mütshuongei Mühghaü to mailembei, hoba haoenei mühei nyengbü che huiletkei hoba haoen yaangbou ka hanboutham sühko senounei neikei.
Hobaje ngühlang khoei Nine- vi choba sühkei hoba hao choba setshang ka meimeikei hoba hao ka chobaeibü neisimei hangletkei hoba senounei neikei, hoba tapa setkei.
Hobaje haoei ngekletkei, hoba Ninevi nyakko hai lauko phinkei: “Müt yingsikei, meisiau yingsikei, masu yingsikei, lon yingsikei, ailakei teshauteyungti.
Lausikei müt hoba meisiau ham la senounei neitishi, hoba Mühghaü to kaang ngektiashi; haü, haoen haoeneibü ik shatyobü ka hoba haoen mütpem weko amaibü lam ka sepeitiashi.
Aingenyu, sen amaulabü lele Mühghaü maangpon sepeilabü hoba hao kaangbüsekbü khauang ka sepeilakei aoei ngekei?”
Hobaje Mühghaüei haoen amaibü lamnyu ka sepeibü kümsilei hapbei. Hibü Mühghaüei, haoei haoen to kümlabü dogo laubü amaibü ka maangpon sepeikei; hoba haoei kho aküm.
Lausikei khoei Jona aeibou khauangkei, hoba hao maangpokkei.
Lausikei haoei
Hibü tou, O
Hobaje
Kheijinei Jona sangnyu ka satkei, hoba sangnyu chaangboua setkei; hoba hao shanga kho yeme phanga sangnyu kho aila yeilaje kho haoei ühüpshongko setan kiteikei.
Hobaje
Lausikei nyibounyet langngejinei Mühghaüei yang che lamlekei, hoba khoei amlüh to taksi kho yuian apbei.

Hobaje ladang chanyu longkei Mühghaüei chaangbou yei aubü che lamlekei, hoba Jonaeibü khua chanyuei juoksi khei hao semthetnyu apbei, hoba haila sukeijakei, hoba laukei, “Kü shanga lang akiko haian apbü ong khaibou.”
Hobaje Mühghaüei Jona to laukei, “Amlüh shangabü no khauangla janbü sai?”
Hobaje haoei jongaiko laukei, “Ngo hailabü lele khauangla janbü ki!”
Hobaje
Khülongaje Ninevi sangnyu sangyaang khütetche, laonei do angebü nashou ongkei müt hajar saongaoto saoche, hoba samkeisamuk juongnyu ki, khüto ngei aonoulep lo?”
Ditashi, O phangshuong, kan pendouei maangsangashi, O kaodak, hoba khünei kibü pendou, hoba
Aishanga chühashi,
Hobaje hao phanga shongh shuong tühnyinlabü hoba wan thedanga naolep tegü laanglak ka dei langjung koubü tegü, pholi shuong kho janyinlabü.
Ho pendou Jakob ngühkhüm leilubü hoba Israel chemdang shabü haangjung ki. Jakobei ngühkhüm leilubü ai ki? Kho Samaria aying lo? Jihudabüeibü shabü ai? Kho Jerusalem aying lo?
Hibü ngei Samaria khongthua onshaibü ontou che semlüh bamang keshang ongshang yeitilabü, hoba saoeibü laangshang ngei yomang to khüpan koutilabü hoba khoeibü chemshang lamenlabü.

Hobaje saoeibü noksa kümbü pendou netla yeiko ngümnyinkulabü hoba saoeibü lamshaibü pendou wanei lonan aplabü, hoba saoeibü heangsho pendou ngei litham phokulabü aishanga pejapelabü shuongei lamshaibü ka saoei khübü kho yoshaikei hoba pejapelako lamshaibü jungto khübü kho sepeilabü.
Kho shanga ngo mang haaplabü hoba wilabü, ngo youkong hoba mütkong haulabü, selong tegü ngo wilabü, hoba ostrik au tegü mang haaplabü.
Aishanga saoeibü mou maila athük, aishanga kho Jihuda tokei loua, khoei kü mütli bakhün, khei Jerusalem sühlanga.
Gada kho telen, hansho ongkei tühaap, Beth Leafraa kan lolo thamngua lekeiashi.
O Shafirbü, kan mütkong hoba himoua danjung hauashi. Zanaubü, kan telong, Beth-Ezel haapbüei ka ka kishang sungngailabü.
Aishanga Marotbü maibü shanga maangdakko haiyeida, aieilausi Jerusalem bakhün sühko
O Lakhishbü, koli you sobü la kailong phenkuashi. Zion nou- yangshou shuong shanga shabü khangshang kho kan kikei, aishanga Israel ngühkhüm leilubü kan to hapbei.
Hibü bangbü jongsak Moreshet Gat la nyi kulabü. Israelbü Choba shuong shanga Akzib chemdang kho khüpetbü ki.
O Mareshabü, kan thükto lason thükbü che ngei leian loulabü, Israelbü soneikangbü Adulam sühko kei loulabü.
No lolo khüngkheashi hoba kaibü khu shuan apashi, nyi maangshikbü shousinasi shanga hogon phatko no lolo khüng kheashi, aieilausi haoen ka jungka langsenbü to haulabü.
Aoyouei shedbü shabü daman chühda hoba yepshanga amaibü huon takda haoen shanga ügütü! Ngeyang lang ngejinei haoenei kho kümda, aieilausi kho haoeneibü ikeibü haua ki.
Haoenei sek maangdühda, hoba khübü kho soda; hoba chem shuongkei sunglangkuda. Haoenei sekmoubü hoba haoeibü chem, müt che hoba haoeibü phetphan soda.
Khoei
Kho chalou sühjinei mütshuongei kan shang- abü tetlatala leko laueikulabü, hoba ho waangbü manghaap chia laulabü:
Kün lemailela lusaka!
Hobaje kho kün langsenbü shuong la kuan apa.”
Hibü ladang kaonyu kho
Mütshuongei hai lauko kü la songlenda, “Kün la song telenbü.” Habü pendou shangabü song telen. Mühghaüei kün ihimoutilabü.
Israel mütshuong shedsikhau che phanga kia dogo nyi damda lao?
Kü mütli yaksa shuong kanei haoen chem maibü ka shian sattida; haoeneibü shousi shuong ka ponpen shanga ngeibü soneikangbü kanei sunglangda.
Kan pianlemashi hoba hauashi; aishanga ho kaneibü hakso shanga aying, aieilausi ihinseibü haangjung, kan maang nganglabü maubüei maulabü.
“Müt cheei yepeijaweko hoba ngüh phakphak lauko, ‘Ngei ka la ih si nyakidei shangabü thusei ngüh lenlabü,’ dogo laualonga khübü kho ong mütlieibü thuseibou la lelabü!

“O Jakob, kan pendou, ngei maimaitham kamshaitilabü, maimaitham ngei Israel joubü leishailabü; Bozra sanshuong tegü ngei haoen liko phokulabü. Hobaje sanshuong kibü lamshaushang tegütham mütshang yaang ngühbüei ngei kaonyek shentilabü.”
Haoen thedangto leilutibou anga, haoenei bakhün tuyetlabü hoba khoto satlabü, haoen thedangto
Hobaje ngei laukei, Sanoudambo ditashi, kan Jakobeibü leiyeibü hoba Israel chemdang kabü songdakbü shuong. Kanei ngühmai ngejan aying lo?
Kanei maibü mangsenda hoba amaibü sanouda. Kanei mütli langkeia khon oda hoba lo ka phejak oda.
Kanei kü mütli phe shauda, kanei haoeneibü khon oda, lo nyintida hoba chaka thunglabü phe tegü netla yeiko jemnyinda.
Kanei
Kü mütli ayinglamto leibü thuseibü shuongei, haoen la okbü inbü shuong la hakso theletkuda, lausikei haoen la akubü dan laje lasonei hatlenda. Khübü thuseibü shuong to
“Thuseibü shuong, kan shanga chalou dankhümda; kan thükto mangsang akiko nangnak loulabü hoba yem ashanenlabü lele nakthüh kaangbü loulabü.”
Thulenbü shuong himou shaulabü hoba yemshanbü shuong maang- panglabü. Haoen pendou sembung yemleplabü, aieilausi Mühghaüei haoen to ajoyolabü.
Lausikei Jakob chemdang to haoeibü ngühkhüm leilubü hoba Israel to haoeibü shabü shanga ngetila
Ho sanoudambo ditashi, kan Jakob chemdang leiyeibü shuong, Israel chemdang songdakbü shuong, kan ngühmai mangsenbü hoba tükdebü koletko songdakbü shuong.
Kanei siiei Zion hoba shedbüei Jerusalem dangda.
Leiyeibü shuongei besa shanga mat jemda, hoba ungshedbou shuongei mu kubüei songlenda hoba haoeibü thuseibü shuongei nam shanga lauda. Khei yingankei
Hibü kan laüa Zion sek tegü laünyinlabü, hoba Jerusalem leilubü tokenbü che yeilabü hoba lembüchem shongh kho lamang shongh tegü kilabü.
Phaianyu ho tegü haüthüklabü,
khei
hoba phangshuong khüto kamshailabü.
Hobaje phang juong loulabü hoba laulabü,
“Kaiya,
hoba Jakob Mühghaü chem to angkho;
hoba haoei haoeibü lamnyu shuong sen la lenlabü,
hoba haoeibü lamnyua sen pailabü.
Aishanga Zion ka ngühkhüm hoba Jerusalem ka
Hobaje haoei phang juong yoa mat jemlabü
hoba saabüa hau kibü phangshuong shanga janenkulabü.
Hobaje haoenei jembü inei shap yaülabü
hoba aubu laangku la janglabü,
phangei phang khulimbo in atuoklabü,
ayingsi touje haoenei wapyobü aditletlabü.
Lausikei haoen mütpem weko jembü semlüh long
hoba bhuklong phanga setlabü;
hoba aoeikei haoen ühüttilabü,
aishanga kho Thukenbou
Aishanga phang pendouei lulueibü mühghaü nyena paida, lausikei sen seneibü Mühghaü
hoba sokebü shuong kho ngei jouletbü yeitilabü, hoba shian sattian kibü shuong kho hau kibü phang che yeitilabü, hoba tou ka, hoba ponpen thon akibü shanga haoen thüka Zion shongha
Hobaje no, O sanshuongeibü lapheishon, Zion nouyangshoueibü shonghshou, shaangbü Choba sangle songdakbou, Jerusalem nouyangshou sangle ka jungto loulabü.
Tou no aila ngüh angko kaang haapda? Kan yoa Choba akisai? Ayingsi na hapjinei tegü khonkuei kan sühlabü lele kan la songsido maibü kubü maukei sai?
O Zion nouyangshou, yaksa na hapjinei khonkubü tegü menei- ashi hoba wiashi, aishanga tou no sangnyu ka satlabü, hoba khongthua kilabü hoba no Babilon sühkokei haulabü; khünei no khümenlabü, khünei
Hobaje tou phang juong no khulimbo kamshailabü hoba lauda, “Sao asaopoko yeitishi, hoba seneibü nyekei Zion to tangko chühtiashi!”
Lausikei haoenei

“Meimeiashi, hoba ngünashi, O Zion nouyangshou! Aishanga ngei kaibü laang namkung la yeitikulabü, hoba ngei kaibü youdem chisak nam la yeitikulabü hoba nyi müt juong jeinyinlabü.” Nyi haoeneibü peisilei soletbü shuong kho
Tou kan shuong kamshaiashi, O sepai tan nouyangnyu, haoei sen khulimbo komlepan kia, haoenei Israel matjembou to amlanga namjuei ngümlabü.
Lausikei no, O Bethlehem Efrata, no Jihuda chung lühbaka wean jinla yongko hansikei ka ka kü shanga Israel thüka songdakbou che longlabü, aoeibü thensilen pijihboujiha thama ki.
Hibü ao na hapla khonkuda, saoei bukbü jih asühshongko haoei haoen khei apyolabü kho Israel jungto sepeinyu loulabü.
Hobaje hao loulabü hoba

Hobaje ho seneibü solo yinglabü, ladang Assiriabü seneibü kaonyek to lotlaje, ladang haoei seneibü Choba chem to youei naketlaje, kheijinei hao khulimbo senei sanlombü nyet hoba leiyeibü set phonlabü.
Hobaje haoenei inei Assiriabü kaonyek leilutikulabü, hoba Nim- rod kaonyek in japan lomlabü, hoba ladang Assiriabü sen kaodak to lotlaje hoba seneibü leilanga naksühlaje haoei sen khümenlabü.
Hobaje Jakobeibü jouletbü müt juong yoa

Hobaje Jakob jouletbü phangshuong yoa müt juong yoa yamkabü meisiau yoa molosaonyu tegü hoba sanshuong yoa molosaonyu paang che tegü kilabü aoei hao danko paithetda, khümenlabü aokei akiko nakan yantida hoba netla yeiko jitnyinda.
Kaibü dangbou shuong thüka kaibü ik tuoktiashi, hoba kaibü dangbou pendou wapan apbuashi.
Hobaje kho chalou ho kühshuoklabü dogo
Hobaje kaneibü sangnyu shuong wapan aplabü hoba kaneibü lapheishon shuong tuongtikulabü.
Hobaje kaibü ik ka seibüyaübü ngei wapan apbulabü hoba no touje thusei kümsilei kümbü shuong akilabü.
Hobaje ka ka ngei kaibü kümbü noksa hoba kaibü saopobü thaonyu shuong wapan apbulabü, hoba touje kaibü ikküm iklei nyi alemlabü.
Ka ka ngei kaibü Ashera koikoi lühan aplabü, hoba kaibü sangnyu shuong ngei mautilabü.
Hobaje ngüha alebü phangshuong thükto ngo khau angbü hoba khau lotbüei phoklamlabü.”
O kan shongh shuong, hoba lo leko kibü kaodak chemshang,
O kü mütli, ngei ka to ai kümbei? Kü khu limbo aukabü kuashi.
Aishanga Ijep kaodak ka ngei no leiyenkei, hoba aao chem ka no angthetkei, hoba ka thedangto Mosa, Aron hoba Miriam hautikei.
“O kü mütli, Moab Choba Balakei ai huonkei hoba Beoreibü shou Balaamei hao to ai jongaikei; tou damenashi, khei
Ai jungan ngo
Sanlon paang hajar juongei ayingsi onang shumang koubü hajar anei
O müt, ai maibü ki kho haoei ka to lena. Ngühmaang lanko kümla hoba üei sanoula hoba ka Mühghaü yoa eaaoa pailabü to liman
to hatlabü kho songsihon. Haoei sangnyu to ngako lauda, “Ditashi, kan sangnyua kambü shuong!
Amaibü mütshuongeibü chema haoenei maang alanko thanshaibü nyaksinam ki. Haoenei ngei mangsenbü yepeijawebü seret takbü jungeida.
Amlangbü takbü hoba seret aonko haubü mütshuong la ngei lai amai apbula thükkei?
Kaneibü keijeibü danei shale jonglebü khüpettida, hoba kan pendou yepeibü ong ki.
Hibü ngei kaneibü shedbü shabü laüa kan shemtila hoba leilutila khanga.
Kanei shaulabü lausikei senyüh ashemlabü; kan mühei haiko ong kilabü. Kanei peisilei thanlabü lausikei yoshaian apholabü; kanei ai ong thanshailaje kho ngei wapyoa khümtilabü.
Kanei wenlabü lausikei youman alatlabü; kanei oliv buhek semlabü lausikei onang nyi ladangkei anaangoulabü.

Aieilausi kanei Omrieibü ngühkhüm hoba Ahab chemdang kümsilei pendou jungeida, hoba haoeneibü huona kan paida. Hibü ngei no sangliphang la yeitilabü, hoba ka mütshuongei hüi, dogo laulabü lele yeitilabü, kho tegü phangshuongei nyikubü kanei kümlabü.”
Kü shanga ügütü! Aishanga sulang buhek heshaikhümbü tegü hoba semlüh seka shen maabü tegü ngo ki; shaulabü shen aki, kü soushouei shaang sembü buhek maangdak aki.
Mühghaü to hatbü kaodak ka maua, hoba ngühmaang lanbü aokei aki. Haoen pendouei sii angtila haiyeida, haoen mütpem wekoei sung jungan jembü jaisina shieida.
Amaibü kümlabüa sokosepbo haoenei ikphen lamakei, leiyeibü shuong hoba matjembü shuongei besa hida, hoba yaangenbü mütshuongei amaibü mangsühda lauda, kho tegü haoenei kho liko hokshaida.
Haoen yoa maiboutham kho bijak tegü ki; pendou to tangbou kho ba lebü jaklong amaibou him.
Kaibü lapheibou chalou süha kaibü kayang lousüha; tou haoen panglang phenyembüa kilabü.
Lepbou to ayingsi lamshuok yen to maang telem; kaibü koukhüna sao thedanga kaibü sembung küpjemshi.
Aishanga jayangshouei bou ühangenda, nouyangshouei nyu khu limbo, hoba namshaunyuei nyu khulimbo meimeida. Müt cheeibü dangbou shuong kho jembü chemdang kabü mütshuong ki.
Lausikei ngeije
Kü khu limbo tüolinyo, O ngeibü dangbou shuong, ngo tuongsikei ngo loenlabü, ngo nakthüha setsikei
Haoei kümat ajemshongko hoba kü shanga ngühmai aküm shongko ngei
Kheijinei ngeibü dangbouei kho haplabü, hoba aoei
Kaibü ba kümthang kümetlabü chalou! Kho chaloua leilang lounyu hoba tham yeitilabü.
Kho chaloua Assiria ka Ijep sühko hoba Ijep ka shumang sühko, hoba shongh ka shongh sühko, haoen ka jungto loulabü.
Khei yingasikei mütshuong hoba haoenei kümenbü buhek shuong shanga kaodak kho sangliphanga kilabü.
Kaibü phetphan sanlon shuong ka mütli aoyou bamang kao jenyua lamanga chem kida khübü kho lambo kaibü juei leiyeiashi; shangiedbü jihsiphai tegü haoen Bashan hoba Gileada samtishi.
No Ijep kaodak ka longbü chaloua tegü ngei hao to seikümseilei lenlabü.
Phangshuongei haplabü hoba haoeneibü hau pendou shanga himouan aplabü; haoenei jembü ikei sembunga yemlabü, haoen obanglabü.
Pinyuei tegü haoenei thamngu selabü; kaoa paibü yangsikok meisiau tegü haoenei saklepan kibü jembü kishang ka sensentham lühko longlabü, haoen hatbü lühbüei
Jembü phetphan joubü shanga hoba ngühkhüm leilubü inletnyu phokulabü lele shedbü shabü apbubü no phatbü Mühghaü ao ki? No ponpen jembü khauanga akida, aishanga no üeisanoua olinda.
No nyibou sepeilabü hoba kün thükto onou kilabü, hoba küneibü shedbü nyi you phanga naklepnyu apyolabü; pendou yungnyu haübüa jinan apbulabü.
Hobaje shangiedbü chaloua nyi küneibü pisibou to thekubü tegü Jakob la maanglembü hoba Abraham la üeisanou kulabü.
Ninevi shangabü mangsang. Ho Elkosh kabü Nahumei hapbü mangsang le.
hoba phoklambü Mühghaü,
hoba khauang maangpokei shenbüa kia;
hoba haoeibü labou shuong shanga
haoei khauang maangpok phoda.
hoba hau yaangbü hoba
ai jihdangakei ashiakoeko adantilabü.
Mühghaü yeia hoba yeinaka
hoba sangmei shuong kho haoeibü youeibü thamngu ki.
Haoei yungnyu to hakda hoba kho haptida!
Hobaje shumang pendou haoei haptida.
Bashan si Garmel yuida hoba Lebanon chipen eletda.
Hao thedanga shongh shuongei nyaakeida,
hoba shonghshou tühnyinda hao thedanga kaodak lühda;
kaodak hoba khünei kibü pendou.
Hao khau lotbü thedanga aoei loenla?
hoba hao khau kaang lotjinei aoei natenla?
Haoeibü khauang wan tegü hakletda,
hoba laang shuong haoei setnyinda.
hau kibü lapheishon che
hoba aoyouei hao to maanglem phoda haoei ngeda.
Lausikei sopbo koubü yungsenei hao khulimbü shuong
langhlangko thonan aptilabü, hoba nakthühbü hauei
haoeibü labou shuong shieilabü.
haoei langhlangko thontilabü, haoei dangbou shuong to
nyinei sühko phok alamlabü.
Jakba tegü kaoen kiasikei youkung linbü tegü
haoen lemailela leilulabü.
ei hai lauda, Hao hauki yaangkibü hoba juong yingasikei haoen wapan aplabü, hoba danjung haulabü. Ngei no khonkutiasikei ngei touje no khon akutilabü.
Hobaje tou ngei ka ka buleng leilutikulabü, hoba kaibü khühbü thettikulabü.

Aoei shongha ngühlang maibü sungbada hoba sangmai ngekletkuda, haoeibü you khüto chühashi! Kaibü lemsilang liashi, O Jihuda, kaibü theletbü kümashi; aishanga no khulimbo amaibü adamlabü haoei lepde wapan apa!
Aoei netla yeiko phetnyintida hao ka thedanga longa; wapyobü peisilei lamleashi, lamnyu khonei thoashi! kaibü shembe kaiashi! kaibü hau pendou jangngaiashi!
Aishanga Israel yaangenbü tegü
Haoeibü lakjaibü shuong aih saklangbü ki, maangkaangbü mütshuong nakthüngan saklangbü neisimei leakei; hao lamlebü chaloua kailong shuong son ponponda hoba hatlamoklabü che aubu shuong kho lepda.
Kailong shuong khonga pongyoda, cheei che to kakyoko khongthua haoen hau longei dogo leda, haoen chühla wanthung tegü, langpon tegü haoen laangyoda.
Sonenbü shuong haoei ngashaida, haoen paijinei phaiyetda, kümthang to haoen panteida hoba namlang tokshang kho lamlesapan phoda.
Shumang koukhün shuong ipda hoba Chobaeibü chem kho hatbü mokbüa kida.
Huzzab mütkong kia; sao langsena, hoba saoeibü medei shuongei guduru wibü tegü khukua jangko mang haapda.
Lausikei shangied ka Ninevi thimdei che phatko kia, khei yingasikei haoen satda, “Loashi! Loashi!” dogo haoenei ngekda; lausikei aoeikei sepeian achühda.
Kanei chandinam soletbü kho sungashi! hon soletbü kho leashi! aishanga namsek peisilei pendou ayingsi nyaksinam thon akiko ki!
Sao kongkong, ai aki, hoba maangpon tühnyinan hoba youkük püpyoan, küksiho pendou haian, thenyek pendou phaklaktham yeida!
Molosaonyu paangshou samshang, molosaonyu paang hoba molosaonyu nyunyu paishang shoushou hanbü kishang lanei ki?

Molosaonyu paangei jembü shou shanga shausiyung souko jitnyinkua hoba nyunyu shanga haitibü meisiau nyatettikukei; haoei haoeibü laangbob haitibü meisiauei hoba haoeibü laangchem phe shaknyinbüei shentikei.
Chühashi, “Ngo ka khulimbo kia,” dogo lakjaibou
Ho yepeijawebü hoba soshausoyungbü peisilei shanga kia, wapyosuyobü thonan achühda!
Lühei sembü ngühlang hoba kailong langh, koli toman shatko laangbü, kailong saiyeiko paibü;
Koli sepai setbü in lepbü hoba aubu lepbü hoba haitibü mangjim juong thanshaian kibü hoba haibü mang thonbü thakbü aki, haoen haibü mang thüka haoen phaiyetda.

Hobaje pendou kho asangalanbü shuong thüka asangalanbü thedüh maangdüh hoba seibüyaübü kakbü aoei phangshuong la asangalanbü shuongei huonettida hoba mütshuong saoeibü themai maangmai lenko khüpettikei.
“Chühashi, Ninevi, ngo kakhu limbo kia!” dogo Thükenbü
Ngei ka la mak hambulabü hoba no awealauko jungeilabü hoba no nyek pükshang che yeitilabü.
Ka to chühbü pendouei ka ka satlabü, hoba laulabü, “Ninevi leiluan inleda, sao shanga aoei mang haapbula? ngei laka sao la haksotibou lambula?”
Saoeibü kümthang kho dei hoba saoeibü lapheishon kho yungnyu che, dogo sao kaijembo dei Nail nyangko tenan kibü Thebes toje maibou sai?
Saoeibü hau Ethiopia si Ijep kikei, hoba kho thon akitei, Put si Lubia saoeibü khangenbou kikei.

Khei yingasikei sao sunglangkei, sao thüngshang to haukei, saoeibü shousi shuong khonga lambheka netla yeiko phetnyinkei hoba saoeibü yaangenbü shuong shanga haoenei phaang pakkei hoba saoeibü yaangbü müt pendou namlühei khühkei.
Tokei no jaaklabü, no hulabü, labou shuong ka nyi satetshang lamlabü.
Lapheishon pendou shaang sembü bhuk hekbü bhuklong tegü kilabü, haoen nyaakeia longa shaubou sembung to khübü kho atda.
Chühashi kaibü sepai shuong shanga kaneibü kaodak bakhün hopatham ipakei, wanei kaibü koukhin suia.
Sang shibü shanga dei khushaiashi, kaibü la- pheishon shuong hau kingaiashi, shungkung kao khüto atashi shungkung kao kho dotashi, juoklaang yaüenbü khünei ik- phen lamashi!
Khünei wanei no suilabü, inei no wapan attilabü, koksüng pühbüei tegü khoei no suian aplabü, no lolo koksüng tegü haashi, koksüng tegü no lolo juong yeiashi.
Nyi kaibü namseibü shuong müha khanshoulitshou shuong tokei juongbou haatikei, koksüngei leilutikuda hoba pijung satda.
Kaibü leiyeibü shuong koksüng phatko kia, kaibü dobou shuong kham chaloua ba youa onshaian kibü koksüng shuong phatko ki, hoba ladang chanyu longlaje haoen pijung satda; haoen lan ki kishang angeda!
O Assiria Choba, kaibü sanlombü shuong yepakei, kaibü yaangbü shuong ngakda, kaibü mütli shuong shongha phinnyinan kia, hoba khübü leishaila ao aki.
Ka la akbü haksotilabüje aki; kaibü moukhün yaangsepa. Kaibü ngühlang ditbü pendouei ka la ik ipbuda. Aishanga ao thüktoje kaibü thonsithak akibü amaibü kümsileiei asühko ki?
Ho
O
Aila shedbü kümbü nyi kü la haptida? hoba kü la khonsak haptida? Aishanga leilutibü hoba ikshatyobü küthedanga kia, hoba tokyobü kia, hoba senyobü longda.
Hibü ngühkhüm nyungakei hoba ngühmai alongtida, aishanga amaibü shuongei saopobü shuong komlepda, hibü matjembü ayingbü to longda.
Kheijinei
Aishanga ditashi, ngei Khaldibü amaibü hoba sobüsepbü phang phonlabü, hoba kishang laobou haoeneibü aying kho sungla kaodak shoongko haoen paida.
Haoen hatlamoklabü matjem hoba yaangenbü haoen jembü lolo ka longtida.

“Haoeneibü koli kongkhü tokei you sobou hoba chasembü sho shuong tokei aei sekokbou hoba haoeneibü koli sepai shuong haoen lolo sodasepda haü, haoeneibü koli sepai shuong saabü ka louda, hogonei suila panteiko haubü tegü haoenei seengeida.
“Haoen pendou ikshatyola louda; haoeneibü thedang ae yeiko chanyu angbou aei yeian kia hoba haoenei langsenbü shuong kho phetsen tegü leishaida.
Hobaje haoenei Choba shuong nyikuda hoba songdakbü shuong haoen thedanga ekyola leda, hoba lapheishon pendou haoenei nyikuda, aishanga haoenei kao ongenan mailemda hoba kao leda.
Kheijinei haoenei yei tegü souda hoba danda hoba shedbü mütshuong yuktila haoeneibü hau kho jembü mühghaü la yeitida.”
O

Amaibü to chühla kaibü nyek yongko hinseikei hoba shedbü kümbü to nyi chühla athük, khülonga nyi aila khüpbo langko jungeibü shuong to ong chühda, hoba amaibüei müt ao hao tokei saopobü ki, hao sujinei aila ngüh üangda?
Aieilausi nyi yungnyu ngao hoba shoongaibü meisiau aoyou thüka songdakbü aki haoen tegü mütshuong yeitida.
Haoei haoen pendou ngauyaüjinei tegü senenda, hoba haoei haoeibü taka haoen lapda, hoba haoeibü taka senshaida hibü hao olinda hoba yaangenda.
Hibü haoei haoeibü tak la haitibü lembü kuda, hoba haoeibü tak la ponlem juokbü kuda, aieilausi khübü danko haoeibü phejan yaangbü hoba shausiyung apsileko ki.
Hibü haoei phangshuong haitila shanga tak kho athakko kongan pholep lo?
Ngo ngeibü lapheishona lolabü hoba ngo lolo lapheishona kilabü, hoba haoei kü to ailai jo- yolaje, hoba ngei maang ühaibüa haoei ai jongailaje ngei chühko haiteilabü.
Hobaje
Aishanga mangsang kho toukei jih pienbü jihsiphai shanga ki, hoba kho thonbü aeto panteida, hoba ayepeilabü, kho phaia tegükei, kho shanga haiyeiko kishi, aieilausi kho loulabü.
Chühashi, haoeibü soushou yonglamda hao mang atang, lausikei saopobü shuong mailemei lang kilabü.”

Maimaitham haü, ih kho khü- pet langettiko jungeibü ki, lilisese müt, ao chema akida, aoei jembü maangdak yemlam tegü yaangtida, hoba haibü tegü hao ki, hoba senyühshembo hao jungto phang pendou leishaida, hoba hao jungto müt pendou takshattida.

Habü pendouei hao khulimbo ngüh- phatbü che hoba hao khulimbo haklabü tetenbü leko ho khei alaulep lo? “Ao müt jembüeibü ayingbüei aei kiko keiko yeilaje hao ügütü! Lalokche keila? hoba kho hao lolo thebülanbü shuongei manko künda.?”
Ka to takla haoen mangde ong loulabü, hoba no seneila lakseplabü, hoba haoen thedanga no leilubü peisilei yeilep aying lo?
Aieilausi nyi phang juong leilutisije hoba mütshuong sii angtisije kaonyeka hoba sangnyu hoba khünei kibü pendou to phang pendouei no leilutikulabü.
Aoei jembü chemdang shanga amaibü ku sungbada, khei amaibü ik ka khümenla jembü hap thükaenei kümda, hao ügütü!
Phang juong wapan apbüei nyi kaibü chemdang to himou huonsiyou takkei, hoba ka soushou khulimbo shed shonkei.
Aishanga kümthang ka laangei ngeklabü, hoba bu ka phemei kho jongailabü.
Aoei sii angtibüei sang sangda hoba shedbüei sangnyu kümda hao ügütü!
Chühashi phangshuongei wan shanga kümbü kho hoba phangshuong amlangbü shanga hübü mangbü kho Thükenbou
Aishanga deiei yungnyu sopbü tegütham,
Aoei müla haoeneibü himou chühla shanga yunglabü laoboua kaibü khauang yeian jinkuan kuda, hoba toukei jaaktida hao ügütü.
Soneikangbü jeiko no himouei shenlabü, nyi yungashi hoba kipan üpbü che tegü kishi!

Aishanga Lebanon to ik shatbüei no küpleplabü hoba meisiau shuong mautibüei haoen hattilabü; mütshuong sii phinbü kaonyeka ik shatyobü, hoba sangnyua hoba khünei kibü pendou to kümbü haangjung khoei no küpleplabü.
“Heangsho noksa kümbüei kümbü ayingsi tühnyinbü heangsho, khüpbülangbü lenbou kho ai ku? Aishanga aoei ladang ngoubü heangsho kümda, haoei khünei maanglemda.
Aoei bu to, ‘Piashi!’ dogo hoba ngoubü laang to, ‘Laksepashi!’ dogo lauda, hao ügütü; khoei tang khitbü kulep sai? chühashi, kho hon si chandinamei naanglepan kia, hoba khonei hak aki.
Lausikei
Habakuk thuseibüei Shigionota welaubü che:
O
hoba kaibü kümsilei to ngo hatko loda.
O
po kanglanga kho ngetiashi.
Maangpokjinei onou damenashi.
Teman ka Mühghaü loukei hoba Paran shongh ka Saopobou loukei.
Haoeibü soneikangbüei müh,
hoba haoeibü nyensangei kaodak shenan kikei.
Ngesakbü tegü haoeibü soneikangbü kikei,
haoeibü ik ka jayou longkei;
hoba khünei haoeibü sei huan phokei.
Hao thedang to limsilang satkei,
hoba haoeibü you junga wan tegü shieikoe haukei.
Hao lokei hoba kaodak takan chühkei.
Haoei chühkei hoba phangshuong nyaakeikei.
Ponpen thon akinyu shongh shuong lintikei;
Ponpen kibü shonghshou shuong phangjung koukei;
haoei kümbü ponpen thon aki.
Ngei Kushan neichem shuong khonkua hapbei;
Midian kaodaka thangtet nei lühkei.
Yungnyu shuong khulimbo
Kaibü khauang longbü shumang shuong khulimbo kikei sai?
Ayingsi yungnyu khulimbo no maangshat kikei sai?
khei koli shuong thüka,
hoba thükbü kailong thüka, setlabü lele?
Kaibü laujin khek ka laujin sungenkei,
hoba lüha laujin khipbü phangshuong
to laubü maimaitham kikei.
Nyi shumang shuongei kaodak janyinda.
Shongh shuongei no hapbei hoba hatko kikei;
deinyu yeinak yaangbü danjung haukei.
Haülangbüei jembü ngühlang longtikei,
hoba haoeibü ik thükae to tonan angtikei.
Kaibü laujin shuong pijung haujinei
no lailaibü kaibü aubu sona chanyu si litnyuei
jembü kishanga atopeiko loyoan khüpbei.
No khau lotan kaonyek danko paikei,
nyi phangshuong khauang lotbüa nakeikei.
Kaibü mütli khümenbü shanga
kaibü pienbü shuong shanga no haukei;
Amaibou chem ka nyi ju ngümnyinkukei,
youshi ka ngüm sühko mütkong phokukei.
Haoeneibü lakjaibü shuong khu
nyi jembü aubuei sepyetkukei.
Ngo lintila haoen kü jungto mühghaü yei tegütham loukei;
haoen olinyobü kho huphanga shalebü shuong suila shanga kiteikei.
Nyi kaibü koli shuongei yungnyu deilo yaangbü to nakeikei.
Ngei ditkei hoba ngeibü mang lühkei.
Ngühlangei ngeibü sembung khop lühda;
ngeibü lo to shat longda
hoba ngeibü kishanga ngo lühkei,
khei haoen shila mütli shuong khulimbo loubü
khonku chalou shanga ngei haiyeilabü.
Aishanga bhuklonga pon aponsikei,
semlüh longa hek akisikei,
Oliv bulongei lang ahekkusikei;
sanlon shuong ka sanlon wapan apbusikei,
hoba masu chema masu tan tan akisi dogokei.
Khei yingsikei ngo
ngei ngeibü khümenbü Mühghaü to olinlabü.
Mühghaü
hoba haoei ngeibü you meishieibü you tegü yeitikuda,
hoba ngo ngeibü shongha paitida.
Jihudabü Choba Amoneibü shou Josia haanga
“Kao thüka ngei pendou lepde mautilabü, dogo
Ngei müt si meisiau shemtilabü, müh kabü aushuong hoba yungnyu kabü ngau shuong shemtilabü, hoba ngei amaibü shuong tuongtilabü, hoba kaonyu ka ngei müt wapan aplabü, dogo
“Jihudabü thükto hoba Jerusalema kibü shuong thükto ngei ngeibü ik shinglabü, hoba ho kishang ka ngei Baal thon leko joubü hoba heangsho lembü ungshedbou shuong nyen,
hoba chemdaka müh kabü chanyu, litnyu hoba khanshoulitshou to khüpetbü shuong, hoba aoyouei
hoba aoyouei
eibü haitibü chaloua ho hai yinglabü, khei ngei leiyeibü shuong hoba Chobaeibü shousi shuong hoba küksithangeibü neisimei lebü mütpem weko shieinangeilabü.
Aoyouei khonga sai- yeida hoba haoeneibü bunyu chem ik shatyobü hoba khüpbü langbüei shentida haoen pendou ngei kho chaloua shieinangeilabü.
Lemenashi, kan Mortara kibü mütshuong pendou maulabü; chandinam kümbü pendou wapan aplabü!
“Hobaje kho chaloua ngei hantin jungan Jerusalem lamlabü, aoyou ho phatan sangsemetnyu ki, khei aoyoueibü maangpona

Hobaje haoeneibü nyaksinam mauto janlabü, hoba haoeneibü chem shuong sangliphang la yeilabü; haü, haoenei chem danglabü lausikei khübünei akilabü, hoba haoenei semlüh sek moulabü lausikei khüka haoenei semlüh ih ayunglabü.”
Kho chalou kho maangpokbü chalou, khonkulabü hoba maangto shatlabü chalou leilubü hoba maushangdanglabü chalou, sangmei hoba nakshou naknyu chalou.
Lapheishon kümbü sangnyu shuong hoba lapheishon suokbü shuong khulimbo teklaang metbü hoba lason uihinbü chalou ki.
Kan lolo liko kamshaiashi; haü, chela takshatashi, O himou akakbü phang;
youshou sho tegü souan aplabü chalou alousühjinei, kan thükto
Kaodaka sembüambü kan pendou aoyouei haoeibü sakkubü ngühkhüm jungeida,
Aishanga Gaza inletlabü hoba Ashkelon mauto janlabü, changea haoenei Ashdod shian aplabü, hoba Ekron li ka pheian aplabü.
Yungkou nyangko kibü mütshuong Karetbü phang ügütü!
Hobaje yungko kho lamshaushang, sanlombü shuong shanga laangbob hoba san shuong shanga chem yinglabü.
Hobaje yungko kho joubü Jihudabü mütli shanga kilabü, khonei haoeneibü shatsinam lamshautilabü. Ashkelon mütli haoen chasemlamto leketnyu yepan kilabü; aishanga
Moabei hakbülaubü, Ammon shousi shuongei awealaubü, laobouei haoenei jembü mütli to hakkei hoba haoeneibü leilanga kibü khulimbo jembü lolo yaangenkei, ngei dida.
Hibü Israel Mühghaü, Thükenbou
Haoen yonglam lilibü shanga haoeneibü thu ho yinglabü aieilausi Thükenbou
Haoen khulimbo
Kan Ethiopiabükei ngeibü inei wapettilabü.
Hobaje yungkük ae khulimbo haoeibü ik shinglabü hoba Assiria mautilabü, hoba haoei Ninevi sangliphang phetsen kao hoba ulangbü tekan apbü che tegü yeitilabü.

Hobaje sao jenyua meisiau shuong pendou lekeitilabü, hogon si san saoeibü sangnyua thünglabü; ukhoungbaei kouloma wilabü, koukhüna aukhomakmakei wilabü, aishanga saoeibü cedar bu kho lengtian phokulabü.

Jembü lolo ong, “Ngo kia, kü to limbo ao aki,” dogo laubü olinbü sangnyu kho ho ki. Sao lai sangliphang yamkabü meisiau thüngshang la yeian ki! Sao nyangko danbü wekoei sao la nyikuda hoba jembü ik semyoan jungda.
Songdak khulimbo lobü hoba shaan apbü, shieinangeibü sangnyu sao shanga ügütü!
Saoei ngüha ale; tangtikubü saoei asunglet, saoei
Saoeibü songdak leiyeibü shuong sao thedanga ngühko kibü molosaonyu shuong ki; saoeibü matjembü shuong nangnakbü selong shuong ki; haoenei ngeyang sühko aikei joutian aphokuda.
Saoeibü thuseibü shuong pejapela hoba mailem akibü mütshuong saoeibü ungshedbou shuongei lemshang shatikei; ngühkhüm akibü mütshuong; ngühkhüm to haoen ik atda.
Hao to

Ngei laukei, “Maimaitham haoei kü to hatlabü, haoei ngei tangtibü sungletlabü; hibü sao kishang aleilulabü; lausikei ngei sao shieinangeilabü, lausikei haoenei tongde meimeikei hoba haoenei kümbü pendou totnyinkukei.
“Hibü shieinangeibü ngo meimeibü chalou asüh shongko kanei kü shanga haiyeiko kishi” dogo
“Aishanga kheijinei ong chikung ngühkung cheei hao khangenlabü, khei haoen pendouei
Ethiopia shumang shuong danjung hauan, yungkük kao saabü ka phinthon- an kibü ngeibü nouyangshousi shuongei kü jungto lembü jungan loulabü.

Kho chaloua ainei ong nyi kükhu limbo ngühkhüm leilukei, nyi kümbü pendou shanga no himouko akilabü; aishanga kheijinei ngei kan yo ka yonglambo yaangenbü shuong sungan aplabü, hoba touje kanei ladangkei ngeibü saopobü shongha yaangenko hoba lilisesea akilabü.
Aishanga ngei kan yoa eaaoabü sembüambü mütshuong hoba shalebü mütli phokulabü hoba haoenei

Jouan kibü Israelei shedbü akümlabü ayingsi amlang ngüh alaulabü, ayingsi haoeneibü sembunga khüpettibü lishang ühüplabü, aishanga haoenei shaulabü hoba leketnyu yeplabü, hoba aoeikei hao ühüt amoktilabü.”
O Zion nouyangshou chia lauashi,
O Israel!
Ngekashi, maangpon pendouei olinashi
hoba olinangko kiashi,
O Jerusalem nouyangshou!
haoei kaibü dangbou shian apbua;
Israel, Choba khei
touje nyi amaibü to ühütlabü.
Kho chaloua Jerusalema laulabü;
“No tehüt, O Zion, kaibü ik nyibutham tekima.
haoei khümenlabü;
olinbüei ka thüka olin angko kilabü,
haoei haoeibü sanoua hakso kilabü,
ka thüka haoei chia lauko olinlabü.
Kaneibü lemalanga maangmau tetletbü,
ngei kuktikulabü; kan la nyikubü ngei sungan apbulabü.
Chühashi, kho chaloua kan shieinangeibü
pendou to ngei kümlabü.
Ngei sokebü khümenlabü,
hoba shian apbü shuong leishailabü.
Hobaje kaodak pendoua himoua kibü ngei haoen
nyenshen yeitilabü hoba nyen sangtilabü.
Kho chaloua ngei kan leingailabü,
hoba kho chaloua ngei kan leishailabü.
Aishanga ladang kan thüngshanga kaneibü thea
ngei nyibou leingailaje, ngei kan nyenshen yeitilabü
hoba kaodakbü mütli pendou yoa nyen sangtilabü,”
dogo
Darias Choba po nyiboua lit lakbou shaangbou nyet Jihudaa governor, Shealtieleibü shou Zerubabel jungto hoba ungshedbou Jihozadakeibü shou Joshua jungto thuseibou Hagai danko
Thükenbou
Kheijinei
“Ho chem leiluan phoan kan thenyoan dangbü chema kila kan shanga ho jih lo?
Hibü tou thükenbou

Kanei juong wenkei lausikei shisho ong sungkei, kanei shauda lausikei shi ashenda; kanei yungda lausikei maang aphamda, kanei neida lausikei aokei lemabüje aki. Aoei nam lamda, haoei neimok yetbüa jinla nam lambada.
Ho tegü Thükenbou
Shongh to angashi, hoba bu sungba hoba chem kho dangashi, hoba ngo khonei olinlabü hoba ngo soneikanglabü dogo
“Kanei juong hapla maanglembei, lausikei chühashi, kho shisho ong kikei, hoba kho kanei chem to sungbakei, hoba kho ngei metan apbukei. Aila? dogo Thükenbou
Hibü kan thüka mühei haoeibü nindei senetakei hoba kaonyuei jembü hek senet- akei.
Hobaje kaonyek thükto hoba shongh shuong thükto hoba youshou thükto, hoba semlüh thükto, hoba onang thükto, hoba samkeisamuk thükto hoba ikei kümbü pendou thükto ngei uangmuang sungbakei.”
Kheijinei Shealtieleibü shou Zerubabel thükkabou ungshedbou Jihozadakeibü shou Joshua hoba joubü mütli pendouei haoen haoeneibü Mühghaü
Kheijinei
Hobaje Jihudaa governor Shealtieleibü shou Zerubabeleibü soushou hoba thükkabou ungshedbou Jihozadakeibü shou Joshuaeibü soushou
Darias Choba po nyiboubü, lit lakboubü chalou saoto leibounyeta kümsilei küm khangkei.
Lit nyetboubü chalou saotoche bounyeta thuseibou Hagai danko
Jihudaa governor Shealtieleibü shou Zerubabel, hoba thükkabou ungshedbou Jihuzadakeibü shou Joshua to, hoba jouletbü mütli shuong to ong ho hai lenshi:
Kan yoa ho chem shaangla soneikangbüa hapbü ao hanei jouan ki? hoba tou kanei ai chühenda? Ho kan thea ai aying yingkao lo?
Khei yingasikei hau kiashi, O Zerubabel, dogo
Kan Ijep ka longjinei ngei kan yoa theyolanyobü ngüh damenashi, hoba ngeibü soushou kan yoa kia, kan tehüt.
Aishanga Thükenbou
Hobaje ngei phang pendou nyakeilabü, hoba phang pendouei maangdühbü loulabü, hoba ngei ho chem soneikangbüei shentilabü, dogo Thükenbou
Chandinam ngeibü hoba hon ngeibü, dogo Thükenbou
Shaangbou toje phaibou soneikangbü yaangbou kilabü dogo Thükenbouei lauda, hoba kho kishanga ngei hakso naangmai kulabü, dogo Thükenbou
Lit güboubü chalou saoto leiboua Darias po nyiboubüa thuseibou Hagai danko
Thükenbou

‘Atei jembü shembe kaibüa saopobü phe künalonga hoba haoeibü shembe kaibü khoei wentek to, ayingsi senbütakbü ayingsi ih ayingsi onang, ayingsi phe at to meitia longa kho saopobü yeilep sai?’ Kheijinei ungshedbou shuongei jongaiko laukei, ‘Aying.’”
Kheijinei Hagaiei laukei, “Haibü mang to meitibü danko asaopobüei khübü to meitia longa kho asaopoko yeilep sai?” Hobaje ungshedbou shuongei jongaiko laukei, “Kho asaopobü kilabü”.
Kheijinei Hagaiei laukei, “Kho tegü ho mütli kia, hoba kho tegü ho phang kü thea kia, dogo
“Lausikei tou ngei kan to sudajada, tat ka hoba tou ka jaüanje daman chühashi,
Ladang cheei takletbü lilabü saoche phoshang to haukei, khonei an ong kikei, ladang cheei ih phoshang to takletbü anjin sem sungenla loukei, khonei saoche ong kikei.
Kaibü ikkümikleia senlaang hoba nindei hoba shatsinyat yangbemei ngei ka to ngümbei, khei yingasikei nyi kü jungto asepei dogo
Daman chühashi, ngei kan to sudajada, ho chalou ka hoba thedang to lit güboubü chalou saoto leibounyet ka
Toukei punga lilabü kia sai? hoba semlüh, bhuk hoba chilang long hoba oliv long shuongei tou sühko aikei ahekkuda lo? Tat chalou ka jaüanje ngei kan haükulabü.”
Hobaje
“Jihudabü governor Zerubabel to ho hai joyoashi: Ngei mütshuong hoba kaodak nyaakeilabü;
hoba ngei Choba sangle shuong, Choba setshang apbulabü, hoba ngei phangshuongeibü Choba sangle hau leilutikulabü.
Kho chaloua, Thükenbou
Darias nyibou po lit setboubüa thuseibou Iddoeibü shou Berekiaeibü shou Zekharia jungto
“Kaneibü pisibou to
Hibü nyi haoen to lenashi, Thükenbou
Kaneibü pisibou tegü kan teki, aoyou to shangied thuseibü shuongei ho hai ngekko laukei: Ho tegü Thükenbou
Kaneibü pisibousi shuong haoen lanei ki? hoba thuseibü shuong haoen pon- pen kida sai?

Khei yingasikei ngeibü ngühshuong hoba ngeibü ngühkhüm deikhüm laobouei ngei ngeibü khangenbü shuong thuseibü shuong la sakkukei, khübü khoei kaneibü pisibou si shuong alaphet lo? Hibü haoen sepeikei hoba laukei, ‘Thükenbou
Lit anthükche boubü chalou saoto leiboubüa laobou Shebat lit, Darias po nyiboubüa thuseibou Iddoeibü shou, Berekiaeibü shou Zekharia jungto

Ngei nangnak hapbei hoba chühashi, ngei müt che koli thupaibü chenei setan hapbei, hoba hao mertel bulong yoa loan pholi kokkhüna hapbei, hao phainei saklangbü, monjungbü hoba thupaibü koli shuong kikei.
Khünei ngei laukei, “O kü bunyu, habü ho ai?”
Kheijinei kü to jongaiko khuthük hangangbüei kü to laukei, “Habü ho ai ong yingkeije ngei ka la lenkho.”
Hobaje mertel bulong yoa loan kibou mütei jongaiko laukei, “Habü ho
Kheijinei haoenei mertel bulong yoa loan kibou
Kheijinei
Hobaje khuthük hangangbü, aoei kü to joyoko kikei hao to
Hibü kü to joybou khuthük hangangbouei kü to laukei, Nyi hai ngekashi, Thükenbou
Hobaje nyibutham kibü phangshuong to ngo aeibou khauangda, aishanga ladang ngo hansho ong khau angko kikei, haoenei aei amaibou yeitikei.
Hibü
Nyibou ho hai phinthonashi, “Ho tegü Thükenbou
Hobaje ngei ngeibü nyek müh aeto chühan angtikei, hoba hapbei, hoba chühashi, khünei masupongsu laang lei kikei.
Kheijinei kü to joyoko kibou khuthük hangangbü to ngei laukei, “Habü ho aiai?”
Haoei kü to laukei, “Habü ho Jihuda, Israel hoba Jerusalem phinnyintibü laang shuong ki.”
Kheijinei
Khünei ngei laukei, “Habü ho ai kümla louda?”

Hobaje haoei jongaikei, “Habü ho Jihuda lintibü laangshuong ki, khei yingsije müt cheei ongkei kho aphonen, hoba phangshuong laobouei Jihuda kao khulimbo lintila shanga laangshuong phonenkei khübü to wapyola tekan aplabü.”
Ngei kü nyek chühangtikei hoba hapbei, hoba chühashi, müt cheei haoeibü ika takbü janglüh jungan kikei.
Kheijinei ngei phekei, “No lato hauda?” Hobaje haoei kü to lenkei, “Jerusalem süng si khaang latetche kho takan chühla shanga.”
Hobaje chühashi, kü to joyobü khuthük hangangbü kho satkei hoba lubü khuthük hangangbü che hao to haüyola haukei,
hoba hao to laukei, “Langashi, hoba kho heshoubou to ho hai lenko joyoashi: Mütshuong hoba khünei samkeisamuk kibü haangjung sangba akibü sang tegü Jerusalem kilabü.
Aishanga ngo
Ho yungkük kao aeka satashi dogo
Ho no Babilonbü nou- yangshou yoa kida, Zion to satetlangshi.
Aishanga Thükenbou
Aishanga chüh- ashi, ngei haoen thüka ngeibü ik soueilabü hoba aoyouei haoen khangenda, haoen shanga soletbou haoen yinglabü hoba kanei Thükenbou
“Chia lauashi, hoba olinyoashi, O Zion nouyangshou, aishanga ditashi ngo louada hoba ngo kathüka kilabü, dogo
Hobaje kho chaloua phang juongei haoen lolo
Hobaje
Müt pendou
Hobaje
Hobaje
Tou Joshua hao khuthük hangangbü thedanga mak kakbü meisiau lean loan kikei.

Hobaje khuthük hangangbüei hao thedanga loan kibü shuong to laukei, “Mak kakbü neisimei kho hao ka sungan apbuashi.” Hobaje haoei Joshua to laukei, “Chühashi, ngei kaibü shedbü shabü apbua, hoba ngei ka la neisimei haanbü lekulabü.”
Hobaje ngei laukei, “Haoeibü khua khun maibü che hankushi.” Hibü haoenei hao la khun maibü che hankukei, hoba neisimei lekukei, hoba
Hobaje
“Ho tegü Thükenbou
Tou ditashi, O thükkabou ungshedbou Joshua, no hoba ka thedanga setbü himshuong; aishanga haoen shensinge kakbü mütshuong ki, aieilausi chühashi, ngei ngo khümenbou bhek longtilabü.
Aishanga chühashi, Joshua thedanga ngei phokubü laang thüka shelebü nyet yembü thüka dobü kho thünglabü dogo Thükenbouei lauda, hoba ngei ho kaodak shedbü nyetche chaloua ong sungenlabü.
Kho chaloua Thükenbou
Hobaje kü to joyobou khuthük hangangbü kü jungto nyibou loukei, hoba müt che ngakbü ka pitibü müt tegütham ngo pitikei.

Hobaje haoei kü to laukei, “Nyi ai hapda?” Hobaje ngei laukei, “Ngei honeibü wanthung denshang che, honthung nyet ngei hapda; hoba chühashi, wanthung weko ihshep che che kia, kho khübüeibü khua lonan kia.
Hobaje kho nyangko oliv bulong penyi che phaueibü mae aenei hoba che khoeibü nanaenei.”
Hobaje kü to joyobü khuthük hangangbü to ngei jongaikei hoba joyoko laukei, “Habü ho ai yingkei, Yaangbou?”
Kheijinei kü to joyobü khuthük hangangbüei jongaikei, “Habü ho ai yingkeije nyi angekei lo?” Hobaje ngei laukei, “Angekei, Yaangbou.”
Kheijinei haoei kü to laukei, Zerubabel jungto
No ao, O shongh yaangbü? Zerubabel thedanga no yomang che yeilabü hoba khüto, Onoushi, onoushi!, dogo ngekbüei tangkabü laang shuong kho haoei sunglanglabü.”
Tokei
“Zerubabeleibü ikei ho chem chemshang huonglabü tokei haoeibü ikei ho yeilabü; hoba Thükenbou
Aishanga aoei kümsilei hanbü shanga chalou aweasüngda, haoen olinlabü, hoba Zerubabeleibü ika thangtet takbü peisilei haplabü, khei khübü nyet kho
Kheijinei ngei jongaikei hoba hao to laukei, “Wanthung mae hoba nanaenei oliv bulong shuong kho ai?”
Hobaje nyiboubü ngei jongaikei hoba laukei, “Oliv bu- hek penyi laobou honeibü ihshep penyiei hon onang haoen lolo yeian jinda khübü kho ai yingla?”
Hobaje haoei kü to jongaiko laukei, “Habü ho ai yinglaje nyi angekei lo?” Hobaje ngei laukei, “Angekei, Yaangbou.”
Kheijinei haoei laukei, “Kaodak pendoueibü
Tokei ngei thükae chühan angtikei hoba chühashi, seengeibü phekhon tulai che hapbei.
Hobaje haoei kü to laukei, “Nyi ai hapda?” Hobaje ngei jongaikei, “Ngei seengeiko kibü tulai che hapda; khoeibü süng kho iknop an.”
Kheijinei haoei kü to laukei, “Ho kaonyek pendou thedangto haubü saüsimaü shuong ki; aieilausi aoei kokda hao khüka wapan aplabü hoba aoei thedalanda hao khüka wapan aplabü.
Ngei ho hautilabü dogo Thükenbou
Kheijinei kü to joyobü khuthük hangangbüei kü to laukei, “Tou kaibü nyekei chühan angtiashi hoba thedang aeto haubü kho ai yingkeije chühashi.”
Hobaje ngei laukei, “Ho ai?” Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ho thedang aeto haubü seret haubü efa ki.” Haoei tokei laukei, “Kaonyek pendoua ho shedshonbü ki.”
Hobaje chühashi, khünei nam- phet nam tongtongbü che tonenkei hoba kam khünei yaksa che setan kikei.
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Ho kümsilei amaibü hoba haoei sao kho kam khüto phaika jangan jinkei hoba atsheibü khoei saoeibü sembung sühko küplepbei.
Kheijinei ngei thükae to chühan angtikei, hoba chühashi, khünei yaksa müt nyi thedang aeto loukei hoba haoeneibü kaaka yei kikei, hoba kaodak si müh kanglanga haoenei seret haubü kam kho tonenkei.”
Kheijinei kü to joyobü khuthük hangangbü to ngei laukei, “Seret haubü kam kho haoenei lae aeto jungan hauda?”
Hobaje haoei kü to laukei, “Shonar kaodaka sao shanga chem che dangkula shanga hoba ladang kho yeilaje jembü kishanga sao phoyolabü.”
Nyibou ngei müh aeto chüh- angtikei hoba chühashi, khünei shongh penyi kanglang ka kailong lei longkei; hoba shongh shuong kho chisak nam shongh kikei.
Shaangbou kailong koli saklangbü shuong hoba nyiboubüa koli nakhübü shuong kikei.
Hobaje semboubü kailonga koli thupaibü, hoba leiboubü kailonga kapnakbü shuong kikei.

O Jihuda chemdang hoba Israel chemdang, phangshuong yoa kan shedsikhau baubü che la yeian kikei, hibü ngei kan khümenlabü hoba kan haülabü che yinglabü, tehüt lausikei kaneibü ik hau kiashi.”
Aishanga Thükenbou
Lausikei tou nyibouaje ngei Jerusalem si Jihuda chemdang to maibü kümla daman kia, kan tehüt.
Habü ho kanei kümlabü kümsilei ki, kan mütpem wekoei jembü lepbou to ngühmaia lenyoashi, matjemshanga tükdebü matjem ngüh jungeiashi.

Kanei ngeibü lemshanga shabü wentek lemda. Hobaje kanei lauda, ‘Ainei künei no shatikei?’ Khünei kanei lauda,

Hobaje tou, ngei kan to sudajada, Mühghaüei sen to onouko kienlabü lole shanga haoeibü sangle lenla suajaashi, ho kaneibü ika ki, haoei kan to onouko kilep lo? dogo Thükenbou
“O kanei ngeibü lemshanga amlanga wan asapla shanga kan yoa cheei koukap shuong kapa tegükei ngei kan to olinbü aki, ayingsi ngei kaneibü ik ka lembü asungletlabü,” dogo Thükenbou

“Aishanga chaangbou ka chanep sühko küksithang yoa ngeibü nyen yaang kia, hoba pendou aenei ngeibü nyen shanga ponlem hilabü hoba hinseibü lembüsabü lemda; aishanga küksithang yoa kü nyen yaang kia,” dogo Thükenbou
“Lausikei kanei ngo shatida khünei kanei lauda, ‘
Tokei kanei lauda, ‘Ho ai olanonglabü che ki!’ hoba kanei kü to kung nyunglabü dogo Thükenbou
“Khüpettibou aoei haoeibü sanlon yoka paang che phoan ki, hoba haoei kho theletnyu phoda, lausikei haitila kapnakbü che
“Hobaje tou, O kan ungshedbou shuong, ho sakkubü kan shanga ki.

Kanei ngeibü nyena soneikangbü kula kanei teditkho laualonga hoba kanei maangpona thanan tephokho laualonga kheijinei kan jungto shedsikhau hautikulabü, hoba ngei kaneibü haülabü to khükla uoklabü, haü, ngei haoen la shedsikhau kua, aishanga kho kanei maangpona thanan apho”, dogo Thükenbou
“Ditashi kan shanga ngei youyik to haklabü hoba kaneibü thenyeka meisiaueibü set, khei kanei lembüa set phinan jinkulabü hoba kan kho to leian haulabü.
Hobaje ngeibü theyolanyobü Levi yoa kia, kho sakkubü ngei kan jungto hautiakei dogo kanei ngela shanga,” dogo Thükenbou
“Ngeibü theyolanyobü hao yoa langkei hoba sangmai haksoa kikei, haoei souhat kula shanga khübü kho ngei hao la kukei, haoei kü to soumo hatkei, hoba ngeibü nyen shanga souhatko lokei.
Maimaitham ngühkhüm haoeibü sembunga kikei, hoba haoeibü sembung khopa asaopobü akitei, haoei sepeitikei.
Aishanga ungshedboueibü sembung khopa hapbü ngebü songsido phoan kijan, hoba haoeibü sembunga haoenei ngühkhüm jungeijan, aishanga hao Thükenbou
“Lausikei kan lamnyu ka sepeinyu ngaian kia, kaneibü ngühkhüma müt juong phaiyettia kanei Levi theyolanyobü leilutikua”, dogo Thükkenbou
“Khei yingsije ngeikei kanei ngeibü kümsilei shuong ajungeibü thüng hoba kü mütli to maangthük maangphang kümbo lenbü shanga, Israel mütli kan khulimbo yeitilabü.”
Sen pendou bou che ong ki ayinglo? Mühghaü cheei ong sen kümbei aying lo? Aila sen mütpem wekoei jembü jaisina khulimbo lepbolangko hoba pisibousi shuongeibü thebülanbü shatiko jungeida?
Jihudaei lepbolangko jungeiakei, hoba Israela hoba Jerusalema mangsenlabü jungeiakei aishanga Jihudaei
Jakobeibü neichem ka ho hai kümbü müt, ao pida hoba aoei jongaida, hoba aoei Thükenbou
Hobaje ho kanei nyibou kümashi, haapbü hoba wibüei shentiashi, aieilausi touje lemshang aikei achühda, ayingsi kaneibü ik ka aikei olinko asungletda.
Khei yingsikei kanei lauda, “Ai yingbü ka?” Aieilausi no hoba no heshouabü yak kanglanga
Aishanga aoei maang asangda hoba bangda, Israel Mühghaü
Kaneibü ngühshuongei
“Chühashi ngei ngeibü hangangbü hautida hoba haoei kü thea lamnyu lamlekulabü hoba
Lausikei aoei hao loubü chalou sühko natenko kila hoba hao loujinei ao loenla? Aishanga hao hinseiko saüenbü wan tegü hoba nei sakbü sapon moli tegü kilabü.
