Hobaje chandinam saüenbü hoba hinseitibou tegü hao setlabü hoba Levi shousi shuong saüenlabü. Haoei haoen hon si chandinam tegü hinseitilabü hibü
Kheijinei piaboua hoba miet shangied tegü Jihuda si Jerusalembüeibü lembü kubü kho

“Kheijinei ngo kan jungto matjemla shanga nyangko loulabü, hoba seibütakbü shuong, hoba asangalanbü shuong khulimbo hoba aoyouei amlanga theyolan- yoda hoba aoyouei chalou eiknam lambü shuong haoeneibü munama khonkutida, latnyu hoba aaomüt aoyouei küksithang yenbou to khüpbolangko jungeida, hoba kü to ühütda haoen khulimbo ngei panteiko aukabü kulabü, dogo Thükenbou
“Ngo
Kaneibü pisibou chalou ka kanei ngeibü ngühkhüm deikhüm khulimbo meimeikei hoba khübü kho ajungei, ngo kan jungto sepeila shanga kü jungto sepeiashi dogo Thükenbou
Mütei Mühghaü soshau soyunglep lo? Khei yingsikei kanei ngo soshau soyungda. Lausikei kanei lauda, ‘Künei no ailai soshau soyungda?’ An phejan hoba lembü yoshaibüa!
Shedsikhau cheei khükauoka, aishanga kan phang pendouei ngo soshau soyungda.
Ngeibü lembüchema shausiyung kilabü lele an phejan pendou thanshang to sungba hoba ngei kan shanga khuthük koulom ipbuan haülabü sopbo akou shongko jonan koutikuasaoje ngo takteiashi, dogo Thükenbou
Kheijinei ngei kaneibü langle künkubou to haklabü hibü kan shanga khoei kao ka longbü amautikulabü hoba seka semlüh longei kan shanga semlüh hek hekkulabü dogo Thükenbou
Hobaje phang pendouei kan to haübou dogo ngalabü aishanga kan olinlabü kaodak yinglabü dogo Thükenbou
“Ngo khulimbo kanei ngüh yaang laukei,” dogo
Kanei lauda, “Mühghaü khangenla kümsilei aki; hoba haoei sakkubü jungeila hoba Thükenbou
Hibü yonglam lilibü thu maia dogo senei weeida, maimaitham amaibü kümbü shuong haako yaangko kidakeida, hoba tokei haoenei Mühghaü takteida hoba satenda.”
Aoyouei
“Hibü ngei kümbü chaloua ngei ngeibü nyaksinam tegü haoen kü shangabü yinglabü, dogo Thükenbou
Kheijinei saopobü hoba amaibou kanglanga aoei Mühghaü khangenda hoba aoei hao akhangenda kanglang kanei janthetlabü.”

“Aishanga chühashi, wanhap tegü juokko chalou kho loulabü hoba yonglam lilibü pendou hoba amaibü kümbü weko youho la yeilabü, hoba loulabü chalouei khübü kho juokan aplabü, khei khoei khübü kho li yingsikei bhek yingsikei üpyolabü dogo Thükenbou
Lausikei kan ngeibü nyen to soumo hatbü shuong shanga saopobü chanyu haoeibü kaaka maitibü yoan jungan loulabü, hoba masu chem ka masu shoushou shuong tegü kan saiyeiko longlabü.
Hobaje kanei amaibou thüka nakeilabü, aishanga ngei kümlabü chaloua kaneibü you phanga ngei haoen thamngu la yeitilabü dogo Thükenbou
“Ngo khangenbou Mosaeibü ngühkhüm laobou ngei hao la Horeba Israelbü pendou shanga sakkukei, khei ngühkhüm deikhüm hoba matjembü kho kanei damenashi.
“Chühashi,
Hobaje ngei louan kaonyek shedsikhauei sühtikusi amaibula bousi shuongeibü maangpon shousi shuongeibü maangpon la, hoba shousi shuongeibü maangpon bou shuongeibü maangpon la yeiko jeileikulabü.”
Ho Abraham shou, Dawid shou, Jisu Khrista thensilen ngühli ki.
Abraham kho Isakeibü bou, Isk kho Jakobeibü bou, Jakob kho Jihuda hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuongeibü bou,
hoba Jihuda kho Tamar kabü Periz si Zeraeibü bou, Perez kho Hezroneibü bou, Hezron kho Rameibü bou,
Ram kho Aminadabeibü bou, Animadab kho Nashumeibü bou, Nashum kho Salmoneibü bou,
Salmon kho Rahab kabü Boazeibü bou, Boaz kho Rut kabü Obedeibü bou, Obed kho Seedeibü bou,
hoba Jesse kho Dawid Chobaeibü bou kikei.
Dawid kho Uria yak kabü Solomoneibü bou,
Solomon kho Rehoboameibü bou, Rehoboam kho Abijaeibü bou, Abija kho Asaeibü bou,
Asa kho Jehosha- fateibü bou, Jehoshafat kho Jorameibü bou, Joram kho Uziaeibü bou,
Uzia kho Jothameibü bou, Jotham kho Ahazeibü bou, Ahaz kho Hezekiaeibü bou,
Hezekia kho Manasseeibü bou, Manasse kho Amoneibü bou, Amon kho Josiaeibü bou,
hoba Babilon to langsenbü jihsiphaia Josia kho Jekhonia hoba haoeibü jaisinasi shuongeibü bou kikei.
Babilon to langsenbü phaia Jekhonia kho Shealtieleibü bou, Sheltiel kho Zerubabeleibü bou,
Zerubabel kho Abiudeibü bou, Abiud kho Eliakimeibü bou, Eliakim kho Azoreibü bou,
Azor kho Zadokeibü bou, Zadok kho Akhimeibü bou, Akhim kho Eliudeibü bou,
Eliud kho Elea- zareibü bou, Eleazar kho Mathaneibü bou, Mathan kho Jakobeibü bou,
Jakob kho Marieibü lao Josefeibü bou, hoba Mari kho Messia dogo nyenbou Bunyuboueibü nyu kikei.
Hibü pendou khünei Abraham ka Dawid sühko meten anthüklei, Dawid ka Babilon to langsenbü sühko meten anthüklei hoba Babilon to langsenbü ka Messia asühshongko meten anthüklei kiteikei.
Khrista Jisu bukbü kho hai kikei. Ladang haonyu Mari Jose- fei kanan kikei, haosi ayoshaijinei thama sao kho Soushou Saopobü danko mang akongko hapbei.
Hao lao Josef ngühmaang lanbü müt yingbü ka, hoba tang khittimang asühbü danko haoei sao kho huphangshoua sattimang sühkei.

Haoeibü maangphanga kho kiteikei, lausikei mangha hao jungto Bunyubou hangangbü louan laukei, “Dawid shou Josef, kayak Mari leiyetla tejemten, aieilausi laobou saoei künan ki kho Soushou Saopobü danko ki.
Saoei bousushou buklabü, hoba nyi hao la Jisu nyenkulabü, aieilausi haoei hao mütli shabü ka khümenlabü.
Khübü pendou kho thuseibü danko hai lenan phokubü ho loushedkei:
‘Saosüngbü medei che mang akongko yeilabü hoba bousushou che buklabü, hoba haoenei hao la Imanuel nyenkulabü.’ laobou tetlabü ‘Mühghaü sen yoa ki.’ ”
Ladang Josef yepbü ka pienkei, haoei Bunyubou hangangbüei hao la lenbü tegü kümbei, hoba sao kho chem to yakla leiyetkei,
lausikei saoei shou abuk shongko haoei sao to ajam; hoba haoei hao la Jisu nyenkukei.
Ladang Herod Choba jiha Bethlehema Jisu bukkei, Jerusalem to chaang aeka songngedongebü shuong louan
phekei, “Jihudabüeibü haanbü bukbü Choba kho lanei ki? Aishanga künei haoeibü khanshoulitshou longan hapbei hoba kün hao to lemla louda.”
Ladang Herod Chobaei kho ditkei, hao hoba hao yoa kibü Jerusalem kabü mütshuong pendou phenyembei.
Haoei ungshed jaishou shuong, Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong hoba mütshuong pendou huishaian Messia kho lanei buklabü kije kho haoen ka phekei.
Haoenei hao to laukei, “Jihuda kabü Bethlehema, aieilausi thuseibü danko ho doakei:
‘No Jihuda kaoa Bethlehem,
no Jihuda kabü songdakbü yoa ai hangeilameikei
hanbouthamje aying,
aishanga ka mütli Israel songdakla
ka ka leiyeibü che longlabü.’”
Kheijinei Herodei huphangshoua songngedongebü shuong ngakei hoba khanshoulitshou kho ladang longkei kho shangashatko haoen ka ditletla haujembei.
Haoei haoen Bethlehem to hai lauko hautikei, “Hauashi, hoba nashou shangabü kho maangsangko pheashi, hoba ladang kanei hao haplaje ngeikei louan hao to lemlabü lele kütokei lenshi.”
Chobaei lenbü kho ditan haoen bangkei, hoba khanshoulitshou laobou haoenei longjineithama hapbei, kho haoen nashou kibü kaoen sühlangan athak shongko haoen thedanga haukei.
Ladang haoenei khanshoulitshou kho hapbei haoen olinbüei shenkei;
hoba haoen chem to atkei hoba nashou kho haonyu Mari yoa hapbei. Haoen kaoa khüpetkei hoba hao to lembei, hoba haoeneibü neimok sengan haoenei hao la hon, ponlem hibü hoba jen jongsak la kukei.
Haoen Herod jungto angaila shanga mangha lenkei hoba haoeneibü kaonyek to lubü lam aeka ngaitikei.

Ladang haoen ungkei Bunyubou hangangbüei Josef la mangha longan lenkei, “Pienashi, shou hoba haonyu leiashi, hoba Ijep to satashi, hoba ngei ka la alenngai shongko khünei kiashi, aishanga Herodei nashou kho haitila lameida.”
Hao pikei, hoba shou si nyu ham leian metu- phanga Ijep to satkei,
hoba Herod ühai shongko khünei kikei, kho thuseibü danko ai laukei kho loushedlabü lele, “Ijep ka ngei kü shou ngaankei.”

Ladang Herodei songngedongebü shuongei hao huonettia dogo ngekei, hao aeibou khau angkei, hoba haoei songngedongebü shuong ka ditletbü jihsiphai ka tetenbü tegü haoei hautian, Bethlehem hoba kho kaijembo kibü kabü po nyi kanglang kabü nashou pendou haitikei.
Kheijinei Jeremia thuseibü danko ai lenkei kho loushedkei,
“Ramaa manghaapbü
hoba haapyoweyobü
yaang ditkei;
Rachelei jembü shousi shanga haapbo,
hoba maang athonenko kikei;
aieilausi haoen akitei.”
Herod haijinei Ijepa Josef la Bunyubou hangangbü mangha hai lauko longan
lenkei, “Pienashi, na hoba haonyu leiashi, hoba Israel kaodak to hauashi, aishanga aoyouei nashou kho haitila lameikei haoen haikhüma.”
Hao pikei, shou si nyu ham leikei, hoba Israel kaodak to haukei.
Ladang haoei Arkheloei Jihuda thüka haobou Herod Choba jeila songdakda dogo ditkei, hao khüto ngaila hatkei, hoba mangha lenan hao Galil kaodak to ngaikei.
Hao haukei hoba Nazaret dogo nyenbü sangnyu chenei kikei, kho ai thuseibü danko hai lenan ki kho loushedtila kiteikei: “Hao to Nazaretbü dogo laulabü.”
Khübü chaloua Baptikubou Johan Jihuda yamlamanga ngekko loukei,
“Maangpon se- peiashi, aishanga Khuthük Sangle nyangko loua.
Isaia thuseibüei ao shanga hai laukei, kho han ki:
‘Müt cheei yamlamanga
ngekbü ngühlang,
Bunyubou lam lamleashi,
haoeibü lamnyu tangshaitham kümashi.’”
Johanei uteibü wi neisimei lekei hoba phekhonei haoeibü shenjanga kaikei, hoba haoeibü shausiyung kho koksüng si yamkabü naodei kikei.
Jerusalem kabü, Jihuda pendou hoba Jordan kaijembo kibü kaophei kabü mütshuong hao jungto haukei,
hoba Jordan deia haoeneibü shabü thekuko haoei baptikukei.
Farisibü si Sadukibü shuong juong hao jungto baptila shanga loubü hapan haoei haoen to laukei, “Kan pinyu shousi shuong, kan to aoei loulabü maangshat ka satenla shanga thungeijangeikei?
Kaneibü the- chüh danko kan tükde maangpon sepeiakei dogo lenenashi;
hoba kan lolo, ‘Abraham kho küneibü bou’ dogo laula tedam, aishanga ngei kan to lenda, Mühghaüei habü laang ka Abraham shanga shisi shousi longtila thükakei.
Wou kho bunyu chungthema tenakei. Lang maibü ehekbü bunyu pendou aklabü hoba wan to jinlabü.

Ngei maimaitham kan maangpon sepeibü tetsida che tegü deia baptikuda. Ao kü phainei louada hao kho kü to hau kibou hoba ngo haoeibü nguok sungenkula ongkei amukei. Haoei kan Soushou Saopobüa hoba wana baptikulabü.
Haoeibü wansou hao ikmanga jungakei. Haoei haoeibü amshang maisho küpjemlabü hoba haoei haoeibü youshou bunga yoshailabü, lausikei haoei sho khoje anyetbü wana jikan aplabü.”
Kheijinei Jisu Galil ka Jordan to Johan jungto hao la baptitila shanga loukei.
Lausikei Johanei hai lauko hao shingekla haujembei, “Ngo aeiko nyi baptikujan. No bouje kü jungto louda si?”
Jisuei hao to jongaikei, “Kü la tou shanga sakkuashi, aieilausi ho tegübü lama Mühghaüei mangsühbü pendou haüthüktilabü kho sen shanga janbü ki.” Kheijinei Johanei hao la sakkukei.
Hobaje Jisu ladang baptikei, dei ka tongde longkei; kheijinei hao la khuthük ipbukei, hoba haoei Mühghaüeibü Soushou duk- utuk tegü hao thükto louyenko hapbei;
hoba ngüh cheei khuthük ka lenkei, “Ho ngei maanghaibü ngeibü jayangshou ki.”
Kheijinei Jisu Satanei takteila shanga Soushouei yamlamang to leilangkei.
Saonyi nyet hoba saonyi you ashau ayungko paian phaia hao mühei nyengkei,
hoba takteibou louan hao to laukei, “No Mühghaü Shou yinga longa habü laang ho wentek la yeishi dogo lenshi.”
Lausikei haoei jongaikei, “Ho doakei, ‘Mütei wentekei ong aying, lausikei Mühghaüeibü sembung ka longbü ngühpem wekoei lang kilabü.’ ”
Kheijinei Satanei hao Saopobü Sangnyu to leilangkei, haoei hao Lembüchem khusunga settikei
hoba hao to laukei, “No Mühghaü Shou yingsije no lolo atetashi; aishanga ho doakei:
‘Haoei haoeibü hangangbü
shuong la
ka shanga ngühkhüm kulabü,
hoba no laang chenei ongkei youa kühsi shanga
haoenei no haoeneibü ikmanga tonlabü.’ ”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Hokei doakei, ‘Nyi kaibü Bunyubou Mühghaü atakteilabü.’”
Tokei Satanei hao shongh suokbü to leijung angkei, hoba kaodak sangle hoba khübü soneikangbü pendou hao la shean lenkei;
hoba haoei hao to laukei, “Nyi kü to khüpetan lema longaje habü pendou ngei ka la kulabü.”
Kheijinei Jisuei hao to laukei, “Satashi, Satan! aiei ho doakei, ‘Nyi Bunyubou kaibü Mühghaü to lemlabü, hoba hao ong khangenlabü.’”
Kheijinei Satanei hao apyokei, hoba khuthük hangangbü shuong louan hao to thuikei.
Ladang Bunyubouei Johan lapakei dogo ditkei hao Galil to ngaikei.
Hao Nazaret apyoan loukei hoba Zebulun si Naftali kaonyek, Kapernaum yungkoa kikei.
Kho Isaia thuseibü danko laubü ngüh ho loushedla yingan kiteikei,
“Zebulun kaodak hoba
Naftali kaodak,
yungnyu aenei lamkhonga,
Jordan deikoa phangshuongeibü Galil!
“Nakthüha setan kibü
mütshuongei ngesakbü
yaang hapa,
hoba haibü kaodak hoba yemekoubü phanga
setan kibü shuong thükto ngesak kho longa.”
Kho jih ka jaüan Jisuei songlenkei hoba laukei, “Maangpon sepeiashi, aishanga Khuthük Sangle nyangko loua.”
Hao Galil yungkoa paiko kijinei haoei jaisinanyi, Peter nyenbou Simon hoba haona Andria sia tak tekko hapbei; aishanga haoen ngau lapbü shuong kiteikei.
Haoei haosi to laukei, “Kaiya, kü phai semshi, hoba ngei kasi müt lapbü la yeitilabü.”
Kheijinei haosiei haoeneibü tak apyokei hoba hao phai sembei.
Ladang hao khüka satkei haoei Zededieibü shou jaisinanyi, Jakob si haona Johan, long chenei haosieibü bou Zebedi yoa lamleko hapbei; hoba haoei haosi ngakei.
Kheijinei haosiei long hoba haosieibü bou apyokei hoba hao phai sembei.
Hao Galil danko, haoeneibü sinagoga lenko Mühghaü Sangle Ngühlang Maibü phinthonko, hoba mütshuong yoa shatsinyat hoba mousisou pendou maitiko haukei.

Haoeibü ngühlang Siria pendoua nyakkei, hoba haoenei hao jungto shatsinyat phang phangei shatbü hoba khonkua kibü, shabü souei lapbü, auleshat hoba pheihaibü pendou sungbakei hoba haoei haoen maitikukei.
Galil, Dekapoli, Jerusalem, Jihuda hoba Jordan ji aeka mütshang yaangbangei hao phai sembei.
Mütshang hapan hao shongh to angkei. Hao setkei, hoba haoeibü eikshuong hao jungto loukei.
Haoei haoen to hai lauko lenla khangkei:
“Soushoua mühbü shuong
olinbou,
aishanga Khuthük Sangle haoeneibü.
Manghaapbü shuong olinbou,
aishanga haoen haksotilabü.
Eaaoabü shuong olinbou,
aishanga haoenei kaodak pailetlabü.
Saopobü shanga mühei haibü
hoba deilabü shuong olinbou,
aishanga haoen senyühshemlabü.
üei sanou lenbü shuong
olinbou,
aishanga haoenei onou haplabü.
Maangpon hinseibü shuong
olinbou,
aishanga haoenei Mühghaü haplabü.
Sangmai kümbü shuong
olinbou,
aishanga haoen to Mühghaü shousi shuong dogo laulabü.
Saopobü shanga aoyou
shieinangeia haoen
olinbou,
aishanga Khuthük Sangle haoeneibü.
“Ladang mütshuongei kü nyena kan nyikuko hakda, hoba amlangbü aukabü danko amaibü pendou jungeiko shieinangeilaje kheijinei kan olinbou.
Kho tegü ong haoenei kan thedang kabü thuseibü shuongkei shieinangeikei. Olinashi, aishanga khuthüka kaneibü jongsak yaangbü ki.
“Kan kaodakeibü jem. Jem ka teibü kho maualonga kho aiei teingaitila? Kho touje ailakei leshang aki; ho hakan apda hoba mütei kho nakeila leda.
Kan kaodak ngesakbü. Shongha kibü sangnyu che huletla athük.
Aoeikei wanthung sapan kamei küplepan aphoda, lausikei wanthung denshanga phoda, hoba khoei chembabü shuong pendou la ngesakbü kuda.
Kho tegütham, haoenei kaneibü kümsilei maibü hapan khuthüka kibü Bou la soneikangbü kutilabü lele kaneibü ngesakbü kho mütshuong thedanga hautijan.
“Ngo Ngühkhüm ayingsi thuseibü shuong mautila shanga loukei dogo tedam; ngo haoen mautila shanga aying lausikei khübü pentisoutila loukei.
Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, khuthük si kaodak adan shongko hoba ho pendou aloushad shongko Ngühkhüm haka dolang hanboutham ayingsi pheiche ongkei ühaüthükoje adanlabü.

Ao- youei habü Ngühkhüm ka hanboutham ongkei lulimlaje ayingsi mülakei leilutilaje, haoen to Khuthük sanglea hanboutham dogo laulabü, lausikei aoyouei khübü jungeida hoba lubü lakei jungeitida haoen to Khuthük sanglea yaangbou dogo laulabü;
aishanga ngei kan to lenda, kaneibü saopobüei Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong hoba Farisi shuongeibü mailem alimlang longa kanei khuthük sangle to üetenlabü.
“Danbü jihsiphaia mütshuong to ‘Nyi müt tühaiti’ dogo laubü kanei dida; aoyouei haitilaje haoen kho matjema kilabü.

Ngei kan to lenda, aoei haoeibü jaisina to khauanglaje hao matjema yolabü; aoei haoeibü jaisina to ‘Shosiek’ dogo khüklaje hao Sanhedrin thedanga matjema kilabü; aoyouei ‘Ngoubüloubü’ dogo khüklaje haoenei molowan hapshaulabü.
Hibü tetlabüei no lemshona jongsak che lemla kümbo kia, hoba nyi kajai kanaei kakhu limbo denche shedtiakei dogo damenalongaje,
kaibü jongsak kho lemshon khünei khei phoyoshi, shaangla hauan kaibü jaisina to jiyophaiyoshi, hoba kho phaia ong louan kaibü jongsak kho lemashi.
“Haoei no matjembü la kuan ap, hoba matjembüei thüngdang lombü la ku, hoba lombou khoei thüngdanga khinan apsi amaibüla, kaibü matbubou to kasi lamoua chela paiko kijinei jenabou lamenashi.
Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, kanei poisa che kho ashem shongko khüka asatenlabü.
“Kanei ho laubükei dida, ‘Nyi asangalanbü ajungeilabü.’
Lausikei ngei kan to lenda aoei yaksa che to dühko chühda haoei maangpona je sao to asangalanbü shona.
Kaibü mae nyekei ka la shabü shontialongaje, kho sungenashi hoba tekan apashi, aishanga mang pemtolo molowan to haukhoulabü khantoje kaibü küksihuo ka cheei aonbü kho khaibou.
Hobaje kaibü mae ikei no shabü shontialonga, kho danan apashi, aishanga kaibü mang pemtolo molowan to haukhoulabü kantoje kaibü küksihuo cheei aonbü kho ka shanga khaibou.
“Hokei laukei, ‘Aoyouei jembü yak bangtilaje sao la bangbü ngühchung le kujan.’
Lausikei ngei kan to lenda, alanbüa ayinglongaje aoei haoyak sattida haoei sao la shabü shontida, hoba aoei sattibü yaksa kho ngada hao lakei shabü shontida.
“Tokei kanei danbü jihsiphaia mütshuong to ho lenko dida, ‘Nyi kaibü thebülanbü aleilulabü, lausikei nyi kaibü thebülanbü kho Bunyubou thedanga loushedtijan.’
Lausikei ngeije kan to lenda, ho Mühghaüeibü Choba setshangbü dogo khuthük phongko,
ayingsi ho haoeibü younakshangbü dogo kaodak nyen phongko, ayingsi ho Choba Yaangboueibü sangnyubü dogo Jerusalem phongko yingsi dogokei aikei athealanlabü;
ayingsi nyi khulou che ongkei thupaitila ayingsi nakhütila athükkeibü dogo kaibü khu phongko yingsikei aikei athe- alanlabü.
Kaibü ngüh kho ‘Haü’ longa ‘Haü’ hoba ‘Ji’ longa ‘Ji’ dogo yingshi. Kho to liman lubü khoje Amaibou ka longbü ngüh ki.
“Kanei ho laubükei dida, ‘Nyek jeila nyek, hoba hauh jeila hauh.’
Ngei kan to lenda, amaibou to teshekei lausikei atei kaibü mae om to ipa longa hao la ji aedangkei thokuashi.
Müt cheei ka to liko matjemshang to haumang sühsije hoba kaibü mangkabü neisimeikei lemang sühalongaje hao la tangkabou mangshokei yoan kuashi.
Müt cheei no sekphai che hautimang sühalonga hao yoa sekphai nyi paiashi.
Ka ka hibou la kuashi, hoba ka ka lotmang sühbou ka the tesepei.
“Kanei ho laubükei dida, ‘Nyi kaibü lepbou to sanouashi hoba dangbou to mangsenashi.’
Lausikei ngei kan to lenda kaibü dangbou shuong to sanouashi hoba no shieikoebü shuong shanga welaukuashi.
Khei yingsije kan kho khuthüka kibü kaneibü boueibü shousi shuong yinglabü, aishanga haoei amaibülakei maibülakei chanyu longtikuda hoba saopobü hoba asaopobü lakei lang yantikuda.
Aishanga nyi ka to sanoubü dan to ong sanoua longa, kaneibü jongsak ai ki? Khüm hebü shuongeikei khei kümda ji si?
Hobaje nyi kaibü jaisinasi shuong to ong maang shika longaje, nyi lubü ai aei jungeida? Küksithang shuongeikei kho jeteibü jungeida ji si?
Hibü kaneibü khuthükkabou Bou lai penan souan ki, kho tegü kankei penan souan kishi.”
“Mütei hapla shanga haoen thedanga, saopobü kanei akümla maangsangshi; khei aying longa khuthüka kibü kaneibü Bou yoa kanei pailetbü aki.

“Hibü nyi ladang maangmai kubü kümsilei kümlaje, hibü- youbü tegü sinagoga hoba pühlama, müteibü nyensang hapla shanga, ka thedanga sen tekaang. Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, haoenei jembü pailetbü hapa.
Lausikei ladang nyi maangmai kubü kümsilei kümlaje, kaibü mae ikei ai kümda kho kaibü nanae ik la tengeti;
khei nyi maangmai kubü kho huphanga kilabü lele; hoba Kabou aoei hushanga haoei lolo hapda haoei ka la pailetbü kulabü.
“Hobaje ladang kanei welaulaje, kanei hibüyoubü shuong tegü teying. Aishanga mütei hapla shanga, haoenei sinagoga hoba lambheka loan welauda. Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, haoenei jembü jongsak hapa.
Lausikei ladang nyi welaulaje, kaibü thangtet maangkabou to atashi, hoba kaibü kou khinngailangan, hushanga kibou Kabou to welauashi; hoba Kabou aoei hushanga kibü hapda haoei ka la pailetbü kulabü.
“Hobaje welaujinei küksithangei jungeibü tegü, lejim akibü ngühnop tejungei, aishanga haoenei juong lausi ditlabü dogo haoenei damda.
Kan haoen tegü teki; aishanga kanei ai ong khambei, kho kaneibü Bouei ngekei.
Kanei hai welaujan:
‘Khuthüka kibü Abou,
Ka nyen saopobü yingshi,
Kaibü Sangle kaiya,
Khuthüka kibü tegü,
kaodakakei kamaang leshi.
Kün la tat chaangbou
shausiyung kubü;
Künei ailai müeibü shedbü
apbuan ki
kho tegü küneibü shedbükei apbuma.
Hobaje kün takteibü to
teleima,
lausikei amaibou ka kün senetashi.’
“Aishanga kanei müeibü shedbü apbua longa, kaneibü khuthük kabü Boueikei, kaneibü shedbü apbulabü.
Lausikei kanei müeibü shedbü üpbu longa, kaneibü Boueikei kaneibü shedbü üpbulabü.

“Hobaje ladang kan nyenglaje, hibüyoubü shuong tegü, the tekhüm; aishanga haoen nyengbü müt la haptila shanga, haoenei jembü thenyeka mak kaktida. Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, haoenei jembü pailetbü hapa.
Lausikei nyengbü kho mütei ayingko, hushanga kibou Kabouei hapla shanga, nyi ladang nyenglaje
ka khua onang naangashi, hoba kathe nyetashi; hoba Kabou, aoei hushanga hapda, haoei ka la pailetbü kulabü.
“Kanei jembü shanga kaoa nyaksinam tethan, ainei phetei hoba dühei künda, hoba kokbüei khoknyinda hoba koklangda.
Lausikei kan shanga khuthüka nyaksinam thanashi, laonei phetei hoba dühei ashauda hoba kokbüei akhoknyinda hoba akoklangda.
Aishanga lanei ka nyaksinam ki khonei ka maangponkei kilabü.
“Nyek kho mangeibü wanthung ki. Ka nyek maisho kia longa, ka mang khümbo ngesaklabü;
lausikei ka nyek amaiko kia longa, ka mang khümbo nakthühei shenan kilabü. Hibü ka to kibü ngesakbü kho nakthüh yinga longa, nakthüh kho latetche yaangkei!
“Aoeikei bunyu nyi khangenla athük; aishanga haoei che mangsenlabü hoba che sanoulabü, ayingsi haoei che la maang kulabü hoba che aweasünglabü. Kanei Mühghaü hoba nyaksinam khangenla athük.

“Hibü ngei kan to lenda, kaneibü langkei shanga ai shaula ayingsi ai yungla, ayingsi tokei kaneibü mang shanga, ai neila, maangtemau. Shausiyung to langkei khaibou, hoba neisimei to mang khaibou aying lo?
Mühkabü aushuong to chühashi; haoenei awenda ayingsi alatda, ayingsi bunga athanda; khei ying- ankei kaneibü khuthükkabü Bouei haoen samda. Haoen to kei kan aei khaibou aying si?
Hobaje kan yoa aoei haiyeibüei jembü thong iknop che chingyola thükkei?
Hobaje kanei aila neisimei shanga maangmauda? Ushia leilang khüpbong lai chingda daman chühashi. Haoenei akümaleida, haoenei lei ashikda;
khei yingasikei ngei kan to lenda, Solomon mangkei jembü soneikangbü pendoua habü yoa che phatko hele ale.
Lausikei O mailem hanbü shuong, ai ushi sang tat kian ngiet wanmang to jinda, khola Mühghaüei hainyu neitia longa, haoei khüto liman kan la aneikulep lo?
Hibü, ‘Künei ai shaula?’ ayingsi ‘Künei ai yungla?’ ayingsi ‘Künei ai neila?’ dogo lauko maangtemau.
Aishanga küksithang shuongei kheibü lamda, hoba kaneibü Khuthükkabü Bouei khübü pendou kanei khamakei dogo ngeakei.
Lausikei kanei shaangla Mühghaü Sangle hoba hao sao- pobü lamashi, hoba khübü pendou kan la jinyokulabü.
Hibü ngiet shanga maangtemau, aishanga ngietei jembü shanga maangmaulabü. Chalou weko khonsak hao thüngthüng ki.”
Kan mat ajemlabü lele mü la matjem teku.
Aishanga ai matjemei kanei jemlaje, kan mat khei jemlabü; hoba ai takletbüei kanei takletkulaje, kho kan la takletkulabü.
Aila nyi jembü nyek kabü inphou shanga adamenko, kaibü jaisina nyeka thamngu nepbü to chühkuda?
Ayingsi nyi kaibü jembü nyek kabü inphou kho ühüpbo kaibü jaisina to, “Ngei kaibü nyek ka thamngu kho apbukho” dogo lai laula thükkei?
Hibüyoubü, nyi jembü nyek ka shaang inphou kho apashi kheijinei ong nyi kaibü jaisina nyeka kibü thamngu kho apbula nyi shangashatko haplabü.
“Ai saopobü ki kho kei la teku, hoba uk thedanga kaneibü phülem tüpbu, ai ngenyu khübü kho haoenei youphanga nakeilabü, hoba sepeilabü hoba kan netla yeitilabü.
“Hiashi, hoba kho kan la kulabü; lamashi, hoba kho kanei haplabü; kuokashi, hoba kho kan la ipbulabü.
Aishanga hibü wekoei hapda, hoba aoei lamda, haoei hapda, hoba aoei kuokeida kho hao la ipbulabü.
Ayingsi jembü shouei wentek che hisi hao la laang kulabü;
ayingsi haoei ngau che hisi hao la pinyu che kulabü, kan yoa müt ao ki?
Khei yingsije, kan amaikokei, kan shousi la jongsak maibü kula ngealonga, khuthüka kibü kaneibü Bouei hao ka hibü shuong la peisilei maibü lai aei akula!
“Kanei mütshuong la kan to ai ong kümtimang sühda, kho tegü kaneikei haoen to kümashi; aishanga ho Ngühkhüm si Thuseibü ngühtet ki.
“Bakou nyonyembü to atashi; aishanga maushang to leibü bakou ongayasetham, hoba lamnyu yaangbü ki hoba khüto atbü shuong juongnyu.
Aishanga langkeishang to leibü bakou aeibou nyonyembei, hoba kho hapbü shuong shijo ong.
“Amlangbü thuseibü shuong, aoyou kan jungto saneibü hele lean louda, lausikei maangaenei sekbülakbü sho ki, haoen shanga maangsangashi.
Haoeneibü hekei kanei haoen shenlabü. Mütei jaklong ka semlühhek ayingsi, kamjak ka bhuk kheida si?
Hibü bunyu maibü wekoa buhek maibü hekda; lausikei bun- yu amaibüa buhek amaibü hekda.
Bunyu maibüa buhek amaibü hekla athük, ayingsi bunyu amaibüa buhek maibü hekla athük.
Laobou bunyua ong lang maibü eheklaje kho akan koutida hoba wana jinda.
Hibü haoeneibü langei kanei haoen shenlabü.
“Kü to, ‘Bunyubou, Bunyubou,’ dogo ngabü wekoei Khuthük Sangle to atla aying, lausikei aoei khuthüka kibü Bouei maangangbü tegü kümlaje, hao ong atlabü.
Kho chalou khünei juongnyuei kü to, ‘Bunyubou, Bunyubou, künei ka nyena ateten lo, hoba ka nyena shabü sou shian asatti lo, hoba ka nyena kümsilei yaangbü juong aküm lo?’ dogo laulabü.
Kheijinei ngei haoen la ngetilabü, ‘Ngei kan ladangkei angekei; kan amaibü kümbü shuong kü ka kukashi.’
“Hibü aoei ong kü ngüh habü ho ditda, hoba jungeida, hao laang thüka chem dangbü songsihon kibü müt phatko kilabü.
Hobaje lang loukei, hoba yungsen loukoukei, hoba yei soukei, hoba kho chem to jangkei hoba kho atuong, aieilausi kho laang thüka huongkei.
Hobaje aoei ong kü ngüh habü ho ditda hoba ajungeida, hao phetsen thüka chem dangbü asangadobü müt phatko kilabü.
Hobaje lang loukei, hoba yungsen loukoukei hoba yei soukei, hoba kho chem to jangkei, hoba kho tuongkei; hoba kho tuongbü kho yaang kikei.”
Ladang Jisuei kho laukhümbei, noknyühei haoei lenbüa maangpangkei,
aishanga haoei Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong tegü aying, lausikei sei kibü che tegü haoen la lenkei.
Hobaje ladang hao shongh ka louyenkei, noknyüh yaangbü che hao phai sembei.
Hobaje chühashi, hao jungto imbü che louan hao thedanga lembo laukei, “Yaangbou, nyi maangangsije nyi ngo saüenkula thükkei.”
Hobaje Jisuei haoeibü ik shingan hao to meitiko laukei, “Ngei maangangda; no saüenashi.” Kheijineitham haoeibü imshat ka saüenkei.
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Chühashi, nyi aotokei telen; lausikei hauashi hoba no lolo ungshedbou la lenashi, hoba no maia dogo haoen to aukabü künla shanga Mosaei sakkubü jongsak lemashi.”
Hobaje ladang hao Kapernaum to atkei, Saongao thükkabou che hao jungto louan hao to sukojako laukei,
“Yaangbou, kü sambü tuokshatei shatko, aeibou khon kuko chema phetetnyu yepakei.”
Hobaje haoei hao to laukei, “Ngo loulabü hoba hao maitilabü.”
Lausikei Saongao thükkabouei jongaikei, “Yaangbou, no ngeibü chemsophang to lotla ngei amukei, lausikei ngüh kho ong lauashi hoba kü sambü mailabü.

Aishanga kü phanga lakjaibü shuong phoan, ngokei songdak hau phanga kibü müt che ki. Hobaje ngei khüto lauda, ‘Khou’, hoba hao hauda; hoba lubü to, ‘Kaiya’, dogo lauda, hoba hao louda; hoba ngei ngeibü sambü to, ‘Ho kümashi’ dogo lauda, hoba haoei kho kümda.”
Hobaje ladang Jisuei kho ditkei, hao maangpangkei hoba phaisembü shuong to laukei, “Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, ho tegübü mailem yaangbü Israel yoa ngei aineikei ühüp.
Ngei kan to lenda, chaang hoba chanep ka juongnyu loulabü hoba Abraham hoba Isak hoba Jakob yoa setshanga khuthüka setlabü;
lausikei Sangleeibü püshi shuongje nongbü nakthüha aplabü; khonei haapbü hoba hauh uyobü kilabü.”
Hobaje Jisuei Saongao thükkabou to laukei, “Hauashi, nyi mailembü tegü kho shanga kümlabü.” Hobaje sambü kho kho jih khünei maian apbei.
Hobaje ladang Jisu Peter chem to loukei, haoei Peter yakeibü nyu mangpokei shatko shena lengan hapbei.
Hobaje Bunyubouei saoeibü ika jungkei hoba mangpokei sao apyokei, hoba sao laksepbei hoba hao la nongnaekukei.
Hobaje ladang chasem sühkei haoenei hao jungto shabü souei lapbü juongnyu leibakukei. Hobaje haoei shabü sou shuong kho welausansanbü ngüh cheei shian sattikei, hoba shatsinyat pendou maitikei.
Kho Isaia thuseibüei, “Haoei sen athükamin langkukei, hoba seneibü shatsinyat thonglangkukei” dogo laubü ngüh loushedtila yingan kiteikei.
Ladang Jisuei hao kaijembo noknyüh yaangbü che hapbei, haoei dei thidang to khatla ngühkhüm kukei.
Hobaje Ngühkhüm lenbou che loukei hoba hao to laukei, “Lenbou, no lae to haulaje ngei kaphai semlabü.”
Hobaje Jisuei hao to laukei, “Selong shuongei laangbob ki hoba mühkabü au shuongei hap kia; lausikei Müteibü Shouje hao khu nongshang aki.”
Haoeibü eik cheei hao to laukei, “Yaangbou, ngo shaang hauan kübou khünla sakkubü.”
Lausikei Jisuei hao to laukei, “Kü phai semashi, hoba haibü shuong la haoen haibü khünla phoyoashi.”
Hobaje ladang hao long che to atkei hao eikshuongei haophai sembei.
Hobaje chühashi, thim khonei yeishik yaang lotkei, khoei long kho deishouei danglepbo yeikei. Lausikei Jisu je yepan kiteikei.
Hobaje haoen hao jungto loukei hoba pitiko laukei, “Bunyubou, kün püetashi, kün shemetda.”
Hobaje haoei haoen to laukei, “Kan aila hatda, mailem hanbü shuong?” Kheijinei hao laksepkei, hoba yei si deishou to kaang hakkei, hoba jemetshouko kikei.
Hobaje mütshuongei maangpangkei hoba laukei, “Yei si deiei mangkei hao ngüha lelabü ho ailaibü müt?”
Hobaje hao yungko thidang to Gadara kaonyek to loukei, hoba shabü souei lapbü müt nyi heelaak ka longbüei hao to haüyokei. Haosi aeibou sekbülakbü yingsije aoeikei kho lam to adan.
Hobaje chühashi, haosiei ngekko laukei, “Mühghaü Shou, nyi aila kün peksekda? Jih asühko kün khonkutila no hato loukei lo?”
Haoen ka tuisho hean uk shuong che lamshauko kiteikei.
Shabü sou shuongei hao to sukojako laukei, “Nyi kün shian sattisije, kün ukshuong yoto hautikai.”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Hauashi.” Hobaje haoen longkei hoba ukshuong to atkei; hoba ukshuong pendou laanglip to nyuyoko yungnyu to atkei hoba deia shemetkei.
Hobaje uklombü shuong satyokei hoba sangnyu to haukei. Khünei haoenei kongnyu leko shabü souei lapbü shangabü hoba haüthükbü ajanjan pendou lenkei.
Hobaje chühashi, sangnyubü shuong pendou Jisu to haüyola longkei, hoba ladang haoenei hao hapbei, haoeneibü kaophei apyola shanga haoenei hao to sukeijakei.
Hobaje hao long to atkei hoba dei khatjung hauan jembü sang to loukei.

Haoenei tuokshatei shatbü müt che, yepshanga lengan hao jungto sungbakei; hoba ladang Jisuei haoeneibü mailem hapbei haoei tuokshatei shatbou to laukei, “Nashoubou, maang kangashi! Kaibü shabü apbua.”
Hobaje Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong atei maangphanga laukei, “Ho mütei Mühghaü nyikuda.”
Jisuei haoenei dambü ngekei hoba laukei, “Ainyula kanei kaneibü maangpona amaibü dameida?
Aishanga, ‘Ka shabü apbua’, dogo laula sobou si; ayingsi, ‘Laksepashi, hoba paiashi,’ dogo laula sobou?
Lausikei kaodaka Müteibü Shou la shabü apbula sei kia dogo ngei kan la lenlabü.” Kheijinei haoei tuokshatei shatbou to laukei, “Laksepashi, ka yepshang peashi, hoba chem to ngaiashi.”
Hobaje hao pienkei, hoba haoen chem to haukei.
Ladang noknyühei kho hapbei haoen hatkei, hoba müt la seisihau khütetche kubou Mühghaü la nyensang kukei.
Hobaje Jisuei khüka satjinei Mathi nyenbü müt che khüm heshanga setan hapbei, hoba haoei hao to laukei, “Kü phai semashi.” Hobaje Mathi meimeikei hoba hao phai sembei.
Hobaje Jisu chema shaushang yungshanga setjinei khüm hebü hoba shabü shuong juong loukei hoba hao hoba eikshuong yoa setkei.
Ladang Farisibüei kho hapbei, haoenei hao eikshuong to laukei, “Aila kaneibü lenbouei khüm hebü hoba shabü shuong yoa shauda yungda?”
Lausikei haoei kho ditkei hoba laukei, “Ashat anyatbü shuong shanga daktar akhamda, lausikei shatbü shuong shanga kümsilei.
Lausikei hauashi hoba, ‘Ngei lembü ji, lausikei onou mangsühda’ dogo laubü kho ngühtet ai yingkeije ditletashi. Aishanga ngo saopobü shuong aying, lausikei shabü shuong ngala loukei.”
Kheijinei Johaneibü eikshuong hao jungto louan laukei, “Aila kün hoba Farisibü shuongei hanghangko nyengda, lausikei ka eikshuongei anyengda?”

Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Chemkanbou haoen yoa ki shongko, chemkanshanga kibü thangbou shuongei manghaapla thükkei sai? Lausikei chemkanbou haoen ka ngailanglabü chalou che sühlabü; kheijinei haoenei nyenglabü.
Aishanga neisimei hangbüa aoeikei nei haanbü athipda, aieilausi thipbü nei khoei neinyu ka jitlangda hoba khün amaibou yetda.

Hobaje mütshuongei ih haanbü phekhon shongmok hangbüa atakda; khei kümsije phekhon shongmok kho thada, hoba ih kho apda hoba phekhon shongmok kho leiluda; lausikei haoenei ih haanbü phekhon shongmok haanbüa takda, hoba ham püetda.”

Haoei khübü kho haoen to lautoua sinagog kabü pangsa che loukei hoba hao thedanga khüpetko laukei, “Kü shou nouyangshou toutham hakshema; lausikei kaiya hoba sao to ka ikei jungashi, hoba sao singngailabü.”
Hobaje Jisu hao eikshuong yoa meimeikei hoba hao phai sembei.
Hobaje chühashi, yaksa che, ao po anthüknyi sii koubü kiteikei, hao phaito loukei hoba haoeibü neiyik to meitikei;
aishanga saoei jembü lolo maangpona laukei, “Ngei haoeibü neia ongkei meitialonga ngo maian aplabü.”
Jisuei sepeikei hoba sao hapbei; hoba haoei laukei, “Nashounyu, maang kangashi! Ka mailemei no maitia.” Hobaje yaksa kho kho jihatham maian apbei.
Hobaje ladang Jisu pangsa chem khüto atkei, hoba pithung metbü hoba noknyüh panglangyoko hapbei,
haoei laukei, “Satkhümashi! Yaksa kho ühaikei; lausikei sao yepbei!” Hobaje haoenei hao to nyikukei;
lausikei ladang noknyüh kho lintikei, hao atkei hoba saoeibü ika jungkei, hoba medeinyu kho laksepbei.
Hobaje kho ngühlang kaonyek pendoua phinthonkei.
Hobaje Jisu khüka satjinei nyekthubü müt nyi hao phai sembei, hoba ngekko laukei, “Dawid Shou, küsi to onoukai.”
Hobaje ladang hao chem to atkei, nyekthubü nyi hao jungto loukei. Hobaje Jisuei haosi to laukei, “Ngei ho kümenlabü dogo kasiei mailemda si?” Hobaje haosiei hao to laukei, “Haü, Bunyubou.”
Kheijinei haoei haosieibü nyek to meitiko laukei, “Kasieibü mailem thüng kasi to yingkushi.”
Hobaje haosieibü nyek khitkei. Hobaje Jisuei kaangkhühtham haosi to sakkuko laukei, “Aolakei tengeti.”
Lausikei haosi satkei hoba kaonyek jembo kho ngühlang phinthonkei.
Hobaje haoen ngaijinei, chühashi shabü souei lapbü ngoubü müt che hao jungto leibakei.
Hobaje ladang shabü sou kho shian sattikei, ngoubü müt khoei ngüh joyokei. Hobaje noknyüh maangpangkei hoba laukei, “Israela ho tegü ladangkei hapan achühkei.”
Lausikei Farisibüei laukei, “Haoei shabü sou shian sattila shabü soushou shuongeibü Choba jungeida.”
Hobaje Jisuei sangshou hoba sangyaang pendoua sinagoga lenko, hoba Khuthük Sangle Ngühlangmaibü songlenko, hoba shat phang phangei shatbü hoba shatsinyat phang phanga maitiko paikei.
Ladang haoei noknyüh hapbei, haoei haoen shanga aeibou sanouko dambukei, aieilausi haoen lombou akibü sanshuong tegü haoen khonkuko hoba aan kiteikei.
Kheijinei haoei hao eikshuong to laukei, “Youlatlabü shangakei, lausikei eik shijo ong.
Hibü kanei youlatbü Bunyubou to, haoei jembü youlatbü to eik koutila welauashi.”
Hobaje haoei eik Anthüknyi hao jungto ngakei, hoba hauan shian sattila shanga shabü sou shuong thüka sei hoba shatsinyat phang pendou hoba shatbü phang pendou maitikulabü sei haoen la kukei.
Tou hangangbü Anthüknyieibü nyen kho habü ho ki: shaangbou kho Peter dogo laubou Simon, hoba haona Andria, Zebedi shou Jakob, hoba haona Johan;
Filip hoba Bartholoma; Thoma hoba khüm hebou Mathi; Alfia shou Jakob, hoba Thadia;
Kananbü Simon, hoba Judas Iskhariot, aoei hao khümbo kukei.
Khübü Anthüknyi Jisuei hautikei, hoba haoen la sakkuko laukei, “Küksithang lam aitokei tohau, hoba Samariabü sangnyu aitokei tüt;
lausikei Israel phang maubü sanshuong jungto hauashi.
Hobaje kan haujinei, ‘Mühghaü Sangle nyangko lousüha’ dogo phinthonashi.
Shatbü maitiashi, haibü shuong langngaitiashi, imbü saüenkuashi, shabü sou shuong shian sattiashi; kanei amlang hapbei, amlang kuashi.
“Kaneibü shijimoka hon ayingsi chandinam, ayingsi poisa tekün;
kaneibü wakou shanga nyingkou ayingsi mangsho nyi, ayingsi nguok, ayingsi ju tekün; aieilausi kümbouei shausiyung hapla mubü.
Hobaje ai sangnyu ayingsi sangto ong kan atlaje, kan sühtimang sühbü kilaoje pheashi; hoba kan asatshongko khünei thüngashi.
Hobaje kan khüto atjinei ‘Salem’ dogo laushi;
hoba chema kibü shuongei kan sungleta longa kaneibü hakso haoen thükto loutiashi; lausikei haoenei asunglet longa, kaneibü hakso kan jungto sepeitiashi.
Hobaje aoyouei ong kan asungletlaje, ayingsi kaneibü ngüh aditlaje, kanei kho chem ayingsi sangnyu ka longjinei kaneibü you ka thamngu kangan apashi.
Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, matjembü chaloua kho sangnyu toje Sodom si Gomora thu to natenbou yinglabü.”
“Chühashi, ngei kan sho shuong yoto sanshuong tegü hautida. Hibü kan pinyu tegü songsihon kishi hoba dukutuk tegü maanglan yingshi.
Lausikei mütshuong shanga maangsangashi; aishanga haoenei kan matjemshang to khümbomeiko kulabü, hoba haoeneibü sinagoga haoenei kan to ngümlabü;
hoba kan kü laüa governor hoba Choba shuong thedanga haoen hoba phangshuong to aukabü künla shanga leian haulabü.
Lausikei ladang haoenei kan khümbomeiko kulaje, kanei lai laula ayingsi ai laula maang temau; aishanga kanei ai laula kho jihsiphaiatham kan la kulabü.
Aishanga laubou kho kan ji, lausikei kaneibü Bou Soushouei kan danko lauda.
“Hobaje jaisinaei jaisina, hoba bouei haoshou, haitila khümbo kulabü; hoba shousi shuongei nyusibou khulimbo meimeilabü, hoba haoen haitilabü.
Hobaje kü nyen laüa müt pendouei kan mangsenlabü; lausikei aoei thon sühko natenlaje hao ong khümenlabü.
Lausikei ladang haoenei kan sangnyu chenei shieikoelaje, nyiboubü to satashi, aishanga ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, Müteibü Shou aloushongko, kanei Israel sangshuong apekhümbo kilabü.
“Lenbou to eik thükkabou ji, ayingsi bunyu to sambü thükkabou ji.

Eikei jembü lenbou tegü kia longa, hao shanga khoei soua, hoba sambüei jembü bunyu tegü kia longa hao shanga khoei soua. Mütshuongei jembü bou to Belzebub dogo lausije, hao chema kibü shuong to latetche yaangbou anyikula!
“Hibü haoen to tehüt. Aishanga tang akhithlabü lele aikei küplepan aki, hoba angeenlabü lele aikei huan aki.
Nakthüha ngei kan to lenda, kho kanei changea laushi; hoba kaneibü noukhüna ai hangsho lauda, kho chemdaka ngeklabü.
Hobaje aoyouei mang haitida, lausikei soushou haitila athük, haoen to tehüt. Aeiko Mühghaü, aoei soushou si mang ham molowana mautila thükkei, hao to ong hatashi.
Aunyingshishou nyi poisa che lu ayaakda lo? Khei yingasikei khübü che ongkei kaneibü Bouei angeko kaoa üatda.
Kaneibü khua khulou mangkei pendou weenakei.
Hibü tehüt; aunyingshishou juong tokei kan khaibou!
“Hibü aoyouei ong müt thedanga ngo theletlaje, khuthüka kibü Kübou thedanga ngeikei hao theletlabü.
Lausikei aoyouei müt thedanga ngo atheletlaje, khuthüka kibü Kübou thedanga ngeikei hao atheletlabü.
“Kaodaka sangmai longtila ngo loukei dogo tedam; sangmai aying lausikei in longtila ngo loukei.
Aishanga müt cheei jembü bou khulimbo, hoba nouyangshouei jembü nyu khulimbo, hoba shoueibü yakei laoeibü nyu khulimbo meimeitila ngo loukei;
hoba müt cheeibü dangbou shuong kho haoeibü jembü chem- pen shuong kilabü.
“Aoei jembü bou ayingsi nyu kü to aei sanoulaje hao kü shanga mubü aying; hoba aoei jayangshou ayingsi nouyangshou kü to aei sanoulaje hao kü shanga mubü aying.
Hobaje aoei jembü peisei pean küphai asemda, hao kü shanga mubü aying.
Aoei jembü langkei hapda kho maulabü, hoba aoei kü shanga jembü langkei mauda kho hapmeilabü.
“Aoei kan sungletda haoei ngo sungletda, hoba aoei ngo sungletda haoei ngo hautibou sungletda.
Aoei thuseibü che thuseibü nyena sungletda thuseibü pailetbü haplabü, hoba aoei saopobü müt che saopobü müt nyena sungletda saopobü müt pailetbü haplabü.
Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, aoei habü hanbü shuong yoa che la ongkei eik nyena deisang thung che inlaje, hao pailletbüei akonglabü.”
Ladang Jisuei jembü eik Anthüknyi to sakkuko lenbü thonkei, kheijinei haoen sangnyu shuonga lenla hoba songlenla shanga haoei khüka banglangkei.
Johanei thüngdanga kijinei Khrista shangabü kümsilei shuong ditkei. Hibü haoei hao eikshuong hautiko lentikei,
“Loula kibou kho no sai, si künei lubü che shanga chüheila?”
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Kan ngaiashi hoba kanei ai ditda hoba hapda Johan la lenashi:
nyekthubü shuongei hapda, sokebü shuong paida, imbü shuong saüenda, hoba obangbüei ditda, hoba haibü shuong langngaitida, hoba shalebü la Ngühlangmaibü songlenda;
hoba aoei kü to phaiyetshang ai ühüplaje hao haübou.”
Khübü mütshuong ngaitoua Jisuei noknyüh to Johan shangabü lenla khangkei, “Ai to chühla kan yam to koukei? Yeiei thakdu soueibü chühla si?
Lausikei kan aito chühla haukei? Inyaibü neisimei lebü müt che to chühla sai? Aoyouei inyaibü neisimei leda haoen Choba chema ki.
Lausikei kan ai chühla haukei? Thuseibü che sai? Haü, ngei kan to lenda, thuseibü che to khaibou.
Laishibaei lenbü ho hao shangabü ki: ‘Chühashi, ngeibü ngühlang künbou, aoei ka thedanga ka lamnyu lamlelabü, hao ka thedangto ngei hautida.’
Ngühmaia ngei kan la lenda, yaksaei bukbü yoa Johan to yaangbou aki; lausikei Mühghaü Sanglea hanbou kho hao to yaangbou ki.
Hobaje Johan Baptibou chalou ka tou sühko Khuthük Sangle soyoda, hoba sekbülakbü shuongei soletda.
Aishanga Thuseibü shuong pendou hoba Ngühkhümei Johana sühko tetenkei;
hoba kanei sungletla maangangko kisije, Johan ho loula kibou Elija ki.
Ao nou yembei haoei ditashi.
“Lausikei ai to ngei ho meten mütshuong takteila? Hoaen namyakshanga atei lubü shuong ngako
hoba ‘Künei chia teibü lauko kan la pithung metkukei, hoba kanei atom! Künei manghaap chia laukei hoba kanei haapbo khuku to ajang!’ dogo lauko setbü nashousi shuong phatkei.
Aishanga Johanei ashauko hoba ayungko loukei, hoba mütshuongei, ‘Hao to shabü soushou kia’ dogo lauda.

Müteibü Shou shaukoyungko loukei, hoba haoenei ‘Chühashi, shaumüt yungmüt, ih yungbou, khüm hebü shuong si shabü shuongeibü thangbou’, dogo lauda. Lausikei songsihon kho saoeibü kümsilei loushedbüei aukabü kuenda.”
Kheijinei laobou sangnyu shuonga haoeibü kümsilei yaangbü juongbou kümbei, khübüei maangpon asepei, haoei haoen hakeiko laukei,

“Khorazin, ka shanga ügütü! Bethsaida, ka shanga ügütü! Aishanga ka to kümbü seikümseilei shuong ho Sidon si Tair to kümbei laubü tegüje, haoen mütshuongei neikek sean haapbo khuto tap mokan jinko maangpon sepeian kikhoulabü.
Lausikei ngei kan to lenda, matjemnyet kan toje Tair si Sidon to natenla soshangbou yinglabü.
Hobaje no, Kapernaum, no khuthüka sühko tonenlep lo? No molowan sühko sungyanlabü. Aishanga laobou kümsilei yaang ka to kümbei ho Sodom to kümbei laubü tegüje, kho tat sühko kikhoulabü.
Lausikei ngei kan to lenda, matjemnyet katoje, Sodom kaodak thu natenla sobou yinglabü.”

Kheijinei Jisuei laukei, “Abou, khuthük hoba kaodak Bunyubou, ngei ka nyen sangda, aieilausi nyi habü ho songbüdobü hoba hapbüngebü thedang ka huan phokei, hoba nyi nasak shuong thedanga tang khittikei.
Haü, Abou, ngei ka nyen sangda, aieilausi kho ka maanghaibü kiteikei.
“Kübouei kü la pendou nongkua: hoba Bou to liman Shou aoeikei angekei; ayingsi Shou hoba aoyou to Shouei hao tang khitkula maangangda haoen to liman, Bou aoeikei angekei.
Kan hübümangbü hoba onat künbü shuong pendou kü jungto kaiya, hoba ngei kan la hakso kukho.
Kanei kü bulenga peashi, hoba kü ka ditletashi, aishanga ngo eaaoabü hoba sensimaang inyaishoule, hoba kanei kaneibü soushou shanga hakso haplabü;
aishanga kü buleng sosotham, hoba kü on songoktham.”
Kho jihsiphaia Jisu Nounyet youshou laak danko haukei. Hobaje hao eikshuong mühei haikei, hoba haoenei youman yetan nyaila khangkei.
Ladang Farisibüei kho hapbei, haoenei hao to laukei, “Chühashi! Ka eikshuongei Nounyet Ngühkhüm lulimda.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Dawid hoba haoyou jambü shuong mühei haijinei haoei ai kümbei kanei awe lo?
Hao Mühghaü chem to atkei hoba Mühghaü thedanga phobü Wentek, laobou ungshedbou to liman lubüei shaujan aying, kho haoei sungkei hoba shaukei hoba haoyou jambü shuong la kukei.
Ayingsi Nounyet lembüchema kibü ungshedbü shuongei Nounyet lai shatida hoba haoen to shedbü aki, kho kanei Ngühkhüma wean achüh lo?
Ngei kan to lenda, khei lembüchem to yaangbou che han kia.
Kanei ‘Ngei lembü ayingko üeisanou mangsühda’ dogo laubü ngühtet ngea tegüje, kanei ashedbü müt la shedbü tekukhoulabü.
Aishanga Müteibü Shou kho Nounyeteibü Bunyubou ki.”
Haoei kho apyokei hoba sinagog to haukei.
Hobaje ik phei haibü müt che khünei kiteikei, hoba haoenei hao attila shanga Jisu to pheko laukei, “Nounyet maitijan sai?”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Tetlabüei kan müt cheeibü san Nounyet püngkhün to atetakei. Khülongaje haoei kho hatan asenenlep lo?
Yinga longa san che to müt lai khaibou! Hibü Nounyet maibü kümjan.”
Kheijinei haoei müt khüto laukei, “Ka ik shingashi.” Haoei shingkei hoba kho maikei hoba ji aedang tegü yeikei.
Lausikei Farisi shuong khong to angkei, hoba haoenei hao lai mautila hao khulimbo huon takkei.
Hobaje Jisuei kho ngekei hoba khüka kukkei. Müt juongei hao phai sembei hoba haoen pendou maitikukei.
Hao shangabü angetila shanga haoei haoen kaangkosekko shingekkei.
Kho Isaia thuseibüei laubü ngüh loushedla yingan kiteikei,
“Ngei pienbü kü
khangenbou,
ngei sanoubü Che, ao to ngo maanghaida.
Ngei hao thüka kü soushou phokulabü,
hoba küksithang to haoei matjembü lenlabü.
Haoei aoyolabü ayingsi
angeklabü;
ayingsi khongnyua aoeikei hao ngüh aditlabü.
Haoei matjembü kho
thükenbü to asungba
shongko,
haoei naknyinan kibü thakdu che ongkei angoktilabü.
Hobaje hao nyena
Küksithang shuongei
maanglemlabü.”
Kheijinei hao jungto shabü souei lapbü, nyekthubü ngoubü müt che leibakei; hoba haoei maitikusije, ngoubou khoei ngüh laukei hoba nyekei hapbei.
Hobaje noknyüh pendou mokde apyokei hoba laukei, “Ho müt Dawid shou yinglep si?”
Lausikei ladang Farisibü shuongei kho ditkei, haoenei laukei, “Ho mütei lubü ayingko shabü sou shuong Choba Beelzebul jungeiko shabü sou shuong shian sattida.”
Hobaje haoeneibü dambü ngean Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Jembü khulimbo janyinbü sangle pendou lusakan apda, hoba laobou sangnyu ayingsi chemdang jembü khulimbo janyinlaje loan akilabü.
Satanei Satan shian sattia longa, haoei jembü khulimbo janyinda; khülongaje kho sangle lai lola?
Hobaje ngei shabü sou shuong shian sattila Beelzebul jungeia longa, kan mütshuongei ao jungeiko khübü shian sattida? Hibü haoen kaneibü matjembou yinglabü.
Lausikei ngei Mühghaü Soushouei shabü sou shuong shian sattisije, maimaitham Mühghaü Sangle kan jungto louakei.
Ayingsi müt cheei shaangla hau kibou müt khühan apho longa, haoei lai küman hau kibou chem khüto atan haoeibü peisilei sola? Kheijinei ong haoei haoen ka koklang solanglabü.
Müt che kho kü yoa akilonga hao kü khu limbo ki, hoba müt cheei ngeibü sanshuong yoshaila athui longa haoei khübü lintida.
Kho aoa ngei kan to lenda, shabü hoba nyikubü pendou mütshuong la amai apbulabü; lausikei Soushou khulimbo nyikubü üpbulabü.
Hobaje aoei Müteibü Shou khulimbo ngüh laulaje, kho hao la apbulabü; lausikei aoyouei Soushou Saopobü khulimbo laulaje, ho kaodaka yingasikei, loulabü kaodaka yingasikei kho hao la üpbulabü.
“Bunyu maia longa khoeibü hek kho maibü yinglabü; hoba bunyu amaibü yinga longaje khoeibü hek kho amaibü yinglabü. Aishanga bunyu che kho jembü hekei shenda.
Kan pinyu shousi shuong, kan amainyu lai maibü lauenla? Aishanga aiei maangpon shenko ki kho sembungei lauda.
Müt maibüei jembüei kibü maibü ka peisilei maibü sungenda.
Hobaje ngei kan to lenda, mütei ai jim akibü ngüh ong anglaje, haoei kho ngüh shangabü matjemnyet jongailabü.
Aishanga ka ngühei no tanglabü, hoba ka ngühei no shedlabü.”
Kheijinei Ngühkhüm lenbou hoba Farisi shuong atei hao to laukei, “Lenbou, künei ka ka amaaphelabü che hapmang sühda.”
Lausikei haoei haoen to jongaikei, “Amaibü hoba maang alemenbü metenei amaaphelabü lamda, hoba Jona thuseibou to liman ho meten la amaaphilabü aikei akulabü.
Aishanga Jona chalou sem hoba langyang sem ngau yaangbü shimunga kibü tegü, Müteibü Shoukei chalou sem hoba langyang sem kaomanga kilabü.
Ninevibü ho meten yoa matjemshanga lolabü, hoba ho meten yuktilabü, aieilausi songlensi haoen maangpon sepeikei; lausikei Jona to yaangbou che hanei kia.
Yungthang Chobasaoei ho meten shuong yoa matjemshanga lolabü, hoba ho meten attilabü, aieilausi saoei thonbü kaodak ka Solomon songsihon to ditla loukei; lausikei Solomon to yaangbou che hanei kia.
“Ladang müt che ka shabü sou che longan apda, haksoshang lambo ulangbü danko satda hoba kho ühüpda.
Kheijinei khoei lauda, ‘Kü chem lao ka ngo longkei, khüto ngo sepeijung ngailabü.’
Kheijinei hao ngaida hoba hao to amaibü lubü soushou nyet leian atda, hoba haoen khonei kida; hoba kho müt thonbü thu kho shaangbou thu to amaibou yeida. Hibü ho amaibü meten shangakei khei kilabü.”
Hao tokei noknyüh to joyoko kitoua, haonyu si haonasi shuong hao to joyomang sühko tanga loan kikei.
Hao to, “Kanyu si kanasi shuong tanga loakei, hoba haoenei ka to joyomang sühda” dogo laukei.
Lausikei hao to lenbou müt to haoei jongaikei, “Künyu ao, hoba künasi shuong aoyou?”
Hobaje Jisuei hao eikshuong aeto haoeibü ik shean litiko laukei, “Künyu si künasi shuong hanei kia.
Aishanga aoyouei khuthüka kibou Kübouei maangangbü kümda, hao kho küna bousubou, küna yaksanyu hoba künyu ki.”
Khünyet Jisu chem ka satkei hoba yungkoa setkei,
hoba hao jungto noknyüh yaang takshatkei, hibü hao long che to atan setkei. Hobaje noknyüh pendou yungkoa lokei.
Hobaje haoei haoen la ngühphatbüei ngüh juongnyu lenko laukei, “Youli saakbü che youli saakla koukei.
Hobaje haoei saakjinei, youli at lamkoa shatkei, hoba aushuong louan kho shaukhümbei.
Youli at kaomai juong akishang laangpünga shatkei, hoba kaomai shangko akisije kho enyu yembei.
Ladang chanyu longkei khüto juokko haukei, hoba khüto li üatsije linan apbei.
Lubü youli shuong jaklaaka shatkei; jaklong chingenkei hoba kho naülepbei.
Lubü youli kaomaia shatkei hoba youkung weko saongao, saosem, ayingsi khujin onko youman hekkei.
Aoto nou yembei haoei ditshi.”
Hobaje hao eikshuongei Jisu jungto louan laukei, “Nyi aila haoen to ngühphatbüa lauda?”
Haoei jongaikei, “Kan laje Mühghaü Sangle huphang ngüh ngela kuakei, lausikei haoenlaje ho akukei.
Aishanga aoei ki hao la aei kuyolabü, hoba haoei apsileko kilabü; lausikei aoei aki, haoei ai ki khokei hao ka ngailanglabü.
Khoei ngei haoen to ngühphatbüa lauda, aieilausi haoenei chühkokei ashenda hoba ditkokei aditouda hoba aditenda.
Hobaje Isaiaei laubü loushetda,
‘Kanei maimaitham ditlabü lausikei aditenlabü;
kanei maimaitham haplabü lausikei achühenlabü;
aishanga ho mütshuongeibü
maangpon ngouan apa,
hoba haoeneibü noukhen ditla shangan apa,
hoba haoenei haoeneibü nyek muakei.
Khei aying tegüje,
haoenei haoeneibü nyekei haplabü,
haoeneibü nouei ditlabü,
haoeneibü maangponei ditenlabü
hoba sepeilabü hoba ngei haoen maitikulabü.’
Lausikei kan maimaitham olinbou, aieilausi kaneibü nyekei hapda, hoba kaneibü nouei ditda.
Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, thuseibü juongnyu hoba saopobü müt juongei kanei hapbü ho hapmang sühkei, hoba haoenei ühüp, hoba kanei ditbü ho ditmang sühkei, hoba haoenei adit.”
“Khülonga kanei youli saakbü ngühphatbü ditashi.
Ladang mütei khuthük Sangle ngühlang ditda hoba kho aditenda, kheijinei amaibou louda, hoba haoeibü maangpona ai phinkei kho solangda. Hoei lamkoa saakbü ngühtet lenda.
Laangpünga saakbü youli tetlabü kho ngüh kho ditan kheijineitham olinko sungletda.
Hao to li aki, lausikei longche shanga yemda, hoba ladang ngüh kho laüa khonsak ayingsi shieikoe loulaje kheijineitham hao atetda.
Hobaje aoei ngüh kho ditda hoba kaodak shangabü maangmau hoba nyekdüh maangdühei kho naülepda, hoba haoei mai ehekda, ho jaklaaka wenbü youli kho ki.
Hobaje aoei ngüh kho ditda, hoba ditenda, hao kho kaomaia saakbü youli ngühtet ki. Haoei youkung weko ka saongao, saosem ayingsi khujin onko youman hekda.”
Haoei haoen to tokei ngüh- phatbü che lenko laukei, “Khuthük Sangle müt cheei jembü seka youli maibü wenbü phatkei;
lausikei ladang müt pendou nyeket shikei, haoeibü dangbou loukei hoba youshou yoa yousangkei phinkuan satkei.
Ladang youli khitan yembei hoba youman hekkei, kheijinei yousangkei hekkei.
Hobaje bunyu sambü shuongei hao jungto louan laukei, ‘Yaangbou, nyi ka seka youli maibü awen si? Khei yingsije yousang ho lakabü?’
Hobaje haoei haoen to laukei, ‘Dangbou cheei ho kümbei.’ Kheijinei sambü shuongei hao to laukei, ‘Khülonga kün hauan khübü kho yoshaitimang sühda sai?’
Hobaje haoei haoen to laukei, ‘Tou, aingenyu kanei yousang yoshaijinei, khübü yoa youkungkei yoshaioulabü.

Youlat jih asüh shongko ham liko yemtiashi, hoba youlatjinei, shaangla yousang yoshaiashi, hoba khübü kho jikan apla shanga thepshaiashi, lausikei youshouje kü bunga yoshaiashi,’ dogo ngei youlatbü shuong to lenlabü.”
Tokei ngühphatbü che haoei haoen to laukei, “Khuthük Sangle müt cheei yongkoshik youli sungjung hauan jembü seka wenbü phatkei.
Ho youli pendou to hanbou, lausikei ladang ho chingenda, kesiong pendou to yaangbou, hoba ho bunyu la yeida, hibü mühkabü aushuong louan haoeibü bheka laangda.”
Tokei haoei haoen la ngühphatbü che lenkei, “Khuthük Sangle ho yaksa cheei tokai sungan wenchak sema dotan pendou pujung along shongko phobü phatakei.”
Jisuei noknyüh to khübü pendou ngühphatbüa lenkei; hoba ngühphatbü ayoko haoei haoen to ai alen.
Ho thuseibüei laubü loushedtila yingan kiteikei,
“Ngei ngühphatbüa kü
sembung iplabü;
Kaopakjinei huan kibü ngüh shuong
ngei kaangbang laulabü.”
Kheijinei haoei noknyüh apyokei hoba chem to atkei, hoba hao eikshuong hao jungto louan laukei, “Seka yousang shangabü kün la wanan lenshi.”
Hobaje haoei jongaikei, “Youli maibü wenbou kho Müteibü Shou.
Sek kho kaodak. Youli maibü kho Sangle shousi shuong ki; hoba yousang kho amaiboueibü shousi shuong ki;
hoba kho wenbou dangbou kho shabü mühghaü ki; youlat jih kho kaodak thonbü ki; hoba youlatbü shuong kho khuthük hangangbü shuong ki.
Hibü yousang kho yoshaian wanei lai jikan apda, kho tegü kaodak thonbüakei kilabü.
Kheijinei Müteibü Shouei jembü khuthük hangangbü shuong hautikulabü, hoba haoenei haoeibü Sangle ka phaiyettibü shuong pendou,
hoba amaibü jungeibü shuong leishailabü, hoba sekbülakbü wanlonga lapan jinlabü; khonei haapbü hoba hauh uyobü kilabü.
Kheijinei saopobü shuongei jembü Boueibü Sanglea chanyu tegü haulabü. Ao nou yembei haoei ditashi.
“Khuthük Sangle seka nam hubü phatkei; laobou müt cheei hapbei hoba hukei. Hobaje olinbüa ngaikei, haoei kibü khümbo yakkei hoba sek kho phoukei.
“Tokei Khuthük Sangle phülem maibü lambü namseibü müt che phatkei.
Haoei namton phülem che hapsi hao ngaian haoei kibü pendou yakkei hoba kho jekkei.
“Tokei, Khuthük Sangle yungnyua tak sanan ngau phang pendou lapbü phatkei.
Ladang kho shenkei haoenei kho deiko to senbakei, hoba setan haoenei maibü shuong qheka yoshaikei, lausikei amaibü kho haoenei apbei.
Kaodak thonbüa khei kilabü. Khuthük hangangbü shuong loulabü hoba saopobü shuong yoka ka amaibü shuong pinyinlabü,
hoba haoen sekbülakbü wanlong to lapan jinlabü; khonei haapbü hoba hauh uyobü kilabü.”
Jisuei laukei, “Kanei habü pendou ditenakou lo?” Haoenei hao to laukei, “Haü.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Hibü Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong aoyou Khuthük Sangle eik la yeia, jembü kibü ka haanbü hoba hangbü sungenbü chem che phatkei.”
Hobaje ladang Jisuei khübü ngühphatbü laukhümbei, haoei kho kaoen apyokei.
Hobaje jembü sangnyu to louan haoei haoen to haoeneibü sinagoga lenkei, kho khei lensi haoenei maangpangko laukei, “Ho songsihon, hoba habü thusei kümsilei ho mütei ai ka hapbei?
Mistri shou kho ho aying si? Haonyu Mari nyenkei aying lo? Hobaje haonasi shuong, Jakob si Josef hoba Simon si Juda aying lo?
Hobaje haona yaksa shuong pendou sen yoa aki lo? Khei yinga longa haoei ho pendou laka hapbei?”
Hobaje haoenei hao to phaiyetkei. Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Jembü kaodak si jembü chema to liman thuseibü asangko aki.”
Haoen to mailem akibü danko haoei khünei seiei kümsilei aküm.
Kheijinei Herod Tetrarkei Jisu shangabü ngühlang ditkei,
hoba hao khangenbü shuong to laukei, “Ho Johan Baptibou, hao haibü ka langngai- akei; khoei habü kümsilei haoei kümda.”
Aiei lausi Herodei haona Filip yak Herodia laüa Johan lapan kühan thüngdanga phokei;
aishanga Johanei hao to laukei, “Nyi sao lejan aying.”
Hobaje haoei hao haitimang sühkei, lausikei hao noknyüh to hatkei, aishanga haoenei Johan thuseibü che dogo dambei.
Lausikei Herod bukbü chalou pennyet, Herodia nouyangshouei yen thedanga tombei, hoba Herod olintikei;
hibü saoei ai ong hilaje kho sao la kukho dogo haoei theletlanletko thekukei.
Hobaje saoeibü nyuei thungbü jangbü danko saoei laukei, “Kü la Johan Baptiboueibü khu phau chenei labü.”
Hobaje Choba kho maang ngangkei; lausikei jembü theletlanletbü hoba hao yoa shaushang yungshanga setbü shuong laüa haoei kho kula sakkukei.
Hobaje haoei hautiko thüngdanga Johaneibü khu thetkei.
Hobaje haoeibü khu kho phau chenei sungbaan medeinyu la kukei, hoba saoei kho haonyu jungto sungbakei.
Hobaje hao eikshuong louan haibü mang kho lenglangan khünkei; hoba haoenei hauan kho Jisu la lenkei.
Ladang Jisuei kho ditkei, hao mütpem khüka long chenei sangliphang to kukkei. Hobaje kho noknyühei ditjinei, sangnyu ka youei hao phai sembei.
Hobaje hao longjinei mütshang yaangbü che hapbei, hoba haoei haoen shanga sanouko daman haoen shatbü nyatbü shuong maitikei.
Hobaje ladang chasem sühkei, eikshuong hao jungto louan laukei, “Ho sangliphang, hoba chanyu nepan apa. Sang shuong to hauan haoenei shausiyung jeklabü lele noknyüh lintiashi.”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Haoen haula akhamda, kanei haoen la denche okashi.”
Hobaje haoenei hao to laukei, “Künei hanei wentek ngao hoba ngau nyi ong ki.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Khübü kho kü jungto sungba.”

Hobaje noknyüh kho sanglaak thüka setla sakkukei. Kheijinei haoei wentek ngao hoba ngau nyi kho jungkei, hoba haoei khuthük ae chühangtikei hoba haükukei; hoba ladang haoei wentek kho shaknyinkei, haoei eikshuong la kukei.
Hobaje haoenei senyühshembo shaukei; hoba jouletbü netshouei kam anthüknyi shenko haoenei heshaikei.
Hobaje shaubü yungbü shuong yaksa hoba nashousi shuong aweko bousu hajar ngao kiteikei.
Jisuei noknyüh lintijinei, haoei hao eikshuong long che to atan hao thedang to thi deiphei to hautikei.
haoei haoen sattikei hoba hao mütpem shongh to welaula angkei. Ladang chasem sühkei khünei hao mütpem kiteikei.
Tou long kho dei ka lounyu hean kiteikei, hoba kho deishouei aeibou khokeitiko kikei, aishanga yeiei thedang aeka soungaikei.
Ngeyang sem ka lak jih kanglanga hao haoen jungto deitaka paijung haukei.
Ladang eikshuongei hao deitaka paiko hapbei, haoen mokde apyokei hoba lau kei, “Ho sou yingkei”; hoba haoen hatbü ka ngekyokei.
Kheijinei Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Maang kaangashi! ngo yingkei, tehüt.”
Peterei hao to jongaikei, “Bunyubou, no yingsije ngo ka jungto deitaka loula sakkushi.”
Haoei laukei, “Kaiya.” Peter long ka lotkei hoba deitaka paiko Jisu jungto likei.
Lausikei ladang haoei yei kaangbü kho hapbei hao hatkei, hoba hao deimang to shemetlangla khangjinei haoei ngekkei, “Bunyubou, ngo püetashi.”
Kheijinei Jisuei hao ik shingan hao to hatkei hoba hao to laukei, “Ka mailem latetche hankei! Aila maanga shuda?”
Ladang haoen long to atkei yei thakkei.
Longa kibü shuongei hao junga khüpetko laukei, “Maimaitham no Mühghaü Shou.”
Ladang haoenei dei khatkei haoen Genesareta sühlangkei.
Khükabü mütshuongei shenkei hoba haoenei hao kaophei pendou to hautikei, hoba haoenei hao jungto shatbü pendou leibakei.
Hobaje haoen la haoeibü neiyika ongkei meititikai dogo haoenei hao to sukeijakei. Hobaje meitibü shuong pendou maikei.
Kheijinei Farisi hoba Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong Jerusalem ka Jisu jungto louan laukei,
“Aila ka eikshuongei jaishou shuongeibü tetbütabü ngühli lulimda? Aishanga shauji yungjinei haoenei ik asakda.”
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Kaneikei aila kaneibü tetbütabü laüa Mühghaü ngühkhüm lulimda?
Aishanga Mühghaüei lauakei, ‘Kabou si kanyu soumo hatashi,’ hoba, ‘Aoei bou ayingsi nyu amaibü laueilaje hao haiphangphang.’
Lausikei kanei lauda, ‘Müt cheei haobou ayingsi nyu to: Ngei kasi shanga jungeila tetbü nam pendou Mühghaü la kula saüenan apa’, dogo laua longa,
haoei touje haobou la soumo akuda. Hibü kaneibü tetbütabü laüa Mühghaü ngüh amlangbü la yeida.
Hibüyoubü shuong, Isaiaei kan shangabü hainyu tükde tetenkei,
‘Habü mütshuongei
haoeneibü sembungei
kü to soumo hatda,
lausikei haoeneibü maangpon kü ka lounyu heakei.
Haoeneibü lenbü tegü
haoenei müt ngüh lensije,
haoenei amlangbüa ngo lemda!’ ”
Jisuei noknyüh hao jungto ngaan laukei, “Ditashi hoba ditenashi.
Sembung to ai atda khoei müt shatida ji; lausikei ai sembung ka longda khoei hao shatida.”
Eikshuong louan hao to laukei, “Nyi laubü ngüh ditjinei Farisi shuong maangto shatda dogo nyi ngekeilao?”
Haoei jongaikei, “Ai kesiong ong khuthük kabü Kübouei ake kho pheian aplabü.
Haoen khei apyoashi. Haoen nyekthubü lamleibü dan. Nyekthubü cheei lubü che leia longa ham kuokkhünto atetlabü.”
Peterei hao to jongaikei, “Kün la kho ngüh- phatbü wanenkukai.”
Haoei laukei, “Kaneikei tou sühko aditenda lo?
Ai ong sembung to atdaje kho shiang to atan apshang to danda dogo kanei aditenda lo?
Lausikei ai sembung ka angda kho maangpon ka longda, hoba khoei müt shatida.
Aishanga maangpon ka amaibü dambü, müt haitibü, asangalan, pejapela, kokbü, amlangbü aukabü hoba mü nyikubü longda.
Khübüei müt shatida, lausikei ik asakko shaubüei müt ashatida.”
Jisuei kho kaoen apyokei hoba Tair si Sidon kaopheia sühlangkei.
Kho kaonyek ka loubü Kanan sao cheei ngekko laukei, “Dawid shou, Yaangbou, kü to onoukai. Kü shou nouyangshou shabü souei aeibou khonkutiko kia.”
Lausikei haoei sao to ajongai. Hao eikshuong louan hao to, “Saoei sen phainei ngekdang ledabü sao ngaitishi” dogo pheko laukei.
Haoei jongaikei, “Israel phang maubü sanshuong jungto ong ngo hautikei.”
Lausikei sao louan hao thedanga lembo laukei, “Yaangbou, kü to thuikai.”
Haoei jongaikei, “Shousieibü shausiyung sungbaan kei thedanga apjan aying.”
Saoei laukei, “Tükde, Yaangbou; lausikei kei shuongeikei jembü bunyu khümsok ka atbü netshouje shauda.”
Kheijinei Jisuei yaksanyu to laukei, “Ka mailem latetche yaangkei! Nyi mangsühbü tegü ka to kümlabü.” Hobaje saoeibü nouyangshou kho kho jih ka thama maian apbei.
Jisuei kho kaoen apyokei hoba Galil yungnyu ae haukei; hoba hao shongh che to angkei hoba khonei setkei.
Hobaje sokebü, nyekthubü, ngoubü, yousi- iksibü, hoba lubü juongnyu yoa shuong yaang hao jungto loukei, hoba haoen haoeibü you junga phoyokukei, hoba haoei haoen maitikukei.
Ladang haoenei ngoubüei joyoko, yousi-iksibü maian, sokebü paiko, hoba nyekthubüei hapbo hapbei noknyüh maangpangkei. Hobaje haoenei Israel Mühghaü la soneikangbü kukei.

Jisuei hao eikshuong hao jungto ngaan laukei, “Ngei noknyüh shanga aeibou sanouko dambuda, aishanga haoen touje kü yoa chalou sem yinga hoba shaula ai aki. Ngei haoen müh ngaitimang asühda. Haoen lama nyengan shemla thükkei.”
Eikshuongei hao to laukei, “Sen sangliphang kaoena yingkei. Künei laka mütshang hatetche phottilabü wentek hapla?”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Kanei wentek ladüng ki?” Haoenei laukei, “Pem nyet, hoba ngau shijo.”
Haoei noknyüh kaoa setla sakkukei.
Haoei wentek nyet hoba ngau jungkei. Kho phaia haoei Mühghaü la nyensang kuko shaknyinkei hoba khübü kho eikshuong la kukei, hoba eikshuongei noknyüh la kukei.
Haoenei photko shaukei; hoba haoenei netshou joubü kam nyet shenko heshaikei.
Yaksa shuong si nashousi shuong aweko kho shaubü shuong kho bousu hajar lei kiteikei.
Haoei noknyüh lintian long che to atkei hoba Magadan kaophei to haukei.
Farisi hoba Saduki shuong loukei, hoba hao takteiko khuthük ka haoen la amaaphilabü che lenbü dogo phekei.
Haoei haoen to jongaikei, “Ladang chasem sühdaje kanei lauda, ‘Chalou mailabü, aieilausi müh sakteiakei.’
Hobaje ngeyang, ‘Tat yeinak loulabü, aieilausi müh saklangle sangmei shangakei.’ Kanei mühnyu tetenda; khülonga kanei jihsiphaieibü amaaphilabü alenenda si?
Amaibü hoba asangalanbü metenei amaaphelabü lamda, hoba Jona amaphelabü to liman lubü ai amaaphelabü akulabü.” Hobaje Jisuei haoen apyoan satkei.
Eikshuong thi yungko sühkei hoba haoenei wentek künla makei.
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Maangsangashi! Farisi si Saduki shuong tokai to maangsangashi.”
Haoen si haoen kanglanga joyoko laukei, “Senei wentek asungba.”
Jisuei kho ngekei hoba laukei, “Kaneibü mailem latetche hankei! Kanei aila tükdebü wentek akünbü shanga lauyoda?
Kanei tou sühko ashuokda lo? Hobaje kanei wentek ngao müt hajar ngao la shombuan tokei kanei kam ladüng heshaikei kho kanei adamenda lo?
Hobaje wentek nyet müt hajar lei la shombuan kanei kam ladüng heshaikei?
Ngei kan la wentek shangabü alen dogo kanei lai aditenda? Lausikei Farisi si Saduki shuong tokai to maangsangashi.”
Kheijinei haoenei haoei haoen to wentek shanga jungeibou tokai aying, lausikei Farisi si Saduki shuong lenbü to maangsangla shanga laukei dogo shuokkei.
Ladang Jisu Kaisariaa Filipi kaophei to loukei haoei hao eikshuong to phekei, “Mütshuongei Müteibü Shou to ao dogo lauda?”
Haoenei laukei, “Atei, ‘Johan Baptibou’; atei, ‘Elija’; hoba atei, ‘Jeremia’ ayingsi ‘thuseibü yoa che’ dogo lauda.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Lausikei kanei ngo ao dogo lauda?”
Simon Peterei jongaikei, “No langkei Mühghaü Shou, Khrista.”
Jisuei hao to jongaikei, “Jona shou Simon, no haübou; aishanga khuthüka kibü Kübou to liman kaodakbü aoeikei ho ka to tang akhitti.
“Tokei ngei ka to lenda, ‘No Peter’, (tetlabü Laangdak) hoba ho laang thüka ngei kü lashong huonglabü, hoba haibüei kho athüklanglabü.
Ngei ka la Khuthük Sangle koukhin kulabü, hoba nyi ai ong kaodaka khühlaje kho khuthüka khühlabü, hoba nyi kaodaka ai ong sengkulaje kho khuthüka sengkulabü.”
Kheijinei hao Khrista yingkei dogo aolakei alenla shanga haoei hao eikshuong to kaangkosekko lenkei.

Kho jih ka jaüan hao Jerusalem to haujan, hoba jaishou shuong, hoba ungshedbou shuong hoba Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong ka khonku juong hapjan, hoba haitijan, hoba sembounyet langngaijan, dogo Jisuei jembü eikshuong la lenla khangkei.
Peterei hao leilangkei hoba hakeiko laukei, “Bunyubou, Mühghaüei kho lothetshi! Kho ka to aloushadlabü!”
Hao sepeikei hoba Peter to laukei, “kü phaito kukashi, Satan! No kü shanga phaiyetshang ki, aishanga nyi Mühghaü aedang ka ayingko müt aedang ka damda.”
Kheijinei Jisuei hao eikshuong to laukei, “Atei kü phai loumang sühsije haoei jembü lolo hanjan, hoba jembü peisei pean, kü phai semashi.
Aishanga müt cheei hao langkei püetmang sü- halonga haoei kho maulabü, lausikei aoei kü nyen laüa jembü langkei maulaje kho hapmeilabü!
Aishanga mütei kaodak khümbo pailetan jembü langkei maualonga haoei ai pailetla? Ayingsi mütei jembü langkei jeila ai kula?
Aishanga Müteibü Shou jembü Bou soneikangbüa khuthük hangangbü yoa loulabü, hoba kheijinei haoei müt weko la jembü kümsilei thüng pailetbü kulabü.
Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, hanei loan kibü shuong yoa atei Müteibü Shou haoeibü Sanglea aloushongko haibü jepan achühlabü.”
Chalou laknyet kian phaia Jisuei Peter, hoba Jakob, hoba haona Johan shongh suokbü che to leijung angkei.
Hobaje hao haoen thedanga son jeian apbei; hoba haoeibü thenyek chanyu tegü haukei, hoba haoeibü neisimei ngesakbü tegü thupaian yeikei.
Hobaje hao to joyoko Mosa hoba Elija haoen junga louphambei.
Kheijinei Peterei Jisu to laukei, “Bunyubou, sen han maian kioua! Nyi maang- angsije ngei hanei dip sem lekho: ka shanga che, hoba Masa shanga che hoba Elija shanga che.”
Haoei lautoua lailaibü sangmei cheei haoen yuklepbei, hoba sangmei ka ngüh cheei laukei, “Ho ngei sanoubü Jayangshou, ao to ngei maangshikda; kanei hao to ditashi.”
Ladang eikshuongei kho ditkei, haoenei the khüman khüpetkei hoba aeibou hatkei.
Jisu louan haoen to meitiko laukei, “Pienashi; tehüt!”
Haoenei chühangtikei hoba Jisu to liman lubü aokei akitei.
Haoen shongh ka louyenjinei Jisuei haoen to sakkuko laukei, “Müteibü Shou haibü ka alangngai shongko kanei hapbü ho aotokei telen.”
Eikshuongei hao to phekei, “Aila Ngühkhüm lenbou shuongei Elija shaang loujan dogo lauda?”
Haoei jongaikei, “Elija maimaitham loulabü hoba ajanjan pendou lamlean phokulabü.
Lausikei ngei kan to lenda, Elija louan apa, hoba haoenei hao ashen, lausikei haoenei hao to haoen maangangbü tegü kümbei. Kho tegütham Müteibü Shou haoen ikmanga khonkulabü.”
Kheijinei eikshuongei haoei haoen to Johan Baptibou shangabü laukei dogo ditenkei.
Ladang haoen shuong yoa sühlangkei, müt che hao jungto louan khüpetkei
hoba laukei, “Yaangbou, kü shou to onoukei, aieilausi hao to auleshat bauakei hoba khonkuda; hao hanghangko wanmang to hoba deimang to tomatlangda.
Ngei hao ka eikshuong jungto leibakei lausikei haoenei hao amaitien.”
Jisuei jongaikei, “Kan maialembü hoba ayingbü meten! Ngo lalokche kan yoa kila? Ngei kan to lalokche natenla? Hao hato kü jungto leiba.”
Jisuei shabü sou to kaang hakkei, hoba shabü sou hao ka longkei hoba nashou kho kheijineithama maian apbei.
Eikshuong Jisu jungto sanshoua loukei hoba laukei, “Künei kho aiei shian asattien?”

Haoei haoen to laukei, “Aieilausi kaneibü mailem yongko hanbü ka; aishanga ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, kan to mailem yongkoshiklang tetche ongkei kisije, kanei shongh khüto, ‘Haka khüto kukashi,’ dogo laulabü, hoba kho kuklabü; kan shanga athükaminlabü ai akilabü.
(Haibüje lubüei aying, lausikei welau si nyengbüei ong sattida.)”
Haoen Galila kijinei, Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Müteibü Shou mütshuongeibü ikmanga khümbo kuan aplabü.
Haoenei hao haitilabü, hoba sembounyet hao langngailabü.” Hobaje haoen aeibou maang ngangkei.
Ladang haoen Kapernaum to loukei, lembüchem khümnam hebü shuong Peter jungto louan laukei, “Kaneibü lenbouei lembüchem khümnam atda lao?”
Haoei laukei, “Atda.” Ladang hao chem to lotkei Jisuei shaang laukei, “Simon, nyi ai damda? Kaodak Choba shuongei khümnam ka ao leda? Haoen shousi ka si küksithang ka?”
Haoei jongaikei, “Küksithang ka.” Jisuei hao to laukei, “Khülongaje shousi kho solo.

Lausikei senei hebütakbü shuong aphaiyettilabü, hibü yungnyu to hauashi, yaüjin attiashi hoba shaang minbü ngau kho sungenashi; hoba khoeibü sembung kekan chühashi hoba nyi sempak che haplabü. Kho jungan hauan seti shanga atashi.”
Kho jihsiphaia eikshuong Jisu jungto louan laukei, “Khülongaje Khuthük sanglea ao yaangbou?”
Haoei hao jungto nashou hanbü che ngabaan haoen thedanga phoyokei,
hoba laukei, “Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, kanei sepeian nashou hanbü shuong tegü ayei longaje, kan Khuthük Sangle to üetenlabü.
Hibü ho nashou hanbü tegü aoei jembü lulo eaaoa yeilaje, hao Khuthük sanglea yaangbou.
Kü nyena aoei ho tegübü nashou hanbü che sungletlaje haoei ngo sungletda.
“Lausikei kü to mailembü habü hanbü shuong yoa che ongkei aoei phaiyettilaje, hao shangaje ngünbü laang che ngüma yakan simaang haübüa shemetnyu haibü khaibou.
Mütshuong mailema phaiyettibü longtilabü kibü shanga kaodak to ügütü! Khübü haüthüklabü hang, lausikei ao danko khübü haüthüklaje kho müt shanga ügütü!

“Ka ik ayingsi ka youei no phaiyettia longa, kho ka ka wetan apashi. Ik nyi ayingsi you nyi yeman thon akibü wan to lapan attikhoulabü toje yousi ik sian ayingsi so kean langkeishang to atbü ka shanga maibou.
Hobaje ka nyekei no phaiyettia longa kho ka ka phekan apashi. Nyeklang nyi yeman molowan to lapan attikhoulabü toje, nyek che yeman langkeishang to atbü ka shanga maibou.
“Habü hanbü shuong yoka tetche ongkei aweasüngko ajungeila maangsangashi, aishanga ngei kan to lenda, khuthüka haoeneibü khuthük hangangbü shuongei ponpendou khuthüka kibü Kübou the hapda.
(Aishanga Müteibü Shou mauan kibü khümenla loukei.)
“Kanei ai damda? Müt cheei san saongao kisije hoba khübü yoka che ayinglamto sadalonga, haoei san anjinngaoto gü kho shongha apyoan ayinglamto haubü maubü che kho lamla ohaulep lo?
Hobaje haoei kho hapsije, ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, ayinglam to asatbü san anjinngaoto gü toje ho shanga bouje haoei aei olinda.
Kho tegü habü hanbü shuong yo ka che ongkei mautila khuthüka kibü kaneibü Bouei maangüangda.
“Kaibü jaisinaei ka khulimbo shabü shonalonga, hauashi hoba hao to sanshoua hakashi. Haoei ka to ditkua longaje nyi kaibü jaisina paileda.
Haoei aditku longa, ngühsidei pendou aukabü sembung nyi ayingsi semei jemlabü yingsije, ka yoa lubü müt che ayingsi nyi leiyoan hauashi.
Haoei haoen to aditku longa lashong to lenshi; hoba haoei lashong tokei aditku longaje hao kho küksithang ayingsi khüm hebü che tegü jungeishi.
“Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, kanei ai ong kaodaka khühlaje kho khuthüka khühlabü hoba kanei ai ong kaodaka sakkulaje kho khuthüka sakkulabü.
“Tokei ngei kan to lenda, kanei subüjabü denche shangabü kaodaka kan müt nyi maangpon chela lesije, kho khuthüka kibü Kübouei kan shanga kümbulabü;
Aishanga lan nyi ayingsi sem kü nyena kamakei khünei ngo haoen yoa kia.”
Kheijinei Peter louan hao to phekei, “Bunyubou, kü jaisinaei kü khulimbo shabü shonalonga, ngei hao la ladüngnei ap kula? Nyetnei sühko sai?”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Nyetnei sühko dogo ngei ka to telenkho, lausikei, Anjinleinei nyet sühko.”
“Hibü, Khuthük Sangle kho Choba cheei jembü sambü shuong yoa nam weyobü phatkei.
Ladang haoei weyola khangkei namsen hajar an thebou che hao jungto leibakei.
Lausikei kula akisije, hao hoba haoyak, hoba shousi shuong, hoba haoei kibü pendou yakla hoba sanghshemla haoeibü Chobaei sakkukei.
“Hibü sambüei hao thedanga khüpetkei hoba lembo laukei, ‘Kü to haisühkai, hoba ngei ka la khümbo shemlabü.’
Khonei sambüeibü Chobaei hao to sanoukei hoba hao litikei hoba hao la sangh kho apbukei.
Lausikei kho sambü kho khuong to angan, hao la sempak saongao thebü jenabou sambü che haüyokei. Haoei hao lapbei hoba sangloua nyatan laukei, ‘Nyi thebü kho labükai.’
Hibü hao jenabou sambüei khüpetan hao to sukojako laukei, ‘Kü to haisühkai, hoba ngei ka la shemlabü.’
Lausikei haoei adit, hoba haoei shemla thebü pendou adekhüm shongko hao thüngdang to lapan jinkei.
Ladang hao jenabou sambü shuongei kho kümbü hapbei, haoen aeibou maangto shatkei, hoba haoeneibü Choba jungto louan haüthükbü pendou wanan lenkei.
Kheijinei haoeibü Chobaei hao ngabaan hao to laukei, ‘No sambü amaibü, nyi subüjabü ka ngei ka la sangh pendou apbukei.
Yingalonga, ngei ka to lai onoukei, nyikei kheishou ka jenabou sambü to onoujan aying lo?
Kheijinei haoeibü Choba aeibou khauangkei hoba haoeibü sangh khümbo adekhüm shongko, khonkutibou ikmangto hao khümbomeiko kuan apbei.’
Hibü kan mütpem wekoei jembü jaisina la maangpon ka ap akulonga, khuthüka kibü Küboueikei kho tegü kan to jungeilabü.”
Ladang Jisuei khübü ngühlau thonkei, haoei Galil apyojung Jordan thidanga kibü Jihuda kaophei to loukei.
Mütshang yaang haophai sembei, hoba haoei haoen khünei maitikei.
Farisi shuong hao jungto louan hao huonko phekei, “Bousuei den che shanga jembü yak sattijan sai?”
Haoei jongaikei, “Püngla khangla Kümbouei khunak shousi bousu si yaksa kümbei,
hoba haoei laukei, ‘Ho shangabüa bousuei haobou si haonyu apyolabü hoba haoyak to phenyoan kilabü, hoba ham chela yeilabü’ dogo kanei awe lo?
Hibü penyi aying lausikei che. Hibü Mühghaüei ai chela shenyotia kho mütei abangtijan.”
Haoenei hao to laukei, “Khülongaje satlabü le kuan sattiashi dogo aila Mosaei sakkukei?”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Kan maangpon kaangbü khoei Mosaei kan la jembü yak bangtila sakkukei; lausikei püngla khanglaje khei akitei.
Ngei kan to lenda, asangalanbü to liman, aoyouei jembüyak sattian lubü yaksa lelaje, haoei asangalanbü shonda.”
Hao eikshuongei hao to laukei, “Bousu jembü yak to kheinyu phenyoan ki yingalonga, chem akanbü ong khaibou.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Mudonga aoyou la Mühghaüei kuan ki khübü to liman laubü ho pendouei thamje asungletenda;
aishanga atje nyusema sungphatan bukbü müt kia, atje mütei sungphatbü kia, hoba atje Khuthük Sangle laüa jembü lolo sungphatbü la yeibü kia. Aoei thüklaje haoei lenbü ho sungletashi.”
Kheijinei hao ikei shangan welautila shanga nashou hanbü shuong hao jungto leibakei; lausikei haoen leibabü shuong to eikshuongei kaang hakkei.
Lausikei Jisuei laukei, “Nashou hanbü shuong pho- yoashi. Haoen kü jungto loubü tethanget, aishanga Khuthük Sangle habü tegübü shangabü ki.”
Haoei haoen to ikei shangkei hoba hao bangkei.
Müt che loukei hoba hao to laukei, “Lenbou, ponpen langkei hapla shanga ngei ai maibü kümla?”
Haoei hao to laukei, “Ai maibü ki kho shangabü aila nyi kü to pheda? Maibüje che ong ki. No langkei to atmang sühalonga ngühkhüm shuong jungeiashi.”
Haoei hao to laukei, “Laobou?” Jisuei laukei, “Nyi ühaitijan, Nyi asangalanbü ashonjan, Nyi akokjan, Nyi amlangbü aukabü akujan,
Kabou si kanyu soumo hatashi; hoba Nyi kalepbou to jembü tegü sanoujan.”
Heshoubouei hao to laukei, “Khübü pendou ngei jungeiakei; ngo toukei aiei aonkei?”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “No penbüsoubü yeimang sühsije, hauashi, nyi kibü yakashi, hoba shalebü la kuashi hoba khuthüka kaibü nyaksinam kilabü; hoba kaiya, hoba küphai semashi.”
Lausikei ladang heshoubouei kho laubü ditkei, hao ngangko ngaikei; aishanga haoei nyaksinam juong kikei.
Jisuei hao eikshuong to laukei, “Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, keibü shuong shanga Khuthük Sangle to atla seklabü.
Nyiboukei ngei kan to lenda, keibü mütei Khuthük Sangle to atlabü toje nidku khün danko ut shetlangbü sobou.”
Eikshuongei kho ditjinei haoen aeibou maangpangkei hoba laukei, “Khülonga ao ong khümenla?”
Jisuei haoen to chühkei hoba laukei, “Ho müt shanga athükaminlabü, lausikei Mühghaüei pendou thükkei.”
Kheijinei Peterei laukei, “Kün shangabü lai? Künei pendou apyoan kaphai sembei. Khülonga künei ai hapla?”

Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, Haanbü sanglea ladang Müteibü Shou jembü soneikangbü setshanga setlaje, kheijinei kan küphai sembü shuongei Israel phang anthüknyi mat jembo, setshang anthüknyia setlabü.

Tokei, aoyouei chem yingasikei, jaisina yingasikei, nousina yingasikei, bou yingasikei, nyu yingasikei, shousi yingasikei, sekphai yingasikei kü nyen laüa apyoa, haoei saongao onko haplabü, hoba ponpen langkei phet phanlabü.
Lausikei shaangbü dan juong phailabü, hoba phaibü dan juong shaanglabü.”
“Khuthük Sangle sekbubou che haoeibü semlühlaaka khüptila shanga ngeyang ete eik lamla haubü phatkei.
Haoei mulambü shuong to chaloua sempak che bang kula theyoan, haoei semlühlaak to haoen koutikei.
Hao ngeyang angh gü thünga haukei hoba lubü at ai kümlaleila akiko namyakshanga loan hapbei;
hoba haoei haoen to laukei, ‘Kankei semlühlaak to kouashi, hoba ngei kan la ai mulaje kho kulabü.’
Hobaje haoen koukei. Tokei hao chajihboua hoba chasemlamto sem thünga dogo haukei hoba jeteitham kümbei.
Angh ngao thünga hao haukei, hoba lubü shuong loan hapbei. Haoei haoen to laukei, ‘Kan hanei aila chaseko ai kümbo loda?’
Haoenei hao to laukei, ‘Aishanga kün aoeikei eik alam.’ Haoei haoen to laukei, ‘Kankei semlühlaak to kouashi.’
“Ladang chasem sühkei sekbunyuei haoeibü ikjaibou to laukei, ‘Kümbüleibü shuong ngaashi, hoba haoen phaibou ka khangan shaangboubü sühko la, jembü mu kuashi.’
Chasemlamto angh ngao jih thünga koutibü shuong loukei hoba haoen mütpem wekoei sempak che bang sungletkei.
Ladang shaang koutibü shuong loukei, haoenei aei haplabü dogo dambei; lausikei haoeneikei sempak che bang ong hapbei.
Ladang haoenei kho hapbei haoenei sekbubou khulimbo nyamnyambo,
laukei, ‘Habü phai loubü shuongei angh che ong kümbeileikei, hoba kün aoyouei chaseko hüko chanyuei juokbü natko khüpbei, nyi haoen kün to jeteitham yeitikei!’
“Haoei haoen yo kabü che to jongaikei, ‘Jena, ngei ka to aikei thechühbü akümda. Nyi kü to sempak che shanga atheyo lo?
Ka shangabü ai yingkeije kho sungashi hoba ngaiashi. Ho phaibou la ka to jetei kulabü kho kü maang yingkei.
Ngeibüei ngei kü maangleko kümjan aying lo? Ngo maangshikbü shanga nyi nyekto shatda sai?’
Hibü phaibü shuong shaanglabü hoba shaangbü shuong phailabü.”
Jisu Jerusalem to angjinei, eikshuong anthüknyi kho ong hao yoa leikei, hoba lama haoei haoen to laukei,
“Ditashi, sen Jerusalem to angda, hoba Müteibü Shou ungshedbou shuong hoba Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong ik to khümbo kuan aplabü. Haoenei hao haitila shedbü kulabü,
hoba nyikulabü, semlabü hoba peiseia thünglabü shanga küksithang ikmang to khümbo kuan aplabü, hoba hao sembounyet langngailabü.”
