Kheijinei Zebedi shou nyieibü nyu jembü shounyi yoa hao jungto louan, hao lembo, hao to denche sukeijakei.
Haoei sao to laukei, “Nyi ai mangsühda?” Saoei hao to laukei, “Habü kü shounyi, ka Sanglea kaibü mae aenei che hoba nanaenei che settila sakkuashi.”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Kanei ai phedaje kho kanei angekei. Ngei tou yungla kibü thung kho kanei yungenlep lo?” Haoenei hao to laukei, “Künei thükakei.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Maimaitham kü thung ka yunglabü, lausikei kü mae aenei hoba nanaenei settila khoje ngei kulabü ji; lausikei Kübouei kho aoyou shanga lamlekei khübü shangabü ki.”
Ladang an khoei ditkei, haoenei jaisinanyi khüto mang- pokkei.
Lausikei Jisuei haoen ngakei hoba laukei, “Küksithang songdakbü shuongei haoen thüka bunyu yeida, hoba haoeneibü yaangbü shuongei haoen thüka hau jungeida, kho kanei ngekei.
Kan yoaje khei ayinglabü, lausikei kan yoa aoei yaangmang sühda, hao kan khangenbou yingjan,
hoba kan yoa ao shaangmang sühda, hao kaneibü aao yingjan.
Kho tegütham Müteibü Shou khangentila ji, lausikei khangenla, hoba juongnyu angla jembü langkei kula loukei.”
Haoenei Jerikho apyojinei mütshang yaang haophai sembei.
Lamkoa setan kibü nyekthubü müt nyiei Jisu danko ditan ngekko laukei, “Dawid Shou Yaangbou, küsi to onoukai!”
“Alemenko kiashi” dogo noknyühei haosi to hakkei, lausikei haosiei aei kaangbou ngekkei, “Dawid Shou Yaangbou, küsi to onoukai!”
Hibü Jisuei sangsembo loan, haosi ngako laukei, “Ngei kasi shanga ai kümtimang sühda?”
Haosiei hao to laukei, “Yaangbou, küsieibü nyek iptikumang sühda.”
Jisuei sanouko dambei hoba haosieibü nyek to meitikei. Kheijinei haosiei hapbei hoba haophai sembei.
Haoen Jerusalem nyangko sühlangkei hoba Oliv shongha kibü Bethfage to loukei. Jisuei eik nyi,
haosi to hai lauko hautikei, “Kasi thedang kabü sang to atashi, hoba khonei gadu che phenan shoushou yoa haplabü. Khünyi sengan kü jungto leiba,
hoba atei kasi to aiche laua longa, ‘Bunyubouei khamda’ dogo lenshi; kheijinei haoei ham hautilabü.”
Ho thuseibü danko,
“Zion nouyangshou to lenashi,
Chühashi, ka Choba eaaoa gadu thüka,
khei gadu shoushou thüka setan ka jungto louada” dogo laubü kho loushedla shanga haüthükkei.
Eik nyi haukei hoba Jisuei haosi la sakkubü tegü kümbei.
Haosiei gadu si shoushou kho leibakei, hoba haoeneibü neisimei khünyi thüka seikukei, hoba hao khonei setkei.
Mütshang yaangbüei haoeneibü neisimei lamnyua imbukei, hoba lubü shuongei bunyu ka buham wetan lamnyua imbukei.
Hao thedang to haubü hoba hao phainei yangbü noknyüh shuongei ngekko laukei, “Dawid Shou, Khümenashi! Bunyubou nyena loubü haülabü yingshi. Thükkaboua nyensang yaang yingshi!”
Ladang hao Jerusalem to atkei, sangnyu khümbo panglangyokei. “Kho ao?” dogo haoenei laukei.
Noknyühei laukei, “Ho Galil kaodaka Nazaret kabü thuseibü Jisu.”
Jisu lembü chem to atkei, hoba yakbü hoba jekbü dan pendou shian sattikei; haoei namjeibü daneibü khümsuok si dukutuk yakbü daneibü setshang khokan koutikei;
hoba haoei haoen to laukei, “Laishibaei lauda, ‘Küchem to welaubü chem dogo nyenlabü’; lausikei kanei ho kokbü shuongeibü laangbob la yeitida.”
Nyekthubü si sokebü shuong lembü chem to hao jungto loukei, hoba haoei haoen maitikei.
Ladang ungshedbou shuong si Ngühkhüm lenbou shuongei haoei maangpanglabü kümsilei kümbü, hoba “Dawid Shou, Khümenashi!” dogo nashousi shuongei lembü chema ngekyobü hapbei haoen khauangkei,
hoba haoenei hao to laukei, “Haoenei laubü kho nyi ditdalao?” Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Aika; ‘Nyi nasak hoba senshepbü sembung ka nyensangbü soutia’ dogo kanei ladangkei awe lo?”
Haoei haoen apyokei, hoba sangnyu ka longan Bethani to atkei, hoba khünei thüngkei.
Hao ngeyang ete longeijinei hao mühei haikei.
Haoei lam- phanga bhuklong che hapan khüto lousi yik to liman ai ühüp. Haoei khüto laukei, “Tou ka jaüan ladangkei ka to mai tehek!” Hobaje bhuklong khoyam yuikei.
Eikshuongei kho hapan maang- pangkei hoba laukei, “Ailaibü bhuklong khoyam yuian apbei?”

Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, kanei atoknokko mailemsije, bhuklong to ai kümbei, kanei khüjo ong kümla aying, lausikei kanei ho shongh to mangkei, ‘No haka tonlangan simaangto thapjung atashi’, dogo laulabü, hoba kho haüthüklabü;
mailembo welaubüei kanei ai ong hilaje pendou kanei haplabü.”
Hao lembü chem to atan songlenko kijinei, ungshedbou shuong si jaishou shuong louan hao to laukei, “Ai hauei nyi habü kümda? Aoei ka la ho hau kukei?”
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Ngeikei kan ka che phelabü. Kanei kü la kho lenalonga ngeikei ai hauei habü kümsilei kümda, kho kan la lenlabü.
Johan Baptikubü laka loukei, khuthük ka si müt ka?” Haoen si haoen wetyoko laukei, “ ‘Khuthük ka’, dogo senei laualonga, ‘Khülonga aila kanei hao to maialem?’ dogo haoei sen to laulabü.
Senei ‘Müt ka’, dogo laualonga senei noknyüh to hatda; aishanga pendouei Johan kho thuseibü che dogo sungletda.”
Haoenei Jisu to jongaikei, “Künei angekei.” Haoei haoen to laukei, “Ngei ai hauei habü kümsilei kümda kho ngei kan to telenkho.”
“Kanei ai damda? Müt cheei shousi müt nyi kikei, haoei shaangbou jungto hauan laukei, ‘Kü shou, hauashi hoba tat semlühlaaka kümaleiashi.’
Haoei jongaikei, ‘Ngo akoulabü.’ Kho phaia haoei haoeibü maang kümetkei hoba koukei.
Haoei nyiboubü jungto hauan jeteibü ngüh kho ong laukei. Haoei jongaikei, ‘Koukho, yaangbou’; lausikei hao akou.

Khünyi yo ka bouei maangangbü laobouei kümbei?” Haoenei laukei, “Shaangbouei.” Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, khüm hebü shuong si suonlamnyu shuong kan to shaang Khuthük Sangle to atda.

Aishanga Johan kan jungto louan saopobü lamnyu lenkei hoba kanei hao to maialem; lausikei khüm hebü shuong si suonlamnyu shuongei hao to mailembei. Kanei kho hapbei, lausikei phaito ongkei maangpon sepeian hao to maialem.”

“Lubü ngühphatbü che ditashi: Sekbubou che kikei, haoei semlühlaak lekei, hoba kho kaiko ba lekei, hoba khonei nitshang thukei, hoba lapheishon che shekei. Haoei kho moubü shuong la apyoan kaonyek saabü che to satkei.
Ladang mai kheilabü jih lousühkei haoei jembü mai hapla shanga sekmoubü shuong jungto jembü sambü shuong koutikei.
Sekmoubü shuongei hao sambü shuong lapbei, che to ngümbei, lubü che haoenei haitikei, hoba lubü che haoenei laangei tetetkei.
Nyiboukei haoei shaangbou to juongbou lubü sambü shuong koutikei, hoba haoenei kho tegü ong haoen to jungeikei.
Phaila haoei haoen jungto haoshou koutiko laukei, ‘Haoenei küshou to soumo hatlabü.’
Lausikei ladang sekmoubü shuongei shou kho hapbei haoen yoa joyoko laukei, ‘Phetphanlabou kho ho yingkei. Kaiya, senei hao haitikho, hoba haoeibü peisilei sungkho.’
Haoenei hao lapbei, hoba semlühlaak ka hao shian sattikei, hoba hao haitikei.
Hibü ladang sekbubou loulaje haoei khübü sekmoubü shuong to ai kümla?”
Haoenei hao to laukei, “Haoei khübü amaibü shuong kho aonouko mautilabü, hoba jih sühbüa sekmoubü aoyouei hao la mai kula, kheibü sekmoubü la haoei semlühlaak kho thounoutilabü.”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Kanei Laishibaa:
‘Chemdangbü shuongei laobou laang ale,
kho chemnyek laang la yeikei;
ho Bunyubouei kümbei hoba sen thea maangpanglabü ki’,
dogo laubü kho ladangkei wean achühkei lo?
Hibü ngei kan la lenda, kan ka Mühghaü Sangle langlabü, hoba mai hekbü phang che la kulabü.
(Aoyou kho laang thüka atetlaje hao netla yeilabü,
hoba ho ao thükto lotlaje hao thamngu la yeiko ngünnyinlabü.)”
Ungshedbü shuong hoba Farisi shuongei haoeibü ngüh- phatbü ditjinei, haoei haoen shangabü lauda dogo haoenei shuokkei,
hoba haoenei hao lapla komeiko kiasikei haoenei noknyüh to hatkei, aieilausi noknyühei hao thuseibü dogo dambei.
Jisuei nyibou haoen to ngühphatbüei lenko laukei:
“Khuthük Sangle Choba cheei haoshou shanga chemkanlem oknyinbü phatkei.
Haoei hao sambü shuong lem to chibü shuong ngala hautikei, lausikei haoenei loumang asüh.

“Nyibou haoei lubü sambü shuong hautiko laukei, ‘Chian kibü shuong to lenashi, Chühashi, kü shausiyung lamleakei, ngeibü masu pongsu hoba amenbü samkeisamuk haitiakei, hoba ajanjan khümbo lamleakei. Chemkanlem to kaiya.’
Lausikei haoenei maang akuko lulu haang to, che haoeibü sek to, hoba lubü che namyakshang to, dogo linkei.
Joubü shuongei hao sambü shuong lapan himou bauko jungeikei hoba haoen haitikei.
Choba khau angkei; hoba haoei hao sepai shuong hautian khübü müt haitibü shuong shemtikei, hoba haoeneibü sangnyu thekei.
Kheijinei haoei hao sambü shuong to laukei, ‘Chemkanlem lamleakei, lausikei chibü shuong amu.
Hibü kan khongyaang lambhek to hauashi, hoba kanei ladüng haplaje pendou chemkanlem to ngashi.’
Sambü shuong lambhek to aakei, hoba haoenei hapbü maibü amaibü pendou leishaikei; hoba chemkan chem yenei shenkei.
“Lausikei Chobaei yenbou shuong to chühla lotjinei haoenei khünei chemkan nei aneibü che hapbei.
Haoei hao to laukei, ‘Jena, no hato chemkan nei aneiko lai lotkei?’ Lausikei haoei ngüh üang.
Kheijinei Choba sambü shuong to laukei, ‘Hao youa ika khühashi, hoba hao tangaenei nakthühbüa tekan apashi. Khünei haapbo hauh uyolabü;’
aishanga juongnyu ngada lausikei shijo ong pienda.”
Kheijinei Farisi shuongei hauan hao ngüh sunga lai mintila huon kümbei.

Haoenei haoeneibü eikshuong Herodeibü eikshuong yoa liko hao jungto hautikei hoba haoenei laukei, “Lenbou, no ngühmaang lanbü, hoba nyi ngühmaia Mühghaü lam lenda, hoba ao to ühütda dogo künei ngekei; aishanga nyi müt the to achühda.
Hibü, kün to lenbü; nyi ai damda? Kaisar la khümnam kujan si akujan?”
Lausikei Jisuei haoen amaibü chühenkei hoba laukei, “Hibüyoubü dan, kanei aila ngo huonda?
Khümnam kho kü la lenbü.” Haoenei sempak che hao la sungbakei,
hoba haoei haoen to laukei, “Ho aoeibü noksa hoba nyendobü?”
Haoenei laukei, “Kaisareibü.” Kheijinei Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Yingalonga ai Kaisareibü kho Kaisar la kuashi hoba ai Mühghaüeibü kho Mühghaü la kuashi.”
Ladang haoenei kho ditkei haoen maangpangkei, hoba haoenei hao apyoan satkei.
Khünyet haibü shuong alangngaida dogo laubü Saduki shuong hao jungto loukei hoba hao to pheko
laukei, “Lenbou, Mosaei laukei, ‘Müt che shousi akiko haialonga, haoenei latnyu kho leiyetlabü hoba haojai shanga youyik longtilabü.’
Kün yoa jaisinasi nyet kikei. Shaangbou kho chem kanan haikei; hoba youyik akiko haoyak haona la phoyokukei.
Kho tegü ong nyiboubü, hoba semboubü, hoba nyetboubüa sühko haüthükkei.
Pendou to thonla yaksa kho haikei.
Hibü langngaijinei nyet yo khünei sao ao yak yingla? Aishanga pendouei sao yakla lekei.”
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Kan satan apashi, aieilausi kanei Laishiba ayingsi Mühghaü sei angekei.
Aishanga langngaijinei haoenei chem akanda, ayingsi laolamla ohautida, lausikei haoen khuthüka khuthük hangangbü shuong tegü ki.
Lausikei haibü ka langngaibü shangabü Müghaüei kan to,
‘Ngo Abraham Müghaü, Isak Mühghaü hoba Jakob Müghaü’ dogo laubü wean achüh lo? Hao haibü shuong Mühghaü aying lausikei langkeibü Mühghaü ki.”
Ho ditjinei noknyüh haoei lenbüa maangpangkei.
Ladang haoei Sadukibü shuong ngüh alongko jangtibü ditkei, Farisi shuong che la takshatkei.
Haoen yo kabü Ngühkhüm lenbou cheei hao huonko phekei,
“Lenbou, Ngühkhüma sakkubü pendou to laobou yaangkei?”
Haoei hao to laukei, “Ka maangpon pendouei, ka soushou pendouei, hoba kaibü sensimaang pendouei nyi Bunyubou ka Mühghaü sanouashi.”
Ho kongnyubou hoba shaangbou ngühkhüm ki.
Ho phatko thenkabou ho ki: “Nyi ka lepbou to jembü tegü sanoujan.”
Habü sakkubü nyi honei Ngühkhüm hoba Thuseibü shuong ngüh khümbo nongakei.
Farisibü pendou yoshaian kijinei Jisuei haoen to phekei,
“Kanei Khrista shangabü ai damda? Hao aoshou?” Haoenei hao to laukei, “Dawid shou.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Kholonga ailai küman, Dawid Soushouei jungeiko hao to,
‘Bunyubouei ngeibü Bunyubou to lenkei,
Ngei kaibü dangbou shuong ka you phanga
aphoku shongko kü maenei
setshi,’ dogo lauko, ‘Bunyubou’ dogo ngada?
Dawidei hao to ‘Bunyubou’ dogo ngaa longaje ailai küman hao hao shou yingla?”
Aoeikei hao to ngühpem che ongkei ajongaien, hoba khünyet ka jaüan touje aoeikei hao to phebü phela maang ayaangen.
Kheijinei Jisuei noknyüh to hoba hao eikshuong to lenko,
laukei, “Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong si Farisi shuong Mosa setshanga setda.
Hibü haoenei kan to ai ong lenlaje kümashi hoba jungeiashi; lausikei haoenei tegü kanei teküm, aishanga haoenei lauda hoba akümda.
Haoenei on atshaibü chela khühyoan müteibü phak to jinkuda, lausikei haoeneije khübü phonenla ikjishou ongkei topeimang asühda.
Haoeneibü kümsilei pendou mütei chühtila haoenei kümda. Aishanga haoenei saopobü shijimok yaangtida hoba neiyikshen loutida;
haoenei lemshou lemyaanga kaoen maibou hoba sinagoga thükkabou setshang,
namyakshanga salem mangsühda, hoba mütshuongei, Lenbou, dogo ngatimang sühda.
Lausikei kan to Lenbou dogo angatijan, aishanga kanei Lenbou che ki, hoba kan pendou jaisina.
Kaodaka aotokei kaneibü bou dogo tenga, aishanga kanei khuthüka Bou che ki.
Hobaje leiyeibou dogo tengati, aieilausi kanei Leiyeibou che, Khrista ki.
Kan yoa pendou to yaangbou kho kan khangenbou yinglabü.
Aoei jembü lolo yaanglaje hao hanlabü, hoba aoei jembü lolo hanlaje hao yaanglabü.
“Kan Ngühkhüm lenbou hoba Farisi, hibüyoubü shuong, ügütü! Kanei müt thedanga khuthük Sangle kou khinan apda; kan jembükei üetda, hoba atla haujembü shuongkei üettida.
(“Kan Ngühkhüm lenbou hoba Farisi hibüyoubü shuong, ügütü! Haptila shanga loubang welauko kiankei, kanei latnyu shuong chem suida; kho aoa kanei kayang yaangbou hapmeilabü.)

Kan Ngühkhüm lenbou, hoba Farisi hibüyoubü shuong, ügütü! Kanei müt che sepeitila shanga yungnyu si kaodak kaijembo paida; hoba hao khei yeijinei kanei hao kan to phejan nyiei aei kan tegü molowan shousi la yeitida.

“Kan nyekthubü lamleibü shuong, ‘Müt cheei lembü chem phongko thelet lanleda longa, kho ai aying; lausikei ao mütei lembü chem kabü hon nyen phongko thelet lanletlaje haoje asatenkei’, dogo lenbü shuong ügütü!
Kan ngoubü hoba nyekthubü dan! Laobou yaangkei, hon si, hon saüenbü la yeitibü lembü chem?
Tokei, ‘Müt cheei lemshon phongko thelet lanleda longa, kho ai aying; lausikei ao mütei kho thüka kibü jongsak nyen phongko thelet lanletlaje haoje asatenkei.’
Kan nyekthubü dan! Laobou yaangkei, jongsak si, jongsak saüenbü la yeitibou lemshon?
Aoei lemshon phongko thelet lanletda, lemshon hoba kho thüka kibü pendou phongko thelet lanletda;
hoba aoei lembü chem phongko thelet lanletda, lembü chem hoba khonei kibou nyen phongko thelet lanletda;
hoba aoei khuthük phongko thelet lanletda, Mühghaü setshang hoba khonei setbou nyen phongko thelet lanletda.

“Kan Ngühkhüm lenbou hoba Farisi, hibüyoubü shuong ügütü! Kanei shongen, hong- pangshou hoba shikmei maitibou an phejan kuda, hoba kanei Ngühkhüm kabü kongnyu shuong, khei; ngühmai, üeisanou, hoba mailem wailetda. Kanei habü küman kijan, hoba lubü khokei wailetan aphokujan.
“Nyekthubü lamleibü dan, kanei shomesho ngaitian apda, lausikei utje suida!
“Kan Ngühkhüm lenbou hoba Farisi, hibüyoubü shuong ügütü! Kanei thung si phau dangje samda, lausikei maangje ailamaiphop si athepetbü maangdühei shenettiakei.
Nyekthubü Farisi, shaangla thung maang hiashi, khoei dangkei hinseilabü.
“Kan Ngühkhüm lembou hoba Farisi hibüyoubü shuong, ügütü! Kan hee thupaibü phatakei, laobou dang chühla he maikei, lausikei maangje haibü shuongeibü losilak hoba asaopobüei shenan ki.
Hibü kan kei müt thedanga saopobü tegü, lausikei maangje hibüyoubü hoba ngühkhüm lulimbüei shenan ki.
“Kan Ngühkhüm lenbou hoba Farisi hibüyoubü shuong, ügütü! Kanei thuseibü shuongeibü hee kümda hoba saopobü shuongeibü hee chühjanko yaüda;
hoba kanei lauda, ‘Kün pisibou metena kün kibü yingma, thuseibü shuong haitibüa haoen yoa kün teyokhoulabü.’
Hibü kanei jembü lolo kan thuseibü shuong haitibü shisishousi dogo aukabü kuda.
Khülongaje kan pisibouei püngkubü shemtiashi.
Kan pinyu shousi shuong, kanei ailai molowan matjem ka satenla?

Khoei ngei kan la thuseibü shuong, songngedonge shuong hoba Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong hautikuda. Haoen yoka kanei at haitilabü hoba peiseia thüngettilabü; haoen at kanei kaneibü sinagoga semeilabü, hoba sangnyu ka sangnyua sühko shieilabü;
hoba kho laüa kaodaka saopobü sii phinbü pendou, khei ngühmaanglanbü Abel sii la jaüan kanei saoposhang si lemshon kanglanga haitibü Barakhia shou Zekharia siia sühko kan thük to shatlabü.
Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, khübü pendou shangabü kayang ho meten thük to loulabü.”

“Jerusalem, Jerusalem, kan thuseibü haitibü hoba kan jungto hautibü dan laangei sonettibü shuong, aunyuei jembü shoushou shuong saoeibü kaakphanga yopbü tegü, ngei ladüngnei ka shousi shuong kü jungto leishaila haujembei, lausikei kanei amangsüh!
Chühashi, kaneibü chem kan la kongkong apyokuda.
Aishanga ngei kan to lenda, ‘Bunyubou nyena ao louda hao haülabü yingshi’, dogo alau shongko, tou ka jaüan kanei ngo ühüplaü.”
Jisu lembüchem ka longan hao jembü lam to hauko kijinei, hao eikshuong hao la lembüchem dangbü shean lenla loukei.
Haoei haoen to jongaikei, “Kanei habü pendou hapdaoba lo? Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, hanei laang che thüka che tenan alusakko akilabü.”
Hao Oliv shongha setan kijinei eikshuong sanshoua loukei hoba laukei, “Habü ladang loushedla, hoba no loubü hoba kaodak thonbü amaaphilabü ai yingla? Kün la lenbüma.”
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Kan aolakei ayinglamto aleilangtila maangsangshi.
Aishanga müt juongei kü nyena, ‘Ngo Khrista’, dogo lauko loulabü, hoba haoenei juong ayinglam to leilanglabü.
Kanei wapyobü langh hoba wapyolabü ngühlang ditlabü. Kan amokla maangsangashi. Ho haüthükjan, lausikei thonbü tou aying.
Aishanga phangei phang khulimbo hoba sangleei sangle khulimbo lolabü, kaoen kaoena mühsinou hoba selonyibü kilabü.
Khübü pendou kho khonkula khangbü ki.
“Kheijinei haoenei kan khonsak haptila khümbo kulabü hoba haitilabü, hoba kü nyen laüa phang pendouei kan mangsenlabü.
Kheijinei juongnyu phaiyetlabü, cheei che khüpettilabü, cheei che mangsenyolabü,
hoba amlangbü thuseibü juong longlabü hoba juongnyu ayinglam to leilanglabü;
hoba ngühkhüm lulimbü pühabuba müt juongeibü sanou litham aplabü.
Lausikei aoei thonbü sühko natenlaje hao khümenlabü;
hoba ho Khuthük Sangle Ngühlangmaibü kaodak pendoua phang pendou to aukabü shanga songlenlabü, hoba kho phaia thonbü kho loulabü.
“Daniel thuseibüei laubü mangsenlabü ladang kanei sao- pobü kaoena loan haplaje (webouei shuokashi);
kheijinei Jihudaa aoyou ki shongh to satjan;
chemdaka kibou müt hao chem to peisilei sungla ayanjan;
hoba seka khüpbou müt jembü neisimei sungla angaijan.
Khübü chaloua mang akongbü hoba senyopbü yaksa shuong shanga ügütü!
“Kan satyobü khamalüha ayingsi Nounyet ayingtila welauashi,
aishanga kheijinei khonsak khonku yaang kilabü, kaopak jih ka tou sühko ho tegübü akitei; hoba toukei akilabü.
Khübü chalou ka awemauku tegüje müt aokei akhümenkhoulabü; lausikei khümenbü dan laüa khübü chalou shuong tuitikulabü.
Kho jiha müt atei kan to, ‘Chühashi, Khrista hanei kia,’ ayingsi ‘Khünei kia’ dogo laua longa maitelemma;
aishanga amlangbü Khrista dan hoba amlangbü thuseibü dan longlabü, hoba thüka longa saopobü shuongkei ayinglam to leilangla shanga amaaphilabü yaang hoba maangpanglabü lenlabü.
Chühashi ngei kan la thedangto tham lena.
Hibü haoenei kan to, ‘Chühashi, hao yama kia’, dogo laua longa tohauma; ‘Chühashi, maangkabü popchema kia’ dogo lausi maitelemma;
aishanga chaang aeka langpon khitsi chanep ae sühkokei lai hauda, kho tegütham Müteibü Shou loubü kilabü.
Lanei ong haibü mang kilaje, khonei hogon shuong chela shaian kilabü.
“Habü khonsak khonku wanbüsi chanyu nakthühan aplabü, hoba litnyuei jembü ngesakbü akulabú, müh ka khanshoulitshou shuong atlabü, hoba mühkabü hau shuong nyaakeilabü.

“Hobaje kheijinei müha Müteibü Shou amaaphilabü longlabü hoba kheijinei kaodak phang pendouei khüklangto jangngaiko haaplabü, hoba haoenei Müteibü Shou mühkabü sangmai si sei hoba soneikangbü yaanga loubü haplabü.
“Hobaje teklaang ngühlang yaangbüei haoei jembü khuthük hangangbü shuong hautilabü, hoba haoenei müh jithon ka jithon sühko kaophei lei ka jembü pienbü shuong leishailabü.
“Bhuklong ka ngühphatbü che ditletashi. Ladang hao bhekshou alibü sapbo yik longda, kanei sulang nepa dogo ngekei.
Hibü kaneikei khübü pendou hapjinei, Müteibü Shou nyangbüa, khei koukhüm junga kia dogo ngeshi.
Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, habü pendou aloushad shongko ho meten adanlabü.
Müh si kaodak dankhümlabü lausikei kü ngüh adankhümlabü.
“Lausikei ho chalou hoba jihsiphai shangabü khuthük hangangbü shuongeikei, ayingsi Shoueikei angekei. Bouei ong ngekei.
Aishanga Noa meten ailai kiteikei, kho tegü Müteibü Shou loubü kilabü.
Aishanga yungsen asühjinei, hoba Noa longchem to ütshongko, haoenei ailai shauko, yungko hoba laolam yaknga kuyoko kikei,
hoba yungsen loukouan haoen pendou ohaulang shongko haoenei ange. Müteibü Shou loubü kho tegü kilabü.
Kheijinei müt nyi seka khüpan kilabü, che leilanglabü hoba che apyolabü.
Yaksa nyi shem shiko kilabü; che leilanglabü hoba che apyolabü.
Pialemashi, aieilausi ai chaloua kaneibü Bunyubou loulaje kanei angekei.
“Kanei ho ngeashi, chembubouei ai jihsiphaia kokbü loula kho ngea tegüje, haoei lombo kikhoulabü hoba haoei jembü chem teleilutikhoulabü.
Hibü kankei lamlean kishi, aieilausi kanei adambü jih chenei Müteibü Shou loulabü.
“Kholongaje chembubouei jembü sambü shuong la jih tetbüa shausiyung kula shanga haoen thüka ikjai letibou maanglemenbü hoba songsido kibü sambü kho ao?
Haoeibü chembubou loujinei, sambü aoei khei kümbo haplaje, hao olinbou.
Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, haoei kibü pendou thüka hao ikjai letilabü.
Lausikei amaibü sambüei, ‘Ngeibü chembubou loula phaida’ dogo lauda,
hoba haoeibü jenabou sambü shuong to ngümla khangda, hoba ihyungbü dan yoa shaula hoba yungla khangda,
sambüeibü chembubou haoei adambü chalou chenei hoba haoei angebü jihsiphai chenei loulabü,
hoba hao netla yeiko jemnyinlabü hoba hao phejan hibüyoubü dan yoa janletkulabü. Khünei haapbü hoba hauh uyobü kilabü.”
“Kheijinei Khuthük Sangle kho saosüngbü medei an wanthung jungan, chemkanbü shuokla haubü phatko kilabü.
Haoen yoa ngao asangbü hoba ngao sangbüdobü kiteikei;
aishanga asangbü shuongei jembü wanthung jungkei lausikei wandei akün;
lausikei sangbüdobü shuongei jembü wanthung yoa lathunga wandei künkei.
Chemkanbou loula phaisije haoen pendou ngakkei hoba nyeket shikei.
“Lausikei metuphanga ngekko laukei, ‘Chemkanbou, chühashi! Hao to shuokyola hauashi.’
Kheijinei saosüngbü medei shuong pendou pienkei hoba jembü wanthung lamlekei.
Asangbü shuongei sangbüdobü shuong to laukei, ‘Kaneibü wandei ka kün la shijo jinbüma, aieilausi küneibü wanthung nyetda.’
Lausikei sangbüdobü shuongei jongaikei, ‘Kün shanga hoba kan shanga wandei souko akila thükkei. Kan yakbü shuong jungto haushi hoba kan shanga jekashi.’
Haoen jekla hauko kitoua chemkanbou lousühkei, hoba aoyou lamlean kiteikei haoen hao yoa chemkan lem to haukei, hoba kou khinngailangkei.
“Phaila joubü saosüngbü medei shuongkei louan laukei, ‘Yaangbou, Yaangbou, kün la ipbü.’
Lausikei haoei jongaikei, ‘Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, ngei kan angekei.’ ”
Hibü pianleman kishi, aieilausi kanei chalou ayingsi jih angekei.
“Ho müt cheei jembü sambü shuong ngashaian, jembü peisilei haoen la khümbo kuan lubü kaonyek to satbü phatkei;
che la haoei namsen ngao kukei, lubü che la nyi, hoba lubü che la che, dogo mütpem weko la luluei thükbü minbü thüng kukei hoba hao lubü kaonyek to satkei.
Namsen ngao sungletbouei tongde hauan khoei nam seikei hoba haoei namsen ngao pailetkei.
Jeteitham namsen nyi sungletbouei kei namsen nyi pailetkei.
Lausikei aoei che sungletkei haoei hauan kao thuan jembü bunyueibü nam huan phokei.
“Jihsiphai lounyu kian phaia khübü sambü shuongeibü bunyu loukei hoba haoen yoa we- yokei.
Aoei namsen ngao sungletkei haoei tokei namsen ngao aeila sungbako laukei, ‘Yaangbou, nyi kü la namsen ngao kukei, chühashi, ngei namsen ngao aei paileda.’
Hao sambouei hao to laukei, ‘Thumai, maibü hoba maanglembü sambü! Peisilei shijo thüka ka to maanglemenkei; ngei no juongnyu thüka phokulabü. No kaibü chembubou olinbü to lotashi, kaiya.’
Aoei namsen nyi sungletkei haoeikei louan laukei, ‘Yaangbou, nyi kü la namsen nyi kukei. Chühashi, ngei namsen nyi aei paileda.’
Hao sambouei hao to laukei, ‘Thumai, maibü hoba maanglembü sambü! Peisilei shijo thüka ka to maanglemenkei; ngei no juongnyu thüka phokulabü. No kaibü chembubou olinbü to lotashi, kaiya.’
Lausikei aoei namsen che sungletkei hao louan laukei, ‘Yaangbou, ngei no ngekei; no kausakbü müt, nyi lan awen khüka latda, hoba nyi lan aphin khüka yoshaida.
Ngo hatko kikei hoba hauan kaibü namsen kaoa hukei. Chühashi, kaibü hanei kia.’
Hao sambouei hao to laukei, ‘No amaibü hoba haulohaushed sambü! Ngei ainei awen khüka latda, hoba ainei aphin khüka yoshaida, dogo nyi ngekei lo?
Palongaje namthanbü dan la nyi kü nam kuan phokujan; hoba ladang ngo longeilaje künam yoa phopnam yoan hapmeikhoulabü.’
Hao ka namsen kho sungashi hoba namsen an kibou la kuashi;
aishanga aoei ki hao la aei kuyolabü, hoba haoei apsileko kilabü; lausikei aoei aki, haoei ai ki khokei hao ka langlabü.
Lejim akibü sambü kho khongaenei nakthühbü kaoena apashi; khonei haapbü hoba hauh uyobü kilabü.”
“Ladang Müteibü Shou jembü soneikangbü hoba hao yoa khuthük hangangbü pendou louyenlaje, kheijinei hao jembü soneikangbü setshanga setlabü;
hoba phang pendou hao thedanga leisheilabü, hoba sanlombouei lon ka san pinyinbü tegü, haoei haoen che ka che pin- yinlabü,
hoba haoei san shuong haoeibü mae aenei hoba lon shuong nanaenei pholabü.
Kheijinei Chobaei haoeibü mae aenei kibü shuong to laulabü, ‘Kaiya, Kübouei haükubü shuong, kan shanga kaopakjinei thama lamlean phokubü sangle phet phanashi;
aishanga ngo mühei haiko kikei hoba kanei kü la oknyinkei; ngo deilako kikei hoba kanei kü la inkei; ngo yenla lean kikei hoba kanei ngo leiyetkei;
ngo mütkong kikei hoba kanei kü la neikukei; ngo shatko kikei hoba kanei ngo pean chühkei; ngo thüngdanga kikei hoba kan kü jungto loukei.’
Kheijinei sao- pobü shuongei hao to jongaikei, ‘Bunyubou, ladang künei no mühei haiko hapan oknyinkei, ayingsi deilajinei inkei?
Ladang künei no yenla lean hapan leiyetkei, ayingsi mütkong kian neikukei?
Ladang künei no shatko hapan, ayingsi thüngdanga kian kajungto loukei?’
Chobaei haoen to jongaikei, ‘Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, habü ngeibü jaisina hanboutham yoa che to ongkei, kanei ai kümbei, kho kanei kü shanga kümbei.’
Kheijinei haoei nanaenei kibü shuong to laulabü, ‘Kan shedsikhau baubü shuong, kü jungka kukashi, hoba Satan hoba haoeibü hangangbü shuong shanga thon akibü wan lamlean phobü khüto atashi;
aishanga ngo müh kikei hoba kanei aoknyin; ngo deilako kikei hoba kanei yungla aku;
ngo yen la lean kikei hoba kanei ngo aleiyet; ngo mütkong kikei hoba kanei kü la aneiku, shatko hoba thüngdanga kikei hoba kanei ngo pean achüh.’
Kheijinei haoeneikei jongailabü, ‘Bunyubou, ladang no mühei haiko, ayingsi deilako, ayingsi yen la lean ayingsi mütkong, ayingsi shatko, ayingsi thüngdanga hapbei, hoba künei ka to athui?’
Kheijinei haoen to jongailabü, ‘Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, habü phangkabou shuong yoka che to ongkei kanei ai aküm, kho kanei kü shanga aküm.’
Haoen thon akibü shieikoe to haulabü, lausikei sao- pobü shuong ponpen thon akibü langkei to haulabü.”
Tou Jisuei khübü pendou lenkhüman phaia haoei hao eikshuong to laukei,
“Chalou nyinyet phaia Püetbülem sühlanglabü dogo kanei ngekei, hoba Müteibü Shou peiseia thüngla khümbomeiko kuan aplabü.”
Kheijinei ungshedbou shuong hoba jaishou shuong, Kaifa nyenbü thükkabou ungshedbou khonga liko takshatkei
hoba haoenei huonei youei Jisu lapla hoba haitila chela ngühthang yenkei;
lausikei haoenei laukei, “Senei ho Lem jiha akümjan. Senei khei kümalonga mütshuong yoa pühnyinlabü.”
Jisu Bethania Simon imbou chema kijinei,
yaksa cheei nam juongnyu mubü ponlem onang laang thungdou thupaibü che jungan hao jungto loukei, hoba hao shaushanga setan kijinei, saoei haoeibü khu to kho jinkukei.
Ladang eikshuongei kho hapbei haoen khauangkei hoba laukei, “Aila kho apsileda?
Kho juong lu yakan shalebü la kuenakei.”
Jisuei kho shuokan haoen to laukei, “Aila kanei yaksanyu khonsaktida? Saoei kü to kümsilei maibü kümda;
aishanga shalebü kan yoa ponpen kilabü, lausikei kan yoa ngo ponpen akilabü.
Saoei kü mang to onang jinkubü kho, ngo heea khünla saoei lamlekula shanga kümbei.
Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, kaodak pendoua lanei ong ho Ngühlangmaibü phinthonlaje, ho yaksaei kümbükei sao damenko laueilabü.”
Kheijinei Anthüknyi yoa, Judas Iskhariot nyenbü che ungshedbü shuong jungto haukei,
hoba laukei, “Ngei kan la hao khümbo kualonga kanei kü la ai kula?” Hobaje haoenei hao la sempak khujin wean jinkukei.
Kho jih ka jaüan haoei haoen la khümbomeiko kuan aplabü hangsilam lambei.
Tokai ajinbü Wentek Lem khangnyet eikshuong Jisu jungto louan laukei, “Ka shanga Püetbü lem shaula nyi kün la lan lamletimang sühda?”
Haoei laukei, “Sangnyu to atan müt khüto lenshi: Lenbouei lauda, ‘Ngeibü tetletbü jihsiphai sühlangda. Kü eikshuong yoa ka chema Püetbülem kho shaukho.’”
Jisuei haoen to laubü tegü eikshuongei kümbei, hoba haoenei Püetbülem lamlekei.
Ladang chasem sühkei, eik Anthüknyi yoa hao shaushang yungshanga setkei;
hoba haoen shauji yungjinei haoei haoen to laukei, “Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, kan yoa cheei ngo yaakshaulabü.”
Haoen aeibou maang ngangkei hoba hao to mütpem wekoei laukei, “Maimaitham, Bunyubou, kho ngo yinglao?”
Haoei jongaikei, “Aoei kü phaua jembü ik hambei khoei ngo yaakshaulabü.
Müteibü Shou, hao shanga Laishibaei laubü tegü satlabü, lausikei ao danko Müteibü Shou khümbo kuan apdaje kho müt shangaje ügütü! Kho müt shangaje hao abukko kibü maibou yingkhoulabü.”
Hao yaakshaubou Judasei jongaikei, “Lenbou, kho ngo sai?” Haoei hao to laukei, “Nyi laua.”
Haoen shauji yungjinei, Jisuei wentek sungkei, hoba haükukei, hoba shaknyinkei hoba kho eikshuong la kuko laukei, “Sungashi, shauashi; ho ngeibü mang.”
Haoei thung che sungkei, nyensang kukei, hoba kho hao eikshuong la kuko laukei, “Kan pendouei haka yungashi;
aishanga ho ngeibü thebülanbü sii laobou juongnyu shabü apla shanga koukei.
Ngei kan to lenda, kan yoa ngei Kübou sanglea semlühdei haanbü ayungshongko tou ka jaüan ngei ho semlühdei ayunglabü.”
Haoenei chia che lauan phaia Oliv Shongh to angkei.
Kheijinei Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Tao kü to kan pendou phaiyetlabü, aishanga Laishibaei lauda, ‘Ngei sanlombou to ngümlabü, hoba sanshuong aalabü’;
lausikei ngo langngaian phaia kan to shaang ngo Galil to haulabü.”
Peterei hao to jongaikei, “Pendou ka to phaiyetasikei, ngo ladangkei aphaiyetlabü.”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Ngühmaia ngei ka to lenda, tao aunak akoutoua nyi ngo semnei athekulabü.”
Peterei hao to laukei, “Ngo ka yoa hailabü kiasi dogokei ngei no athekuko akilabü.” Eikshuongeikei pendouei khei laukei.
Kheijinei Jisu haoen yoa Gethsemen dogo laubü kaoen che to loukei, hoba haoei hao eikshuong to laukei, “Ngo thi ae hauan welaujinei kan hanei kiashi.”
Haoei Peter hoba Zebedi shounyi hao yoa leikei, hoba maangto shatko aeibou khonkula khangkei.
Kheijinei haoei haoen to laukei, “Kü soushou haila tegü shaleda. Kan hanei kishi hoba kü yoa pianleman kishi.”
Hao thedang ae tuisho lian kaoa khüpetan welauko laukei, “Abou, ho thüklabü yingsije, ho thung kü ka kuktikai; khei yinga tegükei ngei maangangbü tegü aying, lausikei nyi maangangbü tegü yingshi.”
Hao eikshuong jungto loukei hoba haoen yepan hapbei, hoba haoei Peter to laukei, “Kan yepakei lo! Kan aokei angh che kü yoa pianleman kila athükda lo?
Kan takteibüa üatetla pialemashi, hoba welauashi. Maimaitham soushouje maangdakda, lausikei phea hau aki.”
Tokei hao nyiboukei haukei hoba welauko laukei, “Abou, ho ngei ayungko nangkula athüklonga, kamaang leshi.”
Hao longeikei hoba tokei yepan hapbei, aishanga haoen ngakbü ka nyek yuian kikei.
Haoei haoen apyokei hoba hauan semboukei jeteibü ngüh lauko welaukei.
Kheijinei hao eikshuong jungto louan haoen to laukei, “Kan tou sühko yepakei lo hoba haksoda lo? Chühashi, jih nyangko loua, hoba Müteibü Shou shabü shuong ikmang to khümbo kuan apa.
Meimeiashi, hauakho. Chühashi, ngo yaakshaubou nyangbüa kia.”
Haoei lauko kijinei Judas, Anthüknyi yoa che loukei; hoba hao yoa ungshedbou si jaishou shuongei hautibü mütshang yaangbü che in si juthep jungan loukei.
Hao yaakshaubouei haoen la amaaphelabü che kuko laukei, “Ngei ao to sembung sheplaje kho hao; hao lapashi.”
Hao Jisu jungto tangshaitham louan salem kuko laukei, “Lenbou”, hoba haoei hao to sembung shepbei.
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Jena, no ai kümla loukeije kümashi.” Kheijinei haoen louan Jisu to ik shatko hao lapbei.
Jisu yoa kibü yoa cheei haoeibü ik shingan jembü in setenan thükkabou ungshedbou sambü che to wapbei, hoba haoeibü nou shipan apbukei.
Kheijinei Jisuei hao to laukei, “Kaibü in hao phoshang to ngaitiashi, aishanga aoyouei in jungeilaje haoen pendou inei shemlabü.
Kübouei toukei kü jungto khuthük hangangbü hajar juong to aei hautilabü lele, ngei hao to sulajala athüklep dogo nyi damda sai?
Khei yinga longa Laishiba laobou hai haijan dogo lauda, kho ailai loushadla?”
Kheijinei Jisuei noknyüh to laukei, “Kanei kokbü khulimbo loubü tegütham in si juthep jungan ngo lapla louda lo? Lembüchema ngo chalou weko lenko setkei, lausikei kanei ngo alap.”
Habü pendou thuseibü Laishiba loushedla haüthükkei. Kheijinei eikshuong pendouei hao apyokei hoba linkei.
Haoenei Jisu lapbei hoba hao thükkabou ungshedbou Kaifa chemto leian haukei, lanei Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong si jaishou shuong liko takshatan kiteikei.
Lausikei Peter thükkabou ungshedbou khong sühko hekoheko sembei; hoba atan thonbü ngela shanga lombou shuong yoa setkei.
Ungshedbou shuong hoba Khukabü Kambü pendouei Jisu haitila shanga aukabü lambei,
lausikei amlangbü aukabü juong louasikei haoenei aikei ühüp. Phaila müt nyi thedangto loukei
hoba laukei, “Ho mütei laukei, ‘Ngei Mühghaü Lembüchem kho leiluan chalou semnyeta dangla thükakei.’”
Thükkabou ungshedbou lokei hoba laukei, “Nyi ai ajongaida si? kakhu limbo haoenei ai aukabü sungbada?”
Lausikei Jisuei ai ngüh üang. Thükkabou ungshedbouei hao to laukei, “Langkeibü Mühghaü nyen phongko ngei ka to thelet lanletko lauda, no Mühghaü Shou Khrista kho yingasi ayingje kü la lenbü.”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Nyi laua; lausikei ngei kan pendou la lenda, tou ka jaüan kanei Müteibü Shou Thükenbou Mühghaü mae aenei setan, hoba mühkabü sangmei thüka setan louyenko haplabü.”
Kheijinei thükkabou ungshedbouei haoeibü nei jitnyinko laukei, “Haoei Mühghaü nyikubü laua. Sen shanga aukabü aei ai khamda? Chühashi, tou Mühghaü khulimbü laubü kanei dida.
Kanei ai damda?” Haoenei laukei, “Hao shedakei, hao haijan.”
Kheijinei haoenei haoeibü thenyek to eok thokkei, hoba hao to ipbei, hoba atei jembü ikei hao to ipbo,
laukei, “Hai, Khrista, ka to ngümbou kho ao? Kün to seiei tetenan lenashi.”
Peter khonga setan kikei. Sambüsao che hao jungto louan laukei, “Nokei Galilbü Jisu yoa kiteikei.”
Lausikei haoei haoen pendou thedanga athekuko laukei, “Nyi ai laudaje ngei angekei.”
Hao tangto angjinei lubü yaksa nashou cheei hao hapbei, hoba khonei kibü shuong to laukei, “Ho mütkei Nazaretbü Jisu yoa kikei.”
Haoei nyiboukei hao athekuko thelet lanletko laukei, “Müt kho ngei angekei.”
Longche kian nyangko loan kibü shuong louan Peter to laukei, “Maimaitham nokei haoen yo kabü che ki, aishanga kaibü ngühangei no ao yingkeije lenda.”
Kheijinei haoei khükkeiuokkei hoba thelet lanletko laukei, “Müt kho ngei angekei.” Khoyam aunakei koukei,
hoba Jisuei, “Aunak mokoujinei nyi ngo semnei athekulabü,” dogo laubü ngüh kho Peterei damenkei. Hao satkei hoba kaang haapbei.
Ladang lang ngekei, ungshedbou shuong hoba jaishou shuong pendouei Jisu haitila shanga hao khulimbo lauyokei;
hoba haoenei hao khühkei, hoba leian hauan Pilat governor la khümbo meiko kuan apbei.
Ladang hao yakshaubou Judasei Jisu la shedbü kubü hapbei, hao jembü lolo maangpon sepeikei, hoba ungshedbou shuong si jaishou shuong jungto nam khujin kho sungbako laukei,
“Shedbü akibü müt che haitila yaakshaubü ka ngei shabü shona.” Lausikei haoenei laukei, “Hoei künla ai yingla? Kamaang leshi.”
Haoei lembü chema nam kho apyoan satkei, hoba hao satan jembü lolo phenetnyu haikei.
Ungshedbou shuongei nam kho jungan laukei, “Ho sii munam yingsije ho lembü chem namphot to jinjan aying.”
Haoenei lau- yoan khoei yensiau mang khünshang shanga chakyaüboueibü kao phoukei.
khoei tat sühko kho kao to Siieibü Sekphai dogo lauda.
Kheijinei Jeremia thuseibouei laubü ngüh kho loushedkei: “Israel shousi yoa atei laobou müt shangabü namngüm tetkei, kho namngün tetbü müteibü mu sempak khujin haoenei lekei,
hoba Bunyubouei kü la sakkubü tegü, haoenei kho chakyaüboueibü sekphai shanga kukei.”
Jisu governor thedanga lotikei, hoba governorei hao to phekei, “No Jihudabü Choba sai?” Jisuei laukei, “Kho nyi lauda.”
Ungshedbou shuong hoba jaishou shuongei hao yuktijinei haoei ai ajongai.
Kheijinei Pilatei hao to laukei, “Haoenei ka khu limbo aukabü lajuche sungbada kho nyi aditda lo?”
Lausikei haoei hao to ngühpem che ongkei ajongai, khoei governor aeibou maangpangkei.
Kho lema, shuong la maangangbü thüngdang kabü che haoen la litikulabü kho governor song kikei.
Kheijinei Baraba nyenbü amaibü nyenshen che thüngdanga kiteikei.
Hibü haoen liko takshatan kijinei Pilatei haoen to laukei, “Ngei kan la ao litila kanei maangangda? Baraba si ayingsi Messia dogo laubou Jisu?”
Aishanga theshoubüei haoenei hao khümbo kukei dogo haoei ngekei.
Hao matjem setshanga setan kijinei haoyakei hao jungto hautiko laukei, “Ho shedbü akibü müt shanga nyi ai teküm aishanga ngo tat hao shangabüa mangha aeibou khonsaka.”
Lausikei ungshedbou shuong si jaishou shuongei haoen shanga Baraba litian Jisu haitishi dogo lautila noknyüh suletkei.
Governorei haoen to jongaikei, “Khünyi yo ka ngei kan la ao litikula kanei maangangda?” Haoenei laukei, “Baraba.”
Pilatei haoen to laukei, “Khülonga Messia dogo laubou Jisu to ngei ai kümla?” Haoen pendouei laukei, “Hao peiseia thüngashi!”
Haoei laukei, “Aila, haoei ai amaibü kümbei?” Lausikei haoenei aei aei kaangbou ngekko laukei, “Hao peiseia thüngashi!”
Pilatei hao ngüh ai ühaüthük lausikei noknyüh pühnyintibü ong hapan, haoei dei sungbaan noknyüh thedanga ik sakko laukei, “Ho müt haibüa ngeibü onat aki. Kan maang leshi.”
Müt pendouei jongaikei, “Hao sii kün thükto hoba kün shousi shuong thükto yingshi.”
Kheijinei haoei haoen jungto Baraba litikei, lausikei haoei Jisu to sembei hoba peiseia thüngla khümbomeiko kukei.
Kheijinei governor sepai shuongei Jisu Choba chemto leian atkei; hoba sepai san pendou hao kaijembo kambei.
Haoenei haoeibü nei khuokkei hoba hao la nakthüngle sakbü nei che neikukei;
hoba jakei Choba khun che yikan haoeibü khua hankukei; hoba haoeibü mae ika liju che jungtikei; hoba haoenei hao thedanga khüpetan nyikuko laukei, “Jihudabü Choba, maisho kishi!”
Haoenei hao to eokei thokkei, hoba liju kho soan haoeibü khu to ngümbei.
Haoenei hao la nyikuan phaia, hao ka nakthüngle sakbü nei kho sungngaikei hoba hao la jembü neisimei lekukei, hoba hao peiseia thüngla leilangkei.
Haoen longjinei haoenei Simon nyenbü Kurinibü müt che hapbei. Haoenei hao la Jisueibü peisei pela jangkukei.
Ladang haoen Golgotha, tetlabü, “Khulo kaoen” che to loukei,
haoenei Jisu la ih khauekbü to kheian yungla kukei; lausikei haoei kho jepan chühan yungla asunglet.
Haoenei hao peiseia thüngan phaia phaang pakko, haoeibü neisimei janan lekei;
hoba haoen setan hao lombo kikei.
Haoeibü khu thüka, “HO JIHUDABÜ CHOBA JISU” dogo doan thipbei.
Kheijinei hao yoa kokbü müt nyi, che maenei hoba che nanaenei dogo thüngkei.
Haubü ngaibü shuongei jembü khu ngomeiko hao to nyikuko
laukei, “No Lembüchem leilutian chalou semnyeta danglabü mút, no lolo püetashi; no Mühghaü Shou longa peisei ka lotashi.”
Kho tegü ong ungshedbou shuongeikei, Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong si jaishou shuong yoa hao nyikuko laukei,
“Haoei mü püetkei; jembüje püetla athük. Hao Israelbü Choba yingkei! Tou hao peisei ka lotashi hoba künei hao to mailemlabü.
Haoei Mühghaü to maanglembei; Mühghaüei hao to maangshikda longa, tou hao Mühghaüei napüeta; aishanga haoei, ‘Ngo Mühghaü Shou’ dogo laukei.”
Hao yoa peiseia thüngbü kokbü shuongeikei kho tegütham hao to nyikukei.
Anthüknyi jih ka sem jih sühko kaodak khümboa nakthühkei.
Sem jih thünga Jisuei ngüh yaangbüei ngekko laukei, “Eli, Eli, lema sabakthani?” kho tetlabü, “Kü Mühghaü, kü Mühghaü, aila nyi ngo apyokei?”
Khünei loan kibü atei kho ditjinei laukei, “Haoei Elija ngada.”
Haoen yoa müt cheei langjung hauan, od che sungbakei hoba kho haijepbüa haman phodong chenei lonan hao la yungla kukei.
Lubü shuongei laukei, “Elija hao püetla loula si aloulaje senei chühkho.”
Jisuei nyibou ngüh yaangbüei ngekkei hoba jembü soushou bangtikei.
Lembüchem thangtet nei kho thük ka koubü kaoa atko penyi la jitnyinkei, hoba selo nyikei, hoba laangdak shuong nyinkei,
hoba hee shuong ipbei hoba nyeket shibü saopobü mang juongnyu langngaitikei;
hoba hao langngaian phaia haoen hee ka longkei hoba Saopobü Sangnyu to atan juong la haptikei.
Saongao thükkabou, hoba hao yoa lombo kibü shuongei selonyibü hoba haüthükbü kümsilei shuong hapan aeibou hatkei. Haoenei laukei, “Maimaitham ho müt Mühghaü Shou yinga!”
Yaksa shuong juong hebü ka chühko kikei. Haoen Galil ka Jisu phai sembei hoba hao to thuiyokei.
Haoen yoa Mari Magdalin, Jakob si Josefeibü nyu Mari, hoba Zebedi shousi shuongeibü nyu yoan kikei.
Chasem, Arimathia ka Josef nyenbü keibü müt che, haokei Jisu eik, khüto loukei.
Hao Pilat jungto haukei hoba Jisueibü mang hikei. Kheijinei Pilatei kho kuan apla sakkukei.
Josefei mang kho sungletkei hoba kho hinseibü nei inyaibüei shokei
hoba haoei laang jakenan phobü jembü hee haanbüa kho phokei, hoba haoei hee koukhüna laang yaangbünyu thangan phoan satkei.
Mari Magdalin si lubü Mari heekou tangko setan kikei.
Nyibounyet, kho Lamlebü chalou phainyet, ungshedbou shuong liko Pilat jungto loukei
hoba laukei, “Yaangbou, ho yepeibouei, ‘Chalou semnyet kian ngo langngailabü’, dogo hao lang kijinei laubü künei damenda.

Hibü sembounyet sühko hee lomla ngühkhüm kubüma, aingenyu hao eikshuong louan hao koklanglabü hoba mütshuong to, ‘Hao haibü ka langngaia’ dogo laulabü; hoba thonbou khüpsilang kho shaangbou tokei amaibou yinglabü.”
Pilatei haoen to laukei, “Lombü leashi. Hauashi hoba hee kho kanei thükbü tegü lomtiashi.”
Haoen haukei hoba lombü shuong thedanga laanga amaaphilabü shangjinan lomtikei.
Nounyet phaia, balea shaangbounyet lange saojinei, Mari Magdalin si lubü Mari heekhün to chühla loukei.
Tou selo kaang nyikei; aishanga Bunyubou khuthük hangangbü khuthük ka louyenan laangdak kho khokan apbei hoba kho thüka setkei.
Hao chühla langpon tegü, hoba haoeibü neisimei ninthu tegü thupaian kikei.
Lombou shuong hao to hatbü ka lühkei hoba haibü tegü yeikei.
Kheijinei khuthük hangangbüei yaksa shuong to laukei, “Kan ai tehüt, Jisu ao peiseia thüngkei kanei hao lamda dogo ngei ngeakei.
Hao hanei aki; aishanga haoei laubü tegü hao langngaia. Kaiya, hao yepshang chühashi;
hoba tongde hauan hao eikshuong la lenashi, ‘Hao haibü ka langngaia; hoba hao kan to shaang Galil to hauda; kanei hao khünei haplabü. Chühashi, ngei kan la lena.’ ”
Haoen hatbü hoba olinbü ka hee ka tongde satkei, hoba haoeibü eikshuong la lenla laangjung haukei.
Mangde Jisu haoen thedanga lokei hoba laukei, “Maisho kishi!” Haoen louan haoeibü youa hatan hao lembei.
Kheijinei Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Tehüt. Hauan ngeibü jaisinasi shuong to Galil to hauashi dogo lenshi, hoba khünei haoenei ngo haplabü.”
Yaksa shuong lama hauko kitoua, lombü shuong atei sangnyu to louan ungshedbou shuong to ai ong haüthükkei pendou lenkei.
Haoen jaishou shuong yoan kamshaian lauyoan phaia, haoenei sepai shuong la nam juong kuko
laukei, “ ‘Kün yepan kijinei, hao eikshuong nangnak louan hao sunglangkei’ dogo kanei lauashi.
Hobaje ho governorei dida longa künei hao suletlabü hoba kan maangmau ka püetlabü.”
Haoenei nam kho sungkei hoba haoen la lenbü tegü kümbei. Ho ngüh Jihudabü yoa tat sühko nyakko phinthonda.
Eik Anthükche kho Galila kibü, Jisuei haoen la lenbü shongh to haukei.
Haoenei hao hapjinei hao lembei; lausikei atei toknokkei.
Jisu louan haoen to joyoko laukei, “Khuthüka hoba kaodaka sei pendou kü la kua.
Hibü, hauashi hoba phang pendou eik la yeitiashi. Bou, Shou hoba Soushou Saopobü nyena haoen baptikushi;
ngei kan la ai ong sakkukei kho pendou jungeila haoen la lenashi; hoba chühashi, kaodak athon shongko ngo kan yoa ponpen yoakei.”
Mühghaü Shou Jisu Khrista Ngühlang Maibü khangshang.
Isaia thuseibüa Laishibaei lenda,
“Chühashi, ngei ngeibü ngühlang künbou ka thedangto hautida;
haoei kala kaibü lam lamlekulabü;
atei yama ngekbü hai kia, ‘Bunyubou lam lamleashi, haoeibü youlam tangsheitham kümashi.’ ”
Hibü Johan longkei. Haoei yama baptikuko kikei hoba müt shuong maangpon sepeijan hoba baptijan, hoba haoen shabü ka ap hapashi dogo ngekko kikei.
Judea kaonyek pendou hoba Jerusalem kabü mütshuong pendou hao jung to haukei hoba haoeneibü shabü theletko Jordan shumanga haoei baptikukei.
Johanei ut winei lekei, hoba loma phekhon shembe che kaikei, hoba haoei koksüng si ushi naodei shaukei.
Haoei ngekkei, “Küto yaangbou che kho kü phainei louada; ngo khüpetan haoeibü nguoklüh sengkula ongkei amukei.
Ngei kan deia baptikukei, lausikei haoei kan Soushou Saopobüa baptikulabü.”
Kho jihsiphaia Jisu Galil kabü Nazaret ka loukei hoba Johanei Jordana baptikukei.
Hao dei ka longbü si haoei khuthük wayetko hapbei hoba dukutuk che tegü Soushou hao to lotkei.
Hobaje khuthük ka ngüh cheei laukei, “No ngei sanoubü hoba Jayangshou ki. Kato ngei maang haida.”
Kheijinei Soushouei Jisu yam to shian attikei;
hoba yamlamanga Satanei hao saonyinyet huonkei; hoba yambabü meisiau yoa kikei, hoba khuthük hangangbü shuongei hao to thuikei.
Johan lapan phaia Jisu Galil to Mühghaü ka Ngühlang Maibü phinthonko, hai
lauko loukei, “Pienbü jihsiphai kho süha; Mühghaü Sangle nyangko lousüha. Maangpon sepeiashi, hoba Ngühlang Maibü kho mailemashi.”
Hao Galil yungkoa paijinei haoei Simon hoba haona Andria, haosieibü tak dei to tekko hapbei, aieilausi haoen ngaulapbü kikei.
Jisuei haosi to laukei, “Kaiya, kü phai semashi, hoba kan müt lapbü dan yeitilabü.”
Kheijinei haosiei haosieibü tak apyokei hoba hao phai sembei.
Ladang hao saashangko haukei, haoei Zebedi shou Jakob si haona Johan, long chenei haosieibü tak lamleko hapbei,
hoba haoei haosi ngakei. Haosiei haosieibü bou Zebedi sambü shuong yoa longa apyoan satkkei hoba hao phai sembei.
Haoen Kapernaum to loukei, hoba Nounyet hao sinagog to atkei hoba lenkei.
Mütshuongei haoei lenbüa maangpangkei, aishanga haoei Ngühkhüm lenbou che tegü ayingko hau kibü che tegü haoen to lenkei.
Khünei haoeneibü sinagoga shabü souei lapbü che kikei.
Haoei ngekkei, “Nazaretbü Jisu, nyi aila kün la kipjim kuda? No aoje ngeakei: No Mühghaüeibü Saopobou kho ki.”
Jisuei hao to kaangko laukei, “Telemen! Hao ka longan apashi!”
Asaopobü soushouei hao toptikei hoba kaang phangkei. Kho phaia kho hao ka longan apbei.
Haoen pendou aeibou maangpangan cheei che to phekei, “Ho ai? Hau kibü lenbü haanbü che! Haoei asaopobü soushou la mangkei ngühkhüm kuda, hoba haoenei hao ngüha leda!”
Longche danga haoeibü ngühlang Galil kaonyek kaijembo pendou ae aakei.
Kheijinei haoenei sinagog apyokei hoba Jakob si Johan yoa Simon si Andria chem to loukei.
Simoneibü yakeibü nyu mangbokei shatko yepan kikei, hoba haoenei Jisu la sao shangabü lenkei.
Hao sao jungto haukei, saoeibü ika hatkei hoba sao lotikei. Mangbokei sao apyokei hoba saoei haoen la nongnaekukei.
Ladang chasem sühkei, hoba chanyu nepbei, haoenei hao jungto shatbü hoba shabü souei lapbü pendou leibakei,
hoba sangnyu khümbo koukhüna shaikei.
Shat phang phangei shatko kibü juongnyu haoei maitikukei hoba shabü soushou juongnyu shian sattikukei; haoei shabü soushou shuong la ngüh üangti, aishanga haoenei hao ngean kikei.
Ngeyang ete, lange asaoko hao pikei hoba satkei; hoba hao sangliphang che to haukei hoba khünei welaukei.
Simon si hao meitangbü shuongei hao lamjung haukei,
hoba ladang haoenei hao hapbei, haoenei hao to laukei, “Pendouei no chüheida.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Ngei khünkei songlenenlabü lele senje lepsang at to hauakho; khoei ngo longan apbei.”
Hao Galil pendou jembo haoeneibü sinagoga songlenko hoba shabü soushou shian sattiko haukei.
Imbü che Jisu jungto loukei hoba hao to sukeijakei. Hao khüpetkei hoba hao to laukei, “Nyi maangangsije ngo saüenkula thükkei.”
Jisuei sanouko dambei hoba haoeibü ik shingkei, hoba hao to meitiko laukei, “Ngei maangangda, no saüenashi.”
Kheijinei tham imei hao apyokei hoba saüenan yeikei.
Jisuei hao to kaangko laukei hoba kheijinei tham hao sattiko
laukei, “Nyi ho aotokei telen. Lausikei hauashi hoba nyi lolo ungshedbou la lenashi hoba no saüenbü aukabü lela shanga Mosaei ngühkhüma sakkubü kho lemashi.”

Müt kho ngaikei hoba ngühli kho lendang lekei; haoei ngühli kho yongko phaktibü danko Jisuei lubü sangnyu che to ongkei pühthea ohauen, lausikei ushi sangliphang kaoena ong thüngkei; hoba kaoen pendou aeka hao jungto loukei.
Ladang hao Kapernaum to chalou shijo kian phaia nyibou longeikei, hao chema kia dogo ditkei.
Hobaje mütshuong juongnyu takshatbü ka koukhüna ongkei haoen ohau, hoba haoei haoen to songlenko kikei.
Hobaje haoenei tuokshatei shatbü müt che müt leiei lengan hao jungto sungbakei,

hoba mütshang yaangbü ka haoenei müt kho hao jungto asungbaensije haoenei hao kishang chemdak kho wayetkei. Ladang haoenei khün yettikei, haoenei tuokshatei shatbou yepan kibü yepshang kho tonyantikei.
Jisuei haoeneibü mailem hapan shatbou to laukei, “Kü shou, kaibü shabü apbua.”
Lausikei Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong at khünei setan kikei hoba maangpona hai dambei,
“Aila ho mütei ngüh hai angda? Haoei Mühghaü nyikuda. Mühghaü to liman aoei amai apbula thükkei?”
Hobaje haoenei haoeneibü maangpona daman chühyobü Jisuei ngean haoei haoen to laukei, “Aila kanei khübü shanga kaneibü maangpona daman chühda?
Tuokshatei shatbou to, ‘Kaibü shabü apbua’ dogo laula sobou si ‘Laksepashi, hoba kaibü yepshang künashi hoba paiashi’ dogo laula sokei?
Lausikei ho kaodaka Müteibü Shou la shabü apbula sei kia dogo ngei kan la lenlabü.” Kheijinei haoei tuokshatei shatbou to laukei,
“Ngei kato lenda, pienashi, ka yepshang tonenashi hoba chemto ngaiashi.”
Hao pienkei, hao yepshang peenkei hoba haoen pendouei hapbo satkei; khoei pendou maangpangkei hoba Mühghaü la soneikangbü kuko laukei, “Künei ladangkei ho tegü ühüpbei.”
Jisu nyibou yungko to haukei. Mütshang pendou hao jungto loukei hoba haoei haoen la lenkei.
Hobaje hao haujinei haoei Alfia shou Levi, khüm heshang chema setan hapbei, hoba haoei hao to laukei, “Kü phai semashi.” Hao loenkei hoba hao phai sembei.
Jisu Levi chema shaushang yungshanga setan kikei hoba khüm hebü hoba shabü mütshuong juongnyu hao hoba hao eikshuong yoa setkei. Aishanga kho tegübü mütshuong juongei hao yoa yangkei.

Hobaje Ngühkhüm lenbou Farisibü shuong yoa atei hao phai sembei. Hao asaopobü hoba khüm hebü shuong yoa shauko yungko hapan haoeibü eikshuong to laukei, “Aila haoei khüm hebü si asaopobü müt yoa shauda?”
Jisuei kho ditkei hoba haoen to laukei, “Ashat anyatbü shuong shanga daktar akhamda, lausikei shatbü shanga kümsilei. Ngo saopobü ngala aying lausikei shabü shuong ngala loukei.”
Johaneibü eik si Farisi eikshuong mühei nyengko kikei. Mütshuong louan hao to laukei, “Aila Johan eik si Farisi eikshuongeije mühei nyengda lausikei ka eikshuongei anyengda?”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Chemkanbou haoen yoa kijinei chemkanbou thangbou shuongei mühei nyengla thükkei sai? Chemkanbou haoen yoa ki shongko haoenei nyengla athük.
Lausikei haoen yo ka chemkanbou ngailanglabü jihsiphai che sühlanglabü; kho phaia haoenei nyenglabü.
Aoeikei nei haanbü neisimei hangbüa athipda; khei kümsije nei haanbü khoei hangbü ka jitlangda, hoba khoei thipmo aei amaibou yeitida.
Hobaje aoeikei ih haanbü phekhon shongmok hangbüa atakda; khei kümsije ih khoei phekhon shongmok kho thalabü, hoba ih si phekhon ham mauto janlabü. Ih haanbü phekhon shongmok haanbüa takda.”
Nounyet hao whet laak danko paiko kiteikei, hoba hao eikshuongei dantoyoko youman yetkei.
Farisi shuongei hao to laukei, “Haoen to chühshi! Aila haoenei Nounyet ngühkhüm tuda?”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Dawid hoba hao yoa kibü shuong khamjinei, hoba mühei haijinei, haoei ai jungeikei, kanei ladangkei wean achüh lo?
Abiathar thükkabou ungshedbou kijinei hao Mühghaü Chem to atkei, hoba Mühghaü thedanga phobü Wentek, laobou ungshedbou to liman lubüei shaujan aying, kho shaukei hoba hao yokabü shuonglakei kukei.”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Nounyet kho müt shanga kümbei hoba Nounyet shanga müt aküm.
Hibü Müteibü Shou kho Nounyetkei Bunyubou ki.”
Hobaje Jisu sinagog to nyibou atkei, hoba khünei ik pheibü müt che kikei.
Haoei Nounyet maitikuasaoje dogo hao la shed kula shanga haoenei chüheiko kikei.
Haoei ik pheibü müt khüto laukei, “Jenyua loashi.”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Nounyet maibü kümla si amaibü kümla sakkuda? Haitila si püetla sakkuda?” Lausikei haoen litham apbei.
Haoei khauangko haoen to sepeisai chühkei, hoba haoen tubüsekbü shanga maangto shatkukei, hoba haoei müt khüto laukei, “Kaibü ik shingashi.” Haoei shingkei hoba hao ik maian apbei.
Farisi shuong tongde tangto angkei, hoba haoenei hao lai haitila, hao khulimbo Herod eikshuong yoa huon takkei.
Jisuei hao eikshuong yoa yungko to satkei, hoba Galil ka mütshang yaangbü cheei hao phai sembei. Tokei shuong yaangbü che Judea
hoba Jerusalem ka, Idumia hoba Jordan thidang ka, haoei kümbüleibü ditan hao jungto loukei.
Haoei hao eikshuong to mütshangei hao üaüeitila shanga hao la long che lamlekula lenkei;
aishanga haoei juongnyu maitikei, hoba shatsinyat thonbü danei hao to meitila shanga aüyokei.
Ladang asaopobü soushou shuongei hao hapbei, haoenei hao thedanga khüpetkei hoba ngekkei, “No Mühghaü Shou!”
Hobaje hao tang akhittila shanga haoei haoen to aeibou kaangko lenkei.
Hao shongh to angkei hoba haoei mangsühbü shuong ngakei hoba haoen hao jungto haukei.
Hobaje hao yoa kila, hoba songlenko hautila,
hoba shabü soushou shuong shian sattila sei kila, haoei Anthüknyi pienkei, hoba haoei haoen la youkoikjai shuong dogo nyenkukei.
Haoei Anthüknyi kho pienkei: Simon, (ao la haoei nyen Peter kukei),
Zebedi shou Jakob, hoba Jakobeibü na Johan (haoei haosi la Boanerges, tetlabü, Langmak Mütshuong, dogo nyen kukei),
Andria, Filip, Bartholomia, Mathi, Thoma, Alfia shou Jakob, Thadia, Kurinibü Simon,
hoba Judas Iskhariot (hao haitila khümbo kubou).
Hobaje hao chem to ngaikei. Hobaje noknyüh kho takshatsije haoenei nyakkei ashauen.
Kho ditan chempenei hao senetla angkei, aishanga mütshuongei hao dalada dogo laueiko kikei.
Jerusalem ka louyenbü Ngühkhüm lenbou shuongei hao to Beelzebul kia, hoba haoei shabü soushou shuong shian sattila shanga thükkabou shabü sou jungeikei dogo laukei.
Haoei haoen ngakei hoba haoen to ngühphatbüei lenkei, “Satanei lai Satan shian sattienla?
Sangle cheei jembü khulimbo janyina longaje kho sangle lola athük;
chem cheei jembü lolo janyina longaje kho chem lola athüklabü;
hoba Satanei hao lolo khulimbo losije hoba janyina longaje haoei lola athük; hao khonei thonlabü.
Ayingsi hau kibü müt kho shaang haoei khühan aphokoje aokei hau kibü müt chem to atan haoeibü peisilei aaklangla athük.
Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, müt la haoeneibü shabü hoba haoenei Mühghaü nyikuko angbü ngüh pendou amai apbulabü;
lausikei müt cheei Soushou Saopobü khulimbo nyikua longaje hao la ladangkei üpbulabü; aishanga haoei thon akibü shabü shona.”
Aishanga haoenei laukei, “Hao to asaopobü soushou kia.”
Haonyu si nasi shuong loukei, hoba tanga lokei; haoenei müt hautiko hao ngakei.
Hao kaijembo shuong che setan kikei hoba haoenei hao to laukei, “Chühashi, kanyu hoba kanasi shuong tanga loakei; haoenei no lameida.”
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Künyu ayingsi Künasi shuong ao?”
Hao kaijembo setbü shuong to chühan haoei laukei, “Habü ho künyu hoba künasi shuong.
Aoei Mühghaüei maangangbü kümda, hao kho küna bousubou, küna yaksanyu hoba künyu ki.”
Haoei tokei nyibou yungkoa lenla khangkei, hoba mütshang yaang hao jungto yoshaikei hibü hao long che to atkei hoba yungnyua khonei setkei. Noknyüh pendou yungnyu nyangko deikoatham kikei.
Haoei haoen to ngühphatbüa juong lenkei hoba haoeibü lenbüa haoei haoen to laukei,
“Ditashi! youli saakbü che youli saakla koukei.
Haoei saakjinei youli at lamkhonga atkei, hoba aushuong louan hekhümbei.
Youli at kaomai juong akishang laangpünga shatkei, hoba kaomai shangko akisije kho enyu yembei.
Ladang chanyu longkei khüto jokko haukei, hoba hao to li üatsije linan apbei.
Lubü youli shuong jaklaaka shatkei; jaklong chingenkei hoba kho naükei, hoba haoei ai mai ehek.
Youli at kaomaia shatkei; kho yembei, chingkei, hoba youkung weko khujin, saosem ayingsi saongao onko youman hekkei.”
Haoei laukei, “Ao la nou yembei haoei ditashi.”
Hobaje hao mütpem kijinei, Anthüknyi yoa lubü eikshuong yoan, hao to ngühphatbü shangabü phekei.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Kanlaje Mühghaü Sangle huphang ngüh kuakei, lausikei aoyou kü phai sembü shuong aying, ajanjan pendou ngühphatbüa ong lauda,
khoei ong,
‘Haoenei maimaitham hapje hapla thükkei lausikei ashenlabü,
hoba haoenei ditlabü lausikei aditenlabü;
aishanga haoenei chühena longa
hoba ditena longa haoen sepeilabü
hoba haoen la apbuan thonlabü.’ ”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Kanei ho ngühphatbü aditenda lo? Khülonga kanei ngühphatbü pendou lai ditenla?
Youli saakbouei ngüh kho phinda.
Hobaje lamkhong laonei ngüh kho saakkei khünei kibü shuong kho ho: haoenei ditda, kheijineitham Satan louda hoba haoen to wenbü ngüh kho japlangkuda.
Laangpünga shatbü youli tetlabü ngüh kho ditan kheijineitham olinko sungletda;
hoba haoen to li akibuba longche shanga ong yemda; kho phaiaje ngüh kho laüa khonsak ayingsi shieikoe louda hoba haoen atetda.
Jaklaaka shatbü youli kho habü: haoenei ngüh kho ditda,
lausikei kaodak maangmau, nyaksinam dühbü hoba lubü nyekdüh maangdüh louan apda, hoba mai ehektiko naülepnyu aptida.
Kaomaia shatbü youli kho ho: aoyouei ngüh kho ditda, hoba sungletda, khübü youkung wekoei khujin onko, saosem onko hoba saongao onko youman hekda.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Kanei wanthung kammanga ayingsi shen phanga küplepan phola sungbadalao? Kho wanthung anshanga anla sungbada aying lo?
Aishanga ngesakbü to akhuokenlabü lele aikei huan aki; tang akhitlabü lele aikei huan aki.
Aoyou la ditla noukhün yembei haoenei ditashi.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Kanei ai ditda maang kuashi. Ai takjina kanei takletkulaje khonei kan la takkulabü, hoba aeikei kan la jinyokulabü.
Aishanga aoei ki, hao la aei kuyolabü, hoba aoei aki, haoei ai ki khokei hao ka langlabü.”
Haoei laukei, “Mühghaü Sangle ho phatkei: müt cheei kaoa youli apda,
hao nangnak yep hoba chaloua laksep dogo kitoua youli kho khitan yemda hoba chingda, lausikei kho lai chingdaje haoei angekei.
Kaoei jembü lolo mai hektida, shangla yik, kho phaia youman, kho phaiaje youmana mai jinda.
Ladang youman kho nyenda, khoyam haoei latla khangda, aishanga youlat jih lousüha.”
Haoei laukei, “Senei Mühghaü Sangle lubü ai to takteila? Ayingsi senei ai ngüh- phatbüei wanenla?
Ho yongkoshiklang youli che phatkei, laobou kaoa wenjineije kaodaka youli pendou to hanbou,
lausikei ho wenan phaiaje yemda, hoba kesiong pendou to yaangbou yeida, hoba phek yaangbang khaüda, hibü mühkabü aushuong louan kho hamphanga langla thükda.”
Kho tegü ngühphatbü juongnyuei haoenei ditenla thükbüa sühko haoei haoen to ngüh lenkei.
Haoei haoen to ngüh- phatbü yoan ong laukei, lausikei haoei chemphanga hao eikshuong la ngüh pendou wanan lenkei.
Khünyet ladang chasem sühkei, haoei haoen to laukei, “Senei dei thidang to khatkho.”
Haoenei noknyüh apyokei, hoba hao longa lai kiteikei kho tegü ong haoenei hao haoen yoa leian haukei.
Kheijinei yeinak yaang lotkei hoba deishou kho longmang to shouetlangsije long kho shenko kiteikei.
Jisu je longshing aenei amnyua yepan kiteikei. Haoenei hao kaangkei hoba hao to laukei, “Kün shemetla nyi aphokeida lo?”
Kheijinei hao laksepbei hoba yei to hakkei hoba dei to laukei, “Ashoueiko sangsembo kishi.” Hobaje yei kho thakkei hoba jemetshouko kikei.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Kan aila hatda? Kan tou sühko mailem aki lo?”
Haoen aeibou hatkei hoba haoen cheei che to laukei, “Yei si deieikei ngüha lelabü lele ho ao?”
Hobaje haoen deiphei aian, Gerasin kaonyek to loukei.
Hao long ka longsi lengko asao- pobü soushou kibü müt che heedang ka longan hao haüyokei.
Hao heelaaka kiko paikei. Aoeikei hao akhühen, yangmenei mangkei akhühen;
aieilausi annebenko hao thüngdanga phoko yangmenei khühasikei, haoei yangmen tokthetkei hoba nameibü thüngdang jangnyinkei, hoba hao thepetla aotokei hau akitei.
Change nangnak haoei heelaaka hoba shongha ngekko hoba jembü lolo laangei latko kikei.
Jisu heebüa hapan hao langjung haukei hoba hao thedanga khüpetkei.
Hobaje haoei ngüh yaangbüei ngekko laukei, “Thükkabou Mühghaü Shou, Jisu, nyi aila ngo peksekda? Ngo ashiakoela ngei kato Mühghaü nyena sudajada.”
Aishanga Jisuei hao to, “Asaopobü soushou, müt khüka longashi” dogo lauko kikei.
Haoei hao to phekei, “No ao nyenkei?” Haoei jongaikei, “Kü nyen juongnyu, aishanga kün juongnyu ki”;
hoba haoei haoen kaonyek ka shian asattila sukeijakei.
Hobaje kho shongh youa uk shuong yaangbü lamshauko kiteikei,
hoba souei hao to, “Kün ukshuong to hautikai, kün haoen to atkho” dogo lauko sukeijakei.
Haoei haoen la sakkukei. Asaopobü soushou shuong longan apbei hoba ukshuong to atkei, hoba ukshuong hajar nyi thüng kho laanglip to nyuyoko koulangan thima shemetkei.
Haoeneibü lombou shuong satyokei hoba sangnyu si kaonyek pendoua phinthonkei. Hobaje ai haüthükkei khüto chühla mütshuong yangbakei.
Haoen Jisu jungto loukei, hoba shabü sou shuong longan apbou müt kho neisimei lean Jisu junga setan hapbei, hoba haoen hatyokei.
Hobaje kho hapbü shuongei shabü souei lapbü müt to haüthükbü hoba uk shangabü lenkei.
Haoenei Jisu to haoen kaonyek apyola sukeijakei.
Hao long to atko kijinei shabü sou kiteibü müt khoei haokei hao yoa yangkho dogo hao to sukeijakei.
Jisuei hao la asakku, lausikei hao to laukei, “Kan chem to chempen shuong jungto ngaiashi, Bunyubouei ka shanga kümsilei latetche kümbei, hoba haoei kato lai onoukei, haoen la lenashi.”
Hao haukei hoba Jisuei hao shanga ai kümbei kho Dekapoli (tetlabü, Sangnyu An) a phinthonkei, hoba müt pendou maangpangkei.
Ladang Jisu longa nyibou yungko thidang to satkei hao deiko nyangko kikei hoba mütshang yaang hao jungto yoshaikei.
Hobaje sinagog bunyu yoa che, Jairas nyenbü müt che loukei hoba ladang haoei hao hapbei, hao hao you junga khüpetkei,
hoba hao to aeibou sukojako laukei, “Kü shou nouyangshou hailabü lele ong kia. Sao maian lang kilabü lele no kaiya hoba sao to ka ikei jungashi.”
Jisu hao yoa haukei hoba mütshang yaang hao phai sembei, hoba haoenei hao omlepbei.
Yaksa che po anthünyi sii koubüei shatko kikei;
saoei daktar juongnyu ka khonsak juong hapbei hoba saoei kibü khümbo apbei. Lausikei saoei ku ühüp, aeiko amaibou la yeikei.
Saoei Jisu shangabü ditkei, hoba sao noknyüh yoa hao phaito loukei hoba haoeibü nei to meitikei.
Aishanga saoei laukei, “Ngei haoeibü nei to meitia longa ngo maian aplabü.”
Kheijinei sii koubü thakkei hoba saoei jembü mangei saoeibü shat sada dogo ngekei.
Kheijinei Jisuei hao ka sei satbü ngekei, hoba noknyüh to sepeian chühngaiko laukei, “Aoei kü nei to meitikei?”
Hao eikshuongei hao to laukei, “Noknyühei no omlepbü nyi hapbo kian, ‘Aoei küto meitikei’ dogo nyi lauda lo?”
Kho aoei kümbeije dogo haoei chühngaikei.
Lausikei yaksanyu mokde apyokei hoba lühkei, aishanga saoei sao to ai haüthükkei kho ngekei hoba louan hao thedanga khüpetko hao la ngühmai khümbo lenkei.
Haoei sao to laukei, “Nashounyu, kaibü mailemei no maia. Haksoa ngaiashi, hoba kaibü shat ka maian apashi.”
Haoei lauko kijinei sinagog bunyu chem ka müt at louan laukei, “Ka shou nouyangshou haia. Lenbou touje aila kipjimtila?”
Lausikei lauko kibü ngüh kho Jisuei aditku hoba sinagog bunyu to laukei, “Tehüt. Mai ong lemashi.”
Haoei Peter, Jakob, hoba Jakobeibü na Johan to liman aokei hao yoto alotti.
Haoen sinagog bunyu chema sühlangkei, haoei panglangyobü hoba mütshuong juong kaangbang haapyobü hoba manghaapbü hapbei.
Hao atkei hoba haoen to laukei, “Kan aila panglangyoda hoba haapyoda? Na kho ühaikei; sao yepbei.”
Haoenei hao la nyikukei; lausikei haoei haoen pendou satkhümtikei, naeibü bou hoba nyu hoba hao yo kabü shuong leian na kishang to atkei.
Hobaje naeibü ika jenan haoei sao to laukei, “Talitha koum”, laobou tetlabü, “Medeinyu, ngei kato lenda, laksepashi.”
Kheijineitham yaksa nashou kho laksepbei hoba paikei. (Sao po anthüknyi nashou kiteikei.) Kheijinei haoen maangpangbü yaangei shenkei.
Hobaje ho aoeikei angejan dogo haoei ngühkhüm kukei, hoba haoei medeinyu la denche okashi dogo haoen la lenkei.
Hobaje haoei kho kaoen apyokei hoba sangnyu to loukei, hoba hao eikshuongei hao phai sembei.
Nounyet haoei sinagoga lenkei. Haoei laubü ditan müt juong maangpangkei hoba laukei, “Müt hoei laka khübü ngüh shuong hapbei? Hao la habü sei hatetbang kümlabü lele ailaibü songsihon kukei?
“Ho Jakob si, Joses si, Jihuda si, Simoneibü jai, Mari shou mistri kho aying lo? Hobaje haona yaksa shuong hanei sen yoa aki lo?” Haoenei hao atheleten.
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Jembü kaodak, jembü chempen shuong hoba jembü chem to limanje thuseibü che asangko aki.”
Haoei khünei shatbü shijo to ikei meitiko maitibü to liman, sei ai aküm.
Haoen to mailem akibü to chühan hao maangpangkei.
Hobaje haoei sang shoongko lenko haukei.
Haoei Anthüknyi kho hao jungto ngakei hoba haoen nyibang hautikei. Haoei haoen la asaopobü soushou thüka hau kukei,
hoba haoei haoen la sakkuko laukei, “Kanei kaneibü wakou shanga ju che to liman wentek ayingsi, neikong ayingsi shijimoka nam yingasikei ai tekün.
Nguok lonashi lausikei khüto liman mangyuk aeila tekün.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Lanei ong kanei chem to atlaje, khüka kan akukshongko khünei thüngashi;
hoba lanei ong kan aleiyetlaje, ayingsi kan ngüh aditkulaje, khüka kukashi hoba haoen khulimbo aukabü lela shanga kaneibü you ka thamngu kangan apashi.”
Haoen haukei hoba mütshuongei maangpon se- peijan dogo songlenkei,
hoba haoenei shabü sou juongnyu shian sattikukei hoba shatbü müt juong la onang naangkuko maitikukei.
Herodei ho shangabü ditkei, aishanga Jisueibü nyen hangenan kiteikei. Müt atei laukei, “Baptikubou Johan langngaiakei khoei ong habü sei hao to kümda.”
Atei laukei, “Ho Elija yingkei”; hoba ateije, “Hao kho shangiedbü thuseibü shuong yokabü tegü thuseibü che yingkei” dogo laukei.
Lausikei ladang Herodei ditkei haoei laukei, “Johan, aoeibü khu ngei thetkei hao langngaiakei.”
Aishanga Herodei müt hautikei hoba Johan lapbei hoba haona Filip yak Herodia laüa hao thüngdanga khinan phokei; aishanga Herodei sao lekei,
hoba Johanei hao to, “Kanaeibü yak nyi ngalabü hoje tükde aying” dogo laukei.
Herodiaei Johan mangsenkei hoba hao haitimang sühkei; lausikei saoei athüken,

aieilausi Herodei hao to hatkei; aishanga Johan kho ngühmai hoba saopobü müt dogo haoei ngekei, hoba haoei hao püetan phokei. Haoei annebenko Johaneibü ngüh ditkei hoba hao phenyembei; khei yingasikei haoei olinangko ong hao ngüh ditkei.

Ladang Herodei hao bukbü chaloua haoeibü yaangenbü shuong si haoeibü lakjaibü sepai yaangenbü shuong hoba Galil kabü khulei langlei shuong la lem yaang oknyinkei, kheijinei Herodia shanga chalou maibü che longan apbei.
Ladang Herodiaeibü shou lotan tombei, saoei Herod hoba hao shaubüyungbü shuong olintikei. Chobaei yaksa to laukei, “Nyi ai ong mangsühda kü ka hiashi; ngei kho kala kulabü.”
Haoei sao to thelet lanletko laukei, “Nyi kü ka ai ong hilaje, kho ngei kü sangle jamtekei kulabü.”
Sao hauan haonyu to laukei, “Ngei ai hila?” Saoei laukei, “Johan Baptikuboueibü khu.”
Saoei panteiko tongde Choba jungto louan laukei, “Johan Baptikuboueibü khu phau chenei nyi kü la toutham kutimang sühda.”
Choba aeibou maangto shatkei, lausikei haoei thelet lanletbü hangjong hoba shaushanga setan kibü shangabü dambo, haoei sao to ü dogo alauen.
Kheijineitham Chobaei hao lombou sepai che Johaneibü khu thetpala shanga ngühkhüm kuan hautikei. Hao haukei hoba thüngdang ka hao khu thetkei.
Johaneibü khu phau chenei sungbakei hoba yaksa kho la kukei. Yaksa khoei kho saoeibü nyu la kukei.
Ladang hao eikshuongei kho ditkei, haoen loukei hoba haoeibü mang hekei hoba hee chenei khünkei.
Youkoikjai shuong liko Jisu jungto loukei, hoba haoenei kümbü hoba lenbü pendou hao la lenkei.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Kan sangliphang to kaiya hoba longche haksoashi”; aishanga juongnyu hau longei dogo kikei, hoba haoenei shaula yunglabü jih ongkei ühüp.
Haoen long chenei sangliphang to bangjung satkukei.
Müt juongnyuei haoen hauko hapbei hoba juongnyuei haoen shenkei. Haoen juong sangnyu pendou ka youei khüto langyokei hoba haoen leioukei.
Ladang hao longkei, haoei mütshang yaang hapbei, hoba haoei haoen shanga aeibou sanouko dambukei, aieilausi haoen sanlombou akibü sanshuong tegü kikei; hoba haoei haoen la ngüh juongnyu lenkei.
Chasemlamto hao eikshuongei louan hao to laukei, “Kaoen ho sangliphang, hoba tou chanyu nepda.
Haoen kaijembo kibü sangnyu si sangshuong to hauan haoen shanga shausiyung denche najekla shanga haoen lintiashi.”
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Kanei bouje haoen la denche okashi.” Haoenei hao to laukei, “Kün hauan sempak saoan den wentek jekan mütshuong la shaula kula sai?”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Kanei wentek lajuche ki? Hauan chühashi.” Ladang haoenei lamenkei haoenei laukei, “Wentek ngao hoba ngau nyi.”
Haoei haoen pendou sang thüka san küman setentila hao eikshuong la ngühkhüm kukei.
Haoen saongao bang si anjinsem bang lin küman setkei.

Hobaje haoei wentek ngao si ngau nyi kho jungan, khuthük ae chühko haükukei; kho phaia haoei wentek kho shaknyinkei, hoba noknyüh junga phokula shanga haoei hao eikshuong la kukei. Tokei haoei ngau penyi kho haoen pendou la jankukei.
Haoen pendouei photko shaukei;
hoba haoenei netshou kam anthüknyi shenko hoba ngau shijo dogo heshaikei.
Hobaje wentek shaubü shuong kho bousu hajar ngao kiteikei.
Kheijineitham haoei noknyüh lintikei, hao eikshuong long to attian Bethsaida yungko thiae hao thedang to hauteila thungeijangeiko hautikei.
Haoei haoen la bangmai kuan phaia hao shongh to welaula angkei.
Ladang chasem sühkei long kho deijia kiteikei hoba hao mütpem kaomaia kikei.

Hobaje yei khüpeian soubü ka haoei haoen longleila aeibou khonsakko hapbei. Hibü hao ngeyang sem jih ka lak jih kanglanga haoen jungto deitaka paiko loukei, hoba haoei haoen leilangla tegü hauko kikei.
Ladang haoenei hao deitaka paiko hapbei, haoenei kho sou dogo dambei hoba ngekkei,
aishanga haoen pendouei hao hapbei hoba mokde apyokei. Kheijinei haoei haoen to joyokei hoba laukei, “Tehüt! Ngo yingkei. Maang kaangashi.”
Hao haoen jungto long to lotkei hoba yei jemlangkei. Haoen aicheküman maangpangkei.
Aishanga haoenei wentek shangabü aditen; haoen maangpon kaangan kiteikei.
Haoenei dei khatko hauan Genesaret sühkei hoba haoeneibü long phenkei.
Haoei long apyosi lengko mütshuongei hao shenkei.
Hobaje kho kaonyek pendou ka langyoko, hao lan ki haoenei ditan khüto shatbü shena lengan loukei.

Hobaje sangshou, ayingsi sangnyu, ayingsi kaonyek ka haoenei shatbü shuong namseishanga phoan, haoeibü neiyik to ongkei meititikai dogo hao to sukeijakei. Hobaje lajucheei hao to meitikei pendou maikei.
Jerusalem ka loubü Farisi shuong si Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong at hao yoto loukei.
Haoenei hao eikshuong atei ik asakko khei songle haangei asüenko shauko hapbei.
(Farisibü shuong si Jihudabü shuong pendouei, jaishou shuong song jungeiko, ik maisho, khei ikngüma sühko asakkoje ashau;
hoba ladang haoen namseishang ka longeilaje haoenei mang ayukoje ashau ayung. Hobaje thung, chak, hoba chinam thungsiphau hoba shen sakbü hoba lenbü song juongnyu sungletan jungeibü kiteikei.)
Hibü Farisi shuong si Ngühkhüm lenbou shuongei hao to phekei, “Aila ka eikshuongei baushi shuong songa kibü tegü ajungeiko, ik asakko shauda?”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Kan hibüyoubü shuong shangabü Isaia thuseibüei maishoko tetenkei; Laishibaei lenbü tegü,
‘Habü mütshuongei haoeneibü sembungei kü to soumo hatda,
lausikei haoeneibü maangpon kü ka lounyu heakei.
Amlanga haoenei kü to lemda;
aieilausi haoeneibü lenbü
songlen kho müteibü song ki!’
“Kanei Mühghaü ngühkhüm wailetda, müteibü song maisho hatlepda.”
Haoei tokei haoen to laukei, “Kanei Mühghaü ngühkhüm inletnyu phoan pisong bousong jungeila kan latetche maikei!
Aishanga Mosaei laukei, ‘Kanyu si kabou to soumo hatashi’, hoba, ‘Aoei haobou si haonyu nyen shada hao haitijan.’
Lausikei kanei lauda, müt cheei haonyu si haobou to, ‘Kasi haangtangla ngei ai nyaksinam ong jungeilaje kho pendou Mühghaü la jongsak la saüenko kuan apa (Korban)’ dogo laua longa,
hao la touje haonyu si haobou shanga kümlaleila asakkuda.
Kho tegü kanei kubü baushi shuongeibü tetenbü ngühei Mühghaü ngüh amlangbü la yeitida. Hobaje kho tegübü kümsilei juongnyu kanei kümda.”
Haoei noknyüh hao jungto nyibou la ngakei, hoba haoen to laukei, “Kan pendouei kü to ditashi hoba ditenashi.
Tangaeka atan müt shatienlabü ai aki; lausikei müt ka ai longda khoei ong müt shatida.”
(Aoto ditla nou yembei haoei ditashi.)
Ladang haoei noknyüh apyoan chemto atkei hao eikshuongei hao ka ngühphatbü shangabü kho phekei.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Kaneikei hainyu aditenda lo? Tangaeka müt to ai ong atda, khoei hao shatila athük dogo laubü kho kanei aditenda si?
Aieilausi kho maangpon to ütda, lausikei shiang to atda hoba apshang to danda.” (Khoei haoei shausiyung pendou saopobü dogo lenenda.)
Haoei laukei, “Müt ka ai longda khoei müt shatida;
aishanga maang aeka, müteibü maangpon ka dambü amaibü pendou longda: asangalanbü, kokmaang senmaang, müt haitilabü,
suonlambü, aeilam aeiphop, amaibü, khüpsilang, pejapelabü, nyekto shatbü, Mühghaü nyikubü, lilisese hoba ngoualouabü,
khübü pendou maang aeka longda hoba khoei müt che shatida.”
Hao khüka meimeijung satkei, hoba Tair kaonyek to haukei. Hao chem che to atkei hoba haoei aolakei ngetimang asüh. Lausi dogokei hao ahuen.
Kheijineitham yaksa che, aoshou nouyangshou to shabü sou kikei, saoei hao shangabü ditkei hoba louan hao junga khüpetkei.
Yaksa kho Grik sao, hoba Siria kabü Foenika phang kiteikei, hoba saoei hao to saoeibü shou ka shabü sou shian sattikushi dogo phekei.
Haoei sao to laukei, “Shousi shuong shaang senyühshemtiashi, aishanga shousieibü shausiyung sungbaan kei thedanga apbula janbü aying.”
Saoei hao to jongaikei, “Haü, yaangbou, lausikei setshang phanga kibü keieikei nashousiei attibü nyaknetshouje shauda.”
Haoei sao to laukei, “Khei jongaibü shanga ngaiashi: shabü sou kho kashou nouyangshou ka longan apa.”
Sao chem to ngaikei hoba saoei na kho shena lengan hapbei, hoba shabü sou sao ka satan apan kiteikei.
Hao Tair kaophei ka longeikei hoba hao Sidon kaonyek ka Dekapoli kaophei jenyu to shetko Galil yungnyu sühko loukei.
Haoenei hao jungto obangbü si likhipbü müt che leibakei hoba haoenei haoeibü ikei hao to maitila sukeijakei.
Jisuei noknyüh ka hao mütpem leilangkei, hoba müt khoeibü noukhün to haoeibü ikjishou attikei. Haoei eok thuokkei hoba müt khoeibü lishanga meitikei,
hoba khuthükae chühko haoei hak hinan apan hao to laukei, “Efata”, laobou tetlabü, “Ipashi”.
Kheijineitham müt khoeibü nou ipbei hoba haoeibü lishang khühbü ka sengkei hoba haoei shangashatko laula khangkei.
Haoenei aola alenla Jisuei ngühkhüm kukei, lausikei haoei latetche ngühkhüm kaangko kudaje khütetche haoenei ngüh kho aei aei phakkei.
Haoen aicheküman maang- pangkei hoba laukei, “Haoei pendou maisho küma; haoei obangbü la dittida hoba likhipbü la joyotida.”
Khünyetkei mütshang yaang shaula yungla akitei, haoei eikshuong ngakei hoba haoen to laukei,
“Ngei shuong shanga aeibou maangto shatkuda, aieilausi haoen kü yoa tatei chalou sembounyet thüngda hoba shaula ai aki.
Ngei haoen aoknyinko lintia longa haoen lamloma nyenglabü, hoba haoen atje kaoen saabü ka louakei.”
Hao eikshuongei hao to jongaikei, “Ho tegübü sangliphang hanei aoei ai wentekei mütshang hatetche phottila?”
Haoei haoen to phekei, “Kanei wentek ladüng ki?” Haoenei laukei, “Pem nyet.”

Haoei noknyüh kaoa setla ngühkhüm kukei; hoba ladang haoei wentek nyet kho sungkei hoba Mühghaü la nyensang kukei, haoei hao eikshuong la haoen thedanga tenkula ngühkhüm kukei, hoba haoenei noknyüh thedanga shimtian phokukei.
Haoenei ngaukei shijo kiteikei. Ladang haoei khübü thüka haükukei, haoei hao eikshuong la khokei shomla shanga ngühkhüm kukei.
Haoenei photko shaukei; hoba haoenei jouletbü netshou kam nyet yoshaikei.
Haoen hajar lei thüng kiteikei; hoba haoei haoen ngaitikei.
Kheijinei hao hao eikshuong yoa long to atkei hoba Dalmanutha kaonyek to loukei.
Farisi shuong loukei hoba hao to wetyokei. Haoenei hao takteila shanga hao ka khuthük ka amaaphilabü che hikei.
Haoei maangphanga hak hinngailangkei hoba laukei, “Ho metenei aila amaaphilabü hida? Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, ho meten la amaaphilabü akulabü.”
Kho phaia haoei haoen apyokei hoba long che to atjung nyiboukei yungko thidang to khatkei.
Haoenei wentek künla maakei, hoba longa haoenei wentek che to liman ai akitei.
Haoei haoen la ngühkhüm kuko laukei, “Farisibü si Herod tokai to kan maangsangashi.”
Haoen cheei che to joyoko laukei, “Haoei kho senei wentek akibü shanga lauda.”
Jisuei kho ngekei hoba haoen to laukei, “Kan aila tükdebü wentek akibü shanga joyoda? Kanei tou sühkokei ashenda hoba aditenda lo? Kaneibü maang kaangngaia lo?
Kan la nyek yeman kanei ühüpda lo? Kan la nou yemakei hoba kanei aditda lo? Hobaje kanei adamenda si?
Ladang ngei hajar ngao shanga wentek ngao shaknyinkei, kanei netshouei kam ladüng shenko heshaikei?” Haoenei hao to laukei, “Anthüknyi.”
“Ladang ngei hajar lei shanga wentek nyet shaknyinkei, kanei netshouei kamyang ladüng heshaikei?” Haoenei laukei, “Nyet”;
hoba haoei haoen to laukei, “Kanei tou sühko ashuokda lo?”
Haoen Bethsaida to loukei. Haoenei hao jungto nyekthubü che leibakei hoba hao to meitiashi dogo hao to sukeijakei.
Haoei nyekthubü kho sang danko jenlangkei, hoba haoei haoeibü nyek to eok thuokan jinkuan haoei haoeibü ikei hao to jungkei hoba hao to phekei, “Nyi aiche hapdalao?”
Haoei chühangtikei hoba laukei, “Ngei mütshuong hapda; ngei haoen bulong tegü hapda, lausikei ngei haoen paiko hapda.”
Kheijinei haoei haoeibü ikei nyekto nyiboula jungkei hoba haoei shangashatko hapbei. Hao maikei hoba haoei heebü kakei ajanjan pendou chong- chingko hapbei.
Jisuei hao chemto hautiko laukei, “Sangnyu to tüt.”
Jisu hoba hao eikshuong Kaisaria Filipi sangnyu shuong to haukei, hoba lama haoei hao eikshuong to phekei, “Mütshuongei ngo ao dogo lauda?”
Haoenei hao to laukei, “Johan Baptikubou”; atei “Elija”, hoba atei “Thuseibü yoa che, dogo lauda.”
Haoei haoen to phekei, “Lausikei kanei ngo ao dogo damda?” Peterei hao to jongaikei, “No Messia.”
Hao shangabü aola alenla shanga Jisuei haoen la ngühkhüm kukei.

Müteibü Shou aeibou khonkujan, hoba jaishou shuong si, ungshedbou shuong si, Ngühkhüm lenbou shuongei hao inletlabü, hoba hao haitilabü, hoba semnyet kian phaia hao langngailabü dogo haoei haoen la lenkei.
Hobaje haoei ho shangabü pühthea laukei. Peterei hao leilangkei hoba hao to hakkei.
Lausikei Jisu sepeikei, hoba hao eiskshuong to chühngaiko Peter to kaang hakkei. Haoei laukei, “Kü jungka kukashi, Satan, aishanga nyi Mühghaü aedangka ayingko müt aedangka damda.”
Haoei eikshuong yoa noknyüh ngakei hoba haoen to laukei, “Atei kü phai loumang sühsije haoei jembü lolo thepetashi, haoeibü peisei peashi hoba kü phai semashi.
Aishanga aoei jembü langkei senetmang sühlaje kho maulabü, lausikei müt aoei kü shanga hoba Ngühlang Maibü laüa jembü langkei maulaje kho hapmeilabü.
Aishanga müt cheei kaodak khümbo pailetan phaia jembü langkei maua longa haoei ai ku pailetla?
Hobaje mütei jembü langkei jeila ai kula?

Aishanga ho asangalan hoba shabü metena, aoei ngo hoba kü ngüh shangabü the alenenlaje, Müteibü Shoueikei jembü Bunyuboueibü soneikangbüa saopobü khuthük hangangbü yoa loujinei hao shangabü the alenenlabü.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, hanei loan kibü yoa atei Mühghaü Sangle seia loubü ühüpshongko haibü jepan achühlabü.”
Chalou lak danan phaia Jisuei Peter, Jakob hoba Johan leikei hoba shongh suokbü che to haoen ong leian angkei. Hao haoen thedanga son jeileikei
hoba haoeibü neisimei kaodaka neisakbü aoeikei thupaian ayeitienlabü lele, aeibou thupaibü hoba lailaitham yeikei.
Haoen jungto Elija si Mosa longkei, hoba haosi Jisu to joyoko kikei.
Peterei Jisu to laukei, “Lenbou sen hanei kila lai maikei? Senei hanei dip sem, ka shanga che, Mosa shanga che hoba Elija shanga che dogo lekho.”
