Ai laulaje haoei ange, aishanga haoen aicheküman hatyokei.
Hobaje sangmei che lotkei hoba haoen küplepbei, hoba sangmei ka ngüh che longkei, “Ho ngei sanoubü hoba jayangshou ki; hao to ditashi.”
Kheijinei haoenei kaijembo chühkei hoba haoen yoa Jisu to liman aokei ühüp.
Haoen shongh ka louyenjinei, Müteibü Shou haibü ka alangngei shongko, haoenei ai hapbei kho aolakei telen dogo haoei haoen to ngühkhüm kuko lenkei.
Hobaje lenbü haoenei amaako, haian langngaibü kho ai ngühtet yingkei dogo pheyokei.
Haoenei hao to phekei, “Aila Ngühkhüm lenbou shuongei Elija shaang loulabü dogo lauda?”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Maimaitham Elija shaang louda hoba ajanjan pendou yentian phoda; hoba aila, hao aeibou khonkulabü hoba aweasüngko jungeilabü, dogo Müteibü Shou shangabü Laishibaei lenda?
Lausikei ngei kan to lenda khei Elija loua, hoba Laishibaei lenan kibü tegütham, haoenei hao to haoenei jungeimaang sühbü tegü jungeikei.”
Ladang haoen eikshuong jungto loukei, haoenei mütshang yaangei haoen kaijeman hoba Ngühkhüm lenbou shuongei haoen to wetyo lauyoko hapbei.
Ladang haoenei hao hapbei noknyüh pendouei hao jungto langjung hauan hao la salem kukei.
Haoei haoen to phekei, “Kanei haoen to aishanga wetyoda?”
Noknyüh yoka müt cheei jongaikei, “Lenbou, ngei küshou ka jungto leibakei; hao to ngoutibü sou kia.

Hoei lanei ong hao laplaje, hao thopbolakko yeitida. Haoei sembung ka uokjok ongtida, haoeibü hauh uyoda hoba shingetnyu aptida. Ngei kaibü eikshuong to kho shian sattikula phekei, lausikei haoenei athük.”
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Kan maialembü meten! Ngo kan yoa lalokche kila? Ngei kan to lalokche natenla? Hao kü jungto leiba.”
Haoenei hao Jisu jungto leibakei. Ladang souei hao hapbei, haoei khoyam nashoubou kho aicheküman pheteitikei, hoba hao sembung ka uokjok ongko kaoa tuongkei hoba lekeikei.
Jisuei haobou to phekei, “Hao to ho haüthükbü phaia lalokche?” Haoei laukei, “Nashoudangathama,
hoba hoei hao wanmang to si deimang to tomjung attiko haitila haujema. Lausikei nyi thükalonga kün to onouko dencheje kümbushi hoba kün to thuikai.”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Nyi thükalonga, dogo se! Aoei mailemda, hao shanga pendou thüklabü.”
Kheijinei shoueibü bouei ngekkei, “Ngei mailemda. Kü mailem soubü ayinglonga kü to thuikai.”

Ladang Jisuei mütshang hao jungto langyoko louko hapbei, haoei shabü sou to ngühkhüm kuko laukei, “No ngoubü hoba obangbü sou, ngei no hao ka longan apla ngühkhüm kuda hoba ladangkei hao to nyibou la tütngai.”
Kheijinei haoei ngekkei, hao kaang pheteitikei hoba longan apbei. Hao haibü mang tegü yeikei, hibü haoen juongbouei hao maimaitham haia dogo laukei.
Lausikei Jisuei hao ik a hatan phonenkei; hoba hao loenkei.
Ladang hao chem to loukei, hao eikshuongei hao to sanshoua phekei, “Aila künei kho shian asattien?”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Haibüje welau to limanje aieikei shian asattien.”
Haoei kho kaoen apyokei hoba Galil danjung haukei. Haoei aolakei ngetimang asüh,

aishanga haoei hao eikshuong to lenko kikei. Haoei haoen to laukei, “Müteibü Shou khunakshousi ikmangto khümbo kua. Haoenei hao haitilabü, hoba ladang hao haitilaje hao chalou sem phaia langngailabü.”
Haoenei lenbü kho aditen hoba hao to phelakei jemtenkei.
Haoen Kapernaum to loukei. Hao chema kijinei haoei haoen to phekei, “Kan lama ai wetyoko kikei?”
Haoen ngüh üangko apbei, aieilausi haoen yoa ao yaangbou dogo lama haoen lau- yokei.
Hao setkei hoba Anthüknyi kho ngakei hoba haoen to laukei, “Müt atei shaangmang sühalonga hao pendou to phaibou hoba pendou khangenbou yeijan.”
Haoei nashou che leibakei hoba haoen thedanga lotian phokei. Hobaje haoei haoeibü phaka himbei hoba haoen to laukei,
“Kü nyena aoei haibü nashou che sungletlaje, haoei ngo sungletda; hoba aoei ngo sungletda haoei ngo sungletda ayingko ngo hautibou sungletda.”
Johanei laukei, “Lenbou, müt cheei ka nyena shabü sou shian sattiko künei hapbei hoba künei hao to thakla shanga lenkei, aieilausi hao sen yokabü aying.”
Jisuei laukei, “Haoen teshilet, aishanga aoei kü nyena seikümseilei kümda haoei kü shangabü amaibü aikei laula athük.
Aishanga aoyou sen khulimbo aying haoen sen shanga.
Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, aoyouei ong kan la kan Khristaeibü yingbü laüa kü nyena deili thung che inlaje, maimaitham jongsakei akonglabü.”
“Kü to mailembü habü hanbü yoka che ongkei aoei phai- yettilaje, hao shangaje ngünbü laangkhüh yaangbü che ngüma yakan si mangto tomatlangbü maibou yingkhoulabü.
Ka ikei no phaiyetia longa, kho wetan apashi. Ik penyi yeman anyetbü molowan to atkhoulabü khantoje thoan langkeishang to atbü ka shanga maibou,
(laonei haoen to yangbemei ponpen hitda hoba wan ponpen longyoan khüpda.)
Ka youei no phaiyettia longa, kho wetan apashi. You penyi yeman molowan to lapan jinbü toje sokean langkeishang to atbü ka shanga maibou,
(laonei haoen to yangbemei hitda hoba wan ponpen longyoan khüpda.)
Ka nyekei no phaiyettia longa, kho phekan apashi. Nyek penyi yeman molowan to lapan jinbü toje,
(laonei haoen to yangbemei ponpen hitda hoba wan ponpen longyoan khüpda), nyeklang che ong yeman Mühg- haü Sangle to atbü ka shanga maibou.
Aishanga mütpem weko wanei teitilabü.
Jem maiakei; lausikei jem ka teibü mauan apalonga, kanei aiei kho teishiktila? Kan to jem kitishi hoba kan si kan paplepashi.”
Hao khüka meimeijung Jihuda kaophei hoba Jordan thidang to loukei. Tokei noknyüh hao jungto yoshaikei, hoba hao hanghangbü tegü haoei haoen la lenkei.
Farisibü shuongei louan hao takteila phekei, “Bousuei jembü yak to bangjan sai?”
Haoei jongaikei, “Mosaei kan la ai sakkuda?”
Haoenei laukei, “Bangbü le dokuan sattila sakkukei.”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Kan maangpon kaangsije haoei kan la ngühkhüm ho dokukei.
Lausikei kaopakbü ka jaüan Mühghaüei bousu hoba yaksa kümbei.
Ho aukabüa bousuei haonyu si haobou apyolabü hoba jembü yak to maanghaiko kilabü,
hoba nyi kho che la yeilabü. Hibü haosi touje nyi aying lausikei che ong.
Mühghaüei ai chela thangjamtikei, kho mütei tebangti.”
Ladang haoen nyibou chema shaikei, kheijinei eikshuongei hao to kho shangabü phekei.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Aoyouei jembü yak sattian lubü ngalaje, haoei sao khulimbo asangalanbü shonda;
hoba sao aoei jembü lao to bangan lubü chem to haudaje saoei asangalanbü shonda.”
Hao la meititila mütshuongei hao jungto nashou hanbü shuong leibako kikei, lausikei eikshuongei haoen to hakkei.
Ladang Jisuei kho hapbei hao aeibou khauangkei hoba haoen to laukei, “Nashousi shuong kü jungto loutikai. Haoen teshilet, aishanga Mühghaü Sangle kho habü tegübü shanga ki.
Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, nashou cheei tegü kanei Mühghaü Sangle asunglet longa haoei khüto üetenlabü.”
Haoei haoen to ikei jungkei hoba haoen to shangetko haükukei.
Hao lama paiko kijinei müt che hao jungto langjung loukei. Haoei hao thedanga khüpetkei hoba hao to phekei, “Lenbou maibou, Ponpen langkei phet phanla ngei ai kümjan?”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Nyi aila kü to maibou dogo lauda? Mühghaü to liman aokei maibü aki.
Nyi ngühkhüm shuong ngeakei: Tühaiti, asangalan tejungei, tekok, amlangbü aukabü tüt, ailam aeiphopbo tesunglet, kanyu si kabou to soumo hatashi.”
Müt khoei hao to laukei, “Lenbou, khübü pendou ngei nashouathama jungeia.”

Jisuei hao to tangko chühkei hoba hao to sanouko dambei. Haoei laukei, “No cheei aonkei. Ngaiashi hoba nyi kibü pendou yakashi hoba yakletbü kho shalebü la kuashi, hoba nyi khuthüka nyaksinam kilabü; hoba kaiya hoba kü phai semashi.”
Kho laubüei müt kho thekhümbei hoba ngangko satan apbei, aishanga hao nyaksinam juong kiteikei.
Jisuei kaijembo chühkei hoba hao eikshuong to laukei, “Keibüei Mühghaü Sangle to atla lai sekkei”;
kho ngüh ditan hao eikshuong maangpangkei. Jisuei haoen to nyibou la lenkei, “Nashousi shuong, nyaksinam to maanglembü keibü shuongei Mühghaü Sangle to atla lai sekkei!
Keibüei Mühghaü Sangle to atbü toje nidku khün ka ut shedlangbü sobou.”
Haoen aeiche maangpangkei hoba haoen si haoen lauyokei, “Khülonga ao ong khümenla?”
Jisuei haoen to chühkei hoba laukei, “Müt shanga athükaminlabü, lausikei Mühghaü shangaje aying, aishanga Mühghaüeije pendou thükkei.”
Peterei hao to laukei, “Kün shanga lai? Künei pendou apyoa hoba ka phai sema.”

Jisuei laukei, “Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, aoei chem yingasikei, jaisina yingasikei, nousina yingasikei, nyu yingasikei, bou yingasikei, shousi shuong yingasikei ayingsi kao yingasikei kü shanga hoba Ngühlang Maibü shanga apyoa,

haoei tou ho jihsiphaia saongao onko chem shuongkei, jaisinasi shuongkei, nousinasi shuongkei, nyu shuongkei, shousi shuongkei hoba kao shuongkei hoba shieikoekei yoan haplabü, hoba loulabü kaodaka ponpen langkei haplabü.
Lausikei shaangbü shuong juongnyu phaila yeilabü, hoba phaibü shuong shaanglabü.”

Haoen Jerusalem to angko kikei, hoba Jisu haoen thedanga hauko kiteikei. Hobaje haoeibü eikshuong maangpangkei hoba hao phainei sembü shuong hatkei. Haoei nyibou Anthüknyi kho leilikei hoba hao to loushadlabü kümsilei shuong haoen la lenkei.

Haoei laukei, “Ditashi, sen Jerusalem to angda hoba Müteibü Shou ungshedbü shuong hoba Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong la khümbomeiko kuan aplabü. Haoenei hao haitilabü lele shedbü kulabü hoba Küksithang shuong la kuan aplabü.
Hao to nyikulabü, eokei thuoklabü hoba haitilabü. Hobaje chalou sem phaia hao langngailabü.”
Zebedi shounyi, Jakob si Johan, hao jungto louan laukei, “Lenbou, küsiei kato ai phelaje nyi kümtimang sühda.”
Haoei haosi to laukei, “Kasiei küla kasi shanga ai kümtimang sühda?”
Haosiei hao to laukei, “No soneikangjinei Küsi che kaibü maenei hoba che nanaenei dogo settikai.”
Jisuei haosi to laukei, “Kasiei ai phedaje kho kasiei angekei. Ngei yungbü thung kasiei yungenlep lo? Ayingsi ngo ainei baptian ki khonei kasi baptienlep lo?”
Haosiei hao to laukei, “Küsiei thükakei.” Jisuei haosi to laukei, “Kasiei maimaitham ngei yungko kibü thung yunglabü, hoba ngo ai baptibüei baptian ki khoei kasi baptilabü;
lausikei kü maenei ayingsi kü nanaenei setlabü khoje ngei kulabü ji, lausikei kho aoyou shanga lamlekukei hao shanga ki.”
Ladang anei kho ditkei, haoen Jakob si Johan to khauangkei.
Jisuei haoen ngakei hoba haoen to laukei, “Aoyouei haoen lolo phangshuong thüka songdakda dogo damda, haoenei bunyu pida, hoba haoeneibü yaangenbü shuongei haoen thüka songdakda, dogo kanei ngeakei.
Lausikei kan yoaje khei aying, lausikei kan yoa aoei yaangmang sühda hao kan khangenbou yingjan,
hoba kan yoa ao shaangmang sühda, hao pendoueibü sambü yingjan.
Aishanga Müteibü Shou mangkei khangentila aying lausikei khangenla, hoba juongnyu angla shanga hao langkei kula loukei.”
Haoen Jerikho to loukei. Hao, hao eikshuong si noknyüh yoa Jerikho ka angjinei, Timia shou, Barthima, nyekthubü hishau hiyungbü che, lamkoa setan kiteikei.
Ladang haoei ho Nazaretbü Jisu dogo ngekei haoei ngekko laukei, “Dawid shou, Jisu, kü to onoukai.”
Müt juongei sangsemashi dogo hao to hakkei, lausikei aei kaangbou ngekkei, “Dawid shou, kü to onoukai.”
Jisu tangshaitham lokei hoba laukei, “Hao ngaba.” Haoenei hao ngako laukei, “Maangkaangashi! Pienashi; haoei no ngada.”
Haoei neisimei hangletnyu apan toman shatko lokei hoba Jisu jungto loukei.
Jisuei hao to phekei, “Nyi küla ka shanga ai kümtimang sühda?” Nyekthubouei hao to laukei, “Lenbou, ngei hapmang sühda.”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Ngaiashi, ka mailemei no maia.” Kheijineitham hao nyek khitkei hoba lama hao phai sembei.
Ladang haoenei Oliv Shongha Bethfage si Bethani sühan Jerusalem nyangko loukei, haoei haoeibü eik nyi
hai lauko hautikei: “Kasi thedang kabü sang khüto atashi, hoba kasi atjinei kasiei gadu shoushou che laonei mütei che ongkei setan achühkei, phenan haplabü. Kho sengashi hoba koba;
hoba atei kasi to, ‘Kasiei aila ho kümda?’ dogo laua longa, kasiei hai lenashi, ‘Bunyubouei kho khamda; haoei tongde ngaitikulabü.’ ”
Haosi haukei hoba lamkhonga kouyem chenei gadu shoushou che phenan hapbei, hoba haosiei kho sengkei.
Khünei loan kibü atei haosi to laukei, “Kasiei gadu shoushou kho sengletko ai kümda?”
Haosiei Jisuei laubü tegü jongaikei hoba mütshuongei ngüha leko kümtikei.
Haosiei gadu shoushou kho Jisu jungto kobakei hoba haoenei haoeneibü neisimei hao thükto shangkukei, hoba hao khonei setkei.
Müt juongei haoeneibü neisimei lama imbukei, hoba lubü shuongei ushi ka buham jatan imbukei.
Thedang to haubü shuong si phainei sembü shuongei ngekkei,
“Hosana! Bunyubou nyena ao louda,
hao nyen sangashi.
Seneibü bou Dawid sanglea lombou sangashi.
Thükkabou khuthüka Hosana!”
Jisu Jerusalem to louan lembüchem to atkei. Ajanjan pendou to sepeisai chühan phaia Anthüknyi yoa Bethani to atkei aieilausi phaian kiteikei.
Nyibounyet ladang haoen Bethani ka longeikei, hao mühei haikei.
Heebü ka haoei bhuklong che yik kian hapbei hoba haoei khünei denche kiasaoje dogo haukei. Hao chunga sühko loukei hoba khonei yik to liman ai akitei, aishanga kho bhuk hekchalou aying.
Kheijinei haoei bhuklong to laukei, “Tou ka jaüanje aoeikei kaka ladangkei mai teshau!” Hobaje hao eikshuongei kho ditkei.
Haoen Jerusalem to loukei. Hao lembüchem to atkei, hoba khünei yakyo jekyobü shuong shishi sattikei; haoei namjeibü shuongeibü khümsok si dukutuk yakbü shuongeibü setshang khokan apbukei,
hoba aolakei lembüchem danko peisilei thonla asakku.
Haoei haoen to lenko laukei, “ ‘Phang pendou shanga kü chem kho welaubü chem dogo nyenlabü’ dogo Laishibaei alauda lo? Lausikei kanei ho kokbü shuongeibü laangpob la yeitia.”
Hobaje thükkabü ungshedbou shuong si Ngühkhüm lenbou shuongei ditkei hoba hao haitila hangsilam lamenla haujembei. Haoen hao to hatkei aieilausi noknyühei haoei lenbüa maang- pangkei.
Ladang chasem sühkei Jisu hoba hao eikshuong sangnyu ka satkei.
Hobaje haoen ngeyang enyu danjinei haoenei bhuklong kho li ka yuian hapbei.
Peterei damenkei hoba hao to laukei, “Lenbou, chüha, nyi khükbüuokbü bhuklong ho yuia.”
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Mühghaü to mailem kishi.”

Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, “Aoei ong ho shongh to, ‘No haka tonlangan simaangto thapjung atshi,’ dogo lenlaje, hoba hao maangpona ashuda, lausikei haoei ai lauda kho haüthüklabü dogo mailemlaje, kho hao shanga loushedkulabü.
Hibü ngei kan to lenda, kanei ai shanga ong welaulaje hoba hilaje, kho pendou hapa dogo mailemashi, hoba kanei khübü haplabü.
Kanei ladang loan welau khangda, atei kakhu limbo mashikan kialonga, khuthüka kibü ka Boueikei kaibü shedbü apbulabü lele nyikei hao la apbuashi.
(Lausikei kanei üpbulonga, khuthüka kibü ka Boueikei kaneibü shedbü üpbulabü.)”
Haoen nyibou Jerusalem to loukei; hoba hao lembü chema paiko kijinei, thükkabü ungshedbou shuong, Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong, hoba jaishou shuong dogo, hao jungto loukei,
hoba hao to laukei, “Ai hauei nyi habü kümda? Khübü kümla ka la aoei hau kukei?”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Ngei kan ka che phekho. Küto jongaiashi, hoba ngei ai hauei habü kümsilei kümdaje ngei kan to lenkho.
Johaneibü baptibü kho khuthük ka si müt ka? Küto jongaikai.”
Haoenei haoen yoa wetyopekyoko laukei: “Senei ‘Khuthük ka’ dogo laualonga, haoei ‘Khülonga kanei hao to aila maialem?’ dogo laulabü.
Lausikei senei, ‘Müt ka’, dogo laualonga...” (Haoen noknyüh to hatkei, aishanga pendouei Johan kho tükdebü thuseibü che dogo weeikei.)
Hibü haoenei Jisu to jongaikei, “Künei angekei.” Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Ngeikei ai hauei ngei habü kümdaje kan to alenda.”

Haoei haoen to ngühphatbüa laukei; “Müt cheei semlühlaak che lekei, kho kaijembo ba lekei, nitshang shanga püngkhün thukei hoba shondip che dangkei. Haoei kho moubü shuong la apyokuan hao usa to satkei.
Jih sühbüa, haoen ka semlühlaak ka mai hapla shanga haoei khübü shuong jungto sambü che koutikei.
Haoenei hao lapjung louan ngümei ai akünko ungtikei.
Nyiboukei haoei haoen jungto sambü che koutikei. Haoenei khola khua aktikei hoba himou bauko jungeikei.
Haoei lubü che koutikei hoba haoenei hao haitikei. Hobaje lubükei juongnyu; haoenei at to ngümbei hoba joubü shuong haitian apbei.
Haoei tokei che jouan kiteikei, kho haoei sanoubü jayangshou. Haoei thonla hao haoen jungto hai lauko hautikei, ‘Haoenei küshou to soumo hatlabü.’
Lausikei khübü sekmoubü shuongei haoen haoen joyoko laukei, ‘Ho phetphanbou yingkei. Kaiya, senei hao haitiakho, hoba phet- phan kho seneibü yinglabü!’
Haoenei hao lapbei hoba haitikei, hoba hao semlühlaak ka senan apbei.
“Semlühlaak bunyuei ai kümla? Hao loulabü hoba sekmoubü shuong kho shemtilabü, hoba semlühlaak kho lubü la kuan aplabü.
Kanei ho Laishiba:
‘Chemdangbü shuongei laobou laang ale
kho chemnyek laang la yeikei;
ho Bunyubouei kümbei,
hoba ho kün thea maangpanglabü ki’,
dogo laubü kho ladangkei wean achühkei lo?”
Haoenei hao lapla chüheikei, lausikei haoenei noknyüh to hatkei, aishanga haoei haoen khulimbo ngühphatbü laukei dogo haoenei ngekei. Haoenei hao apyokei hoba satkei.
Haoenei hao ngühanga nalaptila shanga Farisi si Herod eik at hao jungto hautikei.

Haoen loukei hoba hao to laukei, “Lenbou, no ngühmaanglanbü hoba nyi aoto ühütda dogo künei ngekei, aishanga nyi müt the achühda, lausikei ngühmaia Mühghaü lamnyu lenda. Kaisar la khüm okjan si aying? Künei kula si akula?”
Lausikei Jisuei haoen hibüyoubü ngekei hoba haoen to laukei, “Kanei ngo aila huonda? Küla chühla shanga sempak che sungba.”
Haoenei sungbakei hoba haoei haoen to laukei, “Ho aoeibü noksa hoba nyendo?” Haoenei hao to laukei, “Kaisar.”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Kaisareibü ai yingkei kho Kaisar la kuashi hoba Mühg- haüeibü Mühghaü la kuashi.” Hobaje haoen hao to aicheküman maangpangkei.
Sadukibü, aoyouei haibü ka alangngaida dogo lauda, haoen Jisu jungto loukei hoba hao to hai lauko phekei,
“Lenbou, Mosaei kün shanga, ‘Müt cheeibü jaiei youyik akiko yak ong apyoan haia longaje, haonaei latnyu kho ngalabü hoba haojai shanga youyik longtijan,’ dogo dokukei.
Jaisina nyet kiteikei. Shaangbouei yak che ngakei hoba shousi akiko haikei.
Nyiboubüei sao lekei hoba shousi aphokuko haikei hoba semboubukei khei.
Nyet pendouei sao lekei hoba shousi akiko haikei. Thonla yaksanyu khokei haikei.
Langngaijinei sao aoeibü yak yingla? Aishanga nyet khümboei sao yakla lekei.”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Laishiba ayingsi Mühg- haü sei angebü ka ong kanei mashikda aying lo?
Aishanga ladang mütshuong haibü ka langngailaje haoenei chem akanlabü ayingsi laolamlakei ohautida, lausikei haoen khuthüka kibü hangangbü shuong tegü kilabü.
“Lausikei haibü langngaibü shangabü, buham shangabü dobüa, Mosa lea Mühghaüei hao to, ‘Ngo Abraham Mühghaü, Isak Mühghaü, hoba Jakob Mühghaü’, dogo laubü kho kanei wean achühkei lo?
Hao haibü shuong Mühghaü aying lausikei langkeibü Mühghaü ki. Kanei yongkotham mashikakei!”
Ngühkhüm lenbou yoa che loukei hoba haoen wetyolauyoko ditkei. Jisuei haoen to maisho jongaia dogo ngekei, hoba hao to phekei, “Ngühkhüm pendou to shaangbou kho laobou?”
Jisuei jongaikei, “Shaangbou ngühkhüm kho, ‘Ditashi, O Israel! Seneibü Bunyubou Mühghaü kho Bunyubou che ong,
hoba nyi ka maangpon pendouei, hoba ka soushou pendouei, hoba kasen kamaang pendouei, nyi Bunyubou ka Mühghaü sanouashi.’
Nyiboubü kho ho, ‘Nyi ka lepbou to jembü tegü sanouashi.’ Khüto yaangbou ngühkhüm lubü aki.”
Ngühkhüm lenbouei hao to laukei, “Tükde ong laua, Lenbou! Hao kho che ong hoba hao to liman lubü aki dogo nyi tükde lena.
Hobaje maangpon khümboei, hoba songsido khümboei, hoba hau khümboei hao to sanoulabü, hoba cheei lepbou to jembü tegü sanoulabü, kho pemtolo juokbü hoba lembüsabü pendou to khaibou.”
Jisuei songsido kiko jongaia dogo ngekei hoba hao to laukei, “No Mühghaü Sangle ka ehekei.” Kho ka jaüan aoeikei hao to pheyo wetyola maang ayaangen.
Jisuei lembüchema lenjinei laukei, “Messia kho Dawid shou dogo Ngühkhüm lenbou shuongei lai lauda?
Dawidei mangkei Soushou Saopobüa hai laukei, ‘Bunyubouei ngeibü Bunyubou to laukei, ngei dangbou shuong ka you phanga aphoku shongko, no kü mae ik aenei setashi.’
Dawidei mangkei hao to ‘Bunyubou’ dogo ngada longaje, hao lai küman haoshou yingla?” Noknyühei hao to maangnyembo ditkei.
Haoei lenjinei laukei, “Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong shanga maangsangshi, aoyouei nei loubang lean paimang sühda, hoba namseishanga salem mangsühda,
hoba sinagoga thükkabü setshang hoba lemnyu lemyaanga nyenhang setshang mangsühda.
Aoyouei latnyu shuongeibü nyaksinam khintida hoba chühjanla shanga ong loubang welauda, khübüei shedbü aei yaangbou haplabü.”
Hao namjinshang tangkünga setkei hoba noknyühei namphot to nam jinbü hapbei. Keibü juongnyuei nam juongbang jinkei.
Shalebü latnyu che loukei hoba saoei poisa che mubü pai nyi jinkukei.
Haoei haoeibü eikshuong ngakei hoba haoen to lenkei, “Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, nam jinshang to jinbü shuong pendou to ho shalebü latnyuei juongbou jinkukei.
Aishanga haoen pendouei apsileko kibü ka jinkukei, lausikei ho yaksaei sao shalejongle ka, saoei kibü khümbo, saoei shaulakei ajoutiko jinkukei.”
Hao lembüchem ka ngaijinei, hao eikshuong yoka cheei laukei, “Lenbou, chühashi, ailaibü laang hoba ailaibü chemyaang!”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Habü chemyaang shuong nyi hapdaoba lo? Alusaktiko hanei laang che thüka che jouan akiteilabü.”
Hao Oliv Shongha Lembüchem tangküngyoko setjinei Peter, Jakob, Johan hoba Andriaei hao to huphangshoua phekei,
“Khübü kho ladang loushadla? Hobaje khübü pendou loushadlabü jih nyangko lotjinei amaaphilabü ai yingla, kün la lenbüma.”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Kan aoeikei ayinglam to aleilangtila maangsangashi.
Juongei kü nyena, ‘Ngo hao’ dogo lauko loulabü, hoba haoenei juongnyu ayinglam to senlanglabü.
Lausikei ladang kanei wapyosuyo hoba wapyolabü langh ditlaje kanei mokde tüpyo. Ho loushadlabü, lausikei thonje molousühkei.
Aishanga phangshuongei phangshuong khulimbo, hoba sangleei sangle khulimbo loulabü; kaoen kaoena selonyilabü, hoba mühsinou kilabü. Khübü kho khonkula khangbü ki.
“Lausikei kan lolo maangsangashi. Haoenei kan thangyen la matjemshang to kulabü, kan sinagoga ngümeilabü; hoba governor si choba shuong thedanga kü shanga haoen to aukabü künla shanga kan lolabü.
Phangshuong pendou to Ngühlang Maibü kho shaang phinthonjan.
Ladang haoenei kan matjemshang to leilaje, kanei ai laulaje jih mosühko tephenyem, lausikei kho jih kan la ai ong kulaje, kho kanei laushi; aishanga laubou kho kan aying lausikei Soushou Saopobü.
Jaisinaei jaisina, hoba bouei shou haitila shanga khümbo kuan aplabü; hoba shousi shuongei nyusibou khulimbo lolabü hoba haoen haitilabü.
Kü laüa müt pendouei kan mangsenlabü; lausikei aoei thon sühko natenlaje hao khümenlabü.
“Ladang kanei mangsenlabü maubü hao alojana loan haplaje (webouei shuokashi), kheijinei aoyou Judeaa ki haoen shongh to satashi;
hoba aoyou chemdaka ki haoen teyan, ayingsi haoen chemmang to ajanjan sungla tüt;
hoba ao seka ki haoei haoeibü neisimei sungla tengai.
Lausikei kho metena mang akongbü hoba senyopbü shuong shanga ügütü!
Kho khamalüha akühshuokla shanga welauashi,
aishanga khübü jihsiphai khünei khonsak khonku yaang kilabü, Mühghaüei kaodak yaü khangbü ka jaüan tou sühko ho tegü akitei, hoba ladangkei akilabü.
Bunyubouei ho chalou ka pakan üpbu habü tegüje aokei telangkhoulabü, lausikei haoeibü pienbü shuong laüa haoei chalou thotikei.
“Kho jihsiphaia atei kan to, ‘Chühashi, Messia hanei kia; Chühashi, hao thinei kia’, dogo laua longa khüto maitelem.
Amlangbü Khrista shuong si amlangbü thuseibü shuong longlabü, hoba thükalongaje saopobü dan ayinglam to leilangla shanga amaaphilabü hoba maangpanglabü sei lenlabü.
Lausikei kan maangsangashi; ngei ajanjan pendou thedangto lenkhüma.
“Lausikei khübü jihsiphaia, ho khonsak khonku danan phaia, chanyu nakthühan aplabü, hoba litnyuei jembü ngesakbü akulabü,
Müh ka khanshoulitshou atlabü, hoba müha kibü sei shuong nyaakeilabü.
Kheijinei haoenei Müteibü Shou sangmeia sei hoba soneikangbü yaanga louyenko haplabü.
Hobaje haoei khuthük hangangbü shuong hautilabü, hoba kaothon ji aeka mühthon ji aenei sühko, kaonyek lei ka jembü pienbü shuong leishailabü.
“Bhuklong ka hao ngühphatbü ditletashi. Ladang nyemshang haanbü sapbo yik longda, kheijinei kanei sulang nepa dogo ngeda.
Kho tegü kanei ladang khübü loushadko haplaje, kanei Müteibü Shou kho nyangbüa, khei koukhüma loakei dogo ngeshi.
Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, khübü pendou aloushad shongko ho meten adanlabü,
müh si kaodak dankhümlabü, lausikei kü ngüh adanlabü.
“Lausikei kho chalou ayingsi jih shangabü, Bou to liman, hangangbü shuongeikei ayingsi Shoueikei ayingsi aoeikei angekei.
Maangsangashi, pianleman kishi, aishanga takletbü jihsiphai kho ladangje kanei angekei.
Ho müt che usa to wakou haubü phatkei, aoei jembü chem apyoan, sambü shuong la hau kuan, mütpem weko la lulu kümsilei jankukei, chem lombou tokei pianleman kishi dogo laukei.
Hibü, pialemashi. Chembubou ladang longeilaje kanei angekei; kho chasem, ayingsi metuphang, ayingsi aukoujinei, ayingsi nge- yang yingla thükkei.
Pishilemshi, khei yingsi ong hao mangde loujinei kan yepan ühüplabü.
Ngei kan to ai lauda, kho ngei pendou to lenda, pialemashi!”
Nyinyet phaia Püetbü Lem si Tokai ajinbü Wentek Lem lilabü kiteikei. Ungshedbou shuong si Ngühkhüm lenbou shuongei hao ailai kokei minoula hoba lapan haitila dogo haujembo kikei.
Haoenei laukei, “Senei ho Lema akümjan aishanga hoei mütshuong yoa panget lelabü.”

Hao Bethania imbou Simon chema kiteikei. Hao shaushanga setan kijinei yaksa cheei nam juongnyu mubü ponlem onang laang thungdou thupaibü chenei sungbakei. Saoei thungdou kho jangnyinkei hoba haoeibü khu to jinkukei.
Lausikei atei haoen yoa khauangko laukei, “Aila onang apsileda?
Ho sempak saongao sem to aeian lu yakan shalebü la kula thükakei.” Haoen sao to khauangkei.
Jisuei laukei, “Sao maang letiashi. Aila kanei khonsaktida?
Saoei kü shanga kümsilei maibü che küma; aishanga shalebü kan yoa ponpen kia, hoba ladang ong kanei kümmang sühlaje kheijinei kanei haoen to maibü kümenakei, lausikei ngo kan yoa ponpenje akilabü.
Saoei ai thükkei kho küma; saoei ngo khünla jih asühjinei ngeibü manga onang naangkukei.
Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, kaodak a lanei ong ho Ngühlang Maibü songlenlaje, ho yaksaei kümbü khokei sao damenko laueilabü.”
Judas Iskhariot, Anthüknyi yoa che, hao haoen la khümbo kuan apla shanga ungshedbü shuong jungto haukei.
Haoenei kho ditan olinkei, hoba hao la nam kula thekukei; hoba haoei hao khümbo kuan apla jembü jihsiphai che chüheikei.
Tokai ajinbü Wentek Lem shaangbounyet, ladang haoenei Püetbü lem san shoushou haitikei, hao eikshuongei hao to laukei, “Nyi Püetbü lem shaula yunglabü lele künla nyi lato hauan lamletimang sühda?”
Haoei haoeibü eik nyi hai lauko hautikei, “Sangnyu to atashi, hoba khünei bousu che deikhu- chak künan kasi to haüyolabü. Hao phai semashi,
hoba hao lato atlaje chembubou to lenshi, ‘Bunyubouei lauda: Ngei kü eikshuong yoa Püetbü lem shaula yunglabü lele, ngeibü yensüh chem lanei ki?.’
“Haoei kasi la khümbo lamleettian thükkabü thangtet yaangbü che lenlabü. Sen shanga khonei lamleashi.”
Eikshuong meimeikei hoba sangnyu to atkei; haosiei ajanjan pendou haoei laubü tegü hapbei, hoba Püetbü lem lamlekei.
Ladang chasem sühkei, Jisu Anthüknyi yoa loukei
hoba, haoen shaushang yungshanga setan shaujinei haoei laukei, “Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, kan yoa khei kü yoa shaubü cheei ngo khümbo kuan aplabü.”
Haoenei aeibou ngangkei hoba cheei che, cheei che, dogo hao to laukei, “Maimai, kho ngo sai?”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Kho Anthüknyi yoa kü phaua hambou che.
Aishanga Müteibü Shou, Laishibaei hao shangabü lenan kibü tegü, haulabü, lausikei ao danko Müteibü Shou khümbo kuan apda, hao shanga ügütü! Kho müt shangaje hao abukbü maibou yingkhoulabü!”
Haoen shauji yungjinei haoei wentek sungkei, hoba haoei haükuan kho shaknyinkei hoba haoen la kuko laukei, “Ho sungashi; ho ngeibü mang ki.”
Haoei thung che sungan nyensang kukei, hoba kho haoen la kukei; hoba haoen pendouei khüka yungkei.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Ho kü sii thebülanbü ki, laobou juongnyu shanga koukei.
Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda: Ngei Mühghaü Sanglea semlühdei haanbü ajenshongko, touje semlüh hek mai ngei ayunglabü.”
Haoenei chia che laukei, hoba Oliv Shongh to haukei.
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Kan pendou phaiyetlabü, aishanga Laishibaei lauda, ‘Ngei sanlombou to ngümlabü hoba san shuong aalabü’,
lausikei ngo langngeian phaia ngo kan to shaang Galil to haulabü.”
Peterei hao to laukei, “Pendouei apyosikei ngei no üpyolabü.”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Ngühmaia ngei ka to lenda, tat, khei tao maimai, aunakei nyinei akoutoua, nyi ngo semnei atheletlabü.”
Lausikei haoei aeibou kaangkosekko laukei, “Ngo ka yoa hailabü kiasikei ngei no üpyolabü.” Hobaje lubü shuongeikei pendouei khei laukei.
Haoen Gethsemen dogo laubü kaoen che to loukei, hoba haoei hao eikshuong to laukei, “Ngei welautoua hanei setteiashi.”
Haoei Peter, Jakob hoba Johan hao yoa leikei. Hao maangmauei shiettikei hoba aicheküman khonkula khangkei,
hoba haoei haoen to laukei, “Kü soushou haila tegütham shaleda. Kan hanei kishi, hoba pialemashi.”
Hobaje hao thedang ae tuisho lian kaoa khüpetkei hoba thükalonga jihsiphai kho hao ka kuktiashi dogo welaukei,
hoba haoei laukei, “Aba, Abou, ka thedanga pendou thüklabü. Ho thung kü ka ngailangkushi; lausikei kü maang aying ka maang.”
Hao loukei hoba haoen yepan kibü hapan, Peter to laukei, “Simon, no yepan apda lo? Nyi angh che pianleman akienda lo?
Kan takteibüa üatetla pialemashi hoba welauashi. Maimaitham soushouei maangtakda, lausikei phea hau aki.”
Hao nyibou ngaikei hoba jeteibü ngüh lauko welaukei.
Nyiboukei hao loukei hoba haoen yepan hapbei, aishanga haoeneibü nyek aeibou yuian kiteikei, hoba haoenei hao to ai ong jongailaje angeko mangan apbei.
Hao semboukei longeikei hoba haoen to laukei, “Kan tou sühko yepda, hoba haksoda lo? Soua! Jih lousüha! Chühashi, Müteibü Shou shabü shuongeibü ikmangto khümbo kuan apa.
Loenashi, sen hauakho. Chü- hashi, ngo yaakshaubou chunga kia.”

Kheijinei hao ngüh joyoko kijinei, Judas, Anthüknyi yo kabü che lousühkei; hoba hao yoa, ungshedbü shuong, Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong hoba jaishou shuongei hautibü, in si juthep lamlean jungan mütshang che seman kiteikei.
Hao khümbo kuan apbou khoei haoen la hai lenko amaaphilabü che kuan kiteikei, “Ngei aoto sembung sheplaje kho hao. Hao lapashi hoba lombü shuong phanga leilangashi.”
Hao loukei, hoba tangshaitham hao jungto hauan laukei, “Lenbou”, hoba hao to sembung shepbei.
Haoenei hao to ik shatkei hoba lapbei.
Nyangko loan kibü yoa cheei in che setenan thükkabou ungshedbou sambü che to wapbei hoba haoeibü nou shipan apbukei.
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Kanei kokbü khulimbo loubü tegütham in si juthep jungan ngo lapla louda si?
Kan to lembü chema chalou angbüa lenkei, hoba kanei ngo alap. Lausikei Laishiba loushadjan.”
Haoen pendouei hao apyokei hoba satkei.
Heshou che mang konga inyaibü nei che ong sean haophai sembo kiteikei, hoba haoenei hao to japbei.
Lausikei inyaibü nei kho ong phainei hangletnyu phokuan mütkong satkei.
Haoenei Jisu thükkabou ungshedbou jungto leian haukei, hoba ungshedbü shuong hoba Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong takshatkei.
Peterei thükkabou ungshedbou khongmang sühko heeko heeko haophai sembei. Hao khusabü shuong yoa wana kham sepbo setan kikei.
Ungshedbü shuong hoba Khukabü Kambü pendouei Jisu haitila hao khulimbo aukabü lambei, lausikei haoenei che ongkei ühüp.
Aishanga juongei amlangbü aukabü kukei, lausikei haoeneibü aukabü aji.
At loan hao khulimbo amlangbü aukabü atko laukei,
“Künei maimai, ‘Ngei ho ikei kümbü Lembüchem leilulabü, hoba chalou sem phaia ngei lubü ikei akümbü Lembüchem danglabü’ dogo lauko ditkei.”
Kheinyu kümasikei haoeneibü aukabü aji.
Thükkabü ungshedbou haoen thedanga lokei hoba Jisu to pheko laukei, “Nyi ajongailep lo? Habü shuongei kakhu limbo sungbabü habü aukabü shuong ho ai?”
Lausikei hao semele kikei, hoba ai ajongai. Thükkabou ungshedbouei laukei, “No Haüboueibü Shou Khrista sai?”
Jisuei laukei, “Ngo hao; hoba kanei Müteibü Shou Thükkabou Mühghaü maenei setan kibü hoba mühkabü sangmei yoa loubü haplabü.”
Thükkabou ungshedbouei haoeibü neisimei jitnyinkei hoba laukei, “Senei aila aukabü aei khamla?
Mühghaü nyikubü kanei dida. Kanei ai damda?” Haoen pendouei hao haila muakei dogo shedbü kukei.
Atei hao to eokei thuokkei, hoba haoeibü thenyek yuklepbukei hoba ikei ipbei, hoba laukei, “Tetenashi”, hoba khusabü shuongei leian ngümeikei.
Peter leinei sangchimanga kijinei thükkabou ungshedboueibü sambüsao che loukei
hoba Peter kham sepbo hapbei. Saoei hao to chühkei hoba laukei, “Nokei Nazaret kabü Jisu yoa kiteikei.”
Lausikei haoei hao atheletko laukei, “Ngei angekei ayingsi nyi ai laudaje ashuokda.” Hao khongto angkei hoba aunakei koukei.
Sambüsaoei hao nyiboula hapbei hoba chunga lobü shuong to laukei, “Ho müt haoen yo kabü che.”
Lausikei haoei nyiboukei hao athelet. Longche kian phaia nyangko loan kibü shuongei Peter to laukei, “Maimaitham no haoen yo kabü che yingkei, aishanga no tükde Galilbü.”
Haoei khükkeiuokkei hoba thelet lanletko laukei, “Kanei ao shangabü laudaje kho müt ngei angekei.”
Kheijinei aunakei nyiboula koukei; hoba, “Aunakei nyibou akoutoua nyi ngo semnei atheletlabü,” dogo Jisuei laubü ngüh Peterei damenkei. Hobaje hao maang leilukei hoba haapbei.
Lang ngebüyam, ungshedbü shuongei jaishou shuong si Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong hoba Thükkabü Kambü to ngühthang chela yenkei. Haoenei Jisu khühan leilangkei, hoba Pilat la khümbomeiko kuan apbei.
Pilatei hao to phekei, “No Jihudabü Choba sai?” Haoei hao to jongaikei, “Kho nyi lauda.”
Thükkabü ungshed shuongei hangsilam juongnyua hao attikei.
Pilatei nyibou hao to phekei, “Nyi ajongailep lo? Haoenei kakhu limbo shedbü sungbada chühashi.”
Jisuei aikei ajongai, khoei Pilat maangpangkei.
Tou songei Lem chaloua müt shuongei phebü tegü thüngdanga kibü yo ka müt che haoen la litikulabü kiteikei.
Baraba nyenan müt che, sangkhu limbo khüpyojinei haoenei müt haitibü aoa khüpyobü dan yoa thüngdanga lapan jinan kiteikei.
Noknyüh angan Pilat to haoei nyishou kümbü tegü haoen shanga kümbula phekei.
Haoei haoen to jongaikei, “Ngei kan la Jihudabü Choba kho litikula kanei maangangda lao?”
Aishanga theshoubüei ungshedbü shuongei hao khümbo kukei dogo haoei ngekei.
Lausikei Baraba ong haoei haoen la nalitikula shanga ungshedbü shuongei noknyüh pühnyintikei.
Pilatei haoen to jongaikei, “Kanei Jihudabü Choba dogo laubou to ngei ai kümtimang sühda?”
Haoenei, “Hao peiseia thüngashi!” dogo ngekyokei.
Pilatei haoen to laukei, “Aila, haoei ai amaibü kümbei?” Haoenei aei kaangbou ngekkei, “Hao peiseia thüngashi!”
Pilatei noknyüh maang haitimang sühla Baraba litikei, hoba Jisu to lühthepei semtian phaia peiseia thüngla shanga hao khümbo kuan apbei.
Sepai shuongei hao governor choba chem khongmang to leian atkei; hoba sepai san pendou ngashaikei.
Haoenei hao la nakthüngan sakbü nei neikukei, hoba jakei choba khun che yikan hao la hankukei
hoba salem kuko laukei, “Maisho kishi, Jihudabü Choba!”
Haoenei haoeibü khu to lijuei setkei hoba hao to eokei thuokkei; hoba haoenei hao thedanga youkükei thungetko lembei.
Haoenei hao nyikuan phaia, haoenei hao ka nakthüngan sakbü nei kho sungngaikei hoba hao la jembü neisimei neikukei.
Haoenei hao peiseia thüngla leilangkei;
hoba haoenei kaonyek ka louko kiteibü danto haübü müt che, Alexander si Rufa bou, Kurinibü Simon la Jisueibü peisei tukosekko petikei.
Haoenei Jisu Golgotha, laobou to “Khulo Kaoen” dogo lauda kho kaoen to leibakei;
hoba haoenei hao la semlüh ih khauekbü to kheian kukei, lausikei haoei asunglet.
Haoenei hao peiseia thüngkei, hoba mütpem wekoei ai haülaje dogo phaang pakan chühko haoeibü neisimei haoen yoa jankei.
Haoenei hao nge- yang angh güa peiseia thüngkei.
Hao attibü ngüh, “JIHUDABÜ CHOBA” dogo dokei.
Haoenei hao yoa kokbü müt nyi che haoeibü maenei hoba che nanaenei dogo thüngkei.
(Hobaje Laishibaei, “Hobaje hao ngühkhüm lulimbü yoa pakyokei” dogo laubü loushedkei.)
Danbü phaibü shuongei haoeneibü khu yetko hao khulimbo nyikuko laukei, “Akhai dogo! No, lembüchem leilutian chalou semnyeta dangngailabü kho
peisei ka kaiyena hoba no lulu püetashi!”
Kho tegütham ong thükkabü ungshedbü shuongeikei Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong yoan haoen yoa nyikuko laukei, “Haoei mü püetkei! Hobaje haoei hao lulu püetla athükda.
Künei hapan mailemlabü lele, Israelbü Choba, Khrista, tou peisei ka lotashi.” Hobaje hao yoa peiseia thüngbü shuongeikei hao la nyikukei.
Ladang chajihbou onkei, angh sem asühshongko kaodak khümbo nakthühei küplepbei.
Angh sem jiha Jisuei ngüh yaangbüei ngekkei, “Eloi, Eloi, lema sabakthani?”, laobou tetlabü, “Kü Mühghaü, kü Mühghaü, nyi aila ngo apyokei?”
Ladang nyangko kibü shuongei ditkei, haoenei laukei, “Chühashi, haoei Elija ngada.”
Cheei langjung hauan, od che haijepbü dei shenko haman, phodong chenei kho lonan, hao la yungla kuko laukei, “Khei phokushi. Elija louyenan hao sungleda saoje senei chühkho.”
Jisuei kaang ngekkei hoba soushou satkei.
Hobaje Lembüchema peithetbü nei kui ka kaoa sühko penyila jitnyinkei.
Ladang hao thedanga loan kibou saongao thükkabouei hao khei haiko hapbei, haoei laukei, “Maimaitham ho müt Mühghaü Shou yinga!”
Hobaje yaksa shuongeikei saabü ka chühko kiteikei. Haoen yoa Mari Magdalin, Jakob nashoubou si Jose nyu Mari, hoba Salome,
aoyouei hao Galila kijinei hao phai sembei hoba hao thuikei; hoba lubü yaksa juong hao yoa Jerusalem to loubü haoen yoa yoan kiteikei.
Ladang chasem sühkei, hoba kho Lamlebü chalou yingsije, khei ngiet kho Nounyet kiteisije,
Arimathiabü Josef, damanchühbou yaangenbü che, aoei Mühghaü Sangle chüheiko kikei, hao loukei. Hao maang yaangngeian Pilat jungto haukei hoba Jisueibü mang hikei.
Pilatei Jisu haia saima dogo maangpangkei, hoba haoei saongao thükkabou ngaan hao mudonga haiasai dogo phekei.
Ladang Pilatei saongao thükkabou ka khei yingakei dogo ditletkei, haoei Josef la haibü mang kho kukei.
Haoei inyaibü nei jekkei, hoba hao tonletan khonei shokei, hoba laanga haübü hee chenei hao phokei; hoba haoei heekhün thüka laang che tongjung hauan küplepbei.
Hobaje Mari Magdalin si Jose nyu Mariei hao khünshang hapbei.
Ladang Nounyet dankei, Mari Magdalin, Jakob nyu Mari si Salomeei hao la naangkula loula ponlem onang jekkei.
Balea ngeyang shaangbounyet, ngeyang ete chanyu phambüsi haoen hee to loukei.
Haoen si haoen, “Sen la aoei heekhün ka laang kho yühan apbula?” dogo lauyokei.
Ladang haoenei chüh- antikei, haoenei laang kho yühan sattian hapbei; kho aicheküman yaangan kikei.
Hee maangto atsi haoenei heshou che neisimei thupaibü lean mae aenei müt che setan hapbei, hoba haoen aeibou maangpangkei.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Maang tepang. Kanei peiseia thüngbü Nazaretbü Jisu lameida. Hao langngeia. Hao hanei aki. Chühashi, haoenei hao khünshang ho yingkei.
Lausikei hauashi hoba hao eikshuong si Peter la, ‘Hao kan to shaang Galil to hauda. Haoei kan to lenbü tegü, khünei kanei hao haplabü’, dogo lenashi.”
Haoen longkei hoba aeibou lühko hoba hatenan hee ka satkei. Haoenei aolakei ai alen, aieilausi haoen hatkei.
Tou balea shaangbounyet enyu hao langngeian phaia, haoei shabü sou nyet shian sattikunyu Mari Magdalin to shaang longan lenkei.
Sao haukei hoba hao yoa kibü dan to, haoen mang haapbo hoba haapyoko kijinei lenkei.
Ladang haoenei hao laang kia hoba Mari Magdalinei hapa dogo laukei, haoenei kho maialem.
Kho phaia haoen yokabü müt nyi sangto hauko kijinei, haoei phangcheei haoen la longan lenkei,
haoen ngaikei hoba lubü shuong to lenkei. Haoenei haosi tokei maialem.

Hobaje Anthükche kho shaula yungla setan kijinei, haoei haoen la longan lenkei, hoba haoenei maialembü hoba maang- pon kaangbü shanga hakkei, aishanga hao langngeian phaia hapbü shuong to haoenei maialem.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Kaodak pendou to hauashi hoba khunak shousi pendou la Ngühlang Maibü songlenashi.
Aoei maileman baptida hao khümenlabü, lausikei aoei maialemda hao la shedbü kulabü.
Hobaje aoyouei mailemlaje haoen shanga habü amaaphilabü kilabü: kü nyena haoenei shabü sou shian sattilabü, haoenei ngühyem haanbüei laulabü
hoba haoenei ikkei pinyu jungeilabü, hoba haoenei hailabü denche yungasikei, khoei haoen la ai khon akulabü; haoenei shatbü to ikei shanglabü hoba haoen mailabü.”
Hibü haoen to lauan phaia Bunyubou Jisu khuthük to anlangkei, hoba Mühghaü maenei setkei;
lausikei haoen haukei hoba pendou aenei songlenkei, hoba Jisuei haoen yoa kümsilei kümbei hoba hao ngüh amaaphilabüei aukabü loushadtikei.

(9 Yaksa shuongei Peter si hao jambou shuong to heshoubouei lenbü pendou tuibouei ngetikei. 10 Kho phaia Jisuei chaang ka chanep sühko saopobü hoba thon akibü khümenbü aleilubü ngühlang haoen danko hautikei.)
Sanoubü Theofila: Ngühlangmaibüeibü dambü shuong hoba shaangbü nyekei hapbü aukabü shuong kün la kubü tegü,
haüthükbü kho dola shanga kün yoa müt juongei haoenei sühlangbü maibouthamei haujemyoa.
Kho tegü büngbü khangbü ka thama ngei habü pendou ho shangashatan ki yingsije, ngeikei ho ka shanga thenkei thenko dokula maikei dogo damenkei,
khei nyi ditletbü ngühlang habü ho ngühmaang hoba tükdebü dogo nyi chongchingla shanga.
Jihuda Choba, Herod chaloua Abija mütli kabü ungshedbou müt che Zekharia dogo nyenan kikei. Haoyak kho Aron phang ka; saoeibü nyen Elizabet kikei.
Haosi ham Mühghaü thedanga saopobü ngühkhüm hoba Bunyubouei lenbü pendou amaashikko jungeibü mütshuong kiteikei.
Lausikei haosi shousi akitei; aieilausi Elizabeth kho angkongbü, hoba ham jaile noulebü ong yingan kiteikei.

Ungshedbü hangeilamei ho Zekhariaeibü then yingan kiteikei, hoba hao Mühghaü junga ungshedbü kümsilei kümbo kikei; kheijinei Bunyuboueibü saopobü lemshona jenjuok-ponlem lemla shanga phaang lebü kho hao la shatkei.
Kho jenjuok-ponlem lembü jiha mütshuong pendou khonga welauko kiteikei.
Kheijinei hao la Bunyuboueibü khuthük hangangbü che jenjuok-ponlem lemshanga mae aenei loan longan lenkei.
Zekhariaei ladang kho hapbei hao mokkei hoba hatbüei shenkei.
Lausikei khuthük hangangbüei hao to laukei, “Zekharia, tehüt; kaibü welau kho dida. Kayak Elizabetei kala bousu shou che bukkulabü, hoba nyi hao la Johan nyenkulabü;
nyi olinbü hoba maanghaibü haplabü, hoba hao bukbüei müt juong olinyolabü.
“Aishanga hao Bunyubou thedanga yaangbü che yinglabü, haoei ih ayingsi jaaklabü ai ayunglabü, hao kho bukjineithama Soushou Saopobüei shenan kilabü,
hoba haoei Israelbü juong haoeneibü Bunyubou Mühghaü jungto sepeitilabü.

Bousi shuongeibü maangpon shousi shuongeibü la yeiko hoba ngüha alebü shuong saopobü to, dogo sepeitila shanga, hoba Bunyubou shanga khümbomeiko lamlean kiteilabü lele mütli che lamlela shanga hao Elijaeibü soushou hoba sei bauan Mühghaü thedanga hauteilabü.”
Zekhariaei hangangbü to laukei, “Ngei ho lai küman ngela? Ngo baushi yingkei hoba küyakkei po juong noulebü ki.”
Hangangbüei hao to jongaikei, “Ngo Mühghaü junga lobou Gabriel ki. Ngo ka to joyola hoba ka la ngühlang maibü kula hautikei.
Kü to ditashi! Kho chalou asühshongko no ngüh angla athükko aplabü, aishanga tetenbü chaloua loushadlabü shanga ngei lenbü khübü ngüh to nyi maialem.”
Mütshuong pendouei Zekharia chüheiko kikei hoba hao lemshang ka lounyu alongbü khoei haoen maangpangko kikei.
Ladang hao longkei hao ngühangla athükko kikei hoba haoenei haoei lemshanga mangsang cheje hapan kilabü dogo damenkei. Haoei haoen la shuokenlabü lele ong lenkei hoba haoje ngouyoyo khüpbei.
Hobaje ladang haoeibü khangenbü then kho wankei hao chemto ngaikei.
Kho phaia haoyak Elizabetei shia na künkei, hoba saoei lit ngao sühko sao lolo hai laungaiko haukei,
“Ho Bunyubouei kü shanga kümbubü kho ki! Touje haoei kü to maangshikko chühngaia hoba mütshuong yoka ngeibü himou langkua.”
Lit lakboua Mühghaü ka Gabriel hangangbü kho Galil kabü Nazaret dogo nyenbü sangnyu che to,
Dawid mütli kabü Josef nyenbou bousu cheei kanan kibü saosüngbü medei che jungto hautikei. Medeieibü nyen kho Mari.
Hao atkei hoba sao to laukei, “Salem, maangshiknyutham! Bunyubou ka yoa kia.”
Kho ngühei sao maangphanga aeibou mokkei, hoba kho salem ngüh kho ai tetlabü yingla dogo dameiko kikei.
Kheijinei hangangbüei sao to laukei, “Tehüt, Mari, no Mühghaü junga maangshiknyu.
Nyi na che künlabü hoba bousu shou che buklabü hoba nyi hao la Jisu nyenkulabü.
Hao yaangenlabü, hao to Thükkaboueibü Shou dogo laulabü, hoba Bunyubou Mühghaüei hao la haobou Dawideibü choba setshang kulabü.
Haoei Jakob chemdanga ponpen shanga songdaklabü; hoba haoeibü songdak khünei thon akilabü.”
Lausikei Mariei hao to laukei, “Ho lalokche kian phaia, aieilausi ngo mo chem akankei?”
Hangangbüei sao to jongaikei, “Soushou Saopobü ka thükto lotlabü hoba Thükkabou khoei no khuileplabü. Kho danko bukla kibou na khüto Mühghaü Shou dogo nyenlabü,
tokei ka chempen Elizabeteikei sao nou lean phaia, angkongnyu dogo laubou sao khoeikei tou hoei lit lakbou bousu shou che shia künakei;
aishanga Mühghaü shanga athükaminlabü ai aki.”
Mariei laukei, “Ngo Bunyuboueibü samnyu; kü to nyi laubü tegü yingshi.” Kheijinei hangangbüei sao apyoan satkei.
Kheijinei Mari aeibou panteiko shongh kaodak kabü sangnyu Judea to haukei.
Sao Zekharia chem to haukei hoba Elizabet to salem ngüh joyokei.
Ladang Elizabetei Marieibü salem ngüh ditkei na kho olinbü ka saoeibü shia saiyeikei, hoba sao kho Soushou Saopobüei shenkei.
Saoei ngüh kaangbüei ngekko laukei, “Yaksa pendou yoa maangshiknyu yingshi, hoba kaibü shi kabü hek kho haülabou yingshi.
Ngeibü Bunyuboueibü nyu kü jungto loulabü lele lai kü la haüthükkei?
Aishanga kaibü salem ngüh ngeibü noukhün to lotjinei naei olinbü ka ngeibü shia saiyeida.
Bunyuboueibü ngüh kho sao to yinglabü dogo aoei mailembei, sao kho olinbou.”
Hobaje Mariei laukei,
“Ngeibü soushouei Bunyubou yaangenbü tang khittida,
hoba ngeibü soushou ngeibü Mühghaü,
ngo khümenbou to olinda;
aishanga haoei samnyu to phangkabü thua kijinei maangshikko chüha.
Tou ka jaüan meten pendouei kü tohaünyu dogo laulabü,
aishanga Thükenbouei kü to kümsilei yaang küma.Haoeibü nyen kho Saopobü,
hoba haoei hao to soumo hatbü shuong to meten meten sühko onou lenda.
Haoei haoeibü phakei hau kiko kümena;
haoei lulueibü maangpona liliko dambü shuong lintia.
Haoei songdakbü shuong lulueibü choba setshang ka sungyana,
hoba haoei phangkabü shuong thük to tonena.
Haoei mühbünoubü shuong maibüei phottia,
hoba haoei keibü yaangbü shuong ikkong ngaitia.
Haoei seneibü bousi shuong la thekubü tegü
hao haoeibü sambü Israel to thuila loua;
haoei Abraham jungto hoba haoeibü thensilen to
thon akibü onou shanga dambuko kiteia.”
Mari Elizabet yoa lit sem thüng thüngkei hoba chem to ngaikei.
Elizabeteibü jih sühkei hoba saoei bousu shou che bukkei.
Saoeibü lepbü shuong hoba chempen shuongei Bunyubouei sao to onou yaang lenbü ditkei hoba haoenei sao to liko olinyokei.
Hobaje sembounyet haoenei hao la kipbumang sühkei hoba haoenei hao la haoboueibü nyenphaito Zekharia dogo nyenkumang sühkei.
Lausikei haonyuei laukei, “Aying, hao Johan nyenlabü.”
Haoenei sao to laukei, “Kan chempen aokei khei nyenbüje aki.”
Haoenei haobou to haoei hao la ai ngenkumang sühdaje shuokenlabü lele phekei.
Haoei dojin hikei hoba haoeibü nyen “Johan” dogo dokei. Kheijinei pendou maang- pangkei.
Mangde ong haoeibü ngühang longeikei hoba haoei atoknokko Mühghaü nyen sangko joyokei.
Lepbü shuong pendou hatko yeikei, hoba Judea shongh kaodak pendoua mütshuongei habü haüthükbü shangabü lau- yokei.
Kho ditbü shuong mütpem wekoei lulueibü maang- phanga hai lauko thankei, “Ho nashou hoei ailaibü müt la yeilama lo?” Aishanga maimaitham Bunyuboueibü ik hao thüka kiteikei.
Haobou Zekharia Soushou Saopobüei shenkei hoba hai tetenko laula khangkei,
“Israel Mühghaü Bunyubou sangashi,
aishanga haoei hao mütli pean chühkei hoba haoen püetkei.
Haoei sen shanga haoeibü sambü Dawid
chemdang ka Khümenbou che longtia.
(Kho haoei shangiednyu
haoeibü saopobü thuseibü
shuong danko thekuakei.)
Haoei sen dangbou ka hoba sen to mangsenbü
shuong ikmang ka khümenlabü.
Hobaje ho seneibü bousi shuong to lenbü onou haüthüktila hoba haoeibü
saopobü thesilan damentila shanga kümbei.
Hobaje seneibü bou Abraham to theyolanyobü,
laobou seneibü dangbou ikmang ka khümenla hoba seneibü langkei sünga
saopobü si tangshaibüa ai ühütko hao khangenla
thüktila shanga haoei kho kümbei.
No, nashoukei, Thükkaboueibü thuseibü dogo nyenlabü,
aishanga no haoeibü lam lamlela shanga
Bunyubou thedangto hauteilabü.
Seneibü Mühghaüei haoeibü maanglemenbü
hoba sanoubüa haoeneibü shabü lai apbuda
kho lenko hao mütli la khümenbü phinthonkulabü.
Kho tegü thük ka changeei nakthühbü
hoba haibü yeme phanga setan kibü shuong la
kho ngesak longbü ngetila shanga
hoba sangmai to seneibü youyaü leila shanga
sen pheian chühlabü.”
Na kho chingkei hoba soushoua hau kiko yeikei. Hobaje Israel la khümbo kuko longan lenbü chalou asühshongko hao kho yamlamanga ong kiteikei.
Khübü chaloua ho longkei, kaodak pendoua nyen dojan dogo Kaisar Agusta ka ngühkhüm hautikei.
Kho shaangbou nyen doletbü kikei. Ho Kurinia Siria governor kibü jiha kikei.
Kho kümsilei shanga mütpem weko jembü sangnyu to haukei.
Josefkei Galil ka Nazaret sangnyu ka, Jihudaa Bethlehem nyenbü Dawid sangnyu to haukei, aishanga hao Dawid phang hoba thensilen kikei.
Kiman phobü Mari yoa, mang akongko kijinei hao nyen dola haukei.
Haosi khünei kijinei sao jih sühkei,
hoba saoei shaangbou jayangshou bukkei. Saoei hao sholepbei hoba youho nyaishang ukhong chenei phokei, aieilausi haoen shanga sühshang khünei kaoen akitei.
Kho kaonyeka sanlombü shuong lamshaushanga nangnak haoeneibü sanshuong lombo kiteikei.
Khuthük hangangbü che haoen thük to lotkei, hoba Bunyubou soneikangbü haoen kaijembo haukei, hoba haoen aeibou hatyokei.
Khuthük hangangbüei haoen to laukei, “Tehüt: ngei kan jungto mütshuong pendou shanga olinbü ngühlang yaangbü künbada:
tat kan la Dawid sangnyua Khümenbou che bukkuakei; hao kho Bunyubou Khrista ki.
Kan shanga amaaphilabü ho kilabü; kanei nasak che neiei sholepan youho nyaishang ukhong chenei yeptian haplabü.”
Mangde ong hangangbü yoa khuthükbü tan yaangbü che longan Mühghaü nyen sangko laukei,
“Thükkabou khuthüka Mühghaü to soneikangbü,
hoba kaodaka haoei maangshikbü mütshuong yoa hakso.”
Ladang khuthük hangangbüei haoen apyojung khuthük to ngaikei hoba sanlombü shuong cheei che to laukei, “Sen Bethlehem to hauakho hoba Bunyubouei sen la ngetibü hoba haüthükbü kho chühakho.”
Haoen tongde haukei hoba haoenei Mari si Josef hoba na kho youho nyaishang ukhonga yeptian hapbei.
Kho hapan haoenei na shangabü haoen to ngetibü pendou lenkei.
Sanlombü shuongei haoen to lenbü ditbü shuong pendou maangpangkei,
lausikei Mariei kho pendou saoeibü maangpona künkei hoba haüko dambei.
Hobaje sanlombü shuong Mühghaü la soneikangbü kuko hoba haoenei ditbü hoba haoenei hapbü pendou shanga hao nyen sangko ngaikei; aishanga kho haoen la lenbü tegütham kikei.
Chalou setbounyet hao kiplabü chalou sühkei, hoba hao shia mokünjinei khuthük hangangbüei kubü nyen, hao la Jisu dogo nyenkukei.
Ladang Mosa Ngühkhümei sakkubü tegü saüenbü jih kho wankei, haoeibü nyusibouei Bunyubou la kula
(Bunyubou Ngühkhüma Laishibaei lenda, “Shaangbou bukbü jayangshou weko kho Bunyubou to saopobü” dogo nyenlabü,)
hoba Bunyubou Ngühkhümei sakkubü tegü dukutuk dang che ayingsi guduru shoushou dang che dogo lemla shanga Jerusalem to loukei.
Jerusalema müt che nyenei Simeon kikei. Hao kho, Israel püetla Khrista loubü to aeibou waangko chüheiko saopobü hoba songlea maangdakbü müt che kiteikei; hoba Soushou Saopobü hao thüka kikei.
Hobaje haoei Bunyuboueibü Khrista ühüp shongko hao ühailabü dogo Soushou Saopobüei hao to tang khittian kiteikei.
Soushouei leibü ka hao Lembüchem to loukei, hoba ladang Ngühkhümei mangsühbü tegü hao to kümlaleila shanga nyusibouei nashou Jisu kho leibakei,
haoei hao hao ikmangto sungletkei hoba Mühghaü sangko laukei,
“Bunyubou, tou ka ngüh tegü,
nyi no khangenbou haksoa bangtiashi.
Aishanga Küksithang to tang khitlabü ngesakbü,
hoba ka mütli Israel shanga
soneikangbü laobou nyi phangshuong
nyekei hapbo lamlekei,
kü nyekei kaibü khümenbü kho hapa.”
Haobou si haonyu hao shangabü laubü to maangpangko kikei.

Simeonei haoen haükukei hoba haonyu Mari to laukei, “Chühashi, maangpon juong ka dambü longla shanga Israela juongnyu tuongtila hoba phonla shanga hoba amaaphilabü laobou khulimbo ngüh laula, ho nashou pienakei.
Haü, hoba inei ka soushou paiko seplabü.”
Asher phang ka Fanuel shou Anna nyenbü thuseinyu che kiteikei. Sao kho aeibou sinan kikei; sao chem kanan phaia lao junga po nyet kikei;
sao kho latnyu po sao leito lei noushou kiteikei.
Saoei lembü chem ladangkei üpyo, lausikei change nangnak mühei nyengko hoba welauko Mühghaü khangenkei.
Kheijinei sao loukei hoba Mühghaü la nyensang kukei hoba Jerusalem khümenbü shanga haiyeibü shuong pendou to nashou kho shangabü laukei.
Ladang Josef si Mariei Bunyubou Ngühkhümei sakkubü tegü khümbo wankei, haoen Galil to haoeneibü sangnyu Nazaret to ngaikei.
Nashou kho chingkei hoba hau kiko yeikei. Hao songsihonei shenkei hoba Mühghaü onou hao thüka kikei.
Haoeibü nyusibou po weko Püetbü Lema Jerusalem to haukei.
Hao po anthüknyi onjinei poshou natshou tegü haoen lem to haukei.
Ladang chalou kho penkei haoen ngaijinei, nashou Jisu Jerusalema setngaikei, lausikei haoeibü nyusibouei ange.
Haoenei hao shuong yoa yangakei dogo dambei, hoba haoen chabük che wakou haukei; kheijinei haoenei haoen chempen hoba himshuong yoa hao lameikei.
Haoenei hao ühüpdang lesi, haoen Jerusalem to ngaikei hoba hao lambei.
Chalou semnyet danan phaia haoenei hao lembüchema lenbou shuong yoa haoen ngüh ditko, hoba haoen to pheyoko setan hapbei.
Hao ngüh ditbü shuong pendou haoei ditenbü hoba jongaibü to maang- pangkei.
Ladang haoeibü nyusibouei hao hapbei, haoen maang- pangkei hoba haonyuei hao to laukei, “Kü shou, nyi aila kün to hainyu jungeikei? Kabou hoba ngo maangmauko no lameida.”
Haoei haosi to laukei, “Aila kanei ngo lameiko kikei? Ngo kü Bou chema kijan dogo kanei ange lo?”
Lausikei haoei haoen to laubü kho haoenei aditen.
Hao haoen yoa Nazaret to loukei, hoba hao haoen phanga ngühaleko kikei. Lausikei haonyuei khübü ngühsidei pendou saoeibü maang- pona thankei.
Hobaje Jisu songsihona hoba süngalopa Mühghaü hoba müt thedanga onoua chingkei.
Kaisar Tiberia songdak po anthük ngaoboubüa, Pontia Pilat Judeaa governor kijinei, Herod Galila tetrark, haona Filip Itumia si Trakonitaa tetrark, hoba Lusania Abilena tetrark kiteikei.
Ana si Kaifa nyi thükkabü ungshedbou kiteikei. Kho jihsiphaia yama Zekharia shou Johan jungto Mühghaü ngüh loukei.
Haoei Jordan kaijembo kibü kaonyek pendou ae shabü ap haplabü shanga maangpon sepeiko baptila songlenko haukei.
Isaia thuseibü lea doan kibü tegü:
“Yama cheei ngekbü ngüh,
‘Kanei Bunyubou Lamnyu lamleashi,
hoba haoeibü youlam tangshaitham kümashi;
kaonop pendou shenlabü, hoba shongh hoba
shonghshou pendou yenlabü,
nongbü kuokbü kaoen tangshaibü lam la yeilabü
hoba tokbü khuongbü lam lenglengtham yeilabü;
hoba khunak shousi pendouei Mühghaü khümenbü haplabü.’ ”
Haoei hao la baptitila loubü mütshuong to laukei, “Kan pinyu shousi shuong, loulabü maangshat ka satenla kan to aoei thungeikei?

Kan tükde maang- pon sepeiakei dogo kaneibü thechühei lenenashi; hoba kan lolo, ‘Abraham küneibü bou kia’ dogo telau, aishanga ngei kan to lenda, Mühghaüei habü laang shuong ka Abraham shousi shuong longtila thükakei.
Tokei wou kho bunyu chungthema thenakei. Laobou bunyua lang maibü eheklaje khoje aklabü hoba wan to jinlabü.”
Noknyühei hao to phekei, “Khülonga künei ai kümla?”
Haoei haoen to jongaikei, “Aoei mangyuk nyi ki haoei akibou to janyoashi, hoba aoei shausiyung ki haoeikei khei kümashi.”
Khüm hebü shuongkei baptitila loukei hoba haoenei hao to laukei, “Lenbou, künei ai kümjan?”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Ngühkhümei sakkubü to liman tehe.”
Sepai shuongeikei hao to phekei, “Hobaje küneikei ai kümjan?” Haoei haoen to laukei, “Ao kakei nam tukosekko teso ayingsi amlangbüei mü tüatti; kaneibü muei maanghaiashi.”
Hobaje mütshuongei chüheiko kijinei, hoba müt pendouei Johan shangabü jembü maang- pona hao Khrista yinglaoma dogo dambo kijinei,
Johanei haoen pendou to jongaikei, “Ngei maimaitham kan deia baptikuda, lausikei kü to hau kibou, aoeibü nguoklüh sengkula ngo amu, hao louada. Haoei kan Soushou Saopobü hoba wanei baptikulabü.
Haoeibü amshang maisho saüenla hoba jembü nyak bunga thansheila shanga hao ika wan jungakei; lausikei haoei sho shuong ladangkei anyetbü wan to jinlabü.”
Kho yoa lubü ngüh juongei haoei mütshuong thungeijangeiko songlenkei.
Lausikei haoei Herod tetrark, haonaeibü yak Herodia aoa, hoba haoei kümsilei amaibü kümbü pendou shanga hakeikei.
Tokei Herodei Johan thüngdang to jinkotham yongbou amaibou kümbei.
Ladang müt pendou baptikhümbei Jisukei baptikei, hoba hao welauko kijinei, müh ipbei
hoba Soushou Saopobü dukutuk phatko lotan hao to pakkei. Khuthük ka ngüh cheei joyoko laukei, “No ngei sanoubü Jayangshou. Ngei kato aeibou maanghaida.”
Jisuei hao po khujin onjinei haoei jembü khangenbü kümsilei khangkei; dambü tegütham hao Josef shou kiteikei:
Heli shou Josef, Mathat shou Heli,
Levi shou Mathat, Malkhai shou Levi, Janai shou Malkhai, Josef shou Janai, Mathatia shou Josef,
Amos shou Mathatia, Nahum shou Amos, Esli shou Nahum, Nagai shou Esli, Maat shou Nagai,
Mathatia shou Maat, Semein shou Mathatia, Josek shou Semein, Joda shou Josek, Joanan shou Joda,
Resosa shou Joanan, Zerubabel shou Rhesa, Shealtiel shou Zerubabel, Neri shou Shealtiel, Melkhei shou Neri,
Adi shou Melkhi, Kosam shou Adi, Elmadam shou Kosam, Er shou Elmadam, Joshua shou Er,
Eliezer shou Joshua, Jorim shou Eliezer, Mathat shou Jorim, Levi shou Mathat, Simeon shou Levi,
Judas shou Simeon, Josef shou Judas, Jonam shou Josef, Eliakim shou Jonam, Melia shou Eliakim,
Mena shou Melia, Matatha shou Mena, Nathan shou Matatha, Dawid shou Nathan, Jesse shou Dawid,
Obed shou Jesse, Boaz shou Obed, Salmon shou Boaz, Nashon shou Salmon, Aminadab shou Nashon,
Admin shou Aminadab, Arni shou Admin, Hezrion shou Arni, Perez shou Hezron, Jihuda shou Perez, Jakob shou Jihuda,
Isak shou Jakob, Abraham shou Isak, Tera shou Abraham, Nahor shou Tera, Serug shou Nahor,
Reu shou Serug, Peleg shou Reu, Eber shor Peleg, Shela shou Eber, Kenan shou Shela,
Arfashad shou Kenan, Shem shou Arfashad, Noa shou Shem, Lamek shou Noa, Methusela shou Lamek,
Enok shou Methusela, Jared shou Enok, Mahalalel shou Jared, Kenan shou Mahalalel, Enosh shou Kenan,
Seth shou Enosh, Adam shou Seth, Mühghaü shou Adam.
Jisu Jordan ka Soushou Saopobüei shenko longeikei. Hao Soushouei
chalou saonyi leiyeijinei shabü mühghaüei hao takteikei. Khübü chaloua haoei aikei ashau, hoba ladang khübü chalou onkei, hao mühei haiko kikei.
Kheijinei shabü mühghaüei hao to laukei, “No Mühghaü Shou longa, ho laangei wentek la yeitiashi.”
Jisuei hao to jongaikei, “Laishibaei lauda, ‘Mütei wentek lansanei lang akilabü.’”
Shabü mühghaüei hao leijung angkei hoba insing che kanglanga hao la kaodak sangle pendou lenkei,
hoba haoei hao to laukei, “Ngei kala habü sangle soneikangbü hoba ho songdak hau pendou kulabü; aishanga ho kü la kua, hoba ngei ho ngei pienbü che la kula thükakei;
hibü nyi ngo lema longa ho pendou kaibü yinglabü.”
Jisuei hao to jongaikei, “Laishibaei lauda, ‘Nyi Bunyubou kaibü mühghaü ong lemjan hoba hao ong khangenjan.’”
Haoei hao Jerusalem to leilangkei hoba hao lembüchem chemkhu thüka settikei hoba hao to laukei, “No Mühghaü Shou longa, no lolo haka atashi;
aishanga Laishibaei lauda, ‘Haoei khuthük hangangbü no thounoula yantilabü,
hoba ka you laang chenei ongkei akühtila haoenei no haoeneibü ikmaanga tonletlabü.’ ”
Jisuei hao to jongaikei, “Ho lauakei, ‘Nyi Bunyubou ka Mühghaü tetaktei.’”
Hobaje ladang shabü mühghaüei hao takteibü penkei, haoei hao tuisho shanga apyokei.
Jisu Soushou Saopobü seia Galil to ngaikei; hoba hao shangabü ngühlang kaijembü kaonyek pendou ae aakei.
Haoei haoeneibü sinagoga lenkei hoba müt pendouei hao sangkei.
Hao inthonshang Nazaret to loukei, hoba hao hanghangbü tegü hao Nounyet sinagog to atkei; hoba hao wela lokei.
Isaia thuseibü tulai hao la kukei, hoba ladang haoei kho sengkei, haoei ho doan kishang hapbei:
“Bunyubou Soushou kü thüka kia,
aieilausi shalebü to ngühlang maibü
songlenla haoei ngo naangenko pienkei;
thüngdang kabü shuong la litibü ngühlang si nyekthubü to nyek khittibü
ngühlang ngekletla, hoba naklepbü
la solo kuko litila,
hoba Bunyubouei maangshikbü po
ngekletkula haoei ngo hautikei.”
Hobaje Jisuei tulai kho tungaian khangenbou la kungaikei hoba setkei; hoba sinagoga kibü pendoueibü nyek hao to thekei.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Tat ho Lai kaneibü noukhüna loushada.”
Hobaje pendouei hao shangabü aukabü kukei hoba haoeibü sembung ka longbü onou ngüh to maangpangkei. “Ho Josef shou aying si?” dogo haoenei laukei.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Küla ho tetentanbü ngüh laukulabü, ‘Maitibou, no lolo maiashi’, hoba laulabü, ‘Ai ong nyi Kapernauma kümbü künei ditkei, kho hanei jembü kaoakei kümashi.’ ”
Haoei laukei, “Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, thuseibü aokei jembü kaodaka asungletda.
Ngei kan la shangashatko lenda, Elija jihsiphaia Israela ladang po sem lit lak müh khinkei, hoba ladang kaodak pendoua mühsinou longkei, khonei latnyu juong kiteikei;
lausi dogokei Elija Sidon kaonyek ka Zarepta latnyu to liman ao jungtokei ohauti.
Elisha thuseibü jihsi- phaia Israela imbü juongnyu kikei lausikei Siriabü Naman to liman ao amai.”
Hobaje haoenei habü ngüh ditjinei sinagoga kibü shuong pendou khauangkei.
Haoen loenkei, sangnyu ka shian sattikei hoba laobou shong- ha haoeneibü sangnyu sangan kikei, kho küngkhüm to hao hangkosuko koulangtila shanga leian haukei;
lausikei hao haoen kanglang ka shetlangkei hoba satkei.
Hobaje hao Galila Kapernaum sangnyu che to loukei, hoba Nounyet haoen la lenkei.
Haoei lenbüa haoen maang- pangkei, aieilausi haoei laubü khonei hau thonan kikei.
Hobaje sinagoga asaopobü shabü mühghaü soushouei lapbü müt che kikei. Haoei ngüh yaangei ngekkei,
“Nazaretbü Jisu, nyi kün to ai kümmang sühda? No kün shemtila loukei sai? No aoje ngei ngeakei: No Mühghaüeibü Saopobou kho ki.”
Jisuei haoen to phangko laukei, “Alemenko hao ka longan apashi!” Kheijinei shabü sou khoei hao lembüchem jenyua phetettikei, hoba hao aleilutiko longan apbei.
Haoen pendou maang- pangkei, hoba cheei che to laukei, “Haoei laubü kho ai? Aishanga haoei hau hoba sei yoan asaopobü soushou shuongla ngühkhüm kuda hoba haoen longan apda.”
Hobaje hao shangabü lauyobü kaijembü kaonyek pendou ae phinthonko haukei.
Haoei sinagog apyokei hoba Simon chem to atkei. Simoneibü yakeibü nyu mangbokei aeibou khonkuko kikei, hoba sao shangabü haoenei hao to joyokukei.
Sao thedanga loan haoei mangbok to phangko laukei, hoba khoei apyokei. Sao khoyam laksepbei hoba nongnaeko haoen la oknyinkei.
Chanyu nepbo kijinei shat phang pendouei shatbü hao jungto pendouei leibakei. Haoei haoen mütpem weko to ikei shangetkei hoba haoen maitikukei.
Shabü soushou shuongkei, “No Mühghaü Shou” dogo ngekyoko longan apbei. Haoei haoen to phangko joyokei hoba haoen la laula shanga asakku, aieilausi hao Messia yingkei dogo haoenei ngekei.
Ladang lang ngekei haoei apyokei hoba sangliphang kaoen che to haukei; lausikei noknyühei hao lameiko kikei. Haoen hao jungto loukei, hoba haoenei hao haoen jungka asattila haujembei;
lausikei haoei haoen to laukei, “Lubü sangnyu shuongakei ngei Mühghaü Sangle Ngühlang Maibü songlenjan. Ho shanga ong ngo hautikei.”
Hobaje haoei Jihuda sinagog shuonga lenkei.
Ladang noknyüh hao kaijembo aüyoko loukei hoba Mühghaü ngühlang ditkei, hao Genesaret thim junga loan kikei,
hoba haoei long nyi thimkoa senenan hapbei. Lausikei ngaulapbü dan khübü ka longan haoeneibü tak sakko hapbei.
Hao long che to atkei, laobou Simoneibü kiteikei, hoba hao to long kho deiko ka leilila phekei. Hao setkei hoba noknyüh la long ka lenkei.
Ladang haoei joyokhümbei haoei Simon to laukei, “Dei haübü aedang to long leiliashi hoba kaneibü takshuong mangto ngaulapla tekashi.”
Simonei jongaikei, “Langyang sünga künei kümbeileikei hoba ai alap, lausikei nyi laualonga ngei takshuong teklabü.”
Ladang haoenei khei kümbei haoenei ngau juongnyu seilepbei, hoba haoeneibü tak jitthetla khangkei.
Haoenei lubü longa kibü haoeneibü eikjambü shuong louan thuiyola ik lepan lenko ngakei. Haoen sühlangkei hoba long nyi ham ngauei shensije long shuong mangto atla khangkei.
Ladang Simon Peterei kho hapbei haoei Jisueibü youa khüpetko laukei, “Kü jungka bangashi Bunyubou, aieilausi ngo shabü müt.”
Aishanga ngau juongnyu lapbei, hao hoba hao jambou shuong pendou maang- pangan apbei,
hoba tokei Zebedi shou nyi, Jakob si Johan, aonyi Simon to thujambü shuong kiteikei, maangpangan shembei. Jisuei Simon to laukei, “Tehüt; tou ka jaüan nyi müt laplabü.”
Haoenei long kaomai to leibakei, pendou apyokei, hoba hao phai sembei.
Hao sangnyu chenei kijinei nyetche imei shenan müt cheei hao hapbei. Haoei Jisu thedanga the khüman khüpetkei hoba sukojako laukei, “Yaangbou, nyi maang angsije nyi ngo saüenkula thükkei.”
Jisuei hao ik shingan hao to meitiko laukei, “Ngei maangangda; no saüenashi.” Kheijineitham imei hao apyokei.
Jisuei hao la ngühkhüm kuko laukei, “Aolakei telen, lausikei hauashi hoba no lolo ungshedbou la lenashi, hoba haoen to aukabü shanga Mosaei sakkubü tegü no saüenkubü shanga lemashi.”
Lausikei hao shangabü ngühlang aei aei phinthonko haukei, hoba noknyüh yaang hao ngüh ditla hoba haoeneibü shat maila shanga takshatkei;
lausikei hao sangliphang to satkei hoba welaukei.
Nyetche haoei lenko kikei. Galil, Judea hoba Jerusalem ka loubü Farisi hoba Ngühkhüm lenbou shuongkei khünei setan kikei; hoba maitilabü shanga Bunyubou sei hao yoa kikei.
Kheijinei mütshuongei tuokshatei shatbü müt che shena lengbakei hoba hao Jisu thedanga lengan phokula haujembei.
Mütshang hangjong haoenei atla athüksije haoen chemdak to nguikei, hoba laangkhüh khünyet danko haoeibü shen yoa jenyu to Jisu thedang to hao tonyantikei.
Haoeneibü mailem hapan haoei hao to laukei, “Thangbou, ka shabü apbua.”
Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong si Farisibü shuongei damngeilangko laukei, “Mühghaü nyikuko laubü müt kho ao? Mühghaü to liman aoei shabü apbula thükkei?”
Jisuei haoeneibü maangpona wetyobü ngekei hoba jongaikei, “Kanei aila kaneibü maangpona dameida?
‘Ka shabü apbua’ laubü sokei si, ayingsi, ‘Pienashi hoba paiashi’, dogo laubü sokei?
Lausikei kaodaka Müteibü Shou la shabü apbula hau kia dogo ngei kan la lenlabü.” Hobaje haoei tuokshatei shatbü to laukei, “Ngei lenkho ditashi: pienashi, kaibü shen peashi hoba chem to ngaiashi.”
Hao haoen thedanga phühde pienkei, hoba ainei hao yepbei kho haubakei, hoba Mühghaü la soneikangbü kuko chem to ngaikei.
Hobaje haoen pendou maangpangkei, hoba Mühghaü la soneikangbü kukei, hoba haoenei aeibou hatko laukei, “Tat senei maangpanglabü hapa.”
Kho phaia hao satkei hoba haoei Levi nyenbü khüm hebou che heshang chema setan hapbei, hoba haoei hao to laukei, “Küphai semashi.”
Haoei pendou apyoan loenkei hoba hao phai sembei.
Hobaje Jisu shanga Leviei hao chema lem yaang huiletkei, hoba khonei khüm hebü shuong mütshang yaang hoba lubü shuong dogo haoen yoa nyak shaushanga setan kikei.
Farisi hoba haoeneibü Ngühkhüm lenbou shuongei hao eikshuong khulimbo nyamnyambo laukei, “Aila kanei khüm hebü si shabü shuong yoa shaudayungda?”
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Maisho kibü shuong shanga ayingko shatbü shuong shanga daktar khamda.
Saopobü shuong ayingko shabü shuong maangpon sepeibü to ngala ngo loukei.”
Müt atei hao to laukei, “Johaneibü eikshuong hoba Farisi shuongei hanghangleko nyengko welauda: lausikei ka eikshuongei shauda yungda.”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Kanei chemkanbou haoen yoa kian chemkanbou thangbou shuong mühei nyengtila thükkei sai?
Lausikei chemkanbou haoen yo ka ngailanglabü, kheijinei haoenei mühei nyenglabü.”
Haoei haoen la ngühphatbü che lenkei: “Aoeikei nei haanbü ka jitan nei hangbüa athipda; khei kümsije khoei nei haanbü ka jitan sungbü kho hangbü to abaulabü.
Hobaje aoeikei ih haanbü phekhon shongmok hangbüa atakda; khei kümsije ih khoei phekhon shongmok kho thalabü. Hobaje kho saangkhümlabü, hoba phekhonkei leilulabü.
Lausikei ih haanbü kho phekhon shongmok haansangmai to jinjan.
Hobaje aoeikei ih hangbü yungan phaiaje haanbü amangsühda aishanga haoei lauda, ‘Hangbü kho ong maibou.’ ”
Nounyet hao whetlaak danko paiko kiteikei, hoba haoeibü eikshuongei youman yetan sungan ika nyuian shauko hapbei.
Farisibü atei laukei, “Aila kanei ngühkhüm lulimbo Nounyet leilutida?”
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Dawid hoba hao you jambü shuong mühei haijinei haoei ai kümbei kanei ladangkei aweou lo?
Hao Mühghaü chem to atkei, hoba Mühghaü thedanga phobü Wentek, laobou ungshedbou to liman lubüei shaujan aying, kho haoei sungkei hoba shaukei, hoba hao youjambü shuong la kukei.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Müteibü Shou kho Nounyet Bunyubou ki.”
Lubü Nounyet hao sinagog to atkei hoba khünei lenko kikei. Khünei mae ik sibü müt che kiteikei.
Hobaje Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong si Farisi shuongei haoei Nounyet maitikuasaoje dogo, hao attila shanga aukabü lambo Jisu to chühko kiteikei.
Lausikei haoei haoeneibü dambü ngeenkei hoba iksibü müt khüto laukei, “Pienashi hoba jenyua loashi.” Hao pienkei hoba khünei lokei.
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Ngei kan to pheda, Nounyet maibü kümla si amaibü kümla sakkuda? Langkei püetla si kho haitila sakkuda?”
Haoei haoen pendou to chühkei hoba müt khüto laukei, “Kaibü ik shingashi.” Haoei khei kümbei hoba haoeibü ik maian apbei.
Lausikei haoen aeibou khauangkei hoba haoenei Jisu to ai kümsi maila dogo sangkukei.
Khübü chaloua hao welaula shongh to angkei, hoba haoei langyang sünga Mühghaü to welauko dantikei.
Ladang langngekei haoei hao eikshuong hao jungto ngakei, hoba haoen yoa haoei anthüknyi pienan haoen to Youkoikjai shuong dogo ngakei:
Simon, ao to Peter laukei, hoba haona Andria, Jakob si Johan, Filip si Bartholomia,
Mathi si Thoma, Alfia shou Jakob, Zealot nyenbü Simon,
Jakob shou Judas hoba Judas Iskhariot, ao huonbou yeikei.
Jisu haoen yoa yankei hoba yo chenei lokei. Hobaje hao eikshuong mütshang yaang, Judea kaodak hoba Jerusalem pendou aeka hoba Tair si Sidon yungko ka noknyüh yaang,
hao ngüh ditla hoba haoen shat maila shanga loukei; hoba aoyou shabü souei khonsakko kikei haoen maitikei.
Noknyüh pendouei hao to meitila lameikei, aishanga hao ka sei longko hoba pendou maitiko kikei.
Haoei hao eikshuong to chühangtikei hoba laukei,
“Kan shalebü olinbou;
aishanga Mühghaü sangle kaneibü.
Kan tou mühei haiko kibü shuong olinbou;
aishanga kan senyüh shemlabü.
Kan tou haapbü shuong olinbou;
aishanga kan nyilabü.
“Ladang Müteibü Shou nyen laüa mütei kan mangsenlaje, hoba ladang haoenei haoen yoka kan kuktilaje, hoba kaneibü nyen amaibü laueiko aplaje, kan olinbou.
Khünyet maang haiashi, hoba olinbüei saiyashi; aishanga khuthüka kaneibü jongsak yaangbü ki. Haoeneibü pisibou shuongei thuseibü shuong to kheinyu jungeikei.
‘Lausikei kan keibü shuong ügütü;
aishanga kanei kaneibü olinbü lekhüma.’
‘Kan tou photetnyu kibü shuong ügütü;
aishanga kan mühei hailabü.’
‘Kan tou nyibü shuong ügütü;
aishanga kanei manghaaplabü hoba haaplabü.’
“Ladang müt pendouei kan shangabü ngüh maibü laulaje ügütü. Aishanga haoen pisibouei amlangbü thuseibü shuong to khei jungeikei.
“Ngei kan kü ngüh ditbü shuong to lenda: Kaneibü dangbou to sanouashi, kan mangsenbü shuong to maibü jungeiashi,
kan to khükbüokbü shuong haükuashi, kan amaiko jungeibü shuong shanga welaukuashi.
Atei kaneibü om to ipalonga hao la ji ae khokei sepeikuashi, hoba kaibü nei sungbou ka mang- yukkei tesenet.
Kaka hibü pendou la kuashi, hoba kaibü peisilei langbou ka tehingai.
Mütshuongei kan to lai jungeitimang sühda kho tegü kanei haoen to jungeiashi.
Kanei kan to sanoubü shuong to ong sanoua longa kanei ai nyensang hapla? Shabü mütshuongeikei haoen to sanoubü shuong to ong sanoungaida.
“Hobaje kan to maibü dan to kanei maibü küma longa kanei ai nyensang hapla? Shabü shuongeikei khei kümda.
Hobaje shemenlabü dogo dambü la kanei lotkua longa kanei ai nyensang hapla? Haoenei khüjoche hapmailabü shanga shabü shuongeikei shabü shuong la lotkuda.

Lausikei kaneibü dangbou sanouashi, haoen to maibü kümashi, hoba aikei hapmaila adambo lotkuashi; hoba kaneibü pailetbü yaang kilabü, hoba kan Thükkabou Mühghaü shousi shuong yeilabü aieilausi nyensang akubü hoba amaibü to haoei üeisanou ki.
Kaneibü Bou ailai üeisanou ki kho tegü üeisanou kishi.
“Mümat tejem, hoba kan matkei ajemlabü. Kanei mü tüatti, hoba kankei üattilabü. Ap kuashi hoba kanlakei ap kulabü.
Kuashi, hoba lubüeikei kan la kulabü; haoenei kan la shangko, hokeiko, hoba sopbojaiko kulabü; aishanga nyi mü shanga jungeibü takletbü khonei kala haungaikulabü.”
Haoei haoen la ngühphatbü che lenkei: “Nyekthubü cheei lubü nyekthubü leila thükkei lo? Ham püngkhün to üatetlep lo?
Eik che kho haoeibü lenbou thüka aying; lausikei ladang eik weko penbüsoubü yeilaje, jembü lenbou tegü kilabü.
“Aila nyi jembü nyek kabü inphou shangabü adamenko, kaibü jaisina nyeka thamngu nepbü to chühkuda?
Ayingsi nyi kaibü jembü nyek kabü inphou kho üpbo kaibü jaisina to, ‘Jaisina, ngei ka nyek ka tham kho apbukho’ dogo lai laula thükkei?
“Hibüyoubü, nyi jembü nyek ka shaang inphou kho apashi hoba kheijinei ong nyi kaibü jaisina nyeka kibü thamngu kho apbula nyi shangashatko haplabü.
“Bunyu maibüei buhek amaibü ehekkuda; ayingsi bunyu amaibüei buhek maibü ehekkuda.
Bunyu weko hekei shenda; aishanga mütei jaklong ka bhuk akheida, ayingsi haoenei biham ka semlühhek akheida.

Müt maibüei jembü maangpona maibü thanan phobü ka maibü sungenda, hoba müt amaibüei jembü maangpona amaibü thanan kibü ka amaibü sungenda. Aishanga aiei maangpon shenetnyu ki kho jembü sembungei lauda.
“Aila kanei kü to, ‘Bunyubou, Bunyubou’ dogoje ngada hoba ngei lenbü akümda?
Aoyou kü jungto louda hoba kü ngüh ditda hoba khübü jungeida, hao ao phatkei kho ngei kan la lenlabü.
Hao laang thüka haüko jakan chem huongbü müt che phatkei. Ladang yungsen loukoukei, kho deiei chem to thangyolangkei, lausikei anyaakei aieilausi kho aeibou maian dangkei.

Lausikei aoei ditda hoba ajungeida, hao huongshang ajakenko kaomaia chemdangbü müt che phatkei. Kho chem to yungsenei thangkei, hoba khoyam nopthetko tuongkei, hoba kho chem lusakbü kho yaang kiteikei.”
Mütshuongei ditko haoei habü pendou laukhüman phaia hao Kapernaum to atkei.
Saongao thükkabouei maangshikbü sambü che kikei; hao shatko kikei hoba hailabü lele kikei.
Saongao thükkabouei Jisu shangabü ditkei hoba Jihudabü jaishou shuong hao jungto hautiko, haoeibü sambü püetkula loushi dogo sukeijakei.
Haoen Jisu jungto loukei hoba hao to aeibou sukojako laukei, “Hao shanga ho kümsilei nyi kümla muakei;
haoei kün mütli sanouda hoba kün la sinagogkei haoei dangkukei.”

Jisu haoen yoa meimeijung haukei. Hao chem ka lalok ohauko kijinei saongao thükkabouei thangbou shuong hautiko laukei, “Yaangbou, no ailakei khon tesak, aishanga no kü chemsophang to lotla ngei amukei.
Khoei ngo ka jungto loula ongkei amukei dogo ngei dambei; lausikei ngüh kho ong lenshi hoba kü sambü mailabü.

Aishanga ngokei kü phanga sepai phoan songdak hau phanga kibü müt che ki. Ngei che to, ‘Khou’, dogo lauda hoba hao hauda; hoba lubü che to, ‘Kaiya’, dogo lauda hoba hao louda; hoba kü sambü to, ‘Ho kümashi’, lauda hoba haoei kho kümda.”
Ladang Jisuei kho ditkei, hao hao to maangpangkei. Haoei hao phai sembo kibü noknyüh ae sepeikei hoba laukei, “Ngei kan to lenda, Israela mangkei ho tegü mailem yaangbü ngei ühüpou.”
Ladang hautibü shuong chemto ngaikei haoenei sambü kho maian hapbei.
Kho phaia hao Nain nyenbü sangnyu che to haukei, hoba hao eikshuong si mütshang yaangbü che hao yoa haukei.
Hao sangnyu bakou lousühbüsi, haibü müt che lengbakei; hao kho latnyu cheeibü jayangshou kiteikei. Hobaje sangnyu ka mütshang yaang sao yoa kikei.
Ladang Jisuei sao hapbei haoei sao to sanouko chühkei, hoba sao to laukei, “Tühaap.”
Hao thedang ae haukei hoba mang lengshang to meitikei, hoba pebü shuong atopeiko lokei. Haoei laukei, “Heshoubou, ngei kato lenda, pienashi.”
Haibou kho lokei hoba joyola khangkei; hoba Jisuei haonyu la kukei.
Müt pendou hatbüei shenkei hoba Mühghaü la nyensang kuko laukei, “Sen yoa thuseibü yaangbü che longakei, hoba Mühghaüei hao mütshuong pean chühda.”
Hao shangabü ngühlang kho Judea khümbo hoba kaijembo kibü kaonyek pendou to aakei.
Johaneibü eikshuongei hao la khübü pendou shangabü lenkei; hoba Johanei haoeibü eik nyi ngakei
hoba haosi Jisu jungto, “Loula kibou kho no si ayingsi künei lubü che shanga haiteila?” dogo phela hautikei.
Mütshuong hao jungto loukei hoba laukei, “Johan Baptibouei kün ka jungto, ‘Loula kibou kho no si, ayingsi künei lubü che shanga haiteila?’ dogo phela hautikei.”
Kho jihsiphaia haoei shat phang phanga shatbü nyatbü hoba shabü souei shatbü juongnyu maitikei, hoba haoei nyekthubü juongnyu haptikukei.

Haoei mütshuong to laukei, “Ngaiashi hoba kanei ai hapbei hoba ditkei kho Johan la lenashi: nyekthubü shuongei hapda, sokebü paida, imbü shuong saüenda, obangbüei ditda, haibü shuong langngaitida hoba shalebü shuong to Ngühlang Maibü songlenda;
hoba ao kü hangshong aphaiyetda haoei haükei.”
Ladang Johaneibü ngühlang künbü shuong ngaikei, Jisuei noknyüh to hao shangabü laukei, “Ai to chühla kan yam to haukei? Yeiei thakdu soueibü chühla si?
Lausikei kan aito chühla haukei? Inyaibü neisimei lebü müt che to chühla sai? Aoyou lailaibü neisimei leda hoba apsilebü langkeia haangda haoen choba chema ki.
Lausikei kan ai chühla haukei? Thuseibü che sai? Haü, ngei kan to lenda, thuseibü che to khaibou,
Laishibaei lenbü ho hao shangabü ki:
‘Chühashi, ngeibü ngühlang künbou,
aoei ka thedanga ka lamnyu lamlelabü,
hao ka thedangto ngei hautida.’
“Ngei kan la lenda, yaksaei bukbü yoa Johan to yaangbou aki; lausikei Mühghaü Sanglea hanbou kho hao to yaangbou ki.”
(Ladang haoenei kho ditkei, khüm hebü shuong yoan müt pendouei Mühghaü la nyensang kukei, aishanga haoen Johan Baptibouei baptikukei.
Lausikei haoei abaptikubü Farisi shuong si Ngühkhüm lenbou shuongeije haoen shangabü Mühghaü lamthen asunglet.)
“Khülonga, aito ngei ho meten mütshuong takteila? Haoen ai phatkei?
Haoen namyakshanga cheei che to ngako,
‘Künei chia teibü lauko kan la pithung metkukei, hoba kanei atom;
künei manghaap chia laukei,
hoba kanei ühaap.’
dogo lauko setbü nashousi shuong phatkei.
Aishanga Johan Baptibou wentek ashauko hoba ih ayungko loukei hoba kanei, ‘Hao to shabü soushou kia’ dogo lauda.
Müteibü Shou shauko yungko loukei hoba kanei, ‘Chühashi, shaumang yungmang müt, ih yungbou, khüm hebou si shabü shuongeibü thangbou’, dogo lauda.
Lausikei songsihon kho saoeibü shousi shuongei aukabü kuenda.”
Farisibü müt cheei hao yoa shaulayungla hao huikei; hoba hao Farisibou chem to atkei hoba setkei.
Kho sangnyua shabü langkeia kibü yaksa che kiteikei. Saoei hao Farisibü chema shaushang yungshanga setakei dogo ngekei hoba saoei ponlem onang ninulaang thungdou che sungbakei.
Sao hao phainei haapbo lokei, hoba saoeibü nyeksiei haoeibü you nemla khangkei. Saoei saoeibü khulouei kho haman apbukei, hoba you to shepbo, ponlem onang naangkukei.
Ladang hao leiyetbou Farisibouei kho hapbei, haoei hao lolo laukei, “Ho müt thuseibü che tegüje hao to meitinyu kho ao hoba ailaibü sao haoei ngelabü. Sao shabü sao dogo haoei ngejan.”
Jisuei hao to jongaikei, “Simon, ngei ka to aiche lenlabü kia.” Haoei laukei, “Lenbü, Lenbou.”
“Lotkubou müt che la sangh thebou müt nyi kikei. Cheei nam saongao hoba cheei anjinsem thean kikei.
“Ladang haosiei shemla ai akitei, haoei haosi ham la sangh kho apbukei. Haosi yoa aoei hao to aei sanoula?”
Simonei jongaikei, “Sangh juongbou thebouei, dogo ngei damda.” Jisuei hao to laukei, “Kho tükde!”
Yaksanyu aei sepeian haoei Simon to laukei, “Nyi kho yaksa hapdalao? Ngo ka chem to lotkei. Nyi kü you shanga dei aku; lausikei saoeibü nyeksiei kü you nemtikei hoba saoeibü khulouei haman apbukei.
Nyi kü sembung to ashep; lausikei saoeije ngo lotsilengko küyou shepbü athak.
Nyi kü khua onang anaangku; lausikei saoei kü youa ponlem naangkukei.
Khoei ngei ka to lauda, sao shabü juongnyu kiasikei apbuda, hoba ho saoeibü sanou yaangbou aukabü ki. Lausikei ao la hansho ong amai apbuda haoei hansho ong sanouda.”
Hobaje Jisuei sao to laukei, “Ka shabü apbuda.”
Hao yoa shaushanga setan kibü shuongei haoen lolo laungaikei, “Shabü to liko apbulabü müt kho ao?”
Haoei yaksanyu to laukei, “Kaibü mailemei no khümena. Haksoa ngaiashi.”
Kho phaia Jisu sangnyu hoba sang shuong to hauko Mühghaü Sangle Ngühlang Maibü phinthonko songlenkei. Anthüknyi kho hao yoa haukei,
hoba tokei yaksa shuong aoyou ka shabü sou shian sattia hoba shat maitikua, haoenkei yoan kiteikei. Khübü kho Magdalin nyenbü Mari, ao ka shabü sou nyet satkei;
Herod chema thükkabou sambou Khuza yak Joanna, Sussana hoba lubü juongnyu yoan kikei. Khübü sao shuongei haoen ik ka longbüei ong Jisu hoba hao eikshuong pangteikei.
Ladang mütshuong yaang takshatkei hoba sangnyu juong ka mütshuong hao jungto yangkei, haoei haoen to ngühphatbüei laukei,
