“Youli saakbü che haoeibü sek to youli saakla koukei. Haoei saakjinei youli at lamkhonga shatkei hoba youei nakmaukei hoba mühkabü aushuongei hekhümbei.
Youli at laangnyina shatkei, hoba ladang kho yembei yuian apbei aieilausi khünei nindei atakkei.
Lubü youli jaklaaka shatkei, hoba jakham chingkei hoba naülepbei.
Youli at kaomaia shatkei hoba yembei, hoba saongao onko lang hekkei.” Haoei kho laukhüman phaia ngekkei, “Ao nou yembei, haoei ditashi.”
Hao eikshuongei kho ngühphatbü tetlabü ai dogo hao to phekei.
Haoei laukei, “Mühghaü Sangle huphang ngüh ngela kan la kuakei, lausikei lubü shuong toje haoenei chühkokei aditenlabü lele ngei haoen to ngühphatbüa lauda.
“Ngühphatbü tetlabü ho: Youli kho Mühghaü ngühlang.
Lamkhonga atbü kho ngüh ditbü shuong. Haoen mai alemtila hoba akhümentila shanga shabü mühghaü louan haoeneibü maang- pon ka ngüh kho langkuda.
Laangnyina atbü youli tetlabü kho haoenei ladang ditda, olinbüei ngüh kho sungletda, lausikei haoen to li üatkei; hibü haoenei longche mailemda, hoba takteibü jihsiphaia haoen atetda.
Jaklaaka atbü youli tetlabü kho, haoenei ngüh kho ditkei, lausikei haoen haujinei, maangmau hoba nyaksinam hoba ho kaodak olinbüei naülepda, hoba lang ehekda.
Kaomaia shatbü youli maibü tetlabü kho, müt maibü hoba lanbü shuongei ngüh kho ditkei, haoenei maangpona kaangkhühtham sungletkei hoba youman asung shongko natenda.
“Aoeikei wanthung sapan kam maanga aküplepda, ayingsi shenphanga aphoda. Lausikei chem to lotbü shuongei ngesakbü haplabü lele haoei kho wanthung anshanga phoda.
Aishanga akhuokenlabü lele aikei huan aki hoba angelabü hoba tang akhitlabü lele aikei aki.
Hibü kanei ai ditdaje maangkuashi; aishanga aoei ki hao la kuyolabü, hoba aoei aki, haoei ai ki dogo damda, khokei hao ka langlabü.”
Haonyu si haonasi shuong hao jungto loukei, lausikei mütshang yaangbü ka hao nyangko ohauen.
Hao to, “Kanyu si kanasi shuong tanga loakei, hoba haoenei no haüyomang sühda”, dogo laukei.
Haoei haoen to jongaikei, “Aoyouei Mühghaü ngühlang ditda hoba khübü jungeida kho künyu hoba künasi shuong.”
Nyetche hao hoba hao eikshuong long che to atkei, hoba haoei haoen to laukei, “Senei thim kho khatko thi aedang to haukho.” Hibü haoen meimeijung likei.
Haoen haujinei hao nyeket shikei. Hobaje thim khonei yeinak lotkei, hoba haoeneibü long deiei shenda yingsije haoen thusheda kikei.
Haoen louan hao kangan pitikei hoba laukei, “Lenbou, Lenbou, sen nyemda.” Hao pikei hoba yei si deishou to hakkei. Kheijinei yeinak thakkei, hoba jemetshouko kikei.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Kaneibü mailem lan ki?” Haoen hatkei hoba maang- pangkei, hoba haoen si haoen lauyokei, “Ho ao? Haoei yei si dei la mangkei ngühkhüm kuda, hoba haoenei hao ngüha leda.”
Haoen Galil tangküng aenei kibü Gerasa kaonyek sühlangkei.
Hao kao to lotjinei kho sangnyu kabü müt che louan hao to haüyokei. Hao to shabü sou shuong kikei hoba halokche haoei neisimei aleko kikei; hoba hao chema akiko heelaaka yepbo paikei.
Ladang haoei Jisu hapbei, haoei ngekkei, hoba hao thedanga khüpetkei hoba ngüh yaangbüei hao to laukei, “Thükkabou Mühghaü Shou, Jisu, nyi aila ngo peksekda? Ngo ashiakoela ngei kato sudajada.”

Aishanga Jisuei shabü soushou kho hao ka longan apla shanga ngühkhüm kukei. Hanghangko hao lapbei hoba hao yangmen hoba thüngdang namei khühan lombü phangakei phoko lekei; lausikei haoei phenbü kho thettikei hoba shabü soushouei hao yam to shian koutiko kikei.
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Ka nyen ai?” Haoei laukei, “Juongnyu”, aieilausi shabü sou juongnyu hao to atan kikei.
Haoenei hao to haoen thonshang akibü püngkhün to tohautikai dogo sukeijakei.
Khünei shongha ukshuong lamshauko kiteikei; hoba shabü sou shuongei haoen khüto atla ngühkhüm kubü dogo hao to sukeijakei. Hobaje haoei sakkukei.
Shabü sou shuong uk shuong to atkei, hoba uk shuong laanglip to nyuyoko koulangan thima shemetkei.
Ladang lombou shuongei kho hapbei haoen satyokei hoba sangnyu si kaonyeka kho phinthonkei.
Hobaje ai haüthükkei khüto chühla mütshuong yangbakei. Haoen Jisu jungto loukei, hoba shabü sou shuong longan apbou müt kho neisimei lean Jisu junga setan hapbei, hoba haoen hatyokei.
Hobaje kho hapbü shuongei shabü souei lapbü müt lai khümenkei, kho haoen la lenkei.
Gerasin kaon- yek kaijembo kibü müt pendouei haoen apyoan satla hao to sukeijakei, aishanga haoen aeibou hatenan apbei. Hibü haoen long to atkei hoba ngaikei.
Shabü sou longan apbou müt khoei hao yoa kila sukeijakei, lausikei haoei hao to,
“Kan chem to ngaiashi, hoba Mühghaüei ka shanga ai kümbeije kho lenashi”, dogo lauko ngaitikei. Hibü hao ngaikei hoba sangnyu pendoua Jisuei hao shanga ai kümbei kho phinthonkei.
Jisu longeijinei noknyühei olinko sungletkei, aishanga haoen pendouei hao chüheiko kikei.
Sinagoga setshangbou, Jairas nyenan müt che loukei. Hao Jisueibü youa khüpetkei hoba hao to hao chemto loula sukeijakei,
aieilausi haoei nouyangshou che ong po anthüknyi nashou kikei, hoba sao haiko kikei.
Hao haujinei noknyühei hao omlepbei.
Hobaje yaksa che po anthüknyi sii koubüei shatko kikei, hoba saoei daktar shuong shanga saoei kibü pendou meisikei, aoeikei sao amaitien.
Sao phaito loukei hoba haoeibü neiyik to meitikei, hoba khoyam sao sii koubü thakkei.
Jisuei laukei, “Aoei kü to meitikei?” Aoeikei atheku, hoba Peterei laukei, “Lenbou, noknyühei no kailepan thungda.”
Lausikei Jisuei laukei, “Atei kü to meitia; aishanga kü ka sei longa dogo ngei ngekei.”
Ladang saoei uhuenlabü dogo ngekei, sao lühjilühko louan hao thedanga khüpetkei. Müt pendou thedanga saoei hao to aila meitikei kho wanan lenkei, hoba sao khoyam maian apbü shangabü khokan lenkei.
Haoei sao to laukei, “Nashounyu, kaibü mailemei no maia. Haksoa ngaiashi.”
Haoei lauko kijinei sinagog bunyu chem ka müt at louan laukei, “Kashou nouyangshou haia. Lenbou kip tejimti.”
Jisuei kho ditkei hoba hao to laukei, “Tehüt. Maiong lemashi, hoba sao maian aplabü.”
Ladang hao chem to loukei haoei Peter, Johan, Jakob hoba naeibü nyusibou to liman aokei hao yoa atla asakku.
Müt pendou sao shanga manghaapbü ka haoeneibü khuku to jangngailangko haapyoko shaian kikei.
Haoei laukei, “Tühaap. Sao ühaikei; sao yepbei.”
Sao haia dogo ngebü ka haoenei hao la nyikukei.
Haoei saoeibü ika jenan ngekko laukei, “Nashounyu, pienashi.”
Saoeibü soushou longeikei hoba sao khoyam pienkei. Sao la denche okashi dogo haoei sakkukei.
Saoeibü nyusibou maangpangkei, lausikei haüthükbü kho aola alenla shanga haoei sakkukei.
Jisuei Anthüknyi kho chela ngashaikei hoba haoen la shabü sou pendou shian sattilabü si shatbü maitilabü sei si hau kukei;
hoba haoei haoen Mühghaü Sangle phinthonla si shatbü maitila hautikei.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Wakou shanga, ju ayingsi neikong, ayingsi wentek, ayingsi nam, ayingsi mangyuk nyibang aikei tekün.
Kan ao chem to ong atlaje, kanei apyoan asatshongko khünei thüngashi.
Hobaje laju- cheei kan asungletlaje, ladang kho sangnyu ka kan bangda, haoen khulimbo kaneibü you ka thamngu kangan apashi.”
Haoen bangkei hoba sang che ka sang che to shonko Ngühlang Maibü songlenko hoba haushang pendoua shatsinyat maitikuko haukei.
Herod tetrarkei ho kümbü pendou shangabü ditkei. Hao aeibou maanga shukei, aieilausi Johan haibü ka langngaia dogo atei lauko kikei,
atei Elija longakei dogo, hoba atei shangiedbü thuseibü yo ka che longeiakei dogo lauyoko kikei.
Herodei laukei, “Ngei Johan khu thetkei; lausikei ao shangabü ngei hainyu ditda?” Hobaje hao to chühla haoei haujembei.
Youkoikjai shuong kho longeikei hoba haoenei kümbüleibü pendou Jisu la lenkei. Haoei haoen kokshoua Bethsaida nyenbü sangnyu che to leilangkei,
lausikei noknyühei lapenan hao phai sembei. Haoei haoen sungletkei hoba Mühghaü Sangle shangabü lenkei, hoba aoyou maitilabü khaman kikei haoen dan maitikukei.

Chasemlamto Anthüknyi kho loukei hoba hao to laukei, “Kaijembo kibü sangnyu si sangshuong to hauan sühshang si shausiyung hapenlabü lele noknyüh kho lintian apashi, aieilausi sen hanei sangliphang kaoen chenei kia.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Kanei bouje haoen la denche okashi.” Haoenei laukei, “Künei wentek ngao hoba ngau penyi to liman aki. Kün hauan habü mütshuong pendou shanga shausiyung jekla sai?”
Aishanga haoen müt hajar ngao thüng kiteikei. Haoei hao eikshuong to laukei, “Haoen anjinsem bang san sana settiashi.”
Haoenei khei kümbei hoba haoen pendou setkhümbei.
Haoei wentek ngao hoba ngau penyi kho jungan khuthük to chühangtian phaia haükukei hoba shaknyinkei; hoba haoei noknyüh junga phokula shanga hao eikshuong la kukei.
Haoen pendouei photko shaukei. Netshou heshaikei hoba khoei kam anthüknyi shenkei.
Jisu sanshoua welaujinei eikshuongkei hao yoa kiteikei, hoba haoei haoen to laukei, “Noknyühei ngo ao dogo lauda?”
Haoenei jongaikei, “Johan Baptibou; atei lauda, Elija, hoba ateije shangiedbü thuseibü che longeikei dogo lauda.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Lausikei kanei ngo ao dogo lauda?” Peterei jongaikei, “Mühghaüeibü Khrista.”
Haoei kho aola alenla shanga haoen la kaangko ngühkhüm kukei,
hoba laukei, “Müteibü Shou aeibou khonkujan, hoba jaishou shuong si yaangenbü shuong si ungshedbou si Ngühkhüm lenbou shuongei inletlabü, hoba haitilabü hoba sembounyet langngailabü.”
Haoei mütpem weko to laukei, “Müt atei kü phai loumang sühalonga, haoei jembü lolo thepetashi, chaangboua haoeibü peisei peashi hoba kü phai semashi.
Aishanga müt cheei hao langkei püetmang sühalonga haoei kho maulabü; lausikei müt cheei kü nyen shanga hao langkei mausije haoei kho püetlabü.
Aishanga müt cheei kaodak khümbo pailetan phaia jembü langkei mautojana longa ai ku pailetla?
Aishanga aoei ngo hoba kü nyen shangabü the alenenlaje, Müteibü Shou jembü soneikangbü, Boueibü soneikangbü hoba saopobü khuthük hangangbü soneikangbüa loujinei hao shangabü the alenenlabü.
Ngei kan to ngühmaia lenda, hanei loan kibü yoa atei Mühghaü Sangle ühüpshongko haibü jepan achühlabü.”
Khübü ngüh lauan chalou set thüng danan phaia haoei Peter, Johan hoba Jakob leikei hoba shongh to welaula angkei.
Hao welaujinei hao the chühla son phangche yeikei hoba haoeibü neisimei thuphaitham hoba lailaitham yeikei.
Hobaje chühashi, müt nyi, Mosa si Elija hao to joyoko kikei.
Haoen soneikangbüa longkei hoba hao bangbü danko Jerusalema Mühghaü lamthen loushadla kibü shangabü joyokei.
Peter hoba hao yoa kibü shuong aeibou ngak longkei, lausikei haoen ladang pienkei haoeneibü soneikangbü si hao yoa loan kibü müt nyi kho hapbei.

Mosa si Elijaei Jisu apyoan satjinei Peterei hao to laukei, “Lenbou, sen hanei kila aeibou maikei! Senei hanei dip sem, ka shanga che, Mosa shanga che, hoba Elija shanga che, dogo lekho.” Haoei ai laukeije haoei ange.
Haoei kho lautoua sangmei che lotan haoen khuilepbei; hoba haoen sangmei maangto atjinei haoen hatkei.
Sangmei ka ngüh che longko laukei, “Ho ngei pienbü Shou; hao to ditashi.”
Ladang sangmeiei ngüh joyokhümbei, Jisu mütpem hapbei. Haoenei ngüh üang hoba haoenei ai hapbei aotokei khübü chaloua alen.
Nyibounyet, ladang haoen shongh ka louyenkei, mütshang yaangbü cheei hao to haüyokei.
Noknyüh yo ka müt cheei ngekkei, “Lenbou, kü shou to chühkai, aishanga hao ngeibü jayangshou ki,
hoba shabü soushou cheei hao lapda hoba mangde ngekda; aishanga hoei hao semsem toptida hoba sembung ka uokjok ongtida; shayangleko longyoan ong haoei hao apyoda, hoba haoei hao la mo letida.
Ngei ka eikshuong to shian sattikula sukeijakei, lausikei haoenei athük.”
Jisuei jongaikei, “Kan maialembü hoba khüpeinyu paibü meten! Ngo kan yoa lalok kila hoba kan to lalokche natenla?” Kheijinei haoei müt khüto laukei, “Kashou hato leiba.”
Hao louko kian shabü souei hao phetettikei hoba toptikei. Lausikei Jisuei shabü sou hakeiko nashoubou kho maitikei hoba haobou la kungaikei.
Haoen pendou Mühghaü yaangenbü hau hapan maangpangkei.
Haoei kümbü pendou shangabü müt pendou maangpangyoko kijinei hao eikshuong to laukei,
“Habü ngüh nouanepbo ditashi; ho kan shanga ki: Müteibü Shou mütshuongeibü ikmang to khümbo kuan aplabü.”
Haoenei laubü ho aditen, hoba haoenei kho ngühtet ashuoklabü lele haoen ka huan kikei; hoba ho shangabü hao to phela haoen hatko kikei.
Ao yaangbou dogo haoen yoa ngüh wetyo khangkei.
Jisuei haoen maangphanga wetyobü ngekei, hoba haoei nashou che leibaan hao junga lotikei.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Aoei kü nyena ho nashou sungletlaje haoei ngo sungletda; hoba aoei ngo sungletda haoei ngo hangangbou sungletda; aishanga kan yoa hanbou kho pendou to yaangbou ki.”
Johanei jongaikei, “Lenbou, müt atei ka nyena shabü sou shian sattiko künei hapbei, hoba künei hao shiletla haujembei, aieilausi hao kün yoa ka phai asemda.”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Hao thangetla hau tejem; ao kan khulimbo aying hao kan shanga ki.”
Ladang hao khuthük to anlanglabü jihsiphai sühkei, haoei maangnyu angko Jerusalem ae haula meimeikei,
hoba haoei hao thedangto ngühlang künbü shuong hautikei. Haoen haukei hoba hao shanga lamlela Samariabü sang che to atkei;
lausikei haoenei hao asunglet aieilausi hao Jerusalem ae hauko kikei.
Ladang eikshuong Jakob si Johanei kho hapbei, haosiei laukei, “Bunyubou, haoen lonan aptila künei khuthük ka wan lotla sakkula nyi maang angdalao?”
Jisuei chühngaian haoen to hakkei (hoba laukei, “Kan ai soushoueibü yingkeije kanei angekei,
aishanga Müteibü Shou mütshuongeibü langkei shemtila shanga aying lausikei haoen püetla loukei!”) Hobaje hao lubü sang che to haukei.
Haoen lama hauko kijinei müt cheei hao to laukei, “No lae ong haulaje ngo ka phai semlabü.”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Selong shuongei laangpob ki hoba mühkabü aushuongei hap kia, lausikei Müteibü Shouje hao khu nongshang aki.”
Haoei che to laukei, “Kü phai semshi.” Lausikei haoei laukei, “Yaangbou, ngo shaang hauan kübou khünla sakkubü.”
Lausikei haoei hao to laukei, “Haibü shuongei haoen haibü khünla apyoashi, lausikei noje hauashi hoba Mühghaü Sangle ngühlang phinthonashi.”
Lubüei laukei, “Ngei ka phai semlabü, yaangbou; lausikei shaangla chema kibü shuong to bangbü salem ngüh lenla sakkubuma.”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Müt aoei hao ik sek shapshang to hatan phaiae chühngaidaje hao Mühghaü Sangle shanga amukei.”
Kho phaia Jisuei lubü anjinleito nyi pienkei hoba hao haulabü kibü sangnyu hoba kaoen weko to haoen nyibang hao thedangto hautikei.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Maimaitham sek juongnyu nyenakei lausikei eik shijo ong. Hibü haoeibü sek to eik juong koutiashi dogo kanei sek Bunyubou to welauashi.
Hauashi, ngei kan sho shuong yoto san shoushou shuong tegü hautida.
Shijimok ayingsi, neikong ayingsi nguok tekün; hoba lama aolakei salem teku.
Kan ai chem to ong atlaje, shaang, ‘Ho chema hakso kishi’, dogo lenshi.
Khünei hakso shou at kia longa, kaneibü hakso hao to baulabü; akitei longa kho kan jungto longeilabü.
Haoenei ai ong kulaje shauko yungko kho chema thüngashi, aishanga kümbouei mu hapla mukei. Chem che ka che to teshon.
Kan sangnyu che to atan mütshuongei kan sungletsije, kan thedanga ai ong tenkulaje kanei shauashi;
khünei kibü shatbü shuong maitikuashi; hoba haoen to, ‘Mühghaü Sangle kan nyangko lousüha’, dogo lenshi.
“Lausikei ai sangnyu to ong kan atlaje hoba haoenei kan asungletlaje, khükabü lamnyu to hauan,
‘Kan khulimbo künei küneibü youa kakbü kan sangnyu kabü thamngukei kangan apda, lausikei ho ngeashi, Mühghaü Sangle nyangko lousühakei’, dogo laushi.
Ngei kan la lenda Matjembü Chaloua kho sangnyu khütoje Sodom to natenla soshangbou yinglabü.

“Ka shanga ügütü, Khorazin! Ka shanga ügütü, Bethsaida! Aishanga kato kümbü seikümseilei shuong ho Sidon si Tair to kümbei laubü tegüje, haoen mütshuong neikek sean hoba tapa setan shangieda maangpon sepeian kikhoulabü.
Lausikei matjemnyet kan toje Sidon si Tair to natenla soshangbou yinglabü.
Hobaje no Kapernaum, no khuthük sühko tonenlep lo? No yemsanga sühko tonyanlabü.
Kü eikshuong, aoei kan to ditkuda, haoei küto ditkuda, hoba aoei kan asungletda haoei ngo asungletda; hoba aoei ngo asungletda haoei ngo hautibou asungletda.”
Anjinleito nyi kho olinyoko hai lauyoko longeikei, “Bunyubou, shabü souei mangkei ka nyena küneibü ngüha lekei.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Ngei Satan khuthük ka langpon tegü atbü hapbei.
Chühashi, pinyu hoba sinkip thüka, hoba dangbou sei pendou thüka nakeila ngei kan la hau kua, hoba haoei kan aineikei üaktilabü.
Lausikei shabü soushou shuongei kan to ngüha lebü shanga kan taolin; lausikei kaneibü nyen khuthüka doan kibü shanga olinashi.”

Kheijinei Soushou Saopobü danko Jisu olinbüei shenkei hoba haoei laukei, “Ngei no sangda, Abou, khuthük hoba kaodak Bunyubou, aieilausi nyi habü ho songbüdobü hoba lenenbü shuong ka huletkei, hoba nasak shuong to tang khitkei. Haü, Bunyubou, ngei no sangda, aishanga ho ka shanga maangshikbü kiteikei.
“Ajanjan pendou Bouei kü la nongkukei; Bou to liman Shou ao yingkeije aoeikei angekei; hoba Shou hoba aoyou to Shouei hao tang khittila pienda, haoen to liman Bou aoje aoeikei angekei.”
Haoei hao eikshuong ae sepeikei hoba huphanga laukei, “Kanei ai hapda kho hapbü shuong olinbou.
Ngei kan la lenda, kanei hapbü shuong thuseibü juongnyuei hoba choba shuongei hapmang sühsikei ühüp, hoba kanei ditbü shuong ditmang sühsikei aditou.”
Ngühkhüm lenbou che loenkei hoba hao huonkei. Haoei laukei, “Lenbou, ponpen langkei hapla shanga ngei ai kümjan?”
Jisuei laukei, “Ngühkhüma ai doan ki? Nyi khünei ai weda?”
Haoei jongaikei, “Ka maangpon pendouei, hoba ka soushou pendouei, hoba kaibü hau pendouei, hoba kaibü sensimaang pendouei, Bunyubou ka Mühghaü sanouashi, hoba nyi ka lepbou to jembü tegü sanouashi.”
Haoei hao to laukei, “Nyi tükde jongaia; kho kümashi hoba no lang kilabü.”
Lausikei müt che khoei janbü mangsühkei hoba Jisu to laukei, “Kü lepbou ao?”
Jongaiko Jisuei laukei, “Müt che Jerusalem ka Jerikho to yanko kikei hoba hao soshau soyungbü ikmang to atkei hoba haoenei haoeibü neisimei soan haileleko ngüman apyoan satkei.
Hobaje ungshedbou che kho lamto yanto haükei, hoba ladang haoei hao hapbei haoei lamkhong ka kokei.
Kho tegü Levibü che khüto loukei, hoba haoei ladang hao hapbei hao lamkhong ka kokei.
Lausikei Samariabü che, wakoua hao kibü kaoen to louphambei, hoba ladang haoei hao hapbei haoei aeibou sanouko dambei.
Hao hao jungto haukei hoba haoeibü moukhüna onang si ih jinkuan khühkukei; hoba haoei haoeibü gadua settikei, hoba sühshang che to leiban hao thounoukei.
Nyibounyet haoei nam penyi sungenan chemsetbou la kuko laukei, ‘Hao pangtei onouashi hoba nyi ai ong aei atlaje, ngo nyibou longeijinei ngei kala ngaingoulabü.’
Khübü müt sem yoa soshau soyungbü kühshuokbü müt to aoei lepbou tegü jungeikei dogo nyi damda?”
Haoei laukei, “Hao to üeisanou lenbouei.” Jisuei hao to laukei, “No hauashi, hoba haoei tegü kümashi.”
Haoen lama paijinei hao sang che to loukei, hoba Martha nyenbü yaksa cheei saoeibü chem to hao leiyetkei.
Saoei na che Mari nyenan kikei, saoei Bunyubou you junga setan haoei laubü to ditkei.
Lausikei Martha thungsijuokei maang noutikei. Sao loukei hoba laukei, “Bunyubou, künaei kü mütpem nongnaela apyobü ho nyi daman achühda lo? Kü to thuila sao to lenshi.”
Jisuei sao to jongaikei, “Martha, Martha, kümsilei juongnyu shangabü no maangmauda hoba khonsakda,
lausikei che ong khamda. Mariei phejan maibou piena, hoba ho sao ka aoei alanglabü.”
Haoen kaoen chenei welauko kikei, hoba ladang hao thakkei, haoeibü eik yoa cheei hao to laukei, “Bunyubou, Johanei hao eikshuong la lenbü tegü kün la welaula lenbü.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Ladang kanei welaulaje, hai laushi:
Abou, Ka nyen saopobü yingshi;
Ka Sangle kaiya;
Chaangboua kün la chale shausiyung kubü;
Hobaje kün la küneibü shabü apbu,
aishanga küneikei kün to shedbü
shonbü pendou la apbuda;
Hobaje takteibü to kün teleima.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Tetlabüei kan yoa cheei thangbou che kia hoba hao jungto metuphanga hauan lauda, ‘Jena, kü la wentek sem lotbü.
Kü thangbou che wakou ka kü junga sühakei hoba ngei hao la okla ai aki.’
Hobaje haoei chemmang ka jongaida, ‘Ngo khon tesaktikai. Kou khinngailangakei hoba kü shousi shuong shena kia; ngei kala kula shanga pienla athük.’
Ngei kan to lenda, hao hao thangbou yingbü shanga dogo hao laksepan hao la ai akusi dogokei, müt khoei ihimousapbo subüjabü ka hao lakseplabü hoba hao la hao mangsüh kulabü.
“Ngei kan to lauda: Hiashi hoba kho kan la kulabü; lamashi hoba kanei haplabü; kuokashi hoba kou kho kan la ipbulabü;
aishanga hibü wekoei hapda, aoei lamda haoei hapda, hoba kuokeibü pendou la kou kho ipbuda.
Kan yoa, hao shouei (wentek che hisi, hao la laang kulabü, ayingsi) ngau che hisi hao la ngau jeila pinyu kulabü bou ao ki?
Ayingsi haoei autei che hia longaje hao la sinkip che kulep lo?
Khei yingalonga, khuthükkabü Bouei hao to hibü shuong la Soushou Saopobü lai aei akula!”
Haoei ngoubü che ka shabü sou shian sattiko kikei. Ladang shabü sou satkei, ngoubü müt khoei joyokei, hoba noknyüh maangpangkei.
Haoen yoa atei laukei, “Shabü sou thükkabou, Beelzebul jungeiko haoei shabü sou shuong shian sattida.”
Lubü shuongei hao takteiko khuthük ka amaaphilabü che hikei.
Haoei haoeneibü dambü ngekei hoba haoen to laukei, “Jembü khulimbo janyinbü sangle pendou lusakan apda, hoba chem cheei chem che khulimbo janyina longa tuongda.
Hobaje Satanei hao khulimbo janyina longa haoeibü sangle lalokche loenla? Ngei kho lauda aieilausi ngei Beelzebulei shabü sou shian sattida dogo kanei lauda.
Ngei Beelzebulei shabü sou shuong shian sattida longa, kan mütli shuongei aoei haoen shian sattida? Hibü haoen kho kaneibü matjembü shuong yinglabü.
Lausikei ngei Mühghaü ikjishouei shabü sou shuong shian sattia longa, Mühghaü Sangle kho maimaitham kan jungto louan ki.
Ladang hau kibü mütei insiaubu lamlean hao chem lomda, kheijinei haoeibü peisilei shuong kho püetakei;
lausikei ladang hao to hau kibou müt cheei hao jungto louan thüklaje, haoeibü insiaubu penbüsoubü laonei haoei maanglembei, khübü kho haoei langkuda, hoba haoei soletbü shuong ka janda.
Müt che kü yoa akilonga hao kükhu limbo ki, hoba müt cheei ngeibü sanshuong yoshaila athui longa haoei khübü lintida.
“Ladang müt che ka shabü sou che longan apda, haksoshang lambo ulangbü danko satda. Ladang che ongkei ühüplaje khoei lauda, ‘Kü chem lao ka ngo longkei, khüto ngo sepeijung ngaikho.’
Hao longeida hoba haoei kho kuettian he maiko phoan hapda.
Kheijinei hao ngaida hoba hao to amaibü lubü soushou nyet leian atda, hoba haoen khonei kida; hoba kho müt thonbü thu kho shaangbou thu to amaibou yeida.”
Haoei kho lauko kijinei, noknyüh ka yaksa cheei ngüh longko hao to laukei, “No künbou nasetshang hoba no yopbou sen latetche olinbou!”
Lausikei haoei laukei, “Aoei Mühghaü ngüh ditda, hoba kümda, haoen olinbou, dogo laula maibou.”
Ladang noknyüh hao jungto nyuyoko kikei, haoei laukei, “Ho meten amaibü ki. Hoei amaaphilabü lamda, lausikei Jona amaaphilabü to liman ho meten la amaaphilabü ai akulabü.
Aishanga ailai Ninevibü to Jona amaaphilabü che yeikei, kho tegü Müteibü Shoukei ho meten amaaphilabü che kilabü.
Yungthang Chobasaoei ho meten mütshuong yoa matjemshanga lolabü, hoba haoen yuktilabü, aishanga saoei thonbü kaodak ka Solomon songsihon ditla loukei; lausikei Solomon to yaangbou che hanei kia.
Ninevibüei matjemshanga ho meten yoa lolabü hoba ho meten yuktilabü, aieilausi Jonaei songlensi haoen maangpon sepeikei; lausikei Jona to yaangbou che hanei kia.
“Ao müteikei wanthung jikan hushang kaoena ayingsi kammanga aphoda; lausikei chemto loubü shuongei ngesakbü haptila haoenei wanthung anshanga phoda.
Ka nyek kaibü mang wanthung ki. Ladang ka nyek maisho kilaje kaibü mang pendou ngesakbüei shenda; lausikei ladang kho amaiko kilaje ka mangkei nakthühbüei shenda.
Kato kibü ngesakbü kho nakthühbü si ai yingkeije daman chühashi.
Hibü kaibü mang pendou nakthüh ai akiko ngesakbüei shenan kialonga, wanthung sonlailaibü ngesakbüei kala ngesakbü kubü tegü, kaibü mang ngesakbüei shenlabü.”
Haoei kho laukhümjinei Farisibü cheei hao hao yoa shaula yungla ngakei; hao atkei hoba shaushang yungshanga setkei.
Haoei nyakshau thedangto asakasambü hapan Farisibou aeibou maangpangkei.
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Kan Farisi shuongei thung hoba phau tang sakda, lausikei kan maanga aeilam aeiphop hoba amaibüei shenakei.
Kan ngoubü shuong, tang kümbou khoei maangkei kümbei aying lo?
Lausikei maangkabou kho jongsak la kuashi hoba kan shanga khümbo saopobü yinglabü.

Kan Farisibü shanga ügütü! Kanei shongen hoba sangkhau yik hoba lubü pikshik pendou ka an phejan kuda, hoba kanei ngühmai matjem hoba Mühghaü sanou wailetda. Kanei lubü kho awailetko habü hokei kümbou kikei.
Kan Farisibü shanga ügütü! Kanei sinagoga thükkabou setshang mangsühda hoba namseishanga salem maikuda.
Kan Farisibü shanga ügütü! Aishanga kan mütei ashenbü hee phatkei, hoba mütshuongei angeko kho thüka paida.”
Ngühkhüm lenbou yoa cheei hao to jongaikei, “Lenbou, nyi khübü laujinei künkei yoan nyikuda.”
Haoei laukei, “Kan Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong shangakei ügütü! Kanei akünenlabü on mütshuong la küntida, lausikei kanei on khünei kaneibü ikjishou cheei ongkei ameitida.
Kan shanga ügütü! Kaneibü pisibou shuongei thuseibü shuong haitikei hoba kanei haoeneibü hee yaüda.
Hibü kan pisibousi shuongeibü kümsilei shanga kan aukabü ki hoba kho kanei haü lauda; aieilausi haoenei haoen haitikei hoba kanei haoeneibü hee yaüda.
Khoei ong Mühghaü songsihonei lauda, ‘Ngei haoen yoto thuseibü shuong hoba ngühlang künbü shuong hautikulabü, khüka haoenei at haitilabü hoba at shieikoelabü.’
“Hibü kaopakbü ka jaüan thuseibü sii phinbü pendou, Abel sii ka khangan lemshon si sao- pobü kanglanga haitibü Zekharia sii sühko ho meten ka hilabü.
“Kan Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong shanga ügütü! Kanei songsido koukhin langa; kan jembükei üt hoba atko kibü shuongkei kanei shiletkei.”
Ladang hao khüka satkei, Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong si Farisibü shuong aeibou khauangkei hoba hao to ngühsidei juongnyu pheyo khangkei;
hoba haoei laubü ka shedbü denche lapla shanga haiyeikei.
Kho jiha, ladang mütshang hajar juong you thüka youei nakyoko onshaikei, haoei shaangla hao eikshuong to joyoko laukei, “Kanei Farisibü shuong hibüyoubü tokai to maangsangashi.
Tang akhitlabü lele aikei küplepan aki hoba angelabü lele huan aki;
aishanga kanei nakthüha ai ong laua kho ngesakbüa ditlabü, hoba kanei maangkabou popchem ka hakphangshoua laubü pendou chemdaka ngeklabü.
“Kü thangbou shuong, ngei kan la lenda, aoyouei mang haitida, hoba khüto liman haoenei ai akümenlabü, haoen to tehüt.
Ao to hatjan yingkei ngei kan to lenkho; haitian phaiakei molowan to jinlabü hau kibou Mühghaü to hatashi. Haü, ngei kan to lenda, hao to hatashi.
Aunyingshishou pem ngao poisa nyi lu ayaakda lo? Kheinyu yingankei Mühghaü jungaje khübü aunyingshishou che ongkei awemaukei.
Kaneibü khu kabü khulou mangkei weenakei. Tehüt; aunyingshishou juong to kei kan mu kibou.
“Ngei kan to lauda: Aoyouei müt thedanga ngo theletlaje Müteibü Shouei Mühghaü khuthük hangangbü thedanga hao theletlabü.
Lausikei aoei müt thedanga ngo atheletlaje, Mühghaü khuthük hangangbü thedanga hao asungletlabü.
Aoei Müteibü Shou khulimbo laulaje hao la amai apbulabü, lausikei aoei Soushou Saopobü nyikubü ngüh laulaje kho hao la üpbulabü.
Haoenei ladang kan sinagog hoba songdakbü si khuleibü shuong thedangto leibalaje, kanei ailai jongaila ayingsi laula maang temau,
aishanga kheijineitham kanei ai laula kho Soushou Saopobüei kan la lenlabü.”
Noknyüh yo ka müt cheei hao to laukei, “Lenbou, küjai to küneibü phet kü to janyoashi dogo lenkukai.”
Haoei hao to laukei, “Thangbou, aoei ngo kan thüka matjembou ayingsi janyinbou yeitikei?”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Maangsangashi, aeilam aeiphop phang pendou ka kan lolo senetashi, aieilausi müt cheei nyaksinam juong kibüa jembü langkei akida.”
Haoei haoen la ngühphatbü che lenkei: “Keibü müt cheei hao sek ka nyak juongnyu künkei.
Haoei jembü lolo maangpona laukei, ‘Ngei ai kümla? Ngei kü nyak thanla bung aki.’
Haoei laukei, ‘Ngei ho kümlabü, ngei kü bung panlabü hoba yaangshangbou danglabü, hoba khonei kü nyak hoba peisilei pendou thanlabü;
hoba ngei ngo lolo laungailabü: Nyi po juongnyu shanga nyaksinam juong thanshaiakei. Haksoashi, shauashi, yungashi hoba olinko kishi.’
Lausikei Mühghaüei hao to laukei, ‘Ngoubü, tautham ka langkei ka ka ngailanglabü. Nyi lamlebü nyaksinam pendou aoeibü yingla?’
Hibü aoei jembü shanga nyaksinam juongnyu tanshaida hoba Mühghaü aedanga keibü aying, hao kho müt phatkei.”
Haoei eikshuong to laukei, “Khoei ngei kan to lenda, kanei langkei shanga kanei ai shaula, ayingsi kaneibü manga ai neila, maang temau.
Langkei kho shausiyung to khaibou, hoba neisimei to mang khaibou ki.
Aukhomakmak shuong shangabü daman chühashi; haoenei awenda; haoenei thanshang ayingsi bung aki; yingasikei Mühghaüei haoen samda: Aushuong to kan latetche khaibou ki!
Kan yoa aoei dameibüei haoeibü thong to iknop che jinyola thükla?
Kanei kho kümsilei hanbü athük longa aila lubü joubü shangabü maangmauda?
Leilang khüpbong lai haangda daman- chühashi; haoenei akümaleida, haoenei lei ashikda, lausikei ngei kan to lenda, Solomon hao soneikangbü pendoua habü che phatko alamle.
Hansho ong mailembü mütshuong, ai yambabü sang tat kida hoba ngiet wanlong to jinlabü ki, khübü la Mühghaüei hele hainyu lekuda longaje, haoei khüto liman kan la aletilep lo!
Kanei ai shaula hoba ai yungla dogo maangmauko adamjan.
Khübü kho küksithang mütshuongei lamda; lausikei kan shanga khübü pendou kanei khamda dogo kaneibü Bouei ngeakei.
Aeiko haoeibü Sangle lamashi, hoba khübü kho kan la jinyokulabü.
“Tehüt, tan hanbou; aishanga kan la Sangle kho kula kaneibü Bouei maanganga.
“Kan kibü yakashi, hoba amlang kuashi. ühangbü namphot khuthüka thon akibü nyaksinam lao to kokbü anyangda ayingsi phetei aleilutida, kheibü namphot kanei jembü shanga lamleashi.
Aishanga lanei kaneibü nyaksinam ki khünei kaneibü maangponkei kilabü.
“Kaneibü shembenei homashi, hoba kaneibü wanthung jikan kiashi;
hoba ladang mütshuongei haoeneibü bunyu chemkan lem ka longeian kuokeida, kheijinei haoenei phühde hao la ipbulabü shanga lamlean kiteibü tegü kishi.
Sambü shuong aoyouei bunyu loujinei lombo kian hapda haoen olinbou. Ngei kan to ngühmaia lenkho, haoei jembü lolo shembei kailabü, haoen shaushang yungshanga settilabü hoba louan haoen khangenlabü.
Hao metuphanga ayingsi ngeyang ete loua longa, hoba haoen khei hapsije, khübü sambü shuong olinbou.
Lausikei ho ngeashi, bunyuei ai jiha kokbü loula kho ngekei tegüje haoei lombo kikhoulabü, hoba haoei hao chem tekhuokyettikhoulabü.
Kankei lamlean kishi, aieilausi nyi adambü jihsiphai chenei Müteibü Shou loulabü.”
Peterei laukei, “Bunyubou, ho ngühphatbü nyi kün to lenda si, müt pendou shanga lenda?”
Jisuei laukei, “Bunyuei hao sambü shuong la haoen phejan shausiyung phokula shanga haoen thüka ikjai letilabü maanglemenbü hoba songsido kibü sambü ao yingkeije kü la lenbü.
Haoeibü bunyu loujinei sambü aoei khei kümbo haplaje hao olinbou.
Ngei kan to maimaitham lenda haoei haoeibü peisilei pendou thüka hao ikjai letilabü.
Lausikei ao sambüei hao lolo maangpona, ‘Kü bunyu loula phaida’ dogo damda hoba sambü si sambü sao shuong ngümeila khangda, hoba shauda, yungda hoba ihei jaakda,
haoei adambü chalou hoba angebü jihsiphai chenei samboueibü bunyu kho loulabü, hoba hao tekan aplabü, hoba hao la maang alemenbü dan yoa phejan haptilabü.
“Sambü aoei haoeibü bunyuei maangangbü ngean alamle, ayingsi haoei maang- angbü tegü aküm, haoei ong ikok juong hapshaulabü;

lausikei aoei bunyu maangangbü ange, hoba ikok hapshaula muko kümenkei, haoei ikok shibou hapshaulabü. Ao la juong kukei hao ka juong hilabü; hoba ao ika haoei juong thanan phokukei, hao ka aei juongbou hilabü.
“Ngo kaodak to wan longtikula loukei, hoba kho longan apan kikei tegüje lai maikhoulabü!
Ngo baptibü cheei baptijan, hoba awanshongko ngo lai khonkuda!
Kanei ngo kaodak to sangmai sungbala loukei dogo damda lo? Ngei kan to lenda, aying, lausikei janyinbü longtila bouje loukei!
Tou ka jaüan chemdang chenei ngao kialonga semei nyi hoba nyiei sem khulimbo janyinbü longlabü;
bouei shou khulimbo hoba shouei bou khulimbo; nyuei nouyangshou khulimbo hoba nouyangshouei nyu khulimbo; laoeibü nyuei shoueibü yak khulimbo hoba yakei laoeibü nyu khulimbo janyinbü longlabü.”
Hobaje noknyüh to haoei laukei, “Ladang kanei chanep aenei sangmei shangan haplaje, kanei phühde, ‘Lang loula kümda’ dogo lauda, hoba khei loushatda.
Hobaje ladang kanei yungthang aenei yei soubü haplaje, ‘Ho lemala kümda’ dogo kanei lauda, hoba kho loushatda.
Hibüyoubü dan, kanei kaodak si mühnyu haang lenenda; lausikei kanei lai toubü jihsiphai lenenla angeda?
“Ai tükdebü ki kho aila kan lolo matjem akuenda?

Aishanga no matbubou to matjemla haujinei lamoua nyi hao to jilaphaila haujemashi. Khei ayinglonga haoei no matjembou ik to leian jinkulabü hoba matjembouei no thüngbou ik maangto khümbo kulabü, hoba thüngbouei no thüngdang to jinlabü.
Ngei kan to lenda, nyi thonbou poisa che ashemphem shongko no khüka alonglabü.”
Kheijineitham müt at loukei hoba Galilbü at haoeneibü lembü kuko kian Pilatei haitibü shangabü Jisu la lenkei.
Haoei haoen to jongaikei, “Khübü Galilbü kheinyu khonsaktisi, Galilbü pendou to haoen shabü aei jungeibü shuong dogo kanei damda lo?
Ngei lauda, aying; lausikei kan maangpon asepei longa kankei pendou haoen tegü shemlabü.
Ayingsi Siloama lapheishon laangshon tuongbüei müt anthükset haitisi, Jerusalema kibü pendou to haoen shedbü aei shonbü shuong dogo kanei damda lo?
Ngei lauda, aying; lausikei kan maangpon asepei longa kankei pendou haoen tegü shemlabü.”
Haoei haoen la ho ngühphatbü lenkei: “Müt cheei haoeibü semlühlaaka bhuklong che kekei, hoba hao loukei hoba mai lambei lausikei aikei akitei.
Haoei semlühlaak moubou to laukei, ‘Chü- hashi, tou po sem sühko ngei ho bhuklong ka mai lambo louda, lausikei ai ühüpda. Ho akan koutiashi. Hoei aila kaomai letila?’
Lausikei haoei hao to jongaikei, ‘Yaangbou, toupo shangakei khei phoyoashi. Ngei chungthem kaijembo kao thuan kaomai jinkho.
Hoei ngiempo mai heksije thumaibou, lausikei ehek longa chengan koutishima.’”
Nounyet hao sinagog chenei songlenko kikei.
Khünei yaksa che po anthükset athükaminbü soushou kiteikei; sao komattham kikei hoba ai jihdangakei shingan achüh.
Ladang Jisuei sao hapbei haoei sao hao jungto ngakei hoba sao to laukei, “Yaksa, kaibü athükamin ka no senglitia”;
hoba haoei sao to hatkei. Kheijinei sao phühde tangshaitham loenkei hoba Mühghaü la soneikangbü kula khangkei.
Jisuei Nounyet maitisije, sinagog bunyuei khau angko shuong to laukei, “Kümlaleila shanga chalou lak kia; hibü Nounyet ayingko khübü chaloua louashi hoba maitikuashi.”
Jisuei hao to jongaiko laukei, “Hibüyoubü shuong, kan pendouei Nounyet kaneibü masu ayingsi gadu nyaishang ukhong ka sengletan dei inla shanga leian ohauda lo?
Hobaje ho sao Abraham nouyangshou yingsije hoba Satanei po anthükset sühko khühan kisije kho khühbü ka sao Nounyet sengkulabü janbü aying lo?”
Haoei laujinei haoeibü dangbou pendou himou bautikei hoba noknyüh pendou hao soneikangbü kümsileiei olinyokei.
Haoei laukei, “Mühghaü Sangle ai phatkei, hoba ngei ho ai to takteiyola?
Ho müt cheei haoeibü bamanga yongkoshik lang sungjung hauan phinbü phatkei; ho chingkei hoba bunyu la yeikei, hoba mühkabü aushuong kho bheka laangkei.”
Toukei haoei laukei, “Ngei Mühghaü Sangle ai to takteiyola?
Ho yaksa cheei tokai sungan wenchak sema totan pendou pujung along shongko phobü phatkei.”
Hao Jerusalem to haujinei sangnyu sangshou pendoua songlenko dankei.
Hobaje müt cheei hao to laukei, “Yaangbou, khümenbü shuong shijo ong si ai?”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Koukhün nyonyembü to atla aeibou haujemashi, aishanga ngei kan to lenda, juongnyuei atla aeibou haujemlabü lausikei athüklabü.
Chem bunyu che laksepan kou khinngailanga longa, hoba kanei tangaenei, ‘Yaangbou, kün la ipbu’ dogo lauko kuokeiasikei haoei ‘Ngei kan angekei; kan laka loukei?’ dogo haoei jongailabü.
Kheijinei kanei laulabü, ‘Kün ka yoa shaukei yungkei hoba nyi kün la khongnyua songlenkei.’
Lausikei haoei kan to laulabü, ‘Ngei kan angekei; kan laka loukei? Kan amaibü kümbü shuong pendou kü jungka kukashi.’
Mühghaü Sanglea kanei Abraham hoba Isak hoba Jakob hoba thuseibü shuong pendou haplabü lausikei ladang kanje nongbüa tekan apan haplaje kheijinei haapyobü hoba hauh uyobü kilabü.
Chaang hoba chanep ka, yungkük hoba yungthang ka mütshuong loulabü hoba Mühghaü Sangle lema yolabü.
Maimaitham, phaibü shuong shaanglabü, hoba shaangbü shuong phailabü.”
Kho jihsiphaia Farisibü at hao jungto loukei hoba laukei, “Haka satan apashi hoba wakou meimeiashi. Herodei no haitimang sühda.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Hauashi, hoba kho selong to lenashi, ‘Tat si ngiet ngei shabü sou shuong shian sattida hoba mütshuong maitikuda, hoba sembounyet ngei ngeibü kümsilei wanlabü.’
Lankei, tat hoba ngiet hoba jenyet ngo ngeibü wakou haulabü, aieilausi thuseibü che kho Jerusalem to liman lubünei amaujan.

“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, thuseibü shuong haitibü, hoba ka jungto hautibü shuong laangei sonettibou, aunyuei jembü shou kakphanga leisheian paklepbü tegü, ngei ladüngnei ka shousi shuong leisheimang sühkei, lausikei kanei maang üang!
Chühashi, kaneibü chem kan la litham apyokulabü. Ngei kan to lenda, kanei ‘Bunyubou nyena ao louda, Hao haübou’, dogo alau shongko kanei ngo ühüplabü.”
Nounyet hao Farisibü songdakbü chem che to shaula yungla haukei, hoba haoenei hao lombo kikei.
Hao thedanga mang pokko shatbü müt che kiteikei.
Jisuei Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong si Farisibü shuong to laukei, “Nounyet maitijan si amaitijan?”
Lausikei haoenei ngüh üang. Haoei hao to hatan maitikukei, hoba ngaitikei.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Kan yoa jembü gadu ayingsi masu deikhüna atetan kisi tongde Nounyetje hao asenenlabü ao ki?”
Lausikei haoenei kho ajongaien.
Ladang haoei ngabü shuongei thükkabü setshang ong piko hapbei, haoei khübü shuong to ngühphatbü che lenkei,
“Ladang no müt cheei chemkanlem to ngada, thükkabou setshanga teset. Aingenyu lembubouei ka thükkabü yen che chian kialonga,
no ngabou haosi ham louan, ‘Hao la ho setshang kuashi’, dogo laua longa, himou bauan no phangkabou setshang to ngaila meimeilabü.

Lausikei ladang no ngadaje hauan thonbou setshanga setashi, hoba ladang no ngabou kho loulaje haoei kato, ‘Thangbou, thükaeto kaiyanga’, dogo laulabü. Kheijinei shaushang yungshanga setbü shuong pendou thedanga no soumo kilabü;
aishanga aoyouei jembü lolo yaangenlaje hao hanboula yeilabü hoba aoyouei jembü lolo hanbüla yeilaje hao tonenlabü.”

Haoei chembubou to laukei, “Ladang nyi lem oknyinda kaibü jenabou yingasikei, kaibü jaisina yingasikei, ka chempen yingasikei ayingsi kaibü keibü lepbou yingasikei tenga. Haoenei no ngangaian kala shemngailabü.
Lausikei ladang nyi oknyinda, shale jonglebü, yousi iksibü, sokebü hoba nyekthubü ngaashi;
hoba no olinlabü, aieilausi haoenei kala kungaila athük; aishanga saopobü shuong langngaijinei nyi ku hapmailabü.”
Ladang hao yoa shaushanga setbü shuong yoa cheei khübü ditkei haoei hao to laukei, “Aoei Mühghaü Sangle lema shauoula hao olinbou!”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Müt cheei lem yaang huiletkei hoba müt juong ngaishaikei.
Shaulabü jihsiphaia haoei haoeibü sambü lem to chibü shuong ngala hautiko laukei, ‘Kaiya, aishanga tou ajanjan pendou lamleakei.’
Lausikei haoen pendouei maangpon chela lean ap hila khangkei. Shaangbouei hao to laukei, ‘Ngei sek che jekakei hoba ngo khüto haula khamda. Sanoudaman kü la amai apbushi.’
Lubüei laukei, ‘Ngei sek shapla shanga masu tang ngao jekakei hoba ngo haoen takteila hauda. Sanoudaman kü la amai apbushi.’
Lubüei laukei, ‘Ngo tou ong chem kanakei, khoei ngo alouenlabü.’

Sambü kho longeian haoeibü bunyu la khübü lenkei. Kheijinei chem bunyu khau angko hao sambü to lenkei, ‘Sangnyu khongyaang hoba khong to hali hauashi, hoba shale jongle hoba, yousi iksibü, nyekthubü hoba sokebü hato leiba.’
Sambüei laukei, ‘Yaangbou, nyi sakkubü tegü küma, hoba tokei setshang jouakei.’
Bunyuei sambü to laukei, ‘Pühlam si wakou haang to hauan kü chem shentilabü lele haoen leiyetashi.
Ngei kan to lenda, ngei lem to chibü shuong ka aoeikei ngeibü lem ka ajeplabü.’ ”
Mütshang yaang hao yoa haukei, hoba haoei sepeian chühngaian haoen to laukei,
“Ao kü jungto louda hoba haobou hoba nyu hoba yak hoba shousi shuong hoba jaisina, hoba nousina, hoba jembü mangkei amangsenda, hao ngeibü eik ayeien.
Aoei haoeibü peisei apeda hoba kü phai alouda hao ngeibü eik ayeien.
Aishanga kan yoa laobou mütei laangshon lapheishon yaümang sühda, kho yeila shanga nam souko kiasi aki dogo shaang setan haoei aplabü wean achühda lo?
Aishanga haoei keshang khangan phoan wanla athükko apalonga chühbü shuongei hao la nyikuko aweasüngko
laulabü, ‘Ho mütei yaüla khangkei lausikei wantila athüklangko apakei.’
Ayingsi laobou chobaei lubü choba khulimbo wapyola haujinei lakjaibü hajar anei hao khulimbo hajar saoche leibabü to shuokyola thüklasi athükla dogo shaang setan daman achühda lo?
Khei ayinglonga haoei athüksije, lubü choba mü kaoen heebüa kijineithama haoei toukei youkobü hautiko sangmei shanga phelabü.
Kho tegütham, kan yoa aoei haoei kibü pendou üpyolaje hao ngeibü eik ayeien.
“Jem maiakei; lausikei jemkei teibü mauan apalonga aiei teitila?
Ho kao si od apshang ham shanga lejim aki. Haoenei kho hakan apda. Ao noukhün yetkei haoei ditashi.”
Khüm hebü shuong hoba asaopobü mütshuong pendou hao ngüh ditla hao jungto nyangko louko kikei.
Farisibü shuong hoba Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong nyamnyamyoko laukei, “Ho mütei shabü shuong sungletda hoba haoen yoa shauda yungda.”
Lausikei haoei haoen la ho ngühphatbü lenkei:
“Tetlabüei kan yoa müt cheei sanlon saongao kiteikei hoba khüka che maukei. Khülonga haoei anjinngao to gü kho ushia apyoan maubou che kho ühüpshongko lamla ohauda lo?
Ladang haoei kho hapda haoei olinko phaka tonda hoba chem to longeida.
Hobaje haoei olinko haoeibü jenabou si lepbü shuong ngada hoba haoei haoen to lauda, ‘Kü yoa olinyokai! Ngei kü san maubou kho hapmeiakei.’
Ngei kan to lenda kho tegü maangpon sepeila akhambü saopobü müt anjinngao to gü toje maangpon sepeibü shabü müt cheei khuthüka aei olinbou yinglabü.
“Ayingsi tetlabüei yaksa cheei chandinam an ka che mautikei. Khülonga saoei hantin sapan kho ühüpshongko maangsangko alamda lo?
Ladang saoei kho hapda saoei saoeibü nounanyu si lepbü shuong chela ngashaida hoba lauda, ‘Kü yoa olinyokai. Ngei ngei mautibü chandinam kho hapmeia.’
Ngei kan to lenda, kho tegü maangpon sepeibü shabü müt cheei Mühghaüeibü khuthük hangangbü shuong yoa olinbü ki.”
Haoei laukei, “Müt cheei bousu shou nyi kikei.
Haosi yoa nashoubouei bou to laukei, ‘Abou, peisilei yoka ngei haplabü phejan kü la kubü’; hoba haoei haoeibü nyaksinam haosi la jankukei.
Chalou shijo danan phaia shou nashoubouei haoeibü peisilei pendou takshatkei hoba usa kaonyek to wakou satkei; khünei hao haoeibü nyaksinam pendou saangkhümbo apsilebü langkeia kikei.
Ladang haoei nyaksinam khümbo meikei, kheijinei kho kaonyek pendoua mühsinou yaang longkei, hoba hao aicheküman shale phambei.
Hibü hao haukei hoba kho kaonyek kabü müt che yoa homatlangkei, hoba hao khongthu to uk lomla hautikei.
Haoei shi shentila shanga uk la okbü kaopak khop nyaimang sühkei, lausikei aoeikei hao la ai aku.
Lausikei ladang hao maia phambo loukei haoei laukei, ‘Kübou yoa mulebü shuong lajuche shausiyung shauankei jouko ki, lausikei ngoje hanei nyakmühei haida!
Ngo meimeijung kübou jungto ngailabü, hoba ngei hao to laulabü: Abou, ngei khuthük khulimbo hoba kathedanga shabü shona,
hoba ngo touje kashou dogo laula amukei. Ngo kaibü mulebü che la yeitikai.’
Hibü hao meimeikei hoba haobou jungto loukei. Lausikei hao heebüa kijinei, jembü bouei hao hapan sanouko lotkei; hao laangjung likei hoba ngüma himbei hoba sembung to shepbei.
Kheijinei shouei bou to laukei, ‘Abou, ngei khuthük khulimbo hoba kathedanga shabü shona, hoba ngo touje kashou dogo laula amukei.’
Lausikei bouei hao sambü shuong to laukei, ‘Hali! Neisimei maiboutham sungenashi hoba hao la lekuashi hoba haoeibü ika ikjikhap hoba youa nguok lonkuashi.
Masu shoushou amenbou kho koba hoba haitiashi, hoba sen shauyo yungyoko olinyoakho,
aieilausi ho küshou haian kikei hoba nyibou langkeia, hao mauan apbei hoba hapmeia.’
“Lausikei hao shou jaishoubou kho seka kiteikei, hoba hao longan chem junga sühlangjinei chia laubü hoba tombü ditkei.
Haoei sambü yoka che ngaan ai yingkeije dogo phekei.
Haoei hao to laukei, ‘Kana lousühakei, hoba kabouei amenbü masu shoushou kho haitikei, aieilausi haoei hao amauko langkei maibüa hapmeikei.’
Lausikei hao khauangkei hoba chem to alotla kausakkei. Haobou longkei hoba hao sulettkei.

Lausikei haoei hao bou to jongaikei, ‘Chüha, po hajuche ngei no khangenkei, hoba ngei ka ngühkhüm che ongkei aditko aki; lausikei ngeibü jenabou shuong yoa olinyolabü lele kü la nyi ladangkei lonshou che ongkei aku.
Lausikei ho kashou, aoei asangalanbü sao shuong yoa kaibü nyaksinam khümbo khintian chem to longaikei, nyi hao shanga amenbü masu shoushou kho haitikuda.’
Haobouei hao to laukei, ‘Küshou, no ponpen kü yoa ki, hoba ngei kibü pendou kaibü.
Lausikei senei maanghaiko olinlabü ong kiteikei, aieilausi ho kana haian kiteikei, hoba nyibou lang kia; hao mauan kiteikei hoba hapmeiakei.’ ”
Jisuei hao eikshuong to laukei, “Keibü müt che kikei hoba haoei haoeibü nyaksinam to chühbou thükkabou ikjaibü che kiteikei. Haoei bunyueibü nyaksinam apsilekuda dogo hao attiko bunyu to lenkei.
Hibü haoei hao ngakei hoba laukei, ‘Ngei ka shangabü ditbü kho ai? Kaibü kümsilei tedtangbü weyobü kho kubü, aieilausi no touje thükkabü ikjai lela athük.’
Thükkabou ikjaibouei haoei lolo laungaikei, ‘Ngei tou ai kümsi maila? Ngeibü bunyuei kümsilei ngailangda. Ngo kao thula hau aki hoba ngo hishau hiyunglakei himouda.
Ladang ngo thükkabou ikjai kümsilei ka sattilaje, mütshuongei haoeneibü chem to ngo leiyettilabü lele ngei ai kümlaje ngei ngeakei.’
Kheijinei haoei hao bunyu la sangh thebü shuong che chea ngakei, hoba haoei shaangbou to laukei, ‘Nyi kü bunyu la shemla sangh lajuche thekei?’
Haoei laukei, ‘Onang takletbü saongao.’ Thükkabou ikjaibouei hao to laukei, ‘Kaibü theyobü le sungba; hali setashi hoba anjinsem doashi.’
Hobaje haoei lubü che to laukei, ‘Hobaje nyikei sangh lajuche thean ki?’ Haoei laukei, ‘Youshou takyang saongao.’ Haoei hao to laukei, ‘Kaibü theyobü le sungba hoba saolei doashi.’
Bunyuei haoeibü maanglimaangsang, maangalanbou thükkabou ikjai sangkei; aishanga ngesakbü shousi shuong toje ho kaodak shousi shuong haoen jembü meten yoa aei sangboudobou.
“Hobaje ngei kan to lenda, kanei kan shanga thangbou pailetla kaodak nyaksinam jungeiashi, khei yingsi ong kanei ladang kho apkhümlaje, kan thon akibü kishang to leiyetlabü.
Ao to aeibou hanbüa maanglemenda, hao to juongnyuakei maanglemenlabü; hoba ao aeibou hanbüa ngühmaang alan, hao juongakei ngühmaang alanko ki.
Hibü ho kaodakbü maangalanbü nyaksinam jungeibüa mangkei kan to maang alemen longa, aoei tükdebü nyaksinam jaitila kan to maang lemenla?
Hobaje müeibüa kan to maang alemlonga, aoei kan la kaneibü kula?
Sambü aoeikei bunyu nyi khangenla athük; aishanga haoei che mangsenlabü hoba lubü kho sanoulabü, ayingsi haoei che to maangshiklabü hoba che kho nyikulabü. Kanei Mühghaü si nyaksinam akhangenen.”
Nam to khambü Farisi shuongei khübü ngüh pendou ditan hao la nyikukei.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Kanei kan lolo müt thedanga janbü lela thükkei, lausikei Mühghaüei kaneibü maangpon ngekei; aishanga müt thedanga aeibou yaangenbü kho Mühghaü thedanga mangsenlabü.
“Johan alou shongko Ngühkhüm si Thuseibü shuong kiteikei. Khüka jaüan Mühghaü Sangle Ngühlang Maibü kho songlena, hoba mütpem wekoei khüto atla haujemyoda.
Lausikei Ngühkhüm ka dopem seijinbü hanbüshou che apbü toje müh si kaodak shemla sobou.
“Aoei jembü yak to bangda hoba lubü ngada, haoei asangalanbü jungeida; hoba aoei laoei sattibü yaksa ngadaje haoei asangalanbü shonda.
“Keibü müt che kikei. Haoeibü neisimei kho nakthüngle sakbü hoba inyaibü kiteikei, hoba chaangboua hao olinangko lemshou lemyaang kümbo kikei.
Hobaje Lazar nyenan mouei shenbü hishau hiyungbü che haoeibü koukhüma phoyokei,
hoba haoei keiboueibü khümsok ka atbülebü nyak shaula chüheikei; yongbou keishuong louan haoeibü mou to sekei.
“Kheijinei hishau hiyungbü kho haikei, hoba khuthük hangangbü shuongei hao Abraham khuku to langkei. Keibou khokei haikei hoba khünkei.
Hobaje yemsanga hao aeibou khonkuko kijinei haoei nyek longan chühkei hoba heebüa Abraham hoba haoeibü khukua Lazar hapbei.
Haoei hao to ngakei hoba laukei, ‘Abou, Abraham, küto onoukai hoba Lazarei haoeibü ikjishou deia sheman kü lishang to sangtiko khamtikula yantikai, aishanga ngo ho wanlühei aicheküman khonsakda.’
“Lausikei Abrahamei laukei, ‘Kü shou, no lang kijinei, nyi kaibü maiboutham hapbei dogo damenashi, hoba Lazarei kho tegü amaibou hapbei; lausikei tou hao haksoa kia, hoba no khonkua ki.
Tokei khüto yoko, haka aoyou kan jungto haumang sühlaje athüklabü, hoba khüka kün jungto aokei loula athüklabü lele, kün si kan kanglanga thonshang akibü püngkhün yaangei aoakei.’
Haoei laukei, ‘Khülonga abou, hao kübou chemto hautikai dogo ngei kato sudajada,
aishanga ngei jaisina müt ngao kia, haoei haoen to aukabü kula hautikai; khei yingsi ong haoen ho khonkushang to aloulabü.’
Abrahamei laukei, ‘Haoenei Mosa hoba thuseibü Lai shuong kia; haoenei khübü to ngüha nale.’
Lausikei haoei laukei, ‘Aying, abou Abraham; lausikei haikhün ka müt che haoen jungto ngaisije haoenei maangpon sepeilabü.’
Abrahamei jongaikei, ‘Haoenei Mosa hoba thuseibü shuong ngüh aditlonga, haikhün ka müt che langngaisi dogokei haoenei maialemlabü.’ ”
Haoei eikshuong to laukei, “Müt shabüa phaiyettilabü kho louphangphang, lausikei ao danko khübü haüthüklaje hao shanga ügütü!
“Hao shangaje, habü hanbü shuong yo ka che ongkei phaiyettibü khantoje, ngünjin laang che ngüma yakan si mangto tekan attibü khaibou.
Maangsangashi! Kaibü jaisinaei shedbü shona longa, hao to hakashi, hoba hao maangpon sepeisije, hao la amai apbushi.
Haoei chalou chenei kakhu limbo nyetnei shedbü shona longa, hoba ka jungto nyetnei longeian hao maangpon kümeda dogo kato laua longaje, nyi hao la ap kujan.”
Youkoikjai anthüknyi khoei Bunyubou to laukei, “Kün la mailem aei yaangtikai.”
Jisuei laukei, “Kan to mailem yongkoshiklang tetche ongkei kisije, kanei kho pilong to laulabü, ‘Pheienashi hoba sia keashi’, hoba khoei kan ngüha lelabü.
“Tetlabüei kan yoa müt cheei sek moutiko ayingsi san shuong lomtiko sambü che kia. Ladang hao sek ka lunglaje haoei hao to, ‘Toutham kaiya hoba shaula yungla setashi’ dogo lauda lao?
Aeiko haoei hao to bouje, ‘Nyak peiashi hoba ngo shauji yungjinei shombü jinkula lamleashi; kho phaia nyi lolo shaushi’, dogo alauda si?
Hao la kümla nongkubü kümbü shanga haoei sambü nyen sangda lao?
Kho tegü kaneikei, ladang kan la kümla nongkubü pendou kümsemlaje kanei hai laujan, ‘Kün sambü shuong; kün nyen sanglabü ai aki. Künei ai kümjan kiteikei kho künei küma.’ ”
Hao Jerusalem to haujinei haoei Samaria si Galil kanglang ka dankei.
Hao sang che to haujinei imbü müt anei hao haüyokei. Haoenei tuisho hauan lokei
hoba ngekkei, “Jisu! Bunyubou! Kün to onoukai!”
Ladang haoei haoen hapbei, haoei laukei, “Hauashi hoba kan lolo ungshedbü shuong to lenashi.” Haoen haujineitham haoen maian apbei.
Haoen yoa müt che, hao maingaibü hapan, ngüh yaangei Mühghaü la soneikangbü kuko longeikei;
hoba Jisueibü you junga khüpetkei hoba hao nyen sangkei. Hao Samariabü kikei!
Jisuei laukei, “Müt an pendou saüenkei ji si? Müt güje lan ki?
Ho küksithang che hato liman Mühghaü la soneikangbü kungaila longeibü lubü ao akitei lo?”
Hobaje haoei hao to laukei, “Pienashi hoba hauashi. Kaibü mailemei no maitia.”
Ladang Farisibüei hao to Mühghaü Sangle ladang loula dogo phekei, haoei haoen to jongaikei, “Mühghaü Sangle kho kanei haiyeibüei alouda.
Haoenei, ‘Chüha, hanei kia!’ ayingsi ‘Khünei kia!’ dogo alaulabü. Aieilausi Mühghaü Sangle kho kan yoa kia.”
Haoei eikshuong to laukei, “Kanei Müteibü Shou chalou shuong ka che ongkei hapmang sühko waanglabü jihsiphai che lousühlabü.
Haoenei kan to laulabü, ‘Chühashi, hao khünei kia!’ ayingsi ‘Hao hanei kia!’ Tohau, haoen phai telang;
aishanga langpon ponsi lai ji mühthon ka jinei sühko ngesakda, kho tegü Müteibü Shou haoeibü chaloua yinglabü.
Lausikei shaangla hao aeibou khonkujan hoba ho metenei wailetlabü.
Hobaje Noa chaloua yingbü tegü, Müteibü Shou chalouakei kho tegütham kilabü;
Noa longchem to atbü chalou asühshongko hoba yungsen loukouan haoen pendou ashem shongko, haoenei shaukei yungkei, haoenei leiyetkei hoba haoenei laolam yaknga kuyoko loukei.
Kho tegü ong, Lot chaloua kibü tegü yinglabü: mütshuongei shaukei hoba yungkei, jekkei hoba yaakkei, kekei ongkei hoba chem dangko kikei;
lausikei Lot Sodom ka satnyet khuthük ka wan hoba wanlong lotkei hoba haoen pendou shembei.
Kho tegü ong Müteibü Shou tang khitlabü chalouakei kilabü.
Kho chaloua müt che chemdaka kialonga hoba haoeibü peisilei chemanga kialonga, haoei khübü sungla ayanjan, hoba kho tegü ong ao seka khüpan kilaje haokei khüpeian toung.
Loteibü yak damenashi.
Ao mütei haoeibü langkei püetla haujemdaje kho maulabü, lausikei aoei jembü langkei maulaje haoei kho püetlabü.
Ngei kan la lenda, khüyou yepshang chenei müt nyi kilabü, che leilanglabü, lubü che kho phoyolabü.
Yaksa nyi chela shem shiko kilabü; che leilanglabü, hoba che kho phoyolabü.
(Müt nyi sek chenei kilabü; che leilanglabü hoba lubü che kho phoyolabü.)”
Haoenei hao to jongaikei, “Lanei, Bunyubou?” Haoei haoen to laukei, “Lanei haibü mang ki khünei hogon shuong takshatlabü.”
Haoei haoen to athakko welaulabü hoba ladangkei hau athetlabü shangabü ngüh- phatbü che lenkei.
Haoei laukei, “Sangnyu chenei matjembü che kikei, haoei Mühghaü to ühüt hoba ao mütlakei soumo aku.
Kho sangnyua latnyu che kikei, hoba sao hao jungto hai lauko loutang lekei, ‘Kü dangbou khulimbo kü la mat jembushi.’
Longcheje haoei tokngaikei, lausikei kho phaia haoei hao lolo laukei, ‘Ngei Mühghaü to ühütsikei hoba müt la soumo akusikei,
ho latnyuei ngo khonsaktidabü ngei sao mat jembulabü.’ ”
Jisuei laukei, “Asaopobü matjembouei ai laudaje ditashi.
Kholongaje Mühghaüei, chalou nangnak alauko ngekbü haoeibü pienbü shuong la ngühmaia mat ajembulep lo? Haoen to thuila hao kit khaiakei si?
Ngei kan la lenda, haoei haoen pü lekuko tongde mat jembulabü. Lausikei, ladang Müteibü Shou loulaje kheijinei haoei kaodaka mailem haplep sai?”
Müt atei jembü saopobüa maang leman lubü shuongje pendou nyikuko jungeikei, khoei khübü to haoei tokei ho ngüh- phatbü lenkei:
“Müt nyi lembü- chem to welaula angkei, che kho Farisibü hoba lubü che kho khüm hebou.
Farisibou kho loan jembü lolo hai welaukei, ‘O Mühghaü, ngo lubü mütshuong tegü, aeilam aeiphopbü, maangalanbü, asang- alanbü ayingsi ho khüm hebou tegü ongkei ayingbü shanga ngei ka nyen sangda.
Ngei bale chenei nyinei mühei nyengda, ngei hapbü pendou ka an phejan kuda.’
Lausikei khüm hebou heebüa lokei. Haoei khuthük ae chühangtila ongkei maang üang, lausikei haoeibü khüklang to jangngailangko laukei, ‘O Mühghaü, ngo shabü müt to onoukai.’
Ngei kan la lenda, che khütoje ho Mühghaü thedanga janbü hapan haoeibü chem to yankei; aishanga aoei jembü lolo tonenlaje hao hanlabü, lausikei aoei jembü lolo handa hao tonenlabü.”
Hao la meititila shanga mütshuongei nashou hanbü shuong to luko hao jungto leibako kikei; lausikei ladang eikshuongei kho hapbei, haoenei khübü leibabü shuong to hakkei.
Lausikei Jisuei nashousi shuong leibala shanga haoen ngakei hoba laukei, “Nashousi shuong kü jungto loutiashi. Haoen teshilet, aishanga Mühghaü Sangle kho haoen tegübü shangabü ki.
Maimaitham ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, aoyouei Mühghaü Sangle nashou hanbü che tegü asungletlaje haoei khüto üetenlabü.”
Jihudabü leiyeibü cheei hao to phekei, “Lenbou maibou, pon- pen langkei hapla shanga ngei ai kümla?”
Jisuei hao to jongaikei, “Nyi aila kü to maibou dogo ngada? Mühghaü to limanje aokei maibü aki.
Nyi ngühkhüm shuong ngeakei: Asangalanbü teshon, Tehaiti, Tekok, Amlangbü ngühchung teku.”
Müt khoei jongaikei, “Ngei khübü pendou kho ngo nashoua thama jungeia.”

Ladang Jisuei kho ditkei haoei hao to laukei, “No tokei cheei aonkei; nyi kibü pendou yakashi hoba nam kho shalebü shuong la jankuashi, hoba nyi khuthüka nyaksinam kilabü; hoba kaiya hoba kü phai semshi.”
Lausikei haoei kho ladang ditkei hao aeibou maangto shatkei, aishanga hao aeibou keian kikei.
Jisuei hao aeibou maangto shatko hapan laukei, “Nyaksinam kibü shuong shanga Mühghaü Sangle to atlabü ho latetche sekkei!
Keibüei Mühghaü Sangle to atkhoulabü khantoje nidku khün to ut shetlangbü sobou.”
Kho ditbü danei laukei, “Kholonga ao ong khümenla?”
Haoei laukei, “Müt shanga athükaminlabü kho Mühghaü shangaje thüklaminlabü.”
Peterei laukei, “Kün shangakei lai? Künei küneibü chemsibung apyoa hoba ka phai sema.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Maimaitham ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, aoyouei Mühghaü Sangle shanga jembü chem, yak, jaisinasi shuong, nyusibou ayingsi shousi apyoa,
haoen la toubü ho kaodak hanei aei phopan ashemmailabü ao aki, hoba loulabü metena ponpen langkei haplabü.”
Jisuei Anthüknyi kho leilangkei hoba haoen to laukei, “Ditashi, sen Jerusalem to angda, hoba Müteibü Shou shangabü thuseibü lea doan kibü pendou loushadlabü,
aishanga hao Küksithang la khümbo kuan aplabü, hoba hao la nyikulabü, himou bautilabü hoba eokei thuoklabü;
haoenei hao semeilabü hoba hao haitilabü, hoba sembounyeta hao langngailabü.”
Lausikei haoenei khübü kho che ongkei aditen; kho ai ngühtet laukei haoenei ange hoba kho ai lauda haoenei adamen.
Jisu Jerikho sühlamto, nyekthubü müt che lamkoa hishauko setan kikei.
Ladang haoei mütshang danbü ditkei, haoei kho ai yingkeije dogo phekei.
Haoenei hao to Nazaretbü Jisu danda dogo lenkei.
Kheijinei haoei ngekkei, “Dawid Shou Jisu, kü to onoukai.”
Hobaje thedanga paibü shuongei alementila shanga hao to hakkei, lausikei haoei aei kaangbou ngekkei, “Dawid Shou Jisu, kü to onoukai.”
Jisu lokei hoba müt kho hao jungto leibala ngühkhüm kukei. Ladang hao nyangko loukei haoei hao to phekei,
“Nyi kü la ka shanga ai kümtimang sühda?” Haoei laukei, “Yaangbou, kü la nyibou haptikai.”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Khei yingashi. Kaibü mailemei no maia.”
Haoei khoyam hapngaikei hoba Mühghaü la soneikangbü kuko hao phai sembei. Ladang haoenei kho hapbei mütshuong pendouei Mühghaü nyen sangkei.
Hao Jerikho to atkei hoba kho nakjung danko kikei.
Khünei Zakhia nyenbü müt che kikei; hao khukabou khüm hebou kikei, hoba hao keibü yingan kikei.
Haoei Jisu kho laobou yingkeije chühla shanga haujembo kikei, lausikei haoei ühüp, aieilausi khünei mütshang yaang kikei hoba hao tuibü hanbü kikei.
Hibü hao thedangto langkei hoba hao to chühla shanga bhuklong che to nguikei, aishanga Jisu kho lam to danla hauko kikei.
Ladang Jisu khonei sühlangkei haoei chühantikei hoba hao to laukei, “Zakhia, hali kaiyena; tat ngo ka chema sühjan.”
Hao tongde louyenkei hoba hao olin angko sungletkei.
Haoenei ladang kho hapbei haoen pendou nyamnyamyoko laukei, “Hao shabü müt cheeibü yen la lela haua!”
Zakhia khünei lokei hoba Bunyubou to laukei, “Yaangbou, ngei ngeibü nyaksinam jamde shalebü la kulabü, hoba ngei müt at ka ajanbüei sungan kialonga ngei phejan leiei aeian shemngailabü.”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Tat khümenbü ho chem to loda, aishanga haokei Abraham shou ki.
Aishanga Müteibü Shou maubü lamla hoba khümenla loukei.”
Haoenei kho ditko kitoua haoei lubü ngühphatbü che lenkei, aieilausi hao Jerusalem nyangko kikei, hoba haoenei Mühghaü Sangle khoyam haüthüklabü dogo dambei.
Haoei laukei, “Yaangbü müt cheei choba Sangle songdak hau sungletlabü hoba longeilabü dogo kaonyek heebü che to meimeikei.
Haoei haoeibü sambü an ngakei hoba haoen mütpem weko la mina che bang kukei. Haoei haoen to laukei, ‘Ngo alongei shongko nam seiteiashi.’
Lausikei hao kaonyek kabü mütshuongei hao to mangsenkei, hoba haoenei phainei hai lauko ngühlang künbü hautikei, ‘Künei ho müt kün thüka choba la lemang asühda.’
“Ladang hao choba lela songdak hau sungletan longeikei, haoenei namseibü ka ku lai pailetkeije ngela shanga haoei sambü shuong aoyou la nam jankukei khübü dan hao jungto ngabala haoei ngühkhüm kukei.
Shaangbou loukei hoba laukei, ‘Yaangbou, kaibü mina khoei mina an paileda.’
Haoei hao to laukei, ‘Thumai sambü maibü! No kümsilei hanbü chenei maang lanan kikeibü, sangnyu an thüka songdakshi.’
Nyiboubü kho loukei hoba laukei, ‘Yaangbou, kaibü minaei ngao aeila paileda.’
Haoei haotokei laukei, ‘Hobaje nokei sangnyu ngao thüka songdakshi.’
“Lubü che loukei hoba laukei, ‘Yaangbou, kaibü mina, laobou ngei neiei sholepan phokei, kho ho yingkei.
Ngo kato hatko kikei aieilausi no maangpon thotakbü müt yingkei; nyi lanei apho khüka nyi sungda hoba nyi lanei awen khüka nyi latda.’
Yaangenbou khoei hao to laukei, ‘Müt amaibou, ka sembung ka ngei ka mat jembho. Ngo maangpon thotakbü müt, khei ngei awenbü ka latda, dogo nyi ngo ngekei laushi lo?
Kholongaje nyi ngeibü nam thanshanga aila aphoku? Khei yingsije ngo longeijinei phobnam yoan hapbhoulabü.’
“Haoei nyangko loan kibü shuong to laukei, ‘Hao ka mina kho hiashi hoba mina an kibou khola kuyoashi.’
Haoenei hao to laukei, ‘Yaangbou, haoei mina an kia!’
‘Ngei kan to lenda, aoyouei ki haoen la aei kuyolabü, hoba aoei ai haoei ai ki khokei hao ka ngailanglabü.
Lausikei ngeibü dangbou shuong, aoyouei ngo haoen thüka choba la lemang asüh, haoen kho hato leiba hoba kü thedanga haitiashi!’ ”
Jisuei kho lauan phaia, hao Jerusalem to thedangto hauteikei.
Ladang hao Bethfage si Bethani nyangko Oliv shongh dogo laubou shuipem chenei sühlangkei, haoei haoeibü eik nyi hautiko
laukei, “Kasi thedang kabü sang khüto atashi. Kasi khüto atsi kasiei, ladangkei müt setan achühbü gadu shoushou che phenan haplabü. Kho sengashi hoba sungba.
Hobaje müt atei kasi to, ‘Aila kasiei kho sengletda?’ dogo phesije, kasiei hai laujan: ‘Bunyubouei khamakei.’ ”
Ngühlang künbü shuong haukei hoba ajanjan pendou haoei haosi la lenbü tegü kikei.
Haosiei gadu shoushou sengletko kijinei kho bunyuei haosi to laukei, “Kasiei aila ho sengda”?
Haosiei laukei, “Bunyubouei khamakei.”
Haosiei Jisu jungto kobakei, hoba ladang haoenei kho gadu shoushou thüka nei imbukei, Jisu kho thüka settikei.
Hao hauko kijinei haoenei haoeneibü neisimei lama imbukei.
Ladang hao sangnyu nyangshangko Oliv shonghshui ka louyenko kikei, eikshuong tan pendouei haoenei hapbü maangpanglabü kümsilei pendou shanga olinangko Mühghaü la nyensang kula khangko
laukei, “Bunyubou nyena Choba tegü ao louada hao haülabou yingshi; khuthüka sangmai, khuthük suokboua soneikangbü.”
Shuong yo ka Farisibü atei hao to laukei, “Lenbou, ka eikshuong to hakashi.”
Haoei jongaikei, “Ngei kan to lenda, haoen semele kialonga habü laang shuongei ngekyolabü.”
Ladang hao chunga nyangko loukei hoba sangnyu kho hapbei haoei haapbo
laukei, “Nyi, khei, tat sangmai shangabü ho ongkei ngean kiteikei yingma! Lausikei khübü kho ka nyek ka huletan kia.
Aishanga ka jungto chalou shuong loulabü, laobounei kaibü labou shuongei no shilabü, laangbaei leleplabü hoba kaoen pendou ae jembo khinleplabü;
haoenei no hoba ka shousi shuong kaoa yeptiko shemtilabü, hoba kala laang che thüka che üpyokulabü, aieilausi nyi Mühghaü no pean chühla loubü jih ashen.”
Hao lembüchem to atkei, hoba namseibü shuong shian sattiko,
haoen to laukei, “Laishibaei lenda, ‘Kü chem kho welaushang chem yinglabü’; lausikei kanei ho kokbü shuongeibü laangpob la yeitia.”
Haoei chalou angbüa lembü- chema lenkei, lausikei thükkabü ungshedbü shuong, hoba Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong hoba mütshuongeibü khukabü shuongei hao haitilabü lam lambei.
Lausikei, ai kümlaje haoenei alamen, aishanga mütshuong pendouei maangtakko hao to ditko kikei.
Nyetche, Jisu Lembüchema mütshuong la lenko hoba Ngühlang Maibü songlenko kijinei, thükkabou ungshedbü shuong hoba Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong jaishou shuong yoa liko loukei,
hoba hao to laukei, “Nyi habü ho ai hauei kümdaje kün la lenbü. Ho hau aoei kala kukei?”
Haoei haoen to jongaikei, “Ngeikei kan ka ngüh che phelabü: Küla lenbü,
Johaneibü baptibü kho khuthük ka si müt ka?”
Haoenei haoen yoa hai lauko joyokei, “Senei ‘Khuthük ka’, dogo laualonga, haoei, ‘Kanei aila hao to maialem?’, dogo laulabü.
Lausikei senei ‘Müt ka’, dogo laualonga mütshuong pendouei sen to laangei sonlabü; aishanga Johan kho thuseibü che yingkei dogo haoenei mailema.”
Kho lakabü yingkeije haoenei angekei dogo haoenei jongaikei.
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Hobaje ngei habü kho ai hauei kümdaje ngei kan to alenda.”
Haoei mütshuong la ho ngühphatbü lenkei: “Müt cheei semlühlaak lekei hoba sekham la lela moubü shuong la apyokuan kaonyek saabü to jih lounyu shanga satkei.
Jih sühbüa, khei sekmoubü shuongei hao la semlühlaak ka mai at nakua dogo sambü che koutikei; lausikei sekmoubü shuongei hao ngümeikei hoba ik kong ngaitikei.
Tokei haoei lubü sambü che koutikei; lausikei haoenei haokei ngümeikei hoba himou bautiko jungeikei hoba ik kong ngaitikei.
Tokei haoei semboubü sambü che koutikei; lausikei haoenei haokei leilutikei hoba shian sattikei.
Semlühlaak bunyuei laukei, ‘Ngei ai kümla? Ngei ngei sanoubü hoba jayangshou koutilabü. Haoenei hao to soumo hatlabü.’
Lausikei ladang sekmoubü shuongei hao hapbei, haoenei haoen yoa joyoko laukei, ‘Phet- phanbou kho ho ki; kho phet senei lelabü lele senei hao haitiakho.’
Hobaje haoenei hao semlühlaak ka shian sattikei hoba haitikei.
“Hibü semlühlaak bunyuei haoen to ai kümla?
Hao loulabü hoba haoei khübü sekmoubü shuong kho shemtilabü, hoba semlühlaak kho lubü la kulabü.”
Ladang haoenei kho ditkei haoenei laukei, “Kheinyuje touma!”
Haoei haoen to chühkei hoba laukei, “Kholonga ho Laishiba ngühtet ai:
‘Chemdangbü shuongei laobou laang ale kho chemnyek laang la yeikei’?
Ao kho laang thüka atlaje hao netla yeilabü, hoba ho ao thükto lotlaje hao thamngu la yeiko ngünyinlabü.”

Kho jih khüneitham Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong si ungshedbou shuongei hao to ik shatla lameikei, lausikei haoen mütshuong to hatkei; aishanga haoei kho ngühphatbü haoen khulimbo laukei dogo haoenei ngekei.
Haoenei jihsiphai maibü che chüheikei, hoba haoenei hao haoeibü ngüha mintilabü hoba governor hau hoba songdak hau la hao khümbo kuan apla shanga, aeibou lanan lenko kokpheibü dan litikei.
Haoenei hao to phekei, “Lenbou, nyi laubü hoba lenbü kho tükde dogo künei ngekei, hoba nyi the to chühko akümda, lausikei ngühmaia Mühghaü lam shanga lenda;
künei Kaisar la khüm kujan si akujan?”
Haoei haoeneibü kok lapenkei hoba haoen to laukei,
“Kü la sempak che lenbü. Ho aoeibü noksa hoba ao nyen dokei?” Haoenei laukei, “Kaisareibü.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Kholongaje Kaisareibü Kaisar la kuashi hoba Mühghaüeibü Mühghaü la kuashi.”
Haoenei mütshuong thedanga haoei laubü ngüh ka lapoula athükko kikei; haoei jong- aibü ngüh to haoen maang- pangkei hoba ngüh üangko apbei.
Haibü ka alangngaida dogo laubü Sadukibü at loukei hoba hao to phekei,
“Lenbou, jaisina müt nyi kian che youyik akiko haialonga, na khoei latnyu kho leiyetjan hoba haojai shanga chemdang haatikujan dogo Mosaei kün shanga dokukei.
Tou jaisina müt nyet kiteikei. Jaishoubouei yak che ngakei hoba shousi akiko haikei.
Hobaje nyiboubüei
hoba semboubüei sao lekei; kho tegü müt nyet khümboei sao ngakei; haoenei shousi akitei hoba haikhümbei.
“Thonla yaksa khokei haikei.
Nyibou langngaibüa sao kho aoeibü yak yingla? Aishanga haoen nyet pendouei sao yakla lekei.”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Ho kaodakeibü shousi shuongei chem kanda hoba laolam yaknga kuyoda,
lausikei aoyouei loulabü kaodak pailetla shanga hoba haibü ka langngaila muan ki haoenei chem akanda ayingsi laolam yaknga akuyoda.
Maimaitham haoen haila athükkei, aishanga haoen khuthük hangangbü shuong tegü ki, hoba haibü ka langngaibüa phejan lebüei haoen Mühghaü shousi shuong ki.
Lausikei haibü ka langngaibü shanga Mosaeikei wanlong buham shangabü Laia haoei Bunyubou kho Abraham Mühghaü, Isak Mühghaü hoba Jakob Mühghaü dogo lenakei.
Mühghaü kho haibüeibü aying lausikei langkeibü Mühghaü ki; hao to müt pendou lang kida.”
Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong yoa atei jongaikei, “Lenbou, nyi tükde laua”;
aishanga haoenei hao ka aei phela maangei asom.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Haoenei lai küman Khrista kho Dawideibü Shou dogo lauda?
Dawidei mangkei Nyensang chia lea lauda,
‘Bunyubouei ngeibü Bunyubou to lenkei,
ngei kaibü dangbou shuong ka you nakshang
la ayeiti shongko kü mae aenei setshi.’
Hibü Dawidei hao to Bunyubou dogo ngada; kholonga hao laibü hao shou yingla?”
Haoei mütshuong pendouei ditko hao eikshuong to lenkei,
“Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong, aoyouei nei loubü lean paimang sühda hoba namyak namseishanga salem maikuda, sinagoga thükkabou setshang hoba lemalanga setshang maiboutham kimmang sühda,
aoyouei latnyueibü peisilei khümbuda hoba hela- haangla loubang welauda, haoen to maangsangashi; haoenei shedsikhau yaangbou haplabü.”
Haoei chühantikei hoba keibü danei haoeneibü jongsak lembüchem namphot to jinko hapbei.
Haoei akialebü latnyu cheei poisa penyi jinko hapbei;
hoba haoei laukei, “Ngühmaia ngei kan la lenda, ho shalebü latnyuei haoen pendou to juongbou jina,
aishanga khübü pendou kho haoen kibü keibü ka jinkei, lausikei ho yaksaei sao shalejongle ka saoeibü langkei shanga kibü pendou jinkukei.”
Haoen yoa atei lembüchem hoba hemaibü laang shuong hoba lembüsabüei he maitibü shanga lauyoko kikei. Haoei laukei,
“Kanei chühko kibü habü shuong shanga laang che thüka che alusakko thenan akilabü lele chalou che loulabü.”
Haoenei hao to phekei, “Lenbou, khübü kho ladang ong yingla? Hobaje khübü loushadlamto amaaphilabü ai yingla?”
Haoei laukei, “Kan ayingbü to aleilangtila maangsangashi. Aishanga kü nyena, ‘Ngo hao’, hoba ‘Pienbü jihsiphai kho süha’, dogo lauko loulabü. Haoen phai tesem.
Lausikei ladang kanei wapyosuyo hoba bangku sakku ditlaje temok. Khübü shaang haüthükjan, lausikei thonbü khoyamje alousühlabü.”
Kheijinei haoei haoen to laukei, “Phangei phang khulimbo hoba sangleei sangle khulimbo lolabü;
selo kaang nyilabü hoba kaoen kaoena mühsinou hoba shatsinyat limsilang kilabü; müha hatlalühlabü hoba amaaphilabü yaang kilabü.

Lausikei khübü pendou ühaüthükjinei mütshuongei kan lamlabü hoba shieikoelabü; haoenei kan sinagog to khümbo kuan aplabü hoba kan thünglabü; kü nyen shangabüa kan choba shuong hoba governor shuong jungto leibalabü.
Kan shanga aukabü kula kho jihsiphai maibü yinglabü.
Jongaila shanga jihsiphai asühjinei lamlela tedamei,
aishanga kaibü dangbou aoeikei tokngaila ayingsi khulimbo alauenlabü lele kan la ngüh hoba songsido kulabü.
Kan nyusibouei, jaisinaei, chempenei hoba jenabou shuongei khümbo kuan aplabü, hoba haoenei kan at haitilabü.
Kanei kü to ngüha lebü shanga müt pendouei kan mangsenlabü.
Lausikei kaneibü khu ka khulou pemche ongkei amaulabü.
Thon sühko natenbü danko hanei kaneibü langkei pailetlabü.
“Ladang kanei sepai shuongei Jerusalem kaijeman haplaje, kheijinei kanei sao leilulabü jihsiphai süha dogo ngeashi.
Aoyou Judea a kilaje haoen shongh to satashi; sangnyu maanga kibü shuongei apyoan satashi, hoba aoyou batak aian kilaje haoen sangnyu to tütngai;
aieilausi khübü kho kayang chalou shuong ki; haoen Laishiba ngüh pendou loushadtila shanga loukei.
Khübü chaloua shia künan kibü ayingsi senyopbü yaksa shuong shanga ügütü! Aishanga kaonyeka khonku yaang hoba ho mütli thüka Mühghaü maangshat yaang kilabü.
Haoen inlouei tuonglabü, haoen phang pendou to lang senlabü, hoba Küksithangeibü pienbü chalou aloushad shongko Jerusalem kho Küksithangei nakeila lelabü.
“Chanyu, litnyu hoba khanshoulitshoua amaaphilabü kilabü hoba kaonyudaka phangshuong si hoba deishou ngühyobü langhei maang ngouan shempotham khonsakyolabü;
mütshuongei kaodaka haüthükko loubü hatlabü to chühan maang litilabü, aishanga khuthükbü sei kho nyaakeilabü.
Kheijinei haoenei Müteibü Shou sangmeia sei hoba soneikangbü yaanga louko haplabü.
Ladang khübü haüthükla khanglaje, chühangtiashi, ngüm shingan chühashi, aieilausi kaneibü khümenbü nyangko louda.”
Haoei haoen la ngühphatbü che lenkei: “Bhuklong hoba lubü bunyu pendou to chühashi.
Haoen pik nyemshang longsi lengko, aoei alensikei kanei khüto chühan sulang nepda dogo kanei ngeda.
Kho tegü kanei ladang khübü haüthükko haplaje Mühghaü Sangle nyangko lousüha dogo ngeashi.
Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, habü ho pendou aloushad shongko ho meten adanlabü.
Khuthük si kaodak dankhümlabü, lausikei kü ngüh ladangkei adanlabü.
“Yaübükotbü, ihjaakbü hoba ho langkei maangdühei kaneibü maangpon atsheile ayeitila maangsangashi. Kho Chalou kho kan thükto hakde alottila shanga maangsangashi,
aishanga kaonyudaka kibü pendou thükto ho tin che tegü shemletlabü.
Pianleman kiashi, loushadlabü kibü khübü pendou ka satenlabü, hoba Müteibü Shou thedanga loenlabü lele, jihsiphai pendoua welauko kishi.”
Chaloua haoei lembüchema lenkei, hoba nangnak hao Oliv shongh shui dogo laubü shongh khünei yepbo kikei.
Mütshuong pendouei lembüchema hao ka ditla shanga enyu pian hao jungto louko kikei.
Püetbülem dogo laubü Tokai ajinbü Wentek Lem nyangko kikei.
Ungshedbou shuong hoba Ngühkhüm lenbou shuongei Jisu haitilabü hangsilam lambo kikei; aishanga haoenei mütshuong to hatkei.
Anthüknyi yo kabü che, Iskhariot, dogo laubou Judas maangpon to Satan atkei;
hoba Judas wenjung satkei hoba ungshedbou shuong si lembü- chem lombou leiyeibü shuong to haoei Jisu haoen ik to lai khümbo kuan apla kho sangkukei.
Haoen olinkei hoba hao la nam kula theletkei.
Hao maanghaikei, hoba mütshang akijinei haoen la Jisu khümbo kuan apla shanga jih maibü che chüheikei.
Tokai ajinbü Wentek Lem, laonei Püetbülem sanlon shoushou lemla haitilabü kikei, kho chalou sühkei.
Jisuei Peter si Johan hai lauko hautikei, “Hauashi hoba senei shaula Püetbülem lamleashi.”
Haosiei hao to laukei, “Nyi küsi la ho lanei lamletimang sühda?”
Haoei haosi to laukei, “Ladang kasi sangnyu to atlaje müt cheei thamchaka dei künan kasi to haüyolabü. Hao atbü chem to hao phai semshi,
hoba chem bunyu to hai laushi, ‘Lenbouei kato lauda: Ngei kü eikshuong yoa Püetbülem shaulabü popchem kho lanei ki?’
Haoei kasi la thükkabü popchem yaangbü che jemetsangettian lenlabü. Khonei lamleashi.”
Haosi haukei hoba ajanjan pendou haosi la lenbü tegü yingan kiteikei hoba haosiei Püetbülem khünei lamlekei.
Ladang jihsiphai sühkei hao hoba haoeibü youkoikjai shuong setkei,
hoba haoei haoen to laukei, “Ngo khonakutoua ho Püetbülem kan yoa shaula ngei aeibou maangdühkei,
aishanga ngei kan la lenda, ho nyekchüh Mühghaü Sanglea aloushad shongko ngei ho kan yoa nyibou ashaulabü.”
Kheijinei haoei thung che sungletko Mühghaü la nyensang kukei hoba laukei, “Ho sungletashi hoba kan yoa shomashi;
aishanga ngei kan la lenda, tou ka jaüan Mühghaü Sangle alou shongko ngei semlüh hek dei ayunglabü.”
Haoei Wentek sungan nyensang kuko shaknyinkei hoba haoen la kuko laukei, “Ho kan shanga kubü ngeibü mang. (Ngo damenko hai kümashi.”
Hobaje shauan phaia kho tegü ong haoei thung kho sungko laukei, “Ho thung kü siiei kümbü haanbü theyolanyobü ki; ho kan shanga kouda.)
Lausikei chühashi, aoei ngo yaakshaulabü ki haoeibü ik kü phau denshanga hamakei;
aishanga huongsepbü tegü maimaitham Müteibü Shou hailabü, lausikei hao ao danko khümbo kuan apda hao shangaje ügütü!”
Haoenei haoen yoa laobouei ong ho kümla kima dogo cheei che to pheyola khangkei.
Haoen yoa ao yaangbou yingla dogo haoen wetyo khangkei.
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Kaodak choba shuongei mütli thüka bunyu yeida, hoba haoen thüka hau jungeibü shuong to Thuibou shuong dogo lauda.
Lausikei kan yoaje khei aying; kan yoa yaangshangbou kho nashoubou tegü yingshi, hoba khuleibou kho khangenbou tegü yingshi.
Laobou yaangbou, shaushanga setbou si nongeibou? Shaushang yungshanga setbou kho aying si? Lausikei ngo kan yoa khangenbou che tegü ki.
Kü khonsak pendou dantiko kü yoa thüngbü shuong kho kan ki;
Kübouei küla Sangle che pentibü Kü Sanglea ngeibü shau shang yungshanga shaulabü lele ngei kan pentida;
hoba kanei Israel phang anthüknyi mat jembo choba setshanga setlabü.
“Simon, Simon, kan pendou youshou tegü sipan apla shanga Satanei hileda;
lausikei Simon, kaibü mailemei no athük alottila shanga ngei ka shanga welaua. No ladang haan sepeingailaje, kaibü jaisinasi shuong hau kingaitiashi.”
Peterei jongaikei, “Bunyubou, ngo ka yoa thüngdang to atla hoba hailakei lamleakei.”
Jisuei laukei, “Ngei kala lenda, Peter, nyi ngo angekei dogo semnei alau shongko tat aunak akoulabü.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Ngei kan neimok, nyungkai ayingsi nguok akünko hautijinei kan aieije shalelao?” Haoenei laukei, “Ai aying.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Lausikei touje aoei neimok kije jungashi, hoba nyungkaikei, hoba aoei inlou aki, haoei haoeibü mangyuk yakashi hoba che jekashi.
Ngei kan to lenda, Laishiba laobouei, ‘Hobaje hao ngühkhüm lulimbü dan yoa weoukei’, dogo laukei kho kü to loushatda.”
Haoenei laukei, “Chüha, Bunyubou, hanei inlou penyi kia.” Haoei haoen to laukei, “Khoei soua!”
Haoei apyokei hoba hao hanghangbü tegü Oliv Shongh to haukei; hoba eikshuongei hao phai sembei.
Ladang haoei kaoen sühkei haoei haoen to laukei, “Kan takteibü to aloulabü shanga welauashi.”
Hao haoen ka jutak shijo thüng banglangkei, hoba khüpetko welaukei,
“Abou, nyi maangangsije ho thung kü ka langkai; lausikei kü maang aying, nyi maangangbü kümshi.”
Khuthük ka khuthük hangangbü che louan hao hau kingaitikei.
Hao aeibou khonkukei hoba aei kaangko welaukei, hoba haoeibü lemli dei sii kao to sangbü tegü yeikei.
Hao welaubü ka loenan eikshuong jungto loukei, hoba haoen maangmaubü ka yepan hapbei.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Kan aila yepan kida? Pienashi hoba kan takteibü to alotla shanga welauashi.”
Haoei kho lauko kitoua mütshang che lousühkei, hoba Judas nyenbü, Anthüknyi yoa che kho thedang lean kikei. Haoei hao to sembung shepla shanga Jisu nyangko loukei.
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Judas, nyi sembung shepbo Müteibü Shou khümbo kuan apda lo?”
Loushadla kümbo kibü kho hapan hao phai sembü shuongei laukei, “Bunyubou, künei küneibü inei wapbo no?”
Haoen yo ka cheei thükkabou ungshedboueibü sambü to wapbei hoba mae nou shipan apbukei.
Lausikei Jisuei laukei, “Thakashi! Khüae leshi!” Hobaje haoei kho müteibü nou to jungkei hoba maitikukei.
Jisuei hao khulimbo loubü ungshedbou shuong, lembüchem lombü leiyeibü shuong hoba jaishou shuong to laukei, “Kokbüsembü müt khulimbo loubü tegü kan in si juthep japan louda lo?
Ngo kan yoa liko kijinei kü khu limbo ik ashing. Lausikei ho kaneibü jihsiphai; touje nakthühei songdakda.”
Haoenei hao lapan leilangkei hoba thükkabou ungshedbou chem to leibakei. Peterei tangküng heeko sembei.
Ladang haoenei khongchia wan jikkei, haoen pendou setkei hoba Peterkei haoen yoa setyokei.
Sambü-medei cheei hao wanlong junga setan hapbei hoba hao to tangko chühkei. Saoei laukei, “Ho mütkei hao yoa kiteikei.”
Lausikei Peterei hao athelet hoba laukei, “Yaksa, ngei hao angekei.”
Longche kian müt cheei hao hapbei hoba laukei, “Nokei haoen yoa che yingkei.” Lausikei Peterei laukei, “Ji, ngo aying.”
Angh che thüng kian phaia lubü müt cheei chongchingko shean laukei, “Toknoklabü aki ho müt ho hao yoa kikei, aishanga hao Galilbü yingkei.”
Lausikei Peterei laukei, “Nyi ai laudaje ngei angekei.” Khoyam, haoei lauko kitoua aunakei koukei.
Jisuei sepeikei hoba Peter to chühkei, hoba Peterei Jisuei hao to, “Aunak akoutoua nyi ngo tat semnei sühko atheletlabü”, dogo laubü damenkei.
Hao ngaikei hoba kaang haapbei.
Hao to hatan kibü shuongei hao to nyikuko hoba ngümeiko kikei.
Haoenei haoeibü thenyek yuklepbukei hoba hao to phekei, “Kato ngümbou kho ao? Tetenashi!”
Hobaje haoenei hao khulimbo Mühghaü nyikubü ngüh juong laukei.
Ladang lang ngekei, mütli jaishou shuong, hoba ungshedbou shuong si Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong takshatkei hoba haoenei hao Thükkabou Kambü to leian hauko
laukei, “No Khrista yingsije kün la lenbü.” Haoei haoen to laukei, “Ngei lenalonga kanei maialemlabü;
hoba ngei kan ka phealonga, kanei ajongailabü.
Tou ka jaüan Müteibü Shou Mühghaü sei mae aenei setan kilabü.”
Haoen pendouei laukei, “Khülonga no Mühghaü Shou lo?” Haoei haoen to laukei, “Ngo hao dogo kanei lauda.”
Haoenei laukei, “Sen shanga aukabü aei ai kümsilei ki? Senei lolokei hao sembung ka kho dida.”
Haoen shuong pendou loenkei hoba Jisu Pilat thedangto leibakei.
Hobaje haoenei hao attila khangko laukei, “Ho mütei kün mütli ayingbü to leilangko, Kaisar la khüm kubü shiletko, hoba hao lolo hao Khrista choba ki dogo lauko künei hapbei!”
Pilatei hao to phekei, “No Jihudabü Choba lo?” Haoei hao to jongaikei, “Kho nyi lauda.”
Pilatei ungshedbou shuong si noknyüh to laukei, “Ngei ho müt to shedbü ai alapenda;”
lausikei haoenei aei ong kaangbou laukei, “Haoei Judea pendoua lenko mütshuong pühnyintida; haoei Galila khangkei hoba tou hao hanei kia.”
Ladang Pilatei kho ditkei haoei kho müt Galilbü yinglaoje dogo phekei,
hoba ladang haoei Jisu kho Herod songdak kommang kabü dogo damenkei, haoei hao Herod jungto leian hautikei, aieilausi haokei kho jihsiphaia Jerusalema kiteikei.
