Ladang Herodei Jisu hapbei, hao aeibou olinkei; haoei chalou lounyu ka hao chühmang sühko kikei, aieilausi haoei hao shangabü ditan kikei, hoba haoei amaaphilabü at kümbü to chühla haoei dambo kikei.
Haoei hao to ngüh juong phekei, lausikei Jisuei hao to ai ajongai.
Ungshedbou shuong si Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong maangshat lamlam hao attiko khünei lokei.
Herod hoba haoeibü sepai shuongeikei hao aeibou aweasüngko hoba nyikuko jungeikei; kheijinei haoei hao thükto soneibü nei neikukei hoba hao Pilat jungto leian ngaitikei.
Khünyet Herod si Pilat cheei che to thangbou la yeikei; thedangtoje haosi dangbou kikei.
Pilatei ungshedbou shuong, leiyeibü shuong hoba mütshuong pendou chela ngashaikei,

hoba haoen to laukei, “Kanei ho müt kü jungto mütshuong ayinglamto leilangbou che tegü leibuakei. Ngei hao kan thedanga phanan chüha hoba ngei kanei hao khulimbo sungbabü khünei hao shedlabü lele aikei ühüpou;
ayingsi Herodeikei alapen aishanga haoei hao sen la leian ngaitikuakei. Haoei haila muko aikei akümbei.
Hibü ngei hao semeilabü hoba litilabü.”
(Püetbülem weko Pilatei haoen la thüngdang kabü che litikujan.)
Lausikei mütshang pendouei ngekkei, “Kho müt haitiashi; kün la Baraba litikuashi.”
Baraba kho haoei sangkhu limbo khüpyobü shanga hoba müt haitibü shanga thüngdang to jinkei.
Pilatei Jisu litimang sühko haoen to nyibou la joyokei;
lausikei haoenei, “Peiseia thüngashi, hao peiseia thüngashi!” dogo ngekdang lekei.
Haoei haoen to semboula lenkei, “Aila, haoei ai amaibü kümbei? Ngei hao to hailabü kayang muko ai ühüpenda. Hibü ngei hao to semlabü hoba litilabü.”
Lausikei haoenei kaang ngekko hao haoenei mangsühbü tegü peiseia thüngashi dogo aeibou thungeikei, hoba haoenei ngekbüei thükan apbei.
Hibü Pilatei haoenei mangsühbü sakkula janthetkei.
Haoei haoenei mangsühbü müt, ao khüpyobü hoba müt haitibü shanga thüngdang to jinan kibou kho litikukei; lausikei Jisu, haoenei mangsühbü tegü haoei kuan apbei.
Haoenei hao leilangjinei Kurinibü Simon, yen ka louko kibü lapbei, hoba Jisu phainei pean semtila shanga peisei kho hao la tonan jinkukei.
Mütshang yaang hao phainei yangkei, hoba yaksa shuong khüklang to jangngailangko hao shanga manghaapbo sembei.
Jisuei haoen ae sepeikei hoba laukei, “Jerusalem nouyangshou shuong, kü shanga tühaap, aeiko kan shanga hoba kaneibü shousi shuong shanga bouje haapashi,
aishanga jihsiphai che louada, laonei mütshuongei hai laulabü, ‘Angkongbü shuong, ladangkei na abukbü shuong, hoba ladangkei na ayopbü shuong olinbou.’
Kheijinei haoenei shongh shuong to laulabü, ‘Kün thükto lotkai’, hoba shonghshou to laulabü, ‘Kün küplepkai.’
Aishanga mütshuongei bunyu sangtinga khei kümsije, kho linan phaia ai kümla?”
Amaibü kümbü shuong, lubü müt nyi, hao yoa haitila shanga leian haukei.
Hobaje ladang haoen “Khulo”, dogo nyenbü kaoen to loukei, haoenei hao khünei peiseia thüngkei, hoba amaibü kümbü müt nyi che maenei hoba che nanaenei peiseia thüngkei.
Jisuei laukei, “Abou, haoen la amai apbushi; haoenei ai kümdaje kho haoenei angekei.” Haoenei phaang pakko haoeibü neisimei haoen yoa jankei.
Mütshuongei khüto chühko lokei. Leiyeibü shuongeikei nyikuko laukei, “Haoei lubü shuong püetkei; ho müt Mühghaüei pienbü Khrista yinga longa, hao lolo püetashi.”
Sepai shuongeikei hao to nyikukei. Haoen hao jungto loukei hoba hao la haijepbü dei kuko
laukei, “No Jihudabü Choba yingsije, no lolo püetashi.”
Khünei tokei hao thüka, “HO JIHUDABÜ CHOBA” dogo doan kikei.
Amaibü kümbü peiseia saüan phobü cheei hao khulimbo nyikula khangko laukei, “No Khrista aying si? No lolo püetashi hoba küsikei püetkai.”
Lausikei che khoei hao to hakko laukei, “Nyije Mühghaü to ongkei ühütda lo? Nokei hao to jeteibü kayanga kia.
Seti shangaje ho janbü ki, aishanga setieije setieibü kümsilei mubü hapngaida, lausikei ho müteije ai shedbü akümbei.”
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Jisu, no kaibü Sanglea loujinei ngo damenashi.”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Ngei ngühmaia kato lenda, tat no kü yoa Paradaisa kilabü.”
Tou ho chajihbou kikei. Kaonyek pendoua angh sem jih asühshongko nakthüh lotkei,
hoba chanyu ngesakbü ohauko apbei; hoba lembüchema thangbü nei jenyu ka jitthetkei.
Jisuei ngüh yaangbüei ngekko laukei, “Abou, ka ik to kü soushou kuda”; hoba haoei kho lauan phaia hao haikei.
Ladang saongao thükkabouei haüthükbü kho hapbei haoei Mühghaü la soneikangbü kuko laukei, “Maimaitham ho müt saopobü kiteikei.”
Khünei jichühko shaibü mütshang pendouei ai haüthükkei kho hapbei hoba haoeneibü khüklanga jangngaiko haapbo ngaikei.
Lausikei hao ngean kibü shuong pendou heebüa lokei. Kho tegü Galil ka hao phai sembü yaksa shuong pendouei tangkünga khübü pendou to chühko lokei.
Müt che Josef dogo nyenan, daman chühbou che kikei.
Ho mütei haoeneibü huonsiyou hoba kümsilei aineikei ayo. Hao Jihudabü sangnyu che, Arimathia ka kikei, hoba hao Mühghaü Sangle haiyeiko kikei.
Hao Pilat jungto haukei hoba Jisueibü mang hiletkei.
Haoei kho sungletan nei inyaibüei shokei, hoba aokei khünan achühbü laang ka jakenbü hee chenei hao khünkei.
Ho Lamlebü chalou kikei, hoba Nounyet sühko kikei.
Hao yoa Galil ka loubü yaksa shuong phainei sembei, hoba haoenei hee hoba haoeibü mang lai khünkei kho hapbei.
Hobaje haoen ngaian ponlem si onang lamlekei. Lausikei haoenei ngühkhümei sakkubü tegü Nounyet haksokei.
Lausikei balea shaangbounyet, ngeyang enyu, haoenei lamlebü ponlem onang jungan hee to loukei.
Haoenei laang kho heekhün ka khokan apan hapbei,
lausikei ladang haoen atkei haoenei Bunyubou Jisu mang kho ühüp.
Haoen kho shanga maang phenyembo kitoua, müt nyi soneibü nei lean loukei hoba haoen junga lokei.
Yaksa shuong hatkei hoba haoeneibü thenyek kao ae yeikei, lausikei müt nyi khoei haoen to laukei, “Kanei aila haibü yoa langkei kibou lameida?
(Hao hanei aki; hao langngaia.) Hao Galila kijinei haoei kan to lai laukei kho damenashi,
khei Müteibü Shou shabü shuongeibü ik to khümbo kuan aplabü, peiseia thünglabü hoba sembounyet nyibou langngailabü.”
Haoenei haoeibü ngüh shuong damenkei,
hoba ladang haoen hee ka ngaikei haoenei khübü pendou Anthükche khola hoba joubü shuong pendou la lenkei.
Haoen Mari Magdalin, Joana, hoba Jakob nyu Mari; hoba lubü yaksa shuong yoan haoenei youkoikjai shuong la ajanjan pendou lenkei.
Yaksa shuongei lenbü kho pendou haoen la amlangbü la yeikukei hoba youkoikjai shuongei haoen to maialem.
(Lausikei Peter loenkei hoba heedang to langkei, hoba haoei sühlangan semlitisi haoei nei inyaibü kho ong hapbei; ai haüthükkei khüto maangpangko hao chem to ngaikei.)
Haoeibü eik yoa müt nyi khünyet, Jerusalem ka mail nyet thüng hean, Emos dogo nyenbü sang che to hauko kikei;
hoba ai ong haüthükkei khübü pendou shangabü haosi lauyoko hauko kikei.
Haosi lenyo lauyoko kijinei, Jisu nyangko loukei hoba haosi yoto haukei,
lausikei haosiei ashen.
Jisuei haosi to laukei, “Kasi lam sünga ai shangabü lauyoko paida?” Haosi khün the khüman lokei.
Haosi yoa müt che, Kleopa nyenbüei hao to jongaikei, “Jerusalem to loubü yenbou yoa tat ngiet ai haüthükkei kho angebüje no ong yingakei lo?”
Haoei haosi to laukei, “Ai yingkei?” Haosiei hao to laukei, “Nazaretbü Jisu, ao Mühghaü hoba müt pendou thedanga ngüh hoba kümsileia sei kakbü thuseibü che kikei,
hoba küneibü ungshedbou shuong hoba khuleibü shuongei hao haitilabü shanga khümbo kuan apbei, hoba hao peiseia thüngkei.
Hobaje künei hao kho Israelbü deletlabü müt che yingkei dogo dambo kiteikei. Lausikei khei ayingtei, aishanga, khüto liman, haüthükan phaia tatei sembounyet yinga.
Kün yo kabü yaksa shuong atei kün moktikei. Haoen hee to enyu haukei;
haoenei haoeibü mang ühüp, lausikei haoenei khuthük hangangbü mangsang hapbei hoba hao lang kia dogo haoen to lenkei dogo lauko longeikei.
Hobaje kün yoa kibü at heedang to haukei, hoba yaksa shuongei lenbü tegü kikei, lausikei haoje haoenei ühüp.”
Haoei haosi to laukei, “Kan ngoubü mütshuong! Thuseibü shuongei lenan kibü pendou to mailemla kan latetche kit khaikei!
Khrista kho khonkuan phaia haoeibü soneikangbü to atlabü kümsilei aying si?”
Hobaje Mosa ka khangan hoba thuseibüa sühko haoei Laishiba phang pendou ka hao shangabü dobü wanan lenkei.
Haoenei haoen hauko kibü sang nyangko loukei, hoba hao saabou haula kibü tegü hanglenkei;
lausikei haosiei hao haosi yoa setngaila sukojako laukei, “Chasemlam süha hoba chanyu nepla kümda.” Hibü hao haosi yoa sühla haukei.
Ladang hao haosi yoa setkei haoei wentek jungkei hoba haükuko shaknyinkei hoba haosi la kukei.
Haosieibü nyek khitkei, hoba haosiei hao shenkei; hoba hao haosi jungka mauan apbei.
Haosi cheei che to laukei, “Haoei lama seti to joyojinei hoba seti to Laishiba ka ngühtet wanan lenjinei setieibü maang- pon to lambei aying lo?”
Haosi khoyam loenkei hoba Jerusalem to ngaikei; khünei haosiei Anthükche kho hapbei hoba haoen yoa lubü shuongkei chela kaman kikei.
Haoenei, Bunyubou kho tükde langngaia hoba Simon to longan lena dogo lauko kikei.
Kho tegü Emos kabü müt nyi khoei lama ai haüthükkei hoba wentek shaknyinjinei haosiei hao lai shenkei kho ngetikei.
Ladang haoen yoa khübü shangabü lauyoko kikei hao haoen yoa lokei hoba haoen to laukei, “Kan yoa sangmai kishi.”
Haoenei sou hapda dogo daman haoen mokde apyokei hoba hat- yokei.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Kan aila kheinyu maangpon shaleyoda? Kanei aila maanga hainyu shuyoda?
Ngeibü ik hoba you to chühashi; ho ngo yingkei. Kü to meitiashi hoba chühashi; kanei kü to hapbü tegü soushou la phejak si lo aki.”
(Haoei kho lauan phaia haoei haoen la haoeibü ik hoba you lenkei.)
Haoenei khün sühkokei maialem, hibü haoen olinbüei shenan maangpangyoko kijinei haoei haoen to laukei, “Kanei han denche shaula kilao?”
Haoenei hao la ngau thungbü pem che hean kukei.
Haoei kho sungletkei hoba haoen thedanga shaukei.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Mosa Ngühkhüm, Thuseibü hoba Nyensang Chiaa kü shangabü dobü pendou loushadlabü kümsilei dogo ngo kan yoa kijinei ngei kan la lenbü kho ho ki.”
Kheijinei haoei Laishiba ditenlabü shanga haoeneibü maangpon ipbukei;
hoba haoei haoen to laukei, “Laishibaei lenbü kho ho ki: Khrista kho khonkujan, hoba sembounyeta haibü ka langngaijan,
hoba hao nyena maangpon sepeibü hoba shabü ap shanga Jerusalem ka khangan phangshuong pendou la songlenlabü.
Khübü aukabü kho kan ki.
Hobaje ngei Kübouei theletbü kan la hautikulabü kia; lausikei thükae ka kan thükto sei alot shongko kan sangnyua setjan.”
Haoei haoen Bethani aeto leilangkei, hoba haoeibü ik shingan haoen haükukei.
Haoei haoen haükuko kian hao haoen ka bangkei, hoba khuthük to anlangkei.
Haoenei hao lembei hoba olinbü yaangei Jerusalem to longeikei;
hoba haoenei haoeneibü jihsiphai khümbo lembüchema Mühghaü nyen sangko dantikei.
Kaodak moyaüjineithama Ngüh kiteikei. Ngüh kho Mühghaü yoa kikei hoba Mühghaü to jetei kikei.
Büngla khangla hao Mühghaü yoa kiteikei.
Ajanjan pendou hao danko ong kümbei, hoba hao ayokoje aikei aküm.
Langkei pendou hao ka pakkei, hoba langkei kho khunak shousi ngesakbü kikei.
Ngesakbüei nakthüh phanga hauda, hoba nakthühei kho ladangkei anyetti.
Mühghaü ka hautibü müt che kiteikei; hao nyen Johan kikei.
Hao danko pendouei mailemtila shanga ngesakbü shangabü ngüh chung künla hao aukabü shanga loukei.
Ngesakbü kho hao aying, lausikei hao ngesakbü shangabü ngühchung künla loukei.
Müt pendou ngesaktibou, tükdebü ngesakbü kho kaodak to louko kikei.
Hao kaodaka kiteikei, hoba kaodak kho hao danko longkei, khei yingasikei kaodakei hao ange.
Hao jembü chem to loukei, lausikei haoeibü jembü mütliei hao asunglet.
Lausikei aoyouei hao sungletkei, haoen la Mühghaü shousi shuong yeila hau kukei.
Haoen müteibü haang ka aying, ayingsi mütei maangangbü ka aying, lausikei Mühghaü ka loukei.
Ngüh khoei müt la yeikei hoba sen yoa kikei hoba haoeibü soneikangbü, onou hoba ngühmaiei shenan, Boueibü Jayangshou soneikangbü senei hapbei.
Johanei hao shangabü aukabü künkei hoba ngekkei, “Ngei ao shangabü, ‘Ao kü phaito louada, hao küto yaangbou, aishanga hao küto shaang kiteikei’, dogo laukei kho hao ki.”
Haoeibü atakenbü keisiyaang ka senei onoubü jongsak che phainei che sungletkei;
aishanga Ngühkhüm kho Mosa danko kukei; onou hoba ngühmai Jisu Khrista danko loukei.
Aoeikei Mühghaü hapan achühkei; lausikei, tükdebü, Bou jungkabou, Mühghaü-Jayangshouei ong sen la hao tang khittia.
Ladang Jihudabüei Jerusalem ka Johan to, “No ao” dogo phela ungshedbü shuong si Levibü shuong hautikei, haoeibü aukabü ho kikei:
“Ngo Messia aying!” Kho haoei aeibou haüko theletkei.
Haoenei hao to phekei, “Kholonga ai? No Elija sai?” Haoei laukei, “Ngo ji!” “No Thuseibü sai?” Haoei jongaikei, “Aying!”
Haoenei hao to laukei, “No ao? Künei kün hautibou la jongaibü kujan yingkei. Nyi ka shangabü ai lenla?”
Haoei laukei, “‘Bunyubou lamnyu tangshaitham kümashi’, dogo yama müt atei ngekbou kho ngo.”
Haoen Farisibü shuongei hautikei,
hoba haoenei hao to phekei, “No Messia aying. Elija aying, Thuseiboukei aying longa, kholonga nyi aila baptikuda?”
Johanei haoen to jongaikei, “Ngei deia baptikuda. Kan yoa che loakei, ao kanei ange;
kü phaito loulabou kho hao yingkei. Ngo haoeibü nguoklüh sengkula amukei.”
Habü ho Johanei baptikushang Jordan thidang Bethania haüthükkei.
Nyibounyet haoei Jisu hao jungto louko hapbei, hoba haoei laukei, “Chühashi! Kaodak shabü künlangbou, Mühghaü Sanshoushou.
‘Kü phaito müt che loulabü, ao kü to thükkabou ki; aieilausi hao kü to shaang kiteikei’, dogo lenko ngei ao shangabü laukei, kho hao.
Ngeikei hao ashenkei, lausikei hao Israel la tang khittila shanga ngei deia baptikuko loukei.”
Hobaje Johanei hai lauko aukabü kukei, “Ngei khuthük ka Soushou dukutuk tegü louyenan, hao to pakko hapbei.
Ngei hao angeen, lausikei ngo deia baptikula hautibouei kü to laukei, ‘Nyi ao thükto Soushou louyenan pakko hapbei, hao kho Soushou Saopobüa baptikubou ki.’
Ngei ho hapa, hoba hao kho Mühghaü Shou dogo ngei aukabü küna.”
Toukei, nyibounyet Johan haoeibü eik müt nyi yoa loan kikei.
Jisu paiko kibü to chühan haoei laukei, “Chühashi, Mühghaü Sanshoushou.”
Haoeibü eik müt nyiei haoei laubü ditkei hoba haosi Jisu phai sembei.
Jisuei sepeian chühngaikei, hoba ladang haoei haosi sembo hapbei, haoei haosi to laukei, “Kasiei ai lamda?” Haosi ei hao to laukei, “Rabai (tetlabü, Lenbou), no lanei kida?”
Haoei haosi to laukei, “Kaiya, hoba kasiei haplabü.” Hibü haosi haukei hoba hao kishang hapbei, hoba haosi khünyet hao yoa kikei. Kho chasem angh lei thünga kiteikei.
Johanei laubü ditan Jisu phai sembü müt nyi yoa cheje Simon Petereibü na Andria kiteikei.
Haoei tongde haojai Simon hapbei hoba hao to laukei, “Künei Messia (tetlabü, Naangenbou) hapa.”
Haoei hao Jisu jungto leibakei. Jisuei hao to chühkei hoba laukei, “No Jona shou Simon, no Kefa (laobou Peter dogo sepeikei, tetlabü, ‘Laangnyudak’) dogo nyenlabü.”
Nyibounyet Jisu Galil to haumang sühkei, hoba haoei Filip hapbei. Jisuei hao to laukei, “Kü phai semshi.”
Filip kho Andria si Peter habü sang Bethsaida ka kiteikei.
Filipei Nathaniel hapbei hoba hao to laukei, “Künei Nazaret kabü Josef shou Jisu, ao shanga Mosa Ngühkhüma hoba thuseibü shuongei dokei, kho müt hapa.”
Nathanielei hao to laukei, “Nazaret ka aiche maibü longlep si?” Filipei hao to laukei, “Louan chühashi.”
Jisuei Nathaniel hao jungto louko hapbei hoba hao shangabü laukei, “Tükdebü Israelbü, aeibou lanbü müt che hato chühashi.”
Nathaniel ei hao to laukei, “Nyi ngo lai ngekei?” Jisuei jongaikei, “Filipei no angajinei, no bhuklong che phanga kian ngei no hapbei.”
Nathaniel ei jongaikei, “Lenbou, no Mühghaü Shou; no Israel bü Choba.”
Jisuei jongaikei, “Ngei no bhuklong phanga hapbei dogo lenbü shanga nyi mailemda lo? Nyi khübü to yaangbou haplabü.”
Hobaje haoei hao to laukei, “Maimaitham ngei ngühmaia kan pendou to lenda, kanei khuthük ipan haplabü hoba Mühghaü khuthük hangangbü shuong Müteibü Shou thüka angko louyenko haplabü.”
Sembounyeta Galila Kana sanga chemkanbü kikei, hoba Jisueibü nyukei khünei kiteikei.
Jisu si hao eikshuong pendou kho chemkanbü lem to ngakei.
Ladang ih khümbei, Jisueibü nyuei hao to laukei, “Haoenei ih aki.”
Jisuei sao to laukei, “Yaksa, aila nyi küla kipjim kuda?” Ngeibü jih asühkei.
Hao nyuei sambü shuong to lenkei, “Haoei kan la ai ong lenlaje kümashi.”
Tou Jihudabü saüenbü songa kibü tegü, che chenei jephot nyi si sem atbü, laang ka jakenbü ilechak pem lak tenan kikei.
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Ilechak kho deiei shentishi.” Haoenei khübü kho sopbo shentikei.
Kheijinei haoei haoen to laukei, “Tou at khuenashi, hoba lembubou jungto jungan haushi.” Hobaje haoenei kho khuenkei.
Lem bunyuei, ih la yeitibü dei kho jepan chühkei, dei khubü sambü shuongei ngeasikei, kho lakabüje haoei ange. Haoei chemkanbou kho ngakei
hoba hao to laukei, “Müt pendouei shaang ih maibou kho shomda, hoba müt juongbouei yungan phaia ong amaishangbou shomda, lausikei nyi tou sühko ih maibü kho phoakei.”
Jisuei kho Galil kabü Kana sanga haoeibü shaangbou amaaphilabü kümbei, hoba haoeibü soneikangbü lenkei; hoba hao eikshuongei hao to mailembei.
Kho phaia hao, nyu, haonasi shuong hoba haoeibü eikshuong Kapernaum to yankei, hoba haoen khünei bale shijo thüngkei.
Jihudabü Püetbü Lem nyangko kikei hoba Jisu Jerusalem to angkei.
Lembüchema haoei masu, sanlon hoba dukutuk yakbü shuong hoba namjeibü dan setan hapbei.
Haoei semlabü lühthep kümbei hoba san si masu yoan pendou lembüchem ka shian sattikei. Haoei namjeibü shuongeibü namnet sakletkukei hoba haoeneibü denshang khokan apbukei,
hoba dukutuk yakbü shuong to laukei, “Habü ho haka langashi; Küboueibü chem namseishang la teyeiti.”
“Ka chem maangtakbüei ngo lonlabü” dogo Laiei laubü kho haoeibü eikshuongei damenkei.
Jihudabü shuongei hao to laukei, “Habü kümsilei kümbü danko nyi ai amaaphilabü kün la lenda?”
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Ho lembüchem leiluashi hoba chalou sema ngei phonlabü.”
Kheijinei Jihudabüei laukei, “Ho lembü- chem dangla po saonyito lak lea, nyi ho chalou sema phonngailep lo?”
Lausikei haoeibü mang lembüchem shangabü lauko kiteikei.
Ladang hao haibü ka langngaikei, haoei ho laukei dogo haoeibü eikshuongei damenkei; hoba haoenei Laishiba ngüh, hoba Jisuei laubü ngüh to mailembei.
Püetbülem chaloua, Jisu Jerusalema kijinei, haoei kümbü amaaphilabü hapan müt juongei hao to mailembei.
Lankei, Jisuei haoen to maangalem, aishanga haoei müt pendou ngekei
hoba müt shangabü aukabü künla aokei akham, aishanga müt to ai ki kho haoei ngekei.
Farisibü che Nikodema nyenbü Jihudabü leiyeibü che,
nangnak Jisu jungto loukei, hoba hao to laukei, “Lenbou, no Mühghaü ka lenbou che tegü loukei dogo künei ngekei, aishanga Mühghaü hao yoa ayolonga, aoeikei nyi kümbü amaaphilabü habü ho akümen.”
Jisuei jongaikei, “Maimaitham ngühmaia ngei kala lenda, mütei thükae ka abukngai shongko Mühghaü Sangle hapla athük.”
Nikodemaei hao to laukei, “Müt baushi sinan hao lai küman bukla? Haonyueibü shimung to atngaian bukla thüklep lo?”
Jisuei jongaikei, “Maimaitham ngühmaia ngei kato lenda, mütei dei hoba soushou danko abuklonga, haoei Mühghaü Sangle to atla athükkei.
Müt mang ka ai bukkei kho phe hoba soushou ka ai bukkei kho soushou.
Ngei kato, ‘Kan pendou thükae ka bukngaijan’, dogo laubüei maang tepang.
Yeiei lae soumang sühdaje khiae souda, hoba nyi kho langh ditda, lausikei kho laka louda hoba lae to hauda kho nyi angekei. Hibü soushoua bukbü pendou kho tegü ki.”
Nikodemaei hao to jongaikei, “Khübü lai küman haüthükla?”
Jisuei laukei, “No Israelbü lenbou che yingan, nyi khübü kho angekei si?
Maimaitham ngühmaia ngei kato lenda, künei künei ngebü shanga lauda, hoba künei hapbü shangabü aukabü kuda; khei yingankei kan aoeikei küneibü aukabü asungletda.
Ngei kaodakbü ngüh lensi kanei maialem longa, ngei khuthükbü ngüh lensije kanei lai mailemla?
Müteibü Shou, ao khuthük ka louyenkei, hao to limanje aokei khuthük to üang.
“Aoyouei mailemda haoen danei hao to ponpen langkei hapla shanga, Mosaei lai yama pinyu tonenkei kho tegü Müteibü Shoukei tonenjan.
Aishanga Mühghaüei kaodak to kheinyutham sanoubü ka aoyouei hao to mailemda ühailabü, lausikei pon- pen langkei hapla shanga hao Shou Jayangshou kukei.
Aishanga khunak shousi la shedbü kutila aying lausikei hao danko khunak shousi khümenla shanga Mühghaüei hao Shou kaodak to yantikei.
Aoei hao to mailemda hao la shedbü aku; aoei maialem hao la shedbü kuan apa, aieilausi haoei Mühghaü Jayangshou to maialem.
Shedbü kubü kho hai; ngesakbü kho kaodak to loua, lausikei mütei ngesakbü ayingko nakthühbouje sanoukei, aishanga haoeneibü kümsilei kho amaibü kikei.
Amaibü kümbü danei ngesakbü mangsenda, hoba haoeibü kümsilei tang khittisi amaibüla dogo ngesakbü to alouda;
lausikei aoei ngühmai kümda haoeibü kümsilei kho Mühghaü to nongan kümbei dogo lenenlabü lele ngesakbü to louda.”
Kho phaia Jisu si hao eikshuong Jihuda kaodak to loukei; hoba hao khünei haoen yoa kikei hoba baptikukei.
Johaneikei Salim nyangko Enona baptikuko kikei, aieilausi kho kaoena dei juongnyu kikei; hoba mütshuong louan baptikuko kikei;
aishanga Johan thüngdang to mojinko kikei.
Johaneibü eik si Jihudabü müt che kanglanga saüenbü hangsilam aoa ngüh pekyokei.
Haoen Johan jungto loukei hoba hao to laukei, “Lenbou, chühashi! Jordan thinei ka yoa ao kikei, ao shangabü nyi aukabü kukei, haoei baptikuda, hoba müt pendou hao jungto hauda.”
Johanei jongaikei, “Khuthük ka hao la aku shongkoje müt cheei aikei sungletla athükkei.
‘Ngo Messia aying, lausikei ngo hao thedangto hautikei’, dogo ngei laubü ngeibü aukabü kho kan danshuong ki.
Aoei leiyetnyu ki hao chemkanbou; lausikei chemkanboueibü thangbou, ao ditko loda, haokei chemkanboueibü ngüh kho ditan aeibou olinda. Hibü ngeibü olin penasoua.
Hao yaangjan hoba ngo hanjan.”
Ao thükae ka louda hao kho pendou thüka ki; ao kaodaka ki hao kaodakbü ki, hoba haoei kaodak hangalama lauda. Ao khuthük ka louda hao kho pendou thüka ki.
Haoei ai hapbei hoba ai ditkei kho shangabü haoei aukabü kuda; lausikei aoeikei haoeibü aukabü asungletda.
Aoei haoeibü aukabü sungletda haoei Mühghaü kho ngühmai dogo chongchinga.
Ao Mühghaüei hautikei haoei Mühghaü ngüh lauda, aishanga Mühghaüei soushou jongsak atakletda.
Bouei Shou to sanouda, hoba ajanjan pendou hao ik to khümbo kua.
Aoei Shou to mailemda, haoei ponpen langkei ki; aoei Shou to ngüha aleda haoei ponpen langkei ühüplabü, lausikei Mühghaü maangshat hao thüka ki.
Johan toje Jisuei bouje juongbou baptikuda hoba eik yeitida dogo Farisibüei dida dogo ladang Jisuei ngekei
haoei Jihuda apyokei hoba Galil to nyibou ngaikei. Tükdebüeije kho Jisuei ayingko hao eikshuongei baptikukei.
Hao Samaria nakjung haulabü yingan kikei;
hibü hao Samariaa Jakobei haoshou Josef la kubü Saikhar nyenan sekphai hanbü che nyangko sang che to loukei.
Jakobeibü deikhün khünei kikei. Wakouei hüan, Jisu deikhün jungatham setkei. Kho chajih aoa kiteikei.
Samaria sao che deikhula loukei, hoba Jisuei sao to laukei, “Kü la yungla kubü.”
(Hao eikshuong sangnyu to shausiyung jekla angan apan kikei.)
Samaria saoei laukei, “No Jihudabü che yingan ngo Samaria sao che to yunglabü lai küman hida?” (Aishanga Jihudabü si Samariabü ajep ashauyoda.)
Jisuei sao to jongaikei, “Nyi Mühghaü jongsak ngean kikei tegüje hoba ka to, ‘Küla yungla kubü’ dogo laubou kho ngea tegüje, nyi hao ka hian kikhoulabü, hoba haoei ka la langkeibü dei kukhoulabü.”
Yaksa khoei hao to laukei, “Yaangbou, nyi khujin aki; hoba deikhün kho aeibou haüakei; nyi langkeibü dei kho laka khula?
Küneibü pi Jakob, aoei kün la ho deikhün kukei, hoba hao hoba hao shousi shuong hoba haoeibü shatsinameikei yungkei, no hao to yaangbou sai?”
Jisuei sao to jongaikei, “Aoyouei ho dei yunglaje nyibou dei lalabü,
lausikei aoei ong ngei kubü dei yunglaje hao ladangkei dei alalabü; lausikei ngei hao la kulabü dei khoei hao to ponpen langkei dei pakko deikük la yeilabü.”
Yaksa khoei hao to laukei, “Yaangbou, ngo dei alalabü hoba hato deikhula aloulabü lele kü la kho dei kubü.”
Haoei sao to laukei, “Hauashi hoba kalao ngaashi, hoba hato kaiya.”
Yaksa khoei jongaikei, “Ngei lao aki.” Jisuei sao to laukei, “‘Ngei lao aki’ dogo nyi tükde ong laua;
aishanga nyi lao ngao kikei, hoba no tou aoto ki, khoje kalao aying. Khonei nyi ngühmai lena.”
Yaksa khoei hao to laukei, “Yaangbou, no thuseibü che yingkei dogo hapda.
Küneibü pisibouei ho shongha lembei hoba kan Jihudabüei mütei lemjan kaoen kho Jerusalem ki dogo lauda.”
Jisuei sao to laukei, “Kü to mailemashi, kanei ho shongha yingsikei Jerusalema yingsikei Bou to alemlabü jihsiphai che louda.
Kanei ai ange kho kanei lemda; künei ai ngekei kho künei lemda, aishanga khümenbü kho Jihudabü ka ki.
Lausikei maimaitham Bou to lembü shuongei soushoua hoba ngühmaia lemlabü jih che lousühada, hoba kho tou hanei ki; aishanga Bouei hao lembü dan yingla shanga kheibü mütshuong lamda.
Mühghaüje Soushou, hoba aoyouei hao lemlaje soushoua hoba ngühmaia lemjan.”
Yaksa khoei hao to laukei, “Messia, (aoto Naangenbou dogo lauda), hao louada dogo ngei ngeakei. Ladang hao loulaje, haoei kün la ajanjan pendou lenlabü.”
Jisuei sao to laukei, “Ka to aoei joyoda kho hao.”
Kho jiha hao eikshuong loukei, hoba hao yaksa che to joyoko kibü hapan haoen maang- pangkei; lankei, “Nyi ai mangsühda?,” ayingsi “Nyi aila sao to joyoda?” dogo aoeikei alau.
Yaksa khoei deikhu chak apyoan sangnyu to ungkei hoba mütshuong to laukei,
“Ngei kümbüleibü pendou kü la lenbou, louan chühashi, kho Messia yingasao?”
Haoen sangnyu ka longkei, hoba hao jungto loukei.
Kheijineitham hao eikshuongei hao to sukojako laukei, “Lenbou, shauayungashi.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Ngei kanei angebü shausiyung kia.”
Eikshuong cheei che to laukei, “Müt atei hao la shausiyung sungbakukei sai?”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Kü shausiyung kho ngo hautibouei maangangbü kümla hoba haoeibü kümsilei wantikulabü kho ki.
‘Lit che kian phaia, toukei youlat jih sühda’, dogo kanei alauda lo? Ngei kan la lenda, kan nyek longan sek aeto limchühashi; haoen latlabü lele nyenakei. Mudonga
latboueije mu hapda, hoba wenbou si latbou ham liko olinyolabü lele, haoei ponpen langkei youman yoshaiko kia.
Kho tegü, cheei wenda hoba lubüei latda dogo laubü ngühtet kho ngühmai ki.
Laonei kan hükotouko aküm kho youman latla shanga ngei kan hautikei; lubü shuongei kümaleia, hoba haoen hübütoubü mai ka kankei penda.”
“Haoei ngei kümbüleibü pendou lena”, dogo yaksanyuei aukabü kuko lausije kho sangnyu kabü Samariabü juongnyuei hao to mailembei.
Ladang Samariabü hao jungto loukei, haoenei Jisu to haoen yoa thüngshi dogo sukeijakei; hoba hao khünei chalou nyi setkei.
Haoeibü ngühei juongnyuei mailembei,
hoba haoenei yaksanyu to laukei, “Künei ho nyi lenbü ngühliei mailembei dogokei aying, aishanga künei kün lolokei dida, hoba hao kaodak Khümenbou dogo künei ngea.”
Chalou nyi kho phaia hao khüka Galil to haukei.
Aishanga thuseibü che kho jembü kaoa nyensang aki dogo Jisuei haoei lolo aukabü kukei.
Ladang hao Galil to loukei, Galilbüei hao olinko sungletkei; haoei Jerusalem Lema kümbüleibü pendou haoenei hapa, aishanga haoenkei Lem to loukei.
Hao tokei haoei dei ka ih yeitishang Galil kabü Kana to nyibou loukei. Khünei choba jungkabü yaangbü che kikei, laoboueibü shou Kapernauma shatko kiteikei.
Ladang kho mütei Jisu Jihuda ka Galil to loua dogo ditkei, hao hao jungto haukei, hoba louan hao shou hailabü lele ong kibou kho maitikushi dogo sukeijakei.
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Kan dan hoei amaa- philabü hoba maangpanglabü ühüpshongko kanei maialemlabü.”
Choba jungkabü yaangbouei hao to laukei, “Yaangbou, küshou ühaitoua kaiyena.”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Hauashi, kashou langlabü.” Müt khoei Jisuei hao to joyobü ngüh to mailembei, hoba ngaikei.
Hao lama yanko kitoua hao sambü shuong haü- yokei hoba haoshou langda dogo laukei.
Hao ai jih ka maijung longeikei dogo haoen ka phekei. Haoenei hao to laukei, “Miet, chaangombou angh chenei mangbokei hao apyokei.”
Jisuei hao to, “Kashou langlabü” dogo laubü jih khoneitham yingkei dogo haobouei ngekei; hoba hao hoba hao chemdang khümboei mailembei.
Jisuei hao Jihuda ka Galil to loujinei kümbü amaaphilabü yoa ho nyiboubü ki.
Kho phaia khünei Jihudabü lem che kikei, hoba Jisu Jerusalem to angkei.
Jerusalema, San Bakhüna, Jihuda ngühyema Bethzatha dogo nyenan khünei thim che kia; khonei dip ngao kia.
Khünei shatbü juongnyu nyekthubü, sokebü, ayingsi you si ik phei sibü dan (dei shoueibü haiteiyoko kikei.
Aishanga khuthük hangangbü che jih jiha louyenkei hoba dei kho shoueitikei. Kheijinei dei shoueibü phaia shaang atbou müt kho haoeibü shatsinyat pendou ka maiko kikei.)
Khünei müt che po khujinto set shatbü yoan kikei.
Ladang Jisuei hao khünei lengan hapbei hoba hao khünei jihsiphai lounyu kida dogo ngekei, haoei hao to laukei, “No maimang sühdalao?”
Shatbou müt khoei hao to jongaikei, “Yaangbou, thim shoueijinei ngo leian atlabü aokei aki; lausikei ngo lamoua kitoua lubü che ong kü thedangto hauda.”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Loenashi, ka yepshang peashi hoba paiashi.”
Khoyam müt kho maikei, hao yepshang pekei hoba paikei.
Kho Nounyet chalou che kiteikei.
Hibü Jihudabüei maian kibü müt khüto laukei, “Ho Nounyet yingkei; kaibü shen pelabü kho kala ngühkhümei asakkuda.”
Haoei haoen to jongaikei, “Ngo maitikubou mütei kü to laukei, ‘Ka yepshang peashi hoba paiashi.’ ”
Haoenei hao to phekei, “Ka yepshang peashi hoba paiashi, dogo ka to laubou müt kho ao?”
Lausikei maitikubü müt khoei hao ao yingkeije ange. Jisu meimeijung satan kikei, aieilausi kaoen khünei mütshang juongnyu kikei.
Kho phaia Jisuei hao lembüchema hapbei, hoba hao to laukei, “Chüha, no maian apa, nyi ka to hoto amaibü haüthüktimang asühlonga, touje shabü teshon.”
Müt kho haukei hoba hao maitibou kho Jisu yingakei dogo Jihudabü la lenkei.
Kho laüa Jihudabüei Jisu shieikoela khangkei, aishanga haoei khübü kho Nounyet kümbei.
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Ho jih hanei sühko Kübouei kümdaleida, hoba ngei haoei tegü kümsilei kümda.”
Kho aukabüa Jihudabüei hao haitila aeiche lambei, aieilausi haoei Nounyet ong leilukei aying, lausikei Mühghaü to hao jetei yeiko, Mühghaü kho haoeibü Bou dogo laukei.
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Maimaitham ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, Shouei hao lolo aikei kümla athükkei, haoei Bouei kümbo hapbü kho ong kümla thükkei; aishanga Bouei ai ong kümda, Shoueikei kho kümda.
Aishanga Bouei Shou to sanouda hoba haoei kümbüleibü pendou hao la lenda, hoba kan maangpangyolabü lele haoei hao la khübü to yaangbou kümsilei lenlabü.
Bouei lai haibü langngaitida hoba haoen la langkei kuda, kho tegü ong Shoueikei haoei pienbü shuong la langkei kuda.
Maimaitham Bouei ao mat ajemda, lausikei haoei matjembü pendou Shou la kua,
khei haoenei Bou to soumo hatbü tegü, pendouei Shou to soumo hatlabü. Aoei Shou la soumo akuda, haoei hao hautibou Bou la soumo akuda.
Maimaitham ngühmaia ngei kan la lenda, aoei kü ngüh ditda, hoba ngo hangangbou to mailemda, haoei ponpen langkei ki, hoba matjembü to alouda, lausikei haibü ka langkeibü to hauda.
Maimaitham ngühmaia ngei kan la lenda, haian kibü shuongei Mühghaü Shou ngüh ditlabü jihsiphai che louada, hoba kho tou ki, hoba aoyouei kho ditlaje lang kilabü.
Aishanga Bou la langkei pakshang ki, kho tegü haoei Shou la langkei pakshang yeitila shanga kukei.
Khoto liman haoei hao la matjemlabü shanga hau kua, aishanga hao kho Mühghaü Shou ki.
Khünei maang tepang, aieilausi heemanga kibü shuong pendouei haoeibü ngüh ditlabü jihsiphai che louada,
hoba longlabü; aoyoueibü kümsilei maian kikei haoen pendou langkeishang to langngailabü; shedbü kümbü shuong matjemshang to langngailabü.
“Ngei ngeibü haua ai kümla athükkei; ngei Bouei kü to lenbü tegü mat jemda; hoba ngeibü matjem kho tükdebü ki, aieilausi ngei kü maangangbü alamda, lausikei ngei ngo hangangbouei maangangbü lamda.
“Ngei kü shangabü aukabü kualonga ngeibü aukabü kho ngühmai aying.
Kü shangabü aukabü kubou lubü che kia, hoba haoei kü shangabü laobou aukabü kuda kho ngühmai dogo ngei ngekei.
Kanei Johan jungto hautikei hoba haoei ngühmai la aukabü kukei.
Ngei müteibü aukabüa anongda, lausikei kan khümenlabü shanga ngei khübü kho lauda.
Hao kho longko kibü ngesakbü wanthung che kikei, hoba kan longche shangabü haoeibü ngesakbüa olinyola maangangko kikei.

Lausikei ngei laobou aukabü ki kho Johaneibü aukabü to yaangbou, aishanga kümsilei laobou Kübouei kü la kümphemtila kukei, khübü kümsilei ngei kümda hoba khübüei Bouei ngo hautikei dogo Kü shangabü aukabü kuda.
Hobaje Bou aoei ngo hangangkei haoeikei kü shangabü aukabü kukei. Kanei ladangkei hao ngüh aditkei, ayingsi hao the ühüp.
Haoeibü ngüh kan to athüngda, aishanga kanei haoei hautibou Che khüto maialemda.
Kanei Laishiba phanda, aieilausi kanei khünei ponpen langkei ki dogo kanei damda, lankei kü shangabü aukabü kubou kho khübü ki,
hoba kanei ponpen langkei haplabü shanga kanei kü jungto loula maang üangda.
Ngei müteibü soumo to anongda,
lausikei kanei maangpona Mühghaü to sanoubü aki dogo ngei ngekei.
Ngo kübou nyena louakei, hoba kanei ngo asungletda. Müt at haoeibü jembü nyena lousije kanei hao sungletlabü.
Kan cheei che ka nyensang leda, hoba Mühghaü Che ong kabü nyensang alamda, kanei lai mailemenla?
Bou thedanga ngei kan attilabü dogo tedam. Kan attibou khoje Mosa, kanei ao to kaneibü maanglem phosepan ki.
Kanei Mosa to maileman kikei tegüje kanei kü to maileman kikhoulabü, aishanga haoei kü shangabü dokei.
Kanei haoei dobü to maialemen longaje, lai küman kanei kü ngüh to mailemla?”
Kho phaia Jisu Galil si thidang to haukei, (kho Tiberia si.)
Khünei noknyüh hao phai seman kikei, aieilausi haoenei haoei mütshuong shatbü maitibü amaaphilabü hapbei.
Jisu shongh to angkei hoba khünei hao eikshuong yoa setkei.
Püetbü lem, Jihudabü lem kho nyangko kikei.
Ladang Jisuei limchühkei hoba mütshang yaang hao jungto louko kibü hapbei, haoei Filip to laukei, “Habüei shaula shanga senei wentek laka jekla?”
(Haoei kho hao takteila laukei; aishanga haoei ai kümlabü ki kho haoei ngekei.)
Filipei hao to jongaikei, “Mütpem weko hanbang ong shomasikei sempak saoaneibü wentekei haoen asoulabü.”
Eikshuong yoa che, Simon Petereibü na Andriaei hao to laukei,
“Hanei nashou hanbü che kia, haoei barli wentek ngao hoba ngau penyi kia; lausikei müt khüjoche shanga khoei ai kümbula?”
Jisuei laukei, “Mütshuong settiashi” (khünei sang juongnyu kikei.) Hibü mütshuong setkei; haoen hajar ngao thüng kiteikei.
Jisuei wentek kho sungkei, hoba Mühghaü la nyensang kuan phaia mütshuong setan kijinei haoen la shombukei, hoba ngaukei khei kümbei. Mütpem wekoei photko shaukei.
Ladang haoen senyühshembei, haoei hao eikshuong to laukei, “Ai amaulabü lele jouletbü netshou shuong heshaiashi.”
Hibü haoenei khübü yoshaikei, hoba shaubü shuongei barli wentek ngao ka joutibü khoei kam anthüknyi shenkei.
Haoei kümbü amaaphelabü hapbü mütshuongei laukei, “Maimaitham kaodak to loula kibü Thuseibou kho ho ki.”
Hibü Jisuei, haoenei hao lapan choba la yeitilabü dogo kibü kho ngean, hao hao mütpem shongh aeto satan apbukei.
Ladang chasem yeikei hao eikshuong yungnyu to yankei.
Haoen long che to atkei hoba Kapernaum to danko kikei. Kho touje nangnaka hoba Jisu haoen jungto molouko kikei;
hoba dei shoueila khangko kikei, aishanga yungnyua yei yaang souko kikei.
Haoenei longa mail sem si lei phongan phaia haoenei Jisu dei thüka paiko long junga sühko louko hapbei; hoba haoen hatkei.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Ho ngo yingkei; tehüt.”
Kheijinei haoenei hao long to leiyetmang sühkei, lausikei longche danga long khoei haoen hauko kibü kaoen sühkei.
Nyibounyet, yungnyu thi aedanga shaibü noknyühei, khünei long che ong kiteikei hoba Jisu hao eikshuong yoto long to üet lausikei hao eikshuong lansan ong haukei dogo damenkei.
Tiberia ka lubü long shuong, laonei haoenei Jisuei nyensang kuan phaia wentek shaukei, kho kaoen nyangko lousühkei.
Hibü, ladang noknyühei khünei Jisu ayingsi haoeibü eikshuong ongkei ühüp, haoenei haoen lolo long to atkei, hoba Kapernaum to Jisu lamjung loukei.
Ladang haoenei hao yungnyu thinei hapbei, haoenei hao to laukei, “Lenbou, no ladang hato loukei?”
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Maimaitham ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, kanei ngo kanei amaaphilabü hapbü shanga aying, lausikei kanei wentek janshauan senyühshembü ka lamyoda.

Nyaülabü shausi- yung shanga tekümtelei; thalabü hoba ponpen langkei sungbala, laobou Müteibü Shouei kan la kulabü ki, kheibü shausiyung shanga kümaleiashi; aishanga Bou Mühghaüei hao thüka haoeibü hau tetsida jankua.”
Haoenei hao to laukei, “Künei Mühghaü kümsilei kümlabü lele künei ai kümla?”
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Mühghaü kümsilei kho ho ki, khei haoei ao hautikei kanei hao to mailemjan.”
Hibü haoenei hao to laukei, “Künei kho haplabü hoba ka to mailemlabü lele nyi ai amaaphilabü kümda? Nyi kümlabü kho ai?
Laishibaei, ‘Haoei haoen la khuthük ka shausiyung kukei’, dogo lenan kibü tegü küneibü pisibousi shuongei yama mana shaukei.”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Ngei kan to ngühmaia ngüh juong lenda; Mosaei kan la khuthük ka shausiyung kukei aying; lausikei Kübouei tükdebü shausiyung kan la khuthük ka kuda.
Aishanga Mühghaü shausiyung kho laobou khuthük ka louyenda hoba kaodak la langkei kuda kho ki.”
Haoenei hao to laukei, “Yaangbou, kün la ponpen kho shausiyung kubü.”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Ngo langkei shausiyung; ao kü jungto louda hao mühei ühailabü, hoba aoei kü to mailemda hao ladangkei nyibou dei alalabü.
Lausikei kanei ngo hapasikei kanei kü to maialemda dogo ngei kan to lena.
Bouei kü la kubü shuong pendou kü jungto loulabü, hoba ao kü jungto louda hao ngei shian asattilabü,
aieilausi ngo jembüei maangangbü kümla khuthük ka loukei aying, lausikei ngo hautibouei maangangbü kümla loukei.
Ho ngo hautibouei maangangbü ki, khei haoei kü la kubü ka ngei che ongkei amautijan, lausikei thonbü Chaloua haoen pendou langngaitijan.
Aishanga aoyouei Shou hapda hoba hao to mailemda haoei pon- pen langkei haplabü kho Kübouei maangangbü ki; hoba ngei hao thonbü Chaloua langngaitilabü.”
Hibü Jihudabü shuongei hao shangabü nyamnyambei aishanga haoei, “Ngo khuthük ka loubü shausiyung” dogo laukei.
Haoenei laukei, “Ho Josef shou Jisu aying lo? Haobou si haonyu senei angekei lo? Khülonga haoei tou lai küman, ‘Ngo khuthük ka loukei’ dogo lauda?”
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Kan yoa tenyamnyamyo.
Ngo hautibou Bouei asenba longa aokei kü jungto loula athük; hoba ngei hao thonbü Chaloua langngaitilabü.
Thuseibü lea ho doakei, ‘Hobaje haoen pendou la Mühghaüei lenlabü.’ Aoyouei Bou to ditda hoba hao ka ditletda hao kü jungto louda.
Müt atei Bou hapa dogo ngei alauda, khei Mühghaü ka laobou Che khüto limanje; haoei ong Bou hapa.
Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, aoei mailemda, haoei thon akibü langkei ki.
Ngo langkei shausiyung.
Kaneibü pisibousi shuongei yama mana shaukei, lankei haoen haikei.
Mütei shaulabü hoba ühailabü shanga ngo khuthük ka loubü shausi- yung.
Ngo khuthük ka louyenbü lang kibü shausiyung. Atei ho shausiyung shausije hao ponpen lang kilabü; hoba ngei kulabü shausiyung kho kü phe; kaodakbü langkei shanga ho kuda.”
Hibü Jihudabüei haoen yoa ngühsak nepyoko laukei, “Ho mütei lai küman sen la haoeibü phe shaula kula?”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, kanei Müteibü Shou phe ashau longa hoba hao sii ayung longa kan jembü lolo to langkei aki.
Aoei kü phe shauda hoba kü sii yungda haoei athonbü langkei ki, hoba ngei hao thonbü Chaloua langngaitilabü.
Aishanga kü phe kho tükdebü shausiyung, hoba kü sii kho tükdebü yunglabü.
Aoei kü phe shauda hoba kü sii yungda hao kü to kida hoba ngo hao to kida.
Lang kibü Bouei ngo ailai hautikei, hoba ngo Bouei lang kida, kho tegü aoei ngo shauda haokei ngo danko lang kilabü.
Ho khuthük ka louyenbü shausiyung; ho kaneibü pisibousi shuongei shaubü kho tegü aying, aishanga kho shausiyungei haoen alangda; lausikei aoei ho shausi- yung shauda hao ponpen langkei kilabü.”
Haoei ho Kapernauma sinagoga lenjinei laukei.
Haoenei ladang ho ditkei, hao eikshuong juongei laukei, “Ngüh hoje sekakei. Aoei ho ditenla?”
Ho shangabü haoeibü eikshuongei nyamnyamda dogo Jisuei ngekei, hoba haoen to laukei, “Hoei kan phaiyetda lo?
Khülonga kanei Müteibü Shou hao shangied kishang to angko hapsije lai kümla?
Ho langkei kubou Soushou ki; pheje jim aki. Ngei kan to lenbü ngüh shuongje Soushou hoba langkei ki.
Khei yingasikei kan yoa atje maialembü kia.” (Aishanga maialembü aoyou, hoba aoei hao yaakshaula khübü kho Jisuei khanglathama ngean kiteikei.)
Hobaje haoei laukei, “Bouei akulonga aokei kü jungto loula athük dogo ngei kan to lena.”
Kho jih ka jaüan hao eik juongnyu sepeijung ngaikei hoba hao yoa apaiko apbei.
Kheijinei Jisuei Anthüknyi to laukei, “Kankei ngaimang sühda sai?”
Simon Peterei hao to jongaikei, “Bunyubou, kün ao jungto sepeila? Nyi thon akibü langkei ki;
hoba künei mailema hoba no Mühghaüeibü Saopobou ki dogo ngeena.”
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Ngei kan Anthüknyi kho apien lo? Lausikei kan yoa cheje huonbou ki.”
Haoei Simon Iskhariot shou Judas shangabü lauko kiteikei; aishanga hao Anthüknyi yoa che yingasikei, hao yaakshaulabü lele kiteikei.
Kho phaia Jisu Galila paikei. Haoei Jihuda koletkei aishanga Jihudabü shuongei hao haitila lameikei.
Tou Jihudabü Dip lem nyangko kikei.
Hibü haonasi shuongei hao to laukei, “Ka eikshuongeikei nyi kümbü kümsilei yaangbü haplabü lele ho kaoen apyoashi hoba Jihuda to hauashi.
Aishanga aoei hao pühdaka shentimang sühda, haoei huphanga ai akümda. Nyi khübü kümda longaje no lolo kaodak la haptiashi.”
Aishanga haonasi shuongei ongkei hao to maialem.
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Kü shanga tükdebü jih molousüh; lausikei kan shanga jihsi- phai kho ponpen lamleakei.
Kaodakei kan mangsenla athük, lausikei hoei ngo mangsenda aieilausi haoeibü kümsilei shuong amai dogo ngei kho shanga aukabü kuda.
Lem khüto kan angashi. Ngo kho lem to üangda aishanga ngeibü jih molousüh.”
Haoei kho lauan phaia hao Galila thüngkei.
Lausikei ladang haonasi shuong lem khüto angkei, kheijinei haokei, pühthea ayingko, huphanga angkei.
Jihudabü shuongei hao Lem khünei lambo laukei, “Hao lan ki?”
Noknyüha hao shangabü aeibou nyamnyam- yokei, atei laukei, “Hao müt maibü yingkei”, lubüei laukei, “Aying, haoei noknyüh ayinglamto leida.”
Lausikei Jihudabü to hatla, aoeikei hao shangabü pühthea alau.
Ladang Lemjibou sühkei, Jisu Lembüchem to angkei hoba lenla khangkei.
Jihudabü shuong maangpangkei hoba laukei, “Ho mütei ditletbü akiko lai küman webü songsido khütetche hapbei?”
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Ngei lenbü kho kü ngüh ji, lausikei ngo hautiboueibü ki.
Müt atei hao maangangbü kümla maangangsije, ngei laubü kho Mühghaü ngüh si, ayingsi ngei jembü hauei laudaje kho haoei ngelabü.
Aoei haoeibü jembü haua laudaje haoei jembü soneikangbü lamda; lausikei aoei hao hautiboueibü soneikangbü lamda, hao ngühmai; hao to asaopobü aki.
Mosaei kan la Ngühkhüm aku lo? Khei yingasikei aoeikei Ngühkhüm ajungeida. Kanei aila ngo haitila komeida?”
Noknyühei jongaikei, “Kato shabü mühghaü kia. Aoei no haitila komeida?”
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Ngei kümsilei che kümbei hoba kan tou sühko khoei maangpangda.
Mosaei kan la kiplabü phejan kukei kho Mosa ka aying, lausikei pisibousi ka laobou kanei Nounyet mangkei kipda.
Mosa Ngühkhüm alulimla shanga müt cheei Nounyet mangkei kipda longaje, Nounyet ngei müt che maisho maitikua dogo kan kü to maangpokda lo?
Tang ka chühbüei mat tejem lausikei kaneibü matjembü kho tangbü yingshi.”
Jerusalem kabü mütshuong atei laukei, “Ho haoenei haitila komeibü müt kho aying lo?
Lausikei chühashi, haoei pühthea lauda hoba haoenei hao to ai alauda. Ho Messia yingkei dogo seneibü khuleibü danei tükde ngebü yinglaoma?
Senei ho müt ho lakabüje ngeakei; lausikei ladang Khrista loulaje, aoeikei hao lakabüje angelabü.”
Jisuei lembü chema ngekko laukei, “Kanei ngo ngekei hoba ngo lakabüje kanei ngekei. Lausikei ngo jembü hauei loukei aying, lausikei ngo hautibou kho ngühmai ki, hoba hao kanei angekei.
Ngei hao ngekei, aishanga ngo hao ka ki, hoba haoei ngo hautikei.”
Haoenei hao lapla haujembei, lausikei aoeikei hao to ik ashat, aieilausi haoeibü jihsiphai mosüh.
Noknyüh juongei hao to mailembei hoba laukei, “Ladang Khrista kho loulaje, ho mütei kümbü amaa- philabü to aei haoei kümlep lo?”
Noknyühei hao shangabü nyamnyamyobü Farisi shuongei ditkei, hoba ungshedbü shuong si Farisibü shuongei hao lapla khusabü shuong hautikei.
Jisuei laukei, “Ngo kan yoa longche kilabü hoba ngo hautibou jungto haulabü.
Kanei ngo lamlabü, lausikei kanei ngo ühüplabü hoba ngo lan ki kan loula athük.”
Jihudabü shuongei haoen lolo lauyokei, “Senei hao ühüplabü lele hao lato haula kümeida? Hao Jihudabü linan Grikbü yoa kibü yoto hauan Grikbü la lenla kümeida sai?
‘Kanei ngo lamlabü, lausikei kanei ngo ühüplabü, hoba ngo lan ki kan loula athük’, dogo laubü haoeibü ngüh kho ai tetlabü?”
Lem thonla, youjemnyet, Jisuei loenan ngekko laukei, “At dei lasije kü jungto kaiya hoba yungashi.
Laishibaei laubü tegü, ‘Aoei kü to mailemda hao ka langkei dei shumang koulabü.’ ”
Aoyouei hao to mailembei haoenei ai Soushou sungletla kiteikei kho shangabü haoei laukei, aieilausi Soushou kho mokuko kikei, aishanga Jisu mo sonei akangkei.
Ladang noknyüh yoa atei khübü ditkei haoenei laukei, “Maimaitham ho Thuseibou kho ki.”
Lubü shuongei laukei, “Ho Khrista kho ki;” lausikei atei laukei, “Galil ka Khrista longlep lo?
Dawid lilabü ka, hoba Dawid kibü Bethlehem sang ka Khrista kho longlabü dogo Laishibaei alenkei lo?”
Hibü noknyüha hao hangshong janyinbü longkei.
Haoen ateije hao lapmang sühkei, lausikei aoeikei hao to ik ashat.
Kheijinei khusabü shuong ungshedbü shuong si Farisi shuong jungto loukei hoba haoenei haoen to laukei, “Aila kanei hao aleiba?”
Khusabü shuongei jongaikei, “Aoeikei ho mütei laubü tegüje alaukei.”
Farisi shuongei haoen to jongaikei, “Kankei ayinglamto leilangtia sai?
Seneibü khuleibü ayingsi Farisibü atei ongkei hao to mailema si?
Lausikei ho noknyüh, aoyouei Ngühkhüm kho angekei haoenje shedsikhau baua.”
Lausikei haoen yoa che, Nikodema, ao Jisu jungto shangied loukei, haoei haoen to laukei,
“Shaangla müt khoeibü ngüh ditan achühko, hoba haoei kümbü alamenko, seneibü Ngühkhümei hao mat jemda sai?”
Haoenei hao to jongaikei, “Nokei Galil ka sai? Laishiba phanashi hoba Galil ka thuseibü ao alongda dogo nyi ngelabü.”
(Hobaje haoen mütpem weko lulu chem to ngaikei;)
(lausikei Jisuje Oliv Shongh to haukei.
Ngeyang enyu hao lembüchem to nyibou ngaikei. Müt pendou hao jungto loukei; hoba hao setkei hoba haoen la lenla khangkei.
Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong si Farisi shuongei asangalanbüa lapbü yaksa che leibakei. Haoenei sao kho haoen si Jisu kanglanga lotikei,
hoba hao to laukei, “Lenbou, ho yaksa ho asangalanbüa ikshat lapbei.
Ngühkhüma Mosaei kheibü yaksa kho laangei tetettijan dogo doakei. Nyi ai laula?”
Hao attilabü shanga, hao takteiko haoenei kho ngüh laukei. Lausikei Jisuei ngomjung atkei hoba ikjishouei kaoa dokei.
Ladang haoenei hao to phedang lekei, hao pienan haoen to laukei, “Kan yoa ao to shabü aki haoei shaang sao to laangei tetashi.”
Nyiboula hao ngomjung atkei hoba kaoa dokei.
Ladang haoenei kho ditkei haoen jaishoubou ka khangan che chea satkhümbei, hoba lotian phobü yaksa yoa Jisu mütpem joutikei.
Jisuei pienan sao to laukei, “Yaksa, haoen lan ki? Aoeikei no ayukti lo?”
Saoei laukei, “Yaangbou, aoeikei ayukti.” Hobaje Jisuei laukei, “Ngeikei no ayuktida. Ngaiashi; ladangkei nyibou shabü teshon.”)
Nyiboula Jisuei haoen to joyoko laukei, “Ngo kaodak ngesakbü. Aoei küphai semda hao ladangkei nakthüha apailabü, lausikei langkeibü ngesakbü kilabü.”
Farisi shuongei hao to laukei, “Nyi ka shangabü aukabü künda; kaibü aukabü kho ngühmai aying.”

Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Ngei kü shangabü aukabü kuasikei, ngeibü aukabü kho ngühmai ki, aieilausi ngo laka loukei, ayingsi ngo lato haudaje ngei ngeakei; lausikei ngo laka loukei hoba lato hauda kanei angekei.
Kanei phe aedang ka matjemda; ngeije aomat ajemda.
Ngei mat jemasikei ngeibü matjembü kho ngühmai ki, aishanga ngo müt- pem aying. Ngo hautibou Bou kü yoa kia.
Müt nyieibü aukabü kho ngühmai ki dogo kaneibü Ngühkhüma doakei.
Kü shangabü aukabü kubou kho ngo ki, hoba ngo hautibou Bouei kü shangabü aukabü kuda.”
Haoenei hao to laukei, “Kabou lanei ki?” Jisuei jongaikei, “Kanei ngokei Boukei angekei. Kanei ngo ngekei tegüje, kanei Küboukei ngelabü.”
Haoei habü ngüh ho lembüchema lenjinei nam thanshanga laukei. Aoeikei hao alap, aieilausi haoeibü jih mosüh.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Ngo satda hoba kanei ngo lamlabü, lausikei kan kaneibü shabüa hailabü. Ngo lato haudaje kan khüto alouenlabü.”
Jihudabü shuongei laukei, “‘Ngo laeto haudaje kan loula athük’, dogo haoei laudabü haoei hao lolo haitilep sai?”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Kan phang ka; ngoje thük ka. Kan ho kaodakeibü; ngoje ho kaodakeibü aying.
Khoei ong ngei kan kaneibü shabüa hailabü dogo laukei; aishanga kanei ‘Ngo Kho Hao Ki’ dogo maialem longa kan kaneibü shabüa hailabü.”
Hibü haoenei hao to laukei, “No ao?” Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Khangla thama ngei kan la kho ong lendanai.
Ngei kan shangabü lenla hoba matjemlabü juong kia; lausikei aoei ngo hautikei hao ngühmai ki, hoba ngei hao ka ai ditkei ngei kaodak la lenda.”
Haoei haoen to Bou shangabü lauda dogo haoenei ange.
Jisuei laukei, “Ladang kanei Müteibü Shou tonenlaje kheijinei ‘Ngo Kho Hao Ki’, hoba ngei jembü hauei ai akümda lausikei ngei habü ho Bouei küla lenbü tegü lauda dogo kanei ngelabü.
Hobaje aoei ngo hautikei hao kü yoa ki. Haoei kü mütpem üpyokei, aishanga ngei ponpendou hao maanghaibü kümda.”
Haoei habü laujinei juongnyuei hao to mailembei.
Jisuei hao to mailembü Jihudabü shuong to laukei, “Kanei kü ngüha lealonga, kan maimaitham ngeibü eikshuong;
hoba kanei ngühmai kho ngelabü hoba ngühmai khoei kan dongebü yeitilabü.”
Haoenei hao to jongaikei, “Kün Abraham thensilen, hoba ladangkei aoeibü aaolakei alekei. ‘Kan dongebü yeilabü’, dogo nyi lai küman lauda?”
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, aoei ong shabü shonda, hao shabü aao.
Aao kho chema ponpen akida; shoumaije ponpendou kida.
Yingsije Shouei kan do ngetia longa, kan maimaitham dongebü yinglabü.
Kan Abraham thensilen dogo ngei ngeakei; lausikei kanei ngo haitila komeida, aieilausi kan to kü ngüh athüngda.
Kübou yoa ngei ai hapbei kho ngei kan to lenda; lausikei kanei kaneibü bou ka ai ditkei kho kümda.”
Haoenei hao to jongaikei, “Küneibü bou Abraham ki.” Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Kan Abraham shousi yinga tegüje kanei Abraham kümsilei kümbhoulabü.
Lausikei Mühghaü ka ngühmai ngüh ditan kan to lenbou kho ngo, hoba tou kanei ngo haitila komeida. Abrahamei ho aküm.
Kanei kaneibü boueibü kümsilei kümda.” Haoenei hao to laukei, “Kün khongshou aying; Mühghaü kho ong küneibü Bou ki.”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Mühghaü kaneibü Bou tegüje kanei kü to sanoulabü, aishanga ngo Mühghaü ka loukei, hoba tou hanei kia. Aishanga ngo ngeibü jembü hauei alou, lausikei haoei ngo hautikei.
Aila kanei ngei lenbü ashuokenda? Aieilausi kanei ngeibü ngühlang ditla asomda.

Kan kaneibü bou shabü mühghaü ka ki, hoba kaneibü bouei maangtakbü kümla kanei maangangda. Hao khangbü ka thama müt haitibou kikei. Hao ngühmaia alo, aishanga hao to ngühmai aki. Ladang haoei amlangbü laulaje haoei jembü maangpon ka lauda, aishanga hao kho yepeibou hoba yepeibü bou ki.
Lausikei ngei ngühmai lauda, khoei kanei kü to maialemda.
Kan yoa aoei ngeibü shabü lenenla? Ngei ngühmai lausi kanei aila kü to maialemda?
Ao Mühghaü ka ki, haoei Mühghaü ngüh ditda. Kanei aditbü tetlabü kho kan Mühghaü ka aying.”
Jihudabü shuongei hao to jongaikei, “No Samariabü hoba kato shabü sou kia dogo künei kato tükde alen si?”
Jisuei jongaikei, “Kü to shabü sou aki, lausikei ngei Kübou la soumo kuda hoba kanei kü la soumo akuda.
Ngei jembü soneikangbü alamda; kho lambou hoba matjembou che kia.
Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, atei kü ngüh jungeia longa haoei ladangkei haibü ühüplabü.”
Jihudabü shuongei hao to laukei, “Tou künei kato shabü sou kia dogo ngekei. Abraham hoba thuseibü shuong haikhüma hoba nyi, ‘Atei kü ngüh jungeia longa haoei ladangkei haibü ühüplabü’, dogo lauda.
Küneibü bou Abraham, ao haia, hao to no yaangbou sai? Thuseibü shuongkei haia. Nyi jembü lolo ao dogo lauda?”
Jisuei jongaikei, “Ngei ngo lolo soneikanga longa, ngeibü soneikangbü ai aying. Ho Kübou, kanei ao to, ‘Hao küneibü Mühghaü’, dogo lauda, haoei ngo soneikangtida.
Kanei hao angekei, lausikei ngei hao ngeakei; hoba ngei hao angekei laua longa ngokei kan tegü yepeibü yinglabü; lausikei ngei hao ngekei hoba hao ngüh jungeida.
Kaneibü bou Abrahamei kü chalou hapla olinko chüheikei; haoei kho hapbei hoba olinkei.”
Jihudabü shuongei hao to laukei, “No po anjinsem aonkei, hoba nyi Abraham hapbei si?”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, Abraham abukjinei ‘Ngo’ kho kiteikei, hoba hao kho ngo ki.”
Haoenei hao to tetla laang hekei, lausikei Jisuei jembü lolo hukei, hoba lembüchem ka satkei.
Jisuei hao haujinei, bukjineithama nyek thubü müt che hapbei.
Haoeibü eikshuongei hao to phekei, “Lenbou, hao nyek thuan buklabü lele, ho mütei si, haonyu haobouei shabü shonkei?”
Jisuei jongaikei, “Ho haoeibü shabü ayingsi haoeibü nyusiboueibü shabüeikei aying; lausikei hao danko Mühghaü kümsilei tang khittila shanga hao nyek thuan bukkei.
Senei changea ngo hautiboueibü kümsilei kümjan. Aoeikei akümaleienlabü lele nangnak louda.
Ngo kaodaka ki shongko ngo kaodak ngesakbü.”
Haoei khei lauan phaia, haoei kaoa eok thuokkei, hoba eoka thamdak totkei; haoei thamdak kho müteibü nyeka naangkukei,
hoba hao to laukei, “Hauashi, hoba Siloam shumanga sakashi.” (Siloam ngühtet Hautikei.) Hibü hao hauan sakkei, hoba nyekei hapbo longeikei.
Lepbü shuong hoba nyishou aoyouei hao hishau hiyungbü che dogo shenan kikei haoenei laukei, “Ho müt setan hishau hiyungko kibou kho aying lo?”
Atei laukei, “Haü”; lubü shuongei laukei, “Ji, lausikei haoei hao phatkei.” Müt khoei haoei lolo laukei, “Kho ngo.”
Haoenei hao to laukei, “Kholonga kaibü nyek lai küman ipbei?”
Haoei jongaikei, “Jisu nyenbü müt cheei thamdak totkei hoba ngeibü nyeka naangkukei, hoba kü to laukei, ‘Siloam to hauashi hoba sakashi.’ Hibü ngo haukei hoba sakkei, hoba hapbei.”
Haoenei hao to laukei, “Hao lanei ki?” Haoei laukei, “Ngei angekei.”
Shangied nyek thuan kibü müt kho haoenei Farisibü jungto leian haukei.
Jisuei thamdak totan haoeibü nyek khittikubü kho Nounyet yingan kiteikei.
Farisi shuongei haoei lai küman hapbei kho hao ka nyiboula phekei. Haoei haoen to laukei, “Haoei thamdak totan ngeibü nyeka naangkukei hoba ngei sakkei hoba ngei hapbei.”

Farisibü atei laukei, “Kho kümbou müt kho Mühghaü ka aying, aieilausi haoei Nounyet ajungeida.” Atei laukei, “Müt ao shabü müt che ki haoei lai küman kheibü sei kümenla?” Hobaje haoen yoa janyinbü longkei.
Haoenei nyek thubou to nyiboulakei laukei, “Haoei kaibü nyek ipbukei laudabü nyikei hao shangabü ai lauda?” Haoei laukei, “Hao kho thuseibü che ki.”
Jihudabüei hao nyek thuan kibü maikei laubü ngühli kho haoeibü nyusibou angaba shongko maialem,
hoba haoenei haosi ka phekei, “Bukjineithama nyek thuan bukkei dogo kanei laubü kasieibü shou kho ho sai? Kholonga haoei tou laibü hapda?”
Haoeibü nyusibouei jongaikei, “Hao küsieibü shou hoba hao nyek thuan bukkei dogo kanei ngeakei;
lausikei haoei tou lai küman hapda künei angekei, ayingsi aoei haoeibü nyek ipbukeije künei angekei. Hao ka pheshi, hao jaishou yingkei; haoei jembü shanga laulabü.”
Haoeibü nyusibouei khei laukei, aishanga haoen Jihudabü to hatkei; aieilausi Jihudabü shuongei hai yeian kikei, khei müt atei ongkei hao Messia dogo theleda longa hao sinagog ka shian sattilabü.
Khoei ong müt khoeibü nyusibouei laukei, “Hao jaishou yingkei, hao ka pheshi.”
Hibü nyiboukei haoenei nyek thuan kiteibou kho ngabakei hoba hao to laukei, “Ngühmai lenshi. Ho shabü müt che dogo künei ngeakei.”
Haoei jongaikei, “Hao shabü müt che si ai yingkeije ngei angekei; lausikei ngei che ngeakei kho, ngo nyek thuan kiteikei hoba tou ngei hapda.”
Haoenei hao to laukei, “Haoei kato ai kümbei? Haoei kaibü nyek lai ipbukei?”
Haoei haoen to jongaikei, “Ngei kan to lenan apa, hoba kanei aditku. Kanei aila ho nyibou ditmang sühda? Kankei haoeibü eik la yeimang sühda sai?”
Haoenei hao to nyikuko laukei, “No haoeibü eik; kün Mosaeibü eikshuong.
Mühghaüei Mosa to joyokei dogo künei ngeakei; lausikei ho mütje hao lakabüje künei angekei.”
Müt khoei haoen to jongaikei, “Maangpanglabü kho ho ki, khei hao lakabüje kanei angekei, khei yingasikei haoei kü nyek ipbukei!
Mühghaüei shabü müt to aditkuda dogo senei ngeakei, lausikei müt atei Mühghaü to hadalonga hoba hao maangangbü kümsije, Mühghaüei hao to ditkuda.
Müt cheei ongkei nyek thuan bukbü müt la nyek khittikukei dogo kaopakbü ka jaüan ladangkei ditan achüh.
Kho müt Mühghaü ka aying tegüje, haoei aikei tekümenkhoulabü.”
Haoenei hao to jongaikei, “Khangbü ka thama no shabüa bukkei. Kün to songlenlabü no ao?” Hobaje haoenei hao sinagog ka inletkei.
Haoenei hao inleda dogo Jisuei ditkei, hoba ladang haoei hao hapbei, haoei laukei, “Nyi Müteibü Shou to mailemda lao?”
Haoei jongaikei, “Yaangbou, ngei hao to mailemlabü lele hao kho ao?”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Nyi hao hapa, hoba tou aoei kato joyoda, kho hao.”
Haoei laukei, “Yaangbou, ngei mailemda”; hoba haoei hao thedanga khüpetkei.
Jisuei laukei, “Aoyouei ühüpda haoenei haplabü lele, hoba aoyouei hapda haoen nyekthubü yeilabü lele matjemla shanga ngo ho kaodak to loukei.”
Hao yoa kibü Farisi shuongei kho ditkei hoba laukei, “Künkei nyekthubü sai?”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Kan nyekthubü tegüje kan shabü tekikhoulabü. Lausikei kanei, ‘Künei hapda’, dogo laudabü kaneibü shabü khei ong kia.”
“Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, ao koukhüm danko sanchem to alotda lausikei lubü lam aeka nguida, hao kokbü hoba yepeibü;
lausikei san shuong lombouje koukhüm danko lotda.
Hao la koukhüm lombouei ipbuda, hoba san shuongei hao ngüh ditda; haoei jembüeibü sanshuong nyenshenko ngada hoba leian satda.
Ladang haoei jembüeibü pendou leibada, hao haoen thedanga paida, hoba sanshuongei hao phai semda aieilausi haoenei hao ngüh ngekei.
Haoenei yenbou phai asemlabü, lausikei hao jungka laangjung satkhümlabü aishanga haoenei yenboueibü ngüh kho ashenkei.”
Jisuei kho ngühphatbü haoen to laukei, lausikei haoei haoen to ai laudaje haoenei aditen.
Jisuei nyibou laukei, “Maimaitham ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, ngo sanshuong shanga koukhüm.
Kü to shaang loubü shuong pendou kokbü hoba yepeijawebü, lausikei sanshuongei haoen to aditku.
Ngo koukhüm; ngo danko atei lotsije hao khümenlabü, hoba lotlabü hoba anglabü hoba lamshaushang haplabü.
Kokbüje koklangla hoba haitila hoba leilutila shanga ong louda. Mütshuongei langkeibü nahapla shanga ngo loukei hoba ho apsileko haplabü.
Ngo sanlombü maibü. Sanlombü maibüei sanshuong shanga haoeibü langkei phoyokuda.
Mulambü müt, ao sanlombü ji, ayingsi sanbuboukei aying, ladang sho che louko hapda haoei sanshuong apyoda hoba wenjung satda, hoba shoei taketda hoba lintida.
Kho aieilausi hao mulambü müt hoba haoei sanshuong shanga adambuda.
Ngo sanlombü maibü, Bouei ngo lai ngekei, kho tegü ngei jembüeibü ngekkei, hoba jembüeibüei ngo ngekei; hoba sanshuong shanga ngei kü langkei phoyokuda.
Ho sanchema ayobü ngeibü san lubü kia. Ngei haoenkei leibajan hoba haoenei kü ngüh to ditlabü, hoba haoen sanlombü che yoa sanshuong che yeilabü.
Bouei ngo sanouda, aieilausi kho nyibou hapmeilabü lele ngei kü langkei phoyokuda.
Aoeikei ho kü ka alangda, lausikei ngei ho ngei lolo phoyokuda. Ngei ho phoyola janbü ki hoba ngei ho nyibou hapmeila janbü ki. Kübouei kü to ho kümla lenkei.”
Tokei Jihudabü yoa ho ngüh danko janyinbü longkei.
Haoen juongei laukei, “Hao to shabü sou kia, hoba langet angda. Kanei aila hao ngüh ditda?”
Lubü shuongei laukei, “Habü hoje shabü souei lapbü ngüh aying. Shabü souei nyekthubü nyek khittikula thüklep si?”
Jerusalema Saüenbü Lem kikei. Kho poanga;
hoba Jisu Solomon chemsophanga lembü- chema paiko kikei.
Jihudabüei hao kailepbei hoba hao to laukei, “Nyi kün lalokche phenyemtila? No Messia yingalonga kün la tou chongchingko lenbü.”
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Ngei kan to lena, hoba kanei maialemda. Ngei kü Bou nyena kümbü kümsileiei kü shangabü aukabü kuda;
lausikei kanei maialemda, aieilausi kan ngeibü sanshuong aying.
Kü sanshuongei kü ngüh ditda; ngei haoen ngeakei hoba haoenei kü phai semda.
Ngei haoen la thon akibü langkei kuda, haoen ladangkei amaulabü, hoba aoeikei kü ikmang ka haoen asolanglabü.
Kü Bouei ai küla kuan ki kho pendou to yaangbou, hoba aoeikei Boueibü ik ka haoen sola athükkei.”
Bou hoba ngo che ong.
Jihudabüei hao to tetla nyibou laang hekei.
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Bou ka ngei kan la kümsilei juongnyu lena. Khübü yo ka laobou kümsilei shanga kanei kü to tetla?”
Jihudabü shuongei hao to jongaikei, “Kümsilei maibü shanga künei kato atetda, lausikei Mühghaü nyikubü shanga, hoba no müt che ong yingan, nyi no lolo Mühghaü la yeibü shanga.
‘Kan mühghaü shuong’, dogo Mühghaüei laubü kaneibü Ngühkhüma adokei lo?
Haoen aoyou jungto Mühghaü ngüh loukei, haoei haoen to mühghaü dogo ngakei, hoba Laishiba ngüh sungenan apla athükkei.
Kholongaje, ngei ‘Ngo Mühghaü Shou’ dogo laubü shanga, Bouei ao saüenkei hoba kaodak to hautikei, hao to kanei ‘Nyi Mühghaü nyikuda’, dogo lauda lo?
Ngei Kübou kümsilei aküm longaje kü to maitelemkai;
lausikei ngei khübü kümda longa, kanei kü to maialemasikei, Bou kü to ki hoba ngo Bou to ki dogo kanei damenlabü hoba ngelabü lele, kümsilei shuong to mailemshi.”
Hibü nyiboukei haoenei hao lapla haujembei; lausikei hao haoen ikmang ka satenkei.
Hao nyibou Jordan thi aedang, Johanei shaangla baptikushang to haukei, hoba hao khünei kikei.
Müt juong hao jungto loukei. Haoenei laukei, “Johanei amaaphilabü ai aküm, lausikei Johanei ho müt shangabü laubü pendou kho tükde ong kiteikei.”
Hobaje juongei hao to khün mailembei.
Mari si Martha habü sang Bethani kabü Lazar nyenbü shatbü müt che kiteikei.
Kho Bunyubou la ponlem onang naangkuan saoeibü khulouei haman apbunyu Mari, saoeibü na Lazar shatko kiteikei.
Hibü nounyiei hao jungto hai lauko hautikei, “Bunyubou, kathangbou kho shatda.”
Ladang Jisuei kho ditkei haoei laukei, “Kho shatbü kho haibüa thonlabü aying, lausikei ho danko Mühghaü Shou soneikangtila shanga ki.”
Jisuei Martha hoba saoeibü na hoba Lazar to sanoukei.
Ladang haoei hao shatda dogo ditkei, haoei tokei hao lan kiteikei khünei chalou nyi thüngkei;
hoba kho phaia haoei haoeibü eikshuong to laukei, “Sen Jihuda to han ngaiakho.”
Eikshuongei hao to laukei, “Lenbou, tou nyangko ong Jihudabüei kato laangei tetla lameikei; no khüto nyibou hauda si?”
Jisuei jongaikei, “Chalou chenei angh anthüknyi akida si? Müt cheei chaloua paia longa, aphaiyetlabü, aishanga haoei ho kaodak ngesakbü hapda;
lausikei müt cheei nangnak paialonga, hao phaiyetda, aieilausi ngesakbü kho hao to aki.”
Kho lauan phaia haoei laukei, “Sen thangbou, Lazar nyeket shiakei; lausikei ngo hao lakseptila hauda.”
Eikshuongei hao to laukei, “Bunyubou, hao nyeket shikei longa, hao mailabü.”
Jisuei hao haibü shanga lauan kiteikei, lausikei haoei nyishoubü yepbü shanga lauda dogo haoenei dambei.
Kheijinei Jisuei haoen la shangashatko lenkei, “Lazar haia,
kanei mailemtila ngo khünei akiteibüei ngo kan shanga olinda. Sen hao jungto hauakho.”
Hibü Thoma (laobou ngühtet “Phokshou”) ei jambü eikshuong to laukei, “Hao yoa hailabü lele senkei hauakho.”
Ladang Jisu loukei kheijineije Lazar heea khünan phaia chalou leibounyet yingan kikei.
Bethani kho Jerusalem nyangko, mail nyi thüngei aoan kikei.
Jihudabü juong Martha si Mari jungto haosieibü na shanga maang sula louan kiteikei.
Ladang Marthaei Jisu louada dogo ditkei, sao shuokla haukei; lausikei Mari chema setteikei.
Kheijinei Marthaei Jisu to laukei, “Bunyubou, no hanei kiteia tegüje küna tehaikhoulabü.
Ngei ngeakei, tou yinga tegükei, nyi Mühghaü ka ai ong hilaje, haoei kala kulabü.”
Jisuei sao to laukei, “Kana langngailabü.”
Marthaei Jisu to laukei, “Thonbü Chaloua langngaibü jihsiphaia hao nyibou langkeilabü dogo ngei ngeakei.”
Jisuei sao to laukei, “Ngo langngaibü hoba langkei ki. Aoei kü to mailemda, hao haiasikei lang kilabü;
hoba ao lang kida hoba kü to mailemda, hao ladangkei ühailabü. Nyi mailemdalao?”
Saoei hao to laukei, “Haü, Bunyubou, kaodak to louko kibou, Mühghaü Shou, Messia kho no, dogo ngei mailemda.”
Saoei kho lauan phaia, sao ngaikei hoba saoeibü na Mari ngalangan, hakphangshoua lenkei, “Lenbou kho hanei kia, hoba haoei no ngada.”
Ladang Mariei kho ditkei sao tongde loenkei hoba hao jungto haukei.
Kheijinei Jisu sangnyu to molung, lausikei Marthaei hao haüyoshang kaoena ong kiteikei.
Hibü ladang saoeibü maang suko Mari yoa chema setbü Jihudabü shuongei Mari phühde loenan satan apbü hapbei, haoenei sao heedang to haapla hauda dogo daman sao phai sembei.
Ladang saoei Jisu hapbei, saoei haoyou junga khü- petkei hoba hao to laukei, “Bunyubou, no hanei kiteikei teg- üje küna tehaikhoulabou.”
Jisuei sao hoba sao yoa loubü Jihudabü shuongkei haapyoko hapbei. Hao to maang leilukei hoba waangkei,
hoba laukei, “Kanei hao lanei khünkei?” Haoenei hao to laukei, “Yaangbou, louan chühashi.”
Jisu haapbei.
Kheijinei Jihudabüei laukei, “Haoei hao to latetche sanoukei, chühashi!”
Lausikei haoen atei laukei, “Haoei nyekthubü shuong la nyek ipbukei. Ho müt ühaitila haoei dencheje kümbü yingma lo?”
Jisu to nyibou maangto shatko heekhün to loukei. Kho laangkhün che, hoba laang cheei thangngaian kiteikei.
Jisuei laukei, “Laang kho khokan apashi.” Haibüeibü nou Marthaei hao to laukei, “Bunyubou, touje mangnyaülüm hilabü; hao haian chalou lei yinga.”
Jisuei sao to laukei, “Nyi mailemsije nyi Mühghaü soneikangbü haplabü dogo ngei kala alen lo?”
Hibü haoenei laang kho khokan apbei; hoba Jisuei chühangtikei hoba laukei, “Abou, nyi kü to ditkubü shanga ngei ka nyen sangda.
Nyi kü to ponpen ditkuda dogo ngeikei ngeakei; lausikei hanei kaijembo loan kibü noknyüh laüa khei ngo hautibou kho no yingan kikei dogo haoenei mailemtila ngei ho laukei.”
Kho lauan phaia haoei ngüh yaangei ngekkei, “Lazar, longashi.”
Haian kibü müt kho haoeibü mangsho neiei kaian hoba haoeibü thenyek lemhamneiei yuklepan longkei. Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Mangsho nei sengkuashi hoba hao litiashi.”
Hibü Jihudabü juong aoyou Mari jungto loukei, haoenei haoei kümbü hapbei, hoba hao to mailembei,
lausikei haoen yoa at Farisibü jungto haukei hoba Jisuei ai kümbei kho haoen to lenkei.
Hibü thükkabü ungshedbou shuong si Farisibü shuongei Thükkabou Kambü huiletkei hoba laukei, “Kho mütei ama- aphilabü juongnyu kümda. Sen ai kümbo setda?
Senei hao khei apyoa longa, müt pendouei hao to mailemlabü, hoba Rombü louan seneibü lembüchem si sen phang ham leilukulabü.”
Haoen yo kabü müt che Kaifa nyenbü, ao khüpo thükkabou ungshedbou penan kikei, haoei haoen to laukei, “Kanei ai angekei;
sen phangshuong pendou shembhoulabü khantoje mütli shanga müt che haibü kho kan shanga maibou dogo kaneije damankei achühda.”
Haoei ho haoeibü hauei laukei ji, lausikei khüpo thükkabou ungshedbou yingbü ka, phangshuong shanga Jisu haijan,
hoba phangshuong shanga ong aying, lausikei haoei aan kibü Mühghaü shousi shuong chela yeiko leishaila shangabü haoei ho tetenkei.
Hibü khünyet ka jaüan Jihudabüei Jisu haitila huonkei.
Hibü haoei Jihudabü yoa abongyo, lausikei khüka lamang nyangko kibü kaonyek, Efraim nyenbü sangnyu to haukei, hoba hao khünei eikshuong yoa kikei.
Jihudabü Püetbülem nyangko kikei, hoba haoen lolo saüenla shanga kaonyek ka müt juongnyu Püetbülem thedangto Jerusalem to angkei.
Haoenei Jisu lameiko kikei hoba lembüchema loan haoen si haoen hai lauyokei, “Kanei ai damda? Hao maimaitham lem to aloulabü si ai?”
Haoenei hao lapla shanga müt atei ongkei hao lan kije ngealonga, haoei ngühlang kujan, dogo thükkabü ungshedbü shuong si Farisibü shu- ongei ngühkhüm kuan kiteikei.
Püetbülem sühla chalou lak kian, Jisu, haoei haibü ka langngaitibou Lazar kishang Bethani to loukei.
Haoenei hao la shausiyung lamlekukei hoba Marthaei nongnaekei; hoba Lazarkei hao yoa shaushanga setbü yoa che kiteikei.
Mariei nam juong mubü ponlem onang thungshou che sungjung louan Jisueibü youa naangkukei hoba saoeibü khulouei haman apbukei. Chemmang pendou onang ponlemei shenkei.
Judas Iskhariot, haoeibü eik yoa che, aoei hao khümbo kuan apla kiteikei, haoei laukei,
“Aila kho ponlem onang kho sempak saongao sem lu yakan shalebü la aku?”
Haoei kho shalebü shanga dambubü ka aying, lausikei hao namphot ikjai kikei hoba kokbü yingsije thanbü ka haoei kokshauko kikei.
Jisuei laukei, “Sao khei ong phokushi; saoei ponlem kho ngo khünbü chalou shanga naphoa;
aieilausi shalebü kan yoa ponpen kia, lausikei kan yoa ngo ponpenje akilabü.”
Jihudabü mütshang yaangei Jisu Bethania kia dogo ditletkei, hoba haoen kho shanga ong aying lausikei haoei haikhün ka langngaitibü Lazar to chühlakei dogo loukei.
Thükkabü ungshedbü shuongei Lazarkei haitila huonkei,
aieilausi hao hangshong Jihudabü juongei haoen wailetkei hoba Jisu to mailembei.
Nyibounyet Lem to loubü mütshang yaangei Jisu Jerusalem to louada dogo ditkei;
hoba haoenei hekyang pik pakkei hoba hao shuokla haukei. Haoenei hai ngekdang lekei,
“Hosana!
Bunyubou nyena ao louada hao haülabü yingshi!
Israel Choba haülabou ki!”
Jisuei gadu shoushou che hapbei hoba kho thüka setkei, Laia lenan kibü tegü,
“Tehüt, Zion Sangnyu;
chühashi, kaneibü Choba gadu shoushou chenei setan louada.”
Haoeibü eikshuongei shaanglaje kho aditen, lausikei ladang Jisu soneikangkei, kheijinei haoenei ho hao shangabü Laia dobü, hoba mütshuongei hao shanga kheinyu kümbei dogo haoenei damenkei.
Haoei Lazar heekhün ka ngaanko, haibü ka langngaikujinei hao yoa kibü mütshang pendouei aukabü kukei.
Noknyühkei hao shuokla haukei aieilausi haoenei haoei kho sei kümbü ditkei.
Farisibü shuong cheei che to laukei, “Kan ai hang along dogo kanei ngeakei. Chüha, kaodak pendouei hao phai sema!”
Lem to lemla loubü shuong yoa Grikbü at yoan kikei.
Haoenei Galil kabü Bethsaidabü Filip to hai sukojako phekei, “Yaangbou, künei Jisu hapmang sühda.”
Filip loukei hoba Andria to lenkei. Andria si Filip louan Jisu to lenkei.
Jisuei haoen to jongaikei, “Müteibü Shou soneikanglabü jih süha.
Maimaitham ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda: Youli lang che kaoa shatan akhit longa, hao lansan kida; lausikei kho khitalonga, khoei mai juongnyu hekda.
Aoei haoeibü langkei sanouda, kho mauda, lausikei aoei jembü langkei mangsenda kho phoenlabü hoba thon akibü langkei haplabü.
Müt atei ngo khangensije, haoei kü phai semkai, hoba ngo lanei kilaje khünei ngo khangenboukei kilabü. Müt atei ngo khangensije, Bouei hao to soumo hatlabü.”
“Tou kü soushou to lamda, hoba ngei ai laula? Abou, ho jih ka ngo khümenkai dogo si? Lausikei ho shangabü ngo ho jih to loukei.
Abou, ka nyen soneikangtishi. Khuthük ka ngüh che loukei, ‘Ngei ho soneikangtia, hoba ngei toukei ho nyibou soneikangtilabü.’”
Khünei loan kibü noknyühei kho ditkei hoba kho langmak yingkei dogo laukei. Atei laukei, “Khuthük hangangbü cheei hao to joyoa.”
Jisuei laukei, “Ho ngühlang kü shanga aying, lausikei kan shanga ki.
Ho kaodak tou matjemda; ho kaodak songdakbou tou shian sattilabü.
Hobaje ngo ladang kaodak ka tonenlaje, ngei müt pendou kü jungto senbalabü.”
(Haoei kho hao aiei hailabü yingkeije kho lenla shanga lauan kiteikei.)
Noknyühei jongaikei, “Messiaje ponpen kida dogo künei Ngühkhüm ka dida; kholonga nyi laibü Müteibü Shou kho tonenlabü dogo lauda? Kho Müteibü Shou kho ao?”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Tuisho shanga ngesakbü kho kan yoa kilabü. Nakthühei ala- phettila shanga kan ngesakbü kijinei paiashi; aishanga ao nakthüh phanga paida haoei hao lae haudaje angeda.
Ladang kanei ngesakbü kida, kan ngesakbü shousi shuong la yeila shanga, ngesakbü to mailemashi.”
Jisuei kho lauan phaia hao satkei hoba haoen la hukukei.
Haoei haoen thedanga tetsida juongnyu kümasikei haoenei hao to maialem,
khoei Isaia thuseibüei laubü ngüh ho loushadla kiteikei,
“Bunyubou, küneibü ngühlang aoei mailembei?
Hobaje ao to Bunyubou hau tang khitkei?”
Haoenei maialemen, aishanga Isaiaei tokei lauakei,
“Haoei haoeneibü nyek thutiakei,
hoba haoeneibü maangpon ngoutiakei.
Haoei kheinyu aküm tegüje haoenei
haoeneibü nyekei haplabü,
haoeneibü maangponei ditenlabü,
hoba sepeilabü,
hoba ngei haoen maitikulabü.”
Isaiaei ho laukei aieilausi haoei Jisu soneikangbü hapbei hoba hao shanga lauko kikei.
Khei yingasikei, leiyeibü yoan juongei hao to mailembei, lausikei sinagog ka shian sattisi amailabü dogo Farisibü to hatbü ka haoenei atheku;
aishanga haoenei Mühghaü nyensang toje müteibü nyensang bouje sanoukei.
Jisuei ngekkei, “Aoei kü to mailemda, kü to mailemda aying lausikei ngo hautibou to mailemda;
hoba ngo aoei hapda, haoei ngo hautibou hapda.
Ngo ngesakbü ki, hoba kü to mailembüje aokei nakthüha akilabü shanga ngo kaodak to loukei.
Müt atei kü ngüh ditan ajungei longa, ngei haomat ajemda; aishanga ngo kaodak matjemla aying, lausikei kaodak khümenla loukei.
Aoei ngo asungletlaje hoba ngeibü ngüh asungletda haoei matjembou che kia. Ngei laubü ngühlang hoei hao thonbü chaloua mat jemlabü;
aishanga ngei jembü hauei alau, lausikei ngo hautibou, Bouei, ngei ai laula hoba lenla kho ngühkhüm kukei.
Haoeibü ngühkhüm tetlabü thon akibü langkei dogo ngei ngeakei. Bouei kü to lai lautila lenkei ngei kho ong lauda.”
Ho Püetbü Lem thedangto kikei. Jisuei haoeibü langkei ho kaodak ka Bou jungto banglabü jih lousüha dogo ngekei. Haoei kaodaka kibü haoeibü dan to sanoukei, hoba haoei haoen thonbüa sühko sanoukei.
Simon Iskhariot shou, Judasei hao khümbomeiko kuan aplabü dogo Sataneije janenan kiteikei. Nyak shaujinei
Jisuei, Bouei ajanjan pendou haoeibü ikmanga kuan apa, hoba hao Mühghaü ka loukei hoba Mühghaü jungto hauda dogo ngean,
nyakshaushang ka loenkei, haoeibü neisimei saüan phokei, hoba lemhamnei che sungbaan haoeibü manga shenkei;
kheijinei haoei deithunga dei yeikei hoba eikshuongeibü you sakkuan, haoei shenjanga shenan kibü lem- hamneiei haman apbula khangkei.
Hao Simon Peter junga sühlangkei. Peterei hao to laukei, “Bunyubou, nyi kü you sakkula kümda si?”
Jisuei hao to jongaikei, “Ngei ai kümda kho nyi touje angekei; lausikei nyi haphaia ditenlabü.”
Peterei hao to laukei, “Nyi kü you ladangkei asakkulabü!” Jisuei hao to jongaikei, “Ngei no asakku longa, no kü yoa ai phejan aki.”
Simon Peterei hao to laukei, “Bunyubou, kü you ong ayingko kü ik si kü khukei sakbüma.”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Aoei mang yua, you to limanje aikei saklabü aki, lausikei hao mang khümbo saopoakei; hoba kan sao- poakei, lankei kan pendou thamje ji;”
aishanga haoei hao khümbo yaakshaulabü müt kho ngean kiteikei. Khoei haoei laukei, “Kan pendouje asaopokei.”
Ladang haoei haoeneibü you sakkhümbuan haoeibü neisimei lekei hoba nyibou setkei, haoei haoen to laukei, “Ngei kan to ai kümbei kho kanei ditena lo?
Kanei kü to Lenbou hoba Bunyubou dogo ngada, hoba kho kanei laujana lauda, aishanga ngo kho ki.
Kholongaje, ngo kaneibü Bunyubou si Lenbouei kaneibü you sakkukei longa, kaneikei cheei cheeibü you sakkujan.
Aieilausi ngei kan shanga kümbü tegü, kaneikei khei kümjan dogo ngei kan la tetsida lena.
Maimaitham ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, aao che kho haoeibü bunyu to yaangbou ayingsi hautibü kho hautibou to yaangbou aying.
Kanei ho ngean kanei jungeia longa, kan olinbou.
Ngei kan pendou shangabü alauda. Ngei ao pienkeije ngei ngeakei. Lausikei Lai ngüh ho naloushad, ‘Aoei kü shausiyung shauda haoei khü- peian kü khu limbei.’
Ladang ho loushadlaje kheijinei kanei ngo kho hao dogo mailemtila shanga, ho ühaüthükjinei ngei kan la tou lenteida.
Maimaitham ngühmaia ngei kan la lenda, aoei ngei hautibou sungletlaje haoei ngo sungletda, hoba aoei ngo sungletda, haoei ngo hautibou sungletda.”
Jisuei kho lauan phaia hao to maangto shatbü lilitham loukei hoba tang khitko laukei, “Maimaitham ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, kan yo kabü cheei ngo khümbomeiko kuan aplabü.”
Eikshuongei cheei che to chühyo khüpbei, aieilausi haoei ao to laudaje haoenei ashuoken.
Haoeibü eikshuong yoa che, Jisuei ao to sanouda, hao kho nongyoan Jisu thena setan kiteikei.
Simon Peterei hao to nyek sheman lenko, haoei ao shangabü laudaje kho phela shanga laukei.
Aüan setbü yam, haoei Jisueibü khukua nongngailangan hao to laukei, “Bunyubou, kho ao?”
Jisuei jongaikei, “Ngei ho wentek phaua haman aola kulaje kho müt yinglabü.” Kheijinei haoei wentek che phaua haman sungenkei hoba Simon Iskhariot shou Judas la kukei.
Ladang haoei kho shaukei, Satan hao to atkei. Jisuei hao to laukei, “Nyi ai kümlaje, tongde kümashi.”
Haoei aila hao to khei laukeije khün setbü shuong aoeikei ange.
“Senei Lem shanga ai khamdaje jekashi,” ayingsi haoei “Shalebü la aicheje kujan,” dogo lauda lembo ateije dambei.
Hibü haoei wentek kho shauan phaia hao wenjung satkei. Kho nangnak kikei.
Judas satan phaia Jisuei laukei, “Tou Müteibü Shou soneikanga, hoba hao to Mühghaü soneikanga,
Mühghaü hao to soneikanga, Mühghaüeikei hao jembü yoa soneikangtilabü, hoba haoei kho toutham kümlabü.
Kü shousi shuong, touje ngo kan yoa tuisho ong kilabü. ‘Kanei ngo lameilabü, hoba ngo laeto haulaje kan alouenlabü’, dogo ngei Jihudabü to laukubü tegü, toukei ngei kanlakei lenda.
Ngei kan la ngühkhüm haanbü che kuda: Kan cheei che to sanouyoashi; ngei kan to sanoubü tegü, cheei che to sanoushi.
Kan cheei che to sanoubü danko kan ngeibü eikshuong dogo pendouei ngelabü.”
Simon Peterei hao to laukei, “Bunyubou, no lato hauda?” Jisuei jongaikei, “Ngo laeto haudaje nyi tou kü phai semla athükkei, lausikei nyi phaia semenlabü.”
Peterei hao to laukei, “Bunyubou, ngei aiei ka phai tou asemenla? Ngei ka shanga kü langkei phoyokulabü.”
Jisuei jongaikei, “Nyi kü shanga kaibü langkei phokulep si? Maimaitham ngühmaia ngei kato lenda, Nyi ngo angekei dogo semnei alau shongko aunakei akoulabü.”
“Kaneibü maangpon teleilu. Mühghaü to mailemashi; kütokei mailemshi.
Kübou chema kishang juongnyu kia. Khei aying tegüje, ngo kan shanga kishang lamlekula hauda dogo lenlep si?
Hobaje ngo hauan kan shanga kishang lamlea longa, ngo nyibou longeilabü, hoba ngo lanei kilaje khünei kankei kilabü lele ngei kan kü jungto leilanglabü.
Ngo laeto haudaje kanei lam kho ngeakei.”
Thomaei hao to laukei, “Bunyubou, no laeto haudaje künei angekei; künei lam kho lai ngekei?”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Ngo lamnyu, ngühmai hoba langkei. Ngo adankoje aokei Kübou jungto alouda.
Kanei ngo ngea tegüje, kanei Küboukei ngelabü. Tou ka jaüan kanei hao ngea hoba hao hapa.”
Filipei hao to laukei, “Bunyubou, kün la Bou lenbü; kholonga kün khoei soua.”
Jisuei hao to jongaikei, “Filip, ngo kan pendou yoa halokche kida lausikei kanei ngo angekei lo? Aoei ngo hapa haoei Boukei hapa. Aila kanei, ‘Kün la Bou lenbü’ dogo lauda?
Ngo Bou to kida hoba Bou kü to kida dogo kanei maialemda lo? Ngei kan pendou to ai lenda ngei ngeibü jembü hauei alauda; ho kü to kibü Bou ki hoba hao jembü kümsilei kümda.
Ngo Bou to ki hoba Bou kü to ki dogo kü to mailemkai; khei ayingsikei kümsilei shanga ongkei mailemshi.
Ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, aoei kü to mailemdaje haoeikei ngei kümbo kibü kümsilei kümlabü hoba ho to yaangbü kümsilei haoei kümlabü, aishanga ngo Bou jungto hauda;
hoba kanei kü nyena ai ong hilaje, Shou to Bou soneikangtilabü shanga ngei kümlabü.
Kanei denche shanga ongkei kü nyena hialonga ngei kho kümbulabü.
“Kanei kü to sanoua longa kanei kü ngühkhüm jungeilabü;
hoba ngei Bou to hilabü hoba ponpen kan yoa kilabü lele haoei kan la lubü Thuibou che kulabü,
kho ngühmai Soushou, ao kaodakei asungletenda; aieilausi kaodakei hao ladangkei ühüpda ayingsi angeda. Kanei hao ngeakei aishanga hao kan yoa kida hoba kan to ki.
“Ngei kan litham üpyolabü, ngo kan jungto louada.
Longche kian kaodakei ngo touje ühüplabü, lausikei kanei ngo haplabü. Aieilausi ngo lang kia, kankei lang kilabü.
Khünyet kanei ngo Kübou to ki, khei, kan kü to hoba ngo kan to kida dogo kanei ngelabü.
Aoei kü ngühkhüm ngeda hoba khübü jungeida haoei kü to sanouda; hoba aoei kü to sanouda hao Kübouei sanoulabü, hoba ngei hao to sanoulabü hoba ngo lolo hao to tang khitlabü.”
Judas, (Iskhariot ayingko lubü che) ei hao to laukei, “Bunyubou, ailaibü no kaodak toje tang akhitko, kün to ong tang khitla?”
Jisuei hao to jongaikei, “Müt atei kü to sanoua longa haoei kü ngüh jungeilabü, hoba Kübouei hao to sanoulabü, hoba küsi hao jungto loulabü hoba hao yoa kilabü.
Aoei kü to asanouda haoei kü ngüh ajungeida; hoba kanei ditbü ho kü ngüh ji, lausikei ngo hautibou Boueibü ngüh ki.
“Ngo kan yoa kijinei ngei habü ngüh ho kan to laukua;
lausikei Thuibou, Soushou Saopobü, ao Bouei kü nyena hautilabü ki, haoei kan la pendou lenlabü hoba ngei kan to laubü pendou damentilabü.
Hakso, ngei kan la bangbü jongsak apyokuda, kaodakei kubou kheibü aying lausikei ngeibü hakso ngei kan la kuda. Kaneibü maangpon teleilu hoba tehüt.
Ngei kan to, ‘Ngo hauan apda, hoba ngo kan jungto nyibou longeilabü,’ dogo laubü kanei dida. Kanei kü to sanousije ngo Bou jungto haudabü kan olinlabü, aieilausi Bou kü to yaangbou ki.
Ho ladang loushadlaje kheijinei kanei mailemlabü shanga, ho mohaüthükjinei
