ngei kan to lalok ajoyolabü, aishanga kaodak songdakbou kho louada. Lausikei hao kü thüka ai hau aki;
habü pendou kho khei ngei Bou to sanouda hoba ngei Bouei kü la ngühkhüm kubü tegü kümda dogo kaodakei ngelabü shanga ong ki. Meimeiashi, sen haka satakho.
“Ngo tükdebü semlüh, hoba kü Bou kho moubou ki.
Kü to kibü laobou bheka ong eheklaje haoei kho wapan apda, hoba aei hektila shanga laobou bheka ong mai heklaje kho saüenkuda.
Ngei kan to laubü ngühei touje kan saüenakei.
Kü to kishi hoba ngo kan to kikho. Semlüh li to akibü bhekei lai jembü lolo mai hekla athük, kho tegü kaneikei kan kü to akilonga mai hekla athük.
Ngo semlüh long; kan bhek. Ao kü to kian ngo hao to kida, haoei mai juong hekda, aieilausi kü ka bangan kanei ai akümen.
Atei kü to akilonga hao bhek tegü apda hoba linda. Khübü bhek shuong kho yoshaian wan to jikan apda.
Kan kü to kialonga hoba kü ngüh kan to kialonga, kanei ai ong mangsühdaje hiashi hoba ngei kho kan la kümbulabü.
“Kanei mai juongnyu hekko hoba kan tükdebü ngeibü eikshuong dogo lenenbü danko Kübou soneikangda.
Bouei kü to ailai sanoukei kho tegü ngeikei kan to sanoukei. Ngeibü sanoua kishi.
Ngei ailai Küboueibü ngühkhüm jungeikei, kho tegü kanei kü ngühkhüm jungeia longa kan ngeibü sanoua kilabü.
Ngeibü lenbü kan to kilabü hoba kaneibü olinbü penbüsoubü yeila shanga ho ngei kan to lenda.
Ho kü ngühkhüm ki, khei kan cheei che to sanouyoshi.
Müt cheei hao thangbou shuong shanga jembü langkei phoyokulabü to liman lubü sanou yaangbü aki.
Ngei kan la ai sakkuda kho kanei kümalonga kan kü thangbou shuong ki.
Ngei touje kan to sambü dogo angada, aishanga haoeibü bunyuei ai kümda kho sambüei angekei; lausikei ngei kan to thangbou shuong dogo ngada, aishanga ngei Kübou ka ditbü pendou ngei kan la ngetia.
Kanei ngo apien. Kanei hauan mai juongnyu, khei süngshonbü mai hektila shanga ngei kan pienkei; hibü kanei Bou ka kü nyena ai shanga ong hilaje kho haoei kan la kulabü.
Ngei kan la ho ngühkhüm kuda; cheei che to sanoushi.
“Kaodakei kan mangsena longa, kan to amangsenjineithama hoei ngo mangsenkei dogo kanei ngeashi.
Kan kaodakeibü tegüje, kaodakei jembüeibü to sanoulabü. Kaodakei kan mangsenda aieilausi kan kaodakeibü aying. Ngei kan kaodak ka pienkei.

‘Aao che kho haoeibü bunyu to yaangbou aying’, dogo ngei kan to ai laukei kho damenashi. Haoenei ngo shieikoekei longaje, haoenei kankei shieikoelabü; haoenei kü ngüh ditalonga, haoenei kaneibü ngühkei ditkulabü.
Lausikei haoenei khübü pendou kü nyena kan to kümlabü, aieilausi haoenei ngo hautibou kho angekei.
Ngo louan haoen to ajoyo tegüje, haoen shabü teyingkhoulabü; touje haoeneibü shabü shanga haoen satenshang aki.
Aoei ngo mangsenda haoei kü Boukei mangsenda.
Ngei haoen yoa lubü aoeikei akümbü kümsilei habü aküm tegüje, haoen shedbü teyingkhoulabü; lausikei haoenei küküm külei hapa hoba Kübou küsi ham mangsenkei.
Hibü haoeneibü Ngühkhüma doan kibü tegü ngüh ho loushadjan, ‘Ai ayingbüa haoenei ngo mangsenkei.’
“Ladang ngei Bou ka hautibü Thuibou loulaje, Bou ka laobou ngühmai Soushou ki, haoei kü shanga aukabü künlabü;
kankei ngeibü aukabü shuong ki aieilausi kan khangbü ka jaüan kü yoa kikei.
“Kan aphaiyettila shanga ngei kan la khübü ngüh lenkei.
Mütshuongei kan sinagog ka shian sattilabü. Maimaitham aoei ong ladang kan haitilaje haoei songle kümsilei kümda dogo damlabü jihsiphai che louada.
Haoenei kho kümlabü aishanga haoenei Bou ayingsi ngokei angekei.
Ladang khübü haüthüklabü jihsiphai lousühlaje, ngei khübü shanga kan la lena dogo kanei damenla shanga ngei khübü kho kan to lena.
“Ngei khanglaje kan to habü alen, aieilausi ngo kan yoa kikei.
Lausikei ngo tou ngo hautibou jungto ngaida, hoba kan aoeiche ongkei, ‘No lato hauda?’ dogo aphe;
lausikei ngei khübü lenabü maangmauei kaneibü maang- pon shena.

Khei yingasikei ngei kan to ngühmaia lenda; ho kan maila yaangla shanga ngo hauan apjan, aishanga ngo hauan üplonga, kan jungto Thuibou kho aloulabü; lausikei ngo ngaia longa ngei hao kan jungto hautikulabü.
Hao ladang loulaje haoei kaodakbü la shabü, saopobü, hoba matjembü shangabü ngühtet lenlabü; hoba müt kho latetche shabü, kho aukabü kulabü.
Haoei haoen la kü to maialembü kho shabü dogo lenlabü.
Haoei ngeibü saopobü aukabü kulabü khola ngo Bou jungto hauda, khola kanei ngo touje ühüplabü.
Haoei matjembü kho lousüha dogo aukabü kulabü, khola ho kaodakbü songdakbou kho mat jeman apa.
Ngei toukei kan to juong lenlabü jouakei, lausikei kanei kho touje anatenlabü;

lausikei ladang hao ngühmai Soushou loulaje, haoei kan ngühmai pendou to leilabü, aishanga haoei jembü hauei alaulabü, lausikei haoei ai ong ditda haoei laulabü, hoba haoei kan la loula kibü shanga lenlabü.
Haoei ngo soneikangtilabü, aieilausi haoei kan la ai lenlaje kho haoei ngeibü ka lelabü.
Boueibü ai ong kho pendou ngeibü; khoei ngei, haoei kan la ai lenlaje kho haoei ngeibü ka lelabü, dogo laukei.
“Longche kian kanei ngo ühüplabü; toukei longche kian kanei ngo haplabü.”
Haoeibü eikshuong atei at to laukei, “Haoei sen to, ‘Longche kian phaia kanei ngo ühüplabü; tokei longche kian phaia kanei ngo haplabü,’ hoba ‘Aishanga ngo Bou jungto hauda,’ dogo laubü tetlabü ai?”
Hibü haoenei laukei, “Haoei ‘Longche kian phaia,’ dogo laubü kho tetlabü ai? Haoei ai laudaje senei angekei.”
Jisuei haoenei hao to phemang sühbü kho ngeenkei hoba haoen to laukei, “Kan yoa ai shangabü pheyoda? Ho ngei, ‘Longche kian phaia kanei ngo ühüplabü.’ dogo laubü shangabü sai?
Maimaitham ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, kan haapyolabü hoba manghaaplabü, lausikei kaodakei olinlabü; kan maangto shatlabü lausikei kaneibü maangshat kho olinbü la yeilabü.
“Ladang yaksa cheei na bukda, sao to maangmauei shatda aieilausi saoeibü jih süha; lausikei ladang saoei na kho bukdaje, kaodak to müt che bukbü olinbüei sao khonkubü kho touje adamenda.
Kankei tou maangmau kia; lausikei ngei kan nyibou haplabü, hoba kaneibü maangpon olinlabü, hoba aoeikei kaneibü olin kan ka asolanglabü.
Khünyet kanei kü to aikei aphelabü. Maimaitham ngühmaia ngei kan to lenda, kanei Bou ka kü nyena denche ongkei hialonga haoei kan la kho kulabü.
Tou sühko kanei kü nyena aikei ihikei; hiashi hoba kanei haplabü, khei yingsije kaneibü olin penbüsoubü yeilabü.
“Ngei habü ho kan to ngühtetei ong joyoa. Ngei kan to ho tegübüei alaulabü, lausikei ngei Bou shangabü kan to shangshenko lenlabü jihsiphai che lousühada.
Kho chaloua kanei kü nyena Bou ka hilabü, hoba ngei kan nyena Bou ka phekulabü dogo alauda;
aishanga Bouei jembü lolo kan to sanouda, aieilausi kanei ngo sanoukei hoba ngo Mühghaü ka loukei dogo kanei mailembei.
Ngo Bou ka loukei, hoba ngo kaodak to loukei; nyiboukei ngei kaodak apyoda hoba ngo Bou jungto hauda.”
Haoeibü eikshuongei laukei, “Chüha! Nyi touje ngühtetei ayingko shangshenko lauda.
Nyi pendou ngeakei hoba aoeikei kaka phelabü kümsilei aki dogo künei ngeda; kho danko no Mühghaü ka loukei dogo künei mailemda.”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Kanei touje mailemda lo?
Chühashi, kan mütpem weko lulu chem to aalabü hoba kanei kü mütpem apyolabü kheibü jihsiphai che louda hoba kho lousüha; khei yingasikei ngo kü mütpem aying, aieilausi Bou kü yoa ki.
Kü to kanei hakso hapla shanga ngei khübü kho kan to lena. Kaodaka kan khonsak khonku kilabü. Lausikei maang khaiashi, ngei kaodak thükena.”
Jisuei khübü laukei. Hobaje haoei khuthük to chühangtikei hoba laukei, “Abou, jihsiphai lousüha; shouei no soneikangtilabü lele kashou soneikangtikai;
aishanga nyi hao la kubü pendou la thon akibü langkei kulabü lele nyi hao la khunak shousi pendou thüka hau kuan phoakei.
No tükdebü Mühghaü che, hoba nyi hautibou Jisu Khrista ngelabü ho thon akibü langkei ki.
Nyi kü la nongkubü kümsilei wantibü danko ngei ho kaodaka no soneikangtia.
Tou, O Abou, kaodak moyaüjinei kiteibü soneikangbüei nyi ngo ka yoa soneikangtikai.
Kaodak ka nyi kü la kubü mütshuong to ngei ka nyen tang khittia. Haoen kaibü kiteikei, nyi haoen kü la kukei, hoba ka ngüh ditda.
Nyi kü la kubü ajanjan pendou kaka louda dogo haoenei touje ngeda;
aieilausi nyi kü la kubü ngüh shuong ngei haoen la kua, hoba haoenei khübü sungleda, ngo kaka loukei dogo haoenei tükde ditleda, hoba nyi ngo hautikei dogo haoenei mailema.
Ngei haoen shanga welauda; ngei kaodak shanga awelauda, lausikei nyi kü la kubü shuong shanga welaukuda, aishanga haoen kaibü.
Khübü pendou ngeibü, hoba ngeibü pendou kaibü ki, hoba ngo haoen to soneikanga.
Ngo touje kaodaka aki, lausikei haoen kaodaka kia, hoba ngo ka jungto louada. Saopobü Abou, haoenkei seti tegü che ong yingtila shanga, nyi kü la kubü ka nyen hauei hatlepshi.
Ngo ladang haoen yoa kikei, nyi kü la kubü ka nyen hauei ngei haoen hatlepbei, hoba ngei haoen lombei, hoba Lai loushadlabü lele, maula tetbü che to liman, haoen aokei amau.
Tou ngo ka jungto louada, hoba haoenei ngeibü olin penkosouko haplabü lele ngei ho ngüh kaodaka lauda.
Ngei haoen la kaibü ngüh kua, hoba kaodakei haoen mangsenkei, aieilausi ngo lai kaodakeibü aying kho tegü haoenkei kaodakeibü aying.
Nyi haoen kaodak ka sunglangashi dogo ngei asuajada, lausikei nyi haoen amaibou ka püetashi dogo sudajada.
Ngo lai kaodakeibü aying kho tegü haoenkei kaodakeibü aying.
Haoen ngühmaia saüenkushi. Kaibü ngüh kho ngühmai ki.
Nyi ngo kaodak to hautibü tegü, ngeikei haoen kaodak to hautia;
hoba haoenkei ngühmaia saüenlabü lele, ngei ngo lolo haoen shanga saüenda.
“Ngei habü shuong shanga ong aying lausikei haoeneibü ngüh danko kü to mailembü shuong shangakei welauda.
Abou, haoen pendou che ong yeitishi; nyi ngo hautikei dogo kaodakei mailemtila, no kü to hoba ngo ka to kibü tegü haoenkei seti to kitishi.
Seti lai ki kho tegü haoenkei che ong yeitila shanga, nyi laobou soneikangbü kü la kua, kho soneikangbü nyi haoen la kua;
ngo haoen to hoba no kü to kibü danko haoen che ong yeilabü, khei yingsije nyi kü to sanoubü tegü haoen to kei sanouda dogo kaodakei ngelabü.
“Abou, haoen nyi küla kukei hoba nyi haoen, ngo lanei kije khünei kitimang sühda, khei yingsije nyi kü la kubü ngeibü soneikangbü haplabü, aieilausi kaodak moyaüjinei thama nyi ngo sanoukei.
Saopobü Abou, kaodakei no angeenkei, lausikei ngei no ngeakei, hoba habü mütshuongei nyi ngo hautikei dogo ngeakei.
Nyi haoen la ka nyen ngetia, toukei ho ngetilabü; hoba laobou sanouei nyi ngo sanoua kho haoen to kilabü, hoba ngo haoen to kilabü.”
Ladang Jisuei khübü ngüh laukhümbei, hao haoeibü eikshuong yoa Kidron shumang danko haukei. Khünei bamang che kikei, khüto hao hoba haoeibü eikshuong haukei.
Judas, aoei hao khümbo kuan aplabü kiteikei, haoeikei kho kaoen ngean kikei aieilausi Jisuei hanghangko khünei hao eikshuong to haüyoko kikei.
Judasei thükkabü ungshedbü shuong si Farisi shuong ka shetenbü sepai si lombü tan che leibakei hoba wanthung, hantin hoba in si aubu jungan khüto loukei.
Jisuei hao la haüthüklabü pendou ngean, longkei hoba haoen to laukei, “Kanei ao lamda?”
Haoenei hao to jongaikei, “Nazaretbü Jisu.” Haoei haoen to laukei, “Ngo hao.” Judas, aoei hao khümbo kuan apbei, hao haoen yoa loan kiteikei.
Ladang Jisuei haoen to, “Ngo hao” dogo laukei, haoen phai sukkei hoba kaoa tuongkei.
Hibü haoei haoen ka nyiboula phekei, “Kanei ao lamda?” Haoenei laukei, “Nazaretbü Jisu.”
Jisuei jongaikei, “Ngo hao yingkei dogo ngei kan la lena. Kanei ngo lamda longa, habü mütshuong ngaitiashi”
ho, “Nyi kü la kubü ka ngei aokei amauti,” dogo haoei laubü loushadla yingan kiteikei.
Simon Peterei inlou che kiteikei, kho setenkei, hoba thükkabou ungshedboueibü sambü che to wapbei, hoba haoeibü mae nou shipan apbukei. Kho sambüeibü nyen Malka kikei.
Jisuei Peter to laukei, “Kaibü inlou kho mepoua shouashi. Thung laobou Bouei kü la kua, kho ngei ayunglep lo?”
Kheijinei shetenbü sepai shuong, hajar thükkabou hoba Jihudabü lombü shuongei Jisu lapbei, hoba hao khühkei
hoba shaangla hao Ana jungto leian haukei, aishanga hao khüpo thükkabou ungshedbou penbou Kaifaeibü kounyangbou kiteikei.
Ho Kaifaei, mütli shanga müt che haijan dogo Jihudabü la huon lenko kikei.
Simon Peter si lubü eik cheei Jisu phai sembei. Kho eik kho thükkabou ungshedbouei ngean kikei hoba hao Jisu yoa thükkabou ungshedbou sang- chimang to atkei.
Lausikei Peterje khonga koukhün junga loan kiteikei. Hibü eik, ao thükkabou ungshedbou to ngeyoan kikei, hao louan koukhüna kibü yaksa to joyokei hoba Peter leiyetkei.
Saoei Peter to laukei, “Nokei ho müteibü eik yoa che sai?” Haoei laukei, “Ngoje aying.”
Sambü si lombü shuongei khambü ka wankak jikan wan metkei, hoba haoen khünei kham sepbo loan kikei. Peterkei khünei haoen yoa kham sepbo lokei.
Thükkabou ungshedbouei Jisu ka haoeibü eikshuong hoba haoeibü lenbü shangabü phekei.
Jisuei hao to jongaikei, “Ngei kaodak to tang khitko laua. Ngei ponpendou Jihudabü yoshaishang sinagog si lembüchema lenkei, hoba ngei huphanga ai alau.
Kü to aila pheda? Ngei haoen to ai laukeije ditbü shuong to pheashi. Ngei ai laukeije haoenei ngekei.”
Ladang haoei kho laukei, loan kibü lombou yoa cheei, “Nyi thükkabou ungshedbou to hai jongaijan si?” dogo lauko Jisueibü thenyek to ipbei.
Jisuei hao to jongaikei, “Ngei mashikan lauan kisije mashikbü aukabü kuashi; lausikei janbü yingan kialonga aila kü to ngümda?”
Anaei hao khühan thükkabou ungshedbou Kaifa jungto litikei.
Simon Peter kham sepbo loan kikei. Haoenei hao to laukei, “Nokei haoeibü eikshuong yoa che sai?” Haoei kho athelet; haoei laukei, “Ngoje aying.”
Peterei nou shipan apbubou chempen, thükkabou ungshedboueibü sambü yoa cheei laukei, “Ngei no bamanga hao yoa ühüpou si?”
Toukei Peterei hao athelet, hoba khoyam aunak koukei.
Haoenei Jisu Kaifa chem ka governor chem to leian haukei. Kho langngelamto yingan kikei. Haoen atot akhonyoko Püetbülem shauenlabü shanga haoen chemmang toje üt.
Hibü Pilat haoen jungto khong to angkei hoba laukei, “Ho müt khulimbo kanei ai shedbü sungbada?”
Haoenei hao to jongaikei, “Ho müt ho ashed ayaütibü müt che tegüje, künei hao ka la khümbo tekukhoulabü.”
Pilatei haoen to laukei, “Hao kanei lolo leilangashi, hoba kaneibü ngühkhüma kibü tegü kanei lolo mat jemashi.” Jihudabüei hao to laukei, “Kün la aokei haitila asakkukei.”
Kho Jisuei hao ai haiei hailabü shanga lenkei kho loushadla yingan kiteikei.
Pilat chemmang to ngaikei, Jisu ngakei hoba hao to laukei, “No Jihudabü Choba sai?”
Jisuei jongaikei, “Nyi ho no lolo lauda si ayingsi atei kü shangabü ka to lenkei?”
Pilatei jongaikei, “Ngo Jihudabü si? Kaibü jembü phang hoba thükkabü ungshedbou shuongei no kü la khümbo kuan apbei. Nyi ai kümbei?”

Jisuei jongaikei, “Kü sangle ho kaodak ka alouda. Kü sangle ho kaodak ka loukei tegüje, ngo Jihudabü la khümbo kuan üptila shanga ngeibü sambü shuongei wapyokhoulabü; lausikei ngeibü sangleje ho ka loukei aying.”

Pilatei hao to laukei, “Kholonga no choba lo?” Jisuei jongaikei, “Ngo choba che dogo nyi lauda. Ngo ngühmai shanga aukabü künla bukkei hoba kho shangabü ngo ho kaodak to loukei dogo ngei lauda. Aoyou ngühmaieibü ki haoenei ngeibü ngüh ditda.”
Pilatei hao to laukei, “Ngühmai kho ai?”
Haoei kho lauan phaia hao nyibou Jihudabü jungto angkei hoba haoen to laukei, “Ngei ho müt to ai shedbü ühüpenda;
lausikei Püetbülema ngei kan shanga müt che litikula kho kaneibü songa ki. Ngei kan la Jihudabü choba kho litikula kanei maang angasao?”
Haoenei ngekyoko laukei, “Hao aying lausikei Baraba.” Baraba kho kokbü che kikei.
Kheijinei Pilatei Jisu leilangan ngümtikei,
hoba sepai shuongei jakei khun che yikkei hoba haoeibü khua hankukei, hoba haoenei hao la nakthüngan sakbü nei che neikukei.
Hobaje haoenei hao jungto louan, “Salangko kishi, Jihudabü Choba!” dogo laudang lekei, hoba haoenei haoeibü thenyek to ipbo lekei.
Pilat tangto nyibou angkei hoba Jihudabü shuong to laukei, “Chühashi, ngei hao to ai shedbü achühenda, dogo kanei ngela shanga ngei hao kan jungto leian longkuda.”
Hibü Jisu jakeibü khun hanan hoba nakthüngle sakbü nei neian longkei. Pilatei haoen to laukei, “Chühashi, ho müt yingkei.”

Ladang thükkabou ungshedbü hoba lombü shuongei hao hapbei, haoenei, “Hao peiseia thüngashi! Hao peiseia thüngashi!” dogo ngekyokei. Pilatei haoen to laukei, “Kanei hao leilangan kanei lolo hao peiseia thüngashi; aieilausi ngei hao to ai shedbü ühüpenda.”
Jihudabüei hao to jongaikei, “Künei ngühkhüm che kia, hoba kho ngühkhüm songei hao haijan, aieilausi haoei lolo hao Mühghaü Shou la yeikei.”
Ladang Pilatei kho ngüh ditkei hao aeibou hatkei,
hoba hao chemmang to atngaikei, hoba Jisu to laukei, “No laka loukei?” Jisuei hao to ai ajongai.
Pilatei hao to laukei, “Nyi kü to ajoyoda si? No litila kü to hau kia hoba no haitila kü to hau kia dogo nyi angekei lo?”
Jisuei jongaikei, “Thükkabü ka ka la hau aku tegüje no kü thüka ai haukei tekikhoulabü. Hibü aoei ngo ka la khümbo kukei, haoeibü shabü yaangbou ki.”

Kho ngüh- chunga Pilatei hao litila kümbei. Lausikei Jihudabü shuongei, “Nyi kho müt litia longaje no Kaisar thangbou aying. Aoei ong jembü lolo hao choba dogo lauda, haoei Kaisar khulimda,” dogo lauko ngekyokei.
Ladang Pilatei kho ditkei haoei Jisu tangto leibakei, hoba, “Laangshebü”, Ibri ngühyema, “Gabbatha,” dogo laubü kaoen matjemshanga hao setkei.
Kho Püetbülem thedangto kiteikei. Haoei Jihudabü shuong to laukei, “Chühashi, kaneibü Choba!”

Haoenei ngekkei, “Hao haitiashi, hao haitiashi, hao peiseia thüngashi!” Pilatei haoen to laukei, “Ngei kaneibü Choba peiseia thüngla se?” Thükkabü ungshedbü shuongei laukei, “Kaisar to liman künei ao Choba aki.”
Kheijinei haoei hao peiseia thüngla shanga khümbo kukei.
Hibü haoenei Jisu leilangkei,
hoba haoei haoeibü peisei pean, “Khulo Kaoen” dogo laubou, Ibri ngühyemei “Golgotha” to haukei.
Khünei haoenei hao peiseia thüngkei, hoba hao yoa lubü müt nyi Jisu jenyu lean jijinei che che thüngkei.
Pilatei ngühkung che doan peiseia thipbukei. Dobü kho hai kikei, “NAZARETBÜ JISU, JIHUDABÜ CHOBA.”
Jihudabü juongei kho ngüh wekei, aieilausi Jisu peiseia thüngbü kaoen kho sangnyu nyangko kikei hoba kho Ibri, Latin hoba Grik ngühyema dokei.
Hibü Jihudabü khukabü ungshedbü shuongei hao to laukei, “ ‘Jihudabü Choba’ dogo tedo, lausikei ‘Haoei ngo Jihudabü Choba, dogo laukei’ dogo doashi.”
Pilatei jongaikei, “Ngei ai dokeije doa.”

Ladang sepai shuongei Jisu peiseia thüngkei, haoenei haoeibü nei sungkei hoba sepai shuong che bangei penko pem lei la janyinkei. Haoenei mangyukkei sungkei; kho shimo akiko, thük ka chemala takbü yingan kiteikei.
Khola haoen cheei che to laukei, “Senei ho tejitnyinkho, lausikei ho aoeibü yinglaje janenla shanga phaang pakyokho.” Kho Laishibaei hai laubü loushadla yingan kiteikei:
“Haoenei ngeibü neisimei haoen yoa janyokei,
hoba ngeibü mangyuk shanga phaang leyokei.”
Kho tegü sepai shuongei kümbei.
Tou Jisueibü nyu, haonyueibü na, Klopa yak Mari hoba Mari Magdalin, dogo haoeibü peisei junga loan kikei.
Jisuei haonyu hoba haoei sanoubü eik sao nyangko loan hapbei, hoba haoei sao to laukei, “Yaksa, kashou to chühashi.”
Haoei kho phaia eik khüto laukei, “Kanyu to chü- hashi.” Kho jih ka jaüan eik khoei sao kho hao chem to leian satkei.
Ajanjan pendou kümphema dogo Jisuei ngekei. Laishiba loushadtila haoei laukei, “Ngo deilada.”
Khünei haijepbü dei shenko thung che tenan kikei. Haoenei oda haijepbü dei shenko haman hisop phodong chenei lonan haken to attikukei.
Jisuei haijepbü dei kho shepbei hoba laukei, “Pendou wana.” Hobaje haoei khu ngomletkei hoba haoeibü soushou bangtikei.

Ho chalou Nounyet thedangto kiteikei. Hibü Jihudabü shuongei Pilat to peiseia thüngbü mütshuongeibü you kho setnguokkuan mang shuong kho langtila phekei. Kho haoenei Nounyet peiseia mang aphola shanga kümbei, aishanga Nounyet kho chalou yaangbü che kiteikei.
Hibü sepai shuong louan, Jisu yoa peiseia thüngbü shaangboueibü you hoba lubü khoeibü you dogo setnguokkukei.
Kho phaia haoen hao jungto loukei, hoba ladang haoenei hao haian apan hapbei, haoenei haoeibü you asetnguokku,
lausikei sepai yoa cheei haoeibü hiplang to aubuei sepbei, hoba khoyam sii si dei longkei.
(Ho, kho hapboueibü aukabü, kaneikei mai nalemla shanga kukei, hoba haoeibü aukabü kho ngühmai ki. Haoei ngühmai lenda dogo ngebou müt che kia.)
Habü ho Laishibaei, “Haoeibü lo che ongkei anguoklabü” dogo lenbü loushadla shanga haüthükkei.
Toukei, lubü Laiei lauda, “Haoenei ao to sepbei hao to haoenei chühlabü.”

Kho phaia Arimatheabü Josef, (ao Jisueibü eik che, lausikei Jihudabü to hatbü ka huphang kabü che kikei), haoei Pilat to Jisueibü mang sunglangla shanga phekei; hoba Pilatei sakkukei. Hibü hao loukei hoba haoeibü mang langkei.
Nikodema, ao shaangla Jisu jungto nangnak loukei, haoeikei ponlem hibü jen hoba bunai kheiyobü seret anjinsem thüng atsheibü sungbakei.
Hibü haosiei Jisueibü mang sungkei hoba inyaibü neiei ponlem peisilei yoa shokei, aieilausi kho Jihudabü mangap song kiteikei.
Hao lanei peiseia thüngetkei khünei bamang che kikei, hoba bamang khünei aokei khünan achühbü heekhün haanbü che kiteikei.
Haosiei Jisu khünei khünkei, aieilausi kho chalou Jihudabü Nounyet thedangto kiteikei hoba hee kho nyangbüa kikei.
Balea shaangbounyet ete, jijimomoa Mari Magdalin hee to loukei hoba laang kho khüka khoklangan hapbei.
Hibü sao laangjung Simon Peter si lubü eik aoto Jisuei sanoukei, haosi jungto loukei hoba haosi to lenkei, “Haoenei Bunyubou heekhün ka sunglanga, hoba haoenei hao lanei phokeije künei angekei.”
Hibü Peter si lubü eik nyiei apyojung heedang aeto haukei.
Ham liko laangkei; lausikei lubüei Peter leilangkei hoba heea shaang sühlangkei.
Haoei seman chühlitikei, hoba nei inyaibü kho hangletan hapbei, lausikei hao maangto üt.
Simon Peterkei hao phaito loukei, hoba heekhün to atkei; hoba haoei nei inyaibü kho hangletan hapbei,
hoba khukabü nei khoje nei inyaibü yoa aying, lausikei kaoen chenei nopshaian kiteikei.
Kheijinei lubü eik, ao shaang heea sühlangkei, haokei maangto atkei, hoba hapbei hoba mailembei;
aishanga hao haibü ka langngaijan dogo laubü Laishiba ngüh haoenei moditen.
Hibü eikshuong chem to haan ngaikei.
Mari heekoa haapbo loan kiteikei. Saoei haapbo haapbo heemang to semlitikei,
hoba saoei, khuthük hangangbü nyi, thupaibü helea, Jisu mang phoshang khukhüm aenei che hoba che youdanga dogo setan hapbei.
Haosiei sao to laukei, “No aila haapda?” Saoei haosi to laukei, “Haoenei ngeibü Bunyubou mang sunglanga, hoba haoenei hao lanei khünkeije ngei angekei.”
Saoei khei lauan phaia sepeian chühngaikei hoba Jisu loan hapbei lausikei saoei kho Jisu dogo ange.
Jisuei sao to laukei, “No aila haapda? Nyi ao lamda?” Hao bamang lombou dogo daman saoei hao to laukei, “Yaangbou, nyi hao langan kisije, kü la lenbü, hoba ngei hao ngailanglabü.”
Jisuei sao to laukei, “Mari!” Saoei sepeikei hoba hao to Ibri ngühyema laukei, “Rabuni!” (kho tetlabü, Lenbou.)

Jisuei sao to laukei, “Kü to tejung, aishanga ngo Bou jungto mo üangkei; lausikei ngeibü jaisinasi shuong jungto hauashi hoba haoen to, ‘Ngo kü Bou jungto hoba kaneibü Bou jungto, kü Mühghaü jungto hoba kaneibü Mühghaü jungto angda,’ dogo lenashi.”
Mari Magdalin ngaikei hoba eikshuong to lenkei, “Ngei Bunyubou hapa,” hoba haoei sao to khübü lenkei dogo laukukei.
Kho balea shaangbounyet, chasem kiteikei, hoba Jihudabü to hatbü ka eikshuong kishang kou khinngailangan kikei. Jisu loukei hoba haoen yoa lokei, hoba haoei haoen to laukei, “Kan yoa hakso kishi.”
Haoei kho lauan phaia haoei haoen la haoeibü ik hoba haoeibü hiplang lenkei. Eikshuongei Bunyubou hapan olinyokei.
Jisuei haoen to nyiboukei laukei, “Kan yoa hakso kishi. Bouei ngo hautibü tegü, ngeikei kan hautida.”
Haoei kho lauan phaia, haoei haoen la metan jinkuko laukei, “Soushou Saopobü sungletashi.
Kanei aoyoueibü shabü amai apbulaje, haoeneibü shabü apa; aoyou la kanei üpbulaje haoeneibü shabü nangakei.”
Thoma (laobou ngühtet, “Phokshou”), Anthüknyi yo kabü che Jisu loujinei haoen yoa akitei.

Lubü eikshuongei hao to laukei, “Künei Bunyubou hapa.” Haoei haoen to laukei, “Ngei haoeibü ik manga kojal nali ühüp longa, hoba kojal moa ngeibü ikjishou ütti longa, hoba haoeibü hiplang to ngeibü ik ütti longa, ngei maialemlabü.”
Chalou set kian phaia nyibou hao eikshuong chem manga kikei hoba Thomakei haoen yoa kiteikei. Kou khinngailangan kikei lausikei Jisu lotan haoen yoa lokei hoba laukei, “Kan yoa hakso kishi!”
Kho phaia haoei Thoma to laukei, “Kaibü ikjishou hato thenashi hoba kü ik to chühashi; kaibü ik litiashi hoba kü hiplanga phekattikai; maialemenko teki, lausikei mailemkai.”
Thomaei hao to jongaikei, “Kü Bunyubou, kü Mühghaü.”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Nyi ngo hapabü nyi mailemda lo? Aoyouei ühüp lausi dogokei mailema, haoen olinbou.”
Ho lea adobü amaaphilabü juongnyu Jisuei eikshuong thedanga kümbei;
lausikei Jisu kho Mühghaü Shou, Messia, dogo kanei mailemla shanga, hoba mailembo kanei hao nyena langkei hapla shanga ho ngüh doda.
Kho phaia Jisu jembü lolo Tiberia yungnyua longan lenkei. Haoei hao lolo hai longan lenkei.
Simon Peter, Thoma (laobou tetlabü, “Phokshou”), Galila Kanabü Nathaniel, Zebedi shounyi hoba haoeibü eik lubü nyi dogo chela kiteikei.
Simon Peterei haoen to laukei, “Ngo ngau lapla kouda.” Haoenei hao to laukei, “Künkei ka yoto loulabü.” Haoen koukei hoba long to atkei, hoba khüyou haoenei ai alap.
Chaphamlamto Jisu yungkoa lokei, lausikei eikshuongei kho hao yingkei dogo ange.
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Nashousi shuong, kanei aiche laplao?” Haoenei hao to jongaikei, “Alap.”
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Tak kho long mae aedangto tekashi, hoba kanei shijo laplabü.” Hibü haoenei tekkei hoba ngau juongnyu minsije touje haoenei tak senenla athükko kikei.

Eik, aoto Jisuei sanoukei, haoei Peter to laukei, “Ho Bunyubou yingakei.” Ladang Simon Peterei kho Bunyubou yingkei dogo ditkei, haoei nei huombei, (aishanga haoei kho hangletan phokei), hoba dei to tomatlangkei;
lausikei lubü eikshuongje, taka ngau shenko minan, senjung haoeneibü longa loukei, aishanga haoen deiko ka yongan eheko, phak anjinsem thüng ong kiteikei.
Ladang haoenei deikoa sühlangkei haoenei wankaka wan metenan, kho thüka ngau hoba wentek dogo phoan hapbei.
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Kanei tou lapbabü ngau ka at sungba.”
Simon Peter long to likei hoba ngau yaangbüei shenko kibü tak kho kaomai to senbakei. Khünei ngau saongaoto anjinsemto sem kiteikei; khünei ngau juongnyu minasikei tak ajitthet.
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Kaiya, hoba lem jokashi.” Kho Bunyubou yingkei dogo ngean, eikshuong yoa aoeikei hao to, “No ao?” dogo phela maang ayaangen.
Jisu loukei, hoba wentek sungkei hoba haoen la shonkukei hoba ngaukei kho tegü ong kümbei.
Hao haibü ka langngaian phaia Jisuei hoei semboubü hao eikshuong la longan lenkei.

Ladang haoen lemjok wankei, Jisuei Simon Peter to laukei, “Jona shou Simon, nyi kü to habü pendou to aei sanouda lao?” Haoei hao to laukei, “Haü, Bunyubou, ngei no sanouda dogo nyi ngekei.” Jisuei hao to laukei, “Kü san shoushou shuong samashi.”
Jisuei hao to nyiboukei laukei, “Jona shou Simon, nyi ngo sanouda lao?” Peterei hao to laukei, “Haü, Bunyubou, ngei no sanouda dogo nyi ngekei.” Jisuei hao to laukei, “Kü san shuong lomashi.”

Jisuei hao to semboukei laukei, “Jona shou Simon, nyi ngo sanouda lao?” “Nyi ngo sanouda lao?” dogo hao to semboula laubü shanga Peter ngangkei; hoba haoei Jisu to laukei, “Bunyubou, nyi pendou ngekei; ngei no sanouda dogo nyi ngekei.” Jisuei hao to laukei, “Kü sanshuong samashi.

Maimaitham ngühmaia ngei ka to lenda, no heshoudanga nyi lolo neihuom kaikei hoba no haumang sühbü pendou to haukei; lausikei ladang no sinlaje, nyi kaibü ik shinglabü hoba no laeto haumang asühda khüto no leilanglabü.”
(Haoei kho ai haibüei Peterei Mühghaü soneikangtilabü kikei kho shean lenko laukei.) Kho phaia Jisuei hao to laukei, “Kü phai semashi.”
Peterei sepeian chühngaikei hoba eik ao to Jisuei sanoukei, hao phainei hapbei. (Ho, nyakshaujinei Jisueibü khukua nongan, “Bunyubou, no khümbo kuan aplabou kho ao?” dogo laubou kho kikei.)
Ladang Peterei hao hapbei, haoei Jisu to laukei, “Bunyubou, hao shangabü lai?”
Jisuei hao to laukei, “Ngei ngo alou shongko hao lang kitimang süha tegükei, ka shanga ai ki? Nyi kü phai semshi.”

Hibü kho eik ühailabü lauda dogo jaisinasi shuong yoa phinthonkei, khei yingasikei Jisuei hao to hao ühailabü dogo alau, lausikei, “Ngei ngo alou shongko hao lang kitimang süha tegükei, ka shanga ai ki?” dogo laukei.
Habü shangabü aukabü kubou hoba khübü doshaibou eik kho hao ki. Haoeibü aukabü tükde dogo senei ngekei.
Jisuei kümbüleibü lubükei juongnyu kia; haoen thenei thenko doa tegüje, kho dolabü le kho kaodakei mangkei atinlabü dogo ngei damda.
Sanoubü Theofila, khangbü ka jaüan haoei haoeibü youko- ikjai shuongla ngühkhüm aku shongko
hoba Soushou Saopobü danko hao khuthük to anlangbü chalou asühshongko Jisuei ai ong kümbei hoba lenkei kho pendou ngei ngeibü shaangbou lea doa.
Haibü khonku hapan phaia haoei chalou saonyi kanglanga haoen la shangashatbü aukabü juong hoba Mühghaü Sangle shanga lenko haoen yoa hao langngeian lenkei.
Hao haoen yoa shaujiyungjinei haoei haoen to Jerusalem ka akukko Bouei thekubü jongsak haiyeila shanga ngühkhüm kukei. Haoei laukei, “Kanei ho shangabü kü ka ditleda.
Aishanga Johanei deia baptikukei; lausikei kan tat phaia chalou lalok akiko Soushou Saopobüa baptikulabü.”
Hibü ladang haoen liko takshatkei haoenei hao to phekei, “Bunyubou, nyi Israel la sangle sungngaikulabü jihsiphai kho tou sai?”
Jisuei haoen to laukei, “Bouei haoeibü hauei lamlean phobü jihsiphai ayingsi teten janenbü ngelabü kho kaneibü kümsilei aying,
lausikei ladang kan thükto Soushou Saopobü lotlaje, kheijinei kanei sei sungletlabü, hoba kanei Jerusalem, Jihuda si Samaria, hoba kaodak thonbüa sühko kü shanga aukabü künlabü.”
Haoei kho lauan phaia, haoenei hao to chühko kijinei hao khuthük to leiangkei hoba sangmei lip cheei haoenei ühüpbo leiangkei.
Haoenei hao angjinei müh to nyek thean chühyo khüpbei hoba kheijinei neithu lean müt nyi haoen junga lokei.
Haosiei laukei, “Galil mütshuong, kan aila müh to chühyoko loda? Jeteibü Jisu, ao tou kan yoka müh to anlangko hapbei kho tegütham ong kanei hao louyenko haplabü.”
Kheijinei haoenei Jerusalem nyangko kibü Oliv-shonghshou dogo nyenbü shongh ka Jerusalem to ngaikei; ho Nounyet paithüng lam ki.

Haoen ladang sangnyu to atkei haoen shaangla kishang thükkabou popchem to atkei. Haoen kho Peter, Johan, Jakob si Andria, Filip si Thoma, Bartholomi si Mathi, Alfia shou Jakob, Maangdakbou Simon hoba Jakob shou Judas kikei.
Haoen pendou, yaksa at yoan, hoba Jisueibü nyu Mari si haonasi shuongkei yoan liko khümbo kuko welauyoko kikei.
Khübü chaloua jaisinasi shuong yoa Peter loenkei; haoen kho mütshang yaang, müt saongaoto saoche sühko kikei. Haoei laukei,
“Jaisinasi shuong, Judas, ao Jisu laptibü shuong yoa leibou kiteikei hao shanga Dawidei shangied lenan phokubü Lai kho Soushou Saopobü danko loushedlabü kho aeibou kongnyu kiteikei;
Aishanga hao seneibü lühbaka yoan kikei hoba hao kho khangenbü phejana yoan kikei.
(Tou kho mütei hao amaibü jongsakei sek che phoukei. Hao hangkosuko atetkei, haoeibü shiang thakei hoba oksi senmang pendou lotkei.
Kho Jerusalem kabü mütshuong pendouei ngean apbei, khoei kho sekphai khüto haoen ngühyema ‘Akeldama’ tetlabü, ‘Siieibü Sekphai’ dogo lauda.)
Aishanga Nyensang Chiaa hai doakei,
‘Hao kishang kho saüjim la yeiashi,
hoba khünei aokei tekiti,
hoba haoeibü kümsilei kho lubü cheei jeishi.’

“Hibü senei Bunyubou Jisu langngeibü aukabü lela shanga müt che kümsilei longda, hoba hao kho, Johanei baptikubü chalou ka jaüan tou sen yoka aleilang shongko Bunyubou Jisu sen yoa liko paibü sünga sen phainei yangeibü yokabü müt che yingjan.”
Haoenei, Barsaba dogo nyenbou (hoba Jasta dogokei laubou) Josef si Mathia, müt nyi sühko nyen kukei.
Haoenei welauko laukei, “O Bunyubou, nyi pendoueibü maangpon ngekei. Judasei hao kishang to ngaila shanga laobou khangenbü kümsilei apyoa, kho jeila shanga hanyi haka ao pienkeije kün la lenbü.”
Haoenei haosi kanglanga phaang pakkei, hoba phaang kho Mathia to shatkei. Hao kho youkoikjai anthükche yoa yola shanga heenkei.
Ladang Pentekost chalou sühkei, haoen liko yoshaian kibü jiha
mangde müh ka langh yaangbü che yeinak soubü tegü ditkei, hoba khoei haoen setan kibü chem pendou nyakkei.
Wanlong tegü phatan longbü khübü kho haoen mütpem weko thüka janyin shaknyinko pakkei.
Haoen pendou Soushou Saopobüei shenkei, hoba Soushouei sei kubü ka haoenei lubü ngühyemei laula khangkei.
Khünei Jerusalema Jihudabü shuong hoba kaodaka phang pendou kabü mailema kaangbü shuong kiteikei.
Ladang kho langh ditkei kheijinei mütshuong pendou yoshaikei hoba maangpang- yokei, aieilausi haoen mütpem wekoei jembü ngüha lauko ditkei.
Haoen maangpangkei hoba laukei, “Tou lauko kibü shuong habü pendou ho Galilbü shuong ayingsi?
Khülongaje senei ho laibü haoenei sen lulueibü ngühyema lauko ditda?
Sen Parthiabü, Medebü, Elamaitbü, Mesopotamaia kabü mütshuong, Jihuda hoba Kapadokia, Ponta, hoba Asiabü,
Frigia hoba Pamfilia, Ijep hoba Kurini Libia kaonyek, hoba Rom ka seman chühbü shuong,
Jihudabü hoba Jihuda songle to sepeibü shuong, Kretan hoba Arabbü shuong ki. Senei kho lai küman haoenei Mühghaüeibü maangpanglabü kümsilei shuong sen lulueibü ngüha lauko ditda?
Ho ai tetlabü yingla?” dogo lauko haoen pendou maangpangkei hoba phenyembei.
Ateije nyikuko laukei, “Haoen ih alebüei jakakei.”
Lausikei youkoikjai anthük- che yoa Peter loenan ngüh yaangbüei haoen to laukei, “Jihudabü shuong hoba kan Jerusalema kibü shuong pendou, ngei kan shanga ngetilabü che kia. Kü to ditkai.
Habü mütshuong ho kanei dambü tegü ajaketkei, aieilausi tou angh gü jih thüng ong yingkei;
lausikei ho Joel thuseibüei lenbü kho loushatda:
‘Mühghaüei lauda,
thonbü chaloua,
ngei khunak shousi pendou la kü soushou khüpan jinkulabü:
kaneibü jayangshou hoba nouyangshou shuongei tetenlabü,
kaneibü heshou shuongei mangsang haplabü,
hoba kaneibü baushi shuongei mangh lilabü.
Ngeibü sambü shuong thükto mangkei,
bousu yaksa pendou la, khübü chaloua
ngei soushou khüpan jinkulabü,
hoba haoenei tetenlabü.
Ngei thükaenei müha maangpanglabü,
hoba phangaenei kaodaka tetsida,
khei sii, wan hoba wankhük sangmei tegübü lenlabü.
Bunyuboueibü Chalou, yaangbü hoba soneikangbüChalou kho asühtoua,
chanyu kho nakthühbüla,
hoba litnyu kho sii la yeilabü.
Hobaje kheijinei aoyouei Bunyubou nyena ngalaje haoen khümenlabü.’

“Israel mütshuong ditashi: Mühghaüei kan la hautikubou müt che, Nazaretbü Jisu shangabü ngei lauda. Mühghaüei hao danko kan yoa seikümseilei, maangpanglabü hoba tetsida juong küman lenbü kaneikei ngeakei.
Kho müt kho Mühghaüei haoei teten janenbü nyekchüha kan la khümbo kukei, hoba kanei hao peiseia thüngkei hoba küksithang müteibü ikei haitikei.
Lausikei Mühghaüei hao haibü khonku ka satentikei hoba hao haibü ka langkeitikei, aishanga haibüei khühlepan kilabü kho hao shanga athüklabü kümsilei ki.
Aishanga Dawideikei hao shangabü hai lauda,
‘Ngei ponpendou Bunyubou kü thedanga hapbei,
aishanga ngo anyaakeitilabü lele hao ngeibü maenei ki.
Khoei ngeibü maang haiko kikei
hoba ngeibü lishang olinkei;
kho ong ayingko ngeibü maangkei maanglema kilabü.
Aishanga nyi kü soushou yemlam to kuan üplabü,
ayingsi nyi kaibü Saopobü kho anyaülettilabü.
Nyi kü la langkeibü lamnyu ngetia;
nyi ngo no yobü olinbüei shentilabü.’
“Jaisinasi shuong, ngei kan la boukim Dawid shangabü atoknokko lenla thükkei; hao haian khünkei hoba haoeibü hee kho tat sühko sen yoa kia.
Hao kho thuseibü che kiteikei hoba Mühghaüei hao to haoeibü thensilen ka haoeibü Choba setshang jeila müt che longtilabü dogo haüko thebülanbü lekei;
hibü Dawidei kho hapan kiteikei hoba Messia langngailabü shanga hai lauko lenkei, ‘Hao yemkaodak la khümbo kuan üp’, hoba haoeibü mang la ‘nyaületbü ühüpti.’
Kho Mühghaüei langngaitibou Jisu kikei; hoba ho shangabü kün pendou aukabü ki.
Hibü ladang hao kho Mühghaü mae ikei tonlangkei, hoba Bou ka haoei theletbü Soushou Saopobü sungletkei, haoei kanei tou ai ditda hoba hapda kho Soushou khüpan jinkukei.
Aishanga khuthük to angbou kho Dawid aying. Haoei lauda,
‘Bunyubouei ngeibü Bunyubou to laukei,
Ngei kaibü dangbou shuong kaibü younakshang la ayeiti shongko,
ngeibü maenei setashi.’
Hibü kanei maanga shubü pendou apyoan ho ngeashi khei kanei peiseia haitibou Jisu kho Bunyubou hoba Messia ham la yeitia.”
Ladang haoenei kho ditoukei haoen la maangpona meioukei, hoba haoenei Peter si lubü hangangbü shuong to laukei, “Jaisinasi shuong, künei ai kümla?”
Peterei laukei, “Maang- pon sepeiashi, hoba kan mütpem wekoei kaneibü shabü aptila shanga Jisu Khrista nyena baptiashi, hoba kanei Soushou Saopobü sungletlabü.
Theletbü kho kan shanga, hoba kaneibü shousi shuong shanga, hoba saabüa kibü shuong pendou, khei seneibü Bunyubou Mühghaüei ngabü phai shanga ki.”
Lubü ngüh juong yoan haoei haoen huiletkei, hoba, “Ho sükbü meten ho ka satenashi”, dogo lauko sukeijakei.
Hibü haoei lenbü sungletbü shuong baptikukei, hoba khünyet müt hajar sem thüng haoeneibü lühbak to jinyokei.
Haoenei youkoikjai shuongeibü lembüa, hoba welaua khümbo kuyokei.
Müt pendou hatbü mokbüei shenkei, hoba maangpanglabü hoba sei juong youkoikjai shuong danko kümbei.
Mailembü shuong pendou chela yingkei hoba ajanjan pendou hambei.
Haoenei haoenei kibü peisilei yakan haoen yoa akialebü to liko janyokei.
Chalou angbüa haoenei lembü- chema atheko takshatkei, haoenei chema liko wentek shaknyin janyinkei hoba olin maangmai nyakshau liko shaukei.
Kho tegü ong haoenei Mühghaü nyen sangko hoba mütshuong yoa maangshikyoko loukei. Hobaje chaangboua Bunyubouei haoen yoto songlela lotbü mailembü shuong aei aei jinyokukei
Peter si Johan welaubü jihsiphai chenei chasemlamto angh sem thünga Lembüchem to angko kiteikei.

Kheijinei buknyet ka thama sokebü müt che kei leibako kikei. Chaangboua haoenei hao kho Hemaibü Bakou dogo laubou Lembüchem koukhüna Lembüchem to loubü shuong ka hishau hiyungtila shanga apyoko kikei.
Haoei Peter si Johan Lembüchem to atla kümjinei hapbei hoba haosi ka hikei.
Haosi hamei hao to tangko chühkei hoba Peterei laukei, “Küsi to chühkai.”
Haoei haosi ka denche hapoulabü dogo daman nyek thean chühkei;
lausikei Peterei laukei, “Ngei hon ayingsi chandinam aki, lausikei ngei ai ki kho ka la kuda: Nazaretbü Jisu Khrista nyena paiashi!”
Haoei mae ikei hao jenan loentikei. Khoyam haoeibü you si youngümshang pendou hau kingaikei;
hao toman shatko loenkei hoba paikei, hoba hao haoen yoa Lembüchem to saiko lakko hoba Mühghaü nyen sangko paijung haukei.
Müt pendouei hao paiko hoba Mühghaü nyen sangko hapbei,
hoba haoenei hao kho Lembüchem Hemaibü Bakoua hishau hiyungko setbou kho yingkei dogo shenkei; haoenei hao to haüthükbü kho hapan haoen mokbü hoba maangpangbüei shenkei.
Ladang hao Peter si Johan yoa kakyoan hapbei, mütshuong maangpangbüa Solomoneibü chemsophang dogo laubü khüto lang- yoko yoshaikei.
Ladang Peterei kho hapbei haoei mütshuong to laukei, “Israel mütshuong, kan aila ho to maangpangda, alausikei hao küneibü seiei hoba saopobüei paitikei laula maiko kanei aila kün to hainyu chühda?

Abraham Mühghaü, Isak Mühghaü hoba Jakob Mühghaü, hoba sen pisibousieibü Mühghaüei, kanei Pilat thedanga asungletbou hoba khümbo kuan apbou haoeibü sambü Jisu soneikangtikei. Pilatei hao litila maangangkei,
lausikei kanei saopobü hoba ngühmai kho asunglet. Kanei müt haitibou kho kan la litikula shanga phekei,
hoba kanei ao ka langkei hapda hao bouje haitikei. Lausikei Mühghaüei hao haibü ka langngeitikei. Kün khoeibü aukabü shuong ki.
Ho haoeibü nyen hoba kho mailem nyena ong kanei hao tou hapbü hoba ngebü tegü ho müt to hau kikei, hoba kan pendouei hapbü tegü kho müt la hao danko ong hau longeiko maitikei.
“Hobaje tou, jaisinasi shuong, ngei ngeakei, kaneibü songdakbü shuongei kümbü tegü, kanei amin angeko kümbei.
Mühghaüei kho tegü shaanglathama thuseibü shuong pendou danko haoeibü Messia khonkulabü dogo lenan phokubü loushedkei.
“Hibü kanei shabü haman apla shanga maangpon kümetashi hoba Mühghaü jungto sepeiashi.

Hibü shangiednyu Mühghaüei haoeibü thuseibü shuong danko lauan phokubü tegü, ao pendou kümetbü jihsiphai asüh shongko khuthüka sungletan kiteijan kho Jisu, kaneibü piensapbü Messia kho kan jungto hautiashi hoba Bunyubou yobü ka kan la maang pibülembü longtishima.
Mosaei laukei, ‘Haoei ngo longtibü tegü Bunyubou kaneibü Mühghaüei kan jaisinasi shuong yoka thuseibü che longtilabü. Haoei ai ong lenlaje kanei haoei lenbü ditjan.’
Lausikei kho thuseibüeibü ngüha alebü danje müt yoka saopotham mautikulabü.
Samuel hoba hao jeibü shuong ka khangan, thuseibü shuong pendouei laubü khokei habü chalou shuong shanga laukei.

Kan kho thuseibü shuongeibü shousi shuong ki hoba Mühghaüei Abraham to hai lauko kaneibü pisibousi shuong to theyolanyojinei, ‘Kaibü thensilen danko kaodak phangshou shuong pendou haükulabü’ dogo laubü phet kho kanei phanda.
Kan mütpem weko lulueibü amaibü lam ka sepeitibü danko kan haütikulabü shanga Mühghaüei haoeibü sambü langngaitikei hoba kan jungto shaang hautikukei.”
Peter si Johanei mütshuong to lenko kitoua ungshedbü shuong, Lembüchem lombü shuong yoa leiyeibou hoba Sadukibü shuong haoen jungto louan
aeibou panglangtikei aishanga haosiei mütshuong la songlenkei hoba Jisu haibü ka mütsanga langngaibü shangabü phinthonkei.
Haoenei haosi to ik shatkei hoba haosi nyibounyet sühko thüngdanga khinlepan phokei, aieilausi kho chasemlamto yingan kikei.
Lausikei ngühlang ditbü shuong juongei mailembei, hoba lühbakei hajar ngao thüng onko yeikei.
Ngiet kho haoen songdakbü shuong, jaishou shuong, Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong,
thükkabou ungshedbou Ana, Kaifa, Johan, Alexander hoba lubü khukabü ungshed aedang kabü pendou Jerusalema takshatkei.
Haoenei haosi haoen thedanga lotian phekei, “Ai hauei ayingsi ao nyena kasiei ho kümbei?”
Soushou Saopobüei shenan, Peterei haoen to laukei, “Mütshuongeibü songdakbü dan hoba jaishou shuong,
shatbü che to maibü kümsilei kümbü aoa kanei tat kün takteian chüha longa, hoba hao lai kümbü ka maikeije kho pheda longaje,
kho, kanei peiseia thüngettibou hoba Mühghaüei haibü ka langngaitibou Nazaretbü Jisu nyena kho müt kho shat maian kan thedanga loda dogo müt pendouei hoba Israelbü shuong pendouei ngeashi.
Hao kho kan chemdangbüei aweko apbü hoba chemnyeka kongnyu la yeibü laang kho ki.
Aotokei khümenbü aki, aishanga ho nyenei ong sen khümenlabü ki, hoba ho to limanje kaodaka mütshuong la aolakei nyen akukei.”
Ladang haoenei Peter si Johan maangkaangbü hapbei hoba haoen dobüshibü ühüp angebü shuong dogo damenkei, haoen maangpangkei, hoba haoen kho Jisu yoa kibü dogo haoenei shenkei.
Haoenei haosi kho attila athükko apbei aishanga haoenei maitibü müt kho haosi yoa loan hapbei.
Hibü haoenei haosi kho Sanhedrin ka satan apla shanga ngühkhüm kukei hoba liko kamshaian
lauyokei, “Khübü mütshuong to senei ai kümsi ong maila? Haoen danko amaaphilabü sei kümbü kho Jerusalem kabü shuong pendouei chongchinga; senei kho atheletla athük.
Ho mütshuong yoa aei aei aphaktila shanga senei haoen hatlenkho, hoba haoen to Jisu nyena aolakei ai alenla shanga lenkho.”
Hibü haoenei haosi ngakei hoba Jisu nyena jimlatangla ngüh üanglabü ayingsi alenla shanga ngühkhüm kukei.
Peter si Johanei haoen to jongaikei, “Mühghaü to ayingko kan to bouje ditla kho Mühghaü thedanga janbü si ajanbü yingkeije kanei matjem kujan.
Kün shangaje künei ai hapbei hoba ditkei kho alenlabü kho athük- aminlabü che ki.”
Khünei aeiko haoenei haosi aeibou hatlenkei hoba litikei. Haüthükbü shanga mütshuongei Mühghaü la soneikangbü kubü hangshong haoenei haosi shieikoela kho athükaminlabü che yeikei;
aishanga haosiei maitibü seikümseilei kümbou müt kho po saonyi thüka jailebü yingan kiteikei.
Ladang Peter si Johan litikei haosi haoen thangbou shuong jungto haukei hoba haoen la ungshed jaishou shuongei hoba jaishou shuongei haosi to lenbü pendou lenkei.
Ladang haoenei kho ditkei haoen pendouei liko Mühghaü to kaangbang hai welaukei: “Bunyubou, khuthük si kaodak hoba yungnyu hoba khükabü pendou kümbou kho no ki,
hoba Soushou Saopobü danko küneibü pisibou Dawidei laubü tegü,
‘Küksithang shuong aila khau angkei,
hoba aila phangshuongei jim akibüa huon takkei?
Bunyubou khulimbo hoba haoeibü Messia khulimbo
kaodak Choba shuong liko takshatkei,
hoba songdakbü shuong chela yoshaikei.’
“Aishanga Küksithang si Israel mütshuong yoa Herod si Pontia Pilat yoan liko kaibü saopobü sambü Messia Jisu khulimbo sangnyua takshatkei;
Kaibü ikei hoba maangangbüei ai kümlabü dogo takenkei kho kümla haoen yoshaikei.

Hobaje tou, Bunyubou, haoenei theshoubü khüto chühashi hoba nyi ladang ong maitila shanga kaibü ik shinglaje hoba kaibü saopobü sambü Jisueibü nyen danko sei hoba maangpanglabü lenlaje kheijinei kaibü sambü shuongei kaibü Ngühlang maangkaangko lauentishima.”
Ladang haoen welaukhümbei, haoen kamshang kho nyaakeikei hoba haoen pendou Soushou Saopobüei shenkei, hoba haoenei athakko Mühghaü ngühlang maangkaangko laukei.
Mailembü mütshang pendou dambü hoba maangpon chela lekei; aoeiche ongkei kho haoeibü nyaksinam dogo alau, lausikei ajanjan pendou haoeneibü hambü la yeikei.
Youkoikjai shuongei athakko hau yaangbüei Bunyubou Jisu langngaibü aukabü kula haujembei, hoba Mühghaü onouei haoen pendou thüka athakko kümbeileikei.
Maimaitham haoen yoa aokei apenasouko akitei, aieilausi kao, chemshang sekphai pendou yakan kho yakletbü nam sungbakei.
Hobaje hangangbü shuong thedanga phokuko kikei. Haoenei mütpem weko la hao southüng jankukei.
Josef nyenbü müt che kikei, hao la youkoikjai shuongei Barnaba, tetlabü, “Thungeijangeibü Shou” dogo nyenkuan kikei. Hao Kupra mütli ka, Levibü che kikei,
hoba haoei sek che kikei. Haoei kho phoukei hoba kho yakletbü nam kho youkoikjai shuong jungto sungbaan phokei.
Lausikei müt che Anania dogo nyenan kikei, hoba hao yak Safira haosiei peisilei at yakkei,
hoba yakeikei ngeko haoei nam at hao shanga phongaikei. Haoei joubü kho sungbakei hoba kho youkoikjai shuong junga phokukei.
Peterei laukei, “Anania, nyi Soushou Saopobü huonettilabü hoba sek yaakletbü ka ka shanga jamde huan pholabü lele lai küman Satanei kaibü maangpon hainyu shentikei?
Ho ayaakjinei kaibü aying lo, hoba ho yakan phaia dogokei yakletbü nam kho kamaang aying lo? Nyi müt thedanga ayingko Mühghaü thedanga yepeikei.”
Ananiaei ladang khübü kho ditkei hao tuongetnyu haikei. Ho ditbü shuong pendou hatbüei shenkei.
Kheijinei heshou shuong meimeikei hoba hao sholepbei; hoba haoenei hao sunglangan khünan apbei.
Angh sem thüng danan phaia ai haüthükkei kho ai angeko hao yakkei loukei.
Kheijinei Peterei sao to laukei, “Kü la lenbü, kasiei sek kho khüjoche lu phoukei lo?” Saoei laukei, “Haü, khüjoche lu phoukei.”
Peterei sao to laukei, “Bunyubou Soushou takteila kasi aila ngühthang yenkei? Ditashi, kalao khünbü shuong koukhüna kia, haoenei no tonlanglabü!”
Khoyam sao kho haoeibü you junga tuongetkei hoba haikei. Kheijinei heshou shuong lotkei hoba sao haian hapan haoenei saokei tonlangkei hoba haolao junga khünkei.
Lashongbü dan pendou hoba kho ngühlang ditbü shuong pendou hatyokei.
Mütshuong yoa youkoikjai shuongei seikümseilei hoba maang- panglabü juong kümbei. Haoen pendou Solomoneibü chemsophanga kambei.
Haoen yoa yola aoeikei asom, lausikei mütshuongei haoen nyen sangkei;
lausikei athakko Bunyubou to mailembü shuong bousu yaksa juong haoen lühbaka jinyokei.
Hibü haoenei lamnyu to liko shatbünyatbü shuong sungbakei, hoba Peter danji phaijinei müt che nyi thükto ongkei haoeibü mangh nadanoua dogo daman yepshanga si amnyua lengtian phokukei.
Lepsang lepkhong ka shuong shuonga Jerusalem to shatbünyatbü shuong hoba shabü souei lapbü shuong leibakei hoba haoen pendou maikei.
Kheijinei khukabou ungshed hoba hao yoa kibü shuong, hoba Sadukibü eikshuongeikei haoen to nyekto shatkei.
Haoen loenkei hoba youkoikjai shuong lapbei hoba haoen sangnyu thüngdanga phokei.
Lausikei nangnak Bunyubou khuthük hangangbüei thüngdang koukhün ipan sattikei hoba laukei,
“Hauashi hoba Lembüchema loashi hoba mütshuong la ho langkei shangabü lenashi.”
Ladang haoenei kho ditkei haoen Lembüchem to haukei hoba chanyu louphambü ka jaüan lenla khangkei.
Ladang khukabou ungshed hoba hao yoa kibü shuong loukei, haoenei Sanhedrin hoba Israelbü jaishou shuong thangyen takshatkei, hoba hangangbü shuong kho leibala shanga thüngdang chem to ngüh hautikei.
Ladang pangsa shuongei kho sühlangkei haoenei haoen khünei ühüp. Haoen ngaian lenkei,
“Künei thüngdang chem kho kaangkhühtham khinan, lombü shuong kho koukhüna loan hapbei, lausikei ladang künei kho ipbei chemmaanga aokei akitei.”
Ladang haoenei kho ditkei, Lembüchem lombü shuongeibü leiyeibou si ungshed jaishou shuongei khübü youkoikjai shuong la ai haüthükkei dogo mangan apbei.
Müt atei louan haoen la lenkei, “Kanei thüngdanga khinbü mütshuong kho maimaitham Lembüchema kia; haoen khünei mütshuong la lenko loakei.”
Kheijinei leiyeibou kho haoeibü eikshuong leijung hauan, mütshuongei laangei sonsi amaibüla dogo khau üangko eaaoa leibakei.
Haoenei haoen leibakei hoba Sanhedrin thedanga lotikei. Khukabou ungshedbouei haoen to hai
lauko phekei, “Künei kan la kho nyena alenla shanga ngühkhüm kaangkhühtham kua hoba kanei Jerusalem pendou kaneibü lenbüei nyaktia hoba kho müt haibü on kho kün la küntimang sühda.”
Peter si youkoikjai shuongei jongaikei, “Künei müt ngüha ayingko Mühghaü ngüha lejan.
Seneibü Mühghaüei kanei peiseia thüngettibou Jisu Khrista kho langngaitikei.
Israel maangpon sepeitila hoba saoeibü shabü apbula shanga Mühghaüei haoeibü maenei Leiyeibou hoba Khümenbou che tegü tonenbou kho hao ki.
Khübü loushedbü shanga hao to ngüha lebü shuong la Mühghaüei kubü Soushou Saopobü, hoba kün shuong aukabü ki.”
Haoenei kho ditan maangpokkei hoba haoen haitila takenkei.
Lausikei Farisibü Ngühkhüm lenbou müt che Gamaliel dogo nyenan mütshuongei soumo kuko kibü müt che, Sanhedrina loenan, mütshuong kho insing che tangto leilangla shanga haoen to lenkei.
Haoei haoen to laukei, “Israelbü shuong, kanei khübü mütshuong la ai kümbula damdaje maangsangashi.

Aishanga jihsiphai tuisho dana, Theudaei hao khei phangche yaangkei dogo lauan meimeikei, hoba hao phainei müt saongao lei thüng sembei. Lausikei hao kho haitian apbei hoba haoeibü eikshuong kho linkei, hoba haoen khünei thonkei.
Kho phaia lühbak webü jihsiphaia Galilbü Judas dogo nyenan müt che, hao phainei mütshuong at yoan khulimbo loenkei. Haokei khei maukei hoba haoeibü eikshuong pendou linto jankei.
Hibü ngei kan la lenda, tou kaneibü ik kho haoen ka litiashi hoba khübü mütshuong kho khei ong apyoshi, aishanga haoenei kümbotakko kibü kho müteibü kümsilei yingan kialonga ho mauan aplabü.
Lausikei ho Mühghaüeibü kümsilei yingan kisije, kanei haoen amauentilabü, maimaitham kan bouje Mühghaü to jakkokei thonada.” Haoen haoeibü ngühlam to loukei.
Haoenei youkoikjai shuong kho ngayetan ngümeikei hoba Jisu nyena song alenla shanga ngühkhüm kaangkhühtham kukei. Kho phaia haoenei haoen litikei.
Hibü haoen Sanhedrin ka olinyoko ngaikei, aishanga haoen kho Jisu nyena aweasüngko shieinangeila muan kikei;
hoba chalou weko haoenei Lembüchema hoba mütshuongeibü chema Jisu kho Messia yingkei dogo lenbü hoba songlenbü kho athak.

Khübü chaloua ladang eikshuong kho lühbaka haako haukei, Grik ngühyem laubü Jihudabü shuongei Aramaik ngühyem laubü Jihudabü shuong khulimbei aishanga chaangbou shausiyung janbüa haoen aekabü latnyu shuong khoje wailetkei.
Youkoikjai Anthüknyi khoei eika yobü shuong kho ngaishaikei hoba laukei, “Kaodakbü nyakanama ikjai lejinei Mühghaü Ngühlang hangletan phokulabü kho kün shanga maangkhailabü che aying.
Hibü jaisinasi shuong, kan yo ka Soushouei hoba songeidoei shenbü kanei maang angbü müt nyet pienashi, hoba künei haoen kho kümaleia ikjai letilabü.
Künje, kün lolo welaua khümbo kulabü hoba Ngühlang künbüa khangenlabü.”

Lenbü kho pendou shaibü shuong pendouei olinko sungletkei hoba haoenei habü ho pienkei: mailem hoba Soushou Saopobüei shenbü Stefen, Filif, Prokhora, Nikanor, Timon, Parmena hoba Jihuda songlebou Antiok kabü Nikhola.
Haoenei haoen dan kho youkoikjai shuong jungto leiban lenkei hoba haoenei haoeneibü khua ikei shangetan welaukukei.
Kho tegü ong Mühghaü Ngühlang aakei. Jerusalema eikshuong aei aei mütshang yaangko lühbak haakei, hoba ungshedbü shuongkei juong mailem khüto lotkei.
Stefenei, onou hoba seiei shenan, mütshuong yoa maang- panglabü hoba seikümseilei juong kümbo paikei.
Lausikei Alexandria si Kurini ka Solo sinagoga yobü dan hoba Kilikia si Asia kabü at yoan, ajiaphaiko Stefen to ngüh wetyokei;
lausikei haoei Soushouei jinkubü songsihonei laubü ngüh kho haoenei atokngaienko apbei.
Kheijinei haoenei müt at jekthetan hai lautikei, “Haoei Mosa hoba Mühghaü khulimbo laubü künei dida.”
Haoenei mütshuong, jaishou shuong hoba Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong pühnyintikei hoba hao lapan Sanhedrin jungto sungbakei.
Haoenei hao khulimbo amlangbü hai laukei, “Ho müt hoei Saopobü Lembüchem hoba Ngühkhüm khulimbo laubü athaksapda.
Aishanga Nazaretbü Bunyubouei ho Lembüchem ho leilutilabü hoba Mosaei sen la kubü hangsilam kho jeileilabü dogo ho mütei laubü künei dida.”
Hobaje Sanhedrina setbü mütshuong pendouei hao to chühkei hoba haoeibü thenyek kho khuthük hangangbüeibü thenyek tegütham hapbei.
Thükkabou ungshedbouei phekei, “Kho tükde sai?”
Stefenei laukei: “Jaisinasi shuong hoba bousijai shuong ditashi. Soneikangbü Mühghaü seneibü bou Abraham jungto, hao Harana mo akijinei, hao Mesopotamiaa kian longan lenkei,
hoba hao to laukei, ‘Kaibü kaonyek hoba chempen shuong apyoashi, hoba ngei ka to lenlabü kaonyek to hauashi.’
Kheijinei haoei Khaldia kaonyek apyoan Harana sang lekei. Haobou haibü phaia Mühghaüei hao khüka kan tou kibü kaonyek to kuktikei.

Haoei khünei hao la ai nyaksinam aku, younakshang ongkei aku, lausikei hao kheijinei shousi akiteisi dogokei, haoei hao la hoba haophai kabü thensilen pendou la kho kaonyek kimleptila shanga thekukei.
Khoei Mühghaüei hai laukei: ‘Haoeibü thensilen kho küksithang kaodaka yen la yeilabü, hoba po saongao lei sühko khübüei haoen aao la lelabü, chühmang asühlabü;’
hoba ‘Ngei haoen aaola lebü phangshuong mat jemlabü, hoba kho phaia haoen khüka longenlabü hoba ho kaoena kü to lemlabü.’

Hobaje Mühghaüei Abraham la kipbü danko maangangyobü thesilan che kukei. Kho tegü hao Isakeibü bou la yeikei hoba hao la chalou setbounyeta kipbukei. Kho tegü ong Isak la Jakob bukkukei, hoba Jakob la boukim shuong haoen anthüknyi bukkukei hoba haoen pendou kipan apbei.
“Khübü boukim shuongei Josef to nyekto shatkei hoba Ijepbü la yaakshaukei; lausikei Mühghaü hao yoa kiteikei.
Haoei hao khonku pendou ka püetkei, hoba Ijep Choba Farao la haoeibü songsihon danko hao maibü shentikei. Haoei hao Ijep thüka hoba haoeibü chemsibung pendou thüka hao governor yeitikei.
Kheijinei Ijep kaodak hoba Kanan pendoua mühsinou yaang longkei; seneibü pisibousi shuongeikei shausiyung ühüp.
Lausikei Ijepaje nyak kia dogo Jakobei ditkei hoba shaangboula seneibü pisibousi shuong hautikei.
Nyiboubüaje Josef kho haojaisi shuong la ngeentikei hoba Josef mütli kho Farao la ngeentikei.
Hibü Josefei haobou Jakob hoba haoen chempen pendou, pendoueije müt anjinleito ngao la ngabü ngühlang hautikei.
Kheijinei Jakob hoba seneibü pisishuong Ijep to yanlangkei, laonei haoen haikei.
Haoen Shekhem to künbakei hoba Shekhema Hamor shousi shuong ka Abrahamei namei jekthetbü hee khünei apbei.
“Abraham la Mühghaüei thekubü loushedbü jihsiphai sühlangjinei, Ijepa mütshuong kho aei aei haakei.
Tokei Ijepa Josef angebü lubü Choba longkei.
Haoei sen phang to makhetkei hoba seneibü bousi shuong kho haoeneibü nasak shousi shuong ühaa ayaangtila shanga shingekko shangshenko amaiko jungeikei.
Mosa kho jihsiphaia bukkei. Hao kho aeibou haangmaibü nashou che kiteikei. Hao lit sem sühko haobou chema chingenkei.
Ladang hao kho pühdaka loushedkei, Faraoeibü shouei hao kho saoeibü shou la leko samenkei.
Hobaje Mosa kho Ijepbüeibü songsihon pendoua hapen ngeenbü la yeikei; hao ngühadeia hoba kümaleia aeibou seian yeikei.
“Hao ladang po saonyi onkei haoei haojai haona Israelbü shuong pheian chühmang sühkei.
Kheijinei haoen müt che aeibou amaiko jungeiko hapan haoei hao la pü lekukei; hoba haoei Ijepbü kho ngüman koutian hao la phok lambukei.
Hao danko Mühghaüei haoen püetkei dogo haoeibü jaisinasi shuongei khei damenan kilabü dogo haoeije dambei, lausikei haoenei kho aditen.
Nyibounyet haoen kanglanga ong müt nyi oyophetyoko hapbei, kheijinei haoei ‘Kan jaisinasi ong yingkei; aila kan kan yoa aji- aphaiko jungeiyoda?’ dogo lauko haoei haosi papleptila shanga haujembei.
Lausikei hao thangbou ngümeiko kibou khoei Mosa aüan sattikei hoba laukei, ‘No kün thüka songdakbü hoba matjembou yingtila shanga aoei heenkei?
Nyi miet Ijepbü haitibü tegü ngokei haitimang sühda sai?’
Kho ngüha Mosa satan apbei hoba hao Midian kaodaka yenla lean kikei. Khünei hao müt nyieibü bou la yeikei.
“Ladang po saonyi dankei khuthük hangangbü che Sinai Shongh yamlamanga hamlong danko hao la wanlong chenei longan lenkei.
Khüto chühan Mosa maangpangkei, hoba ladang khüto chühla nyangko loukei Bunyubou ngüh ho ditkei;
‘Ngo kaneibü pisiboueibü Mühghaü, Abraham Mühghaü, Isak Mühghaü hoba Jakob Mühghaü ki!’ Kheijinei Mosa lühkei hoba chühla asom.
Bunyubouei hao to laukei, ‘Kaibü nguok sungenashi, aieilausi no loshang ho saopobü kaoen ki.
Ngei maimaitham Ijepa kibü ngeibü jaisinasi shuong aweasüngko jungeibü hapa, ngei haoen ngühbü wibü dida hoba haoen püetla loukei. Tou kaiya, ngei no Ijep to hautilabü.’

“Kho Mosa, ao haoenei asungletko ‘No aoei songdakla hoba matjemla heenkei?’ dogo laubou kho hao ki. Mühghaü khuthük hangangbü danko hamlonga wan longan lenkei, hoba haoei hao songdakbou si leiyenbou ham shanga hautikei.
Ijep kaodaka hoba yamlamanga po saonyi sühko maangpanglabü hoba tetsida kümbo haoen leijung haubou kho hao ki.
Israelbü to ‘Haoei ngo longtibü tegü, Mühghaüei kan jaisinasi shuong yo ka thuseibü che longtilabü,’ dogo laubou kho hao ki.

Yamlamanga Israelbü takshatbüa yobou kho hao ki. Hao kho Sinai shongha hao to joyobou khuthük hangangbü hoba seneibü pisibousi shuong ham yoa kikei. Sen la kula langkeibü soushou ngüh sungletbou kho hao kikei.
Lausikei seneibü pisibousi shuongei hao to ngüha lemang asüh; haoenei hao aüan sattikei hoba haoeneibü maangponje Ijep to ngaikei.
Haoenei Aron to laukei, ‘Kün thedanga hautila shanga kün la mühghaü kümbü. Aieilausi Mosa, aoei kün Ijep kaodak ka leibakei, hao la ai haüthükkeije künei angekei.’
Kheijinei haoenei masu pongsu shoushou che kümbei hoba haoenei kho heangsho to lembei; hoba haoeneibü ikei kümenbü khüto aeibou maangshikyokei.
Lausikei Mühghaüei sepeinyu haoen la khuthük kabü shuong lemtikei, thuseibü lea hai doan kibü tegü:
‘O Israel phangshuong, kan po saonyi sühko,
yamlamanga kijinei kü la haitibü meisiauei lembei sai
ayingsi lembüsabü kukei sai?
Aying, kanei Molokeibü neichem,
hoba kaneibü khanshoulitshou mühghaü
Refan hoba khübü to khüpetan lemla shanga
kaneibü ikei kümenbü heangsho shuong kan yoa liko sungbakei.
Ngei kan Babilon to langtilabü.’
“Seneibü pisibousi shuongei aukabü neichem yamlamanga kikei. Ho Mosa la Mühghaüei haoei hapbü kho phatko ong kümtikei.

Seneibü pisi shuongei ho thenei thenko sungletkei, hoba haoenei seneibü bousi shuong la nangan sattikubü phangshuongeibü kaodak kimlepbü jihsiphaia Joshua yoa sungbakei. Kho Dawid jihsiphai sühko thenkei.
Haoei Mühghaü to maangshikbü hapbei hoba Jakobeibü thensilenei jungeila shanga hao la kishang kaoen che dangkula shanga phekei;
lausikei Mühghaü shanga chem dangkubou khoje Solomon kiteikei.
Lausikei Thükkabou kho müteibü ikei kümbü chema akida. Thuseibüei lenbü tegü,
‘Khuthük kho ngeibü Choba setshang
hoba kaodak kho ngeibü younakshang.
Kanei kü la ailaibü chem dangkula,
ayingsi ngo haksoenlabü kaoen kho lanei ki?
dogo Bunyubouei lauda.
Khübü pendou kho ngei kümbei aying lo?’
“Kan lulimbü mütshuong, dambü hoba ditenbüa küksithang shuong, kanei ponpendou Soushou Saopobü khulimda; kaneibü pisibou shuongei tubüsekbü tegü kaneikei jungeida.
Kaneibü pisibou shuongei ashiakoebü thuseibü ao ki? Haoenei Saopobou kho loulabü shanga lenbü shuong haitikei; kan tou hao yaakshaubü hoba müt haitibü shuong la yeikhüma.”
Kanei youkoikjai shuong danko Ngühkhüm sungletkei, lausikei kanei kho ajungei.
Haoenei kho ditjinei haoen khau angyokei hoba hao to chühan hauh uyokei.
Lausikei hao Soushou Saopobüei shenan, khuthük aeto nyek thean chühkei hoba Mühghaü soneikangbü hapbei hoba Jisu mae aenei loan hapbei.
Haoei laukei, “Ngei khuthük ipan hapda hoba Jisu Mühghaü mae aenei loan hapda.”
Kheijinei haoenei kaangbang hinyoko haoeneibü nou sakkei hoba haoen pendou hao jungto nyuyokei,
hoba sangnyu ka shian sattian haoenei laangei sonkei. Aukabü shuongei haoeneibü neisimei kho Saul dogo nyenan heshou müt cheeibü you junga shaangan phokukei.
Haoenei Stefen to laangei sonjinei haoei Bunyubou to hai lauko ngakei, “Bunyubou Jisu, ngeibü soushou sungletshi.”
Haoei khüpetan hai lauko kaang ngekkei, “Bunyubou, ho shabü ho haoen la tejinyoku.” Kho lauan phaia hao haikei.
Hao haitila maangangbü kümsilei khünei Saul kei yoan kikei.
Khünyet Jerusalem lashong khulimbo shieikoebü yaang longkei. Youkoikjai shuong to liman haoen pendou Jihuda hoba Samaria kaonyek to linkhümbei.
Songlea khümbo kubü shuongei Stefen khünkei hoba hao shanga mang haapyobü yaang kikei.
Kheijinei Saul lashong dan shian apbo paikei. Hao chem chemto atan bousu yaksa pendou senjung louan thüngdang to jinko paikei.
Linan kibü shuongei kaoen pendoua songlenkei.
Filip Samaria sangnyu to yankei hoba haoen la Ngühlangmaibü lenkei.
Mütshuongei ladang Filipei lenbü ditkei hoba tetsida sei kümbü hapbei, haoenei lenbü to khoyam ong liko maangangan nou haangko ditkei.
Aishanga müt juong to asaopobü soushou kikei hoba haoen ka soushou shuong kho kaangbang ngekyoko longan apbei; hoba phei haibü hoba sokebü shuong juong maitikei.
Hobaje sangnyu khünei olinyobü yaang longkei.
Simon dogo nyenan sangnyua müt cheei sei jungeiko kikei, hoba hao kho khei phangche dogo lenko Samaria mütshuong pendou maangpangtikei;
hoba hanbü yaangbü pendouei “Ho müt ho la Yaangenbou dogo laubou Mühghaüeibü sei kia” dogo lauko haoei lenbülebü to aeibou ngüha lekei.
Haoenei hao to ngüha lekei aieilausi jih lounyu haoen kho haoei sei kümbüa maangpangtiko loukei.
Lausikei Filipei haoen la Mühghaü Sangle hoba Jisu Khrista nyen shanga songlenkei, hoba haoenei hao to mailembei. Haoen bousu yaksa juong baptikukei.
Simoneikei mailembei, baptikei hoba Filip yoa yangkei; tetsida hoba amaa- philabü kümbü kho hapan haokei aeibou maangpangkei.
Ladang Jerusalema kibü youkoikjai shuongei Samariaa Ngühlangmaibü sungleda dogo ditkei haoenei haoen la Peter si Johan hautikukei;
haosi yankei hoba Soushou Saopobü sunglettila shanga welaukukei;
aishanga haoen yoa aothüktokei Soushou Saopobü mo alotko kiteikei. Khün sühkoje haoen kho Bunyubou Jisu Khrista nyena ong baptian kiteikei.
Kheijinei Peter si Johanei haoeneibü khua shangkei, hoba haoenei Soushou Saopobü sungletkei.
Ladang Simonei Soushou kho youkoikjaibüeibü ikei shangetbü danko louko hapbei, haoei haosila nam kuko
laukei, “Ngei aoyou thükto ong ikei shangetlaje Soushou sunglettilabü lele külakei kho sei kho kubüma.”
Peterei hao to laukei, “Kaibü nam kayoa maushi aishanga Mühghaüeibü maangmai jongsak kho nyi namei jekthetlabü dogo damda!
No Ngühlangmaibü hanei janletbü phejan ai aki, aishanga Mühghaü junga kaibü maangpon atangkei.
Kaibü amaibü haka maangpon sepeiashi, thükalonga kaibü dambü shuong kho aptila shanga Bunyubou to welauashi;
ka la khauekbü kom jinkuakei hoba no amaibüeibü aaola yeiakei dogo ngei chühenda.”
Simonei jongaikei, “Nyi laubü khübü kho tetche ongkei kü to ayingtila Bunyubou to kü shanga welaukushi.”
Haoenei aukabü haüko kukei hoba haoen la Bunyuboueibü ngühlang kukei. Kho phaia haosi Jerusalem to ngaikei hoba lamoua Samaria sang juonga Ngühlang Maibü songlenkei.
Khuthük hangangbü cheei Filip to lenkei, “Meimeiashi hoba Jerusalem ka Gaza to yanbü yungthang aekabü lamnyu to hauashi.” (Kho yamlamang lam.)
Hao meimeikei hoba haukei. Tou Ethiopia kabü Kandake Chobasao phanga saoeibü nyaksinam pendou thüka chühbou, Ethiopiabü sungphatbü yaangbü müt che Jerusalem to lemla haukei.
Hao kailonga setan longeijinei haoei Isaia thuseibü le weko kikei.
Soushouei Filip to laukei, “Hauashi hoba khünei setyoashi.”
Filip hao jungto laangkei, hoba hao Isaia thuseibü le weko ditan phekei, “Nyi weko ditbü kho nyi tükde ditendaoba lo?”
Haoei laukei, “Atei alenshongkoje ngei lai küman ditenla?” Hobaje haoei Filip to lotan hao yoa setla shanga phekei.
Haoei weko kibü Lai kho ho kiteikei:
“San che tegü hao haitila nangkei;
hoba sanlon shoushou haoeibü wi khebü junga
ngüh alongbü tegü hao haa akou.
Hao himoutikei hoba ngühmai matjem sunglangkei.
Haoeibü thensilen aoei wanenla?
Aishanga haoeibü langkei kho kaodak ka langa.”
Kheijinei sungphatbou khoei Filip to laukei, “Thuseibou khoei hao shangabü laungeida si ayingsi müt at shangabü laudaje sanoudaman kü la lenkai.”
Filipei lau khangkei, hoba kho Lai ngüh ka khangan hao la Jisu Khrista shangabü Ngühlang Maibü lenkei.
Haosi haujinei deikhün che sühlangkei, hoba sungphatbou khoei laukei, “Chüh- ashi, hanei dei kia. Ngo hanei baptikulabü ka aieije toketda sai?”
(Filipei laukei, “Kaibü maangpon khümboei mailema longa ho kümla thükakei.” Haoei jongaikei, “Jisu Khrista kho Mühghaü Shou dogo ngei mailemda.”)
Haoei kailong kho thaktikei hoba Filip si sungphatbou haosi ham deikhün khüto atkei; hoba Filipei hao baptikukei.
Ladang haosi dei khüka longkei Bunyuboueibü Soushouei Filip kho leilangkei hoba sungphatbou khoei hao ühüp; hoba hao haolam to olinangko ngaikei.
Lausikei Filip Azataa loushedkei hoba hao Kaisar to aloushongko haoei sangnyu pendoua Ngühlang Maibü songlenjung dankei.
Saulei athakko Bunyuboueibü eikshuong to chühmang asühsapbo haitila shanga khukabou ungshed jungto haukei.
Haoei, Lamnyu to mailembü eikshuong, bousu yaksa haüpangteiko lapan Jerusalem to khühan senbala shanga, hao Damaska sinagog to atla shanga sakkubü le hikei.
Hao hauko kijinei Damaska sühlamto müh ka ngesakbü che hao khuilepbo haukei.
Hao kao to atetkei hoba ngüh cheei hao to hai laukei, “Saul, Saul, nyi aila ngo shieinangeida?”
Haoei laukei, “Yaangbou, no ao?” Haoei jongaikei, “Ngo nyi shieinangeibou Jisu ki.
Lausikei laksepashi, sangnyu to atashi, hoba nyi ai kümjan yingkeije ka la lenlabü.”
Hao yoa paibü shuongei ngüh khoje ditda, lausikei aokei ühüpbü ka ngüh alongko mangan apbei.
Saul kao ka laksepbei hoba ladang hao nyek longkei haoei ai ühüpbo apbei; hoba haoenei hao ika jenan Damaska to leian atkei.
Chalou semnyet sühko haoei ai ühüpbo setkei, hoba ai ashau ayung.
Damaskaa eik che Anania dogo nyenan kikei. Bunyubouei hao to mangsanga hai laukei, “Anania,” haoei laukei, “Bunyubou, ngo hanei kia.”
Bunyubouei hao to laukei, “Meimeiashi hoba Tangsheibü dogo laubü lamnyu to hauashi, hoba Saul nyenbü Tarsasbü müt shangabü Judas nyenbü chema pheashi. Hao welauko kia,
hoba haoei mangsanga Anania dogo nyenbü müt che hao jungto louan hao la nyekei haptila shanga hao to ikei shangko hapa.”
Ananiaei jongaikei, “Bunyubou, kho mütei kaibü mütshuong to Jerusalema latet- che amaiko jungeikeije kho shangabü ngei müt juong ka ditoua.
Hobaje tou sema kaibü nyen to ngabü shuong pendou lapan haula shanga haoei ungshed jaishou shuong ka hau hiakei.”
Lausikei Bunyubouei hao to laukei, “Hauashi, aieilausi kho müt kho Küksithang hoba Choba shuong hoba Israelbü shuong jungto ngeibü ngühlang künla shanga ngei pienbü peisilei che ki.
Kü nyen aoa hao latet- che khonsaklabü kije kho ngei hao la lenlabü.”

Ananiaei apyoan chem khüto haukei. Haoei haoeibü ikei Saul to shangetan laukei, “Jaisina Saul, Bunyubou Jisu, ao no loubü lama ka thedanga haüyokei, haoei ngo ka nyekei haptila hoba Soushou Saopobüei shentila shanga hautikei.”
Kheijineitham haoeibü nyek ka kou tegütham ekei hoba haoeibü nyekei hapngaikei; hao laksepbei hoba baptikei,
hoba shauan yungan phaia hao la hau longeikei.
Saul Damaskaa eikshuong yoa longche khüpbei,
hoba khoyam haoei sinagoga Jisu shanga hai lauko phinthonkei, “Hao Mühghaü Shou ki.”

Haoei laubü ditbü shuong pendou maangpangkei hoba laukei, “Ho müt ho Jerusalema hao nyena ngabü shuong pendou khonsaktibou, hoba ungshed jaishou shuong jungto khühan haukula shanga loubou kho aying si?”
Lausikei Saul kho haua aei chingyokei, hoba haoei Jisu kho Messia ki dogo aukabü kubüei Damaskaa kibü Jihudabü shuong aei panglangtikei.
Chalou juong kian phaia Jihudabüei hao haitila huonkei,
lausikei haoenei huonbütakbü kho Saulei ngeenkei. Haoenei hao haitila shanga chalou nangnak pendou bakhüna lombei,
Lausikei haoeibü eikshuongei hao nangnak sangba ka kam chenei tonletkei.
Ladang hao Jerusalema sühlangkei haoei eikshuong yoa yomang sühkei, lausikei haoen pendou hao to hatyokei, aieilausi hao kho eik che yingkei dogo haoenei maialem.
Lausikei, Barnabaei hao youkoikjai shuong jungto leibakei hoba haoei haoen la lai küman lama Saulei Bunyubou hapbei, hoba Damaskaa Jisu nyena lai maangkaangko lenkei, kho pendou lenkei.
Saul haoen yoa Jerusalema ongale hauko longeiko hoba Bunyubou nyena maangkaangko lenko setkei.
Haoei Grik ngühyem laubü Jihudabü to wetyolauyokei; lausikei haoenei hao haitila lameikei.
Ladang jaisinasi shuongei kho ngeenkei haoenei hao Kaisaria to leibakei hoba Tarsas to satan aptikei.
Kho tegü Jihuda, Galil hoba Samaria pendoua lashong dan sangmeia olinyokei. Bunyubou la soumo kubü danko ho chingbü haabüa athak, hoba Soushou Saopobü thungeijangeibü danko ho aei haakei.
Peterei kongpeiko haujinei Liddaa kibü Múhghaü müt at junga sühlangkei.
Kheijinei haoei Aenea dogo nyenan po set shen ka akhokeibü phei haibü müt che hapbei.
Peterei laukei, “Aenea, Jisu Khristaei ka la maitilabü sungbada. Laksepashi, hoba no lolo shen lamleashi.” Hao khoyam pienkei.
Hobaje Lidda si Sharona kibü pendouei hao hapbei; hoba haoen Bunyubou jungto sepeikei.
Joppaa eik müt che Tabitha, tetlabü, Dorka, dogo nyenan kikei. Sao sanoubü kümsilei hoba maangshikbü kümsileiei shenan kikei.
Kho jihsiphaia sao shatkei hoba haikei. Haoenei saoeibü haibü mang kho sakenkei hoba thükkabou popchema phokei.
Lidda kho Joppa nyangko kikei, khoei khünei kibü eikshuongei Peter khün kia dogo ditan haoenei hao jungto müt nyi ho subüjabü ngüh yoan hautikei, “Sanoudaman kün jungto aphaiko kai.”

Peter meimeian haosi yoa haukei. hao ladang sühlangkei haoenei hao thükkabou popchem to leiangkei, hoba latnyu shuong hao nyangko loan haapyoko, hao la Dorka haoen yoa lang kijinei shibü neisimei hoba mangsho shuong sungenan lenkei.
Peterei haoen pendou tangto angtikei hoba khüpetan welaukei. Hao mang yeptian phobü aeto sepeikei hoba laukei, “Tabitha, laksepashi.” Kheijinei saoei nyek longkei, Peter hapbei hoba setkei.
Haoei sao la haoeibü ik hautian loentikei. Kheijinei haoei lashongbü hoba latnyu shuong ngayetkei hoba haoei haoen la sao lang kukei.
Kho ngühlang Joppa pendoua nyakkei hoba müt juong Bunyubou to mailembü shuong la yeikei.
Hao Joppaa Simon dogo nyenan phekhun shibü che junga chalou lounyu thüngkei.
Kaisariaa müt che Kornilia dogo nyenan Itali sepai san chenei saongao thüka leiyeibü che kikei.

Hao hoba haoeibü chemdang kho khümbo kubü hoba Mühghaü to hatbü chemdang che kiteikei, haoei Jihuda mütshuong maila yaangla shanga maangmai onou kümsilei juong kümbei hoba Mühghaü to athakko welaukei.
Nyetche chasemlamto angh sem thünga haoei mangsanga shangashatko Mühghaëibü khuthük hangangbü che hao jungto louko hapbei, hoba hao to laukei, “Kornilia.”
Korniliaei hao to laukei, “Yaangbou, aiche sai?” Khuthük hangangbüei hao to laukei, “Kaibü welau hoba maangmai kümsilei khübü khoei Mühghaü junga lousüha, hoba haoei no damena.
Hibü touje Joppa to müt hautiashi, hoba Peter dogokei nyenbou Simon ngala hautiashi.
Hao kho yungkoa kibou Simon dogo nyenan phekhun shibou chema sühakei.”
Ladang hao to joyobou khuthük hangangbü kho satkei, haoeibü chembabü sambü müt nyi hoba hao khangenbü yo ka khümbo kubü langkei sepai che dogo ngabakei.
Haoei haoen la pendou wanan lenkei hoba Joppa to hautikei.
Nyibounyet ladang haoen sangnyu sühlamto lamoua hauko kikei, kheijinei Peter chajihboua welaula chemdak to nguikei.
Hao mühei haikei hoba shaumang sühkei. Haoenei nongeikuko kitoua hao haileleko nyeket shikei,
hoba haoei müh ipan denche neinyu yaangbü che tegü louyenko hapbei. Kho neithon lei pendoua yaüan kao to lottikei,
hoba khünei you lei yembü hoba kaoa shanbü meisiau hoba sengbü ausiyuk pendou kiteikei.
Kheijinei hao jungto ngüh che hai loukei, “Meimeiashi Peter, haitiashi hoba shauashi.”
Peterei laukei, “Lakabü, Bunyubou, aishanga ngei ladangkei asaüenbü ayingsi asaopobü shauan achühkei.”
Toukei nyiboukei hao jungto ngüh che loukei, “Mühghaüei ai saopotia, kho nyi asaüenbü dogo telau.”
Kho semnei sühko haüthükkei hoba insing chenei ong neilop tegübü kho khuthük to anlangkei.
Ladang Peter haoei hapbü mangsang tetlabü shanga phen- yembo kikei, kheijinei Korniliaei hautibü mütshuong koukhüna lousühkei, hoba Simoneibü chem phekei,
hoba haoenei Peter dogokei nyenbou Simon kho khünei sühkeilaoje dogo phekei.
Ladang Peter kho mangsang shangabü mangan apan dameiko kikei, kheijinei Soushouei laukei, “Müt semei no lamda.
Pienan yanashi; hoba ai ajemtenko haoen yoa hauashi, aieilausi haoen hautibou kho ngo yingkei.”
Peter haoen jungto yanan laukei, “Kanei lameibü müt kho ngo yingkei. Kan aila loubü?”

Haoenei laukei, “Saongao thüka leiyeibou Kornilia, ao tangshaibü hoba Mühghaü to soumo hatbü müt hoba Jihuda mütli pendouei aukabü kuenbü müt ki, hao to Saopobü khuthük hangangbü danko no hao chemto ngabaan nyi ai ong lenlaje kho ditashi dogo hao la lenkei.”
Kheijinei haoei haoen kho hao yenbou la lean leiyetkei.
Nyibounyet kho hao haoen yoa meimeian haukei hoba Joppa ka jaisina atei hao hangkei.
Nyibounyet kho haoenei Kaisariaa sühlangkei. Kheijinei Korniliaei chempen shuong si jenabou shuong ngashaian hao haiyeiko kikei.
Ladang Peter atkei Korniliaei hao to shuokyokei hoba haoeibü you junga khüpetan hao to lembei.
Lausikei Peterei hao phonenko laukei, “Loenashi, ngokei müt ong yingkei.”
Peterei hao to joyoko chem to atkei hoba müt juong chela shaian hapbei.

Haoei haoen to laukei, “Kan pendouei ngeakei, Jihudabü che kho küksithang che to jamlayangla ayingsi joyola kho asakkukei. Lausikei ngei aotoche ongkei asaüenbü ayingsi asaopobü dogo alautila shanga Mühghaüei kü la shangashattia.
Khoei ladang nyi ngo ngala hautikei, kheijinei ngei manga ai ashuko loukei. Hibü ngei pheda, kanei ngo ailache ngada sai?”
Korniliaei laukei, “Chalou lei dana, ngo angh sem jiha kü chema welauko kikei, kheijinei kü thedanga thupaibü neisimei lean müt che lokei.
Haoei laukei, ‘Kornilia, kaibü welau dida, hoba kaibü maangmai kümsilei kho Mühghaü thedanga damena.
Hibü Joppa to hautiashi, hoba Simon, aoto Peter dogokei lauda, hao ngashi. Hao yungkoa kibü Simon, phekhun shibou chema sühakei.’
Hibü khoyam ngei no ngala hautikei hoba no hai lousühsi aeibou maikei. Hobaje tou kün pendou Bunyubouei ka la ai lentilaje kho ditla shanga Mühghaü thedanga yoshaiakei.”
Kheijinei Peterei haoen to hai lauko lenkei, “Ngühmaia ngei damenda, Mühghaüei the to achühda,
lausikei phangshuong wekoa aoei Mühghaü to soumo hatda hoba tangshaitham kümda hao khoje haoei sungletda.
Kho haoei Israelbü shuong jungto Ngühlang Maibü sangmai, pendou thüka Bunyubou Jisu Khrista shanga ngetiko hautibü Ngühlangmaibü kho ki.
“Baptibü shanga Johanei lenbü ka jaüan Galil ka khangan Jihuda pendoua ai ong haüthükkei kho kanei ngeakei.
Soushou Saopobü hoba sei yoan Mühghaüei lai Nazaretbü Jisu naangenkei kho kanei ngeakei. Hao maibü kümbo hoba Satanei khonkutibü maitikuko paikei, aishanga Mühghaü hao yoa kikei.
Hobaje Jihudabü kaonyek hoba Jerusalema kümbü pendou shanga kün aukabü shuong kikei. Haoenei hao peiseia thüngetnyu haitikei.
Lausikei Mühghaüei hao sembounyeta langngaitikei, hoba hao,
mütshuong pendou la aying, lausikei kün aoyou Mühghaüei thedangto thama piensapan phokei hoba aoyou hao haibü ka langngaian phaiakei hao yoa liko shaukei yungkei, khübü aukabü shuong la ong haptikei.
Mütshuong to songlenla hoba langkeibü si haibü ham matjemla Mühghaüei pienbou kho hao ki dogo aukabü kula haoei kün la sakkukei.
Hao to mailembü wekoei hao nyen danko shabü ap hapda dogo thuseibü shuong pendouei aukabü kuko phinthonbü kho hao ki.”
Ladang Peterei kho lauko kikei kheijinei Ngühlang to ditko kibü shuong pendou thükto Soushou Saopobü lotkei.
Peter yoa loubü Jihudabü mailembü shuong maangpangkei, aishanga küksithang shuong thüktokei Soushou Saopobü khüpan jinkukei,
aishanga haoenei haoen kho lubü ngühyemakei lauyoko hoba Mühghaü nyen sangko ditkei. Kheijinei Peterei laukei,
“Habü ho baptikula shanga müt ateije deikei shingekla thükkei sai? Haoeneikei künei tegü Soushou Saopobü sungleda.”
Hobaje haoei haoen Jisu Khrista nyena baptila shanga maisho lenkei. Kheijinei haoenei hao chalou shijo setngaila shanga sukeijakei.
Küksithang shuongeikei Mühghaü ngühlang sungleda dogo youkoikjai hoba Jihudaa kibü jaisina shuongei ditkei.
Ladang Peter Jerusalem to loukei, kipbü danshuongei hao to oyokei.
Haoenei laukei, “Nyi akipbü mütshuong pean chühkei hoba haoen yoa shauayunga.”
Hibü Peterei khangbü ka thenei thenko haoen la lenko laukei,
“Ngo Joppa sangnyua welauko kikei, hoba ngei yemphama mangsang che hapbei. Ngei khuthük ka neinyu yaangbü che phatko neithon leia yaüan lottiko hapbei hoba kü junga shatkei.
Ngei khüto maangsangko hoba haüko chühkei hoba khünei you lei yembü meisiau, kaoa shanbü meisiau hoba seengbü ausiyuk pendou hapbei.
Tokei ngei kü to hai lauko ditkei, ‘Meimeiashi Peter, haitiashi hoba shauashi.’
Lausikei ngei laukei, ‘Lakabü, Bunyubou, aishanga asaüenbü ayingsi asaopobü aikei kü sembung to atan achühkei.’
Khuthük ka ngüh cheei nyibou jongaikei ‘Mühghaüei ai saopotia, kho nyi asaüenbü dogo telau.’
Kho semnei sühko haüthükkei, hoba pendou kho khuthük to nyibou tuan langkei.
Mangde müt sem ngo sühshang to loukei. Haoen kho Kaisaria ka kü jungto hautibü kiteikei.
Soushouei ngo ai asukatembo haoen yoa haula lenkei. Habü jaisina müt lakkei kü yoto loukei, hoba kün khoeibü chem to atkei.
Haoei lai küman khuthük hangangbü hao chema loan hao to, ‘Joppa to müt hautiashi, hoba Peter dogokei nyenbou Simon ngala hautishi,
hoba haoei no hoba ka chemdang pendou lai khümenla kho lenlabü,’ dogo lenko lokei kho kün la lenkei.
Ngei lau khangan phaia, khangla sen thükto lotbü tegütham Soushou Saopobü haoen thükto lotkei.
Ngei Johanei laubü kho damenkei, ‘Johanei deia baptikukei; lausikei kan Soushou Saopobüa baptikulabü.’
“Hibü, sen Bunyubou Jisu Khrista to mailembü yeijinei kubü tegütham Mühghaüei haoenlakei jeteibü jongsak kukei yingalonga, Mühghaü shingeklabü lele ngo tokei ao yingbü?”
Ladang haoenei kho ditkei haoen lemenbü thakkei; hoba haoenei Mühghaü la soneikangbü kuko laukei, “Touje Mühghaüei Küksithang lakei langkei haplabü lele maangpon sepeibü kua.”
Tou aoyou Stefen laüa shieikoejinei satyokei haoen Foenika hoba Kupra hoba Antiok sühko aakei, hoba haoenei ngühlang kho Jihudabü la ong lenkei.
Haoen yoa atje Kupra hoba Kurinibü, ladang haoen Antiok to atkei Küksithang lakei Bunyubou Jisu Khrista Ngühlangmaibü songlenko joyola khangkei.
Bunyubou ik haoen yoa kikei hoba juongnyu mailembü la yeiko Bunyubou jungto sepeikei.
Haoen shangabü ngühlangei Jerusalem kabü lashong sühlangkei, hoba haoenei Antiok to Barnaba hautikei.
Ladang hao sühlangkei hoba Mühghaü onou kibü aukabü hapbei hao olinkei hoba Bunyubou to maangnyu angko kaangkhühtham hatyoan kila shanga haoei haoen pendou thungeikei;
aishanga hao müt maibü, Soushou Saopobü hoba mailemei shenan kikei. Hobaje mütshang yaang Bunyubou jungto sungbakei.
Barnaba Tarsas to Saul lamla haukei,
hoba ladang hao haüyokei haoei hao Antiok to leibakei. Po che sünga haosi lashong to phenyoan kikei hoba mütshang yaang la songlenkei. Eikshuong to Antioka shaang Khristan shuong dogo ngakei.
Khübü chaloua thuseibü shuong Jerusalem ka Antiok to yankei.
Haoen yoa Agaba dogo nyenan müt che loenkei hoba kaonyudak pendoua mühsinou yaang loulabü dogo Soushouei tetenko lenkei.
Kho Klaudia jihsiphaia haüthükkei.
Eikshuong luluei thükbüei Jihuda kabü jaisina shuong la thuibü hautila maangangenkei.
Haoenei khei kümbei hoba Barnaba si Paul ik danko jaishou shuong la hautikukei.
Kho jihsiphaia Herod Chobaei khonkutila shanga lashongbü at thükto ik shatkei.
Haoei Johaneibü jai Jakob inlouei haitikei.
Haoei ladang khoei Jihudabü olintia dogo chühenkei, haoei Peter kei lapla meimeikei. (Kho Tokai ajinbü Wentek Lem kiteikei.)
Haoei hao lapbei hoba sepai lei bang san lei la lomtiko thüngdanga phokei. Haoei Püetbülem phainei pühdak matjemshang to leibalabü dogo dambei.
Hibü lombü phoan Peter thüngdang to jinkei, lausikei lashongje hao shanga kaangkhühtham Mühghaü to welauko kiteikei.
