Herodei hao matjemshang to leibalabü lele lamlean kikei. Khüyou Peter yangmen penyi phenan sepai nyi kanglanga yeptian kikei hoba lombü shuongkei thüngdang koukhüna lombo kiteikei.
Mangde ong Bunyubou khuthük hangangbü hao thüka lokei hoba thüngshanga ngesakbü che haukei. Haoei Petereibü hip to meitiko kangan laukei, “Hali laksepashi.” Hobaje haoeibü ik ka yangmen thetletkei.
Khuthük hangangbüei hao to laukei, “Nei homashi hoba nguok lonashi.” Haoei khei kümbei. Kheijinei haoei Peter to laukei, “Kaibü mangyuk homashi hoba kü phai semshi.”
Peter satkei hoba hao phai sembei. Haoei Mühghaüei khuthük hangangbü danko ai kümda kho tükdebü dogo ange, lausikei haoei mangsang che hapda dogo dambei.

Haosiei shaangbou lomshang koukhün hoba nyiboubükei dankei, hoba thonla sangnyu aeto libü bakhüna louphambei. Kho jembü lolo ipbei, hoba kho aian phaia lamnyu che to yankei. Kheijinei khuthük hangangbüei hao apyokei.
Ladang Peter maia phambei haoei laukei, “Ngei tou chongchinga, khei Herodeibü hau hoba Jihuda mütli shuongei chüheiko kibü ka ngo püetla shanga Bunyubouei haoeibü khuthük hangangbü hautibü yingakei.”
Ladang haoei kho shangashatkei Mark dogokei nyenbou Johaneibü nyu Mari chem, lanei juong takshatan welauko kiteikei, khüto haukei.
Haoei koukhüna koukap to kuokkei hoba Roda nyenbü sambü sao che jola loukei.
Saoei Petereibü ngüh shenkei, hoba aeibou olinbü ka kou ipbulabü khanto laangjung ngaian haoen to Peter khonga loakei dogo lenkei.
Haoenei sao to laukei, “No langet angda.” Lausikei saoei tükdebü yingkei dogo kaosakkei. Haoenei laukei, “Kho haoeibü khuthük hangangbü yinglabü.”
Lausikei Peterei kuokdang lekei. Ladang haoenei kou ipbei hoba hao hapbei, maangpangkei.

Haoei haoen to alemenla shanga ikei shentiko laukei, hoba Bunyubouei hao lai thüngdang ka leibakei kho wanan lenkei; hoba haoei laukei, “Ho Jakob si jaisinasi shuong la lenashi.” Kheijinei haoei apyoan lubü kaoen che to haukei.
Ladang lang ngekei, Peter to ai haüthükkei kho shanga sepai shuong aeibou la pangyokei.
Herodei hao lamtikei, ühüpdang lesi haoei kokpheian chühan phaia lombü shuong haitila leilangtikei. Kheijinei hao Jihuda ka Kaisari to satkei hoba khünei thüngkei.

Herod Tair si Sidon mütli to aeibou khauangkei. Haoen chela takshatan, shaangla Blasta, Choba chema konglebou suletan phokei hoba haoen Choba jungto sangmai hiletla loukei, aishanga shausiyung shanga haoen kho haoeibü kaonyek to nongan kikei.
Pienbü chalou chenei Herodei haoeibü Choba hele lean haoeibü Choba setshanga setkei hoba pühdak ngühlau kukei.
Mütshuongei “Hoje müteibü ngüh aying, mühghaüeibü ngüh,” dogo ngekko laudang lekei.
Mangde Bunyubou khuthük hangangbüei hao ngüman koutikei aishanga haoei soneikangbü Mühghaü la aku; hoba hao yangbemei künan haikei.
Lausikei Bunyubou ngühlang athakko haako yaangko haukei.
Barnaba si Saul Jerusalem ka haosieibü kümsilei wanan longeikei, hoba haosiei Mark dogokei nyenbou Johan haosi yoa leibakei.
Antiok lashonga thuseibü hoba lenbou shuong kiteikei: Barnaba, Niger dogo nyenbou Simon, Kurini kabü Lukia, Herod Tetrark yoa chingenbou Manean, hoba Saul.
Haoen Bunyubou to lembo hoba mühei nyengko kijinei Soushou Saopobüei laukei, “Barnaba si Saul ngei haosi aila ngakei kho kümsilei kümtila kü shanga phangche pienan phoashi.”
Ladang haoenei mühei nyengko haosi to shangetan welau thonkei kheijinei haoenei haosi meimeitikei.
Hibü Soushou Saopobüei haosi hautikei hoba haosi Seleukia sühko koukei. Khüka haosi Kupra to longa haukei.
Haosi Salamia sühlangkei hoba Jihudabü sinagoga Mühghaü ngühlang phinthonkei; hoba haosi to thuiyola Johan yoan kikei.
Ladang haoen Pafosa sühko su pendou danjung haukei, haoen Jihudabü amlangbü thuseibü seibü che to kühshokkei; haoeibü nyen Bar-Jisu kikei.
Hao aeibou akbou governor Sergia Paulas yoa kikei. Governorei Barnaba si Saul ngala hautikei hoba Mühghaü ngühlang ditla shanga phekei.
Lausikei seibou Elimaei (kho haoeibü nyen tetlabü) governor mailem ka ngaitila haujembo haosi khulimbei.
Lausikei Saul, aoto Paul dogo laukei, Soushou Saopobüei shenko haoei hao to nyek thean chühkei hoba laukei,
“No shabüeibü shou, khüpsilang hoba huonei youei shenan, saopobü pendoueibü dangbou, nyi tou Bunyuboueibü lam peksekbü haka athaklep lo?
Ditashi, toutham Bunyubou ikok ka thüka kia; no nyek thulabü hoba longche nyi chanyu ühüplabü.” Mangde deihak hoba nakthüh hao thükto lotkei, hoba hao jentila shanga müt lamla haujembei.
Governorei haüthükbü kho hapbei, hoba mailembü che la yeikei. Bunyubou shangabü lenbü khünei hao maangpangkei.
Paul si hao jambü shuong Pafos ka longa hauan Pamfiliaa Perga to loukei; lausikei Johanei haosi apyokei hoba Jerusalem to ngaikei.
Haosikei Perga ka satkei hoba Pisidia kabü Antiok to loukei. Haosiei Nounyet sinagog to atkei hoba setkei.
Ngühkhüm hoba thuseibü le wean phaia sinagog kabü yaangbü shuongei haoen jungto ngühlang hai hautikei, “Jaisinasi shuong, kanei mütshuong shanga denche thungei jangeilabü ngühlang kisije lenashi.”
Paul loenkei hoba ik jungeiko hai laukei, “Israelbü hoba Mühghaü to hatbü shuong ditashi.
Ho Israel mütli Mühghaüei seneibü pisibou shuong pienkei hoba haoen Ijep kaodaka yenla lean kijinei mütli yaangbü la yeitikei. Haoeibü thükenbü hauei haoen khüka leibakei.
Haoei haoen lamanga po saonyi thüng pangteikei.
Kheijinei haoei Kanan kaoa phangshuong nyet sühko shemtikei hoba haoeneibü kao Israelbü la letikei.
Po saongao leito anjinsem danan phaia tokei haoei haoen la thuseibü Samuel jih asühshongko matjembü shuong kukei.
Nyiboua haoenei Choba che hikei, hoba Mühghaüei haoen la Benjamin phang kabü, Kish shou Saul kukei, aoei po saonyi songdakkei.
Kho phaia haoei Saul kuktikei hoba haoeneibü Choba shanga Dawid longtikei.
“Mühghaüei hao shangabü aukabü leko hai laukei, ‘Ngei Jesse shou Dawid hapoua. Ngeibü dambü pendou künan haulabü lele hao kho maangsembü müt che ki.’
Kho müteibü thensilen ka, haoei theletbü tegü Mühghaüei Israelbü la khümenbou che sungbakei, hoba hao kho Jisu ki.
Hobaje hao aloujinei Johanei Israel mütshuong pendou shanga maangpon sepeibü tetsida lenko baptikubü huileda.
Ladang Johan haoküm haolei thonko loukei haoei laukei, ‘Kanei ngo ao dogo damda? Ngo hao aying, lausikei kü phainei, aoeibü nguoklüh sengkula ngo amu, hao louada.’
“Jaisinasi shuong, Abraham thensilen shuong, hoba kan Mühghaü to soumo hatbü dan, kho khümenbü ngühlang kho kün jungto hautikukei;
aishanga Jerusalembü hoba haoeneibü lei- yeibü danei hao ashen, hoba haoenei hao la shedbü kuko Nounyet weko webü thuseibü ngüh shuong loushedtikei.
Hao haitilabü lele aukabü ai ühüpsikei haoenei hao haitila shanga Pilat to phekei.
Ladang haoenei hao shanga doan kibü tegü pendou loushedtikei, haoenei hao peisei ka sungyankei hoba hee chenei khünkei.
Lausikei Mühghaüei hao haikhün ka langngaitikei.
Hao yoa Galil ka Jerusalem to haubü shuong la chalou lounyu haptikei; hoba haoen tou mütshuong to haoeibü aukabü ki.
Künei kan la Ngühlang Maibü songlenda, khei Jisu Khrista langngaitibü danko, sen haoeneibü shisi shuong shanga pisishuong to theletbü kho nyiboubü Nyensang Chiaa lenan kibü tegü hai loushedkei:
‘No kü shou;
tat ngo Kabou la yeia.’
Mangkhün nyaübü to ladangkei nyibou angailabü lele haoei hao haibü ka langngaitia, hoba khüto yoko haoei hai laua:
‘Ngei ka la Dawid la thekubü saopobü
hoba tükdebü haülabü kulabü.’
Maimaitham haoei lubü nyensang chiaa lauda:
‘Nyi kaibü saopobü kho anyaütilabü.’
“Tou Dawid hao metena Mühghaüei tetenbü tegü khangenan phaia haikei, hoba hao pisi shuong yoa khünkei. Hao nyaületkei.
Lausikei ao Mühghaüei langngaitikei haoje anyaü.
Hibü, jaisinasi shuong, kanei ho ngeashi, hao danko shabü apbubü kho kan to phinthonda,
hoba kan Mosa ngühkhüm phanga laobouei atangtien pendou ka hao to mailembü weko tangtibü hapbei.
Hibü sangashi! Thuseibü lea lenbü loushedlakei thükkei;
‘Chühashi, kan nyikubü dan!
Maangpangashi hoba mauashi;
aishanga ngei kan jiha kümsilei che kümda,
kümsilei che laobou kan to atei wanan lenasikei
kanei ladangkei maialemlabü!’ ”
Paul si Barnaba ngaijinei jeteibü ngühnyek haoen to loulabü Nounyetkei laukushi dogo mütshuongei haosi to phekei.
Ladang kamshai linkei, khünei lembo shaibü Jihudabü hoba Jihuda songle to sepeibü shuong Paul si Barnaba phai sembei hoba haosiei haoen to Mühghaü onou thüka nongan kila shanga thungeijangeikei.
Sühlangbü Nounyet sangnyu kabü khümbo tegü Bunyubou ngühlang ditla takshatkei.
Lausikei ladang Jihudabü shuongei kho hapbei haoenei nyek to shatkei. Haoenei nyikukei hoba Paulei laubü to pekngeidang lekei.

Paul si Barnabaei hau kiko laukei, “Mühghaü ngühlang kho kan la shaang lenjan yingan kikei. Lausikei kanei ho wailetda hoba thon akibü langkei hapla amukei dogo kan lolo lenensije, kün tou Küksithang to sepeida.
Bunyubouei kün la sakkubü ngühkhüm kho ho ki:
‘Kaodak thonbüa sühko khümenbü hangsilam shanga,
ngei no Küksithang to ngesakbü che yingla pienkei.’ ”
Küksithang shuongei kho ditan olinyokei hoba haoei Bunyubou ngühlang soneikangtikei. Thon akibü langkei shanga pienan phobü shuong mailembü la yeikei;
hoba Bunyubou ngüh kaonyek phambo phinthonkei.
Lausikei Jihudabü shuongei Mühghaü lembü yaangbü saoshuong hoba sangnyu kabü khuleibü tensepbei; haoenei Paul si Barnaba khulimbo shieikoe khangkei, hoba haoen kaonyek ka shian sattikei.
Lausikei Paul si Barnabaei haoen khulimbo you ka thamngu kangan apbei hoba Ikonia to haukei.
Hobaje eikshuong kho olinbü hoba Soushou Saopobüei shenkei.
Ikoniaa kei haoen Jihudabü sinagog to atkei hoba Jihudabü si Grikbü shuong yaangbü che mailembü la yeilabü lele lauenkei.
Lausikei maialembü Jihudabü shuongei Küksithang maangpon pühnyinkei hoba jaisinasi shuong khulimbo khüjin khaüjintikei.
Haoenei khünei Bunyubou to maanglem phoan hau kiko ngüh lauko chalou lounyu dantikei, hoba onoubü ngühlang kho Bunyubouei haoen la sei hoba maangpanglabü hau kuko sungletkei.
Touje sangnyu kabü mütshuong kho Jihudabü ae hoba at eikshuong ae yeiko janyinkei.
Ladang Jihudabü si Küksithang ham yoa leiyeibü dan yoan haoen amaiko jungeiko laangei tetla huonkei,
haoenei kho lapenkei hoba haoen Lukonia kabü Lustra si Derbi sangnyu hoba lepsanga sühko satkei.
Khüneikei haoenei Ngühlang Maibü songlenkei.
Lustraa ladangkei haoeibü you jungeian achühbü müt che kikei. Hao bukjineithama sokebü hoba ladangkei apai.
Hao Paulei laubü ditko setkei. Paulei hao to tangko chühkei, hoba kho mailabü lele hao to mailem kibü chühenan
haoei ngüh yaangbüei laukei, “Kaibü youei tangshaitham loashi.”
Müt khoei saikolakko loenan paikei.
Ladang mütshuongei Paulei kümbü kho hapbei, haoenei Lukonia ngühyema ngekkei, “Mühghaü shuong mütmai la yeian sen jungto lotakei.”
Haoenei Barnaba la Zea nyenkukei hoba Paul la Herme, aieilausi kongnyubou ngühlaubou kho hao kiteikei.
Sangnyu bakhün aenei lemshang kibou Zea ungshedbou shuongei noknyüh thedanga lembü kumang sühko bakhün to masu pongsu si chipen yak sungbakei.
Ladang eik nyi, Barnaba si Paulei kho ditkei haosiei maangshatei nei jitnyinkei hoba shuong yoto hai

phangko tomjung atkei, “Mütshuong, kanei aila hai jungeida? Künkei kan tegübü ong, khuthük si kaodak hoba yungnyu hoba khonei kibü pendou kümbou langkeibü Mühghaü jungto ho tegübü jim akibü hangsilam ka kan nasepeia dogo künei kan la Ngühlang Maibü songlenda.
Danbü meten haoei phangshuong pendou jembü lam to haula sakkua.

Khei yingasikei haoei mütshuong kho haoeibü aukabü ayoko üpyo. Haoei khuthük ka lang yantiko hoba shusiphon jihsiphai hautiko haoeibü sanou kan to lenkei, hoba haoei kan shaueiyungei senyühshemtida hoba kaneibü maangpon olinbüei shentida.”
Kheinyu lenkokei haosi to lemla loubü shuong kho haosiei ushaleko ong shingekkei.
Lausikei Pisidia kabü Antiok si Ikonia ka Jihudabü shuong lousühkei. Haoenei shuong kho phokthetan Paul to laangei sonkei hoba haia dogo daman sangnyu aiko senlangkei.
Lausikei ladang eikshuongei kaijembei kheijinei hao laksepbei hoba sangnyu to atkei. Nyibounyet hao Barnaba yoa Derbe to haukei.
Haosiei kho sangnyubü to Ngühlang Maibü lenkei, hoba eik juong haatian phaia haoen Lustra, Ikonia hoba Pisidia kabü Antiok to ngaikei.
Haoenei eikshuong hau kitikei hoba mailema ngühmaang lanko khüpla shanga hai laukei, “Khonku juongnyu danthetko ong sen Mühghaü Sangle to atjan ki.”
Haoenei lashong wekoa jaishou shuong heenkukei, hoba mühei nyengko welauan phaia haoenei mailembü Bunyubou la haoen khümbo nongtian phokukei.
Haoen Pisidia danko hauan phaia Pamfilia to loukei,
hoba haoenei Pergaa songlenan phaia haoen Atalia to loukei.
Khüka haoen, laobou kaoena Mühghaü onoua kümlaleila nongkubü tou khümtia, kho Antiok to longa haukei.
Sühlangan phaia lashongbü chela kamtian Mühghaüei haoen jungeibü hoba haoei ailai Küksithang shuong la mailem koukhün ipbukei kho ngühlang lenkei.
Hobaje haoen eikshuong yoa chalou lounyu thüngkei.
Jihuda ka müt at yanan jaisina shuong to haoenkei Mosa songa kakbü tegü akiplonga khümenla athüklabü dogo lenkei.

Paul si Barnabaei haoen to ngühthang ayenko kaang wetyoko lemenkei, hibü haoenei kho lemenbü ngüh kho shanga Paul si Barnaba yo to haoen ka at yoan Jerusalem to hangangbü shuong si jaishou shuong jungto haula lamlekei.
Haoen lama lashongbüei thuiyoko hautikei, hoba haoen Foenika si Samaria danko Küksithang shuong maangpon sepeibü lenko haukei; hoba haoenei jaisinasi shuong pendou la olinbü yaang kukei.
Ladang haoenei Jerusalem sühkei, lashong hoba hangangbü shuong hoba jaishou shuong pendouei haoen olinko sungletkei, hoba haoenei Mühghaüei haoen lai jungeikei kho lenkei.
Lausikei Farisibü dan yoa mailembü atei loenan, Küksithang shuong kipjan hoba Mosa ngühkhüm jungeila lenjan dogo laukei.
Kheijinei youkoikjai si jaishou shuong kho ngüh daman chühla shanga kambei.

Ngüh juong wetyoan phaia Peter loenkei hoba haoen to laukei, “Jaisinasi shuong, ngo danko Küksithang shuongei Ngühlang Maibü ditlabü hoba mailemlabü shanga shangieda ngo kan yo ka pienkei dogo kanei ngeakei.
Hobaje maangpon ngebou Mühghaüei, sen la kubü tegü haoenlakei Soushou Saopobü kuko haoen sungletbü aukabü lekei.
Haoei sen si hao aoa ai abangnyin, aishanga mailemei haoei haoeneibü maangpon asaüenkukei.
Laobou buleng seneibü pisibou ayingsi senei asüh kho mailembü shuongeibü ngüma jinkuko kanei aila Mühghaü takteida?
Khei aying, Bunyubou Jisueibü onou danko sen si haoen jetei khümenkei dogo senei mailemda.”
Shuong pendou küpjembei hoba Barnaba si Paulei haoen danko Mühghaüei Küksithang yoa sei hoba maangpanglabü kümbü pendou thenan lenbü to ditko setkei.
Ladang haosiei laukhümbei Jakobei thenkei, “Jaisinasi shuong, kü to ditkai.
Küksithang ka hao shanga phangshuong che longtila shanga Mühghaüei shaanglathama lai thounoukei kho tou Simonei thenan lena.
Ho thuseibü ngüh to jiakei; Laishibaei lenda,
‘Kho phaia joubü khunak shousi,
hoba ngei lela ngabü Küksithang pendouei
Bunyubou lamlabü lele ngo longeilabü
hoba ngei Dawid kishang tuongbü kümetlabü.
Ngei kho leilubü kümetlabühoba ho nyibou phonngailabü dogo,
shangiednyu habü ngetibou Bunyubouei lauda.’
“Hibü, senei Küksithang shuong aoyou Mühghaü jungto sepeia haoen la khonsak akujan,
lausikei silip jabü shausiyung, asangalanbü, nyatettibü shausi- yung, hoba sii ka bangenan kila shanga senei haoen to le dojan dogo damda.
Aishanga Mosaei shangiedbü chalou ka thama hao shanga phinthonla phojung loua. Haoeibü ngühkhüm Nounyet weko sinagoga wekei.”

Kheijinei youkoikjai si jaishou shuong yoa kambü shuong pendou yoan, Paul si Barnaba to dangan Antiok to hautilabü müt pienkei. Haoen mailembü yoa leiyeibü shuong Barsaba dogo nyenbou Juda si Sila pienkei.
Haoenei ngühlang hai dobü hautikei: “Antiok, Siria hoba Kilikia pendoua Küksithang jaisinasi shuong to youkoikjai hoba jaishou jaisinasi shuongei salem küntida.
Kün yo kabü müt atei, kün to ai apheshuokko louan kaneibü maangpon phenyemtiko ngüh laua dogo künei dida.
Hibü künei shuong yoka müt at pienan küneibü sanoubü Barnaba si Paul,
aoyou langkei seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista nyena khümbo kua, haosi yoto hautilabü dogo janenkei.
Hibü kanei haoen lolo kan la sembungei lenlabü lele Juda si Sila hautida.
Habü kongnyu phai to liman kan thükto lubü onat ajinyokulabü shanga ho Soushou Saopobü hoba künei janenbü kikei:
silip jabü shausiyung ka, sii ka, nyatettibü shausiyung pendou ka, hoba asangalanbü ka bangenan kilabü. Kan lolo khüka satenan kialonga aeibou mailabü. Bangmai.”
Hibü haoen khüka linan phaia Antiok to yankei. Haoenei shuong pendou takshattikei hoba le kho kukei.
Le kho wean lenkei hoba khoei haoen thungeijangeibü shanga kambü shuong olinyokei.
Juda si Sila, thuseibü yingsije, ngüh lounyu lauko jaisinasi shuong thungeijangeikei hoba hau kingeitikei.
Haoen khünei longche thüngkei. Kheijinei jaisinasi shuongei haoen hautibü shuongla haoeneibü salem lenngaila shanga haoen to phean phaia haoen ungtikei.
(Lausikei Silaeije khün setngaila janenkei.)
Paul si Barnaba, lubü juong yoan Bunyubou Ngühlang Maibü songlenko Antioka setkei.
Chalou shijo kian phaia Paulei Barnaba to, “Setije ngaian setiei Bunyubou ngühlang phinthonshang sangnyu weko to hauan jaisinasi shuong lai ong kije pean chühakho,” dogo laukei.
Barnabaei Mark dogo laubou Johan haosi yoto leimang sühkei;
lausikei aoei haosi Pamfiliaa apyoan haosi yoa kümtoleito ayang, kheibü müt leilaje Paul la amaikuko dambei.
Khünei lem aseyobü yaang longan haosi bangkei, hoba Barnabaei Mark leian Kupra to longa haukei.
Paulei Sila heenkei hoba jaisinasi shuongei Bunyubou onoubü la nongtian phokukei.
Hao Siria si Kilikia danko lashong dan hau kitiko haukei.
Paul Derbe si Lustra to loukei hoba khünei eik che Timoti nyenbü kikei. Hao kho mailembü Jihuda sao cheeibü shou lausikei haobouje Grikbü kikei.
Lustra si Ikoniaa jaisinasi shuongei hao maibü shanga aukabü kuko laukei.
Paulei hao hao yoa thonan haumangsühkei hoba khübü kaoen kabü Jihudabü aoa haoei hao leibaan kipbukei, aieilausi haobouje Grikbü dogo pendouei ngean kiteikei.
Haoen haubü sangnyu wekoa youkoikjai si jaishou shuongei Jerusalema janenbü ngühkhüm jungeila lenko ngühlang kujung dankei.
Khoei lashong dan mailema hau kiko chingkei hoba chalou angbüa mütshang haakei.
Haoen Frigia si Galatia kaophei danko haukei. Asiaa Mühghaü ngüh alentila Soushou Saopobüei haoen shiletkei.
Ladang haoenei Misia leilang sühkei, haoen Bithinia to atla haujembei lausikei Jisueibü Soushouei haoen la asakku.
Haoenei Misia danjung Troa to loukei.
Khüyou Paulei mangsang che hapbei: “Makedonia to louan kün thuikai,” dogo sukojako Makedoniabü che loan hapbei.
Ladang haoenei mangsang kho hapbei, Mühghaüei haoen la Ngühlang Maibü songlentila kún ngada dogo shuokenan tongde Makedonia to haula haujembei.
Kün Troa ka shaüde Samothrak to longa haukei, hoba nyibounyet Neapoli to haukei.
Khüka kün Makedonia kaopheia shaangbou sangnyu hoba Rombü kishang Filipi to loukei. Kün kho sangnyua chalou shijo setkei.
Nounyet kün welaushang kaoen kilabü dogo daman bakhün aiko yungko to haukei, hoba khünei shaian kibü yaksa shuong to joyokei.
Lidia nyenbü Mühghaü lembü yaksa cheei ditko kikei; sao kho Thiatira sangnyu kabü nakthüngan sakbü nei yakbü kikei. Bunyubouei saoeibü maangpon ipbuan saoei Paulei lenbü to aeibou maangtakko ditkei.

Ladang sao hoba sao chemdang baptikei, saoei kün to, “Kanei ngo tükdebü Bunyubou phai sembü yingkei dogo chühenan kia longa kaiya hoba kü chema setashi,” dogo lauko sukeijakei; hoba kün sao yoa leian haukei.
Kün welaushang to haujinei thulenbü soushou kibü aaosao che haüyokei. Saoei seibütakbü ka saoeibü bunyu shuong la pailetbü yaang sungbakukei.
Saoei Paul hoba kün phai, “Habü mütshuong ho Thükkabou Mühghaü sambü shuong ki. Haoenei kan to khümenbü lam che ngekletda,” dogo lauko sembei.
Saoei chalou lounyu hai ong lauko khüpbei. Paul aeibou kipjimtisi haoei sepeian soushou to laukei, “Sao ka longan apshi dogo Jisu Khrista nyena ngei ka la ngühkhüm kuda;” hoba khoyam longan apbei.
Ladang saoeibü bunyu shuongei haoen ku pailetshang aki dogo ngekei, haoenei Paul si Sila lapan namyakshang kaoen to songdakbü shuong jungto senan haukei.
Haoenei matjembü thedang to haoen leibakei hoba laukei, “Habü mütshuongei kün sangkhong aeibou banglangtida; haoen Jihudabü yingkei.
Sen Rombüei ai song asungletda hoba jungeijan aying kho song haosiei lenda.”
Shuongkei khünei thipan haosi shieikei, hoba matjembü shuongei haosieibü mangkabü neisimei jitnyinkuan saüan apbukei hoba juei semeila ngühkhüm kukei.
Haoenei aeibou ngümeian phaia thüngdangto jinkei hoba thüngbou la maisho lomla shanga ngühkhüm kukei.
Hibü haoei haosi mangkabou to jinan, haosieibü you kho thüngdang to attian phokei.
Metuphanga Paul si Sila Mühghaü to welauko hoba nyensangbü chia lauko kikei, hoba thüngdanga kibü shuongei haosi to ditko kikei.
Mangde thüngdang chem pendou nyaakeiko selo kaang nyikei; kheijineitham koukap pendou ipbei hoba thüngdang kabü shuong pendoueibü yangmen thetletkei.
Thüngbou laksepbei hoba ladang haoei thüngshang koukhün pendou ipan hapbei, thüngdangkabü shuong satkhüma dogo daman haoei haoeibü inlou setenkei hoba jembü lolo hailabü ong kiteikei.
Lausikei Paulei ngüh yaangbüei ngekko laukei, “Jembü lolo tekom; aieilausi kün pendou hanei kia.”
Kheijinei thüngbouei hantin hikei hoba wenjung atkei. Hobaje hao hatbüei lühko Paul si Sila thedanga khüpetkei.
Kheijinei haoei haosi tongde leilangan phaia haosi to laukei, “Yaangbü shuong, khümenlabü shanga ngei ai kümjan?”
Haosiei laukei, “Bunyubou Jisu to mailemashi hoba no hoba kan chemdang khümenlabü.”
Haosiei hao hoba haoeibü chemdanga kibü pendou la Mühghaü ngüh lenkei.
Kheijineitham haoei haosi leilangan moukhün sakkukei. Hobaje khoyam hao hoba haoeibü chemdang pendou baptikukei.
Haoei Paul si Sila hao chem to leian haukei hoba oknyinkei; hoba hao Mühghaü to mailembü yeibü shanga hao yoa chemdang pendou yoan olinyokei.
Ladang langngekei, matjembü shuongei, “Khübü mütshuong litiashi,” dogo ngühkhüm jungan thenkabü yaangbü shuong hautikei.
Thüngbouei Paul to kho ngühlang lenko laukei, “Matjembü shuongei kasi litila shanga ngühkhüm kuakei. Hibü tou longashi, hoba eaaoa ngaiashi.”

Lausikei Paulei haoen to laukei, “Küsi to shedbü ai akiko haoenei küsi to pühthea ngümbei hoba kün Rom mütli ki! Haoenei kün thüngdang to jinkei. Hobaje tou haoenei kün huphangshoua ngaitila se? Ladangkei aying! Haoen lolo louan kün sungentiashi.”
Yaangbü shuongei kho ngühlang matjembü shuong la lenkei hoba haoen Rombü dogo ditan aeibou hatyokei.
Haoen louan haosi to ap hikei hoba haosi sungenan phaia haoenei haosi to sangnyu apyola sukeijakei.
Kheijinei haosiei thüngdang chem apyokei hoba Lidia chem to haukei; khünei jaisinasi shuong to haüyoan hoba thungeijangeian phaia haosi bangkei.
Haosi Amfipoli hoba Apolonia danko paikei hoba Thesalonika, laonei Jihudabü sinagog che kikei, khüto loukei.
Haoeibü song tegü, Paulei haoen yoa yoan Nounyet sem sühko haoei haoen to Lai ka,
Messia khonsaklabü hoba sembounyet haikhün ka langngailabü kho janbü yingan kikei dogo wanan lenko hoba aukabü kuko lenyokei. Haoei laukei, “Jisu ao shanga ngei kan to phinthonda, kho Messia ki.”
Haoen at mailemtikei hoba Mühghaü lembü Grikbü shuong yaang hoba yaangbü sao shuong juongnyuei Paul si Sila phai sembei.
Lausikei Jihudabüei nyekto shatkei. Haoenei khong ka shoongeibü sousiwat tan leisheian sangnyu pendou lapangyotikei. Haoenei Jason chem kombei hoba haosi püh shaishang to leibala shanga lameikei.
Haoenei haosi aminousije Jason yoa jaisinasi shuong at sangnyu matjembü shuong jungto, “Kaodak khüpeilangeitibü shuong hatokei louakei, hoba Jasonei haoen haoeibü chem to leiyetkei.
Haoen pendouei Jisu nyenbü lubü Choba che kia dogo lauko Kaisar ngühkhüm khulimbo kümda,” dogo ngekko senbakei.
Haoenei kheinyu lauko ditko shaibü matjembü shuong si noknyüh lapangtikei.
Matjembü shuongei Jason si lubü shuong ka angnam shauan litikei.
Kheijinei jaisinasi shuongei Paul si Sila khüyoutham Beria to hautikei. Haoen sühlangan Jihudabü sinagog to atkei.
Khübü mütshuong Thesalonikabü to maibou kiteikei hoba haoenei ngühlang kho maangtakko sungletkei hoba Paul si Silaei lenbü kho tükde yinglaoje dogo chaangboua Lai to takteian chühkei.
Haoen müt juong, Grikbü yaangbü sao shuong hoba bousu juong mailembü la yeikei.
Ladang Thesalonikabü Jihudabü shuongei Paulei Mühghaü ngúhlang kho Beria akei lena dogo ditkei, haoen khütokei louan noknyüh pendou pühnyintikei.
Kheijinei jaisinasi shuongei tongde Paul yungko to hauan aptikei hoba Sila si Timoti kho kaoena setngaitikei.
Paul hangbü shuongei hao Athen sühtikukei hoba Sila si Timoti hao lambo thükpangteiko enyu kai dogo lentibü ngüh künan haoen bangkei.
Paul Athena haosi haiyeiko setjinei sangnyu kho heangshoei nyakan hapjinei hao aeibou maangto shatkei.
Hibü haoei sinagoga Jihudabü hoba lembü shuong to hoba namseishanga chalou angbü haüyobü pendou to aukabü kuko lenyokei.

Epikuria hoba Stoik songbüdobü müt atei hao to ngüh wanyokei. Atei laukei, “Ho ngühjuongbou mütei ai lenmang sühda?” Atei laukei, “Hao Küksithang mühghaü phinthonbou che yingla jankuda,” aishanga haoei Jisueibü Ngühlangmaibü hoba langngaibü shanga songlenko kikei.
Haoenei hao Areopaga kamshang to leibakei. Haoenei laukei, “Nyi lenko kibü songle haanbü ho shangabü künlakei ngetibü yingma?
Nyi küneibü noukhün to maangpanglabü ngüh at sungbada. Khübü ngüh at ai yingkeije küneikei ngemang sühda.”
Athenbü hoba khükabü yenbou shuong pendouei ngüh haanbü che lenko ayingsi ditko ong jih dantiko kikei.
Paul Areopaga kambü thedanga loan laukei, “Athen kabü mütshuong, kan songlea aeibou kaangakei dogo hangsilam pendoua shenda.

Aishanga ngei kaneibü lembüsabü to chühko paijinei, ngei khübü yoa heangsho che, ‘Angebü Mühghaü che to,’ dogo doan hapbei. Kanei laobou lemda lausikei angekei, kho shangabü ngei kan to tou phinthonda.
Kaodak hoba khünei shenko kibü pendou kümbou Mühghaü ikei dangbü lembüchema akida. Hao kho khuthük hoba kaodak Bunyubou ki.
Ayingsi haoei ajanjan küman kibü tegütham müteibü ikei akhangenda, aishanga pendou la haoeneibü langkei hoba hak hoba peisilei pendou haoei kuda.
Kaodak pendoua kitila shanga haoei khunak shousi phang weko müt che ka paktikei. Phangshuong ladang loan ladang tuongjan hoba haoen tükde lanei kijan kho haoei janenkei.
Hao to joyola hoba hao haptila dambüa haoenei Mühghaü lamjan yingan kikei; hoba hao sen ka aineikei saako bangan aki.
Aishanga hao to sen kida, topeida hoba lang kida; kaneibü chia atbü ateikei hai lauakei: ‘Aishanga sen mangkei haoeibü shisi shuong ki.’
Mühghaü shisi shuong yingan senei Mühghaü kho müteibü huonei seiei jaken yaüenbü peisilei hon, chandinam, ayingsi laang che tegü adamjan.
Angebü jihsiphai kho Mühghaüei khei ong phokukei, lausikei tou pendou aenei pendou maangpon sepeila haoei ngühkhüm kuda.
Aieilausi haoei pienbü müt che danko kaodak kho ngühmaia matjemla shanga haoei chalou che takletan phoakei. Pendou la haoei kho müt haibü ka langngaitibü danko aukabü kua.”
Ladang haoenei haibü ka langngaitibü shanga ditkei, atei nyikukei; lausikei ateije laukei, “Künei ka ka ho shangabü nyiboukei ditlabü.”
Hibü Paulei kho kambü apyokei.
Müt atei hao to yokei hoba mailembü la yeikei; khübü yoa Areopaga Kambü nyenkabü Dionisia yoan kikei; hoba Damari nyenbü yaksa che, hoba lubü shuongkei yoan kikei.
Kho phaia Paulei Athen apyoan Korint to loukei.
Haoei Aquila nyenbü Jihudabü che, Itali ka nyangko loushedbü Pontia mütli che hapbei; aishanga Klaudiaei Jihudabü pendou la Rom apyoan satla ngühkhüm kukei. Hao haoen jungto loukei,
haoeneibü namsei kümsilei kho phekhun shibü kikei, hoba haokei kheibü yingsije haoei haoen yoa homan liko kümbeileikei.
Nounyet weko haoei sinagoga aukabü kuko laukei, hoba Grikbü si Jihudabü ham suletla haujembei.
Ladang Sila si Timoti Makedonia ka lousühkei, Jihudabü la Messia kho Jisu yingkei dogo ngühchung kuko hao lolo khümbo kuan jih pendou songlenla lekei.

Ladang haoenei hao khulimbei hoba nyikukei, haoei haoeibü nei ka thamngu kangan apbo haoen to laukei, “Kan maualonga kho kaneibü shedbü ong yinglabü. Ho on ngei akünda. Tou ka jaüan ngo Küksithang to haulabü.”
Haoei apyokei hoba Mühghaü lembü che Titia Jasta nyenbü chem to atkei; haoeibü chem kho sinagog to lepan kikei.
Krispa nyenbü sinagog kabü yaangbü che, haoeibü chemdang pendou thonan Bunyubou to mailembei; hoba songlenbü ditan Korintbü juongei mailembei hoba baptikei.
Bunyubouei Paul to mangsanga lenkei, “Tehüt; lendang leashi, sangsembo teki,
aishanga ngo ka yoa kia.”
Hibü haoei kho sangnyua po che lit lak thüngko haoen to Mühghaü ngühlang lenkei.
Galio Akhaiaa governor kijinei Jihudabü pendou chenei thipan Paul khulimbo lokei hoba matjemshang to,
“Ho mütei Ngühkhüm khulimbo Mühghaü lemtila shanga mütshuong suletla haujemda” dogo lauko leibakei.
Paulei ngühlau khangla kümbo kitoua Galioei Jihudabü to laukei, “Jihudabü shuong, ho aiche kümshed leishedtibü ayingsi kokbü yepeibü tegüje ngei kan to ditkukhoulabü,
lausikei ho ngüh shuong hoba nyen shuong hoba kaneibü ngühkhüm shangabü yingalonga, khoje kanei lolo chühshi; ngei kheibü mat jemmang asühda.”
Hobaje haoei haoen matjemshang ka shian ngaitikei.
Kheijinei haoen pendouei Sosthena, sinagog yaangbü lapan matjembü khonga ngümeikei; lausikei kho shanga Galioei aikei aphanei.
Paul khünei chalou lounyu thüngkei. Kho phaia haoei jaisinasi shuong to bangngüh lenan Priskila si Aquila yoa Siria to longa haukei. Haoei Kenkhraa khu shuan apbei, aishanga haoei thebülanbü lekei.
Haoen Efesiaa sühkei hoba haoen apyojung hao sinagog to atkei hoba Jihudabü yoa ngühchung kuko laukei.
Haoenei hao loushangko thüngla phekei, lausikei haoei athelet.
Hobaje haoen to bangngüh lenan phaia haoei laukei, “Mühghaüei maang angsije ngo kan jungto longeilabü.” Kho phaia hao Efesia ka longa haukei.
Hao Kaisariaa thakkei hoba Jerusalem to haukei hoba lashongbü to salem lenkei. Kho phaia hao Antiok to yankei.
Khünei chalou shijo thüngan, haoei haoen apyojung Galatia si Frigia kaonyeka kaoen che ka che to shonko eikshuong pendou hau kitijung haukei.
Alexandria mütli Apolo nyenbü Jihudabü che Efesia to loukei. Hao Lai shangalia shatbü hoba ngühsong kakbü müt che kikei.
Hao kho Bunyubou lamnyua lenenan kiteikei, hoba haoei Johanei baptibü shanga ong ngeasikei haoei aeibou soushou maangdakbüa Jisu shangabü tükde lauko lenkei.
Haoei sinagoga aeibou maangkhaiko laukei. Ladang Priskila si Aquilaei haoei laubü ditkei haosiei leilangan Bunyubou lamnyu shanga aei shangashatko lenkei.
Hao Akhaia to haumang sühkei, hoba jaisinasi shuongei hao thungeijangeikei hoba eikshuong jungto hao sunglettila shanga le dokukei.
Hao ladang sühlangkei, Mühghaü onou danko hao kho mailembü shuong shanga aeibou thuibü yingan kikei;
aieilausi haoei aeibou hau kiko Messia kho Jisu yingan kikei dogo Lai ka aukabü sungenan kuko wetyoan Jihudabü shuong pühdaka thüklangkei.
Apolo Korinta kijinei Paul kaolam peiko hauan Efesiaa sühlangkei. Khünei haoei eik at haüyokei,
hoba haoei haoen to laukei, “Kan mailemjinei Soushou Saopobü sungleda lo?” Haoenei hao to laukei, “Künei Soushou Saopobü che kia dogo ongkei aditkei.”
Haoei laukei, “Khülonga kan ainei baptikei?” Haoenei laukei, “Johanei baptikei.”
Haoei laukei, “Johanei mütshuong haoen maangpon sepeibü tetsida leko baptikukei. Mütshuong to haoeibü ngühlang kho hao phainei Che, ao louada, kho Jisu, hao to mailemjan dogo kikei.”
Haoenei ladang kho ditkei haoenei Bunyubou Jisu nyena baptikei;
hoba ladang Paulei haoeneibü khua shangetan welaukukei, haoen thükto Soushou Saopobü lotkei, haoenei lubü ngühyemei laukei hoba tetenkei.
Haoen pendouei müt anthüknyi thüng kiteikei.
Hao sinagog to atkei hoba lit sem sühko wetyoko hoba sueijaiko Mühghaü sangle shanga haoei maangkhaiko lenkei.
Ateije tukeisekkei hoba Lamnyu shanga shuong thedanga amaibü lauko maialem, hibü haoei haoen apyoan satkei; hoba Turana leweshanga chalou angbüa haoei aukabü kuko laukei.
Kho tegü po nyi ontikei; khoei Asiaa kibü Jihudabü hoba Grikbü pendouei Bunyubou ngühlang ditkei.
Mühghaüei Pauleibü ik danko aeila sei jungeiko kikei.
Mütshuongei Paulei jungeibü lemhamjin si shenpeinei jungan hauan shatbü maitikei, hoba shabü sou mangkei haoen ka satkei.

Shabü sou shian sattiko shoongaibü Jihudabü seibü atei shabü sou kibü shuong to Bunyubou Jisu nyen jungeiko, “Paulei songlenbü Jisu nyena longan apshi dogo ngei ngühkhüm kuda,” dogo lauko haujeman chühkei.
Shua nyenbü Jihudabü thükkabü ungshedbou cheeibü shou müt nyetei khei jungeiko kikei.
Kheijinei shabü souei jongaikei, “Ngei Jisu ngeakei, ngei Paulkei ngeakei, lausikei kan ao?”
Hobaje shabü sou kibü müt kho haoen thük to toman shatkei. Haoei haoen pendou thükkei hoba amaiko ngümeisije haoen chem khüka mütkong hoba leiluko satyokei.
Kho Efesiaa kibü Jihudabü hoba Grikbü pendouei ngekei. Haoen aeibou hatyokei hoba Bunyubou Jisu nyen aeibou haangko toneikei.
Mailembü yoka juong loan kümbüleibü tang khitko theletko lenkei.
Kheibü sei jungeibü müt juongei haoeneibü le takshatan pühthea jikan apbei; haoenei kho munam tetsi sempak hajar anjinsem longkei.
Kho tegübü haua Bunyubou ngühlang kho phinthonko haako juongko haukei.
Khübü haüthükbü phaia Paulei Makedonia danko Akhaia to hauan khüka Jerusalem to danla janenkei. Haoei laukei, “Ngo khüto hauan phaia ngei Romkei chühjan.”
Haoei hao to thuibou Timoti si Erasta Makedonia to hautikei, lausikei haoje Asiaa longche setngaikei.
Kho jihsiphaia Lamnyu shangabü aoa panglangbü yaang longkei.
Chandinam yaübou, nyenei Demetria Artemi lembü chem chandinam noksa kümbou, haoei kümbüyaübü shuong la namsei haang yaang sungbakei.
Haoei haoen jeteibü kümsilei kümbü shuong takshattian laukei, “Mütshuong, ho namyaknamsei ka seneibü nyaksinam haada dogo kanei ngekei,
hoba ho Paulei Efesiaa ong ayingko Asia khümboa tegü mütei kümbü mühghaü shuong khoje mühghaü aying dogo lenko mütshuong juong suletko ayingbü to leilangda dogo kanei hapda hoba ditda.

“Seneibü namyak kümsilei ho khulimlabü thushed ong aying, lausikei yaangbü mühghaü sao Artemi lembü chem hokei aikei aweeilabü, hoba sao, laobou Asia khümbo hoba kaodak pendouei lemda, kho yaangenbü saoeibü nyen mangkei hangletlabü.”
Haoenei ladang kho ditkei, haoen aeibou khauangkei hoba, “Efesiabü Artemi kho yaangbü ki!” dogo ngekdang lekei.
Kho lemenbü sangnyu pendoua aakei; hoba haoenei Paul wakoua youjambü Makedoniabü Gaia si Aristarkha lapbei hoba louyoshang to nyuyoko yangkei.
Paulei shuong yoto atmang sühkei lausikei eikshuongei shingekkei.
Asia kommanga yaangbü shuong, hao to maangjambü ateikei hao louyoshang khüto lotla hautejem dogo subüjabü hautikei.
Atei at, atei at, dogo ngekyobü ka kambü shuong aeibou lemenkei; hoba kambü yoka juongbouei haoen aila chela kambeije kho ongkei ange.
Shuong yoa ateije ho Alexander yingakei dogo ong thontikei, aishanga Jihudabü shuongei hao thedang to thungan hautiko kikei. Alexanderei ik topeiko noknyüh to hao ashedkei dogo lenmang sühkei.
Lausikei ladang haoenei hao Jihudabü dogo damenkei, haoen pendouei ngüh che la lean, “Efesiabü Artemi kho Yaangbü ki” dogo lauko ngekyokei, hoba haoenei ho angh nyi sühko ngekdangkang lekei.
Ladang sangnyu dobouei haoen küpjemtikei, haoei laukei, “Efesia mütshuong, Efesia sangnyu kho Yaangbou Artemi lembü chem lombou hoba kho noksa kho khuthük ka lotkei dogo angebü ao ki?
Kho aoeikei ji dogo alauenlabü hibü kan küpjemmeiashi hoba aikei panteiko akümjan.
Kanei hato lembü chem ka akokbü ayingsi seneibü mühghaü sao anyikubü habü mütshuong ong leibuakei.
Hibü Demetria hoba hao yokabü kümbüyaübü shuong müt at to ngüh kisije, kho shanga matjemshang kia; haoen haoen khulimyotishi.
Lausikei kanei lubü ngüh sungbamang sühalonga, khokei nyiboubü pühkamshanga jemlabü.”
Aishanga ho lemenbü hanei tatbü kambü ngühaje künkei thusheda kia. Panglangbü ho shanga aikei khangshang akitei, hibü honei künei aikei aukabü akuenlabü.
Khübü ngühei haoei kambü shuong lintikei.
Ladang lemenbü thonkei, Paulei eikshuong ngala hautian thungeijangeikei. Haoei haoen to bangngüh lenan phaia Makedonia to haula shanga bangkei.
Haoei khübü kaophei danjung haukei hoba thungeijangeibü ngüh juong lenan phaia hao Akhaia to haukei,
khünei hao lit sem thüngkei. Hao Siria to meimeila dambo kitoua Jihudabü shuongei hao khulimbo huon che takkei, hibü haoei Makedonia danko ngaila janenkei.
Pirha shou Beriabü Sopater, Thesalonika ka Aristarkha si Sekunda, Derbebü Gaia, Timoti hoba Asia kabü Tukhika si Trofima hao yoa haukei.
Khübü shuong thedangto paiteikei hoba Troaa kün haiteikei.
Künkei Tokai Ajinbü Wentek Lem phaia Filipi ka longa haukei, hoba chalou ngao danan phaia haoen kibü Troa to loukei; khünei kün chalou nyet thüngkei.
Balea shaangbounyet, ladang kün wentek shaknyinla liko yoshaian kikei, Paulei haoen to songlenko kikei, aieilausi hao ngiet kho ngaila dambü phoan kikei, hoba haoei metuphang sühko laubü athon.
Kün kaman kibü thangtet thükkaboua wanthung juong kikei;
hoba Eutikha nyenan heshou müt che, kouloma setan, Paulei ngühlau aeibou süngsije nyeket shikotham ngakkei. Eutikha nyeket shian thangtet semboubü ka atetkei hoba haian phonenkei.
Lausikei Paul yankei hoba hao lolo bamyolangkei. Haoei haoeibü ikei baman sungan haoen to laukei, “Lemenbü küpjemashi, hao lang kia.”
Hao tokei thükkabou thangtet to angan wentek shaknyinkei hoba shaukei. Haoei lang angeshongko haoen to joyoan phaia hao ngaikei.
Haoenei nashoubou kho chemto sungngaian lang leian ngaikei hoba maangpon aeibou haksokei.
Kheijinei kün thedangto longa hauan Aso to meimeikei, khünei Paul leiyetlabü dogo dambei; aieilausi haoei lolo youlam ong haula lamlekei.
Haoei kün Melitaa haüyokei hoba khünei hao leiyetan Metilen to haukei.
Kün khüka longa haukei hoba nyibounyet Khiotangkünga sühkei; nyibounyet Samo to dankei hoba kho phainyet Melita to loukei.
Aishanga Asiaa jih üpla shanga Paulei longa Efesia kojung danla janenan kiteikei. Thükalonga Pentekostaje Jerusalema kiteila shanga hao panteiko kikei.
Melita ka haoei Efesia to lashongbü jaishou shuong ngala hautikei.
Haoen ladang lousühkei, haoei haoen to laukei, “Ngei Asiaa youei naksühlangbü ka jaüan jihsiphai pendoua ngo kan yoa
sembüambüa, nyeksi angbüa hoba Jihudabüei huonbüyoubü danko kü thükto lotbü khonsak pendoua lai Bunyubou khangenko loukei kho kanei ngeakei.
Kanei ngeakei, ngei kan mailayaangla songlenjinei pühthea yingsikei chema yingsikei aikei asenetko lenkei.
Ngei Jihudabü si Grikbü ham to Mühghaü thedanga maangpon sepeilabü hoba seneibü Bunyubou Jisu to mailemlabü shanga aukabü kuko lena.
Hobaje tou ngo, soushoua khühbü chenei, Jerusalem to hauda. Khünei kü la ai haüthüklaje ngei angekei.
Lausikei khühbü hoba khonkuei ngo haiyeida dogo sangnyu wekoa Soushou Saopobüei kü la lenkei.
Lausikei Mühghaü onou Ngühlang Maibü aukabü kuko phinthonla, ngei Bunyubou Jisu ka sungletkei, kho kümsilei hoba khangenbü wantilabü shanga ngei kü langkei aikei namsek tegü weko aki.
Touje, kan aoyou yoa ngei Sangle shanga phinthonko paia, khübü yoka cheei ongkei ngeibü thenyek ühüpmailabü dogo ngei ngekei.
Hibü kan aoeibü thu shangakei ngo onat aki dogo ngei tat kan to aukabü kuda.
“Aishanga kan to Mühghaüeibü lamthen khümbo ngetila ngei ladangkei asukatem.

Kan shanga hoba sanshuong, laobou yoka kan Soushou Saopobüei lombou la piena, haoen shanga maangsangashi; hao Shou ja- yangshou haibü danko haoei jekthetbü Mühghaü lashongeibü sanlombou shuong yingshi.
Ngei ngeakei, ngo ngaian phaia sekbülakbü sho shuong kan yoto lotlabü hoba sanshuong ajoutilabü;
hoba ngühmai yepeijaweko nongtian, eikshuong haoen phai leilangla shanga kan shuong yo ka müt at longlabü.
Hibü, ngei po sem sühko change nangnak alauko nyeksi angko kan mütpem weko to songlenkei dogo damenan, pheieiko lomashi.
Tou thonla, Mühghaü hoba haoeibü onoubü ngühlang, laobou kan chingtilabü, hoba kan la, laobouei pienbü shuong pendou yokabü haülabü haptilabü ki, kho ngühlang la ngei kan khümbo nongkuda.
Ngei aoeibü chandinam, hon, ayingsi neisimeikei adühda.
Kaneikei ngeakei, ngeibü ik hoei ngo hoba kü yokabü shuong khangenkei.

Ngei ponpendou kan la lena, ho tegü haujembo kümbüleibü danko kanei hau akibü thuijan, hoba Bunyubou Jisuei laubü ngüh damenjan, aishanga haoei laukei, ‘Sungletbü toje kubüei bouje olinbü sungbada.’ ”
Haoei kho lauan phaia hao hoba hao yoa kibü pendou khüpetkei hoba welaukei.
Haoen aicheküman haapyokei; haoenei Paul aplepan sembung shepbei.
Haoen juongbou la, haoenei haoeibü thenyek nyibou ühüplabü dogo haoei ngühkung che laubüei maanga lamyokei. Kho phaia haoenei hao long to hangan haukei.
Ladang kün bangkei, kün longa takshatan Kozi to, hoba nyibounyet Rhoda to hoba khüka Patara to dogo haukei.
Khünei Foenika danko haubü long che haüyokei hoba künkei atan haukei.
Künei Kupra limchühko loukei hoba kho nanaenei apyojung Siria to longa loukei; kün Tair to louphambei, aieilausi long kho khünei akletlabü kiteikei.
Khünei eikshuong haüyokei hoba khünei chalou nyet setkei. Soushouei thungeiko haoenei Paul to Jerusalem to ohaula lendang lekei.
Lausikei ladang chalouei sühkei kün wakou athakko haukei. Haoenei, shousi yaksi pendou yoan sangnyu adankhüm shongko kün hangkei. Künei yungkoa khüpetkei hoba welaukei.
Kheijinei kün cheei che la bangmai kuyokei hoba kün long to atkei kheijinei haoen chem to ngaikei.
Kün Tair ka athakko longa hauan phaia Tolomaia sühlangkei. Khünei künei jaisinasi shuong to salem lekei hoba haoen yoa chalou che thüngkei.
Nyibounyet künei kho apyoan Kaisaria to loukei, kün songlendolenbou Filip chem to atkei, ao nyet yoa che, hoba hao yoa kikei.
Haoeibü shou, tetenbü jongsak kibü medei müt lei kiteikei.
Kün khünei chalou shijo settoua Jihuda ka Agaba nyenbü thuseibü müt che louyenkei.

Hao kün jungto louan Pauleibü shembenei sungkei. Haoei khoei hao lolo you si ik khühan laukei, “Soushou Saopobüei hai lauda: Ho shembeinei bunyu Jerusalema Jihudabüei hai khühlabü hoba haoenei hao Küksithang ik to kulabü.”
Ladang künei kho ditkei, kün hoba khükabü mütshuong pendouei hao Jerusalem sühko ohaula sukeijakei.
Kheijinei Paulei jongaikei, “Kan haap- yoko hoba kü maangpon nyatnyintiko ai kümda? Aishanga, ngoje khühlabü ong ayingko Bunyubou Jisu nyena Jerusalema haikulakei lamlean kia.”
Hao asuajaensije künei, “Bunyubou maang yingshi” dogo ong lauan nangkei.
Khübü chalou phaia kün lamlekei hoba Jerusalem to wakou khangkei.
Kaisaria kakei eikshuong at kün yoa haukei. Haoenei kün la Mason nyenbü Kuprabü kün sühtila kibou leibakei; hao shaangbou eik yokabü.
Ladang künei Jerusalem sühkei, jaisinasi shuongei kün aeibou maang shikko sungletkei.
Nyibounyet Paul yoa Jakob chem to haukei, hoba jaishou shuong pendou kiteikei.
Haoen to salem lean phaia, haoeibü khangenbü danko Mühghaüei Küksithang yoa kümbüleibü pendou thenan lenkei.
Ladang haoenei kho ditkei, haoenei Mühghaü nyen sangkei hoba hao to laukei, “Jaisina, Jihudabü yoa mailembü hajar lajuche ki hoba haoen pendou Ngühkhüma maangdakakei dogo nyi hapda.
Küksithang kaodaka Jihudabü pendou la haoeibü shousi kipan üpla ayingsi Jihudabü song ajungeiko Mosa ka bangla shanga nyi lenko paida dogo ka nyen haoen junga laukua.
Kholonga ai kümla? Haoenei no longeiakei dogo ditlabü haang.
Hibü künei ai lenlaje kho kümashi. Kün yoa theletlanletbü müt lei kia.

Haoen ka yoto leian haushi, hoba haoen yoa saüenbü leashi. Haoen khushubü mu nyi atkuashi, kholongaje müt pendouei ka shanga mütshuongei laueibü kho amlang, lausikei nyi mangkei ngühkhüm kho tükde ong jungeida dogo ngelabü.
Küksithang mailembü shuong jungtoje silip jabü shausiyung ayingsi sii ayingsi nyatettibü shausiyung hoba asangalanbü shanga maangsangashi dogo künei yeibü kutiko le doa.”
Nyibounyet Paulei haoen leikei hoba haoen yoa liko saüenkei. Hao lembü chem to atkei hoba saüenbü jihsiphai penlabü hoba laonyet haoen mütpem weko shanga lembü kulabü kho ngetikei.
Ladang chalou nyet kho wanla nyangkei, Asia kabü Jihudabü shuongei hao lembüchema hapbei. Haoenei mütshuong pendou pangyo sakyotikei, hoba haoenei Paul lapan

hai ngekkei, “Israelbü shuong thuiashi! Ho mütei müt pendou la, kaoen pendoua sen mütli hoba Mosa ngühkhüm khulimbo lenda; hoba lembüchem to Grikbü to liko leiyeda hoba ho saopobü kaoen shedti shatia.”
Aishanga thedang to haoenei sangnyu khünei Efesiabü Trofima hao yoa hapa, hoba Paulei haoen lembüchem to leibakei dogo haoenei dambei.
Sangnyu khümbo saknyinko la pangyokei hoba mütshuong pendou liko laangyokei. Haoenei Paul lapbei hoba lembüchem ka senlangkei, hoba khoyam kou khinkei.
Haoenei hao haitila komeiko kijinei, Jerusalem khümbo pühnyinakei dogo Rom sepai san chenei hajar thükkabou jungto ngühlang loukei.
Haoei khoyam sepai shuong hoba saongao thükkabou shuong leian jungan shuong yoto atkei. Ladang haoenei hajar thükkabou si sepai shuong hapbei, haoenei Paul to ngümbü thakkei.
Kheijinei hajar thükkabou sühlangan hao to jungkei hoba hao yangmen penyiei phenla shanga ngühkhüm kukei. Hao ao hoba ai kümbei dogo haoei haoen ka phekei.
Shuong yo khünei atei phang- che hoba atei phangche dogo ngekkei. Lemenbüei tükdebü kho lapenla athükko, haoei hao lapheishon to leilangla shanga ngühkhüm kukei.
Mütshuong sekbülakbü ka chung to Paul sepai shuongei tonkei.
Aishanga püh pendou “Hao haitiashi” dogo ngekko sembei.
Paul lapheishon to leiyetlamto haoei hajar thükkabou to laukei, “Ngei ka to aiche lenla thükasao?” Haoei jongaikei, “Nyi Grik ngekei lao?
Chalou tuisho dana, lapangyotian, kokshoua müt haitibü dan müt hajar lei lamang to leilangbou Ijepbü kho no aying si?”
Paulei laukei, “Ngo Kilikiaa kongnyu sangnyu che kabü mütli che, Tarsus müt, Jihudabü che ki. Mütshuong to ngüh lenla kü la sakkubü dogo ngei ka to suda.”
Haoei hao la sakkukei, hoba Paulei chung jabüa loan mütshuong haoeibü ikei küpjemtikei. Ladang pendou sangsembei haoei Ibri ngühei laukei:
“Jaisinasi shuong hoba bousijaisi shuong, ngei kan thedanga ngo tangbü lenbü ho ditashi.”
Ladang haoenei haoei Ibri ngühyema lauko ditkei haoen sangsemshangbou yeikei. Haoei laukei,
“Ngo Jihudabü, Kilikiaa Tarsasa bukbü ki, lausikei seneibü pisibou ngühkhüm kaangbüei sakkubü tegü Mühghaü shanga aeibou maangdakko ho sangyanga chingenkei.
Lamnyu phai sembü shuong haibüa sühko ngei shieikoekei; ngei bousu yaksa pendou la yangmen jinkuan thüngdang to jinkei,

maimaitham thükkabou ungshedbou hoba jaishou kambü shuongei kü shanga aukabü kuenlabü. Damaskaa kibü jaisina Jihudabü jungto dobü le mangkei ngei haoen ka sungletkei, hoba khünei kibü dan Jerusalem to yangmenei khühbaan shieikoela shanga meimeikei.
“Ladang ngo lama Damaska sühla nyangko hauko kikei, mangde chajih aoa müh ka ngesakbü yaangbü che lotan ngo kaijembo haukei.
Ngo kao to atkei, hoba ngüh cheei kü to hai lauko ditkei, ‘Saul, Saul, aila nyi ngo shieikoeda?’
Ngei jongaikei, ‘No ao Bunyubou?’ Haoei kü to laukei, ‘Ngo nyi shieikoebü Nazaretbü Jisu.’
Kü yoa kibü shuongei ngesakbü kho hapbei, lausikei haoenei kü to joyobü ngüh khoje adit.
Ngei laukei, ‘Ngei ai kümla, Bunyubou?’ Bunyubouei kü to laukei, ‘Laksepashi, Damaska to atashi, hoba khünei ka la ai kümtila pienan phokukei kho pendou ka to lenlabü.’
Ngesakbü sonei ngei ühüpbo apbü danko, kü yoa kibü shuongei ngo jenkei hoba Damaska to leian atkei.
“Müt che Anania nyenan, ngühkhümei sakkubü tegü mailema maangtakbü, hoba khünei kibü Jihudabü pendouei aukabü kuenbü müt,
kü jungto loukei. Hao kü junga lokei hoba laukei, ‘Jaisina Saul, kaibü nyek khitngaiashi.’ Khoyam ngeibü nyek khitkei hoba hao to chüh- angtikei.
Haoei laukei, ‘Seneibü pisibou Mühghaüei hao maangangbü ngela shanga, Saopobü Che kho hapla hoba haoeibü ngüh tükdebü kho ditla shanga pienkei.
Aieilausi nyi ai hapa hoba dida kho shanga mütshuong pendou thedanga hao shanga no aukabü kilabü.
Hibü no aila phaida? Laksepashi hoba hao nyena ngaashi; baptiashi hoba kaibü shabü sakan apashi.’
“Ladang ngo Jerusalem to ngaikei hoba lembüchema welauko kikei ngo yemto hauko nyeket shikei,
hoba haoei kü to hai lauko hapbei, ‘Panteiashi hoba tongde Jerusalem apyoashi, aieilausi haoenei kü shangabü kaibü aukabü asungletlabü.’
Ngei laukei, ‘Bunyubou, sinagog ka sinagog to shonko mütshuong lapan khühbou hoba ka to mailembü shuong ngümeibou kho ngo yingkei dogo haoenei ngo maisho ngekei;
hoba ladang kaibü aukabou Stefen sii koukei khüneikei ngo nyangko loan kho tükde dogo aukabü lea hoba hao haitibü shuongeibü neisimei lombo kikei.’
Haoei kü to laukei, ‘Hauteiashi, aishanga ngei no Küksithang to saako hautilabü.’ ”
Haoei kho ngüh alaushongko haoenei hao to ditkukei. Kho phaiaje haoenei ngekkei, “Ho mütje kaodak ka bangtisapashi! Kheibü mütje lang kila amukei.”
Ladang haoenei haoeneibü neisimei tekan angtiko hoba kuito thamngu phinan angtiko ngekyokei,
hajar thükkabouei hao lapheishon to leiyetan, aila hao khulimbo ngekyodaje kho lapenla shanga hao to semeiko ngüh phetila shanga ngühkhüm kukei.
Ladang haoenei semeila shanga hao khühkei Paulei nyangko loan kibü saongao thükkabou to laukei, “Nyi hoba kaibü eikei Rom mütli hoba shedbü akibü che semeila thükkei lo?”
Ladang haoei kho ditkei, saongao thükkabou hauan hajar thükkabou la ngühlang kuko laukei, “Nyi ai kümla dambo ki? Ho müt Rom mütli che yingkei.”
Hajar thükkabou kho loukei hoba hao to laukei, “Kü to lenshi, no Rom mütli che lo?” Haoei laukei, “Haü.”
Hajar thükkabouei jongaikei, “Ho mütli jekthetla ngeije nam juongnyu ada.” Paulei laukei, “Lausikei ngoje bukbü mütli.”
Hao to semla lamlean kibü shuong hao jungka khoyam phai sukkei; hajar thükkabou mangkei Paul Rom mütli dogo ngean haoei hao laptibü shanga hatkei.

Nyibounyet, haoei Jihudabüei Paul la aila shedbü kudaje kho lapenmang sühbü ka hao litikei hoba thükkabou ungshedbou shuong si thükkabou kambü shuong pendou yoshaila ngühkhüm kukei. Hobaje haoei hao leibaan haoen thedanga phokukei.
Paulei kambü shuong to nyek theko chühan laukei, “Jaisinasi shuong, tat sühko ngo Mühghaü thedanga sensimaang tangbüei ong kü langkei kijung loua.”
Thükkabou ungshedbou Ananiaei hao nyangko loan kibü shuong to sembung to ipla ngühkhüm kukei.
Kheijinei Paulei hao to laukei, “No thupaibü kümthang, Mühghaüei ka to ngümlabü! Nyi ngühkhüm ka matjembo setakei, hoba nyi kü to ngümla ngühkhüm kuko nyi lolo ngühkhüm leiluda si?”
Khünei nyangko loan kibü shuongei laukei, “Nyi Mühghaüeibü thükkabou ungshedbou nyikuda lo?”
Paulei laukei, “Jaisinasi shuong, ngei hao thükkabou ungshedbou dogo ange; aishanga Laishibaei lenda, ‘Nyi kaibü mütshuong leiyeibou che amaibü alaueilabü.’”

Ladang Paulei tan che Sadukibü hoba tan che Farisibü dogo shenkei, haoei kambü to ngekko laukei, “Jaisinasi shuong, ngo Farisibü hoba Farisibü shou che ki. Haibü ka langngailabü mailem shanga ngo tat ho matjembüa kia.”
Haoei kho laubüsi Farisibü tan si Saduki tan yoa oyo khangkei, hoba kambü kho penyila sakletan apbei.
Aishanga Sadukibü shuongei langngaibü, khuthük hangangbü ayingsi soushou ai aki dogo lauda lausikei Farisibüei khübü pendou kia dogo sungletda.

Aeibou phangyokei hoba Farisi aedang kabü Ngühkhüm lenbou shuong at loenkei hoba khau angko laukei, “Ho müt to künei ai shedbü ühüpenda. Soushou che ayingsi khuthük hangangbü cheei hao to joyoan kia tegükei ai?”
Aishanga oyobü aei kaangbou hausije, Paul netla yeiko jitnyinan aplabü dogo daman hajar thükkabou kho hatkei. Haoei sepai shuong to yanan hao haoen yo ka lapan lapheishon to sungbala ngühkhüm kukei.
Khüyou Bunyubou Paul junga lokei hoba laukei, “Maang kaangashi! Nyi Jerusalema kü shanga aukabü lebü tegü Rom akei nyi aukabü künlabü.”
Ladang lang ngekei Jihudabü shuong dangan huon takkei. Haoenei hao ühaiti shongko shaukei ashaulabü yungkei ayunglabü dogo theyolanyokei.
Kokshoua huonbü shuong kho haoen saonyi to aeian kiteikei.
Haoen ungshedbou hoba jaishou shuong jungto haukei hoba laukei, “Künei Paul ühaiti shongko ai ashaula shanga kün lolo theyolanyoakei.

Hibü touje kan hoba Kambüei, khei haoei kanei haoeibü thu chongchingko phanenla kümda dogo daman hao kan jungto naleibatila hajar thükkabou jungto ngühlang künjan; hao nyangko alousühtoua haitila shanga kün lamleakei.”
Lausikei Pauleibü noueibü shouei haoenei thobü kho ditoukei hoba hauan lapheishon to atkei hoba Paul la lenkei.
Paulei saongao thükkabou yoa che ngakei hoba lenkei, “Nashoubou ho hajar thükkabou jungto leian hauashi; haoei hao to aiche lenlabü kia.”
Hibü hao hajar thükkabou jungto leian hauan lenkei, “Thüngdanga kibou, Paulei ngo ngakei hoba nashoubou kho ka jungto leibala shanga phekei. Haoei ka to aiche lenlabü kia.”
Hajar thükkabouei hao nongbü kaoen to leilangkei, hoba hao to phekei, “Nyi kü to lenlabü kho ai?”
Haoei laukei, “Jihudabü shuongei ngiet Paul Kambü to hai haoeibü thu aei shangashatko phela tegü ong leibala shanga ka ka phela thangjambo yeia.

Nokei haoen la tesuletti, aieilausi haoen müt saonyito aeianei thola kümda. Haoenei hao ühaiti shongko shaukei ashaulabü yungkei ayunglabü dogo theyolanyoakei; hoba toukei haoen ka ka sakkubü hapla haiyeiko lamleakei.”
Hajar thükkabouei nashoubou kho, haoei kho hao la lena dogo aolakei alenla shanga ngühkhüm kuan ngaitikei.
Kho phaia haoei saongao thükkabou yoa müt nyi ngaan laukei, “Tao angh güa Kaisaria to haula sepai saoan, hoba kolia setbü shuong anjinlei hoba aubu jungbü müt saoan lamleashi;
Paul setlakei koli lamlekushi hoba hao governor Felix jungto maisho leian haushi.”
Haoei le che hai dokei:
“Klaudia Lisia ka Yaangenbou Felix jungto: Salem.
Ho müt ho Jihudabü shuongei lapbei hoba haoenei haitilabü lele kikei. Hao Rom mütli che dogo ngei ditletkei, khoei ngo sepai shuong yoa hauan hao püetkei.
Haoenei hao la aishanga shedbü kudaje ngei kho ngemang sühkei; khoei ngei hao haoeneibü Kambü thükkabou to sungbakei.
haoeneibü ngühkhüm shangabü pheyobü laüa hao la shedbü kukei dogo ngei chühenkei, lausikei hao haitilabü ayingsi thüngdang to jinla muko shedbü akitei.
Aieilausi ho müt shanga huonbü ditbü ka ngei khoyam ka jungto hautikuda, hoba hao shieibü dan tokei haoeibü shedbü kho ka thedanga lenyola lenan hautida.”
Hibü sepai shuongei haoen la ngühkhüm kubü tegü Paul leilangkei hoba nangnak hao Antripatri sühko leian haukei.
Nyibounyet kolia setbü shuong hao yoa haula phoyoan hao lapheishon to longeikei.
Khübüei Kaisaria sühkei, governor la le kho kukei hoba Paul hao thedanga apyokukei.
Ladang haoei le kho wekei, hao laobou kaonyek kabü dogo phekei, hoba hao Kilikia ka dogo ditletkei.
Haoei laukei, “Ka la shedbü kubü dankei lousühan ngei kaka ditlabü;” hoba hao lombü yoan Herodeibü Choba Chema photeila ngühkhüm kukei.
Chalou ngao phaia thükkabou ungshedbou Anania, jaishou at yoa Tertula nyenbü matjembou che yoan loukei, hoba haoenei governor Felix thedanga Paul khulimbo ngüh künkei.
Ladang Tertula ngakei, haoei Paul attiko hai lau khangkei, “Yaangenbou, kün mütli hainyu haksoa kibü hoba kümetbü yaang longbü kho no danko ki.
Ho künei hangsilam pendoua aeibou maangshikko sungletda.
Lausikei kaibü jih aei alekula shanga, kün to tuisho ditan chühkula ngei ka to sudajada.
Künei ho müt kipjim naangjimtibou che dogo lapena; haoei kaodak pendoua Jihudabü shuongyo pendoua lemen longtida hoba hao Nazaren tan yoa khuleibou che ki.
Haoei lembüchem mangkei shedti shatila haujembei, hoba künei hao lapbei. Hobaje küneibü ngühkhüma kibü haangei mat jemla haujembei,
lausikei hajar thükkabou Lisia loukei hoba küneibü ik ka tukosekko langkei.
Haoeibü shedbü lapbü shuong ka thedangto loula haoei ngühkhüm kukei. Nyi hao ka pheko lamalonga künei hao khulimbo aukabü sungbabü pendou nyi lolo lapenlabü.”
Jihudabü shuongeikei khübü aukabü kho tükde dogo lauko hao attibü shuong to yingkuan shedbü kukei.
Ladang governorei hao la lautila ikei sheko jih kukei, Paulei jongaikei, “Ho phangshuong shanga nyi ngühmaia po juong songdakkei dogo ngean ngei lolo ngo tangbü lenla olinda.
Ngo Jerusalem to lemla angbü phaia tatei chalou anthüknyi to üaikei dogo nyi shuokenla thükkei.
Lembüchema yingasikei, sinagoga yingasikei, hoba sangnyua yingasikei ngo aotokei oyophet- yoko ayingsi shuong pühnyintiko haoenei ühüp.
Haoenei kü khu limbo ai shedbü sungabada kho ka la aukabü kula athükkei.

Lausikei ngühkhüma kibü ngüh shuong tegü, hoba thuseibü lea doan kibü haangei, khübü pendou mailembo, laobou to haoenei tan dogo lauda kho Lamnyu haangei ngei küneibü pisibou Mühghaü lemda, khoje ngei ka to theletda.
“Aieilausi haoenei tegütham ngei saopobü si asaopobü ham langngailabü dogo mailemda.
Khoei ngeikei Mühghaü hoba müt thedanga jih pendoua sensimaang tangshaitham kila maibouthamei haujemda.
Po shijo auan phaia, kü mütli shalebü la thuibü künbala
ngo lembüchema saüenbü letoua haoenei ngo hapbei. Khonei noknyüh akitei hoba pühnyinbükei akitei.
Lausikei Asia ka Jihudabü at yoan kiteikei; haoenei kü khu limbo ngühsidei kialonga, haoen hato ka thedangto louan laujan kikei.

Ayingsi ngo haoeneibü Kambü thedanga haoen yoa loan, ‘Haibü ka langngaibü shangabüa ngo tat kan thedanga matjembüa loakei,’ dogo ngühkung che ngekbü to liman haoenei ngeibü shedbü aiche lapenan kisije haoen hanei kibü danei lenashi.”
Lausikei Lamnyu shangabü Felixei shangashatko ngean kisije haoei laukei, “Ladang thükkabou khuleibü Lisia loulaje kheijinei ngei kaneibü mat jemlabü.” Kho phaia haoei Kambü kho lintikei.
Hobaje haoei saongao thükkabou to hao thüngdanga phojan, lausikei hao maang letijan, hoba haoeibü jenabou aokei hao khangenla teshilet dogo sakkukei.
Chalou shijo phaia, Felix haoyak Jihuda sao Drusila yoa loukei; haoei Paul ngalikei, hoba hao la Jisu Khrista to mailembü shangabü lautikei.
Haoei sao- pobü, jembü lolo thepetbü hoba loulabü matjembü shangabü laujinei, Felix aeibou hatenkei hoba jongaikei, “Tou shangaje no ngaila thükkei; ladang ngo jih haplaje ngei no ngalabü.”
Paulei hao la nam shangkulabü dogo maanglembo kikei. Kho aoa haoei tokei tokei hao ngala hautikei hoba hao to joyokei.
Po nyi thonan phaia Felix kho Porkhia Festaei jeikei. Jihudabü olintila shanga Felixei Paul thüngdanga phoyokei.
Festa kaonyek to louan chalou sem phaia Kaisaria ka Jerusalem to angkei.
Thükkabou ungshedbou hoba Jihudabü khuleibü shuongei Paul khulimbo ngühlang künkei,
hoba hao to haoen to onouko, Paul Jerusalem to leibala sukeijakei; aieilausi hao haitila lama thola lamleko kikei.
Paul Kaisariaa lombü phanga phoakei, hoba haokei khüto enyu haula kia, dogo Festaei jongaikei.
Haoei Laukei, “Kaneibü leiyeibü shuong kü yoto kai, hoba kho müt to shedbü aiche kialonga, haoenei hao khulimbo shedbü kutiashi.”
Haoen yoa chalou set ayingsi an to aei athüngko hao Kaisaria to yankei, hoba nyibounyet hao matjembü setshanga setkei hoba Paul leibala ngühkhüm kukei.
Ladang hao sühlangkei, Jerusalem ka loubü Jihudabü shuongei hao kailepbei, hoba hao khulimbo attibü kaangbü juong sungbakei, laobou shanga tükdebü aukabü kulaje haoenei athük.
Paulei hao janbüa laukei, “Ngei Jihudabü ngühkhüm khulimbo yingasikei, ayingsi lembüchem khulimbo, ayingsi Kaisar khulimbo yingasikei ai shedbükei ashonkei.”
Festaei Jihudabü lemsetimang sühko Paul to jongaikei, “Nyi Jerusalem to angan kü thedanga habü mat jemla maang angdalao?”
Paulei laukei, “Ngo Kaisar matjembü setshanga loakei, hoba ngo hanei jemlabou ki. Ngei Jihudabü to ai shedbü aküm, kho nyi maisho ngeakei.

Ngei aiche shedbü kümda longa hoba haila muko denche kümshedtian kialonga, ngei khüka satenla apheda; lausikei habü mütshuongei kü khu limbo attibü sungbabü ngüha shedbü akilonga, aoeikei ngo haoen la kuan apla athük. Ngei Kaisar la jemtila pheda.”
Kheijinei hao meitangbou shuong to joyoan phaia Festaei jongaikei, “Nyi Kaisar la jemtilabü laukei; Kaisar sühko no haulabü.”
Chalou tuisho kaangan phaia Agripa Choba si Bernika Karsaria to loukei hoba Festa la olinbü salem kukei.
Haoen khünei tuisho kitoua, Festaei Choba thedangto Pauleibü ngüh hai lauko sungbakei, “Hanei Felixei müt che thüngan phoan satakei.
Ladang ngo Jerusalem to haukei, thükkabou ungshedbou hoba Jihudabü jaishou shuongei hao shangabü ngúhlang kü thedangto sungbakei, hoba hao attiko matjem kula shanga kü to phekei.

Lausikei matbou si shedbü kubou shuong the thenthen üattiyo shongko hoba matbouei hao lolo janbü ngüh laula jihsiphai maibü along shongko müt che khümbo kuan apla Rombü songa aki dogo ngei haoen to jongaikei.
Khola haoen hanei yoshaikei, hoba aphaiko nyibounyet ngo matjemshanga setkei hoba müt kho leibala ngühkhüm kukei.
Ladang attibü shuong loenkei, haoenei hao la ngeibü dambü tegü amaibü shedbü kuko hao ayukti.
Lausikei haoenei haoeneibü songle hoba Paulei lang kia dogo aukabü kuenbü müt che, Jisu, haibü shanga hao to oyobüa ong jimbei.
Khübü ngüh lapenla ngo maang phenyeman apbei hoba hao Jerusalem to hauan kho mat jemmang sühdalaoje dogo phekei.
Lausikei ladang Paulei thükkabou Chobaei janenbüa leko mat jemmeila shanga nangteila phekei, ngei hao Kaisar jungto ohauti shongko lombü phanga photeila ngühkhüm kukei.”
Agripaei Festa to laukei, “Ngei bouje hao ka ditmang sühda.” Festaei jongaikei, “Ngiet nyi haoei laubü ditlabü.”
Hibü nyibounyet Agripa si Bernika, soneikangko lamlean, hajar thükkabou shuong si sangnyu khulei laanglei shuong yoa püh shaibü chem to atkei, hoba Festa ngühkhümei Paul leibakei.
Festaei laukei, “Agripa Choba, hoba hanei kün yoa shaibü shuong pendou, Jihudabü püh pendouei Jerusalema hoba haneikei haoje lang kila amukei dogo ngekyoko kü to laukubou müt kho ho ki.
Kü aedangkaje, haoei haila muko aikei kuan aki dogo lapena, ladang haoei lolo Thükkabou Choba junga jemlabü dogo laukei, ngei hao hautila shanga janenkei.
Ngei Choba jungto hao shanga dolabü aikei chongchingko aki. Khoei ngei hao kan thedangto leibua, hoba ngei aicheje dolabü lele kongnyuleko ka thedangto leibada, O Agripa Choba.
Aishanga thüngbü müt che, hao la shedbü kubü aikei alenko hautikula khoje kü shanga aikei ngühchung akiko damda.”
Agripaei Paul to laukei, “Nyi ka shanga lenla sakkuda.” Kheijinei Paulei haoeibü ik tuokan hao janbü ngüh laula khangkei.
“O Agripa Choba, Jihudabü shuongei kü khu limbo attiko sungbabü pendou shanga ngei ngo janbü at ka thedanga lenlabü ho ngo thu maibü dogo weeida.
Aieilausi kongnyuleko noje Jihudabü songsido hoba lemenbü hangsilam pendou ngebüa penetsouetnyu yingkei. Hibü kü to natenko ditkushi dogo ngei ka to sudajada.
Kü langkei khangbü ka thama ngo jembü mütli yoa hoba jerusalema kijung loukei dogo Jihudabü pendouei ngeakei.
Haoenei ngo shangieda ngeakei; ngo küneibü songle yoa kaangboutham che tegü, Farisi langkei kijung loukei, haoenei ong maangangsije kho haoenei aukabü kula thükakei.
Hobaje Mühghaüei küneibü pisibou to theletbü,

laobou theletbü, kün phang anthüknyiei haoeneibü maangdakbü pendouei chalou nangnak sünga kho hapenla maanglem phoan lembei, kho haoei haüthüktilabü dogo ngei maanglembü ka ngo tou matjemshanga loan ki. Ho kho maanglem shangabüa, O Choba, kü la shedbü kuda, hoba kü la shedbü kubü shuong kho Jihudabü ki.
Aila kan Jihudabü shuong yoa Mühghaüei haibü langngeitida laubü kho mai- alemenlabü la yeitida?
Ngeikei Nazaretbü Jisu nyen khulimbo kümsilei juongnyu kümjan dogo dambei.

Ngei Jerusalema khei kümbei. Thükkabou ungshedbou shuong ka hau hiletan ngei Mühghaü mütshuong juong thüngdang to jinkei. Ladang haoen la haitilabü lele shedbü kukei kheijinei ngei haoen khulimbo ik tuokkei.
Hanghangleko, sinagoga haoen shieikoeko haoen la Mühghaü khükeiuokeitila ngei haujembei. Ngo haoen to danan maangpokjineije küksithang sangnyu danakei ngei haoen shieinangeia.
“Kho kümsilei shanga ngo thükkabou ungshedbou shuong ka hau hoba ngühkhüm hiletan Damaska to hauko kikei.
Hobaje chajihboua, O Choba, ngo lama paiko kijinei, chanyu to ngesakbou ngesakbü che ngei müh ka ngo hoba kü yoa yangbü shuong kaijembo hauan hapbei.
Kün pendou kao to atkei, hoba ngei kü to Ibri ngühyema, ‘Saul, Saul, nyi aila ngo shieikoeda?’ dogo ngüh cheei lauko ditkei. ‘Julo to keingaibüje jembü to ong akda.’
Ngei laukei, ‘Bunyubou, no ao?’ Bunyubouei laukei, ‘Ngo nyi shieikoebou Jisu.

Lausikei pienashi, hoba no lolo loenashi. Ngei no ngeibü khangenbou la pienla shanga ngo ka la longan lenkei. Nyi kü shangabü ai hapa, hoba ngei ka la toukei ai tang khittilabü ki khonei nyi aukabü künlabü.
Ngei no hautilabü mütshuong hoba Küksithang ka ngei no püetlabü.

Kü to kibü haoeneibü mailemei haoenei shabü ap kubü hoba Mühghaü mütli la yeian kibü dan yoa kaoen che hapenlabü lele, haoen nakthühbü ka ngesakbü to hoba Satan hau ka Mühghaü jungto sepeitila shanga nyi haoeneibü nyek khittilabü ki.
“Hibü khoei, O Agripa Choba, ngei khuthükbü mangsang to ngüha aleko aki,

lausikei Damaska si Jerusalem ka shaang khangan, kho phaia Jihuda kaonyek pendoua hoba khüka ong Küksithanga dogo, haoen maangpon sepeijan hoba Mühghaü jungto sepeijan, hoba maangpon sepeibü thüng kümjanleijan dogo ngei ngekletkei.
Khoei Jihudabüei ngo lembüchema lapbei hoba ngo haitila haujembei.

Lausikei Mühghaüei kü to thuikei, hoba Messia kho khonkujan, hoba haibü ka langngaibü shaangbou yingsije, haoei Jihudabü si Küksithang la kho ngesakbü ngekletkulabü shanga thuseibü shuong si Mosaei lenbü loushedlabü dogo hanbü yaangbü pendou to aukabü künbü to liman lubüje ai alauko ngo tat sühko hanei kia.”
Paulei hao janbü ngüh hai lauko kijinei Festaei ngüh yaangbüei laukei, “Paul, no langet angbü. Nyi yongko ngebü ka no langet angtida.”
Paulei Festa to laukei, “Yaangenbou, ngo langet üangda; ngei ka to ai lenda kho ngühmai hoba maiabü.
Chobaei habü thu shanga ngeakei, hoba hao thedanga ngei kaangko laula thükakei; aishanga ngei ngeakei habü ngühlang che ongkei haoei angeko aki, aieilausi ho popanoba kümbü aying.
O Agripa Choba, nyi thuseibü ngüh to mailemda lao? Nyi mailemda dogo ngei ngeakei.”
Agripaei Paul to laukei, “Nyi tongde ngo khristan yeitila suletla haujemda!”
Paulei jongaikei, “Tongde yingasikei maangyangsho yingsikei no ong aying lausikei tat kü ngüh ditko kibü shuong pendou, ho yangmen hato limanje, ngo tegü ong yeila shanga ngei Mühghaü to welauda.”
Choba, governor hoba Bernika hoba setan kibü shuong loenkei,
hoba haoen kukan phaia haoen haoen lauyokei, “Ho mütei hailabü ayingsi thüngdang to jinlabü lele amaibü kümbo aki.”
Agripaei Festa to laukei, “Ho mütei Kaisar junga lauetla akün, tegüje hao litian kikhoulabü.”
Ladang künei Itali ka longa haula janenkei, Agusta sepai san chenei saongao thükkabou, Julia nyenbü ik to Paul hoba lubü thüngbü shuong at yoan kuan apbei.
Kün Asia yungkoa thakko thakko haulabü long chenei Adramitia ka long to angkei hoba yungnyu to meimeikei. Thesalonika ka Makedoniabü Aristaka kei kün yoa kikei.
Nyibounyet kün Sidona thakkei, hoba Juliaei Paul to aeibou sanouko, thangbou shuong jungto haula hoba hao thounoutila sakkuko jungeikei.
Kün khüka meimeikei hoba Kupra yungko yetko likei aieilausi yeilam khüpeian kün ae soukei.
Kho phaia kün Kilikia si Pamfilia yungnyu peithetjung haukei, hoba Lukiaa Mera sühkei.
Khünei saongao thükkabouei Alexandria ka Itali to haubü long che hapbei hoba haoei kün khüto leiyetkei.
Chalou juong kün maangyangsho haukei, hoba ushaleko Naida nyangko sühlangkei. Yei kho athaksije, kün Kreta yungko yetko Salmone to haukei.
Kün yungko sünga aeibou khonsakko haukei, hoba Lasia sangnyu nyangko kibü Longthakshang Maibü dogo nyenbü kaoen che sühlangkei.
Ladang chalou lounyu dankei hoba longa paila thushed yingan apbei, aieilausi Mühei nyengbü kho mangkei danan kikei. Hibü Paulei haoen la thungeijangeibü kuko
laukei, “Yaangbü shuong, long on si long ham shanga wakou ho aeibou leilubü yinglabü dogo ngei chühenda; seneibü langkeikei thushed yinglabü.”
Lausikei saongao thükkabouei Paulei lenbü toje longleibou si long bunyuei lenbü bouje ditkei.

Aieilausi longthakshang kho poang sünga dantilabüje ayingbü ka, ushaleko Fonika ongkei sühan poang khünei dantila daman long khüka lotan apla juongbouei maang angan kikei. Kho yungkük si yungthang chanep ae yeibü Kreta longthakshang che kiteikei.
Ladang yungthang aeka yei inyaishoule soula khangkei, haoenei haoenei dambü tegü haüthüka dogo dambei, hoba haoenei longthakbou yaüenkei hoba thükthüng Kreta yungko nyangko haukei.
Longche kian phaia chaang naphei yei dogo laubou yei kaangbü che kao aeka loukoukei.
Long kho khünei minetkei hoba yeilam ae ayeienko apbei; hibü kün lolo ngüha leko khola soulangtikei.
Kauda nyenbü shushou che phangto libüje shayangleko künei longshou che kho senlibakei.
Longleibü danei kho tonenkei hoba long kaijembo lühei minetkei. Sirti phetsena toklabü dogo jemtenbü ka, haoenei longlei nei lotikei hoba kho tegü yei lolo kün jangeitikei.
Nyibounyet, kün yeinak khoei sekkolakko soulangsije, haoenei long on akletla khangkei,
hoba sembounyet ikei long kabü peisilei panletla khangkei.
Aieilausi chalou lounyu chanyu ayingsi khanshoulitshou ongkei ühüp hoba yeinak kho aeibou kaangko lotkei, khoei thonlaje kün püetlabü dogo dambü maanglem khümbo litian apbei.

Kho tegü, ladang haoen chalou lounyu ashauayungko khüpbei, Paul haoen yoa loenkei hoba laukei, “Yaangbü shuong, kanei kü ngüha lejan kikei hoba Kreta ka ohoulabou kikei. Khei yinga tegüje kan lusakbü hoba maubü telongkhoulabü.
Lausikei tou ngei kan maang kaangashi dogo thungeida, aishanga kan yoka langkei ai amaulabü, lausikei longei ong konglabü.
Miou, ngo aoeibü ki hoba ngei ao to lemda kho Mühghaü khuthük hangangbü kü junga lokei.
Haoei laukei, ‘Tehüt, Paul; no Kaisar junga lojan, hoba Mühghaüei onouko ka yoa longa kibü shuong pendou ka la kua.’
Hibü maang kaangashi, yaangbü shuong, aishanga ho kü la lenbü tegü ong yinglabü dogo ngei Mühghaü to mailemda.
Lausikei sen su chenei thangyolanglabü.”
Ladang anthükleibou you sühkei, kün Adria yungnyua phongeishoueiko kijinei methuphanga longleibü shuongei kaomai sühda dogo ong dambei.
Haoenei taksi phak saoche haüan kikei, hoba longche hauan phaia takan chühsi phak anthükngao kiteikei.
Kün yungko laanglip to thangyolangla hatbü ka, haoenei longshing aeka longthakbou pemlei teklian langesaobü chüheikei.
Longleibü shuong kho long ka satla haujembei hoba longkhu ka longthakbou yantibü la nyeian haoenei longshou kho dei to yantian kiteikei.
Hibü Paulei saongao thükkabou si sepai shuong to laukei, “Habü mütshuong longa akitei tegüje kan kan loloje püetla athükkei.”
Kheijinei sepai shuongei longshou kabü lüh wapthetkei hoba kho attikei.
Chanyu phamlamto Paulei haoen pendou to shaulayungla shanga hai lauko thungeikei, “Chalou anthüklei sühko kan haiteiko hoba müh kia; hoba kanei ai ashauayungkei.
Ngei kan to shaulayungla sudajada, aieilausi kan lang kimang sühalonga, kho shanga kümsilei. Lausikei kan aoeibü khukakei khulou langpem che ongkei amaulabü.”
Kho lauan phaia haoei wentek che sungkei hoba pendou thedanga Mühghaü la nyensang kukei; kho phaia haoei shaknyinkei hoba shaula khangkei.
Kheijinei haoen pendouei maang kaangngaikei hoba haoeneikei shaukeiyungkei.
Long khünei pendouei kün müt saoanto anjinleito lak yingan kikei.
Ladang haoenei photko shaukei, haoenei ang si to tekan koutiko long kho songoktila khangkei.
Ladang lang ngekei haoenei kao ashen, lausikei haoenei phetsen jonbü yungko che chühenkei, hoba thükalonga long kho khüto leilila shanga janenkei.
Haoenei longthakbou lühenkei hoba si to attikei; khüto yoko haoenei longlei wa sengkei, yeilam to shaangbou longleinei tonenkei, hoba deiko to meimeikei.
Lausikei haoen yungnyu penyi haüyoshang to atkei hoba long kho kao to thangyokei. Khünei long kho thangjinlangan atopeiko apbei hoba deishou hauei longshing ae saakletla khangkei.
Thüngbü shuong ka che ongkei dei itjung hauan satenbüla dogo sepai shuongei haitila huon kümbei.
Lausikei saongao thükkabouei Paul langkei püetmang sühbü ka haoeneibü kümsilei kho shiletkei. Aoyou dei itla minkei haoen shang long ka tomletjung kaomai to liashi,
hoba joubü shuong kho wa si longkabü buthema hauashi dogo haoei ngühkhüm kukei. Kho tegü pendou kho kaomai to maisho satenkei.
Ladang kün maisho satenkei kheijinei su kho Malta nyenkei dogo künei ngekei.
Sangbü shuongei kün to aeibou sanou lenkei. Lang loula khangkei hoba aeibou khambei, khoei wan metan kün pendou olinko sungletkei.
Paulei bujikshou thep che haushaikei hoba wan to jinkei. Kheijinei aubü ka pinyu che longan haoeibü ika kaikei.

Ladang khükabü mütshuongei pinyu haoeibü ika saüan hapbei, haoen cheei che to laukei, “Kho müt kho müt haitibü che yinglabü haang. Hao yungnyu ka khümenkei, lausikei maanglanbou soushouei hao lang aphokulabü.”
Lausikei haoei pinyu kho wanmang to wenan attikei hoba hao la ai aying.

Haoenei hao mang poklabü ayingsi mangde tuonglabü dogo chüheiko kikei. Haoenei lounyu kho dambo chüheikei, lausikei haoenei hao la amaiko haüthükbü ai ühüpsije haoenei haoeneibü dambü jeileikei hoba hao mühghaü che yingkei dogo laukei.
Kho lepa Publia nyenbü kho su kabü thükkabou müt cheeibü kaoen sekphai kikei. Haoei kün leiyetkei hoba chalou sem kün pangteiko sühtikei.
Publia bou mangbok si siisenbüei shatko kiteikei. Paul atkei hoba welaukukei. Kho phaia haoei haoeibü ikei shangetan hao maitikei.
Kho haüthüksije kho su kabü shatbü shuong pendou loukei hoba maitikei.
Haoenei kün la jongsak juongnyu kukei, hoba ladang kün longa meimeijung haukei, haoenei kün shanga khambü peisilei pendou long to jinkukei.
Lit sem kian phaia kün kho sua poang angtibou long chenei haukei. Kho Alexandria long kiteikei, hoba kho nyen kho “Khuthükbü Phokbüshou” kikei.
Kün Sirakusaa thakkei hoba khünei semnyet thüngkei.
Khüka kün kaijung hauan Rijiaa sühkei. Natche kian yungthang yei soula khangkei hoba chalou nyia kün Puteoli to loukei.
Khünei künei jaisina at hapbei hoba kün haoen yoa chalou nyet thüngla sukeijakei. Hobaje kün Rom to haukei.

Khünei kün jaisinasi shuongei kün shanga ditan kiteikei hoba haoen Apia Namyakshang si Yensühchem Sem sühko kün shuokla loukei. Ladang Paulei haoen hapbei haoei Mühghaü nyen sangkei hoba maang khaingaitikei.
Ladang kün Rom sangnyu to atkei, Paul hao lombou sepai yoa hao ong kila sakkukei.

Chalou sem kian phaia haoei khükabü Jihudabü khuleibü dan chela ngashaikei. Ladang haoen yoshaikei haoei haoen to laukei, “Jaisinasi shuong, ngo hanei Jerusalem ka thüngbü che tegü kia. Ngeije sen mütli khulimbo ayingsi sen pisibou songsido khulimbo ai akümsikei, ngo Rombü la khümbo kuan apbei.
Ladang haoenei ngo takteian chühkei haoenei ngo litimang sühkei aieilausi kü mata aikei hailabü kayang muko akitei,
lausikei Jihudabüei kho khulimsije ngei Kaisar to künngailabü lele ong yeikei; kho ngei jembü phang khulimbo attibü ngüh sungbalabü shangakei aying.
Khoei ngei kan to haüyomang sühbü ka hoba joyomang sühbü ka kan ngakei; aieilausi Israelbü maanglema ngei ho yangmen phenan ki.”
Haoenei hao to laukei, “Künei Jihuda ka ka shangabü ai lekei ühüp, ayingsi sen jaisinasi shuong atei ongkei louan alen ayingsi ka shangabü amaibü ai alau.
Nyi ai damdaje kho küneikei ditmang sühda; aieilausi pendou aenei ho tan khulimbo ong lauda dogo küneikei ngean ki.”

Haoenei hao shanga chalou che pienkei hoba haoeibü yen tegü müt juong lousühkei. Hobaje ngeyang ka chasem sühko haoei Mühghaü Sangle shangabü aukabü kuko wanan lenkei, hoba Mosa ngühkhüm si thuseibü le ka sungenan lenko Jisu shanga suletla haujembo laukei.
Laubü ngüh to atei mailembei, ateije maialem.
Paulei ngühkung che ho lensilengko haoen kanglanga ngühthang ayenko apbei hoba linkei: “Soushou Saopobüei kaneibü pisibou shuong to Isaia thuseibü danko hainyu maian laukei,
‘Habü mütshuong jungto hauashi hoba lenashi,
Kanei ditdang lelabü lausikei ladangkei aditenlabü;
kanei hapdang lelabü lausikei ladangkei ashenlabü.
Aishanga habü mütshuongeibü maangpon ngouan shema,
haoenei haoeneibü nouei ushaleko ditda,
hoba haoenei haoeneibü nyek mua.
Khei aying tegüje, haoenei haoeneibü nyekei haplabü,
haoeneibü nouei ditlabü,
haoeneibü maangponei ditenlabü,
hoba sepeilabü hoba ngei haoen maitikulabü.’
Mühghaü khümenbü sei Küksithang jungto hautiakei dogo kanei ngeashi, ditlabü kho haoen ki.”
(Ladang haoei kho laukhümbei, Jihudabü shuong haoen yoa aeibou ngühthang ayensapbo linkei.)
Hao khünei chemmu atko po nyi onko kikei, hoba hao jungto loubü dan pendou haoei sungletkei.
Haoei Mühghaü Sangle shanga songlenkei, hoba Bunyubou Jisu Khrista shangabü aeibou tang khitko hoba toketbü akiko lenkei.
Ho le ho Paul ka, Mühghaüeibü youkoikjai che yingla ngabü, hoba Mühghaüeibü Ngühlang Maibü künla shanga pienbü, Jisu Khristaeibü sambü cheei,
lounyu dana ho Ngühlang Maibü Mühghaüei haoeibü thuseibü shuong danko saopobü Laia thekukei.
Ngühlang Maibü kho hao Shou, ao phe aedang ka tangshaitham Dawid thensilen ki,
lausikei sao- pobü thechüh aeka hao Mühghaü Shou yingla shanga langngeijung loubüei khümbomeiko tang khida, hao shangabü ki. Hao seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista ki,
ao danko youkoikjai che yeila shanga sungletkei kho aoyoueibü kümsilei phangshuong mütli pendou hao to mailema ngüha lela shanga ki.
Kankei khünei haoen yoa yoakei, aieilausi kan Jisu Khristaei ngakei.
Rombü Mühghaüei sanoubü shuong hoba hao mütla ngabü pendou jungto: Kan pendou jungto seneibü Bou Mühghaü hoba Bunyubou Jisu Khrista ka olinbü hoba haülabü yingshi.
Shangla ngei ho lenmangsühda, kanei hao to mailembü ngühlang kaodak pendoua ditbü shanga ngei Jisu Khrista danko Mühghaü la nyensang kuda.
Mühghaü ao ngei hao Shoueibü Ngühlang Maibü phinthonbü danko khangenda, ngei lai kan ponpen ngeibü welaua damenda, kho haoei ngekei.
Mühghaüei maangangbü yingsije, ngo thonla ongkei kan jungto louenlabü lele lam naipbua dogo ngei ponpendou welauda.
Kan soushoua hau kitila, kan yoa soushou jongsak janyola shanga, kan to haüyola ngei aeibou waangko chüheida;
khei laulabüei, ngei ladang kan to haüyolaje, kaneibü mailemei ngo, ditenyobüei sen hau kiyolabü.

Ngei kan la ho ngetimangsühda, jaisinasi shuong, tat sühko ngo alouenko toketsi dogokei, ngeikei khei, lubü Küksithang kaodak dana tegü, kan yoakei ngeibü kümsilei kho mai hektilabü shanga, ngo kan jungto loula aeibou takteikei.
Ngei Grikbü hoba Grik ayingbü, hapbü ngebü hoba ühüp angebü pendou yoa jetei kümjan kia.
Khoei ngei kan Rom kabü shuonglakei Ngühlang Maibü songlenla aeibou haiyeida.
Ngo Ngühlang Maibü aoa ihimouda; khei Jihudabü ka khangan Grikbüa sühko, mailembü weko shanga ho Mühghaüeibü khümenbü sei ki.

Aishanga Ngühlang Maibü danko ho tang khitda, khei khangbü ka shembüa sühko Mühghaüei müt hao yoa saopotham kitila kümbü kho mailem ki. Ho doakei, “Ao Mühghaü yoa mailem danko janbü ki hao lang kilabü.”
Asaopobü si amaibü mütshuong aoyouei ngühmai amaiko thangetda haoen khulimbo khuthük ka Mühghaü maangshat kho tou tang khida.
Haoen shanga Mühghaü ngelabü pendou kho lansanbü, aieilausi Mühghaüei ho lansanbü kümbei.

Kaodak yaüshembü ka jaüan haoeibü achühenbü hangsilam, kho thon akibü sei hoba Mühghaübou. khübü kho haoeneibü maangponei hapentila shanga haoei kümbü yaübü kümsilei thonan kiteikei, khoei haoen shanga ap kubü aki.

Haoenei Mühghaü ngean kikei lausikei haoenei hao la kujan nyensang ayingsi maangshikbü aku. Aeiko tokei haoenei amlangbü lenbüa maang kuyokei hoba haoeneibü tak ashatbü maangpon kho nakthühei khuilepbei.
Songsido kibü tegü lenko haoen ngoubü la yeikei;
haoenei ühaibü Mühghaü, müt phatko kümbü hoba au phatbü hoba meisiau si shanbü yangsikok phatko kümbü haibü heangsho to jeiyoda.
Hibü haoen lulueibü maang jembü lolo asaopobü hoba cheei che yoa haoeneibü mang awe- asüngko jungeitila Mühghaüei haoen apyokei.
Haoenei Kümbou, Mühghaü ngühmai kho amlangbü to jeiyokei, hoba haoenei, ao ponpen shanga sangjan kikei, kho jeila haoenei kümenbü shuong to ong khümbo kukei hoba lembei. Amen.
Hibü Mühghaüei haoen aseasangbü khonkua apyokei. Yaksa shuongei haoen yoa ajanbü dühbü hangsilam jungeila shanga bousu yoa jungeilabü janbü hangsilam apyokei,

hoba kho tegü bousueikei yaksa yoa jungeilabü janbü hangsilam kho apyoda, hoba haoen yoa ajanbü dühbü hangsilam jungeida. Bousuei him yoa himou akakbü kümsilei jungeibü hoba sanglea akakbü jungeibü danko haoenei mubü üepenkubü kayang sungbakei.
Kho ong ayingko, haoenei Mühghaü ngebü hatlepjan dogo adamensije, Mühghaüei haoenei akümjan kümtilabü shanga himou akakbü shabü maangpon la haoen khümbo kuan apbei.

Haoen amaibü, aeilam aeiphopbü hoba maangsha maangkok, khübü amaibü pendouei nyakan ki. Haoen nyekto shatbü, müt haitibü, oyongümyobü, khüpsilang hoba mangsenyobüei shenakei. Haoen shayotayobü shuong, jukbüsabü, münyen jungeibü, Mühghaü maabü, hoba Mühghaü khulimbü shuong la yeikhümakei.
Haoen kho lilisese, yonglamshamle, amaibü haanbü haanbü hapen sungenla sekokbü, nyungüh boungüh ashaubü,
ditenshokenbü akibü, soumo akakbü, chemdanga apaplepyobü hoba sanou akakbü shuong ki.
Khübü kümbü mütshuongje haila mukei dogo laubü Mühghaü ngühlang haoenei shangashatakei; yingankei haoenei ong khübü kümda aying, khübü jungeibü shuong to haoenei ik ipbo shoda.
Hibü, küthangbou, ao ao yinga tegükei, no kho matjembü che tegü setalongaje nokei asatenkei. Müt ateibü matjemjinei nyi no lolo attida, aieilausi nyikei nyi shedbü kubü jeteibü kümsilei kho jungeida.
Kanei lauda, “Mühghaüeibü matjembü kho khübü kümbü shuong thükto tükde lotda dogo künei ngeakei.”
