Küthangbou, nyi khübü jungeibü shuongeibü matjemda lausikei nyije khübü kho kümda; kanei kan Mühghaü matjemshang ka satenlep dogo damda lo?
Ayingsi nyi haoeibü sanoubü, senetbü hoba natenbü nyaksinam to awe asüngda sai? Kaneije Mühghaü sanou kho kan maangpon sepeibü to leila shanga dogo adamenda lo?
Lausikei kan tubüsekbü hoba maangpon sepeila adambü shuong yingkei. Mühghaüeibü ngühmaang matjemnyet tang khitla kibü Maangshat Chalou shanga kanei jembü lolo khauang maangshat thanshaida.
Khünyet haoei mütpem wekoeibü kümsilei kho luluei kümbü hangsilam ka jemlabü:
hangsilam maibüa kümenleienla haujembü hoba soneikangbü, soumo hoba ühaibü lambü shuong la haoei athonbü langkei kulabü;
aoyou jembü ong maikubü, saopobü to ngüha aleko asaopobüei lenbü ditbü shuong ki, haoen jungto khauang maangshat loulabü.
Amaibü kümbü müteibü jongsakje sekbü hoba khonku khonsak kilabü; kho Jihudabü shaang hoba tokei Grikbükei;
lausikei maibü kümbü müt shangaje jongsak kho soneikangbü, soumo hoba sangmai kilabü. Kho Jihudabü ka shaang khanglabü, lausikei tokei Grikbükei.
Mühghaü thedangaje maangshik thechüh ai aki.
Aoyouei Ngühkhüm aikei angeko shabü shonkei, haoenei Ngühkhüm ai angesidogokei, haoen maulabü; aoyouei ngühkhüm shenshen ngenge shabü shonkei haoeneibü ngüh Ngühkhümei panlabü.
Müt cheei Ngühkhüm kho dit ong ditbü shangaje, Mühghaü thedanga haomat amaitida; müt cheei ngühkhümei ai mangsühda kho jungeisi ong, haoei Mühghaü thedanga janbü haplabü.
Ladang kükeithangei Ngühkhümje akiko hao haangei ngühkhümei mangsühbü kho jungeida, haoenei Ngühkhüm akisi dogokei haoen kho haoeneibü ngühkhüm ki.
Haoenei haoeneibü maangpona doan kibü Ngühkhüm kho, haoeneibü ditenbü danko lenenda;

Mühghaüei, Jisu Khrista danko, müteibü huphang kümsilei pendou matjemnyet, ngeibü ngühlang maibüei lenbü tegü, haoei haoeneibü dambü maangkaboutham la, jijidang to chühan, shedbü kulabü ayingsi amai apbulabü.
Nyi no tetlabü leshi. No Jihudabü hoba kho shanga yonglamda; no Ngühkhüma youphen younak lamakei; nyi no Mühghaüeibü müt dogo lauenda.
Aieilausi no Ngühkhüm phanga weenbüei nyi haoei maangangbü ngeakei hoba tangbü si shedbü ainei lulu ki kho lenenda.
Nyi no lolo nyekthubü shanga lamleibou, nakthühbüa kibü shanga ngesakbü,
amin angebü shuong la songlenbou hoba nashou hanbü shuong shanga lenbou dogo damda. No Ngühkhüma tükdebü hapbüngebü mang ki.
Khei yingsije nyi lubü la lenda; nyi no lolo lenngaidalao? Kokla haubü khulimbo nyi songlenda; nyi kokdalao?
Nyi asangalanbü thangetda; nyi asangalanbü shondalao? Nyi heangsho kho mangsenlabü tegü damda; nyi Lembüchem shatidalao?
Nyi Ngühkhüma yonglamda; nyi Ngühkhüm lulimbü danko Mühghaü shatidalao?
Laishibaei lenda, “Küksithang yoa Mühghaü nyen kho shatida, hoba kho kaneibü on.”
Nyi Ngühkhüm jungeisije nyi kipbü kho lejim ki, lausikei nyi Ngühkhüm lulimalonga kipbü kho akipbü jam yeilabü.
Akipbü Küksithang cheei Ngühkhümei mangsühbü jungeisije, maimaitham, haoje akipasikei kipbü hima welabü.
Nyi Ngühkhüm leilusije, kaibü dobü ngühkhüm si kipbü ham apyoan, khüpeinyu haoei ong Ngühkhüm tükde jungeisije, kho tegübü akipbü müt che khoei kamat jemlabü.
Aishanga tanga chühlabü khoei tükdebü Jihudabü la ayeida, hoba kipbü kho tanga phe chühlabü che aying.

Aishanga tükdebü maangkabou tham khoei ong Jihudabü tükde yeitida; hao kipbü kho maangpon maangkabü thu, kho dobü ngühkhümei aying lausikei Soushouei. Hao sungletbü kho mütei aying, lausikei Mühghaüei.
Hibü Jihudabü shanga ai aei dühlabü ki? Kipbü danko maibü ai ki?
Hangsilam pendoua khei ong, shaangbou Jihudabü kho Mühghaü ngühlang ik jaitikei.
Khei yingsije, at maangalanbü yingasikei khoei Mühghaükei maangalanko yeitilep lo?
Ladangkei aying! Müt pendou yepeija- webü yingasikei Mühghaüje ngühmai dogo lenenjan. Laiei lenbü tegü: “Nyi ladang ngüh laulaje no janbü dogo aukabü kuenjan hoba ladang kamat jemlaje kho thükjan.”

Lausikei seneibü asaopobüei Mühghaü ngühmai aukabü kula khangensije, senei ai ong laula? Mühghaüei haoeibü maangshat ho kaodaka jungeialonga Mühghaü khoje maang alan dogo senei laulep sai? (Ngei ho müt aedang ka lauda.)
Ladangkei aying! Khei yingsije Mühghaü kho lai küman kaodaka matjembou yingla?
Ngeibü amlangbüei Mühghaü ngühmai aei takshatbou khangenalonga, hoba hao la soneikangbü aei sungbaalonga, ngo aila toukei shabü müt che tegü yuktida?
“Maibü nalongla senei amaibü akümlep si?” dogo laubü ngüh kho künei laukei dogo müt ateije nyikuko laukuda; haoen la kujana shedbü kua.
Khei yingsije, sen Jihudabü müto aeije thükkabou sai? Ladangkei aying, aieilausi künei Jihudabü si küksithang jeteibü shabü hau phanga kibü shanga lenda.
Laishibaei lenbü tegü:
“Saopobü müt aokei aki,
che ongkei aki;
ditenbü ao aki,
Mühghaü lambü ao ayokei.
Pendou ayinglam to satkei,
pendou liko amlangbü la yeia;
sanou jungeibü aokei aki.
che ongkei aki.
Haoeneibü sanglou kho
heekhün tegü asaopobü,
haoenei haoeneibü lishangei huonetyouettida.
Pinyu la tegü haoeneibü sembung khopa lüh kia.
Haoeneibü sembung kho khüksiuok
hoba khauekbüei shenakei.
Sii angtila haoen aeibou you sokei,
haoenei haoen paishang pendoua lusakbü
hoba khonkuei shentida.
Haoenei sangmai lamnyu angeenkei.
Haoen thea Mühghaü la soumo kubü aki.”
Thepetbü ngühkhüma kakbü pendou kho ho phangto lotbü shuong shanga ki dogo senei ngeakei; apyola athükbü kho ho ki, khei aokei satenla athük hoba kaodak pendou kho Mühghaü matjembü phanga kilabü.
Ho shanga aukabü ngüh kho ho ki aokei ngühkhüm jungeibü shanga Mühghaü thedanga mat amailabü. Ngühkhüm danko mütei shabü kho shangshenda.
Lausikei tou tükdebüei Mühghaüei müt hao thedanga mat maitibü kho tang khida hoba ho ngühkhüm to aphenyokei. Ngühkhüm si thuseibü danko ho shanga aukabü künkei, lausikei
ho Mühghaüei khunakshousi pendou Jisu Khrista danko mailemei hao thedanga mat maitikei hoba ho janyinbü akiko mailembü pendou shanga ki.
Pendouei shabü shona hoba Mühghaü soneikangbü kho asühlang.
Haoen Jisu Khristaeibü angthetbü kümsilei danko onoubüei haoen thedanga thamtham mat maitikei.

Hao haibü danko, hao to mailem kibü shuongeibü shabü apentikula shanga, Mühghaüei hao lemla kukei. Aieilausi haoei natenbüa, haoei danbü meten kabü shabü aphaneiko, haoeibü ngühmaanglanbü lenla shanga lemlabü kho kümsilei yingan kiteikei.
Hobaje danbü thuakei haoeibü ngühmaanglanbü lenla shanga, hoba hao kho ngühmai hoba Jisu to mailembü shuong, haoei hao thedanga mat maitida dogo lenla shanga janbü yingan kiteikei.
Yaangenlabü kümsilei ai ki? Ho aweeida. Ai younaka? Ho mütei kümbüleibüa thonkei sai? Aying, mailema ong phenakei.
Mailem danko ong müt kho Mühghaü thedanga mat maitida dogo senei thonshang to louda. Ho “kümsilei” ngühkhümei aying.
Mühghaü kho Jihudabüeibü ong si? Hao Küksithangeibü kei aying lo? Haü, maimaitham,
aieilausi Mühghaü kho che ong. Jihudabüei kipbü khokei mailemei; jeteibü mailem khoei ong Küksithangei akip, hoba Mühghaüei ham kho hao thedanga janbü haptilabü.
Khülonga senei haüko mailembüei ngühkhüm khoje leiluda sai? Khei aying! Ngühkhüm kho senei hatlepda.
Khülonga seneibü pisibou Abra- hamei haoei lolo ong hapenkei dogo laulasi ai?
Aishanga Abrahamei haoeibü hauei ong hao Mühghaü thedanga janbü hapbei longaje hao yonglamlabü ki. Lausikei Mühghaü thedanga aying;
aishanga Laishibaei ai lauda? “Abrahamei Mühghaü to haoeibü mailem phokei hoba kho danko hao Mühghaü thedanga saopobü dogo weeikei.”
Müt cheei haoeibü mu kho maangshikbü che tegü aying lausikei hao la thebü che tegü noda.
Lausikei, haoeibü hau to nongan kikhoulabü jeila, müt cheei Mühghaü, aoei hao angeko kibü shuong hao thedanga mat maitida, hao to ong mailemsije, Mühghaüei hao kho haoeibü mailem thüngei sungletda.
Kho tegü haoei kümenbüei ayingko Mühghaüei sungletbü müt cheeibü olinbü shanga Dawidei hai lauda:
“O, shedtibü shanga Mühghaüei amai apbubü
hoba shabü apbubü danshuong latetche olinlabü!
O, aoeibü shabü Bunyubouei nomaukua,
hao lai olinlabü!”
Haülabü kho kipbü shuong shanga ong si akipbükei yoan? Aieilausi senei laubü kho, “Mühg- haüei Abraham haoeibü mailemei sungletkei.”
Kho haüthükjinei hao ai thua kiteikei? Kipan si akipbo? Kipan aying lausikei akipbo.

Kipbü tetsida khoje phaito ong, hoba kipbü kho hao akipjinei thama kibü mailem, Mühghaüei hao sungletbü shangjinbü tang khitbü ong ki. Kho tegü hao kho, aoyou akipsi dogokei mailem ki hoba aoyou Mühghaüei sungleda khübüeibü bou la yeikei,
hoba tokei aoyou kip ong kipbei ayingko seneibü bou Abrahamei akipjineithama kibü mailem youyaü phai semda khübü kipbü shuongeibü bou la yeikei.
Abraham to ayingsi haoeibü thensilen to haoei kaodak phet phanlabü dogo thekubü kho si ngühkhüm aineikei aphenyokei; Mühghaüei sungletbü khoje mailema ong nongan ki.
Ngühkhümei ong langda hoba khübüei ong kaodakkei pailetda lausije, mailem kho kongbü hoba theletbü kho amlangbü,
aieilausi ngühkhümei khauang longtida; lausikei lan ngühkhüm aki khünei shedtibü alongda.

Hibü touje Mühghaü onoubü to ong sou nonglabü lele ajanjan pendou mailem ka ong pakakei; aieilausi ho Abrahameibü shisishousi pendou la, theletbü kho Ngühkhüm phanga kibü shuong ong aying lausikei Abraham mailema paibü shuong lakei shangashattila shanga ki. Aishanga hao sen pendoueibü bou ki.

Laishibaei lenda, “Ngei no phangshuong juongeibü bou la yeitia.” Thekubü kho haoei haoeibü maanglem phobü Mühghaü, aoei haibü langngaitida hoba mo abukko kisikei lang kibü tegü meten pendou jungto ngabü ngühlang hautida, kho Mühghaü thedanga sungletkei.
Kho tegü haoeibü mailem khoei damlabü akibü thu cheneikei maanglemkei. Khoei ong hao phang juongeibü bou la yeikei. Mühghaüei laukei, “Kaibü thensilen kho juongnyu kilabü,”
hao kheijinei po saongao thüng onan kisikei, mailema hau athet hoba haoeibü mang kho haibü him, hoba Saraeibü nasetshangkei haibü dogo ngean kikei.
Hao ladangkei aphenyem ayingsi Mühghaüei thekubüa hau athet. Haoei Mühghaü sangkei;
Mühghaüei haoei theletbü haüthüktilabü haang dogo haoei maisho maangleman kikei, hoba kho mailemei haoeibü nyishoubü haukei longeikei.
khoei “Mühghaüei hao sungletkei.”
“Mühghaüei hao saopobü che tegü sungletkei” dogo laubü ngüh kho hao shanga ong ado
lausikei sen shangabükei yingkei; sen aoyouei haoei seneibü Jisu haibü ka langngaitikei dogo mailemda,
aoei Jisu senei shedtiyatibü shanga haibü la khümbo kukei hoba Mühghaü thedanga sen mat maitila shanga langkeitikei dogo mailemlaje, khübü khokei pendou sungletlabü.
Hibü, touje, mailem danko sen Mühghaü thedanga mat maitisije, seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista danko sen Mühghaü yoa sangmaia ki.
Seneibü mailemei haoei sen shanga Mühghaü maangshikbü, laobounei sen tou loan ki, khüto lam ipbukei hoba Mühghaüeibü soneikangbü maanglem kho shanga sen olinyoda.
Haü, khonku khonsakakei olinda; aieilausi khonsakei natenbü sungbada,
natenbüei thükenbü thechüh, hoba thechühei maanglem sungbada.
Maanglemei sen ladangkei aphenyemtida, aieilausi haoei sen la kubü Soushou Saopobü danko Mühghaü sanou kho seneibü maangpon to jinkuda.
Sen haang alongko kijinei jih tetbüa Khrista sen Mühghaü angebü shuong shanga haikukei.
Cheei müt maibü che shanga haikulaje natla thükasikei, sao- pobü müt cheeibü mata haikulaje seklabü.
Lausikei sen tokei shabü shuong yingjinei, Khrista sen shanga haikubü danko, Mühghaüei haoeibü sanou sen la aukabü kuda.
Hibü touje, Khrista haibü danko sen Mühghaü maangshat ka hao danko satenlabü dogo senei aei chongchingda.
Aishanga sen dangan kijinei hao Shou haibü danko sen Mühghaü to papletikei hoba, aeije tou sen paplepan kibü langkeibü Khristaei sen khümenlabü.
Kho ong aying; seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista danko sen Mühghaü to olinyoda, aishanga sen Mühghaü junga nyibou che la yeitibou kho hao ki.
Ho tetlabü daman chühshi. Ho kaodak to müt che danko shabü hoba shabü danko haibü loukei. Kho tegü haibüei nyakan apbei aieilausi müt pendouei shabü shonkei.
Ngühkhüm akibü thedang tokei kaodaka shabü kho kiteikei, lausikei ngühkhüm akijinei müteibü shabü kho aweei.
Khei yingasikei Adam ka Mosa jihsiphaia sühko, Adamei tegü ngühkhüm lulimbo shabü ashonbü mütshuong thükakei haibüei songdakkei.
Tou, Adam kho loula kibou kho phatko kiteikei,

lausikei khünei Mühghaüeibü onoubü si Adameibü shabü aikei takteiyolabü aki. Müt cheeibü shabüei pendou jungto haibü sungbakei, lausikei Mühghaüeibü onoubü hoba haoeibü onoubü jongsak, müt che, Jisu Khrista danko pendou jungto apsileko sungbabü haülabü hau kho phangche kiteikei.

Mühghaü jongsak si müt cheeibü shabü shonbü kanglanga aikei takteiyola aki; aieilausi Mühghaüei müt cheeibü shabü matjembüei haibü to leikei, lausikei haoeibü onoubü jongsakei juongnyu shabü apbubü to leida.

Aishanga müt cheeibü shabüei kho müt che danko haibü songdak khangenkukei. Khülongaje, Mühghaü onouei, haoei lolo hao to mat maitila hoba kho soukoauko sungletbü shuongla, Jisu Khrista che danko, langkei songdakla lai küman athüktila?
Hibü müt cheeibü shedbü danko lai pendou jungto haibü sungbakei kho tegü müt cheeibü saopobü kümsileiei Mühghaü junga langkei kubü phenyobü sungbada.
Lai müt cheeibü ngüha alebüka pendou shabüla yeitikei, kho tegü müt cheeibü ngühalebü danko pendou Mühghaü thedanga mat maitilabü.
Shabü aei haatila shanga Ngühkhüm loukei. Lausikei lanei shabü aei pühkei, khünei aeiko onouei shenkei.
Loushedbü kho ho, shabü songdak tetlabü kho müt shanga haibü hoba onoubü songdak kho, seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista danko thon akibü langkei to leibü Mühghaü thedanga mat maibü tetsida che ki.
Senei lai laula? Onoubü aei haatila shanga shabüa hangnyu thünglep sai?
Khei aying! Sen shabüa haibü shuong athakko khün ongje lai kila?
Sen Khrista yoa baptibü danko hao to thangjambü shuong kho hao haibüakei thangjamei dogo kanei angekei lo?
Hobaje hao haibüa sen baptibü danko hao yoa khünbü tegü hao Bouei soneikangbü kümsilei danko hao haibü ka langngaitibü tetlabü kho sen shanga langkei lamnyu haanbü che ki.
Aishanga sen hao haibü tegübüa hao to shangshenkei longaje, sen tokei hao tegü langngaibüa hao yoa shangshenlabü.
Hao senei ngekei, seneibü shabü mang ho leilulabü hoba touje shabü aaola lalok ayeila shanga seneibü shaangbou mang kho hao yoa peiseia thüngkei;
aishanga ao Khrista yoa haia haoei shabü to jongailabü ai aki.
Touje senei mailemda sen Khrista yoa haikei longa sen tokei hao yoa lang kilabü,
hoba senei ngekei Khrista haibü ka laksepa hoba touje ladangkei nyibouje ühailabü. Touje haibüei hao thüka song atakda.
Aishanga hao haibü kho, pendou shanga che ong shabü la haikukei, hoba hao tou kibü langkei kho, Mühghaü to lang kida.
Hibü kho, kanei lolo kan shabü la haikukei hoba Jisu Khristaa Mühghaü to lang kida dogo kanei damlabü ki.
Hibü shabüei touje kaneibü hailabü manga song atakjan hoba hoei dühbü la kanei kaukhok akujan.
Kanei touje kaneibü mangsisau ka phejan che ongkei shabü peisilei che tegü teku; lausikei, kan kho haibü ka langkeibü mütshuong tegü kaneibü mang pendou kho maibü shanga khümbo kushi;
aieilausi shabü kho kan thüka bunyu aying; kan ngühkhüm phanga aying; lausikei Mühghaü onou phanga ki.
Khülonga ai? Sen ngühkhüm phanga aying lausikei onoubü phanga ki bü dogo senei shabü shonlep sai? Khei aying!

Kanei ho maisho ngeakei, kanei kan lolo müt ateibü aaola yeisije, kan kho kanei khangenbü müteibü aao. Shabü kho kaneibü bunyubou yingsije loushedbü kho haibü kilabü; Mühghaü to ngüha lesije loushedbü kho kan hao junga mat maibü kho kilabü.
Kan che shabüeibü aao kibü shuongei maangpon pendouei kanei sungletbüei lenbü aenei ngüha lebü shanga Mühghaü nyen sangashi;
hoba ladang kan shabü ka satentikei kan maibüeibü aaola yeikei.

(Ngei müteibü hangsilam ka lauda aieilausi ngei kan to hau akibü hangsilam ngeakei.) Aishanga kanei kan lolo phe asaopobü hoba ngühkhüm lulimbü, hoba ngühkhüma akakbü ong jungeibü khübü la lai khümbo kukei, kho tegü saopobüa chingla shanga kan lolo maibü la aao tegü khümbo kuashi.
Kan ladang shabü aao shuong kikei, kheijinei kanei sao- pobü shanga laueila ngüh akitei.
Khülonga, kan laobou hangshong tou himou bauda kho to liman kanei kho jihsiphaia ai pailetkei?
Aieilausi haoen haibüa thonkei.
Lausikei kan maimaitham shabü ka solo haptia hoba Mühghaü aao shuong la yeia, hoba kaneibü jongsak saopobüa chingko ponpen langkei haplabü kho ki.
Shabüei mu che kuda hoba kho haibü; lausikei Mühghaüei kulabü jongsak che kia hoba khoje seneibü Bunyubou, Khrista Jisua thon akibü langkei ki.
Jaisinasi shuong, müt che lang ki shongko ngühkhüm kho hao thüka kia dogo kanei maisho ngekei (aieilausi ngei ho ngühkhüm ngebü to lauda).
Laolamla haubü yaksa che kho lao lang ki shongko hao to phenyoakei; lausikei lao kho haisije sao kho chemkan ngühkhüm ka satenakei.

Hibü saoei tokei lao lang kian müt at to phenyobü kialonga sao kho asangalannyu dogo nyenlabü; lausikei lao haisije sao kho ngühkhüm ka satenakei, hibü sao kho lubü jungto hausikei sao kho asangalannyu aying.

Küjai künasi shuong, kan shangakei jetei ong. Kan Khristaeibü manga phejan chela yeia hoba sen Mühghaü junga lejim kitila shanga haibü ka langngaibou cheeibü la yeitila shanga kan che Ngühkhüma haikukei.
Sen ladang kaodak hangeilamei leibü aenei ki, Ngühkhümei longtibü seneibü shabü dühbüei ponpendou akongko sen to kümbeileikei, hoba loushedbü kho haibü kiteikei.
Lausikei tou sen hatlepbou khühbü la che haikukei hoba tou Ngühkhüm ka satenakei; touje senei hangbü dobü ngühkhüma aying lausikei haanbü soushou langkeia khangenda.

Khülonga senei ai laula? Ngühkhüm si shabü jetei hoba che ong sai? Khei aying! Ngei lenda, ngühkhümei aying tegüje shabü kho ai yingkeije tengekhoulabü. Ngühkhümei “Nyi tedüh” dogo alen tegüje dühbü kho ai yingkeije ngei tengekhoulabü.
Kho ngühkhümei shabü la kaokuok kukei hoba kü to phang pendou dühbü longtikei. Ho Ngühkhüm hangshong aying tegüje shabü kho maimaitham haibü yingkhoulabü!
Kü langkeia ngühkhüm shanga angebü jih che kiteikei; lausikei ngei ladang ka jaüan ngühkhüm ngekei, shabü kho longche danga longeikei,
hoba ngo haikei. Kü la langkei sungbalabü ngühkhümei ngo haito jantikei.
Aishanga shabüei ngühkhüma younak lambei. Hoei khüpettikei hoba ngo ngühkhüm danko haitikei.
Hibü Ngühkhüm kho saopobü hoba sakkubü khokei saopobü, ngühmaang hoba maibü ki.

Khülonga kü la haibü sungbabü aoa ngei maibü shanga aiche tetlabü ki sai? Kheikei aying. Tükdebü kho ho, shabü kho shabü tegü chühentila shanga, ngeibü maibü kho kü la haibü sungbabüa jungeikei – laulabüei, haoeibü akhühlepenbü shabü shangshentila shanga shabüei ngühkhüm kho jungeikei.
Ngühkhüm kho Mühghaüei kukei dogo senei ngekei; lausikei ngo shabü aao che tegü yakkubü müt che ong ki.
Ngei ngeibü jembü kümsilei aditenda, aishanga ngei ai kümmang sühda kho ngei akümda; lausikei khüpeinyu ngei ai mangsenda kho ngei kümda.
Ngei kümmang asühbü kümbü khoei ongkei ngühkhüm khoje maiakei dogo lenenda.
Lausikei tükdebüei ngei ai kümda kho ngo aying, lausikei kü to kibü shabü.
Aishanga ngei ngekei, ngeibü kaodak hangsilam aeka damalongaje maibü kho kü to akida, aishanga ngei maibü kümla maangangsikei kü la hau akida.
Ngei ai maibü kümmang sühda, ngei kho akümda; khüpeinyu ngei amangsühbü amaibü kho ong ngei kümda.
Ngei kümmang asühbü kümbou kho ngo aying lausikei kü to kibü shabüei kümda.
Ngei hapbü ngühkhüm kho hanei ki: ngei maibü kümmang sühda lausikei amaibüei ladangkei kü mütpemje üpyoda.
Ngei kü maangponeije olinko Mühghaü Ngühkhüm to hehoat kida,
lausikei ngeibü manga ngeibü ngühchung kho wapyoko ngühkhüm phangche hapda. Ho ngeibü maanga kümboleiko kibü shabü ngühkhüm ki hoba hoei ngo langsenbü la yeitida.
Ngo lai sanoulabü müt che! Aoei ngo ho mang hoba haibüa phenyobü pendou ka püetla?
Mühghaü sangshi, aieilausi ngei Jisu Khrista, seneibü Bunyubou, ngo khümenbou ki!
“Hibü tou kü to jouan kibü kho, ngeibü aukabüei Mühghaü ngühkhüm khangenla thungeida lausikei müteibü hangeilamei kü la shabü ngühkhüm phanga khangentida.”
Hibü Khrista Jisu to kibü shuong shanga shedbü kubü aki.
Aishanga Khrista Jisu to kibü soushou langkei ngühkhümei ngo shabü ngühkhüm hoba haibü ka leiyena.

Müteibü hangalama hau akibü danko ngühkhümei ai akümen kho Mühghaüei kümbei. Shabü to totyotila shanga, haoei hao Shou, sen müteibü shabü phe jeteibü mang hanei hautikei, hoba kho müt mang danko haoei shabü la shedbü kukei.
Haoei ho sen tou kaodak pheei paibü shuong aying lausikei soushouei paibü shuong danko tükdebü ngühkhümei mangsühbü shuong haüthüktila shanga kümbei.
Aishanga aoyou kaodak hangeilamei paida haoen kaodak maangpon la yeida, lausikei aoyou haoeneibü soushou hangeilamei paida haoen soushou maangpon la yeida.
Kaodak aenei dambü kho haibü lausikei soushou aenei dambü kho langkei hoba sangmai.
Aishanga kaodak dambülebü kho Mühghaü to dangbü; ho Mühghaü ngühkhüm phanga akida, hoba maimaitham kila athük.
Aoyou kaodak hangeilamei thüpetbü phanga kida haoenei Mühghaü olintila athük.

Lausikei Mühghaü soushou maimaitham kan yoa kialonga, kheijinei kan kaneibü kaodak hangeilamei thüpetbü phanga aying lausikei kaneibü soushou hangeilamei thüpetbü phanga kida. Müt cheei Khrista Soushou akilonga hao kho haoeibü aying.
Lausikei Khrista ka to kisije, shabü hangshong kaibü mang kho haiasikei, kaibü soushou kho lang ki, aieilausi no kho Mühghaü thedanga mat maitia.
Jisu haibü ka langngaitibou Mühghaü Soushou kan to kialonga, hao Soushou kan to thüngbü danko, aoei Khrista Jisu haibü ka langngaitikei haoei kaneibü hailabü mang lakei langkei kulabü.
Hibü, jaisinasi shuong, sen kümjanleijan che phanga ki, lausikei kho kaodak hangsilam aying.
Kan kaodak songsido hangeilamei kialonga kan hailabü; lausikei kanei Soushou danko kaneibü pheeibü songsido kho haitisije, kan lang kilabü.
Aoyou Mühghaü Soushouei leida haoen Mühghaü shousi shuong ki.
Aishanga kanei sungletbü ho, kan nyibou hatlabü thu to leilabü lele aaoeibü soushou aying. Ho sen shousi la yeitibü soushou ki, hoba senei “Abba, Abou.” dogo welauda.
Sen kho Mühghaü shousi shuong dogo aukabü kula shanga Soushoukei seneibü soushou to yoda.

Hobaje sen shousi shuong yingsije senei Mühghaü jongsak, laobou Khrista yoa hambü jongsak ki, kho jongsak kho hapda. Sen haoeibü soneikangbüa thuiyo janyobü shuong yingla shanga, sen haoeibü khonkua thuiyojanyobü shuong ki.
Toubü jihsiphaia khonkubü ho loulabüa sen la tang khitkula kibü soneikangbü khütoje aikei takteian chühla athüklabü dogo ngei daman chühda.
Kaodak, müt yangsikok pendouei Mühghaü shousi shuong tang khitla kibü khüto aeibou chüheiko haiyeida.
Aishanga yaübü kaodak lejim akibü phangto attibü kho, haoei maangangko aying,
lausikei haoei leilubüeibü aaola yeian kibü thu ka satentilabü hoba Mühghaü shousi shuongeibü soneikangbü solo haptila shanga dambü phoan kümbei.
Aieilausi senei ngekei, meten haanbü ho buksije, tou ho jihsiphaia sühko, yaübü kaodak kabü phejan pendou nabukshat khonkua aeibou ngühyo wiyoda;
kho ong aying lausikei sen soushoua shaangbü jongsak hapan kibü shuongkei sen Mühghaü shousi yeitila shanga hoba seneibü langkei pendou soloa kila haiyeibü ka sen lolo ngühyoda.
Aishanga ho maanglema sen khümenkei. Senei maanglembü kho senei hapla thükalongaje maanglem kho ai ngühtet ki. Ateije nyekei hapbo kibü to maanglemda si?
Lausikei senei hapla athükbü che to maanglemsije senei ho shanga natenko haisühda.

Kho tegü Soushou kei sen hau akibü to thuila sen jungto louda; aieilausi senei ai shanga welaula ayingsi ho shanga lai welaulaje angekei, lausikei Soushouei sen shanga senei alauenbü ngüh khoei Mühghaü junga sühtikuda.
Aoei maangpon lamda haoei Soushou tetlabü kho ngekei, aishanga mütshuong nyena Soushouei hao to sukujakulabü kho Mühghaüei maangangbü ki;
hoba senei ngekei, aoyouei Mühghaü sanouda hoba haoeibü nyekchüh to maangshikko ngaa, haoen shanga Soushouei ajanjan pendou kho maibü shanga ong thangyenko kümbuda.
Aishanga Shou kho chemdang yaangbüa jaishoubou yingtila Mühghaüei shangieda haoeibü shuong pienkei hoba hao shou phatko nayeila shanga shangjinkei.
Haoei kho tegü shangjinbü shuong kho haoei ngaankei; haoei ngaanbü shuong hao thedanga mat maitikei; hoba haoei mat maitibü shuong kho haoeibü soneikangbü to leibakei.
Khülonga senei kho ainei thontila? Mühghaü kho sen shanga yingsije, sen khulimbo ao ki?
Haoei hao shou maimai asenet lausikei haoei hao sen pendou shanga kuan apbei. Hobaje haoei khün sühko kümenalonga, haoei sen la ajanjan pendou khei ong akulep lo?
Mühghaüei pienbü shuong khulimbo aoei shedbü sungbala? Mühghaüei sen tangtikuda.
Aoei attila? Khrista Jisu ao haikei, khei ayingsi ao haibü ka langngaikei, kho Khrista Jisu kho Mühghaü maenei ki, hoba haoei sen nyena sukujakuda.
Khrista sanou ka sen aiei bangtila? Khonku, maangshat, ayingsi shieinangeibüei sai? Ayingsi mühsinou, mütkongbü, hoba haibü thushedei sai?
Laishiba damenashi:
“Kan laüa kün chaseko haitida;
kün haitilabü sanshuong hima weeida.”
Aying, khübü pendou khünei sen to aoei sanouda hao danko, sen hau kiko thükenbü shuong ki.
Aishanga haibü ayingsi langkeibü yingashi, khuthük hangangbü ayingsi shabü satan haukei yingashi, toubü ayingsi loulabü thueikei yingashi, seisi- huon kibü shuongkei yingashi,

müha kibü soushou ayingsi yemlam kabü soushou shuongkei yingashi, mühnyuei küplepbü phanga kibü aieikei Bunyubou Khrista Jisu danko tang khittibü Mühghaü sanou ka sen bangtila athüklabü dogo ngei chong- chingko ngeakei.
Ngei Khristan che tegü ngühmai lauda; ngo ayepeida. Ngeibü dambüei kü to thuida hoba ho Soushou Saopobüei lomakei.
Ngeibü maangpon ngangbü hoba athonenbü khonkuei shenakei.
Hoei ong ngeibü jaisinasi, ngeibü phe hoba ngeibü sii to thuida laubü che tegüje, ngei Khrista ka lepde bangan, Mühgaü khüksiuok phanga kilabü lele welauankei kikhoulabü.
Haoen Israelbü ki; Mühghaüei haoen kho haoshousi la lela pienkei, haoen la haoeibü soneikangbü lenkei, haoen la theyolanyobü kukei, Ngühkhüm kukei, lemshang chem hoba theletbü kukei;
boukim shuong kho haoeneibü hoba müt aedang kaje Messiakei haoen ka loukei. Ao pendou thüka Mühghaü ki hao thon akiko sangshi. Amen.
Mühghaü theletbü kho aloushadkei dogo aying; aishanga Israel ka thenjung loubü shuong pendou kho tükdebüei Israelbü ji.
Ayingsi Abraham thensilen kho hao shousi shuong dogoje aweeida; aishanga “Ho Isak shousi shuong ka kaibü thensilen kho nyenlabü”,
tetlabü kho Mühghaü shousi shuong dogo nyenlabü kho kaodak hangsilam aeka thenbü kho aying; haoeibü tükdebü thensilen khoje,
“Pienbü jihsiphaia ngo loulabü hoba Saraei bousu shou che buklabü,” dogo theletbü phaia bukbü shuong ong ki.
Lausikei kho ong aying, Rebekaeibü shousi shuongeibü boukei seneibü pi Isak kho ong kikei.
Lankei, haoen abukjinei hoba amai maibü ai angejineithama
jaishoubouei nashoubou khangenlabü dogo sao to lenteikei. Kho Mühghaüei haoei ong ngada dogo lenla shanga pienbü ngühkhüm khangenbü yingan kiteikei.
Laishibaei lauda, “Ngei Jakob to sanoukei, lausikei ngei Esau mangsenkei.”
Khülonga senei lai thontila? Mühghaü matjem kho ngühmaang alanbü sai? Khei ji!
Aishanga haoei Mosa to laukei, “Ngei aoto sanoulaje hao to sanoulabü hoba ngei ao to onoulaje hao to onoulabü.”
Hibü, ajanjan pendou kho, mütei maangangbü ayingsi haang longbü danko aying lausikei Mühghaüeibü onoubüa ong nongakei.
Haoei Farao la Laishibaa lenbü tegü, “Ngei no kho ailaje aying lausikei no danko ngeibü sei lenlabü hoba kaodak pendoua kü nyen ngeentila shanga longtikei.”
Khülongaje haoei müt che to sanou lenmang sühsi haoei khei kümda, hoba haoei ateibü ngüm kaangtimang sühalonga haoei kho kümda.
Kanei kü to laulabü, “Khei yinganje haoei aila müt la shedbü kuda? Aoeicheje hao ngüh lulimbei si?”
Lausikei no, thüngathamabü müt che ong yingan, Mühghaü to jongaienlabü lele ao ki? Kümenbü peisilei cheei khoeibü kümbou to “Nyi ngo aila hainyu kümbei?” dogo lenenlep si?
Chak yaübü cheei jeteibü shungkung thamdak ka che namton juongbou hoba cheje shibou dogo kümla hau ki aying lo?

Hobaje Mühghaüei kho tegü ong kümda ji si? Haoeije haoeibü khauang maangpok kho lenmang sühsikei hoba haoeibü seisihau ngetimang sühsikei, leilutila lamlean kibü “Haoeibü khauang maangpok nyekchüh” kho haoei aeibou haisühko natenkei.
Hobaje haoei ho, haoeibü onoubü nyekchüh aenei, haoeibü soneikangbü lamlean phokubü shuong shanga, haoeibü onoubü keisiyang tang khittila shanga kümbei,
hoba haoei Jihudabü yoka ong aying lausikei Küksithang yoka ngaanbü khübü haoeibü onou nyekchüh shuong kho sen ki.
Haoei Hosea lea lenbü tegü,
“Ngei kü müt ayingbü mütshuong pendou to
‘ngeibü mütshuong’ dogo ngalabü,
hoba asanoubü sao to ‘ngei sanounyu’ dogo ngalabü.
Hobaje ho haüthüklabü, lanei haoen to:
‘Kan ngeibü müt shuong aying,’ dogo lauan ki
khüneitham haoen to ‘langkeibü Mühghaü shousi shuong’
dogo ngalabü.”
Hobaje Isaiaei Israel shanga hai phinthonda, “Israelbü kho yungko kabü phetsen tegü awekhümbo shangasikei, shibou ong khümenlabü;
haoei ai kümlabü dogo lauda kho kaodaka Bunyubouei tongde hoba jemetshouko kümlabü.”
Isaiaei shaangbou lea lenan kibü tegü,
“Khuthük Lakoubü shuongeibü Bunyubouei
sen la thensilen at üpyoku tegüje,
sen Sodom tegü hoba Gomora tegütham kikhoulabou.”
Khülonga senei haka ai lai thontila? Küksithang aoyouei Mühghaü to phenyola shanga dambo akitei, haoenei mailem ka longbü phenyobü che hapbei.
Lausikei, Israelbü aoyouei kho tegübü phenyobü akuenlabü ngühkhüm to chüheiko kikei, haoenei ladangkei kheibü ngühkhüm kho ühüpou.
Aiei? Aishanga haoenei khübü phenyobü kho mailem danko aying lausikei haoenei kümenleienbü danko hapla haujembei.
Hobaje kho laang khünei haoen phaiyetkei. Laishibaei lenbü tegü:
“Chühashi, ngei Ziona müt phaiyetlabü laang che,
haoen phaiyettilabü laangdak che khünda;
lausikei aoei hao to mailemda (ao laangdak ki)
haoei hao ladangkei angangtilabü.”
Kü shangaje, jaisinasi shuong, ngei ngeibü maangpon pendouei aeibou waangda hoba haoen khümentila shanga Mühghaü to welauda.
Haoenei Mühghaü shanga maangdakbü yaang kia dogo ngei aukabü kula thükakei lausikei kho ditenbü akiko yingkei.
Mühghaüei müt hao thedanga lai mat maitida kho haoenei angekei hoba haoenei haoen lolo lam at lamenla haujembei.
Aishanga Khristaei mailem kibü shuong pendou Mühghaü junga mat maitibü danko ngühkhümeibü nyekchüh kho khümbo wantia.
Ngühkhüm jungeibü danko loushedbü Mühghaü junga mat maitibü shanga Mosaei hai doakei khei müt atei ngühkhüm jungeibü ka thük hapalonga, hao kho phenyobü khünei kilabü.
Lausikei mailem danko loushadbü phenyobü shanga Mosaei hai lauda; “Khuthük to ao angla?” dogo nyi jembü lolo telau, (khei laubü kho Khrista leiyanlabü ngüh ki),
ayingsi “Yemkhünyet to ao yanla?” dogo telau, (kho Khrista haibü ka nyibou sungailabü ngüh ki.)
Haoei ai lauda? “Ngüh kho kan junga kia, kaneibü sembunga hoba kaneibü maangpona ki.” Künei phinthonbü ho Mühghaü ngüh ki:
khei nyi Jisu kho Bunyubou dogo tang khittialongaje, hoba Mühghaüei hao haibü ka langngaitikei dogo maangphanga mailemsije, no khümenlabü;
aishanga müt cheei Mühghaü thedanga mat maitila shanga maangpona mailemjan, hoba khümenlabü shanga haoei haoeibü mailem kho tang khittijan.
Laishibaei lenda, “Hao to mailembü aokei akongtilabü.”
Jihudabü si Grikbü kanglanga aikei janyinbü aki, aishanga pendoueibü Bunyubou che ong ki hoba haoeibü thuibü maangshikko ngabü shuong pendou shanga hao apsileko keiakei.
Aishanga “Bunyubou nyena ngabü shuong pendou khümenlabü.”
Lausikei hao to maije alemnyu hao nyena ngalabü shuong kho ao ki? Hao shangaje aditnyu hao to mailemlabü kho ao ki?
Hobaje haoen ohautinyu mütshuongei lai songlenla? Laishibaei laubü tegü, “Ngühlang maibü künbabü shuongeibü youyaü lai he maikei!”
Pendoueije Ngühlang Maibü to maang aku. Isaiaei lauda, “Bunyubou, küneibü ngühlang to aoei mailembei?”
Hibü mailem kho ditla maangdakbü ka louda hoba ditletbü kho Khrista shanga lenbü ngüh ki.
Lausikei ngei phekei, Ho mütshuongei ditoulabü jih maibü ühüpoubü ka sai? Maimaitham haoenei ditoua.
“Songlenbou shuongeibü langh
kaodak pendou to haukei,
hoba haoeneibü ngüh kaodak thon sühko aakei.”
Ngei tokei phekei, “Ho Israelei aditenbü kaje teyingkaoba?” Mosaei laubü shaang ditshi: “Ngei kan phang ayingbü che la nyekto shattilabü, ngei ngoubüloubü phang che kan to khau angtilabü.”
Isaiaei maangei natko lauda, “Ngo alambü mütshuongei ngo hapoukei, kü shanga aphebü mütshuong junga ngo loushadkei.”
Lausikei Israel shanga haoei hai lauda, “Ngühtokbü hoba kü khulimbü mütli to subüjabüa ngei chalou sünga ngeibü ik shingkei.”
Khülonga ngei ho pheda. Mühghaüei hao mütli shingekkei sai? Ladangkei aying! Ngokei Israelbü che hoba Benjamin phang kabü Abraham shisishousi che ki.
Mühghaüei hao mütli ashingek; shangiednyu haoei haoen kho haoeibü dogo sungleda. Laishibaa Elijaei Mühghaü to Israel khulimbo subüjabü kho kanei angekei lo?
“Bunyubou, haoenei kaibü thuseibü shuong haitia hoba kaibü lemshon pankhümbua; ngo ong joukei hoba haoenei ngokei haitila haujemda.”
Lausikei Mühghaüei hao to lai jongaikei? “Ngei kü shanga Baal to akhüpetbü mütshuong müt hajar nyet phoakei.”
Tokei kho tegü ong ki: Mühghaüeibü onouei pienbü müt ikmok che thüng jouda;
hoba ho onoubüei yingsije touje hoei haoenei kümenleienbü to aikei nongan aki, khei aying longaje onoubü kho ai onoubü jim akilabü.
Khülongaje ai? Israelei saoei lameibü kho ühüpen; lausikei pienbü danei ong ho hapenkei; jouletbü shuong khoje Mühghaüei subüjabü kho ashenko yeitikei.
Laishibaei lenbü tegü:
“Mühghaüei haoen tat chalou sühko,
haplabü nyekei ühüptiko hoba ditlabü nouei
adittiko maia phambo ngoutikei.”
Dawidei lauda,
“Haoeneibü nyishoubü shausiyungei,
haoen tuongtiko hoba haoen to haklangümla,
ngühlaushang haptiko tin
hoba sung chela ong yeitishi.
Haplabü ka thangetko,
haoeneibü nyek kho thutishi.
Haoeneibü shenjang athakko khüpettishi.”
Maimaitham haoenei ladangkei akümetlabü lele shedtikei sai? Kheikei aying! Haoen phaiyetbü hangshong Jihudabüei haoen to nyek to shattila shanga khümenbü kho küksithang jungto louan apbei.
Haoen phaiyetbü kho kaodak shangaje ku yingalonga, hoba haoenei athük hapbü kho Küksithang shangaje ku yingalongaje, haoeneibü khümbobü ngüha lebü langkeije latetche yingla!
Tou kan Küksithang shuong shanga ngüh che: Ngo Kükeithangeibü youkoikjai che yingkei, ngei
ngei thükthüng küphanga atje nyek to shatko yeitila hoba kho danko haoen atje khümentila shanga thükpangteiko khangenbü pendouei haujemda.
Haoen shingekbü tetlabü kho kaodak pendou Mühghaü to phenyotikei longaje, haoen sungletngaibü khoje khei haibü songdak thona dogo laulabü to liman ai tetlabü ki?
Wenon hanbü che ong shakan Mühghaü la lemasikei, tükdebüeije wen pendou khokei saopobü ki. Bunyu li kho saopobü yingalonga, bhek khokei saopobü ki.
Oliv bubhek at ngokan apan hoba yambabü oliv (kho, kan Küksithang) bu kheletbü at sapyokei hoba khei li si oliv bu-dei senbala thükan ki.
Lausikei kho bhek shanga yongtelam! Nyi khei yonglammang sühalonga ho damashi, nyi li thounouda ji lausikei liei no thounouda.
Nyi laulabü hang, “Bhekshuong kho ngokkhümbei, khoei ong ngo sapyokei.” Haü, khokei tükde ong.
Ho aieilausi haoen mailem akibü ka haoen “pakngokkei,” hoba kan mailem kibüei tou bunyu phejan atla yeiakei. Lausikei yonganje tesungen; maangsangashi.
Mühghaüei haangabü bhekshuong kho üemen tegüje haoei kan aila khei ong phokula?
Mühghaü kho lai sanoubü si maang amaibü thaman ki; atetbü shuong shanga maang amaibou, hoba kanei hao sunglet shongko kan shanga sanoubou ki. Kanei ngüha alelonga, kankei khei chengan aplabü.
Maimaitham, Jihudabü shuongkei haoen ngühmaang alanko ong akilongaje, haoenkei “thenngaikulabü.” Mühghaüei kho kümla thükakei.

Aishanga kan Küksithang shuong kaneibü hao- hangkabü yambabü oliv bulong ka chengan sungkei hoba hao hang ayingbü mouenbü oliv bunyu to sapyokei longaje, khülonga Jihudabü haohang oliv bulong to sapyola aeiko latetche sola!

Jaisinasi shuong, hanei huphang kabü ngühmai kia hoba kanei ho ngejan dogo ngei damda; ngei damda hoei kan sungen yaangenbü ka satentilabü. Huphang ngüh kho ho, khei Israelbü kho laulabüei ngoualoua apbei hoba Küksithang shuong pendou alotkhüm shongko haoen jamde khei kiteilabü;
ho Israelbü pendou lai khümenlabü kho shanga ki. Ho doakei:
“Zion ka Leiyenbou kho loulabü,
haoei Jakob ka haoeibü saopobü kümsilei
pendou apbulabü.
Ho ngei haoeneibü shabü apbunyet,
haoen to theyolanyolabü kho ki.”

Ngühlangmaibü lenbü ka loushedbü tegü Jihudabü shuong Mühghaüeibü dangbü la yeikei, hoba kan Küksithang shuong ku pailetbü shuong ki; lausikei Mühghaüei haoen pienkei hoba haoeneibü pisibou nyena haoen kho athakko haoeibü ki.
Aishanga haoei ladang müt at ngabada hoba haükuda, Mühghaüei kho shanga haoeibü dambü ajaksheida.
Jih chenei kanei Mühghaü to ngüha ale lausikei Jihudabü lenbü aditbü danko tou kanei onoubü sungletakei.
Kho tegü ong, kanei onoubü sungletbüei haoen tou ngüha aleyoko ki, lausikei kho to liman haoeneikei tou onoubü sungletla thükkei.
Aishanga haoei pendou to onoubü lenenla shanga, Mühghaüei müt pendou kho haoen lulueibü lenbü phanga khinlepakei.
Mühghaüeibü keisiyaang, songsihon hoba hapbüngebü latetche yaangkei! Haoei matjemda lausikei aoei kho lenenla? Hao hao lama kümdaleida lausikei kho aoei phanenla?
“Aoei Bunyuboueibü maangpon ngekei?
Hao to songlenla ao kian chühkei?
Mühghaüei hao la shemmailabü lele,
hao la aoei ai kuan chühkei?”
Aishanga ajanjan pendou haoei kümbei, hoba ajanjan pendou hao danko hoba hao shanga lang kida. Ponpen shanga Mühghaü to soneikangbü yingshi. Amen.
Hibü jaisinasi shuong, Mühghaüei sen to aeibou sanouabü, kaneibü mang kho langkei lembüsabü, saopobü hoba sungletenlabü lele lemashi dogo ngei kan to sudajada.

Kaodak hangsilam ae teyei lausikei kaneibü maangpon haanbü che la yeingaibü danko kaneibü langkei jakshaishi; kheijinei kanei Mühghaüei maangangbü, ai to maibü, sungletenlabü hoba penbüsoubü, dogo lauda kho ditenlabü.
Aishanga Mühghaüei kü la onoubü kubü danko ngei mütpem weko to jembü shanga aei ashamla shanga lenda; kanei Mühghaüei kan mütpem weko la kubü mailem to takteian chühko eaaoa damshi.
Mütmang chenei lulu phejan kümbo küksihuo juongnyu ki.
Kho tegütham, juong yingasikei, Khrista to phenyoan, mang che la yeida, hoba sen lulu yingasikei cheei che to küksihuo la yeian ki.
Sen la kubü onoubü thüng seneibü soushou jongsakkei lulu lulu ki. Jongsak kho thusei ngüh yingalonga, senei ho seneibü mailem tetei jungeikho;
ho khangenbü jongsak yingan kialonga senei khünei sen lolo khümbo kukho; lenbou cheei haoeibü jongsak kho lenbüa jungeijan;

ao to thungeijangeilabü jongsak ki haoei kho khünei jungeijan; müto janyola jongsak kibouei kho maangshikko janyojan. Aoyou songdak haua ki haoenei maangdakbü lenjan; aoyouei müto sanou lenda khokei olinangko kümashi.
Sanou kho takshatjan. Amaibü mangsenshi hoba maibü hatlepshi.
Cheei che to tükdebü chempen sanou lenshi; soumo kuyobüa cheei che shaangtiashi.
Kaibü maangdakbü tekouti; Soushoua sekokan kishi. Bunyubou khangenbüa hautaknepshi.
Maanglema olinshi. Shieinangeibü natenshi. Welaua kaangashi.
Mühghaü khangenbü shuong akialebü to thuishi; ponpendou yensiau to maishi.
Kan shieikoebü shuong haükushi; haü, haükushi hoba haoen to tekhüktuok.
Olinbü shuong yoa olinyoshi, haapbü shuong yoa haapyoshi.
Kan yoa dambü jiyoan kishi; tühang teyaangen lausikei hanbü shuong to paplepashi. No sangbüdobü shanga ong dameiko teki.
Amaibü jeila amaibü tekungai. Pendouei maiakei dogo chühlabü kümsilei kümla ong nyek theashi.
Thükalonga nyije pendou to sangmaia kishi.
Phoktelam, küthangbou shuong, lausikei soushou khauang maangpok shanga apyoshi; aishanga Laishibaei lauda, “Phoklambü kho küshangabü; ngei shemmeilabü, dogo Bunyubouei lauda.”
Aying, kaibü dangbou mühei haialonga oknyinashi; hao dei laalonga hao la inashi; khei jungeibü danko nyi haoeibü khua wankak yasebü kho kushaikuda.
Amaibü la no tethükti, lausikei amaibü kho maibüla thüktiashi.
Mütpem weko hao thükkabü songdak hau phanga kijan, aishanga hau kho Mühghaü ka louda hoba songdaka kibü shuong kho Mühghaüei heenkei.
Hibü aoyouei songdak khulimlaje haoenei Mühghaüei pienbü lulimda hoba khei kümbü shuongei haoen lolo matjem senbada.
Matjembü shuong kho maibü kümbü shuong shanga aying lausikei shedtiyatibü shuong shanga hatlabü ki. Nyi songdaka kibü müt to hatbü ka satenmang sühda sai? Maibü kümashi hoba haoei no sanglabü.

Aishanga kan maila yaangla shanga haoei Mühghaü khangenda. Lausikei nyi ajanbü kümsije no hatlabü ki, aieilausi haoei amlangbüa in ajungeida. Hao kho Mühghaüeibü sambü hoba amaibü kümbü shuong la khauang maangpok sungbabou phoklambü peisilei che ki.
Hibü soushou khauang maangpok shanga ong aying lausikei kaibü sensimaang shangakei phangto atkulabü song.
Khoei ong kanei khümkei kuda; aishanga Mühghaüeibü sambü shuong tegü songdakbü shuongei haoen lolo kho nyekchüh shanga khümbo kuyoda.
Nyi sangh ai ong thekei, sangkhüm yamkhüm hoba hatbü si soumo tegübü pendou mütpem weko la haoei muthüng kungaiashi.
Kaibü haübü sanou phejan to liman aolakei matsangh tethe; aishanga aoei müto sanouda haoei ngühkhüm loushadtida.
Aishanga “Nyi asangalanbü teshon. Nyi müt tühaiti, Nyi tekok, Nyi temangsüh.” hoba lubü ngühkhüm pendou kho ho ngühlin hanei onshaiakei: “Nyi kalepbou to jembü lolo tegü sanouashi.”
Nyi ka lepbou to sanousije nyi hao shedtila athük; khoei ngühkhüm pendou kho sanoubüa loushatda.
Khübü kümjinei nyi janenlabü hoba no yepbü ka lakseplabü jih süha dogo ngeenjan; aishanga khümenbü kho senei shaangla songlebü toje tou aei nyangbou ki.
Nangnak lounyu dana; change phamla nyangakei. Senei nakthühbü kümsilei apyojan hoba sen lolo ngesakbü insiaubu jungjan.
Seneibü hangsilam kho change to jibü yingjan; senei tomyolakyobü hoba yungan khuyo ngümyobü tekikho, jakbümakbü hoba pejapelabüa aying, oyophetyobü hoba nyekto shat- yobüa aying;
lausikei Bunyubou Jisu Khrista kaneibü hele la yeitishi hoba sii si pheei dühbü senyühshemtila dambü apyoashi.
Müt che haoeibü mailema hau akibü khokei ka yoto leiyetashi lausikei kho hao to ngüh wetyolabü shanga aying.
Müt cheeibü mailem kho hai kia khei haoei haüpangteiko shaula thükkei; lubü cheje mailema hau aki, hoba haoei pikshik ong shauda.
Pendou ajemtenko shaubouei khei ashaubou la tenyiku; hoba takü ashaubouei che kho ashajan, aieilausi Mühghaüeije hao sungleda.

Müeibü sambü cheeibü mat jembo pailabü lele no ao? Hao tang khitlabü ayingsi aditlabü lele matjemlabü kho haoeibü chembubou ki. Hobaje haoei thükenlabü aieilausi Bunyubouei hao khei yingtila thükan ki.
Müt cheei nyetchebü chalou kho nyishoubü to aei kongnyubou dogo damda; müt cheeije chalou pendou kho jetei dogo damda. Mütpem wekoei jembüeibü dambüa maisho loenjan.
Aoei chalou aeila sungenan nouda haoei kho maangphanga Bunyubou to liko nouda; hoba aoei shauda yungda haoeikei maangphangaje Bunyubou to liko shauda, aishanga haoei Mühghaü la nyensang kuda.
Hobaje aoei shaubü yungbü ka bangenda khokei maangphangaje Bunyubou to liko kümda; aieilausi haoeikei Mühghaü la nyensang kuda.
Sen aokei hao shanga ongje ühangda hoba aokei hao shanga ongje ühaida.
Sen lang kialongaje kho Bunyubou shanga kida, hoba sen haisije kho Bunyubou shanga haida. Kholonga langsikei haiasikei sen Bunyuboueibü ki.
Khoei ong hao haibü si langbü hameibü Bunyubou yeila shanga Khrista haikei hoba langngaikei.
Nyi aila kaibü jaisina nyikuda? Aishanga sen pendou Mühghaü matjembü setshang junga lolabü.
Laishibaei lauda:
“Ngo ki shongko, dogo Bunyubouei lauda,
mütpem wekoei kü junga khüpetlabü,
hoba mütpem wekoei Mühghaü nyen sanglabü.”
Hibü sen mütpem wekoei Mühghaü la lulu shangabü lenlabü.
Hibü senei cheei cheeibü mat jemyobü thakakho, nyi kathangboueibü haanga aikei toketkhi- petlabü ayingsi phaiyetlabü aikei aphokula shanga maangpon kümetashi.
Ngo Bunyuboueibü yingsije aikei asaopobü aki dogo ngei khümbomeiko sungletenda; lausikei müt atei ho asaopobü dogo damsi ong kho asaopobü ki.
Shaueiyungei nyi kathangbou ngangtia longa, nyi hao thedanga sanouko ajungeida. Kaibü shausiyung danko ao shanga Khrista haikei, hao la leilubü tesungba!
Ka shanga ai janbü dogo dambei kho müyomüyanga amaibüla yeiko alaueitila maangsangashi.
Mühghaü sangle khoje shaubü yungbü aying; ho Soushou Saopobü ka loubü saopobü, sangmai hoba olinbü ki.
Aoyouei Khrista khei khangenda haoenei Mühghaü ka maangshikbü hapda hoba müt thedangakei nyenmai hapda.
Hibü senei aiei ong sangmai longtida hoba seneibü thechüh hangsilam hau kitida kho shiakho.
Shausiyung aoa Mühghaü kümsilei teleiluti. Shausiyung pendou kho shaula sombü yingla thükkei lausikei ho danko müt at mailema tuongettilabü yoan kialonga shausiyung pendou kho shedbü.
Kho danko kajai kana senyüh ashemtilabü kialonga nyi phe ashauko apbü ayingsi ayungko nangbü kho ong khaibou.
Kaibü boushou mailem kho Mühghaü kasi kanglanga ong jungeiashi. Ao mütei hao shanga janbü dogo maileman kümbüleibüei hao la shedbü akungaida kho müt olinbou.
Lausikei aoei maanga shuko shauda yungda haoei shedbü shona, aieilausi haoeibü kümsilei kho haoeibü mailem ka longbü aying; ai ong mailem ka alongda kho shabü ki.
Sen aoyou mailema hau ki haoenei hau akibü to thuijan hoba jembü shanga ongje adamjan.
Sen mütpem wekoei jembü lepbü sangmang maila yaangla shanga damjan hoba jilaphailabü lamjan.
Aishanga Khristaeikei hao shangaje adam. Laishibaei lenbü tegü, “Ka to khükbüokbü shuongeibü ngüh kho khuthüka shatkei,”
Ngühmai maanglan hoba Laishiba ka hau hapbü danko senei maanglem kitilabü lele shangiednyu Laia ai ong dokei kho sen la lenla shanga dokei.

Kanei maang- pon chela lean hoba ngüh cheei liko seneibü Bunyubou Khrista Jisueibü Bou Mühghaü sanglabü lele maang lemenbü hoba hau pendou bakshang Mühghaüei, kan la Jisu Khrista to kibü jibüphaibü sensimaang kushi.
Kholongaje, Khristaei kan sungletbü tegü, Mühghaü soneikangbü shanga kanei cheei che sungletyoshi.

Aishanga ngei lenda, khei shaangla, boukim shuong to theyolanyobü kho shangashattila shanga, Küksithang la Mühghaü nyen sangtilabü lele, Khrista kho Mühghaüeibü ngühmaanglanbü aukabü kulabü lele Jihudabü sambü la yeikei. Laishibaei lenbü tegü,
“Hibü ngei Küksithang yoa kan sanglabü.
Ngei ka nyen sangbü chia laulabü.”
Nyiboubüa lauda,
“Kan Küksithang shuong,
hao mütshuong yoa liko olinyoshi.”
Tokei lauda,
“Kan Küksithang shuong,
Bunyubou sangshi,
mütli shuong pendouei hao sangshi.”
Tokei Isaiaei lauda,
“Küksithang thüka songdakla shanga Jesse thensilen longlabü;
hao to Küksithangei maanglemlabü.”
Mühghaü ao maanglem pakshang ki haoei kan hao to kibü mailem danko kan pendou olinbü hoba sangmaiei shentishi; Soushou Saopobü hau danko kan maanglemei sopbojaiko shentishi.
Küjai künasi shuong, ngei ai atoknokko mailemda khei kan pendou maibüei ong shenan, ajanjan pendou hapan ngean, hoba cheei che thungeijangeiyola aeibou thükan minan kilabü.
Lausikei kan la ngühnyek at damentila shanga temtemaje ngei kan jungto kaangshangko doa.
Ngei kho kü la Mühghaüei kubü onoubü,

laobouei ngo Jisu Khrista danko Küksithangeibü sambü la yeitikei kho onoubü danko kümbei. Küksithang shuong to Soushou Saopobüei saüenkubü danko Mühghaü Ngühlang Maibü songlenlabü ho ngeibü ungshed kümsilei ki.
Hibü Mühghaü khangenbüa ngei Khrista Jisua soneikangda.
Ngei ong maang yaangenko laukho laualonga lubü ai aying lausikei ngo danko Küksithang shuong ngüha letila shanga Khristaei ai kümbei kho ong ki. Ngei, haoei ngühei hoba kümeileiei ai kümbei,

sei danko lenbü amaaphilabü hoba maang- panglabü shuong, hoba soushou sei shanga laulabü ki. Hibü khoei ngei Jerusalem ka khangan Illirikuma sühko Jisu Khristaeibü Ngühlang Maibü songlenbüei sühlangtia.
Aishanga müei yaüenbü aoeibü chemshang thükakei ahuongyola shanga, ngei ponpendou lanei ong Khristaeibü nyen ladangkei aditoukei khünei Ngühlangmaibü lenla kho ngeibü nyekchüh,
Laishibaei laubü tegü,
“Aoyouei haoeibü ngühlang aki haoenei haplabü,
hoba aoyouei ladangkei adit haoenei ditenlabü.”
Khoei ong ngo kan jungto loula kibü ka ponpendou thekei.
Ai ai yingsikei, ngei ho kommanga ngei thükbü pendou küma, hoba po juongnyu ngei kan to haüyola chüheiko kibü yingsije
ngo Spain to hauena longa, ngei kan khünei dantoyoko haüyolabü dogo damda. Shaangla ngei jih tuisho shanga kan to haüyoan olinyolabü hoba ngo haujinei kan la thuitimang sühda.
Lausikei, ngo touje Mühghaü mütshuong to thuila shanga ngo Jerusalem to hauda.
Aishanga Makedonia si Akhaia lashong danei Jerusalema kibü Mühghaü mütshuong shale khonsakbü to thuila ajanjan helatakla shanga janenakei.

Ho haoeneibü janenbü ong kiteikei-lausikei tükdebüei ho haoeneibü kümsilei ki! Aishanga haoenei Jihudabüeibü soushou haülabü janyokei longa, haoenei Jihudabü to akialebüa kaodak haülabüakei shakyo jan- yojan.
Hibü ladang ngei ho kümsilei ho wanlaje hoba haoenei takshadbü nam kho kuan aplaje, ngo Spain to haulamto ngei kan to haüyolabü.
Ngei ngeakei ngo ladang kan jungto loulaje kheijinei ngo Khristaeibü haülabüei manan loulabü.
Jaisinasi shuong, kanei ngo longyobü thunang hanei thuishi, hoba kü nyena Mühghaü to welaukushi dogo ngei Soushou jongsak sanou hoba seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista nyena sudajada.
Tokei ngo Jihudaa kibü maialembü shuongeibü ikmang ka khümentila hoba ngei Jerusalem pheian chühbü ho Mühghaü mütshuongei sungletenlabü che yingtishi dogo welaukushi.
Hibü, Mühghaüei maangangbü yingsije, ngo kan jungto olinangko lousühlabü hoba kan yoa haksolabü.
Sangmai kubou Mühghaü kan pendou yoa kishi. Amen.
Ngei kan jungto Kenkhra lashonga khangennyu seneibü nousina Foebe hautikuda.

Sao kho Khristan yen che tegü hoba Mühghaü mütli che tegü mubü hangalama sungletashi hoba saoei kaneibü thuibü mangsühbü pendoua thuishi; sao kho, ngokei yoan müt juong shanga thuibü yaangbü che yingan kikei.
Jisu Khrista khangenbü thangjama kü to liko khangenbü Priska si Aquila ham la ngeibü salem lenshi;
haoenei ngeibü langkei shanga haoeneibü ngüm thokukei. Ngo ong ayingko Küksithang lashong dan pendouei haosi to olinda.
Tokei chema kamshaibü lashong to kei ngeibü salem lenshi.
Asiaa Khrista jungto maangpon sepeibü shaangbou Epaeneta to salem lenshi.
Kan shanga haujembo kümbuleikunyu Mari to salem lenashi.
Kü yoa shaangla thüngdanga kibü Jihudabü thangbou Andronika si Junia to salem lenshi. Haosi kho youko- ikjai shuong yoa nyenshen hoba kü to shaangbou Khristan yingkei.
Bunyubou khangenbüa küthangbou Ampliata la ngeibü salem kushi.
Khrista khangenbüa sen liko kümbouleibou Urbana, hoba ngeibü sanoubü thangbou Stakhi to salem lenshi.
Apelle to salem lenshi, shieikoean natenbü Khristan kho hao ki! Aristobula chemdang to salem lenshi.
Küthangbou Jihudabü Herodion to salem lenshi. Khristan yeibü Narkissa chemdang to salem lenshi.
Bunyubou seka haujembo khüpbou Trifaena si Trifasa la salem lentida. Bunyubou khangenbüa haujembo kümbou ngei sanoubü thangbou Persis la salem lenshi.
Nyenshen Khristan Rufo si haonyu, ao künyulakei yeikei, haosi ham to salem lenshi.
Asinkrita, Flegon, Herme, Patroba Herma hoba haoen yokabü likobü Khristan shuong pendou la salem ngetida.
Filologa hoba Julea, Nerea si haona, hoba Olimpa hoba hao yoa kibü Mühghaü mütshuong pendou to salem ngetida.
Cheei che to saopobü salem leyoshi. Khrista lashong dan pendouei kan la haoeneibü salem küntida.
Jaisinasi shuong, kanei sungletbü lenbü to ajiko janyinbü longtibü, hoba müt hau thettibü khübü khüto maangsangko chühko kila shanga ngei kan to sudajada. Haoen apyoshi

aishanga kheibü mütshuongei seneibü Bunyubou Khrista akhangenda, lausikei haoeneibü shiang shanga kümda. Haoenei müt la mailemtilabü songlen hoba ngüh teibüei müteibü shedbü akibü maangpon huonettida.
Mütpem wekoei kanei Ngühlangmaibü to ngüha lebü shangabü dida. Ngo kan shanga aeibou olinda; lausikei ngei kaneibü maangpon kho amaibü to akheinepbo maibü la kuan aptimang sühda.
Hobaje sangmai kubou Mühghaüei Satan kho kaneibü you phanga nakeitilabü. Bunyuboueibü onou kan yoa kishi.
Küsi liko kümbou Timoti, hoba kü mütli Lukia, Jason hoba Sosipaterei kan la salem lentida.
(Ngo, Tershiaei ho le doletkei; ngei kan jungto Khristan sanou salem küntida).
Kü yenbou hoba lashong pendoueibü yensühbou Gaiaei salem lentida. Sangnyu namthanbou Erasta hoba haona Quarta haosiei kan la salem küntida.
(Seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista onou kan pendou yoa kishi. Amen).
Senei tou, Mühghaü, ao to ong songsido ki, hao la Jisu Khrista danko soneikangbü kukho. Mühghaüei kan anyaakeiko lotila thükakei. Ho ngei Jisu Khrista shanga phinthonko songlenbü
Ho le, Khrista Jisu youkoikjai che yeila Mühghaüei maangangbüa ngabou Paul, hoba jaisina Sosthena ka,

Korinta Mühghaü lashong jungto. Kaoen pendoua haoeneibü hoba seneibü Bunyubou, Bunyubou Jisu Khrista nyena ngabü shuong pendou yoa kan Khrista Jisua phangche pienan phokei hoba Mühghaü mütshuong yingla ngaankei.
Seneibü Bou Mühghaü hoba Bunyubou Jisu Khrista ka kan jungto onou hoba hakso yingshi.
Ponpendou kan shanga ngei kü Mühghaü nyen sangda. Khrista Jisua kan la kubü onou shanga ngei hao nyen sangda,
aishanga hao ajanjan pendoua keibü yeikei. Kanei hapbüngebü pendou kia, hoba ho wanenko laula thükakei,
aieilausi Khrista shangabü kaneibü ngühchung kan to kaangtikei.
Hibü kanei seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista tang khitbü haiyeijinei kan soushou jongsak aineikei akongkei.
Haoei kan seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista Chaloua shedbü akiko yeitila haoei kan thon sühko kaangtilabü.
Mühghaü, aoei kan hao Shou hoba seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista himjam to ngakei, hao maanglemenbü ki.
Jaisinasi shuong, seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista nyen danko ngei kan to sudajada; kan pendou sembung chela leshi; kan yoa janyinbü tekiti, lausikei maangpon hoba dambüa thepyen- ashi.
Aishanga ngeibü jaisinasi shuong, kan yoa oyophetyo kia dogo ngei Klo chemdang ka ngühlang ditletkei.
Ngei laubü kho ho: kan cheei “Ngo Pauleibü,” atei “Ngo Apoloeibü,” atei “Ngo Kaifaeibü,” hoba lubü atei “Ngo Khristaeibü,” dogo lauda.
Khrista janyinkei si? Paul kan shanga peiseia thüngkei si? Kan Paul nyena baptikei si?
Kan kü nyena baptikei dogo aoeikei alaulabü lele, Grispa si Gaya to liman kan yoa ngei aokei abaptikusi ngei Mühghaü nyen sangda.
Hobaje ngei Stefen chemdang baptikukei, khüto liman ngei aoche ongkei baptikulaoje ngei angekei.
Khristaei baptikula ohauti, lausikei Khrista peisei sei ngüh jim akibüla dogo haoei ngo lansanbüa Ngühlang Maibü songlenla hautikei.
Aishanga maubü lama kibü dan shanga peisei songlen kho ngoubü ngüh, lausikei sen aoyou khümenbü lama ki khübü shuong shanga Mühghaü sei.
Aishanga Laishibaei lauda,
“Songbüdobüeibü songsihon ngei mautikulabü,
hoba maangli maangsang songsido jim akitilabü.”
Songbüdobü müt lan ki? Ngühkhüm lenbou lan ki? Ho kaodaka ngüh wetyobou lan ki? Mühghaüei kaodak songsihon ngoubüla ayeiti lo?
Aishanga Mühghaü songsihona kaodakei jembü songsihon danko Mühghaü angesije, künei songlenbü ngoubü ngüh danko aoyouei mailemlaje haoen khümenla Mühghaü maangangbü kiteikei.
Jihudabüei amaaphilabü hida hoba Grikbüei songsihon lamda,
lausikei künei Jihudabü shanga phaiyetshang hoba Küksithang shanga ngoubü ngüh, peiseia thüngbü Khrista songlenda;
lausikei aoyou ngaan ki, Jihudabü si Grikbü ham shanga hao kho Khrista, Mühghaü sei hoba Mühghaü songsihon.
Aishanga Mühghaü ngoubü kho müt maangli maangsang to songsihon kibou hoba Mühghaü hau akibü kho müteibü hau to sekokbou.
Jaisinasi shuong, kan ngabü damanchühashi. Kan juongnyu thamje phea hapbüngebü aying, juongthamje hau kibü aying hoba juong thamje yaangenbüje aying;
lausikei Mühghaüei songbüdobü himou bautila kaodaka asangadobü pienkei, hoba Mühghaüei hau kibü shuong himoutila kaodaka ibünyaübü shuong pienkei;
ai peisilei ong ki kho lejim akibü yeitila shanga kaodaka hanbou, aweasüngbü hoba toukei ai peisilei ong aki, khübü kho Mühghaüei pienkei,
khei ao müteikei Mühghaü thedanga yong alamla shanga.
Haoeibü kümsilei danko Khrista Jisu kia hoba hao seneibü songsihon la yeibou kho Mühghaü ki. Mühghaüei sen hao to leiyenkei, hao mütshuong la yeitikei hoba angthetkei.
Hibü Laishibaei lenbü tegü, “Aoei yaangmang sühda, haoei Bunyubou shangabü yaangentiashi.”
Kho tegü, jaisinasi shuong, ladang ngo kan jungto loukei, sheten shanenbü ngüh ayingsi songsihon yaangbüei ngo kan jungto Mühghaü huphang ngüh phinthonla alou.
Ngo kan yoa kijinei Jisu Khrista, hoba hao peiseia thüngbü to liman ngei kan yoa lubü aikei ngela ajanen.
Ngo kan yoa ponpendou hau akibü hatbü hoba aeibou lühbüa kikei.
Hobaje kan mailema müteibü songsihona lotila shanga aying,
lausikei Mühghaü seia lola shanga, kü ngüh hoba ngeibü songlen suletbü songsihona aying, lausikei Soushou ngühchung hoba seia kikei.
Haü, küneikei chingbü yoa songsihon ngühyem jungeida, lausikei ho kaodak songsihon ayingsi kaodak songdakbü, aoyou lejim akibü la yeida, haoeneibü songsihon aying.
Lausikei laobou huan kibü songsihon Mühghaüei kaodak moyaüjinei thama sen soneikangtila shanga takletkukei, kho künei Mühghaü huphang ngüha lauda.
Ho kaodaka songdakbü aoeikei ho songsihon aditen; haoenei kho ditenkei tegüje, haoenei soneikangbü Bunyubou peiseia tethüngkhoulabü;
lausikei Laishibaei laubü tegü,
“Ai müteibü nyekei ühüp hoba nouei adit,
hoba müteibü maangpon to üt,
kho Mühghaüei hao sanoubü shuong la lamlekukei.”
Mühghaüei Soushou khübü kho sen jungto tang khittikei. Soushouei dambü pendou, khei Mühghaü dambü haübükei ngeda.
Aishanga müt to kibü soushou to liman müt yoa aoei müteibü dambü ngeda? Kho tegü Mühghaü Soushouei ong Mühghaü dambü ngeda.
Mühghaüei sen la lai ong onouko kukei kho ngelabü lele senei kaodak soushou asunglet lausikei Mühghaü ka loubü Soushou sungletkei.
Habü ho senei lauda, lausikei müteibü songsi- honei lenbü ngüh aying, lausikei Soushouei lenbü ngüha soushou dambü shuong soushou mütshuong la wanenko lenda.
Kaodak müt lansaneije Mühghaü Soushou hangsilam asungletda; aishanga khübü kho hao shanga lejim akibü ki; haoei khübü ditenla athük aieilausi khübü kho soushouei ong lenenda.
Soushou mütei ajanjan pendou takteiko jemenda, lausikei aoeikei haomat jemla athük.
Laishibaei laubü tegü,
“Maimaitham aoei Bunyubou maangpon ngekei?
Aoei hao la lenla?”
Lausikei sen to Khristaeibü maangpon ki.
Jaisinasi shuong, ngei kan yoa soushou müt yoa joyobü tegü joyola athükko kikei, lausikei phe mütshuong yoa tegü, hoba Khristaa nasak shuong to tegü ngei kan to joyokei.
Ngei kan kaangbü shausiyungei aying lausikei sendeiei sambei, aishanga kanei kho sungletla athük. Maimaitham toukei kanei athükda,
aishanga kan tou sühko phea ki. Kan yoa ladang nyekto shatbü hoba oyophetyo kida kheijinei kan phea kida ji lo? Kanei takübü müt che tegü apaida lo?
Aishanga ladang müt cheei, “Ngo Pauleibü” hoba lubü cheei “Ngo Apoloeibü” dogo lauda, kheijinei kan phea kida aying lo?
Apolo ai? Paul ai? Kün khangenbü dan, aoyou danko kanei mailembei. Mütpem weko la Bunyubouei janletkuan ki.
Ngei kekei, Apolo ei dei lakkei, lausikei Mühghaüei chingtikei.
Hibü kebou si dei lakbou ham ai aying; lausikei Mühghaüei chingtida.
Aoei kekei hoba aoei dei lakkei kho jambü, lausikei haoen mütpem wekoei jembü kümsilei thüng lulu jongsak haplabü.
Aishanga kün Mühghaü yoa jujambü shuong; hoba kan Mühghaü sek, Mühghaü chem.
Mühghaüei kü la kubü onou thüngei, songsido kibü konglebou chemdangbou che tegü ngei chem huongena; hoba atei kho thüka dangyoda. Lausikei mütpem wekoei haoei lai dangyodaje maangsangashi.
Aishanga laobou huonga, khei Jisu Khrista, khüto liman aoeikei lubü chemshang huongyola athük.
Ho huongbü thüka atei hon, chandinam, namseklaang, bu, sang hoba youhoei kümalonga,
mütpem wekoeibü kümsilei kho tang khitlabü. Aieilausi Chalouei kho lenlabü; aishanga kho wana tang khitlabü, hoba müt wekoeibü kümsilei ailai kho wanei takteilabü.
Kho thüka shanyobü müt ateibü kümsilei jouleda longaje, haoei jongsak haplabü;
hoba kho lonalonga hao jongsakei konglabü, lausikei haoje wanlong ka satenbü tegü püetlabü.
Kan Mühghaü lembüchem hoba Mühghaü Soushou kan to thüngda dogo kanei angekei lo?
Müt atei Mühghaü lembüchem leilutia longa Mühghaüei hao leilutilabü; aishanga Mühghaü lembüchem kho saopobü, hoba kho chem kan ki.
Aoeikei jembü lolo tehuonetti. Kan yoa atei ho kaodak songsi- hona hao sangbüdobü dogo damalonga, hao songsihon kibü yeila shanga ngoubü la yeishi.
Aishanga ho kaodak songsihon kho Mühghaü thedanga ngoubüloubü ki. Laishibaei lauda, “Haoei songbüdobü shuong jembü maangli maangsanga lapda,”
hoba toukei, “Bunyubouei songbüdobü shuongei dambü amlangbü dogo ngekei.”
Hibü aoeikei müt shangabü yong telam. Aishanga pendou kaneibü;
Paul yingasikei, Apolo yingasikei, Kefa yingasikei, kaodak yingasikei, langkei si haibü yingasikei, tou kibü hoba loulabü yingasikei, pendou kaneibü.
Lausikei kan Khristaeibü, hoba Khrista Mühghaüeibü.
Mütshuongei kün Khrista khangenbü shuong tegü hoba Mühghaü huphang ngüh ikjaibü dan tegü weeiashi.
Tokei ikjaibü shuong kho maanglemenbü dan yingjan.
Kü shangaje kanei yingasikei, müteibü matjemshanga yingsikei, kün matjembü ho ngei aeibou hanbü dogo weeida. Ngei ngo lolo mangkei mat ajemda.
Küsen kümaang tangshaitham kia, lausikei khoei dogo ngo mat amaitida. Bunyubouei ong kümat jemda.

Hibü Bunyubou alou shongko jih asühjinei matjem teku. Haoei huan kibü nakthüh kümsilei shuong change to sungbalabü hoba müteibü maang- pona dambü shuong tang khitkulabü. Kheijinei mütpem wekoei Mühghaü ka nyensang haplabü.

Jaisinasi shuong, kan to thuila shanga tetsida che tegü ngei Apolo hoba ngo lolo phateiko jungeia. Ngei kan danshuong la küneibü langkei danko, “Laishiba to phenyoan kishi” dogo laubü ngühtet ditlettimang sühda. Kanei che khulimbo müt che thuiyobüa yong alamyola ngei kan la ditlettimang sühda.
No aoei aei phangche shanenan yeitikei? Hobaje nyi asungletbü ai ki? Lausikei nyi sungletkei longaje, aila nyi asungletbü tegü yonglamda?
Tou kanei mangsühbü pendou kanei ki! Touje kan keian apa! Kün ayoko kan Choba la yeian apa! Künkei kan yoa songdaklabü lele ngei kan maimaitham Choba nayeima dogo damda.

Aishanga haila takletbü mütshuong tegü Mühghaüei pendou to thonbüa kün, khei youkoikjai yeitikei, aieilausi kaodak thedanga, hoba khuthük hangangbü shuong thedanga hoba mütshuong thedanga kün chühletshang che yeia.
Khrista laüa kün ngoubü shuong ki; lausikei kan Khrista to songsido kibü tan! Kün hau akibü lausikei kan hau ki! Kan aeibou nyenhang lausikei kün shoenakeibü!
Tou ho jiha sühko kün müh hoba deilako ki, kün neikek seakei, kün khonkuda hoba kishang aki,
hoba künei küneibü ikei kümboleiko hüda. Nyikujinei künei haükuda; shieinangeijinei künei natenda;
nyen shajinei künei sudajada. Kün kaodakeibü mangsenlabü tegü yeia; kün tat chalou sühko kün müt pendoueibü odsinot apshang ki.
Ngei ho kan himoutila doda aying, lausikei kan kü sanoubü shousi shuong tegü lenla doda.
Aishanga Khristaa kan litbou hajar juong kiasikei, kanei bou juongnyu aki! Aishanga Ngühlang Maibü songlenbü danko ngo kaneibü bou la yeikei.
Hibü kan kü neinoubü dan yingshi dogo ngei kan to sudajada.

Khoei ong ngei Timoti kan jungto hautikuda. Hao Bunyuboua ngei sanoubü hoba maanglemenbü shou ki. Ngei pendou aenei lashong wekoa haoen to lai lenda, kho tegü Khristaa ngei lenbü lam pendou haoei kan la damentikulabü.
Kan ateije ngo kan jungto alouda dogo daman yonglamda;
lausikei Bunyubouei maanganga longa ngo kan jungto tongde loulabü; hoba ngei yonglam lilibü shuongeibü ngüh aying lausikei haoeneibü sei lapenlabü.
Aishanga Mühghaü Sangle ngüha aying lausikei seia ki.
Kan la laobou maikuda? Ngo kan jungto ju jungan loula si ayingsi sanoua hoba eaaoabü soushoua loula?
Kan yoa, Küksithang yoa mangkei akibü asangalanbü kia dogo maimaitham ngühlang hapakei: khei, müt cheei boueibü yak leakei!
Hobaje kan yonglambo pakakei. Aeiko khei kümbou müt kho kan himjam ka kuktian mang haaplabou ong kiteikei.
Ngo kan yoa phea ayosikei, ngo soushoua kan yoa kia. Hobaje ngo yobü jam, hatlabü kümbou müt khola ngei matjem kuan apsepa.
Kan ladang seneibü Bunyubou Jisu nyena, kü soushoukei kan yoa yoan, hoba seneibü Bunyubou Jisu sei yoan chela takshatlaje,
kheijinei, haoeibü langkei haang mautian, phaia seneibü Bunyubou chaloua haoeibü soushou khümenlabü lele kheibü müt kho Satan la khümbomeiko kuan apashi.
Kan yaangenbü kho maibü aying. Tokai hanbüshouei wen uon pendou putida dogo kanei angekei lo?
Kan uon haanbü la yeila shanga tokai hangbü kho sakenashi. Tükdebüei kan tokai asebü ki, aishanga seneibü Püetbü Lem San shoushou lembü haitia.
Hangbü tokaiei aying, ayingsi maangkom hoba amaibü tokaiei aying, lausikei hinseibü hoba ngühmai tokai asebü wentekei senei lem kho likho.
Kanei asangalanbü mütshuong to teyang dogo ngei kan jungto ngeibü lea dokei.
Lausikei ngei, ho kaodak asangalanbü, ayingsi nyekdüh maangdüh ayingsi aeilam aeiphop, ayingsi heangsho lembü dan to teyang alauda; khei yingalonga kan kaodak ka kuklabü ong jouakei!

Lausikei jaisina dogo laubü müt at asangalanbü ayingsi dühbü, ayingsi heangsho, ayingsi nyikubü, ayingsi ihyungbü, ayingsi aeilam aeiphopbü yoa ayanglabü shanga dokei. Kanei kheibü müt yoa shau ongkei ashaujan.
Tangkabü mat jemla ngeibü kümsilei ai ki? Mühghaüei haoen mat jemlabü. Kanei maangkabü mat ong jemda aying lo?
Tangkabü shuong mat kho Mühghaüei jemlabü. Müt amaibü kho kan yo ka kuktiashi.
Kan yoa atei jaisina khulimbo mat hapsi, Mühghaü mütshuong phoyoan songalebü matjemshang to haula maang yaangenda lo?
Mühghaü mütshuongei kaodak mat jemlabü dogo kanei angekei sai? Kaodak mat jemalongaje ngühmat hanbümanbü jemla kan amukei lo?
Ho chaangbou langkei shangabü laula phoyoan senei khuthük hangangbü shuong mat jemlabü dogo kanei angekei lo?
Haü, ho kaodakbü hangalama matjemla kisi kanei lashonga nyen akibü shuong la mat jemtilep lo?
Ngei ho kan himoutila lauda. Jaisina kanglanga ngühsak nepbü pankula kan yoa maimaitham songbüdobü ayokei lo?
Lausikei jaisina si jaisina kanglanga ngühmat longjinei maialembü thedangto hauda lo?
Maimaitham kan cheei che to mat angyobü hoei kan thüklangtia dogo aukabü kuda. Aeiko ajan ayingbü bouje natou! Ayingsi nakhüpettiouba!
Yongbou kanei ngühmaang alanda hoba kanei khüpettida, hoba kho kanei jaisinasi shuong khulimbo kümda!
Asaopobüei Mühghaü Sangle phet aphanlabü dogo kanei angekei lo? Kan tehuonetti; peja- pelabü yingsikei, heangsho lembü yingasikei, asangalanbü yingasikei, bousu kanglanga amaibü jungeibü yingasikei,
kokbü yingasikei, nyekdüh maangdüh yingasikei, ihjakbü dan yingasikei, nyikubü yingasikei, koklangsolangbü yingasikei, khübü aoeikei Mühghaü Sangle phet aphanlabü.
Hobaje kheibü kho kan yoa at kiteikei; lausikei seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista nyen danko hoba seneibü Mühghaü Soushouei kan sakena, kan saüena, kan Mühghaü junga mat maia.
“Kü shanga pendou janbü” lausikei pendouje ku aki. “Kü shanga pendou janbü” lausikei ngo ai aaolakei ayeilabü.
“Shausiyung kho shiang shanga, hoba shiang kho shausiyung shanga” lausikei Mühghaüei ham mautilabü. Mang kho asangalanbü shanga ji lausikei Bunyubou shanga, hoba Bunyubou kho mang shanga;
Mühghaüei Bunyubou langngaitikei hoba haoeibü seiei senkei langngaitilabü.
Kaneibü mang kho Khrista mang küksi- huo dogo kanei angekei lo? Kholonga ngei Khrista mang küksihuo ka at sungjung hauan suonlambü mang cheeibü küksi- huo la yeitilep lo? Ladangkei aying!
Aoei suonlamnyu to jamlaje sao to phe chela yeida dogo kanei angekei lo? Aishanga Laishibaei lauda, “Haosi ham phe che ong yeilabü.”
Lausikei ao Bunyubou to thangjamda hao yoa soushoua che ong.
Asangalan ka satenashi. Mütei shonbü lubü shabü pendou haoeibü manga athonkei, lausikei aoei ong asangalanbü jungeilaje haoei jembü mang khulimbo shabü shonda.
Kaneibü mang kho kanei Mühghaü ka sungletbü kan to kibü Soushou Saopobü lembüchem dogo kanei angekei lo? Kan jembüeibü aying;
kan muei jekkei. Hibü kaneibü manga Mühghaü soneikangtiashi.
Tou kanei dobü hangsilam shangabü kho hai: Bousuei yaksa to ajambü maibou.
Lausikei suonlambü hainyu kisije, bousu wekoei jembü yak phojan hoba yaksa wekoei jembü lao kijan.
Laoei yak la chemkan phejan kujan, hoba yakeikei lao la kho tegü kujan.
Yak kho jembü mang thüka bunyu aying, lausikei lao kho bunyu; hoba kho tegü lao kho jembü mang thüka bunyu aying, lausikei yak kho bunyu.

Kanei welaua hautak neplabü lele, liko ngühthang yenan hoba jihsiphai che to liman kanei cheei che la ai kujan ki kho tesenet; hoba ühüpyola anatenbü shanga Satanei kan atakteitila shanga nyibou liko haüyoashi.
Ho shangabü ngei ngühkhüm tegü ayingko daman chühkubü hangeilamei lauda.
Ngei müt pendou ngo tegü ong yingtimang sühda; khei yingsikei mütpem weko Mühghaü ka jongsak atei denche, atei denche hapda.
Ngei chem akanbü hoba latnyu shuong to lenda khei ngo tegü kila haoen shanga maikei.
Lausikei haoenei jembü mang aseneten longa, haoen chem kanashi; aishanga dühbü juokbü toje chem kanbü maibou.
Lausikei ngei chemkanbü shuong la ngühkhüm kuda (khei ngei ji, lausikei Bunyubouei ngühkhüm kuda), khei yak cheei lao ka abangjan,
hoba lao cheei hao yak asattijan. Yak cheei bangalonga, sao laolamla ohauko kitiashi, ayingsi lao to paplepashi.
Lubü shuong to, Bunyubouei ayingko ngei lauda, jaisina cheei song alebü yak che kisije, hoba saoei hao to athakko kila maangangsije, haoei sao kho tesatti;
hoba yaksa cheei song alebü lao che kisije, hoba haoei sao yoa khei kimang sühalonga sao lao ka tebang.
Aishanga maialembü lao kho yak danko Mühghaüeibü ki, hoba maialembü yak kho lao danko Mühghaüeibü ki.
Lausikei song alebouei bangmang sühsije, hao sattiashi. Kho tegübü thua mailembü jaisina ayingsi nousina akhühkei. Lausikei Mühghaüei kan sangmaia kila shanga ngakei.
Aishanga, O chembunyu, nyi lao khümenla si akhümenlaje nyi lai ngekei? Ayingsi, O chembubou, nyi yak khümenla si akhümenlaje nyi lai ngekei?
Lausikei mütpem weko Bunyubouei hao la jongsak kubü thüng hoba haoei Mühghaü ka sungletbü ngabü thüng langkei kijan. Ho ngei lashong pendoua sakkubü ngühkhüm ki.
Müt at kipan kijinei ngakei sai? Hao akipbüla yeila hautejem. Müt at akipbo kijinei ngakei sai? Haoei tekip.
Kipbüa ai aki, akipbüakei ai aki; lausikei Mühghaü ngühkhüm jungeibüa kakkei.
Mütpem weko hao ai thua kijinei ngaa, kho tegü kiashi.
No aaola lean kijinei ngakei sai? Kho tedamei; no dongebü yeila thükan kiasikei aeiko aaothu kümsilei kümashi.
Aishanga ao Bunyuboua aaola lean kijinei ngakei, Bunyubouei dongebü yeitibou kho hao; hoba kho tegü ong dongebü müt, ladang hao ngadaje Khrista aao yeida.
Kan muei jekkei. Müteibü aao la teyei.
Jaisinasi shuong, mütpem weko hao ai thua kijinei ngakei, kho tegü ong Mühghaü yoa kishi.
Chem akanbü shuong shangabü ngei Bunyubou ka ai ngühkhüm aki, lausikei ngo, maanglemenla Bunyubou ka üeisanou hapbü tegü ngei dambü lenkho.
Tou khonsak kiasikei, mütpem weko hao lai ki, khei kila maikei dogo ngei damda.
Nyi yak ngaakei sai? Bangla tedam. Nyi yak angakei sai? Yak ngala tedamei.
Nyi chem kanalonga nyi shabü ashonda; hoba medeiei laolamla hausije, saoei shabü ashonda. Lausikei aoyou chemkanda haoenei ho langkeia khonsak juongnyu haplabü; hoba ngei kan khüka satentimang sühda.
Jaisinasi shuong, ngei kan la ho lenda: jihsiphai khama nyanga; tou ka jaüan yak kibü shuongei akibü him yeishi,
hoba aoyou haapda haoen ühaapbü maimai yeishi, olinbü shuongei haoen aolinbü maimai yeishi, aoyouei jekda haoenei ai akibü maimai yeishi,
hoba aoyouei kaodak jungeida haoenei kheinyu ajungeibula yeishi; aishanga tou kibü kaodak ho süng ashonlabü.
Ngei kan maangmau songoktimang sühda. Chem akanbü mütei Bunyubou kümsilei shangabü damda hoba haoei Bunyubou olintimang sühda.
Lausikei chemkanbü mütei kaodak kümsilei shanga damda hoba haoei yak olintimang sühda,

hoba hao maangpona janyinda. Medei ayingsi saosüngbü yaksaei Bunyubou kümsilei shanga damda; saoei mang si soushou hama sao haoeibü la yeimang sühda. Lausikei chemkanbü yaksaei kaodak kümsilei shangabü damda; hoba saoei lao olintimang sühda.
Ngei ho kan la onat jinyokula alauda, lausikei eaaoa kitila hoba atok akhipetko Bunyubou khangenla shanga kan maila yaangla lauda.

Müt cheei, haoeibü saosüngnyu to haangphai lamphaia ajungeida dogo damsije, hoba haoei maangdüh yongko anatensije, kümsilei ong yingalonga haoei maangangbü kümtiashi; tetlabü, haosi chem kantiashi; khoei haoei shabü ashonda.
Lausikei maangangenbü kaangbü müt aoei jembü manga maangangena, hoba haoei jembüei maangangbü khulimbo akümbo haoeibü saosüngnyu thangnyu angako phoyola maangangda, haoei kümbü kho janbü yinglabü.
Hibü aoei haoeibü saosüngbü thangnyu ngada, haoei maian jungeida, hoba aoei sao anga, haoei maibou jungeida.
Lao lang kishongko yak che kho hao phanga khühakei; lausikei lao haialonga, saoei ao jungto haumang sühdaje sao maang, lausikei Bunyubou to mailembü yoa ong sao laolamla hautishi.
Lausikei sao khei ong setbü olinbou yinglabü. Ho ngei dambü hoba Mühghaü Soushou kü yoa ki dogo damda.
Tou heangsho la okbü shausiyung shangabü: “Sen pendouei hapbüngebü” kia dogo kanei lauda; lausikei kaneibü hapbüngebü khoei müt yonglamtida, lausikei sanouei chingtida.
Atei denche ngeakei dogo damsije haoei toukei ai ngejan yingkeije angekei;
lausikei atei Mühghaü sanousije hao kho haoei ngeakei.
Hibü heangsho la silip jakubü shausiyung shaubü shangabü, “Kaodaka heangsho ai aying, hoba Mühghaü che to liman ao aki” dogo senei ngekei.
Aishanga khuthüka yingasikei, kaodaka yingasikei mühghaü dogo nyenasikei, (haü, maimaitham mühghaü juong hoba bunyubou juongnyu kia),
khei yinga tegükei sen thüka Mühghaü che ong ki, ao ka ajanjan pendou ki hoba ao shanga sen lang ki; hoba Bunyubou che ong kia, kho Jisu Khrista, hoba hao danko pendou ki, hoba hao danko sen lang ki.

Lausikei müt pendoueije kho angekei. Aieilausi ateije tou sühko heangsho shangabü khünjinsije, haoenei heangsho to silip jabü shausiyung dogo dambo shauda; hoba haoen sensimaang hau akisije kho shatida.
Lausikei shaueiyungei sen Mühghaü junga anyangtilabü; senei ashaubü shanga dogo kongbü aki, hoba senei shaubüei dogo pailetbü aki.
Lausikei kan la jankubüei hau akibü shuong aphaiyettila maangsangshi.
Aishanga haibü shanga ngebü müt cheei no heangsho lemshanga shauko yungko hapalonga, hoba hao hau akilonga, heangsho lembü shausiyung shaula hao maang ayaangentilep lo?
Aishanga kaibü ngebü danko hau akibü jaisina, ao shanga Khrista haikei, hao mauda!
Ladang kanei kho tegübüa jaisina khulimbo shabü shonda, hoba haoen hau akibü sensimaanga aktida, kheijinei kanei Khrista khulimbo shabü shonda.
Hibü, shausiyungei ngeibü jaisina phaiyettialonga, ngei ngeibü jaisina aphaiyettila shanga ladangkei phe ashaulabü.
Ngo dongebü ji lo? Ngo youkoikjai che aying lo? Ngei seneibü Bunyubou Jisu ühüp lo? Ngei Bunyubou khangenbüa loushadbü kümsilei kan ji lo?
Mü shanga ngo youkoikjai che habü aying tegükei kan shangaje ngo yingakei; aishanga Bunyuboua kan ngeibü youkoikjai kümsilei aukabü ki.
Ngo takteibü shuong thedanga ngo satenshang ho ki:
küneikei shaula si yungla janbü aying lo?
Lubü youkoikjai hoba Bunyubou jaisinasi shuong, hoba Kaifaei tegü küneikei mailembü yak che leiyeila janbü aying si?
Ayingsi Barnaba küsiei ong shiang shanga kümsilei kümjan si?
Sepai cheei jembü nyaksinam shauko khangenda si? Aoei semlüh kean khoeibü mai ashauda? Aoei san shuong lombo haoen ka sendei anyatyungda?
Ngei ho müteibü haua lauda sai? Ayingsi Ngühkhümakei ho alenda sai?
Mosa Ngühkhüma ho doakei, “Nyi youshou nakjinei masu la sembung tekhühlepbu.” Masu shangabü Mühghaüei damda sai?
Haoei ho maimaitham kün shangabü lauda ji si? Ho kün shangabü dokei, aieilausi sek shapbouei maanglem phoan shapda hoba nakbouei hao phejan hapla maanglem phoan youshang nakda.
Künei ka la soushou youli wenkuan phaia kaodak latsi kho kün shanga yongko dankei dogo damda sai?

Lubü shuongei mangkei hai jungeijan yingalonga künei bouje aei khei jungeijan ayingsi? Khei yingankei künei kho janbü alam. Aeiko toukei Khrista Ngühlang Maibü apeksektila shanga künei ajanjan pendou aman apda.
Lembüchema saopobü jungeibü shuongei lembü shauda, hoba lemshona khangenbü shuongei lemshon ka jembü phejan hapda, dogo kanei angekei lo?
Kho tegü ong, Bunyubou Ngühlang Maibü phinthonbü shuong la Ngühlang Maibüei haoen lang kila shanga ngühkhüm kukei.
Lausikei ngei habü ho ai ajungei, hoba kü shanga khei jungeitila ngei habü ngüh ado; aishanga kü the lenenbü amlangbüla yeitikhoulabü khantoje ngo haibü ong maibou.
Aishanga ngei Ngühlang Maibü songlensi, ngo aikei yonglamlabü aki; aishanga kho on kü thüka ki. Aishanga ngei Ngühlang Maibü song alenlongaje, kü shanga ügütü!
Aieilausi ngei ho maangnyu angko kümsije ngei pailetlabü, lausikei maang üangko kümalonga ho Mühghaüei kü la nongnaela nongkubü danko ong kümda.
Kholongaje ngeibü mu ai? Ngei mu aleko Ngühlang Maibü song lenenjan; hoba Ngühlang Maibü songlenbü shanga ngeibü kusikhang ajungeilabü.
Aishanga ngo aoeibü aao ayingsikei, ngei thükthüng Khrista shanga juong pailetla ngo müt pendoueibü aao la yeikei.

Jihudabü pailetla ngo Jihudabü junga Jihudabü la yeikei; Ngühkhüm phanga kibü shuong thedanga, ngoje Ngühkhüm phanga akisi dogokei, haoen dan pailetla shanga ngokei Ngühkhüm phanga kibü che tegü yeikei;
Ngühkhüm akibü Küksithang shuong pailetla shanga, ngoje Mühghaü ngühkhüm padaka ayingko ngo Khrista ngühkhüm maanga kiasikei, ngo Ngühkhüm akibü müt che la yeikei;
hau akibü thedanga haoen pailetla shanga ngokei hau akibüla yeikei; haoen at ongkei khümenla shanga ngei thükbü hangsilam pendouei pendou thedanga pendou yeikei.
Ngei kümbü pendou kho, ngokei haülabüa penlabü lele, Ngühlang Maibü shanga kümda.
Laangyobü pendouei laangda, lausikei cheei ong jongsak hapda dogo kanei angekei lo? Kho tegü kanei thükbü hapla shanga laangashi.
Louyojayobüa tokyobü pendouei ajanjan pendoua jembü lolo thepetda. Haoenei kho athabou khun hapla kümda; lausikei senei thabou khun hapla shanga jembü lolo thepetda.
Khoei ngei nyekthe phoan laangda. Ngei yei to thangbü mütei tegü ngei alongyoda.
Lausikei ngei mü to songlenan phaia ngo amuko apbula dogo, ngei kü manga thepetda, hoba khoeibü aao la yeitida.
Jaisinasi shuong, ngei kan la seneibü pisibou to haüthükbü ditentimang sühda. Haoen sangmeiei leikei, pendouei Saklangbü Yungnyu khatkei,
hoba sangmei si yungnyua pendou Mosa himjama baptikei.
Pendouei jeteibü soushou shausiyung shaukei,
hoba pendouei jeteibü soushou dei yungkei; aishanga haoenei haoen phai sembo kibü soushou laangnyudak ka yungkei. Laangnyudak kho Khrista kiteikei.
Lausikei haoen juongbou to Mühghaü maang ühai, hoba haoeneibü mangjimei lamang nyakkei.
Khübü pendou kho, khei haoenei tegü senei amaibü to maang ataktila sen shanga maangsanglabü tetsida che la yeikei.
Haoen at tegü heangsho lembü la teyei; Laishibaei lauda, “Mütshuongei shaula hoba yungla setkei, hoba tomla laakla loenkei.”
Hoenei atei asangalanbü jungeian nyetchenei müt hajar saoto sem tuongbü tegütham, senei tejungeikho.
Ayingsi haoen atei takteian pinyuei shembü tegütham, senei Bunyubou tetakteikho.
Hobaje haoen atei nyamnyaman, Shemtibou Khuthük Hangangbüei shemtibü tegü, senei tenyamnyambho.
Khübü pendou haoen la tetsida che tegü haüthükkei, lausikei sen aoyou thükto meten thonbü lousüha, khübü mütshuong la maangsanglabü che tegü doan phokukei.
Aoei kaangkhühtham loakei dogo damda haoen üatetla maangsangshi.

Mütei natenlabü takteibü to liman kan jungto ai takteibükei aloukei. Mühghaü kho maanglemenbü, hoba haoei kanei natenlabü to liman atakteilabü, lausikei kanei natenlabü lele haoei takteibüa satenlabü lam ipbulabü.
Hibü, ngei sanoubü jaisinasi shuong, heangsho lembü ka saten- ashi.
Ngei kan to hapbüngebü to tegü lauda, ngei laubü ngüh kho kan lolo daman chühashi.
Ladang senei haülabü thung kho haükuda, kheijinei Khrista siia senei janyoda aying lo? Hobaje ladang senei wentek shaknyinda, Khrista manga senei janyoda aying lo?
Wentek che ong yingasikei, sen juong kiasikei mang che ong, aishanga sen pendouei wentek che ka janyo shomyoda.
Jihudabü mailem hoba hangsilam daman chühashi; lemla jinbü shaubü danei Mühghaü khangenbü lemshona nongnaekei aying lo?
Kholonga ngei ai lauda? Silip jabü shausiyung aiche denche ki sai? Ayingsi heangsho kho aiche phangche sai?
Ji, lausikei Kükeithangei lembü kho Mühghaü to ayingko shabü sou to lemda. Ngei kan shabü sou himjam yoa yotimang asühda.
Kanei Bunyubou thung si shabü sou thung yungla athük; kanei Bunyubou lem shaushang si shabü sou lem shaushang hama yola athük.
Senei Bunyubou nyek to shattimang sühda sai? Sen hao to hau kibou sai?
“Pendou janbü” dogo kanei lauda. Haü, lausikei pendouje sen maila shanga aying. “Pendou janbü” dogo kanei lauda lausikei pendouje ku aying.
Aoeikei jembü maila ong adambo mü shangakei damshi.
Phe jemshanga ai yakda kho sensimaang shanga aikei apheeiko jekshauashi.
Kaodak hoba khonei kibü pendou Bunyuboueibü.
Songalebü cheei no oknyinla ngaalonga, hoba nyi haumang sühalonga, ka junga ai denkulaje nyi sensimaang shanga ai ashako shauashi.
Lausikei atei ka to, “Ho lembüsabü peisilei sem,” dogo lausije, kheijinei ka la ngetibou hoba sensimaang laüa kho teshau;
kaibü sensimaang shanga aying lausikei müt che khoeibü laüa ngei lauda.
“Aila ngeibü dongebü solo matjem lubü sensimaangei kula?” dogo kanei lauda.
Ngei nyensang kuko shaualonga, laobou shanga ngei nyen sangda, kho shangabü kü nyen aila shala?
