Aishanga hao danko sen ham Soushou chenei Bou jungto loutibü ki.
Hibü touje kan yenbou hoba loushad loumoubü aying; lausikei Mühghaü mütshuong yoa püshi hoba Mühghaü chemdang kabü shuong ki.
Kan youkoikjai hoba thuseibü shuong thüka huongbü ki, hoba Jisu Khrista hao chemnyek laang yeikei.
Hao to chem khümbo büngbüyenbüa thenakei hoba Bunyuboua saüenbü chem chela yeiko loenda.
Hobaje Soushoua Mühghaü kishang chem che yeila shanga hao to kankei paplepshoule huongenda.
Khoei ngo, kan Küksithang shanga, Khrista Jisua thüngbou Paulei, kan shanga welaukuda.
Mühghaü onou nongnaela kümsilei laobou kan shangabü kanei maimaitham ditan kilabü;
ailai tangkhitbü ngühei huphang ngüh kho kü la ngetikei, kho ngei shangied ngüh tuibouei dokei.
Hobaje ladang kanei kho wean chühlaje, Khrista huphang ngüha ngei ditletbü kanei ditenlabü.
Ho huphang ngüh kho tou Soushoua hao saopobü youkoikjai shuong to tang khitbü tegü lubü metena khunak shousi to angetiko kiteikei.
Hobaje kho huphang ngüh kho ho, khei Ngühlang Maibü danko Khrista Jisua Küksithang shuong kün Jihudabü yoa phetphanbü shuong, hoba mang jeteibüa yobü shuong hoba thekubü jetei sungletbü shuong ki.
Haoeibü maangmai onouei kü to kümbü haoeibü sei danko, Mühghaüei ngo kho Ngühlang Maibüeibü sambü yeitikei.
Khristaeibü ashuokenbü keisi- yaang Küksithang to songlenla, Mühghaü müt shuong pendou to hanbou ngo, kü la kho onou kua.
Hobaje Mühghaü, aoei peisilei pendou kümbei, hao to laobou huphang ngüh meten juongnyu huan kiteikei, kho nongnaebü ngüh müt pendou la haptila shanga,
hoba Mühghaü ponpen thon akibü nyekchüh tegütham, laobou haoei seneibü Bunyubou Khrista Jisua maangangenkei,
haoeibü songsihon yaang tou lashong danko müh kabü kishanga songdakbü shuong hoba songdak hau shuong la ngetienlabü shanga, kü la kho onou kukei.
Khristaa hao sen to mailem danko sen aeibou maanglemei maangkhaibü hoba Mühghaü jungto loutibü senei ki.
Hibü kan shanga ngeibü khonku khonsak, laobou kaneibü soneikangbü ki, khübü shangabü kan hau akibou teyei dogo ngei sudajada.
Ngei lenjung loubü tegü, khoei ong ngei welaua Bou junga khüpetda.
Khuthüka hoba kaodaka hao ong chemdang wekoei khoeibü nyen sungleda.
Hobaje haoeibü soneikangbü keisiyang ka, haoei hao shou danko kaneibü maangkabou langkeia kan la hau hoba sei kula shanga ngei welauda,
khei yingsikei mailem danko Khrista kaneibü maang- pona thünglabü.
Hobaje kanei Mühghaü mütshuong pendou yoa Khrista sanoua photak hoba tousüng hoba suokbü hoba haübü, ai yingkeije jembo shuokenlabü lele kan sanoua li attila hoba takshatla shanga ngei welauda.
Hapbüngebü pendou to khaibou Khrista sanou ngela hoba kan Mühghaü penbüsoubü pendouei shenlabü lele ngei welauda.
Tou, sen to kümbü sei tegütham, aoei senei phebü hoba dambü pendou to aei kümla thükda,
hao to lashonga hoba Khrista Jisua soneikangbü meten pendoua ponpen kishi! Amen.
Hibü, laobou ngabü kanei sungletkei, kho ngabü langkei muko paiashi, dogo ngo, Bunyubou shanga thüngbouei kan to sudajada.
Ponpendou sangsembo, eaaoa hoba natenko kiashi.
Kanei jenabou si jenabou amai apyobü danko sanou lenashi.
Soushouei kan che yeitia. Kanei che ei che to sangmaia kienbü danko kho Soushou thangjam phola maibouthamei haujemashi.
Mang che hoba Soushou che ki, khei kankei kan ngabü maanglem chenei ngakei,
Bunyubou che, mailem che, baptibü che,
sen pendoueibü Mühghaü hoba Bou che; hoba pendou thüka, hoba pendou danko, hoba pendoua ki.
Lausikei Khrista jongsak takletbü thüng sen mütpem weko la onou kukei.
Khoei ong Laishibaei lauda,
“Ladang hao thükaeto nguikei,
haoei langsenbü shuong lapan angkei,
hoba haoei müt shuongla jongsak kukei.”
(Hao “nguikei” laubü ngühtet ai? Kho tetlabü hao kaonyudak phangtokei louyenkei.
Haoei hang pendou shentila shanga louyenbou hoba khuthük pendou to thükkabou to angbou ham kho che ong ki.)
Hobaje “haoei jongsak kukei” laubü ngühtet ai? Kho tetlabü, haoei at hangangbü shuong, at thuseibü shuong, at songlendolenbü shuong, at sanlombü shuong, hoba at lenbou shuong yingla kukei.

Haoeneibü kümsilei kho khei thonbüa, sen pendoua, mailema hoba Mühghaü Shou ngebüa jetei ayei shongko khangenbü kümsilei shanga Mühghaü müt shuong lenenlabü hoba Khrista mang huongenbüa penbüsoubü yeitilabü shanga ki. Kheijinei senei Khrista ka loubü tükdebü mütang onbü hapenlabü.
Senje touje nashou hanbü tegü akilabü, ayingsi lenbü yei weko la asoulangtilabü, ayingsi müt ye- peibü hoba maanglimaangsangei sen mashikan amlangbü lenbüei hau, longei, dogo asoueitilabü.
Aeiko, sanoua ngühmai lauko pendoua hao to sen chinglabü, hao khu, khei Khrista.
Hobaje hao ka mang pendou büngbüyenbüa thenyoan, sapyobü wekoei jembü kümsilei kümbü tegü mang kho jembü lolo sanoua chingenko yeitida.
Hibü Küksithang shuongei jembü maang yaangbüa paibü tegü kanei toukei apaila shanga ngei ho lenda, hoba Bunyuboua aukabü kuda.
Haoen jembü to ühüpangebü kisije, hoba haoen jembü maang kaangsije, haoen ditenbü nyek nakthühla yeiko Mühghaü langkei ka haoen bangakei.
Haoen damlabü ngouan, aeibou maangdakbüei asaopobü pendou jungeila shanga jembü lolo pejapelabü la kukei.
Lausikei kaneije Khrista kho haangei aditen.
Maimaitham kanei hao shangabü ditkei, hoba Jisu to kibü ngühmai yoa kan hao to lenenkei.
Kanei shaangbou langkei, hangbü müt, laobou khüpbülangbü maangdühei leilutian ki, kho apashi.
Kan soushoua haansang yeijan.
Kanei langkei haanbü, Mühghaü phatbüa yaübü müt, laobou ngühmai hoba saopobüa tang khida, kho hele la leashi.
Hibü amlang laubü apan, hoba Laishibaei laubü tegü, “Mütpem wekoei jembü lepbou to ngühmai lauashi,” aieilausi mang che tegü sen pendou küksihuo chebang ki.
Shabü shonko khau tüang. No khauang thüka chanyu tenepti,
hoba shabü mühghaü la kaokuok teku.
Kokko kibouei touje nangashi; lausikei khambü müt to janyola kilabü lele haoei jembü ik jungeiko kümaleiashi.
Kaneibü sembung ka amaibü ngühkung che ongkei telongti, lausikei kümsilei yingbü tegü ai huongyola shanga maibü ki, ditbü shuong la haülabü haptilabü lele kho laushi.
Hobaje Mühghaü Soushou Saopobü, ao to khümenlabü chalou shanga kaneibü amaaphilabü shangjinkei, hao tengangti.
Kaneibü maangpon ka khauekbü, maangpokbü, khauang, nyikubü hoba mangsenbü pendou apashi.
Hobaje jenabou si jenabou sanouyoko maangshikyoko kiashi, hoba ailai Mühghaüei Khristaa kaneibü shedbü apbukei, kho tegütham kaneikei cheei che la ap kuyoashi.
Kan Mühghaü shousi shuong ki hoba haoei kan sanouda, hibü hao phatbüa kila haujemashi.
Hobaje Khristaei ailai kan to sanoukei hoba ponlem teishikbü tegü Mühghaü la sen shanga jembü lolo khümbomeiko kukei, kho tegü kanei sanoua paiashi.
Lausikei kan yoa Mühghaü müt shuong laula amuko, asangalanbü hoba suonlambü pendou, ayingsi nyekto shatbü laulo telaueiti.
Ayingsi amaibü, ayingsi ngoualoua laubü, ayingsi ekyonyiyo, laobou haang aying, kheibü telaueiti. Lausikei Bunyubou la bouje nyensang kuashi.
Aishanga ho chongchingashi: asangalanbü ayingsi ihinseibü müt, ayingsi maangdüh müt, ao heangsho lembü ki, khübü yoa aoeikei Khrista hoba Mühghaü Sanglea phet aphanda dogo kanei ngekei.
Aolakei jim akibüei kan tehuonetti, aieilausi khübü shanga ngüha alebü shousi shuong to Mühghaü maangshat louada.
Hibü kan haoen to janyobou teyei.
Aishanga kan che nakthühbü kiteikei, lausikei tou Bunyuboua kan ngesakbü ki. Ngesakbü shousi shuong tegü paiashi.
Aishanga ngesakbü hek kho maibü hoba saopobü hoba ngühmai pendoua ki dogo damenashi.
Hobaje Bunyubou thedanga maanghailabü ai ki kho hapenla haujemashi.
Hobaje mai ehekbü nakthüh kümsilei to tejam, yongbou khübü khuokentiashi.
Haoenei huphanga kümbü khübü shuong laueila mangkei himoulabü che ki.
Lausikei ngesakbüei khuokenbü shuong kho changea tang khitko shenda,
aishanga ajanjan pendou tang khittibou ngesakbü ki. Khoei ong chiaei lauda,
“O yepbou, laksepashi, haibü ka pienashi,
hoba Khristaei ka thükto haukulabü.”
Hibü kan lai paida maangsangko chühashi, asangadobü tegü aying lausikei maanglimaangsang tegü paiashi;
jih maibü pendou angthetashi, aishanga chalou shuong amaibü ki.
Hibü tengou, lausikei Bunyubou maangangbü ai ki kho ditenashi.
Hobaje ih, laonei lemenlabü ki, khoei tejaakma. Aeiko Soushouei shenko kishi.
Nyensang chia hoba saopobü chia hoba soushou chiaei lauyoko, chia maibü ngüh longko maang- pon khümboei Bunyubou to laushi.
Ponpendou Bou Mühghaü, seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista nyena pendou shanga nyen sangashi.
Khristaa soumo hatbüa kanei jembü lolo cheei che phanga kikuashi.
Yaksi shuong, Bunyuboua tegütham jembü laosi shuong phanga kishi.
Aishanga ailai Khristaei jembü lolo mang khümenbou kian, lashong khu ki, kho tegütham lao kho yak khu.
Lausikei ailai lashong kho Khrista phanga ki, kho tegütham yaksi kho pendoua jembü laosi phanga kishi.
Laosi shuong, Khristaei ailai lashong to sanoukei hoba jembü lolo sao shanga khümbo kuan apbei, kho tegütham kaneibü yaksi shuong to sanouashi.
Kho haoei sao deiei hoba ngühei sakenkula hoba saüenkula,
hoba kho tegütham haoei sao shedbü akiko soneikangbü hemai saomaia, kapnak ayingsi nyungbü aikei akibü lashong che, haoei jembü lolo la kula shanga kümbei.
Kho tegü laosi shuongei jembü mang to tegütham haoeneibü yaksi shuong to sanoujan. Aishanga aoei jembü yak to sanouda haoei jembü lolo sanouda.
Aishanga aoeikei aijih dangakei jembü phe amangsen; lausikei haoei samda hoba thounouda; kho tegütham Khristaeikei lashong kho samda hoba thounouda,
aishanga sen haoeibü mang küksihuo ki.
Laishibaei lenbü tegü, “Ho shanga bousuei haobou si haonyu apyolabü hoba jembü yak to maanghaiko kilabü, hoba haosi ham phe che yeilabü.”
Ho huphang ngüh yaangbü ki; lausikei ngei Khrista hoba lashong shangabü lauda.
Khei yingasikei kaneikei mütpem wekoei jembü tegü jembü yak to sanouashi; hoba yakei jembü lao to soumo hatashi.
Nashousi shuong, Bunyuboua kanei jembü nyusibou to ngüha leashi, aishanga kho song.
“No haükulabü shanga hoba kaodaka salangla shanga, kanyu si kabou to soumo hatashi.” Ho thekubü thonbü shaangbou Ngühkhüm ki.
Hobaje kanei jembü shousi shuong ngangko khau tüangti, lausikei Bunyubouei lenbü hoba thungeijangeibüa samenashi.
Sambü shuong, kanei Khrista to tegü hatbü hoba lühbüa lanbü maangponei phea jembü bunyu shuong to ngüha leashi.
Müt olintibü shuong tegü nyekei haptila aying, lausikei Khrista khangenbü tegü jembü maangpon khümboei Mühghaüei maangangbü kümashi.
Aao yingasikei, dongebü yingasikei, aoei ai ong maibü kümlaje haoei Bunyubou ka jeteibü kho hapmeilabü dogo ngean,
maanglansele kümbo müt to aying, lausikei Bunyubou to tegü khangenashi.
Hobaje bunyu shuong, kho tegü kaneikei haoen to kümashi. Haoeneibü hoba kaneibü Bunyubou khuthüka kia dogo, hoba haoei müt the achühda dogo ngean haoen tehütenti.
Thonla, Bunyubou hoba hao seisihaua hau kishi.
Kanei shabü mühghaü khüpettibü khulimbo loenlabü shanga, Mühghaü lakoubü hele khümbo leashi.
Aishanga senei sii hoba phe khulimbo awapyoda, lausikei mühlom kaodak songdakbü khulimbo, ho nakthühbü meten songdak hau khulimbo, hoba sei shuong khulimbo wapyoda.
Hibü amaibou chaloua kanei loenlabü shanga, hoba pendou kümpheman phaia loenlabü lele Mühghaü wapyo hele pendou leashi.
Hibü kanei loshang lamenashi. Kanei ngühmaiei shembe kaiashi hoba saopobü khükhuom la leashi.
Hakso Ngühlang Maibü songlenla lamlean kibü kho kaneibü youa nguok la lonshi.
Kaneibü mailem kho amaiboueibü wanlüh takbü laujin tokla shanga ponpen aih la thangshi.
Hobaje khümenbü jongsak kaneibü namkhun la leshi hoba Soushou inlou, laobou Mühghaü ngüh ki, khübü sungletashi.
Welau hoba subüjabü pendouei Soushou seia jihsiphai pendoua welauashi. Hobaje khonei athakko haujembü hoba subüjabü pendoua Mühghaü müt shuong pendou shanga, hoba kü shanga pikolembo welauashi.
Khei ngei Ngühlang Maibü huphang ngüh, laobou shangabüa ngo yangmen youkoikjai che ki, kho maangkhaiko laula kü sembung ipjinei ngüh lauenla shanga, kanei pikolembo welauko sushijashi.
Ngei laujan tegü Ngühlang Maibü maangkhaiko songlenla shanga kanei welaushi.
Kanei kü shangabü ngela shanga hoba ngo lai ong ki kho sanoubü jaisina hoba Bunyuboua maanglemenbü khangenbou Tikhikaei kan la pendou ngetilabü.
Kanei küneibü thu pendou ngela shangabü hoba kan thungei jangeitila ngei hao kan jungto hautikuda.
Bou Mühghaü hoba Bunyubou Jisu Khrista ka jaisina pendou jungto hakso, mailem yoa sanou yingshi.
Aoyouei seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista to maimaithambüei sanouda haoen pendou yoa onou kishi.
Ho le, Khrista Bunyuboueibü sambü shuong, Paul si Timoti ka, Filipia kibü Khrista Jisueibü Mühghaü mütshuong, hoba lombü shuong si dikon shuong jungto.
Seneibü Bou Mühghaü hoba Bunyubou Jisu Khrista ka kan jungto onou hoba hakso yingshi.
Ladang ong ngei kan shanga damda, ngei kü Mühghaü nyen sangda;
hoba ladang ong ngei welauda, ngei kan pendou shanga welauda hoba ngo olinbüei shenettiakei,
aieilausi kanei khangbü ka tou sühko Ngühlang Maibü phinthonla kanei kü yoa phejan lekei.
Aishanga Mühghaü, aoei kan to ho kümsilei maibü khangkei, haoei Jisu Khrista Chalou sühko kho pentisoutilabü dogo ngei mailemda.

Hai pendou shangabü damlabü kho kü shanga janbü, aishanga ngei kü maangpona kan thüngtida. Aishanga kan mütpem wekoei kü la Mühghaüei tetletkubü yangmen hoba Ngühlang Maibü kapetla si khangenkula ngabüa phejan leda.
Khrista Jisu sanoua kan pendou shanga ngei lai chüheida ho shangabü Mühghaü ngeibü aukabü ki.
Ho kü welau: kaneibü welau aei haübou chingashi; ho hapbüngebü hoba maangdaka sopbojaiko chingashi!
Kholongaje, ai maiboutham kho kanei lenenlabü, hoba ladang Khrista Chalou lousühlaje kan hinseibü hoba shedbü akiko,
hoba Mühghaü soneikangbü hoba nyensangbü shanga saopobü lang, laobou Jisu Khristaei ong kula thükkei, khoei kan shenan kiteilabü
Jaisinasi shuong, kü to ai haüthükkei khoei Ngühlang Maibü peksekkei ayingko aei shomenkei dogo ngei kan la ngetimang sühda,
aishanga ngo lombü si lubü shuong pendou to Khrista phai sembü aoa ngo thüngdanga ki dogo tang khitkei.
Hobaje Bunyuboua jaisina juongbou ngeibü yangmenei maang yaangenko yeian, Mühghaü ngüh ühütko laula aeibou maang yaangko yeia.
Atei maimaitham nyekshat maangshat hoba oyophetyoei Khrista songlenda, lausikei atei maang tangbüei songlenda.
Atei sanouei songlenda, aishanga Ngühlang Maibü kapletla shanga ngo pentikei dogo haoenei ngekei.
Lausikei lubüei ngeibü khühbüa aei khonsak pailetkula, ngühmaiei ayingko janyinbüei Khrista phinthonda.
Kholongaje ai? Ho ong, hibüyoubüa yingasikei, maimaithambüa yingasikei, pendou aenei Khrista phinthonakei; hoba khonei ngo olinda, hoba toukei olinlabü.
Aishanga kaneibü welau danko hoba Khrista Jisuei kü la hao Soushou kubü danko thonlaje ngo litilabü.

Hibü haüko kuokko dambo maanglembü tegütham ngei ailakei himou ühüplabü, lausikei maangyaangbü pendouei, nyishoubü tegü, langkeiei yingasikei haibüei yingasikei toukei ngeibü manga Khrista yaangentilabü.
Aishanga kü shanga lang kilabü kho Khrista, hoba hailabü kho ku.
Lausikei ngo phea lang kilabü yingsije, kho tetlabü, kibü thüng yingko mai hektilabü. Laobou pienlaje ngei angekei.
Lausikei ham kanglanga ngo phenyembü thua kia. Kü shangaje ngo bangan Khrista yoa kila waangda. Kho yongan ean maibou yinglabü.
Lausikei ngo kan shanga phea lang kilabü kho aei khambou ki.
Hobaje kho ngean, ngo kan jungto nyibou loubüei Khrista Jisua kü to kan the lenenlabü aei yeila shanga, mailema kan haalabü hoba olinla shanga, ngo lang kilabü dogo ngei ngekei.

Ai haüthüklaje haüthükashi, himshuong yoa kaneibü chaangbou langkei kho Khrista Ngühlang Maibü muko kishi. Ngo louan kan to joyojinei yingashi ayingsi ngo ayojineikei yingashi, kan soushoua thangjaman kaangkhühtham loan, khei kan san che hoba nyekchüh chela lean Ngühlangmaibü mailem shanga thungyoda,
hoba kaneibü dangbou to kan ai ajemtenko shuokyoda dogo ngei ditmang sühda. Hoei haoen shemlabü lausikei kan khümenlabü dogo haoen to lenlabü.
Kho Mühghaüei kan la Khrista to mailemlabü ong aying, lausikei hao shanga khonsaklabü phejankei kukei.
Kanei ngo che mailem shanga wapyoko hapa. Hobaje ngo athakko longyoda dogo kanei ditda. Kankei jeteibü lasona kia dogo damenashi.
Hibü Khristaa denche thungeijangeibü kisije, sanou ka denche hakso kisije, Soushoua himjam denche kisije,
denche üeisanou hoba sanouko dambü kisije, jibüphaibü chenei, songsido chenei, sanou jetei kiko, kan sensimaang jetei kila shanga, kanei kü olin shentishi.
Hobaje janyinyobüei yingasikei, jim akibü liliseseei yingasikei, aikei teküm, lausikei eaaoabüei müt- pem wekoei jembü to mü khaibou dogo weeiashi.
Kan mütpem wekoei jembü shanga adambo mü shanga damashi.
Khrista Jisu to laobou dambü kikei kho kan to kei kishi:
Büngla khangla thama hao to Mühghaü haang kiteikei,
lausikei hao Mühghaü to jeteitham himyoan
kijan dogo haoei adam.
Lausikei, haoei jembü lolo kongenkei,
hoba sambü haang la yeikei,
hoba sen tegübü müt che la yeikei.
Hao müt maimai yeikei,
hoba haibüa sühko,
khei, peiseia haila mangkei ngühaleko,
haoei jembü lolo sangsemmeilangkei.
Khoei Mühghaüei hao
thükkabou kaoen to tonenkei,
hibü Jisu nyena khuthük kabü shuong,
kaodak kabü shuong hoba kaonyu mangkabü shuong
mütpem wekoei youkükei thungetan khüpetko lemlabü,
hoba Bou Mühghaü la soneikangbü kuko,
“Jisu Khrista Bunyubou ki”
dogo lauko mütpem wekoei theletlabü lele
hao la pendou to thükkabou nyen kukei.

Hibü, ngei sanoubü jaisinasi shuong, kanei ngüha lebü tetsida ho ki. Ngo kan yoa kijinei kanei ponpendou kü ngüha lekei. Tou ngo kan yo ka bangan kijinei aei ngüha leda. Ngei laubü ho ditashi: hatko hoba lühko kaneibü khümenbü pentisoutila kümaleiashi.
Aishanga aoei jembü maanghaiko kümtila shanga kan to maangangenlabü hoba kümlabü ham longtida, kho Mühghaü.

Kan nali athebü hoba hinseibü yeilabü lele, kanei kümbüleibü pendou anyamnyambo hoba apekawetyoko kümashi. Kholongaje kombü hoba khei- peinyu paibü meten yoa kan penbüsoubü Mühghaü shousi shuong yinglabü,

hoba kanei haoen la ngühlang kho songlenjinei kan kaodaka haoen yoa khanshoulitshou tegü haulabü. Khei yingsije, ngo amlangbüa alaang hoba jim akibüa akümalei dogo Khrista Chaloua ngo denche shanga the lenenla thüklabü.
Kaneibü mailem kho Mühghaü la kubü lembüsabü ki, hoba kü langkei sii kho lembü thük to jonlep yingkei; khei yingsije ngo olinlabü hoba kan pendou yoa kü olin janyolabü.
Kankei olinjan hoba kho olin janyobüa yojan.
Bunyubouei maangangbü yingsije, kan jungto Timoti tongde hautikulabü dogo ngei maanglemda. Aishanga kaneibü ngühlang ditoubü danko ngo olinmang sühda.
Aishanga kaneibü thu shanga maimaitham dambubou hao maangpon tegü yembü kü yoa müt ao aki.
Aishanga haoen pendouei Jisu Khrista shanga alambo jembü ku shanga lamda.
Lausikei nashou cheei ailai jembü bou khangenda, kho tegü Ngühlang Maibü haatila shanga haoei kü yoa khangenkei, dogo kanei hao shanga aukabü ngeakei.
Hibü kü shanga ailai yeilabü ngei ngeko lousije hao kan jungto khoyam hautilabü dogo ngei maanglemda.
Lausikei Bunyubouei maang- angsije ngo kan jungto lalok akiko louphang.
Ngei jaisina Epafrodita kan jungto ngaitilabü dogo dambei. Haoei kü yoa kümbeileikei hoba ngeibü khambüa ngo khangenla hautikubou kaneibü ngühlang künbouei kü yoa thipan long- yokei.
Aishanga hao shatko kikei dogo kanei ditsi, haoei kan pendou haüyola chüheikei, hoba aeibou maangmaukei.
Maimaitham hao haikhün ka langko shatkei. Lausikei Mühghaüei hao to onoukei, hoba hao to ong ayingko kü to kei onoukei. Ngangbü thüka ngangbü ühüptila haoei ngo püetkei.
Hibü kanei hao nyibou hapbo olinla shanga, hoba ngeibü maangmau koutila shanga, ngei hao aeibou hautimang sühko hautikua.
Maimaitham Bunyuboua hao aeibou olinko sungletashi, hoba kanei kheibü müt la soumo kuashi.
Aishanga Khrista khangenbüa hao haikhün ka sheibütham püetkei. Kü to thuila kan akitei, hoba kan jeiko lokula shanga haoei hao langkeiei thungyokei.
Thonla, kü jaisinasi shuong, Bunyuboua olinashi. Ngei kan to thedang to lenbü ong ngei nopmaida, lausikei khoei ngo aoda hoba ho kan shanga maangsanglabü ki.
Kei shuong shanga maangsangashi, lipan apbü shuong shanga maangsangashi.
Tükdebü kipbü shuong kho sen ki. Mühghaü Soushouei seneibü lembü hangsilam leida. Sen yaangenbü kho Khrista Jisua ki. Senei tangkabü phea maanglem aphoda.
Tangkabü phe haanga habü yinga tegükei ngo aikei hatlabü aki. Atei phea maanglemla thükbü shanga laualonga, kü to aeibou ao ki?
Ngo chalou setbounyet kipbei; Ngo Israel mütli, Benjamin phang, hoba Ibribü nyusiboueibü shou Ibribü. Ngühkhüm jungeibü aenei ngo Farisi che kiteikei.
Ngei maangdakbü aeka lashong shieikoekei; hoba Ngühkhümei sakkubü saopobü aeka shedbü ühüpenbü müt.
Khei yingasikei khübü pailetbü pendou Khrista shanga kongbü dogo weeikei.
Hobaje toukei ngeibü Bunyubou Khrista Jisu hapbüngebü maiboutham shanga pendou maubü dogo ngei weeida.

Hobaje ngei Khrista pailetbü shanga hoba ngeibü saopobü laobou ngühkhüm ka ki, kho aying, lausikei saopobü laobou Khrista to mailembü danko hoba Mühghaü ka mailemei louda, kho saopobü kian, ngei hao hapla shanga, hao shangabüa ngo pendouei kongbü natenkei, hoba khübü kho odsinot ong dogo weeida.
Ngei ngemang sühbü khümboei Khrista hoba hao langngaibü danko loubü sei. Ngei hao khonsak janyomang sühda hoba hao haibüa hao phatko yeimang sühda;
hoba ushaleko ongkei haibü ka ngo nyibou langngaimang sühda.
Ngei pendou hapa ayingsi ngoje penasoua dogo ngei alauda. Lausikei ngei thungyoda hoba ho lapoula haujemda, aieilausi Khrista Jisueikei kho shanga ong ngo lapbei.
Jaisinasi shuong, ngei ho molapoukei dogo ngeakei. Lausikei kü shanga che ong ki: phainei ai ki kho maada hoba ai thea thangan ki kho onlangda.
Jisu Khrista danko Mühghaüei ngo ngabü khuthükbü langkei jongsak kaopheitet sühlangla ngo thungyoda.
Hibü sen ladüng soushoua inthonbü shuong ki, kho sensimaang ong kikho, hoba kanei aineije sensimaang phangche kisije, khokei Mühghaüei kan la shanga shattikulabü.
Senei sen loshang ka khangjan, lausikei senei sühlangbü younaka sen kijung haujan.
Jaisinasi shuong, kan pendou ngo tegü kila haujemashi. Künei kan la tetsida che phokuda; aoyouei kün tegü paida haoen chühletashi.
Aishanga, ngei kan to annebenko lenbü tegü hoba toukei ngei haapbo lenda, khei juongnyu Khrista peisei dangbou shuong tegü langkeida.
Thonbüa haoen shemlabü; aishanga jembü shiang haoeneibü mühghaü ki, haoen yaangenbü haoen himoua ki, hoba haoeneibü maangpon kaodak peisileia ngütakei.
Lausikei sen khuthük mütli ki. Hobaje Bunyubou Jisu Khrista khuthük ka louan sen khümenla shanga senei haiyeida.
Haoei laobou seiei ajanjan pendou jembü phanga phola thükkei, kho seisihau jungeiko haoei seneibü akhainyu mang kho hao soneikangbü mang phatko haansangla yeiko jeileikulabü.

Hibü jasinasi shuong, ngei kan to sanouda hoba kan waangda. Kanei kü la olinbü kuda hoba ngeibü thüksimin amaaphilabü kan ki. Hibü ngei sanoubü jaisinasi shuong, Khristaei kan shanga kümbula thükbü pendou shanga kan Khristan shuong phatko kaangkhühtham loashi.
Ngei Euodia si Sintikhe Bunyuboua maangpon che la yeishi dogo thungeida.

Haü, kü yoa maimaitham buleng chenei lengbü, nyi khübü yaksa shuong to thuiashi dogo ngei katokei sudajada, aishanga haoenei kü yoa hoba Klement hoba kü yoa liko kümbü lubü shuong, aoyou nyen langkei lea doan ki, haoen yoa khübü sao shuongei Ngühlang maibüa kümbei.
Ponpen Bunyuboua olinashi; nyiboukei ngei lenkho, Olinashi!
Kan semet ametbü pendou la ngetiashi. Bunyubou khama nyangko ki.
Aineikei maangpon tekouma, lausikei pendoua welaubü hoba subüjabü hoba nyensangei kanei hibü Mühghaü la ngetiashi.
Hobaje Mühghaü hakso laobouei ditenbü pendou leithetda khoei Khrista Jisua kaneibü maangpon hoba dambü lombo kilabü.

Thonbüa, jaisinasi shuong, ai ong ngühmai ki, ai ong soumo hatlabü ki, ai ong janbü ki, ai ong hinseibü ki, ai ong sanoulabü ki, ai shanga ong ngühlang maibü ki, denche maibü kisije, hoba denche nyensang kisije, khübü shanga daman chühashi.
Ai ong kanei kü ka ditletkei, hoba sungletkei hoba ditkei hoba hapbei, khübü kho kümashi; kholongaje hakso Mühghaü kan yoa kilabü.
Lausikei tou thonbüa kanei kü shanga dambü sinngaia dogo, ngo Bunyuboua aeibou olinda; maimaitham kaneikei ngo dambo kikei, lausikei kanei kü to thuila jih maibü ühüp.
Aki alebü shanga ngei lauda ji, aishanga ai thua ong ngo kilaje, khünei maanghaiko kila ngei thekua.

Ailai akhainyu thua kila kho ngei ngekei, hoba ailai souko auko kila khokei ngei ngekei. Ajanjan pendou hoba kümsilei pendoua, photko kilakei hoba shikong lopkong kilakei, juongnyu phoan kilakei hoba kangan kilakei, kho huphang ngüh kho ngei ditleda.
Khrista aoei ngo hau kitida hao danko ngei pendou kümla thükkei.
Khei yingasikei kanei ngo khonsak khonkua thangjamsi, kanei maibü jungeikei.
Hobaje toukei Ngühlang Maibü songlen khangbüa, ladang ngo Makedonia ka bangkei, kan to liman lubü lashong aoeikei lemla kubü hoba sungletbüa kü yoa ajam dogo kan Filipibüei ngekei;
aishanga ngo Thesalonikaa kijineikei che nyinei sühko ngo khambü kanei küntikei.
Ngei jongsak shanga lauda aying, lausikei kan nyena habü buhek shanga ngei phanda.
Lausikei ngei pendou kia, hoba juongnyu kia. Ngei kan ka ponlem maibü hibü, Mühghaüei maanghaibü kan ka loubü sungletla mubü lembü, Epafrodita ka sungletan ngo souakei.
Hobaje kü Mühghaüei Khrista Jisu danko hao soneikangbü nyaksinam thüng kan khambü pendou kulabü.
Tou seneibü Bunyubou Mühghaü to ponpen thon akibü soneikangbü yingshi. Amen.
Khrista Jisua saopobü shuong weko la salem kuashi. Kü yo kabü jaisinasi shuongei kan la salem kuda.
Saopobü shuong pendouei hoba kongnyu leko Kaisar chemdanga kibü shuongei, kan la salem kuda.
Bunyubou Jisu Khrista onou kaneibü soushou yoa kishi.
Ho le Mühghaüei maangangbüei youkoikjai Paul, hoba seneibü jaisina Timoti ka,
Kolosia kibü Khristaa Mühghaü mütshuong hoba maanglemenbü jaisinasi shuong jungto. Seneibü Bou Mühghaü ka kan jungto onou hoba hakso yingshi.
Ladang ong künei kan shanga welauda, künei seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khristaeibü Bou Mühghaü la nyensang kuda;
aishanga künei Khrista Jisua kaneibü mailem hoba kanei Mühghaü mütshuong pendou to sanoubü shanga dida.
Hobaje ham pakshang kho, tükdebü Ngühlangmaibü ngühlang kan jungto loujinei ditbü mailem laobou kan shanga khuthüka tang khitlabü ki, kho mailem yingkei.
Hobaje ailai Ngühlang Maibü kaodak pendoua mai hekda hoba haada, kho tegü laonyet kanei Mühghaü onou shangabü maimaitham ditkei hoba ngekei, khünyet ka jaüan kan yoakei Ngühlang Maibü kho mai hekda.
Aishanga kün jenabou sambü sanoubü Epafra, ao lekün shanga Khrista maanglemenbü khangenbü ki, hao ka kanei Ngühlang maibü kho ditletkei,
hoba haoei Soushoua kaneibü sanou kün la ngetikei.
Hibü kho ngüh ditnyet ka jaüan künei kan shanga athakko welauko sudajada. Soushou songsihon hoba ditenbü pendoua hao maangangbü ngebüei kan shenlabü shanga,
hoba Mühghaü ngebüa hakso, kümsilei maibü pendoua mai hekko, hoba pendoua Bunyubou maang haitiko, muko paila shanga künei welauda.
Hobaje olinbüei lounyu natenbü hoba aman apbü, pendou shanga hao soneikangbü sei tegü hau pendouei hau kitila shanga,
hoba Bou aoei ngesakbüa hao mütshuong yoa phetphan janyobü yeila shanga sen mutikei, kanei hao nyen sangla shanga ngei welauda.
Aishanga haoei nakthüh songdak ka sen khümenkei hoba haoei sanoubü shou Sangle to sen leibakei.
Hobaje Shouei seneibü shabü apbukei hoba sen angthetkei.
Haoei sen la hao langkeia ühüpenbü Mühghaü noksa lenda. Yaübü peisilei pendou thüka hao shaangbou shou ki,

aishanga hao danko Mühghaüei khuthüka hoba kaodaka kibü, hapbü hoba ühüpbü; choba setshang hoba bunyu shuong, songdakbü shuong hoba songdak hau shuong, hoba ajanjan pendou Mühghaüei hao danko hoba hao shanga yaükei.
Hao pendou to shaangbou ka thama ki, hoba hao to pendou kida.
Lashong kho haoeibü mang hoba hao khoeibü khu. Ajanjan pendoua hao shaangbou yingla shanga, hao khangbou, hoba haibü shuong yoka shaangbü Shou.
Aishanga Mühghaüei hao penbüsoubü pendou hao to kila pienkei.

Hobaje peiseia haoeibü sii koubüei sangmai kümbü danko, haoei mühnyu kaonyu khümbo hao danko hao to jitiphaitila pienkei. Haü, mühnyu kaonyu khümbo, khuthüka si kaodaka kibü pendou hao danko jitiphaitikei.
Honei kankei yoakei. Jih chenei kan Mühghaü ka bangan kiteikei, aishanga kaneibü dambü pendou hao khulimbü hoba kümsilei shuong amaibü kikei.
Lausikei kan saopobü, nali athebü hoba shedbü akiko hao thedanga kuenlabü lele hao Shou phea haibü danko Müghaüei kan jembü to jitiphaitikei.

Lausikei kan kaneibü mailema anyaakeiko kaangkhühtham lojan. Kanei ditbü Ngühlang Maibüei kubü maanglem ka kan tekuk. Ngühlang Maibü kho kaodak khümbo jembo phinthona hoba ngo Paul, khoeibü sambü la yeikei.
Tou ngo kan laüa khonsakla olinda. Haoeibü mang, khei lashong, shanga ngo phea khonsakbü pendou Khristaei ho shanga khonsakbüa shomyokuda. Ngei hao khonsak pentisoutida.
Mühghaüei ngo lashongeibü sambü yeitikei. Haoei kü la kan nyena shanenbü kümsilei che nongkukei,
kho, khuthükbü hoba kaodak meten sünga huan kibü Mühghaü ngühlang benbüsoubüa kan la khuokenkula shanga kiteikei, lausikei thonla hao mütshuong to tang khida.
Hobaje Mühghaüei Küksithang yoa ho huphang ngüh soneikangbü nyaksinam ho ai, kho haoen la ngetila maanghaiko kikei. Kho Khrista kan to kibü, hoba hoei kan la loulabü soneikangbü shanga maanglem kuda.
Künei müt pendou penbüsoubüa Khrista thedanga kuenlabü lele, künei mütpem weko lenenko hoba mütpem weko thungeiko songlenda.
Hobaje ho shangabü aoei kü to seiei kümsilei kümda haoeibü hau pendouei ngeikei wapyoko kümsilei kümda.
Ngei kan shanga hoba Laodikiaa kibü shuong hoba aoyou thenyek ngei ühüpbei, haoen shanga ngei latetche long- yoko wapyoda kho kan la ngetimang sühda.

Ngei haoen maang yaangentimang sühda. Haoenei penkosouko ditenan pendoua sopbojaiko keilabü lele ngei haoen sanoua thangjamtimang sühda. Khei yingsije haoenei Mühghaüeibü huphang tangkhit, ao Khrista ki, hao ngelabü.
Hao to songsihon hoba hapbüngebü pendou huan ki.
Ngüh teibüei aolakei kan akhüpettila shanga ngei ho lenda.
Ngo phea ayoensikei, ngo soushoua kan yoa yoakei hoba kaneibü tedtangbü the- chüh hoba Khrista to kibü kaneibü mailem kaangbü hapan olinda.
Hibü kanei ailai Khrista Jisu sungletkei, kho tegü hao to li atko hoba jenshuokko
kan la lenbü mailema kaangtiko, nyensang aeibou kuko hao to paiashi.
Atei hao hapbü ngebü songsido hoba khüpbülangbü lejim akibüa, hoba müteibü pisibou ngühli hoba kaopakbü ngüh shuong, laobou Khrista ka aying, khübüei kan aao la leko aleilangtila maangsangashi.
Aishanga hao to Mühghaü tükdebü pendou penbüsoubü mang khümbomeiko thonakei;
hoba ao soushou konglebou hoba sei pendou thüka songdak hau ki, hao to kan penbüsoubü yeitida.
Ik ayoko kipan apbüei, Khrista kipbüa phe mang kho apbüei, hao to kan kipan apbei.
Hobaje baptibüa kan hao yoa khünkei, hoba tokei baptibüa haibü ka hao langngaitibou Mühghaüei kümbü mailem danko kan hao yoa langngaitikei.
Hobaje kan shabüa hoba Küksithang yingsije phe kipan üpbü hama haian kibü ka haoei kan hao yoa liko langngaitikei. Haoei sen la seneibü shabü pendou apbukei.
Hobaje sen khulimbo ikei dobü ngühkhüm laobou sen khulimbo loan kikei, kho haoei haman apan peiseia thünglanga.
Hobaje kongnyubou shuong hoba sei shuong soletan, khübü thüka thükenbou yeiko haoei khübü tang khitko lena.
Hibü shaubü yingasikei, yungbü yingasikei, lemsilang chalou yingasikei, litnyu touanga yingasikei, Nounyet shangabü yingasikei aolakei kaneibü mat tejemti.
Habü pendou loula kibü yeme che ong; lausikei mang kho Khristaeibü.
Khu, ao phanga mang pemtolo, thenyobü hoba phejak liko jujambo jenshuokan Mühghaü lamthena chingda, kho khu to thangjaman kikhoulabü jeila,
jim akibü phe sensimaangei olin kungkhenko yeian, mühei nyengbü hoba khuthük hangangbü lembü songle shangabü aolakei jembü maang leko kan shanga ngühkhüm tekümti.
Kan kaodak songsido khangshang ngüh shuong ka bangan Khrista yoa haikei longa, kholonga aila kan tou sühko kho ngühkhüm phanga kibü tegü:
“Tejungei, tejep, temeiti,” dogo lautida?
Khübü peisilei pendou jungeibü ka maula tetsepakei, aieilausi khübü kho müteibü ngühkhüm hoba lenbüa thonakei.
Jembüei lemmangsühbü lembü hoba hanglenla sangsembü hoba mang khonkutibü, habü hoeije songsihon phatko haptida, lausikei haoenei phe dühbü pejapelabüje asenetenda.
Kan Khrista yoa langngaikei; hibü Mühghaü maenei, laonei Khrista setan ki, thükaenei kibü peisilei shuong lamashi.
Kaodaka kibü peisilei aying, lausikei thükaenei kibü peisileia kaneibü maangpon phoashi.
Aishanga kan haikei, hoba kaneibü langkei Khrista yoa Mühghaüa huakei.
Khrista, kaneibü tükdebü langkei ki, hoba ladang hao nyibou tang khitlaje kankei hao yoa soneikangbüa tang khitlabü.
Hibü kaodak haang kaneibü küksihuo, khei; asangalanbü, ihinseibü, amaibü dühbü, pejapelabü, hoba nyekdüh maangdüh, laobou heangsho lembü ki, khübü pendou kanei haitiashi.
Aishanga habü laüa ngüha alebü shuong thükto Mühghaü maangshat louada.
Shangied ladang kan habünei haangkei, kankei khünei paikei.
Lausikei touje Khristan shuong yingsije, kanei habü pendou, khei khauang, maangshat longbü, theshoubü, nyikubü hoba sembung ka himou ngüh laubü apashi.
Cheei che to teyepei; aishanga kanei hangbü müt kümsilei yoa hangletnyu apa,
hoba ao müt haanbü, jembü kümbou phatko penbüsoubü songsihon to haanbü küman ki, hao hele la lea.
Ho haanbü langkeiaje Grikbü hoba Jihudabü, kipbü hoba akipbü, barbarbü hoba Sitiabü, aao, dongebü, dogo aikei janyinbü aki. Khrista pendou, hoba pendoua ki.
Hibü, Mühghaüeibü pienbü shuong tegü, saopobü hoba sanou, sanouko dambü maangpon, üeisanou, haanbü la yeibü, eaaoabü, lounyu natenbü, habü hele leashi.
Müt atei at khulimbo shedbü kula kisije, kanei jenabou si jenabou lounyu natenyoko amai apyoashi. Bunyubouei kan la amai apbua hibü kaneikei apbuashi.
Hobaje habü pendou thüka sanou, laobou penbüsoubü khühbü ki, kho sungletashi.
Hobaje Khrista hakso, laobou jungto kankei mang chenei ngakei, kho kaneibü maangpona chobatiashi, hoba kanei nyensangko kishi.

Nyaksinam tegü Khrista ngüh kan to thüngtiashi. Songsihon pendouei jenabou si jenabou lenyoashi hoba thungei- yoashi. Nyensang chia hoba saopobü chia hoba soushou chiaei kaneibü maangpona olinbüei Mühghaü to laushi.
Hobaje ngühanga yingsikei, kümaleia yingsikei, kanei ai ong kümlaje, Bunyubou Jisu nyena pendou kümashi, hoba hao danko Bou Mühghaü la nyensang kuashi.
Yaksi shuong, Bunyuboua lai mubü ki, kho tegü jembü lao phanga kishi.
Laosi shuong, jembü yaksi shuong to sanouashi hoba haoen khulimbo tekausak.
Nashousi shuong, kanei jembü nyusibou to ponpen ngüha leshi; aishanga khoei Bunyubou olintida.
Bousi shuong, haoen hau thetlabü lele kan shousi shuong to temaangpok.
Sambü shuong, kaneibü bunyu shuong to ponpen ngüha leshi, hoba müt olintibou shuong tegü, nyekeibü kümsileiei aying, lausikei Bunyubou to soumo hatbüa lanbü maangponei kümaleiashi.
Bunyubou ka phet- phanbü ku haplabü dogo ngean,
kanei ai ong kümlaje kho müt to aying, lausikei Bunyubou to maangpon khümboei kümashi. Kanei Bunyubou Khrista khangenda.
Aishanga aoei ong shedbü jungeilaje haoei jembüei kümbü shedbü shanga hapmeilabü, hoba khünei müt the chühbü aki.
Bunyu shuong, khuthüka kaneibü Bunyu che kia dogo ngean kaneibü sambü shuong janbüa hoba hangalama jungeiashi.
Welaua kaangko athakko kiashi, hoba khonei nyensang kubü yoa pikolemko kishi.
Khüto yoko, Khrista huphang ngüh laobou laüa ngo tou thüngdanga ki, kho ngüh lenenlabü lele koukhün ipbuashi dogo Mühghaü to pheko kün shangakei welaukushi.
Ngei hangalama shangashatbüei lauenlabü lele welaukushi.
Jihsiphai maibü angthetko, kokabü shuong aenei songadoa paiashi.
Mütpem weko to kanei lai jongaijan kho kanei ngela shanga kaneibü ngüh ponpen onou yoa jemei teitiashi.
Tikhikaei kan la kü shangabü ngühlang pendou lenlabü. Hao küneibü sanoubü jaisina hoba maanglemenbü thuibou hoba Bunyubou kümsileia thujam-sambü ki.
Kün shangabü pendou kan la ngetila hoba kan thungeitilabü nyekchüha ngei hao kan jungto hautikuda.
Küneibü maanglemenbü hoba sanoubü jaisina, Onesima, kan yokabü che, hao yoa thonakei. Hakabü kümsilei pendou haosiei kan la ngetilabü.

Thüngbüa kü meitangbou Aristarkha, Barnaba li Mark hoba Jasta nyenbü Jisu ka kan to salem küntida. (Kanei Mark shangabü sakkubü sungleda; hao kan jungto lousije sungletashi.) Khübü dan kho ong kü yoa Mühghaü Sangle shanga kümbüleibü Jihudabü Khristan shuong ki; haoen kü shanga maangpon haksoshang kiteikei.

Kan yokabü müt che Epafra kakei salem küntida. Khrista Jisu khangenbü che tegü, Mühghaüei maangangbü pendoua kan penbüsoubü hoba tükdebü yeiko loenlabü shanga, haoei haoeibü welaua ponpen kan shanga haujemda.
Hobaje kan hoba Laodikia hoba Hierapolia kibü shuong shanga haoei kümsilei aeibou kümbo hüda dogo ngei hao shangabü aukabü kuda.
Sanoubü daktar Luk hoba Demaei kan la salem küntida.
Laodikiaa hoba Nimfa hoba saoeibü chema kibü lashongbü la salem kuashi.
Ho le kan yoa wean chühan phaia Laodikia kabü lashong lakei wean chühtiashi; hoba Laodikia ka loubü le kho kan yoa wean chühashi.
Hobaje Arkhipa to, “Nyi Bunyuboua ai khangenbü kümsilei sungletkei kho khümtila haujemshi” dogo lenshi.
Ngei ho kü ikei doda: Ngo Paul ka salem. Ngo thüngdanga kia dogo damenashi. Mühghaü onou kan yoa kishi.
Ho le, Paul, Silvana hoba Timoti ka, Bou Mühghaü hoba Bunyubou Jisu Khristaeibü Thesalonika lashong jungto. Kan jungto onoubü hoba hakso yingshi.
Küneibü welaua kan nyen phongko künei kan pendou shanga ponpendou Mühghaü la nyensang kuda.
Kaneibü mailem ka longbü ikshatbü, hoba seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista to maanglem ka longbü natenbü, seneibü Bou thedanga Mühghaü künei athakko damenda.
Aishanga kan küneibü jaisinasi shuong hoba Mühghaüei kan sanouda. Künei kan Mühghaüei pienkei dogo ngeakei,

aieilausi künei ladang kan to Ngühlang Maibü songlenkei, kho ngüh konga ongje ayingtei; lausikei khünei Soushou Saopobü sei yoan kiteikei, hoba küneibü ngühlang ngühmai dogo kanei chongchingkei. Aishanga kan shanga kan aenei kün ailaibü mütshuong kiteikei kho kaneikei ngeakei.
Hobaje ngühlangei khonsak yaang senbasi dogokei Soushou Saopobüei kubü ngüh kho sungletko, kün hoba Bunyubou neinoubü yeikei,
hoba kho tegü kan Makedonia hoba Akhaiaa mailembü pendou to kan tetsida che yeikei.

Aishanga Bunyubou ngühlang heeko hoba haako yaangko dittibou kho no kiteikei. Makedonia si Akhaiaa ong aying, lausikei nyi Mühghaü to mailembü ngühlang kaodak pendou ae aa. Hibü künei ngühlang che ongkei lenla akhamda.
Aishanga kün shanga kan jungto kün ailai ong loukei, hoba kanei langkei hoba tükdebü Mühghaü khangenla ailai heangsho shuong ka Mühghaü jungto sepeikei,
hoba hao Shou, ao haoei haibü ka langngaitikei, ho Jisu aoei loula kibü khauang longbü ka sen khümenda, hao khuthük ka aloushongko haiteila haoenei hao lolo ngühlang kuda.
Jaisinasi shuong, künei kan pean chühbü kho lejim akibü ayingtei dogo kanei ngekei.
Kanei ngeakei shangla kün Filipia khonsak hoba awe asüngbü hapbei, lausikei juongnyuei kün kheinyu shiletasikei kan to haoeibü Ngühlang Maibü lenla küneibü Mühghaüei künla maangkhai kukei.
Aishanga künei thungeijangeibü, shedbüa, pejapelabüa ayingsi khüpettibüa aying.
Lausi dogokei, Mühghaüei künla haoeibü Ngühlang Maibü nongkula janthetkei hoba künei haoeibü maangangbüa lauda. Künei müt ayingko Mühghaü olintila haujemda, aieilausi haoei küneibü maangpon takteida.
Aishanga kanei ngean kibü tegü ladangkei künei amlangbüa nyensang laubü ühüp; ayingsi nyekdüh mangdüh hulepla ajungeiko kikei dogo Mühghaü aukabü ki.
Ayingsi kün Khrista youkoikjai yingbü shanga kan la künlean jinkuko kikhoulabü, lausikei kan ka yingasikei mü ka yingasikei müt aokakei nyensang alam.
Lausikei senyopbüei jembü shousi thounoubü tegü kan yoa kün eaaoa kikei.
Kho tegü kan to maangshikko sanousi, künei kan la Mühghaü Ngühlang Maibü ong aying, lausikei küneibü langkei mangkai kula maanghaiko kikei, aieilausi künei kan to aeibou sanouko yeikei.

Aishanga jaisinasi shuong, künei kan aolakei künalekula shanga, change nangnak kümsilei kümbo künei kan to Mühghaü Ngühlang Maibü songlenko kikei dogo kanei künei aicheküman haujembo kümbü hoba hübütoubü damenashi.
Kan mailembü aenei künei kün lolo lai hinseibü, saopobü hoba shedbü akiko jungeikei, kan hoba Mühghaükei aukabü ki.
Künei kan lai bouei hao shousi shuong thounoubü tegü thounoukei kho kanei ngeakei.
Mühghaüeibü soneikangbü Sangle to kan ngabü muko langkei kila shanga künei kan thungeijangeikei, maangkhaitikei hoba takshattikei.

Künei athakko Mühghaü nyen sangbü denche kia; aieilausi ladang kanei kün ka ditbü Mühghaü ngühlang sungletkei, kanei ho müteibü ngüh tegü asunglet; lausikei tou kan mailembü dan to kümeileiei loushedko kibü tegü, maimaitham Mühghaü ngüh ki dogo sungletkei.

Aishanga jaisinasi shuong, Khrista Jisua Jihudaa kibü Mühghaü lashong chühletbü shuong kan yeikei. Aishanga haoenei Jihudabü ka khonsak hapbü tegü, kaneikei jembü kaodak müt shuong ka khonsak jeteibü hapbei.
Haoenei Bunyubou Jisu hoba thuseibü shuong ham haitikei hoba kün shian sattikei. Haoenei Mühghaü aolintida hoba haoen müt pendoueibü dangbou ki.

Aishanga Küksithang shuong la haoen khümenlabü shanga lenbü ka ongkei haoenei kün shiletda. Hobaje haoenei kho tegü haoeneibü shabü lühbak ontida. Lausikei thonla Mühghaü maangshat haoen thükto lousüha.
Jaisinasi shuong, künei kan apyoan phaia kan nyekei ühüpsi dogokei, kan ladangkei maang- pon ka abang. Künei kan to theshuok hapyomang sühko waangan phaia tou ho longche ong hauda.
Kho aoa ong künei kan jungto loumang sühkei. Maimaitham ngo, Paulei, che nyinei huongeia. Lausikei Satanei kün shiletkei.
Aishanga ladang seneibü Bunyubou Jisu nyibou loulaje, kan ayingdangaje, küneibü mailem, ayingsi olinbü, ayingsi soneikangbü ao yingla?
Aishanga kan küneibü soneikangbü hoba küneibü olinbü.
Hibü künei touje anatenko, künei khanenan Athen sangnyua sukngailangan kila maikei dogo dambei.
Hobaje khübü khonsakei aokei anyaakeitila shanga, kan kangtila hoba kan mailema hau kitila, künei Khrista Ngühlang Maibüa Mühghaü khangenbou hoba küneibü na Timoti kan jungto hautikukei.
Aishanga ho shieikoeei kan aokei sepeinyu angailabü lele khonsak natenla sen pienakei dogo kanei kan lolo ngekei.
Aieilausi maimaitham, ladang kün kan yoa kikei, senei shieikoe haplabü dogo künei kan to shangiednyu lenkei; kho khei loushadkei hoba kanei ngeda.
Khoei ong ngei kan jungto Timoti hautikei. Ngeikei touje lalok anatenko apbei. Aishanga kaneibü mailemei takteibü tokkei si ayingsi küneibü kümsilei pendou jim akibüla yeikeije ngei ngemangsühkei.

Lausikei Timoti tou ong longeiakei hoba haoei kün la kaneibü mailem si sanou shangabü ngühlang maibü künbua. Kanei ponpendou kün sanouko damenda hoba künei kan hapmang sühbü tegü, kanei kün hapla waangko chüheida dogo haoei kün la lenkei.
Hibü, jaisinasi shuong, kün khonsak hoba khonkua kiasikei, kaneibü mailem shangabü ngühlangei kün aicheküman takliama.
Aishanga kan Bunyuboua kaangkhühtham loa longaje salang thüng yingakei.
Kan nyena hao junga kün olinbü pendou shanga künei Mühghaü ailai ong penkosouko sangenla?
Khoei kaneibü thenyek hapenla, hoba kaneibü mailema asoualebü soutila shanga, künei change nangnak aeibou haüko welauda.
Seneibü Mühghaü hoba Bou hoba seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khristaei kün kan jungto leishima.
Künei kan to sanoubü tegü, kan jenabou si jenabou hoba müt pendou to apsileko haabü- yaangbüei sanouyola shanga Bunyubouei kan to thuiashi.
Seneibü Bunyubou Jisu, jembü saopobü shuong pendou yoa loujinei, seneibü Mühghaü hoba Bou thedanga kan nali atheko hoba saopotham kiteilabü lele haoei kaneibü maangpon hau kitiashi.

Thonla jaisinasi shuong, khüpjambü Khristan shuong tegü künei kan to toukei denche phela hoba sulajala kia. Kanei kün ka ailai Mühghaü maang- hailabü lele paila ditletkei, hoba kan tokei laonei paida, khonei kan athakko aei haakoyaangko paila shanga thungeijangeida.
Aishanga Bunyubou Jisu danko künei kan la ai ngühkhüm kukei, kanei ngekei.
Mühghaüei kan ka mangsühbü kho saopobü: kan asangalanbü ka bangenashi;
kan mütpem wekoei jembü yak soumo kuko hoba hinseibüa phoenko jembü mang thepetla ngejan.
Mühghaü angebü Küksithang shuong tegü kanei phedüh maangdüha akhonyojan.
Ho shangabü aoeikei jembü jaisina akhüpettijan hoba shedbü ajungeijan; aishanga künei shangied kan maangsangtibü hoba aukabü kubü tegü khübü pendoua phoklambou kho Bunyubou ki.
Aishanga Mühghaüei sen ihinseibü shanga aying lausikei saopobüa ngakei.
Hibü aoei inletda haoei müt inletda aying lausikei Mühghaü aoei kan la Soushou Saopobü kuda, hao inletda.
Lausikei jaisina sanouyobü shangabü kan jungto dola akhamda, aishanga jenabou si jenabou sanouyola Mühghaüei kan la lena.
Hobaje maimaitham kanei Makedoniaa kibü jaisina pendou to kho jungeida. Jaisinasi shuong, khüto limankei haula shanga künei kan to sudajada.
Hobaje sangsembü langkei kila shanga, langkei kümsileia hautak nepla hoba künei shaangla lenbü tegü kaneibü ikei kümlaleila shanga kaneibü nyekchüh phoashi.
Kholonga kanei tangkabü ka soumo haplabü hoba shakei alelabü hoba aotokei anonglabü.
Jaisinasi shuong, maanglem akibü songalebü dan tegü, kanei mang ühaapla shanga, künei kan la haibü shuong shangabü angeko kitimang asühda.
Aishanga Jisu haikei hoba langngaikei dogo senei mailemsije, khei yingalonga Jisua haibü shuongkei Mühghaüei hao yoa leingaibalabü.
Aishanga Bunyubou loubüa sühko sen lang kibü shuong haibü shuong to ai aoakei ashaanglabü, dogo künei Bunyubou ngühei kan to lenda.
Aishanga uihinko, yaangenbü khuthük hangangbü langhei, hoba Mühghaü teklaangei, Bunyubou jembü lolo khuthük ka louyenlabü, hoba Khristaa haibü shuong shaang langngailabü.
Kheijinei sen lang kibü, jouan kibü shuong, mühloma Bunyubou to haüyola haoen yoa liko sangmeia hipjung anglabü. Hobaje kho tegü sen ponpendou Bunyubou yoa kilabü.
Hibü habü ngühei kan jenabou si jenabou maang suyoashi.
Lausikei jaisinasi shuong, jihsiphai si chalou shangabü kan jungto dola akhamda.
Aishanga nangnak kokbü loubü tegü Bunyubou Chalou loulabü dogo kanei chongchingko ngeakei.
Ladang haoenei, “Hakso hoba püetbü” dogo laulaje, kheijinei yaksa na hapjinei khonkubü tegü, hakde haoen jungto maubü louda; hoba haoen ai aoakei asatenlabü.
Lausikei jaisinasi shuong, kokbüei tegü kho Chalouei koklanglabü lele kan nakthüha aki.
Aishanga kan pendou ngesakbü shousi hoba chalou shousi shuong. Sen nangnak ayingsi nakthüheibü aying.
Hibü lubü shuong tegü sen teyepkho. Lausikei sen pianleman hoba maangsangko kikho.
Aishanga yepbü shuong nangnak yepda hoba ihei jaakbü shuong nangnak jaakda;
lausikei sen chaloueibü shuong pianleman kikho. Senei khükhuom la mailem si sanou lekho hoba khun la khümenbü maanglem hankho.
Aishanga Mühghaüei sen haoeibü maangshata yola tetenkei aying lausikei seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista danko khümenbü pailetla pienkei
Sen pian kiasikei ayingsi yepan kiasikei sen hao yoa liko lang kila shanga hao sen shanga haikukei.
Hibü kanei kümbo kibü tegü, jenabouei jenabou thungeijangeiyoashi hoba hau kitiashi.
Lausikei, jaisinasi shuong, kan yoa aoyouei kümda, hoba maangsangtida. haoen ngeashi.
Haoen to haoeneibü kümsilei shangabü sanoua aicheküman thüka soumo hatla shanga künei kan to sudajada. Kan yoa jikophaiko kishi.
Jaisinasi shuong, ayinglamto paibü shuong maangsangtiashi, maang tuongbü shuong thungeijangeiashi, hau akibü shuong to thuiashi hoba pendou ae lounyu natenashi dogo künei kan to thungeijangeida.
Aoeikei amaibü jeila amaibü akungaila maangsangashi; lausikei jenabou aenei hoba pendou aenei, ai maibü kho ponpen lamashi.
Ponpen olinashi,
athakko welauashi.
Ajanjan pendoua nyensang kuashi. Aieilausi kan shanga Khrista Jisua ho Mühghaüei maangangbü ki.
Soushou kho tenyetti,
songlen ngüh to tenyiku;
pendou takteiashi hoba maibou hatlepashi;
amaibü phang pendou ka bangenashi.
Hakso kubou Mühghaüei kan khümbo saüenkushi. Seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista loujinei haoei kan soushou hoba langkei hoba mang shedbü akiko khümenan phokushi.
Aoei kan ngada hao maanglemenbü, hoba haoei kho kümlabü.
Jaisinasi shuong, kün shanga welaukuashi.
Saopobü sembung shepbüei pendou la salem kuashi.
Ho le jaisinasi shuong pendou thedanga weashi dogo ngei Bunyubou nyena kan to kaangko lenda.
Seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista onou kan yoa kishi.
Ho le, Paul, Silvana hoba Timoti ka, seneibü Bou Mühghaü hoba Bunyubou Jisu Khristaeibü Thesalonika lashong jungto.
Bou Mühghaü hoba Bunyubou Jisu Khrista ka kan jungto onou hoba hakso yingshi.
Jaisinasi shuong, künei kan shanga Mühghaü la nyensang kubü athakjan. Ho mujemukei, aieilausi kaneibü mailem chingda hoba kan jenabou si jenabou sanouyobü haada.
Hibü kan shieikoe hoba khonsak pendou, laobou kanei aman apda, khübünei kaneibü mailem hoba natenbü shanga Mühghaü lashong pendoua künei kün lolo kan shangabü yaangenda.
Hobaje Mühghaü Sangle laobou shanga khonsakda kho Sangle shanga kan mubü weeilabü kan khonsak kho Mühghaü ngühmai matjembü tang khitbü amaaphilabü ki.
Maimaitham kan khonkutibü dan la khonku kungeilabü; honei Mühghaü ngühmai ki,
hoba Bunyubou Jisu wanlüha hao hau kibü haoeibü khuthük hangangbü yoa khuthük ka tang khitjinei, kan khonsak hapbü shuong la, kün yoa hakso kukho.
Mühghaü angebü shuong la, hoba seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Ngühlang Maibü ngüha alebü shuong la phoklam kulabü;
hoba haoeneibü kayang thon akibü leilubü hoba Bunyubou jungka hoba haoeibü thükenbü soneikangbü ka mauan apbü kilabü.

Kho chaloua ladang hao haoeibü saopobü shuong ka nyenhang hapla hoba hao to mailembü shuong ka soumo hapla shanga loulalje kheijinei kho haüthüklabü. Khünei kankei yoakei, aieilausi künei kan jungto sungbabü aukabü to kanei mailembei.

Khoei, seneibü Mühghaüei kan haoei ngabü muko weeitila künei ponpendou kan shanga welaukuda. Kanei maibü hoba penbüsoubü shanga maangdakbü hoba mailem ka longbü kaneibü kümsilei pendou hao seiei haüthüktiashi dogo künei welauda.
Seneibü Bunyubou Jisu nyen kan yoa soneikanglabü hoba kan haoeibü yingbü shanga kankei soneikanglabü dogo künei welauda. Seneibü Mühghaü hoba Bunyubou Jisu Khristaei kho onouei loushadtiashi.
Jaisinasi shuong, Bunyubou Jisu Khrista loulabü hoba sen chela takshatlabü shangabü,

Bunyubou Chalou tou yingkei dogo tetenbü ngühei yingasikei, ngühei yingasikei, kün ka yingkei dogo lauko leei yingasikei, kaneibü maangpon phühde anyaakeitila ayingsi maang amaula shanga künei kan to sudajada.
Aineikei aolakei kan tehuonetti; aishanga shangla Khüpyobou yaangbou kho alou shongko, hoba shabü müt, kho mangsenlabü shou, tang akhitti shongko ho akilabü.
Mühghaü nyen phongbü hoba lembüsabü ai ong ki haoei khulimlabü hoba hao lolo thükkabou to tonenan Mühghaü lembüchema setan, jembü lolo hao Mühghaü dogo laulabü.
Ngo kan yoa kijinei ngei kan la ho lenko kikei dogo kanei adamenda lo?
Hobaje hao jembü jihaphaia tang khitla shanga, hao to aiei senetda, kho kanei ngeakei.
Aishanga ngühkhüm attibouei huphanga touje kümsilei kümkhanga; lausikei aoei senetda hao angailang shongko ong kho tang akhittien.

Hobaje ngühkhüm dubou kho khoyam tang khitan aplabü. Kheijinei Bunyubou Jisu haoeibü soneikangbü pendoua loulabü; hoba haoei hao thükto hakei metlabü hoba hao haitilabü hoba haoei sei pendou langkulabü.
Ngühkhüm dubou loubü kho Satan sei danko tang khitlabü hoba khonei amlangbü seikümseilei, amaaphilabü hoba maang- panglabü thonan kilabü.
Khübü maulabü mütshuong kho amaiko khüpettilabü aieilausi haoenei haoen khümenlabü ngühlang olinko asunglet.
Khoei Mühghaüei haoen la khüpbülangbü hautikukei hoba haoenei amlangbü to tükde dogo mailemda,
hibü khoei aoyou ngühmai to mailembo amaibüa olinyoda, khübü pendou matjem phangto lotlabü.

Lausikei Bunyubouei sanoubü jaisinasi shuong, kan shanga künei Mühghaü la nyensang kula ponpen janbü ki, aishanga Soushouei saüenbü hoba ngühmai mailembüa khümenbü shanga Mühghaüei khangbü ka thama kan pienkei.
Bunyubou Jisu Khrista soneikangbü janyola shanga haoei künei sungbabü Ngühlang Maibü danko kan ngakei.
Hibü jaisinasi shuong, kaangkhühtham loashi, hoba küneibü lea yingasikei, ngühei yingasikei, kan to ai ngüh lenkei kho kangkhühtham hatlepashi.
Tou hao seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista, hoba seneibü Bou Mühghaü, aoei sen to sanoukei, hoba sen la onou danko ponpen thon akibü hakso hoba maanglem maibü kukei,
haoei kan maang- pon haksotiashi, hoba kümsilei hoba ngüh maibü pendoua kan kaangtiashi.
Thon leko, jaisinasi shuong, ailai kanei Bunyubou ngüh yeililanglia aatida, kho tegü künei kila shanga,
hoba daman achühbü hoba amaibü mütshuong ka kün püetlabü lele kün shanga welaukuashi; aieilausi pendoueije mailembei aying.
Lausikei Bunyubou maanglemenbü ki; haoei kan hau kingaitilabü hoba amaibou ka kan lomatlabü.
Hobaje künei kan la kubü ngühkhüm kanei kümda, hoba tokei kümlabü dogo kan shanga Bunyuboua künei mailem ki.
Hobaje Bunyubouei kaneibü maangpon Mühghaü sanou jungto hoba Khrista natenbü jungto leiashi.
Jaisinasi shuong, kün ka ditletbü tegü apaiko hauloko shoongaibü jaisina tan ka sukngailangashi dogo seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista nyena künei kan la sakkuda.
Aishanga ailai kanei kün chühletjan kanei kan lolo ngekei. Aishanga kün kan yoa kijinei ohaulo.
Kün la oknyinbü pendou shanga künei mu kukei. Kan dan ao shangakei onat ayingtila shanga künei chalou nangnak haujembo hoba hüshuokko kümbeileikei.
Kho kün kanei pangtei onoujan ayingbü ka ji, lausikei kanei kün chühlettila shanga, kün lolo kan to tetsida lenkei.
Aishanga kün kan yoa kijinei künei kan la hai sakkukei: müt atei akümalei longa, haoei ashau ayunglabü.
Aishanga kan yoa atei haulo haushedko akümaleiko kümsilei hansho ongkei akümda, lausikei jim akibüa shoongaida dogo künei ditda.
Tou takshatbüa haoenei kümsilei kümashi, hoba haoenei jembü shausiyung shauashi dogo, kheibü tan to Bunyubou Jisu Khristaa künei ngühkhüm kuda hoba thungeida.
Lausikei jaisinasi shuong, kümsilei maibü kümbüa obünongbü tekima.
Hobaje müt atei ho lea künei dobü ngüha alelonga, kho müt tetdangan phoashi, hoba hao himoutila shanga kanei hao to teyang.
Khei yingasikei hao dangbou tegü tejungei, lausikei jaisina tegü thungeiashi.
Tou haksotibou Bunyubouei haoei lolo kümsilei pendoua pendou aenei kan la hakso kushi. Bunyubou kan pendou yoa kishi.
Ngeibü salem ngüh ngo, Paulei jembü ikei doda; kho kü le pendoua amaaphilabü ki; ngei khei doda.
Seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista onou kan pendou yoa kishi.
Ho le, sen khümenbou Mühghaü hoba seneibü maanglem phobou, Khrista Jisu ngühkhüm tegü, Khrista Jisu youkoikjai Paul ka,
mailema haoeibü shoumai Timoti jungto. Bou Mühghaü hoba seneibü Bunyubou Khrista Jisu ka ka jungto onou, üeisanou hoba hakso yingshi.
Ngo Makedonia to haujinei ailai ngei ka la sakkubü kukei kho tegü ngei no Efesiaa thüngtimang sühda. At danshuongei amlangbü lenbü

hoba ngühli si thonshang akibü phangeibü ngühli thenla haujemyobü ka thaktila shanga ngei ka la ngühkhüm kutimang sühda. Khübüei lemen ong longtida laka Mühghaü lamthen ühaatida. Mailemei ong kho kümla thükkei.
Kho ngühkhümeibü nyekchüh kho hinseibü maangpon, tangsheibü sensimaang hoba eaaoabü mailem ka longbü sanou chingtila shanga ki.
Atje khübü ka yonga hoba jim akibü wetyolauyobü to sepeia.
Haoenei ai lauda, ayingsi ai shangabü haoenei maangkeilembo lauda, kho aditenasikei, haoen Ngühkhüm lenbou la yeimang sühda.
Hangalama jungeialonga Ngühkhüm kho aicheküman maikei dogo künei ngekei.

Ho saopobü shuong nyekchüha aying lausikei ngühkhüm lulimbü si athepetbü dan shanga, Mühghaü to ühütbü si shabü dan shanga, asaopobü si songle to nyikubü dan shanga, bou haitibü si nyu haitibü dan shanga, müt haitibü dan shanga,
asangalanbü dan shanga, bousuei bousu jungeibü dan shanga, amlang theletlanletbü dan shanga hoba tükdebü lenbü khulimbo ai ong ki,
hoba kü la nongkubü, haübou Mühghaü Ngühlang Maibü soneikangbü lenbü khulimbo ai ong ki, khübü danshuong shanga ngühkhüm kho kümbei dogo senei ngejan.
Ngei seneibü Bunyubou Khrista Jisu, aoei kü la ho khangenbü kümsilei shanga hau kukei, hao nyen sangda; aishanga,

shaanglaje ngo nyikubou, shieikoebou hoba sekbülakbü che yingan kiasikei, haoei ngo maanglemenbou dogo weeikei hoba ho kümsilei to ngo pienkei. Lausikei haoei kü la onou lenkei, aieilausi, maialembü thu chenei ngei kho angebüa kümbei,
hoba Khrista Jisua kibü mailem hoba sanouei kü la Bunyubou onou apsileko kukei.
Khrista Jisu shabü shuong khümenla kaodak to loukei. Kho mailemla thükkei. Hobaje ngo pendou to amaibou shabü müt ki.

Aoyouei ponpen thon akibü langkei shanga hao to mailemlaje haoen to tetsida yingla shanga, Jisu Khristaei jembü lounyu natenbü pendou kü to, konglebou che tegü, tang khitko lenla shanga kü la onou lenkei.
Tou ponpen thon akibü Choba, ühaibou, ühüpenbou, hoba Mühghaü Che to, hao to nyenhang hoba soneikangbü pon- pen thon akiko yingshi. Amen.
Kü shou Timoti, nyi mailem hoba sensimaang maibü phoan, lason maibü wapyola shanga, shangied ka shanga tetenbü ngüh shuong tegü ngei ka la ho ngühkhüm nongan phokuda.
Atje ho mailem hoba sensimaang maibü ka bangsije, haoeneibü mailem long lusaka.
Haoen yoa Humena si Alexander, haosiei Mühghaü nyikubü alaula songlenla shanga, haosi ngei Satan la khümbo kuan apa.

Pendou to shaangboua, Mühghaü to hatbü hoba daman- chühbü pendoua senei hakso hoba küpjembü langkei kila shanga, müt pendou shanga hoba Choba shuong shanga subüjabü, welau, sukujakubü hoba nyensangbü kula ngei thungeida.
Ao sen khümenbou Mühghaü, aoei müt pendou khümentimang sühda hoba ngühmai ngebü to loutimang sühda, hao junga maibü hoba sungletenlabü ki.
Mühghaü che kia; hoba tokei Mühghaü si müt kanglanga autoatbou müt, Jisu Khrista kia.
Haoei pendou shanga khümenbü angla jembü lolo kukei - ho aukabü jih tükdea kulabü aukabü ki.
Hobaje ho shangabü aukabü (ngei tükdebü lauda, ngo ayepeida) mailema hoba ngühmaia Küksithang shanga lenbou yingla shanga ngo songlendolenbou hoba youkoikjai pienbü ki.
Hibü, kan lan ong lemla shanga haüyolaje ngei bousu shuongei ik tuokko welautimang sühda; lausikei haoen kho khauang hoba oyophetyo akiko khümbo kubü langkei yingjan.
Kho tegü ong, yaksa shuongkei asungenko hoba takshatbüei ea aoabü hele jembü lolo leashi. Haoenei khulou awoujan, ayinglonga hon ayingsi phülem ayingsi namton neisimei alejan.
Lausikei haoenei Mühghaü lemla theletbü sao mubü kümsilei maibü hele leashi.
Yaksa shuongei sangsembo khümbo kuko theletashi.
Lausikei lenla ayingsi bousu thüka songdak hau lela ngei yaksa la asakkuda; lausikei haoen sangsembo kijan.
Aishanga shaangla Adam hoba kho phaia Ev kümbei,
hoba Adam akhüpetti. Lausikei yaksa kho khüpettikei hoba shabüa atetkei.
Yingasikei, haoen eaaoabüei mailem hoba saopoenbüa athakko kialonga, sao shou bukbüei khümenlabü.
“Atei lashong lombü kümsilei mangsühalonga, haoei kümsilei maibüa maangdakda.” Ho mubü ngüh ki.
Aishanga lashong lombou che kho shedbü akibü, yak cheeibü lao, eaaoabü, thepetbü, hoba tedtangbü langkei yingjan. Hao yenmangshikbü hoba lenlo maibou yingjan.
Hao ih to khambü müt ayingjan. Hao sekbülakbü aying lausikei semet- ametbü hoba themai maangmai yingjan. Hao nam to khaubü müt ayingjan.
Haoei hao chemdang maisho song takenbü hoba jembü shousi shuong soumo phanga küpletthako thepetenbü müt yingjan.
(Müt cheei hao chemdang songdak ajungen longa haoei lai küman Mühghaü lashong che thounoula?)
Yonglam khuian shabü mühghaü che atetbü tegü jeteibü matjema atetsi amaibula hao kho tou nyangko songlela lotbü müt ayingjan.
Khüto liman hao nyikubü ühüplabü hoba shabü mühghaü sunga aminlabü shanga, tangkabü shuong ka hao aukabü maibü hapjan.
Dikon shuongkei damanchühbü yingjan. Haoen liphekbü ayingsi ih to khaubü ayingjan. Haoen nyaksinama tedtangbü yingjan,
hoba sensimaang hinseibüa seneibü mailem huphang ngüh hatlepenbü müt yingyan.
Shaangla haoen takteijan, hoba haoen to shedbü akisije, haoen dikon la leashi.
Haoeneibü yaksi shuongkei haüko damanchühbü yingjan; haoen sembung pek- pekbü aying lausikei eaaoabü hoba khümbomeiko maang lemenbü yingjan.
Dikonei yak che ong kijan, hoba shousi si chemdang ham song takenjan.
Aishanga aoyouei dikon kümsilei maian küma, haoen jembü lolo kümsilei maibü hoba Khrista Jisu to mailema aei maangkhaibü pailetda.
Ngo ka jungto tongde loula maanglemda, lausikei ngo phaiko khüpsije, ngühmai thaonyu hoba keshang,
laobou Mühghaü chem, khei langkei Mühghaü lashonga mütei lai jungeijan kho nyi ngela shanga, ngei habü ngüh doda.
Maanga shulabü akiko seneibü songle huphang ngüh kho latetche yaangkei:
“Hao phea tang khitkei,
hao Soushoua janbü hapbei.
Hao khuthük hangangbü shuongei hapbei,
hao phangshuong yoa phinthonkei.
Hao kaodak pendoua mailembei,
hao soneikangbüa anlangkei.”
Soushou Saopobüei chong- chingko lauda, thonbü chaloua müt atei haoen ayinglamto leibü soushou hoba shabü mühghaü ka loubü lenbü to maang kulabü hoba haoen mailem ka atetlabü.
Amlangbü lenbou shuong, aoyoueibü maangpon shabü mühghaüeibü amaaphilabüei shangjinan ki, haoenei huonkoyouko
chemkanbü shiletlabü. Haoenei toukei, ngühmai ngebü mailembü shuongei hao la nyensangbü kuko sunglettila shanga Mühghaüei laobou kümbei khübü shausiyungkei atje ashautila thangetlabü.
Mühghaüei kümbü pendou maibü ong ki. Asungletenlabü ai aki, lausikei ho nyensang kuko sungletjan,
aishanga ho Mühghaü ngüh hoba welauei saüentida.

Nyi khübü ngüh jaisinasi shuong maangpona thüngtialonga no Khrista Bunyuboueibü sambü maibü che yinglabü, hoba nyi lenbü mailem hoba nyi jungeienbü maibü songlenei no lolo soushoua chingentila thuilabü.
Asaopobü hoba shangiedbü pisibou ngühli tesunglet. No lolo saopobü langkeia lenenashi.
Mangsisau nongeisaebü hokei hanshoje ku, lausikei saopobü nongeisae khoje khümbo lejim kibü, aieilausi hoei toubü si loulabü langkei ham shangabü thebülanbü hatlepakei.
Ho ngüh mailemlabü hoba pendouei sungletla mukei.
Ho shangabü künei kümsilei kümda hoba haujemda, aishanga künei langkei Mühghaü, ao müt pendou hoba kongnyuleko mailembü shuong khümenbou ki, hao to küneibü maanglem phoda.
Nyi habü sakkuashi hoba lenashi.
No heshou langkei yingbü shanga aolakei aweasüngko tejungeiti, lausikei kaibü ngühlau, kaibü sanou, mailem hoba hinseibüa mailembü shuong thedanga tetsida che yingtishi.
Ngo aloushongko nyi Lai webü, songlenbü hoba lenbüa maangkuashi.
Jaishou shuongei ikei shangetjinei, tetenbü thusei ngüh loushedbüei ka la kubü laobou jongsak ka to ki, kho tewailet.
Habünei haujemashi; müt pendouei no haabüyaangbü shenlabü, no lolo haoen la khümbo kuan apashi.
Ka langkei hoba kaibü lenbüa maangsangashi. Khei jungeiashi, aishanga khei kümbü danko no hoba ka ngüh ditbü shuong ham khümenlabü.
Jaishou shuong to tühak lausikei hao to kabou to tegü suajaashi; nashou shuong aedang to kanasi shuong tegü,
noushou shuong to kanyusi shuong tegü hoba medei shuong to kaibü nasi shuong to tegü hinseibüa soumo hatko jungeiashi.
Tükdebü latnyu shuong to nyi hangalama thounouashi.

Lausikei latnyu atei jembü chemdang danko saopobü kümsilei küman lenlabü hoba kho phaia haoen chingen yaangentibou nyusibou hoba pisishuong to maibüei shemmaila ditlettiashi. Aishanga ho Mühghaü thedanga sungletenlabü ki.
Tükdebü latnyu khoje nyupem kiteilabü; saoei Mühghaü to mailem phoda hoba change nangnak welauko hoba thuibü hiko subüjabü athakda.
Lausikei latnyu aoei pejapelada, sao lang kijineithama haibü ki.
Haoen ngüh thoshaulabü lele akitila shanga habü ho sakkuashi.
Lausikei atei jembü chem- pen hoba kongnyuleko jembü chemdang athounoulonga, haoei mailem kho atheletkei, hoba hao songalebü tokei amaibou.
Po saosem phanga ayingbü latnyu che kho latnyu lühbaka doletashi. Sao kho laolamla che ong haubü müt yingjan.

Hobaje kümsilei maibü shanga laueibü sao yingjan. Sao kho shousi ongen yaangentinyu hoba yenmaangshikbü, Mühghaü mütshuongeibü you sakkubü, khonsakbü to thuinyu hoba kümsilei maibü pendoua khümbo kuko kijung loubü sao che yingjan.
Lausikei mütang maiabü latnyu shuong lühbaka tedolet. Aishanga ladang haoeneibü nyekdüh maangdühei Khrista khulimlaje haoenei laolamla haumang sühda.
Kheijineije haoenei shaangbou theletlanletbü kho lulimabuba haoen matjem phangto lotda.

Khüto liman haoenei chem chem to setla paida hoba haulola ditletda, hoba tokei haulola ditletbü kho ong jiko, sembung lishang küpajemda, hoba ayolabü pendoua yoanjembo, haoenei alaulabü ngüh lauko paida.
Hibü ngei mütangabü latnyu shuong laolamla hauko hoba shousi bukko chemdang thounoutimang sühda, hoba dangbou shuong sen khulimbo nyikulabü ngüh laula younak kutimang asühda.
Aishanga touthamakei atje Satan phai seman apa.
Lashongei tükdebü latnyu shuong thuienlabü lele, mailembü sao atei chempen latnyu kialonga, saoei haoen pangteiashi, hoba lashong onat teyeiti.
Jaishou shuong aoyouei maishoko songdakda, kongnyuleko aoyouei songlen hoba lenbü kümsileia haujembo kümda, haoen la munam phejan penyi shomyokula mubü ki dogo damenashi.
Aishanga Laishibaei lauda, “Masuei youshou nakjinei nyi sembung akhühlepkujan.” hoba toukei lauda, “Kümbouleibouei mu hapla muakei.”
Jaishou shuong khulimbo yuktibüa aukabü nyi ayingsi sem aki shongkoje tesunglet.
Joubü shuongei maangsanglabü lele shabü jungeibü shuong to pühthea hakashi.
Habü ho jungeila shanga Mühghaü hoba Khrista Jisu hoba saopobü khuthük hangangbü shuong thedanga ngei ka la sakkuda. Ladangkei shangalia alapbo hoba the to chühko matjem teku.
Sosopekpek aotokei khua teshanget, ayingsi mü shabüa teham; lausikei no lolo saopotham phoashi.
Kaibü shiang shanga hoba kaibü hanghang athükamin shanga touje deisang ongje ajenko, ih shibang jungeiashi.
Müt ateibü shabüje shangashatetnyu yingkei, hoba matjemshang to tangshaitham leida; lausikei ateibü shabüje haoen phai ong semda.
Kho tegütham kümsilei maibükei shangashatettiakei; hoba amaibü yinga tegükei haoen aikei huan aki.
Aoyou buleng phanga aao la yeian ki haoenei haoeneibü bunyu to soumo kula mubü dogo weeiashi. Haoenei khei ajungeilonga Mühghaü nyen si seneibü Khristan lenbü ham kho shalabü.

Sambü shuong aoyoueibü bunyu shuong mailembü ki, haoen jaisinasi la yeibü shanga dogoje soumo akuko akijan. Haoenei haoen aei maibou khangenjan, aieilausi aoyouei haoenei khangenbü ka pailetda khübü kho haoen to sanoubü himjam Khristan shuong ki.
Habü ngüh nyi lenjan hoba thungeijangeijan.
Müt atei lenbü phangcheei lenalonga hoba seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista hoba saopobü lenbüa hehoat akilonga,
hao khoje yonglamliliei khuilepa hoba ai angekei. Hao kho shatshang nyatshang. Haoei theshoubü, oyophetyo, nyikubü, maang alemenbü amaibü, hoba ihinseibü sensimaang longtibou tokyopekyobü
hoba lemen khanglabü ngühang ong mangsühda. Khübü pendou kho haiyep leilubü hoba ngühmai akibü mütshuongei jungeida. Haoenei songle kho keila yaanglabü hangsilam dogo damda.
Lausikei senei kibüei maang haialonga maimaitham songle kho ku yaang ki.
Aishanga senei ho kaodak to ai akünba, hoba haka ai künlangla athüklabü.
Senei shausiyung si neisimei kialonga khoei sen maang haijan.
Aoyou keimang sühda haoen takteibüa atetda hoba ngoualouabü hoba nyekdüh maangdüh sunga minda; khübüei mütshuong leilubü hoba maubüa nyemtida.
Aishanga nam to sanoubü kho amaibü phang pendou yemtibou li ki; hoba kho shieijinei müt atje mailem ka ayinglam to leilangan, ngangbü juongnyuei jembü lolo paiko sepbei.
Lausikei no Mühghaü müt ki hoba khübü pendou ka satenashi. Nyi ka maangpon saopobü, Mühghaü ngebü, mailem, sanou, natenbü hoba eaaoabüa phoashi.
Mailem lason maibü wapyoashi. Ponpen thon akibü langkei, laobou shanga Mühghaüei no ngakei, hoba aukabü juongnyu thedanga kaibü mailem aukabü theletkei, kho langkei hatlepashi.
Pendou la langkei kubou thedanga hoba Pontia Pilat thedanga aukabü ngüh maibü theletbü Khrista Jisu thedanga,
nyi seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista alou shongko, ngühkhüm nali atheko hoba anyikuko phola ngei ka la sakkuda.
Hao loubü kho haoeibü jihsiphaia, Mühghaü, ao Haübou hoba Bunyubou Che ong, choba shuong thüka Choba, bunyu shuong thüka Bunyubou,
hao ong ühaibou; aokei anyangenbü ngesakbüa hao kida. Aoeikei hao hapan achühkei hoba aoeikei hao hapla athük. Hao to nyenhang hoba ponpen athonbü seisihau yingshi. Amen.

Aoyou ho kaodak salanga keibü ki, haoen asungenla ayingsi chongachingbü nyaksinama haoeneibü maanglem apholabü, lausikei Mühghaü, aoei sen pendou la ajanjan pendou souko lela kuda, hao to maanglemla sakkuashi.
Haoenei maibü kümlabü, kümsilei maibüa keibü yingla hoba janyola lamlean kila hoba maiyola maangnyu angko kila lenashi.
Hibü, haoenei shangashatbü langkei hatlepenlabü lele, haoeneibü nyakei namei loulabü shanga denshang kaangbü chemshang che tegü loulabü shanga thanlabü lele haoen la ngühkhüm kuko lenashi.
Timoti, ka la nongkubü lomashi. Ho kaodak Mühghaü angebü ngühsidei hoba toket khipetbü songsido laobou to amlang “Hapbüngebü” dogo lauda, khübü ka no lolo satenashi.
Atei ho hapbüngebü theleda hoba mailem ka ayinglamto satan apa. Kan pendou yoa onou kishi.
Ho le, Khrista Bunyuboueibü youkoikjai yingla hoba Khrista Jisu thangjambüa thekubü langkei phinthonla shanga Mühghaü maangangbou Paul ka, haoei sanoubü shou Timoti jungto.
Bou Mühghaü hoba seneibü Khrista Jisu ka onou, üeisanou hoba hakso yingshi.
Ngei change nangnak ngeibü welaua ponpendou no damenjinei, ngeibü pisibou shuong ka thama sensimaang hinseibüa laobou Mühghaü to ngei khangenda, hao nyen sangda.
Ka nyeksi damenko, ngo olinbüei shenlabü lele, no nyibou haüyola shanga aeibou waangda.
Ngei kaibü mailem kaangbü damenda. Kapinyu Lois hoba kanyu Yunis maangpona kibü mailem kho ka maangponakei thüngan kilabü dogo ngei damda.
Hibü, kü ik shangetbü danko Mühghaü jongsak laobou ka to ki, kho wanlong longtila ngei ka la damentida.
Aishanga Mühghaüei sen la hattembü soushou aying, lausikei sei hoba sanou hoba thepetbü soushou kukei.
Hibü seneibü Bunyubou shanga aukabü kula hoba hao shanga thüngbou kü shangabü tehimouma. Mühghaü sei to sou nongashi hoba Ngühlang Maibü laüa khonsak natashi.

Mühghaüei sen khümenkei hoba hao mütshuong la lela ngaankei, khei seneibü kümeileiei ji, lausikei kho haoeibü onou nyekchüh kiteikei. Jihsiphai mokhangjineithama sen Jisu Khrista to thangjam danko onou sen la kuan kiteikei,
lausikei ho sen khümenbou Khrista Jisu tang khitbü danko sungbakei. Haoei habü mautiko, Ngühlang Maibü danko hoba ühaibü ngesakbü kho sungbakei;
hoba kho Ngühlang Maibü shanga ngo songlendolenbou, hoba youkoikjai hoba lenbou yingla pienkei.

Khoei ngo ho kümbo khonsakda. Lausikei ngo ihimouda, aishanga ngei Che, aoto mailemda, ngei hao ngekei, hoba ngei hao ika kho Chalou shanga ai ong nongkukei, kho haoei lombo kila thükakei, kho ngei chongchingko mailemda.
Khrista Jisu kho seneibü thangjama kibü mailem hoba sanoua nyi ai lenbü kü ka hapbei, kho tetsida kaangkhühtham hatlepashi.
Jongsak maibü laobou ka la nongkukei, kho nyi sen to thüngbou Soushou Saopobü danko lombo kishi.
Figela si Hermogeni yoan Asiaa kibü pendou kü ka sepeijung sada.
Quesfora chemdang to Bunyubouei üeisanoushi. Haoei ngo hanghangleko haksotikei, hoba ngeibü yangmen shanga hao ihimou.
Hao Roma sühbü- yam haoei ngo ühüpshongko lameikei.
Haoei Efesiaa ai kümsilei latetche kümbei kho nyi ngeakei. Kho Chalou khünei Bunyubouei hao la Bunyuboueibü jembü onou nahaüku.
Hibü, kü shou, Khrista Jisu to thangjambü ka loubü onou danko no hau kiashi.
Ngei aukabü juongnyu thedanga ai lenkei nyi dida. Kho lenbü kho toukei heebü to lenla thüklabü hoba maanglemenbü mütshuong lakei nongngaikuashi.
Khrista Bunyuboueibü sepai maibü che tegü nyikei kün yoa khonsak natashi.
Sepai kümsileia kijinei, aoei hao sepai la lela hekei, hao maang haitila shanga aoeikei ho langkei kümsileia atotyoda.
Hobaje louyojayobü aoeikei, haoei ngühkhüm hangeilamei ajungeilonga haoei thükbü khun hanla athük.
Langlebü aoei kümdaleida haoei shaangbou mai kho janletjan.
Ngei ai lauda kho damanchühshi; aishanga Bunyubouei ka la kho khümbomeiko ditentilabü.
Jisu Khrista haibü ka langngaibü hoba Dawid ka thenbü damenashi. Kho ngei songlenbü Ngühlang Maibü ki.
Kho shangabü ong kokbü yepeibü tegü ngo khühbüa ki. Lausikei Mühghaü ngüh kho khühan aki.
Hibü, pienbü danei Khrista Jisu to kibü hoba ponpen thon akibü soneikangbü hapla shanga, ngei haoen shanga pendou natenda.
Ho maanglemenlabü ngüh:
“Sen hao yoa haialonga,
senkei hao yoa lang kilabü.
Senei natenalonga,
seneikei hao yoa songdaklabü.
Senei hao atheletlonga,
haoeikei sen atheletlabü.
Sen maanglemenko akisikei,
haoje maanglemenko kida,
aishanga haoei jembü lolo atheletko akien.”
Habü ho nyi haoen la damentiashi: ngüh shangabüa aoaphetyolabü shanga Bunyubou thedanga haoen la ngühkhüm sakkuashi. Aieilausi khoei apailetda; hoba ditbü shuong ong leilutida.
Ihimoulabü lele, kümbouleibou che yeiko hoba ngühmai ngüh tükde jungenko, Mühghaüei sungletenlabü lele no hautaknepashi.
Asaopobü ngüh lauko sembung pekpekbü ka satenashi; aieilausi khübünei yobü dan yongbou amaibou la yeilabü.
Haoeneibü lenbü khoei imei tegü künlabü; haoen yoa Himenia si Fileta yoakei;
haoen ngühmai ka mashikan sada. Haoenei sen langngaibü dana lauda hoba müt ateibü mailem lusakkuda.
Lausikei mailem denshang kho kaangkhühtham loakei. Ho Mühghaüei kekei hoba honei hai doakei: “Bunyubouei haoeibü shuong ngeakei. Aoei Bunyubou nyen phongda hao amaibü ka bangenashi.”
Chem yaangbü chenei hon si chandinam peisilei ong ki aying, lausikei bu hoba thameibü peisileikei ki. Hobaje khübü ka shaangbou kho namton peisilei hoba nyiboubü kho tagübü ki.
Hibü aoei jembü lolo nyiboubü khoka saüenan kilaje hao namton peisilei, Mühghaü shanga saüenbü haoeibü chembubou shanga lejim kibü hoba kümsilei maibü pendou shanga lamlean kilabü.
Nyi heshoudangabü dühbü ka satenashi, hoba hinseibü maang- ponei Bunyubou to ngabü dan yoa saopobü mailem, sanou hoba hakso shiashi.
Ngoubü hoba ngoualouabü wetyo pekyobü apyoashi; aieilausi khübüei oyo- phetyo longtida dogo nyi ngekei.
Bunyubou khangenbüei aoyojan; hao kho, pendou to sanoubü, lenlo maibou, natenbou,

hoba eaaoabüei haoeibü dangbou jakshaikubou müt che yingjan. Aingenyu haoen kho shabü mühghaüei thamtham langsenan, haoeibü sunga mintian, haoei mangsühbü pendou haoen la kümtiko kila thükkei. Lausikei haoen sinngaian hao jungka satenlabü lele, Mühghaüei haoen maangpon sepeila hoba ngühmai ngetila thuilakei thükkei.
Lausikei thonbü chalou shuonga sen thükto sekbülakbü jihsiphai lousühlabü dogo ngei kan la ngetimang sühda.
Mütshuongei jembü nam ong sanoulabü; haoen lilisese, yonglam shamle hoba nyikubü yinglabü; haoenei nyusibou to soumo akulabü, nyen asanglabü, asaopolabü,
hoba sanou hangsilam akilabü; haoen aonoubü, aweasüngbü, athepetenbü hoba sekbülakbü yinglabü. Haoenei maibü mangsenlabü.
Haoen huonetyouetbü, jembü maangleko jungeibü hoba müleng angbü yinglabü. Haoenei Mühghaü toje jembü olin ong sanoulabü.
Tangaje haoenei saopobü hangsilam jungeilabü, lausikei haoenei langkeiaje hoeibü tükdebü hau atheletlabü. Khübü mütshuong ka satenashi.
Aishanga haoenei at chemto atan, shabüei sangetan dühbü phang phangei leiyeiko,
ponpendou ditla haujemda lausikei ngühmai ngebü to ladangkei alouenbü, hau akibü yaksa shuong lapda.
Jani si Jambriei ailai Mosa khulimbei, kho tegü khübü mütei ngühmai khulimda. Haoen maangpon lusakbü hoba mailema amubü shuong ki.
Lausikei haoen lalok ohaulabü, aishanga müt pendouei haoen asangadobü haplabü. Jani si Jambri tokei khei haüthükkei.
Lausikei noje khei aying. Aishanga nyi ngeibü lenbü, kü langkei hangsilam hoba ngeibü nyekchüh phai sembei. Nyi ngeibü mailem, natenbü hoba sanou ngekei.
Ngei Antiok, Ikonia hoba Lustraa shieikoe hoba khonsak künbü nyi ngekei. Khübü shieikoe latetche hatlabü kiteikei! Yingasikei khübü shieikoe pendou ka Bunyubouei ngo püetkei.
Khristan che tegü saopobü langkei kimang sühbü pendou shieikoelabü;
lausikei amaibü mütshuong si huonet youettibou shuong aei aei amaibou yeilabü. Haoenei lubü shuong khüpettilabü hoba haoen lolokei khüpettilabü.
Lausikei noje ka la lenbü hoba nyi khümboei sungletbü ngühmai to maanglanko kiashi, aieilausi kaibü lenbou shuong aoyou yingkeije nyi ngeakei.
Laobou Saopobü Laishibaei Khrista Jisu to mailembü danko khümenbü shanga no hapbüngebü yeitila thükda, kho nyi nashoudanga thama ngeakei.
Mühghaü hak metan jinkubü Lai weko lenla shanga, hakla shanga, mashikbü tangtikula shanga hoba saopobü langkei kila lenla shanga mubü hoba penbüsoubü ki.
Haoei kho ngüha lealonga, Mühghaü müt kho kümsilei maibü pendou shanga mubü hoba penbüsoubü yinglabü.
Mühghaü thedanga hoba langkeibü si haibü ham mat jemla kibou Khrista Jisu thedanga, hoba Khrista nyibou loulabü hoba hao songdakla loulabü dogo damenan, ngei ka la ho ngühkhüm sakkuda:
nyi Ngüh kho songlenashi, jihsiphai hoba jihsiphai ayingbüa maangdakashi; ka ngüh ditbü shuong to lounyu natenbüei hakashi, haoen tangtikuashi, haoen thungeijangeiashi hoba haoen to athakko lenashi.

Aishanga haoenei lenbü maibü to aditkulabü jihsiphai che loulabü. Khüpeinyu, nouto takbü- hitbü dan la yeiko, nyekdüh kühshuoktila shanga haoenei ditmang sühbü lentila shanga lenbou shuong uon uona pholabü.
Haoenei ngühmai ka haoeneibü noukhün sepeijung ngühli ae ayinglamto satkulabü.
Lausikei noje, pendoua damanchühbü kishi. No khonsakla lamlean kijan. Nyi songlendolen kümsilei kümjan. Nyi kaibü janletbü kümsilei khümtijan.
Aishanga yunglabü lembü tegü ngo touje jonda, hoba ngo banglabü jihsiphai khama nyanga.
Ngei wapyo maibü kho wapyoa, ngei kaopheitet sühko laanga, ngei mailem kho jungena.

Touje kü shanga saopobü khun, laobou Bunyubou saopobü matjembouei kho Chaloua kü la kulabü ki, kho phokuakei; hoba kü la ong aying, lausikei aoyouei hao loulabü sanouko chüheida, haoen lakei pendou la kho kulabü.
Kü jungto tongde loula nyi haujemashi.
Aishanga Demaei ngo apyoa. Haoei ho kaodak to aei sanoukei hoba hao Thesalonika to satan apa. Kresken Galatia to hoba Tita Dalmatia to haua;
kü yoa Luk mütpem kia. Mark leiashi hoba hao ka yoa leiba; aieilausi khangenbü kümsileia hao kü shanga thuibü yaang yingakei.
Ngei Tikhika Efesia to hautia.
No ladang loulaje, ngei Troaa Karpa yoa apyobü mangyuk, hoba le shuong, kongnyuleko khoneibü tulai kho sungba.
Alexander, chinam yaübouei kü to aeibou amaiko jungeikei. Haoeibü kümsilei thüng Bunyubouei hao la shemmailabü.
Hao khulimbo no maangsangashi, aishanga haoei küneibü ngühlang aeibou khulimbei.
Ngei shaangla ngo satenshang lamjineije aoeikei kü to athui, lausikei pendouei ngo inletkei. Kho haoen khulimbo naoteyingkuma.
Lausikei Bunyubou kü junga lokei hoba kü la hau kukei; hoba Küksithang pendouei ngühlang kho ditlabü lele phinthonla ngei thükan kikei; hoba ngokei molosaonyu haken ka püetkei.
Bunyubouei amaibü kümsilei pendou ka ngo khümenlabü hoba haoeibü khuthükbü Sangle to ngo leibalabü. Hao to soneikangbü ponpen yingshi.
Priska si Aquila hoba Onesfora chemdang to salem ngetishi.
Erasta Korinta kingaia. Ngei Trofima shatko Melitaa phoyokei.
Puang üangjinei lousühla nyi haujemashi. Eubula, Puden, Linu, Klaudia hoba jaisinasi shuong pendouei ka la haoeneibü salem küntida.
Bunyubou ka soushou yoa kishi. Kan pendou yoa onou kishi.
Ho le ho Mühghaü khangenbou hoba Jisu Khrista youkoikjai Paul ka. Mühghaüei pienbü mütshuongeibü mailem ongenkula hoba seneibü songle ngühmai,
laobouei thon akibü langkei maanglem chüheida kho lenla ngo hautikei. Ho büngbü jihsiphai thedangto Mühghaüei thekubü ki hoba haoei hao ngüh jungeida.
Haoei jembü jihsiphaia, sen Khümenbou Mühghaüei haoeibü ngühlang tang khittikei hoba kho phinthonlabü kho kü la nongkuko ngühkhüm kukei.
Ngeibü ngühmai shou Tita, sen janyobü mailema ngei ho ka to doda. Bou Mühghaü hoba sen Khümenbou Khrista Jisu ka kato onou hoba hakso yingshi.
Nangbü pendou yenei yenko kümsemla shanga ngei no Kretaa apyoda. Ngei ka to lenbü kho nyi sang wekoa jaishou shuong pienashi.
Khübü kho nali athebü thechüh mütshuong yingjan; haoen kho yak che ong phoan, haoen shousi shuong mailembü, thechüha amaibü achühenbü hoba songsido maian jungeibü yingjan.

Lombou kho Mühghaü chemdang shanga chühbou ki. Haokei thechüha nali athebü müt che yingjan; hao kho jembüei maang angbü ong jungeibou ayingsi khauangla sobü müt ayingjan; hao kho ihjakbü aying, ayingsi ikok simbü aying, ayingsi nyaksinam to khaubü ayingjan.
Lausikei hao yenmaang shikbü hoba maibü pendou sanoubü yingjan. Hao kho jembü lolo thepetbü, lanbü, saopobü hoba damanchühbü yingjan.

Hao kho seneibü lenbü to jibü hoba mailemlabü ngühmai ngüh kaangkhühtham jungenbü müt che yingjan. Khoei ong haoei lenlo maibü danko thungeijangeibü kuenlabü hoba dangbü shuongeibü ngühkei thükenlabü.
Aishanga, kongnyuleko Jihudabü songlebü yoa lejim akibü ngüh laubü juongnyu kia, hoba haoen danko kipjim longtida.
Haoen sembung küpjemtijan, aishanga haoenei nyaksinam shanga himou akakko shedbü lenko chemdang pendou khüpeitida.
Haoen san yo kabü thuseibü dogo laubü müt cheei hai laukei,
“Kretabü ponpendou amlangbü,
amaibü meisiau,
haulo haushed shaumang yungmang.”
Kho ngühmai ki. Hibü haoen mailema sa angko kientila shanga nyi haoen to kaang hakashi
hoba touje Jihudabü ngühli hoba ngühmai atheletbü mütshuongeibü lenbüa maang teku.
