Haoenei haoen la dongebü thekuda, lausikei haoen bouje leilubüa aao shuong ki, aishanga müt che kho hao thüka bunyu leboueibü aao ki.

Aishanga Bunyubou hoba Khümenbou Jisu Khrista ngebü danko kaodak ihinseibü ka satenshang to louan phaia, kho sunga ong nyiboula mintiko thüktialonga haoeneibü thonbü thu kho shaangbou thu tokei amaibou yeida.
Saopobü lamnyu ngean phaia sepeijung ngaian haoen la kubü saopobü Ngühkhüm inletkhoulabü haangaje haoen shangaje ladangkei angeenko kibü kho khaibou yingkhoulabü.
Tetentanbüei laubü ngüh kho haoen shanga tükde loushatda: “Keiei jembüei ngaitibü to longeida,” tokei “Uk che la mang yukuashi hoba saoei thima khonlabü,” dogo laubü kia.

Ngei sanoubü jenabou shuong, kan jungto ho ngeibü le nyiboubü ki. Hama, saopobü thuseibü shuongei shangied laubü ngüh shuong hoba kaneibü youkoikjai shuong danko laubü Bunyubou hoba Khümenbou ngühkhüm kanei damenla shanga ngei kan la damentiko, kaneibü dangshatbü maangpon sinentida.
Shaangboua, jembü aeilam aeiphop maangdühei ong shenan kibü danshuong longlabü hoba haoenei kan nyikulabü dogo ngeashi.
Haoenei, “Hao nyibou loula thekubü kho lanei ki? Aieilausi küneibü bousi shuong haibü ka jaüan tat sühko ajanjan pendou kaodak pakjinei kibü yama kia,” dogo laulabü.
Shangieda müh shuong kia, hoba Mühghaüei ngühei lausi kaodak kho dei ka yeikei hoba dei kanglanga kikei dogo ngean shenshen haoenei atheletlabü.
Khübü deiei kho jihsiphai kabü kaodak danglepbei hoba shembei.
Lausikei Mühghaüei toukei jeteibü matjembü chalou shanga tou kibü müh shuong si kaodak kho photeiakei dogo lauda. Kheijinei khübü kho lonlabü hoba asaopobü mütshuong pendou shemlabü.
Kü thangbou shuong, kanei ho tema: Bunyubou yoa chalou che kho po hajar che tegü hoba po hajar che kho chalou che tegü ki.
Ho mütshuongei dambü tegü Bunyubouei haoeibü thekubü loushadtila maang yaangkei ji. Haoei kan to haisühda hoba aokei mautimang asühda. Haoei müt pendou maangpon sepeibü to loutimang sühda.

Kokbü che tegü Bunyubou Chalou loulabü. Ladang kho loulaje mühshuong kho langh langko mauan aplabü hoba khanshoulitshou shuong aubüei tühnyinlabü. Hobaje kaodak hoba khonei kibü ajanjan pendou joulep lo?
Mühnyu kaonyu khümbo kho tegütham tühnyinlabü yingalonga, kankei ailaibü müt yingla?

Kanei Mühghaü Chalou loubü haiyeijinei hoba hao tongde lousühtimang sühjinei, kan saopobü hoba khümbo kubü langkei kijan. Kho Chaloua mühshuong wana lontilabü hoba khanshoulitshou shuong aubüei dühlettilabü.
Lausikei Mühghaüei sen la saopobü shuong kishang chem, khuthük haanbü hoba kaodak haanbü che thekuakei. Senei khübü chüheida.
Hibü sanoubü jenabou shuong, kanei khübü haüthükbü haiyeijinei hao yoa hinseibü hoba nali atheko haksoa haptila haujemashi.
Kan khümentila jihsiphai kuko seneibü Bunyubouei natenbü kho damanchühshi.
Seneibü jaisina Pauleikei hao la kubü songsihonei kan to dokei.

Maimaitham habü shangabü lauko haoeibü le pendoua haoei dokei. Khünei ngühkung atje ditenla sekakei, hoba angebü hoba tak ashatbü danei jembü maulabü lele, ailai lubü Lai shuong haoenei khüpeilangeitida kho tegü habükei süktinongtida.
Lausikei kan, ngeibü jenabou shuongje mudonga maangsangtia. Hibü, kan amaibü mütshuongeibü ngühei leilangan, kan jembü kaangbü younak ka üatetla maangsangashi.
Lausikei seneibü Bunyubou hoba Khümenbou Jisu Khrista onou hoba ngebüa chingashi. Hao to tou hoba ponpen soneikangbü yingshi. Amen.

Küneibü nyekchüh kho langkei ngüh ki. Büngla khangla ai kikei, künei ai ditkei, künei küneibü nyekei ai hapbei, küneibü nyekei ai to chühkei hoba küneibü ikei ai to meitikei, kho künei kan to phinthonda.
Langkei kho tang khitkei; künei khohapa, künei kho aukabü künda, hoba thon akibü langkei laobou Mühghaü yoa kikei hoba kün to tang khitkei kho künei kan to
phinthonda.
Kün yoa kankei himjam kila shanga künei ai hapa hoba dida, kho künei kan to phinthonkuda. Küneibü himjam kho Bou yoa hoba Shou Jisu Khrista yoa ki.
Hobaje küneibü olin penbüsoubü nayeila shanga künei habü ngüh doda.
Künei laobou ngühlang hao ka ditkei hoba tou kan to lenda kho ho: Mühghaü kho ngesakbü hoba hao to nakthüh hansho ongkei aki.
Senei sen hao yoa himjam kia dogo lauan nakthühbüa paisije sen yepeida hoba ngühmai kho ajungeida.
Hao lai ngesakbüa ki kho tegü sen ngesakbüa paialonga sen jenabou si jenabou himjam ki, hoba hao Shou Jisueibü siiei sen shabü pendou ka saüenkuda.
Senei sen to shabü aki laualonga senei sen lolo huonetda, hoba ngühmai kho sen to aki.
Senei seneibü shabü theleda longa, haoei sen la seneibü shabü apbulabú, hoba asaopobü pendou ka sen saüenkulabü, aishanga hao maanglemenbü hoba saopobü ki.
Senei shabü ashon dogo laualonga senei hao yepeibü la yeitida hoba hao ngüh kho sen to aki.
Kü shousi shuong, kanei shabü ashontila shanga ngei ho kan to doda. Müt atei shabü shona tegükei Bou to sen shanga sukujakulabü saopobü müt che kia. Kho Jisu Khrista.
Hao sen shanga shabü angbou ki; seneibü shabü ong aying, lausikei kaodak khümboeibü shabü shanga ki.
Senei hao ngühkhüm jungeisije senei hao ngeakei dogo chong- chingla thükkei.
Aoei “Ngei hao ngeakei,” dogo lauan hao ngühkhüm ajungeida, hao kho yepeibü hoba ngühmai kho hao to aki;
lausikei Mühghaü ngüha lebou müteibü langkeia ong Mühghaü to sanoubü pentisoutida. Khoei ong sen Mühghaüeibü dogo ngeda.
Müt atei ngo Mühghaü to kida dogo laualongaje haokei Jisu Khrista lai kikei kho tegü kijan.
Sanoubü thangbou shuong, ngei kan jungto ngühkhüm haanbü che doda aying, lausikei khangla kanei ai ngühkhüm hapbei kho doda. Hangbü ngühkhüm kho kanei ditbü ngühlang kho ki.
Ngühkhüm haanbü che ngei kan jungto doda. Kho ngühmai Khrista to hoba kan to hapda; aishanga nakthüh dankhümda hoba tükdebü ngesakbü kho hauakei.
Aoei hao ngesakbüa kia dogo lauda hoba jembü jaisina mangsenda, hao toukei nakthühbüa kia.
Aoei jembü jaisina sanouda hao ngesakbüa ki, hoba hao to phaiyetlabü ai aki.
Lausikei aoei jembü jaisina mangsenda hao nakthüha ki hoba nakthüh phanga paida; hao lae haudaje haoei angekei, aieilausi nakthühei haoeibü nyek thutia.
Ngei kan to shousi shuong dogo doda, aieilausi hao nyen laüa kaneibü shabü apbua.
Ngei kan to bousi shuong dogo doda, aieilausi kanei amaibou kho thükena.

Ngei kan to shousi shuong dogo doa, aieilausi kanei khangla thama ao kikei hao ngeakei. Ngei kan to heshou shuong dogo doa, aieilausi kan hau kia hoba Mühghaü ngüh kan to kia, hoba kanei amaibou kho thükena.
Kaodak ayingsi kaodaka kibü peitoleito tesanou. Atei kaodak sanoualonga hao to Bou to sanoubü aki;
aishanga kaodaka kibü phe dühbü, nyekei dühbü, hoba kibükeibü shanga yonglam lilibü pendou Bou ka aying, lausikei kaodak ka louda.
Kaodak hoba khoei müteibü nyekdüh maangdüh senyüh shemtila kubü pendou dankhümda; lausikei aoei Mühghaü maangangbü kümda hao ponpen thon akiko kilabü.
Nashousi shuong, tou ho thonbü angh ki. Kanei Khrista Khulimbou louada dogo dida, hoba maimaitham Khrista khulimbü juong longan apa. Khoei senei thonbü angh kho lousüha dogo ngeda.
Haoen sen ka satkei lausikei haoen seneibü aying; haoen seneibü tegüje haoen sen yoa ong khüpbhoulabü. Haoen satan apbü khoei haoen aokei seneibü aying dogo shangashattida.
Lausikei Saopobüei makenko pienbü kho kan ki, hoba kan pendouei ngühmai ngebü ki.
Ngei kan to kanei ngühmai ange dogo dokei aying, lausikei kanei kho ngeakei, hoba ngühmai aikei yepeibü alongda dogo kanei ngebü shanga dokei.
Jisu kho Khrista yingkei dogo atheletbü to liman yepeibü ao ki? Kheibü müt Khrista khulimbou ki; haoei Bou si Shou ham atheletda.
Hobaje aoei Shou atheletda hao Boueikei konga; aoei Shou sungletda haoei Boukei ki.
Kanje khangla kanei ai ditkei kho kan to thüngtiashi. Kanei khangla ai ditkei khonei kialongaje, kanei Shou hoba Bou to kei thangjambüa kilabü.
Ho haoei sen to thekubü thon akibü langkei ki.
Aoyouei kan ayinglam to leilangmang sühda, haoen shangabü ngei habü ngüh kan to doa.

Hao ka kanei ai naangenko pienbü hapbei, kho kan to kisije, aoeikei kan la lenla akhamda. Haoei kan naangenko pienbü khoei kan la ajanjan pendou shangabü lenda; hoba haoeibü lenbü kho ngühmai, hoba ho yepeibü aying. Hibü haoei kan to lenbü tegü hao yoa thangjambo kishi.
Hobaje tou, nashousi shuong, hao tang khitjinei sen maang khailabü, hoba hao loujinei hao thedanga ihimoula shanga hao to kishi.
Kanei hao saopobü ki dogo ngesije, aoei ong janbü kümda hao kho Mühghaü ka bukbü ki dogo kanei ngekei.
Sen to Mühghaü shousi shuong dogo ngalabü lele Bouei sanou lenenbü kho maangpanglabü latetche. Hobaje sen hao shousi shuong ki! Kaodakei sen angebü tetlabü kho kaodakei hao ange.

Sanoubü jenabou shuong, sen mudonga Mühghaü shousi shuong ki, lausikei sen ailai yinglabü kho tang mokhit. Senei ngeakei, ladang hao tang khitlaje sen hao maimai kilabü, aishanga hao ailai ong ki, kho tegü senei hao haplabü.
Aoyouei Khrista to kho maanglem ki, Khrista lai hinseian ki haokei kho tegü jembü lolo saüenda.
Aoyouei shabü shonda ngühkhüm lulimda; aishanga shabü kho ngühkhüm tubou ki.
Shabü künlangla hao tang khitkei dogo kanei ngeakei, hoba hao to shabü aki.
Ao hao to kida haoei shabü ashonda; aoei shabü shonda haoei Bou ühüpbei, ayingsi haoei hao angekei.
Nashousi shuong, kan aolakei ayinglam to teleilangti. Aoei sao- pobü jungeida hao kho saopobü;
lausikei aoei shabü jungeida hao shabü mühghaüeibü, aishanga shabü mühghaüei khanglathama shabü shonko loukei. Shabü mühghaü kümsilei mautilabü nyek- chüha Mühghaü Shou tang khitkei.
Mühghaü ka bukbü shou aoeikei shabü ajungeida, aishanga hao to Mühghaü haang ki; haoei shabü langkei kila athük, aieilausi hao Mühghaü ka bukbü shou ki.
Mühghaü shousi shuong si shabü mühghaü shousi shuong hoei bangnyinda: aoyouei saopobü ajungeida ayingsi haoeibü jaisinasi shuong to asanouda, haoen Mühghaüeibü aying.
Aishanga senei jenabou si jenabou sanouyojan dogo laubü ngühlang kanei khanglathama dida.
Kain amaiboueibü kiteikei hoba haoei haona haitikei, hao tegü ayingjan. Haoei aila haitikei? Aieilausi haoeibü kümsilei shuong kho amaibü hoba haonaeibü kümsilei shuong kho saopobü kiteikei.
Jaisinasi shuong, kaodakei kan mangsenalonga, maang tepang.
Sen haibü ka langkeishang to khada dogo senei ngeakei, aieilausi senei seneibü jaisinasi shuong to sanouda. Aoei asanouda hao haibüa kia.
Aoei haoeibü jaisina to mangsenda hao müt haitibou ki, hoba müt haitibü aokei hao to thon akibü langkei aki dogo kanei ngeakei.
Senei sanou ngea, aieilausi Khristaei sen shanga hao langkei phoyokei. Seneikei seneibü jaisinasi shuong shanga seneibü langkei apyojan.
Ao mütei nyaksinam kian haojai haonaje khambokei hapda lausikei ik asengda, hao to Mühghaü sanou lai küman kila?
Nashousi shuong, seneibü sanou kho ngühkongje ayingjan; kho kümsilei hoba ngühmai yingjan.

Khoei ong sen ngühmaieibü ki dogo lenenlabü, hoba ainei ong seneibü maangponei sen yuktida kheijinei sen lolo hao thedanga han shangashattida; aishanga Mühghaü kho seneibü maangpon to yaangbou hoba haoei pendou ngekei.
Sanoubü jenabou shuong, seneibü maangponei sen ayukti longa sen Mühghaü jungto maangyaangko loula thükakei,
hoba hao ka senei hibü pendou haplabü, aieilausi senei hao ngühkhüm jungeida hoba hao maanghaibü kümda.
Haoei sen la kubü ngühkhüm: hao Shou Jisu Khrista to mailemlabü hoba haoei sen la sakkubü tegü jenabou si jenabou sanouyolabü kho ki.
Aoei Mühghaü ngühkhüm jungeida hao Mühghaü to kida, hoba Mühghaü hao to kida. Hobaje haoei sen la kubü Soushou danko hao sen yoa kida dogo senei ngekei.
Sanoubü jenabou shuong, soushou pendou to maitelem, lausikei haoen Mühghaü ka yinglaoje takteiashi, aishanga amlangbü thuseibü juongnyu kaodak to aa.
Kanei Mühghaü Soushou honei shenlabü; Jisu kho müt tegü loubü Khrista ki dogo sungletbü soushou weko kho Mühghaü ka ki,
hoba soushou laobouei ong Jisu asungletda kho Mühghaü ka aying. Kho Khrista Khulimbü kümsilei ki; hoba kanei hao louada dogo dida; tou mangkei hao kaodaka kia.
Nashousi shuong kan Mühghaüeibü ki, hoba kanei amlangbü thuseibü thükena, aieilausi kaodaka kibou toje kan to kibü Mühghaü Soushou kho yaangbou ki.
Amlangbü thuseibü shuong kaodakeibü ki, hoba khoei haoenei kaodakei laubü hima lauda, hoba kaodakei haoen to ditkuda.
Sen Mühghaüeibü ki; Mühghaüei sen to ditkuda dogo haoei ngekei; ao Mühghaüeibü aying haoei sen to aditkuda. Hoei senei ngühmai soushou si shedbü soushou kho shenda.
Sanoubü jenabou shuong, senei cheei che to sanouakho, aishanga sanou Mühghaü ka louda hoba aoei sanouda hao Mühghaü ka bukbü shou ki hoba haoei Mühghaü ngekei.
Aoei asanouda haoei Mühghaü angekei, aishanga Mühghaü kho sanou ki.
Hao danko sen lang kitilabü lele Mühghaüei hao Shou jayangshou kaodak to hautikukei dogo laubü khünei Mühghaü sanou kho tang khitkei.
Sanou kho honei ki: senei Mühghaü sanoukei aying, lausikei haoei sen sanoukei hoba seneibü shabü angtila shanga haoei hao Shou jayangshou kaodak to hautikei.
Sanoubü jenabou shuong, Mühghaüei sen hainyu sanoukeilonga seneikei jenabou si jenabou sanouyojan.
Aoeikei Mühghaü hapan achühkei; senei jenabou si jenabou sanouyoa longa, Mühghaü sen to ki, hoba haoeibü sanou sen to penbüsoubü yeida.
Hao sen to, sen hao to ki dogo senei ngekei, aieilausi haoei sen la hao Soushou phejan kuakei.
Bouei Shou kaodak khümenbou yeitila hautikei dogo künei hapa hoba aukabü künda.
Jisu kho Mühghaü Shou ki dogo müt atei theleda longa, Mühghaü hao to ki hoba hao Mühghaü to ki.
Sen shanga Mühghaü sanou laobou ki, kho künei ngekei, hoba mailema.
Mühghaü sanou ki; hoba ao sanoua kida hao Mühghaü to kida, hoba Mühghaü hao to ki.
Matjemnyet sen maang nakhaitila shanga sen yoa sanou pentisoutikei, aieilausi ho kaodaka seneibü langkei kho Khristaeibü to jetei ki.
Sanoua hatlabü aki, lausikei penbüsoubü sanouei hatbü shian sattida. Hatbü kho kayanga thonakei, hoba ao hatda hao sanoua penbüsoubü ayeikei.
Senei sanouda aieilausi haoei shaang sen to sanoukei.
Atei “Ngei Mühghaü sanouda” dogo lauan haojai haona mangsensije hao kho yepeijawebü ki; aishanga aoei haoei hapbü jaisina to asanoudaje haoei haoei ühüpbü Mühghaü sanoula athük.
Aoei Mühghaü sanouda haoei haojai haonakei sanoujan, ho ngühkhüm haoei kün la kukei.
Aoyouei Jisu kho Khrista dogo mailemda hao Mühghaü ka bukbü shou ki, hoba aoyouei bou che to sanouda haoei hao shou tokei sanouda.
Senei ladang Mühghaü to sanouda hoba haoeibü ngühkhüm shuong jungeida kheijinei senei Mühghaü shousi shuong to sanouda dogo senei ngekei;
aishanga Mühghaü to sanoulabü kho hao ngühkhüm jungeilabü shanga ki. Hao ngühkhüm shuong atshaibü aying,
aieilausi Mühghaü ka bukbü shou wekoei kaodak thükda, hoba kaodak thüklangbü kho seneibü thükenbü mailem ki.
Jisu kho Mühghaü Shou dogo mailembü to liman kaodak thükenbou kho ao ki?
Jisu Khrista kho dei hoba sii danko loubü ki; deiei ong aying, lausikei dei hoba sii danko loukei. Ngühchung künbou kho Soushou, aieilausi Soushou kho ngühmai ki.
Aukabü künbou sem ki:
Soushou, hoba dei, hoba sii; hoba sem pendou kho nyekchüh che ong.
Senei müteibü aukabü sungletda, lausikei Mühghaü aukabü kho yaangbou. Mühghaü aukabü khoje hao Shou shangabü.
Aoei Mühghaü Shou to mailemdaje hao to kho aukabü thüngakei. Aoei maialemda haoei Mühghaü kho yepeibula yeitida, aieilausi haoei hao Shou shangabü Mühghaü aukabü to maialem.
Mühghaü aukabü kho ho ki: haoei sen la thon akibü langkei kua hoba kho langkei hao Shou to ki.
Aoei Shou ki, haoei kho langkei ki; aoei Mühghaü Shou aki haoei kho langkei aki.
Kanei thon akibü langkei kia dogo ngelabü shanga ngei ho kan Mühghaü Shou to mailembü shuong to doda.
Senei haoei maangangbü tegü denche hialonga haoei sen to ditkuda dogo senei hao to maanglemenbü ki.
Haoei sen to ponpendou ditkuda dogo senei ngeasikei, senei hao ka senei ai shanga hikei kho kia dogo senei ngeakei.
Atei haojai haonaei hailabü lele ayingko shabü shonko hapalonga, haoei hao shanga welaukulabü hoba hao shanga langkei hapbulabü. Kho hailabü lele ayingko shabü shonbü shanga ong.
Asaopobü pendou shabü, lausikei ühailabü shabü at kia.
Mühghaü ka bukbü shouei shabü ashonda, lausikei Mühghaü Shouei hao lomda, hoba amaibouei hao to ajungda.
Sen Mühghaüeibü dogo senei ngeakei hoba kaodak khümbo amaibou seisihauei yepeitida.

Hobaje Mühghaü Shou loua dogo senei ngeakei, hoba senei tükdebü Mühghaü aoje ngela shanga haoei sen la ditenbü kuakei. Sen hao Shou Jisu Khrista to kisije, sen tükdebü to ki. Kho tükdebü Mühghaü, thon akibü langkei ki.
Nashousi shuong, ayingbü mühghaü shuong ka kan lolo satenan kiashi.
Ho le, Mühghaüei pienbü Yaangennyu, hoba ngühmai himjama ngei sanoubü saoeibü shousi shuong jungto jaishou che ka ki. Ngei ong aying lausikei ngühmai ngebü dan pendouei sao to sanouda,
aishanga kho ngühmai kün ka hoba kho kün to athakko kilabü.
Bou Mühghaü hoba Shou Jisu Khrista ka onou, üeisanou hoba hakso, ngühmaia hoba sanoua sen yoa kilabü. Ngühmai hoba Sanou
Bouei sen la ngühkhüm kubü tegü, ka shousi shuong ngühmaia paiko hapan ngo aeibou olinkei.
Hobaje ngei tou ka shanga ngühkhüm haanbü che adokuda, lausikei khangla künei ai ngühkhüm sungletkei kho: senei jenabou si jenabou sanouyojan.
Sanou tetlabü kho senei hao ngühkhüm hangeilamei paijan. Ho jeteibü ngühkhüm ho kanei khanglathama hapa; sanoua kishi.
Aishanga Jisu Khrista müteibü hangalama loukei dogo atheletbü khüpettibou juongnyu kaodak to aa. Kho khüpettibou hoba Khrista khulimbou ki.
Kanei kümbüleibüa kan konga ajimlabü lele kan lolo maang sangashi.
Aoei Jisu Khristaei lenbü to liman hauda hoba kho kommanga akida haoei Mühghaü aki. Aoei lenbü kommanga kida haoeije Bou hoba Shou ham ki.
Atei kho lenbü akünko ka jungto loualonga hao ka chem to teleiyet; salem mangkei teku;
aishanga aoei hao to salem leda haoei haoeibü kümsilei janyoda. Thonbü Ngüh
Ngei kan jungto dolabü juongkotham kisije, ngei le si shiai jungeimang asühda; kan olinbü soutilabü lele ngo kan jungto louan theshuok joyolabü dogo maanglemda.
Mühghaüei pienbü kaibü nousina shousi shuongei ka la salem kuda.
Ho le, ngühmai himjam manga ngei sanoubü Gaia jungto jaishou ka.
Sanoubü thangbou, no soushoua lai hau ki kho tegü pheakei ashatanyatko langkei maibüa kila ngei welauda.
Ladang jaisina at louan nyi ngühmai to khümbomeiko maangdakbü shangabü lenkei ngo aeibou olinkei. Maimaitham no ngühmaia paida.
Kü shousi shuong ngühmaia paida dogo ditbü to yaangbou ngeibü olinbü aki.
Sanoubü thangbou, haoen yenla yeian kijinei mangkei nyi jaisina shuong shanga nongeisaebü pendoua no maanglemenbü ki;
haoenei lashong thedanga kaibü sanou shanga aukabü kua. Sanoudaman haoen wakoua nyi khangenbü Mühghaü hangsilam muko thuiashi;
aishanga haoen Nyen kho laüa wakou meimeia hoba haoenei küksithang ka ai aleku.
Senkei ngühmai shanga thujam kümbüleibü shuong dogo lenenlabü lele senei khübü mütshuong thuijan.
Ngei lashong to dokei, lausikei haoen yoa khuleilanglei mangsühbou Diotrefeei küneibü hau asungletda.

Hibü ngo ladang loulaje, haoei kün khulimbo nyamnyambü ngühsidei angbü pendou ngei kan la damentilabü. Khoeikei maang ühaiko, haoei jaisinasi shuong asungletda; hoba aoyouei sungletda haoei haoen shiletda hoba haoen lashong ka kuktida.
Sanoubü thangbou, amaibü tetsida phai tesem lausikei maibü phai semshi. Aoei maibü kümda hao Mühghaüeibü ki; aoei amaibü kümda haoei Mühghaü ühüpbei.
Demetria shangabü mütpem wekoei hoba ngühmaieikei aukabü kuda. Küneikei haoeibü aukabü kua, hoba küneibü aukabü kho ngühmai dogo kanei ngeakei.
Ngei ka jungto dola juongnyu kiteikei; lausikei ngei dojin si shiai jungeimang asühda.
Ngei no tongde haüyola maanglemda hoba seti theshuok joyolabü. Kayoa hakso kishi. Hakabü jenabou shuongei ka la salem kuda. Sen jenabou shuong la müt- pem nyen shenko salem kushi.
Ho le Jisu Khrista sambü hoba Jakobeibü na Juda ka ki. Aoyou haoei ngaan ki hoba aoyou Jisu Khrista thounoubü phanga ki, khübü jungto.
Kan jungto onoubü hoba hakso hoba sanou apsileko yingshi.

Sanoubü thangbou shuong, ngei kan jungto sen likobü khümenbü shangabü aeibou domang sühko kijinei, laobou Mühghaüei hao mütshuong la pendou shanga hoba che ong kukei, kho mailem hatlepla shanga thungeiko ngei kan to dolabü lele yeikei.

Aishanga Mühghaü angebü dan at ho laüa aoyou shangieda maulabü shanga pienakei khübü müt kan yo to huphangshoua lotakei. Haoenei, Mühghaüei kubü solo asangalanbü la yeitida hoba haoenei seneibü Bunyubou che ong, khei Bunyubou Jisu Khrista atheletda.
Kanei khümbo ngean kibü kümsilei at ngei kan la damentida. Bunyubouei, aoei mütshuong püetkei hoba haoen Ijep ka leibakei, kho phaia, aoei maialem haoen mautikei.
Khuthük hangangbükei aoyouei haoeneibü jembü sanglea akiko jembü kishang chem apyokei, haoei haoen Chalou yaangbü khonei matjemla shanga thon akibü yangmenei phenan nakthühbüa phoakei.

Tokei Sodom si Gomora hoba haoen lepbü sangnyu shuong damenashi. Haoeneikei jembü lolo asangalanbü la kukei hoba haang ayingbü pheeibü kümsilei to atkei, hoba pendou shanga maangsanglabü che tegü thon akibü wan kayang hapbei.
Habü mütshuong shangakei jeteitham ki. Shaangla haoenei haoen lolo mangh sangda, kho phaiaje haoenei haoeneibü mang shatida, Bunyubou hau asungletda hoba thükkabü soneikangbü shuong nyikuda.
Lausikei khuthük hangangbü yaangbou Maikelei mangkei Mosaeibü mang shangabü shabü mühghaü to lemenjinei hao yuktiko ngüh kaangbü laula asom. Haoei, “Bunyubouei ka to hakshi,” dogo ong laukei.
Khübü mütei haoenei aditenbü to nyikuda, hoba asangbü meisiau tegü haoenei ai ong haangei ditenda, khoei haoen jungto leilubü sungbada.
Haoen shanga ügütü! Haoen Kain lam to haua. Nam to khamla haoen Balaameibü shedbüa koulangkei. Kora tegü haoenei khulimbo lokei hoba shembei.

Khübü mütshuong kho kaneibü sanou lemsilanga od che ki. Haoenei kaneibü shaua- yunga ihimouko shauyoda. Haoen lang ayobü yeiei soubabü sangmei; hoba puang kabü mai ehekbü buheklong, li ka pheibü hoba nyinei haibü long;
yungnyu sekbülakbü deishou jembü himou kümsilei tang khitko lenbü; shoongaibü khanshoulitshou, aoyou la ponpendou shanga aicheküman nakthühbü kaoen tetkuakei, kho phatko ki.
Enok, Adam lin ka nyetbouei habü mütshuong shanga hai tetenko laukei, “Chühashi!

Pendou thüka matjemla, hoba asaopobü dan pendou jembü asaopobüa kümbü kümsilei hoba Mühghaü angebü shabü shuongei laobou ngüh kaangbü hao khulimbo laua kho shanga shedbü kula Bunyubou haoeibü saopobü lakjaibü shuong yoa loulabü.”

Khübü mütei ai akümda lausikei nyamnyamda hoba maang ühaida. Haoen jembü aeilam aeiphopbü shanga kida. Haoenei lilisese lauyoda lausikei ku denche ongkei napailetla shanga ponpendou müteibü thenyek to chühda.
Lausikei, sanoubü jenabou shuong, seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khristaei haoeibü youkoikjai danko ai laukei kho kanei damenjan.
Haoei kan to laua, “Thonbü jihsiphaia mütshuong aoyou mailema maang adak hoba haoen jembü pejapelabü phai semda, khübü danei kan nyikuko loulabü.”
Kho janyinbü longtibü shuong ki. Haoen pejapelabü hoba soushou akibü danshuong ki.
Lausikei kan, ngei sanoubü jenabou shuong, kan kaneibü saopobü mailema loashi hoba Soushou Saopobü seia welauashi.
Kanei jembü lolo Mühghaü sanoua phoashi hoba haoeibü onoua Bunyubou Jisu Khristaei kan la kula kibü thon akibü langkei kho haiyeiashi.
At phenyembo kia, haoen la onou lenashi.
Atje wanlong ka suan sungko nyi haoen khümenjan, hoba at toje kanei hatto khuian onou lenashi; shabü dühbüa khonbü neisimei khüto kanei hatjan.
Aoei kan atuongettiko hoba nali athetiko hoba olinangko, hao soneikangbü thedanga phokula thükakei,
kho sen khümenbou Mühghaü che to, seneibü Bunyubou Jisu Khrista danko, jih pendou thedangto, tou hoba thon akibü pendou shanga, soneikangbü, songdak, sei hoba hau yingshi; Amen.

Ho Mühghaüei Jisu Khrista la kubü tang khitbü ki. Ho tongde loushedla kibü haoeibü khangenbü shuong la lentila shanga haoei hao la kukei. Hao khangenbü Johan la ho ngetila shanga Khristaei haoeibü hangangbü hautikei,
hoba Johanei haoei hapbü pendou lenkei. Haoei Mühghaü ngühlang hoba Jisu Khrista langkei aukabü kukei.
Aoei ho welaje haoei haükei hoba aoyouei ho thusei ngüh shuong to ditlaje hoba hanei dobü to ngüha lelaje haoenei haükei, aishanga pienbü jih kho khama nyanga.
Ho Johanei Asia kabü lashong nyet to doda. Ao tou ki, ao kiteikei hoba ao louada, kho Mühghaü ka kan to onoubü hoba hakso yingshi; hoba Choba setshang junga kibü soushou nyet ka,
hoba maanglemenbü aukabü, Jisu Khrista, ao haibü ka langngaibü shaangbou ki hoba ao kaodak Choba shuongeibü songdakbou ki, hao ka kan to onoubü hoba hakso yingshi.
Aoei sen sanouda, hao haikubü danko aoei sen shabü ka dongetikei,
hoba haoeibü Mühghaü hoba Bou khangentila aoei sen haoeibü ungshedbü shuong sangle yeitikei, hao to soneikangbü hoba sei tou hoba ponpen yingshi. Amen.
Hao sangmeia louada. Müt- pem wekoei hao haplabü. Aoyouei hao to sepbei haoenei hao haplabü, hoba kaodak phangshuong pendouei hao shanga mang haaplabü. Haü, Amen.
“Tou ao ki, ao kiteikei, hoba ao louada, kho thükenbou Bunyubou Mühghaüei lauda, ‘Ngo Alfa hoba Omega.’ ”
Ngo kan jaisina Johan ki. Ngei kan yoa shieinangei hoba Choba sangle hoba natenbüa khristan che tegü janyoda. Ngo Patmos sua kikei aishanga ngei Mühghaü ngühlang hoba Jisu aukabü shangabü songlenkei.
Bunyubou chaloua kü thükto Soushou lotkei, hoba ngei kü phainei teklaang langh che tegü ngüh yaang ditkei.
Khoei laukei, “Nyi ai hapdaje le chenei doashi, hoba kho lashong nyet to hautishi: Efesia to, Smerna to, Pergama to, Thiatira to, Sardia to, Filadelfia to hoba Laodikia to.”
Kü to aoei joyodaje dogo chühla ngo sepeikei, ladang ngo sepeikei ngei honeibü wanthung nyet hapbei,
hoba wanthung yoa Müteibü Shou phatko, mangsho youdema atko lean hoba khukua honeibü khükhom kaian hapbei.
Haoeibü khu kabü khulou kho sanwi tegü thupaitham, hoba haoeibü nyek kho wanlüh maimai kikei.
Haoeibü you kho yaüshema juokbü namsek chinam tegü kikei, hoba haoeibü ngüh kho dei juong ngühbü tegü kikei.
Haoeibü mae ika haoei khanshoulitshou nyet kikei, hao sembung ka jijiham akbü inlou che longkei, hoba hao thenyekei chajihbou chanyu tegü haukei.
Ladang ngei hao hapbei, ngo haibü mang tegü hao junga phetetkei. Haoei haoeibü mae ikei kü to shangan laukei, “Tehütma; ngo shaangbou hoba phaibou,
langkei kibou kho ki. Ngo haikei, hoba tou ngo ponpen shanga lang kida, hoba ngei haibü hoba Yemsang koukhin ki.”
Hibü nyi ai ong hapbei, tou ai ong ki, hoba phaito ai ong loushedlabü ki, doashi.

Nyi ngeibü mae ika khanshoulitshou nyet hapbü, hoba honeibü wanthung nyeteibü huphang ngüh kho ho: khanshoulitshou nyet kho lashong nyeteibü khuthük hangangbü shuong, hoba wanthung nyet kho lashong nyet ki.
“Efesiaa kibü lashong hangangbü jungto doashi: Aoei haoeibü mae ika khanshoulitshou nyet jungda hoba ao honeibü wanthung nyet jenyua paida, haoei habü ngüh shuong lauda;

“Ngei kaibü kümsilei ngeakei. Nyi latetche haujembo kümbeileikei hoba latetche maangkaangko natenkei. Nyi müt amaibü shuong to anatenda dogo ngeakei; aoyouei haoen lolo youkoikjai dogo nyenda, lausikei youkoikjai aying, nyi khübü takteia, hoba nyi haoen yepeibü dan dogo lapena.
Nyi natenda, nyi kü nyen laüa aeibou aman apa hoba hükomangko ayei.
Lausikei ngei ka khu limbo ho kia, khei nyi kaibü shaangbou sanou mautia.

Hibü, no laka atetkeije damenashi; maangpon sepeiashi hoba nyi shaangla kümbü kümsilei kho kümashi. Khei ayinglonga, no maangpon asepeisije, ngo ka jungto loulabü hoba denshang ka kaibü wanthung kho ngailanglabü.
Lausikei Nikholabü ai kümsilei ngei mangsenda khübü kho nyikei mangsenda, kho ngüh nyi ki.
Lashong dan to Soushouei ai lenda, ao nou yembei haoei ditashi. Aoei thükenda hao la ngei Mühghaü paradaisa kibü langkei bunyu ka shaulabü kulabü.”
“Smernaa kibü lashong hangangbü jungto doashi: Ao khangbü hoba shembü, ao haian langngaikei haoei habü ngüh lauda;

“Ngei kaibü khonkubü hoba no shale khonsakbü ngeakei (tükdebüei no keiasikei), hoba aoyouei jembü to Jihudabü dogo lauda, lausikei haoen Jihudabü aying, lausikei Satan sinagog ki, haoenei nyikubü kho ngei ngekei.

No tou nyangko khonkulabü kibü khütokei tehütma. Chühashi, kan takteila shanga Satanei kan at thüngdang to jinla kümda, hoba kan chalou annyet shieinangeilabü. Haibüa sühko natenashi, hoba ngei ka la langkei khun kho kulabü.
Lashong dan to Soushouei ai lenda, ao nou yembei haoei ditashi. Aoei thükenda hao la nyiboubü haibüei khonsak akulabü.”
“Pergamaa kibü lashong hangangbü jungto doashi: Aoei jijiham akbü inlou jungkei haoei habü ngüh lauda;

“No lanei kida ngei ngeakei; no Satan Choba setshang junga kida. Lausikei nyi kü nyen kaangkhühtham hatlepakei. Ladang ngeibü aukabü Antipas kan yoa Satan thüngshanga haitikei kho jihsiphaia mangkei nyi kü to mailembü aliti.

Lausikei ngei kakhu limbo ngüh shijo kia: Aishanga Balaam, aoei Israelbü shuong phaiyettila shanga heangsho to lembü shausiyung shautila hoba asangalanbü kümtila Balak to lenkei, haoeibü lenbü phai sembü müt at nyi khünei phoakei.
Kho tegü ong nyikei Nikolabüei lenbü ditbü dan at kan yoa phoakei.
Hibü maang- pon sepeiashi. Khei ayinglonga ngo ka jungto tongde loulabü hoba kü sembung inlouei haoen khulimbo wapyolabü.

Lashong dan to Soushouei ai lenda, ao nou yembei haoei ditashi. Aoei thükenda huan kibü mana phejan che ngei hao la kulabü; ngei tokei hao la ninulaang thupaibü che kulabü, laobou laanga sungletbou to liman aoei angebü nyen haanbü che doan ki.”
“Thiatiraa kibü lashong hangangbü jungto doashi: Aoeibü nyek wanlüh tegü hoba aoeibü you namsek chinam phatko ki kho Mühghaü Shouei habü ngüh lauda.
“Ngei kaibü kümsilei, kaibü sanou, kaibü mailem, nyi khangenbü hoba natenbü pendou ngekei; hoba kaibü toubü kümsilei shuong kho shaangbou to maibou ki.

Lausikei ngei ka khu limbo ho ki, khei Jezebel, laobou saoei jembü lolo thuseinyu dogo lauko, ngo khangenbü shuong to asangalanbü jungeila, hoba heangsho to lembü shausiyung shaula lenda, sao to nyi natenkei.
Ngei sao la maangpon sepeila jihsiphai kukei, lausikei saoei suonlambü ka maangpon sepeimang asüh.
Hibü ngei sao shatbü shen chenei lengtida, hoba aoyouei sao to asangalanbü jungeilaje haoenei jembü kümsilei ka maangpon asepeilonga haoen khonsak khonku yaangbü to attilabü.
Ngei saoeibü shousi shuong khümbo shemtilabü; hoba ngo haübü hoba maangpon lambou ki dogo lashong pendouei ngelabü, hoba ngei kan mütpem weko la lulueibü kümsilei thüng jongsak kulabü.
Lausikei Thiatiraa kibü joubü aoyou danei ho lenbü asunglet, khei atei Sataneibü haübü kümsilei dogo laubü aoyouei ange, kan to ngei lenda, ngei kan thükto lubü onat ai ajinyokuda.
Lausikei ngo aloushongko kanei ai ki khonei kaangkhühtham hatlepashi.

Aoei thükenda hoba thonbüa sühko ngei mangsühbü tegü maanglanko kümda, ngei kü Bou ka hau lai hapbei kho tegü, phangshuong thüka ngei hau kulabü. Haoei haoen thüka namjuei songdaklabü hoba thamchak tegü phetnyintilabü, hoba ngei hao la khanyang kho kulabü.
Lashong dan to Soushouei ai lenda, ao nou yembei haoei ditashi.”
“Sardia kibü lashong hangangbü jungto doashi: Aoei Mühghaü soushou nyet ki haoei habü ngüh lauda.
“Ngei no khümbo ngeakei: nyenei no lang kia, lausikei no haibü.
Laksepashi! Mohaijinei nyi ai jouan ki kho hau kingeitiashi. Aishanga kü Mühghaü thedanga kaibü kümsilei penbüsoubü yeibü ngei ai ühüp.
Nyi ai sungletkei hoba ditkei kho damenashi; hoba jungeiashi hoba maangpon sepeiashi. No alakseplonga ngo kokbü che tegü loulabü, hoba ngo ladang ka thükto loulaje kho jihsiphai nyi angelabü.
Lausikei no Sardiaa, haoeneibü neisimei atotnyinbü müt shijo kia. Haoen kü yoa thupaibüa pailabü shanga haoen mubü.
Aoei thükenda haokei haoen tegü thupaibü hele letilabü, hoba ngei hao nyen langkei le ka haman üplabü; kü Bou thedanga hoba haoeibü hangangbü shuong thedanga ngei haoeibü nyen theletlabü.
Lashong dan to Soushouei ai lenda, ao nou yembei haoei ditashi.”

“Filadelfiaa kibü lashong hangangbü jungto doashi: Ao saopobü hoba ngühmai, ao ika Dawid koukhin ki; ladang haoei kho koukap ipdaje aoeikei akhinda, hoba ladang haoei kho khindaje aoeikei ipla athük, haoei habü ngüh lauda.
“Ngei no khümbo ngeakei. Ngei ka thedanga koukap che laobou aoeikei akhinenlabü kho ipan phokuakei. Ngei ngeakei, ka la hau hansho kia, lausikei kü ngüh jungeia hoba kü nyen atheletko aki.

Satan sinagog, aoyouei jembü to Jihudabü dogo lauda, lausikei haoen Jihudabü aying, lausikei amlang lauda, kheibü müt at kia. Ngei haoen loutilabü hoba ngei ka to sanoua dogo ngetila shanga ka you junga khüpetan lemtilabü.
Aishanga nyi ngeibü natenbü ngüha leko jungeisije, laobou takteibü jihsi- phai kaonyudaka kibü pendou jungto loulabü ki, kho kümsilei ka ngeikei no püetlabü.
Ngo tongde louada. Kaibü khun aoeikei alanglabü lele nyi ai ki kho kaangkhühtham hatlepashi.

“Aoei thükenda hao kü Mühghaü lembü chema ngei thaonyu che yeitilabü, hoba hao khünei ponpen kilabü. Hobaje kü Mühghaü nyen, kü Mühghaü sangnyu, haanbü Jerusalem, laobou khuthük ka kü Mühghaü ka louyenda, kho nyen hoba kü nyen haanbü ngei hao to dolabü.
Lashong dan to Soushouei ai lenda, ao nou yembei haoei ditashi.”
“Laodikiaa kibü lashong hangangbü jungto doashi: Ao Amen, ao maanglemenbü hoba ngühmai aukabü, ao Mühghaü kümbü khangshang ki, haoei habü ngüh lauda;
“Ngei no khümbo ngeakei; ngei ngeakei no libükei ji aubükei ji. Ngei no libü ayingsi aubü yingtimang sühda.
Hibü no libükei ji aubükei ji, lemshedtibü yingsije, ngei no kü sembung ka ngaitilabü.
Nyi lauda, ‘Ngo keiakei. Ngei nam apsileko ki. Ngei ai akhamda.’ Lausikei no khonsakbü thu, khonkubü, shalejongle, nyekthubü hoba mütkong dogo nyi angekei.

No keibü yeila shanga yaüshema juokenbü hon; hoba no mütkongbü himou küpla shanga, nyi lela neisimei thupaibü; hoba nyi haplabü lele ka nyek shanga naanglabü moli; kü ka jekla shanga ngei no thungeijangeida.
Ngei aoyou to sanouda haoen to ngei hakda hoba ngümda. Hibü aeibou maangdakashi hoba maangpon sepeiashi.
Ngo hanei koukhüna loan koukapa kuokeida. Atei kü ngüh ditan kou ipbua longa, ngo lotlabü hoba ngo hao yoa hoba hao kü yoa shaula yunglabü.
Ngei ai lai thükenan kü Bou yoa haoeibü Choba setshanga setda, kho tegü aoei thükenda, hao kü yoa ngeibü Choba setshanga settilabü.
Lashong dan to Soushouei ai lenda, ao nou yembei haoei ditashi.”

Kho phaia ngei chühkei, hoba khuthüka koukap che ipan kikei, hoba shaangbou ngüh ngei ditbü kho, teklaang phatbü cheei kü to joyoko kikei. Khoei laukei, “Hato kaiyang, hoba ho phaia ai loushadlaje ngei ka to lenlabü.”
Kheijineitham soushou kü thükto lotkei. Hobaje khuthüka Choba setshang che kiteikei, hoba kho Choba setshanga müt che setan kiteikei.
Khonei setbou chühla kho jasper hoba karnelian phatko kiteikei; hoba Choba setshang kaijembo yepukshangjep che eme- rald phatko jenan kikei;

Choba setshang kaiko ngei Choba setshang saoto lei hapbei. Choba setshang khünei jaishou shuong saoto lei setan kikei; haoenei neisimei thupaibü lean kikei, hoba haoeneibü khua honeibü khun hanan kikei.
Choba setshang khoka langpon, langh hoba langmak longkei. Choba setshang thedanga hantin nyet longan kikei; khübü kho Mühghaü soushou nyet ki.
Choba setshang thedanga mangchüh phatko sonlailaibü yungnyu che tegü kikei, hoba Choba setshang jenyua hoba kaijembo langkeibü meisiau lei, thedang hoba phai pendou nyeklangei shenan kikei.
Shaangbou meisiau kho molosaonyu phatan, nyiboubü kho masu shoushou phatbü, semboubü kho müteibü thenyek phatko yeman, hoba leiboubü kho seengbü aulu phatko kikei.
Meisiau lei kho kaak lakbang yeman, tangae mangae pendou nyeklangei shenan kikei. Change nangnak hak asoko,
“Saopobü, saopobü, saopobü,
Bunyubou Mühghaü,
Thükenbou, ao kiteikei, ao tou ki, hoba ao louada,”
dogo haoenei lauko chia laukei.
Hobaje ladang ong khübü meisiau shuongei ponpen thon akiko langkei kibou Choba setshanga setbou la soneikangbü, soumo hoba nyensang kulaje,
jaishou saoto lei khoei Choba setshanga setbou thedanga khüpetda, hoba ponpen thon akiko langkei kibou to lemda, hoba haoenei haoeneibü khun Choba setshang thedanga sungenan phokuko chia hai laulabü,
“Küneibü Bunyubou, hoba küneibü Mühghaü,
soneikangbü, nyenhang hoba sei hapla no mubou;
aishanga pendou nyi kümbei.
Hobaje ka maangangbüei haoen yeikei hoba langkei kukei.”
Kheijinei Choba setshanga setbou mae ika tulai che maangae si tangaenei doan, amaaphilabü nyetei shangjinan hapbei.
Hobaje ngei khuthük hangangbü hau yaangbü cheei ngüh yaangbüei, “Ho le ipla hoba amaaphilabü shuong seengla ao muan ki?” dogo ngekko hapbei.
Khuthüka ayingsi kaodaka ayingsi kaonyu manga aokei kho tulai ipla ayingsi khüto chühla thükbü akitei.
Ngo aeibou haapbei, aishanga kho tulai ipla ayingsi khüto chühla mubü aokei akitei.
Hobaje jaishou shuong yoa cheei kü to laukei, “Tühaap. Jihuda phang kabü molosaonyu, Dawid thensilenei thükena; hibü haoei tulai hoba khoeibü amaaphilabü nyet shangjinbü kho ipla thükkei.”

Kheijinei ngei Choba setshang jenyua langkei kibü meisiau lei si jaishou shuongei kailepan San Shoushou che loan hapbei. Hao kho chühla haitibü tegü kikei. Hao la laang nyet angan hoba nyek nyet yeman kikei; khübü kho kaodak pendou to hautibü Mühghaü soushou nyet kikei.
Hao loukei hoba Choba setshanga setan kibou mae ik ka tulai kho sungkei.

Ladang haoei kho sungkei, langkei kibü meisiau lei si jaishou shuong saoto lei khoei San Shoushou thedanga khüpetkei. Haoen weko kongkin che bang hoba jenei shenan honeibü phau che bang kikei; khübü kho Mühghaü mütshuongei welaubü kikei.
Haoenei chia haanbü che laukei:
“Tulai kho sungla hoba khübü amaaphilabü shangjinbü
kho ipla no mubü,
aishanga no haitikei hoba no haibü danko phang,
ngühyem, mütli hoba phangshuong weko ka
Mühghaü shanga nyi mütshuong jektheda.
Nyi haoen seneibü Mühghaü shanga ungshedbü
sangle la yeitikei,
hoba haoenei kaodaka songdaklabü.”

Kheijinei ngei chühkei hoba ngei kho Choba setshang, langkei kibü meisiau shuong hoba jaishou shuong kaijembo lobü khuthük hangangbü juongeibü ngüh ditkei; hoba haoeneibü lühbak kho shongh shongha, hoba hajar hajar lauko kikei.
Haoenei ngüh yaangbüei laukei;
“Haitibü San Shoushouei sei, keisiyaang,
songsihon, hau, nyenhang, soneikangbü
hoba nyensang hapla mukei.”
Hobaje khuthüka, kaodaka, kaomanga hoba simaanga, yaübü peisilei khümbo hoba yaübü wekoei hai lauko ngei ditkei:
“Choba setshanga setan kibou
hoba San Shoushou to ponpen shanga,
nyensang, nyenhang, soneikangbü
hoba hau, ponpen thon akiko yingshi.”
Hobaje langkeibü meisiau lei khoei laukei, “Amen”; hoba jaishou shuongei khüpetkei hoba lembei.
Kheijinei San Shoushou khoei amaaphilabü shangjinbü nyet kho ipbo hapbei, hoba ngei langkeibü meisiau lei yoa cheei langmak tegü ngüh yaangbüei, “Kaiya!” dogo lauko ditkei.
Ngei chühkei hoba koli thupaibü che kikei. Khonei setbouei lau che jungkei, hao la khun che hankukei, hoba shian apla shanga thük hapbo haukei.
Ladang San Shoushouei amaaphilabü shangjinbü nyiboubü kho ipbei, ngei nyiboubü meisiauei, “Kaiya!” dogo lauko ditkei.
Kho phaia lubü koli saklangbü che longkei. Hobaje kho thüka setbou la mütshuong cheei che haitiyola shanga hoba kaodak ka sangmai ngailangla sakkubü kukei; hoba inlou yaangbü che kho hao la kukei.

Ladang San Shoushouei amaaphilabü shangjinbü semboubü kho ipbei, ngei semboubü meisiauei, “Kaiya!” dogo laubü ditkei. Ngei chühkei, hoba khonei koli nakhübü che kiteikei. Khonei setboueibü ikmanga seret yaüjin che jungkei.
Langkeibü meisiau lei jenyu ka longbü ngüh che tegü lauko ngei ditkei, “Whet youshou seret che lu adoli che hoba barli youshou seret sem lu adoli che, lausikei oliv onang si ih teleiluti.”
Ladang San Shoushouei amaaphilabü shangjinbü leiboubü kho ipbei, ngei leiboubü meisiauei, “Kaiya!” dogo laubü ditkei.

Ngei chühkei hoba khonei koli phaklakbü son che kikei. Khonei setboueibü nyen kho Haibü, hoba Yemsang hao phainei setkei. Kaodak ka phejan leiboubü kho inei, müheinouei hoba limsilangei, hoba kaodak kabü meisiauei dogo shemtila shanga haoen la hau kuan kikei.
Ladang San Shoushouei amaaphilabü shangjinbü ngaoboubü kho ipbei, khonei Mühghaüeibü ngühlang hoba haoenei jungenbü ngühchung laüa haitibü shuongeibü soushou shuong ngei lemshon phanga hapbei.
Haoenei ngüh yaangbüei ngekkei, “Saopobü hoba ngühmai Bunyubou, matjemla hoba kün haitibü sii shanga kaonyudaka kibü shuong to phoklamla nyi lalokche haisühla?”
Haoen mütpem weko la hele thupaibü che bang kukei, hoba jenabou khangenbü shuong hoba jaisinasi shuong, haoen tegü aoyou haitilabü ki, haoen pendou lühbak aonlang shongko haksoteila haoen to lenkei.
Kheijinei ngei chühkei, hoba San Shoushouei amaaphilabü shangjinbü lakboubü kho ipbei, kheijinei selo yaang nyikei; chanyu kho neikek tegü nakkhüan yeikei, hoba litnyu khümbo sii la yeikei;
yei kaangbüei bhuklong nyaakeitijinei bhuk asembü atbü tegü khanshoulitshou shuong kaodak to moletnyu atkhümbei;
müh kho tulai tungaibü tegü maukei; shongh hoba su pendou jembü kaoen ka kukkei.
Kheijinei kaodak kabü Choba shuong, khuleibü shuong, yaangenbü shuong, keijeibü hoba hau kibü dan, hoba aao hoba solo müt pendou haoen lolo laangkhün si shongh kabü laanglipa hukei.
Haoenei shongh hoba laanglak to laukei, “Kün thükto lotashi hoba Choba setshanga setbou thenyek si San Shoushou maangshat ka kün hukai;
aishanga haoeneibü maangshat Chalou yaangbü kho lousüha, hoba aoei loan kienla?”
Kho phaia ngei khuthük hangangbü lei kaodak chemnyek leia loan hapbei. Kaodak ayingsi yungnyu ayingsi bunyu che to ongkei asoutila shanga kaodak kabü yeilam lei pendou haoenei hatlepan phokei.

Hobaje langkeibü Mühghaüeibü amaaphilabü shangjinbü jungan chaang aeka khuthük hangangbü lubü che longko ngei hapbei. Kaodak si yungnyu leilutila hau sakkuan kibü khuthük hangangbü lei kho to haoei ngüh yaangbüei ngekko laukei,
“Künei küneibü Mühghaü khangenbü khüngjaa amaaphilabü ashangjin shongko kaodak yingsikei, yungnyu yingsikei ayingsi bulong yingsikei khon tesakti.”
Kheijinei amaaphilabü shangjinbü shuong lühbak ngei ditkei; kho Israel shousi shuong phang weko ka hajar saongaoto saonyito lei kiteikei.
Jihuda phang ka hajar anthüknyi, Reuben phang ka hajar anthüknyi, Gad phang ka hajar anthüknyi,
Asher phang ka hajar anthüknyi, Naftali phang ka hajar anthüknyi, Manasee phang ka hajar anthüknyi,
Simeon phang ka hajar anthüknyi, Levi phang ka hajar anthüknyi, Issakhar phang ka hajar anthüknyi,
Zebulun phang ka hajar anthüknyi, Josef phang ka hajar anthüknyi, Benjamin phang ka hajar anthüknyi dogo shangjinkei.

Kho phaia ngei chühkei hoba aoeikei wela athükbü mütshang yaangbü che kiteikei; haoen kho phangshuong, phang, mütli hoba ngühyem weko ka kiteikei. Haoen thupaibü helea haoeneibü ika hekyang ham jungan Choba setshang hoba San Shoushou thedanga loan kikei.
Haoenei ngüh yaangbüei ngekkei: “Khümenbü kho Choba setshanga setbou küneibü Mühghaü hoba San Shoushou ka ki.”
Khuthük hangangbü pendou Choba setshang, jaishou shuong hoba langkeibü meisiau shuong kaiko lokei hoba haoenei haoen lolo Choba setshang thedanga khü- petkei hoba Mühghaü lembo
laukei, “Amen. Haülabü, soneikangbü, songsihon, nyensangbü, nyenhang, sei hoba hau pendou thon akiko seneibü Mühghaü to yingshi: Amen.”
Kheijinei jaishou yoa müt cheei kü to laukei, “Hele thupaibü lean kibü shuong kho aoyou hoba haoen laka loukei?”
Ngei hao to laukei, “Yaangbou, nyi ngekei.” Haoei kü to laukei, “Habü shieinangei yaang ka loushadbü mütshuong ki. Haoenei San Shoushoueibü siia haoeneibü hele sakan thupaibü yeitikei.
Khoei ong haoen Mühghaü Choba setshanga ki hoba hao to haoeibü lembüchema change nangnak hao lemda; hoba Choba setshanga setbouei haoen neichemei danglepkulabü.
Haoen ladangkei nyibou mühei ühailabü ayingsi dei alalabü; juokbü chanyu aubü ladangkei haoen thüka ashatlabü.
Aishanga Choba setshang jenyua kibü San Shoushou haoeneibü sanlombou yinglabü hoba haoen langkei deipakshang to leilabü; hoba Mühghaüei haoeneibü nyek ka nyeksi pendou haman apbulabü.”
Kheijinei ladang San Shoushouei nyetboubü amaaphilabü shangjinbü kho ipbei, angh tho thüng khuthüka ngüh alongko kikei.
Mühghaü thedanga lobü khuthük hangangbü nyet kho ngei hapbei hoba haoen la teklaang nyet kukei.

Kheijinei khuthük hangangbü lubü che loukei hoba lemshona lokei. Haoei haoeneibü jenjok phau che jungan Choba setshang thedanga kibü honeibü lemshona Mühghaü mütshuongei welaujinei lemla shanga hao la jen juongnyu kukei.
Mühghaü mütshuong welau yoa khuthük hangangbüeibü ik ka jongsak wankhük kho Mühghaü thedang to angkei.
Hobaje khuthük hangangbüei phau kho sungkei. Haoei kho lemshon kabü wanei shentikei hoba kaodak to tekyantikei; hoba khünei langmak hoba langh hoba langpon hoba selonyibü kikei.
Kheijinei teklaang nyet jungbü khuthük hangangbü nyet khoei khübü metla lamlekei.

Shaangbouei haoeibü teklaang metkei; hoba siiei khonan sen hoba wan longkei, hoba khübü kho kaodak to jonan koutikei. Kaodak phejan sem ka che lonkei, bunyu phejan sem ka che lonkei, hoba sang pendou lonan shembei.
Khuthük hangangbü nyiboubüei haoeibü teklaang metkei; hoba wan longan kibü shongh yaangbü tegübü denche simaangto shemattikei. Yungnyu phejan sem ka che sii la yeikei,
yungnyua kibü langkeibü meisiau phejan sem ka che haikei, hoba long phejan sem ka che leilukei.
Khuthük hangangbü semboubüei haoeibü teklaang metkei; hoba wannyat tegü longan kibü khanshoulitshou yaangbü che atkei. Ho shumang phejan sem ka chenei hoba deipakshanga shatkei.
Khanshoulitshou kho, “Khauekbü” nyenkei. Hobaje dei phejan sem ka che khauekbü la yeikei, hoba dei khauekbü la yeisije kho deiei müt juongnyu haikei.

Khuthük hangangbü leiboubüei haoeibü teklaang metkei; hoba chanyu phejan sem ka che hoba litnyu phejan sem ka che, hoba khanshoulitshou phejan sem ka che kakan apbei, hibü khoei khübü phejan sem ka che nakthühan apbei, hoba chalou phejan sem ka che, hoba nangnakkei phejan sem ka chenei ngesakbü akitei.

Kheijinei ngei chühkei, hoba mühloma aulu che seengeiko ngüh yaangbüei lauko ditkei, “Khuthük hangangbü semei metla kibü lubü teklaang ngühlang shanga kaodaka kibü danshuong shanga, khonku, khonku, khonku!”
Kheijinei khuthük hangangbü ngaobouei haoeibü teklaang metkei; hoba khuthük ka kaodak to atbü khanshoulitshou che ngei hapbei. Hobaje khanshoulitshou kho la thonshang akibü püngkhün koukhin kukei.
Haoei thonshang akibü püngkhün kho ipbei, hoba khüka wanlong yaangbü kabü wankhük tegü wankhük longkei; püngkhün kabü wankhük khoei chanyu si yei nakthühtham apbei.
Wankhük khüka kaodak to koksüng longkei, hoba haoen la kaodakbü sinkip la tegü hau kukei.
Kaodak sang ayingsi sangtüngbü peisilei ayingsi bunyu ai khon asaktilabü, lausikei aoyoueibü khüngjaa Mühghaüei amaaphilabü shangjinbü aki, khübü shuong ong khonsaktila haoen la lenkei.
Haoen haitila aying lausikei lit ngao shanga khonkutila haoen la sakkukei. Haoenei kulabü khonku kho sinkipei müt to takjinei lai ong khonsakda kho phatko kilabü.
Khübü chaloua mütshuongei haibü lamlabü lausikei kho ühüplabü; haoenei haimang sühlabü, lausikei haibüei haoen apyolabü.
Koksüng shuong kho chühla wapyola lamlean kibü koli shuong tegü kikei; haoeneibü khua honeibü khun phatko kikei, hoba haoeneibü thenyek kho müteibü thenyek phatko kikei.
Haoen la yaksaeibü khulou tegü kikei, hoba haoeneibü hauh kho molosaonyueibü hauh tegü kikei.
Haoeneibü khükhom kho nameibü khükhom tegü kikei, hoba haoeneibü kaak langh kho lason to laangbü koli juongnyuei senan haubü kailong langh tegü kikei.
Sinkip tegü haoen to mei hoba lüh kikei, hoba lit ngao sühko mütshuong khonkutilabü sei haoeneibü meia kikei.
Thonshang akibü püngkhün hangangbü kho haoeneibü Choba kikei. Haoeibü nyen kho Ibri ngüha Abaddon hoba Grik ngüha Appolion, tetlabü Shemtibou.
Shaangbou khonku kho dana; ho phaito lubü khonku penyi louada.
Kheijinei khuthük hangangbü lakboubüei haoeibü teklaang metkei; hoba Mühghaü thedanga kibü honeibü lemshon chemnyek lei ka ngüh che ngei ditkei.
Ngüh khoei teklaang jungan kibü khuthük hangangbü lakboubü khüto laukei, “Efrata shumang yaangbüa khinlepan kibü khuthük hangangbü lei kho litiashi.”
Jihsiphai, chalou, lit hoba po shanga lamlean phobü khuthük hangangbü lei kho khunak shousi phejan sem ka che haitila shanga litikei.
Hobaje koli daka setbü lühbak milion saoan kiteikei.

Ngei mangsanga khübü koli hoba khonei setbü shuong hapbei; haoenei khükhom la wan tegü saklangbü, mühsak hoba sulfur tegü semjeibü lekei. Koli shuongeibü khu molosaonyu khu tegü yembei, hoba haoeneibü sembung ka wan, wankhük hoba wansat moli longkei.
Haoeneibü sembung ka angbü wan, wankhük hoba wansat moli, khübü khonku sem khoei kaodaka kibü müt phejan sem ka che shemtikei;
aishanga koli shuongeibü sei kho haoeneibü sembunga hoba meia kikei. Haoeneibü khuyembü mei kho pinyu tegü kikei, hoba khübüei haoenei khonsaktikei.

Khübü khonsakei ühaitiko joubü khunak shousi shuongei haoeneibü ikei kümbü ka maangpon asepei, lausikei shabü soushou shuong hoba chühla, ditla hoba paila athükbü honeibü heangsho, chandinam, chinam, laang hoba bu lemyokei.
Haoenei müt haitibü, seibütakbü, asangalan hoba kokbü ka maangpon asepei.

Hobaje hau kibü lubü khuthük hangangbü che sangmei hele lean khuthük ka louyenko ngei hapbei; haoeibü khua yepukshangjep che jenkei, hoba haoeibü thenyek kho chanyu tegü kikei; haoeibü you wan thaonyu tegü kikei,
hoba hao ika tulai haanbü che ipan jungkei. Haoei haoeibü mae you yungnyua hoba nanae you kaomaia nakkei,
hoba haoei molosaonyuei ngühbü tegü ngüh yaangbüei ngekkei. Ladang haoei ngekkei, langmak nyetei jongaitiko ngühkei.
Hobaje ladang langmak nyet khoei ngüh longkei ngei dola lamlean kikei; lausikei khuthük ka ngüh cheei hai laubü ngei ditkei, “Langmak nyetei ai laukei kho huan phoashi; kho tedolet.”
Hobaje khuthük hangangbü ao ngei yungnyu hoba kaomaia loan hapbei haoei haoeibü mae ik khuthük ae tuokkei,
hoba tou hoba ponpen lang kibou khuthük si kaodak kümbou hoba yungnyu si khonei kibü ajanjan pendou kümbou nyena haoei thekolanko hai laukei: “Touje phaiko akilabü,

lausikei hangangbü nyetboubü ngühlang jihsiphaia, ladang haoei haoeibü teklaang metlaje kheijinei haoei haoeibü sambü thuseibü shuong to lenbü tegü Mühghaüeibü huphang kümsilei shuong kho loushadlabü.”
Ngei khuthük ka lauko ditbü ngüh khoei kü to nyiboula joyokei hoba laukei, “Hauashi, hoba yungnyu si kaomaia loan kibou khuthük hangangbü ik ka ipan kibü tulai kho sungashi.”
Hibü ngo haukei hoba kü la tulai haanbü kho kubü dogo hao to laukei. Haoei kü to laukei, “Ho sungashi hoba shauashi. Hoei kaibü shiang haijeptilabü lausikei ho ka sembunga naodei tegü teibü kilabü.”
Ngei tulai haanbü kho khuthük hangangbü ik ka sungkei hoba shaukei, hoba kü sembunga ho naodei maimai teian kikei; lausikei ladang ngei kho shaukei, ngeibü shiang haijeptham yeikei.
Kheijinei kü to laukei, “Nyi mütli, phangshuong, ngühyem hoba Choba shuong juongnyu shanga nyibou tetenko laujan.”
Kheijinei kü la jutak tegübü phodong che kukei, hoba kü to lenkei, “Loenashi hoba Mühghaü lembüchem hoba lemshon takashi, hoba khonei lembü shuong weashi.
Lembüchem khong chemso kho apyoashi; kho tetak, aishanga ho Küksithang la kuan apa, hoba hoei lit saonyito nyi saopobü sangnyu kho youei nakeilabü.
Ngei ngeibü aukabü nyi la hau kulabü. Haosiei neikek neilabü hoba chalou hajar che, saoanto saosem tetenlabü.”
Khübü kho kaodak Bunyubou thedanga lobü oliv bunyu nyi hoba wanthung nyi ki.
Atei haosi khonsaktimang sühalonga haosieibü haken ka wan longan haosieibü dangbou shemtida; haosi khonsaktimang sühbü dan kho tegü haitijan.

Haosiei tetenjinei lang aloutiko mühkou khinan apla shanga haosi to sei ki. Tokei ladüngnei dei ka sii la yeitimang sühda, hoba kaodak to limsilang phang wekoei ngümmang sühda khüjochenei kümla haosi la sei kuakei.
Lausikei ladang haosiei aukabü kukhümlaje, meisiau laobou thonshang akibü püngkhün ka longda haoei haosi to wapyolabü, haosi thüklabü hoba haosi haitilabü.
Haosieibü haibü mang kho Sodom ayingsi Ijep dogo ngühtet leko nyenbü sangnyu, laonei haoenei Bunyubou peiseia thüngkei, kho sangnyu yaangbü khongthua peitetnyu pholabü.
Hobaje mütli shuong, phangna shuong, ngüh- yem shuong hoba phangshuong ka mütshuongei chalou sem tho sühko haosieibü haibü mang to chühlabü; haoenei haosieibü haibü mang kho heea akhüntilabü.
Kaodaka kibü shuongei haosi shanga olinlabü hoba cheei che la jongsak kuyoko olinyolabü, aishanga khübü thuseibü nyi khoei kaodaka kibü khonkutikei.
Hobaje chalou sem tho phaia haosi to Mühghaü ka langkei hak atkei, hoba haosi jembü youei loenkei. Haosi hapbü shuong aeibou hatkei.
Kheijinei thuseibü nyi khoei ngüh yaangbüei khuthük ka haosi to lauko ditkei, “Hato kaiyang”; hoba haosi sangmei chenei khuthük to angkei, hoba haosieibü dangbou shuongei haosi hapbei.
Kho jihsiphaia selo yaang nyikei, hoba sangnyu phejan an ka che lusakkei hoba selo nyibüei hajar nyet shembei. Joubü shuong khoei hatenan Mühghaü la nyensang kukei.
Nyiboubü khonku dana; semboubü khonku tongde louada.

Kheijinei khuthük hangangbü nyetboubüei haoeibü teklaang metkei; hoba khuthük ka ngüh yaangbang hai lauko longkei: “Kaonyudaka sangle shuong tou seneibü Bunyubou hoba haoeibü Khristaeibü ki, hoba haoei pon- pen thon akiko songdaklabü.”
Kheijinei Mühghaü junga haoen lulueibü Choba setshanga setbü jaishou shuong saotolei khoei haoen lolo khüpetkei hoba Mühghaü lembo
laukei,
“O Mühghaü Thükenbou, hoba tou kibü Bunyubou,
künei no sangda aieilausi nyi kaibü sei yaangbü sunga,
hoba songdakla khanga.
Phangshuong danei khauangkei lausikei kaibü maangshat loua.
Haibü shuong mat jemlabü,
hoba no khangenbü thuseibü shuong si ka mütshuong
hoba ka nyen to hatbü shuong hanbü yaangbü pendou la
jongsak kulabü jih hoba kaodak shemtibü dan shemtilabü
jihsiphai lousüha.”
Hobaje khuthüka Mühghaü lembüchem kho ipbei, hoba haoeibü lembüchema haoeibü ngühkhüm busen kho hapbei, hoba khonei langpon, ngüh, langmak, selo nyibü hoba yeilang sen kikei.
Kheijinei khuthüka ama- aphilabü yaang hapbei. Kho chanyu hele la lebü yaksa che kiteikei; litnyu kho saoeibü youphanga kikei, hoba saoeibü khua khanshoulitshou anthüknyi kibü khun che hanan kikei.
Sao mang akongko kikei, hoba na hapla shanga nabukshat longbü ka saoei ngekkei.
Hobaje khuthüka lubü amaaphilabü che hapbei. Kho khu nyet yembü hoba laang an angbü hoba haoeibü khua Choba khun nyet kibü Dragon saklangbü yaangbü che kiteikei.
Haoeibü meiei mühkabü khanshoulitshou phejan sem ka che senletkei hoba kaodak to attikei. Kheijinei buksilengko suila shanga dragon kho na hapla nyangko kibü yaksa kho thedanga lokei.
Saoei bousushou che, aoei namjuei phangshuong pendou songdaklabü ki, hao bukkei. Hobaje na kho Mühghaü jungto hoba Mühghaüeibü Choba setshang jungto leiangkei.
Kheijinei yaksa kho chalou hajar che, saoanto saosem shanga laonei sao pangteilabü shanga Mühghaüei kaoen che lamlekukei, khüto satkei.
Hobaje khuthüka lason che kikei. Maikel hoba haoeibü khuthük hangangbü shuongei dragon khulimbo wapyokei. Dragon si haoeibü khuthük hangangbü shuongeikei wapyokei,
lausikei hao to thüklabü lele hau akitei hoba thonla haoen shanga khuthüka kishang ühüp.
Dragon yaangbü, kaopakbü pinyu, aoto Shabü mühghaü ayingsi Satan dogo lauda, aoei kaodak khümbo khüpettida, hao kho kaodak to attikei, hoba haoeibü khuthük hangangbü shuongkei hao yoa attikei.

Hobaje khuthüka ngüh yaangbü cheei lauko ngei ditkei, “Thonla Mühghaüei sen khümena. Haoei sen la haoeibü sei, hoba sangle hoba haoeibü Khrista hau lena, aishanga seneibü jaisina la shed kubou, aoei seneibü Mühghaü thedanga change nangnak haoen la shed kuda, hao kho attida.
Haoenei hao kho San Shoushoueibü sii hoba haoenei aukabü künbü ngühlangei thükkei, aishanga haoeneibü langkei aphokai hoba haila maangangko kikei.
Kho shanga kan khuthük shuong hoba kan khünei kibü shuong olinashi. Kao hoba yungnyu shanga ügütü! Aishanga haoeibü jih tuisho ong dogo ngean shabü mühghaü aeibou khauang longko kan jungto louyena.”
Hobaje ladang dragonei hao kaodak to attibü ngekei, bousushou che bukkubü yaksanyu kho haoei shieinangeikei.
Hobaje pinyu ka huletan yama po sem tho shanga pangteila kibü saoeibü kishang to sao seengjung haula shanga sao la aulu yaangbü cheeibü kaak penyi kukei.
Pinyu khoei sao phonglangtila shanga hao sembung ka yaksanyu phainei dei shumang tegü koutikei.
Lausikei kaonyu khoei yaksanyu to thuila loukei, hoba kaonyuei hao sembung hakoukei hoba dragonei hao sembung ka longtibü shumang pendou jenkhümbei.

Kheijinei dragon yaksanyu to aicheküman khau angkei, hoba saoeibü joubü shousi shuong aoyouei Mühghaü ngühkhüm jungeida hoba Bunyubouei kubü aukabü lanko hatlepda, khübü to wapyola haukei. Hobaje hao yungkoa lokei.
Hobaje ngei meisiau che yungnyu ka longko hapbei. Khola laang an hoba khu nyet yeman kikei. Khoeibü laanga khun nyet hoba khua Mühghaü nyikubü nyen shuong kikei.

Meisiau laobou ngei hapbei kho kongkhü phatko, khoeibü you sapeibü you phatko, hoba khoeibü sembungei molosaonyu sembung phatan kikei. Dragonei kho la haoeibü hau, haoeibü Choba setshang hoba haoeibü songdak kuan apbei.
Haoeibü khu shuong yoa cheje haileleko ngümnyinbü tegü, lausikei haoeibü haikhün mou kho maian kikei. Kaodak khümboei maangpangko kho meisiau phai sembei.
Haoenei dragon lembei aieilausi haoei meisiau khola songdak kukei, hoba haoenei meisiau kho lembo laukei, “Ho meisiau phatko ao ki? Aoei hao khulimbo wapyola?”
Hao la yonglambü hoba Mühghaü nyikubü ngüh laula sembung che kuan kikei, hoba ho kümla lit saonyito nyi hao la songdak kuan kikei.
Hobaje haoei Mühghaü khulimbo nyikubü ngüh laula, hao nyen hoba hao kishang hoba khuthüka kibü shuong to nyikubü ngüh angla hao sembung ipbei.
Hao la Mühghaü mütshuong to wapyola hoba haoen thükenla sakkukei hoba hao la phang thüka, mütli thüka, ngühyem thüka hoba phangshuong thüka songdak hau kuan kikei.
Kao- pakjineithama haitibü San Shoushou le hoba langkei lea aoyou daneibü nyen doan aki, khübü kaonyudak kabü mütshuong pendouei hao to lemlabü.
Müt at nou yemalonga haoei ditashi.
Müt at langsenlabü kisije langsenbü to hao hauda; müt at inei haitilabü kialonga hao inei haitijan. Mühghaü mütshuong shanga natenla hoba mailemla khambü kho tou ki.
Hobaje lubü meisiau che kaodak ka longko ngei hapbei. Kho la san shoushoueibü tegü laang penyi yeman kikei hoba khoei dragonei tegü laukei.

Haoei shaangbou meisiaueibü songdak pendou kikei hoba haoei kho shaangbou meisiauei chühjinei jungeikei. Hobaje haoei kaodak hoba khonei kibü shuong pendou la haileleko leiluan maibou meisiau kho lemtikei.
Haoei mütshuong thedanga khuthük ka kaodak to wan yantikotham amaaphilabü yaang kümbei.

Hobaje ho shaangbou meisiau thedanga laobou amaa- philabü shuong kümla hao la sakkuan kikei, khübüei haoei kaodaka kibü shuong khüpettikei. Haoei kaodak mütshuong pendou to laobou meisiau inthem thükan maikei hao shanga heangsho che kümla shanga lenkei.
Kho heangshoei ngüh mangkei anglabü, hoba ladüngei ho meisiau heangsho alemlaje, haoen kho haitilabü shanga meisiau heangsho la langkei hak kula shanga hao la sei kukei.
Haoei hanbü hoba yaangbü, keibü hoba shalebü, dongebü hoba aao, pendou la haoeneibü mae ik ayingsi khüngjaa amaaphilabü jangtikei,
hoba kho meisiau nyen amaaphilabü ayingsi khoeibü nyen lühbak jangbü to limanje aolakei jekla ayingsi yakla asakku.
Honei songsihon khamakei. Aola ditenbü ki haoei kho meisiau lühbak kho weashi, aishanga ho müt cheeibü lühbak. Haoeibü lühbak kho saongao lakto saosemto lak.
Kheijinei ngei chühkei, hoba San Shoushou kho Zion shongha loan kikei. Hobaje hao yoa haoeibü nyen hoba hao boueibü nyen khüngjaa doan müt hajar saongaoto sanyito lei kikei.
Hobaje ngei khuthük ka dei jungnyu koubü hoba langmak yaangbü langh tegü ditkei. Ngei ditbü langh kho kongkin tuokbü shuongei tuokbü tegü kikei.

Haoenei Choba setshang thedanga hoba langkeibü meisiau lei thedanga hoba jaishou shuong thedanga chia haanbü che atkuko kikei. Kaodak pendou ka angthetbü müt hajar saongaoto saonyito lei to liman kho chia kho aoeikei ditletla athükko kikei.

Haoen kho yaksa to akhonyobü mütshuong, haoen haoen lolo saüenan phokei. Haoen kho San Shoushou haushang pendoua hao phai sembü shuong ki. Haoen kho mütshuong yo ka Mühghaü shanga hoba San Shoushou shanga angthetbü, shaangbü buhek shuong ki.
Haoenei ladangkei ayepei; haoen nali athebü shuong ki.
Hobaje khuthük hangangbü lubü che mühyaaka seengaiko ngei hapbei. Kaodaka kibü shuong phangshuong, phang, ngühyem hoba mütli weko to ngekletla shanga thon akibü ngühlang maibü haoei künan kikei.
Haoei ngüh yaangbü cheei laukei, “Mühghaü to hatashi hoba hao sangashi, aieilausi haoeibü matjembü jihsiphai loua. Khuthük si kaodak yaübou, yungnyu si dei pakshang kümbou lemashi.”

Nyiboubü khuthük hangangbüei phai sembo laukei, “Sao tuonga, Babilon yaangbü, sao tuonga! Mühghaü maangshat sungbatibou ih, laobouei phangshuong pendou la sao asangalanbü ih yungtida, kho sao tuonga.”
Hobaje khuthük hangangbü semboubüei haosi phai sembo ngüh yaangbüei laukei, “Ao mütei meisiau hoba khoeibü heangsho lemda, hoba haoeibü khüngjaa ayingsi ika shangmo leda,
haoeibü maangshat thunga shenko kheibü Mühghaü khauang ih khokei haoei yunglabü. Hobaje saopobü khuthük hangangbü shuong thedanga hoba San Shoushou thedanga wan hoba wansat moliei hao khon kulabü.
Haoen khonkubü wankhük ponpen thon akiko angan apda; aoyouei kho meisiau hoba haoeibü heangsho lemda, ayingsi hao nyen shangmo sungletda, change nangnak haoen hakso aki.”
Hanei Mühghaü ngühkhüm hoba Jisu to mailembü jungeibü Mühghaü mütshuong natenbü shanga ki.

Hobaje ngei khuthük ka ngüh che lauko ditkei, “Doashi: Tou ka jaüan Bunyuboua haibü shuong olinbou. Haü, haoen haoeneibü khonsak ka haksolabü, dogo Soushouei lauda, aishanga haoeneibü kümsilei haoen phai semda!”
Hobaje ngei chühkei, hoba sangmei thupaibü che hapbei hoba kho sangmeia müt phatbü che setan hapbei. Haoeibü khua honeibü khun che hoba haoeibü ika langku akbü che jungan kikei.

Kheijinei lubü khuthük hangangbü che lembüchem ka longan sangmeia setan kibou khüto ngüh yaangbüei ngekko laukei, “Langku attiashi hoba latashi, aishanga youlat jih süha; aishanga kaodakeibü youshou nyenetakei.”
Kheijinei sangmeia setbouei kaodak to haoeibü langku litikei hoba kaodak youshou kho latkei.
Hobaje khuthük kabü lembüchem ka lubü khuthük hangangbü che longkei; hoba haoeikei langku akbü che jungan kikei.

Kheijinei wan thüka sei kibou khuthük hangangbü lubü che lemshon ka longkei. Haoei langku akbü jungbou khüto ngüh yaangbüei ngekko laukei, “Kaibü langku akbü kho attiashi hoba kaodak semlühlaak ka semlüh shen shuong kho latshaiashi; aishanga kho semphema.”
Hibü khuthük hangangbüei kaodak to haoeibü langku attikei hoba kaodak semlüh laak ka mai yoshaikei hoba kho Mühghaü maangpok semlüh ngünshang yaangbü to tekan jinkei.
Hobaje kho ngünshang kho sang batanga nakeikei, hoba ngünshang ka sii phak che haüko hoba mail saoan sühko dangshatko koukei.

Hobaje ngei lubü yaangbü hoba maangpanglabü ama- aphilabü müha hapbei; kho shieinangei nyet kibou khuthük hangangbü nyet kiteikei. Khübü kho thonbü shieinangei, aishanga khübünei Mühghaü maangpok koukei.

Hobaje wan yoa kheibü mangchüh yungnyu tegü ngei hapbei. Ngei tokei meisiau thüka hoba khoeibü heangsho thüka hoba khoeibü nyen lühbak thüka thükenbü shuong hapbei. Haoenei haoeneibü ika Mühghaü kongkin jungan mangchüh yungkoa lokei.
Haoenei Mühghaü khangenbou Mosa chia hoba San Shoushoueibü chia hai atko laukei,
“Thükenbou Mühghaü Bunyubou,
kaibü kümsilei shuong kho yaangbü
hoba maangpanglabü;
O phangshuong Choba,
ka lamnyu tangbü hoba ngühmai ki.
Bunyubou, aoei ka to ühütla, hoba ka nyen soneiakangtila?
Aishanga no ong saopobü ki.
Phangshuong pendou ka jungto loulabü
hoba ka thedanga khüpetlabü, aieilausi
kaibü saopobü kümsilei shuong tangkhida.”
Kho phaia ngei chühkei, hoba khuthük ngühchung neichem lembüchem ipbei.
Hobaje kho lembüchem ka shieinangei nyet kibou khuthük hangangbü nyet kho longkei. Haoenei hinseibü hoba chamang shoubü hele lekei hoba honeibü khükhomei khuku jembo kaian kikei.
Hobaje langkeibü meisiau lei yoa cheei khübü khuthük hangangbü nyet la ponpen thon akiko lang kibou Mühghaü maangshatei shenko hon thung nyet kukei.
Hobaje Mühghaü soneikangbü hoba haoeibü sei ka longbü wankhükei lembüchem kho shenkei; hoba khübü khuthük hangangbü nyetei khübü shieinangei nyet kho akhüm shongko aokei kho lembüchem to atla athük.
Hobaje ngei lembüchem ka ngüh yaangbü cheei khübü khuthük hangangbü nyet khüto longan lenko ditkei, “Hauashi hoba Mühghaü khauang thung kho kaodak thükto khokan jinkuashi.”
Shaangbou khuthük hangangbü kho haukei hoba haoeibü thung kho kaodaka khokan jinkukei; hoba kho meisiaueibü shangmo kibü mütshuong hoba khoeibü heangsho lembü shuong to phetla yalabü mou longkei.
Nyiboubü khuthük hangangbüei haoeibü thung kho yungnyu to khokan jinkei; hoba kho müt haibü sii tegü sii la yeikhümbei hoba yungnyua kibü langkeibü yangsikok pendou haikhümbei.
Semboubü khuthük hangangbüei haoeibü thung kho shumang to hoba deipakshang to luan jinkei; hoba haoen sii la yeikei.
Hobaje ngei dei kabü khuthük hangangbüei lauko ditkei, “O Saopobou, no ao ki hoba ao kiteikei, kaibü matjem janbü ki, aieilausi no ngühmaanglanbü ki!
Aishanga aoyouei Mühghaü mütshuong hoba thuseibü shuong sii koutikei nyi haoen la sii yungla kukei; kho haoenei mubü ki.”
Hobaje ngei lemshonei lauko ditkei, “Haü, thükenbou Mühghaü Bunyubou, kaibü matjembü shuong ngühmai hoba saopobü ki.”
Leiboubü khuthük hangangbüei haoeibü thung kho chanyu to khokan jinkei; hoba müt to siko juokla hao la seisihau kukei.
Mütshuong aubüei aeibou juokeikei; khübü shieinangei thüka sei kibou Mühghaü nyen to haoenei khükkeiuokkei, lausikei haoenei maangpon asepei hoba hao yaangenbou nyen asang.
Ngaoboubü khuthük hangangbüei meisiau Choba setshanga haoeibü thung kho khokan jinkukei, hoba khoeibü sangle nakthühan apbei. Hobaje mütshuongei shatbü ka haoeneibü lishang to takngailangkei,
hoba haoeneibü shat si mou to phetbü anatla khuthük Mühghaü nyen shakei; lausikei haoenei haoeneibü kümsilei kaje maangpon asepei.
Lakboubü khuthük hangangbüei haoeibü thung kho Efrata shumang yaangbüa khokan jinkei. Kheijinei kho dei hapbei hoba khoei chaang aeka louko kibü Choba shuong shanga lam lamlekukei.
Hobaje dragon haken ka, hoba meisiau haken ka, hoba amlangbü thuseibü haken ka dogo yuk phatbü asaopobü soushou sem longko ngei hapbei.
Haoen kho shabü mühghaü soushou shuong hoba haoenei amaaphilabü kümda. Thükenbou Mühghaü Chalou yaangbü lason to kaodak khümboeibü Choba shuong huishaila shanga haoen hauda.
(Ngo kokbü che phatko louada. Ao müt pianleman kida, hoba ao mütkong paian pühdaka himou abaulabü lele aoei hele lamlean kida kho mütei haükei!)
Hobaje Ibri ngüha Armagedon nyenbü kaoen chenei haoen takshatkei.
Nyetboubü khuthük hangangbüei haoeibü thung kho mühloma khokan jinkei; hoba lembüchem ka Choba setshang ka ngüh yaangbü che longko laukei, “Ho küma.”
Kheijinei langpon, hoba langh, hoba langmak longkei, hoba hatlabü che selo nyikei. Kaopakbü ka jaüan ladangkei nyian achühbü hatlabü selo kaangbütham nyikei!
Sangyaang yaangbü kho phejan sem la bangkei hoba phangshuongeibü sangyaang shuong kho tuongkei. Babilon yaangbou kho Mühghaüei damenkei, hoba Mühghaü maangshat ihthung kho sao la kukei.
Su pendou maukei hoba shongh shuong akiko apbei.
Hobaje müh ka seret anjinsem thüng atsheibü senlang yaangbang müt thükto lotkei, hoba kho senlang shieinangei shanga haoenei Mühghaü to khükkeiuokkei, aishanga shieinangei kho yongko yaangan kikei.
Hobaje thung nyet jungbü khuthük hangangbü nyet yo ka che loukei hoba kü to joyokei. Haoei laukei, “Kaiya, hoba deinyu juong thüka sangbü asangalannyu thükto matjembü hautibü kho ngei ka la lenlabü.
Kaodak Choba shuongei sao to asangalanbü jungeikei hoba kaodaka kibü mütshuong saoeibü asangalan ih danko jakettikei.”

Kheijinei Soushouei ngo hapbei hoba khuthük hangangbüei ngo lamang che to leilangkei, hoba ngei yaksa che meisiau saklangbü chenei setan kibü hapbei. Meisiau kho Mühghaü nyikubü nyenei shenan kikei hoba hao la khu nyet hoba laang an yeman kikei.
Yaksa kho nakthüngan sakbü hoba saklangbü hele lean hoba hon, namseklaang hoba phülem yakan kikei. Hobaje saoeibü ika mangsenlabü hoba sao asangalan ihinseibü peisileiei shenko hon thung che kikei.
Saoeibü khüngjaa huphang ngühtet che doan kikei, “Babilon yaangbü, asang- alanbü nyu hoba kaodakeibü mangsenlabü.”
Hobaje yaksa kho Mühghaü mütshuongeibü sii hoba Jisu to aukabü künbü siiei jakan ngei hapbei.
Ladang ngei sao hapbei ngo aicheküman maangpangkei.
Khuthük hangangbüei kü to laukei, “No aila maangpangkei? Ho yaksa hoba sao künbou khu nyet hoba laang an yembou meisiau huphang ngüh kho ngei ka la lenlabü.

“Nyi hapbü meisiau kho lang kikei, hoba tou aki, lausikei kho thonshang akibü püngkhün ka longlabü hoba maushang to haulabü. Kaodaka kibü mütshuong, aoyoueibü nyen kaopakjinei thama langkei lea doan aki, haoenei kho meisiau hapan maangpanglabü, aieilausi kho lang kikei hoba touje aki, lausikei nyibou longeilabü.
Hanei ditenbü songsido khamakei. Khu nyet kho yaksa setan kibü shongh nyet. Khübü kho Choba nyetkei ki.
Haoen ngao tuonga, che hanei kia, lubü che kho molou, ladang hao loulaje hao longche kijan.
Hobaje meisiau laobou lang kikei hoba tou aki kho setboubü, hoba ho nyet yoakei che ki, hoba ho maushang to haulabü.
Nyi hapbü laang an kho Choba an ki, haoenei songdakla akhangkei; lausikei angh che shanga meisiau yoa haoenei Choba songdak hau sungletda.
Haoen chela hamakei, hoba haoenei haoeneibü hau hoba songdak kho meisiau khola kuda.

Haoenei San Shoushou khulimbo wapyolabü, hoba San Shoushouei haoen thükenlabü, aishanga hao kho bunyu shuong yoa Bunyubou, hoba Choba shuong yoa Choba; hoba hao phaia sembü shuong, aoyou ngabü, pienbü hoba maanglemenbü ki haoen kho thükenbü phejana yolabü.”
Hobaje khuthük hangangbüei kü to laukei, “Nyi hapbü dei shuong, laonei asang- alanbü setan kiteikei, khübü kho mütshuong hoba noknyüh, phangshuong hoba ngühyem shuong ki.
Nyi hapbü laang an hoba meisiau khoei asangalannyu kho mangsenlabü; haoenei sao sangliphanga hoba mütkong yeitilabü, saoeibü phe shaulabü hoba sao wana lontilabü.
Aishanga Mühghaü ngüh shuong aloushad shongko hao maangleko kümla hoba maangpon chela lean haoeneibü sangle meisiau la kula Mühghaüei haoeneibü maangpon to jinkukei.
“Hobaje laobou yaksa nyi hapbei sao kho kaodak Choba shuong thüka songdaknyu, sangnyu yaangbou kho ki.”
Kho phaia ngei lubü khuthük hangangbü che khuthük ka louyenko hapbei. Hao la songdak hau yaang kukei, hoba haoeibü soneikangbüei kaodak shenkei.
Haoei ngüh yaangbüei ngekkei, “Sao tuonga! Sao tuonga, Babilon yaangbü! Sao kho shabü soushou shuong kishang, asao- pobü soushou hoba asaopobü hoba mangsenlabü au shuong thüngshang la yeia;
aishanga phangshuong pendou sao yoa saoeibü asangalanbü ihei jakeda, hoba kaodak Choba shuongei sao to asangalanbü jungeikei, hoba sao apsilebü maangdüh danko kaodak namseibü dan keikei.”
Kheijinei ngei khuthük ka lubü ngüh che lauko ditkei,
“Kü mütshuong, kan saoeibü shabüa ühamlabü,
hoba saoeibü shieinangei asungletlabü lele
kan sao ka longan apashi;
aishanga saoeibü shabü shuong müha onko longa,
hoba Mühghaüei saoeibü shedbü damena.
Saoei mü lai jungeikei kho tegü saokei jungeiashi.
Saoei kümbü mu phejan nyiei aei kungaiashi.
Saoei mü shanga kheikubü thung khonei
sao la phejan nyiei aei totkuashi.
Saoeibü olin kungkhen hoba apsilebü langkei
to thambo sao la khonku hoba maangmau kushi.
Aishanga saoei lolo laungaida,
‘Ngo Chobasao che tegü setda;
ngo latnyu aying hoba ngei maangmau ladangkei ühüplabü.’
Hibü chalou chenei saoeibü shieinangei loulabü:
limsilang, maangmau hoba mühsinou;
hoba sao kho wanei lonlabü;
aishanga sao matjembou kho
Thükenbou Bunyubou Mühghaü ki.”
Ladang haoenei sao lonbü wankhük haplaje, sao to asang- alanbü jungeibü hoba apsilebü langkei kibü kaodak Choba shuongei sao shangabü mang haaplabü.
Haoei sao khonku to hatenan hebüa loda hoba lauda, “Yaangbü hoba hauki yaangkibü Babilon sangyaang, ügütü, ügütü, ügütü! Angh che kanglanga kaibü matjem lousüha.”
Kaodak namseibü shuongei sao shanga haapda hoba mang haapda aieilausi haoeneibü peisilei:

hon, chandinam, namseklaang, hoba ponlem; inyaibü nei maibü, nakthüngan sakbü nei, yanglüh nei, saklangbü nei; citron bu phang pendou, thunyu hauh si namton bu ka kümbü peisilei, chinam, nam hoba marbel;
phoulo, shikmei maitibou, jen, ponlem onang hoba bunai; ih, onang, wen hoba whet; masu, sanlon, koli, koli kailong, aao hoba müteibü langkei yoan, khübü pendou touje aoeikei ajekda.
(“Ngei ka to lenda, nyi maangdühbü buhek kho satan apa; apsilebü hoba soneikangbü pendou ka la maukua; khübü kho ladangkei nyibou ühüpmailabü.”)
Khübü peisilei yakbü namseibü shuong aoyou sao danko keibü yeikei, haoenei sao khonkubü hapan hatla hebüa lolabü. Haoenei haaplabü hoba mang haaplabü,
hoba laulabü, “Inyaibü nei hoba nakthüngan sakbü hoba saklangbü, hoba hon hoba namseklaang hoba phülemei hele lebü ho sangnyu yaangbü, ügütü! ügütü!
Aishanga angh che kanglanga khübü nyaksinam khütetche kho shema.”
Kheijinei long-bou shuong hoba wakoubü shuong, hoba longleibü si longa küm-mu lebü shuong pendou hebüa lokei.
Haoenei sao lonbü wan ka wankhük longbü hapan ngekkei, “Ho sangnyu yaangbü phatko ai sangyaang ki!”

Haoenei jembü khua thamngu mokan jinko haapyokei hoba mang haapbei. Haoenei ngekkei, “Saoeibü nyaksinam yaangbü danko yungnyu kabü long-bou shuong keitibü sangyaang kho ügütü! ügütü! ügütü! Angh che kanglanga sao mautojana.”
Khuthükei olinashi. Kan Mühghaü mütshuong, kan hangangbü shuong hoba thuseibü shuong, sao leilubü to olinashi. Mühghaüei kan shanga sao khulimbo matjembü hautia.
Hobaje hau kibü khuthük hangangbü cheei wen ngünbü laangdak che tonenkei hoba yungnyu to baman attiko laukei, “Babilon yaangbü sangnyu kho hainyu koulangtilabü hoba ladangkei nyibouje ühüplabü.

Hobaje kongkin tuokbü shuong, chia laubü shuong, pithung hoba teklaang metbü langh ka to ladangkei nyibou aditlabü; jaken yaüenbü aokei ka to nyibou ühüplabü; ngühbü langh ka to ladangkei nyibou aditlabü;

wanthung ngesakbü ka to ladangkei nyibou ühüplabü; hoba chemkanbou ayingsi chemkannyu langh ka to ladangkei nyibou aditlabü. Aishanga kaibü namseibü shuong kho kaodakeibü khulei laanglei shuong kiteikei, hoba phangshuong pendou kho kaibü seibütakbü shuongei khü- pettia.
Hobaje thuseibü shuong sii, Mühghaü mütshuong sii hoba kaodaka haitibü shuong pendoueibü sii sao to hapbei.”
Kho phaia khuthüka noknyüh yaangbü cheei ngekbü langh tegübüei lauko ngei ditkei, “Haliluya! Khümenbü, soneikangbü hoba sei seneibü Mühghaüeibü ki,

aishanga haoeibü matjembü ngühmai hoba saopobü ki. Suonlamnyu aoei sao asangalan yaangbüei kaodak to lusakbü sungbakei, kho sao thükto haoei matjembü hautikei, hoba hao khangenbü shuong haibü shanga haoei sao to phok lambei.”
Hobaje haoenei nyibou laukei, “Haliluya! Hobaje sao ka wankhük ponpen thon akiko angdang leda.”
Hobaje jaishou shuong saoto lei hoba langkeibü meisiau leiei khüpetkei hoba Choba setshanga setan kibou Mühghaü to lembo laukei, “Amen, haliluya!”
Choba setshang ka ngüh longko laukei, “Kan hao khangenbü shuong, hoba kan hao to hatbü shuong, kan hanbü yaangbü pendouei seneibü Mühghaü la nyensang kuashi.”

Hobaje noknyüh cheei ngekbü phatko hoba dei juongnyuei ngühbü tegü hoba langmak yaangeibü langh tegü lauko ngei ditkei, “Haliluya, aishanga Thükenbou, seneibü Bunyubou Mühghaüei haoeibü songdak khanga.
Senei olinkho hoba olinyoakho hoba hao la soneikangbü kuakho, aieilausi San Shoushoueibü chemkan jihsi- phai kho lousüha. Haoeibü chemkannyuei sao lolo lamlea,
hoba hele shanga Mühghaüei sao la inyaibü nei, lailaibü hoba hinseibü neisimei kukei.” Inyaibü neisimei kho Mühghaü mütshuongeibü saopobü kümsilei shuong ki.
Hobaje ngüh khoei kü to laukei, “Ho doashi: San Shoushou Chemkan lem to aoyou ngakei haoen olinbou.” Haoei kü to tokei laukei, “Habü Mühghaü ngüh shuong kho ngühmai ki.”

Hobaje hao to lemla haoyou junga khüpetkei, lausikei haoei kü to laukei, “Khei teküm. Ngo ka yoa hoba kaibü jaisinasi shuong yoa liko khangenbü che ki. Sen pendou Bunyuboueibü ngühchung künbü shuong ki; Mühghaü lemshi. Aishanga Bunyuboueibü ngühchung kho songlen ngüh soushou ki.”
Hobaje ngei khuthük ipan hapbei; hoba khünei koli thupaibü che kikei, hoba khonei setbou kho Maanglemenbou hoba Ngühmai dogo nyenan kikei; aishanga haoei saopobüa matjemda hoba wapyoda.
Haoeibü nyek kho wanlüh ki, hoba haoeibü khua khun juongnyu ki. Haoei hao to liman aoeikei angebü nyen che ki.
Hobaje haoei sii hambü neisimei leakei, hoba hao Mühghaü Ngüh dogo nyenkei.
Hobaje khuthükbü lakoubü shuong inyaibü nei, thupaibü hoba hinseibü neisimei lean koli thupaibü shuonga setan hao phai sembei.

Hobaje phangshuong to ngümla shanga hao sembung ka inlou akbü che loushatda; hoba haoei namjuei haoen thüka songdaklabü, hoba Thükenbou Mühghaü khauang maangpok semlüh hek ngünshang kho haoei nakeilabü.
Hobaje haoeibü neisimeia hoba haoeibü youshia nyen che: “CHOBA SHUONG THÜKA CHOBA HOBA
Hobaje ngei khuthük hangangbü che chanyua loan hapbei. Hobaje haoei mühloma seengeibü aushuong pendou to ngüh yaangbü cheei ngekkei, “Kaiya,

kanei Choba shuong phe, yaangenbü shuong phe hoba hau kibü shuong phe, hoba koli shuong phe hoba khübünei setbü shuong phe, hoba dongebü si aao shuong phe, hoba yaangbü si hanbü müt pendoueibü phe shaula Mühghaü lem yaangbü to takshatashi.”
Hobaje ho kolia setbü hoba haoeibü lakjaibü shuong khulimbo wapyola shanga, ho meisiau hoba kaodak Choba shuong hoba haoeneibü lakjaibü shuong yoshaibü ngei hapbei.

Hobaje meisiau hoba hao yoa laobou amlangbü thuseibüei hao thedanga amaaphilabü kümbei khübünei haoei kho meisiau amaaphilabü sungletbü shuong hoba haoeibü heangsho lembü shuong khüpettikei, haosi ham lapbei. Hobaje wansat moliei longan kibü wan-nang to ham lang lapan jinkei.
Hobaje joubü tan kho kolia setbou sembung ka longbü inlouei haitikei; hoba aushuong pendou haoeneibü pheei senyüh shembei.
Hobaje thonshang akibü püngkhün koukhin hoba yangmen yaangbünyu hao ika jungan khuthük hangangbü che khuthük ka louyenko ngei hapbei.
Hobaje haoei dragon, khei hangbü pinyu, laobou shabü mühghaü ayingsi Satan, kho lapbei hoba po hajar che shanga hao khühan phokei.

Hobaje haoei hao thonshang akibü püngkhün to jinkei, hoba po hajar che kho apen shongko, haoei phangshuong khüpettila athüktila shanga hao khünglepbei, hoba kho thüka amaaphilabü shangjinkei. Kho phaia hao jih tuisho shanga litilabü.

Hobaje ngei Choba setshang hapbei, hoba kho thüka haoen setkei, hoba haoen la matjemlabü kuan kikei. Hobaje Jisu aukabü shanga hoba Mühghaü ngühlang songlenbü shanga aoyou khu thetkei khübüeibü soushou shuong ngei hapbei. Haoenei meisiau ayingsi haoeibü heangsho alem, hoba haoeneibü khüngja si haoeneibü ika haoenei amaaphilabü shangjinbü asunglet. Haoen langkeingaikei hoba Jisu yoa po hajar che songdakkei.
(Po hajar che kho apen shongko joubü haibü shuong kho nyibou alangkei.) Kho shaangbou langngaibü ki.

Kho shaangbou langngaibüa thujambü shuong haübou hoba saopobü dan ki. Haoen thüka nyiboubü haibüei sei aki, lausikei haoen Mühghaüeibü hoba Khristaeibü ungshedbou shuong ki, hoba haoenei hao yoa po hajar che songdaklabü.
Hobaje ladang po hajar che kho onlaje, Satan kho haoeibü thüngdang ka litilabü,
hoba kaodak kaonyek leia kibü phangshuong, Gog si Magog, haoen khüpettiko takshatla shanga hao haulabü; haoeneibü lühbak kho yungnyu phetsen maimai ki.
Haoen kaonyudak pendou phambo haukei hoba Mühghaü mütshuong shaishang si haoei sanoubü sangnyu komlepbei, lausikei khuthük ka wan lotkei hoba haoen lonkei.

Hobaje haoen khüpettibou kaokabü mühghaü kho, wan hoba wansat moli püngkhüna, laonei ho meisiau si amlangbü thuseibü kida, khüto lapan jinkei. Khonei haoen change nangnak ponpen thon akiko khonkulabü.
Hobaje Choba setshang thupaibü yaangbü che hoba khonei setbou ngei hapbei. Hobaje kaodak si khuthük haothe ka satkei hoba kishang ühüpbo maukei.

Hobaje Choba setshang thedanga haibü shuong hanbü hoba yaangbü pendou loan ngei hapbei, hoba le shuong ipbei. Hobaje lubü le, langkei le kho ipbei. Hobaje khübü lea doan kibü tegü, haibü shuong jembü kümsilei thüng matjembei.
Hobaje yungnyuei jembü to kibü haibü shuong khümbomeiko kukei, hoba haibü si Yemsangei jembü to kibü haibü shuong khümbo kuan apbei; hoba mütpem weko jembü kümsilei thüng matjembei.
Hobaje haibü si Yemsang molowana jinkei. Ho nyiboubü haibü, khei wan-nang püngkhün ki.
Hobaje ateibü nyen langkei lea doan akitei longa hao molowan to jinkei.
Hobaje khuthük haanbü hoba kaodak haanbü che ngei hapbei; aishanga shaangbou khuthük si shaangbou kaodak kho dana, hoba yungnyu touje aki.
Hobaje jembü lao shanga chemkannyuei hele lamlebü tegü lamlean, saopobü sangyaang, haanbü Jerusalem, Mühghaü jungka khuthük ka louyenko ngei hapbei.

Hobaje Choba setshang ka ngüh yaangbüei lauko ngei ditkei, “Chühashi, Mühghaü müt yoa kila louakei. Hao haoen yoa kilabü hoba haoen kho hao mütshuong yinglabü; Mühghaü jembü lolo haoen yoa kilabü hoba haoeneibü Mühghaü yinglabü.
