Haoei haoeneibü nyek ka nyeksi pendou haman apbulabü hoba haibü touje akilabü, mang haap- yobü ayingsi haaplabü ayingsi khonku touje akilabü; aishanga shaangbü shuong dankhüma.”
Hobaje Choba setshanga setbouei laukei, “Chühashi, ngei pendou haanbü kümda.” Hobaje haoei lauda, “Doashi: Aishanga habü ngüh mailemlabü hoba ngühmai ki.”
Hobaje haoei kü to laukei, “Khübü loushada. Ngo Alfa hoba Omega, khangbü hoba shembü. Deilabü la ngei langkei dei pakshang ka mu aleko ong yungtilabü.
Aoei thükenda haoei habü phet phanlabü; hoba ngo hao Mühghaü yinglabü, hoba hao küshou yinglabü.

Lausikei hattembü, maialembü, mangsenlabü, müt haitibü shuong, asang- alanbü, seibütakbü shuong, heangsho lembü shuong, hoba yepeibü shuong pendou wan hoba wansat wankhükei longan kibü molowan phejan haplabü: kho nyiboubü haibü ki.”

Hobaje thonbü shieinangei nyetei shenko thung nyet jungbü khuthük hangangbü nyet yo ka che kü jungto loukei hoba kü to joyokei. Haoei laukei, “Kaiya, ngei ka la leiyetnyu, San Shoushoueibü yak kho lenlabü.”
Soushoua haoei ngo shongh yaangbü hoba suokbü che to leiangkei, hoba haoei saopobü sangyaang, haanbü Jerusalem, Mühghaü jungka khuthük ka
Mühghaü soneikangbüei shenan louyenko kü la haptikei. Khoeibü ngesakbü kho, khei namseklaang, chalongphat hinseibü jasper maimai kiteikei.
Khonei laang ba yaangbü hoba suokbü, hoba bakou anthüknyi kikei hoba bakoua khuthük hangangbü anthüknyi kikei. Hobaje khonei Israel shousi phang anthüknyi nyen doan kiteikei.
Chaang aenei bakou sem, yungthang aenei bakou sem, yungkük aenei bakou sem hoba chanep aenei bakou sem kikei.
Hobaje sangyaang laang ba khünei kishang anthüknyi kikei, hoba khonei San Shoushou hangangbü anthüknyi nyen anthüknyi doan kikei.
Hobaje kho sangyaang hoba khübü bakou shuong takla shanga kü to joyobouei honeibü phodong takjin che kikei.
Hobaje sangyaang kho chemnyek lei, süng si khaang jetei ong kikei. Haoei phodongei sangyaang kho takan chühsi mail hajar cheto saongao ngao kiteikei. Khoeibü süng, khaang hoba suokbü jetei ong kikei.
Hobaje haoei kümthang takkei; kho müt che, khei khuthük hangangbüei takbüei phak khujinto lak kikei.
Hobaje kümthang kho jasperei thenyokei, hoba sangnyu kho lanbü hon hinseibü mangchüh tegübüei yaükei.
Sangyaang laangshong ba denshang kho namseklaang phang pendouei hemaiko yaükei. Shaangbou denshang kho jasper kikei, nyiboubü, kho safir, semboubü kho agate, leiboubü kho emerald,
ngaoboubü kho sardonika, lakboubü kho sardia, nyetboubü kho khrisol, setboubü kho beril, güboubü kho topaz, anboubü kho khrisopras, anthükche boubü kho jasin, hoba anthüknyi boubü kho amethis.
Hobaje bakou anthüknyi kho phülem anthüknyi kiteikei: bakou weko kho phülem che bangei kümbei. Hobaje sangnyu khongchi kho mangshoubü mangchüh tegü hon hinseibü kiteikei.
Hobaje sangyaang khünei ngei ai lembüchem ühüp; aishanga pendou Thükenbou Bunyubou Mühghaü hoba San Shoushou kho lembüchem ki.
Hobaje sangyaang khonei hautila shanga chanyu ayingsi litnyu ngesakbü akhamda, aieilausi Mühghaü soneikangbüei kho ngesaktikei, hoba San Shoushou khoeibü wanthung ki.
Hobaje phangshuongei kho ngesakbü maanga pailabü, hoba kaodak Choba shuongei haoeneibü soneikangbü kho maangto sungbalabü.
Hobaje ho bakou chaloua ladangkei akhinlabü, hoba khonei nangnak akilabü.
Hobaje haoenei phangshuongeibü soneikangbü hoba nyenhang khüto sungbalabü.
Hobaje denche ihinseibü, ayingsi mangsenlabü jungeibü hoba yepeibü khüto aokei ütlabü lausikei aoyou nyen ong ho San Shoushoueibü langkei lea doan ki haoen ong atlabü.
Hobaje khuthük hangangbüei Mühghaü hoba San Shoushou Choba setshang ka chalong phatko lailaitham koubü langkei dei shumang che kü la lenkei.
Ho sangyaang khongchi ka koukei. Hobaje deiko jijinei langkei bunyu chebang kikei, hoba khoei buhek phang anthüknyi hekda, hoba lita che hekda, hoba bunyu yik kho phangshuong mailabü shanga kiteikei.
Hobaje shedsikhau touje aikei akilabü. Khünei Mühghaü hoba San Shoushoueibü Choba setshang kilabü, hoba hao khangenbü shuongei hao to lemlabü;
haoenei hao the haplabü, hoba hao nyen kho haoeneibü khüngjaa kilabü.
Touje khünei nangnak akilabü, hoba haoenei wanthung ngesakbü ayingsi chanyu akhamlabü, aieilausi Bunyubou Mühghaüei haoen la ngesakbü kulabü, hoba haoenei ponpen thon akiko songdaklabü.

Hobaje khuthük hangangbüei kü to laukei, “Habü ngüh mailemlabü hoba ngühmai ki, hoba tongde ai loushadlabü ki, kho thuseibü soushou shuong Mühghaü Bunyubouei hao khangenbü shuong to lenla jembü khuthük hangangbü hautikei.
Ditashi! Ngo tongde louada. Aoei ho lea tetenbü ngüh shuong jungeida hao olinbou.”
Hobaje ngo Johanei habü ngüh shuong ditkei hoba hapbei. Ladang ngei khübü ditkei hoba hapbei, laobou khuthük hangangbüei kü la khübü lenkei, hao lemla ngo hao you junga khüpetkei.
Hobaje haoei kü to laukei, “Khei teküm. Ngo ka yoa hoba kaibü jaisina thuseibü shuong hoba ho lea dobü jungeibü shuong yoa liko khangenbü che ki. Mühghaü lemshi.”
Hobaje khuthük hangangbüei kü to laukei, “Habü le tetenbü ngüh shuong amaaphilabü shangjinko tekhin; aishanga pienbü jih lousühda.

Ao ngühmaang alan, hao toukei ngühmaang alanko kijan; hoba ao ihinsei, hao toukei ihinseibü yingjan; hoba ao ngühmaanglanbü ki hao toukei ngühmaanglanko kijan; hoba ao saopobü ki, hao toukei saopotham kijan.”
Bunyubouei lauda, “Ditashi! Ngo tongde louada, hoba mütpem weko la jembü kümsilei thüng kula ngei kü yoa jongsak künbada.
Ngo Alfa hoba Omega, shaangbou hoba thonbou, khangbou hoba shembou.”
Aoyouei jembü nei sakda haoen olinbou; aishanga haoen la langkei bunyu ka shautilabü hoba sangyaang bakhün to lottilabü.
Kei shuong hoba seibütakbü shuong, hoba asangalanbü, hoba müt haitibü shuong, hoba heangsho lembü shuong hoba yepeibü sanoubü hoba jungeibü shuong pendou bataka kilabü.
“Ngo Bunyubouei lashong dan shanga kan to habü ngüh aukabü kula ngeibü khuthük hangangbü hautia. Ngo Dawid li hoba thensilen, soneibü langnge khanyang.”
Soushou hoba Leiyetnyuei lauda, “Kaiya!” Hobaje aoei ditda haoei, “Kaiya!” dogo lenshi. Ao dei lada hao loutikai, hoba aoei mangsühda haoei langkeibü dei mu akuko leashi.
Ho lea tetenbü ditbü shuong mütpem weko to ngei aukabü kuko lenda: Atei habü ngüh to denche shomyoalonga, ho lea doan kibü shieinangei shuong kho müt to Mühghaüei shomyokulabü;
hoba atei ho tetenbü le ngühshuong ka denche apalonga, ho lea doan kibü langkei bunyu hoba saopobü sangyaang ka Mühghaüei hao phejan apbulabü.
Aoei ho ngühlang kuda, haoei lauda, “Haü, ngo tongde louda.” Amen. Bunyubou Jisu, Kaiya!
Bunyubou Jisu onou pendou yoa kishi. Amen.
